column2: Ensi ekaba etari mu buteeka, kandi erimu busha; omwirima gukaba gushwekire amaizi maingi, kandi Omwoyo wa Ruhanga akaba naagyendagyenda ahaiguru y'amaizi.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Habeho omushana. Omushana gwabaho.
Ruhanga yaareeba omushana guri murungi; yaataanisa omushana n'omwirima.
Ruhanga yaayeta omushana Nyomushana, n'omwirima yaagweta Nyekiro. Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro ky'okubanza.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Habeho omwanya ahagati y'amaizi, gutaanise amaizi n'agandi.
Ruhanga yaataho ogwo mwanya, gwataanisa amaizi g'ahansi yaagwo n'ag'ahaiguru yaagwo. Kyaba nikwo kyaba.
Ruhanga yaayeta ogwo mwanya Eiguru. Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro kya kabiri.
Ruhanga yaayeta eryo itaka Ensi, n'eiteeraniro ry'amaizi yaaryeta Enyanja. Ruhanga yaareeba kiri kirungi.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Ensi emere ebirikumera, ebirikwera enjuma, kandi n'ebiti ebirikwana ebijuma, ebirimu embibo, buri kimwe omu muringo gwakyo. Kyaba nikwo kyaba.
Ensi yaamera ebirikumera, ebirikwera enjuma omu miringo yaabyo, n'ebiti ebirikwana ebijuma ebirimu embibo, buri kimwe omu muringo gwakyo. Ruhanga yaareeba kiri kirungi.
Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro kya kashatu.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Habeho ebirikwaka omu mwanya omu iguru, bitaanise nyomushana na nyekiro; kandi bibe eby'okumanyisa obunaku n'ebiro n'emyaka;
bigume byakye omu mwanya omu iguru, bibone kwakira ensi. Kyaba nikwo kyaba.
Ruhanga yaakora ebirikwaka bihango bibiri, ekirikwaka ekihango okutegyeka nyomushana, kandi ekikye okutegyeka nyekiro; kandi yaakora n'enyonyoozi.
Ruhanga yaabita omu mwanya omu iguru okujwera ensi,
n'okutegyeka nyomushana na nyekiro, kandi n'okutaanisa omushana n'omwirima. Ruhanga yaareeba kiri kirungi.
Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro kya kana.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Amaizi gaijure ebirikwegyendesa ebiine amagara, kandi n'ebirikuguruka bigurukye ahaiguru omu kaabunga.
Ruhanga yaahanga
Ruhanga yaabiha omugisha, naagira ati: Muzaare, mukanye, mwijure omu maizi g'omu nyanja, kandi n'ebirikuguruka bikanye omu nsi.
Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro kya kataano.
Ruhanga yaahanga enyamaishwa z'omu nsi omu miringo yaazo, n'amatungo omu miringo yaago, n'ebirikwekurura ahansi omu miringo yaabyo; Ruhanga yaareeba kiri kirungi.
Ruhanga yaahanga omuntu orikumushusha; omu kushusha kwa Ruhanga yaaba nimwo yaamuhangira; yaahanga omushaija n'omukazi.
Ruhanga yaabaha omugisha, kandi yaabagira ati: Muzaare, mukanye, mwijure ensi, ebe eyaanyu; mutegyekye eby'omu nyanja, n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya, na byona ebiine amagara ebirikwegyendesa ahansi.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Reeba, naabaha ebirikumera byona ebirikwera enjuma, ebiri omu nsi yoona, n'ekiti kyona ekirikwana ebijuma ebirimu embibo; bibe eby'okurya byanyu.

Kandi enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu nsi, n'ebirikuguruka byona eby'omu mwanya, n'ekintu kyona ekirikugyendesa enda, buri kintu kyona ekiine omwitsyo, naabiha ebirikumera byona ebibisi, bibe eby'okurya byabyo. Kyaba nikwo kyaba.
Ruhanga yaareeba byona ebi ahangire; kandi reeba, bikaba biri birungi munonga. Bwaira, bwasheesha, kyaba ekiro kya mukaaga.
Eiguru n'ensi n'ebirimu byona byahwa kuhangwa.
Aha kiro kya mushanju Ruhanga yaaheza ebi yaabaire naakora; kandi aha kiro ekyo yaahuumura emirimo ye yoona ei yaakozire.
Ruhanga yaaha omugisha ekiro kya mushanju, yaakyeza; ahabw'okuba nikyo yaahuumuriireho emirimo yoona ei yaakozire omu kuhanga kwe.
Okwo nikwo kuhangwa kw'eiguru n'ensi obu byahangwa.
Obu MUKAMA Ruhanga yaahanga ensi n'eiguru,
hakaba hatariho kishaka kyona aha nsi, kandi n'obunyaatsi bwona bukaba butakamezire ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga akaba atakagwisize njura aha nsi, kandi hatariho muntu weena w'okuhinga eitaka;
kwonka oruho rukaba rwimuka, rujubya ensi yoona.
Bwanyima MUKAMA Ruhanga yaahanga omuntu omu mucuucu gw'ahansi, yaamuhuuha omu nyindo omwitsyo gw'amagara, omuntu yaaba ohuriire.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaamezamu omuti gwona ogurikushemeza amaisho, n'omuti gwona ogushemereire kuriibwa; kandi ahagati y'ekibanja yaataho omuti gw'amagara, n'omuti ogw'okumanya oburungi n'obubi.
Kandi omugyera gukaba gusheneneka niguruga omuri Edeni, kufukiiriza ekyo kibanja; kandi gukihika aho, gwebaganisamu emigyera ena.
Ogw'okubanza gukaba nigwetwa Pishoni; ogwo nigwo gweziguurukire ensi yoona eya Havila erimu ezaabu;
kandi ezaabu ey'omu nsi egyo ni nungi; na
Eiziina ry'omugyera gwa kabiri ni Gihoni; ogwo nigwo gweziguurukire ensi yoona ya Kuushi.
Eiziina ry'ogwa kashatu ni Hidekeeli; ogwo nigwo guraba omu maisho g'ensi ya Asiria. Kandi omugyera ogwa kana ni Furaati.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaatwara ogwo muntu, yaamuta omu kibanja ky'omuri Edeni okukihinga n'okukirinda.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaaragiira ogwo muntu, naagira ati: Omuti gwona ogw'omu kibanja noikirizibwa kuryaho nk'oku orikwenda;
kwonka omuti gw'okumanya oburungi n'obubi otariguryaho, ahabw'okuba eizooba eri origuryaho, buzimazima oryafa.
Bwanyima MUKAMA Ruhanga yaagira ati: Ti kirungi omuntu kuguma wenka; ka mmukorere omuhwezi omushemereire.

MUKAMA Ruhanga yaahanga omu itaka enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa, n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya byona; yaabireetera ogwo muntu, ngu areebe oku araabyete; kandi oku yaayetsire ekihangirwe kyona ekiine amagara, niryo ryabaire eiziina ryakyo.
Ogwo muntu yaayeta amatungo goona n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa amaziina; kwonka omuhwezi omushemereire akaba atakabonekire.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaagwejegyeza ogwo muntu obutasisiimuka; ku yaagwejegyeire, yaamwihamu orubaju rumwe, yaagarura enyama omu mwanya gwarwo;
orwo rubaju oru MUKAMA Ruhanga yaihire omu muntu, yaaruhangamu omukazi, yaamureetera ogwo muntu.
Omuntu yaagira ati: Ogu n'eigufa eryaruga omu magufa gangye, kandi n'omubiri ogwaruga omu mubiri gwangye; ayetwe omukazi, ahakuba yaihwa omu mushaija.
Nikyo omushaija aritsigiraho ishe na nyina, akaguma n'omukazi we; bombi bakaba omubiri gumwe.
Kandi ogwo mushaija n'omukazi we bombi bakaba bataine ki bajwaire, kandi batarikukwatwa nshoni.
Omukazi yaagarukamu enjoka ati: Nitwikirizibwa kurya ebijuma by'emiti y'omu kibanja,
kureka ebijuma by'omuti oguri ahagati y'ekibanja; nibyo Ruhanga yaagizire ati: Mutaribirya, n'obu kwakuba okubikoraho, mutakaafa.
Enjoka yaagambira omukazi eti: Okufa kwo, buzima timurifa;
ahabw'okuba Ruhanga naamanya ngu eizooba eri muriguryaho, amaisho gaanyu garyaiguka, naimwe mube nka Ruhanga, mumanye oburungi n'obubi.
Omukazi ku yaareebire omuti guri murungi kurya, nigushemeza amaisho, kandi nigwetengwa ahabw'okuha omuntu obwengye, yaacwa aha bijuma byagwo, yaarya, yaahaho na iba, nawe yaarya.
Ahonaaho amaisho gaabo bombi gaiguka, baamanya ku bajwaire busha, baayebaziirira amababi g'omutiini g'okwekingaho.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaayeta omushaija, naagira ati: Ori nkahi?
Omushaija yaagira ati: Naakuhurira ori omu kibanja; naatiina, ahakuba naaba njwaire busha; naayeshereka.
Ruhanga yaamubuuza ati: N'oha okugambiire ku ojwaire busha? Waarya aha muti ogu naakuzibiire kuryaho?
Omushaija yaagarukamu ati: Omukazi ou wampaire kuguma naanye, niwe yampa aha bijuma by'ogwo muti, naanye nkarya.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaabuuza omukazi ati: Iwe ekyo waakora ki? Omukazi yaagarukamu ati: Enjoka niyo yambeihabeiha, naanye nkarya.
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaagira enjoka ati: Ahabw'okukora ekyo, waakyeenwa okukira amatungo goona n'enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa; oryaguma ogyendesa enda, orye omucuucu ebiro byona eby'amagara gaawe;
kandi ndyata obuzigu ahagati yaawe n'ogu mukazi, n'ahagati y'oruzaaro rwawe n'orwe; orwe ruryakuteera omutwe, naiwe oryaruteera ekitsintsiino.
Yaakubuukana omukazi, yaamugira ati: Ndyakanyisa munonga obusaasi bwawe omu kuzaara; omu busaasi nimwo orizaarira abaana; n'okwetenga kwawe kuryaguma kube ahari baro; nawe aryakutegyeka.

Kandi yaagira Adamu ati: Ahabw'okuhurira eiraka ry'omukazi waawe, okarya aha muti ogu naakuzibiire kuryaho, eitaka ryakyeenwa ahabwawe; oryaguma oriihemu eby'okurya obihendekyeire ebiro byona eby'amagara gaawe;
riryakumerera amahwa n'amatojo; oryaguma otungwe ebirikumera omu misiri;
ebi orirya biryakutuutura aha maisho, okuhitsya obu origaruka omu itaka; ahakuba nimwo waihirwe; ahabw'okuba ori omucuucu, n'omumucuucu nimwo origaruka.
Omushaija yaayeta omukazi we eiziina
MUKAMA Ruhanga yaakorera Adamu n'omukazi we ebijwaro by'empu, yaabajweka.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA Ruhanga yaamwiha omu kibanja kya Edeni, ngu aze kuhinga eitaka eri yaihirwemu,
Ruhanga nikwo kubinga omuntu, akata
Bwanyima Adamu yaamanya Haawa omukazi we, yaagira enda, yaazara Kaini; yaagira ati: Ntungire omwana w'omwojo ahabw'okuhwerwa MUKAMA.
Yaagaruka, yaazaara Abeeli omurumuna. Abeeli yaaba omuriisa w'entaama, Kaini we yaaba omuhingi.
Ebiro ku byagyenzire nibihingura, Kaini yaareetera MUKAMA omutoijo gw'ebi yaahingire.
Na Abeeli yaareeta aha mijigaijo y'entaama ze n'ebishaju byazo. Ruhanga yaasiima Abeeli n'ebi yaatoija;
kwonka tiyaasiima Kaini n'ebi yaatoija. Kaini yaagira ekiniga kingi, yairirimba aha maisho.
MUKAMA yaabuuza Kaini ati: N'enki ekyakukwatsa ekiniga? Kandi n'enki ekyakwiririmbya aha maisho?
Ku oraakore gye, torikwija kusiimwa? Kwonka ku oraabe otakozire gye, ekibi nikiija kuguma kibandami aha rwigi, kikugwereire; kwonka iwe oshemereire kukitegyeka.
Kaini yaagambira Abeeli omurumuna ati: Ija, tuze omu ishwa. Ku baahikireyo, Kaini yaagurukira Abeeli omurumuna, yaamwita.
MUKAMA yaabuuza Kaini ati: Abeeli murumuna waawe arahi? Kaini yaagarukamu ati: Tindikuhamanya. Niinye murinzi wa murumuna wangye?
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Eki waakora ki? Eiraka ry'eshagama ya murumuna waawe nirimpururiza omu itaka.
Mbwenu hati waakyeenwa omu nsi, eyaayashamya akanwa kumira eshagama ya murumuna waawe, ei omukono gwawe gwasheesha;
ku orihinga eitaka, tiririkwereza by'okurya; oryaguma ori empungi, n'ekizengyerezi omu nsi.
Kaini yaagira MUKAMA ati: Ekifubiro eki wampa ni kihango, tikirikubaasa kwemerwa.
Reeba, eri izooba wancwa aha itaka, kandi tinkireebwa mu maisho gaawe; ndyaguma ndi empungi n'ekizengyerezi omu nsi; kandi orindeeba weena aryanyita.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Mbwenu oriita Kaini, ahoorwe emirundi mushanju. MUKAMA yaata ahari Kaini akamanyiso, ngu orimubugana weena atarimwita.
Bwanyima Kaini yaaruga omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaatuura omu nsi ya Noodi aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Edeni.
Bwanyima Kaini yaamanya omukazi we, yaagira enda, yaazaara Enoka; yaayombeka orurembo, yaarweterera ogwo mutabani Enoka.
Enoka yaazaara Iradi; Iradi yaazaara Mehuyaeli; Mehuyaeli yaazaara Mesushaeli; na Mesushaeli yaazaara Lameka.
Lameka yaashwera abakazi babiri, omwe naayetwa Ada, n'ondiijo naayetwa Ziila.
Ada yaazaara Yabali; niwe ishenkuru w'abariisa b'ente abatuura omu mahema.
Kandi omurumuna orikwetwa Yubali niwe ishenkuru w'abateezi b'enanga n'emikuri.
Na Ziila yaazaara Tubali-kaini, omuheesi w'ebintu byona ebirikushara eby'emiringa n'eby'ebyoma; na munyaanya wa Tubali-kaini akaba ari Naama.
Lameka yaagira abakazi be ati:
Ada na Ziila, mumpurire;
Naimwe baka Lameka, muhurire ebi ndikugamba;
Nyitsire omushaija ahabw'okumputaaza,
N'omutsigazi ahabw'okunteera.
Kaini ku araabe naahoorerwa emirundi mushanju,
Buzima Lameka naija kuhoorerwa emirundi makumi mushanju na mushanju.
Adamu yaagaruka yaamanya omukazi we, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yamweta Seezi; ahakuba Haawa akagira ati: Ruhanga yanshumbuusha ondiijo mwana omu mwanya gwa Abeeli, ou Kaini yaitsire.
Na Seezi yaazaara omwojo, yaamweta Enosi; omu bunaku obwo abantu baatandika kutakira eiziina rya MUKAMA.
Eki n'ekitabo ky'oruzaaro rwa Adamu. Aha izooba eri Ruhanga yaahangiireho omuntu, akamuhanga naashushana nawe;
yaahanga omushaija n'omukazi, yaabaha omugisha, yaabeeta Omuntu, aha izooba eri baahangiirweho.
Adamu ku yaamazire emyaka igana na makumi ashatu, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo orikumushusha omu muringo gwe, yaamweta Seezi.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Seezi, yaamara emyaka magana munaana ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Adamu yaamazire yaahika magana mwenda na makumi ashatu; yaafa.
Seezi ku yaamazire emyaka igana n'etaano, yaazaara Enosi;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Enosi, yaamara emyaka magana munaana na mushanju, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Seezi yaamazire, yaahika magana mwenda na ikumi n'ebiri; yaafa.
Enosi ku yaamazire emyaka makumi mwenda, yaazaara Kenani;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Kenani, yaamara emyaka magana munaana na ikumi n'etaano, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Enosi yaamazire yaahika magana mwenda na'itaano; yaafa.
Kenani ku yaamazire emyaka makumi mushanju, yaazaara Mahalaleeli;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Mahalaleeli, yaamara emyaka magana munaana na makumi ana, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Kenani yaamazire, yaahika magana mwenda na ikumi; yaafa.
Mahalaleeli ku yaamazire emyaka makumi mukaaga n'etaano, yaazaara Yaredi;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Yareedi, yaamara emyaka magana munaana na makumi ashatu, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Mahalaleeli yaamazire yaahika magana munaana na makumi mwenda n'etaano; yaafa.
Yaredi ku yaamazire emyaka igana na makumi mukaaga n'ebiri, yaazaara Enoka;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Enoka, yaamara emyaka magana munaana, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Yaredi yaamazire yaahika magana mwenda na makumi mukaaga n'ebiri; yaafa.
Enoka ku yaamazire emyaka makumi mukaaga n'etaano, yaazaara Mesuseela.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Mesuseela, yaaguma naagyenda na Ruhanga okumara emyaka magana ashatu, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'aishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Enoka yaamazire yaahika magana ashatu na makumi mukaaga n'etaano.
Enoka yaagyenda na Ruhanga, yaabura, ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akamutwara.
Mesuseela ku yaamazire emyaka igana na makumi munaana na mushanju, yaazaara Lameka;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Lameka, yaamara emyaka magana mushanju na makumi munaana n'ebiri, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Mesuseela yaamazire yaahika magana mwenda na makumi mukaaga na mwenda; yaafa.
Lameka ku yaamazire emyaka igana na makumi munaana n'ebiri, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo;
yaamweta Noa, naagira ati: Ogu niwe aritutambira enaku ezi turikureeba omu mirimo n'okufa kubi nitukoresa emikono yaitu, ebirikuruga omu itaka eri MUKAMA yaakyeenire.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Noa, yaamara emyaka magana ataano na makumi mwenda n'etaano, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Emyaka yoona ei Lameka yaamazire yaahika magana mushanju na makumi mushanju na mushanju; yaafa.
Noa ku yaahikize emyaka magana ataano, yaazaara Sheemu, Haamu na Yafeesi.
Abantu ku baatandikire kukanya omu nsi, kandi baazaara abaishiki,
abaana ba Ruhanga baareeba abaishiki b'abantu bari barungi; baashweramu abakazi boona abu baakunzire.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Omwoyo wangye tariguma naahakana n'abantu ebiro byona; ahakuba n'abantu-buntu; kandi emyaka yaabo eryaba igana na makumi abiri.
Omu biro ebyo hakaba hariho abantu b'ebikaaka; kandi bwanyima y'ebyo abaana ba Ruhanga ku baashweire bahara b'abantu, baabazaaraho abaana; abaana abo nibo bantu b'amaani aba ira abaarangainwe.
MUKAMA yaayefuuza eki yaahangiire omuntu omu nsi, kandi kyamugwisa kubi omu mutima gwe.
MUKAMA nikwo kugira ati: Ndyahwerekyereza abantu abu naahangire omu nsi, mbamareho, abantu n'enyamaishwa n'ebirikugyendesa enda, n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya; ahabw'okuba nyefuurize eki naabihangiire.
Kwonka Noa we Ruhanga yaamugirira embabazi.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Noa. Noa akaba ari ohikiriire, otaine kabara omu busingye bwe. Noa yaaguma naagyenda na Ruhanga.
Kandi Noa akaba aine abaana bashatu b'aboojo, Sheemu, Haamu na Yafeesi.
Ensi ekaba esiisikaire omu maisho ga Ruhanga, eijwire eiraro.
Ruhanga yaareeba ensi, kandi reeba, ekaba esiisikaire, ahakuba byona ebiine omubiri bikaba biherize kusiisikara omu mitwarize yaabyo.
Ruhanga yaagambira Noa ati: Mmaririire kumaraho abaine omubiri boona; ahabw'okuba bareeteire ensi kwijura eiraro; reeba ndyabahwerekyereza hamwe n'ensi.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyekorere emeeri omu muti ogurikwetwa goferi, ocwemu ebishengye, ogisiigye koroto omunda n'enyima.
Kandi oku nikwo oraagikore; oburaingwa bwayo bube mikono magana ashatu, obuhango bwayo mikono makumi ataano, n'obwemi bwayo mikono makumi ashatu.
Ku oriheza ahaiguru, ocwemu edirisa okuruga ahaiguru mukono gumwe; omuryango gwayo ogucwe omu rubaju; kandi ogitemu kanyinaibiri na kanyinaishatu.
Kandi reeba, ndyareeta omwegyemure gw'amaizi, gushwekye ensi okucwekyereza byona ebiine omubiri n'omwitsyo gw'amagara, mbimareho ahansi y'eiguru; ebiri omu nsi byona bife.
Kwonka ndyahamya endagaano yangye naiwe; oryataaha omu meeri na batabani baawe n'omukazi waawe na bakaamwana baawe.
Aha bintu byona ebiine amagara oryataasya bibiri bibiri ebya buri muringo, obirinde bigume naiwe bihuriire; biryaba ekishaija n'ekikazi.
Aha birikuguruka omu miringo yaabyo, aha nyamaishwa omu miringo yaazo n'aha birikugyendesa enda omu miringo yaabyo, bibiri bibiri ebya buri muringo biryaija ahariiwe, obirinde bigume bihuriire;
kandi oyetwarire aha by'okurya byona ebirikuriibwa, obyehunikire, bibe eby'okurya byawe n'eby'ebi oine byona.
Noa yaakora atyo, nka byona ebi Ruhanga yaamuragiire oku biri; kandi yaaba nikwo yaatwaza.
Aha nyamaishwa ezitarikuzira otwareho mushanju mushanju, ekishaija n'ekikazi; aha zirikuzira ibiri ibiri, enshaija n'enkazi;
n'aha birikuguruka nabyo mushanju mushanju, ekishaija n'ekikazi, oruzaaro rwabyo rubone kugumaho omu nsi yoona.
Ahakuba ebiro mushanju ku biraahwe, niinyija kugwisa enjura aha nsi okumara ebiro makumi ana, nyomushana na nyekiro; kandi buri kintu kyona ekihuriire eki naahangire, ndyakimariraho kimwe aha nsi.
Noa yaakora byona nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Obu omwegyemure gw'amaizi gwaija aha nsi, Noa akaba ahikize emyaka magana mukaaga.
Noa yaataaha omuri egyo meeri n'abatabani n'omukazi we na bakaamwana, ahabw'omwegyemure gw'amaizi.
Aha nyamaishwa ezitarikuzira n'ezirikuzira n'aha birikuguruka, n'aha birikugyendesa enda byona,
haataaha bibiri bibiri, byashanga Noa omu meeri, ekishaija n'ekikazi, nk'oku Ruhanga yaaragiire Noa.
Ebiro mushanju ku byahingwire, omwegyemure gw'amaizi gwashandaara aha nsi.
Enjura yaamara ebiro makumi ana neegwa nyomushana na nyekiro.
Eryo izooba Noa n'abatabani, Sheemu, Haamu na Yafeesi, n'omukazi we na bakaamwana bashatu baataaha omu meeri.
Bo n'enyamaishwa zoona omu miringo yaazo, n'amatungo goona omu miringo yaago, n'ebirikugyendesa enda ahansi byona omu miringo yaabyo, n'ebirikuguruka byona, enyonyi z'emiringo yoona,
byona byashanga Noa omu meeri, bibiri bibiri ahari byona ebiine omubiri n'omwitsyo gw'amagara.
Ebyataahiremu byona hakataaha ekishaija n'ekikazi, nk'oku Ruhanga yaamuragiire; MUKAMA yaamukingiranamu.
Omwegyemure gwamara aha nsi ebiro makumi ana; amaizi gaakanya, gaimutsya emeeri, yaaruga aha nsi.
Amaizi gaakanya, gaaba maingi munonga aha nsi; emeeri yaaguma neegazeereeraho.
Amaizi gaayeyongyera munonga kushandaara aha nsi; enshozi zoona ez'ahansi y'eiguru zaashwekwa amaizi.
Amaizi gaayeyongyera kwijura, gaahika ahaiguru mikono ikumi n'etaano okuruga aha mitwe y'enshozi.
Ebiine omubiri byona ebirikwegyendesa byafa, ebirikuguruka n'amatungo n'enyamaishwa n'ebirikugyendesa enda ahansi byona, na buri muntu weena;
byona ebyabaire biri ahansi, ebiine omwitsyo gw'amagara, byafa.

Buri kintu kyona ekihuriire ekyabaire kiri ahansi kyacwekyerezibwa, abantu, enyamaishwa, ebirikugyendesa enda n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya; byamarirwaho kimwe omu nsi; Noa wenka yaaba niwe yaatsigaraho, n'abu yaabaire aine omu meeri.
Kandi amaizi gaamara ebiro igana na makumi ataano, gakishandaire aha nsi.
Enshuro z'okuzimu n'amadirisa g'omu iguru byaigarwa, n'enjura eyaabaire neeruga omu iguru yaazibirwa;
amaizi gaaguma nigatuuba aha nsi; bwanyima y'ebiro igana na makumi ataano amaizi gaabaganukaho;
emeeri yaahika aha nshozi za Araraati aha kiro kya ikumi na mushanju ky'okwezi kwa mushanju.
Amaizi gaaguma nigatuuba okuhitsya omu kwezi kwa ikumi; aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwo kwezi emitwe y'ebibungo yaareebeka.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro makumi ana, Noa yaigura edirisa y'emeeri ei yaakozire;
yaashohoza ekikoona, kyaguma nikizengyerera okuhitsya obu amaizi gaayomeire kimwe aha nsi.
Kandi yaashohoza enkombe, ngu amanye amaizi ku garaabe gaayomire ahansi;
kwonka enkombe tiyaabona h'okuteekama, yaagaruka kumushanga omu meeri, ahabw'okuba amaizi gakaba gakishwekire ensi yoona; yaashohoza omukono gwe, yaagikwata, yaagitaasya omu meeri.
Yaamara ebiro mushanju, yaagaruka yaashohoza egyo nkombe;
egyo nkombe yaagaruka ahariwe omu mwabazyo; kandi reeba, ekaba eine akababi k'omuzeituuni omu kanwa. Ekyo kyamanyisa Noa ku amaizi gaatuubire aha nsi.
Noa yaamara ebindi biro mushanju, yaashohoza egyo nkombe; yaagyenderayo, tiyaagaruka.

Omu mwaka gwa magana mukaaga na gumwe, omu kwezi kw'okubanza, aha kiro ky'okubanza, amaizi gaayomera kimwe aha nsi; Noa yaihaho ekyabaire kishwekire emeeri, yaanaga amaisho aheeru, kandi reeba, ahansi hakaba hoomire.
Kandi omu kwezi kwa kabiri, aha kiro kya makumi abiri na mushanju, ensi yaayomera kimwe.
Ruhanga yaagambira Noa ati:
Shohora orugye omu meeri, n'omukazi waawe na batabani baawe na bakaamwana baawe.
Kandi oshohoze byona ebiine amagara ebi obaire oine, ebiine omubiri byona, ebirikuguruka n'enyamaishwa n'ebirikwekurura ahansi, bibone kuzaara munonga omu nsi, bikanye, bigiijuremu.
Noa yaashohora n'abatabani n'omukazi we na bakaamwana;
enyamaishwa zoona, ebirikugyendesa enda byona, ebirikuguruka byona, na byona ebirikwegyendesa aha nsi, nk'enganda zaabyo oku zaabaire ziri, byaruga omu meeri.
Bwanyima Noa yaayombekyera MUKAMA eitambiro, yaatoorana enyamaishwa n'ebirikuguruka ebya buri ruganda orutarikuzira, yaabitambira aha itambiro kuba ebitambo byokize.

MUKAMA yaahurira ekisooroora kirungi, yaagira omu mutima gwe ati: Tindikyeena nsi obundi ningitura omuntu, ahakuba ebiteekateeko by'omu mutima gw'omuntu biba bibi okuruga omu buto bwe; kandi tindigaruka kwita kintu kyona ekiine amagara, nk'oku nkozire.
Omu bunaku bwona ensi ekiriho, eibiba n'eigyesha, embeho n'obutagatsi, ekyanda n'eitumba, nyomushana na nyekiro, tibirihwaho.
Ruhanga yaaha Noa n'abatabani omugisha, yaabagira ati: Muzaare, mukanye, mwijure ensi.
Enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu nsi n'ebirikuguruka byona muryabiitsa obwoba, bibatiine, na byona ebirikugyendesa enda ahansi n'eby'omu nyanja byona; mubihairwe kubitegyeka.
Ebirikwegyendesa byona ebiine amagara biryaba eby'okurya byanyu; mbibahaire byona, nk'oku naabahaire ebirikumera.
Kwonka mutarirya enyama n'amagara gaayo, niyo shagama yaayo.
Kandi buzima eshagama y'amagara gaanyu ndyagihoora, ngihoorere enyamaishwa yoona n'omuntu; amagara g'omuntu weena ndyagahoora ahabwa mugyenzi we.
Orisheesha eshagama y'omuntu, n'eye baryagisheesha; ahakuba Ruhanga akahangira omuntu omu muringo gwe.
Mbwenu muzaare, mukanye, muzaare munonga omu nsi, mugiijure.
Ruhanga yaagambira Noa n'abatabani, ati:
Reeba, nyowe naahamya endagaano yangye naimwe, kandi na baijukuru baanyu abaribakurata,
n'ebihangirwe byona ebiine amagara ebiri hamwe naimwe, ebirikuguruka, amatungo n'enyamaishwa yoona eri hamwe naimwe omu nsi, nka byona ebirugire omu meeri oku biri.
Kandi nimpamya endagaano yangye naimwe, ebiine omubiri byona tibirigaruka kucwekyerezibwa maizi g'omwegyemure; kandi tiharigaruka kubaho mwegyemure kucwekyereza ensi.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Aka niko kamanyiso k'endagaano ei naaragaana naimwe na buri kihangirwe kyona ekiine amagara ekiri hamwe naimwe okuhitsya obusingye bwona;
naata omuhanganzima gwangye omu kicu, gugume guri akamanyiso k'endagaano ei naaragaana n'ensi.
Ahu ndihikisiza enjura hoona, omuhanganzima gwareebeka omu bicu,
ndyaijuka endagaano yangye naimwe n'ekihangirwe kyona ekiine omubiri; amaizi tigarigaruka kuba omwegyemure gw'okuhwerekyereza ebiine omubiri byona.
Omuhanganzima ku guriba guri omu bicu, ndyagureeba, nyijukye endagaano etarihwaho ey'Omuhangi n'ekihangirwe kyona ekiine amagara ekiri omu nsi.
Ruhanga yaagambira Noa ati: Aka niko kamanyiso ak'endagaano ei naaragaana n'ebiine omubiri byona ebiri aha nsi.
Batabani ba Noa abaarugire omu meeri ni Sheemu, Haamu na Yafeesi; kandi Haamu niwe ishe wa Kanaani.
Abo bonshatu nibo batabani ba Noa; kandi nibo baakomookirweho abaabugire ensi yoona.
Noa yaatandika kuhinga; yaabyara omusiri gw'emizaabibu;
yaanywa viinyo yaayo, yaasinda, yaabyama omu ihema rye ajwaire busha.
Haamu ishe wa Kanaani ku yaareebire ishe ajwaire busha, yaashohora, yaagambira bakuru be aheeru.
Sheemu na Yafeesi baatwara ekijwaro, bakitaire aha mabega gaabo bombi, baagyenda ekisiganyima, baashweka ishebo ajwaire busha.
Noa ku yaasinduukire, yaamanya eki omutabani omuto akozire;
yaagira ati: Kanaani akyeenwe; aryaba omuhuuku w'abahuuku ahari beene ishe.
Kandi ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Sheemu asiimwe; kandi Kanaani abe omuhuuku we.
Ruhanga ahangusye Yafeesi; atuure omu mahema ga Sheemu, kandi Kanaani abe omuhuuku we.
Bwanyima y'omwegyemure Noa yaamara emyaka magana ashatu na makumi ataano.
Emyaka yoona ei Noa yaamazire, yaahika magana mwenda na makumi ataano; yaafa.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa beene Noa, Sheemu, Haamu na Yafeesi; omwegyemure gw'amaizi ku gwahweireho, baazaara abaana b'aboojo.
Aba nibo batabani ba Yafeesi, Gomeri, Magogi, Madai, Yavani, Tubalo, Mesheki na Tirasi.
Batabani ba Gomeri ni Ashikenaazi, Rifaasi, na Togaruma;
Batabani ba Yavani ni Elisha, Tarushiishi, Kitimu na Dodanimu.
Abo nibo baakomookirweho abantu abaabugire ensi ez'aha rubaju rw'enyanja; kandi abo nibo beene Yafeesi, buri omwe nk'orurimi rwe oku ruri, omu miryango yaabo n'omu mahanga gaabo.
Aba nibo batabani ba Haamu, Kuushi, Miziraimu, Puuti na Kanaani.
Batabani ba Kuushi ni Seeba, Havila, Sabuta, Raama na Sabuteeka; na batabani ba Raama ni Sheeba na Dedani.
Na Kuushi yaazaara Nimuroodi; yaatandika kuba emanzi omu nsi.
Akaba ari omuhiigi rugambwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA; nk'oku bagira ngu, N'omuhiigi rugambwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA nka Nimuroodi.
Ensi ei yaabandiizemu kuba omugabe ni Shinaari, eyaabaire erimu Babeeli, Ereki, Akadi na Kalune.
Okuruga okwo yaagumizamu yaaza Ashuri, yaayombeka Nineeve, Rehoboosira, Kaala,
na Reseni ey'ahagati ya Nineeve na Kaala, (nirwo rurembo rukuru).
Miziraimu yaazaara Ludimu, Anamimu, Lehabimu, Nafutuhimu,
Patirusimu, Kasiluhimu (owaakomookirweho Abafilistia) na Kafutorimu.
Na Kanaani yaazaara Sidoni omwana w'omujigaijo na Heesi;
n'Abayebusi, Abaamori, Abagirugashi,
Abahiivi, Abaaruki, Abasini,
Abaarivadi, Abazemari, n'Abahamasi. Bwanyima emiryango y'Abanyakanaani yaabuga hoona.
Omwatano gw'Abanyakanaani gukaba nigutandikira Sidoni, gugyema Gerari okuhika Gaaza, kandi gutoora Sodoma, Gomora, Aduma na Zeboimu okuhika Lasha.
Abo nibo beene Haamu nk'emiryango yaabo n'endimi zaabo, n'ensi zaabo n'amahanga gaabo oku byabaire biri.
Na Sheemu mukuru wa Yafeesi, ishenkuru w'abaana ba Eberi boona, nawe yaazaara abaana.
Aba nibo beene Sheemu, Elamu, Ashuri, Arufakisaadi. Ludi na Aramu.
Aramu yaazaara Uzi, Huli, Geseri, na Maasha.
Arufakisaadi yaazaara Sheela, na Sheela yaazaara Eberi.
Eberi yaazaara aboojo babiri; eiziina ry'omwe akaba ari Pelegi, ahabw'okuba omu bunaku bwe nibwo abantu b'omu nsi baabaganisibwamu; kandi omurumuna akaba naayetwa Yokitaani.
Yokitaani yaazaara Alimodaadi, Shelefu, Hazarimaveesi, Yeera,
Hadoramu, Uzali, Dikila,
Obali, Abimaeli, Sheeba,
Ofiri, Havila, na Yobabu; abo boona ni beene Yokitaani.
Ensi ei baabaire batwiremu, ekaba neetandikira Meesha, etoora Sefari, ehika omu nsi y'ebibungo oburugwa-izooba.
Abo nibo baana ba Sheemu nk'emiryango yaabo n'endimi zaabo n'ensi zaabo n'amahanga gaabo oku byabaire biri.
Egyo niyo miryango ya beene Noa nk'oruzaaro rwabo n'amahanga gaabo oku byabaire biri; kandi nibo baakomookirweho amahanga agaabugire hoona omu nsi bwanyima y'omwegyemure.
Ensi yoona ekaba eine orurimi rumwe n'engambo emwe.
Ku baafurukiire oburugwa-izooba, baareeba oruhita omu nsi ya Shinaari; baarutuuramu.
Baagambirana bati: Mwije tubumbe, amatafaari, tugootsye gye. N'ahabw'ekyo baagira amatafaari omu mwanya gw'amabaare, na koroto omu mwanya gw'obudongo.
Baagira bati: Mwije tweyombekyere orurembo n'omunaara, guhikye ahaiguru, tubone kurangaanwa, turekye kutaataanira hoona omu nsi yoona.
MUKAMA yaashuuma kureeba orurembo n'omunaara, ebi abantu baabaire nibombeka.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Reeba, abantu aba n'eihanga rimwe, kandi baine orurimi rumwe; ku baraabe baatandika kukora ebi, omu bi barikuteekateeka kukora, tihariho kiribarema.
Ka tushuume tuhindahindure orurimi rwabo, barekye kuhurirana.
Atyo MUKAMA yaabataataanisa, baarugayo, baabuga ensi yoona; baarekyera aho kwombeka orurembo.
Nikyo rwayeteirwe Babeeli; ahakuba niho MUKAMA yaahindahindwire orurimi rw'ensi yoona; kandi okuruga obwo MUKAMA yaabataataanisa, baabuga ensi yoona.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Sheemu. Ku yaabaire aine emyaka igana, omwegyemure gumazire emyaka ebiri guhweireho, yaazaara Arufakisaadi.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Arufakisaadi, yaamara emyaka magana ataano, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Arufakisaadi, ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu n'etaano, yaazaara Sheela;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Sheela, yaamara emyaka magana ana n'eshatu ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Sheela ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu, yaazaara Eberi.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Eberi, yaamara emyaka magana ana n'eshatu, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Eberi ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu n'ena, yaazaara Pelegi.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Pelegi, yaamara emyaka magana ana na makumi ashatu, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Pelegi ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu, yaazaara Reu;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Reu, yaamara emyaka magana abiri na mwenda, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Reu ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu n'ebiri, yaazaara Serugi.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Serugi, yaamara emyaka magana abiri na mushanju, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Serugi ku yaamazire emyaka makumi ashatu, yaazaara Nahori.
Ku yaaherize kuzaara Nahori, yaamara emyaka magana abiri, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Nahori ku yaamazire emyaka makumi abiri na mwenda, yaazaara Teera;
ku yaaherize kuzaara Teera, yaamara emyaka igana na ikumi na mwenda, ei yaazaariiremu abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Teera. Teera akazaara Abramu na Nahori na Harani; Harani yaazaara Looti,
Harani yaafa ishe akiriho, yaagwa Uri ey'aba Kaludaaya, omu nsi ei yaazaariirwemu.
Abramu na Nahori baashwera; eiziina rya muka Abramu akaba ari Sarai; n'eiziina rya muka Nahori akaba ari Milika, muhara wa Harani, ishe wa Milika, na Isika.
Kwonka Sarai akaba ari engumba, ataine mwana.

Teera yaatwara Abramu omutabani, na Looti mwene Harani omwijukuru, na Sarai omukaamwana, muka omutabani Abramu; baaruga kumwe Uri ey'aba Kaludaaya, kuza omu nsi ya Kanaani; kwonka ku baahikire Harani, baaba niyo baatuura.
Emyaka yoona ei Teera yaamazire yaahika magana abiri n'etaano; yaafa, yaagwa Harani.
ndyakuhindura eihanga rihango; kandi ndyakuha omugisha, ndangaanise eiziina ryawe; naiwe oryahaisa abandi omugisha.
Ndyaha omugisha abarikushabira omugisha, n'orikukyeena ndyamukyeena; kandi omuriiwe enganda zoona ez'omu nsi nimwo ziriheerwa omugisha.
Atyo Abramu yaagyenda, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamugambiire, na Looti yaagyenda nawe; kandi Abramu akaba ahikize emyaka makumi mushanju n'etaano, obu yaaruga Harani.
Abramu yaagyenda na Sarai omukazi we, na Looti omwana w'omurumuna, n'ebi baabaire batungire byona, n'abantu abu baatungiire Haraani; baarugayo kuza omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Ku baahikire omu nsi ya Kanaani,
Abramu yaaraba omu nsi egyo, yaahika omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Shekemu aha mwela gwa Moore. Omu bunaku obwo aba Kanaani bakaba bari omuri egyo nsi.
MUKAMA yaayeyoreka Abramu, yaamugira ati: Ensi egi ndyagiha oruzaaro rwawe. Aho yaayombekyeraho MUKAMA, owaamweyorekire, eitambiro.
Yaarugayo, yaaza omu kibungo aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Beseeli, emuri oburengyerwa-izooba na Ai oburugwa-izooba; okwo nayo yaayombekyerayo MUKAMA eitambiro, yaatakira eiziina rye.
Abramu yaagumizamu, naatoora omu nsi ya Negebu.
Ku yaabaire ari haihi kuhika Misri, yaagambira omukazi we Sarai ati: Reeba nimmanya ku ori omukazi murungi orikureebwa;
kandi aba Misri ku barikureeba, baryagira bati: Ogu n'omukazi we; baanyite, haza iwe bakurekye.
Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, ogume ogire oti: Ni munyaanyazi mbone kutunga omugisha ahabwawe, ndekye kufa, nkaba niiwe naazira.
Abramu ku yaahikire Misri, aba Misri baareeba omukazi ari murungi munonga.
Abanyiginya ba Faraho baamureeba, baamusiimira Faraho; bwanyima baamutwara omu nju ya Faraho.
Faraho yaatwaza gye Abramu ahabwa Sarai; kandi Abramu akaba aine entaama n'ente n'enimi z'endogoya n'abahuuku n'abazaana, ebuguma z'endogoya n'engamira.
MUKAMA yaareetera Faraho n'eka ye ebibonaboneso bingi ahabwa Sarai muka Abramu.
Faraho yaatuma Abramu, yaamugira ati: Beitu shi, ontuzire ki? Ahabw'enki tongambiire ku ari omukazi waawe?
Ongiriire ki oti: Ni munyaanazi? Naanye nikyo mmutwariire kuba omukazi wangye. Mbwenu omukazi waawe ngugwo, omutware, oyegyendere.
Faraho nikwo kuragiira abashaija be oku baraamutwaze; batyo bakamushendekyereza n'omukazi we n'ebi yaabaire aine byona.
Abramu yaaruga Misri n'omukazi we n'ebi yaabaire aine byona, na Looti, baataaha Negebu.
Kandi Abramu akaba ari omutungi munonga, aine amatungo maingi n'efeeza n'ezaabu.
Yaaruga omuri Negebu, yaagumizamu okuhika Beseeli, yaahika omu mwanya ahagati ya Beseeli na Ai, ahu yaabandize kuteera eihema omu kubanza;
kandi aho niho eitambiro eri yaabandize kwombeka, ryabaire riri. Okwo Abramu yaatakirirayo eiziina rya MUKAMA.
Kandi Looti nawe, owaagyenzire na Abramu, akaba aine amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente n'amahema.
Ensi egyo ekaba etabahikire kugituuranamu, ahakuba amatungo gaabo gakaba gari maingi; nikyo baabaire batarikubaasiza kutuura hamwe omuri obwo bunaku.
Abariisa b'Abramu n'aba Looti baagira empaka. Omu bunaku obwo Abanyakanaani n'Abaperizi bakaba batwire omu nsi egyo.
Abramu yaagambira Looti ati: Ninkweshengyereza, turekye kugirirana amahari, n'obu baakuba abariisa bangye n'abaawe; ahabw'okuba turi ishe-emwe.

Ensi yoona tekuri omumaisho? Naakweshengyereza, reka tutaane; ku oraatware orubajurwel bumosho, naanye niinyija aha kuza aha rwa buryo; nari shi ku oraatware orwa buryo, nyowe niinyija kuza aha rwa bumosho.
Looti yaanaga amaisho, yaareeba oruhita rwa Yorudani rwona okuhika Zoari, nirufuka rwona nk'omusiri gwa MUKAMA, nari nk'ensi ya Misri, MUKAMA atakahwerekyereize Sodoma na Gomora.
N'ahabw'ekyo Looti yaihamu oruhita rwa Yorudani rwona; yaatoora oburugwa-izooba. Okwo nikwo baataine.
Abramu yaatuura omu nsi ya Kanaani, na Looti yaatuura omu ndembo z'omu ruhita; yaafurura eihema rye, yaariteera haihi na Sodoma.
Kwonka abantu ba Sodoma bakaba bari abanyabibi, nibacumura munonga ahari MUKAMA.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagambira Abramu, aherize kutaana na Looti, ati: Yema omu mwanya ogu orimu, onagye amaisho, oreebe obukiizi-bwa bumosho n'obwa-buryo, oburugwa-izooba n'oburengyerwa-izooba;
ahakuba ensi egi yoona ei orikureeba, ndyagikuha, ebe eyaawe kandi n'eya baijukuru baawe okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Kandi oruzaaro rwawe ndyarukanyisa, rube nk'omucuucu gw'ahansi; omuntu ku araabe naabaasa kubara omucuucu gw'ahansi, na baijukuru baawe nabo aryabaasa kubabara.
Imuka ogyende, orabe omu nsi egi, oreebe oburaingwa n'obuhango bwayo; ahakuba niiwe ndigiha.
Abramu nikwo kufurura eihema rye, akagyenda, akatuura haihi n'emyela ya Mamure eyaabaire eri Heburooni, akombekyerayo MUKAMA eitambiro.
Omu biro bya Amurafeli omugabe wa Shinaari, na Arioki omugabe wa Elasaari, na Kedolaomeeri omugabe wa Elamu, na Tidali omugabe wa Goyimu,
abo bagabe bakarwanisa Beera omugabe wa Sodoma na Birusha omugabe wa Gomora, na Shinabu omugabe wa Aduma, na Shemebeeri omugabe wa Zeboimu, n'omugabe wa Beela (niyo Zoari).
Abo boona baateeranira engabo zaabo omu ruhita rwa Sidimu, niyo Nyanja y'omwonyo.
Bakaba bamazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri nibakorera Kedolaomeeri; kwonka omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'eshatu baamugomera.
Bwanyima omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'ena Kedolaomeeri yaija n'abagabe abaahurwire nawe, baateera aba Reefa ab'omuri Ashetaroosi-karunaimu, n'aba Zuuzi omuri Haamu, n'aba Emimu omuri Shave-kiryasaimu,
n'aba Hoori, omu bibungo byabo bya Seiri, okuhika Eli-parani, haihi n'eihamba; baabagomoora.
Bwanyima baagaruka, baahika Enimishipati (niyo Kadeshi), baakubuura ensi yoona ey'Abaamaleki, n'Abaamori abaabaire batwire Hazazori-tamaari.
Bwanyima haahurura omugabe wa Sodoma n'owa Gomora n'owa Aduma n'owa Zeboimu n'owa Beela (niyo Zoari), baatenga orugamba omu ruhita rwa Sidimu,
baarwanisa Kedolaomeeri omugabe wa Elamu na Tidali omugabe wa Goyimu na Amurafeeli omugabe wa Shinaari na Arioki omugabe wa Elasari, abagabe bana baarwanisa abataano.
Kandi oruhita rwa Sidimu rukaba rwijwire ebiina bya koroto; abagabe ba Sodoma na Gomora baahunga, abamwe baabigwamu, abandi baahungira omu bibungo.
Abagabe abaababingire baanyaga ebintu byona eby'omuri Sodoma na Gomora n'eby'okurya byabo, baayegyendera.
Baanyagiranamu na Looti, mutabani wa murumuna wa Abramu, owaabaire atwire Sodoma, n'ebintu bye; baagyenda.
Bwanyima haija omwe owaacwire, yaakigambira Abramu Omuheburaayo, owaabaire atwire haihi n'emyela ya Mamure Omuamori, murumuna wa Eshikooli na Aneri; abo bakaba nibakwatanisa na Abramu.
Abramu ku yaahuriire ngu mutabani w'omurumuna anyagirwe, yaahurura n'abashaija be abeegyesiibwe eby'okurwana, abaazairwe omu ka ye, magana ashatu na ikumi na munaana, baabakurata okuhika Daani.
Abramu yaabaganisa omu ngabo ze kubarwanisa nyekiro, yaabateera, yaababinga yaabahitsya Hooba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho obwa Damasiko.
Yaabaaka ebi baabaire banyagire byona, yaagarura na Looti mutabani w'omurumuna n'ebintu bye n'abakazi n'abandi bantu.
Abramu ku yaatabaarukire, naaruga kwita kedolaomeeri n'abagabe abaabaire bahurwire nawe, omugabe wa Sodoma yaashohora kumubuganira omu ruhita rwa Shaave (oruhita rw'omugabe).
Na Melikizedeki omugabe wa Saalemu yaareeta omugaati na viinyo; kandi akaba ari omunyamurwa wa Ruhanga Rukira-boona.
Yaamushabira omugisha, naagira ati: Abramu aheebwe omugisha Ruhanga Rukira-boona. Omuhangi w'eiguru n'ensi;
kandi Ruhanga Rukira-boona, ohaireyo abazigu baawe omu mikono yaawe, asiimwe. Bwanyima Abramu yaamuha ekicweka kya ikumi ekya byona.
N'omugabe wa Sodoma yaagambira Abramu ati: Nyowe mpa abantu, reero iwe eminyago ogyetwarire.
Abramu yaamugarukamu ati: Ndahiire MUKAMA Ruhanga Rukira-boona, Omuhangi w'eiguru n'ensi,
ku ntaritwara kahuuzi n'obu kaakuba akakoba k'enkaito nari ekintu kyawe kyona, nyentsya otakaagira oti: Niinye naatungiise Abramu.
Tinditwara kintu kyona, kureka ebi abatsigazi bariire, n'omugabo gw'abashaija abu mpurwire nabo; kandi Aneri na Eshikooli na Mamure nabo batware omugabo gwabo.
Abramu yaagira ati: Ai Mukama RUHANGA, oryampa ki, obu naaguma ndi encwekye, haza omuhunguzi w'ebyangye ari Eliezeeri owa Damasiko.
Kandi Abramu yaagaruka yaagira ati: Reeba torampaire ruzaaro; kandi owaazaariirwe omu ka yangye niwe ariba omuhunguzi w'ebyangye.
Reeba, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyamwizira, MUKAMA naamugira ati: Ogwo tiwe arihungura ebyawe, kureka omwana, ou oryezaarira, niwe aribihungura.
Yaamushohoza aheeru, yaamugira ati: Rarama oreebe ahaiguru, obare enyonyoozi, oreebe ku oraabe noobaasa kuzibara. Yaamugira ati: Na baijukuru baawe nikwo bariingana batyo.
Abramu yaikiriza MUKAMA, MUKAMA yaakimubarira kuba okuhikiirira.
Kandi yaagaruka, yaamugira ati: Niinye MUKAMA owaakwihire omuri Uri ey'aba Kaludaaya, kukuha ensi egi ngu ogihungure.
Abramu yaamubuuza ati: Ai Mukama RUHANGA, nimmanyira hi ku ndigihungura?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ndeetera enyana ehikize emyaka eshatu, n'ebuguma y'embuzi ehikize emyaka eshatu, n'empaya y'entaama nayo ey'emyaka eshatu, n'akaiba n'enkombe nto.
Yaabimutwarira byona, yaabishaturamu habiri, yaabirambika naabireebanisa; kwonka enyonyi zo tiyaazishaturamu.
Amahungu ku gaabaire gaija kugwa aha mitumbi, Abramu agabinga.
Eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, Abramu yaakwatwa oturo twingi; kandi reeba, omwirima mwingi ogurikutiinisa gwamushweka.
MUKAMA yaagambira Abramu ati: Omanyire kimwe ku oruzaaro rwawe rurishuhuukira omu nsi etari yaarwo, bakakorera ab'ensi egyo, nibaitwa kubi emyaka magana ana.
Kwonka eihanga eryo, eri barikorera, ndyaritaho orubanja; kandi bwanyima baryarugayo baine eitungo ringi.
Kwonka iwe oryashanga baashwenkuru n'obusingye, oryaziikwa gye ohikize emyaka ya bukuru.
Omu bwijukuruza bwa kana baryagaruka aha, ahabw'okuba ebibi by'Abaamori tibikakanyire kurengyesereza.
Bwanyima eizooba ku ryaherize kurenga, haabaho omwirima, reeba ekikoomi ekirikucumbuuka, n'orumuri orurikwaka byaraba ahagati y'ebyo bishate.
Aha izooba eryo MUKAMA yaaragaana na Abramu endagaano, naagira ati: Oruzaaro rwawe ndyaruha egi nsi, okuruga aha kagyera ka Misri okuhika aha mugyera omuhango Furaati,
ensi y'Abakeeni, ey'Abakenizi, ey'Abakadumooni,
ey'Abahiiti, ey'Abaperizi, ey'Abareefa,
ey'Abaamori, ey'Abanyakanaani, ey'Abagirugashi, n'ey'Abayebusi.
Sarai yaagambira Abramu ati: Reeba, MUKAMA anyimire oruzaaro; ninkweshengyereza, byama n'omuzaana wangye; shana nkaamutungaho abaana. Abramu yaikiriza enaama ya Sarai.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abramu ku yaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi omu nsi ya Kanaani, Sarai omukazi we yaatwara omuzaana we Hagari, Omunyamisrikazi, yaamuha iba kuba omukazi we.
Sarai yaagambira Abramu ati: Okuhemurwa kwangye kube niiwe kwazaho; ahakuba nkakuha omuzaana wangye kukufumbata; mbwenu ku areebire yaagira enda, yangaya. MUKAMA atucwere orubanja, nyowe naiwe.
Abramu yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba, omuzaana waawe ari omu bushoboorozi bwawe; omugire nk'oku orikwenda. Sarai nikwo kumutwaza kubi, nawe akamuhunga.
Bwanyima maraika wa MUKAMA yaamushanga omu ihamba haihi n'eiziba eriri aha muhanda ogurikutoora Shuuri;
yaamubuuza ati: Hagari omuzaana wa Sarai, nooruga hi? Kandi nooza hi? Yaagira ati: Nimpunga mugore wangye Sarai.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Garuka ahari mugore waawe, omworobere.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Ndyakanyisa munonga oruzaaro rwawe, rureme eibara ahabw'obwingi.
Kandi maraika wa MUKAMA yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Reeba oine enda, oryagizaaramu omwana w'omwojo, omwete Ishimaeli, ahakuba MUKAMA ahuriire okwitwa kubi kwawe.
Aryaba nk'enturegye omu bantu, aryaguma arwanise omuntu weena, n'abantu boona baryamurwanisa; aryatuura beene ishe boona hangahari.
MUKAMA owaagambire nawe Hagari yaamweta eiziina, naagira ati: Niiwe Ruhanga oreeba; ahakuba Hagari akagira ati: Biri Otuura nandeeba nkaamureebera n'aha?
Nikyo eiziba eryo ryayeteirwe
Bwanyima Hagari yaazaarira Abramu omwana w'omwojo; Abramu yaayeta omwana w'omwojo, ou Hagari yaazaire, Ishimaeli.
Obwo Abramu akaba ahikize emyaka makumi munaana na mukaaga, obu Hagari yaamuzaarira Ishimaeli.
naanye ndyaragaana naiwe endagaano, kandi ndyakukanyisa munonga.
Abramu yaagwa ahansi, yaajuumara; Ruhanga yaamugambira ati:
Reeba, endagaano yangye ogiine; oryaba ishe w'amahanga maingi munonga.
Kandi tokigaruka kwetwa Abramu, kureka Abrahamu, ahakuba naakugira ishe w'amahanga maingi munonga.
Kandi ndyakuha okuzaara munonga, nkukanyise, nkuhindure amahanga, n'abagabe bakukomookyemu.

Ndyahamya endagaano yangye naiwe, kandi ngihamye n'oruzaaro rwawe bwanyima yaawe okuhitsya obusingye bwarwo bwona, ebe endagaano etarihwaho, nyowe kuba Ruhanga waawe n'ow'oruzaaro rwawe orwa bwanyima.
Bwanyima iwe n'oruzaaro rwawe ndyabaha ensi ei oshuhuukiiremu, ensi yoona eya Kanaani, ebe eyaawe obusingye bwona; naanye ndyaguma ndi Ruhanga waabo.
Ruhanga yaagaruka yaagambira Abrahamu ati: Oryaguma orinde endagaano yangye, iwe n'oruzaaro rwawe orwa bwanyima yaawe obusingye bwarwo bwona.
Egi niyo ndagaano yangye ei muriguma nimurinda, ei ndikuragaana naimwe kandi n'oruzaaro rwawe orwa bwanyima; omushaija weena omuriimwe aryasharwa.
Muryasharwa ekishushu ky'omubiri gwanyu, kabe akamanyiso k'endagaano yangye naimwe.
Omwojo weena omuriimwe omu busingye bwanyu bwona, ku arihitsya ebiro munaana azairwe, asharwe, yaaba ozairwe omu ka yaawe, nari otari w'omu ruzaaro rwawe, owaaguzirwe empiiha aha banyamahanga.
Orizaarwa omu ka yaawe n'origurwa empiiha zaawe, bashemereire kusharwa; kandi endagaano yangye eryaba aha mibiri yaanyu, ebe endagaano etarihwaho.
Kandi omushaija weena oriba atashazirwe kishushu ky'omubiri gwe aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye; ahabw'okuba aryaba aitsire endagaano yangye.
Ruhanga yaagambira Abrahamu ati: Ebya Sarai omukazi waawe, otarigaruka kumweta Sarai kureka omwete Saara.
Naanye ndyamuha omugisha; kandi ndyamukuhaho omwana w'omwojo; buzima ndyamuha omugisha, abe nyina w'amahanga; abagabe b'amahanga niwe barikomookaho.
Abrahamu yaagwa ahansi, yaajuumara, yaasheka, yaayebuuza ati: Beitu shi omwana aryazaarwa omugurusi w'emyaka igana? Kandi na Saara, azaare?
Abrahamu yaagambira Ruhanga ati: Ishimaeli ku yaakugizire amagara omu maisho gaawe!
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Ngaaha! Kwonka na Saara omukazi waawe aryakuzaarira omwana w'omwojo, omwete
Kandi ebya Ishimaeli nabyo, naakuhurira. Reeba, ndyamuha omugisha, mmuhe okuzaara munonga, mmukanyise. Aryazaara abategyeki ikumi na babiri, kandi ndyamugira eihanga rihango.
Kwonka endagaano yangye ndyagihamya ahari Isaaka, ou Saara arikuzaarira omu bunaku obwatairweho omu mwaka ogurikwija.
Ruhanga ku yaaherize kugamba na Abrahamu, yainamuka, yaaruga ahu Abrahamu yaabaire ari.

Bwanyima Abrahamu yaatwara Ishimaeli omutabani n'abaazaariirwe omu ka ye boona n'abaaguzirwe empiiha ze boona, yaashara ekishushu ky'omubiri gw'omushaija weena owaabaire ari omu ka ye, nk'oku Ruhanga yaamugambiire.
Abrahamu akaba ahikize emyaka makumi mwenda na mwenda, obu yaasharwa.
Na Ishimaeli omutabani akaba ahikize emyaka ikumi n'eshatu, obu yaasharwa.
Abrahamu akasharwa aha izooba rimwe na Ishimaeli omutabani.
Kandi n'abashaija boona, abaazaariirwe omu ka ye, n'abaaguzirwe empiiha ze aha banyamahanga, bakasharwa hamwe nawe.
MUKAMA yaayeyorekyera Abrahamu aha myela ya Mamure, ashutami omu muryango gw'eihema rye omu ihangwe;
ku yaimukize amaisho, yaareeba abashaija bashatu beemereire hangahari. Ku yaabareebire, yaimuka omu muryango gw'eihema, yairuka kubabugana, yainama ahansi, yaagira ati:
Mukama wangye, ku ndaabe ningirirwa embabazi omu maisho gaawe, ninkweshengyereza otahingura omwiru waawe.
Ka bareete otwizi, munaabe aha bigyere, mwije ahansi y'omuti, muhuumure,
naanye ndeete akagaati, mugarukwemu amaani mubone kugumizamu, nk'oku mwahunguka aha mwiru waanyu. Baagira bati: Kora nk'oku waagamba.
Abrahamu yaayehuuta, yaataaha omu ihema, yaashangamu Saara, yaamugira ati: Rahuka ogire encuro ishatu z'esaano y'obunono, ogibumbabumbe, ogiihemu otugaati.
Kandi yairuka, yaaza omu masyo, yaihamu enyana nto nungi, yaagiha omushumba we, nawe yaagibaaga ahonaaho, yaagiteeka.
Abrahamu yaatwara amajuta n'amate n'enyama y'enyana ei yaateeka, yaabita omu maisho gaabo; yaaguma ayemereire aha rubaju rwabo ahansi y'omuti, nibarya.
Baamubuuza bati: Saara omukazi wawe arahi? Yaagarukamu ati: Ari omu ihema.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Buzimazima, obunaku ku burihika, ndyagaruka; kandi reeba, Saara omukazi waawe aryazaara omwana w'omwojo. Saara akaba ari omu muryango gw'eihema enyima ye, abihuriire.
(Obwo Abrahamu na Saara bakaba bakuzire, bahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru; kandi Saara akaba atakiza mu micwe y'abakazi.)
N'ahabw'ekyo Saara yaashekyera aha mutima, naagira ati: Nimbaasa kushemererwa naakaikwire, na ibanye ari omugurusi?
MUKAMA yaagambira Abrahamu ati: N'enki ekyashetsya Saara, akagira ati: N'eky'amazima ndyazaara omwana nkaikwire?
Hariho ekirema MUKAMA? Omu bunaku obwatairweho ndyagaruka; kandi ebiro bye ku birihika, Saara aryazaara omwana w'omwojo.
Kwonka Saara yaayehakana ati: Tinaasheka; ahakuba akaba atiinire. Yaamugarukamu ati: Ngaaha! Okusheka kwo waasheka.
Abo bashaija baimuka, baarugayo, baagyenda bagyemire Sodoma; na Abrahamu yaabashendekyereza
MUKAMA yaayebuuza ati: Abrahamu ku araabe arihinduka eihanga rikuru ery'amaani, kandi n'amahanga goona ag'omu nsi gariheerwa omugisha omuriwe, nshemereire kumushereka eki ndikuza kukora?

Ngaaha! Ahakuba nkamutoorana, ngu abone kuragiira abaana be n'ab'omu ka ye abarimukurata, okuguma omu muhanda gwa MUKAMA, nibakora eby'okuhikiirira n'eby'oburyo, ngu MUKAMA abone kureetera Abrahamu ebi yaamugambiire.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Nk'oku okutaka kw'abarikurega Sodoma na Gomora kuri kwingi ahabw'ekibi kyabo ekihinguraine munonga,
nikyo naaza kushuumira hati, nkareeba kwo, ku baraabe bakozire nk'okutaka kw'abarikubarega, oku mpuriire, oku kuri; nari ku kiraabe kitari kityo, nakyo nkimanye.
Abashaija abo baaruga aho, baagumizamu nibaza Sodoma; kwonka Abrahamu yaaguma ayemereire omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Mbwenu omu rurembo ku haakuba harimu abahikiriire makumi ataano, okaarucwekyereza, oyanga kurusaasira ahabw'abahikiriire makumi ataano abarimu?
Nikikabure ekyo kukurugaho, okwita abahikiriire hamwe n'ababi, n'okureeba abahikiriire nibatwazibwa nk'ababi! Ekyo nikikabure! Omucwi w'emanja z'ensi yoona tarikora ebihikire?
MUKAMA yaagarukamu ati: Omu rurembo rwa Sodoma ku ndaashangyemu abahikiriire makumi ataano, niinyija kurusaasira rwona ahabwabo.
Abrahamu yaagaruka yaagira ati: Reeba, naayehanga kugamba na Mukama wangye, haza ndi omucuucu n'eiju.

Mbwenu shi, abahikiriire makumi ataano kuhaakuburaho bataano, okaacwekyereza orurembo rwona ahabw'abo abataano abaaburaho? Yaagira ati: Ku ndaashangyeyo makumi ana na bataano, tindikwija kurucwekyereza.
Abrahamu yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Ku haraabonekyeyo makumi ana! Yaagarukamu ati: Tindikwija kurucwekyereza ahabw'abo makumi ana.
Kandi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mukama wangye arekye kungwerwa kubi, ngarukye ngambe. Ku haraabonekyeyo makumi ashatu. Yaamugarukamu ati: Tindikwija kurucwekyereza, ku ndaashangyeyo makumi ashatu.
Yaagira ati: Reeba, naayehanga kugamba na Mukama wangye. Ku haraabonekyeyo makumi abiri. Yaagarukamu ati: Tindikwija kurucwekyereza ahabw'abo makumi abiri.
Bwanyima yaagira ati: Mukama wangye arekye kuguubwa kubi, ngarukye ngambe omurundi ogu gwonka. Mbwenu shi ku haraabonekyemu ikumi.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Tindirucwekyereza ku hakubonekayo ikumi.
MUKAMA ku yaaherize kugamba na Abrahamu, yaagyenda; kandi na Abrahamu yaagaruka owe.

Bakama bangye, nimbeeshengyereza mukubuukye, mutaahe omu ka y'omwiru waanyu, munaabe aha bigyere, muraare; omu kasheeshe kare mwimukye, mugyende. Baagarukamu bati: Ngaaha; kureka nitwija kuraara omu muhanda, burugyeho busheeshe.
Yaabagyema munonga, baakubuuka, baataaha omu ka ye; yaabateekyera obugyenyi, yaateeka emigaati etatumbisiibwe, baarya.
Kwonka ku baabaire batakabyamire, abashaija b'omu rurembo Sodoma, abato n'abakuru, abantu boona abaarugire embaju zoona baayehinguririza egyo nju;
baayeta Looti, nibagira bati: Abashaija abaija owaawe ogu mwabazyo barahi? Batureetere, tubamanye.
Looti yaashohora, yaabashanga aha muryango, yaagaruraho orwigi;
yaabagira ati: Bagyenzi bangye, nimbeeshengyereza mutakora ekibi ekirikushusha kityo.
Reeba, nyine bahara bangye babiri abatakamanyaga mushaija; ka mbabashohoreze, mubakore. nk'oku murikwenda; kwonka mutagira eki mwakora ahari aba bashaija, ahakuba baizire kuraara omu nju yangye.

Baagira bati: Rugaho, tuhigize. Baagaruka baagira bati: Orushaija oru rukaija rushuhuukire, mbwenu nirwenda kwehindura omuramuzi? Hati twaza kukugira kubi okukira oku twakubagizire. Baamiganira ahari ogwo mushaija Looti, bairira haihi kucwa orwigi.
Abashaija abaabaire bari omu nju, baashohoza emikono yaabo, baataasya Looti, baakinga orwigi.
Baahumya amaisho g'abashaija abaabaire bari aha rwigi, abato n'abakuru; nahabw'ekyo baafa kubi, nibakorakora nibasherura orwigi.
ahakuba twaza kugucwekyereza, ahabw'okuba okutaka kw'abarikubarega kurengyesereize omu maisho ga MUKAMA; kandi MUKAMA atutumire kugucwekyereza.

Looti yaashohora, yaagambira abakwe, abaabaire nibenda kushwera bahara be, naagira ati: Mwimukye, murugye omu mwanya ogu; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA naayenda kucwekyereza orurembo. Kwonka omu maisho ga bakwe be yaashusha nk'orikuteera obuyaga.
Ku bwaseesire, baamaraika baateera Looti obwira, nibagira bati: Imuka otware omukazi waawe na bahara baawe bombi abari aha, mutakaagwa omu rubanja rw'orurembo.
Kwonka yaaguma naayeziringa; abashaija abo nikwo kumukwata omukono, n'omukono gw'omukazi we, n'emikono ya bahara be bombi, bakamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamusaasiire.
Ku baaherize kubashohoreza kimwe, omwe yaagira ati: Hunga otafa; otareeba enyima, n'obu kwakuba okwemereraho omu ruhita rwona; hungira omu bibungo, otakaacwekyerezibwa.
Looti yaabagira ati: Ngaaha, Mukama wangye.
Reeba omwiru waawe naaheebwa omugisha omu maisho gaawe, waakanyisa embabazi zaawe ezi wangirira kunkiza okufa. Tindikubaasa kuhungira mu bibungo, ntakaahikwaho akabi, nkafa.
Reeba, orurembo ruriya ruri haihi okuhungiramu, kandi ni rukye. Naakweshengyereza mbe nirwo naahungiramu (ti rukye?), amagara gangye nigaija kukiriramu.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Naakwikiriza n'ekyo nakyo, okutahwerekyereza rurembo oru waagambaho.
Yehuute ohungireyo; ahakuba tindikubaasa kukora kintu kyona, otakahikireyo. Orwo rurembo nikyo rwayeteirwe Zoari.
Looti yaahika Zoari, akashana kaatagata.
MUKAMA yaabona kunaga ahari Sodoma na Gomora omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, nibiruga ahari MUKAMA omu iguru;
yaacwekyereza ezo ndembo, n'oruhita rwona n'abatuuzi baamwo boona, n'ekyabaire kimezire ahansi.
Kwonka omukazi we, owaabaire amukuratiire, yaareeba enyima, yaahinduka enyomyo y'omwonyo.
Abrahamu yaimuka omu kasheeshe, yaaza ahu ayemereire omu maisho ga MUKAMA,
yaareeba aha bukiizi bwa Sodoma na Gomora n'oruhita rwona; kandi reeba, ensi ekaba neecumba omwika nk'ogw'ekikoomi.
Kandi Ruhanga, ku yaabaire naacwekyereza endembo z'omuri orwo ruhita, yaijuka Abrahamu, yaatuma ahari Looti ngu azirugyemu, omu kucwekyereza ezo ndembo ezi Looti yaabaire atwiremu.
Bwanyima Looti yaaruga Zoari yainamuka omu bibungo na bahara be bombi; ahakuba akatiina kutuura Zoari; atyo yaataaha omu nyanga na bahara be bombi.
Omukuru yaagambira omuto ati: Tataitwe akuzire; kandi omu nsi tiharimu muntu oriija kutushwera, nk'emicwe y'ensi yoona oku eri.
Ija tunywaise tataitwe viinyo, tumusinze, tubyame nawe, tutungye oruzaaro, turekye kufa bucwekye.
Baasinza ishebo ekyo kiro; omukuru yaataahamu, yaabyama na ishe; kandi ishe tiyaamanya bunaku bu yaabyamiramu nawe, n'obu yaimukiramu.
Ku bwaseesire, omukuru yaagira omuto ati: Reeba, nyekiro mbyamire na taata; ka tugarukye tumusinze eki kiro; naiwe otaahemu, obyame nawe, tutungye oruzaaro, turekye kufa bucwekye.
Batyo baagaruka baasinza ishebo na viinyo ekyo kiro; omuto yaimuka, yaabyama nawe; ishe tiyaamanya bunaku bu yaabyamiramu nawe, nobu yaimukiramu.
Okwo nikwo bahara ba Looti baatwekirwe ishebo.
Omukuru yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Moabu; niwe ishe w'Abamoabu n'okuhitsya hati.
Omuto nawe yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Ben-ami; niwe ishe w'Abaamoni n'okuhitsya hati.
Abrahamu yaarugayo, yaaza aha bukiizi bw'ensi ya Negebu, yaatuura ahagati ya Kadeshi na Shuuri; bwanyima yaashuhuukira Gerari.
Abrahamu yaagamba ku omukazi we Saara ari munyaanya. Abimeleki omugabe wa Gerari yaatuma ahari Saara, yaamutwara.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaija ahari Abimeleki nyekiro omu kirooto, yaamugira ati: Reeba, waafa, ahabw'okuba omukazi ou otwaire aine iba.
Kwonka Abimeleki akaba atakamuhikire; Abimeleki nikwo kugarukamu ati: Nooyenda kwita eihanga eritaina rubanja?
We wenka tarangizire ati: Ogu ni munyaanyazi? Kandi omukazi nawe akagira ati: Ndi munyaanya. Eki eki nkozire nkikozire nyine omutima gw'amazima n'emikono etaine rubanja.
Ruhanga yaamugarukamu omu kirooto, ati: Eego, nimmanya ngu okikozire oine omutima gw'amazima; kandi naanye nkuzibiire kuncumuraho; nikyo ntakwikiririize kumukoraho.
Mbwenu nu garurira ogwo mushaija omukazi we, ahakuba ni nabi, akushabire orekye kufa; kwonka ku oraabe otamumugaruriire, omanyire kimwe ngu noija kufa hamwe n'abaawe boona.
Abimeleki yaaguruka kare, yaatuma aha bairu be boona, yaabateekyerereza ebyo byona, baatiina munonga.
Bwanyima yaatuma ahari Abrahamu, yaamubuuza ati: Otutuzire ki? Nkucumwireho ki, waaza kundeetaho ekibi kihango, nyowe n'obugabe bwangye? Onkoreire ebitakorwa.
Kandi yaagaruka yaabuuza Abrahamu ati: Okareeba ki, ekyakureeteire kukora otyo?
Abrahamu yaagarukamu ati: Nkakikora ahabw'okuteekateeka ngu: Buzima omu mwanya ogu tiharimu kutiina Ruhanga; nibaija kuunyita ahabw'omukazi wangye.
Kandi ekindi, ni munyaanyazi buzima, owa taata otari wa maawe; kwonka nkamushwera.

Bwanyima Ruhanga ku yaanyihire omu ka ya tata, yampindura ow'okuzengyerera, naagira Saara nti: Eky'embabazi eki oshemereire kunkorera n'eki; buri mwanya gwona ogu turizamu, ogume ogire oti: Ogu ni munyaanyazi.
Abimeleki yaareeta entaama n'ente n'abahuuku n'abazaana, yaabiha Abrahamu, yaamugarurira na Saara omukazi we.
Kandi yaamugira ati: Reeba, ensi yangye ekuri omumaisho; otuure ahu orikwenda hoona.
Yaagambira na Saara ati: Reeba, naaha munyaanyoko ebicweka by'efeeza rukumi, kukwihaho ekihemu omu maisho g'abari hamwe naiwe boona; kandi omu maisho g'abantu boona oryaguma ori ohikire.
Bwanyima Abrahamu yaashaba Ruhanga; Ruhanga yaakiza Abimeleki n'omukazi we n'abazaana be; baazaara abaana;
ahakuba MUKAMA akaba ayigariire kimwe enda z'ab'omu ka ya Abimeleki ahabwa Saara muka Abrahamu.
Saara yaagira enda, yaazaarira Abrahamu omwana w'omwojo yaakuzire, omu bunaku obu Ruhanga yaamugambiire.
Abrahamu yaayeta ogwo mwana ou yaazaire Isaaka, ou Saara yaamuzaariire.
Abrahamu yaashara omwana we Isaaka amazire ebiro munaana azairwe, nk'oku Ruhanga yaamuragiire.
Kandi Abrahamu akaba ahikize emyaka igana, obu yaazaara ogwo mwana Isaaka.
Saara yaagira ati: Ruhanga anshekize; n'oraakihurire weena naija kusheka.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: N'oha owaakugizire Abrahamu, ngu Saara nawe aryayontsya abaana? Ahakuba mmuzaariire omwana w'omwojo omu bugurusi bwe.
Omwana yaakura, yaacuuka; Abrahamu yaateeka obugyenyi bwingi aha izooba eri Isaaka yaacuukiireho.
Nikyo yaagiriire Abrahamu ati: Binga ogu muzaana n'omwana we; ahakuba omwana w'ogu muzaanakazi tarihungura n'omwana wangye Isaaka.
Ekigambo ekyo kyagwisa kubi Abrahamu ahabw'omwana we.
Ruhanga yaagambira Abrahamu ati: Otaguubwa kubi ahabw'omwana n'ahabw'omuzaanakazi waawe. Kyona eki Saara araakugambire, omworobere; ahabw'okuba baijukuru baawe baryayetererwa Isaaka.
Kandi omwana w'omuzaana nawe ndyamuhindura eihanga, ahabw'okuba n'omwana waawe.

N'ahabw'ekyo Abrahamu yaimuka omu kasheeshe kare, yaagira eby'okurya n'efurebe y'amaizi, yaabiha Hagari, yaabimuta aha ibega, yaamuha n'ogwo mwana, yaamwohereza. Yaarugayo, yaaguma naagyendagyenda omu ihamba rya Beerisheba.
Amaizi ku gaahweire omu furebe, yaarambika omwana ahansi y'ekishaka,

yaagyenda, yaashutama hangahari naamureeba, kaanya nk'aharikurashwa omwambi; ahabw'okuba akagira ati: Ka ndekye kureeba omwana wangye naakaba. Ku yaabaire ashutami naareeba ei ari, omwana yaimutsya eiraka, yaarira.
Ruhanga yaahurira eiraka ry'ogwo mwana; maraika wa Ruhanga yaayema omu iguru, yaayeta Hagari, yaamugira ati: Waaba ota, Hagari? Otatiina, ahabw'okuba Ruhanga yaahurira eiraka ry'omwojo ah' ari.
Imuka, oimutsye omwana, omweyegamize aha mukono; ahakuba ndyamuhindura eihanga rihango.
Omuri ogwo mwanya Ruhanga yaigura amaisho ga Hagari, yaareeba eiziba ry'amaizi, yaagyenda, yaijuza efurebe amaizi, yaanywaisa omwana.
Okuruga aho Ruhanga yaaguma n'omwojo, yaakura, yaatuura omu ihamba, yaaba omurasi rugambwa.
Yaaguma omu ihamba rya Parani; nyina yaamushwererera Omunyamisrikazi.
Omu biro ebyo Abimeleki na Fikooli omukuru w'engabo ze baagambira Abrahamu bati: Ruhanga ari hamwe naiwe omu bi orikukora byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo ondahire Ruhanga, ku otarimbeiha nari mutabani wangye, n'obu yaakuba mwijukuru wangye; kureka nk'embabazi ezi naakugiriire oku ziri, naiwe ku nikwo oringirira n'ensi ei waashuhuukiiremu.
Abrahamu yaamugarukamu ati: Naaza kukurahira.
Abimeleki yaagarukamu ati: Tindikumanya owaakozire ekyo; naiwe tokabingambiraga, kandi tinkakihuriraga, kureka eri izooba.
Abrahamu yaatwara entaama n'ente, yaaziha Abimeleki; bombi baaragaana endagaano.
Abrahamu yaashoroora omu busyo abaagazi b'entaama mushanju.
Abimeleki yaabuuza Abrahamu ati: Abaagazi b'entaama aba mushanju abu waashoroora, n'aba ki?
Yaagarukamu ati: Aba baagazi b'entaama mushanju naabakuha, obatware, babe eky'okuhamya eiziba eri ku niinye naarifukwire.
Nikyo yaayeteire omwanya ogwo Beeri-sheba, ahakuba aho niho baarahiriire bombi.
Batyo baaragaanira endagaano Beeri-sheba; bwanyima Abimeleki na Fikooli omukuru w'engabo ze baimuka, baagaruka omu nsi y'Abafilistia.
Kandi Abrahamu yaabyara ekiti ky'omwesheli ahari Beeri-sheba; yaaramizaho eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga otahwaho.
Bwanyima Abrahamu yaamara ebiro bingi, ashuhuukiire omu nsi y'Abafilistia.
Yaamugira ati: Twara omwana waawe omwe nyamunegyere Isaaka, ou okunda, oze omu nsi ya Moria, omutambire aha kibungo kimwe omu bibungo by'aho, eki ndaakugambire, kuba ekitambo ekyokize.

Atyo Abrahamu yaimuka kare omu kasheeshe, yaatandiika endogoya ye, yaatwara babiri aha batsigazi be na Isaaka omwana we; yaashatura enku z'okwotsya ekitambo, yaimuka, yaaza omu mwanya ogu Ruhanga amugambiire.
Aha kiro kya kashatu Abrahamu yaanaga amaisho, yaareeba omwanya gukiri hare.
Abrahamu yaagira abatsigazi be ati: Imwe mugume aha n'endogoya, nyowe n'omwojo tuze kuriya, turamye, haza tugarukye, tubashangye aha.
Abrahamu yaakwata enku z'okwotsya ekitambo, yaazikorera Isaaka omwana we; we yaatwara omuriro n'omusyo gw'endiga; baagyenda hamwe bombi.
Isaaka yaayeta Abrahamu ishe ati: Taata! Abrahamu yaamwetaba ati: N'enki, mwana wangye? Yaagira ati: Beitu shi ka twine omuriro n'enku; omwana gw'entaama ogw'okutamba gurahi?
Abrahamu yaagarukamu ati: Mwana wangye, Ruhanga naija kwebonera omwana gw'entaama gw'ekitambo ky'okwotsya. Batyo baagumizamu bombi.
Abrahamu yaakununkirira omusyo kurezya omutabani.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaayema omu iguru, yaamweta ati: Abrahamu! Abrahamu! Yaayetaba ati: Nyamuhanga!
Yaamugira ati: Otakora ahari ogwo mwana, nari kugira eki waamwitsa; ahabw'okuba hati naamanya ku orikutiina Ruhanga ahabw'okutaanyima mwana waawe omwe nyamunegyere.

Abrahamu yaimutsya amaisho, yaamagamaga, yaareeba enyima ye empaya y'entaama ekwatsirwe ebikamba omu mahembe; Abrahamu yaagyenda, yaihayo egyo mpaya, yaagitamba kuba ekitambo ekyokize omu mwanya gw'omwana we.
Abrahamu yaayeta ogwo mwanya Yehovayire, nk'oku kirikugambwa na hati ngu, Aha kibungo kya MUKAMA kiryaheebwa.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagaruka yaayema omu iguru, yaayeta Abrahamu omurundi gwa kabiri,
yaamugira ati: Naayerahira, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira, ahabw'okukora eki, otaanyime mwana waawe omwe nyamunegyere,

nti: Okukuha ndyakuha omugisha, kandi n'okukanyisa ndyakanyisa oruzaaro rwawe rube nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, kandi nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja; n'oruzaaro rwawe ruryakubuura amarembo g'abazigu baarwo;
kandi omurirwo amahanga goona ag'omu nsi nimwo gariheerwa omugisha, ahabw'okuba oyorobeire eiraka ryangye.
Bwanyima Abrahamu yaagaruka aha batsigazi be; baimuka baagyenda hamwe Beeri-sheba; Abrahamu yaaba niyo yaatuura.
omujigaijo ni Uzi, n'omurumuna Buuzi, na Kemueli ishe wa Aramu;
na Kesedi, Haazo, Piludashi, Yidulafu na Besueli.
Besueli yaazaara Rebeka; abo omunaana nibo Milika yaazaariire Nahori, murumuna wa Abrahamu.
Kandi n'omukazi we w'ekinyanshunju orikwetwa Reuma, nawe yaazaara Teeba, Gahamu, Tahashi na Maaka.
Saara akamara emyaka igana na makumi abiri na mushanju; egyo niyo myaka ei yaahikize.
Yaafeera Kiryasiaraba (niyo Heburooni) omu nsi ya Kanaani; Abrahamu yaataaha omu ihema kuririra Saara n'okumucurira;
yaaruga aha mutumbi gwe, yaashohora, yaagambira aba Heesi ati:
Ndi omunyaihanga kandi omushuhuuki omuriimwe; mumpe omwanya gw'okuziikamu, mbone kuziika omufu wangye, andugye omumaisho.
Aba Heesi baagarukamu Abrahamu bati:

Mukama waitu, tuhurire; ori omuntu mukuru munonga omuriitwe; ziika omufu waawe omu kituuro eki oraatoorane omu bituuro byaitu byona; tihariho n'omwe omuriitwe oraakwime ekituuro kye, ngu otaziikamu omufu waawe.
Abrahamu yaimuka, yainama omu maisho ga bakama b'ensi, aba Heesi.
Yaabagira ati: Ku muraabe nimwikiriza ngu nziikye omufu wangye, andugye omumaisho, mumpurire, munyeshengyerereze Efurooni mwene Zohari,
ampe enyanga ya Makipeela ei aine, eri aha muheru gw'ekibanja kye; agingurize omu maisho gaanyu nk'obuguzi bwayo oku buri, gube omwanya gwangye ogw'okuziikamu.
Kandi obwo Efurooni akaba ashutami omu ba Heesi; Efurooni ogwo Omuhiiti yaagarukamu Abrahamu, aba Heesi boona abaabaire nibataaha omu irembo ry'orurembo rwe bamuhuriire, naagira ati:
Ngaaha, Mukama wangye, mpurira. Ekyo kibanja naakikuha, n'enyanga yaamwo; naabikuheera omu maisho g'eihanga ryaitu. Oziikyemu omufu waawe.
Abrahamu yainama omu maisho ga bakama b'ensi.
Yaagambira Efurooni, boona bahuriire, ati: Ku oraabe nookisiima, naakweshengyereza, ompurire; nkuheereze obuguzi bw'ekibanja nk'oku buri; kandi ikiriza obutware, naanye mbone kuziikamu omufu wangye.
Efurooni yaagarukamu Abrahamu ati:
Mukama wangye, mpurira. Akabanja akarikugurwa shekeli z'efeeza magana ana nikyo ki ahariiwe naanye? Mbwenu ziikamu omufu waawe.
Abrahamu yaikiriza Efurooni, yaamurengyera efeeza ezi yaagambira omu maisho g'aba Heesi, shekeli magana ana z'efeeza, ezirikukoresibwa abashuubuzi.
byahamibwa omu maisho b'aba Heesi n'ag'abaabaire nibataaha omu irembo ry'orurembo rwe kuba ebya Abrahamu.
Bwanyima y'ekyo, Abrahamu yaaziika omukazi we Saara omu nyanga y'omu kibanja kya Makipeela, aharikureeba Mamure (niyo Heburooni) omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Ekyo kibanja n'enyanga yaamwo byahamibwa aba Heesi kuba ebya Abrahamu n'okuba omwanya gwe gw'okuziikamu.
Abrahamu akaba akuzire, ahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru; kandi MUKAMA akaba amuhaire omugisha omuri byona.
Abrahamu yaagambira omugaragwa we mukuru owaabaire naategyeka eby'omu ka ye byona, ati: Ija ote omukono gwawe ahansi y'ekibero kyangye;
nkurahize MUKAMA Ruhanga w'eiguru n'ensi, ku otarishwererera mwana wangye omuri bahara b'Abanyakanaani, abu ntwiremu;
kureka ku origyenda omu ihanga ryaitu, kandi omuri beene waitu, okaba niyo waashwererera omwana wangye Isaaka omukazi.
Omugaragwa yaamugarukamu ati: Shana akaayanga kwija naanye omu nsi egi. Ku kiriba kyabaire kityo, omwana waawe mmugarure omu nsi ei waarugiremu?
Abrahamu yaamugira ati: Oyerinde, otarigarurayo omwana wangye.

MUKAMA Ruhanga w'eiguru owaanyihire omu ka ya tata n'omu nsi ei naazairwemu, kandi owangambiire naarahira ati: Oruzaaro rwawe ndyaruha ensi egi, Ogwo aryatuma maraika we akwebembere, oshwererereyo omwana wangye omukazi.
Omukazi ku aryanga kwija naiwe, orwo tiruriba rubanja rwawe ahabw'endahiro ei naakurahiza; kwonka eki ndikukwehanangiriza, otarigarurayo omwana wangye.
Omugaragwa nikwo kuta omukono ahansi y'ekibero kya Abrahamu mukama we, akamurahira ku arikikora.

Bwanyima omugaragwa yaatwara engamira ikumi aha za mukama we n'ebintu birungi eby'okuriimisa eby'emiringo yoona ebi yaahairwe mukama we, yaimuka yaaza Mesopotamia, yaahika haihi n'orurembo rwa Nahori.
Yaateeza engamira ebikokora ahansi aheeru y'orurembo aha iziba ry'amaizi omu mwabazyo, ahu abakazi batahira amaizi.
Yaashaba ati: Ai MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa mukama wangye Abrahamu, ninkweshengyereza, mpa omugisha hati, ogirire mukama wangye Abrahamu embabazi.
Reeba, nyemereire aha aha iziba; kandi abaishiki b'abanyarurembo nibaija kutaha amaizi.

Mbwenu kibe kiti; omwishiki, ou ndaagire nti, Tuura orunywero rwawe, nnyweho, naakweshengyereza, nawe akagarukamu ati, Nywaho, kandi naaza kweshera n'engamira zaawe, abe ogwo ou waatooraniire omwiru waawe Isaaka; kandi aho niho ndaamanyire ku waagirira mukama wangye embabazi.
Ku yaabaire atakaherize kushaba, reeba, haashohora Rebeka, muhara wa Besueli, mutabani wa Milika, muka Nahori murumuna wa Abrahamu, aine orunywero rwe aha ibega.
Kandi omwishiki ogwo akaba ari murungi munonga orikureebwa, omwishiki otakamanyaga mushaija; yaashuuma aha iziba, yaijuza orunywero rwe amaizi, yainamuka.
Omugaragwa yairuka kumubugana, yaagira ati: Naakweshengyereza, mpa otwizi, nnywere aha runywero rwawe.
Yaamugira ati: Nywaho, Mukama wangye. Yaarahuka, yaata orunywero rwe aha kiganja, yaamunywaisa.
Ku yaaherize kumunywaisa, yaagira ati: Naaza kweshera n'engamira zaawe, nazo zinywe okuhitsya obu ziraakuukye.
Yaarahuka yaashuka amaizi omu bwato, yaagaruka omu iziba kutaha, yaayeshera engamira ze zoona.
Omushaija yaamugumyaho amaisho ahunami, kumanya ku MUKAMA araabe ahaire orugyendo rwe omugisha, nari shi ataruguhaire.
yaamugira ati: Ori muhara w'oha? Ngambira, naakweshengyereza. Kandi tukaabona oburaaro omu ka ya sho?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi muhara wa Besueli, mutabani wa Milika, ou yaazairweho Nahori.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Twine obunyaatsi n'eby'okurya byazo ebirikumara; kandi n'oburaaro buriyo.
Omushaija yainama, yaaramya MUKAMA,

yaagira ati: MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa mukama wangye Abrahamu, ahimbisibwe, ahakuba tarekire kugirira mukama wangye embabazi n'obwesigwa; kandi naanye MUKAMA anyebembeire, yampitsya ahari beene ishe ba mukama wangye.
Omwishiki yairuka, yaagambira ab'omwa nyina ebigambo ebyo byona.

Ku yaareebire empeta y'ezaabu n'engoro aha mikono ya munyaanya, kandi yaahurira Rebeka munyaanya naagamba ebi yaagambirwa ogwo mushaija, yaija ah' ari, yaashanga ayemereire aha rubaju rw'engamira aha iziba.
Yaamugira ati: Ija otaahe, iwe ou MUKAMA ahaire omugisha. N'enki ekikwemereize aheeru? Ahakuba naakuteekateekyera enju, n'ahu engamira ziraaraare.
Atyo omushaija yaataaha omu nju, Labaani yaatandiikurura engamira, yaareeta obunyaatsi n'eby'okurya by'engamira, n'amaizi g'okunaabisa ebigyere bye n'eby'abashaija abu yaabaire aine.
Bwanyima baamureetera eby'okurya; kwonka we yaagira ati: Tindikwija kurya, ntakagambire bi ntumirwe. Ndi Labaani ati: Bigambe.
Yaagira ati: Ndi omugaragwa wa Abrahamu.
Kandi MUKAMA akaha mukama wangye omugisha mwingi munonga, yaahinduka omuntu rugambwa. Yaamuha amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente, efeeza n'ezaabu, abahuuku n'abazaana, engamira n'endogoya.
Na Saara muka mukama wangye yaamuzaarira omwana w'omwojo yaakuzire; n'omwana ogwo ishe amuhaire ebi aine byona.
Mbwenu mukama wangye akandahiza, naagira ati: Otarishwererera omwana wangye omukazi omu baishiki b'Abanyakanaani, abu ntwire omu nsi yaabo;
kureka oryagaruka omu muryango gwa tata n'omuri beene waitu, obe niyo waashwererera omwana wangye omukazi.
Naagambira mukama wangye nti: Shana omukazi tariikiriza kwija naanye.
Yangarukamu ati: MUKAMA ou ngyenda nandeeba, aryatuma maraika we, ahe orugyendo rwawe omugisha, obone kushwererera omwana wangye omukazi omuri beene waitu n'omu muryango gwa tata.
Ku orihika omuri beene waitu, oryaba otakiine rubanja ahabw'endahiro ei naakurahiza; kandi n'obu bariba batamukuhaire, nabwo torigira rubanja ahabw'endahiro egyo.
reeba, naayemerera aha iziba; mbwenu kibe kiti; omwishiki oraije kutaha amaizi, ou ndaashabe nti, Mpa aha maizi g'omu runywero rwawe, nnyweho,
nawe akangira ati: Nywaho, kandi naaza kweshera n'engamira zaawe, abe niwe yaaba omukazi ou MUKAMA yaateekateekyeire omwana wa mukama wangye.

Ku naaba ntakaherize bi naaba ninshaba omu mutima gwangye, naayecura Rebeka naashohora omu rurembo, aine orunywero rwe aha ibega; yaashuuma aha iziba, yaataha amaizi, naamugira nti: Mpa nnyweho, naakweshengyereza.
Ahonaaho yaiha orunywero rwe aha ibega, yaagira ati: Nywaho; kandi ka nyeshere n'engamira zaawe. Ntyo naanywaho, kandi yaayeshera n'engamira.
Naamubuuza nti: Ori muhara w'oha? Yaagarukamu ati: Ndi muhara wa Besueli, mutabani wa Nahori, ou yaazaire ahari Milika; naanye nikwo kumujweka empeta aha nyindo, n'engoro aha mikono ye.
Bwanyima nainama, naaramya MUKAMA, kandi naasiima MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa mukama wangye Abrahamu, onyebembeire omu muhanda oguhikire kushwererera omwana wa mukama wangye omukazi omuri beene waabo.

Mbwenu ku muraabe nimwikiriza kukorera mukama wangye eby'embabazi n'eby'amazima, mungambire; nari shi, ku muraabe mutarikwikiriza, nabwo mungambire, mbone kugira orubaju oru naatoora, yaaba rwa buryo yaaba rwa bumosho.
Labaani na Besueli baagarukamu nibagira bati: Enaama egi n'eya MUKAMA; titwine ki turikubaasa kukugambira, yaaba kukwikiriza, nari kukwangira.
Reeba, Rebeka akuri omu maisho, mutware, mugyende, abe muka omwana wa mukama waawe, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
Omugaragwa wa Abrahamu ku yaahuriire okugarukamu kwabo, yainama, yaaramya MUKAMA.
Ogwo mugaragwa yaihayo ebintu birungi by'efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebijwaro, yaabiha Rebeka; kandi yaaha munyaanya na nyina ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi.
Bwanyima baarya, baanywa, we n'abashaija abu yaabaire aine, baaraarayo; ku baimukire omu kasheeshe, yaagira ati; Mundagye, ngarukye owa mukama wangye.
Munyaanya na nyina baamugarukamu bati: Reka omwishiki agume naitwe okumara ebiro nka ikumi nari okukiraho, bwanyima abone kugyenda.
Yaabagira ati: Nk'oku MUKAMA ahaire orugyendo rwangye omugisha, mutantuuza aha; kureka mundagye, ngarukye owa mukama wangye.
Baagira bati: Ka twete omwishiki, tumubuuze, ayegambire.
Baayeta Rebeka, baamubuuza bati: Noikiriza kugyenda n'ogu mushaija? Yaagira ati: Niinyikiriza.
Batyo baaraga Rebeka munyaanyabo n'omurezi we n'omugaragwa wa Abrahamu n'abashaija be.
Baashabira Rebeka omugisha, nibagira bati: Munyaanyiitwe, obe nyina w'abantu enkumi n'obukumi; kandi oruzaaro rwawe rukubuure amarembo g'abarikurwanga.
Rebeka yaimuka n'abazaana be, baatemba engamira, baagyenda n'ogwo mushaija. Okwo nikwo omugaragwa yaatwaire Rebeka, akeegyendera.
Obwo Isaaka akaba yaarugire Beeri-lahairoi, atwire omu nsi ya Negebu.
Omu mwabazyo Isaaka yaashohora, yaaza omu ishwa kutunga omwanya gw'okuteekateeka; ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba engamira niziija.
Kandi Rebeka yaimutsya amaisho ge; ku yaareebire Isaaka, yaaruga aha ngamira.
Yaabuuza omugaragwa ati: Omushaija oriya orikwija kutubugana n'oha? Omugaragwa yaagira ati: Niwe mukama wangye. Rebeka yaakwata omwenda gwe, yaagwetwekyerera.
Omugaragwa yaateekyerereza Isaaka ebi yaakozire byona.
Bwanyima Isaaka yaatwara Rebeka omu ihema rya Saara nyina yaaba omukazi we, yaamukunda, yaayebwa enaku z'okufa kwa nyina.
Bwanyima Abrahamu yaashwera ondiijo mukazi orikwetwa Ketura.
Yaazaara nawe Zimuraani, Yokishaani, Medani, Midiani, Ishibaaki na Shua.
Yokishaani yaazaara Sheeba na Dedani. Kandi beene Dedani n'aba Ashuri n'aba Letushi n'aba Leumi.
Kandi abaana ba Midiani ni Efa, Eferi, Hanoki, Abida na Elidaa. Abo boona n'oruzaaro rwa Ketura.
Abrahamu yaaha Isaaka ebye byona.
Kwonka abaana b'ebinyanshunju bye ebi yaabaire aine, yaabaha ebiconco. Bwanyima yaaboohereza akiriho, ngu bataane n'omwana we Isaaka; baatoora oburugwa-izooba, baahika omu nsi y'obwo bukiizi.
Emyaka ei Abrahamu yaahikize ekaba eri igana na makumi mushanju n'etaano.
Abrahamu ku yaahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru, omwitsyo gwamuhwamu, yaafa gye ari omugurusi w'emyaka mingi, yaakurata baishenkuru.
Isaaka na Ishimaeli abatabani baamuziika omu nyanga ya Makipeela omu kibanja kya Efurooni mwene Zohari Omuhiiti, aharikureeba Mamure,
ekibanja eki Abrahamu yaaguzire ahari beene Heesi. Aho niho Abrahamu yaaziikirwe hamwe na Saara omukazi we.
Bwanyima y'okufa kwa Abrahamu Ruhanga yaaha Isaaka omwana we omugisha. Isaaka yaatuura Beeri-lahairoi.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Ishimaeli mwene Abrahamu, ou yaazaire ahari Hagari Omunyamisrikazi, omuzaana wa Saara.
Kandi aga nigo maziina ga beene Ishimaeli, nk'oku baakurataine. Omujigaijo gwa Ishimaeli ni Nebayoosi; haataho Kedari, Adubeeli, Mibusamu,
Mishuma, Duma, Masa,
Hadadi, Teema, Yetura, Nafishi na Kedema.
Abo nibo batabani ba Ishimaeli, kandi ago nigo maziina gaabo, omu birorero byabo n'omu maka gaabo abategyeki ikumi na babiri nk'amahanga gaabo oku gaabaire gari.
Emyaka ei Ishimaeli yaahikize ekaba igana na makumi ashatu na mushanju; yaahwamu omwitsyo, yaafa, yaakurata baishenkuru.
Baataura okuruga Havila okuhika Shuuri eri omu maisho ga Misri, nootoora Asiria. Kandi Ishimaeli yaatuura beene ishe boona hangahari.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Isaaka mwene Abrahamu. Abrahamu akazaara Isaaka;
Isaaka ku yaahikize emyaka makumi ana, yaashwera Rebeka muhara wa Besueli Omusiria wa Padanaramu, munyaanya wa Labaani Omusiria.
Isaaka yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA ahabw'omukazi we, ahakuba akaba ari engumba; MUKAMA yaahurira okweshengyereza kwe, Rebeka omukazi we yaagira enda.
Abaana baamurwanira omunda; yaagira ati: Ku kiraabe kiri kiti, ngumiireho ki? Yaayehanuuza ahari MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati:
Enda yaawe erimu amahanga abiri,
Enganda ibiri ezi orizaara ziryataanamu habiri;
Oruganda rumwe ruryakiza orundi amaani,
Kakuru aryaheereza Kato.
Ebiro bye eby'okuzaara ku byahikire, yaashangwa aine enda y'empasha.
Kakuru yaazaarwa naatukura, aine obwoya aha mubiri gwe gwona nk'omwenda gw'ebyoya; baamweta Esau.
Haakurataho Kato, omukono gwe gukwaitse ekitsintsiino kya Esau; baamweta Yakobo. Obwo Isaaka akaba ahikize emyaka makumi mukaaga, obu omukazi we yaabazaara.
Abo boojo baakura; Esau yaaba omuhiigi w'obwengye ruraaramahamba; Yakobo yaaba omucureezi, yaaguma omuka.
Kandi Isaaka akaba naakunda Esau, ahabw'okuba akaba arya aha nyama z'enyamaishwa ezi yaabaire ahiiga; kwonka Rebeka akaba akunda Yakobo.
Eizooba rimwe Yakobo akaba ateekire ekicumbe; Esau yaija naaruga kuhiiga, naakooza aine enjara.
Esau yaagira Yakobo ati: Mpa ekyo kicumbe ekirikutukura, ndyeho; ahakuba naaza kugwa enshazi. (Eiziina rye nikyo ryayeteirwe
Yakobo yaamugira ati: Kureka obanze onguze obukuru bwawe.
Esau yaagira ati: Ndi haihi kwefeera. Eby'obukuru shi biryangasira ki?
Yakobo yaagira ati: Banza ondahire. Esau yaamurahira, yaamuguza obukuru bwe.
Bwanyima Yakobo yaaha Esau omugaati n'ekicumbe ky'ebihimba; yaarya, yaanywa, yaimuka, yaayegyendera. Okwo nikwo Esau yaagayire obukuru bwe.
MUKAMA yaayeyoreka Isaaka, yaamugira ati: Otashuuma Misri; ogume omu nsi ei naaza kukugambira,
obe niyo waashuhuukiramu; naanye ndyaguma naiwe, nkuhe omugisha; ahabw'okuba iwe n'oruzaaro rwawe ndyabaha ensi ezi zoona, mpamye endahiro ei naarahiire sho Abrahamu.
Kandi ndyakanyisa oruzaaro rwawe, rube nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, nduhe ezi nsi zoona; kandi omurirwo amahanga goona ag'omu nsi nimwo gariheerwa omugisha;
ahabw'okuba Abrahamu akanyorobera, yaahurira ebi naamwehanangiriize, n'ebi naamuragiire, n'ebi naataireho, n'ebiragiro byangye.
Isaaka yaatuura Gerari;

abantu baayo baamubuuza eby'omukazi we, yaabagarukamu ati: Ni munyaanyazi; ahakuba akatiina kugira ati, N'omukazi wangye, yaateekateeka ngu abashaija b'omuri ogwo mwanya nibaija kumwita azire Rebeka, ahakuba akaba ari murungi munonga orikureebwa.
Bwanyima ku yaamazireyo ebiro bingi, Abimeleki omugabe w'Abafilistia yaayozya amaisho omu dirisa, yaareeba Isaaka naazaana n'omukazi we Rebeka.
Abimeleki yaayeta Isaaka, yaamugira ati: Buzimazima, n'omukazi waawe. Ahanki ogizire oti, Ni munyaanyazi? Isaaka yaamugarukamu ati: Ahakuba nteekateekire ngu niinyija kwitwa ahabwe.
Abimeleki yaagira ati: Mbwenu shi ekyo, otukozire ki? Obundi kikaarahukire omwe aha bashaija bangye kubyama n'omukazi waawe atakimanyire, haza obwo niiwe waakubaire otureeteire orubanja.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abimeleki yaayehanangiriza abantu be boona, naagira ati: Orikora aha mushaija ogu nari aha mukazi we, buzimazima aryaitwa.
Yaaba omushaija omutungi, yaaguma naayeyongyera kutunga, okuhitsya obu yaabaire omutungi rugambwa;
yaagira eitungo ringi ry'amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente, n'eby'omuka bingi; Abafilistia baamugirira eihari. (
Amaziba goona agaafukwirwe abairu ba ishe Abrahamu akiriho, Abafilistia bakaba baagatabire n'eitaka.)
Abimeleki yaagira Isaaka ati: Turugyemu, ogyende, ahabw'okuba nootukiza munonga amaani.
Isaaka yaarugayo, yaagomberera omu ruhita rwa Gerari, yaatuurayo.
Isaaka yaagaruka yaigura amaziba agaafukwirwe omu biro bya Abrahamu ishe; ahakuba Abafilistia bakaba baagatabire bwanyima y'okufa kwa Abrahamu; yaageeta amaziina agu ishe yaabaire ageetsire.
Bwanyima abairu ba Isaaka baafukura omu ruhita, baagwa aha iziba ry'enshuro y'amaizi.
Abariisa ba Gerari baarwanisa aba Isaaka, nibagira bati: Amaizi aga n'agaitu. Yaayeta eryo iziba Eseki, ahakuba bakatongana nawe.
Baagaruka, baafukura erindi iziba, naryo baaritonganira; yaaryeta Sitina.
Okwo yaarugayo, yaafukura erindi iziba; eryo tibaaritonganira; yaaryeta Rehoboosi; yaagira ati: Ahakuba hati MUKAMA atuhaire ah'okweshanzira, nitwija kukanyira omuri egi nsi.
Yaarugayo, yainamuka Beerisheba.
Okwo yaayombekayo eitambiro, yaatakirirayo eiziina rya MUKAMA, yaateerayo eihema rye; okwo nayo abairu be baafukurayo eiziba.
Bwanyima Abimeleki yaaruga Gerari, hamwe na Ahuzaasi munywani we, na Fikooli omukuru w'engabo ze, baamushangayo.
Isaaka yaababuuza ati: Mureetsirwe ki owangye, haza mwanyangire, kandi mukambinga owaanyu?
Baamugarukamu bati: Tukareeba ku MUKAMA ari naiwe buzima; nikwo kugira tuti: Ka tugire endahiro ahagati yaitu naiwe, kandi turagaane n'endagaano,
