ku otaritukora kubi, nkaitwe oku tutarakukozireho, kandi nk'oku tutaine kintu kyona eki twakwitsize, kureka okukukorera ebirungi n'okukuraga n'obusingye. Mbwenu ori omuntu ou MUKAMA ahaire omugisha.
Bwanyima Isaaka yaabateekyera obugyenyi, baarya, baanywa.
Baimuka nibutaagurukana, baarahirana na Isaaka, yaabaraga, baamurugaho n'obusingye.
Aha izooba eryo abairu ba Isaaka baija, baamugambira eby'eiziba eri bafukwire, nibagira bati: Tufumukire aha maizi.
Yaaryeta Shiiba; nikyo orwo rurembo rwayeteirwe Beerisheba, n'okuhitsya hati.
Esau ku yaahikize emyaka makumi ana, yaashwera Yudeesi muhara wa Beeri Omuhiiti, na Basemaasi muhara wa Eloni Omuhiiti;
abo bakazi baagwisa kubi Isaaka na Rebeka.
Yaamugira ati: reeba, nkuzire, tindikumanya izooba ri ndifeeraho.
N'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza, ihayo ebi ohiigisa, omutana gwawe n'obuta bwawe, oze omu ihamba, onyitireyo enyamaishwa,
onteekyere enyama, ozirungye nk'oku nkunda, ozindeetere, ndye, nkushabire omugisha ntakafiire.
Isaaka ku yaabaire naagambira omutabani Esau, Rebeka yaashangwa amuhuriire. Atyo Esau yaaza omu ihamba kuhiiga enyamaishwa n'okugireeta.
Rebeka yaagambira omutabani Yakobo ati: Naahurira sho naagambira mukuru waawe Esau ati:
Gyenda onyitire enyamaishwa, onteekyere enyama, ozirungye, ndye, nkushabire omugisha omu maisho ga MUKAMA ntakafiire.
Mbwenu nu, mwana wangye, nyorobera okore eki ndikukuragiira.
Irooko oze omu busyo bw'embuzi, onyihireyo ebyagazi bibiri bito birungi, naanye nteekyere sho enyama, ngirungye nk'oku akunda;
haza ogimutwarire, arye, akushabire omugisha atakafiire.
Yakobo yaagambira Rebeka nyina ati: Noomanya Esau mukuru wangye ku ari omushaija w'ebyoya, haza nyowe omubiri gwangye ku gurikuterera.
Obundi tata akaankoraho, anteekateekaho ku ndi engobya, nyihayo omukyeeno omu mwanya gw'omugisha.
Nyina yaamugira ati: Omukyeeno gwawe gube niinye gwazaho, mwana wangye; iwe fa okunyorobera, obindeetere.
Yakobo yaagyenda, yaabireetera nyina; nawe yaateeka enyama, yaagirunga, nk'oku ishe yaabaire naakunda.
Kandi Rebeka yaihayo ebijwaro birungi by'omutabani Esau kakuru; ebi Rebeka yaabaire aine omu nju, yaabijweka omutabani Yakobo kato;
kandi yaata empu z'ebyo byana by'embuzi aha mikono ye, n'aha bitsya bye aharikuterera;
bwanyima yaamuha enyama zirungire n'omugaati ogu yaateekateeka.
Yakobo yaija ahari ishe, yaagira ati: Taata! Onu ati: Ndi aha; ori oha, mwana wangye?
Yakobo yaagarukamu ishe ati: Niinye Esau kakuru omwana waawe; naakora nk'oku wandagiira; mbwenu imuka oshutame, orye aha nyama ei naakureetera, obone kunshabira omugisha.
Isaaka yaabuuza omwana we ati: Beitu shi, waagirahutsya ota, mwana wangye? Onu ati: Ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yampiira.
Isaaka yaagira Yakobo ati: Irira aha, mwana wangye, nkukoreho, ndeebe ku oraabe ori omwana wangye Esau buzimazima, nari shi otari we.
Yakobo yairira haihi Isaaka ishe; Isaaka yaamukoraho, yaagira ati: Eiraka n'erya Yakobo, kwonka emikono n'eya Esau.
Tiyaamumanya, ahabw'okuba engaro ze zikaba ziine ebyoya, nk'eza mukuru we Esau; yaiha aho, yaamushabira omugisha.
Yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Beitu kwo buzima, ori omwana wangye Esau? Yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi we.
Isaaka yaagira ati: Ginyirize haihi, ndyeho, mwana wangye, nkushabire omugisha. Yaagimwiriza haihi, yaarya, yaamureetera na viinyo, yaanywa.
Isaaka ishe yaamugira ati: Irira haihi, onnywegyere, mwana wangye.
Yaamwirira haihi, yaamunywegyera. Isaaka yaahurira omugaju gw'ebijwaro bye, yaamushabira omugisha, naagira ati:
Reeba, okutaamirana kw'omugaju gw'omwana wangye
Nikushusha nk'okw'eishwa eri MUKAMA ahaire omugisha.
N'aha mweru gw'ensi, n'engano nyingi na viinyo nyingi.
Otegyekye beene sho, n'abaana ba nyoko bakwinamire.
Weena orikukyeena, akyeenwe;
Kandi weena orikushabira omugisha, nawe aheebwe omugisha.
Bwanyima Isaaka ku yaabaire yaaheza kushabira Yakobo omugisha, Yakobo yaiha ati ebigyere omu maisho ga Isaaka ishe, Esau mukuru we yaija naaruga kuhiiga.
Nawe yaateeka enyama, yaagirunga, yaagitwarira ishe; yaagira ishe ati: Taata, imuka orye aha nyama ei omwana waawe yaakureetera, obone kunshabira omugisha.
Isaaka ishe yaamubuuza ati: Kandi shi, iwe ori oha? Onu ati: Ndi omwana waawe w'omujigaijo Esau.
Isaaka yaatetema munonga, yaagira ati: Owaaruga aha, andeeteire enyama, nkarya ahari byona, nkamushabira omugisha otakaizire, n'oha? Kandi n'omugisha ogwo aryaguheebwa.
Esau ku yaahuriire ebigambo bya ishe, yaarira, yaaborooga munonga n'obusaasi bwingi, yaagira ishe ati: Ai bambe, Taata, naanye nshabira omugisha.
Yaagira ati: Murumuna waawe yaija aha n'obugobya, yaatwara omugisha gwawe.
Esau yaagira ati:

Isaaka yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba, naamuhindura mukama waawe, na beene ishe boona naabamuha kuba abairu be; naamujarika, naamuha engano na viinyo eby'okumutunga; mbwenu shi, ninkikukorera ki, mwana wangye?
Esau yaabuuza ishe ati: Oine omugisha gumwe gwonka, Taata? Ai bambe Taata, naanye nshabira omugisha. Esau yaaborooga, yaarira.
Isaaka nikwo kumugira ati:
Oryatuura hare n'omweru gw'ensi,
N'orume orurikuruga omu iguru ahaiguru.
Oryaheereza murumuna waawe;
Kwonka ku orimwehindurira,
Oryaruga omu butegyeki bwe.
Baagambira Rebeka ebi Esau omwana we mukuru agambire; yaatuma ow'okweta Yakobo omwana we omuto, yaamugira ati: Omanye omukuru waawe Esau ku amaririire kukwita, kwemara ekiniga.
Mbwenu nu, mwana wangye, hurira eki ndikukugambira; imuka ohungire Harani owa Labaani munyaanyazi,
obe oriyo omuri ebi biro, okuhitsya obu ekiniga kya mukuru waawe kiraahwe,
n'enziika ye ekakurugaho, akeebwa eki omukozire; obwo ndyakutumaho, ogarukye. Ningasirwa ki, ku ndaabafiise mwembi eizooba rimwe?
Rebeka yaagira Isaaka ati: Amagara gangye garuhire na bahara ba Heesi; Yakobo ku arishwera omwishiki omuri bahara ba Heesi, ori nk'aba ab'omu nsi egi, kiryagasira ki amagara gangye?
Isaaka yaayeta Yakobo, yaamushabira omugisha, yaamwehanangiriza ati: Otarishwera omu Bakanaanikazi.
Imuka oze Padanaramu owa Besueli shwenkuru, oshwereyo omukazi omuri bahara ba Labaani nyokoromi.
Kandi Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona akuhe omugisha, akuhe okuzaara munonga, akukanyise, obe omutwe muhango gw'amahanga;
kandi akuhe omugisha gwa Abrahamu, iwe n'oruzaaro rwawe, obone kuhungura ensi ei waashuhuukiiremu, ei Ruhanga yaahaire Abrahamu.
Atyo Isaaka yaayohereza Yakobo, yaaza Padanaramu owa Labaani mwene Besueli Omusiria, munyaanya wa Rebeka, nyina wa Yakobo na Esau.
Esau ku yaareebire Isaaka yaashabira Yakobo omugisha, kandi yaamwohereza Padanaramu kushwerayo omukazi; n'omu kumushabira omugisha yaamwehanangiriza ngu atarishwera omukazi omu baishiki ba Kanaani;
na Yakobo yaayorobera ishe na nyina, yaaza Padanaramu,
Esau yaamanyira aho ku abaishiki ba Kanaani batarikugwisa gye Isaaka ishe;
Esau nikwo kuza owa Ishimaeli, akashwera Mahalaasi muhara wa Ishimaeli mwene Abrahamu, kandi munyaanya Nebayoosi, akamwongyera aha bakazi abu yaabaire aine.
Yakobo yaaruga Beeri-sheba, naatoora Harani;
yaahika omu mwanya, yaaguraaramu, ahakuba eizooba rikaba ryarengire; yaatwara eibaare rimwe aha mabaare agaabaire gari omu mwanya ogwo, yaaryeshegura, yaabyama, yaagwejegyera.
Yaaroota, naareeba amatembero gatsimbire ahansi, omutwe gwago guhikire omu iguru, baamaraika ba Ruhanga nibagatemberaho, kandi nibagatemburukiraho.
Kandi reeba, MUKAMA akaba ayemereire ahaiguru yaago, naagira ati: Ndi MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu shwenkuru, kandi Ruhanga wa Isaaka; ensi egi ei obyamiho ndyagikuha n'oruzaaro rwawe;

n'oruzaaro rwawe ruryaba nk'omucuucu gw'ahansi, rubugye oburengyerwa-izooba, n'oburugwa-izooba, obukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'obwa-buryo; kandi omuriiwe n'omu ruzaaro rwawe enganda zoona ez'omu nsi nimwo ziriheerwa omugisha.
Reeba ndi hamwe naiwe, ndyaguma ninkurinda ahu oriza hoona, kandi nkugarure omu nsi egi; ahakuba tindikutsigaho, okuhitsya obu ndiheza kukora ebi naakugambira.
Yaatiina, yaagira ati: Omwanya ogu ka nigutiinisa! Omwanya ogu ti kindi, n'enju ya Ruhanga, kandi n'eirembo ry'eiguru.
Yakobo yaimuka nibutaagurukana, yaihaho eibaare, eri yaabaire ayeshegwire, yaaribyara kuba enyomyo, yaashuka amajuta aha mutwe gwaryo.
Omwanya ogwo yaagweta Beseeli; kwonka eiziina ry'orurembo rwaho rikaba riri Luuzi obunyakare.
Yakobo yaahiga naagira ati: Ruhanga ku ariguma naanye, yandinda omuri oru rugyendo oru ndimu, yaaguma nampa eby'okurya n'eby'okujwara,
bwanyima naagaruka owa tata n'obusingye, obwo MUKAMA aryaba Ruhanga wangye;
n'eri ibaare eri naabyara nk'enyomyo, eryaba enju ya Ruhanga; kandi ahari byona ebi origuma nompa, tindibura kukuha ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi.

Yaimutsya amaisho, yaareeba eiziba omu ishwa, n'amasyo ashatu g'entaama gabyami haihi naryo; ahabw'okuba aha iziba eryo niho baabaire bageeshera; eibaare eryabaire riri aha munwa gw'eiziba rikaba riri rihango munonga.
Amasyo goona ku gaabaire gateeranira aho, abariisa baiha eibaare aha munwa gw'eiziba, beeshera, bwanyima barigaruraho.
Yakobo yaabuuza abariisa ati: Beene waitu, nimuruga hi? Baamugarukamu bati: Nituruga Harani.
Yaababuuza ati: Nimumanya Labaani mwene Nahori? Banu bati: Nitumumanya.
Yaababuuza ati: Ariyo agumire? Banu bati: Agumire. Nangwa reeba, na Rakeeli muhara we, nguriya naija n'entaama.
Yakobo yaagira ati: Reeba, bukiri omu ihangwe, n'obunaku bw'okuzaagiza amasyo tibukahikire; mweshere entaama, mugyende muziriise.
Baamugira bati: Titurikubaasa, amasyo goona gatakateeraine, bakaiha eibaare aha munwa gw'eiziba, tukabona kweshera entaama.
Yakobo ku yaareebire Rakeeli muhara wa Labaani nyinarumi n'entaama ze, yaahika aha iziba, yaiha eibaare aha munwa gwaryo, yaayeshera entaama za Labaani nyinarumi
Yakobo yaanywegyera Rakeeli, yaimutsya eiraka, yaarira naaborooga.
Yaayetondera Rakeeli ku aine obuzaare na ishe, kandi ku ari mutabani wa Rebeka. Rakeeli yairuka, yaabigambira ishe.
Labaani ku yaahuriire ebigambo bya Yakobo omwihwa, yairuka kumubugana, yaamubumbatira, yaamunywegyera, yaamutaasya omu ka ye. Yakobo yaagambira Labaani ebyabaireho byona.
Labaani yaamugira ati:
Bwanyima Labaani yaamubuuza ati: Beitu shi, oshemereire kunkorerera busha, ngu ahakuba twine obuzaare? Okaayenzire ku nkuha bihembo ki?
Kandi Labaani akaba aine abaishiki babiri; eiziina ry'omukuru akaba ari Lea, kandi ery'omuto ari Rakeeli.
Lea akaba ataine maisho garikwera; kwonka Rakeeli akaba ari murungi munonga w'okurigirwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo Yakobo akakunda Rakeeli. Yakobo nikwo kugarukamu Labaani ati: Niinyija kukukorera emyaka mushanju, ompingire Rakeeli muhara waawe omuto.
Labaani yaamugarukamu ati: Ni kirungi okumukuha okukira okumuha ondiijo muntu weena. Guma naanye.
Atyo Yakobo yaakora emyaka mushanju ahabwa Rakeeli; kandi egyo myaka yaamubeera nk'ebiro bikye, ahabw'okukunda oku yaabaire naamukunda.
Bwanyima Yakobo yaagira Labaani ati: Mpingira omukazi wangye, mmushwere, ahabw'okuba mpikize ebiro byangye.
Labaani yaateeka obugyenyi, yaayeta abantu boona ab'omuri ogwo mwanya.
Omu mwabazyo yaareeta muhara we Lea, yaamuhingira Yakobo, yaamushwera.
Kandi Labaani yaaha muhara we Lea omuzaana we Zilupa kuba omuzaana we.
Omu kasheeshe Yakobo yashanga ari Lea; yaayetomboitera Labaani, naagira ati: Beitu shi, ongizire ota? Tindakukoreire ahabwa Rakeeli? Mbwenu ongobereize ki?
Labaani yaagira ati: Owaitu tikwo tugira, okuhingira omuto omukuru atakashweirwe.
Banza omare saabiti n'ogwo, haza tukuhingire n'ogu, ogarukye onkorere endiijo myaka mushanju.
Yakobo yaakora atyo; yaamara saabiiti na Lea; bwanyima Labaani yaamuhingira Rakeeli muhara we.
Kandi Labaani yaaha Rakeeli omuzaana we Biliha kuba omuzaana we.
Atyo Yakobo yaashwera Rakeeli; kandi yaamukunda munonga okukira Lea; yaagaruka yaakorera Labaani endiijo myaka mushanju.
Lea yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo; yaamweta Reubeeni; ahakuba akagira ati: MUKAMA areebire okwitwa kubi kwangye; mbwenu ibanye naija kunkunda.
Yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara ondiijo mwojo; yaagira ati: MUKAMA ahuriire ku ndikwangwa, nikyo yampeera n'ogu; yaamweta Simeoni.
Yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara omwojo; yaagira ati: Aha murundi ogu ibanye naija kukwatanisa naanye, ahakuba mmuzaariire aboojo bashatu; n'ahabw'ekyo yaamweta Leevi.
Yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara omwojo; yaagira ati: Omurundi ogu naaza kuhimbisa MUKAMA; nikyo yaamweteire Yuda; bwanyima oruzaaro rwayemerera.
Yakobo yaagirira Rakeeli ekiniga, yaagira ati: Niinye waata omu mwanya gwa Ruhanga owaakwimire oruzaaro?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba omuzaana wangye Biliha, omushwere, abone kuzaarira aha maju gangye, naanye mmubonereho abaana.
Yaamuha Biliha omuzaana we; Yakobo yaamushwera.
Biliha yaagira enda, yaazaarira Yakobo omwana w'omwojo.
Rakeeli yaagira ati: Ruhanga ancwereire orubanja, kandi yaahurira okushaba kwangye, yampa omwana w'omwojo. Nikyo yaamweteire Daani.
Biliha omuzaana wa Rakeeli yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaarira Yakobo omwojo wa kabiri.
Rakeeli yaagira ati: Nfukaine munonga na mukuru wangye, naamwikarira. Nikyo yaamweteire Nafutaali.
Lea ku yaareebire ataagaruka kuzaara, yaatwara Zilupa omuzaana we, yaamuha Yakobo kuba omukazi we.
Zilupa omuzaana wa Lea yaazaarira Yakobo omwana w'omwojo.
Lea yaagira ati: Eshi naahiirwa! Yaamweta Gaadi.
Zilupa omuzaana wa Lea yaazaarira Yakobo omwojo wa kabiri;
Lea yaagira ati: Eshi nyine omugisha! Ahakuba abakazi baryanyeta Ohiiriirwe; yaamweta Asheri.

Lea yaamugarukamu ati: Iwe okyetsire ekigambo kikye okuncwa aha mushaija wange; mbwenu nooyenda kutwara n'amadudaimu g'omwana wangye? Rakeeli yaagira ati: Mbwenu ku orampe amadudaimu g'omwana waawe, baro naija kukuraarira.

Omu mwabazyo Yakobo ku yaabaire naaruga omu ishwa naataaha, Lea yaashohora kumubugana, yaamugira ati: Oshemereire kundaarira, ahabw'okuba naaha amadudaimu g'omwana wangye ahabwawe. Yakobo nikwo kumuraarira ekyo kiro.
Ruhanga yaahurira okushaba kwa Lea, yaagira enda, yaazaarira Yakobo omojo wa kataano.
Lea yaagira ati: Ruhanga yampa ebihembo, ahakuba nkaha ibanye omuzaana wangye; ogwo mwana yaamweta Isakaari.
Lea yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaarira Yakobo omwojo wa mukaaga.
Lea yaagira ati: Ruhanga yampa ekiconco kirungi eky'obugore; mbwenu ibanye naija kuguma naanye, ahakuba mmuzaariire aboojo mukaaga; omwana yaamweta Zebuluuni.
Bwanyima yaazaara omwishiki, yaamweta Dina.
Yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaagira ati: Ruhanga yaanyihaho ekihemu;
yaamweta Yosefu, naagira ati: MUKAMA anyongyere akandi koojo.
Rakeeli ku yaaherize kuzaara Yosefu, Yakobo yaagira Labaani ati: Ndaga, ngarukye omuka omu nsi y'owaitu.
Ompe abakazi bangye n'abaana bangye, abu naakukorereire, ngyende; ahakuba noomanya omurimo ogu naakukoreire.
Labaani yaamugarukamu ati: Ku oraabe nongirira embabazi, ogume aha; ahakuba nyetegyereize ku MUKAMA ampaire omugisha ahabwawe.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Oncwere ebihembo ebi orikwenda, niinyija kubikuha.
Yakobo yaamugarukamu ati: Noomanya oku naakukoreire, n'oku amatungo gaawe gaabaire, obu naabaire ninkigariisa.

Ahakuba agu waabaire oine ntakaizire, gakaba gari makye; mbwenu gakanyire, gaaba maingi munonga; kandi MUKAMA akakuha omugisha, ahu naabaire nza hoona. Mbwenu nyowe ndyatunga ryari eby'okukwatsa eka yangye?
Onu ati: Mbwenu nkuhe ki? Yakobo yaagarukamu ati: Toine ki orampe; kureka ku oraabe noikiriza kunkorera eki, niinyija kugumizamu kuriisa amasyo gaawe n'okugarinda.

Onyikirize ndabe omu busyo bwawe bwona eri izooba, nyihemu entaama zoona ez'ebigabo n'ez'amayenje, n'abaana baazo abarikwiragura, n'embuzi z'obugondo n'ez'ebitanga; ezirikushusha zityo nizo ziriba ebihembo byangye.
Bwanyima ku oraije kureeba ebihembo byangye, amazima gangye nigaija kweyoreka; embuzi yoona ei oraashangye etari y'ebitanga nari ey'obugondo, n'entaama yoona etari erikwiragura, biri n'enyibano.
Labaani yaagira ati: Ni kirungi; ka kibe nk'oku waagamba.
Eryo izooba Labaani yaashorooramu empaya z'embuzi ez'ebihuuga n'ez'obugondo n'ebuguma zoona ez'ebitanga n'ez'obugondo n'eine ekigabo yoona, n'entaama ezirikwiragura zoona, yaaziha abatabani;
yaatsiga ahagati ye na Yakobo omwanya gw'orugyendo rw'ebiro bishatu. Yakobo yaariisa amasyo ga Labaani agaatsigaraho.
Yakobo yaatwara enkoni z'emilebeni mibisi, n'ez'emiluzi, n'ez'arumoni, yaazicwamu amabara agarikwera maraingwa, gaareebeka.
Yaazita omu mikura erikutwara amaizi omu bwato, ahu amasyo ganywera;
ku gaabaire gaija kunywa, ezirikwenda kwema zaayema nizireeba ezo nkoni, zizaara ez'ebihuuga n'ez'ebigabo n'ez'amayenje.

Yakobo yaashoroora abo baana b'entaama, kandi amasyo yaagareebesa ez'ebihuuga n'ezirikwiragura zoona eziri omu busyo bwa Labaani; bwanyima eze yaazita aha kwazo, yaareka kuziteerana n'obusyo bwa Labaani.
Enungi ku zaabaire ziba nizeema, Yakobo ata enkoni omu mikura omu maisho gaazo, ngu zeemere ahagati y'ezo nkoni;
kwonka ku zaabaire ziba ziba mbi, areka kutaho enkoni; n'ahabw'ekyo embi ziri eza Labaani, enungi ziba eza Yakobo.
Okwo nikwo ogwo mushaija yaayeyongyeire kutunga munonga, n'okugira amasyo maingi, abazaana n'abahuuku, engamira n'endogoya.
Kandi yaareeba Labaani atakimureeba gye nk'okubanza.
MUKAMA yaagambira Yakobo ati: Garuka omu nsi ya baashwenkuru n'omuri beene waanyu; kandi ndyaguma hamwe naiwe.
Yakobo yaatuma ahari Rakeeli na Lea kumushanga omu ishwa, ei amasyo ge gaabaire gari,
yaabagira ati: Ndeebire shoimwe atakindeeba gye nk'okubanza; kwonka Ruhanga wa tata akaguma naanye.
Naimwe nimumanya ku naakoreire shoimwe n'amaani gangye goona.
Kandi shoimwe atuura nangobeza, ahindwire ebihembo byangye emirundi ikumi; kwonka Ruhanga taramwikiriize kunkora kubi.
Ku yaabaire angira ati: Ez'obugondo nizo ziriba ebihembo byawe, obusyo bwona buzaara ez'obugondo; akigira ati; Ez'ebihuuga nizo ziriba ebihembo byawe, obusyo bwona buzaara ez'ebihuuga.
Okwo nikwo Ruhanga yaayakire shoimwe amatungo, akagampa.
Omu bunaku bu amasyo gaabaire geemeramu, nkanaga amaisho nindoota, naareeba empaya z'embuzi ezaabaire nizeemya obusyo ziri ez'ebihuuga, n'ez'obugondo, n'ez'ebihuura.
Maraika wa Ruhanga yangambirira omuri ekyo kirooto ati: Yakobo! Naagarukamu nti: Mukama wangye.
Yangira ati: Imutsya amaisho gaawe, oreebe empaya z'embuzi zoona ezirikwemya obusyo ku ziri ez'ebihuuga n'ez'obugondo n'ez'ebihuura; ahakuba ndeebire ebi Labaani arikukwitsa.
Niinye Ruhanga wa Beseeli, ei waashukiire amajuta aha ibaare, kandi ei waahigiire nondahira; mbwenu imuka orugye omu nsi egi, ogarukye omu nsi ei waazaariirwemu.
Rakeeli na Lea baamugarukamu bati: Noogira ngu tukiine omugabo nari obuhunguzi owa tataitwe?
Tarikutubara nk'abanyamahanga? Ahakuba akatutunda, kandi yaamariraho kimwe empiiha zaitu.
Eitungo ryona eri Ruhanga yaayakire tataitwe, n'eryaitu n'abaana baitu. N'ahabw'ekyo eki Ruhanga akugambiire kyona, okikore.
Atyo Yakobo yaimuka, yaata abatabani n'abakazi be aha ngamira,
yaatwara amatungo ge goona n'ebintu byona ebi yaayetungiire, nigo matungo agu yaihire omuri Padanaramu, okuza owa Isaaka ishe omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Omuri ebyo biro Labaani akaba agiire kushara ebyoya by'entaama ze; Rakeeli yaiba ebishushani by'emandwa za ishe.
Yakobo yaayeiba ahari Labaani Omusiria, ahakuba taramugambiire ku arikwenda kuhunga.
Atyo yaacwa n'ebi yaabaire aine byona; yaimuka, yaayambuka omugyera Furaati, yaatoora omuhanda ogurikuza omu nsi y'ebibungo bya Gileadi,
Aha kiro kya kashatu baagambira Labaani ku Yakobo acwire.
Labaani nikwo kutwara beene ishe akamukurata; bwanyima y'ebiro mushanju akamushanga omu nsi y'ebibungo bya Gileadi.
Nyekiro Ruhanga yaizira Labaani Omusiria omu kirooto, yaamugira ati: Oyerinde, otagambira Yakobo ekigambo kyona, ekirungi nari ekibi.
Labaani yaahika Yakobo, yaashanga ateire eihema rye omu nsi y'ebibungo bya Geleadi; Labaani na beene ishe nabo baateerayo amahema gaabo.
Labaani yaagambira Yakobo ati: Eki okozire ki okunyeibaho, okatwara bahara bangye nk'abu banyagire na rurara?
Ohungiire ki ntakimanyire, okanyeibaho, otangambiire nkabona kukuraga tushemereirwe, nitweshongora n'ebitaasa n'enanga?
Kandi ahabw'enki otaanyikiriize kunywegyera baijukuru bangye na bahara bangye nimbaraga? Eki okozire n'eky'obushema.
Naaba nimbaasa kukukora kubi; kwonka Ruhanga wa sho araire angambiire ati: Oyerinde, otagambira Yakobo ekigambo kyona ekirungi nari ekibi.
Nimmanya ku ogyenzire ahabw'okugirira eka ya sho orushusho; beitu shi oibiire ki emandwa zangye?
Yakobo yaagarukamu Labaani ati: Ahakuba nkatiina, naagira ngu noija kuunyaka bahara baawe n'empaka.
Kandi weena ou oraashangye aine emandwa zaawe, atakira. Tukiri aha omu maisho ga beene waitu, caaka, ekyawe eki oraashangye nyine okitware. Kwonka Yakobo akaba atarikumanya ku Rakeeli aziibire.
Labaani yaataaha omu ihema rya Yakobo n'erya Lea n'omu ihema ry'abazaana bombi; kwonka tiyaazishangamu. Yaaruga omu ihema rya Lea, yaataaha omu rya Rakeeli.
Rakeeli ogwo akaba yaazitwaire, yaazitaire omu matandiiko g'engamira, azishutamiire, Labaani yaacaaka eihema ryona, tiyaazibona.
Rakeeli yaagambira ishe ati: Mukama wangye, kitakugwisa kubi ahabw'okutakwimukira, ahakuba ndi omu kwezi. Labaani yaacaaka, kwonka tiyaazibona.
Yakobo yaagira ekiniga, yaatonganisa Labaani, naagira ati: Nshobize ki? Nkozire kibi ki ekikureeteire okunkurata otyo n'ekiniga?
Mbwenu ku waacaaka omu bintu byangye byona, aha bintu by'omu nju yaawe byona waashangamu ki? Kite aha omu maisho ga beene waitu na beene waanyu, batucwere orubanja.
Mmazire naiwe emyaka makumi abiri; omuri egyo myaka entaama zaawe n'embuzi zaawe tizikatoroogaga, kandi tinkaryaga mpaya z'omu masyo gaawe.
Ezaabaire ziitwa enyamaishwa, nkaba ntazikureetera, niinye zaabaire zifeera; kandi eyaabaire eibwa nyomushana nari nyekiro okaba ogindihisa.
Okwo nikwo naabaire nfa kubi; nyomushana nyitwa omushana, na nyekiro nyitwa embeho; ngurukwa oturo.
Mmazire egi myaka makumi abiri omu ka yaawe; ikumi n'ena nkagikukorera ahabwa bahara baawe bombi, n'omukaaga ahabw'obusyo bwawe; kandi ebihembo byangye okabihindura emirundi ikumi.

Kuri Ruhanga wa tata, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, ou Isaaka yaabaire atiina, atarabaire hamwe naanye, buzimazima okaanyohereize ntaine kantu. Ruhanga areebire okubonabona n'okufa kubi kwangye ninkora, yaakuteisa eki kiro.

Labaani yaagarukamu Yakobo ati: Abaishiki aba ni bahara bangye, n'abaana aba n'abaana bangye, kandi n'amasyo aga n'amasyo gangye, n'ebi byona ebi orikureeba n'ebyangye. Mbwenu eri izooba ngire nta aba baishiki bangye n'abaana baabo abu baazaire?
Mbwenu ija tukore endagaano, nyowe naiwe; ebe omujurizi ahagati yangye naiwe.
Yakobo yaatwara eibaare, yaaribyara kuba enyomyo.
Yaagambira beene ishe ati: Mutorotoore amabaare. Ku baagatorotoire, baagarunda hamwe; baariira aha rubaju rw'ekirundo kyago.
Labaani yaayeta ogwo mwanya Yegari-sahadusa; kwonka Yakobo yaagweta Galeedi.
Labaani yaagira ati: Eri izooba ekirundo eki kyaba omujurizi ahagati yangye naiwe. Nikyo kyayeteirwe Galeedi;
kandi na Mizipa; ahakuba akagira ati; MUKAMA agumye eriisho ahagati yangye naiwe, ku turiba twataine.
Ku oriita kubi abaishiki bangye, nari waabashwereraho abandi bakazi, n'obu hariba hataine oriho, omanye ngu Ruhanga niwe kareebi wangye naiwe.
Kandi yaagira Yakobo ati: Omanye eki kirundo, n'egi nyomyo, ebi naata ahagati yangye naiwe.
Ekirundo eki n'eky'okuhamya, n'enyomyo egi n'ey'okuhamya, ku ntariraba aha kirundo eki kukukora kubi, kandi naiwe ku otarikirabaho nari egi nyomyo kunkora kubi.
Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Nahori, Ruhanga wa ishebo, atucwere orubanja. Yakobo yaarahira Ou Isaaka ishe yaabaire atiina.
Bwanyima Yakobo yaatambira ekitambo aha kibungo, yaayeta beene ishe kurya eby'okurya; baarya, baaraara aho, bwarugaho bwasheesha.
Ku bwabaire nibutaagurukana, Labaani yaimuka, yaanywegyera abaijukuru na bahara be, yaabashabira omugisha. Yaagyenda, yaagaruka owaabo.
Ku yaabareebire, yaagira ati: Aba n'eihe rya Ruhanga. Omwanya ogwo yaagweta Mahanaimu.
Yaatuma entumwa kumubandiza ahari Esau mukuru we omu nsi ya Seiri, niyo nsi ya Edomu,
yaabaragiira ati: Mugambire mukama wangye Esau muti: Oku nikwo omwiru waawe Yakobo arikugamba, naagira ati: Nkashuhuukira owa Labaani naagumayo n'okuhitsya hati.
Nyine ente n'endogoya n'amasyo g'entaama n'abahuuku n'abazaana. Mbwenu ntumire ahariiwe, mukama wangye, kukugambira, ngu okaangirira embabazi.
Entumwa zaagaruka ahari Yakobo, zaagira ziti: Esau mukuru waawe tumuhikireho; kandi naija n'abashaija magana ana kukubugana.
N'ahabw'ekyo Yakobo yaatiina munonga, yaashoberwa. Abantu abu yaabaire aine n'amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente n'engamira, yaabicwamu ebicweka bibiri;
yaagira ati: Esau ku araahikye aha kicweka kimwe, yaakicwekyereza, ekindi kicweka nikiija kukira.
Yakobo yaashaba ati: Ai Ruhanga wa tatenkuru Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa tata Isaaka, MUKAMA owangizire oti: Garuka owaanyu omuri beene waanyu, ndyakukorera gye.

Aha mbabazi zaawe zoona n'obwesigwa bwawe bwona ebi waayorekire omwiru waawe, tinshemereire kuheebwaho nangwa n'akati kaingana busha; ahakuba nkambuka Yorudani egi n'enkoni yonka; mbwenu ndugiremu emitwe ebiri.
Ninkweshengyereza, onkize mukuru wangye Esau; ahakuba nimmutiina, ngu atakaija akanyita n'abaana bangye na baanyinabo.
Kandi naiwe okandaganisa oti: Buzimazima ndyakukorera gye, mpindure oruzaaro rwawe rube nk'omusheenyi gw'aha nyanja, ogutarikubaasa kubarwa.
Ekyo kiro yaaraara aho; yaiha omu bi yaabaire aine ekiconco ky'okuha Esau mukuru we,
ebuguma z'embuzi magana abiri, n'empaya makumi abiri, ebuguma z'entaama magana abiri n'empaya makumi abiri,
engamira ezirikukamwa makumi ashatu n'enyana zaazo, ente z'ejigija makumi ana n'enimi ikumi, n'ebuguma z'endogoya makumi abiri n'abaana baazo ikumi.
Yaaziha abairu be, buri busyo okwabwo, yaabagira ati: Munyebembere, mwambukye, mutsigye omwanya ahagati y'obusyo n'obundi.
Yaaragiira omwebembezi ati: Mukuru wangye Esau ku araakubugane, yaakubuuza ati: Ori ow'oha? Kandi, Nimuza hi? Kandi amatungo aga n'ag'oha?
Omugire oti: N'ag'omwiru waawe Yakobo, mukama wangye Esau; n'ekiconco eki waatwekyerwa; kandi nawe atukuratiire.
Kandi yaaragiira atyo owa kabiri n'owa kashatu, n'abaabaire nibafunya amasyo boona, naabagira ati: Mube nikwo mwagira Esau, ku muraamubugane;
kandi mumugire muti: Reeba, n'omwiru waawe Yakobo atukuratiire. Ahakuba Yakobo akagira ati: Naaza kumucureeza n'ekiconco ekinyebembeire, bwanyima tureebane; shana akaanyikiriza.
Ekiconco nikwo kumwebembera, kikambuka; kwonka we akaraara aho ahu baagombekire ekyo kiro.
Ekyo kiro yaimuka, yaatwara abakazi be bombi n'abazaana be na'abaana be ikumi n'omwe, baayambukira aha nyambukiro ya Yaboki.
Yaabambutsya ako kagyera n'ebi yaabaire aine byona.
Yakobo yaatsigarayo wenka; omushaija yaija, yaafukaana nawe bwarugaho bwataagurukana.
Omushaija ogwo ku yaareebire yaamurema, yaamukora aha igufa ry'eitako eitako, rya Yakobo ryateruka nibakifukaana.
Omushaija yaamugira ati: Ndekura, ahakuba nibutaagurukana. Yakobo yaamugira ati: Tindikwija kkukurekura aotampaire mugisha.
Onu ati: Eiziina ryawe ori oha? Ati: Ndi Yakobo.
Onu ati: Okuruga hati torigaruka kwetwa Yakobo kureka Israeli; ahakuba ohakaine na Ruhanga n'abantu, waasinga.
Bwanyima Yakobo yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ngambira eiziina ryawe. Onu ati: Nooyendera ki kumanya eiziina ryangye? Atyo yaamuheera aho omugisha.
Yakobo yaayeta ogwo mwanya Penueli, naagira ati: Nyereebaniire na Ruhanga amaisho n'amaisho, tinaafa.
Eizooba ryarasha naarengyera Penueli, naagyenda omunyugu aha bw'eigufa ry'eitako.
Abaisraeli nikyo bazirira enyama y'aha mutsi gw'eitako ry'ekibero n'okuhitsya hati; ahabw'okuba ogwo mushaija akakora aha mutsi gw'eitako ry'ekibero kya Yakobo.
Yakobo yaimutsya amaisho, yaareeba Esau naija n'abashaija be magana ana; yaabaganisa abaana, yaaha Lea abe, na Rakeeli abe, n'abazaanakazi bombi abaabo.
Yaayebembeza abazaanakazi n'abaana baabo, yaakuratsaho Lea n'abaana be, haahereeruka Rakeeli na Yosefu.
Yakobo yaabeebembera, yainama ahansi emirundi mushanju, okuhitsya obu yaahikire haihi na mukuru we.
Esau yairuka kumubugana, yaamubumbatira, yaamugwa omu kifuba, yaamunywegyera; bombi baarira.
Esau ku yaimukize amaisho, yaareeba abakazi n'abaana, yaagira ati: Aba abu oine nibaahi? Yakobo yaagarukamu ati: N'abaana abu Ruhanga yaahaire omwiru waawe ahabw'embabazi ze.
Abazaanakazi n'abaana baabo bairira haihi, bainama.
Lea nawe yaija n'abaana be, bainama; bwanyima Yosefu na Rakeeli nabo baija, bainama.
Esau yaabuuza ati: Ebintu byona ebi mbugaine bibaire biri ebya ki? Onu ati: N'ebi ntwekyeire mukama wangye, ngu angirire embabazi.
Esau yaagira ati: Ebi nyine nibimmara, mwana wa maawe; ebyo ebi oine yegumire nabyo.

Yakobo yaamugira ati: Ngaaha! Naakweshengyereza, ku oraabe wangirira embabazi, ikiriza ekiconco eki nkureeteire; ahabw'okuba ku naareeba amaisho gaawe, naashusha nk'owaareeba amaisho ga Ruhanga, kandi wanshemerererwa.
Naakweshengyereza, yakiira ekiconco eki nkureeteire, ahakuba Ruhanga ankoreire eby'embabazi, kandi ebi nyine, nibimmaara. Yaamweshengyereza munonga; yaakitwara.
Bwanyima Esau yaagira ati: Ka tugumizemu tugyende, nyowe mbeebembere.
Yakobo yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, noomanya abaana ku bataine maani, kandi amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente agu nyine nigontsya; ku baraagabindirane eizooba rimwe, goona nigafa.

Ninkweshengyereza, mukama wangye, orabe aha mwiru waawe, ogyende, nyowe niinyija kwija mpora, nk'oku amasyo agu nyine garikugyenda, kandi n'abaana oku barikugyenda, okuhitsya ahu ndaahikire Seiri owa mukama wangye.
Esau yaagira ati: Ka nkutsigire abashaija bamwe ahari aba abu nyine. Onu ati: Mbwenu n'ab'enki? Nsaasira, mukama wangye, obarekye.
Atyo Esau yaagyenda eryo eizooba naagaruka Seiri.
Kwonka Yakobo yaagyenda naaza Sukosi; ku yaahikireyo, yaayeyombekyera enju, kandi yaayombekyerayo amasyo ge ebiju. Omwanya ogwo nikyo gwayeteirwe Sukosi.
Yakobo ku yaarugire Padanaramu, yaahika n'obusingye aha rurembo rwe Shekemu omu nsi ya Kanaani, yaasiisira omu maisho gaayo.
Yaagura ekibanja ahari beene Hamori ishe wa Shekemu ebicweka by'efeeza igana, ahu yaateire eihema rye.
Yaayombekayo eitambiro, yaaryeta Elelohe-Israeli.
Shekemu, mwene Hamori Omuhiivi omutegyeki w'ensi egyo, ku yaamureebire, yaamutwara, yaamuhamba, yaamushiisha.
Ogwo mushaija yaamarira omutima gwe ahari Dina muhara wa Yakobo, yaamukunda, yaamugambira eby'okumugwisa gye.
Shekemu yaagambira Hamori ishe, ati: Nshwererera ogu mwishiki.
Yakobo yaahurira ku Shekemu asiisire Dina muhara we; obwo abatabani bakaba bariisize; Yakobo yaahunama, okuhitsya ahu baiziire.
Hamori ishe wa Shekemu yaaruga omu rurembo, yaaza kuhanuura na Yakobo.

Beene Yakobo, ku baakihuriire, baaruga omu iriisizo, baataaha. Baashaasha, kandi baagira ekiniga kingi, ahabw'okuba akakora ekihagaro omu ba Israeli okubyama na muhara wa Yakobo, ekintu ekitashemereire kukorwa.
Hamori yaahanuura nabo, ati: Omutima gwa mutabani wangye gukunzire muhara waanyu; naabeeshengyereza mumumuhe amushwere.
Mushwererane naitwe, mutuhingire bahara baanyu, naimwe mushwere abaitu.
Haza mutuure naitwe; ensi ngigi ebari omumaisho, mugituuremu, mugikoreremu eby'obushuubuzi, kandi mugitungiremu.
Na Shekemu yaagambira ishe w'omwishiki na banyaanya ati: Mungirire embabazi; eki murancwe kyona, ninkibaha.
Enjugano n'ekiconco ebi murancwe, n'obu byakwingana ki, niinyija kubiha, nk'oku muraabincwe; beitu mumpingire ogu mwishiki.
Beene Yakobo baagarukamu Shekemu na Hamori ishe nibabaryarya, ahabw'okushiisha Dina munyaanyabo;
baabagira bati: Eki titurikubaasa kukikora, okuhingira munyaanyaitwe omuntu otashazirwe; ahakuba omuriitwe kikaaba ekihemu.
Hariho kimwe kyonka ekyakutureetera kubaikiriza, nikwo kwikiriza kuba nkaitwe, buri mushaija weena omuriimwe akasharwa;
obwo nibwo turibahingira bahara baitu, naitwe tukashwera bahara baanyu, tukatuura naimwe, tukaba eihanga rimwe.
Ku muraabe mutatwikiriize mukasharwa, nitwija kutwara omwishiki waitu, twegyendere.
Ebigambo byabo byashemeza Hamori na Shekemu omutabani.
Omutsigazi ogwo tiyaayeziringa, yaarahuka kukikora, ahabw'okukunda munonga omwishiki wa Yakobo; kandi akaba naasiimwa munonga okukira boona ab'omu ka ya ishe.
Hamori na Shekemu omutabani baaza aha irembo ry'orurembo rwabo, baahanuura n'abashaija b'omuri orwo rurembo, bati:
Abashaija abo twine nabo obusingye; n'ahabw'ekyo ka batuure omu nsi egi, bakoreremu eby'obushuubuzi; ahakuba ensi egi ni mpango, neebamara; tushwere bahara baabo, naitwe tubahingire abaitu.
Hariho kimwe kyonka ekyakureetera abashaija abo okutuura naitwe, tukaba eihanga rimwe, nikwo buri mushaija weena omuriitwe okusharwa, nkabo oku bashazirwe.
Nimugira ngu ente zaabo n'ebintu byabo n'amatungo gaabo goona tibirikwija kuba ebyaitu? Ka tufe okubaikiriza; nibwo baraatuure naitwe.
Boona abaashohoire nibaraba omu irembo ry'orurembo rwe, baikiriza ebi Hamori na Shekemu omutabani baabagambira. Buri mushaija weena owaarabire omu irembo ry'orurembo rwe yaasharwa.
Baitsa Hamori na Shekemu omutabani rurara, baiha Dina omu nju ya Shekemu, baagyenda.
Beene Yakobo baija aha mitumbi, baagicwijura, baanyaga eby'omu rurembo, nibabatura okushiisha munyaanyabo.
Baatwara n'amasyo gaabo ag'entaama n'ag'ente, n'endogoya zaabo, n'ebyabaire biri omu rurembo n'omu ishwa byona;
baanyaga eitungo ryabo ryona, n'abaana baabo abato n'abakazi baabo, n'ebintu byona ebyabaire biri omu maju, byaba eminyago yaabo.

Bwanyima Yakobo yaagira Simeoni na Leevi ati: Mungwisiize akagwe, mwandeetera kwangirwa kimwe abantu abatwire omu nsi egi, Abanyakanaani n'Abaperizi; haza nimureeba ku turi bakye; ku baraayeteerane kundwanisa, niinyija kucwekyerezibwa n'eka yangye.
Baagira bati: Hoona tukaamurekire agira munyaanyaitwe nka maraaya?
Bwanyima Yakobo yaagambira ab'omu ka ye n'abandi boona abaabaire bari hamwe nawe, ati: Mwiheho baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga abari omuriimwe, mweyeze, mujware ebindi bijwaro;
bwanyima mwimukye twinamukye Beseeli; niinyija kwombekyerayo Ruhanga eitambiro, owampuriire aha izooba ry'obusaasi bwangye, akaguma naanye omu muhanda ogu naarabiremu.
Nabo nikwo kuha Yakobo baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga abu baabaire baine, n'empeta ezi baabaire bajwaire aha matu gaabo; Yakobo akabishereka ahansi y'omwela ogwabaire guri haihi na Shekemu.
Bwanyima Yakobo n'abu yaabaire aine boona baahika Luuzi, niyo Beseeli, ey'omu nsi ya Kanaani;
yaayombekayo eitambiro, yaayeta ogwo mwanya Eli-Beseeli, ahabw'okuba niyo Ruhanga yaamweyorekyeire, obu yaahunga mukuru we.
Kandi Debora, omurezi wa Rebeka, yaafa, yaaziikwa ifo ya Beseeli ahansi y'omwela; n'ahabw'ekyo baagweta
Yakobo, ku yaarugire Padanaramu, Ruhanga yaagaruka yaamweyoreka, kandi yaamuha omugisha.
Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Eiziina ryawe ori Yakobo; kwonka tokyetwa Yakobo obundi, kureka noija kwetwa Israeli. Ruhanga nikwo kumweta Israeli.
Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Ndi Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona; ozaare, okanye; eihanga n'omutwe gw'amahanga biryaruga omuriiwe, kandi n'abagabe baryakukomookamu.
Ndyakuha ensi ei naahaire Abrahamu na Isaaka, kandi bwanyima ngihe n'oruzaaro rwawe.
Ruhanga yaamutsiga omu mwanya ogu yaabaire naagaaniriramu nawe, yaatemba omu iguru.
Yakobo yaabyara enyomyo y'eibaare omu mwanya ogu yaagaaniriiremu nawe, yaagishukaho empongano y'eky'okunywa, kandi yaagishukaho n'amajuta.
Yakobo yaayeta omwanya ogu Ruhanga yaagaaniriiremu nawe Beseeli.
Bwanyima baaruga Beseeli; ku baabaire bakiri kaanya, batakahikire Efuraata, Rakeeli yaarumwa kuzaara, yaahangaanirwa.
Ku yaabaire akihangaaniirwe, omuzaarisa yaamugira ati: Otatiina; waaza kugaruka kuzaara omwojo.
Ku yaabaire ari haihi kufa, omu kukaba kwe yaamweta
Atyo Rakeeli yaafa, yaaziikwa aha muhanda ogurikuza Efuraata, niyo Betelehemu.
Yakobo yaabyara enyomyo aha kituuro kye; niyo nyomyo y'aha kituuro kya Rakeeli; kandi ekiriho n'okuhitsya eri izooba.
Israeli yaagumizamu, bwanyima yaateera eihema rye seeri y'omunaara gwa Ederi.
Israeli ku yaabaire akiri omuri ekyo kyanga, Reubeeni yaagyenda, yaabyama na Biliha muka ishe ow'ekinyanshunju; Israeli yaakimanya. Obwo batabani ba Yakobo bakaba baahikire ikumi na babiri.
Batabani ba Lea, Reubeeni omujigaijo gwa Yakobo, Simeoni, Leevi, Yuda, Isakaari na Zebuluuni.
Batabani ba Rakeeli, Yosefu na Benyamiini.
Batabani ba Biliha, omuzaana wa Rakeeli, Daani na Nafutaali.
Batabani ba Zilupa omuzaana wa Lea, Gaadi na Asheri. Abo nibo batabani ba Yakobo abaazaariirwe Padanaramu.
Bwanyima Yakobo yaashanga ishe Mamure, nari Kiryasiaraba, niyo Heburooni, ei Abrahamu na Isaaka baabaire bashuhuukiire.
Emyaka ya Isaaka ekahika igana na makumi munaana.
Atyo omwitsyo gwamuhwamu, yaafa, yaakurata abaabo, ari omugurusi ahwitsire; abatabani Esau na Yakobo baamuziika.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Esau, niwe Edomu.
Esau akashwera abakazi omu baishiki ba Kanaani; Ada muhara wa Eloni Omuhiiti, Oholibama muhara wa Aana, kandi mwijukuru wa Zibeoni Omuhiivi,
na Basemaasi muhara wa Ishimaeli, munyaanya wa Nebayoosi.
Ada yaazaarira Esau Elifaazi; Basemaasi yaazaara Reueli,
na Oholibama yaazaara Yeushi, Yalamu na Koora. Abo nibo batabani ba Esau abaazaariirwe omu nsi ya Kanaani.

Esau yaatwara abakazi be, batabani be, bahara be, n'ab'omu ka ye boona n'ente ze n'amatungo ge goona kandi n'ebintu bye byona, ebi yaihire omu nsi ya Kanaani; yaaza omu nsi ya hare, ngu ataane n'omurumuna Yakobo;
ahabw'okuba eitungo ryabo rikaba riri ringi, tibaabaasa kutuurana; ensi ei baabaire baashuhuukiiremu, terabaasize kubamara ahabw'amatungo gaabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo Esau yaatuura omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Seiri; Esau ogwo niwe Edomu.
Aba nibo baijukuru ba Esau, ishenkuru w'Abanyaedomu abaabaire batwire omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Seiri.
Aga nigo maziina ga batabani ba Esau: Elifaazi mutabani wa Ada muka Esau, Reueli mutabani wa Basemaasi muka Esau.
Na batabani ba Elifaazi bakaba bari Temani, Omari, Zeefo, Gatamu na Kenazi.
Kandi Timuna akaba ari omukaza wa Elifaazi mwene Esau ow'ekinyanshunju; yaazaarira Elifaazi Amaleki. Abo nibo baijukuru ba Ada muka Esau.
Aba nibo baijukuru ba Basemaasi muka Esau.
Aba nibo batabani ba Oholibama muka Esau, muhara wa Aana mwijukuru wa Zibeoni; yaazaarira Esau Yeushi, Yalamu na Koora.
Aba nibo bakuru b'enganda beene Esau; batabani ba Elifaazi omujigaijo gwa Esau, omutware Temani, omutware Omari, omutware Zeefo, omutware Kenazi,
omutware Koora, omutware Gatamu n'omutware Amaleki; abo nibo bakuru b'enganda abaazairwe Elifaazi omu nsi ya Edomu, kandi nibo baijukuru ba Ada.

Aba nibo batabani ba Reueli mwene Esau: omutware Nahasi, omutware Zeera, omutware Shama n'omutware Miiza; abo nibo batware abaazairwe Reueli omu nsi ya Edomu, kandi nibo baijukuru ba Basemaasi muka Esau.
Aba nibo batabani ba Oholibama muka Esau: omutware Yeushi, omutware Yalamu, n'omutware Koora; abo nibo batware abaazairwe Oholibama muka Esau, kandi muhara wa Aana.
Abo nibo batabani ba Esau, niwe Edomu; kandi abo nibo batware baabo.
Aba nibo batabani ba Seiri Omuhoori, abaashangirwe batwire omuri egyo nsi: Lotani, Shobali, Zibeoni, Aaba,
Dishoni, Ezeeri na Dishani; abo nibo baami b'Abahoori beene Seiri ab'omu nsi ya Edomu.
Na batabani ba Lotani bakaba bari Hoori na Hemani; kandi Timuna akaba ari munyaanya wa Lotani.
Aba nibo batabani ba Shobali: Alivani, Manahaasi Ebali, Sheefo na Onamu.
Aba nibo batabani ba Zibeoni: Aaya na Aana; Aana ogwo niwe yaazoire ekitagata omu ihamba, obu yaabaire ariisize endogoya za Zibeoni ishe.
Aba nibo baana ba Aana: Dishoni na Oholibama muhara wa Aana.
Aba nibo batabani ba Dishoni: Hemidaani, Eshibaani, Isuraani, na Kerani.
Aba nibo batabani ba Ezeeri: Biluhaani, Zaavani na Akani.
Aba nibo batabani ba Dishani: Uuzi na Arani.
Aba nibo batware b'Abahoori; omutware Lotani, omutware Shobali, omutware Zibeoni, omutware Aana,
omutware Dishoni, omutware Ezeri n'omutware Dishani; abo nibo batware b'Abahoori omu nsi ya Seiri, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri.
Aba nibo bagabe abaategyekire omu nsi ya Edomu, Abaisraeli obu baabaire batakategyekirwe mugabe weena.
Beela mwene Beori akategyeka Edomu, kandi eiziina ry'orurembo rwe rikaba riri Dinihaba.
Beela yaafa, Yobabu mwene Zeera owa Bozira yaayema omu mwanya gwe.
Yobabu yaafa, Hushamu ow'omu nsi y'Abatemani yaayema omu mwanya gwe.
Hushamu yaafa, Hadadi mwene Bedadi, owaabingire Abamidiani omu nsi ya Moabu, yaayema omu mwanya gwe; eiziina ry'orurembo rwe rikaba riri Aviisi.
Hadadi yaafa, Samula owa Masireka yaayema omu mwanya gwe.
Samula yaafa, Shauli owa Rehoboosi aha mugyera Furaati yaayema omu mwanya gwe.
Shauli yaafa, Baali-hanani mwene Akiboori yaayema omu mwanya gwe.

Baali-hanani mwene Akiboori yaafa, Hadari yaayema omu mwanya gwe, n'eiziina ry'orurembo rwe rikaba riri Pau, kandi omukazi we akaba naayetwa Mehetabeeli, muhara wa Matireedi, kandi mwijukuru wa Mezahaabu.
Aga nigo maziina g'abatware abaakomookire ahari Esau, n'emiryango yaabo n'emyanya yaabo n'amaziina gaabo; omutware Timuna, omutware Aliva, omutware Yeseti,
omutware Oholibama, omutware Eela, omutware Pinoni,
omutware Kenazi, omutware Temani, omutware Mibuzaari,
omutware Magudieli n'omutware Iraamu; abo nibo batware ba Edomu, niwe Esau ishenkuru w'Abanyaedomu, nk'emyanya yaabo ey'omu nsi ei baakubwire oku yaabaire eri.
Yakobo akatuura omu nsi ya Kanaani, ei ishe yaashuhuukiiremu.
Ebi nibyo byabaire aha ruzaaro rwa Yakobo.

Yosefu akaba naariisa amasyo hamwe na bakuru be, aine emyaka ikumi na mushanju; omu kukura kwe akanyeeta na batabani ba Biliha n'aba Zilupa baka ishe; kandi Yosefu akaba agambira ishe ebibi ebi baabaire bakora.
Kandi Israeli akaba akunda Yosefu okukira abandi baana be boona, ahakuba akaba ari omwana ou yaazaire yaabaire omugurusi; n'ahabw'ekyo akamubaziiriza ekanzu ndaingwa y'amabara.
Bakuru be ku baareebire ishe naamukunda okubakira boona, baamwanga, tibaabaasa kugamba gye nawe.
Yosefu yaaroota ekirooto; ku yaakigambiire bakuru be, baayeyongyera kumwanga.
Yaabagira ati: Nimbeeshengyereza muhurire ekirooto eki ndootsire;
tubaire nituboha ebiba omu misiri; ekiba kyangye kyaimuka, kyayemerera; ebyanyu biba nabyo byayemerera byayehinguririza ekyangye, byakiinamira.
Bakuru be baamubuuza bati: Noogira ngu oryaba omugabe waitu? Buzima oryatutegyeka? Baayeyongyera kumwanga ahabw'ebirooto bye n'ebigambo bye.
Yaagaruka yaaroota ekindi kirooto, yaakigambira bakuru be, naagira ati: Ngarukire naaroota ekindi kirooto; eizooba n'okwezi n'enyonyoozi ikumi n'emwe nibiinyinamira.
Ku yaakigambiire ishe na bakuru be, ishe yaamuteisa, yaamugira ati: Ekyo ni kirooto ki eki orootsire? Noogira ngu nyowe na nyoko na bakuru baawe buzima turyaija twiname ahansi omu maisho gaawe?
Bakuru be baamugirira eihari, kwonka ishe yaaguma naijuka ekyo kigambo.
Bwanyima bakuru be baaza kuriisa amasyo ga ishebo haihi na Shekemu.
Israeli yaagira Yosefu ati: Bakuru baawe tibarikuriisiza Shekemu? Ija mbakutumeho. Yaamugarukamu ati: Ntuma, Taata.
Ishe yaamugira ati: Irooko oreebe bakuru baawe ku baraabe bari gye n'amasyo ku garaabe gari gye, ogarukye ongambire. Nikwo kumutuma, akaruga omu Ruhanga rwa Heburooni, akaza Shekemu.
Ku yaahikireyo, omuntu yaamushanga naagyendagyenda omu bwerere; yaamubuuza ati: Noosherura ki?
Onu ati: Ninsherura bakuru bangye; ninkweshengyereza, ngambira ahu bariisiize.
Omushaija yaamugarukamu ati: Bafurukire, ahakuba mpuriire nibagira ngu, Tuze Dosani. Atyo Yosefu yaakurata bakuru be, yaabashanga Dosani.
Baagambirana bati: Reeba, ruroota yaija.
Mbwenu murekye tumwite, tumunagye omu kiina; turyagira tuti: Enyamaishwa endi y'abantu ekamurya; haza tureebe ebirooto bye ahu biriherera.
Reubeeni yaakihurira, yaamubakiza, yaagira ati: Ka turekye kumwitira kimwe.
Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Mutasheesha eshagama, mumunagye aha omu ihamba omuri eki kiina, kwonka emikono yaanyu etagira eki yaamukoraho. Akagira atyo ngu abone kumubakiza, amugarurire ishe.
Yosefu ku yaahikire bakuru be, baamujuura ekanzu eri endaingwa ei yaabaire ajwaire,
baamutwara, baamunaga omu kiina; ekyo kiina kikaba kirimu busha, kitarimu maizi.
Baashutama kurya; ku baimukize amaisho, baareeba omutwe gw'Abaishimaeli nibaruga Gileadi, baine engamira zeekoreire emigaju n'emibazi na sumuruna, nibabitwara Misri.
Yuda yaagira beene ishe ati: Nikitugasira ki kwita murumuna waitu, tukashereka eshagama ye?
Mwije tumuguze Abaishimaeli, emikono yaitu erekye kuba niyo yaamwita; ahabw'okuba ni murumuna waitu, kandi turi ab'orura rumwe. Beene ishe baamwikiriza.
Omuri ako kaanya abashuubuzi b'Abamidiani baarabaho; banu baiha Yosefu omu kiina, baamuguza Abaishimaeli shekeli makumi abiri z'efeeza; baatwara Yosefu Misri.
Reubeni ku yaagarukire aha kiina, yaashanga Yosefu atarimu, yaataagura ebijwaro bye;
yaagaruka ahari beene ishe, yaagira ati: Omwana tariyo; mbwenu ntoore hi?
Baatwara ekanzu ya Yosefu, baita empaya y'embuzi, baagijabika omu shagama yaayo;
egyo kanzu ndaingwa baagitwarira ishebo, baagira bati: Tugwire aha kanzu egi; reeba ku eraabe eri ey'omwana waawe, nari etari yo.
Yakobo yaagimanya, yaagira ati: N'ekanzu y'omwana wangye; enyamaishwa endi y'abantu emuriire; tihariho kubanganisa, Yosefu ataagataagwirwe.
Yakobo yaataagura ebijwaro bye, yaayezirika ekiguniya, yaamara ebiro bingi naacurira omwana we.
Batabani be na bahara be boona baimuka baija kumwebesa enaku; yaayanga, yaagira ati: Ndyarugaho, nshangye omwana wangye okuzimu ninkicura. Nikwo ishe yaamucuriire atyo.
Kandi Abamidiani abo ku baahikire Misri, baamuguza Potifaari, omwe aha bakuru b'engabo za Faraho, owaabaire ategyeka abarinzi.
Omu biro ebyo Yuda akaruga omuri beene ishe, yaashuuma, yaataaha ow'omuntu orikwetwa Hiira owa Adulaamu.
Yuda yaareebayo omwishiki w'Omunyakanaani orikwetwa Shua; yaamutwara, yaabyama nawe;
yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Eeri.
Yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara ondiijo mwojo, yaamweta Onani;
kandi yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara ondiijo mwojo, yaamweta Sheela; obwo akaba ari Keziba, obu omukazi we yaazaara ogwo mwana.
Yuda yaashwererera omutabani omukuru Eeri omukazi eiziina rye Tamari.
Kwonka Eeri omujigaijo gwa Yuda akaba mubi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, MUKAMA nikwo kumwita.
Bwanyima Yuda yaagira Onani ati: Irooko otaahe omwa muka mukuru waawe, oraare nawe, omumuzaarireho omwana.
Onani yaamanya ngu omwana tarikwija kuba owe; n'ahabw'ekyo ku yaabyamire na muka mukuru we, yaasheesha ahansi, ngu atazaarira mukuru we.
Eki yaakozire kyaba kibi omu maisho ga Mukama; nawe yaamwita.

Bwanyima Yuda yaagambira Tamari omukaamwana ati: Guma ori omufaakazi omu ka ya sho, okuhitsya obu omwana wangye Sheela arikura; ahakuba akatiina ngu naija kufa nka bakuru be. Tamari nikwo kugyenda, akaguma omu ka ya ishe.

Bwanyima ku haahingwireho ebiro, muhara wa Shua, muka Yuda, yaafa. Yuda ku yaarugire omu rufu rw'omukazi we, yainamuka Timuna hamwe na mugyenzi we Hiira owa Adulaamu, baaza ei abariisa be baabaire nibasharira ebyoya by'entaama.
Baagira Tamari bati: Shozaara yainamuka, yaaza Timuna kusharisa entaama ze ebyoya.

Yaajuura ebijwaro by'obufaakazi, yaayetwekyerera akenda ah amaisho, ogundi yaagwehumbika, yaashutama omu irembo rya Enaimu, eriri aha muhanda ogurikuza Timuna; ahabw'okuba akareeba Sheela akuzire, haza tibaamumuha kumuhungura.
Yuda ku yaamureebire, yaagira ngu ni maraaya; ahakuba akaba ayetwekyereire ah amaisho.
Yaakiikama aha rubaju rw'omuhanda ahu yaabaire ari, yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ija tubyame hamwe; (kwonka akaba atamanyire ku ari omukaamwana). Onu ati: Nompa ki, ku oraabyame naanye?
Yaagira ati: Niinyija kukutwekyera omwana gw'embuzi ogw'omu busyo bwangye. Onu ati: Noija kunkwatiriza ki, okuhitsya obu oraaguntwekyere?
Yaagira ati: Nkukwatirize ki? Onu ati: Ontsigire empeta yaawe eriho akamanyiso, n'orukoba rwawe, n'egyo nkoni ei oine omu ngaro. Yaabimuha, yaabyama nawe, yaamutweka.
Omukazi yaimuka, yaayegyendera, yaayeiha ako kenda aha mutwe, yaagaruka yaajwara ebijwaro bye by'obufaakazi.
Yuda yaatweka munywani we Omunyadulaamu omwana gw'embuzi ngu omukazi amugarurire ebi amukwatiriize; kwonka tiyaamushangayo.
Yaabuuza abashaija b'omuri ogwo mwanya ati: Maraaya obaire ari Enaimu aha rubaju rw'omuhanda agiire hi? Banu bati: Tihariho maraaya obaire ari aha.
Yaagaruka ahari Yuda, yaamugira ati: Tinaamushangayo; kandi abaayo bangira ngu, Habaire hatariyo maraaya.
Yuda yaagira ati: K'agume nabyo, turekye kuhemuka; ahakuba naakutweka omwana gw'embuzi, tiwaamushangayo.
Ku haahingwireho nk'ameezi ashatu, baagambira Yuda bati: Tamari mukaamwana waawe akeegira maraaya, mbwenu aine enda y'obushambani. Yuda yaagira ati: Mumushohoze, bamunagye omu muriro.

Ku baamushohoize, yaatuma ahari ishezaara, naagira ati: Mukama w'ebintu ebi niwe yantwekire enda; kandi ati: Ninkweshengyereza, obyetegyereze, empeta eriho akamanyiso n'orukoba n'enkoni, omanye mukama waabyo.
Yuda yaikiriza ku biri ebye, yaagira ati: We niwe ahikiriire okunkira, ahakuba tindamuhaire Sheela mutabani wangye. Tiyaagaruka kubyama nawe obundi.
Obunaku bwe bw'okuzaara ku bwahikire, yaareebeka aine enda y'empasha.
Ku yaabaire naarumwa, omwe yaashohoza omukono, omuzaarisa yaagukwata, yaagukomaho akahuuzi akarikutukura, yaagira ati: Ogu niwe yaabanza kushohora.
Bwanyima ogwo mwana ku yaabaire naagarurayo omukono, mugyenzi we yaashohora. Omuzaarisa yaagira ati: Ahabw'enki waayeyozyaho? Nikyo yaayeteirwe Pereezi.
Bwanyima na mugyenzi we owaabaire akomire akahuuzi akarikutukura aha mukono yaazaarwa. Baamweta Zeera.
MUKAMA yaaguma hamwe na Yosefu, yaaba omunyamigisha. Yaaguma omu ka ya mukama we Omunyamisri.
Mukama we yaareeba oku MUKAMA ari hamwe nawe, kandi oku MUKAMA amuhaire omugisha omuri byona ebi arikukora.
Yosefu yaashongoka ahari mukama we, yaamuheereza, mukama we yaamugira omureeberezi w'eka ye na byona ebi yaabaire atungire yaabimukwatsa.

Ku yaaherize kumugira omureeberezi w'eka ye kandi ow'ebintu byona ebi yaabaire aine, MUKAMA yaaha eka y'ogwo Munyamisri omugisha ahabwa Yosefu; kandi omugisha gwa MUKAMA gwaza ahari byona ebi yaabaire aine, eby'omuka n'eby'omu misiri.
Yaakwatsa Yosefu ebi yaabaire aine byona; tiyaagaruka kufa aha kintu kyona eki yaabaire aine, kureka eby'okurya byonka, ebi yaabaire arya. Yosefu akaba anyeetsire gye, aine ahamaisho harungi.
Bwanyima y'ebyo muka mukama we yaamureeba, yaamurigira, yaagira ati: Ija tubyame hamwe.
Kwonka Yosefu yaayanga, yaagira muka mukama we ati: Reeba, mukama wangye taine ki arikumanya omuri egi ka; akankwatsa ebi aine byona;
egi ka tihariho orikuginkiramu; kandi tihariho ki atarandekuriire, kureka iwe wenka, ahabw'okuba ori omukazi we. Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kukora ekibi ekirikwingana kityo, n'okucumura ahari Ruhanga?
Kandi n'obu araabe yaabaire abimugambira obutoosha, Yosefu akaba ataikiriza kubyama nawe, n'obu kwakuba okuguma nawe.
Eizooba rimwe Yosefu ku yaataahire omu nju kukora omurimo gwe, hataine mushaija weena ow'omuri egyo ka orimu,
omukazi yaamukwata ekijwaro, yaamugira ati: Ija tubyame hamwe. Yosefu yaatsiga ekyo kijwaro omu ngaro ze, yaahunga, yaashohora aheeru.
Omukazi ku yaareebire yaamutsigira ekijwaro kye, yaahunga,
yaayeta abashaija b'omu ka ye, yaabagira ati: Reeba, bakareeta Omuheburaayo okutweshungiraho; mbwenu yantaahirira kubyama naanye, naateera enduuru;
ku yaahurira naayamuza ninteera enduuru, yaatsigaho ekijwaro kye, yaahunga, yaashohora aheeru.
Omukazi nikwo kweta ekyo kijwaro haihi, okuhitsya ahu mukama we yaagarukiire omuka,
akamuteekyerereza ebigambo ebyo byona, oku bibaire, ati: Omwiru Omuheburaayo, ou waatureeteire, yantaahirira kunyeshungiraho;
ku naayamuza naateera enduuru, yantsigira ekijwaro kye, yaahunga, yaashohora.
Mukama we ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebi omukazi we yaamugambira naagira ati: Omwiru waawe nikwo yangira, yaagira ekiniga kingi.
Yaakwata Yosefu, yaamuta omu kihome, ahu embohe z'omugabe zaabaire ziboherwa; yaaguma okwo omu kihome.
Ogwo murinzi w'ekihome yaakwatsa Yosefu embohe zoona ezaabaire ziri omu kihome; byona ebi zaabaire zikora, Yosefu niwe yaabaire abikoresa.
Omurinzi w'ekihome tiyaagaruka kureeberera kintu kyona omu bi yaamukwatsize, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba ari hamwe nawe, kandi ebi yaabaire akora byona, MUKAMA akaba abiha omugisha.
Bwanyima y'ebyo omugabuzi wa viinyo ow'omugabe wa Misri n'omuteeki we w'emigaati baagwisa kubi mukama waabo, omugabe wa Misri.
Faraho yaagirira ekiniga abakuru abo bombi, omukuru w'abagabuzi ba viinyo n'omukuru w'abateeki b'emigaati;
yaabata omu kihome ekyabaire kiri omu ka y'omukuru w'abarinzi, ahu Yosefu yaabaire akomeirwe.
Omukuru w'abarinzi yaabakwatsa Yosefu kuguma naabaheereza; baamara ebiro bari omu kihome.
Ekiro kimwe bombi baaroota ebirooto, buri omwe ekirooto kye, kiine amakuru gaakyo, omugabuzi wa viinyo n'omuteeki w'emigaati ab'omugabe wa Misri, abaabaire bari omu kihome.
Yosefu ku yaizire kubareeba omu kasheeshe, yaashanga bagwirwe kubi;
yaabuuza abo bakuru ba Faraho abaabaire bakomeirwe omu nju ya mukama we hamwe nawe, ati: Ahabw'enki eri izooba mwaimuka mugwirwe kubi?
Baamugarukamu bati: Turootsire ebirooto, twabura ow'okubitushobororera. Yosefu yaabagira ati: Okushoboorora shi t'okwa Ruhanga? Nimbashaba mubindootororere.
Omugabuzi wa viinyo omukuru yaarootororera Yosefu ekirooto kye, naagira ati: Ndootsire omuzaabibu guri omu maisho gangye;
ogwo muzaabibu gubaire gwine amataagi ashatu; ku guginire, gwarabya, gwaragaza ebijuma byagwo byahiisa.
Obwo ekikopo kya Faraho kindi omu ngaro; naacwa ebyo bijuma, naabikamuurira omu kikopo kya Faraho, naakimukwatsa omu ngaro.
Yosefu yaamugira ati: Aga nigo makuru gaakyo: ago mataagi ashatu nibyo biro bishatu;
omuri ebyo biro bishatu Faraho naija kwimutsya omutwe gwawe akugarure omu bugabuzi bwawe, oheereze Faraho ekikopo kye, nk'oku waabaire omuheereza okiri omugabuzi we wa viinyo.
Ku oriba waabaire gye, naakweshengyereza onyijukye, ongirire embabazi, ongambe owa Faraho, onyihise omuri egi nju.
Omanye ku naihirwe omu nsi y'Abaheburaayo; kandi na kunu tinkakorayoga ekyakuntaisize omu kihome.
Omuteeki w'emigaati omukuru ku yaareebire ebi yaamushobororera byaba birungi, yaagambira Yosefu ati: Naanye ndootsire nyekoreire ebitemere bishatu by'emigaati.
Aha kitemere eky'aha mutwe gw'ebindi hariho emigaati y'emiringo yoona ningitwarira Faraho; enyonyi zaija, zaagindiira aha mutwe ahari ekyo kitemere.
Yosefu yaamugarukamu ati: Aga nigo makuru gaakyo; ebitemere ebyo ebishatu nibyo biro bishatu;
omuri ebyo biro bishatu Faraho naija kwimutsya omutwe gwawe, agucweho, akuhanikye aha muti, amahungu gakushokoorereho.

Aha kiro kya kashatu, aha izooba ry'okwijuka okuzaarwa kwa Faraho, yaateekyera abairu be boona obugyenyi; yaimutsya omutwe gw'omugabuzi wa viinyo omukuru n'ogw'omuteeki w'emigaati omukuru ahagati y'abairu be;
yaagarura omukuru w'abagabuzi ba viinyo omu bugabuzi bwe, yaaguma naabonetsya Faraho omu kikopo kye.
Kwonka omuteeki w'emigaati omukuru yaamuhanika, nk'oku Yosefu yaashoboroire amakuru g'ebirooto byabo.
Kwonka omugabuzi wa viinyo omukuru tiyaijuka Yosefu, yaamwebwa.
Ku haahingwireho emyaka ebiri, Faraho yaaroota ayemereire aha rubaju rw'omugyera;
omuri ogwo mugyera haarugamu ente nungi mushanju ezigomokire, zaayahukira ekibingo, zaarya.
Bwanyima haakurataho ezindi nte mbi mushanju ezihweire aha magufa, nazo niziruga omu mugyera; zaayemerera na ziri aha nkungu.
Embi ezihweire aha magufa zaarya ezo enungi mushanju ezigomokire. Bwanyima Faraho yaasisiimuka.
Yaagaruka yaagwejegyera, yaaroota ekirooto kya kabiri; yaareeba ebishiisha by'engano mushanju birungi by'enjuma, biri aha mushengye gumwe;
kandi otundi tushiisha mushanju otwomiibwe omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba natwo twakurataho, twamera.
Otushiisha otwo twamira ebishiisha mushanju ebirungi eby'enjuma. Faraho ku yaasisiimukire, yaashanga kiri ekirooto.
Omu kasheeshe yaimuka ashobeirwe, yaatuma ku bamwetera abafumu boona ab'omuri Misri, n'abanyabwengye baamwo boona, yaabarootororera ebirooto bye, kwonka tihaabaho n'omwe owaabaasa kubimushobororera.
Bwanyima omugabuzi wa viinyo omukuru yaagambira Faraho ati: Eri izooba naijuka eby'orubanja rwangye ruri;
Faraho akaba agwereirwe kubi abairu be, yanta omu kihome omu nju y'omukuru w'abarinzi hamwe n'omukuru w'abateeki b'emigaati.
Ekiro kimwe twembi twaroota ebirooto, buri omwe ekirooto kye kiine amakuru gaakyo.
Omu kihome ekyo tukaba turimu n'omutsigazi Omuheburaayo, omwiru w'omukuru w'abarinzi. Twamurootororera ebirooto byaitu, yaabitushobororera, buri omwe nk'ekirooto kye oku kyabaire kiri.
Kandi nk'oku yaatushobororeire, nikwo byabaire; nyowe naagarurwa omu bugabuzi bwangye, mugyenzi wangye yaahanikwa.
Faraho yaagambira Yosefu ati: Ndootsire ekirooto, haabura ow'okukinshobororera; mbwenu mpuriire nibakugambaho ngu, ku bakurootororera ekirooto, okishoboorora.
Yosefu yaagarukamu Faraho naagira ati: Tiinye; Ruhanga niwe araagarukyemu Faraho eby'obusingye.
Faraho yaagambira Yosefu ati: Ndootsire nyemereire aha nkungu y'omugyera.
Omuri ogwo mugyera haarugamu ente nungi mushanju ezigomokire, zaayahukira ekibingo, zaarya.
Bwanyima zaakuratwa ezindi nte mbi mushanju ezihweire aha magufa, ente mbi ezi ntakareebaga mu nsi yoona eya Misri.
Ente ezo embi ezihweire aha magufa zaarya ziri omushanju enungi ezigomokire ez'okubanza.
Ku ziherize kuzirya, waashusha oti tizaazirya; zaaguma ziri mbi nk'okubanza. Bwanyima naasisiimuka.
Naagaruka naaroota nindeeba ebishiisha mushanju birungi by'enjuma, biri aha mushengye gumwe;
kandi otundi tushiisha mushanju tuhotokire, twomiibwe omuyaga ogw'oburugwa-izooba, natwo twakurataho twamera;
otwo tushiisha twamira ebishiisha ebirungi mushanju. Naabirootororera abafumu, kwonka haabura owaabaasa kubinshobororera.
Ente mushanju enungi niyo myaka mushanju; n'ebishiisha mushanju ebirungi nayo n'emyaka mushanju; ekirooto ni kimwe.

Kandi n'ente ezindi mushanju embi ezihweire aha magufa, ezikuratsire ziri n'emyaka mushanju, n'otushiisha mushanju otutarimu njuma otwomiibwe omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba; egyo eryaba emyaka mushanju y'enjara.
Ekyo nikyo naagambira Faraho nti: Ruhanga akworekire, iwe Faraho, eki arikwenda kukora.
Reeba nihaija kubaho emyaka mushanju ey'omweru mwingi omu nsi yoona eya Misri;
bwanyima y'egyo haryabaho emyaka mushanju ey'enjara, omweru gwona gwebe omu nsi ya Misri; egyo njara eryamaraho ensi.
Omweru guryaba gutakiijukwa mu nsi ahabw'enjara erikurataho, ahabw'okuba eryaba nyingi munonga.
Ekireeteire Faraho okuroota ekirroto ekyo omu miringo ebiri n'ahabw'okuba kitairweho Ruhanga, kandi niwe arikwija kukihikiiriza juba.
Mbwenu nu Faraho asherure omuntu orikwetegyereza kandi omunyabwengye, amuhe obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka ensi ya Misri.
Faraho akore atyo, ateho ab'okureeberera ensi, bahunikise ekicweka kya kataano ky'eby'okurya by'ensi yoona eya Misri omu myaka mushanju ey'omweru;
bateeranire hamwe ebirikuhunikwa byona eby'omu myaka egyo emirungi eyaaza kwija, babihunikye omu ndembo, babirinde biri omu bushoboorozi bwa Faraho.
Eby'okurya ebyo biryabiikirwa ensi ahabw'emyaka mushanju ey'enjara, eribaho omu nsi ya Misri, ensi erekye kwitwa enjara.
Ekyo kigambo kyasiimwa Faraho n'abaheereza be boona.
Faraho yaabuuza abaheereza be ati: Ebyo tukaabaasa kubona omuntu orikushusha nk'ogu, oine Omwoyo wa Ruhanga?
Faraho yaagambira Yosefu ati: Nk'oku Ruhanga akworekire ebyo byona, tihariho ondiijo orikwetegyereza kandi omunyabwengye nkaiwe.
Naakuha okutegyeka eka yangye, kandi abantu bangye boona baryatwaza nk'oku oribaragiira; kureka eki ndikweshumbya n'ekitebe ky'obugabe kyonka.
Faraho yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Reeba, naakuha obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka ensi yoona eya Misri.
Faraho yaajuura empeta ye eriho akamanyiso omu rukumu rwe, yaagijweka Yosefu omu rukumu; yaamujweka n'ebijwaro birungi bya kitaani, kandi n'omukuufu gw'ezaabu omu bitsya;
yaamugyendeseza omu kigaari ekya kabiri aha kye, baateera akaari omu maisho ge, nibagira bati: Mumutsimbire amaju. Yaamuha obushoboorozi kutegyeka ensi yoona eya Misri.
Faraho yaagambira Yosefu ati: Nk'oku ndi Faraho, tihariho muntu weena oriimutsya omukono n'obu kyakuba ekigyere omu nsi yoona eya Misri, otamwikiriize.
Faraho yaakubya Yosefu Zafunasi-panea; yaamuha Asenasi, muhara wa Potifeera omunyamurwa wa Oni kumushwera. Okuruga aho Yosefu yaarambura ensi ya Misri.
Omu myaka egyo mushanju ey'omweru ensi tiyaayeza, yaacwa ebintu.

Yosefu yaateeranira hamwe eby'okurya ebirikuhunikwa byona ebi baasharwire omu myaka mushanju eyaabaireho omu nsi ya Misri, yaabihunikisa omu ndembo; eby'okurya by'omu misiri eyaabaire eba eyehinguririize buri rurembo, nimwo yaabaire abihunika.
Yosefu yaahunika eby'okurya bingi munonga ebirikwingana n'omusheenyi ogw'aha nyanja, okuhitsya obu yaarekire kubara; ahakuba bikaba bitakibaasa kubarwa.
O'womujigaijo yaamweta Manaase, naagira ati: Ahakuba Ruhanga akanyebesa okufa kubi kwangye kwona n'eka ya tata yoona.
Owa kabiri yaamweta Efuraimu, naagira ati: Ahakuba Ruhanga ampeereire oruzaaro omu nsi ei naareebeiremu enaku.
Egyo myaka mushanju ey'omweru eyaabaireho omu nsi ya Misri yaahwa.
Emyaka mushanju ey'enjara yaatandika, nk'oku Yosefu yaagambire; enjara yaabuga ensi zoona, kwonka omu nsi ya Misri yoona hakaba harimu eby'okurya.
Ensi yoona eya Misri ku yaateirwe enjara, baayetuurira Faraho ngu abahe eby'okurya. Faraho yaagambira Abanyamisri boona ati: Muze owa Yosefu; eki araabagambire kyona, mukikore.
Enjara yaabuga ensi yoona. Yosefu yaigura ebitara byona, yaashakisa Abanyamisri; enjara yaaba nyingi omu nsi ya Misri.
Ab'omu nsi zoona baija ahari Yosefu omuri Misri kushaka eby'okurya, ahakuba enjara ekaba eri nyingi omu nsi yoona.
Yaagira ati: Reeba, mpuriire ngu Misri hariyo eby'okurya; mwirooko muzeyo, mutushakire eby'okurya, bitutambire tutafa.
Bakuru ba Yosefu ikumi baashuuma, baaza Misri kushaka;
kwonka Benyamiini murumuna wa Yosefu, Yakobo tiyaamwohereza na bakuru be; ahakuba akatiina ngu shana atakaaguubwaho akabi.
Batabani ba Israeli baija n'abandi abaizire kushaka, ahakuba enjara ekaba eri nyingi omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Yosefu ku yaareebire bakuru be, yaabamanya, kwonka yaayehindura nk'omunyaihanga aharibo, yaabakabukira, yaababuuza ati: Nimuruga hi? Banu bati: Nituruga omu nsi ya Kanaani, twizire kusahaka.
Yosefu yaamanya bakuru be, kwonka bo tibaamumanya.
Yosefu yaijuka ebirooto biri ebi yaabarootsireho; yaabagira ati: Muri entatsi; mwizire kureeba ahu ensi etaine maani.
Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha, mukama waitu; abairu baawe tureetsirwe okushaka.
Twena turi eishe-emwe; turi abantu b'amazima, abairu baawe tituri ntatsi.
Yaabagira ati: Ngaaha; mwizire kureeba ahu ensi etaine maani.
Baamugarukamu bati: Abairu baawe turi eishe-emwe ikumi na babiri, abaana b'omushaija omwe omu nsi ya Kanaani; murumuna waitu omuto hati tariho, atsigaire na tataitwe, kandi ondiijo takibaho.
Yosefu yaabagira ati: Ekyo nikyo naabagirira nti, muri entatsi.
Mbwenu aha niho muraamanyirwe; nindahira Faraho, timurikwija kuruga aha, murumuna waanyu omuto atakaizire.

Mutume omwe ahariimwe, areete murumuna waanyu, abandi mutsigare mubohirwe, ebigambo byanyu bibone kuhamibwa, tumanye ku muri ab'amazima; ku kiraabe kitabaire kityo, nindahira Faraho, buzima muri entatsi.
Boona yaabata omu kihome okumara ebiro bishatu.
Aha kiro kya kashatu Yosefu yaabagira ati: Mukore muti, nimwija kukira; ahakuba nintiina Ruhanga.
Ku muraabe muri ab'amazima, omwe ahariimwe atsigare omu nju y'ekihome ahu mubaire mukomeirwe; abandi mugyende mutware eby'okurya ahabw'enjara y'omu maka gaanyu;
bwanyima mundeetere murumuna waanyu omuto; obwo ebigambo byanyu biryahamibwa, timurifa. Nabo baatwaza batyo.
Baagambirana bonka bati: Buzima twine orubanja ahabwa murumuna waitu; ahakuba tukareeba aine obusaasi omu mutima, obu yaatweshengyereza, tukanga kumuhurira; nikyo kyatureetera akabi aka.
Reubeeni yaabagarukamu naagira ati: Tindabagambiire nti: Mutakora kubi omwana, mukanga kumpurira? Mbwenu reeba, twazira eshagama ye.
Kwonka tibaamanya ku Yosefu yaabahurira, ahabw'okuba akaba naagambirirwa omuhinduzi.
Yosefu yaabateera amabega, yaarira; bwanyima yaagaruka ahu bari, yaagamba nabo, yaabaihamu Simeoni, yaamukomera omu maisho gaabo.
Banu baata eby'okurya byabo aha ndogoya zaabo, baagyenda.
Ku baahikire omu icumbi, omwe aharibo yaakomorora enshaho ye okuriisa endogoya, yaashanga efeeza ye eri omu minwa yaayo;
yaagambira bagyenzi be ati: Efeeza yangye baagingarurira; reeba ngigi omu nshaho yangye; baahuruutuka emitima, bahindukirana nibatetema, nibagira bati: Eki n'enki eki Ruhanga yaatukorera?
Ku baahikire ahari Yakobo ishebo omu nsi ya Kanaani, baamugambira byona ebyababaireho, nibagira bati:
Omushaija orikutegyeka egyo nsi akatukabukira, yaatweta abaizire kutata ensi;
naitwe twamugira tuti: Turi ab'amazima, tituri ntatsi;
turi eishe-emwe ikumi na babiri, abaana b'omushaija omwe; omwe takibaho, kandi na murumuna waitu omuto atsigaire n'omugurusi waitu omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Omushaija ogwo orikutegyeka ensi yaatugira ati: Eki nikyo kirimmanyisa ku muri ab'amazima. Muntsigire omwe ahariimwe, mutware eby'okurya ahabw'enjara y'omu maka gaanyu, mugyende;
mundeetere murumuna waanyu omuto; niho ndimanyira ku mutari ntatsi, kureka ku muri ab'amazima; reero naanye ndyabagarurira mugyenzi waanyu, mubone kushuubura omu nsi egi.
Ku baabaire nibaiha eby'okurya omu nshaho zaabo, buri muntu yaashanga ekifunyika ky'efeeza kiri omu nshaho ye; bo na ishebo ku baareebire ebifunyika by'efeeza, baatiina.
Ishebo Yakobo yaabagira ati: Mbwenu ho mwancwa; Yosefu takibaho, na Simeoni tariho; mbwenu nimwenda kuunyihaho na Benyamiini. Ebyo byona niinye biiziire!
Reubeeni yaagira ishe ati: Ku ndiba ntamukugaruriire, oite batabani bangye bombi; munkwatse, ndyamukugarurira.

Onu ati: Omwana wangye tarikwija kugyenda naimwe; ahabw'okuba mukuru we akafa, niwe atsigaireho wenka; akabi katakaamuhikaho, mukandeetera obujune bukampuhura, nkashuuma okuzimu nk'oku murikundeeba n'ezi nju.
Enjara yaagumizamu kuba nyingi omu nsi.
Aba Yakobo ku baaherize engano ezi baihire Misri, ishebo yaabagira ati: Mugarukyeyo, mutushakire ak'okurya.
Yuda yaamugarukamu ati: Omushaija ou twakugambiire akatwehanangiriza, naagira ati: Timuringaruka mu maisho, mutareetsire murumuna waanyu.
Ku oraatwohereze na murumuna waitu, nitwija kuzayo, tukushakire;
kwonka ku oraabe otamwohereize, titurikuzayo; ahabw'okuba ogwo mushaija akatugira ati: Timuringaruka mumaisho mutaine murumuna waanyu.
Israeli yaababuuza ati: Ahabw'enki mwangiriire kubi mutyo, mukagambira ogwo mushaija, ku mwine murumuna waanyu ondiijo?

Baamugarukamu bati: Omushaija ogwo akatubuuza naatucondooza, oku turi, n'ab'owaitu, kandi yaatugira ati: Shoimwe akibaho? Mwineho murumuna waanyu ondiijo? Naitwe twamugarukamu, nk'oku yaatubuurize. Tukaba nitumanya ku arikwenda kugira ati: Mureete murumuna waanyu?
Yuda yaagambira Israeli ishe ati: Omwojo mwohereze, agyende naanye, twimukye tugyende, tukize amagara gaitu, tutafa, itwe naiwe n'abaana baitu abato.
Nyowe ndyamwemererera; niinye orimubuuza. Ku ndiba ntamugarwire, nkamuhitsya omu maisho gaawe, obwo ndyagiibwaho orubanja orutarindugaho ebiro byona;
ahakuba kuri tutareeziringire, buzima hati kuri twagarukire omurundi gwa kabiri.
kandi mutware efeeza ezirikwingana na ziri kabiri, n'efeeza ezaagarwirwe omu minwa y'enshaho zaanyu nazo muzitware; shana bakakikora batakimanyire.
Kandi mutware murumuna waanyu, mwimukye mugarukye ow'ogwo mushaija.
Kandi Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona abahe omugisha, ogwo mushaija abagirire embabazi, abagarurire mugyenzi waanyu na Benyamiini. Ku ndiba naafeereirwe abaana bangye, biri naafeereirwe.
Abo bashaija baatwara egyo mitoijo, n'efeeza eziri nka ziri kabiri, baatwara na Benyamiini, baimuka baashuuma Misri, baayemerera omu maisho ga Yosefu.
Yosefu ku yaareebire baine Benyamiini, yaagambira omubiiki w'eby'omu ka ye ati: Twara abashaija aba omuka, obabaagire, otebeekanise byona, ahakuba abashaija aba nibaija kurya naanye omu ihangwe.
Omubiiki yaakora nk'oku Yosefu yaamugambira, yaatwara abo bashaija omu ka ya Yosefu.

Baatiina ahabw'okutwarwa omu nju ya Yosefu; baagira bati: Eki baatutaahiza omu n'ahabw'efeeza ezaagarwirwe omu nshaho zaitu obw'okubanza, ngu agire eki yaatureebaho, atugurukire atukwate, atugire abahuuku, kandi anyagye n'endogoya zaitu.
Bairira haihi omubiiki w'eby'omu nju ya Yosefu, baagambira nawe aha muryango gw'enju,
nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, n'eky'amazima, tukaija omurundi gw'okubanza kushaka;
ku twahikire omu icumbi, twakomorora enshaho zaitu, twashanga efeeza za buri muntu ziri omu minwa y'enshaho ye, zoona ziri nk'oku zaabaire ziri; mbwenu nzizi, twazigarura.
Kandi twareeta n'ezindi kushaka eby'okurya; titurikumanya owaazitaire omu nshaho zaitu.
Yaabagira ati: Muhuumure, mutatiina; Ruhanga waanyu, kandi Ruhanga wa shoimwe niwe yaataire obutungi omu nshaho zaanyu. Nyowe nkaakiira efeeza zaanyu. Yaabashohoreza Simeoni.
Yaabataasya omu nju ya Yosefu, yaabaha amaizi g'okunaaba aha bigyere; yaaha n'endogoya zaabo eby'okurya.
Baatebeekanisa emitoijo y'okuha Yosefu yaija omu ihangwe; ahakuba bakahurira ngu, nibaija kuriirayo.
Yosefu ku yaagarukire omuka, baamushangisa omu nju emitoijo ei baareetsire, baamwinamira.
Yaababuuza oku bari, kandi ati: Shoimwe agumire, omugurusi ou mwagambireho? Akibaho?
Banu bati: Omwiru waawe tataitwe akiriho agumire? Bainika emitwe, baamuramya.
Yaanaga amaisho, yaareeba Benyamiini mwene nyina, yaababuuza ati: Ogu niwe murumuna waanyu omuto ou mwangambiire? Yaamugambira ati: Ruhanga akugirire embabazi mwana wangye.
Yosefu yaarahuka kubarugaho, ahakuba akaba ainiire mwene nyina orushusho ruhango; yaasherura ah'okuririra, yaataaha omu kishengye kye, yaaririramu.
Bwanyima yaanaaba ah'amaisho, yaashohora, yaayegumya, yaagira ati: Mwihure eby'okurya.
Baamugaburira ahakwe, na bari ahakwabo, n'Abanyamisri abaabaire barya nawe nabo ahakwabo, ahabw'okuba Abanyamisri bakaba batarya n'Abaheburaayo; kikaba kiri ekihagaro aha Banyamisri.
Beene ishe baashutama omu maisho ge, nk'oku barikukuratana omu kuzaarwa okuruga aha mukuru okuhika aha muto; baareebana nibatangaara.
Yosefu yaababegyera ebitongye aha by'okurya ebyabaire biri omu maisho ge, kwonka ekitongye kya Benyamiini kyakira ekya buri omwe aharibo emirundi etaano. Bwanyima baanywa, baashemererwa hamwe nawe.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaaragiira omubiiki w'eby'omu nju ye ati: mwijuze enshaho z'abo bashaija, nk'oku omuntu weena arikubaasa kwekorera, ote n'efeeza ya buri muntu omu minwa y'enshaho ye,
kandi ote ekikopo kyangye ky'efeeza omu minwa y'enshaho ya murumuna waabo omuto hamwe n'efeeza ei yaabaire areetsire kushakisa. Nawe yaatwaza nk'oku Yosefu yaamuragiira.
Ku bwabaire nibutaagurukana, abo bashaija baaragwa, baagyenda n'endogoya zaabo.

Ku baabaire baaruga omu rurembo, batakahikire hare, Yosefu yaagira omubiiki we ati: Imuka okurate abo bashaija; ku oraabahikye, obabuuze oti: Ahabw'enki mwaihura obubi, haza mugiriirwe gye? Ahanki mwaiba ekikopo kye ky'efeeza?
Tikyo mukama wangye anywaisa, kandi tikyo aragurisa? Mukozire kubi okukora mutyo.
Ku yaabahikire, yaabagambira ebigambo ebyo.
Baamugarukamu bati: Mukama wangye, ahabw'enki waatugambira ebigambo nk'ebyo? Nikikabure abairu baawe okukora ekintu nk'ekyo!
Noomanya ngu efeeza ezi twashangire omu minwa y'enshaho zaitu tukazikugarurira, obu twaruga Kanaani. Mbwenu nitubaasa tuta kwiba efeeza nari ezaabu eby'omu nju ya mukama waawe?
Weena ou oraashangye akiine omu bairu baawe, afe, kandi naitwe tube abahuuku ba mukama waitu.
Nawe yaagira ati: Mbwenu hati kibe nk'oku mwagamba. Ou turaashangye akiine, niwe araabe omuhuuku wangye; haza obwo abandi nimurugwaho orubanja.
Baarahuka, buri muntu yaata enshaho ye ahansi, yaagikomorora.
Omushaija ogwo yaacaaka, naatandikira aha mukuru okuhitsya obu yaahikire aha muto; ekikopo kyashangwa omu nshaho ya Benyamiini.
Baatagura ebijwaro byabo, buri muntu yaata ebintu bye aha ndogoya ye, baagaruka omu rurembo.
Yuda na bagyenzi be baahika omu nju ya Yosefu, baashanga akiri aho, baagwa ahansi omu maisho ge.
Yosefu yaabagira ati: Eki eki mukozire n'enki? Timurikumanya ngu omuntu nkaanye nimbaasa kuragura?

Yuda yaagira ati: Mbwenu nitukyenda kukugambira ki, mukama waitu? Ekindi tugambe ki? Nari shi twetonganire tuta? Ruhanga asherembwire obubi bw'abairu baawe. Mbwenu twaba abahuuku ba mukama waitu, hamwe n'ou baashanga aine ekikopo.
Kwonka Yosefu yaagira ati: Nikikabure nyowe okukora ntyo; kureka omushaija ou baashanga aine ekikopo, niwe araabe omuhuuku wangye; haza imwe mwegyendere n'obusingye, mugarukye owa shoimwe.
Mukama wangye akabuuza abairu be, naagira ati: Mwine shoimwe, nari murumuna waanyu ondiijo?
Twagarukamu mukama wangye tuti: Twine tataitwe, n'omugurusi, kandi na murumuna waitu ou yaazaire yaakuzire; mukuru we akafa, niwe atsigaireho omu nda ya nyina, kandi ishe naamukunda.
Naiwe waagambira abairu baawe, oti: Mumundeetere, mmureebe;
naitwe twagambira mukama wangye tuti: Omwana ogwo tarikubaasa kutsigaho ishe; ahakuba ku yaakumutsigaho, ishe akaafa.
Waagarukamu abairu baawe oti: Murumuna waanyu omuto ku ariba ataizire naimwe, timuringaruka mumaisho.
Ku twagarukire aha mwiru waawe tataitwe, twamugambira ebigambo bya mukama wangye.
Bwanyima tataitwe yaagira ati: Mugarukyeyo, mutugurire ak'okurya.

Naitwe twagira tuti: Titurikubaasa kuzayo; murumuna waitu omuto ku araagyende naitwe, obwo naitwe nitwija kuzayo; ahakuba tituribaasa kugaruka ogwo mushaija mumaisho, kureka murumuna waitu omuto yaagyenda naitwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo omwiru waawe tata akatugira ati: Nimumanya ku omukazi wangye yanzaariire aboojo babiri;
omwe akandugaho, naateekateeka nti: Buzima akataagataagurwa; kandi n'okuhitsya hati tinkamureebaga.
Mbwenu ku muraanyiheho n'ogu, haagira ekyamubaho, nimwija kundeetera obujune bumpuhure, nshuume okuzimu nk'oku murikundeeba n'ezi nju.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku ndigaruka aha mwiru waawe tata, omwojo tutamwine, yaareeba tutaija nawe, aryafa,
ahabw'okuba amagara ge gakwaitswe ag'ogu mwana; kandi itwe abairu baawe turyaba tureeteire omwiru waawe tataitwe obujune bw'okumuhuhura, ogwo mugurusi ashuume okuzimu n'ezo nju.
Omanye ngu nyowe omwiru waawe niinye naayemerereire ogu mwana ahari tata, ningira nti: Ku ndiba ntamukugaruriire, ndyagiibwaho orubanja orutarindugaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza, mukama wangye, mbe niinye naaguma aha, mbe omuhuuku waawe, haza omwana ogu we ataahe na bakuru be.
Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kugaruka ahari tata, ntaine ogu mwojo? Nintiina kureeba akabi akarihika ahari tata.

Yosefu yaaremwa kwegumya omu maisho ga boona abaabaire bamwemereire haihi, yaagira ati: Ragiira abantu boona bashohore bampigize. Tihaagira muntu weena owaatsigara na Yosefu, omu kwegambira beene ishe.
Yaarira naaborooga munonga; Abanyamisri n'ab'omu nju ya Faraho baamuhurira.
Yosefu yaagambira beene ishe, ati: Niinye Yosefu. Tata akibaho? Beene ishe baabura eki baamugarukamu, ahakuba bakashobererwa omu maisho ge.
Yosefu yaagira beene ishe ati: Nimbeeshengyereza muunyirire haihi. Baamwirira haihi. Yaagira ati: Niinye Yosefu murumuna waanyu, ou mwagurize kutwarwa Misri.
Mbwenu mutashaasha, n'obu kwakuba okwegwerwa kubi ahabw'okunguza nkaija kunu; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga niwe yantumire kubabandiza kunu kukiza amagara g'abantu.
Ahakuba hati enjara emazire emyaka ebiri omu nsi, kandi hakiriyo endiijo myaka etaano, ei abantu batarihingiramu, n'obu kwakuba okugyesha.
Kandi Ruhanga akantuma kubabandiza kunu ngu abakwatire eihembe omu nsi, kandi abajune omu buryo bw'okutangaaza.
N'ahabw'ekyo tiimwe mwanyohereize kunu, ni Ruhanga; kandi angizire nk'omuzaire ahari Faraho, mukama w'eka ye yoona, kandi omutegyeki w'ensi yoona eya Misri.
Nimwimukye mwehuute, muze owa tata, mumugire muti: Omwana waawe Yosefu atutumire naagira ati: Ruhanga angizire mukama wa Misri yoona; shuuma onshangye kunu, oteeziringa;
kandi noija kutuura omu kyanga kya Gosheni, onze haihi iwe n'abaana baawe na baijukuru baawe n'amasyo gaawe ag'entaama n'ag'ente, n'ebi oine byona.
Okwo ndyakuheerayo eby'okurya, ahabw'okuba hakitsigaireyo endiijo myaka etaano y'enjara, otakaitwa obworo, iwe n'ab'omu ka yaawe n'abu oine boona.
Kandi reeba, hati imwe na murumuna wangye Benyamiini nimwereebera ku niinye ndikugamba naimwe.
Mushemereire kugambira tata eby'ekitiinisa kyangye kyona eki nyine omuri Misri, n'ebi mureebire byona; kandi murahukye mureete tata kunu.
Yaagwa Benyamiini omurumuna omu bitsya, yaarira; na Benyamiini nawe yaarira amugwire omu bitsya.
Kandi yaanywegyera bakuru be boona naarira; bwanyima y'ebyo bakuru be baagaaniira nawe.
Amakuru ku gaahikire owa Faraho ngu beene ishe wa Yosefu baizire, byashemeza Faraho n'abaheereza be.
Faraho yaagira Yosefu ati: Gambira beene sho oti: Mugire muti: Mute emitwaro aha ndogoya zaanyu, mugyende, mugarukye omu nsi ya Kanaani;
mureete shoimwe n'ab'omu maka gaanyu, mwije owangye; naanye ndyabaha ebirungi by'omu nsi ya Misri, naimwe murye aha bishaju byayo.
Kandi obaragiire oti: Mutwaze muti: mutware ebigaari by'omu nsi ya Misri eby'okureetamu abaana baanyu abato n'abakazi baanyu, mureete na shoimwe, mwije.
Kandi murekye kufa aha bintu byanyu, ahakuba ebirungi by'omu nsi yoona eya Misri n'ebyanyu.
Beene Israeli baatwaza batyo; Yosefu yaabaha ebigaari, nk'oku Faraho aragiire, yaabaha n'entanda y'okuriira omu muhanda.
Boona oku baingana, buri omwe yaamuha ebijwaro by'okwihaihanisa; kwonka Benyamiini we yaamuha ebicweka by'efeeza magana ashatu n'ebijwaro by'okwihaihanisa kataano.
Kandi ishe yaamutwekyera endamutsyo y'endogoya ikumi ezeekoreire ebintu birungi bya Misri, n'ezindi ndogoya ikumi z'ebuguma ezeekoreire engano n'emigaati n'entanda ya ishe y'okuriira omu muhanda.
Atyo yaaraga beene ishe; ku baabaire nibaimuka kugyenda, yaabagira ati: Mwerinde, mutatonganira omu muhanda.
Bainamuka baaruga Misri, baahika omu nsi ya Kanaani ahari ishebo Yakobo,
baamugambira bati: Yosefu abaho, kandi niwe mutegyeki w'ensi yoona eya Misri. Omutima gwe gwagwa enshazi, ahakuba tarabaikiriize.
Baamutekyerereza ebi Yosefu yaabagambiire byona; kandi ku yaareebire ebigaari, ebi Yosefu yaatwekire kumutwara, omutima gwe gwagaruka eruguru;
Israeli nikwo kugira ati: Nikimara; Yosefu omwana wangye obu ariho; ka ngyende, ndeebane nawe ntakafiire.
Atyo Israeli yaimuka, yaagyenda n'ebi yaabaire aine byona, yaahika Beerisheba, yaatambira Ruhanga wa Isaaka ishe ebitambo.
Ruhanga yaayeta Israeli omu kworekwa kwa nyekiro, ati: Yakobo! Yakobo! Onu ati: Ndi aha, Mukama wangye.
Yaamugira ati: Ndi Ruhanga, Ruhanga wa sho; otatiina kushuuma Misri; ahakuba okwo niyo ndikuhindurira eihanga rihango;
ndyashuuma naiwe Misri, kandi buzima ndyagaruka nkwiheyo; na Yosefu niwe arikukwata ahamaisho nookaba.
Yakobo yaimuka, yaaruga Beeri-sheba; abatabani baamutwara hamwe n'abaana baabo abato n'abakazi baabo omu bigaari ebi Faraho yaatwekire kumureetamu.
Kandi baatwara amatungo gaabo n'ebintu byabo ebi baatungiire omu nsi ya Kanaani, baaza omuri Misri, Yakobo n'oruzaaro rwe rwona,
abatabani na batabani baabo, na bahara be, na bahara ba batabani be; orwonirwo ruzaaro rwe rwona oru yaagyenzire narwo Misri.
batabani ba Reubeeni, Hanoki, Palu, Hezirooni na Karumi.
Batabani ba Simeoni ni Yemueli, Yamini, Ohadi, Yakini, Zohari, na Shauli omutabani, w'Omunyakanaanikazi.
Batabani ba Leevi ni Gereshoni, Kohasi na Merari.
Batabani ba Yuda ni Eeri, Onani, Sheela, Pereezi na Zeera; kwonka Eeri na Onani bakafeera omu nsi ya Kanaani; batabani ba Pereezi ni Hezirooni na Hamuli.
Batabani ba Isakaari ni Toola, Puuva, Yobu na Shimirooni.
Batabani ba Zebuluuni ni Seredi, Eloni na Yahaleeli.
Abo nibo batabani ba Lea, abu yaazaariire Yakobo omuri Padanaramu hamwe na muhara we Dina; abaana be b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki boona bakaba bari makumi ashatu na bashatu.
Batabani ba Gaadi ni Zifioni, Haagi, Shuuni, Ezibooni, Eeri, Arodi na Areeli.
Batabani ba Asheri ni Imuna, Ishiva, Ishivi na Beeria na munyaanyabo Seera; batabani ba Beria ni Heberi na Malikieli.
Abo nibo baana ba Zilupa ou Labaani yaahaire Lea muhara we, kandi abo nibo yaazaariire Yakobo, abantu ikumi na mukaaga.
Batabani ba Rakeeli muka Yakobo ni Yosefu na Benyamiini.
Kandi Yosefu yaazaarira Manaase na Efuraimu omu nsi ya Misri, abu Asenaasi muhara wa Potifeera omunyamurwa wa Oni yaamuzaariire.
Batabani ba Benyamiini ni Beela, Bekeri, Ashubeeli, Geera, Naamani, Ehi, Roshi, Mupimu, Hupimu na Aridi.
Abo nibo batabani ba Rakeeli abu yaazaariire Yakobo; boona bakaba bari ikumi na bana.
Mutabani wa Daani ni Hushimu.
Batabani ba Nafutaali ni Yahazeeli, Guuni, Yezeri na Shileemu.
Abo nibo batabani ba Biliha ou Labaani yaahaire Rakeeli muhara we, abu yaazaariire Yakobo; boona bakaba bari mushanju.
Abantu boona ab'omu nda ya Yakobo abaagyenzire nawe Misri, otabariiremu bakaamwana be, bakaba bari makumi mukaaga na mukaaga.
Batabani ba Yosefu abu yaazaariire Misri bakaba bari babiri; abantu boona ab'omu ka ya Yakobo abaagiire Misri bakaba bari makumi mushanju.
Yakobo yaatuma Yuda ahari Yosefu ku amushanga Gosheni; batyo baahika omu kyanga kya Gosheni.
Yosefu yaaboneza ekigaari kye, yainamuka, yaaza kubugana Israeli ishe omuri Gosheni; yaamwetondera, yaamugwa omu bitsya, yaamara omwanya naarira akimuri omu bitsya.
Israeli yaagira Yosefu ati: N'obu naakufa nka hati, niho naakureeba, nkamanya ku obaho.
Yosefu yaagambira beene ishe n'ab'omu ka ya ishe ati: Ka ngyende ngambire Faraho, mmugira nti: Beene tata n'ab'omu ka ye abaabaire batwire omu nsi ya Kanaani naatsiga baija;
