nti, kandi abo bashaija n'abariisa, ahakuba omurimo gwabo n'okuriisa; na mbwenu baareeta amasyo gaabo ag'entaama n'ag'ente, n'ebindi byona ebi baatungire.
Faraho ku araabeete, yaababuuza ati: Mukora murimo ki?
Mumugire muti: Abairu baawe turi abariisa okwiha omu buto bwaitu n'okuhitsya hati, itwe na baatatenkuriitwe; mubone kutuura omu kyaro kya Gosheni; ahakuba omuriisa weena n'ekihagaro aha Banyamisri.
Yosefu yaaza owa Faraho, yaamugira ati: Tata na beene tata n'amasyo gaabo ag'entaama n'ag'ente n'ebi baatungire byona barugire omu nsi ya Kanaani, hati bari omu kyanga kya Gosheni.
Omuri beene ishe yaatooranamu bataano, yaabatondera Faraho.
Faraho yaababuuza ati: Mukora murimo ki? Baamugarukamu bati: Abairu baawe turi abariisa, itwe na baatatenkuriitwe.

Baagaruka baagambira Faraho bati: Twizire kushuhuukira omu nsi egi; ahakuba abairu baawe tukabura obunyaatsi bw'amasyo gaitu owaitu Kanaani, kandi hariyo n'enjara nyingi; mbwenu nitukweshengyereza, oikirize abairu baawe batuure omu kyaro kya Gosheni.
Faraho yaagambira Yosefu ati: Sho na beene sho bakuhikire;

ensi ya Misri ekuri omumaisho; ohe sho na beene sho ah'okutuura aharikukira oburungi; batuure omu kyanga kya Gosheni. Kandi ku oraabe oine abu orikumanyamu abarikumanya gye eby'ente, obahindure abakuru b'amasyo gangye.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaataasya Yakobo ishe owa Faraho, yaamuta omu maisho ge; Yakobo yaashabira Faraho omugisha.
Faraho yaabuuza Yakobo ati: Mbwenu oine emyaka engahi?

Yakobo yaamugarukamu ati: Ebiro by'emyaka ei mmazire ningyendagyenda nibihika emyaka igana na makumi ashatu; ebiro by'egyo myaka y'amagara gangye ni bikye kandi ni bibi; terikwingana n'ei baatatenkuru baamazire omu kugyendagyenda kwabo.
Yakobo ku yaaherize kushabira Faraho omugisha, yaashohora, yaaruga omumaisho ge.
Yosefu yaaha ishe na beene ishe ah'okuzingura omu nsi ya Misri omu kyaro kya Rameseesi aharikukira oburungi okuba obutaka bwabo, nk'oku Faraho yaaragiire.
Kandi Yosefu yaaguma naaha ishe eby'okurya na beene ishe n'ab'omu ka ya ishe boona, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Kandi omuri egyo nsi yoona hakaba hatarimu by'okurya; ahakuba enjara ekaba eri nyingi munonga, kyareetera ab'omu nsi ya Misri n'eya Kanaani okukuuhura ahabw'egyo njara.
Yosefu yaateerana hamwe empiiha zoona ezaabaire ziri omu nsi ya Misri n'eya Kanaani, ezaarugire omu ngano ezi baaguzire; empiiha ezo zoona yaazireeta omu nju ya Faraho.
Empiiha ku zaahwereire kimwe omu nsi ya Misri n'eya Kanaani, Abanyamisri boona baayetuurira Yosefu, baagira bati: Tuhe eby'okurya. Mbwenu tukugwe omumaisho ahabw'okubura empiiha?
Yosefu yaagira ati: Empiiha ku ziraabe zihweire, mureete amatungo gaanyu, mbaguze eby'okurya.
Batyo baareetera Yosefu amatungo gaabo; yaabaguza eby'okurya, baamuha embaraasi n'entaama n'ente n'endogoya; omuri ogwo mwaka gwona yaabaha eby'okurya, nibabishakisa amatungo gaabo.

Omwaka ogwo ku gwahweire, baamugarukaho omu gundi ogwakuratsireho, baamugira bati: Titurikubaasa kushereka mukama waitu ku empiiha zaitu zihwereire kimwe, kandi n'amatungo gaitu ku gabaire age; tihaine kitsigaireho omumaisho ga mukama waitu, kureka emibiri yaitu n'ebibanja byaitu.

Mbwenu tukugwe omumaisho n'ebibanja byaitu? Otugure n'ebibanja byaitu, otuhe eby'okurya; haza itwe turyaba abahuuku ba Faraho n'ebibanja byaitu; otuhe embibo, tukire tutafa, ensi erekye kuhinduka amatongo.
Atyo Yosefu yaagurira Faraho ensi yoona eya Misri; ahakuba Omunyamisri weena akatunda omusiri gwe, ahabw'okuba enjara ekabateera munonga. Ensi yoona yaaba eya Faraho.
Abantu boona yaabagira abahuuku, okuruga aha rubaju rumwe rwa Misri okuhika aha rundi.
Kwonka ebibanja by'abanyamurwa nibyo ataraguzire; ahabw'okuba abanyamurwa bakaba baine omugabo gwabo ogu baahairwe Faraho, kandi nigwo baabaire baryaho; nikyo bataratundiire bibanja byabo.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaagambira abantu ati: Reeba, eri izooba naaheza kubagura n'ebibanja byanyu kuba ebya Faraho. Mbwenu reeba, naabaha embibo, mugyende mubibe omu misiri yaangu.
Omu ishaaruura muryaha Faraho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano, kandi ebicweka bina bibe ebyanyu, mwiheho embibo, ebindi bibe eby'okurya byanyu n'ab'omu maka gaanyu hamwe n'abaana baanyu abato.
Baagarukamu bati: Otutambiire, titwafa; mukama waitu, na mbwenu otugirire embabazi, nitwija kuguma turi abahuuku ba Faraho.
Okuruga aho Yosefu yaataho ekiragiro ky'ebibanja omu nsi ya Misri, ekikiriho na hati, Faraho okutunga ekicweka kimwe kya kataano; kureka ebibanja by'abanyamurwa bonka nibyo bitarabaire bya Faraho.
Yakobo yaamara emyaka ikumi na mushanju omu nsi ya Misri; n'ahabw'ekyo emyaka yoona ei yaamazire yaahika igana na makumi ana na mushanju.

Obunaku bw'okufa kwa Israeli ku bwabaire buri haihi, yaayeta omutabani Yosefu, yaamugira ati: Ku oraabe nongirira embabazi, ninkweshengyereza ta omukono gwawe ahansi y'ekibero kyangye, onkorere eby'embabazi kandi eby'amazima; otarinziika Misri,
orekye nshangye baatatenkuru; onyihe Misri, onziikye omu kituuro kyabo. Onu ati: Ndyakora nk'oku waagamba.
Yaagira ati: Ndahira. Yaamurahira. Israeli yainama aha mushego gw'ekitabo kye.
Bwanyima y'ebyo baagambira Yosefu ku ishe arwaire; yaatwara abatabani bombi, Manaase na Efuraimu.
Baagambira Yakobo bati: Yosefu omwana waawe yaija kukureeba. Israeli yaayehangaana, yaashutama aha kitabo.
Yakobo yaagira Yosefu ati: Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona akanyeyorekyera Luuzi omu nsi ya Kanaani, yampa omugisha;
yangira ati: Ndyakuha oruzaaro, nkukanyise, nkuhindure omutwe muhango gw'amahanga; kandi ensi egi ndyagiha oruzaaro rwawe orurikukurata kuba eyaabo ey'ebiro n'ebiro.
Kandi mbwenu batabani baawe bombi, abu waazaariire Misri, ntakakushangireyo, n'abangye; Efuraimu na Manaase baryaba abangye nka Reubeeni na Simeoni oku bari.
Abandi baana, abu orizaara bwanyima yaabo, baryaba abaawe; baryayetererwa bakuru baabo omu by'obuhunguzi bwabo.

Eky'obusaasi, ku naabaire ninduga Padani, naahika Kanaani tukiri omu muhanda, naafeerwa Rakeeli, hakitsigaire omwanya okuhika Efuraata; naamuziika aho aha muhanda ogurikuza Efuraata, (niyo Betelehemu).
Bwanyima Israeli ku yaareebire beene Yosefu, yaamubuuza ati: Aba ni baahi?
Yosefu yaagarukamu ishe ati: Ni batabani bangye, abu Ruhanga yampeereire kunu. Ishe yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza bampitsye, mbashabire omugisha.
Obwo Israeli akaba atakibaasa kuhweza ahabw'obukuru. Yosefu yaabamuhitsya, Israeli yaabanywegyera ababumbatiire;
yaagira Yosefu ati: Nkaba ntarikuteekateeka ngu turyareebana; mbwenu reeba Ruhanga yandeebesa n'oruzaaro rwawe.
Yosefu yaabaiha aha maju ga ishe, yainama ahansi.

Yaabatwara bombi, akwaitse Efuraimu n'omukono gwe gwa buryo amugyemire omukono gwa Israeli ogwa bumosho, na Manaase amukwaitse n'omukono gwe gwa bumosho amugyemire omukono gwa Israeli ogwa buryo, yaabamuhitsya.

Israeli yaananuura omukono gwe ogwa buryo, yaata engaro ze aha mutwe gwa Efuraimu omuto, kandi ez'ogwa bumosho yaazita aha mutwe gwa Manaase, arabaniisemu emikono ye, akigyendereire; ahakuba Manaase niwe yaabaire ari omujigaijo.
na maraika owancungwire omu bubi bwona, ahe aba boojo omugisha; kandi beetererwe eiziina ryangye n'amaziina g'abanzaire Abrahamu na Isaaka, kandi barugyemu omutwe muhango gw'abantu omu nsi.
Yosefu ku yaareebire ishe ataire omukono gwe gwa buryo aha mutwe gwa Efuraimu, kyamugwisa kubi; yaakwata omukono gwa ishe kugwiha aha mutwe gwa Efuraimu kuguta aha gwa Manaase.
Yaagira ishe ati: Ngaaha, Taata; ogu niwe mujigaijo; ba niwe waataho omukono gwawe gwa buryo.

Kwonka ishe yaayanga, yaagira ati: Ninkimanya, mwana wangye, ninkimanya; ogu nawe aryahinduka eihanga, kandi aryaba mukuru; kwonka omurumuna aryamukiza obukuru, n'oruzaaro rwe ruryahinduka omutwe muhango gw'amahanga.

Atyo yaabashabira omugisha eryo izooba, naagira ati: Muryaba eky'okureeberaho aha Baisraeli, baaba nibashabirana emigisha, bagire bati: Ruhanga akugire nka Efuraimu na Manaase. Okwo nikwo yaatungwire Efuraimu okukira Manaase.
Bwanyima Israeli yaagira Yosefu ati: Reeba, naaza kufa; kwonka Ruhanga aryaguma naimwe, kandi aryabagarura omu nsi ya baashwenkuriimwe;
kandi iwe naakuha omugabo gumwe okweshumba beene sho, ogu naanyagire Abaamori na rurara yangye n'obuta bwangye.
Imwe beene Yakobo, muteeranire hamwe, muhurire; Mutegye shoimwe Israeli amatu.
Reubeeni, niiwe naabandize kuzaara,
Amaani gangye, kandi omujigaijo gw'obutsigazi bwangye.
Ow'amaryo rurangaanwa, kandi ow'amaani rugambwa.
Ahakuba okatemba ekitabo kya sho;
Waakihagara. Waaza ahu mbyama!
Zaarurara zaabo n'ez'okwitanisa.
Iwe magara gangye, otariza omu naama zaabo,
Iwe kitiinisa kyangye, otarikwatanisa nabo bateeraine;
Ahakuba ahabw'ekiniga bakaita abantu,
Ahabw'okwenda kwemara ak'aha mutima baatema n'ente ebiteega.
Ekiniga kyabo kikyeenwe, ahakuba ni kingi;
Ekiniga kyabo kikaba kiine obushaarizi.
Ndyababaganisiza omuri Yakobo,
Mbataataanisize omuri Israeli.
Iwe Yuda, beene sho baryakuhimbisa;
Omukono gwawe guryakwata abazigu baawe aha bitsya;
Beene sho baryakwinamira.
Yuda n'ekitsigazi ky'entare;
Mwana wangye, oinamukire, nooruga aha ki waita;
Yainama, yaabundama nk'entare,
Kandi nk'entare enkazi; n'oha owaakwemera kumusisiimura?
N'obu yaakuba ey'obutegyeki kumuruga aha bigyere,
Okuhitsya obu mukama waayo ariija;
Aryatsibika omwana gw'embaraasi ye aha muzaabibu,
N'omwana gw'endogoya ye aha muzaabibu ogutoorainwe;
Ayogyese ebijwaro bye viinyo,
N'eby'okujwara bye abyogyese eshande y'emizaabibu.
Amaisho ge garyatukuzibwa viinyo,
Namaino ge geezibwe amate.
Abe enyambukiro y'emeeri;
Omwatano gwe guryagarukira ahari Sidoni.
Isakaari n'endogoya y'amaani
Ebyami ahagati y'engo z'entaama.
Akareeba omwanya gw'okuruhuukiramu ku guri murungi,
Kandi n'ensi ku erikushemeza;
Yainika eibega rye okwekorera;
Atyo yaahinduka omuhuuku w'okugyemwa emirimo.
Daani aryacwera oruganda rwe emanja, Nk'oku oruganda rwe ruri rumwe aha nganda za Israeli.
Kandi encwera omu kahanda,
Eruma ebitsintsiino by'embaraasi,
Ngu egaranjure ogitembire.
Kwonka aryababinga abahambize.
Omuri Asheri haryarugamu eby'okurya birungi,
Baryareeta eby'okurya ebishemereire abagabe.
Nafutaali n'ebuguma y'ensa etsibwirwe;
Agamba ebigambo birungi.
Yosefu n'eitaagi eririkwana munonga,
Eitaagi eririkwana munonga haihi n'enshuro;
Amataagi ge garengyera aha rugo rw'amabaare.
Abarasi bakamugwisa kubi,
Baamurasha, baamuhiiga.
Emikono ye n'engaro ze byaheebwa amaani
Omukono gw'Ow'obushoboorozi owa Yakobo
Omu iziina ry'omuriisa,
Orukiri rwa Israeli,
Niwe Ruhanga wa sho, orikuhwera,
Ow'obushoboorozi bwona orikuha omugisha,
Emigisha erikuruga omu iguru,
N'emigisha erikuruga hare okuzimu,
N'emigisha ey'aha mabeere n'ey'omu nda.
Emigisha ei sho akushabira
Neekira eya tata na tatenkuru,
Neehika aha muheru gw'enshozi ezitahwaho.
Emigisha egyo eryaguma aha mutwe gwa Yosefu,
Aha kazingiro k'ogwo owaatoorainwe omuri beene ishe.
Omu kasheeshe gurya eki gwitsire,
Omu mwabazyo gubagana eminyago.
Abo boona n'enganda za Israeli ikumi na ibiri; kandi ebyo nibyo ishebo yaabagambiire naabashabira omugisha; buri muntu nk'omugisha gwe oku guri, nikwo yaabashabiire atyo.
Bwanyima yaabeehanangiriza, naabagira ati: Niinyija kushanga abaitu; muryanziika hamwe na baatatenkuru omu nyanga y'omu kibanja kya Efurooni Omuhiiti,
egyo nyanga eri omu kibanja kya Makipeela ahashungaine na Mamure omu nsi ya Kanaani, niyo nyanga ei Abrahamu yaaguzire hamwe n'ekibanja ahari Efurooni Omuhiiti, okuba obutaka bw'okuziikamu.
Okwo niyo baaziikire Abrahamu na Saara omukazi we; niyo baaziikire Isaaka na Rebeka omukazi we, kandi niyo naaziikire Lea;
ekyo kibanja n'enyanga yaamwo bikagurwa aha ba Heesi.
Yakobo ku yaaherize kwehanangiriza abatabani, yaagarura amaguru ge aha kitabo, gwahwamu, yaashanga abaabo.
Yosefu yaajuumara aha maisho ga ishe, yaamuriririraho, yaamunywegyera.
Yosefu yaaragiira abaheereza be abafumu okwomya omutumbi gwa ishe n'omubazi; abafumu nikwo kwomya Israeli.
Baamara ebiro makumi ana nibamwomya; ahakuba ebiro by'okwomya nikwo byabaire bingana; kandi Abanyamisri baamara ebiro makumi mushanju omu rufu rwe.
Ebiro by'orufu rwe ku byahweire, Yosefu yaagambira ab'eka ya Faraho ati: Ku muraabe nimungirira embabazi, nimbeeshengyereza mumpikire Faraho, mumugambire ku tata yandahiize, naagira ati:
Reeba, naaza kufa; oryanziika omu kituuro kyangye eki naayekoreire omu nsi ya Kanaani. Mumugire muti: Mbwenu naakweshengyereza omurekye ainamukye, aziikye ishe, agarukye.
Faraho yaagarukamu ati: Inamuka oziikye sho, nk'oku yaakurahiize.
Yosefu yainamuka kuziika ishe; yaagyenda hamwe n'abagaragwa ba Faraho boona, abakuru b'omu ka ye, kandi n'abakuru boona ab'ensi ya Misri,
n'eka ye yoona na beene ishe n'ab'eka ya ishe; kwonka abaana baabo abato n'amasyo gaabo g'entaama nag'ente baabitsiga omu kyanga kya Gosheni.
Yainamuka n'ebigaari n'ab'aha mbaraasi; gwaba omutwe muhango munonga.
Baahika omu ihuuriro rya Atadi eriri seeri ya Yorudani; aho niho baacuriire munonga n'obusaasi; bwanyima yaamara ebiro mushanju naaririra ishe.

Abatuuzi b'ensi egyo Abanyakanaani ku baareebire nibacurira omu ihuuriro rya Atadi, baagira bati: Oku n'okucura kw'obusaasi aha Banyamisri; nikyo omwanya ogwo gwayeteirwe Abeeli-misraimu, kandi guri seeri ya Yorudani.
Batabani be baamukorera nk'oku yaabaragiire;

ahakuba bakamutwara omu nsi ya Kanaani, baamuziika omu nyanga y'omu kibanja kya Makipeela, ahashungaine na Mamure, ei Abrahamu yaaguzire hamwe n'ekyo kibanja ahari Efurooni Omuhiiti, okuba obutaka bw'okuziikamu.
Yosefu ku yaaherize kuziika ishe, yaagaruka Misri na beene ishe n'abandi boona abaagyenzire nawe kumuziikisa ishe.
Beene ishe ba Yosefu ku baareebire ishebo aherize kufa, baagira bati: Obundi Yosefu akaatwanga, atutura ebibi byona ebi twamwitsize.
Baatuma ahari Yosefu, nibagira bati: Sho atakafiire, akaragiira ati: Muryagambira Yosefu muti:

Naakweshengyereza osaasire beene sho okushiisha kwabo n'ekibi kyabo; ahakuba bakakukora kubi. Mbwenu nitukweshengyereza osaasire okushiisha kw'abairu ba Ruhanga wa sho. Yosefu ku baamugizire batyo, yaarira.
Na beene ishe nabo baija, baamugwa omu maisho; baagira bati: Reeba, hati twaba abairu baawe.
Yosefu yaabagira ati: Mutatiina; nimugira ngu ndi omu mwanya gwa Ruhanga?
Imwe enaama yaanyu ekaba eri ey'okunkora kubi, kwonka eya Ruhanga ekaba eri ey'okureeta ebirungi okukiza abantu baingi, ngu barekye kufa nk'oku kiri hati.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati mutatiina; niinyija kubaha eby'okubatunga n'abaana baanyu abato. Yaabahamiza, yaabagarura omutima omunda.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaatuura omuri Misri, we n'ab'eka ya ishe; yaahitsya emyaka igana na ikumi.
Yaareeba baijukuru ba Efuraimu aba kashatu; kandi n'abaana ba Makiri mwene Manaase bakamuzaarirwa aha maju.
Yosefu yaagambira beene ishe ati: Naaza kufa; kwonka buzimazima Ruhanga aryabataayaayira, abaihe omu nsi egi, abate omu nsi ei yaarahiire kuha Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaarahiza abaana ba Israeli, naagira ati: Buzimazima Ruhanga aryabataayaayira; naimwe muryaiha amagufa gangye omu nsi egi, mugagyendane.
Atyo Yosefu yaafa, ahikize emyaka igana na ikumi; baamwomya n'omubazi, baamuta omu shanduukye y'okuziikamu omuri Misri.
Reubeeni, Simeoni, Leevi, Yuda,
Isakaari, Zebuluuni, Benyamiini,
Daani, Nafutaali, Gaadi na Asheri.
Abantu boona abaarugire omu nda ya Yakobo bakaba bari makumi mushanju; kwonka Yosefu we akashangwa ari omuri Misri.
Bwanyima Yosefu yaafa na beene ishe boona, n'ab'omu busingye obwo boona.
Bwanyima haayema omugabe musya omuri Misri, owaabaire atarikumanya Yosefu.
Yaagira abantu be ati: Reeba, Abaisraeli ni baingi kandi n'ab'amaani okutukira;
mwije tubacwere obwengye, barekye kukanya; nyentsya tukiguubwaho orugamba, bakeeteerana n'abazigu baitu, bakaturwanisa, bakacwa, bakaruga omuri egi nsi.
Nikyo baabateereireho abanyampara, ngu babareebese enaku nibabeekoreza emitwaro erikuremeera. Baayombekyera Faraho endembo z'okuhunikamu, Pisomu na Ramaseesi.
Kwonka ei baagarukiire kubabonabonesa, nabo niyo baagarukiire kukanya n'okubuga hoona. Ekyo kyareetera Abanyamisri kugira obwoba bwingi ahabw'Abaisraeli.
Abanyamisri baakoresa Abaisraeli emirimo y'amaani;

baabatamisa amagara gaabo ahabw'okubakoresa emirimo y'obuhuuku, nibabakaatisa obudongo n'okubabumbisa amatafaari, kandi baabakoresa emirimo y'emiringo yoona omu misiri; buri murimo gwona ogu baabaire babakoresa, bagubakoresa n'amaani.
Bwanyima omugabe wa Misri yaagambira abazaarisa b'Abaheburaayo, omwe orikwetwa Shifira, n'ondiijo orikwetwa Pua;
naagira ati: Ku muraabe nimuzaarisa Abaheburaayokazi, mwareeba bari aha butebe oburikuzaarirwaho, haazaarwa omwojo, mumwite; ku araabe ari omwishiki, agumeho.
Kwonka abazaarisa baatiina Ruhanga, tibaakora nk'oku omugabe wa Misri abaragiire, baaguma kureka abaana b'aboojo bahuriire.
Omugabe wa Misri yaayeta abazaarisa, yaababuuza ati: Ahabw'enki mukozire muti okureka abaana b'aboojo bakagumaho?
Abazaarisa baagarukamu Faraho bati: Manya Abaheburaayokazi tibari nk'Abanyamisrikazi, ahakuba baine amaani, omuzaarisa ku aza kwija, ashanga baazaire.
N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga yaakorera gye abo bazaarisa; eihanga ry'Ahaheburaayo ryakanya, ryaba ery'amaani maingi.
Kandi abo bazaarisa ahabw'okutiina Ruhanga, yaabaha oruzaaro, baarugwamu enganda.
Bwanyima Faraho yaaragiira abantu be boona ati: Buri mwojo weena oraazaarwe Omuheburaayokazi, mumunagye omu mugyera; kwonka omwishiki weena agumeho.
Omukazi ogwo yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo; ku yaareebire ari omwana murungi, yaamushereka okumara ameezi ashatu.
Bwanyima ku yaareebire atakibaasa kuguma amusherekire, yaareeta akagozi k'omubimbiri k'okumutamu, yaakasiiga eibumba na koroto, yaamutamu; ako kagozi yaakata ahagati y'ebifunjo omu nkungu y'omugyera;
munyaanya yaayemerera hangahari kureeba ekiraamubeho.
Ku yaakafundwire, yaashangamu omwana, ogwo mwana yaarira. Yaamugirira esaasi, yaagira ati: Ogu n'omwe aha baana b'Abaheburaayo.
Ahonaaho munyaanya yaabuuza muhara wa Faraho ati: Nze kukwetera omurezi omu bakazi b'Abaheburaayo, akurerere ogu mwana?
Muhara wa Faraho yaamugira ati: Irooko. Omwishiki yaagyenda, yaayeta nyina.
Muhara wa Faraho yaamugira ati: Twara omwana ogu, omunderere, ndyakuha ebihembo. Omukazi nikwo kutwara omwana, akamurera.
Bwanyima omwana ku yaakuzire, nyina yaamureetera muhara wa Faraho, yaaba omwana we. Yaamweta Musa, naagira ati: Ahabw'okuba nkamwiha omu maizi.
Yaamagamaga; ku yaareebire hataine oriho, yaita ogwo Munyamisri, yaashereka omutumbi gwe omu musheenyi.
Ku bwaseesire, yaagarukayo, yaashanga Abaheburaayo babiri nibarwana, yaagambira owaashaagiza mugyenzi we ati: Ahabw'enki nooteera mugyenzi waawe?
Onu ati: N'oha owaakuhaire obushoboorozi bw'okututegyeka n'okutucwera emanja? Nooyenda kunkuratsa Omunyamisri ou oitsire? Musa yaatiina, yaagira ati: Buzima eki nkozire kimanyirwe.
Bwanyima Faraho ku yaakihuriire, yaasherura oku araite Musa.
Kwonka Musa yaahunga Faraho, yaaza omu nsi ya Midiani; ku yaahikireyo, yaashutama aha rubaju rw'eiziba.
Hakaba hariyo omunyamurwa wa Midiani, aine bahara be mushanju; baija, baataha amaizi, baijuza amaato kweshera obusyo bwa ishebo.
Haija abariisa, baababinga, kwonka Musa yaimuka, yaabarwanaho, yaayeshera obusyo bwabo.
Ku baataahire, Reueli ishebo yaagira ati: Byaba bita eri izooba? Ka mwarahukayo!
Baagarukamu bati: Omunyamisri niwe yaatujuna abariisa, akatutahira amaizi, kandi akatwesherera n'obusyo.
Yaabuuza bahara be ati: Mbwenu shi ogwo mushaija arahi? Ahabw'enki mwamutsigayo? Mumwete, tumufungurire.
Okuruga aho Musa yaasiima kuguma n'ogwo mushaija; bwanyima omusahaija ogwo yaamuhingira muhara we Zipora.
Yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, ishe yaamweta Gereshomu; ahakuba akagira ati: Nkashuhuukira omu nsi etari yaitu.
Ruhanga yaahurira okutsinda kwabo, Ruhanga yaijuka endagaano ei yaaragaine na Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo.
Ruhanga yaareeba Abaisraeli, Ruhanga yaamanya oku bari.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaamweyorekyera omu rurimi rw'omuriro nigunaga enkobe ahagati y'orushaka; yaayetegyereza, yaareeba orushaka nirwaka, kwonka rutarikusya.
Musa yaagira ati: Ka nkiikame, ndeebe eri ihano, orushaka okwaka rutasye.
MUKAMA ku yaareebire yaakiikama kureeba, Ruhanga yaamweta naayema ahagati omu rushaka, naagira ati: Musa, Musa! Yaamwetaba ati: Ndi aha, Mukama wangye.
Ruhanga yaagira ati: Otairira haihi; juura enkaito omu bigyere byawe, ahakuba omwanya ogu oyemereiremu n'ogurikwera.
Kandi yaagira ati: Ndi Ruhanga wa sho, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Yakobo. Musa yaayekwata aha maisho, ahakuba akatiina kureeba Ruhanga.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Buzimazima ndeebire okubonabonesibwa kw'abantu bangye abari omuri Misri, naahurira okutaka kwabo oku barikutakisibwa abanyampara; ahabw'okuba nimmanya obusaasi bwabo,

kandi naashuuma kubajuna, kubaiha omu mikono y'Abanyamisri, barugye omu nsi egyo, mbatware omu nsi enungi kandi egarami, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki, ensi ey'Abanyakanaani, ey'Abahiiti, ey'Abaamori, ey'Abaperizi, ey'abahiivi n'ey'Abayebusi.
Na mbwenu reeba, okutaka kw'Abaisraeli kumpikireho, kandi ndeebire okuhatwa oku Abanyamisri barikubahata.
N'ahabw'ekyo ija, nkutume ahari Faraho, oihe abantu bangye Abaisraeli omuri Misri.
Yaamugira ati: Buzimazima ndyaba nkwine. Akamanyiso akarihamya ku niinye naakutumire n'aka; ku oriba waihire abantu omuri Misri, muryaheerereza Ruhanga aha rushozi oru.
Musa yaagarukamu Ruhanga ati: Ku ndihika Abaisraeli, naabagira nti: Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe abantumireho; bambuuza bati: Eiziina rye n'oha? Ndyabagarukamu nta?
Ruhanga yaagira Musa ati: Ndi MBAHO; kandi yaagira ati: Oku nikwo origambira Abaisraeli, oti: MBAHO niwe abantumireho.

Kandi Ruhanga yaagambira Musa ati: Oku nikwo origambira Abaisraeli, oti: MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, Ruhanga wa Yakobo niwe abantumireho; eryo niryo iziina ryangye ebiro byona, kandi okwo nikwo nshemereire kwijukwa obusingye bwona.

Irooko oteeranire hamwe abakuru b'Abaisraeli, obagire oti: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo akaanyeyoreka naagira ati: Mbareebire, naareeba n'okubarikubagira omuri Misri;
mbwenu nindaganisa okubaiha omu kubonabona kwa Misri, mbatware omu nsi y'Abanyakanaani, ey'Abahiiti, ey'Abaamori, ey'Abaperizi, ey'Abahiivi kandi n'ey'Abayebusi, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki.

Nabo baryakuhurira; bwanyima oryagyenda n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli ow'omugabe wa Misri mumugire muti: MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo atutaayaayiire; mbwenu nitukweshengyereza, orekye tugyende orugyendo rw'ebiro bishatu omu ihamba tutambiririreyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ebitambo.
Kandi nimmanya ku omugabe wa Misri ataribaikiriza kugyenda, kureka yaagyemwa omukono gw'amaani.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndyabanga omukono gwangye, nteere Misri n'eby'okutangaaza byangye byona, ebi ndigikoreramu; bwanyima aryabarekura.
Kandi aba bantu ndyabaha okukundwa Abanyamisri; n'ahabw'ekyo ku muriba nimurugayo, timurirugayo ngaro nsha;

kureka buri mukazi aryashaba mutaahi we, ashabe n'oriba acumbikire omu nju ye, ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi eby'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu, n'ebijwaro, mubijwekye abaana baanyu b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki; okwo nikwo murinyaga Abanyamisri.
Musa yaagarukamu naagira ati: Kwonka nimmanya ngu tibariinyikiriza, n'obu kwakuba okumpurira; ahakuba baryagira bati: MUKAMA tarakweyorekire.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Ekyo eki oine omu ngaro niki? Onu ati: N'enkoni.
Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Ginagye ahansi. Yaaginaga ahansi; enkoni yaahinduka enjoka; Musa yaagihunga.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Tayo omukono gwawe, ogikwate omukira, (yaatayo omukono, yaagikwata, yaagaruka yaahinduka enkoni omu ngaro ze):
okwo nikwo orikora, bakabona kwikiriza ku MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo, yaakweyorekire.
Yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Garura omukono gwawe omu kifuba. Yaagugaruramu; ku yaagwihiremu, yaashanga guri nk'omubiri gwe ogundi.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Ku bariba batakwikiriize, n'obu kwakuba okwikiririsibwa akamanyiso k'okubanza, baryaikiririsibwa aka kabiri.

Kandi ku bariba bataikiririsiibwe obwo bumanyiso bwombi, n'obu kwakuba okuhurira ebi orikubagambira, oryatwara aha maizi g'omu mugyera, ogashukye ahansi; amaizi ago agu oritaha omu mugyera, garyahinduka eshagama ahari eryo itaka.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: N'oha owaahangire akanwa k'omuntu? Nari n'oha ohindura omuntu ekiteta, nari ekifamatu, nari shi n'oha omureebesa, nari omuhumya? Tiinye MUKAMA?
N'ahabw'ekyo irooko ogyende, ndyaba ndi hamwe n'akanwa kaawe, nkuhabure ebi origamba.
Musa yaagarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, ninkweshengyereza, ou orikwenda kutuma, mutume.

MUKAMA yaagirira Musa ekiniga kingi, yaagira ati: Arooni mwene sho Omuleevi tariho? Nimmanya we ku arikubaasa kugamba gye. Kandi reeba, hati naija kukubugana; ku araakureebe, naija kwesiimira aha mutima.
Oryaguma omugambire, ote ebigambo omu kanwa ke; naanye ndyaba ndi hamwe n'akanwa kaawe n'ake, mbahabure ebi murikora.
Aryaba ow'okukugambirira abantu, abe akanwa kaawe, naiwe omubeere nka Ruhanga.
Kandi oryaguma otware enkoni egi omu ngaro, ei orikoresa obumanyiso.

Musa yaagaruka ahari Yesero ishezaara, yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, reka ngyende, ngarukye ahari beene waitu abari omuri Misri, ndeebe ku baraabe bakibaho. Yesero yaagira Musa ati: Gyenda n'obusingye.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa akiri omuri Midianai ati: Irooko ogarukye Misri, ahabw'okuba abaabaire nibenda kukwita bafiire.
Musa yaatwara omukazi we n'abatabani, yaabata aha ndogoya, yaagaruka omu nsi ya Misri; kandi yaatwara egyo nkoni ya Ruhanga omu ngaro ze.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Ku oraagarukye Misri, otarireka kukorera omu maisho ga Faraho eby'okutangaaza byona ebi nkuhaire kukora; kwonka ndyagangaaza omutima gwe, tarireka bantu kugyenda.
Kandi oryagambira Faraho oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, naagira ati: Israeli n'omwana wangye w'omujigaijo;
kandi ninkugambira nti: Reka omwana wangye agyende, ampeereze; ku oraayangye kumurekura, niinyija kwita omwana waawe ow'omujigaijo.
Zipora yaakwata eibaare ry'obwogi, yaashara ekishushu ky'omubiri gw'omwana we, yaakinaga aha bigyere bya Musa, yaamugira ati: Wampindukira omugore orikujwisa eshagama.
MUKAMA nikwo kumureka. Zipora akagira ati: Ori omugore orikujwisa eshagama ahabw'okushara!
MUKAMA yaagambira Arooni ati: Irooko oze kubugana Musa omu ihamba. Yaagyenda, yaamubugana aha rushozi rwa Ruhanga, yaamunywegyera.
Musa yaagambira Arooni ebigambo byona ebi MUKAMA yaamutumire, n'obumanyiso bwona obu yaamuragiire kukora.
Musa na Arooni baagyenda, baateeranira hamwe abakuru b'Abaisraeli boona,
Arooni yaabagambira ebigambo byona, ebi MUKAMA yaagambiire Musa, kandi yaakorera obwo bumanyiso omu maisho g'abantu.
Abantu baikiriza; kandi ku baahuriire ngu MUKAMA ataayaayiire Abaisraeli, yaareeba okubonabonesibwa kwabo, bainika emitwe yaabo, baaramya.
Bwanyima Musa na Arooni baija ahari Faraho, baamugira bati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende omu ihamba, bankorereyo obugyenyi.
Faraho yaabagira ati: MUKAMA niwe oha, ou nyowe nshemereire kuhurira, nkarekura Abaisraeli bakagyenda? MUKAMA ogwo tindikumumanya; kandi n'ekindi tindikwija kubarekura, bakagyenda.

Baagira bati: Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo atutaayaayiire; mbwenu nitukweshengyereza, orekye tugyende orugyendo rw'ebiro bishatu omu ihamba, tutambirireyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ebitambo, atakaatwitsa orufu nari rurara.
Omugabe wa Misri yaabagira ati: Iwe Musa na Arooni, ahabw'enki nimwiha abantu aha mirimo yaabo? Mwirooko mugarukye aha mirimo yaanyu.
Faraho yaagaruka yaagira ati: Reeba, abantu bakanyire omu nsi; haza imwe nimwenda kubaiha omu buhuuku bwabo.
Eizooba eryo Faraho yaaragiira abanyampara b'abantu n'abatware baabo, naagira ati:
Mutagaruka kuha abantu embuba z'engano z'okukoresa amatafaari nka ira; murekye bagyende bazeesherurire.

Omubaro gw'amatafaari, ogu baabaire nibabumba n'okuhitsya hati, mube nigwo mwabagumyaho; mutagutuubyaho na kakye; ahakuba n'abeeremwa; nikyo kirikubatakisa nibagira bati: Ka tuze kutambira Ruhanga waitu ebitambo.
Abashaija abo mubahe emirimo erikukiraho amaani, bagikore; barekye kuta omutima aha bigambo by'ebishuba.
Abanyampara b'abantu n'abatware baabo nikwo kushohora, bakagambira abantu bati: Oku nikwo Faraho arikugamba naagira ati: Tindibaha mbuba z'engano;
mwirooko mugyende, muzeesherurire ahu muraazishangye hoona, mumanye ngu omurimo gwanyu tiguricuubwaho na kakye.
N'ahabw'ekyo abantu baabugibwa omu nsi yoona eya Misri kutorotoora ebitsintsi by'engano omu mwanya gw'embuba zaazo.
Abanyampara baabeezirikisa munonga nibagira bati: Muhitsye emirimo yaanyu eya buri izooba, nk'oku mubaire nimugikora mwine embuba z'engano.

Abanyampara b'Abaisraeli, abaatairweho abanyampara ba Faraho, baaterwa, kandi baabuuzibwa bati: N'enki ekibazibiire kuhitsya omubaro gw'amatafaari, ogu mucwereirwe nyomwabazyo n'eri izooba, nk'oku mubaire nimukora?
Bwanyima abanyampara b'Abaisraeli baija ahari Faraho kwetonganira nibagira bati: Ahabw'enki otukozire oti, itwe abairu baawe?
Tibakituha mbuba z'engano; kandi bagarukire baatugira bati: Mubumbe amatafaari; haza obwo bwona itwe abairu baawe nituteerwa, kandi orubanja ruri orw'abantu baawe.
Kwonka yaagarukamu ati: Muri abeeremwa; muri abeeremwa! Nikyo kirikubagirisa muti: Ka tugyende tutambire MUKAMA ebitambo.
Mwirooko mugarukye aha mirimo yaanyu, mukore; ahakuba timurigaruka kuheebwa mbuba z'engano, kandi mugume muhitsye omubaro gw'amatafaari ogu mwacwereirwe.
Ku baagambiirwe ngu tibaricwerwaho mubaro gw'amatafaari ogwa buri izooba na kakye, abanyampara b'Abaisraeli baamanya ku bagwereirwe akagwe.
Ku baabaire nibaruga owa Faraho, baashanga Musa na Arooni beemereire omu muhanda;
baabagira bati: MUKAMA abareebe, kandi abacwere orubanja, ahabw'okuba niimwe mureeteire Faraho n'abashaija be kutwangira kimwe, n'okukwata rurara kutwita.
Musa yaagaruka ahari MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Ai bambe MUKAMA, abantu aba obakoreire ki kubi? Okaba wantumira ki?
Ahakuba kwiha naaza owa Faraho kugamba omu iziina ryawe, akozire kubi aba bantu; kandi naiwe tiwaajuna bantu baawe na kakye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Hati noija kureeba oku ndaagire Faraho; ahakuba, ahabw'okugyemwa omukono gw'amaani, aryabarekura, nangwa n'okubabinga ababingye omu nsi ye ahabw'ogwo mukono.
Ruhanga yaagamba na Musa naamugira ati: Niinye Yehova.
Kandi nkeeyoreka Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo, ndi Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona; kwonka tindabeemanyiise mu iziina ryangye erya Yehova.
Nkahamya endagaano yangye nabo, ku ndibaha ensi ya Kanaani, ensi ei baatwiremu nk'abashuhuuki.
Kandi mpuriire okutsinda kw'Abaisraeli, abu Abanyamisri baagizire abahuuku; naanye naijuka endagaano yangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo gambira Abaisraeli ku ndi Yehova, kandi ku ndibatuura emitwaro ei Abanyamisri baabakoreire, nkabaiha omu buhuuku bwabo, nkabacunguza omukono gubangire n'ebifubiro by'amaani.
Bwanyima ndyabeetwarira mube abantu bangye, kandi naanye mbe Ruhanga waanyu; aho niho murimanyira ku ndi Yehova Ruhanga waanyu, obatwire emitwaro ei Abanyamisri baabeekoreize;
kandi ndyabatwara omu nsi ei naimukiize omukono kuha Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo; ngibahe kuba obuhunguzi bwanyu. Nyowe Yehova.
Musa yaagambira Abaisraeli ebigambo ebyo; kwonka baayanga kumuhurira ahabw'obusaasi bw'omu mitima yaabo, n'ahabw'obuhuuku bubi.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Za owa Faraho omugabe wa Misri, omugambire arekye Abaisraeli barugye omu nsi ye.
Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ati: Reeba, Abaisraeli tibampuriire; mbwenu Faraho we naabaasa ata kumpurira, nyowe ow'eminwa etashazirwe?
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni, naabatuma aha Baisraeli n'ahari Faraho omugabe wa Misri, kwiha Abaisraeli omu nsi ya Misri.
Aba nibo bakuru b'emiryango ya baishenkurubo; Batabani ba Reubeeni omujigaijo gwa Israeli, ni Hanoki, Palu, Hezirooni na Karumi; egyo niyo miryango ya Reubeeni.
Batabani ba Simeoni ni Yemueli, Yamini, Ohadi, Yakini, Zohari, na Shauli omutabani ow'Omunyakanaanikazi; egyo niyo miryango ya Simeoni.
Kandi aga nigo maziina ga batabani ba Leevi, nk'oku baagyenzire nibakuratana omu kuzaara; Gereshoni, Kohasi na Merari. Emyaka ei Leevi yaahikize ekaba eri igana na makumi ashatu na mushanju.
Batabani ba Gereshoni ni Libuni na Shimei, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri;
na batabani ba Kohasi ni Amuraamu, Izuhaari, Heburooni, na Uzieli; kandi emyaka ei Kohasi yaahikize ekaba eri igana na makumi ashatu n'eshatu;
kandi na batabani ba Merari ni Mahili na Muushi. Egyo niyo miryango y'Abaleevi nk'oku baagyenzire nibakuratana omu kuzaara.
Amuraamu yaashwera Yokebedi ishenkazi, yaamuzaarira Arooni na Musa; emyaka ei Amuraamu yaahikize ekaba eri igana na makumi ashatu na mushanju.
Batabani ba Izuhaari ni Koora, Nefegi na Zikiri.
Batabani ba Uzieli ni Mishaeli, Elizafani na Zitiri.
Arooni yaashwera Elisheba, muhara wa Aminadabu, munyaanya wa Nahashooni; yaamuzaarira Nadabu, Abihu, Eleazaari na Itamaari.
Batabani ba Koora ni Asiri, Elukaana na Abiasaafu; egyo niyo miryango y'aba Koora.
Eleazaari mwene Arooni yaashwera omwe ahari bahara ba Putieli; yaamuzaarira Finehaasi. Abo nibo bakuru b'emiryango ya baishenkuru b'Abaleevi nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Abo nibo ba Arooni na Musa abu MUKAMA yaagambiire kwiha Abaisraeli omu nsi ya Misri, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari.
Abo nibo baagambiire Faraho omugabe wa Misri eby'okwiha Abaisraeli omuri Misri; abo nibo Musa na Arooni bari.
Aha izooba eri MUKAMA yaagambiriireho Musa omu nsi ya Misri,
akamugira ati: Niinye MUKAMA; gambira Faraho omugabe wa Misri ebigambo byona ebi ndikukugambira.
Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ati: Nyowe ndi omuntu w'eminwa etashazirwe; Faraho aryabaasa ata kumpurira?
Oryagamba byona ebi ndikuragiira; na mukuru waawe Arooni abigambire Faraho, naamuragiira kureka Abaisraeli kuruga omu nsi ye.
Kwonka ndyagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, nkanyise obumanyiso bwangye n'eby'okutangaaza byangye omu nsi ya Misri.
Faraho taribahurira; haza nyowe mbone kuta omukono gwangye ahari Misri, nyiheyo amahe gangye, nibo bantu bangye Abaisraeli, nimbajuna Abanyamisri n'ebifubiro by'amaani.
Ku ndibanga omukono gwangye ahari Misri, naiha Abaisraeli omuribo, obwo nibwo Abanyamisri barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Musa na Arooni baakora batyo; nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaragiire, baaba nikwo baakora.
Obwo Musa akaba ahikize emyaka makumi munaana, kandi mukuru we Arooni akaba aine emyaka makumi munaana n'eshatu, obu baagamba na Faraho.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Faraho ku araabagire ati: Mukore eky'okutangaaza ky'okubahamya, obwo ogire Arooni oti: Twara enkoni yaawe, oginagye ahansi omu maisho ga Faraho, ehindukye enjoka.
Batyo Musa na Arooni baataaha owa Faraho, baakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaragiira; Arooni yaanaga enkoni ye ahansi omu maisho ga Faraho n'abaheereza be, yaahinduka enjoka.
Faraho nawe yaayeta abanyabwengye n'abarogi, kandi n'abafumu ba Misri, baakora batyo n'oburogo bwabo;
ahakuba nabo bakanaga ahansi, buri muntu enkoni ye zaahinduka enjoka; kwonka enkoni ya Arooni yaamira ezaabo.
Omutima gwa Faraho gwagangaara, tiyaabahurira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
Omu kasheeshe oze owa Faraho; naija kuba naaza aha mugyera; iwe oyemerere aha nkungu y'omugyera, akushangyeho; kandi n'enkoni eyaahindukire enjoka ogigyendane;
omugire oti: MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo akuntumireho, naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende, bampeerereze omu ihamba; kandi n'okuhitsya hati oyangire kuhurira.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, naagira ati: Aha niho oraamanyire ku ndi MUKAMA; niinyija kuteera amaizi g'omu mugyera n'enkoni ei nyine omu ngaro, gahindukye eshagama;
eby'enyanja by'omu mugyera bife, omugyera gunuukye ekijunde; Abanyamisri banugye amaizi g'omuri ogwo mugyera, bangye kuganywa.

MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Twara enkoni yaawe, obangye omukono gwawe ahaiguru y'amaizi g'omuri Misri, emigyera yaabo n'otugyera twabo n'ebiyanja byabo n'ahu amaizi gateeraniire hoona, gahindukye eshagama; kandi omu nsi ya Misri yoona omu bintu byabo eby'ebiti n'eby'amabaare nihaija kubamu eshagama.
Musa na Arooni baakora nk'oku MUKAMA abaragiire; yaimutsya egyo nkoni, yaateera amaizi g'omu mugyera omu maisho ga Faraho n'abaheereza be; amaizi goona ag'omu mugyera gaahinduka eshagama.
Eby'enyanja ebyabaire biri omu mugyera byafa; omugyera gwanuuka ekijunde, Abanyamisri tibaabaasa kunywa maizi gaagwo; haabaho eshagama omu nsi ya Misri yoona.
Abafumu ba Misri baakora batyo n'oburogo bwabo; omutima gwa Faraho gwagangaara, tiyaabahurira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
Faraho yaarugayo, yaagaruka omuka, n'ekyo tiyaakyeetaho.
Abanyamisri boona baatimba haihi n'omugyera, ngu batungye amaizi g'okunywa; ahakuba tibarabaasize kunywa ha maizi g'omuri ogwo mugyera.
Haahinguraho ebiro mushanju, MUKAMA aherize kuteera ogwo mugyera.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Za owa Faraho, omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende, bampeereze.
Kandi ku oraayangye kubarekura, reeba niinyija kuteeza ensi yaawe yoona ebikyere;

omugyera nigwija kwijura ebikyere, biinamukye, bitaahe omu ka yaawe, bize omu kishengye eki oraaramu, bihikye n'aha kitabo kyawe, n'omu nju z'abaheereza baawe n'abantu baawe, bihikye n'omu mateekyero gaawe n'omu bintu byawe eby'okugoyeramu emigaati;
kandi ebikyere bikutembe, bitembe abantu baawe n'abaheereza baawe boona.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Gambira Arooni oti: Banga omukono gwawe ogukwaitse enkoni aha migyera n'otugyera n'ebiyanja, ebikyere biinamukye, bibugye ensi ya Misri.
Arooni yaabanga omukono gwe aha maizi ga Misri; ebikyere byainamuka, byashweka ensi ya Misri.
Abafumu nabo baakora batyo n'oburogo bwabo, bainamura ebikyere aha nsi omuri Misri.

Musa yaagira Faraho ati: Obe niiwe waanyegambirira obunaku obu ndaayeshengyererezemu MUKAMA iwe n'abaheereza baawe n'abantu baawe, ebikyere bikacwekyerezibwa bikakurugaho, bikahwa n'omu maju gaawe, bikatsigara omu mugyera gwonka.
Faraho yaamugarukamu ati: Nyencakare. Nawe ati: Kibe nk'oku waagamba, obone kumanya ku hatariho orikushushana na MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Ebikyere nibiija kukurugaho, birugye n'omu maju gaawe, n'aha baheereza baawe n'aha bantu baawe, bitsigare omu mugyera gwonka.
Musa na Arooni baaruga owa Faraho; Musa yaatakira MUKAMA ahabw'ebikyere, nk'oku aikirizaine na Faraho.
MUKAMA yaakora nk'oku Musa agambire; ebikyere byafeera omu maju n'omu bibuga n'omu misiri, byahwaho.
Baabirunda emituumo n'emituumo; ensi yaanuuka ekijunde.
Kwonka Faraho ku yaareebire byabaho gye, yaagangaaza omutima gwe, tiyaabahurira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Gambira Arooni oti: Banga enkoni yaawe, oteere omucuucu gw'aha nsi, guhindukye enda omu nsi yoona eya Misri.
Baakora batyo; Arooni yaabanga omukono gwe ogukwaitse enkoni ye, yaateera omucuucu gw'aha nsi; enda zaanyiga aha bantu n'aha matungo; omucuucu gwona ogw'omu nsi ya Misri gwahinduka enda.
Abafumu nabo baateeraho kureeta enda n'oburogo bwabo, tibaabaasa; enda zaanyiga aha bantu n'aha matungo.
Abo bafumu baagira Faraho bati: Mbwenu ho oru n'orukumu rwa Ruhanga. Omutima gwa Faraho gwagangaara, tiyaabahurira nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.

MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Ogurukye kare omu kasheeshe, oyemerere omu maisho ga Faraho, naija kuba naaza aha mugyera, omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende, bampeereze.

Ku oraabe otabarekwire, niinyija kukuteeza emizinga y'eshohera, iwe n'abaheereza baawe n'abantu baawe, zitaahe n'omu maju gaawe; kandi n'amaju g'Abanyamisri nigaija kwijura n'emizinga y'eshohera, zishwekye n'omwanya ogubarimu.
Eizooba eryo niinyija kutsiga ekyanga kya Gosheni, eki abantu bangye batwiremu, emizinga y'eshohera erekye kuhikayo, obone kumanya ku ndi MUKAMA ori ahagati y'ensi.
Niinyija kuta omutaano ahagati y'abantu bangye n'abantu baawe; nyencakare ako kamanyiso nikaija kubaho.
MUKAMA yaakora atyo; emizinga mingi y'eshohera yaataaha omu nju ya Faraho n'omu maju g'abaheereza be n'omu nsi yoona eya Misri; ensi yaasiisikara ahabw'egyo mizinga y'eshohera.
Faraho yaatuma ahari Musa na Arooni, yaagira ati: Mugyende mutambire Ruhanga waanyu ebitambo omu nsi egi.

Musa yaagira ati: Tikihikire kukora tutyo; ahakuba nitwija kutambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ebitambo ebirikuzira aha Banyamisri. Mbwenu ku turaatambire ebitambo omu maisho g'Abanyamisri ebi barikuzira, tibarikwija kututeera amabaare?
Kureka tushemereire kugyenda orugyendo rw'ebiro bishatu omu ihamba, tutambire MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ebitambo, nk'oku arikuturagiira.
Faraho yaagira ati: Niinyija kubareka mugyende, mutambire MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ebitambo omu ihamba; kwonka mutaza hare munonga; kandi munyeshengyerereze MUKAMA.

Musa yaagira ati: Reeba naaza kuruga omu maisho gaawe, nze kweshengyereza MUKAMA, emizinga y'eshohera erugye ahari Faraho n'abaheereza be n'aha bantu be nyencakare; kwonka Faraho atagaruka kugobya obundi, okutareka bantu kuza kutambira MUKAMA ebitambo.
Musa yaaruga omu maisho ga Faraho, yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaakora nk'oku Musa yaagamba, yaiha emizinga y'eshohera ahari Faraho n'aha baheereza be n'aha bantu be; tihaatsigaraho shohera n'emwe.
N'obwo nabwo Faraho yaagangaaza omutima gwe, tiyaareka bantu kugyenda.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Za owa Faraho, omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo arikugamba naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende, bampeereze.
Ahakuba ku oraayangye kubarekura, waabagumya,
reeba omukono gwa MUKAMA gwaza kureeta omubyamo mubi ogw'amaani aha matungo gaawe ag'omu mariisizo, aha mbaraasi n'endogoya n'engamira n'aha masyo g'ente n'ag'entaama.
MUKAMA naija kworeka omutaano ahagati y'amatungo g'Abaisraeli n'ag'Abanyamisri; aha matungo g'Abaisraeli goona tiharifaho na rimwe.
MUKAMA yaataho obunaku, naagira ati: Nyencakare MUKAMA naija kukora ekyo omu nsi.
Ku bwaseesire, MUKAMA yaakikora; amatungo g'Abanyamisri goona gaafa; kwonka aha matungo g'Abaisraeli tihaafaho na rimwe.
Faraho yaatuma kubuuza, baashanga aha matungo g'Abaisraeli hatafiireho na rimwe. Kwonka omutima gwa Faraho gwagangaara, tiyaareka bantu kugyenda.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati: Mutware amagaro g'eiju rya kashenda ery'omu tanuuru, Musa arimiishe ahaiguru omu maisho ga Faraho;
niriija kuhinduka omucuucu, gubugye ensi yoona eya Misri, gurwaze abantu n'enyamaishwa ebizimba birugyemu ebironda omu nsi yoona eya Misri.
Baatwara eiju ry'omu tanuuru, baayemerera omu maisho ga Faraho; Musa yaarimiisha ahaiguru, ryarwaza abantu n'enyamaishwa ebizimba ebirikurugamu ebironda.
Abafumu bari tibaabaasa kwemerera omu maisho ga Musa ahabw'ebizimba; ahakuba ebyo bizimba bikarwaza abo bafumu n'Abanyamisri boona.
Kwonka MUKAMA yaagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, tiyaabahurira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambiire Musa.

MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Ogurukye kare omu kasheeshe, oyemerere omu maisho ga Faraho, omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo arikugamba naagira ati: Reka abantu bangye bagyende bampeereze;

ahakuba aha murundi ogu niinyija kukureetera ebibonaboneso byangye byona, bihikye aha mutima gwawe n'aha baheereza baawe n'aha bantu baawe, obone kumanya ku hatariho orikushushana naanye omu nsi yoona.
Ahabw'okuba hati nkaabangire omukono gwangye, nkuteeza orufu n'abantu baawe, ohwerekyerera, oruga omu nsi;
kwonka buzima, eki nkurekyeireho n'okukworeka amaani gangye, ngu eiziina ryangye ribone kugambwa omu nsi zoona.
Mbwenu na hati nookyehimbisiza aha bantu bangye, oyangire kubarekura.
Reeba, nyencakare nk'aga magingo niinyija kugwisa orubaare rwingi munonga, orutakagwaga muri Misri okwiha obu ensi egyo yaabaho n'okuhitsya hati.
N'ahabw'ekyo otume bataasye amatungo gaawe n'ebi oine omu ishwa byona; ahakuba omuntu weena n'eitungo ryona ekiraashangwe omu ishwa, kitakataahire, nikiija kuteerwa orubaare, kife.
Bwanyima weena owaatiinire ekigambo kya MUKAMA aha baheereza ba Faraho, yaahungiza abairu be n'amatungo ge omu maju;
kwonka otareetaire ha kigambo kya MUKAMA, yaareka abairu be n'amatungo ge omu ishwa.
Musa yaimutsya enkoni ye, agyorekire ahaiguru; MUKAMA yaahindisa eiguru, yaagwisa orubaare, omuriro gwashuuma ahansi; MUKAMA yaagwisa atyo orubaare omu nsi ya Misri.
Haagwa orubaare, n'omuriro gwaguma nigutyankana ahagati yaarwo, orubaare rwingi munonga, orutakagwaga mu nsi ya Misri yoona okwiha obu yaaba eihanga.
Orwo rubaare rwaita byona ebyabaire biri omu ishwa, abantu n'amatungo, omu nsi ya Misri yoona; kandi rwateera ebimezire byona, rwahendagura n'emiti yoona, eby'omu ishwa;
kureka omu kyaro kya Gosheni kyonka, eki Abaisraeli baabaire batwiremu, nimwo orubaare rutarahikire.
Mweshengyereze MUKAMA, ahakuba okuhinda oku okw'amaani n'orubaare nibimara; naaza kubareka mugyende, timukiguma aha.
Musa yaamugira ati: Ku ndaarugye omu rurembo, ahonaaho niinyija kutega MUKAMA emikono, okuhinda nikwija kuhwaho, kandi n'orubaare tirurigaruka kubaho, obone kumanya ku ensi eri eya MUKAMA.
Kwonka iwe n'abaheereza baawe, nimmanya ku murikwija kuba mutakitiina MUKAMA Ruhanga.
(Ahabw'orubaare orwo furakisi na sayiri bikafa, ahabw'okuba sayiri ekaba eri obushiisha, kandi furakisi ekaba neerabya.
Kwonka engano na kusemeti tibirateirwe, ahakuba bikaba bitakamezire.)
Musa yaaruga ahari Faraho omu rurembo, yaatega MUKAMA emikono; okuhinda n'orubaare byahwaho, n'enjura tiyaagaruka kugwa.
Faraho ku yaareebire enjura n'orubaare n'okuhinda byahwaho, yaayeyongyera kushiisha, yaagangaaza omutima gwe, we n'abaheereza be.
Omutima gwa Faraho gwagangaara, tiyaareka Baisraeli kugyenda, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa kugamba.
kandi ngu naiwe obone kubiteekyerereza omwana waawe na mwijukuru waawe, bahurire ebi naakozire omuri Misri, n'obumanyiso obu naakoreire omuribo; mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA.

Musa na Arooni baaza owa Faraho, baamugira bati: oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaheburaayo arikugamba naagira ati: Oryahitsya hi okwanga kwecureeza omu maisho gangye? Reka abantu bangye bagyende, bampeereze.
Ku oraayangye kubarekura, reeba, nyencakare niinyija kureeta enzigye omu nsi yaawe,
zishwekye ensi, omuntu abure ah'okureeba, zirye ebyatsigaireho, bitaitsirwe rubaare, zirye n'emiti yaanyu yoona erikumera omu misiri;

kandi ziijure amaju gaawe n'amaju g'abaheereza baawe boona n'ag'Abanyamisri boona, ezi baasho na baashwenkuru baabaire batakareebaga, okwiha obu baabaho n'okuhitsya hati. Yaakuba, yaaruga omu maisho ga Faraho.
Abaheereza ba Faraho baamubuuza bati: Omushaija ogu aryahitsya hi okutubeera omutego? Reka abantu bagyende, baheereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo. Tokamanyire ku Misri ecwekyereire?
Baagarura Musa na Arooni omu maigho ga Faraho; Faraho yaabagira ati: Mwirooko, muheereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu; beitu shi ni bantu ki abaraagyende?

Musa yaagira ati: Turyagyenda n'abaana baitu abakuru, tugyende na batabani baitu na bahara baitu hamwe n'amasyo gaitu ag'entaama n'ag'ente; ahakuba tushemereire kukorera MUKAMA obugyenyi n'okumutambira ebitambo.
Onu yaabagira ati: MUKAMA akinture, ku ndaabe naabaikiriize kugyenda n'abaana baanyu abato; kwonka mumanye ku enaama yaanyu eri mbi.
Ngaaha! Naayanga; abashaija mube niimwe mwagyenda, mukaheereza MUKAMA, ahakuba nikyo murikwenda. Baabingwa omu maisho ga Faraho.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Banga omukono gwawe aha nsi ya Misri, enzigye ziije, zigiteere, zirye ekimeziremu kyona, ekitaraitsirwe rubaare.
Musa yaabanga enkoni aha nsi ya Misri, MUKAMA yaareeta omuyaga ogurikuruga oburugwa-izooba, gwahuuha ensi eryo izooba ryona n'ekyo kiro kyona; ku bwaseesire, omuyaga ogwo gwareeta enzigye.
Enzigye zaabuga ensi yoona eya Misri, zaagwa omu byanga byayo byona; zikaba ziri enzigye nyingi munonga ez'eihano, ezitakabahoga okwiha ira, kandi ezitaribaho bundi.

Ahakuba zikashweka ensi yoona, ensi yaagira omwirima; zaarya ebimezire byona n'ebijuma byona eby'emiti yoona etaraitsirwe rubaare; omu nsi ya Misri yoona tihaatsigaramu kintu kyona ekibisi, yaaba kiti nari obunyaatsi eby'omu ishwa.
Ahonaaho Faraho yaatuma Musa na Arooni; yaabagira ati: Ncumwire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'ahariimwe.
Mbwenu nimbeeshengyereza munsaasire ekicumuro kyangye omurundi ogu gwonka, muunyeshengyerereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, afe okunyihaho orufu oru rwonka.
Musa yaaruga omu maisho ga Faraho, yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaareeta omuyaga mwingi gw'amaani, ogurikuruga oburengywerwa-izooba, gwatuntumura ezo nzigye, gwazinaga omu Nyanja erikutukura; tihaatsigara ruzigye na rumwe omu byanga byona ebya Misri.
Kwonka MUKAMA yagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, tiyaareka Baisraeli kugyenda.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Imutsya omukono gwawe, ogworekye eiguru, ensi ya Misri eshwekwe omwirima, omwirima ogubambire ndindindi.
Musa yaimutsya omukono gwe, yaagworeka omu iguru, haabaho omwirima ndindindi omu nsi yoona eya Misri okumara ebiro bishatu;
baamara ebiro bishatu batarikureebana, n'obu yaakuba omuntu okuruga ah'ari; kwonka omu maka g'Abaisraeli boona baaguma nibahweza.
Faraho yaatuma Musa, yaamugira ati: Mwirooko muze kuheereza MUKAMA; kandi n'abaana baanyu abato mugyende nabo; kwonka amasyo gaanyu ag'entaama n'ag'ente go gatsigare.
Musa yaagira ati: Oshemereire kutuha eby'okutamba n'eby'okuhonga by'okwotsya, tubone kutambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ebitambo.

N'amatungo gaitu nago nitwija kugatwara; nangwa n'ekyara tikiritsigara; ahabw'okuba nigo turiba tushemereire kwihamu eby'okuheereza MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu; kandi titurikumanya bi turikoresa omu kuheereza MUKAMA, okuhitsya obu turihikayo.
Kwonka MUKAMA yaagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, tiyaabareka kugyenda.
Faraho yaagambira Musa ati: Ruga aha, oyerinde, otaringaruka omumaisho; ahakuba eizooba eri oringaruka omumaisho; oryafa.
Musa yaagira ati: Eki waagamba nikwo; tindikugaruka mumaisho obundi.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Hatsigaire ekibonaboneso kimwe eki ndaabonabonesese Faraho na Misri yoona; bwanyima aryabareka mugyende; okumanya ku aribareka, n'okubabinga aryababingira kimwe.
Gambira abantu, buri mushaija ashabe mutaahi we, na buri mukazi ashabe mutaahi we, bashabe ebintu by'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu.
MUKAMA yaaha abantu okukundwa Abanyamisri. Kandi na Musa yaaba omushaija orikutiinwa munonga omu nsi ya Misri, omu baheereza ba Faraho, n'omu bantu boona.
Musa yaagira Faraho ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, naagira ati: Nyekiro nk'omu itumbi niinyija kuraba omuri Misri;
emijigaijo yoona ey'omu nsi ya Misri efe, okwiha aha mujigaijo gwa Faraho ori aha ngoma okuhitsya aha mujigaijo gw'omuzaana orikusa aha rubengo, n'emijigaijo yoona ey'amatungo.
Kwonka omu Baisraeli embwa terikankamira muntu weena, n'obu ryakuba rimwe aha matungo gaabo, mubone kumanya ku MUKAMA arikworeka omutaano ahagati y'Abanyamisri n'Abaisraeli.
Kandi abaheereza baawe aba boona nibaija kushuuma, baije, baanyinamire, nibagira bati: Irooko, n'abantu boona abarikukukuratira, bwanyima ngyende. Yaaruga omu maisho ga Faraho aine ekiniga kingi.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Faraho tarikwija kubahurira, eby'okutangaaza byangye bibone kukanya omu nsi ya Misri.
Musa na Arooni baakora eby'okutangaaza ebyo byona omu maisho ga Faraho; MUKAMA yaagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, tiyaareka Abaisraeli kuruga omu nsi ye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni omu nsi ya Misri, ati:
Okwezi oku kuryababeera obutandikiro bw'ameezi; ahariimwe kuryaba okwezi kw'okubanza omu mwaka.
Mugambire omutwe gwona ogw'Abaisraeli muti: Aha kiro kya ikumi eky'okwezi oku omuntu weena aryayetwarira omwana gw'entaama, nk'emiryango ya baishebo oku eri, buri ka omwana gw'entaama gumwe.

Kandi eka ku eriba eri nkye, etarikubaasa kumaraho omwana gw'entaama gwona, nyineeka agukwatanise na mutaahi we ohereraine nawe, nk'obwingi bw'abantu oku buri; mubariirire omwana gw'entaama nk'okurya kwa buri muntu oku kuri.
Omwana gw'entaama gwanyu ogwo guryaba empaya ehikize omwaka, etaine kamogo; muryagwiha omu ntaama nari omu mbuzi;
muryagurinda okuhitsya aha kiro kya ikumi na bina eky'oku kwezi; aha kiro ekyo eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli baryagwita omu mwabazyo beeteeraine.
Baryatwara aha shagama, bagimiisiire aha biti by'omuryango byombi n'aha kisasi ky'enju ei bariguriiramu.
Omuri ekyo kiro baryarya enyama yaagwo eyokize hamwe n'omugaati ogutatumbisiibwe; kandi bagirye n'emboga ezirikushaarira.
Mutarigirya mbisi, nari eteekire, kureka mugirye eyokize hamwe n'omutwe n'amaguru n'eby'omunda.
Mutarigira eki mwatsigaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe; ekiriba kyatsigaireho kyona, mukyokyeze kimwe.
Oku nikwo murigirya; muryagirya mwezirikire, mujwaire enkaito, n'enkoni zaanyu muziine omu ngaro; muryagirya n'obwira. Okwo nikwo Kuhinguraho kwa MUKAMA;
ahakuba ekyo kiro ndyaraba omu nsi ya Misri, nyite emijigaijo yoona ey'omuri egyo nsi, ey'abantu n'ey'amatungo; na baaruhanga boona aba Misri mpikiirize orubanja oru mbacwereire; Nyowe MUKAMA.
Egyo shagama eryaba akamanyiso ahariimwe, akatairwe aha maju agu murimu; naanye ku ndireeba egyo shagama, ndyabahinguraho: ku nditeera ensi ya Misri, imwe timurihikwaho rufu rwona kubacwekyereza.

Muryamara ebiro mushanju nimurya emigaati etatumbisiibwe; kwonka aha kiro ky'okubanza mubanze mwihe ekitumbisa omu maka gaanyu; ahakuba omuntu weena orirya omugaati ogutumbisiibwe, okwiha aha kiro ky'okubanza okuhitsya aha kiro kya mushanju, omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu ihanga rya Israeli.

Ahari ekyo kiro ky'okubanza muryagira okuteerana okurikwera, n'aha kya mushanju muryatwaza mutyo. Omuri ebyo biro hatarigira omurimo gwona ogwakorwa; kureka eby'okurya ebi omuntu ashemereire kurya, nibyo murikora byonka.

Kandi muryaguma mwijukye obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe; ahabw'okuba ahari ekyo kiro nikyo ndikwija kwihiraho amahe gaanyu omu nsi ya Misri; n'ahabw'ekyo muryaguma mwijukye ekyo kiro omu busingye bwanyu bwona, gube omugyenzo ogubateereirweho ebiro byona.
Omu kwezi kw'okubanza, aha kiro kya ikumi na bina omu mwabazyo, muryarya emigaati etatumbisiibwe, okuhitsya aha kiro kya makumi abiri na kimwe eky'okwo kwezi omu mwabazyo.

Omu biro mushanju ekitumbisa kyona kitarireebwa omu maka gaanyu; ahakuba omuntu weena orirya ekitumbisiibwe aryacuubwa omu ihanga rya Israeli, n'obu ariba ari omunyaihanga obashuhuukiiremu, nari enzaarwa.
Mutarirya ekitumbisiibwe kyona; omu maka gaanyu goona mugume murye emigaati etatumbisiibwe.
mutware enganda y'enyaweera, mugijabikye omu shagama eri omu rwabya, mugimiisiire aha kisasi n'aha biti by'omuryango; kandi hatarigira n'omwe omuriimwe owaaruga omu nju ye okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.

Ahakuba MUKAMA aryaraba omuriimwe naija kuteera Abanyamisri; ku arireeba eshagama aha kisasi n'aha biti by'emiryango byombi, aryaraba ahaiguru y'orwo rwigi, kandi tariikiriza Muhwerekyerezi kutaaha omu maju gaanyu kubaita.
Kandi muryaguma mwijukye eki, gube omugyenzo ogubateereirweho n'abaana baanyu ebiro byona.
Kandi ku muriba mwahikire omu nsi ei MUKAMA aribaha nk'oku yaaraganiise, muryakora omugyenzo ogu ogurikwera.
Bwanyima abaana baanyu ku baribabuuza bati: Ogu mugyenzo, ogu murikukora, nigumanyisa ki?

Naimwe muryabagarukamu muti: N'ekitambo ky'Okuhinguraho kwa MUKAMA, ahakuba akahingura ahaiguru y'amaju g'Abaisraeli omuri Misri, obu yaita Abanyamisri, akakiza amaka gaitu. Abantu bainika emitwe yaabo, baaramya.
Abaisraeli baagyenda, baakora batyo; nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa na Arooni, baaba nikwo baatwaza.
Ahonaaho Faraho n'abaheereza be boona n'Abanyamisri boona baimuka nyekiro; haabaho okuborooga kuhango omuri Misri, ahabw'okuba tiharabaireho nju yoona etarafiiremu muntu.
Yaatuma Musa na Arooni ekyo kiro, yaabagira ati: Mwimukye, murugye omu bantu bangye, imwe n'Abaisraeli; mugyende muheereze MUKAMA nk'oku mwagambire.
Kandi mutware amasyo gaanyu ag'entaama n'ag'ente, nk'oku mwagambire, mwegyendere; naanye munshabire omugisha.
Abaisraeli baatwara eisyanga ryabo ritakatumbisiibwe, baakoma ebintu byabo eby'okugoyeramu emigaati omu minagiro yaabo, baabyekorera aha mabega.
Baakora nk'oku Musa abaragiire; baashaba Abanyamisri ebintu by'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu n'eby'okujwara.
MUKAMA yaaha abantu okukundwa Abanyamisri, baikiriza kubaha ebi baabaire nibabashaba byona. Okwo nikwo baanyagire Abanyamisri.
Abaisraeli baaruga Rameseesi, baahika Sukoosi, abashaija nk'obusiriira mukaaga nibagyendesa ebigyere, otabariiremu bakazi n'abaana.
Kandi omutwe muhango gw'ebijwangye by'abantu bainamuka, baagyenda nabo n'amatungo maingi munonga g'entaama n'ag'ente.
Baateeka emigaati etatumbisiibwe omu isyanga eri baihire Misri, ahakuba rikaba ritatumbisiibwe; ahabw'okuba bakabingwa omuri Misri, tibaabaasa kwetwara n'obu kwakuba okwekomera entanda.
Aha kiro eki egyo myaka magana ana na makumi ashatu yaahikiireho, ahari ekyo kiro kyonka amahe goona aga MUKAMA gakaruga omuri Misri.
Ekyo kiro nikyo MUKAMA yaaraire naareeba abantu be, ngu abone kubaiha omu nsi ya Misri; n'ahabw'ekyo ekiro ekyo kishemereire kwijukwa Abaisraeli boona ahari MUKAMA omu busingye bwabo bwona.
kwonka omuhuuku weena oguzirwe empiiha naikirizibwa kukuryaho, mwaherize kumushara.
Omushuhuuki n'orikukorera ebihembo tarikwikirizibwa kukuryaho.
Kuryaguma kuriirwe omu nju emwe; otarishohoza akanyama koona aheeru y'enju; kandi mutarihenda eigufa ryayo.
Eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli riryaguma rikwijukye.

Omunyaihanga ku ariija kutuura naimwe, yaayenda kukwatanisa naimwe omu bugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho ahari MUKAMA, oyetwa omushaija weena omuribo asharwe, abone kwija kubutaaha; obwo aryaba nk'enzaarwa omu nsi yaanyu; kwonka omuntu weena otashazirwe atariburyaho.
Enzaarwa n'omunyaihanga obatwiremu baryategyekwa ekiragiro kimwe.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli boona baakozire; nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa na Arooni, nikwo baatwarize.
Ahari ekyo kiro kyonka MUKAMA akaiha Abaisraeli omu nsi ya Misri, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Munyereze emijigaijo yoona; ekiigura-nda kyona omu Baisareli, yaaba mu bantu nari omu matungo, n'ekyangye.

Musa yaagambira abantu ati: Muryaguma mwijukye eizooba eri, eri mwarugiireho Misri, omu nju y'obuhuuku; ahakuba MUKAMA akabaiha omu mwanya ogwo n'omukono gw'amaani; hatarigira omugaati gwona ogutumbisiibwe ogwariibwa.
Eizooba eri ery'omu kwezi Abibu niryo mwaza kurugiramu.

Kandi MUKAMA ku arikuhitsya omu nsi y'Abanyakanaani, n'Abahiiti n'Abaamori n'Abahiivi n'ey'Abayebusi, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki, ei yaagambiire baashwenkuru naarahira kugikuha, oryaguma oijukye kukora omugyenzo ogu omu kwezi oku.
Oryamara ebiro mushanju noorya emigaati etatumbisiibwe; kandi aha kiro kya mushanju haryabaho obugyenyi bw'ekiro kikuru kya MUKAMA.
Omuri ebyo biro mushanju muryaguma nimurya emigaati etatumbisiibwe; mutarireebwa mwine omugaati gwona ogutumbisiibwe, n'obu kyakuba ekitumbisa kyona, omu nsi yaanyu yoona.
Kandi ahari eryo izooba oryagambira omwana waawe oti: Eki ninkikora ahabw'eki MUKAMA yankoreire, obu naaruga omuri Misri.
Kandi kiryakubeera akamanyiso aha mukono gwawe, n'ekiijutsyo ahagati y'amaisho gaawe, ekiragiro kya MUKAMA kirekye kukuruga omu kanwa; ahakuba MUKAMA akakwiha omuri Misri n'omukono gw'amaani.
N'ahabw'ekyo oryaguma oijukye omugyenzo ogu omu bunaku bwagwo buri mwaka.
Kandi MUKAMA ku arikuhitsya omu nsi ya Kanaani, yaagikuha, nk'oku yaaraganiise na baashwenkuru naarahira,
oryashoroorera MUKAMA ekiigura-nda kyona. Emijigaijo yoona ey'omu matungo gaawe, ekyetwa ekishaija kyona, kiryaba ekya MUKAMA.
Omujigaijo gwona ogw'endogoya oryagucunguza omwana gw'entaama; ku oriba otarikwenda kugucungura, oryaguhenda ebitsya; kandi emijigaijo yoona ey'abantu omu baana baawe oryagicungura.

ahakuba Faraho akaba agangaire, ayangire kuturekura, MUKAMA yaita emijigaijo yoona omu nsi ya Misri, ey'abantu n'ey'amatungo. Nikyo ntambirira MUKAMA ebiigura-nda byona, ebyetwa ebishaija; kwonka emijigaijo yoona omuri batabani bangye, nkagicungura.
Eki kiryaba akamanyiso aha mukono gwawe, n'ekiijutsyo aha buso bwawe; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akatwiha omuri Misri n'omukono gw'amaani.
Kureka Ruhanga akabakiikuura omu muhanda ogw'omu ihamba aha rubaju rw'Enyanja erikutukura. Abaisraeli baaruga Misri, bahagatiire eby'okurwanisa.
Musa yaatwara amagufa ga Yosefu; ahabw'okuba Yosefu akaba arahiize Abaisraeli naabahamiza ati: Buzimazima Ruhanga aryabataayaayira; naimwe muryaiha amagufa gangye omu nsi egi, mugagyendane.
Baaruga Sukoosi, baateera amahema Esamu aha munwa gw'eihamba.
MUKAMA akaba abeebembera nyomushana ari omu nyomyo y'ekicu, ngu abahabure, kandi nyekiro omu nyomyo y'omuriro, ngu abamurikire, babone kugyenda nyomushana na nyekiro.
Egyo nyomyo y'ekicu nyomushana, kandi ey'omuriro nyekiro, ekaba etabaruga mumaisho.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli bagarukye enyima, bateere amahema omu maisho ga Pihahiroosi ahagati ya Migidooli n'enyanja, omu maisho ga Baalizefooni; muteere amahema ahashungaine naho aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Kandi Faraho naija kugamba aha Baisraeli ati: Bashobereirwe omu nsi, eihamba ribatangire.
Naanye niinyija kugangaaza omutima gwa Faraho, abakurate; nyetungire ekitiinisa ahari Faraho n'aha ihe rye ryona, Abanyamisri baamanye ku ndi MUKAMA. Abaisraeli baakora batyo.

Baagambira omugabe wa Misri ku Abaisraeli bacwire; omutima gwa Faraho n'ey'abaheereza be yaahinduka, baayefuuza ahabwabo, nibagira bati: Beitu eki, tukozire ki, okwikiriza Abaisraeli kugyenda bakareka kutukorera?
Yaatebeekanisa ekigaari kye eky'okurwanisa, yaagyenda n'engabo ze;
yaatwara ebigaari magana mukaaga ebitoorainwe, n'ebindi bigaari bya Misri byona eby'okurwanisa, buri kimwe n'omukuru waakyo.
MUKAMA yaagangaaza omutima gwa Faraho omugabe wa Misri, yaakurata Abaisraeli; ahakuba Abaisraeli bakaruga Misri nibeemurika.

Abanyamisri baabakurata n'embaraasi n'ebigaari bya Faraho byona, n'ab'aha mbaraasi n'engabo ze, baabahika, baashanga bateire amahema haihi n'enyanja aha rubaju rwa Pihahiroosi, ahashungaine na Baali-zefooni.
Baagambira Musa bati: Beitu shi, ebituuro bikaba bibuzire omuri Misri, waaza kutureeta kugwa omu ihamba? Eki okatukorera ki, okutwiha omuri Misri?
Eki tikyo twakugambiire, obu twabaire tukiri Misri tuti: Fa okutureka, tugume tukorere Abanyamisri? Haakiri tukorera Abanyamisri okukira okugwa omu ihamba.
Musa yaagambira abantu ati: Mutatiina mwemerere muhamire, haza mureebe okujunwa oku MUKAMA araabareetere eri izooba; ahakuba Abanyamisri abu murikureeba eri izooba, timurigaruka kubareeba bundi.
MUKAMA niwe araabarwanirire; ekyanyu n'okwemerera kwonka.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Ahabw'enki nontakira? Gambira Abaisraeli bagumizemu bagyende.
Naiwe oyereeze enkoni yaawe, ogorore omukono gwawe aha nyanja, ogibaganise, Abaisraeli barabe ahagati y'enyanja aha itaka ryomire.
Naanye niinyija kugangaaza emitima y'Abanyamisri bazemu babakurate, nyetungire ekitiinisa ahari Faraho n'aha ihe rye ryona n'aha bigaari bye n'aha bantu be ab'aha mbaraasi.
Kandi Abanyamisri nibaija kumanya ku ndi MUKAMA, ku ndaaheze kwetungira ekitiinisa ahari Faraho n'ebigaari bye n'aha bantu be ab'aha mbaraasi.
Bwanyima maraika wa Ruhanga, owaabaire ayebembera eihe ry'Abaisraeli, yaarugayo, yaabaza enyima; n'enyomyo y'ekicu yaabaruga omumaisho, yaabeemerera enyima,

yaaza ahagati y'eihe ry'Abanyamisri n'ery' Abaisraeli. Aha rubaju rwa bari egyo nyomyo yaaba ekicu n'omwirima, kwonka aha rubaju rwa banu yaabamurikira nyekiro; n'ahabw'ekyo bari tibaabaasa kuhika banu ekyo kiro kyona.
Abaisraeli baaza ahagati y'enyanja aha itaka ryomire, amaizi gaaba nk'ekisiika aha rubaju rwabo orwa buryo n'orwa bumosho.
Abanyamisri baabakurata; embaraasi za Faraho zoona n'ebigaari bye n'abantu be ab'aha mbaraasi baaza ahagati y'enyanja babakuratiire.
Omu itumbi ahu abarinzi abarikuhitsya omu kasheeshe batandikira, MUKAMA yaayema omu nyomyo y'omuriro n'ekicu, yaareeba eihe ry'Abanyamisri, yaabahahaaza emitima.
Yaashayisa enziga z'ebigaari byabo, byarema eikurura; Abanyamisri nikwo kugira bati: Murekye tuhungye Abaisraeli; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe arikubarwanira n'Abanyamisri.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Gorora omukono gwawe aha nyanja, amaizi gagarukye, gashwekye Abanyamisri n'ebigaari byabo n'abantu baabo ab'aha mbaraasi.

Musa yaagorora omukono gwe aha nyanja; ku bwabaire nibutaagurukana, enyanja yaagaruka omu maani gaayo nk'oku eshangwa etuura; Abanyamisri omu kuhunga baabugabugana nayo; MUKAMA yaabinga Abanyamisri, baakunkumukira omuri egyo nyanja.
Amaizi gaagaruka, gaashweka ebigaari n'ab'aha mbaraasi n'eihe ryona erya Faraho, eryagiire omu nyanja ribakuratiire; tihaatsigaraho n'omwe aharibo.
Kwonka Abaisraeli bo omu kuraba omuri egyo nyanja bakaraba ahoomire; amaizi gaaba nk'ekisiika aha rubaju rwabo orwa buryo n'orwa bumosho.
Kandi Abaisraeli baareeba omurimo muhango ogu MUKAMA yaakozire aha Banyamisri; abantu baatiina MUKAMA; kandi baikiriza MUKAMA n'omugaragwa we Musa.
Niinyeshongorera MUKAMA, ahakuba asingwire n'ekitiinisa; Embaraasi n'ogitembire abinagire omu nyanja.
Kandi ahindukire okujunwa kwangye.
Ogu niwe Ruhanga wangye, nimmuhimbisa;
Ruhanga wa tata; nimmuha ekitiinisa.
MUKAMA niryo iziina rye.
Ebigaari bya Faraho n'eihe rye abinagire omu nyanja;
Abakuru b'engabo ze abatoorainwe barohamire omu
Nyanja erikutukura.
Amaizi g'ahagati y'enyanja gabashwekire; baakyengyera okuzimu nk'eibaare.
MUKAMA, omukono gwawe gwa buryo gwine ekitiinisa ahabw'obushoboorozi bwagwo;
MUKAMA, omukono gwawe ogwa buryo gusheenyagura abazigu.
Oyohereza ekiniga kyawe, kibasiriiza nk'ebitsintsi by'embuba.
Omwitsyo gw'amaani ogw'omu nyindo zaawe gutuumire hamwe amaizi,
Amaizi agaaba nigagyenda gaayetuuma hamwe omutuumo;
Okuzimu omunda y'enyanja haakwata.
Abazigu bagizire bati: Ka tubakurate, tubakwate,
Tubagane eminyago, tubeemarireho akaturi aha mutima;
Nitwija kusyorayo zaarurara zaitu, emikono yaitu ebacwekyereze.
Waareeta omuyaga gwawe, enyanja yaabashweka;
Baarohama nka rusasi omu maizi maingi ag'amaani.
N'oha ori nkaiwe, iwe orikuhimbisibwa ahabw'okwera kwawe,
Ow'okutiinwa ahabw'eby'ekitiinisa n'eby'okutangaaza, ebi okora?
Ogoroire omukono gwawe ogwa buryo,
Ensi yaabamira.
Iwe ahabw'embabazi zaawe oyebembeire abantu baawe abu ocungwire,
Waabeebembera n'amaani gaawe kubahitsya omu mwanya gwawe ogurikwera.
Abatwire Filistia baagira obujune.
Hati abatware ba Edomu nibatangaara;
Emanzi za Moabu nizitetema;
Abatwire omuri Kanaani boona emitima ebahweire omunda.
Ahabw'obukuru bw'omukono gwawe tibarikwehiga, ni nk'eibaare,
Okuhitsya obu abantu baawe baraarabeho,
Okuhitsya obu abantu abu waayeguriire baraarabeho.
Oryabahitsya omu nsi egyo, obabyare aha rushozi rw'obuhunguzi bwawe,
Omwanya, ogu waayeshemereize kutuuramu, ai MUKAMA,
Omwanya Ogurikwera, ogu waahamize n'emikono yaawe.
MUKAMA aryaguma aha ngoma ebiro byona.

Embaraasi za Faraho ku zaagiire omu nyanja n'ebigaari bye n'abantu be ab'aha mbaraasi, MUKAMA yaagarura amaizi g'enyanja, gaabashweka; kwonka Abaisraeli bo bakaraba ahagati y'enyanja aha itaka ryomire.
Bwanyima Miriamu nabikazi, munyaanya wa Arooni, yaatwara ekitaasa; n'abakazi boona baagyenda bamukuratiire, baine ebitaasa nibazina.
Miriamu yaabebeembera, naagira ati:
Mweshongorere MUKAMA, aha kuba asingwire n'ekitiinisa,
Embaraasi n'ogitembire abinagire omu nyanja.
Musa yaayebembera Abaisraeli okuruga aha Nyanja erikutukura, baagyenda, baahika omu ihamba rya Shuuri, baarimaramu ebiro bishatu nibagyenda, babuzire amaizi.
Ku baahikire Maara, tibaabaasa kunywa maizi gaayo, ahakuba gakaba nigashaarira; nikyo haayeteirwe Maara.
Abantu baayetomboitera Musa, nibagira bati: Tunywe ki?
Musa yaatakira MUKAMA; MUKAMA yaamworeka ekiti, yaakinaga omuri ago maizi, amaizi gaanura.
Aho niho MUKAMA yaabaheereire ekiragiro n'omugyenzo ogu yaataireho; kandi niho yaabagyereize,

naagira ati: Ku oryezirika kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, waakora ebihikire omu maisho ge, waatega amatu ebiragiro bye, waarinda byona ebi yaataireho, tindikureetaho ndwara n'emwe ahari ezo ezi naareetsire aha Banyamisri; ahakuba niinye MUKAMA orikukutambira endwara.
Bwanyima baahika Elimu, ahu enshuro z'amaizi ikumi na ibiri n'emikindo makumi mushanju byabaire biri; baateera amahema aha rubaju rw'ago maizi.
Eihanga ryona ey'Abaisraeli baaruga Elimu, baahika omu ihamba rya Siini, eriri ahagati ya Elimu na Sinai aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano eky'okwezi kwa kabiri, baherize kuruga omu nsi ya Misri.
Eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli baayetomboitera Musa na Arooni omu ihamba,

nibagira bati: Nangwa kuri twaitsirwe omukono gwa MUKAMA, tukiri omu nsi ya Misri, obu twabaire tushutama aha nyungu z'enyama, tukarya emigaati, tukahaaga. Mbwenu mukatwihayo, mwatureeta omuri eri ihamba kwitsa eri ihanga ryona enjara.
Kandi ahari buri kiro kya mukaaga baryayeteguura eby'okutwara omuka, biingane n'ebi batorotoora buri izooba kabiri.
Musa na Arooni baagambira Abaisraeli boona bati: Omu mwabazyo nimwija kumanya ku owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri ari MUKAMA;
kandi omu kasheeshe nibwo murikwija kureeba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA, ahabw'okuba ahuriire ebi murikumwetomboitera. Mbwenu itwe turi baahi, abu murikwetomboitera?

Musa yaagaruka yaabagira ati: MUKAMA ku araabahe enyama y'okurya omu mwabazyo, n'omu kasheeshe yaabaha omugaati mwahaaga; niho muraamanyire ku ahuriire okwetomboita kwanyu oku murikumwetomboitera. Mbwenu itwe turi baahi? Tiitwe murikwetomboitera, kureka nimwetomboitera MUKAMA.
Musa yaagambira Arooni ati: Gambira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli oti: Mwirire haihi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ahakuba ahuriire ebi murikwetomboita.
Arooni ku yaabaire naaki gambira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli, baanaga amaisho omu ihamba, baareeba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA nikireebekyera omuri kiri kicu.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Mpuriire okwetomboita kw'Abaisraeli; bagambire oti: Omu mwabazyo nimwija kurya enyama, kandi omu kasheeshe nimwija kurya eby'okurya muhaagye; haza mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Orume ku rwakyeire, Aha nsi omu ihamba haareebeka otuntu tukye twekuringiriire, nk'amatondo g'orume rw'embeho.
Abaisraeli ku baatureebire, baabuuzana bati: Ebi n'enki? ahakuba tibarabimanyire. Musa yaabagira ati: Ebyo nibyo by'okurya ebi MUKAMA abahaire kurya.
Eki nikyo MUKAMA arikubaragiira, naagira ati: Mutorotoore, buri muntu nk'okurya kwe oku kuri, omuntu weena homeri emwe nk'omubaro gw'abantu baanyu oku guri; buri muntu abitwarire ab'omu ihema rye.
Abaisraeli baakora batyo, abamwe baatorotoora bingi, n'abandi bikye.
Bwanyima ku baabirengire omuri homeri, owaashangurwize bingi, tiyaashaazyaho; n'owaashangurwize bikye, tiyaakyaakina. Buri muntu yaatorotoora nk'okurya kwe oku kwabaire kuri.
Kandi Musa yaabagira ati: Hatagira omuntu owaabiraazaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Beitu kwonka tibaamuhurira; abamwe aharibo baabiraazaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, byagiibwamu enyogori, byanuuka. Musa yaabagirira ekiniga.
Okuruga aho baaguma nibatorotoora buri kasheeshe, nk'okurya kwa buri muntu oku kwabaire kuri; omushana gukijwa, bihwerera.
Aha kiro kya mukaaga baatorotoora eby'okurya ebirikwingana na biri kabiri, buri muntu homeri ibiri; abakuru b'eihanga boona baija, baabigambira Musa.

Yaabagarukamu ati: Okwo nikwo MUKAMA agizire ati: Nyencakare n'eizooba rikuru ry'okuruhuukiraho, sabato eyereziibwe MUKAMA; mwotsye ebi murikwenda kwotsya; muteekye ebi murikwenda kuteeka; ebiraashaagye byona mubibiikye okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Baabiraaza, byahitsya omu kasheeshe, nk'oku Musa yaaragiire, tibyanuuka, n'obu kwakuba okugiibwamu enyogori n'emwe.
Musa yaabagira ati: Ebyo mube nibyo mwarya eri izooba, ahakuba eri izooba ni sabato ahari MUKAMA; eri izooba timurikwija kubibona omu ishwa.
Muryaguma nimubitorotoora okumara ebiro mukaaga; kwonka aha kiro kya mushanju, niyo sabato, tibirireebeka.
Bwanyima aha kiro kya mushanju abantu bamwe baashohora, baaza kutorotoora, tibaabibona.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Muryahitsya hi okwanga kworobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naaragiire?

Mumanye ngu MUKAMA akabaha sabato, n'ahabw'ekyo aha kiro kya mukaaga nikyo abaheera eby'okurya by'okumara amazooba abiri; omuntu weena agume omu mwanya gwe; hatarigira omuntu weena owaaruga omu mwanya gwe aha kiro kya mushanju.
N'ahabw'ekyo abantu baaruhuuka aha kiro kya mushanju.
Eby'okurya ebyo ab'enju ya Israeli baabyeta Emaanu; ekaba neeyera nk'enjuma z'obunyaatsi oburikwetwa gaadi; kandi neenura nk'omugaati ogukoreirwemu obwoki.

Musa yaagira ati: Eki nikyo MUKAMA arikubaragiira, naagira ati: Encuro ya homeri emwe ebiikwe ahabwa baijukuru baanyu ab'obusingye oburiija, nyentsya bareebe eby'okurya ebi naabaire mbariisiza omu ihamba, obu naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri.
Musa yaagira Arooni ati: Twara orwabya, orutemu homeri y'emaanu, orubiikye omu maisho ga MUKAMA, emaanu egyo ebiikwe ahabwa baijukuru baanyu ab'obusingye oburiija.
Atyo Arooni yaagibiika omu maisho g'Ebirikuhamya, ngu egumeho, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Kandi Abaisraeli bakamara emyaka makumi ana nibarya emaanu, okuhitsya obu baahikire omu nsi etwirwemu abantu; baagumizamu nibarya emaanu okuhitsya obu baahikire aha myatano y'ensi ya Kanaani.
Kandi homeri emwe ekaba eri ekicweka kya ikumi kya

Eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli ryaruga omu ihamba rya Siini, baagyenda nibaraarira nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaire abaragiira. Ku baahikire Refidimu, baateerayo amahema; kwonka abantu baaburayo amaizi g'okunywa.
N'ahabw'ekyo abantu baatonganisa Musa nibagira bati: Tuhe amaizi g'okunywa. Musa yaabagira ati: Nimuntonganisiza ki? Ahabw'enki nimugyeza MUKAMA?
Abantu baagirirayo eiriho, baayetomboitera Musa nibagira bati: Okatwihira ki Misri kutwitsa eiriho, itwe n'abaana baitu n'amatungo gaitu?
Musa yaatakira MUKAMA, naagira ati: Abantu aba mbagire nta? Bari hakye kunteera amabaare.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Raba omu maisho g'abantu, otware abamwe aha bakuru b'Abaisraeli, otware n'enkoni, ei waateire omugyera guri, ogyende.
Reeba, niinyija kwemerera omu maisho gaawe aha rukiri rw'ahari Horebu; oteere orwo rukiri, harugyemu amaizi, abantu banywe. Musa yaakora atyo omu maisho g'abakuru b'Abaisraeli.
Omwanya ogwo yaagweta
Musa yaagambira Yoshua ati: Tutooranire engabo, mugyende murwanise Abaamaleki; nyencakare niinyija kwemerera aha mutwe gw'ekibungo, nkwaitse enkoni ya Ruhanga omu ngaro.
Yoshua yaakora nk'oku Musa amuragiire, yaarwanisa Abaamaleki; Musa na Arooni na Huuri bainamuka, baahika aha mutwe gw'ekyo kibungo.
Musa ku yaabaire aimutsya omukono, Abaisraeli babinga; akigugwisa, Abaamaleki babinga.

Kwonka emikono ya Musa yaaruha; baareeta eibaare, baarita ahansi ye, yaarishutamaho; Arooni na Huuri baaramira emikono ye, omwe aha rubaju rumwe n'ondi aha rundi; emikono ye yaahama okuhitsya obu eizooba ryarengire.
Yoshua yaasingura Amaleki n'engabo ze na rurara.
Kandi Musa yaayombeka eitambiro, yaaryeta
yaagira ati: MUKAMA yaarahira ku ariguma naarwanisa Abaamaleki, nk'oku obusingye burigyenda nibwihaihana.
Yesero omunyamurwa wa Midiani, ishezaara wa Musa, akahurira byona ebi Ruhanga yaakoreire Musa n'abantu be Abaisraeli, kandi n'oku yaihire Abaisraeli omuri Misri.
Kandi Yesero, ishezaara wa Musa, akaba atwaire Zipora muka Musa, ou Musa yaabaire ayohereizeyo n'abatabani bombi.
Eiziina ry'omwe akaba ari Gereshomu, (ahakuba ishe akagira ati: Nkaba ndi omushuhuuki omu nsi etari yaitul;
n'ondiijo akaba naayetwa Eliezeeri, lahakuba ishe akagira ati: Ruhanga wa taata akambeera Omuhwezi, yankiza rurara ya Faraho.)
Yesero ishezaara wa Musa yaareetera Musa abatabani n'omukazi we, yaamushanga omuri eryo ihamba, ahu yaabaire ari omu rusiisira aha rushozi rwa Ruhanga.
Yaagambira Musa ati: Nyowe shozaara Yesero naakureetera omukazi waawe na batabani be bombi.
Musa yaashohora kubugana ishezaara, yainama omu maisho ge, yaamunywegyera; baabuuzana oku barikuraara; baataaha omu ihema.
Musa yaateekyerereza ishezaara byona ebi MUKAMA yaakozire ahari Faraho n'Abanyamisri ahabw'Abaisraeli, n'enaku zoona ezi baareebire omu muhanda, kandi n'oku MUKAMA yaabakirize.
Yesero yaashemererwa ahabw'ebirungi byona ebi MUKAMA yaakoreire Abaisraeli, ahabw'okubajuna omu mikono y'Abanyamisri.
Yesero yaagira ati: MUKAMA owaabakirize Abanyamisri na Faraho ahimbisibwe!
Mbwenu naamanya ku MUKAMA arikukira baaruhanga abandi boona, ahakuba akaiha abantu omu mikono y'Abanyamisri, obu baabaire nibabaita kubi babaineho amaryo.
Yesero ishezaara wa Musa yaatwara ekitambo ky'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo by'okutambira Ruhanga; Arooni n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli boona baija kuriira hamwe na ishezaara wa Musa omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Ku bwaseesire, Musa yaashutama kucwera abantu emanja; abantu baayemerera beehinguririize Musa okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.

Ishezaara wa Musa ku yaareebire byona ebi arikukorera abantu, yaagira ati: Eki eki orikukorera abantu niki? Ahabw'enki nooshutama wenka, abantu boona bakakwehinguririza okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu mwabazyo?
Musa yaagarukamu ishezaara ati: N'ahabw'okuba abantu nibaija ahariinye, ngu mbabuurize ahari Ruhanga.
Omuntu na mutaahi we ku baba baine eki barikufa, baija ahariinye, mbaramura, kandi mbamanyisa ebiragiro bya Ruhanga n'ebi arikuragiira.
Ishezaara wa Musa yaamugira ati: Eki eki orikukora ti kirungi.
Noija kwomera ahaiguru, iwe n'aba bantu abu oine; ahakuba omurimo ogu nigukukira; torikubaasa kugukora wenka.
Mbwenu hurira eki ndikukugambira, nkuhe obwengye; kandi Ruhanga agume naiwe. Obe niiwe waaguma noohikira abantu ahari Ruhanga, kandi ogume obahikizeyo emanja zaabo;
kandi oryabeegyesa ebiragiro n'ebi Ruhanga arikuragiira, oboorekye oku bashemereire kutwaza n'ebi bashemereire kukora.

Kandi otoorane omu bantu boona abashaija b'oburyo, abarikutiina Ruhanga, ab'amazima, kandi abarikwanga enguzi; abantu nk'abo obateho bategyekye abantu, abamwe bategyekye buri omwe rukumi, abandi igana, abandi ataano, n'abandi ikumi;

babe nibo baaguma nibacwera abantu emanja obutoosha. Orubanja orugumire rwona baryarukureetera, kwonka emanja ezoorobi babe nibo baazicwa; obwo nibwo oryanguhirwa, nabo bakaguma nibakwatanisa naiwe oburemeezi.
Ku oraakore ekigambo ekyo, kandi Ruhanga yaaba niwe yaakikuragiira, obwo oryabaasa kugumaho, kandi n'aba bantu baryaguma nibagaruka owaabo n'obusingye.
Musa yaahurira ebigambo bya ishezaara, yaakora ebi yaamugambira byona.
Yaatoorana omu Baisraeli boona abashaija b'oburyo, yaabahindura abakuru b'abantu, abamwe kutegyeka buri omwe rukumi, abandi igana, abandi ataano n'abandi ikumi.
Baaguma nibacwera abantu emanja obutoosha; emanja ezigumire bazireetera Musa, kwonka ezoorobi zoona bazeemarira.
Bwanyima Musa yaaraga ishezaara, yaagaruka owaabo.
Omu kwezi kwa kashatu Abaisraeli baherize kuruga omu nsi ya Misri, aha kiro eki okwezi okwo kwabonekyeireho, bakahika omu ihamba rya Sinai.
Ku baarugire Refidimu, baahika omu ihamba rya Sinai, baateera amahema omuri eryo ihamba; kandi Abaisraeli baaguma omu rusiisira omu maisho g'orushozi.
Musa yainamuka ahari Ruhanga, MUKAMA yaamweta naayema aha rushozi, yaagira ati: Oku nikwo oraagambire enju ya Yakobo, noogambira Abaisraeli, oti:
Mukareeba ebi naakozire Abanyamisri, kandi naimwe oku naabatwariire aha mapapa nk'empungu, nkabareeta ahariinye.
N'ahabwekyo ku murihurira eiraka ryangye, mwarinda endagaano yangye, muryaba abantu bangye ahabwangye abatoorainwe omu mahanga goona; ahakuba ensi yoona n'eyangye;
kandi muryambeera obukama bw'abanyamurwa n'eihanga eririkwera. Ebyo nibyo bigambo ebi oraagambire Abaisraeli.
Musa yaija, yaayeta abakuru b'abantu, yaata omu maisho gaabo ebigambo ebyo byona ebi MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Abantu boona baagarukiramu hamwe, nibagira bati: Byona ebi MUKAMA yaagamba, nitwija kubikora. Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ebigambo ebyo ebi abantu baagamba.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Reeba, niinyija ahariiwe omu kicu kikwaitse, ngu abantu bahurire ningamba naiwe, babone kukwikiriza ebiro byona. Bwanyima Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ebigambo by'abantu.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Irooko oze omu bantu, obeeze eri izooba na nyencakare, boozye ebijwaro byabo,
aha kiro kya kashatu bashangwe beeteekateekire; ahakuba ahari ekyo kiro kya kashatu MUKAMA naija kushuuma aha rushozi Sinai omu maisho g'abantu boona.

Oteereho abantu obugarukiro okwehinguririza orushozi, obagire oti: Mwerinde, mutainamuka aha rushozi, n'obu kwakuba okukora aha bugarukiro bwarwo; omuntu weena oraakore aha rushozi, buzimazima naija kwitwa;

kandi hatagira omuntu weena owaamukoraho, kureka bamwitse amabaare, nari bamurashe; n'obu eraabe enyamaishwa nari omuntu, atagumaho. Enzamba ku eraagambe akasirikiriro, bainamukye, bahikye aha rushozi.
Bwanyima Musa yaashuuma orushozi, yaaza omu bantu, yaabeeza, baayozya ebijwaro byabo;
yaagambira abantu ati: Ekiro kya kashatu kishangye mweteekateekire; mutagira obu muhikire abakazi baanyu.

Ku bwaseesire aha kiro kya kashatu, enkuba zaahinda, emirabyo yaatyankana, ekicu kikwaitse kyaija ahari orwo rushozi, eiraka ry'enzamba ryagamba munonga, abantu boona, abaabaire bari omu rusiisira, baatetema.
Musa yaashohoza abantu omu rusiisira kubugana Ruhanga, baayemerera ahansi y'orushozi.
Orwo rushozi Sinai rwona rwacumba omwika, ahakuba MUKAMA akarushuumaho naizira omu muriro; omwika gwagwo gwacumbuuka nk'ogw'ekikoomi, orushozi rwona rwatengyeta munonga.
Eiraka ry'enzamba ku ryayeyongyeire kugamba munonga, Musa yaagamba, MUKAMA yaamugarukamu n'eiraka.
MUKAMA yaashuuma aha rushozi Sinai, aha mutwe gwarwo, yaayeta Musa kwinamuka aha mutwe gw'orwo rushozi; Musa yainamuka.
