MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Irooko oshuume, oyehanangirize abantu, batakaayoga aha bugarukiro kuhika ahu MUKAMA ari kumushamaarira, baingi omuribo bakacwekyerera.
Kandi n'abanyamurwa abairira haihi MUKAMA beeyeze, MUKAMA atakaabagwaho.
Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ati: Abantu tibarikubaasa kwinamuka ahari oru rushozi Sinai; ahakuba okaturagiira oti: Oteho obugarukiro okwehinguririza orushozi, orweze.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Irooko oshuume, haza oinamukye na Arooni; kwonka abanyamurwa n'abantu barekye kwoga aha bugarukiro kuhika ahu MUKAMA ari, atakaabagwaho.
Musa nikwo kushuuma, akaza ahu abantu bari, akabibagambira.
Ruhanga akagamba ebigambo ebi byona, naagira ati:
Otarigira baaruhanga abandi, nyowe ndiho.
Otaryekorera ekishushani kyona ekibaizire, n'obu kyakuba ekishushani ky'ekintu kyona ekiri ahaiguru omu iguru, nari ekiri omu nsi ahansi, nari ekiri omu maizi okuzimu;
kwonka abaana b'abarikunkunda bakoorobera ebiragiro byangye, mbagirira embabazi okuhitsya obusingye enkumi n'enkumi.
Ijuka kweza ekiro kya sabato;
omu biro mukaaga ogume okore; obe nimwo waakorera emirimo yaawe yoona;

kwonka ekiro kya mushanju niyo sabato ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; otarikoreraho omurimo gwona, iwe nari mutabani waawe, nari muhara waawe, nari omuhuuku waawe, nari omuzaana waawe, nari amatungo gaawe, nari omunyaihanga ori omu ka yaawe;
ahabw'okuba omu biro mukaaga nimwo MUKAMA yaahangiire eiguru n'ensi, enyanja n'ebirimu byona, akahuumura aha kiro kya mushanju; nikyo MUKAMA yaaheereire omugisha ekiro kya mushanju, akakyeza.
Otariiba.
Otaribeiherera mutaahi waawe.
Baagira Musa bati: Obe niiwe waagamba naitwe, nitwija kuhurira; kwonka Ruhanga arekye kugamba naitwe, tutakaafa.
Musa yaagarukamu abantu ati: Mutatiina; ahakuba Ruhanga yaija kubagyeza, ngu okutiinwa kwe kubagume omumaisho, murekye kushiisha.
Abantu baayemerera hare munonga; reero Musa we yairira haihi omwirima ndindindi, ahu Ruhanga yaabaire ari.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Oku nikwo orangambirire Abaisraeli ebi ndikubagambira nti: Imwe ahabwanyu mwayereebera oku naagamba naimwe niinyema omu iguru.
Mutaryekorera baaruhanga abandi kubamparika; baaruhanga b'efeeza nari ab'ezaabu mutaribeekorera.

Ombumbire eitambiro ry'eitaka, otambireho ebitambo byawe eby'okwotsya, n'empongano zaawe ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, entaama zaawe n'ente zaawe; omu mwanya gwona ogu eiziina ryangye ririijukirwaho, ndyaija ah' ori, nkuhe omugisha.
Kandi ku orinkorera eitambiro ry'amabaare, otaririkoresa amabaare gabaizire; ahakuba ku oriribaizisaho oti ekyoma kyawe, oryaba orihagaire.
Otarita amatembero aha itambiro ryangye kutemberaho, orekye kureebwa ojwariireho busha.
Ebi nibyo biragiro ebi oraate omu maisho gaabo.
Ku origura Omuheburaayo kuba omuhuuku waawe, akuheereze emyaka mukaaga; omu mwaka gwa mushanju agyende n'obusingye, ataine ki ayecungwize.
Ku ariba aizire wenka, agyende wenka; ku ariba aizire n'omukazi, omukazi we agyende nawe.
Mukama we ku arimushwererera omukazi, yaamuzaarira abaana b'aboojo nari ab'abaishiki, ogwo mukazi n'abaana be baryaba aba mukama we; we agyende wenka.
Kwonka ogwo muhuuku ku aryegambira butunu ati: Ninkunda mukama wangye n'omukazi wangye kandi n'abaana bangye; tindikwenda kugyenda kuruga omu buhuuku;
mukama we aryamutwara omu maisho ga Ruhanga, amwemereze aha rwigi nari aha kiti ky'omuryango, amufumure okutu n'empindu; omuhuuku ogwo agume naamukorera ebiro byona.
Ku ariba atashemeize mukama we, owaabaire amwereeteire kumushwera, amurekye acungurwe; tarigira bushoboorozi bw'okumutunza abanyamahanga, ahabw'okuba niwe ariba amureebize.
Kandi ku arimushwererera omutabani, amutwaze nka muhara we.
Ku arimuharika, atarituubya aha by'okurya bye, nari aha bijwaro bye, n'obu kwakuba okumwitira embu.
Ku ariba atamuhikiize ebyo byonshatu, aryagyenda atazimuuriirwe.
Kwonka omuntu ku ariita ondi atamugwereire, beitu kyaruga ahari Ruhanga kumugwa omu mikono, ndyakuteeraho omwanya ogu ashemereire kuhungiramu.
Omuntu ku aritaahirira mutaahi we, yaamureebya, yaamwita nkana, omwihe aha itambiro ryangye, aitwe.
Oriteera ishe nari nyina, aitwe.
Orijuma ishe nari nyina, aitwe.
Abantu ku baritongana, omwe yaateera mugyenzi we eibaare nari entomi, ataafa, kwonka yaaguma aha kishegu arwaire,
ku ariimuka, yaashotookyera aha kibango, owaamuteire atarigiibwaho orubanja, kureka arihe ebiro ebi amazire arwaire, kandi amuragurize okuhitsya obu arikira gye.
kwonka ogwo muhuuku ku arimaraho ekiro kimwe nari bibiri, tariheebwa kiheneso ahakuba ogwo muhuuku n'empiiha ze.

Abashaija ku barirwana, baasaasa omukazi oine enda, enda yaarugamu, kwonka ataagira kundi oku yaaba, owaamusaasa aryariha iba w'ogwo mukazi, nk'oku arimurihisa; kandi aryariha, nk'oku abaramuzi barisiima.
Kwonka ku arigira okundi oku yaaba, obwo amagara garyarihwa agandi,
eriisho ririhwe erindi, eriino ririhwe erindi, ekiganja kirihwe ekindi, ekigyere kirihwe ekindi,
okwotsya kuhoorerwe okundi, obuhuta buhoorerwe obundi, n'okuteerwa kuhoorerwe okundi.
Omuntu ku ariteera omuhuuku we nari omuzaana we, yaamwata eriisho, aryamurekura, arugye omu buhuuku ahabw'eryo riisho.
Kandi ku ariteera omuhuuku we nari omuzaana we, yaamuhigura eriino, aryamurekura, arugye omu buhuuku ahabw'eryo riino.
Ente ku ericumita omushaija nari omukazi, yaamwita, egyo nte baryagiitsa amabaare, kandi etaririibwa; kwonka mukama waayo atarigiibwaho orubanja.
Kwonka egyo nte ku eraabe yaabaire neecumita abantu, baagambira mukama waayo, yaayanga kugirinda, bwanyima yaita omushaija nari omukazi, egyo nte baryagiitsa amabaare, na mukama waayo bamwite.
Ku barimucwa eby'okwecunguza, ahe ebi barimucwa byona ahabw'okucungura amagara ge.
N'obu ericumita mutabani w'omuntu nari muhara w'omuntu, mukama w'ente aryatwazibwa nk'ekiragiro ekyo oku kiri.
Kandi egyo nte ku ericumita omuhuuku nari omuzaana, mukama waayo aryariha mukama waabo shekeli makumi ashatu z'efeeza, n'egyo nte bagiitse amabaare.
Omuntu ku aritsiga ekiina kyashami, nari yaarima ekiina, ataakitinda, ente nari endogoya yaakigwamu,
mukama w'ekyo kiina aryagiriha, ahe mukama waayo empiiha, kandi omutumbi gwayo guryaba ogwa mukama w'ekiina.
Ente y'omuntu ku ericumita ey'ondiijo, yaagiita, baryatunda egyo ehuriire, babagane empiiha zaayo, kandi bagarukye babagane n'eyaitwa.
Nari ku kirimanywa ngu ente egyo eshangwa ecumita, kandi mukama waayo tagirinda, aryariha endi omu mwanya gwayo, kandi omutumbi guryaba ogwa kiriha.
Omushuma ku arishangwa naafumura enju, baamuteera, yaafa, tihaine origiibwaho orubanja ahabw'eshagama ye;
kwonka ku barimwita bwaseesire, baryagiibwaho orubanja ahabw'eshagama ye.
Ekiibirwe ku barishanga akiine kikihuriire, yaaba nte, nari endogoya nari entaama, aryagiriha ibiri.

Omuntu ku aryonesa nkana omusiri gw'ondi, nari omusiri gwe ogw'emizaabibu; nari ku aritsibura amatungo ge, gaayona omusiri gw'ondiijo, aryamuriha aha bi ahingire ebirikukira oburungi, nari amurihe aha byana by'emizaabibu eby'omu musiri gwe ebirikukira oburungi.
Omuriro ku guryaka, gwakwata amahwa, gwayotsya ebiba by'engano, nari ezikyemereire, nari omusiri gwona, owaatweka ogwo muriro aryariha byona ebyasya.
Omuntu ku aribiitsya mutaahi we empiiha nari ebindi bintu, byaibirwa omu nju ye, obiibire ku ariboneka, amurihe kabiri.
Kwonka obiibire ku aribura, mukama w'enju aryairira Ruhanga haihi, kimanywe ku atarakwatsire ha bintu bya mutaahi we.

Ahakuba okuryangatanisa ekintu kyona, yaaba nte nari endogoya nari entaama, nari ekijwaro nari ekintu kyona ekibuzire, eki nyinakyo yaahamya ati: Nikyo eki; orubanja rwabo bombi ruryatonganirwa omu maisho ga Ruhanga; ou Ruhanga aricwera orubanja rukamusinga, aryariha mutaahi we kabiri.
Omuntu ku arihereka mutaahi we endogoya nari ente nari entaama, nari ekitungirwe kyona ngu akiriise, kyafa, nari kyagira oku kyaba, nari kyatwarwa hataine okireebire,
habeho okurahira MUKAMA ahagati yaabo bombi, kiherekwa ku atarakwatsire ha kintu kya mutaahi we; mukama waakyo aryaikiriza okwo kurahira, onu arekye kuriha.
Kwonka ku kiriibirwa owa kiherekwa, aryariha mukama waakyo.
Ku kiritaanyagurwa enyamaishwa, areete ekiriira kyakyo kibe eky'okuhamya ku kiri ekye; obwo taririha kitaanyagwirwe.
Omuntu ku aritiiza ekintu kyona ekya mutaahi we, kyasiisikara, nari kyafa, mukama waakyo atariho, buzimazima nyakukitiizibwa aryakiriha.
Kwonka mukama waakyo ku ariba ariho, tarikiriha. Kandi ku kiriba kiguririirwe, kiryagwana n'eki baakiguririire.
Kwonka ishe ku aryangira kimwe kumumuhingira, aryariha enjugano nk'ezi bajuga omwishiki.
Otariikiriza omurogikazi kugumaho.
Oribyama n'enyamaishwa weena, aitwe.
Mutaribonabonesa omufaakazi weena nari efuuzi.
Ku murigira eki mwabaitsa, bantakira, buzimazima ndyahurira okutaka kwabo,
ngirire imwe ekiniga kingi, mbaitse rurara; abakazi baanyu babe abafaakazi, n'abaana baanyu babe efuuzi.
Ku oriba waakwatiriziibwe omwenda gwa mutaahi waawe, otarirenzya eizooba otagumugaruriire;
ahabw'okuba nigwo ayeshweka gwonka; nikyo kijwaro ky'omubiri gwe. Noogira ngu aryayeshweka ki? Kandi ku arintakira, ndyamuhurira; ahakuba ndi omunyambabazi.
Kandi nikwo oritwaza ente zaawe n'entaama zaawe; omujigaijo gwayo guryamara ebiro mushanju na nyinagwo; aha kiro kya munaana oryaguntoijera.
Muryaba abantu abaanyereziibwe; n'ahabw'ekyo mutarirya enyama n'ekintu kyona eki enyamaishwa eriire, ekatsiga omu ishwa; muryaguma mukitambikire embwa.
Otarikurata abaingi kukora ebibi; ku oryetwa kuba mushinja, otarigwera orubaju rw'abaingi okajurira eby'okusingisiriza orubanja;
kandi otarigwera orubaju rw'omuntu, ngu ahabw'okuba n'omworo.
Ku orishanga endogoya y'orikukwanga egwire n'omutwaro, otaryehuzya, okatsiga naafa kubi atyo, kureka omuhwere kugiimutsya.
Oyetantare ekigambo kyona eky'ebishuba; kandi otariita otaine rubanja kandi ohikiriire; ahabw'okuba omubi tindimwihaho rubanja.
Otarirya enguzi, ahakuba enguzi eita amaisho g'abarikureeba, kandi ekiikamya ebigambo by'abataine rubanja.
Otariita kubi omunyaihanga, haza kunu noomanya omutima gw'omunyaihanga; ahabw'okuba naimwe mukaba muri abanyaihanga omu nsi ya Misri.
Oryamara emyaka mukaaga noohinga emisiri yaawe, kandi nooshaaruura ebi oyerizemu;
kwonka omu mwaka gwa mushanju ogirekye eraare, abooro barye ebyemerizemu; kandi ebiritsigaramu biriibwe enyamaishwa. Okwo nikwo oritwaza omusiri gwawe ogw'emizaabibu, n'ogw'emizeituuni.
Mute omutima aha bi mbagambiire byona; mutarigira obu mugambire aha maziina ga baaruhanga abandi, kandi gatarihurirwa omu kanwa kaanyu.

Oryagira obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe; omare ebiro mushanju noorya emigaati etatumbisiibwe, nk'oku naakuragiire, omu bunaku obwatairweho omu kwezi Abibu, ahakuba nikwo waarugiiremu Misri; hatarigira owaija omu maisho gangye engaro nsha.

Kandi oryagira obugyenyi bw'eigyesha ry'ebi waahingire omu misiri, nigwo muganuro gw'ebi waahendekyeire; kandi ku oriheza kushaaruura byona eby'omu misiri yaawe ebi waahendekyeire aha muheru gw'omwaka, oryagira obugyenyi bw'eishaaruura.
Oyetwa omushaija weena aryaija areebwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga kashatu omu mwaka.
Otarihonga eshagama y'ekitambo, eki ntambiirwe, hamwe n'omugaati ogutumbisiibwe; kandi ebishaju by'obugyenyi bwangye otaribiraaza okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Reeba, nintuma maraika okukwebembera, n'okukurinda omu muhanda, akakuhitsya omu mwanya ogu naakuteekateekyeire.
Omworobere, ohurire eiraka rye, otamugwisa kubi; ahakuba tarisaasira bicumuro byanyu; ahabw'okuba eiziina ryangye riri omuriwe.
Kwonka ku orihurira eiraka rye, otaireho omutima, waakora byona ebi ndikugamba, obwo ndyaba omuzigu w'abazigu baawe, n'omubisha w'ababisha baawe.
Ahakuba maraika wangye aryakwebembera, akuhitsye omu Baamori, Abahiiti, Abaperizi, Abanyakanaani, Abahiivi n'Abayebusi, mbamareho.
Otariramya baaruhanga baabo, otaribaheereza, n'obu kwakuba okutwaza nkabo; kureka oryabahwerekyerereza kimwe, n'enyomyo zaabo ez'amabaare ozisheenyagure.
Muryaheereza MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nawe aryaha eby'okurya byawe n'amaizi gaawe omugisha; kandi ndyaiha endwara omuriimwe.
Tihaine orirugwamu enda, nari oriba engumba omu nsi yaawe; kandi ndyahitsya omubaro gw'ebiro byawe.
Kandi ndyayohereza enwa, zikwebembere, nizo ziribinga Abahiivi n'Abanyakanaani n'Abahiiti omu maisho gaawe.
Kwonka tindibabinga mu maisho gaawe kuruga omu nsi omu mwaka gumwe gwonka, ensi etakaaba ekifurukwa, n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba zikakanya, zikakunyangaraza.
Kureka ndyababinga mporampora omu maisho gaawe, okuhitsya obu orikanya, okahungura ensi.

Kandi ndyakuteeraho omwatano okuruga aha Nyanja erikutukura okuhika aha Nyanja y'Abafilistia, n'okuruga aha ihamba okuhika aha mugyera Furaati; ahakuba ndyahayo abantu abatwire omu nsi egyo omu mikono yaawe, obabingye barugye omu maisho gaawe.
Otariragaana nabo endagaano n'obu kwakuba okuragaana na baaruhanga baabo.
Batariguma omu nsi yaawe, nyentsya bakakuncumuzaho; ahabw'okuba ku oriheereza baaruhanga baabo, buzimazima kiryakubeera omutego.
Musa wenka abe niwe yairira haihi MUKAMA, kwonka abandi batamwirira haihi; kandi abandi boona batainamuka nawe.
Musa yaaza omu bantu, yaabagambira ebigambo bya MUKAMA byona n'ebiragiro byona; abantu boona baagarukiramu hamwe, nibagira bati: Ebigambo byona ebi MUKAMA yaagamba, nitwija kubikora.
Musa yaahandika ebigambo bya MUKAMA byona; kandi yaimuka kare omu kasheeshe, yaayombeka eitambiro ahansi y'orushozi, n'enyomyo ikumi na ibiri, nk'enganda za Israeli ikumi na ibiri oku zaabaire ziri.
Yaatuma abatsigazi b'omu Baisraeli, baahongyera MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya, baamutambira ebitambo by'ente eby'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Musa yaabaganisa eshagama omu bicweka bibiri ebirikwingana; kimwe yaakita omu nyabya, ekindi yaakimiisiira aha itambiro.
Bwanyima yaakwata ekitabo ky'endagaano, yaakishomera abantu; nabo baagarukamu bati: Byona ebi MUKAMA yaagamba, nitwija kuguma nitubikora, kandi tubyorobere.
Musa yaatwara eshagama, yaagimiisiira abantu, naagira ati: Mureebe eshagama y'endagaano, ei MUKAMA yaaragaana naimwe, nk'ebigambo ebyo byona oku biri.
Bwanyima Musa yainamuka na Arooni na Nadabu na Abihu n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli makumi mushanju;
baareeba Ruhanga wa Israeli; ahansi y'ebigyere bye nihashusha nk'amabaare ga safiro agaariire, agarikumurinkana nk'eiguru.
Abo bakuru b'Abaisraeli Ruhanga tiyaagira ku yaabagira; kureka baamureeba, baarya, baanywa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Inamuka, onshangye aha rushozi, ogumeyo; Nyowe niinyija kukuha ebishate by'amabaare, ebiriho ebiragiro n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi mpandiikire ngu obyegyese.
Musa yaimuka na Yoshua omuheereza we, yainamuka aha rushozi rwa Ruhanga.

Ku yaabaire atakagyenzire, yaagambira abo bakuru ati: Mututegyerereze aha, okuhitsya obu turigaruka, tukabashanga aha; kandi reeba, mwatsigara na Arooni na Huuri; omuntu weena oriba aine eki arikufa, abe nibo yaareeba.
Bwanyima Musa yainamuka aha rushozi, ekicu kyarushweka.
Ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyaza aha rushozi Sinai, n'ekicu kyarushweka okumara ebiro mukaaga; aha kiro kya mushanju MUKAMA yaayeta Musa, naayema omuri ekyo kicu.
Ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kikaba nikishusha nk'omuriro ogurikurya busha aha mutwe gw'orushozi omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Musa yaataaha omu kicu, yainamuka aha rushozi; Musa yaamara ahari orwo rushozi ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisareli bandeetere emitoijo; mwakiire omutoijo ogu omuntu weena arantoijere, ayekundiire.
Egi niyo mitoijo yaabo ei muryakiira: ezaabu, efeeza, emiringa,
emyenda ya bururu n'eya bujwa n'eya karari n'eya bafuta, obwoya bw'embuzi,
empu z'empaya z'entaama zizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, empu z'engongi, embaaho z'eminyinya,
amajuta g'etabaaza, eby'emigaju eby'okuta omu majuta ag'okushukaho, n'eby'okukoramu obubaane oburikutaamirana,
amabaare agarikwetwa shohamu, n'agandi mabaare ag'okuhundisa efodi n'eky'aha kifuba.
Kandi bankorere Omwanya ogurikwera, mbone kutuura ahagati omuribo.
Nk'ebi ndikwija kukworeka byona oku biri, omuringo gw'eihema n'ogw'ebintu byaryo byona, mube nikwo mwabikora.
Baryakora eshanduukye omu munyinya; oburaingwa bwayo mikono eibiri n'ekicweka, obuhango bwayo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka, n'obwemi bwayo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.
Ogishmekye n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, ogishwekye omunda n'enyima, kandi ogyehinguririze omuguno gw'ezaabu.
Oyazye ezaabu, ogikoremu ebifunga bina, obite aha maguru gaayo ana, bibiri aha rubaju rumwe, kandi bibiri aha rundi.
Okore n'emigamba omu munyinya, ogishwekye n'ezaabu.
Ote egyo migamba omu bifunga by'omu mbaju z'eshanduukye, bagume bagiheekyese.
Emigamba egyo egume omu bifunga by'eshanduukye, etariihwamu.
Okore ekitebe ky'okusaasira omu zaabu eshemeziibwe; oburaingwa bwakyo mikono ebiri n'ekicweka, n'obuhango bwakyo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.
Kandi okore ebishushani bya baakerubi babiri omu zaabu; omu kubikora obiheeshe aha mitwe yombi ey'ekyo kitebe ky'okusaasira.
Okore ekya kerubi omwe aha mutwe gumwe, n'eky'ondi aha gundi; mubiheesherane n'ekitebe ky'okusaasira aha mitwe yaakyo yombi.
Baakerubi bashashaanure amapapa gaabo ahaiguru, bagasangize ekitebe ky'okusaasira, boorekyeraine nibareeba ekyo kitebe.
Ekitebe ky'okusaasira okite aha shanduukye, kandi omu shanduukye otemu Ebirikuhamya ebi ndikuha.

Aho niho ndiguma nimbugaabuganira naimwe, nkagamba naiwe ahari byona ebi ndikugambira kuragiira Abaisraeli, niinyema ahaiguru y'ekitebe ky'okusaasira, ahagati ya baakerubi abari aha shanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya.
Ogishwekye n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, ogiteho omuguno gw'ezaabu gugyehinguririze.
Ogikorere ebizingiti okugyehinguririza, obuhango bwabyo ekita kimwe, nabyo obiteho omuguno gw'ezaabu, gubyehinguririze.
Ogikorere ebifunga bina by'ezaabu, obite aha maguru gaayo, aha nkokora zaayo ina.
Ebifunga ebyo bize haihi n'ebizingiti, bibe eby'okutamu emigamba ey'okuheeka emeeza.
Egyo migamba ogibaije omu munyinya, ogishwekye n'ezaabu, ebe ey'okuheekyesa emeeza.
Okore enyabya zaayo n'ebikopo byayo, kandi okore emidumo yaayo n'ebakuri zaayo eby'okushukisibwa empongano; obiheeshe omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Ogume ote ahari egyo meeza emigaati ey'okumurika, ebe omu maisho gangye obutoosha.
Kigire amataagi mukaaga agarikuruga ahari ogwo mukono, ashatu aha rubaju rumwe, n'ashatu aha rundi;

aha itaagi rimwe habeho ebikopo bishatu ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, hamwe n'ekintu ekyebumburikire n'ekirabyo kyakyo; aha itaagi erindi habeho ebikopo bishatu ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, hamwe n'ekintu ekyebumburikire n'ekirabyo kyakyo; goona omukaaga nk'oku garikuruga aha mukono gw'etabaaza gabe nikwo gaaba.
Ogwo mukono gw'etabaaza gugire ebikopo bina ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, n'ebintu ebyebumburikire n'ebirabyo byabyo.
Ekintu ekyebumburikire kiheesheranwe n'omukono gw'etabaaza ahansi ya buri mataagi abiri agarikugurugaho; goona omukaaga gabe nikwo gaaba.
Ebyebumburikire n'amataagi eby'ogwo mukono bibe biheesherainwe nagwo omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Oheeshe amatabaaza gaakyo mushanju; bagume bagate ahu garikubaasa kwakira, gakahwezesa omwanya ogugari omumaisho.
Empana zaago n'otusohaani twago biryaba biheesirwe omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Ekikondo ky'amatabaaza n'ebintu byago byona biryakorwa omu zaabu eshemeziibwe ey'oburemeezi bw'etalanta emwe.
Oteho omutima kubiheesha, nooreebera aha ky'okureeberaho kyabyo, eki oyorekyeirwe aha rushozi oru.
Oburaingwa bwa buri mukingo bube mikono makumi abiri na munaana, n'obuhango bwagwo mikono ena; emikingo ebe ey'orugyero rumwe.
Emikingo etaano eteeranwe hamwe, n'endiijo etaano eteeranwe okwayo.
Obaziire obufunga bwa bururu aha mukugiro ogw'aharubaju rw'emikingo etaano ey'okubanza, n'aha mukugiro gw'aha rubaju rw'emikingo endiijo etaano.
Ote obufunga makumi ataano aha mukingo gumwe oguteeraine, n'obundi makumi ataano aha mukugiro gw'omukingo ogwa kabiri; obwo bufunga bureebane.
Kandi okore ebikwatsi by'ezaabu makumi ataano, obikwatanisise egyo mikingo; obutaaho bube bumwe.
Kandi oryakora emikingo y'obwoya bw'embuzi ey'okushakaara; okore emikingo ikumi na gumwe.
Oburaingwa bwa buri mukingo bube mikono makumi ashatu, n'obuhango bwagwo mikono ena; egyo mikingo yoona ikumi na gumwe ebe ey'orugyero rumwe.
Emikingo etaano ogiteerane okwayo; n'emikingo mukaaga okwayo ogwa mukaaga ogukube, gureereetere omu maisho g'eihema.
Kandi okore obufunga makumi ataano aha mukugiro gw'omukingo ogurikuheererukayo omu y'okubanza, n'obundi makumi ataano aha mukugiro ogw'omukingo ogurikuhereerukayo omu ya kabiri.
Okore ebikwatsi by'emiringa makumi ataano, obite omu bufunga, oteerane eihema, ribe rimwe.
Ekicweka ky'omukingo ekiraatsigare aha mikingo y'eihema, nikyo kicweka ky'omukingo ekirikushaagaho, kireereetere enyima y'obutaaho.
Mukono gumwe ogw'emikingo y'obwoya bw'embuzi ogurikushaaga aha rubaju oru n'oru aha buraingwa bw'emikingo y'eihema ereereetere aha mbaju zombi ez'obutaaho, erishwekye.
Kandi okore eby'okushweka Eihema omu mpu z'empaya z'entaama ezizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, kandi otungikyeho eky'okushakaara ekindi ekikozirwe omu mpu z'engongi.
Kandi oryabaija embaaho z'obutaaho omu munyinya, ozeemereze;
oburaingwa bwa buri rubaaho rube mikono ikumi, obuhango bwarwo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka;
okore endimi ibiri omuri buri rubaaho okuruteerana na rugyenzi rwarwo; obe nikwo waakora embaaho zoona ez'obutaaho.
Aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo oteho embaaho z'obutaaho makumi abiri,

kandi okore ebiina makumi ana omu feeza eby'okubyaramu ezo mbaaho makumi abiri; ebiina bibiri ahansi y'orubaaho rumwe ahabw'endimi zaarwo zombi, n'ebindi biina bibiri ahansi y'orundi rubaaho ahabw'endimi zaarwo.
Aha rubaju rw'obutaaho orwa kabiri, oruri aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, habeho embaaho makumi abiri,
n'ebiina byazo by'efeeza makumi ana, ebiina bibiri ahansi y'orubaaho rumwe, n'ebindi bibiri ahansi y'orundi.
Kandi okore embaaho mukaaga ahabw'orubaju rw'obutaaho orw'enyima orurikureeba oburengyerwa-izooba;
okore n'embaaho ibiri ez'enshonda z'obutaaho aha mbaju zombi ez'enyima.
Ezo mbaaho ahansi zitaane, kwonka ahaiguru ziteeranire aha mpeta ey'okubanza; zombi zibe nikwo zaaba; zibe ez'okuhamya ezo nshonda zombi.
Aho habeho embaaho munaana n'ebiina byazo by'efeeza, ebiina byona ikumi na mukaaga; ahansi y'orubaaho rumwe ebiina bibiri, n'ahansi y'orundi bibiri.
ezindi itaano ahabw'embaaho z'orundi rubaju; n'ezindi itaano ahabw'embaaho z'orubaju rw'obutaaho orw'enyima orurikureeba oburengyerwa-izooba.
Orubazi rw'ahagati y'ezindi rwogyemu, ruhikye oku n'oku.
Ezo mbaaho ozishwekye n'ezaabu, oheeshe empeta z'ezaabu ez'okurabyamu ezo mbazi; nazo ozishewkye n'ezaabu.
Oryayemereza obutaaho bushushane n'eky'okureeberaho eki oyorekirwe aha rushozi oru.
Oguhanikye aha nyomyo ez'eminyinya ina ezishwekirwe n'ezaabu, n'eby'okuhanikaho by'ezaabu; ezo nyomyo ina zibyarwe omu biina by'efeeza bina.
Omukingo ogwo oguhanikye ahansi y'ebikwatsi biri. Bwanyima ote eshanduukye y'Ebirkuhamya omunda y'omukingo; omukingo ogwo guryaba ogw'okutaanisa Omwanya ogurikwera n'Omwanya ogurikwera munonga;
Kandi ote ekitebe kiri ky'okusaasira aha shanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya omu Mwanya ogurikwera munonga.
Kandi emeeza eri ogite kunu y'omukingo; aharikureebana nayo omu butaaho oteho ekikondo ky'etabaaza, kize aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, kandi emeeza eze aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa bumosho.
Kandi oryakora omukingo gw'okukinga aha muryango gw'eihema, ogukore omu myenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya kitaani, gutariizemu amabara gacwereraine.
Kandi ogwo mukingo ogukorere enyomyo z'eminyinya itaano, ozishwekye n'ezaabu; eby'okuhanikaho byazo bibe eby'ezaabu; kandi oyazye omuringa, ogukoremu ebiina byazo bitaano.
Aha nshonda zaaryo ina oribaijeho amahembe ana; ago mahembe gabaiziranwe naryo; orishwekye n'emiringa.
Oriheeshere eby'okuyooreraho eiju ryaryo n'eby'okuriyooresa n'enyabya n'eby'okwihuza enyama n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro; ebyo bintu byaryo byona obiheeshe omu miringa.
Oriheeshere ekintu ekishobeekaine nk'ekigoye, okiheeshe omu muringa; okiheeshere ebifunga by'emiringa bina, obite aha nshonda zaakyo ina;
okite ahansi y'omuguno ogwehinguririize eitambiro, kirugye ahansi, kihikye rwagati y'eitambiro.
Kandi obaijere eitambiro emigamba omu munyinya, ogishwekye n'emiringa.
Egyo migamba yaaryo ogite omu bifunga, eze embaju zombi z'eitambiro, ebe ey'okuriheekyesa.
Oribaije omu mbaaho, omunda ribe omurangara; barikore nk'oku oryorekirwe aha rushozi oru.
Kandi oryakora ekibuga ky'Obutaaho; aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo orugo rube orw'emikingo ya kitaani, oburaingwa bwayo mikono igana aha rubaju rumwe;
orwo rugo rugire enyomyo makumi abiri, n'ebiina by'okuzitamu makumi abiri; bibe eby'emiringa; eby'okuhanikaho eby'ahari ezo nyomyo n'obufunga bwabyo bibe eby'efeeza.

Kandi n'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho orugo rube orw'emikingo, oburaingwa bwayo mikono igana; enyomyo zaarwo makumi abiri n'ebiina byazo makumi abiri bibe eby'emiringa, kandi eby'okuhanikaho eby'aha nyomyo n'obufunga bwabyo bibe eby'efeeza.
Aha rubaju rw'oburgengyerwa-izooba narwo habeyo emikingo, obuhango bwayo mikono makumi ataano; enyomyo zaayo zibe ikumi, n'ebiina byazo nabyo ikumi.
Orubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba narwo obuhango bwarwo bube mikono etaano.
Emikingo y'orugo rw'aha rubaju rumwe rw'eirembo ebe mikono ikumi n'etaano, enyomyo zaayo zibe ishatu, n'ebiina byazo nabyo bibe bishatu.
Orundi rubaju rwaryo narwo rugire orugo rw'emikingo ya mikono ikumi n'etaano; enyomyo zaayo zibe ishatu, n'ebiina byazo nabyo bibe bishatu.

Kandi eirembo ry'orwo rugo rigire omukingo gwa mikono makumi abiri obuhango, ogukozirwe omu myenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya kitaani, gutariizemu amabara gacwereraine; enyomyo zaagwo zibe ina, n'ebiina byazo bibe bina.
Enyomyo zoona ez'orwo rugo ziteebweho obufunga bw'efeeza; eby'okuhanikaho byazo bibe eby'efeeza, n'ebiina byazo bibe eby'emiringa.

Oburaingwa bw'ekibuga kyona bube mikono igana n'obukiika bwakyo mikono makumi ataano embaju zoona, n'obwemi bw'orugo bube mikono etaano; rube orw'emyenda ya kitaani, kandi ebiina by'enyomyo zaarwo bibe eby'emiringa.
Ebintu byona eby'Obutaaho n'eby'okubukoresa byona n'enkondo zaabwo zoona n'enkondo z'orugo zoona bibe eby'emiringa.
Kandi oryaragiira Abaisraeli bakureetere amajuta marungi agashekwirwe omu mizeituuni ahabw'okuhemba, gabe ag'okwatsya etabaaza obutoosha.

Omu ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu enyima y'omukingo ogukingiire Ebirikuhamya Arooni n'abatabani babe niho baaguma nibashemereza etabaaza, egume neeyakira omu maisho ga MUKAMA, okuruga omu mwabazyo okuhitsya omu kasheeshe. Kibe ekiragiro ky'ebiro byona eki Abaisraeli bashemereire kworobera omu busingye bwabo bwona.
Okorere Arooni mukuru waawe ebijwaro birikwera, bimuhaise ekitiinisa n'okureebeka gye.
Kandi ogambire boona abarikumanya munonga kubaziira, abu nyijwize omwoyo gw'obwengye, bakore ebijwaro bya Arooni okumushoroora, abone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.

Ebijwaro ebi baraakore nibyo ebi eky'aha kifuba, efodi, ekanzu yaayo, n'ekooti y'akatimba, ekikwemba n'eky'okwezirikisa; kandi bakorere Arooni mukuru waawe n'abatabani ebijwaro birikwera, babone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Batware eby'okukoresa, ezaabu, emyenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya bafuta.
Egire ebiremu bibiri aha mabega, biteerane emikugiro yaayo yombi, efodi ebone kuteeranwa.
Eky'okwezirikisa ekigikoreirweho, ekirukirwe abanyamwoga, kikorwe nkayo, kandi kirukwe omu bintu bimwe n'ebyayo, ezaabu, emyenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya kitaani.
Kandi ogire amabaare abiri agarikwetwa shohamu, ogasharureho amaziina g'abaana ba Israeli;
amaziina gaabo mukaaga ogahandiikye aha ibaare rimwe, n'amaziina g'abandi mukaaga ogahandiikye aha rindi, nk'oku barikukuratana omu bukuru bwabo.
Nk'oku omusharuzi asharura aha ibaare akamanyiso, obe nikwo waasharura ahari ago mabaare gombi amaziina g'abaana ba Israeli; ogahamise ezaabu ekwegire.
Ago mabaare ogate aha biremu bya efodi eby'aha mabega, gabe ag'okwijukiraho abaana ba Israeli; kandi Arooni aryaguma atware amaziina gaabo aha mabega ge gombi omu maisho ga MUKAMA kuba ekiijutsyo.
Okore omu zaabu ekwegire eby'okuhamya amabaare,
n'emikuufu y'ezaabu eshemeziibwe ebiri, ogikore omu zaabu ehotoire nk'omugoye guhotoire.
Okore n'eky'aha kifuba eky'okumanyisa eby'oburyo, ekikozirwe omunyamwoga; okikore nk'oku efodi ekozirwe, okikore omu zaabu, omu myenda ya bururu, omu ya bujwa, omu ya karari, n'omu ya kitaani,
kingane embaju zoona kikubiraine, oburaingwa bwakyo bube ekita, n'obuhango bwakyo nabwo ekita.
Okiteho emishorongo y'amabaare ena; omushorongo ogw'okubanza gubemu amabaare aga sarudio, topazi na barekesi,
omushorongo gwa kabiri simaragido, safiro na arimasi,
omushorongo gwa kashatu huwakinto, kalukedoni na amesuusito,
n'omushorongo ogwa kana berulo, shohamu na yasipi; goona gahamibwe omu zaabu ekwegire.
Ago mabaare garyaba ikumi n'abiri, nk'amaziina g'abaana ba Israeli oku gari; gahandiikwe nk'oku basharura akamanyiso, buri rimwe rihandiikweho eiziina ryaryo, ahabw'enganda ikumi na ibiri.
Kandi okorere eky'aha kifuba emikuufu ehotoire nk'emigoye ekozire omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Oheeshere eky'aha kifuba empeta z'ezaabu ibiri, ozite aha nshonda zombi ez'aha mutwe gwakyo,
orabye emikuufu y'ezaabu yombi omuri ezo mpeta ez'aha nshonda zombi ez'eky'aha kifuba;
emitwe yombi ey'emikuufu yombi ogikome aha by'okuhamya amabaare, obone kukikwatsa aha biremu bya efodi eby'aha mabega aha rubaju rwabyo orw'omumaisho.
Kandi okore ezindi mpeta z'ezaabu ibiri, ozite aha nshonda ibiri ez'omukugiro gw'eky'aha kifuba ogw'omunda, aha rubaju oruri haihi na efodi.
Kandi okore empeta z'ezaabu ibiri, ozite aha mukugiro gw'ahansi ogw'ebiremu bibiri eby'aha mabega omumaisho, ahu birikuteeranira n'eky'okwezirikisa efodi ekirukirwe abanyamwoga.

Kandi eky'aha kifuba bakikome aha mpeta za efodi, bakikomese otwenda twa bururu nibaturabya omu mpeta zaakyo, kibone kuza aha ky'okwezirikisa kya efodi, ekirukirwe abanyamwoga, eky'aha kifuba kirekye kuyuga kikataana na efodi.

Arooni aryaguma ajware aha mutima gwe amaziina g'abaana ba Israeli agahandiikirwe aha ky'aha kifuba eky'okumanyisa eby'oburyo, yaaba naataaha omu Mwanya ogurikwera, kuba ekiijutsyo omu maisho ga MUKAMA obutoosha.

Kandi omu ky'aha kifuba eky'okumanyisa eby'oburyo oryatamu Urimu na Tumimu, bibe biri aha mutima gwa Arooni yaaba naaza omu maisho ga MUKAMA; Arooni aryatwara orubanja rw'Abaisraeli aha mutima gwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA obutoosha.
Egire ebitsya by'okurabyamu omutwe; egire n'omutarizo ogurukire okwehinguririza ebitsya byayo, nk'oku bakora ebitsya by'ekijwaro kya kitaani, ngu etataaguka.
Aha mukugiro gwayo ogw'ahansi obaziireho ebirikushusha amakoma-mahanga ebirukire omu huuzi za bururu na bujwa na karari, bigwehinguririze; ohundemu amajugo g'ezaabu, gagyende nigaza ahagati yaabyo,
eijugo ry'ezaabu rikuratwe eikoma-mahanga, eijugo ry'ezaabu eikoma-mahanga, bityo bityo, okwehinguririza omukugiro gw'ekanzu gwona.
Arooni agume agijware, yaaba naaza kuheereza; ago majugo gagambe, yaaba naaza omu Mwanya ogurikwera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kandi naarugayo, atakaafa.
okite aha kikwemba, obikwatanise n'otwenda twa bururu, kize omu maisho g'ekyo kikwemba.

Ekyo kipande kigume aha buso bwa Arooni, kandi Arooni aryayekorera okutahikiirira kw'Abaisraeli oku barishiisha bareetsire empongano zaabo ezirikwera; kigume aha buso bwe obutoosha, zibone kwikirizibwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Ekooti oryagiruka omuri bafuta, n'ekyo kikwemba nakyo okikore omuri bafuta, kandi eky'okwezirikisa ekyo okitarizemu amabara gacwereraine.
Batabani ba Arooni obakorere ekooti n'eby'okwezirikisa n'enkofiira, okubahaisa ekitiinisa n'okureebeka gye.
Obijwekye Arooni mukuru waawe hamwe n'abatabani; kandi obashukyeho amajuta, obashoroore, obeeze, babone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Kandi obakorere empare za kitaani, bazijware, barekye kujwara busha; ezo mpare zirugye omu bwezirikiro zihikye omu bibero;

zijwarwe Arooni n'abatabani, baaba nibaza omu ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, nari baaba nibaza aha itambiro kuheereza omu Mwanya ogurikwera, batakaayereetaho orubanja, bakafa. Ekyo kiryaba ekiragiro ky'ebiro byona ahariwe n'aha baijukuru abarimukurata.
Oku nikwo oritwaza noobeeza kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamura. Oryatwara enimi nto, empaya z'entaama ibiri ezitaine kamogo,
emigaati etatumbisiibwe, otugaati twa keeki otutatumbisiibwe oturimu amajuta g'emizeituuni, na capati ezitatumbisiibwe ezisiigirweho amajuta; obikore omu saano y'engano ey'obunono;
obite omu kiibo kimwe, obireete hamwe n'egyo nimi n'ezo mpaya ibiri.
Kandi Arooni n'abatabani obareete aha muryango gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, oboozye n'amaizi.
Bwanyima oiheyo ebijwaro, ojwekye Arooni ekooti n'ekanzu ya efodi, na efodi, n'eky'aha kifuba; omuzirikye n'eky'okwezirikisa ekirukirwe abanyamwoga eky'ahari efodi;
omujwekye ekikwemba omu mutwe; aha kikwemba oteho ekirunga kirikwera.
Bwanyima oiheyo amajuta ag'okushukaho, ogamushukye aha mutwe, ogamushoroorese.
Kandi oreete n'abatabani, obajwekye ekooti;
Arooni n'abatabani obazirikye n'eby'okwezirikisa, kandi obajwekye enkofiira, obunyamurwa bube obwabo, buhamibwe ekiragiro ekitarihwaho. Okwo nikwo orishoroora Arooni n'abatabani.
Oitire enimi omu maisho ga MUKAMA aha muryango gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
otware aha shagama y'enimi, ogisiigye aha mahembe g'eitambiro n'orukumu rwawe; eshagama eraatsigareho ogishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eitambiro;
otware ebishaju byona ebishwekire amara, ekishaabo ky'aha kitugu, entsigo zombi n'ebishaju ebiziriho, obyokyeze aha itambiro.
Kwonka enyama z'egyo nimi, oruhu rwayo n'efa yaayo, obyokyeze kimwe aheeru y'orusiisira; ekyo n'ekitambo ky'ekibi.
Kandi oryareeta emwe ahari ezo mpaya z'entaama; Arooni n'abatabani bate engaro zaabo aha mutwe gwayo;
bwanyima ogiite, otware eshagama yaayo, ogishukyeere embaju zoona ez'eitambiro;
omutumbi gwayo ogucwemu ebicweka, oyozye amara gaayo n'amaguru gaayo, obiteerane n'ebindi bicweka byayo n'omutwe gwayo.
Egyo mpaya yoona ogyokyeze kimwe aha itambiro; ekyo n'ekitambo ekyokize ahari MUKAMA; kandi n'empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA, ey'ekisooroora kirungi.
Oryatwara endiijo mpaya, Arooni n'abatabani bate engaro zaabo aha mutwe gwayo.

Bwanyima ogiite, otware aha shagama yaayo, ogisiigye aha nshonga y'okutu kwa buryo kwa Arooni n'aha nshonga z'amatu ga buryo ag'abatabani, n'aha bikumu bishaija eby'engaro zaabo eza buryo, n'aha bikumu bishaija eby'ebigyere byabo ebya buryo; eshagama eraatsigareho ogishukyeere embaju zoona ez'eitambiro.

Kandi otware aha shagama ey'aha itambiro n'aha majuta ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, obimiisiire Arooni n'ebijwaro bye, n'abatabani n'ebijwaro byabo, abe oyeziibwe n'ebijwaro bye, n'abatabani n'ebijwaro byabo.

Kandi oryatwara ebishaju by'egyo mpaya n'omukira gwayo ogw'ebishaju, n'ebishaju byayo ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'ekishaabo ky'ekitugu kyayo, n'entsigo zombi n'ebishaju ebiziriho, n'ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo; ahakuba egyo n'empaya y'entaama ey'okushoroorwa kw'abanyamurwa;
otware n'omugaati gumwe, n'akagaati kamwe ka keeki akarimu amajuta na capati emwe, obiihe omu kiibo ky'emigaati etatumbisiibwe etuura omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Ebyo byona obite omu ngaro za Arooni n'abatabani, babizongazongye, ebe empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA;
bwanyima obiihe omu ngaro zaabo, obyotsye n'ekitambo ekirikwokibwa aha itambiro, kibe ekisooroora kirungi omu maisho ga MUKAMA; egyo n'empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Kandi oryatwara enkoro y'egyo mpaya y'entaama ey'okushoroorwa kwa Arooni, ogizongazongyeze omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ebe empongano ezongazongiibwe; enkoro egyo eryaba omugabo gwawe.
Kandi oyeze egyo nkoro y'empongano ezongazongiibwe, n'ekivune ky'empongano erikwihwaho ahari egyo mpaya y'entaama ey'okushoroorwa, kibe ekya Arooni n'abatabani.

Ekivune ekyo kiryaguma kibe ekya Arooni n'abatabani eki Abaisraeli bashemereire kubaha ebiro byona, ahakuba n'empongano erikwihwa omu mpongano z'Abaisraeli ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; niyo mpongano yaabo ei baihaho ahabwa MUKAMA.
Kandi ebijwaro ebirikwera ebya Arooni biryaba eby'abatabani abarimukurata, babe nibyo baashukirwamu amajuta, kandi babe nibyo baashoroorerwamu.
Omutabani oriba omunyamurwa omu mwanya gwe, aryamara ebiro mushanju naabijwara, yaaba naaza omu ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, okuheereza omu Mwanya ogurikwera.
Kandi oryatwara empaya y'entaama ey'okushoroorwa kw'omunyamurwa, oteekyere enyama yaayo omu mwanya gwona ogurikwera;
Arooni n'abatabani barye egyo nyama y'empaya y'entaama n'omugaati oguri omu kiibo, babiriire aha muryango gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Kandi barye ebyo bintu ebihongirwe ahabw'okubashoroora n'okubeeza; kwonka otari munyamurwa ataribiryaho, ahakuba n'ebirikwera.
Ku harigira enyama nari omugaati ebyatsigara aha by'okushoroora okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, oryabyotsya omu muriro; tibiririibwa, ahakuba n'ebirikwera.
Okwo nikwo oritwaza Arooni n'abatabani nka byona ebi nkuragiire oku biri; oryamara ebiro mushanju noobeeza.
Buri izooba oryahayo enimi ey'okuhonga ahabw'ekibi, ebe empongano; kandi oryayeza eitambiro, ku oriba noorihongyerera; kandi orishukyeho amajuta ahabw'okuryeza.
Oryamara ebiro mushanju noohongyerera eitambiro, nooryeza; ribe eririkwera munonga; kyona ekirikora ahari eryo itambiro kiryaba ekirikwera.
omu kasheeshe ohongye omwana gw'entaama gumwe, n'omu mwabazyo ohongye ogundi;
kandi hamwe n'ogwo mwana gw'entaama ohe ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ekya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya

Ogundi mwana gw'entaama oryaguhonga omu mwabazyo, nagwo oguhongye n'empongano y'esaano n'ey'eky'okunywa, nk'eby'omu kasheeshe, kuba ekisooroora ekirungi, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Omu busingye bwanyu bwona kiryaguma kibe ekitambo ky'okwotsya, nikitambirwa aha muryango gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ahu ndibugaabuganira naimwe, nkagamba naiwe.
Aho niho ndibugaabuganira n'Abaisraeli; kandi eryo Ihema riryayezibwa ekitiinisa kyangye.
Ndyayeza eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'eitambiro; kandi Arooni n'abatabani ndyabeeza, babone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Kandi ndyaguma omu Baisraeli, mbe Ruhanga waabo.
Nabo baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, ngu ngume omuribo. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo.
oburaingwa bwakyo kibe mukono gumwe, obuhango bwakyo nabwo mukono gumwe, kingaingane embaju zoona, obwemi bwakyo kibe mikono ebiri, kandi amahembe gaakyo gabaiziranwe nakyo.
Okishwekye n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, ahaiguru n'omu mbaju zaakyo n'aha mahembe gaakyo; kandi okiteho omuguno gw'ezaabu gukyehinguririze.
Okiheeshere ebifunga bibiri by'ezaabu, obite ahansi y'omuguno gwakyo aha mbaju zaakyo zombi, bibe eby'okutamu emigamba y'okukiheekyesa.
Egyo migamba ogibaije omu minyinya, ogishwekye n'ezaabu.
Okite omu maisho g'omukingo ogukingiire eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'okusaasira ekiri ahaiguru y'Ebirikuhamya, ahu ndiguma nimbugaabuganira naiwe.
Arooni aryayotereraho obubaane obw'emigaju erikutaamirana, abwotere buri kasheeshe, yaaba naashemeza amatabaaza;
kandi n'omu mwabazyo, Arooni yaaba naahemba amatabaaza, abwotere, bube obubaane oburiguma nibwoterwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA obutoosha omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Mutarikyotereraho obubaane obw'ogundi muringo, n'obu kyakuba ekitambo ekyokize, nari empongano y'esaano; kandi mutarikishukaho empongano yoona ey'ebyokunywa.

Rimwe omu mwaka Arooni aheere aha mahembe gaakyo eky'okurihiirira; eshagama y'empongano ey'okurihiirira ekibi abe niyo yaarihiirira eryo itambiro rimwe omu mwaka omu busingye bwanyu bwona; n'ekirikwera munonga ahari MUKAMA.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Ku oribara Abaisraeli, buri muntu areetere MUKAMA eky'okucungura amagara ge omuri orwo rubaro, abantu batakaateerwa rufu noobabara.

Eki nikyo omuntu weena, ohikire kuza omu barikubarwa, ariha; ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri kya shekeli, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku erikwingana, (shekeli emwe neingana geera makumi abiri); ekyo kicweka kya shekeli kibe eky'okuhongyera MUKAMA.
Buri muntu weena ohikire kuza omu barikubarwa, ohikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, aryaha MUKAMA eky'okuhonga ekyo;
abatungi batarirenzya aha kicweka kya shekeli, n'abooro batarikicwaho, mwaba nimuha MUKAMA eky'okurihiirira amagara gaanyu.
Oryaiha aha Baisraeli efeeza ez'okubarihiirira, ozite aha murimo gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, zibeere Abaisraeli ekiijutsyo ky'okubaijukiraho omu maisho ga MUKAMA, okurihiirira amagara gaanyu.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Oryaheesha ekinaabiro omu miringa, n'ekibunu kyakyo obe nimwo waakiheesha, kibe eky'okunaabiramu; okite ahagati y'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu n'eitambiro; kandi okitemu amaizi.
Omwo nimwo Arooni n'abatabani bariguma nibanaabira engaro zaabo n'ebigyere byabo;

baaba nibaza kutaaha omu ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, bagume banaabe amaizi batakaafa, nari baaba nibaza aha itambiro okukora omurimo gwabo gw'okwotsya empongano ey'okwotsya omu muriro ey'okuhongyera MUKAMA;
banaabe engaro zaabo n'ebigyere byabo batakaafa; kibabeere ekiragiro ky'ebiro byona, we n'oruzaaro rwe omu busingye bwabo bwona.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Otware eby'emigaju erikuhita endiijo yoona, shekeli magana ataano za sumuruna y'amaizi, shekeli magana abiri na makumi ataano z'omudarasiini ogurikutaamirana, shekeli magana abiri na makumi ataano za kaane erikutaamirana,
na shekeli magana ataano za kasiya, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri; kandi na hiini emwe y'amajuta g'emizeituuni.
Obijwanzye, bibe amajuta agarikwera ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, emigaju ejwangiibwe abanyamwoga; gabe amajuta agarikwera ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora.
Ogashukye aha ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'aha shanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya,
n'aha meeza n'ebintu byayo byona, n'aha kikondo ky'etabaaza n'ebintu byakyo, n'aha kyoterero ky'obubaane,
n'aha itambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo n'ebintu byaryo byona, n'aha kinaabiro n'ekibunu kyakyo.
Obyeze, bibe ebirikwera munonga. Ekiribikoraho kyona kiryaba ekirikwera.
Kandi ogashukye ahari Arooni n'abatabani, obeeze, babone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Kandi ogambire Abaisraeli oti: Aga garyaba amajuta aganyereziibwe ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Gatarishukwa aha mubiri gw'omuntu weena otari munyamurwa kandi mutarikora agandi agajwangize nkago; n'agarikwera, naimwe garyababeera agarikwera.
Orijwanzya amajuta agarikushushana nago, nari origashuka aha muntu otari munyamurwa, aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Otware eby'emigaju egi erikutaamirana, natafi, shekelesi, na kelibena, eby'emigaju ebyo hamwe n'ogundi ogurikwetwa lebona; byona bibe nibinganisa oburemeezi.
Obikoremu obubaane, nk'oku abanyamwoga baabwo babijwanzya, otemu omwonyo, bube obushemeire kandi oburikwera;
otwareho bukye, obuhonde, obunozye, obute omu maisho g'Ebirikuhamya omu ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, ahu ndibugaabuganira naiwe; naimwe buryababeera oburikwera munonga.
Kandi obubaane obu orikora bujwangire nk'obwo, otaribwejwangiza; buryakubeera obwereziibwe MUKAMA.
Orijwanzya obubaane oburikushushana nabwo, kubukoresa nk'omugaju, acuubwe omu ihanga rye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Reeba, naayeta Bezaleeli omu iziina mutabani wa Uuri, mwene Huuri, ow'omuruganda rwa Yuda.
Naamwijuza Omwoyo wa Ruhanga n'obwengye n'okwetegyereza n'okumanya n'obuhangu bwona obw'okukora;
okugunja emirimo y'obuhangu, okuheesha ezaabu n'efeeza n'emiringa,
okubaija amabaare ag'okuhunda omu bintu, okusharura ebibaizirwe omu miti, n'okukora emirimo y'emiringo yoona.
Kandi reeba, naamutaho Oholiabu, mwene Ahisamaaki, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daani. Kandi boona abaine omutima ogurikwetegyereza, naabaha obwengye, ngu bakore ebi naakuragiira byona,
Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya, ekitebe ky'okusaasira ekigifundikiire, n'ebintu byona eby'Eihema,
n'emeeza n'ebintu byayo, n'ekikondo ky'etabaaza eky'ezaabu eshemeziibwe n'ebintu byakyo byona, n'ekyoterero ky'obubaane,
n'eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo n'ebintu byaryo byona, n'ekinaabiro n'ekibunu kyakyo,
n'ebijwaro ebibaziirwe gye, n'ebijwaro ebirikwera ebya Arooni omunyamurwa n'eby'abatabani, eby'okujwara nibakora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa,
n'amajuta ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'obubaane bw'emigaju erikutaamirana ahabw'Omwanya ogurikwera. Nke,bi naakuragiira byona oku biri, babe nikwo baabikora.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Kandi ogambire Abaisraeli oti: Buzimazima mutaribura kurinda sabato zangye; ahabw'okuba niko kamanyiso ahagati yangye naimwe omu busingye bwanyu bwona, mubone kumanya ku niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza.
N'ahabw'ekyo muryaguma murinde sabato; ahabw'okuba n'erikwera ahariimwe; omuntu weena origishiisha, aryaitwa; omuntu weena origikoreraho omurimo gwona, acuubwe omu ihanga rye.
Omu biro mukaaga emirimo ebe nimwo yaakorerwa; kwonka ekiro kya mushanju niyo sabato ey'okuruhuukiriraho kimwe, eyereziibwe MUKAMA. Orikora omurimo gwona aha izooba rya sabato, buzimazima aitwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abaisraeli baryarinda sabato, bagume nibahitsya emigyenzo yaayo omu busingye bwabo bwona, ebe endagaano etarihwaho.
Ako n'akamanyiso ahagati yangye n'Abaisraeli akarigumaho ebiro byona; ahabw'okuba omu biro mukaaga nimwo MUKAMA yaahangiire eiguru n'ensi, akahuumura aha kiro kya mushanju, akaruhuuka.
Arooni yaabagira ati: Mujuure empeta z'ezaabu eziri aha matu g'abakazi baanyu n'aga batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu, muzindeetere.
Abantu boona baajuura empeta ezaabaire ziri aha matu gaabo, baazitwarira Arooni.
Yaaziiha omu ngaro zaabo; ku yaaherize kuziheeshamu ekishushani ky'enimi, yaakishemeza n'ekyoma ekirikusharura. Baagira bati: Iwe Israeli, ogu niwe ruhanga waawe owaakwihire omu nsi ya Misri.
Arooni ku yaakireebire, yaayombeka eitambiro omu maisho gaakyo; yaaranga, naagira ati: Nyencakare nihaija kubaho obugyenyi bw'ekiro kikuru kya MUKAMA.
Ku bwaseesire, baimuka kare, baatamba ebitambo by'okwotsya, baahonga empongano y'okusiima ahabw'obusingye. Abantu baashutama kurya n'okunywa, baimuka kuzaana.
baarahuka kuteishuka omuhanda ogu naabaragiire; baayeheeshera ekishushani ky'enimi, baakiramya, baakitambira ebitambo nibagira bati: Iwe Israeli, ogu niwe ruhanga waawe, owaakwihire omu nsi ya Misri.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Naayetegyereza abantu aba; n'abantu b'ebitsya bigangaire.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndeka, ekiniga kyangye kibaakyeho, mbamareho; haza iwe ndyakuhindura eihanga rihango.
Musa yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA Ruhanga we, naagira ati: MUKAMA, ahabw'enki ekiniga kyawe nikyaka aha bantu baawe abu waihire omu nsi ya Misri n'obushoboorozi bwingi n'omukono gw'amaani?

Ahabw'enki nooyenda kureetera Abanyamisri kwesiima nibagira bati: Akabaihayo kubakora kubi, ngu abaitire omu nshozi, abamare omu nsi? Reka ekiniga kyawe kingi, oyegarukyemu, orekye kureeta akabi ako aha bantu baawe.

Ijuka Abarahamu, Isaaka na Israeli abairu baawe abu waagambiire noorahira oti: Ndyakanyisa oruzaaro rwanyu, rube nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, kandi ensi egi yoona ei naagambaho ndyagiha oruzaaro rwanyu, ebe obuhunguzi bwarwo ebiro byona.
MUKAMA yaayegarukamu, yaareka akabi aku yaabaire naayenda kureeta aha bantu be.
Musa yaahinduka, yaashuuma naaruga aha rushozi, aine omu ngaro ze ebishate bibiri ebiriho Ebirikuhamya, ebihandiikire embaju zaabyo zombi omunda n'enyima.
Ebyo bishate bikaba bikozirwe Ruhanga, okuhandiika okwo kukaba kuri okwa Ruhanga kusharwirwe aha bishate.
Yoshua ku yaahuriire orwari rw'abantu nibayomba, yaagambira Musa ati: Orwo rwari oruri omu rusiisira n'orw'okurwana.
Musa yaagira ati: Orwo rwari ti rwari rw'abarikuteera akaari ahabw'okubinga, nari orw'abarikuyomba ahabw'okubingwa; kureka oru ndikuhurira, n'orw'abarikweshongora.
Musa ku yaahikire haihi n'orusiisira, yaareeba ekishushani ky'enimi n'abarikuzina, yaagira ekiniga kingi, yaatambika ebishate ebi yaabaire aine omu ngaro, yaabyatira ahansi y'orushozi.
Yaatwara ekishushani eki babaire baheesire, yaakyotsya omu muriro, yaakihondahonda, yaakicwa eiju, yaarinaganaga omu maizi, yaaganywaisa Abaisraeli.
Musa yaabuza Arooni ati: Aba bantu bakugizire bata, waaza kubareetera kukora ekibi kihango ekirikwingana kiti?
Arooni yaagarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, reka kungirira ekiniga; noomanya aba bantu ku bamaririire kukora kubi;
ahakuba bangizire bati: Tukorere ruhanga oraatwebembere, ahakuba omushaija ori Musa owaatwihire omu nsi ya Misri, titurikumanya oku abaire.
Naanye naabagarukamu nti: Oine ezaabu weena, agijuure; nabo baazimpa naazinaga omu muriro, zaarugamu egyo nimi.
yaayemerera omu irembo ry'orusiisira, yaagira ati: Weena ori aha rubaju rwa MUKAMA, aije ahi ndi. Abaleevi boona baateeranira ah'ari.

Yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba, naagira ati: Buri muntu ahagatire rurara ye, mugyendagyende hoonahoona omu rusiisira nimuruga aha irembo nimuza aha rindi, buri muntu aite mwene ishe, na mugyenzi we, na mutaahi we.
Abaleevi baakora nk'oku Musa yaabaragiira; aha izooba eryo omu Baisraeli haafa abashaija nk'enkumi ishatu.
Musa yaagira ati: Eri izooba mweyeze ahari MUKAMA, ahakuba buri muntu arwaniise omutabani na mwene ishe, MUKAMA abone kubaha omugisha eri izooba.
Musa yaagaruka ahari MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Ai bambe, abantu aba bakozire ekibi kihango, baayekorera ruhanga omu zaabu.
Mbwenu hati, ku oraabe noikiriza kubasaasira ekibi kyabo, obasaasire; kwonka ku oraabe otarikubasaasira, naakweshengyereza onyihe omu kitabo eki waahandiikire.
MUKAMA yaagarukamu Musa ati: Weena oncumwireho, niwe ndaihe omu kitabo kyangye.
Mbwenu irooko otware abantu abo omu mwanya ogu naakugambiire; reeba, maraika wangye naija kukwebembera. Kwonka aha izooba ry'okuhoora, ndyabatura ekibi kyabo.
MUKAMA yaitsa abantu orufu, ahakuba bakakoresa ekishushani ky'enimi eki Arooni yaakozire.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Irooko orugye aha, iwe n'abantu abu waihire omu nsi ya Misri, muze omu nsi ei naarahiire Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo, ningira nti: Ndyagiha oruzaaro rwawe.
Naanye ndyayohereza maraika akwebembere, kandi ndyabinga Abanyakanaani, Abaamori, Abahiiti, Abaperizi, Abahiivi n'Abayebusi;
mutaahe omu nsi y'amate n'obwoki; kwonka Nyowe tindigyenda naimwe, ntakaabaitira omu muhanda; ahabw'okuba muri abantu b'ebitsya bigangaire.
Abantu ku baahuriire ebyo bigambo bibi, baashaasha munonga, tihaagira n'omwe owaajwara eby'okweshemeza.

Ahakuba MUKAMA akaba yaagambiire Musa ati: Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Muri abantu b'ebitsya bigangaire; ku naakugyenda naimwe nangwa n'akaanya kakye, nkaabamaraho. Mbwenu nu, mujuure eby'okweshemeza byanyu, mbone kumanya oku ndaabagire.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abaisraeli baajuura eby'okweshemeza, okutandikira aha rushozi Horebu n'okweyongyerayo.

Kandi okuruga obwo Musa yaaguma naatwara Eihema naariteera aheeru y'orusiisira hare narwo; yaaryeta Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu. Kandi omuntu weena owaabaire aba naasherura MUKAMA, akaba ashohora aza aha Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, eryabaire riri aheeru y'orusiisira.
Musa ku yaabaire aruga omu rusiisira, naaza aha Ihema, abantu boona baimuka, buri muntu ayemerera aha muryango gw'eihema rye, baguma nibamureeba okuhitsya obu araataahe omu Ihema.
Musa ku yaabaire aheza kutaahamu, enyomyo eri ey'ekicu eshuuma, eyemerera aha muryango gw'Eihema, MUKAMA agamba nawe.
Abantu boona bakireeba enyomyo y'ekicu eyemereire aha muryango gw'Eihema, baimuka, baramya, buri muntu ari aha muryango gw'eihema rye.

Okwo nikwo MUKAMA yaabaire agamba na Musa nibareebana, nk'oku omuntu agamba na mugyenzi we. Bwanyima Musa agaruka omu rusiisira; kwonka omuheereza we Yoshua mwene Nuuni, omutsigazi, akaba ataruga omuri eryo Hema.

Mbwenu nu, ninkweshengyereza, ku ndaabe ngiriirwe embabazi omu maisho gaawe, hati onyorekye enaama zaawe, nkumanye, mbone kuguma ningirirwa embabazi omu maisho gaawe; kandi oijukye eihanga eri ku riri eihanga ryawe.
MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Nyowe nyenka ndyagyenda naiwe, kandi ndyakuha obuhuumure.
Musa yaamugira ati: Iwe wenka ku oraabe otarikugyenda naanye, otatwiha aha.
Mbwenu kiryamanywa kita, nyowe n'abantu baawe ku tugiriirwe embabazi omu maisho gaawe? Tiiwe kugyenda naitwe, kikareetera nyowe n'abantu baawe kugira omutaano n'amahanga goona agari omu nsi?
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Ekigambo eki eki waagamba nakyo niinyija kukikora; ahabw'okuba ogiriirwe embabazi omu maisho gangye, kandi ninkumanya eiziina.
Musa yaagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, nyoreka ekitiinisa kyawe.

MUKAMA yaagira ati: Niinyija kurabya oburungi bwangye bwona omu maisho gaawe, ndangye eiziina ryangye YEHOVA omu maisho gaawe; ndyagirira embabazi ou ndigirira embabazi, kandi nsaasire, ou ndisaasira.
Kandi yaamugira ati: Torikubaasa kundeeba hamaisho; ahakuba tihariho muntu orindeeba, akagumaho.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Reeba, aha rubaju rwangye hariho omwanya, ahu orikwija kwemerera aha rukiri.
Ekitiinisa kyangye ku kiraabe nikihinguraho, niinyija kukuta omu bwatika bwarwo, nkusangire n'ekiganja kyangye, okuhitsya obu ndaarabeho;
bwanyima nyiheho omukono gwangye, ondeebe omugongo; kwonka aha maisho gangye tiharikwija kureebwa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Shatura ebishate bibiri by'amabaare nk'eby'okubanza; naanye niinyija kubihandiikaho ebigambo ebyabaire biri aha by'okubanza ebi waayatsire.
Nyencakare omu kasheeshe obe oyeteekateekire, oinamukye aha rushozi Sinai, oyeyorekye omu maisho gangye aha mutwe gwarwo.
Hatagira omuntu owainamuka naiwe, kandi otaikiriza omuntu weena kureebwa aha rushozi rwona, n'obu gaakuba amasyo g'entaama nari ag'ente kuriira omu maisho gaarwo.
Musa yaashatura ebishate bibiri by'amabaare nk'eby'okubanza, yaimuka kare omu kasheeshe, yainamuka aha rushozi Sinai nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire, aine omu ngaro ebyo bishate byombi by'amabaare.
MUKAMA yaashuumira omu kicu, yaayemererayo nawe, yaaranga eiziina rye YEHOVA.
MUKAMA yaaraba omu maisho ga Musa, yaaranga naagira ati: MUKAMA, MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'okusaasira n'embabazi, otarahuka kugira ekiniga, oijwire embabazi n'amazima,

ogirira embabazi abantu enkumi n'enkumi, osaasira okutahikiirira n'okushiisha n'ekibi; otasingisiriza na kakye abaine orubanja; ohoora abaana ahabw'eby'okushiisha bya baishebo, n'abaijukuru baabo okuhitsya aha busingye bwa kashatu n'obwa kana.
Musa yaarahuka, yainika omutwe ahansi, yaaramya;

yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, mbwenu ku ndaabe naagirirwa embabazi omu maisho gaawe, ninkweshengyereza, MUKAMA, ogyende ahagati yaitu, n'obu turaabe turi eihanga ry'ebitsya bigangaire, osaasire okutahikiirira kwaitu n'ekibi kyaitu, otwakiire tube obuhunguzi bwawe.
Ogume oyorobere eki ndikukuragiira eri izooba. Reeba, ndyabinga Abaamori omu maisho gaawe, n'Abanyakanaani, Abahiiti, Abaperizi, Abahiivi n'Abayebusi.
Oyerinde, otariragaana endagaano n'abatwire omu nsi ei orikuzamu, ekaba omutego omuriimwe;
kureka musheenye amatambiro gaabo, muhigure enyomyo zaabo, mutemagure na Ashera zaabo.
(Mumanye ngu timuriramya ruhanga ondiijo weena; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA, ou eiziina rye ririkwetwa Ow'eihato, ni Ruhanga ow'eihato.)
Otariragaana endagaano n'abatwire omuri egyo nsi; ahakuba ku barikurata baaruhanga baabo nk'abarikuraaya, baabatambira ebitambo, nyentsya omwe aharibo akaakweta, orya aha kitambo kye,
oshwererera batabani baawe bahara baabo, bwanyima bahara baabo bakurata baaruhanga baabo nk'abarikuraaya, bareetera batabani baawe kukurata baaruhanga baabo omu muringo ogwo.
Otaryekorera ebishushani bya baaruhanga ebiheesirwe.

Oryaguma orinde obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe. Omu bunaku obwatairweho omu kwezi Abibu oryamara ebiro mushanju noorya emigaati etatumbisiibwe, nk'oku naakuragiire; ahabw'okuba omuri okwo kwezi Abibu nimwo waarugiire omuri Misri.
Ekiigura-nda kyona n'ekyangye, ekyetwa ekishaija ky'omu matungo gaawe goona ag'ente n'ag'entaama.

Kwonka omujigaijo gw'endogoya oryagucunguza omwana gw'entaama; ku oriba otarikwenda kugucungura, oguhende ebitsya. Emijigaijo ya batabani baanyu yoona muryagicungura. Hatarigira owaija omu maisho gangye engaro nsha.
Omu biro mukaaga oryakora, kwonka aha kiro kya mushanju oryahuumura; omu ibiba n'omu igyesha oryahuumura.
Kandi oryarinda obugyenyi bwa saabiiti mushanju, ez'omuganuro gw'eigyesha ry'engano, kandi n'obugyenyi bw'eishaaruura ry'aha muheru gw'omwaka.
Kashatu omu mwaka abeetwa abashaija boona baryaguma baije, bareebwe omu maisho ga Mukama RUHANGA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Ahakuba ndyabinga amahanga, garugye omu maisho gaawe, nyirizeyo emyatano yaawe; ku oriba ogiire kureebwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA kashatu omu mwaka, tihaine muntu weena oryetenga ensi yaawe.
Otarihayo eshagama y'ekitambo ekintambiirwe hamwe n'omugaati ogutumbisiibwe, kandi ekitambo ky'obugyenyi bw'ekiro kikuru ky'Okuhingurwaho kitaritsigaraho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Emiganuro y'ebirikubanza kwera omu misiri yaawe oryagireeta omu nju ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe. Otariteeka omwana gw'embuzi omu mahenahene ga nyinagwo.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Handiika ebigambo ebyo; ahakuba endagaano ei ndagaine naiwe n'Abaisraeli neehamira aha bigambo ebyo.

Musa yaamarayo ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro, ari hamwe na MUKAMA; omu biro ebyo tarariire by'okurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa amaizi. Yaahandiika ahari ebyo bishate by'amabaare ebigambo by'endagaano egyo, nibyo biragiro ikumi.
Arooni n'Abaisraeli boona ku baareebire Musa, reeba aha maisho ge hakaba nihamurinkana; baatiina kumuhika haihi.
Musa yaabeeta, Arooni n'abategyeki boona ab'eihanga eryo baagaruka ah'ari; Musa yaagaaniira nabo.
Bwanyima Abaisraeli boona bairira haihi; yaabamanyisa ebiragiro byona oku biri, ebi MUKAMA amugambiriire aha rushozi Sinai.
Musa ku yaaherize kugamba nabo, yaata eky'okwetwekyerera aha maisho ge.
Kwonka ku yaabaire aza omu maisho ga MUKAMA kugamba nawe, akiihaho okuhitsya ahu araashohorere; kandi ku yaabaire ashohora kugambira Abaisraeli ebi yaaragiirwa,
Abaisraeli bareeba aha maisho ge nihamurinkana; Musa agaruka ayeta eky'okwetwekyerera aha maisho, okuhitsya obu yaabaire agarukayo kugaaniira na MUKAMA.
Musa yaateerana eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli, yaabagira ati: Ebi nibyo MUKAMA abaragiire kukora.

Omu biro mukaaga emirimo ebe nimwo yaakorerwa, kwonka ekiro kya mushanju kiryaba ekiro ekirikwera ahariimwe, sabato ey'okuhuumuririraho kimwe, eyereziibwe MUKAMA; origikoreraho omurimo gwona, aryaitwa.
Mutarihemba omuriro gwona omu maka gaanyu aha izooba rya sabato.
Musa yaagambira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli ati: Eki nikyo MUKAMA aragiire kukora.
Mwihe omuriimwe emitoijo y'okutoijera MUKAMA; omuntu weena oine omutima ogurikukunda kuha, areete omutoijo gwa MUKAMA; ezaabu, efeeza, emiringa,
emyenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari, eya bafuta, n'obwoya bw'embuzi,
empu z'empaya z'entaama ezizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, empu z'engongi, embaaho z'eminyinya,
amajuta g'etabaaza, eby'emigaju eby'okuta omu majuta ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'eby'okujwanzya n'obubaane oburikutaamirana,
amabaare agarikwetwa shohamu, n'agandi mabaare ag'okuhundisa efodi n'eky'aha kifuba.
Omunyamwoga weena omuriimwe aije akore ebi MUKAMA aragiire byona;
obutaaho n'Eihema ryabwo n'eby'okubushweka n'ebikwatsi byabwo n'embaaho zaabwo n'embazi zaabwo n'enyomyo zaabwo n'ebiina byabwo;
eshanduukye y'endagaano n'emigamba yaayo, n'ekitebe ky'okusaasira, n'omukingo gw'okukingira Aharikwera munonga;
n'emeeza n'emigamba yaayo n'ebintu byayo byona, n'emigaati y'okumurika;
n'ekikondo ky'etabaaza y'okuhwezesa n'ebintu byakyo, n'amatabaaza gaakyo n'amajuta g'okuhemba;
n'ekyoterero ky'obubaane n'emigamba yaakyo n'amajuta g'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'obubaane oburikutaamirana, n'omukingo gw'okukinga aha muryango gw'obwo butaaho;
n'eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo n'ekintu kyaryo ky'emiringa ekishobeekaine nk'ekigoye, n'emigamba yaaryo n'ebintu byaryo byona, n'ekinaabiro n'ekibunu kyakyo;
n'emikingo y'orugo rw'ekibuga n'enyomyo zaarwo n'ebiina byazo n'emikingo y'eirembo ry'ekibuga;
n'enkondo z'obwo butaaho n'ez'orugo rwabwo n'emigoye yaazo;
n'ebijwaro ebibaziirwe gye eby'okukoresa omu Mwanya ogurikwera, nibyo bijwaro ebirikwera eby'okujwarwa Arooni omunyamurwa n'eby'abatabani, nibakora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli ryaruga omu maisho ga Musa.

Bwanyima baagaruka, buri muntu owaagyemirwe omutima gwe, na buri muntu ou omutima gwe gwayekundiire, baareeta emitoijo ya MUKAMA ey'okukoresa Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'emirimo yaaryo yoona n'ey'okukoresa ebijwaro ebirikwera.

Haija abashaija n'abakazi, boona abaabaire baine emitima eyekundiire, baareeta empeta z'aha nyindo n'ez'omu matu, empeta eziriho obumanyiso n'enkwanzi, byona biri eby'ezaabu; buri muntu weena owaatoijiire, MUKAMA yaareeta omutoijo gw'ezaabu.
Kandi buri muntu owaashangirwe aine emyenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya bafuta, n'obwoya bw'embuzi, n'empu z'empaya z'entaama ezizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, n'empu z'engongi, yaabireeta.

Buri muntu owaabaasize kureeta omutoijo gw'efeeza nari ogw'emiringa, yaagutoijera MUKAMA; kandi n'omuntu weena owaabaire aine embaaho z'omunyinya ezaakubaasa kukorwamu ekintu kyona omuri ogwo murimo, yaazireeta.
Kandi n'abakazi boona abanyamyoga baakaraga n'engaro zaabo, baareeta ebi baakaragire ebya bururu, ebya bujwa, ebya karari n'ebya bafuta.
Kandi abakazi boona abanyamwoga omu kukaraga abaagyemirwe emitima yaabo, baakaraga obwoshe bw'embuzi.
N'abategyeki baareeta amabaare agarikwetwa shohamu n'amabaare ag'okuhundisa efodi n'eky'aha kifuba,
n'eby'emigaju, n'amajuta ag'okuhemba n'ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'ahabw'obubaane oburikutaamirana.
Abaisraeli baareetera MUKAMA emitoijo n'emitima eyekundiire, omushaija weena n'omukazi weena abaagyemirwe emitima yaabo kureeta ekintu kyona ahabw'omurimo ogu MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa kukora.
Musa yaagambira Abaisraeli ati: Reeba, MUKAMA ayetsire Bezaleeli omu iziina, mutabani wa Uuri, mwene Huuri, ow'omu ruganda rwa Yuda,
yaamwijuza Omwoyo wa Ruhanga n'obwengye n'okwetegyereza n'okumanya n'obuhangu bwona obw'okukora emirimo,
okugunja emirimo y'emyoga, okuheesha ezaabu n'efeeza n'emiringa,
okubaija amabaare ag'okuhunda omu bintu, okusharura ebibaizirwe omu miti, n'okukora emirimo y'emiringo yoona.
Kandi yaata omu mutima gwe okwegyesa abandi, we na Oholiabu mwene Ahisamaaki, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daani.

Bombi yaijuza emitima yaabo obuhangu bw'okukora emirimo ya buri muringo, erikukorwa abasharuzi n'ababaziizi b'ebicwererane by'ehuuzi za bururu n'eza bujwa n'eza karari aha mwenda gwa bafuta, n'abaruki, ebirikukorwa omukozi w'omuringo gwona n'omugunji w'obwengye.

Bezaleeli na Oholiabu n'omuntu weena omunyamwoga, ou MUKAMA yaahaire obwengye n'okwetegyereza okumanya kukora omurimo gwona ahabw'okukora Omwanya ogurikwera, baryakora nk'ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire byona oku biri.
Bwanyima Musa yaayeta Bezaleeli na Oholiabu n'omunyamwoga weena ou MUKAMA yaataire obwengye omu mutima gwe, na weena owaagyemirwe omutima gwe kwija kukora omurimo ogwo;
Musa yaabaha emitoijo ei Abaisraeli baareetsire ey'okukores omurimo gw'Omwanya ogurikwera n'okuguhereza kimwe. Kandi buri kasheeshe abantu baaguma nibamureetera emitoijo n'emitima eyekundiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo abanyamwoga boona abaabaire nibakora omurimo gwona ogw'Omwanya ogurikwera, buri omwe yaaruga aha murimo gwe ogu yaabaire naakora,
yaagira Musa ati: Abantu nibareeta bingi munonga okukira ebirikwetengwa ahabw'omurimo, ogu MUKAMA yaaturagiire kukora.

Musa yaaragiira, eki yaaragiira kyarangirirwa omu rusiisira rwona, nibagira bati: Hatagira omushaija nari omukazi owaagaruka kukora ogundi murimo ahabw'emitoijo y'Omwanya ogurikwera. Okwo nikwo abantu baazibiirwe kureeta endiijo mitoijo;
ahakuba ebintu ebi baabaire baine bikaba nibimara okukora omurimo gwona, kandi nibishaaga.
Oburaingwa bwa buri mukingo bukaba buri mikono makumi abiri na munaana, n'obuhango bwagwo mikono ena; emikingo yoona ekaba eri ey'orugyero rumwe.
Emikingo etaano yaagiteerana okwayo, n'endiijo etaano okwayo.
Yaakora obufunga bwa bururu aha mukugiro ogw'aha rubaju rw'emikingo etaano ey'okubanza, n'aha mukugiro gw'aha rubaju rw'emikingo endiijo etaano;
yaakora obufunga makumi ataano aha mukingo gumwe oguteeraine, n'obundi makumi ataano aha mukugiro gw'omukingo gwa kabiri; obwo bufunga bwareebana.
Kandi yaakora ebikwatsi by'ezaabu makumi ataano, yaabikwatanisisa egyo mikingo; obutaaho bwaba bumwe.
Kandi yaakora emikingo y'obwoshe bw'embuzi kuba eihema ry'okushweka obutaaho; yaakora emikingo ikumi na gumwe.
Oburaingwa bwa buri mukingo bukaba buri mikono makumi ashatu, n'obuhango bwagwo mikono ena; egyo mikingo ikumi na gumwe ekaba eri ey'orugyero rumwe.
Emikingo etaano yaagiteerana okwayo, n'emikingo mukaaga okwayo.
Yaakora obufunga makumi ataano aha mukugiro gw'omukingo ogurikuheererukayo omu y'okubanza, n'obundi makumi ataano aha mukugiro ogw'omukingo ogurikuheererukayo omu ya kabiri.
Yaakora ebikwatsi makumi ataano by'emiringa okukwatanisa eihema ku riba rimwe.
Kandi yaakora eky'okushweka eihema ky'empu z'empaya z'entaama ezizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, yaatungikaho eky'empu z'engongi.
Kandi yaakora embaaho z'obutaaho omu munyinya ez'okwemereza;
oburaingwa bwa buri rubaaho mikono ikumi, n'obuhango bwarwo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.
Buri rubaaho rwagira endimi ibiri ez'okuruteerana na rugyenzi rwarwo. Okwo nikwo yaakozire embaaho zoona ez'obutaaho.
Aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo yaakora embaaho makumi abiri,

yaakora n'ebiina by'efeeza makumi ana, yaabita ahansi y'ezo mbaaho makumi abiri, ebiina bibiri ahansi y'orubaaho rumwe ahabw'endimi zaarwo ibiri, n'ebindi biina bibiri ahansi y'orundi rubaaho ahabw'endimi zaarwo ibiri.
Aha rubaju rw'obutaaho orwa kabiri, oruri aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, yaakoraho embaaho makumi abiri,
n'ebiina byazo by'efeeza makumi ana, ebiina bibiri ahansi y'orubaaho rumwe n'ebindi bibiri ahansi y'orundi.
Aha rubaju rw'obutaaho orw'enyima orurikureeba oburengyerwa-izooba, yaakoraho embaaho mukaaga;
yaakora n'embaaho ibiri ez'enshonda z'obutaaho aha mbaju zombi ez'enyima.
Ezo mbaaho ahansi zaataana, kwonka ahaiguru zaateeranira aha mpeta ey'okubanza; nikwo zombi yaazikozire atyo aha nshonda zombi.
N'ahabw'ekyo haabaho embaaho munaana n'ebiina byazo by'efeeza; byona byaba ikumi na mukaaga, ebiina bibiri ahansi ya buri rubaaho.
Kandi yaakora embazi omu munyinya; itaano ahabw'embaaho z'orubaju rumwe orw'obutaaho,
n'itaano ahabw'embaaho z'orubaju orundi orw'obutaaho, n'ezindi itaano ahabw'embaaho z'obutaaho ez'orubaju orw'enyima orurikureeba oburengyerwa-izooba.
Orubazi orw'ahagati y'ezindi yaarwozyamu, rwahika oku n'oku.
Embaaho zoona yaazishweka n'ezaabu, yaaheesha empeta z'ezaabu ez'okurabyamu ezo mbazi; nazo yaazishweka n'ezaabu.
Omukingo ogwo yaagukorera enyomyo ina z'eminyinya, yaazishweka n'ezaabu; eby'okuhanikaho byazo byaba eby'ezaabu; yaaziheeshera ebiina by'efeeza bina.
Kandi yaakora omukingo gw'okukinga aha muryango gw'Eihema, yaagukora omu myenda ya bururu, eya bujwa, eya karari n'eya kitaani, ebaziirwemu amabara gacwereraine;
yaakora n'enyomyo zaagwo itaano n'eby'okuhanikaho byazo. Yaashweka emitwe yaazo n'obufunga bwazo n'ezaabu; kwonka ebiina byazo ebitaano byaba eby'emiringa.
Kandi Bezaleeli yaakora eshanduukye omu munyinya, oburaingwa bwayo mikono ebiri n'ekicweka, obuhango bwayo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka, n'obwemi bwayo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.
Yaagishweka n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe omunda n'enyima, yaagitaho omuguno gw'ezaabu kugyehinguririza.
Yaayazya ezaabu, yaagiheeshamu ebifunga bina, yaabita aha nshonda zaayo ina, bibiri aha rubaju rumwe, n'ebindi bibiri aha rundi.
Yaakora emigamba omu munyinya, yaagishweka n'ezaabu;
yaata egyo migamba omu bifunga eby'omu mbaju z'eshanduukye, ngu bagume bagiheekyese.
Yaakora ekitebe ky'okusaasira omu zaabu eshemeziibwe, oburaingwa bwakyo mikono ebiri n'ekicweka, n'obuhango bwakyo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.
Kandi yaakora baakerubi babiri omu zaabu; omu kubakora yaabaheeshera aha mitwe yombi ey'ekyo kitebe ky'okusaasira;
kerubi omwe aha mutwe gumwe, n'ondi aha gundi; yaabaheesherana n'ekitebe ky'okusaasira aha mitwe yaakyo yombi.
Baakerubi baashashaanura amapapa gaabo ahaiguru, baagasangiza ekitebe ky'okusaasira, boorekyeraine nibareeba ekyo kitebe.
Yaagishweka n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, yaagitaho omuguno gw'ezaabu kugyehinguririza.
Yaagikorera ebizingiti kugyehinguririza, obuhango bwabyo ekita kimwe; nabyo yaabitaho omuguno gw'ezaabu kugyehinguririza.
Yaagiheeshera ebifunga bina by'ezaabu, yaabita aha maguru gaayo aha nshonda zaayo ina.
Ebifunga ebyo byaza haihi n'ebizingiti, kuba eby'okutamu emigamba y'okuheekyesa emeeza.
Egyo migamba y'okuheekyesa emeeza, yaagibaija omu munyinya, yaagishweka n'ezaabu.
Kandi yaakora ebintu by'okuta ahari egyo meeza omu zaabu eshemeziibwe, enyabya zaayo n'ebikopo byayo, kandi emidumo n'ebakuri byayo eby'okushukisa empongano z'eby'okunywa.
Kyagira amataagi mukaaga agarikuruga ahari ogwo mukono, ashatu aha rubaju rumwe, n'ashatu aha rundi,

aha itaagi rimwe ebikopo bishatu ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, hamwe n'ekintu ekyebumburikire n'ekirabyo kyakyo; aha itaagi erindi ebikopo bishatu ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, hamwe n'ekintu ekyebumburikire n'ekirabyo kyakyo; goona mukaaga nk'oku garikuruga aha mukono gumwe gaaba nikwo gaaba gatyo.
Ahari ogwo mukono gw'ekikondo ky'etabaaza haabaho ebikopo bina ebirikushusha nk'ebirabyo by'endozi, n'ebintu ebyebumburikire n'ebirabyo byabyo;
ekintu ekyebumburikire kyaheesheranwa n'omukono gw'etabaaza ahansi ya buri mataagi abiri agarikugurugaho; goona mukaaga gaaba nikwo gaaba.
Ebyebumburikire n'amataagi gaabyo byaheesheranwa nagwo omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Yaaheesha amatabaaza gaakyo mushanju n'empana zaago n'otusohaani twago omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Ekikondo ky'amatabaaza n'ebintu byakyo byona, yaabikora omu zaabu eshemeziibwe ey'oburemeezi bw'etalanta emwe.
Yaakishweka n'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, aha mutwe gwakyo n'embaju zaakyo n'amahembe gaakyo; kandi yaakitaho omuguno gw'ezaabu kukyehinguririza.
Yaakiheeshera ebifunga bibiri by'ezaabu, yaabita ahansi y'omuguno gwakyo aha mbaju zaakyo zombi, kuba eby'okutamu emigamba y'okukiheekyesa;
egyo migamba yaagikora omu munyinya, yaagishweka n'ezaabu.
Kandi yaakora amajuta garikwera ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'obubaane burungi obw'eby'emigaju erikutaamirana, nk'oku abanyamwoga baabwo babujwanzya.
Aha nshonda zaaryo ina yaabaijaho amahembe ana; ago mahembe gaabaijeranwa naryo; yaarishweka n'emiringa.
Kandi yaariheeshera ebintu byaryo byona, eby'okuyooreraho eiju, n'eby'okuriyooresa, n'enyabya, n'eby'okwihuza enyama, n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro; ebintu byaryo byona yaabikora omu miringa.
Kandi yaariheeshera ekintu ekishobeekaine nk'ekigoye omu miringa, yaakita ahansi y'omuguno ogwehinguririize eitambiro, kyaruga ahansi, kyahika rwagati y'eitambiro.
Yaaheesha ebifunga bina, yaabita aha nshonda ina z'ekyo kintu ky'emiringa ekishobeekaine kuba eby'okutamu emigamba.
Yaabaija emigamba omu munyinya, yaagishweka n'emiringa;
egyo migamba yaagita omu bifunga aha mbaju z'eitambiro kuba ey'okuriheekyesa. Yaaribaija omu mbaaho, omunda ryaba omurangara.
Kandi yaakora ekibuga; aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo orugo rwakyo rukaba ruri orw'emikingo y'emyenda ya kitaani, oburaingwa bwarwo mikono igana,
enyomyo zaayo ziri makumi abiri, n'ebiina byazo by'emiringa nabyo makumi abiri; kwonka eby'okuhanikaho eby'ahari ezo nyomyo n'obufunga bwabyo biri eby'efeeza.

Kandi aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa bumosho oburaingwa bwarwo buri mikono igana, enyomyo zaarwo ziri makumi abiri, n'ebiina byazo by'emiringa makumi abiri, kwonka eby'okuhanikaho eby'aha nyomyo n'obufunga bwabyo biri eby'efeeza.
Aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba oburaingwa bw'emikingo bwaba mikono makumi ataano, n'enyomyo zaakyo ikumi, n'ebiina byazo ikumi; eby'okuhanikaho eby'aha nyomyo n'obufunga bwabyo biri eby'efeeza.
Kandi omumaisho aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba obuhango bwarwo bukaba buri mikono makumi ataano.
Obuhango bw'emikingo ey'aha rubaju rumwe rw'eirembo buri mikono ikumi n'etaano, enyomyo zaayo ishatu, n'ebiina byazo bishatu;
byaba bityo n'aha rubaju; aha rundi rubaju rw'eirembo oru na ruriya obuhango bw'emikingo bukaba buri mikono ikumi n'etaano, enyomyo zaayo ishatu, n'ebiina byazo bishatu.
Emikingo yoona eyaabaire eyehinguririize ekibuga ekaba ekozirwe omu myenda ya kitaani;

ebiina by'okutamu enyomyo bikaba biri eby'emiringa; eby'okuhanikaho by'enyomyo n'obufunga bwazo biri eby'efeeza; n'emitwe yaazo eshwekirwe efeeza; n'enyomyo zoona ez'orugo rw'ekibuga zikaba ziine obufunga bw'efeeza.

Kandi omukingo gw'eirembo ry'ekibuga gukaba gubaziirwemu ebicwererane by'ehuuzi za bururu na bujwa na karari na kitaani; obuhango bwagwo bukaba buri mikono makumi abiri, n'obwemi bwagwo buri mikono etaano, nibwingana n'emikingo y'orwo rugo rwona.
Enyomyo zaagwo ziri ina, n'ebiina byazo by'emiringa bina; eby'okuhanikaho byazo biri eby'efeeza; emitwe yaazo eshwekirwe n'efeeza, n'obufunga bwazo buri obw'efeeza.
Kandi enkondo zoona ez'obutaaho n'ez'orugo orwabaire rwehinguririize ekibuga zikaba ziri ez'emiringa.

Ogu nigwo mubaro gw'ebintu byona ebyakozirwe ahabw'obutaaho, nibwo butaaho bw'Ebirikuhamya, nk'oku Musa yaaragiire ku bibarwa Abaleevi, abaabaire nibabibara, nibareebererwa Itamaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa.
Bezaleeli mutabani wa Uuri mwene Huuri ow'omu ruganda rwa Yuda akakora byona, ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa,
naakwatanisa na Oholiabu mwene Ahisamaaki, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daani, omusharuzi w'amabaare, omu nyamwoga omu by'emirimo, omubaziizi w'ebicwererane by'ehuuzi za bururu na bujwa na karari na bafuta.

Oburemeezi bw'ezaabu zoona ezi baatoizire ahabw'okukora omurimo gwona ogw'Omwanya ogurikwera bukaba buri talanta makumi abiri na mwenda, na shekeli magana mushanju na makumi ashatu, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri.

Kandi oburemeezi bw'efeeza ezaahairwe ab'omu ihanga eryo abaabazirwe bukaba buri etalanta igana na shekeli rukumi na magana mushanju na makumi mushanju na itaano, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri;

nizo zaahairwe abashaija obusiriira mukaaga n'enkumi ishatu na magana ataano na makumi ataano; buri mushaija owaagiire omu baabazirwe ahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho akaba aha beeka emwe, nikyo kicweka kimwe kya kabiri kya shekeli nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri.
Ezo talanta z'efeeza igana zikaba ziri ez'okuheeshamu ebiina by'embaaho z'Omwanya ogurikwera, n'eby'enyomyo z'omukingo, etalanta igana zirugwamu ebiina igana, ekiina kimwe etalanta emwe.
Kandi ezo shekeli rukumi na magana mushanju na makumi mushanju na itaano yaaziheeshamu eby'okuhanikaho eby'aha nyomyo n'obufunga bwazo, yaagaruka yaazishwekyesa emitwe y'ezo nyomyo.
Kandi oburemeezi bw'emiringa ei baatoizire bukaba buri etalanta makumi mushanju na shekeli enkumi ibiri na magana ana.
Egyo miringa yaagiheeshamu ebiina by'enyomyo z'omuryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'eitambiro ry'omuringa hamwe n'ekintu ky'emiringa ekishobeekaine nk'ekigoye, n'ebintu byaryo byona,
n'ebiina by'enyomyo z'orugo orwehinguririize ekibuga, n'eby'ez'eirembo ryakyo, n'enkondo zoona ez'obutaaho, n'ez'orugo orwehinguririize ekibuga.
Kandi egyo myenda ya bururu n'eya bujwa n'eya karari baagikoramu ebijwaro ebikozirwe gye eby'okukoresa omu Mwanya ogurikwera, kandi baakorera Arooni ebijwaro birikwera, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Yaakora efodi n'emikwengye y'ezaabu n'ehuuzi za bururu na bujwa na karari na kitaani.
Ezaabu baagiheesha, yaaba akahwahwari, baagisharamu emikwegye y'okucwererana amabara omu myenda ya bururu n'eya bujwa n'eya karari n'eya bafuta, omurimo ogurikukorwa abanyamyoga b'obwengye.
Baakorera efodi ebiremu by'aha mabega biteerainwe nayo aha mikugiro yaayo yombi;

eky'okwezirikisa ekigikoreirweho, ekirukirwe abahangu, kyakorwa nkayo, kandi kyarukwa omu bintu bimwe n'ebyayo, emikwegye y'ezaabu, ehuuzi za bururu n'eza bujwa, n'eza karari, n'eza kitaani, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Yaagata aha biremu bya efodi eby'aha mabega kuba amabaare g'okwijukiraho abaana ba Israeli, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Kikaba nikiingaingana embaju zoona; baakikora kikubiremu; oburaingwa bwakyo bwaba ekita kimwe, n'obuhango bwakyo nabwo bwaba ekita, waaba okikubiremu.
Baakitaho emishorongo y'amabaare ena; omushorongo ogw'okubanza gwabamu amabaare aga sarudio, topazi na barekesi,
omushorongo ogwa kabiri, samaragido, safiro na arimaasi,
omushorongo gwa kashatu huwakinto, kalukedoni na amesuusto,
n'omushorongo ogwa kana berulo, shohamu na yasipi; goona gaahamibwa omu zaabu ekwegire.
Amabaare ago gaaba ikumi n'abiri, nk'amaziina g'abaana ba Israeli oku gari; gaahandiikwa nk'oku basharura akamanyiso, buri rimwe ryahandiikwaho eiziina ryaryo ahabw'enganda ikumi na ibiri.
Kandi baakorera eky'aha kifuba emikuufu ehotoire nk'omugoye, ekozire omu zaabu eshemeziibwe.
Kandi baaheesha eby'okuhamya amabaare bibiri n'empeta ibiri omu zaabu; ezo mpeta baazita aha nshonda zombi ez'aha mutwe gw'eky'aha kifuba,
baarabya egyo mikuufu yombi ey'ezaabu ehotoire omuri ezo mpeta ez'aha nshonda zaakyo zombi.
Emitwe yombi ey'egyo mikuufu ehotoire baagikoma aha by'okuhamya amabaare byombi, baabikwatsa aha biremu by'efodi eby'aha mabega aha rubaju rwabyo orw'omumaisho.
Kandi baakora ezindi mpeta z'ezaabu ibiri, baazita aha nshonda ibiri ez'omukugiro gw'eky'aha kifuba ogw'omunda aha rubaju oruri haihi na efodi.
Kandi baakora empeta z'ezaabu ibiri, baazita aha mukugiro gw'ahansi ogw'ebiremu bibiri eby'aha mabega omumaisho, ahu birikuteeranira n'eky'okwezirikisa kya efodi ekirukirwe abanyamwoga.
Kandi eky'aha kifuba baakikoma aha mpeta za efodi, bakikomesa otwenda twa bururu, nibaturabya omu mpeta zaakyo, ngu eky'aha kifuba kirekye kuyuga kikataana na efodi, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Kandi yaakora ekanzu ya efodi, erukirwe omu mwenda gwa bururu gwonka;
yaagira ebitsya by'okurabyamu omutwe, nk'oku bakora ebijwaro bya kitaani, ebikugiire n'omutarizo, ngu etataaguka.
Aha mukugiro gwayo ogw'ahansi baabaziiraho ebirikushusha amakoma-mahanga ebirukire omu huuzi za bururu na bujwa na karari.
Baaheesha amajugo omu zaabu eshemeziibwe, baagahunda ahagati y'ago makoma-mahanga aha mukugiro gw'egyo kanzu okugyehinguririza,
eijugo ryakuratwa eikoma-mahanga, eijugo eikoma mahanga, bityo bityo byayehinguririza omukugiro gw'egyo kanzu, ngu ebe ey'okujwarwa orikukora omurimo gw'obuheereza, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
n'ekikwemba kya bafuta, n'enkofiira nungi eza bafuta, n'empare za kitaani,
n'eky'okwezirikisa kya kitaani n'emyenda ya bururu n'eya bujwa n'eya karari, ebaziirwemu ebicwererane, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Baakikomaho otwenda twa bururu, kukikwatanisa n'ekyo kikwemba aharuguru, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Okwo nikwo omurimo gwona gw'okukora obutaaho bw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu gwahweire, Abaisraeli bakakora byona nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa. Nikwo baakozire batyo.
Baareetera Musa obutaaho n'Eihema n'ebintu byaryo byona, ebikwatsi byaryo, embaaho zaaryo, embazi zaaryo, enyomyo zaaryo, ebiina byaryo,
eky'okushweka ky'empu z'empaya z'entaama ezizigirwe n'erangi erikutukura, eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, omukingo gw'okukingira Aharikwera munonga,
eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya n'emigamba yaayo n'ekitebe ky'okusaasira,
emeeza n'ebintu byayo byona n'emigaati y'okumurika,
ekikondo ky'etabaaza ky'ezaabu eshemeziibwe n'amatabaaza gaakyo g'okukitaho n'ebintu byakyo byona n'amajuta g'okuhemba,
ekyoterero ky'ezaabu, amajuta g'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, obubaane oburikutaamirana, omukingo gw'aha muryango gw'Eihema,
eitambiro ry'emiringa n'ekintu kyaryo ky'emiringa ekishobeekaine, n'emigamba yaaryo n'ebintu byaryo byona, ekinaabiro n'ekibunu kyakyo,

emikingo y'orugo rw'ekibuga n'enyomyo zaayo n'ebiina byazo, omukingo gw'eirembo ry'ekibuga, emiguha yaarwo n'enkondo zaarwo, kandi n'ebintu byona eby'okukoresa omu butaaho, niryo Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
n'eby'okujwara ebibaziirwe gye eby'okukoresa omu Mwanya ogurikwera, n'ebijwaro ebirikwera ebya Arooni omunyamurwa n'eby'abatabani eby'okukoresa omurimo gw'obunyamurwa.
Abaisraeli baakora omurimo gwona, nibakuratira byona ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Musa yaayetegyereza emirimo yoona, yaareeba bagiherize; nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire, nikwo baabaire bagikozire. Musa yaabashabira omugisha.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwezi kw'okubanza oryaimutsya obutaaho bw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu;
obutemu eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya, oteho omukingo gw'okugikingira,
otemu emeeza, otebeekanise ebintu ebigiriho, otemu ekikondo ky'etabaaza, okiteho amatabaaza gaakyo,
ekyoterero ky'ezaabu eky'okwotereraho obubaane okite omu maisho g'eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya, ote omukingo aha muryango gw'obutaaho,
ote eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo omu maisho g'omuryango gw'obutaaho bw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
ote ekinaabiro ahagati y'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu n'eitambiro, kandi okishukyemu amaizi,
oimutsye orugo, rwehinguririze ekibuga, ote omukingo aha irembo ryakyo,
otware amajuta g'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, ogashukye aha butaaho n'aha bintu byona ebirimu, obweze n'ebintu byabwo byona, bube oburikwera;
