ogashukye n'aha itambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo, n'ebintu byaryo byona, oryeze; eryo itambiro ribe eririkwera munonga,
kandi ogashukye n'aha kinaabiro n'aha kibunu kyakyo, okyeze.
Bwanyima oreete Arooni n'abatabani aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, oboozye n'amaizi,
ojwekye Arooni ebijwaro birikwera, omushukyeho amajuta, omweze, abone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa;
oreete n'abatabani, obajwekye ekooti,
obashukyeho amajuta, nk'oku oriba waagashukire ahari ishebo, babone kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa; okwo kushukwaho kwabo kuryabahaisa obunyamurwa bw'ebiro byona omu busingye bwabo bwona.
Musa yaakora atyo; nk'ebi MUKAMA yaamuragiire byona oku byabaire biri, nikwo Musa yaakozire.
Omu kwezi kw'okubanza okw'omu mwaka gwa kabiri, aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwo kwezi obutaaho bwaimukibwa.
Musa yaimutsya obwo butaaho, yaataho ebiina byabwo, yaimutsya embaaho zaabwo, yaatamu embazi zaabwo, yaabyara n'enyomyo zaabwo.
Bwanyima yaashakaaza obutaaho eihema, yaaritaho eky'okurishweka, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Yaatwara Ebirikuhamya, yaabita omu shanduukye, yaata emigamba omu bifunga byayo, ahaiguru yaayo yaataho ekitebe ky'okusaasira;
yaataasya egyo shanduukye omu butaaho, yaataho omukingo gw'okukingira eshanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Bwanyima yaata emeeza omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu enyima y'omukingo aha rubaju rw'obutaaho orurikureeba obukiizi-bwa-bumosho,
yaagitebeekanisaho emigaati omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Kandi yaata ekikondo ky'etabaaza omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, kyareebana n'emeeza, aha rubaju rw'obutaaho aharikureeba obukiizi-bwa-buryo,
yaakitaho amatabaaza omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nk'oku yaamuragiire.
Yaata ekyoterero ky'ezaabu omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho g'omukingo,
yaakyotereraho obubaane bw'eby'emigaju ebirikutaamirana, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Yaata omukingo aha muryango gw'obutaaho;
yaata eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo omu maisho g'omuryango gw'obutaaho bw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, yaaritambiraho ekitambo ky'okwotsya n'eky'esaano, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Kandi yaata ekinaabiro ahagati y'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu n'eryo itambiro, yaakishukamu amaizi g'okunaaba,
eki Musa na Arooni n'abatabani baabaire banaabiramu engaro zaabo n'ebigyere byabo;
ku baabaire baba nibataaha omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, kandi nibaza aha itambiro, banaaba, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Bwanyima yaimutsya orugo kwehinguririza obutaaho n'eitambiro, yaataho omukingo gw'eirembo ry'ekibuga. Atyo Musa yaaheza omurimo.
Musa tiyaabaasa kutaaha omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, ahabw'okuba ekyo kicu kikaba kiririho, kandi ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kiijwire obwo butaaho.
Omu ngyendo zaabo zoona ekyo kicu ku kyabaire kiihwa ahari obwo butaaho, Abaisraeli baimuka, bagyenda;
kwonka ku kyabaire kiba kitaihirweho, bakaba batagyenda, okuhitsya aha izooba eri kyabaire kiihirwaho.
Ahakuba ekicu kya MUKAMA kikaba kiguma ahari obwo butaaho nyomushana, kandi kibamu omuriro nyekiro omu maisho g'ab'enju ya Israeli boona omu ngyendo zaabo zoona.
MUKAMA akeeta Musa, yaagambira nawe omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, naagira ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli, obagire oti: Omuntu weena omuriimwe ku ariba naareetera MUKAMA ekitambo, muryaguma muhongye ekirugire omu masyo g'ente nari ag'entaama.
Ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'ekitambo ky'okwotsya, kiikirizibwe ahabwe okumurihiirira.
Aitire egyo nimi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, batabani ba Arooni abanyamurwa bareete eshagama yaayo, bagishukyere eitambiro eriri aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu embaju zoona.
Abaagye ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya, akicwagure nk'oku emyanya yaakyo eri.
Bwanyima batabani ba Arooni omunyamurwa bate omuriro aha itambiro, baguteekyereho enku,
bate ebyo bicweka n'omutwe n'ebishaju aha nku eziri aha muriro aha itambiro, nibabikuratanisa gye;

kwonka eby'omunda byakyo n'amaguru gaakyo babyozye n'amaizi; kandi omunyamurwa abyokyeze kimwe aha itambiro, kuba ekitambo ekyokize, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ey'ekisooroora kirungi, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Ekitambo kye eky'okwotsya ku kiriba nikiruga omu busyo bw'entaama nari obw'embuzi, atambe empaya etaine kamogo.
Agiitire omu maisho ga MUKAMA aha rubaju rw'eitambiro orurikureeba obukiizi-bwa-bumosho; batabani ba Arooni abanyamurwa bashukyeere eitambiro eshagama yaayo embaju zoona;
agicwagacwagure nk'oku emyanya yaayo eri n'omutwe gwayo n'ebishaju byayo, omunyamurwa abite aha nku eziri aha muriro gw'aha itambiro, naabikuratanisa gye;
kwonka eby'omunda byayo n'amaguru gaayo abyozye n'amaizi, abitambe byona, abyokyeze aha itambiro; ekyo n'ekitambo ekyokize, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ey'ekisooroora kirungi ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Kandi ekitambo kye eky'okwotsya ku kiriba kiri enyonyi, areete ekitambo ky'obwiba nari enkombe nto.
Omunyamurwa agireete aha itambiro, agihotore ebitsya, agicweho omutwe, agyokyeze aha itambiro; eshagama yaayo egikamuukyemu neejwera aha rubaju rw'eitambiro;
agiihemu ekitondoro, agihaanyeho ebyoya, abinagye aha rubaju rw'eitambiro orurikureeba oburugwa-izooba, ahu baata eiju ry'akashenda.

Akwate amapapa gaayo, agitaagure, kwonka atagitaanisamu, agyokyeze aha itambiro aha nku eziri aha muriro; ekyo n'ekitambo ekyokize, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ey'ekisooroora kirungi, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.

agireetere batabani ba Arooni abanyamurwa, agiiheho oruhi rw'esaano y'obunono n'amajuta, hamwe n'obubaane bwayo bwona, omunyamurwa abyokyeze aha itambiro kuba ekiijutsyo, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro y'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Ekiritsigara ahari egyo mpongano y'esaano kibe ekya Arooni n'abatabani; egyo n'empongano erikwera munonga omu mpongano ezihongyeirwe MUKAMA ezokiibwe omu muriro.
Ku orihonga empongano y'esaano eteekire omu iteekyero ry'emigaati, ebe twakeeki otutatumbisiibwe otw'esaano y'obunono otujwangizemu amajuta, nari capati ezitatumbisiibwe ezisiigirweho amajuta.
Kandi ku orihonga empongano y'esaano ekarangire, ebe esaano y'obunono etatumbisiibwe, ejwangizemu amajuta.
Okicwemu ebicweka, obishukyeho amajuta; egyo n'empongano y'esaano.
Empongano yaawe ku eriba eri ey'esaano ekarangisiibwe amajuta aha kyoma, ebe ey'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu amajuta.
Empongano y'esaano ekozirwe omu miringo egyo oryagireetera MUKAMA; ku erireetwa aha munyamurwa, agitware aha itambiro,
aihe ahari egyo mpongano ekiijutsyo kyayo, akyokyeze aha itambiro kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro y'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Ekiritsigara ahari egyo mpongano y'esaano, kibe ekya Arooni n'abatabani; egyo n'empongano erikwera munonga omu mpongano ezihongyeirwe MUKAMA, ezokiibwe omu muriro.
Empongano z'esaano ezirimu ekitumbisa n'obwoki muryazihongyera MUKAMA nk'omuganuro, kwonka zitarihongyerwa aha itambiro kuba empongano y'ekisooroora kirungi.
Empongano y'esaano yoona oryaguma ogitemu omwonyo, kandi otariikiriza empongano zaawe ez'esaano kuburamu omwonyo gw'endagaano ya Ruhanga waawe; empongano zaawe zoona oryaguma ozihongye n'omwonyo.
ogishukyeho amajuta, kandi ogimemeerereho obubaane bwa lebona; egyo n'empongano y'esaano.
Omunyamurwa ayotsye akacweka k'ebihere by'engano n'amajuta hamwe n'obwo bubaane bwona kuba ekiijutsyo kyayo; egyo n'empongano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA eyokiibwe omu muriro.
Kandi empongano ye ku eriba eri ekitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, yaakiiha omu busyo bw'ente yaaba nimi nari enyana, ahongye ekitaine kamogo omu maisho ga MUKAMA,
ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'empongano ye, agiitire aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; batabani ba Arooni abanyamurwa bashukyeere eitambiro eshagama embaju zoona.
Aihe ahari ekyo kitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA, ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda n'ebishaju byona ebibiriho,
n'entsigo zombi eziri aha mugongo n'ebishaju byazo, n'ekishaabo ky'aha kitugu, abihongye;
batabani ba Arooni bagyokyeze aha itambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo aha nku eziri aha muriro; egyo n'empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ey'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Empongano ye ey'ekitambo ky'okusiima MUKAMA ahabw'obusingye ku eriba eri ey'omu busyo bw'entaama, yaaba mpaya nari omwagazi, ahongye ekitaine kamogo.
Ku arihayo omwana gw'entaama kuba empongano ye, aguhongye omu maisho ga MUKAMA;
kandi ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'empongano ye, agiitire omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; batabani ba Arooni bashukyeere eitambiro eshagama embaju zoona.

Aihe ebishaju ahari ekyo kitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, ekyokiibwe omu muriro, ekihongyeirwe MUKAMA, n'omukira gwona ogw'ebishaju agukuuriraine n'engugi, n'ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'ebishaju byona ebibiriho,
n'entsigo zombi eziri aha mugongo n'ebishaju byazo, n'ekishaabo eky'aha kitugu akitwarirane n'entsigo;
omunyamurwa akyokyeze aha itambiro kuba empongano y'eby'okurya eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Empongano ye ku eriba eri ey'embuzi, agihongye omu maisho ga MUKAMA;
ate engaro ze aha mutwe gwayo, agiitire omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; batabani ba Arooni bashukyere eitambiro eshagama yaayo embaju zoona;
aihe ahari ekyo kitambo empongano ye eyokiibwe omu muriro ei ahongyeire MUKAMA, ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'ebishaju byona ebibiriho,
n'entsigo zombi eziri aha mugongo n'ebishaju ebiziriho, n'ekishaabo eky'aha kitugu akitwarirane n'entsigo.
Omunyamurwa abyokyeze aha itambiro; n'eby'okurya by'empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro eby'ekisooroora kirungi; ebishaju byona n'ebya MUKAMA.
Kiryaba ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona n'omu maka gaanyu goona, imwe okutarya bishaju nari eshagama.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omuntu ku arikora ekibi atakikozire nkana, yaakora kimwe aha bi MUKAMA yaazibiire,

ku ariba ari omunyamurwa owaashukirweho amajuta okozire ekibi ekyo, akareetera eihanga ryona orubanja, ahongyerere ekibi eki akozire enimi y'ekimasha etaine kamogo, agihongyere MUKAMA kuba empongano y'ekibi.
Areete egyo nimi aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ate engaro ze aha mutwe gwayo, agiitire omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Omunyamurwa owaashukirweho amajuta atware aha shagama yaayo, agireete omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
akoze orukumu omuri egyo shagama, agimiisiire emirundi mushanju omu maisho ga MUKAMA omu maisho g'omukingo ogukingiire Omwanya ogurikwera munonga;

kandi atware ahari egyo shagama, agite aha mahembe g'ekyoterero ky'obubaane oburikutaamirana omu maisho ga MUKAMA ekiri omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; kandi eshagama y'egyo nimi y'ekimasha eyaatsigaraho yoona agishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo, eriri aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Kandi ebishaju byona by'egyo nimi ey'empongano y'ekibi abiiheho, ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda n'ebishaju byona ebibiriho,
n'entsigo zombi eziri aha mugongo n'ebishaju byazo, n'ekishaabo eky'aha kitugu abitwarirane n'ezo ntsigo,
nk'oku babiiha aha nimi y'ekitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; omunyamurwa abyokyeze aha itambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo.
Kwonka oruhu rwayo n'enyama zaayo zoona n'omutwe gwayo n'amaguru gaayo n'eby'omunda byayo n'efa yaayo,
eby'egyo nimi yoona abitware aheeru y'orusiisira omu mwanya murungi, ahu baata eiju ry'akashenda, abite aha nku, abyotsye; aho ahu baata eiju, bibe niho byayokyezibwa.
bwanyima ekibi eki bakozire kyamanywa, eihanga ryona rihongye enimi y'ekimasha kuba empongano y'ekibi, bagireete omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Abakuru b'eihanga bate engaro zaabo aha mutwe gw'egyo nimi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kandi eitirwe omu maisho ge;
omunyamurwa owaashukirweho amajuta areete aha shagama y'egyo nimi omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
agikozemu orukumu, agimiisiire emirundi mushanju omu maisho ga MUKAMA omu maisho g'ogwo mukingo;

kandi atware ahari egyo shagama, agite aha mahembe g'ekyoterero, ekiri omu maisho ga MUKAMA omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; kandi eshagama y'egyo nimi eyaatsigaraho yoona agishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eitambiro ery'okwokyezaho ebitambo, eriri aha muryango gw'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu;
kandi ebishaju byayo byona abiiheho, abyokyeze aha itambiro.
Okwo abe nikwo yaatwaza egyo nimi; nk'oku atwarize enimi y'empongano y'ekibi, abe nikwo yaatwaza n'egi; omunyamurwa ahongye atyo eky'okubarihiirira, nabo baryasaasirwa.
Bwanyima atware egyo nimi aheeru y'orusiisira, agyotsye nk'oku ayokize ey'okubanza; egyo n'empongano y'ekibi ehongirwe ahabw'eihanga ryona.
bwanyima yaamanyisibwa ekibi eki akozire, areete empaya y'embuzi etaine kamogo, agihongye,
ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'egyo mbuzi, agiitire omu maisho ga MUKAMA ahu baitira ebitambo by'okwotsya; egyo n'empongano y'ekibi.

Bwanyima omunyamurwa atware aha shagama y'egyo mpongano y'ekibi aha rukumu rwe, agite aha mahembe g'eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo, endiijo shagama yoona agishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eryo itambiro.
Ebishaju byayo byona abyokyeze aha itambiro, nk'oku bootsya ebishaju by'ebitambo by'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi kye, nawe aryasaasirwa.
bwanyima yaamanyisibwa ekibi eki akozire, areete omwagazi gw'embuzi ogutaine kamogo, aguhongye ahabw'ekibi eki akozire.
Ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'egyo mpongano y'ekibi, agiitire ahu baitira ebitambo by'okwotsya.
Omunyamurwa atware aha shagama yaagwo aha rukumu rwe, agite aha mahembe g'eitambiro ery'okwokyezaho ebitambo; endiijo shagama yoona agishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eryo itambiro;

kandi ebishaju byagwo byona abiiheho, nk'oku babiiha aha bitambo by'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; omunyamurwa abyokyeze aha itambiro kuba ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA; omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi kye, nawe aryasaasirwa.
ate engaro ze aha mutwe gw'egyo mpongano y'ekibi, agiitire ahu baitira ebitambo eby'okwotsya kuba empongano y'ekibi.
Omunyamurwa atware aha shagama y'egyo mpongano y'ekibi aha rukumu rwe, agite aha mahembe g'eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo; endiijo shagama yaagwo agishukye ahansi aha kibunu ky'eryo itambiro;

ebishaju byagwo byona abiiheho, nk'oku babiiha aha mwana gw'entaama gw'ekitambo eky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; omunyamurwa abyokyeze aha itambiro aha mpongano ezookiibwe omu muriro ahari MUKAMA, amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi eki akozire; nawe aryasaasirwa.

Nari omuntu weena ku arikora aha kintu kyona ekirikuzira, yaaba omutumbi gw'enyamaishwa erikuzira, nari ogw'ekitungirwe ekirikuzira, nari ogw'ekirikugyendesa enda ekirikuzira, atakimanyire, yaasiisikara, aryagiibwaho orubanja.
Nari ku arikora aha kirikuzira ekirikuruga omu muntu ondiijo eky'omuringo gwona atakimanyire, ku arikimanya, aryagiibwaho orubanja.
Nari omuntu ku arirahukwa aha rurimi, yaarahira kukora kubi nari kukora gye kyonakyona eki arirahuka kurahira atakimanyire, ku arikimanya aryagiibwaho orubanja rw'ekyo eki yaarahukire kurahira.
Mbwenu omuntu ku arimanya ku aine orubanja rwa kimwe ahari ebyo, ayature ekyo kibi ki akozire,

areetere MUKAMA omwagazi gw'entaama nari ogw'embuzi ogw'omu busyo kuba empongano ey'okumwihisaho orubanja rw'ekibi eki akozire; omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi kye; nawe aryasaasirwa.

Kwonka ku ariba ari omworo otarikubaasa kureeta omwana gw'entaama, areete obwiba bubiri nari enkombe nto ibiri, azihongyere MUKAMA kuba empongano y'okumwihisaho orubanja rw'ekibi eki akozire, emwe ebe empongano ey'ekibi, endiijo ebe empongano ey'okwotsya.
Azireetere omunyamurwa, nawe abanze kutamba ey'empongano y'ekibi, agihotore ebitsya, agicweho omutwe, kwonka atagibaganisamu habiri;
atware aha shagama y'egyo mpongano y'ekibi, agimiisiire aha rubaju rw'eitambiro; endiijo shagama yoona egikamuukyemu, neejwera ahansi aha kibunu ky'eitambiro; egyo n'empongano y'ekibi.
Eya kabiri agihongye kuba empongano y'okwotsya, nk'omugyenzo ogwatairweho oku guri; omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi eki akozire, nawe aryasaasirwa.
Egyo saano agireetere omunyamurwa, ogwo munyamurwa agiiheho oruhi kuba ekiijutsyo kyayo, agyokyeze aha itambiro ahaiguru y'empongano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA eyokiibwe omu muriro; egyo n'empongano y'ekibi.
Atyo omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okurihiirira ekibi kyona eki akozire omuri ebyo byona, nawe aryasaasirwa. Esaano eritsigaraho ebe ey'omunyamurwa, nk'empongano y'esaano oku etwazibwa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Omuntu ku arishobya ekintu kimwe omu birikwera ebya MUKAMA, yaakora ekibi atakimanyire, areetere MUKAMA empongano y'okumwihisaho orubanja ey'empaya y'entaama ey'omu busyo etaine kamogo, obariirire obuguzi bwayo omu shekeli z'efeeza, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja;

kandi arihe eki asiisire ahari ekyo kintu ekirikwera, akyongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano kyakyo, abihe omunyamurwa; bwanyima omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'egyo mpaya y'entaama ey'okwihaho orubanja, ebe empongano ey'okumurihiirira; kandi aryasaasirwa.

Aryaiha omu busyo empaya y'entaama etaine kamogo, nk'oku oribariirira obuguzi bwayo, kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, agireetere omunyamurwa; omunyamurwa amuhongyerere kurihiirira eki ashobize atamanyire, nawe aryasaasirwa.
Egyo n'empongano ey'okwihaho orubanja; ahakuba buzima naaba aine orubanja omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Omuntu weena ku arishiisha, yaacumura ahari MUKAMA omu kuryangatanisa ebi mutaahi we amubiikize, nari ebi ayemerereire, nari omu kumunyaga nari omu kumuhata,
nari okugwa aha kibuzire, akakiryangatanisa naarahira ebishuba, nari ekintu kyona omu bi abantu bakora bakabisiisiramu, biryatwazibwa biti;
omuntu ku arikikora, yaagiibwaho orubanja, aryariha eki aibire, nari eki anyagiise eishaija, nari eki aryangataniise bamubiikize, nari eki atorotoire kibuzire,
nari ekintu kyona eki ayehakaine naarahira ebishuba, aryabigarura byona, kandi abyongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano, abihe mukama waabyo aha izooba eri arihongyeraho empongano y'okwihaho orubanja;
bwanyima areetere omunyamurwa empongano egyo, ei ahongyeire MUKAMA kumwihaho orubanja, empaya y'entaama etaine kamogo, nk'oku oribariirira obuguzi bwayo, kuba empongano y'okumwihaho orubanja;
omunyamurwa amuhongyerere empongano y'okumurihiirira omu maisho ga MUKAMA; nawe aryasaasirwa eki ariba akozire kyona ekyamureeteire orwo rubanja.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Ragiira Arooni n'abatabani oti: Eki nikyo kiragiro ky'ebitambo by'okwotsya. Ekitambo ky'okwotsya kiryaguma kiteebwe aha nku z'aha itambiro, kiraareho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, kandi omuriro gw'aha itambiro gugume nigwaka.
Omunyamurwa ajware ekanzu ye ya bafuta, n'empare ye ya kitaani, ayoore eiju ry'ekitambo ekyokize, ekyokiibwe omu muriro aha itambiro, arite aha rubaju rw'eitambiro;
bwanyima ajuure ebyo bijwaro, ajware ebindi, atware eiju aheeru y'orusiisira, aryate omu mwanya murungi.
Omuriro gw'aha itambiro guryaguma nigwaka, gutariraara; omunyamurwa agume agutemu enku buri kasheeshe, ariteho gye ekitambo ky'okwotsya, ayotsyeho ebishaju by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Ogwo muriro gugume nigwaka aha itambiro obutoosha, gutariraara.
Eki nikyo kiragiro ky'empongano y'esaano. Batabani ba Arooni baryaguma bagihongye omu maisho ga MUKAMA omu maisho g'eitambiro.
Omunyamurwa agiiheho oruhi rw'esaano y'obunono n'amajuta gaayo n'obubaane bwa lebona bwona obugimemeereirweho, abyokyeze aha itambiro kuba ekiijutsyo kyayo ky'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Ebiraatsigareho biriibwe Arooni n'abatabani; babiriire omu mwanya gurikwera bitatumbisiibwe; omu kibuga ky'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu babe nimwo baabiriira.
Bataribiteekyerana n'ekitumbisa; naakibaha kuba omugabo gwabo ogw'empongano ezi mpongyeirwe ezokiibwe omu muriro; n'ebirikwera munonga, nk'empongano y'ekibi n'ey'okwihaho orubanja oku biri.

Oyetwa omushaija weena omuri beene Arooni akiryeho, nk'omugabo gwe ogurikuruga omu mpongano ezokiibwe omu muriro ezihongyeirwe MUKAMA; kibe ekiragiro ky'ebiro byona omu busingye bwanyu bwona; oribikoraho weena aryaba orikwera.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Egi niyo mpongano ei Arooni n'abatabani barihongyera MUKAMA aha izooba eri arishukirwaho amajuta; ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ekya eefa y'esaano y'obunono kuba empongano y'esaano obutoosha, ekicweka kyayo kihongwe omu kasheeshe, n'ekindi omu mwabazyo.
Ogiteekyerane n'amajuta aha kyoma ky'okukarangaho; ku eraahikwemu amajuta, ogireete, ogihongye omu bicweka bikarangire kuba empongano y'esaano y'ekisooroora kirungi ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Kandi omunyamurwa ow'omuri batabani ba Arooni oriba ashukirweho amajuta kumuhungurira, abe niwe yaagihongyera MUKAMA, nk'ekiragiro ky'obutoosha oku kirikuragiira; empongano egyo eyokibwe yoona.
Buri mpongano y'esaano erihongwa omunyamurwa eryayokibwa yoona, teririibwa.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Gambira Arooni n'abatabani oti: Eki nikyo kiragiro ky'empongano y'ekibi. Omwanya ogu baitiramu ekitambo ky'okwotsya babe niho baaguma nibaitira n'empongano y'ekibi omu maisho ga MUKAMA; egyo n'empongano erikwera munonga.
Omunyamurwa oriba naagitamba ahabw'ekibi, abe niwe yaagirya; eriirwe omu mwanya gurikwera omu kibuga ky'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Ekirikora aha nyama yaayo kyona kiryaba ekirikwera; kandi eshagama yaayo ku eritaraakira ekijwaro kyona, ekyo kijwaro ekyataraakirwa eshagama oryakyogyeza omu mwanya gurikwera.
Orwabya oru eteekirwemu ruryayatwa; kwonka ku eriba eteekirwe omu rwabya rw'emiringa, orwo rwabya ruryakuutwa, kandi rumunyuguzibwe n'amaizi.
Oyetwa omushaija weena omu banyamurwa agiryeho; egyo n'empongano erikwera munonga.
Kwonka empongano y'ekibi yoona, ei eshagama yaayo erireetwa omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu kurihiirira ekibi omu Mwanya ogurikwera, etaririibwa, kureka eyokibwe omu muriro.
Omu mwanya ogu baitiramu ekitambo ky'okwotsya, babe niho baaguma nibaitira n'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, eshagama yaayo eshukyeerwe eitambiro embaju zoona.
Kandi ebishaju byayo byona bihongwe, omukira gwayo gw'ebishaju, ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda,
entsigo zombi eziri aha mugongo n'ebishaju ebiziriho, n'ekishaabo eky'aha kitugu akitwarirane n'ezo ntsigo, omunyamurwa abiiheho,
abyokyeze aha itambiro kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA; egyo n'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja.
Oyetwa omushaija omu banyamurwa weena agiryeho; eriirwe omu mwanya gurikwera; egyo n'empongano erikwera munonga.
Nk'empongano y'ekibi oku eri, nikwo n'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja eri; ekiragiro kyazo ni kimwe; omunyamurwa orikuzihonga abe niwe yaagitwara.
Omunyamurwa orikutamba ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'omuntu weena, abe niwe yaatwara oruhu rw'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eki yaatamba.
Kandi empongano y'esaano yoona eteekyeirwe omu iteekyero ry'emigaati, n'ekintu kyona ekikarangisiibwe amajuta aha kyoma, kandi n'ekiteekirwe aha kyoma, biryaba eby'omunyamurwa owaabihayo.
N'empongano y'esaano yoona ejwangizemu amajuta nari ey'esaano eyomire, eryabaganwa batabani ba Arooni boona nibainganisa.

Omuntu ku arikihonga ahabw'okusiima, hamwe n'ekyo kitambo ky'okusiima areete twakeeki otutatumbisiibwe otujwangize n'amajuta, na capati ezitatumbisiibwe ezisiigirwe amajuta, n'otundi twakeeki tw'esaano y'obunono otujwangize gye n'amajuta.
Twakeeki otwo atwongyereho emigaati etatumbisiibwe, abihongye hamwe n'ekitambo kye ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, eki arikuhonga ahabw'okusiima MUKAMA.
Ahari buri empongano aiheho omugaati gumwe kuba empongano y'okuzongazonzya ahari MUKAMA, gube omugabo gw'omunyamurwa orikushukyeera eshagama y'ekitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Enyama y'ekitambo ky'empongano ze ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye eryariibwa aha izooba eri ekyo kitambo kirihongyerwaho; atarigira ei yaatsigaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Kwonka ekitambo ky'empongano ye ku kiriba kiri eky'okuhiga, nari eki atoizire ahabw'okweyendera, kiryariibwa aha izooba eri arikiheeraho, kandi ekiritsigaraho kiriibwe omu kasheeshe;
kwonka enyama y'ekitambo ekyo eritsigaraho okuhitsya aha izooba rya kashatu, eryayokibwa omu muriro.

Kandi enyama yoona ey'ekitambo ey'empongano ze z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, ku eririibwa aha izooba rya kashatu, teriikirizibwa, kandi teribarirwa ogwo ogihongire; eryaba erikunugwa, kandi origiryaho weena aryagiibwaho orubanja rw'okutahikiirira.
Enyama erikora aha kirikuzira kyona etaririibwa, kureka eyokibwe omu muriro. Abashemeire boona nibaikirizibwa kurya enyama y'ekitambo,
kwonka omuntu weena orirya aha nyama y'ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima MUKAMA ahabw'obusingye, akisiisikaire, omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.

Kandi omuntu weena ku arikora aha kintu kyona ekirikuzira, ekirikuruga omu muntu, nari aha nyamaishwa erikuzira, nari aha kintu kyona ekisiisikaire ekirikuzira, haza akarya aha nyama y'ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima MUKAMA ahabw'obusingye, omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Mutarirya ebishaju by'ente nari eby'entaama nari eby'embuzi.
Ebishaju by'ekyefeereire nari eby'ekiitsirwe enyamaishwa nibibaasa kukoresibwa omu muringo gundi gwona, kwonka mutaribiryaho na kakye;
ahakuba omuntu weena orirya aha bishaju by'enyamaishwa y'omu birikuhongyerwa MUKAMA ebirikwokibwa omu muriro, omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
Kandi mutarirya eshagama y'omuringo gwona ey'ebirikuguruka nari ey'enyamaishwa omu maka gaanyu goona.
Omuntu weena orirya eshagama y'omuringo gwona, acuubwe omu ihanga rye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:

Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Oritambira MUKAMA ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, areetere MUKAMA empongano ye; aihe aha kitambo ekyo eky'okuhongyera MUKAMA ekirikwokibwa omu muriro, akyereetere n'engaro ze;
areete ebishaju n'enkoro, egyo nkoro bagizongazonzye, ebe empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Omunyamurwa ayotsye ebishaju aha itambiro; kwonka enkoro ebe eya Arooni n'abatabani.
Kandi aha bitambo by'empongano zaanyu ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, muryaguma muhe omunyamurwa ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo kuba empongano eihirweho.
Ow'omuri batabani ba Arooni, oriba naatamba eshagama n'ebishaju by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, abe niwe yaatwara ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo kuba omugabo gwe;

ahakuba enkoro erikuzongazongibwa n'ekivune ky'okuguru ekiihwaho, naabiiha aha Baisraeli omu bitambo by'empongano zaabo z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, naabiha Arooni omunyamurwa n'abatabani kuba omugabo gwabo ogw'ebiro byona, ogu bahairwe Abaisraeli.

Ogwo nigwo mugabo gwa Arooni n'abatabani ogwihirwe omu mpongano ezookiibwe omu muriro, ebihairweyo ahari MUKAMA, ogwabaihiirweho aha izooba eri baamurikiirweho omu maisho ga MUKAMA kumuheereza nk'abanyamurwa be;
ogwo mugabo MUKAMA akaragiira Abaisraeli kuguma nibagubaha, yaakiragiira aha izooba eri yaabashukiireho amajuta kubashoroora. Ekyo kyaba ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwabo bwona.
Ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'ekitambo eky'okwotsya, n'eky'empongano y'esaano, n'eky'empongano y'ekibi, n'eky'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, n'eky'okushoroora, n'eky'ekitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye,
ebi MUKAMA yaaragiriire Musa aha rushozi Sinai, aha izooba eri yaaragiriireho Abaisraeli kureetera MUKAMA empongano zaabo omu ihamba rya Sinai.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Twara Arooni n'abatabani n'ebijwaro biri n'amajuta g'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, n'enimi y'ekimasha ey'empongano y'ekibi, n'empaya ibiri z'entaama, n'ekiibo ky'emigaati etatumbisiibwe;
kandi oteeranire eihanga ryona aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Musa yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiira; eihanga ryona ryateeranira aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Musa yaagambira eihanga ryona ati: Eki nikyo MUKAMA yaaragiira kukorwa.
Musa yaareeta Arooni n'abatabani, yaaboozya n'amaizi;
yaamujweka ekooti, yaamuzirika n'eky'okwezirikisa kiri, yaamujweka ekanzu, yaagitungikaho efodi, yaamuzirika eky'okwezirikisa kya efodi ekirukirwe abanyamwoga, yaakigimuhamisaho;
yaamujweka eky'aha kifuba kiri, kandi omurikyo yaakitamu Urimu na Tumimu.
Yaamujweka ekikwemba aha mutwe, kandi aha kikwemba omu maisho yaataho ekipande ky'ezaabu, nikyo kirunga ekirikwera, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Bwanyima Musa yaihayo amajuta gari ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora, yaagashuka aha butaaho n'ahari byona ebyabaire birimu, yaabyeza.
Yaagamiisiira n'aha itambiro emirundi mushanju, kandi yaagashuka ahari eryo itambiro n'ebintu byaryo byona, n'aha kinaabiro n'ekibunu kyakyo, kubyeza.
Kandi yaagashuka n'aha mutwe gwa Arooni kumweza.
Bwanyima Musa yaareeta batabani ba Arooni, yaabajweka ekooti, yaabazirika n'eby'okwezirikisa, yaabajweka n'enkofiira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Bwanyima yaareeta enimi y'ekimasha ey'empongano y'ekibi; Arooni n'abatabani baata engaro zaabo aha mutwe gw'egyo nimi y'empongano y'ekibi.

Musa yaagiita, yaatwara eshagama yaayo, yaagita aha mahembe g'eitambiro n'orukumu rwe aha nshonda zaaryo zoona, yaarishemeza, yaashuka endiijo shagama yoona ahansi aha kibunu kyaryo kuririhiirira, yaaryeza.
Yaatwara ebishaju byona ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'ekishaabo eky'aha kitugu, n'entsigo zombi n'ebishaju byazo, yaabyokyeza aha itambiro.
Kwonka enimi, oruhu rwayo n'enyama zaayo n'efa yaayo, yaabyokyeza aheeru y'orusiisira nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Yaareeta empaya y'entaama kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya; Arooni n'abatabani baata engaro zaabo aha mutwe gw'egyo mpaya.
Musa yaagiita, yaashukyera eitambiro eshagama yaayo embaju zoona.
Ku yaaherize kugicwagacwagura, yaayotsya omutwe gwayo n'ebicweka byayo n'ebishaju byayo;

yaayozya eby'omunda byayo n'amaguru gaayo n'amaizi, yaayokyeza egyo mpaya yoona aha itambiro; kyaba ekitambo kyokize eky'ekisooroora kirungi, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Bwanyima yaareeta empaya y'entaama eya kabiri, empaya ey'okushoroorwa kw'abanyamurwa; Arooni n'abatabani baata engaro zaabo aha mutwe gwayo;
Musa yaagiita, yaatwara aha shagama yaayo, yaagita aha nshonga y'okutu kwa Arooni okwa buryo n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'engaro ya buryo, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'ekigyere kya buryo;

bwanyima yaareeta batabani ba Arooni, yaata eshagama aha nshonga z'amatu gaabo aga buryo n'aha bikumu bishaija eby'engaro zaabo za buryo n'aha bikumu bishaija eby'ebigyere byabo bya buryo; Musa yaashukyeera endiijo shagama yoona aha itambiro embaju zoona.
Kandi yaatwara ebishaju byayo n'omukira gw'ebishaju n'ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'ekishaabo ky'aha kitugu n'entsigo zombi n'ebishaju byazo n'ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo;

kandi omu kiibo ky'emigaati etatumbisiibwe eyaabaire etuura omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaihamu kaakeeki kamwe akatatumbisiibwe, n'akandi akasiigirwe amajuta na capati emwe, yaabita ahari ebyo bishaju n'aha kivune ky'okuguru kwayo okwa buryo;
byona yaabita aha ngaro za Arooni n'aha ngaro z'abatabani, yaabizongazonzya, byaba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA.

Bwanyima Musa yaabiiha omu ngaro zaabo, yaabyokyeza aha itambiro hamwe n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya, nk'empongano y'okushoroorwa kw'abanyamurwa ey'ekisooroora kirungi; yaaba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.

Kandi Musa yaatwara enkoro, yaagizongazonzya kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA; enkoro egyo yaaba omugabo gwa Musa ogw'ahari egyo mpaya y'okushoroorwa kw'abanyamurwa, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.

Kandi Musa yaatwara aha majuta ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora n'aha shagama eyaabaire eri aha itambiro, yaabimiisiira ahari Arooni n'aha bijwaro bye n'aha batabani n'aha bijwaro byabo; atyo yaayeza Arooni n'ebijwaro bye n'abatabani n'ebijwaro byabo.

Bwanyima Musa yaagambira Arooni n'abatabani ati: Muteekye egyo nyama aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, mube niho mwagiriira hamwe n'emigaati eri omu kiibo ey'okushoroorwa kw'abanyamurwa, nk'oku naaragiire, ningira nti: Arooni n'abatabani bagirye.
Enyama n'emigaati ebiraatsigareho, mubyotsye n'omuriro.
Mumare ebiro mushanju, mutarikushohora aheeru y'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, okuhitsya ahu ebiro by'okushoroorwa kwanyu birihwera; ahabw'okuba okushoroorwa kwanyu nikwija kumara ebiro mushanju.
Nk'oku byakorwa eri izooba, nikwo MUKAMA yaaragiira ku biguma nibikorwa bityo okubarihiirira.
Nimwija kuguma aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu nyomushana na nyekiro okumara ebiro mushanju, nimukora eki MUKAMA yaaragiira, mutakaafa; ahakuba nikwo naaragiirwa.
Arooni n'abatabani baakora byona ebi baaragiririirwe omuri Musa.
Aha kiro kya munaana Musa yaayeta Arooni n'abatabani n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli,
yaagambira Arooni ati: Twara enimi y'ekimasha kuba empongano y'ekibi, n'empaya y'entaama kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, ebitaine kamogo byombi, obitambire omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi ogambire Abaisraeli oti: Mutware empaya y'embuzi kuba empongano y'ekibi, n'enyana hamwe n'omwana gw'entaama ebihikize omwaka gumwe ebitaine kamogo kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya,

n'enimi n'empaya y'entaama kuba empongano ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, bitambirwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA; kandi mutware n'empongano y'esaano ejwangize n'amajuta; ahakuba eri izooba MUKAMA naija kubeeyoreka.
Baareeta omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu ebi Musa yaaragiira; eihanga ryona ryairira haihi, ryayemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Musa yaagira ati: Eki nikyo MUKAMA yaabaragiira kukora; kandi ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA nikiija kubabonekyera.

Musa yaagira Arooni ati: Hika aha itambiro, ohongye empongano yaawe y'ekibi n'ekitambo kyawe ky'okwotsya, kandi okore eby'okwerihiirira n'eby'okurihiirira abantu; oreete n'empongano y'abantu, okore eby'okubarihiirira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire.
Atyo Arooni yaahika aha itambiro, yaita enyana y'empongano y'ekibi ey'okwehongyerera;
abatabani baamureetera eshagama, yaagikozamu orukumu, yaagita aha mahembe g'eitambiro, endiijo yaagishuka ahansi aha kibunu ky'eitambiro;
kwonka ebishaju n'entsigo zombi n'ekishaabo ky'aha kitugu eby'egyo mpongano y'ekibi yaabyokyeza aha itambiro, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Enyama yaayo n'oruhu rwayo yaabyotsya omu muriro aheeru y'orusiisira.
Bwanyima yaita ekitambo ky'okwotsya; abatabani baamureetera eshagama yaakyo, yaagishukyeera eitambiro embaju zoona;
baamureetera ebicweka by'ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya, kimwe kimwe hamwe n'omutwe gwakyo; yaabyokyeza aha itambiro.
Yaayozya eby'omunda n'amaguru gaakyo, yaabita aha kitambo ky'okwotsya, yaabyokyeza aha itambiro.
Bwanyima yaareeta ekitambo ky'okwotsya, yaakihonga nk'oku omugyenzo gwakyo guri.
Kandi yaareeta empongano y'esaano, yaagiihaho oruhi rwijwire, yaagyokyeza aha itambiro, naagyongyera aha kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'omu kasheeshe.
Kandi yaita n'egyo nimi n'empaya y'entaama eby'okutambirira abantu kuba empongano zaabo ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; abatabani baamureetera eshagama yaabyo, yaagishukyera eitambiro embaju zoona,
kandi n'ebishaju by'enimi n'eby'empaya, n'omukira gw'ebishaju, n'ebishaju ebishwekire eby'omunda, n'entsigo zombi, n'ekishaabo ky'aha kitugu;
baata ebyo bishaju aha nkoro zaazo, yaabyokyeza aha itambiro;
kwonka enkoro zaazo n'ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo Arooni yaabizongazonzya kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nk'oku Musa yaaragiire.
Musa na Arooni baataaha omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; ku baashohoire, baashabira abantu omugisha; ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyabonekyera abantu boona.
Omuriro gwaruga omu maisho ga MUKAMA, gwayokyeza kimwe ekitambo ky'okwotsya n'ebishaju ebyabaire biri aha itambiro; abantu boona ku baakireebire, baayamuza, baagwa ahansi bajuumaire.
Ahonaaho omuriro gwaruga ahari MUKAMA, gwabootsya, baafeera omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Musa yaagira Arooni ati: Eki nikyo MUKAMA yaagambire ati: Ndyayeyoreka ku ndi Orikwera omu barikuunyirira haihi, kandi ndyaheebwa ekitiinisa omu maisho g'aba bantu boona. Arooni yaahunama.
Musa yaayeta Mishaeli na Elizafani, batabani ba Uzieli, ishento wa Arooni, yaabagira ati: Mwirire haihi, mwihe beene waanyu omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera, mubatware aheeru y'orusiisira.
Bairira haihi, baabatwara bajwaire ekooti zaabo, baabaiha omu rusiisira, nk'oku Musa yaaragiira.

Musa yaagambira Arooni n'abatabani, Eleazaari na Itamaari ati: Mutazingurura eishokye, n'obu kwakuba okutaagura emyenda yaanyu, mukafa, kandi ekiniga kya MUKAMA kikajuumikira eihanga ryona; kwonka murekye beene waanyu ab'enju ya Israeli boona bacure ahabw'abookiibwe omuriro ogu MUKAMA areetsire.
Kandi mutaruga omu muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, mukafa, ahabw'okuba amajuta ga MUKAMA agu mushukirweho gabariho. Baakora nk'oku Musa yaabaragiira.
MUKAMA yaagambira Arooni ati:
Mutarinywa viinyo nari eky'okunywa eky'amaani, iwe na batabani baawe mwaba nimutaaha omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, mutakaafa; ekyo n'ekiragiro ky'ebiro byona omu busingye bwanyu bwona,
mubone kutaanisa ebirikwera n'ebitarikwera, kandi ebirikuzira n'ebitarikuzira,
n'okwegyesa Abaisraeli ebiragiro byona, ebi MUKAMA yaabagambiire naaraba omuri Musa.

Musa yaagambira Arooni n'abatabani, abaatsigaireho, Eleazaari na Itamaari, naagira ati: Mutware empongano y'esaano etsigaire aha mpongano ezihongyeirwe MUKAMA ezookiibwe omu muriro, mugiriire aha rubaju rw'eitambiro etatumbisiibwe; ahakuba n'erikwera munonga;
kandi mugiriire omu mwanya gurikwera, ahakuba n'omugabo gwawe na batabani baawe, ogu mushemereire kuheebwa aha mpongano ezihongyeirwe MUKAMA ezookiibwe omu muriro, ahakuba okwo nikwo naaragiirwe.

Kwonka enkoro ezongazongiibwe n'ekivune ky'okuguru ekiihirweho mubiriire omu mwanya gwona ogushemeire, iwe na batabani baawe na bahara baawe, ahakuba n'omugabo gwawe ogu origuma nooheebwa na batabani baawe aha bitambo by'empongano z'Abaisraeli z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.

Ekivune ky'okuguru ekiihirweho n'enkoro ezongazongiibwe baryaguma nibabireeta hamwe n'empongano z'ebishaju ez'okwokibwa omu muriro, babizongazongyeze omu maisho ga MUKAMA kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe; bibe ebyawe na batabani baawe kuba omugabo gwanyu ogw'ebiro byona, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire.
Musa yaayezirika munonga kusherura embuzi y'empongano y'ekibi, yaashanga bagyokyeize kimwe; yaagwerwa kubi Eleazaari na Itamaari, batabani ba Arooni abaatsigaireho, yaababuuza ati:
N'enki ekyabazibira kuriira empongano y'ekibi omu mwanya gw'Aharikwera, haza eri erikwera munonga; kandi mugihairwe ngu mubone kutwara okutahikiirira kw'eihanga okuririhiirira omu maisho ga mukama?
Reeba eshagama yaayo tereetsirwe mu mwanya gw'Aharikwera; buzimazima mukaabaire mugiriiriire omu mwanya gw'Aharikwera nk'oku naaragiire.

Arooni yaagarukamu Musa ati: Reeba eri izooba baaheza kutamba empongano yaabo ey'ekibi n'ekitambo kyabo ekyokiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA; ebintu ebirikushusha biti byambaho! Mbwenu shi, kuri naarya empongano y'ekibi eri izooba, kikaabaire kirungi omu maisho ga MUKAMA?
Musa ku yaakihuriire, yaaguubwa gye.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni, naabagira ati:
Mugambire Abaisraeli muti: Ebiine amagara ebi nibyo murikwikirizibwa kurya omu nyamaishwa zoona ez'omu nsi.
Enyamaishwa zoona ezaatsizemu ebyara, eziine ebigyere by'ebyara bibiri, kandi ezirikwekuuma, mube nizo mwarya.
Kwonka omuri ezo ezirikwekuuma, nari ezaatsizemu ebyara, ezi mutarizirya; engamira, ahakuba eyekuuma, kwonka tiyatsizemu byara; n'erikuzira ahariimwe;
endirira, ahakuba eyekuuma, kwonka teyatsizemu byara; n'erikuzira ahariimwe;
orumi, ahakuba rwekuuma, kwonka tirwatsizemu byara; n'orurikuzira ahariimwe;
empunu, ahakuba eyatsizemu ebyara, eine ebigyere by'ebyara bibiri, kwonka teyekuuma; n'erikuzira ahariimwe.
Enyama yaazo mutarigirya, kandi n'emitumbi yaazo mutarigikoraho; ezo n'ezizira ahariimwe.
Ebi nibyo murikwikirizibwa kurya ahari byona eby'omu maizi; eby'omu maizi ag'omu nyanja n'ag'omu migyera ebiine amapapa n'engamba, mube nibyo mwarya;
kwonka byona ebitaine mapapa na ngamba eby'omu nyanja n'omu migyera, ebirikugyendera omu maizi byona, kandi n'ebiine amagara byona eby'omu maizi, n'ebirikunugwa ahariimwe.
Biryaguma biri ebirikunugwa ahariimwe; mutarirya aha nyama yaabyo, kandi emitumbi yaabyo mugume muginugye.
Ekiri omu maizi kyona ekitaine mapapa na ngamba n'ekirikunugwa ahariimwe.
Ebi n'ebirikuguruka ebi mushemereire kunuga; bitaririibwa, n'ebirikunugwa; eishamba, empungu-mareere, kaamushungushungu,
ekyanira, nyakabaka n'oruganda rwayo,
ekikoona kyona n'oruganda rwakyo,
maaya, ekishoma-bwire, enyangi, akaca n'oruganda rwako,
ekihihizi, ekiyoyo, enyawaawa,
enkoko y'omu maizi, nyamunyonyi, ekihuhura-bahuta,
enkongoro, oruyongoyongo n'oruganda rwarwo, enkooherwa, n'orubaka.
Ebikooko byona ebiine amapapa, ebirikugyendesa amaguru magufu ana n'eby'okunugwa ahariimwe;
kwonka omu bikooko ebiine amapapa, ebirikugyendesa amaguru ana magufu, nimwikirizibwa kurya ebiine amaguru maraingwa ageehinyire ahaiguru y'ebigyere byabyo ag'okugurukisa ahansi;
ahari ebyo ebi nibyo murikwikirizibwa kurya; enzigye n'oruganda rwazo, ebiharara n'oruganda rwabyo, ejerere n'oruganda rwazo, n'eseenene n'oruganda rwazo.
Kwonka ebikooko ebindi byona ebiine amapapa, ebirikugyendesa amaguru magufu ana n'ebirikunugwa ahariimwe.
Ebyo biryabahindura abasiisikaire; omuntu weena orikora aha mutumbi gwabyo aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Weena oryekorera ekicweka kyona eky'omutumbi gwabyo, ashemereire kwozya ebijwaro bye, n'okuguma ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Enyamaishwa yoona eyaatsizemu ebyara, kwonka etaine bigyere by'ebyara bibiri, kandi etarikwekuuma, n'erikuzira ahariimwe; omuntu weena origikoraho aryaba osiisikaire.
Enyamaishwa yoona erikuribatisa ebiganja omu nyamaishwa zoona ezirikugyendesa amaguru ana, n'erikuzira ahariimwe; weena orikora aha mutumbi gwayo aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo;
kandi oryekorera omutumbi gw'emwe aharizo, ashemereire kwozya ebijwaro bye, n'okuguma ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; ezo n'ezirikuzira ahariimwe.
Ebi nibyo birikuzira ahariimwe omu birikugyendera ahansi ebiine amaguru magufu; akakorwa, embeba, entsigira-muteete n'oruganda rwayo,
ekihangare, engamba, ekinya, akanyarugondo n'enyaruju.
Ebyo nibyo ebirikuzira ahariimwe omu birikugyendera ahansi byona ebiine amaguru magufu; omuntu weena oribikoraho bifiire, aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.

Ekintu kyona eki omutumbi gwabyo gurigwaho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire; n'obu kiriba kiri ekintu ekibaizirwe omu kiti, nari ekijwaro, nari oruhu, nari ekiguniya, nari ekintu kyona ekirikukoresibwa omurimo gwona, kishemereire kuteebwa omu maizi, n'okuguma kiri ekisiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; bwanyima kibe ekishemeire.
Kandi kimwe aharibyo ku kirigwa omu kintu ky'eibumba, kyona ekiriba kiri omuri ekyo kintu kiryaba ekisiisikaire, kandi ekintu ekyo muryakyata.
Eby'okurya byona ebikirimu ebirikugiibwamu amaizi, biryaba ebisiisikaire; nari eby'okunywa byona ebirikunywebwa ebiriba biri omuri ekyo kintu biryaba ebisiisikaire.

Ekintu kyona ekiriguubwaho ekicweka ky'omutumbi gwabyo kiryaba ekisiisikaire, n'obu kiriba kiri eiteekyero ry'eby'okurya, nari amahega kyatagurwe; ebintu ebyo biryaba bisiisikaire, kandi biri ebisiisikaire ahariimwe.
Kureka enshuro nari ekiina ekyarimiirwe amaizi, omu garikuteeranira, nikyo kiriba kitasiisikaire; kwonka ekiriihamu omutumbi gwabyo kiryaba ekisiisikaire.
Kandi ekicweka kyona eky'omutumbi gwabyo ku kirigwa aha mbibo yoona ey'okubibwa, embibo egyo eryaba etasiisikaire;
kwonka ezo mbibo ku ziriba zitumbikire omu maizi, zaaguubwaho ekicweka kyona eky'omutumbi gwabyo, ziryaba ezisiisikaire ahariimwe.
Enyamaishwa yoona ei murikwikirizibwa kurya, ku erifa, orikora aha mutumbi gwayo, aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.

Kandi orirya aha mutumbi gwayo, aryayozya ebijwaro bye, agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; kandi n'oryekorera omutumbi gwayo, aryayozya ebijwaro bye, agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Ekirikugyendera ahansi kyona, n'ekirikunugwa; kitaririibwa.
Ebirikugyendera ahansi byona, yaaba ebirikugyendesa enda, yaaba eby'amaguru ana, nari eby'amaguru maingi, mutaribirya; ahakuba n'ebirikunugwa.
Mutaryehindura abarikunugwa ahabw'ekintu kyona ekirikugyendera ahansi, kandi mutaribyesiisisa, bikabashiisha.
Mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu; n'ahabw'ekyo mweyeze, mube abarikwera; ahabw'okuba ndi Orikwera; kandi mutaryeshiisha n'ekintu ky'omuringo gwona ekirikugyendera ahansi;
ahakuba niinye MUKAMA owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri kuba Ruhanga waanyu; n'ahabw'ekyo mube abarikwera, ahakuba ndi Orikwera.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro by'enyamaishwa n'ebirikuguruka n'ebiine amagara byona ebirikugyendera omu maizi na buri kihangirwe kyona ekirikugyendera ahansi,
ebitairweho kutaanisa ebirikuzira n'ebitarikuzira, n'ebiine amagara ebirikwikirizibwa kuriibwa n'ebitarikwikirizibwa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omukazi ku arigira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, aryamara ebiro mushanju atashemeire; nk'oku aba ari omu biro bye by'okuza omu kwezi, nikwo ariguma ari otashemeire.
Aha kiro kya munaana omwana ogwo aryasharwa ekishushu ky'omubiri gwe.

Kandi nyina aryagumizamu ari omu shagama y'ekizaire, amare ebiro makumi ashatu na bishatu naashemezibwa; atarikora aha kintu kyona ekyeziibwe, n'obu kwakuba okuza omu Mwanya ogurikwera ebiro by'okutashemera kwe bitakahweire.

Kwonka ku arizaara omwishiki, obwo aryamara ebiro ikumi na bina ari otashemeire nk'omu biro bye by'okuza omu kwezi; agumizemu ari omu shagama y'ekizaire, amare ebiro makumi mukaaga na mukaaga, naashemezibwa.

Ebiro by'okutashemera kwe ku birihwa, yaaba by'omwojo nari eby'omwishiki, aryareeta omwana gw'entaama oguhikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, n'enkombe nto nari akaiba kuba empongano y'ekibi, abireetere omunyamurwa aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu;
omunyamurwa abihongyere omu maisho ga MUKAMA, amurihiirire; ogwo mukazi abone kushemezibwa omu by'eshagama y'obuzaire bwe. Ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'omukazi ozaire omwana w'omwojo nari ow'omwishiki.

Kwonka ku ariba ari omworo, atarikubaasa kureeta mwana gw'entaama, areete obwiba bubiri nari enkombe nto ibiri, emwe kuba ey'ekitambo ky'okwotsya, n'endiijo kuba ey'empongano y'ekibi; omunyamurwa amurihiirire, abe oshemeziibwe.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Omuntu ku arigira aha mubiri gwe ekizimba nari ekiseera nari eibara, kyahinduka aha mubiri gwe nk'endwara y'ebibembe, bamureetere Arooni omunyamurwa nari omwe ahari batabani be abanyamurwa;

omunyamurwa ashwijume endwara ey'aha ruhu rw'omubiri gwe; ku arishanga obwoya obw'ahu endwara eri buhindukire nibwera, kandi eibara ryogire omu ruhu rw'omubiri, egyo ndwara eryaba eri ebibembe; omunyamurwa amwetegyereze, amurangye ku asiisikaire.

Kwonka ku arireeba eibara ry'aha ruhu rw'omubiri gwe niryera, kandi ritoogire mu ruhu, n'obwoya bwaho butahindukire kuba oburikwera, obwo omunyamurwa aryakingirana ogwo muntu orwaire okumara ebiro mushanju;
aha kiro kya mushanju omunyamurwa agarukye amushwijume; ku arireeba egyo ndwara egumire nk'oku ebaire eri, etabugire mubiri, obwo omunyamurwa aryagaruka amukingirane ebindi biro mushanju;

aha kiro kya mushanju ekindi omunyamurwa agarukye amushwijume; ku arishanga eibara ry'endwara ritakireebeka munonga, ritabugire mubiri, obwo amurangye ku atasiisikaire; biri n'ekiseera; ogwo muntu ayozye ebijwaro bye, abe otasiisikaire.
Kwonka ebiseera ku birimubuga omubiri, aherize kweyoreka omunyamurwa ahabw'okushemezibwa, aryagaruka ayeyorekye omunyamurwa;
omunyamurwa amushwijume; ku arireeba ebiseera bimubugira omubiri, amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'ebibembe.
omunyamurwa amushwijume; ku arishanga aine ekizimba kirikwera omu ruhu, kihindwire obwoya bwaho kuba oburikwera, kandi hacwekire ekironda,
biri n'ebibembe ebitwire aha mubiri gwe; omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; atarimukingirana, ahabw'okuba asiisikaire.
Ebibembe ku birimusheesha aha mubiri, byashweka omubiri gwe gwona kwiha aha mutwe kuta aha bigyere, aha bicweka ebi omunyamurwa arireeba,
omunyamurwa amushwijume; ku arireeba ebibembe bishwekire omubiri gwe gwona, amurangye ku atasiisikaire ahabw'endwara egyo; omubiri gwe gwona nigwera; tasiisikaire.
Kwonka ahu ekironda kirimureebekyeraho, aryaba osiisikaire.
Omunyamurwa aryashwijuma ekyo kironda, amurangye ku asiisikaire; ekyo kironda kisiisikaire; n'ebibembe.
Nari ekyo kironda ku kirigaruka kyaba ekirikwera, agarukye aha munyamurwa;
omunyamurwa amushwijume; ku arishanga endwara ehindukire neeyera, obwo omunyamurwa amurangye ku atasiisikaire; biri tasiisikaire.
Omuntu ku ariba aine aha mubiri gwe enkojo y'ekihuute ekikizire,
omu nkojo y'ekyo kihuute haazimbamu ekizimba kirikwera, nari haijamu eibara eririkutukaatukura, obwo kiryayorekwa omunyamurwa, omunyamurwa akishwijume;
ku arishanga kyogire omu ruhu rw'omubiri, n'obwoya bwaho buhindukire oburikwera, obwo omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'endwara y'ebibembe, ebarukire omu nkojo y'ekihuute.
Kwonka omunyamurwa ku arikishwijuma, yaashanga hatariho bwoya burikwera, kitoogire mu ruhu rw'omubiri, kandi kitarikureebeka munonga, omunyamurwa amukingirane okumara ebiro mushanju;
kandi ku kirimubuga omubiri, omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'endwara y'ebibembe.
Kwonka eryo ibara ku ririgumira ahu ribaire riri, ritaayeyongyera, biri n'enkojo ya kiri kihuute; omunyamurwa amurangye ku atasiisikaire.
Nari shi, omuntu ku arigira amasya aha ruhu rw'omubiri gwe, aho ahahiire haagira eibara eririkutukaatukura nari eririkwera,

omunyamurwa ahashwijume; ku arishanga obwoya oburi omuri eryo ibara buhindukire oburikwera, kandi eibara riri nk'eryogire omu ruhu rw'omubiri, biri n'ebibembe ebibarukire omuri ago masya; omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'endwara y'ebibembe.

Kwonka omunyamurwa ku arihashwijuma, yaashanga obwoya bw'omuri eryo ibara butarikwera, kandi ritoogire mu ruhu rw'omubiri, kandi ritarikureebeka munonga, omunyamurwa amukingirane okumara ebiro mushanju.
Aha kiro kya mushanju amushwijume; ku arishanga rimubugire omubiri, amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'endwara y'ebibembe.

Kwonka eryo ibara ku ririgumira ahuribaire riri, ritaabuga mubiri, kandi ritaareebeka munonga, biri n'ekizimba ekizimbire ahaabaire hahiire; omunyamurwa amurangye ku atasiisikaire; ku ziri enkojo z'omu masya ezihiriitsire.
Omushaija nari omukazi ku arigira endwara omu mutwe nari omu bireju,

omunyamurwa ashwijume egyo ndwara; ku arishanga endwara eyogire omu ruhu, obwoya bwamwo nibushusha obw'orwaire mutuku, obwo omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; biri n'ekiguuna, n'ebibembe by'omu mutwe nari omu bireju.
Omunyamurwa ku arishwijuma egyo ndwara y'ekiguuna, yaashanga etoogire omu ruhu, hatarimu ishokye nari obwoya burikwiragura, omunyamurwa amukingirane okumara ebiro mushanju;
aha kiro kya mushanju omunyamurwa ashwijume egyo ndwara; ku arishanga ekiguuna kiteeyongyeire, kandi kitarimu obwo bwoya obwa mutuku, kandi kitarikureebeka kyogire omu ruhu,
bamwe eishokye, kwonka ahu ekiguuna kiri batarihamwa; omunyamurwa amukingirane okumara ebindi biro mushanju.

Aha kiro kya mushanju ekindi, omunyamurwa ashwijume ekyo kiguuna; ku arishanga kitabugire mubiri, kandi kitarikureebeka kyogire omu ruhu, obwo omunyamurwa amurangye ku atasiisikaire; ayozye ebijwaro bye, abe oshemeire.
Kwonka ekiguuna ku kirimubuga omubiri, aherize kushemezibwa,
obwo omunyamurwa aryamushwijuma; ku arishanga ekiguuna kimubugire omubiri, ataryerusya kusherura obwoya bwa mutuku; biri asiisikaire.

Kwonka ku arireeba ekiguuna kigumiire ahu kibaire kiri, hameziremu eishokye nari obwoya burikwiragura, biri ekyo kiguuna kikizire, omuntu ogwo aryaba atasiisikaire; omunyamurwa amurangye ku atasiisikaire.
Kandi omushaija nari omukazi ku arigira amabara aha ruhu rw'omubiri gwe, ago mabara gaaba agarikwera,
omunyamurwa agashwijume; ku arishanga ago mabara g'aha ruhu rw'omubiri gwe gatarikwera munonga, biri n'amazomba kwonka agaseesire aha mubiri; aryaba atasiisikaire.
Omuntu ku ariba ahweirwe eishokye aha mutwe, aryaba aine oruhara, kwonka atasiisikaire;
omuntu ku arihwa eishokye aha bwekorerero, aryaba aine oruhara aha bwekorerero; aryaba atasiisikaire.

Kwonka omuntu ku arigira endwara y'eibara eririkutukaatukura omu ruhara orw'aha mutwe gwona, nari omu ruhara orw'aha bwekorerero, biri n'ebibembe ebirikwera omu ruhara rwe, nari omu ruhara rw'aha bwekorerero bwe.
Omunyamurwa aryamushwijuma; ku arishanga egyo ndwara y'omu ruhara rwe, nari omu ruhara rw'aha bwekorerero, kiri ekizimba ekirikutukaatukura, ekirikushusha ebibembe ebiri aha ruhu rw'omubiri,
biri n'omubembe, aryaba asiisikaire; omunyamurwa amurangye ku asiisikaire; n'endwara ye emuri omu mutwe.
Ebiro byona ebi arimara aine egyo ndwara, aryaguma ari osiisikaire; n'osiisikaire, ashemereire kuguma wenka omu nganyo aheeru y'orusiisira.
yaaba mu huuzi za bukiika nari za bwemi, eza kitaani nari ez'obwoya bw'entaama, nari omu ruhu, nari omu kintu kyona ekikozire omu ruhu,

endwara egyo ku eriba eine erangi ya kijubwe nari erikutukaatukura, yaareebeka omu kijwaro nari omu ruhu, nari omu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, nari omu kintu kyona ekikozirwe omu ruhu, eryaba eri ebibembe, eshemereire kworekwa omunyamurwa;
omunyamurwa ashwijume egyo ndwara, akingirane ekyo kintu ekigiine okumara ebiro mushanju.

Aha kiro kya mushanju ashwijume egyo ndwara; ku arishanga eyeyongyeire omuri ekyo kijwaro, yaaba mu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, nari omu ruhu orurikukoresibwa omurimo gwona, egyo ndwara eryaba eri ebibembe ebirikurya; ekyo kintu kiryaba kisiisikaire.

Ayotsye ekyo kijwaro ekiine endwara omu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, yaaba ky'obwoya bw'entaama nari ekya kitaani, nari ekintu kyona ekikozirwe omu ruhu; ahakuba kiine endwara y'ebibembe erikurya; kishemereire kwokibwa omu muriro.
Omunyamurwa ku arishwijuma, yaashanga endwara eteeyongyeire muri ekyo kijwaro omu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, nari omu kintu kyona ekikozirwe omu ruhu,
obwo omunyamurwa aryaragiira boozye ekintu ekirimu egyo ndwara, akikingirane okumara ebindi biro mushanju;

kandi omunyamurwa ashwijume ekyo kintu ekibaire kirimu endwara, kiherize kwogibwa; ku arishanga egyo ndwara etahindwire ibara, kandi eteeyongyeire, biri kisiisikaire; oryaba oshemereire kukyotsya; biri n'endwara erikurya, n'obu eibara ry'endwara egyo ryakuba riri enyima nari omunda.
Kwonka omunyamurwa ku arishwijuma ahu endwara ebaire eri, yaashanga etarikureebeka munonga, haherize kwogibwa, ataagure eibara omu kijwaro, nari omu ruhu, nari omu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi;
egyo ndwara ku erireebeka ekiri omuri ekyo kijwaro, yaaba mu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, nari omu kintu kyona eky'oruhu, biri neekyeyongyera, oshemereire kwotsya ekyo kintu ki erimu.
Kandi ekijwaro, yaaba ky'ehuuzi ekirukire bukiika nari bwemi nari ekintu kyona eky'oruhu ekirirugwamu endwara oherize kukyozya, kiryagaruka kyogibwe, kibe ekishemeire.

Ebyo nibyo biragiro by'endwara y'ebibembe omu kijwaro ky'obwoya bw'entaama nari ekya kitaani, omu huuzi ezirukire bukiika nari bwemi, nari ekintu kyona eky'oruhu, ebirikuhamya ku kitasiisikaire nari ku kisiisikaire.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Ebi nibyo biragiro by'omubembe aha izooba ry'okushemezibwa kwe. Aryareetwa aha munyamurwa;
omunyamurwa ashohore aheeru y'orusiisira, ashwijume ogwo mubembe; ku arishanga akizire endwara y'ebibembe,
aragiire bareete enyonyi ibiri ezitarikuzira, ezihuriire, n'ekiti ky'omwereezi, n'akenda ka karari, n'enganda y'enyaweera ahabw'orikwenda kushemezibwa;
omunyamurwa aragiire kwitira emwe ahari ezo nyonyi omu rwabya rw'eibumba ahaiguru y'amaizi agarikugyenda;
atware enyonyi ehuriire n'ekyo kiti ky'omwereezi n'akenda ka karari n'enganda y'enyaweera, abijabikye hamwe n'enyonyi ehuriire omu shagama y'enyonyi ei baitira ahaiguru y'amaizi agarikugyenda;
bwanyima agimiisiire orikuza kushemezibwaho ebibembe emirundi mushanju, amurangye ku ashemeziibwe, bwanyima arekure egyo nyonyi ehuriire, eze omu ishwa.
Orikushemezibwa ayozye emyenda ye, amwe omubiri gwe gwona, ayogye omu maizi, abe oshemeziibwe; bwanyima y'ebyo agarukye omu rusiisira, kwonka amare ebiro mushanju aheeru y'eihema rye.
Aha kiro kya mushanju amwe eishokye rye ryona n'ebireju bye na bahungu n'obundi bwoya bwe bwona, kandi ayozye emyenda ye, ayogye omubiri gwe omu maizi, abe oshemeziibwe.

Kandi aha kiro kya munaana atware abaana b'entaama babiri b'empaya, abataine kamogo n'omwagazi gw'entaama oguhikize omwaka, ogutaine kamogo, hamwe n'ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano na
Omunyamurwa orikumushemeza atware omushaija orikushemezibwa n'ebintu ebyo omu maisho ga MUKAMA aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.

Bwanyima omunyamurwa atware emwe ahari ezo mpaya nto z'entaama, agihongye kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, hamwe na logi y'amajuta, abizongazonzye kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA;

bwanyima aitire egyo mpaya nto omu mwanya ogu baitiramu empongano y'ekibi n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya omu mwanya gw'Aharikwera; ahakuba nk'oku empongano y'ekibi eri ey'omunyamurwa, nikwo n'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja eri; n'erikwera munonga.

Omunyamurwa atware atwe shagama y'empongano y'okwihaho rubanja, agite aha nshonga y'okutu kwa buryo kw'orikushemezibwa, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'engaro ye ya buryo, kandi n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'ekigyere kye kya buryo;
kandi omunyamurwa atware ahari logi y'amajuta, agashukye aha kiganja kye kya bumosho,
akoze orukumu rwe rwa buryo omu majuta agari aha kiganja kye kya bumosho, arumiisiize ago majuta emirundi mushanju omu maisho ga MUKAMA;

amajuta agaatsigara aha kiganja kye omunyamurwa agate aha nshonga y'okutu kwa buryo kw'orikushemezibwa n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'engaro ye ya buryo, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'ekigyere kye kya buryo, ahu yaata eshagama y'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja.
Agandi majuta agaatsigara aha kiganja ky'omunyamurwa agasiigye aha mutwe gw'orikushemezibwa; omunyamurwa amurihiirire omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi omunyamurwa ahongye empongano y'ekibi, arihiirire owaashemezibwaho okusiisikara; bwanyima aite ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
ahongyere aha itambiro ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya n'empongano y'esaano; amurihiirire, abe oshemeziibwe.
kandi n'obwiba bubiri nari enkombe nto ibiri ebi arikubaasa kutunga; emwe ahari ezo ebe empongano y'ekibi, endiijo ebe ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Aha kiro kya munaana abitwarire omunyamurwa aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kushemezibwa.
Omunyamurwa atware ogwo mwana gw'entaama gw'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, na logi ya majuta, abizongazongyeze omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe;

aite ogwo mwana gw'entaama gw'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, atware aha shagama yaagwo, agite aha nshonga y'okutu kwa buryo kw'orikushemezibwa, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'engaro ye ya buryo, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'ekigyere kye kya buryo;
kandi omunyamurwa ashukye ahari ago majuta aha kiganja kye eky'engaro ya bumosho;
amiisiire ahari ago majuta gari aha kiganja kye n'orukumu rwe rwa buryo emirundi mushanju omu maisho ga MUKAMA;

omunyamurwa akore ahari ago majuta, agate aha nshonga y'okutu kwa buryo kw'orikushemezibwa, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'engaro ye ya buryo, n'aha kikumu kishaija eky'ekigyere kye kya buryo, ahu yaata eshagama y'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja;
kandi amajuta agaatsigara aha kiganja ky'omunyamurwa, agasiigye aha mutwe gw'orikushemezibwa, kumurihiirira omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Bwanyima ahongye kamwe ahari obwo bwiba, nari ahari ezo nkombe nto, ezi abaasize kutunga,
emwe ebe empongano y'ekibi, endiijo ebe ekitambo ky'okwotsya hamwe n'empongano y'esaano; omunyamurwa arihiirire orikushemezibwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro ahabw'omuntu orwaire endwara y'ebibembe otarikubaasa kutunga empongano ezaatairweho ahabw'okushemezibwa kwe.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Ku murihika omu nsi ya Kanaani, ei mbahaire kuba eyaanyu, naareeta endwara y'ebibembe aha nju ey'omuri egyo nsi,
mukama w'egyo nju agyende agambire omunyamurwa, ati: Nooshusha oti enju yangye etaahirwemu endwara.

Omunyamurwa aragiire baihe omuri egyo nju ebirimu byona, atakataahiremu kushwijuma endwara, ebintu byona eby'omuri egyo nju birekye kurangwa ku bisiisikaire; bwanyima y'okubiihamu omunyamurwa ataahemu agireebe;
ashwijume egyo ndwara; ku arishanga endwara eri aha bisiika by'enju, eri ey'eibara rya kijubwe nari eririkutukaatukura, kandi yaareebeka etaahire omu kisiika,
obwo omunyamurwa arugye omuri egyo nju; ku arihika aha muryango, agikingye okumara ebiro mushanju;
aha kiro kya mushanju agarukye agishwijume; ku araashangye egyo ndwara ebugire ebisiika by'enju,
aragiire baihe omuri ekyo kisiika amabaare agarimu egyo ndwara, baganagye ahatashemeire aheeru y'orurembo;
kandi aragiire baharagate egyo nju yoona omunda; ebi baraaharagatemu babyate aheeru y'orurembo omu mwanya gutashemeire;
bwanyima bareete agandi mabaare, bagagarure omu mwanya gwa gari, areete ogundi musheenyi, agisiigirize.
Egyo ndwara ku erigaruka yaasheesha omu nju, aherize kwihamu ago mabaare, n'okugiharagata, n'okugisiigiriza,
omunyamurwa ataahemu agishwijume; ku arishanga egyo ndwara egibugire, biri n'ebibembe ebirikurya bitaahire omu nju; enju egyo eryaba esiisikaire.
Asheenye egyo nju, amabaare gaayo n'ebiti byayo n'obuhome bwayo bwona abitware aheeru y'orurembo omu mwanya gutashemeire.
Kandi oritaaha omu nju egyo ekikingire, aryahinduka osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi origibyamamu aryayozya ebijwaro bye; n'origiriiramu, ayozye ebijwaro bye.
Kwonka omunyamurwa ku arigitaahamu, yaagishwijuma, yaashanga endwara etabugire nju bwanyima y'okusiigirizibwa, obwo arangye ku egyo nju etasiisikaire, ahabw'okuba endwara ekizire;
atware enyonyi ibiri n'ekiti ky'omwereezi n'akenda ka karari n'enganda y'enyaweera eby'okushemeza egyo nju,
emwe ahari ezo nyonyi agiitire omu rwabya ahaiguru y'amaizi agarikugyenda;

kandi atware ekyo kiti ky'omwereezi n'enganda y'enyaweera n'akenda ka karari hamwe n'enyonyi ehuriire, abijabikye omu shagama y'enyonyi eyaitwa, kandi n'omu maizi agarikugyenda, amiisiire egyo nju emirundi mushanju.
Okwo nikwo arishemeza enju n'eshagama y'enyonyi n'amaizi agarikugyenda n'enyonyi ehuriire n'ekiti ky'omwereezi n'enganda y'enyaweera n'akenda ka karari;
bwanyima arekure egyo nyonyi ehuriire, erugye omu rurembo eze omu ishwa; atyo arihiirire egyo nju; ebe eshemeziibwe.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro by'emiringo yoona ey'endwara y'ebibembe n'ekiguuna,
n'ebibembe eby'omu bijwaro nari omu nju,
n'eby'ebizimba n'ebiseera n'eibara,
ebirikumanyisa ekisiisikaire n'ekitasiisikaire. Ebyo nibyo biragiro by'ebibembe.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Mugambire Abaisraeli nimubagira muti: Omushaija weena ku ariba naarugwa amahira omu mubiri, aryaba asiisikaire ahabw'amahira ago.
Ebi nibyo biragiro by'okusiisikara kwe ahabw'amahira agarikumurugamu; yaaba omubiri gwe nigureeta amahira, nari omuhanda gwago gwigaire, okwo nikwo kusiisikara kwe.
Buri kitanda eki orikurugwamu amahira aribyamaho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire, na buri kintu eki arishutamaho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire.
Kandi orikora aha kitanda kye weena, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Orishutama aha kintu kyona eki orikurugwamu amahira ashutamireho, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Orikora aha mubiri gw'orikurugwamu amahira, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi orikurugwamu amahira ku aricwera omuntu otasiisikaire amacwante, owaacwerwa ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Amatandiiko goona agu orikurugwamu amahira arishutamaho garyaba agasiisikaire.

Weena orikora aha kintu kyona ekiriba kiri ahansi ye, aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; kandi n'oryekorera kimwe ahari ebyo, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi orikurugwamu amahira ku arikora aha muntu weena atanaabire ngaro ze, owaakorwaho ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Ekintu ky'eibumba eki orikurugwamu amahira arikoraho, kyatwe; kandi ekibaizirwe omu kiti kyona kyogibwe.
Aha kiro kya munaana atware obwiba bubiri, nari enkombe nto ibiri, aije omu maisho ga MUKAMA aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, abihe omunyamurwa;
omunyamurwa abihongye, kimwe kibe empongano y'ekibi, ekindi kibe ekitambo ky'okwotsya; omunyamurwa amurihiirire omu maisho ga MUKAMA ahabw'okurugwamu amahira kwe.
Omuntu weena ku arirugwamu amaizi agarikuzaara, ayogye omubiri gwe gwona omu maizi, agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo;
kandi buri kijwaro n'oruhu rwona ebirihikwaho ago maizi agarikuzaara, byogibwe omu maizi, bigume biri ebisiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi omushaija ku ariba abyami n'omukazi, yaarugwamu ago maizi, bombi boogye omu maizi, bagume bari abasiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Omukazi ku ariza omu kwezi nk'obutoosha, aryamara ebiro mushanju ari otashemeire; orimukoraho weena abe otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo;
kandi ekintu kyona eki aribyamaho ari omu kwezi, kibe ekisiisikaire; n'eki arishutamaho kyona kibe ekisiisikaire.
Weena orikora aha kitanda kye, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, agume ari otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi weena orikora aha kintu kyona eki ashutamireho, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, agume ari otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo,
yaaba kitanda kye nari ekintu kyona eki ashutamireho, orikikoraho aryaba otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi omushaija oribyama nawe, ebirikumurugamu byamuzaho, amare ebiro mushanju ari otashemeire; kandi ekitanda kyona eki ogwo mushaija aribyamaho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire.

Omukazi ku arimara ebiro bingi naajwa eshagama, butari bunaku bwe bw'okuza omu kwezi, nari shi yaarenzya ebiro ebi ashangwa amara omu kwezi, aryaba nk'oku ashangwa aba omu biro bye by'okuza omu kwezi; abe otashemeire.

Ekitanda kyona eki aribyamaho omu biro byona ebi arimara arwaire ekyejwiso, kiryaba nk'ekitanda eki abyamaho omu biro bye by'okuba omu kwezi, n'ekintu kyona eki arishutamaho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire nk'ekisiisirwe okuba omu kwezi kwe.
Orikora ahari ebyo weena aryaba otashemeire, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kwonka ku arikira ekyejwiso, ayebarire ebiro mushanju, bwanyima yaabyo aryaba oshemeire.
Aha kiro kya munaana aryatwara obwiba bubiri nari enkombe nto ibiri, azireetere omunyamurwa aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu;
omunyamurwa ahongye emwe kuba empongano y'ekibi, n'endiijo kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, omunyamurwa amurihiirire ahabw'okutashemera kw'ekyejwiso kye.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro by'orikurugwamu amahira, nari orikurugwamu amaizi agarikuzaara, bikamuhindura otashemeire,
n'eby'omukazi ori omu kwezi, n'eby'omuntu weena, omushaija nari omukazi, orikurugwamu ebirikumushiisha, n'eby'omushaija okubyama n'omukazi otashemeire.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa bwanyima y'okufa kwa batabani ba Arooni, obu bairira omu maisho ga MUKAMA, bakafa.

MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Gambira Arooni mukuru waawe, arekye kuguma naataaha buri kaanya Aharikwera omunda y'omukingo, omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'okusaasira, ekiri aha mutwe gw'eshanduukye, atakaafa; ahabw'okuba niinyija kweyorekyera omu kicu aha kitebe ky'okusaasira.
Kwonka oku nikwo Arooni araagume naatwaza, yaaba naija Aharikwera, aijane enimi y'ekimasha kuba empongano y'ekibi, kandi n'empaya y'entaama y'ekitambo ky'okwotsya.

Ajware ekooti erikwera ya bafuta, n'empare ya bafuta, bibanze aha mubiri, ayezirikise orukoba rwa bafuta, ajware n'ekikwemba kya bafuta; ebyo nibyo bijwaro ebirikwera. Abanze ayogye, bwanyima abijware.
Aihe omu Baisraeli empaya ibiri z'embuzi kuba empongano y'ekibi, kandi n'empaya y'entaama kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Bwanyima atware ezo mbuzi zombi, azite omu maisho ga MUKAMA aha muryango g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu;
Arooni ateerere ezo mbuzi zombi enteenyu, emwe ahabwa MUKAMA, n'endi ahabwa Azazeeli.
Arooni areete egyo mbuzi eyaakwatwa enteenyu ya MUKAMA, agitambe ebe empongano y'ekibi;
kwonka embuzi eyaakwatwa enteenyu eya Azazeeli emurikwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA ehuriire, bagikorereho eby'okurihiirira ebibi, bagyohereze omu ihamba ahabwa Azazeeli.
Bwanyima Arooni amurikye egyo nimi kuba empongano ye y'ekibi, ayerihiirire we n'eka ye; aite egyo nimi ei yaayetambirira kuba empongano y'ekibi;
areete ekyoterero ekiijwire amakara garikwaka, agu yaiha aha itambiro omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kandi n'empi ibiri z'obubaane bushekwire oburikutaamirana, akitware omunda y'omukingo,
abute aha muriro omu maisho ga MUKAMA, omwika gw'obubaane gushwekye ekitebe ky'okusaasira ekiri aha Birikuhamya, ngu atafa;
kandi atware aha shagama y'egyo nimi, agimiisiire n'orukumu rwe aha rubaju rw'ekitebe ky'okusaasira orurikureeba omumaisho, kandi agimiisiire omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'okusaasira emirundi mushanju.

arihiirire atyo Aharikwera ahabw'okusiisikara kw'Abaisraeli, kandi n'ahabw'eby'okushiisha byabo, n'ebibi byabo byona; kandi abe nikwo yaatwaza Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, eri batuura naryo omu kusiisikara kwabo.
Hatarigira owaaguma omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, Arooni yaaba naataaha Aharikwera kukora eby'okurihiirira, okuhitsya obu araarugyemu, yaaheza kwerihiirira we n'eka ye n'eihanga rya Israeli ryona.
Bwanyima ashohore aze aha itambiro eriri omu maisho ga MUKAMA, aririhiirire, kandi atware aha shagama y'egyo nimi n'ey'egyo mbuzi, agite aha mahembe g'eitambiro aha nshonda zoona;
akore ahari egyo shagama, agimiisiire aha itambiro n'orukumu rwe emirundi mushanju, arishemeze, aryeze, rirugweho okusiisikara kw'Abaisraeli.
Arooni ku araaheze kurihiirira Aharikwera n'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu n'eitambiro, areete egyo mbuzi ehuriire;

ate engaro ze zombi aha mutwe gwayo, agyaturireho eby'okutahikiirira by'Abaisraeli byona n'eby'okushiisha byabo byona; ebyo bibi byabo byona abite aha mutwe gw'egyo mbuzi agyohereze omu ihamba etwarwe omuntu oyeteekateekyeire omurimo ogwo;
egyo mbuzi eyekorere eby'okutahikiirira byabo byona, ebitware omu nsi etatuurwamu bantu, agirekure eze omu ihamba.
Bwanyima Arooni ataahe omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, ajuure eby'okujwara bya bafuta, ebi yaajwara naataaha Aharikwera, abitsigyeyo;
ayogyere omubiri gwe omu mwanya gurikwera, ajware ebijwaro bye, ashohore, ayetambirire ekitambo ky'okwotsya, atambe n'eky'abantu, ayerihiirire, arihiirire n'abantu.
Ebishaju by'egyo mpongano y'ekibi abyokyeze aha itambiro.
Kandi orekwire egyo mbuzi ahabwa Azazeeli, ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye n'omubiri gwe, abone kugaruka omu rusiisira.

Reero egyo nimi y'empongano y'ekibi n'egyo embuzi y'empongano y'ekibi, ebi eshagama yaabyo yaataahibwa Aharikwera kukora eby'okurihiirira ebibi, babyekorere, babitware aheeru y'orusiisira, bootsye empu zaabyo n'enyama zaabyo n'efa yaabyo omu muriro.
Oraaheze kubyotsya ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omubiri gwe, bwanyima agarukye omu rusiisira.

Ekyo kigume kiri ekiragiro ekibateereirweho ekitahwaho; omu kwezi kwa mushanju aha kiro kya ikumi eky'okwo kwezi, muryaguma mwebonabonese, mutarikikoreraho omurimo gwona, n'obu yaakuba omuntu enzaarwa, nari omunyaihanga oshuhuukiire omuriimwe;
ahakuba aha kiro ekyo nikyo muriguma nimurihiiririrwaho kushemezibwa; obwo muryaba abashemeziibweho ebibi byanyu byona omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Eizooba eryo riryababeera sabato ey'okuruhuukiraho, muryayebonabonesa; n'ekiragiro ekitairweho okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Kandi omunyamurwa oriba waashukirweho amajuta, akashoroorwa kuba omunyamurwa omu mwanya gwa ishe, niwe ariguma naabarihiirira, ajwaire ebyo bijwaro birikwera bya bafuta;
kandi arihiirire Omwanya ogurikwera, arihiirire Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu n'eitambiro; kandi arihiirire abanyamurwa n'abantu b'eihanga boona.
Kandi eki kibabeere ekiragiro ekitairweho ekitarihwaho, Abaisraeli kuguma nibarihiirirwa ahabw'ebibi byabo byona rimwe omu mwaka. Musa yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Arooni n'abatabani n'Abaisraeli boona oti: Eki nikyo MUKAMA yaaragiira naagira ati:
Omuntu weena ow'omunju ya Israeli oribaagira ente nari omwana gw'entaama nari embuzi omu rusiisira, nari origibaagira aheeru yaarwo,

atagitware ha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, kugihongyera MUKAMA omu maisho g'obutaaho bwe, ogwo muntu aryakwatwa orubanja rw'egyo shagama; n'omuntu oseesire eshagama; kandi omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye;

ebyo byaragiirwa ngu ebitambo ebi Abaisraeli baraagume baitira omu ishwa, babireetere MUKAMA aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, babiheereze omunyamurwa, abitambe, bibe empongano z'okusiima MUKAMA ahabw'obusingye.
Obwo omunyamurwa amiisiire eshagama yaabyo aha itambiro rya MUKAMA aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganriamu, ayotsye ebishaju, bibe ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo batarigaruka kuhongyera baadaimoni ebitambo byabo, abu barikwenda kukurata kuraaya nabo. Ekyo kibe ekiragiro ekibateereirweho ebiro byona omu busingye bwabo bwona.
Kandi obagire oti: Omuntu weena ow'omu nju ya Israeli nari ow'omu banyamahanga ababashuhuukiiremu, oritamba ekitambo eky'okwotsya nari ekindi,
atakireetsire ha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu kukitambira MUKAMA, ogwo muntu aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
Mumanye ngu amagara g'omubiri gaba omu shagama; nikyo naagibaheera kushukwa aha itambiro ngu erihiirire amagara gaanyu; eshagama niyo erihiirira ahabw'okuba erimu amagara.
Nikyo naagambirira Abaisraeli nti: Hatarigira omuntu weena omuriimwe owaarya eshagama, n'obu yaakuba omunyaihanga obashuhuukiiremu.
Kandi omuntu weena omu Baisraeli nari ow'omu banyamahanga obashuhuukiiremu, oriita enyamaishwa erikuriibwa nari enyonyi ahiigire, ayate eshagama yaayo ahansi, agishwekye eiju;

ahabw'okuba amagara g'ekihangirwe kyona gaba omu shagama yaakyo; nikyo ngiriire Abaisraeli nti: Mutarirya eshagama y'ekihangirwe kyona; ahakuba amagara g'ekihangirwe kyona gaba omu shagama yaakyo; origirya weena, aryacuubwa.

Kandi omuntu weena orirya ekintu kyona ekyefeereire, nari ekiitsirwe enyamaishwa, yaaba muntu enzaarwa nari omunyaihanga, aryayozya ebijwaro bye, ayogye omu maizi, kandi agume ari otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; obwo aryaba oshemeire.
Kwonka ku ariba atabyogize, nawe akooga, orubanja rw'okutahikiirira ruryamugumaho.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutarikora nk'oku Abanyamisri bakora omu nsi yaabo ei mwabaire mutwiremu; kandi mutarikora nk'oku Abanyakanaani barikukora omu nsi yaabo ei ndikubatwaramu. Buzima mutarikuratira ebiragiro byabo.
Ebi ndikubaragiira mube nibyo mwahurira, ebiragiro byangye mubyorobere mubigyenderemu. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye n'ebi ndikuragiira; oribyorobera biryamuhaisa amagara. Niinye MUKAMA.
Hatarigira owaahika omunyabuzaare weena omuri haihi kumujweka busha. Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarijweka sho busha, ahakuba enjuuro ya sho nikyo kimwe n'eya nyoko; niwe nyoko; otarimujweka busha.
Otarijweka busha muka sho; ahakuba n'enjuuro ya sho.
Otarijweka busha munyaanyoko, owa sho nari owa nyoko, yaaba azairwe omuka nari ahandi.
Otarijweka busha muhara wa mutabani waawe, nari muhara wa muhara waawe; ahakuba enjuuro yaabo niyo yaawe.
Otarijweka busha muhara wa muka sho, ozairwe sho, ahakuba ni munyaanyoko.
Otarijweka busha shwenkazi; ahakuba aine obuzaare bwa haihi na sho.
Otarijweka busha nyokwento, ahakuba aine obuzaare bwa haihi na nyoko.
Otarijweka busha shwento, nikwo kuhika omukazi we; ahakuba ni muka shwento.
Otarijweka busha muka mwana waawe; ahakuba ni muka mutabani waawe, otarimujweka busha.
Otarijweka busha muka mwene sho, ahakuba enjuuro ye n'eya mwene sho.
Otarijweka busha omukazi na muhara we, kandi otaritwara muhara wa mutabani we nari owa muhara we, okabajweka busha; ahabw'okuba baine obuzaare bwa haihi n'omukazi waawe; ekyo n'ekibi kihango.
Otarishwera omukazi na mwene nyina kumumuharika, okamujweka busha, mwene nyina akiriho.
Otarijweka busha omukazi akiri omu kwezi, atakashemeire.
Otaribyama na muka mutaahi waawe, okamwesiisisa.
Otarihayo n'omwe omu ruzaaro rwawe kumutambira Moleki, okajumisa eiziina rya Ruhanga waawe. Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarigira omushaija omukazi; ahabw'okuba n'ekihagaro.
Otaribyama n'enyamaishwa yoona okagyesiisisa; nari omukazi weena otaryeha enyamaishwa kubyama nayo; n'okukora ebitari by'obuhangwa.
ensi yaabo ekasiisikara; nikyo ndikugitura ahabw'okutahikiirira kwayo, ekatanaka abagitwiremu.
Kwonka imwe mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho, kandi mutakora na kimwe aha bihagaro ebyo byona, yaaba muntu enzaarwa nari omunyaihanga obashuhuukiiremu;
(ahakuba ebyo bihagaro nibyo abantu b'ensi egi abaababandiize baakozire, ensi ekasiisikara);
naimwe ensi ekabatanaka ahabw'okugishiisha, nk'oku yaatanakire eihanga eryababandiize.
Ahabw'okuba omuntu weena orikora ekihagaro kyona ahari ebyo, abantu abaribikora baryacuubwa omu ihanga ryabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo mworobere ebi ndikubaragiira; mutarikora emicwe egyo yoona erikunugwa, ei abaababandiize baakozire, mukabyesiisisa. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira eihanga ry'Abaisraeli ryona ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Mushemereire kuba abarikwera; ahakuba Nyowe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ndi orikwera.
Omuntu weena omuriimwe ashemereire kutiina nyina na ishe; kandi mugume murinde sabato zangye. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutarihindukira ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, n'obu kwakuba okweheeshera baaruhanga b'ebishushani. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Ku muritambira MUKAMA ebitambo by'empongano y'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, muryaguma mubihongye omu buryo obu murikubaasa kwikiririzibwamu.
Ekyo kitambo kiriibwe aha izooba eri murikihongyeraho, n'eririkurataho; ekiriba kyatsigaireho okuhitsya aha izooba rya kashatu, kyokibwe omu muriro.
Ku kiririibwaho aha izooba rya kashatu, kiryaba ekirikunugwa; tikiriikirizibwa;
kandi omuntu weena orikiryaho, orubanja rw'okutahikiirira ruryamugumaho, ahabw'okuba aryaba asiisire ekintu kya MUKAMA ekirikwera; ogwo muntu aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
Otarishoroma emizaabibu yaawe okagiherezamu kimwe, n'obu kwakuba okutorotoora eragarikire; ogitsigire enshoberwa n'omushuhuuki. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutariiba, mutarigobya, kandi mutaribeihana.
Mutarirahirira busha eiziina ryangye, mukajumisa eiziina rya Ruhanga waanyu. Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarikyeena ekifa-matu, kandi otaritega empumi eky'okugiteeza entsibo, kureka ogume otiine Ruhanga waawe. Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarigyendagyenda noogambuura abantu omu bantu b'owaanyu; kandi otariba mushinja w'ebishuba kwitisa mutaahi waawe Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarihoora abantu b'eihanga ryawe, n'obu kwakuba okubagiraho enziika; kureka okunde mutaahi waawe, nk'oku oyekunda. Niinye MUKAMA.

Mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye. Otaryemesa amatungo gaawe aha nyamaishwa ezitari z'oruganda rwago; otaribiba omu musiri gwawe embibo z'emiringo ebiri; kandi otarijwara ekijwaro kibaziire omu myenda y'emiringo ebiri.

Omuntu ku aribyama n'omuzaana, orikugambwa ondiijo mushaija obugyenyi, omuzaana ogwo atakacungwirwe nari atakarekwirwe, ebyabo biryayetegyerezibwa, kwonka tibariitwa, ahabw'okuba omukazi abaire atakarekwirwe.
Kwonka ogwo mushaija areetere MUKAMA empongano y'okwihaho orubanja aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, empaya y'entaama kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja;
omunyamurwa amurihiirire omu maisho ga MUKAMA empaya y'entaama kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja rw'ekibi eki akozire, nawe aryasaasirwa ekyo kibi ki akozire.
Ku murihika omu nsi egyo, mwabyara emiti y'emiringo yoona ahabw'ebyokurya, mubanze mutwaze ebijuma byayo nk'ebitarikwikirizibwa kuriibwa; muryamara emyaka eshatu mutarikubiikirizibwa; bitaririibwaho.
Kandi omu mwaka gwa kana ebijuma byayo byona biryaba ebirikwera, empongano y'okuhimbisa MUKAMA.
Kwonka omu mwaka gwa kataano muryaikirizibwa kurya aha bijuma byayo, egyo miti ebone kuguma neebeerera munonga. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutarirya ekintu kyona n'eshagama yaakyo; mutariroga n'obu kwakuba okuragura.
Mutaritega ebyeyera, mutarishiisha omu mbaju z'ebireju byanyu.
Mutarishara emibiri yaanyu ahabw'okuba omu rufu, kandi mutaricwa engondo. Niinye MUKAMA.
Otarishiisha muhara waawe, okamuhindura maraaya, ensi erekye kwohokyera omu bushambani, ekaijura obubi.
Mugume murinde sabato zangye, muhe ekitiinisa Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera. Niinye MUKAMA.
Omunyaihanga ku arishuhuukira owaanyu omu nsi yaanyu, otarimwita kubi;
omunyaihanga oribashuhuukiramu abe nk'enzaarwa omuriimwe, omukunde nk'oku oyekunda; ahabw'okuba naimwe mukaba muri abanyaihanga omu nsi ya Misri. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutarikora ebitari by'oburyo omu kucwa emanja, omu kugyera oburaingwa, nari oburemeezi, nari obwingi.
Mugire eminzaani ehikire, amabaare gahikire, eefa ehikire na hiini ehikire. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri.
