Mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye byona n'emigyenzo ei naataireho yoona, mubikore. Niinye MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Garuka ogambire Abaisraeli ebigambo ebi: Omuntu weena ow'omu Baisraeli nari ow'omu banyamahanga abarikubashuhuukiramu, oritambira Moleki omwe aha b'omu ruzaaro rwe, ashemereire kwitwa, ab'omuri egyo nsi bakamuteera amabaare.
Naanye ndyareeba kubi ogwo mushaija, mmucwe omu ihanga rye, nimmutura okuha Moleki omwe aha b'omu ruzaaro rwe, n'okushiisha Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera, akajumisa eiziina ryangye eririkwera.
Abantu b'omu nsi egyo ku baryehuzya ogwo mushaija, ohaire Moleki omwe aha b'omu ruzaaro rwe, bataamwita,
ndyaguma nindeeba kubi ogwo mushaija hamwe n'ab'omu ka ye, mmucwe omu ihanga ryabo hamwe n'abandi boona abarikumukuratira, bakeehongyera Moleki, bakamuramya nk'abarikuraaya.
Kandi omuntu oriimuurira aha bantu abarikubandwa emizimu n'abarogi, abarikubakuratira nk'abarikuraaya, ndyareeba kubi ogwo muntu, mmucwe omu ihanga rye.
N'ahabw'ekyo mweyeze, mube abarikwera; ahakuba Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye, kandi mukore ebi naataireho. Niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza.
Omuntu weena orikyeena ishe nari nyina aitwe; ahabw'okukyeena ishe nari nyina, orubanja rw'eshagama ye rube ahariwe.
Omuntu ku arishambana na muka mutaahi we, bombi kishambana na kishambanisibwa, baitwe.
Omushaija ku aribyama na muka ishe, aryaba ajwekire ishe busha; bombi baitwe; orubanja rw'eshagama yaabo rubabeho.
Omuntu ku aribyama n'omukaamwana, bombi baitwe; baryaba bakozire ekitakorwa; orubanja rw'eshagama yaabo rubabeho.
Omushaija ku arihindura mugyenzi we omukazi, bombi baryaba bakozire ekihagaro, baitwe; orubanja rw'eshagama yaabo rubabeho.
Omushaija ku arishwera omukazi na nyina, kiryaba kiri ekibi kihango, we nabo bookibwe, ekibi kyona kirekye kuba omuriimwe.
Omushaija ku aribyama n'enyamaishwa, aitwe, kandi mwite n'egyo nyamaishwa.
Omukazi ku arihika enyamaishwa, yaabyama nayo, mwite ogwo mukazi n'egyo nyamaishwa; buzima bishemereire kwitwa; kandi orubanja rw'eshagama yaabyo rukabibaho.

Omuntu ku aritwara munyaanya, owa ishe nari owa nyina, baareebana bajwaire busha, kiryaba ekihemu; babacwere omu maisho g'eihanga ryabo; ahakuba ajwekire busha munyaanya; orubanja rw'okutahikiirira ruryamugumaho.
Omushaija ku aribyama n'omukazi ori omu kwezi, yaamujweka busha, aryaba ajwekire busha okujwa kwe, n'omukazi nawe aryaba ajwekire busha okujwa kwe; bombi bacuubwe omu ihanga ryabo.
Otarijweka busha nyokwento nari shwenkazi; ahabw'okuba okwo n'okujweka busha ow'obuzaare bwa haihi; mwembi orubanja rw'okutahikiirira ruryabagumaho.
Omushaija ku aribyama na muka ishento, aryaba ajwekire busha ishento; baryagiibwaho ekibi kyabo, bafe bucwekye.
Omushaija ku aritwara muka mwene ishe, kiryaba kiri okweshiisha; aryaba ajwekire busha mwene ishe; baryafa bucwekye.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume mworobere ebiragiro byangye byona n'emigyenzo ei naataireho yoona, mubikore, ensi ei ndikubatwara kutuuramu erekye kubatanaka.
Mutaritooreza emicwe y'eihanga eri ndikubinga omu maisho gaanyu; ahakuba ebyo byona nibyo baakozire, bikandeetera okubangira kimwe.
Kwonka imwe nkabagira nti: Muryahungura ensi yaabo, ngibahe, ebe eyaanyu, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu owaabataaniise n'agandi mahanga.

N'ahabw'ekyo mushemereire kutaanisa omu nyamaishwa ezitarikuzira n'ezirikuzira, n'enyonyi ezitarikuzira n'ezirikuzira; mutaryesiisisa enyamaishwa nari enyonyi nari ekintu kyona ekirikugyendera ahansi, eki naabataaniise nakyo, ngu kigume kiri ekirikuzira ahariimwe.
Muryaba abarikwera ahariinye; ahabw'okuba Nyowe MUKAMA ndi orikwera, kandi nkabataanisa n'amahanga agandi, ngu mubone kuba abantu bangye.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Gambira abanyamurwa batabani ba Arooni, noobagira oti: Hatarigira omuntu omuriimwe owaayeshiisha ahabw'omuntu ofiire omu ruganda rwe,
kureka ahabw'ow'obuzaare obumuri haihi munonga, nka nyina, ishe, omutabani, muhara we, mwene ishe,
nari munyaanya otakamanyaga mushaija, (omuri haihi, ahakuba takashweirwe; ahabw'ogwo naikirizibwa kweshiisha).
Ataryeshiisha, akeegayisa, ahabw'okuba n'omuntu mukuru omu ihanga rye.
Bataryemwa eishokye aha kazingiro, bataritega omu mbaju z'ebireju byabo, n'obu kwakuba okwecwa engondo.

Babe abeereziibwe Ruhanga waabo, barekye kujumisa eiziina rye; ahakuba nibo bahongyera MUKAMA empongano z'okwotsya n'omuriro, nibyo by'okurya bya Ruhanga waabo; n'ahabw'ekyo bashemereire kuba abarikwera.
Batarishwera maraaya nari omukazi osiisirwe, nari oshenzirwe iba; ahakuba omunyamurwa n'orikwera ahari Ruhanga we.
Nikyo orimwereza, ahakuba niwe ahonga eby'okurya bya Ruhanga waawe; aryaguma ari orikwera ahariiwe; ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA orikubeeza ndi orikwera.
Kandi muhara w'omunyamurwa weena, ku aryeshiisha, yaaba maraaya, biri ajumiise ishe; ayokibwe omu muriro.

Oriba ari omunyamurwa omukuru omuri beene ishe, owaashukirwe amajuta aha mutwe, akeezibwa kujwara ebyo bijwaro by'obunyamurwa bukuru, atarizingurura eishokye rye, n'obu kwakuba okutaagura ebijwaro bye;
atarihika aha mutumbi gwona, kandi ataryeshiisha n'omutumbi gwa ishe nari ogwa nyina.
Atarishohora kuruga omu Mwanya ogurikwera gwa Ruhanga we, n'obu kwakuba okugushiisha; ahabw'okuba okushoroorwa, oku yaashoroirwe naashukwaho amajuta ga Ruhanga we, kumuriho. Niinye MUKAMA.
Kandi ashemereire kushwera omwishiki otakamanyaga mushaija;
atarishwera omufaakazi, nari oshenzirwe, nari osiisirwe, nari maraaya; kureka ashwere omwishiki w'eihanga rye otakamanyaga mushaija,
arekye kujumisa abaana be omu ihanga rye; ahakuba niinye MUKAMA orikumweza.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Arooni oti: Omuntu weena ow'omu ruzaaro rwawe omu busingye bwabo bwona oine akamogo, atariikirizibwa kuhika haihi, kuhongyera Ruhanga we eby'okurya;
ahakuba omuntu weena oine akamogo tarikwikirizibwa kwirira haihi, yaaba ari empumi nari ekirema nari okokoire enyindo, nari ekimuga,
nari owaahendekire ekigyere nari engaro,
nari ow'eibango nari ekipimpiri, nari oine eshongo, nari orwaire obuhere, nari ebiseera, nari oyatikire amagosi.
Hatarigira ow'omu ruzaaro rwa Arooni omunyamurwa oine akamogo owaahika haihi kuhongyera MUKAMA empongano ez'okwotsya omu muriro; ahakuba aine akamogo tariirira haihi kuhongyera Ruhanga we eby'okurya.
Aryaguma arye eby'okurya bya Ruhanga we, ebirikwera munonga n'ebirikwera;
kwonka taritaaha kuhika aha mukingo, nari okuhika aha itambiro, ahakuba aine akamogo; arekye kushiisha emyanya yangye erikwera, ahabw'okuba niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza.
Atyo Musa yaabigambira Arooni n'abatabani n'eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Arooni n'abatabani beetantare ebintu ebirikwera, ebi Abaisraeli barikuunyereza, barekye kujumisa eiziina ryangye eririkwera. Niinye MUKAMA.

Obagambire ebigambo byangye ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Omuntu weena ow'omu ruzaaro rwanyu omu busingye bwanyu bwona orihika aha bintu birikwera ebi Abaisraeli barikwereza MUKAMA akisiisikaire, omuntu ogwo aryacuubwa omu maisho gangye. Niinye MUKAMA.

Weena ow'omu ruzaaro rwa Arooni obembire, nari orikureeta amahira, atarirya aha bintu ebirikwera okuhitsya obu ariba oshemeire. Omuntu weena orikora aha kintu kyona ekisiisikaire ahabw'okuhika aha mutumbi, nari orikureeta amahira,
nari orikora aha kintu kyona ekirikugyendera ahansi ekirikubaasa kumuhindura otashemeire, nari omuntu ondiijo ou yaihaho okutashemera okw'omuringo gwona,
omuntu orikora aha kintu ekirikushusha kityo, aryaba otashemeire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, kandi tariikirizibwa kurya aha bintu birikwera, atabandize kwoga omubiri gwe omu maizi.
Eizooba ku ririrenga, aryaba oshemeire; bwanyima abone kurya aha bintu ebirikwera; ahabw'okuba ebyo n'eby'okurya bye.
Atarirya ekyefeereire nari ekiitsirwe enyamaishwa okukyesiisisa. Niinye MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo bashemereire kworobera eki ndikubaragiira, batakaagiibwaho orubanja rw'ekibi, bakakifeeramu ahabw'okushiisha ekiragiro ekyo. Niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza.
Kwonka omunyamurwa ku arigura omuntu n'empiiha ze, ogwo aryabiryaho; kandi n'abo abazaariirwe omu ka ye, baryarya aha by'okurya bye.
Muhara w'omunyamurwa ku arishwerwa otari w'omu banyamurwa, atarirya aha mpongano z'ebintu ebirikwera;

kwonka muhara w'omunyamurwa ku ariba ari omufaakazi nari oshenzirwe, ataine mwana, yaagaruka aha mahega ga ishe, nk'oku yaabaire ari akiri omwishiki, aryaikirizibwa kurya aha by'okurya bya ishe; kwonka tihariho otari w'omu banyamurwa weena oribiryaho.
Kandi omuntu ku arirya aha kintu kirikwera atakimanyire, akirihe omunyamurwa, kandi ayongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano eky'obuguzi bwakyo.
Abanyamurwa batarishiisha ebintu ebirikwera ebi Abaisraeli bahongyera MUKAMA,
bakabareetera kugiibwaho okutahikiirira n'orubanja ahabw'okurya ebintu byabo ebirikwera; ahabw'okuba niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Gambira Arooni n'abatabani n'eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli oti: Omuntu weena ow'omu nju ya Israeli nari ow'omu babashuhuukiiremu ku arireeta empongano ye, yaaba y'okuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise nari eki yaatoizire ahabw'okweyendera, kuba empongano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA ey'ekitambo ky'okwotsya,
ahabw'okwenda ngu eikirizibwe, mushemereire kuhonga enimi nari empaya y'entaama nari ey'embuzi etaine kamogo;
kwonka ekiine akamogo mutarikihonga, ahabw'okuba tikiritoorwa habwanyu.

Kandi omuntu weena oritambira MUKAMA ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, okuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise nari eki atoizire ahabw'okweyendera, naakiiha omu masyo g'ente nari ag'entaama, kyaza kwikirizibwa kishemereire kuba ekishugaine, kitainemu kamogo koona.

Enyamaishwa ehumire nari ehendekire nari ebuzireho orugingo nari erikureeta amahira nari erwaire orukamba nari akanyamutinda, mutaribihongyera MUKAMA, n'obu kwakuba okubitamba mukabyokyeza MUKAMA aha itambiro.
Enimi nari omwana gw'entaama ebiine ebicweka ebirikukiraakirana, nimwikirizibwa kukihonga kuba omutoijo gw'okweyendera; kwonka tibirikwikirizibwa kuba empongano y'okuhikiiriza eki mwaraganiise.
Enyamaishwa eine amagosi gahonokire nari gahonzire nari gataagukire nari gashaahwirwe, mutarigitoijera MUKAMA n'obu kwakuba okugimutambira omu nsi yaanyu.
Kandi mutaryakiira ezirikushusha nk'ezo okuruga omu mikono y'omunyaihanga kuba eby'okurya eby'okuhongyera Ruhanga waanyu; ahabw'okuba ziine obumogo; ahabw'obumogo bwazo tiziritoorwa habwanyu.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Enimi nari entaama nari embuzi ku erizaarwa, eryamara ebiro mushanju na nyinayo; okuruga aha kiro kya munaana eryaikirizibwa kuhongyerwa MUKAMA kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro.
Nyinayo, ku eriba eri ente nari entaama, otarigiita hamwe n'omwana gwayo aha izooba rimwe.
Ku muritambira MUKAMA ekitambo ky'okusiima, mukitambe omu muringo ogu murikubaasa kwikiririzibwamu;
kiriibwe aha izooba eryo eri kyatambirwaho; mutarigira eki mwatsigaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe. Niinye MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo muryaguma mworobere ebiragiro byangye, mukore ebi naataireho. Niinye MUKAMA.
Kandi mutarijumisa eiziina ryangye eririkwera; kureka ndyaguma nyezibwe omu ihanga rya Israeli. Niinye MUKAMA orikubeeza,
owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, kuba Ruhanga waanyu. Niinye MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Aga nigo magyenyi ga MUKAMA agu naataireho, agu oshemereire kuranga kuba okuteerana okurikwera.

Omu biro mukaaga emirimo ebe nimwo yaakorerwa; kwonka ekiro kya mushanju ni sabato y'okuhuumuriraho ey'okuteerana okurikwera; mutarigikoreraho omurimo gwona; ni sabato ahari MUKAMA omu maka gaanyu goona.
Aga nigo magyenyi ga MUKAMA agaatairweho ag'okuteerana okurikwera, agu oshemereire kuranga omu bunaku bwago obwatairweho.
Omu kwezi kw'okubanza aha kiro kya ikumi na bina omu mwabazyo, nikwo kuhinguraho kwa MUKAMA.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano eky'okwezi okwo n'obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe ahari MUKAMA; muryaguma mumare ebiro mushanju nimurya emigaati etatumbisiibwe.
Aha kiro ky'okutandikiraho obwo bugyenyi muryagira okuteerana kurikwera; mutarikikoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya;

kwonka muryaguma nimureeta empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA ey'okwotsya omu muriro okumara ebiro mushanju; aha kiro kya mushanju haryabaho okuteerana okurikwera; mutarikikoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebi ndikuragiira ningira nti: Ku murihika omu nsi ei ndikubaha, mwashaaruura emyaka yaayo, muryareetera omunyamurwa ekiba ky'omuganuro gw'ebi mwerize,
nawe azongazonzye ekyo kiba omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kiikirizibwe ahabwanyu; aha izooba eririkurata sabato niryo omunyamurwa arikizongazongyezaho;
kandi aha izooba eryo eri murizongazongyezaho ekyo kiba, muryahonga empaya nto y'entaama etaine kamogo ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya ekihongyeirwe MUKAMA.

Kandi empongano y'esaano ey'okuhongwa nakyo eryaguma ebe ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta, ebe empongano ey'okuhongyera MUKAMA ey'okwotsya omu muriro kuba ekisooroora kirungi; empongano y'eby'okunywa ey'okuhongwa nakyo eryaguma ebe ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini ya viinyo.

Mutarirya omugaati gwona nari enjuma y'ekintu kyona ekarangire nari embisi eryo izooba eri muriheeraho empongano ahari Ruhanga waanyu ritakahikire. Ekyo n'ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona n'omu maka gaanyu goona.
nimubara ebiro makumi ataano okuhitsya aha izooba eririkukurata sabato ya mushanju; obwo muryareeta empongano y'esaano y'omwaka musya y'okuhongyera MUKAMA.
Mwihe omu maka gaanyu emigaati ebiri ekozirwe omu bicweka bibiri bya ikumi bya eefa kuba empongano y'okuzongazonzya, eteekwe omu saano y'obunono, bagiteekyerane n'ekitumbisa kuganurirwa MUKAMA.

Hamwe n'egyo migaati mureete abaana b'entaama mushanju abataine kamogo, abahikize omwaka, n'enimi nto emwe n'empaya z'entaama ibiri; bibe ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'okutambirwa MUKAMA, n'empongano y'esaano ereetsirwe nabyo, n'ez'eby'okunywa ezireetsirwe nabyo, kuba empongano ey'okwotsya omu muriro y'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba empongano y'ekibi, n'empaya nto ibiri z'entaama ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Omunyamurwa abizongazonzye hamwe n'emigaati y'omuganuro kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA hamwe n'abo baana b'entaama bombi, bibe ebyereziibwe MUKAMA, bitwarwe omunyamurwa.
Eryo izooba murangye ku murigira okuteerana okurikwera; mutaririkoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya. Ekyo n'ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu maka gaanyu goona n'omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omu kwezi kwa mushanju, ekiro ky'okubanza ky'okwo kwezi murykigira eizooba eririkwera ery'okuhuumuriraho, ery'ekiijutsyo eki muriranga nimuteera enzamba, kuba okweteerana okurikwera.
Mutaririkoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya; kureka muryahongyera MUKAMA empongano y'okwotsya omu muriro.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Kwonka ekiro kya ikumi eky'okwo kwezi kwa mushanju kiryaba eizooba ry'okurihiiriraho; riryababeera eizooba ry'okuteerana okurikwera; muryabonabonesa amagara gaanyu, muhongyere MUKAMA empongano y'okwotsya omu muriro.
Aha kiro ekyo mutarikora omurimo gwona, ahakuba n'eizooba ry'okurihiiriraho, okubarihiirira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Ahakuba omuntu oriba atabonaboneise magara ge eryo izooba, aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye;
n'omuntu weena orikora omurimo gwona ahari eryo izooba, ndyamuhwerekyereza, mmwihe omu ihanga rye.
Mutarigira omurimo gwona ogu mwakora. Ekyo n'ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu maka gaanyu goona n'omu busingye bwanyu bwona.

Eryo izooba riryababeera sabato erikwera ey'okuhuumuriraho, mubonabonese amagara gaanyu; aha kiro kya mwenda eky'okwezi okwo okwiha omu mwabazyo muryarinda sabato yaanyu okuhitsya omu mwabazyo ogundi.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano eky'okwo kwezi kwa mushanju haryabaho obugyenyi bw'Ensiisira ahari MUKAMA okumara ebiro mushanju.
Aha izooba ry'okubanza haryabaho okuteerana okurikwera; mutaririkoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya.

Muryaguma nimureeta empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA y'okwotsya omu muriro okumara ebiro mushanju; aha kiro kya munaana muryagira okuteerana okurikwera, mureete empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA y'okwotsya omu muriro; eryo izooba n'ery'okuteerana okurikwera; mutaririkoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya.

Ago nigo magyenyi ga MUKAMA agaatairweho agu muriranga kuba ag'okuteerana okurikwera, mukabona kureetera MUKAMA empongano z'okwotsya omu muriro, n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya, n'empongano y'esaano, n'ebindi bitambo, n'empongano z'eby'okunywa, buri kimwe aha izooba ryakyo,
mutaihiremu sabato za MUKAMA, n'emitoijo yaanyu, n'ebi muraganisa nimuhiga byona, n'ebi mutoija ahabw'okweyendera ebi mutoijera MUKAMA.

Ahari eryo izooba ry'okutandikiraho muryatwara ebijuma by'emiti emirungi, n'amataagi g'enkindo, n'amataagi g'emiti eyumbize, n'emiti y'aha migyera; muryamara ebiro mushanju nimushemerererwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Kandi muryaguma mugire obwo bugyenyi bw'ebiro mushanju ahari MUKAMA buri mwaka. Ekyo n'ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona. Muryaguma mubugire omu kwezi kwa mushanju.
Muryamara ebiro mushanju nimuraara omu nsiisira; Abaisraeli enzaarwa boona bagume omu nsiisira,
ab'obusingye bwona oburibakurata bamanye ku naaraarize Abaisraeli omu nsiisira, obu naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Okwo nikwo Musa yaarangiire Abaisraeli amagyenyi ga MUKAMA agaatairweho.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ragiira Abaisraeli bakureetere amajuta marungi g'emizeituuni eshekwirwe ag'okuhemba, amatabaaza gabone kuguma nigaaka obutoosha.

Enyima y'omukingo ogurikukingira Ebirikuhamya, omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, Arooni abe niho yaaguma naagashemereza obutoosha, gabone kuguma nigaakira omu maisho ga MUKAMA okuruga omu mwabazyo okuhitsya omu kasheeshe. Ekyo kibe ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Arooni agume ashemereze ago matabaaza aha kikondo kyago eky'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, gaakire omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
obute aha meeza y'ezaabu eshemeziibwe omu mishorongo ebiri ey'obugaati mukaaga-mukaaga omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi aha mishorongo yombi oteho obubaane burungi oburikwetwa lebona, bubone kuheebwayo hamwe n'emigaati nk'ekiijutsyo eky'empongano ey'okuhongyera MUKAMA ey'okwotsya omu muriro.
Buri sabato Arooni agite omu maisho ga MUKAMA obutoosha ahabw'Abaisraeli, kuba endagaano etarihwaho.

Kandi egyo migaati egume ebe eya Arooni n'abatabani bagiriire omu mwanya gurikwera, ahakuba n'erikwera munonga ahariwe omu mpongano ezihongyerwa MUKAMA ezokiibwe omu muriro; n'omugabo gwe ogw'ebiro byona.
Hakaba hariho omwojo, mutabani w'Omwisraelikazi, ou yaazairweho Omunyamisri, owaizire n'Abaisraeli; omwojo ogwo akatonganira omu rusiisira n'omushaija Omwisraeli;
mutabani w'Omwisraelikazi yaarogota aha Iziina eryo, naakyeena; baamureeta ahari Musa. (Kandi nyina akaba naayetwa Shelomiisi muhara wa Diburi, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daani.)
Baamukingirana okuhitsya obunaku obu baraagambirirweho eki MUKAMA arikuragiira.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Shohoza ogwo okyeenire aheeru y'orusiisira, abamuhuriire boona bamute engaro aha mutwe, abantu boona bamuteere amabaare.
Kandi ogambire Abaisraeli oti: Omuntu weena orikyeena Ruhanga we aryagiibwaho orubanja rw'ekyo kibi;
kandi orirogota aha Iziina rya MUKAMA, aitwe; ab'eihanga ryona bamuteere amabaare; n'omunyaihanga nawe nk'omuntu enzaarwa, orirogota aha Iziina eryo, aitwe.
Oriita enyamaishwa etungirwe, agirihe; amagara garihwe agandi.
Omuntu oriremaza mutaahi we, nawe aihurwe eki amukozire;
obuhuta burihwe obundi; eriisho ririhwe erindi; eriino ririhwe erindi; nk'oku omuntu ariba aremaize ondiijo, nawe abe nikwo yaihurwa.
Oriita enyamaishwa etungirwe, agirihe; n'oriita omuntu, aitwe.
Omunyaihanga n'enzaarwa bagire ekiragiro kimwe. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa aha rushozi Sinai ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Ku murihika omu nsi ei ndikubaha, egyo nsi eryaguma egire sabato ahabwa MUKAMA.
Oryamara emyaka mukaaga noohinga emisiri yaawe, noosharira emizaabibu yaawe, nooshaaruura emyaka yaabyo.
Kwonka omwaka gwa mushanju guryaba sabato y'okuraariza kimwe emisiri; ni sabato ahabwa MUKAMA; otarihinga emisiri yaawe, n'obu kwakuba okusharira emizaabibu yaawe.
Ebyemerize otaribigyesha, kandi ebijuma by'emizaabibu yaawe etashariire otaribicwa; omwaka ogwo guryaba ogw'okuhuumura kw'ensi okurikwera.
Sabato egyo ey'ensi niyo eriba eby'okurya byanyu, iwe n'omuhuuku waawe n'omuzaana waawe n'omupakasi waawe n'omunyaihanga owaakushuhuukiireho,
n'amatungo gaawe n'enyamaishwa ez'omu nsi yaawe, byona ebi ensi eryeza nibyo biriba eby'okurya.
Kandi oryayebarira sabato mushanju z'emyaka, niyo myaka mushanju emirundi mushanju; n'ahabw'ekyo obunaku bwa sabato ezo mushanju z'emyaka buryababeera emyaka makumi ana na mwenda.
Reero aha kiro kya ikumi ky'okwezi kwa mushanju oryatwara enzamba erikugamba munonga; ahari eryo izooba ry'okurihiirira niryo oriteereraho enzamba omu nsi yaawe yoona.
Mweze omwaka gwa makumi ataano, murangye omu nsi yoona abagitwiremu boona, ku baine obusingye; guryababeera jubili; omuntu weena omuriimwe agarukye omu butaka bwe n'omu baabo.
Ogwo mwaka gwa makumi ataano guryababeera jubili; mutariguhingiramu, mutarigushaaruuriramu ebyemerize, n'obu kwakuba okugucweramu ebijuma by'emizaabibu etashariire;
ahabw'okuba ni jubili; guryababeera ogurikwera; muryaguma nimurya ebyezire omu ishwa omuri ogwo mwaka.
Omuri ogwo mwaka gwa jubili omuntu weena omuriimwe aryagaruka omu butaka bwe.
Kandi ku origira eki waaguza mutaahi waawe, nari eki waamuguraho, mutarinyagana.
Nk'emyaka erikurata jubili oku eriba eri, obe nikwo waagura ahari mutaahi waawe, kandi nawe akuguze nk'emyaka y'ebihingirwe oku eriba eri.
Emyaka ku eriba mingi, oyongyere obuguzi; kandi emyaka ku eriba mikye, otuubye aha buguzi; ahabw'okuba omu kukuguza aryakurata obwingi bw'emyaka ei orishaaruura.
Mutarinyagana, kureka mutiine Ruhanga waanyu; ahakuba niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Ensi eryayeza emyaka yaayo, naimwe murye, muhaagye, mugituuremu buhooro.
Kandi ku murigira muti: Beitu shi turyatungwa ki omu mwaka gwa mushanju ku turiba tutahingire kandi tutashaarwire!
mumanye ku ndiragiira omugisha gukabaijaho omu mwaka gwa mukaaga, ogwo mwaka gukeera eby'okurya by'emyaka eshatu.
Omu mwaka gwa munaana muryahinga; kwonka muryaguma nimurya ahari ebyo ebi muhunikire ira, okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa mwenda, obu ebi mwabibire biryera.
Eitaka ritaritundirwa kimwe; ahakuba niinye mukama waaryo; naimwe muri abanyaihanga abanshuhuukiireho.
Kandi ensi yoona eriba yaabaire obutaka bwanyu, muryaguma mwikirize eitaka ricungurwe.
Mwene waanyu ku ariba omworo, yaatunda aha butaka bwe, owaabo omuri haihi omu buzaare aryaija acungure eki mwene waabo atunzire.
Omuntu ku aribura ow'okubucungura, bwanyima yaatunga, yaagira eby'okubucungura,
abare emyaka ehingwire okwiha obu yaabutunda, agarurire owaabuguzire eby'emyaka eriba etsigaireyo, abone kugaruka omu butaka bwe.
Kwonka ku ariba atarikubaasa kubwecungurira, obutaka obu yaatunzire buryagumanwa owaabuguzire okuhitsya aha mwaka gwa jubili; omu mwaka ogwo buryarekurwa, mukama waabwo abugarukyemu.

Omuntu ku aritunda enju ye omu rurembo orwehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare, aryaikirizibwa kugicungura omwaka gutakahweireho okuruga obu yaagitunda; aryamara omwaka gwona aine obushoboorozi bw'okugicungura.

Kwonka ku eriba etacungwirwe omwaka ogwo gutakahweire, enju egyo eri omu rurembo orwehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare eryahamibwa kubeera kimwe ey'ogwo owaagiguzire ebiro bye byona n'eby'abarimukurata; n'omu mwaka gwa jubili tericungurwa.
Kwonka amaju g'omu birorero ebiteehinguririziibwe rugo rw'amabaare nigabarwa nk'emisiri y'omu ishwa; nigabaasa kucungurwa; kandi omu mwaka gwa jubili garyarekurwa.
Kwonka omu ndembo z'Abaleevi amaju g'omu butaka bwabo nibaikirizibwa kugacungura omu bunaku bwona.

Kandi Omuleevi ku ariba atacungwire nju ye, egyo nju eyaatunzirwe omu rurembo rw'obutaka bwabo, eryarekurwa omuri jubili; ahabw'okuba amaju g'omu ndembo z'Abaleevi n'agaabo g'obutaka obu baabagaine omu Baisraeli.
Kwonka emisiri ehereraine n'endembo z'Abaleevi teritundwa, ahakuba n'obutaka bwabo bw'ebiro byona.
Otarimushaba enshaagi nari ebirengyesereize; kureka otiine Ruhanga waawe, mwene waanyu abone kuguma atwire naiwe.
Otarimuguza empiiha ahabw'enshaagi, n'obu kwakuba okumuha eby'okurya ngu akweshumbizeho.
Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri kubaha ensi ya Kanaani, ngu mbe Ruhanga waanyu.
kureka agume naiwe nk'omupakasi kandi nk'omushuhuuki; akukorere okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa jubili.
Obwo aryakurugaho, we n'abaana be, agarukye omuri beene waabo n'omu butaka bwa baishenkuru;
ahakuba n'abairu bangye abu naihire omu nsi ya Misri; bataritundwa nk'abahuuku.
Otarimutegyekyesa eikama, kureka otiine Ruhanga waawe.
Kandi eby'abahuuku baawe n'abazaana baawe, abu oriba oine, noikirizibwa kubagura omu mahanga agabeehinguririize;
kandi nimwikirizibwa kubagura omu baana b'abanyamahanga abaabashuhuukiiremu, n'abaijukuru baabo abu barizaarira omu nsi yaanyu; bo baryaba abaanyu.

Kandi nimwikirizibwa kubaraga abaana baanyu abaribakurata, babe abaabo ebiro byona. Bo muryaguma mubagire abahuuku ebiro byona; kwonka beene waanyu Abaisraeli mutaribaikiriza omuntu kutegyekyesa mutaahi we amaani.

Omunyaihanga nari omushuhuuki okushuhuukiireho ku ariba omutungi, na mwene waanyu otwire nawe yaaba omworo yaayetunda ahari ogwo munyaihanga nari omushuhuuki okushuhuukiireho, nari ahari omwe ow'omuri beene waabo,
bwanyima y'okutundwa naabaasa kucungurwa; omwe ahari beene waabo naabaasa kumucungura,
yaaba ishento nari omwana wa ishento, nari mwene waabo weena ow'obuzaare bwa haihi, naabaasa kumucungura; nari shi we wenka, yaatunga, nabaasa kwecungura.

Aryabara emyaka n'owaamuguzire okwiha aha mwaka ogu yaamwetundiiremu okuhitsya aha mwaka gwa jubili; empiiha z'okumucungura ziingane n'egyo myaka; ebiro ebi ariba amazire naakorera mukama we biryabariirirwa, biihurwe nk'oku baihura omupakasi.
Emyaka ku eriba ekitsigaire mingi okuhitsya ahari jubili, oku eriba eri, nikwo arigarurira mukama we empiiha z'okumucungura, naaziiha ahari ezo ezi yaaguzirwe.
Emyaka ku eriba etsigaire mikye, aryabara emyaka na mukama we; oku egyo myaka eriba eri, abe nikwo yaamugarurira empiiha z'okwecungura.
Aryaguma nawe nk'omupakasi orikukorera ebihembo buri mwaka; atarimutwaza eikama, noomureeba.
Ku ariba atacungwirwe omu buryo obwo, omu mwaka gwa jubili aryarekurwa n'abaana be;
ahakuba ahariinye Abaisraeli n'abairu; n'abairu bangye abu naihire omu nsi ya Misri. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Muryaguma murinde sabato zangye, muhe ekitiinisa Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera. Niinye MUKAMA.
Ku muriguma nimukuratira ebi naataireho, mwahurira ebiragiro byangye, mwabyorobera,
ndyaguma mbagwisize enjura omu bunaku bwayo, ensi egire omweru n'emiti y'omu misiri eyane ebyana.
Eihuura ryanyu riryahitsya omu ishaaruura ry'emizaabibu, n'eishaaruura rihitsye omu ibiba; muryarya eby'okurya byanyu, muhaagye, mutuure omu nsi yaanyu buhooro.
Kandi ndyareeta obusingye omu nsi; muryabyama, kandi tihaine oribatiinisa. Ndyamara enyamaishwa mbi omu nsi, na rurara teriraba mu nsi yaanyu yoona.
Muryabinga abazigu baanyu, zaarurara zibagwise omu maisho gaanyu.
Bataano omuriimwe baryabinga igana, na igana omuriimwe baryabinga kakumi; abazigu baanyu baryaitwa zaarurara.
Ndyabataho omutima, mbahe okuzaara munonga, mbakanyise, mpamye endagaano yangye naimwe.
Muryarya eby'okurya ebitwire omu bitara, muhununure ebikuru, muhunikye ebisya.
Ndyata obutaaho bwangye ahagati yaanyu; omutima gwangye tiguribatamwa.
Ndyagyendera omuriimwe, mbe Ruhanga waanyu, naimwe mube abantu bangye.
Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, ngu murekye kuba abahuuku baabo; naabaihaho emigamba eyaabaire yaabainikire, naabagyendesa bwemi.
ku murigaya ebi naataireho, emitima yaanyu yaayangira kimwe emigyenzo ei naataireho, kyabareetera kutoorobera biragiro byangye byona, kureka mwaita endagaano yangye,

naanye ndyabagira nti; ndyabareetera ebirikutiinisa, n'omunywengyerero, n'omushwija ogurukugwisa amaisho omunda, gukareetera amagara okugyenda nigahwerera. Muryabibira busha, ahakuba ebi muribiba abazigu baanyu baryabirya.
Ndyabata omu kaso, mbarwanise, mubingwe abazigu baanyu; abarikubanga babe nibo baabategyeka; muryahunga, hataine obabingire.
Hoona nabwo ku muryanga kumpurira, ndyayeyongyera kubahana emirundi mushanju ahabw'ebibi byanyu;
ndyabacwa amaryo, mbamare eishaija; eiguru ryanyu ndihindure ribe nk'ekyoma, n'ensi yaanyu ebe nk'omuringa;
muryahendekyera busha, ahakuba ensi yaanyu teryeza myaka, kandi emiti y'ensi yaanyu teryana bijuma.
Ku muritwaza okwanyu, mutaikirizana naanye, mwayanga kumpurira, ndyabareetera ebindi bibonaboneso, ebirikwingana n'ebibi byanyu emirundi mushanju.
Kandi ndyabarekurira enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba, zibaakye abaana, zicwekyereze amatungo gaanyu, zibatuubye, n'emihanda yaanyu etsibe.
Ebyo bifubiro ku biriba bitabareeteire kungarukira, mwagumizamu nimutwaza okwanyu, mutaikirizana naanye,
naanye ndyatwaza okwangye, ndekye kwikirizana naimwe; kandi nyowe ndyabeeteerera emirundi mushanju, nimbatura ebibi byanyu.
Ndyabareetaho rurara, ehoore enzigu y'okwita endagaano yangye; kandi ku murihungira omu ndembo zaanyu, ndyabooherereza orufu, mbaheyo omu mikono y'abazigu.
Ku ndihenda enkoni ei mwegamiire, nibyo by'okurya byanyu, abakazi ikumi baryateeka eby'okurya byanyu omu nyungu emwe babibarengyere; muryarya, kwonka timurihaaga.
Ebyo byona ku biriba bitabareeteire kumpurira, mwagumizamu nimutwaza okwanyu, mutaikirizana naanye,
naanye ndyatwaza okwangye mbainiire ekiniga, mbabonabonese emirundi mushanju, nimbatura ebibi byanyu.
Muryarya batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu.

Kandi ndyacwekyereza emyanya yaanyu mikuru ey'okuramizamu, nteme ebyoterero byanyu by'obubaane, mbiiheho, nnagye emitumbi yaanyu aha mitumbi y'ebishushani byanyu; kandi omutima gwangye guryabatamirwa kimwe.
Endembo zaanyu ndyazihindura amatongo, n'emyanya yaanyu erikwera ngihindure emishaka; tindihurira kutaamirana k'emigaju yaanyu.
Ndyahindura ensi yaanyu amatongo, kitangaaze abazigu baanyu abariba bagitwiremu.
Ndyabataataanisiza omu mahanga, nsyoreyo rurara, ngibakuratse, ensi yaanyu eryaba amatongo, n'endembo zaanyu zibe emishaka.
Obunaku bwona obu erimara eri amatongo, eryahuumura, okuhuumura oku etaratungiire mu sabato zaanyu mukigirimu.
Abariba baahonokireho omuriimwe, ndyabahahaariza emitima omu nsi y'abazigu baabo; baryakangwa ekibabi ekirikuhuuhwa omuyaga, bahungye, nk'oku omuntu ahunga rurara; bagwe hataine obabingire.
Baryagwa nibaribatiirirana, nk'abarikuhunga rurara, haza hataine obabingire; timurigira garwanisa bazigu baanyu.
Muryahwerekyererera omu mahanga; ensi y'abazigu baanyu ebamareho.
Abariba baahonokireho omuriimwe baryahwererera omu nsi y'abazigu baanyu ahabw'okutahikiirira kwabo; kandi ahabw'okutahikiirira kwa baishenkurubo, baryahwerera nkabo.
ku nikyo kyandeeteire kutwaza okwangye nkabarwanisa, nkabareeta omu nsi y'abazigu baabo; omu bunaku obwo emitima yaabo etashazirwe ku eryecureeza, baikiriza ekifubiro ky'okutahikiirira kwabo,
naanye obwo ndyaijuka endagaano yaangye na Yakobo, n'ei naaragaine na Isaaka, kandi n'ei naaragaine na Abrahamu; n'egyo nsi ndyagiijuka.

Kwonka ensi yaabo baryaba batagirimu, eshemerererwe sabato zaayo, omu bunaku bwona obu erimara eri amatongo batagirimu; baikirize ekifubiro ky'okutahikiirira kwabo, ahabw'okuba bakanga emigyenzo yangye ei naataireho, n'emitima yaabo yaayangira kimwe ebiragiro byangye.

Kwonka n'obu kiriba kiri kityo, ku bariba bari omu nsi y'abazigu baabo, tindibanaga, kandi tindibangira kimwe kubacwekyereza nkabamaraho, nkaita endagaano yangye nabo; ahakuba ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo;
kureka ahabwabo ndyaijuka endagaano ei naaragaine na baishenkurubo, abu naihire omu nsi ya Misri omu maisho g'amahanga, kuba Ruhanga waabo. Niinye MUKAMA.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro ebyatairweho n'emigyenzo n'ebindi biragiro ebi MUKAMA yaataire ahagati ye n'Abaisraeli, naabigambira aha rushozi Sinai, naaraba omuri Musa.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebigambo ebi. Omuntu ku ariraganisa kuhongyera MUKAMA empongano y'omutaano, yaahonga abantu, abo bantu baryaba aba MUKAMA nk'oku oribabariirira;
obariirire omushaija okuruga aha myaka makumi abiri okuhika ahari makumi mukaaga, omucwe shekeli z'efeeza makumi ataano, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri.
Ku ariba ari omukazi, omucwe shekeli makumi ashatu.
Ku ariba ari omwana ow'emyaka etaano okuhika ahari makumi abiri, yaaba ari omwojo, omucwe shekeli makumi abiri; ku ariba ari omwishiki, omucwe ikumi.
Ku ariba ari omwana muto ow'okwezi kumwe okuhika aha myaka etaano, yaaba ari omwojo omucwe shekeli z'efeeza itaano; ku ariba ari omwishiki, omucwe shekeli z'efeeza ishatu.
Kandi ku ariba ahikize emyaka makumi mukaaga n'okukiraho, yaaba ari omushaija, omucwe shekeli ikumi na itaano; ku ariba ari omukazi omucwe shekeli ikumi.
Kwonka kiraganisa ku ariba ari omworo, otarikubaasa kuha eki acwereirwe, aryareeta empongano aha munyamurwa, nawe amucwere; omunyamurwa amucwere nk'oku kiraganisa arikubaasa kuha.
Eki yaaraganisa ku kiriba kiri enyamaishwa ey'omu nganda ezihongyerwa MUKAMA, yoona ey'omuri ezo nganda ei omuntu ahongyera MUKAMA, eryaba erikwera.

Atarigira ekindi kyona eki yaaha omu mwanya gwayo, n'obu kwakuba okugihingisa, enungi omu mwanya gw'embi, nari embi omu mwanya gw'enungi; ku arigihingisa enyamaishwa ngyenzi yaayo, ei araganiise, n'ei yaagihinga, zombi ziryaba ezirikwera.
Ku ariba araganiise enyamaishwa erikuzira, etari y'omu nganda ezihongyerwa MUKAMA, kiraganisa agitwarire omunyamurwa;
omunyamurwa agicwere obuguzi nk'oburungi nari obubi bwayo oku buri; nk'oku iwe omunyamurwa origicwera, obuguzi bwayo nikwo buriba.
Kwonka kiraganisa ku aryenda kugicungura, ayongyere aha buguzi obu ecwereirwe ekicweka kimwe kya kataano.
Kandi ogihaireyo ku aryenda kugyecungurira, ayongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano eky'obuguzi obu ecwereirwe, ebone kuba eye.

Omuntu ku arihayo ahari MUKAMA ekicweka ky'eitaka ery'omu butaka bwe, oricwere obuguzi noihirira aha bwingi bw'embibo za sayiri ezishemereire kuhingwamu; homeri y'embibo za sayiri ecwerwe shekeli z'efeeza makumi ataano.
Ku arihayo omusiri gwe ahari MUKAMA, atandikire aha mwaka gwa jubili, obuguzi bw'omusiri ogwo buryaba nk'oku ogucwereire.
Kwonka ku ariguhayo bwanyima ya jubili, omunyamurwa abariirire obuguzi bwagwo, naihirira aha myaka eriba etsigaireyo okuhitsya aha gundi mwaka gwa jubili; bacwe aha buguzi bwagwo nk'oku oribariirira.
Kandi oriba ahaireyo omusiri ku aryenda kugwecungurira, ayongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano eky'obuguzi obu ogucwereire, gubone kuba ogwe buzima.
Kwonka ku ariba atarikwenda kwecungurira ogwo musiri, nari ku ariba yaagugurize ondiijo, guryaba a gutakicungurwa bundi.
Kwonka ogwo musiri ku gurirekurwa omu mwaka gwa jubili, guryaguma guri ogwereziibwe MUKAMA, nk'omusiri oguhairweyo; kandi omunyamurwa abe niwe yaagutwara.
Omuntu ku arihayo omusiri ogu yaaguzire ogutari gw'omu butaka bwe,
omunyamurwa abariirire obuguzi bwagwo okuhitsya aha mwaka gwa jubili; omuntu ogwo ahe obuguzi obu gucwereirwe aha izooba eryo, gube ekintu ekyereziibwe MUKAMA.
Omu mwaka gwa jubili omusiri ogwo guryagarukira ou baaguguzireho, ou gwashangirwe guri omu butaka bwe obw'empungurirano.
Obuguzi bwona obu oricwa buryabarwa omuri shekeli ez'Omwanya ogurikwera; kandi shekeli emwe neingana geera makumi abiri.
Ku guriba guri ogw'enyamaishwa erikuzira, agucunguze obuguzi obu oricwa, ayongyereho ekicweka kyabwo kimwe kya kataano; nari ku eriba etacungwirwe, etundwe nk'obuguzi bwayo obu oricwa oku buri.

Kwonka tihariho kintu ekihairweyo kyona eki omuntu arihayo ahari MUKAMA, ahari byona ebi aine, yaaba muntu, nari enyamaishwa, nari ekibanja kye ky'empungurirano, ekiritundwa, nari ekiricungurwa; ekintu kyona ekihairweyo n'ekyeziibwe munonga ahabwa MUKAMA.
Hatarigira omuntu weena ohairweyo ahabw'okucwerwa abantu orubanja rw'okufa, owaacungurwa, kureka aitwe.
Omuntu ku aryenda kugira eki yaacungura omuri ebyo bicweka bya ikumi, ayongyereho ekicweka kimwe kya kataano ky'obuguzi bwabyo.
Ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ky'amasyo g'ente nari ag'entaama, buri nyamaishwa ya ikumi ahari ezo eziriba niziraba ahansi y'enkoni y'omuriisa, eryaba eyereziibwe MUKAMA.
Omuntu ataryetegyereza kureeba yaaba eri nungi nari mbi, kandi atarigihingisa; kwonka ku arigihingisa, eyaahingwa n'eyaahingisibwa, zombi ziryaba ezirikwera; zitaricungurwa.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro ebi MUKAMA yaaragiriire Musa aha rushozi Sinai kubigambira Abaisraeli.
MUKAMA akagambirira Musa omu ihamba rya Sinai, ari omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwezi kwa kabiri omu mwaka gwa kabiri barugire omu nsi ya Misri, ati:
Mubare eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli, nk'oku enganda zaabo ziri n'emiryango ya baishenkurubo oku eri, mubare abashaija boona, omwe omwe, nk'amaziina gaabo oku gari,
abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, ab'omuri Israeli abarikubaasa kuhurura; iwe na Arooni mubabare nk'emitwe y'engabo zaabo oku eri.
Mukwatanise n'omuntu omwe omuri buri ruganda, omukuru w'omuryango gwa baishenkuru.
Aga nigo maziina g'abashaija abaraakwatanise naimwe. Omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni, Elizuuri mwene Shedeuri;
omu rwa Simeoni, Shelumieli mwene Zuri-Shadai;
omu rwa Yuda, Nahashooni mwene Aminadabu;
omu rwa Isakaari, Netaneeli mwene Zuari;
omu rwa Zebuluuni, Eliabu mwene Heloni;
omuri beene Yosefu, ow'omu rwa Efuraimu, Elishaama mwene Amihuudi; omu rwa Manaase, Gamalieli mwene Pedazuuri;
omu rwa Benyamiini, Abidaani mwene Gideoni;
omu rwa Daani, Ahiezeeri mwene Ami-shadai;
omu rwa Asheri, Pagieli mwene Okiraani;
omu rwa Gaadi, Eliasaafu mwene Deueli;
omu rwa Nafutaali, Ahiira mwene Enani.
Abo nibo baatoorainwe omu ihanga ryona, abaabaire bari abeebembezi b'enganda za baishenkurubo, kandi abakuru b'emiryango y'Abaisraeli.
Musa na Arooni baatwara abantu abo abu amaziina gaabo gaagambwaho,

baateerana eihanga ryona aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwezi kwa kabiri, baayehandiikisa nk'enganda zaabo oku zaabaire ziri n'emiryango ya baishenkurubo oku yaabaire eri, baabara amaziina gaabo omwe omwe, abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho.
Nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa, nikwo yaababariire omu ihamba rya Sinai.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Reubeeni, omujigaijo gwa Israeli, nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe, abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni abaabazirwe baaba obukumi buna n'enkumi mukaaga na magana ataano.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Simeoni nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Simeoni abaabazirwe baaba obukumi butaano n'enkumi mwenda na magana ashatu.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Gaadi, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Gaadi abaabazirwe baaba obukumi buna n'enkumi itaano na magana mukaaga na makumi ataano.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Yuda, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda abaabazirwe baaba obukumi mushanju n'enkumi ina na magana mukaaga.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Isakaari, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Isakaari abaabazirwe baaba obukumi butaano n'enkumi ina na magana ana.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Zebuluuni, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Zebuluuni abaabazirwe baaba obukumi butaano n'enkumi mushanju na magana ana.

Omuri batabani ba Yosefu baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Efuraimu, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Efuraimu abaabazirwe baaba obukumi buna na magana ataano.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Manaase nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaase abaabazirwe baaba obukumi bushatu n'enkumi ibiri na magana abiri.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Benyamiini, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini abaabazirwe baaba obukumi bushatu n'enkumi itaano na magana ana.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Daani, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Daani abaabazirwe baaba obukumi mukaaga n'enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Asheri, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Asheri abaabazirwe baaba obukumi buna na rukumi na magana ataano.

Baahandiika oruzaaro rwa Nafutaali, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, nibabara amaziina g'abashaija boona omwe omwe abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali abaabazirwe baaba obukumi butaano n'enkumi ishatu na magana ana.
Abo nibo baabazirwe, abu Musa na Arooni baabazire, nibahwerwa abeebembezi ba Israeli, abashaija ikumi na babiri, buri omwe ahabw'enju ya baishenkuru.
N'ahabw'ekyo abaabazirwe boona omu Baisraeli nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, abaabaire bahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, kandi boona abaabaire nibabaasa kuhurura,
abaabazirwe boona baaba obusiriira mukaaga n'enkumi ishatu na magana ataano na makumi ataano.
ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akagira Musa ati:
Oruganda rwa Leevi rwo otarirubara, n'obu kwakuba okubabarira hamwe n'Abaisraeli abandi;

kureka Abaleevi obagire ab'okutegyeka Obutaaho bw'Ebirikuhamya, n'ebintu byamwo byona, n'ebintu byabwo byona; nibo bariguma nibatwara obwo Butaaho n'ebintu byamwo byona; nibo bariguma nibabukoramu emirimo y'obuheereza, kandi baryaguma bateere amahema gaabo okubwehinguririza.
Kandi Obutaaho ku buriba nibwimuka kugyenda, Abaleevi babe nibo baabukuura; kandi ku buriba nibuza kuteerwa, Abaleevi babe nibo baabuteera. Otari Muleevi weena ku aribuhika haihi, aitwe.
Abaisraeli baryaguma bateere amahema gaabo, buri muntu omu rusiisira rw'owaabo aha rurango rwabo, nk'oku emitwe yaabo eri.
Kwonka Abaleevi bo baryateera amahema gaabo nibeehinguririza Obutaaho bw'Ebirikuhamya, eihanga ry'Abaisreli rirekye kugirirwa ekiniga; kandi Abaleevi nibo bariguma nibarinda Obutaaho bw'Ebirikuhamya.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baakozire, bakakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Abaisraeli bagume bateere amahema gaabo, buri muntu aha rurango rw'owaabo, n'aha turango tw'amaju ga baishenkurubo; bagateere nigareeba Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu aha mbaju zaaryo zoona.

Abaraateere amahema gaabo aha rubaju rwaryo orw'oburugwa-izooba bagume babe ab'orusiisira rwa Yuda, nk'oku emitwe yaabo eri, baine orurango rw'oruganda rwabo; kandi omwebembezi w'Abayuda abe Nahashooni mwene Abinadabu.
Eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi mushanju n'enkumi ina na magana mukaaga, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Ab'oruganda rwa Isakaari nibo baraateere orusiisira okubahereera; omwebembezi waabo abe Netaneeli mwene Zuari.
Eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi butaano n'enkumi ina na magana ana, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Hakurateho oruganda rwa Zebuluuni, omwebembezi waabo abe Eliabu mwene Heloohi;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi butaano n'enkumi mushanju na magana ana, nk'oku baabazirwe.

Boona abaabazirwe omu kicweka kya Yuda bakaba bari abashaija akasiriira n'obukumi munaana n'enkumi mukaaga na magana ana, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari. Abo babe nibo baaguma nibabanza kwimutsya orugyendo.
Aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo hagume hazeho orurango rw'orusiisira rw'oruganda rwa Reubeeni, nk'oku emitwe yaabo eri; omwebembezi waabo abe Elizuuri mwene Shedeuri.
Eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi buna n'enkumi mukaaga na magana ataano, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Abaraateere orusiisira okubahereera babe ab'oruganda rwa Simeoni; omwebembezi waabo abe Shelumieli mwene Zuri-shadai;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi butaano n'enkumi mwenda na magana ashatu, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Hakurateho oruganda rwa Gaadi; omwebembezi waabo abe Eliasaafu mwene Reueli;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi buna n'enkumi itaano na magana mukaaga na makumi ataano.

Boona abaabazirwe omu kicweka kya Reubeeni bakaba bari abashaija akasiriira n'obukumi butaano na rukumi na magana ana na makumi ataano, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari. Abo babe nibo baaba aba kabiri omu kwimutsya orugyendo.

Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu rigume riimukize hamwe n'orusiisira rw'Abaleevi ahagati y'ensiisira ezindi; nk'oku barikusiisira, babe nikwo baaguma nibaimutsya orugyendo, buri ruganda omu mwanya gwarwo, nk'oku endango zaabo ziri.
Aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa izooba hagume hazeho orurango rw'orusiisira rw'oruganda rwa Efuraimu, nk'oku emitwe yaabo eri; omwebembezi waabo abe Elishaama mwene Amihuudi.
Eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi buna na magana ataano, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Ab'oruganda rwa Manaase babe nibo baabahereera; omwebembezi waabo abe Gamalieli mwene Pedazuuri;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi bushatu n'enkumi ibiri na magana abiri, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Hakurateho oruganda rwa Benyamiini; omwebembezi waabo abe Abidaani mwene Gideoni;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi bushatu n'enkumi itaano na magana ana, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Boona abaabazirwe omu kicweka kya Efuraimu bakaba bari abashaija akasiriira n'enkumi munaana na igana, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari. Abo babe nibo baaba aba kashatu omu kwimutsya orugyendo.
Aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho hagume hazeho orurango rw'orusiisira rw'oruganda rwa Daani nk'oku emitwe yaabo eri; omwebembezi waabo abe Ahiezeeri mwene Ami-shadai.
Eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi mukaaga n'enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Ab'oruganda rwa Ashera babe nibo baabahereera; omwebembezi waabo abe Pagieli mwene Okiraani;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi buna na rukumi na magana ataano, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Hakurateho oruganda rwa Nafutaali; omwebembezi waabo abe Ahiira mwene Enani;
eihe rye rikaba ririmu abashaija obukumi butaano n'enkumi ishatu na magana ana, nk'oku baabazirwe.
Boona abaabazirwe omu kicweka kya Daani bakaba bari abashaija akasiriira n'obukumi butaano n'enkumi mushanju na magana mukaaga. Abo babe nibo baaguma nibahereeruka, nk'endango zaabo oku ziri.

Abo nibo Baisraeli abaabazirwe nk'oku amaju ga baishenkurubo gaabaire gari; ab'omu nsiisira boona abaabazirwe nk'amahe gaabo oku gaabaire gari, bakaba bari abashaija obusiriira mukaaga n'enkumi ishatu na magana ataano na makumi ataano.
Kwonka omu kubara Abaisraeli Abaleevi bo tibarabazirwe, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.

Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baakozire, nk'ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa byona oku byabaire biri. Nikwo baagumire nibateera amahema gaabo nk'endango zaabo oku zaabaire ziri, kandi nikwo baabaire baimutsya orugyendo, buri muntu omu ruganda rwe, n'omu muryango gwa baishenkuru.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Arooni na Musa omu bunaku obu MUKAMA yaagambiiremu na Musa aha rushozi Sinai.
Aga nigo maziina ga beene Arooni; omujigaijo gwe ni Nadabu, abandi ni Abihu, Eleazaari na Itamaari.
Ago nigo maziina ga beene Arooni, abanyamurwa abaashukirweho amajuta, abu yaashoroire kuheereza omu mirimo y'abanyamurwa.

Nadabu na Abihu bakafeera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, obu baayoteza omu maisho ga MUKAMA omuriro ogundi ogutararagiirwe kwoteza, bari omu ihamba rya Sinai kandi bakaba batakagizire baana. Kwonka Eleazaari na Itamaari baaguma nibaheereza omu murimo gw'obunyamurwa omu maisho ga Arooni ishebo.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Reeta oruganda rwa Leevi, oruhitsye omu maisho ga Arooni omunyamurwa, babone kuguma nibamuheereza.
Bagume nibamukorera omurimo, bakorere n'eihanga ryona omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, nibakora omurimo gw'Obutaaho.
Babe nibo baarinda ebintu byona eby'omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, beezirikye kukora emirimo y'okuheereza omu by'Obutaaho ahabw'Abaisraeli.
Oheyo Abaleevi ahari Arooni n'abatabani; bamuheerwe kimwe ahabw'Abaisraeli.
Kandi oryataho Arooni n'abatabani, beezirikye kukora omurimo gwabo gw'obunyamurwa; kwonka otari w'omuribo orihika haihi, akabyetaasyamu, aitwe.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Reeba, nyetooraniire Abaleevi omu Baisraeli omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli. Abaleevi n'abangye;

ahabw'okuba emijigaijo yoona n'eyangye; aha izooba eri naitiireho emijigaijo yoona ey'omu nsi ya Misri, nibwo naayeyereza emijigaijo yoona omuri Israeli, ey'abantu n'ey'amatungo. Emijigaijo yoona eryaguma ebe eyangye. Niinye MUKAMA.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa omu ihamba rya Sinai, ati:
Bara Abaleevi, nk'oku amaju ga baishenkurubo gari, n'emiryango yaabo oku eri; obare oyetwa omushaija weena, okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi.
Musa yaayorobera ekigambo kya MUKAMA, yaababara nk'oku yaaragiirwe.
Aga nigo maziina ga batabani ba Leevi, Gereshoni, Kohasi na Merari.
Kandi aga nigo maziina ga beene Gereshoni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, Libuni na Shimei.
Kandi aba nibo beene Kohasi nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, Amuraamu, Izuhaari, Heburooni na Uzieli.
Na beene Merari nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri nibo aba; Mahili na Muushi. Egyo niyo miryango y'Abaleevi, nk'oku amaju ga baishenkurubo gaabaire gari.
Omuri Gereshoni nimwo haakomookire omuryango gw'aba Libuni n'ogw'aba Shimei; egyo niyo miryango y'aba Gereshoni.
Omubaro gw'abarikwetwa abashaija boona okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi kumwe gukaba guri enkumi mushanju na magana ataano.
Emiryango y'aba Gereshoni egume eteere amahema gaayo enyima y'Obutaaho aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.
Kandi omwebembezi w'enju ya baishenkuru b'aba Gereshoni abe Eliasaafu mwene Laeli.
Eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu ebiraakwatsibwe beene Gereshoni, bibe Obutaaho n'Eihema, eby'okurishakaara, omukingo gw'okukinga aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
emikingo y'orugo, n'omukingo ogw'aha irembo ry'orwo rugo orwehinguririize Obutaaho n'eitambiro, n'emirunga yaarwo, kandi n'emirimo yoona ey'ebyo bintu.
Omuri Kohasi nimwo haakomookire omuryango gw'aba Amuraamu, n'ogw'aba Izuhaari, n'ogw'aba Heburooni, n'ogw'aba Uzieli; egyo niyo miryango y'aba Kohasi.
Abeetwa abashaija boona okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi kumwe bakaba bari enkumi munaana na magana mukaaga, abaakwatsiibwe eby'Omwanya ogurikwera.
Emiryango ya beene Kohasi egume eteere amahema gaayo aha rubaju rw'Obutaaho orw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Kandi omwebembezi w'enju ya baishenkurubo omu miryango y'aba Kohasi abe Elizafaani mwene Uzieli.

Ebi baraakwatsibwe bibe eshanduukye y'endagaano, emeeza, ekikondo ky'amatabaaza, n'amatambiro, n'ebintu by'Omwanya ogurikwera ebirikukoresibwa abanyamurwa n'omukingo gwaho, kandi n'emirimo yaabyo yoona.
Kandi Eleazaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa abe niwe yaaba omukuru w'abeebembezi b'Abaleevi, areeberere abakwatsiibwe eby'Omwanya ogurikwera.
Omuri Merari nimwo haakomookire omuryango gw'aba Mahili, n'ogw'aba Muushi; egyo niyo miryango y'aba Merari.
Ab'omuribo abarikwetwa abashaija boona okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi kumwe bakaba bari enkumi mukaaga na magana abiri.
Omukuru w'enju ya baishenkurubo omu miryango ya Merari akaba ari Zurieli mwene Abihaili; abo bagume bateere amahema gaabo aha rubaju rw'Obutaaho orw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Ebi beene Merari baraakwatsibwe bibe embaaho z'Obutaaho n'embazi zaazo n'enyomyo zaabwo n'ebiina byazo n'ebintu byabyo byona, kandi n'emirimo yaabyo yoona;
kandi n'enyomyo z'orugo orwehinguririize ekibuga, n'ebiina byazo n'enkondo zaazo n'emirunga yaazo.

Abaraagume nibateera amahema aha rubaju rw'Obutaaho orw'oburugwa-izooba, omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, aharikureeba ei eizooba rireetwa, ni Musa na Arooni n'abatabani, abaakwatsiibwe omurimo gw'Omwanya ogurikwera, ogurikukorwa ahabw'Abaisraeli; otari w'omuribo ku arihika haihi yaabyetaasyamu, aitwe.

Abaleevi boona abaabazirwe, abu Musa na Arooni baabazire ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri, abeetwa abashaija boona okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi kumwe, bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri.
Kandi MUKAMA yaaragiira Musa ati: Bara abeetwa abashaija boona ab'emijigaijo omu Baisraeli okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi kumwe, ohandiikye omubaro gw'amaziina gaabo.
Ontooranire Abaleevi-niinye MUKAMA- omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli; ompe n'amatungo g'Abaleevi omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'amatungo g'Abaisraeli.
Musa yaabara emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Abeetwa abashaija boona ab'emijigaijo okwiha aha beereere abahikize okwezi, omubaro gw'amaziina gaabo gwaba obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri na magana abiri na makumi mushanju na bashatu.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Twara Abaleevi omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli, otware n'amatungo g'Abaleevi omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo y'amatungo gaabo, Abaleevi babe abangye; niinye MUKAMA.
Kandi ahabw'okucungura emijigaijo y'Abaisraeli magana abiri na makumi mushanju na bashatu abaashaagire aha mubaro gw'Abaleevi,
otware shekeli itaano za buri omwe ahari egyo mijigaijo, otware eziri nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri; (shekeli emwe erimu geera makumi abiri),
ohe Arooni n'abatabani ezo feeza z'okucungura egyo mijigaijo eshaagire.
Ahari abo abaashaagire aha baacungwirwe Abaleevi, Musa yaabaihaho efeeza z'okubacungura;
efeeza ezi yaihire ahari egyo mijigaijo y'Abaisraeli zaaba shekeli rukumi na magana ashatu na makumi mukaaga na itaano, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri.
Musa yaaha Arooni n'abatabani ezo feeza z'okucungura, nk'ekigambo eki MUKAMA yaaragiire oku kyabaire kiri.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Mubare beene Kohasi, mubashoroore omu Baleevi, mubabare nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gari,
okwiha aha bahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, abatakarengize myaka makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo, kukora omurimo gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Ogu nigwo murimo gwa beene Kohasi, ogu bashemereire kukora omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; ogwo murimo n'ogw'ebintu birikwera munonga.
Ab'omu rusiisira ku baryenda kwimutsya orugyendo, Arooni n'abatabani bataahemu, bahanure omukingo ogukingiire Aharikwera munonga, bagushwekye eshanduukye erimu Ebirikuhamya,
bashwekyeho eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, nakyo bakiteho omwenda gwa bururu gwonka, bwanyima bate emigamba omu bifunga byayo.
Kandi aha meeza y'emigaati y'okumurika bateho omwenda gwa bururu, baguteho enyabya n'ebikopo n'ebakuri n'emidumo y'okushukisa empongano z'eby'okunywa; kandi emigaati y'obutoosha nayo ebeho;
babishwekye omwenda gurikutukura, nagwo baguteho eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, bate emigamba omu bifunga byayo.
Kandi batware omwenda gwa bururu, bagushwekye ekikondo ky'etabaaza n'amatabaaza gaakyo n'empana zaakyo n'otusohaani twago, n'ebintu byakyo eby'okushukisa amajuta, ebi barikukoresa omurimo gwakyo;
bakikomerane n'ebintu byakyo byona omu ky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, babite aha biti by'okubiheekyesa.
Kandi ekyoterero ky'ezaabu bakishwekye omwenda gwa bururu, baguteho eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, bate emigamba omu bifunga byakyo.
Kandi bareete ebintu ebi barikukoresa byona, ebirikukoresibwa omu Mwanya ogurikwera, babikome omu mwenda gwa bururu, babishwekye eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, babite aha biti by'okubiheekyesa.
Kandi bayoore eiju aha itambiro, bariteho omwenda gwa bujwa,

bariteho n'ebintu byaryo byona, ebi barikukoresa emirimo yaaryo, n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro gw'amakara n'eby'okwihuza enyama, n'eby'okuyooreraho eiju, n'eby'okuriyooresa, n'enyabya, ebintu eby'eitambiro byona; babishwekye eky'okushweka ky'empu z'engongi, bate emigamba omu bifunga byaryo.

Arooni n'abatabani ku bariguma baaheza kushweka eby'Omwanya ogurikwera n'ebirikukoresibwaho byona, ab'omu rusiisira baaba nibenda kwimutsya orugyendo, bwanyima beene Kohasi babone kwija kubiheeka; kwonka batarikora aha birikwera, batakaafa. Ebyo nibyo bintu by'omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu ebiriheekwa beene Kohasi.

Kandi Eleazaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa akwatsibwe amajuta g'okuhemba, n'obubaane burikutaamirana, n'empongano y'esaano y'obutoosha, n'amajuta ag'okushukaho ahabw'okushoroora; kandi akwatsibwe n'Obutaaho bwona n'ebirimu byona, n'Omwanya ogurikwera n'ebintu byaho.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Mutareka omuryango gw'aba Kohasi kuhwerekyerezibwa, bakahwaho omu Baleevi;
oku mube nikwo mwabatwaza, babone kugumaho, barekye kufa baahika aha bintu ebirikwera munonga. Arooni n'abatabani bagume bataahemu, baragiire buri omwe omurimo gwe n'eki ashemereire kutwara;
kwonka bataritaahamu bakareeba Aharikwera, n'obu kaakuba akaanya akarikwingana busha, batakaafa.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Kandi obare beene Gereshoni nabo, nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gari, n'emiryango yaabo oku eri;
obare boona abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Ogu nigwo murimo gw'emiryango y'aba Gereshoni omu kuheereza n'omu kuheeka ebintu;

baryaguma baheekye emikingo y'Obutaaho, n'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'eby'okurishakaara, n'eky'okushwekaho eky'empu z'engongi ekibishwekire, n'omukingo gw'omuryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,

n'emikingo y'orugo, n'omukingo ogurikukinga eirembo ry'orugo orwehinguririize ekibuga ekirimu Obutaaho n'eitambiro, n'emirunga yaayo n'ebintu ebirikukoresibwa byona; babe nibo baakora emirimo yaabyo yoona.
Arooni n'abatabani nibo bariguma nibaragiira beene Gereshoni emirimo yaabo yoona omu bi bariba nibaheeka byona, n'omu kuheereza kwabo kwona; mubakwatse ebi bashemereire kuheeka byona.
Obwo nibwo buheereza bw'emiryango ya beene Gereshoni omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; omu mirimo yaabo baryaguma nibareebererwa Itamaari mwene Arooni omunylamurwa.
Ebya beene Merari, oryababara nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gari;
obare boona abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Ebi babe nibyo baakwatsibwa kuheeka omu buheereza bwabo bwona obw'omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; embaaho z'Obutaaho, embazi zaazo, n'enyomyo zaazo n'ebiina byazo,

kandi n'enyomyo z'orugo orwehinguririize obwo Butaaho n'ebiina byazo n'enkondo zaazo n'emirunga yaazo, n'ebintu byabyo byona ebirikukoresibwa omu buheereza bwabo bwona; kandi mugambe amaziina g'ebintu ebi omuntu weena ashemereire kuheeka.
Obwo nibwo buheereza bw'emiryango ya beene Merari, nk'emirimo yaabo yoona oku eri omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, nibareebererwa Itamaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa.
Musa na Arooni n'abakuru b'eihanga ryona baabara beene Kohasi nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gari,
baabara abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Abaabazirwe omuribo nk'emiryango yaabo oku eri baaba enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju na makumi ataano.
Abo nibo baabazirwe omu miryango y'aba Kohasi, boona abaabaire nibakora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, abu Musa na Arooni baabazire, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire naaraba omuri Musa.
Kandi abaabazirwe ahari beene Gereshoni, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari,
abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
abaabazirwe aharibo nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari, baaba enkumi ibiri na magana mukaaga na makumi ashatu.
Abo nibo baabazirwe omu miryango ya beene Gereshoni, boona abaabaire bakora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, abu Musa na Arooni baabazire, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire.
Kandi abaabazirwe omu miryango ya beene Merari, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari,
abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
abaabazirwe nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, baaba enkumi ishatu na magana abiri.
Abo nibo baabazirwe omu miryango ya beene Merari, abu Musa na Arooni baabazire nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire naaraba omuri Musa.
Boona abaabazirwe aha Baleevi, abu Musa na Arooni n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli baabazire, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, n'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari,
abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, abatakarengize makumi ataano, boona abarikubaasa kuza omu buheereza obwo kukora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
abaabazirwe aharibo baaba enkumi munaana na magana ataano na makumi munaana.
Nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire naaraba omuri Musa, buri muntu yaakwatsibwa omurimo gwe ogw'obuheereza nari ogw'okwekorera. Musa nikwo yaababazire atyo, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ragiira Abaisraeli baihe omu rusiisira omubembe weena, na buri muntu orikureeta amahira, n'osiisikaire ahabw'omutumbi;
mwihe abashaija n'abakazi omu rusiisira, mubate aheeru yaarwo, barekye kushiisha orusiisira rwabo, oruntuura ahagati.
Abaisraeli baakora batyo, baabaihamu, baabata aheeru y'orusiisira. Nka MUKAMA oku yaagambiire Musa, Abaisraeli baaba nikwo baakora.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omushaija nari omukazi ku arikora ekibi kyona eki abantu bakora, bakacumura ahari MUKAMA, yaagiibwaho orubanja,
ayature ekibi eki akozire, arihe ekimureeteire orubanja ataine ki atsigireyo, akihe ou akozire kubi, kandi akyongyereho ekicweka kyakyo kya kataano.
Kwonka ogwo ou akozire kubi, ku ariba ataine waabo ow'okurihwa, egyo ndihano erihwe MUKAMA, ebe ey'omunyamurwa, kandi eyongyerweho empaya y'entaama ey'okurihiirira, ei baraamurihiirire.
Kandi buri mpongano y'ebintu ebirikwera ebi Abaisraeli barireetera omunyamurwa eryaba eye.
Ebirikwera byona ebi omuntu ashoroire biryaba eby'omunyamurwa; eki omuntu ariha omunyamurwa kyona, kiryaba ekye.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Muka mushaija ku aryekiika aha rubaju, yaakora ekitari ky'obwesigwa ahari iba,
omushaija ondi yaabyama nawe, kyasherekwa iba ataakimanya, ogwo mukazi yaasiisikara, hataine orikumushinja ahabw'okutagira omukwatsire naakikora;
iba yaagira omutima gw'obufuuhi, yaafuuhira omukazi we, n'obu yaakuba atasiisire,

obwo ogwo mushaija aryatwara omukazi we aha munyamurwa, ayereetere empongano, ey'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ekya eefa y'esaano ya sayiri; atarigishukaho amajuta n'obu bwakuba obubaane bwa lebona, ahabw'okuba n'empongano y'esaano ahabw'obufuuhi, empongano y'esaano ey'ekiijutsyo eky'okwijutsya okutahikiirira.
Omunyamurwa airize haihi ogwo mukazi, amute omu maisho ga MUKAMA;
omunyamurwa atware amaizi garikwera omu rwabya rw'eibumba, atware aha mucuucu gw'ahansi omu Butaaho, agute omuri ago maizi;

kandi ate ogwo mukazi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, azingurure eishokye ry'aha mutwe gwe, amute omu ngaro egyo mpongano y'ekiijutsyo, empongano y'esaano ahabw'obufuuhi; kandi omunyamurwa akwate omu ngaro ago maizi garikushaarira, agarikureeta omukyeeno.

Bwanyima arahize ogwo mukazi, naamugira ati: Ku oraabe otaine mushaija ou oshambaine nawe, oteekiikire okeeshiisha, haza nookitegyekwa baro, aga maizi garikushaarira, agarikureeta omukyeeno, garekye kugira eki gaakukoraho.
Kwonka ku oraabe oyekiikire nookitegyekwa baro, okeeshiisha, okabyama n'ondiijo mushaija otari baro;
omunyamurwa arahize ogwo mukazi endahiro y'okukyeenwa, amugire ati: MUKAMA akuhindure eky'okukyeenwa kandi eky'okurahira omu ihanga ryawe, ku araanyuunyuure ekibero kyawe, yaakuhazya enda;
kandi amaizi aga agarikureeta omukyeeno nigaija kukuza omu mara, gakuhazye enda, gakunyuunyuure ekibero. Ogwo mukazi aikirize ati:
Bwanyima ogwo munyamurwa ahandiikye ebigambo by'egyo mikyeeno omu kitabo, abyozye n'amaizi, gaze omuri ago agarikushaarira,
anywaise ogwo mukazi ago maizi garikushaarira agarikureeta omukyeeno; ago maizi agarikureeta omukyeeno gamuze omu nda, gaamushaarire.
Omunyamurwa aihe omu ngaro z'ogwo mukazi egyo mpongano y'esaano ahabw'obufuuhi, agizongazonzye omu maisho ga MUKAMA, agitware aha itambiro;
aihe ahari egyo mpongano oruhi rwayo, rube ekiijutsyo kyayo, orwo ruhi rw'esaano arwokyeze aha itambiro, abone kunywaisa ogwo mukazi ago maizi.

Ku ariheza kugamunywaisa, biryaba biti: ku ariba ayesiisire, akozire ebitari by'obwesigwa ahari iba, ago maizi agarikureeta omukyeeno garyamuza omu nda, gamushaarire, ahagye enda, ekibero kye kinyuunyuukye; ogwo mukazi ahindukye eky'okukyeenwa omu ihanga rye.
Kwonka ku ariba ateesiisire, yaashangwa ari oshemeire, tihaine kirimubaho; aryarekurwa, azaare abaana.
Ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'obufuuhi aha mukazi oine iba orikwekiika, akeeshiisha;
n'aha mushaija owaagira omutima gw'obufuuhi, akafuuhira omukazi we; obwo aryareeta omukazi we omu maisho ga MUKAMA, omunyamurwa amukorere eby'emigyenzo y'ekyo kiragiro byona.
Omushaija aryaihwaho okutahikiirira kwe, kwonka omukazi okutahikiirira kuryamugumaho.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omushaija nari omukazi ku arihiga okuhiga okutari kw'obutoosha okw'Omunaziiri, naaraganisa kweshoroorera MUKAMA,

ayetaanise na viinyo n'eky'okunywa ky'amaani, atarinywa viinyo erikushaarira, nari eky'okunywa ky'amaani kyona ekirikushaarira, n'obu kwakuba okunywa eky'okunywa kyona ekirikuruga omu mizaabibu, nari okurya ebijuma byayo ebibisi nari ebyomire.
Ebiro byona ebi arimara omu bunaziiri atarirya ekintu kyona ekirikuruga omu muzaabibu, okuruga aha mbibo zaayo okuhika aha kishushu kyayo.
Ebiro byona eby'okweshoroora kwe ahari MUKAMA atarihika aha mutumbi.
Ishe nari nyina nari mwene nyina nari munyaanya, ku arifa, ataryeshiisha ahabw'orufu rwabo, ahabw'okuba okweshoroora kwe ahari Ruhanga kuri aha mutwe gwe.
Ebiro byona ebi arimara omu bunaziiri aryaba oyereziibwe MUKAMA.
Ku harigira omuntu yaamukinukira aha rubaju, yaashiisha omutwe gw'obunaziiri bwe, aryamwa eishokye rye aha izooba ry'okushemezibwa kwe; aha kiro kya mushanju niho aririmwera.
Kandi aha kiro kya munana aryareeta obwiba bubiri nari enkombe nto ibiri, abiheere omunyamurwa aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu,
omunyamurwa ahongyeho emwe kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, n'endi okuba ekitambo eky'okwotsya, amurihiirire, ahabw'okuba asiisire ahabw'omufu. Bwanyima ahari eryo izooba ayeze omutwe gwe,

ayeshoroore ahari MUKAMA okumara ebiro byona eby'obunaziiri bwe, areete empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'okwihaho orubanja; ahakuba ebiro bye eby'okubanza biryaba bifiire busha, ahabw'okuba obunaziiri bwe busiisikaire.

ahongyere MUKAMA empongano ze, empaya nto y'entaama emwe ehikize omwaka etaine kamogo kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, omwagazi gw'entaama gumwe oguhikize omwaka ogutaine kamogo kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, empaya y'embuzi emwe etaine kamogo kuba ekitambo ky'okusiima ahabw'obusingye,
ekiibo ky'emigaati etatumbisiibwes otukeeki tw'esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta, na capati ezitatumbisiibwe ezisiigirwe amajuta, hamwe n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Omunyamurwa abimurikye omu maisho ga MUKAMA, amuhongyerere ekitambo kye ky'ekibi n'eky'okwotsya,

kandi ahongyere MUKAMA egyo mpaya y'entaama kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, abihongye n'ekiibo ky'egyo migaati etatumbisiibwe; kandi omunyamurwa ahongye empongano zaabyo ez'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.

Obwo ogwo Munaziiri amwe eishokye aha mutwe gwe ogw'obunaziiri, arimwere aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, atware eryo ishokye ry'aha mutwe gwe ogw'obunaziri, arite aha muriro oguri ahansi y'ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.

Omunyamurwa atware ekivune ky'omukono ky'egyo mpaya y'entaama kiteekire, aihe akakeeki kamwe akatatumbisiibwe omuri ekyo kiibo, na capati emwe etatumbisiibwe, abite omu ngaro z'ogwo Munaziiri, yaaheza kumwa eishokye ry'aha mutwe gwe ogw'obunaziiri;

omunyamurwa abizongazonzye omu maisho ga MUKAMA; bibe omugabo gw'omunyamurwa ogurikwera, hamwe n'enkoro ezongazongiibwe n'ekivune ky'okuguru ekihongirwe. Ebyo ku birihwa, Omunaziiri abone kunywa viinyo.

Ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'Omunaziiri orikuhiga, n'eky'empongano ezi arihongyera MUKAMA ahabw'obunaziiri bwe, otabariiremu ebi arikubaasa kuhonga ahabw'okweyendera; okuhiga oku yaahigire akuhikiirize, nk'ekiragiro ky'obunaziiri bwe oku kiri.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Arooni n'abatabani oti: Oku nikwo muriguma nimushabira Abaisraeli omugisha, nimugira muti:
MUKAMA akwimukize amaisho ge, akuhe obusingye.
Okwo nikwo bariguma nibata eiziina ryangye aha Baisraeli; naanye ndyaguma mbahe omugisha.

Musa ku yaaherize kwimutsya Obutaaho, n'okubushukaho amajuta g'okubushoroora, n'okubweza n'ebintu byabwo byona, n'eitambiro n'ebintu byaryo byona, nabyo yaaheza kubishukaho amajuta g'okubishoroora, n'okubyeza,
ahari eryo izooba abeebembezi ba Israeli, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, nabo baahonga empongano; abo nibo beebembezi b'enganda, abaabaire nibategyeka abaabazirwe;

baareeta empongano zaabo omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ebigaari mukaaga ebiine ekisanga ahaiguru n'enimi ikumi na ibiri, ekigaari kimwe ahabw'abeebembezi babiri, n'enimi emwe ahabwa buri mwebembezi; baabimurika omu maisho g'Obutaaho.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ikiriza ebi, ebi baahonga, bibe eby'okukoresibwa emirimo y'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, obihe Abaleevi, nk'obuheereza bwa buri muntu oku buri.
Musa nikwo kwakiira ebyo bigaari n'ezo nimi, akabiha Abaleevi.
Ebigaari bibiri n'enimi ina yaabiha beene Gereshoni, nk'obuheereza bwabo oku buri;
ebigaari bina n'enimi munaana yaabiha beene Merari, nk'obuheereza bwabo oku buri, okureebererwa Itamaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa.
Kwonka beene Kohasi tiyaagira ki yaabaha, ahabw'okuba bakakwatsibwa obuheereza bw'eby'Omwanya ogurikwera kuguma nibabiheeka aha mabega.
Kandi abo beebembezi baahonga empongano z'okweza eitambiro aha izooba eri ryashukiirweho amajuta g'okurishoroora, baazihongyera omu maisho gaaryo.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Bagume bareete empongano zaabo z'okweza eitambiro, buri mwebembezi aha izooba rye.
Owaareetsire empongano ye aha kiro ky'okubanza ni Nahashooni mwene Aminadabu ow'omu ruganda rwa Yuda.

Empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane,
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka gumwe, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi emwe kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano, ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka gumwe kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Nahashooni mwene Aminadabu.
Aha kiro kya kabiri Netaneeli mwene Zuari omwebembezi w'Abaisakaari yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ei yaahongire ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano,
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane,
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka gumwe, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano, ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Netaneeli mwene Zuari.
Aha kiro kya kashatu Eliabu mwene Helooni, omwebembezi w'Abazebuluuni, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano, ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Eliabu mwene Helooni.
Aha kiro kya kana Elizuuri mwene Shedeuri, omwebembezi w'Abareubeeni yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Elizuuri mwene Shedeuri.
Aha kiro kya kataano Shelumieli mwene Zuri-shadai, omwebembezi w'Abasimeoni, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano, n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Shelumieli mwene Zuri-shadai.
Aha kiro kya mukaaga Eliasaafu mwene Deueli, omwebembezi w'Abagaadi, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Eliasaafu mwene Deueli.
Aha kiro kya mushanju Elishaama mwene Amihuudi, omwebembezi w'Abaefuraimu, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Elishaama mwene Amihuudi.
Aha kiro kya munaana Gamalieli mwene Pedazuuri, omwebembezi w'Abamanaase, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezi nizo mpongano za Gamalieli mwene Pedazuuri.
Aha kiro kya mwenda Abidaani mwene Gideoni, omwebembezi w'Ababenyamiini, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba eikitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mponano za Abidaani mwene Gideoni.
Aha kiro kya ikumi Ahiezeeri mwene Ami-shadai, omwebembezi w'Abadaani, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Ahiezeeri mwene Ami-shadai.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na kimwe Pagieli mwene Okiraane omwebembezi w'Abaasheri, yaaba niwe yaahonga;

empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Pagieli mwene Okiraane.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bibiri Ahiira mwene Enani, omwebembezi w'Abanafutaali, yaaba niwe yaahonga;
