empongano ye ekaba eri eshohaani y'efeeza, oburemeezi bwayo shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, n'orwabya rw'efeeza, oburemeezi bwarwo shekeli makumi mushanju nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, byombi biijwire esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano;
n'ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi kiijwire obubaane;
enimi y'ekimasha emwe, empaya y'entaama emwe, n'empaya nto y'entaama ehikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya;
n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi;

kandi enimi ibiri, empaya z'entaama itaano n'ez'embuzi itaano, n'empaya nto z'entaama itaano ezihikize omwaka, kuba ekitambo ky'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; ezo nizo mpongano za Ahiira mwene Enani.

Ezi nizo mpongano zoona abeebembezi b'Abaisraeli ezi baahongire ahabw'okweza eitambiro, aha izooba eri ryashukiirweho amajuta g'okurishoroora, eshohaani z'efeeza ikumi na ibiri, enyabya z'efeeza ikumi na ibiri, n'ebikopo by'ezaabu ikumi na bibiri;

oburemeezi bwa buri shohaani y'efeeza bukaba buri shekeli igana na makumi ashatu, na buri rwabya shekeli makumi mushanju; efeeza z'ebyo bintu byona zaagira oburemeezi bwa shekeli enkumi ibiri na magana ana, nk'efeeza y'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri;

kandi ebikopo by'ezaabu ikumi na bibiri ebiijwire obubaane, buri kimwe kikaba kiine oburemeezi bwa shekeli ikumi, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, ezaabu yoona ey'ebyo bikopo yaagira oburemeezi bwa shekeli igana na makumi abiri;

kandi amatungo goona ag'ebitambo by'okwotsya, enimi z'ebimasha ikumi na ibiri, empaya z'entaama ikumi na ibiri, n'empaya nto z'entaama ezihikize omwaka ikumi na ibiri hamwe n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano; n'empaya z'embuzi z'ekitambo ky'ekibi ikumi na ibiri;

n'amatungo goona ag'ebitambo by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, enimi makumi abiri na ina, empaya z'entaama makumi mukaaga, n'ez'embuzi makumi mukaaga, n'empaya nto z'entaama ezihikize omwaka makumi mukaaga. Ezo nizo zaabaire ziri empongano z'okweza eitambiro, ryaheza kushukwaho amajuta g'okurishoroora.

Musa ku yaataahire omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu kugamba na MUKAMA, yaahurira eiraka eririkugamba nawe, niriruga ahaiguru y'ekitebe ky'okusaasira, ekyabaire kiri aha shanduukye y'Ebirikuhamya ahagati ya baakerubi bombi; eryo iraka ryagamba nawe.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Arooni oti: Ku origuma waahemba etabaaza, ago matabaaza mushanju gagume gaakye, gahwezese omwanya oguri omu maisho g'ekikondo kyago.
Arooni yaakora atyo; yaahemba ago mataabaza ngu gaakye, gahwezese omwanya oguri omu maisho g'ekikondo kyago, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.

Oku nikwo ekikondo ky'amatabaaza kyaheesirwe, kikaheeshwa omu zaabu; okuruga aha kibunu kyakyo okuhika aha birabyo byakyo kyona kikaba kiheesirwe; nk'eky'okureeberaho, eki MUKAMA yaayorekire Musa, oku kyabaire kiri, nikwo yaaheesire ekyo kikondo ky'amatabaaza.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Iha Abaleevi omu Baisraeli, obashemeze.
Oku nikwo oraabashemeze; obamiisiire amaizi ag'okubaihaho ekibi, bamwe emibiri yaabo yoona, boozye emyenda yaabo, beeshemeze.
Bwanyima batware enimi y'ekimasha n'empongano yaayo y'esaano y'obunono ejwangize n'amajuta; kandi naiwe otware endiijo nimi y'ekimasha kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi.
Oreete Abaleevi omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, oteeranire hamwe eihanga ryona erya Israeli,
omurikye Abaleevi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, Abaisraeli babateho engaro,
Arooni ahongye Abaleevi omu maisho ga MUKAMA kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe omu mwanya gw'Abaisraeli, babe ab'okukora omurimo gw'okuheereza MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Abaleevi bate engaro zaabo aha mitwe y'ezo nimi, emwe ogihongye kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, endi kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya ekihongyeirwe MUKAMA okurihiirira Abaleevi.
Ote Abaleevi omu maisho ga Arooni n'abatabani, obahongyere MUKAMA kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe.
Bwanyima y'okubeeza n'okubahonga kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe, Abaleevi bataahe bakore omurimo gw'obuheereza omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Ahakuba mbaheereirwe kimwe kuruga omu Baisraeli; mbeetooraniire kuza omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli;
ahabw'okuba emijigaijo y'Abaisraeli yoona n'eyangye, ey'abantu n'ey'amatungo; nkagyeyereza aha izooba eri naitiireho emijigaijo yoona ey'omu nsi ya Misri.
Mbwenu ntooraine Abaleevi omu mwanya gw'emijigaijo yoona ey'Abaisraeli.

Kandi abo Baleevi mbaihire omu Baisraeli, naabaha Arooni n'abatabani nk'ekiconco, okukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu ahabw'Abaisraeli, n'okubarihiirira, ngu hataribaho orufu omu Baisraeli, ku bariba baahikire haihi n'Omwanya ogurikwera.
Okwo nikwo Musa na Arooni n'eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli baatwarize Abaleevi; nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa aha by'Abaleevi byona, Abaisraeli baaba nikwo baabatwaza.
Abaleevi baayeshemezaho ekibi, baayozya emyenda yaabo, Arooni yaabahonga omu maisho ga MUKAMA kuba empongano ezongazongiibwe, yaabarihiirira kubashemeza.

Bwanyima y'ebyo Abaleevi baabona kutaaha kukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho ga Arooni n'abatabani; nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaire aragiire Musa aha by'Abaleevi, baaba nikwo baabatwaza.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ebi ndikukugambira aha Baleevi n'ebi; baryatandika kutaaha omu buheereza bw'okukora omurimo gw'eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, bahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano n'okukiraho;
kandi ku barihitsya emyaka makumi ataano, barekyere aho kukora omurimo gw'obwo buheereza ogurikurusya, barekye kugaruka kuheereza;
kwonka bagume bahwere beene waabo omu by'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, okurinda ebi bakwatsiibwe, kwonka barekye kukora eby'obuheereza. Okwo obe nikwo waatwaza Abaleevi aha by'ebi bakwatsiibwe.
MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa omu ihamba rya Sinai omu kwezi kw'okubanza okw'omu mwaka gwa kabiri, barugire omu nsi ya Misri, ati:
Abaisraeli bagume barinde Okuhingurwaho omu bunaku bwakwo obwatairweho.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bina eky'okwezi oku omu mwabazyo, mube nibwo mwakurinda nk'obunaku bwakwo obwatairweho oku buri; mukurinde nk'ebiragiro byakwo byona n'emigyenzo yaakwo yoona oku biri.
Musa yaagambira Abaisraeli kurinda Okuhingurwaho.
Baakurinda omu kwezi kw'okubanza aha kiro kya ikumi na bina omu mwabazyo, bari omu ihamba rya Sinai; nk'ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa byona oku byabaire biri, Abaisraeli baaba nikwo baatwaza.
Kandi hakaba hariho abashaija abasiisirwe omutumbi gw'omuntu, tibaabaasa kurinda Okuhingurwaho eryo izooba; baija ahari Musa na Arooni ahari eryo izooba,
baamugira bati: Tusiisirwe omutumbi gw'omuntu; n'enki ekirikutuzibira kuhongyera MUKAMA empongano omu bunaku bwayo hamwe n'Abaisraeli abandi?
Musa yaabagarukamu ati: Mube murekire, mbanze mpurire eki MUKAMA araaragiire aha byanyu.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Omuntu weena omuriimwe nari omu ruzaaro rwanyu, ku arishiishwa omutumbi, nari ku ariba ari omu rugyendo rwa hare, n'obu kiriba kiri kityo, arinde Okuhingurwaho ahari MUKAMA;
omu kwezi kwa kabiri aha kiro kya ikumi na bina omu mwabazyo, babe nibwo baakurinda; omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho baguriise emigaati etatumbisiibwe n'emboga ezirikushaarira;
batarigira eki baatsigaho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, kandi batarihenda eigufa ryagwo na rimwe; nk'ebiragiro by'Okuhingurwaho byona oku biri, babe nikwo baakurinda.

Kwonka omuntu otasiisikaire, kandi otari mu rugyendo, ku arireka kurinda Okuhingurwaho, aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye; ahabw'okuba tahongyeire MUKAMA empongano omu bunaku bwayo obwatairweho, omuntu ogwo okutahikiirira kwe kuryamugumaho.
Kandi omunyamahanga obashuhuukiiremu, ku aryenda kurinda Okuhingurwaho ahari MUKAMA, aryatwaza nk'ebiragiro byakwo n'emigyenzo yaakwo oku biri; omunyamahanga n'enzaarwa baryagira ekiragiro kimwe.
Okwo nikwo byabaire biba obutoosha; ekicu kikaba kibusangira nyomushana, nyekiro kishusha nk'omuriro.
Ekyo kicu ku kyabaire kiihwa ahaiguru y'Eihema, Abaisraeli babona kugyenda; kandi ahu kyabaire kyemerera, Abaisraeli niho baabaire bateera amahema.
Abaisraeli bakaba bagyenda ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, kandi basiisira ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA; omwanya gwona ogu ekicu kyabaire kimara ahaiguru y'Obutaaho, bakaba baguma omu rusiisira.
N'obu ekicu kyabaire kimara ebiro bingi ahaiguru y'obwo Butaaho, nabwo Abaisraeli bakaba boorobera ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, bareka kugyenda.
Obundi ekicu kikaba kimara ebiro bikye ahaiguru y'Obutaaho; baguma omu rusiisira nk'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA oku kiri; kandi bwanyima nk'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA oku kiri, baimutsya orugyendo.

Obundi ekicu kigumaho okwiha omu mwabazyo okuhitsya omu kasheeshe; ekicu kikiihwa aha Butaaho omu kasheeshe, baimutsya orugyendo; nari shi ku kyabaire kisiibaho, kyaraaraho, bwanyima kikiihwaho, baimutsya orugyendo.
N'obu ekicu kyabaire kimara ebiro bibiri nari okwezi nari omwaka kiri ahaiguru y'obwo Butaaho, Abaisraeli bakaba baguma omu rusiisira, bareka kugyenda; kwonka ku kyabaire kiihwaho, bagyenda.
Bakaba bateera amahema ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA; kandi bagyenda ahabw'ekiragiro kye; baguma niboorobera ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, nk'oku yaabaragiire naaraba omuri Musa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Heesha enzamba ibiri omu feeza; ozikore omu feeza eheesire; ogume ozeetese eihanga ryona, n'okuziimukisa abari omu rusiisira kugyenda.
Ku bariziteera zombi, eihanga ryona rikuteeranireho aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubaabuganiramu.
Ku bariteera emwe yonka, abeebembezi, abakuru b'enganda z'Abaisraeli, bagume bakuteeranireho.
Ku muriteera ey'akasirikiriro, ab'omu nsiisira eziri aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bagume baimutsye orugyendo.
Ku murigaruka mwateera ey'akasirikiriro, ab'omu nsiisira ez'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo bagume baimutsye orugyendo; ku bariba nibenda kwimutsya orugyendo, bagume bateere ey'akasirikiriro.
Ku muryenda kuteerana eihanga ryona, mugume muteere ezo nzamba, kwonka mutariteera ez'akasirikiriro.
Batabani ba Arooni abanyamurwa babe nibo baaguma nibateera ezo nzamba. Okwo kuteera enzamba kubabeere ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Ku murihurura kurwanisa abazigu baanyu abarikubaita kubi omu nsi yaanyu, mugume muteere ezo nzamba z'akasirikiriro, mubone kwijukwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, n'okujunwa omu bazigu baanyu.

Kandi omu biro by'okushemererwa kwanyu n'omu magyenyi gaanyu agatairweho n'omu kuboneka kw'ameezi gaanyu, mugume muteere ezo nzamba nimutamba ebitambo, by'okwotsya, n'eby'empongano zaanyu z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, zibabeere ekiijutsyo ky'okwijukirwaho Ruhanga waanyu; niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Omu mwaka gwa kabiri, omu kwezi kwa kabiri aha kiro kyakwo kya makumi abiri, ekicu kiri kikaihwa aha Butaaho bw'ebirikuhamya.
Abaisraeli baimutsya orugyendo, baaruga omu ihamba rya Sinai, nk'oku orugyendo rwabo rwabaire nirukuratana; ekyo kicu kyayemerera omu ihamba rya Parani.
Okwo nikwo kwimutsya orugyendo kwabo okw'okubanza, nibagyenda nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaragiire naaraba omuri Musa.
Haabanza kwimutsya orurango rw'orusiisira rw'Abayuda, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari; omwebembezi w'eihe ry'Abayuda akaba ari Nahashooni mwene Aminadabu.
Omwebembezi w'eihe ry'Abaisakaari akaba ari Netaneeli mwene Zuari;
kandi omwebembezi w'eihe ry'Abazebuluuni akaba ari Eliabu mwene Helooni.
Ku baaherize kukuura Obutaaho, beene Gereshoni na beene Merari ababwekorera baimutsya orugyendo.
Orurango rw'orusiisira rw'Abareubeeni rwaimutsya orugyendo, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari; omukuru w'eihe ryabo akaba ari Elizuuri mwene Shedeuri.
Omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Abasimeoni akaba ari Shelumieli mwene Zuri-shadai;
kandi omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Abagaadi akaba ari Eliasaafu mwene Deueli.
Bwanyima aba Kohasi baimutsya orugyendo, baheekire ebintu eby'Omwanya ogurikwera; baashanga Obutaaho bwaherize kuteerwa.
Orurango rw'orusiisira rw'Abaefuraimu rwaimutsya orugyendo, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari; omukuru w'eihe ryabo akaba ari Elishaama mwene Amihuudi;
omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Abamanaase akaba ari Gamalieli mwene Pedazuuri;
kandi omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Ababenyamiini akaba ari Abidaani mwene Gideoni.
Orurango rw'orusiisira rw'Abadaani orwabaire ruri enyima y'ezindi nsiisira zoona, rwaimutsya orugyendo, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari; omukuru w'eihe ryabo akaba ari Ahiezeeri mwene Ami-shadai;
omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Abaasheri akaba ari Pagieli mwene Okiraane;
kandi omukuru w'eihe ry'oruganda rw'Abanafutaali akaba ari Ahiira mwene Enani.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baakurataine omu ngyendo zaabo, obu baimutsya orugyendo, nk'oku amahe gaabo gaabaire gari.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Tindikwija kugyenda naimwe, kureka niinyija kugaruka omu nsi yaitu omuri beene waitu.
Musa yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, otatutsigaho; ahabw'okuba noomanya omuringo ogu tushemereire kusiisiramu omu ihamba, niiwe orikwija kuba amaisho gaitu.
Kandi ku oraagyende naitwe, ebirungi byona ebi MUKAMA aritukorera, naitwe turyabikukorera.
Ku baabaire baimutsya orugyendo kuruga omu rusiisira, ekicu kya MUKAMA kiguma kiri ahaiguru yaabo nyomushana.
Kandi egyo shanduukye ku yaabaire eimutsya orugyendo, Musa agira ati: Ai MUKAMA, imuka, abazigu baawe bataataane, n'abarikukwanga bakuhungye.
Kandi ku yaabaire ehuumura, agira ati: Ai MUKAMA, garuka aha bukumi n'obukumi bw'Abaisraeli.
Abantu baatakira Musa; Musa yaashaba MUKAMA; omuriro gwaraara.
Omwanya ogwo gwayetwa Tabera, ahabw'okuba omuriro gwa MUKAMA gukabaakamu.
Omutwe gw'ebijwangye by'abanyamahanga abaabaire bari omuribo baatandika kwetenga; Abaisraeli nabo baagaruka baarira, nibagira bati: N'oha oraatuhe enyama y'okurya?
Twaijuka eby'enyanja, ebi twabaire turiira busha, tukiri omuri Misri, emyongo, ebihaaza, obutunguru bw'ebibabi n'obw'ebitakuri, na katunguricumu;
mbwenu twomire, titwine kindi kyona eki turikureeba kureka emaanu egi yonka.
Kandi egyo maanu ekaba neeshusha otujuma tw'obunyaatsi oburikwetwa gaadi; enshusha yaayo ekaba eri nk'amakanca g'ebiti agarikwetwa budola.
Abantu bakaba bagyenda, bagitorotoora, bagisa aha mengo, nari bagishekura omu shekuro, bagiteeka omu nyungu, bagikoramu twakeeki; okunura kwayo kukaba kuri nk'okw'otukeeki otukozirwe n'amajuta.
Orume ku rwabaire rutonda omu rusiisira nyekiro, emaanu erutondaho.
Musa ku yaahuriire abantu nibarira, buri muntu n'ab'eka ye nibaririra aha miryango y'amahema gaabo, MUKAMA yaagira ekiniga kingi munonga, Musa nawe yaaguubwa kubi.
Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ati: Ahabw'enki oitsire kubi omwiru waawe? Ahabw'enki onkoreire oburemeezi bw'aba bantu boona, okanga kungirira embabazi?
Niinye naatwaire enda y'aba bantu boona? Niinye naabazaire, waaza kungira oti: Obatwarire omu kifuba, nk'omurezi oku akiikira omwana orikwonka, obahitsye omu nsi ei naaraganiise baishenkurubo?
Nkaihire hi enyama y'okugaburira aba bantu boona? Ahakuba nibandirira omu maisho nibagira bati: Tuhe enyama y'okurya.
Tindikubaasa kuheeka aba bantu boona nyenka, ahabw'okuba n'omutwaro gurikundema.
Ku oraabe nooyenda kuntwaza otyo, ninkweshengyereza, nyita ndugyeho, ku oraabe nongirira embabazi, ndekye kureeba enaku ezirimbaho.
Naanye niinyija kushuuma, ngambireyo naiwe; nyihe aha mwoyo oguri ahariiwe, ngubateho; nabo bagume baheekye naiwe omutwaro gw'abo bantu, orekye kuguheeka wenka.

Kandi ogambire abantu oti: Mweyeze ahabw'eizooba rya nyencakare, nimwija kurya enyama; ahakuba muririire omu matu ga MUKAMA, nimugira muti: N'oha oraatuhe enyama y'okurya? Ahakuba tukaba turi gye omuri Misri. N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA naija kubaha enyama, nimugirya.
Timurigirya izooba rimwe, nari amazooba abiri, nari ataano nari ikumi nari makumi abiri,
kureka nimwija kugirya okwezi kwona, okuhitsya obu eribareetwa omu nyindo, ekabatama; ahabw'okuba mugayire MUKAMA ori omuriimwe, mwamuririra omumaisho nimugira muti: Tukaba twarugira ki Misri?
Musa yaagira ati: Abantu abu ntuuramu n'abashaija obusiriira mukaaga abarikugyendesa ebigyere; kandi waagira oti: Niinyija kubaha enyama, bagirye okumara okwezi kwona.
Nibaija kubaagirwa amasyo g'entaama n'ag'ente g'okubahaazya? Nari shi eby'enyanja byona nibiija kuteeranirwa hamwe ahabw'abo kubahaazya?
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati: Noogira ngu omukono gwa MUKAMA gubaire mugufu? Mbwenu noija kureeba ekigambo kyangye ku kiraabe nikiija kuhikiirira ahabwawe nari kitarikwija kubakwo.
Musa yaashohora, yaagambira abantu ebi MUKAMA yaamugambira; bwanyima yaateerana abashaija makumi mushanju ab'omu bakuru b'abantu, yaabata omu myanya okwehinguririza Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
MUKAMA yaashuumira omu kicu, yaagamba na Musa, yaiha aha mwoyo ogwabaire gumuriho, yaaguta ahari abo bakuru makumi mushanju; omwoyo ku gwabagiireho, baaragura; kwonka tibaagaruka kukora batyo obundi.

Kwonka omu rusiisira hakaba hatsigairamu abashaija babiri, omwe orikwetwa Eludaadi n'ondi orikwetwa Medadi; ogwo mwoyo gwabazaho; kandi bakaba bari omu mubaro gw'abahandiikirwe, kwonka batarugire aho kuza aha Ihema; baaragurira aho omu rusiisira.
Omutsigazi yaagyenda nairuka, yaagambira Musa ati: Eludaadi na Medadi nibaragurira omu rusiisira.
Yoshua mwene Nuuni omuheereza wa Musa, omwe aha bashaija be b'entoore, yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye Musa, bazibire.
Musa yaamugarukamu ati: Waagira eihari ahabwangye? Nkaabaasibwa ki abantu ba MUKAMA boona baba baanabi, MUKAMA abaha omwoyo gwe.
Musa yaagaruka omu rusiisira, we n'abo bakuru b'Abaisraeli.
Abantu baimuka, baarenzya eryo izooba, baaseesa ekiro, baarenzya erindi izooba nibazikwata; owaakwatsire enkye, yaakwata homeri ikumi, baazeeyanikira embaju zoona ez'orusiisira.
Enyama ku yaabaire ekibari omu kanwa, batakagimizire, MUKAMA yaabagirira ekiniga kingi, yaajuumikiza abantu orufu rwingi munonga.
Omwanya ogwo gwayetwa Kibiroosi-hatava, ahabw'okuba niho baaziikire abantu abaayetengire.
Abantu baimuka Kibiroosi-hatava, baaza Hazeroosi; baamarayo ebiro.
Baagira bati: N'eky'amazima MUKAMA agambira omuri Musa wenka? Itwe tatugambiramu? MUKAMA yaakihurira.
Kandi ogwo mushaija Musa akaba ari omucureezi, okukira abantu boona ab'omu nsi.
Ahonaaho MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni na Miriamu ati: Mushohore mwenshatu, mwije aha Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu. Bonshatu baashohora.
MUKAMA yaashuumira omu nyomyo y'ekicu, yaayemerera aha muryango gw'Eihema, yaayeta Arooni na Miriamu, bombi baija;
yaabagira ati: Nimuhurire ebigambo byangye. Omuriimwe ku haraabe harimu nabi, omu kworekwa nimwo nyowe MUKAMA ndimwemanyisiza, kandi n'omu kirooto nimwo ndigambira nawe.
Kwonka omugaragwa wangye Musa tikwo mmutwaza; n'omwesigwa omu nju yangye yoona.
We ngamba nawe butunu nitureebana, ntarikugamba nawe mu nfumu, kandi n'enshusha yangye agireeba. Mbwenu ahabw'enki timutiinire kugamba kubi aha mugaragwa wangye Musa?
MUKAMA yaabagirira ekiniga kingi, yaagyenda.
Ekicu ku kyarugire ahaiguru y'Eihema baareeba Miriamu aseesire ebibembe ebirikwera nk'orubaare. Arooni ku yaareebire Miriamu, yaashanga aseesire ebibembe.
Arooni yaagira Musa ati: Ai bambe Mukama wangye, otatuha ekifubiro ahabw'ekibi eki tukoresiibwe obushema.
Ninkweshengyereza arekye kushusha nk'ekizairwe kifiire kijunzire orubaju rumwe.
Musa yaatakira MUKAMA ati: Ai Ruhanga, naakweshengyereza mutambire.

MUKAMA yaagarukamu Musa ati: Kuri noogira ngu ishe amucweire amacwante bucwante omu maisho, takugizire nshoni okumara ebiro mushanju? Reka amare ebiro mushanju akomeirwe aheeru y'orusiisira, bwanyima abone kurugarurwamu.
Atyo Miriamu yaakomerwa aheeru y'orusiisira okumara ebiro mushanju; abantu tibaimutsya rugyendo okuhitsya obu yaagarwirwe omu rusiisira.
Bwanyima abantu baimutsya orugyendo, baaruga Hazeroosi, baateera orusiisira omu ihamba rya Parani.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Tuma abantu batate ensi ya Kanaani, ei ndikuha Abaisraeli; mwihe omuntu omwe omuri buri ruganda rwa baishenkurubo, buri omwe aharibo abe ari omwebembezi.
Musa yaabatuma ari omu ihamba rya Parani nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire; abu yaatumire boona bakaba bari abakuru b'Abaisraeli.
Aga nigo maziina gaabo. Omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni baatuma Sahamua mwene Zakura;
omu rwa Simeoni Shafati mwene Hoori;
omu rwa Yuda, Kalebu mwene Yefune;
omu rwa Isakaari, Igali mwene Yosefu;
omu rwa Efuraimu, Hoshea mwene Nuuni;
omu rwa Benyamiini, Paluti mwene Raafu;
omu rwa Zebuluuni, Gadieli, mwene Soodi;
omu rwa Yosefu, nirwo ruganda rwa Manaase, Gaadi mwene Suusi;
omu rwa Daani, Amieli mwene Gemali;
omu rwa Asheri, Seeturi mwene Mikaeli;
omu rwa Nafutaali, Nahibi mwene Vofisi;
omu rwa Gaadi, Geueli mwene Maaki.
Ago nigo maziina g'abantu abu Musa yaatumire kutata egyo nsi. Musa yaayeta Hoshea mwene Nuuni Yoshua.
Musa yaabatuma kutata ensi ya Kanaani, yaabagira ati: Mutoore omuhanda ogurikuraba Negebu, mwinamukye omu nsi y'ebibungo,
mutate ensi, mumanye oku eri, n'abantu abagitwiremu mumanye ku baraabe baine amaani nari batagaine, nari shi ku baraabe bari bakye nari baingi;
n'ensi ei batwiremu ku eraabe eri nungi nari eri mbi; n'endembo ezi batwiremu oku ziri, ku baraabe nibataaha omu nsiisira, nari omu ngo zigumire;

kandi mureebe eitaka ryayo ku riraabe niryeza nari ritarikweza, n'ensi ku eraabe erimu ebiti nari bitarimu. Mutatiina, mureete aha bijuma by'omuri egyo nsi. Kandi obunaku obwo bukaba buri eitogyera ry'emizaabibu.
Batyo baagyenda, baatata ensi okuruga omu ihamba rya Ziini okuhika Rehobu, ahu orikutaahira nooza Hamasi.

Bainamuka Negebu, baahika Heburooni; kandi obwo Ahimaanu na Sheshai na Talumai beene Anaki bakaba bari okwo. (Heburooni egyo ekaba emazire emyaka mushanju eyombekirwe, Zoani ey'omuri Misri etakombekirwe.)
Baahika omu ruhanga rwa Eshikooli, baatemayo omutsita gw'ebijuma by'emizaabibu, abantu babiri baaguheeka aha mugamba; kandi baareeta n'amakomamahanga n'ebijuma by'emitiini.
Omwanya ogwo gwayetwa oruhanga rwa Eshikooli ahabw'omutsitsa gw'ebijuma by'emizaabibu, ogu Abaisraeli baatemireyo.
Ku baamazire ebiro makumi ana nibatata egyo nsi, baagaruka.

Ku baizire, baashanga Musa na Arooni n'eihanga ry'Abaisraeli ryona Kadeshi omu ihamba rya Parani, baabagambira hamwe n'eihanga ryona ebi baareebire, kandi baabooreka n'ebijuma ebi baihire omu nsi egyo.
Baagira Musa bati: Tukahika omu nsi ei waatutumiremu, n'ekya buzima n'ensi y'amate n'obwoki; kandi n'ebijuma byayo mbibi.
Kwonka abantu abagitwiremu n'ab'amaani, n'endembo zaabo zizitiize engo z'amabaare, kandi ni mpango munonga; tukareebayo na beene Anaki.
Abaamaleki batwire omu nsi ya Negebu, Abahiiti n'Abayebusi n'Abaamori batwire omu nsi y'ebibungo; n'Abanyakanaani batwire aha nyanja n'omu mpita za Yorudani.
Kwonka abantu abaabaire bagyenzire nawe baagira bati: Titurikubaasa kwinamukayo kurwana na bari bantu, ahabw'okuba nibatukiza amaani.
Baagambira Abaisraeli enkuru mbi z'ensi ei baagiire kutata, nibagira bati: Ensi ei twarabiremu kutata, n'ensi erikurya abagitwiremu; n'abantu boona abu twareebireyo ni baraingwa munonga.
Kandi tukareebayo abantu b'ebikaaka, beene Anaki, abaakomookire aha Baanefili; tukeereeba turi nk'eseenene, kandi kwo nikwo twabaire turi omu maisho gaabo.
Eihanga ry'abantu boona baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baaborooga; ekyo kiro baaraara nibarira.
Abaisraeli boona baayetomboitera Musa na Arooni, eihanga ryona ryagira riti: Kuri nangwa twagwire omu nsi ya Misri! Nari tukaahenwa ki, tugwa omuri eri ihamba!
MUKAMA naatutwarira ki omuri egyo nsi kumarirwayo rurara? Abakazi baitu n'abaana baitu abato nibaija kuba eminyago. Ekirikukira t'okwegarukira Misri?
Musa na Arooni baajuumara omu maisho g'omutwe gwona ogw'eihanga ry'Abaisraeli boona.
Bwanyima Yoshua mwene Nuuni na Kalebu mwene Yefune, bamwe ahari abo abaatatsire ensi, baataagura ebijwaro byabo.
Baagambira eihanga ry'Abaisraeli ryona bati: Ensi ei twarabiremu kutata ni nungi munonga.
MUKAMA ku araabe naatusiima, aryagituhitsyamu, agituhe; n'ensi y'amate n'obwoki.
Kwonka murekye kugomera MUKAMA, kandi mutatiina abantu b'omu nsi egyo, ahakuba n'eby'okurya ahariitwe; ekibaire kibakingiire kibaihirweho, kandi MUKAMA ari hamwe naitwe; mutabatiina.
Kwonka eihanga ryona ryagira riti: Tubateere amabaare.
Ahonaaho ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyabonekyera Abaisraeli boona omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Abantu aba baryahitsya hi okungaya? Baryahitsya hi okutanyikiriza, haza kunu naakozire obumanyiso obwo bwona omuribo?
Niinyija kubaitsa orufu, mbaiheho obuhunguzi bwabo, haza nkuhindure eihanga eririkubakira obwingi n'amaani.
Musa yaagambira MUKAMA ati: Ku oraagire otyo, Abanyamisri nibaija kubihurira; ahakuba okaiha aba bantu omuribo n'amaani gaawe,

bakigambire abatwire omu nsi egi, haza baabaire baahuriire ngu iwe MUKAMA otuura omuri aba bantu; ahakuba iwe MUKAMA oreebwa n'amaisho butunu, kandi ekicu kyawe kyemerera ahaiguru yaabo, kandi ogyenda obeebembeire, ori omu nyomyo y'ekicu nyomushana, n'omu nyomyo y'omuriro nyekiro.
Mbwenu ku oraite aba bantu nk'omuntu omwe, amahanga agaahuriire okurangaanwa kwawe, garyagira gati:
MUKAMA aremirwe kuhitsya abo bantu omu nsi ei yaarahiire naaraganisa kubaha, nikyo abacwekyererereize omu ihamba.
Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza amaani ga MUKAMA gabe maingi, nk'oku waagambire noogira oti:

MUKAMA tarahuka kuguubwa kubi, n'ow'embabazi nyingi, asaasira eby'okutahikiirira n'eby'okushiisha, tasingisiriza abaine orubanja na kakye; atura abaana okutahikiirira kwa baishebo, okuhitsya aha baijukuru n'abaijukuruza.
Ninkweshengyereza saasira okutahikiirira kw'abantu aba, nk'embabazi zaawe nyingi oku ziri, nk'oku oshangwa obasaasira okwiha obu baaruga Misri n'okuhitsya hati.
kwonka niinyerahira nti, nk'oku ensi eriijura ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA,
aha bantu abo boona, abaareebire ekitiinisa kyangye n'obumanyiso obu naakoreire Misri n'omu ihamba, bakangyeza emirundi egi yoona ikumi, batarikworobera iraka ryangye,
tihariho n'omwe aharibo orireeba ensi ei naarahiire kuha baishenkurubo; kandi tihariho n'omwe ahari abo abangayire origireeba,
kureka omwiru wangye Kalebu, ahabw'okuba aine omutima ogundi, ogutari nk'ogwabo, akankuratirira kimwe; ogwo ndyamuhitsya omu nsi ei yaagiiremu; n'oruzaaro rwe ruryagihungura.
Mbwenu, nk'oku Abaamaleki n'Abanyakanaani batwire omu mpanga, nyencakare muhindukye, mugarukye omu ihamba, mutoore omuhanda ogurikuza aha Nyanja erikutukura.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Eihanga eri eribi riryahitsya hi okuunyetomboitera? Mpuriire okwetomboita oku Abaisraeli barikuunyetomboitera.
Bagambire oti: MUKAMA naagira ati: Buzimazima niinyerahira nti, nk'oku mpuriire nimugamba, nikwo ndibagira;
emitumbi yaanyu eryagwa omuri eri ihamba; abaabazirwe mwena, nk'omubaro gwanyu gwona ogw'abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho oku guri, mwena abaanyetomboitere,
buzima timurihika mu nsi ei naimukiize omukono nindahira kubaha ngu mugituuremu, kureka Kalebu mwene Yefune na Yoshua mwene Nuuni.
Kwonka abaana baanyu abato, abu mugizire ngu baryaba eminyago, nibo ndigihitsyamu, bakamanya ensi ei mwangire.
Kwonka imwe, emitumbi yaanyu eryagwa omuri eri ihamba;
kandi abaana baanyu baryamara emyaka makumi ana nibarizengyereramu nibariisa, nibaturwa obuteesigwa bwanyu, okuhitsya obu emitumbi yaanyu yoona eriziikwa omu ihamba.
Nk'ebiro makumi ana ebi mwatatiiremu egyo nsi oku birikwingana, ekiro kimwe kiryaingana omwaka, mumare emyaka makumi ana mwine orubanja rw'okutahikiirira, kandi muryamanya ku mbagwereirwe kubi.
Niinye MUKAMA owaakigamba; buzimazima eki nikyo ndikora aha ihanga eri ryona eribi, eriteeraine kundwanisa; baryahwera omuri eri ihamba, kandi nimwo barifeera.
abo bashaija abaagambire kubi ahari egyo nsi baitirwa orufu omumaisho ga MUKAMA.
Kwonka Yoshua mwene Nuuni na Kalebu mwene Yefune, bamwe ahari abo abaagiire kutata ensi, baaba nibo baahonokaho.
Baimuka kare omu kasheeshe, bainamuka kuza omu kibungo nibagira bati: Reeba turi aha, nitwinamuka kuza omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaaraganiise kutuha; ahakuba tusiisire.
Musa yaabagira ati: Ahabw'enki nimushobya ekiragiro kya MUKAMA? Eki murikukora tikirikwija kuba gye.
Mutainamuka, mukasingurwa abazigu baanyu; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA tari muriimwe.
Mumanye ngu omu maisho gaanyu harimu Abaamaleki n'Abanyakanaani, nimwija kwitwa rurara, ahakuba muteishukire mwareka kukuratira MUKAMA; n'ahabw'ekyo tarikwija kuguma naimwe.
Kwonka bo baabigaya, baagumizamu bainamuka omu kibungo; kwonka eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA tiyaaruga mu rusiisira, n'obu yaakuba Musa.
Bwanyima Abaamaleki n'Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire omuri ekyo kibungo baashuuma, baabateera, baababinga, baabahitsya Horuma.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebigambo byangye ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Ku murihika omu nsi ei ndikubaha, ei murikuza kutuuramu,

mwayenda kuhongyera MUKAMA empongano z'okwotsya omu muriro, n'obu kiriba kiri ekitambo ky'okwotsya, nari ekitambo ky'okuhikiiriza eki waaraganiise noohiga, nari eky'okuhonga ahabw'okweyendera, nari eky'okuhonga aha magyenyi gaanyu agaatairweho, kuba ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA, nimukiiha omu masyo g'ente nari ag'entaama,
orihonga empongano ye ahongyere MUKAMA empongano y'esaano ey'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi kya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini y'amajuta g'emizeituuni,
kandi, oteekateekye ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini ya viinyo ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama, kuba empongano ey'eby'okunywa, ehongwe hamwe n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya nari ekindi kitambo.

Nari ku eriba eri empaya y'entaama oteekateekye ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu ekicweka kimwe kya kashatu ekya hiini y'amajuta g'emizeituuni kuba empongano y'esaano y'okuhongwa n'egyo mpaya;
kandi ohongye ekicweka kimwe kya kashatu kya hiini ya viinyo kuba empongano y'eby'okunywa ey'omugaju murungi ahari MUKAMA.
Kandi ku oriteekateeka enimi y'ekimasha kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, nari ekindi kitambo eky'okuhikiiriza eki waaraganiise noohiga, nari empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye ez'okuhongyera MUKAMA,
oriba naahonga egyo nimi, agihongye n'ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri kya hiini y'amajuta g'emizeituuni kuba empongano y'esaano.
Kandi oryahonga ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri kya hiini ya viinyo kuba empongano y'eby'okunywa, byona bibe empongano ey'okwotsya omu muriro ey'ekisooroora kirungi ekirikushemeza MUKAMA.
Okwo bibe nikwo byaguma nibikorwa ahari buri nimi, nari buri mpaya, nari ahari buri mpaya nto y'entaama nari ey'embuzi.
Nk'ebitambo ebi muriteekateeka oku birikwingana, mube nikwo mwakora ahabwa buri kimwe nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri.
Enzaarwa zoona ziryaguma zikore ebyo zityo, ku ziriba nizihonga empongano ez'okwotsya omu muriro ez'ekisooroora kirungi ekirikushemeza MUKAMA.

Kandi omunyaihanga ku ariba abashuhuukiiremu nari omuntu weena oriba atwire naimwe omu busingye bwanyu bwona, yaayenda kuhonga empongano ey'okwotsya omu muriro, ey'ekisooroora kirungi ekirikushemeza MUKAMA, nk'oku mutwaza, abe nikwo yaatwaza.

Ahabw'eihanga haryabaho ekiragiro kimwe ekitairweho ahabwanyu n'ahabw'omunyaihanga obashuhuukiiremu, ekiragiro ekitarihwaho omu busingye bwanyu bwona; nkaimwe oku muri, n'omunyaihanga nikwo ariba omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Muryagira ekiragiro kimwe n'omugyenzo gumwe hamwe n'omunyaihanga obashuhuukiiremu.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli ebigambo byangye ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Ku murihika omu nsi ei ndikubatwaramu,
mwarya aha by'okurya byayo, muryahongyera MUKAMA empongano.
Aha saano ei muribanza kusa muryahonga omugaati kuba empongano; muryagihonga kuba empongano erugire aha mbuga y'okuhuuriraho.
Aha saano ei muribanza kusa muryaihaho empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA omu busingye bwanyu bwona.
Kwonka ku murishobya, mutaarinda biragiro ebi byona, ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa,
nibyo byona ebi MUKAMA yaabaragiriire omuri Musa, okwiha aha kiro eki MUKAMA yaaragiriireho ebiragiro okuhitsya ebiro byona omu busingye bwanyu bwona,

ku muriba mutakikozire nkana, kandi kitaamanywa ihanga, eihanga ryona riryahonga enimi nto kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, eky'ekisooroora kirungi ekihongyeirwe MUKAMA, hamwe n'empongano y'esaano yaakyo n'empongano y'eby'okunywa byakyo, nk'emigyenzo yaabyo oku eri, kandi n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi.

Omunyamurwa arihiirire eihanga ry'Abaisraeli ryona, kandi riryasaasirwa; ahabw'okuba baryaba batakikozire nkana, kandi baryaba bareetsire empongano yaabo, eyokiibwe omu muriro, ehongyeirwe MUKAMA, bareetsire n'ekitambo ky'ekibi omu maisho ga MUKAMA ahabw'ekyo kibi ki batarakozire nkana.
N'ahabw'ekyo eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli hamwe n'omunyaihanga oriba abashuhuukiiremu, baryasaasirwa; ahakuba eihanga ryona riryaba ritakikozire nkana.
Omunyamurwa arihiirire ogwo oriba ashobize, akakora ekibi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, atakikozire nkana; ku ariheza kumurihiirira, ogwo muntu aryasaasirwa.
Muryagira ekiragiro kimwe aha bw'omuntu weena okozire ekibi, atakikozire nkana, yaaba nzaarwa y'omu Baisraeli nari omunyaihanga oriba abashuhuukiiremu.
Kwonka omuntu weena orikora ekibi nkana n'amaryo, yaaba nzaarwa nari omunyaihanga, ogwo muntu aryaba ajumire MUKAMA, kandi aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
Ahabw'okugaya ekigambo kya MUKAMA n'okushobya ekiragiro kye, ogwo muntu aryacwerwa kimwe, okutahikiirira kumugumeho.
Abaisraeli ku baabaire bakiri omu ihamba, baashanga omuntu naatorotoora enku ahari sabato.
Abaamushangire naazitorotoora, baamutwara ahari Musa na Arooni n'eihanga ryona.
Baamukingirana, ahabw'okuba bakaba batakagambiirwe oku baraamugire.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Buzimazima omushaija ogwo aitwe; eihanga ryona rimuteerere amabaare aheeru y'orusiisira.
Eihanga ryona ryamutwara aheeru y'orusiisira, ryamuteera amabaare, yaafa; nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli, bagume bakore ebijwengye aha mikugiro y'ebijwaro byabo omu busingye bwabo bwona, kandi babaziire aha kijwengye ky'ahari buri nshonda akenda ka bururu;
kibe ekijwengye eki muraagume nimureebaho, mukaijuka ebiragiro byona ebya MUKAMA, mukabyorobera, mukareka kukuratira ebi emitima yaanyu n'amaisho gaanyu byetenga, ebi mwabaire mukurata nimuraaya;
mubone kwijuka n'okworobera ebiragiro byangye byona, n'okuba abarikwera ahari Ruhanga waanyu.
Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri okuba Ruhanga waanyu. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
baimuka omu maisho ga Musa, bakwataniise n'abamwe omu Baisraeli, abeebembezi b'eihanga magana abiri na makumi ataano, abashaija rugambwa abaatoorainwe omu mutwe gw'abateeraine,

baayeteerana hamwe kugomera Musa na Arooni, baabagira bati: Mwekurize mwahingurana; ahakuba abantu b'eihanga ryona n'abarikwera, buri omwe omuribo, kandi MUKAMA ari omuribo. Mbwenu nimwekuriza ki aha ihanga rya MUKAMA?
Musa ku yaakihuriire, yaajuumara ahansi;
yaagambira Koora n'omutwe gwe gwona, naagira ati: Omu kasheeshe MUKAMA naija kworeka ori owe, kandi n'ori orikwera, amwirize haihi; ogwo ou araatoorane, niwe arayeiririze haihi.
Mukore muti; iwe Koora n'omutwe gwawe gwona, mutware ebyoterero,
mubiteho omuriro, kandi omu kasheeshe mubiteho obubaane omu maisho ga MUKAMA; bwanyima omuntu ou MUKAMA araatoorane, niwe araabe orikwera. Imwe beene Leevi, mwekurize mwahingurana.
Musa yaagaruka yaagira Koora ati: Imwe beene Leevi, muhurire!

Imwe nimugira ngu n'ekigambo kikye Ruhanga wa Israeli okubashoroora omu ihanga rya Israeli, akabeehitsya haihi kukora omurimo gw'omu Butaaho bwa MUKAMA, n'okuguma nimwemerera omu maisho g'eihanga ryona okuriheereza,
kandi naiwe okukwiriza haihi hamwe na bagyenzi baawe boona beene Leevi; mbwenu nimwenda n'obunyamurwa?
N'ahabw'ekyo mumanye ngu iwe n'omutwe gwawe gwona, ou mweteeraine kurwanisa ni MUKAMA; kandi Arooni niwe oha, imwe kumwetomboitera?
Bwanyima Musa yaatuma kweta Dasani na Abiraamu, beene Eliabu; baagira bati: Titurikwija kwinamukayo;
noogira ngu n'ekintu kikye iwe okutwiha omu nsi y'amate n'obwoki, okatwinamura omu ihamba kutwitiramu, haza n'okwehindura okatwehinduraho omukama?
Kandi otatureetsire omu nsi y'amate n'obwoki, n'obu kwakuba okutuha obuhunguzi bw'obutaka n'emisiri y'emizaabibu. Nooyenda kwihamu abantu aba amaisho? Titurikwija kwinamukayo.
Musa yaagira Koora ati: Nyencakare iwe n'omutwe gwawe gwona mwije na Arooni, muhikye omu maisho ga MUKAMA,

buri muntu omuriimwe areete ekyoterero kye, akiteho obubaane, mubireete omu maisho ga MUKAMA, buri muntu ayereetere ekye, ebyoterero byona magana abiri na makumi ataano; naiwe na Arooni mureete ebyanyu.
Buri muntu omuribo yaatwara ekyoterero kye, boona baabitaho omuriro, baataho n'obubaane, baayemerera aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu hamwe na Musa na Arooni.
Koora yaateerana abantu b'eihanga ryona, baabaza omumaisho aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyabonekyera eihanga ryona.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa na Arooni ati:
Mwetaanise n'omutwe ogu, mbone kubacwekyereza omuri aka kaanya.
Baajuumara ahansi nibagira bati: Ai Ruhanga, Ruhanga w'emyoyo y'abantu boona, omuntu omwe ku araashiishe, noogirira ekiniga eihanga ryona?
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira abantu oti: Mwimukye, murugye aha mahema g'aba Koora, Dasani na Abiraamu.
Musa yaimuka, yaaza owa Dasani na Abiraamu; abakuru b'Abaisraeli baagyenda bamukuratiire.
Yaagambira omutwe gwona ati: Nimbeeshengyereza, murugye aha mahema g'aba bantu babi, kandi mutagira ekintu kyabo kyona eki mwakoraho, mutakaacwekyerezibwa nabo omu kifubiro ky'ebibi byabo.

Abantu nikwo kwimuka, bakaruga aha mbaju zoona ez'amahema g'aba Koora, Dasani na Abiraamu. Bwanyima Dasani na Abiraamu baashohora, baayemerera aha miryango y'amahema gaabo hamwe n'abakazi baabo na batabani baabo n'abaana baabo abato.
Musa yaagira ati: Aha niho muraamanyire MUKAMA ku niwe yantumire kukora emirimo egi yoona; kandi ku ntaragikozire ahabwangye.
Abantu aba ku baraafe orufu orwita abandi boona, nari shi ku baraaguubweho ebigwa aha bandi boona, biri MUKAMA tarantumire.
Kwonka MUKAMA ku araakore ekitakareebwaga, eitaka okwashama, rikabamira hamwe n'ebyabo byona, bakashuuma okuzimu bahuriire, niho muraamanyire abantu aba ku bagayire MUKAMA.
ensi yaayashama, yaabamira n'amaka gaabo, hamwe n'aba Koora boona n'ebintu byabo byona.
Batyo bo n'abaabo boona baashuuma okuzimu bahuriire, eitaka ryabashweka, baacwekyerera, baihwa omu ihanga.
Abaisraeli boona abaabaire babeehinguririize baahunga ahabw'okuborooga kwabo, nibagira bati: Tuhungye, naitwe ensi etakaatumira.
Ahonaaho omuriro gwaruga ahari MUKAMA, gwayokyeza kimwe abo bashaija magana abiri na makumi ataano abaabaire nibootera obubaane.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Eleazaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa ashahure ebyo byoterero omu muriro, kandi naiwe ogutaataanise, ahabw'okuba n'ebirikwera.

Ebyoterero by'abo basiisi, abasiisire bakafa, babiheeshemu ebyoma eby'okushweka eitambiro; ahakuba babihongyeire MUKAMA, n'ahabw'ekyo n'ebirikwera; kandi biryaguma biri eky'okureeberaho aha Baisraeli.
Eleazaari omunyamurwa nikwo kutwara ebyo byoterero by'emiringa, ebi abookiibwe babaire bahongire, bakabiheeshamu eky'okushweka eitambiro,

kandi n'okuba ekiijutsyo aha Baisraeli, ngu hatarigira omuntu otari w'omu ruzaaro rwa Arooni owairira haihi kwotera obubaane omu maisho ga MUKAMA, akaba nka Koora n'ab'ekigombe kye; yaabikora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamugambiire naaraba omuri Musa.
Abantu ku baayeteeraine kugomera Musa na Arooni, baanaga amaisho ei Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu riri, baareeba ekicu kiri kirishwekire, kandi ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyareebeka.
Musa na Arooni baaza omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Mwimukye murugye omuri aba bantu, mbone kubacwekyereza omuri aka kaanya. Baajuumara ahansi.

Musa yaagira Arooni ati: Twara ekyoterero kyawe, okiteho omuriro ogw'aha itambiro, oteho n'obubaane, okitware ahonaaho omu bantu, obarihiirire; ahabw'okuba ekiniga kyaruga ahari MUKAMA, orufu rwatandika.
Arooni yaakitwara nk'oku Musa yaamuragiire, yairuka yaaza ahagati y'abantu abaabaire beeteeraine, yaashanga orufu rwatandikire omu bantu; yaakitaho obubaane, yaarihiirira abantu.
Yaayemerera ahagati y'abafiire n'abahuriire; orufu rwazibirwa.
Abaitsirwe orwo rufu bakaba bari abantu kakumi n'enkumi ina na magana mushanju, otabariiremu abafiire ahabw'ebya Koora.
Arooni yaagaruka ahari Musa aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, orufu rwaheza kuzibirwa.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Gambira Abaisraeli bareete enkoni, emwe omuri buri ruganda rwa baishenkurubo, zireetwe abeebembezi baabo, nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gari, enkoni zoona zibe ikumi na ibiri. Ohandiikye eiziina rya buri muntu aha nkoni ye.
Kandi ohandiikye eiziina rya Arooni aha nkoni ya Leevi, ahakuba omukuru wa buri ruganda rwa baishenkuru naija kugira enkoni emwe;
ozibiikye omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu maisho g'Ebirikuhamya, ahu mbugaabuganira naimwe.
Enkoni y'omushaija ou ndaatoorane neija kutooka, ntyo mmareho okwetomboita omu maisho gangye oku Abaisraeli barikubeetomboitera.

Musa yaabigambira Abaisraeli, abeebembezi baabo boona baamuha enkoni, buri mwebembezi yaamuha emwe, nk'enganda za baishenkurubo oku zaabaire ziri, enkoni zoona ikumi na ibiri; kandi n'enkoni ya Arooni yaaziteebwamu.
Musa yaazita omu maisho ga MUKAMA omu Ihema ry'Ebirikuhamya.
Omu kasheeshe Musa ku yaataahire omu Ihema ry'Ebirikuhamya, yaashanga enkoni ya Arooni, ey'oruganda rwa Leevi, etookire, erabize kandi ereetsire enjuma zihiisize ezirikwetwa endozi.
Musa yaashohoza enkoni zoona, naaziiha omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaazireetera Abaisraeli boona, abo bakuru baazireeba, buri muntu yaatwara eye.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Garura enkoni ya Arooni omu maisho g'Ebirikuhamya, ebiikwe kuba akamanyiso k'okwomesereza abagomi, obone kumaraho okwetomboita oku barikuunyetomboitera, barekye kufa.
Okwo nikwo Musa yaakozire; nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire, yaaba nikwo yaakora.
Abaisraeli baagira Musa bati: Reeba, nituhwerekyerera, twahwaho, twahwaho twena.
Buri muntu orikwija akairira haihi Obutaaho gwa MUKAMA, naafa. Ebyo twahwaho twena?

MUKAMA yaagira Arooni ati: Iwe na batabani baawe n'eka ya sho muryabuuzibwa byona ebiriba byashobire omu by'Omwanya ogurikwera; iwe na batabani baawe niimwe muribuuzibwa ebiriba byashobire omu bunyamurwa bwanyu.

Kandi na beene waanyu ab'oruganda rwa Leevi oruganda rwa shwenkuru, obairize haihi naiwe, bagume bakwatanise naiwe, bakuheereze; kwonka iwe na batabani baawe niimwe muriguma omu maisho g'Eihema ry'Ebirikuhamya.
Bagume nibooroobera ebi orikubaragiira, kandi bakwatsibwe eby'Eihema byona, kwonka batariirira haihi n'ebintu by'Omwanya ogurikwera n'eitambiro, imwe nabo mutakaafa.
Bakwatanise naiwe, kandi bakwatsibwe eby'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu ahabw'omurimo gw'obuheereza bwaryo bwona; otari w'omuribo atariirira haihi naimwe.
Niimwe mwakwatsibwa eby'Omwanya ogurikwera n'eitambiro, Abaisraeli barekye kugaruka kugirirwa ekiniga.
Kandi reeba, nyihire beene waanyu Abaleevi omu Baisraeli; ahariimwe n'ekiconco ekihairwe MUKAMA okukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.

Kwonka iwe na batabani baawe mugume nimukora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa ogurikukwata aha buri kintu kyona eky'aha itambiro, n'ahari byona ebiri omunda y'omukingo; egyo niyo mirimo ei muraagume nimukora. Naabaha obunyamurwa nk'ekiconco; otari w'omuriimwe oribyetaasyamu, aryaitwa.

Ebi ebitarikwokibwa aha birikwera munonga bibe ebyawe; buri mpongano yaabo yoona, buri mpongano yaabo ey'esaano, buri kitambo kyabo eky'ekibi, na buri kitambo kyabo eky'okubaihisaho orubanja rw'ekibi, ebi barimpongyera, biryaba ebirikwera munonga ahabwawe na batabani baawe.
Ogume obiriire aharikwera munonga, orikwetwa omushaija weena omuriimwe abe niwe yaabiryaho; biryakubeera ebirikwera.

Kandi ebi nabyo n'ebyawe; empongano zaabo ezi bahayo ahabw'okweyendera, empongano zoona ezizongazongiibwe ez'Abaisraeli, naazikuha na batabani baawe na bahara baawe kuba omugabo gwanyu ogw'ebiro byona; buri muntu weena ow'omu ka yaawe oshemeire aryaguma aziryeho.
Kandi amajuta agarikukira oburungi goona, na viinyo erikukira oburungi yoona, n'engano ezirikukira oburungi zoona, n'emiganuro yaabyo ei bariguma nibareetera MUKAMA, niiwe naabiha.
Ebijuma byona ebiriguma nibibanza kwera omu nsi yaabo, ebi bareetera MUKAMA, biryaba ebyawe; buri muntu weena ow'omu ka yaawe oshemeire aryaguma abiryeho.
Ekintu kyona ekiriheerwayo kimwe omuri Israeli kiryaba ekyawe.

Emijigaijo yoona ey'ebiine omubiri byona ebi bahongyera MUKAMA, yaaba y'abantu nari ey'enyamaishwa, egume ebe eyaawe; kwonka emijigaijo y'abantu otaribura kugicungura, kandi emijigaijo y'enyamaishwa ezirikuzira nayo oryagicungura.
Ebishemereire kucungurwa aharibyo okutandikira aha bihikize okwezi, bicungurwe obuguzi bwa shekeli itaano obu oricwa, nka shekeli ey'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri, (nizo geera makumi abiri).

Kwonka emijigaijo y'ente nari ey'entaama nari ey'embuzi otarigicungura; emijigaijo yaazo n'erikwera; oryaguma oshukyere eitambiro eshagama yaayo, oyotsye ebishaju byayo kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ey'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA.
Kwonka enyama yaayo ey'enkoro ezongazongiibwe, n'ey'ekivune ky'okuguru kwa buryo eryaguma ebe eyaawe.

Empongano zoona ezirikwera ezi Abaisraeli bahongyera MUKAMA, naazikuha na batabani baawe, kuba omugabo gwanyu ogw'ebiro byona; n'endagaano ey'ebiro byona eraganisibwa omwonyo omu maisho ga MUKAMA ahariiwe n'oruzaaro rwawe.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagira Arooni ati: Iwe torigira buhunguzi omu nsi y'Abaisraeli, n'obu gwakuba omugabo gwona omuribo; niinye mugabo gwawe n'obuhunguzi bwawe omu Baisraeli.
Kandi okuruga hati Abaisraeli batariirira haihi n'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, bakagiibwaho ekibi, bakafa.

Kureka Abaleevi babe nibo baakora omurimo gw'obuheereza ogw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, kandi babe nibo baagumwaho orubanja rw'okutahikiirira. Kibe ekiragiro ekitarihwaho ebiro byona omu busingye bwanyu bwona; kandi batarigira obuhunguzi omu Baisraeli.
Ahabw'okuba ebicweka bya kimwe kya ikumi ebi Abaisraeli barireeta kuhongyera MUKAMA, naabiha Abaleevi kuba obuhunguzi bwabo; nikyo naabagambirira ku batarigira buhunguzi omu Baisraeli.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Kandi ogambire Abaleevi oti: Ku muriiha aha Baisraeli kimwe kya ikumi, eki mbahaire kuba obuhunguzi bwanyu, naimwe mugume mukiiheho kimwe kya ikumi kuba empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA.
Egyo mpongano eryababarirwa nk'ey'engano erugire aha mbuga y'okuhuuriraho, kandi nk'eya viinyo enyuukirwe omu icwa ryona ery'emizaabibu.

Okwo mube nikwo mwaguma nimuhongyera MUKAMA empongano ezi mwihire aha bicweka byanyu byona ebya kimwe kya ikumi eki muriiha aha Baisraeli. Kandi aharibyo mugume mwiheho empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA, mugihe Arooni omunyamurwa.
Aha biconco byona ebi muriheebwa, mugume muheyo empongano eshemereire kuhongyerwa MUKAMA, nimugiiha aha birikukira oburungi, nimuhayo ebicweka byabyo ebyeziibwe.

N'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Ku muriguma mwaheza kuhonga ebicweka byabyo ebirikukira oburungi, ebiritsigaraho biryabarirwa Abaleevi nk'ekirugire aha mbuga ey'okuhuuriraho, kandi nka viinyo erugire omu inyuukiro;
muryaguma mubiriire ahu murikwenda hoona, imwe n'ab'omu maka gaanyu; ahabw'okuba n'ebihembo byanyu ebi murikuheebwa ahabw'omurimo gwanyu ogu murikukora omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Kandi timurigira rubanja rw'ekibi ahabwabyo, ku muriheza kubiihaho ebirikukira oburungi, mwabihonga; kandi mutarishiisha ebintu by'Abaisraeli ebirikwera, mukafa.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Arooni ati:
Ebi nibyo bigambo by'ekiragiro eki MUKAMA yaaragiire, naagira ati: Gambira Abaisraeli bakureetere enyana y'eruutsi kahogo etaine ibara, n'obu kaakuba akamogo, ei batakahingisaga.
Mugihe Eleazaari omunyamurwa, agishohoze aheeru y'orusiisira, bagiitire omu maisho ge.
Eleazaari omunyamurwa aihe aha shagama yaayo n'orukumu, agimiisiire emirundi mushanju naatooza ei Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu riri;
egyo nyana bagyokyeze omu maisho ge; boostye oruhu rwayo n'enyama yaayo n'eshagama yaayo n'efa yaayo.
Omunyamurwa atware ekiti ky'omwereezi n'enyaweera n'akenda ka karari, abinagye omu muriro ogurikwotsya egyo nyana.
Bwanyima omunyamurwa ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omubiri gwe omu maizi, abone kugaruka omu rusiisira, kwonka asiibe ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Owaagyotsya ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omubiri omu maizi, asiibe ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Omuntu oshemeire ayoore eiju ry'egyo nyana, arishukye omu mwanya gushemeire aheeru y'orusiisira, ribiikwe ahabw'eihanga ry'Abaisraeli okurijwanzya n'amaizi, gabe amaizi g'okweza n'okwihaho ebibi.
Owaayoora eiju rye'gyo nyana ayozye ebijwaro bye, agume ari osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo. Ekyo kigume kiri ekiragiro ekitarihwaho aha Baisraeli n'abanyamahanga abariba babashuhuukiiremu.
Orikora aha mutumbi gw'omuntu weena aryamara ebiro mushanju ari osiisikaire.
Ogwo muntu aryayeyeza n'ago maizi aha kiro kya kashatu, n'ekya mushanju abone kuba oshemeire; kwonka ku ariba ateeyerize aha kiro kya kashatu, n'ekya mushanju, tariba oshemeire.

Orikora aha mutumbi gw'omuntu weena ofiire, akanga kweyeza, aryaba asiisire Obutaaho bwa MUKAMA; ogwo muntu acuubwe omu Baisraeli; ahakuba tamiisiirweho ago maizi g'okweza, aryaguma ari osiisikaire; okusiisikara kwe kuryaba kukimuriho.
Eki n'ekiragiro ky'omuntu ofeereire omu ihema; oriritaahamu weena n'oriba aririmu weena, baryamara ebiro mushanju bari abasiisikaire.
Kandi ekintu kyona ekyashami, ekitaine kifundikizo ekikihamiireho, kiryaba ekisiisikaire.
Kandi omuntu weena oriba ari omu ishwa, akakora aha mutumbi gw'omuntu oitsirwe rurara, nari aha gundi mutumbi, nari aha igufa ry'omuntu, nari aha kituuro, aryamara ebiro mushanju ari osiisikaire.
Ahabw'ogwo muntu osiisikaire baryatwara aha iju ry'egyo nyana y'ekitambo ky'ekibi, barite omu kintu, barishukyemu amaizi g'omugyera,

omuntu oshemeire atware enyaweera, agijabikye omuri ago maizi, agamiisiire aha ihema n'aha bintu byona n'abantu abaririmu n'ahari ogwo okozire aha igufa nari aha muntu oitsirwe nari aha mutumbi ogundi nari aha kituuro.

Kandi ogwo muntu oshemeire amiisiire osiisikaire aha kiro kya kashatu n'ekya mushanju; aha kiro kya mushanju amushemeze; nawe ayozye ebijwaro bye, ayogye omubiri omu maizi, abone kuba oshemeire omu mwabazyo.
Ekyo kiryababeera ekiragiro ekitarihwaho. Kandi orimiisiira ago maizi g'okweza, aryayozya ebijwaro bye; n'origakoraho aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Kandi ekintu kyona eki omuntu osiisikaire arikoraho kiryaba ekisiisikaire, n'omuntu orikikoraho aryaba osiisikaire okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Baatonganisa Musa nibagira bati: Nangwa kuri twafiire obu beene waitu baagwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA!
Mbwenu mukareetera ki eihanga rya MUKAMA omuri eri ihamba kufeeramu n'amatungo gaitu?
Mukatwihira ki Misri kutureeta omu mwanya ogu omubi? Ti mwanya ogurikuhingwamu engano nari emitiini nari emizaabibu n'obu gaakuba amakomamahanga; kandi tiharimu maizi g'okunywa.
Musa na Arooni baaruga omu maisho g'abo bantu abeeteeraine, baaza aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, baajuumara ahansi; ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyababonekyera.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Twara enkoni eri, oteerane eihanga ryona, iwe na Arooni mukuru waawe, mugambirire orukiri omu maisho gaabo, rureete amaizi gaarwo, obaihire amaizi omuri orwo rukiri; obone kunywaisa eihanga ryona n'amatungo gaaryo.
Musa yaiha egyo nkoni omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nk'oku yaamuragiira.
Musa yaimutsya omukono gwe, yaatera orwo rukiri kabiri n'enkoni ye, haarugamu amaizi maingi; abantu boona baanywa hamwe n'amatungo gaabo.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa na Arooni ati: Ahabw'okuba timuunyikiriize, mukampaisa ekitiinisa omu maisho g'Abaisraeli, timurihitsya eri ihanga omu nsi ei mbahaire.
Ago nigo maizi ga Meriba, ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli bakahakanisa MUKAMA, yaayeyoreka omuribo ku ari Orikwera.
baatatenkuriitwe bakashuuma, baaza Misri, twatuurayo omwanya muraingwa; Abanyamisri baatwita kubi na baatatenkuriitwe.
Ku twatakiire MUKAMA, yaahurira okutaka kwaitu, yaatuma maraika, yaatwiha omuri Misri; mbwenu reeba turi Kadeshi, orurembo oruri aha mwatano gw'ensi yaawe.

Nitukweshengyereza, reka turabe omu nsi yaawe; titurikwija kuraba omu misiri n'obu kwakuba okuraba omu misiri y'emizaabibu, kandi titurikwija kunywa maizi g'omu maziba; nitwija kuraba omu nguuto y'omugabe, turekye kukiikama aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, okuhitsya obu turaarugire kimwe omu nsi yaawe.
Kwonka omugabe wa Edomu yaamugarukamu ati: Torikwija kuraba mu nsi yangye, ntakaahurura nkakurwanisa na rurara.

Abaisraeli baamugira bati: Nitwija kuraba omu nguuto empango; kandi itwe n'amatungo gaitu ku turaanywe aha maizi gaawe, nitwija kugaihurira. Ka turabemu n'ebigyere kwonka, titwine kindi ki turikwija kukora.
Yaagarukamu ati: Timurikwija kurabamu. Ogwo mugabe wa Edomu yaija n'engabo nyingi kumurwanisa n'amaani maingi.
Okwo nikwo Abanyaedomu baayangiire Abaisraeli kuraba omu nsi yaabo; nikyo Abaisraeli baahindukiire bakabarugaho.
Eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli ryaruga Kadeshi, ryahika aha rushozi Hoori.
MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa na Arooni ahari orwo rushozi Hoori orw'aha mwatano gw'ensi ya Edomu, ati:
Arooni yaaza kukurata abaabo, ahakuba tarihika mu nsi ei naahaire Abaisraeli, ahabw'okuba mukagomera ekiragiro kyangye aha maizi ga Meriba.
Twara Arooni na Eleazaari omutabani obainamure aha rushozi Hoori,
ojuure Arooni ebijwaro bye, obijwekye Eleazaari omutabani; bwanyima Arooni naija kufeerayo, akurate abaabo.
Musa yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiira; bainamuka aha rushozi Hoori, eihanga ryona niribareeba.
Musa yaajuura Arooni ebijwaro bye, yaabijweka Eleazaari omutabani; Arooni yaafeera aho, aha mutwe gw'orwo rushozi; Musa na Eleazaari baashuuma, baarugayo.
Eihanga ryona, nibo b'enju ya Israeli boona, ku baareebire Arooni yaafa, baamara ebiro makumi ashatu nibamucurira.
Omugabe wa Aradi Omunyakanaani, owaabaire atwire Negebu, ku yaahuriire ngu Abaisraeli nibaija bareetsirwe omu muhanda gwa Asarimu, yaabarwanisa, yaakwatamu bamwe.
Abaisraeli baahiga ahari MUKAMA nibagira bati: Ku oraaheyo eri ihanga omu mikono yaitu, nitwija kusheenyera kimwe endembo zaabo n'okuzicwekyereza.
MUKAMA yaahurira Abaisraeli, yaahayo Abanyakanaani; Abaisraeli baabacwekyerereza kimwe hamwe n'endembo zaabo; ogwo mwanya baagweta Horuma.
Baimutsya orugyendo okuruga aha rushozi Hoori, baatoora omuhanda ogurikuza aha Nyanja erikutukura, ngu beehinguririze ensi ya Edomu; emitima y'abantu yaafoobeera munonga ahabw'orugyendo;

baagamba kubi ahari Ruhanga n'ahari Musa, nibagira bati: Mukatwihira ki Misri okutureeta omuri eri ihamba kugwamu; ahakuba tiharimu by'okurya n'obu gaakuba amaizi, kandi tutamirwe eby'okurya ebi ebitaine ku biri.
MUKAMA yaayohereza omu bantu enjoka z'obushegu oburikubabiirira, zaabaruma; abantu baingi omu Baisraeli baafa.
Baayetuurira Musa, baagira bati: Tucumwire, ahabw'okuba tugambire kubi ahari MUKAMA n'ahariiwe; shaba MUKAMA atwiheho ezi njoka. Musa yaabashabira.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Heesha enjoka ey'obushegu oburikubabiirira, ogihanikye aha muti; bwanyima oraarumwe enjoka weena, ku araagireebe, naakira.
Musa yaaheesha enjoka y'omuringa, yaagihanika aha muti; bwanyima omuntu weena owaabaire arumwa enjoka, ku yaabaire areeba ahari egyo njoka y'omuringa, akira.
Abaisraeli baimutsya orugyendo, baateera orusiisira Obosi;
baaruga Obosi, baateera orusiisira Iye-abariimu omu ihamba eririkureebana na Moabu aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba.
Okuruga aho baimutsya orugyendo, baateera orusiisira omu ruhanga rwa Zeredi;
baarugayo baateera orusiisira seeri y'omugyera Arunooni, oguri omu ihamba ogurikuruga omu nsi y'Abaamori; ahakuba omugyera Arunooni gukaba guri omwatano gwa Moabu, ogurikutaanisa Moabu n'Abaamori.
Nikyo kirikugambirwa omu kitabo ky'Engamba za MUKAMA ngu,
Wahebu omuri Suufa n'empanga za Arunooni
Aharikushuuma omu mpanga
Hakahika aha mwanya ogu Aari atuuramu,
Ogwegamiire omwatano gwa Moabu
Bwanyima nikwo kweshongora ekyeshongoro eki:
Imuka, oijure, iwe iziba 'we; muryeshongorere;
Eri abakuru b'abantu baafukwize enkoni y'ekitiinisa
N'ebikoni byabo.
Baaruga omu ihamba, baaza Matana;
baarugayo, baaza Nahalieli; baarugayo, baaza Bamosi.
Baaruga Bamosi, baaza omu ruhanga omu nsi ya Moabu, baahika aha mutwe gwa Pisiga aharikurengyera omu ihamba.

Ka turabe omu nsi yaawe; titurikwija kuraba omu misiri, n'obu kwakuba okuraba omu misiri y'emizaabibu; kandi titurikwija kunywa amaizi g'omu maziba, kureka nitwija kuraba omu nguuto y'omugabe okuhitsya obu turaarugire kimwe omu nsi yaawe.
Sihooni tiyaikiriza Abaisraeli kuraba omu nsi ye, kureka yaahuruza engabo ze zoona, yaaza omu ihamba kubarwanisa; yaahika Yahazi, yaarwanirayo nabo.
Abaisraeli baamusinguza rurara, baakubuura ensi ye okutandikira ahari Arunooni okuhika Yaboki, aha mwatano gw'Abaamoni; ahabw'okuba omwatano gw'Abaamoni gukaba guri ogw'amaani.
Abaisraeli baakwata ezo ndembo zoona, baatuura omuri ezo ndembo z'Abaamori, n'omuri Heshibooni n'omu birorero byayo byona.
Ahakuba Heshibooni rukaba ruri orurembo rwa Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, owaarwaniise omugabe wa Moabu owa ira, akanyaga ensi ye yoona okuhitsya Arunooni.
Nikyo abeeshongozi b'ebyeshongoro by'ebihimbano bagirira bati:
Nimwije Heshibooni,
Orurembo rwa Sihooni rwombekwe, ruhame.
Endimi z'omuriro zaaruga omu rurembo rwa Sihooni;
Zaayotsya Aari ey'omuri Moabu,
N'abakama b'ebibungo bya Arunooni.
Mwahwa, imwe abantu ba Kemoshi!
Areeteire batabani be kuhunga,
Na bahara be kuba enkwatwa
Z'omugabe Sihooni ow'Abaamori.
Tubarasire; Heshibooni yaacwekyerera okuhika Diboni,
Twahwerekyereza ensi okuhika Noofa.
Okuhitsya obu omuriro guhikire Medeba.
Batyo Abaisraeli baatuura omu nsi y'Abaamori.
Musa yaatuma ab'okutata Yazeri, baakwata ebirorero byayo, baabingamu Abaamori abaabaire batwiremu.
Baakuba, baatoora omuhanda ogurikuza Bashani; Ogi omugabe wa Bashani yaabahururira n'engabo ze zoona, yaarwanira nabo Edurei.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Otamutiina; ahakuba mmuhaireyo omu mikono yaawe n'abantu be boona n'ensi ye; omugire nk'oku waagizire Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, owaabaire atwire Heshibooni.
Baamucwekyereza n'abatabani n'abantu be boona, okuhitsya obu hataratsigaireho n'omwe; n'ensi ye baagikubuura.
Abaisraeli baimutsya orugyendo, baateera orusiisira omu mpita za Moabu seeri ya Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko.
Balaki mwene Zipori yaareeba byona ebi Abaisraeli baakozire Abaamori;
Abamoabu baatiina munonga Abaisraeli; ahakuba bakaba bari baingi munonga; emitima yaabahwa omunda ahabw'abo.

Abamoabu baagambira abakuru ba Midiani bati: Egi nyanja y'abantu neija kumaraho ebitwehinguririize byona, nk'oku ente emara obunyaatsi omu iriisizo. Kandi omu biro ebyo Balaki mwene Zipori niwe yaabaire ari omugabe wa Moabu.

Yaatuma entumwa ahari Balamu mwene Beori, owaabaire atwire Pesori aha mugyera Furaati omu nsi y'abantu b'eihanga rye, kumweta, naagira ati: Hariho abantu barugire Misri; reeba, bashwekire ensi, batwire aharikureebana naitwe.

Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, ija onkyeenere aba bantu; ahabw'okuba nibankiza amaani; obundi nkaabaasa kubasingura, mbabingira kimwe omu nsi; ahakuba nimmanya ngu ou oshabira omugisha aguheebwa, kandi ou okyeena akyeenwa.
Yaabagira ati: Muraare aha eki kiro; niinyija kubagambira nk'oku MUKAMA arangambire. Abanyiginya ba Moabu baaraara owa Balamu.
Ruhanga yaija ahari Balamu, yaamubuuza ati: Abo bashaija abari hamwe naiwe nibaahi?
Balamu yaagarukamu Ruhanga ati: Balaki mwene Zipori omugabe wa Moabu antumireho ati:
Reeba, hariho abantu barugire Misri, baashweka ensi; mbwenu ija obankyeenere; obundi nkaabaasa kubarwanisa, mbabinga.
Ruhanga yaagira Balamu ati: Otagyenda nabo, otarikyeena abo bantu, ahakuba bahairwe omugisha.
Balamu yaimuka omu kasheeshe, yaagambira abanyiginya ba Balaki ati: Mwirooko mugarukye owaanyu, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA taanyikiriize kugyenda naimwe.
Abanyiginya ba Moabu baimuka, baagaruka ahari Balaki, baamugira bati: Balamu ayangire kwija naitwe.
Balaki yaagaruka yaatuma abandi banyiginya abarikukira bari obwingi n'ekitiinisa.
Baija ahari Balamu, baamugira bati: Balaki mwene Zipori atutumire naagira ngu, hatagira ekyakuzibira kwija;
ahakuba naija kukukuza, akuhindure omuntu w'ekitiinisa kingi; kandi ngu, eki orimugambira kyona, aryakikora; n'ahabw'ekyo ngu oije omukyeenere abo bantu.
Balamu yaagarukamu abagaragwa ba Balaki ati: N'obu Balaki yaakumpa enju ye eijwire efeeza n'ezaabu, tinkaabaasa kuhingura aha kigambo kya MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, kukicwaho nari okukyongyeraho.
Mbwenu nimbeeshengyereza, naimwe muraare aha eki kiro, ndeebe eki MUKAMA araagarukye kungambira.
Ruhanga yaija ahari Balamu ekyo kiro, yaamugira ati: Aba bashaija ku baraabe baizire kukweta, imuka ogyende nabo; kwonka eki ndaakuragiire, obe nikyo waakora.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaamugirira ekiniga ahabw'okugyenda; maraika wa MUKAMA yaayemerera omu muhanda kumutanga; obwo Balamu akaba atembire endogoya ye, kandi aine abaheereza be bombi.
Endogoya yaareeba maraika wa MUKAMA ayemereire omu muhanda, aine rurara omu ngaro; endogoya yaaruga omu muhanda, yaakiikama yaaza omu kishaka; Balamu yaagiteera kugigarura omu muhanda.
Bwanyima maraika wa MUKAMA yaayemerera omu kahanda kafunzire, akarikuraba ahagati y'emisiri y'emizaabibu, orugo rumuri oku n'oku.
Egyo ndogoya ku yaareebire maraika wa MUKAMA, yaayemigisiriza aha rugo, yaarumigiraho ekigyere kya Balamu; Balamu yaagaruka yaagiteera.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagaruka enyima, yaayemerera ahafunzire munonga, ahataine buhindukiro aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho.
Endogoya ku yaareebire maraika wa MUKAMA, yaabyama omu maguru ga Balamu; Balamu yaagira ekiniga kingi, yaagiteera enkoni.
MUKAMA yaayashamya akanwa k'egyo ndogoya, yaabuuza Balamu eti: Wantura ki okunteera egi mirundi yonshatu?
Balamu yaagigarukamu ati: Naakutura okungaya. Kuri naaba nyine rurara mu ngaro, naaba ninkwita.
Endogoya yaabuuza Balamu eti: Tiinye endogoya yaawe, ei otuura nootemba obutoosha n'okuhitsya eri izooba? Hariho obu ndakugizire nti? Onu ati: Ngaaha!
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaamubuuza ati: Waateerera ki endogoya yaawe egi mirundi yonshatu? Reeba, naija kukutanga omu maisho, ahabw'okuba orugyendo oru orimu n'orw'obugomi omu maisho gangye;
endogoya yaawe ku yandeeba, yampigiza egyo mirundi eshatu; kuri etampigiza, buzimazima hati kuri naakwitsire, yo ngireka ehuriire.
Balamu yaagarukamu maraika wa MUKAMA ati: Naacumura, ahakuba naaba ntamanyire ku onyemereire omu maisho kuntanga; mbwenu ku kiraabe nikikugwisa kubi, naaza kugarukayo.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira Balamu ati: Irooko ogyende n'abo bashaija; kwonka ekigambo eki ndaakugambire, obe nikyo waagamba. Atyo Balamu yaagumizamu, yaagyenda n'abanyiginya ba Balaki.
Balaki ku yaahuriire ngu Balamu yaija, yaaza kumubugana omu rurembo rwa Moabu, orwabaire ruri aha mwatano gwa Arunooni, ahu ogwo mwatano gurikugarukira.
Balaki yaagira Balamu ati: Tindakutumireho kukweta? N'enki ekyakuzibiire kwija? Torikumanya ku ndikubaasa kukukuza nkakuhindura omuntu w'ekitiinisa?
Balamu yaagarukamu Balaki ati: Reeba, mbwenu naija; noogira ngu nyine obushoboorozi bwona kugira eki naagamba ahabwangye? Ekigambo eki Ruhanga araate omu kanwa kangye, nikyo ndaagambe.
Balamu yaagyenda na Balaki, baahika Kiryasi-huzoosi.
Balaki yaatamba ebitambo by'ente n'entaama, yaatwekyeraho Balamu n'abanyiginya abaizire nawe.
Balamu yaagira Balaki ati: Nyombekyera aha amatambiro mushanju, ondeetereho enimi mushanju n'empaya z'entaama mushanju.
Balaki yaakora nk'oku Balamu yaamugambira; Balaki na Balamu baatambira ahari buri itambiro enimi n'empaya y'entaama.

Balamu yaagira Balaki ati: Yemerera aha rubaju rw'ekitambo kyawe ekyokize, nyowe ngyende; shana MUKAMA akaija kumbugana; eki MUKAMA araanyorekye kyona, niinyija kukikugambira. Yaaza aha mutwe gw'ekibungo, ahataine kati.
Ruhanga yaabugana Balamu, Balamu yaamugira ati: Naatebeekanisa amatambiro mushanju, naatambira ahari buri itambiro enimi n'empaya y'entaama.
MUKAMA yaata ekigambo omu kanwa ka Balamu, yaamugira ati: Garuka ahari Balaki, oku obe nikwo waagamba.
Balamu yaagaruka ahari Balaki, yaashanga akyemereire aha rubaju rw'ekitambo kye ekyokize hamwe n'abanyiginya ba Moabu boona.
Yaagamba ebigambo bye naahanuura ati:
Omuri Aramu niyo Balaki yaanyihire,
Omugabe wa Moabu akaanyiha omu bibungo by'oburugwa-izooba;
Ati: Ija onkyeenere Yakobo,
Rugayo, ohayire Israeli.
Nkaakyeena nta abu Ruhanga atakyeenire?
Kandi nkaahayira nta abu Ruhanga atahayiire?
Mmwetegyerereza aha mitwe y'ebibungo;
Reeba, n'eihanga erituura ryonka,
Eriteebarira mu gandi.
Nari akabara ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya Israeli?
Ka nyefeere nk'oku ohikiriire afa,
N'omuheru gw'amagara gangye gube nk'ogwe.
Balamu yaamugarukamu ati: Ebi MUKAMA yaata omu kanwa kangye, tinshemereire kubyerinda, nkaba nibyo naagamba?
Balaki yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ija nkutware ahandi, ahu oraabaase kubareebera; noija kureeba ekicweka kyabo ekirikuhera haihi, torikwija kubareeba boona; aho obe niho waayema, abankyeenere.
Yaamutwara omu bwerere bwa Zofimu aha mutwe gwa Pisiga, yaayombekayo amatambiro mushanju, yaatambira ahari buri itambiro enimi n'empaya y'entaama.
Balamu yaagira Balaki ati: Yemerera aha rubaju rw'ekitambo kyawe ekyokize, mbanze mbugane MUKAMA hariya.
MUKAMA yaabugana Balamu, yaata ekigambo omu kanwa ke, yaamugira ati: Garuka ahari Balaki, oku obe nikwo waagamba.
Yaija ahari Balaki, yaashanga akyemereire aha rubaju rw'ekitambo kye ekyokize, ari hamwe n'abanyiginya ba Moabu. Balaki yaamubuuza ati: MUKAMA yaagamba ki?
Balamu yaagamba ebigambo bye, naahanuura ati:
Imuka, Balaki, ohurire;
Iwe mwene Zipori, ntega amatu!
Kandi ti mwana w'omuntu, ngu ayefuuze.
Ebi yaagambire, taribikora?
Kandi ebyarugire omu kanwa ke, taribihikiiriza?
Ruhanga agubahaire, tindikubaasa kugubaaka.
Kandi omuribo tareebire bugomi omuri Israeli.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo ari hamwe nabo,
Kandi omuribo harimu akaari aku barikuteerera Omugabe waabo.
Ruhanga owaabaihire omuri Misri, akabareeta,
Aine amaani nk'ag'embogo.
N'obu kwakuba okuragurira kubi Israeli;
Hati nikiija kugambwa ahari Yakobo na Israeli ngu,
Eki Ruhanga abakoreire ka n'eky'okutangaaza!
Reeba, eri ihanga niribandatuka nk'entare y'enkazi,
Kandi niriimuka nk'entare y'enshaija;
Teribyama, etakariire ki ekwatsire,
Etakanyweire shagama y'ebi eitsire.
Balaki yaagira Balamu ati: Otabakyeena na kakye, n'obu kwakuba okubashabira omugisha.
Kwonka Balamu yaagarukamu Balaki ati: Tinkugambiire nti: Byona ebi MUKAMA araagambe, nibyo nshemereire kukora?
Balaki yaagira Balamu ati: Ija nu, nkutware omu gundi mwanya; obundi Ruhanga akaasiima ku oyema okwo, okabankyeenera.
Balaki yaatwara Balamu aha mutwe gwa Peori, aharikureeba ahansi omu ihamba.
Balamu yaagira Balaki ati: Nyombekyera aha amatambiro mushanju, ondeetereho enimi mushanju n'empaya z'entaama mushanju.
Balaki yaakora nk'oku Balamu yaamugambira, yaatambira ahari buri itambiro enimi n'empaya y'entaama.
Balamu ku yaareebire ngu MUKAMA asiimire kuha Israeli omugisha, tiyaagyenda, nk'oku abaire naagyenda obundi, kusherura endagu, kureka yaahanga amaisho omu ihamba.
Bwanyma yaimutsya amaisho, yaareeba Abaisreli basiisiire nk'enganda zaabo oku ziri. Omwoyo wa Ruhanga yaamwijaho.
Yaagamba ebigambo bye, naahanuura ati:
Okuhanuura kwa Balamu mwene Beori,
Okuhanuura kw'omushaija obaire ahumire,
Akareeba okworekwa kw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Ogwire ahansi, kwonka amaisho ge nigareeba;
Naagira ati:
Amahema gaawe ka ni marungi, iwe Yakobo;
N'ensiisira zaawe ka ni nungi, iwe Israeli!
Nk'emisiri y'aha rubaju rw'omugyera,
Nk'enkaka ezi MUKAMA yaabyaire,
Nk'emyereezi y'aha rubaju rw'amaizi.
N'oruzaaro rwe ruryatuura ahu amaizi maingi gari;
Omugabe we aryaba mukuru okukira Agagi,
Kandi obugabe bwe buryahimbisibwa.
Ruhanga amwihire omuri Misri;
Aine amaani nk'ag'embogo;
Aryamaraho amahanga agarikumurwanisa,
Ahendagure amagufa gaabo,
Abarashe, aboozyemu emyambi ye.
N'entare y'enkazi; n'oha owaakwemera kumwimutsya?
Orikukushabira omugisha weena, aguheebwe;
N'orikukukyeena weena, akyeenwe.
Balaki yaagirira Balamu ekiniga kingi, yaateera omu ngaro, yaamugira ati: Nkakweta kunkyeenera abazigu; mbwenu waabashabira omugisha egi mirundi yonshatu.
N'ahabw'ekyo irooko, ogarukye owaawe; nkaba ninteekateeka kukukuza, nkakuhindura omuntu w'ekitiinisa kingi; mbwenu MUKAMA akikwimire.
Balamu yaagira Balaki ati: Tindagambiire entumwa zaawe, ezi wantumireho, nti:

N'obu Balaki yaakumpa enju ye eijwire efeeza n'ezaabu, tinkaabaasa kuhingura aha kigambo kya MUKAMA kukora ekirungi nari ekibi omu bwengye bwangye nyenka; kureka eki MUKAMA araagambe, nikyo ndaagambe?
Mbwenu reeba, naaza kugaruka owaitu; ija nkuhanuurire eki eri ihanga ririkora abantu baawe omu biro bya bwanyima.
Balamu yaagamba ebigambo bye, naahanuura ati:
Okuhanuura kwa Balamu mwene Beori,
Okuhanuura kw'omushaija obaire ahumire;
Okuhanuura kw'ogwo orikuhurira ebigambo bya Ruhanga,
Akamanya obwengye bwa Rukira-boona,
Akareeba okworekwa kw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Ogwire ahansi, kwonka amaisho ge nigareeba,
Naagira ati:
Mmuhangire amaisho, n'obu araabe atari haihi;
Enyonyoozi eryaruga omuri Yakobo,
N'enkoni y'obugabe eimukye omuri Israeli;
Eryateera embaju zoona eza Moabu
Ecwekyereze beene Sheesi boona.
Seiri ekubuurwe, ensi ey'abazigu be,
Obwo Israeli naakora eby'obumanzi.
Omuri Yakobo haryarugamu omutegyeki,
Acwekyereze ab'omu ndembo abaahonokireho.
Bwanyima yaareeba Abaamaleki, yaagamba ebigambo bye, naahanuura ati:
Amaleki niwe yaabaire ari ow'okubanza omu mahanga,
Kwonka omuheru gwe guryaba okucwekyerezibwa.
Yaagaruka yaareeba Abakeeni, yaagamba ebigambo bye naahanuura ati:
Ahu otwire n'ah'amaani;
N'ekyashuri kyawe kiri omu rukiri;
Kwonka Kaini aryanyagwa,
Okuhitsya obu Abaashuri barikutwara omu bunyagwa.
Ai bambe, Ruhanga ku arikora ekyo, n'oha origumaho?
Kwonka emeeri ziryaruga Kitimu,
Zibonabonese Ashuri na Eberi;
Nawe acwekyerere.
Bwanyima Balamu yaimuka, yaagyenda, yaagaruka owe; na Balaki yaayegyendera.
ahakuba Abamoabu bakaba babeeta aha magyenyi g'okutambira baaruhanga baabo ebitambo; Abaisraeli bakiija, barya nabo, baramya baaruhanga baabo.
Batyo Abaisraeli baayeteerana na Baali-peori, MUKAMA yaabagirira ekiniga kingi ekirikwaka nk'omuriro.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Reeta abakuru b'eihanga boona, obahanikye omu mushana omu maisho gangye, ekiniga kyangye kingi kibone kuruga ahari Israeli.
Musa yaagambira abaramuzi b'Abaisraeli ati: Buri muntu omuriimwe aite abashaija be abeeteeraine na Baali-peori.
Omwe aha Baisraeli yaija, areeteire beene waabo Omumidianikazi omu maisho ga Musa n'omu maisho g'eihanga ryona ry'Abaisraeli, yaashanga nibaririra aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari, mwijukuru wa Arooni omunyamurwa, ku yaakireebire, yaimuka ahagati y'abantu, yaakwata eicumu omu ngaro,
yaakurata ogwo Mwisraeli omu ihema, yaabacumita bombi, eicumu ryayoga omu Mwisraeli, ryateera omukazi aha nda. N'ahabw'ekyo orufu rwazibirwa omu Baisraeli.
Boona abaitsirwe orwo rufu bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari, mwijukuru wa Arooni omunyamurwa, aihire ekiniga kyangye aha Baisraeli, ahabw'okuba andwaniire eihato omuribo, tinaabacwekyereza habw'eihato ryangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo omugambire ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Naakuha endagaano yangye ey'obusingye;
eryaba endagaano y'obunyamurwa obutarihwaho ei naaragaana naiwe n'oruzaaro rwawe orurikurataho, ahabw'okurwanira Ruhanga waawe eihato, okarihiirira Abaisraeli.
Kandi ogwo Mwisraeli owaitsirwe n'ogwo Mumidianikazi akaba naayetwa Zimuri mwene Saalu, omukuru w'enju ya baishenkuru omu ruganda rwa Simeoni;
kandi ogwo Mumidianikazi owaitsirwe akaba naayetwa Kozibi muhara wa Zuuri; nawe akaba ari omukuru w'omutwe gw'ab'enju ya baishenkuru omu Bamidiani.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Tuntuza Abamidiani, obaite,
ahabw'okuba babatuntwize n'oburyarya bwabo, obu baababeihabeihiise omu bya Peori, n'omu bya Kozibi muhara w'omukuru w'Abamidiani, munyaanyabo oitsirwe aha izooba ry'orufu orureetsirwe ebya Peori.
Bwanyima y'orwo rufu MUKAMA yaagambira Musa na Eleazaari mwene Arooni omunyamurwa, ati:
Mubare eihanga ry'Abaisraeli ryona, abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, nk'emiryango ya baishenkurubo oku eri, ab'omu Baisraeli boona abarikubaasa kuhurura.
Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa baagamba nabo bari omu mpita za Moabu, haihi na Yorudani, ahashungaine na Yeriko, nibagira bati:
Mubare abantu abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, nk'oku MUKAMA aragiire Musa.
Abaisraeli abaarugire omu nsi ya Misri nibo aba:
Reubeeni omujigaijo gwa Israeli; beene Reubeeni, abaazairwe Hanoki, omuryango gw'aba Hanoki; abaazairwe Palu, omuryango gw'aba Palu,
abaazairwe Hezirooni, omuryango gw'aba Hezirooni; abaazairwe Karumi, omuryango gw'aba Karumi.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abareubeeni; abaabazirwe omuribo bakaba bari obukumi buna n'enkumi ishatu na magana mushanju na makumi ashatu.
Omuri beene Palu, Eliabu.
Beene Eliabu Nemueli, Dasani na Abiraamu, Dasani na Abiraamu abo nibo baatoorainwe omu ihanga, bakahakanisa Musa na Arooni bakwataniise na Koora, obu baahakanisa MUKAMA,
ensi ekaashamya akanwa, ekabamira hamwe na Koora, obu ekigombe kye ekyo kyafa, omuriro gukootsya abashaija magana abiri na makumi ataano, bakahinduka eky'okureeberaho.
Kwonka beene Koora tibarafiire.
Beene Simeoni nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Nemueli, omuryango gw'aba N'emueli; abaazairwe Yamini, omuryango gw'aba Yamini; abaazairwe Yakini, omuryango gw'aba Yakini;
abaazairwe Zeera, omuryango gw'aba Zeera; abaazairwe Shauli, omuryango gw'aba Shauli.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abasimeoni, abashaija obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri na magana abiri.
Beene Gaadi nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Zefoni, omuryango gw'aba Zefoni; abaazairwe Haagi, omuryango gw'aba Haagi; abaazairwe Shuuni, omuryango gw'aba Shuuni;
abaazairwe Ozini, omuryango gw'aba Ozini; abaazairwe Eeri, omuryango gw'aba Eeri;
abaazairwe Arodi, omuryango gw'aba Arodi; abaazairwe Areeli, omuryango gw'aba Areeli.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abagaadi, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo oku baabaire bari, obukumi buna na magana ataano.
Beene Yuda Eeri na Onani; Eeri na Onani abo bakagwa omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Beene Yuda nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri, abaazairwe Sheela, omuryango gw'aba Sheela; abaazairwe Pereezi, omuryango gw'aba Pereezi, abaazairwe Zeera, omuryango gw'aba Zeera.
Beene Pereezi nibo aba; abaazairwe Hezirooni, omuryango gw'aba Hezirooni; abaazairwe Hamuli, omuryango gw'aba Hamuli.
Egyo niyo miryango ya Yuda, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo, obukumi mushanju n'enkumi mukaaga na magana ataano.
Beene Isakaari nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Toola, omuryango gw'aba Toola; abaazairwe Puuva, omuryango gw'aba Puuna;
abaazairwe Yashubu, omuryango gw'aba Yashubu; abaazairwe Shimirooni, omuryango gw'aba Shimirooni.
Egyo niyo miryango ya Isakaari, nk'abo abaabazirwe oku baabaire bari, obukumi mukaaga n'enkumi ina na magana ashatu.
Beene Zebuluuni nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Seredi, omuryango gw'aba Seredi; abaazairwe Eloni, omuryango gw'aba Eloni; abaazairwe Yahaleeli, omuryango gw'aba Yahaleeli.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abazebuluuni, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo oku baabaire bari, obukumi mukaaga na magana ataano.
Beene Yosefu nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; Manaase na Efuraimu.
Beene Manaase, abaazairwe Makiri, omuryango gw'aba Makiri; kandi Makiri akazaara Gileadi; abaazairwe Gileadi, omuryango gw'aba Gileadi.
Kandi aba nibo beene Gileadi, abaazairwe Yezeri, omuryango gw'aba Yezeri; abaazairwe Heleki, omuryango gw'aba Heleki;
abaazairwe Asirieli, omuryango gw'aba Asirieli; abaazairwe Shekemu, omuryango gw'aba Shekemu;
abaazairwe Shemida, omuryango gw'aba Shemida; abaazairwe Heferi, omuryango gw'aba Heferi.
Zelofehaadi mwene Heferi tarazaire boojo, kureka abaishiki; amaziina ga bahara ba Zelofehaadi ni Maala na Noa, Hogula, Milika na Tiruza.
Egyo niyo miryango ya Manaase; abaabazirwe aharibo bakaba bari obukumi butaano n'enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju.
Aba nibo beene Efuraimu nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Shuseela, omuryango gw'aba Shuseela; abaazairwe Bekeri, omuryango gw'aba Bekeri; abaazairwe Tahani, omuryango gw'aba Tahani.
Kandi nibo beene Shuseela; abaazairwe Erani, omuryango gw'aba Erani.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abaefuraimu, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo oku baabaire bari, obukumi bushatu n'enkumi ibiri na magana ataano. Abo nibo beene Yosefu nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri.
Beene Benyamiini nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Beela, omuryango gw'aba Beela; abaazairwe Ashubeeli, omuryango gw'aba Ashubeeli; abaazairwe Ahiraamu, omuryango gw'aba Ahiraamu;
abaazairwe Shufaamu, omuryango gw'aba Shufaamu; abaazairwe Hufaamu, omuryango gw'aba Hufaamu.
Kandi beene Beela bakaba bari Arudi na Naamani; abaazairwe Arudi, omuryango gw'aba Arudi; abaazairwe Naamani, omuryango gw'aba Naamani.
Abo nibo beene Benyamiini nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaabazirwe aharibo bakaba bari obukumi buna n'enkumi itaano na magana mukaaga.
Aba nibo beene Daani nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Shuhaamu, omuryango gw'aba Shuhaamu; egyo niyo miryango y'Abadaani.
Emiryango yoona ey'aba Shuhaamu, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo oku baabaire bari, n'obukumi mukaaga n'enkumi ina na magana ana.
Beene Asheri nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Imuna, omuryango gw'aba Imuna; abaazairwe Ishuvi, omuryango gw'aba Ishuvi; abaazairwe Beria, omuryango gw'aba Beeri;
omuri beene Beria, abaazairwe Heberi, omuryango gw'aba Heberi; abaazairwe Malikieli, omuryango gw'aba Malikieli;
kandi muhara wa Asheri akaba naayetwa Seera.
Egyo niyo miryango y'Abaasheri, nk'abo abaabazirwe aharibo oku baabaire bari, obukumi butaano n'enkumi ishatu na magana ana.
Beene Nafutaali nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Yahazeeli, omuryango gw'aba Yahazeeli; abaazairwe Guuni, omuryango gw'aba Guuni;
abaazairwe Yezeri, omuryango gw'aba Yezeri; abaazairwe Shileemu, omuryango gw'aba Shileemu.
Egyo niyo miryango ya Nafutaali nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaabazirwe aharibo bakaba bari obukumi buna n'enkumi itaano na magana ana.
Abo nibo baabazirwe aha Baisraeli, boona bakaba bari obusiriira mukaaga na rukumi na magana mushanju na makumi ashatu.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Abo nibo baribaganisizibwa ensi kuba obuhunguzi, nk'omubaro gw'amaziina gaabo oku guri.
Abaingi oryabaha obuhunguzi bwingi, kandi abakye obahe obuhunguzi bukye; buri ruganda ruheebwe obuhunguzi nk'omubaro gw'abantu baarwo abaabazirwe oku guri.
Kwonka ensi eryabaganisibwa n'enteenyu; baryagihungura nk'amaziina g'enganda za baishenkurubo oku gari.
Nk'oku enteenyu eriba, nikwo n'obuhunguzi buribaganisizibwa abaingi n'abakye.

Aba nibo baabazirwe omu Baleevi, nk'emiryango yaabo oku yaabaire eri; abaazairwe Gereshoni, omuryango gw'aba Gereshoni; abaazairwe Kohasi, omuryango gw'aba Kohasi; abaazairwe Merari, omuryango gw'aba Merari.
Egyo niyo miryango ya Leevi, omuryango gw'aba Libuni, omuryango gw'aba Heburooni, n'ogw'aba Mahili n'ogw'aba Muushi, n'ogw'aba Koora. Kandi Kohasi niwe yaazaire Amuraamu.
Kandi muka Amuraamu akaba naayetwa Yokebedi, muhara wa Leevi, ou Leevi yaazaariire Misri; yaazaara na Amuraamu, Arooni na Musa, na Miriamu munyaanyabo.
Na Arooni yaazaara Nadabu, Abihu, Eleazaari na Itamaari.
Kwonka Nadabu na Abihu bakafa, obu baayoteza omuriro ogundi ogutararagiirwe kwoteza omu maisho ga MUKAMA.

Abaleevi abaabazirwe, oyetwa omushaija weena okwiha aha mwana ohikize okwezi bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ishatu; kandi tibarabazirwe na Baisraeli abandi, ahabw'okuba tibarahairwe buhunguzi hamwe nabo.
Abo nibo baabazirwe Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa, abaabariire Abaisraeli omu mpita za Moabu haihi na Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko.
Kwonka omuri abo hakaba hatarimu n'omwe omu baabazirwe Musa na Arooni omunyamurwa, abaabariire Abaisraeli omu ihamba rya Sinai.
Ahakuba MUKAMA akabagambaho, naagira ati: Buzimazima baryafeera omu ihamba. Tihariho n'omwe aharibo owaatsigaireho kureka Kalebu mwene Yefune na Yoshua mwene Nuuni.
baayemerera omu maisho ga Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'abeebembezi n'eihanga ryona aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu; baagira bati:
Tataitwe akagwa omu ihamba; kandi akaba atari mu mutwe gw'abaayeteeraine kugomera MUKAMA omu kigombe kya Koora; akafeera omu bibi bye wenka, kandi akaba atazaire boojo.
N'enki ekirikwihisa eiziina rya tataitwe omu b'omuryango gwe, ngu ahabw'okuba tarazaire mwojo? Otuhe obutaka omu b'oruganda rwa tataitwe.
Musa yaatwarira MUKAMA ebigambo byabo.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ebi bahara ba Zelofehaadi barikufa n'eby'amazima; buzimazima otaribura kubaha obutaka omu b'omuryango gwa ishebo; obarekye bahungure obuhunguzi bwe.
Kandi ogambire Abaisraeli oti: Omuntu ku arifa, atatsigire mwana w'omwojo, muryareka obuhunguzi bwe bube obwa muhara we.
Ku ariba atatsigire muhara, obuhunguzi mubuhe beene ishe.
Ku ariba ataine beene ishe, mubuhe baishento.

Kwonka ishe ku ariba ataine bakuru be nari abarumuna, obuhunguzi mubuhe omunyaruganda omuri haihi, abuhungure. Ekyo kibe ekiragiro ky'okucweraho emanja z'obuhunguzi omu Baisraeli, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Ku oriheza kugireeba, naiwe oryafa, okurate abaanyu, nka Arooni mukuru waawe oku yaabakuratsire,
