ahabw'okuba mukagomera ekiragiro kyangye omu ihamba rya Ziini, obu eihanga ryampakanisa, mukanga kumpaisa ekitiinisa omu maisho gaaryo aha maizi. Ago nigo maizi ga Meriba omuri Kadeshi omu ihamba rya Ziini.
Musa yaagira MUKAMA ati:
MUKAMA Ruhanga w'emyoyo y'abantu boona atoorane omushaija w'okutegyeka eri ihanga,
ow'okubeebembera nibashohora, kandi nibataaha, oraabashohoze, kandi akabataasya, eihanga rya MUKAMA rirekye kuba nk'entaama ezitaine muriisa.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Twara Yoshua mwene Nuuni, omuntu oine omwoyo, omuteho engaro;
bwanyima omwemereze omu maisho ga Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'omu g'eihanga ryona, omukwatsize omurimo omu maisho gaabo.
Kandi omuhe aha kitiinisa kyawe, ab'eihanga ry'Abaisraeli boona babone kumworobera.

Aryaguma ayemerere omu maisho ga Eleazaari omunyamurwa, nawe aije omu maisho gangye amubuurize ahariinye naakoresa Urimu; ahabw'okuragiira kwa Eleazaari baryaguma bashohore, kandi bataahe ahabw'okuragiira kwe, Yoshua hamwe n'Abaisraeli boona, niryo ihanga ryona.
Musa yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiira; yaatwara Yoshua, yaamwemereza omu maisho ga Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'eihanga ryona,
yaamutaho engaro, yaamukwatsa omurimo, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire naaraba omuri Musa.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:

Ragiira Abaisraeli, obagambire ebi ndikugamba ningira nti: Ebi mpongyeirwe, eby'okurya ebi murikumpongyera ebyokiibwe omu muriro, eby'ekisoroora ekirikunshemeza, mugume mwijukye kubimpongyera omu bunaku bwabyo obwatairweho.
Obagire oti: Egi niyo mpongano y'okwotsya omu muriro, ei muriguma nimuhongyera MUKAMA; buri izooba muhongye empaya nto z'entaama ibiri ezitaine kamogo, kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha.
Ogume ohongye omwana gw'entaama gumwe omu kasheeshe, n'ogundi omu mwabazyo,
hamwe n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi kya eefa y'esaano y'obunono kuba empongano y'esaano, ejwangizemu ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini y'amajuta g'emizeituuni agashekwire.
Egyo n'empongano y'okwotsya ey'obutoosha, eyaaragiriirwe aha rushozi Sinai kuba ey'ekisoroora kirungi, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.

Kandi empongano y'eby'okunywa ey'okuhongwa n'omwana gw'entaama gumwe, eryaba ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini. Omu mwanya ogurikwera nimwo origuma nooshuka empongano ya viinyo y'amaani, ebirikuhongyerwa MUKAMA.
Ogundi mwana gw'entaama oguhongye omu mwabazyo; oguhongye n'empongano yaagwo y'esaano n'ey'eby'okunywa nk'eby'omu kasheeshe, kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ey'ekisoroora ekirikushemeza MUKAMA.

Aha izooba rya sabato muhongye empaya nto z'entaama ibiri, ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo, hamwe n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ebya eefa y'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu amajuta n'empongano yaayo y'eby'okunywa;
egyo niyo mpongano y'okwotsya buri sabato, mutabariireho ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'eby'okunywa.
Aha kutandika kwa buri kwezi mugume muhongyere MUKAMA empongano y'okwotsya enimi z'ebimasha ibiri, n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,

n'ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono kuba empongano y'esaano ejwangizemu amajuta ey'okuhongwa na buri nimi, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi bya eefa y'esaano y'obunono kuba empongano y'esaano ejwangizemu amajuta ey'okuhongwa na buri mpaya y'entaama,

kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ky'esaano y'obunono, ejwangizemu amajuta kuba empongano y'esaano ey'okuhongwa na buri mwana gw'entaama, byona bibe empongano y'okwotsya ey'ekisooroora kirungi, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.

Kandi empongano z'eby'okunywa ez'okuhongwa nabyo zibe ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri kya hiini ya viinyo ahabwa buri nimi, n'ekicweka kimwe kya kashatu kya hiini ahabwa buri mpaya y'entaama, kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya hiini ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama; egyo niyo mpongano ey'okwotsya eya buri kwezi okumara ameezi goona ag'omu mwaka.
Kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi ekihongyeirwe MUKAMA, mutabariireho ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano eky'okwo kwezi hagume habeho ekiro kikuru ky'obugyenyi; muryaguma mumare ebiro mushanju nimurya emigaati etatumbisiibwe.
Aha izooba eririkubibandiza habeho okuteerana okurikwera; mutarikoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya;

kureka muhongyereho empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'okuhongyera MUKAMA, enimi z'ebimasha ibiri, n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju ezihikize omwaka; mureebe ngu tibiine kamogo;
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo ez'esaano ejwangizemu amajuta, ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi ahabwa buri nimi, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ahabwa buri mpaya y'entaama,
kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama ahari ezo mushanju;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi ky'okubarihiirira.
Mugume mubihongye mutabariireho ekitambo ky'okwotsya ekya buri kasheeshe, empongano y'okwotsya ey'obutoosha.

Kandi mugume muhongye mutyo buri izooba, okumara ebiro mushanju, eby'okurya by'empongano ezookiibwe omu muriro kuba ekisooroora ekirikushemeza MUKAMA; bihongwe nibyongyerwa aha kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya mushanju mugire okuteerana okurikwera; mutarikikoreraho omurimo gwona ogurikurusya.
kureka muhongye ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'ekisooroora ekirikushemeza MUKAMA, enimi z'ebimasha ibiri, n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju ezihikize omwaka,
n'empongano z'esaano ez'okuhongwa nabyo, esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu amajuta, ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi ahabwa buri nimi, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ahabwa buri mpaya,
kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama ahari ezo mushanju,
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi emwe ey'okubarihiirira.
Mugume mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'eby'okunywa, mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha. Mureebe ngu tibiine kamogo.

Kandi muryaguma nimurihongyeraho empongano y'okwotsya ey'ekisooroora ekirikushemeza MUKAMA, enimi y'ekimasha emwe, n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
n'empongano ez'okuhongwa nabyo z'esaano ejwangizemu amajuta, ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi ahabw'egyo nimi, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ahabw'egyo mpaya y'entaama,
kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama ahari ezo mushanju;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi eky'okubarihiirira,

mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya ekihongwa aha kuboneka kw'okwezi n'empongano y'esaano yaakyo, n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano y'esaano yaakyo, n'ey'eby'okunywa yaakyo, nk'ekiragiro kyabyo oku kiri, kuba empongano y'ekisooroora kirungi, eyokiibwe omu muriro, erikuhongyerwa MUKAMA.
kureka muhongyere MUKAMA empongano y'okwotsya ey'ekisooroora kirungi, enimi y'ekimasha emwe n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju, ezihikize omwaka; bibe ebitaine kamogo,
n'empongano z'esaano ez'okuhongwa nabyo, ez'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu amajuta, ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi ahabw'egyo nimi, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ahabw'egyo mpaya y'entaama,
kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama ahari ezo mushanju;

kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi emwe kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi; mutabariiremu kitambo ky'okurihiirira ekibi, n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha, n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano, n'empongano zaabyo z'eby'okunywa.

Kandi muryahonga ebitambo by'okwotsya, empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ey'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA; enimi z'ebimasha ikumi na ishatu, n'empaya z'entaama ibiri, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina, ezihikize omwaka; bibe ebitaine kamogo;

obihongye n'empongano zaabyo ez'esaano y'obunono ejwangizemu amajuta, ebicweka bishatu bya ikumi ahabwa buri nimi ahari ezo ikumi na ishatu, n'ebicweka bibiri bya ikumi ahabwa buri mpaya ahari ezo zombi,
kandi n'ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ahabwa buri mwana gw'entaama ahari ezo ikumi na ina;
muhongye n'empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha izooba rya kabiri muhongye enimi z'ebimasha ikumi na ibiri, n'empaya z'entaama ibiri, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina, ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo;
mubihongye n'empongano yaabyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi, n'ahabw'ezo mpaya z'entaama, kandi n'ahabw'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya kashatu muhongye enimi z'ebimasha ikumi na emwe n'empaya z'entaama ibiri, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo ez'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi n'ezo mpaya, kandi n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano y'esaano yaakyo n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya kana muhongye enimi z'ebimasha ikumi, n'empaya z'entaama ibiri, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi, n'ezo mpaya, n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya kataano muhongye enimi z'ebimasha mwenda n'empaya z'entaama ibiri, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi n'ezo mpaya kandi n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, kandi nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya mukaaga muhongye enimi z'ebimasha munaana, n'empaya z'entaama ibiri kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi n'ezo mpaya z'entaama kandi n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, kandi nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.
Aha kiro kya mushanju muhongye enimi z'ebimasha mushanju n'empaya z'entaama ibiri kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama ikumi na ina ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo,
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'ezo nimi n'ezo mpaya z'entaama kandi n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, kandi nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo y'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.

kureka muhongye ekitambo ky'okwotsya, kuba empongano eyokiibwe omu muriro, ey'ekisooroora kirungi ahari MUKAMA; muhongye enimi emwe n'empaya y'entaama emwe, kandi n'empaya nto z'entaama mushanju ezihikize omwaka ezitaine kamogo;
mubihongye n'empongano zaabyo z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa ahabw'egyo nimi n'egyo mpaya y'entaama, kandi n'abo baana b'entaama, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku guri, nk'oku ebiragiro byabyo biri;
kandi muhongye empaya y'embuzi kuba ekitambo ky'ekibi, mutabariireho ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha n'empongano yaakyo ey'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa.

Ebyo nibyo muriguma nimuhongyera MUKAMA omu biro by'amagyenyi gaanyu agaatairweho, kuba ebitambo byanyu by'okwotsya, n'empongano zaanyu z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa, kandi n'empongano zaanyu z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, mutabariireho bi muhonga ahabw'ebi mwaraganiise n'ebi mutoija ahabw'okweyendera.
Bwanyima Musa yaagambira Abaisraeli byona, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.
Musa yaagambira abakuru b'enganda z'Abaisraeli ati: Eki nikyo kiragiro eki MUKAMA yaaragiira.
Omuntu ku arihiga omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nari shi ku arirahira, yaayekwatiriza, atariita egyo ndahiro ye, kureka ahikiirize ekyamurugire omu kanwa kyona.
Kandi omwishiki ku arihiga omuhigo omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaayekwatiriza, akiri omu ka ya ishe omu buhangare bwe,
ishe yaahurira okuhiga kwe, n'okwekwatiriza kwe, yaamwetsiza, okuhiga kwe kwona n'okwekwatiriza kwe kwona n'endahiro biryahama.
Kwonka ishe ku aryanga ebi arikurahira aha izooba eri yaabihuririraho, ebi yaahiga byona, n'okwekwatiriza kwe tibirihama; kandi MUKAMA aryamusaasira, ahabw'okuba ishe yaamwangira.
Kandi ku arishwerwa omushaija naakitegyekwa ebi yaahigire, nari shi akibohirwe endahiro ei yaarahiriire eryo,
iba yaabihurira, yaamwetsiza aha izooba eri yaabihuririraho, ebi yaahigire biryahama, n'ebi yaarahiire naayekwatiriza nabyo bihame.
Kwonka iba ku arimwangira aha izooba eri yaabihuririraho, aryaba aihireho okuhiga kwe oku yaahigire, n'endahiro ei yaarahiriire eryo kurahira naayesinga; kandi MUKAMA aryamusaasira.
Kwonka omufaakazi nari omukazi oshenzirwe ku arihiga, eki yaahigire kyona, akarahira endahiro, naayekwatiriza, kiryamutukurira.
Kandi ku ariba ahigiire omwa iba, nari ku ariba arahiire naayekwatiriza,
iba yaabihurira, yaamwetsiza, ataamwangira, ebi yaahigire byona biryahama, n'ebi yaarahiire naayekwatiriza byona nabyo bihame.

Kwonka iba ku aribiihaho, yaabyanga aha izooba eri yaabihuririraho, ebyarugire omu kanwa ke naahiga, nari shi ebi yaarahiire naayekwatiriza, tibirihama, ahakuba iba aryaba abiihireho; kandi MUKAMA aryamusaasira.
Okuhiga kwona n'endahiro yoona ei ogwo mukazi arirahira kwebonabonesa, iba aine obushoboorozi bw'okugihamya nari kugiihaho.
Kwonka iba ku arimara ebiro naamwetsiza, biri ahamize emihigo ye yoona n'endahiro ze zoona ezi yaarahiire naayekwatiriza; iba aryaba abihamize, ahakuba akamwetsiza aha izooba eri yaabihuririireho.
Kwonka ku aribiihaho, amazire ebiro naabihurira, aryagiibwaho okutahikiirira kw'omukazi we.
Ebyo nibyo biragiro ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa, aha mushaija n'omukazi we, n'aha mushaija na muhara we, okiri empangare omu ka ya ishe.
MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ati:
Hoora Abamidiani, obahoorere Abaisraeli; bwanyima oryafa okurate abaanyu.
Musa yaagambira abantu ati: Mutoorane abantu omuriimwe, mubahe eby'okurwanisa, bateere Midiani, babahoore enzigu ahabwa MUKAMA.
Omuri buri ruganda rw'enganda zoona eza Israeli mwihemu engabo rukumi, muzoohereze aha rugamba.
Batyo omu nkumi z'Abaisraeli baatooranamu engabo rukumi-rukumi omuri buri ruganda, baihamu engabo kakumi n'enkumi ibiri eziine eby'okurwanisa.
Musa yaaboohereza aha rugamba, rukumi omuri buri ruganda, hamwe na Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari omunyamurwa, baine ebintu by'Aharikwera n'enzamba z'okuhuruza.
Baarwanisa Abamidiani, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa, baita abashaija boona.
Kandi hamwe n'abo abaitsirwe, baitiranamu abagabe bataano ba Midiani, Evi, Rekemu, Zuuri, Huuri na Reeba, kandi na Balamu mwene Beori baamwitsa rurara.
Abaisraeli baanyaga abakazi b'Abamidiani n'abaana baabo abato; n'ente zaabo zoona n'amasyo gaabo goona ag'entaama n'embuzi, n'ebintu byabo byona nabyo baabinyaga.
Kandi endembo zaabo zoona omu myanya ei baabaire batwiremu, n'ensiisira zaabo zoona baabyotsya.
Baatabaarukana ebi baanyagire byona, abantu n'amatungo.
Enkwatwa n'eminyago n'ebintu baabireetera Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli, ahu baabaire basiisiire omu mpita za Moabu haihi na Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko.
Musa na Eleazaari n'abeebembezi boona ab'eihanga baashohora kubabugana aheeru y'orusiisira.
Musa yaagwerwa kubi abakuru b'eihe, abeebembezi b'engabo rukumi-rukumi, n'aba igana-igana, abaabaire nibatabaaruka.
Musa yaababuuza ati: Abakazi boona mubarekire, timwabaita?
Nimumanya ngu abo nibo baacumwize Abaisraeli ahari MUKAMA omu bya Peori, ahabw'okuhaburwa Balamu, kikareeta orufu omu ihanga rya MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati mwite omwojo weena omu baana, na buri mukazi weena orabyamire n'omushaija.
Kwonka abaishiki boona abatakabyamaga na bashaija, mubeetsigireho.

Bwanyima muteere amahema gaanyu aheeru y'orusiisira, mumareyo ebiro mushanju; oitsire omuntu weena, n'okozire aha muntu oitsirwe weena, mweshemeze aha kiro kya kashatu n'aha kya mushanju, imwe n'enkwatwa zaanyu.
Kandi mushemeze buri kijwaro kyona, n'ekintu kyona ekikozirwe omu mpu n'omu bwoya bw'embuzi, n'ekibaizire kyona.
Eleazaari omunyamurwa yaagambira engabo ezitabaarukire ati: Eki nikyo kiragiro eki MUKAMA aragiire Musa;
kwonka ezaabu, n'efeeza, n'emiringa, n'ebyoma, n'amabaati na rusasi,
ekintu kyona ekitarikubaasa kusya, mukirabye omu muriro, kibone kushemera; kwonka kandi mukishemeze n'amaizi gari ag'okweza; kandi ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kusya, mukirabye omuri ago maizi.
Bwanyima aha kiro kya mushanju mwozye ebijwaro byanyu, mubone kushemera, mugarukye omu rusiisira.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Iwe na Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'eryo ihanga mubare eminyago enyagirwe, ey'abantu n'ey'amatungo,
mubaganise egyo minyago omu bicweka bibiri, ekimwe mukihe abarwani abagiire aha rugamba, n'ekindi mukihe eihanga ryona.
Mwihe aha barwani abagiire omu rugamba ebi muraabacwere kuha MUKAMA, kimwe kya ikumi ahari magana ataano, eky'abantu, eky'ente, eky'endogoya, n'eky'amasho g'entaama,
mubiihe aha mugabo gwabo, mubihe Eleazaari omunyamurwa kuba empongano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA.
Kandi aha mugabo gw'Abaisraeli mwiheho kimwe kya makumi ataano, eky'abantu, eky'ente, eky'endogoya, n'eky'amasyo g'entaama, nigo matungo goona, mubihe Abaleevi abarikurinda Obutaaho bwa MUKAMA.
Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa baakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Eminyago eyaatsigaire ahari byona ebi abarwani baanyagire, ekaba eri entaama obusiriira mukaaga n'obukumi mushanju n'enkumi itaano,
n'ente obukumi mushanju n'enkumi ibiri,
n'endogoya obukumi mukaaga na rukumi;
kandi abaishiki boona abaabaire batakabyamaga n'abashaija bakaba bari obukumi bushatu n'enkumi ibiri.
Ekicweka kyabyo, nigwo mugabo gw'abaagiire aha rugamba, kikaba kiri entaama obusiriira bushatu n'obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mushanju na magana ataano;
ahari ezo ntaama, ekicweka ekyaihirweho kuba ekya MUKAMA, zikaba ziri entaama magana mukaaga na makumi mushanju na itaano.
Ente zikaba ziri obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mukaaga; ahari ezo ezaihirweho kuba eza MUKAMA zikaba ziri makumi mushanju na ibiri.
Endogoya zikaba ziri obukumi bushatu na magana ataano; ahari ezo ezaihirweho kuba eza MUKAMA zikaba ziri makumi mukaaga n'emwe.
Kandi n'abantu bakaba bari kakumi n'enkumi mukaaga; ahari abo abaihirweho kuba aba MUKAMA bakaba bari makumi ashatu na babiri.
Musa yaaha Eleazaari omunyamurwa ebyo ebyaihirweho kuba empongano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Ekicweka kyabyo eky'Abaisraeli, eki Musa yaihire aha by'abantu abaagiire omu rugamba-
(Kandi omugabo gw'eihanga zikaba ziri entaama obusiriira bushatu n'obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mushanju na magana ataano,
ente obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mukaaga,
n'endogoya obukumi bushatu na magana ataano,
kandi n'abantu kakumi n'enkumi mukaaga.)
ahari ogwo mugabo gw'Abaisraeli Musa yaihaho kimwe kya makumi ataano ky'abantu n'amatungo, yaabiha Abaleevi, abaabaire barinda Obutaaho bwa MUKAMA, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Bwanyima abakuru abaabaire nibategyeka enkumi ez'omu ihe, n'abeebembezi ba rukumi-rukumi, n'aba igana-igana, baija ahari Musa, baamugira bati:
Itwe abairu baawe, twabara engabo ezi turikutegyeka, twashanga hataine obuzire n'omwe.

Mbwenu tureeteire MUKAMA empongano aha bi buri muntu anyagire, ebintu by'obuguzi eby'ezaabu, emikuufu y'aha maguru, n'engoro z'aha mikono, n'empeta z'obumanyiso, n'ez'omu matu, kandi n'enkwanzi, eby'okurihiirira amagara gaitu omumaisho ga MUKAMA.
Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa baayakiira ebyo bintu byona ebiheesirwe omu zaabu.
Ezo zaabu zoona ez'empongano ei baahongyeire MUKAMA, ezaahongirwe abeebembezi b'engabo rukumi-rukumi, na igana-igana, zikaba ziri shekeli kakumi n'enkumi mukaaga na magana mushanju na makumi ataano.
(Ahabw'okuba buri murwani akaba aine ebi yaayenyagiire.)
Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa baayakiira ezaabu z'abo beebembezi b'engabo rukumi-rukumi, na igana-igana, baazitwara omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu kuba ekiijutsyo ky'Abaisraeli omumaisho ga MUKAMA.
Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi bakaba baine amatungo maingi munonga; ku baareebire ensi ya Yazeri n'ensi ya Gileadi ziri ensi z'amatungo,
Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni baija, baagambira Musa na Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'abeebembezi b'eihanga bati:
Ataroosi, Diboni, Yazeri, Nimura, Heshibooni, Eleale, Shebamu, Neebo na Beoni,
ensi ei MUKAMA yaasingwire omumaisho g'Abaisraeli, n'ensi y'amatungo, kandi itwe abairu baawe tugaine.
Baagaruka baagira bati: Ku oraabe nootugirira embabazi, itwe abairu baawe tuheebwe egi nsi ebe eyaitu, otatwambutsya Yorudani.
Musa yaabuuza Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni ati: Beene waanyu nibaija kuhurura, imwe mugume aha?
Nimuhahaariza ki Abaisraeli emitima, ngu batambuka kuza omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaabahaire?
Okwo nikwo baashoimwe baagizire, obu naabatuma kutata egyo nsi, tukiri Kadeshi-barunea;
ahakuba, ku bainamukire omu ruhanga rwa Eshikooli, baareeba egyo nsi, baahahaaza Abaisraeli emitima, ngu bataza omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaabahaire.
MUKAMA yaabagirira ekiniga ekirikwaka nk'omuriro eryo izooba, yaarahira naagira ati:

Buzimazima tihariho n'omwe omuri aba bashaija abaarugire Misri, abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho, orireeba ensi ei naarahiire kuha Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo; ahabw'okuba tibankuratiriire kimwe,
kureka Kalebu mwene Yefune Omukenizi, na Yoshua mwene Nuuni, ahakuba bo bankuratiriire kimwe.
MUKAMA yaagirira Abaisraeli ekiniga, yaabazengyereza omu ihamba okumara emyaka makumi ana, okuhitsya obu ab'obusingye obwo bwona, abaakozire ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, baahweireho.
Mbwenu reeba, naimwe mugarukire omu mwanya gwa baashoimwe, oruzaaro rw'enkozi z'ebibi, kugaruka kwongyera ekiniga kya MUKAMA, ku kiba kingi munonga aha Baisraeli.
Ahabw'okuba ku muraamurugyeho, mwayanga kumukuratira, naija kugaruka abatsigye omuri eri ihamba; haza naimwe mureetere eihanga eri ryona kucwekyerera.
Baamwirira haihi, baamugira bati: Nitwija kuzitirira amasyo gaitu, twombekyere abaana baitu endembo;

Kwonka itwe twenka nitwija kukwata eby'okurwanisa, twebembere Abaisraeli, okuhitsya obu turibahitsya omu nsi yaabo; kandi abaana baitu baryaguma omuri ezi ndembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare ahabw'okwerinda abatwire omuri egi nsi.
Titurigaruka mu maka gaitu, buri muntu omu Baisraeli atakatungire buhunguzi bwe;
ahakuba tituriheebwa buhunguzi hamwe nabo seeri ya Yorudani kandi n'okweyongyerayo; ahabw'okuba obuhunguzi bwaitu tubuhairwe seenu ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba.
abashaija boona omuriimwe abaine eby'okurwanisa ku baryambuka Yorudani omu maisho ga MUKAMA, okuhitsya obu aribingira kimwe abazigu be omu maisho ge,
ensi ekagomoorerwa MUKAMA, bwanyima muryagaruka mutaine rubanja omumaisho ga MUKAMA n'omumaisho g'Abaisraeli; kandi ensi egi eryaba eyaanyu omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kwonka ku muriba mutakozire mutyo, muryaba mucumwire ahari MUKAMA; kandi mumanyire kimwe ngu ekibi kyanyu kiryabahindukana.
Mbwenu mwombekyere abaana baanyu endembo, muzitirire entaama zaanyu, mukore ekyo eki mwagamba.
Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni baagira Musa bati: Itwe abairu baawe turyakora nk'oku waaturagiira, mukama waitu.
Abaana baitu n'abakazi baitu n'entaama zaitu, kandi n'ente zaitu zoona biryaguma omu ndembo za Gileadi;
kwonka itwe twena abairu baawe abaine eby'okurwanisa turyayambuka, tuhurure twebembeire MUKAMA, nk'oku waagamba, mukama waitu.
Bwanyima ebyabo Musa yaabiragiira Eleazaari omunyamurwa na Yoshua mwene Nuuni n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'enganda z'Abaisraeli.

Yaabagira ati: Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni ku baryambuka Yorudani naimwe, beebembeire MUKAMA kuhurura, buri muntu aine eby'okurwanisa bye, ensi yaagomoorwa omu maisho gaanyu, bwanyima muryabaha ensi ya Gileadi ebe eyaabo.
Kwonka ku bariba batambukire naimwe baine eby'okurwanisa, baryaheebwa naimwe obutaka omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni baagarukamu nibagira bati: Oku MUKAMA yaaragiira abairu baawe, nikwo turikora.
Turyayambuka twine eby'okurwanisa, tuze omu nsi ya Kanaani twebembeire MUKAMA, obutaka bwaitu tugume nabwo seenu ya Yorudani.
Abagaadi baayombeka Diboni, Ataroosi, Aroeri,
Atiroosi-shofani, Yazeri, Yogibeha,
Besi-nimura na Besi-harani; ezo ndembo baazeehinguririza engo z'amabaare, kandi baazitirira entaama zaabo.
Abareubeeni baayombeka Heshibooni, Eleale, Kiryasaimu,
Neebo, Baalimeoni (baahindura amaziina gaazo) na Sibuma; endembo ezi baayombekire baazeeta agandi maziina.
Aba Makiri mwene Manaase baaza Gileadi, baagikwata, baabingamu Abaamori abaabaire batwiremu.
Musa yaaha Makiri mwene Manaase Gileadi, yaagituuramu.
Na Yairi mwene Manaase yaakwata ebirorero byayo, yaabyeta Havosi-yairi.
Kandi na Nooba yaagyenda, yaakwata Kenaasi n'ebirorero byayo, yaagyeterera eiziina rye Nooba.
Ezi nizo ndaariro z'Abaisraeli, obu baaruga Misri, nk'amahe gaabo oku gaabaire gari, beebembeirwe Musa na Arooni.
Musa yaahandiika endaariro zaabo, nk'oku zaabaire nizikuratana omu ngyendo zaabo naaragiirwa MUKAMA; mbwenu ezi nizo ndaariro zaabo nk'oku baagyenzire.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano omu kwezi kw'okubanza bakaimutsya orugyendo, baaruga Rameseesi; Okuhingurwaho kuraire kuhweire, Abaisraeli baarugayo nibeemurika omu maisho g'Abanyamisri;
baatsiga banu nibakiziika emijigaijo yaabo yoona, ei MUKAMA yaabaire abaitsiremu; kandi na baaruhanga baabo MUKAMA akaba abacwereire orubanja.
Baaruga Sukoosi, baasiisira Etamu eri aha rubaju rw'eihamba.
Baaruga Etamu, baagaruka enyima, baaza Pihahiroosi, aharikureebana na Baali-zefooni, baasiisira omu maisho ga Migidooli.
Baaruga ahu baabaire bari omu maisho ga Hahiroosi, baaraba omu nyanja, baahika omu ihamba; baagyenda orugyendo rw'ebiro bishatu omu ihamba rya Etamu, baasiisira Maara.
Baaruga Maara, baahika Elimu; omuri Elimu hakaba harimu enshuro z'amaizi ikumi na ibiri, n'emikindo makumi mushanju; baasiisirayo.
Baaruga Elimu, baasiisira aha rubaju rw'Enyanja erikutukura.
Baaruga aha Nyanja erikutukura, baasiisira omu ihamba rya Siini.
Baaruga omu ihamba rya Siini, baasiisira Dofika.
Baaruga Dofika, baasiisira Alushi.
Baaruga Alushi, baasiisira Refidimu, ahu abantu baaburiire amaizi g'okunywa.
Baaruga Refidimu, baasiisira omu ihamba rya Sinai.
Baaruga omu ihamba rya Sinai, baasiisira Kibiroosi-hatava.
Baaruga Kibiroosi-hatava, baasiisira Hazeroosi.
Baaruga Hazeroosi, baasiisira Risima.
Baaruga Risimai baasiisira Rimoni-pereezi.
Baaruga Rimoni-pereezi, baasiisira Libuna.
Baaruga Libuna, baasiisira Risa.
Baaruga Risa, baasiisira Kehelaasa.
Baaruga Kehelaasa, baasiisira omu kibungo kya Sheferi.
Baaruga omu kibungo kya Sheferi, baasiisira Harada.
Baaruga Harada, baasiisira Maki-heloosi.
Baaruga Maki-heloosi, baasiisira Tahasi.
Baaruga Tahasi, baasiisira Teera.
Baaruga Teera, baasiisira Misika.
Baaruga Misika, baasiisira Hashimoona.
Baaruga Hashi-moona, baasiisira Moseroosi.
Baaruga Moseroosi, baasiisira Bene-yakani.
Baaruga Bene-yakani, baasiisira Hori-hagidigadi.
Baaruga Hori-hagidigadi, baasiisira Yotibaasa.
Baaruga Yotibaasa, baasiisira Abiroona.
Baaruga Abiroona, baasiisira Ezioni-geberi.
Baaruga Ezioni-geberi, baasiisira omu ihamba rya Ziini, niyo Kadeshi.
Baaruga Kadeshi, baasiisira aha rushozi Hoori aha mwatano gw'ensi ya Edomu.
Arooni omunyamurwa yainamuka aha rushozi Hoori ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, yaafeerayo omu mwaka gwa makumi ana Abaisraeli barugire omu nsi ya Misri, omu kwezi kwa kataano aha kiro ky'okubanza.
Kandi Arooni akaba ahikize emyaka igana na makumi abiri n'eshatu, obu yaagwa aha rushozi Hoori.
Baaruga aha rushozi Hoori, baasiisira Zalumoona.
Baaruga Zalumoona, baasiisira Punooni.
Baaruga Punooni, baasiisira Obosi.
Baaruga Obosi, baasiisira Iye-abariimu eri omu mwatano gwa Moabu.
Baaruga Iyimu, baasiisira Diboni-gaadi.
Baaruga Diboni-gaadi, baasiisira Alimoni-dibulasaimu.
Baaruga Alimoni-dibulasaimu, baasiisira omu nshozi za Abariimu omu maisho ga Neebo.
Baaruga omu nshozi za Abariimu, baasiisira omu mpita za Moabu haihi na Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko.
Bwanyima baasiisira haihi na Yorudani okuruga Besi-yeshimooseveni okuhika Abeeli-shitimu omu mpita za Moabu.
MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa omu mpita za Moabu, haihi na Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko, ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Ku muryambuka Yorudani, mwahika omu nsi ya Kanaani,

mubingye abatuuzi boona ab'omuri egyo nsi, babarugye omumaisho, mucwekyereze ebishushani byabo byona ebibaizirwe omu mabaare, n'ebishushani byabo byona ebiheesire, kandi musheenye emyanya yaabo yoona emikuru ey'okuramizamu,
mukubuure ensi, mugituuremu; ahabw'okuba niimwe ngihaire kuba eyaanyu.

Ensi egyo muryagihungura nimugiteerera enteenyu, nk'emiryango yaanyu oku eri; abaingi muryabaha obuhunguzi bwingi, n'abakye mubahe bukye; ahu enteenyu erikwatira omuntu, niho hariba ahakwe; muryagihungura nk'enganda za bashwenkuriimwe oku ziri.
Kwonka ku muriba mutabingire abagitwiremu, mukabaiha omumaisho gaanyu, abumuritsigamu baryababeera ebirikucumita omu maisho, n'amahwa omu mbaju, babatuntuze omuri egyo nsi ei muriba mutwiremu.
Kandi oku naabaire niinyenda kubagira, naimwe nikwo ndibagira.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Ragiira Abaisraeli oti: Ku murihika omu nsi ya Kanaani, (niyo nsi ei muriheebwa kuba obuhunguzi, nk'emyatano yaayo oku eri)

ekicweka kyanyu eky'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo kiryaruga aha ihamba rya Ziini, kirabe aha rubaju rwa Edomu, kandi omwatano gwanyu ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo guryatandikira aha Nyanja y'Omwonyo okwiha aha muheru gwayo aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba;

ogwo mwatano gwanyu gukiikame gutoore aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo aharikwinamuka Akarabiimu, gwogyemu guhikye Ziini, gugarukire aha rubaju rwa Kadeshi-barunea aha bukiizi bwayo obwa-buryo; gugumizemu, guhikye Hazari-adaari, gwogyemu guhikye Azimooni.
Bwanyima gurugye Azimooni, gukiikame, guhikye aha kagyera ka Misri, gugarukire aha Nyanja Empango.
Omwatano gwayo ogw'aha burengyerwa-izooba guryaba Enyanja Empango n'embaju zaayo; ogwo nigwo guriba omwatano gwanyu aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.
N'ogu nigwo guriba omwatano gwanyu aha rubaju r'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho; okwiha aha Nyanja Empango muryataho omwatano guhikye aha rushozi Hoori.
Okuruga aha rushozi Hoori muteho omwatano guhikye ahu orikutaahira nooza Hamasi, gugarukire Zedadi.
Bwanyima omwatano gugumizemu guhikye Zifurooni, gugarukire Hazari-enani; ogwo gube nigwo gwaba omwatano gwanyu ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Kandi muryataho omwatano gwanyu aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba okuruga Hazari-enani okuhika Shefamu.
Gurugye Shefamu, gushuume, guhikye Ribula aha rubaju rwa Aini orw'oburugwa-izooba; gugumizemu gushuume, guhikye aha rubaju rw'enyanja ya Kinereesi oburugwa-izooba;
gugumizemu gushuume guhikye Yorudani, gugarukire aha Nyanja y'Omwonyo; egyo niyo eriba ensi yaanyu, nk'emyatano yaayo egyehinguririize oku eri.

ahabw'okuba oruganda rwa Reubeeni nk'emiryango ya baishenkurubo oku eri, n'oruganda rwa Gaadi nk'emiryango ya baishenkurubo oku eri, n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, baherize kuheebwa obuhunguzi bwabo.
Ezo nganda ibiri n'ekicweka ziherize kuheebwa obuhunguzi bwazo seenu ya Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Aga nigo maziina g'abantu abaribabaganisiza ensi kuba obuhunguzi bwanyu; Eleazaari omunyamurwa na Yoshua mwene Nuuni.
Kandi muryatoorana omwebembezi omwe omuri buri ruganda, babaganise ensi kuba obuhunguzi.
Amaziina gaabo n'aga; ow'oruganda rwa Yuda, Kalebu mwene Yefune;
ow'oruganda rwa Simeoni, Shemueli mwene Amihuudi;
ow'oruganda rwa Benyamiini Elidaadi mwene Kisilooni;
ow'oruganda rwa Daani omwebembezi Buuki mwene Yogili;
owa beene Yosefu, ow'oruganda rwa Manaase, omwebembezi Hanieli mwene Efodi;
ow'oruganda rwa Efuraimu omwebembezi Kemueli mwene Shifitaani;
ow'oruganda rwa Zebuluuni omwebembezi Elizafaani mwene Parinaaki;
ow'oruganda rwa Isakaari omwebembezi Palitieli mwene Azaani;
ow'oruganda rwa Asheri omwebembezi Ahihuudi mwene Shelomi;
ow'oruganda rwa Nafutaali omwebembezi Pedaheli mwene Amihuudi.
Abo nibo MUKAMA yaaragiire kubaganisiza Abaisraeli obuhunguzi bwabo omu nsi ya Kanaani.
MUKAMA yaagambirira Musa omu mpita za Moabu haihi na Yorudani ahashungaine na Yeriko, ati:
Ragiira Abaisraeli bahe Abaleevi endembo z'okutuuramu, nibaziiha aha nsi yaabo ei bahungwire; kandi mubahe amariisizo ageehinguririize ezo ndembo.
Ezo ndembo zibe ezaabo z'okutuuramu, n'amariisizo gabe ag'ente zaabo n'ebintu byabo, n'amatungo gaabo goona.
Amariisizo ag'aha ndembo agu muriha Abaleevi, gatandikire aha ngo z'endembo, gahitsye entambwe magana ataano embaju zoona.

Aheeru y'orurembo aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba mugyere entambwe rukumi, aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo entambwe rukumi, aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba entambwe rukumi, kandi n'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho entambwe rukumi, orurembo rugume ahagati. Ago gabe nigo gaaba mariisizo g'aha ndembo zaabo.
Endembo ezi muriha Abaleevi zibe endembo mukaaga ez'okuhungiramu, oriita omuntu weena azihungiremu; kandi ahari ezo mukaaga mwongyereho ezindi makumi ana na ibiri.
Endembo zoona ezi muriha Abaleevi zibe makumi ana na munaana; muzibahe hamwe n'amariisizo gaazo.
Endembo ezi muriiha aha butaka bw'Abaisraeli kuha Abaleevi, abaingi muryabaihaho nyingi, n'abakye mubaiheho nkye. Buri ruganda nk'obuhunguzi bwarwo oku buri, nikwo ruribaha aha ndembo zaarwo.
MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Ku muryambuka Yorudani, mwahika omu nsi ya Kanaani,
muryayetooranira endembo zibe ezaanyu z'okuhungiramu, oitsire omuntu weena, atamwitsire nkana, ahungiremu.
Ezo ndembo ziryababeera obuhungiro bw'okukiriramu omuhoozi w'enzigu, oriba aitsire omuntu arekye kufa, atakeemereire mu maisho g'omutwe gw'abakuru kucwerwa orubanja.
Kandi ezo ndembo ezi muriha, nizo ziriba endembo zaanyu mukaaga ez'okuhungiramu.
Muryaha endembo ishatu seenu ya Yorudani, n'ezindi ishatu omu nsi ya Kanaani, zibe endembo z'okuhungiramu.
Ezo ndembo zoona mukaaga ziryaba obuhungiro bw'Abaisraeli n'obw'abanyamahanga n'obw'abariba babashuhuukiiremu, oriita omuntu weena, atamwitsire nkana, ahungiremu.
Nari ku arimuteera eibaare, eri aine omu ngaro, eririkubaasa kwita omuntu, yaafa, biri n'omwitsi; kandi omwitsi ataribura kwitwa.
Nari shi, ku arimuteeza ekiti kibaizire eki akwaitse omu ngaro, ekirikubaasa kwita omuntu, yaafa, biri n'omwitsi; kandi omwitsi ataribura kwitwa.
Orikuhoorera nyakufa niwe ariyeitira oitsire omuntu; ku arimureeba, amwite.
Kandi oitsire omuntu, ku ariba amucumitsire ahabw'okumwanga, nari aine eki yaamurekyeire, akamuteera amugwereire, akafa,
nari shi amuteire entomi ahabw'okumwanga, yaagwa ahansi, yaafa, owaamuteire ataribura kwitwa; biri n'omwitsi; orikuhoorera nyakufa aite ogwo mwitsi, ku arimureeba.
Kwonka ku arihikiirirwa, yaacumita omuntu atamwineho rwango, nari yaagira eki yaamuteera, atamugwereire;
nari shi ku arimuteera eibaare eririkubaasa kwita omuntu atamureebire, yaarimuteera, yaafa, kandi ashangirwe atari muzigu we, kandi atarikwenda kumukora kubi,
obwo omutwe gw'abakuru guryacwera omwitsi n'orikuhoorera eshagama orubanja, nk'ebiragiro ebyo oku biri;

abo bakuru bakize oitsire omuntu orikumuhoorera nyakufa, bamugarure omu rurembo rw'obuhungiro, oru abaire ahungiiremu, arugumemu okuhitsya obu omunyamurwa omukuru, owaashukirweho amajuta g'okushoroora, arifa.
Kwonka ogwo muntu oitsire ondiijo ku arirenga omwatano gw'orurembo rw'obuhungiro, oru ahungiiremu,
orikuhoorera eshagama yaamushanga aheeru y'orwo rurembo rw'obuhungiro, yaamwita, tarigiibwaho rubanja rw'eshagama ye;
ahakuba ogwo akaabaire agumire omu rurembo rw'obuhungiro bwe, okuhitsya ahu omunyamurwa omukuru arifeera; kwonka omunyamurwa omukuru ku ariheza kufa, ogwo oitsire omuntu agarukye omu butaka bwe.
Ebyo bigume bibabeere ebiragiro n'emitwarize ebitairweho omu busingye bwanyu bwona n'omu maka gaanyu goona.
Oriita omuntu weena aryaitwa ahabwa baamushinja, kwonka atariitwa ahabwa mushinja omwe.
Kandi mutaryakiira eky'okucungura oitsire omuntu, oshemereire kwitwa; kureka omuntu ogwo buzimazima aryaitwa.
Kandi mutariikiriza ekarabo y'omuntu ohungiire omu rurembo rw'obuhungiro, ngu agarukye kutuura omu nsi, omunyamurwa omukuru atakafiire.

Ku muritwaza mutyo, timurishiisha nsi ei murituuramu; ahabw'okuba eshagama niyo eshiisha ensi, kandi tihariho ky'okurihiirira ensi, ahabw'eshagama eyaagisheeshekireho, kureka eshagama y'ogwo owaagijwisize.
Mutarishiisha ensi ei mutwiremu, ei ntuuramu ahagati; ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA ntuura ahagati y'Abaisraeli.

Abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo ag'emiryango ya beene Gileadi mwene Makiri, mwene Manaase, ab'omu miryango ya beene Yosefu, bairira haihi, baagambira omu maisho ga Musa n'abeebembezi n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'Abaisraeli,

nibagira bati: MUKAMA akakuragiira, iwe mukama waitu, kubaganisa ensi n'enteenyu noogiha Abaisraeli kuba obuhunguzi; kandi, mukama waitu, okaragiirwa MUKAMA kuha bahara ba Zelofehaadi mwene waitu obuhunguzi bwe.

Kwonka ku barishwerwa abantu b'omu nganda ezindi ez'Abaisraeli, obuhunguzi bwabo buryaihwa aha buhunguzi bwa baatatenkuriitwe, bwongyerwe aha buhunguzi bw'enganda ezi barishwerwamu; n'ahabw'ekyo buryaba bwihirwe aha mugabo gw'obuhunguzi bwaitu.

Kandi omwaka gwa jubili y'Abaisraeli ku gurihika, obuhunguzi buryayongyerwa aha buhunguzi bw'oruganda oru baashweirwemu; n'ahabw'ekyo obuhunguzi bwabo buryaihirwa kimwe aha buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa baatatenkuriitwe.
Musa yaaragiira Abaisraeli nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri, naagira ati: Ebi oruganda rwa beene Yosefu rurikufa n'eby'amazima.
Eki nikyo MUKAMA arikuragiira aha bya bahara ba Zelofehaadi, ati: Mubarekye bagume bashwerwe abu barisiima; kwonka bashwerwe omu muryango gw'oruganda rwa baishenkurubo.
Hatarigira obuhunguzi bw'Abaisraeli obwaruga omu ruganda bukaza omulundi; kureka buri muntu omu Baisraeli agume omu buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa baishenkuru.
Kandi omwishiki weena, oriheebwa obuhunguzi omu ruganda rw'Abaisraeli, ashwerwe ow'omu muryango gw'oruganda rwa baishenkuru, buri muntu ow'omu Baisraeli abone kuheebwa obuhunguzi bwa baishenkuru.
N'ahabw'ekyo tiharibaho buhunguzi obwaruga omu ruganda bukaza omu rundi; ahakuba buri ruganda omu nganda z'Abaisraeli ruryagumya obuhunguzi bwarwo.
Bwanyima bahara ba Zelofehaadi baakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiira Musa;
ahakuba Maala, Tiruza, Hogula, Milika na Noa, bahara ba Zelofehaadi, bakashwerwa batabani ba baishentobo.
Baashwerwa ab'omu miryango ya beene Manaase, mwene Yosefu; obuhunguzi bwabo bwaguma omu ruganda rw'omuryango gwa ishebo.
Ebi nibyo bigambo ebi Musa yaagambiire Abaisraeli boona bari seeri ya
Okuruga Horebu okuhika Kadeshi-barunea, orabire aha rushozi Seiri, n'orugyendo rw'ebiro ikumi na kimwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ana omu kwezi kwa ikumi na kumwe, aha kiro kyakwo ky'okubanza, Musa akagambira Abaisraeli ebi MUKAMA yaamuragiire kubagambira byona, nk'oku byabaire biri;
yaabimugambira aherize kusingura Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, owaabaire atwire Heshibooni, na Ogi omugabe wa Bashani owaabaire atwire Ashitaroosi omuri Edurei;
Musa yaatandika kushoboorora ebiragiro ebyo, ari omu nsi ya Moabu seeri ya Yorudani, naagira ati:
MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu akatugambirira Horebu, naagira ati: Omwanya ogu mumazire ahari oru rushozi ni muhango munonga;

muhindukye, mwimutsye orugyendo, muze omu nsi y'ebibungo ey'Abaamori n'ahandi hoona ahahereraine naho, omuri Araba, n'omu nsi y'ebibungo, n'omu mpita, na Negebu n'omu mpita z'aha rubaju rw'Enyanja Empango, omu nsi y'Abanyakanaani, n'aha rushozi Lebanooni, muhikye n'aha mugyera muhango Furaati.
Reeba, egyo nsi ngitaire omu maisho gaanyu; mugizemu, mukubuure egyo nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe, Abarahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo, na baijukuru baabo abarikurataho.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abakanyiise; reeba hati muri baingi nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru.
MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe abakanyise emirundi rukumi okukira oku muri, kandi abahe omugisha, nk'oku yaabaraganiise.
Nimbaasa nta kwemera oburemeezi bwanyu n'empaka zaanyu ebirikumpenda?
Mutoorane abanyabwengye, abarikwetegyereza kandi abarikumanywa, nk'enganda zaanyu oku ziri, mbateho kuba abeebembezi baanyu.
Mwangarukamu muti: Ebi waagamba ni birungi itwe kubikora.

Naanye nikwo kutwara abakuru b'enganda zaanyu, abanyabwengye kandi abarikumanywa, nkabahindura abeebembezi baanyu, abamwe kutegyeka buri omwe rukumi, abandi igana, abandi ataano n'abandi ikumi, kandi n'abakuru b'engabo, nk'oku enganda zaanyu ziri.
Kandi obwo nkeehanangiriza abaramuzi baanyu, ningira nti: Mugume muhurire ebi beene waanyu barikufa, mucwere omuntu na mwene ishe n'omunyaihanga otwire nawe emanja z'oburyo.

Omu kucwa emanja kwanyu mutarishoroora omu bantu; muhurire abataine kitiinisa n'abakiine nimubainganisa; mutaritiina amaisho g'omuntu, ahabw'okuba okucwa orubanja n'okwa Ruhanga; kandi emanja eziribarema, mugume muzindeetere, naanye ndyazihurira.
Kandi omu bunaku obwo nkabaragiira byona ebi mushemereire kukora.
Ku twahikireyo, naabagira nti: Mwaija omu nsi y'ebibungo ey'Abaamori, ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu arikutuha.
Reeba, MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ataire egyo nsi omu maisho gaanyu; mwinamukye, mugikubuure, nka MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe oku yaabagambiire; mutatiina, n'obu kwakuba okuhahaaza omutima.
Bwanyima mwena mwanyirira haihi, mwagira muti: Ka tutume abantu batubandizeyo, batutatire ensi, bagarukye batugambire omuhanda ogu turaatoore nitwinamuka, n'endembo ezi turaahikyemu.
Ekigambo ekyo kyangwisa gye munonga, naabaihamu abantu ikumi na babiri, omwe omuri buri ruganda.
Baahinduka, bainamuka omu nsi y'ebibungo, baahika omu ruhanga rwa Eshikooli, baarutata.
Baiha aha bijuma by'egyo nsi, baabitureetera omu ngaro zaabo, kandi baatureetera n'enkuru nungi nibagira bati: Ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu arikutuha ni nungi.
mwayetomboitera omu mahema gaanyu nimugira muti: Ruhanga ahabw'okutwanga akatwiha omu nsi ya Misri okutuhayo omu mikono y'Abaamori kutucwekyereza.

Nitwinamuka hi? Beene waitu batumazire omutima omunda nibagira bati: Abo bantu ni bahango kandi ni baraingwa nibatukira; endembo zaabo ni mpango, kandi zeehinguririziibwe engo ezizitiire okuhika ahaiguru munonga; kandi tureebireyo beene Anaki.
Naanye nikwo kubagumya nimbagira nti: Mutagira obwoba, kandi mutabatiina.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu orikubeebembera niwe araabarwanirire, nk'ebi yaabakoreire omuri Misri byona nimureeba, oku byabaire biri,
kandi n'omu ihamba ahu mwareebeire oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabaheekire, omu muhanda gwona ogu mwarabiremu okuhika aha, nk'oku omuntu aheeka omwana we.
Kwonka n'obu ndaabe naabagambiire ekyo, timuraikiriize MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu,
owaabeebembeire omu muhanda kubasherurira omwanya gw'okuteeramu amahema gaanyu, ari omu muriro nyekiro n'omu kicu nyomushana, kubahabura omuhanda ogu muraatooremu.
Buzimazima tihariho n'omwe omuri aba bantu ab'obusingye obu obubi orireeba egyo nsi nungi ei naarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe,
kureka Kalebu mwene Yefune niwe arigireeba; kandi ensi ei yaaribatsiremu ndyagimuha n'abaana be, ahabw'okuba kakuratirira kimwe MUKAMA.
Kandi naanye MUKAMA akangwerwa kubi ahabwanyu, yaagira ati: Naiwe torigihikamu.
Kwonka Yoshua mwene Nuuni, omuheereza waawe niwe aritaahamu; omugumye, ahakuba niwe arihunguza Abaisraeli egyo nsi.
Kandi abaana baanyu abato abu mwagizire ngu baryaba eminyago, n'abaana baanyu abatakamanyire kirungi nari kibi, nibo barigitaahamu, kandi nibo ndigiha bakagikubuura.
Kwonka imwe muhindukye mugarukye omu ihamba, mutoore omuhanda ogurikuza aha Nyanja erikutukura.

Bwanyima mwangarukamu nimugira muti: Tucumwire ahari MUKAMA; nitwija kwinamuka, turwane nk'ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaaturagiire byona oku biri. Buri omuntu weena omuriimwe yaahagatira eby'okurwanisa bye, mwateekateeka ngu nikirahuka kwinamuka omu nsi y'ebibungo.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Obangirire oti: Mutainamuka, kandi mutarwana; ahakuba tindi muriimwe, mutakaitwa abazigu baanyu.
Ntyo naabibagambira, kwonka timwabihurira, mwagomera ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, mwainamuka n'ekigaazo omuri egyo nsi y'ebibungo.
Abaamori abaabaire bagitwiremu baija kubarwanisa, baababinga nk'enjoki, baabaitira Seiri, baabahitsya Horuma.
Mwagaruka, mwarira omu maisho ga MUKAMA; kwonka MUKAMA tiyaabeetaho n'obu kwakuba okubatega okutu.
Mutyo mwamara ebiro bingi muri Kadeshi, nk'ebiro ebi mwamazireyo oku byabaire nibiingana.
Bwanyima twahinduka, twaimutsya orugyendo nituza omu ihamba, twatoora omuhanda ogurikuza aha Nyanja erikutukura, nk'oku MUKAMA yandagiire; twamara ebiro bingi nitwehinguririza orushozi Seiri.
MUKAMA yangira ati:
Omwanya ogu mumazire nimwehinguririza oru rushozi ni muhango munonga; mukiikame mutoore aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Kandi oragiire abantu oti: Mwaza kuraba omu nsi ya beene waanyu aba Esau, abatwire Seiri; bo baryabatiina; n'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde munonga,
mutaribarwanisa; ahakuba tindibaha ha nsi yaabo, n'obu haakuba ah'okuribata ekigyere; ahabw'okuba nkaha Esau orushozi Seiri kuba orwe.
Muryaguma mubashakyemu eby'okurya, mubone kurya, kandi mugure nabo amaizi, mubone kunywa.

Ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akakuha omugisha omu mirimo yoona ey'emikono yaawe, yaamanya engyendo zaawe ez'omuri eri ihamba rihango; kandi emyaka egi yoona makumi ana MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe agumire naiwe, otaine ki obuzire.

Tutyo twagumizamu, twayetantara beene waitu aba Esau, abatwire Seiri, twayetantara n'omuhanda ogurikuraba Araba niguruga Elaasi na Ezionigeberi; twakuba, twatoora omuhanda ogurikuza omu ihamba rya Moabu.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Mutarahura Abamoabu, mukabarwanisa; ahakuba tindibaha buhunguzi mu nsi yaabo, ahabw'okuba nkaha aba Looti ensi ya Aari kuba eyaabo.
(Obunyakare aba Emimu bakaba batwireyo, n'eihanga ry'amaani ery'abantu baingi kandi baraingwa nk'aba Anaki,
kandi bakaba nibeetwa aba Reefa nk'aba Anaki; kwonka Abamoabu bakabeeta aba Emimu.
Kandi obunyakare Abahoori nabo bakaba batwire Seiri, baabanyaga, baabaita, baatuura omu nsi yaabo, nk'Abaisraeli oku baakubwire ensi yaabo ei MUKAMA yaabahaire.)
MUKAMA yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mbwenu mwimukye, mwambukye akagyera Zeredi. Ako kagyera Zeredi twakambuka.

Emyaka ei twamazire okwiha obu twaruga Kadeshi-barunea okuhitsya obu twayambukire ako kagyera Zeredi, ekahika makumi ashatu na munaana; okuhitsya obu abarwani boona ab'obusingye obwo baahwereire kimwe omu nsiisira zaitu, nk'oku MUKAMA yaabagambiire naarahira.
Buzimazima omukono gwa MUKAMA gukabarwanisa okubahwerekyerereza omu nsiisira zaitu, okuhitsya obu baahweireho.
Bwanyima abarwani boona ku baaherize kufa, baahwa omu bantu,
MUKAMA yangira ati:
Eri izooba nimwija kuraba omuri Aari, mucwekanise omwatano gwa Moabu;
kandi ku oraahikye haihi n'Abaamoni, otabarahura, n'obu kwakuba okubarwanisa; ahakuba tindikuha buhunguzi omu nsi y'Abaamoni, ahabw'okuba nkagiha aba Looti kuba eyaabo. (
Ensi egyo nayo neeyetwa ey'aba Reefa; obunyakare aba Reefa bakaba bagitwiremu; kwonka Abaamoni hati nibabeeta Abazamuzumi;
rikaba riri eihanga ry'amaani, ery'abantu baingi kandi baraingwa nk'aba Anaki; kwonka MUKAMA akabacwekyerereza omu maisho g'Abaamoni, baabanyaga, baatuura omu nsi yaabo,
nk'oku yaagiriire aba Esau, abatwire Seiri, obu yaacwekyerereza aba Hoori omu maisho gaabo, bakabanyaga, bakatuura omu nsi yaabo n'okuhitsya hati.
Kandi n'aba Avimu, abaabaire batwire omu birorero okuhika Gaaza, aba Kafutoori, abaarugire Kafutoori, bakabacwekyereza, baatuura omu nsi yaabo.)

MUKAMA yaagaruka yangira ati: Mwimukye mugyende, mwambukye oruhanga rwa Arunooni; reeba naahayo Sihooni Omuamori, omugabe wa Heshibooni, n'ensi ye omu mikono yaawe; otandikye kumurwanisa n'okukubuura ensi ye.
Eri izooba niinyija kwitsa amahanga agari ahansi y'eiguru obwoba n'okugatiinisa ahabwawe; nibaija kuhurira okurangaanwa kwawe, bateteme, bagire amaganya maingi ahabwawe.
Onyikirize ndabe omu nsi yaawe; niinyija kutoora omuhanda rugyendwa, tindikwija kukiikama aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho.
Eby'okurya oryabinguza nkuhe empiiha, mbone kurya; n'amaizi oganguze nkuhe empiiha, mbone kunywa; kwonka ondekye, ndabemu n'ebigyere,
nk'aba Esau abatwire Seiri, n'Abamoabu abatwire Aari, oku bangiriire, okuhitsya obu ndyambuka Yorudani, nkahika omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu arikutuha.
Kwonka Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni yaayanga kutureka kuraba omu nsi ye, ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akamugangaaza omutima, yaamutizya, ngu abone kumuhayo omu mukono gwawe, nk'oku kiri na hati.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Reeba, naatandika kuhayo Sihooni n'ensi ye omumaisho gaawe; naiwe otandikye kugikubuura, obone kugihungura.
Bwanyima Sihooni yaija n'engabo ze zoona kuturwanisiza ahari Yahazi.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaamuhayo omu maishogaitu, twamwita n'abatabani n'abantu be boona.
Omu bunaku obwo twakwata endembo ze zoona, twazicwekyerereza kimwe, abashaija, n'abakazi n'abaana; titwatsigamu na wa kizira.
Kureka amatungo gonka nigo twayenyagiire hamwe n'ebi twanyagire omu ndembo ezi twakwatsire.

Okuruga Aroeri eri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni, n'okuruga aha rurembo oruri omuri orwo ruhanga, okuhika Gileadi, tihaagira rurembo rwaturema ahabw'oburaingwa bwarwo. MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaazihayo zoona omu maisho gaitu.
Kwonka tiwaahika haihi n'ensi y'Abaamoni, n'obu haakuba aha nkungu z'omugyera Yaboki, nari endembo z'omu nsi y'ebibungo, n'ahandi hoona ahu MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaatuzibiire.
Bwanyima twakuba, twatoora omuhanda ogurikwinamuka Bashani; Ogi omugabe wa Bashani yaija n'engabo ze zoona kuturwanisiza omuri Edurei.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Otamutiina; ahakuba naamuhayo n'abantu be boona n'ensi ye omu mukono gwawe; omugire nk'oku waagizire Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori owaabaire atwire Heshibooni.
Atyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaahayo na Ogi omugabe wa Bashani n'abantu be boona omu mikono yaitu; twabaita, tiyaahonoraho n'omwe.
Omu bunaku obwo twakwata endembo ze zoona; tihaatsigaraho rurembo na rumwe oru tutarabanyagire  endembo makumi mukaaga, ekyaro kyona ekya Arugoobi, obugabe bwa Ogi omuri Bashani.
Ezo zoona zikaba ziri endembo ezizitiire n'engo ndaingwa, ziine amarembo g'enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi, otabariireho birorero bingi munonga ebitaine ngo.
Twazicwekyerereza kimwe, nk'oku twagizire Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni, nitucwekyereza buri rurembo, abashaija n'abakazi n'abaana.
Kwonka amatungo goona, n'ebi twanyagire omu rurembo, twabyetwarira kuba eminyago.
Tutyo omuri obwo bunaku twakubuura ensi z'abo bagabe b'Abaamori bombi, abaabaire batwire seenu ya Yorudani, okwiha aha ruhanga rwa Arunooni, okuhika aha rushozi Herumooni;
(orwo rushozi Herumooni Abasidoni bakaba barweta Sirioni, n'Abaamori barweta Seniiri;)
kandi twakwata endembo zoona ez'omu ruhita, na Gileadi yoona, na Bashani yoona okuhika Saleka n'omuri Edurei, endembo z'omu bugabe bwa Ogi omuri Bashani.

(Ahabw'okuba Ogi omugabe wa Bashani niwe wenka owaabaire akiriho omu ba Reefa abaatsigaireho; ekitanda kye kikaba kiri ky'ebyoma; tikiri omuri Rabba ey'Abaamoni? Oburaingwa bwakyo bukaba buri mikono mwenda, n'obuhango bwakyo mikono ena, nk'orugyero rw'abantu orwa mukono gumwe oku ruri.)

Ku twakubwire egyo nsi omu bunaku obwo, naaha aba Reubeeni n'aba Gaadi ekyanga ekirikutandikira Aroeri eri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni n'ekicweka ky'ensi y'ebibungo ya Gileadi n'endembo zaamwo.

Ekicweka kya Gileadi ekyatsigaireho na Bashani yoona, obugabe bwa Ogi, naabiha ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, ekyanga kyona kya Arugoobi, niyo Bashani yoona. (Egyo nsi ekaba neeyetwa ensi y'aba Reefa.
Yairi mwene Manaase yaatwara ekyaro kyona ekya Arugoobi, niyo Bashani, okuhika aha mwatano gw'aba Geshuri n'aba Maakasi, yaakyeyeterera, kyayetwa Havosi-yairi n'okuhitsya hati.)
Kandi naaha Makiri Gileadi.
Aba Reubeeni n'aba Gaadi naabaha okuruga ahari Gileadi okuhika aha ruhanga rwa Arunooni, omwatano gwayo gwaraba ahagati y'orwo ruhanga, gwahika aha mugyera Yaboki, ogurikubaatanisa n'Abaamoni;
kandi naabaha Araba, omwatano gwayo gwaba Yorudani, okuruga Kinereesi okuhika aha nyanja ya Araba, niyo Nyanja y'Omwonyo, ahansi y'orushozi Pisiga aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba.
Omu bunaku obwo nkabaragiira, ningira nti: MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahaire ensi egi kugikubuura; abashaija baanyu amamanzi baryayambuka bakwaitse eby'okurwanisa beebembeire beene waanyu Abaisraeli.
Kwonka abakazi baanyu n'abaana baanyu n'amatungo gaanyu,  (nimmanya ku mwine amatungo maingi) biryaguma omu ndembo zaanyu, ezi naabahaire,

okuhitsya obu MUKAMA ariha beene waanyu okuhuumura, nk'oku yaakubahaire, nabo bakakubuura ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha seeri ya Yorudani; bwanyima muryagaruka buri muntu omu butaka bwe obu mbahaire.
Omu bunaku obwo nkaragiira Yoshua ningira nti: Amaisho gaawe geereebire byona ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu akozire abo bagabe bombi; kandi nikwo MUKAMA arigira obugabe bwona omu nsi ei murikwambukamu.
Mutaribatiina; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe abarwanirira.
Omu bunaku obwo nkeeshengyereza MUKAMA ningira nti:

Ai Mukama RUHANGA, otandikire kworeka omwiru waawe obukuru bwawe n'omukono gwawe ogw'amaani; ahakuba ni ruhanga ki omu iguru nari aha nsi, orikubaasa kukora emirimo nk'eyaawe, kandi n'eby'amaani ebi waakozire oku biri?
Ninkweshengyereza onyikirize nyambukye, ndeebe ensi egyo enungi eri seeri ya Yorudani, n'ebyo bibungo birungi na Lebanooni.
Kwonka MUKAMA yangwerwa kubi ahabwanyu, tiyaanyikiriza; yangira ati: Rekyera aho, otagaruka kungambira ahari ekyo kigambo.
Inamuka oze aha mutwe gwa Pisiga, onagye amaisho oburengyerwa-izooba, n'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, n'aha bwa buryo, n'oburugwa-izooba, oreebe n'amaisho gaawe; ahakuba toryambuka Yorudani egi.
Kwonka oyehanangirize Yoshua, omwezirikise, omugumye; ahabw'okuba niwe aryambuka ayebembeire aba bantu, akabahunguza ensi ei oraareebe.
Tutyo twaguma omu ruhanga orushungaine na Besi-peori.
Mutaryongyera aha kigambo eki ndikubaragiira, kandi mutarikicwaho, mubone kukwata ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ebi ndikubaragiira.
Amaisho gaanyu gakeereebera ebi MUKAMA yaakozire ahabw'ebya Baali-peori; ahabw'okuba abashaija boona, abaakuratiire Baali-peori, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akabacwekyereza, yaabamara omuriimwe.
Kwonka imwe, abahamiire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mukiriho mwena n'eri izooba.
Reeba, naabeegyesa ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye yandagiire, ngu mube nikwo mwatwaza omu nsi ei murikuza kukubuura.

N'ahabw'ekyo mugume mubikwate, mubyorobere; obwo nibwo bwengye bwanyu n'okwetegyereza kwanyu omu maisho g'amahanga agarihurira ebyo biragiro byona, gakagira gati: N'ekya buzima eri ihanga rikuru n'eihanga ry'abantu b'obwengye kandi abarikwetegyereza.
Ni ihanga ki erikuru eriine ruhanga oriri haihi nka MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu oku atuba haihi, twamutakira?
Kandi ni ihanga ki erikuru eriine ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe ebihikire nk'Ebiragiro ebi byona ebi naata omu maisho gaanyu eri izooba?

Ogume oijukye eizooba eri waayemerereireho omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ahari Horebu, obu MUKAMA yangira ati: Nteeranira abantu, mbagambire ebigambo byangye, babone kwega kuntiina ebiro byona ebi barimara omu nsi, kandi beegyese n'abaana baabo.
Naimwe mwairira haihi, mwayemerera ahansi y'orushozi; orwo rushozi rwayaka omuriro, gwahika ahagati y'eiguru, rwashwekwa omwirima, n'ekicu, kandi omwirima ndindindi.
MUKAMA yaabagambira naayema omu muriro; mwahurira ebyagambwa, kwonka timwagira ki mwareeba, kureka eiraka ryonka.
Yaabagambira endagaano ye, ei yaabaragiire kuhitsya, nibyo biragiro ikumi; yaabihandiika aha bishate bibiri by'amabaare.
Omu bunaku obwo MUKAMA yandagiira kubeegyesa ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe ngu mubone kubyoroberera omu nsi ei murikuza kukubuura.
mwerinde mutakaashiisha, mukeekorera ekishushani ekirikushusha ekintu kyona, ekishushani ky'ekishaija nari eky'ekikazi,
ekishushani ky'enyamaishwa yoona eri omu nsi, nari eky'ekintu kyona ekiine amapapa ekirikuguruka omu mwanya,
ekishushani ky'ekintu kyona ekirikugyendesa enda ahansi nari eky'eky'enyanja kyona ekiri omu maizi okuzimu.

Kandi mwerinde, mutakaimutsya amaisho ahaiguru, mukireeba eizooba n'okwezi n'enyonyoozi, nigo mahe goona ag'omu iguru, mukabeihwabeihwa, mukabiramya, mukabiheereza, haza biri ebintu ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaahaire amahanga goona agari ahansi y'eiguru.
Ahabw'okuba imwe nimumanya ku MUKAMA yaabakwatsire, akabashahura omu iziiko ry'ebyoma eririkubugumwamu omuriro, niyo Misri, kuba abantu be buzima, nk'oku muri na hati.
Kandi MUKAMA akangwerwa kubi ahabwanyu, yaarahira ku ntaryambuka Yorudani kuza omu nsi egyo enungi, ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha kuba obuhunguzi.
N'ahabw'ekyo nshemereire kufeera omu nsi egi; tinshemereire kwambuka Yorudani; kwonka imwe muryayambuka, mukubuure ensi egyo nungi.
Mwerinde, mutaryebwa endagaano ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, ei yaaragaine naimwe, mukeekorera ekishushani ekibaizire, ekirikushusha ekintu kyona, MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu eki yaabazibiire;
ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'omuriro ogurikurya busha, Ruhanga ow'eihato.

Ku murizaara abaana, nabo baazaara abandi, mwamara omwanya muhango mutwire omu nsi egyo, bwanyima ku murishiisha, mwakora ekishushani ekibaizire, ekirikushusha ekintu kyona, mwakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu kumugwisa kubi,

eri izooba niinyeta eiguru n'ensi kuba baamushinja, kuhamya ku murihwerekyerera juba, mukahwa omu nsi ei muryambuka Yorudani kuza kukubuura; timurigimaramu mwanya muhango, kureka muryagicwekyerereramu kimwe.
MUKAMA aryabataataanisa, abanagye omu banyamahanga, mutsigare muri bakye omu mahanga agu MUKAMA aribatwaramu.
Okwo muryaheererezayo baaruhanga abaakozirwe emikono y'abantu omu biti n'omu mabaare, abatarikureeba, abatarikuhurira, nari okurya, n'obu kwakuba okukaga.
Kwonka okwo ku murisherurirayo MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, muryamureeba, ku murimusherura n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona.
Ku origira obusaasi, ebyo byona byakuhikaho, omu biro bya bwanyima oryagarukira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, oyorobere eiraka rye;
ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ni Ruhanga orikusaasira; tarikuhemukaho, kandi tarikucwekyereza, n'obu kwakuba okwebwa endagaano ei yaaragaine na baashwenkuru naarahira.
Hariho abantu abarahuriire eiraka rya Ruhanga nirigambira omu muriro, nkaimwe oku mwarihuriire, bakagumaho bari abahuriire?

Nari shi hariho ruhanga orateireho kuza kwetwarira eihanga, naariihisa omu rindi ebigyezo n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'engamba n'omukono gw'amaani n'omukono ogubangire, kandi n'ebirikutiinisa munonga, nk'ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaakoreire omuri Misri byona omu maisho gaanyu oku byabaire biri?
Niiwe waayorekirwe ebyo, ngu obone kumanya ku MUKAMA ari Ruhanga; ku hatariho ondiijo kureka We wenka.
Akeema omu iguru, yaakuhuriza eiraka rye, ngu abone kukwegyesa; n'omu nsi yaakworeka omuriro gwe omwingi; kandi waahurira ebigambo bye nibigurugamu.
Kandi ahabw'okukunda baashwenkuru, nikyo yaatooraniire baijukuru baabo abaakuratsireho, akakweihira omuri Misri n'amaani ge maingi,
ngu abingye amahanga agarikukukiza ekitiinisa n'amaani, garugye omu maisho gaawe, akutaasye omu nsi yaabo, agikuhe kuba obuhunguzi, nk'oku kiri n'eri izooba.
Mbwenu eri izooba omanye eki kandi okite aha mutima, ku MUKAMA ari Ruhanga ori omu iguru ahaiguru n'omu nsi ahansi; tihariho ondiijo weena.

N'ahabw'ekyo ogume okwate ebiragiro bye ebyatairweho n'ebi yaaragiire, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, obone kuba gye n'abaana baawe abarikurataho, n'okuhangaarira omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha kuba eyaawe ebiro byona.
Bwanyima Musa yaatoorana endembo ishatu aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba seeri ya Yorudani,
ngu oriita omuntu weena ahungireyo, oriba aitsire mutaahi we, atamwitsire nkana, oshangirwe ataine buzigu nawe omu biro ebihingwire, akize amagara ge ahabw'okuhungira omu rurembo rumwe ahari ezo;
endembo ezo nizo eziBezeeri omu ihamba eriri omu nsi y'empita ahabw'aba Reubeeni, Ramosi omuri Gileadi ahabw'aba Gaadi, na Golani omuri Bashani ahabw'aba Manaase.
Ebi nibyo biragiro ebi Musa yaataire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli;
n'ebirikuhamya, n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho, n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi Musa yaagambiire Abaisraeli obu baaruga Misri,
bakiri seeri ya Yorudani omu ruhanga orushungaine na Besi-peori, omu nsi ya Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, owaabaire atwire Heshibooni, ou Musa n'Abaisraeli baitsire, obu baaruga Misri,
bakakubuura ensi ye n'eya Ogi omugabe wa Bashani, kandi abo nibo bagabe bombi b'Abaamori abaabaire batwire seeri ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba,
okuruga Aroeri eri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni okuhika aha rushozi Sioni (egyo niyo Herumooni),
kandi na Araba yoona seeri ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, n'okuhika aha nyanja ya Araba ahansi y'orushozi Pisiga.
Musa yaayeta Abaisraeli boona, yaabagira ati: Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, muhurire ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi ndikugamba muhuriire eri izooba, mubone kubyega n'okubyorobera.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu akaragaanira naitwe endagaano ahari Horebu.
Baatatenkuriitwe tibo MUKAMA yaaragaine nabo egyo ndagaano, kureka akaragaana naitwe abari aha, abakiriho eri izooba.
MUKAMA akagamba naimwe nimureebana, ari aha rushozi ahagati omu muriro.
(Omu bunaku obwo nkeemerera ahagati ya MUKAMA naimwe okubagambira ekigambo kya MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba mukaba mutiinire ogwo muriro, timwainamuka ahari orwo rushozi.) Yaagira ati:
otarigira baaruhanga abandi nyowe ndiho.
Otaryekorera ekishushani kyona ekibaizire, n'obu kyakuba ekishushani ky'ekintu kyona ekiri ahaiguru omu iguru nari ekiri omu nsi ahansi, nari ekiri omu maizi okuzimu;

otaribiinamira, kandi otaribiheereza; ahakuba nyowe MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ndi Ruhanga w'eihato, ntura abaana eby'okushiisha bya baishebo abarikuunyanga okuhitsya aha b'obusingye bwa kashatu n'obwa kana;
kwonka abaana b'abarikunkunda bakoorobera ebiragiro byangye, mbagirira embabazi okuhitsya obusingye enkumi n'enkumi.
Ijuka okweza ekiro kya sabato; nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaakuragiire.
Omu biro mukaaga ogume okore; obe nimwo waakorera emirimo yaawe yoona;

kwonka ekiro kya mushanju niyo sabato ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; otarikoreraho omurimo gwona, iwe nari mutabani waawe, nari muhara waawe, nari omuhuuku waawe, nari omuzaana waawe, nari ente yaawe, nari endogoya yaawe, nari eki otungire kyona omu matungo gaawe, nari omunyaihanga ori omu ka yaawe; omuhuuku waawe n'omuzaana waawe bahuumure nkaiwe.
Kandi oryaguma oijukye ku waabaire ori omuhuuku omu nsi ya Misri, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akakwihayo n'omukono gw'amaani kandi ogubangire. Nikyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaakuragiriire kurinda sabato.
Kandi otariiba;
Kandi otaribeiherera mutaahi waawe;
Ku mwahuriire eiraka eririkuruga omu mwirima, mwareeba orushozi nirwaka omuriro, abeebembezi b'enganda zaanyu boona n'abakuru baanyu baanyirira haihi;
mwangira muti: Reeba MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaatworeka ekitiinisa kye n'obukuru bwe, kandi twahurira eiraka rye niriruga omu muriro; eri izooba twareeba Ruhanga ku arikugamba n'omuntu, akagumaho.
Mbwenu twaza kwitirwa ki? Guriya muriro mwingi ka gwaza kutumaraho. Ku turaagarukye kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, nitwija kufa.
Mbwenu n'oha omu bantu boona orahuriire eiraka rya Ruhanga otahwaho naagambira ahagati omu muriro, nk'oku twarihurira, akagumaho?
Ba niiwe wairira haihi, ohurire ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu arikugamba byona, otugambire ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu araakugambire byona; naitwe nitwija kubihurira, tubyorobere.
Ku mwangambiire ebigambo byanyu, MUKAMA yaabihurira; yangira ati: Mpuriire ebigambo ebi abantu abo bakugambiire; ebi bagambire byona, babigambire gye.
Nangwa ku baakugira omutima nk'ogwo gukabareetera kuntiina obutoosha n'okworobera ebiragiro byangye byona, bakaaba gye, n'oruzaaro rwabo ebiro byona.
Irooko obagire oti: Mugarukye omu mahema gaanyu.
Kwonka iwe, ogume aha ahu ndi, naanye nkugambire eki ndikuragiira kyona n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi oshemereire kubeegyesa, babone kubyoroberera omu nsi ei ndikubaha kuba eyaabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo muteho omutima, mukore nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abaragiire; mutariteishukira aha mukono gwa buryo nari ogwa bumosho.
Mugume mugyendere omu muhanda gwona ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahabwire, mubone kugumaho muri gye, muhangaarire omu nsi ei murikubuura.
Mbwenu eki nikyo kyaragiirwe n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yandagiire kubeegyesa, ngu mubone kubyoroberera omu nsi ei murikwambukamu kukubuura;
otiine MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, oyorobere ebiragiro bye byona ebyatairweho, ebi ndikukuragiira, iwe na mutabani waawe na mwijukuru waawe, ebiro byona ebi orimara omu nsi, haza obone kuhangaara.
N'ahabw'ekyo, hurira, iwe Israeli, oteho omutima, obyorobere, obone kuba gye, n'okukanyira munonga omuri egyo nsi y'amate n'obwoki, nka MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuru oku yaakuraganiise.
kandi ogume okunde MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'amagara gaawe goona, n'amaani gaawe goona.
Kandi ebigambo ebi, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, bishemereire kukuguma aha mutima;
ogume oyezirikye kubyegyesa abaana baawe, ogume obigaaniireho oshutami omu nju yaawe, nari noogyenda omu muhanda, kandi waaba nooza kubyama, kandi noimuka.
Obikome aha mukono gwawe, bibe akamanyiso, obite aha buso bwawe ahagati y'amaisho gaawe.
Oryabihandiika aha biti by'omuryango gw'enju yaawe n'aha nyigi z'amarembo gaawe.
n'amaju agaijwire ebirungi byona, agu otaraijwize, n'amaziba g'amaizi agu otarafukwire, n'emisiri y'emizaabibu n'emizeituuni ei otarabyaire, waarya, waahaaga,
oyerinde otaryebwa MUKAMA owaakwihire omu nsi ya Misri, omu nju y'obuhuuku.
Ogume otiine MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, omuheereze, n'eiziina rye obe niryo waarahira.
Mutarikuratira baaruhanga abandi ab'abanyamahanga, abahereraine naimwe;
ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe obari ahagati ni Ruhanga w'eihato; MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe nyentsya atarikugirira ekiniga, akakuhwerekyereza, akakwiha omu nsi.
Mugume mwezirikye kworobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, n'ebi yaahamize, n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho ebi yaabaragiire.
Kandi ogume okore ebihikire n'ebirungi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, obone kuba gye, oze omuri egyo nsi nungi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuru, ogikubuure,
ahabw'okubinga abazigu baawe boona omu maisho gaawe, nk'oku yaagambire.
Mutabani waawe ku arikubuuza omu biro ebiriija, naagira ati: Amakuru g'ebirikuhamya n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaabaragiire n'enki?
oryamugarukamu oti: Tukaba turi abahuuku ba Faraho omuri Misri; MUKAMA yaatwiha omuri Misri n'omukono gw'amaani;
yaayoreka obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza eby'amaani ebirikusaasa, naabikora ahari Misri na Faraho n'eka ye yoona omu maisho gaitu;
yaatwihayo, ngu atureete omu nsi ei yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe ku arigituha.
Kandi MUKAMA yaaturagiira kworobera ebyo biragiro byona, n'okutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, ngu tubone kuba gye ebiro byona, kandi ngu akize amagara gaitu okufa, nk'oku kiri n'eri izooba.
Ku turitaho omutima, twayorobera ebyo biragiro byona omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, nk'oku yaaturagiire, kiryatubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira.

MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku arikuhitsya omu nsi ei orikuza kukubuura, yaabinga amahanga maingi omu maisho gaawe, Abahiiti, Abagirugashi, Abaamori, Abanyakanaani, Abaperizi, Abahiivi n'Abayebusi, amahanga mushanju agarikubakira obuhango n'amaani,
kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku ariheza kugahayo omu maisho gaawe, waagasingura, ogacwekyerereze kimwe; otarigira endagaano yoona ei waaragaana nabo, kandi otaribagirira esaasi;
otarishwererana nabo, kuhingira muhara waawe mutabani waabo, nari mutabani waawe kumushwererera muhara waabo;
ahabw'okuba baryahindura mutabani waawe arekye kunkurata, kureka aheereze baaruhanga abandi; haza kireetere MUKAMA kukugirira ekiniga, n'okurahuka kukucwekyereza.
Kwonka oku nikwo muribatwaza; muryasheenya amatambiro gaabo, musheenyagure enyomyo zaabo z'amabaare ezi baayombekire, mutemagure Ashera zaabo, kandi mwotsye ebishushani byabo ebibaizire.
Ekyareeteire MUKAMA kubakunda n'okubatoorana, ti habw'okugira ngu mukaba muri eihanga eririkukira agandi obuhango; ahakuba mukaba muri eihanga eririkukira obukye omu gandi goona;

kureka akabatoorana ahabw'okubakunda, yaayenda ngu ahikiirize endahiro ei yaarahiire baashwenkuriimwe. Nikyo MUKAMA yaabaihiireyo n'omukono gw'amaani, akabacungura okubaiha omu nju y'obuhuuku n'omu mukono gwa Faraho omugabe wa Misri.
N'ahabw'ekyo omanye ngu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe niwe Ruhanga, Ruhanga omwesigwa, orikurinda endagaano, akagirira embabazi abarikumukunda bakoorobera ebiragiro bye okuhitsya obusingye rukumi,
oihura abamwanga okubacwekyereza nibareebana; taryeganda kwihura orikumwanga, kureka aryamwihura nibareebana.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogume oyorobere ekiragiro kye, n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba.
Bwanyima ahabw'okuhurira ebirikuragiirwa ebyo, n'okubirinda noobyorobera, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryagumizamu ahitsye endagaano n'okukugirira embabazi, ebi yaaragaine na baashwenkuru;

kandi aryakukunda, akuhe omugisha, akukanyise; kandi aryaha omugisha abaana b'enda yaawe, n'ebyana by'eitaka ryawe, n'engano zaawe, na viinyo yaawe, n'amajuta gaawe g'emizeituuni, n'okukanya kw'ente zaawe n'okw'abaana b'obusyo bw'entaama zaawe omu nsi ei yaaragaine na baashwenkuru kukuha.
Oryaheebwa omugisha okukira agandi mahanga goona; tiharibaho mushaija nari omukazi oriba engumba omuriimwe, nari omu matungo gaanyu.
MUKAMA aryakwihaho endwara zoona; kandi tarikurwaza ndwara mbi yoona aha ndwara za Misri ezi murikumanya; kureka aryazirwaza boona abarikukwanga.
Oryacwekyereza amahanga goona agu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arihayo ahariiwe; amaisho gaawe gatarigasaasira; kandi naimwe mutariheereza baaruhanga baabo, ahabw'okuba ekyo kiryababeera omutego.
Ku origira omu mutima gwawe oti: Amahanga aga nigankiza amaani; nimbaasa nta kuganyaga?
otarigatiina, kureka oijukye ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaakoreire Faraho na Misri yoona,

ebigyezo by'amaani ebi amaisho gaawe gaareebire, obumanyiso, eby'okutangaaza, n'omukono gw'amaani kandi ogubangire, ebi MUKAMA yaakwihiiseyo; nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arigira amahanga goona agu orikutiina.
Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryayohereza enwa, zibateere, okuhitsya obu abo abariba batsigaireho babeesherekire, baricwekyererezibwa omu maisho gaawe.
Otaribatiina, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ari omuriiwe, Ruhanga omukuru kandi orikutiinisa.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryabingamu ago mahanga, gakurugyeho mporampora; orekye kugamaraho ahonaaho, enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba zikakukanyaho, zikarengyesereza.
Kureka MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryagahayo omu maisho gaawe, agarabanisemu munonga, okuhitsya obu garihwerekyerera.

Kandi n'abagabe baabo aryabahayo omu mukono gwawe, naiwe oryabacwekyereza, eiziina ryabo ryebere kimwe ahansi y'eiguru; tihariho muntu weena oribaasa kukuza omu kaso, okuhitsya obu oribamariraho kimwe.

Ebishushani bya baaruhanga baabo ebibaizire oryabyotsya omu muriro; otaryetenga efeeza nari ezaabu eriba ebiriho, n'obu kwakuba okugyetwarira, nyentsya okagwa omu mutego gwayo; ahabw'okuba n'ekihagaro ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Kandi otarireeta ekihagaro omu nju yaawe, okakyeenwa nkakyo; oryakyangira kimwe, okinugire kimwe, ahakuba n'ekintu ekikyeenirwe.
Ebiragiro byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba, muryabitaho omutima, mubyorobere, mubone kugumaho mukakanya, mukaza omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe, mukagikubuura.

Oryaguma oijukye omuhanda gwona ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaakurabizemu omu ihamba emyaka egi yoona makumi ana, kukucwa eishaija, naakugyeza ngu amanye ebiri omu mutima gwawe, yaaba orayorobere ebiragiro bye, nari otarikwija kubyorobera.

Yaakucureeza, yaakureka waagira enjara, yaakugaburira emaanu ei waabaire otakamanyaga, n'obu baakuba baashwenkuru, ngu akumanyise ku omuntu atatungwa by'okurya byonka, kureka ku atungwa ekigambo kyona ekiruga omu kanwa ka Ruhanga.
Ebijwaro byawe tibirakukuriireho, n'ekigyere kyawe tikirazimbire, emyaka egyo yoona makumi ana.
Kandi omanye omu mutima gwawe ku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akuhana, nk'oku omuntu ahana omwana we.
Oryakwata ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe noogyendera omu mihanda ye, noomutiina;
ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe naakutwara omu nsi enungi, erimu otugyera tw'amaizi, n'enshuro n'ebiyanja by'amaizi maraingwa agarikuhimintika nigaruga omu mpanga n'omu bibungo;
ensi ey'engano na sayiri n'emizaabibu n'emitiini kandi n'amakomamahanga; ensi y'amajuta g'emizeituuni n'obwoki;
ensi ei oriryamu eby'okurya bitatuube, kandi ei otarikyeneramu kintu kyona; ei amabaare gaayo gari obutare, kandi ei oritimba emiringa omu bibungo byayo.
Oryarya, oigute, osiime MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ahabw'ensi nungi ei akuhaire.
Oyerinde otaryebwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, okanga kworobera ebiragiro bye, n'ebi yaaragiire, n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba.
Ku oriba waariire waigutsire, waayombekire enju nungi, waazitwiremu,
amasyo gaawe g'ente n'ag'entaama ku gariba gaakanyire, efeeza n'ezaabu zaawe nazo zaakanya, n'ebi otungire byona byakanya,
oyerinde omutima gwawe gutaryehimbisa, okeebwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe owaakwihire omu nsi ya Misri, omu nju y'obuhuuku,

akakurabya omuri eryo ihamba rihango kandi eririkutiinisa, eri waashangiremu enjoka z'obushegu oburikubabiirira na skorupio, n'ensi y'empaama etarimu maizi, owaakwihiire amaizi omu rukiri rugumire munonga;
owaakugabuririire emaanu omu ihamba, ei baashwenkuru baabaire batakamanyaga; ngu akucwe eishaija, akugyeze abone kukukora gye aha muheru.
Oyerinde otarigira omu mutima gwawe oti: Obushoboorozi bwangye n'amaani gangye nibyo byampaisize obutungi obu bwona.
Oryaguma oijukye MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ahakuba niwe akubaasisa kutunga eitungo ngu abone kuhamya endagaano ei yaaragaine na baashwenkuru naarahira, nk'oku kiri eri izooba.
Kwonka ku oryebwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, waakuratira baaruhanga abandi, waabaheereza, kandi waabaramya, ninkumanyisiza kimwe eri izooba ku otaribura kuhwerekyerera.
Nk'amahanga agu MUKAMA arikuhwerekyerereza omu maisho gaanyu, nikwo naimwe murihwerekyerera, ahabw'okwanga kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
n'abantu bahango kandi baraingwa beene Anaki, abu orikumanya, kandi abu orahuriire nibagambaho bati: N'oha orikubaasa kuza aba Anaki omu kaso?

Eri izooba omanye ngu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe niwe ogwo oraayambukye, akwebembeire nk'omuriro gurikurya busha; niwe araabacwekyereze, akabagomoorera omu maisho gaawe; naiwe oryababingamu, obahwerekyereze ahonaaho, nk'oku MUKAMA yaakugambiire.

Torikuza omu nsi yaabo kugikubuura ahabw'okuhikiirira kwawe nari okugororoka kw'omutima gwawe, kureka ahabw'obubi bw'ago mahanga nikyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikubabingira omu maisho gaawe, kandi ngu abone kuhamya ekigambo eki yaarahiire naaraganisa baashwenkuru, Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo.
N'ahabw'ekyo omanye MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku atarikukuha nsi egi kugikubuura ahabw'okuhikiirira kwawe; ahabw'okuba ori eihanga ery'ebitsya bigangaire.
Oijukye, kandi oteebwa oku waitsize MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ekiniga omu ihamba; okwiha aha izooba eri waarugiireho omu nsi ya Misri, n'okuhitsya obu muhikire aha, mukaba mugomera MUKAMA.
Kandi n'ahari Horebu mukaitsizaho MUKAMA ekiniga, yaabagirira ekiniga, yaayenda kubacwekyereza.

Ku nainamukire aha rushozi kwakiira ebishate biri eby'amabaare, nibyo bishate by'endagaano ei MUKAMA yaaragaine naimwe, naamara ahari orwo rushozi ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro; nkaba ntarya kintu kyona, n'obu kwakuba okunywa amaizi.

MUKAMA yampa ebyo bishate bibiri by'amabaare ebihandiiikirweho orukumu rwa Ruhanga; bikaba biriho ebigambo byona ebi MUKAMA agambiire naimwe ahari orwo rushozi, ari ahagati omu muriro, aha izooba ry'okuteeraniraho.
Ebyo biro makumi ana ku byahweire, MUKAMA yampa ebyo bishate bibiri by'amabaare, nibyo bishate by'endagaano;
yangira ati: Imuka, orugye aha, orahukye oshuume; ahabw'okuba abantu baawe abu waihire Misri, beesiisire; baarahuka kuteishuka omuhanda ogu naabaragiire kutoora; baayeheeshera ekishushani.
Kandi MUKAMA yangira ati: Ndeebire eihanga eri, reeba n'eihanga ry'ebitsya bigangaire;
reka mbacwekyereze, eiziina ryabo ryebere kimwe ahansi y'eiguru, nkuhindure eihanga eririkubakiza amaani n'ekitiinisa.
Naanye naahinduka, naaruga aha rushozi, kandi orwo rushozi rukaba nirwaka omuriro; ebyo bishate bibiri by'amabaare nkaba mbiine omu ngaro zombi.
Ku naayetegyereize, naareeba mucumwire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mweheesheire ekishushani ky'enyana omu zaabu, muteishukire omuhanda ogu MUKAMA yaabaire abaragiire kutoora.
Naakwata ebyo bishate bibiri by'amabaare, ebyabaire bindi omu ngaro zombi, naabiteera ahansi, naabyatira omu maisho gaanyu.

Naagwa ahansi omu maisho ga MUKAMA nk'okubanza, okumara ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro; tinaarya kintu kyona, n'obu kwakuba okunywa amaizi, ahabw'ekibi kyanyu kyona eki mwakozire, nimukora ekirikwangwa MUKAMA, kumwitsa ekiniga.
Ahakuba nkatiina ahabw'ekiniga n'okubiihirwa kwingi, ebi MUKAMA yaabagiriire, akenda kubacwekyereza. Kwonka omuri obwo bunaku nabwo MUKAMA yampurira.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagirira Arooni ekiniga kingi, yaayenda kumwita; omuri obwo bunaku na Arooni nawe naamushabira.

Naakwata ekibi kyanyu, nikyo kishushani ky'enyana eki mwaheesire, naakyotsya omu muriro, naakihondahonda, naakisa, naakicwa obunono; esaano yaakyo naaginaga omu kagyera akaabaire nikaruga omu rushozi.
Kandi n'ahari Tabera na Maasa na Kibiroosi-hatava mukaitsa MUKAMA ekiniga.
Kandi n'obu MUKAMA yaabatumira Kadeshi-barunea, naagira ati: Mwinamukye, mukubuure ensi ei mbahaire; nabwo mukagomera ekiragiro kya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, timwamwikiriza, n'obu kwakuba okumuhurira.
Mukaba mugomera MUKAMA, okwiha aha izooba eria naatandikiireho kubamanya.
Ntyo naajuumara ahansi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, okumara ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro, ahakuba MUKAMA akagamba ku arikwija kubacwekyereza.
Naashaba MUKAMA nti: Ai Mukama RUHANGA, otacwekyereza abantu baawe, nibwo buhunguzi bwawe, abu waacungwize ekitiinisa kyawe, okabaiha omuri Misri n'omukono gw'amaani.
Ijuka abairu baawe Abarahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo; oteeta aha bugangaazi bw'aba bantu, nari aha bubi bwabo n'ekibi kyabo;
abantu b'omu nsi ei waatwihiremu batakaagira ngu MUKAMA akaremwa kubahitsya omu nsi ei yaabaraganiise, kandi ngu ahabw'okubanga, akabaihayo kubaitira omu ihamba.
Haza kunu bari abantu baawe, kandi obuhunguzi bwawe, abu waihireyo n'omukono gwawe ogw'amaani kandi ogubangire.
naanye niinyija kuhandiika ahari ebyo bishate ebigambo ebyabaire biri aha bishate by'okubanza, ebi waayatsire, obite omuri egyo shanduukye.
Ntyo naabaija eshanduukye y'omunyinya, n'ebishate bibiri by'amabaare ebirikushusha eby'okubanza, nainamuka aha rushozi, nyine ebyo bishate byombi omu ngaro.
Yaabihandiikaho ebiragiro ikumi, nk'oku yaahandiikire aha by'okubanza ebi MUKAMA yaabagambiriire aha rushozi ari ahagati omu muriro aha izooba eri mwateeraniireho; MUKAMA yaabimpa.
Naahinduka, naashuuma okuruga ahari orwo rushozi, naabita omu shanduukye ei naabaizire; kandi nimwo biri, nk'oku MUKAMA yandagiire.
Abaisraeli bakaimutsya orugyendo okuruga Beeroosi-beene-yakani, baaza Mosera; okwo niyo Arooni yaagwire, kandi niyo yaaziikirwe; Eleazaari omutabani yaakora omurimo g'wobunyamurwa omu mwanya gwe.
Okuruga aho baimutsya orugyendo, baaza Gudigoda; baaruga Gudigoda, baaza Yotibaasa, ensi y'otugyera tw'amaizi.

Omu bunaku obwo nimwo MUKAMA yaashorooreire oruganda rwa Leevi kuguma nibaheeka eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, n'okwemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA nibamuheereza, kandi n'okushabira abantu omugisha omu iziina rye, nk'oku kiri na hati.
Nikyo Abaleevi batagirira mugabo n'obu bwakuba obuhunguzi omuri beene waabo; MUKAMA niwe buhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaabagambiire.)
Naaguma ahari orwo rushozi okumara ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro, nk'okubanza; obwo nabwo MUKAMA yampurira, tiyaayenda kubacwekyereza.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Imuka ogyende, oyebembere abo bantu, baze omu nsi ei naarahiire kuha baishenkurubo, bagikubuure.
Mbwenu Israeli, ekindi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe naakwenza ki? T'okutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, okugyendera omu mihanda ye yoona, okumukunda, okumuheereza n'omutima gwawe gwona n'amagara gaawe goona,
n'okukwata ebiragiro bye n'ebi yaataireho, ebi ndikukuragiira hati ngu obe gye?
Reeba, eiguru, n'eiguru eriri ahaiguru y'agandi, n'ensi n'ebirimu byona n'ebya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, MUKAMA akata omutima ahari baashwenkuru, yaabakunda okukira agandi mahanga goona, yaatoorana oruzaaro rwabo orwakuratsireho, nibo imwe nk'oku kiri na hati.
