N'ahabw'ekyo mushare ekishushu eky'aha mitima yaanyu, murekye kugaruka kuba ab'ebitsya bigangaire.
Ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ni Ruhanga wa baaruhanga, kandi MUKAMA w'abakama, Ruhanga omukuru ow'amaani kandi orikutiinisa, otashoroora mu bantu, kandi otarya nguzi,
ocwera efuuzi n'abafaakazi emanja z'oburyo, kandi okunda omunyaihanga, akamuha eby'okurya n'eby'okujwara.
N'ahabw'ekyo mukunde abanyamahanga, ahakuba naimwe mukaba muri abanyaihanga omu nsi ya Misri.
Oryaguma otiine MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; obe niwe waaheereza, omuhamireho, kandi eiziina rye obe niryo waarahira.
Niwe kwesiima kwawe kandi Ruhanga waawe, owaakukoreire ebikuru biri kandi ebirikutiinisa, ebi waayereebeire.
Baashwenkuru bakashuuma Misri, bari abantu makumi mushanju; mbwenu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe abagizire baingi nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru.
N'ahabw'ekyo oryaguma okunde MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, orinde obutoosha ebi yaakukwatsize, n'ebyatairweho, n'ebyaragiirwe, n'ebiragiro bye.

Eri izooba mumanye ebi, (ahakuba tindikugambira baana baanyu, abatakabimanyire n'obu kwakuba okubireeba), muteekateekye aha kuhana kwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, obukuru bwe, omukono gwe gw'amaani kandi ogubangire,
obumanyiso bwe n'ebi yaakozire Faraho omugabe wa Misri n'ensi ye yoona omu nsi ya Misri;

n'ebi yaakozire eihe rya Misri n'embaraasi zaabo n'ebigaari byabo; oku yaagarwire amaizi g'Enyanja erikutukura gakabashweka babakuratiire, MUKAMA akabacwekyerereza kimwe, batagarukye kwimutsya omutwe n'okuhitsya hati;
n'ebi yaabakozire muri omu ihamba, okuhitsya obu mwahikire aha;

n'ebi yaakozire Dasani na Abiraamu beene Eliabu, mutabani wa Reubeeni, oku eitaka ryayashamire rikabamira n'ab'omu maka gaabo n'amahema gaabo n'ebintu byona ebihuriire ebi baabaire nibagyenda nabyo, bikacwekyererera ahagati y'Abaisraeli boona;
ahakuba amaisho gaanyu gakeereebera ebikuru byona ebi MUKAMA yaakozire.
Nikyo mushemerereire kukwata ebiragiro byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba, mubone kuba ab'amaani, muze omu nsi ei murikuza kwambukamu kukubuura, ku eba eyaanyu,
kandi mubone kuhangaarira omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe n'oruzaaro rwabo, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki.
Ahakuba ensi ei murikuzamu kukubuura ti nk'eya Misri ei mwarugiremu, ei mwabaire mubiba embibo, mukareetamu amaizi n'ebigyere byanyu, nk'oku bagira omusiri gw'emboga;
kureka ensi ei murikuzamu kukubuura, n'ensi y'ebibungo n'empanga erikuguubwamu amaizi g'enjura erikuruga omu iguru,
n'ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikutaho omutima; kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu atuura agitaireho amaisho, okwiha aha kutandika kw'omwaka okuhitsya aha muheru gwagwo.
Ku muryezirika kworobera ebiragiro byangye ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba, okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, n'okumuheereza n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona,
naanye ndyagwisiza ensi yaanyu enjura omu bunaku bwayo, ey'eibiba n'eya katumba, mubone kushaaruura engano zaanyu, na viinyo yaanyu n'amajuta gaanyu g'emizeituuni.
Ndyameza obunyaatsi omu mariisizo gaanyu ahabw'amatungo gaanyu, murye, mwigute.
Mwerinde, emitima yaanyu etaribeihwa-beihwa, mukateishuka, mukaheereza baaruhanga abandi, mukabaramya,
MUKAMA akabagirira ekiniga kingi, akakinga eiguru, enjura ekabura, ensi ekareka kweza emyaka yaayo, mukarahuka kuhwerekyerera, mukahwa omu nsi enungi ei MUKAMA arikubaha.
N'ahabw'ekyo mute ebigambo byangye ebi aha mitima yaanyu n'omu magara gaanyu, mubikome aha mikono yaanyu bibe akamanyiso, mubite aha buso bwanyu ahagati y'amaisho gaanyu.
Mugume mubyegyese abaana baanyu, mubigaaniireho mushutami omu maka gaanyu, nimugyenda omu muhanda, nimuza kubyama, kandi nimwimuka.
Muryabihandiika aha biti by'emiryango y'amaju gaanyu n'aha nyigi z'amarembo gaanyu;
ebiro byanyu n'eby'abaana baanyu bibone kukanya omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe omwanya gwona ogu eiguru ririmara riri ahaiguru y'ensi.
Ahakuba ku muryezirika kukwata ebiragiro ebi byona ebi ndikubaragiira, mwabyorobera, okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, n'okugyendera omu mihanda ye yoona, n'okumuhamiraho,
obwo MUKAMA aryabinga amahanga ago goona omu maisho gaanyu, kandi muryakubuura amahanga agarikubakira obukuru n'amaani.
Omwanya gwona ogu muriribatamu n'ebigyere byanyu guryaba ogwanyu; omwatano gwanyu guryatandikira aha ihamba na Lebanooni, n'aha mugyera Furaati, guhikye aha Nyanja y'oburengyerwa-izooba.
Tihaine muntu weena oribaasa kubaza omu kaso; MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryaitsa obwoba ensi yoona ei muriribatamu, kandi agireetere okutiina ahabwanyu, nk'oku yaabaraganiise.
omugisha ku muryorobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba,
n'omukyeeno ku muryanga kworobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mwateishuka omuhanda ogu ndikubaragiira eri izooba, mwakuratira baaruhanga abandi abu mutakamanyaga.
Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ku aribahitsya omu nsi ei murikuza kukubuura, muryata omugisha aha rushozi Gerizimu n'omukyeeno aha rushozi Ebali.
Enshozi ezo tiziri seeri ya Yorudani, oburengyerwa-izooba bw'omuhanda omu nsi y'Abanyakanaani, abatwire omuri Araba, ahashungaine na Gilugaali, aha rubaju rw'emyela ya Moore?
Ahakuba nimwija kwambuka Yorudani kuza omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kukubuura, kandi kwo muryagikubuura, mugituuremu.
Kandi muryaguma mute omutima aha biragiro ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe byona, ebi ndikuta omu maisho gaanyu eri izooba, mubyorobere.
Mutaribura kusheenya emyanya yoona ei amahanga agu murikwija kunyaga, gaabaire gaheererezamu baaruhanga baago, ey'aha nshozi ndaingwa, n'aha bibungo, n'ey'ahansi ya buri kiti ekyetwa omurinzi;

kandi muryasheenya amatambiro gaabo, musheenyagure enyomyo zaabo z'amabaare ezi baayombekire, mwotsye Ashera zaabo n'omuriro, mutemagure ebishushani bya baaruhanga baabo ebibaizire; mumareho eiziina ryabo omu mwanya ogwo.
Kwonka imwe tikwo murigirira MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu;
kureka muryasherura omwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aritoorana omu nganda zaanyu zoona kuba nigwo yaatamu eiziina rye, akagugira Obutaaho bwe;

okwo niyo muriguma nimuza, kandi okwo niyo muriguma nimureeta ebitambo byanyu eby'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo, na kimwe kya ikumi kyanyu, n'empongano ezi muhonga, n'ebi muhayo ahabw'okuhiga, n'ebi muhayo mweyendeire, n'emijigaijo y'amasyo gaanyu g'ente n'ag'entaama;
okwo niyo muririira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, niyo imwe n'ab'omu maka gaanyu murishemerererwa ekintu kyona eki muritaho engaro, eki MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ariba abaheereiremu omugisha.
Mutarikora nk'ebi byona ebi turikukora omu bunaku obu, obu buri muntu arikukora eki arikusiima;
ahabw'okuba timukahikire h'okuhuumurira n'omu buhunguzi obu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha.
Kwonka ku muryambuka Yorudani, mwatuura omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kuhungura, yaabahuumuza engamba z'abazigu baanyu boona abariba babeehinguririize, ngu mubone kugituuramu buhooro,

obwo muryaguma nimureeta ebi ndikubaragiira byona omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye, ebitambo byanyu eby'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo, na kimwe kya ikumi kyanyu, n'empongano ezi muhonga n'ebi muritoorana kuragaanisa kuhayo ahari MUKAMA;

kandi muryayesiimira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, imwe na batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu n'abahuuku baanyu n'abazaana baanyu, n'Abaleevi abari omu maka gaanyu, ahakuba tibaine mugabo n'obu bwakuba obuhunguzi omuriimwe.
Mwerinde mutaritambira ebitambo byanyu ahu murishanga hoona;
kureka omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana omuri rumwe aha nganda zaanyu, mube nimwo mwatambira ebitambo byanyu by'okwotsya, kandi mube nimwo mwakorera ebi ndikubaragiira byona.

Kwonka nimwikirizibwa kwita enyamaishwa n'okurya enyama yaazo nk'oku murikwenda, omu maka gaanyu goona, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ariba abahaire omugisha; abatashemeire n'abashemeire boona nibaikirizibwa kugiryaho, nk'oku barya esirabo n'empara.
Kwonka mutarirya eshagama, kureka muryagyata ahansi nk'amaizi.

Kandi kimwe kya ikumi ky'engano zaanyu n'ekya viinyo yaanyu n'eky'amajuta gaanyu g'emizeituuni, n'emijigaijo y'amasyo gaanyu g'ente n'ag'entaama, n'ekintu kyona eki mwaraganiise kuhayo, n'eki murihayo n'omutima ogweyendeire, n'empongano ezi murihonga, ebyo byona mutaribiriira omu maka gaanyu;

kureka muryabiriira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu omu mwanya ogu aritoorana, imwe na batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu n'abahuuku baanyu n'abazaana baanyu n'Abaleevi abari omu maka gaanyu; kandi muryayesiimira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu omuri byona ebi muritaho engaro.
Mwerinde mutaryebwa Omuleevi ebiro byona ebi murimara omu nsi yaanyu.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku arihangusya ensi yaawe nk'oku yaakuraganiise, waagira oti: Niinyenda kurya enyama, ahakuba amagara gangye niyo gakunda; oryaikirizibwa kurya enyama nk'oku orikwenda.

Omwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba atooraine kugumyamu eiziina rye, ku guriba gukuri hare, oryaita omu masyo gaawe g'ente n'ag'entaama agu MUKAMA yaakuhaire, nk'oku naakuragiire; oryariira omu ka yaawe nk'oku orikwenda kwona.
Nk'oku barya esirabo n'empara, nikwo orirya egyo nyama; abatashemeire n'abashemeire boona nibaikirizibwa kugirya.
Kwonka eki oryerinda, n'okurya eshagama; ahakuba eshagama n'amagara; n'ahabw'ekyo otarirya enyama n'amagara gaayo.
Otarigirya, kureka oryagyata ahansi nk'amaizi.
Otarigirya, obone kuba gye, hamwe n'abaana baawe abarikurataho, ku oriba waakozire ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA.
Kwonka ebintu byanyu ebirikwera, ebi oshemereire kuhonga, n'empongano zaawe z'ebi oragaanisa noohiga, oryabitwara, oze omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana,
otambire ebitambo byawe eby'okwotsya, enyama n'eshagama, aha itambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; eshagama y'ebitambo byawe eryashukwa aha itambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, reero enyama ogirye.

Ogume oteho omutima kuhurira ebigambo ebi byona ebi ndikukuragiira, obone kuba gye ebiro byona hamwe n'abaana baawe abarikurataho, ku oriba waakozire ebirungi kandi ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.

oyerinde otaritegwa kugakuratira gaherize kuhwerekyerezibwa omu maisho gaawe, okabuuririza ebya baaruhanga baabo noogira oti: Amahanga aga gakaba gaheereza gata baaruhanga baago? naanye nkabona kutwaza ntyo.

Kwonka iwe tikwo origirira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; ahakuba bo bakaba bakorera baaruhanga baabo buri kintu kyona ekirikunugwa eki MUKAMA ayanga; nangwa na batabani baabo na bahara baabo nabo babookyeza baaruhanga baabo omu muriro.
Eki ndikubaragiira kyona, nikyo mushemereire kutaho omutima kukora; mutarikyongyeraho, kandi mutarikicwaho.
kandi ako kamanyiso nari eky'okutangaaza ekyo eki abagambiireho kyahikiirira, yagaruka yaagira ati: Ka tukuratire baaruhanga abandi abu mutakamanyaga, tubaheereze;

mutarihurira ebigambo bya nabi ogwo nari eby'ogwo murootsi w'ebirooto; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryaba naabagyeza, kumanya ku muraabe nimukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona.
Muryaguma mukuratire MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mumutiine, mukwate ebiragiro bye, muhurire eiraka rye, mumuheereze, kandi mumuhamireho.

Kandi nabi ogwo, nari ogwo murootsi w'ebirooto, aryaitwa, ahabw'okubagambira eby'okugomera MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, akabacungura omu nju y'obuhuuku, n'ahabw'okubateishura omuhanda ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabaragiire kugyenderamu. Ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekibi omuriimwe.

Murumuna waawe, omwana wa nyoko, nari mutabani waawe, nari muhara waawe, nari omukazi waawe ow'aha mukono, nari munywani waawe ow'aha mara, ku arikwosyosya omu mubonano naagira ati: Ija, tuze kuheereza baaruhanga abandi, abu otakamanyaga, n'obu baakuba baashwenkuru,
baaruhanga b'amahanga agabeehinguririize agari haihi naimwe, nari agabari hare, okuruga aha muheru gw'ensi, okuhika aha gundi;
otarimwikiriza n'obu kwakuba okumuhurira; otarimureebesa eriisho ry'esaasi, otarimusaasira, kandi otarimushereka,
kureka buzimazima oryamwita; omukono gwawe gube nigwo gwamubanza, bwanyima hateho ey'abandi boona;
oryamuteera amabaare, afe, ahabw'okuba ayenzire kukubeihabeiha, ngu akwihe ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, owaakwihire omu nsi ya Misri, omu nju y'obuhuuku.
Kandi Abaisraeli boona baryakihurira, batiine, tibarigaruka kukora kibi ekirikwingana kityo omuriimwe.
hariho abantu babi abarugire omuriimwe, bakoosyosya abatwire omu rurembo rwabo, nibagira bati: Ka tugyende tuheereze baaruhanga abandi, abu mutakamanyaga;
obibuuririze, obikuratirire, obicondooze; ku orishanga biri eby'amazima bitarikubanganisibwa, ku ekihagaro ekirikushusha kityo kikoreirwe omuriimwe,
otaribura kwitsa ab'omuri orwo rurembo rurara, okarucwekyerereza kimwe n'ebirimu byona hamwe n'amatungo gaamwo.

Eminyago yaamwo yoona oryagirunda ahu emihanda erikuteeranira, oyotsye orwo rurembo n'eminyago yaamwo yoona, nk'oku bootsya ekitambo eky'okwokyeza kimwe ekitambiirwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu; orwo rurembo ruryaguma ruri omutuumo ebiro byona; tiruryombekwa bundi.
Otarigira ekintu kyona eki waagumya omu ngaro ahari ebyo ebyashorooreirwe MUKAMA, abone kureka ekiniga kye kingi, akugirire embabazi n'esaasi, akukanyise, nk'oku yaaraganiise baashwenkuru naarahira;
ku origuma noohurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, nookwata ebiragiro bye byona, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, nookora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Ahakuba muri eihanga eryereziibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, kandi MUKAMA akabatoorana omu mahanga goona ag'omu nsi kuba eihanga rye eri yaayetooraniire.
Otarirya ekintu kyona ekirikuzira.
Ezi nizo nyamaishwa ezi murikwikirizibwa kurya-ente, entaama, embuzi,
empara, esirabo, esa, enkorongo, enyemera, n'ekihondamabaare.
Omu nyamaishwa zoona buri nyamaishwa eyatsizemu ebyara, eine ebigyere by'ebyara bibiri, kandi erikwekuuma, mube niyo mwaguma nimurya.
Kwonka omuri ezo ezirikwekuuma, nari ezaatsizemu ebyara, ezi mutarizirya: engamira, orumi n'endirira, ahabw'okuba zeekuuma, kwonka tizaatsizemu byara; zibe ezirikuzira ahariimwe;
kandi empunu, ahabw'okuba eyatsizemu ebyara, kwonka teyekuuma; ahariimwe nikizira; mutarirya enyama yaazo, n'obu kwakuba okukora aha mitumbi yaazo.
Ahari byona eby'omu maizi ebi nibyo murikwikirizibwa kurya: ebiine amapapa n'engamba, mube nibyo mwarya;
ekitaine mapapa na ngamba mutarikirya; ahariimwe nikizira.
Enyonyi zoona ezitarikuzira nimwikirizibwa kuzirya.
Kwonka ezi nizo mutarikwikirizibwa kuryaeishamba, empungumareere, kaamushungu-shungu,
ekyanira, nyakabaka n'oruganda rwayo,
ekikoona kyona n'oruganda rwakyo,
maaya, ekishoma-bwire, enyangi, akaca n'oruganda rwako,
ekihihizi ekikye n'ekihango, enyawaawa,
nyamunyonyi, ekihuhura-bahuta, ekiyoyo,
enkongoro, oruyongoyongo n'oruganda rwarwo, enkooherwa, n'orubaka.
Ebikooko byona ebiine amapapa, ebirikugyendesa amaguru ahariimwe nibizira; mutaribirya;
kureka enyonyi zoona ezitarikuzira nizo murikwikirizibwa kurya.
Mutarirya ekintu kyona ekyefeereire; nimwikirizibwa kukiha omunyaihanga otwire naimwe, akirye; nari shi nimwikirizibwa kukiguza omunyaihanga; ahakuba muri eihanga eryereziibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mutariteeka omwana gw'embuzi omu mahenehene ga nyinagwo.

Kandi oryaguma oriire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe omu mwanya ogu aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye, kimwe kya ikumi ky'engano zaawe, n'ekya viinyo yaawe n'eky'amajuta gaawe g'emizeituuni, n'emijigaijo y'amasyo gaawe g'ente n'ag'entaama, obone kwega kuguma nootiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Obundi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku ariheza kukuha omugisha, orugyendo ruryakubeera ruraingwa, oremwe kukitwarayo ahabw'omwanya kukuba hare ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba atooraine kugumyamu eiziina rye.
Ku kiriba kyabaire kityo, oryabiihamu efeeza, ozizingirire, ozitware omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba atooraine;

oziguremu ebi orikwenda byona, yaaba nte, nari entaama, nari viinyo, nari eky'okunywa eky'amaani, nari ekindi kyona eki omutima gwawe gurikwenda; obiriire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'ab'omu ka yaawe boona, mushemererwe.
Kandi n'Omuleevi otwire naiwe otarimwebwa, ahabw'okuba taine mugabo n'obu bwakuba obuhunguzi omuriimwe.
Aha muheru gwa buri myaka eshatu oryaiha aha bi oyerize omuri ogwo mwaka kimwe kya ikumi, okibiikye omu ka yaawe;

reero Omuleevi ahabw'okutagira mugabo n'obu bwakuba obuhunguzi omuriimwe, n'omunyaihanga, n'efuuzi, n'omufaakazi, abatwire naiwe, nabo baije, barye, bahaagye, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe abone kukuha omugisha omu mirimo yoona ei oriba nookora n'emikono yaawe.

Ogu nigwo muringo ogu murihamu obusingye: buri muntu weena oriba aine ou arikwihuza, aryareka ekyo eki yaagurize mutaahi we; atarikiihuza mutaahi we nari mwene ishe; ahabw'okuba okuha obusingye, okuragiirwe MUKAMA, kuherize kurangwa.
Noikirizibwa kwihuza omunyaihanga; kwonka ekintu kyawe kyona ekiinwe mwene waanyu, oryakimurekyera.
Kwonka ku orihurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, waataho omutima kworobera ebiragiro ebyo byona ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba,
tiharibaho booro omuriimwe; ahakuba MUKAMA taribura kukuha omugisha omu nsi ei MUKAMA arikukuha kukubuura kuba obuhunguzi;
ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryakuha omugisha, nk'oku yaakuraganiise; oryaguza amahanga maingi, kwonka iwe torigeeguzaho; oryategyeka amahanga maingi, kwonka go tigarikutegyeka.
kureka omushashaanurire engaro, omuguze ekirikubaasa kumumarira obukyene bw'ekyo eki akyenire.

Oyerinde otarigira ekiteekateeko ky'obufura bukye omu mutima gwawe, okagira oti: Omwaka gwa mushanju ogw'okuha obusingye guri haihi; okareeba mwene waanyu eriisho ribi, okanga kugira eki waamuha, nawe akatakira MUKAMA naakutabaariza, haza kikakurugiramu ekibi.

Otaribura kumuha; kandi ku orimuha, otaritsigara noonyomwa omu mutima; ahabw'okuba ahabw'ekigambo ekyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryakuha omugisha omu mirimo yaawe yoona n'omuri byona ebi orikora n'emikono yaawe.
Mumanye ngu abooro tibarihwa mu nsi; nikyo ndikukuragiirira nti: Otaribura kushashaanurira mwene waanyu engaro, omukyene n'omworo abari omu nsi yaawe.
Ku barikuguza mwene waanyu Omuheburaayo nari Omuheburaayokazi, akukorere emyaka mukaaga; omu gwa mushanju omurekure, agyende n'obusingye.
Kandi ku orimurekura, otarimureka, akagyenda engaro nsha;
kureka oryamuha aha bi otungire omu masyo gaawe, n'eby'aha mbuga yaawe, n'omu inyuukiro ryawe otarikunyomwa; nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba akuhaire omugisha, naiwe nikwo orimuha.
Oryaijuka naiwe ku waabaire ori omuhuuku omu nsi ya Misri, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akakucungura; nikyo ndikukuragiirira eki eri izooba.
Kwonka ku arikugambira ahabw'okukukunda n'eka yaawe, kandi n'okuba gye naiwe, ati: Tindikwija kukurugaho,
oryareeta empindu, ogimufumuze okutu, eyogyemu, ekwate orwigi; obwo aryaguma ari omuhuuku waawe ebiro byona. Kandi n'omuzaana waawe nikwo orimutwaza otyo.

Ku orimurekura yaakurugaho n'obusingye, otaritsigara n'akangonongono; ahabw'okuba aryaba akukoreire emyaka mukaaga, iwe omwihwire kimwe kya kabiri eky'ebihembo by'omupakasi. Ku oritwaza otyo, MUKAMA aryakuha omugisha omu bi orikukora byona.

Emijigaijo yoona ey'enimi n'empaya erizaarwa omu masyo gaawe g'ente n'ag'entaama, oryaguma ogyereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; otarikoresa omujigaijo gw'ente yaawe, kandi otarikyemura ebyoya by'omujigaijo gw'entaama yaawe.
Kureka iwe n'ab'omu ka yaawe muryaguriira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe buri mwaka omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana.
Kwonka ku guriba gwine akamogo, oburema nari obuhumi, nari akandi kamogo koona akabi, otarigutambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Oryaguriira omu ka yaawe; abatashemeire n'abashemeire boona nibaikirizibwa kuguryaho, nk'oku barya esirabo n'empara.
Kwonka otarirya eshagama yaagwo, kureka oryagyata ahansi nk'amaizi.
Kandi oryatambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ekitambo ky'Okuhingurwaho, nookiiha omu masyo g'entaama nari ag'ente, okitambire omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye.

Otarikiriisa omugaati gutumbisiibwe; oryamara ebiro mushanju nookiriisa omugaati gutatumbisiibwe, nigwo mugaati gw'okubonabona, ahabw'okuba okaruga omu nsi ya Misri n'obwira, obone kwijuka eizooba eri waarugiireho omu nsi ya Misri ebiro byawe byona.

Otarireebwa oine ekitumbisa kyona omu nsi yaawe yoona okumara ebiro mushanju; kandi hatarigira enyama yoona ey'ekitambo eki oritamba aha izooba ry'okubanza omu mwabazyo, eyaaraaraho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Otaritambira ekitambo ky'Okuhingurwaho omu rurembo rwona aha ndembo ezi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha;

kureka omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye, nimwo oritambira omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho omu mwabazyo, eizooba nirirengarenga, omu bunaku obu waarugiiremu Misri.
Oryagwotsya, oguriire omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aritoorana; kandi omu kasheeshe ohindukye ogarukye omu mahema gaawe.
Oryamara ebiro mukaaga noorya emigaati etatumbisiibwe, kandi aha kiro kya mushanju habeho okuteerana okwereziibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe; otarikikoreraho omurimo gwona.
Oryarinda obugyenyi bwa saabiiti mushanju ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe nooreeta omutoijo gw'empongano yaawe ogu oritoija n'omutima ogwekundiire, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba akuhaire omugisha;

kandi oryayesiimira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye, iwe na mutabani waawe na muhara waawe n'omuhuuku waawe n'omuzaana waawe n'Omuleevi otwire omu marembo gaawe n'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi abatwire naimwe;
kandi oryaijuka ku waabaire ori omuhuuku omuri Misiri; ote omutima aha biragiro ebi ebyatairweho, kandi obyorobere.
oryashemererwa aha bugyenyi bwawe, iwe na mutabani waawe na muhara waawe n'omuhuuku waawe n'omuzaana waawe n'Omuleevi n'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi abatwire naiwe.

Oryamara ebiro mushanju noorinda obwo bugyenyi ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ori omu mwanya ogu aritoorana; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryakuha omugisha omu bi oriba oyerize byona, n'omu bi oriba okozire n'emikono yaawe byona; kandi oshemerererwe kimwe.

Buri mwaka abantu baawe boona abeetwa abashaija baryaguma bareebwe kashatu omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe omu mwanya ogu aritoorana-aha bugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe, aha bugyenyi bwa saabiiti mushanju, n'aha bugyenyi bw'Ensiisira; kandi batarireebwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA engaro nsha;
buri muntu aryaguma ahe nk'oku arikubaasa, nk'omugisha ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ariba amuhaire oku guri.
Oryataho abaramuzi n'abategyeki omu ndembo zaawe zoona ezi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha, nk'enganda zaawe oku ziri, bagume bacwere abantu emanja z'oburyo.
Otariita orubanja; otarishoroora omu bantu; kandi otarirya enguzi, ahakuba enguzi eita amaisho g'abanyabwengye, kandi eita emanja z'abahikiriire.
Eby'oburyo, eby'oburyo byonka, obe nibyo waakuratira, obone kugumaho, ohungure ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha.
Kandi otaryebyarira enyomyo y'eibaare, ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ayanga.
Otaritambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe enimi nari entaama eine akamogo nari akacokore koona; ahabw'okuba ekyo n'ekihagaro ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Omuriimwe, omuri ibara rurembo aha ndembo zaanyu ezi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha, ku harireebekamu omushaija nari omukazi orikukora ekirikwangwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, ekirikwita endagaano ye,
akaza kuheereza baaruhanga abandi, akabaramya, nari shi akaramya eizooba nari okwezi nari ekintu kyona eky'omu ihe ry'eby'omu iguru, eki ntarabaragiire;
ku baribikugambira, waabihurira, oyezirikye kubibuuririza; ku orishanga biri eby'amazima, bitarikubanganisibwa ku ekyo kihagaro kikoreirwe omuri Israeli,
muryashohoza ogwo mushaija nari ogwo mukazi okozire ekyo kihagaro, mumutware omu irembo ry'orurembo rwanyu, yaaba mushaija nari omukazi, mumuteere amabaare, afe.
Ow'okufa aryaitwa ahabwa baamushinja babiri nari bashatu; atariitwa ahabwa mushinja omwe.
Emikono ya baamushinja ebe niyo yaamubanza, bwanyima hateho ey'abandi boona. Ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekibi omuriimwe.
ohikye aha Baleevi abanyamurwa, n'aha muramuzi oriba ariho omu biro ebyo, obeebuuzeho, babone kukumanyisa oku orubanja rushemereire kucuubwa;
bwanyima oryatwaza nk'okucwa kwabo oku kuri oku barikuhaburira omuri ogwo mwanya gu MUKAMA ariba atooraine, oteho omutima kukora byona ebi barikwegyesa.
Oryakora nk'ebi bariba bakuhabwire oku biri, kandi nk'okucwa oku bariba bakugambiire oku kuri; otariza aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, okateishuka aha rubanja nk'oku bariba bakuhabwire.
Kandi omuntu origira amaryo, akanga kuhurira omunyamurwa, oriba naayemerera okwo omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nari omuramuzi, ogwo muntu aryaitwa, obone kwiha ekibi omuri Israeli.
N'abantu boona baryahurira, batiine, barekye kugaruka kugira amaryo.
buzimazima mutaribura kweteeraho omugabe ou MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aritoorana. Ou muritaho aryaba ow'omuri beene waanyu; mutaritaho omunyaihanga otari w'omuri beene waanyu.
Kwonka ataritunga embaraasi nyingi, n'obu kwakuba okugarura abantu omuri Misri, ngu abone kwetungirayo embaraasi nyingi; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akabagira ati: Mutarigaruka kutoora ogwo muhanda.
Kandi arekye kushwera abakazi baingi, omutima gwe gukahinduka gukaruga ahari MUKAMA; kandi ataryekanyisiza efeeza n'ezaabu nyingi.
Kandi ku ariheza kuza aha ngoma, aryayehandiikira ebiragiro ebi omu kitabo, naabiiha omu kitabo ky'Abaleevi abanyamurwa.
Ekyo kitabo agume nakyo, agume akishomemu ebiro byona ebi arimara akiriho, abone kwega kutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga we, n'okukwata ebigambo byona eby'ebiragiro n'ebyatairweho, n'okubyorobera,

omutima gwe gurekye kwehimbisiza ahari beene waabo, akateishuka aha biragiro, akatoora aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, haza obwo abone kuhangaarira omu bugabe bwe omuri Israeli, we n'oruzaaro rwe.
Batarigira obuhunguzi omuri beene waabo. MUKAMA niwe buhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku yaabagambiire.

Kandi ogwo nigwo mugabo gw'abanyamurwa ogushemereire kwihwa omu bantu; abarikutamba ebitambo, yaaba nte nari entaama, baryaguma nibaihiraho omunyamurwa ekivune ky'omukono, n'emishaya yombi, n'ekishansha.
Kandi omunyamurwa muryamuha aha miganuro y'ebi mwerize, engano zaanyu, na viinyo yaanyu, n'amajuta gaanyu ag'emizeituuni, kandi n'ebyoya by'okubanza eby'entaama zaanyu.
Ahakuba niwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaatooraine omu nganda zaanyu zoona, ngu ayemerere kuheereza omu iziina rya MUKAMA, we n'abatabani ebiro byona.
Kandi Omuleevi ku arifuruka omuri ibara rurembo aha ndembo zaanyu, ahu ariba atwire hoona omuri Israeli, yaaza omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA aritoorana akyekundiire,
nawe aryaikirizibwa kuheereza omu iziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga we, nka bagyenzi be boona Abaleevi, abeemerera okwo omu maisho ga MUKAMA, oku baheereza.
Aryatunga omugabo gw'eby'okurya ogurikwingana n'ey'abandi, otabariireho ebyarugire omu kutunda ebi ishe yaamuragire.
Hatarigira omuntu weena omuriimwe owaarabya mutabani we nari muhara we omu muriro, nari owaaba omufumu, nari orikuragura ebiribaho, nari omuteezi w'ebyatsi, nari omucecezi,
nari omuhi w'engisha, nari orikubandwa emizimu, nari omurogi, nari orikubuuza abafu.
Ahakuba orikukora ebyo weena n'ekirikunugwa ahari MUKAMA, kandi ahabw'ebirikunugwa ebyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu nikyo arikubingira amahanga ago omu maisho gaanyu.
Mube abahikire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu;
ahakuba amahanga ago, agu murikubuura, gata omutima aha barikuragura ebiribaho n'aha bafumu; kwonka imwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu takabaikirizaga kukora mutyo.

buzima kiryaba nk'ebi mwashabire MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu byona muri ahari Horebu aha izooba riri eri mwabaire muteeraine, nimugira muti: Nitukweshengyereza tutagaruka kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, n'obu kwakuba okureeba ogu muriro mwingi obundi, tutakaafa.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Ebi bagambire byona, bihikire.
Ndyabaimukiza nabi nkaiwe omuribo omuri beene waabo, nte ebigambo byangye omu kanwa ke, abagambire ebi ndimuragiira byona.
Kandi weena oryanga kuhurira ebigambo byangye ebi arigamba omu iziina ryangye, ndyakimutura.
Kwonka nabi oryetuma kugamba ekigambo omu iziina ryangye eki ntamuragiire kugamba, nari shi origamba omu iziina rya baaruhanga abandi, nabi ogwo aryafa.
Kandi ku muryebuuza omu mitima yaanyu muti: Nitubaasa tuta kumanya ekigambo eki MUKAMA atagambire?
Nabi ku arigamba omu iziina rya MUKAMA, eki yaagamba kitaabaho, nari kitaabakwo, biri ekigambo ekyo MUKAMA tiwe akigambire; kureka nabi ogwo niwe akyetumire; mutarimutiina.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ku ariheza kucwekyereza amahanga agu arikubaha ensi yaago, mwagakubuura, mwatuura omu ndembo zaabo n'omu maka gaabo,
muryayetooranira endembo ishatu omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kukubuura;
mweteereho emihanda, mubaganise ensi yaanyu ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha omu bicweka bishatu, oriita omuntu weena ahungireyo.
Ebi nibyo byatairweho ahabw'oriita omuntu, ngu ahungireyo, akire. Omuntu weena oriita omuntu, atamwitsire nkana, kandi ashangirwe atarikumwanga,
(nk'oku omuntu agyenda na mugyenzi we omu kibira kutiganda, akeereeza empango kutema ekiti, ekasyoka omu muhini, ekateera mugyenzi we ogwo, ekamwita), ahungire omuri rumwe ahari ezo ndembo, akire,
orikuhoorera kiitwa atarikurata kiita akiine ekiniga, akamukwatira omu muhanda ahabw'okuba hare, akamuteera, akamugwisaho; haza kunu yaaba atashemereire kwitwa, ahabw'okuba abaire atarikumwanga.
Nikyo ndikubaragiirira nti: Muryayetooranira endembo ishatu.
Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ku arihangusya ensi yaanyu, nk'oku yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe, yaabaha ensi yoona ebi yaaraganiise baashwenkuriimwe kubaha,

kandi ku murigumizamu kukwata ebiragiro ebi byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba, okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'okugyendera omu mihanda ye ebiro byona, ahari ezo ndembo ishatu muryayongyeraho ezindi ishatu,
eshagama y'abataine rubanja erekye kusheesherwa omu nsi yaanyu ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kuba obuhunguzi, mukagiibwaho orubanja rwayo.
abakuru b'orurembo rwe baryatuma, bamwiheyo, bamuheyo aha muhoozi w'enzigu, aitwe.
Amaisho gaanyu gatarimusaasira, kureka muryaiha omuri Israeli eshagama y'otaine rubanja, mubone kuba gye.
Mushinja w'ebishuba ku ariimuka kushinja omuntu ekibi,
abarikutongana bombi baryayemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, omu maisho g'abanyamurwa n'abaramuzi abariba bariho omu biro ebyo;
abaramuzi babuuririze munonga; mushinja ku ariba ari ow'ebishuba, abeihereire mugyenzi we,
mumugire nk'oku abaire naayenda kugira mugyenzi we; ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekibi omuriimwe.
Abaritsigaraho baryabihurira, batiine; okuruga aho tibarigaruka kukorera omuriimwe ekibi nk'ekyo.
Amaisho gaanyu gatarigira esaasi; amagara garyaguma garihwe agandi, eriisho ririhwe erindi, eriino ririhwe erindi, engaro erihwe endiijo, n'ekigyere kirihwe ekindi.
Kandi ku muriba muri haihi kurwana, omunyamurwa airire haihi abantu,
abagire ati: Muhurire, imwe Abaisraeli; eri izooba mwairira haihi abazigu baanyu kubarwanisa; emitima yaanyu etafoobeera; mutatiina, mutatetema, mutahahaaza emitima ahabwabo;
ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe arikugyenda naimwe kubarwanira n'abazigu baanyu n'okubajuna.
N'abakuru b'engabo baryabuuza abantu bati: Omuriimwe harimu obaire ayombekire enju nsya, otakagyerize? ku araabe ariho, agarukyeyo, ataahe omuri egyo nju, atakaafeera omu rugamba, ekeezibwa ondiijo.
Hariho owaabyaire omusiri gw'emizaabibu, otakariire ha bijuma byagwo? Nawe agarukyeyo, ataahe omu ka ye, atakaafeera omu rugamba, ondiijo akabirya.
Hariho ogambire omukazi obugyenyi, otakamushweire? Nawe agarukyeyo, ataahe omu ka ye, atakaafeera omu rugamba, ondiijo akamushwera.
Kandi abakuru b'engabo baryagaruka babuuze abantu bati: Omuriimwe harimu omuntu ekinyabwoba, ow'omutima gufoobeire? Ogwo nawe agarukyeyo, ataahe omu ka ye, emitima ya beene waabo etakaahaha nk'ogwe.
Abo bakuru b'engabo ku bariheza kugambira abantu ebigambo ebyo, bateho abakuru b'amahe kwebembera abantu.
Ku murihika haihi n'orurembo kururwanisa, mubanze murugambire eby'obusingye.
Ku ruribagarukamu eby'obusingye, rwabaigurira, boona abu murishangamu baryabakorera emirimo y'obuhuuku, kandi babaheereze.
Kwonka ku ruryanga kuragaana naimwe eby'obusingye, kureka rwayenda kubarwanisa, muryarugota;
MUKAMA ku ariruhayo omu mikono yaanyu, muryaita oyetwa omushaija weena na rurara;
kwonka abakazi n'abaana bato, n'ebirurimu byona, n'amatungo, niyo minyago yaamwo yoona mubyetwarire; kandi muryarya ebi murinyaga aha bazigu baanyu, ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahaire.
Okwo nikwo muritwaza endembo zoona ezibari hare munonga, ezitari z'aga mahanga.
Kwonka omu ndembo ez'aga mahanga, ezi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kuba obuhunguzi, mutarigira ekintu kyona ekirikwitsya eki mwarokora;
kureka muryabahwerekyerereza kimwe, Abahiiti, n'Abaamori, n'Abanyakanaani, n'Abaperizi, n'Abahiivi, n'Abayebusi, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabaragiire,
nyentsya bataribeegyesa kutooreza ebihagaro byabo byona ebi baabaire nibakorera baaruhanga baabo, mukacumura ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.

Ku murimara omwanya muraingwa mugotsire orurembo nimururwanisa kurukwata, mutaritema emiti yaarwo n'empango, mukagiraza; ahabw'okuba obundi mukaabaasa kurya aha bijuma byayo; n'ahabw'ekyo mutarigitema. Nimugira ngu emiti y'omu ishwa nayo n'abantu, imwe okugigota?
Emiti ei murikumanya ngu teyera bijuma ebirikuriibwa, egyo yonka niyo muritema, mukaraza, mukombekyesa eby'okwemereraho ahari orwo rurembo orurikubarwanisa, okuhitsya obu rurisingurwa.
abakuru baanyu n'abaramuzi baryaija, bateere entambwe okuruga aha mutumbi gw'oitsirwe okuhika aha ndembo ezeehinguririizeho;
abakuru b'orurembo oruri haihi n'ogwo mutumbi baryatwara enyana y'eruutsi etakakoresiibweho n'obu kwakuba okukurura ekintu kyona n'endiijo,
bagishuumye omu ruhanga orurimu akagyera k'amaizi agarikugyenda, oruhanga orutahingirwe, kandi orutabibirwemu, bagihendere ebitsya omuri orwo ruhanga.

Abanyamurwa beene Leevi bairire haihi; ahakuba nibo MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaatooraine kumuheereza n'okushabira abantu omugisha omu iziina rya MUKAMA, kandi nibo bashemereire kucwa orubanja rw'empaka zoona n'orw'obuhuta bwona.
Bwanyima abakuru boona ab'orwo rurembo oruri haihi n'omutumbi gw'oitsirwe banaabire engaro zaabo ahari egyo nyana y'eruutsi ei ebitsya byayo byahenderwa omuri orwo ruhanga;
beehakane nibagira bati: Emikono yaitu tiyo eseesire egi shagama, kandi n'amaisho gaitu tigagireebire neesheesheka.
Ai MUKAMA, saasira abantu baawe Israeli, abu waacungwire, otata orubanja rw'eshagama y'otaine rubanja aha bantu baawe Israeli; kureka basaasirwe orubanja rw'egyo shagama.
Ku muritwaza mutyo, mwakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, muryaiha omuriimwe orubanja rw'eshagama y'otaine rubanja.
Ku orihurura kurwanisa abazigu baawe, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaabahayo omu mikono yaawe, waabatwara bari enkwatwa,
waabareebamu omukazi murungi, waamurigira, waayenda kumushwera,
oryamutwara owaawe, amweise eishokye rye, acwe ebyara,
ajuure ebijwaro ebi akwatiirwemu, agume omu ka yaawe, amare okwezi kwona naaririra ishe na nyina; bwanyima obone kumushwera, obe iba, nawe abe omukazi waawe.
Bwanyima ku otarimusiima, omurekye agyende, aze ahi arikwenda; kwonka otarimutunda empiiha, kandi otarimutwaza nk'omuzaana, ahabw'okuba oryaba omusiisire.
aha izooba eri ariragiraho abaana be ebi atungire, tariikirizibwa kuhindura omwana w'enkundwakazi kuba omwana we mukuru okukira ogwo ow'enyangwakazi owaabandize kuzaarwa;

kureka aryaikiriza omwana w'enyangwakazi owaabandize kuzaarwa, ahabw'okumuraga emigabo ebiri y'ebi atungire; ahabw'okuba niwe maani ge ag'okuzaara gaatandikiireho; n'ebishemereire omwana w'okubanza n'ebye.
ishe na nyina baryamukwata, bamutwarire abakuru b'orurembo rwabo aha irembo ryarwo,
bagambire abakuru b'orwo rurembo bati: Ogu mwana waitu aba empiga kandi omugomi, tatuhurira; n'omunyamururu kandi omusinzi.
Abashaija boona ab'omu ruembo rwabo baryamuteera amabaare, afe. Ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekyo kibi omuriimwe; Abaisraeli boona baryakihurira, batiine.
omutumbi gwe gutariguraaraho, kureka omuziikye eryo izooba; ahabw'okuba ohanikwa aha muti, aba akyeenirwe Ruhangaorekye kushiisha ensi, ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha kuba obuhunguzi.
Kandi mwene waanyu ku ariba akuri hare, nari ku oriba otarikumumanya, oryagitaasya omuka, ogume nayo, okuhitsya obu mwene waanyu arigisherura; bwanyima okagimugarurira.
Kandi n'endogoya ye oryagitwaza otyo, n'ekijwaro kye okitwaze otyo, kandi otwaze otyo n'ekindi kintu kyona ekya mwene waanyu ekiriba kibuzire okakibona; otaribyehuzya.
Otarireeba endogoya ya mwene waanyu nari ente ye egwire aha muhanda, okagyehuzya; otaribura kumuhwera kugiimutsya.
Omukazi atarijwara kishaija; kandi n'omushaija atarijwara kikazi; ahakuba weena orikukora ebyo, n'ekihagaro ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
oryareka nyinabyo egyende, reero ebyana obitware, obone kuba gye, ohangaare.
Ku oryombeka enju nsya, ote aha mutwe gwayo eky'okuzibira abantu kugwa, kigyehinguririze, orekye kureetera enju yaawe orubanja rw'eshagama ahabw'omuntu kugihanukaho, akagwa ahansi.
Otarikomerana ente n'endogoya kukurura ekyoma ky'okuhingisa.
Otarijwara ekijwaro ekikozirwe omu byoya by'entaama n'ehuuzi za kitaani.
yaamugambaho ebigambo ebirikumuhemura, yaashiisha eiziina rye naagira ati: Nshweire ogu mwishiki; ku mbyamire nawe, naashanga ataine bumanyiso bw'okutamanya mushaija;
bwanyima ishe w'omwishiki na nyina baryatwara obumanyiso bwe bw'okutamanya mushaija, babuhitsye aha bakuru b'orurembo rwabo aha irembo ryarwo;
ishe w'ogwo mwishiki agambire abakuru ati: Nkahingira ogu mushaija muhara wangye; mbwenu amwangire,

kandi yaamugambaho ebirikumuhemura, naagira ati: Nshangire muhara waawe ataine bumanyiso bw'okutamanya mushaija. Mbwenu obu nibwo bumanyiso bwa muhara wangye bw'okutamanya mushaija. Baryayara omwenda omu maisho g'abakuru b'orurembo.
Abakuru b'orwo rurembo bakwate ogwo mushaija, bamuteere;
bamuhongyese shekeli z'efeeza igana, bazihe ishe w'omwishiki, nibamutura okushiisha eiziina ry'omwishiki Omwisraeli, agarukye abe omukazi we; atarimushenda ebiro byona ebi arimara omu nsi.
Kwonka ku kirishangwa kiri eky'amazima ngu ogwo mwishiki tarashangirwe na bumanyiso bw'okutamanya mushaija,

baryashohoza omwishiki aha muryango gw'enju ya ishe, abashaija b'omu rurembo rw'owaabo bamwitse amabaare, ahabw'okukora ekibi ky'obufamutima omuri Israeli, kuraayira omu ka ya ishe; ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekyo kibi omuri Israeli.
Ku hariba hariho omwishiki orikugambwa obugyenyi, omushaija yaamushanga omu rurembo, yaabyama nawe,

bombi muryabashohoza aha irembo ry'orwo rurembo, mubaitse amabaare; omwishiki mumwite ahabw'okutateera nduuru, haza ari omu rurembo; n'omushaija mumwite ahabw'okushiisha omukazi wa mutaahi we; ku muritwaza mutyo, muryaiha ekyo kibi omuri Israeli.
Kwonka omushaija ku arishanga omwishiki orikugambwa obugyenyi omu ishwa, yaamuhamba, yaabyama nawe, obwo ogwo mushaija obyamire nawe niwe ariitwa wenka;
kwonka omwishiki mutarigira eki mwamukora; aryaba ataine rubanja orushemereire kumwitsa; nimumanya ngu orubanja orwo ni nk'orw'omuntu ogurukaine mutaahi we, akamwita;
ahakuba omushaija aryaba amushangire omu ishwa; ogwo mwishiki orikugambwa obugyenyi, n'obu yaakuteire enduuru, tihaine waakumujunire.
Omushaija ku arishanga omwishiki otakagambirwe bugyenyi, yaamuhamba, yaabyama nawe, kandi baakwatwa;
ogwo mushaija obyamire nawe aryariha ishe w'omwishiki shekeli z'efeeza makumi ataano, bwanyima abe omukazi we, ahabw'okuba amusiisire; kandi atarimushenda ebiro byona ebi ariba akiriho.
Oyatikire amagosi, nari oshazirweho obushaija atariza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA.
Ekinyandaaro kitariza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA; hatarigira ow'omu ruzaaro rwakyo owaaza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA okuhitsya aha ruzaaro rwakyo rw'omwijukuru wa ikumi.

Omuamoni nari Omumoabu atariza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA; hatarigira ow'omu ruzaaro rwabo owaaza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA ebiro byona okuhitsya aha ruzaaro rwabo rw'omwijukuru wa ikumi;
ahabw'okuba tibarababuganiise by'okurya n'amaizi omu muhanda nimuruga Misri, n'ahabw'okuguriirira Balamu mwene Beori owa Pesori wa Mesopotamia, ngu abakyeene.
Kwonka MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaayanga kuhurira Balamu, kureka MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu omukyeeno yaaguhindura omugisha ahariimwe, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu akabakunda.
Mutaribatengyera obusingye n'obu kwakuba okuba gye ebiro byanyu byona.
Oruzaaro rwabo orw'abaana ba baijukuru baabo baryaikirizibwa kuza omu kuteerana kw'abantu ba MUKAMA.
Ku murihurura kurwanisa abazigu baanyu, mwateera orusiisira, muryaguma mwerinde ekintu kyona ekibi.
Omuriimwe ku harireebekamu omuntu otashemeire ahabw'ekiriba kimubaireho nyekiro, ashohore arugye omu rusiisira, arekye kurugarukamu;
kwonka ku burihika omu mwabazyo, ayogye omu maizi; kandi eizooba ku ririheza kurenga, agarukye omu rusiisira.
Kandi muryagira omwanya aheeru y'orusiisira ahu muriguma nimushohorera;
omu by'okurwanisa byanyu muryagiramu ekihosho; omuntu ku arishohora kuza aha ishaazi, akitimbise ekiina; yaaza kurugaho, ashwekye ahi yaaruga;

ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe agyendagyenda omu rusiisira rwanyu, okubajuna n'okuhayo abazigu baanyu omu maisho gaanyu; n'ahabw'ekyo orusiisira rwanyu rushemereire kuba orurikwera; MUKAMA arekye kureeba omuriimwe ekintu kyona ekitashemeire, akahinduka akabarugaho.
aryaguma naiwe, atuure omuriimwe omu mwanya ogu aritoorana omuri rumwe aha ndembo zaanyu, ahu arisiima hoona; otarimwita kubi.
Otarireeta omu nju ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ekiconco kya maraaya nari eky'ekitingwa, kuhikiiriza eki waaraganiise noorahira kuha MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba ebyo n'ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ayangira kimwe.

Kwonka omunyaihanga noikirizibwa kumuguza ahabw'ekiteebwamu; beitu mwene waanyu otarimuguza ahabw'enshaagi, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe abone kukuha omugisha omuri byona ebi orikora n'emikono yaawe omu nsi ei orikuza kuhungura.
Kwonka ku oriba otakiraganiise, tikirikurugiramu kibi.
Oryataho omutima kuhikiiriza ekirugire omu kanwa kaawe, ahakuba eki waaraganiise MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'akanwa kaawe, okakiraganisa oyekundiire.
Kandi ku oriza omu ngano za mutaahi waawe, noikirizibwa kucwa obushiisha n'engaro, kwonka otarigyeshesa omusyo engano ze.
Ogwo mukazi ku araarugye omuri egyo nju, naikirizibwa kushwerwa ondiijo mushaija.
Kwonka ogwo mushaija owaaba amushweire bushumbakazi nawe ku araamwangye, yaahandiika ebaruha y'okumushenda, yaagimukwatsa, yaamubinga omu nju ye, nari shi yaafa,

omushaija we ow'okubanza owaamubingire tariikirizibwa kumugarura akaba omukazi we, yaaherize kusiisikara atyo; ahabw'okuba ekyo n'ekihagaro omu maisho ga MUKAMA, kandi mutarireeta orubanja aha nsi, ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kuba obuhunguzi.
Hatarigira owaakwatirizibwa orubengo nari eseiso, ahakuba naaba akwatiriziibwe amagara ga mukama waabyo.
Mwijukye oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaagizire Miriamu, muri omu rugyendo nimuruga Misri.
Ku origuza mutaahi waawe, nari waamutiiza ekintu kyona, otariza omu nju ye kwihamu eky'okukukwatiriza;
kureka oryayemerera aheeru; ou ogurize abe niwe yaakureetera eky'okukukwatiriza.
Kandi ku ariba ari omworo, otariraazayo eki akukwatiriize;
otaribura kukimugarurira eizooba nirirengarenga, abone kuraara omu kijwaro kye, akushabire omugisha; ekyo kiryakurugiramu okuhikiirira omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.

oryaguma omuhe ebihembo bye ebi yaakorera, eizooba ritarirenga otakabimuhaire, nyentsya atakaatakira MUKAMA naakutabaariza, haza kikakurugiramu ekibi; ahabw'okuba n'omworo, kandi ebihembo bye nibyo ataireho omutima.
Baishe b'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa abaana baabo; kandi n'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa baishebo; kureka omuntu weena aryaitwa ahabw'ekibi kye.
kureka oryaguma oijukye ku waabaire ori omuhuuku omuri Misri, kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ku yaakucungwire, akakwihayo; nikyo ndikukuzibirira kutwaza otyo.

Ku orishaaruura omusiri gwawe, waayebwayo ekiba, otarigarukayo kukiihayo; kiryaba eky'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe abone kukuha omugisha omu bi orikukora n'emikono yaawe byona.
Ku oriteera omuti gwawe gw'omuzeituuni kwihamu ebijuma, otarigaruka omu mataagi gaagwo; ebiritsigaramu biryaba eby'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi.
Kandi ku orishoroma ebijuma by'emizaabibu yaawe, otarigarukamu kuhumba; ebiritsigaramu bibe eby'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi.
Oryaguma oijukye ku waabaire ori omuhuuku omu nsi Misri; nikyo ndikukuragiirira kutwaza otyo.
Abantu ku bariba baine eki barikutongana, baija kucwerwa orubanja, abaramuzi baarubacwera, baryaiha orubanja aha muntu otarwine, barusingise okozire kubi;
kandi ogwo muntu okozire kubi ku ariba ashemereire kuteerwa, omuramuzi aryaragiira bamurambikye omu maisho ge, bamuteere kiboko ezishemereire ekibi kye.
Naikirizibwa kumuteera kiboko makumi ana, kwonka atarizirenzya; ahakuba ku arigumizamu kumuteera, yaayeshumbya ahari ezo, aryaba amumaziremu ak'obuntu, haza ari mwene waanyu.
Kandi omwojo ou aribanza kuzaara aryahungurira nyakufa, ayetwe eiziina rye, rirekye kweba omuri Israeli.

Kwonka ogwo mushaija ku ariba atarikwenda kuhungura muka mukuru we, ogwo mukazi aryaza aha bakuru omu irembo ry'orurembo, abagire ati: Muramu wangye ayangire kugaruraho eiziina rya mukuru we omuri Israeli; tarikwenda kunkorera ebi muramu w'omuntu akorera muka mukuru we.
Abakuru b'orurembo rwabo bamwete, bagambe nawe; ku ariguma ayangire, yaagira ati: Tindikwenda kumuhungura,
ogwo mukazi muramu we amuhikye haihi omu maisho g'abakuru, amujuure enkaito, amucwere amacwante omu maisho, amugire ati: Omuntu weena oryanga kwombeka eka ya mukuru we, akorwe atyo.
Eiziina ry'eka ye omuri Israeli riryayetwa Eka y'owaajwirwe enkaito.
Abashaija ku barirwana, omukazi w'omwe aharibo yaaza kujuna iba orikumuteera, yaatayo omukono, yaakwata kiteera iba eifo,
ogwo mukazi oryamucwaho engaro; eriisho ryawe ritarimusaasira.
n'omu nju yaawe otarigiramu endengo z'okurengyesa obwingi bumwe, haza kunu nizikiraakirana.
Kureka oryagira amabaare gahikire kandi agarikwinganira kimwe; kandi n'endengo ezihikire kandi ezirikwinganira kimwe nizo origira, obone kuhangaarira omu nsi ei MUKAMA waawe arikukuha;
ahabw'okuba boona abakora nk'ebyo, boona abakora eby'okutahikiirira, abo n'ebirikunugwa ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
oku baababugaine omu muhanda, bakashanga muruhire, mugwire enshazi, bakaita abantu baanyu abaabaire bataine maani, batsigaire enyima; kandi tibaratiinire Ruhanga.

N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ku ariheza kubahuumuza engamba z'abazigu baanyu ababeehinguririize omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kukubuura kuba obuhunguzi bwanyu, muryamariraho kimwe eiziina ry'Abaamaleki, rirekye kwijukwa ahansi y'eiguru; mutarikyebwa.
Ku oriba waahikire omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha kuba obuhunguzi, waagikubuura, waagituuramu,

oryatwara emiganuro y'ebi oyerize omu misiri yaawe byona, ebi orishaaruura omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha, obite omu kiibo, obitware omu mwanya ogu MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aritoorana kugumyamu eiziina rye,
ohikye aha munyamurwa oriba ariho omu biro ebyo, omugire oti: Eri izooba nimpamya omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ku mpikire omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire naaraganisa baatatenkuriitwe kugituha.
Ogwo munyamurwa akwakiire ekyo kiibo, akite ahansi omu maisho g'eitambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.

Naiwe oryagarukamu ogambire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, oti: Tatenkuru akaba ari Omuaramu, ari haihi kufa; bwanyima yaashuuma Misri n'abantu bakye, baashuhuukirayo; yaahindukirayo eihanga rikuru, ry'amaani, kandi ery'abantu baingi.
Abanyamisri baatwita kubi, baatubonabonesa, baatukoresa emirimo y'obuhuuku.
Twatakira MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe, yaatuhurira, yaareeba okubonabona kwaitu, n'okufa kubi kwaitu n'okuhatwa kwaitu;
bwanyima MUKAMA yaatwiha omuri Misri n'omukono gw'amaani kandi ogubangire, n'ebirikutiinisa munonga, n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza;
yaatureeta omu mwanya ogu, yaatuha egi nsi y'amate n'obwoki.
Mbwenu MUKAMA, reeba ndeetsire emiganuro y'ebyezire omu misiri ei wampaire. Bwanyima okite ahansi omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, oramize omu maisho ge,
oshemerererwe ebirungi byona ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akuhaire n'eka yaawe, iwe n'Omuleevi n'omunyaihanga, abatwire naimwe.

Ku oriheza kwiha kimwe kya ikumi ahari byona ebi oyerize omu mwaka gwa kashatu nigwo mwaka gw'okuheeramu kimwe kya ikumi, bwanyima okihe Omuleevi n'omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi kuriira owaawe, bahaagye;

kandi ogambire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe oti: Nyihire omu ka yangye ebintu ebishoroirwe, naabiha Omuleevi, omunyaihanga, efuuzi, n'omufaakazi, nk'ebiragiro byawe byona ebi wandagiire oku biri; omu biragiro byawe byona tihaine ki nshobize, nari eki nyebirwe.
Tindabiriireho ndi omu rufu; tihariho bi naihireho nsiisikaire; kandi tihariho bi naagaburiire emizimu y'abafiire; kureka nkahurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, naakora ebi wandagiire byona.

Naga amaisho ahansi nooyema omu iguru, omu mwanya gwawe ogurikwera, ohe abantu baawe Israeli omugisha, kandi n'ensi ei waatuhaire ogihe omugisha, ensi y'amate n'obwoki, nk'oku waarahiire nooraganisa baatatenkuriitwe.
Eri izooba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu naabaragiira kworobera ebiragiro ebi ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe; n'ahabw'ekyo muryaguma muteho omutima kubyorobera n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona.
Eri izooba mwagamba nimuhamya ku MUKAMA ari Ruhanga waanyu, kandi ku murikwija kugyendera omu mihanda ye, n'okukwata ebiragiro bye n'ebyatairweho n'ebyaragiirwe, kandi n'okuhurira eiraka rye.
Kandi eri izooba MUKAMA yaagamba naahamya ku muri eihanga rye eri yaayetooraniire, nk'oku yaabaraganiise, kandi ku muriguma nimworobera ebiragiro bye,
n'oku aribatunguura okukira agandi mahanga goona agu yaahangire, mukagakiza okusiimwa n'okurangaanwa n'ekitiinisa, naimwe mube abantu abeereziibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nk'oku yaagambire.
Musa n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli baaragiira abantu nibagira bati: Mukwate ebiragiro byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba.
Kandi aha izooba eri muryambukiraho Yorudani kutaaha omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha, muryabyara amabaare mahango, mugasiigye einoni,

mugahandiikyeho ebigambo byona eby'ebiragiro ebi, ku muriheza kwambuka n'okutaaha omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha, ensi y'amate n'obwoki, nka MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe, oku yaabaraganiise.
Ku muriheza kwambuka Yorudani, ago mabaare agu naabaragiira eri izooba muryagabyara aha rushozi Ebali, mugasiigye einoni.
Kandi okwo niyo muryombekyera MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu eitambiro ry'amabaare; mutarigabaizisa ekyoma kyona.
Eryo itambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu muryaryombekyesa amabaare agatabaizire; kandi muritambirireho MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ebitambo by'okwotsya;
kandi muhongye empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, muriireyo; mushemerererwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Kandi muryahandiika ahari ago mabaare ebigambo byona eby'ebi biragiro, bihwezibwe gye.
Musa n'abanyamurwa Abaleevi baagambira Abaisraeli boona bati: Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, muhuname, muhurire. Eri izooba mwahinduka eihanga rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Nikyo mushemerereire kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mukoorobera ebiragiro bye n'ebyatairweho, ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba.
Musa yaayehanangiriza abantu eryo izooba, naagira ati:
Ku muriheza kwambuka Yorudani, aba nibo baryemerera aha rushozi Gerizimu okushabira abantu omugisha; ab'oruganda rwa Simeoni, orwa Leevi, orwa Yuda, orwa Isakaari, orwa Yosefu n'orwa Benyamiini;
kandi aba nibo baryemerera aha rushozi Ebali ahabw'okukyeena; ab'oruganda rwa Reubeeni, orwa Gaadi, orwa Asheri, orwa Zebuluuni, orwa Daani n'orwa Nafutaali.
Orikugaya ishe nari nyina akyeenwe! Abantu boona baikirize nibagira bati: Amiina.
Orikubyama n'enyamaishwa yoona akyeenwe! Abantu boona baikirize nibagira bati: Amiina.
Orikubyama na munyaanya owa ishe nari owa nyina akyeenwe! Abantu boona baikirize nibagira bati: Amiina.
Orikubyama na nyina-zaara akyeenwe! Abantu boona baikirize nibagira bati: Amiina.
kandi ku oryorobera eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, emigisha egi yoona eryaija ekuhikyeho.
Oryagira omugisha omu rurembo, kandi ogugire n'omu misiri.
Oryagira omugisha omu ruzaaro rwawe, n'omu bi oyerize omu misiri yaawe, n'omu by'amatungo gaawe, okukanya kw'ente zaawe n'okuzaara kw'amasyo gaawe g'embuzi n'ag'entaama.
Omugisha gube aha kitenga kyawe n'aha nyungu yaawe egoya.
Oryagira omugisha omu magyenda n'omu magaruka.
MUKAMA aryareetera abazigu baawe abariimuka kukurwanisa kukuhunga; baryareetwa omuhanda gumwe baizire kukurwanisa; omu kukuhunga bagabe ebirari mushanju.
MUKAMA aryaragiira omugisha gukwijeho, guze omu bitara byawe n'ahari byona ebi orikora n'emikono yaawe; kandi akuheere omugisha omu nsi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuha.
Ku orikwata ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, waagyendera omu mihanda ye, aryakuhamya obe eihanga eririkwera eri yaayetooraniire, nk'oku yaarahiire naakuraganisa.
Kandi amahanga goona ag'omu nsi garyareeba ku oyetereirwe eiziina rya MUKAMA, gakutiine.
Kandi MUKAMA aryakutungisa, ogogyerere omu ruzaaro rwawe n'omu by'amatungo gaawe n'omu bi oryeza omu misiri yaawe omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaaraganiise baashwenkuru naarahira kugikuha.

MUKAMA aryakwigurira eibiikiro rye erirungi, niryo iguru, agwisize ensi yaawe enjura omu bunaku bwayo, ahe omugisha ebi orikora n'emikono yaawe byona; oryaguza amahanga maingi, kwonka iwe torigeeguzaho.
MUKAMA aryakuhindura omutwe, ti mukira; oryaguma nootunguuka, torigaruka hansi, ku oryorobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, waataho omutima kubikwata;
otaateishuka kureka ekigambo na kimwe ahari ebyo ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, okatoora aha mukono gwa buryo nari aha gwa bumosho, okukuratira baaruhanga abandi kubaheereza.
Oryaba okyeenirwe omu rurembo, kandi n'omu misiri.
Omukyeeno gube aha kitenga kyawe n'aha nyungu yaawe egoya.
Oryaba okyeenirwe omu ruzaaro rwawe, n'omu bi oyerize omu misiri yaawe, n'omu kukanya kw'ente zaawe, n'okuzaara kw'amasyo gaawe g'entaama n'ag'embuzi.
Oryaba okyeenirwe omu magyenda n'omu magaruka.
MUKAMA aryakureetera orufu rukugumeho, okuhitsya obu arikumaraho omu nsi ei orikuza kukubuura.

MUKAMA aryakurwaza omunywengyerero n'omushwija n'obuzimba oburikuhurura n'okubabiirirwa, kandi akwitse omushana, n'okubabuka n'okusya-nyamwenga omu bi ohingire; biryakukurata okuhitsya obu orihwerekyerera.
Eiguru eriri ahaiguru yaawe riryaba nk'emiringa, kandi eitaka eri oyemereireho ribe nk'ekyoma.
Omu mwanya gw'okugwisa enjura omu nsi yaawe, MUKAMA aryagwisa omucuucu n'omusheenyi; biryaruga omu iguru, bikugweho okuhitsya obu orihwerekyerera.
Emitumbi yaanyu eryariibwa amahungu goona ag'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu nsi, zibure kubinga.
MUKAMA aryabarwaza ebihuute bya Misri n'ebishebe n'efumbi n'obuhere ebi mutarikira.
MUKAMA aryakugwisa eiraro, akuhumye, akuhunguture omutima.
Oryagyenda noobandagira nyomushana, nk'oku empumi egyenda neebandagira omu mwirima; torigira mugisha omu bi orikora byona; oryaguma oitwe kubi, kandi onyagwe obutoosha, obure kijuna.
Oryagamba omwishiki obugyenyi, ondiijo abyame nawe; oryayombeka enju, torigitaahamu; oryabyara emizaabibu, obure kurya ebijuma byayo.
Ente yaawe eryakubaagirwa omumaisho, torigiryaho. Endogoya yaawe eryanyagisibwa amaani noogireeba, torigigarurirwa. Entaama zaawe baryaziha abazigu baawe, obure owaakuha emikono.
Batabani baawe na bahara baawe baryaheebwa ab'erindi ihanga; obakuratse amaisho, gagwe omu nkiro ahabw'obusaasi eizooba ryona; haza iwe obure obushoboorozi bw'okukizibira.
Emyaka y'omu misiri yaawe n'ebi waahendekyeire byona biryariibwa eihanga eri otarikumanya; oryaba ow'okwitwa kubi kwonka, ogume noohondagurwa;
ekirirugamu ogwisibwe eiraro ebi amaisho gaawe garireeba.
MUKAMA aryabarwaza ebihuute ebirikuhurura munonga, ebitarikutambwa, aha maju n'aha maguru, okwiha aha mara g'ebigyere okuhitsya aha kazingiro k'eishokye.
Muryahinduka eky'okutangaarira, eky'okucweraho enfumu n'eky'okugaaniiza omu mahanga goona agu MUKAMA aribatwaramu.
Muryabiba embibo nyingi, mushaaruure bikye; ahabw'okuba biryariibwa enzigye.
Muryabyara emizaabibu, mugihingirire, kwonka timurinywa hari viinyo yaayo, n'obu kwakuba okushoroma ebijuma byayo; ahabw'okuba eryariibwa obukooko.
Muryagira emizeituuni omu nsi yaanyu yoona, kwonka timuryesiiga amajuta gaayo; ahakuba emizeituuni yaanyu eryaragaza ebijuma byayo bitakeezire.
Muryazaara aboojo n'abaishiki; kwonka tibariba baanyu, ahabw'okuba baryatwarwa omu bunyagwa.
Emiti yaanyu yoona n'emyaka y'omu misiri yaanyu biryaba eby'enzigye.
Abanyamahanga abariba bari omuriimwe baryaguma nibeeyongyera kutunguuka, babakire, haza imwe mugume nimweyongyera kugaruka ahansi.
Baryabaguza, kwonka imwe timuribaguza; baryaba omutwe, haza imwe mube omukira.

Emikyeeno egyo yoona eryabaizira, egume ebahiigye, ebahikyeho okuhitsya obu murihwerekyerera, ahabw'okuba muryaba mwangire kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, okukwata ebiragiro bye n'ebyatairweho, ebi yaabaragiire;
kandi egyo mikyeeno eryabahikaho, imwe na baijukuru baanyu, kuba akamanyiso n'eky'okutangaaza ebiro byona.

nikyo muriheerereza abazigu baanyu, abu MUKAMA aryohereza kubarwanisa, mwine enjara n'eiriho, mutaine ky'okujwara, kandi mukyenire ebintu byona; kandi aryabata enkomo y'ekyoma omu bitsya, okuhitsya obu aribahwerekyereza.
MUKAMA aryabareetera eihanga rya hare, ariihe aha muheru gw'ensi, riije nirirahuka nk'empungu, eihanga eri oriba otarikumanya rurimi rwaryo,
eriine ahamaisho harikutiinisa, eritaryeta ha bagurusi, n'obu kwakuba okusaasira abaana;

baryarya ebi amatungo gaanyu garizaara, n'ebi emisiri yaanyu eryeza, okuhitsya obu murihwerekyerera. Kandi tibaribatsigira ngano yoona, nari viinyo, nari amajuta, nari okukanya kw'ente zaanyu, n'obu kwakuba okuzaara kw'amasyo g'entaama zaanyu n'ag'embuzi, okuhitsya obu baribahwerekyereza.

Kandi baryabagotera omu ndembo zaanyu zoona, okuhitsya obu engo zaanyu z'amabaare ndaingwa kandi ezigumire, ezi mwabaire nimwesiga omu nsi yaanyu yoona, zirikumbagara; baryabagotera omu ndembo zaanyu zoona omu nsi yaanyu yoona ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahaire.

Kandi muryarya abaana baanyu abu mwezaariire, enyama ya batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu, abu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ariba abahaire, ahabw'okugotwa n'okutagira bwehigiro, oku abazigu bariba babafundize.
Kandi omushaija omutetsi kandi omwegiragye aryagira eriisho ribi aha murumuna, aha mukazi we w'aha mukono, n'aha mwana we ou ariba atsigaize,

arekye kuha n'omwe aharibo aha nyama z'abaana be abu ariba naarya; ahabw'okuba aryaba atakiine ki atsigaize ahabw'okugotwa n'okubura obwehigiro, oku abazigu baanyu bariba babafundize omu ndembo zaanyu zoona.

Kandi n'omukazi, oriba ari omuriimwe, omutetsi kandi omwegiragye, owaabaire atenda kigyere kye kuhika ahansi ahabw'obutetsi n'obwegiragye, nawe aryagira eriisho ribi ahari iba, aha mutabani n'ahari muhara we,

abaime ekyanyima ekiriba kimuri omu maguru, n'abaana abu ariba azaire; ahabw'okuba aryabarya bwesherekye ahabw'okukyena ebintu byona, ahabw'okugotwa n'okubura obwehigiro oku abazigu baanyu bariba babafundize omu ndembo zaanyu zoona.
MUKAMA aryabareetera, imwe na baijukuru baanyu, okubonabonesibwa okutakareebwaga okurimara omwanya muhango, n'endwara ezirikusaasa zibabeho akarande;
kandi abagarureho endwara zoona eza Misri, ezi mwabaire mutiina, zibagumeho.
Kandi ezindi ndwara n'ezindi nfu zoona, ezitahandiikirwe mu kitabo ky'ebiragiro ebi, nazo MUKAMA aryazibarwaza, okuhitsya obu murihwerekyerera.
Muryatsigara bakye, haza mwabaire muri baingi nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, ahabw'okutahurira iraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.

MUKAMA aryabataataanisiza omu mahanga goona, okuruga aha muheru gw'ensi okuhika aha gundi; kandi oryaheererezayo baaruhanga abandi ab'ebiti n'ab'amabaare abu mwabaire mutakamanyaga, n'obu baakuba baashwenkuriimwe.

Kandi ago mahanga timurigagiriramu busingye, n'obu kwakuba okubona ah'okuhuumuza ekigyere; kureka MUKAMA aryabaheerayo omutima gurikutetema, n'amaisho agagwire omu nkiro, kandi n'omutima ogwitsirwe orushusho;
amagara gaanyu garyatuura omu kubanganisa, mugire obwoba nyomushana na nyekiro; timurigira ky'okuhamizaho yaaba muri ab'okugumaho.
Ahabw'eby'okutiinisa ebi emitima yaanyu eriba neetiina, n'ebi amaisho gaanyu gariba nigareeba, ku burisheesha, muryagira muti: Kuri bwizire! Kandi ku buriira, mugire muti: Kuri buseesire!
MUKAMA aryabagarura Misri n'emeeri, omu muhanda ogu naabaire naabagambiire nti: Timurigaruka kugutoora. Okwo muryayetundirayo aha bazigu baanyu, kuba abahuuku n'abazaana; kwonka tihaine oribagura.
Ebi nibyo bigambo by'endagaano ei MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa kuragaana n'Abaisraeli omu nsi ya Moabu, ebyayongyeirwe aha ndagaano ei yaaraganiire nabo aha rushozi Horebu.
Musa yaayeta Abaisraeli boona yaabagira ati: Mukareeba byona ebi MUKAMA yaakozire Faraho n'abaheereza be boona n'ensi ye yoona omu nsi ya Misri, omu maisho gaanyu,
n'ebigyezo by'amaani n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bikuru, ebi mwayereebeire.
Kwonka MUKAMA takabahaire mutima gw'okwetegyereza, nari amaisho g'okureeba, nari amatu g'okuhurira n'okuhitsya hati.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Nkamara emyaka makumi ana nimbeebembera omu ihamba; ebijwaro byanyu tibikabakuriireho, n'enkaito tizikabakuriire mu bigyere.
Timukaryaga mugaati n'obu kwakuba okunywa viinyo nari eby'okunywa ebirikusinza, ngu mubone kumanya ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
twanyaga ensi yaabo, twagiha Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase kuba obuhunguzi bwabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo mukwate ebigambo by'endagaano egi, mubihitsye, mubone kutunga omugisha omu bi murikukora byona.
Eri izooba mwena mwemereire omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, abeebembezi b'enganda zaanyu, abakuru baanyu, abategyeki baanyu, abashaija boona ba Israeli,
abaana baanyu abato, abakazi baanyu n'abanyamahanga abari omu nsiisira zaanyu, okuruga aha barikubasheenyera enku okuhika aha barikubatahira amaizi,
mureetsirwe kutaaha omu ndagaano ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ei yaahamize naarahira, kandi ei arikuragaana naimwe eri izooba;
abone kubahamya eri izooba kuba eihanga rye, nawe akaba Ruhanga waanyu, nk'oku yaabagambiire, kandi nk'oku yaarahiire naaraganisa baashwenkuriimwe, Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo.
Kandi tiimwe mwenka abari aha abu ndikuragaana nabo egi ndagaano n'endahiro,
kureka n'abatari aha naitwe eri izooba, otaihiremu abari aha, abeemereire naitwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Nimumanya oku twatwire omu nsi ya Misri, kandi n'oku twarabire omu mahanga agu mwarabiremu;
mukareeba ebirikunugwa byabo n'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, eby'ebiti, eby'amabaare, eby'efeeza, n'eby'ezaabu, ebyabaire biri omuribo.

Mwerinde, omuriimwe hatarigira omushaija nari omukazi nari omuryango nari oruganda, ou omutima gwe gwateishuka gukaruga ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, akaza kuheereza baaruhanga ab'ago mahanga, kandi hatarigira omuriimwe owaamerwamu omuzi ogurikwana ebyana ebirikushaarira nk'omuravunga;
akihurira ebigambo by'endagaano egi, akeehimbisa omu mutima gwe, naagira ati: Tiinyine ku ndiba, n'obu ndigumizamu n'obugangaazi bw'omutima gwangye; atyo akareetera ababisi n'aboomire kucwekyerera.

Omuntu ogwo MUKAMA tarimusaasira, kureka ekiniga kya MUKAMA n'eihato rye biryamwakaho nk'omuriro omuri obwo bunaku, emikyeeno yoona ehandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo emubeho, kandi MUKAMA aryamaraho eiziina rye, ryebe ahansi y'eiguru.
MUKAMA aryamutoorana omu nganda za Israeli zoona abe engwerwakagwe, nk'emikyeeno yoona ey'omu ndagaano ehandiikirwe omu kitabo eki eky'ebiragiro oku eri.
Kandi ab'obusingye oburiija, nibo baana baanyu abarikurataho, n'omunyaihanga oriruga omu nsi ya hare, baryataka ku barireeba ebibonaboneso by'ensi egyo n'endwara ezi MUKAMA agireetsireho,

kandi ku egyo nsi yoona ehindukire obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, n'omwonyo, n'eitaka erihiire nyamwenga, eritarikuhingwa, eritarikwera, n'obu kwakuba okumerwaho akanyaatsi, ecwekyereziibwe nka Sodoma, Gomora, Aduma na Zeboimu, ei MUKAMA yaagiriire ekiniga, akagicwekyereza agigwereirwe kubi;
kandi buzima n'amahanga goona garyabuuza gati: Ahabw'enki MUKAMA agizire ati egi nsi? Eki kiniga kingi nikimanyisa ki?
Abantu baryabagarukamu nibagira bati: Ahabw'okuba bakareka endagaano ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, ei yaaragaine nabo, obu yaabaiha omu nsi ya Misri;
baagyenda, baaheereza baaruhanga abandi, abu baabaire batarikumanya, kandi abu MUKAMA yaabaire atabahaire, baabaramya.
Nikyo ekiniga kya MUKAMA kyakiire ahari egi nsi, kikagireetera emikyeeno yoona eyaahandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo.
Nikyo kyareeteire MUKAMA kubabiihirirwa, okubagwerwa kubi n'okubagirira ekiniga kingi, akabarandura omu nsi yaabo, akabanaga omu nsi endiijo, nk'oku kiri hati.
mwagaruka ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mwahurira eiraka rye, mwakora ebyo byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba, imwe n'abaana baanyu, mwabikora n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona;
obwo MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryagarura abantu baanyu abaanyagirwe, abagirire esaasi, agarukye abateeranire hamwe, abaihe omu mahanga goona, agu MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabataataanisiizemu.
Abantu baanyu ababingirwe, n'obu bariba bari aha muheru gw'ensi, MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryabataaruura, abaiheyo;
kandi aryabagarura omu nsi eyaabaire eri eya baashwenkuriimwe, mugizemu ebe eyaanyu; abagirire gye, abakanyise mukire baashwenkuriimwe obwingi.
Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryashara ekishushu ky'aha mitima yaanyu n'ey'oruzaaro rwanyu, mukunde MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona, mubone kugumaho.
Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryata egyo mikyeeno yoona aha bazigu baanyu n'aha barikubanga boona bakabahiiga.
Kandi muryagaruka muhurire eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mworobere ebiragiro bye byona ebi ndikubaragiira eri izooba.

Kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu aryabaha omugisha, abagogyeze omu bi murikukora byona, oruzaaro rwanyu, okuzaara kw'amatungo gaanyu n'emyaka y'omu misiri yaanyu, mube gye; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aryagaruka abashemerererwe omu kubagogyeza, nk'oku yaabaire ashemerererwa baashwenkuriimwe,

ku murihurira eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mwakwata ebiragiro bye n'ebyatairweho ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo eki eky'ebiragiro, kandi ku murigaruka ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona.
Ahakuba ekiragiro eki, eki ndikukuragiira eri izooba, tikirikukurema, n'obu kwakuba okukuba hare.
Tikiri mu iguru, iwe okugira oti: N'oha oritemba omu iguru, akakitureetera, ngu tukihurire, tukyorobere?
Kandi tikiri seeri y'enyanja, iwe okugira oti: N'oha oritwambukirayo, akakitureetera, ngu tukihurire, tukyorobere?
Kureka ekyo kigambo kikuri haihi munonga omu kanwa kaawe n'omu mutima gwawe, ngu obaase kukyorobera.

Ku oryorobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ebi ndikukuragiira eri izooba, okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, okugyendera omu mihanda ye, n'okukwata ebiragiro bye n'ebi yaataireho n'ebi yaaragiire, obwo oryagumaho, okanye, kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryakuheera omugisha omu nsi ei orikuza kukubuura.
Kwonka omutima gwawe ku guriteishuka, waayanga kuhurira, waabeihwabeihwa, waaramya baaruhanga abandi, waabaheereza,
nimbagambirira kimwe eri izooba, muryahwerekyerera, timurihangaarira mu nsi ei murikuza kwambuka Yorudani kuza kukubuura.
Eri izooba niinyeta eiguru n'ensi kubashinja, ku naata omu maisho gaanyu amagara n'okufa, omugisha n'omukyeeno; n'ahabw'ekyo mutoorane amagara, mubone kugumaho, imwe n'oruzaaro rwanyu,

okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, okuhurira eiraka rye, n'okumuhamiraho,ahabw'okuba niwe magara gaanyu n'okuhangaara kwanyu, mubone kuguma omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaarahiire kuha baashwenkuriimwe, Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo.
Musa yaagyenda, yaagambira Abaisraeli boona ebigambo ebi.
Yaabagira ati: Eri izooba naahitsya emyaka igana na makumi abiri; tinkibaasa kushohora n'okutaaha; kandi MUKAMA akangira ati: Toryambuka Yorudani egi.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe aribeebembera kwambuka, kandi niwe arihwerekyereza amahanga ago omu maisho gaanyu, mukagakubuura; kandi Yoshua niwe aribeebembera kwambuka, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
MUKAMA aryagagira nk'oku yaagizire Sihooni na Ogi, abagabe b'Abaamori, abu yaacwekyereize, n'ensi yaabo.
MUKAMA aryagahayo omu maisho gaanyu, mugagire nk'ebiragiro byona ebi naabaragiire oku biri.
Mube ab'amaani, mugume omutima; mutagira obwoba, kandi mutabatiina; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe arikubeebembera; taribahemukaho, kandi taribatsigaho.
MUKAMA niwe arikukwebembera; aryaguma naiwe, tarikuhemukaho, kandi tarikutsigaho; otatiina, n'obu kwakuba okuhahaaza omutima.
Musa yaahandiika ebyo biragiro, yaabiha abanyamurwa beene Leevi abaabaire baheeka eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli boona.
Musa yaabaragiira naagira ati: Aha muheru gwa buri myaka mushanju, omu bunaku obwatairweho omu mwaka gw'okuha obusingye, aha bugyenyi bw'Ensiisira,
Abaisraeli boona ku bariba baizire kumurikwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu omu mwanya ogu aritoorana, oryaguma oshomere ebiragiro ebi omu maisho g'Abaisraeli boona, nibabihurira.
Oryateerana abantu, abashaija n'abakazi n'abaana n'abashuhuuki abariba batwire naimwe, babihurire, beegye kutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, bateho omutima kworobera ebigambo byona eby'ebi biragiro,
kandi n'abaana baabo, abatakabimanyaga, babihurire, beegye kutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ebiro byona ebi murimara omu nsi ei murikwambuka Yorudani kuza kukubuura.

MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati: Reeba, obunaku bw'okufa kwawe buri haihi; yeta Yoshua, mwije mweyorekye omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, mbone kumukwatsa omurimo. Musa na Yoshua baagyenda, baayemurika omu Ihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
MUKAMA yaayeyoreka omuri eryo Ihema, ari omu nyomyo y'ekicu, kandi egyo nyomyo y'ekicu yaayemerera ahaiguru y'omuryango gwaryo.

Obwo bunaku ekiniga kyangye kiryabaakaho nk'omuriro, mbarugyeho, mbaime amaisho, bamarweho, bahikweho ebibi bingi n'eminyangararo; n'ahabw'ebyo omu bunaku obwo baryagira bati: Ekitureeteire kuhikwaho ebibi ebi, t'ahabw'okuba Ruhanga tari muriitwe?
Buzimazima omu bunaku obwo ndyabaima amaisho, mbature ebibi byona ebi bariba bakozire, omu kwehongyera baaruhanga abandi.
N'ahabw'ekyo muhandiikye ekyeshongoro eki, iwe okyegyese Abaisraeli, kandi okibeeshongoze, kimbeere obujurizi bw'okushinja Abaisraeli;

ahabw'okuba ku ndiheza kubahitsya omu nsi ei naarahiire kuha baishenkurubo, ensi y'amate n'obwoki, baaheza kurya n'okuhaaga, baagomoka, baryayehongyera baaruhanga abandi, babakorere, bangaye, baite endagaano yangye.

Bwanyima ku barihikwaho ebibi bingi n'eminyangararo, ekyeshongoro eki kiryaba mushinja w'okuhamya omu maisho gaabo, ahabw'okuba tikiryeba, kiryaguma nikyeshongorwa oruzaaro rwabo. Ahakuba nimmanya ebiteekateeko byabo ebi baine na hati, ntakabahikize mu nsi ei naarahiire kubaha.
Atyo Musa yaahandiika ekyeshongoro ekyo ahari eryo izooba, yaakyegyesa Abaisraeli.
Kandi MUKAMA yaayehanangiriza Yoshua mwene Nuuni, naagira ati: Ba ow'amaani, ogume omutima, ahakuba niiwe orihitsya Abaisraeli omu nsi ei naarahiire kubaha; kandi ndyaguma naiwe.
Musa ku yaaherize kuhandiika ebigambo by'ebyo biragiro omu kitabo, yaabimariramu,
yaaragiira Abaleevi abaabaire baheeka eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, naagira ati:
Mwakiire eki kitabo ky'ebiragiro, mukite aha rubaju rw'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, kigume kiri omujurizi w'okubashinja.
Ahakuba nimmanya obugomi bwanyu n'ebitsya byanyu ebigangaire. Reeba, eri izooba mwagomera MUKAMA nkibaine; kaashwa ku ndiba naafiire, muryashura ki?
Munteeranire abakuru b'enganda zaanyu boona n'abategyeki baanyu, mbone kugamba ebigambo ebi, babihurire, n'okweta eiguru n'ensi kubashinja.

Ahabw'okuba nimmanya ngu, ku ndiheza kufa, muryayesiisira kimwe, muteishukye omuhanda ogu naabaragiire; kandi omu biro ebirikurataho muryahikwaho ebibi bingi, ahabw'okuba muryakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, kumugwisa kubi n'ebi murikora n'emikono yaanyu.
Atyo Musa yaagamba ebigambo by'ekyeshongoro eki, Abaisraeli boona babihuriire, okuhitsya obu yaabiherize.
N'ensi ehuriire ebigambo by'omu kanwa kangye.
N'ebigambo byangye bitonde nk'orume,
Nk'orutoonyerera aha bunyaatsi bubisi,
Nk'orujura aha bishaka.
Ahakuba naaza kuranga eiziina rya MUKAMA.
Muhamye Ruhanga waitu ku ari mukuru rugambwa.
Ahakuba emitwarize ye yoona n'ey'oburyo;
Ni Ruhanga ow'okwesigwa, otagira kutahikiirira;
N'ow'amazima, kandi ohikiriire.
Bamukoreire ebitahikire;
Tibakiri baana be ahabw'obumogo bwabo;
N'ab'obusingye oburikwehabagiza kandi obukiikami.
Okwo nikwo murikuzimuurira MUKAMA?
Tiwe Shoimwe owaabacungwire?
Niwe yaabahangire, akabagumyaho.
Mwijukye ebiro ebya ira,
Muteekateekye aha myaka y'obusingye bwingi obwa baashwenkuriimwe.
Mubuuze baashoimwe, nibaija kubibashobororera;
Mubuuze abakuru baanyu, nibaija kubibagambira.
Akataanisa enganda z'abantu,
Obwo akataho emyatano y'amahanga,
Nk'omubaro gw'Abaisraeli oku gwabaire guri.
Ahakuba abantu ba MUKAMA nigwo mugabo gwe;
Yakobo niwe mugabo gw'obuhunguzi bwe.
Omu ihamba ei enyamaishwa zigambira;
Yaamwehinguririza, yaamutaho omutima,
Yaamurinda nk'emboni y'eriisho rye.
Nk'oku empungu esisiimura ebyana byayo,
Ekaimutsya amapapa ahaiguru yaabyo,
Ekagajanjamura, ekabitwara,
Ekabiheeka aha mapapa gaayo;
Nikwo MUKAMA wenka yaamwebembeire atyo,
Hatariho ruhanga ondiijo w'abanyamahanga owaakwataniise nawe.
Yaarya aha byezire omu misiri,
Yaamunyuunyutisa obwoki bw'omu rukiri,
N'amajuta omu rukiri orugumire munonga;
N'ebishaju by'abaana b'entaama, n'empaya z'entaama,
Amasyo ga Bashani g'ente n'ag'embuzi,
N'engano ezirikukira oburungi;
Kandi yaakunywaisa viinyo erikuruga omu shande y'emizaabibu.
K'ogomokire, okahanguha, okabengyeya!
Yaimuura Ruhanga owaamuhangire,
Yaagaya Rukiri w'okujunwa kwe.
Baamwitsa eihari ahari baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga;
Baamukwatsa ekiniga ahabw'ebirikunugwa byabo.
Baatambira baadaimoni, abatari Ruhanga Nyamuhanga,
Baaruhanga abu batakamanyaga,
Baaruhanga abasya, abahangire,
Abu baashwenkuriimwe baabaire batakamanyaga.
Rukiri owaabakire enda yaawe, toramutaireho mutima,
Waayebwa Ruhanga owaakuzaire.
MUKAMA yaakireeba, yaabatamirwa kimwe,
Ahabw'okwitsibwa ekiniga batabani be na bahara be.
Yaagira ati: Ndyabaima amaisho,
Ndeebe omuheru gwabo oku guriba;
Ahabw'okuba n'ab'obusingye bw'obugomi,
N'abaana abataine bwesigwa.
Bankwatsize ekiniga n'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa;
Naanye ndyabaitsa eihari aha bantu abatari ihanga buzima;
Mbakwatse ekiniga n'eihanga eritaine bwengye;
Kandi nigwaka okuhika okuzimu owa Nyamuteza,
Nigubuguma omu nsi n'ebigyeziremu,
Kandi nigwotsya emisingi y'enshozi.
Ndyabarundaho obubi bwingi,
Mbamarireho emyambi yangye.
Baryakuuhuzibwa enjara,
Bamarweho ekibabo ky'omuriro n'orufu orurikwita;
Ndyabahayo omu maino g'enyamaishwa,
N'aha biine obushegu ebirikugyendesa enda omu mucuucu.
N'omu nju bashangwemu ebirikutiinisa,
Bicwekyereze abatsigazi n'empangare,
Abarikwonka n'abagurusi b'enju.
Nkaagizire nti: Ndyabataataanisa, mbanagye hare,
Mbamareho, barekye kwijukwa omu bantu,
Kuri ntaratiinire kurahurwa abazigu, bakankwatsa ekiniga,
Ngu ababisha baabo barekye kwebeiha nibagira bati:
Emikono yaitu niyo eriho;
MUKAMA tiwe akozire ebi byona.
Ahakuba n'eihanga ry'abantu abatagira naama;
Kandi abataine kwetegyereza.
Bateekateeka aha by'omuheru gwabo.
N'ababiri okubinga kakumi,
Kuri Rukiri waabo atarabarekwire,
Kuri MUKAMA atarabahaireyo?
Nangwa n'abazigu baitu ahabwabo nibakihamya.
Kandi omuzaabibu gwabo gukakomooka aha gwa Sodoma,
N'omu misiri ya Gomora;
Ebijuma by'emizaabibu yaabo n'endurwe,
Emitsitsa y'ebijuma byayo neeshaarira;
Viinyo yaabo n'obushegu bw'ebijoka,
N'obushegu bw'encwera oburikwita.
Ebyo tibibiikirwe owangye,
Bikakomwa n'akamanyiso omu mabiikiro gangye?
Omu bunaku obu ebigyere byabo biriterereramu;
Ahabw'okuba ekiro kyabo eky'okuhikwaho akabi kiri haihi;
N'ekifubiro kyabo kiryarahuka;
Kandi hataine otsigaireho, yaaba muhuuku, nari ow'obusingye,
Aryabaihaho orubanja,
Agirire abairu be esaasi.
rukiri waabo ou baayesigire,
Abaabaire barya ebishaju by'ebitambo byabo,
Bakanywa viinyo y'empongano zaabo z'eby'okunywa?
Mbwenu nibaimukye, babahwere,
Babe nibo baabarinda.
Ku hatariho ruhanga ondiijo, kureka Nyowe.
Niinye nyita, nkazoora;
Kandi niinye mputaaza, nkatamba.
Tihaine orikubaasa kwiha omu mukono gwangye ou naakwatsire.
Ahakuba niinyimutsya omukono gwangye ahaiguru,
Nindahira, nk'oku mbaho ebiro byona,
Ku ndityaza rurara yangye erikumurinkana,
Omukono gwangye gwagikwata kucwa emanja;
Ndyahoora abazigu bangye,
Nzimuurire abarikuunyanga;
Emyambi yangye ndyagisinza n'eshagama,
Na rurara yangye erye enyama
Eshagama y'abaitsirwe n'ey'enkwatwa,
Okwiha aha bakuru b'abategyeki b'abazigu.
Imwe mahanga 'mwe, nimusiime abantu be;
Ahakuba aryahoorera eshagama y'abairu be,
Ahoore abazigu be,
Kandi ahongyerere ensi y'abantu be.
Musa yaija, we na Yoshua mwene Nuuni baagamba ebigambo byona eby'ekyo kyeshongoro, abantu babihuriire.
Musa ku yaaherize kugambira Abaisraeli boona ebyo bigambo byona,
yaabagira ati: Mute emitima yaanyu aha bigambo byona ebi naabeehanangiriza eri izooba, mubiragiire abaana baanyu, babone kworobera ebigambo byona eby'ebi biragiro.
Ahakuba okubyorobera ti ky'okufa busha, kureka nigo magara gaanyu, kandi nikyo kiribahaisa okuhangaarira omu nsi ei murikwambuka Yorudani kuza kukubuura.
Ahari eryo izooba MUKAMA yaagira Musa ati:
Temba oru rushozi Neebo ya Abariimu orw'omu nsi ya Moabu, orushungaine na Yeriko, oreebe ensi ya Kanaani ei ndikuha Abaisraeli kuba eyaabo;
ofeere ahari orwo rushozi oru waaza kutemba, oshangye abaanyu, nk'oku Arooni mukuru waawe yaafeereire aha rushozi Hoori, akashanga abaabo;
ahabw'okuba mukancumuraho omu maisho g'Abaisraeli, muri aha maizi ga Meriba ahari Kadeshi omu ihamba rya Ziini; kandi timwampaisa kitiinisa omu Baisraeli.
Noija kureeba egyo nsi ei ndikuha Abaisraeli omu maisho gaawe, kwonka torigihikamu.
Naagira ati:
MUKAMA akaruga Sinai;
Yaabajugutira nk'omushekye, naaruga Seiri,
Yaayakira aha rushozi Parani;
Yaaruga omu bukumi bw'abarikwera,
Omuriro guri aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo.
Abarikwera be boona bakaba bari omu mukono gwe,
Bashutami aha bigyere bye,
Nibahurira ebi arikubahabura.
Musa akaturagiira ebiragiro
Kuba obuhunguzi bw'eihanga rya Yakobo.
Atyo MUKAMA yaaba omukama omuri Yeshuruuni,
Obu abakuru b'eihanga baateerana hamwe
N'enganda za Israeli zoona.
Reubeeni agumeho, arekye kufa;
N'abantu be barekye kuba bakye.
Ai MUKAMA, hurira eiraka rya Yuda,
Omureete omu bantu be;
Akeerwanirira n'emikono ye,
Naiwe omuhe emikono kurwanisa abazigu be.
Ohe Leevi Tumimu yaawe,
Kandi Urimu yaawe ogihe omuntu waawe orikutiina Ruhanga,
Ou waagyereize ahari Maasa,
Ou waahakanisiize aha maizi ga Meriba;
Ati: Tindikubamanya;
Akooga beene ishe, kandi ateete aha baana be;
Ahakuba Abaleevi bakoorobera ekigambo kyawe,
Baakwata endagaano yaawe.
Beegyese na Israeli ebiragiro byawe;
Baryaguma nibata obubaane omu maisho gaawe,
Batambire aha itambiro ryawe ekitambo ky'okwokyeza kimwe.
Ai MUKAMA, ogume ohe omugisha ebi atungire,
Oikirize ebi arikukora n'emikono ye;
Ohondahonde obwezirikiro bw'abarikwimuka kumurwanisa,
Kandi n'obw'abarikumwanga, barekye kugaruka kwimuka.
Ahari Benyamiini yaagira ati:
Orikukundwa MUKAMA aryatuura nawe buhooro;
Agume naamusangira eizooba ryona,
Obutaaho bwe bube amabega ge.
Ahari Yosefu yaagira ati:
Ensi ye MUKAMA agihe omugisha
Gw'eby'obuguzi bwingi eby'ahaiguru omu iguru,
N'eby'ahansi okuzimu,
Ogw'ebijuma by'obuguzi bwingi ebirikwezibwa eizooba,
N'ogw'omweru mwingi ogw'emyaka eya buri kwezi,
Ogw'ebintu ebirikukira oburungi ebirikuruga omu nshozi eza ira,
N'ogw'eby'obuguzi bwingi ebirikuruga omu bibungo ebitahwaho,
N'obuganzi ahari Ogwo owaabaire ari omu rushaka ruri.
Emigisha egyo eze aha mutwe gwa Yosefu,
Aha kazingiro k'ogwo owaashoroirwe omuri beene ishe, akaba omutegyeki waabo.
Amahembe gaayo n'ag'embogo;
Eryagabingisa amahanga goona
Gahikye aha muheru gw'ensi;
Ago mahembe nibwo bukumi bwingi bwa Efuraimu,
N'enkumi nyingi za Manaase.
Ahari Zebuluuni yaagira ati:
Iwe Zebuluuni, oyesiimire amagyenda gaawe,
Naiwe Isakaari, oyesiimire amahema gaawe.
Batambireyo ebitambo by'abahikiriire;
Ahakuba banyuunyuuta ebintu bingi ebirikuruga omu nyanja,
N'eby'obutungi ebitarikumanywa ebiri omu musheenyi.
Orikuhangusya Gaadi aheebwe omugisha;
Gaadi abundama nk'entare,
Ataagura omukono n'akazingiro k'eishokye.
Akeetooranira ekicweka ky'ensi ekirikukira oburungi,
Ahakuba okwo niyo omugabo gw'omukuru w'engabo gwabaire gubiikirwe.
Yaija n'abandi bakuru b'eihanga,
Yaakwatanisa na Israeli okuhikiiriza ebiragiro bya MUKAMA,
N'eby'oburyo bye ebi yaaragiire.
Ahari Daani yaagira ati:
Daani n'ekyana ky'entare,
Ekirikuguruka nikiruga Bashani.
Ahari Nafutaali yaagira ati:
Iwe Nafutaali, ohaagire obuganzi bwa MUKAMA,
Oigutsi omugisha gwe,
Kubuura ensi y'oburengyerwa-izooba n'ey'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Asheri aheebwe omugisha gw'okuzaara abaana;
Akundwe beene ishe;
Ajabikye ekigyere kye omu majuta.
Empimbi zaawe zibe ebyoma n'emiringa;
Nk'oku ebiro byawe biriingana,
N'amaani gaawe nikwo gariba.
Oritemba eiguru naarirabamu kuza kukuhwera,
Naaraba omu kaabunga n'ekitiinisa kye kingi.
Kandi ahansi yaawe hariho emikono etahwaho.
Akabinga abazigu omu maisho gaawe,
