Yaagira ati: Bacwekyereze.
Eiziba rya Yakobo erituura ryonka
Omu nsi y'engano na viinyo;
Eego, eiguru rye ritoonyereza orume.
Eihanga eryajunirwe MUKAMA,
Engabo y'okuhwerwa kwawe,
Kandi rurara y'okusingura kwawe!
Abazigu baawe baryakugomookyera,
Oribatiirire emyanya yaabo mikuru ey'okuramizamu.
Musa yaaruga omu mpita za Moabu, yaatemba orushozi Neebo, yaahika aha mutwe gwa Pisiga, ahashungaine na Yeriko. MUKAMA yaamworeka ensi ya Gileadi yoona okuhika Daani,
na Nafutaali yoona, n'ensi ya Efuraimu na Manaase n'ensi yoona eya Yuda okuhika aha Nyanja y'oburengyerwa-izooba;
yaamworeka na Negebu, n'oruhita rwa Yorudani, nirwo ruhanga rwa Yeriko orurembo rw'emikindo, okuhika Zoari.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Eriya niyo nsi ei naarahiire ningira Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo nti: Ndyagiha oruzaaro rwawe. Mbwenu naakwikiriza kugireeba n'amaisho, kwonka toryambuka kugizamu.
Atyo Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaafeera okwo omu nsi ya Moabu, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
Yaamuziika omu ruhanga omu nsi ya Moabu ahashungaine na Besi-peori; kwonka tihariho orikumanya ahu ekituuro kye kiri n'okuhitsya hati.
Musa ogwo yaafa ahikize emyaka igana na makumi abiri, amaisho ge gatakagiirwemu ruho, n'amaani ge gatakatuubire.
Abaisraeli baamara ebiro makumi ashatu, nibacurira Musa omu mpita za Moabu. Bwanyima ebiro by'okuba omu rufu rwa Musa n'okumucurira byahwa.
Okuruga obwo tiharagarukire kubaho nabi ori nka Musa, ou MUKAMA yaabaire amanya, kandi akareebana nawe;
kandi tihariho owaakugyeragyeranisibwa nawe omu by'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza byona, ebi MUKAMA yaamutumire kukora omu nsi ya Misri, ahari Faraho n'abaheereza be boona, n'ensi ye yoona,
n'omu by'amaani maingi byona, n'ebirikutiinisa byona, ebi Musa yaakoreire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli boona.
Bwanyima y'okufa kwa Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA, MUKAMA akagambira Yoshua mwene Nuuni, omuheereza wa Musa, ati:
Musa omugaragwa wangye afiire; n'ahabw'ekyo imuka, oyambukye omugyera ogu Yorudani, iwe n'eihanga eri ryona, mutaahe omu nsi ei ndikuha Abaisraeli.
Omwanya gwona ogu muriribatamu, ngubahaire, nk'oku naagambiire Musa.
Okuruga aha ihamba n'orushozi oru Lebanooni, okuhika aha mugyera omuhango Furaati, ensi yoona ey'Abahiiti, okuhika aha Nyanja empango ey'oburengyerwa-izooba, egyo niyo eriba emyatano yaanyu.
Tihaine muntu weena oribaasa kukuza omu kaso ebiro byona eby'amagara gaawe; nk'oku naabaire ndi na Musa, nikwo ndiguma naiwe; tindikuhemukaho, kandi tindikutsigaho.
Ba ow'amaani, ogume omutima; ahakuba niiwe orihunguza eihanga eri ensi ei naarahiire kuha baishenkurubo.

Kwonka ba ow'amaani, ogumire kimwe omutima, kandi oyerinde ohitsye ebiragiro byona ebi Musa omugaragwa wangye yaakuragiire; otaribiteishukaho kutoora aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, obone kubaasikirwa, ei oriza yoona.

Ekitabo eki eky'ebiragiro kitarikuruga omu kanwa; kureka ogume nookiteekateekaho nyomushana na nyekiro, obone kwerinda, ohitsye byona ebihandiikirwemu; obwo nibwo oriheebwa omugisha ei oriza yoona, okabaasa gye byona.
Tiinye naakuragiira? Ba ow'amaani, ogume omutima; otatiina, n'obu kwakuba okuhahaaza omutima; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe aryaguma naiwe, ei oriza yoona.
Ahonaaho Yoshua yaaragiira abatware b'abantu ati:

Mugyende nimuraba omu rusiisira rwona, muragiire abantu muti: Mwekomere entanda, ahakuba omu biro bishatu nimwija kwambuka ogu mugyera Yorudani, kuza kukubuura ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha kuba eyaanyu.
Kandi Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, Yoshua yaabagira ati:
Mwijukye ekigambo eki Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabaragiire naagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahaire oburuhuukiro, kandi aryabaha ensi egi.

Abakazi baanyu n'abaana baanyu n'amatungo gaanyu biryaguma omu nsi ei Musa yaabahaire seenu ya Yorudani; kwonka imwe mwena amamanzi nimwija kwambuka, mwebembeire beene waanyu, mwine eby'okurwanisa, mubahwere,

okuhitsya obu MUKAMA ariha beene waanyu oburuhuukiro, nk'oku naimwe yaabubahaire, nabo bakakubuura ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu arikubaha. Bwanyima imwe muryagaruka omu nsi ei mwakubwire, mugirye, niyo nsi ei Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabahaire seenu ya Yorudani aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba.
Baagarukamu Yoshua nibagira bati: Ebi waaturagiira byona turyabikora, kandi yoona ei oritutuma turyazayo.
Nk'oku twayorobeire Musa omuri byona, naiwe nikwo turikworobera; kwonka MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe agume naiwe, nk'oku yaabaire ari na Musa.
Omuntu weena origomera ebiragiro byawe, akanga kuhurira ebigambo byona ebi orikumuragiira, aryaitwa. Kwonka ba ow'amaani, ogume omutima.
Haabaho owaagambira omugabe wa Yeriko, naagira ati: Twahurira ngu abashaija babiri b'Abaisraeli baija kunu eki kiro kutata ensi.
Omugabe wa Yeriko yaatuma ahari Rahabu, ati: Shohoza abantu abaizire owaawe, bakataaha omu nju yaawe; ahakuba baizire kutata ensi yoona.
Kwonka ogwo mukazi akaba yaatwaire abo bashaija babiri, yaabasherekirembwenu yaagira ati: N'eky'amazima, haine abashaija baizire owangye; kwonka timmanyire ei babaire nibaruga;
ku bwizire, bari haihi kukinga eirembo, abo bashaija baashohora; tindikumanya i batoire; murahukye kubakurata, nimwija kubakwata.
Kwonka we akashangwa yaabatembize aha mutwe gw'enju, abasherekireyo, abashwekire furakisi ei yaabaire ayanikireyo.
Abashaija b'omugabe nikwo kugyenda nibabasherura omu muhanda ogurikuza Yorudani okuhika aha nyambukiro; ahonaaho abarikubasherura ku baabaire baarugaho, eirembo ryakingwa.
Ku baabaire batakabyamire, Rahabu yaatemba, yaabashanga aha mutwe gw'enju;
yaabagira ati: Nimmanya ku Mukama abahaire egi nsi, tugizire obwoba bwingi ahabwanyu, kandi n'abatuuzi boona ab'omu nsi egi nibahwerera omu maisho gaanyu;

ahakuba tukahurira oku MUKAMA yaayomize amaizi g'Enyanja erikutukura omu maisho gaanyu, obu mwaruga Misri, kandi n'oku mwagizire abagabe b'Abaamori bombi, abaabaire bari seeri ya Yorudani, Sihooni na Ogi, abu mwacwekyerereize kimwe.

Ahonaaho ku twakihuriire, emitima yaatuhwa omunda, kandi tihaine muntu weena owaatsigairwe omutima omunda ahabwanyu; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe Ruhanga ow'ahaiguru omu iguru, kandi ow'ahansi omu nsi.
N'ahabw'ekyo nimbeeshengyereza, nk'oku mbagiriire eby'embabazi, mundahire MUKAMA, naimwe ku murizigirira enju ya tata, haza mumpe akamanyiso kahamire,
kandi ku murirokora tata na maawe, banyaanyazi na barumuna bangye n'ebi baine byona, mukakiza amagara gaitu.
Abashaija baamugarukamu bati: Nk'oku mukirize amagara gaitu, turyakiza agaanyu; ku muraabe mutatwatiire naama, turyabagirira embabazi omu mazima, MUKAMA ku arituha ensi egi.
Yaabagira ati: Muhungire omu bibungo, abarikubasherura batakaababugana; mumareyo ebiro bishatu mwesherekire, okuhitsya abarikubasherura obu baraagarukye; bwanyima mubone kwegyendera.
Abashaija baamugarukamu bati: Tituriturwa egi ndahiro ei waaturahiza.
Reeba, ku turiba twaizire omu nsi egi, oryakoma aka kagoye akarikutukura omu dirisa ei waaturabyamu, oteeranire omu nju yaawe sho na nyoko na banyaanyoko n'ab'omu ka ya sho boona.
Omuntu weena oriba yaarugire omu nju, akaza omu nguuto, eshagama ye niwe eritukurira, kwonka itwe teritubaho; kandi ou oriba oine omu nju, yaagira ekyamubaho, eshagama ye niitwe eritukurira.
Kwonka ku oritwatira enaama, titurigira rubanja rw'endahiro ei waaturahiza.
Yaagira ati: Kibe nk'oku mwagamba. Atyo yaaboohereza, baagyenda; yaakoma akagoye karikutukura omu dirisa.
Baagyenda baaza omu bibungo, baamarayo kashatu, okuhitsya obu abaabaire nibabasherura baagarukireyo; ahabw'okuba bakabasherura omu muhanda gwona, baababurira.
Bwanyima ezo entatsi zombi zaaruga omu bibungo, zaashuuma, zaayambuka; ku zaahikire ahari Yoshua mwene Nuuni, zaamuteekyerereza byona ebyazibaireho.
Zaagira Yoshua ziti: N'eky'amazima, MUKAMA atuhaire ensi egi yoona, kandi n'abatuuzi baamwo boona nibahwerera omu maisho gaitu.
Bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu abatware baagyenda baaraba omu rusiisira,
nibaragiira abantu bati: Ku muraareebe eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu eyekoreirwe abanyamurwa Abaleevi, ahonaaho murugye ahu muri, mugikuratire,
mubone kumanya omuhanda ogu muraatoore, ahakuba timukagurabamuga. Kwonka mutsigye ahagati yaanyu nayo omwanya gwa mikono nk'enkumi ibiri; mutagiirira haihi.
Yoshua yaagambira abantu ati: Mweyeze, ahabw'okuba nyencakare MUKAMA naija kukorera omuriimwe eby'okutangaaza.
Kandi Yoshua yaagambira abanyamurwa ati: Muheekye eshanduukye y'endagaano, mwambukye mwebembeire abantu. Baaheeka eshanduukye y'endagaano, baayebembera abantu.
Noija kuragiira abanyamurwa abaheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano oti: Ku muraahikye aha nkungu y'amaizi ga Yorudani, muragaremu, mwemerere.
Yoshua yaagambira Abaisraeli ati: Muhikye aha, muhurire ebigambo bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.

Yoshua yaagira ati: Eki nikyo muraamanyireho ku Ruhanga otahwaho ari omuriimwe kandi ku atariremwa kubinga Abanyakanaani omu maisho ganyu, Abahiiti, Abahiivi, Abaperizi, Abagirugashi, Abaamori n'Abayebusi.
Reeba, eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ow'ensi yoona neija kubabandiza kuza omuri Yorudani.
Mbwenu mutoorane abantu ikumi na babiri omu nganda za Israeli, omuri buri ruganda mwihemu omuntu omwe.

Ebigyere by'abanyamurwa abaheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, Mukama ow'ensi yoona, ku biraahikye omu maizi ga Yorudani, amaizi ago agarikushuuma nigaruga eruguru nigaija kuzibirwa kugyenda, geemerere geerunzire hamwe.
Batyo abantu baaruga omu mahema gaabo kwambuka Yorudani, beebembeirwe abanyamurwa abaheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano;
abaabaire bagiheekire, ku baahikire ahari Yorudani, baahitsya ebigyere byabo omu maizi, (omu igyesha amaizi ga Yorudani gaijura, garengyera aha nkungu zaayo zoona)

amaizi agaabaire nigashuuma, nigaruga eruguru, gaayemerera, gaayerunda hamwe hare munonga aha rurembo orurikwetwa Adamu aha rubaju rwa Zaretaani, n'agaabaire nigashuuma omu nyanja ya Araba, niyo Nyanja y'omwonyo, gaahweraho kimwe; abantu baayambuka bagyemire Yeriko.

Abanyamurwa, abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano eya MUKAMA, baayemerera ahoomire batarikuterera ahagati ya Yorudani; n'Abaisraeli boona baayambukira ahoomire, okuhitsya obu eihanga ryona ryaherize kwambuka Yorudani.
Iha abantu ikumi na babiri omu ihanga ryona, omuri buri ruganda oihemu omwe,
obaragiire oti: Mutorotoore amabaare ikumi n'abiri ahagati ya Yorudani, ahi ebigyere by'abanyamurwa byemereire, mugambukane, mugate ahu muraaraare eki kiro.
Yoshua yaayeta abo bantu abu yaatooraine omu Baisraeli, omuntu omwe omuri buri ruganda;

yaabagira ati: Mwirooko mwebembere eshanduukye ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu okuhika ahagati ya Yorudani, buri muntu weena omuriimwe nk'oku enganda za Israeli zirikwingana atorotoore eibaare, arite aha ibega,
ako kabe akamanyiso omuriimwe, abaana baanyu ku baribabuuza omu biro ebiriija bati: Amabaare aga nigamanyisa ki?

naimwe muryabagira ngu amaizi ga Yorudani gakacuubwamu habiri omu maisho g'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA; obu yaayambuka Yorudani, amaizi gaayo gakacuubwamu habiri. Kandi amabaare aga garyaba ekiijutsyo ky'ebiro byona aha Baisraeli.

Abaisraeli baakora nk'oku Yoshua yaabaragiira, baatorotoora amabaare ikumi n'abiri ahagati ya Yorudani agarikwingana n'omubaro gw'enganda z'Abaisraeli, nk'oku MUKAMA agambiire Yoshua; baagambukana, baahika omu mwanya ahu baaraire, baagata aho.
Kandi Yoshua nawe yaabyara amabaare ikumi n'abiri ahagati ya Yorudani ahi ebigyere by'abanyamurwa abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano byayemereire; gakibaho n'okuhitsya hati.

Abanyamurwa abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye baayemerera ahagati ya Yorudani, okuhitsya obu byona ebi MUKAMA yaagambiire Yoshua kumanyisa abantu byahweireyo, nk'ebi Musa yaaragiire Yoshua byona oku byabaire biri; abantu baayambuka nibeehuuta.
Abantu boona ku baaherize kwambuka, eshanduukye ya MUKAMA nayo yaayambuka hamwe n'abanyamurwa, abantu nibabareeba.
Aba Reubeeni n'aba Gaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase nabo baayambuka bakwaitse eby'okurwanisa, beebembeire Abaisraeli, nk'oku Musa yaabagambiire;
bari nk'obukumi buna beeteekateekyeire orugamba, baayambuka omu maisho ga MUKAMA kurwanira omu mpita za Yeriko.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati:
Ragiira abanyamurwa abaheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano, bainamukye barugye omuri Yorudani.
Yoshua nikwo kuragiira abanyamurwa ati: Mwinamukye murugye omuri Yorudani.

Kandi abanyamurwa abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ku baarugire omuri Yorudani, ebigyere byabo byahika aha nkungu, amaizi ga Yorudani gaagaruka omu mwanya gwago, gaarengyera aha nkungu zaayo zoona, nk'oku gaabaire gari.
Abantu baaruga omuri Yorudani aha kiro kya ikumi ky'okwezi kw'okubanza, baasiisira Gilugaali aha mwatano gwa Yeriko ogw'oburugwa-izooba.
Kandi amabaare gari ikumi n'abiri agu baihire omuri Yorudani, Yoshua yaagabyara Gilugaali.
Bwanyima yaagambira Abaisraeli ati: Abaana baanyu ku baribuuza baishebo omu biro ebiriija bati: Amabaare aga nigamanyisa ki?
obwo muryabashobororera muti: Abaisraeli bakambuka Yorudani egi eyomire.

Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu akoomya amaizi ga Yorudani omu maisho gaanyu, okuhitsya obu mwayambukire, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaagizire Enyanja erikutukura, ei yaayomize omu maisho gaitu, okuhitsya obu twayambukire;
ngu amahanga goona ag'ensi gabone kumanya omukono gwa MUKAMA ku guri ogw'amaani; kandi naimwe mubone kutiina MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ebiro byona.
Omu bunaku obwo MUKAMA akagambira Yoshua ati: Mwebaijere emisyo omu mabaare, oshare Abaisraeli obwa kabiri.
Yoshua yaabaija emisyo omu mabaare, yaasharira Abaisraeli aha mugongo Aralooti.
Kandi ekyareeteire Yoshua okubashara n'eki; abashaija boona abaarugire Misri bakaba baherize kugwa omu muhanda ogurikuraba omu ihamba, barimu abarwani boona abaarugire Misri.
Abantu boona abaarugire Misri bakaba bashazirwe; kwonka boona abu baazaariire omu ihamba bakiri omu muhanda baarugire Misri, bo bakaba batakashazirwe.

Ahakuba Abaisraeli bakamara emyaka makumi ana nibazengyerera omu ihamba, okuhitsya obu abashaija abarwani b'eihanga ryabo ryona baafiire bakahwaho ahabw'okutahurira iraka rya MUKAMA; kandi MUKAMA akaba yaabarahiire ku ataribaikiriza kureeba ensi ei yaaraganiise baishenkurubo kutuha, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki.
N'ahabw'ekyo abaana baabo abu MUKAMA yaagarwire omu mwanya gwabo, nibo Yoshua yaashazire; bakaba batashazirwe, ahabw'okuba tibarashazirwe bakiri omu muhanda.
Abashaija boona, ku baaherize kusharwa, baaguma omu myanya yaabo omu rusiisira, okuhitsya obu baakizire.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati: Eri izooba naabaihaho ekijumo eky'Abanyamisri. N'ahabw'ekyo omwanya ogwo gukeetwa Gilugaali n'okuhitsya hati.
Omu kasheeshe akaakuratiire Okuhingurwaho aha izooba eryo baarya aha by'okurya by'egyo nsi, emigaati etatumbisiibwe n'ebicoori bikarangire.
Ku baaherize kurya eby'okurya by'egyo nsi, omu kasheeshe akandi emaanu tiyaaboneka; kandi Abaisraeli tibaagaruka kugitunga, kureka baaguma nibarya eby'okurya by'ensi ya Kanaani ogwo mwaka.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ngaaha! Kureka naija kuba omukuru w'eihe rya MUKAMA. Yoshua yaagwa ahansi, yaajuumara, yaamuramya, yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, nooragiira ki omwiru waawe?
Omukuru w'eihe rya MUKAMA yaagira Yoshua ati: Iha enkaito omu bigyere byawe; ahakuba omwanya ogu oyemereiremu n'ogurikwera. Yoshua yaakora atyo.
Yeriko ekaba ekingiirwe kimwe ahabw'okutiina Abaisraeli; tihaine waabaire naashohora n'obu kwakuba okutaaha.
MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati: Reeba, nkuhaire Yeriko n'omugabe waayo n'abashaija baayo amamanzi g'amaani.
Imwe mwena, abashaija abarwani, nimwija kweziguurutsya orurembo omurundi gumwe; mukore mutyo amazooba mukaaga.

Kandi abanyamurwa mushanju nibaija kutwara enzamba mushanju z'amahembe g'empaya z'entaama, beebembere eshanduukye y'endagaano; aha izooba rya mushanju muziguurukye orurembo emirundi mushanju, obwo abanyamurwa nibateera enzamba.

Ku baraateere enzamba y'akasirikiriro n'eihembe ry'empaya y'entaama, naimwe mwahurira eiraka ryayo, abantu boona bateerere hamwe orwari; ahonaaho orugo rw'amabaare rw'orurembo nirwija kukumbagara, rugwe ahansi, buri muntu arutembere ahu araabe yaahika.

Bwanyima Yoshua mwene Nuuni yaayeta abanyamurwa, yaabagira ati: Muheekye eshanduukye y'endagaano, kandi n'abanyamurwa mushanju batware enzamba mushanju z'amahembe g'empaya z'entaama beebembere eshanduukye ya MUKAMA.
Kandi yaagambira abantu ati: Mwimukye, muziguurukye orurembo, abaine eby'okurwanisa barabeho beebembere eshanduukye ya MUKAMA.

Yoshua ku yaaherize kugambira abantu, abanyamurwa mushanju abaabaire baine enzamba mushanju z'amahembe g'empaya z'entaama omu maisho ga Mukama baagyenda omu maisho nibateera enzamba, eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ebakuratiire.
Abashaija abaabaire baine eby'okurwanisa baayebembera abanyamurwa abaabaire nibateera enzamba; ab'enyima baakuratira eshanduukye, obwo enzamba zigumiizemu nizigamba.
Yoshua yaaragiira abantu ati: Mutateera orwari, n'amaraka gaanyu gatahurirwa, kandi hatagira owaateeza, okuhitsya aha izooba eri ndaabaragiirireho kuteera orwari; obwo nibwo muraaruteere.
Atyo yaaziguurutsya eshanduukye ya MUKAMA orurembo omurundi gumwe; baagaruka omu rusiisira, baaraaramu.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaaguruka kare omu kasheeshe, abanyamurwa baaheeka eshanduukye ya MUKAMA.

N'abanyamurwa mushanju, abaabaire baine enzamba mushanju z'amahembe g'empaya z'entaama beebembeire eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, baarabaho, baagumizamu nibateera enzamba; n'abashaija abaabaire baine eby'okurwanisa baabeebembera, ab'enyima baakuratira eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, obwo enzamba nizigamba.
N'aha izooba rya kabiri baaziguuruka orurembo omurundi gumwe; baagaruka omu rusiisira rwabo. Baamara ebiro mukaaga nibakora batyo.
Aha izooba rya mushanju baimuka kare omushekye nigujuguta, baaziguuruka orurembo, nk'oku baabaire nibagira; kwonka aha izooba eryo baaruziguuruka emirundi mushanju.
Aha murundi gwa mushanju, abanyamurwa ku baateire enzamba, Yoshua yaagambira abantu ati: Muteere orwari! ahakuba orurembo MUKAMA yaarubaha.
Kandi orurembo n'ebirimu byona nibiija kubiikirwa MUKAMA, kureka Rahabu maraaya na boona abaraashangwe omu nju ye nibo baraakire, ahabw'okuba akashereka entumwa ezi twatumire.
Kwonka imwe mwerindire kimwe ekintu kyona ekibiikiirwe MUKAMA; ku muraabe mwabibiikire, hatakaagira owaatwara kimwe aharibyo, akareetera orusiisira rw'Abaisraeli kuhwerekyerera n'okwitwa kubi.
Kwonka efeeza yoona n'ezaabu, ebintu eby'emiringa n'ebyoma n'ebirikwera ebitooraniirwe MUKAMA; bize omu ibiikiro rye.
Baacwekyerereza kimwe ekintu kyona ekyabaire kirimu, abashaija n'abakazi, abato n'abakuru, ente n'entaama n'endogoya, baabiitsa rurara.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaagira abashaija bari ababiri abaatatsire ensi, ati: Mutaahe omu nju ya maraaya, mwihemu ogwo mukazi n'abe boona, nk'oku mwamuraganiise.
Batyo abo batsigazi abaatatsire baataahamu, baihamu Rahabu, na ishe, na nyina, na banyaanya n'ebye byona; kandi baihamu n'abu aine nabo obuzaare, baabata aheeru y'orusiisira rw'Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima baayotsya orurembo n'ebyabaire birimu byona; kwonka efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebintu by'emiringa n'ebyoma baabita omu ibiikiro ery'omu nju ya Mukama.
Kwonka Rahabu maraaya, n'enju ya ishe n'abe boona Yoshua yaabarokora; Rahabu ogwo yaatuura omuri Israeli n'okuhitsya eri izooba, ahakuba akashereka entumwa ezi Yoshua yaatumire kutata Yeriko.
Yoshua yaatuma abantu ari Yeriko kuza Ai haihi na Besaveeni, aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Beseeli, naabagira ati: Mwinamukye mutate egyo nsi. Abashaija abo baagyenda baatata Ai.

Bwanyima baagaruka ahari Yoshua, baamugira bati: Abantu boona batazayo, kureka hagyende abantu nk'enkumi ibiri nari ishatu, babe nibo baateera Ai, otaruhiza busha abantu boona, ahabw'okuba abantu baayo ni bakye.
N'ahabw'ekyo hainamukayo abantu nk'enkumi ishatu; ku baahikireyo, aba Ai baababinga.

Baabaitamu abantu nka makumi ashatu na mukaaga; baabaiha omu maisho g'amarembo gaabo, bababingire baabahitsya Shebariimu, baabaitira aha kashuumo. N'ahabw'ekyo emitima y'abantu yaayaga, yaaba nk'amaizi.
Yoshua nikwo kugira ati: Ai bambe, MUKAMA Ruhanga! Aba bantu okabambukiza ki Yorudani okutuhayo omu mikono y'Abaamori kutuhwerekyereza? Haakiri kuri twagumire seeri ya Yorudani!
Ai MUKAMA, mbwenu ngambe ki, obu Abaisraeli baateire abazigu baabo amabega!
Ahakuba Abanyakanaani n'abatwire omu nsi egi nibaija kukihurira, batukubire ahagati, bamare eiziina ryaitu omu nsi. Mbwenu oryakora ki ahabw'eiziina ryawe erikuru?
MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati: Imuka! N'enki ekikujuumaize ahansi?
Abaisraeli bacumwire, baita endagaano yangye, ei naabahaire; baatwara aha bibiikirwe, baiba, kandi baaryaraya, baabita omu bintu byabo.

Nikyo Abaisraeli batarikubaasiza kusyamirana n'abazigu baabo; nibabahunga ahabw'okuba bahindukire abakyeenirwe. Kandi tindiguma naimwe bundi, kureka biri mwahwerekyereza ebibiikiirwe MUKAMA ebiri omuriimwe.

Imuka, oyeze abantu, kandi obagire oti; Mweyeze ahabw'eizooba rya nyencakare; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli naagira ati: Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, omuriimwe harimu ebibiikiirwe MUKAMA; timurikubaasa kusyamirana n'abazigu baanyu, okuhitsya obu muraihe omuriimwe ebibiikirwe.

N'ahabw'ekyo omu kasheeshe nimwija kureetwa haihi omu nganda zaanyu; kandi oruganda oru MUKAMA araatoorane nirwija kwija nk'emiryango yaarwo oku eri; kandi omuryango ogu MUKAMA araatoorane nigwija kwija nk'amaju gaagwo oku gari; kandi enju ei MUKAMA araatoorane hagume nihaija omuntu omwe-omwe.
Kandi oraakwatwe aine ebintu ebibiikirwe naija kwokibwa n'ebi aine byona; ahakuba aitsire endagaano ya MUKAMA, yaakora ekirikuhemura omu Baisraeli.
Yoshua yaaguruka kare omu kasheeshe, yaateeranira hamwe Abaisraeli omu nganda zaabo; oruganda rwa Yuda rwatooranwa;
yairiza haihi emiryango ya Yuda, haatooranwamu omuryango gwa Zeera; yairiza haihi ab'enju ya Zeera omwe-omwe, Zabudi yaatooranwa;
yairiza haihi ab'enju ya Zabudi omwe-omwe, haatooranwa Akani mwene Karumi, mwijukuru wa Zabudi, mwene Zeera ow'omu ruganda rwa Yuda.
Yoshua yaagira Akani ati: Mwana wangye, ninkweshengyereza, heereza MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli ekitiinisa, omwaturire; kandi ongambire hati mbwenu eki okozire, otakinshereka.
Akani yaagarukamu Yoshua, naagira ati: N'eky'amazima ncumwire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, kandi eki nikyo nkozire.

Ku ndeebire omu minyago ekijwaro kirungi kya Shinaari na shekeli magana abiri z'efeeza kandi n'omuhimba gw'ezaabu ogwine oburemeezi bwa shekeli makumi ataano, naabyetenga, naabitwara; na mbwenu bisherekire omu itaka, biri omu ihema ryangye ahagati, n'efeeza eri ahansi yaabyo.
Yoshua nikwo kutuma entumwa, zikairuka, zikataaha omu ihema, zikashanga bisherekire omu ihema rye n'efeeza eri ahansi yaabyo;
bakabiihamu bakabireetera Yoshua n'Abaisraeli boona, bakabita ahansi omu maisho ga MUKAMA.

Yoshua n'Abaisraeli boona baatwara Akani mutabani wa Zeera n'efeeza n'ekijwaro n'omuhimba gw'ezaabu n'abatabani na bahara be n'ente ze n'endogoya ze n'entaama ze n'eihema rye n'ebi yaabaire aine byona, baabishuumya omu ruhanga rwa Akori.
Ku baahikireyo, Yoshua yaamubuuza ati: Otwitiire ki kubi? Naiwe MUKAMA yaaza kukwita kubi eri izooba. Abaisraeli boona baamuteera amabaare; ku baaherize kubateera amabaare, baabootsya n'omuriro.

Bwanyima baamurundaho omutuumo muhango gw'amabaare, ogukiriho n'eri izooba. Okuruga obwo MUKAMA yaayegarukamu, yaareka ekiniga kye kingi. Na mbwenu omwanya ogwo nigukyetwa Oruhanga rwa Akori n'okuhitsya hati.
Noija kugira Ai n'omugabe waayo nk'oku waagizire Yeriko n'omugabe waayo; kwonka eminyago yaayo n'ente zaayo mubyetwarire, bibe eminyago yaanyu; mugwere enyima y'orurembo.
Yoshua nikwo kwimuka n'engabo ze zoona kuza kuteera Ai; akatoorana abashaija b'amaani amamanzi obukumi bushatu, akaboohereza nyekiro;
Kandi akabaragiira ati: Reeba, nimwija kugwera enyima y'orurembo; mutaruza hare munonga, kureka mugume mweteekateekire;
nyowe n'abantu abu nyine nitwija kwirira haihi n'orurembo; ku baraije kuturwanisa nk'okubanza, nitwija kubahunga;
nabo nibaija kwija batubingire, okuhitsya obu turaababeihabeihe tukabaiha omu rurembo; ahakuba nibaija kugira bati: Baatuhunga nk'okubanza; itwe nitwija kugumizamu kubahunga;
haza imwe abaaba babagwereire mwimukye mukwate orurembo; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu naija kuruhayo omu mikono yaanyu.
Ku muraaheze kurukwata, murutwekyemu omuriro; mutwaze nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaragiire; ekyo nikyo naabaragiira.
Yoshua yaaboohereza, baaza ahu barikuza kugwera, baaraara ahagati ya Beseeli na Ai aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba bwa Ai; kwonka ekyo kiro Yoshua we yaaraara n'abatsigaireyo.
Yaimuka kare omu kasheeshe, yaateerana abantu, yainamuka n'abakuru b'Abaisraeli, beebembeire abantu nibaza Ai.
Abantu boona abarwani abu yaabaire aine bainamuka, baahika haihi omu maisho g'orurembo, baasiisira aha rubaju rwa bumosho orwa Ai; aho hakaba hariho oruhanga ahagati yaabo na Ai.
Bwanyima yaatwara abantu nk'enkumi itaano, yaabaragiira kugwera ahagati ya Beseeli na Ai aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba bw'orurembo.

Okwo nikwo baatengire orugamba; eihe ry'amaani bakarita aha rubaju rwa bumosho rw'orurembo, n'abandi ab'okugwera, baabata aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba; kwonka Yoshua ekyo kiro yaakiraara omu ruhanga.

Omugabe wa Ai ku yaakireebire, we n'abantu be boona ab'omu rurembo baimuka kare n'obwira, baaza kurwanisa Abaisraeli aharikushuuma omu ruhita; kwonka tiyaamanya ku hariho abagwereire enyima y'orurembo.
Yoshua n'Abaisraeli boona baayehindura nk'abaabingwa omu maisho gaabo, baahunga nibatoora omu ihamba.
N'abantu boona abaabaire bari omu rurembo baayetwa kuteeranira hamwe kubakurata; ku baayeyongyeire kubinga Yoshua, baayeyongyera kuza hare n'orurembo.
Tihaagira mushaija weena owaatsigara omuri Ai nari omuri Beseeli, otarashohoire kubinga Abaisraeli; baatsiga orurembo rurangaire, baakurata Abaisraeli.
MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati: Imutsya eicumu ryawe eri okwaitse, oryorekye Ai; ahakuba naaza kugihayo omu mikono yaawe. Yoshua yaimutsya eicumu eri yaabaire akwaitse, yaaryoreka Ai.
Ku yaagoroire omukono gwe, abaabaire bagwereire ahonaaho baimuka ahu baabaire bari, bairuka, baataaha omu rurembo; baarukwata, baarahuka baarutwekamu omuriro.
Aba Ai ku baanagire amaisho enyima, baareeba omwika nigutuumuuka ahaiguru, baabura agahungira oku nari kuriya, ahakuba abaabaire bahungiire omu ihamba bakahindukana abaabaire bababingire.
Yoshua n'ab'Abaisraeli boona ku baareebire abaabaire bagwereire baakwata orurembo, kandi baareeba n'omwika gw'omu rurembo nigutuumuuka ahaiguru, baagaruka, baita abantu ba Ai.
N'abaakwatsire orurembo baashohora kubarwanisa; aba Ai nikwo kukubirwa ahagati y'Abaisraeli, bakabareetwa oku n'oku, bakabaita, hakabura owaahonoka aha icumu, n'obu kwakuba okuhunga.
Omugabe wa Ai we baamukwata ahuriire, baamureetera Yoshua.

Abaisraeli ku baaherize kwitira kimwe aba Ai boona omu bwerere omu irungu, ei baabaire babakuratiire, n'abandi boona baabaita na rurara, okuhitsya obu baabamariireho kimwe, baagaruka Ai, baagihwerekyereza na rurara.
Abantu boona aba Ai, abaafiire eryo izooba, abashaija n'abakazi, bakaba bari kakumi n'enkumi ibiri;
ahakuba Yoshua taragwisize mukono gwe, ogwabaire gwimukize eicumu, okuhitsya obu yaaherize kucwekyerereza kimwe aba Ai boona.
Kureka ente n'eminyago eby'omuri orwo rurembo Abaisraeli bakabyetwarira, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambiire Yoshua.
Yoshua yaayotsya Ai, yaagihindura amatongo agatarituurwamu ebiro byona, nk'oku kiri na hati.

Yaahanika omugabe wa Ai aha muti okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; kandi eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, Yoshua yaaragiira, baahanura omutumbi gwe, baagunaga omu maisho g'eirembo ry'orurembo, baagurundaho omutuumo muhango gw'amabaare, ogukiriho n'okuhitsya eri izooba.

nk'oku Musa omugaragwa wa Mukama yaaragiire Abaisraeli, kandi nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo eky'ebiragiro bya Musa, okuryombekyesa amabaare gatabaizire, agu omuntu weena atakatahoga kyoma; baaritambiriraho MUKAMA ebitambo ebyokize, baahayo empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Kandi aho niho yaahandiikiire ahari ago mabaare omu maisho g'Abaisraeli ebiragiro ebi Musa yaahandiikire.

Abaisraeli boona, enzaarwa n'abanyamahanga, n'abakuru baabo n'abategyeki n'abaramuzi, baayemerera embaju zombi z'eshanduukye ya MUKAMA omu maisho g'abanyamurwa b'Abaleevi, abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA; ekicweka kimwe kyayemerera omu maisho g'akabungo Gerizimu, kandi ekindi kyayemerera omu maisho g'akabungo Ebali; nk'oku Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaaragiire okubanza, kushabira Abaisraeli omugisha.
Bwanyima yaashoma ebigambo by'ebiragiro byona, eby'omugisha n'eby'emikyeeno, nk'oku byona byabaire bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebiragiro.
Tihariho kigambo na kimwe ahari byona ebi Musa yaaragiire, eki Yoshua atarashomeire mu maisho g'Abaisraeli boona, obwo harimu abakazi n'abaana n'abanyamahanga abaabaire nibagyenda nabo.
baayeteerana n'omutima gumwe kurwanisa Yoshua n'Abaisraeli.
baacwa obwengye, baayehindura entumwa, baakoma entanda, baatwara ebiguniya aha ndogoya zaabo n'efurebe za viinyo ezikuzire eziteire ebiremu,
baajwara enkaito zikuzire, ezibambatikire ebiremu, n'emyenda y'obucancabari; kandi entanda zaabo zoona ez'emigaati zikaba zoomire kandi zihumbire.
Baimuka, baashanga Yoshua n'Abaisraeli omu rusiisira Gilugaali, baabagira bati: Nituruga omu nsi ya hare; n'ahabw'ekyo muturaganise endagaano.
Abaisraeli baagarukamu Abahiivi bati: Obundi mukaaba mutwire naitwe; mbwenu obwo nitubaasa tuta kukora naimwe endagaano?
Baagira Yoshua bati: Turi abairu baawe. Yoshua yaababuuza ati: Muri baahi? kandi nimuruga hi?
Baamugarukamu bati: Itwe abairu baawe nituruga omu nsi ya hare; ekitureetsire aha n'eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ahakuba tukahurira okurangaanwa kwe n'ebi yaakozire omuri Misri byona,
kandi n'oku yaagizire abagabe b'Abaamori bombi aba seeri ya Yorudani, Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni, na Ogi omugabe wa Bashani, owaabaire atwire Ashitaroosi.
Mbwenu abakuru baitu n'abantu b'owaitu boona bakatugira ngu, Mutware entanda ahabw'orugyendo, mugyende mubabugane, mubagire muti: Turi abairu baanyu; mbwenu muturaganise endagaano.
Kandi entanda zaitu ezi tukazikomera omu maka gaitu nizikyotsya, aha izooba eri twaimukiireho nitwija kubareeba; mbwenu reeba, zaayomire, kandi zaahumbire.
Kandi efurebe ezi tukaziijuza viinyo zikirinsya; mbwenu reeba, zifumagurukire. Ebijwaro n'enkaito bitukuriireho ahabw'orugyendo ruraingwa munonga.
Abaisraeli baikiriza ahabw'okureeba eby'okurya byabo, batabuurize MUKAMA.
Yoshua yaaragaana nabo endagaano y'obusingye, ku ataribaita; n'abakuru b'eihanga baabarahira.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu baherize kuragaana nabo, baahurira ku bari bataahi baabo, kandi ku batwire nabo.
Abaisraeli baagyenda, baahika aha ndembo zaabo aha kiro kya kashatu. Endembo zaabo zikaba ziri Gibeoni, Kefira, Beeroosi na Kiryasi-yearimu.
Kwonka Abaisraeli tibaabaita, ahakuba abakuru b'eihanga bakabarahira MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli. Eihanga ryona ryayetomboitera abakuru.
Kwonka abakuru boona baagambira eihanga ryona bati: Tubarahiire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli; n'ahabw'ekyo titurikubaasa kubakoraho.
Eki turaakore nikwo kubareka bahuriire, tutakaahikwaho ekiniga ahabw'okwita endahiro ei tubarahiire.
Kandi abakuru baabagira bati: Mubarekye bagumeho. Bwanyima baahinduka abasheenyi b'enku n'abatahi b'amaizi b'eihanga ryona, nk'oku abakuru baabagambiire.
Kandi Yoshua yaabeeta, yaabagira ati: Mutubeiheire ki, nimugira muti: Tubari hare munonga; haza kunu mutwire naitwe?
N'ahabw'ekyo mbwenu mwakyeenwa; kandi abamwe omuriimwe baryaba abahuuku b'okusheenya enku n'okutaha amaizi ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga wangye.

Baagarukamu Yoshua bati: Manya itwe abairu baawe tukagambirirwa kimwe ku MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe yaaragiire Musa omugaragwa we kubaha ensi yoona n'okuhwerekyereza abagitwiremu boona, bakahweraho kimwe omu maisho gaanyu; nikyo twabatiiniire munonga ngu tutafa, tukakora tutyo.
Mbwenu nu, reeba turi omu mikono yaawe; otukore kyona eki orikureeba ngu ni kirungi kandi kihikire omu maisho gaawe.
Nikwo yaabagizire atyo; akabakiza omu mikono y'Abaisraeli, tibaabaita.
Okuruga obwo Yoshua yaabahindura abasheenyi b'enku n'abatahi b'amaizi b'eihanga n'eitambiro rya MUKAMA omu mwanya gwona ogu yaabaire atoorana n'okuhitsya hati.
yaatiina munonga, ahakuba Gibeoni rukaba ruri orurembo rw'amaani nk'endembo z'abagabe ezindi oku zaabaire ziri, nangwa rukaba nirukira na Ai, n'abashaija baayo bari amamanzi.
Nikyo kyareeteire Adoni-zedeki omugabe wa Yerusaalemu kutuma ahari Hohamu omugabe wa Heburooni na Piramu omugabe wa Yaramuusi na Yafia omugabe wa Lakishi, na Debira omugabe wa Egulooni, naagira ati:
Mwinamukye, mumpe emikono, tuteere Gibeoni; ahakuba eragaine na Yoshua n'Abaisraeli eby'obusingye.

N'ahabw'ekyo abagabe bataano b'aba Amori, omugabe wa Yerusaalemu, omugabe wa Heburooni, omugabe wa Yaramuusi, omugabe wa Lakishi, n'omugabe wa Egulooni, baayeteeranira hamwe n'amahe gaabo goona, bainamuka, baasiisira ahari Gibeoni, baagirwanisa.

Aba Gibeoni baatuma ahari Yoshua omu rusiisira Gilugaali nibagira bati: Otahinya omukono gwawe kureka abairu baawe; rahuka otuhe emikono, otuhwere; ahakuba abagabe boona b'Abaamori abatwire omu nsi y'ebibungo beeteeraine kuturwanisa.
Atyo Yoshua yainamuka naaruga Gilugaali, we n'engabo ze zoona, kandi n'abashaija boona ab'amaani amamanzi.
MUKAMA yaagira Yoshua ati: Otabatiina, ahakuba mbahaireyo omu mikono yaawe; kandi tihariho mushaija weena aharibo oraasyamirane naiwe.
Ahonaaho Yoshua yaabagwaho, ahabw'okuba akaija ekiro kyona, naaruga Gilugaali.

MUKAMA yaabahahaaza emitima omu maisho g'Abaisraeli, baabaitamu abantu baingi munonga omuri Gibeoni, abandi baababinga nibabatooza ogurikwinamuka Besi-horoni, baagyenda nibabaita okuhika Azeka na Makeda.

Ku baabaire nibahunga Abaisraeli nibashuuma kuruga Besi-horoni, MUKAMA yaabateeza emengo z'orubaare niziruga omu iguru, baagyenda nibafa okuhitsya obu baahikire Azeka; abaitsirwe orubaare baakira abu Abaisraeli baitsize rurara.
Iwe izooba 'we, yemerera ahaiguru ya Gibeoni,
Naiwe kwezi 'we, yemerera ahaiguru y'oruhanga rwa Ayalooni.
Okuhitsya obu eryo ihanga ryaherize kuhoora abazigu baaryo.
Timurikumanya ekyo ku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Yashari? Eizooba ryayemerera ahagati y'eiguru, tiryarahuka kurenga, ryamara omwanya nk'ogw'eizooba ryona.
Tihariho izooba erirabaire nk'eryo omu gaaribandiize n'agaakuratsireho, obu MUKAMA yaahurira eiraka ry'omuntu; ahakuba MUKAMA akarwanirira Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaatabaaruka n'Abaisraeli boona, baagaruka omu rusiisira Gilugaali.
Abagabe bari abataano baahunga, baayeshereka omu nyanga eyaabaire eri Makeda.
Yoshua yaagambirwa ku abo bagabe bataano baashangirwe beesherekire omu nyanga ya Makeda.
Yoshua yaaragiira ati: Mukumbagaze amabaare mahango, mugate aha munwa gw'enyanga, muteho n'abashaija b'okubarinda;
kwonka mutasiibayo; kureka mukurate abazigu baanyu, mutandikire aha b'enyima, mubaite mutabaikiriza kutaaha omu ndembo zaabo; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu abahaireyo omu mikono yaanyu.
Yoshua n'Abaisraeli ku baaherize kwitira kimwe baingi munonga omuribo, abaatsigaireho baahungira omu ndembo eziine engo zigumire,
abantu boona baagaruka n'obusingye ahari Yoshua omu rusiisira Makeda; kandi tihaagira n'omwe owaagaruka kwimutsya orurimi kujuma Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaaragiira ati: Mwigure enyanga, mushohoze abo bagabe bataano, mubandeetere.
Baakora batyo, baiha abo bagabe bataano omu nyanga, baabamureetera, omugabe wa Yerusaalemu, owa Heburooni, owa Yaramuusi, owa Lakishi, n'owa Egulooni.

Ku baaherize kushohoza abo bagabe, baabamureetera, Yoshua yaayeta Abaisraeli boona, yaagambira abakuru b'engabo abaahurwire nawe, ati: Mwirire haihi, muribate aba bagabe aha bitsya. Bairira haihi, baabaribata aha bitsya.
Yoshua yaabagambira ati: Mutatiina, kandi mutahahaaza emitima; mube ab'amaani, mugume emitima; ahabw'okuba nikwo MUKAMA arigira ati abazigu baanyu boona abu murirwanisa.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaabacumita, yaabaita, yaabahanika aha miti etaano; baaguma aha miti okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.

Eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, Yoshua yaaragiira, baabahanura aha miti, baabanaga omu nyanga omu baabaire beesherekire, baarunda amabaare mahango aha munwa gwayo, n'okuhitsya eri izooba gakibaho.

Eryo izooba Yoshua yaakwata Makeda; abantu baayo n'omugabe waayo yaabaitsa rurara; yaabacwekyerereza kimwe; tiyaatsigaho n'omwe ahari boona abaabaire barutwiremu. Kandi yaagira omugabe wa Makeda nk'oku yaagizire owa Yeriko.
Yoshua n'Abaisraeli boona baaruga Makeda, baateera Libuna, baagirwanisa;
nayo MUKAMA yaagihayo omu mikono y'Abaisraeli n'omugabe waayo; baabaitsa rurara, tibaatsigaho n'omwe ahari boona abaabaire barutwiremu. Yoshua yaagira omugabe waayo nk'oku yaagizire owa Yeriko.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaaruga Libuna n'Abaisraeli boona, baahurura Lakishi, baateerayo orusiisira kugirwanisa.
MUKAMA yaahayo Lakishi omu mikono y'Abaisraeli, baagikwata aha kiro kya kabiri, baagihwerekyereza na rurara, baita abantu boona abaabaire barimu, nk'oku baagizire Libuna omuri byona.
Yoshua yaaruga Lakishi n'Abaisraeli boona, baahurura Egulooni, baateerayo orusiisira kugirwanisa.
Baagikwata aha izooba eryo, baagihwerekyereza na rurara, n'abantu baamwo boona baabacwekyerereza kimwe eryo izooba, nk'oku yaagizire Lakishi omuri byona.

baagikwata, baagihwerekyereza na rurara, n'omugabe waayo n'endembo zaayo zoona, n'abantu baamwo boona; tiyaatsigaho muntu n'omwe, nk'oku yaagizire Egulooni omuri byona; kureka yaagicwekyerereza kimwe n'abantu baamwo boona.
Yoshua yaagaruka n'Abaisraeli boona, baahurura Debira, baagirwanisa,

yaagikwata n'omugabe waayo n'endembo zaayo zoona; baagihwerekyereza na rurara, baacwekyereza abantu baayo boona; tiyaatsigaho n'omwe. Nk'oku yaagizire Heburooni, na Libuna n'omugabe waayo, nikwo yaagizire Debira n'omugabe waayo.
Yoshua yaabaita okuruga Kadeshi-barunea okuhika Gaaza, n'ensi yoona eya Gosheni okuhika Gibeoni.
Abo bagabe boona n'ensi yaabo Yoshua akabakwata omu hururu emwe; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli akabarwanirira.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaatabaaruka n'Abaisraeli boona, baagaruka omu rusiisira Gilugaali.
n'aha bagabe abaabaire batwire aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho omu nsi y'ebibungo n'omuri Araba aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo obwa Kineroosi, omu mpita n'omu bibungo bya Doori aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba,
n'ah'Abanyakanaani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba n'oburengyerwa-izooba, n'ah'Abaamori n'Abahiiti n'Abaperizi n'Abayebusi omu nsi y'ebibungo, n'ah'Abahiivi ahansi ya Herumooni omu nsi ya Mizipa.
Baahurura n'amahe gaabo goona, engabo nyingi munonga ezirikwingana n'omusheenyi ogw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja, baine embaraasi n'ebigaari bingi munonga.
Abo bagabe boona baayeteerana, baija baasiisira hamwe aha nyanja ya Meromu kurwanisa Abaisraeli.
MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati: Otabatiina, ahakuba boona niinyija kubahayo omu mikono y'Abaisraeli kubaita; embaraasi zaabo muziteme ebiteega, n'ebigaari byabo mubyotsye n'omuriro.
Yoshua nikwo kwija n'engabo ze zoona, bakabagwaho aha nyanja ya Meromu batakimanyire;

MUKAMA akabahayo omu mikono y'Abaisraeli, bakabaita, bakababinga, bakabahitsya Sidoni empango na Miserofoosi-maimu n'omu ruhanga rwa Mizipe aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba; bakabaita, batatsigyeho n'omwe.
Kandi Yoshua yaabagira nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire; yaatema ebiteega by'embaraasi zaabo, n'ebigaari byabo yaabyotsya.
Omu biro ebyo Yoshua yaakubuuka, yaakwata Hazori, yaitsa omugabe waayo rurara; ahakuba obunyakare Hazori ekaba eri omutwe gw'obugabe obwo bwona.
Abaisraeli baitsa rurara boona abaabaire barimu, baabacwekyerereza kimwe; tihaatsigaraho n'omwe orikwitsya; n'orurembo Hazori baarwotsya.
Kandi endembo zoona ez'abo bagabe Yoshua yaazikwata, n'abagabe baazo boona yaabaitsa rurara, yaabacwekyerereza kimwe, nka Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA oku yaaragiire.
Kwonka Abaisraeli tibarookize rurembo na rumwe ahari ezo ezaayombekirwe aha mituumo y'ezindi, kureka Hazori yonka; niyo Yoshua yaayokize.

Kandi eminyago yoona n'amatungo goona ebyarugire omu ndembo ezo Abaisraeli bakabyetwarira; kwonka abantu boona baabaitsa rurara, okuhitsya obu baabahwerekyerereize kimwe, batatsigyeho n'omwe orikwitsya.
Nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa omugaragwa we, nikwo Musa yaaragiire Yoshua, na Yoshua nikwo yaatwarize; taine kyona eki yaatsigire kitakozirwe ahari byona ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Okwo nikwo Yoshua yaakubwire egyo nsi yoona, ey'enshozi na Negebu yoona, n'ensi ya Gosheni yoona, n'ey'empita na Araba, n'ey'ebibungo bya Israeli n'empita zaayo,
okwiha aha kibungo kya Halaki ekirikwinamuka Seiri, okuhitsya Baali-gaadi omu ruhanga rwa Lebanooni ahansi y'orushozi Herumooni. N'abagabe baayo boona yaabakwata, yaabacumita, yaabaita.
Yoshua yaamara omwanya muhango naarwanisa abo bagabe boona.
Tihariho rurembo orwaragaine kugira n'Abaisraeli obusingye, kureka Abahiivi abaabaire batwire Gibeoni; ezindi zoona bakazirwanisa, baazikwata;

ahakuba ekyo kikaruga ahari MUKAMA kugangaaza emitima yaabo, bakaza kurwanisa Abaisraeli, ngu abone kubahwerekyerereza kimwe, barekye kugirirwa embabazi, kureka bahwerekyerezibwe, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Tihaine Muanaki n'omwe owaatsigaireho omu nsi y'Abaisraeli; kureka omuri Gaaza na Gaasi na Ashidoodi nimwo haatsigaire bamwe.

Nikwo Yoshua yaakwatsire atyo ensi yoona, nk'ebi MUKAMA yaagambiire Musa byona oku byabaire biri, Yoshua yaagiha Abaisraeli kuba obuhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku enganda zaabo zaabaire ziri. Bwanyima ensi yaahuumura engamba.

Aba nibo bagabe b'ensi, abu Abaisraeli baitsire, bakakubuura ensi yaabo seeri ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, okuruga omu ruhanga rwa Arunooni, okuhika aha rushozi Herumooni, na Araba yoona ey'oburugwa-izooba;

Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, owaabaire atwire Heshibooni, naategyeka okuruga Aroeri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni n'ahagati omu ruhita, n'ekicweka kya Gileadi okuhitsya aha mugyera Yaboki, omu mwatano gw'Abaamoni;

kandi okuruga Araba okuhitsya aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bw'enyanja Kineroosi n'aha muhanda ogurikuza Besi-yeshimoosi oburugwa-izooba bw'enyanja ya Araba, Enyanja y'omwonyo; kandi aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo okuhika ahansi y'akashuumo k'orushozi Pisiga.
Kandi na Ogi omugabe wa Bashani, omwe aha baatsigaireho omu Bareefa, owaabaire atwire Ashitaroosi na Edurei,
naategyeka orushozi Herumooni, na Saleka, na Bashani yoona okuhika aha mwatano gw'aba Geshuri n'aba Maaka, n'ekicweka kya Gileadi okuhika aha mwatano gwa Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni.
Abo nibo Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA n'Abaisraeli baitsire; kandi ensi yaabo Musa akagiha Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase kuba eyaabo.

Kandi aba nibo bagabe b'ensi abu Yoshua n'Abaisraeli baitsire seenu ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba okuruga Baali-gaadi omu ruhanga rwa Lebanooni okuhika aha kibungo Halaki ogurikwinamuka Seiri; kandi egyo nsi niyo Yoshua yaahaire enganda za Israeli kuba eyaabo, nk'oku baagibaganisiziibwe;
omu nsi y'ebibungo n'omu mpita n'omuri Araba n'omu nkiizi z'emigongo n'omu ihamba n'omuri Negebu, n'ensi y'Abahiiti n'ey'Abaamori n'ey'Abanyakanaani n'ey'Abaperizi n'ey'Abahiivi n'ey'Abayebusi.
Omugabe wa Yeriko omwe; omugabe wa Ai eri aha rubaju rwa Beseeli omwe;
omugabe wa Yerusaalemu omwe; omugabe wa Hebulooni omwe;
omugabe wa Yaramuusi omwe; omugabe wa Lakishi omwe;
omugabe wa Egulooni omwe; omugabe wa Gezeeri omwe;
omugabe wa Debira omwe; omugabe wa Gederi omwe;
omugabe wa Horuma omwe; omugabe wa Aradi omwe;
omugabe wa Libuna omwe; omugabe wa Adulaamu omwe;
omugabe wa Makeda omwe; omugabe wa Beseeli omwe;
omugabe wa Tapua omwe; omugabe wa Heferi omwe;
omugabe wa Afeki omwe; omugabe wa Lasharooni omwe;
omugabe wa Madoni omwe; omugabe wa Hazori omwe;
omugabe wa Shimurooni-meroni omwe; omugabe wa Akishaafu omwe;
omugabe wa Tanaki omwe, omugabe wa Megido omwe;
omugabe wa Kedeshi omwe, omugabe wa Yokineamu omuri Karumeeli omwe;
omugabe wa Doora omu bibungo bya Doori omwe; omugabe wa Goimu omuri Galilaaya omwe;
omugabe wa Tiruza omwe; abagabe boona makumi ashatu n'omwe.
Ensi ekitsigaire n'egi; ebyanga byona eby'Abafilistia n'eby'aba Geshuri byona

(okwiha Shihoori eri aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Misri okuta aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho aha mwatano gwa Ekurooni, n'ah'Abanyakanaani; kandi abategyeki bataano b'Abafilistia n'aba; owa Gaaza, owa Ashidoodi, owa Ashkelooni, owa Gaasi n'owa Ekurooni), n'eby'aba Avimu,
kandi aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, ensi yoona ey'Abanyakanaani, na Meara ey'aba Sidoni, okuhika Afeki aha mwatano gw'Abaamori,
n'ensi y'aba Gebali na Lebanooni yoona aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, okuruga Baali-gaadi ahansi y'orushozi Herumooni okuhika ah'orikutaahira omuri Hamasi,

n'abatwire omu nsi y'ebibungo boona okuruga Lebanooni okuhika Miserofoosi-maimu, n'aba Sidoni boona, ndyababinga omu maisho g'Abaisraeli; kwonka ogibaganisize Abaisraeli kuba obuhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku naakuragiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati ensi egi ogibaganisize enganda mwenda n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase kuba obuhunguzi bwabo.
okuruga Aroeri eri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni, n'orurembo oruri ahagati y'orwo ruhanga, n'omurambi gwona ogwa Medeba okuhika Diboni;
n'endembo zoona eza Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamoni owaategyekyeire Heshibooni, okuhika aha mwatano gw'Abaamoni;
na Gileadi n'omu myatano y'aba Geshuri n'aba Maaka, n'orushozi rwa Herumooni rwona, na Bashani okuhika Saleka;
n'obugabe bwona obwa Ogi omuri Bashani, owaategyekyeire Ashitaroosi na Edurei, Ogi ogwo n'omwe ahari abo abaatsigaireho omu Bareefa; abo nibo Musa yaarwaine nabo akabinga.
Kwonka Abaisraeli bo tibarabingire ba Geshuri nari aba Maaka; kureka aba Geshuri n'aba Maaka bakituura nabo n'okuhitsya hati.
Kwonka oruganda rwa Leevi rwo Musa tararuhaire buhunguzi, kureka ebitambo ebyokize eby'okuhayo ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli nibwo buhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambiire Musa.
Musa yaaha oruganda rwa Reubeeni obuhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga kyabo kikaba nikitandikira Aroeri aha rubaju rw'oruhanga rwa Arunooni, n'orurembo rw'ahagati yaarwo, n'omurambi gwona ogwa Medeba;
na Heshibooni n'endembo zaayo zoona eziri omu mirambi; na Diboni na Bamosi-baali na Besi-baali-meoni;
na Yahazi na Kedemoosi na Mefaasi;
na Kiryasaimu na Sibuma na Zeresi-shahaari aha kabungo akari omu ruhita;
na Besi-peori n'enkiizi za Pisiga, na Besi-yeshimoosi;

ezo nizo ndembo zoona ez'omu mirambi; n'obugabe bwona bwa Sihooni omugabe w'aba Amori, owaategyekyeire Heshibooni, ou Musa yaitsire hamwe n'abategyeki ba Midiani Evi, Rekemu, Zuuri, Huuri na Reeba, abanyiginya ba Sihooni abaabaire batwire omu nsi egyo.
Kandi omwatano gw'aba Reubeeni gukaba guri Yorudani. Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'aba Reubeeni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo byabaire biri.
Kandi Musa yaaha oruganda rwa Gaadi obuhunguzi bwabo nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga kyabo kikaba kiri Yazeri, n'endembo zoona eza Gileadi, n'ekicweka ky'ensi y'Abaamoni okuhitsya Aroeri aharikureebana na Rabba;
kandi okuruga Heshibooni okuhika Ramasi-mizipe na Betonimu; kandi okuruga Mahanaimu okuhika aha mwatano gwa Debira;

n'endembo z'omu ruhita, Besi-haramu, Besi-nimura, Sukoosi na Zafooni, n'ekicweka ky'obugabe bwa Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni ekyabaire kitsigaireho, omwatano gukaba guri Yorudani okuhika aha isheeshero ry'enyanja ya Kinereesi oburugwa-izooba bwa Yorudani.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'aba Gaadi, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo.
Kandi Musa yaaha ab'ekicweka ku'oruganda rwa Manaase obuhunguzi bwabo, bwaba obw'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga kyabo kikaba kiri okuruga Mahanaimu na Bashani yoona n'obugabe bwa Ogi omugabe wa Bashani bwona, na tauni zoona eza Yairi eziri omuri Bashani, endembo makumi mukaaga;
kandi ekicweka kya Gileadi na Ashitaroosi na Edurei, endembo z'omu bugabe bwa Ogi omuri Bashani bikaheebwa aba Makiri, mwene Manaase, ekicweka kya beene Makiri, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi obu Musa yaabaganiise omu mpita za Moabu seeri ya Yorudani, oburugwa-izooba bwa Yeriko.
Kwonka oruganda rwa Leevi rwo Musa tararuhaiire buhunguzi bwona; kureka MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli niwe buhunguzi bwabo, nk'oku yaabagambiire.
obwo buhunguzi bwabo bakabubaganisiza enganda mwenda n'ekicweka n'enteenyu, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
Ahakuba Musa akaba yaahaire enganda ibiri n'ekicweka obuhunguzi bwazo seeri ya Yorudani; kwonka Abaleevi tarabahaire buhunguzi hamwe n'abo.

Abaana ba Yosefu bakakomookwamu enganda ibiri, Manaase na Efuraimu; kandi tibarahaire Baleevi mugabo omu nsi, kureka endembo z'okutuuramu, n'emyanya eri haihi nazo ey'amariisizo g'ente zaabo n'ey'ebintu byabo.
Nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa, nikwo Abaisraeli baatwarize, bakabagana ensi.
Nkaba nyine emyaka makumi ana, obu Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yantumira Kadeshi-barunea kutata ensi, kandi nkamureetera amakuru g'ebi naareebire nk'oku byabaire biri omu mutima gwangye.
Beene waitu, abu nainamukire nabo, baahahaaza emitima y'abantu; kwonka nyowe naakuratirira kimwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye.
Eryo izooba nibwo Musa yaarahira ati: Buzimazima ensi ei oribatsiremu eryaba obuhunguzi bwawe n'obw'abaana baawe ebiro byona, ahabw'okuba okakuratirira kimwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye.

Kalebu yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mbwenu reeba, MUKAMA andinzire emyaka egi makumi ana n'etaano, nk'oku yaagambire, okuruga obu MUKAMA yaagambira Musa ekigambo ekyo, Abaisraeli nibakizengyerera omu ihamba; mbwenu reeba, hati mpikize emyaka makumi munaana n'etaano.
Na hati nkiine amaani nk'agu naabaire nyine, obu Musa yantuma. Nk'amaani gangye oku gaabaire gari aha rugamba, nimpurura kandi nintabaaruka, na hati nikwo gakiri.

N'ahabw'ekyo ompe ensi y'ebibungo, ei MUKAMA yaagambireho eryo izooba; ahakuba nk'oku waahuriire buri, na mbwenu Abaanaki bariyo, kandi baine endembo mpango ezeehinguririziibwe engo zigumire. Shana MUKAMA aryaguma naanye, mbabingye, nk'oku yaagambire.
Yoshua yaashabira Kalebu mwene Yefune omugisha, yaamuha Heburooni kuba obuhunguzi bwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo Heburooni yaahinduka obuhunguzi bwa Kalebu mwene Yefune Omukenizi n'okuhitsya hati, ahabw'okuba akakuratirira kimwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
(Kandi obunyakare Heburooni ekaba neeyetwa Kiryasi-araba; Araba ogwo akaba ari omuntu mukuru rugambwa omu Baanaki.) Bwanyima ensi yaahuumura engamba.

Ekyanga eki oruganda rw'Abayuda baabagaine, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, kikaba nikihika aha mwatano gwa Edomu, omu ihamba rya Ziini aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, okuhikira kimwe aha muheru gw'orubaju orwo;
kandi omwatano gwabo ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo gukaba niguruga aha muheru gw'Enyanja y'omwonyo, aha mukono gw'enyanja ogurikureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo;

gwogamu guhika aha bukizi-bwa-buryo aharikwinamuka Akarabiimu, gugumizamu guhika Ziini, gwinamuka aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bwa Kadeshi-barunea, guraba haihi na Hezirooni, gwinamuka guhika Adari, gukiikama guhika Karaka;
okuruga aho gugumizamu guhika Azimooni, gwogamu, gushuuma n'akagyera ka Misri, gugarukira aha nyanja; ogwo nigwo guriba omwatano gwanyu aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo.

Kandi omwatano gwabo ogw'oburugwa-izooba gukaba guri Enyanja y'omwonyo okuhika ahu Yorudani egishukiramu. Kandi omwatano ogw'orubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho guruga aha mukono gw'enyanja ahu Yorudani erikugishukiramu;
omwatano ogwo gwinamuka guhika Besi-hogola, guraba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa Besaraba; gugumizamu guhika aha ibaare rya Bohani mwene Reubeeni.

Kandi gugumizamu niguruga omu ruhanga rwa Akori, guhika Debira, gutyo gutoora aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, nigureeba Gilugaali ahateegaine n'aharikwinamuka Adumimu, eri aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo obw'oruhanga; ogwo mwatano gugumizamu guraba aha maizi ga Enishemeshi, gugarukira Eni-rogeli;

okuruga aho omwatano gwinamuka, guraba omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu oruri aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bw'ensi y'Abayebusi, (niyo Yerusaalemu); gwinamuka guhika aha mutwe gw'ekibungo ekiri omu maisho g'oruhanga rwa Hinoomu orubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, kandi ekiri aha muheru gw'oruhanga rw'Abareefa aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho;
bwanyima omwatano guruga aha mutwe gw'ekyo kibungo okuhika aha nshuro y'amaizi ga Nefutoa, gwogamu guhika aha ndembo z'aha kibungo kya Efurooni; guhika Baala, niyo Kiryasi-yearimu;

okuruga Baala omwatano gukiikama gutoora oburengyerwa-izooba, guhika aha kibungo Seiri, guraba aha rubaju rw'ekibungo Yearimu aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, niyo Kesalooni; gushuuma guhika Beti-shemeshi, gwogamu guraba aha rubaju rwa Timuna;
gugumizamu guhika aha rubaju rwa Ekurooni aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho; guhika Shikerooni, gwogamu guhika aha kibungo Baala, gugumizamu guhika Yabuneeli; gugarukira aha nyanja.
Kandi n'omwatano ogw'oburengyerwa-izooba gukaba guri Enyanja empango. Ogwo nigwo mwatano gw'Abayuda nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Kalebu ogwo yaabingamu batabani ba Anaki bashatu, Sheshai, Ahimaanu na Talumai, baijukuru ba Anaki.
Okuruga aho yainamuka, yaateera aba Debira; kandi obunyakare eiziina rya Debira rikaba riri Kiryasi-seferi.
Kandi Kalebu yaagira ati: Oraateere Kiryasi-seferi, akagikwata, niinyija kumuhingira muhara wangye Akisa.
Otinieli mwene Kenazi, murumuna wa Kalebu, yaagikwata; onu yaamuhingira muhara we Akisa.
Ku yaamutaahize, Akisa yaayeshengyereza iba kushaba ishe-zaara ekibanja; ku yaarugire aha ndogoya ye, Kalebu yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda ki?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ontambire! Nk'oku ontaire omu nsi ya Negebu, ogarukye ompe ahaine enshuro z'amaizi. Kalebu nikwo kumuha enshuro z'eruguru n'eza ifo.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'Abayuda nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Endembo z'oruganda rw'Abayuda eziri aha muheru gw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, aha rubaju rw'omwatano gwa Edomu nizo ezi. Kabuzieli, Ederi, Yaguri,
Kiina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedeshi, Hazori, Itunaanu,
Ziifu, Telemu, Bealoosi,
Hazori-Hadata, Keriosi-hezirooni, niyo Hazori,
Amamu, Sheema, Molada,
Hazari-gaada, Heshimooni, Besipeleeti,
Hazari-shuali, Beeri-sheba, Bizyotia,
Baala, Iyimu, Ezeemu,
Elitolaadi, Kesili, Horuma,
Zikulaagi, Madimana, Sani-sana,
Lebaosi, Shilihimu, Aini na Rimoni; endembo zoona makumi abiri na mwenda n'ebirorero byazo.
N'ez'omu mpita, Eshitaoli, Zoora, Ashina,
Zanoa, Eniganimu, Tapua, Enamu,
Yaramusi, Adulaamu, Sooko, Azeka,
Sharaimu, Aditaimu, Gedeerana, Gederosaimu, endembo ikumi na ina n'ebirorero byazo.
Zenani, Hadasha, Migudaligadi,
Dileani, Mizipe, Yokiseeli,
Lakishi, Bozikaasi, Egulooni,
Kaboni, Lahimani, Kitiliishi,
Gederoosi, Besidagoni, Naama, na Makeda, endembo ikumi na mukaaga n'ebirorero byazo.
Libuna, Eteeri, Ashani,
Ifuta, Ashuna, Nezibu,
Keila, Akiziibuna, Mareesha, endembo mwenda n'ebirorero byazo.
Ekurooni na tauni zaarwo n'ebirorero byarwo;
okuruga aha Ekurooni okuhika aha Nyanja, endembo zoona ezaabaire ziri aha rubaju rwa Ashidoodi n'ebirorero byazo;
na Ashidoodi na tauni zaarwo n'ebirorero byarwo; na Gaaza na tauni zaarwo n'ebirorero byarwo, okuhika aha kagyera ka Misri n'aha Nyanja empango.
N'ez'omu nsi y'enshozi, Shamira, Yatiri, Sooko,
Daana, Kiryasi-sana, niyo Debira,
Anabu, Eshitemo, Animu,
Gosheni, Holoni, na Giilo; endembo ikumi na rumwe n'ebirorero byazo.
Arabu, Duma, Eshani,
Yanimu, Besi-tapua, Afeka,
Humita, Kiryasi-araba, niyo Heburooni, na Ziori, endembo mwenda n'ebirorero byazo,
Maoni, Karumeeli, Ziifu, Yuta,
Yezereeli, Yokideamu, Zanoa,
Kaini, Gibea, na Timuna; endembo ikumi n'ebirorero byazo;
Halihuli, Besi-zuuri, Gedori,
Maarasi, Besanoosi na Elitekoni; endembo mukaaga n'ebirorero byazo;
Kiryasi-baali, niyo Kiryasi-yearimu, na Rabba; endembo ibiri n'ebirorero byazo.
N'ez'omu ihamba, Besaraba, Midudiini, Sekaaka,
Nibushani orurembo rw'omwonyo, na Eni-geedi; endembo mukaaga n'ebirorero byazo.
Kwonka Abayebusi abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu, Abayuda tibarabaasize kubabinga; n'ahabw'ekyo Abayebusi bakatuura Yerusaalemu hamwe n'Abayuda n'okuhitsya eri izooba.
Ekyanga eki baijukuru ba Yosefu baabagaine kikaba nikitandikira Yorudani haihi na Yeriko, aha maizi gaayo omu ihamba, omwatano guruga Yeriko, gwinamuka Beseeli niguraba omu nsi y'ebibungo;
guruga Beseeli, guza Luuzi, guraba aha mwatano gw'aba Aruki, guhika Ataroosi;
gushuuma oburengyerwa-izooba guhika aha mwatano gw'aba Yafileeti, kandi guhika aha mwatano gwa Besihoroni eya ifo, niyo Gezeri; gugarukira aha Nyanja.
Baijukuru ba Yosefu, abaana ba Manaase na Efuraimu, baaheebwa obuhunguzi bwabo.

Omwatano gw'ekyanga kya beene Efuraimu nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, gukaba guri guti; omwatano gw'obuhunguzi bwabo oburugwa-izooba gukaba nigutandikira Ataroosi-adari, guhika Besi-horoni ey'eruguru;

ahari Mikemeesa aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho gwogamu gutoora oburengyerwa-izooba; bwanyima gukiikama gutoora oburugwa-izooba, guhika Tanati-shiilo, gugiraba haihi aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba okuhika Yanoa.
Okuruga Yanoa gushuuma guza Ataroosi na Naara; guhika Yeriko, gugarukira Yorudani.
Kandi omwatano guruga Tapua gugumizamu oburengyerwa-izooba, guhika aha kagyera Kaana; gugarukira aha Nyanja. Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'Abaefuraimu, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri,
hamwe n'endembo ezaabatooraniirwe omu kyanga ky'obuhunguzi bw'Abamanaase, endembo zoona n'ebirorero byazo.
Kwonka tibarabingiremu Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire Gezeri; n'ahabw'ekyo Abanyakanaani bakatuura omu Baefuraimu n'okuhitsya eri izooba, kwonka baahinduka abahuuku b'okubakorera.

Kandi baijukuru ba Manaase abaatsigaireho baababaganisiza, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri; abo nibo, Abiezeeri, Heleki, Asirieli, Shekemu, Heferi, na Shemiida, batabani ba Manaase mwene Yosefu, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.

Baimuka baashanga Eleazaari omunyamurwa, na Yoshua mwene Nuuni, n'abakuru b'eihanga, baagira bati: MUKAMA akaragiira Musa kutuha obuhunguzi na banyaanyaitwe. Nikyo Yoshua yaabaheereire obuhunguzi na beene ishe, nk'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri.
Abamanaase baaheebwa ebicweka ikumi, otabariiremu ebyanga bya Gileadi na Bashani seeri ya Yorudani,
ahabw'okuba bahara ba Manaase bakaheebwa obuhunguzi na baanyaanyabo; kandi Abamanaase abandi baaheebwa ekyanga kya Gileadi.
Omwatano gw'ekyanga ky'Abamanaase gukaba gutandikira Asheri, guhika Mikemeesa, eri kureeba Shekemu; gugumizamu aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, guhika omu bantu abatwire Eni-tapua.
Kandi ekyanga kya Tapua kikaba kiri ekya Manaase, kwonka Tapua aha mwatano gwa Manaase ekaba eri ey'Abaefuraimu.

Gutyo omwatano gushuuma, guhika aha kagyera Kaana aha rubaju rwako rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo; endembo ezo zikaba ziri ez'Abaefuraimu ahagati omu ndembo za Manaase; kandi omwatano gwa Manaase gukaba guri aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho bw'ako kagyera; nigugarukira aha Nyanja.

Aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo ekaba eri eya Efuraimu, kandi aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho eri eya Manaase; n'enyanja ekaba eri omwatano gwe; kandi aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho baahika aha kyanga kya Asheri, kandi oburugwa-izooba bahika aha kya Isakaari.

Kandi omu byanga bya Isakaari na Asheri, aba Manaase bakaheebwa Besi-sheani na tauni zaarwo, Ibuleamu na tauni zaarwo, n'abantu abatwire Doori na tauni zaarwo, n'abatwire Endoori na tauni zaarwo, n'abatwire Tanaki na tauni zaarwo, n'abatwire Megido na tauni zaarwo, nibyo bibungo bishatu.
Kwonka aba Manaase tibarabaasize kubinga abantu abaabaire batwire omu ndembo ezo, kureka Abanyakanaani bakenda kuguma batwire omu nsi egyo.
Kwonka Abaisraeli ku baaherize kuhama, baakoresa Abanyakanaani emirimo y'obuhuuku, tibaababingiramu kimwe.

Yoshua yaabagarukamu ati: Ku muraabe muri oruganda ruhango, mwinamukye muze omu kibira ky'omu nsi y'Abaperizi n'aba Reefa, mukyetemere, mweshanze; ahabw'okuba ensi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu efunzire munonga ahariimwe.

Aba Yosefu baagira bati: Ensi y'ebibungo terikutuhika; kandi Abanyakanaani boona abatwire omu nsi y'empita baine ebigaari by'ebyoma, nibo ba Besi-sheani na tauni zaarwo, n'abatwire omu ruhita rwa Yezereeli.

Yoshua nikwo kugambira ab'omuryango gwa Yosefu, nibo ba Efuraimu n'aba Manaase, ati: N'ekya buzima muri oruganda ruhango, kandi mwine amaani maingi; timushemereire kuheebwa omugabo gw'ekyanga kimwe kyonka;

kureka ensi y'ebibungo eryaba eyaanyu; n'obu eraabe eri ey'ekibira, muryakitema, mukikubuure okuhika aha muheru gwakyo; ahakuba Abanyakanaani, n'obu baraabe baine ebigaari by'ebyoma, kandi bari ab'amaani, muryababinga.
Kwonka omu Baisraeli hakaba hatsigaire enganda mushanju, ezaabaire zitakahairwe buhunguzi bwazo.
Yoshua yaagambira Abaisraeli ati: Muryahitsya hi okweganda kuza kukubuura ensi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe yaabahaire?
Mbwenu mutoorane abashaija bashatu omuri buri ruganda; naanye ndyaboohereza, baimukye, bagyendagyende omu nsi, beetegyereze ensi y'obuhunguzi bwabo oku erikushusha, haza bagarukye ahariinye.
Kandi baryagibaganisa omu bicweka mushanju; Abayuda baryaguma omu kyanga kyabo aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, n'aba Yosefu bagume omu kyabo aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Muryabaganisa ensi omu bicweka mushanju, mubireete aha, mubinshobororere; naanye ndyagibabaganisiriza n'enteenyu omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.

Kwonka Abaleevi tibaine mugabo omuriimwe, ahakuba obunyamurwa bwa MUKAMA nibwo buhunguzi bwabo; n'Abagaadi n'Abareubeeni, n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, baaherize kuheebwa obuhunguzi bwabo oburugwa-izooba seeri ya Yorudani, obu Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabahaire.

Abo bashaija ku baabaire nibaimuka kugyenda kushoboorora ensi, Yoshua yaabeehanangiriza ati: Mugyende omu nsi yoona, muhandiikye emyatano yaayo, mugarukye ahi ndi; naanye ndyagibabaganisiriza aha Shiilo omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Abashaija abo baagyenda, baaraba omuri egyo nsi, baahandiika ebicweka byayo mushanju omu kitabo, nibooreka n'endembo zaamwo; bwanyima baagaruka ahari Yoshua omu rusiisira Shiilo.
Yoshua yaabateerera enteenyu ari omuri Shiilo omu maisho ga MUKAMA. Aho niho Yoshua yaabaganisiriize Abaisraeli ensi, nk'enganda zaabo oku zaabaire ziri.
Omugabo gw'oruganda rwa Benyamiini gwaija nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri; kandi omwatano gw'ekyanga kyabo gukaba gutandikira ahagati y'eky'Abayuda n'eky'aba Yosefu.

Kandi omwatano gwabo aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, gukaba gutandikira Yorudani, gwinamuka, guraba aha rubaju rwa Yeriko aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, gugumizamu guraba omu nsi y'ebibungo oburengyerwa-izooba, gugarukira aha ihamba rya Besaveeni.
Okuruga aho guza Luuzi, niyo Beseeli, aha rubaju rwayo rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, gushuuma guhika Ataroosi-adari, haihi n'ekibungo ekiri aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bwa Besi-horoni eya ifo.

Aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba gukiikama gutoora obukiizi-bwa-buryo, okuruga aha kibungo ekirikureeba Besi-horoni aha rubaju rwa buryo, gugarukira Kiryasi-baali, niyo Kiryasi-yearimu orurembo rw'Abayuda; orubaju orwo nirwo rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.
Kandi orubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo gutandikira aha muheru gwa Kiryasi-yearimu, gutoora oburengyerwa-izooba, guhika aha nshuro z'amaizi za Nefutoa;

gushuuma, guhika aha muheru gw'ekibungo, ekirikureebana n'oruhanga rwa beene Hinoomu, kandi ekiri aha muheru gw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho bw'oruhanga rwa Reefa; gushuuma omu ruhanga rwa Hinoomu, okuhika aha rubaju rw'Abayebusi aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, gugumizamu gushuuma Eni-rogeli;
gukiikama, gutoora obukiizi-bwa-bumosho, guza Eni-shemeshi, gugumizamu guza Elilooti, erikureebana n'aharikwinamuka Adumimu; gushuuma guhika aha rukiri rwa Bohani mwene Reubeeni;
gugumizamu guraba aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa Besaraba, gushuuma guhika Araba;

kandi gwogamu guhika aha rubaju rwa Besi-hogola aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, gugarukira aha mukono gw'Enyanja y'omwonyo, ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho aha isheeshero rya Yorudani; ogwo nigwo mwatano gw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.

Kandi Yorudani niyo yaabaire eri omwatano gwayo aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba. Ekyo nikyo kyanga ky'obuhunguzi bw'aba Benyamiini, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, n'emyatano yaakyo oku yaabaire eri aha mbaju zoona.
Kandi endembo z'oruganda rwa Benyamiini, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, nizo ezi; Yeriko, Besi-hogola, Emekezizi,
Besaraba, Zemaraimu, Beseeli,
Avimu, Paara, Ofura,
Kefaramooni, Ofuni na Geeba; endembo ikumi na ibiri n'ebirorero byazo;
Gibeoni, Raama, Beerosi,
Mizipe, Kefira, Mooza,
Rekemu, Irupeeli, Tarala,
Zeela, Elefu na Yebusi, niyo Yerusaalemu, Gibeasi, na Kiryasi; endembo ikumi na ina n'ebirorero byazo. Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'Ababenyamiini nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Endembo ezi baahairwe kuba obuhunguzi bwabo nizo ezi; Beeri-sheba nari Sheba, Molada,
Hazari-shuali, Baala, Ezeemu,
Elitolaadi, Besuula, Horuma,
Zikulaagi, Besi-marikaboosi, Hazaari-suusa,
Besi-lebaosi, na Sharuheni; endembo ikumi na ishatu n'ebirorero byazo;
Aini, Rimona, Eteeri, na Ashani; endembo ina n'ebirorero byazo.
n'ebirorero byona ebyahinguririize ezo ndembo okuhika Baalasibeero, niyo Raama y'obukiizi-bwa-buryo. Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa Simeoni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Obuhunguzi bw'Abasimeoni bukaihwa omu bw'Abayuda, ahakuba ekyanga ky'Abayuda kikaba kiri kihango munonga, nikibakira; nikyo kyareeteire oruganda rwa Simeoni kuheebwa obuhunguzi ahagati y'obw'Abayuda.
Omugabo gwa kashatu gwaija guri ogw'oruganda rwa Zebuluuni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri. Omwatano gw'obuhunguzi bwabo gukaba guhika Sarida;
gwinamuka gutoora oburengyerwa-izooba, guhika Marala na Dabesheesi; gugumizamu guhika aha kagyera akari omu maisho ga Yokineamu;
okuruga Sarida gukiikama gutoora oburugwa-izooba, guhika aha mwatano gwa Kisiloosi-tabora; guruga aho, guhika Daberaasi, gwinamuka guhika Yafia;
guruga aho guraba aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, guhika Gaasi-heferi na Eti-kaziini, gwogamu guhika Rimoni, gutoora Nea;
aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho gukiikama gutoora Hanatooni, gugarukira omu ruhanga rwa Ifusaheeli;
kandi baheebwa Kataasi, Nahalaali, Shimirooni, Idala na Betelehemu; endembo ikumi na ibiri n'ebirorero byazo.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'Abazebuluuni, nizo ndembo n'ebirorero byazo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Omugabo gwa kana gwaija guri ogwa Isakaari, nirwo ruganda rw'Abaisakaari, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga kyabo kikaba kirimu endembo ezi; Yezereeli, Kesuloosi, Shuneemu,
Hafaraimu, Shioni, Anaharaasi,
Rabisi, Kishioni, Ebeza,
Remesi, Eni-ganimu, Eni-haada, na Besi-pazezi;
kandi omwatano guhika Tabora, Shahazuma, na Beti-shemeshi, gugarukira Yorudani; endembo ikumi na mukaaga n'ebirorero byazo.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa Isakaari, n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Omugabo gwa kataano gwaija guri ogw'oruganda rwa Asheri, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga kyabo kikaba kirimu endembo ezi; Helukaasi, Haali, Beeteni, Akisaafu,
Alameleki, Amadi, na Mishaali; kandi aha burengyerwa-izooba, omwatano guhika Karumeeli na Shihori-libunaasi;

gukiikama gutoora oburugwa-izooba, guhika Besi-dagoni, gugumizamu guhika Zebuluuni, n'omu ruhanga rwa Ifusaheeli aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho, guhika Besi-emeki, na Neyeli; gugarukira Kaabuli aha rubaju rwa bumosho,
na Eburooni, Rehobu, Hamoni na Kaana, n'okuhika Sidoni empango;
bwanyima gukiikama gutoora Raama, guhika aha rurembo rw'orugo orugumire Turo; okuruga aho gukiikama gutoora Hoosa; gugarukira aha nyanja haihi na Akiziibu;
kandi baheebwa Umma na Afeki na Rehobu; endembo makumi abiri na ibiri n'ebirorero byazo.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa Asheri, n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Omugabo gwa mukaaga gwaija guri ogw'oruganda rwa Nafutaali, nibo Banafutaali nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Omwatano gwabo gukaba gutandikira Helefi, aha muti ogurikwetwa omwela oguri Zaananimu, guraba Adami-nekebu, na Yabuneeli, guhika Lakumu, gugarukira Yorudani.

Aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba gukiikama, guhika Azinoosi-tabora; okuruga aho guraba Hukooki, guhika Zebuluuni aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, kandi guhika Asheri aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, kandi aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba guhika Yuda ahari Yorudani.
Kandi endembo zaabo ez'engo ezigumire nizo ezi; Zidimu, Zeera, Hamasi, Rakasi, Kinereesi,
Adama, Raama, Hazori,
Kedeshi, Edurei, Enihazori,
Irooni, Migudaleeli, Horemu, Besanaasi, na Besi-shemeshi; endembo ikumi na mwenda n'ebirorero byazo.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa Nafutaali, n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Omugabo gwa mushanju gwaija guri ogw'oruganda rwa Daani, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ekyanga ky'obuhunguzi bwabo kikaba kirimu endembo ezi, Zoora, Eshitaoli, Irishemeshi,
Shaalabiina, Ayalooni, Itula,
Eloni, Timuna, Ekurooni,
Eliteeke, Gibesooni, Baalasi,
Yehudi, Beneberaaki, Gaasi-rimoni,
Meyarikooni, na Rakooni, okuhika aha mwatano ogurikureeba Yoopa.

Ahabw'ekyanga ky'aba Daani kubabeera kikye, bakainamuka, baateera Leshemu, baagikwata, baagihwerekyereza na rurara, baagikubuura, baagituuramu. Leshemu egyo baagyeta Daani, nibagyeterera ishenkurubo Daani.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'oruganda rwa Daani, n'endembo zaabo n'ebirorero byazo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri.
Ku baaherize kubaganisa ensi omu bicweka byayo, nk'emyatano y'obuhunguzi bwabo oku eri, Abaisraeli baaha Yoshua mwene Nuuni obuhunguzi ahagati yaabo;
baamuha orurembo oru yaabashabire, orurikwetwa Timunaati-seera omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, nk'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri. Yaayombekayo orurembo, yaarutuuramu.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Yoshua ati:
Gambira Abaisraeli oti: Mwetooranire endembo z'okuhungiramu, ezi naaragiire Musa kubagambira,
ngu oriita omuntu weena atamwitsire nkana, nari atakimanyire ahungireyo; ziryaba obuhungiro bwanyu bw'okuhungiramu omuhoozi w'enzigu.

Omuntu ogwo aryahungira omuri rumwe aha ndembo ezo; ku arihikayo, ayemerere aha irembo ry'orwo rurembo, agambire abakuru baarwo eki akozire; nabo baryamutaasya omu rurembo, bamuhe omwanya, atuure nabo.
Omuhoozi ku arimukuratayo, batarimumuha kumuhoora, ahabw'okuba taraitsire mutaahi we nkana, kandi akashangwa atarikwangana nawe.

Aryaguma omuri orwo rurembo, okuhitsya obu aryemerera omu maisho g'omutwe gw'abantu kucwerwa orubanja, kandi hoona tarirugamu, okuhitsya obu omunyamurwa omukuru, oriba ariho omu bunaku obwo, arifa; bwanyima ogwo mwitsi nibwo arigaruka owaabo omu ka ye, omu rurembo oru yaacwiremu.

Kandi seeri ya Yorudani aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Yeriko, baatooranayo Bezeeri aha murambi gw'omu ihamba omu kyanga ky'oruganda rwa Reubeeni, na Ramosi omuri Gileadi omu kyanga ky'oruganda rwa Gaadi, na Golani omuri Bashani omu kyanga ky'oruganda rwa Manaase.

Ezo nizo ndembo ezaatooraniirwe Abaisraeli boona n'abanyamahanga abaabaire babashuhuukiiremu, ngu omuntu weena oraite omuntu, atamwitsire nkana, ahungireyo, arekye kwitwa omuhoozi w'enzigu, okuhitsya obu aryemerera omu maisho g'omutwe gw'abantu.
Bwanyima abakuru b'emiryango y'oruganda rwa Leevi baija ahari Eleazaari omunyamurwa na Yoshua mwene Nuuni n'abakuru b'emiryango y'enganda za Israeli,
baabagambirira Shiilo omu nsi ya Kanaani, bati: MUKAMA akaragiira Musa ku tuheebwa endembo z'okutuuramu n'amariisizo gaazo ahabw'amatungo gaitu.
Abaisraeli nikwo kuha Abaleevi endembo n'amariisizo gaazo ahari ezo ezi baahungwire, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire.

Enteenyu yaakwata ab'emiryango y'aba Kohasi; Abaleevi baijukuru ba Arooni omunyamurwa bo baakwatwa enteenyu, baaheebwa endembo ikumi na ishatu omu ruganda rwa Yuda, n'omu rwa Simeoni n'omu rwa Benyamiini.
Baijukuru ba Kohasi abaatsigaire batahairwe, enteenyu yaabakwata, baaheebwa endembo ikumi omu ruganda rwa Efuraimu n'omu rwa Daani n'omu kicweka ky'orwa Manaase.
Enteenyu yaakwata baijukuru ba Gereshoni, baaheebwa endembo ikumi na ishatu omu miryango y'oruganda rwa Isakaari, n'omu rwa Asheri, n'omu rwa Nafutaali, n'omu kicweka ky'orwa Manaase omuri Bashani.
Kandi na baijukuru ba Merari, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, baheebwa endembo ikumi na ibiri omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni, n'omu rwa Gaadi, n'omu rwa Zebuluuni.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baahaire Abaleevi ezo ndembo n'amariisizo gaazo nibateera enteenyu, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa ku baziheebwa.
Omu ndembo z'oruganda rwa Yuda n'orwa Simeoni baabaha endembo ezi, ezi amaziina gaazo garikugambwaho ahaifo.
Haabanza beene Arooni, ow'omu miryango y'aba Kohasi, ab'omuri baijukuru ba Leevi; ahabw'okuba omugabo gw'okubanza gukaba guri ogwabo.
Baabaha Kiryasi-araba, orurembo rwa Araba, ishe wa Anaki, niyo Heburooni ey'omu nsi y'ebibungo bya Yuda n'amariisizo gaayo;
kwonka emisiri yaarwo n'ebirorero byarwo bikaba byahairwe Kalebu mwene Yefune kuba obutaka bwe.
Beene Arooni omunyamurwa baabaha Heburooni n'amariisizo gaayo, nirwo rurembo rw'okuhungirwamu oitsire omuntu, na Libuna n'amariisizo gaayo,
Yatiri n'amariisizo gaayo, Eshitemoa n'amariisizo gaayo,
Holoni n'amariisizo gaayo, Debira n'amariisizo gaayo,
Aini n'amariisizo gaayo, Yuta n'amariisizo gaayo, na Beti-shemeshi n'amariisizo gaayo; endembo z'enganda ezo zombi zaaba mwenda.
Kandi n'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, baabaha Gibeoni n'amariisizo gaayo, Geeba n'amariisizo gaayo,
Anatoosi n'amariisizo gaayo, na Alumooni n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ina.
Endembo zoona eza beene Arooni abanyamurwa zaaba ikumi na ishatu n'amariisizo gaazo.
Ab'emiryango ya beene Kohasi, b'aba Leevi, nibo baijukuru ba Kohasi abaatsigaire batahairwe, bo baaheebwa endembo z'omugabo gwabo omu z'oruganda rwa Efuraimu.
Baabaha Shekemu n'amariisizo gaayo omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, nirwo rurembo rw'okuhungirwamu oitsire omuntu, na Gezeri n'amariisizo gaayo,
Kibuzaimu n'amariisizo gaayo, na Besi-horoni n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ina.
N'omu z'oruganda rwa Daani baabaha Eliteeke n'amariisizo gaayo, Gibesooni n'amariisizo gaayo,
Ayalooni n'amariisizo gaayo, na Gaasi-rimoni n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ina.
Kandi omu z'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase baabaha Tanaki n'amariisizo gaayo na Gaasi-rimoni n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ibiri.
Endembo zoona ez'emiryango ya beene Kohasi, abaatsigaire batahairwe zaaba ikumi n'amariisizo gaazo.

Kandi beene Gereshoni, ab'omu miryango y'aba Leevi baabaha endembo ibiri ez'omu z'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, Golani ey'omuri Bashani, orurembo rw'okuhungirwamu oitsire omuntu, n'amariisizo gaayo, na Beshiteera n'amariisizo gaayo.
N'omu z'oruganda rwa Isakaari baabaha Kishioni n'amariisizo gaayo, Deberaati n'amariisizo gaayo,
Yaramuusi n'amariisizo gaayo, na Eni-ganimu n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ina.
N'omu z'oruganda rwa Asheri baabaha Mishaali n'amariisizo gaayo, Abudooni n'amariisizo gaayo,
Helukaasi n'amariisizo gaayo, na Rehobu n'amariisizo gaayo; endembo ina.

Kandi n'omu z'oruganda rwa Nafutaali baabaha Kedeshi omuri Galilaaya n'amariisizo gaayo, orurembo rw'okuhungirwamu oitsire omuntu, Hamosi-doori n'amariisizo gaayo, na Karitaani n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ishatu.
Endembo zoona z'aba Gereshoni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, zaaba ikumi na ishatu n'amariisizo gaazo.
Kandi ab'emiryango ya beene Merari, nibo ba Leevi abaatsigaire batahairwe, baaheebwa omu ndembo z'oruganda rwa Zebuluuni Yokineamu n'amariisizo gaayo, Karita n'amariisizo gaayo,
Dimuna n'amariisizo gaayo, na Nahalaali n'amariisizo gaayo, endembo ina.
N'omu z'oruganda rwa Reubeeni, baabaha Bezeeri n'amariisizo gaayo, Yahazi n'amariisizo gaayo,
Kedemoosi n'amariisizo gaayo na Mefaasi n'amariisizo gaayo endembo ina.
Kandi n'omu z'oruganda rwa Gaadi baabaha Ramosi omuri Gileadi n'amariisizo gaayo, orurembo rw'okuhungirwamu oitsire omuntu, Mahanaimu n'amariisizo gaayo,
Heshibooni n'amariisizo gaayo, na Yazeri n'amariisizo gaayo, zoona zaaba endembo ina.
Endembo ezo zoona nizo zaabaire ziri eza beene Merari nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, niyo miryango y'Abaleevi eyaatsigaire etahairwe; omugabo gwabo gukaba guri endembo ikumi na ibiri.
Endembo zoona z'Abaleevi ezaabaire ziri ahagati omu butaka bw'Abaisraeli zikaba ziri makumi ana na munaana n'amariisizo gaazo.
Ezo ndembo buri rumwe rukaba rwehinguririziibwe amariisizo gaarwo; kandi ezo ndembo zoona nikwo zaabaire ziri.
Okwo nikwo MUKAMA yaahaire Abaisraeli ensi yoona ei yaarahiire kuha baishenkurubo; batyo baagikubuura, baagituuramu.
MUKAMA yaabaha okuhuumura embaju zoona, nk'oku yaaraganiise baishenkurubo; omu bazigu baabo boona tihariho n'omwe owaayehangire kubaza omu kaso; kureka MUKAMA akabahayo boona omu mikono yaabo.
Omu bigambo byona ebirungi ebi MUKAMA yaagambiire ab'enju y'Abaisraeli, tihariho na kimwe ekyabuzire; byona bikaba kwo.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaayeta Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase,
yaabagira ati: Mukozire byona ebi Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabaragiire; kandi omuri byona ebi naabaragiire, mukaanyorobera.
Ebiro ebi ebingi ebi mumazire, timukahemukaga ahari beene waanyu n'okuhitsya hati, kureka mworobeire ekiragiro eki MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabaragiire.

Mbwenu hati MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ahuumwize beene waanyu, nk'oku yaabaraganiise; n'ahabw'ekyo mugarukyeyo, muze omu maka gaanyu omu nsi y'obutaka bwanyu ei Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabahaire seeri ya Yorudani.

Kwonka muteho omutima munonga kworobera ebiragiro byona ebi Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaabaragiire, okukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, okugyendera omu mihanda ye yoona, okworobera ebiragiro bye, okumuhamiraho, n'okumuheereza n'omutima gwanyu gwona n'amagara gaanyu goona.
Atyo Yoshua yaabashabira omugisha, yaaboohereza, baagaruka omu maka gaabo.

Ekicweka kimwe eky'oruganda rwa Manaase Musa akaba yaabahaire obuhunguzi omuri Bashani; kwonka ekindi kicweka kyarwo Yoshua niwe yaabahaire obuhunguzi omuri beene waabo seenu ya Yorudani oburengyerwa-izooba. Kandi Yoshua, ku yaaboohereize kugaruka omu maka gaabo, yaabashabira omugisha,

yaabagira ati: Mugarukye omu maka gaanyu, mutware ebintu bingi, namatungo maingi munonga, efeeza, ezaabu, emiringa, ebyoma, n'ebijwaro bingi munonga; mubagane na beene waanyu eminyago y'abazigu baanyu.

Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase baagarukayo, baataana n'Abaisraeli okuruga Shiilo ey'omu nsi ya Kanaani, kuza omu nsi ya Gileadi ei baayekubuuriire, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaagambiire Musa oku kyabaire kiri.
Ku baahikire omu kyanga ekiri haihi na Yorudani omu nsi ya Kanaani, Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase baakora eitambiro haihi na Yorudani, eitambiro rihango munonga.
Abaisraeli baahurira abarikugira bati: Reeba Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase bakozire eitambiro aha mwatano gw'ensi ya Kanaani, haihi na Yorudani, aha rubaju rw'Abaisraeli.
Abaisraeli ku baakihuriire, omutwe gwona gw'Abaisraeli gwayeteeranira Shiilo kuza kubarwanisa.
Abaisraeli baatuma Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari omunyamurwa aha Bareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase omu nsi ya Gileadi.
Baamutuma n'abakuru ikumi, buri ruganda rwa Israeli omukuru omwe ow'omuryango gwa baishenkurubo, buri omwe omuribo akaba ari omukuru w'omuryango gwa baishenkurubo omu nganda za Israeli.
Baija omu nsi ya Gileadi, baashangayo Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, baagamba nabo nibagira bati:
Ab'eihanga ryona erya MUKAMA baatutuma ngu: Eki kicumuro ki mucumwire ahari Ruhanga wa Israeli mukikoreire ki, okureka kukuratira MUKAMA, mukeekorera eitambiro, mukamugomera?
Nimugira ngu ekicumuro eki twacumuriire omuri Peori kikatubeera kikye? Timurikumanya na hati ku tutakakyetuuraga, n'obu orufu rwateire eihanga rya MUKAMA?

Mbwenu ekyo kikaabareeteire okuteishuka, mukareka kukuratira MUKAMA eri izooba? Ekiraabirugyemu ahabw'okugomera MUKAMA eri izooba, nyencakare naija kugirira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli ekiniga kingi.

Ensi yaanyu ei mwakubwire ku eraabe esiisikaire, mwambukye mwije omu nsi ya MUKAMA, ei eihema rya MUKAMA riri, mutungye obutaka omuriitwe; kwonka mutagomera MUKAMA, kandi naitwe mutatugomera, mukeekorera erindi itambiro, eritari rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Timurikumanya Akani mwene Zeera ku yaacumwire akatwara aha byabiikiirwe MUKAMA, eihanga ryona erya Israeli rikahikwaho ekiniga kingi? Kandi ogwo mushaija taracwekyereire wenka ahabw'ekicumuro kye.
Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase baagarukamu nibagambira abakuru b'enganda za Israeli bati:
MUKAMA Ruhanga Nyamuhanga! MUKAMA Ruhanga Nyamuhanga niwe arikukimanya, kandi n'Abaisraeli baryakimanya. Ku turaabe twakikozire ahabw'obugomi nari ahabw'okucumura ahari MUKAMA, eri izooba tutakira!

Ku turaabe twayekoreire eitambiro ngu tuteishukye, turekye kukuratira MUKAMA, nari ngu tutambireho ebitambo ebyokize, nari empongano z'eby'okurya, nari ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, MUKAMA wenka abe niwe yaabitutura;
kureka tukikozire twine eki tukikoreire, ngu omu biro ebiriija abaana baanyu bataribuuza abaitu bati: Mwine kakwate ki na MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli?
Timurikumanya ngu MUKAMA akataho Yorudani kuba omwatano gwaitu naimwe, imwe Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi? Timwine mugabo ahari MUKAMA. N'ahabw'ekyo abaana baanyu baryazibira abaitu kutiina MUKAMA.
