Nikyo kyatureeteire kugira tuti: Ka twekorere eitambiro, eritari ry'okutambiraho ebitambo ebyokize nari ebindi bitambo;

kureka ribe eky'okuhamya ahagati yaitu naimwe, na baijukuru baitu abaritukurata, ku turi abantu abakora omurimo gwa MUKAMA nitutambira ebitambo ebyokize omu maisho ge n'ebindi bitambo n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, abaana baanyu nyentsya batarigira abaitu omu biro ebiriija bati: Timwine mugabo ahari MUKAMA.

Nikyo twagiriire tuti: Ku baritugira batyo, nari baagira kwo baijukuru baitu omu biro ebiriija, itwe turyabagarukamu tuti: Reeba eitambiro eri tukozire, eririkushushana n'eitambiro eri baatatenkuriitwe baakozire, eritari ry'ebitambo ebyokize nari ebindi bitambo, kureka ery'okuhamya ahagati yaitu naimwe.

Nikikabure itwe okugomera MUKAMA eri izooba, tukateishuka, tukareka kumukuratira, tukeekorera eitambiro ry'okwokyezaho ebitambo, nari ery'okuhongyeraho empongano z'eby'okurya, nari ebindi bitambo, ritari itambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu eriri omu maisho g'eihema rye.
Finehaasi omunyamurwa n'abakuru b'eihanga, nibo bakuru b'emiryango y'Abaisraeli abu yaabaire aine, ku baahuriire ebigambo by'Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'Abamanaase, baashemererwa munonga.

Kandi Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari omunyamurwa yaagambira Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'Abamanaase ati: Mbwenu eri izooba nibwo twamanya ku MUKAMA ari omuriitwe, ahakuba timurakozire kicumuro eki ahari MUKAMA; mbwenu mwakiza Abaisraeli okutaitwa mukono gwa MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari omunyamurwa n'abakuru baaruga omu nsi ya Gileadi; ei baashangire Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi, baagaruka omu nsi ya Kanaani aha Baisraeli, baabagambira ebyabaireho.
Ekyo kyashemeza Abaisraeli, baahimbisa Ruhanga, tibaagaruka kugamba by'okurwanisa Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi, n'okucwekyereza ensi ei batwiremu.
Kandi eryo itambiro Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi baaryeta Edi; amakuru gaakyo, ngu eky'okuhamya ahagati yaitu naimwe ku MUKAMA ari Ruhanga.
Bwanyima y'ebiro bingi MUKAMA aherize kuha Abaisraeli okuhuumura engamba z'abazigu baabo boona abaabaire babeehinguririize, na Yoshua yaakuzire, yaahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru,
yaayeta Abaisraeli boona, n'abakuru baabo n'abategyeki n'abaramuzi n'abakuru b'engabo, yaabagira ati: Reeba hati nkuzire, mpikire omu ngingo zaabukuru;
kandi mukareeba byona ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaakozire amahanga aga goona ahabwanyu; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe yaabarwaniriire.

Reeba, mperize kubabaganisiza amahanga aga agakitsigaireho kuba obuhunguzi bw'enganda zaanyu, hamwe n'amahanga goona agu naahwerekyereize okuruga Yorudani okuhika aha Nyanja empango aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe aribabinga omu maisho gaanyu, akabatuntumura, mukabona kukubuura ensi yaabo nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabaraganiise.
N'ahabw'ekyo muhamire kimwe mubone kwerinda n'okukora byona ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebiragiro bya Musa, murekye kuteishuka mukabirugamu kutoora orubaju-rwa-buryo nari orwa-bumosho,
mutariteerana n'amahanga aga agatsigaire omuriimwe; mutarigamba aha maziina ga baaruhanga baabo, nari okubarahira nari okubakorera, n'obu kwakuba okubaramya,
kureka muhamire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nk'oku mwakozire n'okuhitsya hati.
Nimumanya ku MUKAMA yaabingire amahanga makuru kandi ag'amaani omu maisho gaanyu; kwonka imwe tihaine muntu weena orabagiire omu kaso n'okuhitsya hati.
Omwe omuriimwe aryabinga rukumi; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu niwe aribarwanirira, nk'oku yaabagambiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo muteho omutima munonga kukunda MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Ahakuba ku murigaruka enyima omu muringo gwona, mwateerana n'amahanga aga agatsigaire omuriimwe, mwashwererana nago, kandi mwataahirana nago,

mumanyire kimwe mutarikubanganisa ku MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu atarigaruka kubinga amahanga ago omu maisho gaanyu, kureka baryababeera obusya n'omutego, babe eky'okubaasha omu mbaju, n'amahwa omu maisho gaanyu, okuhitsya obu murihwerekyererera omu nsi egi enungi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabahaire, mukahwaho.

Nk'oku mwatungire ebirungi byona ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabagambiire, nikwo MUKAMA aribareetaho ebibi byona, okuhitsya obu aribahwerekyerereza omu nsi egi enungi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabahaire, akabamaraho.

Ku muricumura, mwaita endagaano ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabahaire, mwagyenda mwaheereza baaruhanga abandi, mwabaramya, MUKAMA aryabagirira ekiniga kingi, muhwerekyererere juba omu nsi enungi ei MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu yaabahaire, muhweho.

Yoshua yaagambira abantu boona ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Obunyakare baashwenkuriimwe bakaba batwire seeri y'omugyera Furaati, nangwa na Teera, ishe wa Abrahamu na Nahori; bakaba baheereza baaruhanga abandi.
Bwanyima naiha Abarahamu shwenkuriimwe seeri y'ogwo mugyera, naamurabya omu nsi yoona eya Kanaani, naakanyisa oruzaaro rwe, naamuha Isaaka.
Kandi Isaaka naamuha Yakobo na Esau; Esau naamuha ensi y'ebibungo ya Seiri kuba eye; kwonka Yakobo n'oruzaaro rwe baashuuma omu nsi ya Misri.
Bwanyima naatuma Musa na Arooni, naateeza Misri ebibonaboneso ebi naagireetsiremu; bwanyima yaabyo naabaihayo.
Naiha baashwenkuriimwe Misri; naabahitsya aha Nyanja erikutukura; Abanyamisri baabakurata n'ebigaari n'ab'aha mbaraasi okuhika aha nyanja egyo.

Ku baatakiire MUKAMA, yaata omwirima ahagati yaanyu n'aba Misri, yaagarura amaizi g'enyanja, gaabashweka; kandi n'amaisho gaanyu gakeerebera ebi naakozire omuri Misri; bwanyima mwamara ebiro bingi omu ihamba.
Naabatwara omu nsi y'Abaamori, abaabaire batwire aha rundi rubaju rwa Yorudani; baabarwanisa, naabahayo omu mikono yaanyu, mwakubuura ensi yaabo, naabahwerekyerereza omu maisho gaanyu.
Na Balaki mwene Zipori omugabe wa Moabu yaimuka, yaarwanisa Abaisraeli, yaatuma ahari Balamu mwene Beori, kwija kubakyeena;
kwonka naayanga kuhurira Balamu; n'ahabw'ekyo Balamu yaabashabira omugisha; okwo nikwo naabakirize omu mikono ya Balaki.
Bwanyima mwayambuka Yorudani, mwahika Yeriko; abaayo baabarwanisa, nangwa n'Abaamori n'Abaperizi n'Abanyakanaani n'Abahiiti n'Abagirugashi n'Abahiivi n'Abayebusi; naabahayo omu mikono yaanyu.
Kandi naayohereza enwa kubeebembera, zaababinga omu maisho gaanyu, nangwa n'abagabe babiri b'Abaamori, tibarabingirwe zaarurara zaanyu n'amata gaanyu.
Naabaha ensi ei mutarahendekyeire, n'endembo ezi mutarombekire, mwazituuramu; kandi na hati nimurya aha mizaabibu n'emizeituuni ei mutarabyaire.

Kandi ku muraabe nimugira ngu ni kibi okuheereza MUKAMA, eri izooba mutoorane ou muraaheereze, yaaba baaruhanga abu baashwenkuriimwe baabaire nibaheereza seeri y'omugyera, nari baaruhanga b'Abaamori abu mutwire omu nsi yaabo; kwonka nyowe n'eka yangye nitwija kuguma nituheereza MUKAMA.
Abantu baagarukamu nibagira bati: Nikikabure itwe okwimuura MUKAMA, tukeehongyera baaruhanga abandi;

ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu niwe yaatwihire omuri Misri na baatatenkuriitwe omu nju y'obuhuuku, akakora eby'okureeberaho ebyo ebikuru, kandi akaturinda omu muhanda gwona n'omu bantu boona, ei twarabire.
Kandi MUKAMA akabinga amahanga goona omu maisho gaitu, Abaamori abaabaire batwire omu nsi egyo; nikyo naitwe turigumira nituheereza MUKAMA, ahabw'okuba niwe Ruhanga waitu.
Ku muriimuura MUKAMA, mwayehongyera baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga, aryabahindukana, abakore kubi, abamareho, bwanyima y'okubakora gye.
Abantu baagarukamu Yoshua bati: Ngaaha! Kureka itwe turyaguma nituheereza MUKAMA.
Yoshua yaabagira ati: Muri baakareebi abarikwehamiza ku mutooraine MUKAMA kuba niwe mwaheereza. Baagarukamu bati: Turi baakareebi.
Yoshua yaagira ati: Mbwenu nu nimwiheho baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga abari omuriimwe, mute emitima yaanyu ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Abantu baagambira Yoshua bati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu niwe turiguma nituheereza, kandi n'eiraka rye niryo turihurira.
Bwanyima Yoshua yaaragaana n'abantu eryo izooba, yaabateeraho ebiragiro n'ebyaragiirwe, bari Shekemu.

Yaagambira abantu boona ati: Reeba, eibaare eri riryaguma riri kareebi w'okutushinja, ahakuba ryahurira ebigambo byona ebi MUKAMA yaatugambira; n'ahabw'ekyo riryaguma riri kareebi waanyu, ngu mutaryehakana Ruhanga waanyu.
Okuruga aho Yoshua yaayohereza abantu, buri muntu okugaruka omu buhunguzi bwe.
Bwanyima y'ebyo Yoshua mwene Nuuni omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaafa, ahikize emyaka igana na ikumi,
baamuziika omu kyanga ky'obuhunguzi bwe Timunaati-seera, omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bw'ekibungo kya Gaashi.
Kandi Abaisraeli bakaheereza MUKAMA omu biro byona ebya Yoshua, n'omu biro byona eby'abakuru abaatsigaireho yaafiire, abaabaire nibamanya ebi MUKAMA yaakoreire Abaisraeli.
Kandi Eleazaari mwene Arooni nawe yaafa; baamuziika aha kabungo aku Finehaasi omutabani yaahairwe omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Abayuda nibo barizayo; reeba mpaireyo ensi omu mikono yaabo.
Abayuda baagira Abasimeoni beene waabo bati: Mwije tuhurure hamwe omu nsi ei twabagaine, turwanise Abanyakanaani; naitwe turyahurura naimwe omu nsi ei mwabagaine. Batyo Abasimeoni baahurura nabo.
Bwanyima Abayuda bainamuka, MUKAMA yaahayo Abanyakanaani n'Abaperizi omu mikono yaabo; baabaitamu abantu kakumi omuri Bezeki.
Baashangayo Adoni-bezeki, baamurwanisa, baabinga Abanyakanaani n'Abaperizi.
Adoni-bezeki yaahunga, baamukurata, baamukwata, baamucwaho ebikumu bishaija eby'engaro n'eby'ebigyere.

Adoni-bezeki yaagira ati: Abagabe makumi mushanju abacwirweho ebikumu bishaija by'engaro n'eby'ebigyere bakaba batorotoora obucwagurika bw'eby'okurya ahansi y'emeeza yangye; oku naabagizire, nikwo Ruhanga yangira. Baamutwara Yerusaalemu, yaagwayo.
Kandi Abayuda baateera Yerusaalemu, baagikwata, baagicwekyereza na rurara, n'orurembo baarutwekamu omuriro.
Bwanyima Abayuda baashuuma; baateera Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire omu bibungo, n'omuri Negebu kandi n'omu mpanga.
Kandi baagaruka baateera Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire Heburooni (eyaabaire neeyetwa Kiryasi-araba); baasingura Sheshai, Ahimaanu na Talumai.
Ku baarugireyo, baateera abaabaire batwire Debira eyaabaire neeyetwa Kiryasi-seferi.
Obwo Kalebu yaagira ati: Oriteera Kiryasi-seferi, akagikwata, ndyamuhingira muhara wangye Akisa.
Bwanyima Otinyeli, mutabani wa Kenazi, murumuna wa Kalebu, yaagikwata, onu yaamuhingira muhara we Akisa.
Ku yaahikire owa iba, yaamweshengyereza kushaba ishe ekibanja; yaaruga aha ndogoya ye; Kalebu yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda ki?
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Nk'oku ontaire omu nsi ya Negebu, na mbwenu ongirire embabazi, ompe n'enshuro z'amaizi. Kalebu nikwo kumuha enshuro z'orubaju rwa ruguru n'orwa ifo.
Abayuda baagyenda n'Abasimeoni beene waabo, baateera Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire Zefasi, baagicwekyerereza kimwe. Bwanyima orwo rurembo rwayetwa Horuma.
Kandi Abayuda baagaruka baakubuura Gaaza n'ebyanga byayo, Ashikelooni n'ebyanga byayo na Ekurooni n'ebyanga byayo.
Kandi MUKAMA yaaguma n'Abayuda, baakubuura ensi y'ebibungo; kwonka tibaabaasa kubinga abaabaire batwire omu mpita, ahabw'okuba bakaba baine ebigaari by'ebyoma.
Kalebu yaaheebwa Heburooni, nk'oku Musa yaagambire, yaabingamu beene Anaki bonshatu.
Kwonka Ababenyamiini tibarabingire Abayebusi abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu; kureka Abayebusi bakaguma batwire n'Ababenyamiini omuri Yerusaalemu n'okuhitsya hati.
Ab'omuryango gwa Yosefu nabo bainamuka, baateera Beseeli, MUKAMA yaaguma nabo.
Kandi ab'omuryango gwa Yosefu baatuma ab'okutata Beseeli; (orwo rurembo ira rukaba rwetwa Luuzi;)
ezo ntatsi zaareeba omuntu naaruga omuri orwo rurembo, zaamugira ziti: Nitukweshengyereza, tworekye omuhanda ogurikuza omu rurembo; naitwe nitwija kukukorera eby'embabazi.
Nawe yaabooreka omuhanda gurikuza omu rurembo, baarucwekyereza na rurara; kwonka ogwo mushaija baamureka n'ab'omu ka ye boona.
Omushaija ogwo yaagyenda, yaataaha omu nsi y'Abahiiti, yaayombeka orurembo, yaarweta Luuzi; eryo niryo iziina ryarwo n'okuhitsya hati.

N'Abamanaase tibarabingire batuuzi b'omuri Besi-sheani na tauni zaayo, nari aba Tanaki na tauni zaayo, nari aba Doori na tauni zaayo, nari aba Ibuleamu na tauni zaayo, n'obu baakuba ab'omuri Megido na tauni zaayo; kureka Abanyakanaani bakaguma beetuuriire omuri egyo nsi.
Bwanyima Abaisraeli ku baaherize kugira amaani, baakoresa Abanyakanaani emirimo y'obuhuuku; tibaababingiramu kimwe.
N'Abaefuraimu tibarabingire Banyakanaani abaabaire batwire Gezeri; kureka Abanyakanaani bakaguma batwire nabo omuri Gezeri.
N'Abazebuluuni tibarabingire batuuzi b'omuri Kitirooni, n'obu baakuba ab'omuri Nahalooli; kureka Abanyakanaani bakaguma batwire nabo, nibabakorera emirimo y'obuhuuku.
N'Abaasheri tibarabingire batuuzi b'omuri Ako, nari Sidoni, nari Ahulaabu, nari Akiziibu, nari Heliba, nari Afika, nari Rehobu;
kureka Abaasheri bakatuura n'Abanyakanaani, abatuuzi b'omuri egyo nsi, ahakuba tibarababingiremu.

N'Abanafutaali tibarabingire batuuzi b'omuri Beti-shemeshi, nari aba Besanaasi, kureka bakatuura n'abanyakanaani, abatuuzi b'omuri egyo nsi; kwonka abaabaire batwire Beti-shemeshi n'aba Besanaasi bakahinduka abairu b'okubakorera emirimo y'obuhuuku.
Abaamori bakabingira Abadaani omu bibungo, tibaabaikiriza kushuuma mu mpita;
Abaamori abo baaguma beetuuriire aha kibungo Heresi, n'omuri Ayalooni n'omuri Shaalubiimu; kwonka ab'omuryango gwa Yosefu ku baabakirize amaani, baabagira abairu b'okubakorera emirimo y'obuhuuku.
Kandi emyatano y'Abaamori ekaba neetandikira aharikwinamuka Akarabiimu, neiha ahari Seela n'okwinamuka.
kandi naimwe mutariragaana endagaano n'abatwire omu nsi egi; kureka muryasheenya amatambiro gaabo. Kwonka timuroorobeire kiragiro kyangye. N'enki ekyabareeteire kukora mutyo?
Naanye nikyo ndikugirira nti, Tindibabinga mu maisho gaanyu; kureka baryaba nk'amahwa omu mbaju zaanyu, na baaruhanga baabo bababeere emitego.
Maraika wa MUKAMA ku yaagambiire Abaisraeli boona ebigambo ebyo, abantu baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baarira.
Omwanya ogwo baagweta Bokimu; baatambirirayo MUKAMA ebitambo.
Yoshua ku yaaherize kwohereza abantu, Abaisraeli baagyenda, buri muntu yaaza omu nsi y'obuhunguzi bwe kugikubuura.
Abantu baaheereza MUKAMA omu biro byona ebya Yoshua, kandi n'omu biro byona eby'abakuru abaatsigaireho yaafiire, abaareebire ebikuru ebi MUKAMA yaakoreire Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Yoshua mutabani wa Nuuni, omugaragwa wa MUKAMA, yaafa, ahikize emyaka igana na ikumi.
Baamuziika omu kyanga ky'obuhunguzi bwe Timunaati-seera omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bw'ekibungo kya Gaashi.
Kandi ab'obusingye obwo boona nabo baafa baakurata baishenkurubo, baakuratwa ab'obusingye obundi abaabaire batarikumanya MUKAMA n'ebi yaakoreire Abaisraeli.
Abaisraeli baakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, baaheereza Baabaali;
baimuura MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri; baakuratira baaruhanga abandi b'abanyamahanga abaabaire babeehinguririize, baabaramya, baagwisa kubi MUKAMA.
Baimuura MUKAMA, baaheereza Baabaali n'aba Ashitaroosi.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaabagirira ekiniga kingi, yaabahayo omu mikono y'abanyagi, baabanyaga; yaabarekurira abazigu baabo ababeehinguririize; tibaagaruka kugira garwanisa abazigu baabo.
Ei baabaire baza yoona, omukono gwa MUKAMA gubarwanisa ku bakora kubi, nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaire yaabateisize naarahira; baareeba enaku nyingi.

Kwonka baayanga kworobera abaramuzi baabo; baakuratira baaruhanga abandi nk'abarikuraaya, baabaramya; baarahuka kuteishuka, baaruga omu mitwarize ya baishenkurubo, abaabaire boorobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA; haza bo tibaatwaza batyo.

MUKAMA ku yaabaire abateeraho abaramuzi, aguma n'omuramuzi weena ou yaabateeraho, abajuna omu mikono y'abazigu baabo omu biro by'ogwo muramuzi byona; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ku yaabaire ahurira entsinda yaabo ahabw'abo abarikubahata nibabatuntuza, abagirira embabazi.

Kwonka ogwo muramuzi ku yaabaire afa, bagaruka enyima bakora kubi okukira baishenkurubo omu kukuratira baaruhanga abandi, okubaheereza n'okubaramya; kandi bakaba batareka bi barikukora, n'obu kwakuba okureka obugangaazi bwabo.
Ahabw'ebyo MUKAMA akaba agirira Abaisraeli ekiniga kingi, agira ati: Abantu aba baitsire endagaano yangye ei naaragaine na baishenkurubo nimbaragiira, kandi tibaahurira iraka ryangye,
n'ahabw'ekyo naanye tindigaruka kubinga ihanga ryona omu maisho gaabo ahari ago agaatsigaireho obu Yoshua yaafa,
mbone kurengyesa Abaisraeli amahanga ago, ndeebe ku baraabe nibaija kugyendera omu muhanda gwa MUKAMA, nk'oku baishenkurubo baabaire batwaza, nari shi batarikwija kutwaza batyo.
Nikyo MUKAMA yaatsigiireho amahanga ago, atarahukye kugabinga; kandi atagaheyo omu mukono gwa Yoshua.
ngu ab'obusingye bwona bw'Abaisraeli bamanyiire engamba, kandi okukira munonga ayegyese abo abaabaire batakarwanaga.

Abo nibo bakama bataano b'Abafilistia, n'Abanyakanaani boona, n'Abasidoni, n'Abahiivi, abaabaire batwire omu kibungo kya Lebanooni, okuruga aha rushozi rwa Baali-herumooni okuhika ah'orikutaahira nooza Hamasi.
Bakaba bari ab'okurengyesa Abaisraeli okumanya ku baraabe nibaija kworobera ebiragiro bya MUKAMA ebi yaaragiire baishenkurubo naaraba omuri Musa.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abaisraeli baatuura hamwe n'Abanyakanaani n'Abahiiti n'Abaamori n'Abaperizi n'Abahiivi n'Abayebusi;
baashwererana nabo, kandi baaheereza baaruhanga baabo.
Kyareetera MUKAMA kugirira Abaisraeli ekiniga ekirikwaka nk'omuriro, yaabahayo omu mikono ya Kushani-rishataimu, omugabe wa Mesopotamia; baamuheereza okumara emyaka munaana.
Kwonka Abaisraeli ku baatakiire MUKAMA, yaabateeraho ow'okubajuna, niwe Otinyeli mwene Kenazi, murumuna wa Kalebu.
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaamwijaho, yaaba omuramuzi w'Abaisraeli, yaarwana engamba, MUKAMA yaahayo Kushani-rishataimu omugabe wa Mesopotamia omu mikono ye, yaamusingura.
Okuruga obwo ensi yaahuumura engamba okumara emyaka makumi ana. Bwanyima Otinyeli mwene Kenazi yaafa.
Egulooni yaahuruza Abaamoni n'Abaamaleki, baateera Abaisraeli, baabasingura, baakubuura orurembo rwabo rw'emikindo.
Abaisraeli baamara emyaka ikumi na munaana, nibaheereza Egulooni omugabe wa Moabu.
Kwonka ku baatakiire MUKAMA, yaabateeraho ow'okubajuna, niwe Ehudi mwene Geera Omubenyamiini, owaabaire naatwara emosho. Bwanyima Abaisraeli baamuha omutoijo gw'okutoijera Egulooni omugabe wa Moabu.
Ehudi yaaheesesa rurara y'amoogi abiri, ey'oburaingwa bwa mukono gumwe; yaagyezirikira aha rukoba, neereereetera aha kibero kye kya buryo omunda y'ebijwaro bye.
Yaareetera Egulooni omugabe wa Moabu ogwo mutoijo; kandi Egulooni ogwo akaba ari omushaija muhango munonga.
Ku yaaherize kuhayo ogwo mutoijo, yaayohereza abantu abaagureetsire;

kwonka we ku yaahikire aha bishushani by'amabaare Gilugaali, yaatega, yaagaruka, yaagira omugabe ati: Nyakusinga, nyine eki ndikwenda kukugambira omu mubonano. Omugabe yaagira ati: Muhuname! Abagaragwa be boona baashohora, baaruga ahu yaabaire ari.
Ehudi yaija ahi ari, yaashanga ashutami wenka omu kishengye kye ky'amabeho eky'ahaiguru; yaamugira ati: Nkureeteire obutumwa oburikuruga ahari Ruhanga. Egulooni yaimuka omu kitebe kye.
Ehudi yaatayo omukono gwe gwa bumosho, yaasyorayo rurara aha kibero kye kya buryo, yaagimutimbura aha nda,
n'ekirindi kyayo kyahwerayo; ebishanju byagishweka, ahakuba taragikwireyo; n'efa yaareetwaho.
Bwanyima Ehudi yaashohora; ku yaahikire omu kisasi, yaakinga enyigi z'ekyo kishengye ky'ahaiguru, yaazikingisa ekishumuruzo.
Ehudi ku yaashohoire, abaheereza b'omugabe baija, baashanga enyigi z'ekyo kishengye zikingire; baateekateeka ngu agiire aha ishaazi omu kishengye ky'amabeho.
Baategyereza okuhitsya obu baitsirwe enshoni; n'ahabw'ekyo baatwara ekishumuruzo, baaziigura, baashanga mukama waabo agangarami ahansi afiire.
Kwonka ku baabaire bakiri aheeru bategyereize, Ehudi yaacwa, yaaraba aha bishushani by'amabaare, yaahungira Seira.
Ku yaahikireyo, yaateerera enzamba omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, Abaisraeli baashuuma nawe, nibaruga omuri ebyo bibungo, abeebembeire.

Yaabagira ati: Munkurate; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ahaireyo abazigu baanyu Abamoabu omu mikono yaanyu. Batyo baashuuma bamukuratiire, baakwata enyambukiro za Yorudani, ngu batangireho Abamoabu; kandi tibaikiriza muntu weena kwambuka.
Obwo baita omu Bamoabu abantu nka kakumi, abashaija boona ab'amaani kandi amamanzi; tihaahonokaho n'omwe.
Okwo nikwo Abamoabu baasingwirwe Abaisraeli ahari eryo izooba. Bwanyima ensi yaamara emyaka makumi munaana, ehumwire engamba.
Bwanyima yaakuratwa Shamugaari mwene Anaasi, owaitsire omu Bafilistia abashaija magana mukaaga n'omuhunda ogufunya ente; kandi nawe yaajuna Abaisraeli.
Ehudi ku yaaherize kufa, Abaisraeli baagaruka, baakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA;
kyareetera MUKAMA kubahayo omu mikono ya Yabini, omugabe wa Kanaani, owaabaire naategekyera omuri Hazori; kandi omukuru w'eihe rye akaba ari Sisera, owaabaire atuura Harosheesi ey'Abanyamahanga.
Abaisraeli baatakira MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba Yabini akaba aine ebigaari by'ebyoma magana mwenda, yaamara emyaka makumi abiri naita kubi Abaisraeli.
Omu bunaku obwo Debora nabikazi, muka Lapidoosi, niwe yaabaire naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.
Akaba ahimbisa kushutama ahansi y'omukindo gwa Debora ahagati ya Raama na Beseeli omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu; kandi Abaisraeli bakaba baija ah' ari kubashoboorora.

Bwanyima yaatuma kweta Baraki mwene Abinoamu omuri Kedeshi-nafutaali, yaamugira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli tarakuragiire kugyenda kuteeranira abantu kakumi aha kibungo Tabora, noobaiha omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali n'orwa Zebuluuni?
Kandi Ruhanga agizire ati: Naanye niinyija kukureetera Sisera omukuru w'eihe rya Yabini, akubugane aha mugyera Kishoni n'ebigaari bye n'engabo ze nyingi munonga, mmuheyo omu mikono yaawe.
Baraki yaamugarukamu ati: Ku oraagyende naanye, niinyija kugyenda; kwonka ku oraabe otagyenzire naanye, tindikwija kugyenda.

Yaamugira ati: N'ekya buzima niinyija kugyenda naiwe; kwonka orugyendo oru orikwija kugyenda tirurikwija kukuhaisa kitiinisa; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA naija kuhayo Sisera omu mikono y'omukazi. Debora yaimuka, yaagyenda na Baraki, baaza Kedeshi.
Ku baahikireyo, Baraki yaahuruza Abazebuluuni n'Abanafutaali kuteeranira Kedeshi; haija abantu kakumi bamukuratiire; na Debora yaagyenda nawe.
Ku baagambiire Sisera ku Baraki mwene Abinoamu yainamuka omu kibungo Tabora,
Sisera yaahuruza ebigaari bye byona, ebigaari by'ebyoma magana mwenda, n'engabo ze zoona ezaarugire Harosheesi ey'Abanyamahanga, yaabateeranira aha mugyera Kishoni.

Debora yaagambira Baraki ati: Imuka, ahakuba eri niryo izooba eri MUKAMA yaaheerayo Sisera omu mikono yaawe. Noogira ngu MUKAMA takwebembeire? Atyo Baraki yaaruga aha kibungo Tabora, yaashuuma n'engabo ze kakumi zimukuratiire.
MUKAMA yaaburanzya Sisera n'ebigaari bye byona n'engabo ze zoona na rurara, baahunga omu maisho ga Baraki; na Sisera yaasyoka omu kigaari kye, yairuka, yaahunga.
Baraki yaagyenda abingire ebyo bigaari n'ezo ngabo, okuhika Harosheesi ey'Abanyamahanga; engabo zoona eza Sisera zaahwera ahari rurara, tihaagira waahonokaho.
Yayeli yaashohora kubugana Sisera, yaamugira ati: Kiikama, mukama wangye, otaahe omwangye; otatiina. Yaataaha omu ihema rye, yaamushweka burangiti.
Onu yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza mpa otwizi tw'okunywa, ahakuba nyine eiriho. Yayeli yaafunduura ecupa y'amate, yaamuha, yaanywa, yaagaruka yaamushweka.
Sisera yaamugira ati: Yemerera aha muryango gw'eihema; ku haraije omuntu weena, yaakubuuza ati: Haine omuntu ori aha? omugire oti: Ngaaha!

Bwanyima Yayeli muka Heberi yaihayo enkondo y'eihema n'enyondo, yaamwizira naashooba, yaamuteera egyo nkondo omu kanenero agwejegyeire munonga ahabw'okuruha, enkondo yaayogamu, yaahika omu itaka. Atyo Sisera yaafa.

Kandi reeba, Baraki ku yaabaire akikuratiire Sisera, Yayeli yaashohora kumubugana, yaamugira ati: Ija nkworekye omushaija ou orikusherura. Yaataaha omu ihema ry'ogwo mukazi, yaashanga Sisera agangarami afiire, n'enkondo y'eihema ekimuri omu kanenero.
Eryo izooba Ruhanga yaagomoora Yabini omugabe w'Abanyakanaani omu maisho g'Abaisraeli;
n'ahabw'ekyo omukono gw'Abaisraeli gwaguma nigweyongyera amaani ahari Yabini omugabe wa Kanaani, okuhitsya obu baamuhwerekyerereize kimwe.
Eryo izooba Debora na Baraki mwene Abinoamu baayeshongora bati:
Muhimbise MUKAMA,
Ahabw'okuba abeebembezi beebembeire Israeli,
N'abantu baayehayo beekundiire.
Imwe bagabe 'mwe, nimuhurire; naimwe abanyiginya, mutegye amatu.
Naaza kweshongorera MUKAMA,
Nyeshongore eby'okuhimbisa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Obu waashohora omu nsi ya Edomu noohurura,
Ensi ekatengyeta, n'eiguru ryatengatenga,
Ebicu byatoonya amaizi.
Enshozi zaahimintika amaizi omu maisho ga MUKAMA,
Nangwa na Sinai yaaba etyo omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Emihanda rugyendwa ekaba etarabwa,
Abagyenzi bakaba bashenshebuka omu tuhanda tw'omu mbaju.
Obwo abategyeki bahweire omuri Israeli,
Okuhitsya obu nyowe Debora naimukire,
Nkaimuka nk'omuzaire omuri Israeli.
Engamba zaatengyerwa omu marembo.
Ha ngabo, nari icumu, ebyabaireho
Omu ngabo za Israeli obukumi buna.
Omutima gwangye gwona guri aha beebembezi ba Israeli
Abaayehaireyo omu bantu n'omutima gwekundiire.
Muhimbise MUKAMA.
Naimwe abashutama aha mikyeeka y'ekikama,
Kandi naimwe abagyendesa ebigyere omu mihanda.
Hare ei enduuru z'abarikurashana zirikureetwa,
Ei bataha amaizi,
Okwo niyo bariguma nibagambira eby'okuhikiirira ebi MUKAMA yaakozire,
Eby'okuhikiirira kw'omu butegyeki bwe omuri Israeli.
Nibwo abantu ba MUKAMA baashuuma, bakataaha omu marembo.
Sisiimuka, sisiimuka, Debora!
Sisiimuka, sisiimuka, oyeshongore ekyeshongoro.
Imuka, Baraki, abaabaire bakukwatsire obatware bari enkwatwa,
Iwe mutabani wa Abinoamu.
Haashuuma ab'ekitiinisa abaabaire batsigaireho;
Abantu ba MUKAMA baashuuma kumurwanira n'ab'amaani.
Bakukuratiire, iwe Benyamiini, na beene waanyu;
Abakuru b'engabo baashuuma nibaruga Makiri,
N'omuri Zebuluuni haarugayo abaabaire batwara enkoni y'omukuru w'engabo.
Abanyiginya ba Isakaari baija na Debora,
N'abandi ba Isakaari abaabaire bari abeesigwa ahari Baraki;
Bairukira omu ruhanga, bamuri omu ntegye.
Aha migyera ya Reubeeni
Baagiriraho enaama ehamire.
Kuhurira emikuri ei barikuziteerera?
Aha migyera ya Reubeeni
Haabaho okwebuuza kuhango munonga.
Abagileadi beegumiire obuseeri bwa Yorudani;
Abadaani batsigaziibwe ki omu meeri?
Abaasheri bagumire beeshutamiire aha nyambukiro,
Baayegumira omu mikono y'enyanja.
Tibatiinire kufa.
N'Abanafutaali bagiire omu kaso k'orugamba.
Abagabe ba Kanaani baarwanira Tanaki
Aha migyera ya Megido;
Kwonka tibaine feeza zi banyagire.
Enyonyoozi omu ngyendo zaazo zaarwanisa Sisera.
Ogwo mugyera gwa ira Kishoni.
Iwe magara gangye, oribatiriire ab'amaani.
Obwo embaraasi zaabo zairuka nizishaayaguza,
Nizishaayaguza n'amaani.
Mukyeene munonga abatwireyo,
Ahakuba tibaizire kuha MUKAMA emikono,
Kumuha emikono kurwanisa ab'amaani.
Muka Heberi Omukeeni aheebwe omugisha okukira abakazi abatuura omu mahema.
Ashabire amaizi, yaamuha amate;
Yaamureetera amate g'amakamo omu nkongooro y'ekitiinisa.
Yaatayo omukono, yaihayo enkondo,
N'omukono gwe ogwa buryo yaihayo enyondo y'abakozi;
Yaamuteera enkondo omu mutwe n'enyondo,
Yaagimuteera omu kanenero, yaayogamu.
Sisera yaayefunya, yaagwa;
Yaagangarama aha bigyere bye;
Ahu yaagwa, niho yaafeera.
Nyina wa Sisera yaaringuririza omu dirisa,
Yaarabya amaisho omu tuhengyere, naagira ati:
Ahabw'enki ekigaari kye kyasiibayo munonga?
N'enki ekizibiire enyamuziga z'ebigaari bye kwija?
Abaranga be b'obwengye baamugarukamu
Eki yaaba naateekateeka, bati:
Tibarikugibagana
Buri muntu omuzaana omwe nari babiri?
Sisera tarikubagana omunyago gw'emyenda y'ebicwererane by'amabara maingi;
N'emyenda y'amabara maingi agacwereraine embaju zombi
Ey'okukujweka omu bitsya?
Kwonka abarikukukunda babe nk'oku eizooba rituruka n'amaani.
Okuruga aho ensi yaahuumura okumara emyaka makumi ana.
Abamidiani baasingura Abaisraeli; ahabw'Abamidiani Abaisraeli baayetimbira amaaya omu nshozi, n'enyanga, kandi baayeyombekyera n'engo z'amabaare.
Ahakuba Abaisraeli ku baabaire babiba, Abamidiani n'Abaamaleki n'abandi bantu b'oburugwa-izooba baija babateera;
basiisirayo kubarwanisa, bashiisha emyaka yaabo okuhika Gaaza, kandi bakaba batatsiga k'okurya koona omu nsi ya Israeli, n'obu yaakuba entaama, nari ente nari endogoya.
Ahakuba bakaba baija n'amatungo gaabo n'amahema gaabo, baija baingi nk'enzigye, bo n'engamira zaabo batarikubaasa kubarwa; bataaha omu nsi kugicwekyereza.
Abaisraeli baayehwa munonga amatsiko ahabw'Abamidiani; baatakira MUKAMA.
Abaisraeli ku baatakiire MUKAMA ahabw'Abamidiani,
MUKAMA yaabatumaho nabi; yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaisraeli arikugamba naagira ati: nkabaiha Misri, naabaiha omu nju y'obuhuuku,
naabaiha omu mikono y'Abamisri n'omu mikono y'abandi boona abaabaire nibabaita kubi, naababinga, baabaruga omu maisho, imwe naabaha ensi yaabo.
Kandi naabagira nti: Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mutaritiina baaruhanga b'Abaamori, abu mutwire omu nsi yaabo; kwonka mwayanga kuhurira eiraka ryangye.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaija, yaashutama ahansi y'omwela ahari Ofura eya Yoashi owa Abiezeeri, kandi omutabani Gideoni akaba naahuura engano omu inyuukiro rya viinyo kugishereka Abamidiani.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaamweyoreka, yaamugira ati: MUKAMA ari hamwe naiwe, iwe omushaija w'amaani emanzi.

Gideoni yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, MUKAMA ku araabe ari hamwe naitwe, ahabw'enki ebi byona bitubaireho? Kandi eby'okutangaaza bye byona birahi, ebi baatatenkuriitwe baabaire batugambira, nibagira bati: MUKAMA tiwe yaatwihire omuri Misri? Mbwenu atutsigireho, yaatuhayo omu mikono y'Abamidiani.
MUKAMA yaamutaho amaisho, yaamugira ati: Gyenda n'amaani gaawe aga, ojune Abaisraeli omu mikono y'Abamidiani. Tiinye naakutuma?
Onu ati: Mukama wangye, nimbaasa nta kujuna Abaisraeli? Reeba, ab'omuryango gwaitu n'abooro okukira boona ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaase, kandi omu nju ya taata niinye muto.
MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ndyaba ndi hamwe naiwe, naiwe oryabinga Abamidiani nk'orikubinga omuntu omwe.
Onu ati: Ku oraabe wangirira embabazi, nyoreka ak'okureeberaho akarikuhamya ku niiwe orikugamba naanye.
Ninkweshengyereza otaruga aha okuhitsya obu ndaagarukye, nkakureetera omutoijo nkaguta omu maisho gaawe. Yaamugarukamu ati: Niinyija kuguma aha, okuhitsya ahu oraagarukire.

Atyo Gideoni yaataaha omuka, yaabaaga akaana k'embuzi, yaagira na twakeeki otutatumbisiibwe twa eefa y'esaano; enyama yaagita omu kiibo, n'omucuuzi gwayo yaaguta omu rwabya, yaabimureetera ahansi y'ogwo mwela, yaabimuheereza.
Maraika wa Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Twara egi nyama, na twakeeki otutatumbisiibwe, obite aha rukiri oru, obishukyeho n'ogwo mucuuzi. Onu yaakora atyo.

Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagorora omukono gwe ogwabaire gukwaitse enkoni, yaakoza eifundo ryayo aha nyama na twakeeki otutatumbisiibwe; ahonaaho omuriro gwaruga omu rukiri, gwayotsya egyo nyama na twakeeki otwo otutatumbisiibwe; bwanyima maraika wa MUKAMA yaabura, Gideoni tiyaagaruka kumureeba.
Gideoni ku yaamanyire ku ari maraika wa MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Ntoore hi, Mukama RUHANGA, ahakuba naareebana na maraika wa MUKAMA butunu.
MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Huumura, otatiina; torikwija kufa.
Bwanyima Gideoni yaayombekyerayo MUKAMA eitambiro, yaaryeta Yehova-shaloomu. Rikiri Ofura ey'aba Abiezeeri n'okuhitsya hati.

bwanyima oyombekyere MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe eitambiro aha mutwe gw'akabungo akeehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare, oryombekye gye; bwanyima otware egyo nimi ya kabiri, ogihongye kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, okyokyese enku ezi oraasheenye ahari Ashera.

Atyo Gideoni yaatwara abashaija ikumi ab'omu bairu be, yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiira; kwonka ahabw'okutiina ab'omu ka ya ishe, n'abantu ab'omuri orwo rurembo, yaakikora nyekiro, tiyaakikora nyomushana.

Ab'omuri orwo rurembo ku baimukire kare omu kasheeshe, baashanga eryo itambiro rya Baali risheenyirwe, na Ashera eyaabaire eri aha rubaju rwaryo etemirwe, n'enimi eya kabiri ehongyeirwe aha itambiro eryombekirwe.
Baabuuzana bati: Okozire eki n'oha? Ku baaherize kubuuririza munonga, baagira bati: Gideoni mwene Yoashi niwe akikozire.
Bwanyima abantu b'omu rurembo baagira Yoashi bati: Shohoza mutabani waawe, afe, ahabw'okuba asheenyire eitambiro rya Baali, kandi yaatema Ashera ebaire eriri haihi.

Yoashi yaagarukamu boona abaabaire bamubambiire, ati: Nimwenda kurwanirira Baali, nari kumutonganira? Weena orikumurwanirira, naija kwitwa omuri aka kasheeshe. Baali ku araabe ari Ruhanga, murekye ayerwaniririre, ahakuba eitambiro erisheenyirwe n'erye.
Nikyo eryo izooba Gideoni yaayeteirwe Yeruba-baali, amakuru ngu, Reka Baali amurwanise, ahakuba asheenyire eitambiro rye.
Bwanyima Abamidiani boona n'Abaamaleki kandi n'abantu b'oburugwa-izooba baateeranira hamwe, baayambuka, baasiisira omu ruhita rwa Yezereeli.
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaija ahari Gideoni, yaateera enzamba; Aba Abiezeeri baayeteerana, baamukurata.
Yaatuma entumwa kuhuruza Abamanaase boona; nabo baayeteerana, baamukurata; kandi yaatuma ezindi ntumwa kuhuruza Abaasheri n'Abazebuluuni n'Abanafutaali; bainamuka kubabugana.
Gideoni yaagambira Ruhanga ati: Ku oraabe noija kujunisa Abaisraeli omukono gwangye, nk'oku ogambire,

reeba naaza kuta ebyoya by'entaama omu ihuuriro; ku ndaashangye bitonzirweho orume byonka, haza ahabyehinguririize hoomire, obwo nimmanya ku orikwija kujunisa Abaisraeli omukono gwangye, nk'oku ogambire.
Kandi nikwo byabaire bityo; Gideoni ku yaimukire omu kasheeshe, yaakamuura ebyoya, byarugwamu orume rwingi, rwaijura orucuba.

Gideoni yaagaruka yaagira Ruhanga ati: Otangirira ekiniga, ondekye ngarukye ngambe rimwe kwonka, ndekyere aho. Ninkweshengyereza, reka nteereho ogundi murundi n'ebyoya; mbwenu ebyoya ka bibe nibyo byaguma byomire, haza eitaka ryona ribe niryo ryagiibwaho orume.
Ruhanga yaakora atyo ekyo kiro; ebyoya byonka byaguma byomire, orume rwaza aha itaka ryona.

Bwanyima Yeruba-baali, niwe Gideoni, n'abantu boona abu yaabaire aine, baimuka kare omu kasheeshe, baasiisira aha rubaju rw'eiziba rya Harodi; kandi orusiisira rw'Abamidiani rukaba ruri aha bukiizi bwabo obwa-bumosho, omu ruhanga haihi n'ekibungo kya Moore.

MUKAMA yaagambira Gideoni ati: Abantu abu oine bahinguraine obwingi; n'ahabw'ekyo tindikwija kuhayo Abamidiani omu mikono yaabo, Abaisraeli batakaanyehimbisaho nibagira bati: Emikono yaitu niyo etujunire.
Mbwenu nu gyenda ogambire abantu oti: Orikutiina weena, kandi orikutetema, agarukye omuka. Haagarukayo abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri; haatsigara kakumi.
Atyo yaashuumya abo bashaija aha maizi; MUKAMA yaagira Gideoni ati: Omuntu weena oraanywaise amaizi orurimi nk'embwa, omwegyekye hangahari; kandi weena oraatsimbe amaju kunywa, omute ahakwe.
Abaatahiise amaizi engaro, bakaganywaisa orurimi, baaba magana ashatu; kwonka abandi boona baanywa batsimbire amaju.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagambira Gideoni ati: Abashaija magana ashatu abaanywaisa amaizi orurimi nibo ndaabajunise, nkahayo Abamidiani omu mikono yaawe; reka abandi boona bagarukyeyo, buri muntu omu ka ye.

Atyo Gideoni yaayaka abo bantu entanda zaabo n'enzamba zaabo; bwanyima yaaboohereza boona, buri muntu omu ihema rye, kwonka yaaguma n'abo magana ashatu; kandi orusiisira rw'Abamidiani rukaba ruri ahaifo ye omu ruhita.
Ekyo kiro MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Imuka oshuume, oteere orusiisira, ahakuba nduhaireyo omu mikono yaawe.
Kwonka ku oraabe nootiina kushuumayo, gyenda n'omugaragwa waawe Puuri omuri orwo rusiisira;

noija kuhurira ebi barikugamba; bwanyima emikono yaawe neija kugira amaani g'okuruteera. Atyo yaashuuma n'omugaragwa we Puura, yaahika aha ngabo ezirikubandizibwaho ezaabaire ziiine eby'okurwanisa nizirinda orusiisira.

Abamidiani n'Abaamaleki n'abantu boona ab'oburugwa-izooba bakaba bateekire enteeko omu ruhita, bari baingi nk'enzigye, n'engamira zaabo zikaba zitarikubaasa kubarwa, ziri nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja.

Gideoni ku yaahikireyo, yaahurira omuntu omwe omuribo naarootororera mugyenzi we ekirooto, naagira ati: Reeba ndootsire ekirooto, ngu omugaati gwa sayiri gugwire omu rusiisira rw'Abamidiani, gwateera eihema, eryo ihema ryakumbagara, ryagwa rigarami.
Mugyenzi we yaamugarukamu ati: Ekyo ti kindi; ni rurara ya Gideoni mwene Yoashi, omushaija w'omu Baisraeli; Ruhanga ahaireyo Abamidiani n'eihe ryona omu mikono ye.

Gideoni ku yaahuriire ekyo kirooto n'oku baakishoboorora, yaaramya Ruhanga, yaagaruka omu rusiisira rw'Abaisraeli, yaagira ati: Mwimukye, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ahaireyo eihe rya Midiani omu mikono yaanyu.
Yaabaganisa abo bashaija magana ashatu omu mitwe eshatu, boona yaabakwatsa enzamba n'enyungu zirimu busha, n'emuri omuri ezo nyungu.
Yaabagira ati: Mundeebereho; oku ndaagire, mube nikwo mwagira. Ku ndaahikye ahu orusiisira rurikutandikira, mukore eki ndaakore.
Ku ndaateere enzamba, n'abandi boona abari hamwe naanye, naimwe muteerere enzamba aha mbaju zoona ez'orusiisira rwona, nimugira muti: Ahabwa MUKAMA n'ahabwa Gideoni.

Atyo Gideoni n'abashaija igana abu yaabaire aine baahika ahu orusiisira rurikutandikira, abantu baahirwayo, ahu abarinzi ba kabiri batandikira; baateera enzamba, baayata enyungu ezi baabaire baine omu ngaro.

Egyo mitwe eshatu y'engabo baateerera hamwe enzamba, baayata enyungu, bakwaitse emuri omu ngaro zaabo za bumosho, n'enzamba z'okuteera ziri omu za buryo; baateera orwari nibagira bati: Rurara ya MUKAMA n'eya Gideoni.
Buri muntu yaayemerera omu mwanya gwe, beehinguriririize orusiisira; engabo zoona ez'Abamidiani zairuka niziyogoorekana, zaahunga.

Abantu abo magana ashatu baagumizamu nibateera enzamba, MUKAMA yaitanisa Abamidiani na rurara, buri muntu yaita mugyenzi we, eihe ryona ryaitana, ryahunga, ryahika Besi-shiita ehereraine na Zerera, baahika aha mwatano gwa Abeli-mehola haihi na Tabasi.
Abashaija ba Israeli baahurura nibaruga Nafutaali na Ashera na Manaase yoona, baakurata Abamidiani.

Kandi baakwata abanyiginya babiri ba Midiani, Orebu na Zeebu; Orebu baamwitira aha rukiri rwa Orebu, na Zeebu baamwitira aha inyuukiro rya Zeebu; baagumizamu baakurata Abamidiani; kandi baareetera Gideoni omutwe gwa Orebu n'ogwa Zeebu seeri ya Yorudani.
Nawe yaabagarukamu ati: Nkozire ki ekirikwingana n'ebi mukozire? Emizaabibu y'empumbano eya Efuraimu terikuhita icwa ryona ery'emizaabibu ya Abiezeeri?
Ruhanga ahaireyo abanyiginya ba Midiani Orebu na Zeebu omu mikono yaanyu. Mbwenu shi nyowe eki nkozire ekirikukira ebi mukozire niki? Ku yaabagambiire ekyo, ekiniga kyabo kyaikaikana.
Gideoni yaija yaayambuka Yorudani n'abo bantu magana ashatu abu yaabaire aine, bagwire enshazi kwonka babakuratiire.
Yaagira abantu ba Sukoosi ati: Naabeeshengyereza mumpeere aba bantu bankuratiire emigaati, ahakuba baagwa enshazi, kandi nkibingire Zeeba na Zalumuuna, abagabe ba Midiani.
Abategyeki ba Sukoosi baagira bati: Zeeba na Zalumuuna waabakwatsire, tukabona kuheereza engabo zaawe ebyokurya?
Gideoni yaagira ati: MUKAMA ku araaheyo Zeeba na Zalumuuna omu mikono yangye, emibiri yaanyu niinyija kugitaaguza amahwa g'omu ihamba n'ag'emikwata-ngwe.
Yaarugayo, yaaza Penueli, nabo yaabagambira ebigambo nk'ebyo; kandi aba Penueli bamugarukamu nk'eby'aba Sukoosi.
Yaagambira aba Penueli ati: Ku ndaabe naagarukire n'obusingye, niinyija kusheenya ogu munaara.
Gideoni yainamuka, yaatoora omuhanda ogurikuraba omu bantu abaabaire batuura omu mahema aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bwa Nooba na Yogibeha, yaasingura eryo ihe; ahakuba rikaba ryehugiireho.
Zeeba na Zalumuuna abagabe bombi ba Midiani baahunga, yaababinga, yaabakwata, kandi engabo zaabo zoona yaazihahaaza emitima, zaataataana.
Bwanyima Gideoni mwene Yoashi yaatabaaruka omu rugamba, yaaraba aharikwinamuka Heresi;
yaakwata omutsigazi wa Sukoosi, yaamubuuza abategyeki n'abakuru ba Sukoosi, onu yaamuhandiikira amaziina gaabo, abashaija makumi mushanju na mushanju.

Atyo yaija aha ba Sukoosi, yaagira ati: Mureebe Zeeba na Zalumuuna, abu munteerereireho enaku, nimugira muti, Zeeba na Zalumuuna waabakwatsire, tukabona kuha engabo zaawe ezirikugwa enshazi eby'okurya?
Yaatwara abakuru b'orurembo, n'amahwa g'omu ihamba n'ag'emikwatangwe, yaageegyesesa aba Sukoosi.
Kandi yaasheenya omunaara gwa Penueli, yaita abashaija b'omuri orwo rurembo.

Bwanyima yaabuuza Zeeba na Zalumuuna ati: Abashaija abu mwaitiire Tabora bakaba nibashusha ki? Baamugarukamu bati: Nk'oku orikushusha, nabo nikwo baabaire nibashusha. Buri omwe akaba naashusha omwana w'omugabe.
Yaagira ati: Abo bakaba bari bakuru bangye, abaana ba maawe. Nindahira MUKAMA ahuriire, kuri noogira ngu mukabakiza, naanye tinkubaitsire.
Yaagambira Yeseri omujigaijo gwe, ati: Imuka, obaite. Kwonka omutsigazi ogwo tiyaihayo rurara ye; yaatiina, ahabw'okuba akaba akiri omutsigazi.

Bwanyima Zeeba na Zalumuuna nikwo kumugira bati: Imuka, obe niiwe waatwita, ahakuba nk'oku omuntu arikwingana, n'amaani ge nikwo gaingana. Atyo Gideoni yaimuka, yaita Zeeba na Zalumuuna, yaajuura engamira zaabo ebirezi ebi zaabaire zijwaire omu bitsya.
Bwanyima Abaisraeli baagambira Gideoni bati: Otutegyekye, iwe na mutabani waawe, na mwijukuru waawe; ahabw'okuba otukirize Abamidiani.
Gideoni yaabagarukamu ati: Tindibategyeka, na mutabani wangye taribategyeka; kureka MUKAMA niwe aribategyeka.
Gideoni yaabagira ati: Nyine eki ndikubashaba; buri muntu ampe empeta z'omu matu ezi anyagire. (Ahakuba Abamidiani bakaba bajwara empeta z'ezaabu omu matu, ahabw'okuba bakaba bari Abaishimaeli.)
Baamugarukamu bati: Twaza kuzikuha n'omutima gwekundiire. Baayara omwenda ahansi, buri muntu yaanagaho empeta z'omu matu ezi anyagire.

Oburemeezi bw'empeta zaabo ez'ezaabu z'omu matu ezi yaashabire bwaba shekeli z'ezaabu rukumi na magana mushanju, otabariiremu birezi n'eby'okwehunda n'ebijwaro bya bujwa ebyabaire bijwarwa abagabe ba Midiani, kandi otataireho mikuufu ey'omu bitsya by'engamira zaabo.
Gideoni yaabikoramu efodi, yaagita omu rurembo rwe orurikwetwa Ofura; Abaisraeli boona baaguma nibazayo kugiramya nk'abarikuraaya; yaaba omutego ahari Gideoni n'ab'omu ka ye.
Batyo Abamidiani baasingurwa Abaisraeli, tibaagaruka kwimutsya mutwe obundi. Ensi yaahuumura okumara emyaka makumi ana omu busingye bwa Gideoni.
Yeruba-baali mwene Yoashi yaagyenda, yaatuura omu nju ye ey'obutaka.
Gideoni akaba aine abaana b'aboojo makumi mushanju, abu yaayezaariire; ahabw'okuba akaba aine abakazi baingi.
Kandi akaba aine omukazi w'ekinyanshunju omuri Shekemu; nawe yaamuzaarira omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Abimeleki.
Bwanyima Gideoni mwene Yoashi yaafa yaahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru, yaaziikwa Ofura ey'aba Abiezeeri omu kituuro kya Yoashi ishe.
Abaisraeli tibaijuka MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, owaabaire abaiha omu mikono y'abazigu baabo boona, abaabaire baba babeehinguririize;
kandi tibaagirira mbabazi ab'enju ya Yeruba-baali, niwe Gideoni, ahabw'ebirungi byona ebi yaakoreire Israeli.
Nimbeeshengyereza mubuuze aba Shekemu boona muti: Ekirungi ahariimwe nikiiha, okutegyekwa batabani ba Yeruba-baali makumi mushanju, nari okutegyekwa omwe? Kandi mwijukye ku ndi owaanyu w'aha mara.
Ab'oruganda rwa nyina baamugambirira aba Shekemu boona ebigambo ebyo byona, emitima y'aba Shekemu yaasiima kwija kukurata Abimeleki; ahakuba bakagira bati: Ni mwene waitu.
Baiha omu nju ya Baali-berisi ebicweka by'efeeza makumi mushanju, baabiha Abimeleki, nawe yaabiha abantu abataine mugasho, ebizahambuki, yaabaguriirira, baamukurata.

Yaaza Ofura owa ishe, yaashangayo beene ishe, batabani ba Yeruba-baali makumi mushanju, yaabaitira aha rukiri; kwonka Yosamu mutabani wa Yeruba-baali omuto yaaba niwe yaahonokaho, ahakuba akeeshereka.
Aba Shekemu boona baayeteerana n'ab'enju ya Miilo boona, baagyenda baayemekyera Abimeleki aha mwela gw'enyomyo y'omuri Shekemu.
Ku baakigambiire Yosamu, yaagyenda, yaayemerera aha mutwe gw'ekibungo kya Gerizimu yaabeeta n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Imwe bantu ba Shekemu 'mwe, nimumpurire, naimwe Ruhanga abone kubahurira.
Eizooba rimwe emiti ekaimuka, yaaza kweteeraho omugabe w'okugitegyeka; yaagambira omuzeituuni eti: Tutegyekye.
Omuzeituuni gwagigira guti: Mbwenu nimwenda ngu ntsigyeho amajuta gangye agarikuhaisa Ruhanga n'abantu ekitiinisa, nze kwecunda ahaiguru y'emiti?
Egyo miti yaagira omutiini eti: Ija, otutegyekye.
Kwonka omutiini gwagigarukamu guti: Mbwenu nimwenda ngu ntsigyeho obunuzi bwangye n'ebijuma byangye birungi, nze kwecunda ahaiguru y'emiti?
Egyo miti yaagira omuzaabibu eti: Ija, otutegyekye.
Omuzaabibu gwagigarukamu guti: Nimwenda ngu ntsigyeho viinyo yangye egwisa gye Ruhanga n'abantu, nze kwecunda ahaiguru y'emiti?
Bwanyima emiti yoona yaagira omukwatangwe eti: Ija, otutegyekye.

Omukwata-ngwe gwagigarukamu guti: Ku muraabe nimuunyemeka omu mazima, mwije mwegame omu kicuucu kyangye; kwonka ku kiraabe kitari kityo, omuriro ka gurugye omu mukwata-ngwe, gwokyeze kimwe emyereezi ya Lebanooni.
Mbwenu ku muraabe mukozire omu bwesigwa n'omu mazima omu kwemeka Abimeleki, kandi ku muraabe mukozire gye Yerubabaali n'ab'omu ruganda rwe, mukamukorera ebishemereire ebi yaakozire
(ahakuba tata akabarwanirira, yaayoga amagara, yaabaiha omu mikono y'Abamidiani;
mbwenu eri izooba mwaimukira eka ya tata, mwaita abatabani makumi mushanju, mwabaitira aha rukiri, mwayemeka Abimeleki omwana w'omuzaanakazi kutegyeka abantu ba Shekemu, ahabw'okuba ni mwene waanyu)
mbwenu ku muraabe mukoreire Yeruba-baali n'ab'omu ruganda rwe eby'obwesigwa n'eby'amazima eri izooba, mwesiime ahabwe, nawe ayesiime ahabwanyu.

Kwonka ku kiraabe kitari kityo, omuriro ka gurugye ahari Abimeleki, gwokyeze kimwe aba Shekemu n'ab'enju ya Miilo; kandi n'omuriro gugarukye gurugye omu ba Shekemu n'omu b'enju ya Miilo, gwokyeze kimwe Abimeleki.
Yosamu yairuka, yaahungira Beeri, yaatuurayo ahabw'okutiina Abimeleki mukuru we.
Abimeleki yaamara emyaka eshatu naategyeka Israeli.
Ruhanga yaatuma omuzimu kwanganisa Abimeleki n'aba Shekemu; aba Shekemu baamugirira enaama y'okumureebya,

ngu okwita kubi oku yaitsire batabani ba Yeruba-baali makumi mushanju, n'eshagama yaabo, bigwere mwene waabo Abimeleki, owaabaitsire, kandi bigwere n'aba Shekemu abaamuhaire emikono y'okwita beene ishe.
Aba Shekemu baata abantu aha mitwe y'ebibungo kumugwera, kandi baaguma nibanyaga abantu boona abaabaire nibabarabaho omuri ogwo muhanda. Ekyo kyagambirwa Abimeleki.
Bwanyima Gaali mwene Ebedi yaija na beene waabo, baaza Shekemu; aba Shekemu baamwesiga;
baaza omu misiri, baacwa emizaabibu, baaginyuuka, baagira obugyenyi, baataaha omu nju ya ruhanga waabo, baarya, baanywa, baajuma Abimeleki.

Gaali mwene Ebedi yaagira ati: Abimeleki niwe oha, kutegyeka itwe aba Shekemu? Mwene Yeruba-baali na Zebuli omukungu we bakaba batarikutegyekwa aba Hamori ishe wa Shekemu? Ahabw'enki itwe tushemereire kumuheereza?
Kuri noogira ngu niinye ndikutegyeka aba bantu, nkaihireho Abimeleki, mmugira nti: Teerana engabo zaawe zoona, oshohore!
Zebuli omutegyeki w'orurembo ku yaahuriire ebigambo bya Gaali mwene Ebedi, yaagira ekiniga;
yaatuma entumwa ahari Abimeleki bwesherekye, naagira ati: Reeba, Gaali mwene Ebedi na beene ishe baizire Shekemu, nibaimukiriza orurembo kukugomera.
Mbwenu nu, imuka oije nyekiro, iwe n'abantu abu oine, ogwere omu misiri.
Omu kasheeshe eizooba nirituruka, mwimukye mweshukye aha rurembo, muruteere; we n'abantu abu aine ku baraije kukurwanisa, obagire nk'oku orikubaasa.
Abimeleki n'abantu boona abu yaabaire aine baimuka nyekiro, baayebaganisamu emitwe ena, baagwera Shekemu.
Gaali mwene Ebedi yaashohora, yaayemerera omu irembo ry'orurembo; ahonaaho Abimeleki n'abu yaabaire aine baimuka ahu baabaire bagwereire.
Gaali ku yaareebire abo bantu, yaagira Zebuli ati: Reeba abantu nibashuuma, nibaruga aha mutwe gw'ebibungo. Zebuli yaamugira ati: Nooreeba ebiinyimanyimi by'ebibungo, oshusha oti n'abantu.
Gaali yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Reeba abantu nibashuuma, baahika rwagati y'ebibungo, kandi n'ogundi mutwe gwaija nigureetwa omu muhanda gw'omwela gw'abafumu.
Zebuli nikwo kumutsyorera ati: Nya myehimbiso yaawe eri erahi, iwe ogizire oti: Abimeleki n'oha itwe kumuheereza? Bariya tibo bantu abu ogayire? Mbwenu irooko orwane nabo.
Gaali za yaayebembera aba Shekemu, yaarwanisa Abimeleki.
Abimeleki yaamubinga, onu yaamuhunga; baingi baahutaara, baagyenda nibagwa omu muhanda gwona okuhika aha irembo ry'orurembo.
Abimeleki yaatsigara Aruma, na Zebuli yaabinga Gaali na beene waabo, ngu barekye kuguma omuri Shekemu.
Ku bwaseesire, abantu baashohora, baaza omu misiri; kyagambirwa Abimeleki.
Yaatwara engabo ze, yaazicwamu emitwe eshatu, baagwera omu misiri; ku yaimukize amaisho, yaareeba abantu nibaruga omu rurembo, yaimuka, yaabateera, yaabaita.
Abimeleki n'omutwe ogu yaabaire aine bairuka, baayemerera omu irembo ry'orurembo; emitwe endiijo ebiri yaagwa aha bantu boona abaabaire bari omu misiri, baabaita.
Abimeleki yaarenzya eizooba naarwanisa orwo rurembo; yaarukwata, yaita abantu abaabaire barurimu; yaarusheenyagura, yaarumemeereramu omwonyo.
Baagambira Abimeleki ku abantu boona ab'omunaara gwa Shekemu beeteeraine hamwe.

Abimeleki n'abantu boona abu yaabaire aine bainamuka omu kibungo kya Zalumooni; yaakwata empango, yaatema eitaagi omu miti; yaaritwara aritaire aha ibega; yaagira abantu abu yaabaire aine ati: Oku mwareeba ningira, naimwe murahukye mube nikwo mwagira.

Abantu boona buri muntu nikwo kutema eitaagi rye, bakakurata Abimeleki, bakageegyekyerera ekyo kishengye, baakookyezamu abantu abaabaire barimu; batyo abantu boona ab'omunaara gwa Shekemu baafa, haafeeramu abantu nka rukumi, abashaija n'abakazi.
Bwanyima Abimeleki yaaza Tebeza, yaagiteeraho orusiisira kugirwanisa, yaagikwata.
Kwonka omuri orwo rurembo hakaba harimu omunaara gugumire; abantu boona ab'omu rurembo, abashaija n'abakazi baaguhungiramu, baayekingirana, baatemba aha mutwe gwagwo.
Abimeleki yaahika aha munaara, yaaguteera, yairira haihi n'orwigi rwagwo kurwotsya n'omuriro.
Omukazi yaarekyera eseiso, yaagiteera Abimeleki omutwe, yaagwata.
Ahonaaho Abimeleki yaayeta omutsigazi owaabaire amutwarira eby'okurwanisa, yaamugira ati: Ihayo rurara yaawe, onyite, abantu batakaagira ngu yaitwa omukazi. Ogwo mutsigazi we yaamutimbura, yaafa.
Abaisraeli ku baareebire Abimeleki yaafa, baarugayo, buri muntu yaataaha omu ka ye.
Okwo nikwo Ruhanga yaahoire Abimeleki enzigu ahabw'ekibi eki yaakoreire ishe, obu yaita beene ishe makumi mushanju;
kandi ebibi byona ebi aba Shekemu baakozire Ruhanga yaabibazimuurira; baagiibwaho omukyeeno gwa Yosamu mwene Yeruba-baali.
Bwanyima ya Abimeleki Toola mwene Pua, mwijukuru wa Dodo ow'omu ruganda rwa Isakaari yaimuka kujuna Israeli; akaba atuura Shamiri omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu.
Yaamara emyaka makumi abiri n'eshatu naacwera Abaisraeli emanja; bwanyima yaafa, yaaziikwa omuri Shamiri.
Bwanyima ye haimuka Yairi Omugileadi, nawe yaamara emyaka makumi abiri ne'biri naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.
Akaba aine abatabani makumi ashatu, abaabaire bagyendera aha ndogoya nto makumi ashatu, kandi baine endembo makumi ashatu omu nsi ya Gileadi ezaabaaire nizeetwa Havosi-yairi n'okuhitsya hati.
Yairi yaafa, yaaziikwa Kamoni.
MUKAMA yaagirira Israeli ekiniga kingi, yaabahayo omu mikono y'Abafilistia n'ey'Abaamoni.
Omu mwaka ogwo baaburabuza Abaisraeli, baabaita kubi; baamara emyaka ikumi na munaana nibaita kubi Abaisraeli boona abaabaire batwire seeri ya Yorudani omu nsi y'Abaamori ey'omuri Gileadi.
Kandi Abaamoni baayambuka Yorudani kurwanisa Abayuda n'Ababenyamiini n'ab'oruganda rwa Efuraimu; n'ahabw'ekyo Abaisraeli baatuntuzibwa munonga.
MUKAMA yaagarukamu Abaisraeli ati; Tindabajunire Abanyamisri n'Abaamori n'Abaamoni kandi n'Abafilistia?
Kandi n'aba Sidoni n'Abaamaleki n'aba Maoni bakabaita kubi, mwantakira, naabaiha omu mikono yaabo.
Kwonka mwanyimuura, mwaheereza baaruhanga abandi; n'ahabw'ekyo tindigaruka kubajuna.
Mugyende mutakire baaruhanga abu mwayetooraniire; babe nibo baabajuna omu biro by'okutuntuzibwa kwanyu.
Abaisraeli baagarukamu MUKAMA bati: N'ekya buzima tukashiisha; mbwenu otukore kyona eki orikwenda; kwonka nitukweshengyereza otujune eri izooba.
Baiha baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga omuribo, baaheereza MUKAMA; omutima gwe gwashaasha munonga ahabw'obusaasi bw'Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Abaamoni baayeteerana, bateera orusiisira omuri Gileadi; n'Abaisraeli nabo baayeteerana, baateera orusiisira omuri Mizipa.
Kandi abantu bakuru ba Gileadi, baagambirana bati: N'oha oraabanze kurwana n'Abaamoni? Ogwo niwe araabe mukuru w'abatwire omuri Gileadi boona.

Kandi muka Gileadi akaba amuzaariire abaana b'aboojo. Batabani b'omukazi we abo ku baakuzire, baabinga Yefusa, baamugira bati: Torigira buhunguzi mu ka ya tataitwe, ahabw'okuba ori omwana w'ondiijo mukazi.
Yefusa nikwo kuhunga beene ishe, akatuura omu nsi ya Toobu; abantu abaabaire bataine mugasho baaguma nibateeranira ahari Yefusa, nibahurura nawe.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, Abaamoni baateera Abaisraeli.
Abaamoni ku baabateire, abakuru ba Gileadi baaza kuhuruza Yefusa omu nsi ya Toobu;
baamugira bati: Ija obe omukuru w'eihe ryaitu, tubone kurwanisa Abaamoni.
Kwonka Yefusa yaabagarukamu ati: Tiimwe mwanyangire, mukambinga omu ka ya tata? Ahabw'enki mwaija kunsherura, obu muri omu busaasi?
Abakuru ba Gileadi baamugarukamu bati: Ekyatureetera kukugarukira, nitwenda ngu ogyende naitwe, turwanise Abaamoni, kandi obe omukuru w'abatwire omuri Gileadi boona.
Yefusa yaabuuza abakuru ba Gileadi ati: Ku murangarure owaitu kurwanisa Abaamoni, MUKAMA yaabahayo omu mikono yangye, n'ekya buzima ndyaba omukuru waanyu?
Abakuru ba Gileadi baamugarukamu bati: MUKAMA niwe ariba mushinja ahagati yaitu; buzimazima turyakora nk'oku waagamba.
Atyo Yefusa yaagyenda n'abakuru ba Gileadi, abantu baamuhindura omukuru waabo w'okubeebembera. Yefusa yaagambira ebigambo bye byona omu maisho ga MUKAMA omuri Mizipa.
Yefusa yaatuma entumwa aha mugabe w'Abaamoni, naamubuuza ati: Nontura ki okwija kuteera ensi yangye?
Omugabe w'Abaamoni yaagarukamu entumwa za Yefusa ati: Ahakuba Abaisraeli ku baabaire nibaruga Misri, baanyaga ensi yangye okuruga Arunooni okuhika Yaboki na Yorudani; mbwenu gigarure n'obusingye.
Yefusa yaagaruka yaatuma entumwa aha mugabe w'Abaamoni,
yaamugira ati: Oku nikwo Yefusa arikugira ati: Israeli taranyagire nsi ya Moabu n'obu yaakuba ey'Abaamoni;
kureka Abaisraeli bakaruga Misri, baaraba omu ihamba okuhika aha Nyanja erikutukura; bwanyima baahika Kadeshi.

Okuruga aho Israeli yaatuma entumwa aha mugabe wa Edomu, naagira ati: Twakweshengyereza, reka turabe omu nsi yaawe; omugabe wa Edomu tiyaikiriza. Kandi yaatuma atyo aha mugabe wa Moabu; kwonka nawe tiyaikiriza. Israeli nikwo kuguma Kadeshi.

Bwanyima baaraba omu ihamba, baayekiikuura ensi ya Edomu n'eya Moabu, baaraba aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba rw'ensi ya Moabu, baateera amahema seeri ya Arunooni; kwonka tibaarenga mwatano gwa Moabu, ahakuba omwatano gwayo ni Arunooni.
Bwanyima Israeli yaatuma entumwa ahari Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori, omugabe wa Heshibooni, naamugira ati: Twakweshengyereza, reka turabe omu nsi yaawe, tuze owaitu.
Kwonka Sihooni tiyaayesiga Baisraeli kurenga omwatano gwe, kureka yaateerana abantu be boona, yaateera orusiisira Yahazi, yaarwanisa Abaisraeli.
MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli yaahayo Sihooni n'abantu be boona omu mikono y'Abaisraeli, baabasingura. Batyo Abaisraeli baakubuura ensi yoona ey'Abaamori abaabaire batwiremu.
Baakubuura ensi yoona ey'Abaamori okuruga Arunooni okuhika Yaboki, kandi okuruga aha ihamba n'okuhika Yorudani.
Atyo MUKAMA Ruhanga w'Abaisraeli yaabinga Abaamori omu maisho g'abantu be Abaisraeli. Mbwenu niimwe mwakushemereire kugikubuura?
Torikubuura ensi ei Kemoshi ruhanga waawe arikuha? Naitwe abantu boona abu MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaabingire omu maisho gaitu, nibo turaakubuure ensi yaabo.
Oine eki orikukiza Balaki mwene Zipori omugabe wa Moabu? Akaba arahakaniiseho Abaisraeli, nari akaba arabarwaniiseho?

Abaisraeli ka baamazire emyaka magana ashatu, batwire omuri Heshibooni n'omuri tauni zaayo, n'omuri Aroeri na tauni zaayo, n'omu ndembo zoona eziri aha mbaju za Arunooni! Ahabw'enki omuri egyo myaka yoona ezo ndembo timurazigarukaine?
N'ahabw'ekyo tiinye nkukozire kubi, kureka niiwe onkozire kubi kundwanisa. MUKAMA Omucwi w'emanja abe niwe yaaramura Abaisraeli n'Abaamoni eri izooba.
Kwonka omugabe w'Abaamoni tiyaata mutima ha bigambo ebi Yefusa yaamutumireho.
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaija ahari Yefusa; Yefusa yaaraba omuri Gileadi na Manaase, yaahika Mizipa eya Gileadi; yaarugayo yaahika omu Baamoni.
Yefusa yaahiga ahari MUKAMA naagira ati: Buzimazima ku oraaheyo Abaamoni omu mikono yangye,
ku nditabaaruka gye ninduga kurwanisa Abaamoni, ekiribanza kushohora omu muryango gw'enju yangye kumbugana, kiryaba ekya MUKAMA, kandi ndyakihonga, kibe ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Atyo Yefusa yaayambuka aha Baamoni kubarwanisa; MUKAMA yaabahayo omu mikono ye.
Yaabateera okuruga Aroeri okuhika Miniisi, yaabaitamu abantu baingi munonga, yaakwata endembo makumi abiri okuhika ahari Abeeli-keramimu. Okwo nikwo Abaamoni baasingwirwe Abaisraeli.

Yefusa ku yaamureebire, yaataagura ebijwaro bye, yaagira ati: Ai bambe, mwana wangye! Ka wangwisiza akagwe, okandeetera amaganya maingi; ahakuba nkaashamya akanwa kangye ahari MUKAMA; tinkibaasa kukireka.
Muhara we yaamugarukamu ati: Taata, ku oraabe waayashamize akanwa kaawe ahari MUKAMA, ongire nk'ekyarugire omu kanwa kaawe oku kiri, nk'oku MUKAMA akuhooreire Abaamoni abazigu baawe.
Yaagaruka yaagira ishe ati: Ninkushaba onyikirize eki; ondekye ameezi abiri, nze omu bibungo, ngyendagyende na bagyenzi bangye, ncurire obuhangare bwangye.
Yaamugira ati: Irooko. Yaamwohereza okumara ameezi abiri; yaagyenda na bagyenzi be, yaacurira obuhangare bwe omu bibungo.
Ameezi abiri ku gaahweire, yaagaruka ahari ishe, yaamugira nk'oku yaaraganiise; kandi omwishiki ogwo akaba atakamanyaga mushaija.
Gwahinduka omugyenzo omuri Israeli, abaishiki ba Israeli okuguma nibagyenda buri mwaka kumara ebiro bina nibacurira muhara wa Yefusa Omugileadi.
Yefusa yaabagarukamu ati: Nyowe n'abantu bangye tukaba twine empaka nyingi n'Abaamoni; kandi ku twabeetsire, timwabatujuna.
Ku naareebire mutaatujuna, naayoga amagara, naayambuka kurwanisa Abaamoni, kandi MUKAMA yaabahayo omu mikono yangye. Mbwenu ahabw'enki mwaija eri izooba kundwanisa?

Okuruga aho Yefusa yaahuruza Abagileadi boona, yaabarwanisiza Efuraimu; Abagileadi baasingura Abaefuraimu; ahakuba bakabatsyorera bati: Imwe Abagileadi, muri Abaefuraimu abaacwire omu nsi ya Efuraimu n'eya Manaase.

Abagileadi baakwata enyambukiro za Yorudani kutangaho Abaefuraimu ngu batambuka. Omuefuraimu weena ku yaabaire aba naahunga, yaahika aha nyambukiro, yaashaba kwambuka, Abagileadi bamubuuza bati: Ori Omuefuraimu? Ku yaabaire agira ati: Ngaaha,

bamugira bati: Gira oti, Shiboleesi, nawe agira Siboleesi, ahabw'okutabaasa kukigamba gye, bamukwata, bamwitira ahari ezo nyambukiro za Yorudani. Omu bunaku obwo haafa Abaefuraimu obukumi buna n'enkumi ibiri.
Yefusa yaamara emyaka mukaaga naacwera Abaisraeli emanja. Bwanyima Yefusa Omugileadi yaafa, yaaziikwa omu rurembo rumwe aha ndembo z'omuri Gileadi.
Bwanyima ye Ibuzaani owa Betelehemu yaaba omuramuzi w'Abaisraeli.

Akaba aine abatabani makumi ashatu na bahara be makumi ashatu abu yaahingiire omu zindi nganda; kandi akashwerererayo abatabani abakazi makumi ashatu. Yaamara emyaka mushanju naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.
Bwanyima Ibuzaani yaafa, yaaziikwa Betelehemu.
Bwanyima ye haazaho Elooni Omuzebuluuni, yaaba omuramuzi w'Abaisraeli; yaamara emyaka ikumi naabacwera emanja.
Bwanyima Elooni Omuzebuluuni yaafa, yaaziikwa Ayalooni omu ishaza rya Zebuluuni.
Bwanyima ye haazaho Abudooni mwene Hileeli owa Piratooni, yaaba omuramuzi w'Abaisraeli.
Akaba aine abatabani makumi ana n'abaijukuru b'aboojo makumi ashatu; boona makumi mushanju bakaba bagyendera aha ndogoya nto makumi mushanju. Yaamara emyaka munaana naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.
Bwanyima Abudooni mwene Hileeli owa Piratooni yaafa, yaaziikwa Piratooni omu ishaza rya Efuraimu omu nsi y'ebibungo ey'Abaamaleki.
Hakaba hariho omushaija wa Zoora, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daani, orikwetwa Manoa; omukazi we akaba ari engumba, ataine mwana weena.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaayeyoreka ogwo mukazi, yaamugira ati: Reeba mbwenu ori engumba, torikuzaara; kwonka noija kugira enda, ozaare omwana w'omwojo.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyerinde, otarinywa viinyo nari ekirikusinza, kandi otarirya ekintu kyona ekirikuzira;
ahabw'okuba reeba, noija kugira enda, ozaare omwana w'omwojo; kandi orumweiso tirurimuraba ha mutwe; ahakuba ogwo mwana aryaba

Bwanyima ogwo mukazi yaija, yaagambira iba ati: Omushaija wa Ruhanga yaanyijaho, enshusha ye yaaba eri nk'eya maraika wa Ruhanga orikutiinisa munonga; tinaamubuuza i yaaba naaruga, kandi tiyangambira iziina rye;

kwonka yaangira ati: Reeba noija kugira enda, ozaare omwana w'omwojo; kandi ati: otarinywa viinyo nari ekirikusinza, n'obu kwakuba okurya ekintu kyona ekirikuzira; ahabw'okuba ogwo mwana aryaba Omunaziiri ahari Ruhanga okuruga omu nda ya nyina okuhitsya aha izooba eri arifeeraho.
Bwanyima Manoa yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA, naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza oikirize ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga ou waatuma atugarukyeho, atushobororere oku turitwaza omwana orizaarwa.
Ruhanga yaahurira okushaba kwa Manoa; maraika ori owa Ruhanga yaagaruka ahari ogwo mukazi, yaashanga ashutami omu musiri; kwonka Manoa iba atariho.
Omukazi yairukisa obwira, yaagambira iba ati: Reeba omushaija onyizireho omu biro ebihingwire yaagaruka yaanyeyoreka.
Manoa yaimuka, yaakurata omukazi we, yaahika ahari ogwo mushaija, yaamubuuza ati: Niiwe mushaija ogambire n'omukazi wangye? Onu ati: Niinye.
Manoa yaagira ati: Mbwenu ebigambo byawe ku biriba byabaire kwo, aryaba omwana wa muringo ki, kandi aryakora murimo ki?
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira Manoa ati: Byona ebi ngambiire omukazi waawe, abyerinde.
Tarikwikirizibwa kurya ekintu kyona ekirikuruga omu muzaabibu, n'obu kwakuba okunywa viinyo nari ekirikusinza, nari okurya ekintu kyona ekirikuzira; byona ebi mmuragiire, ashemereire kubyorobera.

Maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira Manoa ati: N'obu orankyerereze, tindikwija kurya by'okurya byawe; kandi ku oraayende kugira ekitambo ky'okwotsya, oshemereire kukihongyera MUKAMA; ahakuba Manoa taramanyire ku yaabaire ari maraika wa MUKAMA.
Manoa yaabuuza maraika wa MUKAMA ati: Eiziina ryawe ori oha, ebigambo byawe ku biriba byabaire kwo, tubone kukuha ekitiinisa?
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Nombuuriza ki eiziina? Ka n'ery'okutangaaza!
Manoa nikwo kureeta omwana gw'embuzi n'empongano y'esaano, akabihongyera MUKAMA aha rukiri; maraika akakora eby'okutangaaza, Manoa n'omukazi we nibamureeba.

Endimi z'omuriro ku zaimukire ahaiguru niziruga aha itambiro, maraika wa MUKAMA yaatembera omuri ezo ndimi ezaaruga aha itambiro, Manoa n'omukazi we nibabireeba; ku baabireebire, baagwa ahansi bajuumaire.
Maraika wa MUKAMA tiyaagaruka kweyoreka obundi ahari Manoa n'omukazi we. Okuruga aho Manoa yaamanya ku abaire ari maraika wa MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Manoa yaagambira omukazi we ati: Buzimazima nitwija kufa, ahabw'okuba twareeba Ruhanga.

Kwonka omukazi we yaagira ati: Kuri noogira ngu MUKAMA abaire naayenda kutwita, takwakiire kitambo ky'okwotsya n'empongano y'esaano ebi twamuhongyera, kandi takutworekire ebyo byona, n'obu kwakuba okutugambira ebigambo ebyo byona omu bunaku obu.
Bwanyima ogwo mukazi yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Samusooni; omwana yaakura, kandi MUKAMA yaamuha omugisha.
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaatandika kumukoresa omuri Mahane-daani ahagati ya Zoora na Eshitaoli.
Yainamuka, yaagambira ishe na nyina ati: Ndeebire omwishiki muhara w'Abafilistia omuri Timuna; mbwenu niinyenda ngu mumunshwererere.

Ishe na nyina baamugira bati: Beitu shi omuri beene waitu nari omu ihanga ryaitu tiharimu omwishiki, iwe waaza kwenda kushwera omu Abafilistia abatashazirwe? Samusooni yaagarukamu ishe ati: Nyowe munshwererere, ahkuba nanshemeza munonga.
Kwonka ishe na nyina tibaramanyire ku yaabaire eri enaama ya MUKAMA, ahakuba akaba naasherura obwiho bw'okurwana n'Abafilistia. Omu bunaku obwo Abafilistia bakaba nibategyeka Abaisraeli.
Atyo Samusooni yaashuuma Timuna na ishe na nyina, yaahika omu misiri y'emizaabibu yaayo, yaateerateeraniramu n'ekitsigazi ky'entare, kyamutontomera;
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaamwijaho n'amaani, yaakitaagataagura nk'orikutaagataagura omwana gw'embuzi, haza ataine ki akwaitse; kwonka tiyaagambira ishe na nyina ki yaakora.
Samusooni yaashuuma, yaagaaniira n'ogwo mwishiki, yaamushemeza munonga.
Ku haahingwireho omwanya, yaagarukayo kumutwara; yaakiikama aha rubaju kureeba omutumbi gw'entare eri; ku yaahikireho, yaashanga gurimu omuzinga gw'enjoki n'obwoki.
Yaabubomboora n'engaro, yaagyenda naaburya, yaagaruka ahari ishe na nyina; nabo yaabahaho, baarya; kwonka tiyaabagambira ku yaabwiha omu mutumbi gw'entare.
Ishe yaashuuma ei ogwo mwishiki yaabaire ari; Samusooni yaateekyerayo obugyenyi, nk'oku omucwe gw'abatsigazi gwabaire guri.
Ku baamureebire, baamureetera bagyenzi baabo makumi ashatu kumwikaza.

Samusooni yaabagira ati: Ka mbahe ekishaakuzo; ku muraakiite ebiro mushanju by'obugyenyi bitakahweire, mwakimanya muti, nimbaha ebijwaro bya bafuta makumi ashatu, n'ebindi eby'ekitiinisa makumi ashatu.
Kwonka ku muraabe mutakiitsire, nimumpa ebijwaro bya bafuta makumi ashatu n'ebindi eby'ekitiinisa makumi ashatu. Baamugira bati: Kishaakuze, tukihurire.
Yaabagira ati:
Omuri rurya harugiremu eby'okurya,
Kandi omu w'amaani harugiremu obunuzi.
Baamara ebiro bishatu batakiitsire.
Aha kiro kya kana baagambira muka Samusooni bati: Beihabeiha baro atwitire ekyo kishaakuzo, tutakwotsya n'enju ya sho. Mutwetsire kutuhindura abooro? Tikwo kiri?

Muka Samusooni yaamuririra omumaisho, naagira ati: Biri onyanga, tonkunda. Ohaire ab'owaitu ekishaakuzo, haza tiwaakiinyitira. Onu ati: Ku ndaabe ntakigambiire tata na maawe, nimbaasa nta kukikugambira?
Yaamara ebyo biro by'obugyenyi byona naamuririra omumaisho; aha kiro kya mushanju yaakimugambira, ahabw'okuba akamutonga amagara; nawe yaakigambira beene waabo.
Aha kiro kya mushanju eizooba ritakarengire, abantu b'omuri orwo rurembo baamugira bati:
Ekirikukiza obwoki obunuzi niki?
Kandi ekirikukiza entare amaani n'enki?
Samusooni yaabagira ati:
Kuri mutahingiise nyana yangye,
Timwakwitsire kishaakuzo kyangye.
Kwonka muka Samusooni baamuhingira mugyenzi we, owaamugambiire obugyenyi.
Ishezaara yaamugira ati: Buzimazima nkateekateeka ngu okamwangira kimwe; n'ahabw'ekyo nkamuhingira mugyenzi waawe. Omurumuna tarikumuhita? Naakweshengyereza, ba niwe waatwara omu mwanya gwe.
Samusooni yaabagira ati: Mbwenu ku ndaabe naakozire Abafilistia kubi, tihaine orancwere orubanja.
Samusooni yaagyenda, yaakwata zaamuha magana ashatu, yaatwara enkanza z'omuriro, yaakomerana emikira ya zaamuha, yaagyenda naata enkanza emwe ahagati y'emikira ebiri.
Ku yaaherize kwatsya enkanza, yaazirekura, zaaza omu misiri y'engano y'Abafilistia, zaayotsya ebiba by'engano n'engano zitakatemire, kandi n'omu misiri y'emizeituuni.

Abafilistia baabuuza bati: Okozire eki n'oha? Baagarukamu bati: Ni Samusooni mukwe w'Omunyatimuna, ahakuba akamwaka omukazi we, yaamuha mugyenzi we. Abafilistia bainamuka, baayotsya ogwo mukazi na ishe, baafa.
Samusooni yaabagira ati: Nk'oku mukozire mutyo, buzimazima niinyija kubahoora enzigu; ku ndaaheze, ndekyere aho.
Yaabateera, yaabacoocoora, yaita baingi munonga; bwanyima yaashuuma, yaaguma omu nyanga y'orukiri rwa Etamu.
Abafilistia bainamuka, baateera orusiisira omu ishaza rya Yuda, baajanjaara omuri Leehi.
Abantu ba Yuda baababuuza bati: Ahabw'enki mwaija kuturwanisa? Baagarukamu bati: Twaija kuboha Samusooni kumugira nk'oku atugizire.

Abashaija ba Yuda enkumi ishatu nikwo kushuuma aha nyanga y'orukiri rwa Etamu, bakagira Samusooni bati: Torikumanya ku Abafilistia barikututegyeka? Mbwenu eki, otukozire ki? Samusooni yaabagarukamu ati: Nk'oku bangizire, naanye nikwo mbagizire.
Baamugira bati: Twizire kukuboha, tukuheyo omu mikono y'Abafilistia. Samusooni yaabagira ati: Nimundahire imwe ku muraabe mutarikwija kunkombeera.

Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha! Kwonka itwe nitwija kukuboha, tukuhamye, tukuheyo omu mikono yaabo; buzimazima titurikwija kukwita. Batyo baamubohesa emirunga ebiri misya, baamwiha ahari orwo rukiri, baamwinamura.

Ku yaahikire Leehi, Abafilistia baija kumubugana nibateera akaari; Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaamwijaho n'amaani, emirunga eyaabaire emuri aha mikono yaaba nka furakisi eyaayokibwa omuriro; ebyabaire bimubohire byamuruga aha mikono, byaragara.
Ku yaagiire kugira ati, yaagwa aha igufa ry'oruba rusya rw'endogoya, yaarukununkirira, yaarwitsa abantu rukumi.
Bwanyima yaagira ati:
N'oruba rw'endogoya, emirundo n'emirundo
N'oruba rw'endogoya nyitsire abantu rukumi.
Ku yaaherize kugamba, yaanaga orwo ruba; kandi omwanya ogwo gukaba nigwetwa Ramasi-Leehi.
Bwanyima yaagira eiriho ringi, yaatakira MUKAMA naagira ati: Otuhaire okujunwa oku okuhango, nootujunisa omukono gw'omwiru waawe; mbwenu nyitwe eiruho, ngwe omu mikono y'abatashazirwe?

Ruhanga yaayashamura enonko eyaabaire eri omuri Leehi, haarugamu amaizi; ku yaaherize kuganywa, omutima gwamugaruka omunda, yaagarukwamu amaani. Nikyo omwanya ogwo gwayeteirwe Eni-hakore, amakuru ngu, eiziba ry'owaatakire; kandi eryo iziba rikiri omuri Leehi n'okuhitsya hati.
Samusooni yaamara emyaka makumi abiri naacwera Abaisraeli emanja omu biro by'Abafilistia.
Samusooni yaaza Gaaza, yaareebayo maraaya, yaataaha omu nju ye.

Baakigambira aba Gaaza bati: Samusooni ari aha. Baayehinguririza omwanya ogu yaabaire arimu, baamara ekiro kyona bamugwereire aha irembo ry'orurembo; ekyo kiro baakimara bahunami, nibagira bati: Murekye busheeshe, tumwite.

Samusooni yaabyama okuhitsya omu itumbi; eitumbi ku ryahinzire, yaimuka, yaakwata enyigi z'eirembo ry'orurembo n'ebiti by'amarembo byombi, yaabikuurirana n'empimbi zaabyo, yaabita aha mabega, yaabitwara aha mutwe gw'ekibungo ekiri omu maisho ga Heburooni.
Bwanyima yaakunda omukazi ow'omu ruhita rwa Sooreki, owaabaire naayetwa Delila.

Abategyeki b'Abafilistia baija owe, baamugambira bati: Omubeihabeihe, omanye ei amaani ge maingi gakomooka, n'oku twakumubaasa, tukamuboha, tukamucwa eishaija; haza buri omwe omuriitwe naija kukuha ebicweka by'efeeza rukumi n'eigana.
Delila yaagira Samusooni ati: Nyaabura 'we, ngambira ei amaani gaawe maingi gakomooka, kandi n'eki baakukubohesa, kikakucwa eishaija.
Samusooni yaamugira ati: Ku baakumbohesa enshuri mbisi mushanju ezitakoomire, obwo nkaahwa amaani, mba nk'abandi bantu.
Abategyeki b'Abafilistia nikwo kumureetera eshuri mbisi mushanju ezitakoomire, akazimubohesa.

Kandi akaba aine abashaija abaabaire bagwereire omu kishengye ky'omunda. Yaamugira ati: Samusooni, waafa, Abafilistia baakwita! Samusooni yaacwa ezo nshuri, nk'akagoye k'obugoigo oku kacweka kaahikwaho omuriro. Obwo tibaamanya i amaani ge gakomooka.
Delila yaagira Samusooni ati: Reeba wanshungisa, tiwangambira mazima; mbwenu naakweshengyereza, ngambira eki baakukubohesa.
Yaamugira ati: Ku baakumbohesa emirunga misya etakagizire ki yaaboha, obwo nkaahwa amaani, mba nk'abandi bantu.

Delila nikwo kureeta emirunga misya, akagimubohesa, akamugira ati: Samusooni, waafa, Abafilistia baakwita. Kandi abashaija abaabaire bagwereiire bakaba bari omu kishengye ky'omunda. Egyo mirunga yaagicwa nk'ehuuzi, yaamuruga aha mikono.

Delila yaagira Samusooni ati: N'okuhitsya hati nookinshungisa, torikungambira mazima; ngambira eki baakukubohesa. Onu yaamugira ati: Ku waakutsiba obutsibo bw'eishokye ryangye mushanju, waaburukirana n'omwenda ogurikurukirwa aha biti, waabuhamisa orubambo, obwo nkaahwa amaani, mba nk'abandi bantu.
Atyo yaabuhamisa orubambo, yaamugira ati: Samusooni, waafa, Abafilistia baakwita! Yaasisiimuka, yaakuura orwo rubambo n'ebyo biti n'ogwo mwenda.
Ku yaamucondoorize munonga buri izooba, yaaguma naamujugutirira, Samusooni yaarugaho yaaremba;

nikwo kumugambira omubonano gwe gwona, akamugira ati: Orumweiso tirukandabaga ha mutwe, ahakuba okwiha obu naaruga omu nda ya maawe, ntuura ndi Omunaziiri ahari Ruhanga. Ku baakuumwa, obwo nkaahwamu amaani, mba otaine maani, nk'abandi bantu.

Deeila ku yaareebire yaamugambira omubonano gwe gwona, yaatuma kweta abategyeki b'Abafilistia naagira ati: Mwije obu bwonka, ahakuba yangambira omubonano gwe gwona. Ahonaaho abategyeki b'Abafilistia baija owe, baine empiiha omu ngaro zaabo.
Delila yaamugwejegyereza aha maju ge; yaayeta omushaija, yaamugambira kumumwa obutsibo bw'eishokye rye mushanju; yaatandika kumwita kubi, amaani gaamuhweramu kimwe.
Yaamugira ati: Samusooni, waafa, Abafilistia baakwita! Yaasisimuka, yaagira ati: Ka nshohore nyekunkumure nk'okwangye. Kwonka akaba atamanyire ku MUKAMA amurugireho.
Abafilistia baamukwata, baamwihamu amaisho, baamushuumya Gaaza, baamukomesa emihama y'emiringa; yaaguma naakora omurimo gw'okusa omu nju y'embohe.
Kwonka eishokye rye ryagaruka ryamera bwanyima y'okumumwa.
Abategyeki b'Abafilistia baateerana abantu okutambira Dagoni ruhanga waabo ekitambo kihango, n'okwesiima; ahakuba bakagira bati: Ruhanga waitu ahaireyo Samusooni omuzigu waitu omu mikono yaitu.
Abantu ku baamureebire, baasiima ruhanga waabo; ahakuba bakagira bati: Ruhanga waitu ahaireyo omu mikono yaitu omuzigu waitu obaire naahwerekyereza ensi yaitu, naatwitamu abantu baingi.
Bwanyima emitima yaabo ku yaashemerereirwe munonga, baagira bati: Mwete Samusooni, atuzaanire. Baayeta Samusooni kuruga omu nju y'embohe; yaabazaanira; baamuta ahagati y'enyomyo.
Samusooni yaagambira omwojo owaabaire amukwaitse omukono, ati: Ka nkorakoze, nkwate enyomyo ezi enju ehamiizeho, nzeegamire.

Obwo enju ekaba eijwire abashaija n'abakazi; n'abategyeki b'Abafilistia boona bakaba barimu; kandi n'aha mutwe gw'enju hakaba hariho abantu nk'enkumi ishatu, abashaija n'abakazi, abaabaire nibareeba Samusooni oku arikubazaanira.
Samusooni yaatakira MUKAMA ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga, ninkweshengyereza mpa amaani omurundi ogu gwonka, mpoore Abafilistia ahabw'amaisho gangye gombi.
Samusooni yaakwata ezo nyomyo ez'ahagati zombi, ezi enju yaabaire ehamiizeho; yaazeegamira, emwe yaagikwatsa omukono gwe gwa buryo, n'endiijo ogwa bumosho.

Samusooni yaagira ati: Ka ngwane n'Abafilistia. Yainama n'amaani ge goona; ahonaaho enju yaagwera abategyeki n'abantu boona abaabaire bagirimu. N'ahabw'ekyo abu yaitsire omu kufa kwe baakira abu yaitsire akihuriire.

Bwanyima beene waabo n'ab'enju ya ishe boona baashuuma, baamutwara, baamuziika omu kituuro kya Manoa ishe, ahagati ya Zoora na Eshitaoli; obwo akaba amazire emyaka makumi abiri naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.
Hakaba hariho omushaija omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, owaabaire naayetwa Miika.

Yaagira nyina ati: Ebicweka by'efeeza biri rukumi na igana, ebi baakwibire, bikakureetera kukyeena, nkuhuriire, reeba niinye mbiine. Niinye naabiibire. Nyina yaamugarukamu ati: Mwana wangye, MUKAMA akuhe omugisha.

Miika ku yaagaruriire nyina ebyo bicweka by'efeeza rukumi na igana, nyina yaagira ati: Ebi bicweka by'efeeza ebindi omu ngaro, naabishoroorera MUKAMA, ngu omwana wangye abiheeshemu ekishushani ekisharwire; na mbwenu niinyija kubikugarurira.
Ku yaaherize kugarurira nyina ezo feeza, nyina yaatwaraho ebicweka magana abiri, yaabiha omuheesi, yaabiheeshamu ekishushani kisharwire; kyaguma omu nju ya Miika.
Kandi omushaija ogwo Miika akaba aine endaaro ya baaruhanga be, yaakora efodi na
Omu bunaku obwo hakaba hatariho mugabe omuri Israeli, kureka buri muntu akaba naayekorera nk'oku arikwenda.
Omushaija ogwo yaaruga omu rurembo rwa Betelehemu-yuda, yaaza kusherura ah'okutuura. Ku yaabaire naakigyenda, yaahika aha nju ya Miika omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu.
Miika yaamubuuza ati: Nooruga hi? Onu ati: Ndi Omuleevi owa Betelehemu-yuda, ninza kusherura ah'okutuura.
Miika yaamugira ati: Tuura naanye, ombeere omuzaire kandi omunyamurwa; naanye ngume nkuhe ebicweka by'efeeza ikumi buri mwaka, nkujwekye kandi nkugaburire. Atyo ogwo Muleevi yaataahamu.
Bwanyima yaasiima kuguma n'ogwo mushaija; ogwo mutsigazi yaamubeera nk'omwe aha batabani.
Miika yaashoroora ogwo Muleevi, yaaba omunyamurwa we, yaaguma omu nju ye.
Bwanyima Miika yaagira ati: Mbwenu nimmanya ngu MUKAMA naija kumpa omugisha, obu ngizire Omuleevi omunyamurwa wangye.

Abadaani baiha omu ruganda rwabo rwona abashaija bataano amamanzi, baabatuma okuruga Zoora na Eshitaoli kuza kutata ensi n'okugyetegyereza; baabagira bati: Nimwirooko mwetegyereze ensi. Baahika aha nju ya Miika omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, baaraarayo.
Ku baabaire bari haihi n'enju ya Miika, baamanya eiraka ry'ogwo mutsigazi Omuleevi, baakiikama, baamubuuza bati: Okureetsire aha n'oha? Aha nookoraho ki, kandi oineho murimo ki?
Onu ati: Oku nikwo Miika yantwarize, akandaganisa ebihembo kumukorera; naanye nkaba omunyamurwa we.
Baamugira bati: Twakweshengyereza, buuza Ruhanga, tumanye yaaba nitwija kugira omugisha omuri oru rugyendo rwaitu.
Omunyamurwa yaabagarukamu ati: Mugyende n'obusingye; MUKAMA naija kubarinda omu rugyendo rwanyu.

Abo bashaija bataano baagyenda, baahika Laishi, baareeba abantu abaabaire bariyo, beetuuriire n'obusingye, nk'oku omucwe gw'Abasidoni gwabaire guri, batuurize, bataine ki beetaireho; bakaba bari abatungi bataine ki bakyenire omu nsi; bari hare n'Abasidoni, bataine bandi boona abu barikukwatanisa nabo.
Ku baagarukire ahari beene waabo omuri Zoora na Eshitaoli, beene waabo baababuuza bati: Nigaahi?
Banu bati: Mwimukye tuze kubateera; ahakuba tureebire ensi, kandi ensi egyo ni nungi munonga. Mushutikirwe ki? Murekye kweziringa, muze omuri egyo nsi, mugikubuure.
Ku muraagyende, nimwija kushangayo abantu abeetuuriire n'obusingye, kandi n'ensi eri mpango; buzima Ruhanga agihaireyo omu mikono yaanyu; n'ensi etabuziremu kintu kyona eky'omu nsi.
Bwanyima abashaija magana mukaaga ab'omu ruganda rwa Daani, baaruga Zoora na Eshitaoli, bakwaitse eby'okurwanisa.
Bainamuka, baateera orusiisira Kiryasi-yearimu omuri Yuda; n'ahabw'ekyo omwanya ogwo baagweta Mahane-Daani n'okuhitsya hati; guri enyima ya Kiryasi-yearimu.
Baarugayo, baahika omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu aha nju ya Miika.

Ku baahikireyo, abo bashaija bataano abaabaire nibaza kutata ensi ya Laishi, baagira beene waabo bati: Nimumanya ku omuri aga maju harimu efodi na terafimu n'ekishushani kiheesire, kandi ekisharwire? N'ahabw'ekyo muteekateekye eki muraakore.
Baakiikama, baataaha omu nju y'ogwo mutsigazi Omuleevi omu ka ya Miika, baamubuuza oku araire;
kandi abo bashaija magana mukaaga ab'omu ruganda rwa Daani baayemerera aha irembo, bakwaitse eby'okurwanisa byabo;

bwanyima abo bashaija bataano abaagiire kutata ensi, baazayo, baataahamu, baihamu ekyo kishushani kiheesire kandi ekisharwire, na efodi na terafimu; omunyamurwa yaayemerera omu irembo hamwe n'abo bashaija magana mukaaga abakwaitse eby'okurwanisa.
Abashaija bari ku baataahire omu nju ya Miika, baihamu ekishushani kiheesire kandi ekisharwire, na efodi na terafimu, omunyamurwa yaababuuza ati: Nimukora ki?

Baamugarukamu bati: Hurikiza, igara akanwa; gyenda naitwe otubeere omuzaire kandi omunyamurwa. Ekirikukukirira oburungi n'okuba omunyamurwa w'eka y'omuntu omwe, nari okuba omunyamurwa w'oruganda n'omuryango omuri Israeli?
Omunyamurwa yaashemererwa munonga omu mutima, yaatwara efodi na terafimu n'ekyo kishushani kisharwire, yaagyenda n'abo bashaija bamushagatiire.
Batyo baakiikama, baagyenda beebembeize abaana n'amatungo n'ebintu.
Ku baabaire baagyendaho akaanya okuruga aha ka ya Miika, abantu abaabaire bari omu maju agari haihi n'eka ya Miika baayeteerana, baakurata Abadaani, baabahika haihi.
Baabeeta nibabakubukira. Abadaani baahinduka, baabuuza Miika bati: Obaire ota okutuhururira n'omutwe ogurikwingana gutyo?
Miika yaabagarukamu ati: Mwanyaga baaruhanga bangye abu naakozire, n'omunyamurwa wangye, mwayegyendera; kandi ekindi naatsigarana ki? Mbwenu nimumbuuriza ki ngu, Obaire ota?
Abadaani baamugira bati: Tutagaruka kukuhurira, abanyakiniga batakaakugwaho, bakakwita n'ab'omu ka yaawe.
Abadaani baayegyendera; Miika ku yaareebire bamukiza amaani, yaakuba yaagaruka owe.

Abo bantu baabura kijuna, ahabw'okuba orurembo rwabo rukaba ruri hare na Sidoni, kandi bakaba batarikukwatanisa n'abandi; kandi orurembo rwabo ruri omu ruhanga oruri haihi na Besirehobu. Bwanyima Abadaani baayombekayo orundi rurembo, baarutuuramu.
Orwo rurembo baarweta Daani, nibarweterera ishenkurubo Daani, owaazairwe Israeli; kwonka eiziina ry'orwo rurembo ery'okubanza rikaba riri Laishi.
Abadaani baayeteeraho ekyo kishushani; kandi Yonasaani mwene Gereshoni, mutabani wa Musa, we n'abatabani baaguma bari abanyamurwa b'oruganda rwa Daani okuhitsya aha izooba eri ensi yaanyagiirweho.
Batyo baataho ekyo kishushani kisharwire, eki Miika yaakozire, kyagumaho ebiro byona ebi enju ya Ruhanga yaamazire omuri Shiilo.
Omukazi we yaamugwerwa kubi, yaayangana, yaagaruka owa ishe omuri Betelehemu-yuda, yaamarayo ameezi ana.

Bwanyima iba yaimuka, yaamukurata yaaza kumweshengyereza kumugarura, yaagyenda n'omugaragwa we n'endogoya ibiri; omukazi yaamutaasya omu ka ya ishe; ishezaara ku yaamureebire, yaija kumubugana ashemereirwe.
Ishezaara, ishe w'ogwo mwishiki, yaamwosesa, yaamara nawe ebiro bishatu; baarya, baanywa, baaguma aho.
