Aha kiro kya kana baimuka omu kasheeshe kare, ogwo Muleevi yaimuka kurugayo; ishe w'omwishiki yaagambira omukwe ati: Banza orye akagaati, ogarukwemu amaani, bwanyima obone kugyenda.
Batyo baashutama bombi hamwe, baarya, baanywa; bwanyima ishe w'omwishiki yaagambira omukwe ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ikiriza ogarukye oraare, omutima gwawe gushemererwe.
Ogwo mushaija ku yaimukire kugyenda, ishezaara yaamweshengyereza, okuhitsya obu yaagarukire akaraarayo.
Aha izooba rya kataano yaimuka omu kasheeshe kare kugyenda; ishe w'omwishiki yaagira ati: Huumuza omutima, ninkweshengyereza, osiibe aha okuhitsya omu mwabazyo. Batyo baarya hamwe.

Omushaija ku yaimukire kugyenda, we n'omukazi we n'omugaragwa we, ishezaara, ishe w'ogwo mwishiki, yaamugira ati: Reeba, eizooba ryahendekire, nimbeeshengyereza mugarukye muraare; reeba, bwaizire, raara, omutima gwawe gushemererwe; nyencakare mugurukye kare, mutaahe.
Kwonka omushaija tiyaikiriza kuraara, yaimuka, yaagyenda, yaahika ahashungaine na Yebusi, niyo Yerusalemu; obwo aine endogoya ibiri eziriho amatandiiko, kandi aine n'omukazi we.
Ku baahikire haihi na Yebusi, bwashangwa buri haihi kwira; omugaragwa yaagira mukama we ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ija tukiikame, turaare omuri oru rurembo rw'Abayebusi.
Mukama we yaamugira ati: Titurikwija kukiikama omu rurembo rw'abanyamahanga, orutari rw'Abaisraeli, kureka twambukye tuhikye Gibea.
Yaagaruka yaagambira omugaragwa we ati: Ija tuhikye haihi na Gibea nari Raama, turaare omu rurembo rumwe ahari ezo.
Batyo baayogaho, baagyenda; ku baahikire haihi na Gibea eya Benyamiini, eizooba ryarenga.
Baakiikamira aho, baaza Gibea kuraarayo. Ku yaahikireyo, yaashutama ahu emihanda y'omu rurembo erikuteeranira, ahakuba tiharabaireho owaikiriize kubaraaza.

Bwanyima omuri ogwo mwabazyo haija omugurusi naaruga omu musiri ei yaabaire naakora; omugurusi ogwo akaba ari ow'omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, owaabaire ashuhuukiire Gibea; kwonka ab'omuri orwo rurembo bakaba bari Ababenyamiini.
Ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba omugyenzi omu nguuto y'orwo rurembo. Ogwo mugurusi yaamubuuza ati: Nooruga hi, kandi nooza hi?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Nituruga Betelehemu-yuda, nituza enyima y'ensi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu; niyo naarugire, ninza Betelehemu-yuda; mbwenu ninza omu nju ya MUKAMA, ahakuba tihariho owaikiriza kundaaza.
Kwonka twine embuba n'eby'okurya by'endogoya zaitu; kandi twine omugaati na viinyo ahabwangye n'omuzaana waawe n'omutsigazi ou twine; titwine ki turikwetenga.
Omugurusi yaagira ati: Huumura! Niinyija kukukorera ebi orikwetenga byona; kwonka otaraara omu muhanda.
Atyo yaabataasya omu ka ye, yaaha endogoya z'ogwo mushaija eby'okurya, baanaaba ebigyere, baarya, baanywa.

Omushaija nyineeka yaashohora ahu baabaire bari, yaabagira ati: Beene waitu, murekye, naabeeshengyereza, mutakora ekibi ekirikwingana kityo; ogu mushaija yaataahire omu nju yangye, mutakora ekihagaro ekirikushusha kityo.
Reeba, hariho muhara wangye empangare, n'omukazi w'ogu mushaija; ka mbe nibo naashohoza hati, mubashiishe, mubagire nk'oku murikwenda; kwonka omushaija ogu mutamukoraho ekihagaro ekirikushusha kityo.

Abo bashaija baayanga kumuhurira; ogwo mushaija omugyenyi nikwo kukwata omukazi we w'ekinyanshunju, akamushohoza ahu bari, bakamumanya, bakamushiisha ekiro kyona okuhitsya omu kasheeshe; ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana, baamurekura.
Omukazi yaija nibusheesha, yaagwa aha rwigi rw'enju y'ogwo mushaija, omu mukama we yaabaire ari, okuhitsya obu bwaseesire.
Mukama we ku yaimukire omu kasheeshe, yaigura enyigi z'enju, naashohora kugyenda, yaashanga ogwo mukazi we w'ekinyanshunju agwire ahansi, engaro ze ziri omu kisasi.
Yaamugira ati: Imuka tugyende. Akateezo kaabura; bwanyima omushaija yaamuta aha ndogoya, yaimuka, yaaza owaabo.
Ku yaataahire omu nju ye, yaihayo omusyo, yaakwata omutumbi gw'omukazi we, yaagutemaatemera omu ngingo, yaagucwamu ebicweka ikumi na bibiri, yaabyohereza omu mashaza goona aga Israeli.

Abaakireebire boona baagira bati: Ekintu nk'eki tikikakorwaga, kandi tikikareebwaga, okwiha obu Abaisraeli baaruga omu nsi ya Misri n'okuhitsya hati. Mukiteekateekyeho, mukihanuureho, kandi mukigambeho.
Abategyeki b'eihanga ryona ery'enganda za Israeli zoona, baayeyoreka omu mutwe gw'abantu ba Ruhanga, abashaija enkwata-rurara obusiriira buna abarikugyendesa ebigyere.
(Kandi Ababenyamiini bakaba bahuriire ku Abaisraeli bainamukire Mizipa.) Abaisraeli baabuuza bati: Tugambire, ekibi ekyo kikakorwa kita?
Ogwo Muleevi, iba w'omukazi owaitsirwe, yaagarukamu naagira ati: Nyowe nkaija Gibea eya Benyamiini n'omukazi wangye w'ekinyanshunju kuraarayo.
Abashaija ba Gibea bantaahirira, bankubira omu nju nyekiro; nyowe baayenda kuunyita, n'omukazi wangye baamuhamba n'amaani, yaafa.
Naakwata omukazi wangye, naamucwamu ebicweka, naabyohereza omu mashaza goona ag'obuhunguzi bwa Israeli; ahabw'okuba bakakora ekibi ky'obushambani, kandi ekihagaro omuri Israeli.
Imwe Abaisraeli mwena, mureebe, mukihanuureho, mugambire aha ekishemereire kukorwa.
Abantu boona baimuka nk'omuntu omwe, nibagira bati: Tihaine n'omwe omuriitwe oraaze omu ihema rye, nari oraagarukye omu ka ye.
Kureka hati oku nikwo turaagire Gibea; nitwija kugiteera, twaheza kuteera enteenyu.

Kandi nitwija kutoorana abashaija ikumi omu bantu igana, na igana omu bantu rukumi, na rukumi omu bantu kakumi, nitubaiha omu nganda zoona eza Israeli, b'okuza kureetera engabo entanda, ezo ngabo ku ziraahikye Gibea eya Benyamiini, zibone kubakora nk'ebihagaro byona ebi baakozire omuri Israeli oku biri.
Batyo Abaisraeli boona baateeranira hamwe, baine enaama emwe, kurwanisa orwo rurembo.
Mbwenu nu mutuhe abo bashaija ba Gibea abataine mugasho, tubaite, twihe ekibi omuri Israeli. Kwonka Ababenyamiini baayanga kuhurira Abaisraeli beene waabo.
Ababenyamiini baaruga omu ndembo zaabo, baateeranira Gibea kurwanisa Abaisraeli.
Eryo izooba baabara Ababenyamiini abaarugire omu ndembo zaabo, abashaija enkwata-rurara obukumi bubiri n'enkumi mukaaga, otabariiremu ab'omuri Gibea, abashaija b'entoore magana mushanju.
Omuri abo bantu boona hakaba harimu abashaija b'entoore magana mushanju abarikutwara emosho; buri muntu omuribo akaba abaasa kurekyeza enjungu y'eibaare, n'akashokye akateera, atahembye.
N'Abaisraeli abaabazirwe, otabariiremu Ababenyamiini, bakaba bari obusiriira buna enkwata-rurara; kandi abo boona bakaba bari abarwani.
Abaisraeli baimuka omu kasheeshe, baateera orusiisira kurwanisa Gibea;
baahurura kuteera Ababenyamiini, baatenga orugamba kurwanira nabo Gibea.
Ababenyamiini baashohora, baita Abaisraeli, baabaraza nk'ebiti, haafa abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri.
Kwonka Abaisraeli baayezirika, baagaruka baatenga orugamba omu mwanya ogu baarutengyeiremu okubanza.
Abaisraeli bainamuka, baaririra omu maisho ga MUKAMA okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, baabuuza MUKAMA bati: Tugarukye turwane n'Ababenyamiini beene waitu? MUKAMA yaagarukamu ati: Nimwirooko mubateere.
Batyo Abaisraeli bairirira Ababenyamiini kubarwanisa aha izooba rya kabiri.
Aha izooba eryo Ababenyamiini baaruga omuri Gibea, baabarwanisa, baagaruka baababingira kimwe, baabaitamu abantu kakumi n'enkumi munaana; kandi abo boona bakaba bari abashaija enkwata-rurara.

Bwanyima Abaisraeli boona, engabo zoona, bainamuka, baaza Beseeli, baashutama omu maisho ga MUKAMA, baarira; eryo izooba baayesiibyakwo okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; baahonga ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Abaisraeli baabuuza MUKAMA, (ahakuba omuri ebyo biro eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA niyo yaabaire eri;

na Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari, mutabani wa Arooni niwe yaabaire aheereza MUKAMA omu maisho gaayo) nibagira bati: Tugarukye turwane n'Ababenyamiini beene waitu, nari turereere? MUKAMA yaagarukamu ati: Nimwirooko; ahakuba nyencakare niinyija kubahayo omu mikono yaanyu.
Aha izooba rya kashatu Abaisraeli baahurura kuteera Ababenyamiini, baatenga orugamba kurwanira nabo Gibea, nk'oku babaire baarwaine nabo obundi.

Ababenyamiini baashohora kubarwanisa, baabeihwabeihwa, baaruga omu rurembo; baatandika kuteera Abaisraeli n'okubaita nk'oku babaire baakozire obundi; baabaitira omu muhanda ogurikuza Beseeli n'ogurikuza Geeba, n'omu bwerere; baabaitamu abantu nka makumi ashatu.
Ababenyamiini baagira bati: Twababinga nk'okubanza. Kwonka Abaisraeli baagira bati: Ka tuhungye, tubabeihabeihe, tubaihe omu rurembo tubahitsye omu mihanda.
Abaisraeli boona baimuka omu mwanya ogu babaire barimu, baatenga orugamba Baali-tamari; kandi abaabaire bagwereire baajumbutuka omu mwanya ogu babaire barimu Maaregeeba.
Omu Baisraeli boona haarugamu abashaija entoore kakumi, baateera Gibea; orugamba rwahama; kwonka aba Gibea bakaba batamanyire ku bari omu kabi.

MUKAMA yaasingura Ababenyamiini omu maisho g'Abaisraeli; eryo izooba Abaisraeli baacwekyereza omu Babenyamiini abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano na igana; kandi abo boona bakaba bari abashaija enkwata-rurara.
Ababenyamiini baareeba Abaisraeli ku baabingwa, ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli bakabahunga ahabw'okwesiga abagwereire abu bataire haihi na Gibea.
Abaabaire bagwereire baajumbutuka, baayetuura omuri Gibea, baacwekyereza orurembo rwona na rurara.
Kandi Abaisraeli boona bakaba baragaine akamanyiso n'abaabaire bagwereire, ngu ku baraacumbuutsye omwika mwingi nk'ekicu omu rurembo,
Abaisraeli bakubuukye, barwane. Obwo Ababenyamiini bakaba batandikire kubinga Abaisraeli n'okubaitamu abantu nka makumi ashatu; ahakuba bakagira bati: Buzimazima twababingira kimwe nk'okubanza.
Kwonka omwika ogurikushusha nk'enyomyo ku gwatandikire kucumbuuka omu rurembo, Ababenyamiini baareeba enyima, baashanga orurembo rwona nirucumbuuka omwika okuhika ahaiguru.
Abaisraeli baabahindukana, Ababenyamiini baashoberwa, ahakuba bakareeba akabi kaabahikaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo baateera Abaisraeli amabega, baahunga nibatoora omu ihamba; kwonka engabo z'Abaisraeli zaabakurata zibahambize, kandi ezaarugire omu ndembo zaabatanga omumaisho, zaabacwekyereza.
Batyo baatangatanga Ababenyamiini embaju zoona, baababinga, baabaribatiirira okuruga ahari Noha, okuhika ahashungaine na Geeba oburugwa-izooba.
Omu Babenyamiini haafamu abantu kakumi n'enkumi munaana, boona abaabaire bari amamanzi.

Abaatsigaireho baahinduka, baahungira omu ihamba okuhika aha rukiri rwa Rimona; bakiri omu muhanda Abaisraeli baabaitamu abantu enkumi itaano; baagumizamu bababingire okuhika Gidomu, baitirayo abandi enkumi ibiri.
N'ahabw'ekyo boona abaafiire omu Babenyamiini eryo izooba baahika obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano, abashaija enkwata-rurara kandi amamanzi.
Kwonka abashaija magana mukaaga baahinduka, baahungira omu ihamba, baahika aha rukiri rwa Rimona, baagumayo okumara ameezi ana.
Abaisraeli baagaruka baahindukana Ababenyamiini, baacwekyereza orurembo rwona na rurara, abantu n'amatungo n'ebi baashangiremu byona; kandi n'endembo zoona ezi baahikiremu baazootsya n'omuriro.
Kandi Abaisraeli bakaba barahiriire Mizipa bati: Tihariho muntu weena omuriitwe orihingira omu Babenyamiini muhara we.
Abantu baagaruka Beseeli, baaguma bashutami omu maisho ga Ruhanga okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, baarira nibaborooga munonga.
Baagira bati: Ai bambe MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, eki kibeereireho ki, oruganda rumwe hati okubura omuri Israeli?
Ku bwaseesire, abantu baimuka kare, baayombekayo eitambiro, baahonga ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.

Abaisraeli baabuuza bati: Omu nganda za Israeli otaizire mu iteeraniro ahari MUKAMA n'oha? Ahakuba bakaba barahiire endahiro ehamire aha muntu weena oriba ataizire Mizipa ahari MUKAMA, nibagira bati: Buzimazima aryaitwa.
Abaisraeli baayefuuza ahabw'Ababenyamiini beene waabo, nibagira bati: Eri izooba hariho oruganda orucwirwe omuri Israeli.
Mbwenu tugire tuta okusherurira abaahonokireho abakazi, ku turaabe twarahiire ngu tituribahingira bahara baitu?
ahabw'okuba ku baabazire abantu, baashanga omu bantu ba Yabeshi-gileadi hatariho n'omwe.

Eiteeraniro ryona ryatumayo abashaija amamanzi, abarikukira abandi boona, kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, baabaragiira bati: Mugyende mucwekyereze aba Yabeshi-gileadi na rurara, n'abakazi baabo n'abaana baabo.
Eki mube nikyo mwakora; mucwekyerereze kimwe abashaija boona na buri mukazi weena oraraire n'omushaija.
Omu ba Yabeshi-gileadi baashangayo abaishiki magana ana, abaabaire batakamanyaga bashaija; baabareeta omu rusiisira orwabaire ruri Shiilo omu nsi ya Kanaani.
Ababenyamiini baagaruka obwo; baabaha abo baishiki abu baakirize omu ba Yabeshi-gileadi; kwonka tibaabahika.
Abantu baagaruka baayefuuza ahabw'Ababenyamiini, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba areetsire ekyasha omuri Israeli.
Bwanyima abakuru b'eihanga baagira bati: Mbwenu tugire tuta okusherurira abatsigaireho abakazi, abakazi ku baraabe bahweireho omuri Benyamiini?
Baagira bati: Ababenyamiini abahonokire aha icumu bashemereire kugira ab'okubahungurira, harekye kugira oruganda orwahwaho muri Israeli.
Kwonka titurikubaasa kubahingira bahara baitu, ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli bakaba barahiire bati: Omuntu weena orihingira muhara we omu Babenyamiini akyenwe.

Baagaruka baagira bati: Nimumanya ku habaho obugyenyi bwa MUKAMA buri mwaka omuri Shiilo, eri aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa Beseeli aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba bw'omuhanda ogurikuruga Beseeli nigwinamuka Shekemu, kandi aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bwa Lebona.
Baaragiira Ababenyamiini bati: Mwirooko muze omu misiri y'emizaabibu,

mugume mugwereire; abaishiki ba Shiilo ku baraabe nibaza kuzina, mugurukye omu misiri y'emizaabibu, buri muntu ayekwatire omukazi omuri abo baishiki ba Shiilo; bwanyima mugarukye omu nsi ya Benyamiini.

Baishebo nari banyaanyabo ku baraije kututonganaho, nitwija kubagira tuti: Mubatuhe ahabw'embabazi, ahabw'okuba buri muntu tituramunyagiire mukazi omu rugamba; kandi naimwe timurababahaire; kuri niimwe mwababahaire, mukaagizire orubanja.

Ababenyamiini baakora batyo; baayekwatira abakazi omuri abo abaabaire nibaza kuzina, nk'oku abashaija baabaire nibaingana, baabatwara; bwanyima baagyenda, baagaruka omu buhunguzi bwabo, baayombeka endembo ezaabaire zisheenyirwe, baazituuramu.
Kandi Abaisraeli baarugayo omu bunaku obwo, buri muntu yaagaruka omu ruganda rwe n'omuri beene waabo. Okuruga aho buri muntu yaaza omu buhunguzi bwe.
Omu bunaku obwo hakaba hatariho mugabe omuri Israeli; kureka buri muntu akaba naayekorera nk'oku arikwenda.

Ogwo mushaija akaba naayetwa Elimeleki, n'omukazi we naayetwa Naomi, n'amaziina g'abatabani gakaba gari Mahalooni na Kilioni; bakaba bari aba Efuraata, aba Betelehemu-Yuda. Ku baahikire omu nsi ya Moabu, baatuurayo.
Bwanyima Elimeleki iba wa Naomi yaafa; Naomi yaatsigara n'abatabani bombi.
Baashwera Abamoabukazi, omwe akaba naayetwa Orupa, n'ondi Ruusi; baamarayo emyaka nka ikumi.
Bwanyima Mahalooni na Kilioni bombi baafa; Naomi ogwo yaafeerwa iba n'abatabani bombi.
Yaaruga ahu yaabaire ari hamwe n'abakaamwana bombi, baakwata omuhanda kugaruka omu nsi ya Yuda.
Naomi yaagira abakaamwana ati: Mwirooko, buri omwe agarukye omu nju ya nyina. MUKAMA abakorere eby'embabazi, nk'oku mwabinkoreire na baanyakufa.
MUKAMA abahe obuhuumure, buri omwe omu ka ya iba. Yaabanywegyera, baimutsya amaraka, baarira.
Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha, kureka nitwija kugarukayo naiwe omu bantu b'owaanyu.
Naomi yaabagira ati: Baana bangye, mugarukyeyo; nimwendera ki kugyenda naanye? Nimugira ngu nkiine abandi baana omunda, ngu nyentsya babe abashaija baanyu?
Baana bangye, mwegyendere, mugarukyeyo, ahakuba nkuzire, tinkiri w'okushwerwa. Nangwa n'obu naakugira nti, nyine amatsiko, nari n'obu naakushwerwa omushaija eki kiro, naazaara abaana b'aboojo,
ebyo mukaabategyereza, okuhitsya ahu barikurira? Haza ekyo kibazibira kushwerwa? Ngaaha, baana bangye; ninshaasha munonga ahabwanyu, ahakuba MUKAMA abangire omukono gwe kundwanisa.
Baagaruka baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baarira. Orupa yaanywegyera nyinazaara, kwonka Ruusi we yaamubaho akaramata.

Ruusi yaamugarukamu ati: Reka kuunyeshengyereza kukutsigaho, n'obu kwakuba okugarukayo, ngu ndekye kukukuratira; ahakuba ahu oriza hoona, naanye niho ndiza; ahu oriraara, naanye niho ndiraara; abantu baawe nibo bariba abantu bangye, kandi Ruhanga waawe niwe ariba Ruhanga wangye.
Ahu origwa, naanye niho ndigwa, kandi niho ndiziikwa. Ku harigira ekyantaanisa naiwe, kitari rufu, MUKAMA akinture n'okukiraho.
Naomi ku yaareebire amaririire kimwe kugyenda nawe, yaarekyera aho kumugambira.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Murekye kuunyeta
Nkaruga kunu nyijwire, mbwenu MUKAMA yangarura ntaine kantu. Nimuunyetera ki Naomi, haza nimureeba oku MUKAMA ambonaboneise, kandi Ow'obushoboorozi bwona oku angwisiize akagwe.
Okwo nikwo Naomi yaagarukire na Ruusi Omumoabukazi omukaamwana, nibaruga omu nsi ya Moabu. Baahika Betelehemu omu itogyera rya sayiri.
Ruusi Omumoabukazi yaagira Naomi ati: Ka nze omu misiri, mpumbe engano ninkuratira orangirire embabazi. Yaamugira ati: Irooko, mwana wangye.
Yaagyenda, yaahika omu misiri, yaahumba akuratiire abarikugyesha; yaahika aha kicweka ky'emisiri ekyabaire kiri ekya Boazi, ow'omuryango gwa Elimeleki, kwonka atakimanyire.
Kandi reeba, Boazi yaija naaruga Betelehemu, yaaramutsya abagyesi ati: MUKAMA agume naimwe. Nabo baamugarukamu bati: MUKAMA akuhe omugisha.
Bwanyima Boazi yaabuuza omunyampara w'abagyesi ati: Omwishiki ogu n'ow'oha?
Omunyampara ogwo yaagarukamu ati: N'omwishiki w'Omumoabu owaagarukire na Naomi okuruga omu nsi ya Moabu.

Ku yaija, yangira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, nyikiriza mpumbe ninshanguruza nkuratiire abagyesi ahagati y'ebiba. Atyo yaija, yaiha omu kasheeshe naahumba n'okuhitsya hati, kureka akaanya kakye, aku yaahuumuraho omu nju.
Bwanyima Boazi yaagira Ruusi ati: Hurira, mwana wangye! Otaza kuhumba omu gundi musiri, kandi otaruga omuri ogu, kureka ogume haihi n'abazaana bangye.

Ogume otaire amaisho aha musiri ogu barikugyesha, kandi obakuratire. Tiwaahurira ku naayehanangiriza abatsigazi, ngu hatagira owaakukoraho? Kandi ku oraagire eiriho, oze aha nyungu, onywe aha maizi agu abatsigazi baataha.
Ruusi yaajuumara ahansi, yaamugira ati: N'enki ekyakureetera kungirira embabazi n'okuunyetaho, haza ndi omunyaihanga?
Boazi yaamugarukamu ati: Banshobororeire gye byona ebi waakoreire nyokozaara okwiha obu baro yaafa, kandi n'oku waatsigireho sho na nyoko n'ensi yaanyu, okaija omu bantu abu waabaire otakamanyaga.
MUKAMA akuzimuurire ahabw'ebi waakozire; MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli; ou waahungiire omu mapapa ge, akuhe ebihembo byawe byona bitacwirweho.
Ruusi yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, wangirira embabazi nyingi, ahabw'okuba wampuumuriza, kandi waagamba gye n'omuzaana waawe, n'obu ndaabe ntari nk'omwe aha bazaana baawe.

Obunaku bw'okurya ku bwahikire, Boazi yaamugira ati: Ija aha, orye eby'okurya, okoze ekitongye kyawe omuri viinyo. Ruusi yaashutama aha rubaju rw'abagyesi; baamuha sayiri ekarangire, yaarya, yaahaaga, yaagitsigaho.
Kandi ku yaimukire kugaruka kuhumba, Boazi yaaragiira abatsigazi be ati: Mumurekye ahumbe n'omu biba, mutamujuma.
Kandi mumwihire ezindi omu biba, muzitsigye aho, azihumbe, mutamugambaho.
Atyo yaahumba omuri ogwo musiri okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; bwanyima yaahuura ebi yaahumba, haarugamu
Yaagyekorera, yaaza omu rurembo, nyinazaara yaareeba ei yaahumba; Ruusi yaiha omu kikondooro ebi yaatsigaza yaaheza kurya, yaabimuha.

Nyinazaara yaamubuuza ati: Waahumba hi eri izooba? Kandi waakora hi? Owaakwetaho aheebwe omugisha. Yaagambira nyinazaara mukama w'omusiri ogu yaakoramu, yaamugira ati: Mukama w'omusiri ogu naakoramu eri izooba naayetwa Boazi.

Naomi yaagira omukaamwana ati: Ogwo mushaija aheebwe omugisha ahari MUKAMA, otarekire kugirira mbabazi abakiriho na baanyakufa. Naomi yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Ogwo mushaija ni mwene waitu ow'obuzaare bwa haihi, omwe ah'abashemereire kutucungura.
Ruusi Omumoabukazi yaamugira ati: N'ekya buzima yangira ati: Ogume haihi n'abairu bangye, okuhitsya obu baraaheze kugyesha emisiri yangye yoona.
Naomi yaagira Ruusi omukaamwana ati: Mwana wangye, ni kirungi ogume ogyende n'abazaana be, barekye kukushanga omu gundi musiri.
Okuruga obwo yaaguma haihi n'abazaana ba Boazi, naahumba okuhitsya aha muheru gw'eishaaruura rya sayiri n'engano; kandi yaaguma na nyinazaara.
Boazi, ou obaire ori hamwe n'abazaana be, titwine nawe obuzaare? Reeba, eki kiro naaheheeza sayiri aha mbuga y'okuhuuriraho.
N'ahabw'ekyo yoga, oyesiigye, ojware gye, oshuume aha mbuga y'okuhuuriraho; kwonka orekye kumwegambira, atakaherize kurya n'okunywa.
Kandi ku araabyame, oyetegyereze ahu yaabyama, ogyende omushwekuure ebigyere, obyame; bwanyima naija kukugambira eki oraakore.
Ruusi yaamugarukamu ati: Ebi waagamba byona naaza kubikora.
Yaashuuma yaaza aha mbuga, yaakora nk'oku nyinazaara yaamuragiira.
Boazi ku yaaherize kurya n'okunywa, omutima gwe gwashemererwa, yaagyenda yaabyama aha rubaju rw'ekirundo ky'engano; Ruusi yaija naashooba, yaashwekuura ebigyere bye, yaabyama.
Omu itumbi ogwo mushaija yaayekanga, yaahinduka, yaashanga omukazi abyami aha bigyere bye.
Yaamubuuza ati: Ori oha, iwe? Onu yaagarukamu ati: Ndi omuzaana waawe Ruusi; shweka omuzaana waawe ekijwaro kyawe; ahakuba niiwe waitu ow'okutucungura.
Boazi yaagira ati: Mwana wangye, MUKAMA akuhe omugisha! Ebirungi ebi waayoreka hati nibikira ebi waayorekire ira, ahabw'okuba tosherwire batsigazi, yaaba booro nari abatungi.
Mbwenu mwana wangye, otatiina. Niinyija kukukorera ebi waagamba byona; ahabw'okuba bagyenzi bangye boona ab'omuri oru rurembo nibamanya ku ori omukazi w'omutima.
N'ekya buzima kwo ndi oshemereire kubacungura; kwonka hariho ondiijo orikunkira kuba haihi.

Raara aha eki kiro; omu kasheeshe ku araikirize kukukorera ebi omunyabuzaare akora, ni kirungi; abikore; kwonka ku araayangye kubikukorera, nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, niinyija kukukorera ebi omucunguzi w'obuzaare bwa haihi ashemereire kukora; mbwenu byama busheeshe.
Kandi yaamugira ati: Reeta ogwo munagiro gu ojwaire, ogutegye. Onu yaagumutega; yaamushukiraho encuro mukaaga za sayiri, yaazimukorera; Ruusi yaataaha omu rurembo.
Ku yaahikire owa nyinazaara, nyinazaara yaamubuuza ati: Bigyenzire bita, mwana wangye? Ruusi yaamugambira ebi ogwo mushaija amukoreire byona.
Kandi ati: Ezi ncuro mukaaga za sayiri niwe yaazimpa; ahakuba yangira ati: Otagaruka ahari nyokozaara engaro nsha.
Naomi yaamugira ati: Yeshutamire, mwana wangye, okuhitsya ahu oraamanyire oku biraabe; ahabw'okuba ogwo mushaija tarikwija kuhuumura atakabiherize.
Boazi yaareeta abashaija ikumi aha bakuru b'orwo rurembo, yaabagira ati: Mushutame aha! Baashutama.
Yaagambira ogwo ow'obuzaare bwa haihi ati: Naomi ogarukire naaruga omu nsi ya Moabu, naatunda ekibanja ekyabaire kiri ekya mwene waitu Elimeleki;

mbwenu nteekateekire kukikugambira, nti: Okigurire omu maisho g'aba abari aha n'omu maisho g'abakuru b'oruganda rwaitu. Ku oraabe nooyenda kukicungura, okucungure; nari ku oraabe otarikwenda, nabwo ongambire, nkimanye; ahabw'okuba tihariho ondiijo ow'okukicungura kureka iwe, naanye orikukukurata. Onu yaagira ati: Niinyija kukicungura.
Bwanyima Boazi yaagira ati: Eizooba eri oraagurireho ekyo kibanja na Naomi, omanye ku oshemereire kukigura n'ahari Ruusi Omumoabukazi, muka nyakufa, okugaruraho eiziina rya nyakufa omu buhunguzi bwe.
Ogwo munyabuzaare bwa haihi yaagarukamu ati: Nyowe tindikubaasa kukicungura, ntakaashisha obuhunguzi bwangye. Okicungure omu mwanya gwangye, ahakuba tindikubaasa kukicungura.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo munyabuzaare bwa haihi, ku yaagambiire Boazi ati: Okicungure, yaajuura enkaito ye.
Bwanyima Boazi yaagambira abakuru n'abantu boona ati: Eri izooba muri baakareebi b'okuhamya ku naagura na Naomi byona ebyabaire biri ebya Elimeleki n'ebya Kilioni byona n'ebya Mahalooni byona.

Kandi Ruusi Omumoabukazi owaabaire ari muka Mahalooni, nawe naamugura kuba omukazi wangye, mbone kugaruraho eiziina rya nyakufa omu buhunguzi bwe, eiziina rya nyakufa rirekye kweba omuri beene waabo n'omu irembo ry'eka ye. Muri baakareebi eri izooba.

Abantu boona abaabaire bari omu irembo n'abakuru baagira bati: Turi baakareebi. Ogu mukazi owaaza omu nju yaawe MUKAMA amugire nka Rakeeli na Lea oku baakwataniise bombi kwimutsya enju ya Israeli; naiwe okore ebishemeire omuri Efuraata, kandi orangaanwe omuri Betelehemu,
kandi enju yaawe ebe nk'eya Pereezi, ou Tamari yaazaariire Yuda, ahabw'abaana abu MUKAMA arikuha omuri ogwo mukazi muto.
Atyo Boazi yaatwara Ruusi, yaaba omukazi we; yaamuta aha mukono, MUKAMA yaamuha enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo.
Abakazi baagira Naomi bati: MUKAMA asiimwe ahabw'okutakureka otaine w'obuzaare bwa haihi; kandi eiziina rye rirangaanwe omuri Israeli.
Aryaba ow'okukugaruramu amagara, kandi ow'okukuriisa omu bukaikuru bwawe; ahabw'okuba mukaamwana waawe, orikukukunda, kandi orikukukirira abaana b'aboojo mushanju, niwe amuzaire.
Naomi yaakwata omwana, yaamukiikira, yaaba omurezi we.
Kandi abakazi bataahi be baamweta eiziina, nibagira bati: Omwana w'omwojo azaariirwe Naomi. Baamweta Obedi; niwe ishe wa Yese, ishe wa Daudi.
Kandi oru nirwo ruzaaro rwa Pereezi; Pereezi akazaara Hezirooni,
Hezirooni yaazaara Raamu; Raamu yaazaara Aminadabu;
Aminadabu yaazaara Nahashooni; Nahashooni yaazaara Salumooni;
Salumooni yaazaara Boazi; Boazi yaazaara Obedi;
Obedi yaazaara Yese, na Yese yaazaara Daudi.
Akaba aine abakazi babiri, omwe naayetwa Hanna, n'ondiijo Penina; Penina akaba naazaara, kwonka Hanna ari engumba.
Aha izooba eri Elukaana yaabaire atambiraho ebitambo, akaba agira emigabo, agiha Penina omukazi we n'abaana be b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki,
kwonka Hanna amuha emigabo ebiri, ahabw'okuba akaba naamukunda, n'obu MUKAMA yaabaire amwimire oruzaaro.
Kandi muka iba akaba amuteerera enaku, ngu amugwise kubi, ahakuba MUKAMA akaba amwimire oruzaaro.
Okwo nikwo byabaire biba buri mwaka; Hanna ku yaabaire aza omu nju ya MUKAMA, muka iba amuteerera enaku. Ekyo kimuriza, ayanga n'okurya.
Kandi Elukaana iba akaba amubuuza ati: Beitu shi, Hanna, orizibwa ki? N'enki ekikuzibira kurya? Ahabw'enki omutima gwawe gutuura n'amaganya? Tindikukukirira abaana b'aboojo ikumi?
Eizooba rimwe ku baaherize kurya n'okunywa, Hanna yaimuka ahu baabaire bari omuri Shiilo. Obwo Eli omunyamurwa akaba ashutami aha kitebe kye aha kiti ky'omuryango gwa hekalu ya MUKAMA.
Hanna yaatandika kushaba MUKAMA, aine obusaasi bwingi omu mutima, naarira munonga;

yaaragaanisa naahiga omu maisho ga MUKAMA, naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA ow'amahe, ku oraareebe okubonabona kw'omuzaana waawe, waanyijuka, otaanyebwa, wampa omwana w'omwojo, ndyamukuhongyera, abe owaawe ebiro byona ebi arimara omu nsi, kandi orumweiso tirurimuraba ha mutwe.
Ku yaagumiizemu naashaba atyo omu maisho ga MUKAMA, Eli yaaguma naamureeba aha minwa.
Kwonka Hanna we akaba naashabira aha mutima, eminwa ye neimuka, eiraka rye ritarikuhurirwa; nikyo Eli yaateekateekyeire ngu asinzire.
Eli nikwo kumubuuza ati: Oryahitsya hi n'esindo? Ku ocwa viinyo?

Hanna yaamugarukamu ati: Tikwo kiri, Mukama wangye; ndi omukazi oine omutima gw'obusaasi; tiinyweire viinyo nari ekirikusinza kyona, kureka ninshuka amaganya g'omu mutima gwangye omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Otateekateeka ngu omuzaana waawe n'ekifa-mutima; ahakuba ebi naaba ningamba n'okuhitsya hati, mbireeteirwe amaganya maingi n'okugwisibwa kubi.
Eli yaamugira ati: Yegyendere n'obusingye; MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli akuhe eki waamushaba.
Onu yaagira ati: Omuzaana waawe agirirwe embabazi omu maisho gaawe. Atyo ogwo mukazi yaayegyendera yaarya, tiyaagaruka kureebwa aine enaku.
Obunaku ku bwahikire, Hanna yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Samueli; ahakuba akagira ati: Nkamushaba MUKAMA.
Bwanyima omushaija ogwo Elukaana yainamuka n'eka ye yoona kutambira MUKAMA ekitambo kya buri mwaka, kandi n'okuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise;
kwonka Hanna tiyainamukayo; ahakuba akagira iba ati: Tindizayo, okuhitsya obu omwana aricuuka, nkabona kumutwara, nkamumurikira MUKAMA, akagumayo ebiro byona.

Iba Elukaana yaamugira ati: Kora eki orikusiima; otegyereze okuhitsya obu orimucuutsya; kwonka MUKAMA ahamye ekigambo kye. Atyo ogwo mukazi yaaguma aho naayontsya omwana we, okuhitsya obu yaamucuukize.
Ku yaaherize kumucuutsya, yaamwinamura n'enimi ishatu, na eefa emwe y'esaano y'obunono, n'efureebe ya viinyo; yaamutwara Shiilo omu nju ya MUKAMA; kandi ogwo mwana akaba akiri muto.
Batyo baita enimi, baareetera Eli omwana.
Ogwo mukazi yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, buzimazima nk'oku okiriho, niinye mukazi ori, owaabaire ayemereire aha omu maisho gaawe naashaba MUKAMA.
Omwana ogu nkamushaba MUKAMA; kandi agarukiremu okushaba kwangye;
nikyo naamuhongyerera MUKAMA; ebiro byona ebi arimara omu nsi, aryaguma ahongyeirwe MUKAMA. Baaramizayo MUKAMA.
Omutima gwangye nigwesiimira omuri MUKAMA;
Eihembe ryangye ritunguuriirwe omuri MUKAMA;
N'akanwa kangye nikashekyerera abazigu bangye,
Ahakuba ninshemerererwa okujuna kwawe.
Tihariho ondiijo kureka Iwe wenka;
Kandi tihariho Rukiri ori nka Ruhanga waitu.
N'eby'amaryo birekye kuruga omu kanwa kaanyu;
Ahakuba MUKAMA ni Ruhanga orikumanya byona;
Kandi niwe arenga ebi abantu bakora.
Amata g'amamanzi gahendekire;
Kwonka abarikutsibaaza beezirikire amaani.
N'abaabaire baine enjara, tibakigiine.
Eego, engumba ezaire mushanju,
N'ow'abaana baingi atentebukire.
Ashuumya okuzimu, kandi aihayo.
Agarura ahansi, kandi atunguura.
Aiha abakyene omu rubungo,
Kubashutamya n'abanyiginya,
Kandi n'okuhungura ekitebe ky'ekitiinisa;
Ahakuba enyomyo z'ensi n'eza MUKAMA,
Kandi nizo yaagihangiriize.
Kwonka ababi baryahwerekyererera omu mwirima;
Ahakuba tihariho muntu orisinguza amaani ge.
Abahindireho naayema omu iguru.
MUKAMA aryacwera emperu z'ensi orubanja.
Aryaheereza omugabe we amaani,
Atunguure eihembe ry'ou yaashukireho amajuta.
Bwanyima Elukaana yaagaruka omu ka ye Raama; kandi omwana yaaguma naaheereza MUKAMA omu maisho ga Eli omunyamurwa.

Ogu nigwo gwabaire guri omucwe gw'abo banyamurwa omu mitwarize yaabo n'abantu. Omuntu weena ku yaabaire atamba ekitambo, omuheereza w'omunyamurwa aija bakiteekire enyama, aine orwoma rw'amaino ashatu omu ngaro;

arucumita omu safuriya, nari omu binika, nari omu nyungu, nari omu rwabya; ekintu kyona eki orwoma rwabaire rujaburamu, nikyo omunyamurwa yaabaire atwara. Okwo nikwo baabaire batwaza Abaisraeli boona abaabaire baza Shiilo.
Kandi ebishaju ku byabaire biba bitakookiibwe, omuheereza w'omunyamurwa akaba aija, agira orikutamba ati: Mpa enyama y'okwokyeza omunyamurwa; ahabw'okuba tarikwenda eteekire, kureka embisi.
Kandi ogwo muntu akimugarukamu ati: Ka babanze bootsye ebishaju, obone kutwara ei orikwenda yoona, onu amugarukamu ati: Ngaaha! gimpe hati; kandi ku oraayangye, ningitwaza amaani.
Okwo nikwo ekibi ky'abo batsigazi kyabaire kihango omu maisho ga MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba bikareetera abantu kutambira MUKAMA ebitambo babitamirwe.
Kandi nyina akaba amubaziirira akakooti, akamutwarira buri mwaka, nainamuka na iba kutamba ekitambo kya buri mwaka.
Kandi Eli akaba ashabira Elukaana n'omukazi we omugisha naagira ati: MUKAMA akuhe oruzaaro omuri ogu mukazi omu mwanya gw'ogu ou yaahongyeire MUKAMA. Batyo bagaruka owaabo.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaataayaayira Hanna, yaagira enda, yaazaara abaana b'aboojo bashatu n'abaishiki babiri. Omwana ogwo Samueli yaakurira omu maisho ga MUKAMA.

Omu bunaku obwo Eli akaba ahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru; yaaguma naahurira byona ebi abatabani baabaire nibakora omu Baisraeli boona, kandi n'oku barikushambana n'abakazi abaabaire baheereza aha muryango gw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.
Yaababuuza ati: N'enki ekirikubakoresa ebirikushusha bityo? Ahakuba nimpurira omu bantu boona eby'emicwe yaanyu emibi.
Ngaaha, baana bangye! Ebi ndikuhurira abantu nibabagambaho ti birungi; nimusiisisa abantu ba MUKAMA.

Omuntu ku arikushiisha ahari mugyenzi we, Ruhanga naamucwera orubanja; mbwenu omuntu ku arikushiisha ahari Ruhanga, n'oha orikubaasa kumweshengyerereza? Kwonka baayanga kuhurira ishebo, ahakuba MUKAMA akaba naayenda kubaita.

Niwe naatooraine omu nganda zoona eza Israeli kuba omunyamurwa wangye, okuza aha itambiro ryangye, okwotera obubaane, n'okujwara efodi omu maisho gangye. Kandi nkaha oruganda rwa sho empongano z'Abaisraeli zoona ez'ebitambo by'okwotsya omu muriro.

Mbwenu ahabw'enki nimureebesa omururu ebitambo byangye n'empongano zangye ezi naaragiire kumpongyera, okaha batabani baawe ekitiinisa okunkira, ngu mweyitirire n'ebicweka ebirikukira oburungi by'empongano zoona ezi abantu bangye Abaisraeli barikumpongyera?

Nikyo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugirira ati: N'ekya buzima nkaba ngizire nti; Ab'enju yaawe n'ab'enju ya sho nibo bariguma nibaheereza omu maisho gangye ebiro byona; mbwenu hati MUKAMA naagira ati: Nikikabure! ahakuba abarikumpa ekitiinisa, nibo ndikiha; kwonka abarikungaya, baryagaywa.
Reeba, ebiro nibiija, obu ndimaraho amaani gaawe n'ag'enju ya sho, hakabura omugurusi omu nju yaawe.
Kandi omu kubonabona kwawe oryareebesa eihari ebirungi byona ebi Abaisraeli bariheebwa omu Butaaho bwangye; n'omu nju yaawe tiharibamu mugurusi ebiro byona.
Ku harigira omuntu waawe owaahonokaho, akatsigara aha itambiro ryangye, aryaba ow'okukuhwereza amaisho noorira, n'okukusaasa omutima; oruzaaro rw'enju yaawe rwona ruryahenderwa omunyeeto.
Ako kagwe akarigwera batabani baawe bombi, Hofuni na Finehaasi, karyakubeera akamanyiso; bombi baryafa eizooba rimwe.

Naanye ndyayeimukiza omunyamurwa orikwesigwa, orikora nk'ebindi aha mutima n'omu biteekateeko oku biri. Ndyamwombekyera enju ehamire; kandi aryaheerereza omu maisho g'ou naashukireho amajuta ebiro byona.

Bwanyima weena oriba yaatsigaireho omu nju yaawe, aryaija, amukwate amaguru ngu amuhe akacweka k'efeeza nari omugaati, amushabe ati: Ninkweshengyereza, mpa omurimo gumwe aha y'abanyamurwa, beitu nkaabona ak'okurya.
Omu bunaku obwo Eli amaisho ge gakaba gaagiirwemu oruho, atakihweza gye. Ekiro kimwe, ku yaabaire abyami omu mwanya gwe,
etabaaza ya Ruhanga etakaraire, na Samueli abyami omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA ahu eshanduukye ya Ruhanga yaabaire eri,
MUKAMA yaayeta Samueli; nawe yaamwetaba ati: Ndi aha, Mukama wangye.
Yairuka, yaaza ahari Eli, yaamugira ati: Naija, ahakuba waanyeta. Eli yaamugira ati: Tinaakweta; garukayo obyame. Yaagarukayo, yaabyama.
MUKAMA yaagaruka yaamweta ati: Samueli! Samueli yaimuka yaaza ahari Eli, yaagira ati: Naija, ahakuba waanyeta. Yaamugarukamu ati: Tinaakweta, mwana wangye; garukayo obyame.
Obwo Samueli akaba atakamanyire MUKAMA, n'ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaba kitakamushuururiirwe.
MUKAMA yaayeta Samueli omurundi gwa kashatu. Yaimuka, yaaza ahari Eli, yaagira ati: Naija; ahakuba waanyeta. Ekyo kyamanyisa Eli ku MUKAMA niwe arikweta ogwo mwana.
Nikyo Eli yaagiriire Samueli ati: Irooko obyame; ku araagarukye yaakweta, ogire oti: Gamba, MUKAMA; ahakuba omwiru waawe ahuriire. Samueli nikwo kugarukayo, akabyama.
MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Reeba, ndyakora ekintu omuri Israeli, ekirireetera amatu g'orikihurira weena kuteera enduuru.
Eryo izooba ndyahikiiriza ahari Eli ebi naagaambire aha nju ye byona, okwiha obu byatandika n'okuhitsya aha muheru gwabyo.
Ahakuba nkamugambira ku ndiha enju ye ekifubiro eky'ebiro byona, nimbatura eby'okushiisha ebi yaamanyire; ahabw'okuba batabani be bakeeshiisha, tiyaabazibira.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndahiriire enju ya Eli nti: Eby'okushiisha by'enju ya Eli tibirihongyererwa yaaba kitambo nari empongano ebiro byona.
Samueli yaabyama, bwarugaho bwasheesha; ku yaimukire, yaigura enyigi z'enju ya MUKAMA; yaatiina kugambira Eli ebi ayorekirwe.
Bwanyima Eli yaayeta Samueli, naagira ati: Samueli mwana wangye! Onu ati: Ndi aha, mukama wangye.
Eli yaamubuuza ati: MUKAMA akugambiire ki? Ninkweshengyereza, otakinshereka. Ku oraagire eki wanshereka omuri ebyo byona ebi akugambiire, Ruhanga akikuture, n'okukiraho.
Atyo Samueli yaamugambira byona, tiyaagira ki yaamushereka. Onu ati: Ni MUKAMA; ka akore eki arikusiima kyona.
N'Abaisraeli boona, okuruga Daani okuhika Beeri-sheba, baamanya ku Samueli ahamiibwe kuba nabi wa MUKAMA.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagaruka yaayeyoreka omuri Shiilo; ahakuba MUKAMA akeeyorekyera Samueli Shiilo omu kigambo kye. Kandi ekigambo kya Samueli kyahika aha Baisraeli boona.
Abafilistia baatenga orugamba kurwanisa Abaisraeli; ku baarwaine, Abafilistia baabinga Abaisraeli, babaitamu abantu enkumi ina.

Engabo ku zaagarukire omu rusiisira, abakuru ba Israeli baabuuzana bati: Ahabw'enki MUKAMA yaatubingisa omu maisho g'Abafilistia eri izooba? Ka tuze kwenda eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, tugiihe Shiilo, tugireete aha; ku eraatuhikyemu, etujune omu mikono y'abazigu baitu.

Batyo baatuma abantu Shiilo, baihayo eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ow'amahe, oshutami ahari baakerubi. Kandi beene Eli bombi, Hofuni na Finehaasi, abaabaire bari hamwe n'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya Ruhanga, baija nayo.
Eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ku yaahikire omu rusiisira, Abaisraeli boona baateera munonga akaari, ensi yaateera obwaku.
Abafilistia ku baahuriire orwo rwari, baagira bati: Orwo rwari rwingi oruri omu rusiisira rw'Abaheburaayo n'orw'enki? Bwanyima baamanya ku eshanduukye ya MUKAMA yaahika omu rusiisira rwabo.
Abafilistia baatiina, ahakuba bakagira bati: Ruhanga yaahika omu rusiisira rwabo. Baagaruka baagira bati: Eshi twareeba enaku! Ahabw'okuba tihakabahoga kintu nk'eki okwiha ira ryona.
Twareeba enaku! N'oha oraabaase kutujuna baaruhanga aba ab'amaani? Aba nibo baaruhanga abaitsize Abanyamisri enfu za buri muringo omu ihamba.
Mube ab'amaani, murwane mashaija, imwe Bafilistia 'mwe, murekye kuba abahuuku b'Abaheburaayo, nk'oku baabaire bari ahariimwe, mufe mashaija murwane.
Batyo Abafilistia baarwana; Abaisraeli baabingwa, baahunga, buri muntu yairukira omu ihema rye; haabaho kwitire kuhango; ahakuba Abaisraeli bakafamu abantu abarikugyendesa ebigyere obukumi bushatu.
Kandi eshanduukye ya Ruhanga yaanyagwa, na beene Eli bombi Hofuni na Finehaasi baitwa.

Obu yaija, Eli akaba ashutami aha kitebe kye aha rubaju rw'omuhanda, ataireyo amaisho; ahakuba omutima gukaba gumuhweire omunda ahabw'eshanduukye ya Ruhanga. Ogwo mushaija ku yaahikire omu rurembo, yaabagambira ebibaireho; ab'omu rurembo boona baayeha ekiboroogo.
Eli ku yaahuriire okwo kuborooga, yaabuuza ati: Okwo kujagarara n'okw'enki? Ogwo mushaija yaija naayehuuta, yaabimugambira.
Obwo Eli akaba ahikize emyaka makumi mwenda na munaana; amaisho ge gaahumire, atakihweza.
Ogwo mushaija yaagira Eli ati: Niinye ogwo owaaruga omu rugamba eri izooba, naacwa omu ngabo. Onu yaamubuuza ati: Bibaire bita, mwana wangye?
Ogwo owaareeta amakuru yaamugarukamu ati: Abaisraeli baahunga Abafilistia, haabaho okwitwa kw'abantu baingi, batabani baawe bombi, Hofuni na Finehaasi, baafa; kandi eshanduukye ya Ruhanga yaanyagwa.

Ku yaagambire eby'eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, Eli yaaruga aha kitebe kye, yaagwa agarami aha kiti ky'omuryango, yaahendeka ebitsya, yaafa; ahakuba akaba ari omugurusi, orikweremeera. Kandi akaba amazire emyaka makumi ana naacwera Abaisraeli emanja.

Obwo mukaamwana wa Eli, muka Finehaasi, akaba aine enda ari haihi kuzaara; ku yaahuriire enkuru ngu eshanduukye ya Ruhanga enyagirwe, kandi ngu ishezaara na iba baafa, yaafukama, yaazaara, ahakuba ebisha bikamukwatira aho.
Ku yaabaire ari haihi kufa, abakazi abaabaire nibamuzaaza, baamugira bati: Otatiina; ahabw'okuba waazaara omwana w'omwojo. Kwonka tiyaabagarukamu, n'obu kwakuba okukyetaho.
Yaayeta ogwo mwana Ikabodi, naagira ati: Ekitiinisa kyaruga ahari Israeli. Yaakigamba ahabw'eshanduukye ya Ruhanga kunyagwa, n'ahabw'ebya ishezaara na iba.
Kandi yaagira ati: Ekitiinisa kyaruga ahari Israeli; ahabw'okuba eshanduukye ya Ruhanga yaanyagwa.
Abafilistia ku baaherize kunyaga eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, baagiiha Ebenezeeri, baagitwara Ashidoodi;
baagitaasya omu ndaaro ya Dagoni, baagita aha rubaju rwe.
Omu kasheeshe abantu ba Ashidoodi ku baimukire kare, baashanga Dagoni agwire ajuumaire ahansi omu maisho g'eshanduukye ya MUKAMA. Baamujuumuura, baamugarura aha mwanya gwe.

Kandi ku baimukire kare omu kasheeshe kaakuratsireho, baashanga Dagoni agwire ajuumaire ahansi omu maisho g'eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, kandi omutwe gwe n'engaro ze bicwirweho, biri omu muryango; haatsigaire ekihinju kya ifo kyonka.
Eki nikyo abagirwa ba Dagoni n'abataaha omu ndaaro ya Dagoni boona omuri Ashidoodi bataribatira mu kisasi ky'omuryango n'okuhitsya hati.
Abantu ba Ashidoodi ku baarebire byaba bityo, baagira bati: Eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli etaguma naitwe; ahabw'okuba omukono gwe gutuhingamiire na ruhanga waitu Dagoni.

Nikwo kutuma abategyeki b'Abafilistia boona kuteeranira hamwe, bakagira bati: Tugire tuta eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli? Baabagarukamu bati: Eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli mugyohererezane, ehikye Gaasi. Batyo baayohererezana eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli, baagihitsyayo.
Bwanyima ku baaherize kugihitsyayo, omukono gwa MUKAMA gwarwanisa orwo rurembo, yaabahahaaza emitima munonga; yaarwaza abanyarurembo, abato n'abakuru, ebizimba aha mibiri yaabo.

N'ahabw'ekyo eshanduukye ya Ruhanga baagyohereza Ekurooni; aba Ekurooni ku baagicwire eriisho neija, baayombera kimwe nibagira bati: Boohererezaine eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli, mbwenu baagituhitsyaho kutwita n'abantu baitu.

N'ahabw'ekyo baatuma abategyeki b'Abafilistia boona, baateeranira aho, aba Ekurooni baabagira bati: Mwohereze eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli, egarukye omu mwanya gwayo, erekye kutwita n'abantu baitu. Ahabw'okuba omuri orwo rurembo rwona hakaba hariho okuhahaaza emitima ahabw'okutiina kufa; n'omukono gwa MUKAMA gubahingamiire munonga.
Abashaija abaatsigaireho batafiire, baarwara ebizimba; n'okuborooga kw'orwo rurembo kwahika omu iguru.
Eshanduukye ya MUKAMA yaamara ameezi mushanju omu nsi y'Abafilistia.
Bwanyima Abafilistia baayeta abagirwa n'abafumu, baababuuza bati: Egi shanduukye ya MUKAMA tugigire tuta? Mutuhabure oku turaagigarureyo, tukagihitsya omu mwanya gwayo.

Baabagarukamu bati: Ku muraayohereze eshanduukye ya Ruhanga wa Israeli, mutagyohereza yonka; kureka mucwe obwengye bwona kugigarurayo n'empongano y'okwihaho orubanja. Obwo nibwo muraakire, kandi mukamanya ekizibiire omukono gwe kubarugaho.

Banu bagira bati: Ni mpongano ki ey'okwihaho orubanja ei turaamwoherereze? Baagarukamu bati: Ebizimba bitaano by'ezaabu, n'embeba itaano z'ezaabu, nk'omubaro gw'abategyeki b'Abafilistia oku gurikwingana; ahakuba imwe mwena n'abategyeki baanyu mukajuumikirwa orwo rufu.

N'ahabw'ekyo mushemereire kuheesha ebishushani by'ebizimba byanyu, n'eby'embeba ezirikushiisha ensi yaanyu; kandi muryaha Ruhanga wa Israeli ekitiinisa; obundi akaatuubya oburemeezi bw'omukono gwe ahariimwe, n'ahari baaruhanga baanyu, n'aha nsi yaanyu.
Mbwenu shi nimugangaariza ki emitima, nk'Abanyamisri na Faraho oku baagangaize eyaabo? Obu yaakora eby'amahano omuribo, tibararekire abo bantu bakarugayo, bakagyenda?
N'ahabw'ekyo hati mureete ekigaari kisya, mukiboneze, n'ente ibiri ezirikwontsya, ezitakakururaga kintu, muzikomeho ekigaari, muzaakye enyana zaazo, muzigarure omuka;

bwanyima mutware eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, mugite aha kigaari, kandi n'ebintu by'ezaabu, ebi murikumwoherereza kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, mubite omu kashanduukye aha rubaju rwayo; bwanyima mugyohereze, egyende.

Kandi mureebe ahu eraatoore; ku eraarabe ogurikuza aha mwatano gwayo, yaagyema Beti-shemeshi, nitwija kumanya ku MUKAMA niwe atureeteire aka kabi koona; kandi ku kiraabe kitabaire kityo, nabwo nitwija kumanya ku gutari mukono gwe ogwatwitsire; kureka ku kari akagwe akatugwereire.
Abo bashaija baatwaza batyo, baareeta ente ibiri zirikwontsya, baazikomaho ekigaari, enyana zaazo baazikingira omuka;
baata eshanduukye ya MUKAMA aha kigaari, baataho n'akashanduukye akarimu embeba eziheesire omu zaabu n'ebishushani by'ebizimba byabo.

Ezo nte zaatoora omuhanda ogurikucwekanisa niguza Beti-shemeshi, zaagumizamu omu muhanda rugyendwa nizijuga, tizaakiikama ha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho; kandi abategyeki b'Abafilistia baagyenda bazikuratiire okuhika aha mwatano gwa Beti-shemeshi.
Eryo izooba aba Beti-shemeshi bakaba nibagyesha engano omu ruhita; ku baanagire amaisho, baareeba eshanduukye, baashemererwa munonga kugireeba.

Ekyo kigaari kyahika omu musiri gwa Yoshua owa Beti-shemeshi, kyayemerera aho, ahu eibaare rihango ryabaire riri; bwanyima baashatura embaaho z'ekyo kigaari, baatambira aho ezo nte kuba ekitambo ky'okwokyeza MUKAMA.

Abaleevi baihaho eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, n'akashanduukye akaabaire kari hamwe nayo, akarimu ebyo bintu by'ezaabu, baabita aha mutwe gw'eryo ibaare rihango; kandi eryo izooba aba Beti-shemeshi baatambira MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo.
Abo bategyeki ku baaherize kubireeba, baagaruka Ekurooni eryo izooba.

Ebi nibyo bizimba by'ezaabu ebi Abafilistia baahongyeire MUKAMA kuba empongano y'okwihaho orubanja; kimwe aha bwa Ashidoodi, ekindi ahabwa Gaaza, ekindi ahabwa Ashikelooni, ekindi ahabwa Gaasi, n'ekindi ahabwa Ekurooni;

kandi n'embeba z'ezaabu, nk'omubaro gw'endembo zoona ez'Abafilistia, ezaabaire nizitwarwa abo bategyeki bataano, oku gwabaire guri, endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, n'ebirorero by'omu byaro. Kandi eryo ibaare rihango, eri baataireho eshanduukye ya MUKAMA aha rubaju omu musiri gwa Yoshua owa Beti-shemeshi, niryo kareebi n'okuhitsya hati.
Abashaija ba Beti-shemeshi baagira bati: N'oha orikubaasa kwemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, Ruhanga ogu orikwera? Kandi ku araaturugyeho, naaza ahari oha?
Batyo baatuma entumwa aha batwire Kiryasi-yearimu, nibagira bati: Abafilistia bagarwire eshanduukye ya MUKAMA. Mushuume, mugiinamure owaanyu.

Okwiha aha izooba eri eshanduukye ya MUKAMA yaataahiireho Kiryasi-yearimu, hakahinguraho omwanya muraingwa; ahakuba ogwo mwanya gwona gukahika emyaka makumi abiri. Ab'enju ya Israeli boona baatakira MUKAMA.

Samueli yaabagambira ati: Ku muraagarukye ahari MUKAMA n'omutima gwanyu gwona, mwihe omuriimwe baaruhanga b'enduga-mahanga n'aba Ashitaroosi, mushemereze MUKAMA emitima yaanyu, mube niwe mwaheereza wenka; nawe naija kubakiza, abaihe omu mikono y'Abafilistia.
Batyo Abaisraeli baihaho Baabaali n'aba Ashitaroosi, baaheereza MUKAMA wenka.
Samueli yaaragiira ati: Muteeranire Abaisraeli boona Mizipa, nyije mbashabire ahari MUKAMA.

Baateeranira Mizipa, baataha amaizi, baagashuka omu maisho ga MUKAMA; eryo izooba baayesiibyakwo, nibagira bati: Tukacumura ahari MUKAMA. Obwo Samueli yaatandika kucwera Abaisraeli emanja ahari Mizipa.
Abafilistia ku baahuriire ngu Abaisraeli bateeraniire Mizipa, abategyeki baabo bainamuka kurwanisa Abaisraeli. Abaisraeli ku baakihuriire, baabatiina.
Abaisraeli baashaba Samueli nibagira bati: Otareka kutakira MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ahabwaitu, abone kutujuna omu mikono y'Abafilistia.
Bwanyima Samueli yaatwara omwana gw'entaama gurikwonka, yaaguhongyera MUKAMA kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya; Samueli yaatakira MUKAMA ahabw'Abaisraeli, MUKAMA yaamugarukamu.

Samueli ku yaabaire naahonga ekitambo eky'okwotsya, Abafilistia bairira haihi kurwanisa Abaisraeli; kwonka MUKAMA yaahinda okuhinda kw'amaani aha Bafilistia eryo ezooba, yaabarabanisamu, baabingwa omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Abaisraeli baaruga Mizipa, baakurata Abafilistia, baagyenda nibabaita, baabahitsya Besi-kaari.
Bwanyima Samueli yaakwata eibaare, yaaribyara ahagati ya Mizipa na Sheeni, yaaryeta eiziina Ebenezeeri, naagira ati: MUKAMA naakituhwera n'okuhitsya hati.

Kandi endembo ezi Abafilistia baabaire banyagire Abaisraeli, zaabagarurirwa, okuruga Ekurooni n'okuhika Gaasi; Abaisraeli baiha ensi yaabo omu mikono y'Abafilistia; haabaho obusingye ahagati y'Abaisraeli n'Abaamori.
Samueli yaaguma naacwera Abaisraeli emanja ebiro bye byona.
Kandi buri mwaka akaba arambura Beseeli, Gilugaali na Mizipa, naacwera Abaisraeli emanja omuri egyo myanya yoona;
bwanyima agaruka Raama; ahakuba eka ye niyo yaabaire eri; okwo niyo yaabaire acwerera Abaisraeli emanja; kandi niyo yaayombekyeire MUKAMA eitambiro.
Omwana we w'omujigaijo akaba naayetwa Yoeli; ow'omushubiro naayetwa Abiya; bakaba bari abaramuzi omuri Beeri-sheba.
Kwonka abo batabani tibaratwarize nka ishebo, kureka bakateishuka emihanda ye ahabw'okukunda empiiha, baaguma nibarya enguzi, kandi nibaita emanja z'abantu.
Bwanyima abakuru ba Israeli boona baayeteerana hamwe, baija ahari Samueli Raama.
Baamugira bati: Reeba, okuzire; kandi batabani baawe tibarikutwaza nkaiwe; mbwenu otuteereho omugabe w'okututegyeka nk'agandi mahanga oku gatwaza.
Kwonka ekigambo ekyo kyagwisa kubi Samueli, eki baagizire bati: Otuhe omugabe, atutegyekye. Samueli yaashaba MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Hurira ebi abo bantu barikukugambira byona; ahakuba tiiwe bangire, kureka niinye bangire ngu ntaba omugabe waabo.
Nk'ebi baakozire byona oku byabaire biri, okwiha aha izooba riri eri naabaihiireho Misri n'okuhitsya hati, obu baanyimuura, bakaheereza baaruhanga abandi, naiwe nikwo barikukugira.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati hurira eki barikukugambira; kwonka obeehanangiririze kimwe, noobashobororera emitwarize y'omugabe oribategyeka, oku eriba.
Atyo Samueli yaagambira abantu abamushabire omugabe ebigambo bya MUKAMA byona.

Yaabagira ati: Egi niyo eriba emitwarize y'omugabe oribategyeka; aryatwara batabani baanyu, abamwe abagire ab'ebigaari bye, n'ab'okugyendera aha mbaraasi ze, n'ab'okuguma nibairuka omu maisho g'ebigaari bye.

Abandi abateho kuba abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'aba makumi ataano-ataano; abandi babe ab'okumuhingira, n'ab'okumugyeshera, abandi babe ab'okumuheeshera eby'okurwanisa, n'eby'okukoresa omu bigaari bye.
Kandi aryatwara bahara baanyu kuba ab'okukora eby'emigaju, n'ab'okuteeka eby'okurya, n'abateeki b'emigaati.
Kandi aryabaaka emisiri yaanyu, n'emizaabibu yaanyu, n'emizeituuni yaanyu, ebirikukira ebindi oburungi, abihe abaheereza be.
Kandi aryabaihaho kimwe kya ikumi ky'ebi muhunikire n'eky'emisiri yaanyu y'emizaabibu, abihe abakuru b'abantu be n'abaheereza be.
Kandi aryabanyaga abahuuku n'abazaana baanyu, n'ente zaanyu ezirikukira oburungi, n'endogoya zaanyu, abikorese emirimo ye.
Kandi n'aha masyo gaanyu g'entaama n'ag'embuzi aryaihaho kimwe kya ikumi; naimwe muryaba abairu be.
Omu bunaku obwo muryarira ahabw'ogwo mugabe waanyu ou muriba mwetooraniire; kwonka omuri obwo bunaku MUKAMA taribagarukamu.
naitwe tube nk'amahanga goona; omugabe waitu agume atucwere emanja, kandi atwebembere aturwanirire omu ngamba zaitu.
Samueli ku yaaherize kuhurira ebigambo by'abo bantu byona, yaabigambira MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Hurira eki barikugamba, obateereho omugabe. Bwanyima Samueli yaagira abashaija ba Israeli ati: Mwirooko mugarukyeyo, buri muntu omu rurembo rw'owaabo.
Kandi akaba aine omutabani murungi omutsigazi, orikwetwa Saulo. Omu Baisraeli boona hakaba hatarimu orikumuhita; akaba naakira abantu boona aha mutwe, nibamugarukira aha ibega.
Eizooba rimwe endogoya za Kiishi, ishe wa Saulo, zikabura, Kiishi nikwo kugira omutabani Saulo ati: Twara omwe aha bairu baitu, mwimukye muze kusherura endogoya.

Atyo Saulo yaagyenda yaaraba omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, n'omu nsi ya Shalisha; kwonka tibaazibona. Bwanyima baaraba omu nsi ya Shalimu, zaaburayo; baaraba omu nsi y'Ababenyamiini, nayo zaaburayo.
Ku baahikire omu nsi ya Zuufi, Saulo yaagira omwiru ou yaabaire aine ati: Ija, tugarukyeyo, tata atakaiha omutima aha ndogoya, akagwemereza ahabwaitu.

Onu yaamugira ati: Reeba, omuri ruriya rurembo harimu omuntu wa Ruhanga; kandi n'omuntu w'ekitiinisa. Ebi agamba byona, buzima bibakwo. Mbwenu tuzeyo; obundi akaatushobororera eby'oru rugyendo rwaitu oru turimu.

Saulo yaabuuza omwiru we ati: Mbwenu shi, ku turaazeyo, ogwo mushaija nitumutwarira ki? Ahakuba entanda zihweire omu nshaho zaitu, kandi titwine mukimbo gw'okutwarira ogwo muntu wa Ruhanga. Mbwenu twine ki?
Omwiru we yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba, nyine omu ngaro ekicweka kimwe kya kana kya shekeli y'efeeza; nikyo ndaaheereze ogwo muntu wa Ruhanga, akabona kutuhabura omuhanda.
(Obunyakare omuri Israeli, omuntu ku yaabaire aza kwehanuuza ahari Ruhanga, akaba agira ati: Ija tuze ow'omuhanuuzi; ahabw'okuba orikwetwa nabi omu biro ebi, ira akaba ayetwa omuhanuuzi.)
Saulo yaagira omwiru we ati: Ebi waagamba nibyo; ija tugyende. Batyo baataaha omu rurembo omu ogwo muntu wa Ruhanga yaabaire ari.
Baabagarukamu bati: Ariyo; reeba ari omu maisho gaanyu aho; mwehuute, ahabw'okuba nibwo yaija omu rurembo; kandi eri izooba abantu nibaija kutambira ebitambo omu mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu.

Ku muraahikye omu rurembo, ahonaaho nimwija kumureeba atakainamukire kuza kuriira omuri ogwo mwanya mukuru; kandi abantu tibarikubaasa kurya atakaizire, ahakuba niwe ashemereire kushabira ekitambo omugisha; bwanyima abeetsirwe bakabona kurya. Mbwenu mwinamukye; nimwija kumubugana hati.
Batyo bainamuka nibaza omu rurembo; ku baabaire nibakitaahamu, baabugana Samueli naashohora, naaza omuri ogwo mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu.

Nyencakare nk'aga magingo niinyija kukwoherereza omushaija orikuruga omu nsi ya Benyamiini, omushukyeho amajuta g'okumushoroora kuba omugabe w'abantu bangye Abaisraeli; kandi niwe arijuna abantu bangye, akabaiha omu mikono y'Abafilistia; kandi ndeebire abantu bangye, ahabw'okuba okutaka kwabo kumpikireho.
Samueli ku yaareebire Saulo, MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Ngugwo omushaija ou nkugambiire! Niwe aritegyeka abantu bangye.
Atyo Saulo yaashanga Samueli omu irembo ahu yaabaire ari, yaamubuuza ati: Ninkweshengyereza, mpabura ahu enju y'omuhanuuzi eri.

Samueli yaamugarukamu ati: Manya niinye muhanuuzi; mbwenu nyebembera, tuze omu mwanya mukuru; ahakuba eri izooba nimwija kurya naanye; kandi nyencakare omu kasheeshe niinyija kukwohereza, naaheza kukushobororera ebikuri aha mutima byona.
Kandi eby'endogoya zaawe ezimazire ebiro bishatu zibuzire, birekye kukwemereza omutima; ahakuba zibonekire. Mbwenu ebirungi by'omuri Israeli byona bibiikiirwe oha? Tiiwe n'enju ya sho yoona?

Saulo yaamugarukamu ati: Torikumanya ku ndi Omubenyamiini, ow'omu ruganda orurikukira obukye omu nganda za Israeli? Kandi omu miryango y'oruganda rwa Benyamiini yoona, ogwaitu tigwo gurikukira obukye? Ahabw'enki nongambira ebigambo nk'ebyo?
Samueli yaatwara Saulo n'omwiru we, yaabataasya omu kishengye, yaabashutamya omu mwanya gw'ekitiinisa ahagati y'abeetsirwe, abaabaire bari nka makumi ashatu.
Samueli yaagira omuteeki ati: Reeta omugabo ogu nkuhaire, nkakugira nti: Gubiikye.

Omuteeki yaareeta ekivune ky'okuguru n'enyama zaakyo, yaakita omu maisho ga Saulo. Samueli yaagira ati: Reeba, ekibaire kibiikirwe, nkiki omu maisho gaawe; okirye; ahakuba kibaire kikubiikiisrwe okuhitsya aha bunaku obubaire butairweho, ngu obone kurya n'abeetsirwe. Atyo Saulo yaarya na Samueli eryo izooba.
Ku baarugire omuri ogwo mwanya mukuru, baashuuma omu rurembo, baatemba aha mutwe gw'enju, Samueli yaagaaniirirayo na Saulo.
Omu kasheeshe baimuka kare; ku bwabaire nibutaagurukana, Samueli yaayeta Saulo ayemi ahaiguru y'enju, yaamugira ati: Imuka, nkuragye. Saulo yaimuka; baashohora bombi, we na Samueli, baaza aheeru.
Ku baabaire nibashuuma kuhika ahu orurembo rurikugarukira, Samueli yaagira Saulo ati: Gambira omwiru waawe arabeho; ku araarabeho, haza iwe oyemerereho kakye, nkugambire ekigambo kya Ruhanga.

Eri izooba ku orandugyeho, noija kubugana abashaija babiri aha kituuro kya Rakeeli, ahari Zeliza omu mwatano gwa Benyamiini, bakugire bati: Endogoya ezi obaire ogiire kusherura, zibonekire; mbwenu sho takyemereize mutima ahabw'endogoya, kureka agwemereize ahabwawe, naagira ati: Mbwenu ngire nta ahabw'omwana wangye?

Bwanyima orugye aho, ogumizemu; ku oraahikye aha mwela gwa Tabora, noija kubugana abashaija bashatu nibainamuka Beseeli ahari Ruhanga, omwe ayekoreire abaana b'embuzi bashatu, ondi aine emigaati eshatu, n'ondiijo ayekoreire efurebe ya viinyo;
bakuramutsye, bakuhe emigaati ebiri, ogyakiire.

Bwanyima noija kuhika aha kibungo kya Ruhanga, ahu engabo z'Abafilistia ziteire orusiisira; ku oraahikye omu rurembo, noija kubuganamu omutwe gwa baanabi nibaruga omu mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu, endingiri n'ebitaasa n'emikuri n'enanga bibeebembeire; kandi noija kushanga nibaragura.
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA naija kukwijaho n'amaani, oragure nabo, ohindukye omuntu musya.
Kandi obwo bumanyiso ku buraakuhikyeho, okore nk'oku kiraabe nikyetengwa; ahakuba Ruhanga ari naiwe.

Bwanyima oshuume Gilugaali, ombandizeyo; naanye niinyija kukushangayo kutamba ebitambo by'okwotsya n'eby'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; omareyo ebiro mushanju ontegyereize, okuhitsya obu ndaije, nkakushobororera eki oshemereire kukora.
Ku yaateire ati Samueli amabega kumurugaho, Ruhanga yaamuha ogundi mutima; obw'okureeberaho obwo bwona bwahikiirira eryo izooba.
Ku baahikire ahari ekyo kibungo, omutwe gwa baanabi gwamubugana, Omwoyo wa Ruhanga yaamwijaho n'amaani, yaaragura nabo.
Boona abaabaire nibamumanya obunyakare, ku baareebire naaragura hamwe na baanabi, baagambirana bati: Beitu mwene Kiishi yaaba ata? Saulo nawe ari omuri baanabi?
Omwe aha batwire omu mwanya ogwo yaabagarukamu naagira ati: Beitu shi ni beene oha? N'ahabw'ekyo kyahinduka enfumu, ngu: Saulo nawe ari omuri baanabi?
Ku yaaherize kuragura, yaaza omu mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu.
Ishento yaagaruka yaagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ngambira ebi Samueli akugambiire.
Saulo yaagarukamu ishento ati: Atugambiriire kimwe ku endogoya zibonekire. Kwonka ebirikukwata aha by'obugabe, ebi Samueli agambire, tiyaabimugambira.

yaagambira Abaisraeli ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Nkaiha Abaisraeli Misri, naabajuna naabaiha omu mikono y'Abanyamisri, n'omu mikono y'abagabe boona abaabaire nibabaita kubi;

kwonka eri izooba mwayanga Ruhanga waanyu obajuna omu kabi kaanyu koona n'omu busaasi bwanyu; mbwenu mwangira muti: Ngaaha, kureka otuteereho omugabe. N'ahabw'ekyo hati mweyorekye omu maisho ga MUKAMA muri omu nganda zaanyu n'omu nkumi zaanyu.
Yairiza haihi oruganda rwa Benyamiini bari omu miryango yaabo, omuryango gwa Matiri gwatooranwa; na Saulo mwene Kiishi yaatooranwa. Kwonka ku baamusherwire, tiyaaboneka.
N'ahabw'ekyo baayongyera kwehanuuza ahari MUKAMA, nibamubuuza bati: Ogwo mushaija aizire aha? MUKAMA yaabagarukamu ati: Reeba, ayesherekire omu bintu.
Baagyenda nibairuka, baamwihayo; ku yaayemereire ahagati yaabo, yaakira abantu boona aha mutwe, baamugarukira aha ibega.
Samueli yaagira abantu boona ati: Nimureeba ou MUKAMA atooraine? Tihariho ori nkawe omu bantu boona. Abantu boona baateera akaari, nibagira bati: Omugabe naakaramaare!
Saulo nawe yaataaha owe Gibea, yaagyenda n'omutwe gw'amamanzi abu MUKAMA yaakozire aha mutima, bamushendekyereize.
Kwonka abashaija bamwe abataine mugasho baagira bati: Omushaija ogu naabaasa ata kutujuna? Baamugaya, baayanga kumureetera entabaarutsyano. Kwonka we yaayehunamira.
Nahashi Omuamoni yaabagira ati: Ku muraikirize ku mbanonkoramu amaisho ga buryo, niinyija kugibakoresa; kandi nkigire ekijumo ahari Israeli yoona.
Abakuru ba Yabeshi baamugarukamu bati: Ba oturekire okumara ebiro mushanju, tubanze tutume entumwa, zirabe omuri Israeli yoona; ku turaabure kijuna, nitwija kukwehongyera.
Omuri ako kaanya Saulo yaija akuratiire ente, naaruga omu misiri; yaabuuza ati: Abantu aba baaba bata, ka nibaborooga? Baamuteekyerereza eby'aba Yabeshi.
Saulo ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, Omwoyo wa Ruhanga yaamwijaho n'amaani, yaagira ekiniga kingi.

Yaihayo ente ibiri, yaaziita, yaazitematemamu ebicweka, yaabiha entumwa kubitwara omuri Israeli yoona, yaazituma ati: Weena oraayangye kuhurura na Saulo na Samueli, okwo nikwo ente ze ziraatwazibwe. Okutiinisa kwa MUKAMA kwakwata abantu, baahururira kimwe nk'omuntu omwe.
Ku yaabateeraniire Bezeki, yaababara, Abaisraeli baaba obusiriira bushatu, n'Abayuda baaba obukumi bushatu.

Bwanyima baagambira entumwa ziri eziizire, bati: Mugambire aba Yabeshi-gileadi muti: Nyencakare akashana kaatagata, nimwija kuheebwa emikono. Ezo ntumwa zaagyenda, zaabigambira aba Yabeshi; baashemererwa.
Aba Yabeshi nikwo kugambira Abaamoni bati: Nyencakare nitwija kubeehongyera, mutugire nk'oku murikwenda kwona.

Ku bwaseesire, Saulo yaabaganisa abantu omu mitwe eshatu, baayeshuka omu rusiisira rw'Abaamoni enkoko nizigamba, baabaita okuhitsya omu ihangwe; abaahonokireho baataataana, nangwa n'ababiri tibaaguma hamwe.
Kwonka Saulo yaagira ati: Hatagira omuntu n'omwe owaitwa eri izooba; ahakuba eri izooba MUKAMA yaakora eby'okujuna Abaisraeli.
Samueli yaagira abantu ati: Mwije tuze Gilugaali, tuhamizeyo obugabe.

Abantu boona baaza Gilugaali; okwo niyo baayemekyeire Saulo omu maisho ga MUKAMA, bakatambirayo empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye omu maisho ge; kandi niyo Saulo n'Abaisraeli boona baayesiimiire munonga.
Ogwo mugabe niwe arikubeebembera; nyowe nkuzire, naagizire enju; mbwenu reeba, batabani bangye bari hamwe naimwe. Kandi nyowe nkabeebembera okwiha omu butsigazi bwangye okuhitsya hati.

Reeba, ndi aha; munyomesereze omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'omu maisho g'ogu muntu we, owaashukirweho amajuta. Ndanyagire ente y'oha? Ndanyagire endogoya y'oha? Nari ndaryangataniise oha? N'oha ou ndaitsire kubi? Nari shi n'oha ou ndariireho enguzi, kuunyita amaisho? nkabimuriha.
Baamugarukamu bati: Tokaturyangatanisaga, kandi tokatwitaga kubi, n'obu kwakuba okunyaga ekintu ky'omuntu weena.
Yaabagira ati: MUKAMA niwe mujurizi w'okubashinja, kandi n'omuntu we owaashukirweho amajuta ni kareebi w'okuhamya, ku mutaine ki mwanshanga omu ngaro. Baagira bati: Niwe kareebi.
N'ahabw'ekyo eri izooba nimwemerere, ntongane naimwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA eby'okujuna byona ebi MUKAMA yaabakoreire na baashwenkuriimwe.
Yakobo obu yaaza Misri, baashwenkuriimwe bakatakira MUKAMA, yaatuma Musa na Arooni, baiha baashwenkuriimwe Misri, baabata omu nsi egi kutuuramu.
Kwonka baayebwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, yaabarekurira Sisera, omukuru w'eihe rya Hazori, n'Abafilistia, n'omugabe wa Moabu, baabarwanisa.
Bwanyima baatakira MUKAMA nibagira bati: Tukacumura, ahakuba tukaimuura MUKAMA, twaheereza Baabaali n'aba Ashitaroosi; mbwenu otujune, otwihe omu mikono y'abazigu baitu, tukuheereze.
MUKAMA yaatuma Yerubabaali, Baraki, Yefusa na Samueli, yaabaiha omu mikono y'abazigu baanyu embaju zoona, mwatuura buhooro.
Bwanyima ku mwareebire Nahashi omugabe w'Abaamoni yaabateera, mwangira muti: Ngaaha, nitwenda kutegyekwa omugabe; haza kunu omugabe waanyu ari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Mbwenu hati, nimureebe omugabe ou mwayetooraniire, kandi ou mwashabire. Mpaho MUKAMA abateereireho omugabe w'okubategyeka.
Ku muritiina MUKAMA, mwamuheereza, mwahurira eiraka rye, mutaagomera kiragiro kya MUKAMA, kandi imwe n'omugabe orikubategyeka ku murikuratira MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, biryaba gye.
Kwonka ku muryanga kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA, mwagomera ekiragiro kye, omukono gwa MUKAMA guryabarwanisa, nk'oku gwarwaniise baashwenkuriimwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati mwemerere mureebe ekintu eki ekikuru eki MUKAMA yaaza kukora omu maisho gaanyu.

Hati t'obunaku bw'eishaaruura ry'engano? Mbwenu naaza kushaba MUKAMA, areete okuhinda kw'enkuba n'enjura; haza mwetegyereze mureebe obubi bwanyu ku buri bwingi, obu mwagizire omu maisho ga MUKAMA, obu mwayeshabira omugabe.
Atyo Samueli yaashaba MUKAMA; eryo izooba MUKAMA yaareeta okuhinda kw'enkuba n'enjura; abantu boona baatiina munonga MUKAMA na Samueli.
Baagira Samueli bati: Shabira abairu baawe ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, turekye kufa; ahabw'okuba tukongyera aha bibi byaitu byona ekibi eki eky'okweshabira omugabe.
Samueli yaagambira abantu ati: Mutatiina; n'ekya buzima, ebyo bibi byona kwo mukabikora; kwonka mutateishuka mukareka kukuratira MUKAMA, kureka mumuheereze n'omutima gwanyu gwona;
kandi mutateishuka mukakuratira ebitaine mugasho, kandi ebitarikubaasa kubagasira, n'obu kwakuba okubajuna; ahakuba tibiine mutambo.
Mumanye ngu MUKAMA taritsigaho bantu be ahabw'eiziina rye erikuru, ahakuba MUKAMA akasiima kubagira eihanga rye ahabwe.
Kandi ahabwangye nikikabure okucumura ahari MUKAMA, okureka kubashabira; kureka ndyaguma mbahabure omuhanda murungi kandi oguhikire.
Kwonka mugume mutiine MUKAMA, mumuheereze omu mazima n'omutima gwanyu gwona; ahabw'okuba mushemereire kuteekateeka aha bi MUKAMA yaabakoreire ku biri bikuru.
Kwonka ku muriguma nimukora kubi, muryahwerekyerera imwe n'omugabe waanyu.
Saulo akaza aha ngoma aine emyaka makumi ashatu, yaamara emyaka ebiri naategyeka Israeli.

Bwanyima Saulo yaatoorana abashaija enkumi ishatu omu Baisraeli; enkumi ibiri zaaguma na Saulo Mikimaashi n'aha kibungo kya Beseeli; kandi orukumi rwaguma na Yonasaani omuri Gibea eya Benyamiini; abandi boona yaabaraga, buri muntu yaataaha omu ka ye.
Bwanyima Yonasaani yaateera ekigo ky'Abafilistia ekyabaire kiri Gibea; Abafilistia baakimanya. Bwanyima Saulo yaaragiira kuteera enzamba omu nsi yoona, naagira ati: Abaheburaayo bahurire.
Abaisraeli boona baahurira ngu Saulo ateire ekigo ky'Abafilistia, kandi ngu Abaisraeli bahindukire ekirikunugwa aha Bafilistia. Abantu baahuruzibwa kushanga Saulo Gilugaali.

Kandi Abafilistia baayeteerana kurwanisa Abaisraeli, baine ebigaari obukumi bushatu, n'ab'aha mbaraasi enkumi mukaaga, n'ezindi ngabo nyingi, eziri nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja; bainamuka, baasiisira Mikimaashi, aha burugwa-izooba bwa Besaveeni.
Abashaija ba Israeli ku baareebire bari omu kabi, (ahakuba abantu bakaba batuntuziibwe) baayeshereka omu nyanga n'omu bishaka n'omu nkiri n'omu nengo kandi n'omu biina.
Kandi Abaheburaayo abamwe bakaba bambukire Yorudani, nibaza omu nsi ya Gaadi na Gileadi; kwonka Saulo akaba akiri Gilugaali, abantu boona baamukuratayo nibatetema.
Saulo nikwo kugira ati: Mundeetere ekitambo ky'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye. Atyo yaatamba ekyo kitambo ky'okwotsya.
Ku yaabaire yaaheza ati kukitamba, Samueli yaija. Saulo yaashohora kumubugana, ngu amuramutsye.

Samueli yaamubuuza ati: Eki waakora ki? Saulo yaamugarukamu ati: Ku ndeebire abantu baatandika kutaataana nibampwaho, naiwe otaizira mu biro bi ongambiire, kandi n'Abafilistia baateeraniire Mikimaashi,
naanye nikwo kugira nti: Hati Abafilistia baaza kushuuma, banteerere Gilugaali, ntakeeshengyereize MUKAMA kumpa omugisha. Nikyo nyegyemeserereize kutamba ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Samueli yaagambira Saulo ati: Waakora eky'obushema; tiwaakwata kiragiro kya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, eki yaakuragiire; reeba MUKAMA yaaba ari ow'okuhamya obugabe bwawe omuri Israeli ebiro byona.
Kwonka mbwenu obugabe bwawe tiburigumaho. MUKAMA yaaheza kwesherurira omuntu ori nk'omutima gwe oku gurikwenda, kandi niwe yaataho kuba omugabe w'abantu be, ahakuba tokwatsire ki MUKAMA yaakuragiire.
Samueli yaimuka, yaaruga Gilugaali, yaaza Gibea eya Benyamiini. Saulo yaabara abantu abu yaabaire aine, baaba nka magana mukaaga.
Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani n'abantu abu baabaire baine baaguma Geeba eya Benyamiini; kwonka Abafilistia baaguma omu rusiisira Mikimaashi.
Kandi abanyagi b'omu Bafilistia baaruga omu rusiisira rwabo, baayecwamu emitwe eshatu; ogumwe gwatoora omuhanda ogurikuza Ofura omu nsi ya Shuali;
ogundi gwatoora omuhanda ogurikuza Besi-horoni; n'ogundi gwatoora omuhanda ogw'aha mwatano ogurikureeba omu ruhanga rwa Zeboimu haihi n'eihamba.
Kandi Abaisraeli boona bakaba bashuuma omu Bafilistia, buri muntu kutyazayo efuka ye, oruhabyo rwe, empango ye, n'omuhoro gwe;
kwonka bakaba baine eityazo ry'okutyazaho emihoro n'empabyo, n'efuka z'amaino n'empango, n'eby'okutyazaho ebihosho.
N'ahabw'ekyo aha izooba ry'orugamba omu bantu abu Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani baabaire baine, tihariho n'omwe owaabaire agira rurara nari eicumu; kureka bikaba bigirwa Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani.
Bwanyima ab'omu kigo ky'Abafilistia baashohora, baaza omu nkiro ya Mikimaashi.
Eizooba rimwe Yonasaani mwene Saulo akagambira omutsigazi, omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, ati: Ija twambukye seeri omu kigo ky'Abafilistia. Kwonka tiyaagambira ishe.
Kandi Saulo akaba ari omu kicweka kya Gibea ekirikuhereerukayo ahansi y'omukoma-mahanga ogwabaire guri Migirooni; n'abashaija abu yaabaire aine bakaba bari nka magana mukaaga;

kandi hakaba hariho na Ahiya, mwene Ahitubu, mukuru wa Ikabodi, mwene Finehaasi, mwijukuru wa Eli, omunyamurwa wa MUKAMA omuri Shiilo, ajwaire efodi. Kandi n'abo bantu tibaramanyire ku Yonasaani agyenzire.
Omuri egyo nkiro ahu Yonasaani yaabaire naayenda kucwekanisiza kuhika omu kigo ky'Abafilistia, hakaba hariho ebibaare bihango embaju zombi; ekimwe nikyetwa Bozezi, n'ekindi nikyetwa Senehi.
Ekibaare kimwe kikaba kirumbaire aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, ahashungaine na Mikimaashi; n'ekindi aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo ahashungaine na Geeba.
Omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye yaamugarukamu ati: Kora ekikuri aha mutima kyona. Reeba ndi hamwe naiwe; oku omutima gwawe guri, n'ogwangye nikwo guri.
Yonasaani yaagira ati: Ka twambukye omuri abo bashaija, tubeeyorekye.
Ku baraatugire ngu, mube murekire, okuhitsya obu turaabashangye aho, obwo nitwija kuguma twemereire omu mwanya gwaitu; titurikwija kwinamuka ei bari.
Kwonka ku baraagire ngu, mwinamukye mwije, obwo nitwija kwinamuka; biri MUKAMA naaba abahaireyo omu mikono yaitu. Ako niko karaatubeere akamanyiso.
Batyo bombi baayeyoreka ab'omu kigo ky'Abafilistia; Abafilistia ku baabareebire, baagira bati; Reeba, Abaheburaayo nibaruga omu biina omu babaire beesherekire.

Ab'omu kigo baagambira Yonasaani n'omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye bati: Nimwinamukye, tuboorekye. Yonasaani yaagira omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye ati: Nkurata; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA yaabahayo omu mikono y'Abaisraeli.
Atyo Yonasaani yaatemba naayajura, n'omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye amuri enyima. Abafilistia baagwa omu maisho ga Yonasaani; kandi omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye yaabaita amukuratiire.
Omuri okwo kwita kw'okubanza Yonasaani n'omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye bakaita abashaija nka makumi abiri omu mwanya ogurikwingana ekicweka ky'omusiri.
Bwanyima haabaho obwoba bwingi omu rusiisira, omu ishwa n'omu bantu boona; kandi ab'omu kigo n'abanyagi bari nabo baatetema; n'ensi yaatengyeta; haabaho okutengyeta kwingi munonga.
Kandi abarinzi ba Saulo, abaabaire bari Gibea eya Benyamiini, ku baanagireyo amaisho, baareeba emitwe y'abantu neegaba ebirari.
Saulo nikwo kugambira abantu abu yaabaire aine ati; Mubare abantu, mureebe ku haraabe haine oturugiremu. Ku baaherize kubara, baashanga Yonasaani n'omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye batabarimu.
Saulo yaagira Ahiya ati: Reeta eshanduukye ya Ruhanga; ahabw'okuba omuri ebyo biro eshanduukye ya Ruhanga ekaba eri omu Baisraeli.
Saulo ku yaabaire naakigamba n'omunyamurwa, orwari orwabaire ruri omu rusiisira rw'Abafilistia rwaguma nirweyongyera; Saulo yaagira omunyamurwa ati: Ihayo omukono gwawe.
Atyo Saulo n'abantu boona abu yaabaire aine, baayeteerana, baaza omu rugamba; baashanga nibaitana bonka na rurara, buri muntu na mugyenzi we; haabaho omurabanamu muhango munonga.
Kandi Abaheburaayo, abaabaire bari hamwe n'Abafilistia obunyakare, abaagyenzire nabo omu rusiisira, nabo baagarukira Abaisraeli abaabaire bari hamwe na Saulo na Yonasaani, baakwatanisa nabo.
Kandi n'Abaisraeli boona abaabaire beesherekire omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, ku baahuriire ngu Abafilistia baahunga, baababinga babahambize.
Atyo MUKAMA yaajuna Abaisraeli eryo izooba; bwanyima orugamba rwagumizamu, rwahika seeri ya Besaveeni.
Abantu boona baahika aha kibira ekyabaire kirimu obwoki ahansi;
ku baakitaahiremu, baashanga obwoki nibushononoka; kwonka tihaagira owaayekoza orukumu omu kanwa; ahakuba bakaba nibatiina egyo ndahiro.

Kwonka Yonasaani we, obu ishe yaabaire naarahiza abantu, taramuhuriire. N'ahabw'ekyo yaihayo enkoni ei yaabaire akwaitse omu ngaro, yaacumita eifundo ryayo omu ngabo y'obwoki, yaakoza orukumu rwe omu kanwa, amaisho ge gaahweza.
Omwe ahari abo bantu yaamugira ati: Sho yaarahiriza kimwe abantu, naagira ati: Omuntu weena oraagire eki yaatamira eri izooba akyeenwe. Kandi abantu bakaba nibagwa enshazi.
Yonasaani yaagira ati: Tata ka yaakabya ensi; mbwenu nimureebe amaisho gangye ku gaahweza ahabw'okurigatsa ahari aka kooki.
Kuri noogira ngu abantu eri izooba baikirizibwa kurya aha minyago y'abazigu baabo, ei bashangireyo, tibaakubaire gye okukiraho? Ahakuba tihakabaireho kwita kwingi omu Bafilistia.
Eryo izooba baabinga Abafilistia okuruga Mikimaashi okuhika Ayalooni. Abantu baagwa enshazi munonga;
baayeroha omu minyago, baakwata entaama n'ente n'enyana, baaziregyeza ahansi; baaziriirirana n'eshagama yaazo.
Haabaho abaabigambira Saulo bati: Reeba, abantu nibacumura ahari MUKAMA, ahabw'okuba nibarya enyama n'eshagama yaayo. Yaabagira ati: Mwagobya; mbwenu mukumbagaze eibaare rihango, murindeetere aha.

Bwanyima Saulo yaagira ati: Murabe omu bantu boona, mubagire muti: Buri muntu areete ente ye, nari entaama ye, muziitire aha, muzirye; kandi mutacumura ahari MUKAMA, mukarya eshagama. Ekyo kiro buri muntu yaareeta ente ye, baaziitira aho.
Saulo yaayombekyera MUKAMA eitambiro; eryo niryo itambiro ry'okubanza eri yaayombekyeire MUKAMA.
Saulo yaayehanuuza ahari Ruhanga naagira ati: Nshuume nkurate Abafilistia? Noija kubahayo omu mikono y'Abaisraeli? Kwonka MUKAMA tiyaamugarukamu ekyo kiro.
Saulo nikwo kugira ati: Imwe mwena abakuru b'abantu, nimwirire aha, mwetegyereze mureebe eki kibi kyakorwa eri izooba ahu kiri;
ahakuba nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, Omujuni wa Israeli, n'obu kyakuba kiri omuri mutabani wangye Yonasaani, buzimazima naija kwitwa. Kwonka tihaabaho n'omwe omu bantu boona owaamugarukamu.
Bwanyima yaagambira Abaisraeli boona ati: Muze aha rubaju rumwe, nyowe na mutabani wangye Yonasaani tuze aha rundi. Abantu baagarukamu Saulo bati: Kora eki orikusiima.

N'ahabw'ekyo Saulo yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, ahabw'enki tiwaagarukamu omwiru waawe eri izooba? Ku ruraabe ruri orubanja rwangye nari orwa mutabani wangye Yonasaani, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, oyorekye ekihikire; kwonka ku ruraabe ruri orw'abantu baawe Israeli, otuhe Tumimu. Haakwatwa Yonasaani na Saulo, abantu baakira.
Saulo yaagaruka yaagira ati: Teera enteenyu ahariinye na mutabani wangye Yonasaani. Enteenyu yaakwata Yonasaani.

Saulo nikwo kugira Yonasaani ati: Ngambira eki waakora. Yonasaani yaamugira ati: N'ekya buzima naakoza eifundo ry'enkoni, ei naaba nyine omu ngaro, omu bwoki, naarigatsaho. Reeba ndi aha, nshemereire kufa.
Saulo yaagira ati: Yonasaani, buzimazima noija kufa; ku oraabe otafiire, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.

Kwonka abantu baagira Saulo bati: Hoona Yonasaani, oreetsire okujunwa okurikwingana kuti omuri Israeli, afe? Nikikabure! Niturahira MUKAMA otahwaho, tiharikwija kugira kashokye na kamwe ak'aha mutwe gwe akaagwa ahansi; ahabw'okuba eri izooba yaakora na Ruhanga. Okwo nikwo abantu baakirize Yonasaani, atafe.
Okuruga aho Saulo yaarekyeraho kukurata Abafilistia; n'Abafilistia baagaruka owaabo.
Saulo ku yaaherize kuza aha ngoma omuri Israeli, yaarwana n'abazigu be boona embaju zoona, Abamoabu, Abaamoni, Abanyaedomu, abagabe ba Zooba n'Abafilistia; ahu yaabaire aza hoona, abasingura.
Yaarwana n'obumanzi, yaasingura Abaamaleki, yaiha Abaisraeli omu mikono y'abaabaire babanyagire.
Eiziina rya muka Saulo akaba naayetwa Ahinoamu, muhara wa Ahimaazi; eiziina ry'omukuru w'engabo ze akaba naayetwa Abuneeri, mutabani wa Neeri, ishento wa Saulo;
Kiishi akaba ari ishe wa Saulo, na Neeri, ishe wa Abuneeri, akaba ari mwene Abieli.
Kandi Samueli akagira Saulo ati: MUKAMA akantuma kukushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli; n'ahabw'ekyo hati hurira ebi MUKAMA arikukugambira.
MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Nyijukire oku Abaamaleki baagizire Abaisraeli, obu baabatanga omu muhanda nibaruga Misri.
Mbwenu irooko orwanise Abaamaleki, ocwekyerereze kimwe ebi baine byona, otabasaasira, kureka oite abashaija n'abakazi, abeereere n'abarikwonka, ente n'entaama, engamira n'endogoya.
Saulo yaayeta abantu, yaababarira Telaimu, abarikugyendesa ebigyere baaba obusiriira bubiri, n'Abayuda baaba kakumi.
Saulo yaahika aha rurembo rw'Abaamaleki, yaabagwera omu ruhanga.

Kandi Saulo yaagira aba Keeni ati: Mushuume murugye omu Baamaleki, ntakaabacwekyereza nabo; ahabw'okuba mukagirira Abaisraeli boona embabazi, obu baabaire nibaruga Misri. N'ahabw'ekyo aba Keeni baaruga omu Baamaleki.
Saulo yaabinga Abaamaleki okuruga Havila okuhika Shuuri, ahashungaine na Misri;
yaakwata Agagi omugabe w'Abaamaleki ahuriire, kandi yaacwekyerereza kimwe abantu boona na rurara.

Kwonka Saulo n'abantu baasaasira Agagi n'entaama n'ente n'abaana b'entaama ebirikukira oburungi kandi ebigomokire, n'ebintu byona ebirungi; tibaabicwekyerereza kimwe; kwonka byona ebirikugaywa kandi ebitaine mugasho baabicwekyerereza kimwe.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Samueli nikigira kiti:
Niinyefuuza eki naateereireho Saulo kuba omugabe; ahabw'okuba agarukire enyima, yaayanga kunkuratira, kandi tiyaakora bi naamuragiire. Samueli yaaguubwa kubi; yaaraara naatakira MUKAMA.
Samueli yaaguruka kare omu kasheeshe kubugana Saulo. Baamugira bati: Saulo ahikire Karumeeli, yaayebyarirayo eibaare ry'ekiijutsyo, yaakuba yaagumizamu, yaashuuma Gilugaali.
Samueli yaija ahari Saulo; Saulo yaamugira ati: MUKAMA akuhe omugisha! Nkozire eki MUKAMA andagiire.
Samueli yaamubuuza ati: Beitu shi, okwo kujuga kw'entaama n'okw'ente oku ndikuhurira n'okw'enki?
Onu ati: N'ezi baihire omu Baamaleki; ahakuba abantu basaasiire entaama n'ente ezirikukira oburungi, kuzitambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ebitambo; ebindi ebitsigaireho tubicwekyerereize kimwe.
Samueli yaagira Saulo ati: Ba orekire, nkugambire eki MUKAMA araire angambiire. Onu ati: Gamba.
Samueli yaagira ati: N'obu oraabe waabaire nooyegaya ngu ori muto, toratoorainwe kuba omutegyeki w'enganda za Israeli? Omanye ku MUKAMA niwe yaakushukireho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli.
Mbwenu akutumire naagira ati: Gyenda ocwekyerereze kimwe abasiisi Abaamaleki, orwane nabo okuhitsya obu oraabamareho.
N'enki ekikuzibiire kworobera eiraka rya MUKAMA, okagwa aha minyago n'enda, okakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA?
Saulo yaagira Samueli ati: Okworoba kwo nyorobeire MUKAMA, naaza ei MUKAMA antumire, naareeta Agagi omugabe w'Abaamaleki, kandi naacwekyerereza kimwe Abaamaleki;
kwonka abantu batwaire eminyago y'entaama n'ente, ebirikukira oburungi omu bibaire biri eby'okucwekyerezibwa, kubitambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe omuri Gilugaali.

Samueli yaamugarukamu ati: Noogira ngu MUKAMA naashemerererwa ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo, nk'oku ashemerererwa okworobera eiraka rye? Manya okworoba kukira ebitambo, n'okuhurira kukira ebishaju by'empaya z'entaama.
Kwonka obugomi ni nk'ekibi ky'oburogo, n'obugangaazi ni nk'okuramya ebishushani na baateraafi. Nk'oku oyangire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, nawe ayangire ku oguma aha ngoma.
Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, nsaasira ekibi kyangye, oikirize ogyende naanye, mbone kuramya MUKAMA.
Samueli yaagira Saulo ati: Tindikwija kugarukayo naiwe, ahabw'okuba oyangire ekigambo kya MUKAMA; nawe yaayanga ku oba omugabe wa Israeli.
Samueli ku yaabaire naakihinduka kugyenda, Saulo yaakwata omukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye, kyataaguka.
Samueli yaamugira ati: Eri izooba MUKAMA yaakutaaguraho obugabe bwa Israeli, yaabuha mutaahi waawe orikukukira oburungi.
Kandi Maani ga Israeli tabeiha, n'obu kwakuba okwegarukamu; ahabw'okuba ti muntu ngu ayegarukyemu.

Bwanyima Saulo yaagira ati: Ncumwire; kwonka hati ninkweshengyereza mpa ekitiinisa omu maisho g'abakuru b'abantu bangye n'omu maisho ga Israeli yoona, ogyende naanye, mbone kuramya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Atyo Samueli yaahinduka, yaakurata Saulo; Saulo yaaramya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Samueli yaagira ati: Mundeetere aha Agagi, omugabe w'Abaamaleki. Agagi yaija ahu ari naanyimbanyimba; yaagira ati: Buzimazima obushaarizi bw'okufa bwahweire.
Samueli yaagira ati: Nk'oku rurara yaawe yaahindwire abakazi encwekye, nikwo na nyoko yaaza kuhinduka encwekye omu bakazi. Samueli yaatemagurira Agagi omu maisho ga MUKAMA Gilugaali.
Bwanyima Samueli yaaza Raama, na Saulo yainamuka yaaza owe Gibea eya Saulo.
Okuruga obwo Samueli tiyaagaruka kwija kureeba Saulo okuhitsya obu yaafire; kwonka yaaguma naamusaasibwa; kandi MUKAMA yaayefuuza eki yaahinduriire Saulo omugabe wa Israeli.

Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Noija kuhitsya hi okusaasibwa Saulo, haza nyowe mmwangire kuba omugabe wa Israeli? Ijuza eihembe ryawe amajuta, oije nkutume ahari Yese owa Betelehemu; ahakuba nyeboneire omugabe omu batabani.
Samueli yaagira ati: Nimbaasa nta kugyenda? Saulo ku araakihurire, naija kuunyita. MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Twara enyana y'eruutsi; ku oraahikyeyo, ogire oti: Nyizire kutambira MUKAMA ekitambo.
Kandi oyete na Yese aije ahari okwo kutamba; naanye niinyija kukworeka oku oraatwaze, onshukire amajuta ahari ogwo ou ndaakugambire.
Samueli yaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiira, yaaza Betelehemu. Ku yaahikireyo, abakuru b'orwo rurembo baija kumubugana nibatetema; baamubuuza bati: Beitu waahuutwa ki? Ni buhooro?
Nawe yaabagira ati: Ni buhooro. Nyizire kutambira MUKAMA ebitambo. Mweyeze, mwije tugyendane aha kitambo. Kandi yaayeza Yese n'abatabani, nabo yaabeeta kwija aha kitambo.
Ku baizire, yaareeba Eliabu, yaateekateeka ati: Buzimazima ou MUKAMA arikwenda kushukaho amajuta niwe ogu ori omu maisho ge.
