Kwonka MUKAMA yaagira Samueli ati: Otareeba oku arikushusha nari ekyemerero kye; ahakuba ogwo tiwe ndikwenda; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA tareeba nk'oku abantu bareeba; abantu bareeba emireebekyere y'aharuguru, kwonka MUKAMA areeba omutima.
Bwanyima Yese yaayeta Abinadabu, yaamurabya omu maisho ga Samueli. Samueli yaagira ati: N'ogu tiwe MUKAMA atooraine.
Yese yaagaruka yaarabyaho Shaama. Nabwo Samueli yaagira ati: N'ogu nawe tiwe MUKAMA atooraine.
Atyo Yese yaarabyaho abatabani, baahika mushanju omu maisho ga Samueli; Samueli yaamugira ati: Omuri aba tiharimu u MUKAMA atooraine.

Samueli yaabuuza Yese ati: Abaana baawe boona bari aha? Yaamugarukamu ati: Haatsigarayo omuto, kwonka ariisize entaama. Samueli yaagira Yese ati: Tuma bamureete; ahakuba titurikwija kushutama atakahikire aha.
Yaatuma, baamureeta. Omwana ogwo akaba naayera, aine ahamaisho harungi, kandi ari murungi omu kureebwa. MUKAMA yaagira ati: Imuka omushukyeho amajuta; niwe ogu.
Samueli yaakwata eihembe ry'amajuta, yaagamushukiraho omu maisho ga bakuru be; okwiha obwo Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaija ahari Daudi n'amaani, yaamugumaho. Bwanyima Samueli yaimuka, yaagaruka Raama.
Abaheereza ba Saulo baamugira bati: Reeba omwoyo mubi ogurugire ahari Ruhanga nigukwita kubi.

Mukama waitu, ragiira abairu baawe abakuri omumaisho, bakusherurire omuntu orikumanya kuteera gye enanga; bwanyima omwoyo mubi ogurikuruga ahari Ruhanga ku guraagume gwakwijaho, agikuteerere, obe gye.
Saulo nikwo kugambira abaheereza be ati: Munsherurire omuntu orikumanya kuteera gye enanga, mumundeetere.

Omutsigazi omwe yaamugira ati: Nyowe ndeebire mutabani wa Yese owa Betelehemu, naamanya kuteera gye enanga, n'omushaija w'amaani emanzi, orikumanya eby'okurwana, otarikugambira eryo, omuntu murungi omu kureebwa; kandi MUKAMA ari hamwe nawe.
N'ahabw'ekyo Saulo yaatuma ahari Yese naagira ati: Nyoherereza mutabani waawe Daudi, omuriisa w'entaama.
Yese yaareeta endogoya, yaagyekoreza emigaati n'efureebe ya viinyo, n'omwana gw'embuzi, yaabitwekyera Saulo, byatwarwa Daudi omutabani.
Daudi ku yaahikire Saulo, yaatandika kumuheereza; Saulo yaamukunda munonga, yaamugira omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye.
Saulo yaagaruka yaatuma ahari Yese ati: Ninkushaba oikirize Daudi agume nampeereza; ahabw'okuba atungire obuganzi ahariinye.
Okuruga aho, omwoyo mubi ogwarugire ahari Ruhanga ku gwabaire gwija ahari Saulo, Daudi akwata enanga, agiteera; Saulo aikaikana, aba gye, ogwo mwoyo mubi gumurugaho.
Omu bunaku obwo Abafilistia bakateerana engabo zaabo kurwana; baateeranira Sooko eya Yuda, baateera orusiisira Efesi-damimu, ahagati ya Sooko na Azeka.
Saulo n'Abaisraeli nabo baateerana, baateera orusiisira omu ruhanga rwa Ela, baatenga orugamba kurwana n'Abafilistia.
Abafilistia baayemerera aha kibungo seeri, n'Abaisraeli baayemerera seenu aha kindi; oruhanga rubari ahagati.
Bwanyima omu rusiisira rw'Abafilistia haarugamu emanzi rugambwa, orikwetwa Goliasi owa Gaasi; oburaingwa bwe bukaba buri mikono mukaaga n'ekita;
akaba ajwaire enkofiira y'omuringa aha mutwe, n'eky'okujwara ky'ekyoma, oburemeezi bwakyo shekeli z'omuringa enkumi itaano;
aha maguru ajwaireho ebyoma by'okukingira emirundi, aine akacumu k'omuringa ahagati y'amabega ge;
orubango rw'eicumu rye ruri nk'empimbi ei barukiraho emyenda; okuremeera kw'ekyogi kyaryo ziri shekeli z'ekyoma magana mukaaga, kandi omukwatsi w'engabo ye amwebembeire.

Yaija yaayemerera, yaagambira amahe ga Israeli n'eiraka rihango, ati: Mbwenu mweruhiize ki kwija kutenga orugamba? Tindi Omufilistia? Naimwe timuri engabo za Saulo? Mwetooranire omushaija, ashuume tubugaabugane.
Ku arandwanise, yaanyita, nitwija kuba abairu baanyu; kwonka ku ndamusingure, naamwita, naimwe nimwija kuba abairu baitu, nimutukorera.
Omufilistia yaagaruka yaagira ati: Nimpiga amahe ga Israeli eri izooba; nimumpe omushaija, turwane.
Saulo n'Abaisraeli boona ku baahuriire ebigambo by'ogwo Mufilistia, baahahaara, baatiina munonga.
Abatabani abakuru bashatu bakaba bahurwire na Saulo; amaziina g'abo batabani bonshatu gakaba gari aga; ow'omujigaijo Eliabu, ow'omushubiro Abinadabu, n'owa kashatu Shaama.
Daudi akaba ari muto waabo boona, kandi bakuru be abo bonshatu nibo baabaire bahurwire na Saulo.
Kwonka Daudi akaba aza owa Saulo, kandi agaruka Betelehemu kuriisa entaama za ishe.
Kandi ogwo Mufilistia akaba aija buri kasheeshe na buri mwabazyo, abeeringiita omumaisho, okumara ebiro makumi ana.
Eizooba rimwe Yese akagira Daudi omutabani ati: Irooko ogyemurire bakuru baawe eefa y'engano zikarangire n'egi migaati ikumi, obibatwarire juba omu rusiisira;
kandi ezi ncumate ikumi za ciizi ozitwarire omukuru w'engabo rukumi ezi barimu; oreebe bakuru baawe oku bari, haza ondeetere amakuru agarikubarugaho.
Omu bunaku obwo Saulo n'abo bashaija n'Abaisraeli boona bakaba bari omu ruhita rwa Ela nibarwana n'Abafilistia.

Daudi yaaguruka kare omu kasheeshe, entaama yaazitsigira omurinzi, yaakwata ebyo bintu, yaagyenda nk'oku Yese amuragiire; yaahikira ahu baabaire beemereize ebigaari, yaashanga engabo nizihiga, nizishohora kurwana.
Abaisraeli n'Abafilistia baatenga orugamba, engabo zaasyamirana n'ezindi.
Daudi yaakwatsa omurinzi w'eby'orugamba embintu bye, yairuka, yaayeroha omu ngabo, yaahika bakuru be, yaabaramutsya.
Ku yaabaire naakigaaniira nabo, egyo manzi rugambwa, Omufilistia wa Gaasi orikwetwa Goliasi, yaasyoka omu ngabo z'Abafilistia, yaatandika kuhiga nk'oku abaire naahiga; Daudi yaabihurira.
Abaisraeli boona, ku baareebire ogwo mushaija, baamuhunga; baatiina munonga.

Abaisraeli baagira bati: Ebyo ogwo mushaija waasyokayo mwamureeba? Buzimazima yaija kuhiga Israeli; omuntu oraamwite, omugabe naija kumutungisa munonga, amuhingire muhara we, kandi ahe omuryango gwa ishe obusingye omuri Israeli.

Bwanyima Daudi yaabuuza abashaija abaabaire bamwemereire aha rubaju ati: Oraite ogwo Mufilistia, yaiha aha Baisraeli ekijumo, naija kukorerwa ki? Beitu shi, oriya Mufilistia otashazirwe niwe oha kwehanga kuhiga amahe ga Ruhanga ohuriire?
Abantu baamugarukamu nk'ebi ab'okubanza baagamba, bati: Oraamwite nikwo araakorewe atyo.
Daudi yaamugarukamu ati: Mbwenu naashobya ki? Noogira ngu tiinyine kyandeeta?
Yaamuteera amabega, yaahindukira ondiijo, nawe yaamubuuza nk'ebyo; abantu baamugarukamu nk'okubanza.
Abantu ku baahuriire ebi Daudi yaagamba, baagaruka baabigambira omu maisho ga Saulo; Saulo yaamutuma.
Daudi yaagira Saulo ati: Hatagira owaahahaaza omutima ahabw'ogwo Mufilistia; omwiru waawe yaaza kurwana nawe.
Saulo yaagira Daudi ati: Torikubaasa kuturukirira ogwo Mufilistia kurwana nawe, ahabw'okuba okiri muto, kandi we n'omushaija omanyiire engamba okwiha omu buto.
Daudi yaagarukamu Saulo ati: Nyowe, omwiru waawe, nkaba ndiisa entaama za tata; ku haabaire haija entare nari edubu, yaakwata omwana gw'entaama omu busyo,
nkaba ngikurata, ngiteera, ngugiiha omu kanwa; ekinyijaijana, ngikwata akareju, ngiteera, ngiita.
Omwiru waawe akaita entare n'edubu; n'Omufilistia ogwo otashazirwe naija kuba nk'emwe aharizo, ahabw'okuba ahigire amahe ga Ruhanga ohuriire.
Daudi yaagaruka yaagira ati: MUKAMA owaanyihire omu byara by'entare n'omu byara by'edubu, naija kunjuna n'omu mikono y'ogwo Mufilistia. Saulo yaagira Daudi ati: Irooko, MUKAMA agume naiwe.
Bwanyima Saulo yaihayo ebijwaro bye eby'okurwanisa, yaabijweka Daudi; yaamuta enkofiira y'omuringa aha mutwe, yaamujweka ekooti y'ekyoma;

Daudi yaahagatirira rurara ahari ebyo bijwaro. Yaateeraho kugyenda, byayanga; ahakuba akaba atabimanyiire. Daudi yaagira Saulo ati: Tindikubaasa kugyenda njwaire ebi; ahakuba timbimanyiire. Atyo Daudi yaabijuura.

Yaakwata enkoni ye omu ngaro, yaayetooranira amabaare ataano omu kagyera, yaagata omu kashaho k'omunda ak'omu furebe y'omuriisa ei yaabaire aine; kandi akaba aine enjungu ye omu ngaro; yairira haihi Omufilistia.
Omufilistia nawe yaija, yairira haihi Daudi, omukwatsi w'engabo ye amwebembeire.
Omufilistia ku yaizire naamagamaga, yaareeba Daudi, yaamugaya; ahakuba akaba ari omutsigazi muto, orikwera, oine ahamaisho harungi.
Omufilistia yaagira Daudi ati: Obu orikumpururira n'enkoni, onyetsire embwa? Yaamukyeenesa baaruhanga be.
Yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Ija nkubaagire amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba.
Daudi yaagira Omufilistia ati: Wampururira na rurara n'eicumu n'akacumu; kwonka nyowe naija omu iziina rya MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga w'engabo za Israeli, ezi ohigire.

Eri izooba MUKAMA naakuhayo omu mikono yangye, ninkuteera, noogwa, ninkucwaho omutwe; kandi eri izooba niinyija kugaburira amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba emitumbi y'engabo z'Abafilistia, haza ensi yoona neemanya ku habaho Ruhanga omuri Israeli,
kandi n'omutwe gwona oguri aha nigumanya ku MUKAMA atajunisa rurara na icumu; ahabw'okuba orugamba oru n'orwa MUKAMA, kandi naija kubahayo omu mikono yaitu.
Omufilistia ku yaarugire ahu yaabaire ari, yaija kubugaabugana na Daudi, Daudi yaija nairuka agyemire ahu baabaire batengire orugamba kubugaabugana n'ogwo Mufilistia.
Yaata omukono gwe omu furebe, yaihamu eibaare, yaarirekyera, yaariteera Omufilistia omu buso, ryahweramu, yaagwa ajuumaire.
Okwo nikwo Daudi yaasingwize Omufilistia eibaare ry'enjungu, akamuteera, akamwita; kwonka Daudi akaba ataine rurara mu ngaro.
Daudi yairuka, yaaza aha Mufilistia, yaamwemereraho, yaakwata rurara ye, yaagisyora omu kyobati kyayo, yaagimwitsa, yaamucwaho omutwe. Abafilistia ku baareebire emanzi yaabo yaafa, baahunga.

Abaisraeli n'Abayuda baimuka, baateera akaari, baabinga Abafilistia okuhika Gaasi n'aha marembo ga Ekurooni; emputa z'Abafilistia zaagyenda nizigwa aha muhanda ogurikuruga Sharaimu okuhika Gaasi na Ekurooni.
Bwanyima Abaisraeli baarekyera aho kubinga Abafilistia, baagaruka, baanyaga orusiisira rwabo.
Daudi yaatwara omutwe gw'Omufilistia, yaaguhitsya Yerusaalemu; kwonka eby'okurwanisa bye yaabita omu ihema rye.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Irooko obuuririze ishe w'ogu mwojo.
Kandi Daudi ku yaatabaarukire ati naaruga kwita Omufilistia, Abuneeri yaamutwara omu maisho ga Saulo, aine omutwe gw'Omufilistia omu ngaro.
Saulo yaamubuuza ati: Ori mwene oha, mutsigazi 'we? Daudi yaagarukamu ati: Ndi mwene Yese omwiru waawe owa Betelehemu.
Eryo izooba Saulo yaatwara Daudi owe, tiyaamwikiriza bundi kugaruka owa ishe.
Bwanyima Yonasaani yaaragaana na Daudi endagaano, ahakuba akamukunda nk'oku ayekunda.
Yonasaani yaayejuura omunagiro ogu yaabaire ajwaire, yaaguha Daudi, n'eby'okurwanisa bye, nangwa na rurara ye n'obuta bwe n'orukoba rwe nabyo yaabimuha.
Daudi akaba aza ei Saulo yaabaire amutuma yoona; kandi akoresa obwengye. N'ahabw'ekyo Saulo yaamugira omukuru w'engabo ze, abantu boona baakisiima, nangwa n'abagaragwa ba Saulo baakisiima.
Omu kweshongora, abo bakazi baikirizana nibagira bati:
Saulo aitsire enkumi,
Daudi yaita obukumi.
Okuruga obwo Saulo yaaguma naareeba Daudi eriisho ribi.
Ku bwaseesire, omwoyo mubi ogwarugire ahari Ruhanga gwaza ahari Saulo n'amaani, yaasharira omu nju ye; obwo Daudi akaba naateera enanga nk'obutoosha; kandi Saulo akaba aine eicumu omu ngaro.
Saulo yaarirekyera; ahakuba akateekateeka ati: Niinyija kucumita Daudi, eicumu ryogyemu rikwate ekisiika. Daudi yaamweshumba kabiri.
Nikyo Saulo yaamweihiireho, akamugira omukuru w'omutwe gw'engabo rukumi, Daudi akaguma naazeebembera omu kuhurura, kandi naatabaaruka nazo.
Kandi Daudi yaaguma naakoresa obwengye omu mitwarize ye yoona; MUKAMA yaaguma nawe.
Saulo ku yaareebire aine obwengye bwingi omu mitwarize ye, yaamutiina.
Kwonka Abaisraeli n'Abayuda boona baamukunda, ahakuba akaba abeebembera omu kuhurura, kandi n'omu kutabaaruka.
Daudi yaagira Saulo ati: Mbwenu nyowe niinye oha, n'abaitu nibo baahi, n'omuryango gwa tata omuri Israeli nigwo guuha, nyowe okuba mukwe w'omugabe?
Kwonka obunaku ku bwahikire, Merabu muhara wa Saulo, owaabaire ari ow'okuhingirwa Daudi, baamuhingira Adurieli owa Mehola.
Bwanyima Mikaali muhara wa Saulo yaarigira Daudi; ku baakigambiire Saulo, kyamushemeza;
yaagira ati: Niinyija kumumuha, amubeere omutego, Abafilistia bamurwanise. Nikyo Saulo yaagiriire Daudi obwa kabiri, ati: Mbwenu hati noija kuba mukwe wangye.

Saulo nikwo kugambira abagaragwa be ati: Mugaaniire na Daudi omu mubonano, mumugire muti: Manya, omugabe naakusiima munonga, n'abagaragwa be boona nibakukunda; n'ahabw'ekyo ikiriza obe mukwe w'omugabe.
Abagaragwa ba Saulo baagambira Daudi ebyo bigambo. Daudi yaagira ati: Imwe nimukyeta ekintu kikye okuba mukwe w'omugabe; haza ndi omwana w'omworo, kandi otaine kitiinisa?
Bwanyima abagaragwa ba Saulo baamugambira oku Daudi agizire.

Saulo yaagira ati: Oku mube nikwo mwagira Daudi muti: Omugabe tarikwenda njugano, kureka ebishushu igana ebishazirwe aha Bafilistia, abone kuhoora abazigu be. Kwonka Saulo akateekateeka atyo, ngu amwitse Abafilistia.
Abagaragwa be ku baaherize kugambira Daudi ebyo bigambo, Daudi yaasiima munonga kuba mukwe w'omugabe.

Ebiro ku byabaire bitakahingwireho, Daudi yaimuka n'engabo ze, baahurura, baita Abafilistia magana abiri; Daudi yaatabaaruka n'ebyo bishushu byabo, baabitwarira omugabe byona, ngu abone kuba mukwe w'omugabe. Atyo Saulo yaamuhingira muhara we Mikaali.
Kwonka Saulo ku yaabireebire, yaamanya ku MUKAMA ari hamwe na Daudi, kandi ku Abaisraeli boona barikumukunda,
yaayeyongyera kumutiina. Okuruga aho Saulo yaaguma ari omuzigu wa Daudi ebiro byona.
Bwanyima abategyeki b'Abafilistia baahurura kubarwanisa; ku baabaire bahurura, Daudi arwana gye okukira abagaragwa ba Saulo boona; n'ahabw'ekyo eiziina rye ryarangaanwa.

Kwonka Yonasaani mwene Saulo akaba naakunda Daudi munonga; mbwenu Yonasaani yaagira Daudi ati: Tata Saulo naayenda kukwita; n'ahabw'ekyo omu kasheeshe oyerinde, oyesherekye omu mwanya gwekiikire, ogumeyo;
naanye niinyija kushohora, nyemerere aha rubaju rwa tata omu ishwa ahu oraabe ori, ngaaniire nawe aha byawe; ku ndaagire eki naareeba, niinyija kukikugambira.
Ku bwaseesire, Yonasaani yaagamba gye Daudi ahari Saulo ishe, naamugira ati: Nyakusinga, otakora ekibi aha mwiru waawe Daudi, ahabw'okuba takakucumurahoga, kureka ebi akukorera byona ni birungi;

ahakuba akooga amagara, yaita Omufilistia, MUKAMA yaaha Abaisraeli boona obusinguzi buhango. Naiwe okakireeba, waakishemerererwa. Mbwenu ahabw'enki nooyenda kukora kubi kusheesha eshagama y'otaine rubanja, kwitira Daudi busha?
Saulo yaahurira ebi Yonasaani yaamugambira, yaarahira naagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, tariitwa.
Yonasaani yaayeta Daudi, yaamugambira ebyo byona; bwanyima Yonasaani yaagarura Daudi ahari Saulo, yaaguma omu maisho ge nk'obunyakare.
Haagaruka haabaho obweme; Daudi yaahurura, yaarwanisa Abafilistia, yaabaitamu abantu baingi munonga; baamuhunga.
Eizooba rimwe Saulo akaba ashutami omu nju ye, aine eicumu omu ngaro, Daudi naamuteerera enanga; omwoyo mubi ogwarugire ahari MUKAMA gwamwijaho;
Saulo yaateeraho kucumita Daudi eicumu, ngu rimuhamize aha kisiika; kwonka Daudi yaaryeshumba, ryacumita ekisiika; Daudi yaacwa, yaahunga.

Ekyo kiro Saulo yaatuma entumwa owa Daudi kuraara bamugwereire, ngu bamwite omu kasheeshe; Mikaali muka Daudi yaamugambira naagira ati: Ku oraabe otakirize magara gaawe eki kiro, nyencakare noija kwitwa.
Atyo Mikaali yaarabya Daudi omu dirisa, yaacwa, yaahunga.
Mikaali yaiha ekishushani kya teraafi omu mwanya gwakyo, yaakita aha kitanda, yaakishegura omushego gw'obwoshe bw'embuzi, yaakishweka emyenda.
Saulo ku yaatumire entumwa kukwata Daudi, Mikaali yaagira ati: Arwaire.
Bwanyima yaagaruka yaatuma entumwa kureeba Daudi, naagira ati: Mumuheekye aha kitanda, mumundeetere, mmwite.
Entumwa ku zaataahire omu nju, zaashanga ekishushani kya teraafi omu kitanda kishegwire omushego gw'obwoshe bw'embuzi.
Saulo ku yaabimanyire, yaagira Mikaali ati: Ombeihiire ki otyo, okareka omuzigu wangye, akacwa, akagyenda. Mikaali yaagarukamu Saulo ati: Angizire ati: Reka ngyende; mbwenu nkwitire ki?
Daudi yaacwa, yaahunga, yaashanga Samueli Raama, yaamuteekyerereza oku Saulo amugizire kwona. Yaimuka na Samueli, baaza Nayosi, baagumayo.
Bwanyima baagambira Saulo ku Daudi ari Nayosi omuri Raama.
Saulo yaatuma entumwa kukwata Daudi; ku zaareebire omutwe gwa baanabi nibaragura, na Samueli ayemereire aho nk'omukuru waabo, Omwoyo wa Ruhanga yaaza aha ntumwa za Saulo, nazo zaaragura.
Ku baakigambiire Saulo, yaatuma ezindi ntumwa, nazo zaaragura. Yaagaruka yaatuma ezindi obwa kashatu, nazo zaaragura.
Bwanyima yaayeimukira, yaaza Raama, yaahika aha iziba rihango rya Seeku, yaabuuza ati: Samueli na Daudi barahi? Baamugarukamu bati: Reeba, bari Nayosi omuri Raama.
Saulo nikwo kwimuka, akaza Nayosi omuri Raama; ku yaabaire naakigyenda, Omwoyo wa Ruhanga yaamwijaho, yaagyenda naaragura, okuhitsya obu yaahikire Nayosi omuri Raama.
Nawe yaajuura ebijwaro bye, yaaragurira omu maisho ga Samueli, yaamara eryo izooba ryona n'ekyo kiro kyona, arambiire ajwaire busha. Nikyo kigirirwa kiti: Saulo nawe ari omuri baanabi?
Daudi yaahunga, yaaruga Nayosi omuri Raama, yaija ahari Yonasaani, yaamubuuza ati: Beitu nkozire ki? Nsiisire ki? Ncumwire ki ahari sho, eki arikumpiigira kuunyita?
Nawe yaamugarukamu ati: Nikikabure! Torikwija kufa. Reeba, tata takora kintu kyona, yaaba kihango nari kikye, atakingambiire. Noogira ngu eki tata akaakinsherekyeire ki? Tikwo kiri.

Daudi yaarahira naagira ati: Sho naamanya gye ku onkunda, nikwo kugira ati: Ka Yonasaani arekye kubimanya, akashaasha; kwonka buzima ninkurahira Ruhanga otahwaho, magara gaawe, ntsigaizeyo orutambwe rumwe nfe.
Yonasaani yaagira Daudi ati: Eki omutima gwawe gurikwenda kyona, niinyija kukikukorera.

Daudi yaagira Yonasaani ati: Reeba, nyencakare okwezi nikuboneka; nkaabaire ntashemereire kubura aha by'okurya by'omugabe; kwonka mbwenu ndeka, ngyende nyesherekye omu kishaka okuhitsya aha kiro kya kashatu omu mwabazyo.
Sho ku araabe atandeebire, omugire oti: Daudi anyeshengyereize munonga ngu mmurekye ahikyeho owaabo Betelehemu; ahabw'okuba hariyo obugyenyi bw'ebitambo ebitambirwa eka yaabo yoona buri mwaka.
Ku araagire ati: Ni kirungi, biri omwiru waawe yaaba gye; kwonka ku araaguubwe kubi, noija kumanya ku amaririire kunkora kubi.
N'ahabw'ekyo girira omwiru waawe embabazi; ahakuba okaragaana n'omwiru waawe endagaano ya MUKAMA; kwonka ku ndaabe nyine eki nsiisire, onyeitire; nooyendera ki kuntwara ahari sho?
Yonasaani yaagira ati: Nikikabure! Kuri noogira ngu mbaire nimmanya ku tata amaririire kukukora kubi, tinkukugambiire?
Daudi yaabuuza ati: Beitu shi, sho ku araakugarukyemu kubi, n'oha orangambire?
Yonasaani yaagira Daudi ati: Ija tushohore, tuze omu ishwa. Baashohora, baaza omu ishwa.

Yonasaani yaagira Daudi ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli niwe kareebi. Nyencakare nk'aga magingo, nari kwosha nyencakare, ku ndaaheze kugaaniira na tata, nimmukyenguuza, naashanga akwineho ebiteekateeko birungi, niinyija kukutumaho, mbikumanyise.
Kwonka ku ndaashangye tata naayenda kukukora kubi, ntaabikugambira, nkakuraga, okeegyendera n'obusingye, MUKAMA akinture n'okukiraho. Mbwenu MUKAMA agume naiwe, nk'oku yaabaire aba na tata.
Ku ndiba nkiriho, ogume ongirire embabazi nk'eza MUKAMA, ndekye kufa;
kandi otarireka kugirira eka yangye embabazi ebiro byona. MUKAMA ku ariba naamaraho abazigu ba Daudi omu nsi,
otariikiriza eiziina rya Yonasaani kumarwaho omu nju ya Daudi. MUKAMA ahoore enzigu abazigu ba Daudi.
Yonasaani yaagaruka yaarahiza Daudi ahabwa rukundo ei yaabaire naamukunda; ahabw'okuba akaba naamukunda, nk'oku yaabaire naayekunda.
Bwanyima Yonasaani yaamugira ati: Nyencakare okwezi nikuboneka; nibaija kukusherura, obure, ahakuba omwanya gwawe nigwija kuba gurimu busha.
Aha kiro kya kashatu oshuume, ogarukye omu mwanya ogu waabaire oyesherekiremu, obu biri byabaho, ogume haihi n'eibaare rya ezeli.
Ku ndaije, niinyija kurasha emyambi eshatu aha rubaju rwaryo, nk'orikurasha ekimaasho.

Kandi reeba, niinyija kutuma omwojo, mmugire nti: Irooko osherure emyambi. Ku ndaagire ogwo mwojo nti: Reeba, emyambi eri aha rubaju rwawe orurikuhera kunu, giiheho; haza iwe obwo oije, ahakuba nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, ahariiwe nihaba hariho obusingye, hatariho kabi.
Kwonka ku ndaagire omwojo nti: Reeba, emyambi eri ahabiso yaawe; obwo oyegyendere; biri MUKAMA niwe yaakwohereza.
Kandi aha bigambo ebi ebi twagamba hamwe, reeba, MUKAMA niwe araagume ahagati yangye naiwe ebiro byona.

yaashutama aha kitebe kye haihi n'ekisiika nk'obutoosha, Yonasaani yaashutama aha rundi rubaju rw'emeeza nibareebana, Abuneeri yaashutama aha rubaju rwa Saulo, kwonka omwanya gwa Daudi gwagumamu busha.
Eryo izooba Saulo tiyaagira ki yaagamba, ahakuba akateekateeka ati: Shana hariho ekimubaireho; tashemeire; buzimazima tashemeire.

Kandi ku bwaseesire, okwezi kuraire kubonekire, nabwo omwanya gwa Daudi gwagumamu busha. Saulo yaabuuza omutabani Yonasaani ati: N'enki ekizibiire mwene Yese kwija aha by'okurya nyomwabazyo n'eri izooba?
Yonasaani yaamugarukamu ati: Daudi anyeshengyereize munonga kumwikiriza kuza Betelehemu,

naagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, reka ngyende; ahabw'okuba owaitu nibaija kutamba ebitambo omu rurembo, kandi mukuru wangye andagiire kubayo. N'ahabw'ekyo ku oraabe nongirira embabazi, reka ngyende, nze kureeba bakuru bangye. Ekyo nikyo kimuzibiire kwija aha meeza y'omugabe.

Ahonaaho Saulo yaagirira Yonasaani ekiniga kingi, yaamugira ati: Iwe omwana w'omukazi entahurira kandi omugomi, tindikumanya ku waatooraine mwene Yese kwehemura, n'okuhemura nyoko, okamukwatsa enshoni?
Omanye ngu mutabani wa Yese ku ariba akiri omuri egi nsi, torihamibwa n'obu bwakuba obugabe bwawe. N'ahabw'ekyo tuma bamundeetere; ahabw'okuba buzimazima naija kufa.
Yonasaani yaamugarukamu, ati: Beitu naitirwa ki? Acumwire ki?
Ahonaaho Saulo yaamurekyera eicumu kumwita; Yonasaani yaamanyira aho ku ishe amaririire kwita Daudi.
Yonasaani yaimuka, yaaruga aha meeza n'ekiniga kingi, yaayanga kurya eby'okurya ahari ekyo kiro kya kabiri ky'okwezi, ahabw'okuba akaguubwa kubi ahabwa Daudi, kandi n'ahabwa ishe kumuhemura.
Omu kasheeshe Yonasaani yaashohora, yaaza omu ishwa n'omwojo omu bunaku obu aragaaniise Daudi.
Yaagira ogwo mwojo we ati: Iruka otorotoore emyambi ei naaza kurasha. Omwojo ku yaabaire nairuka, onu yaarasha omwambi, yaagumurenzya.
Omwojo ku yaahikire ahu omwambi ogu Yonasaani yaarasha gwagwa, Yonasaani yaayeta omwojo, naagira ati: Omwambi tiguri ahabiso yaawe?
Yonasaani yaagaruka yaagambira omwojo ati: Rahuka, gira obwira, oteeziringa. Atyo omwojo wa Yonasaani yaatorotoora emyambi, yaagaruka ahari mukama we.
Kwonka ogwo mwojo taine ki yaamanyire, kureka Yonasaani na Daudi nibo baakimanyire.
Yonasaani yaaha omwojo we eby'okurwanisa bye, yaamugira ati: Irooko obitware omu rurembo.

Omwojo ku yaabaire yaarugaho ati, Daudi yaimuka, yaaruga aha rubaju rw'eibaare riri, yaagwa ahansi, yaajuumara, yaamwinamira kashatu; bwanyima baanywegyerana, bombi baarira, okuhitsya obu Daudi yaarengyesereize.

Bwanyima Yonasaani yaagira Daudi ati: Yegyendere n'obusingye; ahakuba twembi tukarahirana omu iziina rya MUKAMA nitugira tuti: MUKAMA aryaguma ahagati yangye naiwe, kandi n'hagati y'oruzaaro rwangye n'orwawe ebiro byona. Daudi yaimuka yaagyenda; Yonasaani yaagaruka omu rurembo.
Bwanyima Daudi yaaza Noobu owa Ahimeleki omunyamurwa; Ahimeleki yaija kumubugana naatetema, yaamubuuza ati: Ahabw'enki ori wenka, otaine muntu?

Daudi yaagarukamu Ahimeleki omunyamurwa ati: Omugabe aine eki yandagiira kukora; kandi yangira ati: Hatagira owaamanya eki naakutuma kukora, n'eki naakuragiira; kandi ndagaine n'engabo zangye z'abatsigazi ku tubugaabugana omu mwanya nanka.
Mbwenu oine eki oine? Mpa emigaati etaano nari ekindi kyona eki oine.
Omunyamurwa yaagarukamu Daudi ati: Tiinyine mugaati gw'obutoosha, kureka hariho omugaati ogweziibwe, ogu ndikubaasa kubaha, abatsigazi ku baraabe beerinzire abakazi.

Daudi yaagarukamu omunyamurwa naagira ati: Buzimazima tumazire ebiro bishatu tuzibiirwe kuhika abakazi; nyimukize orugyendo, ebintu by'abatsigazi bangye biri ebirikwera, n'obu ruraabe rubaire ruri orugyendo rw'obutoosha; mbwenu shi eri izooba tibirikukiraho kuba ebirikwera?
N'ahabw'ekyo omunyamurwa yaamuha emigaati eyeziibwe; ahakuba hakaba hatariho gundi mugaati, kureka emigaati ey'okumurikwa, eihirwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA, bakagaruraho emigaati eyaaruga kuteekwa.

Bwanyima Daudi yaabuuza Ahimeleki ati: Beitu shi aha tokaagiraho icumu nari rurara? ahakuba tindeetsire rurara yangye n'obu byakuba eby'okurwanisa byangye; ahabw'okuba omurimo gw'omugabe gubaire nigwenda obwira.

Omunyamurwa yaagira ati: Rurara eri eya Goliasi Omufilistia, ou waitiire omu ruhita rwa Ela, reeba ngigi; eri aha enyima ya efodi, eshembire omu mwenda; ku oraayende kugitwara, ogitware; ahakuba tihariho ndiijo eri aha kureka egyo. Daudi yaagira ati: Tihariho erikushushana nayo; gimpe.
Eryo izooba Daudi yaimuka, yaahungira owa Akishi omugabe wa Gaasi ahabw'okutiina Saulo.
Abagaragwa ba Akishi baamugira bati: Ogu tiwe Daudi omugabe w'eihanga? Tibaramweshongoire omu kuzina kwabo nibaikirizana bati: Saulo aitsire enkumi; Daudi yaita obukumi?
Daudi ku yaahuriire ebyo bigambo, yaabita aha mutima, yaatiina munonga Akishi omugabe wa Gaasi.
N'ahabw'ekyo yaayehindura omu maisho gaabo, yaayegwisiza eiraro omu mikono yaabo, yaaguma naaharamba enyigi z'eirembo, naitururuka orufuzi niruza omu bireju.
Akishi yaagira abagaragwa be ati: Yeimwe, timurikureeba ogu mushaija ku agwire eiraro? Mumundeetereire ki?
Nimugira ngu nkyenire abagwa-iraro, mwaza kundeetera eki kishaija kunsharira omumaisho? Eki kishaija nikiija kungiira omuka?
Omuntu weena owaabaire ari omu naku, n'owaabaire aine amabanja, n'owaabaire aine eki arikwetomboita, baateeranira ah'ari; yaaba omukuru waabo; kandi abaamweteeraniireho baahika abantu nka magana ana.
Yaabatsigira omugabe wa Moabu, baaguma nawe ebiro byona ebi Daudi yaamazire omu kigo.
Bwanyima nabi Gaadi yaagira Daudi ati: Reka kuguma omu kigo; rugamu oze omu nsi ya Yuda. Daudi nikwo kurugayo, akaza omu kibira kya Heresi.

Eizooba rimwe Saulo akaba ashutami Gibea ahansi y'omunyinya omuri Raama, aine eicumu omu ngaro, n'abagaragwa be boona beemereire bamwehinguririize. Yaahurira ku Daudi abonekire n'abashaija abu yaabaire aine.

Saulo yaabuuza abagaragwa be abamwehinguririize ati: Imwe Babenyamiini 'mwe, nimuhurire! Hari nimugira ngu mwene Yese ogwo naija kuha buri muntu omuriimwe emisiri n'emizaabibu, kandi mwena nikwo aribagira abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'ab'eigana-igana,

mwaza kuza omu naama kungomera? Tihariho n'omwe orikummanyisa ku mutabani wangye ari omu naama na mwene Yese; kandi tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe orikunsaasibwa, nari orikummanyisa ku mutabani wangye angomeseize omugaragwa kundwanisa, akangwera, nk'oku angwereire hati.
Ahonaaho Doegi Omunyaedomu, owaabaire ayemereire aha rubaju rw'abagaragwa ba Saulo, yaagira ati: Ndeebire mwene Yese naija Noobu, owa Ahimeleki mwene Ahitubu.
Ahimeleki yaamuhanuuriza ahari MUKAMA, yaamuha eby'okurya, kandi yaamuha rurara ya Goliasi Omufilistia.
Omugabe ku yaakihuriire, yaatuma Ahimeleki omunyamurwa, mwene Ahitubu, n'ab'enju ya ishe boona, abanyamurwa abaabaire bari Noobu. Boona baija aha mugabe.
Saulo yaagira ati: Hurira, iwe mwene Ahitubu! Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Gamba, Nyakusinga!
Saulo yaamugira ati: Ahabw'enki iwe na mwene Yese mungiiriire omu naama, okamuha emigaati na rurara, kandi okamuhanuuriza ahari Ruhanga, ngu aimukye kundwanisa, n'okungwera, nk'oku angwereire hati?
Ahimeleki yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Beitu omu bagaragwa baawe boona, n'oha orikwesigwa nka Daudi, mukwe w'omugabe, oshutama omu mibonano y'enaama zaawe, kandi ow'ekitiinisa omu ka yaawe?

Noogira ngu hati nibwo naatandika kumuhanuuriza ahari Ruhanga? Ngaaha! Omugabe arekye kwomesereza omwiru we ekintu kyona, n'obu baakuba ab'enju ya tata boona; ahakuba omwiru waawe taine ki arikumanya ahari ebyo byona, yaaba bingi nari bikye.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Iwe Ahimeleki, okufa kwo noija kufa, n'ab'enju ya sho boona.

Yaagaruka yaagira abarinzi abaabaire beemereire bamwehinguririize, ati: Muhindukye, mwite abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA, ahakuba nabo bakwataniise na Daudi, kandi bakamanya ku yaahungire, tibaakimmanyisa. Kwonka abagaragwa b'omugabe baayanga kugorora emikono yaabo kwita abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA.
Omugabe yaagira Doegi ati: Hinduka ogurukire abo banyamurwa, obaite. Doegi yaahinduka, yaabagurukira, yaabaita; eryo izooba yaita abantu abaabaire bajwara efodi ya kitaani makumi munaana na bataano.
Bwanyima yaacwekyereza Noobu orurembo rw'abanyamurwa na rurara; abashaija n'abakazi, abaana n'abarikwonka, ente, endogoya n'entaama ebyabaire birimu yaabiitsa rurara.
Abiasaari yaagambira Daudi ku Saulo aitsire abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA.
Daudi yaagira Abiasaari ati: Buri, obu Doegi Omunyaedomu yaabaire ariyo, nkamanyira kimwe ku arikwija kugambira Saulo. N'ahabw'ekyo ab'eka ya sho boona niinye bazizire.
Mbwenu guma naanye, otatiina; ahakuba orikumpiiga kuunyita, naiwe niwe arikukuhiiga kukwita; mbwenu obu wampikire, tokifa.
Bwanyima baagambira Daudi bati: Reeba Abafilistia nibarwanisa Keila, kandi banyaga engano z'aha mbuga zaabo.
Daudi nikwo kwehanuuza ahari MUKAMA, naabuuza ati: Mbwenu nze kuteera abo Bafilistia? MUKAMA yaagarukamu Daudi ati: Irooko, obateere, ojune aba Keila.
Kwonka abantu ba Daudi baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu obu twatiina tukiri aha omuri Yuda, ku turiza Keila kurwana n'amahe g'Abafilistia turyaba tuta?
Daudi yaagaruka yaayehanuuza ahari MUKAMA; MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Imuka oshuume Keila; ahakuba niinyija kuhayo Abafilistia omu mikono yaawe.
Daudi yaimuka n'engabo ze, baaza Keila, baarwana n'Abafilistia, baanyaga ente zaabo, baabaitamu abantu baingi munonga. Okwo nikwo Daudi yaajunire aba Keila.

Eizooba rimwe baagambira Saulo ku Daudi ari Keila. Saulo yaagira ati: Ruhanga amuhaireyo omu mikono yangye, ahakuba obu ataahire omu rurembo orwine eirembo ry'enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi, ayekingiraine omunda.
Saulo yaahuruza engabo ze zoona kushuuma Keila kugota Daudi n'abantu be.
Daudi yaamanya ku Saulo ari omu naama y'okumukora kubi, yaagira Abiasaari omunyamurwa ati: Reeta efodi.
Daudi yaashaba naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, nyowe omwiru waawe mpuriire ku Saulo arikwenda kuteera Keila, kugicwekyereza ahabwangye.

Abantu ba Keila nibaija kumpayo omu mikono ye? N'eky'amazima Saulo naija kushuuma kunu, nk'oku omwiru waawe ahuriire? MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ninkweshengyereza, manyisa omwiru waawe. MUKAMA yaagarukamu ati: Naija kushuuma.
Daudi yaagaruka yaabuuza ati: Aba Keila nibaija kumpayo n'abantu bangye omu mikono ya Saulo? MUKAMA yaagarukamu ati: Nibaija kukuhayo.
Atyo Daudi n'abantu be nka magana mukaaga baimuka, baaruga Keila, baaza hoona ahu barikubaasa. Bwanyima baagambira Saulo ku Daudi acwire, akaruga Keila, yaareka kuhurura.
Daudi yaaguma omu bigo by'omu ihamba, omu nsi y'ebibungo omu ihamba rya Ziifu. Saulo yaaguma naamusherura obutoosha, kwonka Ruhanga tiyaamuhayo mu mikono ye.
Daudi ku yaareebire Saulo aizire kumuhiiga kumwita, yaaguma omu ihamba rya Ziifu omu kibira.
Bwanyima Yonasaani mwene Saulo yaimuka, yaashanga Daudi omuri ekyo kibira, yaamugumya omuri Ruhanga.
Yaamugira ati: Otatiina; ahakuba tata Saulo tarikubona, kandi oryaba omugabe wa Israeli, naanye nkubeho owa kabiri; kandi ekyo na Saulo tata naakimanya.
Bombi baaragaana endagaano omu maisho ga MUKAMA. Daudi yaaguma omuri ekyo kibira, Yonasaani yaagaruka owe.
Mbwenu Nyakusinga, shuuma, oyemare ekikuri aha mutima; ekyaitu n'okumuhayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Saulo yaagira ati: MUKAMA abahe omugisha; ahakuba mwangirira esaasi.
Mwirooko, mwongyere kuhamya, mwetegyereze mureebe omwanya ogu ayesherekiremu, kandi mumanye n'omureebire; ahakuba nibangambira omushaija ogwo ku aba omunyabwengye.

N'ahabw'ekyo mureebe, mwetegyereze obweshereko bwe bwona, ahu ayesherekire, haza mugarukye mundeetere enkuru ehamire, naanye niinyija kugyenda naimwe; ku araabe ari omuri egyo nsi, niinyija kumusherura omu nkumi zoona ez'Abayuda.
Batyo baimuka, baaza Ziifu, baatangayo Saulo.
Omu bunaku obwo Daudi n'abashaija be bakaba bari omu ihamba rya Maoni omuri Araba, aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bwa Yeshimooni.
Saulo n'abantu be baaza kumusherura; haabaho abaagambira Daudi; n'ahabw'ekyo yaaza aha ibaare rihango ery'omu ihamba rya Maoni, yaagumayo. Saulo ku yaakihuriire, yaamukurata omuri eryo ihamba.
Saulo yaareetwa aha rubaju rumwe rw'ekibungo, na Daudi n'abantu be aha rundi; obwo Daudi akaba nairuka naahunga Saulo, ahakuba Saulo n'engabo ze bakaba nibenda kubakubira ahagati kubakwata.
Kwonka haija entumwa ahari Saulo, yaamugira eti: Rahuka ogarukye; ahakuba Abafilistia baahurura kuteera ensi yaitu.
N'ahabw'ekyo Saulo yaagarukayo, yaarereera kukurata Daudi, yaaza kurwanisa Abafilistia. Nikyo baayeteire ogwo mwanya Sela-hama-lekoosi.
Bwanyima Daudi yaarugayo, yainamuka, yaaguma omu bigo bya Enigeedi.
Saulo nikwo kutoorana engabo enkumi ishatu omuri Israeli yoona, akazitwara, akaza kusherura Daudi n'abantu be aha nkiri z'aha izaagiriro ry'enzaza.
Ku yaahikire aha ngombe z'entaama ezaabaire ziri aha rubaju rw'omuhanda, yaashangaho enyanga, yaagitaahamu kuza aha ishaazi. Kandi Daudi n'abashaija be bakaba bari hare omunda y'egyo nyanga.

Abashaija ba Daudi baamugira bati: Eri niryo izooba eri MUKAMA yaakugambiire naagira ati: Reeba, ndyahayo omuzigu waawe omu mikono yaawe, omugire nk'oku orikwenda. Bwanyima Daudi yaimuka, yaagyenda naashooba, yaashara aha mukugiro gw'omunagiro gwa Saulo.
Kwonka ku yaaherize kukora atyo, yaashinjwa omu mutima ahabw'okushara ahari ogwo munagiro;
yaagira abashaija be ati: Nikikabure nyowe okukora ntyo mukama wangye, ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta, okumubangira omukono, haza MUKAMA yaamushukireho amajuta.
Atyo Daudi yaazibira abashaija be, tiyaabaikiriza kwita Saulo. Bwanyima Saulo yaimuka, yaaruga omu nyanga, yaagyenda.
Bwanyima Daudi nawe yaimuka, yaaruga omu nyanga, yaayeta Saulo naagira ati: Nyakusinga mukama wangye. Saulo ku yaagarwire amaisho enyima, Daudi yainama, yaamutangirira.
Daudi yaabuuza Saulo ati: Ahabw'enki noohurira ebi abantu barikukugambira ngu, Daudi naayenda kukukora kubi?

Mbwenu tiwaayereebera ku MUKAMA yaaba akuhaireyo omu mikono yangye eri izooba, obu waaba ori omu nyanga? Nangwa hariho abamwe abangambira kukwita, kwonka nyowe naakusaasira, naagira nti: Tindikwija kugorora mukono gwangye ahari mukama wangye, ahakuba niwe MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta.

Kandi Taata, reeba omukugiro gw'omunagiro gwawe; nk'oku naashara omukugiro gw'omunagiro gwawe, ntakwite, ekyo kikumanyise kandi oreebe ku hatariho kibi nari obugomi omuriinye; kandi ku ntakakucumurahoga, n'obu oraabe otuura noohiiga amagara gangye kugaihaho.
MUKAMA abe niwe yaatucwera orubanja twembi, kandi abe niwe yaakumpoorera; kwonka omukono gwangye gurekye kuba nigwo gwakwita.
Nk'oku enfumu y'aba kare egira eti, Ebibi biruga omu babi; kwonka omukono gwangye tigurikukoraho.
Beitu omugabe wa Israeli aizire kuteera oha? Ou ohiigire n'oha? Ohiigire embwa efiire, ohiigire omura.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA abe omuramuzi waitu twembi, atucwere orubanja, areebe, antonganire, akunjune.
Daudi ku yaaherize kugambira Saulo ebigambo ebyo, Saulo yaagira ati: Mwana wangye Daudi, eryo n'eiraka ryawe? Saulo yaayeha eboroogo, yaarira.
Yaagaruka yaagira Daudi ati: Wankiza okuhikiirira; ahakuba waanyihura ebirungi, haza nyowe nkwihwire ebibi.
Kandi eri izooba waayoreka butunu ku wankora gye, ahabw'okuba tiwaanyita n'obu MUKAMA yampayo omu mikono yaawe.
Noogira ngu omuntu akaareeba omuzigu we, amureka, agyenda? N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA akuzimuurire ebirungi ahabw'eki wankorera eri izooba.
Kandi reeba, hati nimmanya ku otaribura kuba omugabe, n'obugabe bwa Israeli ku burihamibwa omu mikono yaawe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndahira MUKAMA ku otaricwekyereza ruzaaro rwangye naarugaho, kandi ku otarimaraho iziina ryangye omu nju ya tata.
Daudi yaamurahira. Saulo yaagaruka owe; kwonka Daudi yainamuka yaagaruka omu kigo n'abantu be.

Omuri Maoni hakaba harimu omushaija, ou amatungo ge gaabaire gari Karumeeli; akaba ari omutungi munonga, aine entama enkumi ishatu, n'embuzi rukumi; omuri obwo bunaku akaba naakyemurira ebyoya by'entaama ze Karumeeli.

Ogwo mushaija akaba naayetwa Nabali, n'eiziina ry'omukazi we ari Abigaili. Ogwo mukazi akaba ari omukazi orikwetegyereza, kandi murungi; kwonka iba akaba ari omunyamwaga, aine emicwe mibi; kandi akaba ari ow'omu muryango gwa Kalebu.
Daudi ku yaabaire akiri omu ihamba, yaahurira ngu Nabali naakyemura ebyoya by'entaama ze.
Daudi yaatuma abatsigazi ikumi, yaabagira ati: Mwinamukye Karumeeli, muze owa Nabali, mumundamukize;
mugire ogwo mutungi muti: Obusingye bugume ahariiwe, n'aha ka yaawe, n'ahari byona ebi oine.
Mpuriire ku oine abarikukyemura ebyoya; kandi ebi biro tubaire turi hamwe n'abariisa baawe; omwanya gwona ogu baamazire Karumeeli, titwine ki tubaitsize, kandi tibaine kintu kyona eki baafeereirwe.

Buuza abatsigazi baawe, nibaija kukugambira. Ninkweshengyereza abatsigazi bangye bagirirwe embabazi omu maisho gaawe, ahakuba twaija aha izooba rirungi ry'obugyenyi. N'ahabw'ekyo eki oraabe oine kyona obe nikyo waaha abairu baawe n'omwana waawe Daudi.
Abatsigazi ba Daudi ku baahikire aho, baagambira Nabali byona nk'oku Daudi yaabibatuma; baaguma bategyereize.
Nabali yaagarukamu abo baheereza ba Daudi, ati: Daudi ogwo niwe oha? Kandi mwene Yese niwe oha? Ebi biro hariho abahuuku baingi abacwire ahari bakama baabo.
Mbwenu nyeyakye eby'okurya byangye, n'amaizi gangye, n'enyama ei mbaagiire abakyemuzi bangye b'ebyoya, mbihe abantu abu ntarikumanya i barikuruga?
Batyo abatsigazi ba Daudi baahinduka, baagarukayo, baamuteekyerereza ebyo byona.

Daudi nikwo kugira abashaija be ati: Buri muntu ahagatire rurara ye. Batyo buri muntu yaahagatira rurara ye, na Daudi yaahagatira eye; abantu nka magana ana bainamuka bakuratiire Daudi; na magana abiri baatsigara aha bintu.
Omwe aha batsigazi ba Nabali yaagambira Abigaili muka mukama we ati: Reeba, Daudi atumire entumwa, zaaruga omu ihamba kuramutsya mukama waitu; ku baizire, yaabajuukirira.
Haza abo bashaija bakatubeera efura; tibaine ki baatwitsize nari eki twafeereirwe, omwanya gwona ogu twamazire nabo turi omu mariisizo.
Bakatubeera orugo nyomushana na nyekiro, omwanya gwona ogu twamazire nabo nituriisa entaama.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati okimanye, oteekateekye eki oraakore, ahakuba bamaririire kukora kubi mukama waitu n'eka ye yoona; noomanya omuntu mubi nk'ogwo tihaine orikubaasa kugamba nawe.
yaagira abatsigazi be ati: Muunyebembere; niinyija kubakurata. Kwonka tiyaabigambira iba Nabali.
Ku yaabaire ari aha ndogoya naashuuma omu rukiizi rw'ekibungo, reeba Daudi n'abantu be nabo baashuuma nibareebana nawe, baabugaabugana.

Kandi Daudi akaba agizire ati: Buzimazima nkahendekyera busha kurinda ebintu ebi ekyo kishaija kyabaire kiine omu ihamba byona; tihaagira kintu kyona omu bintu byakyo ekyabura; nkamukorera gye, mbwenu yanzimuurira ebibi.
Nyowe Daudi ku ndaahitsye omu kasheeshe hakiriho ekyetwa omwojo omu bantu be boona, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
Abigaili ku yaareebire Daudi, yaarahuka yaaruga aha ndogoya ye, yaajuumara omu maisho ga Daudi, yainama ahansi.
Yaamukwata amaguru naagira ati: Mukama wangye, ekyo kibi kibe niinye kyabarirwa. Ninkweshengyereza ikiriza omuzaana waawe agire eki yaakugambira, naiwe ohurire ebigambo by'omuzaana waawe.
Mukama wangye, ninkweshengyereza, reka kweta ahari ogwo mushaija mubi Nabali; ahakuba oku arikwetwa, nikwo arikushusha;
N'ahabw'ekyo mukama wangye, nk'oku MUKAMA akuzibiire kwehoorera enzigu n'omukono gwawe, okagiibwaho orubanja rw'eshagama, reka abazigu baawe n'abarikukutengyera kubi, mukama wangye, babe nka Nabali.
Mbwenu ngugu omutoijo ogu omuzaana waawe yaakureetera, mukama wangye, guheebwe abatsigazi abarikugyendana mukama wangye.

Ninkweshengyereza saasira omuzaana waawe ekyo kibi, ahakuba MUKAMA taribura kukwombekyera enju ehamire; ahabw'okuba mukama wangye, niiwe orwana engamba za MUKAMA, kandi torireebwaho kibi ebiro byona ebi orimara omu nsi.

Kandi n'obu abantu baimukire kukuhiiga n'okwenda kukwita, mukama wangye, amagara gaawe garyakomwa hamwe na MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe omu mutwaro gumwe gw'abahuriire; kwonka amagara g'abazigu baawe aryagarekyera nk'eibaare ry'enjungu.
Mbwenu MUKAMA ku ariba yaaherize kuhikiiriza ebirungi byona ebi yaakugambireho, akakugira omugabe wa Israeli,

nyetsya eki kitarikusaasa nari okukureetera okwefuuza ahabw'okusheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja nari okwehoorera enzigu. Kandi MUKAMA ku ariba yaakukoreire ebirungi, Nyakusinga, oijukye omuzaana waawe.
Daudi yaagarukamu Abigaili ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, owaakwohereza kumbugana eri izooba, asiimwe.
Kandi obwengye bwawe busiimwe, naiwe osiimwe ahabw'okunzibira eri izooba kwehoorera enzigu n'omukono gwangye, nkagiibwaho orubanja.
Ninkurahira MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli owanzibira kuku kora kubi, kuri noogira ngu tiwaarahuka kwija kumbugana, bwaba nibuza kusheesha hatakiriho ekyetwa omwojo omu bantu ba Nabali.
Atyo Daudi yaayakiira ebi yaamutoijera, yaamugira ati: Yeinamukire owaawe n'obusingye; ebi waagamba naabihurira, n'ebi waashaba naabiikiriza.
Ku bwaseesire, Nabali amaarwa gaamurugaho, omukazi we yaamuteekyerereza ebyo byona, omutima gwa Nabali gwamuhwa omunda, yaaba nk'ekiti.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro ikumi, MUKAMA yaamuteera, yaafa.
Abagaragwa ba Daudi ku baahikire Karumeeli owa Abigaili, baamugira bati: Daudi yaakututumaho kumukutwarira, ngu obe omukazi we.
Yaabandatuka, yainika omutwe ahansi, yaagira ati: Reeba, nyowe omuzaana we ndi ow'okunaabisa ebigyere by'abagaragwa ba mukama wangye.
Ahonaaho Abigaili yaimuka, yaatemba endogoya, aine abazaana be bataano bamukuratiire; yaakurata entumwa za Daudi, yaaba omukazi we.
Kwonka Saulo akaba yaahingiire Paluti mwene Laishi owa Galimu muhara we Mikaali, owaabaire ari muka Daudi.
Ahonaaho Saulo yaimuka, yaashuuma omu ihamba rya Ziifu, aine engabo enkumi ishatu ezitoorainwe omuri Israeli, kuza kusherura Daudi omuri eryo ihamba.
Saulo yaateera orusiisira aha kibungo kya Hakila, ekiri aha rubaju rw'omuhanda aha burugwa-izooba bwa Yeshimooni. Kwonka Daudi yaaguma omu ihamba; ku yaareebire Saulo aizire omu ihamba kumusherura,
yaatuma entatsi, zaahamiza kimwe Saulo ku aizire.

Daudi yaimuka, yaija omu mwanya ogu Saulo ateiremu orusiisira; yaayetegyereza ahu Saulo abyami hamwe na Abuneeri mwene Neeri, omukuru w'engabo z'eihe rye; kandi Saulo akaba abyami omu mwanya gw'ahagati y'ebigaari, abantu bateire orusiisira bamwehinguririize.

Daudi na Abishai baahika omuri ezo ngabo nyekiro omu rusiisira, baahika ahu Saulo yaabaire abyami agwejegyeire, omu mwanya gw'ahagati y'ebigaari, eicumu rye ritsimbire aha mushego, Abuneeri n'engabo ze babyami bamwehinguririize.
Abishai yaagira Daudi ati: Eri izooba Ruhanga yaahayo omuzigu waawe omu mikono yaawe; mbwenu reka mmuteere eicumu rimwe, rimwogyemu, rikwate omu itaka, tindikwija kumuteera rya kabiri.
Kwonka Daudi yaagira Abishai ati: Reka, otamwita; mbwenu n'oha orikubaasa kubangira omukono ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta, atagiibweho rubanja?
Daudi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Ninkurahira MUKAMA otahwaho, MUKAMA niwe arimweyitira; nari shi obunaku bwe ku burihika, aryafa; nari aryashuuma omu rugamba, agweyo.
Rubuuza nyowe okubanga omukono gwangye aha muntu ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta; kureka iha eicumu n'orunywero rw'amaizi aha mushego gwe, tugyende.

Atyo Daudi yaiha eicumu n'orunywero rw'amaizi aha mushego gwa Saulo, baagyenda. Tihaagira owaakireeba, nari owaakimanya, n'obu yaakuba owaasisiimuka, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba abagwejegyeize obutasisiimuka.
Bwanyima Daudi yaayambuka seeri, yaayemerera hare aha mutwe gw'ekibungo, ahagati yaabo haaba kaanya.
Daudi yaayeta engabo na Abuneeri mwene Neeri, naagira ati: Abuneeri, ku otarikuteeza? Abuneeri yaamugarukamu ati: Iwe orikweta omugabe ori oha?
Daudi yaagira Abuneeri ati: Tori emanzi? N'oha orikwingana naiwe omuri Israeli? Mbwenu ekikuzibiire kurinda mukama waawe omugabe n'enki? Ahakuba omuntu aizire omuriimwe kwita omugabe mukama waawe.

Eki okozire ti kirungi. Ninkurahira MUKAMA otahwaho, mushemereire kufa, ahabw'okuba timurinzire gye mukama waanyu, ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta. Mbwenu reeba eicumu ry'omugabe n'orunywero rw'amaizi orubaire ruri aha mushego gwe.
Saulo yaamanya eiraka rya Daudi, yaagira ati: Beitu eryo iraka n'eryawe, mwana wangye Daudi? Daudi yaagira ati: N'eryangye, mukama wangye omugabe.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Beitu shi, mukama wangye ahiigira ki omwiru we? Nkakora ki? Nari shi ni kibi ki eki nyine?

Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, Nyakusinga omugabe, hurira ebigambo by'omwiru waawe. MUKAMA ku araabe niwe anteeraine naiwe, aikirize empongano; kwonka ku baraabe bari abantu, bakyeenwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ahakuba eri izooba bambinga ngu ntagira omugabo omu buhunguzi bwa MUKAMA, nibagira bati: Irooko oheereze baaruhanga abandi.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati otaikiriza eshagama yangye kugwa ahansi, ahu MUKAMA atari; ahabw'okuba omugabe wa Israeli aizire kusherura omura, nk'ohiigire endahi omu bibungo.
Daudi yaamugira ati: Reeba eicumu ryawe ndiri, Nyakusinga! Hagire omwe aha batsigazi baawe, aije aryakiire.
MUKAMA azimuurira omuntu nk'okuhikiirira kwe n'obwesigwa bwe oku biri. Omanye ku MUKAMA yaakuhayo omu mikono yangye eri izooba, nkanga kubanga omukono gwangye ahariiwe ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta.
Kandi nk'oku amagara gaawe gaaba ag'obuguzi bwingi omu maisho gangye eri izooba, n'agangye gabe nikwo gaaba ag'obuguzi bwingi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, anjune omu kutuntuzibwa kwona.
Bwanyima Saulo yaagira Daudi ati: Oheebwe omugisha, mwana wangye Daudi; oryakora bikuru, kandi n'okusingura oryasingura. Atyo Daudi yaayegyendera, Saulo nawe yaagaruka owe.

Bwanyima Daudi yaagira omu mutima gwe ati: Hoona eizooba rimwe Saulo aryarugaho anyite; tihariho kirikunkirira okuhungira omu nsi y'Abafilistia, kikaareetera Saulo kumpwa amatsiko, akareka kugaruka kunsherurira omu byaro bya Israeli byona; nkamukira ntyo.
Daudi yaimuka n'abashaija be magana mukaaga abu yaabaire aine, baayambuka, baayehongyera Akishi mwene Maoki, omugabe wa Gaasi.
Daudi n'abashaija be baatuura na Akishi omuri Gaasi, buri muntu n'ab'omu ka ye, na Daudi n'abakazi be bombi, Ahinoamu owa Yezereeli, na Abigaili owa Karumeeli, owaabaire ari muka Nabali.
Abantu baagambira Saulo ku Daudi ahungiire Gaasi; tiyaagaruka kumusherura bundi.

Bwanyima Daudi yaagira Akishi ati: Ku ndaabe ngiriirwe embabazi omu maisho gaawe, bampe ekibanja omu rurembo rumwe aha ndembo z'omu byaro, mbe nimwo naatuura; mbwenu omwiru waawe atuuzibwe ki naiwe omu rurembo rw'omugabe?
Atyo Akishi yaamuha orurembo Zikulaagi eryo izooba; nikyo Zikulaagi yaabeereire ey'abagabe ba Yuda okwiha obwo n'okuhitsya hati.
Ebiro ebi Daudi yaamazire omu nsi y'Abafilistia bikahika omwaka n'ameezi ana.

Bwanyima Daudi n'abashaija be bainamuka, baateera aba Geshuri n'aba Giruzi n'Abaamaleki; ahakuba ago mahanga ira nigo gaabaire gatwire omuri egyo nsi erikugarukira Shuuri n'aha mwatano gw'ensi ya Misri.
Daudi yaacwekyereza egyo nsi, tihaarokokamu mushaija nari omukazi; yaanyaga entaama n'ente n'endogoya n'engamira kandi n'ebijwaro; bwanyima yaatabaaruka, yaaza owa Akishi.
Akishi akaba amubuuza ati: Eri izooba waateera hi? Daudi amugarukamu ati: Naateera Negebu eya Yuda, nari Negebu ey'aba Yerameeli, nari ey'aba Keeni.

Kwonka Daudi akaba atarokora mushaija nari omukazi, ngu abatware Gaasi; ahabw'okuba akaba agira ngu nibaija kubarega bati: Daudi atukozire ati n'ati. Kandi ebiro byona ebi yaamazire omu nsi y'Abafilistia nikwo yaabaire atwaza.
N'ahabw'ekyo Akishi akeesiga Daudi, yaaguma naagira ati: Ayetamiise munonga beene waabo Abaisraeli; n'ahabw'ekyo naija kuguma ari omugaragwa wangye ebiro byona.
Daudi yaamugira ati: Eego, aho niho oraamanyire eki omwiru waawe arikubaasa kukora. Akishi yaagira Daudi ati: Eego, naanye niinyija kukugira omurinzi w'amagara gangye ebiro byona.
Omu biro ebyo Abafilistia bakateerana, baaza Shuneemu, baateerayo orusiisira. Saulo nawe yaateerana Abaisraeli boona, baateera orusiisira Giliboa.
Saulo ku yaareebire eihe ry'Abafilistia, yaatiina, omutima gwamuhwa omunda, yaatetema munonga.
Ku yaayehanwize ahari MUKAMA, MUKAMA tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu, yaaba mu birooto nari omuri Urimu, n'obu haakuba omuri baanabi.
Saulo nikwo kugira abagaragwa be ati: Munsherurire omugirwakazi w'emizimu, nze kumuraguzaho. Abagaragwa be baamugarukamu bati: Reeba, hariho omurogikazi ari Endoori.
Ogwo mukazi yaamugira ati: Noomanyira kimwe eki Saulo yaakozire, ku yaacwire abarikubandwa emizimu n'abarogi omu nsi ye. Mbwenu ahabw'enki nootega amagara gangye omutego ngu baanyite?
Saulo yaamurahira MUKAMA naagira ati: Ninkurahira MUKAMA atahwaho, ekyo torikiturwa.
Omukazi yaamubuuza ati: Nkuzoorere oha? Onu ati: Nzoorera Samueli.
Ogwo mukazi ku yaareebire Samueli, yaayamuza n'eiraka rihango; yaagira Saulo ati: Wambeihera ki? Kunu ori Saulo.
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Otatiina! Ngambira eki orikureeba. Omukazi yaagira Saulo ati: Nindeeba ruhanga naaruga okuzimu.
Yaamubuuza ati: Naashusha ki? Onu ati: N'omugurusi orikwinamuka, kandi ayehumbikire omwenda. Saulo yaamanya ku ari Samueli, yainama, yaamutangirira.
Samueli yaagira ati: Ku oraabe noomanya ngu MUKAMA akurugireho, yaahinduka omuzigu waawe, nombuuriza ki?
MUKAMA akugizire nk'oku yaagambire naaraba omuriinye, ahakuba MUKAMA akakutaaguraho obugabe, yaabuha mutaahi waawe Daudi.
Ahabw'okutoorobera iraka rya MUKAMA, n'okutahikiiriza kiniga kye kingi aha Baamaleki, nikyo MUKAMA yaakugirira atyo eri izooba.

N'ekindi MUKAMA naija kukuhayo hamwe n'Abaisraeli omu mikono y'Abafilistia, kandi nyencakare iwe na batabani baawe nimwija kunshanga ei ndi. MUKAMA naija kuhayo eihe ry'Abaisraeli omu mikono y'Abafilistia.
Ahonaaho Saulo yaagwa ahansi arambiire, aine obwoba bwingi ahabw'ebigambo bya Samueli; amaani gaamuhwamu, ahabw'okuba akaba asiibirekwo kandi arairekwo.
Bwanyima ogwo mukazi yaija ahari Saulo; ku yaareebire atiinire munonga, yaamugira ati: Reeba, nyowe omuzaana waawe naakuhurira, naayoga amagara, naakora eki wandagiira.
Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, naiwe ohurire omuzaana waawe, onyikirize nkureetere ak'okurya, orye, obone agagyenda.
Yaayanga, yaagira ati: Tindikwija kurya. Kwonka abagaragwa be hamwe n'ogwo mukazi baamugyema, yaikiriza ebi baamugambira. Yaabandatuka ahansi, yaashutama aha kitanda.
Ogwo mukazi akaba aine enyana y'ebishaju omu nju; yaakoresa obwira, yaagiita, yaagira esaano, yaagibumbabumba, yaagiteekamu omugaati ogutatumbisiibwe;
yaabireetera Saulo n'abagaragwa be, baarya. Bwanyima baimuka ekyo kiro, baagyenda.
Abategyeki b'Abafilistia baahurura bari omu mitwe ya igana-igana n'eya rukumi-rukumi; kandi Daudi n'abashaija be hamwe na Akishi baabaija enyima.

Ku baabaire nibakigyenda, abakuru b'engabo z'Abafilistia baagira bati: Beitu shi, aba Baheburaayo nibakora ki aha? Akishi yaabagarukamu ati: Ogu ti Daudi, omugaragwa wa Saulo omugabe wa Israeli, omazire naanye ebiro n'emyaka? Okwiha obu yaanyehongyera n'okuhitsya hati tinkamureebahoga kishobyo kyona.

Kwonka abakuru b'Abafilistia baamugwerwa kubi, baamugira bati: Garurayo omuntu ogu, agarukye omu kibanja kye eki waamuhaire, otamwikiriza kushuuma naitwe aha rugamba, atakaahika omu rugamba, akatuhindukana, akaba omuzigu waitu. Noogira ngu ogu mushaija akaagarukaine ata na mukama we, yaaba atatwaire mitwe yaitu?
Ogu ti Daudi, ou baayeshongoire omu kuzina kwabo nibaikirizana bati: Saulo aitsire enkumi, Daudi yaita obukumi?

Akishi nikwo kweta Daudi akamugira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, niiwe ohikire; ahabwangye nindeeba ngu oshemereire kuhurura n'okutabaaruka naanye omu ihe ryaitu, ahakuba okwiha obu waanyehongyera n'okuhitsya hati, tinkakureebahoga kishobyo; kwonka abategyeki tibarikukwenda.
N'ahabw'ekyo yegarukireyo, ogyende n'obusingye, orekye kugwisa kubi abategyeki b'Abafilistia.
Daudi yaagira Akishi ati: Beitu shi, ncumwire ki? okwiha obu naakwehongyera n'okuhitsya hati n'enki eki orareebire aha mwiru waawe, ekyakunzibira kuza kurwanisa abazigu ba mukama wangye omugabe?
Akishi yaamugarukamu ati: Nimmanya ku otaine ky'okuhanwa omu maisho gangye nka maraika wa Ruhanga; kwonka abakuru b'Abafilistia baagira bati: Tarikwija kuhurura naitwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogurukye kare omu kasheeshe n'abairu ba mukama waawe abu oizire nabo; ku muraimukye muti omu kasheeshe, haija nihahweza, mugyende.
Atyo Daudi yaimuka kare n'abashaija be, baimutsya orugyendo kugaruka omu nsi y'Abafilistia; n'Abafilistia bainamuka, baahika Yezereeli.
baanyagire abakazi n'abaabaire bagitwiremu boona, abato n'abakuru; bataine u baitsire, kureka babatwaire, beegyendeire.
Daudi n'abashaija be ku baahikire omuri orwo rurembo, baashanga barwokize, kandi abakazi baabo na batabani baabo na bahara baabo banyagirwe.
Ahonaaho Daudi n'abu yaabaire aine, baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baaborooga, okuhitsya obu baahikire ahu batakibaasiza kuborooga.
Kandi abakazi ba Daudi bombi, Ahinoamu owa Yezereeli na Abigaili owaabaire ari muka Nabali owa Karumeeli, nabo bakaba banyagirwe.

Daudi yaashaasha munonga, ahabw'okuba abantu bakaba nibagira ngu bamuteere amabaare; ahakuba abantu boona bakaba baine obushaarizi omu mutima, buri muntu naasaasibwa batabani be na bahara be; kwonka Daudi yaayehamiza omuri MUKAMA Ruhanga we.
Daudi yaayehanuuza ahari MUKAMA ati: Ku ndaakurate ezo ngabo, niinyija kuzihika? MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Zikurate; ahakuba torikwija kubura kuzihika, kandi torikwija kuremwa kugarura ebintu byona.
Atyo Daudi yaagyenda n'abashaija magana mukaaga abu yaabaire aine; ku baahikire aha kagyera Besori, abaabaire bari enyima baatsigara aho.
Kwonka Daudi yaagumizamu n'abashaija magana ana; ahakuba abaatsigaire enyima baruhire, batakiine gambuka, bakaba bari magana abiri.
Bwanyima baashanga Omunyamisri omu ishwa, baamureetera Daudi, baamuha omugaati, yaarya; baamuha n'amaizi g'okunywa;

kandi baamuha omwate gumwe aha kiihuro ky'ebijuma by'emitiini n'emitsitsa ebiri y'emizaabibu eyomire. Ku yaaherize kurya, yaagarukwamu amaani; ahabw'okuba akaba amazire ebiro bishatu atarikurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa, nyomushana na nyekiro.

Daudi yaamubuuza ati: Ori ow'oha? Kandi nooruga hi? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi omutsigazi Omunyamisri, omuhuuku w'Omuamaleki; mukama wangye antsigireho, ahakuba ebiro bishatu ebihingwire mbaire ndwaire.
Tukaba tuteire Negebu ey'Abakeresi n'ey'Abayuda, n'eya Kalebu, twayotsya Zikulaagi.
Daudi yaamubuuza ati: Okaanyebembera, ompitsya omuri ezo ngabo? Onu ati: Ndahira Ruhanga ku otarikwija kuunyita, n'obu kwakuba okumpayo omu mikono ya mukama wangye, mbone kuzikuhitsyamu.
Daudi yaabaita okwiha omu rwita-waabo okuhitsya omu mwabazyo gw'erindi izooba; tihaahonokaho n'omwe omuribo, kureka abatsigazi magana ana, abaatembire engamira bakahunga.
Daudi yaagarura ebi Abaamaleki babaire banyagire byona; kandi yaajuna abakazi be bombi.
Tihaagira kintu kyona ekyabura, yaaba kihango nari kikye, yaaba boojo nari abaishiki, yaaba munyago nari ekindi kintu kyona ekibaire kitwairwe; Daudi yaabigarura byona.
Kandi Daudi yaanyaga amasyo goona ag'entaama n'ag'ente; abantu baagafunya bageebembeize Daudi, nibagira bati: Ogu n'omunyago gwa Daudi.

Bwanyima Daudi yaahika aha bashaija bari magana abiri, abaruhire bakabura agamukurata, bakabatsiga aha kagyera Besori; baaza kubugana Daudi n'abantu abu abaire aine. Daudi ku yaabahika, yaabaramutsya.

Kwonka abantu babi boona abataine buntu, omuri abo abahurwire na Daudi, baagira bati: Titurikwija kubaha aha minyago ei tugarwire, ahakuba tibahurwire naitwe, kureka buri muntu tumuhe omukazi we n'abaana be, babatware, bagyende.
Kwonka Daudi yaagira ati: Beene waitu, tikwo murikwija kutwaza ebi MUKAMA atuhaire, MUKAMA oturinzire, akahayo omu mikono yaitu ezo ngabo ezibaire zituteire.
Nimugira ngu hariho orikwija kwikiriza ekyo eki murikugamba? Ahakuba omugabo gw'ogiire aha rugamba nikyo kimwe n'ogw'otsigaire aha bintu; boona nibaija kubagana, bainganise.
Okwiha ahari eryo izooba yaakihindura ekiragiro n'omugyenzo omuri Israeli n'okuhitsya hati.
Daudi ku yaahikire Zikulaagi, yaatwekyera banywani be abakuru b'Abayuda ahari egyo minyago, naagira ati: Ekiconco kyanyu nkikyo, ekirugire aha minyago y'abazigu ba MUKAMA;
yaabitwekyera abaabaire bari Beseeli, na Ramoosi omuri Negebu, na Yatiri,
na Aroeri, na Sifumoosi, na Eshitemoa,
na Rakali, n'ab'omu ndembo z'aba Yerameeli n'ez'aba Keeni,
n'ab'omuri Horuma, na Korashaani, na Ataki,
na Heburooni n'emyanya yoona ei Daudi n'abantu be baabaire bazengyereramu.
Abafilistia baahambya Saulo n'abatabani, baita Yonasaani na Abinadabu na Malikishua, beene Saulo.
Orugamba rwaba orw'amaani ahari Saulo, abarasi baamugwaho, baamuhutaaza munonga.

Saulo nikwo kugira omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, ati: Ihayo rurara yaawe, oginteere, abatashazirwe bariya batakaija, bakancumita, bakanshungisa. Kwonka omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye yaayanga, ahabw'okuba akatiina munonga. Nikyo Saulo yaasyoreireyo rurara ye, akagyetungaho.
Ogwo mukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, ku yaareebire yaafa, nawe yaayetunga aha ye, baafa kumwe.
Okwo nikwo Saulo yaafiire n'abatabani bonshatu, n'omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, n'engabo ze zoona; bakafeera hamwe eryo izooba.

Kandi Abaisraeli abaabaire bari seeri y'oruhita, n'abaabaire bari seeri ya Yorudani, ku baareebire Abaisraeli baahunga, na Saulo n'abatabani baafa, baatsigaho endembo zaabo, baahunga; Abafilistia baija, baazituuramu.
Ku bwaseesire, Abafilistia baija kucwijura emitumbi, baashanga Saulo n'abatabani bonshatu bagwire aha kibungo kya Giliboa,
baamutemaho omutwe, baamucwijura eby'okurwanisa bye, baatuma entumwa omu nsi y'Abafilistia kubuzya hoona amakuru omuri hekalu z'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, n'omu bantu boona.
Eby'okurwanisa bye baabita omuri hekalu ya Ashitaroosi, n'omutumbi gwe baaguhanika aha rugo rw'amabaare rwa Besi-shaani.
Abanyayabeshi-gileadi ku baahuriire oku Abafilistia bagizire Saulo,
abashaija boona amamanzi baimuka, baagyenda ekiro kyona, baahanura omutumbi gwa Saulo n'ey'abatabani aha rugo rwa Besi-shaani, baagaruka Yabeshi; ku baahikireyo, baagyotsya.
Bwanyima baatwara amagufa gaabo, baagaziika ahansi y'omunyinya ogw'omuri Yabeshi, baamara ebiro mushanju nibeesiibyakwo.
Aha kiro kya kashatu haija omushaija naaruga omu rusiisira rwa Saulo, emyenda ye etaagukire, aine eitaka omu mutwe; ku yaahikire ahari Daudi, yaajuumara ahansi, yaamutangirira.
Daudi yaamubuuza ati: Nooruga hi? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Naacwa omu rusiisira rw'Abaisraeli.
Daudi yaamubuuza ati: Bibaire bita? Ninkweshengyereza, ngambira. Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Abantu bahungire aha rugamba, baingi omuribo bagwire, baafa, kandi Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani nabo bafiire.
Daudi yaabuuza ogwo mutsigazi owaamubikira ati: Beitu shi omanyisiibwe ki Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani ku bafiire?

Ogwo mutsigazi owaabaire naamubikira yaagira ati: Ku mbaire niinyegyendera, naahika aha kibungo Giliboa, naareeba Saulo ayegamiire eicumu rye; kandi naareeba ab'ebigaari n'ab'embaraasi bamubingire bamuhambize.
Ku agarwire amaisho enyima, yandeeba, yaanyeta, naanye naamwetaba nti: Ndi aha, Nyakusinga!
Yambuuza ati: Ori oha? Naamugarukamu nti: Ndi Omuamaleki.
Yangira ati: Mpika haihi, onyite; ahakuba nyine obusaasi bwingi, kandi tinkakabire.

Ntyo naamuhika haihi, naamwita, ahakuba mmanyiire kimwe ku atari w'okukira yaagwire; bwanyima naamucwijura ekirunga ky'aha mutwe gwe n'engoro ebaire emuri aha mukono; mbwenu mbibi, mbikureeteire, mukama wangye.
Daudi yaataagura emyenda ye, n'abashaija boona abu yaabaire aine baakora batyo.
Baacura nibaborooga, baayesiibyakwo okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, ahabwa Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani, n'ahabw'abantu ba MUKAMA n'enju ya Israeli okumarwa rurara.
Daudi yaabuuza omutsigazi owaamubikira ati: Nooruga hi? Onu ati: Ndi omwana w'omunyaihanga, Omuamaleki.
Daudi ati: Kirugire hi iwe okutatiina kubanga omukono kwita ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta?
Daudi yaayeta omwe aha batsigazi, yaamugira ati: Irooko omuhikye haihi, omugurukire. Yaamucumita, yaafa.
Daudi yaamugira ati: Orubanja rw'eshagama yaawe rube niiwe rwabaho, ahabw'okuba akanwa kaawe niko mushinja ku waahamya noogira oti: Nyitsire ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta.
Bwanyima Daudi yaacurira Saulo n'omutabani Yonasaani n'ekyoshongoro eki,
(kandi yaaragiira kukyegyesa Abayuda; reeba kihandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Yashari.) naagira ati:
Ai bambe Israeli, ekitiinisa kyawe kiitiirwe aha bibungo byawe.
Amamanzi ka gagwire!
Mutakibuzya omu mihanda ya Ashikelooni,
Abaishiki b'Abafilistia bakeesima,
N'abaishiki b'abatashazirwe bakeehimbisa.
Mutatondwaho orume, mukaguubwaho enjura,
N'obu kwakuba okugira emisiri y'empongano!
Ahakuba okwo niyo engabo y'emanzi enagirwe kubi,
Engabo ya Saulo, nk'otarashukirweho majuta.
Kuruga aha shagama y'abaitsirwe, n'aha mamanzi ebikaaka;
Kandi rurara ya Saulo ekaba etagaruka busha.
Saulo na Yonasaani bakaba bari barungi kandi abarikukundwa bakiriho,
N'omu kufa kwabo tibataanisiibwe.
Bakaba barahuka okukira empungu,
Kandi baine amaani okukira entare.
Imwe abaishiki ba Israeli mucurire Saulo,
Owaabaire abajweka emyenda ya karari erikunekaneka,
Akahunda emyenda yaanyu ezaabu.
Amamanzi ka gagwire
Ahagati y'orugamba!
Yonasaani aitiirwe aha bibungo byawe.
Okaba onshemeza munonga.
Okukunda kwawe ahariinye kukaba kuri okw'okutangaaza,
Okukira okukunda kw'abakazi.
Amamanzi ka gagwire,
N'eby'okurwanisa ka bicwekyereire!
Atyo Daudi yainamukayo n'abakazi be bombi, Ahinoamu owa Yezereeli, na Abigaili owaabaire ari muka Nabali owa Karumeeli.
Kandi Daudi yainamuka n'abantu abu yaabaire aine, buri muntu n'ab'omu ka ye; baatuura omu ndembo za Heburooni.
Abayuda baija, baashukiraho okwo Daudi amajuta kuba omugabe w'enju ya Yuda.
Bwanyima baagambira Daudi ngu, Aba Yabeshi-gileadi nibo baziikire Saulo.
Daudi nikwo kubatumaho entumwa naabagira ati: MUKAMA abahe omugisha, ahabw'okuba mugiriire mukama waanyu Saulo embabazi, mwamuziika.
Mbwenu MUKAMA abagirire embabazi, kandi abakorere eby'obwesigwa; naanye ndabazimuurira ahabw'eby'embabazi ebyo ebi mukozire.
N'ahabw'ekyo emikono yaanyu egire amaani, mube amamanzi; ahakuba Saulo mukama waanyu afiire, kandi ab'enju ya Yuda banshukireho amajuta kuba omugabe waabo.
amwemekire kuba omugabe wa Gileadi na Ashura na Yezereeli na Efuraimu na Benyamiini na Israeli yoona.
Kandi Isheboshesi mwene Saulo akaba ahikize emyaka makumi ana obu yaaza aha ngoma kutegyeka Israeli, yaamara aha ngoma emyaka ebiri. Kwonka enju ya Yuda yaakurata Daudi.
Omwanya ogu Daudi yaamazire Heburooni ari aha ngoma naategyeka enju ya Yuda gukahika emyaka mushanju n'ameezi mukaaga.
Bwanyima Abuneeri mwene Neeri, n'abagaragwa ba Isheboshesi mwene Saulo, baaruga Mahanaimu, baaza Gibeoni.
Na Yoabu mwene Zeruiya n'abagaragwa ba Daudi baashohora, baabugabugana nabo aha kiyanja kya Gibeoni; abamwe baashutama seeri yaakyo, abandi seenu.
Abuneeri yaagira Yoabu ati: Abatsigazi baimukye, batuzaanire. Yoabu yaamugarukamu ati: Nibaimukye.
Batyo baimuka, baayambuka, baababara; ab'orubaju rwa Benyamiini na Isheboshesi mwene Saulo baaba ikumi na babiri, kandi ab'orubaju rwa Daudi nabo baaba ikumi na babiri.
Buri omwe yaagwa omuzigu we omu maraka, yaamutimbura rurara omu rubaju; boona baagwera kyarimwe, baafa. Nikyo omwanya ogwo gwayeteirwe Helukasi-hazurimu, oguri haihi na Gibeoni.
Eryo izooba orugamba rwaba orw'amaani munonga; Abuneeri n'abashaija ba Israeli baasingurwa abagaragwa ba Daudi.
Bwanyima Asaheeli yaakurata Abuneeri amubingire; kandi omu kumubinga tiyaareeba ha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho kuteishuka Abuneeri.
Abuneeri ku yaareebire enyima, yaagira ati: Biri niiwe, Asaheeli? Onu ati: Niinye.
Abuneeri yaamugira ati: Kikaama, otoore aha rubaju rwawe rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, okwate omwe aha batsigazi, obe niwe waanyaga eby'okurwanisa. Kwonka Asaheeli yaayanga kumurugaho.
Abuneeri yaagaruka yaagira Asaheeri ati: Toora ahandi orekye kunkurata; mbwenu ku naakukucumita, naakutuura aha, okaazira ki? Kandi nkaareebana nta na Yoabu mwene sho?

Nabwo hoona yaayanga kumurugaho; nikyo Abuneeri yaamuteereire omuhunda gw'eicumu rye aha nda, gukamwogamu, akeetuura ahansi, akagwaho; kandi abantu boona ku baabaire bahika ahu Asaheeli yaabaire agwire, beemereraho.
Kwonka Yoabu na Abishai baagyenda babingire Abuneeri; eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, baahika aha kibungo Amma ekishungaine na Giya omu muhanda ogurikuza omu ihamba rya Gibeoni.
Ababenyamiini baayeteeranira ahari Abuneeri, baaba omutwe gumwe, baayemerera aha mutwe gw'ekibungo.

Bwanyima Abuneeri yaayeta Yoabu, yaamubuuza ati: Rurara eryaguma neerya busha obutoosha? Torikumanya omuheru gw'ekyo ku guriba okushaarira? Mbwenu oryahitsya hi okutaragiira bantu baawe kureka kukuratirira beene waabo?
Yoabu yaamugarukamu ati: Nindahira Ruhanga otahwaho, kuri noogira ngu tiwaagamba ekyo kigambo, buzimazima abantu baaba nibaija kuseesa ekiro, buri muntu akuratiriire mwene ishe.
Atyo Yoabu yaateera enzamba, abantu boona baayemerera, tibaagumizamu kukuratirira Abaisraeli, n'obu kwakuba okubarwanisa obundi.
Abuneeri n'engabo ze baagyenda ekiro kyona, baaraba omuri Araba, baayambuka Yorudani, baahika Mahanaimu.
Yoabu yaatabaaruka, yaareka kukuratirira Abuneeri; ku yaaherize kuteeranira abantu boona hamwe, yaashanga omu bagaragwa ba Daudi nihaburamu abantu ikumi na mwenda, otabariiremu Asaheeli.
Kwonka abagaragwa ba Daudi bakaba baitsire omu Babenyamiini engabo za Abuneeri magana ashatu na makumi mukaaga.
Bwanyima baatwara Asaheeli, baamuziika Betelehemu omu kituuro kya ishe. Kandi Yoabu, n'engabo ze baaraara nibagyenda, bwasheesha baahika Heburooni.
Bwanyima haabaho obweme buhango ahagati y'enju ya Saulo n'eya Daudi; kwonka Daudi yaaguma naayeyongyera amaani, enju ya Saulo yo yaagyenda neehwa amaani.
owa kabiri Kileaba owa Abigaili, owaabaire ari muka Nabali owa Karumeeli; owa kashatu Abusalomu ou yaazaire ahari Maaka omuhara wa Talumai, omugabe wa Geshuri;
owa kana Adoniya mutabani wa Hagisi; owa kataano Shefatia mutabani wa Abitaali;
kandi owa mukaaga akaba ari Itereamu owa Egula muka Daudi. Abo boona nibo Daudi yaazaariire Heburooni.

Omu bunaku obwo hakaba hariho omukazi orikwetwa Rizipa, muhara wa Ayiya, owaabaire ari omukazi wa Saulo w'ekinyanshunju. Eizooba rimwe Isheboshesi yaagira Abuneeri ati: Ahabw'enki otembire ekitabo kya muka tata?

Okuruga aho Abuneeri yaagira ekiniga ahabw'ebigambo ebi Isheboshesi yaamugambira, yaamugarukamu ati: Beitu shi onyetsire omutwe gw'embwa y'Abayuda? Okuhitsya hati ninkiha enju ya sho Saulo ekitiinisa, na beene ishe na bagyenzi be, kandi tinkakuhayoga mu mikono ya Daudi; haza eri izooba oza kuntaho ekibi ky'okuraara n'ogwo mukazi?
Nyowe Abuneeri, ku ndaabe ntakoreire Daudi nk'oku MUKAMA yaamurahiire,
nkaiha obugabe aha nju ya Saulo, nkata Daudi aha kitebe ky'obugabe, akategyeka Israeli na Yuda, okuruga Daani okuhika Beeri-sheba, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
Isheboshesi tiyaabaasa kugarukamu Abuneeri kigambo kyona, ahabw'okumutiina.
Bwanyima Abuneeri yaatuma entumwa ahari Daudi, ari Heburooni, naagira ati: Mukama w'ensi egi n'oha? Ragaana naanye endagaano, nkwatanise naiwe, nkukubuurire Israeli yoona.

Daudi yaamugarukamu ati: Ni kirungi; niinyija kuragaana naiwe endagaano; kwonka eki ndikwenda ahariiwe ni kimwe. Omanye ku otarincwa ryera, kureka biri waabanza kundeetera Mikaali muhara wa Saulo, oizire kundeeba.
Bwanyima Daudi yaatuma entumwa ahari Isheboshesi mwene Saulo, naagira ati: Mpa omukazi wangye Mikaali, ou naajugire ebishushu igana by'Abafilistia.
Isheboshesi nikwo kumutuma, akamwaka iba Palutieli, mwene Laishi.
Kwonka iba yaagyenda naarira omuhanda gwona, amukuratiire, okuhitsya obu baahikire Bahurimu. Abuneeri yaamugira ati: Garukayo. Onu yaagarukayo.
Bwanyima Abuneeri yaagira enaama n'abakuru ba Israeli, naagira ati: Obunaku obwahingwire, mukaba nimwenda Daudi ngu abe omugabe waanyu.

Mbwenu mukikore; ahakuba MUKAMA akaraganisa Daudi naagira ati: Omukono gw'omugaragwa wangye Daudi nigwo ndijunisa abantu bangye Israeli okuruga omu mikono y'Abafilistia, n'okuruga omu mikono y'abazigu baabo boona.
Abuneeri yaagaruka yaabigambira Ababenyamiini; kandi yaaza Heburooni kugambira Daudi byona ebi Israeli n'ab'enju ya Benyamiini yoona basiimire kukora.
Atyo Abuneeri n'abashaija makumi abiri baashanga Daudi Heburooni. Daudi yaateekyera Abuneeri obugyenyi n'abashaija abu yaabaire aine.

Abuneeri yaagira Daudi ati: Niinyija kwimuka, nteeranire Abaisraeli boona ahari mukama wangye omugabe, baragaane naiwe endagaano, obone kutegyeka abu omutima gwawe gurikwenda boona. Atyo Daudi yaayohereza Abuneeri; yaagyenda n'obusingye.
Ago maguru abagaragwa ba Daudi na Yoabu, abaabaire bahurwire, baatabaaruka n'eminyago mingi; kwonka baashanga Abuneeri atakiri na Daudi, ahakuba akaba yaamwohereize, yayengyendeire n'obusingye.
Yoabu ku yaahikire aho, naatabaaruka n'engabo ze zoona ezi yaabaire aine, baamugira bati: Abuneeri mwene Neeri aizire ow'omugabe; yaamwohereza, yaagyenda n'obusingye.
Atyo Yoabu yaaza ow'omugabe, yaamubuuza ati: Eki okozire ki? Abuneeri mwene okwija owaawe, okamureka akagyenda?
Omanyire kimwe Abuneeri mwene Neeri ku aizire kukubeihabeiha, n'okukutata ngu amanye oku ohurura n'oku otabaaruka, n'okwetegyereza ebi orikukora byona.
Yoabu ku yaarugire owa Daudi kutabaara, yaatuma entumwa, zaakurata Abuneeri, zaamugarurira aha iziba rya Siira; kwonka Daudi atarikukimanya.

Abuneeri ku yaagarukire Heburooni, Yoabu yaamutwara hangahari omu irembo ahagati, ngu agambe nawe omu mubonano; ku baahikireho, yaamuteera aha nda, yaamugwisaho naamuhoorera eshagama y'omurumuna Asaheeli.
Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: Nyowe n'engoma yangye titurigiibwaho rubanja rw'eshagama ya Abuneeri mwene Neeri omu maisho ga Ruhanga okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Kureka ruryaguma ahari Yoabu n'aha ka ya ishe; kandi eka ye teribura kubamu orikurugwamu amahira, nari omubembe, nari okugyendera aha kibango, nari ow'okwitwa rurara, nari omukuuhuzi.
Okwo nikwo Yoabu na Abishai baitsire Abuneeri, nibamuhoorera murumuna waabu ou yaitiire omu rugamba rwa Gibeoni.
Baaziika Abuneeri Heburooni; omugabe yaimutsya eiraka rye, yaacurira aha kituuro kya Abuneeri; n'abantu boona baacura.
Omugabe yaacurira Abuneeri, naagira ati:
Abuneeri akaafiire nk'omushema?
Emikono yaawe tebohirwe
N'ebigyere byawe tibikomirwe na byoma;
Nk'omuntu oku agwa omu maisho g'ababi,
Naiwe nikwo ofiire.
N'abantu boona baagaruka baamucurira.

Bwanyima abantu boona baija kweshengyereza Daudi kurya ak'okurya bukiri kare; kwonka yaarahira naagira ati: Ku ndaarye aha mugaati nari ekindi kyona, izooba ritakarengire, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
Abantu boona baakyetegyereza, kyabashemeza; kandi ebi omugabe yaabaire akora byona bikaba bishemeza abantu boona.
N'ahabw'ekyo aha izooba eryo abantu boona n'Abaisraeli boona baamanya ku kitarugire ha mugabe kwita Abuneeri mwene Neeri.
Omugabe yaagira abagaragwa be ati: Ebyo nimumanya hati omuri Israeli ku hafiiremu omunyiginya, kandi obaire ari omushaija rugambwa?
Kandi nyowe, n'obu ndaabe ndi omugabe oshukirweho amajuta, kwonka ndi busha; n'abashaija aba, batabani ba Zeruiya, bagumire, tindikubabaasa. MUKAMA azimuurire enkozi y'ebibi nk'obubi bwayo oku buri.
Bwanyima Isheboshesi mwene Saulo ku yaahurire ngu Abuneeri agwire Heburooni, emikono ye yaahwa amaani, n'Abaisraeli boona baashoberwa.

Kandi Isheboshesi ogwo mutabani wa Saulo akaba aine abakuru b'engabo ze babiri; omwe akaba naayetwa Baana, n'ondiijo ari Rekabu, beene Rimona owa Beeroosi, ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini; (ahakuba Beeroosi ekaba neebarirwa ahari Benyamiini;
kandi aba Beeroosi bakahungira Gitaimu, baashuhuukirayo n'okuhitsya hati).
Eizooba rimwe beene Rimona owa Beeroosi, Rekabu na Baana bakaija, baahika owa Isheboshesi omu ihangwe, baashanga abyami ahuumwireho;
kandi omurinzi w'enju owaabaire naashemeza engano, baashanga yaakwatwa oturo, yaagwejegyera. N'ahabw'ekyo Rekabu na Baana omurumuna baataahamu.

Ku baahikire omu nju, baashanga Isheboshesi abyami aha kitanda kye omu kishengye ky'okuraaramu, baamucumita, baamwita, baamutemaho omutwe. Baagutwara, baagyenda ekiro kyona nibatoora omuhanda ogw'omuri Araba.

Ogwo mutwe gwa Isheboshesi baagutwarira Daudi Heburooni, baagira omugabe bati: Ngugu omutwe gwa Isheboshesi mwene Saulo omuzigu waawe, owaabaire akuhiiga kukwita. Eri izooba MUKAMA yaahoorera mukama waitu omugabe Saulo n'oruzaaro rwe.
Daudi yaagarukamu, naagira Rekabu na Baana omurumuna beene Rimona owa Beeroosi, ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, owaakirize amagara gangye omu kabi koona,
obu omuntu yaija, akangira ati: Reeba, Saulo afiire; akaba naagira ngu andeeteire enkuru nungu; ahonaaho naamukwata, naamwiirta Zikulaagi; ebyo nibyo bihembo ebi naamuhaire ahabw'enkuru ze.
Mbwenu shi, nk'abantu babi abaitira ohikiriire omu nju ye abyami aha kitanda, nimugira ngu tindikwija kubahoorera eshagama ye, nkabacwekyereza, nkabaiha omu nsi, okukira ogwo?

Bwanyima Daudi yaaragiira abatsigazi be, baabaita, baabatemaho engaro n'ebigyere, baabahanika aha rubaju rw'eiziba rya Heburooni. Kandi omutwe gwa Isheboshesi baagutwara, baaguziika omu kituuro kya Abuneeri Heburooni.

Omu biro ebyahingwire, obu Saulo yaabaire ari omugabe waitu, niiwe waabaire oyebembera Abaisraeli nibahurura kandi nibatabaaruka; kandi MUKAMA akakugira ati: Niiwe oririisa abantu bangye Israeli, kandi niiwe oriba omugabe waabo.
Batyo abakuru ba Israeli boona baashanga omugabe Daudi Heburooni; kandi okwo niyo yaaraganiire nabo endagaano omu maisho ga MUKAMA, bakamushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli.
Kandi Daudi, obu yaaza aha ngoma, akaba ahikize emyaka makumi ashatu, yaamara emyaka makumi ana ari aha ngoma.
Omuri Heburooni akamaramu emyaka mushanju n'ameezi mukaaga naategyeka Yuda; kandi omuri Yerusaalemu yaamaramu emyaka makumi ashatu n'eshatu, naategyeka Israeli yoona na Yuda.
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, Daudi akakwata ekigo kya Saayuuni, nirwo rurembo rwa Daudi.

Kandi ahari eryo izooba Daudi akaba agizire ati: Orikwenda kuteera aba Yebusi, atembe ahu amaizi garikwerekyerera, abone kwita biri birema n'empumi, ebi Daudi arikwanga. Nikyo bagirira bati: Empumi n'ebirema bitaritaaha omu nju.
Atyo Daudi yaatuura omuri ekyo kigo, yaakyeta orurembo rwa Daudi. Yaakyombekaho amaju okukyehinguririza, okuruga Miilo n'okugaruka omunda.
Daudi yaaguma naayeyongyera kugira ekitiinisa; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe akaba ari hamwe nawe.
Daudi yaamanyira aho ku MUKAMA amuhamize kuba omugabe wa Israeli, kandi ku aimukize obugabe bwe ahabw'abantu be Israeli.
Aga nigo maziina g'abaana abu baamuzaariire ari Yerusaalemu Shamua, Shobabu, Nasani, Sulemaani,
Ibuhaari, Elishua, Nefegi, Yafia,
Elishaama, Eliada na Elifeleti.
Abafilistia ku baahuriire ngu Daudi ashukirweho amajuta kuba omugabe w'Abaisraeli, boona baimuka, baaza kusherura Daudi. Daudi ku yaabihuriire, yaashuuma, yaaza omu kigo.
Omu bunaku obwo Abafilistia bakaba baizire, bajanjaire oruhita rw'Abareefa rwona.

Daudi yaayehanuuza ahari MUKAMA naabuuza ati: Nyinamukye, ndwane n'Abafilistia? Noija kubahayo omu mikono yangye? MUKAMA yaagarukamu Daudi ati: Inamuka, ahakuba buzimazima niinyija kuhayo Abafilistia omu mikono yaawe.
Atyo Daudi yaaza Baali-peraziimu, yaabaitirayo. Bwanyima yaagira ati: MUKAMA ahigwire abazigu bangye omu maisho gangye, nk'oku amizi gahigura omucungiro. Nikyo yaayeteire ogwo mwanya Baali-peraziimu.
Abafilistia baatsigayo ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, Daudi n'abashaija be baabitwara.
Ku haahingwire ebiro, Abafilistia baagaruka bainamuka, baajanjaara oruhita rw'Abareefa.
Daudi ku yaayehanwize ahari MUKAMA, MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Otainamukayo; kureka obakiikuukye, obareetwe enyima ahashungaine n'akabira k'emitugunda.
Bwanyima ku oraahurire enshwagara aha mitwe y'emitugunda, ahonaaho oyehuute, ahabw'okuba obwo MUKAMA naaba akwebembeire kuteera engabo z'Abafilistia.
Daudi yaatwaza nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiira, yaagyenda naita Abafilistia okuruga Geeba, okuhika Gezeri.
Yaimuka, yaagyenda n'ezo ngabo zoona ezi yaabaire aine, baaza Baale eya Yuda, kwihayo eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, erikwetererwa Eiziina rya MUKAMA ow'amahe, oshutama ahari baakerubi.
Baatwarira eshanduukye ya Ruhanga aha kigaari kisya; baagiiha omu ka ya Abinadabu eyaabaire eri aha kibungo; kandi Uzza na Ahio batabani ba Abinadabu nibo baabaire nibatwara ekyo kigaari kisya,
ekyabaire kiriho eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, Ahio agyebembeire.
Daudi n'ab'enju ya Israeli boona baagyenda nibashemererwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA, nibeeshongora n'amaani gaabo goona, nibateera endingiri, n'enanga n'engarabi n'amataari n'ebitaasa.
MUKAMA yaagirira Uzaa ekiniga; Ruhanga yaamwitira aho, naamutura okuramira eshanduukye n'omukono gwe; yaafeera aho aha rubaju rw'eshanduukye ya Ruhanga.
Daudi yaaguubwa kubi ahabwa MUKAMA kugwa ahari Uzzaa; omwanya ogwo yaagweta Pereezi-uzzaa, n'okuhitsya hati.
Eryo izooba Daudi yaatiina MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Mbwenu eshanduukye ya MUKAMA neebaasa eta kuza owangye?
N'ahabwe'ekyo Daudi yaayanga kwihayo eshanduukye ya MUKAMA kugitwara owe omu rurembo rwa Daudi; yaagikiikamya, yaagitaasya omu nju ya Obededomu owa Gaasi.
Eshanduukye ya MUKAMA yaamara ameezi ashatu omu nju ya Obededomu owa Gaasi; MUKAMA yaamuha omugisha n'ab'omu ka ye boona.
Oku nikwo byatwaziibwe; abaheekire eshanduukye ya MUKAMA ku baagyenzireho entambwe mukaaga, Daudi yaatambiraho enimi y'ekimasha n'enyana y'ebishaju.
Daudi yaayemurikira omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'amaani ge goona, ayezirikire efodi ya kitaani.
Atyo Daudi n'ab'enju ya Israeli boona bainamura eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, nibateera akaari n'amakondere.

Bwanyima eshanduukye ya MUKAMA ku yaabaire neetaaha omu rurembo rwa Daudi, Mikaali muhara wa Saulo yaaringuririza omu dirisa, yaareeba omugabe Daudi naayemurika kandi naazinira omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yamugayira aha mutima.
Baataasya eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, baagita omu mwanya gwayo omu ihema eri Daudi agiteereireho; Daudi yaatamba ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi ku yaaherize kutamba ebyo bitambo by'okwotsya n'ezo mpongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, yaashabira abantu omugisha omu iziina rya MUKAMA ow'amahe,

yaagaburira abantu boona, ab'eihanga ryona erya Israeli, abashaija n'abakazi, buri muntu omugaati, entongo y'enyama n'omwate gw'emizaabibu eyomire. Okuruga aho abantu boona baarugayo, buri muntu yaataaha owe.

Daudi yaagarukamu Mikaali ati: Ekyo naakikorera omu maisho ga MUKAMA owantooraine akaanyeshumbya sho n'ab'omu ka ye boona, akangira omugabe w'abantu be Israeli; nikyo ndigumira niinyemurikira omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi niinyija kwongyera kwehindura orikugaywa okukira aho, n'okwegarura ahansi omu maisho gaawe; kwonka abo bazaana abu waagambaho, bo baryampa ekitiinisa.
Okuruga aho Mikaali muhara wa Saulo tiyaagira bu azaara okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaafeereireho.
Bwanyima omugabe yaagira nabi Nasani ati: Reeba hati, ndi omu nju y'emyereezi, kwonka eshanduukye ya Ruhanga eri omu ihema.
Nasani yaagira omugabe ati: Irooko okore ekikuri aha mutima kyona, ahakuba MUKAMA ari hamwe naiwe.
Ekyo kiro ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaizira Nasani nikigira kiti:
Irooko ogambire omwiru wangye Daudi oti: MUKAMA naagira ati: Ebyo oryanyombekyera enju y'okutaahamu?
Noomanya ku ntakatuuraga mu nju, okwiha obu naiha Abaisraeli Misiri n'okuhitsya hati, kureka nkaba ngyendagyenda nintaaha omu ihema.

Nimugira ngu omu myanya yoona ei naabaire ngyendamu n'Abaisraeli boona, nkaba ndagizire omwe aha baramuzi ba Israeli abu naaragiire kuriisa abantu bangye Israeli nti: Ahabw'enki mutakanyombekyeraga nju y'emyereezi?
N'habw'ekyo ogire omwiru wangye Daudi oti: MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Nkakwiha omu iriisizo nooriisa entaama, ngu nkuhindure omutegyeki w'abantu bangye Israeli,
kandi nkaba nguma naiwe ahu waabaire oza hoona, ncwekyerereza abazigu baawe omu maisho gaawe; kandi ndyakuha eiziina rikuru nk'ery'abantu rugambwa ab'omu nsi.
Ndyatooranira abantu bangye Israeli omwanya, mbabyaremu, babone kugira obutaka bw'okutuuramu, obu batariihwamu bundi. Kandi abantu babi tibarigaruka kubaita kubi nk'obunyakare,
obu naabaire ndagiira abaramuzi kutegyeka abantu bangye Israeli; kandi ndyakuha okuhuumura abazigu baawe boona. N'ekindi, MUKAMA naakugambira ku arikuhindura oruganda.
Ogwo niwe aryombekyera eiziina ryangye enju; kandi ndyahamya ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe ebiro byona.
Ndyaba ishe, nawe abe omwana wangye; ku aricumura, ndyamuhanisa enkoni z'abantu, babe nibo baamuteera;
kwonka embabazi zangye tizirimurugaho, nk'oku naaziihire ahari Saulo ou naacwire nkaiha omu maisho gaawe.
Enju yaawe n'obugabe bwawe biryahamibwa ebiro byona, n'ekitebe ky'obugabe bwawe kiryaba eky'ebiro byona.
Ebyo bigambo byona n'okwo kworekwa kwona, Nasani yaabiteekyerereza Daudi nk'oku byabaire biri.
Bwanyima Daudi omugabe yaataaha omu Ihema, yaashutama omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Niinye oha, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga? Kandi n'enju yangye nikyo ki, iwe okundinda okampitsya aha?
