Kwonka ekyo ahariiwe ni kikye, MUKAMA Ruhanga; mbwenu waayongyeraho n'okugamba aha by'enju y'omwiru waawe oku eriba omu biro bingi munonga ebiriija, nk'oku kiba omu biragiro by'abantu, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga.
Mbwenu shi, ekindi Daudi akugambire ki? Ahabw'okuba noomanya omwiru waawe, MUKAMA Ruhanga.
Ahabw'endagaano yaawe okakora ebikuru ebyo byona, kubimanyisa omwiru waawe, nk'oku omutima gwawe gwateekateekire.
Nikyo obeera mukuru, MUKAMA Ruhanga; ahakuba tihariho orikushushana naiwe, kandi tihariho Ruhanga ondiijo kureka Iwe, nk'ebi twahuriire byona oku biri.

Kandi ni ihanga ki omu nsi eriri nk'abantu baawe Israeli, abu Ruhanga yaagiire kwecungurira kuba abantu be, ngu ayetungire eiziina, ahabw'okubakorera ebikuru kandi ebirikutiinisa, naabinga omu maisho gaabo eihanga na baaruhanga baaryo?
Bwanyima okeehamiza abantu baawe Israeli, ngu babe eihanga eri waayetooraniire ebiro byona; naiwe, MUKAMA, okaba Ruhanga waabo.
Mbwenu hati, MUKAMA Ruhanga, ekigambo eki waagamba aha mwiru waawe n'aha nju ye, okihamye ebiro byona, kandi okore nk'oku waagamba;
n'eiziina ryawe riryahimbisibwa ebiro byona, bagire bati: MUKAMA ow'amahe niwe Ruhanga wa Israeli; kandi enju y'omwiru waawe Daudi eryahamibwa omu maisho gaawe.
Ahakuba Iwe, MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, oshuuruuriire omwiru waawe, noogira oti: Ndyakwombekyera enju; nikyo omwiru waawe agiriire obumanzi bw'okukushaba ebigambo ebi.
Mbwenu hati, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga, niiwe Ruhanga, n'ebigambo byawe n'eby'amazima, kandi oraganiise omwiru waawe, ekigambo ekyo ekirungi.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati ikiriza kuha enju y'omwiru waawe omugisha, egumeho ebiro byona omu maisho gaawe, ahakuba niiwe waakigamba, MUKAMA Ruhanga; kandi omugisha gwawe gugume guheebwe enju y'omwiru waawe ebiro byona.

Bwanyima yaasingura Abamoabu, yaabarambika ahansi, yaabagyeresa omuguha; emishorongo ebiri yaaba ey'okwitwa, n'omushorongo gumwe gwaba ogw'okukira. Okuruga aho Abamoabu baahinduka abahuuku ba Daudi, baaguma nibamutoijera.

Daudi yaamunyagaho engabo z'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi rukumi na magana mushanju, n'abarikugyendesa ebigyere obukumi bubiri; bwanyima Daudi yaatema ebiteega by'embaraasi ezirikukurura ebigaari zoona; kwonka yaatsigaho ezirikubaasa kukurura ebigaari igana.
Abasiria ba Damasiko ku baizire kuha Hadadezeeri omugabe wa Zooba emikono, Daudi yaabaitamu abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri.
Bwanyima Daudi yaata emitwe y'abarinzi omuri Siria eya Damasiko; n'Abasiria baahinduka abahuuku ba Daudi, baaguma nibamutoijera Kandi MUKAMA yaaguma naaha Daudi obusinguzi ahu yaabaire aza hoona.
Daudi yaanyaga engabo z'ezaabu ezi abagaragwa ba Hadadezeeri baabaire baine, yaazitwara Yerusaalemu.
Kandi omugabe Daudi yaiha emiringa mingi munonga omuri Beeta na Berosai, endembo za Hadadezeri.
Toi omugabe wa Hamasi ku yaahuriire ngu Daudi asingwire eihe ryona erya Hadadezeeri,

yaatuma Yoramu omutabani aha mugabe Daudi kumuramutsya n'okumutabaarutsya ahabw'okurwana na Hadadezeeri n'okumusingura; ahabw'okuba Hadadezeeri akaba atuura naarwana na Toi. Yoramu ogwo yaijana ebintu by'efeeza, eby'ezaabu n'eby'emiringa.
Ebyo nabyo omugabe Daudi yaabishoroorera MUKAMA hamwe n'efeeza n'ezaabu ebi yaabaire ashoroire, abiihire omu mahanga goona agu yaabaire asingwire,
ebya Siria, ebya Moabu, eby'Abaamoni, eby'Abafilistia, ebya Amaleki, n'eby'eminyago ya Hadadezeeri mwene Rehobu omugabe wa Zooba.
Daudi yaayetungira atyo eiziina.
Ku yaabaire naagaruka, yaitira omu ruhita rw'omwonyo Abanyaedomu kakumi n'enkumi munaana.
Yaata emitwe y'abarinzi omuri Edomu; yaababuzya Edomu yoona; Abanyaedomu boona baahinduka abahuuku be. MUKAMA yaaguma naaha Daudi obusinguzi ahu yaabaire aza goona.
Atyo Daudi yaategyeka Israeli yoona, kandi yaacwera abantu be boona emanja z'oburyo omu bwinganisa.
Obwo Yoabu mwene Zeruiya akaba ari omukuru w'eihe, Yehoshafaati mwene Ahiluudi ari omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho;
Zadoki mwene Ahitubu na Ahimeleki mwene Abiasaari bari abanyamurwa; Seraaya ari omuhandiiki;
Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada ari omukuru w'aba Keresi n'aba Pelesi; kandi batabani ba Daudi bari abategyeki bakuru.
Omu biro ebyo hakaba hariho omuheereza ow'omu nju ya Saulo orikwetwa Ziiba; baamwetera Daudi omugabe, yaamubuuza ati: Niiwe Ziiba? Onu ati: Niinye omwiru waawe.
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Omu nju ya Saulo haine okiriho nkamukorera eby'embabazi za Ruhanga? Ziiba yaamugarukamu ati: Hakiriho mutabani wa Yonasaani, oremaire ebigyere.
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Arahi? Ziiba yaamugarukamu ati: Ari Lodebaari omu nju ya Makiri mwene Amieli.
Omugabe Daudi nikwo kutuma, bakamwiha Lodebaari omu nju ya Makiri mwene Amieli.
Atyo Mefiboshesi mwene Yonasaani, mwijukuru wa Saulo yaija owa Daudi, yaajuumara omu maisho ge, yaamutangirira. Daudi yaamugira ati: Mefioshesi! Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Omwiru waawe ari aha.

Daudi yaamugira ati: Otatiina, ahabw'okuba buzimazima niinyija kukukorera eby'embabazi ahabwa Yonasaani sho, nkugarurire ebibanja bya shwenkuru byona; kandi oryaguma nooriira aha meeza yangye obutoosha.
Mefiboshesi yaagaruka yaamwinamira, yaagira ati: Omwiru waawe ni kintu ki, iwe okuunyetaho, nyowe embwa efiire?
Bwanyima omugabe yaayeta Ziiba omuheereza wa Saulo, yaamugira ati: Ebyabaire biri ebya Saulo byona n'eby'ab'omu ka ye boona, naabiha mutabani wa mukama waawe.

Kandi iwe na batabani baawe n'abairu baawe mugume mumuhingire emisiri, mumureetere ebyezire, mutabani wa mukama waawe abone kutunga eby'okurya; kwonka Mefiboshesi mutabani wa mukama waawe aryaguma naariira aha meeza yangye obutoosha. Kandi Ziiba ogwo akaba aine abatabani ikumi na bataano, n'abairu makumi abiri.
Ziiba yaagira omugabe ati: Ebi Nyakusinga omugabe yaaragiira omwiru we byona, omwiru we nikwo araagume naabitwaza. Okuruga aho Mefiboshesi yaaguma naariira aha meeza y'omugabe, nk'omwana w'omugabe.
Kandi Mefiboshesi akaba aine omutabani muto orikwetwa Miika; ab'omu ka ya Ziiba boona bakaba bari abairu ba Mefiboshesi.
Atyo Mefiboshesi yaaguma Yerusaalemu, ahakuba akaba ariira aha meeza y'omugabe obutoosha; kandi akaba aremaire ebigyere byombi.

Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: Niinyija kukorera gye Hanuni mwene Nahashi, nk'oku ishe yankoreire gye. Atyo Daudi yaayohereza abagaragwa be kumuyaagira ahabw'okufeerwa ishe. Abagaragwa ba Daudi baahika omu nsi y'Abaamoni.

Kwonka abategyeki b'Abaamoni baagira Hanuni mukama waabo bati: Noogira ngu Daudi okukwoherereza ab'okukuyaagira n'okuha sho ekitiinisa? Torikumanya ku Daudi ayohereize abagaragwa be kwetegyereza orurembo n'okurutata, ngu arumareho?
N'ahabw'ekyo Hanuni yaakwata abagaragwa ba Daudi, yaabamwa ebireju by'orubaju rumwe, yaahirimburira rwagati ekicweka kya ifo eky'ebijwaro byabo okugarukira aha bibunu, yaaboohereza.
Ku baabigambiire Daudi, yaayohereza ab'okubabugana, ahabw'okuba bakaba baine enshoni nyingi munonga. Omugabe yaabatumaho ati: Mugume Yeriko okuhitsya obu obureju burikura, mukaija.
Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaayohereza Yoabu n'eihe ryona ery'amamanzi.
Abaamoni baashohora, baatenga orugamba aha irembo; kandi Abasiria ba Zooba n'aba Rehobu n'engabo za Tobu na Maaka bakaba bari ahakwabo omu ishwa.
Yoabu ku yaareebire engabo zimuri omumaisho n'enyima, yaatoorana abashaija entoore omu Baisraeli boona, yaabatengyesa orugamba kurwana n'Abasiria;
abandi boona yaabaha omurumuna Abishai, nawe yaabatengyesa orugamba kurwana n'Abaamoni.
Yaamugira ati: Abasiria ku barankize amaani, oije ompe emikono; kandi naiwe Abaamoni ku baraakukize amaani, naanye niinyija kugikuha.
Guma omutima, turwane mashaija ahabw'eihanga ryaitu n'ahabw'endembo za Ruhanga waitu; kandi MUKAMA akore eki arikusiima.
Atyo Yoabu n'engabo ezi yaabaire aine, bairira haihi kurwanisa Abasiria; Abasiria baabahunga.
Abaamoni ku baareebire Abasiria baahunga, nabo baahunga Abishai, baataaha omu rurembo rwabo. Bwanyima Yoabu yaareka Abaamoni, yaagaruka Yerusaalemu.
Kwonka Abasiria ku baareebire babingirwe Abaisraeli, baayeteerana.
Hadadezeeri yaatuma aha Basiria abaabaire batwire seeri y'omugyera Furaati baarugayo, baaza Helamu, beebembeirwe Shobaki omukuru w'eihe rya Hadadezeeri.
Ku baagambiire Daudi, nawe yaateerana Israeli yoona, baayambuka Yorudani, baaza Helamu, Abasiria baatenga orugamba, baarwana na Daudi.
Abasiria baahunga Abaisraeli, Daudi yaita omu Basiria abantu abarikurwanira aha bigaari magana mushanju, n'ab'aha mbaraasi obukumi buna, kandi baacumita Shobaki omukuru w'eihe ryabo, baamugwisaho.
Abo bagabe boona abaabaire nibaheereza Hadadezeeri, ku baareebire baasingurwa Abaisraeli, baabeehongyera, baabatabaarira. N'ahabw'ekyo Abasiria baatiina kugaruka kuha Abaamoni emikono.

Eizooba rimwe omu mwabazyo, Daudi yaimuka aha kitanda kye, yaagyendagyenda aha mutwe gwa nyaruju y'omugabe. Ku yaabaire ayemereireho, yaareeba omukazi naayoga; kandi omukazi ogwo akaba ari murungi munonga w'okurigira.
Daudi yaatuma kumubuuririza. Omuntu omwe yaagira ati: Beitu ogwo ti Batisheba muhara wa Eliamu, muka Uriya Omuhiiti?
Daudi yaatuma entumwa, zaamureeta, yaija owe, Daudi yaabyama nawe; ahakuba akaba azirukire; bwanyima yaagaruka omuka.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro bikye, yaagira enda, yaatuma ahari Daudi ati: Nyine enda.
N'ahabw'ekyo Daudi yaatuma ahari Yoabu ati: Nyoherereza Uriya Omuhiiti. Atyo Yoabu yaamumwoherereza.
Uriya ku yaahikire Daudi, Daudi yaamubuuza oku Yoabu ari n'engabo ze, n'ahu obweme bwahika.
Bwanyima Daudi yaamugira ati: Irooko oshuume owaawe, onaabe aha bigyere. Atyo Uriya yaaruga omuri nyaruju y'omugabe, omugabe yaamukuratsa eky'okumufungurira.
Kwonka Uriya yaabyama aha irembo rya nyaruju hamwe n'abaheereza ba mukama we, tiyaataaha mu ka ye.
Ku baagambiire Daudi ku Uriya atataahire muka, Daudi yaabuuza Uriya ati: Beitu shi torikuruga omu rugyendo? N'enki ekikuzibiire kutaaha omuka?

Uriya yaagarukamu Daudi ati: Eshanduukye ya Ruhanga n'Abaisraeli n'Abayuda nibaraara omu nsiisira; kandi mukama wangye Yoabu n'abagaragwa ba mukama wangye basiisiire omu ishwa. Mbwenu nyowe nze omuka kurya, kunywa n'okuraara n'omukazi wangye? Buso bwawe, ninkurahira tindikwija kukikora.
Daudi yaagira Uriya ati: Siiba aha n'eri izooba, nyencakare nkuragye ogyende. Atyo Uriya yaasiiba Yerusaalemu eryo izooba n'eryakuratsireho.
Daudi yaamweta, yaarya, yaanywera omu maisho ge, yaamusinza. Nyekiro Uriya yaashohora, yaaza kubyama aha kitanda kye hamwe n'abagaragwa ba mukama we, tiyaagira bu agiire omuka.
Ku bwaseesire, Daudi yaahandiikira Yoabu ebaruha, yaagitweka Uriya.
Omuri egyo baruha yaahandiikamu ati: Mute Uriya omu kaso k'orugamba, ahu ruhamire, mumutsigyeho, bamucumite, afe.
Bwanyima Yoabu ku yaabaire agotsire orurembo, yaata Uriya ahu arikumanya ku niho amamanzi gari.
Abanyarurembo baashohora, baarwana na Yoabu, abamwe aha bagaragwa ba Daudi baafa, na Uriya Omuhiiti nawe yaafa.
Yoabu yaayohereza entumwa kugambira Daudi amakuru goona ag'orugamba,
yaayehanangiriza entumwa, naagira ati: Ku oraaheze kugambira omugabe amakuru g'orugamba,
yaaguubwa kubi, yaakugira ati: Ahabw'enki murwaine mukahika haihi n'orurembo? Mubaire mutarikumanya ku barikubaasa kubarasha, beemereire aha rugo rw'amabaare?

Nimugira ngu owaitsire Abimeleki mwene Yerubeshesi n'oha? T'omukazi owaamuteereire eseiso Tebeza ayemereire aha rugo, akamugwisaho? Ahabw'enki muhikire haihi n'orugo mutyo? naiwe omugarukyemu oti: Manya omushaija waawe Uriya Omuhiiti nawe afiire.
Etyo entumwa yaagyenda, yaagambira Daudi ebi Yoabu agitumire byona.
Entumwa yaagira Daudi eti: Abantu baayo batubingire, baatuhitsya omu ishwa ahi tubaire turi, kwonka naitwe twababinga, twarugaho twabahitsya omu irembo.
Bwanyima abarasi abaabaire beemereire aha rugo baarasha abairu baawe; mbwenu bamwe aha bagaragwa b'omugabe bafiire, Omuhiiti yaabafamu.

Daudi yaagira egyo ntumwa ati: Oku nikwo oraagire Yoabu oti: Ekyo kirekye kukugwisa kubi; ahakubi rurara eita omuntu, obundi eita ondiijo. Yeyongyere kuhamya orugamba; orwane n'orurembo, orusingure. Kandi naiwe, ku Oraakikyeyo, omugumye.
Muka Uriya ku yaahuriire ngu iba afiire, yaamucurira.
Ku baarugire omu rufu, Daudi yaamutuma, yaamutaasya omwe, yaaba omukazi we, yaamuzaarira omwana w'omwojo. Kwonka eki Daudi yaakozire kyagwisa kubi MUKAMA.
Ogwo mutungi akaba aine amasyo maingi g'entaama n'ag'ente,

kwonka ogwo mworo akaba ataine kindi eki atungire, kureka akaagazi k'entaama kamwe, aku yaabaire aguzire. Yaakoorora, kaakurira owe n'abaana be; kaaguma nikarya aha tw'okurya twe, nikanywera aha kikopo kye, kandi nikabyama omu kifuba kye; kaaba nka muhara we.

Eizooba rimwe ogwo mutungi yaaraarirwa omugyenyi; kwonka tiyaayenda kubaagira ogwo muhinguzi owaamuraarira omu masyo ge g'entaama nari ag'ente, kureka yaatwara ako kataama k'ori mworo, yaaba niko yaamubaagira.
Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaagirira ogwo mushaija ekiniga kingi munonga, yaagira Nasani ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, omushaija okozire ekyo kintu akaabaire ow'okufa;
mbwenu arihe ako kataama kana ahabw'okukora ekyo n'ahabw'okutagira saasi.
naakuha enju ya mukama waawe, n'abakazi be kukushegura; kandi naakuha enju ya Israeli n'eya Yuda. Eki ku kyakubaire kiri kikye, nkaakwongyeire ebindi bingi.
Ahabw'enki ogayire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, okakora ekirikwangwa omu maisho ge? Oitsire Uriya Omuhiiti na rurara, waatwara omukazi we, waamushwera; waamwitsa rurara y'Abaamoni.
N'ahabw'ekyo rurara teriruga mu ka yaawe, ahabw'okungaya, okatwara muka Uriya Omuhiiti kuba omukazi waawe.
Kandi MUKAMA naakugira ati: Ndyaimutsya ebihikiirizi omu ka yaawe, nkwakye abakazi baawe nooreeba, mbahe mutaahi waawe, abyame nabo nyomushana.
Okakikora bwesherekye, kwonka ekyangye ndyakikora nyomushana omu maisho ga Israeli yoona.
Daudi yaagira Nasani ati: Ncumwire ahari MUKAMA. Naasani yaagira Daudi ati: MUKAMA nawe yaihaho ekibi kyawe; tokifa.
Kwonka ahabw'ekyo eki okozire, okareetera abazigu ba MUKAMA kumujuma, omwana ogwo ozairwe buzimazima naija kufa.
Bwanyima Nasani yaagarukayo owe. MUKAMA yaarwza ogwo mwana, ou muka Uriya yaazaariire Daudi, yaaremba munonga.
N'ahabw'ekyo Daudi yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA ahabwe; Daudi yaayesiibyakwo, yaataaha omu nju, yaabyama ahansi, bwarugaho bwasheesha.
Abakuru b'enju ye baamwemerera aha rubaju kumwimutsya ahansi, yaabangira, kandi tiyaarya nabo.

Aha kiro kya mushanju, ogwo mwana yaakaba. Abagaragwa ba Daudi baatiina kumugambira ku omwana yaakaba; ahakuba bakagira bati: Reeba, ku turaabe tumugambiire, omwana akihuriire, akanga kutuhurira, nitwija kumugambira tuta omwana yaakabire? Tarikwija kwekora kubi?
Kwonka Daudi, ku yaareebire abagaragwa nibagambirana omu kutu, yaamanyira aho ku omwana yaakaba. Daudi yaababuuza ati: Omwana yaakaba? Baamugarukamu bati: Yaakaba.
Daudi yaimuka ahansi, yaayoga, yaayesiiga, yaahindura ebijwaro bye, yaataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA, yaaramya. Ku yaaherize, yaataaha omwe, yaashaba eby'okurya, baabimuta omumaisho, yaarya.
Abagaragwa be baamubuuza bati: Eki waakora ki? Oyesiibizekwo, waaririra omwana akihuriire; mbwenu omwana ku yaaheza kufa, waimuka waarya!
Daudi yaagira ati: Omwana obu abaire akihuriire, nyesiibizekwo, naarira; ahakuba ngizire nti: N'oha orikumanya ngu MUKAMA tarikwija kungirira embabazi, omwana akagumaho?
Mbwenu ka yaafiire, niinyesiibizakwo ki? Nimbaasa kumuhimbuura? Ndyamukurata, kwonka we taringarukira.
yaatuma nabi Nasani, yaamweta Yedidiya ahabwa MUKAMA.
Yoabu yaatuma entumwa ahari Daudi, naagira ati: Ndwaniise Rabba, kandi naakwata orurembo rw'amaizi.
N'ahabw'ekyo oteerane engabo ezitsigaireho, ziteere ensiisira ahari orwo rurembo, obe niiwe waarukwata, ntakaarukwata, rukaanyetererwa.
Atyo Daudi yaateerana engabo zoona, yaaza Rabba, yaagirwanisa, yaagikwata.

Yaiha ekirunga aha mutwe gwa Milikomu, ekishushani kyabo ekirikuramibwa, oburemeezi bwakyo etalanta emwe y'ezaabu, ekyabaire kirimu eibaare ry'obuguzi bwingi; baakita aha mutwe gwa Daudi. Kandi omuri orwo rurembo yaanyagamu eminyago mingi munonga.

Yaihamu abantu abaabaire barimu, yaabashara n'emisimeeno n'ebyoma by'amaino, n'empango z'ebyoma, yaabarabya omu tanuuru z'amatafaari; okwo nikwo yaagizire endembo zoona ez'Abaamoni. Bwanyima Daudi n'engabo zoona baagaruka Yerusaalemu.
Amunooni ahabw'okurigira okwo okubi oku yaarigiire Tamari munyaanya, yaarwara; ahabw'okuba munyaanya ogwo akaba ari omwishiki otakamanyire mushaija; kandi yaareeba kigumire kugira eki yaamukoraho.
Kwonka Amunooni akaba aine munywani we orikwetwa Yonadabu, mwene Shimea mukuru wa Daudi; kandi Yonadabu ogwo akaba ari enyabwengye.
Yaamubuuza ati: Iwe mutabani w'omugabe 'we, ahabw'enki noogyenda noohwa aha magufa? Tokaakingambira? Amunooni yaamugarukamu ati: Ndigiire Tamari, munyaanya wa Abusalomu, mwene tata.

Yonadabu yaamugira ati: Irooko obyame aha kitanda kyawe, oyerwaze; bwanyima sho ku araije kukureeba, omugire oti: Ninkweshengyereza, ikiriza munyaanyazi Tamari aije, andeetere eby'okurya, abiteekyere omu maisho gangye nimbireeba, mbiriire omu ngaro ze.

Atyo Amunooni yaabyama, yaayerwaza; bwanyima omugabe ku yaizire kumureeba, Amunooni yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ntwekyera munyaanyazi Tamari, aije, anteekyere omumaisho otukeeki tubiri, nturiire omu ngaro ze.
Daudi nikwo kutuma omuka ahari Tamari, akamugira ati: Irooko oze owa munyaanyoko Amunooni, omuteekyere eby'okurya.
Atyo Tamari yaaza owa munyaanya, yaashanga abyami. Yaagira eisyanga, yaaribumbabumba, yaarikoreramu otukeeki omu maisho ge, yaatuteeka.
Yaakwata eky'okukarangaho, yaatumwihurira omumaisho, kwonka yaayanga kurya. Amunooni yaagira ati: Abashaija boona baampigize. Abashaija boona bamuhigiza, baashohora.
Amunooni yaagira Tamari ati: Reeta eby'okurya omu kishengye, mbiriire omu ngaro zaawe. Tamari nikwo kugira otwo tukeeki, otu yaateeka, akatutwarira munyaanya Amunooni omu kishengye.
Ku yaatumuhikize ngu arye, yaamukwata, yaamugira ati: Ija obyame naanye, munyaanyazi.
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ngaaha, munyaanyazi, otampamba; ahakuba ekintu nk'ekyo tikikorwa muri Israeli; otakora eky'obufamutima nk'ekyo.
Mbwenu nkaanye, ekyo kihagaro nkaatoora hi nakyo? Kandi naiwe okaahinduka ekifa-mutima omuri Israeli. Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, okigambire omugabe; ahakuba tarikwija kukuunyima.
Kwonka yaayanga kumuhurira; kandi ahabw'okumukiza amaani, yaamuhamba, yaabyama nawe.
Okuruga aho Amunooni yaamwanga okutakareebwaga; kandi okwanga oku yaamwangire kukakira okukunda oku yaabaire naamukunda. Amunooni yaamugira ati: Imuka ogyende.
Kwonka onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ngaaha, munyaanyazi; ahakuba ekibi eki eki orikukora kumbinga ni kihango okukira ekyo eki wankora. Amunooni yaayanga kumuhurira.
Yaayeta omutsigazi owaabaire naamuheereza, yaamugira ati: Nyiha ogu mwishiki omumaisho; ku araashohore, omukuratse orwigi, orukome.
Kandi Tamari akaba ajwaire ekijwaro ky'emikono miraingwa, ahakuba bahara b'omugabe abatakashweirwe nikwo baabaire bajwara. Atyo omuheereza wa Amunooni yaamushohoza, yaakoma orwigi.
Tamari yaayeshukyera eiju omu mutwe, yaataagura ekyo kijwaro ky'emikono miraingwa eki yaabaire ajwaire, yaayekorera emikono, yaagyenda naaborooga.

Bwanyima munyaanya Abusalomu yaamubuuza ati: Munyaanyoko Amunooni yaaba ari hamwe naiwe? Mbwenu hunama, munyaanyazi; manya nawe ni munyaanyoko; ekyo orekye kukitaho omutima. Atyo Tamari yaaguma owa munyaanya Abusalomu, ari enshoberwa.
Omugabe Daudi ku yaahuriire ebyo byona, yaagira ekiniga kingi;
kwonka Abusalomu tiyaagira ki yaagambira Amunooni, yaaba kibi nari kirungi; ahabw'okuba akamwanga ahabw'okuhamba Tamari munyaanya.
Yaija aha mugabe, yaamugira ati: Reeba, omwiru waawe aine abakyemuzi b'entaama; ninshaba omugabe n'abairu be, bagyende n'omwiru waawe.
Kwonka omugabe yaagira Abusalomu ati: Ngaaha, mwana wangye, ka turekye kugyenda twena, tutakaakurusya. Abusalomu yaamugyemesereza kwonka onu yaayanga, yaamushabira omugisha.
Bwanyima Abusalomu yaamugira ati: Ku oraabe otarikwija, reka tugyende na Amunooni mukuru wangye. Omugabe yaamugira ati: Ahabw'enki ashemereire kugyenda naiwe?
Abusalomu yaamugyemesereza, okuhitsya obu yaikiriize Amunooni na batabani b'omugabe boona kugyenda nawe.

Bwanyima Abusalomu yaaragiira abaheereza be ati: Mugume mutaire eriisho ahari Amunooni; ku murareebe yaasinda viinyo, nkabagira nti: Muteere Amunooni, mumwite mutatiina. Tiinye naabaragiira? Mugume omutima, mube emanzi.
Batyo abaheereza ba Abusalomu baagira Amunooni nk'oku Abusalomu yaabaragiira. Ahonaaho batabani b'omugabe boona baimuka, buri omwe yaayenaga aha nyumbu ye, baahunga.
Ku baabaire bakiri omu muhanda, enkuru yaahika Daudi ngu Abusalomu aitsire batabani b'omugabe boona, tihaatsigaraho na wa kizira.
Omugabe yaimuka, yaataagura ebijwaro bye, yaabyama ahansi; n'abagaragwa be boona abaabaire beemereireho nabo baataagura ebijwaro byabo.

Kwonka Yonadabu, mwene Shimea mukuru w'omugabe, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye atagira ngu baitsire abatsigazi boona, batabani b'omugae; kureka ofiire ni Amunooni wenka, ahabw'okuba okwiha obu yaahamba munyaanya Tamari, Abusalomu akamariirira kukora ekyo, kandi niwe akiragiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo mukama wangye omugabe arekye kukitaho omutima, akagira ngu batabani b'omugabe boona bafiire; kureka Amunooni wenka niwe afiire.
Okuruga aho Abusalomu yaahunga. Bwanyima omutsigazi owaabaire naarinda, ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba abantu baingi nibareetwa omuhanda ogurikuruga Horonaimu aha rubaju rw'ekibungo.
Yonadabu yaagira omugabe ati: Reeba, batabani b'omugabe baija, nk'oku omwiru waawe yaagira, nikwo byaba.
Ku yaabaire yaaheza ati kugamba, reeba batabani b'omugabe baija, baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baaborooga; omugabe nawe n'abagaragwa be boona baarira munonga.
Atyo Abusalomu yaahunga, yaaza Geshuri, yaamarayo emyaka eshatu.
Bwanyima Daudi yaayetenga munonga kuza kureeba Abusalomu, ahakuba obusaasi bwa Amunooni bukaba bwamurugireho, ahabw'okureeba ku yaafiire.

Yoabu yaatuma Tekoa, yaihayo omukazi w'obwengye, yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, oyehindure nk'ofeereirwe, ojware ebijwaro by'ofeereirwe, orekye kwesiiga amajuta, kureka otwaze nk'omukazi omazire ebiro bingi ari omu rufu;
otaahe ow'omugabe omugambire ebigambo ebi. Atyo Yoabu yaamugambira ebi araagambe.
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Obaire ota? Yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ndi omufaakazi, omushaija wangye akafa.
Omuzaana waawe akaba aine abaana b'aboojo babiri. Ku baabaire bari omu ishwa, baatongana, baabura kiramura, omwe yaateera ondi, yaamwita.

Mbwenu reeba, abanyaruganda boona bayookyeire omuzaana waawe, baamugira bati, Tuheereze oitsire mukuru we, tumwite, tumuture ou aitsire. Mbwenu nibenda kwita n'omuhunguzi. Okwo nikwo barikwenda kuzimya eikara eri ntsigaire naryo, ngu batatsigira omushaija wangye eiziina omu nsi n'obu kwakuba okugira ou baatsigaho.
Omugabe yaagira ogwo mukazi ati: Garuka owaawe, naaza kugira eki naakora aha byawe.
Ogwo mukazi wa Tekoa yaagira omugabe ati: Mukama wangye, Nyakusinga omugabe, mbe niinye naagira orubanja, n'enju ya tata; kwonka omugabe n'engoma ye bitarugira.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Omuntu weena oraakugambeho, omundeetere, tarikugarukaho bundi.

Omukazi yaagira ati: Mbwenu Nyakusinga omugabe, ninkweshengyereza, rahira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ku hatakiija kubaho muhoozi w'enzigu obundi, bakacwekyereza mutabani wangye. Onu ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, n'obu kaakuba akashokye kamwe k'omwana waawe tikarigwa hansi.
Omukazi yaamugarukamu ati: Nyakusinga, omuzaana waawe k'agambire omugabe ekigambo kimwe. Onu ati: Gamba.
Omukazi yaabuuza ati: Ahabw'enki ocumiire abantu ba Ruhanga enaama erikushusha ebyo? Ahabw'okuba omu kutaho ekiragiro ekyo omugabe naaba naakyeteeraho, ahakuba takagaruraga muntu we owaabingirwe.

Twena turi ab'okufa, nitushusha nk'amaizi agaatikire ahansi, agatakibaasa kuyoorwa bundi; kandi na Ruhanga ahabwe taihiraho kimwe magara b'omuntu, kureka ataho oburyo, ngu ou yaabingire arekye kubeera kimwe encuubwa.

Mwenu naija kugambira mukama wangye omugabe ekigambo eki, ahabw'okuba abantu bantiiniise. Omuzaana waawe yaateekateeka, naagira ati: Mbwenu niinyija kugamba n'omugabe; obundi omugabe akaakorera omuzaana we eki yaamushaba;
ahakuba omugabe naija kubihurira, akize omuzaana we ogwo muntu orikwenda kumucwekyereza n'omwana we, n'okubaiha omu buhunguzi bwa Ruhanga.

Kandi omuzaana waawe ateekateekire ngu, Ekigambo kya mukama wangye omugabe nikiija kumpuumuza; ahakuba mukama wangye omugabe ni nka maraika wa Ruhanga omu kukyenga ebibi n'ebirungi. MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe agume naiwe!
Bwanyima omugabe yaagarukamu ogwo mukazi ati: Otanshereka ekigambo kyona eki ndaakubuuze. Omukazi yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye omugabe akigambe.

Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Beitu okwataniise na Yoabu omuri ebyo byona? Omukazi yaamugarukamu ati: Ninkurahira, mukama wangye omugabe, tihariho waakubaasa kutoora aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho, okwetantara ekigambo kyona eki mukama wangye omugabe yaagamba. N'ekya buzima omwiru waawe Yoabu niwe aragiire omuzaana waawe, kandi niwe ampaire ebigambo ebyo byona kubigamba.
Ahabw'okwenda ku bihinduka okundi, omwiru waawe Yoabu nikyo abitwariize atyo. Kandi mukama wangye n'omunyabwengye nka maraika wa Ruhanga, naamanya ebiri omu nsi byona.
Bwanyima omugabe yaagira Yoabu ati: Reeba mbwenu naikiriza; irooko, ogarure ogwo mutsigazi Abusalomu.

Yoabu yaagwa ahansi, yaajuumara omu maisho g'omugabe, yaamusiima; naagira ati: Eri izooba omwiru waawe yaamanya ku yaagirirwa embabazi omu maisho gaawe, Nyakusinga omugabe, ahabw'okuba omugabe yaakorera omwiru we eki amushabire.
Atyo Yoabu yaimuka, yaaza Geshuri, yaareeta Abusalomu Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima omugabe yaagira ati: Naagarukye omu ka ye, kwonka atarindeeba. Atyo Abusalomu yaaguma wenka omu ka ye, tiyaagira bu areebire omugabe.
Kandi omu Baisraeli boona tihariho waabaire naasiimwa nka Abusalomu ahabw'oburungi bwe; okuruga aha mara g'ekigyere okuhika aha kazingiro k'eishokye akaba ataine kamogo.
Aha muheru gwa buri mwaka akaba amweisa eishokye rye; ahabw'okumuremeera, nikyo yaabaire arimweisiza, kandi ku yaabaire arimweisa, oburemeezi bwaryo bukaba buba
Kandi Abusalomu akazaarirwa abaana b'aboojo bashatu, n'omwishiki owaabaire naayetwa Tamari; akaba ari omwishiki murungi omu kureeba.
Atyo Abusalomu yaamara emyaka ebiri Yerusaalemu, atarikureebana na mugabe.
Bwanyima Abusalomu yaatuma kweta Yoabu, ngu amutume aha mugabe; kwonka Yoabu yaayanga kwija. Yaagaruka yaamutumaho obwa kabiri; nabwo yaayanga kwija.
Nikwo kugambira abairu be ati: Reeba, omusiri gwa Yoabu guhereraine n'ogwangye; hati gurimu sayiri; mugyende mugwotsye. Batyo abairu ba Abusalomu baagyenda, baagwotsya.
Yoabu yaimuka, yaaza owa Abusalomu, yaamubuuza ati: Ahabw'enki abairu baawe baanyokyeize omusiri?

Abusalomu yaagarukamu Yoabu ati: Reeba nkutumireho ngu oije aha, nkutume aha mugabe, omumbuurize oti: Nkaihwa ki Geshuri? Haakiri kuri naagumireyo n'okuhitsya hati. Mbwenu omugabe anyikirize ndeebane nawe; ku harabe hariho okutahikiirira omuriinye, anyite.
Atyo Yoabu yaaza ow'omugabe, yaabimugambira. Bwanyima omugabe yaatuma ahari Abusalomu, yaija; ku yaahikire omugabe, yainama ahansi omu maisho ge; omugabe yaamunywegyera.

Kandi akaba aimuka kare, ayemerera aha rubaju rw'eirembo; omuntu weena owaabaire aija aha mugabe aine eki arikutongana, Abusalomu amweta, amubuuza ati: Ori owa rurembo ki? Onu amugarukamu ati: Nyowe omwiru waawe ndi ow'omu ruganda nanka orw'omu nganda za Israeli.
Abusalomu amugira ati: Reeba, orubanja rwawe ni rurungi kandi ruhikire; kwonka omugabe taine u atsigiire kuhurira ebyawe.
Abusalomu agaruka amugira ati: Kuri noogira ngu niinye muramuzi w'omu nsi egi, buri muntu weena owaakubaire aine eki arikufa nari orubanja, akaanyizireho, ncwa orubanja rwe omu buryo obuhikire.
Kandi omuntu ku yaabaire aija kumutangirira, akaba amukununkirira, amukwata, amunywegyera.
Okwo nikwo Abusalomu yaabaire atwaza Abaisraeli boona abaabaire bareeta emanja zaabo aha mugabe; omu buryo obwo Abusalomu yaiba emitima y'Abaisraeli.
Ahakuba nyowe, omwiru waawe, obu naabaire ndi Geshuri omuri Siria, nkahiga nindaganisa nti: MUKAMA ku aringarura Yerusaalemu, buzima ndyamuheereza.
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Gyenda n'obusingye. Atyo yaimuka yaaza Heburooni.
Kwonka Abusalomu yaayohereza entatsi omu nganda za Israeli zoona, naagira ati: Ku muraahurire okugamba kw'enzamba, ahonaaho mugire muti: Abusalomu yaaba omugabe omuri Heburooni.
Kandi omuri okwo kugyenda kwa Abusalomu akagyenda n'abashaija magana abiri, abu yaayetsire kugyenda nawe okuruga Yerusaalemu, baafa okugyenda bataine ki barikumanya.

Bwanyima Abusalomu ku yaabaire naatamba ebitambo bye, yaatuma kweta Ahisofeeli owa Giilo, omuhi w'obwengye wa Daudi kuruga omu rurembo rw'owaabo Giilo. Kutyo okwebumba okwo kwayeyongyera kuba okw'amaani, ahakuba abantu bakeeyongyera obutoosha kwebumba na Abusalomu.
Bwanyima haija entumwa ahari Daudi, yaagira eti: Emitima y'Abaisraeli ekumbiire ahari Abusalomu.

Daudi nikwo kugira abagaragwa be boona abu yaabaire aine Yerusaalemu ati: Nimwimukye tuhungye; ku turaabe tutahungire, tihariho n'omwe omuriitwe oraakire Abusalomu. Murahukye kugyenda, atakaatuhika, akatukora kubi, akacwekyereza orurembo na rurara.
Abagaragwa b'omugabe baamugira bati: Reeba, abairu baawe beeteekateekire kukora kyona eki mukama waitu omugabe arikusiima.
Atyo omugabe yaashohora n'ab'omu ka ye boona bamukuratiire; kwonka yaatsigamu abakazi ikumi b'ebinyanshunju kurinda eka.
Omugabe yaagyenda n'abantu boona bamukuratiire; ku baahikire Besi-merubaaki, baayemereraho.
Batyo abagaragwa be boona baamurabaho; n'aba Keresi boona, n'aba Pelesi boona, n'aba Gaasi boona, abashaija magana mukaaga abaarugire Gaasi bamukuratiire,nabo baaraba omumaisho g'omugabe.
Iwe oizire nyomwabazyo; nimbaasa nta kukugambira kuzengyerera naitwe, ntarikumanya i ndikuza? Garukayo, ogarureyo na beene waanyu; MUKAMA abahe embabazi n'obwesigwa.
Itaayi yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Nindahira MUKAMA otahwaho, na mukama wangye omugabe, ei mukama wangye omugabe ariza, yaaba kufa nari okugumaho, naanye omwiru waawe niyo ndiza.
Daudi yaagira Itaayi ati: Irooko oyambukye. Atyo Itaayi owa Gaasi yaayambuka n'abantu be boona hamwe n'abaana boona abu yaabaire aine.
Abantu boona ku baabaire nibarabaho, ab'omuri ekyo kyanga kyona baaborooga; bwanyima omugabe yaayambuka akagyera Kidirooni, n'abantu boona baagumizamu bagyemire omuhanda ogurikuza omu ihamba.
Omugabe yaagira Zadoki ati: Garura eshanduukye ya Ruhanga omu rurembo; MUKAMA ku arangirire embabazi, aryangarura, anyikirize ngireebe hamwe n'obutaaho bwe.
Kwonka ku araagire ati: Tindikukushemerererwa; ndi aha, angire oku arikwenda.
Omugabe yaagaruka yaagira Zadoki omunyamurwa ati: Tori omuhanuuzi? Garuka omu rurembo n'obusingye, iwe na Abiasaari na batabani baanyu bombi, Ahimaazi mutabani waawe, na Yonasaani mutabani we.
Reeba, niinyija kuguma aha nyambukiro y'omu ihamba, ntegyereize okuhitsya obu murantumeho kungambira.
Zadoki na Abiasaari nikwo kuheeka eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, bakagigarura Yerusaalemu, bakagumayo.
Bwanyima Daudi yaatemba aharikwinamuka omu kibungo kya Zeituuni, yaagyenda naarira, ayetwekyereire, atajwaire nkaito; kandi n'abaabaire bari hamwe nawe boona baayetwekyerera, bainamuka nibarira.
Haagira owaagambira Daudi ku Ahisofeeli n'omwe aha beebumbire na Abusalomu. Daudi yaashaba ati: Ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza, faafaatikanisa enaama ya Ahisofeeli.
Daudi ku yaahikire aha mutwe gw'ekibungo ahu baabaire bashabira Ruhanga, Hushai mwene Aruki yaija kumubugana, ebijwaro bye bitaagukire, n'eitaka rimuri omu mutwe.
Daudi yaamugira ati: Ku oraagyende naanye, noija kundusya;

kwonka ku oraagaarukye omu rurembo, waagira Abusalomu oti: Nyakusinga, niinyija kuba omwiru waawe; nk'oku naabaire ndi omwiru wa sho omu biro ebyahweire, na hati nikwo ndikwija kuba ahariiwe; noija kunsiisira enaama za Ahisofeeli.
Beitu torikwija kuba oineyo Zadoki na Abiasaari abanyamurwa? N'ahabw'ekyo eki oraahurire kyona ekirikuruga omu ka y'omugabe, okigambire Zadoki na Abiasaari abanyamurwa.
Kandi noomanya ku baineyo batabani baabo bombi, Ahimaazi mwene Zadoki na Yonasaani mwene Abiasaari; abo nibo murantumeho kungambira ebi muraabe mwahuriire byona.
Atyo Hushai munywani wa Daudi yaaza omu rurembo, yaashanga Abusalomu naataaha Yerusaalemu.

Omugabe yaabuuza Ziiba ati: Ebi n'ebya ki? Ziiba yaamugarukamu ati: Endogoya n'ez'okuheeka ab'omu ka y'omugabe, emigaati n'ebijuma by'omu kyanda n'eby'okufugurira abatsigazi, kandi na viinyo n'ey'okunywebwa abaraagwere enshazi omu ihamba.

Omugabe yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Beitu shi, mutabani wa mukama waawe arahi? Ziiba yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba, atsigaire Yerusaalemu; ahakuba agizire ati: Eri izooba enju ya Israeli neija kungarura aha ngoma ya tata.
Omugabe yaagira Ziiba ati: Reeba, ebibaire biri ebya Mefiboshesi byona, hati n'ebyawe. Ziiba yaagira ati: Kasingye, Nyakusinga omugabe. Ngume ngirirwe ntyo embabazi omu maisho gaawe.
yaarekyera Daudi n'abagaragwa be boona amabaare; abantu boona n'abashaija be amamanzi bakaba bamushagatiire aha rubaju rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho.
Shimei ku yaabaire naamukyeena, yaaguma naagira ati: Rugaho, rugaho, iwe mwitani 'we, ekishaija kitaine mugasho.
MUKAMA akutuzire eshagama y'enju ya Saulo yoona, ou waahunguriire, okaza aha ngoma ye; mbwenu MUKAMA ahaire Abusalomu mutabani waawe obugabe bwawe; reeba, otuzirwe eitima ryawe, ahakuba ori omwitani.
Omugabe yagira ati: Nyine kakwate ki naimwe, imwe beene Zeruiya? MUKAMA ku araabe niwe amugizire ati: Kyeena Daudi, mbwenu n'oha oraamugire ati: Ahabw'enki waakora otyo?
Daudi yaagira Abishai n'abagaragwa be boona ati: Nimureeba mutabani wangye ou nyezaariire nampiiga kuunyita; kaashwa ogu Mubenyamiini. Nimumurekye akyeene, ahakuba MUKAMA amuragiire.
Obundi MUKAMA akaareeba oku ndikwitwa kubi, arugaho anzimuurira ebirungi ahabw'oku kukyeenwa oku naakyeenwa eri izooba.
Atyo Daudi n'abashaija be baagumya omuhanda, na Shimei yaakiikama omu rukiizi rw'ekibungo seeri yaabo naamukyeena, naamurekyera amabaare n'omucuucu.
Bwanyima omugabe n'abantu boona abu yaabaire aine, baahika Yorudani baruhire; omugabe yaaruhuukirayo.
Abusalomu n'Abaisraeli boona baahika Yerusaalemu hamwe na Ahisofeeli.
Kandi Hushai mwene Aruki, munywani wa Daudi, yaija owa Abusalomu, yaamugira ati: Omugabe nakaramaare! Omugabe nakaramaare!
Abusalomu yaabuuza Hushai ati: Obwo nibwo bwesigwa obu oine ahari munywani waawe? Ekikuzibiire kugyenda nawe n'enki?
Hushai yaagira Abusalomu ati: Ngaaha! kureka omuntu otoorainwe MUKAMA n'aba bantu n'Abaisraeli boona, niwe ndiba owe, kandi niwe ndiguma nawe.
Kandi ekindi, n'oha ou nshemereire kuheereza? T'omutabani? Nk'oku naabaire mpeereza sho, naiwe nikwo ndikuheereza.
Bwanyima Abusalomu yaagira Ahisofeeli ati: Tuhe obwengye, oku turaatwaze.

Ahisofeeli yaagira Abusalomu ati: Irooko obyame n'ebinyanshunju bya sho, ebi atsigiire eka ye kugirinda; haza Abaisraeli boona nibaija kumanyira aho ku otamirwe sho; n'ahabw'ekyo abu oine boona nibaija kuhama.
Batyo baateerera Abusalomu eihema aha mutwe gw'enju; Abusalomu yaaritaahamu, yaabyama n'ebinyanshunju bya ishe, Abaisraeli boona nibakireeba.
Kandi omu biro ebyo obwengye obu Ahisofeeli yaabaire aha, bukaba buba nk'obu omuntu ahairwe Ruhanga; okwo nikwo obwengye bwa Ahisofeeli bwabaire busiimwa Daudi, kandi na Abusalomu.
Kandi Ahisofeeli yaagaruka yaagira Abusalomu ati: Ka ntoorane engabo kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, nyimukye, nkurate Daudi eki kiro;
niinyija kumugwaho aruhire, atakiine maani, mmutiinise, abantu boona abu aine bahungye, nyite omugabe wenka;
haza abantu boona mbakugarurire. Manya eki orikwenda n'okwita omuntu omwe, reero abantu boona bakagira obusingye.
Enaama egyo yaasiimwa Abusalomu n'abakuru ba Israeli boona.
Hushai ku yaahikire ahari Abusalomu, Abusalomu yaamugira ati: Ahisofeeli yaatugambira ati n'ati; mbwenu tukore nk'oku yaagamba? Ku oraabe otarikukisiima, naiiwe otugambire.
Hushai yaagarukamu Abusalomu ati: Obwengye obu Ahisofeeli yaaha eri izooba ti burungi.

Kandi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Noomanya sho n'engabo ze ku bari amamanzi; kandi hati bashaariire nk'edubu eyaayakwa ebyana byayo omu ihamba; kandi sho aba rugambwa omu kurwana, tarikwenda kuraara mu bantu.
Mbwenu ayesherekire omu kiina nari ahandi. N'ahabw'ekyo ku haraagire abaafa nibakitandika kurwana, oraakihurire weena naija kugira ati: Hafiire abantu baingi omu ba Abusalomu.
Ekyo nikyija kureetera omuntu weena kuhahaara, n'obu yaakuba ari emanzi aine omutima nk'ogw'entare, ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli boona nibamanya sho ku ari emanzi, kandi n'abu aine boona ku bari amamanzi.

Kureka nyowe obwengye obu ndikukuha n'obu. Teeranira hamwe Abaisraeli boona, okutandikira Daani okuhika Beeri-sheba, baingane n'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja obwingi, kandi naiwe wenka ohurure nabo.
Tutyo nitwija kumugwaho ahu turaamushangye hoona, tumutondeho nk'oku orume rutonda ahansi; we n'abantu abu aine boona, titurikwija kutsigaho n'omwe.
Kandi ku araahungire omu rurembo, nabwo Abaisraeli boona nibaija kureeta emirunga, turukumbagaze omu ruhanga, okuhitsya obu ruraahweho, hatatsigareho kabaare na kamwe.

Abusalomu n'Abaisraeli boona baagira bati: Obwengye bwa Hushai mwene Aruki bwakira obwa Ahisofeeli. Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba ataireho enaama y'okushiisha obwengye burungi bwa Ahisofeeli, ngu abone kureetera Abusalomu akabi.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutume juba ahari Daudi muti: Eki kiro otaraara aha nyambukiro y'eihamba; oyambukye, hatagira ekyakuzibira, omugabe atakaamirwa n'abantu abu aine boona.

Kandi Yonasaani na Ahimaazi bakaba bari Eni-rogeli bategyereize; omuzaana yaaguma naija naabibagambira, nabo nibaza kubigambira omugabe Daudi; ahakuba bakaba batarikwikirizibwa kutaaha omu rurembo nibareebwa;
kwonka haagira omwojo owaabareeba, yaagambira Abusalomu. Abo batsigazi bombi baagyenda nibeehuta, baahika Bahurimu, baataaha omu nju y'omushaija owaabaire aine eiziba omu kibuga kye; baarizamu.
Omukazi yaagira ekifundikizo, yaakita aha munwa gwaryo, yaakyanikaho omushekure gw'engano; tikyamanywa.
Abambari ba Abusalomu baahika aha nju, baabuuza omukazi bati: Ahimaazi na Yonasaani barahi? Omukazi yaabagarukamu ati: Baayambuka akagyera. Ku baabasherwire, baabura, baagaruka Yerusaalemu.

Ku baaherize kugyenda, abo batsigazi baaruga omu iziba, baagyenda, baagambira Daudi ebi batumirwe; baamugira bati: Mwimukye, murahukye kwambuka omugyera, ahakuba Ahisofeeli aine enaama eti n'eti y'okubarwanisa.
Atyo Daudi yaimuka n'abantu abu yaabaire aine boona, baayambuka Yorudani; omushekye ku gwagiire kujuguta, haashangwa hatakiine n'omwe otakambukire.

Kandi Abusalomu akaba ataireho Amasa kuba omukuru w'eihe omu mwanya gwa Yoabu. Kandi Amasa ogwo akaba ari mutabani w'omushaija orikwetwa Itura Omuishimaeli, owaashweire Abigaili muhara wa Nahashi, murumuna wa Zeruiya nyina wa Yoabu.
Bwanyima Abaisraeli na Abusalomu baasiisira omu nsi ya Gileadi.
baareeta ebitanda, enyabya, enyungu, engano, sayiri, esaano, engano zikarangire, ebihimba, enkoore zikarangire,
obwoki, amajuta, entaama n'encumate za ciizi, baabireetera Daudi n'abantu abu yaabaire aine kubafungurira; ahakuba bakagira bati: Abantu baine enjara, baruhire, kandi baitiirwe eiriho omu ihamba.
Daudi yaabara abantu abu yaabaire aine, yaataho abantu kuba abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'aba igana-igana.

Yaagaba engabo, ekicweka kimwe kya kashatu yaakiha Yoabu, ekindi yaakiha Abishai mwene Zeruiya, murumuna wa Yoabu, n'ekindi yaakiha Itaayi owa Gaasi. Omugabe yaagira abantu ati: Naanye ahabwangye niinyija kuhurura naimwe.

Kwonka abantu baamugira bati: Iwe torikwija kuhurura; ahabw'okuba ku turaahungye, tibarikwija kutufaho; nangwa n'obu ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri ky'abantu baitu kyakufa, nabwo tibakaatufaho; ahakube iwe noingana n'abantu baitu kakumi; n'ahabw'ekyo haakiri ogume omu rurembo, otwoherereze ab'okutuha emikono.
Omugabe yaabagira ati: Eki murikusiima nikyo ndaakore. Bwanyima omugabe yaayemerera aha irembo, engabo zoona nizishohora omu mitwe ya igana-igana na rukumi-rukumi.
Omugabe yaayehangangiriza Yoabu na Abishai na Itaayi ati: Mutwaze gye ogwo mwojo Abusalomu ahabwangye. Kandi abantu boona baahurira omugabe naayehanangiriza abakuru b'engabo ebya Abusalomu.
Abaisraeli baasingurirwayo abashaija ba Daudi; kandi eryo izooba haafa abantu obukumi bubiri,
ahakuba orugamba rukaba rujanjaire omuri egyo ensi yoona; eryo izooba ekibira kyamara abantu baingi okukira abaitsirwe rurara.
Omushaija yaamureeba, yaagambira Yoabu ati: Naareeba Abusalomu ari omu mwela naareereeta.
Yoabu yaabuuza owaamugambira ati: Ot'enki! Waamureeba! Ahabw'enki otaamucumita, okamutuura ahansi? Naaba ninkuha ebicweka by'efeeza ikumi n'orukoba.

Ogwo mushaija yaagarukamu Yoabu ati: N'obu naakuheebwa ebicweka by'efeeza rukumi, tinkaabanga mukono gwangye kwita omwana w'omugabe; ahakuba twahurira omugabe naakwehanangiriza iwe, na Abishai na Itaayi ati: Mwerinde, hatagira owaakora ahari ogwo mwojo Abusalomu.
Kandi hoona kuri naabitwaza okundi, nkamureebya, (manya omugabe tagira ki asherekwa,) iwe waaba noija kubyejuura.
Yoabu yaagira ati: Tinaaza kusiisira mwanya gwangye busha ningamba naiwe. Yaakwata emyambi eshatu omu ngaro, yaagitimbura Abusalomu omu mutima, akiri omu mwela ahuriire.
Bwanyima abatsigazi ikumi abatwazi b'eby'okurwanisa bya Yoabu baayehinguririza Abusalomu, baamurezya, yaafa.
Yoabu yaateera enzamba, engabo zaagaruka, zaareereera kukurata Abaisraeli, ahabw'okuzibirwa Yoabu.
Baatwara Abusalomu, baamunaga omu kiina kihango ky'omu kibira, baamurundaho ekirundo kihango munonga ky'amabaare; Abaisraeli baahunga, buri muntu yaaza omu ka ye.
Yoabu yaamugira ati: Otaza kugamba amakuru eri izooba, kureka ogagambe obundi. Kwonka eri izooba orekye kugagamba, ahabw'okuba omwana w'omugabe yaafa.
Yoabu yaagira Omukuushi ati: Irooko ogyende, ogambire omugabe ebi waareeba. Atyo Omukuushi yainama omu maisho ga Yoabu, yairuka.

Ahimaazi mwene Zadoki yaagaruka yaagira Yoabu ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ka nyirukye nkurate oriya Mukuushi, oku biraabe bibekwo. Yoabu yaagira ati: Noirukibwa ki, mwana wangye, ka noomanya ku otakiheebwa bihembo ahabw'ago makuru?
Onu yaagira ati: Ekiraabe kyabaire kibe, naaza kugyenda. Yoabu ati: Iruka. Atyo Ahimaazi yairuka, yaatoora ogw'oruhita, yaatangayo Omukuushi.
Omurinzi yaayeta, yaagambira omugabe. Omugabe yaagira ati: Ku araabe ari wenka, aine amakuru agu areetsire. Ogwo muntu yaija naayehuuta, yaahika haihi.
Bwanyima omurinzi yaareeba ondiijo mushaija nairuka; yaayeta omukumiirizi, yaamugira ati: Reeba ondiijo mushaija nairuka wenka. Omugabe yaagira ati: Nawe areetsire amakuru.
Omurinzi yaagira ati: Okundikureeba, okwiruka kw'oyebembeire nikushusha okwa Ahimaazi mwene Zadoki. Omugabe yaagira ati: Aba omushaija murungi, naija kureeta amakuru marungi.
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Omwojo ori Abusalomu ari buhooro? Ahimaazi yaagarukamu ati: Yoabu obu yantuma, nyowe omwiru waawe naareeba abantu nibayogoorekana; kwonka tinaamanya kyaba kiriho.
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Hingura, oyemerere aha. Atyo yaahingura, yaayemerera.
Omugabe yaabuuza Omukuushi ati: Omwojo ori Abusalomu ari buhooro? Omukuushi yaamugarukamu ati: Abazigu ba mukama wangye omugabe, n'abantu boona abaimukire kukukora kubi, nibakabe nk'ogwo mwojo.

Omugabe yaashaasha munonga, yaatemba omu kishengye ky'aha mutwe gw'eirembo, yaarira; ku yaabaire naagyenda, yaagyenda naagira ati: Ai bambe omwana wangye Abusalomu! Omwana wangye, Omwana wangye Abusalomu! Kuri niinye naafa omu mwanya gwawe, ai bambe Abusalomu, mwana wangye, mwana wangye!
Bwanyima baagira Yoabu bati: Reeba, omugabe naacurira Abusalomu.
Eryo izooba okwesiima kw'obusinguzi kwahinduka okucura omu bantu boona; ahakuba eryo izooba abantu bakahurira ngu omugabe ari omu naku ahabw'omwana we.
Kandi abantu baagaruka omu rurembo nibashoobooka, nk'abantu abacwire aha rugamba oku bashoobooka baine enshoni.
Omugabe yaayetwekyerera ahamaisho, yaacura n'eiraka rihango ati: Ai bambe omwana wangye Abusalomu, Abusalomu, mwana wangye, mwana wangye!

Yoabu yaataaha omu nju, yaahika omugabe, yaamugira ati: Eri izooba waahemura abagaragwa baawe boona abakirize amagara gaawe hati, n'aga batabani baawe na bahara baawe, kandi n'ag'abakazi baawe n'ebinyanshunju byawe;

ahabw'eokuba nookunda abarikukwanga, nooyanga abarikukunda. Mbwenu waayorekyera kimwe ku abakuru b'engabo n'abagaragwa baawe bari busha ahariiwe; hati naamanya ngu, kuri Abusalomu agumireho, abandi twena tukafa eri izooba, kuri nooyesiima munonga.

Mbwenu hati imuka, oshohore, ogambe gye n'abairu baawe; ahakuba nindahira MUKAMA, ku oraabe otashohoire, tihariho mushaija n'omwe oraatsigare naiwe eki kiro; kandi kiryakurugiramu akabi okukira akabi koona aku orareebire okwiha omu buto bwawe n'okuhitsya hati.
Omugabe nikwo kwimuka, akashutama aha irembo, bakagambira abantu boona bati: Reeba, omugabe ashutami aha irembo. Bwanyima abantu boona baija kutabaarira omugabe.
Obwo Abaisraeli boona bakaba bahungire, buri muntu agarukire omu ka ye.

Bwanyima abantu boona ab'enganda zoona z'Abaisraeli baagarukanamu nibagira bati: Omugabe niwe yaatwihire omu mikono y'abazigu baitu, akatukiza Abafilistia; mbwenu ahungire Abusalomu yaaruga aha ngoma.
Na Abusalomu ou twashukireho amajuta kututegyeka, agwire omu rugamba. Mbwenu nimuzibirwa ki kuhanuura aha by'okugarura omugabe?
Niimwe beene tata; niimwe baitu ab'aha mara; mbwenu ahabw'enki mwaza kuhereerukira abandi kugarura omugabe?
Kandi mugambire na Amasa muti: Torikumanya iwe naanye ku turi ab'enda emwe? Ku oraabe otabaire omukuru w'eihe ryangye okuruga hati omu mwanya gwa Yoabu, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
Yaayekubuurira emitima y'Abayuda boona nk'omutima gw'omuntu omwe. Ekyarugiremu baatuma aha mugabe bati: Garuka n'abagaragwa baawe boona.
Atyo omugabe yaagaruka, yaahika ahari Yorudani. Abayuda baaza Gilugaali kumubugana kumwabutsya Yorudani.
aine abashaija rukumi b'Ababenyamiini, na Ziiba omugaragwa w'enju ya Saulo n'abatabani n'abairu be makumi abiri; baayambuka Yorudani omugabe naabareeba.
Obwato bwasiiba nibwambutsya ab'omu ka y'omugabe, n'okukora eki arikwenda. Omugabe ku yaaherize kwambuka Yorudani, Shimei mwene Geera yaajuumara ahansi omu maisho ge.

Yaagira omugabe ati: Nyakusinga omugabe, otambarira okutahikiirira, kandi otaijuka eki omwiru waawe yaakozire n'obugomi aha izooba eri waarugiireho Yerusaalemu, mukama wangye, kandi birekye kukusaasa.
Ahakuba nyowe, omwiru waawe, nimmanya ku naacumwire; nikyo eri izooba naabandiza ab'enju ya Yosefu boona kushuuma kubugana mukama wangye omugabe.
Kwonka Abishai mwene Zeruiya yaagira ati: Beitu Shimei tarikwija kwitwa, ahabw'okujuma ou MUKAMA yaashukireho amajuta?

Daudi yaagira ati: Mbwenu imwe beene Zeruiya, nyine kakwate ki naimwe, mwaza kuunyimukiza obuzigu eri izooba? Nimugira ngu hariho ow'okwitwa omuri Israeli eri izooba? Nari shi tindikumanya ku ndi omugabe wa Israeli eri izooba?
Omugabe yaagira Shimei ati: Torikwija kufa. Yaamurahira.
Ku yaahikire Yerusaalemu kubugana omugabe, omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Beitu Mefiboshesi, n'enki ekyakuzibiire kugyenda naanye?

Yaamugarukamu ati: Nyakusinga omugabe, omwiru wangye akambeiha; ahakuba nyowe omwiru waawe nkaba ngizire nti: Niinyija kutandiika endogoya, ngizeho, ngyende n'omugabe, ahakuba omwiru waawe ndi ekimuga.
Kandi akambeiherera ahari mukama wangye; kwonka mukama wangye omugabe ni nka maraika wa Ruhanga; omugabe n'ahabw'ekyo okore eki orikusiima.

Ahakuba ab'omu ka ya tata boona bakaba bacwereirwe orubanja rw'okufa omu maisho ga mukama wangye omugabe; haza wanshutamya n'abarikuriira aha meeza yaawe. Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kugaruka kutakira omugabe?
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Ahabw'enki noogaruka omu bigambo? Naabiheza. Iwe na Ziiba mubagane ekibanja.
Mefiboshesi yaagira omugabe ati: Iwe, reka akitware kyona, niho mukama wangye omugabe yaagaruka omu ka ye n'obusingye.
Baruzilai ogwo akaba ari omugurusi munonga aine emyaka makumi munaana; kandi niwe yaabaire agyemurira omugabe obu yaabaire ari Mahanaimu; ahakuba akaba ari omushaija ohamire.
Omugabe yaagira Baruzilai ati: Ija twambukane, tuze Yerusaalemu; niinyija kugama ninkuriisa.
Kwonka Baruzilai yaagira omugabe ati: Ntsigaizeyo emyaka engahi, eyaakungyema kwinamuka n'omugabe Yerusaalemu?

Eri izooba naahitsya emyaka makumi munaana. Mbwenu ninkibaasa kutaanisa ekirungi n'ekibi? Omwiru waawe naakinurirwa ebi arikurya nari ebi arikunywa? Nkiine agahurira amaraka g'abashaija nari abakazi abarikweshongora? Mbwenu omwiru waawe asiibe naaruhiza ki mukama wangye omugabe?
Omwiru waawe k'afe okwambuka n'omugabe Yorudani, amuhitsye hariya seeri. Ahabw'enki omugabe ashemereire kumpa ebihembo ebirikwinga bityo?

Ninkweshengyereza, nyowe omwiru waawe ka ngarukyeyo, ngwe omu rurembo rw'owaitu, ahu ekituuro kya tata na maawe kiri. Kwonka reeba omwiru waawe Kimuhaamu ngugu; abe niwe yaayambuka na mukama wangye omugabe, omutwaze nk'oku orikwenda.
Omugabe yaamugarukamu ati: Mbwenu Kimuhaamu naarabeho twambukye; niinyija kuguma nimmukorera eki orikwenda kyona; kandi naiwe eki orinshaba kyona, ndyakikukorera.
Batyo abantu boona baayambuka Yorudani; n'omugabe nawe yaayambuka. Omugabe yaanywegyera Baruzilai, yaamushabira omugisha; bwanyima onu yaagaruka owaabo.
Okwo nikwo omugabe yaayambukire, akaza Giligaali, na Kimuhaamu akambuka nawe. Batyo Abayuda boona hamwe n'ekicweka ky'Abaisraeli baayambutsya omugabe.

Abayuda boona baagarukamu Abaisraeli bati: N'ahabw'okuba omugabe aine obuzaare bwa haihi naitwe. Beitu shi imwe kibagwisiize ki kubi? Nimugira ngu twine eky'omugabe eki turiire? Nari shi hariho ekiconco kyona eki atuhaire?

Abaisraeli baagarukamu Abayuda bati: Itwe twine emigabo ikumi omu mugabe, kandi Daudi n'owaitu kukira imwe. Mbwenu shi mutugayiire ki? Tiitwe tubandize kuhanuura eby'okugarura omugabe waitu? Kwonka ebigambo by'Abayuda byashaarira okukira eby'Abaisraeli.
Titwine mugabo omuri Daudi
N'obu bwakuba obuhunguzi omuri mwene Yese.
Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, buri muntu agarukye omu ihema rye!
N'ahabw'ekyo Abaisraeli boona baarereera kukuratira Daudi, baakuratira Sheeba mwene Bikuri; kwonka Abayuda, okuruga Yorudani okuhika Yerusaalemu baahamira aha mugabe waabo.
Atyo Amasa yaaza kuhuruza Abayuda; kwonka yaarenzya ebiro ebi omugabe yaamuragiire.

Daudi nikwo kugira Abishai ati: Mbwenu ho Sheeba mwene Bikuri yaaza kutukora kubi okukira Abusalomu; irooko otware abashaija ba mukama waawe, mumukurate, atakaakubuura endembo ezizitiirwe n'engo z'amabaare, akaguma naatuganzya.
Abishai yaahurura akuratiirwe abashaija ba Yoabu n'aba Keresi n'aba Pelesi n'amamanzi goona; baaruga Yerusaalemu, kukurata Sheeba mwene Bikuri.

Ku baahikire aha ibaare rihango rya Gibeoni, Amasa yaija kubabugana. Obwo Yoabu akaba ajwaire ebijwaro by'orugamba, abyezirikiise orukoba, oruriho rurara eri aha nyugunyu omu kyobati kyayo; ku yairiireho omumaisho, rurara yaaragara.
Yoabu yaagira Amasa ati: Ni buhooro, mwana wa tata? Yoabu yaakwata ekireju kya Amasa n'omukono gwe gwa buryo kumunywegyera.

Kwonka Amasa tiyaayeta hari rurara ei Yoabu yaabaire akwaitse; Yoabu nikwo kugimutimbura aha nda, amara ge gakeeshuka ahansi, atagarukye kugimuteera bundi. Atyo Amasa yaafa. Bwanyima Yoabu na Abishai omurumuna baagumizamu kukurata Sheeba mwene Bikuri.
Omwe aha bashaija ba Yoabu yaayemerera aha rubaju rwa Amasa, yaagira ati: Orikukunda Yoabu, kandi ori aha rubaju rwa Daudi, akuratire Yoabu.

Obwo Amasa akaba agarami omu shagama naashamba, ahagati y'omuhanda rugyendwa. Ogwo mushaija ku yaareebire abantu boona baayemerera aho, yaakiriza Amasa, yaamwiha omu muhanda, yaamurambika omu kishaka, yaamushweka ekijwaro.
Ku baamwihire omu muhanda, abantu boona baakuratira Yoabu kuza kusherura Sheeba mwene Bikuri.
Sheeba ogwo yaaraba omu nganda za Israeli zoona, yaahika Abeeli eya Besi-maaka, aba Bikuri boona baateerana, baamukurata.
Abashaija boona aba Yoabu baamugotera Abeeli eya Besi-maaka; baatuuma omutuumo gw'eitaka aha rugo rw'amabaare rw'orurembo; baatandika kuteera orugo kurukumbagaza.
Bwanyima omukazi omunyabwengye w'omuri orwo rurembo yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Yeimwe nimuhurire, mbagambire! Mungirire Yoabu muti: Ija kunu, akugambire.
Yoabu yaamuhika haihi; ogwo mukazi yaamubuuza ati: Ori Yoabu? Onu ati: Ndi we. Omukazi yaamugira ati: Hurira ebigambo by'omuzaana waawe. Onu ati: Nimpurira.
Yaagira ati: Ira bakaba bagira ngu, Ka baze kwehanuuza omuri Abeeli. Batyo bamarirayo ekibashobeire.
Nyowe ndi omwe ahari abo abakunda obusingye, kandi abarikwesigwa omuri Israeli. Mbwenu nooyenda kucwekyereza orurembo n'omuzaire omuri Israeli. Ahabw'enki nooyenda kumaraho obuhunguzi bwa MUKAMA?
Yoabu yaamugarukamu ati: Nikikabure! Nikikabure nyowe okumaraho nari okucwekyereza.

Ekyo tikwo kiri. Kureka hariho omushaija ow'omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, orikwetwa Sheeba mwene Bikuri, owaabangire omukono gwe kurwanisa omugabe Daudi. Mube niwe mwahayo wenka, mbone kubarugira aha rurembo. Ogwo mukazi yaagira Yoabu ati: Reeba, omutwe gwe twaza kugukutambikira, tugurenzye orugo.

Ahonaaho ogwo mukazi yaagaruka aha bantu baamwo boona n'obwo bwengye bwe, baatemaho Sheeba mwene Bikuri omutwe, baagutambikira Yoabu. Yoabu yaateera enzamba, abantu boona baataataana, baaruga aha rurembo, buri muntu yaagaruka omu ka ye. Na Yoabu yaatabaaruka, yaaza Yerusaalemu ow'omugabe.
Adoraamu ari omushorooza mukuru w'omushoro, Yehoshafaati mwene Ahiluudi ari omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho;
Sheeva ari omuhandiiki; Zadoki na Abiasaari bari abanyamurwa;
na Iira owa Yayiri ari enganzi ya Daudi.

Omugabe yaatuma kweta aba Gibeoni. (Aba Gibeoni abo bakaba batari b'eihanga ry'Abaisraeli, kureka bakaba bari ab'Abaamori, abaatsigaireho. N'obu Abaisraeli baarahiire kutabaita, kwonka Saulo akaba naayenda kubaita ahabw'eihato eri yaabaire ainiire Abaisraeli n'Abayuda.)
Daudi yaabuuza aba Gibeoni ati: Mbwenu mbakorere ki? Nkaakaraba ki, mukabona kushabira obuhunguzi bwa MUKAMA omugisha?
Aba Gibeoni baamugarukamu abti: Eki turikwenda ahari Saulo n'enju ye ti feeza, nari ezaabu; kandi okwita omuntu omuri Israeli ti kyaitu. Onu yaagira ati: Eki murikwenda, nikyo ndaabakorere.
Baagira omugabe bati: Ogwo mushaija waatucwekyereize, akacuma enaama y'okutumariraho kimwe, ngu tutagira ah'okutuura omu nsi ya Israeli yoona;
mbwenu mutuhe abashaija mushanju omu batabani, tubahanikye omu maisho ga MUKAMA omuri Gibea ya Saulo owaatoorainwe MUKAMA. Omugabe yaagira ati: Niinyija kubabaha.
Kwonka omugabe yaarokora Mefiboshesi mwene Yonasaani mutabani wa Saulo, ahabw'endahiro ei Daudi na Yonasaani mwene Saulo baarahiriraine ahari MUKAMA.

Omugabe yaatwara batabani ba Rizipa muhara wa Aya bombi, abu yaazaariire Saulo, Arumooni na Mefiboshesi, kandi na batabani ba Merabu muhara wa Saulo bataano, abu yaazaariire Adurieli mwene Baruzilai owa Mehola;
yaabahayo omu mikono y'aba Gibeoni, baabahanika omu kibungo omu maisho ga MUKAMA; boona mushanju baafeera hamwe. Baitwa omu itogyera, nibatandika kugyesha sayiri.

Rizipa muhara wa Aya yaatwara ekiguniya, yaaguma naakyeyarira aha rukiri okwiha omu itogyera okuhitsya obu enjura ya katumba yaagwire ahari egyo mitumbi; omu bunaku obwo bwona Rizipa tiyaikiriza mahungu g'omu mwanya kugizaho nyomushana, nari enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba nyekiro.
Baagambira Daudi eki Rizipa muhara wa Aya, ekinyanshunju kya Saulo, akozire.

Daudi yaagyenda, yaiha amagufa ga Saulo n'aga Yonasaani omutabani omu bantu ba Yabeshi-gileadi, abaabaire bagaibire omu muhanda gwa Besi-shaani, ei Abafilistia baabaire babahanikire, aha izooba eri Abafilistia baitiireho Saulo omuri Giliboa.
Yaihayo amagufa ga Saulo n'aga Yonasaani omutabani, kandi baateerana n'amagufa g'ababaire bahanikirwe.

Batyo baaziika amagufa ga Saulo na Yonasaani omutabani Zeela omu nsi ya Benyamiini omu kituuro kya Kiishi ishe; baahikiiriza ebi omugabe yaabaragiire byona. Bwanyima y'ebyo Ruhanga yaabona kuhurira okushaba kwabo ahabw'ensi.
Abafilistia baagaruka kurwana n'Abaisraeli. Daudi yaashuuma n'abashaija be, baarwana n'Abafilistia; ku baabaire nibakirwana, Daudi yaatandika kuruha.
Ishubi-benobu, mwijukuru w'ebikaaka biri, ou eicumu rye ryabaire riine oburemeezi bwa shekeli z'emiringa magana ashatu, ahagatiire rurara nsya, yaayenda kwita Daudi.

Kwonka Abishai mwene Zeruiya yaija kumuha emikono, yaarwana n'Omufilistia ogwo, yaamwita. Bwanyima engabo za Daudi baamurahiza, nibagira bati: Otarigaruka kuhurura naitwe, nyentsya otakaaraaza etabaaza ya Israeli.
Haagaruka haabaho orugamba n'Abafilistia Gobu; Elihanani mwene Yaare-oregimu owa Betelehemu, yaita Goliasi owa Gaasi, ou orubango rw'eicumu rye rwabaire ruri nk'empimbi ei barukiraho emyenda.

Bwanyima haabaho orundi rugamba Gaasi. Okwo hakaba hariyo omushaija muraingwa munonga, owaabaire aine enkumu mukaaga ahari buri ngaro, n'enkumu z'ebigyere mukaaga ahari buri kigyere, zoona makumi abiri na ina; kandi nawe akaba ari ow'omuri baijukuru b'ebikaaka.
Ku yaahigire Abaisraeli, Yonasaani mwene Shimei mukuru wa Daudi yaamwita.
Abo boona bana bakaba bari baijukuru b'ebikaaka bya Gaasi; baitwa Daudi n'abashaija be.
naagira ati:
MUKAMA n'orukiri rwangye, orugo rwangye orugumire, kandi Omujuni wangye,
Omunaara gwangye omuraingwa, n'obuhungiro bwangye;
Omujuni wangye, niiwe onkiza omwaga.
Obwo nibwo ndikira abazigu bangye.
N'emyegyemure y'okuhwerekyerera yantiinisa;
Emitego ya Rufu yantanga omumaisho.
Naatakira Ruhanga wangye;
Yaahurira eiraka ryangye ari omuri hekalu ye,
N'okurira kwangye kwahika omu matu ge.
N'emisingi y'eiguru yaanyiganyiga,
Yaatengyetsibwa ekiniga kye.
Omwika gukaruga omu nyindo ze,
N'omu kanwa ke haarugamu omuriro ogurikurya busha,
Gwayatsya amakara.
Omwirima ndindindi guri ahansi y'ebigyere bye.
Yaareebwa ari aha mapapa g'omuyaga.
Akahindura omwirima obweshereko, nk'eihema erimwehinguririize,
N'ebicu ebikwaitse ebirimu amaizi yaabigira eky'okumusangira
Omu kumurinkana okwabaire kuri omu maisho ge
Haarugamu amakara garikwaka.
Rukira-boona yaagamba n'eiraka rye.
Niyo mirabyo ye mingi, yaababinga.
N'emisingi y'ensi ekashuuruuka
Ahabw'okukabuka kwa MUKAMA,
Ahabw'okuhuuha kw'amaani okw'omwitsyo gw'omu nyindo zaawe.
Yaanyiha omu maizi maingi.
Yankiza omuzigu wangye ow'amaani,
N'abo abaabaire nibaanyanga, ahakuba bakaba nibankiza amaani.
Bakampururira aha izooba ry'okureeberaho enaku;
Kwonka MUKAMA yaaba obwegamo bwangye.
Yanjuna, ahabw'okuba akaba nanshemerererwa.
Yanzimuurira nk'okushemera kw'emikono yangye oku kuri.
Kandi tinkacumuraga kuruga ahari Ruhanga wangye.
Tinkeetantaraga bi yaaragiire.
Kandi nkeerinda okushiisha.
Nikyo MUKAMA yaanyihuriire, nk'okuhikiirira kwangye oku kuri,
Akanzimuurira ebishemereire okushemera kw'emikono yangye omu maisho ge.
Ahari ohikire oyeyoreka ori ohikire;
Ahari oshemeire oyeyoreka ori oshemeire,
Aha mugomi oyeyoreka ogumire.
Kwonka amaisho gaawe gari aha banyamaryo okubagarura ahansi.
Ruhanga wangye ayakira omwirima gwangye.
Eego, ahabwawe nimbaasa kurwanisa omutwe gw'engabo;
Ahabw'okuhwerwa Ruhanga wangye nimbaasa kuguruka orugo.
Okuraganisa kwa MUKAMA kurengirwe, n'okw'amazima.
Niwe ngabo ekingira abamuhungiraho boona.
Mbwenu n'oha oba Ruhanga, otari MUKAMA?
N'oha oba Rukiri, otari Ruhanga waitu?
Niwe ahabura abahikire omu mihanda yaabo.
Anyemereza aha nengo mpamire.
Ngu emikono yangye ebaase kureega obuta bw'emiringa.
Ompaire engabo y'okujuna kwawe,
Okutwaza gye kwawe kunkurize.
Ebigyere byangye tibyaterera.
Nkakurata abazigu bangye, naabahwerekyereza;
Kandi tindagarukire okuhitsya obu baahweireho.
Naabamaraho nimbacumita, tibaabaasa kwimuka;
Baagwa ahansi y'ebigyere byangye.
Ahakuba okanzirika amaani g'okurwana,
Waagomoora abaabaire nibaija kundwanisa.
Kandi n'abaabaire nibaanyanga naabacwekyereza.
Baatakira MUKAMA, tiyaabagarukamu.
Naabaribatiirira nk'ebyondo by'omu nguuto.
Wandinda ngu mbe mukuru waago;
Naaheerezibwa eihanga eri ntakamanyaga.
Ku bampuriire bati, ahonaaho baanyorobera.
Baaruga omu bigo byabo nibatetema.
MUKAMA n'ohuriirre; Rukiri wangye ahimbisibwe!
Ruhanga orukiri rw'okujunwa kwangye aheebwe ekitiinisa!
Akangomoorera amahanga,
Eego, okanta ahaiguru y'abarikundwanisa,
Waanyiha omu mikono y'abanyamwaga.
Nyeshongore eby'okuhimbisa eiziina ryawe.
Omugabe ou yaataireho, amuha obusinguzi bwingi,
Kandi ayoreka ou yaashukireho amajuta embabazi,
Niwe Daudi n'abaijukuru ebiro n'ebiro.
Okuhanuura kwa Daudi mwene Yese,
Okuhanuura kw'omushaija owaatungwirwe,
Okuhanuura kw'owaashukirweho Ruhanga wa Yakobo amajuta,
Omuhimbi murungi wa zaaburi za Israeli.
Ekigambo kye tikinguga ha rurimi.
Rukiri wa Israeli angambiire, ati:
Omuntu ku ategyeka abantu omu buryo buhikire,
Naategyekyera omu kutiina Ruhanga,
Nk'oku eizoba ryaka omu kasheeshe akataine kibunda,
Aba nk'enjura erikumeza obunyatsi omu itaka.
N'ekya buzima, enju yangye tikwo eri na Ruhanga,
Kwonka We andaganiise endagaano etarihwaho,
Etebeekanisiibwe gye omuri byona, kandi ehamire.
Tarikwija kuhikiiriza
Okuhwerwa kwangye kwona n'ebi ndikwetenga?
Kwonka abataine Ruhanga boona baryaba nk'amahwa g'okunagwa,
Ahakuba tigarikubaasa kukwatwa n'engaro;
Kureka orikwenda kugakoraho
Ashemereire kugakoresaho ekyoma n'orubango rw'eicumu;
Kandi baryabookyeza kimwe n'omuriro.

Yaimuka, yaita Abafilistia okuhitsya obu omukono gwe gwaruhire, engaro ye ekaramatana na rurara; eryo izooba MUKAMA yaabaha okusingura kuhango, abandi baamugarukira ahabw'okucwijura abaitsirwe kwonka.
Kandi ogwo akaba naakuratwa Shama, mwene Ageye, owa Harari. Abafilistia bakaba bateeraniire Leehi, ahu omusiri ogwijwire enkoore gwabaire guri; abashaija boona baahunga Abafilistia;
kwonka we yaayemerera ahagati y'ogwo musiri, yaagurinda, yaita Abafilistia; MUKAMA yaabaha okusingura kuhango.
Daudi ari omu kigo, n'Abafilistia bari Betelehemu.
Daudi yaatenga, yaagira ati: Nkaabaasibwa ki hagira owampa otwizi tw'omu iziba eriri aha irembo rya Betelehemu, ntunywa!

Ahonaaho ago mamanzi ashatu gaayataguza omu rusiisira rw'Abafilistia, gaataha amaizi g'omuri eryo iziba rya Betelehemu, eryabaire riri aha irembo, baagatwarira Daudi; kwonka we yaayanga kuganywa, kureka yaagashuka omu maisho ga MUKAMA;
yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, rubuuza nyowe okukora eki. Nimbaasa kunywa eshagama y'abashaija abaayoga amagara gaabo? Ekyo nikyo yaayangiire kuganywa. Ebyo nibyo ago mamanzi ashatu gaakozire.
Kandi Abishai mukuru wa Yoabu mwene Zeruiya niwe yaabaire ari mukuru w'abo makumi ashatu. Akakwata eicumu rye, yaarwana n'abashaija magana ashatu, yaabaita, yaarangaanwa nk'abo abashatu.
Omuri abo makumi ashatu niwe yaakizire kurangaanwa, akahinduka mukuru waabo; kwonka tiyaahika hari abo abashatu.
Kandi yaita Omunyamisri murungi ahamaisho. Omunyamisri ogwo akaba aine eicumu omu ngaro, kwonka Benaaya yaamushuumira n'enkoni, yaamusikura eicumu omu ngaro, yaarimwitsa.
Ebyo nibyo Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada yaakozire, akarangaanwa nk'abo abashatu ab'amaani.
Yaarangaanwa omuri abo makumi ashatu, kwonka tiyaahika hari bari abashatu. Daudi yaamuhindura omukuru w'abarinzi be.
Asaheeli murumuna wa Yoabu akaba ari omwe ahari abo makumi ashatu, na Elihanani mwene Doodo owa Betelehemu,
Shama owa Harodi, Elika owa Harodi,
Helezi owa Paluti, Iira mwene Ikishi owa Tekoa,
Abiezeeri owa Anatoosi, Mebunai owa Huusha,
Zalumooni owa Ahohi, Maharai owa Netofa,
Helebu mwene Baana owa Netofa, Itayi, mwene Ribai owa Gibea eya Benyamiini,
Benaaya owa Piratooni, Hidai ow'omu tugyera twa Gaashi,
Abialiboni owa Arubasi, Azimaveesi owa Bahurimu,
Eliahuba owa Shalibooni, beene Yasheni, Yonasaani,
Shama owa Harari, Ahiamu mwene Sharari owa Arari,
Elifeleti mwene Ahasibai mwijukuru wa Maaka, Eliamu mwene Ahisofeeli owa Giilo,
Hezero owa Karumeeli, Parati owa Arubi,
Igaali mwene Nasani owa Zooba, Baani owa Gaadi,
Zeleki Omuamoni, Naharai owa Beeroosi, Yoabu mwene Zeruiya,
Iira owa Ituri, Garebu owa Ituri,
na Uriya Omuhiiti boona makumi ashatu na mushanju.
Omugabe yaagira Yoabu omukuru w'eihe rye, ou yaabaire aine, ati: Gyenda orabe omu nganda za Israeli zoona, okuruga Daani okuhika Beeri-sheba, mubare abantu, mbone kumanya omubaro gwabo.
Yoabu yaagira omugabe ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ayongyere aha bantu okukira oku bari emirundi igana, kandi omugabe akyereebere. Beitu shi, Nyakusinga omugabe, ahabw'enki nooshemerererwa ekintu ekyo?
Kwonka ekigambo ky'omugabe kyakiza ebya Yoabu n'abakuru b'engabo ze amaani. Bwanyima Yoabu n'abo bakuru b'engabo baaruga omumaisho g'omugabe, baaza kubara Abaisraeli.
Baayambuka Yorudani, baatandikira omuri Aroeli, n'omu rurembo orwabaire ruri ahagati y'oruhita, baaza Gaadi, baagumizamu, baahika Yazeri.
Bwanyima baahika Gileadi, na Kadeshi ey'omu nsi y'Abahiiti; bwanyima baahika Daani, baagumizamu, baaziguuruka baahika Sidoni;
okuruga aho baahika omu kigo kya Tuuro, n'omu ndembo zoona ez'Abahiivi n'Abanyakanaani. Bwanyima baaza omuri Negebu eya Yuda, baahika Beeri-sheba.
Ku baaherize kubara omu nsi yoona, baagaruka Yerusaalemu, bamazire ameezi mwenda n'ebiro makumi abiri.
Yoabu yaaha omugabe omubaro gw'abantu abu yaabazire; omuri Israeli hakaba harimu abashaija amamanzi enkwata-rurara obusiriira munaana; kandi Abayuda bakaba bari obusiriira butaano.
Daudi ku yaimukire omu kasheeshe, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaizira nabi Gaadi, omuhanuuzi wa Daudi, nikigira kiti:
Gyenda ogire Daudi oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, naagira ati: Naakuha ebintu bishatu, oiheho kimwe, mbe nikyo naakukora.

Atyo Gaadi yaija ahari Daudi, yaakimugambira; yaamugira ati: Ahari ebi bishatu ihaho kimwe, ensi yaawe okuteerwa enjara emyaka mushanju; nari okuguma noohunga abazigu baawe bakubingire okumara ameezi ashatu; nari ensi yaawe okujuumikirwa orufu okumara ebiro bishatu. Mbwenu teekateeka, ongambire eki ndaagarukyemu Ontumire.
Daudi yaagira Gaadi ati: Naashobererwa kimwe; ka tugwe omu mikono ya MUKAMA, ahakuba embabazi ze ni nyingi; ndekye kugwa omu mikono y'abantu.

Kwonka maraika ku yaabangiire Yerusaalemu omukono kugicwekyereza, MUKAMA yaayegarukamu ahabw'ako kabi, yaagira maraika owaabaire naacwekyereza abantu ati: Ekyo nikimara. Banguura omukono. Obwo maraika wa MUKAMA akaba ari haihi n'embuga ya Arauna Omuyebusi.

Daudi ku yaareebire maraika owaabaire naita abantu, yaagira MUKAMA ati: Reeba, niinye ncumwire, nkashiisha mnonga; mbwenu entaama ezi zo zikozire ki? Ninkweshengyereza, omukono gwawe gube niinye gwarwanisa n'enju ya tata.
Eryo izooba Gaadi yaija ahari Daudi, yaamugira ati: Inamuka, oyombekyere MUKAMA eitambiro aha mbuga ya Arauna Omuyebusi.
Atyo Daudi yainamuka, ahabw'ekigambo kya Gaadi eki MUKAMA amuragiire.
Arauna ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba omugabe n'abagaragwa be nibaija ah'ari; yaashohora, yainama omu maisho g'omugabe;
Arauna yaabuuza ati: N'enki ekyareeta mukama wangye omugabe aha mwiru we? Daudi yaamugarukamu ati: Naareetwa okugura embuga yaawe, kwombekyera MUKAMA eitambiro, ngu orufu rurugye omu bantu.
Arauna yaagira Daudi ati: Mukama wangye omugabe atware eki arikwenda kyona, akihongye; reeba ente ez'ekitambo ky'okwotsya nzizi, n'ebihuuzo n'emigamba y'ente mubiihemu enku.
Ebyo byona, Nyakusinga, nyowe Arauna naabiha omugabe. Yaagaruka yaagira omugabe ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akwikirize.

Kwonka omugabe yaagira Arauna ati: Ngaaha; buzimazima niinyija kubigura naiwe, nkuhe obuguzi bwabyo. Tindikwija kuhongyera MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye ebitambo by'okwotsya, ebi ntaheereire byangye. Atyo Daudi yaagura egyo mbuga n'ezo nte shekeli z'efeeza makumi ataano.
Daudi yaayombekyerayo MUKAMA eitambiro, yaatamba ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye. Atyo MUKAMA yaahurira ebi yaayeshengyereziibwe ahabw'ensi; orufu rwaruga omuri Israeli.
Omugabe Daudi akaba akuzire munonga, ahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru; n'obu baabaire bamushweka ebyeshweko, akaba atakibaasa kutagatirwa.
Nikyo abagaragwa be baamugiilire bati: Nyakusinga Omugabe, ka bakusherurire omwishiki empangare, agume akuheereze, kandi abyame omu kifuba kyawe, obone kutagatirwa.
Batyo basherura omwishiki murungi omuri Israeli yoona, baabona Abishaagi owa Shuneemu, baamureetera omugabe.
Omwishiki ogwo akaba ari murungi munonga, yaaba omuranga w'omugabe, yaaguma naamuheereza; kwonka omugabe tiyaamumanya.
Ishe akaba atakamugwisaga kubi naamugira ati: Ahabw'enki okozire oti n'oti? Akaba ari omushaija murungi munonga omu kureeba; kandi niwe yaabaire naakurata Abusalomu.
Adonia ogwo yaahanuura na Yoabu mwene Zeruiya n'Abiasaari omunyamurwa; baakwatanisa nawe, baamuhwera.
Kwonka Zadoki omunyamurwa na Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada, na Nasani nabi, na Shemei, na Rei, na bari bashaija ba Daudi amamanzi bakaba batakwataniise na Adoniya.
Adoniya yaatambira entaama n'ente n'eby'ebishaju haihi n'eibaare rya Zoheleesi, erihereraine na Eni-rogeli; yaayeta beene ishe batabani b'omugabe, n'abategyeki boona ab'omuri Yuda ab'obugabe;
kwonka nka Nasani nabi na Benaaya n'abo bashaija amamanzi na Sulemaani mwene ishe tiyabeeta.
Bwanyima Nasani yaagira Batisheba nyina wa Sulemaani ati: Tohuriire Adoniya mwene Hagisi ku abaire omugabe, haza mukama waitu Daudi atarikukimanya?
Mbwenu nu, ija nkuhe obwengye, obone kukiza amagara gaawe n'aga mutabani waawe Sulemaani.

Irooko oze ow'omugabe Daudi, omugire oti: Nyakusinga Omugabe, torikwijuka ku waaraganiise omuzaana waawe noorahira oti: Buzimazima mutabani waawe Sulemaani niwe ariza aha ngoma naarugaho; kandi oti: Niwe arishutama aha kitebe kyangye ky'obugabe? Mbwenu ahabw'enki heemire Adoniya?
Mbwenu ku oraabe nookigamba n'omugabe, naanye niinyija kutaahamu nkukuratiire, mpamye ebigambo byawe.
Atyo Batisheba yaataaha omu kishengye ky'omugabe; (obwo omugabe akaba akuzire munonga, kandi Abishaagi owa Shuneemu niwe yaabaire naamuheereza).
Batisheba yainama, yaatangirira omugabe; omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda ki?

Yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, okarahira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, noogira omuzaana waawe oti: Buzimazima Sulemaani mutabani waawe niwe ariza aha ngoma naarugaho; kandi oti: Niwe arishutama aha kitebe kyangye ky'obugabe.
Mbwenu reeba, Adoniya niwe ayemire, haza, Mukama wangye Omugabe, otarikukimanya.
Aitsire ente n'eby'ebishaju n'entaama bingi, yaabitamaba, kandi yaayeta batabani b'omugabe boona, na Abiasaari omunyamurwa na Yoabu omukuru w'eihe, kwonka Salemaani omwiru waawe tiyaamweta.
Mbwenu, Nyakusinga Omugabe, Abaisraeli boona niiwe bataireho amaisho, kubagambira orishutama aha kitebe kya mukama wangye omugabe yaarugaho.
Nyakusinga Omugabe, ku oraabe otakozire otyo, bwanyima ku origwejyegyera waashanga baashwenkuru, nyowe na mutabani wangye Sulemaani turyabarwa nk'abacumwire.
Batisheba ku yaabaire naakigamba n'omugabe, Nasani nabi yaataahamu.
Baagambira omugabe bati: Reeba, Nasani nabi ari aha. Ku yaahikire omu maisho g'omugabe, yainama omu maisho ge.
Nasani yaagira ati: Nyakusinga Omugabe, niiwe ogizire oti: Adoniya niwe ariza aha ngoma naarugaho, kandi niwe arishutama aha kitebe kyangye ky'obugabe?

Ahabw'okuba eri izooba yaashuuma, yaita ente n'eby'ebishaju n'entaama bingi munonga, yaabitamba, kandi yaayeta batabani b'omugabe boona na Yoabu omukuru w'eihe na Abiasaari omunyamurwa; mbwenu bari omu maisho ge nibarya nibanywa, nibagira bati: Omugabe Adoniya naakaramaare!
Kwonka nyowe omwiru waawe, na Zadoki omunyamurwa na Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada n'omwiru waawe Sulemaani tatwetsire.
Ekyo kirugire ahari mukama wangye omugabe, kandi otagambiire abairu baawe orishutama aha kitebe kyawe ky'obugabe waarugaho?
Omugabe Daudi yaagira ati: Nyetera Batisheba. Batisheba yaija, yaayemerera omu maisho ge.
Omugabe yaarahira naagira ati: Nk'oku MUKAMA ari ohuriire, owaihire amagara gangye omu busaasi bw'emiringo yoona,

buzimazima nk'oku naakurahiire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli nimpamya nti: Mutabani waawe Sulemaani niwe ariza aha ngoma naarugaho, kandi niwe arishutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe omu mwanya gwangye, nikwo ndaagire eri izooba.
Batisheba yainama, yaaramya omugabe naagira ati: Mukama wangye Omugabe Daudi naakaramaare!
Omugabe Daudi yaagira ati: Muunyetere Zadoki omunyamurwa na Nasani nabi na Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada. Nabo baija omu maisho ge.
Omugabe yaabagira ati: Mugyende n'abagaragwa ba mukama waanyu, mutembye mutabani wangye Sulemaani enyumbu yangye ahabwangye, mumushuumye Gihoni;
ku muraahikyeyo, Zadoki omunyamurwa na Nasani nabi bamushukyeho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli; bwanyima muteere eikondere, mugire muti: Omugabe Sulemaani naakaramaare!
Bwanyima mwije enyima ye, aije ashutame aha kitebe kyangye ky'obugabe; ahakuba aryaba omugabe omu mwanya gwangye; kandi niwe naataho kuba omugabe wa Israeli na Yuda.
Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Amiina! MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa mukama wangye omugabe nawe agire atyo.
Nk'oku MUKAMA abaire ari na mukama wangye omugabe n'okuhitsya hati, abe nikwo yaaba na Sulemaani, atunguure ekitebe kye ky'obugabe okukira ekya mukama wangye omugabe Daudi.
Atyo Zadoki omunyamurwa na Nasani nabi na Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada n'Abakeresi n'Abapelesi, baashuuma baatembya Sulemaani enyumbu y'omugabe Daudi, baamutwara Gihoni.
Zadoki omunyamurwa yaiha eihembe ry'amajuta omu Ihema, yaagashuka ahari Sulemaani. Baateera eikondere; abantu boona baagira bati: Omugabe Sulemaani nakaramaare!
Abantu boona baagyenda bamukuratiire, nibateera obunyamurera, nibashemererwa n'okushemererwa kwingi, n'ensi yaashatuka ahabw'akaari kaabo.
Adoniya n'abagyenyi boona abu yaabaire aine, ku baabaire nibaheza bati kurya, baakihurira. Yoabu ku yaahuriire okugamba kw'eikondere, yaagira ati: Orwo rwari ruri omu rurembo n'orw'enki?
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, yaayecura Yonasaani mwene Abiasaari omunyamurwa; Adoniya yaamugira ati: Taaha omu nju, ahakuba ori omwesigwa, kandi oreetsire amakuru marungi.
Yonasaani yaagarukamu Adoniya ati: Ngaaha! Mukama waitu omugabe Daudi yaayemeka Sulemaani;
kandi omugabe yaamwohereza na Zadoki omunyamurwa, na Nasani nabi, na Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada, hamwe n'Abakeresi n'Abapelesi; baamutembya enyumbu y'omugabe;
kandi Zadoki omunyamurwa na Nasani nabi baamushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe omuri Gihoni; abantu baarugayo nibashemererwa; n'ahabw'ekyo orurembo niruteera akaari. Ako niko kaari aku mwahurira.
Mbwenu Sulemaani ari aha kitebe ky'obugabe.

Kandi abagaragwa b'omugabe baija kushabira mukama waitu omugabe Daudi mugisha, nibagira bati: Ruhanga waawe atunguure eiziina rya Sulemaani rirangaanwe okukira eryawe, kandi n'obugabe bwe abugire obwe'ekitiinisa okukira obwawe. Bwanyima omugabe yainama aha kitanda kye, yaaramya.
Kandi omugabe yaagira ati: MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, asiimwe, owampa omuntu ow'omu nda yangye kushutama aha kitebe kyangye ky'obugabe eri izooba, kandi n'amaisho gangye gakakireeba.
Bwanyima abagyenyi ba Adoniya boona baatiina, baimuka baagyenda, buri muntu yaatoora ogwe.
Adoniya yaatiina Sulemaani; yaimuka, yaagyenda, yaakwata amahembe g'eitambiro.
Baagambira Sulemaani bati: Reeba, Adoniya atiinire omugabe Sulemaani; akwaitse amahembe g'eitambiro, naagira ati: Omugabe Sulemaani andahire eri izooba ku atarikwija kwita omwiru we na rurara.
Sulemaani yaagarukamu ati: Ku araayeyorekye ari omushaija omwesigwa, tiharikwija kugira kashokye na kamwe ak'aha mutwe gwe akaagwa ahansi; kwonka ku araabonekaweho ekibi, naafa.
Atyo omugabe Sulemaani yaatuma, baamwiha aha itambiro, yaija yainama omu maisho ge; Sulemaani yaamugira ati: Taaha owaawe.
Obunaku bw'okufa kwa Daudi ku bwairiire haihi, yaayehangangiriza omutabani Sulemaani naamugira ati.
Ndi haihi kugyenda, nk'ab'ensi boona oku bagyenda. Ba ow'amaani, oyeyorekye ori omushaija,

okwate ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikukuragiira, okugyendera omu mihanda ye n'okukwata ebiragiro bye, n'ebi yaaragiire, n'ebyatairweho, kandi n'ebi yaahamize, nk'ebyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Musa oku biri, obone kuba gye omu bi orikukora byona, kandi n'ei oraagyende yoona,

MUKAMA abone kuhamya ekigambo kye, eki yangambireho naagira ati: Abaana baawe ku baryerinda omu mitwarize yaabo, baagyendera omu maisho gangye omu mazima n'emitima yaabo yoona n'amagara gaabo goona, toribura oriza aha ngoma ya Israeli.
N'ahabw'ekyo otwaze nk'oku obwengye bwawe buri, kandi otariikiriza omutwe gwe gw'enju kushuuma okuzimu n'obusingye.
Kwonka oryagirira embabazi beene Baruzilai Omunyagileadi, babarirwe omu barikuriira aha meeza yaawe; ahakuba obu naabaire mpungire Abusalomu mwene sho, nikwo bangiriire.

Kandi reeba, hariho Shimei mwene Geera, Omubenyamiini owa Bahurimu, owankyeenire okukyeena kubi munonga aha izooba eri naagiiriireho Mahanaimu; kwonka akaija kuntangirira Yorudani, naamurahira MUKAMA nimmugira nti: Tindikwitsa rurara.
Kwonka mbwenu otarimubara nk'otaine rubanja; ahakuba ori omushaija w'obwengye; oryamanya eki oshemereire kumukora; kandi oryashuumya omutwe gwe gw'enju okuzimu guriho eshagama.
Emyaka ei Daudi yaamazire aha ngoma naategyeka Israeli ekahika makumi ana; emyaka mushanju akagitegyekyera Heburooni, kandi makumi ashatu n'eshatu yaagitegyekyera Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaashutama aha kitebe kya Daudi ishe; obugabe bwe bwahamibwa munonga.
Adoniya mwene Hagisi yaija ahari Batisheba nyina wa Sulemaani. Batisheba yaamugira ati: Ni buhooro? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ni buhooro.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Nyine eki ndikwenda kukugambira. Nyin'omugabe ati: Ngambira.

Yaamugira ati: Noomanya ku obugabe bwabaire buri obwangye, kandi Abaisraeli boona ku baabaire bantaireho amaisho, ngu mbategyekye; kwonka bwanyima kyahinduka bwaba obwa mwene tata, ahabw'okuba akabuheebwa MUKAMA.
Mbwenu nyine eki ndikwenda kushaba; otakiinyima. Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Kigambe.
Yaamugira ati: Nshabira omugabe Sulemaani, ahakuba tarikwija kukwangira, ampe Abishaagi owa Shuneemu, mmushwere.
Betisheba yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, niinyija kumukugambirira.

Atyo Betisheba yaaza ow'omugabe kumumugambirira. Omugabe yaimuka kumubugana, yaamwinamira; bwanyima yaashutama aha kitebe kye ky'obugabe, yaaragiira ku bareetera nyina ekitebe, yaashutama aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo.
Yaamugira ati: Nyine ekintu kikye eki ndikwenda kukushaba; kandi otakiinyima. Omugabe yaamugira ati: Kinshabe, Mukaikuru wangye; tindikwija kukikwima.
Onu ati: Mbwenu ninkushaba oikirize Abishaagi owa Shuneemu ashwerwe Adoniya mwene sho.

Omugabe Sulemaani yaagarukamu nyina ati: Ahabw'enki nooshabira Adoniya Abishaagi owa Shuneemu? Mushabire nu n'obugabe; ahabw'okuba ni mukuru wangye; kandi shabira na Abiasaari omunyamurwa na Yoabu mwene Zeruiya.
Bwanyima omugabe Sulemaani yaarahira MUKAMA, naagira ati: Adoniya ku araabe atazizire eki kigambo, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
N'ahabw'ekyo nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire, owantaireho, akaanyemeka omu mwanya gwa tata Daudi, kandi onyombekyeire eka nk'oku yaaraganiise, buzimazima eri izooba Adoniya naitwa.
Atyo omugabe Sulemaani yaatuma Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada; yaamuteera yaafa.
Atyo Sulemaani yaabinga Abiasaari omu bunyamurwa, ngu arekye kuba omunyamurwa wa MUKAMA; yaahikiiriza atyo ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaagambire ahari Eli omuri Shiilo.
Kandi baagambira omugabe Sulemaani bati: Yoabu yaahungira omu Ihema rya MUKAMA; kandi reeba, ari aha itambiro. Sulemaani yaayohereza Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada, ati: Irooko omwite.

Atyo Benaaya yaahika aha Ihema rya MUKAMA, yaamugira ati: Omugabe yaagira ngu, Orugyeyo. Onu ati: Ngaaha! Ka ngwe aha. Benaaya yaagaruka yaagambira omugabe ati: Oku nikwo Yoabu yangira, kandi nikwo yangarukamu.
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Okore nk'oku yaagamba; omwite, omuziikye, obone kwiha ahariinye n'aha nju ya tata orubanja rw'eshagama ei Yoabu yaaseeseire busha.

MUKAMA naija kumuhoora, asheeshe eshagama ye, naamutura abantu babiri abu yaitsize rurara, omugurusi wangye Daudi atakimanyire, haza baabaire bari abantu abarikumukira oburungi n'okuhikiirira, nibo Abuneeri mwene Neeri, omukuru w'eihe rya Israeli, na Amasa mwene Yeseri, omukuru w'eihe rya Yuda.
Okwo nikwo Yoabu arihoorwa naaturwa eshagama yaabo, we n'oruzaaro rwe ebiro byona; kwonka Daudi n'oruzaaro rwe n'enju ye n'obugabe bwe biryagira obusingye oburikuruga ahari MUKAMA ebiro byona.
Atyo Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada yaagarukayo, yaamuteera, yaamwita; baamuziika omu ka ye, ahu yaabaire atwire omu ihamba.
Bwanyima omugabe yaata Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada omu mwanya gwe kuba omukuru w'eihe; kandi yaata Zadoki omunyamurwa omu mwanya gwa Abiasaari.
Bwanyima omugabe yaatuma ahari Shimei, yaamugira ati: Oyeyombekyere enju Yerusaalemu, ogigumemu, kandi otarigirugamu kugira ahandi hoona ahu waaza.
Ahakuba eizooba ri orirugayo okambuka akagyera Kidirooni, omanyire kimwe ku otaribura kufa, kandi eshagama yaawe niiwe eribaho.
Shimei yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Ebi wangambira ni birungi; nyowe omwiru waawe niinyija kutwaza nka Mukama wangye Omugabe oku wandagiira. Atyo Shimei yaamara ebiro bingi ari Yerusaalemu.
Ku haahingwireho emyaka eshatu, abahuuku ba Shimei babiri baacwa, baaza owa Akishi mwene Maaka, omugabe wa Gaasi. Bwanyima bagambira Shimei bati: Abahuuku baawe bari Gaasi.
Shimei yaimuka yaatandiika endogoya ye, yaaza Gaasi owa Akishi kusherura abahuuku be; atyo yaagyenda, yaabaiha Gaasi.
Bwanyima Sulemaani ku yaagambiirwe ngu Shimei arugire Yerusaalemu, yaaza Gaasi, kandi yaagaruka,

omugabe yaatuma ahari Shimei, yaamugira ati: Nkakurahiza MUKAMA, naakwehanangiririza kimwe ninkugira nti: Omanyire kimwe ngu, eizooba ri orirugayo, okagira ahandi hoona ahu waaza, oryafa? Naiwe wangarukamu oti: Ebi waagamba ni birungi; niinyikiriza kubyorobera.
