Mbwenu ahabw'enki torinzire ndahiro ei waarahiire ahari MUKAMA, n'ekiragiro eki naakwehanangiriize?
Omugabe yaagaruka yaagira Shimei ati: Noomanya omu mutima gwawe ebibi byona ebi waakozire tata Daudi; n'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA naija kukuhoora ahabw'obubi bwawe.
Kwonka omugabe Sulemaani aryaheebwa omugisha, kandi ekitebe ky'obugabe bwa Daudi kiryagumaho ebiro byona omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Bwanyima omugabe yaaragiira Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada kumwita; yaashohora, yaamuteera, yaafa.
Butyo obugabe bwahamibwa omu mikono ya Sulemaani.
Kwonka abantu bakaba bahongyera empongano zaabo omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, ahakuba hakaba hatakombekirwe nju ahabw'eiziina rya MUKAMA.
Sulemaani yaakunda MUKAMA, yaagyendera omu biragiro bya Daudi ishe; kwonka yaaguma naatambira ebitambo omu myanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu, kandi naayotererayo obubaane.
Sulemaani ku yaabaire akiri Gibeoni, MUKAMA yaamweyoreka omu kirooto nyekiro; Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Shaba eki orikwenda ngu nkuhe.

Sulemaani yaagira ati: Okaba ogirira omwiru waawe tata Daudi embabazi nyingi, nk'oku yaabaire agyendera omu maisho gaawe omu mazima n'omu kuhikiirira n'omutima ogugororokire ahariiwe; mbwenu omucumiire omugisha ogu omuhango, waamuha omwana w'okuza aha ngoma ye, nk'oku kiri eri izooba.
Mbwenu hati, MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, ogizire omwiru waawe omugabe omu mwanya gwa tata Daudi, n'obu ndaabe ndi omwana muto, ntarikumanya oku ndaashohore, n'oku ndaataahe.
Kandi nyowe, omwiru waawe, ndi ahagati y'abantu baawe abu waatooraine, eihanga rihango munonga, eritarikubaasa kubarwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo ohe omwiru waawe omutima ogurikwetegyereza kutegyeka abantu baawe, mbone kutaanisa ekibi n'ekirungi; mbwenu n'oha orikubaasa kutegyeka eihanga ryawe eri erihango?
Okwo kushaba kwa Sulemaani kwashemeza MUKAMA ahabw'okushaba ekigambo ekyo.
Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Ahabw'aokushaba ekigambo ekyo, oteeshabire kuhangaara, nari obutungi, nari okushabira abazigu baawe kufa, kureka okeeshabira obwengye bw'okumanya ebihikire,
reeba, naakora nk'oku ekigambo kyawe kiri. Naakuha omutima gw'obwengye kandi ogurikwetegyereza; tihakabahoga orikwingana naiwe omu baakubandiize, kandi n'omu barikukurata taribaho.
Kandi naakuha n'ebi otaashaba, obutungi n'ekitiinisa; tiharibaho ondiijo mugabe oringana naiwe ebiro byawe byona.
Kandi ku origyendera omu mihanda yangye, waayorobera ebyatairweho n'ebiragiro byangye, nk'oku sho Daudi yaabaire abigyenderamu, ndyayongyera aha myaka yaawe.

Sulemaani yaasisiimuka, yaashanga kiri ekirooto. Bwanyima yaija Yerusaalemu, yaayemerera omu maisho g'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, yaatamba ebitambo by'okwotsya, n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; kandi yaateekyera abairu be boona obugyenyi.
Bwanyima abakazi babiri, abaabaire bari baamaraaya, baija, baayemerera omu maisho g'omugabe.
Omukazi omwe yaagira ati: Nyakusinga mukama wangye, nyowe n'omukazi ogu nituraara omu nju emwe. Ku tubaire turi hamwe omuri egyo nju, naazaara omwana.
Ku mbaire mmazire ebiro bishatu nzaire, omukazi ogu nawe yaazaara; kandi tubaire turi twenka, hataine ondiijo oriho omuri egyo nju, kureka itwe twembi.
Ku bubaire buri nyekiro omwana w'omukazi ogu yaafa ahabw'okumubyamira.
We nikwo kwimuka omu itumbi, nyowe omuzaana waawe ngwejegyeire, akaanyiha omwana wangye aha rubaju, akamubyamya omu kifuba kye, akareeta owe ofiire, akamubyamya omu kifuba kyangye.
Ku nyimukire kare omu kasheeshe kwontsya omwana wangye, naashanga afiire; kwonka ku ngiire kumwetegyereza bwaseesire, naashanga atari mwana wangye, ou nzaire.
Kwonka ogu mukazi yaagira ati: Ngaaha, omwana ohuriire n'owangye; ofiire n'owaawe. Ow'okubanza ati: Ngaaha, ofiire n'owaawe, ohuriire niwe wangye. Nikwo baabigambire batyo omumaisho g'omugabe.
Bwanyima omugabe yaagira ati: Mbwenu omwe naagira ati: Ohuriire n'owangye, ofiire niwe waawe; ondiijo ati: Ngaaha, ofiire n'owaawe, ohuriire niwe wangye.
Omugabe yaagaruka yaagira ati: Nimundeetere rurara. Baagimureetera.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Ogwo mwana ohuriire, mumucwemu ebicweka bibiri; kimwe mukihe omwe, ekindi mukihe ondiijo.

Bwanyima omukazi nyina w'omwana ohuriire, ahabw'okusaasibwa omwana we, yaagira omugabe ati: Mukama wangye, omwana ohuriire mumuhe, otamwita na kakye. Kwonka omukazi ondiijo yaagira ati: Tarikwija kuba wangye nari owaawe; bamucwemu ebicweka bibiri.
Omugabe nikwo kugira ati: Omwana ogwo ohuriire mutamwita na kakye, mumuhe omukazi ow'okubanza, ahabw'okuba niwe nyina.
Kandi Abaisraeli boona baahurira oku omugabe acwire orwo rubanja, baamutiina, ahabw'okuba bakareeba obwengye bwa Ruhanga bw'okucwa emanja z'oburyo buri omuriwe.
Omugabe Sulemaani yaaba omugabe wa Israeli yoona;
kandi aba nibo bategyeki bakuru abu yaabaire aine; Azaria mwene Zadoki akaba ari omunyamurwa,
Elihorefu na Ahiya beene Shiisha bakaba bari abahandiiki; Yehoshafaati mwene Ahiluudi akaba ari omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho;
Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada akaba ari omukuru w'eihe; Zadoki na Abiasaari bakaba bari abanyamurwa;
Azaria mwene Nasani ari omukuru w'abatware; Zabudi mwene Nasani akaba ari omunyamurwa, kandi munywani w'omugabe;
Ahishaari akaba ari omukuru w'ekikaari na Adoniramu mwene Abuda ari omukuru w'eby'emirimo.

Kandi Sulemaani akaba aine abatware ikumi na babiri omuri Israeli yoona, abo nibo baabaire batoijera omugabe n'ab'omu ka ye boona eby'okurya; buri omwe akaba aragiirwa kureeta eby'okurya by'okwezi kumwe omu mwaka.
Aga nigo maziina gaabo; Benihuuri ow'omu nsi y'ebibungo ya Efuraimu;
Benidekere owa Makazi, Shaalubiimu, Betishemeshi na Eloni-besihanani;
Benihesedi owa Aruboosi, (kandi niwe yaabaire atwara Sooko n'ensi yoona eya Heferi);
Ben-abinadabu owa Nafati-doori yoona, (kandi akaba ashweire muhanra wa Sulemaani orikwetwa Tafasi).
Baana, mwene Ahiluudi, owa Tanaki, Megido na Besi-sheani yoona aha rubaju rwa Zaretaani orwa ifo ya Yezereeli, okuruga Besi-sheani okuhika Abeeli-mehola, kandi n'okuhika seeri ya Yokimeamu;

Benigeberi owa Ramosi-gileadi, (kandi akaba naatwara tauni za Yairi mwene Manaase ez'omuri Gileadi, n'ekyanga kya Arugoobi, eky'omuri Bashani, ekyabaire kirimu endembo makumi mukaaga ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare eziine amarembo g'enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi z'emiringa);
Ahinadabu mwene Ido, owa Mahanaimu;
Ahimaazi owa Nafutaali (kandi nawe niwe yaabaire ashweire muhara wa Sulemaani orikwetwa Basemaasi);
Baana mwene Hushai owa Asheri na Bealoosi;
Yehoshafaati mwene Parua, owa Isakaari;
Shimei mwene Ela, owa Benyamiini;
na Geberi mwene Uuri, ow'ensi ya Gileadi, n'ensi ya Sihooni omugabe w'Abaamori na Ogi omugabe wa Bashani. Kandi omuri Yuda hakaba harimu omutware omwe.
Abayuda n'Abaisraeli bakaba bari baingi nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja, nibarya, nibanywa, kandi nibashemererwa.
Omutoijo gw'eby'okurya bya Sulemaani omu izooba rimwe gukaba guba encuro z'esaano y'obunono makumi ashatu, n'ez'endiijo saano makumi mukaaga,
enkone z'ente ikumi, n'ezindi makumi abiri ezi baabaire baiha omu mariisizo, n'entaama igana, otabariiremu mpara, esirabo, engabi n'enkoko zigomokire.

Ahakuba akaba atwara ebyanga byona ebyabaire biri seenu y'omugyera Furaati, okuruga Tifusa, okuhika Gaaza, kandi n'abagabe boona abaabaire bari seenu y'ogwo mugyera; kandi akaba aine obusingye aha mbaju zoona.
Abayuda n'Abaisraeli baaguma bari buhooro, buri muntu aha muzaabibu gwe, n'aha mutiini gwe, okuruga Daani okuhika Beeri-sheba omu biro bya Sulemaani byona.
Kandi Sulemaani akaba aine emyanya ei embaraasi ze ezirikukurura ebigaari zirikuraaramu obukumi buna, kandi akaba aine abashaija abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri.
Abo batware bakaba batoijera Sulemaani eby'okurya ahabwe n'ahabwa boona abaabaire bariira aha meeza ye, buri mutware okwezi kwe, hatarikugira kintu kyona ekyaburaho.
Brui mutware akaba areeta sayiri n'obunyaatsi bw'embaraasi n'obw'ezirikwiruka munonga, nk'oku yaabaire aragiirwa; abireeta omu mwanya ogu byabaire biba nibyetengwamu.
butyo obwengye bwa Sulemaani bwakira obw'abantu b'oburugwa-izooba n'obwengye bwona obw'Abanyamisri.
Kandi akaba naakiza n'abandi boona obwengye, nka Esaani Omunyaezerahi, na Hemani, Katukooli na Darada beene Mahooli; eiziina rye ryarangaanwa omu mahanga goona agaabaire gamwehinguririize.
Akagunja enfumu enkumi ishatu, yaahimba n'ebyeshongoro rukumi na bitaano.
Akaba naamanya ebirikumera okwiha aha mwela ogw'omuri Lebanooni okuhika aha nyaweera erikumera aha rugo; kandi akaba naamanya enyamaishwa, n'enyonyi, n'ebirikugyendesa enda, n'eby'enyanja.
Abantu bakaba baruga omu mahanga goona, baija kuhurira obwengye bwa Sulemaani, batumirwe abagabe b'omu nsi yoona, abaaherize kuhurira aha bwengye bwe.
Sulemaani yaatuma ahari Hiraamu naagira ati:
Noomanya ku tata Daudi atarabaasize kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga we enju ahabw'engamba z'abazigu abaabaire bamuri embaju zoona, okuhitsya obu MUKAMA yaabataire ahansi y'ebigyere bye.
Mbwenu hati MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye ampaire okuhuumura embaju zoona; tihakiriho bazigu nari akabi.

N'ahabw'ekyo mmaririire kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye enju, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambiire tata Daudi, ati: Mutabani waawe, ou ndyemeka kukuhungurira, niwe aryombekyera eiziina ryangye enju.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati ragiira bantemere emiti y'emyela omuri Lebanooni; baryakora n'abairu bangye; kandi ndyaguma nkuhe ebihembo by'abairu baawe nk'oku oringambira; ahabw'okuba noomanya ku hatariho n'omwe omuriitwe orikumanya kushara embaaho nk'Abasidoni.
Hiraamu, ku yaahuriire ebigambo bya Sulemaani, yaashemererwa munonga, yaagira ati: Eri izooba MUKAMA asiimwe, ahabw'okuha Daudi omwana w'obwengye kutegyeka eihanga eri erikuru.
Hiraamu yaatuma ahari Sulemaani ati: Mpuriire ebi ontumireho byona; niinyija kukora byona eby'emyereezi n'eby'emiberooshi, nk'oku orikwenda.

Abairu bangye baryagiiha Lebanooni, bagishuumye, bagihitsye aha nyanja, ngikomerane nk'ebibaya, ebone kuraba aha nyanja, ehikye omu mwanya ogu orindagiira; okwo ebe niyo yaakomororerwa, ogyakiire; kandi ku oriheereza ab'omu ka yangye eby'okurya, oryaba ohikize ebi ndikwenda.
Atyo Hiraamu yaatwekyera Sulemaani emyerezi n'emiberooshi ei yaabaire naayenda yoona;
na Sulemaani yaaha Hiraamu encuro z'engano obukumi bubiri n'entsimbo z'amajuta marungi makumi abiri ahabw'eka ye. Okwo nikwo Sulemaani yaagumire naamuha ebyo by'okurya buri mwaka.
Kandi MUKAMA yaaha Sulemaani obwengye, nk'oku yaamuraganiise, yaagira obusingye na Hiraamu; bombi baaragaana endagaano y'okuhwerana.
Yaaguma naayohereza kakumi-kakumi Lebanooni buri kwezi nibaihaihana; bamarayo okwezi kumwe, kandi ameezi abiri bagamara omuka; Adoniramu niwe yaabaire ari omukuru waabo.
Kandi Sulemaani akaba aine abeekorezi obukumi mushanju, n'abaabaire nibabaija amabaare omu nshozi obukumi munaana,
otabariiremu bakuru b'emirimo enkumi ishatu na magana ashatu, abaabaire nibategyeka abakozi.
Omugabe yaabaragiira kuhigura amabaare mahango g'obuguzi bwingi, ngu babone kugabaija n'okugombekyesa omusingi gw'egyo nju.
Batyo abombeki ba Sulemaani n'aba Hiraamu n'abantu ba Gebali bagabaija; bwanyima baatebeekanisa emiti n'ago mabaare kubyombekyesa egyo nju.
Enju ei omugabe Sulemaani yaayombekyeire MUKAMA, oburaingwa bwayo bukaba buri mikono makumi mukaaga, obukiika bwayo mikono makumi abiri, n'obwemi bwayo mikono makumi ashatu.
Ekisasi eky'omu maisho ga hekali kikaba kiri mikono makumi abiri oburaingwa, nibwingana n'obukiika bwa hekalu, n'obuhango bwakyo omu maisho ga hekalu bukaba buri mikono ikumi.
Egyo nju yaagibaizira amadirisa g'embaaho zirabainemu ezitarikubaasa kwihwamu.

Kandi aha bisiika by'egyo nju yaayombekyeraho ekindi kyombeko okwehinguririza ebisiika by'egyo nju, niyo hekalu n'ekishengye kyayo eky'Aharikwera munonga. Omuri ekyo kyombeko yaakoramu ebishengye okugyehinguririza.

Ebishengye by'ahansi obuhango bwabyo bikaba biri mikono etaano, ebya kaanyina-ibiri mikono mukaaga, n'ebya kaanyina-ishatu mikono mushanju; ahakuba okwehinguririaza aheera y'enju akaba atsigaho emyanya y'emiraba kuhikiraho, ngu erekye kwoga omu bisiika by'enju.

Kandi egyo nju omu kwombekwa, ekombekwa amabaare agaagyereirwe omu iteerero ryago kare; n'ahabw'ekyo hekalu ku yaabaire neeyombekwa, hakaba hatahurirwa kirikugamba kyona, enyondo nari empango n'obu kyakuba ekintu kyona ekyetwa ekyoma ky'okukoresa.

Omuryango ogw'ebishengye bya kaanyina-ibiri gukaba guri aha rubaju rwa buryo; bakaba batembera aha matembero agarikugyenda nigeezinga okuhika omu bishengye bya kaanyina-ibiri, n'okwogaho gakahika omuri kaanyina-isahtu.
Okwo nikwo yaayombekire egyo nju, akagiheza, akagishakaaza emiraba n'ambaaho eby'emyereezi;
kandi ebishengye by'ekyo kyombeko akabyombeka naabyegamiza hekalu, obwemi bwa buri kishengye bukaba buri mikono etaano, kandi ekyo kyombeko kikaba kiteerainwe n'enju ya hekalu n'emiraba y'emyereezi.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaizira Sulemaani, nikigira kiti:

Eby'enju ei orikwombeka, ku origuma noogyendera omu biragiro ebi naataireho, waahikiiriza emigyenzo yangye, waayorobera ebi naaragiire byona, waabigyenderamu, obwo ndyahamya ekigambo kyangye, eki naagambiire sho Daudi;
kandi ndyatuura omu bantu bangye Abaisraeli, ndekye kubatsigaho.
Okwo nikwo Sulemaani yaayombekire egyo nju, akagiheza.
Bwanyima omunda ebisiika yaabishweka embaaho z'emyereezi, okuruga ahansi okuhika aha miraba y'etandaruha; kandi ahansi yaayariraho embaaho z'emiberooshi.

Aha muheru gw'enju yaayombekaho ekisiika ky'embaaho z'emyereezi kya mikono makumi abiri okuruga ahansi okuhika aha miraba; ogwo mwanya gw'omwinziiro yaagugira omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda kuba Aharikwera munonga.
Kandi ekishengye ky'omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda kikaba kiri mikono makumi ana.

Ebisiika by'ekyo kishengye bikaba bishwekirwe embaaho z'emyereezi omunda, ezisharwirweho ebishushani by'ebisisi, n'eby'ebirabyo ebijanjamwire. Kyona kikaba kishwekirwe embaaho z'emyereezi, hataine ibaare ririkureebwa.
Ogwo Mwanya gurikwera ogw'omunda, ogwabaire guri aha muheru gw'egyo nju yaagushemeza kutamu eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA.

Kandi ogwo mwanya gukaba guri mikono makumi abiri oburaingwa, makumi abiri obukiika, kandi makumi abiri obwemi; bwanyima yaagushweka ezaabu eshemeziibwe; kandi egyo zaabu yaagishweka n'eitambiro eryabaire rishwekirwe embaaho z'emyereezi.
Kandi Sulemaani yaashweka enju yoona omunda ezaabu; omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda yaacwekanisaho enjegyere z'ezaabu.
Enju yoona yaagishweka ezaabu okuhitsya obu yaahweire; kandi n'eitambiro ry'omu Mwanya gurikwera ogw'omunda yaarishweka ezaabu.
Oburaingwa bw'eipapa ry'ekishushani kya kerubi omwe bukaba buri mikono etaano, n'erindi etaano, okuruga aha ndiijo mikono ikumi.
Ekishushani kya kerubi owa kabiri oburaingwa bwakyo nabwo bukaba buri mikono ikumi; ebishushani byombi bikaba biine orugyero rumwe kandi nibishushana.
Oburaingwa bw'ekishushani kya kerubi bukaba buri mikono ikumi, kandi n'obw'ekindi nabwo butyo.

Ebyo bishushani yaabita omu Mwanya gurikwera ogw'omunda aha muheru. Amapapa gaabyo gakaba gashashaanwire, eipapa rya kimwe nirihika aha kisiika ky'orubaju rumwe rw'enju, n'ery'ekindi nirihika aha rundi; agandi mapapa gaabyo nigabugaabuganira ahagati.
Ebyo bishushani bya baakerubi byombi yaabishweka ezaabu.
Kandi aha bisiika by'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda n'ogw'omumaisho yaasharuraho ebishushani bya baakerubi, n'eby'emikindo n'eby'ebirabyo bijanjamwire.
Ahansi omu myanya egyo yombi yaahashweka ezaabu.
Aharikutaaha omu Mwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda yaataho enyigi z'embaaho z'emizeituuni; ekisasi n'ebiti by'ogwo muryango byaba kimwe kya kataano ky'ekyo kisiika.

Ezo nyigi zombi ez'emizeituuni yaazisharuraho ebishushani bya baakerubi, n'eby'emikindo, n'eby'ebirabyo bijanjamwire, yaazishweka ezaabu, kandi ebyo bishushani bya baakerubi n'eby'emikindo yaabisiiga ezaabu.
Kandi aharikutaaha omuri hekalu yaataho ebiti by'emiryango eby'emizeituuni eby'embaju ina ezirikwingana;
orwigi rwaho yaarukora omu miberooshi, rwine embari ibiri; buri mbari erimu ebishate bibiri ebirikukubwa.
Ahari ezo mbari yaasharuraho ebishushani bya baakerubi, n'eby'emikindo, n'eby'ebirabyo bijanjamwire, yaazisiiga ezaabu naagiinganisa omuri ebyo bicweka bisharwire.
Kandi orugo rw'ekibuga ky'omunda yaarwombekyesa amabaare gabaizire omu mishorongo eshatu, kandi omushorongo, gumwe guri ogw'emitambiko y'emyereezi.
Omu kwezi kwa Buula nikwo kwezi kwa munaana okw'omwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe baagiheza n'emyanya yaayo yoona, nk'oku yaabaire eteekateekirwe kwombekwa. Yaamara emyaka mushanju naagyombeka.

Yaayombeka enju y'ekibira kya Lebanooni, oburaingwa bwayo mikono igana, obukiika bwayo mikono makumi ataano, n'obwemi bwayo mikono makumi ashatu; kandi ekombekwa aha nyomyo z'emyereezi ezibyairwe omu mishorongo ena, etairweho emitambiko y'emyereezi;
ahaiguru y'egyo mitambiko makumi ana n'etaano, ikumi n'etaano omuri buri mushorongo, eyaabaire etairwe ahari ezo nyomyo, yaashwekaho embaaho z'emyereezi.
Yaakora emishorongo eshatu y'amadirisa gakurataine, buri dirisa nirireebana n'erindi.
Ebiti by'emiryango y'enyigi n'eby'amadirisa byona bikaba nibingana embaju zoona, kandi ago madirisa gari omu mishorongo eshatu, buri rimwe nirireebana n'erindi.
Kandi yaayombeka ekyombeko ky'enyomyo, oburaingwa bwakyo mikono makumi ataano n'obukiika bwakyo mikono makumi ashatu, n'omu maisho gaakyo yaataho ekisasi ky'enyomyo n'ekisanga ky'omwenda.
Kandi yaakora ekishengye ky'ekitebe ky'obugabe eky'okucweramu emanja, nikyo kishengye ky'eiramuriro; yaakyombekyesa embaaho z'emyereezi okuruga ahansi okuhika aha miraba.

Ago maju goona gakaba gombekyeise amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi, gabaizirwe nk'oku gaagyezirwe, kandi gashazirwe n'emisumeeno omunda n'enyima, okuruga aha musingi okuhika aha mushorongo ogw'aha mutwe, kandi okuruga omu kibuga ky'enju ya MUKAMA okuhika aha kibuga ekihango.
Amabaare g'omusingi gakaba gari ag'obuguzi bwingi, kandi mahango munonga, agamwe gari mikono ikumi n'agandi mikono munaana.
N'ahaiguru yaataho amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi, gabaizirwe nk'oku gaagyezirwe, n'embaaho z'emyereezi.

Ekyo kibuga kihango kikaba kyehinguririziibwe emishorongo eshatu y'amabaare gabaizire, n'omushorongo gumwe gw'emitambiko y'ebiti by'emyereezi, nk'oku baayombekire ekibuga ky'omunda eky'enju ya MUKAMA n'ekisasi kyayo.
Omugabe yaatuma kweta Hiraamu okuruga Tuuro.

Hiraamu ogwo akaba ari omwana w'omufaakazi ow'omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali, kwonka ishe ari owa Tuuro. Akaba ari omuheesi w'emiringa, owaabaire aine obwengye bwingi n'okwetegyereza, kandi omunyamwoga orikubaasa kuheesha ebintu byona eby'emiringa. Yaija aha mugabe Sulemaani, yaamukorera emirimo yoona ei yaabaire naayenda.
Yaaheesha enyomyo ibiri z'emiringa, buri emwe mikono ikumi na munaana oburaingwa, omuzimba gwayo mikono ikumi n'ebiri.
Kandi yaaheesha emitwe ebiri y'emiringa eyagiibwe kugita aha mitwe y'ezo nyomyo; oburaingwa bwa bwemi bw'omutwe gumwe bukaba buri mikono etaano, n'obw'ogundi nabwo butyo.
Ahari egyo mitwe y'ahaiguru y'enyomyo yaaheesheraho otugoye tw'emiringa otushobeekaine nk'akatimba, kandi yaahundaho emikuufu eri nk'ebitaako; aha mutwe gumwe yaataho mushanju n'aha gundi mushanju.
Kandi yaakora ebishushani by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga; yaabyehinguririza obwo butimba omu mishorongo ebiri, kuza ahari ogwo mutwe ogw'aha nyomyo; yaatwaza atyo n'ogw'aha ndiijo nyomyo.
Kandi emitwe ey'aha nyomyo z'ekisasi ekaba eri nk'ebirabyo by'emyangangye, oburaingwa bwayo mikono ena.

Emitwe egyo ekaba eri ahari ezo nyomyo, kandi ahaiguru y'engata ey'ahari buri nyomyo haihi n'obwo butimba; aho niho baahanikire ebishushani by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga omu mishorongo ebiri; ebyo bijuma bikaba biri magana abiri.
Atyo yaabyara ezo nyomyo omu maisho g'ekisasi kya hekalu, ey'aha rubaju rwa buryo yaagyeta Yakiini, n'ey'aha rwa bumosho yaagyeta Boazi.
Aha mutwe gw'ezo nyomyo baakoraho ebishushani by'ebirabyo by'emyangangye. Okwo nikwo omurimo gw'ezo nyomyo gwahweire.
Kandi omu bugyenyero bwakyo hakaba hakiikiizemu ebishushani by'ebisisi biri omu mishorongo ebiri, biheesherainwe nakyo.

Ekyo kitanka kikaba kiteekirwe aha bishushani by'enimi ikumi na ibiri, bishatu nibireeba aha bukiizbwa-bumosho, bishatu oburengyerwa-izooba, bishatu aha bwa-buryo, na bishatu aha burugwa-izooba; ekyo kitanka kiteekirwe ahaiguru yaabyo, biteeraine ebibunu.
Omubiri gwakyo gukaba guri ekita kimwe; eminwa yaakyo ekaba ekozirwe nk'ey'ekikopo, nari nk'ey'ekirabyo ky'emyangangye; nikigiibwamu encuro enkumi ibiri z'ebunyungu bihango.
Oku nikwo ebyo bitebe byabaire bikozirwe; bikaba biine ebiremu ebishensheize omu mbaaho zaabyo.

Ahari ebyo biremu ebishensheize omuri ezo mbaaho hakaba hasharwirweho ebishushani by'entare, n'eby'enimi, n'ebya baakerubi; kandi ahari ezo mbaaho, ahaiguru n'ahansi y'ebishushani by'entare n'enimi, hasharwirweho ebitaako.

Kandi buri kitebe kikaba kiine enziga ina z'emiringa, n'ebyoma ebirikuhindukirwaho ezo nziga; nabyo biri eby'emiringa; kandi aha nshonda zaakyo ina hariho ebirikuhamya ekinaabiro. Ebirikuhamya ebyo bikaba biheesherainwe n'ebitaako aha rubaju rwa buri kimwe.

Kandi ekyo kitebe kikaba kiine omugoma aha munwa gwakyo, obwemi bwagwo mikono gumwe n'ekicweka; ahari ogwo mugoma bakaba bagyenyireho; kandi ebiremu byabyo bikaba nibingana embaju zoona biteebumburukire.
Ezo nziga ina ziri ahansi y'ebyo biremu, n'ebirikuhindukirwaho enziga biheesherainwe n'ekyo kitebe; obwemi bw'enziga emwe bukaba buri mukono gumwe n'ekicweka.

Enziga ezo zikaba nizishusha nk'ez'ebigaari by'orugamba; ebyoma byazo ebi zirikwehinduriraho, n'ebyoma byazo by'enziga, n'enyomyo zaazo, n'emigongo yaazo, n'engata zaazo, byona bikozirwe omu miringa eyagiibwe.
Aha nshonda zoona ina eza buri kitebe hakaba hariho ebirikuhamya bina biheesherainwe nakyo.
Aha mutwe gwa buri kitebe hakaba hariho ekintu kyebumburikire, obwemi bwakyo ekicweka kya mukono gumwe, kandi enyomyo zaakyo n'ebiremu byakyo bikwataine.
Ahari ezo nyomyo n'ebyo biremu yaasharuraho ebishushani bya baakerubi n'eby'entare n'eby'emikindo, nk'omwanya gwa buri kimwe oku gwabaire guri, yaakitaho ekitaako okukyehinguririza.
Okwo nikwo yaakozire ebitebe ikumi; byona bikaba biheesirwe omu muringo gumwe, biri orugyero rumwe, kandi nibishushana.
Yaata ebitebe bitaano aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo obw'egyo nju, n'ebindi bitaano aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho. Kandi ekitanka yaakita aha nshonda y'orubaju rwa buryo orw'oburugwa-izooba bw'egyo nju.
enyomyo ibiri, enyabya ibiri, emitwe y'aha mitwe y'enyomyo, n'obutimba bw'okushweka enyabya ibiri ez'aha mitwe eyaabaire eri ahari ezo nyomyo,
n'ebishushani by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga eby'okuhunda ha butimba bwombi, emishorongo ebiri ahari buri katimba, kushweka ahari ezo nyabya eziri ha mitwe y'enyomyo,
ebitebe ikumi n'ebinaabiro ikumi ebyabaire biri ahari ebyo bitebe,
ekitanka kimwe n'ebishushani by'enimi ikumi na ibiri, ebyabaire biri ahansi yaakyo.
Kandi ezo nyungu n'ebyoma by'okuyoora eiju n'ebinaabiro, ebyo bintu byona ebi Hiraamu yaakoreire omugabe Sulemaani ahabw'enju ya MUKAMA, akabikora omu miringa ekuubirwe.
Omugabe akaba abiyagiza omu ruhita rwa Yorudani ahaabaire haine eitaka ry'eibumba ahagati ya Sukoosi na Zaretaani.
Kandi Sulemaani tareeruhize kupima ebyo bintu byona, ahabw'okuba bikaba biri bingi munonga; n'ahabw'ekyo oburemeezi bw'emiringa tiburamanyirwe.

eby'okutaho amatabaaza by'ezaabu eshemeziibwe bitaano aha rubaju rwa buryo n'ebindi bitaano aha rwa bumosho omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda. Yaakora ebirabyo, amatabaaza n'empana eby'ezaabu;

ebikopo, makansi, enyabya, esohaani z'obubaane, n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro by'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, epata z'enyigi ez'ekishengye ky'omunda eky'Omwanya ogurikwera munonga, kandi ez'enyigi z'ekishengye kya hekalu, zikaba ziri ez'ezaabu.
Abashaija boona Abaisraeli baateeranira ow'omugabe Sulemaani omu kwezi kwa Etanimu, nikwo kwezi kwa mushanju, baizire aha bugyenyi.
Abakuru ba Israeli boona baija, abanyamurwa baakiriza eshanduukye.
Bainamura egyo shanduukye ya MUKAMA, n'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'ebintu byona ebirikwera ebyabaire biri omuri eryo ihema; abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baabitwara.

Kandi omugabe Sulemaani n'eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli, abaabaire bateeraniire omu maisho ge, bakaba bari hamwe nawe omu maisho g'eshanduukye, nibatamba ebitambo by'entaama n'ente ezitarikubaasa kubarwa ahabw'obwingi.

Bwanyima abanyamurwa baareeta eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, baagita omu mwanya gwayo, omu mwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda omuri hekalu, aharikwetwa Aharikwera munonga, ahansi y'amapapa g'ebishushani bya baakerubi.
Ahabw'okuba ebyo bishushani bya baakerubi bikaba bishashaanwire amapapa gaabyo ahaiguru y'omwanya gw'okutamu eshanduukye; amapapa gaabyo gaashweka eshanduukye n'emigamba yaayo.

Kandi emigamba ekaba eri miraingwa munonga; n'ahabw'ekyo emitwe yaayo ekaba ereebekyera omu mwanya ogurikwera oguri omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda; kwonka ekaba etarikubaasa kureeberwa aheeru; kandi na hati ekiriyo.

Omuri egyo shanduukye tihaine kindi ekyabaire kibamu kureka ebishate by'amabaare bibiri ebi Musa yaateereiremu ha rushozi Horebu, aha mukama yaaranniire 'Abaisraeli endagaano nibaruga omu nsi ya Misri.
Bwanyima abanyamurwa ku baarugire omu Mwanya ogurikwera, ekicu kyaijura enju ya MUKAMA,
batyo abanyamurwa tibaabaasa kwemereramu kuheereza ahabw'ekyo kicu; ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kikaba kiijwire enju ye.
Buzimazima nkwombekyeire enju y'ekitiinisa, omwanya gwawe gw'okutuuramu ebiro n'ebiro.
Omugabe yaahindukira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli beemereire, yaabashabira omugisha,
naagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli asiimwe, owaahikiiriza n'omukono gwe eki yaaraganiise tata Daudi n'akanwa ke, naagira ati:
Okwiha obu naiha abantu bangye omuri Misri, tinkatooranaga rurembo kwombekamu enju, ngu eiziina ryangye ribe nimwo ryaguma; kureka nkatoorana Daudi kutegyeka abantu bangye Israeli.
Mbwenu kikaba kiri omu mutima gwa tata Daudi kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli enju.
Kwonka MUKAMA yaagira tata Daudi ati: Obaire okozire gye ahabw'enaama ei obaire oine kwombekyera eiziina ryangye enju.
Kwonka tiiwe oryombeka egyo nju, kureka mutabani waawe ou orizaara, niwe aryombekyera eiziina ryangye enju.

Mbwenu MUKAMA yaahikiiriza eki yaaraganiise; ahabw'okuba naaza omu mwanya gwa tata Daudi, naagaruka aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaraganiise; kandi nyombekire egi nju ahabw'eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Omwo nimwo ntaire omwanya ahabw'eshanduukye, erimu endagaano ya MUKAMA, ei yaaragaine na baatatenkuriitwe obu yaabaiha omu nsi ya Misri.
yaagira ati:

Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, tihariho ruhanga omu iguru ahaiguru n'omu nsi ahansi orikushushana naiwe omu kurinda endagaano, n'omu kugirira embabazi abairu baawe abarikugyendera omu maisho gaawe n'emitima yaabo yoona;
kandi okahamya eki waaraganiise omwiru waawe tata Daudi; nk'oku waagambire n'akanwa kaawe, mbwenu waakihikiiriza n'omukono gwawe eri izooba.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati, MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, hamya eki waaraganiise omwiru waawe tata Daudi, noogira oti: Batabani baawe ku barigira emicwe mirungi, baagyendera omu maisho gangye nk'oku waabaire ogyenderamu, tiharibura muntu w'okushutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli.
Mbwenu hati, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ninkweshengyereza ekigambo kyawe eki waagambiire omwiru waawe tata Daudi okihamye.
Kwonka MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, ta omutima aha kushaba n'okweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe, noohurira okutaka kwe n'okushaba oku arikushaba omu maisho gaawe eri izooba,

obone kuguma otaire amaisho gaawe ahari egi nju nyomushana na nyekiro, omu mwanya ogu waagizire oti: Eiziina ryangye nimwo ririguma; obone kuguma noohurira okushaba oku omwiru waawe araagume naashaba naareeba omwanya ogu.

Kandi ogume ohurire okweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe n'okw'abantu baawe Abaisraeli oku bariguma nibakushaba nibareeba omwanya ogu; ogume ohurire ori omu iguru, omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu; kandi ku oraahurire, osaasire.
ohurire ori omu iguru, ogire eki waakora, ocwere abairu baawe emanja, zisingye okozire kubi, aturwe okutahikiirira kwe, oihe orubanja ahari ohikiriire, omuzimuurire nk'okuhikiirira kwe oku kuri.
ohurire ori omu iguru ryawe, osaasire abantu baawe Abaisraeli ekibi kyabo, obagarure omu nsi ei waahaire baishenkurubo.

ohurire ori omu iguru ryawe, osaasiree abairu baawe ab'eihanga ryawe Israeli ekibi kyabo, obeegyese emitwarize mirungi ei bashemereire kugyenderamu; kandi ogwisize ensi yaawe enjura, ei waahaire abantu baawe kuba obuhunguzi.
omuntu weena nari eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli baakushaba nibakweshengyereza, ibara muntu naamanya endwara y'omu mutima gwe, kandi aimukize emikono ye naagyorekyeza ei egi nju eri,

ohurire ori omu iguru omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu, osaasire, ogire eki waakora, oihure buri muntu, ou orikumanya omutima gwe, nk'oku emitwarize ye eri; ahabw'okuba niiwe wenka orikumanya emitima y'abantu boona,
ngu babone kukutiina ebiro byona ebi barimara omu nsi ei waahaire baatatenkuriitwe.
Kandi n'omunyaihanga otari w'omu bantu baawe Israeli oriruga omu nsi ya hare, akaija ahabw'eiziina ryawe,
ahakuba tibaribura kuhurira aha iziina ryawe erikuru, n'aha mukono gwawe ogw'amaani kandi ogubangire, omuntu ogwo ku ariija yaashaba naareeba enju egi,

ohurire ori omu iguru omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu, omumarire byona ebi ariba naakushaba, kibone kureetera amahanga goona ag'omu nsi kumanya eiziina ryawe n'okukutiina, nk'oku eihanga ryawe Israeli ririkukutiina, kandi bamanye egi nju ei nyombekire ku erikwetererwa eiziina raywe.

Abantu baawe ku barihurura nibaza aha rugamba kurwana n'abazigu baabo, omu muhanda gwona ogu oribatoozamu, baakushaba nibareeba ei oru rurembo oru waatooraine ruri, n'egi nju ei nyombekyeire eiziina ryawe,
ohurire okushaba n'okweshengyereza kwabo ori omu iguru, obarawnirire.
Kandi ku barikucumuraho, (ahakuba tihariho muntu otacumura,) waabagirira ekiniga, waabahayo aha bazigu baabo, baatwarwa omu nsi y'abazigu baabo eya hare nari eya haihi, bari enkwatwa;
kwonak ku barihikayo, baayegarukamu, baayeteisa, baakweshengyererezayo, nibagira bati: Tukacumura, twashiisha, twakora eby'obugomi,

baakugarukira n'omutima gwabo gwona n'amagara gaabo goona bakiri omu nsi y'abazigu baabo abaabatwaire omu bukwatwa, baakushaba nibareeba ei ensi ei waahaire baishenkurubo eri, n'orurembo oru waatooraine, n'egi nju ei nyombekyeire eiziina ryawe,
ohurire okushaba kwabo n'okweshengyereza kwabo ori omu iguru ahu otuura, obamarire ebyabo,
osaasire abantu baawe abo abaakucumwireho, obasaasire eby'okushiisha byabo byona ebi baakucumwireho, obahe okuigrirwa embabazi abaabanyagire, babagirire esaasi,
(ahabw'okuba n'abantu baawe kandi obuhunguzi bwawe, abu waihire omuri Misri omu iziiko ry'ebyoma).
Mbwenu ote amaisho gaawe aha kweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe n'eihanga ryawe Israeli, obategye amatu omu bunaku bwona obu barikutakiriramu;
ahabw'okuba okabashoroora, waabataanisa n'amahanga goona ag'omu nsi, ngu babe obuhunguzi bwawe, Mukama RUHANGA, nk'oku waagambiire omu mwiru waawe Musa, obu waiha baatatenkuriitwe omuri Misri.
yaayemerera, yaashabira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli omugisha, naagamba n'eiraka rihango ati:
MUKAMA asiimwe, ohaire eihanga rye Israeli okuhuumura, nk'ebi yaaraganiise byona oku biri; omu bigambo byona ebirungi ebi yaaraganiise, naagambira omuri Musa, tihariho na kimwe ekirabuzire.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu agume naitwe, nk'oku yaabaire aba na baatatenkuriitwe; ataritutsigaho, kandi atarituhemukaho;
ayehuguurireho emitima yaitu, tugyendere omu mitwarize ye yoona, tworobere ebiragiro ebi yaataireho, n'emigyenzo ei yaaragiire baatatenkuriitwe.
Kandi ebi bigambo ebi naayeshengyereresa MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ndi omu maisho ge, agume abiijukye nyomushana na nyekiro, abone kuguma naashoboorora omwiru we n'eihanga rye ebiribabaho buri izooba,
amahanga goona ag'omu nsi gamanye MUKAMA ku niwe Ruhanga, ku hatariho ondiijo.
N'ahabw'ekyo emitima yaanyu ebe eshemeire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, mugyendere omu bi yaataireho, mworobere ebiragiro bye, nk'oku kiri eri izooba.

Sulemaani yaahongyera MUKAMA empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye ente obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri, n'entaama akasiriira n'obukumi bubiri. Okwo nikwo omugabe n'Abaisraeli boona baashoroire enju ya MUKAMA.

Kandi eryo izooba niryo omugabe yaashororoire ekibuga ky'ahagati eky'omu maisho g'enju ya MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba niho yaatambiire ekitambo ky'okwokyeza kimwe, n'empongano z'esaano, n'ebicweka by'ebishaju by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, ahabw'okuba eitambiro ry'emiringa eryabaire riri omu maisho ga MUKAMA rikaba riri rikye, ritarikubaasa kuhikwaho bitambo by'okwotsya, n'empongano z'esaano, n'eby'ebishaju eby'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.

Okwo nikwo Sulemaani yaateekire obugyenyi omu bunaku obwo hamwe n'omutwe muhango gw'abantu aba Israeli yoona, abaabaire bateeraniire aho barugire omu nsi yoona okuruga ahu orikutaahira nooza Hamasi okuhika aha kagyera ka Misri, bakamarayo ebiro mushanju. Bwanyima baamara ebindi biro mushanju, byona byaba ikumi na bina.

Aha kiro kya munaana yaayohereza abantu; baamushabira omugisha, baataaha omu maka gaabo, bashemereirwe kandi bananukire ahabw'ebirungi byona ebi MUKAMA yaayorekire omwiru we Daudi n'abantu be Israeli.
MUKAMA yaamweyoreka omurundi gwa kabiri, nk'oku yaamweyorekyeire Gibeoni.

Yaamugira ati: Mpuriire okushaba kwawe n'okweshengyereza kwawe ebi oreetsire omu maisho gangye; nshoroire egyo nju i oyombekire, naatamu eiziina ryangye ngu rigumemu ebiro byona; kandi amaisho gangye n'omutima gwangye biryagigumaho obutwire bwona.
Kandi naiwe ku origyendera omu maisho gangye nka sho Daudi, n'omutima gw'amazima kandi ogugororokire, nookora ebi naakuragiire byona, kandi nooyorobera ebiragiro byangye n'emigyenzo ei naabaragiire,
naanye ndyahamya ekitebe kyawe ky'obugabe, otegyeke Israeli ebiro byona, nk'oku naaraganiise sho Daudi, nimmugira nti: Toribura muntu w'okuza aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli.
Kwonka iwe nari abaana baawe ku muriteishuka, mwandugaho, mwayanga kworobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebyatairweho ebi naataire omu maisho gaanyu, mwagyenda mwaheereza baaruhanga abandi, kandi mwabaramya,

obwo ndyamaraho Abaisraeli omu nsi ei naabahaire; kandi n'enju ei naashorooreire eiziina ryangye ndyaginaga ngiihe omu maisho gangye; kandi Israeli eryaba eky'okucweraho enfumu n'ekigaaniizo omu mahanga goona.
Egi nju eryaba orubungo; omuntu weena oriba naarabaho aryatangaara, ayeshaanye, naagira ati: Beitu shi MUKAMA akatura ki egi nsi n'egi nju?

Bwanyima bagira bati: Ahabw'okuba bakatsigaho MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo owaihire baishenkurubo omu nsi ya Misri, baayehongyera baaruhanga abandi, baabaramya, kandi baabaheereza; nikyo MUKAMA abareeteireho obubi obu bwona.
Hiraamu omugabe wa Tuuro owaabaire aha Sulemaani embaaho z'emyereezi n'ez'emiberooshi n'ezaabu, ebi yaabaire ayetenga byona, omugabe Sulemaani yaamuha endembo makumi abiri omu nsi ya Galilaaya.
Kwonka Hiraamu ku yaarugire Tuuro, yaija kureeba ezo ndembo zi Sulemaani amuhaire, tiyaazisiima.
Yaagira ati: Mwana wa tata, ezi ni ndembo ki ezi ompaire? Nikyo zaayeteirwe ensi ya Kabula n'okuhitsya hati.
Kandi Hiraamu akaba atwekyeire omugabe talanta z'ezaabu igana na makumi abiri.
Eki nikyo kyareeteire omugabe Sulemaani kukwata abantu b'okukora; okwombeka enju ya MUKAMA, eye ahabwe, Miilo, orugo rw'amabaare rwa Yerusaalemu, Hazoori, Megido, Gezeri,

(Faraho omugabe wa Misri akaba ainamukire, akwatsire Gezeri, kandi agyokize; aitsire Abanyakanaani abaabaire batwire omuri orwo rurembo; bwanyima yaagiha muhara we muka Sulemaani kuba enshagarirano; atyo Sulemaani yaayombeka busya Gezeri.)
na Besi-horoni eya ifo,
na Baalasi na Tamari omu ihamba omu nsi ya Yuda,

endembo z'amabiikiro zoona ezi Sulemaani yaabaire aine n'ez'ebigaari bye, n'endembo z'engabo ze ezirikugyendera aha mbaraasi, n'ekindi kyona eki yaabaire ayenda kwombeka omuri Yerusaalemu, Lebanooni n'ensi zoona ezaabaire ziri omu bugabe bwe.
Abantu boona abaahonokire aha Baamori, Abahiiti, Abaperizi, Abahiivi, kandi n'Abayebusi abaabaire batari Baisraeli;
baijukuru baabo abaahonokireho omuri egyo nsi, abu Abaisraeli batarabaasize kucwekyerereza kimweabo nibo Sulemaani yaahindwire abahuuku b'okubakorera emirimo, bakaguma batyo n'okuhitsya hati.

Kwonka Abaisraeli bo Sulemaani tarabahindwire bahuuku, kureka bakaba abasrukare, abandi baaba abatware be, abandi abakuru b'amahe, abandi abakuru b'engabo, abandi abakuru b'ebigaari bye, n'abandi baaba engabo ze ezirikugyendera aha mbaraasi.
Abatware abakuru abaabaire nibareeberera omurimo gwa Sulemaani bakaba bari magana atana na makumi ataano; abo nibo baabaire nibategyeka abantu abaabaire nibakora ogwo murimo.
Kwonka muhara wa Faraho yaaruga omu rurembo rwa Daudi, yaataaha omu nju ye ei Sulemaani yaamwombekyeire; bwanyima Sulemaani yaayombeka Miilo.

Sulemaani yaaguma naatambira MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya, n'eby'okusiima ahabw'obusingye kashatu omu mwaka, naabitambira aha itabiro eri yaayombekyeire MUKAMA, kandi naayoterera obubaane omu maisho ga MUKAMA. Atyo Sulemaani yaaheza enju.
Kandi omugabe Sulemaani yakora eigana ry'emeeri, yaazikorera Ezioni-geberi, ahahereraine na Eloosi aha rubaju rw'Enyanja erikutukura omu nsi ya Edomu.
Bwanyima Hiraamu yaayohereza omuri ezo meeri abairu be, abarimbi abaabaire bamanyiire enyanja, kukwatanisa n'abairu ba Sulemaani;
baaza Ofira, baihayo etalanta z'ezaabu magana ana na makumi abiri; baazireetera omugabe Sulemaani.

Yaija Yerusaalemu ashandekyereziibwe abantu baingi munonga, n'engamira ezeekoreire emigaju, ezaabu nyingi n'amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi. Ku yaahikire ahari Sulemaani, yaamugambira kyona ekyabaire kimuri aha mutima.
Sulemaani yaagarukamu ebi yaamubuurize byona; tihariho kigambo na kimwe ekyayeshobire omugabe, eki ataramushobororeire.
Omugabekazi ku yaareebire obwengye bwona obwa Sulemaani, n'enju ei yaayombekire,

eby'okurya by'aha meeza ye, emishutamire y'abagaragwa be, n'emiheerereze y'abaheereza be, n'ebijwaro byabo, n'abagabuzi be ba viinyo, n'emiinamukire ye naaza omu nju ya MUKAMA, omutima gwamuhwa omunda.
Yaagira omugabe ati: Ebigambo ebi naahuriire omu nsi yangye ebirikugamba aha by'emitwarize yaawe n'obwengye bwawe, bikaba biri eby'amazima;

kwonka tindabiikiriize okuhitsya obu nyeiziire, eriisho ryangye rikabyereebera; mbwenu naashanga batarangambiire n'obu kyakuba ekicweka kyabyo kimwe kya kabiri; kandi obwengye bwawe n'obugwa gye bwawe nibikira oku naabihuriire.
Abashaija baawe bahiiriirwe! Nabaheereza baawe aba bahiiriirwe, abeemerera obutoosha omu maisho gaawe, bakahurira obwengye bwawe!

MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, owakusiimire akakuta aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli, ahimbisibwe! MUKAMA ahabw'okukunda Israeli ebiro byona, nikyo yaakuteereireho kuba omugabe, ngu obone kucwa emanja z'oburyo omu kuhikiirira.

Bwanyima yaaha omugabe etalanta z'ezaabu igana na makumi abiri, emigaju mingi munonga, n'amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi; tihakagarukaga kwija endiijo migaju mingi nk'ei omugabekazi wa Sheeba yaahaire omugabe Sulemaani.

Ezo mbaaho z'alumuugi omugabe yaazibaijamu enyomyo z'enju ya MUKAMA n'eye, kandi yaazibaijamu endongo n'enanga ahabw'abeeshongozi; tihariho biti by'alumuugi ebyagarukire kureetwa nari okureebwa ebiri nk'ebyo n'okuhitsya hati.

Omugabe Sulemaani yaaha omugabekazi wa Sheeba ebi yaabaire naayenda byona, n'ebi yaashabire byona, otabariiremu bi Sulemaani yaamuhaisize obufura nk'omugabe. Bwanyima yaakuba, yaagaruka omu nsi ye n'abagaragwa be.
otabariiremu eyaabaire eruga omu bashuubuzi n'enshaagi ezaabaire ziruga omu batungi n'abagabe boona ba Buharabu, n'abategyeki b'omu nsi egyo.
Omugabe Sulemaani yaaheeshesa engabo z'ezaabu magana abiri, engabo emwe neeheeshwa omu zaabu ya shekeli magana mukaaga.
Kandi yaaheeshesa engabo nkye magana ashatu z'ezaabu; miina ishatu z'ezaabu niziheeshwamu engabo emwe; omugabe yaazita omu nju y'ekibira kya Lebanooni.
Kandi yaabaijesa ekitebe kihango ky'obugabe omu miino y'enjojo, yaakishweka ezaabu eshemeziibwe.

Ekyo kitebe ky'omugabe kikaba kiine amatembero mukaaga; kandi enyima yaakyo hariyo ekishushani ky'omutwe gw'enyana; ahari buri rubaju rw'ekyo kitebe hariho ah'okuta emikono, n'ebishushani bibiri by'entare, kimwe aha rubaju rumwe, n'ekindi aha rundi rubaju;

kandi n'ebindi bishushani by'entare ikumi na bibiri byemereire bibiri bibiri ahari buri itembero ahari ago matembero mukaaga, kimwe aha rubaju rumwe rwaryo, n'ekindi aha rundi. Omu bugabe obundi bwona tihariho kitebe ekyabaire nikishushana nakyo.

Eby'okunywaisa byona eby'omugabe Sulemaani bikaba biri eby'ezaabu, n'ebintu byona eby'omu nju y'ekibira kya Lebanooni bikaba biri eby'ezaabu eshemeziibwe; tihariho kintu na kimwe ekyabaire kikozirwe omu feeza, ahabw'okuba omu biro bya Sulemaani efeeza ekaba etarikubarwa kuba ekintu.

Ahakuba omugabe akaba aine eigana ry'emeeri aha nyanja ya Tarushiishi hamwe n'erya Hiraamu. Omurundi gumwe omu myaka eshatu, ago magana g'emeeri gakaba gaija gareetsire ezaabu, efeeza, emiino y'enjojo, enkobe na zaanyamunyonyi.
Abantu boona ab'omu nsi bakaba beetenga kureeba Sulemaani, ngu bahurire obwengye bwe obu Ruhanga yaamuhaire.
Kandi weena owaabaire aija akaba areeta omutoijo, ebintu by'efeeza nari eby'ezaabu, ebijwaro, eby'okurwanisa, emigaju, embaraasi n'enyumbu; ebyo byona nikwo byabaire biija buri mwaka.
Omugabe yaareetera Yerusaalemu okugira efeeza nyingi nk'amabaare, n'ebiti by'emyereezi byaba nk'emisikamoori y'omu mpita.
Embaraasi ezi Sulemaani yaabaire aine bakaba baziiha omuri Misri; abashuubuzi b'omugabe bakaba bazigura omu busyo, buri busyo bwine obuguzi bwabwo.

Kandi ekigaari kikaba kiihwa Misri ahabwa shekeli z'efeeza magana mukaaga, n'embaraasi ahari igana na makumi ataano; kandi abashuubuzi ku baabaire bazireeta, baziguza abagabe boona ab'Abahiiti n'ab'Abasiria.

abaarugire omu mahanga agu MUKAMA yaagambiire Abaisraeli naagira ati: Mutarishwererana nabo; ahakuba buzimazima baryahindura emitima yaanyu, mukuratire baaruhanga baabo. Kwonka Sulemaani ahabw'okubakunda yaababaho akaramata.
Akaba aine abakazi magana mushanju abanyiginyakazi, n'ebinyansunju magana ashatu; abakazi be abo baahindura omutima gwe.
Ahakuba Sulemaani ku yaakuzire, baahindura omutima gwe, yaakuratira baaruhanga abandi; ahabw'okuba omutima gwe tigurabeereire kimwe gw'amazima ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga we nk'ogwa Daudi ishe.
N'ahabw'ekyo Sulemaani akakuratira Ashitaroosi ruhanga-omukazi ow'Abasidoni, na Milikomu ekihagaro eky'Abaamoni.
Atyo Sulemaani yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, tiyaakuratirira kimwe MUKAMA nk'oku Daudi ishe yaakozire.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaayombekyera Kemoshi ekihagaro kya Moabu, na Moleki ekihagaro ky'Abaamoni omwanya gw'okuramizamu aha kabungo k'oburugwa-izooba bwa Yerusaalemu.
Kandi nikwo yaakoreire atyo abakazi be boona ab'endugamahanga, abaabaire bootera obubaane, bakatambira baaruhanga baabo.
kandi amuragiire naamwehanangiriza aha kintu eki, kutakuratira baaruhanga abandi; kwonka tiyaakora nk'oku MUKAMA yaamuragiire.

Nikyo MUKAMA yaagiriire Sulemaani ati: Nk'oku okozire eki, okiihire aha mutima, okanga kurinda endagaano n'ebyatairweho ebi naakuragiire, buzimazima niinyija kukwaka obugabe bwawe, mbuhe omugaragwa waawe.
Kwonka ahabwa sho Daudi tindikikora omu biro byawe, ndyabwaka mutabani waawe.
Kandi tindibumwaka bwona, kureka ndyamuhaho oruganda rumwe ahabw'omwiru wangye Daudi, n'ahabwa Yerusaalemu ei naayetooraniire.
MUKAMA yaimukiza Sulemaani omuzigu w'okumurwanisa, orikwetwa Hadadi Omunyaedomu, owaabaire ari ow'omu ruganda rw'obugabe bwa Edomu.
Ahakuba Daudi ku yaabaire ari Edomu, Yoabu owaabaire ari omukuru w'engabo yaimuka yaaza kuziika abaitsirwe, yaita oyetwa omushaija weena omuri Edomu;
(ahakuba Yoabu n'Abaisraeli boona bakamarayo ameezi mukaaga, okuhitsya obu yaacwekyereize oyetwa omushaija weena omuri Edomu)
kwonka Hadadi yaahungira Misri n'abamwe aha Banyaedomu abaabaire bari abairu ba ishe, we akiri muto.
Batyo baaruga Midiani, baahika Parani, baihayo abashaija, baabatwara, baaza Misri owa Faraho omugabe wa Misri, Faraho yaamuha enju, n'ab'okumutoijera eby'okurya, kandi yaamuha n'obutaka.
Hadadi ogwo yaagira obushongore bwingi ahari Faraho, ekyarugiremu yaamuhingira muramu we, murumuna wa Tapeneesi omukazi we nyeiteeka.
Murumuna wa Tapeneesi yaamuzaarira omwana w'omwojo orikwetwa Genubaasi, ou Tapeneesi yaacuukiize omu ka ya Faraho n'abaana be.

Kwonka Hadadi ku yaabaire ari Misri, yaahurira ngu Daudi agwejegyeire, yaashaga baishenkuru, kandi ngu na Yoabu omukuru w'eihe afiire, Hadadi yaagira Faraho ati: Reka ngyende, ngarukye omu ihanga ryaitu.
Kwonka Faraho yaamubuuza at: Waaza kwenda kugaruka owaanyu mbuzire ki? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Tikiriho; kwona fa okundeka ngyende.
Kandi Ruhanga yaagaruka yaamwimukiza omuzigu orikwetwa Rezoni mwene Eliada, owaabaire acwire ahari mukama we Hadadezeeri omugabe wa Zooba.
Daudi ku yaabaire aherize kwita aba Zooba, Rezoni yaateerana hamwe abantu, yaaba omwebembezi w'omutwe gw'abambuzi; baataha Damasiko, baatuurayo, bwanyima baamugira omugabe omuri Damasiko.
Yaaba omuzigu w'Abaisraeli ebiro byona ebya Sulemaani, naakora kubi nka Hadadi, naayangira kimwe Israeli, kandi naategyeka Siria.
Kandi eki nikyo yaarwanisiize omugabe. Sulemaani akaba naayombeka Miilo, naahunduuza ekishenshero ky'orurembo rwa Daudi ishe.
Kandi Yeroboamu akaba ari omushaija orikwebaasa; n'ahabw'ekyo Sulemaani ku yaareebire ogwo mutsigazi ari omukozi, yaamuha obukuru bw'okureeberera abapakasi boona ab'omu muryango gwa Yosefu.
Omu bunaku obwo, Yeroboamu ku yaabaire naaruga Yerusaalemu, nabi Ahiya owa Shiilo yaamubugana. Obwo Ahiya akaba ajwaire omwenda musya; bari bombi omu bwerere.
Ahiya yaakwata ekyo kijwaro kye, yaakitaaguramu emitanda ikumi n'ebiri.
Yaagira Yeroboamu ati: Yetwarire emitanda ikumi; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli nikwo arikugira ati: Reeba, niinyija kwaka Sulemaani obugabe, iwe nkuhe enganda ikumi;
kwonak naija kuguma n'oruganda rumwe ahabw'omwiru wangye Daudi, n'ahabwa Yerusaalemu, orurembo oru naatooraine omu nganda zoona eza Israeli;

ahabw'okuba antsigireho, yaaramya Ashitaroosi ruhanga-omukazi owa Sidoni, na Kemoshi ruhanga wa Moabu, na Milikomu ruhanga w'Abaamoni; kandi yaayanga kugyendera omu mihanda yangye n'okukora ebihikire omu maisho gangye, n'okworobera ebyatairweho n'emigyenzo ei naaragiire, nk'oku Daudi ishe yaabaire naatwaza.
Kwonka tindimwaka bugabe bwona, kureka ndyamureka agume ari omutegyeki omu biro bye byona, ahabwa Daudi omwiru wangye ou naatooraine akoorobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho;
omwana we niwe ndyaka obugabe, nkakuha engada ikumi.
Kwonka omwana we ndyamuha oruganda rumwe, ngu Daudi omwiru wangye agume n'etabaaza obutoosha omu maisho gangye omuri Yerusaalemu, orurembo oru naatooraine kugumyamu eiziina ryangye.
Kandi ndyakutwara otegyekye nk'oku orikwenda kwona, obe omugabe wa Israeli.

Kandi ku orihurira ebi ndikukuragiira, waagyendera omu mihanda yangye, waakora ebihikire omu maisho gangye, nooyorobera ebi naataireho n'ebiragiro byangye, nk'omwiru wangye Daudi oku yaabaire atwaza, ndyaguma naiwe, nkwombekyere enju ehamire, nk'ei naayombekyeire Daudi; kandi nkuhe Israeli.
Kandi ahabw'ekyo ndyabonabonesa baijukuru ba Daudi, kwonka ti biro byona.
Ekyo kyareetera Sulemaani kwenda kwita Yeroboamu; kwona Yeroboamu yaimuka, yaahungira Misri owa Shishaki omugabe wa Misri, yaagumayo okuhitsya obu Sulemaani yaafiire.
Kandi omwanya gwona ogu Sulemaani yaamazire aha ngoma Yerusaalemu naategyeka Israeli yoona, gukahika emyaka makumi ana.
Atyo Sulemaani yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi ishe, Rehoboamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu bunaku obwo Yeroboamu mwene Nebati akaba akiri Misri, ei yaabaire ahungiire omugabe Sulemaani. Ku yaakihuriire, yaarugayo.
Baamutumaho ab'okumweta; atyo Yeroboamu n'omutwe gw'Abaisraeli boona baija, baagira Rehoboamu bati:
Sho akongyera oburemeezi aha kutegyekwa kwaitu. Mbwenu otutuubize aha mirimo erikurusya ei sho yaabaire naatukoresa, n'aha buremeezi bw'okutegyeka kwe, naitwe nitwija kukuheereza.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Mbwenu mugarukyeyo, mumareyo kashatu; haza mugarukye. Batyo abantu baayaabuuka, baagyenda.
Bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaaza omu naama n'abagurusi abaabaire batabaarira Sulemaani ishe akiriho, yaabagira ati: Nimumpa bwengye ki okugarukamu abo bashaija?
Baamugira bati: Ku oraikirize kuba omuheereza w'eri ihanga eri izooba, waabaheereza, kandi waabagarukamu ebigambo ebirikubagwisa gye, obwo nibwo bariba abairu baawe ebiro byona.
Kwonka we yaayanga enaama ei abo bagurusi baamuha, bwanyima yaaza omu naama n'abatsigazi abaanyeetsire nawe, kandi abaabaire nibamutabaarira.
Yaababuuza ati: Nimumpa bwengye ki okugarukamu abo bantu abangizire ngu mbatuubize aha buremeezi bw'obutegyeki obu tata yaabataireho?

Abo batsigazi abaanyeetsire nawe baamugira bati: Oku nikwo oraagarukyemu abantu abakushabire nibagira bati: Sho akongyera oburemeezi aha kutegyekwa kwaitu; mbwenu iwe otutuubizeho; obagire oti: Akakumu kangye akahera nikakira obuhango enyugunyu ya tata.
Mbwenu nk'oku tata yaabeekoreize omugamba guremeire, nyowe niinyija kukizaho. Tata akaba abateeza enkoba, nyowe niinyija kubateeza
Aha kiro kya kashatu Yeroboamu yaija n'abantu boona aha mugabe Rehoboamu, nk'oku yaabagizire ati: Mugarukye aha kiro kya kashatu.
Omugabe yaabagarukamu n'amaani, naayanga obwengye obu abagurusi babaire bamuhaire;

yaabagarukamu nk'obwengye bw'abatsigazi obu bamuhaire oku bubaire buri, ati: Tata akaba abeekoreza omugamba guremeire, kwonka nyowe niinyija kukizaho. Akaba abateeza enkoba, kwonka nyowe niinyija kubateeza skorupio.
Abaisraeli boona ku baareebire omugabe yaayanga kubahurira, baamugira bati:
Twine kakwate ki na Daudi?
Titwine buhunguzi omuri mwene Yese.
Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, nimugarukye omu mahema gaanyu!
Naimwe aba Daudi, mugume mwemarire ebyanyu n'oruganda rwanyu!
Batyo Abaisraeli baagaruka omu maka gaabo.
Kwonka Rehoboamu yaagumizamu naategyeka Abaisraeli abaabaire batwire omu ndembo za Yuda.

Bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaatuma Adoramu owaabaire ari omukuru w'abakozi b'emirimo y'okuhatwa; Abaisraeli boona baamuteera amabaare, yaafa. Omugabe Rehoboamu ku yaabihuriire, ahonaaho yaaza omu kigaari kye kuhungira Yerusaalemu.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baagomeire enju ya Daudi n'okuhitsya hati.

Kandi Abaisraeli boona ku baahuriire ngu Yeroboamu agarukire, baamutumaho ab'okumweta ngu aije omu ishengyero, bamwemekye kuba omugabe wa Israeli yoona. Tihaabaho n'omwe owaagaruka kukuratira enju ya Daudi, kureka oruganda rwa Yuda rwonka.
Kwonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyaija ahari Shemaaya, omushaija wa Ruhanga, nikigira kiti:
Gambira Rehoboamu mwene Sulemaani omugabe wa Yuda kandi n'abantu boona ab'enju ya Yuda n'eya Benyamiini, n'abandi boona, oti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Mutahurura, n'obu kwakuba okurwanisa beene waanyu Abaisraeli. Buri muntu agarukye omu ka ye, ahakuba ekintu eki niinye kirugireho. Batyo baahurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA, baagaruka omuka, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri.
Bwanyima Yeroboamu yaagira omu mutima gwe ati: Nimmanya ngu hati obugabe nibwija kugaruka omu nju ya Daudi;
abantu aba ku baraagume nibainamuka Yerusaalemu kutambirayo ebitambo omu nju ya MUKAMA, emitima yaabo eryagarukira mukama waabo, Rehoboamu omugabe wa Yuda.

Atyo omugabe yaagira enaama y'okukora ebishushani bibiri by'enyana omu zaabu. Yaagira abantu ati: Nikiija kubarusya okuguma nimwinamuka Yerusaalemu. Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, nimureebe baaruhanga baanyu abaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri.
Ekimwe yaakita omuri Beseeli n'ekindi yaakita Daani.
Ekyo eki yaakozire kyaba ekibi; ahakuba abantu bakaba baza kuramya eky'omuri Beseeli, n'ekindi bakishanga omuri Daani.
Kandi yaayombeka amaju omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, yaagaruka yaataho abanyamurwa naabaiha omu bandi bantu, abatari by'omu Baleevi.

Aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano omu kwezi kwa munaana Yeroboamu yaataho obugyenyi, nk'obw'omuri Yuda; yaatambira ebitambo aha itambiro; kandi yaagira atyo n'omuri Beseeli, naatambira enyana ezi yaakozire ebitambo. Bwanyima yaata abanyamurwa omu myanya egyo emikuru ei yaakozire kuramizamu.

Yainamuka aha itambiro eri yaabaire akozire omuri Beseeli aha kiro kya ikumi na bitaano omu kwezi kwa munaana, omu kwezi oku yaayeteereireho; yaaragiira ku habaho obugyenyi ahabw'Abaisraeli, kandi yainamuka aha itambiro kwotera obubaane.

Ogwo mushaija yaakyeena eitambiro n'ekigambo kya MUKAMA naagira ati: Iwe itambiro 'we, itambiro, oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, omwana w'omwojo orikwetwa Yosia aryazaarirwa enju ya Daudi; bwanyima aryakutambiraho abanyamurwa b'emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, abakwotereraho obubaane, kandi akwokyezeho n'amagufa g'abantu.
Ahari eryo izooba yaayoreka akamanyiso, naagira ati: Aka niko kamanyiso aku MUKAMA yaagamba, naagira ati: Reeba, eri itambiro niriija kushatuka, n'eiju ryaho ryatikye.

Omugabe Yeroboamu ku yahuriire ebigambo by'ogwo muntu wa Ruhanga ebi yaakyeena eitambiro ry'omuri Beseeli, yaamworekyeza omukono ari aha itambiro naagira ati: Mumukwate. Omukono ogu yaabaire amworekyeize gwayomerayo, tiyaabaasa kugugarura.
Eitambiro ryashatuka, n'eiju ryayatika, nk'akamanyiso aku omushaija wa Ruhanga yaayorekire ahabw'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kaabaire kari.

Omugabe yaagambira ogwo muntu wa Ruhanga ati: Yeshengyereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe hati, onshabire, omukono gwangye gukire. Atyo omushaija wa Ruhanga yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA, omukono gw'omugabe gwakira, gwaba nk'oku gushangirwe guri.
Omugabe yaagira ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga ati: Ija tugyendane omuka, oruhuukyeho, kandi niinyija kukuha ebihembo.
Ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga yaamugarukamu ati: N'obu waakumpa ekicweka ky'enju yaawe, tindikwija kutaahamu naiwe. Kandi tindikwija kurya eby'okurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa amaizi omu mwanya ogu;
ahabw'okuba nikwo ekigambo kya MUKAMA kindagiire, nikigira kiti: Otariryayo eky'okurya, otarinywayo amaizi, n'obu kwakuba okugaruka omuhanda ogu oreetsirwe.
Atyo yaatoora ogundi muhanda, tiyaagaruka muhanda ogumureetsire naaza Beseeli.

Omu bunaku obwo hakaba hariho nabi omugurusi atwire Beseeli. Abatabani baija, baamugambira byona ebi ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga yaakora Beseeli eryo izooba; kandi n'ebigambo ebi yaagambira omugabe, baabigambira ishebo.
Ishebo yaababuuza ati: Yaatoora muhanda ki? Abatabani baamworeka omuhanda ogu ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga orugire omuri Yuda yaatoora.
Yaagira abatabani ati: Nimuntandiikire endogoya. Batyo baamutandiikira endogoya, yaagitemba.
Yaakurata ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga, yaamushanga ashutami ahansi y'omwela, yaamubuuza ati: Niiwe mushaija wa Ruhanga orugire omuri Yuda? Yaamugarukamu ati: Niinye.
Bwanyima yaamugira ati: Ija tugyendane omuka, orye ak'okurya.
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Tindikwikirizibwa kugarukayo naiwe, nari okutaaha omuka naiwe, n'obu kwakuba okurya eby'okurya nari okunywa amaizi naiwe omuri ogu mwanya;
ahabw'okuba nikwo ekigambo kya MUKAMA kindagiire nikigira kiti: Otariryayo eby'okurya, otarinywayo amaizi, n'obu kwakuba okugaruka omuhanda ogu oreetsirwe.
Onu yaamugira ati: Naanye ndi nabi nkaiwe, kandi maraika otumirwe ekigambo kya MUKAMA yangira ati: Irooko omugarure omu ka yaawe, arye ak'okurya, kandi anywe otwizi. Kwonka akaba naamubeiha.
Atyo yaagaruka nawe omuka, baarya eby'okurya omu ka ye, kandi baanywa n'amaizi.
Ku baabaire bakiri aha meeza, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari nabi ogwo owaamugarura;

yaagambira ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga orugire omuri Yuda n'eiraka rihango, ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okugomera ekigambo kya MUKAMA, kandi n'okutoorobera kiragiro eki MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akuragiire,

okagaruka, okarya eby'okurya, okanywa amaizi omu mwanya ogu akuzibiire naagira ati: Otariryamu eby'okurya n'obu kwakuba okunywamu amaizi, n'ahabw'ekyo omutumbi gwawe tigurihika ha kituuro kya baashwenkuru.
Nabi ogwo omugurusi, ku yaaherize kurya eby'okurya n'okunywa, yaatandiikira nabi ogwo ou yaagarura endogoya.
Ku yaabaire naakigyenda, entare yaamubugana omu muhanda, yaamwita; omutumbi gwe gwagangarama omu muhanda, endogoya yaagwemerera aha rubaju, n'entare nayo yaayemereraho.
Kandi reeba, abantu abaarabireho baareeba omutumbi gugangarami omu muhanda, entare egwemereire aha rubaju; baija, baakigamba omu rurembo omu ogwo mugurusi nabi yaabaire atwire.

Nabi ogwo owaamugaruriire omu muhanda ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: N'omushaija wa Ruhanga, owaagomera ekigambo kya MUKAMA; nikyo MUKAMA yaamuriisiza entare, ekamutaagataagura, ekamwita, nk'ekigambo eki MUKAMA amugambiire oku kiri.
Yaagira abatabani ati: Muntandiikire endogoya. Nabo baagitandiika.
Yaagyenda, yaashanga omutumbi gugangarami omu muhanda, endogoya n'entare bigwemereire aha rubaju, entare etaguriire n'obu kwakuba okutaagataagura endogoya.
Nabi ogwo yaihaho omutumbi gw'omushaija wa Ruhanga, yaaguta aha ndogoya, yaagugarura omu rurembo kumucurira n'okumuziika.
Ogwo mutumbi yaaguziika omu kituuro kye, baamucurira, buri omwe naagira ati: Ai bambe, mwene tata!
Nabi ogwo ku yaaherize kumuziika, yaagira abatabani ati: Ku ndifa, munziikye omu kituuro ekyaziikwamu omushaija wa Ruhanga, amagufa gangye gahereere age;
ahakuba ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki agambire naakyena eitambiro ery'omuri Beseeli n'amaju goona ag'omu myanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu, ey'omu ndembo za Samaria, kiryahikiirira buzima.
Ekyo eki yaakozire kyaba ekibi aha nju ye ky'okugimaraho n'okugihwerekyereza ekahwaho.
Omu biro ebyo Abiya mwene Yeroboamu akarwara.
Yeroboamu yaagira omukazi we ati: Imuka oyehindure, orekye kumanywa ku ori omukazi wangye, oze Shiilo. Noomanya nabi Ahiya owandagwireho ngu ndyaba omugabe w'eri ihanga, ku niyo ari.
Kandi otware emigaati, n'oatukeeki, n'kanyungu k'obwoki, omuhikyeho; naija kukugambira oku ogu mwana araabe.
Muka Yeroboamu yaatwza atyo; yaimuka, yaaza Shiilo, yaahika aha nju ya Ahiya. Kandi Ahiya akaba atakibaasa kuhweza, ahakuba amaisho ge gakaba gaagiirwemu oruho ahabw'obukuru.
MUKAMA yaagira Ahiya ati: Reeba, muka Yeroboamu naija kukwebuuzaho eby'omutabani, ahakuba arwaire. Ku araataahemu, omugambire oti n'oti; ahabw'okuba naija kwehindura ondiijo mukazi.
N'ahabw'ekyo Ahiya ku yaahuriire emitsindo ye naakiija yaahika aha rwigi, yaagira ati: Iwe muka Yeroboamu, taaha omu nju; nooyehindurira ki ondiijo? Manya nkutumirweho ebigambo bibi.
Irooko ogambire Yeroboamu oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba, naagira ati: Nkakwiha omu bandi bantu, naakukuza, naakugira omwebembezi w'eihanga ryangye Israeli;
naayaka enju ya Daudi obugabe, naabukuha; kwonka iwe tiwambeera nk'omwiru wangye Daudi, owaabaire ayorobera ebiragiro byangye, nankuratira n'omutima gwe gwona, naakora ebi ndikusiima byonka,
kureka waakora kubi okukira abaakubandiize boona, waagyenda, waayekorera baaruhanga abandi n'ebishushani ebiyagiibwe, wangwisa kubi, wannaga enyima.

N'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kureeta akabi aha nju ya Yeroboamu, mmumareho oyetwa omushaija weena, omuhuuku n'ow'obusingye omu Baisraeli, mmarireho kimwe enju ya Yeroboamu, nk'oku omuntu aheha amazi, akagamariraho kimwe.
Omuntu wa Yeroboamu weena, origwa omu rurembo, aryariibwa embwa; kandi origwa omu ishwa, aryariibwa amahungu; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe akigambire.
N'ahabw'ekyo imuka, oyetaahire. Kwonka ebigyere byawe ku biraaribate biti omu rurembo, omwana naafa.

Abaisraeli boona nibaija kumucurira, bamuziikye; ogwo niwe wenka omu ba Yeroboamu oriziikwa omu kituuro, ahabw'okuba omu nju ya Yeroboamu niwe wenka oreebirwemu ekirungi ekirikusiimwa MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Kandi MUKAMA aryayeimukiza omugabe okutegyeka Israeli; niwe arimaraho enju ya Yeroboamu aha izooba eryo. Hariho obundi bunaku? Tibwo obu?

Ahakuba MUKAMA aryateera Abaisraeli, babe nk'ekifunjo ekirikutengyetsibwa amaizi, abarandure omuri egi nsi nungi ei yaahaire baishenkurubo, abataataanisize seeri y'omugyera Faraati, ahabw'okuba bakeekorera Asherimu, baagwisa kubi MUKAMA.
Aryatsigaho Israeli, abature ebibi bya Yeroboamu ebi yaakozire, n'ebi yaasiisiise Abaisraeli.
Atyo muka Yeroboamu yaimuka, yaagyenda, yaagaruka Tiruza. Ku yaahikire ati aha muryango gw'enju, omwana yaakaba.
Abaisraeli boona baamuziika, baamucurira nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaarabize omu mwiru we nabi Ahiya oku kyabaire kiri.
Kandi ebindi byona ebi Yeroboamu yaakozire, oku yaarwaine engamba, n'oku yaategyekire, reeba bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli.
Emyaka ei Yeroboamu yaamazire aha ngoma ekaba makumi abiri n'ebiri; yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, omutabani Nadabu yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Bwanyima aba Yuda baakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, baamwitsa eihari ahabw'ebibi ebi baabaire nibakora, byakira ebibi byona ebi baishenkurubo baakozire.
Ahabw'okuba bakeeyombekyera amaju omu myanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu, n'enyomyo, na Asherimu, ahari buri kibungo kiraingwa, n'ahansi ya buri kiti ekyetwa omurinzi;
kandi omu nsi egyo hakaba harimu ebitingwa. Abantu bakaba nibakora ebihagaro byona eby'abanyamahanga abu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
yaanyaga ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi eby'omu nju ya MUKAMA, n'eby'omu nju y'omugabe; yaabitwara byona. Kandi yaatwara n'engabo zoona ez'ezaabu ezi Sulemaani yaabaire aheesire.
Bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaaheesesa engabo omu miringa omu mwanya gwa ziri, yaazibiitsya abakuru b'abarinzi, abaabaire nibakumiirira aha rwigi rw'enju y'omugabe.
Kandi omugabe ku yaabaire ataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA, abo barinzi bakaba bazihagatira, bwanyima bazigarura omu nju y'abarinzi.
Kandi haaguma nihabaho engamba ahagati ya Rehoboamu na Yeroboamu.
Bwanyima Rehoboamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa hamwe nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi. Nyina akaba naayetwa Naama Omwamonikazi. Bwanyima omutabani Abiyamu yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaategyekyera emyaka eshatu omuri Yerusaalemu. Nyina akaba naayetwa Maaka, muhara wa Abishalomu.
Abiyamu ogwo yaaguma naagyendera omu bibi byona ebi ishe owaamubandiize yaakozire; ahabw'okuba omutima gwe gwona gukaba gutari gw'amazima ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga we, nk'ogwa ishenkuru.
Kwonka ahabwa Daudi, MUKAMA Ruhanga we yaamuha etabaaza omuri Yerusaalemu, yaataho omwana we owaamuhunguriire, kandi yaahamya Yerusaalemu,
ahabw'okuba Daudi akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, tiyaateshuka kyona eki yaamuragiire ebiro byona eby'amagara ge, okwihaho ebya Uriya Omuhiiti.
Kandi haaguma nihabaho obweme ahagati ya Rehoboamu na Yeroboamau ebiro byona eby'amagara ge.
Endiijo mirimo ya Abiyamu n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda? Kandi haaguma nihabaho obweme ahagati ya Abiyamu na Yeroboamu.
Bwanyima Abiyamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika omu rurembo rwa Daudi. Omutabani Asa yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri gw'omu busingye bwa Yeroboamu omugabe wa Israeli, Asa akatandika kutegyeka Yuda;
yaategyekyera emyaka makumi ana na gumwe omuri Yerusaalemu. Kandi nyina akaba naayetwa Maaka, muhara wa Abishalomu.
Asa ogwo akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA nk'oku Daudi ishenkuru yaakozire.
Yaabinga ebitingwa omu nsi, kandi yaihaho ebishushani byona ebi baishenkuru baakozire.
Kandi yaabinga na nyina Maaka, yaamwiha aha bwanyin'omugabe, naamutura ekishushani ky'ekihagaro eki yaakoreire Ashera; ekyo kishushani Asa yaakitema, yaakyokyeza aha kagyera Kidirooni.
N'ekya buzima emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu teraihirweho. Kwonka omutima gwa Asa gwaguma guri ogw'amazima ahari MUKAMA ebiro bye byona.
Yaareeta omu nju ya MUKAMA ebintu ebi ishe yaashoroire, n'ebindi ebi yaashoroire ahabwe, efeeza, ezaabu n'ebintu by'okukoresa.
Kandi haaguma nihabaho obweme ahagati ya Asa na Baasha omugabe wa Israeli ebiro byabo byona.
Baasha ogwo omugabe wa Israeli yainamuka, yaateera Yuda, yaayombeka Raama, ngu azibire omuntu weena okuruga omu bugabe bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, nari okubwijamu.

Bwanyima Asa yaatwara efeeza n'ezaabu zoona, ezaabaire zitsigaire omu bintu by'obuguzi bwingi ebibiikirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA, n'ebindi ebibiikirwe omu nju y'omugabe, yaabiha abagaragwa be; yaabatuma ahari Benihadadi mwene Taburimooni, mwijukuru wa Hezioni, omugabe wa Siria, owaabaire atwire Damasiko, naagira ati:

Ka tukore endagaano y'okukwatanisa nyowe naiwe, nk'oku tata na sho baabaire bagiine. Kandi reeba naakutwekyera ekiconco ky'efeeza n'ezaabu; irooko oite endagaano yaawe na Baasha omugabe wa Israeli, abone kundugaho.

Benihadadi yaikiriza eki omugabe Asa yaamushaba, yaayohereza abakuru b'amahe ge kuteera endembo za Israeli, yaakubuura Iyooni, Daani, Abeeli-besimaaka, na Kineroosi yoona hamwe n'ensi yoona eya Nafutaali.
Baasha ku yaakihuriire, yaarekyera aho kwombeka Raama, yaaguma Tiruza.

Bwanyima omugabe Asa yaarangirira omu Bayuda boona, tiyaagira u yaatsiga, baaza Raama, baihayo amabaare n'ebiti ebi Baasha yaabaire ayombekyeise; omugabe Asa yaabyombekyesa Geeba ya Benyamiini na Mizipa.

Mbwenu endiijo mirimo yoona eya Asa, amaani ge goona, ebi yaakozire byona, n'endembo ezi yaayombekire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busigye bw'abagabe ba Yuda? Kwonka omu bugurusi bwe ebigyere bye bikarwara.
Bwanyima Asa yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa hamwe nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi ishenkuru; Yehoshafaati omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, yaagyendera omu muhanda gwa ishe, n'omu kibi kye eki yaasiisiise Abaisraeli.
Omu mwaka gwa kashatu ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda nibwo yaamwita, akategyeka omu mwanya gwe.

Ku yaaherize ati kuza aha ngoma, yaita ab'enju ya boona; tiyaatsigira nju ya Yeroboamu muntu weena orikwitsya, okuhitsya obu yaagicwekyereize, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaarabize omu mwiru we Ahiya owa Shiilo oku kyabaire kiri,
ahabw'ebibi ebi Yeroboamu yaakozire, n'ebi yaasiisiise Abaisraeli, n'ahabw'okwitsa ekiniga MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Nadabu n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Kandi haaguma nihabaho obweme ahagati ya Asa na Baasha omugabe wa Israeli ebiro byabo byona.
Omu mwaka gwa kashatu ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, Baasha mwene Ahiya akatandika kutegyeka Israeli yoona ari Tiruza, yaamara aha ngoma emyaka makumi abiri n'ena.
Yaakora ebirikwanga MUKAMA, naagyendera omu muhanda gwa Yeroboamu, n'omu kibi kye eki yaasiisiise Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yehu mwene Hanani kuhana Baasha, nikigira kiti:
Nkakwiha omu mucucu, naakukuza, naakugira omwebembezi w'eihanga ryange Israeli; mbwenu ogyendeire omu muhanda gwa Yeroboamu, waasiisisa abantu bangye Abaisraeli, baanyitsa ekiniga n'ebibi byabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kukwihiraho kimwe n'enju yaawe, ngigire nk'eya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati.
Omuntu wa Baasha weena, origwa omu rurembo, aryariibwa embwa; kandi origwa omu ishwa, aryariibwa amahungu.
Mbwenu endiijo emirimo ya Baasha yoona, n'ebi yaakozire n'eby'amaani ge, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Bwanyima Baasha yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa Tiruza; Ela omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.

Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaraba omuri Yehu mwene Hanani nikihana Baasha n'enju ye, ahabw'obubi bwona obu yaakozire omu maisho ga MUKAMA, naamwitsa ekiniga n'ebi yaakozire n'emikono ye nk'eby'enju ya Yeroboamu, kandi n'ahabw'okucwekyereza egyo nju.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri na mukaaga ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, Ela mwene Baasha akatandika kutegyekyera Israeli omuri Tiruza, yaamara aha ngoma emyaka ebiri.

Bwanyima omugaragwa we Zimuri, omukuru w'ekicweka kimwe ky'ebigaari bye, yaamugiira omu naama kumurwanisa. Ela ku yaabaire ari Tiruza omu nju ya Aruza omukuru w'ekikaari kye omuri Tiruza, naanywa okuhitsya obu araasinde,
Zimuri yaatahamu, yaamuteera, yaamugwisaho, omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri na mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Ku yaatandikire kutegyeka, aherize ati kuza aha ngoma, yaita ab'enju ya Baasha boona; tiyaamutsigira oyetwa omwojo omuri beene waabo nari omuri banywani be.
Okwo nikwo Zimuri yaacwekyereize ab'enju ya Baasha boona, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaarabize omuri nabi Yehu naahana Baasha oku kyabaire kiri,
ahabw'ebibi bya Baasha byona, n'eby'omutabani Ela ebi baakozire, kandi ebi baasiisiise Abaisraeli, bakaitsa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli ekiniga n'eby'obufamutima byabo.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Ela yoona n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?

Omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri na mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, Zimuri akategyekyera ebiro mushanju omuri Tiruza. Obwo engabo zikaba ziteire orusiisira kurwanisa Gibesooni ey'Abafilistia;

bwanyima engabo ezaabaire ziri omuri orwo rusiisira zikahurira nibagira bati: Zimuri agiire omu naama, yaita omugabe; nikyo Abaisraeli boona baahinduriire Omuri omukuru w'eihe omugabe wa Israeli aha izooba eryo bakiri omu rusiisira.
Atyo Omuri yainamuka kuruga Gibesooni n'Abaisraeli boona, baagota Tiruza.
Zimuri ku yaareebire orurembo rwanyagwa, yaataaha omu kigo ky'omu kikaari ky'omugabe, yaayeyokyeza omu nju y'omugabe, yaafa,
ahabw'ebibi ebi yaakozire, naakora kubi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, naagyendera omu muhanda gwa Yeroboamu, n'ahabw'ekibi eki yaasiisiise Abaisraeli
Mbwenu endijo mirimo ya Zimuri yoona n'obugomi obu yaagomire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Bwanyima Abaisraeli baayecwamu habiri, ekicweka kimwe kyakuratira Tibuni mwene Ginaasi kumuhindura omugabe, n'ekindi kyakuratira Omuri.
Kwonka abantu abaakuratiire Omuri baasingura abaakuratiire Tibuni mwene Ginaasi; atyo Tibuni yaafa, Omuri yaaba omugabe.

Omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu na gumwe ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, Omuri akatandika kutegyeka Israeli, yaategyekyera emyaka ikumi n'ebiri; omuri egyo yaamara emyaka mukaaga naategyekyera Tiruza.
Bwanyima yaagura ahari Shemeri ekibungo ekirikwetwa Samaria etalanta ibiri z'efeeza, yaakyombekaho orurembo, n'orurembo orwo yaarweta Samaria, naarweterera Shemeri mukama w'ekyo kibungo.
ahabw'okuba akagyendera omu muhanda gwona ogwa Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, n'omu bibi ebi yaasiisiise Abaisraeli, bakaitsa MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ekiniga ahabw'eby'obufamutima byabo.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ei Omuri yaakozire yoona, n'eby'amaani agu yaayorekire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Bwanyima Omuri yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omuri Samaria; Ahabu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu na munaana gw'omu busingye bwa Asa omugabe wa Yuda, Ahabu mwene Omuri akatandika kutegyeka Israeli; yaategyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria emyaka makumi abiri n'ebiri.
Omu busingye bwe yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA okukira boona abaamubandiize.

Kandi tiyaakyeta kintu kibi okugyendera omu muhanda gwa Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, yaagaruka yaashwera Yezebeeli muhara wa Isi-baali, omugabe w'Abasidoni, yaagyenda yaaheereza Baali, kandi yaaguma naamuramya.
Yaayombekyera Baali ogwo eitambiro omu nju ei yaabaire amwombekyeire Samaria.
Kandi Ahabu yaakora Ashera. Yaakira abagabe ba Israeli boona abaamubandiize okwitsa MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ekiniga.

Omu busingye bwe Hieli owa Beseeli akombeka Yeriko; ku yaayombekire ati omusingi gwarwo, omwana we w'omujigaijo Abiramu yaafa; kandi ku yaatairemu ati ebiti by'eirembo ryarwo, omwana we wa bucuranda Seguba nawe yaafa, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaarabize omuri Yoshua mwene Nuuni, oku kyabaire kiri.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyamwizira nikigira kiti:
Ruga aha, otoore oburugwa-izooba, oyesherekye aha rubaju rw'akagyera akarikwetwa Kerisi, aharikureebana na Yorudani.
Noija kuguma noonywa amaizi ahari ako kagyera, kandi naaragiira ebikoona kuguma nibikugyemurirayo.
Atyo yaagyenda, yaatwaza nk'oku MUKAMA yaamugambira; yaaza ahari ako kagyera Kerisi, akateegaine na Yorudani, yaagumayo.
Ebikoona byaguma nibimureetera emigaati n'enyama buri kasheeshe n'omu mwabazyo; kandi yaaguma naanywa amaizi ahari ako kagyera.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, ako kagyera kaayoma, ahabw'okuba enjura ekaba etarikugwa muri egyo nsi.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyamwizira nikigira kiti:
Imuka oze Zarefaasi ey'Abasidoni, obe niyo waaguma. Reeba, niyo ndagiire omufaakazi kuguma naakugaburira.
Atyo yaimuka, yaaza Zarefaasi; ku yaahikire aha irembo ry'orurembo, yaashanga omukazi omufaakazi naatorotoora otuku; yaamweta, yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ndeetera otwizi omu nkyeka, ntunywe.
Ku yaabaire naaza kugenda, Eliya yaamweta, yaamugira ati: Ondeetere n'akagaati omu ngaro.

Onu yaamugira ati: Ninkurahira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, tiinyine kagaati, kureka oruhi rw'esaano omu kanyungu n'amajuta makye omu katsimbo; mbwenu nintorotoora obuyaayo bubiri, mbone kugaruka omuka, nkeeteekyere na mutabani wangye, tukarye, tufe.
Eliya yaamugira ati: Otatiina; irooko otwaze nk'oku waagamba; kwonka banza onteekyereho kakye, okandeetere, bwanyima obone kweteekyera n'omwana waawe;

ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Esaano y'omuri ako kanyungu terikwija kuhwaho, n'amajuta ag'omuri ako katsimbo tigarikwija kuhwamu, okuhitsya aha izooba eri MUKAMA arigwisizaho enjura ahansi.
Ogwo mukazi yaagyenda, yaatwaza nk'oku Eliya yaamugira; bwanyima we na Eliya n'ab'omu ka ye baamara ebiro bingi nibarya;
esaano y'omuri ako kanyungu tiyaahwaho, n'amajuta g'omuri ako katsimbo tigaahwamu, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki yaarabize omuri Eliya, oku kyabaire kiri.
Bwanyima y'ebyo, omwana w'ogwo mukazi nyineeka yaarwara; endwara yaamurembya, okuhitsya obu omwitsyo gwamuhweereiremu kimwe.
Nyina yaagira Eliya ati: Iwe muntu wa Ruhanga 'we, noofa ki naanye? Okaija omwangye kuunyijutsya ekibi kyangye, n'okuunyitira omwana!
Eliya yaamugira ati: Mpa omwana waawe. Atyo yaamumwiha omu kifuba, yaamwinamura omu kishengye kya kaanyinaibiri eki yaabaire naaraaramu, yaamurambika aha kitanda kye.
Yaatakira MUKAMA ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, niiwe oreetsire akabi n'aha mufaakazi ogu orikundaaza, ak'okwita omwana we?
Bwanyima yaayegororera ahari ogwo mwana kashatu, naatakira MUKAMA ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, ninkweshengyereza, ikiriza amagara g'ogu mwana gamugarukyemu.
MUKAMA yaahurira okushaba kwa Eliya, amagara g'ogwo mwana gaamugarukamu, yaahimbuuka.
Eliya yaatwara ogwo mwana, yaamwiha omu kishengye kya kaanyinaibiri, yaamushuumya, yaamutaasya omu nju, yaamuha nyina; yaamugira ati: Reeba, omwana waawe ahuriire.
Ogwo mukazi yaagira Eliya ati: Mbwenu naamanya ku ori omushaija wa Ruhanga, kandi n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga eki orikugamba ku kiri eky'amazima.
Atyo Eliya yaaza kweyoreka Ahabu. Obwo enjara ekaba eri nyingi omuri Samaria.
Ahabu yaayeta Obadia owaabaire ari omukuru w'eka ye. (Obadia ogwo akaba naatiina munonga MUKAMA;
kandi obu Yezebeeli yaita baanabi ba MUKAMA, Obadia akatwara baanabi igana, yaashereka makumi ataano-ataano omu nyanga, yaaguma naabaheeramu eby'okurya n'amaizi.)
Ahabu yaagira Obadia ati: Irooko ogyendagyende omu nsi aha nshuro zoona ez'amaizi n'omu mpanga zoona; obundi tukaareeba obunyaatsi, tutambira embaraasi n'enyumbu, amatungo goona gareka kufa.
Batyo baagaba ensi ebirari, ngu babone kugirabamu yoona; Ahabu yaagyenda okwe, na Obadia okwe.
Obadia ku yaabaire naakigyenda, yaabugaabugana na Eliya; Obadia yaamumanya, yaajuumara ahansi, yaagira ati: Niiwe, Mukama wangye Eliya?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Niinye. Gyenda ogambire mukama waawe oti: Reeba, Eliya ari aha.
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ncumwire ki okuhayo omwiru waawe ahari Ahabu, ngu anyite?

Ninkurahira MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, tihariho ihanga n'obu bwakuba obugabe, ei mukama wangye atatumire bantu b'okukusherura; kandi ku baakugizire ngu tari kunu, akaarahiize obwo bugabe nari eryo ihanga, ku batakureebire.
Mbwenu noogira oti: Gyenda ogambire mukama waawe, oti: Reeba, Eliya ari aha.

Kandi ku ndaabe naakurugaho nti, Omwoyo wa MUKAMA naija kukutwara ei ntarikumanya; ku ndaagyende naagambira Ahabu, yaija, ataakureeba, naija kuunyita, n'obu ndaabe nyowe omwiru waawe ntiina Ruhanga okwiha omu buto bwangye.

Mukama wangye, tokahuriraga eki naakozire, obu Yezebeeli yaita baanabi ba MUKAMA, ku naasherekire abashaija igana, baanabi ba MUKAMA, makumi ataano-ataano omu nyanga, kandi nkaguma nimbaheeramu eby'okurya n'amaizi?
Mbwenu noogira oti: Irooko ogambire mukama waawe, oti: Reeba, Eliya ari aha; ekiraarugyemu naija kuunyita.
Eliya yaamugira ati: Ninkurahira MUKAMA ow'amahe, ou mpeereza, buzimazima nimmweyoreka eri izooba.
Atyo Obadia yaagyenda kubugana Ahabu, na Ahabu yaaza kubugana Eliya.
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Nyowe tinkanyangaraize Israeli, kureka niiwe n'enju ya sho, ahabw'okuba mukareka ebiragiro bya MUKAMA, mwakuratira baabali.
Mbwenu nu ntumira Abaisraeli boona, bateeranire aha kibungo Karumeeli na baanabi ba Baali magana ana na makumi ataano, kandi n'abandi magana ana ba Ashera, abariira aha meeza ya Yezebeeli.
Atyo Ahabu yaatuma aha Baisraeli boona, kandi yaateeranira baanabi abo aha kibungo Karumeeli.

Abo boona ku baahikireyo, Eliya yaabairira haihi, yaabagira ati: Muryahitsya hi n'okugira emitima ebiri? MUKAMA ku araabe ari Ruhanga, mumukuratire; nari Baali ku araabe ari Ruhanga, mube niwe mwakuratira. Abantu tibaagira ki baamugarukamu.
Eliya yaagaruka yaagira abantu ati: Nyowe, nyowe nyenka niinye nabi wa MUKAMA otsigaireho; kwonka baanabi ba Baali n'abashaija magana ana na makumi ataano.
Mbwenu ka batuhe enimi ibiri, bo baiheho emwe ahabwabo, bagitematememu ebicweka, babite aha nku, kwonka batatamu omuriro; naanye niinyija kubaaga eya kabiri, ngite aha nku, ndekye kutamu omuriro.
Imwe mwete eiziina rya ruhanga waanyu, naanye niinyija kweta eiziina rya MUKAMA; kandi Ruhanga oraagarukisemu omuriro, biri ogwo niwe Ruhanga. Abantu boona baagarukamu bati: Eki waagamba nikwo.
Bwanyima Eliya yaagira baanabi ba Baali ati: Mwetooranireho enimi emwe, mube niimwe mwabanza kubaaga, ahabw'okuba muri baingi; haza mwete eiziina rya ruhanga waanyu, kwonka mutatamu omuriro.

Batyo baatwara enimi ei baaheebwa, baagibaaga, baayeta eiziina rya Baali okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu ihangwe, nibagira bati: Ai Baali, otuhurire! Kwonka tihaabaho iraka, nari owaabagarukamu. Baaguma nibagurukagurukira aha itambiro eri baayombeka.

Omu ihangwe Eliya yaabateerera enaku naagira ati: Nimwete munonga; ahabw'okuba ni ruhanga; nooshusha oti naateekateeka, nari aine ah'ari, nari azindukire, nari shi agwejegyeire, ashemereire kusisiimurwa.
Batyo baayeta nibaamuza, baayeshara na zaarurara n'emisyo nk'oku baabaire bagira, okuhitsya obu eshagama yaajwire n'amaani.
Bwanyima y'eihangwe baagumizamu nibaamuza okuhitsya obunaku bw'okutamba ekitambo ky'omu mwabazyo; kwonka tihaabaho iraka, nari ow'okubagarukamu, n'obu yaakuba ow'okubeetaho.
yaihaho amabaare ikumi n'abiri, agarikwingana n'omubaro gw'enganda za batabani ba Yakobo, ou ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaiziire nikigira kiti: Israeli niryo riraabe eiziina ryawe;
ago mabaare yaagombekyesa eitambiro omu iziina rya MUKAMA. Yaateera oruhazo okwehinguririza eitambiro orurikuhikwamu encuro ibiri z'embibo.
Yaateekyeraho enku, yaatematema enimi, yaagita aha nku, yaagira ati: Mwijuze enyungu z'amaizi ina, mugashukye aha kitambo ky'okwotsya n'aha nku.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mukore mutyo obwa kabiri; baakikora obwa kabiri; yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mukore mutyo obwa kashatu; baakikora obwa kashatu;
amaizi gaahimintika, gaayehinguririza eitambiro, gaijuza n'oruhazo.
Ngarukamu, ai MUKAMA; ngarukamu, abantu aba bamanye ku niiwe, ai MUKAMA, ori Ruhanga, kandi ku niiwe ohindwire emitima yaabo, ekakugarukira.
Ahonaaho omuriro gwa MUKAMA gwagwa aha kitambo ky'okwotsya, gwakyokyeza kimwe hamwe n'enku n'amabaare n'omucuucu, gwakomba n'amaizi g'omu ruhazo.
Abantu boona ku baakireebire, baajuumara ahansi, baagira bati: MUKAMA niwe Ruhanga! MUKAMA niwe Ruhanga!
Bwanyima yaagira Ahabu ati: Imuka, orye, onywe; ahakuba hariho okuhoorera kw'enjura nyingi munonga.
Atyo Ahabu yainamuka kurya n'okunywa. Na Eliya yainamuka aha mutwe gw'ekibungo Karumeeli; yaajuumara, omutwe yaaguta omu maguru.
Yaagira omuheereza we ati: Inamuka, onagye amaisho aha nyanja. Yainamuka, yaareebayo, yaagira ati: Tihaine kiriyo. Onu ati: Garukayo emirundi mushanju.

Aha murundi gwa mushanju omuheereza yaagira ati: Reeba ekicu ekirikushusha ekiganja ky'omuntu nikiimuka omu nyanja. Eliya yaamugira ati: Irooko ogire Ahabu oti: Tebeekanisa ekigaari kyawe, oshuume, enjura etakaakutangira aho.
Omu kaanya kakye eiguru ryairirimba ahabw'ebicu n'omuyaga, haagwa enjura nyingi. Ahabu yaatemba ekigaari, yaaza Yezereeli.
Kandi omukono gwa MUKAMA gwaza ahari Eliya, yaayezirika, yairukanga omu maisho ga Ahabu, yaahika aha irembo rya Yezereeli.
Bwanyima Yezebeeli yaatuma ahari Eliya naagira ati: Nyencakare nk'aga magingo ku ndaabe ntagizire magara gaawe nk'oku waagira agaabo, baaruhanga bakinture n'okukiraho.
Eliya nikwo kutiina, akaimuka, akahunzya amagara, akahika Beerisheba eya Yuda, akatsigayo omuheereza we.
