Yaabyama ahansi y'omukinga, yaagwejegyera; bwanyima maraika yaija, yaamukoraho, yaamugira ati: Imuka orye.
Onu ku yaamagamagire, yaareeba aha mutwe gwe omugaati oguteekirwe aha mabaare garikwotsya, n'orunywero rw'amaizi. Yaarya, yaanywa, yaagaruka yaabyama.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaija obwa kabiri, yaamukoraho, yaagira ati: Imuka orye, orugyendo ni ruhango, rutakaakurema.
Atyo yaimuka, yaarya, yaanywa, yaagyendera aha mwiguto gw'ebyo by'okurya ebiro makumi ana nyomushana na nyekiro, yaahika ahari Horebu orushozi rwa Ruhanga.
Ku yaahikire okwo, yaataaha omu nyanga, yaaraaramu; kandi reeba, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyamwizira; yaamugira ati: Eliya, nookora ki aha?

Onu yaagira ati: Ngizire eihari ringi ahabwa MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe; ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli baitsire endagaano yaawe, baasheenya amatambiro gaawe, baita baanabi baawe na rurara; nyowe, nyowe nyenka, niinye ntsigaireho; kandi naanye nibeenda kuunyita.

MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Shohora, oyemerere ahari oru rushozi omu maisho ga MUKAMA. MUKAMA yaarabaho, omuyaga mwingi gw'amaani gwashatura enshozi, gwayatagura enkiri omu maisho ga MUKAMA; kwonka MUKAMA akaba atagurimu. Bwanyima y'omuyaga haija omutsitsa, kwonka MUKAMA akaba atagurimu;
bwanyima y'omutsitsa haija omuriro, kwonka MUKAMA akaba atagurimu; bwanyima y'omuriro haija akaraka kakye kandi koorobi.
Eliya ku yaakahuriire, yaayeshweka omunagiro aha maisho, yaashohora, yaayemerera aha munwa gw'enyanga. Haija eiraka, ryamugira riti: Eliya nookora ki aha?

Yaagarukamu ati: Ngizire eihari ringi ahabwa MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe; ahabw'eokuba Abaisraeli baitsire endagaano yaawe, baasheenya amatambiro gaawe, na baanabi baawe baabaitsa rurara; nyowe, nyowe nyeka, niinye ntsigaireho; kandi naanye nibansherura kuunyita.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Irooko ogarukyeyo, otoore omuhanga gurikuza omu ihamba rya Damasiko; ku oraahikyeyo, oshukye amajuta ahari Hazaeli kuba omugabe wa Siria;
kandi na Yehu mwene Nimushi omushukyeho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli, na Elisa mwene Shafati owa Abeeli-mehoola, omushukyeho amajuta kuba nabi omu mwanya gwawe.
Oriba yaakizire rurara ya Hazaeli, aryaitwa Yehu; kandi oriba yaakizire rurara ya Yehu, aryaitwa Elisa.
Kwonka ndyayetsigiraho abantu enkumi mushanju omuri Israeli, abatakatsimbiraga Baali maju, n'obu kwakuba okumunywegyera.
Elisa yaatsigaho ente, yaamwirukaho, yaamugira ati: Reka mbanze nnywegyere tata na maawe, mbone kukukuratira. Yaamugarukamu ati: Garukayo; mbwenu waareeba naakugira nta?
Tiyaamukuratira, yaagarukayo, yaatwara ente ibiri, yaaziita, yaaziteekyesa ebiti ebyaba bizikomire, yaagaburira abantu, baarya. Bwanyima yaimuka, yaakurata Eliya, yaaguma naamuhereza.
Yaatuma entumwa omu rurembo ahari Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli, yaamugira ati: Oku nikwo Benihadadi arikugamba naagira ati:
Efeeza zaawe n'ezaabu zaawe n'ebyangye; abakazi baawe abarikuhita abandi boona, n'abaana baawe, nabo n'abangye.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaamugarukamu ati: Nk'oku waagira, Nyakusinga Omugabe, ndi owaawe n'ebyangye byona.
Bwanyima ezo ntumwa zaagaruka ahari Ahabu, zaamugira ziti: Oku nikwo Benihadadi arikugamba naagira ati: Nkutumireho ningira nti: Nyoherereza efeeza zaawe n'ezaabu zaawe, abakazi baawe n'abaana baawe;
mbwenu nyencakare nk'aga magingo niinyija kukutumaho abashaija bangye, nibacaaka enju yaawe n'amaju g'abagaragwa baawe; eki baraagweho kyona ekirikubashemeza, nibakitwara.
Abakuru boona n'abantu boona baamugira bati: Otakitaho omutima, kandi otaikiriza.

Atyo yaagira entumwa za Benihadadi ati: Mugambire mukama wangye omugabe muti: Byona ebi obandize kutuma aha mwiru waawe, niinyija kubikora; kwonka eki tindikwija kukikora. Entumwa zaagyenda, zaamugambira ebi Ahabu yaazituma.
Benihadadi yaamutumaho naamugira ati: Engabo zangye zoona ezirikunkuratira ku ziraahikwe omucuucu gwa Samaria, buri muntu yaabona ogurikwijuza oruhi, baaruhanga bakinture n'okukiraho.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagarukamu ati: Orikujwara eby'okurwanisa naaza aha rugamba, arekye kwehimbisa nk'orikubijuura yaatabaarukire.
Obwo Benihadadi akaba ari omu rusiisira naanywa n'abandi bagabe; ku yaahuriire obwo butumwa, yaagira engabo ze ati: Mutengye orugamba. Batyo baatenga orugamba kurwanisa orurembo.

Ahabu yaamubuuza ati: Ou araakorese n'oha? Onu ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: N'abashaija b'abategyeki b'amashaza. Yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: oraatandikye orwo rugamba n'oha? Yaamugarukamu ati: Niiwe.
Atyo yaateerana abashaija b'abategyeki b'amashaza; baaba magana abiri na makumi ashatu na babiri; bwanyima yaabo yaateerana Abaisraeli boona, baaba enkumi mushanju.
Baahurura omu ihangwe, Benihadadi ari omu rusiisira naayenywera asinzire, we n'abo bagabe makumi ashatu na babiri abaabaire baizire kumuha emikono.
Abashaija b'abategyeki b'amashaza baaba nibo baabanza kuhurura. Bwanyima Benihadadi yaatuma entatsi, zaamugira ziti: Twareeba abashaija nibaruga omuri Samaria.
Yaagira ati: Ku baraabe bareetwa obusingye, mubakwate bahuriire; kandi ku baraabe bareetwa okurwana, nabwo mubakwate bahuriire.
Batyo abo bashaija b'abategyeki b'amashaza baaruga omu rurembo n'eihe ribakuratiire.
Buri muntu yaayeitira omuntu we; Abasiria baahunga, Abaisraeli baababinga, kwonka Benihadadi omugabe wa Siria yaahungira aha mbaraasi n'abatembire embaraasi, yaakira.
Omugabe wa Israeli nawe yaahurura, yaakwata embaraasi n'ebigaari, yaita Abasiria baingi munonga.
Bwanyima nabi ogwo yairira haihi omugabe wa Israeli, yaamugira ati: Irooko oyehamye, oteekateekye oku oshemereire kutwaza; ahabw'okuba omu kutandika kw'omwaka omugabe wa Siria aryagaruka kukurwanisa.

Bwanyima abagaragwa b'omugabe wa Siria baamugira bati: Manya baaruhanga baabo ni baaruhanga b'ebibungo; nikyo baatukiriize amaani; mbwenu murekye turwanire nabo omu mpita, buzima nitwija kubakiza emikono.
Hati twaza oti; ihaho abo bagabe, buri omwe omwihe omu mwanya gwe, omu myanya yaabo otemu abakuru b'engabo;

kandi oteerane eihe eririkwingana n'eihe eri ofeereirwe, ogarure embaraasi omu mwanya gw'embaraasi, n'ekigaari omu mwanya gw'ekigaari; haza turwanire nabo omu mpita; buzima nitwija kubakiza emikono. Yaahurira ebi barikugamba, yaatwaza atyo.
Omwaka ku gwabaire nigutandika, Benihadadi yaateerana hamwe Abasiria, yainamuka Afeki kurwanisa Abaisraeli.
N'Abaisraeli baateeranirwa hamwe, baaheebwa entanda, baaza kubarwanisa. Abaisraeli baateera orusiisira omu maisho gaabo nibashusha nk'obusyo bukye bubiri bw'embuzi, kwonka Abasiria bo baashweka ensi.

Omushaija wa Ruhanga yairira haihi, yaagambira omugabe wa Israeli, ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'Abasiria okugira ngu, MUKAMA ni Ruhanga w'ebibungo, ti ruhanga w'empita, nikyo ndaaheereyo engabo ziriya enyingi munonga omu mikono yaanyu; nibwo muraamanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Baamara ebiro mushanju bari omu nsiisira ezirikureebana. Bwanyima aha izooba rya mushanju orugamba rwatandika; Abaisraeli baita omu ngabo z'Abasiria abantu akasiriira kamwe omu izooba rimwe.

Abandi baahungira omu rurembo rwa Afeki; orugo rwarwo rw'amabaare rwagwera ababaire baahonokaho obukumi bubiri n'enkumi mushanju. Benihadadi nawe yaahunga, yaataah omu rurembo, yaaza omu kishengye ky'omunda.

Abagaragwa be baamugira bati: Reeba, tuhuriire ngu abagabe b'enju ya Israeli n'abagabe b'embabazi. Nitukweshengyereza, twikirize twezirikye ebiguniya, twekome emigoye omu mitwe, tushohore, tuze aha mugabe wa Israeli; obundi akaakiza amagara gaawe, oreka kufa.

Batyo baayezirika ebiguniya omunda, baayekoma emigoye omu mitwe, baaza aha mugabe wa Israeli, baagira bati: Omwiru waawe Benihadadi naagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ndeka, ngumeho. Onu yaagira ati: Biri akiriho? Ni mwene tata.

Obwo abo bashaija bakaba bamutaireho eriisho, ngu bamanye ekiri omu biteekateeko bye; ku baakihuriire bati, baakiijaho, bati: Eego, Benihadadi ni mwene sho. Ahabu yaagira ati: Mugyende mumureete. Bwanyima Benihadadi yaashohora, yaija ah'ari, yaamutembesa omu kigaari kye.

Benihadadi yaamugira ati: Endembo ezi tata yaanyagire sho, niinyija kuzigarura; kandi oryayegirira amaduuka omuri Damasiko, nk'oku sho yaagagizire omuri Samaria. Ahabu yaagira ati: Ku oraagire otyo, ninkurekura. Atyo yaakora nawe endagaano, yaamurekura.
Bwanyima yaamugira ati: Ahabw'okutahurira iraka rya MUKAMA, ku oraabe wandugaho oti, entare neekwita. Atyo ku yaabaire yaamurugaho, entare yaamubugana, yaamwita.
Yaagaruka yaareeba ondiijo mushaija, yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, nteera. Ogwo mushaija yaamuteera, yaamuhutaaza.
Atyo nabi ogwo yaagyenda, yaategyereza omugabe aha rubaju rw'omuhanda, yaayehindura okundi ayekomire ekitambaara aha maisho.

Omugabe ku yaabaire naahinguraho, nabi ogwo yaamweta, yaagira ati: Nyowe omwiru waawe ngiire omu rugamba; bwanyima reeba, omushaija yaakubuuka, yandeetera omushaija, yangira ati: Rinda omushaija ogu. Ku araabure, noomuzira; nari noija kuriha etalanta emwe y'efeeza.
Kwonka nyowe omwiru waawe ku mbaire nindabanamu ninkora oku n'oku, yaabura. Omugabe wa Israeli yaamugira ati: Orubanja rwawe nikwo ruraabe rutyo; niiwe waarwecwera.
Nabi ogwo yaarahuka yaiha ekitambaara aha maisho; omugabe wa Israeli yaamumanya ku ari ow'omuri baanabi.
Yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okurekura omushaija ou mbaire mpaireyo kwitirwa kimwe, amagara gaawe nigaija kuzira age, n'abantu baawe bazire abe.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagaruka Samaria, yaataaha omu nju ye aine enaku kandi agwirwe kubi.
Kandi hakaba hariho omushaija orikwetwa Nabosi owa Yezereeli, owaabaire aine omusiri gw'emizaabibu haihi n'ekikaari kya Ahabu omugabe wa Samaria.

Bwanyima Ahabu yaagira Nabosi ati: Mpa omusiri gwawe gw'emizaabibu, ngugire ogw'okuhingamu emboga, ahabw'okuba guri haihi n'eka yangye; naanye niinyija kukuha ogundi musiri gw'emizaabibu ogurikuguhita; nari shi, ku oraabe nookisiima, nkuhe empiiha ezigushemereire.
Nabosi yaagira Ahabu ati: Nikikabure nyowe okukuha obuhunguzi bwa baatatenkuru.

Ahabu yaagaruka omuka aine enaku, kandi agwirwe kubi ahabw'ekigambo eki Nabosi owa Yezereeli yaamugambira; ahakuba akamugira ati: Tindikwija kukuha buhunguzi bwa baatatenkuru. Yaabyama aha kitanda kye, ahugikire omushaya, yaayanga n'okurya.
Bwanyima Yezebeeli omukazi we yaija, yaamubuuza ati: N'enki ekikugwisize kubi, kikakuzibira kurya?

Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ahabw'okuba naagira Nabosi owa Yezereeli nti: Mpa omusiri gwawe gw'emizaabibu, ngugure empiiha, nari hsi, ku oraabe nokisiima, nkuhe ogundi omu mwanya gwagwo; nawe yangarukamu ati: Tindikwija kukuha musiri gwangye.
Omukazi we Yezebeeli yaamugarukamu ati: Reeba mihi, tiiwe orikutegyeka Israeli? Imuka orye, omutima gwawe gushemererwe. Nyowe niinyija kukuha ogwo musiri gwa Nabosi owa Yezereeli.
Yaahandiika omuri ezo baruha ati: Murangirire abantu boona, beesiibyekwo, mute Nabosi omu maisho g'abantu omu mwanya ogurikureebwa;
omu maisho ge mutemu abashaija babiri abataine ku bari, bamwomesereze nibagira bati: Okyeenire Ruhanga n'omugabe. Bwanyima mumushohoze aheeru, mumuteere amabaare, afe.
Abashaija b'omuri orwo rurembo, abakuru baarwo n'abakungu abaabaire barutwiremu, baakora nk'oku Yezebeeli abatumireho omu baruha ze ezi abatwekyeire.
Baarangirira abantu okwesiibyakwo, baata Nabosi omu maisho g'abantu omu mwanya ogurikureebwa.

Bwanyima abo bashaija babiri abataine ku bari baija, baashutama omu maisho ga Nabosi, baamwomeserereza omu maisho g'abantu, nibagira bati: Nabosi akyeenire Ruhanga n'omugabe. Omuri ako kaanya baamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo, baamuteera amabaare, yaafa.
Bwanyima baatuma ahari Yezebeeli bati: Nabosi baamuteera amabaare, yaafa.

Yezebeeli, ku yaahuriire ngu Nabosi baamuteera amabaare, yaafa, yaagira Ahabu ati: Imuka, otware omusiri gw'emizaabibu ogu Nabosi owa Yezereeli abaire ayangire kukuguza; ahabw'okuba Nabosi yaafa, takiriho.
Ahonaaho Ahabu ku yaahuriire ngu Nabosi yaafa, yaimuka, yaashuuma omuri ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu ogwa Nabosi owa Yezereeli kugutwara.
Imuka oshuume, obugane Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli, otwire Samaria; reeba, ari omu musiri gwa Nabosi gw'emizaabibu, ogu yaashuuma kutwara;

omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Oitsire, kandi waataho n'okunyaga? Kandi omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba. Omu mwanya ogu embwa zikombeiremu eshagama ya Nabosi, nimwo zirikombera eshagama yaawe wenka.
Ahabu yaagira Eliya ati: Iwe muzigu wangye 'we, wandeeba? Yaamugarukamu ati: Naakureeba, ahakuba okeehayo kukora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA.
Niinyija kukureetaho akabi, nkwihireho kimwe, nkumareho buri mwana weena ow'omwojo, yaaba muhuuku nari ow'obusingye omuri Israeli;
ndyagira enju yaawe nk'eya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, kandi nk'eya Baasha mwene Ahiya, ahabw'okungwisa kubi, n'okucumuza Abaisraeli.
Kandi ebya Yezebeeli nabyo, MUKAMA yaabigambaho ati: Embwa ziryariira Yezebeeli haihi n'orugo rw'amabaare orw'orurembo Yezereeli.
Omuntu wa Ahabu weena origwa omu rurembo aryariibwa embwa; kandi origwa omu ishwa aryashokoorwa amahungu.
Akakora ebihagaro bingi munonga omu kukuratira ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, nk'ebi Abaamori baakozire byona, abu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli, oku byabaire biri.
Ahabu ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, yaataagura ebijwaro bye, yaajwara ebiguniya, yaayesiibyakwo abyami omu biguniya, yaagyenda ayeinamiriire.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Eliya owa Tishubi, nikigira kiti:
Oreebire Ahabu oku ayecureize omu maisho gangye? Ahabw'okwecureeza omu maisho gangye, tindireeta kabi omu busingye bwe; kureka omu busingye bw'omutabani nimwo ndireetera akabi aha nju ye.
Kwonka omu mwaka gwa kashatu Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda yaashuuma ow' omugabe wa Israeli.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira abagaragwa be ati: Timurikumanya Ramosi-gileadi ku eri eyaitu? Mbwenu twetsirize titwagiiha mu mikono y'omugabe wa Siria.
Yaabuuza Yehoshafaati ati: Noija kuhurura naanye, tuteere Ramosi-gileadi? Yehoshafaati yaagira omugabe wa Israeli ati: Nyowe naiwe turi bamwe, abantu bangye nibo baawe, n'embaraasi zangye nizo zaawe.
Yehoshafaati yaagira omugabe wa Israeli ati: Ninkweshengyereza, banza oyehanuuze ahari MUKAMA, oreebe eki arikugamba eri izooba.

Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaateeranira ahamwe baanabi, abashaija magana ana, yaababuuza ati: Nteere Ramosi-gileadi, nari ndereere? Baamugarukamu bati: Irooko ohurure, ahakuba MUKAMA naija kugihayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Kwonka Yehoshafaati yaagaruka yaabuuza ati: Beitu shi aha, tihariho nabi wa MUKAMA, tukamubuuza?

Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Hakiriho omushaija omwe ou turikubaasa kwehanuuzaho ebya MUKAMA, niwe Mikaaya mwene Imula; kwonka nimmwanga, ahabw'okuba tandagurira birungi kureka ebibi. Yehoshafaati yaagira ati: Nyakusinga, reka kugamba otyo.
Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaayeta omukuru w'abaserukare, yaamugira ati: Ndahukiza Mikaaya mwene Imula.

Obwo omugabe wa Israeli na Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda bakaba bashutami aha bitebe byabo eby'obugabe, bajwaire zaabushuuti zaabo, bari aha mbuga omu irembo rya Samaria, baanabi boona babari omumaisho nibaragura.
Zedekia mwene Kenaana yaayekorera amahembe g'ekyoma, yaaragura ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Aga mahembe nigo oraabingise Abasiria okuhitsya obu baraacwekyerere.
Kandi na baanabi boona baaragura batyo, nibagira bati: Irooko oteere Ramosi-gileadi, osingure; MUKAMA naija kugihayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Entumwa eyaaza kweta Mikaaya yaamugira eti: Reeba, ebigambo bya baanabi nibiikirizana biragura gye ah mugabe; naiwe ebigambo byawe bibe nk'ebyabo, oragure gye.
Kwonka Mikaaya yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, eki MUKAMA arangambire, nikyo ndaagambe.
Ku yaahikire omugabe, omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Mikaaya, tuteere Ramosi-gileadi, nari turereere? Yaamugarukamu ati: Hurura osingure; MUKAMA naija kugihayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Omugabe yaamugira ati: Niinyija kukurahiza kangahi otarikungambira kindi omu iziina rya MUKAMA kureka amazima?

Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ndeebire Abaisraeli boona bataataaniire aha bibungo nk'entaama ezitaine muriisa; MUKAMA yaagira ati: Aba tibaine mukama waabo; boona bagarukyeyo n'obusingye, buri muntu omu ka ye.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Tinaakugambira nti: Tarikwija kundagurira birungi kureka ebibi?
Mikaaya yaagaruka yaagira ati: Mbwenu hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Naareeba MUKAMA ashutami aha kitebe kye, n'eihe ryona ery'omu iguru ryemereire aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho;
MUKAMA yaagira ati: N'oha oraabeihabeihe Ahabu, akateera Ramosi-gileadi, akagwayo. Omwe yaagamba okundi, n'ondi okundi.
Bwanyima haija omwoyo, gwayemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, gwagira guti: Niinye ndaamubeihabeihe.

MUKAMA yaagugira ati: Noomubeihabeihesa ki? Gwagira guti: Niinyija kugyenda, mpindukye omwoyo gw'ebishuba, naambire omuri baanabi be boona. MUKAMA yaagira ati: Niiwe oraamubeihabeihe; kandi noija kukibaasa; irooko okore otyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo reeba, MUKAMA ataire omwoyo gw'ebishuba omuri baanabi baawe aba boona. Kandi MUKAMA akugambireho kubi.
Mikaaya yaagira ati: Mbwenu oryakireeba ahari eryo izooba ku oriba nooza kweshereka omu kishengye ky'omunda.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira ati: Twara Mikaaya, omugarure ahari Amoni omukuru w'orurembo, na Yoasi mutabani w'omugabe,
omugire oti: Oku nikwo omugabe arikugamba naagira ati: Mute ekishaija eki omu kihome, mukiriise eby'okurya kandi mukinywaise amaizi eby'akahenano, okuhitsya obu ndaagarukye n'obusingye.
Mikaaya yaagira ati: Ku oraagarukye n'obusingye, biri MUKAMA tagambire naaraba omuriinye. Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Naimwe bantu 'mwe mwena, mukihurire!
Bwanyima omugabe wa Israeli na Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda bainamuka, baateera Ramosi-gileadi.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Nyowe naaza kwehindura, nze kurwana, kwonka iwe ogume ojwaire eby'okujwara byawe by'obugabe. Omugabe wa Israeli yaayehindura, yaaza aha rugamba.
Kandi omugabe wa Siria akaba aragiire abakuru makumi ashatu na babiri b'ebigaari bye by'okurwanisa, ati: Mutarwana n'abato n'obu baakuba abakuru, kureka omugabe wa Israeli wenka.
Abo bakuru b'ebigaari ku baareebire Yehoshafaati, baagira bati: Buzima oriya niwe mugabe wa Israeli. Baakubuuka kurwana nawe; Yehoshafaati yaateera enduuru.
Abakuru b'ebigaari ku baareebire atari mugabe wa Israeli, baagarukayo, baareka kumubinga.

Kwonka omushaija yaananuura obuta, yaafa okurasha omwambi, yaateera omugabe wa Israeli ahu ebijwaro bye by'okurwanisa n'eky'aha kifuba birikuteeranira; nawe nikwo kugambira omuvugi w'ekigaari kye ati: Hinduka, onyihe omu rugamba, ahabw'okuba naahutaara munonga.

Eryo izooba orugamba rwayeyongyera amaani, omugabe baamuhigika omu kigaari kye naareeba Abasiria, okuhitsya obu yaafiire omu mwabazyo; n'eshagama yaaruga omu buhuta, yaahimintika yaatarama omu kigaari.
Eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, haabaho okurangirira omu ihe ryona nibagira bati: Buri muntu agarukye omu rurembo rwabo n'omu nsi yaabo.
Atyo omugabe yaafa, baamureeta Samaria, baamuziikayo.
Kandi ekigaari kye baakyogyeza aha kiyanja kya Samaria, n'embwa zaakombera eshagama ye, ahu baamaraaya baabaire boogyera, nk'ekigambo eki MUKAMA yaagambire oku kyabaire kiri.
Endiijo mirimo ya Ahabu n'ebi yaakozire byona, na nyaruju ye ei yaayombekyeise emiino, n'endembo zoona ezi yaayombekire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Atyo Ahabu yaagwejegyerea, yaashanga baishenkuru, omutabani Ahazia yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Obu yaatandika kutegyeka, akaba ahikize emyaka makumi ashatu n'etaano; yaategyekyera emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi nyina akaba naayetwa Azuuba, muhara wa Shiluhi.

Yaagyendera omu mihanda yoona eya Asa ishe, tiyaateishuka kugirugamu, kureka yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA; kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu tiyaihwaho, kureka abantu baaguma nibatambirirayo ebitambo, n'okwotererayo obubaane.
Kandi Yehoshafaati yaaragaana endagaano y'obusingye n'omugabe wa Israeli.
Kandi ebitingwa ebyatsigaireho omu busingye bwa Asa ishe, yaabimara omu nsi.
Yehoshafaati akakora emeeri za Tarushiishi ez'okuza Ofiri kwihayo ezaabu; kwonka tizaahikayo, ahakuba zikafeera Ezioni-geberi.
Bwanyima Ahazia mwene Ahabu yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Reka abashaija bangye bagyende n'abaawe omu meeri; kwonka Yehoshafaati tiyaakisiima.
Bwanyima Yehoshafaati yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi ishenkuru; Yehoraamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Ahazia mwene Ahabu akatandika kutegyeka Israeli omuri Samaria omu mwaka gwa ikumi na mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda; yaamara emyaka ebiri naategyeka Israeli.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, naagyendera omu mihanda ya ishe na nyina, n'omu muhanda gwa Yeroboamu mwene Nebati owaasiisiise Abaisraeli.
Yaaguma naaheereza Baali, naamuramya, yaitsa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli ekiniga omu muringo gwona ogu ishe yaatwarizemu.

Omu biro ebyo Ahazia akooga omu dirisa ey'ekishengye kye ky'ahaiguru omuri Samaria, yaagwa, yaarwara; atyo yaatuma entumwa naazigira ati: Mwirooko, muraguze ahari Baali-zebubi, ruhanga wa Ekurooni, yaaba ndikira egi ndwara.

Kwonka maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira Eliya owa Tishubi ati: Imuka oinamukye, obugane entumwa z'omugabe wa Samaria, ozigire oti: Ekirikuza kukuragurizisa ahari Baali-zebubi, ruhanga wa Ekurooni, n'ahabw'okuba omuri Israeli tiharimu Ruhanga?
Mbwenu oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Torikwija kuruga ha kishego ki oriho; buzimazima noija kufa. Atyo Eliya yaazayo.
Ezo ntumwa ku zaagarukire aha mugabe, yaazibuuza ati: Mwagarurwa ki?

Baamugarukamu bati: Tubugainwe omushaija, yaatugira ati: Mwirooko mugarukye aha mugabe obatumire, mumugire muti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ekirikuza kukuragurizisa ahari Baali-zebubi, ruhanga wa Ekurooni, n'ahabw'okuba omuri Israeli tiharimu Ruhanga? N'ahabw'ekyo torikwija kuruga ha kishego eki oriho; buzimazima noija kufa.
Yaababuuza ati: Ni muntu ki obabugaine, akabagambira ebigambo ebyo?
Baamugarukamu bati: Abaire ajwaire ekijwaro ky'ebyoya, ayezirikiise orukoba. Onu yaagira ati: Ni Eliya owa Tishubi.

Bwanyima omugabe yaamutumaho omukuru w'engabo makumi ataano hamwe n'ezo ngabo ze. Yainamuka, yaashanga Eliya ashutami aha mutwe gw'ekibungo, yaamugira ati: Iwe mushaija wa Ruhanga 'we, omugabe naakugira ngu oshuume.

Eliya yaagarukamu ogwo mukuru w'engabo ataano ati: Ku ndaabe ndi omushaija wa Ruhanga, omuriro nigurugye omu iguru, gukumareho n'engabo zaawe makumi ataano. Ahonaaho omuriro gwaruga omu iguru, gwamumaraho n'engabo ze makumi ataano.
Omugabe yaagaruka yaamutumaho ondiijo mukuru w'engabo makumi ataano hamwe n'engabo ze. Yainamuka, yaamugira ati: Iwe mushaija wa Ruhanga 'we, ekiragiro ky'omugabe nikigira kiti: Shuuma ahonaaho.

Eliya yaabagarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe ndi omushaija wa Ruhanga, omuriro gurugye omu iguru, gukumareho n'engabo zaawe makumi ataano. Ahonaaho omuriro gwa Ruhanga gwaruga omu iguru, gwamumaraho n'engabo ze makumi ataano.
Reeba, omuriro gurugire omu iguru, gwamaraho abakuru b'engabo abambandiize hamwe n'engabo zaabo makumi ataano-ataano; kwonka mbwenu reka amagara gangye gabe ag'obuguzi bwingi omu maisho gaawe.
Bwanyima maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira Eliya ati: Shuuma nawe; otamutiina. Atyo yaimuka, yaashuuma nawe aha mugabe,

yaamugira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Waaza kutuma entumwa kukuragurizisa ahari Baali-zebubi, ruhanga wa Ekurooni, omuri Israeli habaire hatarimu Ruhanga w'okwehanuuzaho? Ahabw'ekyo torikwija kuruga aha kishego eki oriho; buzimazima noija kufa.

Atyo omugabe yaafa, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki Eliya yaagambire oku kyabaire kiri. Omu mwaka gwa kabiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Yehoraamu mwene Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda, Yehoraamu omurumuna yaaba omugabe omu mwanya gwe, ahabw'okuba Ahazia ogwo akaba ataine mutabani.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ei Ahazia yaakozire tehandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?

Eliya yaagira Elisa ati: Ninkweshengyereza, guma aha; ahakuba MUKAMA yantuma Beseeli. Kwonka Elisa yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, kandi ninkurahira, tindikwija kukurugaho. Batyo baashuuma, baaza Beseeli.

Abaana ba baanabi, abaabaire bari Beseeli, baashohora, baashanga Elisa, baamugira bati: Noomanya ku eri izooba MUKAMA arikwija kutwara mukama waawe, akamukwihaho? Onu ati: Eego ninkimanya; kwonka, nimwetsize.
Eliya yaagira Elisa ati: Elisa, ninkweshengyereza guma aha, ahakuba MUKAMA yantuma Yeriko. Kwonka Elisa yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, kandi ninkurahira, tindikwija kukurugaho. Batyo baahika Yeriko.

Abaana ba baanabi abaabaire bari Yeriko, bairirira Elisa, baamugira bati: Noomanya ku eri izooba MUKAMA arikwija kutwara mukama waawe, akamukwihaho? Yaagarukamu ati: Eego, ninkimanya; kwonka nimwetsize.

Bwanyima Eliya yaamugira ati: Ninkweshengyereza guma aha; ahakuba MUKAMA yantuma Yorudani. Kwonka Elisa yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, kandi ninkurahira, tindikwija kukurugaho. Batyo baagumizamu bombi.
Abashaija makumi ataano ab'omu baana ba baanabi nabo baagyenda, baabeemerera hangahari, nibareeba Eliya na Elisa beemereire aha rubaju rwa Yorudani.
Bwanyima Eliya yaajuura omunagiro gwe, yaagukubamu, yaateera amaizi; ahonaaho amaizi gaayecwamu habiri oku n'oku, bombi baayambukira ahoomire.
Ku baaherize kwambuka, Eliya yaagira Elisa ati: Shaba eki ndaakukorere, ntakakwihirweho. Elisa yaagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, ndaga emigabo ebiri y'omwoyo gwawe.
Onu yaagira ati: Waashaba ekigumire; kwonka ku orandeebe ninkwihwaho, noija kukitunga; ku oraabe otandeebire, tikirikwija kuba kityo.
Ku baabaire nibakigyenda nibagaaniira, ahonaaho haija ekigaari ky'omuriro n'embaraasi z'omuriro, byabataanisa. Eliya yaatwarwa omuyaga gw'akasooroora, yaatemba omu iguru.
Elisa ku yaakireebire, yaagamba munonga, naagira ati: Taata! Taata! Ebigaari bya Israeli n'embaraasi zaayo! Tiyaagaruka kumureeba. Ahonaaho yaakwata ebijwaro bye, yaabitaaguramu ebicweka bibiri.
Bwanyima yaihaho omunagiro gwa Eliya ogwamuragara, yaagarukayo, yaayemerera aha rubaju rwa Yorudani.
Yaakwata ogwo munagiro gwa Eliya ogwamuragara, yaateera amaizi naagira ati: MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Eliya, arahi? Ku yaateire amaizi, gaayebaganisamu habiri, yaayambuka.
Abaana ba baanabi abaabaire bari Yeriko, ku baamureebire abari omumaisho, baagira bati: Omwoyo gwa Eliya guri ahari Elisa. Baija kumubugana, baamwinamira;

baamugira bati: Reeba, itwe abairu baawe twine abashaija b'amaani makumi ataano; nitukweshengyereza, ka bagyende, basherure mukama waawe. Obundi Omwoyo wa MUKAMA akaaba amukiriize, amunagire omu kibungo nari omu ruhanga ahatarikumanywa. Onu ati: Mutabatuma.
Kwonka ku baamweshengyereize munonga, yaarugaho yaakwatwa enshoni, yaabagira ati: Mubatume. Batyo baatuma abashaija makumi ataano, baamara ebiro bishatu nibamusherura, tibaamubona.
Ku baamugarukireho, baashanga akiri Yeriko, yaabagira ati: Timbagizire nti: Mutagyenda?
Abashaija b'orwo rurembo baagira Elisa bati: Reeba, mukama waitu, naiwe nk'oku orikureeba, ahu orurembo rwombekirwe ni harungi, kwonka amaizi gaaho ni mabi, n'eitaka ryaho tiririkweza.
Yaagira ati: Mundeetere akaabya kasya, mukatemu omwonyo. Batyo bakamureetera.
Yaaza aha nshuro y'amaizi, yaaginagamu omwonyo, yaagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Naatambira aga maizi; okuruga hati tigakirugwamu rufu nari okutorooga.
N'ahabw'ekyo ago maizi gaashemera okwiha obwo n'okuhitsya eri izooba, nk'ekigambo eki Elisa yaagambire oku kyabaire kiri.

Yaarugayo, yainamuka, yaaza Beseeli; ku yaabaire naakigyenda, haija abatsigazi bato nibaruga omu rurembo, baamugaaniiza nibagira bati: Iwe mushaija w'oruhara 'we, inamuka! Iwe mushaija w'oruhara 'we, inamuka!
Yaahinduka; ku yaabareebire, yaabakyeena omu iziina rya MUKAMA; ahonaaho haija edubu ibiri z'enkazi zaaruga omu kibira, zaabataagataaguramu abatsigazi makumi ana na babiri.
Okuruga aho yaagumizamu, yaaza aha kibungo kya Karumeeli; yaarugayo, yaagaruka Samaria.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, n'obu araabe atarabaire mubi nka ishe na nyina; ahakuba akihaho enyomyo ya Baali ei ishe yaakozire.
Kwonka yaagumira omu kibi kya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati eki yaasiisiise Abaisraeli; tiyaakireka.
Mesha omugabe wa Moabu akaba ari omworozi w'entaama. Buri mwaka akaba aragiirwe kuha omugabe wa Israeli abaana b'entaama akasiriira.
Kwonka Ahabu ku yaafiire, omugabe wa Moabu yaagomera omugabe wa Israeli.
N'ahabw'ekyo omugabe Yehoraamu yaaruga Samaria omu bunaku obwo, yaateerana Abaisraeli boona kuhurura.

Yaagyenda, yaatuma ahari Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda, naamugira ati: Omugabe wa Moabu angomeire; noikiriza kuhurura naanye, tukateera Moabu? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, niinyija kuhurura; nyowe naiwe turi bamwe; abantu bangye nibo baawe, n'embaraasi zangye nizo zaawe.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Tutoore guuha nituhurura? Yehoraamu yaamugarukamu ati: Tutoore ogw'eihamba rya Edomu.
Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaahurura n'omugabe wa Yuda n'owa Edomu. Ku baaherize orugyendo rw'ebiro mushanju nibeekiikuura, haabura amaizi g'eihe n'obu gaakuba ag'enyamaishwa ezi baagyenzire nazo.
Omugabe wa Israeli nikwo kugira ati: Ai bambe! MUKAMA atureetsire twenshatu kutuhayo omu mikono y'Abamoabu.

Yehoshafaati yaamubuuza ati: Aha tihariho nabi wa MUKAMA, ou twakwehanuuzaho ahari MUKAMA. Omwe aha bagaragwa b'omugabe wa Israeli yaagarukamu ati: Aha hariho Elisa mwene Shafati, owaabaire anaabisa Eliya engaro.
Yehoshafaati yaagira ati: Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiri omuriwe. Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaashuuma ahari Elisa hamwe na Yehoshafaati n'omgabe wa Edomu.
Elisa yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA ow'amahe, ou mpeereza, kuri ntaagirira Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda eshoni, tinkukucwire ryera, n'obu kwakuba okukureeba.
Kwonka mbwenu mundeetere omuteezi w'enanga. Omuteezi w'enanga ku yaagiteire, amaani ga MUKAMA gaamwijaho.
Yaagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Timurikwija kureeba muyaga n'obu yaakuba enjura, kwonka oru ruhanga nirwija kwijura amaizi, mubone kunywa, n'ente zaanyu n'enyamaishwa zaanyu.
Ekyo n'ekigambo kikye ahari MUKAMA; kandi naija kuhayo n'Abamoabu omu mikono yaanyu;

kandi nimwija kucwekyereza orurembo rwona oruriho orugo orwehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare, n'orurembo rwona orurungi, kandi muteme omuti gwona omurungi, mwigare enshuro zoona ez'amaizi, mushiishe omusiri gwona omurungi n'amabaare.
Ku bwaseesire, omu bunaku bw'okuhayo ekitambo, ahonaaho amaizi gaija nigaruga Edomu, ensi yaijura amaizi.
Abamoabu boona ku baahuriire ngu abo bagabe baizire kurwana nabo, baahuruza boona abaabaire nibabaasa kujwara eby'okurwanisa, okwiha aha muto okuhika aha mukuru, baayemerera aha mwatano.
Ku baimukire kare omu kasheeshe, eizooba ryarasha aha maizi, Abamoabu baareeba amaizi omu maisho gaabo nigatukura nk'eshagama.
Baagira bati: Eriya n'eshagama; buzimazima abo bagabe barwaine, baitana. Mbwenu imwe Abamoabu, murahukye tuze kunyaga.
Kwonka ku baahikire omu rusiisira rw'Abaisraeli, Abaisraeli baimuka baabarwanisa, okuhitsya obu baabahungire; bakagyenda nibabaita, bakarugaho bakahika n'omu nsi yaabo.

Baasheenya endembo, kandi omusiri gwona omurungi buri muntu yaagunagamu eibaare rye, okuhitsya obu baagishwekire yoona; baigara buri nshuro y'amaizi, baatema emiti yoona emirungi, okuhitsya obu aha ndembo z'amabaare haatsigare Kiruhareseesi yonka; bwanyima ab'enjungu baagigota, baagicwekyereza.
Omugabe wa Moabu ku yaareebire orugamba nirumugyendera kubi, yaatwara abashaija magana mushanju abarikurwanisa zaarurara, ngu baataguze bahikye omugabe wa Edomu; kwonka tibaabaasa.

Bwanyima yaatwara omutabani ow'omujigaijo, owaabaire naaza kumuhungurira kuza aha ngoma, yaamutambira aha mutwe gw'orugo rw'amabaare kuba ekitambo ekyokize. Kyareetera abantu okugirira Abaisraeli ekiniga kingi; baamurugaho, baagaruka omu nsi yaabo.
Elisa yaamubuuza ati: Mbwenu nooyenda ku nkukorera ki? Ngambira eki otungire omuka. Onu ati: Omuzaana waawe taine ki atungire, kureka ecupa emwe y'amajuta.
Elisa yaagira ati: Irooko oze omuri bagyenzi baawe boona, otiizemu ecupa ezirimu busha, kwonka zitari nkye.
Bwanyima ogarukye omuka, oyekingirane na batabani baawe, oshukye ago majuta omuri ezo ecupa zoona; eraijure, ogibiikye.
Atyo yaamurugaho, yaayekingirana n'abatabani, baamureetera ecupa, yaazishukamu.
Ecupa zoona ku zaaherize kwijura, yaagira omutabani ati: Ndeetera endiijo. Yaamugira ati: Tihakiriho ndiijo. Ahonaaho amajuta gaarekyera aho kwija.
Yaija yaagambira omushaija wa Ruhanga; nawe yaamugira ati: Irooko otunde ahari ago majuta, oihure amabanja gaawe; bwanyima iwe na batabani baawe mutungwe agaraatsigareho.
Ogwo mukazi yaagira iba ati: Mbwenu nyetegyereize ogu mushaija orikuturabaho obutoosha ku ari omushaija orikwera wa Ruhanga.
Ka tumwombekyere akashengye kakye aha mutwe gw'enju, tumuteeremu ekitanda, emeeza, entebe n'etabaaza; ku araagume yaatuhungukaho, abe nimwo yaaza.
Eizooba rimwe akahungukayo, yaaza omuri ako kashengye, yaahuumuriramu.
Yaagira Gehazi omuheereza we ati: Nyetera ogwo mukazi wa Shuneemu. Ku yaamwetsire, yaayemerera omu maisho ge.

Elisa yaagira Gehazi ati: Mugire oti: Mbwenu, obu otufeereire kubi oti, tukaakukorera ki? Nooyenda ku tugira eki twakugambirira omugabe, nari omukuru w'amahe? Ogwo mukazi yaagarukamu ati: Ngaaha! Ndi omu baitu.
Elisa yaabuuza ati: Mbwenu shi, ekindi tumukorere ki? Gehazi yaagarukamu ati: Manya taine mwana w'omwojo, kandi na iba n'omugurusi.
Elisa yaagira ati: Mwete. Ku yaamwetsire, ogwo mukazi yaayemerera omu muryango.
Elisa yaamugira ati: Omu bunaku nk'obu omu mwaka ogurikwija oryakiikira omwana w'omwojo. Onu ati: Ngaaha, mukama wangye, iwe mushaija wa Ruhanga 'we, reka kubeiha omuzaana waawe.
Bwanyima ogwo mukazi yaabaka enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo omu bunaku nk'obwo omu kutandika kw'omwaka, nk'oku Elisa yaamugambiire.
Ogwo mwana ku yaakuzire, eizooba rimwe yaaza kureeba ishe omu bagyesi.
Yaagira ishe ati: Ai bambe! Omutwe gwanyita! Omutwe gwanyita! Ishe yaagira omuhuuku we ati: Mutwarire nyina.
Ku yaamuheekire, yaamutwarira nyina, omwana yaamushutama aha bibero okuhitsya omu ihangwe, yaakaba.
Nyina yainamuka, yaamurambika aha kitanda ky'omushaija wa Ruhanga, yaamukingirana, yaashohora.
Yaayeta iba, yaamugira ati: Nyoherereza omwe aha bambari baawe, n'endogoya emwe, ngyende ahonaaho nze ow'omushaija wa Ruhanga, ngarukye.
Iba ati: Ekirikukuhuuta owe eri izooba niki? Okwezi tikukabonekire, kandi ti sabato. Onu ati: Ni kirungi nzeyo.
Atyo yaatandiika endogoya, yaagira omwambari we ati: Irukanzya endogoya; oteetwara ntakugambiire.

Atyo yaagyenda yaahika aha mushaija wa Ruhanga aha kibungo Karumeeli. Ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga ku yaamureebeire hare naakiija, yaagira Gehazi omuheereza we ati: Reeba, oriya ga n'omukazi ori owa Shuneemu;
gyenda noiruka, omubugane, omubuuze oti: Ni buhooro? Baro ari buhooro? N'omwana waawe ari buhooro? Omukazi yaamugarukamu ati: Ni buhooro.

Ku yaahikire aha mushaija wa Ruhanga omu kibungo, yaamukwata amaguru. Gehazi yaija kumutsindika. Kwonka omushaija wa Ruhanga yaagira ati: Mrekye, ahakuba omutima gwe gwine enaku nyingi; kandi MUKAMA akinsherekire, tiyaakingambira.
Omukazi yaamugira ati: Niinye naashabire mukama wangye omwana w'omwojo? Tindakugizire nti: Otambeiha?
Elisa yaagira Gehazi ati: Yezirikye, otware enkoni yangye, ogyende. Ku oraabugane omuntu, otamuramutsya; kandi ku haraagire owaakuramutsya, omwetsize; orambikye egi nkono aha maisho g'omwana.
Nyina w'omwana yaamugira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, kandi ninkurahira, tindikwija kukutsiga aha. Atyo yaimuka, yaamukuratira.
Gehazi yaagyenda abeebembeire, yaarambika egyo nkoni aha maisho g'omwana; tihaabaho kateezo n'obu kwakuba okwetengyetsa. Nikyo yaagarukiireyo kumubugana, akamugira ati: omwana tiyaahimbuuka.
Elisa ku yaatahire omu nju, yaareeba omwana abyami aha kitanda kye afiire.
Atyo yaataahamu, yaayekingiranamu n'omwana, yaashaba MUKAMA.
Bwanyima yaaza aha kitanda, yaayegororera aha mwana, yaata omunwa aha munwa gwe, n'amaisho aha maisho ge, n'engaro aha ngaro ze; ku yaamwegororeireho, omubiri gw'omwana gwatandika kutagata.
Yaagaruka yaimuka, yaagyendagyendaho omu nju rimwe, yaagaruka yaaza aha kitanda, yaamwegororeraho, omwana yaayetsyamura emirundi mushanju, yaabuuruura amaisho.
Yaayeta Gehazi, yaamugira ati: Yeta ogwo mukazi wa Shuneemu. Atyo yaamweta. Ku yaamuhikire, yaagira ati: Ihaho omwana waawe.
Yaija, yaagwa aha bigyere bye, yaajuumara ahansi, yaihaho omwana we, yaashohora.

Bwanyima Elisa yaagaruka Gilugaali; kandi hakaba hateireyo enjara. Abaana ba baanabi ku baabaire bamushutami omu maisho, yaagira omuheereza we ati: Ta enyungu mpango aha mahega, oteekyere abaana ba baanabi ekicumbe.
Omwe aharibo yaaza omu ishwa kushoroma emboga, yaashangayo omutanga, yaagushoromaho entanga, yaaziijuza omwenda gwe, yaija, yaazikyeka, yaazita omu nyungu eri ey'ekicumbe, atazimanyire.
Batyo baihura kugaburira abantu. Kwonka ku baabaire nibarya ekyo kicumbe, baagamba munonga nibagira bati: Ai bambe, mushaija wa Ruhanga, omu nyungu harimu rufu. Tibaabaasa kukirya.
Elisa yaagira ati: Mureete esaano. Yaaginaga omu nyungu, yaagira ati: Mwihurire abantu, barye. Baashanga omu nyungu hatakirimu kabi.

Kwonka ogwo muheereza yaagira ati: Ebi nimbaasa nta kubigaburira abashaija igana? Elisa yaagaruka yaamugambira ati: Bigaburire abantu, barye; ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Nibaija kurya, batsigazeho.
Atyo yaabibata omumaisho, baarya, ebindi byatsigaraho, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri.
Omu hururu emwe Abasiria bakahurura omu nsi ya Israeli, baanyagayo omwishiki muto, yaaguma naaheereza muka Naamani.
Eizooba rimwe yaagira mugore we ati: Mukama wangye ku yaakuza owa nabi ow'omuri Samaria! Akaamutambira ebibembe bye.
Atyo Naamani yaataahamu, yaagambira mukama we ati: Omwishiki ori owaanyagirwe omu nsi ya Israeli yaagira ati n'ati.

Omugabe wa Siria yaamugira ati: Mbwenu irooko, ogyende, niinyija kutwekyera omugabe wa Israeli ebaruha. Naamani yaagyenda, yaatwara etalanta z'efeeza ikumi, na shekeli z'ezaabu enkumi mukaaga, n'ebijwaro eby'okwihaihanisa ikumi.
Atyo yaatwarira omugabe wa Israeli ebaruha, erikugira eti: Ebaruha egi ku eraakuhikye, reeba naakwoherereza omushaija wangye Naamani, omutambire ebibembe.

Omugabe wa Israeli ku yaashomire ebaruha, yaataagura ebijwaro bye naagira ati: Niinye Ruhanga orikwita akakiza, omushaija ogu okuntumaho ngu ntambire omuntu ebibembe? Muteekateekye, mureebe ku arikutaara ah'okutonganira naanye.

Kwonka Elisa omushaija wa Ruhanga ku yaahuriire ngu omugabe wa Israeli ataagwire ebijwaro bye, yaamutumaho naagira ati: Ahabw'enki otaagwire ebijwaro byawe? Murekye anyijeho hati, abone kumanya omuri Israeli ku harimu nabi.
Atyo Naamani yaija, n'embaraasi ze n'ebigaari bye, yaayemerera aha muryango gw'enju ya Elisa.
Elisa yaamutumaho entumwa naagira ati: Irooko oze omuri Yorudani, oyogyemu emirundi mushanju, omubiri gwawe nigwija kuba nk'oku gwabaire guri, nooshemera.

Naamani ku yaakihuriire, yaaguubwa kubi, yaagyenda naagira ati: Nyowe mbaire ningira ngu buzimazima naija kushohora, nampikaho, naayeta eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga we, naasiisirira aharwaire, nantambira ebibembe.
Emigyera ya Damasiko, Abana na Faapa, terikuhita amaizi goona ag'omuri Israeli? Tinkubaasize kwoga omuri ago, nkashemera? Atyo yaakuba yaagarukayo agwirwe kubi munonga.
Abaheereza be baamwirira haihi, baamugira bati: Taata, kuri nabi ogu yaakuragiira ekintu kihango, tokukikozire? Kaashwa okukugira ati: Yoga, oshemere?
Atyo yaashuuma, yaayejabika omuri Yorudani emirundi mushanju, nk'ekigambo ky'omushaija wa Ruhanga oku kyabaire kiri; omubiri gwe gwaba nk'ogw'omwana muto, yaashemera.

Bwanyima yaagaruka ahari ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga, we n'abantu be boona, yaija, yaayemerera omu maisho ge, yaamugira ati: Mbwenu naamanya ku hatabaho Ruhanga omu nsi yoona kureka omuri Israeli; n'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza yakiira omukimbo gw'omwiru waawe.
Kwonka Elisa yaagira ati: Nindahira Ruhanga otahwaho, ou mpeereza, tindikwija kugira kintu kyona eki naayakiira. Yaamweshengyereza kukitwara, onu yaayanga.

Naamani yaagira ati: Ku oraabe waayanga, ninkweshengyereza, nyowe omwiru waawe, mpeebwe eitaka eririkwekorerwa enyumbu ibiri; ahabw'okuba okuruga hati tindikwija kutamba kitambo ky'okwotsya nari ekindi kitambo ahari ruhanga ondiijo weena, kureka MUKAMA wenka.

Omu kigambo eki MUKAMA agume asaasire omwiru waawe; mukama wangye ku ariguma yaaza omu nju ya Ramoni okuramizamu, naanye nainama omuri egyo nju, nainama omu nju ya Ramoni, MUKAMA asaasire omwiru waawe omu kigambo ekyo.
Elisa yaamugira ati: Gyenda n'obusingye.
Kwonka Naamani ku yaabaire yaamurugaho akaanya kakye,
Gehazi omuheereza wa Elisa omushaija wa Ruhanga yaagira ati: Mbwenu mukama wangye Elisa yaayangire kutwara eki ogu Musiria Naamani yaamureetera. Nindahira MUKAMA, naaza kwiruka, ngire eki naamwihaho.
Atyo Gehazi yaakurata Naamani. Naamani ku yaareebire omuntu amukuratiire, yaaruga omu kigaari kumubugana, yaagira ati: Ni buhooro?

Onu ati: Ni buhooro. Mukama wangye yantuma kukugambira naagira ati: Omuri aka kaanya haija abatsigazi babiri abaana ba baanabi, nibaruga omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu; mbwenu ninkweshengyereza obampeere etalanta y'efeeza, kandi n'ebijwaro bibir by'okwihaihanisa.

Naamani yaamugira ati: Ikiriza, otware etalanta ibiri. Atyo yaamweshengyereza, yaamukomera etalanta z'efeeza ibiri omu nshaho ibiri, n'ebijwaro bibiri by'okwihaihanisa, yaabikorera abairu be babiri, baagyenda beebembeire Gehazi.
Gehazi ku yaahikire aha kabungo k'owaabo, yaabibaihaho, yaabitaasya omu nju; yaaboohereza, baagyenda.
Yaatahamu, yaayemerera omu maisho ga mukama we. Elisa yaamubuuza ati: Waaba ogiire hi, Gehazi?

Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Omwiru waawe taine hu yaaba agiire. Elisa yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Omutima gwangye tigwagyenda naiwe, obu omushaija yaaruga omu kigaari kukubugana? Noogira ngu obwo nibwo bwaba buri obunaku bw'okwakiiriramu empiiha, ebijwaro, emisiri y'emizeituuni n'ey'emizaabibu, entaama, ente, abahuuku n'abazaana?
N'ahabw'ekyo ebibembe bya Naamani byaza kukwomaho iwe n'oruzaaro rwawe ebiro byona. Atyo yaamuruga omu maisho abembire naayera nk'orubaare.
Bwanyima abaana ba baanabi baagira Elisa bati: Reeba, omwanya ogu tutwiremu, ogu orikutiireebermu, ni mukye, tugufunziremu.
Ka tuze Yorudani, buri muntu atemeyo enyomyo, twekorereyo omwanya gw'okutuuramu. Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimwirooko!
Bwanyima omwe yaamushaba naagira ati: Ikiriza ogyende n'abairu baawe. Yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, niinyija kugyenda.
Atyo yaagyenda nabo. Ku baahikire Yorudani, baatema emiti.
Kwonka omwe ku yaabaire naatema, empango yaakuuka, yaagwa omu maizi; yaayamuza ati: Ai bambe, Mukama wangye! ebaire eri entiizano.
Omushaija wa Ruhanga yaamubuuza ati: Yaagwa hi? Ku yaamworekire omwanya, yaatema akati yaakanagaha, etyo yaatuuhuuka.
Yaagira ati: Giihemu. Yaagikununkirira, yaagiihamu.
Omugabe wa Siria ku yaabaire naarwanisa Israeli, yaahanuura n'abashaija be naagira ati: Omu mwanya nanka na nanka nimwo ndita orusiisira rwangye.
Omushaija wa Ruhanga yaatuma aha mugabe wa Israeli naagira ati: Oyerinde, otaraba omu mwanya nanka, ahabw'okuba Abasiria niyo barikushuuma kukugwera.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaatuma omuri ogwo mwanya ogu omushaija wa Ruhanga yaamugambiire. Okwo nikwo Elisa yaabaire ateisa omugabe, akakira ti rimwe, kandi ti kabire.
Ekyo kyareetera omugabe wa Siria kwemereza omutima munonga, yaayeta abashaija be, yaabagira ati: Timukaanyoreka omuntu omuriitwe ori aha rubaju rw'omugabe wa Israeli?
Omwe aha bashaija be yaagira ati: Ngaaha, mukama wangye omugabe; kureka Elisa nabi ow'omuri Israeli niwe agambira omugabe wa Israeli ebigambo ebi ogambira omu kishengye eki oraaramu.
Yaamugira ati: Irooko oreebe ei ari, ntumeyo bamukwate. Baamugira bati: Manya, ari Dosani.
Atyo yaatumayo embaraasi n'ebigaari n'eihe rihango, baahikayo nyekiro, baagota orurembo.

Omuheereza w'omushaija wa Ruhanga ku yaimukire kare omu kasheeshe, yaashohora, yaareeba eihe n'embaraasi n'ebigaari byehinguririize orurembo. Ogwo muheereza yaagira ati: Ai bambe mukama wangye! Mbwenu tugire tuta?
Onu yaagira ati: Otatiina; ahabw'okuba abari hamwe naitwe ni baingi okukira abo abari hamwe nabo.

Bwanyima Elisa yaashaba naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza, mwigure amaisho, areebe. Atyo MUKAMA yaigura amaisho g'ogwo mutsigazi, yaareeba; kandi reeba ogwo mugongo gukaba gwijwire embaraasi n'ebigaari by'omuriro byehinguririize Elisa.
Abasiria ku baahikire Elisa, yaashaba MUKAMA naagira ati: Ninkweshengyereza humya amaisho g'aba bantu. Atyo MUKAMA yaahumya amaisho gaabo, nk'oku Elisa yaamushabire.
Elisa yaabagira ati: Ogu tigwo muhanda, kandi oru tirwo rurembo. Munkuratire, mbatwarire omushaija ou murikusherura. Yaabeembera, yaabahitsya Samaria.

Ku baataahire bati omuri Samaria, Elisa yaashaba ati: Ai MUKAMA, humuura amaisho g'aba bashaija, bareebe. MUKAMA yaahumuura amaisho gaabo, baareeba; ku baagiire kureeba, baashanga bari ahagati ya Samaria.
Omugabe wa Israeli ku yaabareebire, yaabuuza Elisa ati: Taata, mbaite? Mbaite?
Yaagarukamu ati: Otabaita. Nooyenda kwita abu oyekwatiire na rurara n'obuta bwawe? Bahe eby'okurya n'amaizi, barye, banywe, bagarukye ahari mukama waabo.
Atyo yaabateekyera eby'okurya bingi; ku baaherize kurya n'okunywa, yaaboohereza, baagaruka ahari mukama waabo. Emitwe y'engabo z'Abasiria yaarekyera aho kuguma neija kuteera ensi ya Israeli.
Bwanyima Benihadadi omugabe wa Siria yaateeranira hamwe eihe rye ryona, yainamuka, yaateera Samaria, yaagigota.

Enjara nyingi yaateera Samaria ahabw'okugotwa, okuhitsya obu omutwe gw'endogoya gwaguzire shekeli z'efeeza makumi munaana, na kimwe kya kana ky'akaabya k'amazi g'enkombe kikagura shekeli z'efeeza itaano.
Eizooba rimwe omugabe wa Israeli ku yaabaire naahingura aha mutwe gw'orugo rw'amabaare, omukazi yaamutakira naagira ati: Njuna, mukama wangye omugabe.
Onu yaagira ati: MUKAMA ku araabe atakujunire, nyowe niinyiha hi eby'okukujuna? Mbiihe aha mbuga y'okuhuuriraho nari omu inyuukiro rya viinyo?
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Obaire ota? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Omukazi ogu angizire ati: Reeta mutabani waawe, tumurye eri izooba, nyencakare turye owangye.
Atyo twateeka omwana wangye, twamurya. Ku buseesire, naamugira nti: Reeta omwana waawe tumurye; mbwenu owe amusherekire.

Omugabe ku yaahuriire ebigambo by'ogwo mukazi, yaataagura ebijwaro bye (obwo omugabe akaba naahingura ari aha mutwe gw'orugo rw'amabaare; abantu ku baamureebire, baashanga abandize ekiguniya aha mubiri gwe).
Omugabe yaagira ati: Eizooba ku riraarengye Elisa mwene Shafati akiine omutwe, Ruhanga akinture n'okukiraho.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba nabo, omugabe yaashuuma, yaamuhikaho, yaagira ati: Ezi naku zirugire ahari MUKAMA. Mbwenu nkimwiniireho ki amatsiko?

Kwonka Elisa yaagira ati: Muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Nyencakare nk'aga magingo encuro y'esaano y'obunono neija kugura shekeli, emwe, n'encuro ibiri za sayiri zigure shekeli emwe, aha irembo rya Samaria.

Omukuru w'engabo, ou omugabe yaabaire ayegamira omukono gwe yaagira omushaija wa Ruhanga ati: Noogira ngu n'obu MUKAMA wenka yaakuta amadirisa omu iguru, ekigambo eki kikaabaho? Onu ati: Noija kukireeba n'amaisho gaawe, kwonka torikwija kubiryaho.

Ahakuba ku turaagire tuti, Ka tutaahe omu rurembo, orurembo rurimu enjara nitwija kugwamu; kandi hoona n'obu turaagume tushutami aha, nabwo nitwija kufa. N'ahabw'ekyo mwije twambukye twegyeme orusiisira rw'Abasiria; ku baraaturekye, tugumeho; ku baraatwite, biri twafiire.
Batyo baimuka omu rwita-waabo kuza omu rusiisira rw'Abasiria. Ku baahikire ahu orusiisira rurikutandikira, baashanga hatarimu muntu;

ahakuba MUKAMA akaba areeteire engabo z'Abasiria kuhurira okuhinda kw'ebigaari n'embaraasi, n'endigito y'eihe rihango, kyabareetera kugambirana bati: Yeimwe, omugabe wa Israeli aguririire abagabe b'Abahiiti n'ab'Abanyamisri kututeera.
Batyo baimuka omu rwita-waabo, baacwa, baatsigaho amahema gaabo, embaraasi zaabo n'endogoya zaabo, orusiisira rwona nk'oku rwabaire ruri, baahunga ngu bakize amagara.

Abo babembe ku baahikire ahu orusiisira rurikutandikira, baataaha omu ihema rimwe, baarya, baanywa, baihamu efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebijwaro, baagyenda, baabishereka; baagaruka baataaha omu rindi ihema, baihamu ebindi, baagyenda, baabishereka.

Bwanyima baagambirana bati: Ebi turikukora tibihikire. Eizooba eri n'eizooba ry'amakuru marungi, haza tuhunami; ku turaarekye bukataagurukana, nitwija kugiibwaho ekiheneso. N'ahabw'ekyo mwije tugyende, tugambire ab'omu nju y'omugabe.

Batyo baagyenda; ku baahikire aha irembo, baayeta omurinzi w'eirembo, baamugira bati: Twahika omu rusiisira rw'Abasiria, twashanga rutarimu muntu n'obu kaakuba akateezo, kureka embaraasi n'endogoya azitsibikire, kandi n'amahema gari nk'oku gabaire gari.
Ogwo murinzi yaayeta abandi, baabigambira ab'omu nju y'omugabe.

Omugabe yaimuka nyekiro, yaagambira abaheereza be ati: Ka mbagambire enaama ei Abasiria batugiriire. Bamanyire ku enjara etwitsire; nikyo barugiire omu rusiisira, bakeeshereka omu ishwa, nibateekateeka bati: Ku baraashohore omu rurembo, nitwija kubagurukana, tubakwate bahuriire, tweshukye n'omu rurembo.

Omwe aha baheereza be yaagira ati: Ka batware embaraasi itaano ahari ezo ezitsigaire omu rurembo;  mbwenu torikumanya ku zirembire nk'Abaisraeli boona abatsigaire omu rurembo, abahonokire ahari abao abafiire;  tutumeyo, tureebe.
Baareeta abashaija babiri b'embaraasi, omugabe yaaboohereza kukurata eihe ry'Abasiria, naagira ati: Mugyende mureebe.
Baabakurata okuhika Yorudani, baashanga omuhanda gwona gwijwire ebijwaro n'ebintu ebi Abasiria banagire nibairuka. Ezo ntumwa zaagaruka zaagambira omugabe.

Eryo izooba omugabe yaaragiira omukuru w'engabo, ou yaabaire ayegamira omukono, kurinda eirembo. Abantu baamuribatiiririra omu irembo, yaafa, nk'oku omushaija wa Ruhanga agambire, obu omugabe amwizireho.

Ahakuba omushaija wa Ruhanga ku yaagambiire omugabe ati: Nyencakare nk'aga magingo, encuro ibiri za sayiri niziija kugura shekeli emwe, n'encuro y'esaano y'obunono egure shekeli emwe omu rurembo rya Samaria,

ogwo mukuru w'engabo yaagarukamu omushaija wa Ruhanga naagira ati: Noogira ngu n'obu MUKAMA wenka yaakuta amadirisa omu iguru, ekigambo eki kikaabaho? Onu yaamugira ati: Noija kukireeba n'amaisho gaawe, kwonka torikwija kubiryaho.
Kyaba nikwo kyamubaho kityo; ahabw'okuba abantu bakamuribatiiririra omu irembo, yaafa.
Omukazi yaimuka, yaakora nk'oku omushaija wa Ruhanga yaamugambiire; yaagyenda n'ab'eka ye, yaashuhuukira omu nsi y'Abafilistia okumara emyaka mushanju.
Emyaka mushanju ku yaahweire, ogwo mukazi yaagaruka naaruga omu nsi y'Abafilistia, yaaza owa omugabe kumwetongyeza ahabw'enju ye n'obutaka bwe.
Kandi obwo omugabe akaba naagaaniira na Gehazi omuheereza w'omushaija wa Ruhanga, naagira ati: nteekyerereza ebikuru byona ebi Elisa yaakozire.

Ku yaabaire naakiteekyerereza omugabe oku Elisa yaahimbwire ofiire, omukazi ou yaahimbwire omutabani, yaija yaayetongyeza omugabe ahabw'enju ye n'obutaka bwe. Gehazi yaagira ati: Mukama wangye omugabe, ogu niwe mukazi n'ogu niwe mutabani ou Elisa yaahimbwire.

Kandi omugabe ku yaabuurize ogwo mukazi, nawe yaabimushobororera. Atyo omugabe yaamukwatsa omwe aha batware be, yaamugira ati: Omugarurire ebye byona, n'ebyayezire omu misiri ye okwiha obu yaaruga omuri egi nsi n'okuhitsya hati.
Omugabe yaagira Hazaeli ati: Twara omukimbo, obugane ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga, omushabe, akubuurize ahari MUKAMA, naagira ati: Ebyo omugabe naija kukira egi ndwara?

Atyo Hazaeli yaaza kumubugana, aine omukimbo gw'ebintu by'emiringo yoona ebya Damasiko, ebirikwekorerwa engamira makumi ana. Ku yaamuhikire, yaayemerera omu maisho ge, yaagira ati: Omwana waawe Benihadadi omugabe wa Siria yaakuntumaho naabuuza ati: Niinyija kukira egi ndwara?
Elisa yaamugarukamu ati: Irooko omugire oti: Buzima egyo ndwara noija kugikira. Kwonka kandi MUKAMA anyorekire ngu, buzima naija kufa.
Yaamugumyaho eriisho, okuhitsya obu yaakwatsirwe enshoni. Omushaija wa Ruhanga yaarira.

Hazaeli yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, noorizibwa ki? Yaagarukamu ati: Ahabw'okuba nimmanya oku orikora kubi Abaisraeli; ebigo byabo oryabyotsya n'omuriro, abatsigazi baabo oryabaitsa rurara, oryateera ahansi abaana baabo, bacwagagurikye, n'abakazi baabo abaine enda obashature aha nda.
Hazaeli yaagira ati: Mbwenu nkaanye omwiru waawe embwa, niinye oha okukora ekigambo ekyo ekikuru? Elisa yaamugarukamu ati: MUKAMA anyorekire ku orikwija kuba omugabe wa Siria.
Atyo yaaruga ahari Elisa, yaija ahari mukama we; mukama we yaamubuuza ati: Elisa yaakugambira ki? Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Yangira ngu buzima noija kukira.
Kwonka ku bwaseesire, yaakwata eky'okweshweka, yaakijabika omu maizi, yaakimuta aha maisho okuhitsya obu yaafiire. Bwanyima yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa kataano ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoramu mwene Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli, Yehoraamu mwene Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda akatandika kutegyeka.
Yaaza aha ngoma ahikize emyaka makumi ashatu n'ebiri, yaategyekyera emyaka munaana omuri Yerusaalemu.
Yaagyendera omu mitwarize y'abagabe ba Israeli, nk'ab'enju ya Ahabu oku baakozire, ahabw'okuba akashwera muhara wa Ahabu. Kandi yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA.
Kwonka MUKAMA tarenzire kuhwerekyereza Yuda ahabwa Daudi omwiru we, nk'oku yaaraganiise kuguma naamuha etabaaza n'oruzaaro rwe ebiro byona.
Omu biro bye Abanyaedomu bakagoma, baaruga omu butegyeki bwa Yuda, baayeteeraho omugabe.

Bwanyima Yehoraamu yaayambuka, yaaza Zairi n'ebigaari bye byona. Yaimuka nyekiro, we n'abakuru b'ebigaari bye baateera Abanyaedomu abaabaire bamwehinguririize; kandi engabo ze zoona zaahunga, zaataaha.
Okwo nikwo Edomu yaagomire, ekaruga omu butegyeki bwa Yuda n'okuhitsya hati. Omu bunaku obwo Libuna nayo yaagoma.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yehoraamu n'ebi yaakozire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabyoky'oby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Yehoraamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa hamwe na baishenkuru omu rurembo rwa Daudi; Ahazia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'ebiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoramu mwene Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli, Ahazia mwene Yehraamu omugabe wa Yuda akatandika kutegyeka.

Ahazia akaba ahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'ebiri, obu yaatandika kutegyeka. Yaategyekyera omwaka gumwe omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi eiziina rya nyina akaba ari Atalia, mwijukuru wa Omuri omugabe wa Israeli.
Nawe yaagyendera omu mitwarize y'ab'enju ya Ahabu, yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'ab'enju ya Ahabu oku baakozire; ahabw'okuba akaba ari mukwe w'ab'enju ya Ahabu.

Omugabe Yoramu yaagaruka Yezereeli kurwarizibwayo obuhuta obu Abasiria baamuhutaariize Raama, obu yaarwana na Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria. Kandi Ahazia mwene Yehoraamu omugabe wa Yuda yaashuuma kureeba Yoramu mwene Ahabu omuri Yezereeli, ahabw'okuba akaba arwaire.
Ku oraahikyeyo, osherure Yehu mwene Yehoshafaati, mwijukuru wa Nimushi; ku oraamanye omu ari, otaahemu, omwimutsye omuri beene ishe, omutware omu kishengye ky'omunda.

Bwanyima okwate eri ihembe ry'amajuta, ogamushukye aha mutwe, ogire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Naakushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli. Ku oraaheze, oigure orwigi, ohungye, oteeziringa.
Atyo ogwo mutsigazi nabi yaagyenda, yaaza Ramosi-gileadi.

Ku yaahikireyo, yaashanga abakuru b'eihe nibahanuura; yaagira ati: Nyine obutumwa ahariiwe, Omukuru w'engabo. Yehu yaamubuuza ati: Ahari oha omuriitwe twena? Yaamugarukamu ati: Ahariiwe, Omukuru w'engabo.

Atyo Yehu yaimuka, baataaha omu nju; ogwo mutsigazi yaamushuka amajuta aha mutwe, naamugira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Naakushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe w'eihanga rya MUKAMA Israeli.
Oryaita ab'enju ya Ahabu mukama waawe, mbone kuhoora Yezebeeli enzigu y'eshagama y'abairu bangye baanabi, kandi n'eshagama y'abandi bairu ba MUKAMA boona.
Ahakuba ab'enju ya Ahabu boona nibaija kuhwerekyerera, mmare ahari Ahabu oyetwa omushaija weena, omuhuuku nari ow'obusingye, omuri Israeli.
Kandi ndyahindura enju ya Ahabu nk'eya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, kandi nk'eya Baasha mwene Ahiya.
Embwa ziryariira Yezebeeli omu kibanja kya Yezereeli, abure owaamuziika. Ahonaaho yaigura orwigi, yairuka.
Baagira bati: Ngaaha, noobeiha; tugambire amazima. Onu ati: Yaagamba naanye naagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Naakushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli.
Batyo baarahuka, buri muntu yaakwata ekijwaro kye, baabyara ahansi ye aha mutwe gw'amatembero, baateera eikondere nibagira bati: Yehu yaaba omugabe.

kwonka omugabe Yoramu akaba agarukire Yezereeli kurwarizibwayo obuhuta obu Abasiria baamuhutaize, obu yaarwana na Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria.) Atyo Yehu yaagira ati: Eki ku muraabe nikyo murikwenda, hatagira omuntu weena owairuka kuruga omu rurembo, kutwara enkuru omuri Yezereeli.
Atyo Yehu yaatemba ekigaari, yaaza Yezereeli, ahakuba Yoramu niyo yaabaire arwariire; kandi obwo Ahazia omugabe wa Yuda akaba ashuumireyo kureeba Yoramu.

Obwo omurinzi akaba ayemereire aha munaara gw'omuri Yezereeli, naareebera ahare omutwe gw'engabo za Yehu nigwija; yaagira ati: Nindeeba omutwe gw'engabo nigwija. Yoramu yaagira ati: Tuma omuntu aha mbaraasi ababugane, ababuuze ati: Ni buhooro?

Atyo ow'aha mbaraasi yaaza kumubugana, yaagira ati: Omugabe naabuuza ngu, Ni buhooro? Yehu yaagira ati: Ebya buhooro noofa ki nabyo? Hingura, okubuukye, onkurate. Ogwo murinzi yaagira ati: Entumwa yaabahika, kwonka tindikureeba neegaruka.
Omugabe yaagaruka yaatuma ondiijo aha mbaraasi; nawe yaabahika, yaabagira ati: Omugabe naabuuza ngu, Ni buhooro? Yehu yaagarukamu ati: Ebya buhooro, noofa ki nabyo? Hingura, okubuukye, onkurate.
Omurinzi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Nawe yaabahika, kwonka tindikureeba naagaruka. Kandi emivugire neeshusha eya Yehu mwene Nimushi, ahakuba naavugisa amaani.
Yoramu ku yaareebire Yehu, yaamubuuza ati: Ni buhooro, Yehu? Onu yamugarukau ati: Ni buhooro ki, obushambani bwa nyoko Yezebeeli, n'oburugo bwe bikiri bingi biti?
Yoramu yaahinduza embaraasi orukoba, yaahunga, naagira Ahazia ati: Ahazia, hariho okureebyana!
Yehu yaananuura obuta bwe n'amaani ge goona, yaateeera Yoramu omwambi omu buteeraniro bw'amabega, gwamwata omutima, gwayogamu, yaagwa omu kigaari kye

Yehu yaagira Bidukaari omukuru w'engabo ze, ati: Mukirize, omunagye omu musiri gw'ekibanja kya Nabosi owa Yezereeli; ahakuba noijuka, obu nyowe naiwe twakurata Ahabu ishe, turi aha mbaraasi, MUKAMA akamuraguraho ekigambo eki ati:

Buzimazima, nk'oku nyomwabazyo ndeebire eshagama ya Nabosi n'abatabani, naanye ndyakuhoorera omuri ogu musiri; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira. N'ahabw'ekyo mukirize, omunagye omuri ogwo musiri, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire.
Abagaragwa be baamuta omu kigaari, baamutwara Yerusaalemu, baamuziika omu kituuro omu rurembo rwa Daudi, baamushangisa baishenkuru.
Kandi omu mwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoramu mwene Ahabu, Ahazia akatandika kutegyeka Yuda.
Yehu ku yaahikire Yezereeli, Yezebeeli yaakihurira, yaaziga amaisho ge, yaaboneza eishokye rye, yaaringuririza omu dirisa.
Yehu ku yaabaire yaahika ati omu rurembo, Yezebeeli yaamugira ati: Iwe Zimuri, owaita mukama waawe, ni buhooro?
Yehu yaimutsya amaisho, yaareeba omu dirisa, yaagira ati: Ori aha rubaju rwangye n'oha? N'oha? Abakonwa bashatu nari babiri baamuringuriza.
Yaabagira ati: Mumunagye ahansi. Batyo baamunaga ahansi, eshagama ye yaataraakira ekisiika n'embaraasi, zaamuribatiirira.
Yehu yaataaha omu nju, yaarya, yaanywa; bwanyima yaagira ati: Mwirooko mureebe ogwo mukazi okyeenirwe, mumuziikye, ahakuba ni muhara w'omugabe.
Kwonka ku baagiire kumuziika, tibaamushangaho, kureka empanga y'omutwe gwe n'ebigyere n'ebiganja.

Ku baagarukire, baamugambira, yaagira ati: Ekyo nikyo kigambo kya MUKAMA, eki yaagambire naaraba omu mwiru we Eliya owa Tishubi, ati: Omu musiri gwa Yezereeli nimwo embwa ziririira omutumbi gwa Yezebeeli;
kandi omutumbi gwe guryaba nk'amasha agari ahansi omu musiri gwa Yezereeli, habure owaagira ati: Ogu ni Yezebeeli.
Kandi Ahabu akaba aine abatabani makumi mushanju omuri Samaria. Yehu yaahandiika ebaruha, yaazitwekyera abategyeki b'orurembo Samaria, n'abakuru baarwo, kandi n'abarezi ba beene Ahabu, naabagira ati:
Egi baruha ku eraabahikye eti, nk'oku mwine batabani ba mukama waanyu, kandi mukagira ebigaari n'embaraasi n'endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare n'eby'okurwanisa,
mutoorane omuri batabani ba mukama waanyu orikukira abandi boona, kandi ohikire, mumute aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa ishe, murwanirire enju ya mukama waanyu.
Kwonka baatiina munonga, baagira bati. Ku araabe atabaasiibwe abo bagabe bombi, itwe nitubaasa tuta kumuza omu kaso?

Atyo omutegyeki w'ekikaari n'ow'orurembo hamwe n'abakuru n'abo barezi b'abaana, baatuma ahari Yehu nibagira bati: Turi abairu baawe; nitwija kukora ebi oraaturagiire byona; kandi titwine muntu weena ou turaayemekye; kureka iwe okore eki orikusiima.

Yaagaruka yaabahandiikira ebaruha ya kabiri, naagira ati: Ku muraabe muri abangye, kandi mweteekateekire kuunyorobera, mutemeho batabani ba mukama waanyu emitwe, nyencakare nk'aga magingo muginshangise Yezereeli. Obwo bunaku batabani b'omugabe boona makumi mushanju bakaba bari hamwe n'abakuru b'orurembo, abaabaire nibabarera.
Egyo baruha ku yaabahikire, baakwata batabani b'omugabe, baabaita boona makumi mushanju, emitwe yaabo baagita omu bitukuru, baagimutwekyera Yezereeli.
Entumwa yaija, yaamugira eti: Emitwe y'abaana b'omugabe baagireeta. Yaagira ati: Mugirunde ebirundo bibiri aha irembo egumeho okuhitsya omu kasheeshe.
Omu kasheeshe ku yaashohoire, yaayemerera omu maisho g'abantu boona, yaabagira ati: Imwe timwine rubanja; niinye ngomeire mukama wangye, nkamwita; mbwenu nimugira ngu oitsire aba boona, n'oha?
N'ahabw'ekyo mumanye ku hatariho kigambo na kimwe eki MUKAMA yaagambire aha nju ya Ahabu ekiribura; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ahikiriize eki yaagambire naaraba omu mwiru we Eliya.
Bwanyima Yehu yaita boona abaabaire batsigaire omu nju ya Ahabu omuri Yezereeli, abashaija be ab'aha mara, n'abanyamurwa be; tiyaatsigaho na waakizira.
Bwanyima Yehu yaarugayo, yaaza Samaria; ku yaabaire akiri omu muhanda, yaahika aha nju y'eikyemuriro ry'ebyoya by'entaama,
yaabugana ab'oruganda rwa Ahazia omugabe wa Yuda, yaabuuza ati: Muri baahi? Baamugarukamu bati: Turi ab'oruganda rwa Ahazia, twizire kutaayaayira abaana b'omugabe n'aba nyin'omugabe.
Yaagira ati: Mubakwate bahuriire. Baabakwata bahuriire, baabaitira aha kiina ky'enju y'eikyemuriro ry'ebyoya by'entaama, boona makumi ana na babiri, tiyaatsigaho n'omwe.
yaamugira ati: Ija tugyende, oreebe obweziriki bwangye ahabwa MUKAMA. Atyo yaamutwara omu kigaari kye.
Ku yaahikire Samaria, yaita aba Ahabu boona abaabaire batsigaire Samaria, okuhitsya obu yaabamazireho, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA, eki yaagambiire Eliya, oku kyabaire kiri.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati muunyetere baanabi ba Baali boona, boona abarikumuramya, n'abanyamurwa be boona, hatagira n'omwe owaaburaho; ahabw'okuba nyine ekitambo kihango ky'okutambira Baali; weena oraabureho tarikwija kugumaho. Kwoha Yehu ekyo akakikoresa obwengye oburimu obugobya, ngu abone kucwekyereza abarikuramya Baali.
Yehu yaaragiira ati: Murangye, habeho okuteerana okurikwera ahabwa Baali. Batyo baakuranga.
Yehu yaatuma omuri Israeli yoona; abaabaire nibaramya Baali boona baija, tihaagira muntu n'omwe owaatsigarayo ataizire. Baataaha omuri nyaruju ya Baali, yaijura n'aha bunwa.
Yehu yaagambira orikutegyeka enju erikubikwamu ebijwaro, ati: Reetera abaramya Baali boona ebijwaro. Atyo yaabibareetera.

Bwanyima Yehu yaataaha omuri nyaruju ya Baali na Yehonadabu mwene Rekabu, yaagambira abarikuramya Baali ati: Mwetegyereze, muhamye ngu omuriimwe tiharimu mwiru wa MUKAMA, kureka abarikuramya Baali bonka.

Atyo yaataahamu kuhayo ebitambo n'okutamba ebitambo by'okwotsya. Kwonka Yehu akaba ataire aheeru abashaija makumi munaana, yaabagira ati: Omuntu oraikirize omwe ahari aba abu naata omu mikono yaanyu, kubura, naamuzira.

Ku yaaherize ati kutamba ekitambo ky'okwotsya, yaagira abarinzi n'abakuru b'engabo ati; Mutaahemu, mubaite, hatagira n'omwe owaacwa. Batyo baabaitsa rurara; bwanyima abarinzi n'abakuru b'engabo baabanaga aheeru, baataaha omu kishengye ky'omunda omuri nyaruju ya Baali,
baashohoza enyomyo ezaabaire ziri omuri nyaruju ya Baali, baazootsya.
Baayatagura ekishushani kya Baali, baasheenyagura nyaruju ye, baagihindura orubungo n'okuhitsya hati.
Okwo nikwo Yehu yaamazireho Baali, akamwiha omuri Israeli

Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagira Yehu ati: Ahabw'okukora gye, okahikiiriza ebirikusiimwa omu maisho gangye, okagira enju ya Ahabu nk'oku naabaire ninteekateeka omu mutima gwangye kugigira, abaana baawe baryashutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli okuhitsya aha busingye bwa kana.
Kwonka Yehu tiyaayeta aha kugyendera omu biragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli n'omutima gwe gwona; tiyaaruga mu bibi ebi Yeroboamu yaakoreise Abaisraeli, bakacumura.
okutandikira Yorudani nootoora oburugwa-izooba, ensi yoona eya Gileadi, n'ey'Abagaadi, n'ey'Abareubeni, n'ey'Abamanaase, okuruga Aroeri, ey'omu ruhita rwa Arunooni, niyo Gileadi na Bashani.
Endiijo mirimo ya Yehu n'ebi yaakozire byona, n'eby'amaani ge goona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Bwanyima Yehu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika Samaria. Yehoahazi omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Kandi emyaka ei Yehu yaamazire aha ngoma naategyeka Israeli omuri Samaria ekahika makumi abiri na munaana.

Kwonka Yehosheba muhara w'omugabe Yehoraamu, munyaanya wa Ahazia, yaatwara Yoasi mutabani wa Ahazia, yaamwiha omuri batabani b'omugabe, abu baabaire nibenda kwita, yaamucwisa n'omurezi we, yaabata omu kishengye ky'okuraaramu. Atyo yaamushereka Atalia, tiyaitwa;
yaaguma nawe asherekirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA okumara emyaka mukaaga; obwo Atalia naategyeka ensi.
Yaabaragiira, naabagira ati: Oku nikwo muraatwaze. Kimwe kya kashatu kyanyu, abaija aha murimo ahari Sabato, barinde enju y'omugabe;
kimwe kya kashatu ekindi kize aha irembo rya Suuri; kandi ekindi kigume aha irembo enyima y'abarinzi;
ebyo bicweka byanyu byombi, eby'abaihwa aha murimo, birinde enju ya MUKAMA beehinguririize omugabe.

Mutyo mugume mukiikiize omugabe embaju zoona, buri muntu akwaitse eby'okurwanisa bye omu ngaro. Omuntu weena oraayende kutaaha omu mishorongo yaanyu, mumwite. Imwe mugume n'omugabe yaaba naashohora, kandi yaaba naataaha.

Abakuru b'engabo baakora byona ebi Yehoyaada omunyamurwa yaaragiira, buri omwe yaareeta abashaija be ab'okwija aha murimo ahari Sabato, hamwe n'ab'okwihwa aha murimo ahari Sabato, baija ahari Yehoyaada omunyamurwa.
Omunyamurwa yaaheereza abo bakuru b'engabo amacumu n'engabo ebyabaire biri eby'omugabe Daudi bibiikirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA;
abarinzi baayemerera, buri muntu akwaitse eby'okurwanisa bye omu ngaro, okuruga aha rubaju rw'enju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, okuhika aha rwa bumosho, beehinguririize eitambiro n'enju.

Bwanyima Yehoyaada yaashohoza omwana w'omugabe, yaamujweka ekirunga aha mutwe, yaamuha Eby'okuhamya; baamuranga ku yaaba omugabe, baamushukaho amajuta, baateera omu ngaro nibagira bati: Omugabe naakaramaare!
Atalia ku yaahuriire orwari rw'abarinzi n'abantu, yaataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA ahu abantu bari;

ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba omugabe ayemereire aha rubaju rw'enyomyo, nk'oku omugyenzo gwabaire guri, n'abakuru b'engabo n'ab'amakondere bamwemereire aha rubaju, n'abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi nibashemererwa, nibateera amakondere. Ahonaaho Atalia yaataagura ebijwaro bye, naagira ati: Okwebumba! Okwebumba!

Yehoyaada omunyamurwa yaaragiira abakuru b'engabo abaabaire nibategyeka eihe, naagira ati: Mumurabye omu ngabo, mumushohoze; oraamukurate weena, mumwite na rurara. Ahabw'okuba omunyamurwa akagira ngu arekye kwitirwa omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Batyo baamutaho engaro, baamurabya omu irembo ry'embaraasi, baamuhitsya ahari nyaruju y'omugabe, baaba niho baamwitira.

Okuruga aho abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi baaza ahari nyaruju ya Baali, baagisheenya; amatambiro ge n'ebishushani bye baabisheenyagurira kimwe, baitira Mataani omunyamurwa wa Baali omu maisho g'ago matambiro. Kandi omunyamurwa yaata abarinzi aha nju ya MUKAMA.

Bwanyima yaatwara abakuru b'engabo, Abakariti, abarinzi, n'abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi, baiha omugabe omu nju ya MUKAMA, baamushuumya, baamurabya omu irembo ry'abarinzi, baamutaasya omuri nyaruju y'omugabe, yaashutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe.
Batyo abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi baashemererwa; kandi Atalia ku yaaherize kwitirwa aha nju y'omugabe na rurara, haabaho okutuuza omu rurembo.
Yoasi akatandika kutegyeka ahikize emyaka mushanju.
Omu mwaka gwa mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Yehu, Yoasi akatandika kutegyeka, yaategyekyera omuri Yerusaalemu emyaka makumi ana. Eiziina rya nyina akaba ari Zibia owa Beeri-sheba.
Yoasi yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA ebiro byona ebi yaamazire naahaburwa Yehoyaada omunyamurwa.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu teraihirweho, kureka abantu bakagumizamu nibgitambiramu ebitambo, kandi nibootereramu obubaane.
abanyamurwa bazitware, buri omwe aziihe ahari mugyenzi we, bazihunduuze enju, ahi esiisikaire hoona.
Kwonka okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoasi, abanyamurwa bakaba bataine ki baahundwize kyona ahari egyo nju.

Nikyo omugabe Yoasi yaatumiire Yehoyaada omunyamurwa n'abandi banyamurwa, akababuuza ati: Ahabw'enki mutarikuhunduuza enju? Mbwenu murekyere ahao kwiha empiiha ahari bagyenzi baanyu, kureka muziheyo ahabw'okuhunduuza enju.
Batyo abanyamurwa baikiriza kutagaruka kwiha empiiha aha bantu, n'obu kwakuba okuhunduuza enju.
Ku baabaire bareeba empiiha zaaba nyingi omuri egyo shanduukye, omuhandiiki w'omugabe n'omunyamurwa omukuru baija, bazibara, bazikoma omu nshaho, zoona ezi bashanga omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima ezo mpiiha ezi babazire baziha abakozi abarikureeberera enju ya MUKAMA; nabo baziha ababaizi n'abombeki abarikukora egyo nju,
n'abarikwombekyesa amabaare, n'abarikugashara; ezindi bazihayo kugura embaaho n'amabaare agabaizire eby'okuhunduuza enju ya MUKAMA, n'ahabw'ebindi byona ebirikwetengwa kuhunduuza egyo nju.
Kwonka ezo mpiiha ezi baabaire bareeta omu nju ya MUKAMA tibarazikoreise bikopo by'efeeza, nari makansi z'entambi, nari enyabya, nari amakondere, n'obu byakuba ebindi bintu by'ezaabu nari eby'efeeza,
kureka zo bakaba baziha abakozi abarikuzikoresa enju ya MUKAMA.
Kandi abo bashaija abu baabaire baha empiiha z'okwihura abakozi, bakaba batababuuza oku zikoresiibwe, ahabw'okuba bakaba bazikoresa n'obwesigwa.
Empiiha z'empongano z'okwihaho orubanja, n'ez'empongano z'ekibi zikaba zitareetwa mu nju ya MUKAMA; zikaba ziba ez'abanyamurwa.

N'ahabw'ekyo Yoasi omugabe wa Yuda yaatwara ebintu byona ebirikwera ebyahairwe baishenkuru, Yehoshafaati na Yehoraamu na Ahazia abagabe ba Yuda, hamwe n'ebintu bye ahabwe ebi yaahaireyo, kandi n'ezaabu yoona eyaashangirwe omu mabiikiro g'enju ya MUKAMA n'ag'enju y'omugabe, yaabitwekyera Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria. Atyo Hazaeli yaaruga ahari Yerusaalemu.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yoasi n'ebi yaakozire byona tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'obusingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Bwanyima abagaragwa be baimuka, baamugiira omu naama, baamwitira omu nju ya Miilo omu muhanda gurikushuuma Siila;
abo bagaragwa be abaamuteire akafa, ni Yozakaari mwene Shimeasi na Yehozabadi mwene Shomeri. Yaaziikwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi, yaashanga baishenkuru; Amazia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.

Omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri n'eshatu ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoasi mwene Ahazia omugabe wa Yuda, Yehoahazi mwene Yehu akatandika kutegyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria, yaamara aha ngoma emyaka ikumi na mushanju.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, yaakurata Yeroboamu mwene Nebati omu bibi bye ebi yaasiisiise Israeli, tiyaabireka.
MUKAMA yaagirira Israeli ekiniga, yaaguma naabahayo omu mikono ya Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria, n'omu mikono ya Benihadadi omutabani.
Bwanyima Yehoahazi yaayeshengyereza MUKAMA, MUKAMA yaamuhurira; ahakuba akareeba okwitwa kubi kw'Abaisraeli, oku omugabe wa Siria yaabaire naabaita kubi. (
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaaha Abaisraeli omujuni, baaruga omu mikono y'Abaisria; batyo Abaisraeli baatuura omu maka gaabo nk'omu biro bya ira.
Kwonka tibaaruga mu bibi by'enju ya Yeroboamu, ebi yaasiisiise Israeli; baaguma nibabigyenderamu; kandi na Ashera nazo zaaguma omuri Samaria.)

Ahabw'okuba Yehoahazi taratsigaize bantu, kureka ab'aha mbaraasi makumi ataano, n'ebigaari, n'engabo ezirikugyendesa ebigyere kakumi ahakuba omugabe wa Siria akabacwekyereza, yaabagira nk'omucuucu gw'aha mbuga.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yehoahazi n'ebi yaakozire byona n'eby'amaani ge tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Atyo Yehoahazi yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika omuri Samaria; Yehoashi omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu na mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Yoasi omugabe wa Yuda, Yehoashi mwene Yehoahazi akatandika kutegyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria, yamara aha ngoma emyaka ikumi na mukaaga.
Nawe yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati ebi yaasiisiise Abaisraeli, kureka yaaguma naabigyenderamu.
Mbwenu endiijo mirirmo ya Yehoashi, n'ebi yaakozire byona, n'eby'amaani ge, agu yaarwaniise naarwana na Amazia omugabe wa Yuda, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Atyo Yehoashi yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, Yeroboamu yaaza aha kitebe kye ky'obugabe, bwanyima Yehoashi yaaziikwa Samaria hamwe n'abagabe ba Israeli.
Elisa yaamugira ati: Kwata obuta n'emyambi. Atyo yaabikwata.
Yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Nanuura obuta! Yaabunanuura; Elisa yaata engaro aha z'omugabe.

Bwanyima yaagira ati: Igura edirisa erikureeba oburugwa-izooba. Onu yaagiigura. Elisa yaamugira ati: Rasha. Onu yaarasha. Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Ogwo n'omwambi gwa MUKAMA gw'obusinguzi ogw'okusingura Siria! Ahakuba noija kuranira omuri Afeki n'Abasiria, okuhitsya obu oraabaite okabamaraho.
Bwanyima yaagira omugabe wa Israeli ati: Kwata emyambi. Onu yaagikwata. Yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Giteere ahansi. Yaagiteera ahansi kashatu, yaarereera.

Ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga yaamugwerwa kubi, yaamugira ati: Waaba oshemereire kugiteera ahansi emirundi etaano nari mukaaga; haza obwo obona kusingura Abaisiria, obamariraho kimwe; kwonka hati noija kubasingura emirundi eshatu yonka.

Eizooba rimwe ku baabaire nibaziika omuntu, baareeba omutwe gw'abanyagi, baamutambika omu kituuro kya Elisa; omutumbi ku gwahikire guti ha magufa ga Elisa, ogwo muntu yaahimbuuka, yaimuka, yaayemerera.

Kwonka MUKAMA akaba abagirira embabazi n'esaasi, abataho omutima ahabw'endagaano ei yaaragaine na Abarahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo, kandi akaba atacwekyereza, n'obu kwakuba kubabingira kimwe omu maisho ge omu biro ebyo.
Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria ku yaafiire, Beni-hadadi omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Bwanyima Yehoashi mwene Yehoahazi yaiha ahari Benihadadi mwene Hazaeli endembo ezi Hazaeli yaabaire anyagire ahari ishe omu bweme. Yehoashi yaamusingura kashatu, yaagarura endembo za Israeli.
Yaatandika kutegyeka aine emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano, yaamara emyaka makumi abiri na mwenda ari aha ngoma omuri Yerusaalemu. Eiziina rya nyina akaba ari Yehoadaani owa Yerusaalemu.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, kwonka tiyaaba nka ishenkuru Daudi; kureka yaakora nk'ebi Yoasi ishe yaakozire byona.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu tiyaihwaho; abantu baaguma nibagitambiramu ebitambo, kandi nibagyotereramu obubaane.
Bwanyima ku yaaherize kuhama omu bugabe bwe, yaita abashaija be abaitsire ishe ari aha ngoma.

Kwonka abaana b'abo baitsi abaitsire ishe tiyaabaita, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebiragiro bya Musa, eki MUKAMA yaaragiriiremu ati: Baishe b'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa abaana baabo; kandi n'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa baishebo; kureka omuntu weena aryaitwa ahabw'ekibi kye.

Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli yaatuma ahari Amazia omugabe wa Yuda naagira ati: Eitojo rya Lebanooni rikatuma aha mwereezi gwa Lebanooni nirigira riti: Ha mutabani wangye muhara waawe, amushwere. Ku bwaseesire, enyamaishwa y'omu ihamba rya Lebanooni yaija neerabaho, yaariribata.
N'ekya buzima oteire Abanyaedomu waabasingura, omutima gwawe gwakureetera eigundu. Yehimbise ahabw'ekitiinisa kyawe, kwonka ogume omuka; ahabw'enki nootaara akabi, ngu ofe na Yuda?
Kwonka Amazia tiyaabyetaho. N'ahabw'ekyo Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli yainamuka kubugana Amazia omugabe wa Yuda; baabugaabuganira Beti-shemeshi eya Yuda, baarwanirayo.
Abaisraeli baabinga Abayuda, buri muntu yaahungira omu ka ye.

Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli yaakwata Amazia omugabe wa Yuda, mwene Yoasi, mwijukuru wa Ahazia, yaamukwatira Betishemeshi; bwanyima yaaza Yerusaalemu, yaasheenya orugo rwayo rw'amabaare ekicweka kya mikono magana ana, okuruga aha irembo rya Efuraimu okuhika aha irembo ry'Akeekubo.
Kandi yaanyaga ezaabu n'efeeza zoona, n'ebintu byona ebyashangirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu mabiikiro g'enju y'omugabe, kandi yaabaihamu abantu, yaabagira omukwato; bwanyima yaagaruka Samaria.
Yehoashi yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omuri Samaria hamwe n'abagabe ba Israeli. Bwanyima Yeroboamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Amazia tehandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Abantu baamugiira omu naama bari Yerusaalemu, yaahungira Lakishi; kwonka baamukuratsayo abantu, baamwitirayo.
Baamureeta aha mbaraasi, baamuziika Yerusaalemu omu rurembo rwa Daudi hamwe na baishenkuru.
Bwanyima abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi baatwara Uziya owaabaire aine emyaka ikumi na mukaaga, baamwemeka omu mwanya gwa Amazia ishe.
Omugabe ku yaaherize kugwejegyera n'okushanga baishenkuru, Uziya yaayombeka Elaasi, yaarugarurira obugabe bwa Yuda.

Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'omu busingye bwa Amazia mwene Yoasi, omugabe wa Yuda, Yeroboamu mwene Yehoahsi omugabe wa Israeli, akatandika kutegyekyera omuri Samaria, yaamara aha ngoma emyaka makumi na na gumwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati ebi yaasiisiise Abaisraeli.

Yaagarura emyatano ya Israeli okuruga ahu orikutaahira nooza Hamasi okuhika aha Nyanja ya Araba, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli oku kyabaire kiri, eki yaagambire naaraba omu mwiru we nabi Yona mwene Amitai, owaarugire Gaasi-heferi.
Ahakuba MUKAMA akareeba okubonabona kwa Israeli kuri kwingi munonga; ahabw'okuba tihaine n'omwe owaatsigaireho, yaaba muhuuku, nari ow'obusingye, n'obu yaakuba ow'okuha Israeli emikono.
Ahakuba MUKAMA akaba agizire ngu tarikwija kumariraho kimwe iziina rya Israeli ahansi y'eiguru; n'ahabw'ekyo yaabajunisa Yeroboamu mutabani wa Yehoashi.
Yeroboamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru abagabe ba Israeli; Zekaria omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaatandika kutegyeka aine emyaka ikumi na mukaaga; yaategyekyera emyaka makumi ataano n'ebiri omuri Yerusalemu. Eiziina rya nyina akaba ari Yekolia owa Yerusaalemu.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Amazia ishe yaakozire byona oku byabaire biri.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu teraihirweho; abantu bakaba bagitambiramu, kandi bagyoteerraho obubaane.

Bwanyima MUKAMA yaateera omugabe, yaarwara ebibembe, yaaguma omu nganyo okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaafeereireho. Kandi Yosamu omutabani niwe yaabaire ari omukuru w'ekikaari, naategyeka abantu b'omuri egyo nsi.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Uziya n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Uziya yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika hamwe nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi; Yosamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu na munaana ogw'omu busingye bwa Uziya omugabe wa Yuda, Zekaria mutabni wa Yeroboamu akategyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria ameezi mukaaga.
Yaakora ebirkwangwa MUKAMA, nk'oku baishenkuru baakozire. Tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, ebi yaasiisiise Israeli.
Eizooba rimwe Shalumu mwene Yabeshi yaamugirira enaama, yaamwitira omu maisho g'abantu, yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Endiijo mirimo ya Zekaria n'ebi yaakozire bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli.
Okwo nikwo kuragaanisa kwa MUKAMA oku yaaraganiise Yehu naagira ati: Batabani baawe baryashutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe okuhitsya aha bwijukuru bwa kana. Kandi nikwo kyabaire.
Bwanyima Menahemu mwene Gaadi yaaruga Tiruza, yaija Samaria, yaitirayo Shalumu mwene Yabeshi, yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Endiijo mirimo ya Shalumu yoona, n'okugoma oku yaagomire, reeba bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli.

Bwanyima omu biro ebyo Menahemu akateera Tifusa, yaagicwekyereza n'abaabaire barimu boona, n'ebyaro byayo byona okuruga Tiruza okuhika aha myatano yaayo; eki yaagicwekyerereize n'ahabw'okuba bakanga kumwigurira amarembo, kandi n'abakazi baamwo abaabaire baine enda yaabashatura aha nda.
