Omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu na mwenda ogw'omu busingye bwa Uziya omugabe wa Yuda, Menahemu mwene Gaadi akatandika kutegyeka Israeli, yaategyekyera emyaka ikumi omuri Samaria.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA; omu biro bye byona tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati ebi yaasiisiise Israeli.
Eizooba rimwe Puuli omugabe wa Asiria yaateera egyo nsi; Menahemu yaamuhongyera etalanta z'efeeza rukumi, ngu amuhwere abone kuhama omu bugabe bwe.

Kandi ezo mpiiha Menahemu akaba aziihire omu batungi boona ab'omuri Israeli, buri muntu omuribo shekeli z'efeeza makumi ataano, ngu abone kuziha ogwo mugabe wa Asiria. N'ahabw'ekyo omugabe wa Asiria yaakuba yaagarukayo, tiyaaguma muri egyo nsi.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Menahemu n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli?
Menahemu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru; omutabani Pekahia yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ataano ogw'omu busingye bwa Uziya omugabe wa Yuda Pekahia mwne Menahemu akatandika kutegyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria; yaamara emyaka ebiri ari aha ngoma.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, ebi yaasiisiise Israeli.
Bwanyima Peeka mwene Remalia, omukru w'engabo ze, yaamugiira omu naama, yaamwitira Samaria omu kigo ky'omu kikaari ky'omugabe. Ku yaaherize kumwita, yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Pekahia n'ebi yaakozire byona, bikahandiikwa omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli.
Omu mwaka gwa makumi ataano ogw'omu busingye bwa Uziya omugabe wa Yuda Peeka mwene Remalia akatandika kutegyekyera Israeli omuri Samaria, yaamara emyaka makumi abiri ari aha ngoma.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, tiyaareka bibi bya Yeroboamu, ebi yaasiisiise Israeli.
Bwanyima Hoshea mwene Ela yaagiira Peeka mwene Remalia omu naama, yaamuteera, yaamwita; yaatandika kutegyeka omu mwanya gwe omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Yosamu mwene Uziya.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Peeka n'ebi yaakozire byona bikahandiikwa omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Israeli.
Omu mwaka gwa kabiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Peeka mwene Remalia omugabe wa Israeli Yosamu mwene Uziya omugabe wa Yuda akatandika kutegyeka.
Obu yaatandikire kutegyeka, akaba ahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano, yaamara emyaka ikumi na mukaaga ari aha ngoma omuri Yerusaalemu. Kandi nyina akaba naayetwa Yerusha muhara wa Zadoki.
Akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Uziya ishe yaakozire byona.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu tiyaasheenywa; kureka abantu bakaguma bagitambiramu ebitambo, bagyotereramu obubaane. Kandi yaayombeka eirembo ry'ekikaari kya MUKAMA ery'aharuguru.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yosamu n'ebi yaakozire byona tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Omu biro ebyo MUKAMA akatandika kutuma Rezini omugabe wa Siria na Peeka mwene Remalia kurwanisa Yuda.
Bwanyima Yosamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika hamwe nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi ishenkuru; Ahazi omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Omu mwaka gwa ikumi na mushanju ogw'omu busingye bwa Peeka mwene Remalia, Ahazi mwene Yosamu omugabe wa Yuda akatandika kutegyeka.
Akaba ahikize emyaka makumi abiri, obu yaatandika kutegyeka; yaategyekyera emyaka ikumi na mukaaga omuri Yerusaalemu. Tiyaakora birikusiimwa MUKAMA Ruhanga we, nk'oku ishenkuru Daudi yaakozire,
kureka yaagyendera omu mitwarize y'abagabe ba Israeli; kandi yaarabya n'omutabani omu muriro, naakuratira ebirikunugwa eby'abanyamahanga abu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Kandi yaaguma naatambira ebitambo, naayoterera obubaane omu myanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu n'aha bibungo kandi n'ahansi ya buri kiti ekyetwa omurinzi.
Omu biro ebyo nimwo omugabe wa Edomu yaagaruriire Elaasi omuri Edomu, akabingamu abashaija ba Yuda; Abanyaedomu bakaija omuri Elaasi; bakagumamu n'okuhitsya hati.
Atyo Ahazi yaatuma entumwa ahari Tigulaasi-pileseeri omugabe wa Asiria, naagira ati: Ndi omwiru waawe kandi omwana waawe. Rugayo onjune omugabe wa Siria n'owa Israeli, abanteire.
Kandi yaatwara efeeza n'ezaabu ezaashangirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu mabikiro g'enju y'omugabe, yaabitoijera omugabe wa Asiria.
Omugabe wa Asiria yaamwikiriza, yaahurura, yaateera Damasiko, yaagikwata, n'abantu baamwo yaabatwara Kiiri bari enkwatwa, kandi yaita na Rezini.

Omugabe Ahazi ku yaagiire Damasiko kubugana Tigulaasi-pileseeri omugabe wa Asiria, yaareebayo eitambiro. Yaatwekyera Uriya omunyamurwa eky'okureeberaho ky'eryo itambiro, ekyabaire nikishushanira kimwe naryo omu miringo yoona.
Uriya omunyamurwa yaayombeka eryo itambiro, naarishushanisiza kimwe n'ebi omugabe Ahazi yaatwekire ari Damasiko byona; atyo ogwo munyamurwa yaarikora, omugabe Ahazi atakagarukire naaruga Damasiko.
Omugabe ku yaarugire Damasiko, yaareeba eitambiro; bwanyima yaariirira haihi, yaaritembaho
yaaryokyezaho ekitambo kye ky'okwotsya n'empongano ye y'esaano, yaarishukaho empongano ye y'eky'okunywa, kandi yaarishukyeera eshagama y'empongano ze ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.

Kandi eitambiro ry'emiringa eryabaire rituura omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaariiha omu maisho g'enju omu mwanya gwaryo ahagati y'eitambiro rye n'enju ya MUKAMA, yaarita aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho obw'eitambiro rye.

Omugabe Ahazi yaaragiira Uriya omunyamurwa naagira ati: Aha itabiro erihango obe niho waaguma nooyokyeza ekitambo ekyokibwa omu kasheeshe, n'empongano y'esaano ey'omumwabazyo, n'ekitambo ky'omugabe eky'okwotsya n'empongano ye ey'esaano, hamwe n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'abantu boona ab'eryo ihanga n'empongano yaabyo ey'esaano n'ey'ebyokunywa; kandi orishukyeere eshangama yoona ey'ekitambo ky'okwotsya n'ey'ebindi bitambo; kwonka eitambiro ry'emiringa rigume ribe eryangye ery'okwehanuurizaho.
Uriya omunyamurwa yaakora ebyo byona, nk'oku omugabe Ahazi yaamuragiire.

Kandi omuhanda ogushakaire ogw'okurabamu ahari Sabato, ogwabaire gwombekire okuruga omu kikaari okuhika aha irembo ry'omugabe ery'aheeru eririkutaaha omuri hekalu, yaagwiha aha nju ya MUKAMA ahabw'omugabe wa Asiria.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Ahazi n'ebi yaakozire byona tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Ahazi yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika hamwe nabo omu rurembo rwa Daudi; Hezekia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, kwonka tiyaashushana na bagabe ba Israeli abaamubandiize.
Shalumaneseeri omugabe wa Asiria yainamuka, yaamuteera; Hoshea yaahinduka omwiru we, yaaguma naamutoijera.

Bwanyima omugabe wa Asiria yaashanga Hoshea amugiriire enaama; ahakuba akaba atumire entumwa ahari So omugabe wa Misri, kandi ayangire kutwekyera omugabe wa Asiria emitoijo, nk'oku yaabaire amutoijera buri mwaka. Nikyo omugabe wa Asiria yaamuteereire omu kihome akamuboha.
Bwanyima omugabe wa Asira yainamuka, yaaraba omuri egyo nsi yoona, yaahika Samaria, yaagigota okumara emyaka eshatu.

Omu mwaka gwa mwenda ogw'omu busingye bwa Hoshea, omugabe wa Asiria yaakwata Samaria, yaatwara Abaisraeli Asiria bari enkwatwa, yaabata omuri Haala n'aha mugyera Habora ogw'omuri Gozani, n'omu ndembo z'Abameedi.
baagyendera omu micwe y'ago mahanga agu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho gaabo, kandi n'omu micwe ei abagabe ba Israeli baabaire bareetsire.

Kandi Abaisraeli baaguma nibakorera omu mubonano ebitahikire nibacumura ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo. Baayeyombekyera emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu omuri tauni zaabo zoona, okuruga aha minaara y'abarinzi, okuhika aha ndembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare;
kandi baayebyarira enyomyo z'amabaare na Ashera ahari buri kibungo kyona ekiraingwa, n'ahansi ya buri kiti ekyetwa omurinzi,
okwo niyo baayoterereire obubaane omu myanya yoona emikuru y'okuramizamu, nk'oku ago mahanga gaakozire agu MUKAMA yaatwaire akaiha omu maisho gaabo. Baakora ebindi bibi, baagwisa kubi MUKAMA,
baaheereza ebishushani ebirikuramibwa ebi MUKAMA yaabaire abagizire ati; Eki mutarikikora.

N'obu biraabe byabaire biba bityo, hoona MUKAMA akaba ateisa Israeli na Yuda, naagambira omuri buri nabi na buri muhanuuzi, naagira ati: Muhindukye murekye emicwe yaanyu emibi, mworobere ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho, nk'ebiragiro byona ebi naaragiire baashwenkuriimwe, kandi n'ebi naabatumireho nimbirabya omu bairu bangye bombi, oku byabaire biri.
Kwonka banga kuhurira, bagangaara, nka baishenkurubo abaabaire bataikiriza MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo.

Bagaya ebi yaataireho, n'endagaano ei yaaragaine na baishenkurubo n'okuteisa oku yaabaire abateisa. Bakuratira ebitaine mugasho, nabo bahinduka ebataine mugasho, batooreza emicwe y'amahanga agabeehinguririze, agu MUKAMA yaabeehanangiriize kutakora nkago.
Batyo baareka ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, baayekorera ebishushani bibiri by'enyana ebiheesire, kandi baaguma nibakora ana Ashera, baramya eihe ryona ery'omu iguru, nibaheereza Baali.
Barabya batabani baabo na bahara baabo omu muriro nk'ebitambo, baragura, baroga, beehayo kukora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nibamugwisa kubi.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaagwerwa kubi munonga Abaisraeli yaababinga omu maisho ge, tiyaagira u yaatsigaho kureka oruganda rwa Yuda rwonka.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaacwa baijukuru b'Abaisraeli boona, yaababurabuza, yaabahayo omu mikono y'abanyagi, okuhitsya obu yaababingiire kimwe omu maisho ge.
Ahakuba akacwa Israeli aha nju ya Daudi, baahindura Yeroboamu mwene Nebati omugabe. Kandi Yeroboamu yaazibira Abaisraeli kukuratira MUKAMA, yaabakoresa ekibi kihango.
Batyo Abaisraeli baagyendera omu bibi byona ebi Yeroboamu yaakozire, tibaabireka,

okuhitsya obu MUKAMA yaabingire Israeli omu maisho ge, nk'oku yaashangirwe agambire naaraba omu bairu be boona baanabi. Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baabingirwe omu nsi yaabo, bakatwarwa Asiria, bakagumayo n'okuhitsya hati.
Ku baabaire bakitandikire kutuurayo, tibaatiina MUKAMA; n'ahabw'ekyo yaabooherereza entare, zaabaitamu abantu.

Batyo baagambira omugabe wa Asiria bati: Amahanga agu otwaire kuta omu ndembo za Samaria tigarikumanya biragiro bya ruhanga w'egyo nsi; n'ahabw'ekyo abooherereize entare; mbwenu reeba, nizibaita, ahabw'okuba tibarikumanya biragiro bya ruhanga w'ensi egyo.
Omugabe wa Asiria nikwo kuragiira ati: Mugarureyo omunyamurwa omwe aha bu mwaihireyo, agyende atuureyo, abeegyese ebiragiro bya ruhanga w'egyo nsi.
N'ahabw'ekyo omwe aha banyamurwa abu baihire Samaria yaija, yaatuura Beseeli, yaaguma naabeegyesa oku bashemereire kutiina MUKAMA.
Aba Babulooni baakora Sukoosi-benosi; aba Kuusi baakora Neregaali; aba Hamasi baakora Ashima;
aba Ava baakora Nibuhazi na Tarutaaki; n'aba Sefavaimu baaguma nibootsya abaana omu muriro, nibabatambira Adrameleki na Anameleki, baaruhanga ba Sefavaimu.
Kandi bakaba batiina MUKAMA, batoorana omuribo abantu b'emiringo yoona kuba abanyamurwa b'emyanya mikuru; abo nibo baabaire babatambirira ebitambo omuri zaanyaruju z'omuri egyo myanya.
Batyo batiina MUKAMA, kwonka baaguma nibaheereza baaruhanga baabo, nibakuratira emitwarize y'amahanga agu baarugiremu.
Na hati nibakitwaza nk'oku baabaire batwaza ira.
Tibarikutiina MUKAMA, tibarikukuratira byatairweho nari emigyenzo, nari ebiragiro ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire beene Yakobo ou yaayetsire Israeli.
Abo nibo MUKAMA yaaragaine nabo endagaano akabeehanangiriza naagira ati: Mutaritiina baaruhanga abandi, mutaribainamira, mutaribaheereza n'obu kwakuba okubatambira ebitambo;
kureka MUKAMA owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri n'amaani maingi n'omukono ogubangire, mube niwe mwatiina, mukainamira; kandi mube niwe mwatambira ebitambo.
Kandi ebyatairweho n'emigyenzo n'ebiragiro, ebi yaaragiire akabibahandiikira, mugume mubiteho omutima, mubyorobere; mutarigira baaruhanga abandi abu mwatiina.
N'ahabw'ekyo endagaano ei naaragaine naimwe mutarigyebwa; mutaritiina baaruhanga abandi,
kureka mugume mutiine MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu; niwe aribajuna omu mikono y'abazigu baanyu boona.
Kwonka bo baayanga kuhurira, baagumizamu n'emicwe yaabo eya ira.

Batyo abantu b'ago mahanga baaguma nibatiina MUKAMA, kandi nibaheereza ebishushani byabo ebibaizire; abaaba baabo na baijukuru baano nabo baagumizamu baakora nk'oku baishekurubo baabaire bakora, n'okuhitsya hati.
Yaatandika aine emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano, yaategyekyera emyaka makumi abiri na mwenda omuri Yerusaalemu. Nyina akaba naayetwa Abi muhara wa Zekaria.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA nk'ebi Daudi ishenkuru yaakozire byona oku byabaire biri.

Yaihaho emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu, yaasheenya enyomyo z'amabaare, yaatema Ashera; kandi yaacwagacwagura enjoka y'omuringa ei Musa yaabaire akozire, ahabw'okuba okuhitsya omu bunaku obwo Abaisraeli bakaba nibakigyoterera obubaane; neeyetwa Nehushitaane.
Akaba naayesiga MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli; n'ahabw'ekyo tihariho mugabe weena owaabaire naamushusha omu bagabe ba Yuda boona abaamukuratiire, n'obu baakuba abaamubandiize.
Ahabw'okuba akagumira ahari MUKAMA, tiyaareka kumukuratira, yaaguma naayorobera ebiragiro ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa.
MUKAMA yaaguma nawe; ei yaabaire ahurura yoona, aba gye. Kandi yaagomera omugabe wa Asiria, yaayanga kumuheereza.
Kandi yaateera Abafilistia okuruga aha munaara gw'abarinzi okuhika aha ndembo ezizitiire n'engo z'amabaare, yaabahitsya Gaaza n'omu byanga byayo.
aha muheru gw'omwaka gwa kashatu yaagikwata. Omu mwaka gwa mukaaga ogwa Hezekia, ogwabaire guri omwaka gwa mwenda ogwa Hoshea omugabe wa Israeli, nimwo Samaria yaakwatiirwe.
Bwanyima omugabe wa Asiria yaatwara Abaisraeli omu nsi ye bari enkwatwa, yaabata omuri Haala, n'aha mugyera Habora ogw'omuri Gozani, n'omu ndembo z'Abameedi,
ahakuba tibarahuriire iraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, kureka bakaita endagaano ye, nangwa n'ebi Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaaragiire byona, baayanga kubihurira, n'obu kwakuba okubyorobera.

Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda yaatuma aha mugabe wa Asiria ari Lakishi, ati: Nshobize; ndeka; kyona eki orancwe ninkyemera. Omugabe wa Asiria yaacwa Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda etalanta magana ashatu z'efeeza, kandi n'ez'ezaabu makumi ashatu.
Hezekia yaamuha efeeza yoona eyaashangirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA, n'omu mabiikiro g'enju y'omugabe.
Omu biro ebyo Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda akaiha ezaabu aha nyigi za hekalu ya MUKAMA, n'aha biti by'emiryango, ei yaabaire abishwekire, yaagiha omugabe wa Asiria.

Omugabe wa Asiria ku yaabaire akiri Lakishi, yaatuma abatware be Tarutaani, Rabusaari, na Rabushaake, n'eihe rihango aha mugabe Hezekia omuri Yerusaalemu. Bainamuka, baaza Yerusaalemu. Ku baahikireyo, baayemerera aha mukura gw'ekiyanja ky'eruguru, ekiri aha muhanda rugyendwa ogurikuza aha kibanja ky'omwozi.
Ku baayetsire omugabe, haija Eliakimu mwene Hilukia, owaabaire ari omukuru w'ekikaari, na Shebuna omuhandiiki, na Yoa mwene Asafu omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho, baabashanga aho.
Omutware Rabushaake yaabagira ati: Mwirooko mugire Hezekia muti: Oku nikwo omugabe rugambwa, omugabe wa Asiria arikugamba naagira ati: Mbwenu ou orikwesiga n'oha?
Noogira ngu ebigambo bugambo nibyo naama n'amaani eby'okurwanisa? Hari ou oyegamiire hati n'oha, waaza kungomera?

Reeba, hati oyegamiire Misri, orubango oruri nk'ekibingo kihndekire, ekirikwija kucumita ekiganja ky'omuntu weena orikukihimbagiriraho. Okwo nikwo na Faraho omugabe wa Misri ari ahari boona abarikumwesiga.

Kandi ku murangire muti: Nitwesiga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, tiwe ogwo ou Hezekia yaihireho emyanya ye mikuru ey'okuramizamu n'amatambiro ge, naagira Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu ati: Mushemereire kuramiza omu maisho g'eri itambiro eriri Yerusaalemu?
Mbwenu ija okwatirizane na mukama wangye omugabe wa Asiria. Nkuhe embaraasi enkumi ibiri; ku oraabone ab'okuzitemba, ongire kwo!
Noija kubaasa ota kubinga omwe aha bakuru bangye b'engabo ab'amaani makye okukira abandi, ku oraabe oyesigire Misri kuba nibo baakuha ebigaari n'ab'aha mbaraasi?
Kandi noogira ngu nyizire kuteera omwanya ogu n'okugucwekyereza ntaragiirwe MUKAMA? Omanye ngu MUKAMA niwe angambiire ati: Inamuka, oteere egyo nsi, ogicwekyereze.

Bwanyima Eliakimu mwene Hilukia na Shebuna na Yoa baagira omutware Rabushaake bati: Twakweshengyereza, gamba n'abairu baawe omu rurimi rw'Abasiria; ahakuba itwe niturumanya; reka kugamba omu rurimi rw'Abayuda, abantu abari ha rugo rw'amabaare babihuriire.

Kwonka omutware Rabushaake yaabagarukamu ati: Nimugira ngu mukama wangye antumire ahari mukama waanyu naimwe kuba niimwe naagambira ebigambo ebi mwenka? Tantumire kubigambira n'abashaija bariya abashutami aha rugo, abarikwija kurya naimwe amazi gaabo, n'okunywa naimwe enkari yaabo?
Ahonaaho omutware Rabushaake yaayemerera, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango omu rurimi rw'Abayuda, naagira ati: Muhurire obutumwa bw'omugabe rugambwa, omugabe wa Asiria.
Oku nikwo omugabe arikugamba naagira ati: Mutaikiriza Hezekia kubabeiha; ahabw'okuba tarikwija kubaasa kubajuna abaihe omu mikono yangye.
Mutaikiriza Hezekia kubeesigisa MUKAMA naabagira ati: Buzimazima MUKAMA naija kutujuna, kandi orurembo oru tirurikwija kuheebwayo mu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria.

Mutahurira Hezekia; ahakuba oku nikwo omugabe wa Asiria arikugamba naagira ati: Mugarukane naanye; mwije munshangye aha; obwo buri omwe omuriimwe nibwo araarye aha muzaabibu gwe, akarya aha mutiini gwe, kandi akanywa amaizi g'omu iziba rye,

okuhitsya obu ndiija, nkabatwra omu nsi erikushushana n'eyaanyu, ensi y'engano na viinyo, ey'emigaati n'emizaabibu, kandi ey'emizeituuni n'obwoki, mukabona kugumaho, mutafe. N'ahabw'ekyo mutahurira Hezekia orikubabeihabeiha naabagira ati: MUKAMA naija kutujuna.
Nimugira ngu hariho ruhanga omuri baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga orajunire ensi ye omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria?
Mbwenu baaruhanga ba Hamasi na Arupaadi barahi? na baaruhanga ba Sefavaimu, ba Hena n'aba Iiva barahi? Barajunire Samaria omu mikono yangye?
Ni baahi omuri baaruhanga boona ab'ezo nsi abarajunire ensi yaabo omu mikono yangye, mukabona kwesiga ku MUKAMA arikwija kwiha Yerusaalemu omu mijono yangye?
Abantu baahunama, tibaagira ki baamugarukamu, ahabw'okuba ekiragiro ky'omugabe kikaba nikigira kiti: Mutamugarukamu.

Bwanyima Eliakimu mwene Hilukia omukuru w'ekikaari, na Shebuna omuhandiiki, na Yoa mwene Asafu omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho baija ahari Hezekia bataagwire ebijwaro byabo, baamuteekyerereza ebigambo bya Rabushaake.
Yaatuma Eliakimu omukuru w'ekikaari na Shebuna omuhandiiki n'abanyamurwa abakuru ahari nabi Isaaya mwene Amozi bajwaire ebiguniya.
Baamugira bati: Oku nikwo Hezekia arikugamba naagira ati: Eri izooba n'eizooba ry'obusaasi n'okuhanwa n'okuteererwa enaku, ahakuba abaana bahikire kuzaarwa, kwona amaani g'okubazaara tigariho.

Shana MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ahuriire ebigambo byona ebigambirwe Rabushaake, ou mukama we omugabe wa Asiria atumire kugaya Ruhanga otahwaho, obundi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akaamuhana ahabw'ebigambo ebyo ebi ahuriire; na'ahabw'ekyo imutsya eiraka ryawe oshabire abantu abakiriho abaahonokireho.
Abaheereza b'omugabe Hezekia ku baahikire owa Isaaya,
Isaaya yaabagira ati: Mugambire mukama waanyu muti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Otatiina ebyo bigambo bi ohuriire, ebi abaheereza b'omugabe wa Asiria banjumire.
Reeba, niinyija kumutamu ogundi mutima, ahurire orukuru, agarukye omu nsi ye; kandi ku araahikyeyo, mmwitse rurara.
Bwanyima Rabushaake yaagarukayo, yaashanga omugabe wa Asiria naarwanisa Libuna; ahabw'okuba akaba ahuriire ku arugire Lakishi.
Omugabe ku yaahuriire ebya Tiruhaaka omugabe wa Esiopia nibagira ngu, Reeba aizire kukuteera, yaagaruka yaatuma ahari Hezekia naagira ati:
Mwirooko mugire Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda muti: Otaikiriza Ruhanga waawe ogwo ou orikwesiga kukubeiha naakuraganisa ati: Yerusaalemu teriheebwayo mu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria.
Reeba, ohuriire oku abagabe ba Asiria baagizire ensi zoona, bakazicwekyerereza kimwe. Noogira ngu niiwe orikwija kukira?
Amahanga aga, Gozani, Harani, Rzefu, n'ab'omuri Edeni abaabaire batwire Telasaari, agu baatatenkuru baacwekyereize, noogira ngu baaruhanga baago bakagajuna?
Nyoreka omugabe wa Hamasi, n'owa Arupaadi, n'ow'orurembo Sefavaimu, n'owa Hena, n'owa Iiva!

Hezekia yaashabira omu maisho ga MUKAMA naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, otuura aha kitebe ky'obukama ahagati ya baakerubi, Iwe wenka niiwe Ruhanga ow'obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi; niiwe waahangire eiguru n'ensi.
MUKAMA, tega okutu kwawe, ohurire; igura amaisho gaawe, ai MUKAMA, oreebe; ohurire ebigambo ebi Senakeribu atumire kurogota ahari Ruhanga otahwaho.
N'ekya buzima, MUKAMA, abagabe ba Asiria bakacwekyereza abantu b'ago mahanga n'ensi zaabo,
baanaga baaruhanga baabo omu muriro, ahabw'okuba bakaba batari baaruhanga nyamuhanga, kureka bakaba bakozirwe engaro z'abantu omu biti n'omu mabaare; nikyo baabacwekyerereize.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, ninkweshengyereza otujune, otwihe omu mikono ye, obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi, ai MUKAMA, bumanye ku niiwe wenka oba Ruhanga.

Bwanyima Isaaya mwene Amozi yaatuma ahari Hezekia naagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Nk'oku onshabire kukuhwera aha bya Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria, naakwikiriza.
Eki nikyo kigambo eki MUKAMA amugambirieho naagira ati:
Omwishiki wa Saayuuni otakamanyaga mushaija
Naakugaya, naakushekyerera;
Kandi Yerusaalemu neekuzongoreza omutwe.
Kandi ou okabukiire, okateera ekitsyori n'oha?
N'Orikwera wa Israeli!
Noogira oti: Nyinamukire n'ebigaari byangye bingi
Aha mitwe y'enshozi,
Hare munonga ahagati ya Lebanooni.
Niinyija kutema emyereezi yaayo emiraingwa,
N'emiberooshi yaayo emirungi munonga;
Niinyija kuhika omu bweshereko bwayo hare munonga,
Omu kibira kyayo ekikwataine.
Naanywa amaizi gaago;
Naaribatiirira emigyera ya Misiri yoona,
Naagyomya.
Omu biro bya ira nkacuma enaama y'okukora
Ebi ndikuhikiiriza omu biro ebi,
Ngu ocwekyereze endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare,
Ozihindure amatongo.
Bakahahaaza omutima, bakarimbagirirwa,
Bakaba nk'obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa,
Nk'obunyaatsi buto,
Bakahotoka nk'obunyaatsi obumezire aha mutwe gw'enju,
Nk'engano ezooma zitakakuzire.
Kwonka nimmanya emishutamire yaawe,
Emihururire yaawe, n'emitabaarukire yaawe,
Kandi n'ekiniga eki wangiriire.
Kandi nkahurira eby'amaryo gaawe,
Niinyija kukuta eirobo ryangye omu nyindo,
N'ekyoma kyangye omu kanwa,
Nkugarure omuhanda ogwakureetsire.
Abatsigaire aha b'enju ya Yuda abaahonokireho baryagaruka batsimbe emizi okuzimu, n'ahaiguru baane ebyana;
ahakuba omuri Yerusaalemu haryarugamu ekicweka ekiriba kitsigaireho, n'aha rushozi Saayuuni harugyeho omutwe gw'abahonokireho. Obweziriki bwa MUKAMA buryakihikiiriza.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugambira aha mugabe wa Asiria naagira ati: Tarihika muri oru rurembo, nari okurwemurikira omumaisho aine engabo ye, n'obu kwakuba okurutuumaho omutuumo gw'eitaka.
Omuhanda ogwamureetsire nigwo gurimugarurayo; kandi taritaaha muri oru rurembo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira;
ahakuba ndyarinda oru rurembo, ndujune ahabwangye, n'ahabw'omwiru wangye Daudi.
Bwanyima Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria yaarugayo, yaagaruka Nineeve, yaatuurayo.

Ku yaabaire ari omuri nyaruju ya ruhanga we Nisirooki naamuramya, Adurameleki na Sharezeeri abatabani baija baamwitsa rurara, baacwa, baahungira omu nsi ya Araraati. Esari-hadooni omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Ahonaaho Hezekia yaahinduka, yaareba ekisiika, yaashaba MUKAMA naagira ati:
Ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza, mbwenu ijuka oku ngyendeire omu maisho gaawe omu bwesigwa n'omutima oguhikire, ninkora ebi orikusiima. Yaarira munonga.
Kwonka Isaaya ku yaabaire atakashohoire kuruga omu kibuga ky'ahagati omu kikaari, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyamwijaho nikigira kiti:

Garukayo, ogambire Hezekia omukuru w'abantu bangye oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Daudi shwenkuru, arikugamba naagira ati: Naahurira okushaba kwawe, kandi naareeba n'amarira gaawe. Reeba, niinyija kukukiza; aha kiro kya kashatu oinamukye omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Kandi ndyayongyera aha biro byawe emyaka ikumi n'etaano. Ndyakujuna, iwe n'oru rurembo, omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria, kandi ndurinde ahabwangye, n'ahabw'omwiru wangye Daudi.
Isaaya yaagira ati: Mureete ekitongye ky'emitiini. Baakireeta, baakibatika aha kizimba eki yaabaire arwaire, yaakira.
Obwo Hezekia akaba yaabuurize Isaaya ati: Ni kamanyiso ki akarikworeka ku MUKAMA arikwija kuntambira, kandi ku ndikwija kwinamuka omu nju ya MUKAMA aha kiro kya kashatu?

Isaaya yaamugarukamu ati: Aka niko kamanyiso aku MUKAMA yaakuha, akarikuhamya ku arikwija kuhikiiriza eki yaagamba. Nooyenda ngu ekicuucu kigyende omumaisho entambwe ikumi, nari kigarukye enyima entambwe ikumi?
Hezekia yaamugarukamu ati: Nikirahuka ekicuucu kugyenda omumaisho entambwe ikumi; haakiri kigarukye enyima ezo ntambwe ikumi.
Atyo nabi Isaaya yaashaba MUKAMA; nawe yaagarura ekicuucu enyima entambwe ikumi okuruga ahu kyabaire kyahika aha ky'okugyeresa kya Ahazi.

Hezekia yaazaakiira n'okushemererwa, yaazooreka enju ye yoona omu abiika ebintu bye eby'obuguzi bwingi, efeeza, ezaabu, emigaju, amajuta ag'obuguzi bwingi, n'ahu abiika eby'okurwanisa bye, n'ebyashangirwe omu mabiikiro ge byona; tihariho kintu kyona omu nju ye nari omu bugabe bwe bwona, eki atarazoorekire.
Bwanyima nabi Isaaya yaija aha mugabe Hezekia, yaamugira ati: Abashaija abo bagambire ki? kandi baizire owaawe nibaruga hi? Hezekia yaagira ati: Barugire omu nsi ya hare Babulooni.
Onu ati: Bareebire ki omwawe? Hezekia yaagira ati: Byona ebiri omwangye babireebire; tihariho kintu kyona omu mabiikiro gangye eki ntaboorekire.
Isaaya yaagira Hezekia ati: Mbwenu hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Reeba, obunaku buryahika, ebintu by'omu nju yaawe byona, n'ebi baashwenkuru baabiikire okuhitsya hati, bitwarwe Babulooni, harekye kugira ekyatsigaraho, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Kandi bamwe ahari batabani baawe, abu oriba oyezaariire, baryatwarwa, bahindukye abakonwa omu kikaari ky'omugabe wa Babulooni.
Bwanyima Hezekia yaagira Isaaya ati: Ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki waagamba ni kirungi. Ahakuba akagira ati: Mbwenu shi ti kirungi, ku haraabe nihaija kubaho obusingye n'obuhooro omu biro byangye?
Bwanyima Hezekia yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru; Manaase omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Kwonka yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, naatooreza emicwe erikunugwa ey'abanyamahanga abu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli;

ahabwo'okuba akagaruka yaayombeka zaanyaruju z'omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu ezi Hezekia ishe yaabaire asheenyire; yaayombekyera Baali amatambiro, yaakora Ashera nk'oku Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli yaabaire akora, kandi yaaguma naaramya eihe ryona ery'omu iguru, naariheereza.
Kandi yaayombeka amatambiro omu nju ya MUKAMA, ei MUKAMA yaabaire agambireho ati: Omuri Yerusaalemu nimwo ndita eiziina ryangye.
Kandi yaayombekyera eihe ryona ery'omu iguru amatambiro omu bikaari byombi eby'enju ya MUKAMA.
Yaarabya omutabani omu muriro, yaaguma naakora eby'okumanyisa ebiribaho n'okuragura, kandi yaaraguza aha barikugambisa emizimu n'abarogi. Yaakora ebibi bingi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaamugwisa kubi.

Yaata ekishushani kya Ashera ekibaizire omu nju ei MUKAMA yaagambiire Daudi n'omutabani Sulemaani ati: Omu nju egi n'omuri Yerusaalemu ebi naatooraine omu nganda zoona eza Israeli, nimwo ndita eiziina ryangye kugumamu ebiro byona;
kandi Abaisraeli ku barita omutima aha kworobera ebi naabaragiire byona, n'ebi omwiru wangye Musa yaabaragiire, tindigaruka kubazengyereza kubaiha omu nsi ei naahaire baishenkurubo.
Kwonka tibaahurira, kandi Manaase yaababeihabeiha kukora ebibi ebirikukira obubi ebi amahanga gaakozire agu MUKAMA yaacwekyerereize omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagamba naaraba omu bairu be baanabi ati:
Ahabwa Manaase omugabe wa Yuda kukora ebirikunugwa ebyo, akakora ebibi ebirikukira obubi ebi Abaamori abaamubandiize baakozire byona, akasiisisa Abayuda ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa;
nikyo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugambira naagira ati: Reeba, naaza kureeta akabi ahari Yerusaalemu na Yuda aku omuntu weena araahurire amatu gakateera enduuru.
Ndyagyeresa Yerusaalemu akagoye nk'aku naagyereise Samaria, na kariisho ei naashwijumiise enju ya Ahabu; kandi ndyaragaza Yerusaalemu, nk'oku omuntu aragaza eshuhaani, akagijuumika.
Ndyanaga ekicweka ekitsigaire aha buhunguzi bwangye, mbaheyo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo, bahindukye omuhiigo n'omunyago aharibo,
ahakuba bakozire ebi ndikwanga, bangwisa kubi okwiha obu baishenkurubo baaruga Misri n'okuhitsya hati.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Manaase, n'ebi yaakozire byona, n'ekibi eki yaakozire, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Manaase yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu musiri gw'aha nju ye, ogwa Uzza; Amoni omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Amoni akaba aine emyaka makumi abiri n'ebiri obu yaatandika kutegyeka, yaategyekyera emyaka ebiri omuri Yerusaalemus Nyina akaba naayetwa Meshulemeesi, muhara wa Haruzi owa Yotiba.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA nka Manaase ishe.
Yaagyendera omu muhanda gwona ogu ishe yaagyendeiremu, yaaheereza ebishushani ebi ishe yaaheereize, kandi yaabiramya;
yaimuura MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkuru, tiyaagyendera mu mihanda ye.
Bwanyima abaheereza b'omugabe Amoni baamugirira enaama, baamwitira omu nju ye.
Kwonka abantu b'omuri egyo nsi baita abamugiriire enaama boona, baata omutabani Yosia aha ngoma omu mwanya gwe.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Amoni ei yaakozire, tehandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Yaaziikwa omu kituuro kye omu musiri gwa Uzza; Yosia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA naagyendera omu muhanda gwa Daudi ishenkuru, tiyaateishuka kutoora aha rubaju rwa buryo nari rwa bumosho.
Omu mwaka gwa ikumi na munaana gw'omu busingye gw'omugabe Yosia, akatuma Shafani, mwene Azaliya mwijukuru wa Meshulaamu omuhandiiki, omu nju ya MUKAMA, yaamugira ati:
Inamuka oze owa Hilukia omunyamurwa omukuru, omugambire abare empiiha ezireetsirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA, ezi abarinzi b'eirembo bashoroize omu bantu,
bazihe abarikureeberera enju ya MUKAMA, nabo bazihe abakozi abari omu nju ya MUKAMA abarikugihunduura ahi esiisikaire,
nibo babaizi, abombeki n'abarikwombekyesa amabaare; kandi ezindi zibe ez'okugura embaaho n'amabaare agahigwire eby'okuhunduuza enju.
Kandi ezo mpiiha ezi baabaire babaha, bakaba batababuuza oku zikoresiibwe; ahabw'okuba bakaba bazikoresa n'obwesigwa.
Bwanyima Shafani omuhandiiki yaija ow'omugabe, yaamugambira ati: Abairu baawe baihire omu nju ya MUKAMA empiiha ezishangirwemu; baaziha abarikugireeberera.
Shafani omuhandiiki yaagaruka yaagira omugabe ati: Hilukia omunyamurwa yampa ekitabo. Atyo Shafani yaakimushomera.
Omugabe ku yaahuriire ebigambo by'omu kitabo ky'Ebiragiro, yaataagura ebijwaro bye.
Ahonaaho yaaragiira Hilukia omunyamurwa, Ahikaamu mwene Shafani, Akiboora mwene Mikaaya, Shafani omuhandiiki na Asaaya omugaragwa w'omugabe, naagira ati:

Mwirooko muhanuuze ahari MUKAMA ahabwangye n'abantu bangye kandi na Yuda yoona eby'ebigambo by'ekitabo eki ekizoirwe; ahakuba ekiniga kya Ruhanga ekituriho ni kingi munonga, ahabw'okuba baatatenkuriitwe tibaroorobeire bigambo by'eki kitabo, okukora ebyahandiikirwe byona ebirikutukwataho.
Yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Mugambire omushaija obantumireho muti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyareeta akabi aha mwanya ogu n'aha batuuzi baamwo, nk'ebigambo byona ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo eki omugabe wa Yuda ashomire oku biri.

Ahabw'okuba bakaanyimuura, baayoterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane, ngu bangwise kubi n'ebi baakozire n'emikono yaabo byona, n'ahabw'ekyo ekiniga kyangye kiryayaka aha mwanya ogu, kandi tikiriraazibwa.
Kwonka omugabe wa Yuda obatumire kuhanuuza ahari MUKAMA, mumugire muti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Ebirikukwata aha bigambo ebi ohuriire,

ahabw'okugira omutima gworobi, ku ohuriire ebi ngambire aha mwanya ogu n'aha batuuzi baamwo, ku barihinduka amatongo n'omukyeeno, waayecureeza omu maisho ga MUKAMA, waataagura ebijwaro byawe, waaririra omu maisho gangye, n'ahabw'ekyo naanye nkuhuriire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Reeba nikyo ndikusaangisiza baashwenkuru, okaziikwa omu kituuro kyawe n'obusingye, kandi amaisho gaawe tigarireeba kabi koona aku ndireeta aha mwanya ogu. Batyo baagaruka, baabiteekyerereza omugabe.

Omugabe yainamuka omu nju ya MUKAMA hamwe n'abashaija b'omuri Yuda boona, abatuuzi b'omuri Yerusaalemu boona, abanyamurwa, na baanabi, abantu boona abakuru n'abato; yaabashomera ebigambo byona eby'omu kitabo ky'endagaano ekizoirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Omugabe yaayemerera aha rubaju rw'enyomyo, yaaragaana endagaano omu maisho ga MUKAMA, naaraganisa kumukuratira, okworobera ebiragiro bye, n'ebi yaahamize, n'ebi yaataireho, n'omutima gwe gwona n'amagara ge goona, kandi n'okuhikiiriza ebigambo by'omuri egyo ndagaano ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo ekyo; n'abantu boona baakwatanisa nawe omuri egyo ndagaano.

Yaabinga abanyamurwa b'ebishushani ebirikuramibwa ebyatairweho abagabe ba Yuda kuguma nibabyoterera obubaane omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu ey'omu ndembo za Yuda n'eyeehinguririize Yerusaalemu; kandi yaabinga n'abandi abaabaire nibooterera Baali obubaane, n'eizooba n'okwezi n'eigana ry'enyonyoozi n'eihe ryona ery'omu iguru.

Kandi yaiha Ashera omu nju ya MUKAMA, yaagitwara aheeru ya Yerusaalemu aha kagyera Kidirooni, yaagyokyezaho, yaagihondahonda, yaagicwa omucuucu, ogwo mucuucu yaagushuka aha bituuro by'abantu b'obutoosha.
Kandi yaasheenya amaju ga baamaraya agaabaire gari omu nju ya MUKAMA, ahu abakazi baabaire barukira enyegamo z'okukingira Ashera.

Yaiha abanyamurwa boona omu ndembo za Yuda, yaashiisha emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, ahu abanyamurwa baabaire booterera obubaane, okuruga Geeba okuhika Beerisheba; yaasheenya zaanyaruju z'emyanya mikuru eyaabaire eri aha irembo ahu orikutaahira nooza omu nju ya Yoshua omukru w'orurembo, emyanya egyo ekaba eri aha rubaju rwa bumosho rw'eryo irembo.
Kwonka abanyamurwa b'emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu tibainamuka ha itambiro rya MUKAMA omuri Yerusaalemu, kureka baaguma nibariira emigaati etatumbisiibwe omuri bagyenzi baabo.
Kandi yaashiisha Tofesi ey'omu ruhanga rwa beene Hinoomu, ngu hatagira omuntu weena owaarabya omutabani nari muhara we omu muriro kumutambira Moleki.

Yaihaho ebishushani by'embaraasi, ebi abagabe ba Yuda baabaire bahongyeire eizooba, ebyabaire biri ahu orikutaahira nooza omu nju ya MUKAMA, haihi n'ekishengye kya Nasani-meleki omukuru w'enju ekyabaire kihereraine na hekalu; yaayotsya n'ebigaari by'eizooba.

Kandi amatambiro agaabaire gari aha mutwe gw'ekishengye kya Ahazi eki abagabe ba Yuda baayombekire, n'amatambiro agu Manaase yaabaire akozire omu bikaari bibiri eby'enju ya MUKAMA, yaagahanantura, yaagatuura ahansi, yaagasheenyagura, omucuucu gwago yaagunaga omu kagyera Kidirooni.

Kandi omugabe yaashiisha emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu eyaabaire eri aha burugwa-izooba bwa Yerusaalemu, aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'akabungo k'eijundiro, ei Sulemaani omugabe wa Israeli yaabaire ayombekyeire Ashitaroosi ekirikunugwa ky'Abasidoni, na Kemoshi ekirikunugwa ky'Abamoabu, na Milikomu ekririkunugwa ky'Abaamoni.
Yaasheenyagura enyomyo, yaatema ebishushani bya Ashera, kandi omu myanya yaabyo yaijuzamu amagufar g'abantu.

Yosia ku yaahindukire ati, yaareeba ebituuro hangahari aha kabungo; yaatuma, baiha amagufa omuri ebyo bituuro, yaagookyeza aha itambiro, yaarishiisha nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki omushaija wa Ruhanga ori yaarangire naaragura oku kyabaire kiri.

Bwanyima yaagira ati: Kiriya kiijutsyo eki ndikureeba obuseeri n'eky'enki? Abashaija b'omuri orwo rurembo baamugarukamu bati: N'ekituuro ky'omushaija wa Ruhanga owaarugire Yuda, akaragura ahari ebi ebi waakora eri itambiro.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Mumurekye; hatagira owaaziikuura amagufa ge. Batyo baareka amagufa ge hamwe n'aga nabi owaarugire Samaria.

Kandi zaanyaruju zoona ez'omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu ey'omu ndembo za Samaria, ezaabaire zombekirwe abagabe ba Israeli nibagwisa kubi MUKAMA, Yosia yaazigira nk'ebi yaagizire nyaruju ya Beseeli byona oku byabaire biri.
Kandi abanyamurwa b'egyo myanya mikuru boona abaabaire bariyo, yaabaitira aha matambiro, yaayokyezaho n'amagufa g'abantu. Bwanyima yaagaruka Yerusaalemu.
Buzimazima okwiha omu biro by'abaramuzi abaabaire bacwera Abaisraeli emanja n'omu biro byona eby'abagabe ba Israeli n'aba Yuda; tihakabahoga bungyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho oburikushusha nk'obwo;
kureka omu mwaka gwa ikumi na munaana ogw'omu busingye bw'omugabe Yosia nibwo baakorera MUKAMA obugyenyi obwo omuri Yerusaalemu.

Omu bagabe boona abaamubandiize tihaine owaashushaine nawe, owaahindukiire MUKAMA n'omutima gwe gwona, n'amagara ge goona, n'amaani ge goona, nk'ebiragiro bya Musa byona oku biri; kandi n'omu baamukuratiire tihaine waashushaine nawe.

Ekyarugiremu MUKAMA yaagira ati: Ndyaiha Abayuda omu maisho gangye, nk'oku naihiremu Abaisraeli, kandi nyogye oru rurembo Yerusaalemu oru naatooraine, n'enju ei naagizire nti: Nimwo eiziina ryangye ririguma.
Nbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yosia n'ebi yaakozire byona, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Kandi omu busingye bwe Faraho Neeko omugabe wa Misri akainamuka aha mugyera Furaati kurwanisa omugabe wa Asiria; omugabe Yosia nawe yaaza kumurwanisa. Faraho Neeko ku yaamureebire, yaamwitira Megido.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi baishenkuru baakozire byona.

Bwanyima Faraho Neeko yaamubohera Ribula omu nsi ya Hamasi, ngu arekye kuguma Yerusaalemu aha ngoma, n'abantu b'omuri egyo nsi yaabacwera omutoijo gw'etalanta z'efeeza igana, n'etalanta emwe y'ezaabu.
Faraho Neeko yaagira Eliakimu mwene Yosia omugabe omu mwanya gwa ishe, yaahindura eiziina rye, yaamweta Yehoyakimu; kandi yaihayo Yehoahazi; Yehoahazi ogwo ku yaahikire Misri, yaagwayo.

Yehoyakimu yaaha Faraho ezo feeza n'ezaabu; kwonka yaacwera ensi omushoro, ngu bareete empiiha nk'ekiragiro kya Faraho oku kyabaire kiri. Yaashoroza efeeza n'ezaabu aha bantu b'omuri egyo nsi, buri muntu nk'oku yaabaire acwereirwe, kubiha Faraho Neeko.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA nk'ebi baishenkuru baakozire byona.
MUKAMA yaamwoherereza emitwe y'engabo z'Abakaludaaya, n'ez'Abasiria, n'ez'Abamoabu kandi n'ez'Abaamoni, ngu bateere Yuda bagicwekyereze, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire naaraba omu bairu be baanabi.
Buzimazima ekyo kikaba ahari Yuda ahabw'ekiragiro kya MUKAMA, ngu abone kubaiha omu maisho ge, naabatura ebibi bya Manaase nk'oku yaabikozire byona,
kandi n'eshagama y'abataine rubanja ei yaaseesire; ahabw'okuba akagiijuza Yerusaalemu, n'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaayanga kubimusaasira.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Yehoyakimu n'ebi yaakozire byona tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Yuda?
Bwanyima Yehoyakimu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, Yehoyakiini omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.

Kandi omugabe wa Misri taragarukire kuruga mu nsi ye, ahakuba omugabe wa Babulooni akaba akubwire ensi yoona eyaabaire eri ey'omugabe wa Misri, okuruga aha kagyera ka Misri okuhika aha mugyera Furaati.
Nawe yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi ishe yaakozire byona.
Omu biro ebyo abashaija ba Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni bakainamuka, baateera Yerusaalemu, baagota orurembo.
Bwanyima Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yaijayo, abashaija be bakirugotsire.

Yehoyakiini omugabe wa Yuda yaashohora, yaayehayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni, we na nyina n'abagaragwa be n'abanyiginya be, n'abakuru b'ekikaari kye. Ogwo mugabe wa Babulooni omu mwaka gwe gwa munaana nibwo yaakwata Yehoyakiini, akamutwara ari enkwatwa,

kandi yaanyaga eby'obutungi by'omu nju ya MUKAMA byona n'eby'omu nju y'omgabe, yaatematema ebintu by'ezaabu byona eby'omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA ebi Sulemaani omugabe wa Israeli yaakozire, nk'oku MUKAMA yaabaire agambire.

Kandi yaatwara ab'omuri Yerusaalemu boona bari enkwatwa n'abanyiginya boona, n'amamanzi goona ag'amaani; enkwatwa zoona hamwe n'abanyamyoga boona n'abaheesi zaaba kakumi; tihaagira owaatsigarayo, kureka abantu abarikuhereerukayo omu bworo bonka omuri egyo nsi.
Atyo yaatwara Yehoyakiini Babulooni; na nyin'omugabe, n'abakazi be n'abatware be n'abakuru b'ensi ye, yaabaiha Yerusaalemu, yaabatwara Babulooni bari enkwatwa.
Abashaija boona amamanzi enkumi mushanju, abanyamyoga hamwe n'abaheesi rukumi, boona ab'amaani abarikumanya eby'engamba, omugabe wa Babulooni yaabatwara Babulooni bari enkwatwa.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA nk'ebi Yehoyakiini yaakozire byona oku byabaire biri.
Ahakuba ekiniga kya MUKAMA kikaba kingi munonga ahari Yerusaalemu na Yuda, okuhitsya obu yaababingiire kimwe omu maisho ge. Bwanyima Zedekia yaagomera omugabe wa Babulooni.
Batyo baagota orwo rurembo okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe ogw'omu busingye bwa Zedekia.
Aha kiro kya mwenda omu kwezi kwa kana enjara yaaba nyingi munonga omuri orwo rurembo, abantu baamwo baabura eky'okurya.

Bwanyima Abakaludaaya baafumura orugo rw'orurembo. Ahonaaho omugabe Zedekia n'engabo ze zoona baacwa ekyo kiro, baaraba omu irembo eryabaire riri haihi n'omusiri gw'omugabe ahagati y'engo zaagwo zombi, baatoora ogurikuza Araba. (Obwo Abakaludaaya bagotsire orurembo embaju zoona).
Kwonka eihe ry'Abakaludaaya ryakurata omugabe, ryamuhikira omu mpita za Yeriko, engabo ze zoona zaamuhungaho, zaataataana.
Batyo baakwata ogwo mugabe, baamureetera omugabe wa Babulooni ahari Ribula, yaamucwera orubanja.
Baitira batabani ba Zedekia ogwo omu maisho ge, bwanyima nawe baamwihamu amaisho, baamukoma n'emihama, baamutwara Babulooni.
Yaayotsya enju ya MUKAMA n'enju y'omugabe n'amaju goona ag'omuri Yerusaalemu; buri nju yoona empango yaagyotsya.
Eihe ryona ey'Abakaludaaya, abaizire n'omukuru w'abarinzi, baasheenya engo z'amabaare ezaabaire zeehinguririize Yerusaalemu.

Bwanyima abantu abaabaire batsigaire omu rurembo, n'abaabaire baimwire omugabe waabo beehongyeire omugabe wa Babulooni, n'abandi bantu b'obutoosha, abo boona Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaabatawara bari enkwatwa.
Kwonka yaatsigamu abantu bamwe abarikuhereerukayo kuba abooro kuguma nibasharira emizaabibu kandi n'ab'okuhinga.
Kandi baatwara enyungu n'ebyoma by'okuyooza eiju, na makansi, n'enyabya z'obubaane, n'ebindi bintu by'emiringa byona ebyabaire bikoresibwa omu murimo gwa hekalu,
n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro, n'enyabya. Ebintu ebyabaire bikozire omu zaabu omukuru w'abarinzi yaabitwara biri efeeza.
Enyomyo zombi ziri, n'ekitanka, n'ebitebe ebi Sulemaani yaakoreire enju ya MUKAMA, emiringa y'ebyo bintu byona ekaba erengire ekigyero.

Obwemi bw'enyomyo emwe bukaba buri mikono ikumi na munaana, kandi eriho omutwe gw'emiringa, obwemi bwagwo mikono eshatu; omutwe ogwo gwehinguririziibwe otugoye tw'emiringa otushobeekaine nk'akatimba, n'ebishushani by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga, byona biri eby'emiringa; kandi enyomyo ya kabiri ekaba eine nk'ebyo, nabyo biriho akatimba.

kandi omu rurembo yaihamu omutware owaabaire ari omukuru w'engabo, n'abashaija bataano abaabaire bari bamwe aha bashaija empikamugabe abaashangirwe omu rurembo, n'omuhandiiki w'omukuru w'eihe, owaabaire ahuruza engabo z'omuri egyo nsi, n'abashaija makumi mukaaga b'omu bantu b'obutoosha abaashangirew omu rurembo.
Atyo Nebuzaradaani ogwo, omukuru w'abarinzi, yaabakukumba, yaabatwara Ribula aha mugabe wa Babulooni.
Omugabe wa Babulooni yaabateera, yaabaitira Ribula omu nsi ya Hamasi. Okwo nikwo Abayuda baihirwe omu nsi yaabo, bakatwarwa bari enkwatwa.

Banyima abakuru b'engabo boona hamwe n'engabo zaabo, ku baahuriire ngu omugabe wa Babulooni ataireho Gedalia kuba omutegyeki, baija Mizipa, ahu yaabaire ari n'engabo zaabo; haija Ishimaeli mwene Nesania, Yohanaani mwene Yanihumeesi owa Netofa, na Yazania mutabani w'omushaija wa Maaka.
Gedalia yaabarahira n'abashaija baabo naagira ati: Mutatiina abakuru b'Abakaludaaya; mugume omuri egi nsi, mukorere omugabe wa Babulooni, nimwija kuba gye.

Kwonka omu kwezi kwa mushanju Ishimaeli mwene Nesania, mwijukuru wa Elishaama ow'omuryango gw'omugabe, yaija n'abashaija ikumi, baarwanisa Gedalia, baamwita hamwe n'Abayudaaya n'Abakaludaaya abu yaabaire aine Mizipa.
Ahonaaho abantu boona, abakuru n'abato, n'abo bakuru b'engabo, baimuka, baahungira Misri ahabw'okutiina Abakaludaaya.
yaagamba gye nawe, yaamuha ekitebe ekirikukira eby'abandi bagabe abaabaire bari hamwe nawe Babulooni.
Atyo Yehoyakiini yaajuura ebijwaro by'ekihome. Okuruga aho yaaguma naariira aha meeza y'omugabe ebiro bye byona;
kandi eby'okumutunga omugabe yaaguma naabimuha, buri izooba naamuha omugabo gwaryo, ebiro byona ebi yaamazire akihuriire.
Kenani, Mahalaleeli, Yaredi,
Enoka, Mesuseela, Lameka,
Noa, Sheemu, Haamu, Yafeesi.
Batabani ba Yafeesi: Gomeri, Magogi, Madai, Yavani, Tubali, Mesheki na Tiraasi.
Batabani ba Gomeri: Ashikenaazi, Difaasi, Toguruma.
Batabani ba Yavani: Elisha, Tarushiishi, Kitimu na Rodanimu.
Batabani ba Kuushi: Seeba, Havila, Sabuta, Raama, na Sabuteeka. Batabani ba Raama: Sheeba na Dedani.
Kuushi yaazaara Nimuroodi; yaaba niwe yaabandize kuba ow'amaani rugambwa omu nsi.
Patirusimu, Kasiluhimu, ou Abafilistia baakomookireho, na Kafutorimu.
Kanaani yaajigaija Sidoni, bwanyima yaazaara Heesi,
kandi yaakomookwamu Abayebusi, Abaamori Abagirugashi,
Abahiivi, Abaaruki, Abasiini,
Abaarivadi, Abazemari, n'Abahamasi.
Arufakisaadi yaazaara Sheela, Sheela yaazaara Eberi.
Eberi yaazaara aboojo babiri, omwe akaba naayetwa Pelegi, ahabw'okuba omu biro bye ensi nibwo yaabaganisibwa, kandi eiziina ry'omurumuna akaba ari Yokitaani.
Yokitaani yaazaara Alimodaadi, Shelefu, Hazarimaveesi, Yeera,
Hadoramu, Uzali, Dikila,
Ebali, Abimaeli, Sheeba,
Ofiri, Havila na Yobabu; abo boona bakaba bari batabani ba Yokitaani.
Eberi, Pelegi, Reu,
Serugi, Nahori, Teera,
Abraamu niwe Abarahamu.
Oru nirwo ruzaaro rwabo; omujigaijo gwa Ishimaeli, Nebayoosi, yaakuratwa Kedari, Adubeeli, Mibusaamu,
Mishuma, Duuma, Maasa, Hadadi, Teema,
Yeturi, Nafishi, na Kedema. Abo nibo batabani ba Ishimaeli.
Batabani ba Ketura, ekinyashunju kya Abarahamu, akazaara Zimuraani, Yokishaani, Medani, Midiani, Ishibaaki na Shua. Batabani ba Yokishaani, Sheeba na Dedani.
Batabani ba Midiani: Eefa, Eferi, Hanoki, Abida, na Eludaya, abo boona bakaba bari batabani ba Ketura.
Batabani ba Esau: Elifaazi, Reueli, Yerushi, Yalamu na Koora.
Batabani ba Elifaazi: Temani, Omari, Zeefi, Gatamu, Kenazi, Timuna, na Amaleki.
Batabani ba Reueli: Nahasi, Zeera, Shama na Miiza.
Batabani ba Lotani: Hoori, na Homamu; munyaanya wa Lotani akaba ari Timuna.
Batabani ba Shobali: Alivani, Manahaasi, Ebali, Sheefi na Onamu. Batabani ba Zibeoni: Aaya na Aana.
Mutabani wa Aana: Dishoni. Batabani ba Dishoni: Hamuraani, Eshibaani, Isuraani, na Keraani.
Batabani ba Ezeeri: Biluhaani, Zaavani, na Yakani. Batabani ba Dishoni: Uuzi na Arani.
Aba nibo bagabe abaategyekire ensi ya Edomu, hatakabaireho mugabe weena ow'okutegyeka Abaisraeli: Beela mwene Beori, ou orurembo rwe rwabaire nirwetwa Dinihaba.
Beela ku yaafiire, Yobabu mwene Zeera owa Bozira yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yobabu ku yaafiire, Hushamu ow'omu nsi y'Abatemaani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Hushamu ku yaafiire, Hadadi mwene Bedadi owaasingwire Abamidiani omu nsi ya Moabu yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe; eiziina ry'orurembo rwe rukaba nirwetwa Aviisi.
Hadadi ku yaafiire, Samula owa Masireka yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Samula ku yaafiire, Shauli owa Rehoboosi ey'aha mugyera Furaati yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Shauli ku yaafiire, Baali-hanani mwene Akiboori yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Baali-hanani ku yaafiire, Hadadi yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe; n'eiziina ry'orurembo rwe rukaba nirwetwa Pai, kandi omukazi we akaba naayetwa Mehetabeeli muhara wa Matireedi, omwijukuru wa Mezahaabu.
Bwanyima Hadadi yaafa.
Abaami ba Edomu bakaba bari aba: Omwami Timuna, Aliva, Yeseti,
Oholibama, Eela, Pinoni,
Kenazi, Temani, Mibuzaari,
Magudieli na Iraamu; abo nibo baabaire bari abaami ba Edomu.
Daani, Yosefu, Benyamiini, Nafutaali, Gaadi na Asheri.
Batabani ba Yuda: Eeri, Onani, na Sheela; abo bonshatu nibo Batishua Omunyakanaanikazi yaamuzaariire. Kwonka Eeri omujigaijo gwa Yuda akaba ari mubi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, A, yaamwita.
Kandi mukaamwana Tamari nawe yaamuzaarira Pereezi na Zeera. Yuda akaba aine abatabani bataano.
Batabani ba Zeera: Zimuri, Esaani, Hemani, Kalukooli na Daara, boona bataano.
Mutabani wa Karumi: Akani owaitsire kubi Abaisraeli akacumura omu byabiikiirwe MUKAMA;
kandi mwene Esaani akaba ari Azaria.
Raamu yaazaara Aminadabu, Aminadabu yaazaara Nahashooni, omukuru omuri beene Yuda.
Nahashooni yaazaara Saluma, Saluma yaazaara Boazi,
Boazi yaazaara Obedi, Obedi yaazaara Yese,
Yese yaajigaija Eliabu, yaakuratwa Abinadabu, omwana we owa kashatu yaaba Shimea,
owa kana Nesaneeli, owa kataano Radai,
owa mukaaga Ozeemu, owa mushanju Daudi;
banyaanya baabo ni Zeruiya na Abigaili. Batabani ba Zeruiya: Abishai, Yoabu, na Asaheeli, bashatu.
Abigaili yaazaara Amasa, kandi ishe wa Amasa akaba ari Yeseri Omuishimaeli.
Kalebu mwene Hezirooni akazaara abaan ha mukazi we Azuuba n'ahari Yeriosi; kandi abaana be nibo aba: Yesheri, Shobabu na Aridooni.
Azuuba ku yaafiire, Kalebu yaashwera Efuraata owaamuzaariire Huuri.
Huuri yaazaara Uuri, na Uuri yaazaara Bezaleeli.
Bwanyima Hezirooni, ku yaahikize emyaka makumi mukaaga, yaataasya muhara wa Makiri ishe wa Gileadi, yaaba omukazi we; yaamuzaarira Seegebu.
Seegebu yaazaara Yairi, owaabaire naategyeka endembo makumi abiri na ishatu omu nsi ya Gileadi.
Kwonka Geshuri na Aramu yaanyagaho Havoosi-yairi, na Kenasi n'ebirorero byayo, tauni zoona makumi mukaaga. Abo boona bakaba bari baijukuru ba Makiri ishe wa Gileadi.
Hezirooni ku yaafiire, Kalebu yaabyama na Efuraata muka Hezirooni ishe, yaamuzaarira Ashihuuri, ishe wa Tekoa.
Batabani ba Yerameeli omujigaijo gwa Hezirooni: Raamu omujigaijo gwe, Buna, Oreni, Ozemi na Ahiya.
Yerameeli akaba aine ondiijo mukazi orikwetwa Atara owaabaire ari nyina wa Onamu.
Batabani ba Raamu omujigaijo gwa Yerameeli: Maazi, Yamini na Ekeri.
Batabani ba Onamu: Shamai: Nadabu na Abishuri.
Muka Abishuri akaba naayetwa Abihaili; yaamuzaarira Ahibaani na Molidi.
Batabani ba Nadabu: Seleedi na Apayimu: Seleedi ogwo yaafa bucwekye.
Mutabani wa Apayimu: Iishi. Mutabani wa Iishi: Sheshani. Mutabani wa Sheshani: Ahilai.
Batabani ba Yaada murumuna wa Shamai: Yeseri na Yonasaani. Yeseri ogwo yaafa bucwekye.
Batabani ba Yonasaani: Pelesi na Zaaza. Abo nibo baijukuru ba Yerameeli.
Kandi Sheshani akaba atazaire boojo kureka abaishiki bonka; kwonka Sheshani akaba aine omuhuuku Omunyamisri owaabaire naayetwa Yaruha.
Atyo Sheshani yaahingira muhara we ogwo muhuuku we Yaruha, yaamuzaarira Atai.
Atai ogwo yaazaara Nasani, Nasani yaazaara Zabadi.
Zabadi yaazaara Efulaali, Efulaali yaazaara Obedi,
Obedi yaazaara Yehu, Yehu yaazaara Azaria.
Azaria yaazaara Helezi, Helezi yaazaara Eleasa.
Eleasa yaazaara Sisumai, Sisumai yaazaara Shalumu;
Shalumu yaazaara Yekamia, na Yekamia yaazaara Elishaama.
Batabani ba Kalebu murumuna wa Yerameeli: maresha omujigaijo gwe owaazaire Ziifu. Mutabani wa Maresha: Heburooni.
Batabani ba Heburooni: Koora, Tapua, Rekemu na Sheema.
Sheema yaazaara Rahamu, ishe wa Yorikeamu; kandi Rekemu yaazaara Shamai.
Mutabani wa Shamai: Maoni; kandi Maoni yaazaara Besizuuri.
Eefa ekinyanshunju kya Kalebu nawe yaazaara Harani, Mooza na Gazezi; kandi Harani yaazaara Gazezi.
Batabani ba Yahidai: Regemu, Yosamu, Geshani, Peleti, Eefa, na Shaafi.
Maaka ekinyanshunju kya Kalebu yaazaara Sheberi na Tiruhaana.
Kandi yaazaara Shaafi ishe wa Madumaana, Sheeva ishe wa Makibeena na ishe wa Gibea; kandi muhara wa Kalebu akaba ari Akisha.
Abo nibo baijukuru ba Kalebu.
Batabani ba Huuri omujigaijo gwa Efuraata: Shobaali ishe wa Kiryasi-yearimu,
Saluma ishe wa Betelehemu, na Harefu ishe wa Besigadeeri.
Shobaali ishe wa Kiryasi-yearimu akazaara abandi baana b'aboojo, Harowe, ekicweka ky'Abamenuhosi.
Emiryango ya Kiryasi-yearimu; aba Isuri, aba Puuti, aba Shumaasi, n'aba Mishura; omuri abo hakakomookamu aba Zoraasi, n'aba Eshitaoli.
Batabani ba Saluma: Betelehemu, aba Netoofaasi, Atiroosi-besiyoabu, n'ekicweka ky'aba Manahaasi abarikwetwa aba zoori.
Kandi emiryango y'abahandiiki abaabaire batwire Yabezi: aba Tiraasi, aba Shimeasi n'aba Sukaasi. Abo nibo ba Keeni, abaakomookire ahari Hamasi, ishenkuru w'enju ya Rekabu.
owa kashatu ni Abusalomu, owaazairwe Maaka, muhara wa Talumai omugabe wa Geshuri: owa kana ni Adoniya, owaazairwe Hagisi,
owa kataano Shefatia owaazairwe Abitaali, owa mukaaga Itereamu owaazairwe omukazi we Egula;
abo mukaaga bakamuzaarirwa ari Heburooni, ahu yaategyekyeire emyaka mushanju n'ameezi mukaaga. Kandi yaamara endiijo myaka makumi ashatu n'eshatu, naategyekyera Yerusaalemu.
bwanyima yaazaara Ibuhaari, Elishaama, Elifeleti,
Nooga, Nefegi, Yafia,
Elishaama, Eliada na Elifeleti, boona mwenda.
Abo boona bakaba bari batabani ba Daudi, otabariiremu batabani b'ebinyanshunju bye; kandi munyaanya waabo akaba ari Tamari.
owaazaire Yehoraamu, owaazaire Ahazia, owaazaire Yoasi,
owaazaire Amazia, owaazaire Uziya, owaazaire Yosamu,
owaazaire Ahazi, owaazaire Hezekia, owaazaire Manaase,
owaazaire Amoni, owaazaire Yosia.
Batabani ba Yosia: omujigaijo gwe Yohanaani, owa kabiri Yehoyakimu, owa kashatu Zedekia, owa kana Shalumu.
Baijukuru ba Yehoyakimu, mutabani we Yekonia, ishe wa Zedekia;
batabani ba Yekonia enkwatwa: Shealutieli,
Malikiramu, Pedaaya, Shenazaari, Yekamia, Hoshama na Nedabia;
batabani ba Pedaaya: Zerubabeeli na Shimei; batabani ba Zerubabeeli: Meshulaamu na Hanania, kandi Shelomiisi akaba ari munyaanya;
na Hashuba, Oheli, Berekia, Hasadia, na Yushabu-hesedi, boona bataano.
Batabani ba Hanania: Pelatia na Yeshaya, owaazaire Refaaya, owaazaire Arunani, owaazaire Obadia, owaazaire Shekania.
Mutabani wa Shekania: Shemaya. Batabani ba Shemaya, Hatushi, Igali, Baria, Nearia, na Shafati, boona mukaaga.
Batabani ba Nearia: Elio-enai, Hizukia, na Azurikaamu, boona bashatu.
Batabani ba Elio-enai: Hodavia, Eliashibu, Pelaaya, Akubu, Yohanaani, Delaya na Anani, mushanju.
Reaya mwene Shobali akaba ari ishe wa Yahasi, Yahasi yaazaara Ahumai na Lahadi. Abo nibo b'emiryango y'aba Zorasi.
Aba nibo batabani ba Etamu: Yezereeli, Ishuma na Ibudashi, munyaanya waabo akaba naayetwa Hazalelipooni,
Penueli yaazara Gedori, na Ezeeri yaazaara Husha. Abo nibo batabani ba Huuri omujigaijo gwa Efuraata ishe wa Betelehemu.
Ashihuri, ishe wa Tekoa akaba aine abakazi babiri, Heela na Naara;
Naara yaamuzaarira Ahuzamu, Heferi, Temeni na Hahashitari. Abo nibo batabani ba Naara.
Batabani ba Heela: Zeresi, Izuhari, na Esinaani.
Koozi yaazaara Anubu, Zobeba n'emiryango ya Ahariheli mwene Harumu.
Yabezi akaba ari omuntu orikusiimwa okukira beene ishe; nyina yaamweta Yabezi, naagira ati: Ahabw'okuba nkamuzaarira omu busaasi.
Yabezi yaashaba Ruhanga wa Israeli naagira ati: Nkaabaasibwa ki, ompa omugisha, oirizayo emyatano yangye, omukono gwawe guguma naanye, ondinda akabi kareka kuunyita. Ruhanga yaamuha eki yaashabire.
Kelubu murumuna wa Shuuha yaazaara Mehiiri, nawe yaazaara Eshitoni.
Eshitoni yaazaara Besiraafa, Pasea na Tehina, ishe wa Irunahashi. Abo n'abashaija ba reeka.
Batabani ba Kenazi: Otinyeli na Seraaya; batabani ba Otinyeli: Hatasi na Meonosai.
Meonosai yaazaara Ofura; na Seraaya yaazaara Yoabu, ishe w'aba Gerashi, bakaba nibeetwa eryo iziina ahabw'okuba abanyamyoga.
Batabani ba Kalebu mwene Yefune: Iiru, Ela, na Naamu; mutabani wa Ela ni Kenazi.
Batabani ba Yehaleleli: Ziifu, Ziifa, Tiria na Asareeli.
Batabani ba Ezira: Yeseri, Meredi, Eferi, na Yalooni. Abo nibo batabani wa Bisia muhara wa Faraho, ou Meredi yaashweire; yaagira enda, yaazaara Miriamu, Shamai na Ishuba ishe wa Eshitemoa.
Kandi omukazi we Omuyudaayakazi yaazaara Yeredi ishe Gedori, Heberi ishe wa Sooko na Yekusieli ishe wa Zanoa.
Batabani ba muka Hodia, munyaanya wa Nahamu, bakazaara Keila owa Garumi na Eshitemoa owa Maakasi.
Batabani ba Shimoni: Amunoni, Riina, Benihanani na Tilooni. Batabani ba Iishi: Zohesi na Benizohesi.
Batabani ba Sheela mwene Yuda: Eeri ishe wa Leeka, Laada ishe wa Maresha n'ab'emiryango y'enju y'abarikuruka emyenda ya kitaani ahari Betashibea
na Yokimu n'abashaija ba Kozeba, na Yoasi, na Sarafu owaabaire naategyeka Moabu, na Yashubilehemu. Ebyo bihandiiko n'ebya ira munonga.
Abo nibo baabaire bari ababumbi, batwire Netaimu na Gedera; bo bakaba batuurayo n'omugabe nibamukorera.
kandi Shalumu n'omutabani, na Mibusamu na Mishima.
Batabani ba Mishima: omutabani Hamueli, mwene Hamueli ni zakuru, mwene Zakuri ni Shimei.
Kandi Shimei ogwo akaba aine abaana b'aboojo ikumi na mukaaga n'ab'abaishiki mukaaga; kwonka beene ishe bakaba batazaire baana baingi, kandi oruganda rwabo rwona tirurakanyire nk'orwa Yuda.
Bakaba batwire Beeri-sheba, Molada, Hazari-shuali,
Biluha, Ezeemu, Toladi,
Besueli, Horuma, Zikulaagi,
Besi-marikaboosi, Hazarasusimu, Besibiri na Sharaimu. Ezo nizo zaabaire ziri endembo zaabo okuhitsya obu Daudi yaagiire aha ngoma.
Ebirorero byabo bikaba biri Etamu, Aini, rimona, Tokemu na Ashani, endembo zoona itaano,
hamwe n'ebindi birorero byabo ebyabaire byehinguririize ezo ndembo okuhika Baali. Aho niho baabaire batwire, kandi bakaba baine ekitabo ky'okuhandiikamu oruzaaro rwabo.
Meshobabu, Yamuleki, Yoosha mwene Amazia,
Yoeli, Yehu mwene Yoshibia, mwijukuru wa Seraaya mwene Asieli,
Elio-enai, Yakoba, Yeshohaaya, Asaaya, Adieli, Yesimieli, Benaaya,
Ziiza mwene Shiifi, Shiifi ya Alooni, Alooni ya Yedaaya, Yedaaya ya Shimuri, Shimuri ya Shemaaya.
Abo abu amaziina gaabo gagambwa bakaba bari bakuru omu miryango yaabo, kandi amaju ga baishenkurubo gakakanya munonga.
Baaza ahu orikutaahira nooza Gedori, aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba bw'oruhita, kutatira amasyo gaabo obunyaatsi,
baashangayo amariisizo marungi g'obunyaatsi, kandi ensi yaayo ekaba eri mpango munonga, eine obusingye, etuurize; ahabw'okuba abatuuzi baayo aba ira bakaba bari baijukuru ba Haamu.

Kandi aba, abu amaziina gaabo gahandiikirwe, bakija omu busingywe bwa Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda, baateera amahema g'aba Haamu, n'ag'aba Meuniimu abu baashangireyo, baabacwekyerereza kimwe, baahwaho, tibaagaruka kwimutsya mutwe n'okuhitsya hati, baakubuura ensi yaabo, ahabw'okuba hakaba hariyo amariisizo g'amasyo gaabo.
Kandi abamwe aharibo, beene Simeoni, abashaija magana ataano baaza omu bibungo bya Seiri, baine abeebembezi baabo Pelatia, Nearia, Refaaya na Uzieli beene Iishi;
baacwekyereza ekicweka ky'Abaameleki ekyabaire kihonokireho, baatuurayo okuruga obwo n'okuhitsya hati.
kureka Yuda niwe yaakirize beene ishe amaani, kandi niwe yaakomookirwemu omutegyeki; kwonka obukuru bw'okuba omwana w'omujigaijo bwaguma buri obwa Yosefu.)
Batabani ba Reubeeni omujigaijo gwa Israeli: Hanoki, Palu, Hezirooni na Karumi.
Batabani ba Yoeli: mutabani we ni Shemaaya, mwene Shemaaya ni Googi, mwene Googi ni Shimei,
mwene Shimei ni Niika, mwene Milka ni reaya, mwene Reaya ni Baali;
mwene Baali ni Beera; ogwo niwe Tigulaasi-pileseeri omugabe wa Asiria yaatwaire omu bukwatwa, kandi niwe yaabaire ari mukuru omu Bareubeeni.
Beene waabo bakahandiikwa omu miryango yaabo, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri; omukuru Yeyeli; na Zekaria,
na Beela, mwene Azazi mwijukuru wa Sheema mwene Yoeli owaabaire atwire Aroeri okuhika Neebo na Baali-meoni;
kandi akatuura aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba, ahu orikutaahira nooza omu ihamba seenu y'omugyera Furaati, ahakuba amatungo gaabo gakaba gakanyire omu nsi ya Gileadi.
Bwanyima omu busingye bwa Saulo baarwana n'aba Hagari, baabaita; batyo baatuura omu mahema gaabo omu byanga byona eby'aha burugwa-izooba bwa Gileadi.
Yoeli niwe yaabaire ari mukuru, orikukurataho ari Shafamu, n'abandi Yanai na Shafati omuri Bashani.
Na beene waabo nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari: Mikaeli, Meshulaamu, Sheeba, Yorai, Yakani, zia na Eberi, boona mushanju.
Aba nibo batabani ba Abihaili mwene Huuri, mwijukuru wa Yaroa, mwene Gileadi, Gileadi ya Mikaeli, Mikaeli ya Yeshishai, Yeshishai ya Yahudo, na Yahudo ya Buuzi:
Ahi mwene Abudieli, mwijukuru wa Guuni, niwe yaabaire ari mukuru omu maju ga baishenkurubo.
Abo bakaba batwire Gileadi n'omuri Bashani n'omu ndembo zaayo, kandi n'omu mariisizo goona ag'omuri Sharooni okuhika ahu garikugarukira.
Abo boona bakahandiikwa omu busingye bwa Yosamu omugabe wa Yuda, n'omu bwa Yeroboamu omugabe wa Israeli, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri.
Baateera aba Hagari, aba Yeturi, aba Nafishi n'aba Nodabu.

Ku baabaire nibakirwana nabo, baahwerwa, aba Hagari na boona abu baabaire baine baaheebwayo omu mikono yaabo, ahakuba bakatakira Ruhanga omuri orwo rugamba, yaahurira okweshengyereza kwabo, ahabw'okuba bakamwesiga.
Baanyaga amatungo gaabo, engamira obukumi butaano, entaama obusiriira bubiri n'obukumi butaano, n'endogoya enkumi ibiri, kandi n'abashaija akasiriira abaakwatsirwe;
ahakuba baingi bakaitwa, ahabw'okuba orwo rugamba rukaba rurugire ahari Ruhanga. Bwanyima baatuura omu nsi ya bari, okuhitsya obu baatwairwe omu bukwatwa.

Kandi aba nibo baabaire bari bakuru omu maju ga baishenkurubo: Eferi, Iishi, Elieli, Azurieli, Yeremia, Hodavia na Yahudieli, abarwani b'amaani, abashaija rugambwa, abaabaire bari bakuru omu maju ga baishenkurubo.
Kwonka bakacumura ahari Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, baakuratira baaruhanga b'amahanga g'omuri egyo nsi nk'abarikuraaya, agu Ruhanga yaabacwekyerereize omumaisho.

N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga wa Israeli yaimutsya Puuli omugabe wa Asiria na Tigulaasi-pileseeri omugabe wa Asiria, yaatwara Abareubeeni, Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase bari enkwatwa, yaabata Haala, Habora, Haara n'aha mugyera ogw'omuri Gozani, baagumayo n'okuhitsya hati.
Batabani ba Kohasi: Amuraamu, Izuhaari, Heburooni na Uzieli.
Abaana ba Amuraamu: Arooni, Musa na Miriamu. Batabani ba Arooni: Nadabu, Abihu, Eleazaari na Itamaari.
Abishua yaazaara Buuki, Buuki yaazaara Uuzi,
Uuzi yaazaara Zerahia, Zerahia yaazaara Merayoosi,
Merayoosi yaazaara Amaria, Amaria yaazaara Ahitubu,
Ahitubu yaazaara Zadoki, zadoki yaazaara Ahimaazi,
Ahimaazi yaazaara Azaria, Azaria yaazaara Yohanaani,
Yohanaani yaazaara Azaria, (ogwo niwe yaabaire akora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa omu nju ei Sulemaani yaayombekire Yerusaalemu).
Azaria yaazaara, Amaria, Amaria yaazaara Ahitubu,
Ahitubu yaazaara Zadoki, Zadoki yaazaara Shalumu,
Shalumu yaazaara Hilukia, Hilukia yaazaara Azaria,
Azaria yaazaara Seraaya, Seraaya yaazaara Yehozadaki,
owaatwairwe omu bukwatwa, obu MUKAMA yaimutsya Nebukadeneeza, akatwara Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu omu bukwatwa.
Kandi aga nigo maziina ga batabani ba Gereshoni: Libuni na Shimei.
Batabani ba Kohasi: Amuraamu, Isuhaari, Heburooni na Uzieli.
Batabani ba Merari: Mahili na Muushi. Egi niyo miryango y'Abaleevi nk'oku baishenkuru baabaire bari.
Aba Gereshoni: omutabani ni Libuni, mwene Libuni ni Yahasi, mwene Yahasi ni Ziima,
mwene Ziima ni Yoa, mwene Yoa ni Iido, mwene Iido ni zeera, mwene Zeera ni Yeaserai.
Batabani ba Kohasi: omutabani ni Aminadabu, mwene Aminadabu ni Koora, mwene Koora ni Asiri,
mwene Asiri ni Elukaana, mwene Elukaana ni Ebiasaafu, mwene Ebiasaafu ni Asiri,
mwene Ariri ni Tahasi, mwene Tahasi ni Urieli, mwene Urieli ni Uziya, mwene Uziya ni Shauli.
Batabani ba Elukaana: Amasai na Ahimoosi,
omutabani ni Elukaana, mwene Elukaana ni Zofai, mwene Zofai ni Nahasi,
mwene Nahasi ni Eliabu, mwene Eliabu ni Yerohaamu, mwene Yerohaamu ni Elukaana.
Batabani ba Samueli: omujigaijo gwe ni Yoeli, n'omushubiro ni Abiya.
Batabani ba Merari: Mahili, mwene Mahili ni Libuni, mwene Libuni ni Shimei, mwene Shimei ni Uuza,
mwene Uuza ni Shimea, mwene Shimea ni Hagia, mwene Hagia ni Asaaya.

baaguma nibeeshongora omu maisho g'Obutaaho bw'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu omu kuheereza kwabo, okuhitsya obu Sulemaani yaaherize kwombeka enju ya MUKAMA omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi baakora omurimo gwabo, nk'oku embu zaabo zaabaire ziri.
Aba nibo baabaire baheereza hamwe na batabani baabo. Omuri beene Kohasi: Hemani omweshongozi mwne Yoeli, Yoeli ya Samueli,
Samueli ya Elukaana, Elukaana ya Yerohaamu, Yerohaamu ya Elieli, Elieli ya Toa,
Toa ya Zuufi, Zuufi ya Elukaana, Elukaana ya Mahasi, Mahasi ya Amasai,
Amasai ya Elukaana, Elukaana ya Yoeli, Yoeli ya Azaria, Azaria ya Zefania,
Zefania ya Tahasi, Tahasi ya Asiri, Asiri ya Ebiasaafu, Ebiasaafu ya Koora,
Koora ya Izuhaari, Izuhaari ya Kohasi, mwene Leevi, omwana wa Israeli.
Murumuna wa Hemani ni Asafu owaabaire ayemerera aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, niwe Asafu mwene Berekia, Berekia mwene Shimea,
Shimea ya Mikaeli, Mikaeli ya Baseya, Baseyaya Malikiya,
Malikiya ya Esuni, Esuni ya Zeera, Zeera ya Adaaya,
Adaaya ya Esaani, Esaani ya Ziima, Ziima ya Shimei,
Shimei ya Yahasi, Yahasi mwene Gereshoni, omwana wa Leevi.
Aha rubaju rwabo rwa bumosho hakaba hariho beene waabo batabani ba Merari: Esaani mwene Kiishi, Kiishi ya Abudi, Abudi ya Maluki,
Maluki ya Hashabia, Hashabia ya Amazia, Amazia ya Hilukia,
Hilukia ya Amuzi, amuzi ya Baani, Baani ya Shemeri,
Shemeri ya Mahili, Mahili ya Muushi mwene Merari, omwana wa Leevi.
Kandi beene waabo Abaleevi bakateebwaho kukora omurimo gwona ogw'omu Butaaho bw'enju ya Ruhanga.
Abo nibo batabani ba Arooni: Eleazaari omutabani, mwene eleazaari ni Finehaasi, mwene Finehaasi ni Abishua,
mwene Abishua ni Buuki, mwene Buuki ni Uuzi, mwene Uuzi ni Zerahia,
mwene Zerahia ni Merayosi, mwene Merayoosi na Amaria, mwene Amaria ni Ahitubu,
mwene Ahitubu ni Zadoki, mwene Zadoki ni Ahimaazi.
bakabaha Heburooni omu ishaza rya Yuda n'amariisizo gaayo agaagyehinguririize,
kwonka emisiri y'orurembo n'ebirorero byarwo baabiha Kalebu mwene Yefune.
Beene Arooni abandi baabaha endembo ez'okuhungiramu- Heburooni, Libuna n'amariisizo gaayo, Yatiri, Eshitemoa n'amariisizo gaayo,
Hileeni n'amariisizo gaayo, Debira n'amarisiizo gaayo,
Ashani n'amariisizo gaayo, na Beti-shemeshi n'amariisizo gaayo;

kandi omu z'oruganda rwa Benyamiini baabaha Geeba n'amariisizo gaayo, Alemeesi n'amariisizo gaayo, na Anatoosi n'amariisizo gaayo. Endembo zaabo zoona ezi baabagaine omu miryango yaabo yoona zaaba ikumi na ishatu.
Beene Gereshoni, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, baaheebwa endembo ikumi na ishatu omu ruganda rwa Isakaari, orwa Asheri, orwa Nafutaali n'orwa Manaase omuri Bashani.
Beene Merari nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri baabaha endembo ikumi na ibiri omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni, orwa Gaadi, n'orwa Zebuluuni.
Batyo Abaisraeli baaha Abaleevi ezo ndembo n'amariisizo gaazo.
Kandi baagaruka baabahaisa enteenyu ezo ndembo ezaagambwaho ez'omu ruganda rwa Yuda, orwa Simeoni n'orwa Benyamiini.
Baaheebwa n'endembo z'okuhungiramu- Shekemu ey'omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu n'amariisizo gaayo, Gezeri n'amariisizo gaayo,
Yokimeamu n'amariisizo gaayo, Besihoroni n'amariisizo gaayo,
Ayalooni n'amariisizo gaayo, na Gaasi-rimoni n'amariisizo gaayo;
kandi omu kicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase Aneri n'amariisizo gaayo, na Bileamu n'amariisizo gaayo ahabw'emiryango y'aba Kohasi eyaatsigaireho.
omu ruganda rwa Isakaari Kedeshi n'amariisizo gaayo, Daberaasi n'amariisizo gaayo,
Ramosi n'amariisizo gaayo, na Anemu n'amariisizo gaayo;
omu ruganda rwa AsheriMashari n'amariisizo gaayo, Abudooni n'amariisizo gaayo,
Hukoki n'amariisizo gaayo, na Rehobu n'amariisizo gaayo;
omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali- Kedeshi ey'omuri Galilaaya n'amariisizo gaayo, na kiryasaimu n'amariisizo gaayo.
na seeri ya Yorudani ahari Yeriko, aha rubaju rwayo rw'oburugwa-izooba omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni, Bezeeri ey'omu ihamba n'amariisizo gaayo, Yahuza n'amariisizo gaayo,
Kedemoosi n'amariisizo gaayo na Mefaasi n'amariisizo gaayo;
kandi omu ruganda rwa Gaadi Ramosi ey'omuri Gileadi n'amariisizo gaayo, Mahanaimu n'amariisizo gaayo,
Heshibooni n'amariisizo gaayo, na Yazeri n'amarisiizo gaayo.

Batabani ba Toola: Uuzi, Refaaya, Yerieli, Yahumai, Ibusaamu na Shemueli, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, nibo beene Toola, abaabaire bari abarwani b'amaani omu biro byabo; omu busingye bwa Daudi omubaro gwabo bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri na magana mukaaga.
Mutabani wa Uuzi: Izurahia. Batabani ba Izurahia: Mikaeli, Obadia, Yoeli na Ishia, boona bataano bakaba bari abantu bakuru;

kandi omuribo, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rw'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku kwabaire kuri, hakaba harimu emitwe y'engabo z'okuza aha rugamba obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mukaaga, ahabw'okuba bakaba baine abakazi baingi n'abaana b'aboojo baingi.
Kandi beene waabo ab'omu miryango yoona y'Abaisakaari bakaba bari abarwani obukumi munaana n'enkumi mushanju, nk'oku baahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'okuzaarwa kwabo.
Batabani ba Benyamiini: Beela, Bekeri na Yedieli, bashatu.

Batabani ba Beela: Ezibooni, Uuzi, Uzieli, Yerimoosi na Iiri, bataano, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, kandi abarwani b'amaani; bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri na makumi mukaaga na bana, nk'oku baahandiikirwe omu kukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo.
Batabani ba Bekeri; Zemira, Yoasi, Eliezeeri, Elio-enai, Omuri, Yeremoosi, Abiya, Anatoosi na Alemeesi.
Abo boona bakaba bari beene Bekeeri; omu kubarwa kw'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rw'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo nk'oku kwabaire kuri, bakaba bari abarwani b'amaani obukumi bubiri na magana abiri.
Mutabani wa Yedieli: Biluhaani: Yeushi, Benyamiini, Ehudi, Kenaana, Zesaani, Tarushiishi na Ahishahaari.
Abo boona bakaba bari beene Yedieli; omu kubarwa kw'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo abashaija abarwani b'amaani baaba kakumi n'enkumi mushanju na magana abiri, abeeteekateekire kuza aha rugamba.
Shupimu na Hupimu beene Iiri, Hushimu mwene Aheri.
Makiri yaashwererera Hupimu na Shupimu. Munyaanya akaba naayetwa Zelofehaadi; kandi Zelofehaadi ogwo akazaara abaishiki bonka.
Maaka muka Makiri yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Pereshi; n'omurumuna akaba naayetwa Shereshi; batabani be baaba Ulamu na Rakemu.
Mutabani wa Ulamu: Bedani. Abo nibo baabaire bari beene Gileadi mwene Makiri, mwijukuru wa Manaase.
Hamolekesi munyaanya yaazaara Ishihoodi, Abiezeeri na Mahula.
Batabani ba Shemida bakaba bari Ahiani, Shekemu, Likuhi na Aniamu.
mwene Tahasi ni zabadi, mwene Zabadi ni Shuseela, kandi na Ezeri na Eleada abaitsirwe abashaija ba Gaasi abazaariirwe omuri egyo nsi, ahabw'okuba bakashuumayo kunyaga ente zaabo.
Bwanyima Efuraimu ishebo yaamara ebiro bingi naabacurira, beene ishe baija kumugumya.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, Efuraimu yaabyama n'omukazi we, omukazi yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamweta Beria, ahakuba enju ye ekaguubwaho akabi.
Muhara we akaba naayetwa Sheera owaayombekire Besi-horoni zombi, eya ifo n'eya ruguru, na Uzene-sheera.
Mutabani we ni Reefa, mwene Reefa ni Reshefu, mwene Reshefu ni Teela, mwene Teela ni Tahani,
mwene Tahani ni Ladani, mwene Ladani ni Amihuudi, mwene Amihuudi ni Elishaama,
mwene Elishaama ni Nuuni, mwene Nuuni ni Yoshua.

Kandi ebibanja byabo n'ebi baabaire batungire bikaba biri Beseeli n'omu ndembo zaayo, aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba Narani, aha burengyerwa-izooba Gezeri n'endembo zaayo, Shekemu n'endembo zaayo na Aaza n'endembo zaayo;
kandi n'aha myatano y'Abamanaase Besi-sheani n'endembo zaayo, Tanaki n'endembo zaayo na Doori n'endembo zaayo. Omuri ezo ndembo beene Yosefu mwene Israeli nimwo baabaire batwire.
Batabani ba Beria: Heberi na Malikieli owaabaire ari ishe wa Biruzaisi.
Heberi yaazaara Yafuleeti, Shomeri, Hosamu na munyaanya waabo Shua.
Batabani ba Yafuleeti Pasaki, Bimuhaali na Ashuvaati. Abo nibo beene Yafuleeti.
Batabani ba Shemeri omurumuna: Rohuga, Yehuba, na Aramu.
Batabani ba Helemu omurumuna: Zoofa, Imuna, Sheleshi na Amali.
Batabani ba Zoofa: Sia, Harunefeeri, Shuali, Beeri, Imura,
Bezeeri, Hoodi, Shama, Shilusha, Ituraani na Beera.
Batabani ba Yeseri: Yefune, Pisupa na Araa.
Batabani ba Uula: Aara, Hanieli na Rizia.

Abo boona bakaba bari beene Asheri, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, abashaija abarikusiimwa, abarwani b'amaani, abakuru b'abategyeki. Kandi omubaro ogw'abahandiikirwe kuza aha rugamba, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri, gukaba guri obukumi bubiri n'enkumi mukaaga.
owa kana yaaba Nooha n'owa kataano yaaba Raafa.
Beela nawe yaazaara abaana b'aboojo: Adari, Geera, Abihuudi,
Abishua, Naamani, Ahoa,
Geera, Shefufaani na Huraamu.
Kandi aba nibo batabani ba Ehudi, (nibo baabaire bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'abatuuzi ba Geeba, abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa, bakabata Manahaasi)
Naamani, Ahiya na Geera, niwe Hegulaamu, ishe wa Uuza na Ahihuudi.
Shaharaimu, ku yaaherize kushenda abakazi be Hushimu na Baara, yaazaarira abaana b'aboojo omu nsi ya Moabu.
Yaazaara aha mukazi we Hodeshi abatabani, Yobabu, Zibia, Mesha, Malukaamu,
Yeusi, Sakia na Miruma. Abo nibo batabani abaabaire bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo.
Kandi yaazaara ahari Hushimu abaana b'aboojo Ahitubu na Elipaali,
Batabani ba Elipaali: Eberi, Mishamu, Shemedi owaayombekire Ono na Loodi n'endembo zaayo;
Beria na Sheema abaabaire bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo b'abatuuzi ba Ayalooni, abaagingire abatuuzi ba Gaasi,
Ahio, Shashaki na Yeremoosi.
Batabani ba Beria: Zebadia, Aradi, Ederi,
Mikaeli, Ishupa na Yooha.
Batabani ba Elipaali: Zebedia, Meshulaamu, Hizuki, Heberi,
Ishimerai, Izulia na Yobabu.
Batabani ba Shimei: Yahimu, Zikuri, Zabudi,
Elienai, zilesai, Elieli,
Adaya, Beraaya na Shimuraasi.
Batabani ba Shashaki: Ishupaani, Eberi, Elieli,
Abudooni, Zikuru, Hanani,
Hanania, Elamu, Antosiya,
Ifodwa na Penueli.
Batabani ba Yerohaamu: Shamusherai, Sheharia, Atalia,
Yareshia, Eliya na zikuri.
Abo nibo baabaire bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, nk'oku kuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri, abantu bakuru. Abo bakaba batwire Yerusaalemu.
Yeyeli ishe wa Gibeoni akaba atwire Gibeoni, omukazi we akaba naayetwa Maaka.
Omwana we w'omujigaijo akaba ari Abudooni, naakuratwa Zuuri, Kiishi, Baali, Nadabu,
Gedori, Ahio, Zekeri
na Mikuloosi owaazaire Shimea. Abo nabo bakaba batwire na beene waabo omuri Yerusaalemu nibareebana.
Yonasaani yaazaara Meribubaali, Meribu-baali yaazaara Miika.
Batabani ba Miika: Pisoni, Meleki, Tarea na Ahazi.
Ahazi yaazaara Yehoada, Yehoada yaazaara Alemeesi, Azimaveesi na Zimuri, Zimuri yaazaara Mooza,
Mooza yaazaara Binea; mwene Binea ni Raafa, mwene Raafa ni Eleasa, mwene Eleasa ni Azeeli.
Azeeli akaba aine aboojo mukaaga, n'amaziina gaabo nigo aga, Azurikaamu, Bokeru, Ishimaeli, Shearia, Obadia na Hanani. Abo boona ni beene Azeeli.
Beene Esheki omurumuna: Ulaamu omujigaijo gwe, omushubiro Yeushi, n'owa kashatu Elifeleti.
Beene Ulaamu bakaba bari abarwani b'amaani, enkwata-mata, kandi bakaba baine abatabani n'abaijukuru baingi, omubaro gwabo guri igana na makumi ataano. Abo boona bakaba bari Ababenyamiini.
Kandi bamwe aha Bayuda, Ababenyamiini, Abaefuraimu n'Abamanaase bakatuura omuri Yerusaalemu;
Usai mwene Amihuudi, Amihuudi ya Omuri, Omuri ya Baani, ab'omuri beene Pereezi mwene Yuda.
N'aba Shiilo: omujigaijo gwe ni Asaaya n'abatabani.
Ab'omuri batabani ba Zeera: Yeuli na beene waabo magana mukaaga na makumi mwenda.
Ab'omuri beene Benyamiini: Saalu mwene Meshulaamu ya Hodavia, Hodavia ya Hasenua,
na Ibunea mwene Yerohaamu, na Eela mwene Uuzi ya Makiri, na Meshulaamu mwene Shefatia ya Reuli mwene Ibunia;
na beene waabo nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri, bakaba bari magana mwenda na makumi ataano na mukaaga. Abo boona bakaba bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, nk'oku gaabaire gari.
Azaria mwene Hilukia ya Meshulaamu, Meshulaamu ya Zadoki, Zadoki ya Merayosi, Merayosi ya Ahitubu, omukuru w'enju ya Ruhanga;
na Adaaya mwene Yerohaamu, Yerohaamu ya Pashihuuri, Pashihuuri ya Malikia; na Masai mwene Adieli ya Yahuzeera, Yahuzeera ya Meshulaamu, Meshulaamu ya Mehsilemiisi mwene Imeri,
otabariiremu beene waabo, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, rukumi na magana mushanju na makumi mukaaga, abashaija abarikubaasiza kimwe kukora omurimo gw'enju ya Ruhanga.
na Bakubakari, Hereshi, Galali, na Matania mwene Miika ya zikuri mwene Asafu;
na Obadia mwene Shemaaya ya Galali, Galali ya Yedusiini, Yedusuuni ya Berekia, Berekia ya Aasa mwene Elukaana abaabaire batwire omu birorero by'aba Netofaasi.
Abakumiirizi b'amarembo: Shalumu, Akubu, Talumooni, Ahimaanu na beene waabo, (kandi Shalumu niwe yaabaire ari mukuru)
abaabaire batuura aha irembo ry'omugabe ery'aha bukiizi bw'oburugwa-izooba n'okuhitsya hati. Kandi abo nibo baabaire bari abakumiirizi b'eirembo ry'orusiisira rw'Abaleevi.

Shalumu mwene Koore ya Eliasafu mwene Koora na beene waabo ab'enju ya ishenkuru, aba Koora, nibo baabaire bakwatsiibwe omurimo gw'okuheereza, nigwo gw'okurinda omuryango gw'Eihema, nka baishenkurubo oku baabaire bakwatsiibwe orusiisira rwa MUKAMA nibarinda eirembo ryarwo.
Na Finehaasi mwene Eleazaari niwe yaabaire naabategyeka omu bya ira; kandi MUKAMA akaba ari hamwe nawe.
Zekaria mwene Meshelemia niwe yaabaire ari omukumiirizi aha irembo ry'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu.

Abo boona abaatoorainwe kuba abakumiirizi b'amarembo bakaba bari magana abiri na ikumi na babiri. Kandi bakaba bahandiikirwe omu birorero byabo, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri. Abo nibo Daudi na Samueli omuhanuuzi baahamize omu murimo gwabo ogw'obwesigwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo bo na batabani baabo baakwatsibwa omurimo gw'okurinda amarembo g'enju ya MUKAMA, niyo nju y'Eihema.
Abo bakumiirizi baaguma nibaza aha mbaju zaayo ina, orw'oburugwa-izooba, orw'oburengyerwa-izooba, orw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'obwa-buryo;
kandi beene waabo ab'omu birorero byabo bakaba nibaragiirwa kwija buri biro mushanju kuguma nabo;
ahabw'okuba abo bakumiirizi bakuru bana, abaabaire bari Abaleevi, bakaba baguma aha murimo gwabo batarikwihwa; kandi nibo baabaire bakwatsiibwe ebishengye n'amabiikoro eby'omu nju ya Ruhanga;
baraara beehinguririze egyo nju ya Ruhanga, ahakuba omurimo gwabo gukaba guri okugirinda n'okugiigura buri kasheeshe.
Abamwe omuribo bakaba bakwatsiibwe ebintu by'obuheereza; ahakuba bakaba nibaragiirwa kubibara omu kubitaasya n'omu kubishohoza.
Abandi omuribo bakaba bakwatsiibwe ebintu by'omu Butaaho n'ebintu byona ebirikwera eby'okukoresa, kandi n'esaano y'obunono, viinyo, amajuta, obubaane n'emigaju.
Abandi ab'omuri batabani b'abanyamurwa bakaba bajwanzya emigaju,
kandi Matisia ow'omu Baleevi omujigaijo gwa Shalumu ow'omu ba Koora niwe yaabaire akwatsiibwe omurimo gw'okureeberera ebirikukarangwa aha byoma.
Kandi n'abandi omuri beene waabo b'Abakohasi nibo baabaire bakwatsiibwe omurimo gw'emigaati y'okumurikwa, okugitebeekanisa buri Sabato.
Abo nibo baabaire bari bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'Abaleevi, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwabo oku kwabaire kuri, abantu bakuru abaabaire batuura omuri Yerusaalemu.
omutabani ow'omujigaijo akaba ari Abudooni, naakuratwa Zuuri, Kiishi, Baali, Neeri, Nadabu,
Gedori, Ahio, Zekaria na Mikuloosi;
Mikuloosi yaazaara Shimeamu; abo nabo bakaba batwire na beene waabo omuri Yerusaalemu, amaka gaabo nigareebana.
Neeri yaazaara Kiishi, Kiishi yaazaara Saulo, Saulo yaazaara Yonasaani, Yonasaani yaazaara Melikishua, Abinadabu na Eshibaali;
mwene Yonasaani akaba ari Meribu-baali, Meribu-baali yaazaara Miika.
Batabani ba Miika: Pisoni, Meleki, Tahurea na Ahazi;
Ahazi yaazaara Yaara, Yaara yaazaara Alimeesi, Azimaveesi na Zimuri; Zimuri yaazaara Mooza.
Mooza yaazaara Binea, Binea yaazaara Refaaya, Refaaya yaazaara Eleasa, Eleasa yaazaara Azeeli.
Azeeli yaazaara abaana b'aboojo mukaaga, n'amaziina gaabo nigo aga: Azurikaamu, Bokeru, Ishimaeli, Shearia, Obadia na Hanani; abo nibo beene Azeeli.
Abafilista baahambya Saulo n'abatabani, baita Yonasaani, Abinadabu na Malikishua beene Saulo.
Orugamba rwaba orw'amaani ahari Saulo, abarasi baamugwaho, baamuhutaaza.

Saulo nikwo kugira omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, ati: Ihayo rurara yaawe, oginteere, bariya bashaija batashazirwe batakaija, bakanshungisa. Kwonka omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye yaayanga, ahabw'okuba akatiina munonga. Nikyo Saulo yaasyoreireyo rurara ye, akagyetungaho.
Ogwo mukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bye, ku yaareebire yaafa, nawe yaayetunga aha ye, yaafa.
Okwo nikwo Saulo yaafiire; we n'abatabani bonshatu n'ab'omu ka ye boona bakafeera hamwe.
Kandi Abaisraeli boona abaabaire bari omu ruhita, ku baareebire eihe ryahunga, na Saulo n'abatabani baafa, baatsigaho endembo zaabo, baahunga, Abafilistia baija baazituuramu.
Ku bwaseesire, Abafilistia baija kucwijura emitumbi, baashanga Saulo n'abatabani bagwire aha kibungo kya Giliboa,
baamucwijura, baamucwaho omutwe, baatwara eby'okurwanisa bye, baatuma entumwa omu nsi yaabo yoona kubuzya amakuru omuri hekalu z'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa.
Eby'okurwanisa bye baabita omuri nyaruju za baaruhanga baabo, n'omutwe gwe baaguhanika omuri hekalu ya Dagoni.
Kwonka aba Yabeshi-gileadi boona, ku baahuriire oku Abafilistia baagizire Saulo,

abashaija boona amamanzi baimuka, baihayo omutumbi gwa Saulo n'ey'abatabani, baagitwara Yabeshi. Bwanyima baaziika amagufa gaabo ahansi y'omwela ogw'omuri Yabeshi, baamara ebiro mushanju nibeesiibyakwo.
yaayanga kwehanuuza ahari MUKAMA. Nikyo MUKAMA yaamwitiire, obugabe akabuha Daudi mwene Yese.
