Omu biro ebyahingwire, Saulo akiri omugabe, niiwe waabaire oyebembera Abaisraeli nibahurura kandi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akakugira ati: Niiwe oriba omuriisa w'abantu bangye Israeli, kandi niiwe oriba mugabe waabo.

Batyo abakuru ba Israeli boona baija aha mugabe omuri Heburooni, kandi okwo niyo yaaraganiire nabo endagaano omu maisho ga MUKAMA, bakamushukaho amajuta kuba omugabe wa Israeli, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri eki yaagambire naaraba omuri Samueli.
Bwanyima Daudi n'Abaisraeli boona baaza Yerusaalemu, niyo Yebusi, ahu Abayebusi abatuuzi b'omuri egyo nsi baabaire bari.
Abayebusi baagira Daudi bati: Otaija aha. Kwonka Daudi yaakwata ekigo kya Saayuuni, nirwo rurembo rwa Daudi.
Kandi Daudi akaba agizire ati: Oraabanze kuteera aba Yebusi, niwe araabe omutware kandi omukuru w'engabo. Yoabu mwene Zeruiya yaaba niwe yaabanza kwinamukayo; n'ahabw'ekyo yaaba omutware.
Daudi yaatuura omuri ekyo kigo, nikyo kyayeteirwe orurembo rwa Daudi.
Yaakyombekaho amaju okuruga Miilo n'okukyehinguriririza kimwe; kand Yoabu yaahunduuza ekicweka ky'orurembo ekyatsigaireho.
Daudi yaaguma naayeyongyera kugira ekitiinisa; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe akaba ari hamwe nawe.
Ebi nibyo birikugambwa aha mamanzi agu Daudi yaabaire aine. Yashobeamu owa Hakimooni niwe yaabaire ari mukuru omuri abo abashatu; akakwata eicumu rye, yaariitsa abantu magana ashatu omurundi gumwe.
Akaba ari hamwe na Daudi Pasidamimu, obu Abafilistia baateeranirayo kurwana. Okwo hakaba hariyo omusiri gwa sayiri nyingi; Abaisraeli baahunga Abafilistia;
kwonka we yaayemerera omuri ogwo musiri, yaagurwanaho, yaita Abafilistia; MUKAMA yaabajunisa okusingura kw'amaani.
Bashatu omu bashaija bakuru makumi ashatu baashuuma, baashanga Daudi aha rukiri omu nyanga ya Adulaamu; obwo eihe ry'Abafilistia rikaba risiisiire omu ruhita rwa Reefa,
Daudi ari omu kigo, n'omutwe gw'engabo z'Abafilistia guri Betelehemu.
Daudi yaatenga, yaagira ati: Nkaabaasibwa ki, hagira owampa otwizi tw'omu iziba eriri aha irembo rya Betelehemu, ntunywa!

Ahonaaho ago mamanzi ashatu gaayataguza omu rusiira rw'Abafilistia, gaataha amaizi g'omuri eryo iziba rya Betelehemu, eryabaire riri aha irembo, baagatwarira Daudi. Kwonka Daudi yaayanga kuganywa, kureka yaagashuka omu maisho ga MUKAMA;

yaagira ati: Nikikabure nyowe okukora eki omu maisho ga Ruhanga wangye! Nimbaasa kunywa eshagama y'aba bashaija baayoga amagara gaabo? Ahakuba baagareeta ahabw'okwoga amagara. Ekyo nikyo yaayangiire kuganywa. Ebyo nibyo ago mamanzi gaakozire.
Kandi Abishai mukuru wa Yoabu niwe yaabaire ari mukuru omu mamanzi makumi ashatu. Akakwata eicumu rye, yaarwana n'abashaija magana ashatu, yaabaita, yaarangaanwa nk'abo abashatu.
Omuri abo makumi ashatu niwe yaakizire kurangaanwa, akahinduka mukuru waabo; kwonka tiyaahika hari abo abashatu.

Kandi Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada owa Kabuzieli, owaabaire ari emanzi, akakora eby'amaani, yaita bene Arieli babiri aba Moabu. Kandi aha izooba rimwe omu biro by'ebirika akashuuma, yaitira entare omu kiina.

Kandi yaita Omunyamisri muraingwa munonga, oburaingwa bwe mikono etaano. Ogwo Munyamisri akaba aine eicumu omu ngaro, orubango rwaryo ruri nk'empimbi ei barukiraho emyenda; yaamushuumira n'enkoni, yaamusikura eryo icumu omu ngaro, yaarimwitsa.
Ebyo nibyo Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada yaakozire, akarangaanwa nk'abo abashatu ab'amaani.
Yaarangaanwa omuri abo makumi ashatu, kwonka tiyaahika hari bari abashatu. Daudi yaamuhindura omukuru w'abarinzi be.
Kandi ago mamanzi g'omu mahe nigo aga: Asaheeli murumuna wa Yoabu, Elihanani mwene Dodo owa Betelehemu,
Shamosi owa Harodi, Helezi owa Pelooni,
Iira mwene Ikeshi owa Tekoa, Abiezeeri owa Anatoosi,
Sibekai owa Hushati, Ilai owa Ahohi,
Maharai owa Netofa, Heleda mwene Baana owa Netofa,
Itai mwene Ribai owa Gibea ey'Ababenyamiini, Benaaya owa Piratooni,
Hurai ow'aha tugyera twa Gaashi, Abieli owa Arubaasi,
Azimaveesi owa Baharamu, Eliahuba owa Shalibooni,
Hashemi owa Gizooni, Yonasaani mwene Shageri owa Harari,
Ahiamu mwene Sakeri owa Harari, Elifaali mwene Uuri,
Heferi owa Mekeraasi, Ahiya owa Peloni
Hezero owa Karumeeli, Narai mwene Ezubai,
Yeli murumuna wa Nasani, Mibuhaari mwene Haguri,
Zeleki Omuano, Naharai owa Beeroosi, owaabaire ari omukwatsi w'eby'okurwanisa bya Yoabu mwene Zeruiya,
Iira owa Ituri, Garebu owa Ituri,
Uriya Omuhiiti, Zabadi mwene Ahulai,
Adina mwene Shiza Omureubeeni omwebembezi w'Abareubeeni, owaizire n'abantu makumi ashatu,
Hanani mwene Maaka, Yoshafati owa Misuuni,
Uziya owa Ashitaroosi, Shama na Yeyeli beene Hosamu owa Aroeri,
Yediaeli mwene Shimuri, n'omurumuna Yooha owa Tiizi,
Elieli owa Mahavi, Yeribai na Yoshavia beene Elunaamu, Ituma Omumoabu,
Elieli, Obedi na Yasieli owa Mezoba.
Bakaba nibamanya kurwanisa amata, kandi nibatwara emikono yombi omu kurekyera enjungu n'omu kurasha emyambi; bakaba bari Ababenyamiini beene waabo b'aba Saulo.
Omukuru waabo akaba ari Ahiezeeri, naakuratwa Yoasi, bombi bari beene Shemaya owa Gibea, na Yezieli na Peleti beene Azimaveesi; Beraaka, Yehu owa Anatoosi,
Ishumaaya owa Gibeoni, omushaija w'amaani omuri bari makumi ashatu, kandi omwebembezi waabo, Yeremia, Yahazieli, Yohanaani, Yozabadi owa Gedera,
Eluzai, Yerimoosi, Bealia, Shemaria, Shefatia owa Harufi,
Elukaana, Ishia, Azareeli, Yoezeeri, Yashobeamu ow'aba Koora;
na Yoeli na Zebadia beene Yerohaamu owa Gedori.

Kandi omu Bagaadi haarugamu abashaija abarwani b'amaani abamanyiire eby'orugamba, amahano omu kutwara engabo n'amacumu, abu obuso bwabo bwabaire nibushusha obw'entare, abaabaire nibairuka nk'esirabo z'omu bibungo, baashanga Daudi omu kigo ky'omu ihamba.
Omukuru akaba ari Ezeri, owa kabiri Obadia, owa kashatu Eliabu,
owa kana Mishimana, owa kataano Yeremia,
owa mukaaga Atai, owa mushanju Elieli,
owa munaana Yohanaani, owa mwenda Elizabadi,
owa ikumi Yeremia, owa ikumi n'omwe Makubanai.
Abagaadi abo bakaba bari abakuru b'engabo, omuto omuribo akaba ari nk'abantu igana, n'omukuru nk'abantu rukumi.
Abo nibo baayambukire Yorudani omu kwezi kw'okubanza, obu Yorudani yaabaire eijwire, amaizi garengyeire aha nkungu zaayo zoona, bakabinga ab'omu mpita z'oburugwa-izooba n'oburengyerwa-izooba boona.
Bwanyima abamwe omu Babenyamiini n'Abayuda baija, baashanga Daudi omu kigo.

Daudi yaashohora kubabugana, yaabagira ati: Ku muraabe mwaija kumpa emikono nk'abanywani bangye, omutima gwangye nigwija kukwatanisa n'eyaanyu; kwonka ku muraabe mwaija kundeebya aha bazigu bangye, haza ntaine ki nshobize, Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe akireebe, kandi abahane.
Ahonaaho Omwoyo yaija ahari Amasai, omukuru wa bari makumi ashatu, yaagira ati:
Turi abaawe, Daudi!
Turi aha rubaju rwawe, iwe mwene Yese!
Obusingye, obusingye bube ahariiwe,
N'aha barikukuha emikono;
Ahakuba Ruhanga waawe akuhwera.
Ahonaaho Daudi yaabaakiira, yaabagira abakuru b'engabo ze.

Kandi n'abamwe omu Bamanaase bakaimuura, baayehongyera Daudi, obu yaahurura n'Abafilistia kurwanisa Saulo. (Kwonka Daudi tarabahwereire, ahakuba abakuru omu Bafilistia bakaza omu naama, baamubinga nibagira bati: Naija kutureebya agarukire mukama we Saulo, atunagye omu kabi.)

Ku yaabaire naakigaruka Zikulaagi, abashaija aba ab'omu Bamanaase baamwehongyera, Aduna, Yoazabadi, Yediaeli, Mikaeli, Yozabadi, Elihu na Zilesai, abaabaire bari abakuru b'emitwe y'engabo rukumi-rukumi y'eihe ry'Abamanaase;
bakaha Daudi emikono kurwanisa emitwe y'abanyagi.
Ahakuba abantu bakaba baija ahari Daudi buri izooba kumuha emikono, okuhitsya obu baabaire eihe rihango, nk'eihe rya Ruhanga.
Abayuda abaabaire baine engabo n'amacumu, bakaba bari obukumi mukaaga na magana munaana abeeteekateekyeire orugamba;
Abasimeoni abashaija abarwani b'amaani omu rugamba bari enkumi mushanju na igana;
Abaleevi enkumi ina na magana mukaaga;
Yehoyaada owaabaire ari omwebembezi w'enju ya Arooni yaija n'engabo enkumi ishatu na magana mushanju;
Zadoki omutsigazi w'amaani emanzi yaija n'abakuru b'engabo makumi abiri na babiri ab'enju ya ishe.
Ababenyamiini, abaine obuzaare na Saulo, bakaba bari enkumi ishatu, ahabw'okuba okuhitsya omu bunaku obwo abaingi omuribo bakaba bahamiire aha nju ya Saulo;
Abaefuraimu abashaija b'amaani amamanzi, ba rugambwa omu maju ga baishenkurubo bari obukumi bubiri na magana munaana,
ab'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, abu amaziina gaabo gaagambirweho ngu baije kwemeka Daudi, bari kakumi n'enkumi munaana;
Abaisraeli abaabaire nibeetegyereza eby'obunaku, kandi nibamanya ebi Abaisraeli bashemereire kukora, abakuru bari magana abiri hamwe na beene waabo abu baabaire nibategyeka.
Abazebuluuni, abaabaire bamanyiire eby'orugamba baine eby'okurwanisa byona, baizire kuhwera Daudi n'omutima gumwe, bari obukumi butaano;
Abanafutaali abakuru b'engabo rukumi abaizire n'engabo eziine engabo n'amacumu bari obukumi bushatu n'enkumi mushanju;
Abadaani abaabaire baine eby'okurwanisa by'orugamba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi munaana na magana mukaaga;
Abaasheri engabo ezimanyiire orugamba ezaabaire zeeteekateekire kurwana bari obukumi buna;
Abareubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase abaarugire seeri ya Yorudani baine eby'okurwanisa by'orugamba eby'emiringo yoona, bari akasiriira n'obukumi bubiri.
Baamarayo kashatu bari hamwe na Daudi, nibarya nibanywa; ahabw'okuba beene waabo bakaba bababisiire.

Kandi na bataahi baabo, n'abaarugire Isakaari, Zebuluuni na Nafutaali, baija bareetsire eby'okurya aha ndogoya, aha ngamira, aha nyumbu n'aha nte, eby'okurya bingi, esaano, ebiihuro by'emizaabibu eyomire, viinyo n'amajuta, ente n'entaama; ahabw'okuba omuri Israeli hakaba harimu okushemererwa.
Bwanyima Daudi yaaza omu naama n'abeebembezi boona, abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi na igana-igana.

Kandi yaagambira omutwe gw'Abaisraeli boona abaabaire bateeraine naagira ati: Ku muraabe nimukisiima, kandi kirugire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, tutume hoona-hoona omuri beene waitu abatsigaire omu nsi ya Israeli yoona, abu abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi batwire nabo omu ndembo zaabo n'amariisizo gaazo, babone kuteeranira ahu turi;
bwanyima tuze kugarura eshanduukye ya Ruhanga waitu; ahabw'okuba omu biro bya Saulo tituragyeteireho.
Omutwe gwona gwaikiriza kutwaza gutyo, ahakuba egyo naama ekasiimwa abantu boona.
Atyo Daudi yaateerana Abaisraeli boona okuruga Shihoori akagyera ka Misri okuhika ah'orikutaahira nooza Hamasi, ngu babone kwiha eshanduukye ya Ruhanga Kiryasi-yearimu.
Baatwarira eshanduukye ya Ruhanga aha kigaari kisya, baagiiha omu ka ya Abinadabu, kandi Uzza na Ahio nibo baabaire nibatwara ekyo kigaari.
Daudi n'Abaisraeli boona baagyenda nibashemerererwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'amaani gaabo goona, nibeeshongora nibateera endingiri, n'enanga n'engarabi, n'amataari n'ebitaasa n'amakondere.
Ku baahikire aha mbuga ya Kidoni, Uzza yaatayo omukono gwe kuramira eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, ahabw'okuba ente zikateera entsibo.
MUKAMA yaagirira Uzza ekiniga; yaamwitira aho, naamutura okuramira eshanduukye n'omukono gwe; yaafeera aho omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Daudi yaaguubwa kubi ahabwa MUKAMA kugwa ahari Uzza; ogwo mwanya gwayetwa Pereezi-uzza n'okuhitsya hati.
Eryo izooba Daudi yaatiina Ruhanga yaagira ati: Nimbaasa nta kutwara eshanduukye ya MUKAMA omu ka yangye?
N'ahabw'ekyo Daudi tiyaatwara shanduukye ya Ruhanga owe omu rurembo rwa Daudi, kureka yaagikiikamya, yaagita omu nju ya Obededomu Omunyagaasi.
Eshanduukye ya Ruhanga yaamara ameezi ashatu omu nju ya Obededomu; MUKAMA yaaha eka ya Obededomu omugisha, n'ebi yaabaire atungire byona.
Daudi yaamanyira aho ku MUKAMA amuhamize kuba omugabe wa Israeli, kandi ku aimukize obugabe bwe ahabw'abantu be Israeli.
Bwanyima Daudi yaashwerera abandi bakazi omuri Yerusaalemu, yaazaara abandi baana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Aga nigo maziina g'abaana abu yaazaariire Yerusaalemu; Shamua, Shobabu, Nasani, Sulemaani,
Ibuhaari, Elishua, Elipeleti,
Nooga, Nefegi, Yafia,
Elishaama, Beeliada na Elifeleti.
Abafilistia boona ku baahuriire ngu Daudi ashukirweho amajuta kuba omugabe w'Abaisraeli boona, bainamuka baaza kusherura Daudi; Daudi ku yaabihuriire, yaahurura kubarwanisa.
Omu bunaku obwo Abafilistia bakaba baizire, bateire oruhita rw'Abareefa.
Daudi yaayehanuuza ahari Ruhanga naabuuza ati: Nyinamukye ndwane n'Abafilistia? Noija kubahayo omu mikono yangye? MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Inamuka, ahakuba niinyija kubahayo omu mikono yaawe.
Daudi nikwo kuza Baali-peraziimu, akabaitirayo. Bwanyima yaagira ati: Ruhanga ahigwire abazigu bangye, nk'oku amaizi gahigura omu- cungiro. Nikyo baayeteire ogwo mwanya Baali-peraziimu.
Abafilistia baatsigayo ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, Daudi yaaragiira, baabyotsya.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro Abafilistia baagaruka baateera orwo ruhita.
Daudi yaagaruka yaayehanuuza ahari Ruhanga, Ruhanga yaamugarukamu ati: Otainamuka kubakurata; kureka obakiikuukye, obashangye ahashungaine n'akabira k'emitugunda.
Bwanyima ku oraahurire okukaabuuza aha mitwe y'emitugunda, ahonaaho ogyende obateere; ahakuba Ruhanga naaba akwebembeire kwita engabo z'Abafilistia.
Atyo Daudi yaatwaza nk'oku Ruhanga yaamuragiira, baagyenda baita Abafilistia okuruga Gibeoni okuhika Gezeri.
Okurangaanwa kwa Daudi kwabuga ensi zoona, MUKAMA yaareetera amahanga goona kumutiina.
Daudi yaagira ati: Tihariho n'omwe oshemereire kuheeka eshanduukye ya Ruhanga kureka Abaleevi, ahabw'okuba nibo MUKAMA yaatooraine kuguma nibaheeka eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, n'okumuheereza ebiro byona.
Bwanyima Daudi yaateeranira Abaisraeli boona Yerusaalemu, ngu baze kwinamura eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, bagite omu mwanya gwayo ogu agibonereize.
Kandi Daudi yaateerana batabani ba Arooni n'Abaleevi;
omuri beene Kohasi, omukuru akaba ari Urieli na beene ishe igana na makumi abiri;
omuri beene Merari, omukuru Asaaya na beene ishe magana abiri na makumi abiri;
omuri beene Gereshoni, omukuru Yoeli na beene ishe igana na makumi ashatu;
omuri beene Elizafaani, omukuru Shemaaya na beene ishe magana abiri;
omuri beene Heburooni, omukuru Elieli na beene ishe makumi munaana;
omuri beene Uzieli, omukuru Abinadabu na beene ishe igana na ikumi na babiri.
Bwanyima Daudi yaayeta Zadoki na Abiasaari abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi aba: Urieli, Asaaya, Yoeli, Shemaaya, Elieli na Aminadabu,
yaabagira ati: Muri abakuru b'amaju ga baashwenkuriimwe Abaleevi; mweyeze, imwe Ana beene waanyu, mubone kwinamura eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli kugita omu mwanya ogu ngibonereize.
Ahabw'okuba obw'okubanza timuragiheekire, nikyo MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaatugwereireho naatutura okutagitwaza nk'oku kyaragiirwe.
Batyo abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baayeyeza ahabw'okuza kwinamura eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Ku baakhikireyo, Abaleevi baaheeka eshanduukye ya Ruhanga aha mabega gaabo n'emigamba, nk'oku Musa yaragiire naakuratira ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Kandi Daudi yaaragiira abakuru b'Abaleevi kutaho abeeshongozi ab'omuri beene waabo, ab'okuteera enanga, endingiri n'ebitaasa, nibateera akaari k'okushemererwa.
Batyo Abaleevi baatoorana Hemani mwene Yoeli, omuri beene ishe baatoorana Asafu mwene Berekia, n'omuri beene Merari baatoorana Esaani mwene Kushaya;

kandi hamwe n'abo baatoorana omuri beene waabo abarikukurataho, Zekaria, Yazieli, Shemiramoosi, Yehieli, Uuni, Eliabu, Benaaya, Maaseya, Matisiya, Elefelebu, Mikuneya n'abarinzi b'eirembo Obededomu na Yeyeli.
Abeeshongozi aba, Hemani, Asafu na Esaani, bakaba bari ab'okuteera ebitaasa by'emiringa;
Zekaria, Azieli, Shemiramoosi, Yehieli, Uuni, Eliabu, Maaseya na Benaaya bakaba baari ab'okuteera enanga omu iraka rya
Matisiya, Elefelebu, Mikuneya, Obededomu, Yeyeli na Azazia bakaba bari ab'okuteera enanga omu iraka rya
Kandi Kenania, omwebembezi w'Abaleevi omu by'okweshongora, niwe yaabaire ari omwebembezi, ahabw'okuba akaba naabimanya munonga.
Berekia na Elukaana bakaba bari abaku miirizi b'eirembo ahabw'eshanduukye.

Shebania, Yoshafaati, Netaneeli, Amasai, Zekaria, Benaaya na Eliezeeri, abanyamurwa, nibo baabaire bari ab'okugyenda nibateerera amakondere omu maisho g'eshanduukye ya Ruhanga; Obededomu na Yehia nabo bari abakumiirizi b'eirembo ahabw'eshanduukye.
Kandi ahabwa Ruhanga kuhwera Abaleevi ababaire baheekire eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, baatamba enimi mushanju n'empaya z'entaama mushanju.

Obwo Daudi akaba ajwaire ekanzu ya kitaani, kandi n'Abaleevi abaabaire baheekire eshanduukye, n'abeeshongozi, na Kenania omwebembezi waabo, nabo bakaba bajwaire batyo; kwonka Daudi we ajwariireho n'efodi ya kitaani.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli boona bainamwire eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA nibateera akaari n'enzamba n'amakondere n'ebitaasa, nibateera munonga endingiri n'enanga.

Bwanyima eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA ku yaabaire neetaaha omu rurembo rwa Daudi, Mikaali muhara wa Saulo yaaringuririza omu dirisa, yaareba omugabe Daudi naazina naayemurika, yaamugayira aha mutima.
Daudi ku yaaherize kutamba ebyo bitambo by'okwotsya n'empngano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, yaashabira abantu omugisha omu iziina rya MUKAMA,
yaagaburira Abaisraeli boona, abashaija n'abakazi, buri muntu omugaati gumwe, entongo y'enyama kandi n'omwate gw'emizaabibu eyomire.
Kandi yaataho Abaleevi bamwe kukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu maisho g'eshanduukye ya MUKAMA, okuguma nibaijutsya, okusiima n'okuhimbisa MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.

Omukuru waabo yaaba Asafu, yaakuratwa Zekaria, Yeyeli, Shemiramoosi, Yehieli, Matisiya, Eliabu, Benaaya, Obededomu na Yeyeli, abaatairweho kuteera enanga n'endingiri; Asafu we yaaba ow'okuteera ebitaasa,
Benaaya na Yahazieli abanyamurwa baaba ab'okuguma nibateerera amakondere omu maisho g'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya Ruhanga.
Eryo izooba nibwo Daudi yaatandika kutaho Asafu na beene ishe kuba ab'okusingiza MUKAMA.
Mumanyise ebi yaakozire omu mahanga!
Mumweshongorere, mweshongore eby'okumuhimbisa,
Mugambire abantu eby'emirimo ye yoona ey'okutangaaza!
Mwesiime ahabw'eiziina rye eririkwera;
Emitima y'abarikusherura MUKAMA eshemererwe!
Mwetengye okuguma omu maisho ge obutoosha.
N'ebitakareebwaga ebi yaakozire, n'emanja ezi yaacwire,
Imwe ab'oruzaaro rw'omwiru we Abrahamu,
Abaana ba Yakobo abu yaatooraine.
Emicwere ye eri omu nsi yoona;
Aijuka endagaano ye ebiro byona,
Ekigambo eki yaaragiire ab'obusingye rukumi,
Ei yaarahiire naaraganisa Isaaka,
Na Israeli okuba endagaano etarihwaho,
Kuba omugabo gw'obuhunguzi bwanyu.
Eego bakye munonga kandi abashuhuuki omu nsi egyo,
Nibazengyerera omu mahanga agatari gamwe,
Okuruga omu bugabe bumwe okuza omu bundi,
Akateisa abagabe ahabwabo,
N'obu kwakuba okukora kubi baanabi bangye.
Mworekye okujuna kwe buri kasheeshe.
Mumanyise ekitiinisa kye omu mahanga,
Emirimo ye ey'okutangaaza omu mahanga goona.
Kandi n'okutiinwa okukira baaruhanga boona.
Kwonka Ruhanga niwe yaahangire eiguru.
Ekitiinisa n'obukuru bimwebembeire;
Amaani n'okushemererwa biri ahi atuura.
Mugambe ku MUKAMA aine ekitiinisa n'amaani,
Mureete empongano, mwije omu maisho ge;
Muramye MUKAMA mujwaire ebirikwera;
Muteteme omu maisho ge, imwe ab'omu nsi mwena;
Eego, ensi ehamire, terikubaasa kutengyetsibwa.
Bagambire omu mahanga nibagira bati: MUKAMA ari aha ngoma!
Emisiri eyesiime n'ebirimu byona!
Obwo nibwo emiti yoona ey'omu kibira eryeshongora
Ahabw'okushemererwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA,
Ahabw'okuba naija kucwera ensi orubanja.
Kandi embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro n'ebiro!
Otutaaruure, otujune nootwiha omu mahanga,
Tubone kusiima eiziina ryawe eririkwera,
Twesiimire okuhimbisibwa kwawe.
Okwiha ira ryona okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Bwanyima abantu boona baagira bati: Amiina; baahimbisa MUKAMA.
Atyo Daudi yaatsiga Asafu na beene ishe omu maisho g'eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA kuguma nibakora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu maisho gaayo, nk'oku kyabaire nikyetengwa buri izooba;
yaatsigayo na Obededomu na beene ishe makumi mukaaga na munaana; kandi yaataho Obededomu mwene Yedusuuni na Hoosa kuba abakumiirizi b'eirembo.
Kandi yaatsiga Zadoki omunyamurwa na beene ishe abanyamurwa omu maisho g'eihema rya MUKAMA eryabaire riri omu mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu, ogwabaire guri Gibeoni,
kuguma nibatambirira MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya aha itambiro ryabyo omu kasheeshe n'omu mwabazyo, nk'oku byona byabaire bihandiikirwe omu biragiro bya MUKAMA ebi yaaragiire Abaisraeli.
Kandi hamwe n'abo yaataho Hemani na Yedusuuni n'abandi abaatoorainwe, abu amaziina gaabo gaagambirweho, kuba ab'okusiima MUKAMA ahabw'embabazi ze ezigumaho ebiro byona.

Kandi Hemani na Yeduduuni abo bakaba bagira amakondere n'ebitaasa eby'okuteera, n'ebindi bintu by'okuteerwa ahabw'ebyeshongoro ebirikwera. Kandi baataho batabani ba Yedusuuni kuba ab'okurinda eirembo.
Bwanyima abantu boona baayaabuuka, buri muntu yaaza owe, na Daudi yaagaruka owe kushabira eka ye omugisha.
Nasani yaagira Daudi ati: Kora ekikuru aha mutima kyona, ahakuba Ruhanga ari hamwe naiwe.
Kwonka ekyo kiro ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaizira Nasani nikigira kiti:
Irooko ogire omwiru wangye Daudi oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Toriinyombekyera nju y'okutuuramu;
ahakuba tinkatuuraga mu nju, okwiha aha izooba eri naihiireho Abaisraeli Misri n'okuhitsya hati, kureka nkaba ngyenda ninduga omu ihema nindigarukamu, ninduga omu butaaho nimbugaruakamu.

Nimugira ngu omu myanya yoona ei naabaire ngyendamu n'Abaisraeli boona nkaba ndagizire omwe aha baramuzi ba Israeli, abu naaragiire kuriisa abantu bangye Israeli, nti: Ahabw'enki mutakaanyombekyeraga nju y'emyereezi?
N'ahabw'ekyo ogire omwiru wangye Daudi oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Nkakwiha omu iriisizo nooriisa entaama, ngu nkuhindure omutegyeki w'abantu bangye Israeli;
kandi nkaba nguma naiwe ahu waabaire oza hoona, ncwekyerereza abazigu baawe omu maisho gaawe; kandi ndyakuha eiziina nk'ery'abantu rugambwa ab'omu nsi.
Ndyatooranira abantu bangye Israeli omwanya, mbabyaremu, babone kugira obutaka bw'okutuuramu, obu batariihwamu bundi; kandi abantu babi tibarigaruka kubaita kubi nk'obunyakare,
obu naabaire ndagiira abaramuzi kutegyeka abantu bangye Israeli; kandi ndyagomoora abazigu baawe boona. N'ekindi ninkugambira nti: MUKAMA aryakwombekyera eka.
Kandi obunaku bwawe obw'okushanga baashwenkuru ku burihika, ndyaimutsya omu ruzaaro rwawe omwe ahari batabani baawe akuhungurire, mpamye obugabe bwe.
Ogwo niwe ariinyombekyera enju, kandi ndyahamya ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe ebiro byona.
Ndyaba ishe, nawe abe omwana wangye. Tindimwihaho mbabazi zangye, nk'oku naaziihire aha waakubandiize,
kureka ndyamuhamya omu nju yangye n'omu bugabe bwangye ebiro byona, kandi ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe kiryagumaho ebiro n'ebiro.
Ebyo bigambo byona n'okwo kworekwa kwona Nasani yaabiteekyerereza Daudi nk'oku byabaire biri.
Bwanyima omugabe Daudi yaataaha, yaashutama omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaagira ati: Niinye oha, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga, kandi n'enju yangye nikyo ki, iwe okundinda okampitsya aha?

Kwonka ekyo ahariiwe ni kikye, ai Ruhanga; mbwenu waayongyeraho n'okugamba aha by'enju y'omwiru waawe, oku eriba omu biro bingi munonga ebiriija, kandi reeba, waanyinganisa n'omuntu w'ekitiinisa kihango, ai MUKAMA Ruhanga!
Mbwenu shi, ekindi, nyowe Daudi, nkugambire ki ahabw'okuha omwiru waawe ekitiinisa? Ahabw'okuba niiwe orikumumanya.
Ai MUKAMA, ebikuru ebyo byona obikoreire omwiru waawe, nk'oku omutima gwawe gurikuteekateeka, ngu obone kworeka ebikuru ebyo byona.
Ai MUKAMA, tihariho orikushushana naiwe; tihariho Ruhanga kureka Iwe, nk'ebi twahuriire byona oku biri.

Kandi n'ihanga ki omu nsi eriri nk'abantu baawe Israeli, abu Ruhanga yaagiire kwecungurira kuba abantu be, ngu oyetungire eiziina ahabw'okubakorera ebikuru kandi ebirikutiinisa, noobinga amahanga omu maisho g'abantu baawe, abu waacungwire, okaiha Misri?
Bwanyima abantu baawe Israeli okabagira abaawe buzima ebiro byona; naiwe MUKAMA, waaba Ruhanga waabo.
Mbwenu hati, ai MUKAMA, ekigambo eki waagamba aha mwiru waawe n'aha nju ye, kihamibwe ebiro byona, kandi okore nk'oku waagamba;

n'eziina ryawe rihamibwe, kandi riheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona, nibagira bati: MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, niwe Ruhanga wa Israeli; kandi enju y'omwiru waawe Daudi eryahamibwa omu maisho gaawe.
Ahakuba Iwe, Ruhanga wangye, oshuuruuriire omwiru waawe, ku orimwombekyera eka; nikyo omwiru waawe yaagirira obumanzi kushaba omu maisho gaawe.
Mbwenu hati, ai MUKAMA, niiwe Ruhanga, kandi waaraganisa omwiru waawe ekyo kigambo kirungi;
n'ahabw'ekyo hati ikiriza kuha enju y'omwiru waawe omugisha, egumeho ebiro byona eri omu maisho gaawe; ahakuba, MUKAMA, eki ohaire omugisha, kigugira ebiro byona.
Yaasingura n'Abamoabu, baaba abairu be, baaguma nibamutoijera.
Kandi Daudi yaasingura Hadadezeeri omugabe wa Zooba, yaamubinga, yaamuhitsya Hamasi; obwo Hadadezeeri akaba naaza kubyara ekiijutsyo kye aha mugyera Furaati.

Daudi yaamunyagaho ebigaari rukumi, n'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi enkumi mushanju, n'engabo ezirikugyendesa ebigyere obukumi bubiri. Bwanyima Daudi yaatema ebiteega by'embaraasi ezirikukurura ebigaari zoona, kwonka yaatsigaho ezirikubaasa kukurura ebigaari igana.
Abasiria ba Damasiko ku baizire kuha Hadadezeeri omugabe wa Zooba emikono, Daudi yaabaitamu abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri.
Bwanyima Daudi yaata emitwe y'abarinzi omuri Siria eya Damasiko, n'Abasiria baahinduka abairu be, baaguma nibamutoijera. Kandi MUKAMA yaaguma naaha Daudi obusinguzi ei yaabaire aza yoona.
Daudi yaanyaga engabo z'ezaabu, ezi abagaragwa ba Hadadezeeri baabaire baine, yaazitwara Yerusaalemu.
Kandi Daudi yaiha emiringa mingi munonga omuri Tibuhaasi na Kuuni, endembo za Hadadezeeri.
Bwanyima Tou omugabe wa Hamasi, ku yaahuriire ngu Daudi asingwire eihe ryona erya Hadadezeeri omugabe wa Zooba,

yaatuma Yoramu omutabani aha mugabe Daudi, kumuramutsya, n'okumutabaarutsya, ahabw'okurwana na Hadadezeeri n'okumusingura; ahabw'okuba Hadadezeeri akaba atuura naarwana na Tou. Yaamutwekyera ebintu by'emiringo yoona eby'ezaabu, eby'efeeza n'eby'emiringa;
ebyo nabyo omugabe Daudi yaabishoroorera MUKAMA, hamwe n'efeeza n'ezaabu ebi yaabiare anyagire omu mahanga aga goona, Edomu, Moabu, n'omu Baamoni, Abafilistia, na Amaleki.
Bwanyima Abishai mwene Zeruiya yaitira Abanyaedomu kakumi n'enkumi munaana omu ruhita rw'Omwonyo.
Yaataho emitwe y'abarinzi omuri Edomu; Abanyaedomu boona baahinduka abairu ba Daudi. Okwo nikwo MUKAMA yaahaire Daudi okusingura, ei yaabaire aza yoona.
Atyo Daudi yaategyeka Israeli yoona; kandi yaacwera abantu be boona emanja z'oburyo omu bwinganisa.
Obwo Yoabu mwene Zeruiya akaba ari omukuru w'eihe; Yehoshafaati mwene Ahiluudi ari omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho;
Zadoki mwene Ahitubu na Abimeleki mwene Abiasaari bari abanyamurwa; Shavusha ari omuhandiiki;
Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada ari omukuru w'Abakeresi n'Abapelesi; kandi batabani ba Daudi bari abategyeki bakuru b'omugabe.

Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: Niinyija kukorera gye Hanuni mwene Nahashi, nk'oku ishe yankoreire. Atyo Daudi yaayohereza entumwa kumuyaagira ahabw'okufeerwa ishe. Abagaragwa ba Daudi baahika owa Hanuni omu nsi y'Abaamoni kumuyaagira.

Kwonka abanyiginya b'Abaamoni baagira Hanuni bati: Noogira ngu Daudi okukwoherereza ab'okukuyaagira n'okuha sho ekitiinisa? Torikumanya ku ayohereize abagaragwa be kwetegyereza ensi n'okugitata, ngu abone kugicwekyereza?
N'ahabw'ekyo Hanuni yaakwata abagaragwa ba Daudi, yaabamwa ebireju by'orubaju rumwe, yaacegyeta ebijwaro byabo okugarukira aha bibunu, yaaboohereza; baagyenda.
Ku baagambiire Daudi eby'abo bashaija, yaatuma ab'okubabugana, ahabw'okuba bakaba baine enshoni nyingi. Omugabe yaagira ati: Mugume Yeriko, okuhitsya ahu obureju bwanyu buraakurire, mukabona kwija.

Abaamoni ku baamanyire ngu beetamiise Daudi, Hanuni n'Abaamoni baayohereza etalanta z'efeeza rukumi kupangisa ebigaari n'okuguriirira abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi, ebya Mesopotamia, Aramu-maaka na Zooba.

Baapangisa ebigaari obukumi bushatu n'enkumi ibiri, baaguriirira omugabe wa Maaka n'eihe rye, baija, baateera orusiisira aharikureeba Medeba. Kandi Abaamoni baaruga omu ndembo zaabo, baateeranira hamwe kuza kurwana.
Daudi ku yaakihuriire, yaayohereza Yoabu n'eihe ryona ey'amamanzi.
Abaamoni baashohora, baatenga orugamba aha irembo ry'orurembo, kandi abagabe, abaabaire baizire kuhurura, bakaba bari ahakwabo omu ishwa.
Yoabu ku yaareebire engabo zimuri omumaisho n'enyima, yaatoorana abashaija entoore omu Baisraeli, yaabatengyesa orugamba kurwana n'Abasiria;
abandi boona yaabaha omurumuna Abishai, nabo baatenga orugamba kurwana n'Abaamoni.
Yoabu yaagira ati: Abasiria ku barankize amaani, oije ompe emikono; kandi naiwe Abaamoni ku baarakukize amaani, naanye niinyija kugikuha.
Guma, turwane mashaija ahabw'eihanga ryaitu, n'ahabw'endembo za Ruhanga waitu; kandi MUKAMA akore eki arikusiima.
Atyo Yoabu n'engabo ezi yaabaire aine bairira haihi kurwanisa Abasiria baabahunga.
Abaamoni ku baareebire Abasiria baahunga, nabo baahunga Abishai murumuna wa Yoabu, baayeroha omu rurembo. Bwanyima Yoabu yaatabaaruka, yaaza Yerusaalemu.
Kwonka Abasiria ku baareebire baabingwa Abaisraeli, baatuma entumwa, baahuruza Abasiria aba seeri y'omugyera Furaati, baija beebembeirwe Shofaki omukuru w'eihe ry'engabo za Hadadezeeri.

Ku baakigambiire Daudi, nawe yaateerana Israeli yoona, baayambuka Yorudani, baahika ahu Abasiria baabaire bari, baatenga orugamba kubarwanisa. Daudi ku yaatengire orugamba kurwanisa Abasiria, baarwana nawe.
Abasiria baahunga Abaisraeli; Daudi yaabaitamu abantu abarikurwanira omu bigaari enkumi mushanju, n'abarikugyendesa ebigyere obukumi buna, yaita na Shofaki omukuru w'eihe ryabo.
Abagaragwa ba Hadadezeeri ku baareebire baasingurwa Abaisraeli baayehongyera Daudi, baahinduka abairu be. N'ahabw'ekyo Abasiria baayanga kugaruka kuha Abaamoni emikono obundi.

Daudi yaiha omugabe waabo ekirunga aha mutwe; yaashanga kiine oburemeezi bw'etalanta emwe y'ezaabu, kandi kikaba kirimu eibaare ry'obuguzi bwingi; baakita ha mutwe gwa Daudi. Kandi omuri orwo rurembo yaanyagamu eminyago mingi munonga.
Yaihamu abantu abaabaire barimu, yaabashara n'emisimeeno n'ebyoma ebyamaino n'empango; okwo nikwo Daudi yaagizire endembo zoona ez'Abaamoni. Bwanyima Daudi n'engabo zoona baagaruka Yerusaalemu.
Haagaruka haabaho orugamba n'Abafilistia; Elihanani mwene Yairi yaitu Lahumi, murumuna wa Goliasi owa Gaasi, ou orubango rw'eicumu rye rwabaire nirwigangana empimbi ei barukiraho emyenda.

Kandi haagaruka haabaho orugamba Gaasi. Okwo hakaba hariyo omushaija muraingwa munonga, owaabaire aine enkumu mukaaga ahari buri ngaro, n'enkumu z'ebigyere mukaaga ahari buri kigyere, zoona makumi abiri na ina; nawe akaba ari ow'omuri baijukuru b'ebikaaka.
Ku yaahigire Abaisraeli, Yonasaani mwene Shimei mukuru wa Daudi yaamwita.
Abo boona bakaba bari baijukuru b'ebikaaka bya Gaasi; baitwa Daudi n'abashaija be.
N'ahabw'ekyo Daudi yaagira Yoabu n'abakuru b'eihe ati: Mugyende, mubare Abaisraeli okuruga Beeri-sheba okuhika Daani, mwije mungambire, mbone kumanya omubaro gwabo.

Kwonka Yoabu yaagira ati: MUKAMA ayongyere aha bantu be okukira oku bari emirundi igana! Mukama wangye omugabe, abo boona t'abairu baawe? Mbwenu eki nookyendera ki, mukama wangye? Ahabw'enki nooyenda kureetera Abaisraeli orubanja?
Kwonka ekigambo ky'omugabe kyakiza ebya Yoabu amaani. Yoabu nikwo kugyenda naaraba omuri Israeli yoona, akagaruka Yerusaalemu.

Ku yaahikireyo, Yoabu yaaha Daudi omubaro gw'abantu abu yaabazire. Omuri Israeli yoona hakaba harimu abashaija enkwata-rurara akakaikuru n'akasiriira kamwe, n'omuri Yuda abashaija enkwata-rurara obusiriira buna n'obukumi mushanju.
Kwonka omuri okwo kubara tiyaabariramu Baleevi n'obu baakuba Ababenyamiini; ahakuba ekiragiro ky'omugabe kikaba kimutamire.
Kwonka ekigambo ekyo kyagwisa kubi Ruhanga, n'ahabw'ekyo yaateera Israeli.
Daudi yaagira Ruhanga ati: Ncumwire munonga ahabw'ekyo eki nkozire. Kwonka hati ninkweshengyereza iha aha mwiru waawe okutahikiirira, ahakuba ndengyesereize, naakora eky'obufa-mutima.
MUKAMA yaagambira Gaadi omuhanuuzi wa Daudi ati:
Gyenda ogambire Daudi oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Naakuha ebintu bishatu, oiheho kimwe, mbe nikyo naakukora.
Atyo Gaadi yaija ahari Daudi, yaamugira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahari ebi byonshatu tooranaho kimwe eki orikwenda;

emyaka eshatu y'enjara; nari okucwekyerezibwa abazigu baawe, noitwa rurara yaabo okumara ameezi ashatu, nari ebiro bishatu bya rurara ya MUKAMA, orufu okujuumikira ensi, kandi na maraika wa MUKAMA naacwekyereza ensi ya Israeli yoona. Mbwenu gira eki waihamu, ongambire eki ndaagarukyemu ontumire.
Daudi yaagira Gaadi ati: Naashobererwa kimwe; ka ngwe omu mikono ya MUKAMA, ahakuba embabazi ze ni nyingi munonga; ndekye kugwa omu mikono y'abantu.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaajuumikiza Israeli orufu, haafa Abaisraeli obukumi mushanju.

Ruhanga yaatuma maraika Yerusaalemu kugicwekyereza; kwonka ku yaabaire ari haihi kugicwekyereza, MUKAMA yaareeba, yaayegarukamu ahabw'ako kabi; yaagira maraika owaabaire naacwekyereza, ati: Ekyo nikimara; banguura omukono. Obwo maraika wa MUKAMA akaba ari haihi n'embuga ya Orunaani Omuyebusi.

Daudi yaimutsya amaisho, yaareeba maraika wa MUKAMA ayemereire ahagati y'ensi n'eiguru, asyoireyo rurara, agyorekyeize Yerusaalemu. Ahonaaho Daudi n'abakuru baagwa ahasni bajuumaire, bajwaire ebiguniya.

Daudi yaagira Ruhanga ati: Tiinye ndagiire kubara abantu? Niinye ncumwire, nkakora kub munonga. Mbwenu entaama ezi zo zikozire ki? Ninkweshengyereza, MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, ba niinye waarwanisa n'enju ya tata; kwonka orekye kureeta orufu aha bantu baawe.
Atyo Daudi yainamuka ahabw'ekigambo kya Gaadi, eki yaagamba omu iziina rya MUKAMA.
Obwo Orunaani akaba naahuura engano; yaahinduka, yaareeba maraika, batabani be bana, abu yaabaire aine, baayeshereka.
Daudi ku yaabaire naizira Orunaani, Orunaani yaimutsya amaisho, yaamureeba, ahonaaho yaaruga aha mbuga, yainama, yaamutangirira.
Daudi yaagira Orunaani ati: Mpa ekibanja eki embuga yaawe erimu, nyombekyeremu MUKAMA eitambiro, orufu rubone kuruga aha bantu; kandi okinguze aha buguzi bwakyo bwona obukishemereire.

Orunaani yaagira Daudi ati: Kitware, Nyakusinga omugabe! okore eki orikusiima kyona; reeba, naakuha ente z'ebitambo by'okwotsya, n'ebihuuzo obiihemu enku n'engano ogiihemu empongano y'esaano. Byona naabikuha.

Kwonka omugabe Daudi yaagira Orunaani ati: Ngaaha! kureka niinyija kukigura aha buguzi bwakyo bwona obukishemereire. Tindikwija kuhongyera MUKAMA ebyawe, n'obu kwakuba okutamba ebitambo eby'okwotsya, ebi ntaheereire byangye.
Atyo Daudi yaarenga shekeli z'ezaabu magana mukaaga, yaaziihura Orunaani ahabw'ekibanja.

Bwanyima Daudi yaayombekyerayo MUKAMA eitambiro, yaamuhongyera ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, yaashaba MUKAMA, nawe yaamugarukamu n'omuriro ogurikuruga omu iguru, gwagwa aha itambiro ry'ebitambo eby'okwotsya.
Ahonaaho MUKAMA yaaragiira maraika; yaagarura rurara ye omu kyobati kyayo.
Omu bunaku obwo Daudi ku yaareebire MUKAMA amugarukiiremu aha mbuga ya Orunaani Omuyebusi, yaatambirayo ebitambo.
Ahakuba Eihema rya MUKAMA, eri Musa yaakoreire omu ihamba, n'eitambiro ry'ebitambo by'okwotsya omu biro ebyo bikaba biri Gibeoni omu mwanya mukru gw'okuramizamu.
Kwonka Daudi tiyaabaasa kuza omu maisho gaaryo kwehanuuza ahari Ruhanga, ahabw'okuba akaba atiinire rurara ya maraika wa MUKAMA.
Kandi yaateekateeka ebyoma bingi by'okuheeshamu emisumaari y'enyigi z'amarembo, n'emiringa mingi munonga erengire ekigyero,
n'ebiti by'emyereez ebitarikubarwa; ahabw'okuba Abasidoni n'Abatuuro bakareetera Daudi emyereezi mingi.

Ahakuba Daudi akagira ati: Sulemaani mutabani wangye akiri muto, takahamire, kandi enju erikwija kwombekyerwa MUKAMA eshemereire kuba ey'ekitiinisa kingi munonga, ekarangaanwa, ekahimbisibwa omu nsi zoona; n'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kugiteekateekyera eby'okugyombeka. Atyo Daudi yaateekateeka ebintu bingi munonga atakafiire.
Bwanyima yaayeta omutabani Sulemaani, yaamwehanangiriza kwombekyera MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli enju.
Yaagira Sulemaani ati: Mwana wangye, nkashangwa nkiine aha mutima kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye enju.
Kwonka ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyizira, nikigira kiti: Okasheesha eshagama nyingi, waarwana engamba nyingi; toryombekyera iziina ryangye nju, ahabw'okuba okasheesha eshagama nyingi omu maisho gangye.

Reeba, oryazaarirwa omwana, abe ow'obusingye; kandi ndyamuha obusingye aha bazigu be boona abariba bamwehinguririize; ahakuba eiziina rye aryayetwa Sulemaani; kandi omu biro bye ndyaha Israeli obusingye n'okutuuza.
Ogwo niwe aryombekyera eiziina ryangye enju. Aryaba omwana wangye, naanye mbe ishe; kandi ndyahamya ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe omuri Israeli ebiro byona.
Mbwenu, mwana wangye, MUKAMA agume naiwe, obone kwombeka enju ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, ogiheze gye, nk'oku yaakugambireho.
Kwonka, MUKAMA akuhe obwengye n'okwetegyereza, ku araakutegyekyese Israeli, oyorobere ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.
Obwo, ku orita omutima aha kworobera ebiragiro n'ebyatairweho ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire Musa ahabwa Israeli, oryaba gye. Ba ow'amaani, ogume; otatiina, kandi otahahaaza omutima.

Reeba, omu kufa kubi kwangye nteekateekyeire enju ya MUKAMA etalanta z'ezaabu akasiriira kamwe, n'ez'efeeza akakaikuru, n'emiringa n'ebyoma ebirengire ekigyero, ahabw'okuba ni bingi munoga; kandi nteekateekire embaaho n'amabaare. Ahari ebyo naiwe oryayongyeraho.
Kandi oine abakozi baingi munonga, ababaizi b'amabaare, abombeki, ababaizi, abanyamyoga b'emiringo yoona abatarikubarwa,
abarikumanya kukoresa ezaabu, efeeza, emiringa n'ebyoma. Imuka okore! MUKAMA agume naiwe.

Timurikumanya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu ku ari hamwe naimwe? Kandi tabahaire obusignye embaju zoona? Ahabw'okuba akahayo abatuuzi b'ensi egi omu mikono yangye; kandi ensi egomoirwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'omu maisho g'bantu be.

Mbwenu mute omutima gwanyu gwona aha kusherura MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu. Mwimukye, mwombekye Omwanya ogurikwera ogwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, mubone kureeta eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, n'ebintu ebirikwera bya Ruhanga, omu nju eryombekyerwa eiziina rye.
Yaateeranira hamwe abakuru ba Israeli boona, n'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi.
Batyo baabara Abaleevi abahikize emyaka makumi ashatu n'abagirengize, boona baaba abashaija obukumi bushatu n'enkumi munaana.
Daudi yaagira ati: Omuri aba, obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina bakwatsibwe omurimo gw'okuheereza omu nju ya MUKAMA, enkumi mukaaga babe abatware n'abaramuzi,
enkumi ina babe abarinzi b'amarembo, kandi enkumi ina babe ab'okuhimbisa MUKAMA n'ebintu ebi nkozire ahabw'okuhimbisa.
Daudi yaabacwamu ebicweka nk'oku batabani ba Leevi baabaire bari: Gereshoni, Kohasi na Merari.
Batabani ba Gereshoni bakaba bari Ladani na Shimei.
Beene Ladani: omukuru Yehieli, naakuratwa Zesamu na Yoeli, boona bashatu.
Beene Shimei, Shelomiisi, Hazieli, na Harani, boona bashatu. Abo nibo baabaire bari abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru ba Ladani.
Beene Shimei, Yahasi, Ziina, Yeushi na Beria. Abo bana bakaba bari beene Shimei.
Yahasi niwe yaabaire ari mukuru, naakuratwa Ziiza, kwonka Yeushi na Beria bakaba bataine baana b'aboojo baingi; nikyo kyabareeteire kubarwa nk'ab'enju emwe eya baishenkurubo.

Beene Amuraamu, Arooni na Musa. Kandi Arooni ogwo niwe yaashoroirwe kuba ow'okweza ebintu ebirikwera munonga, we n'oruzaaro rwe kuguma nibootera obubaane omu maisho ga MUKAMA nibamuheereza, kandi n'okushabira abantu omugisha omu iziina rye ebiro byona.
Kwonka beene Musa omushaija wa Ruhanga bakaba nibabarirwa omu ruganda rwa Leevi.
Beene Musa, Gereshoni na Eliezeeri.
Beene Gereshoni omukuru ni Shebueli.
Beene Eliezeeri; Rehabia, niwe yaabaire ari mukuru, kandi Eliezeeri akaba ataine bandi baana b'aboojo, kwonka beene Rehabia bakaba bari baingi munonga.
Beene Izuhaari, Shelomiisi niwe yaabaire ari mukuru.
Beene Heburooni, Yeria niwe yaabaire ari mukuru, owa kabiri Amaria, owa kashatu Yahazieli, n'owa kana Yekameamu.
Beene Uzieli, Miika niwe yaabaire ari mukuru, naakuratwa Ishia.
Eleazaari yaafa atazaire baana b'aboojo, kureka abaishiki bonka; beene waabo batabani ba Kiishi baabashwera.
Beene Muushi, Mahili, Ederi na Yeremoosi, boona bashatu.
Ahabw'okuba Daudi akagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli ahaire abantu be obusingye; kandi atuura omuri Yerusaalemu ebiro byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abaleevi tibakyetenga kuheeka Ihema, n'obu kyakuba ekintu kyona eky'okukoresa omurimo gwaryo;
(ahakuba ahabw'ekiragiro kya Daudi eky'aha muheru Abaleevi abahikize emyaka makumi abiri n'abagirengize bakabarwa)

kureka omurimo gwabo guryaba okuhwera beene Arooni ahabw'obuheereza omu nju ya MUKAMA, bakwatsiibwe ebibuga, ebishengye, okushemeza ebintu byona ebirikwera, kandi n'omurimo gwona ogw'okukora aha nju ya Ruhanga;

kandi n'okuhwera omu by'emigaati ey'okumurikwa, omu by'esaano ahabw'empongano z'esaano, omu bya capati z'emigaati etatumbisiibwe, omu by'empongano eziteekire, omu by'empongano ezijwangizemu amajuta, n'omu bigyero byona eby'okurengyesa obwingi n'obuhango.
Buri kasheeshe baryayemerera basiime MUKAMA, nibamuhimbisa, kandi n'omu mwabazyo batyo;

kandi ku bariba nibahongyera MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya ahari buri sabato, nari ahari buri kuboneka kw'okwezi, nari aha biro bikuru by'amagyenyi, nk'ebiragiro byabyo oku biri, bakore batyo obutoosha omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Okwo nikwo baririnda Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, kandi bakaheereza beene waabo, beene Arooni, omu buheereza bw'omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Embu za beene Arooni zikaba ziri ziti. Batabani ba Arooni: Nadabu, Abihu, Eleazaari na Itamaari.
Kwonka Nadabu na Abihu bakabandiza ishebo kufa, kandi bakaba bataine baana; nikyo Eleazaari na Itamaari baabeereire abanyamurwa.
Daudi yaahwerwa Zadoki ow'omuri beene Eleazaari, na Ahimeleki ow'omuri beene Itamaari, kubabaganisa omu buheereza bwabo nk'emirimo ei bateereirweho oku eri.
Ahabwa beene Eleazaari kugira abantu bakuru baingi okweshumba beene Itamaari, baataho abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo ikumi na mukaaga omuri beene Eleazaari, na munaana omuri beene Itamaari.
Baababaganisa n'enteenyu, boona omu muringo gumwe; ahakuba omuri beene Eleazaari n'omuri beene Itamaari hakaba harimu abatware b'Omwanya Ogurikwera, n'abatware ba Ruhanga.

Bwanyima Shemaya mwene Netaneeli omuhandiiki ow'omu Baleevi yaabahandiikira omu maisho g'omugabe n'abanyiginya, na Zadoki omunyamurwa, na Ahimeleki mwne Abiasaari, n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, enju emwe yaatooranirwa Eleazaari, n'endiijo Itamaari nibakuratana.
Orubu rw'okubanza rwaba orwa Yehoyaribu, orwa kabiri Yedaaya,
orwa kashatu Harimu, orwa kana Serorimi,
orwa kataano Malukiya, orwa mukaaga Miyamiinu,
orwa mushanju Hakozi, orwa munaana Abiya,
orwa mwenda Yeshua, orwa ikumi Shekaniya,
orwa ikumi na rumwe Eliashibu, orwa ikumi na ibiri Yakimi,
orwa ikumi na ishatu Huupa, orwa ikumi na ina Yeshebeabu,
orwa ikumi na itaano Biluga, orwa ikumi na mukaaga Imeri,
orwa ikumi na mushanju Heziri, orwa ikumi na munaana Hapizeezi,
orwa ikumi na mwenda Pesahia, orwa makumi abiri Yehezekeeli,
orwa makumi abiri na rumwe Yakini, orwa makumi abiri na ibiri Gamuli,
orwa makumi abiri na ishatu Delaaya, orwa makumi abiri na ina Maaziya.
Ezo nizo zaabaire ziri embu z'emirimo y'obuheereza bwabo okutaaha omu nju ya MUKAMA, nibakuratira emitwarize ei baateereirweho Arooni, ishenkurubo, nk'oku MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli yaamuragiire.
Beene Rehabia; omuri beene Rehabia, omukuru Ishia.
Beene Izuhaari: Shelomoosi; omuri beene Shelomoosi, Yahasi;
Beene Heburooni: omukuru Yeria, owa kabiri Amari; owa kashatu Yahazieli, owa kana Yekameamu.
Beene Uzieli, Muika; omuri beene Miika, Shamiri.
Murumuna wa Miika, Ishia; omuri beene Ishia, Zekaria.
Beene Merari: Mahili na Muushi. Beene Yaaziya: Beno.
Beene Merari: aba Yaaziya, Beno, Shohamu, Zakuri, na Iburi.
Owa Mahili, Eleazaari, owaabaire ataine baana b'aboojo.
Aba Kiishi, beene Kiishi Yerameeli.
Beene Muushi, Mahili, Ederi na Yerimoosi. Abo nibo batabani ba beene Leevi nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabare gari,

kandi abo bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, omukuru wa buri nju ya baishenkuru hamwe n'omurumuna, baateera enteenyu nka beene waabo beene Arooni, nibaziteerera omu maisho g'omugabe Daudi, na Zadoki na Ahimeleki, kandi n'omu maisho g'abakuru b'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi.
Omuri beene Asafu, Zakuri, Yosefu, Netania, na Ashareela, beene Asafu, abaabaire nibeebemberwa Asafu, naaragura nk'ekiragiro ky'omugabe oku kyabaire kiri.

Aba Yedusuuni, beene Yedusuuni: Gedalia, Zeeri, Yeshaaya, Shiemei, Hashabia na Matisia, boona mukaaga nibeebemberwa ishebo Yedusuuni, owaabaire naaragura n'endingiri, naasiima MUKAMA kandi naamuhimbisa.
Aba Hemani, beene Hemani: Bukia, Matania, Uzieli, Shebueli, na Yerimoosi, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Gidaliti, na Romamutiezeeri, Yoshibekasha, Maloosi, Hosiri na Mahaziosi.

Abo boona bakaba bari beene Hemani omuhanuuzi w'omugabe, owaabaire naahanuura ebigambo bya Ruhanga eby'okumuha ekitiinisa; kandi Ruhanga yaaha Hemani abaana b'aboojo ikumi na bana, n'ab'abaishiki bashatu.

Abo boona bakaba beebemberwa ishebo, nibeeshongorera omu nju ya MUKAMA n'ebitaasa n'enanga n'endingiri, nibakora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu nju ya Ruhanga. Kandi Asafu na Yedusuuni na Hemani bakaba baragiirwa omugabe.
Omubaro gwabo hamwe na beene waabo abaabaire beegyesiibwe okweshongorera MUKAMA, boona abaabaire nibakumanya gye, bakaba bari magana abiri na makumi munaana na munaana.
Bwanyima baateerera emirimo yaabo enteenyu, abakuru n'abato, abeegyesa n'abeegi boona hamwe.
Enteenyu y'okubanza yaakwata Yosefu ahabwa Asafu; eya kabiri, Gedalia na beene ishe n'abatabani, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya kashatu, Zakuri n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya kana, Izuri, n'abatabani ba beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya kataano, Netania n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya mukaaga, Bukia n'abatabani ba beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya mushanju, Yeshareela, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri,
eya munaana, Yeshaaya n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya mwenda, Matania n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi Shimei n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi n'emwe, Azareeli n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na ibiri, Hashabia, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na ishatu, Shubaeli n'abatabani ba beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na ina, Matisia, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na itaano Yeremoosi, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri,
eya ikumi na mukaaga, Hanania, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na mushanju Yeshebekasha, n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na munaana, Hanani n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya ikumi na mwenda, Maloosi n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya makumi abiri, Eliasa n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya makumi abiri n'emwe, Hosiri n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya makumi abiri na ibiri, Gidaliti n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
eya makumi abiri na ishatu, Mahaziosi n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri;
n'eya makumi abiri na ina, Romamutiezeeri n'abatabani na beene ishe, boona ikumi na babiri.
Eby'embu z'abakumiirizi b'amarembo; ab'omu ba Koora, Meshelemia mwene Koore, ow'omuri beene Asafu.
Kandi Meshelemia ogwo akaba aine abaana b'aboojo; ow'omujigaijo Zekaria, owa kabiri Yedyaeli, owa kashatu Zebadia, owa kana Yatinyeli,
owa kataano Elamu, owa mukaaga Yehohanani, owa mushanju Elyeho-enai.
Obededomu nawe akaba aine abatabani: ow'omujigaijo Shemaaya, owa kabiri Yehozabadi, owa kashatu Yoa, owa kana Skari, owa kataano Netaneeli,
owa mukaaga Amieli, owa mushanju Isakaari, owa munaana Peulesa; ahakuba Ruhanga akamuha omugisha.
Kandi omutabani Shemaaya akazaara abaana b'aboojo, abaabaire bari abategyeki omu maju ga baishenkurubo; ahabw'okuba bakaba bari abashaija b'amaani amamanzi.
Beene Shemaaya: Otuni, Refaeli, Ebedi, Elizabaadi na beene ishe abaabaire bari amamanzi, Elihu na Semakia.
Abo boona bakaba bari beene Obededomu hamwe na batabani baabo na beene ishebo, abashaija b'amaani abaabaire nibabaasa ogwo murimo; aba Obededomu boona bakaba bari makumi mukaaga na babiri.
Kandi Meshelemia akaba aine abatabani na beene ishe, abashaija amamanzi ikumi na munaana.
Na Hoosa ow'omuri beene Merari akaba aine abatabani: omukuru ari Shimuri, (ahakuba n'obu araabe yaabaire atari w'omujigaijo, ishe akamuhindura mukuru),
owa kabiri Hilukia, owa kashatu Tebalia, n'owa kana Zekaria; batabani ba Hoosa na beene ishe boona bakaba bari ikumi na bashatu.
Abakumiirizi b'amarembo omuri ezo mbu, nk'abakuru baabo oku baabaire bari, bakaba baine emirimo ei bakwatsiibwe, nka beene waabo abaabaire nibaheereza omu nju ya MUKAMA oku baabaire bagiine;
kandi baateerera amaju ga baishenkurubo enteenyu, amakye n'amahango, kumanya ab'okurinda amarembo gaabo.
Enteenyu yaakwata Shelemia kurinda eirembo ry'oburugwa-izooba. Bwanyima baateerera omutabani Zekaria enteenyu, omuhanuuzi w'obwengye; yaakwatwa ey'okurinda ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Obededomu yaakwata ey'okurinda ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo; kandi abatabani baakwatsibwa eibiikiro.
Shupimu na Hoosa baakwatwa ey'okurinda eirembo ry'oburengyerwa-izooba, n'eirembo rya Shalekesi aha muhanda ogurikwinamuka, ahu abakumiirizi barikureebanira.
Aha burugwa-izooba haazaho mukaaga buri izooba, aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bana buri izooba; aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo bana, kandi n'aha ibiikiro babiri-babiri;
ahari Paribaari oburengyerwa-izooba bana ahari ogwo muhanda, na babiri ahari Paribaari.
Ezo nizo mbu z'abakumiirizi b'amarembo b'omuri beene Koore, na beene Merari.
Beene Ladani, beene Gereshoni ab'omu ba Ladani, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo ba Ladani owa Gereshoni: Yahieli.
Omu ba Amuraamu, Abaizuhaari, Abaheburooni n'Abauzieli-
na Shebueli mwene Gereshoni, mwijukuru wa Musa, niwe yaabaire akwatsiibwe amabiikiro.
Beene ishe Eliezeeri akakomookwaho Rehabia omutabani, mwene Rehebia Yeshaaya, mwene Yeshaaya Yoramu, mwene Yoramu Zikuri, mwene Zikuri Shelomoosi;

Shelemoosi ogwo na beene ishe nibo baabaire bakwatsiibwe amabiikiro goona ag'ebintu ebyeziibwe, ebi Daudi omugabe n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo n'abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'aba igana-igana n'abakuru b'amahe, baayerize.
Omu bintu ebi baanyagire omu ngamba bakashorooramu ebintu by'okuhunduuza enju ya MUKAMA.

Kandi ebi Samueli omuhanuuzi na Saulo mwene Kiishi, na Abuneeri mwene Neeri, na Yoabu mwene Zeruiya baayerize byona, ebi omuntu weena yaabaire ahongyeire MUKAMA byona bikaba birindwa Shelomoosi na beene ishe.
Omuri beene Izuhaari, Kanania n'abatabani nibo baabaire bakwatsiibwe omurimo gw'aheeru ahabw'Abaisraeli, bari abatware n'abaramuzi.

Omuri beene Heburooni, Hashabia ana beene ishe, abashaija amamanzi rukumi na magana mushanju, nibo baabaire nibareeberera Israeli oburengyerwa-izooba bwa Yorudani ahabw'omurimo gwa MUKAMA gwona, n'ahabw'omurimo gw'omugabe.

Omu ba Heburooni abo Yeriya niwe yaabaire ari omukuru waabo, nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rw'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku kwabaire kuri. (Omu mwaka gwa makumi ana ogw'omu busingye bwa Daudi bakasherura, baashanga omuri abo ba Heburooni abashaija b'amaani amamanzi, bari Yazeri omuri Gileadi.)

Omugabe Daudi yaataho Yeriya ogwo na beene ishe, abashaija amamanzi enkumi ibiri na magana mushanju, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, kuba ab'okureeberera Abareubeeni, Abagaadi n'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, ahabw'ebintu bya Ruhanga byona, kandi n'eby'omugabe.

Aga nigo maziina g'Abaisraeli, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'aba igana-igana n'abatware baabo abaabaire nibaheereza omugabe omu murimo gw'okureeberera abantu omu by'okwihaihana kw'embu zaabo, buri rubu rukaba rurimu abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Akaba ari ow'omuri baijukuru ba Pereezi, kandi ari omutegyeki mukuru w'abakuru b'amahe boona omu kwezi kw'okubanza.
Dodai owa Ahohi niwe yaabaire naareeberera ab'orubu rw'okwezi kwa kabiri; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Omukuru wa kashatu omu kwezi kwa kashatu akaba ari Benaaya mwene Yehoyaada omunyamurwa mukuru; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Benaaya ogwo niwe yaabaire ari omushaija w'amaani ow'omuri bari amakumi ashatu, kandi ari omukuru waabo. Amizabaadi omutabani akaba ari omu rubu rwe.
Asaheeli murumuna wa Yoabu niwe yaabaire ari omukuru wa kana omu kwezi kwa kana, naakuratwa omutabani Zebadia; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Omukuru wa kataano omu kwezi kwa kataano akaba ari Shamuhuusi owa Izuraahi; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Omukuru wa mukaaga omu kwezi kwa mukaaga akaba ari Iira mwene Ikeshi owa Tekoa; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Omukuru wa mushanju omu kwezi kwa mushanju akaba ari Helezi owa Pelooni ow'omuri beene Efuraimu; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Owa munaana omu kwezi kwa munaana akaba ari Sibekai, owa Huusha, ow'omu ba Zeera; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Owa mwenda omu kwezi kwa mwenda akaba ari Abiezeeri owa Anatoosi, Omubenyamiini; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Owa ikumi, omu kwezi kwa ikumi akaba ari Maharai owa Netofa, ow'omu ba Zeera; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Owa ikumi n'omwe omu kwezi kwa ikumi na kumwe akaba ari Benaaya owa Piratooni ow'omuri beene Efuraimu; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Owa ikumi na babiri omu kwezi kwa ikumi n'abiri akaba ari Heludai owa Netofa mwene Otinyeli; ab'omu rubu rwe bakaba bari obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ina.
Kandi abategyeki b'enganda za Israeli nibo aba; omukuru w'Abareubeeni akaba ari Eliezeeri mwene Zikuri; ow'Abasimeoni, Shefatia mwene Maaka;
ow'Abaleevi, Hashabia mwene Kemueli; ow'aba Arooni, Zadoki;
ow'Abayuda, Elihu omwe ahari bakuru ba Daudi; ow'Abaisakaari, Omuri mwene Mikaeli;
ow'Abazebuluuni, Ishimaaya, mwene Obadia; ow'Abanafutaali, Yeremoosi mwene Azurieli;
ow'Abaefuraimu, Hoshea mwene Azazia; ow'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase, Yoeli mwene Pedaya;
ow'ekicweka ky'oruganda rwa Manaase eky'omuri Gileadi, Ido mwene Zekaria; ow'Ababenyamiini, Yaasieli mwene Abuneeri;
ow'Abadaani, Azareeli mwene Yerohaamu. Abo nibo baabaire bari abakuru b'enganda za Israeli.
Kwonka Daudi tarabazire batakahikize myaka makumi abiri, ahakuba MUKAMA akagamba ku arikanyisa Abaisraeli, bakaba nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru.
Yoabu mwene Zeruiya yaatandika kubara, kwonka tiyaaheza; nikyo ekiniga kyaiziire ahari Israeli, kandi omubaro ogwo tiguhandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'omugabe Daudi.
Omureeberezi w'amabiikiro g'omugabe akaba ari Azimaveesi mwene Adieli; ow'amabiikiro g'omu byaro, omu ndembo, omu birorero n'omu bigo, Yonasaani mwene Uziya;
ow'abahingi b'omu misiri, Ezeri mwene Kelubu;
ow'emisiri y'emizaabibu Shimei owa Raama; ow'ebirikuruga omu mizaabibu eby'okubiikwa omu mabiikiro ga viinyo, Zabudi owa Shiifu;
ow'emiti y'emizeituuni n'emisikamoori ey'omu ruhita, Baali-hanani owa Gederi; ow'amabiikiro g'amajuta, Yoashi;
ow'amasyo agaabaire gariira Sharooni, Shiturai owa Sharooni; ow'amasyo agaabaire gariira omu mpita, Shafati mwene Adulai;
ow'engamira, Ebili owa Ishimaeli; ow'endogoya, Yehedeeya owa Meranoosi; kandi ow'obusyo bw'entaama, Yazizi owa Hagiri.
Abo boona nibo baabaire bari ababiiki b'ebintu bya Daudi.
Yonasaani ishento wa Daudi niwe yaabaire ari omuhanuuzi, omushaija orikwetegyereza kandi omuhandiiki; we na Yehieli mwene Hakimooni nibo baabaire nibarera abaana b'omugabe.
Ahisofeeli akaba ari omuhanuuzi w'omugabe, na Hushai owa Aruki ari munywani w'omugabe.
Ahisofeeli akakuratwa Yehoyaada mwene Benaaya, na Abiasaari. Kandi Yoabu niwe yaabaire ari omukuru w'eihe ry'omugabe.

Bwanyima Daudi yaimuka, yaagira ati: Imwe beene tata n'abashaija bangye, mumpurire. Nkashangwa nkiine aha mutima kwombekyera eshanduukye y'endaagano ya MUKAMA enju y'okugitamu, n'okuba akatebe k'ebigyere ka Ruhanga; kandi nikwo naabaire nyetegwire ntyo.
Kwonka Ruhanga yangira ati: Torikwija kwombekyera iziina ryangye nju, ahabw'okuba ori omushaija omurwani, kandi okasheesha eshagama nyingi.

N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kiri kityo, MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli akantoorana omu ruganda rwa baatatenkuru rwona kuba omugabe wa Israeli ebiro byona; ahabw'okuba akatoorana Yuda kuba omwebembezi, omu ruganda rwa Yuda yaatoorana enju ya tata, kandi omuri beene tata yaaba niinye yaihamu, yanshemerererwa, yangira omugabe wa Israeli yoona.
Mbwenu omuri batabani bangye boona, (ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akampa abaana b'aboojo baingi,) yaatooranamu mutabani wangye Sulemaani kuba niwe yaaza aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa MUKAMA kutegyeka Israeli.
Yangira ati: Mutabani waawe Sulemaani niwe aryombeka enju yangye, n'ebikaari byangye, ahabw'okuba mmutooraine kuba omwana wangye, naanye nkaba ishe.
Ku arigumizamu kworobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho, nk'oku ari hati, ndyahamya obugabe bwe.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati omu maisho ga Israeli yoona, nigwo mutwe gw'abantu ba MUKAMA abateeraine, kandi omu maisho ga Ruhanga waitu orikutuhurira, mute omutima aha biragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu byona, mubiijukye, mubone kukubuura ensi egi enungi, nyentsya mugitsigire abaana baanyu abaribakurata, ebe obuhunguzi bwabo ebiro byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo mbwenu oyerinda; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akutooraine kwombekyera Obutaaho bwe enju: ba ow'amaani, ogikore.

kandi eky'okureeberaho ky'ebi yaabaire aine omu mutima byona, eky'ebikaari by'enju ya MUKAMA, n'ebishengye byona ebigyehinguririize, n'amabiikiro g'enju ya Ruhanga, n'ag'ebintu by'emitoijo ebyashoroirwe;
kandi n'eby'embu z'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, n'eby'emirimo yoona ey'okukorerwa omu nju ya MUKAMA; n'eby'ebintu byona eby'okukoresibwa omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Kandi yaamugambira oburemeezi bw'ezaabu ahabw'ebintu by'ezaabu eby'okukoresa emirimo yoona, n'oburemeezi bw'efeeza ahabw'ebintu by'efeeza ahabw'emirimo yoona,
n'oburemeezi bw'ekikondo ky'amatabaaza n'amatabaaza gaakyo eby'ezaabu, n'oburemeezi bw'ezaabu ahabw'ekikondo kyona n'amataabaza gaakyo, nka buri kikondo oku kirikoresibwa omu buheereza bwabo,
n'oburemeezi bw'ezaabu za buri meeza y'emigaati y'okumurikwa, n'obw'efeeza ahabw'emeeza z'efeeza,
n'obw'ezaabu eshemeziibwe ahabw'eby'okwihuza enyama, n'enyabya, n'ebikopo; n'obw'ezaabu za buru bakuri y'ezaabu, n'obw'efeeza za buri bakuri y'efeeza;

kandi n'eky'okureeberaho ky'eitambiro ry'okwotereraho obubaane, ery'okukorwa omu zaabu eshemeziibwe, n'oburemeezi bwayo; kandi n'eky'okureeberaho ky'ekigaari ky'ezaabu ekya baakerubi abashashanwire amapapa gaabo, gakashweka eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA.
Daudi yaagira ati: Ebyo byona nkabimanyisibwa ebyahandiikirwe omukono gwa MUKAMA; egyo niyo mirimo yoona nk'eky'okureeberaho kyayo oku kiri.

Kandi reeba, hariho embu z'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi ahabw'omurimo gwona ogw'obuheereza bw'omu nju ya Ruhanga; kandi omuri egyo mirimo yoona, oryaba oine omuntu weena oyekundiire, omunyamwoga w'okukora omurimo gwa buri muringo; kandi n'abategyeki hamwe n'abantu boona baryaba bari omu bushoboorozi bwawe kuhurira eki orikubaragiira.

N'ahabw'ekyo ntegwire enju ya Ruhanga wangye, nk'oku ndikubaasa, naatunga ezaabu ahabw'ebintu by'ezaabu, efeeza ahabw'ebintu by'efeeza, emiringa ahabw'ebintu by'emiringa, ebyoma ahabw'ebintu by'ebyoma, n'ebiti ahabw'ebintu by'ebiti, otabariireho mabaare amaingi agarikwetwa shohamu, n'agandi mabaare maingi g'okuhunda, n'amabaare garikwengyengyeta ag'amabara maingi n'ag'obuguzi bwingi ag'emiringo yoona, n'agarikwetwa marimaari agatarikubarwa.

Kandi ahabw'okukunda oku nyine aha nju ya Ruhanga wangye, nk'oku nyine obutungi bwangye ahabwangye obw'ezaabu n'efeeza, mbwenu naabuhayo ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga wangye, okwongyera ahari ebyo byona ebi naateekateekyeire egyo nju erikwera;
n'etalanta z'ezaabu za Ofiri enkumi ishatu, ez'efeeza eshemeziibwe enkumi mushanju ez'okushweka ebisiika by'enju,
ezaabu ahabw'ebintu by'ezaabu, n'efeeza ahabw'ebintu by'efeeza, ebirikukorwa abanyamyoga b'obwengye. Mbwenu eri izooba n'oha orikwikiriza kugira eki yaahayo, naayeyereza MUKAMA?
Baahayo etalanta z'ezaabu enkumi itaano na dariki kakumi, etalanta z'efeeza kakumi, ez'emiringa kakumi n'enkumi munaana, n'etalanta z'ebyoma akasiriira, ahabw'omurimo gw'enju ya Ruhanga.
Kandi omuntu weena owaabaire aine amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi, yaagahayo, baagata omu ibikiro ry'enju ya MUKAMA kurindwa Yehieli owa Gereshoni.
Bwanyima abantu baashemererwa, ahabw'okuba abo bantu bakahayo n'omutima ogwekundiire; ahakuba bakahongyera MUKAMA n'omutima gwabo gwona batarikugyemwa; kandi n'omugabe Daudi yaashemererwa munonga.

Ai MUKAMA, obukuru, obushoboorozi, ekitiinisa, obusinguzi n'okutiinwa n'ebyawe; ahakuba ebiri omu iguru n'eby'omu nsi byona n'ebyawe; obukam n'obwawe, ai MUKAMA, kandi ohimbisibwa ahabw'okuba Omutwe gwa byona.
Obutungi n'ekitiinisa niiwe bikomookaho, kandi otegyeka byona. Omu mukono gwawe harimu obushoboorozi n'amaani, kandi niiwe orikubaasa kukuza, n'okuha boona amaani.
Mwenu hati, Ruhanga waitu, nitukusiima, kandi nitusingiza eiziina ryawe ery'ekitiinisa.
Mbwenu nkaanye ndi oha, nyowe n'abantu bangye, okubaasa kukuhongyera tuti n'omutima gwekundiire? Ahakuba byona biruga ahariiwe, kandi ebi twakuha n'ebyawe.
Ahabw'okuba omu maisho gaawe turi abagyenyi n'abashuhuuki, nka baatatenkuriitwe boona oku baabaire bari; ebiro ebi tumara aha nsi ni nk'ekicuucu, tihariho matsiko g'okumereera.
Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, ebintu ebi byona ebingi, ebi tuteekateekire kukwombekyera enju ahabw'eiziina ryawe eririkwera, birugire omu mukono gwawe, kandi byona n'ebyawe.

Ruhanga wangye, nimmanya ngu ocaaka emitima, kandi oshemerererwa amazima; naanye ahabwangye naahonga ebintu ebi byona n'omutima gw'amazima ntarikugyemwa; kandi hati naareeba abantu baawe abari aha nibakuhongyera n'okushemererwa kwingi batarikugyemwa.
Ai MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, owa Isaaka, kandi n'owa Israeli baatatenkuriitwe, ebi obihamye omu biteekateeko by'omu mitima y'abantu baawe; otebeekanise emitima yaabo, ebe niiwe yaazaho.
Kandi mutabani wangye Sulemaani, omuhe kworobera ebiragiro byawe n'ebi waahamize n'ebyatairweho n'omutima gwe gwona, akore ebyo byona, kandi ayombekye nyaruju ei naateekateekire kwombeka.

Ku bwaseesire, baatambira MUKAMA ebitambo, kandi baamuhongyera empongano z'ebitambo by'okwotsya, enimi rukumi, empaya z'entaama rukumi, n'abaana b'entaama rukumi, hamwe n'empongano zaabyo z'eby'okunywa n'ebindi bitambo bingi munonga ahabwa Israeli yoona;

eryo izooba baarya, baanywa bashemereirwe, bari omu maisho ga MUKAMA. Baagaruka baayemeka Sulemaani mwene Daudi omugabe obwa kabiri, baamushukaho amajuta g'okumushoroorera MUKAMA kuba omugabe, na Zadoki kuba omunyamurwa.
Abeebembezi boona n'abashaija amamanzi, kandi na batabani b'omugabe Daudi boona baahiga omu maisho g'omugabe Sulemaani, ku barikwija kuba abashaija be.
MUKAMA yaakuza Sulemaani munonga omu maisho ga Israeli yoona, yaamuha ekitiinisa ky'obugabe ekitakabaga ha mugabe weena owaamubandiize omuri Israeli.
Okwo nikwo Daudi mwene Yese yaategyekire Israeli yoona.
Emyaka ei yaamazire naategyeka Israeli ekahika makumi ana; emyaka mushanju akagimara Heburooni, kandi emyaka makumi ashatu n'eshatu yaagimara Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima yaafa, yaahikire omu ngingo zaabukuru, amazire ebiro bingi ari omutungi munonga, kandi aine ekitiinisa kingi; omutabani Sulemaani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.

Ebi omugabe Daudi yaakozire byona, okwiha aha by'okubanza okuhitsya aha by'aha muheru, bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebyabaireho ekya Samueli omuhanuuzi, n'ekya Nasani nabi, kandi n'ekya Gaadi omuhanuuzi,
hamwe n'eby'obutegyeki bwe bwona, n'eby'amaani ge, n'ebyamubaireho, n'ahari Israeli kandi n'aha bugabe bwona obw'ezo nsi.
Sulemaani yaagamba na Israeli yoona, abakuru b'engabo rukumi-rukumi n'aba igana-igana, abaramuzi, n'abeembezi ba Israeli boona, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo.

Kandi Sulemaani hamwe n'omutwe gwona ogw'abantu baaza Gibeoni omu mwanya, mukuru gw'okuramizamu; ahabw'okuba niyo Eihema rya Ruhanga ry'okubugaabuganiramu, eri Musa omwiru wa MUKAMA yaakozire omu ihamba, ryabaire riri.
(Kwonka eshanduukye ya Ruhanga, Daudi akaba agiinamwire, agiihire Kiryasi-yearimu, agitwaire omu mwanya ogu yaabaire agibonereize; ahakuba akaba agiteereire eihema Yerusaalemu.)

Kandi eitambiro ry'emiringa eryakozirwe Bezaleeli mwene Uuri, mwijukuru wa Huuri, niyo ryabaire riri omu maisho g'Obutaaho bwa MUKAMA. Okwo niyo Sulemaani n'omutwe gw'abantu baabaire baza kusherura MUKAMA.
Ku baahikireyo, Sulemaani yaaza aha itambiro ry'emiringa omu maisho ga MUKAMA, eryabaire riri omu maisho g'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, yaaritambiraho ebitambo rukumi by'okwotsya.
Sulemaani yaagira Ruhanga ati: Okagirira tata Daudi embabazi nyingi, wangira omugabe omu mwanya gwe.
Mbwenu MUKAMA Ruhanga, eki waaraganiise tata Daudi kihikiirizibwe; ahakuba ongizire omugabe w'abantu abarikwingana omucuucu gw'aha nsi.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati ninkushaba obwengye n'okwetegyereza oku ndaagume nintwaza omu maisho g'aba bantu omu kushohora n'omu kutaaha; ahatari ekyo, n'oha orikubaasa kutegyeka abantu baawe aba abarikwingana bati?

Ruhanga yaamugira ati: Ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo kibaire kikuri aha mutima, kandi tiwaayeshabira bintu, nari obutungi, nari ekitiinisa, nari okushabira abazigu baawe kufa, n'obu kwakuba okweshabire okuramaara, kureka waayeshabira obwengye n'okwetegyereza, ngu obone kutegyeka abantu bangye abu nkwemekyeire,
mbwenu obwengye n'okwetegyereza waabiheebwa, kandi ndyakuha obutungi, ebintu n'ekitiinisa, ebitakagirwaga mugabe weena omu baakubandiize, kandi n'omu barikukurata tihaine oribigira.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaaruga Gibeoni omu maisho g'eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, eryabaire riri omu mwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu, yaagaruka Yerusaalemu; yaategyeka Israeli.
Omugabe yaareetera Yerusaalemu okugira efeeza n'ezaabu nyingi nk'amabaare, n'ebiti by'emyereezi byaba nk'emisikamoori y'omu mpita.
Embaraasi ezi Sulemaani yaabaire atungire, bakaba baziiha Misri; abashuubuzi b'omugabe bakaba bazigura omu busyo, buri busyo bwine obuguzi bwabwo.

Kandi ekigaari kikaba kiihwa Misri ahari shekeli z'efeeza magana mukaaga, n'embaraasi ahari igana na makumi ataano; kandi abashuubuzi ku baabaire bazireeta, baziguza abagabe boona ab'Abahiiti n'ab'Abasiria.
Yaataho abantu obukumi mushanju b'okwekorera, obukumi munaana b'okuhigura amabaare omu nshozi, n'enkumi ishatu na magana mukaaga b'okubareeberera.

Reeba, niinyenda kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye enju, n'okugimushoroorera, ngu mbone kugyotereramu obubaane oburikutaamirana omu maisho ge n'okuguma nimpongyeramu emigaati y'okumurikwa, n'okutambiramu ebitambo by'okwotsya obutoosha omu kasheeshe n'omu mwabazyo, ahari sabato, aha kuboneka kw'okwezi, n'aha magyenyi ga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu agatairweho, nk'oku byaragiirwe Abaisraeli kuguma nibabikora ebiro byona.
Enju ei ndikwenda kwombeka neija kuba mpango munonga; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga waitu ni mukuru okukira baaruhanga boona.

Mbwenu n'oha orikubaasa kumwombekyera enju, ku araabe atarikuhika mu iguru, n'obu ryakuba iguru eririkweshumba agandi? Mbwenu niinye oha kumwombekyera enju, kureka ebe ey'okwotereramu obubaane omu maisho ge?

Mbwenu nyoherereza omushaija omunyamyoga, ow'okukora eby'ezaabu, eby'efeeza, eby'emiringa, n'eby'ebyoma, kandi n'eby'emyenda ya bujwa, eya karari, n'eya bururu, kandi orikumanya kusharura amabara, agume n'abanyamyoga abu nyine omuri Yuda na Yerusaalemu, abu tata Daudi yaataireho.

Kandi ontwekyere embaaho z'emyereezi n'emiberooshi n'emiti ya aligumu ebya Lebanooni; ahakuba nimmanya abashaija baawe ku barikumanya kushara ebiti by'embaaho omuri Lebanooni. Kandi abashaija bangye baryakwatanisa n'abaawe,
babone kunteekateekyera embaaho nyingi munonga; ahakuba enju ei ndikwenda kwombeka neija kuba mpango kandi erikutangaaza.

Kandi ndyaha abashaija baawe, ababaizi b'okushara embaaho, encuro z'engano ezihwire obukumi bubiri, n'encuro za sayiri obukumi bubiri, n'enjoga za viinyo obukumi bubiri, n'entsimbo z'amajuta obukumi bubiri.

Hiraamu yaagaruka yaagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, owaahangire eiguru n'ensi, ahimbisibwe, ahabw'okuba ahaire Daudi omwana w'obwengye, omwerinzi kandi orikwetegyereza, kuba niwe yaayombekyera MUKAMA enju, kandi n'okweyombekyera nyaruju y'obugabe.
Mbwenu naayohereza omushaija omunyamyoga, orikwetegyereza munonga, orikwetwa Huraamu,

mutabani w'omukazi ow'omuri beene Daani, ou ishe yaabaire ari owa Tuuro. Ogwo mushaija akeegyesibwa kukora eby'ezaabu, eby'efeeza, eby'emiringa, eby'ebyoma, eby'amabaare n'eby'ebiti, kandi n'eby'emyenda ya bujwa, eya bururu, eya karari n'eya kitaani; kandi naamanya n'okusharura amabara g'emiringo yoona n'okukora ekintu kyona eki bamuhaire eky'okureeberaho kyakyo; mbwenu akwatanise n'abanyamyoga baawe, nibo ba mukama wangye omugurusi waawe Daudi.
N'ahabw'ekyo engano na sayiri, n'amajuta na viinyo, ebi mukama wangye agambireho, abitwekyere abairu be;
naitwe nitwija kushara embaaho zoona ezi orikwetenga omuri Lebanooni, tuzikomerane zibe nk'ebibaya, tuzirabye omu nyanja, tuzikureetere Yoopa, obone kuzitwara Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaabara abanyamahanga boona abaabaire bari omu nsi ya Israeli, nk'oku Daudi ishe yaababazire. Yaashanga bari akasiriira kamwe n'obukumi butaano n'enkumi ishatu na magana mukaaga.
Yaiha omuribo abantu obukumi mushanju, baaba ab'okwekorera, obukumi munaana ab'okuhigura amabaare omu nshozi, n'enkumi ishatu na magana mukaaga baaba abanyampara b'okubakoresa.
Omu mwaka gwa kana ogw'omu busingye bwe, omu kwezi kwa kabiri, nibwo yaatandika kwombeka.

Ekisasi eky'omu maisho ga hekalu kikaba kiri mikono makumi abiri oburaingwa, nibwingana n'obukiika bwa hekalu, kandi obwemi bwakyo bukabba buri mikono igana na makumi abiri. Omu nda yaakyo yoona yaakishweka ezaabu eshemeziibwe.
Ekishengye kya hekalu eky'ahagati yaakishweka embaaho z'emiberooshi, nazo yaazishweka ezaabu eshemeziibwe, yaazisharuraho emikindo n'emikuufu.
Egyo nju yaagihunda n'amabare g'obuguzi bwingi; egyo zaabu ekaba eri eya Paruvaimu.
Atyo yaashweka egyo nju n'ezaabu, emitambiko yaayo, emiryango yaayo, ebisiika byayo n'enyigi zaayo; kandi aha bisiika byayo yaasharuraho ebishushani bya baakerubi.
Oburemeezi bw'emisomaari bwaba shekeli z'ezaabu makumi ataano. Kandi ebishengye bya kaanyina-ibiri nabyo yaabishweka ezaabu.

Amapapa ga baakerubi bombi, goona hamwe gaaba mikono makumi abiri oburaingwa; eipapa ry'omwe erya mikono etaano ryahika aha kisiika ky'enju, kandi erindi ipapa, naryo rya mikono etaano, ryahika aha ipapa rya kerubi ondiijo;
kandi eipapa rya kerubi ogwo owa kabiri rya mikono etaano ryahika aha kisiika ky'enju, n'erindi, naryo rya mikono etaano, ryahika aha ipapa rya mugyenzi we ow'okubanza.
Gatyo amapapa ga baakerubi abo gaaba mikono abiri oburaingwa. Ebishushani bya baakerubi bikaba byemereire, nibireeba ekishengye kya hekalu eky'ahagati.
Kandi yaakora omukingo omu myenda ya bururu, bujwa, karari na kitaani, yaagutarizamu ebishushani bya baakerubi.
yaaheesha emikuufu erikushusha enkwanzi, yaagijweka omu mitwe y'ezo nyomyo; yaaheesha ebishushani igana by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga, yaabihanika ahari egyo mikuufu.
Atyo yaabyara ezo nyomyo omu maisho ga hekalu, emwe aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, endiijo aha rwa bumosho; ey'aha rwa buryo yaagyeta Yakiini, n'ey'aha rw'obwa bumosho yaagyeta Boazi.
Bwanyima yaaheesha ekitanka ky'amaizi ekyezigoire; okukicwekanisa mikono ikumi, obwemi bwakyo mikono etaano, kandi okwehinguririza omugoma gwakyo mikono makumi ashatu.
Kandi ahansi y'obugyenyero bwakyo haakiikizibwamu ebishushani by'ebisisi biri omu mishorongo ebiri, biheesherainwe nakyo.

Ekyo kitanka kikaba kiteekirwe aha bishushani by'enimi ikumi na ibiri, bishatu nibireeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, bishatu aha burengyerwa-izooba, bishatu aha bwa-buryo, na bishatu aha burugwa-izooba; ekyo kitanka kiteekirwe ahaiguru yaabyo, biteeraine ebibunu.
Omubiri gwakyo gukaba guri ekita kimwe; eminwa yaakyo ekaba ekozirwe nk'ey'ekikopo, nari nk'ekirabyo ky'emyangangye; nikigiibwamu encuro enkumi ishatu z'ebinyungu bihango.

Kandi yaakora ebinaabiro ikumi by'okunaabiramu; bitaano yaabita aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buro, n'ebitaano aha rw'obwa bumosho. Ebyo nibyo baabaire bamunyungurizamu ebintu ebi baabaire bakoresa ahabw'ebitambo by'okwotsya, kandi ekitanka nikyo abanyamurwa baabaire banaabiramu.
Kandi yaakora emeeza ikumi, yaazita omuri hekalu, itaano aha rubaju rwa buryo, na itaano aha rwa bumosho; yaakora n'enyabya z'ezaabu igana.
Yaakora ekikaari ky'abanyamurwa, n'ekikaari ekirikwetwa ekihango, n'enyigi zaakyo, kandi ezo nyigi yaazishwekyesa emringa.
Ekitanka yaakita aha nshonda y'orubaju rwa buryo rw'oburugwa-izooba bw'egyo nju.
enyomyo ibiri, n'enyaba, n'emitwe ebiri aha mitwe y'ezo nyomyo, n'obutimba bubiri bw'okushweka enyabya ibiri ez'aha mitwe y'ezo nyomyo;
ebishushani by'ebijuma by'amakomamahanga eby'okuhunda aha butimba bwombi obwabaire buri aha mitwe y'enyomyo.
Kandi yaakora ebitebe n'ebinaabiro aharibyo,
n'ekitanka kimwe n'ebishushani by'enimi ikumi na bibiri ebyabaire biri ahansi yaakyo.
Ebiyungu n'ebyoma by'okuyooza eiju, kandi n'eby'okwihuza enyama, n'ebintu byabyo byona eby'okubikoresa, Huraamu yaabikorera enju ya MUKAMA omu miringa ekuubire ahabw'omugabe Sulemaani.
Omugabe yaabiyagiza omu ruhita rwa Yorudani omu itaka ry'eibumba ahagati ya Sukoosi na Zereda.
Sulemaani yaakora ebintu bingi munonga ebi oburemeezi bw'emiringa yaabyo bwabaire butarikubaasa kumanywa.
Atyo Sulemaani yaakora ebintu byona eby'okuta omu nju ya MUKAMA; eitambiro ry'ezaabu, emeeza z'emigaati y'okumurikwa,
ebikondo by'amatabaaza n'amatabaaza gaabyo g'ezaabu eshemeziibwe g'okwakira omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda, nk'oku kyaragiirwe;
ebishushani by'ebirabyo, amatabaaza n'empana z'ezaabu, byona byaba eby'ezaabu eshemeziibwe munonga;
makansi, enyabya, esohaani z'obubaane n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro eby'ezaabu eshemeziibwe; kandi epata z'enyigi ez'ekishengye kya hekalu, n'ez'Aharikwera munonga, zikaba ziri ez'ezaabu.
Abashaija ba Israeli boona baateeranira omu maisho g'omugabe aha bugyenyi obw'omu kwezi kwa mushanju.
Abakuru ba Israeli boona baija, n'Abaleevi baakiriza egyo shanduukye;
baagiinamura hamwe n'Eihema ry'okubugaabuganiramu, n'ebintu byona ebirikwera ebyabaire biri omuri eryo ihema; abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baaba nibo baabiinamura.

Omugabe Sulemaani n'omutwe gwona ogw'Abaisraeli abaabaire bateeraniire omu maisho ge, bakaba bari omu maisho g'eshanduukye nibatamba ebitambo by'entaama n'eby'ente bingi munonga, ebitarikubaasa kugambwa nari okubarwa.

Batyo abanyamurwa baatwara eshanduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA, baagita omu mwanya gwayo omunda y'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'egyo nju, ogurikwetwa Aharikwera munonga, ahansi y'amapapa g'ebishushani bya baakerubi.
Ahakuba baakerubi abo bakaba bashashaanura amapapa gaabo ahaiguru y'omwanya gw'eshanduukye n'emigamba yaayo;

kandi emigamba ekaba eri miraingwa munonga; n'ahabw'ekyo emitwe yaayo ekaba ereebekyera omu mwanya ogurikwera omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omunda; kwonka ekaba etarikubaasa kureeberwa heeru; kandi na hati ekiriyo.
Omuri egyo shanduukye tihaine kindi ekyabaire kibamu, kureka ebishate by'amabaare bibiri, ebi Musa yaateereiremu ahari Horebu, ahu Musa yaaraganiire n'Abaisraeli endagaano nibaruga omu nsi ya Misri.
Bwanyima abanyamurwa ku baarugire omu mwanya ogurikwera, (ahakuba abanyamurwa boona abaabaire bariyo bakaba baherize kweyeza, batarikufa ha mbu zaabo,

kandi abeeshongozi Abaleevi boona, Asafu, Hamani na Yedusuuni, hamwe na batabani baabo na beene waabo, bajwaire emyenda ya bafuta, baine ebitaasa n'enanga n'endingiri, baayemerera aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba rw'eitambiro hamwe n'abanyamurwa abarikuteera amakondere igana na makumi abiri;

kandi gukaba guri omurimo gw'abakondere n'abeeshongozi kuhurirwa nibeeshongora n'eiraka rimwe, nibahimbisa MUKAMA kandi nibamusiima.) baimutsya ekyeshongoro nibateera amakondere n'ebitaasa n'ebindi bintu ebirikugamba, nibahimbisa MUKAMA, bati:
Ahakuba ni murungi,
Kandi embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona,
egyo nju, enju ya MUKAMA, yaijura ekicu;
batyo abanyamurwa tibaabaasa kwemerera kuheereza ahabw'ekyo kicu; ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kikaijura enju ya Ruhanga.
kwonka nyowe nkwombekyeire enju y'ekitiinisa, omwanya gwawe gw'okutuuramu ebiro n'ebiro.
Omugabe yaahindukira eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli beemereire, yaabashabira omugisha,
naagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli asiimwe, owaahikiiriza n'omukono gwe eki yaaraganiise tata Daudi n'akanwa ke naagira ati:

Okwiha obu naiha abantu bangye omuri Misri, tinkatooranaga rurembo mu nganda za Israeli zoona kwombekamu enju, ngu eiziina ryangye ribe nimwo ryaguma; kandi tindatooraine muntu weena kuba omutegyeki w'abantu bangye Israeli;
kwonka ntooraine Yerusaalemu kuba nimwo eiziina ryangye ryaguma, kandi ntooraine Daudi kutegyeka abantu bangye Israeli.
Mbwenu kikaka kiri omu mutima gwa tata Daudi kwombekyera eiziina rya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, enju.
Kwonka MUKAMA yaagira tata Daudi ati: Obaire okozire gye ahabw'enaama ei obaire one kwombekyera eiziina ryangye enju;
kwonka tiiwe oryombeka egyo nju, kureka mutabani waawe, ou orizaara, niwe aryombekyera eiziina ryangye enju.

Mbwenu MUKAMA yaahikiriza eki yaaraganiise, ahabw'okuba naaza omu mwanya gwa tata Daudi, naagaruka aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israeli, nk'oku MUKAMA yaaraganiise, kandi nyombekire egi nju ahabw'eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa israeli.
Omwo nimwo ntaire omwanya ahabw'eshanduukye ei endagaano ya MUKAMA erimu, ei yaaragaine n'abantu ba Israeli.
Atyo Sulemaani yaayemerera omu maisho g'eitambiro rya MUKAMA, eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli riri aho, yaimutsya emikono ye.

Kandi Sulemaani akaba akozire ekintu ky'emiringa ky'okwemereraho, oburangwa bwakyo mikono etaano, obuhango bwakyo mikono etaano, n'obwemi bwakyo mikono eshatu, yaakita omu kikaari, yaakyemereraho. Bwanyima yaatsimba amaju omu maisho g'Abaisraeli boona, yaimutsya emikono ye ahaiguru;

yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, tihariho ruhanga omu iguru nari omu nsi, orikushushan naiwe, omu kurinda endagaano, n'omu kigirira embabazi abairu baawe abarikugyendera omu maisho gaawe n'emitima yaabo yoona;
kandi okahamya eki waaraganiise omwiru waawe tata Daudi; eego, okakigamba n'akanwa kaawe, mbwenu waakihikiiriza eri izooba n'omukono gwawe.

N'ahabw'ekyo, MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, hamya eki waaraganiise omwiru waawe tata Daudi, noogira oti: Batabani baawe ku barigira emicwe mirungi, baagyendera omu biragiro byangye, nk'oku iwe obaire noobigyenderamu, tiharibura muntu w'okushutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa Israel.
Mbwenu hati, MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, ekigambo kyawe eki waagambiire omwiru waawe Daudi, okihamye.
Beitu kwo, n'eky'amazima Ruhanga oryatuura n'abantu omu nsi? Reeba, eiguru, n'obu ryakuba eiguru eririkukirira kimwe kuba ahaiguru y'agandi torikubaasa kurihikamu; kaashwa egi nju ei nyombekire!
Kwonka MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, ta omutima aha kushaba n'okweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe, noohurira okutaka kwe n'okushaba oku arikushaba omu maisho gaawe,
obone kuguma otaire amaisho gaawe ahari egi nju nyomushana na nyekiro, omwanya ogu waaraganiise kutamu eiziina ryawe, obone kuguma noohurira okushaba oku omwiru waawe arishaba naareeba omwanya ogu.

Kandi ogume ohurire okweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe n'okw'abantu baawe Israeli, baaba nibakushaba nibareeba omwanya ogu; ogume ohurire nooyema omu iguru, omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu; kandi ku oraahurire, osaasire.
Omuntu ku arisiisira mutaahi we, baamurahiza, nawe yaija yaarahira omu maisho g'eitambiro ryawe omu nju egi,

ohurire nooyema omu iguru, ogire eki waakora, ocwere abairu baawe orubanja, rusingye okozire kubi, aturwe okutahikiirira kwe, oihe orubanja ahari ohikiriire, omuzimuurire nk'okuhikiirira kwe oku kuri.
Kandi abantu baawe Abaisraeli ku baribingwa abazigu baabo ahabw'okukucumuraho, bwanyima baakugarukira, baikiriza eiziina ryawe, baakushaba nibeeshengyerereza omu nju egi,
ohurire nooyema omu iguru, osaasire abantu baawe Israeli ekibi kyabo, obagarure omu nsi ei waabahaire na baishenkurubo.

ohurire ori omu iguru, osaasire abairu baawe, eihanga ryawe Israeli, ekibi kyabo, obeegyese emitwarize mirungi ei bashemereire kugyenderamu; kandi ogwisize ensi yaawe enjura, ei waahaire abantu baawe kuba obuhunguzi.

Kandi enjara ku eriteera ensi, nari orufu, okututa, nari okusya-nyamwenga, nari enzigye, nari kanyaananga; nari abazigu okubagotera omuri ibara rurembo rwabo; nari ku haribaho kahumpuri nari endiijo ndwara yoona;
omuntu weena nari eihanga ryona ery'Abaisraeli baakushaba nibakweshengyereza, buri muntu naamanya endwara y'omu mutima gwe, n'obusaasi bwe, kandi aimukize emikono ye naagyorekyeza, ei egi nju eri,
