ohurire nooyema omu iguru omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu, osaasire, oihure buri muntu, ou orikumanya omutima, nk'oku emitwarize ye eri; (niiwe wenka orikumanya emitima y'abaana b'abantu;)
babone kukutiina ebiro byona ebi barimara omu nsi ei waahaire baatatenkuriitwe.

Kandi n'omunyamahanga otari w'omu bantu baawe Israeli, oriruga omu nsi ya hare, akaija ahabw'eiziina ryawe erikuru, n'ahabw'omukono gwawe ogw'amaani kandi ogubangire, omuntu ogwo ku ariija yaashaba naareeba enju egi,

ohurire nooyema omu iguru omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu, omumarire ebi ariba naakushaba byona, kibone kureetera amahanga goona ag'omu nsi kumanya eiziina ryawe n'okukutiina, nk'oku eihanga ryawe Israeli ririkukutiina, kandi bamanye egi nju ei nyombekire ku erikwetererwa eiziina ryawe.

Abantu baawe ku barihurura nibaza aha rugamba kurwana n'abazigu baabo, omu muhanda gwona ogu oribatoozamu, baakushaba nibareeba ei oru rurembo oru waatooraine ruri, n'egi nju ei nyombekyeire eiziina ryawe,
ohurire okushaba n'okweshengyereza kwabo, nooyema omu iguru, obarwanirire.
kwonka ku barihikayo, baayegarukamu, baayeteisa, baakweshengyererezayo nibagira bati: Tukacumura, twashiisha, twakora eby'obugomi;

baakugarukira n'omutima gwabo gwona n'amagara gaabo goona, bakiri omu nsi y'abaabanyagire, baakushaba nibaareeba ei ensi ei waahaire baishenkurubo eri, n'orurembo oru waatooraine, n'egi nju ei nyombekyeire eiziina ryawe,
ohurire okushaba n'okweshengyereza kwabo nooyema omu iguru omu mwanya gwawe ogu otuuramu, obamarire ebyabo, osaasire abantu baawe abakucumwireho.
Iwe hamwe n'eshanduukye y'Amaani gaawe!
Abanyamurwa baawe, MUKAMA Ruhanga, bajwekwe okujunwa,
N'abarikwera baawe bashemerererwe omu burungi bwawe.
Ijuka embabazi ezi waagiriire omwiru waawe Daudi.
Abanyamurwa tibaabaasa kutaaha mu nju ya MUKAMA, ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kikaijura egyo nju ye.
Abaisraeli boona ku baareebire omuriro gwashuuma, n'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kiri ahari hekalu, bainama ahansi, baajuumara aha mabaare gaariire, baaramya, baasiima MUKAMA nibagira bati:
Ahakuba ni murungi,
Ahabw'okuba embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona.
Omugabe Sulemaani yaahonga ente obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ibiri, n'entaama akasiriira n'obukumi bubiri kuba ebitambo. Atyo omugabe n'abantu boona baashoroora enju ya MUKAMA.

Abanyamurwa baayemerera omu myanya yaabo; n'Abaleevi baayemerera, baine ebintu by'okuteerera MUKAMA, ebi omugabe Daudi yaakozire ahabw'okusiima MUKAMA, akaguma naabiteera, ahu yaabaire ayendera kumusiimira hoona, naagira ati: Ahabw'okuba embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona. Omu maisho g'abo Baleevi abanyamurwa baateera amakondere, kandi Abaisraeli boona baayemerera.

Omuri obwo bunaku Sulemaani yaataho obugyenyi okumara ebiro mushanju, hamwe n'Abaisraeli boona, abaabaire bari omutwe muhango munonga, abaarugire hoona okuruga ahu orikutaahira nooza Hamasi, okuhika aha mugyera gwa Misri.
Aha izooba rya munaana baagira okuteerana okurikwera; ahakuba bakaba bamazire ebiro mushanju nibashoroora eitambiro, n'ebindi mushanju omu bugyenyi.

Aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bishatu eky'okwezi kwa mushanju yaayohereza abantu omu maka gaabo, bashemereirwe, kandi bananukire omu mitima aha bw'oburungi obu MUKAMA yaayorekire Daudi na Sulemaani n'abantu be Israeli.
Atyo Sulemaani yaaheza enju ya MUKAMA n'ey'omugabe; byona ebi Sulemaani yaabaire ateekateekire kukora omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu nju ye, yaabiheza gye.
Ku ndikinga eiguru, enjura yaabura, nari naaragiira enzigye kukunuura ensi, nari naayohereza orufu omu bantu bangye,

abantu bangye abarikwetererwa eiziina ryangye, ku baryecureeza, baashaba, bansherura, baareka emitwarize yaabo emibi, obwo ndyahurira niinyema omu iguru, nsaasire ekibi kyabo, kandi ntambire ensi yaabo.
Okuruga hati niinyija kuguma ninta amaisho gangye kandi nintega amatu gangye aha kushaba okurishabirwa omu mwanya ogu.
Ahabw'okuba hati naatoorana egi nju, kandi naagyeeza, ngu eiziina ryangye ribone kugigumamu ebiro byona; amaisho gangye n'omutima gwangye biryagigumaho obutwire bwona.
Kandi iwe ku origyendera omu maisho gangye, nka sho Daudi oku yaatwarize, waakora byona ebi nkuragiire, waayorobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho,
obwo ndyahamya ekitebe ky'obugabe bwawe, nk'oku naaragaine na sho Daudi, ningira nti: Toribura muntu w'okutegyeka Israeli.
obwo ndyabarandura omu nsi ei naabahaire, kandi n'enju egi ei naashorooreire eiziina ryangye, ndyaginaga, ngiihe omu maisho gangye, ngihindure eky'okucwaho enfumu n'ekigaaniizo omu mahanga goona.
Kandi egi nju erikuhimbisibwa etyo, buri muntu oriba naarabaho aryatangaara, naagira ati: Beitu shi MUKAMA akatura ki egi nsi n'egi nju?

Bwanyima baagire bati: Ahabw'okuba bakatsigaho MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, baahamira ahari baaruhanga abandi, baabaramya, kandi baabaheereza; nikyo abareeteireho obubi obu bwona.
Sulemaani akombeka busya endembo ezi Hiraamu yaamuhaire, yaazitamu Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaateera Hamasi-zooba, yaagikwata.
Yaayombeka Tadimoori omu ihamba, n'endembo zoona ez'amabiikiro ezi yaayombekire omuri Hamasi.
Kandi yaayombeka Besi-horoni eya ruguru na Besi-horoni eya ifo, endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, eziine amarembo g'enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi,

na Baalasi n'endembo z'amabiikiro zoona ezi Sulemaani yaabaire aine, n'endembo zoona ez'ebigaari bye, n'endembo z'engabo ze ezirikugyendera aha mbaraasi, n'ekindi kyona eki Sulemaani yaabaire ayenda kwombeka omuri Yerusaalemu, Lebanooni n'ensi zoona ezaabaire ziri omu bugabe bwe.
Abantu boona abaahonokire aha Bahiiti, Abaamori, Abaperizi, Abahiivi n'Abayebusi abaabaire batari Baisraeli,
baijukuru baabo abaahonokireho omuri egyo nsi, abu Abaisraeli bataracwekyerereize kimwe,abo nibo Sulemaani yaahindwire abahuuku b'okubakorera emirimo, bakaguma batyo n'okuhitsya hati.

Kwonka Abaisraeli bo Sulemaani tarabahindwire bahuuku b'okumukorera; kureka bakaba abaserukare, abandi baaba abatware be, abandi abakuru b'ebigaari bye, n'abandi baaba engabo ze ezirikugyendera aha mbaraasi.
Kandi abatware abo abakuru b'omugabe Sulemaani, abaabaire nibategyeka abantu, baaba magana abiri na makumi ataano.

Sulemaani yaiha muhara wa Faraho omu rurembo rwa Daudi, yaamuta omu nju ei yaamwombekyeire; ahakuba akagira ati: Omukazi wangye tashemereire kuguma omu nju ya Daudi omugabe wa Israeli, ahabw'okuba emyanya ei eshanduukye ya MUKAMA eiziremu n'erikwera.

nk'omurimo gwa buri izooba oku gwabaire nigwetengwa, naahonga nk'oku Musa yaaragiire ebya sabato, ebya buri kuboneka kw'okwezi, n'eby'amagyenyi ashatu aga buri mwakaobugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe, obugyenyi bwa saabiiti, n'obugyenyi bw'ensiisira.

Nk'ekiragiro kya Daudi ishe oku kyabaire kiri, yaataho abanyamurwa b'okukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu mbu, n'Abaleevi ahabw'omurimo gwabo ogw'okuhimbisa, n'ogw'okuheereza omu maisho g'abanyamurwa, nk'omurimo gwa buri izooba oku gwabaire nigwetengwa, kandi n'abakumiirizi b'amarembo ab'okurinda amarembo goona omu mbu; ahabw'okuba okwo nikwo Daudi omushaija wa Ruhanga yaabaire aragiire.
Kandi tibaateishuka kureka ebi omugabe yaaragiire abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi ebirikukwata aha kintu kyona n'aha by'amabiikiro.
Okwo nikwo omurimo gwona ogwa Sulemaaani gwahweire, okwiha aha izooba eri omusingi gw'enju ya MUKAMA gwateereirweho, okuhitsya ahu yaahwereire. Batyo baahereza kimwe enju ya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaaza Ezioni-geberi na Eloosi aha rubaju rw'enyanja omu nsi ya Edomu.

Hiraamu yaayohereza abagaragwa be kumutwarira emeeri n'abarimbi be abamanyiire enyanja, baaza Ofiri hamwe n'abashaija ba Sulemaani, baihayo etalanta z'ezaabu magana ana na makumi ataano, baazireetera omugabe Sulemaani.
Sulemaani yaagarukamu ebi yaamubuurize byona; tihariho kigambo na kimwe ekyayeshobire Sulemaani, eki ataramushobororeire.
Omugabekazi wa Sheeba ku yaareebire obwengye bwa Sulemaani, enju ei yaayombekire,

eby'okurya by'aha meeza ye, emishutamire y'abagaragwa be, n'emiheerereze y'abaheereza be, n'ebijwaro byabo, n'abagabuzi be ba viinyo n'ebijwaro byabo, n'ebitambo by'okwotsya ebi yaabaire naahongyera aha nju ya MUKAMA, omutima gwamuhwa omunda.
Yaagira omugabe ati: Ebigambo ebi naahuriire ndi omu nsi yangye ebirikugamba aha by'emitwarize yaawe n'obwengye bwawe bikaba biri eby'amazima,

kwonka tindabiikiriize okuhitsya obu nyeiziire, eriisho ryangye rikabyereebera; nkashanga batarangambiire n'obu kyakuba ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri ky'obwingi bw'obwengye bwawe; nookirira kimwe ebi naahuriire.
Abashaija baawe bahiiriirwe! N'abaheereza baawe, abeemerera obutoosha omu maisho gaawe, bakahurira obwengye bwawe, nabo bahiiriirwe!

MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ahimbisibwe, owaakusiimire, akakuta aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwe, kuba omugabe ahabwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe! Ruhanga waawe ogwo ahabw'okukunda Abaisraeli n'okwenda kubahamya ebiro byona, nikyo yaakuteereireho kuba omugabe w'okubategyeka, ngu obone kucwa emanja z'oburyo omu kuhikiirira.
Bwanyima yaaha omugabe etalanta z'ezaabu igana na makumi abiri, emigaju mingi munonga, n'amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi; tihakabahoga migaju nk'ei omugabekazi wa Sheeba yaahaire omugabe Sulemaani.

Ezo mbaaho za alumuugi omugabe yaazibaijamu amatembero g'enju ya MUKAMA n'ag'enju ye ahabwe, n'endingiri n'enanga ahabw'abeeshongozi; hakaba hatakareebwaga mbaahza alumuugi ezirikushusha nk'ezo omu nsi ya Yuda.
Omugabe Sulemaani yaaha omugabekazi wa Sheeba ebi yaabaire naayenda byona, n'ebi yaamushabire byona, okwhaho ebi yaamureeteire. Bwanyima yaakuba, yaagaruka omu nsi ye n'abagaragwa be.
otabariiremu eyaabaire eruga omu bashuubuzi n'omu batunzi; kandi abagabe ba Buharabu boona n'abategyeki b'omu nsi bakaba bareetera Sulemaani ezaabu n'efeeza.
Omugabe Sulemaani yaaheeshesa engabo z'ezaabu magana abiri, engabo emwe neeheeshwa omu zaabu ya shekeli magana mukaaga.
Kandi yaaheeshesa ezindi ngabo z'ezaabu magana ashatu; engabo emwe neeheeshwa omu zaabu ya shekeli magana ashatu; omugabe yaazita omu nju y'ekibira kya Lebanooni.
Kandi yaabaijesa ekitebe ky'obugabe kihango omu miino y'enjojo, yaakishweka ezaabu eshemeziibwe.

Ekyo kitebe ky'obugabe kikaba kiine amatembero mukaaga, n'akatebe ky'ebigyere k'ezaabu, ebyabaire bikoreirwe hamwe n'ekyo kitebe; aha buri rubaju rw'ekyo kitebe hariho ah'okuta emikono, n'ebishushani bibiri by'entare ezeemereire aha rubaju rw'ah'okuta emikono;
kandi n'ebindi bishushani by'entare ikumi na bibiri byemereire bibiri bibiri ahari buri itembero ahari ago matembero mukaaga. Omu bugabe obundi bwona tihariho kitebe ekyabaire nikishushana nakyo.

Eby'okunywaisa eby'omugabe Sulemaani byona bikaba biri eby'ezaabu, kandi n'ebintu byona eby'omu nju y'omu kibira kya Lebanooni bikaba biri eby'ezaabu eshemeziibwe; omu biro bya Sulemaani efeeza ekaba etarikuteekateekwaho kuba ekintu.

Ahakuba emeeri z'omugabe zikaba ziza Tarushiishi n'abashaija ba Hiraamu; omurundi gumwe omu myaka eshatu ezo meeri za Tarushiishi zikaba ziija, zireetsire ezaabu, efeeza, emiino y'enjojo, enkobe na zaanyamunyonyi.
Okwo nikwo omugabe Sulemaani yaakirize abagabe boona ab'omu nsi obutungi n'obwengye.
Abagabe boona ab'omu nsi bakaba beetenga kureeba Sulemaani, ngu bahurire obwengye bwe obu Ruhanga yaamuhaire.
Kandi weena owaabaire aija akaba areeta omutoijo, ebintu by'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu, ebijwaro, sumuruna, emigaju, embaraasi n'enyumbu; ebyo byona nikwo byabaire biija buri mwaka.

Kandi Sulemaani akaba aine emyanya obukumi buna ei embaraasi ze ezirikukurura ebigaari zaabaire ziraaramu, kandi aine abashaija abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, abu yaataire omu ndembo z'ebigaari bye, n'omuri Yerusaalemu owa omugabe.
Kandi yaategyeka abagabe boona okuruga aha mugyera Furaati okuhika omu nsi y'Abafilistia n'aha mwatano gwa Misri.
Omugabe yaareetera Yerusaalemu kugira efeeza nyingi nk'amabaare, n'ebiti by'emyereezi byaba nk'emisikamoori y'omu mpita.
Kandi bakaba bareetera Sulemaani embaraasi nibaziiha Misri n'omu nsi ezindi zoona.
Sulemaani yaamara aha ngoma emyaka makumi ana naategyekyera Israeli yoona omuri Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima Sulemaani yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi ishe; Rehoboamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yeroboamu mwene Nebati ku yaakihuriire, (ahakuba akaba ari Misri, ei yaabaire ahungiire omugabe Sulemaani), yaaruga Misri, yaagaruka owaabo.
Baatuma kumweta; atyo Yeroboamu n'Abaisraeli boona baija ahari Rehoboamu, baamugira bati:
Sho akongyera oburemeezi aha kutegyekwa kwaitu. Mbwenu otutuubize aha mirimo erikurusya ei sho yaabaire atukoresa, n'aha buremeezi bw'okutegyeka kwe, naitwe nitwija kukuheereza.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Mugarukye aha bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu. Batyo abantu baayaabuuka, baagyenda.
Bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaaza omu naama n'abagurusi abaabaire batabaarira Sulemaani ishe akiriho, yaabagira ati: Nimumpa bwengye ki okugarukamu abo bantu?
Baamugira bati: Ku oraatwaze gye abo bantu, waabagwisa gye, obwo nibwo bariba abairu baawe ebiro byona.
Kwonka we yaayanga enaama ei abo bagurusi baamuhaire, yaaza omu naama n'abatsigazi abaanyeetsire nawe, kandi abaabaire nibamutabaarira.
Yaababuuza ati: Nimumpa bwengye ki okugarukamu abo bantu, abangizire ngu mbatuubize aha buremeezi bw'obutegyeki obu tata yaabataireho?

Abo batsigazi abaanyeetsire nawe baamugira bati: Oku nikwo oraagarukyemu abantu abakushabire nibagira bati: Sho akongyera oburemeezi aha kutegyekwa kwaitu; mbwenu iwe otutuubizeho; obagire oti: Akakumu kangye akahera nikakira obuhango enyugunyu ya tata.
Mbwenu nk'oku tata yaabeekoreize omugamba guremeire, nyowe niinyija kukizaho. Tata akabateeza enkoba, nyowe niinyija kubateeza skorupio.
Aha kiro kya kashatu Yeroboamu n'abantu boona baija aha mugabe Rehoboamu, nk'oku yaabagizire ati: Mugarukye aha kiro kya kashatu.
Omugabe Rehoboamu yaabagarukamu n'amaani, naayanga obwengye obu abagurusi babaire bamuhaire;

yaabagarukamu nk'obwengye bw'abatsigazi obu bamuhaire oku bwabaire buri, ati: Tata akabeekoreza omugamba guremeire, kwonka nyowe niinyija kukizaho; akabateeza enkoba, kwonka nyowe niinyija kubateeza skorupio.
Atyo omugabe tiyaabahurira, ahabw'okuba kikaba kirugire ahari Ruhanga, ngu MUKAMA ahikiirize ekigambo eki yaagambiire Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, naakirabya omuri Ahiya owa Shiilo.
Abaisraeli boona ku baareebire omugabe yaayanga kubahurira, baamugira bati:
Twine kakwate ki na Daudi?
Titwine buhunguzi omuri mwene Yese.
Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, nimugarukye omu mahema gaanyu!
Naimwe aba Daudi mugume mwemarire ebyanyu n'oruganda rwanyu!
Batyo Abaisraeli boona baagaruka omu maka gaabo.
Kwonka Rehoboamu yaagumizamu naategyeka Abaisraeli abaabaire batwire omu ndembo za Yuda.

Bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaatuma Hadoraamu, owaabaire ari omukuru w'abakozi b'emirimo y'okuhatwa; Abaisraeli boona baamuteera amabaare, yaafa. Omugabe ku yaabihuriire, ahonaaho yaaza omu kigaari kye kuhungira Yerusaalemu.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baagomeire enju ya Daudi n'okuhitsya hati.
Kwonka ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Shemaaya, omushaija wa Ruhanga, nikigira kiti:
Gambira Rehoboamu mwene Sulemaani omugabe wa Yuda n'Abaisraeli boona ab'omuri Yuda na Benyamiini, oti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Mutahurura, n'obu kwakuba okurwanisa beene waanyu. Buri muntu agarukye omu ka ye, ahakuba ekintu eki niinye kirugireho. Batyo baahurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA, baagarukayo, tibaarwanisa Yeroboamu.
Rehoboamu yaatuura Yerusaalemu, kandi yaayombeka omuri Yuda endembo z'okwerinda abazigu.
Yaayombeka Betelehemu, Etamu, Tekoa,
Besi-zuuri, Sooko, Adulaamu,
Gaasi, Mareesha, Ziifu,
Adoraimu, Lakishi, Azeka,
Zoora, Ayalooni, na Heburooni, endembo z'omuri Yuda na Benyamiini ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare.
N'ebigo byazo yaabigumya, yaabitamu abakuru b'engabo, yaabibiikamu eby'okurya n'amajuta na viinyo.
Kandi omuri ezo ndembo zoona yaatamu engabo n'amacumu, yaazihindura ez'amaani maingi munonga. Atyo yaagumya Abayuda n'Ababenyamiini bari abe.
Bwanyima abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, abaabaire batwire omuri Israeli yoona, baaruga omu myanya yoona ei baabaire batwiremu, baija ah'ari.
Ahakuba Abaleevi bakareka amariisizo gaabo n'obutaka bwabo, baija omuri Yuda na Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba Yeroboamu n'abatabani bakabaiha omu murimo gw'obuheereza bw'abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA,
yaataho abanyamurwa abe kuheereza omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, n'okukora omurimo gw'okuheereza baadaimoni, n'ebishushani by'enyana bibiri ebi yaakozire.

Ab'omu nganda zoona eza Israeli, abaataire emitima yaabo aha kusherura MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, baija bakuratiire abo Baleevi, baahika Yerusaalemu, baatambirirayo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo ebitambo.
Batyo baahamya obugabe bwa Yuda, kandi baamara emyka eshatu nibagumiza kimwe Rehoboamu mwene Sulemaani; ahabw'okuba omuri egyo myaka eshatu bakaguma nibagyendera omu muhanda gwa Daudi na Sulemaani.
yaamuzaarira abaana b'aboojo, Yeushi, Shemaria na Zahaamu.
Bwanyima y'ogwo yaashwera Maaka, muhara wa Abusalomu, yaamuzaarira Abiya, Atai, ziiza na Shelomiisi.

(Kandi Rehoboamu akashwera abakazi ikumi na munaana n'ebinyanshunju makumi mukaaga; yaazaara abaana b'aboojo makumi abiri na munaana, n'ab'abaishiki makumi mukaaga); kwonka akaba akunda Maaka muhara wa Abusalomu okukira abakazi be boona n'ebinyanshunju bye;
n'ahabw'ekyo yaagira Abiya mwene Maaka omwana mukuru omuri beene ishe, ahakuba akaba naayenda kumuhindura omugabe.
Yaakoresa obwengye, yaata abatabani omu byanga byona eby'omuri Yuda na Benyamiini omu ndembo zoona ezirimu ebigo; yaabaha eby'okurya bingi munonga, kandi yaabashwererera abakazi.
Bwanyima omu mwaka gwa kataano ogw'omu busingye bwe Shishaki omugabe wa Misri akainamuka, yaateera Yerusaalemu,
aine ebigaari rukumi na magana abiri, n'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi obukumi mukaaga; n'abantu abaarugire nawe Misri bakaba batarikubarwa, bari aba Libya, aba Sukimu n'aba Esiopia.
Yaakwata endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, yaahika Yerusaalemu.

Ku yaahikireyo, Shemaaya nabi yaija ahari Rehoboamu n'aha bategyeki ba Yuda, abaabaire bateeraniire Yerusaalemu ahabwa Shishaki, yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ondugireho, mbwenu naanye naakurekurira Shishaki.
Ahonaaho abategyeki ba Israeli n'omugabe baayecureeza, nibagira bati: MUKAMA niwe ahikiriire.

MUKAMA ku yaareebire baayecureeza, ekigambo kye kyaizira Shemaaya nikigira kiti: Beecureize; n'ahabw'ekyo tinkibahwerekyereza; kureka niinyija kugira eki naabajuna, kandi ekiniga kyangye tikirikwija kushukwa hari Yerusaalemu kuteerwa Shishaki.
Kwonka nibaija kuba abairu be, babone kumanya obutegyeki bwangye, n'obw'abagabe b'ezo nsi.
bwanyima omugabe Rehoboamu yaaheesha ezindi z'emiringa omu mwanya gwazo, yaazibiitsya abakuru b'abarinzi, abaabaire barinda orwigi rw'enju y'omugabe.
Obutoosha omugabe ku yaabaire aza omu nju ya MUKAMA, abo barinzi baija, bazihagatira, bwanyima bazigarura omuri egyo nju y'abarinzi.
Ku yaayecureize, ekiniga kya MUKAMA kyamurugaho, ngu arekye kumucwekyerereza kimwe; kandi omuri Yuda ebintu bikaba biriho gye.

Atyo omugabe Rehoboamu yaayegaruramu amaani, yaategyeka. Rehoboamu akaba aine emyaka makumi ana na gumwe, obu yaatandika kutegyeka; yaategyekyera emyaka ikumi na mushanju omuri Yerusaalemu, orurembo oru MUKAMA yaatooraine omu nganda zoona ez'Abaisraeli kuba nimwo yaata eiziina rye. Nyina akaba naayetwa Naama Omuamoni.
Akakora kubi, ahabw'okuba tarataire mutima aha kusherura MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Rehoboamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi; Abiya omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaategyekyera emyaka eshatu omuri Yerusaalemu. Nyina akaba naayetwa Mikaya, muhara wa Urieli owa Gibea.

Omuri obwo bunaku hakabaho obweme ahagati ya Abiya na Yeroboamu. Abiya yaahurura n'abashaija amamanzi abamanyiire engamba, abashaija entoore obusiriira buna; Yeroboamu we yaatenga orugamba kumurwanisa n'abashaija entoore abarwani b'amaani obusiriira munaana.
Bwanyima Abiya yaayemerera aha kibungo Zemaraimu, ekiri omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, yaagira ati: Muntegye amatu, iwe Yeroboamu n'Abaisraeli mwena.
Timushemereire kumanya ku MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli yaahaire Daudi n'abatabani obugabe kutegyeka Israeli, naabaraganisa endagaano y'omwonyo?
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, Yeroboamu mwene Nebati, omugaragwa wa Sulemaani mwene Daudi, akaimuka yaagomera mukama we;
abashaija bamwe abataine mugasho baija, baakwatanisa nawe, baahiga Rehoboamu mwene Sulemaani akiri muto, atakahamire, atarikubaasa kubazibira.

Timurabingire abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA beene Arooni, n'Abaleevi, mukeeteeraho abandi nk'abantu b'agandi mahanga? Omuntu weena orikwija kweyeza, areetsire enimi y'ekimasha nari empaya z'entaama mushanju, ahinduka omunyamurwa w'abatari baaruhanga.
Kwonka itwe, MUKAMA niwe Ruhanga waitu, kandi titukamutsigahoga. Abanyamurwa abu twine, arikuheereza MUKAMA, ni batabani ba Arooni, kandi twine Abaleevi b'okubaheereza.

Buri kasheeshe na buri mwabazyo bahongyera MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya, bamwoterera obubaane bw'emigaju erikutaamirana, batebeekanisa emigaati ey'okumurikwa aha meeza y'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, kandi bareeberera ekikondo ky'amatabaaza ky'ezaabu, ngu amatabaaza gaakyo gabone kwaka buri mwabazyo; ahakuba itwe tukuratira ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu yaaturagiire, kwonka imwe mumutsigireho.

Reeba, Ruhanga ari hamwe naitwe, naatwebembera, kandi n'abanyamurwa be bari aha, baine enzamba z'okuhuruza ab'okubarwanisa. Imwe beene Israeli 'mwe, murekye kurwanisa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe; ahabw'okuba timurikubaasa kusingura.
Obwo Yeroboamu akaba ayohereize ab'okubagwera, ngu babateere nibabareetwa enyima; n'ahabw'ekyo engabo ze zikaba ziri omu maisho g'Abayuda, n'ab'okubagwera babari enyima.
Abayuda ku baanagire amaisho, baashanga orugamba rubaturukire omumaisho n'enyima; baatakira MUKAMA, abanyamurwa baateera enzamba,
n'abashaija ba Yuda baateera orwari; ku baaruteire, Ruhanga yaasingura Yeroboamu n'Abaisraeli boona omu maisho ga Abiya n'Abayuda.
Abaisraeli baahunga Abayuda, Ruhanga yaabahayo omu mikono yaabo.
Abiya n'abantu be baabaitamu abantu baingi munonga; batyo Abaisraeli baafamu abashaija entoore obusiriira butaano.
Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli baahweire eishaija omu bunaku obwo, Abayuda bakabasingura, ahabw'okwesiga MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Bwanyima Abiya yaakurata Yeroboamu, yaamunyaga endembo ezi, Beseeli n'ebirorero byayo, Yeshana n'ebirorero byayo na Efurooni n'ebirorero byayo.
Omu busingye bwa Abiya Yeroboamu taragizire bu agaruka kugira amaani; bwanyima MUKAMA yaamurwaza, yaafa.
Kwonka Abiya yaayeyongyera amaani. Yaashwera abakazi ikumi na bana, yaazaara abatabani makumi abiri na babiri, na bahara ikumi na mukaaga.
Endiijo mirimo ya Abiya, emicwe ye n'ebigambo bye bihandiikirwe omu kitabo kya nabi Ido.
Asa yaakora ebirungi kandi ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA.
Akaihaho amatambiro g'enduga-mahanga n'emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, yaasheenya enyomyo z'amabaare, yaatema Ashera,
kandi yaaragiira Abayuda kusherura MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, n'okworobera ebiragiro n'ebyatairweho.
Kandi yaiha omu ndembo zoona eza Yuda emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, n'ebyoterero by'okwotereraho obubaane. Obugabe bwagira obuhuumure omu busingye bwe.
Yaayombeka endembo ezeehinguririziibwe amabaare omuri Yuda, ahakuba ensi ekaba eine obusingye. Omuri egyo myaka tiyaagira ngamba; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akamuha obusingye.

Yaagira Abayuda ati: Ka twombekye endembo ezi, tuzeehinguririze engo z'amabaare, tuzombekyeho eminaara, n'amarembo againe enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi; ensi ekiri eyaitu, ahabw'okuba tusherwire MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu; tumusherwire, nawe yaatuha obusingye embaju zoona. Batyo baayombeka, baaba gye.

Kandi Asa akaba aine eihe ry'abashaija obusiriira bushatu babarugire Yuda abaine engabo n'amacumu, n'abarugire Benyamiini obusiriira bubiri n'obukumi munaana, ab'engabo n'amata; abo boona bakaba bari abashaija b'amaani amamanzi.
Bwanyima Zeera owa Esiopia yaija kubarwanisa n'eihe ry'engabo akakaikuru n'ebigaari magana ashatu, yaahika Mareesha.
Asa yaashohora kumubugana, baatenga orugamba omu ruhita rwa Zefasa ahari Mareesha.

Asa yaatakira MUKAMA Ruhanga we, naagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, tihaine orikwingana naiwe omu kuhwera abataine maani baateerwa ab'amaani. MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, otuhe emikono, ahabw'okuba niiwe turikwesiga, kandi omu iziina ryawe twizire kurwanisa omutwe ogu muhango munonga ogw'engabo. Ai MUKAMA, niiwe Ruhanga waitu, otaikiriza omuntu kukusingura.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaasingura Abaesiopia omu maisho ga Asa n'Abayuda, Abaesiopia baahunga.

Asa n'abantu abu yaabaire aine baababinga, baabahitsya Geera, Abaesiopia baafa baingi munonga, tibaabaasa kugaruka kweyunga; ahabw'okuba bakacwekyerezibwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'eihe rye. Abashaija ba Yuda baatwara eminyago mingi munonga;

bwanyima baacwekyereza endembo zoona ezaabaire zeehinguririize Geera, ahabw'okuba Abaesiopia bakaba baitsirwe obwoba obwareetsirwe MUKAMA. Baanyaga ezo ndembo zoona, ahakuba zikaba zirimu eminyago mingi.
Kandi baacwekyereza amahema g'abaabaire batungire ente, baanyaga entaama n'engamira nyingi munonga. Bwanyima baagaruka Yerusaalemu.

yaashohora kubugana Asa, yaamugira ati: Iwe n'Abayuda n'Ababenyamiini, mumpurire. Ruhanga ari hamwe naimwe, mwaba muri hamwe nawe. Ku murikumusherura, nimumuzoora; kwonka ku murikumutsigaho, nawe naabatsigaho.
Nimumanya ku Abaisraeli baamazire omwanya muhango bataine Ruhanga nyamuhanga, n'obu yaakuba omunyamurwa orikubeegyesa, kandi bataine biragiro;
kwonka ku baahindukiire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli omu busaasi bwabo, baamusherura, baamuzoora.
Omu biro ebyo hakaba hatariho busingye aha muntu weena orikushohora, nari orikutaaha, ahabw'okuba emirabanamu mingi ekagwisa kubi munonga abatuuzi boona ab'omuri ago mahanga.
Baataanamu, eihanga ryarwana n'erindi, n'orurembo rwarwana n'orundi, ahakuba Ruhanga akabatuntuza n'obusaasi bw'emiringo yoona.
Kwonka imwe, mugume! Mutacweka emikono; ahabw'okuba emirimo yaanyu eryazimuurirwa.

Bwanyima yaateeranira hamwe Abayuda n'Ababenyamiini boona, n'abaarugire omuri Efuraimu, Manaase na Simeoni, abaabaire baabashuhuukiiremu; ahakuba abantu baingi, ku baareebire MUKAMA Ruhanga we ari hamwe nawe, baacwa omuri Israeli, baija, baamwehongyera.
Omu kwezi kwa kashatu kw'omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'omu busingye bwa Asa, nibwo baateeranira Yerusaalemu.
Ahari eryo izooba baatambira MUKAMA ente magana mushanju n'entaama obukumi mushanju, nibaziiha omu minyago ei baabaire bareetsire.
Baaragaana endagaano kusherura MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo n'omutima gwabo gwona n'amagara gaabo goona;
kandi ngu, omuntu weena oraayangye kusherura MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa israeli, yaaba muto, yaaba mukuru, yaaba mushaija, yaaba mukazi, aitwe.
Baarahira omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'eiraka rihango, nibateera akaari, n'amakondere n'enzamba.
Abayuda boona baashemerererwa egyo ndahiro; ahakuba bakarahira n'omutima gwabo gwona, kandi baamusherura n'okwetenga kwabo kwona, baamuzoora; MUKAMA yaabaha obuhuumure embaju zoona.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu teraihirwe muri Israeli. N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, omutima gwa Asa gukaba gutaine ky'okuhanwa ebiro bye byona.
Kandi yaareeta omu nju ya Ruhanga ebintu ebi ishe yaashoroire, efeeza, n'ezaabu, n'ebintu by'okukoresa.
Tihaabaho bundi bweme okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu n'etaano ogw'omu busingye bwe.
Asa nikwo kwiha efeeza n'ezaabu omu mabiikiro g'omu nju ya MUKAMA, n'ag'omu nju y'omugabe, akabitwekyera Benihadadi omugabe wa Siria, owaabaire atwire Damasiko, naagira ati:
Ka turagaane endagaano y'okukwatanisa, nk'oku tata yaaragaine na sho. Reeba, naakutwekyera efeeza n'ezaabu. Gyenda, oite endagaano ei waaragaine na Baasha omugabe wa Israeli, abone kundugira omu nsi.
Benihadadi yaikiriza eby'omugabe Asa, yaatuma abakuru b'amahe ge kuteera endembo za Israeli, baakwata Iyooni, Daani, Abeeli-maimu n'endembo z'amabiikiro zoona ez'omuri Nafutaali.
Baasha ku yaakihuriire, yaarekyera aho kwombeka Raama, yaayemereza omurimo.
Bwanyima omugabe Asa yaatwara Abayuda boona, baiha omuri Raama amabaare n'embaaho, ebi Baasha yaabaire naayombekyersa; yaabyombekyesa Geeba na Mizipa.

Abaesiopia n'Abalibya bakaba batari eihe rihango munonga, eriine ebigaari bingi n'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi baingi? N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kiri kityo, kwonka ahabw'okwesiga MUKAMA akabahayo omu mikono yaawe.

Ahabw'okuba amaisho ga MUKAMA gairuka oku n'oku nigabuga ensi yoona, okweyoreka ku ari ow'amaani kuhwera abaine emitima eshugaine ahariwe. Omuri eki okozire eby'obushema; n'ahabw'ekyo okuruga hati noija kuguma noogira obweme.
Ahonaaho Asa yaagirira omuhanuuzi ekiniga, yaamuta omu nkomo, yaamutwara omu kihome; ahabw'okuba akamugwerwa kubi munonga ahabw'ekyo. Kandi omu bunaku obwo Asa yaabonabonesa abantu bamwe.

Bwanyima omu mwanka gwa makumi ashatu na mwenda ogw'omu busingye bwe, Asa yaarwara ebigyere, egyo ndwara yaaba ey'amaani munonga; hoona n'obu yaarwaire, tarasherwire buhwezi ahari MUKAMA, kureka akabusherura aha bafumu.
Bwanyima Asa yaafa omu mwaka gwa makumi ana na gumwe ogw'omu busingye bwe, yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru.

Baamuziika omu kituuro, eki yaayetimbiire omu rurembo rwa Daudi. Baarambika omutumbi gwe aha kitanda ekiijwire emigaju ey'emiringo etari emwe, ejwangiibwe abanyamyoga, kandi baacumika omuriro mwingi kumuhaisa ekitiinisa.
Yehoshafaati omutabani akategyeka omu mwanya gwa Asa ishe, yaakora eby'okwehamya ngu ayerinde Israeli.
Yaata emitwe y'engabo omu ndembo zoona eza Yuda ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, yaata abarinzi omu nsi ya Yuda, n'omu ndembo za Efuraimu, ezi Asa ishe yaakubwire.
MUKAMA yaaguma na Yehoshafaati, ahabw'okuba akagyendera omu micwe ya ishe ey'okubanza; tiyaakuratira Baabaali,
kureka yaakuratira Ruhanga wa ishe, yaaguma naayorobera ebiragiro bye, tiyaakuratira mitwarize ya Israeli.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaahamya obugabe bwe; Abayuda boona baaguma nibatoijera Yehoshafaati, yaatunga munonga, kandi yaagira ekitiinisa kingi.
Yaagyendera omu muhanda ya MUKAMA n'omutima gutaine bwoba; kandi yaihaho emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu na Ashera omuri Yuda.
Omu mwaka gwa kashatu ogw'omu busingye bwe, yaatuma abatware be Benihaili, Obadia, Zekaria, Netaneeli na Mikaaya kwegyesa omu ndembo za Yuda;
yaabatuma n'Abaleevi aba, Shemaya, Netania, Zebadia, Asaheeli, Shemiramoosi, Yehonasaani, Adoniya, Tobiya na Tobadoniya; hamwe n'abo Baleevi yaatuma abanyamurwa Elishaama na Yehoraamu.
Baayegyesa omuri Yuda, baine ekitabo kya MUKAMA eky'ebiragiro; baaraba omu ndembo zoona eza Yuda, nibeegyesa abantu.

Abamwe aha Bafilistia baareetera Yehoshafaati ebiconco, kandi baaguma nibamutoijera efeeza; kandi n'Abaharabu baamureetera empaya z'entaama enkumi mushanju na magana mushanju, n'empaya z'embuzi enkumi mushanju na magana mushanju.
Yehoshafaati yaaguma naayeyongyera ekitiinisa; yaayombeka omuri Yuda ebigo n'endembo z'amabiikiro;
kandi yaabiika ebintu bingi omu ndembo zaayo. N'omuri Yerusaalemu yaagira mu abaserukare, abashaija b'amaani amamanzi.

Ogu nigwo mubaro gwabo, nk'amaju ga baishenkurubo oku gaabaire gari; omu Bayuda, abakuru b'amahe bakaba bari aba: Aduna, omukuru w'engabo owaabaire aine abashaija b'amaani amamanzi obusiriira bushatu,
orikumukurata akaba ari Yehohanani omukuru w'engabo owaabaire aine abashaija obusiriira bubiri n'obukumi munaana,
n'orikutaho akaba ari Amasia mwene Zikuri, owaayehaireyo kuheereza MUKAMA n'omutima gwekundiire; we akaba aine abashaija b'amaani amamanzi obusiriira bubiri.
Omu Babenyamiini abakuru b'amahe bakaba bari aba: Eliada omushaija ow'amaani emanzi, owaabaire aine abashaija b'amata n'engabo obusiriira bubiri,
n'orikumukurata Yehozabadi, owaabaire aine abashaija akasiriira n'obukumi munaana abeeteekateekyeire orugamba.
Abo nibo baabaire nibakorera omugabe, otabariireho abo abu omugabe yaataire omu ndembo zeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare omuri Yuda yoona.
Emyaka ku yaahingwireho, yaashuuma, yaashanga Ahabu omuri Samaria; Ahabu yaamubaagira entaama n'ente nyingi, n'abu yaabaire aine, yaamubeihabeiha kuhurura nawe kuteera Ramosi-gileadi.

Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda ati: Noija kuhurura naanye Ramosi-gileadi? Yaamugarukamu ati: Nyowe naiwe turi bamwe, abantu bangye nibo baawe. Nitwija kukwatanisa naiwe omu rugamba.
Yehoshafaati yaagira omugabe wa Israeli ati: Ninkweshengyereza, banza oyehanuuze ahari MUKAMA, oreebe eki arikugamba eri izooba.

Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaateerana baanabi abashaija magana ana, yaababuuza ati: Tuteere Ramosi-gileadi, nari ndereere? Baamugarukamu bati: Irooko, ohurure, ahakuba MUKAMA naija kugihayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Kwonka Yehoshafaati yaagira ati: Beitu shi aha, tihariho nabi wa MUKAMA, tukamubuuza?

Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: hakiriho omushaija omwe, ou turikubaasa kwehanuuzaho ebya MUKAMA, niwe Mikaaya mwene Imula; kwonka nimmwanga, ahabw'okuba tandagurira birungi, kureka ebibi. Yehoshafaati yaagira ati: Nyakusinga, reka kugamba otyo.
Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaayeta omukuru w'abaserukare, yaamugira ati: Ndahukiza Mikaaya mwene Imula.

Obwo omugabe wa Israeli na Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda bakaba bashutami aha bitebe byabo eby'obugabe, bajwaire zaabushuuti zaabo, bari aha mbuga omu irembo rya Samaria, baanabi boona babari omumaisho nibaragura.
Zedekia mwene Kenaana yaayekorera amahembe g'ekyoma, yaaragura ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Aga mahembe nigo oraabingise Abasiria okuhitsya obu baraacwekyerere.
Kandi na baanabi boona baaragura batyo nibagira bati: Irooko oteere Ramosi-gileadi, osingure; MUKAMA naija kugihayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Entumwa eyaaza kweta Mikaaya yaamugira eti: Reeba, ebigambo bya baanabi nibiikirizana, biragura gye aha mugabe; naiwe ebigambo byawe bibe nk'ebyabo, oragure gye.
Kwonka Mikaaya yaagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA, eki MUKAMA arangambire, nikyo ndaagambe.
Ku yaahikire omugabe, omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Mikaaya, tuteere Ramosi-gileadi, nari ndereere? Yaamugarukamu ati: Hurura, osingure; nibaija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'omugabe.
Kwonka omugabe yaamugira ati: Nkurahize kangahi okutangambira kindi omu iziina rya MUKAMA kureka amazima?
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Ndeebire Abaisraeli boona bataataaniire aha bibungo nk'entaama ezitaine muriisa; MUKAMA yaagira ati: Aba tibaine mukama; boona bagarukyeyo n'obusingye, buri muntu omu ka ye.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Tinaakugambira nti: Tarikwija kundagurira birungi kureka ebibi?
Mikaaya yaagira ati: Mbwenu hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Naareeba MUKAMA ashutami aha kitebe kye, n'eihe ryona ery'omu iguru ryemereire aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho;
MUKAMA yaagira ati: N'oha oraabeihabeihe Ahabu, akateera Ramosi-gileadi, akagwayo? Omwe yaagamba okundi, n'ondi okundi.
Bwanyima haija omwoyo, gwayemerera omu maisho ga MUKAMA, gwagira guti: Niinye ndaamubeihabeihe. MUKAMA yaagubuuza ati: Noomubeihabeihesa ki?
Gwagira guti: niinyija kugyenda, mpindukye omwoyo gw'ebishuba, ngambire omuri baanabi be boona. MUKAMA yaagira ati: Niiwe oraamubeihabeihe, kandi noija kukibaasa; irooko okore otyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA ataire omwoyo gw'ebishuba omuri baanabi baawe aba boona; kandi MUKAMA akugambireho kubi.
Bwanyima Zedekia mwene Kenaana yairira haihi, yaateera Mikaaya oruhi rw'omushaaya, naagira ati: Omwoyo wa MUKAMA arabire hi kundugaho kugamba naiwe?
Mikaaya yaagira ati: Mbwenu oryakireeba ahari eryo izooba ku oriba nooza kweshereka omu kishengye ky'omunda.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira ati: Twara Mikaaya, omugarure ahari Amoni omukuru w'orurembo na Yoasi mutabani w'omugabe,
omugire oti: Oku nikwo omugabe arikugamba naagira ati: Mute ekishaija eki omu kihome, mukiriise eby'okurya kandi mukinywaise amaizi eby'akahenano, okuhitsya obu ndaagarukye n'obusingye.
Mikaaya yaagira ati: Ku oraagarukye n'obusingye, biri MUKAMA tagambiire muriinye. Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Naimwe bantu 'mwe mwena, mukihurire!
Bwanyima omugabe wa Israeli na Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda bainamuka, baateera Ramosi-gileadi.
Omugabe wa Israeli yaagira Yehoshafaati ati: Nyowe naaza kwehindura, nze kurwana, kwonka iwe ogume ojwaire ebijwaro byawe by'obugabe. Atyo omugabe wa Israeli yaayehindura, yaaza aha rugamba.
Kandi omugabe wa Siria akaba aragiire abakuru b'ebigaari bye ati: Mutarwana n'abato, n'obu baakuba abakuru, kureka omugabe wa Israeli wenka.
Abo bakuru b'ebigaari, ku baareebire Yehoshafaati, baagira bati: Buzima niwe mugabe wa Israeli. Baakubuuka kurwana nawe. Yehoshafaati yaateera enduuru, MUKAMA yaamuhwera; Ruhanga yaabamwihaho;
abakuru b'ebigaari, ku baareebire atari mugabe wa Israeli, baagarukayo, baareka kumubinga.

Kwonka haarugaho omushaija yaananuura obuta, yaafa okurasha omwambi, yaateera omugabe wa Israeli ahu ebijwaro bye eby'okurwanisa n'eky'aha kifuba birikuteeranira; omugabe nikwo kugambira omuvugi w'ekigaari kye ati: Hinduka, onyihe omu rugamba, ahabw'okuba naahutaara munonga.
Eryo izooba orugamba rwayeyongyera amaani, omugabe baamuhigika omu kigaari kye naareebana n'Abasiria, okuhitsya omu mwabazyo; eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, yaafa.
Bwanyima Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda yaagaruka buhooro omu kikaari kye omuri Yerusaalemu.
Ku yaabaire atakataahire, Yehu mwene Hanani omuhanuuzi yaaza kumubugana, yaamugira ati: Oshemereire kuha ababi emikono, n'okukunda abarikwanga MUKAMA? N'ahabw'ekyo ekiniga kya MUKAMA kyakwijaho.
Kwonka, n'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, omuriiwe harimu n'ebirungi, ahakuba okacwekyereza Ashera omu nsi, kandi omutima gwawe waaguta aha kusherura MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Yehoshafaati yaatuura Yerusaalemu; yaagaruka yaagyendagyenda omu bantu, okuruga Beeri-sheba okuhika omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu, yaabagarura ahari MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Yaata abaramuzi omu nsi, omu ndembo zoona eza Yuda ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, omuri buri rumwe,
yaagambira abaramuzi ati: Muteekateekye eki murikukora; ahakuba timurikuramurira bantu, kureka MUKAMA; kandi ari hamwe naimwe omu kucwa emanja.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume mutiine MUKAMA; kandi mwerinde omu bi murikukora; ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu taita manja, tashoroora mu bantu, kandi tarya nguzi.
Yaabeehanangiriza ati: Oku nikwo muritwaza omu kutiina MUKAMA, omu bwesigwa, mutaireho emitima yaanyu yoona.

Beene waanyu abatwire omu ndembo zaabo, ku bariguma baabareetera emanja z'obwitsi, ez'ebiragiro, ez'ebyaragiirwe, ez'ebyatairweho nari ez'emigyenzo, muryaguma mubahabure, barekye kugiibwaho orubanja omu maisho ga MUKAMA, naimwe na beene waanyu murekye kuhikwaho ekiniga. Okwo nikwo muritwaza, mukareka kugiibwaho orubanja.

Kandi reeba, Amaria omunyamurwa omukuru niwe arikubategyeka omu bigambo byona ebya MUKAMA, na Zebedia mwene Ishimaeli omutegyeki w'enju ya Yuda, omu bigambo byona eby'omugabe; kandi Abaleevi baryaguma nibabaheereza nk'abakuru. Mukore n'obumanzi; kandi MUKAMA agume n'abarikukora eby'oburyo.
Haija abantu baagambira Yehoshafaati bati: Omutwe muhango gw'engabo guri omu muhanda niguruga Edomu, seeri y'enyanja, gwizire kukuteera; reeba, baahika Hazazoni-tamaari, niyo Enigeedi.
Ahonaaho Yehoshafaati yaatiina, yaamariirira kusherura MUKAMA, kandi yaaragiira Abayuda boona kwesiibyakwo.
Abayuda baayeteerana kusherura obuhwezi ahari MUKAMA; baaruga omu ndembo z'omuri Yuda zoona kuza kusherura MUKAMA.
Yehoshafaati yaayemerera ahagati y'omutwe gw'Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu, abateeraniire omu nju ya MUKAMA omu maisho g'ekikaari kisya,

yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe, tiiwe Ruhanga ow'omu iguru? Tiiwe orikutegyeka obugabe bwona obw'amahanga? Omu mukono gwawe harimu obushoboorozi n'amaani, tihariho orikubaasa kukuza omu kaso.
Ai Ruhanga waitu, torabingire abatuuzi b'omuri egi nsi omu maisho g'abantu baawe Israeli, okagiha baijukuru ba Abrahamu munywani waawe kuba eyaabo ebiro byona?
Kandi kwo bakagituuramu, baayombekyeramu eiziina ryawe Omwanya ogurikwera, nibagira bati:

Akabi ku karituhikaho, rurara, okugira orubanja, orufu, nari enjara, turyayemerera omu maisho g'enju egi n'omu maisho gaawe, ahakuba eiziina ryawe rituura omuri egi nju, tukutakire omu kubonabona kwaitu; naiwe ohurire kandi ojune.
Mbwenu reeba, Abaamoni, Abamoabu n'ab'omu bibungo bya Seiri, abu waayangire Abaisraeli ku bateera ensi yaabo, obu baabaire nibaruga omu nsi ya Misri, kureka bakabaraba hangahari, batabacwekyererze,
reeba oku barikutuzimuurira, nibaza kutubinga omu buhunguzi bwawe, obu waatuhaire kuhungura.

Ai Ruhanga waitu, torikwija kubacwera orubanja, okabafubira? Ahakuba titwine maani g'okurwanisa eri ihe rihango eriizire kuturwanisa; kandi titurikumanya oku turaagire; kureka niiwe tuhangire amaisho.
Omuri obwo bunaku abashaija ba Yuda boona bakaba beemereire omu maisho ga MUKAMA n'abeereere baabo n'abakzi baabo n'abaana baabo.
Ahonaaho Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaija ahari Yahazieli mwene Zekaria, mwijukuru wa Benaaya, ya Yayeli mwene Matania, Omuleevi ow'omuri beene Asafu, ahu yaabaire ari ahagati y'ogwo mutwe.

Yaagira ati: Muhurire, imwe Abayuda, n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu n'omugabe Yehoshafaati Cku nikwo MUKAMA arikubagambira naagira ati: Mutatiina ogu mutwe muhango gw'engabo, kandi mutahahaaza emitima; ahakuba orugamba ti rwanyu, n'orwa MUKAMA.
Nyencakare mushuume, mubateere; nibaija kwinamukira ahu orikutembera nooza Ziizi; nimwija kubashanga aha muheru gw'oruhanga aha burugwa-izooba bw'eihamba rya Yerueli.

Omuri orwo rugamba timurikwija kwetenga kurwana; muze omu myanya yaanyu, mwemerere kwonka, mureebe oku MUKAMA araabasingurire, imwe Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu. Mutatiina, kandi mutahahaaza emitima; nyencakare muhurure mubateere; MUKAMA naija kuba hamwe naimwe.
Bwanyima Yehoshafaati yainika omutwe ahansi, yaaramya, n'Abayuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu boona nabo baagwa omu maisho ga MUKAMA bajuumaire, nibamuramya.
Abaleevi ab'omuryango gwa Kohasi, n'ab'omu gwa Koora, baayemerera kuhimbisa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli n'eiraka rihango munonga.

Omu kasheeshe munonga baimuka, baaza omu ihamba rya Tekoa; ku baabaire nibakigyenda, Yehoshafaati yaayemerera, yaagira ati: Mumpurire, imwe Abayuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, Mwesigye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nibwo muraahamibwe; mwikirize baanabi be, nibwo muraabe gye.
Ku yaaherize kuhanuura n'abantu, yaataho ab'okweshongorera MUKAMA, n'okumuhimbisa bajwaire ebirikwera, kugyenda beebembeire eihe, nibagira bati:
Musiime MUKAMA,
Ahakuba embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona.
Ku baatandikire kweshongora n'okuhimbisa, MUKAMA yaataho ab'okugwera Abaamoni, n'Abamoabu n'ab'omu bibungo bya Seiri abaizire kurwanisa Abayuda; baabarabanisamu.

Ahakuba Abaamoni n'Abamoabu bakagurukana abatuuzi b'omu bibungo bya Seiri, baabacwekyerereza kimwe; ku baaherize kucwekyereza aba Seiri, baayehindukiririzana, baatandika kwitana bonka, buri muntu yaita mugyenzi we.
Abayuda ku baahikire aha munaara gw'abarinzi omu ihamba, baanaga amaisho ei ogwo mutwe gw'engabo gwabaire guri, baashanga boona baabaire emitumbi barambiire ahansi, hataine ohonokireho.

Yehooshafaati n'abantu be ku baahikiireyo kubanyaga, baashangayo amatungo maingi munonga, ebintu, ebijwaro n'ebindi bintu eby'obuguzi bwingi, baabyetwarira okuhitsya obu byabaremeireho. Ahabw'okuba bingi munonga, baamara ebiro bishatu nibanyaga.
Aha kiro kya kana baateeranira omu ruhanga rwa Beraaka, baasiimirayo MUKAMA; nikyo ogwo mwanya gurikweterwa Beraaka n'okuhitsya hati.
Bwanyima buri muntu ow'omu Bayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu hamwe na Yehoshafaati abeebembeire baagaruka Yerusaalemu bashemereirwe, ahakuba MUKAMA akabaha okweraata aha bazigu baabo.
Baahika Yerusaalemu aha nju ya MUKAMA, baine enanga n'endingiri n'amakondere.
Ab'omu bugabe bw'amahanga goona, ku baahuriire ngu MUKAMA arwaniise abazigu ba Israeli baashwekwa obwoba ahabw'okutiina Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo obugabe bwa Yehoshafaati bwatuuza, ahakuba Ruhanga we akamuha obuhuumure embaju zoona.
Yaagyendera omu muhanda gwa Asa ishe, tiyaagira bu aguteishukire; kureka yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA.
Kwonka emyanya mikuru ey'okuramizamu tiyaihwaho, ahakuba abantu bakaba batakataire mitima yaabo ahari Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Yaakwatanisa nawe kubaija emeeri z'okuza Tarushiishi, baazibaijera Ezioni-geberi.

Bwanyima Eliezeeri mwene Dodavahu owa Mareesha, yaaragura ahari Yehoshafaati naagira ati: Ahabw'okweteerana na Ahazia, MUKAMA naija kucwekyereza eki obaizire. Ezo meeri zaahendagurika, tizaabaasa kuza Tarushiishi.
Akaba aine abarumuna, abaana ba Yehoshafaati, Azaria, Yehieli, Zekaria, Azaria, Mikaeli na Shefatia; abo boona bakaba bari batabani ba Yehoshafaati omugabe wa Yuda.

Ishebo akabaha ebiconco bingi, by'efeeza, n'ezaabu n'ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi hamwe n'endembo omuri Yuda ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare; kwonka obugabe yaabuha Yehoraamu, ahabw'okuba omwana w'omujigaijo.
Yehoraamu ku yaagiire aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa ishe, yaahamibwa, yaita abarumuna boona na rurara, n'abandi banyiginya b'omuri Yuda.
Yehoraamu akaba ahikize emyaka makumi ashatu n'ebiri, obu yaaza aha ngoma, yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu emyaka munaana.
Yaagyendera omu mihanda y'abagabe ba Israeli, nk'ab'enju ya Ahabu oku baakozire, ahakuba akaba ashweire muhara wa Ahabu. Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA.
N'obu biraabe byabaire biri bityo, MUKAMA akanga kucwekyerereza kimwe enju ya Daudi, ahabw'endagaano ei yaaragaine na Daudi, n'ahabw'okumuraganisa we n'oruzaaro rwe, kubaha etabaaza ebiro byona.
Omu biro bye Abanyaedomu bakagoma, baaruga omu butegyeki bwa Yuda, baayeteeraho owaabo mugabe.
Bwanyima Yehoraamu yaayambuka n'abakuru b'engabo n'ebigaari bye byona; yaimuka nyekiro, yaateera Abanyaedomu, abaabaire bamwehinguririize n'abakuru b'ebigaari bye.
Okwo nikwo Edomu yaagomire, ekaruga omu butegyeki bwa Yuda n'okuhitsya hati. Omu bunaku obwo Libuna nayo yaamugomera, ahabw'okuba akaba atsigireho MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkuru.

Bwanyima yaatunga ebaruha erikuruga ahari nabi Eliya, neegira eti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Daudi shwenkuru arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okuba togyendeire mu mihanda ya sho Yehoshafaati, n'obu yaakuba eya Asa omugabe wa Yuda,
ogyendeire omu mihanda y'abagabe ba Israeli, waareetera Abayuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu okuruga ahari Ruhanga, kandi waataho n'okwita barumuna baawe, ab'enju ya sho, abaabaire nibakuhita,
reeba, MUKAMA naija kureeta ekibonaboneso kihango aha bantu baawe, aha baana baawe, aha bakazi baawe n'aha bintu byawe byona,
kandi naiwe wenka noija kurwara endwara mbi munonga omu mara, okuhitsya obu oraagume nooreeta omwoyo buri izooba.

baija kurwanisa Yuda, baagiteera, baanyagayo ebintu byona ebi baashangire omu nju y'omugabe, kandi n'abatabani n'abakazi be, tiyaatsigaza mwana weena ow'omwojo kureka Yehoahazi omwana we wa bucuranda.
Bwanyima y'ebyo byona, MUKAMA yaamurwaza endwara etarikukira omu mara.

Ebiro ku byahingwireho, aha muheru gw'emyaka ebiri, yaatandika kureeta omwoyo ahabw'egyo ndwara, yaafa aine obuhuruzi bwingi munonga. Abantu be tibaacumika muriro gw'okumuhaisa ekitiinisa, nk'oku baagiriire baishenkuru.

Obu yaatandika kutegyeka, akaba aine emyaka makumi ashatu n'ebiri, yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu emyaka munaana, yaafa atakiine orikumwenda. Baamuziika omu rurembo rwa Daudi, kwonka ti mu bituuro by'abagabe.
Ahazia akaba aine emyaka makumi ana n'ebiri, obu yaatandika kutegyeka, yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu omwaka gumwe. Nyina akaba naayetwa Atalia mwijukuru wa Omuri.
Ahazia nawe yaagyendera omu micwe y'ab'enju ya Ahabu, ahabw'okuba nyina niwe yaabaire amuha obwegye kukora kubi.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'oku ab'enju ya Ahabu baakozire; ahakuba ishe ku yaaherize kufa, baaguma nibamuha obwengye obwamucwekyereize.
Kandi akakuratira obwengye bwabo, yaagyenda na Yoramu mwene Ahabu omugabe wa Israeli kurwanisa Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria ahari Ramosi-gileadi. Abasiria baahutaaza Yoramu,

yagaruka Yezereeli kurwarirayo obuhuta, obu baamuhutaariize Raama, obu baarwana na Hazaeli omugabe wa Siria. Bwanyima Ahazia mwene Yehoraamu omugabe wa Yuda yaashuuma Yezereeli kureeba Yoramu mwene Ahabu, ahakuba akaba arwaire.
Ku yaabaire naaha ab'enju ya Ahabu ekifubiro, yaabugana abanyiginya ba Yuda na batabani ba barumuna ba Ahazia, abaabaire nibaheereza Amazia, yaabaita.

Bwanyima yaasherura Ahazia, baamukwata ayesherekire omuri Samaria, baamureetera Yehu, yaamwita. Baamuziika, ahabw'okuba bakagira ngu ni mwijukuru wa Yehoshafaati, owaabaire naasherura MUKAMA n'omutima gwe gwona. Okuruga aho enju ya Ahazia yaabura omuntu orikubaasa kutwara engoma.

Kwonka Yehoshabeasi muhara w'omugabe yaatwara Yoasi mwene Ahazia, yaamwiba omuri batabani b'omugabe, abaabaire bari haihi kwitwa, we n'omurezi we yaabata omu kishengye ky'okuraaramu. Atyo Yehoshabeasi, muhara w'omugabe Yehoraamu, kandi muka Yehoyaada omunyamurwa, ahabw'okuba munyaanya wa Ahazia, yaamushereka Atalia, tiyaamwita.
Yaamara nabo emyaka mukaaga, asherekirwe omu nju ya Ruhanga; obwo Atalia naategyeka ensi.
Baaraba omuri Yuda yoona, baateerana Abaleevi, nibabaiha omu ndembo zoona eza Yuda, n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'Abaisraeli, baija Yerusaalemu.
Abateeraine boona baaragaana endagaano n'omugabe bari omu nju ya Ruhanga. Yehoyaada yaabagira ati: Omwana w'omugabe ngugu! K'ategyekye, nk'oku MUKAMA yaagambire ahari beene Daudi.
Mbwenu oku nikwo muraatwaze. Omuriimwe abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi abarikwihwa aha murimo ahari sabato, ekicweka kimwe kya kashatu kibe eky'ab'okuridna amarembo,
kimwe kya kashatu kibe eky'aha nju y'omugabe, na kimwe kya kashatu ekindi kibe eky'aha irembo ry'omusingi; kandi abantu boona baze omu bikaari by'enju ya MUKAMA.
Hatagira ondiijo weena owaataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA, kureka abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi abarikuheereza; bo bataahemu, ahabw'okuba n'abarikwera; kwonka abandi boona bategyereze okuragiira kwa MUKAMA.
Abaleevi beehinguririze omugabe, buri muntu aine eby'okurwanisa bye omu ngaro; kandi omuntu weena oraataahe omu nju aitwe. Mugume n'omugabe, yaaba naataahamu, nari naashohora.

Abaleevi n'Abayuda boona baakora nk'ebi Yehoyaada omunyamurwa yaabaragiira byona. Buri omwe yaareeta abantu be ab'okwihwa aha murimo ahari sabato, n'ab'okwija aha murimo ahari sabato; ahabw'okuba Yehoyaada omunyamurwa tararagiire baabaire bari aha rubu kutaaha.
Bwanyima Yehoyaada omunyamurwa yaaha abakuru b'engabo amacumu n'engabo mpango n'enkye, ezaabaire ziri ez'omugabe Daudi, nizibiikwa omu nju ya Ruhanga;

yaataho abantu boona kuba abarinzi b'omugabe, buri muntu aine eky'okurwanisa kye omu ngaro, okuruga aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo bw'enju, okuhika aha rw'obwa bumosho, baayehinguririza eitambiro n'enju.
Bwanyima yaashohoza omwana w'omugabe, yaamujweka ekirunga, yaamuha Eby'okuhamya; baamuranga ku yaaba omugabe, Yehoyaada n'abatabani baamushukaho amajuta, baagira bati: Omugabe naakaramaare!
Atalia ku yaahuriire orwari rw'abantu nibairuka nibahimbisa omugabe, yaataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA ahu bantu bari;

ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba omugabe ayemereire aha rubaju rw'enyomyo ye aha irembo, n'abakuru b'engabo n'abakondere bamwemereire aha rubaju, n'abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi nibashemererwa nibateera amakondere, kandi n'abeeshongozi baine ebintu byabo by'okuteera nibeebembera abarikweshongora. Ahonaaho Atalia yaataagura ebijwaro bye, yaagira ati: Okwebumba! Okwebumba!

Yehoyaada omunyamurwa yaashohoza abakuru b'engabo abaatairweho kutegyeka eihe, yaabagira ati: Mumurabye omu ngabo, mumushohoze; oraamukurate weena, mumwite na rurara. Ahakuba omunyamurwa akaragiira ati: Mutamwitira omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Batyo baamutaho engaro, baamurabya omu irembo ry'embaraasi aha irembo ry'enju y'omugabe, baamwitirayo.
Bwanyima Yehoyaada yaaragaana endagaano n'abantu boona kandi n'omugabe kuba abantu ba MUKAMA.
Okuruga aho abantu boona baaza ahari nyaruju ya Baali, baagisheenya; amatambiro ge n'ebishushani bye baabisheenyagurira kimwe, baitira Mataani omunyamurwa wa Baali omu maisho g'ago matambiro.

Bwanyima Yehoyaada yaataho abantu b'okurinda enju ya MUKAMA kuguma nibareebererwa abanyamurwa Abaleevi, n'abandi Baleevi, abu Daudi yaataireho kuguma nibareeberera enju ya MUKAMA, kuhongyera MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu biragiro bya Musa, ngu babihongye nibashemererwa nibeeshongora, nk'oku Daudi yaaragiire.
Abarinzi b'amarembo yaabata aha marembo g'enju ya MUKAMA, ngu omuntu weena otashemeire omu muringo gwona arekye kutaahamu.

Bwanyima yaatwara abakuru b'engabo, n'ab'ekitiinisa, n'abategyeki b'abantu, hamwe n'abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi, baashuumya omugabe nibamwiha omu irembo rya ruguru, baamutaasya omu nju y'omugabe, baamuta aha kitebe ky'obugabe.
Batyo abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi baashemererwa; kandi bwanyima y'okwita Atalia na rurara, orurembo rwatuuza.
Omu biro byona ebya Yehoyaada omunyamurwa Yoasi akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA.
Yehoyaada yaamushwererera abakazi babiri, yaazaara abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki.
Bwanyima y'ekyo Yoasi yaamariirira kuhunduuza enju ya MUKAMA.

Yaateerana abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, yaabagira ati: Mwirooko muze omu ndembo za Yuda, muteerane omu Baisraeli boona empiiha z'okuhunduuza enju ya Ruhanga waanyu buri mwaka; kandi mukirahutsye. Kwonka Abaleevi tibaakirahutsya.

Omugabe nikwo kweta Yehoyaada omukuru, akamugira ati: Ahabw'enki toragiire Baleevi kwiha omu Bayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu emitoijo, ei Musa omugaragwa wa MUKAMA yaaragiire eihanga ryona erya Israeli kuha, ngw ebi ey'Eihema ry'Eby'okuhamya?
Ahakuba batabani ba Atalia, ogwo mukazi mubi, bakataaha omu nju ya Ruhanga, kandi ebintu byona eby'omu nju ya MUKAMA ebyashoroirwe, baabikoresa ahabwa Baabaali.
N'ahabw'ekyo omugabe yaaragiira, baabaija eshanduukye, baagita aheeru y'eirembo ry'enju ya MUKAMA.
Baaranga omuri Yuda n'omuri Yerusaalemu yoona, ku baareetera MUKAMA emitoijo ei Musa omugaragwa wa Ruhanga yaaragiire Abaisraeli bari omu ihamba.
Abanyiginya boona n'abantu boona baashemererwa, baareeta emitoijo yaabo, baagita omuri egyo shanduukye okuhitsya obu baaherize.

Abaleevi ku baabaire bareetera abatware b'omugabe egyo shanduukye, baareeba erimu empiiha nyingi, omuhandiiki w'omugabe n'omutware w'omunyamurwa mukuru baija, baihamu ebirimu byona, bagitwara, bagigarura omu mwanya gwayo. Okwo nikwo baabaire bakora buri izooba, bakateerana empiiha nyingi munonga.
Omugabe na Yehoyaada baziha abarikureeberera omurimo gw'enju ya MUKAMA, bagurira abombeki n'ababaizi kuhunduuza egyo nju, hamwe n'abaheesi b'ebyoma n'ab'emiringa.
Batyo abaakwatsiibwe omurimo baakora n'amaani, baaguhereza kimwe, enju ya Ruhanga baagihunduuza, baagigarura omu buteeka, baagihamya.

Ku baagiherize, baareetera omugabe na Yehoyaada empiiha ezashaagireho, baazikoramu ebintu by'enju ya MUKAMA, eby'okuheerezesa, eby'ebitambo by'okwotsya, eshohaani z'obubaane, n'ebintu by'efeeza n'ezaabu. Kandi omu biro bya Yehoyaada byona bakaguma nibatambira ebitambo by'okwotsya omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Kwonka Yehoyaada yaakura, yaahika omu ngingo zaabukuru, yaafa; kandi akafa ahikize emyaka igana na makumi ashatu.
Baamuziika omu bagabe omu rurembo rwa Daudi, ahabw'okuba akakora gye omuri Israeli ahari Ruhanga n'aha b'enju ye.
Yehoyaada ku yaaherize kufa, abanyiginya ba Yuda baija, baatangirira omugabe. Okuruga aho omugabe yaaguma naahurira ebi barikumugambira.
Baareka enju ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, baaheereza Ashera n'ebishushani ebirikuramibwa. Ahabw'eikyo kicumuro kyabo, ekiniga kya Ruhanga kyaija aha Bayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu.
Hoona, n'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, akaguma naabatumaho baanabi kubagarura ahari MUKAMA; baanabi abo baaboomesereza, kwonka baayanga kuhurira.
Kwonka baamugirira enaama, baamuteerera amabaare omu kikaari ky'enju ya MUKAMA ahabw'ekiragiro ky'omugabe.
Okwo nikwo Yoasi omugabe yaayebirwe embabazi ezi Yehoyaada, ishe wa Zekaria, yaamugiriire, akamwitira omwana. Zekaria ku yaabaire naafa, yaagira ati: MUKAMA akireebe, kandi ahoore!

N'obu eihe ry'Abasiria ryaizire n'abantu bakye, MUKAMA akahayo omu mikono yaabo eihe rihango munonga, ahabw'okuba Abayuda abo bakatsigaho MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo. Okwo nikwo Abasiria baahaire Yoasi ekifubiro.
Abaamugiriire enaama bakaba bari Zabadi mwene Shineasi Omuamonikazi, na Yehozabadi mwene Shimuriisi Omumoabukazi.
Eby'abatabani, n'ebi baanabi baamuhanire, n'eby'okuhunduuza enju ya Ruhanga, bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebirikushoboorora eby'omu kitabo ky'abagabe. Amazia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, kwonka ataine mutima guhikire.
Ku yaaherize kuhamibwa ati omu omu bugabe bwe, yaita abaheereza be abaitsire omugabe ishe;

kwonka tiyaita baana baabo, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Musa eky'ebiragiro, omu MUKAMA yaaragiriire ati: Baishe b'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa abaana baabo, kandi n'abaana batariitwa nibaturwa baishebo; kureka omuntu weena aryaitwa ahabw'ekibi kye.
Yaagaruka yaagurira abashaja b'amaani amamanzi aba Israeli akasiriira kamwe n'etalanta z'efeeza igana.
Kwonka omushaija wa Ruhanga yaija ah'ari, yaamugira ati: Nyakusinga omugabe, otaikiriza eihe rya Israeli kuhurura naiwe, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA tari hamwe na Israeli, Abaefuraimu aba boona.
Ku oraabe noogira ngu oine amaani g'okurwana, omanye ngu Ruhanga naija kukuteera ahansi omu maisho g'abazigu baawe; ahakuba Ruhanga aine obushoboorozi bw'okuhwera, nari obw'okutuura ahansi.

Amazia yaagira ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga ati: Mbwenu shi tugire tuta ezo talanta igana, ezi mpaire eihe rya Israeli? Omushaija wa Ruhanga yaamugarukamu ati: MUKAMA naabaasa kukuha nyingi munonga ezirikukira ezo.
Bwanyima Amazia yaaragiira eihe, eryamwizireho niriruga Efuraimu, kugaruka omuka. Baagwerwa kubi munonga Abayuda, baagaruka omuka baine ekiniga kingi.
Kwonka Amazia we yaaguma, yaahuruza abantu be, baaza omu ruhita rw'omwonyo, baita omu bashaija ba Seiri abantu kakumi.
Kandi Abayuda baakwata abandi kakumi bahuriire, baabatwara aha mutwe gw'ekibaare kihango, baabatambika, baayetuura ahansi, baacwagacwagurika boona.
Kwonka abashaija b'eryo ihe, abu Amazia yaagarwireyo, akanga ku bahurura nawe, baateera endembo za Yuda okuruga Samaria okuhika Besi-horoni, baaziitamu abantu enkumi ishatu, baanyaga eminyago mingi.
Amazia ku yaarugire kwita Abanyaedomu, yaareeta ebishushani bya baaruhanga ba Seiri, yaabyemereza kuba baaruhanga be, yaabiramya, yaabihongyera empongano.
Nikyo MUKAMA yaagwereirwe kubi Amazia, akamutumaho nabi, akamugira ati: Ahabw'enki oyehongyeire baaruhanga abatarabaasize kujuna abantu baabo omu mikono yaawe?

Ku yaabaire naakigamba, omugabe yaamugira ati: Beitu shi tukugizire omuhanuuzi w'omugabe? Hunama! Mbwenu oitirwe ki? Atyo nabi yaahunama; kwonka yaagira ati: Nimmanya ngu Ruhanga amaririire kukucwekyereza, ahabw'okukora eki, okanga kuhurira eki nkuhabwire.

Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli yaatuma ahari Amazia omugabe wa Yuda naagira ati: Eitojo rya Lebanooni rikatuma aha mwereezi gwa Lebanooni nirigira riti: Ha mutabani wangye muhara waawe, amushwere. Ku bwaseesire, enyamaishwa y'omu ihamba rya Lebanooni yaija neerabaho, yaariribata.
Ogizire oti: Reeba, nteire Abanyaedomu, naabasingura; omutima gwawe gwakureetera eishaija, waayehimbisa. Kwonka ogume omuka; ahabw'enki nootaara akabi, ngu ofe, na Yuda nayo efe.
Kwonka Amazia yaayanga kuhurira, ahabw'okuba kikaba kirugire ahari MUKAMA, ngu abone kubahayo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo ahabw'okwehongyera baaruhanga ba Edomu.
N'ahabw'ekyo Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli, yainamuka; we na Amazia omugabe wa Yuda baabugaabuganira Beti-shemeshi eya Yuda, baarwanirayo.
Abayuda baabingwa Abaisraeli, buri muntu yaahungira omu ka ye.

Yehoashi omugabe wa Israeli yaakwata Amazia omugabe wa Yuda, mwene Yoasi, mwijukuru wa Ahazia; yaamukwatira Beti-shemeshi, bwanyima yaamureeta Yerusaalemu, yaasheenya orugo rwayo rw'amabaare ekicweka kya mikono magana ana okuruga aha irembo rya Efuraimu okuhika aha irembo ry'aha keekubo.

Kandi yaanyaga ezaabu n'efeeza zoona n'ebintu byona ebyashangirwe omu nju ya Ruhanga hamwe na Obededomu; yaagaruka yaanyaga eby'omu mabiikiro g'enju y'omugabe, kandi yaabaihamu abantu, yaabagira omukwato; bwanyima yaagaruka Samaria.
Mbwenu endiijo mirimo ya Amazia, okuruga aha kutandika okuhika aha muheru, tehandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'abagabe ba Yuda na Israeli?
Okuruga omu bunaku obu yaarugiiremu ahari MUKAMA, bakamugirira enaama y'okumugomera omuri Yerusaalemu; yaahungira Lakishi; kwonka baamukuratsa abantu Lakishi, baamwitirayo.
Baamureetera aha mbaraasi, baamuziika omu rurembo rwa Daudi hamwe na baishenkuru.
Abayuda boona baatwara Uziya, owaabaire aine emyaka ikumi na mukaaga, baamwemeka omu mwanya gwa ishe.
Yaayombeka Eloosi, yaagigarurira Abayuda, omugabe ishe aharize kugwejegyera kushanga baishenkuru.
Uziya akaba aine emyaka ikumi na mukaaga, obu yaatandika kutegyeka, yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu emyaka makumi ataano n'ebiri. Nyina akaba naayetwa Yekolia owa Yerusaalemu.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Amazia ishe yaakozire byona.
Omu biro bya Zekaria, owaabaire naamwegyesa okutiina Ruhanga, akamariirira kusherura Ruhanga; kandi omwanya gwona ogu yaamazire naasherura MUKAMA, Ruhanga akamuha omugisha.
Kandi Ruhanga yaamuhwera omu kurwanisa Abafilistia n'Abaharabu, abaabaire batwire Gurubaali, n'Abameuni.
Abaamoni baareetera Uziya emitoijo; kandi okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga, kwahika n'aha mwatano gwa Misri; ahakuba akaba ow'amaani munonga.
Kandi Uziya yaayombeka eminaara omuri Yerusaalemu aha Irembo ry'aha keekubo, aha Irembo ry'oruhanga, n'aha Keekubo, yaagihamya.

Yaagaruka yaayombeka eminaara omu ihamba, yaatimba amaziba maingi, ahakuba akaba aine amasyo maingi omu mirambi n'omu mpita; kandi aine abahingi n'abasharizi b'emizaabibu omu bibungo n'omu byanga ebirikweza; ahabw'okuba akaba akunda munonga eby'okuhinga.

Kandi Uziya akaba aine eihe ry'abaserukare, abahikire kuza aha rugamba, bari omu mitwe y'engabo, nk'oku omubaro gwabaire guri ogw'abaabazirwe Yeyeli omuhandiiki na Maaseya omutware, nibareebererwa Hanania, omwe aha bakuru b'engabo b'omugabe.
Omubaro gwona ogw'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, abashaija b'amaani amamanzi, gukaba guri enkumi ibiri na magana mukaaga.
Bakaba nibategyeka eihe ry'abashaija obusiriira bushatu n'enkumi mushanju na magana ataano, abaabaire nibabaasa kurwanisa amaani maingi, bakahwera omugabe kumujuna abazigu.
Kandi Uziya yaateekateekyera eihe ryona engabo, amacumu, enkofiira z'orugamba, ebizibaho by'ebyoma, amata n'amabaare g'enjungu.

Omuri Yerusaalemu yaakoreramu ebyoma, ebyagunzirwe abanyamyoga, eby'okuta aha minaara n'aha bwekubo bw'engo z'amabaare, okurasisa emyambi n'okurekyeza amabaare mahango. Okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga hoona; ahakuba akahwerwa okutakareebwaga, okuhitsya obu yaahamire.
Kwonka ku yaaherize kuhama, yaagira amaryo, gaamwita; ahakuba akacumura ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga we, yaataaha omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA kwoterera obubaane aha kyoterero kyabwo.
Kwonka Azaria omunyamurwa yaataahamu amukuratiire, n'abanyamurwa ba MUKAMA makumi munaana, abashaija amamanzi;

baamuzibira nibamugira bati: Ti murimo gwawe, Uziya, kwoterera MUKAMA obubaane, kureka n'ogw'abanyamurwa beene Arooni abashorooreirwe okwotera obubaane. Ruga omu Mwanya ogurikwera; ahakuba waacumura, kandi tikirikwija kukuhaisa kitiinisa ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga.

Uziya yaagira ekiniga. Obwo akaba aine akooterero k'obubaane omu ngaro, naaza kubwotera; ku yaagiriire ati abanyamurwa ekiniga, ahonaaho ebibembe byamusheesha aha buso omu maisho g'abanyamurwa omu nju ya MUKAMA, ahu yaabaire ayemereire aha rubaju rw'ekyoterero ky'obubaane.

Azaria omunyamurwa omukuru n'abandi banyamurwa boona ku baagiire kumwetegyereza bati, baashanga aine ebibembe aha buso. Baamutsindika n'amaani kumushohoza, kandi nawe yairuka, yaashohora, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba amuteire.
Uziya yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, baamuziika omu iziikiro eryabaire riri ery'abagabe; ahabw'okuba bakagira bati: N'omubembe. Yosamu omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Uziya ishe yaakozire byona, okwihaho eky'okutaahisa amaani omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA. Kwonka abantu baagumizamu nibakora ebibi.
Yaayombeka eirembo rya ruguru ery'enju ya MUKAMA, kandi yaayombeka ebyombeko bingi aha rugo rw'amabaare rwa Ofeli.
Kandi yaayombeka endembo omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Yuda, hamwe n'ebigo n'eminaara aha bubungo bw'ebibira.

Yaarwanisa abagabe b'Abaamoni, yaabasingura. Omu mwka ogwo Abaamoni baamutoijera etalanta z'efeeza igana, n'ebitenga by'engano kakumi, n'ebya sayiri kakumi. Kandi omu mwaka gwa kabiri n'ogwa kashatu Abaamoni baamutoijera batyo.
Atyo Yosamu yaahinduka ow'amaani, ahabw'okushemeza emitwarize ye omu maisho ga MUKAMA Ruhanga we.
Akaba aine emyaka makumi abiri n'etaano obu yaatandika kutegyeka, yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu emyaka ikumi na mukaaga.
Yosamu yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi. Ahazi omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
kureka yaakuratira emicwe y'abagabe ba Israeli. Kandi yaaheesha n'ebishushani ebirikuramibwa ahabwa Baabaali;
yaaguma naayoterera obubaane omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, yaarabya abaana be omu muriro, naakuratira emigyenzo erikunugwa ey'abanyamahanga, abu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Yaaguma naatambira omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, aha bibungo, n'ahansi ya buri kiti ekyetwa omurinzi, kandi naayotererayo obubaane.
Ahakuba Peeka mwene Remalia omu izooba rimwe akaita omuri Yuda abashaija amamanzi akasiriira n'obukumi bubiri, ahabw'okuba bakatsigaho MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Na Zikuri, omushaija rugambwa owa Efuraimu yaita Maaseya mutabani w'omugabe, na Azurikaamu omukuru w'ekikaari ky'omugabe, na Elukaana enganzi y'omugabe.

Kwonka okwo hakaba hariyo nabi wa MUKAMA owaabaire naayetwa Odedi; nabi ogwo yaashohora kubugana eihe eryabaire niritabaaruka, niriza Samaria; yaabagira ati: Nimumanya ku MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe yaagwereirwe kubi Abayuda, akabahayo omu mikono yaanyu; kwonka imwe murengyesereize, mwabaita mwine ekiniga kingi ekihinguraine munonga.
Mbwenu nimwenda kugira Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu abahuuku n'abazaana. Imwe timwine ebibi byanyu, ebi mucumwire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu?
Mbwenu mumpurire, mugarureyo aba bantu, abu mukwatsire omuri beene waanyu, ei mubaihire, ahakuba MUKAMA abagiriire ekiniga kingi munonga.
Kandi n'abakuru bamwe b'Abaefuraimu, Azaria, mwene Yohanani, Berekia mwene Meshilemoosi, Mehizikia mwene Shalumu na Amasa mwene Hadulai, baayemerera kukumiirira abaabaire nibaruga aha rugamba,

baabagira bati: Timurikwija kureeta aha nkwatwa, ahabw'okuba nimwenda kutureetera orubanja rw'okucumura ahari MUKAMA, kwongyera aha bibi n'orubanja ebi twine; haza orubanja oru twine ruri ruhango, kandi ahari Israeli hariho ekiniga kingi.
N'ahabw'ekyo abo bashaija abaabaire baine eby'okurwanisa baatsiga enkwatwa n'eminyago omu maisho g'abakuru n'omutwe gwona ogw'abateeraine.

Abo bakuru, abu amaziina gaabo gaagambwaho, baimuka, baayakiira enkwatwa, boona abaabire bajwaire busha omuribo baabajweka eby'omu minyago; batyo baabajweka, baabaha enkaito, baabaha eby'okurya n'eby'okunywa, baabasiiga amajuta, boona abaabaire bataine maani omuribo baabaheeka aha ndogoya, baabahitsya omuri beene waabo ahari Yeriko, orurembo rw'emikindo. Bwanyima baagaruka Samaria.
ahabw'okuba Abanyaedomu bakaba batabaire Yuda, bagisingwire, bakwatsireyo enkwatwa.

Kandi n'Abafilistia bakaba bateire endembo z'omu mirambi n'omuri Negebu eya Yuda, bakwatsire Beti-shemeshi, Ayalooni, Gederoosi, Sooko n'ebirorero byayo, Timuna n'ebirorero byayo, na Gimuzo n'ebirorero byayo; bwanyima baazituuramu.
Ahakuba MUKAMA akabagarwire Abayuda ahansi, naabatura Ahazi omugabe wa Israeli, ahabw'okuba akakorera omuri Yuda ebitahikire, yaacumura munonga ahari MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo Tigulaasi-peleseeri omugabe wa Asiria yaija yaamuteera, yaamubonabonesa omu mwanya gw'okumugumya.
Ahakuba Ahazi akaiha ebintu omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu y'omugabe n'omu maju g'abanyiginya, yaabitoijera omugabe wa Asiria; kwonka tibyagira ki byamugasira.
Kandi omu biro by'obusaasi bwe akeeyongyera kucumura ahari MUKAMA, ogwo mugabe weena Ahazi;

ahakuba akatambira baaruhanga ba Damasikio ebitambo, abaabaire bamusingwire, yaagira ati: Ahabw'okuba baaruhanga b'abagabe ba Siria bakabahwera, naanye niinyija kubatambira ebitambo, babone kumpwera. Kwonka bakaba bari ab'okumucwekyereza hamwe na Israeli yoona.
Ahazi yaateeranira hamwe ebintu by'omu nju ya Ruhanga, yaabitematemamu ebicweka, yaakinga enyigi z'enju ya MUKAMA, yaayeyombekyera amatambiro buri hantu omuri Yerusaalemu.
Kandi omuri buri rurembo rwa Yuda yaakoramu emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, kuguma naayoterereramu baaruhanga abandi obubaane, naagwisa kubi MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkuru.
Bwanyima Ahazi yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu rurembo Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba tibaramuziikire mu bituuro by'abagabe ba Israeli. Hezekia omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Daudi, ishe, yaakozire byona.
Yaataasyamu abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, yaabateeranira omu mwanya omuhango aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba,
yaabagira ati: Imwe Baleevi 'mwe, nimupurire! Mweyeze hati, mweze n'enju ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baashwekuriimwe, mwihe oburofa omu Mwanya ogurikwera.
Ahakuba batatenkuriitwe bakacumura, baakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, Ruhanga waitu; baamutsigaho, baagaruka baiha amaisho aha Butaaho bwa MUKAMA, baamuteera amabega.
Kandi baakinga enyigi z'ekisasi, baaraaza amatabaaza, kandi tibaayoterera Ruhanga wa Israeli bubaane, n'obu kwakuba okumutambira ebitambo by'okwotsya omu Mwanya ogurikwera.
Nikyo kyareeteire MUKAMA kugirira Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu ekiniga, akabahayo kuba eky'okutiinisa, n'eky'okutangaarirwa, kandi n'eky'okweshaanya, nk'oku murikubireebesa amaisho gaanyu.
Reeba, ebyo bikareetera baatatenkuriitwe kwitwa rurara, kandi batabani baitu na bahara baitu n'abakazi baitu baaba enkwatwa.
Mbwenu ekindi aha mutima n'okuragaana endagaano na MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ngu ekiniga kye kingi kibone kuturugaho.
Baana bangye, murekye kweganda, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akabatoorana kwemerera omu maisho ge, okumuheereza, okuba abaheezera be, n'okumwoterera obubaane.
ab'omuri beene Elizafaani, Shimuri na Yeueli; ab'omuri beene Asafu, Zekaria na Matania;
ab'omuri beene Hemani, Yehueli na Shimei; n'ab'omuri beene Yedusuuni, Shemaaya na Uzieli.
Baateerana beene waabo, baayeyeza, baataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA kugishemeza, nk'omugabe oku yaaragiire naakuratira ebigambo bya MUKAMA.

Abanyamurwa baaza omu nju ya MUKAMA aha muheru kuhashemeza, baashohoza oburofa bwona obu baashangire omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA, baabuhitsya omu kikaari ky'enju ya MUKAMA; bwanyima Abaleevi baabutwara, baabuhitsya aha kagyera Kidirooni.

Baatandika kugyeeza aha kiro ky'okubanza ky'okwezi kw'okubanza, aha kiro kya munaana ky'okwo kwezi baahika aha kisasi kya MUKAMA; bwanyima baamara ebiro munaana nibeeza enju ya MUKAMA, baagiheza aha kiro kya ikumi na mukaaga ky'okwo kwezi.

Bwanyima baataaha ow'omugabe Hezekia, baamugira bati: Twaheza kushemeza enju ya MUKAMA yoona, n'eitambiro ry'ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebintu byaryo byona, n'emeeza y'emigaati y'okumurikwa n'ebintu byayo byona.
Kandi n'ebintu byona, ebi omugabe Ahazi yaanagire omu kucumura kwe ari aha ngoma, twabishemeza, twabyeza. Mbwenu biri omu maisho g'eitambiro rya MUKAMA.
Ku bwaseesire, omugabe Hezekia yaimuka kare, yaateerana abakuru b'orurembo, yainamuka omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Baareeta enimi mushanju, empaya z'entaama mushanju, abaana b'entaama mushanju, kandi n'empaya z'embuzi mushanju aha bugabe, n'aha Mwanya ogurikwera, kandi n'ahari Yuda. Yaaragiira abanyamurwa beene Arooni kubitambira aha itambiro rya MUKAMA.

Batyo ezo nimi baaziita, abanyamurwa baatangiriza eshagama yaazo, baagishukyeera eitambiro; baita empaya z'entaama, eshagama yaazo baagishukyeera eitambiro; baita n'abaana b'entaama, n'eshagama yaabo baagishukyeera eitambiro;
bwanyima ezo mpaya z'embuzi ez'okuba empongano y'ekibi zaareetwa omu maisho g'omugabe n'omu maisho g'omutwe gwona oguteeraine, baazitaho engaro zaabo;

abanyamurwa baaziita, baatambira eshagama yaazo aha itambiro kuba empongano y'ekibi, okurihiirira Abaisraeli boona; ahakuba omugabe akaragiira ngu batambe ekitmbo ky'okwotsya n'empongano y'ekibi ahabwa Israeli yoona.
Batyo Abaleevi baayemerera, baine ebintu bya Daudi eby'okweshongoza, n'abanyamurwa baine amakondere.

Bwanyima Hezekia yaaragiira kutambira ekitambo ky'okwotsya aha itambiro. Ekitambo ky'okwotsya ku kyatandikire kutambwa, ekyeshongoro ky'okweshongorera MUKAMA nakyo kyatandika, hamwe n'amakondere n'ebindi bintu by'okweshongoza bya Daudi omugabe wa Israeli.
Omutwe gwona ogw'abantu gwaramya, abeeshongozi baayeshongora, n'abateezi b'amakondere baagateera; ebyo byona byagumizamu, okuhitsya obu ekitambo ky'okwotsya kyahweire.
Ekitambo ku kyaherize kutambwa, omugabe n'abaabaire bari hamwe nawe boona bainama, baaramya.
Omugabe Hezekia n'abanyiginya baaragiira Abaleevi kweshongorera MUKAMA eby'okuhimbisa, ebi Daudi na Asafu omuhanuuzi baagunzire. Baayeshongora eby'okuhimbisa bashemereirwe, bainama ahansi, baaramya.
Omubaro gw'ebitambo by'okwotsya ebi abantu baareetsire gukaba guri enimi makumi mushanju, empaya z'entaama igana, n'abaana b'entaama magana abiri; ebyo byona bikaba biri ebitambo by'okwokyeza MUKAMA.
Kandi empongano ezeeziibwe zikaba ziri enimi magana mukaaga n'entaama enkumi ishatu.

Kwonka abanyamurwa bakaba bakye, tibaabaasa kubaaga bitambo by'okwotsya byona; nikyo kyareeteire beene waabo Abaleeevi kubahwera, okuhitsya obu omurimo gwahweire, abandi banyamurwa batakeeyerize; ahabw'okuba Abaleevi bakaba nibakiza abanyamurwa omutima gw'okwezirikira okweyeza.

Okwongyera ahari ebyo bitambo by'okwotsya ebingi munonga, hakaba hariho n'ebishaju by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, n'ez'eby'okunywa ebirikuhongwa na buri kitambo kyona eky'okwotsya. Okwo nikwo omurimo gw'obuheereza bw'omu nju ya MUKAMA gwagarwireho.
Hezekia n'abantu boona baashemerererwa ebi Ruhanga yaakoreire abantu; ahabw'okuba bikakorwa ahonaaho.

Bwanyima Hezekia yaatuma aha Baisraeli n'aha Bayuda boona, kandi yaahandiikira Abaefuraimu n'Abamanaase ebaruha, kwija omu nju ya MUKAMA Yerusaalemu, kukorera MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho.
Ahabw'okuba omugabe n'abanyiginya be, n'abantu boona abaateeraniire Yerusaalemu bakaba bahanwire kutaho obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho omu kwezi kwa kabiri,
ahabw'okuba tibarabaasize kubutaho mu bunaku bwabwo ahabw'omubaro gw'abanyamurwa abeeyerize kutahika, kandi n'ahabw'abantu kushangwa batateeraniire Yerusaalemu.
Egyo naama yaasiimwa omugabe n'abantu boona.

Batyo baataho ekirangiriro, baakirangirira omuri Israeli yoona, okutandikira Beeri-sheba okuhika Daani, ngu abantu baije Yerusaalemu, bakorere MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho; ahabw'okuba bakaba batakibukora bari baingi munonga, nk'oku kyabaire kihandiikirwe.

Batyo baamatarisi baatwara ebaruha ezirikuruga aha mugabe n'abanyiginya be, baazibuzya Israeli na Yuda yoona, ezirikugamba ekiragiro ky'omugabe naagira ati: Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, mugarukire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, owa Isaaka kandi owa Israeli, nawe abone kubagarukira, imwe abatsigaireho, abaahonokire omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria.
Mutaba nka baashwenkuriimwe nari beene waanyu, abaabaire bacumura ahari MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, kikamureetera kubahayo, bakahwerekyerera, nk'oku murikureeba.

N'ahabw'ekyo mbwenu mutagira ebitsya bigangaire nka baashwenkuriimwe, kureka mwehongyere MUKAMA, mutaahe omu Mwanya gwe ogurikwera, ogu yaayerize kuba ogurikwera ebiro byona, muheereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, ekiniga kye kingi kibone kubarugaho.

Ahakuba ku muraagarukire MUKAMA, beene wanyu n'abaana baanyu nibaija kugirirwa embabazi abaabatwaire bari enkwatwa, bagarukye omu nsi egi. Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu agira embabazi n'esaasi; kandi ku muraamugarukire, tarikwija kubaima maisho.
Kwonka abamwe aha Baasheri n'Abamanaase n'Abazebuluuni baayoroba, baija Yerusaalemu.
Kandi n'omuri Yuda omukono gwa MUKAMA gwabaha kugira omutima gumwe, baayorobera ekiragiro ky'omugabe n'abanyiginya eki baaragiirwe ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima abantu baingi baateeranira Yerusaalemu kwijuka obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe omu kwezi kwa kabiri, bari omutwe muhango munonga.
Baimuka, baiha Yerusaalemu amatambiro agaabaire gariyo, n'ebyoterero by'okwotereraho obubaane byona baabitwara, baabinaga omu kagyera Kidirooni.
Batyo baita omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho aha kiro kya ikumi na bina omu kwezi kwa kabiri. Abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baakwatwa enshoni, baayeyeza, baareeta ebitambo by'okwotsya omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Baayemerera omu myanya yaabo nk'emigyenzo yaabo oku yaabaire eri, nibakuratira ekiragiro kya Musa omushaija wa Ruhanga; abanyamurwa baamiisha eshagama ei baahairwe Abaleevi.

Ahabw'okuba hakaba hariho baingi omu mutwe ogwo abaabaire bateeyerize; nikyo kyareeteire Abaleevi kwita omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho ahabwa buri muntu weena owaabaire atashemeire, okubeereza MUKAMA.
Ahakuba abangu bainti munonga omu Baefuraimu, Abamanaase, Abaisakaari n'Abazebuluuni bakaba bateeyerize, baafa okurya omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho omu muringo ogutarikwikirizibwa biragiro.

Ahabw'okuba Hezekia akaba abashabiire naagira ati: MUKAMA omurungi asaasire buri muntu omaririire kusherura Ruhanga, MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkuru, n'obu araabe ateeziibwe nk'emigyenzo y'Omwanya ogurikwera oku eri.
MUKAMA yaahurira Hezekia, yaakiza abantu.

Bwanyima Abaisraeli abo abaabaire bari Yerusaalemu baamara ebiro mushanju nibaijuka obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe n'okushemererwa kwingi munonga; kandi Abaleevi n'abanyamurwa baaguma nibahimbisa MUKAMA buri izooba, nibamweshongorera n'amaani gaabo goona.

Kandi Hezekia yaagamba ebigambo by'okwezirikisa Abaleevi boona abaayorekire obwengye omu murimo gw'okuheereza MUKAMA. Batyo abantu baarya eby'okurya by'obugyenyi okumara ebiro mushanju, nibahonga empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, nibasiima MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Bwanyima omutwe gwona gwasiima kweyongyera ebindi biro mushanju omu bugyenyi; batyo baamara ebyo biro nibashemererwa.

Ahabw'okuba Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda akaha omutwe gw'abantu enimi rukumi n'entaama enkumi mushanju kuba ebitambo; abanyiginya nabo baaha ogwo mutwe enimi rukumi n'entaama kakumi; n'abanyamurwa baingi baayeyeza.
Omutwe gwona ogw'Abayuda n'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, n'omutwe gwona ogwarugire omuri Israeli n'abashuhuuki abaarugire omu nsi ya Israeli n'abashuhuuki abaabaire batwire omuri Yuda, baashemererwa.

N'ahabw'ekyo haabaho okushemererwa kwingi munonga omuri Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba okwiha obu obusingye bwa Sulemaani mwene Daudi omugabe wa Israeli bwarugaho hakaba hatakabahoga bugyenyi nk'obwo omuri Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baimuka, baashabira abantu omugisha; eiraka ryabo ryahurirwa, kandi okushaba kwabo kwahika omu mwanya gwe ogurikwera ogu atuuramu omu iguru.

Kandi omugabo ogu omugabe yaihire omu bintu bye kuguma naaha gukaba guri ogw'ebitambo by'okwotsya,ebitambo by'okwotsya omu kasheeshe n'omu mwabazyo, ebya sabato, eby'okuboneka kw'ameezi n'eby'amagyenyi agaatairweho, nk'oku bihandiikirwe omu biragiro bya MUKAMA.
Yaagaruka yaaragiira abantu abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu kuguma nibaha abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi emigabo ebashemereire, ngu nabo babone kwehayo omu biragiro bya MUKAMA.

Ekiragiro ekyo ku kyaherize kiti kubuga, Abaisraeli baareeta emiganuro mingi munonga, engano, viinyo, amajuta, obwoki n'ebindi byona ebyarugire omu misiri; kandi baareeta na kimwe kya ikumi ekya buri kintu, byaba bingi munonga.

Abaisraeli n'Abayuda abaabaire batwire omu ndembo za Yuda nabo baareeta kimwe kya ikumi eky'ente n'entaama, n'ebintu ebyeziibwe, ebyabaire bishorooreirwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, ebintu ebyo baabituuma emituumo.
Omu kwezi kwa kashatu nibwo baatandika kutuuma egyo mituumo, bakaheza omu kwezi kwa mushanju.
Hezekia n'abanyiginya ku baizire, baareeba egyo mituumo, baasiima MUKAMA n'abantu be Israeli.
Bwanyima Hezekia yaabuuza abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi eby'egyo mituumo.

Azaria omunyamurwa omukuru, ow'omu nju ya Zadoki, yaamugarukamu ati: Obu abantu baatandika kureeta emitoijo omu nju ya MUKAMA, tukatandika obwo kurya n'okuhaaga, n'okushaazya bingi; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaha abantu be omugisha, nikyo ebi ebyashaagire bibeereire bingi biti.
Bwanyima Hezekia yaaragiira ku bateguura ebishenye by'enju ya MUKAMA; baabiteguura.
Baatamu emitoijo, ebicweka bya kimwe kya ikumi, n'ebintu ebyashoroirwe n'obwesigwa. Omukuru waabo owaabaire naabareeberera akaba ari Konania Omuleevi, owa kabiri ari Shimei omurumuna;

Yehieli, Azazia, Nahasi, Asaheeli, Yerimoosi, Yozabaadi, Elieli, Ismakia, Mahasi na Benaaya, nibo baabaire bari abareeberezi nibahwera Konania na Shimei omurumuna, nk'oku kyaragiirwe Hezekia omugabe na Azaria omukuru w'enju ya Ruhanga.

Kandi Koore mwene Imuna Omuleevi, omurinzi w'eirembo ry'oburugwa-izooba niwe yaabaire naategyeka emitoijo etoijeirwe Ruhanga n'omutima gwekundiire, naabaganisa ebintu ebibiikiirwe MUKAMA ahabw'empongano ezirikwera munonga.
