Edeni, Minyamiini, Yeshua, Shemaaya, Amaria na Shekania bakaba bari abeesigwa nibamuhwera omu ndembo z'abanyamurwa, kubaganisiza beene waabo emigabo, abakuru n'abato nibabainganisa, nk'oku ebicweka byabo byabaire biri,

otaireho abaabaire nibahandiikwa nk'oku oruzaaro rwabo rwabaire nirukuratana, abeetwa abashaija okuruga aha myaka eshatu n'okukiraho, boona abaabaire bataaha omu nju ya MUKAMA, nk'okwetenga kw'omurimo gwa buri izooba oku kwabaire kuri, ngu babone kukora omurimo gwabo, nk'oku embu zaabo zaabaire nizikuratana.
Abanyamurwa bakahandiikwa, nk'oku amaju ga baishenkurubo gaabaire gari; n'Abaleevi abaabaire baine emyaka makumi abiri n'okukiraho baahandiikwa omu bicweka byabo, nk'oku omurimo gwabo gwabaire guri.
Abanyamurwa baahandiikwa n'abaana baabo abato boona n'abakazi baabo na batabani baabo na bahara baabo, okumarayo oruganda rwona; ahabw'okuba bakaba bari abeesigwa omu kwerinda kuguma bari abarikwera.

Kandi ahabw'abanyamurwa beene Arooni, abaabaire batwire omu byaro ebyehinguririize endembo zaabo, omuri buri rurembo hakaba harimu abantu abagambirweho amaziina kuba ab'okugaburira oyetwa omushaija weena omu banyamurwa, n'omuntu weena ow'omu Baleevi owaahandiikirwe.
Okwo nikwo Hezekia yaabitwarize omuri Yuda yoona, akakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA n'eby'oburyo kandi n'eby'obwesigwa.
Ebi yaakozire byona omu murimo gw'okuheereza omu nju ya Ruhanga, naakuratira ebiragiro n'ebyaragiirwe, omu kusherura Ruhanga we, akaba abikora n'omutima gwe gwona, kandi abigiriramu omugisha.
Hezekia ku yaareebire Senakeribu yaija amaririire kuteera Yerusaalemu,
yaahanuura n'abakuru b'engabo ze n'abashaija be ab'amaani kwita enshuro ezaabaire ziri enyima y'orurembo; baamuhwera.
Abantu baingi munonga baateerana, baita enshuro zoona, n'akagyera akaabaire nikaraba omuri egyo nsi, ahakuba bakagira bati: Ebyo nikwo kwona Abaasiria baije, bashangye egi amaizi maingi?

Yaayezirika kukora, yaayombeka busya orugo rw'amabaare orwakumbagaziibwe, yaarwombekaho eminaara, kandi enyima yaarwo yaayombekayo orundi rugo, yaahamya Miilo omu rurembo rwa Daudi. Kandi yaaheesesa eby'okurwanisa n'engabo bingi munonga.
Yaataho abakuru b'engabo kutegyeka abantu, yaabateeranira ah'ari omu iubuga eky'aha irembo ry'orurembo, yaabagambira ebigambo by'okubagumya, naagira ati:
Mube ab'amaani, mugume; mutatiina, kandi mutahahaaza emitima ahabw'omugabe wa Asiria n'engabo ze nyingi ezi aine; ahabw'okuba ori hamwe naitwe naakira ori hamwe nabo.
Aha rubaju rwe aine emikono y'abantu-buntu, kwonka aha rubaju rwaitu twine MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu kutuhwera n'okuturwanira engamba zaitu. Abantu baayesiga ebigambo bya Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda.

Bwanyima y'ebyo Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria, owaabaire agotsire Lakishi n'engabo ze zoona, yaatuma abagaragwa be Yerusaalemu ahari Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda n'aha bantu ba Yuda boona abaabaire bari Yerusaalemu, naagira ati:
Oku nikwo Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria arikugamba naagira ati: Mbwenu mwesigire ki okutegyereza kugoterwa omuri Yerusaalemu?
Hezekia, orikubagira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu naija kutujuna omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria, tarikubabeiha, ngu mwitwe enjara n'eiriho?

Hezekia ogwo tiwe yaihireho emyanya ye mikuru ey'okuramizamu n'amatambiro, naaragiira Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu ati: Mushemereire kuguma nimuramiza omu masiho g'eitambiro rimwe ryonka, kandi n'okuritambiraho ebitambo byanyu?
Timurikumanya oku nyowe na baatatenkuru twagizire abantu boona ab'omu gandi mahanga? Baaruhanga b'ago mahanga bakabaasa kujuna ensi zaabo omu mikono yangye?
N'oha omuri baaruhanga boona ab'ago mahanga agu baatatenkuru baacwekyerereize kimwe owaabasize kujuna abantu be omu mikono yangye, naimwe mukabona kwesiga ku Ruhanga waanyu arikwija kubakiza?

N'ahabw'ekyo murekye kwikiriza Hezekia kubabeihabeiha n'okubahabya atyo, kandi murekye kumwesiga, ahabw'okuba tihariho ruhanga ow'eihanga ryona nari obugabe bwona orabaasize kujuna abantu be omu mikono yangye nari eya baatatenkuru, reero kaashwa Ruhanga waanyu!
Bwanyima abagaragwa be baayeyongyereraho ebindi bigambo baajuma Mukama RUHANGA n'omwiru we Hezekia.

Kandi Senakeribu yaahandiika ebaruha z'okugayisa MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli n'okumujuma, naagira ati: Nk'oku baaruhanga b'amahanga g'omu nsi batarajunire bantu baabo mu mikono yangye, nikwo na Ruhanga wa Hezekia atarikwija kujuna abe.
Ebyo bigambo baabigambira aba Yerusaalemu abaabaire bari aha rugo rw'amabaare n'eiraka rihango omu rurimi rw'Abayudaaya, ngu babatiinise, babahahaaze emitima, babone kukwata orurembo.
Baagamba ahari Ruhanga wa Yerusaalemu, nk'oku bagamba ahari baaruhanga b'ensi abakozirwe emikono y'abantu.
Ekyo kyareetera Hezekia omugabe na Isaaya nabi mwene Amozi kushaba nibatakira eiguru.

N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA yaayohereza maraika, yaacwekyereza abarwani boona ab'amaani, n'abakuru b'amahe n'abakuru b'engabo abaabaire bari omu rusiisira rw'omugabe wa Asiria. Atyo yaagaruka omu nsi ye aine enshoni. Ku yaahikire omuri hekalu ya ruhanga we, abu yaayezaariire baamwitiramu na rurara.
Okwo nikwo MUKAMA yaajunire Hezekia n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu omu mikono ya Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria, n'omu mikono y'abandi bazigu be boona; bwanyima akabaha okuhuumura embaju zoona.
Kandi abantu baingi baareetera MUKAMA emitoijo Yerusaalemu, na Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda baamutoijera ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi; okwiha obwo kyamureetera okurangaanwa omu mahanga goona.
Kwonka Hezekia tiyaakora nk'embabazi ezi yaagiriirwe oku zaabaire ziri; ahabw'okuba omutima gwe gukagira amaryo. Ekyarugiremu ekiniga kya MUKAMA kyamwijaho, we n'Abayuda na Yerusaalemu.
Kwonka Hezekia yaayecureeza, yaayeteisa amaryo g'omu mutima gwe, we n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu; na'ahabw'ekyo ekiniga kya MUKAMA tikyabaijaho omu busingye bwa Hezekia.
Kandi Hezekia akaba atungire munonga, aine ekitiinisa kingi; yaayekorera amabiikiro g'efeeza, ezaabu, amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi, emigaju, engabo n'ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi eby'emiringo yoona;
yaayombeka n'ebitara by'okuhunikamu engano, n'amabiikiro ga viinyo n'amajuta, kandi n'emyanya y'okuraazamu amatungo g'emiringo yoona, n'amaka g'amasyo g'entaama.
Kandi yaayetungira endembo, n'amasyo g'ente n'ag'entaama nyingi munonga; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akamuha ebintu bingi munonga.

Hezekia ogwo yaacungira ahu amizi ga Gihoni aga ruguru gaabaire nigareetwa, yaagahaburira, yaagatooza aha rubaju rw'orurembo rwa Daudi orw'oburegyerwa-izooba. Hezekia yaagira omugisha omu bi yaabaire naakora byona.
Kwonka omu bigambo by'entumwa z'abategyeki ba Babulooni, ezi baamutumireho kumubuuza eby'akamanyiso akaakozirwe omu nsi ye, Ruhanga akabimurekyera kumugyeza, ngu amanye ebiri omu mutima gwe byona.

Bwanyima Hezekia yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa aha rubaju rwa ruguru rw'ebituuro bya batabani ba Daudi; aha kufa kwe Abayuda boona n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu baamuha ekitiinisa. Bwanyima omutabani Manaase yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, naakuratira emitwarize erikunugwa ey'amahanga agu MUKAMA yaabingire omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.

Ahabw'okuba akagaruka yaayombeka ebyombeko by'emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu ebi Hezekia ishe yaasheenyire, yaayombekyera Baali amatambiro, yaakora Ashera, yaaguma naaramya eihe ry'omu iguru ryona, naariheereza.
Kandi yaakora n'amatambiro omu nju ya MUKAMA, ei MUKAMA yaagambireho ati: Omuri Yerusaalemu nimwo eiziina ryangye ririguma ebiro byona.
Kandi yaayombekyera eihe ry'omu iguru ryona amatambiro omu bikaari byombi eby'enju ya MUKAMA.

Yaarabya abatabani omu muriro omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu; yaaguma naaraguza abafumu ebiribaho, naarogyesa, naakoresa abateezi b'ebyatsi, naayehanuuza aha barikugambisa emizimu n'aha barogi. Yaakora ebibi bingi omu maisho ga MUKAMA, yaamugwisa kubi.

Kandi yaata ekishushani ekirikuramibwa eki yaakozire omu nju ya Ruhanga, ei Ruhanga yaagambiire Daudi n'omutabani Sulemaani, naagira ati: Omuri egi nju n'omuri Yerusaalemu, ei naatooraine omu nganda za Israeli zoona, nimwo ndita eiziina ryangye kugumamu ebiro byona;

kandi Abaisraeli ku barita omutima aha kworobera ebi naabaragiire byona, n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho, n'emigyenzo yoona, ebyaragiirwe nibiraba omuri Musa, tindigaruka kwiha bigyere byabo omu nsi ei naateereireho baishenkurubo.
Atyo Manaase yaahabya Abayuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, kyabareetera kukora ebibi ebirikukira eby'amahanga agu MUKAMA yaacwekyerereize omu maisho g'Abaisraeli.
Kandi MUKAMA yaagamba na Manaase n'abantu be, kwonka tibakyetaho.
Nikyo MUKAMA yaabateereize abakuru by'eihe ry'omugabe wa Asiria, bakakwata Manaase, bakamubohesa enjegyere n'emihama y'emiringa, bakamutwra Babulooni.
Ku yaabaire ari omu busaasi, yaashaba MUKAMA Ruhanga we kumugirira embabazi, yaayecureeza munonga omu maisho ga Ruhanga wa baishenkuru.
Atyo yaashaba Ruhanga, nawe yaikiriza okweshengyereza kwe, kandi yaahurira okushaba kwe, yaamugarura Yerusaalemu omu bugabe bwe. Manaase yaamanyira aho MUKAMA ku niwe Ruhanga.

Bwanyima y'ebyo yaayombeka orugo rw'amabaare enyima y'orurembo rwa Daudi aha rubaju rwa Gihoni orw'oburengyerwa-izooba omu ruhanga, yaaruhitsya aha irembo ry'eby'enyanja, yaaruziguza Ofeli, yaarutunguura, rwahika ahaiguru munonga; kandi yaata abakuru b'amahe omu ndembo za Yuda zoona ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare.

Yaihaho baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga, n'ekishushani kiri ekirikuramibwa yaakiiha omu nju ya MUKAMA, n'amatambiro goona agu yaabaire ayombekire aha kabungo k'enju ya MUKAMA n'omuri Yerusaalemu, yaabinaga aheeru y'orurembo.
Kandi yaahunduuza eitambiro rya MUKAMA, yaaritambiraho ebitambo by'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye n'eby'okuhimbisa; kandi yaaragiira Abayuda boona kuheereza MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, abantu baaguma nibatambira ebitambo omu myanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, kwonka nibabitambira MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo wenka.

Endiijo mirimo ya Manaase, n'okushaba oku yaashabire Ruhanga we, n'ebigambo ebi abahanuuzi baabaire bamugambira omu iziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, reeba bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebyakozirwe abagabe ba Israeli.

Kandi n'okushaba kwe n'oku Ruhanga yaikiriize kuhurira okweshengyereza kwe, n'ekibi kye kyona, n'okucumura kwe, n'ahu yaayombekire ebyombeko omu myanyamikuru y'okuramizamu, akatamu Ashera n'ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, obu yaabaire atakeeteisize, ebyo byona bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebyagambirwe abahanuuzi.
Bwanyima Manaase yaagwejegyera, yaashanga baishenkuru, yaaziikwa omu nju ye, Amoni omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Manaase ishe yaakozire. Yaatambira ebishushani byona ebi Manaase ishe yaakozire, yaabiheereza.
Kandi Amoni ogwo tiyaayecureeza mu maisho ga MUKAMA, nk'oku Manaase ishe yaagizire, kureka yaaguma naayeyongyera kushiisha.
Bwanyima abagaragwa be baamugirira enaama, baamwitira omu nju ye.
Kwonka abantu b'omuri egyo nsi baita abaamugiriire enaama boona; baayemeka Yosia omutabani omu mwanya gwe.
Yaakora ebirikusiimwa MUKAMA, yaatwaza nka Daudi ishenkuru, tiyaateishuka kutoora aha rubaju rwa buryo nari orwa bumosho.

Ahakuba omu mwaka gwe gwa munaana ari aha ngoma, akiri muto, akatandika kusherura Ruhanga wa Daudi ishenkuru; kandi omu mwaka gwe gwa ikumi n'ebiri yaatandika kushemeza Yuda na Yerusaalemu, yaamaramu emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, na Ashera, n'ebishushani ebibaizire n'ebiheesire.

Baasheenyera omu maisho ge amatambiro ga Baabaali, yaatema ebishushani by'eizooba ebyabaire biri ahaiguru yaago, byagwa ahansi; yaasheenyagura Ashera, n'ebishushani ebibaizire n'ebiheesire, yaabicwa esingo, egyo singo yaagishuka aha bituuro by'abaabaire babitambira.
Yaagaruka yaayokyeza amagufa g'abanyamurwa aha matambiro gaabyo; yaashemeza atyo Yuda na Yerusaalemu.
Kandi yaatwaza atyo n'omu ndembo za Manaase, Efuraimu na Simeoni ezaabaire zaabaire amatongo, nangwa n'okuhika Nafutaali,

yaasheenya amatambiro, yaahondahonda Ashera, n'ebishushani yaabicwa esingo, yaatemagura ebishushani by'eizooba byona, ebyabaire biri omu nsi ya Israeli yoona, yaabinaga ahansi. Bwanyima yaagaruka Yerusaalemu.

Baahika owa Hilukia omunyamurwa omukuru, baahayo empiiha ezaareetsirwe omu nju ya Ruhanga, ezi Abaleevi abakumiirizi baabaire bashoroize omu Bamanaase, Abaefuraimu, n'omu Baisraeli boona abaabaire batsigaireho, n'omu Bayuda n'Ababenyamiini boona, kandi n'omu batuuzi ba Yerusaalemu.
Baaziha abakozi abarikureeberera enju ya MUKAMA; bwanyima abakozi abarikukora omu nju ya MUKAMA baatandika kuzikoresa kuhunduuza enju n'okugigira nsya.
Baaziha ababaizi n'abombeki kugura amabaare agabaizire, embaaho z'okuteerana, n'emitambiko y'ebyombeko ebi abagabe ba Yuda baarekire bikasiisikara.
Abo bashaija baakora omurimo n'obwesigwa. Abaabaire nibabareeberera bakaba bari Yahasi na Obadia Abaleevi ab'omuri beene Merari, na Zekaria na Meshulaamu ab'omuri beene Kohasi.

Abandi Baleevi, abaabaire bari abanyabwengye omu kuteera ebirikugamba, baareeberera abeekorezi, kandi baaguma nibeezirikisa boona abaabaire nibakora emirimo y'emiringo yoona ey'okuheereza. Kandi abandi omu Baalevi bakaba bari abahandiiki, abatware n'abakumiirizi.
Ku baabaire nibashohoza empiiha ezaaretsirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA, Hilukia omunyamurwa yaazoora ekitabo ky'Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA, ekyahandiikirwe Musa.
Hilukia yaagambira Shafani omuhandiiki ati: Nzoire ekitambo ky'Ebiragiro omu nju ya MUKAMA. Atyo yaakiha Shafani.
Shafani yaakitwarira omugabe, kandi yaagambira omugabe eby'omurimo ati: Ebi abairu baawe bakwatsiibwe babikozire byona;
batwaire empiiha zoona ezibaire ziri omu nju ya MUKAMA, baaziha abarikureeberera omurimo n'abakozi.
Kandi Shafani omuhandiiki yaagaruka yaagambira omugabe ati: Hilukia omunyamurwa yampa ekitabo. Atyo yaakishomera omugabe.
yaaragiira Hilukia, Ahikaamu mwene Shafani, Abudooni mwene Miika, Shafani omuhandiiki na Asaaya omugaragwa w'omugabe, naagira ati:

Mwirooko mumbuurize ahari MUKAMA, hamwe n'abatsigaire omuri Israeli na Yuda eby'ebigambo by'omuri eki kitabo ekizoirwe; ahabw'okuba ekiniga kya MUKAMA ekituriho ni kingi, ahakuba baatatenkuriitwe tibaroorobeire kigambo kya MUKAMA kukora ebihandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo byona.

N'ahabw'ekyo Hilukia n'abu omugabe yaabaire atumire, baaza owa Hulida nabikazi muka Shalumu, mwene Tokuhaasi, mwijukuru wa Hasira, omubiiki w'ebijwaro, (kandi ogwo mukazi akaba atwire Yerusaalemu omu kicweka kyayo kya kabiri), baabimuteekyerereza.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Mugambire omushaija obantumireho muti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyareeta akabi aha mwanya ogu n'aha batuuzi baamwo, n'emikyeeno yoona ehandiikirwe omu kitabo ekishomeirwe omugabe wa Yuda.
Ahabw'okuba bakanfuruka, baayoterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane, ngu bangwise kubi n'ebi barikukora n'emikono yaabo byona, nikyo ekiniga kyangye kirishukirwa ahari ogu mwanya, kitaraazibwe.
Kwonka omugabe wa Yuda, obatumire kumbuuza, mumugire muti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba aha bigambo ebi ohuriire, naagira ati:

Ahabw'okugira omutima gworobi, ku ohuriire ebi ngambire aha mwanya ogu n'aha batuuzi baamwo, waayecureeza omu maisho gangye, waataagura ebijwaro byawe, wandirira omumaisho; n'ahabw'ekyo nanaye nkuhuriire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.

Reeba, ndyakushangisa baashwenkuru, oziikwe omu kituuro kyawe n'obusingye, kandi amaisho gaawe tigarireeba kabi koona aku ndireeta aha mwanya ogu n'abagutwiremu. Batyo baagyenda, baabigambira omugabe.

Omugabe yainamuka omu nju ya MUKAMA hamwe n'abashaija ba Yuda boona n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, abantu boona abakuru n'abato; yaabashomera ebigambo byona eby'omu kitabo ky'endagaano ekizoirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Omugabe yaayemerera omu mwanya gwe, yaaragaana endagaano omu maisho ga MUKAMA, okumukuratira n'okworebera ebiragiro bye n'ebi yaahamize kandi n'ebi yaataireho, n'omutima gwe gwona n'amagara ge goona, n'okuhikiiriza ebigambo by'egyo ndagaano ehandiikirwe omuri ekyo kitabo.
Bwanyima yaareetera abaabaire bari Yerusaalemu na Benyamiini boona kwemera egyo ndagaano. N'ahabw'ekyo abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu baakora nk'endagaano ya Ruhanga, Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo, oku eri.

Kandi Yosia yaihaho ebirikunugwa byona omu nsi yoona ey'Abaisraeli, n'abaabaire bari omuri Israeli boona yaabagyema kuheereza MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo. Omu busingye bwe bwona tibararekire kukuratira MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baishenkurubo.
Yaagarura abanyamurwa aha murimo gwabo, yaabeezirikisa kukora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Kandi yaagambira Abaleevi abaabaire beegyesa Abaisraeli, akndi abaayereziibwe MUKAMA, ati: Mute eshanduukye erikwera omu nju ei Sulemaani mwene Daudi omugabe wa Israeli yaayombekire; tihaakiriho kirigibaheekyesa obundi. Mbwenu muheereze MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, n'abantu be Israeli.
Mweteekateekye omu mbu zaanyu, nk'oku amaju ga baashwenkuriimwe gari, nimukuratira ebyaragiirwe Daudi omugabe wa Israeli, na Sulemaani omutabani.
Kandi mwemerere omu mwanya ogurikwera nk'emitwe y'amaju ga baishenkuru ba beene waanyu abatari Baleevi oku eri, buri mutwe gugire ekicweka ky'enju ya baashwenkuriimwe Abaleevi.
Bwanyima mwite omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho, mweyeze, mweteekateekyere beene waanyu, mubone kukora nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA ekyagambirwe Musa oku kiri.

Ku baaherize, Yosia yaaha abantu abatari Baleevi abaana b'entaama n'ab'embuzi obukumi bushatu n'enimi enkumi ishatu okuruga omu masyo, kuba empongano z'Okuhingurwaho ahabwa boona abaabaire bari aho; ebyo byona bikaruga omu matungo g'omugabe.

Kandi abanyiginya nabo baaha abantu b'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi eby'okuhonga, baabiha n'omutima ogwekundiire. Hilukia, Zekaria na Yehieli, abakuru b'enju ya Ruhanga, baaha abanyamurwa abaana be'entaama n'ab'embuzi enkumi ibiri na magana mukaaga, n'enimi magana ashatu, kuba empongano z'Okuhingurwaho.

Kandi Konania n'abarumuna Shemaaya na Netaneeli, hamwe na Hashabia, Yeyeli na Yozabaadi, abakuru b'Abaleevi, baaha Abaleevi abaana b'entaama n'ab'embuzi enkumi itaano, n'enimi magana ataano, kuba empongano z'Okuhingurwaho.
Batyo baita omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho, abanyamurwa baamiisiira eshagama ei baahairwe Abaleevi, abaabaire nibabaaga.

Baihaho ebitambo by'okwotsya, baabibaganisa nk'emitwe y'amaju ga baishenkuru b'abatari Baleevi oku yaabaire eri ngu babone kubihongyera MUKAMA, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Musa. Kandi n'enimi baazitwaza batyo.

Bwanyima baayotsya omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho nk'oku kirikuragiirwa; kandi n'empongano ezirikwera baaziteeka omu nyabya, omu nyungu n'omu safuriya, ahonaaho baabitwara, baagaburira abantu boona.

Bwanyima baayeteekateekyera ebyabo ahabwabo n'ahabw'abanyamurwa, ahabw'okuba abanyamurwa beene Arooni bakaba bahugiire omu kutamba ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebishaju okuhitsya obu bwaizire; batyo Abaleevi baateekateeka ebyabo ahabwabo n'ahabw'abanyamurwa beene Arooni.

Kandi abeeshongozi beene Asafu bakaba bari omu mwanya gwabo, nk'oku kyaragiirwe Daudi na Asafu, Hemani na Yedusuuni, omuhanuuzi w'omugabe; n'abakumiirizi bakaba bari aha marembo goona; abo boona bakaba batarikwenda kuruga aha mirimo yaabo, ahabw'okuba beene waabo Abaleevi bakaba nibabateekateekyera ebyabo.

Okwo nikwo omurimo gw'okuheereza MUKAMA gwona gwateekateekirwe eryo izooba kwijuka obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho n'okutambira ebitambo by'okwotsya aha itambo rya MUKAMA, nk'oku omugabe Yosia yaaragiirre.
Omu bunaku obwo Abaisraeli, abaabaire bari aho, baijuka obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho, n'obw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe okumara ebiro mushanju.

Kandi okwiha omu biro bya nabi Samueli omuri Israeli hakaba hatakabahoga bugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho nk'obwo; kandi tihariho mugabe omu bagabe ba Israeli boona owaijukire obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho nk'oku Yosia yaijukire, akwataniise n'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, n'aba Yuda na Israeli boona abaabaire bari aho, hamwe n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu.
Omu mwaka gwa ikumi na munaana ogw'omu busingye bwa Yosia, nibwo baijuka obwo bugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho.

Kwonka Neeko yaamutumaho entumwa, naamugira ati: Mbwenu nyowe naiwe nitufa ki, iwe omugabe wa Yuda? Hati tiiwe nyizire kurwanisa, kureka nyine enju ei ndikurwana nayo; kandi Ruhanga andagiire ngu nyehuute. Ruga Ruhanga omu kaso ori hamwe naanye, atakaakucwekyereza.
Kwonka Yosia yaayanga kumurugaho, kureka yaayehindura ngu arwane nawe; tiyaahurira bigambo bya Neeko ebirugire omu kanwa ka Ruhanga, yaaza omu rugamba omu ruhita rwa Megido.
Abarasi baarasha omugabe Yosia; nawe nikwo kugira abashaija be ati: Muunyiha omu rugamba ahakuba naahutaara munonga.
Batyo abashaija be baamwiha omu kigaari, baamuta omu kigaari kye ekya kabiri, baamutwara Yerusaalemu. Yaafa, yaaziikwa omu bituuro bya baihsenkuru. Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu boona baamucurira.

Na Yeremia yaamucurira; kandi abeeshongozi boona, abashaija n'abakazi, baaguma nibamugambaho omu kutonzya kwabo n'okuhitsya hati. Baakihindura omugyenzo omuri Israeli; reeba, bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'Okutonzya.
Endiijo mirimo ya Yosia, n'ebirungi ebi yaakozire naakuratira ebihandiikirwe omu biragiro bya MUKAMA,
n'ebi yaakozire okwiha aha kutandika okuhitsya aha muheru, reeba, bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'Abagabe ba Israeli n'aba Yuda.
Yehoahazi akaba aine emyaka makumi abiri n'eshatu, obu yaatandika kutegyeka; yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu ameezi ashatu.
Bwanyima y'ago meezi ashatu omugabe wa Misri yaamwiha aha ngoma omuri Yerusaalemu, yaacwera ab'omuri egyo nsi etalanta z'efeeza igana n'etalanta emwe y'ezaabu.

Bwanyima omugabe wa Misri ogwo Neeko yaayemeka Eliakimu mukuru we kuba omugabe wa Yuda na Yerusaalemu, yaahindura eiziina rye, yaamweta Yehoyakimu; kandi yaakwata Yehoahazi omurumuna, yaamutwara Misri.
Bwanyima Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yainamuka, yaamuteera, yaamubohesa emihama kumutwara Babulooni.
Kandi Nebukadeneeza ogwo yaatwara Babulooni bimwe aha bintu by'enju ya MUKAMA, yaabita omu kikaari kye.

Endiijo mirimo ya Yehoyakimu, n'ebirikunugwa ebi yaakozire, n'ebyabaire bimureebwaho, bihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'abagabe ba Israeli n'aba Yuda; bwanyima omutabani Yehoyakiini yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Zedekia akaba aine emyaka makumi abiri na gumwe, obu yaatandika kutegyeka; yaategyekyera Yerusaalemu emyaka ikumi na gumwe.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA Ruhanga we; tiyaayecureeza mu maisho ga Yeremia nabi, owaabaire amugambira ebigambo bya MUKAMA.
Kandi yaagomera omugabe Nebukadeneeza owaamurahiize ahari Ruhanga; yaagaruka yaagangaaza ebitsya, yaagumya omutima gwe, yaayanga kuhindukira MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Kandi abanyamurwa abakuru boona n'abantu nabo bakaba barengyesereize omu kucumura nibakuratira ebirikunugwa byona eby'abanyamahanga, baashiisha enju ya MUKAMA ei yaabaire ayereize Yerusaalemu.
kwonka baaguma nibateerera enaku entumwa za Ruhanga, nibagaya ebigambo bye, nibashekyerera baanabi be, okuhitsya obu ekiniga kya MUKAMA kyaizire aha bantu be, bakabura oku baraakikire.
Kandi ebintu byona eby'enju ya MUKAMA, ebihango n'ebikye, n'eby'obutungi by'omuri egyo nju, n'eby'omugabe n'eby'abanyiginya be, ebyo byona yaabitwara Babulooni.
Bwanyima baayotsya enju ya Ruhanga, baasheenya orugo rw'amabaare rwa Yerusaalemu, baayotsya zaanyaruju zaayo zoona, baacwekyereza n'ebintu byayo ebirungi.
Abaahonokire ahari rurara Nebukadeneeza yaabatwara Babulooni, baaba abahuuku be n'aba'abatabani, okuhitsya aha kutandika kw'obugabe bwa Perisi,

okuhikiiriza ekigambo kya MUKAMA ekyagambirwe Yeremia, ngu ensi eryaguma etyo okuhitsya obu eriheza kushemerererwa sabato zaayo; ahabw'okuba ebiro ebi yaamazire eri omushaka byona, ekaba eijuka sabato okumara emyaka makumi mushanju.

Oku nikwo Kuuro omugabe wa Perisi arikugamba naagira ati: MUKAMA, Ruhanga w'eiguru, ampaire obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi, kandi anyehanangiriize kumwombekyera enju omuri Yerusaalemu ey'omuri Yuda. Mbwenu omuntu weena omuriimwe ow'omu bantu be, MUKAMA Ruhanga we agume nawe; kandi ainamukye.
Mbwenu omuntu weena omuriimwe ow'omu bantu be, Ruhanga we agume nawe, ainamukye Yerusaalemu ey'omuri Yuda, ayombekye enju ya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, (niwe Ruhanga otuura omuri Yerusaalemu),

kandi omuntu weena owaahonokireho, ori ei yaashuhuukiire, abantu baayo bamuhwere n'efeeza n'ezaabu, kandi n'ebintu n'amatungo, otabariireho mitoijo ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Yerusaalemu, ei barikureeta n'omutima gwekundiire.
kandi abaabaire batwire nabo baabatwera ebintu by'efeeza, n'ezaabu n'ebindi bintu n'amatungo, n'ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi, otabariireho ebindi byona ebi baatoizire n'omutima gwekundiire.
Kandi omugabe Kuuro yaashohoza ebintu by'enju ya MUKAMA ebi Nebukadeneeza yaabaire anyagire Yerusaalemu, akata omu nju ya baaruhanga be.
Kuuro omugabe wa Perisi yaaragiira Misiredaasi omubiiki kubiihamu, akabibarira Sheshebazaari omunyiginya wa Yuda.
Kandi ogu nigwo mubaro gwabyo: eshohaani z'ezaabu makumi ashatu, n'ez'efeeza rukumi, ebyoterero makumi abiri na mwenda,
enyabya z'ezaabu makumi ashatu, n'ez'efeeza enkumi ibiri na magana ana na ikumi, n'ebindi bintu ebirikukoresibwa rukumi;
ebintu byona eby'ezaabu n'efeeza bikaba biri enkumi itaano na magana ana na makumi mukaaga na mwenda. Ebyo byona Sheshebazaari akabinamukana, obu enkwatwa zaihwa Babulooni kugarurwa Yerusaalemu.
Bakaija na Zerubabeeli, Yeshua, Nehemia, Seraaya, Relaaya, Morodekai, Bilushaani, Misipaari, Biguvai, Rehumu na Baana.
Omubaro gw'abashaija b'Abaisraeli nigwo ogu:
beene Paroshi enkumi ibiri na igana na makumi mushanju na babiri.
Beene Shefatia, magana ashatu na makumi mushanju na babiri;
Beene Aara, magana mushanju na makumi mushanju na bataano.
Beene Pahasimoabu, nibo beene Yeshua na Yoabu, enkumi ibiri na magana munaana na ikumi na babiri.
Beene Elamu, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ataano na bana.
Beene Zaatu, magana mwenda na makumi ana na bataano.
Beene Zakai, magana mushanju na makumi mukaaga.
Beene Baani, magana mukaaga na makumi ana na babiri.
Beene Bebai, magana mukaaga na makumi abiri na bashatu.
Beene Azigaadi, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi abiri na babiri.
Beene Adonikaamu, magana mukaaga na makumi mukaaga na mukaaga.
Beene Biguvai, enkumi ibiri na makumi ataano na mukaaga.
Beene Adini, magana ana na makumi ataano na bana.
Beene Ateeri, nibo ba Hezekia, makumi mwenda na munaana.
Beene Bezai, magana ashatu na makumi abiri na bashatu.
Beene Yoora, igana na ikumi na babiri.
Beene Hashumu, magana abiri na bashatu.
Beene Gibaari makumi mwenda na bataano.
Beene Betelehemu, igana na makumi abiri na bashatu.
Abashaija ba Netofa, makumi ataano na mukaaga.
Abashaija ba Anatoosi, igana na makumi abiri na munaana.
Beene Azimaveesi, makumi ana na babiri.
Beene Kiryasarimu, Kefira na Beeroosi, magana mushanju na makumi ana na bashatu.
Beene Raama na Geeba, magana mukaaga na makumi abiri n'omwe.
Abashaija ba Mikimaasi, igana na makumi abiri na babiri.
Abashaija ba Beseeli na Ai, magana abiri na makumi abiri na bashatu.
Beene Neebo, makumi ataano na babiri.
Beene Magibihsi, igana na makumi ataano na mukaaga.
Beene Elamu ondiijo, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ataano na bana.
Beene Harimu, magana ashatu na makumi abiri.
Beene Loodi, Hadidi na Ono, magana mushanju na makumi abiri na bataano.
Beene Yeriko, magana ashatu na makumi ana na bataano.
Beene Senaha, enkumi ishatu na magana mukaaga na makumi ashatu.
Abanyamurwa n'aba: beene Yedaaya ab'omu nju ya Yeshua, magana mwenda na makumi mushanju na bashatu.
Beene Imeri, rukumi na magana ataano na babiri.
Beene Peshihuuri, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ana na mushanju.
Beene Harimu, rukumi na ikumi na mushanju.
Abaleevi n'aba: beene Yeshua na Kadimieli ab'omuri beene Hodavia, makumi mushanju na bana.
Abeeshongozi, beene Asafu igana na makumi abiri na munaana.
Batabani b'abakumiirizi, beene Shalumu, Ateeri, Talumooni, Akubu, Hatita na Shobai, boona igana na makumi ashatu na mwenda.
Abaheereza b'omuri hekalu bakaba bari aba: beene Ziiha, beene Hasufa, beene Tabaosi,
beene Kerosi, beene Siaha, beene Padoni,
beene Lebana, beene Hagaba, beene Akubu,
beene Hagabu, beene Shamulai, beene Hanani,
beene Gideli, beene Gahaari, beene Reaya,
beene Rezini, beene Nekoda, beene Gazamu,
beene Uzza, beene Pasea, beene Besai,
beene Asina, beene Meunimu, beene Nefisimu,
beene Bakibuki, beene Hakufa, beene Harihuri,
beene Baziluusi, beene Mehida, beene Harisha,
beene Barikoosi, beene Sisera, beene Teema,
beene Nezia na beene Hatifa.
Batabani b'abagaragwa ba Sulemaani: beene Sotai, beene Hasoferesi, beene Peruda,
beene Yaala, beene Darikoni, beene Gideli,
beene Shefatia, beene Hatili, beene Pokeresi-hazebaimu na beene Ami.
Abaheereza b'omuri hekalu boona na batabani b'abagaragwa ba Sulemaani bakaba bari magana ashatu na makumi mwenda na babiri.
Kandi aba nibo baarugire Telimeela, Teliharasha, Kerubu, Adani na Imeri, kwonka tibaarabaasize kworeka amaju ga baishenkurubo, nari obukomooko bwabo, kuhamya ku bari Abaisraeli buzima;
beene Delaaya, beene Tobia, na beene Nakoda, magana mukaaga na makumi ataano na babiri.
Kandi ab'omuri batabani ba'abanyamurwa, beene Habaaya, beene Hakozi, na beene Baruzilai, owaashweire omukazi ow'omuri bahara ba Baruzilai owa Gileadi, akeetererwa eiziina ryabo.

Abo bakasherura amaziina gaabo omu baahandiikirwe nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwa baishenkurubo oku kwabaire kuri, kwonka tigaareebekamu; nikyo baateekateekyeirwe kuba abatashemeire, bakazibirwa kukora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa;
omutegyeki omukuru yaabaragiira ngu barekye kurya aha by'okurya ebirikwera, okuhitsya obu haribaho omunyamurwa oine Urimu na Tumimu.
Omutwe gw'abo bantu boona gukaba guri obukumi buna n'enkumi ibiri na magana ashatu na makumi mukaaga,

otabariiremu bahuuku baabo n'abazaana baabo, abu omubaro gwabo gwabaire guri enkumi mushanju na magana ashatu na makumi ashatu na mushanju; kandi bakaba baine abeeshongozi, abashaija n'abakazi, magana abiri.
Embaraasi zaabo zikaba ziri magana mushanju na makumi ashatu na mukaaga, enyumbu magana abiri na makumi ana na itaano,
engamira magana ana na mkumi ashatu na itaano, n'endogoya enkumi mukaaga na magana mushanju na makumi abiri.
Kandi bamwe ab'omu bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, ku baahikire aha nju ya MUKAMA ey'omuri Yerusaalemu baahonga empongano n'omutima gwekundiire ahabw'okwombeka enju ya Ruhanga omu kibanja kyayo;
baahayo ebiconco nk'oku barikubaasa, nibabita omu ibiikiro ry'empiiha z'omurimo, dariki z'ezaabu obukumi mukaaga na rukumi, na miina z'efeeza enkumi itaano, n'ebijwaro by'abanyamurwa igana.
Kandi abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi na bamwe omu bantu, n'abeeshongozi n'abakumiirizi kandi n'abaheereza b'omuri hekalu batuura omu ndembo zaabo, n'Abaisraeli boona baatuura omu zaabo.

Ku baahikireyo, Yeshua mwene Yozadaaki yaimuka na beene ishe abanyamurwa, na Zerubabeeli mwene Shealutieli na beene waabo, baayombeka eitambiro rya Ruhanga wa Israeli kutambiraho ebitambo by'okwotsya, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu biragiro bya Musa omushaija wa Ruhanga.
Baata eryo itambiro omu mwanya gwaryo, ahabw'okuba bakaba baine obwoba ahabw'abantu b'omuri ezo nsi, baaritambiriraho MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya, omu kasheeshe n'omu mwabazyo.
Kandi baijuka obugyenyi bwe'biro bikuru obw'Ensiisira, nk'oku kuhandiikirwe, baatamba ebitambo bya buri izooba, nk'omubaro gwabyo oku gwabaire guri, nibakuratira ekiragiro kya buri izooba;

bwanyima baahayo ebitambo by'okwotsya eby'obutoosha, n'eby'okuboneka kw'ameezi, n'eby'amagyenyi ga MUKAMA goona agaatairweho, hamwe n'empongano z'omuntu weena owaahongyeire MUKAMA n'omutima gwekundiire.
Aha izooba ry'okubanza ery'okwezi kwa mushanju niho baatandiikire kutambira MUKAMA ebitambo by'okwotsya. Kwonka omusingi gwa hekalu ya MUKAMA gukaba gutakatairweho.

N'ahabw'ekyo baaha abombeki n'ababaizi empiiha, kandi baaha Abasidoni n'Abatuuro eby'okurya n'eby'okunywa n'amajuta, ngu bareete emiti y'emyereezi, kugiiha Lebanooni bakagireeta aha nyanja, bakagihitsya Yoopa, nk'oku Kuuro omugabe wa Perisi yaabaikiriize.
Yeshua n'abatabani na beene waabo baimuka na Kadumieli n'abatabani beene Yuda kukoresa abakozi abarikukora enju ya Ruhanga nibakwatanisa na beene Henadaadi na beene waabo Abaleevi.
baayeshongora nibaikirizana, nibahimbisa MUKAMA kandi nibamusiima bati:
Ahakuba ni murungi,
Kandi embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona ahari Israeli.
Ku baabaire nibahimbisa MUKAMA, abantu boona baateera akaari n'amaraka mahango, ahabw'okuheza kutaho omusingi gw'enju ya MUKAMA.

Kwonka baingi omu banyamurwa n'Abaleevi n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, abagurusi abaareebire enju y'okubanza, ku baareebire omusingi gw'enju gwaheza kuteebwaho, baarira nibaborooga munonga, n'obu abandi baraabe baabaire nibateera akaari ahabw'okushemererwa;
kyareetera abantu kutabaasa kutaanisa amaraka, yaaba gari ag'okushemererwa nari ag'okucura; ahakuba abantu bakaba nibayomba munonga, n'orwari rwabo niruhuririrwa hare.
Bwanyima abazigu b'Abayuda n'Ababenyamiini ku baahuriire ngu abaarugire omu bukwatwa nibombekyera MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, hekalu,

baija ahari Zerubabeeli n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, baabagira bati: Ka twombekye hamwe naimwe; ahakuba naitwe turamya Ruhanga waanyu, nk'oku mumuranya, kandi tutuura nitumutambira ebitambo, okuruga omu busingye bwa Esari-hadoni, omugabe wa Asiria owaatureetsire aha.

Kwonka Zerubabeeli na Yeshua n'abandi bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'Abaisraeli baabagarukamu bati: Timwine kakwate naitwe kwombekyera Ruhanga waitu enju; kureka itwe twenka nitwija kwombekyera MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, nk'oku Nyakusinga Kuuro omugabe wa Perisi yaaturagiire.
Bwanyima abantu b'omuri egyo nsi baateera Abayuda aha mutwe, baabatiinisa kwombeka,
baaguriirira abahi b'obwengye kubazibira kuhikiiriza eki barikwenda kukora; byaguma bityo omu busingye bwa Kuuro omugabe wa Perisi bwona okuhitsya omu busingye bwa Dario omugabe wa Perisi.

Bwanyima omu busingye bwa Aruta-gizakiseeski, Bishulaamu, Mesiredaasi, Tabeeli na bagyenzi baabo abandi baahandiikira Aruta-gizakiseesi omugabe wa Perisi; egyo baruha baagihandiika omu rurimi rwa Siria, kandi baagihindura.
Rehumu omutegyeki na Shimushai omuhandiiki nabo baahandiikira Aruta-gizakiseesi ebaruha nibarega Yerusaalemu ni bagira bati:
n'ab'amahanga agandi abu Osinapaari omutegyeki omukuru rugambwa yaihire owaabo, akabata omu ndembo za Samaria, n'omu byaro ebindi ebiri omu nsi seeri y'Omugyera n'ebindi:
(ebi nibyo bigambo by'ebaruha ei baatwekire;) Nyakusinga Omugabe Aruta-gizakiseesi, itwe abairu baawe ab'omu nsi ya seeri y'Omugyera nitukuramutsya.
Mbwenu Nyakusinga omugabe, omanye Abayuda, abaarugire okwo, bakaija kunu Yerusaalemu, orurembo orugomi kandi orubi; mbwenu nibarwombeka, kandi baaherize engo z'amabaare n'omusingi.
Mbwenu Nyakusinga, omanye ngu, ku baraayombekye oru rurembo, baaheza n'engo zaarwo, tibarikutoijera, n'obu kwakuba okuha omushoro n'ehoozi; ekirirugamu empiiha z'obugabe ziryatuuba.
Mbwenu ahabw'okuba tutungirwe obugabe, kandi n'ahabw'okutenda kureeba omugabe naihwaho ekitiinisa, nikyo twakutumiraho kukumanyisa,

ngu basherure omu kitabo ekirikwijutsya ebyabaireho omu busingye bwa baashwenkuru. Ebyo noija kubishanga omuri ekyo kitabo, omanye ku orurembo oru ruba orugomi, orunyangaraza abagabe n'ensi zaabo, kandi okuruga ira ku rushangwa rugomesa abantu. Ekyo nikyo kyarureeteire kucwekyerezibwa.
Nitumanyisa omugabe ngu, oru rurembo ku ruraayombekwe, engo zaarwo zaahwa, noija kubura eki waatunga omu nsi egi eya seeri y'Omugyera.

Omugabe yaatuma ahari Rehumu omutegyeki na Shimushai omuhandiiki na bagyenzi baabo abandi abaabaire batwire Samaria n'omu bindi byanga by'ensi eya seeri y'Omugyera, yaabagarukamu naagira ati: Muri buhooro, n'ebindi?
Ebaruha ei mwatutwekyeire, bagishomeire omu maisho gaitu, yaashobooroka.
Naaragiira ku basherura, baashanga ngu okuruga ira orwo rurembo rukaba rwimukirira abagabe, kandi eby'obugomi n'okwebumba bikaba biruhanuurirwamu.
Kandi ngu rukaba rubamu abagabe b'amaani abaabaire bategyeka Yerusaalemu n'ebyanga byona ebya seeri y'Omugyera, kandi bakaba baheebwa emitoijo n'omushoro n'empooza.
N'ahabw'ekyo muteho ekiragiro abo bashaija barekyere aho, orwo rurembo rurekye kwombekwa, okuhitsya obu ndibaragiira ekindi.
Kandi mwerinde, muteeganda ahari ekyo, akabi katakaakura, kakareetera abagabe kufeerwa.

Bwanyima ku baaherize kushomera ebaruha y'omugabe Aruta-gizakiseesi omu maisho ga Rehumu na Shimushai omuhandiiki na bagenzi baabo, ahonaaho baimuka, baaza Yerusaalemu ahu Abayuda baabaire bari, baabazibira kukora n'amaani n'obushoboorozi.
N'ahabw'ekyo omurimo gw'enju ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Yerusaalemu baagurekyera aho, okuhitsya omu busingye bwa Dario omugabe wa Perisi.

Ahonaaho Zerubabeeli mwwene Shealutieli na Yeshua mwene Yozadaaki baimuka, baatandika kugaruka kwombeka enju ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Yerusaalemu, nibahwerwa baanabi ba Ruhanga abo, abaabaire bari hamwe nabo.

Omu biro ebyo Tatenai omutegyeki w'ensi egyo eya seeri y'Omugyera na Shesari-bozenai na bagyenzi baabo baabashanga ahu baabaire bari, baababuuza bati: N'oha obaragiire kwombeka enju egi n'okuheza oru rugo rw'amabaare?
Baagaruka baababuuza bati: Abarikwombeka egi nju amaziina gaabo nibaahi?
Kwonka eriisho rya Ruhanga waabo ryaguma aha bategyeki b'Abayudaaya, tibaabazibira kwombeka, batakamanyise Dario, nawe akabagarukamu aha kigambo ekyo.
Nyakusinga Dario omugabe, nitukwendeza obusingye bwonka!

Nitukumanyisa ku tugiire omu ishaza rya Yuda, aha nju ya Ruhanga Nyamuhanga, erikwombekyesibwa amabaare mahango, bakatambika emitambiko mihango omu bisiika byayo; omurimo ogwo nibagukora n'obweziriki, kandi nigugyenda gye.
Mbwenu tubuurize abo bakuru, nitubagira tuti: N'oha obaragiire kwombeka enju egi, n'okuheza oru rugo rw'amabaare?
Kandi twababuuza n'amaziina gaabo, ngu tubone kugakumanyisa, kandi n'okukuhandiikira amaziina g'abarikubategyeka.

Oku nikwo baatugarukiremu, nibagira bati: Turi abairu ba Ruhanga w'eiguru n'ensi, kandi hati nitugaruka kwombeka enju eyaayombekirwe ira emyaka mingi ehingwire, ei omugabe wa Israeli rugambwa yaayombekire akaheza.
Kwonka Ruhanga w'eiguru, ahabw'okugwisibwa kubi baatatenkuriitwe, akabahayo omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza Omukaludaaya omugabe wa Babulooni, yaasheenya egyo nju, yaatwara abantu Babulooni bari enkwata.
Kwonka Kuuro omugabe wa Babulooni, omu mwaka gw'okubanza ogw'omu busingye bwe, akaragiira ku egi nju ya Ruhanga eshemereire kwombekwa.

Kandi ebintu by'omu nju ya Ruhanga eby'ezaabu n'eby'efeeza, ebi Nebukadeneeza yaanyagire omuri hekalu ya Yerusaalemu, akabitwara omuri hekalu ya Babulooni, omugabe Kuuro yaabiiha omuri egyo hekalu ya Babulooni, baabiha omuntu orikwetwa Sheshebazaari, ou yaahindwire omutegyeki;
yaamuragiira ati: Twara ebintu ebi, ogyende, obite omuri hekalu y'omuri Yerusaaleumu, enju ya Ruhanga egarukye eyombekwe omu kibanja kyayo.
Bwanyima Sheshebazaari ogwo yaija, yaataho emisingi y'enju ya Ruhanga omuri Yerusaalemu; mbwenu okwiha obwo n'okuhitsya hati neekyombekwa, tekahweire.

N'ahabw'ekyo, omugabe ku araakisiime, basherure omu nju y'eibiikiro ry'omugabe wa Babulooni, bareebe Kuuro ku araabe atararagiire kwombeka egi nju ya Ruhanga omuri Yerusaalemu. Haza obwo omugabe atutumeho eki arikusiima omu kigambo eki.
Bwanyima Dario omugabe yaaragiira kusherura omu nju y'ebitabo by'ebyabaireho omuri Babulooni, omu baabaire babiika ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi.
Bwanyima baasherura omuri Akimeta, ekikaari ky'obugabe eky'omu ishaza rya Media, baazooramu omuzingo gw'ekitabo ogwahandiikirwemu ebigambo ebirikugira biti:

Omugabe Kuuro, omu mwaka gw'okubanza ogw'omu busingye bwe, akataho ekiragiro eki: Ebirikukwata aha nju ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Yerusaalemu, enju egyo eyombekwe, ebe omwanya ogw'okutambiramu ebitambo, emisingi yaayo eteebweho gye, ehame; obwemi bwayo bube mikono makumi mukaaga, n'obukiika bwayo mikono makumi mukaaga;
egire emishorongo eshatu y'amabaare mahango n'omushorongo gumwe gw'emitambiko y'ebiti; eby'okugiihurira birugye omu ibiikiro ry'empiiha z'obugabe.

Kandi ebintu by'enju ya Ruhanga, eby'ezaabu n'eby'efeeza, ebi Nebukadeneeza yaanyagire omuri hekalu ey'omuri Yerusaalemu, akabitwara Babulooni, babigarureyo, babite omuri hekalu egyo, buri kintu kigarukye omu mwanya gwakyo; mubite omu nju ya Ruhanga.
mutagira eki mwakora ekirikuzibira omurimo gw'egyo nju ya Ruhanga; omutegyeki w'Abayuda n'abakuru baabo babe nibo baayombeka egyo nju ya Ruhanga omu kibanja kyayo.

Kandi naataho ekiragiro ky'ebi mushemereire kukorera abo bakuru b'Abayudaaya ahabw'okwombeka enju ya Ruhanga; mwihe aha mpiiha z'obugabe ezirugire omu mushoro gw'abantu b'ensi ya seeri y'Omugyera, muteho omutima kuha abo bashaija eby'okwihurira omurimo, barekye kgira ekyabazibira kukora.

Kandi eki bariba nibeetenga kyona, yaaba nimi z'ebimasha, empaya z'entaama nari entaama ahabw'ebitambo by'okwotsya kutambira Ruhanga w'eiguru, nari engano, omwonyo, viinyo nari amajuta, ebi abanyamurwa ba Yerusaalemu bariba nibeetenga, bagume babiheebwe buri izooba bitaribura,
babone kuguma nibatambira Ruhanga w'eiguru ebitambo by'ekisooroora kirungi, kandi bashabire omugabe n'abatabani okugira amagara.
Kandi nintaho ekiragiro nti: Omuntu weena orihindura ekigambo ekyo, baryahigura enyomyo omu nju ye, bagimuhanikyeho, n'enju ye bagihindure orubungo.

Kandi Ruhanga, owaagumizeyo eiziina rye, acwekyereze omugabe weena, nari abantu, abariimutsya emikono yaabo kuhindura ekiragiro eki, nari okusheenya egyo nju ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Yerusaalemu. Nyowe Dario, niinye naaragiira ekyo kiragiro; kihikiirizibwe n'obweziriki bwona.
Bwanyima Tatenai omutegyeki w'ensi eya seeri y'Omugyera, na Shesari-bozenai na bagyenzi baabo baayezirika munonga kukora eki Dario omugabe yaaragiire, nk'ekigambo eki yaabatumireho oku kyabaire kiri.

Abakuru b'Abayudaaya baayombeka, byagyenda gye ahabw'okuhanuura kwa nabi Hagai na Zekaria mwene Ido. Baayombeka, baaheza ahabw'okuragiirwa Ruhanga wa Israeli, kandi n'ahabw'ekiragiro ekyatairweho Kuuro na Dario na Aruta-gizakiseesi omugabe wa Perisi;
egyo nju yaahwa aha kiro kya kashatu ky'okwezi kwa Adari, omu mwaka gwa mukaaga ogw'omu busingye bw'omugabe Dario.

Ku baabaire nibagishoroora, baahonga enimi igana, empaya z'entaama magana abiri, n'abaana b'entaama magana ana; kandi baatamba empaya z'embuzi ikumi na ibiri kuba empongano z'okurihiirira ekibi ahabw'Abaisraeli boona, nk'omubaro gw'enganda zaabo oku gwabaire guri.
Baata abanyamurwa omu mbu zaabo, nk'oku baabaire nibakuratana, n'Abaleevi baaza omu myanya yaabo, kuheereza Ruhanga omuri Yerusaalemu, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya Musa.

Ahabw'okuba abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi bakaba beeyereize hamwe; boona bashemeire. N'ahabw'ekyo baita omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho ahabw'abaarugire omu bukwatwa boona, n'ahabwa beene waabo abanyamurwa, n'aabwabo bonka.
Gwariibwa Abaisraeli abaarugire omu bukwatwa, n'abantu boona abaabaire beetaaniise n'ebihagaro by'abanyamahanga ab'omu nsi egyo, bakakwatanisa n'Abaisraeli kuramya MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli.

Baijuka obugyenyi bw'emigaati etatumbisiibwe, baamara ebiro mushanju nibashemererwa; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akabaha okushemererwa, kandi yaahindura omutima gw'omugabe wa Asiria, yaabakunda, yaabahwera omu murimo gw'okwombeka enju ya Ruhanga, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Hilukia ya Shalumu, Shalumu ya Zadoki, Zadoki ya Ahitubu,
Ahitubu ya Amaria, Amaria ya Azaria, Azaria ya Merayoosi,
Merayoosi ya Zerahia, Zerahia ya Uuzi, Uuzi ya Buuki,
Buuki ya Abishua, Abishua ya Finehaasi, Finehaasi ya Eleazaari, mwene Arooni omunyamurwa omukuru;

Ezera ogwo akaruga Babulooni, yainamuka kuza Yerusaalemu; kandi akaba ari omuhandiiki w'obwengye omu by'ebiragiro bya Musa, ebyahairwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli. Omugabe yaamuha ebi yaashabire byona, ahabw'okuba omukono gwa MUKAMA Ruhanga we gukaba gumuriho.
Ezera yaahika Yerusaalemu omu kwezi kwa kataano omu mwaka gwa mushanju ogw'omu busingye bw'ogwo mugabe;

ahakuba aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwezi kw'okubanza akatandika kuruga Babulooni, kandi aha kiro ky'okubanza omu kwezi kwa kataano yaahika Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba omukono gwa Ruhanga we omurungi gukaba gumuriho.
Kandi Ezera ogwo akaba ataire omutima gwe aha kwega ebiragiro bya MUKAMA, n'okubyorobera, kandi n'okwegyesa Abaisraeli ebyo biragiro n'emigyenzo eyaatairweho.
Nyowe Aruta-gizakiseesi, omugabe w'abagabe, naakuhandiikira, Ezera omunyamurwa, kandi omuhandiiki w'ebiragiro bya Ruhanga w'eiguru, ninkuramutsya munonga, n'ebindi!
Mbwenu nintaho ekiragiro nti: Omuntu weena omu Baisraeli, nari omu banyamurwa baabo nari ow'omu Baleevi, abari omu bugabe bwangye, orikwenda kuza Yerusaalemu atagyemirwe, agyende naiwe.
Ahabw'okuba nyowe omugabe n'abahi b'obwengye bangye mushanju twakutuma ngu oze kubuuza ebya Yuda na Yerusaalemu, nk'ebiragiro bya Ruhanga waawe ebi oine oku biri,
kandi otware efeeza n'ezaabu, ebi nyowe omugabe n'abahi b'obwengye bangye tutoijeire Ruhanga, otuura Yerusaalemu, ahabwaitu,

hamwe n'efeeza yoona n'ezaabu ezi orishanga omu ishaza rya Babulooni ryona, hamwe n'emitoijo y'abantu n'abanyamurwa, ei baaraganiise kutoija n'omutima gwekundiire ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga waabo eri omuri Yerusaalemu.

N'ahabw'ekyo oyezirikye munonga kugura n'empiiha ezo enimi empaya z'entaama n'abaana b'entaama hamwe n'empongano z'esaano, n'ez'eby'okunywa eby'okuhongwa nazo, mubitambire aha itambiro ry'enju ya Ruhanga waanyu omuri Yerusaalemu.
Kandi ebirishaaga ahari ezo feeza n'ezaabu, iwe na beene waanyu, oku muryenda kubitwaza, mubitwaze kwo, nimukuratira ebi Ruhanga waanyu arikusiima.
Kandi n'ebintu ebi ohairwe kukoresa omu nju ya Ruhanga waawe oryabimurikira omu maisho ga Ruhanga wa Yerusaalemu.
Kandi ekindi kyona ekiriba nikyetengwa ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga waawe, eki oryenda kuha, okiihe omu ibiikiro ry'omugabe, okihe.

Kandi nyowe, omugabe Aruta-gizakiseesi, naaragiira ababiiki b'omu nsi eya seeri y'Omugyera boona nti: Kyona eki Ezera omunyamurwa, kandi omuhandiiki w'ebiragiro bya Ruhanga w'eiguru, aribashaba, mukikore n'obweziriki bwona,
okutarenzya aha talanta z'efeeza igana, encuro z'engano igana, enjoga za viinyo igana, entsimbo z'amajuta igana, n'omwonyo ogurengire ekigyero.
Ekiriragiirwa Ruhanga w'eiguru kyona, kikorerwe kimwe ahabw'enju ye, ekiniga kye kitakaija aha mugabe n'abatabani.

Kandi nitubamanyisa eby'abanyamurwa, Abaleevi, abeeshongozi, abakumiirizi, abaheereza b'omuri hekalu n'abandi bakozi b'omuri egyo nju ya Ruhanga boona oku baingana, ku mutarikwizibwa kubatoijesa emitoijo, nari okubashoza omushoro, n'obu kwakuba okubahooza ehoozi.
Kandi weena otariikiriza kworobera biragiro bya Ruhanga waawe n'eby'omugabe, aheebwe ekifubiro, atarikusaasirwa, eky'okwitwa, nari okubingwa, nari okunyagwa ebintu bye, nari okuteebwa omu kihome.
Bwanyima Ezera yaagira ati: MUKAMA asiimwe, Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe, ahabw'okuta ekintu nk'eki omu mutima gw'omugabe, okushemeza enju ya MUKAMA ey'omuri Yerusaalemu,

kandi n'ahabw'okumpa okugirirwa embabazi omu maisho g'omugabe n'abahi b'obwengye be, n'omu maisho g'abategyeki be boona ab'obushoboorozi. Nikyo naahamiire ahabw'omukono gwa MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye ogwabaire gundiho, nkateerana abakuru bamwe omuri Israeli ngu twinamukane.
Aba nibo bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, kandi oku nikwo kukuratana kw'oruzaaro rw'abaarugire naanye Babulooni omu busingye bw'omugabe Aruta-gizakiseesi.
Omuri beene Finehaasi, Gereshoni; omuri beene Itamaari Danieli; omuri beene Daudi Hatushi;
omuri beene Shekania. Omuri beene Paroshi Zakaria owaahandiikirwe hamwe n'abashaija igana na makumi ataano.
Omuri beene Pahasi-moabu Eliehoenai mwene Zerahia, kandi ogwo akaba ari hamwe n'abashaija magana abiri.
Omuri beene Zatu Shekania mwene Yahazieli, hamwe n'abashaija magana ashatu.
Omuri beene Adini Ebedi mwene Yonasaani hamwe n'abashaija makumi ataano.
Omuri beene Elamu Yeshaya mwene Atalia hamwe n'abashaija makumi mushanju.
Omuri beene Shefatia Zebadia mwene Mikaeli hamwe n'abashaija makumi munaana.
Omuri beene Yoabu Obadia mwene Yehieli, hamwe n'abashaija magana abiri na ikumi na munaana.
Omuri beene Baani Shelomiisi mwene Yosifia hamwe n'abashaija igana na makumi mukaaga.
Omuri beene Bebai Zekaria mwene Bebai hamwe n'abashaija makumi abiri na munaana.
Omuri beene Azigaadi Yohanaani mwene Hakataani hamwe n'abashaija igana na ikumi.
Omuri beene Adonikaamu abaizire bwanyima, amaziina gaabo Elifeleti, Yeueli, na Shemaaya hamwe n'abashaija makumi mukaaga.
Omuri beene Biguvai Usai na Zakuri hamwe n'abashaija makumi mushanju.
Naatuma kweta Eliezeeri, Arieli, Shemaya, Elinasani, Yaribu, Elinasani, Nasani, Zekaria na Meshulaamu, abashaija bakuru, hamwe na Yoyaribu na Elinasani abaabaire bari abashaija abarikwetegyereza,

naabatuma ahari Ido, omutegyeki w'ekyaro ekirikwetwa Kasifia, naabagambira ebi baraagambire Ido na beene ishe abaheereza b'omuri hekalu abaabaire bari omuri ekyo kyaro, ngu batwoherereze abaheereza b'okukora omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu.

Ahabw'omukono gwa Ruhanga waitu omurungi ogwabaire guturiho, baatureetera omushaija orikwetegyereza ow'omuri beene Mahili mwene Leevi mwijukuru wa Israeli, orikwetwa Sherebia hamwe n'abatabani na beene waabo, boona ikumi na munaana;
na Hashabia hamwe na Yeshaaya ow'omuri beene Merari, na beene ishe na batabani baabo, boona makumi abiri;
otabariireho baheereza b'omuri hekalu magana abiri na makumi abiri, abu Daudi n'abatware be baatooraine kuheereza Abaleevi. Abo boona baagambwaho nk'oku amaziina gaabo gaabaire gari.

ahabw'okuba nkagira enshoni z'okushaba omugabe omutwe gw'engabo z'abaserukare n'ab'aha mbaraasi kuturinda abazigu omu muhanda, ahakuba tukaba twagambiire omugabe tuti: Omukono gwa Ruhanga waitu guri aha barikumusherura boona kubagirira gye; kwonka amaani ge n'ekiniga kye birwanisa abamutsigaho boona.
Tutyo twayesiibyakwo, twashaba Ruhanga waitu nitumweshengyereza; yaahurira okweshengyereza kwaitu.
Naabapimira efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebintu, ebyatoizirwe omugabe n'abahi b'obwengye be n'abatware be n'Abaisraeli boona abaabaire bari aho, ahabw'enju ya Ruhanga waitu.
Ntyo naabakwatsa etalanta z'efeeza magana mukaaga na makumi ataano, n'ebintu by'efeeza eby'etalanta igana n'etalanta z'ezaabu igana,
n'enyabya z'ezaabu makumi abiri eza dariki rukumi, n'ebintu bibiri by'emiringa mirungi ekuubirwe eby'obuguzi bwingi nk'obw'ezaabu.
Naabagira nti: Muri abeereziibwe MUKAMA, kandi ezi feeza n'ezaabu n'emitoijo ei baatoijeire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe n'omutima gwekundiire.
Mubibiikye kandi mubirinde, okuhitsya obu muribipimira omu maisho g'abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abaleevi n'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru b'Abaisraeli omu bishengye by'enju ya MUKAMA omuri Yerusaalemu.
Batyo abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baayakiira efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebindi bintu, nk'oku oburemeezi bwabyo bwabaire buri, kubitwara Yerusaalemu omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu.
Ku twahikire Yerusaalemu, twahamara ebiro bishatu;

aha izooba rya kana twapimira efeeza n'ezaabu n'ebindi bintu omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu, twabikwatsa Meremoosi omunyamurwa mwene Uriya, owaabaire ari hamwe na Eleazaari mwene Finehaasi, bakwataniise n'Abaleevi Yozabaadi mene Yeshua na Noadia mwene Binui.
Byona byabarwa, byapimwa, kandi oburemeezi bwa buri kintu bwahandiikwa.
Kandi baaha abategyeki b'omugabe n'abamashaza b'ensi ya seeri y'Omugyera ebiragiro by'omugabe; nabo baahwera abantu n'enju ya Ruhanga.

ahabw'okuba bashweire bamwe omuri bahara baabo, kand baabashwererera na batabani baabo; n'ahabw'ekyo eihanga eririkwera ryejwangize n'abanyamahanga b'omuri ezi nsi. Kandi abategyeki n'abakuru nibo bakirize abandi kukora ekyo kicumuro.
Ku naahuriire ebyo, naataagura ebijwaro n'omunagiro gwangye, naayemaanyura eishokye omu mutwe, kandi n'obureju, naashutama ahansi nshobeirwe munonga.

Bwanyima abantu boona, abu ebigambo bya Ruhanga wa Israeli byareeteire kutetema ahabw'ekicumuro ky'abaarugire omu bukwatwa, baateeranira ahu naabaire nshutami nshobeirwe, okuhitsya aha bunaku bw'okutamba ekitambo ky'omu mwabazyo.
Obunaku bw'ekitambo ky'omu mwabazyo ku bwahikire, naimuka ahu naabaire nyecureereize, ebijwaro byange n'omunagiro gwangye bitaagukire, naatsimba amaju, naateega MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye emikono,
ningira nti:

Ai Ruhanga wangye, nyine enshoni z'okwimutsya amaihso kukureeba, nimbwerabwera omu maisho gaawe, Ruhanga wangye; ahabw'okuba ebibi byaitu bikanyire, byatukira aha mutwe, n'orubanja rwaitu rwatuuma, rwahika omu iguru.

Okuruga omu biro bya baatatenkuriibwe tutuura twine orubanja ruhango n'okuhitsya hati; kandi ebicumuro byaitu nibyo byatureeteire hamwe n'abagabe baitu n'abanyamurwa baitu kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abagabe b'ezi nsi, okwitwa rurara, okutwarwa omu bukwatwa, okunyagwa n'okuhemuka, nk'oku kiri na hati.

Kwonka omu biro ebi ebikye MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ayorekire embabazi ze, yaagira abu yaatutsigiraho, yaatuha omwanya guhamire omu Mwanya gwe ogurikwera, ngu abone kushemuura amaihso gaitu, n'okutugaruramu otugara omu buhuuku bwaitu;

ahakuba kwo turi abahuuku; kwonka Ruhanga tatutsigireho mu buhuuku bwaitu, kureka atworekire embabazi ze omu maisho g'abagabe b'Abaperisi; yaatugaruramu otugara, ngu tubone agombeka enju ya Ruhanga waitu, okuhunduuza ahasiisikaire, n'okutubeera orugo rw'okuturinda omuri Yuda na Yerusaalemu.
Mbwenu, ai Ruhanga waitu, ka waatutambiire oti, ekindi nitwenda kugamba ki? Ahabw'okuba tukareka kworobera ebiragiro byawe

ebi waaragiira nooraba omu bairu baawe baanabi, noogira oti: Ensi ei murikuzamu kukubuura n'ensi esiisikaire ahab'ebihagaro by'abantu baamwo, n'ebirikunugwa byabo ebigiijwize, okutashemera kukshaagaana.

N'ahabw'ekyo mutarihingira bahara baanyu batabani baabo, nari kushwererera batabani baanyu bahara baabo, n'obu kwakuba okubendeza obusingye nari okuba gye, mubone kuba ab'amaani, n'okurya ebirungi by'ensi, kandi n'okugitsigira abaana baanyu, ekaba obuhunguzi bwabo obw'ebiro byona.

Mbwenu nk'oku ebi byona byatubaireho ahabw'ebibi ebi twakozire, n'ahabw'orubanja rwaitu ruhango, haza iwe, Ruhanga waitu, okatuha ekifubiro ekitakuuraine na bibi byaitu, kandi okatutsigiraho ekicweka kirikwingana kiti,
mbwenu tugarukye tushiishe ebiragiro byawe, tushwererane n'amahanga agarikukora ebirikunugwa biti? Torikwija kutugirira ekiniga, okatumaraho, hakabura owaahonokaho, nari owaakira?

Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli, ori ow'amazima, ahabw'okuba tutsigaireho turi ekicweka ekyahonokireho, nk'oku kiri hati. Mbwenu reeba, turi aha omu maisho gaawe, tusingirwe orubanja; kandi tihaine orikubaasa kwemerera omu maisho gaawe ahabw'ekyo.

Bwanyima Shekania mwene Yehieli, ow'omuri beene Elamu, yaagambira Ezera ati: Tucumwire ahari Ruhanga waitu, twashwera abakazi b'abanyamahanga, kwonka n'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, na hati tukiine amatsiko ahabwa Israeli.

N'ahabw'ekyo ka turagaane na Ruhanga waitu tushende abakazi abo boona n'abaana baabo, nk'obwengye bwa mukama wangye n'obw'abarikutetema ahabw'ekiragiro kya Ruhanga waitu, oku buri; kandi ka kikorwe, nk'oku ebiragiro birikuragiira.
Imuka, ahakuba n'omurimo gwawe, kandi naitwe tukwataniise naiwe; ba ow'amaani, okikore.
Ahonaaho Ezera yaimuka, yaarahiza abakuru b'omu banyamurwa, n'Abaleevi, n'Abaisraeli boona, ku bakora nk'oku kigambirwe. Batyo baarahira.
Bwanyima baaranga omuri Yuda yoona na Yerusaalemu, ngu abantu boona abaarugire omu bukwatwa bateeranire Yerusaalemu;
kandi ngu omuntu weena ku araabe atahikireyo omu biro bishatu, ebintu bye byona binyagwe, kandi nawe acuubwe omu mutwe gw'abaarugire omu bukwatwa, nk'oku abategyeki n'abakuru baaragiire.

Bwanyima abashaija ba Yuda na Benyamiini boona baateeranira Yerusaalemu, ebyo biro bishatu bitakahweire; obwo kukaba kuri okwezi kwa mwenda, aha kiro kyakwo kya makumi abiri. Abantu boona baashutama omu kibuga ky'omu maisho g'enju ya Ruhanga, nibatetema ahabw'ekyo kigambo, n'ahabw'enjura nyingi.
Ezera omunyamurwa yaayemerera, yaabagira ati: Mukacumura, mwashwera abakazi b'abanyamahanga, mwayongyerera Israeli orubanja.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati mwaturire MUKAMA Ruhanga wa baashwenkuriimwe ekibi kyanyu, mukore eki arikwenda; mwetaanise n'abantu b'omuri egi nsi kandi n'abanyamahangakazi.
Ahonaaho abantu boona abaabaire bateeraniireyo baagarukamu n'eiraka rihango bati: Nikwo kiri; tushemereire kukora nk'oku waagamba.
Kwonka abantu ni baingi; kandi n'obunaku bw'enjura nyingi; titurikubaasa kwemerera aheeru. Kandi omurimo ogu ti gw'ekiro kimwe nari bibiri; ahakuba tukacumura munonga omu kigambo eki.

Abakuru baitu ka beemerere omu iziina ry'eihanga ryona; bwanyima ab'omu ndembo zaitu boona, abaashweire abanyamahangakazi, baije omu bunaku obu bateereirweho, hamwe n'abakuru n'abaramuzi aba buri rurembo, okuhitsya obu ekiniga kya Ruhanga waitu ekingi, eki atugiriire ahabw'ekigambo eki, kiraaturugyeho.
Kwonka Yonasaani mwene Asaheeli na Yahazeya mwene Tikuva baayanga egyo naama, kandi Meshulaamu na Shabesai Omuleevi baikirizana nabo.

Batyo abaarugire omu bukwatwa baaba nikwo baatwaza. Ezera omunyamurwa yaatoorana abashaija, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, nk'oku ago maju gaabaire gari, kuba abajwekyerwa nk'oku amaziina gaabo gaabaire gari. Aha kiro ky'okubanza ky'okwezi kwa ikumi baashutama kwetegyereza ebyo bigambo,
kandi aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'okwezi kw'okubanza baashangwa baaherize ebigambo by'abashaija boona abaabaire bashweire abanyamahangakazi.
Baarahira kushenda abakazi baabo, kandi empongano yaabo y'okwihaho ekibi ekaba eri empaya y'entaama ey'omu busyo ahabw'orubanja rwabo.
Omuri beene Imeri: Hanani na Zebadia.
Omuri beene Harimu: Maaseya, Eliya, Shemaaya, Yehieli na Uziya.
Omuri beene Pashihuuri: Elioenai, Maaseya, Ishimaeli, Netaneeli, Yozabaadi, na Elasa.
Omu Baleevi: Yozabaadi, Shimei, Kelaya (niwe Keliita), Pesahia, Yuda, na Eliezeeri.
Omu beeshongozi, Eliashibu. Omu bakumiirizi, Shalumu, Telemu, na Uuri.
Ab'omuri Israeli: omuri beene Paroshi, Ramia, Izia, Malukiya, Miyamiini, Eleazaari, Hashabia na Benaaya.
Omuri beene Elamu: Matania, Zekaria, Yehieli, Abudi, Yeremoosi na Eliya.
Omuri beene Zaatu: Elio-enai, Eliashibu Matania, Yeremoosi, Zabadi na Aziza.
Omuri beene Bebai: Yehohanani, Hanania, Zabai, na Asulai.
Omuri beene Baani; Meshulaamu, Maluki, Adaya, Yashubu, Sheali na Yeremoosi.
Omuri beene Pehasi-moabu: Aduna, Kelali, Benaaya, Maaseya, Matania, Bezaleeli, Binui, na Manaase.
Omuri beene Harimu: Eliezeeri, Ishiya, Malukiya, Shemaaya, Shimeoni,
Benyamiini, Maluki, na Shemaria.
Omuri beene Hashumu: Metanai, Matasa, Zabadi, Elifeleti, Yeremai, Manaase, na Shimei.
Omuri beene Baani: Maadai, Amuraamu, Ueli,
Benaaya, Bedeya, Keluhi,
Vania, Meremoosi, Eliashibu,
Matania, Matenai, na Yaasu.
Omuri beene Binui: Shimei,
Shelemia, Nasani, Adaaya,
Makundebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azareeli, Shelemia, Shemaria,
Shalumu, Amaria na Yosefu.
Omuri beene Neebo; Yeyeli, Matitia, Zabadi, Zebina, Yadai Yoeli na Benaaya.
Abo boona bakaba bashweire abanyamahangakazi, baababinga n'abaana baabo.
Eizooba rimwe omu kwezi kwa Kisileevi omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri, nkaba ndi omu rurembo Suusa,
Hanaani, omwe ahari beene waitu, yaija n'abashaija nibaruga Yuda; naababuuza eby'Abayudaaya abaahonokire batatwarwe omu bukwatwa, n'ebya Yerusaalemu.

Bangira bati: Abaahonokire batatwarwe omu bukwatwa, abari omuri eryo ishaza, bari omu busaasi bwingi, n'omu kuhemuka kuhango; orugo rw'amabaare orwa Yerusaalemu rusheenyirwe, n'amarembo gaayo gacwekyereziibwe n'omuriro.
Naagira nti: Ai MUKAMA, Ruhanga w'eiguru, ori Ruhanga Nyamuhanga orikutiinwa, orinda endagaano kandi ogirira embabazi abakukunda, bakoorobera ebiragiro byawe,

tega okutu, kandi oreebe n'amaisho, ohurire okushaba kw'omwiru waawe, oku ndikushaba omu maisho gaawe nyomushana na nyekiro ahabw'Abaisraeli abairu baawe, niinyatura ebibi byabo ebi twakucumwireho. N'ekya buzima, nyowe n'enju ya tata tukacumura.
Tukakora ebitahikire ahariiwe, titwayorobera biragiro, ebyatairweho n'eby'emigyenzo ebi waaragiire omugaragwa waawe Musa.
Ijuka ekigambo eki waaragiire omugaragwa waawe ogwo, noogira oti: Ku muricumura, ndyabataataanisiza omu mahanga;

kwonka ku muringarukira, mwayorobera ebiragiro byangye, mwabikora, n'obu muriba mutaataanisiziibwe okwo hare aha muheru gw'ensi, ndyabateeranira hamwe, mbaiheyo, mbareete omu nsi ei naatooraine kugumyamu eiziina ryangye.
N'abairu baawe, kandi abantu baawe, abu waacungwire n'amaani gaawe amaingi, kandi n'omukono gwawe ogw'amaani.

Ai MUKAMA, tega okutu kwawe, ohurire okushaba kw'omwiru waawe, n'okw'abairu baawe, abashemerererwa okutiina eiziina ryawe; ohe omwiru waawe omugisha eri izooba, agirirwe embabazi omu maisho g'omushaija ogu. (Omu bunaku obwo nkaba ndi omuheereza wa viinyo y'omugabe.)
Omugabe yambuuza ati: Ahabw'enki nooreebeka ogwirwe kubi, haza otarwaire? Ekyo ti kindi, kureka n'obusaasi bw'aha mutima. Ku naakihuriire, naatiina munonga.
Naagira omugabe nti: Karamaare, Nyakusinga! Ekyakunzibiire kuguubwa kubi niki, haza kunu orurembo orurimu ebituuro bya baatatenkuru, rwabaire amatongo, n'amarembo gaarwo gaacwekyereziibwe n'omuriro?
Bwanyima omugabe yangira ati: Mbwenu nooshaba ki? Ntyo naashaba Ruhanga w'eiguru.

Bwanyima naagira omugabe nti: Nyakusinga omugabe, ku oraabe nookisiima, kandi nyowe omwiru waawe nyine obushongore omu maisho gaawe, nyohereza Yuda, omu rurembo rw'ebituuro bya baatatenkuru, ngarukye ndwombekye.
Omugabe, omwigarire amushutami aha rubaju, yangira ati: Noija kumarayo mwanya ki, kandi oryagaruka ryari? Atyo omugabe yaasiima kuunyohereza; naanye naaragaana nawe obunaku.
Bwanyima naagira omugabe nti: Ku oraabe nookisiima, Nyakusinga, bampe amabaruha g'okutwarira abamashaza ba seeri y'Omugyera, baanyikirize kurabamu kuhika Yuda;

kandi mpeebwe n'ebaruha y'okutwarira Asafu, omurinzi w'ekibira ky'omugabe, abone kumpa emiti y'okwihamu enkingi z'amarembo g'ekigo kya hekalu, n'ey'orugo rw'orurembo, kandi n'ey'enju ei ndaataahemu. Omugabe yaanyikiriza ebi naashaba; ahakuba omukono gwa Ruhanga wangye omurungi gukaba gundiho.
Kwonka Sanibalati Omuhoroni na Tobia omuhuuku Omuamoni, ku baahuriire ngu hariho oizire kukorera Abaisraeli ebirungi, kyabagwisa kubi mononga.
Bwanyima naimuka nyekiro n'abantu bakye; kandi tinaagambira muntu weena eki Ruhanga wangye antaire aha mutima kukorera Yerusaalemu. Kandi nkaba ntaine ndiijo mbaraasi kureka ei naagyendeireho.

Ekyo kiro naashohora, naaraba omu irembo ry'omu ruhanga, naahika aha iziba ry'Ekijoka, n'aha irembo ry'orubungo, naayetegyereza engo za Yerusaalemu ezaabaire zisheenyukire, n'amarembo gaarwo agaabaire gacwekyereziibwe n'omuriro.
Ntyo naagumizamu naahika aha irembo ry'enshuro, n'aha kiyanja ky'omugabe, kwonka naabura ah'okurabya embaraasi ei naabaire ntembire.
Bwanyima ekyo kiro nainamuka orwo ruhanga, naayetegyereza orwo rugo; bwanyima naakuba, naaraba omu irembo ry'oruhanga, naagarukayo.
Kandi abategyeki tibaamanya i naaba ngiire, nari eki naaba ninkora; kandi nkaba ntakagambiire Bayudaaya, abanyamurwa, abakungu, abatware, nari abandi abaabaire bari ab'okukora omurimo.

Kandi naabateekyerereza oku omukono gwa Ruhanga wangye gwambereire murungi, kandi n'ebi omugabe yangambiire. Baagira bati: Ka twimukye, twombekye. Batyo baayeteera ebinyomyo kukora omurimo ogwo omurungi.
Kwonka Sanibalati Omuhoroni na Tobia omuhuuku Omuamoni, na Geshemu Omuharabu, ku baakihuriire, baatushekyerera, baatugaya nibagira bati: Mbwenu eki nimukora ki? Nimwenda kugomera omugabe?

Naanye naabagarukamu nti: Ruhanga w'eiguru naija kutuha omugisha, kandi itwe abairu be nitwija kwimuka, twombekye; kwonka imwe timwine mugabo, nari obushoboorozi, n'obu kyakuba ekiijutsyo omuri Yerusaalemu.
Haakurataho aba Yeriko; nabo baakuratwa Zakuri mwene Imuri omu kwombeka.
Batabani ba Hasena baayombeka eirembo ry'eby'enyanja; baabyara enkingi zaaryo, baatamu enyigi zaaryo, ebyoma byaryo by'okurikingisa, n'empimbi zaaryo.
Baakuratwa Meremoosi mwene Uriya mwijukuru wa Hakozi, yaahunduuza; haataho Meshulaamu mwene Berekia, mwijukuru wa Meshezabeeli, yaahunduuza; haataho Zadoki mwene Baana, yaahunduuza.
Haataho aba Tekoa, baahunduuza; kwonka abakungu baabo tibarataire mutima ha murimo gwa mukama waabo.
Haataho Melatia owa Gibeoni, yaahunduuza na Yadoni owa Meronoosi, abashaija ba Gibeoni na Mizipa, abaabaire bari omu butegyeki bw'omutegyeki w'ensi eya seeri y'Omugyera.
Haataho Uzieli, mwene Haruhaaya, ow'omu baheesi b'ezaabu, yaahunduuza. Haataho Hanania, omwe aha barikujwanzya emigaju, yaahunduuza. Bo baagaruraho orugo rwa Yerusaalemu okuhika aha Rugo oruhango.
Haataho Refaaya mwene Huuri, omutegyeki w'ekicweka kya Yerusaalemu; yaahunduuza.
Haataho Yedaaya mwene Harumaafu, yaahunduuza ahashungaine n'enju ye; haataho Hatushi mwene Hashabuneia, yaahunduuza.
Malakiya mwene Harimu na Hashubu mwene Pahasi-moabu baahunduuza ekicweka ky'orugo, n'omunaara gw'amateekyero.
Haataho Shalumu mwene Haloheeshi, omutegyeki w'ekicweka kya Yerusaalemu, yaahunduuza, we na bahara be.

Hanuuni n'abatuuzi ba Zanoa baahunduuza eirembo ry'Oruhanga; baaryombeka, baatamu enyigi zaaryo, ebyoma byaryo ey'okurikingisa, n'empimbi zaaryo; kandi baahunduuza ekicweka ky'orugo kya mikono rukumi okuhika aha irembo ry'orubungo.
Malakiya mwene Rekabu, omutware w'eishaza rya Besi-hakeremu, yaahunduuza eryo irembo ry'orubungo; yaaryombeka, yaatamu enyigi zaaryo, ebyoma byaryo eby'okurikingisa, n'empimbi zaaryo.
Haataho Nehemia mwene Azubuuki, omutware w'ekicweka ky'eishaza rya Besi-zuuri, yaahunduuza okuhika aharikureebana n'ebituuro bya Daudi, aha biyanja ebi baatibire, n'aha nju y'amamanzi.
Yaakuratwa Abaleevi; Rehumu mwene Baani, haataho Hashabia, omutware w'ekicweka ky'eishaza rya Keila, yaahunduuza ahabw'eishaza rye.
Haataho beene waabo, baahunduuza; Bavai mwene Henadaadi omutware w'ekicweka ky'eishaza rya Keila;
haataho Ezeri mwene Yehsua, omutware wa Mizipa, yaahunduuza ekindi kicweka, ekirikureebana n'ah'orikwinamukira nooza omu ibiikiro ry'eby'okurwanisa aha Keekubo.
Haataho Baruki mwene Zabai, yaahunduuza ekindi kicweka, okwiha aha Keekubo okuhika aha rwigi rw'enju ya Eliashibu omunyamurwa omukuru.
Haataho Meremoosi mwene Uriya, mwijukuru wa Hakozi, yaahunduuza ekindi kicweka, okwiha ahari orwo rwigi okuhika aha muheru gw'egyo nju.
Yaakuratwa abanyamurwa, ab'omu ruhita, baahunduuza.
Haataho Benyamiini na Hashubu, baahunduuza ahashungaine n'enju yaabo. Haataho Azaria mwene Maaseya, mwijukuru wa Anania, yaahunduuza aha rubaju rw'enju ye.
Yaakuratwa Benui, mwene Henadaadi, yaahunduuza ekindi kicweka, okuruga aha nju ya Azaria okuhika aha Keekubo.
Palali mwene Uzai yaahunduuza aharikureebana n'Akeekubo, n'aha munaara ogukwataine n'enju y'omugabe ey'aharuguru, omu kibuga ky'abarinzi.

Yaakuratwa Pedaya mwene Paroshi n'abaheereza b'omuri hekalu, abaabaire batwire Ofeli, baahunduuza okuhika ahashungaine n'eirembo ry'amaizi aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, n'omunaara ogukwataine n'orwo rugo.
Haataho aba Tekoa, baahunduuza ekindi kicweka ekirikureebana n'omunaara muhango ogukwataine n'orwo rugo, okuhika aha rugo rwa Ofeli.
Baakuratwa Zadoki mwene Imeri; yaahunduuza aharikureebana n'enju ye. Haataho Shemaaya, mwene Shekania, omurinzi w'eirembo ry'oburugwa-izooba, nawe yaahunduuza.
Haataho Hanania mwene Shelemia, na Hanuni mutabani wa Zalafu owa mukaaga, baahunduuza ekindi kicweka. Haataho Meshulaamu mwene Berekia, yaahunduuza ahashungaine n'ekishengye kye.

Yaakuratwa Malukiya, omwe aha baheesi b'ezaabu; yaahunduuza okuhika aha nju y'abaheereza by'omuri hekalu, n'ey'abashuubuzi, aharikureebana n'eirembo ry'eiteeraniro, n'okuhika aha kishengye kya ruguru eky'aha Keekubo.
Kandi abaheesi b'ezaabu n'abashubuuzi baahunduuza ahagati y'ekyo kishengye ekya ruguru eky'aha keekubo n'eirembo ry'entaama.

Yaagambira omu maisho ga beene ishe, n'omu maisho g'eihe rya Samaria, ati: Ziriya ntakimazire z'Abayudaaya nizikora ki? Nibenda kweyombekyera ekigo? Nibenda kutamba ebitambo? nibenda kwombeka ngu baherezeho? Nibabaasa kutabuura emabaare omu mituumo y'ebyasheenyukire, haza gaabaire gaahiire?
Reero Tobia, owaabaire amuri aha rubaju, nawe yaagira ati: N'ekya buzima! Orwo rugo rwabo rw'amabaare, oru barikwombeka, muha ku ekurwemereraho, ekaarubandika ahansi.
Ntyo naashaba ningira nti: Ai Ruhanga waitu, hurira; ahabw'okuba tugayirwe. Ebijumo ebi batujumire, obibagarureho, kandi obaheyo, batwarwe omu ndiijo nsi bari enkwatwa, banyagirweyo.
Otashwekyerera orubanja rwabo, kandi n'ekibi kyabo kitaragazibwa omu maisho gaawe; ahakuba bakugwisiize kubi omu maisho g'abombeki.
Tutyo twayombeka orugo, twaruteerana rwona, rwahika rwagati; ahabw'okuba abantu bakeezirika baakora.
boona baagira enaama y'okuza kurwanisa Yerusaalemu, n'okugirabanisamu.
Kwonka itwe twashaba Ruhanga waitu, twataho abarinzi b'okurinda nyomushana na nyekiro.
Bwanyima Abayuda baagira bati: Abarikwekorera baahwa amaani, kandi ebisheenyuka bikiri bingi; n'ahabw'ekyo titurikubaasa kwombeka rugo.
Abazigu baitu baagira bati: Tibarikwija kukimanya, n'obu kwakuba okutureeba, okuhitsya obu turaabahikye ahagati, tukabaita, tukabazibira kukora.
Abayudaaya abaabaire batwire n'abo bazigu baitu ku baizire, baaguma nibatugambira, nangwa baahitsya emirundi ikumi, nibagira ngu abo bazigu nibaija kuruga hoona-hoona ahu batwire, batuteere.
Nikyo naateereire abantu omu buhanga enyima y'orugo, n'aha mitwe y'obubungo, nk'oku emiryango yaabo yaabaire eri, baine zaarurara n'amacumu n'amata.

Ku naayetegyereize, naimuka, naagambira abakungu n'abatware n'abandi boona nti: Mutabatiina. Mwijukye Mukama, omukuru kandi orikutiinisa, murwanirire beene waanyu, batabani baanyu, bahara baanyu, abakazi baanyu n'amaka gaanyu.

Okuruga ahari eryo izooba, ekicweka kimwe kya kabiri ky'abashaija bangye kyaguma aha murimo gw'okwombeka, kimwe kya kabiri ekindi kyakwata amacumu, engabo, amata n'ebijwaro by'ebyoma eby'okurwanisa; kandi abeebembezi baayemerera enyima y'ab'enju ya Yuda boona.
Abaabaire nibombeka orugo, n'abaabaire nibeekorera ebintu, buri muntu akaba akoresa omukono gumwe, ogundi guguma gukwaitse eby'okurwanisa.
Buri mwombeki weena akaba ayombeka ahagatiire rurara ye; kandi ow'okuteera eikondere anguma aha rubaju.
Kandi naagmbira abakungu n'abatware n'abandi boona nti: Omurimo ni muhango, guhikire hare, kandi itwe twenaganagire aha rugo, buri muntu ari hare na mugyenzi we.
Ei muraahurire eiraka ry'enzamba yoona, mube niyo mwairukira, mutushangye. Ruhanga waitu naija kuturwanirira.
Okwo nikwo twabaire tukora omurimo, ekicweka kyabo kimwe kikwata amacumu, okwiha omu kasheeshe nibutaagurikana okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, ahu enyonyoozi zireebekyera.
Omuri obwo bunaku naagaruka naagmbira abantu nti: Buri muntu n'omuhuuku we bagume baraare omuri Yerusaalemu, babone kuturinda nyekiro, n'okukora nyomushana.

N'ahabw'ekyo tihariho n'omwe omuriitwe owaabaire ajuura ebijwaro bye, yaaba nyowe, nari beene tata, nari abashaija bangye, n'obu baakuba abarinzi abaabaire bangyenda enyima; buri muntu akaba aza kutaha amaizi aine eky'okurwanisa kye omu ngaro.
ahakuba abamwe bakagira bati: Itwe na batabani baitu na bahara baitu turi baingi; ka tuze kushaka eby'okututunga.
Kandi abandi baagira bati: Nitukwatiriza emisiri yaitu, n'emizaabibu yaitu, n'amaju gaitu, ahabw'enjara, ngu tubone eby'okurya.
N'abandi baagira bati: Tugurize empiiha, twakwatiriza emisiri yaitu n'emizaabibu yaitu kuha omushoro gw'omugabe.

Haza itwe na beene waitu turi omubiri gumwe, n'abaana baitu nikyo kimwe n'abaabo; mbwenu batabani baitu na bahara baitu nitubagyema kuba abahuuku n'abazaana; nangwa n'abamwe ahari bahara baitu babeereire kimwe abazaana, kandi titwine ky'okukora, ngu tubacungure, ahabw'okuba emisiri yaitu n'emizaabibu yaitu biinwe abandi.
Ku naahuriire okwetomboita kwabo n'ebigambo ebyo, naagira ekiniga kingi munonga.
Naagira enaama n'omutima gwangye, bwanyima naatonganisa abakungu n'abatware, naabagira nti: Nimwiha hari beene waanyu ekiteebwamu, buri muntu ahari mwene waabo.

Naateerana omutwe gw'abantu baingi kukibeemeza, naabagira nti: Itwe tukakora eki turikubaasa, twacungura beene waitu Abayudaaya abaabaire baguzirwe abanyamahanga; mbwenu imwe nimwenda kutunda beene waanyu; nimugira ngu, kihikire itwe kubagura? Baahunama, baabura eky'okugarukamu.
Naagaruka naagira nti: Eki murikukora ti kirungi. Ekirungi t'okugyendera omu kutiina Ruhanga waitu, mukareka kwejumisa omu banyamahanga abazigu baitu?
Kandi nyowe na beene waitu n'abashaija bangye nitubaguza empiiha n'eby'okurya; kwonka ka turekye kubashaba ekiteebwamu.

Na mbwenu eri izooba mubagarurire emisiri yaabo, emizaabibu yaabo, emizeituuni yaabo, n'amaju gaabo, kandi tubagarurire na kimwe kya igana eky'empiiha, engano, viinyo n'eky'amajuta, ebi mubaire nimubahaisa.

Baagarukamu nibagira bati: Twaza kubibagarurira, kandi titurikwija kugira ki twabahaisa. Nitwija kukora nk'oku waagamba. Ntyo naayeta abanyamurwa, naabarahiriza omu maisho g'abo bantu kuguma nibakora nk'oku baarahira.

Kandi naakunkumura omunagiro ogu naabaire nnagiire, naagira nti: Omuntu weena, oraabe atahikiriize egi ndagaano, Ruhanga amukunkumure atyo, amwihe omu nju ye n'omu murimo gwe. Abe nikwo yaakunkumurwa atyo, akahwaho. Omutwe gw'abantu abaabaire bateeraine baagira bati: Amiina, baahimbisa MUKAMA. Bwanyima abantu baakora nk'oku baaraganisa.

Kwonka abategyeki abambandiize bakaita kubi abantu, nibabatoijesa eby'okurya na viinyo, otabariireho shekeli z'efeeza makumi ana. Nangwa n'abagaragwa baabo bakaba batwaza abantu eikama. Kwonka nyowe tindatwarize ntyo ahabw'okutiina Ruhanga.
Kureka nkaba nyezirika kukora hari orwo rugo, kandi tihariho itaka ryona eri naatwaire; n'abashaija bangye boona bakaba bateeranirayo, bareetsirwe ogwo murimo.
Kandi aha meeza yangye hakaba hariiraho abashaija igana na makumi ataano, Abayudaaya n'abatware, otabariireho abaabaire baija ahariitwe, nibaruga omu mahanga agatwehinguririize.

Egobo y'eizooba rimwe ekaba eba ente emwe, n'entaama mukaaga ezitoorainwe; banteekyera n'enkoko, kandi buri biro ikumi efurebe za viinyo y'emiringo mingi; kwonka ebyo byona nkaba ntabitoijesa bantu nk'omutegyeki; ahabw'okuba obuhuuku bukaba bubaruhize.
Ai Ruhanga wangye, oijukye ebi naakoreire aba bantu byona, onzimuurire ebirungi.
Sanibalati na Geshemu ku baakihuriire bantumaho nigabira bati: Ija tubugaabuganire omu kirorero kimwe omu ruhita rwa Ono. Kwonka bakaba nibenda kuunyita.
Naanye nikwo kubatumaho entumwa, nkabagira nti: Ndi aha murimo muhango; tindikubaasa kushuuma okwo. Mbwenu omurimo gwemerere ngu nyizire okwo?
Bantumaho batyo kana, naanye nimbagarukamu ntyo.
Bwanyima Sanibalati yaagaruka yantumaho omuheereza we omurundi gwa kataano omu muringo ogwo, aine ebaruha eshashaaniwre omu ngaro ze.

Egyo baruha ekaba ehandiikirwemu ebigambo ebirikugira biti: Nikigambwa omu mahanga, kandi na Geshemu naakigamba, ngu iwe n'Abayudaaya nimwenda kugoma; ngu nikyo murikwobekyera orugo; kandi ngu, nooyenda kuba omugabe waabo, nk'oku kirikugambwa.
Kandi ngu, otaireho na baanabi b'okubuzya ebyawe omuri Yerusaalemu, ngu, Omuri Yuda harimu omugabe. Mbenu oije tuhanuure, ahabw'okuba ebyo bigambo tibiribura kugambirwa mugabe.
Naanye naamutumaho, nimmugira nti: Ebyo ebi waagamba tibikabahoga; kureka niiwe waabyegunzira omu mutima gwawe.
Boona bakaba nibagira batyo, ngu batutiinise, nibateekateeka ngu emikono yaitu neija kutentebuka, omurimo nigureka kukorwa. Kwonka nai Ruhanga, gumya emikono yangye.
Naamugarukamu nti: Omushaija nkaanye nimbaasa kuhunga? ni mushaija ki nkaanye orikubaasa kuhungira omuri hekalu, ngu akire? Tindikuzamu.
Ku naayetegyereize, naamanya ku atatumirwe Ruhanga, kureka ku yandaguraho atyo, ahabw'okuguriirirwa Tobia na Sanibalati.
Eki baamuguriririire, bakenda ngu antiinise, haza naanye nkore ntyo, nshiishe, ekiraarugyemu bangambeho kubi, banshekyerere.
Ai Ruhanga wangye, ijuka Tobia na Sanibalati, n'ebyo byona ebi barikukora, oijukye na nabikazi Noadia, na baanabi abandi boona, ababaire nibenda kuntiinisa.
Rutyo orugo rwahwa aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bitaano ky'okwezi Eluli omu biro makumi ataano na bibiri.

Bwanyima abazigu baitu boona ku baakihuriire, n'amahanga goona agatwehinguririize gaakireeba, baatiina, baahwera kimwe eishaija, ahabw'okuba bakareeba ngu ogwo murimo gukozirwe ahabw'okuhwerwa Ruhanga waitu.
Kandi omu biro ebyo abakungu b'Abayudaaya bakatwekyera Tobia ebaruha nyingi, n'eza Tobia zaabahikaho.
Ahabw'okuba baingi omuri Yuda bakaragaana nawe endagaano ahabw'okuba mukwe wa Shekania mwene Aara, kandi n'omutabani Yehohanani akaba ashweire muhara wa Meshulaamu mwene Berekia.
Kandi baagambira omu maisho gangye ebirungi ebi akora, baagaruka baamugambira n'ebigambo byangye. Atyo Tobia yaaguma nantwekyera ebaruha z'okuntiinisa.
naaha mwene tata Hanani na Hanania omukuru w'ekigo obukuru bw'okutegyeka Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba akaba ari omuntu orikwesigwa kandi orikutiina Ruhanga okukira abandi baingi.

Bwanyima naabagira nti: Enyigi za Yerusaalemu zigume zirekye kwigurwa omushana gutakajwire; bagume bazikingye, abarizi bakyemereireho, baziteho empimbi; kandi mugume muteho abarinzi b'omu bantu ba Yerusaalemu, buri muntu mumute omu mwanya gwe, aharikureebana n'enju ye.
Orurembo rukaba ruri ruhango kandi rugarami, kwonka abantu baamwo bakaba bari bakye, n'amaju gaarwo gatakombekirwe.
Bakaija na Zerubabeeli, Yeshua, Nehemia, Azaria, Raamia, Nahamaani, Morodekai, Bilushaani, Biguvai, Nehumu na Baana.
Omubaro gw'abashaija b'Abaisraeli nigwo ogu:
beene Paroshi enkumi ibiri na igana na makumi mushanju na babiri.
Beene Shefatia, magana mushanju na makumi mushanju na babiri.
Beene Aara, magana mukaaga na makumi ataano na babiri.
Beene Pehasi-moabu, nibo beene Yeshua na Yoabu, enkumi ibiri na magana munaana na ikumi na munaana.
Beene Elamu, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ataano na bana.
Beene Zaatu, magana munaana na makumi ana na bataano.
Beene Zekai, magana mushanju na makumi mukaaga.
Beene Binui, magana mukaaga na makumi ana na munaana.
Beene Bebai, magana mukaaga na makumi abiri na munaana.
Beene Azigaadi, enkumi ibiri na magana ashatu na makumi abiri na babiri.
Beene Adoni-kaamu, magana mukaaga na makumi mukaaga na mushanju.
Beene Viguvai, enkumi ibiri na makumi mukaaga na mushanju.
Beene Adini, magana mukaaga na makumi ataano na bataano.
Beene Ateeri, nibo ba Hezekia, makumi mwenda na munaana.
Beene Hashumu, magana ashatu na makumi abiri na munaana.
Beene Bezai, magana ashatu na makumi abiri na bana.
Beene Harifu, igana na ikumi na babiri.
Beene Gibeoni, makumi mwenda na bataano.
Abashaija ba Betelehemu na Netofa, igana na makumi munaana na munaana.
Abashaija ba Anatoosi, igana na makumi abiri na munaana.
Abashaija ba Besi-azimaveesi, makumi ana na babiri.
Abashaija ba Kirayasi-yarimu, Kefira na Beeroosi, magana mushanju na makumi ana na bashatu.
Abashaija ba Raama na Geeba, magana mukaaga na makumi abiri n'omwe.
Beene Mikimaasi, igana na makumi abiri na babiri.
Abashaija ba Beseeli na Ai, igana na makumi abiri na bashatu.
Abashaija ba Neebo endiijo, makumi ataano na babiri.
Beene Elaamu ondiijo, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ataano na bana.
Beene Harimu, magana ashatu na makumi abiri.
Beene Yeriko magana ashatu na makumi ana na bataano.
Beene Loodi, Hadidi na Ono, magana mushanju na makumi abiri n'omwe.
Beene Senaha, enkumi ishatu na magana mwenda na makumi ashatu.
Abanyamurwa n'aba: beene Yedaaya ab'omu nju ya Yeshua, magana mwenda na makumi mushanju na bashatu.
Beene Imeri, rukumi na magana ataano na babiri.
Beene Pashihuuri, rukumi na magana abiri na makumi ana na mushanju.
Beene Harimu, rukumi na ikumi na mushanju.
Abeeshongozi beene Asafu, igana na makumi ana na munaana.
Abakumiirizi: beene Shalumu, beene Ateeri, beene Talumooni, beene Akubu, beene Hatita na beene Shobai, igana na makumi ashatu na munaana.
Abaheereza b'omuri hekalu bakaba bari aba: beene Ziiha, beene Hasufa, beene Tabaosi,
beene Kerosi, beene Siaha, beene Padoni,
beene Lebana, beene Hagaba, beene Shalumai,
beene Hanani, beene Gideli, beene Gahaari,
beene Reaya, beene Rezini, beene Nekoda,
beene Gazamu, beene Uzza, beene Pasea,
beene Besai, beene Meunimu, beene Nefushesimu,
beene Bakibuki, beene Hakufa, beene Harihuri,
beene Baziluusi, beene Mehida, beene Harisha,
beene Barikoosi, beene Sisera, beene Teema,
beene Nezia, na beene Hatifa.
Batabani b'abagaragwa ba Sulemaani: beene Sotai, beene Soferesi, beene Perida,
beene Yaala, beene Darikoni, beene Gideli,
beene Shefatia, beene Hatili, beene Pokeresi-hazebaimu, na beene Amoni.
Abaheereza b'omuri hekalu boona na batabani b'abagaragwa ba Sulemaani bakaba bari magana ashatu na makumi mwenda na babiri.
Kandi aba nibo baarugire Telimeela, Teliharasha, Kerubu, Adoni na Imeri, kwonka tibarabaasize kworeka maju ga baishenkurubo, nari obukomooko bwabo, kuhamya ku bari Abaisraeli buzima;
beene Delaaya, beene Tobia, na beene Nekoda, magana mukaaga na makumi ana na babiri.
Kandi ab'omu banyamurwa; beene Hobaaya, beene Hakozi, na beene Baruzilai, owaashweire omukazi ow'omuri bahara ba Baruzilai owa Gileadi, akeetererwa eiziina ryabo.

Abo bakasheura amaziina gaabo omu baahandiikirwe nk'okukuratana kw'oruzaaro rwa baishenkurubo oku kwabaire kuri, kwonka tigaareebekamu; nikyo baateekateekyeirwe kuba abatashemeire, bakazibirwa kukora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa;
