omutegyeki omukuru yaabaragiira ngu barekye kurya aha by'okurya ebirikwera, okuhitsya obu haribaho omunyamurwa oine Urimu na Tumimu.
Omutwe gw'abo bantu boona gukaba guri obukumi buna n'enkumi ibiri na magana ashatu na makumi mukaaga,

otabariiremu abahuuku baabo n'abazaana baabo, abu omubaro gwabo gwabaire guri enkumi mushanju na magana ashatu na makumi ashatu na mushanju; kandi bakaba baine abeeshongozi, abashaija n'abakazi, magana abiri na makumi ana na bataano.
Embaraasi zaabo zikaba ziri magana mushanju na makumi ashatu na mukaaga, enyumbu magana abiri na makumi ana na itaano,
engamira magana ana na makumi ashatu na itaano, n'endogoya enkumi mukaaga na magana mushanju na makumi abiri.

Kandi bamwe ab'omu bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo baahayo eby'okuhwera omurimo. Omutegyeki yaata omu ibiikiro dariki z'ezaabu rukumi, enyabya makumi ataano, n'ebijwaro by'abanyamurwa magana ataano na makumi ashatu.
N'abamwe ab'omu bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo baata omu ibiikiro ry'empiiha z'omurimo dariki z'ezaabu obukumi bubiri, na miina z'efeeza enkumi ibiri na magana abiri.
Ebi abandi bantu baahaireyo bikaba biri dariki z'ezaabu obukumi bubiri, miina z'efeeza enkumi ibiri, n'ebijwaro by'abanyamurwa makumi mukaaga na mushanju.

Batyo abanyamurwa, Abaleevi, abakumirizi, abeeshongozi, abamwe omu bantu, abaheereza b'omuri hekalu, n'Abaisraeli boona, baatuura omu ndembo zaabo. Okwezi kwa mushanju ku kwahikire, Abaisraeli baashangwa batwire omu ndembo zaabo.
Aha kiro ky'okubanza ky'okwezi kwa mushanju Ezera omunyamurwa yaareeta ekyo kitabo ky'Ebiragiro omu maisho g'omutwe gw'abashaija n'abakazi, boona abaabaire nibabaasa kuhurira, bakeetegyereza.

Yaashoma ebirimu, ayorekyeire ekibuga ekiri omu maisho g'eirembo ry'Amaizi, okwiha omu kasheeshe kare okuhitsya omu ihangwe, abashaija n'abakazi n'abandi abrikubaasa kwetegyereza bariho; kandi abantu boona baatega amatu kuhurira eby'omuri ekyo kitabo ky'Ebiragiro.

Kandi Ezera omuhandiiki yaayemerera aha kituuti ky'embaaho, eki baabaire bakozire ahabw'ogwo murimo; aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo haayemereraho Matisia, Sheema, Anaya, Uriya, Hilukia na Maaseya; n'aha rwa bumosho, Pedaaya, Mishaeli, Malikiya, Hashumu, Hashibadana, Zekaria na Meshulaamu.
Atyo Ezera yaashuuruurira ekitabo omu maisho g'abantu boona, ahakuba akaba ari ahatunguukire naabeeshumba; ku yaakishuurwire, abantu boona baayemerera.
Ezera yaasiima MUKAMA Ruhanga omukuru, n'abantu boona baikiriza nibaimutsya emikono yaabo, nibagira bati: Amiina, Amiina; bainika emitwe yaabo, baaramya MUKAMA bajuumaire ahansi.
Baashoma omu kitabo ky'Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga omu iraka eririkuhurirwa gye, baabishoboorora; n'ahabw'ekyo abantu baayetegyereza ebyashomwa.

Bwanyima yaabagira ati: Mwirooko murye ez'ebishaju, munywe ebirikunuriirira, mutwekyere abataine obabisiire egabo; ahakuba eri izooba n'eryereziibwe Mukama waitu; kandi murekye kushaasha, ahabw'eokuba okushemerererwa omuri MUKAMA nigo maani gaanyu.
Batyo Abaleevi baahunamya abantu boona nibagira bati: Mucureere, ahakuba eizooba eri n'eririkwera; murekye kushaasha.
Bwanyima abantu boona baayaabuuka, baaza kurya n'okunywa kandi n'okutwekyera bagyenzi baabo egabo, n'okushemererwa munonga, ahabw'okushoborokyerwa ebigambo ebi baagambirwa.
Aha kiro kya kabiri abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkuru ab'eihanga ryona, hamwe n'abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, baateeranira ahari Ezera omuhandiiki kuhurira ebigambo by'omu Biragiro.
Baashanga bihandiikirwe omu Biragiro, ebi MUKAMA yaaragiire naaraba omuri Musa, ngu Abaisraeli baryaguma nibaraara omu nsiisira omu bugyenyi bw'okwezi kwa mushanju,

kandi baryaguma babirangye, babibuzye omu ndembo zaabo zoona n'omuri Yerusaalemu, nibagira bati: Mwirooko muze omu bibungo, mureete amataagi g'emizeituuni, n'ag'emizeituuni ey'omu ishwa, n'ag'emikadasi, n'ag'emikindo, n'ag'ebiti by'amababi gashakambire, mukore ensiisira, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe.

Batyo abantu baagyenda, baareeta amataagi, baayeyombekyera ensiisira, buri muntu aha mutwe gw'enju ye, n'omu bibuga byabo, n'omu bikaari by'enju ya Ruhanga, n'omu kibuga ky'aha Irembo ry'Amaizi, kandi n'omu kibuga ky'aha irembo rya Efuraimu.

Omutwe gwona ogw'abaarugire omu bukwatwa baayombeka ensiisira, baaziraaramu; ahakubakwiha omu biro bya Yoshua mwene Nuuni okuhitsya ahari eryo izooba Abaisraeli bakaba batakakitwazaga batyo. Haabaho okushemererwa kwingi munonga.

Kandi okwiha aha kiro ky'okubanza okuhitsya aha ky'aha muheru, Ezera akaba ashoma ekitabo ky'Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga buri izooba. Batyo baamara ebiro mushanju omuri obwo bugyenyi; aha kya munaana haabaho okuteerana okurikwera, nk'oku ekiragiro kyabaire kiri.
Kandi Abaisraeli baayetaanisa n'abanyamahanga boona, baayemerera, baayatura ebibi byabo, n'eby'okushiisha bya baishenkurubo.

Baayemerera omu mwanya gwabo, baamara ekicweka kimwe kya kana ky'eizooba nibashoma ekitabo ky'Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo; kandi ekindi kicweka kimwe kya kana baakimara nibaatura ebibi byabo, nibaramya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo.
Bwanyima Yeshua, Baani, Kadimieli, Sebania, Buuni, Sherebia, Baani na Kenani, baayemerera aha matembero g'Abaleevi, baatakira MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo n'eiraka rihango.

Bwanyima Abaleevi, Yeshua, Kadimieli, Baani, Hashabuneya, Sherebia, Hodia, Shebania na Pesahia, baagira bati: Mwimukye, musiime MUKAMA, oba Ruhanga waanyu okwiha ira ryona okuhitsya ebiro byona, nimugira muti: Eiziina ryawe ery'ekitiinisa, eririkukira okusiimwa kwona n'okusingizibwa kwona, rihimbisibwe.
Niiwe MUKAMA, Ruhanga owaatooraine Abramu, okamwiha omuri Uuri ey'Abakaludaaya, okamweta eiziina Abrahamu;

okashanga aine omutima ogurikwesigwa omu maisho gaawe, okaragaana nawe endagaano y'okuha abaijukuru ensi y'Abanyakanaani, ey'Abahiiti, ey'Abaamori, ey'Abaperizi, ey'Abayebusi n'ey'Abagirugashi; kandi ebyo ebi waaraganiise okabihikiiriza, ahabw'okuba ori ohikiriire.
Bwanyima waareeba okubonabonesibwa kwa baatatenkuriitwe bari Misri, waahurira okutaka kwabo bari aha Nyanja erikutukura,

waayoreka obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebi waakozire ahari Faraho n'abagaragwa be n'abantu b'omu nsi ye boona; ahabw'okuba okamanya oku baagizire baatatenkuriitwe n'amaryo; ekyarugiremu waayetungira eiziina rugambwa, nk'oku kiri na hati.
Bwanyima waataanisamu enyanja habiri omu maisho gaabo, baaraba ahagati yaayo hoomire, kwonka abaabaire babakuratiire waabanaga ahagati y'amaizi, baatobera omu maizi maingi nk'eibaare.
Kandi nyomushana okaba obeebembera n'enyomyo y'ekicu, na nyekiro obeebembera n'enyomyo y'omuriro, kubamurikira omuhanda ogu bashemereire kutoora.
Okashuuma aha rushozi Sinai, waagamba nabo nooyema omu iguru, waabateeraho emigyenzo ehikire n'ebiragiro by'amazima, ebyatairweho ebirungi, n'ebyaragiirwe;
waabamanyisa sabato yaawe erikwera, waabaragiira nooraba omu mwiru waawe Musa ebiragiro n'ebyatairweho, byaba ebiragiro byawe.
Ku baagizire enjara, waabaha eby'okurya ebirikuruga omu iguru; ku baagizire eiriho, waabaihira amaizi omu rukiri, waabaragiira kuza omu nsi ei waarahiire kubaha, ngu bagikubuure.

baayanga kuhurira, kandi tibaijuka by'okutangaaza ebi waakoreire omuribo; kureka baagangaaza ebitsya byabo, kandi ahabw'obugomi bwabo baayeteeraho omwebembezi, ngu bagarukye Misri omu buhuuku bwabo. Kwonka Iwe ori Ruhanga oyeteekateekire kusaasira, oine embabazi n'esaasi, otarahuka kuguubwa kubi, kureka ogira okukunda okutaruga ha rugyero; torabarekire.
Nangwa n'obu baayeheeshera ekishushani ky'enyana bakagira bati: Ogu niwe Ruhanga waanyu, owaabaihire omu nsi ya Misri, bakakora ebirikukugwisa kubi ebirengyesereize,

kwonka Iwe ahabw'embabazi zaawe nyingi torabatsigireho bari omu ihamba; enyomyo y'ekicu ey'okubeebembera omu muhanda nyomushana ekaba etabaruga mumaisho, n'obu yaakuba ey'omuriro kubamurikira nyekiro kubooreka ei baraatoore.
Waabaha Omwoyo waawe omurungi kubeegyesa, kandi tiwaabaima maanu yaawe kubura eky'okurya, waabaha amaizi kubatambira eiriho.
Waabatungira omu ihamba okumara emyaka makumi ana, tibaagira ki baakyena; ebijwaro byabo tibyakura, n'ebigyere byabo tibyazimba.
Waabaha ensi z'abagabe, n'amahanga nk'oku emigabo yaabo yaabaire eri; batyo baakubuura ensi ya Sihooni omugabe wa Heshibooni, n'eya Ogi omugabe wa Bashani.
Waakanyisa oruzaaro rwabo, rwaba nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, waabahitsya omu nsi ei waagambiire baishenkurubo ku barigizamu, bakagikubuura.

Batyo baijukuru baabo baaza omuri egyo nsi, baagikubuura; Abanyakanaani abatuuzi b'omuri egyo nsi, waabasingurira omu maisho gaabo, waabahayo omu mikono yaabo hamwe n'abagabe baabo n'abantu baamwo, kubagira nk'oku barikwenda.

Bwanyima baakwata endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare, n'ensi ezirikweza munonga, baakubuura amaju agaijwire ebintu byona ebirungi, n'amaziba agafukwire, n'emisiri y'emizaabibu n'ey'emizeituuni n'ey'ebiti bingi ebirikwana ebijuma; batyo baarya, baahaaga, baagomoka, baashemerererwa omu burungi bwawe bwingi.

Nikyo waabaheereireyo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo, bakabaita kubi; kwonka omu biro by'obusaasi bakaba bakutakira, obahurira oyemi omu iguru, kandi nk'oku embabazi zaawe ziba nyingi, obaha ab'okubajuna, babaiha omu mikono y'abazigu baabo.

Kwonka ku baabaire bamara ebiro baagira obusingye, bagaruka bakora ebi orikwanga; nikyo waabaire obarekyera omu mikono y'abazigu baabo, bakabatwara; kwonka ku baabaire bahinduka, baakutakira, obahurira oyemi omu iguru, emirundi mingi obajuna, nk'oku embabazi zaawe ziri.

Okaba obateisa, ngu obone kubagarura, boorobere ebiragiro byawe. Kwonka bagira amaryo, banga kubyorobera, bashiisha ebiragiro ebi waaragiire, haza biri ebi omuntu yaakukozire, bikamubaisaho, batunika amabega gaabo, bagangaaza ebitsya, banga kuhurira.
Obagumisiririza emyaka mingi, obateisa n'Omwoyo waawe noogambira omuri baanabi baawe; kwonka banga kutega amatu kuhurira. Nikyo waabaire obaheerayo omu mikono y'amahanga g'omu nsi ezo.
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, torabamariireho kimwe ahabw'embabazi zaawe, kandi torabatsigireho; ahabw'okuba ori Ruhanga ow'embabazi n'okusaasira.
Kwonka omuri ebyo byona ebyatubaireho, okaguma ori ow'amazima; ahakuba Iwe okakora eby'obwesigwa, haza itwe twakora kubi.
Abagabe baitu, abanyiginya baitu, abanyamurwa baitu, na baatatenkuriitwe tibaroorobeire biragiro byawe, n'obu kwakuba okweta aha bi waaragiire n'ebi waabaire obateisa.

Ku baabaire bari omu bugabe bwabo, omu birungi bingi ebi waabahaire, n'omu nsi mpango kandi erikweza munonga, ei waataire omu maisho gaabo, tibaragikuheerereizemu, kandi tibararekire micwe yaabo emibi.
Mbwenu reeba, turi abahuuku na hati; turi abahuuku omu nsi ei waahaire baatatenkuriitwe kurya ebijuma byamwo n'ebirungi byamwo byona.

Emyaka yaamwo etungisa munonga abagabe abu waataireho kututegyeka ahabw'ebibi byaitu; kandi abo bagabe baine obushoboorozi aha mibiri yaitu n'aha matungo gaitu, kubikora nk'oku barikwenda; turi omu busaasi bwingi munonga.
Abaataireho akamanyiso nibo aba: Nehemia omutegyeki mwene Hakalia, Zedekia,
Seraaya, Azaria, Yeremia,
Pashihuuri, Amaria, Malikiya,
Hatushi, Shebania, Maluki,
Harimu, Meremoosi, Obadia,
Danieli, Ginesooni, Baruki,
Meshulaamu, Abiya, Miyamiini,
Maazia, Biligai, Shemaaya; abo bakaba bari abanyamurwa.
Abaleevi nibo aba: Yeshua mweene Azania, Binui ow'omuri beene Henadaadi, na Kadimieli;
na beene waabo n'aba, Shebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaya, Hanai,
Miika, Rehobu, Hashabia,
Zakuri, Sherebia, Shebania,
Hodia, Baani, na Beninu.
Abategyeki b'abantu nibo aba: Paroshi, Pahasi-moabu, Elamu, Zaatu, Baani,
Buuni, Azigaadi, Bebai,
Adoniya, Biguvai, Adini,
Ateri, Hezekia, Azuri,
Hodia, Hashumu, Bezai,
Harifu, Anatoosi, Nebai,
Magipiashi, Meshulaamu, Heziri,
Meshezabeeli, Zadoki Yadua,
Pelatia, Hanani, Anaya,
Hoshea, Hanania, Hashubu,
Haloheeshi, Piliha, Shobeki,
Rehumu, Hashabuna, Maaseya,
Ahia, Hanani, Anani,
Maluki, Harimu na Baana.

baakwatanisa na beene waabo n'abakungu baabo, baikiriza eby'omukyeeno n'endahiro, kugyendera omu biragiro bya Ruhanga, ebyahairwe Musa omugaragwa we, n'okworobera ebi MUKAMA, Mukama waitu, yaaragiire byona n'okubihikiiriza, hamwe n'emigyenzo n'eby'oburyo ebi yaataireho.
Kandi baagira bati: Titurishwererana na mahanga ag'omuri egi nsi;

kandi abanyamahnga b'omuri egi nsi, ku barireeta ebintu nari eby'okurya byona kubitunda aha kiro kya sabato, tituribigura ha kiro kya sabato, nari aha kiro kikuru kyona; kandi omu mwaka gwa mushanju turyaraaza ensi, turekye kugihinga, n'obu kwakuba okwihuza omuntu weena eibanja.

emigaati y'okumurikwa, empongano z'esaano ezihongwa obutoosha, ebitambo by'okwotsya ebitambwa buri izooba, eby'amasabato, eby'emboneko z'ameezi, eby'ebiro bikuru ebyatairweho, eby'ebintu ebirikwera, eby'empongano z'okwihaho ekibi ez'okurihiirira Abaisraeli, n'eby'emirimo yoona ey'omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu.

Kandi twateerera enteenyu abanyamurwa, Abaleevi n'abandi bantu, okumanya oku baraagume nibareeta enku omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu nk'omutoijo, nk'oku amaju aga baatatenkuriitwe gaabaire gari, omu bunaku obwatairweho buri mwaka, kuba ez'okuhemba aha itambiro rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'Ebiragiro.
Kandi twayemera kureeta emiganuro y'emisiri yaitu, n'ey'ebijuma byona ebya buri muti ebirikuriibwa, omu nju ya MUKAMA buri mwaka;

n'okureeta emijigaijo ya batabani baitu n'ey'amatungo gaitu, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'Ebiragiro, emijigaijo y'ente zaitu n'ey'entaama zaitu, kugireeta omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu, n'okugiha abanyamurwa abarikukorera omuri egyo nju omurimo gw'obuheereza,

kandi n'okuguma nitureeta omuganuro gw'ebiihuro byaitu, n'empongano ezizongazongiibwe, n'ebijuma ebirikuriibwa eby'aha miti ebirikuriibwa byona, na viinyo n'amajuta, nitubireetera abanyamurwa omu bishengye by'enju ya Ruhanga waitu, n'okuha Abaleevi ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi ky'ebyezire omu misiri yaitu; ahabw'okuba Abaleevi nibo batwara kimwe kya ikumi ky'emisiri y'endembo zaitu zoona.

Kandi Abaleevi ku bariba nibaheebwa kimwe kya ikumi, omunyamurwa, mwene Arooni, agume abeho; bwanyima Abaleevi nabo bareete kimwe kya ikumi ky'ebyo ebi baaheebwa omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu, babite omu bishengye by'enju y'eibiikiro.

Ahabw'okuba Abaisraeli n'Abaleevi baryaguma bareete empongano z'engano, viinyo n'amajuta, babite omu bishengye, ebirimu ebintu by'Omwanya ogurikwera, bibe eby'abanyamurwa abarikuheereza n'abakumiirizi n'abeeshongozi. Titurireka kuta omutima aha nju ya Ruhanga waitu.
Abantu baasiima abashaija boona abaayehaireyo n'omutima gwekundiire kutuura Yerusaalemu.

Omuri Yerusaalemu hakaba harimu bamwe omu Bayuda n'omu Babenyamiini. Omuri beene Yuda, Ataaya mwene Uziya, mwijukuru wa Zekaria, Zekaria ya Amaria, Amaria ya Shefatia, Shefatia ya Mehalaleeli, ow'omuri beene Pereezi;
na Maaseya mwene Baruki, mwijukuru wa Kolihoze, Kolihoze ya Hazaaya, Hazaaya ya Adaaya, Adaaya ya Yoyaribu, Yoyaribu ya Zekaria owa Shiilo.
Beene Pereezi boona abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu bakaba bari abashaija amamanzi magana ana na makumi mukaaga na munaana.
Kandi aba nibo beene Benyamiini: Saalu mwene Meshulaamu mwijukuru wa Yoedi, Yoedi ya Pedaaya, Pedaaya ya Kolaaya, Kolaaya ya Maaseya, Maaseya ya Ityeli, Ityeli ya Yeshaaya,
Yaakuratwa Gabai, na Salai, boona magana mwenda na makumi abiri na munaana.
Yoeli mwene Zikuri akaba ari omureeberezi waabo; kandi Yuda mwene Hasenua ari owa kabiri omu bategyeki b'orurembo.
Omu banyamurwa: Yedaaya mwene Yoyaribu, Yakiini,
Seraya mwene Hilukia, mwijukuru wa Meshulaamu, Meshulaamu ya Zadoki, Zadoki ya Merayosi, Merayosi ya Ahitubu, omutegyeki w'enju ya Ruhanga,

hamwe na beene waabo abaabaire nibakora omurimo gw'enju, boona magana abiri na makumi abiri na babiri; kandi na Adaya mwene Yerohaamu, mwijukuru wa Pelalia, Pelalia ya Amuzi, Amuzi ya Zekaria, Zekaria ya Pashihuuri, Pashihuuri ya Malukiya,

hamwe na beene ishe, abategyeki b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, boona magana abiri na makumi ana na babiri; kandi na Amashisai mwene Azareeli, mwijukuru wa Ahazai, Ahazai ya Mehsilemoosi, Meshilemoosi ya Imeri,
hamwe na beene ishe, abashaija b'amaani amamanzi igana na makumi abiri na munaana; kandi omureeberezi waabo akaba ari Zabudieli mwene Hagedolimu.
Kandi omu Baleevi: Shemaaya mwene Hashubu, mwijukuru wa Azurikaamu, Azurikaamu ya Hashabia, Hashabia ya Buuni,
kandi na Shebatai na Yoazabaadi ab'omu bategyeki ba'omu Baleevi, abaabaire bareeberera emirimo y'enju ya Ruhanga ey'aheeru;

kandi na Matania mwene Miika, mwijukuru wa Zabudi, Zabudi ya Asafu, owaabaire ari omutegyeki w'okwebembera abarikuhimbisa omu kushaba, na Bakibukia owaabaire ari owa kabiri ahari beene ishe, na Abuda mwene Shamua, mwijukuru wa Galali, Galali ya Yedusuuni.
Abaleevi boona ab'omu rurembo orurikwera bakaba bari magana abiri na makumi munaana na bana.
Kandi abakumiirizi Akubu, Talumooni na beene waabo, abaabaire barinda amarembo, boona bakaba bari igana na makumi mushanju na babiri.
Abandi Baisraeli boona n'abandi banyamurwa n'Abaleevi, bakaba batwire omu ndembo za Yuda zoona buri muntu omu buhunguzi bwe.
Kwonka abaheereza b'omuri hekalu bakaba batwire Ofeli, nibareebererwa Ziiha na Gishupa.

Omureeberezi w'Abaleevi omuri Yerusaalemu akaba ari Uuzi mwene Baani, mwijukuru wa Hashabia, Hashabia ya Matania, Matania ya Miika ow'omuri beene Asafu, abeeshongozi, abaabaire bareeberera omurimo gw'enju ya Ruhanga.
Ahabw'okuba omugabe akaba aragiire ebyabo, kandi agyereire abeeshongozi egabo ya buri izooba.
Kandi Pesahia mwene Meshezabeeli, ow'omuri beene Zeera, mwene Yuda, akaba ari omuntu w'omugabe owaabaire amuhwera omuri byona ebirikufa aha bantu.
Yeshua, Molada, Besi-peleti,
Hazarishuali, Beeri-sheba n'omu birorero byayo,
Zikulaagi, Mekona n'omu birorero byayo,
Enirimooni, Zoora, Yaramuusi,
Zanoa, Adulaamu n'omu birorero byayo, Lakishi n'emisiri yaayo, na Azaka n'omu birorero byayo. Nikwo bateire batyo ensiisira okuruga Beeri-sheba okuhika omu ruhanga rwa Hinoomu.
Ababenyamiini bakatuura okuruga Geeba n'okweyongyera omumaihso, Mikimaashi, Aiya, Beseeli n'omu birorero byayo,
Anatoosi, Noobu, Anania,
Hazora, Raama, Gitaimu,
Hadidi, Zeboimu, Nebalaati,
Loodi, na Ono, oruhanga rw'abanyamyoga.
Kandi ebicweka bimwe by'Abaleevi omuri Yuda bakateeranwa na Benyamiini.
Amaria, Maluki, Hatushi,
Shekani, a Rehumu, Meremoosi,
Ido, Ginesooni, Abiya,
Miyamiini, Maadia, Biliga,
Shemaaya, Yoyaribu, Yedaaya,
Saalu, Amoki, Hilukia, na Yedaaya. Abo nibo baabaire bari bakuru omu banyamurwa n'omuri beene waabo omu biro bya Yeshua.
Kandi Bakibukia na Uuno beene waabo bakaba beemerera nibareebana omu kushaba.
Yeshua akazaara Yoyakimu, Yoyakimu yaazaara Eliashibu, Eliashibu yaazaara Yoyada,
Yoyada yaazaara Yonasaani, na Yona saani yaazaara Yadua.
Abanyamurwa b'omu biro bya Yoyakimu abaabaire bari bakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, n'aba: ow'enju ya Seraaya akaba ari Meraaya, ow'eya Yeremia, ari Hanania,
ow'eya Ezera, ari Meshulaamu, ow'eya Amaria ari Yehohanani,
ow'eya Maluki ari Yonasaani, ow'eya Shebania ari Yosefu,
ow'eya Harimu ari Aduna, ow'eya Merayosi ari Helekai,
ow'eya Ido ari Zekaria, ow'eya Ginesooni ari Meshulaamu,
ow'eya Biya ari Zikiri, ow'eya Minyamiini owa Moadia, ari Pilutai,
ow'eya Biliga ari Shamua, ow'eya Shemaaya ari Yehonasani,
ow'eya Yoyaribu ari Matenai, ow'eya Yedaaya ari Uuzi,
ow'eya Salai ari Kalai, ow'eya Amoki ari Eberi,
ow'eya Hilukia ari Hashabia, n'ow'eya Yedaaya ari Netaneeli.
Omu biro bya Eliashibu, Yoyada, Yohanaani na Yadua, Abaleevi n'abanyamurwa bakaba bahandiikwa omu kitabo ky'amaziina g'abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo, okuhitsya omu busingye bwa Dario Omuperisi.
Na beene Leevi, abakuru b'amaju ga baishenkurubo bakaba bahandiikwa omu kitabo ky'eb'omu busingye okuhitsya omu biro bya Yohanaani mwene Eliashibu.

Kandi abakuru b'Abaleevi bakaba abari Hashabia, Sherebia, na Yeshua mwene Kadimieli, abaabaire bakwatanisa na beene waabo abaabaire beemerera nibareebana, kuhimbisa n'okusiima, nk'ekiragiro kya Daudi omushaija wa Ruhanga oku kyabaire kiri, nibakikora omu mbu zaabo.
Kandi Matania, Bakibukia, Obadia, Mehsulaamu, Talumooni na Akubu bakaba bari abakumiirizi, abaabaire barinda amaju g'amabiikiro g'aha marembo.
Abo nibo baabaire bariho omu biryo bya Yoyakimu mwene Yeshua, mwijukuru wa Yozadaaki, n'omu biro bya Nehemia omutegyeki na Ezera omunyamurwa, kandi omuhandiiki.
Kandi abaana b'abeeshongozi baateeranira hamwe nibaruga omu mpita ezeehinguririize Yerusaalemu n'omu birorero by'Abanetofa,
na Besi-gilugaali n'omu byaro bya Geeba na Azimavesi; ahabw'okuba abeeshongozi bakaba beeyombekyeire ebirorero embaju zoona eza Yerusaalemu.
Kandi abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi baayeyeza, baayeza n'abantu n'amarembo, n'orwo rugo rw'amabaare.

Bwanyima naatembya abakuru ba Yuda aha mutwe gw'orwo rugo, naabaganisa abantu omu mitwe ebiri mihango okugyenda aha mutwe gw'orugo bakurataine nibahimbisa. Omutwe gumwe gwatoora aha rubaju rwa buryo, gugyemire ow'Eirembo ry'orubungo;
baakuratwa Hoshaaya n'ekicweka ky'abakuru ba Yuda,
na Azaria, Ezera, Meshulaamu,
Yuda, Benyamiini, Shemaaya, Yeremia,
na batabani b'abanyamurwa abamwe baine amakondere, Zekaria, mwene Yonasaani, mwijukuru wa Shemaaya, Shemaaya ya Matania, Matania ya Mikaaya, Mikaaya ya Zikuri, mwene Asafu;
na beene waabo Shemaaya, Azareeli, Yuda na Hanani, baine ebirikugamba bya Daudi omushaija wa Ruhanga, beebembeirwe Ezera omuhandiiki.

Ku baahikire aha Irembo ry'enshuro, bainamuka bagyemire omu maihso gaabo, baatembera aha matembero agarikuza omu rurembo rwa Daudi, ahu orugo rwabaire nirwinamukira aharuguru y'enju ya Daudi, baahika aha Irembo ry'amaizi ery'oburugwa-izooba.

Ogundi mutwe gw'abarikugyenda nibahimbisa gwatoora aha rubaju rwa bumosho, naanye naagyenda mbakuratiire aha mutwe gw'orugo, nyine ekicweka ky'abantu, twatoora aha rubaju rw'omunaara gw'ebikoomi, twahika aha rugo ruhango,

bwanyima twaraba aha Irembo rya Efuraimu, n'aha Irembo rya ira, n'aha Irembo ry'eby'enyanja, n'aha munaara gwa Hananeeli, n'aha gwa Hameeya, twahika aha Irembo ry'entaama, twayemerera aha Irembo ry'abakumiirizi.
Etyo egyo mitwe yombi y'abantu abarikusiima yaayemerera omu nju ya Ruhanga, hamwe naanye n'ekicweka ky'abatware abu naabaire nyine,
n'abanyamurwa Eliakimu, Maaseya, Minyamiini, Mikaaya, Elio-enai, Zekaria na Hanania baine amakondere;
kandi na Maaseya, Shemaaya, Eleazaari, Uuzi, Yehohanani, Malikiya, Elamu na Ezeri. Kandi abeeshongozi baayeshongora n'amaraka mahango, nibeebemberwa Yezerahia.

Eryo izooba baatamba ebitambo bingi nibashemererwa; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akaba abahaire okushemererwa kwingi; kandi abakazi n'abaana bato nabo baashemererwa. Kyareetera akaari k'okushemererwa kw'omuri Yerusaalemu kuhuririrwa hare.
nibakora emirimo ya Ruhanga waabo n'okuhikiiriza eby'okweyeza; kandi abeeshongozi n'abakumiirizi nabo nikwo baabaire nibatwaza, nibakuratira ekiragiro kya Daudi n'eky'omutabani Sulemaani.
Ahabw'okuba ira omu biro bya Daudi na Asafu hakaba hariho omwebembezi w'abeeshongozi, n'ebyenshongoro by'okuhimbisa Ruhanga n'okumusiima.

Kandi omu biro bya Zerubabeeli n'omu bya Nehemia Abaisraeli boona bakaba bahayo emigabo ya buri izooba ahabw'abeeshongozi n'abakumiirizi; kandi baihaho eby'okubiikira Abaleevi, n'Abaleevi baihaho eby'okubiikira beene Arooni.
ahabw'okuba tibarabuganiise Baisraeli by'okurya na maizi, kureka bakaguriirira Balamu ngu abakyeene; kwona Ruhanga witu yaahindura ogwo mukyeeno kuba omugisha.
Abantu ku baahuriire Ebiragiro, baiha omu Baisraeli ekijwangye kyona ekirikukomooka omu banyamahanga.

akaba amushemereize ekishengye kihango, ekyabaire kibiikwamu ira empongano z'esaano, obubaane, ebirikukoresibwa, ebicweka bya kimwe kya ikumi eby'eby'okurya na viinyo n'amajuta, ebyabaire biragiirwa kuheebwa Abaleevi, abeeshongozi n'abakumiirizi, hamwe n'emitoijo erikutoijwa ahabw'abanyamurwa.

Kwonka obu ebyo byakorwa, nkaba ntari Yerusaalemu; ahabw'okuba omu mwaka gwa makumi ashatu n'ebiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Aruta-gizakiseesi omugabe wa Babulooni, nkaba ngiire ow'omugabe. Bwanyima ku haahingwireho ebiro, naashaba omugabe ngu anyohereze,
naagaruka Yerusaalemu; ku naahikireyo, naamanya ekibi eki Eliashibu yaakozire ahabw'okushemereza Tobia ekishengye omu bikaari by'enju ya Ruhanga.
Naagira ekiniga kingi, naahuruutura ebintu bya Tobia byona omuri ekyo kishengye, naabinaga aheeru.
Ntyo naaragiira ku bashemeza ebyo bishengye; bwanyima naagaruramu ebintu by'enju ya Ruhanga, hamwe n'empongano z'esaano n'obubaane.
Ntyo naahana abatware ningira nti: N'enki ekyareeteire enju ya Ruhanga kutsigwaho? Ahonaaho naateerana Abaleevi, naabagarura omu myanya yaabo.
Bwanyima aba Yuda boona baareeta kimwe kya ikumi ky'eby'okurya na viinyo n'amajuta, baabita omu mabiikiro.

Bwanyima naataho ababiiki aba kurinda amabiikiro: Shelemia omunyamurwa, Zadoki omuhandiiki na Pedaaya ow'omu Baleevi, nibahwerwa Hanani mwene Zakuri, mwijukuru wa Matania, ahakuba bakaba nibateekateekwa kuba abeesigwa; omurimo gwabo gukaba guri ogw'okugaburira beene waabo.
Ai Ruhanga wangye, onyijukye ahabw'ekyo, kandi otaragaza emirimo yangye emirungi ei nkoreire enju ya Ruhanga wangye, kandi n'omurimo ogurikukorerwa omuriyo.
Kandi n'abashaija ba Tuuro, abaabaire batwire omu rurembo, bakaba bareeta eby'enyanja, n'ebintu by'emiringo yoona, babiguza aba Yuda n'aba Yerusaalemu ahari sabato.
Ku naabireebire, naatonganisa abakungu ba Yuda, naabagira nti: Ahabw'enki nimukora ekibi ekirikushusha kiti, kushiisha eizooba rya sabato?
Na baashwenkuriimwe tikwo baakozire batyo, kikareetera Ruhanga waitu okutureetaho akabi aka koona, n'aha rurembo oru? Mbwenu imwe nimweyongyera kureeta ahari Israeli ekiniga ahabw'okushiisha sabato.
Bwanyima abashuubuzi n'abarikutunda ebintu by'emiringo yoona baaraara enyima ya Yerusaalemu ekiro kimwe nari bibiri.
Ku naabareebire, naabahana nimbagira nti: N'enki ekibaraarize enyima y'orugo? Ku muraagarukire, niinyija kubakwata. Okuruga obwo tibaagaruka kwija ahari sabato.

Kandi naaragiira Abaleevi kweyeza, ngu babone kwija kurinda amarembo, eizooba rya sabato rirekye kusiisikara. Ai Ruhanga wangye, onyijukye n'ahabw'ekyo, kandi onsaasire nk'embabazi zaawe nyingi oku ziri.
kandi abaana baabo bakaba bagamba orurimi rwabo nibarujwanzya n'orurimi rw'aba Ashidoodi, batarikubaasa kugamba gye Ruyudaaya, kureka bagambaho rumwe ahari ezo.
Ntyo naabatonganisa nimbajuma, nangwa na bamwe omuribo naabateera, naabamaanyura eishokye, naabarahiza omu iziina rya Ruhanga, nti: Mutarihingirana nabo, kandi naimwe mutaribashweramu.

Timurikumanya ku Sulemaani omugabe wa Israeli yaasiisire ahabw'abakazi nk'aba? N'obu haraabe hatarabaireho mugabe ondiijo owaashushaine nawe omu mahanga maingi, kandi Ruhanga we yaamukunzire, akamugira omugabe wa Israeli yoona, kwonak nawe abanyamahangakazi bakamusiisisa.
Mbwenu nimugira ngu nitwija kwikiriza ebyanyu, tukore ekibi ekirikwingana kiti, kushwera abanyamahangakazi?
Kandi omwe ahari batabani ba Yehoyada mwene Eliashibu omunyamurwa omukuru, akaba ari mukwe wa Sanibalati Omuhoroni; nikyo naamubingiire omu maisho gangye.
Ai Ruhanga wangye, ogume obaijukye, ahabw'okuba bakashiisha obunyamurwa, n'endagaano y'obunyamurwa n'ey'Abaleevi.
Kandi nkaragiira eby'okureeta emitoijo y'enku omu bunaku obutairweho, n'eby'emiganuro. Ai Ruhanga wangye, ogume onyijukye, onzimuurire ebirungi.
omu biro by'ogwo mugabe Ahasuero, ku yaabaire ari aha ngoma omuri Shushani orurembo orukuru,

omu mwaka gwe ogwa kashatu, akateeka obugyenyi, yaayeta abanyiginya be boona, abagaragwa be, abakuru b'amahe aba Buperisi na Bumeedi, abakungu hamwe n'abategyeki b'ago mashaza, baateeranira omu maisho ge,
yaamara ebiro igana na makumi munaana naayoreka eitungo ry'obugabe bwe, n'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwe ekyabaire kihinguraine.

Ebiro ebyo ku byahweire, yaateekyera abantu boona obugyenyi, abakuru n'abato abaabaire bari omuri orwo rurembo rukuru Shushani, bwamara ebiro mushanju omu kibuga ky'aha musiri gw'omu kikaari ky'omugabe.

Aho hakaba hakingireho emikingo y'emyenda erikwera, n'eya bururu, ehanikirwe aha bugoye bwa bafuta n'obwa bujwa buhamiibwe empeta z'efeeza aha nyomyo z'amabaare agarikwetwa maburo; kandi aha mabaare agaariire agarikutukura, agarikwera, aga kinekye n'agarikwiragura, baataho ebitanda by'ezaabu n'eby'efeeza.
Baabanywaisiza viinyo y'omugabe omu bintu by'ezaabu ebitarikushushana, yaatereka nyingi munonga, nk'obufura bw'omugabe oku bwabaire buri.
Abantu baanywa nk'oku ebiragiro byabaire biri, tihaabaho muntu owaagyemwa; ahabw'okuba omugabe akaba aragiire abatware b'ekikaari kye boona kuheereza omuntu weena nk'oku arikwenda.
N'omwigarire Vasita yaateekyera abakazi obugyenyi omu kikaari ky'omugabe Ahasuero.
kureeta omwigarire Vasita omu maisho ge, ajwaire ekirunga ky'obugabe, kworeka abantu n'abanyiginya oburungi bwe; ahabw'okuba akaba ari murungi w'okureebwa.
Kwonka omwigarire Vasita yaayanga kuhurira ekiragiro eki omugabe yaamutumireho abakonwa be ngu aije. Ekyo kyareetera omugabe ekiniga kingi, kyayenda kumubarura.

kandi abashaija abaabaire nibakurata omugabe omu kitiinisa, bakaba bari Karisheena, Shesaari, Adimaasa, Tarushiishi, Meresi, Mariseena na Memukaani, abanyiginya mushanju aba Buperisi na Bumeedi, abaabaire bari empika-mugabe, baine emyanya mikuru erikukira ey'abandi omu ihanga.)
Omugabe yaababuuza ati: Omu biragiro, tugire tuta omwigarire Vasita, oyangire kukora eki omugabe amutumireho abakonwa?

Memukaani yaagarukamu ari omu maisho g'omugabe n'abanyiginya ati: Omwigarire Vasita tacumwire ha mugabe wenka, kureka ashobize n'aha banyiginya boona n'amahanga goona agari omu mashaza g'omugabe Ahasuero goona.

Ahabw'okuba eki, eki omwigarire akozire, nikiija kumanywa abakazi boona, kibareetere kugaya baibabo, ahakuba nibaija kugira bati: Omugabe Ahasuero ka yaatumire omwigarire Vasita kwija mu maisho ge, akanga.

Kandi eri izooba abanyiginyakzi ba Buperisi na Bumeedi, abaahurira eki omwigarire akozire, nibaija kukigambira abanyiginya b'omugabe boona; ekiraarugyemu habeho okugayana kwingi n'okugirirana ekiniga.

Nyakusinga, ku oraabe nookisiima, omugabe ateho ekiragiro, ku Vasita atarigaruka omu maisho g'omugabe Ahasuero, kandi kihandiikwe omu biragiro by'Abaperisi n'Abameedi, kirekye kuhindurwa; bwanyima omwanya gwe gw'obwigarire omugabe aguhe ondiijo orikumuhitsa emicwe.
Kityo ekiragiro ky'omugabe ku kiraarangwe omu bugabe bwe bwona, nk'oku bwingana, abakazi boona nibaija kutiina baibabo, ab'ekitiinisa n'abatakiine.
Obwo bwengye bwasiimwa omugabe n'abanyiginya, omugabe yaatwaza nk'oku Memukaani yaamuhabwire.

Yaatweka ebaruha omu mashaza g'obugabe bwe bwona, omuri buri ishaza nk'oku emihandiikire yaaryo eri, kandi n'omuri buri ihanga omu rurimi rwaryo, ngu omushaija weena ashemereire kutegyeka eka ye, kandi ngu nawe akibuzye omu rurimi rw'eihanga rye.
Bwanyima y'ebyo, ekiniga ky'omugabe Ahasuero ku kyaikaikaine, yaijuka Vasita n'eki yaakozire, n'ekiragiro eki yaamuteereireho.
Bwanyima abagaragwa b'omugabe abaabaire nibamuheereza baamugira bati: Ka basherurire omugabe abaishiki barungi empangare.

Kandi omugabe ateho abatware omu mashaza goona ag'omu bugabe bwe, bateeranire hamwe empangare nungi zoona omu nju y'abakazi omu rurembo Shushani, babakwatse Hegai omukonwa w'omugabe, omurinzi w'abakazi; kandi baheebwe ebintu by'okwecuma.
Bwanyima omwishiki, ou omugabe arisiima, abe omwigarire omu mwanya gwa Vasita. Omugabe yaasiima egyo naama, yaatwaza atyo.
Omushaija ogwo akaba anyagirwe Yerusaalemu, atwairwe n'ezindi nkwatwa, na Yekonia omugabe wa Yuda, ou Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yaatwaire.

Morodekai ogwo akoorora Hadasa muhara wa ishento, niwe Esteeri; ahabw'okuba akaba ari efuuzi, ataine ishe na nyina; kandi ogwo mwishiki akaba akuzire gye, kandi ari murungi w'okureebwa. Ishe na nyina ku baaherize kufa, Morodekai yaamutwara, yaamworora nk'omwana we ou ayezaariire.

Bwanyima ekiragiro ky'omugabe ku kyaherize kubuga, abaishiki baingi baateeranirwa omu rurembo Shushani kurindwa Hegai; na Esteeri yaatwarwa omu kikaari ky'omugabe, yaakwatsibwa Hegai omurinzi w'abakazi.

Ogwo mwishiki yaasiimwa Hegai, yaamugiraho obuganzi. Hegai yaarahuka kumuha eby'okwecuma, n'egabo ye, n'abazaana mushanju abaarugire omu kikaari ky'omugabe, abu yaabaire ashemereire kuheebwa; yaamutoorana omu bandi, yaamutwara n'abazaana be, yaamuta omu mwanya ogurikukira oburungi omu nju y'abakazi.
Kandi Esteeri ogwo akaba atakagambaga ihanga rye, n'obu baakuba beene waabo; ahabw'okuba Morodekai akaba amwehanangiriize kutabigamba.
Kandi Morodekai akaba agyendagyenda obutoosha omu maisho g'ekikaari ky'enju y'abakazi, ngu amanye Esteeri oku ari, kandi n'oku ariba.

Kandi omwishiki ku yaabaire aheza ameezi ikumi n'abiri naayecuma nk'ebiragiro by'abakazi oku biri, akaba amurikirwa omugabe Ahasuero; ahakuba ameezi ago nigo gaabaire garagiirwa kwecumiramu, ameezi mukaaga nibeesiiga amajuta ga sumuruna, n'agandi mukaaga eby'emigaju n'amajuta ag'okwarika abakazi.
Omwishiki ku yaabaire aza kutaaha ow'omugabe, aheebwa ekintu kyona eki arikwenda omu nju y'abakazi kugyendana omu kikaari ky'omugabe.

Akaba azayo omu mwabazyo, agaruka omu kasheeshe, ataaha omu nju y'abakazi eya kabiri, akwatsibwa Shaashigazi omukonwa w'omugabe, owaabaire arinda ebinyanshunju; akaba atagaruka w'omugabe, kureka omugabe ku yaabaire amukunda, amweta naamugamba eiziina.

Bwanyima obunaku bwa Esteeri, muhara wa Abihaili, ishento wa Morodekai owaamworoire nk'omwana we, bw'okumurikirwa omugabe, bwahika. Ku baamwetsire, tiyaagira ki yaashaba, kureka eki yaasiimiirwe Hegai omukonwa w'omugabe kandi omurinzi w'abakazi. Atyo Esteeri yaasiimwa boona abaamureebire.
Kandi Esteeri yaatwarwa aha mugabe Ahasuero omu kikaari ky'omugabe omu kwezi kwa ikumi okurikwetwa Tebesi, omu mwaka gwe gwa mushanju agiire aha ngoma.

Omugabe ku yaareebire Esteeri, yaamukunda okukira abandi bakazi boona, Esteeri yaagirirwa embabazi omu maisho ge, kandi yaakundwa okukira ezo mpangare zoona; omugabe yaamujweka ekirunga aha mutwe, yaamugira omwigarire omu mwanya gwa Vasita.
Bwanyima omugabe yaateekyera abanyiginya be boona n'abagaragwa be obugyenyi bwingi munonga ahabwa Esteeri. Kandi yaasaasira amashaza ge goona omushoro, yaahereza ebiconco nk'omugabe.
Kandi abaishiki, ku baateerainwe obwa kabiri, Morodekai akaba ashutami aha irembo ry'omugabe;
(obwo Esteeri akaba atakagambaga beene waabo nari eihanga rye, nk'oku Morodekai yaabaire amwehanangiriize; ahabw'okuba Esteeri akaba ayorobera Morodekai, nk'oku yaabaire amworobera, naakimworora).
Enaama yaabo yaamanywa Morodekai, yaagigambira omwigarire Esteeri, omwigarire yaagimugambirira omugabe.
Ku baabibuuririize, baashanga biri kwo, abo bashaija bombi baahanikwa aha biti. Ekyo kyahandiikirwa omu maisho g'omugabe omu kitabo ky'ebyabaireho.

Abashaija b'omugabe boona abaabaire batuura aha irembo ry'omugabe, bakaba bamwinamira, bamutangirira; ahakuba omugabe nikwo yaabaire aragiire. Kwonka Morodekai we akaba atamwinamira, n'obu kwakuba okumutangirira.
Bwanyima abo bashaija b'omugabe baabuuza Morodekai ogwo bati: Ahabw'enki noohenda ekiragiro ky'omugabe?
Baaguma nibamuteisa buri izooba, yaayanga kubahurira, nabo nikwo kubigambira Hamani, ngu bareebe ku araabe naikiriza ebya Morodekai; ahabw'okuba akaba naayetonganira ngu n'Omuyudaaya.
Hamani ku yaareebire Morodekai ataamwinamira, n'obu kwakuba okumutangirira, yaagira ekiniga kingi.

Kwonka yaareeba okukwata Morodekai wenka, ku kitaine mugasho; ahabw'okuba bakaba bamugambiire eihanga rya Morodekai. N'ahabw'ekyo yaasherura oburyo bw'okucwekyereza Abayudaaya boona abaabaire bari omu bugabe bwona obwa Ahasuero, eihanga rya Morodekai.

Bwanyima Hamani yaagambira omugabe Ahasuero ati: Hariho eihanga eryataataine rikajanjaara omu mashaza g'omu bugabe bwawe goona; ebiragiro byaryo tibiri nk'eby'agandi mahanga, kandi tibarikworobera biragiro by'omugabe; n'ahabw'ekyo tikiine ki kirikugasira omugabe kurigumisiririza.

Nyakusinga omugabe, ku oraabe nookisiima, hateebweho ekiragiro kihandiikwe, bacwekyerezibwe; nyowe niinyija kuha etalanta z'efeeza kakumi, zaakiirwe abarikureeberera omurimo gw'omugabe, bazite omu mabiikiro ge.
Atyo omugabe yaajuura empeta y'akamanyiso ke, yaagiha Hamani mwene Hamedasa Omuagagi, omuzigu w'Abayudaaya.
Omugabe yaagira Hamani ati: Efeeza zaawe yegumire nazo, kandi eryo ihanga naarikuha, origire nk'oku orikwenda.

Ezo baruha zaatwarwa baamatarisi omu mashaza g'omugabe goona, nizigamba kucwekyereza, okwita n'okumaraho Abayudaaya boona, abato n'abakuru, abaana n'abakazi, aha izooba rimwe, aha kiro kya ikumi na bishatu kw'okwezi kwa ikumi n'abiri okurikwetwa Adari, kandi n'okunyaga ebintu byabo;
kandi ngu ebihandiikirwe omuri egyo baruha bishemereire kubugibwa omuri buri ishaza nk'ekiragiro, nibagambira amahanga goona kweteekatekyera eryo izooba.

Baamatarisi baagyenda nibeehuta ahabw'ekiragiro ky'omugabe, kandi ekyo kiragiro kyabugibwa omu rurembo rukuru Shushani. Omugabe na Hamani baashutama kwenywera, kwonka ab'omuri orwo rurembo Shushani baashoberwa.
Bwanyima yaaza aha irembo ry'omugabe, ahabw'okuba tihariho waabaire naikirizibwa kutaaha omu kikaari ajwaire ebiguniya.
Kandi omu mashaza goona, ei ekiragiro ky'omugabe kyabaire kihika, Abayudaaya bagira amaganya maingi, beesiibyakwo, barira nibaborooga, kandi abaingi omuribo babyama ahansi aha biguniya n'omu iju.
Bwanyima abazaana ba'omwigarire Esteeri, n'abakonwa be, baija, baabimugambira; yaagira obusaasi bwingi; yaayoherereza Morodekai ebijwaro by'okujwara, ngu ajuure ebiguniya; kwonak we yaabyanga.
Bwanyima Esteeri yaatuma kweta Hasaki, omwe aha bakonwa b'omugabe, ou omugabe yaabaire ataireho kumuheereza, yaamuragiira kuza ahari Morodekai kumubuuza ebibaireho n'ekibireetsire.
Atyo Hasaki yaagyenda, yaashanga Morodekai omu kibuga ky'orurembo, omu kangara-teete omu maisho g'eirembo ry'omugabe.
Morodekai yaamuteekyerereza ebimubaireho byona, n'omubaro gw'empiiha zoona ezi Hamani araganiise kuta omu ibiikiro ry'omugabe, ahabw'okucwekyereza Abayudaaya.

Kandi yaamuha ebigambo ebihandiikirwe omu kiragiro ekibugiibwe omuri Shushani, eky'okubacwekyereza, ngu abyorekye Esteeri, abimushobororere, amwehanangirize kuza aha mugabe kumweshengyereza n'okumushaba kukiza eihanga rye.
Hasaki yaagaruka ahari Esteeri, yaamugambira obutumwa bwa Morodekai.
Bwanyima Esteeri yaagaruka yaatuma Hasaki ahari Morodekai naamugira ati:

Abaheereza b'omugabe boona, n'abantu b'omu mashaza ge nibamanya ngu omuntu weena, yaaba mushaija nari omukazi, orikuza ow'omugabe omu kikaari ky'omunda ateetsirewe, hariho ekiragiro kimwe aha muntu nk'ogwo, nikwo kwitwa, kureka ou omugabe yaimukiza enkoni ye ey'ezaabu, ngu arekye kufa. Kandi naanye hahingwire ebiro makumi ashatu nteetsirwe kushanga omugabe.
Baagambira Morodekai ebigambo bya Esteeri.
Atyo Morodekai yaabagambira kugarukamu Esteeri bati: Otateekateeka ngu noija kuhonoka aha bandi Bayudaaya boona, ngu ahabw'okuba ori omuri nyaruju y'omugabe.

Omanye ngu, ku oraahuname omu biro ebi, eky'okuhuumuriza n'okukiza Abayudaaya nikiija kureetwa ahandi, kwonka iwe n'enju ya sho muryacwekyerera. N'oha orikumanya ekyakutaire aha ngoma, ku kutari kuhwera omu bunaku bw'akabi nk'obu?
Esteeri nawe yaabaragiira kugarukamu Morodekai ati:

Gyenda oteeranire hamwe Abayudaaya boona abari omu rurembo Shushani, mwesiibyekwo ahabwangye, mumare ebiro bishatu nyomushana na nyekiro, mutarikurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa. Naanye n'abazaana bangye twaza kwesiibyakwo nkaimwe. Bwanyima y'ebyo niinyija kuza ow'omugabe, n'obu kirabe kitari ky'ebiragiro; ku ndaabe ningwayo, ngweyo.
Atyo Morodekai yaayegyendera, yaakora ebi Esteeri yaamuragiira byona.

Aha kiro kya kashatu Esteeri yaajwara ebijwaro bye by'obwigarire, yaaza omu kibuga ky'omugabe eky'omunda, yaayemerera aharikureebana n'enju y'omugabe; kandi omugabe akaba ashutami aha kitebe ky'obugabe omuri nyaruju ye, aharikureebana n'eirembo eririkutaaha omu kibuga.
Omugabe ku yaarebire omwigarire Esteeri ayemereire omu kibuga, yaamushemerererwa, yaamwimukiza enkoni y'ezaabu eyaabaire eri omu ngaro ze. Atyo Esteeri yairira haihi, yaakora aha ifundo ryayo.
Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Omwigarire Esteeri, oine eki orikwenda? Nooshaba ki? Eki orikushaba kyona ninkikuha, n'obu kyakuba ekicweka ky'obugabe bwangye.
Esteeri yaagira ati: Nyakusinga omugabe, ku oraabe nookisiima, eri izooba oije na Hamani aha bugyenyi obu nkuteekateekyeire.
Omugabe yaagira ati: Nimwete Hamani juba, eki Esteeri arikwenda kikorwe. Atyo omugabe na Hamani baija aha bugyenyi obu Esteeri yaabaire abateekateekyeire.
Ku baabaire nibanywa viinyo, omugabe yaamugira ati: N'enki, Omwigarire Esteeri? nooshaba ki, okakiheebwa? Noija kukiheebwa, n'obu kiraabe ekicweka ky'obugabe bwangye.
Esteeri yaamugarukamu ati: Eki ndikushaba, kandi eki ndikwenda nikyo eki.

Ku ndaabe ndi ow'okugirirwa embabazi omu maisho g'omugabe, kandi omugabe ku araaba naakisiima kumpa eki ndikushaba, n'okuhikiiriza eki ndikwenda, omugabe na Hamani bagarukye nyencakare aha bugyenyi obu ndaabateekateekyere; obwo nibwo ndaakore eki omugabe yaagamba.
Kwonka yaagumisiriza, yaataaha omuka, yaatuma kweta banywani be n'omukazi we Zereshi;
yaabagambira ekitiinisa eki aine ahabw'obutungi bwe, abaana be ku bari baingi, na byona ebi omugabe amukurizemu, akamutunguura okukira abanyiginya n'abandi bagaragwa be.
Kandi Hamani yaagaruka yaagira ati: Nangwa n'omwigarire Esteeri tiyaayeta ondiijo kwija n'omugabe aha bugyenyi kureka nyowe nyenka. Kandi na hati yaanyeta n'omugabe aha bugyenyi nyencakare.
Kwonka ebyo byona tibiine ki birikungasira, ninkireeba ogwo Muyudaaya Morodekai ashutami omu irembo ry'omugabe.

Bwanyima Zereshi omukazi we n'abanywani be boona baamugira bati: Ka bakore ekiti ky'oburaingwa bwa mikono makumi ataano, kibyarwe; omu kasheeshe ogambire omugabe, bakihanikyeho Morodekai, obone kuza aha bugyenyi n'omugabe oshemereirwe. Egyo naama yaashemeza Hamani; yaabyara ekyo kiti.
Baashanga kihandiikirwemu ku Morodekai niwe yaaregire abashaija babiri b'omu bakonwa b'omugabe, abaabaire barinda omuryango gw'enju ye, Bigisaana na Tereshi, abaabaire nibenda kwita omugabe Ahasuero.

Omugabe yaabuuza ati: Beitu Morodekai ogwo hariho ekitiinisa nari obukuru, ebi arahairwe, nibamuzimuurira ekyo eki yaakozire? Abagaragwa b'omugabe abaabaire nibamuheereza, baagarukamu bati: Taine ki arakoreirwe.

Omugabe yaababuuza ati: N'oha ori omu kibuga? Kandi Hamani akaba yaahika ati omu kibuga eky'aheeru ky'ekikaari ky'omugabe, naaza kumugambira eby'okuhanika Morodekai ahari ekyo kiti, eki yaabaire amuteekateekyeire.
Batyo abagaragwa b'omugabe baamugira bati: Hamani niwe ayemereire omu kibuga, Nyakusinga. Omugabe yaagira ati: Mumurekye aije.

Atyo Hamani yaija; omugabe yaamugira ati: Tukorere ki omushaija ou omugabe arikusiima kuha ekitiinisa? Hamani yaagira omu mutima gwe ati: Ni muntu ki ogwo, ou omugabe arikusiima kuha ekitiinisa kukira nyowe?
Hamani nikwo kugarukamu omugabe ati: Omushaija ou omugabe arikusiima kuha ekitiinisa,
ka bareete bushuuti y'omugabe, ei omugabe ajwara, bareete n'embaraasi ei omugabe atemba, eine ekirunga ky'obugabe aha mutwe;

ebyo bijwaro n'egyo mbaraasi babikwatse omwe aha banyiginya b'omugabe abarikweshumba abandi, aije ajwekye ogwo mushaija ou omugabe arikusiima kuha ekitiinisa, amutembye embaraasi, amurabye omu kibuga kihango ky'orurembo amwebebembeire, naaranga ati: Oku nikwo omushaija weena araatwazibwe ou omugabe araasiime kuha ekitiinisa.

Ahonaaho omugabe yaagira Hamani ati: Rahuka oreete ebijwaro n'embaraasi, nk'oku waagamba, otwaze otyo Morodekai Omuyudaaya, oshutama aha irembo ry'omugabe. Otagira eki waatsiga ahari ebyo byona ebi waagamba.
Atyo Hamani yaihayo bushuuti n'embaraasi, yaajweka Morodekai, yaamurabya omu kibuga kihango ky'orurembo, naaranga ati: Oku nikwo omushaija weena aritwazibwa ou omugabe arisiima kuha ekitiinisa.
Bwanyima Morodekai yaagaruka aha irembo ry'omugabe; kwonka Hamani yaayehuuta, yaataaha owe ayetwekyereire aha mutwe naarira.

Yaateekyerereza omukazi we Zereshi na banywani be boona ebyamubaho. Abahi be b'obwengye n'omukazi we Zereshi baamugira bati: Morodekai ogwo, ou waatandika kufoobeera omu maisho ge, ku araabe ari ow'omu ihanga ry'Abayudaaya, torimubaasa, kureka noija kugwa omu maisho ge.
Ku baabaire nibakigamba nawe, abakonwa b'omugabe baija, baatwara Hamani aha bugyenyi obu Esteeri yaabaire ateekire nibeehuuta.
Batyo omugabe na Hamani baaza aha bugyenyi kurya n'omwigarire Esteeri.

Ahari ekyo kiro kya kabiri, ku baabaire nibanywa viinyo, omugabe yaagaruka yaabuuza Esteeri ati: Hari omwigarire Esteeri, nooshaba ki? noija kukiheebwa. N'enki eki orikwenda? Eki oraashabe kyona, n'obu kiraabe kiri ekicweka ky'obugabe bwangye, nikiija kuhikiirizibwa.

Omwigarire Esteeri yaagarukamu ati: Nyakusinga omugabe, ku ndaabe ndi ow'okugirirwa embabazi omu maisho gaawe, kandi ku oraabe nookisiima, ninkushaba amagara gangye, kandi ninkweshengyereza ahabwa beene waitu;

ahabw'okuba nyowe n'eihanga ryaitu, tuguzirwe ngu twitwe, tucwekyerezibwe, tumarweho. Nangwa kuri tuguzirwe ngu tube abahuuku n'abazaana, tiinyine ki naakugambire, n'obu omuzigu waitu atakubaasize kuriha ebi omugabe yaakufeereirwe.
Ahonaaho omugabe Ahasuero yaabuuza omwigarire Esteeri ati: N'oha oyehangire kukora ekyo, kandi arahi?
Esteeri yaagarukamu ati: Omuzigu waitu orikuturwanisa n'eri ihano Hamani. Hamani yaatetemera omu maisho g'omugabe n'omwigarire.

Ahonaaho omugabe yaimuka, yaaruga aha bugyenyi asambisiirwe, yaashohora, yaaza omu musiri gw'ekikaari; kwonka Hamani yaimuka kushaba omwigarire ngu ataitwa; ahabw'okuba akareeba ku omugabe amaririire kumukora kubi.

Bwanyima omugabe yaagaruka naaruga omu musiri gw'ekikaari, yaataaha omu kishengye omu baabaire nibanywera viinyo, yaashanga Hamani ajuumaire aha kitabo ahu Esteeri yaabaire ari; omugabe yaagira ati: Kandi yaaza kuhambira omwigarire omu maisho gangye omu nju yangye? Ebigambo ebyo ku byarugire biti omu kanwa k'omugabe, abantu baashweka Hamani ahamaisho.

Bwanyima Harabona, omwe aha bakonwa abaabaire nibaheereza omugabe, yaagira ati: Manya, omu kibuga kya Hamani habyairwemu ekiti kiraingwa kya mikono makumi ataano, eki Hamani ateekateekire kuhanikaho Morodekai, owaagambire ekigambo ky'okukiza omugabe.
Omugabe nikwo kuragiira ati: Mube nikyo mwamuhanikaho. Batyo baahanika Hamani aha kiti eki yaabaire ateekateekyeire Morodekai. Okuruga aho ekiniga ky'omugabe kyaikaikana.
Omugabe yaajuura empeta y'akamanyiso ke ei ayakire Hamani, yaagiha Morodekai. Na Esteeri yaataho Morodekai kutegyeka enju ya Hamani.
Omugabe yaimukiza Esteeri enkoni ye y'ezaabu,

Esteeri yaimuka, yaayemerera omu maisho ge, yaagira ati: Omugabe ku araabe naakisiima akanshemerererwa, n'ebi ndaagambe bikamugwisa gye, kandi nkaba orikumushemeza, nimmweshengyereza, ku bahandiika ebaruha y'okuhindura busha ezi Hamani mwene Hamedasa Omuagagi yaahandiikire kucwekyereza Abayudaaya abari omu mashaza g'omugabe goona.
Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kugumisiririza akabi akarihika aha ihanga ryaitu? Nari shi nimbaasa nta kugumisiririza aokureeba beene waitu nibacwekyerezibwa?
Omugabe Ahasuero yaagarukamu omwigarire Esteeri na Morodekai Omuyudaaya ati: Reeba, mpaire Esteeri enju ya Hamani, kandi Hamani bamuhanikire aha kiti nimmutura okubangira Abayudaaya omukono.

N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe muhandiikire Abayudaaya, nk'oku murikwenda, omu iziina ry'omugabe, muteho akamanyiso k'empeta ye; ahabw'okuba ekiragiro ekihandiikirwe omu iziina ry'omugabe, kikahamibwa akamanyiso k'empeta ye, tihariho muntu orikubaasa kukiihaho.

Batyo omu bunaku obwo, aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bishatu omu kwezi kwa kashatu okurikwetwa Sivani, abahandiiki b'omugabe baayetwa, baahandiika ebi Morodekai aragiire aha by'Abayudaaya byona, baabitwekyera abategyeki b'omugabe, n'abandi bategyeki, n'abanyiginya b'omu mashaza goona, oku gari igana na makumi abiri na mushanju, okuruga Buhindi okuhika Esiopia, buri ishaza ryona nk'emihandiikire yaaryo oku yaabaire eri, na buri ihanga omu rurimi rwaryo; baabihandiikira n'Abayudaaya omu mihandiikire yaabo n'omu rurimi rwabo.

Ebyo byona Morodekai yaabihandiika omu iziina ry'omugabe, yaabihamisa akamanyiso k'empeta y'omugabe, ebaruha yaazikwatsa baamatarisi, abaabaire bagyendera aha mbaraasi ezirikwiruka munonga, ezaabaire zizaaziibwe omu masho g'omugabe, nizikora emirimo ye.

Omuri ezo baruha omugabe yaikiriza Abayudaaya b'omu ndembo zoona, ngu bateeranire hamwe, beerwaneho bahamire, babone kwita n'okucwekyereza n'okumaraho engabo zoona z'eihanga ryona nari ez'eishaza ryona, eziribateera, baite n'abaana baabo abato n'abakazi baabo, kandi banyagye ebintu byabo;
kandi ngu ebyo byona bikorerwe aha izooba rimwe, aha kiro kya ikumi na bishatu omu kwezi kwa ikumi n'abiri okurikwetwa Adari, omu mashaza goona ag'omugabe Ahasuero;

kandi ngu ebihandiikirwe omuri ezo baruha bibugibwe nk'ekiragiro omuri buri ishaza, kandi birangwe omu mahanga goona, nibimanyisa Abayudaaya ku bashemereire kweteekateeka kwerwanaho ahari eryo izooba, nibahoora abazigu baabo.

Batyo baamatarisi baatemba embaraasi ezirikwiruka munonga, ezaabaire zikora emirimo y'omugabe, baashohora nibeehuuta, nibagyemwa ekiragiro ky'omugabe. Kandi ekyo kiragiro kyabugibwa omu rurembo Shushani.

Bwanyima Morodekai yaaruga omu maisho g'omugabe, yaashohora ajwaire bushuuti y'omugabe eya bururu kandi erikwera, ajwaire ekirunga kihango ky'ezaabu, kandi anagiire omunagiro gwa bafuta na bujwa; batyo ab'omu rurembo Shushani baateera akaari baashemererwa.
N'Abayudaaya baajwerwa omushana, baatunga okushemererwa n'okwesiima n'ekitiinisa.

Kandi omuri buri ishaza n'omu buri rurembo ahu ekiragiro ky'omugabe n'ekihandiiko kye byabaire bihika, Abayudaaya bakaba bashemererwa, beesiima, baagira obugyenyi n'ekiro kikuru ky'okuhuumuriraho. Baingi omu mahanga g'omuri egyo nsi baayehindura Abayudaaya, ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya bakabatiinisa.

Batyo Abayudaaya baateeranira omu ndembo zaabo z'omu mashaza g'omugabe Ahasuero goona, kukwata abaabaire nibenda kubakora kubi. Tihariho muntu n'omwe owaabaire naabaasa kubaza omu kaso, ahabw'okuba amahanga goona gakaba gabatiinire.
Kandi abategyeki b'amshaza boona, n'abategyeki b'omugabe n'abandi bategyeki, n'abatware b'omu kikaari ky'omugabe, baaha Abayudaaya emikono, ahabw'okuba nabo bakaba batiinire Morodekai.
Morodekai ogwo akaba ahindukire rugambwa omu ka y'omugabe, kandi okurangaanwa kwe kubugire omu mashaza goona; ahabw'okuba akaguma naayeyongyera kuhama.
Batyo Abayudaaya baitsa abazigu baabo rurara, baabacwekyereza, baabamaraho; abaabaire nibabanga, baabagira nk'oku barikwenda.
Omu rurembo rukuru Shushani Abayudaaya baitamu abashaija magana ataano, baabamaraho;
kandi baita na Parishanidasa, Dalifooni, Asipaasa,
poraasa, Adalia, Aridasa,
Parimashiita, Arisai, Aridai na Vaizaasa,
boona ikumi beene Hamani mwene Hamedasa, omuzigu w'Abayudaaya; kwonka tibaagira ki baanyaga.
Eryo izooba omubaro gw'abaitwa omu rurembo rukuru Shushani gwagambirwa omugabe.

Omugabe yaagira omwigarire Esteeri ati: Abayudaaya baita abashaija magana ataano omu rurembo Shushani, baabamaraho; baita na beene Hamani ikumi. Mbwenu noogira ngu omu gandi mashaza g'omu bugabe bakozire ebirikwingana ki? Hariho ekindi eki orikushaba, okakiheebwa? nari hariho ekindi eki orikwenda, ngu kihikiirizibwe?

Esteeri yaamugarukamu ati: Omugabe ku araabe naasiima, aikirize Abayudaaya abari omuri Shushani nyencakare batwaze nk'ekiragiro ky'eri izooba oku yaba; kandi beene Hamani abo, oku bari ikumi, bahanikwe aha biti.
Atyo omugabe yaaragiira ku kiba kityo; ekiragiro kyabugibwa omuri Shushani, na beene Hamani oku bari ikumi baahanikwa.
Ku bwaseesire aha kiro kya ikumi na bina ky'okwezi Adari, Abayudaaya abaabaire bari omuri Shushani baateeranira hamwe, baita abashaija magana ashatu, kwonka nabwo tibaagira ki baanyaga.

N'abandi Bayudaaya b'omu mashaza g'omugabe baateeranira hamwe, baayerwanaho, baita omu bazigu baabo abantu obukumi mushanju n'enkumi itaano, baahuumura ahabw'abazigu baabo, kandi nabwo tibaagira ki baanyaga.
Okwo nikwo byabaire aha kiro kya ikumi na bishatu ky'okwezi Adari; aha kiro kya ikumi na bina baahuumura, baakigira ekiro kikuru ky'obugyenyi ky'okuriira hamwe n'okushemererwa.

Kwonka Abayudaaya ab'omuri Shushani baateeranira hamwe aha kiro kya ikumi na bishatu n'ekya ikumi na bina eby'okwo kwezi; bwanyima aha kya ikumi na bitaano baahuumura, baakigira ekiro kikuru ky'obugyenyi ky'okuriira hamwe n'okushemererwa.

Nikyo Abayudaaya ab'omu byaro, abatuura omuri tauni ezitaine ngo z'amabaare, baijukira ekiro kya ikumi na bina ky'okwezi Adari, bakakigira eizooba ry'okushemerererwaho n'okuriira hamwe, n'eizooba rirungi ry'okutwekyereraniraho eby'okurya.
Bwanyima Morodekai yaahandiika ebyo byona, kandi yaahandiika n'ebaruha, yaazitwekyera Abayudaaya boona, abaabaire bari omu mashaza g'omugabe Ahasuero goona, aba haihi n'aba hare,
naabeehangiriza kwijuka ekiro kya ikumi na bina n'ekya ikumi na bitaano eby'okwezi Adari, kubigira ebiro bikuru buri mwaka;

ahabw'okuba ahari ebyo biro nibwo Abayudaaya baahuumura abazigu baabo, kandi okwo kwezi nikwo kwababeereire okw'okushemererwa omu mwanya gw'obusaasi, kukaba okw'okuhuumuriramu omu mwanya gw'okuganya; kandi yaabaragiira ku babigira ebiro by'okuriira hamwe n'okushemererwa, n'eby'okutwekyereraniraho eby'okurya, n'okuha abooro ebiconco.
Batyo Abayudaaya baaragaana ku bariguma nibabitwaza nk'oku baabitandika, kandi nk'oku Morodekai abahandiikiire.
Ahabw'okuba Hamani mwene Hamedasa Omuagagi, omuzigu w'Abayudaaya boona, akaba abagiriire enaama y'okubacwekyereza, kandi akaba aragwize enteenyu ezirikwetwa Puuri, kubasingyeera n'okubamaraho;
kwonka egyo naama ku yaahikire aha mugabe, omugabe yaaragiirira omu baruha ati: Egyo naama mbi y'okwita Abayudaaya ebe niwe yaagarukana, kandi ngu we n'abatabani bahanikwe aha biti.
Nikyo ebyo biro babyetera Purimu, nibagyeterera Puuri. N'ahabw'ekyo ahabw'ebyahandiikirwe omuri egyo baruha, n'ebi Abayudaaya bareebire omuri ako kabi, kandi n'ebyabahikireho,

bakaragiira, kandi baaragaana ahabwabo n'ahaba baijukuru baabo, n'ahabwa boona abaakwataniise nabo, ku batarireka kwijuka ebyo biro bibiri, nk'ekihandiiko kyabyo oku kyabaire kiri, n'obunaku bwabyo obwataireho buri mwaka.

Kandi baaragiira ngu, omu miryango yoona, n'omuri buri ishaza, n'omuri buri rurembo bagume baijukye ebyo biro, babigire ebiro bikuru omu busingye bwona, kandi ngu ebyo biro bya Purimu, bitarihugwaho omu Bayudaaya, nari ekiijutsyo kyabyo okweba omu ruzaro rwabo.
Ebaruha zaatwekyerwa Abayudaaya boona ab'omu mashaza igana na makumi abiri na mushanju ag'omu bugabe bwa Ahasuero, ezabaire zirimu ebigambo by'obusingye n'amazima;

ngu zibone kuhamya ebyo biro bikuru bya Purimu omu bunaku obutairweho, nk'oku Morodekai Omuyudaaya n'omwigarire Esteeri baabiragiire Abayudaaya, bakabiragaana ahabwabo n'oruzaaro rwabo, eby'okwesiibyakwo n'amaganya gaabo.
Kityo ekiragiro ky'omwigarire Esteeri kyahamya egyo migyenzo ya Purimu, kyahandiikwa n'omu kitabo.
Bwanyima omugabe Ahasuero yaacwera ensi n'ebirwa by'omu mayanja omushoro.

Mbwenu emirimo yoona ei yaakozire n'obushoboorozi bwe n'amaani ge, n'ebirikworeka ekitiinisa eki yaahaire Morodekai, akaba omuntu rugambwa, tibihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eby'omu busingye bw'abagabe ba Bumeedi na Buperisi?

Ahabw'okuba ogwo Muyudaaya Morodekai niwe yaabaire ari owa kabiri aha mugabe Ahasuero; kandi akaba ari rugambwa omu Bayudaaya, naasiimwa beene waabo boona, ahabw'okuba akaba asherurira eihanga rye eby'okurikiza, kandi n'okwendeza abantu be obusingye.
Akazaara aboojo mushanju n'abaishiki bashatu.

Kandi akaba atungire entaama enkumi mushanju, engamira enkumi ishatu, enimi z'okuhingisa rukumi, ebuguma z'endogoya magana ataano, n'abahuuku baingi munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo mushaija akaba ari omushaija rugambwa orikukira abashaija boona ab'omu nsi z'oburugwa-izooba.
Kandi abatabani bakaba bakunda kuriira obugyenyi omu nju ya buri omwe aha izooba rye, kandi batuma ahari banyaanyabo bonshatu kwija kurya n'okunywa nabo.

Bwanyima ebiro byabo eby'obugyenyi bikihwa, Yobu abatumaho kubeeza, aimuka kare omu kasheeshe, atamba ebitambo by'okwotsya ebirikwingana n'omubaro gwabo boona; ahabw'okuba Yobu akaba agira ati: Obundi abaana bangye bakaaba basiisire, bahemukire ahari Ruhanga omu mitima yaabo. Okwo nikwo Yobu yaabaire atwaza obutoosha.
MUKAMA yaabuuza Sitaane ati: Nooruga hi? Sitaane yaamugarukamu ati: Ninduga kugyendagyenda omu nsi, n'okugizengyereramu.

MUKAMA yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Ebyo waayetegyereza omwiru wangye Yobu, ku hataine mushaija orikumushusha omu nsi, ku ataine kabara kandi ku ahikiriire, omushaija orikuntiina, kandi orikwetantara ekibi?
Sitaane yaagarukamu MUKAMA ati: Noogira ngu Yobu akutiinira busha?
Tiiwe omurinda embaju zoona, we n'enju ye n'ebi atungire byona? Okaha omugisha ebi yaakozire n'emikono ye, kandi waakanyisa ebi atungire byona.
Kwonka hati gorora omukono gwawe, okore aha bintu bye byona; naija kukwehakana butunu.
MUKAMA yaagira Sitaane ati: Reeba, ebi atungire byona biri omu bushoboorozi bwawe; kwonka we, otamukoraho. Atyo Sitaane yaaruga omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Eizooba rimwe abatabani na bahara be bakaba nibarya nibanywera viinyo omu nju ya mukuru waabo;
entumwa yaija ahari Yobu, yaamubikira eti: Enimi zaaba nizihinga, n'endogoya niziriira aha rubaju rwazo;
ahonaaho aba Sabeya baazeeshukamu, baazinyaga, n'abariisa baazo baabaitsa rurara; niinye nyenka owaahonokaho, nkaija kubikubikira.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, endiijo ntumwa yaija, yaagira eti: Omuriro gwa Ruhanga gwaruga omu iguru, gwayotsya entaama n'abariisa baazo, gwabicwekyereza; niinye nyenka owaahonokaho, nkaija kubikubikira.

Nawe ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija ondiijo, yaagira ati: Abakaludaaya baija omu mitwe eshatu, baayeshuka omu ngamira, baazinyaga, n'abariisa baazo baabaitsa rurara; niinye nyenka owaahonokaho, nkaija kubikubikira.
N'ogwo ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija ondiijo, yaagira ati: Batabani baawe na bahara baawe baaba nibarya, nibanywera viinyo omu nju ya mukuru waabo;
omuyaga gw'amaani gwareetwa omu ihamba, gwateera embaju ina z'enju, enju yaagwera abo batsigazi, baafa; niinye nyenka owaahonokaho, nkaija kubikubikira.
Nkaruga omu nda ya maawe ntaine ki njwaire, kandi nikwo ndigarukayo ntyo. MUKAMA akampa, mbwenu abiinyihireho. Eiziina rya MUKAMA risiimwe!
Omuri ebyo byona Yobu tarakozire kibi, n'obu kwakuba okubarira Ruhanga okushobya.
Kandi aha izooba erindi abaana ba Ruhanga bakaija kwemurika ahari MUKAMA, na Sitaane yaabaijamu ngu nawe ayemurikye ahari MUKAMA.
MUKAMA yaabuuza Sitaane ati: Nooruga hi? Sitaane yaamugarukamu ati: Ninduga kugyendagyenda omu nsi, n'okugizengyereramu.

MUKAMA yaagaruka yaabuuza Sitaane ati: Ebyo oyetegyereize omwiru wangye Yobu, ku hataine mushaija orikumushusha omu nsi, ku ataine kabara, kandi ku ahikiriire, omushaija orinkutiina akeetantara ekibi? Na mbwenu, n'obu oraabe wandeeteire kumukora kubi, n'okumucwekyereza nimmutura busha, kwonka akihamiire aha kuhikiirira kwe.
Sitaane yaamugarukamu ati: Amagara gakira amagana. Ebi omuntu atungire byona, akaabihayo ahabw'amagara ge.
Kwonka mbwenu gorora omukono gwawe, okore aha magufa ge n'aha mubiri gwe, naija kukwehakana butunu.
MUKAMA yaagira Sitaane ati: Reeba, ari omu bushoboorozi bwawe; kwonka otamwita.
Yobu yaayesherurira orugusyo rw'okweyaguza, yaashutama omu iju.
Bwanyima omukazi we yaamugira ati: Beitu na hati okihamiire aha kuhikiirira kwawe? Yehakane Ruhanga, ofe.
Kwonka we yaamugarukamu ati: Noogamba nk'omukazi omushema. Noogira ngu turyaheebwa ebirungi byonka omu mikono ya Ruhanga, tituriheebwa n'ebibi? Omuri ebyo byona Yobu taracumwire na rurimi rwe.
Ku baamureebire bakiri hare, baamwebwa, baimutsya amaraka gaabo, baarira; baataagura ebijwaro byabo, baayeshuka eiju omu mutwe, kandi baarimiisha n'ahaiguru.
Bwanyima baashutama nawe ahansi okumara ebiro mushanju nyomushana na nyekiro; tihaagira n'omwe owaamugambira ekigambo, ahabw'okureeba obusaasi bwe burengyesereize.
Bwanyima y'ebyo Yobu yaayashamya akanwa ke, yaagamba, yaakyeena eizooba eri yaazaariirweho,
naagira ati:
N'ekiro eki baagambiireho ngu,
Maawe abakira enda y'omwana w'omwojo.
Eryo izooba rihinduka omwirima!
Ruhanga ow'ahaiguru areka kuryetaho,
Kandi rireka kujwerwa omushana;
Ebicu birikondakondera,
Obwira-kabiri bwona buritiinisa,
Ekyo kiro kikwatwa omwirima ndindindi,
Kireka kushemererwa omu biro by'omwaka,
N'obu kwakuba okubarirwa omu gandi meezi;
Eego, ekyo kiro kiba engumba,
Kireka kuhurirwamu akaari k'okushemererwa;
Abarikumanya kwimutsya Leviasaani;
Ritegyereza omushana, guriburira,
Kandi ribura kureeba okujuguta kw'omushekye;
Ahabw'okuba tiriragaize nda ya maawe,
N'obu kwakuba okuzibira amaisho gangye kureeba obusaasi.
Ahabw'enki ntarafiire ninzaarwa,
Nkabura kwitsya ninkishohora nti?
N'amabeere g'okwonka?
Kuri kyabaire kityo, nkaabaire mbyami, mpunami;
Nkaabaire ngwejegyeire, nyehuumuriire,
Abaayeyombekyeire ebituuro by'ekitiinisa by'okuziikwamu;
Nari shi, n'abanyiginya abaabaire baine ezaabu,
Baijwize amaka gaabo efeeza.
Nk'abeereere abatarareebire mushana;
Kandi niyo abaruhire baruhuukira.
Zitakihurira iraka ry'orikuzikoresa kubi.
Omuto n'omukuru niyo bataaha,
Kandi omuhuuku tategyekyerwayo mukama we.
N'abaine entimba aha mutima akabagumyaho?
Bagitimba okukira oku abantu batimba ezaabu esherekirwe.
Ku bahika aha kituuro, bashemererwa munonga, beesiima.
Otaine butooro, kandi ou akubiire hamwe?
N'okuborooga kwangye nikweshuka nk'amaizi;
Kandi ekirikuunyitsa obwoba nikyo kirikungwaho.
Tiinyine busingye, tintuurize, kandi tiinyine buhuumure,
Kureka enaku nizo zirikuunyeshukyeera.
Bwanyima Elifaazi Omutemaani yaagarukamu ati:
Omuntu ku yaakuteeraho kugamba naiwe, okaaguubwa kubi?
Beitu shi hoona n'oha orikubaasa kwezibira kugamba?
Kandi okaba ohamya emikono etaine maani.
Ebigambo byawe bikaba biramira orikwenda kugwa,
Kandi okaba ohamya entegye ezirikubonda.
Kwonka mbwenu niiwe bihikireho, kandi tiwaagumisiriza!
Bikukozireho, waahahaaza omutima!
Kandi amatsiko gaawe tigari omu kuhikiirira kw'emitwarize yaawe?
Nari shi, abahikiriire baramazirweho?
Bakabiba obubi, nibyo bagyesha.
Bamarwaho okuhoorera kw'ekiniga kye.
N'amaino g'emigunju y'entare gacweka.
Ekisimba ky'entare kifa ahabw'okubura omuhiigo,
Kandi n'obwana bw'entare enkazi butaataana.
Okutu kwangye kukakihurira nikiija mpora,
Abantu baahirwayo.
Naagira obwoba, naatetema,
Kyareetera amagufa gangye goona kukomangana.
Omuzimu gwandaba omumaisho,
Ekikoba kyampwa aha mutwe;
Omu maisho gangye haabamu waringa.
Haabaho akaceceko, bwanyima naahurira eiraka eririkugira riti:
Naabaasa kuba oshugaine omu maisho g'Owaamuhangire?
Na baamaraika be aboomesereza ebishobyo;
Agu omusingi gwago guri omu mucuucu;
Abarikuribatwa bakatanga ekiyenje kubaruka.
Bahweraho kimwe, hataine okyetaireho.
Tibafa, kandi bakafa bataine bwengye?
Omu barikwera ou waakwagira n'oha?
Buzimazima ekiniga kiita omushema,
Kandi eihari riita otaine bwengye.
Kwonka omu mwanya mukye naakyeena obutaaho bwe;
Basingyererwa omu marembo,
Babura kijuna.
Ebi ashaarwire biriibwa abaine enjara,
Bagaruka batwara n'ebiri omu mahwa;
Abaine eiriho bainiire ebintu bye ekyaka;
Ahabw'okuba okubonabona tikuruga mu mucuucu,
N'enaku tizimera mu itaka,
Nk'oku esiriira zituumuuka omu mwanya.
Nyowe ahabwangye nkaasherwire Ruhanga,
Kandi Ruhanga mba niwe naayegyekyera ebyangye.
N'eby'okutangaaza ebitarikubaasa kubarwa.
Akashandaaza amaizi omu misiri.
N'abarikuborooga akabaimutsya, bakaba buhooro.
Ngu emikono yaazo eremwe kuhitsya eki zimaririire kukora.
N'enaama z'engobya zimarwaho juba.
Babandagira omu ihangwe nk'owa nyekiro.
Kwonka omworo amujuna omu kanwa kaabo,
N'omukyene amwiha omu mikono y'ab'amaani.
Kandi n'akanwa k'abatahikiriire kabumbwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo otagaya okuhana kw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona;
Ateera, kwonka engaro ze nizo zikiza.
Nangwa n'omu bugwe mushanju tihariho kibi ekirikuhikaho.
N'omu rugamba aryakukiza amaani ga rurara.
Kandi okuhwerekyerera ku kuriija, torikutiina.
Kandi toritiina nyamaishwa z'omu nsi;
Ahabw'okuba oryaragaana n'amabaare g'omu bwerere,
N'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba ziryagira obusingye naiwe.
Oryaguma nooreeba engombe y'amatungo gaawe, oshangye hataine kibuziremu.
Na baijukuru baawe bakaba nk'obunyaatsi bw'omu nsi.
Nk'ekiba ky'engano oku kihunikwa omu bunaku bwakyo.
Obihurire, obyegyereho eky'okukugasira.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Ai bambe! Nkaabaasibwa ki, obugwa kubi bwangye burengwa,
Nari ebihikiirizi byangye byona biteebwa aha minzaani!
Bikaaremeera okukira omusheenyi ogw'omu nyanja.
Nikyo kindeeteire kurahuka kugamba;
Amagara gangye niganywa obushegu bwayo,
Eby'okutiinisa bya Ruhanga bitengire orugamba kundwanisa.
Noogira ngu enturegye neekunga eine obunyaatsi omu kanwa,
Nari shi ente ejuga neerya?
Ekitaine nsha kiriibwa kitarimu mwonyo,
Nari omu maizi g'eihuri habamu akanuzi?
Omutima gwangye tigurikwenda kubirozaho;
Nibinsusira nk'eby'okurya birikunugwa.
Nkaabaasibwa ki, ntunga eki ndikushaba,
Ruhanga ampa eki ndikwetenga!
Atayo omukono gwe, ampuhura.
Nangwa n'omu busaasi obutarikutuuza nkaayesiima,
Ahabw'okuba tindikuhakanisa bi Orikwera arikugamba.
Nyine maani ki g'okutegyereza?
Omuheru gw'obusaasi bwangye n'enki, ngu mbone kugumisiriza?
Amaani gangye n'amaani g'amabaare,
Nari omubiri gwangye n'omuringa?
Kandi obundi buhwezi bwona buunyihirweho.
Ngu atakaareka kutiina Ow'obushoboorozi bwona.
Nk'omukuru ogurikureetwamu omwegyemure, gukooma,
Ogurikwiraguzibwa amaizi agakwatsire,
Omu orubaare rweshereka.
Hakibaho obutagatsi bikahwerera,
Omushana gukijwa, bikaruga omu mwanya gwabyo.
Emitwe y'abagyenzi eyaabaire eraba aha rubaju rw'ogwo mukura, eteishuka,
Eza omu ihamba, egwayo.
N'abagyenzi ba Sheeba baguma bategyereize;
Bakihikayo, bashoberwa.
Okwo nikwo mumbeereire;
Ku mureebire ebihikiirizi ebimpikireho, mwatiina.
Hariho obu naagizire nti: Mugire eki mwampa?
Nari shi nti: Mumpe ekiconco aha bi mutungire?
Nari nti: Munjune omu mikono y'omuzigu?
Nari nti: Muncungure omu mikono y'abarikumpata?
Muunyegyese, naanye niinyija kwetsiza;
Mummanyise eki naashobize.
Ebigambo by'okuhikiirira ka n'eby'amaani!
Mbwenu empaka zaanyu nizimpana ki?
Manya ebigambo by'owaayehweire amatsiko biri nk'omuyaga.
N'okwiha ahari munywani waanyu enshaagi.
Mbwenu hati nimbeeshengyereza mundeebe;
Ahabw'okuba buzima tindikubeiha, nk'oku murikundeeba.
Nimbeeshengyereza muhindukye, mutakora ebitari by'okuhikiirira.
Eego muhindukye; ebyangye n'eby'oburyo.
Nimugira ngu orurimi rwangye rwine oku ruri?
Tirurikubaasa kumanya ekibi?
Ebiro bye ti nk'eby'orikukorera ebihembo?
Kandi nk'oku orikukorera ebihembo abitegyereza,
Nkateerwaho ebiro birikurusya.
Kwonka ekiro kigyenda ira;
Ndaara niinyehindaguturana, burugaho busheesha.
Oruhu rwagwo nirugangaara, rugaruka rushatuka.
Bihwaho ntaine matsiko.
Amaisho gangye tigarigaruka kureeba birungi.
Amaisho gaawe ku gariba nigakindeeba, ndyabura.
Nikwo orikushuuma okuzimu atarigaruka;
Kandi omwanya gwe tigurigaruka kumumanya.
Niinyija kugambisibwa obusaasi bw'omu mutima gwangye,
Nyetomboite ahabw'entimba y'omu magara gangye.
Nyowe ndi enyanja, nari ndi omugoye,
Waaza kuntaho ow'okundinda?
Ekitabo kyangye nikiija kutuubya aha busaasi bwangye,
Obwo nonkangisa n'ebirooto,
Ontiinisa n'ebi oyorekirwe,
Okukira okuguma mpweire aha magufa.
Ndeka, ahabw'okuba ebiro byangye n'ebya busha.
N'okumwetaho okamwetaho,
Okamugyeza buri kaanya?
N'okutampa kaanya k'okumira amacwante?
Omurinzi w'abantu, nkwitsize ki?
Ahabw'enki ompindwire ekimaasho?
Ahanki nkubeereire omutwaro?
Okaanyihaho ekibi?
Ahabw'okuba hati naaza kubyama omu mucuucu;
Naiwe oryayezirika kunsherura, oshangye ntakiriho.
Bwanyima Biludaadi Omushuuhi yaamugarukamu ati:
Kandi ebigambo by'omu kanwa kaawe kuba nk'omuyaga gw'amaani?
Nari Ow'obushoboorozi bwona aita emanja z'oburyo?
Akabahayo omu bushoboorozi bw'ekicumuro kyabo.
Waayeshengyereza Ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Buzimazima Ruhanga naija kwimuka ahabwawe,
Akugarurire eka yaawe eyaabaire ehikiriire.
Kwonka omu biro byawe ebya bwanyima ebyawe biryakanya munonga.
Oyetegyereze eki baatatenkuriitwe baareebire;
Kandi ebiro byaitu omu nsi ni nk'ekicuucu.
Tibarikwija kukwegyesa, bakakugambire,
Nibahamya ebigambo ebi barikumanya?
Nari omubimbiri kumera ahataine maizi?
Bibandiza ebindi binyaatsi byona kwoma.
N'amatsiko g'otarikutiina Ruhanga garyahwaho.
N'obwesigye bwe ni nk'orububi rw'orutangura.
Aryagikwata, kwonka terigumaho.
N'omurubo gwe gubuga omusiri gwe;
Emizi ye neerandira aha mutuumo gw'amabaare,
Atuura omu nkiri.
Haryamwehakana hati: Tinkakureebaga.
Reeba, okwo nikwo kushemererwa kw'omuhanda gwe,
Kandi omu itaka haryameramu abandi.
Reeba, tarinaga muntu ohikiriire,
Kandi tariramira nkozi z'ebibi.
N'eminwa yaawe eteere akaari.
Kandi eihema ry'enkozi z'ebibi tiririgaruka kubaho.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Beitu shi, omuntu akaabaasa ata kuba ohikiriire omu maisho ga Ruhanga?
Takaabaasa kumugarukamu kigambo na kimwe omu bigambo rukumi.
(N'oha owaakumugangaarira, haza akaba gye?)
Aihaho enshozi zitakimanyire,
Ku aba naazijuumika n'ekiniga kye.
Enyomyo zaayo zitengyeta.
Aragiira eizooba, tirituruka,
N'enyonyoozi azitwekyerera.
Akaribatiirira ebingonzi by'enyanja.
Na Kakaaga n'emyanya y'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Akora ebikuru ebitarikubaasa kushoboororwa,
N'eby'okutangaaza ebitarikubaasa kubarwa.
Agumizamu, kwonka timmwetegyereza.
N'oha owaakubaasa kumugira ati: Ekyo nookora ki?
Nangwa n'abahwezi ba Rahabu bamwinamira.
Mbwenu shi niinye naakumugarukamu,
Nkeesherurira ebigambo by'okumuhakanisa?
Kureka nkaamushaba kusaasirwa, ahakuba niwe arikunshinja.
Nangwa n'obu naakumweta, akangarukamu,
Tinkaikiriza ngu yampurira;
Akanyisa ebihuta byangye nantura busha.
Tandeka ngu nyitsye,
Kureka anyijuza obushaarizi.
Ku biraabe biri eby'okucwa emanja, We naagira ati:
N'oha oranteereho obunaku?
N'obu ndaabe ntaine kabara, nanshinja obugomi.
Ntamirwe amagara gangye.
Acwekyereza abahikire n'ababi.
Akagwe ku kagwa, kaakinura abantu,
Ashekyeerera abataine rubanja baaguubwaho akabi.
Ashweka amaisho g'abaramuzi baayo;
Ku araabe atari We, ondiijo n'oha?
Nibihunga, kandi tibigira kirungi kyona eki bireeba;
Nk'oku empungu erahuka neeza kuteera eki ehiigire.
Ndekye kumanywa ku ngwirwe kubi, nyesiime,
Ahabw'okuba nimmanya ngu torinteekateekaho nk'otaine rubanja.
Ndyasingwa orubanja;
Mbwenu niinyeruhiza ki?
Nkanaaba engaro zangye n'esabuuni,
Nabwo noija kunnaga omu kiina,
N'ebijwaro byangye ahabwangye bintamwe.
Ahabw'okuba Ogwo ti muntu nkaanye, ngu mmugarukyemu,
Twemerere hamwe, tutongane;
Akatucura engaro omumaisho.
N'okutiinisa kwe kurekye kuunyitsa obwoba;
Haza obwo ngambe ntarikumutiina,
Ahabw'okuba ahabwangye tindi w'okutiina.
Tindikwija kwezibira kutaka;
Niinyija kugamba ahabw'obusaasi bw'omu mutima gwangye.
Otancwera orubanja kunsinga,
Kureka onyorekye eki orikuntura.
Okugaya eki waahangire,
N'okushemerererwa enaama z'enkozi z'ebibi?
Nari shi oreeba nk'oku abantu bareeba?
Nari emyaka yaawe ni nk'ey'abantu,
N'okucaaka ekibi kyangye,
Kandi ku hatariho orikubaasa kujuna omuntu omu mikono yaawe?
Mbwenu wampindukana, wancwekyereza.
Mbwenu nooyenda kugaruka kumpindura omucuucu?
Okanshuka nk'amate,
Wankamya nk'amajuta ga kiizi,
Wanshweka oruhu n'enyama,
Wanteeranisa amagufa n'emitsi;
Wampa amagara n'obushongore,
Okureeberera kwawe nikwo kungumizeho.
Kandi nimmanya ebyo ku waabigyendereire.
Kandi toonyihaho rubanja;
Ku mba ohikiriire, timbaasa kwimutsya mutwe;
Ahabw'okuba mba nyijwire okuhemuka,
Nindeeba okubonabona kwangye.
Ogaruka onkoraho eby'amahano,
Oyongyera kungwerwa kubi,
Kandi oguma noondeetera amahe masya g'okundwanisa.
Nangwa kuri naafiire hatakagizire riisho ryona eryandeeba,
Nkaziikwa ninkiruga omu nda.
Ndeka, nduhuukyeho kakye,
Omu nsi y'omwirima, kandi ey'ekibunda kya rufu,
Omu nsi y'omwirima etarimu buteeka,
Ei omushana guba nk'omwirima.
Bwanyima Zofari Omunaamasi yaagarukamu ati:
Nari shi, engambi y'amaingi eshemereire kwihwaho orubanja?
Abantu bashemereire kuhunamisibwa emyehimbiso yaawe?
Kandi ku oraateere enaku, tihariho orikukukwatsa enshoni?
Ndi mwere omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Nkaabasibwa ki, Ruhanga agamba,
Ayashamya akanwa ke, akwomesereza.
Ahabw'okuba n'obw'emiringo mingi.
Mbwenu omanye ku Ruhanga atarikufubira,
Nk'oku ebibi byawe biri.
Okaabaasa kumanya Ow'obushoboorozi bwona, omumarayo?
Kiri okuzimu okukira owa Nyamuteza; nookimanya ota?
Oburaingwa bwakyo nibukira ensi,
N'obukiika bwakyo nibukira enyanja.
Yaabeeta omu rubanja, n'oha owaakumuzibira?
Ahabw'okuba naamanya abantu entakimazire;
Ku araareebe okutahikiirira, noogira ngu naakwehuzya?
Enturegye ku yaakuzaara omuntu,
Entakimazire akaagira obwengye.
Omutegye emikono.
Ku haraabe hariho okutahikiirira omu ngaro zaawe, okute hare;
Otaikiriza obubi kuguma omu ka yaawe.
Oryahama, kandi toritiina.
Obwijukye nk'amaizi agaheza kurabaho.
N'obu gariba garimu omwirima, garyaba nk'akasheeshe.
Oryarindwa, ohuumure buhooro;
Oryabyama, tiharigira owaakutiinisa;
Eego, baingi baryakuhakwaho.
Baryabura obuhungiro,
Kandi amatsiko gaabo garyaba okuhwamu omwitsyo.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Eego, niimwe bantu mwenka;
Kandi ku murifa, obwengye buryahwaho naimwe!
Timurikunkira.
Mbwenu n'oha otarikumanya ebigambo nk'ebyo?
Nyowe owaabaire atakira Ruhanga, akangarukamu,
Omuntu ohikiriire, otaine kamogo;
Mbwenu ndi ow'okushekyeererwa.
Omu mutima gw'omuntu ogaramisiriize habamu okugaya abahikiriirwe.
Ebihikiirizi bitegyereize abarikuterera.
Abarikugwisa kubi Ruhanga bahamire,
Abu emikono yaabo eba ruhanga waabo.
Mbwenu buuza enyamaishwa, niziija kukwegyesa,
N'enyonyi z'omu mwanya niziija kukugambira;
Nari ogambire ensi, neija kukwegyesa,
Kandi eby'omu nyanja nabyo nibiija kukumanyisa.
Ku MUKAMA niwe yaakozire ekyo?
Kandi n'omwitsyo gw'abantu boona nimwo guri.
Nk'oku akanwa kamanya eby'okurya?
N'abahikize emyaka mingi nibo beetegyereza.
Niwe ahanuura, kandi aine okwetegyereza.
Kandi ku akingirana omuntu, tihaine obaasa kwiguraho.
Kandi ku agaigurira, ensi etabaarwa.
Abarikugobezibwa n'abarikugobya n'abe.
N'abaramuzi abahindura abashema.
Abagabe abaihaho obushoboorozi
Abazirika obutanda omunda.
Abanyamurwa abatwara banyagirwe,
N'ab'amaani abamaraho.
Abarikwesigwa ababuza ebigambo,
Kandi abagurusi abaihaho okwetegyereza.
Ayuzya orukoba rw'ab'amaani.
N'omwirima ndindindi agujwisiza omushana.
Ahangusya amahanga, kandi agatuubya.
Abazengyereza omu ihamba eritarimu mihanda.
Bagwererana nk'omusinzi.
Reeba, eriisho ryangye rikareeba ebyo byona,
N'okutu kwangye kwabihurira, naabimanya.
Timwine ki murikunkiza.
Kandi n'okwetonganira ahari Ruhanga.
Mwena muri abafumu abataine mutambo.
Obwo nibwo mwakuba ab'obwengye.
Mbwenu muhurire ebi ndikufa,
Mutegye amatu ebi ndikwetonganira.
Nimwenda kutonganira Ruhanga nimubeiha,
Kandi nimuryarya ahabwe?
Nimwenda kurwanirira Ruhanga?
Nimubaasa kumuryarya, nk'oku omuntu aryarya mugyenzi we?
Buzimazima aryabahana,
Ku murigira orubaju oru mwagwera bwesherekye.
N'okutiinisa kwe kukabagwaho?
Ebigambo ebi murikuhamya n'enfumu eziri nk'eiju;
Ebi murikwerinza ni nk'eibumba.
Nimuhuname, ngambe;
Ekirambeho kimbeho!
Niinyija kwoga amagara.
Ndyayetonganira omu maisho ge, niinyoreka ebinaakozire.
Ekyo nakyo kiryambeera okujunwa,
Ahabw'okuba tihariho otatiina Ruhanga orihika omu maisho ge.
Mutegye amatu ebi ndikubagambira.
Nimmanya ku ndikwija kusinga orubanja.
Ahabw'okuba ku akureebeka, nkaahunama, nfa.
Obwo nibwo ntarikwija kukweshereka.
Kandi okutiinisa kwawe kurekye kuunyitsa obwoba.
Nari shi onyikirize, ngambe, naiwe ongarukyemu.
Ebicumuro byangye n'ebibi byangye ni bingahi?
Mmanyisa okushiisha kwangye n'ekibi kyangye.
Okanteekateekaho nk'omuzigu waawe?
Nooyenda kutiinisa eibabi eririkutwarwa omuyaga,
N'okuhiiga ebishushunga ebyomire?
Ongaruraho ebibi by'obutsigazi bwangye;
Waagumya amaisho aha mihanda yangye yoona,
Ebigyere byangye waabiteeraho obugarukiro.
Omuntu weena ahwaho nk'ekintu ekijunzire,
Nk'ekijwaro ekiriirwe ebiyenje.
Aba ow'enaku nsha.
Ahingura nk'ekicuucu, tagumaho.
Nari nkaanye, okandeeta kutongana naiwe?
Tihariho n'omwe.
Omubaro gw'ameezi ge okagumanya,
Okamuteeraho obugarukiro, obu atarikubaasa kurenga,
Okuhitsya obu ariheza ebiro bye, nk'orikukorera ebihembo.
Manya, hariho amatsiko ngu, ekiti ku kitemwa, kitooka,
Kandi ngu emitwe y'amataagi mato gaakyo egumizamu neekura.
N'ekitsintsi kyakyo kikajundira aho,
Kwonka ku kihurira okufukiirira kw'amaizi, kitooka,
Kimera amataagi nk'ekiti kito.
Buzima omwitsyo gumuhwamu. Mbwenu obwo aba akirahi?
N'omugyera gukatuuba, gukooma,
Tariimuka, n'obu kwakuba okusisiimurwa,
Okuhitsya obu eiguru ririba ritakiriho.
Ondindira omu mubonano, okuhitsya ahu ekiniga kyawe kirihwera,
Onteeraho obunaku, onyijuka!
Ebiro byangye byona ebyanteereirweho nkaabigumisiririza,
Ntegyereza obunaku bwangye bw'okurekurwa.
Kandi naiwe okaayetenga kureeba eki emikono yaawe yaakozire;
Kandi otaire eriisho aha kibi kyangye.
N'okutahikiirira kwangye kukomeirwe hamwe.
N'orukiri rwihwa omu mwanya gwarwo;
Amaizi gagyenda nigarya amabaare,
N'emitunga etwara eitaka ry'ensi;
Naiwe nikwo omaraho amatsiko g'omuntu.
Ebiro byona omusingura, nawe ahwaho;
Aha maisho ge ohahindura okundi; omwohereza.
Bagarurwa ahansi, kwonka tamanya byabo;
Kureka obusaasi obu ahurira, n'obw'omubiri gwe;
Kandi amaganya agu agira, gaba age wenka.
Bwanyima Elifaazi Omutemaani yaagarukamu ati:
N'okwijuza enda ye omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba?
Ashemereire kuteera empaka n'ebigambo ebitaine buryo,
Nari okugamba ebitaine ki birikugasira abandi?
Kwonka nooyenda kwihaho okutiina Ruhanga,
N'okuzibira abantu kugira eki baateekateekaho bari omu maisho ge;
Ahabw'okuba okutahikiirira kwawe nikwo kwegyesa akanwa kaawe eby'okugamba,
Naiwe okunda kugambisa orurimi r'obugobya.
N'eminwa yaawe yonka niyo erikukushinja.
Nari okazaarwa, enshozi zitakabaireho?
Nooyenda kuba niiwe waagira obwengye wenka?
Nooyetegyereza ki, itwe eki tutarikushoborokyerwa?
N'abakuzire munonga abarikukira sho.
Okuhuumuriza kwa Ruhanga ahabwawe ni kukye,
N'ebigambo ebi ogambiirwe gye, noobigaya?
Ahabw'enki omutima gwawe nigukubambaaza,
Amaisho gakakutukura,
Okagamba ebigambo nk'ebyo?
N'owaazairwe omukazi, kuba ohikiriire?
Nangwa n'eiguru tirishemeire mu maisho ge,
Ogotomera okutahikiirira nk'amaizi
Naaza kukushobororera, haza ompurire!
Kandi ebi naareebire, nibyo ndikwija kukumanyisa,
Ebi baishebo batarasherekire,
Batagiibwemu munyamahanga weena)
Niyo myaka eyateereirweho abarikuhata.
N'obu ariba ari omu kugogyera,
Omuhwerekyerezi aryamugwaho.
Taikiriza ngu aryagaruka arugye omu mwirima,
Kandi ateekateekyeirwe rurara.
Naamanya ku ekiro ky'omwirima kiri haihi kumuhikaho.
Enaku n'obusaasi bimutiinisa,
Bimusingura nk'omugabe oyeteekateekyeire orugamba;
Ahabw'okuba akabanga omukono kurwanisa Ruhanga,
Yaahiga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Akingire engabo eine eiromba rihango.
N'ebigojo byahingamirana aha nyugunyu ze,
Kandi yaatuura omu ndembo ezihindukire amatongo,
N'omu maju agatashemereire kutaahwamu muntu,
Agabaire gari haihi kuhinduka emungo z'amatongo.
N'ahabw'ekyo taritunga, n'eitungo rye tiririgumaho,
Kandi taritsimba mizi omu itaka.
Endimi z'omuriro ziryayomya amataagi ge,
Atwarwe omwitsyo gwa Ruhaga.
Ahakuba ebitaine mugasho nibyo arizimuurirwa.
Amataagi agarikumutookaho gatakabaire kijubwe.
Aryaba nk'omuzaabibu ogu ebijuma byagwo biragarika bitakahiisize,
Abe nk'omuzeituuni ogurikuragaza orurabyo.
Kandi omuriro guryamaraho amahema g'abarikurya enguzi.
N'emitima yaabo eteekateeka obugobya.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Mwena muri abayaagi abarikurusya.
Ekyakureetera kungarukamu niki?
Nkaabaasize kugamba nkaimwe;
Nyungayunga ebigambo by'okubapaatiika,
Mbazongoreza omutwe;
Kwonka nkaabagumize n'akanwa kangye,
N'ebigambo by'orurimi rwangye bibatuubiza aha busaasi.
N'obu ndaagambe, obusaasi bwangye tiburikutuuba,
Nari shi bwo ku ndaayegumye, niinyija kutuubizibwa ki?
Mbwenu ho Ruhanga andembize,
Ammazireho abangye boona.
Okuhwa aha magufa kwangye kuunyimukiriire;
Nikwo kurikuunyomesereza.
Anneneire amaino,
Ogwo mubisha wangye anzooreire amaisho.
Banteera aha itama nibanjuma;
Nibateeranira hamwe kunteera.
Ruhanga nampayo omu mikono y'abatarikumutiina,
Yannaga omu mikono y'enkozi z'ebibi.
Yankwata aha bitsya, yancwa obusaasingo;
Bwanyima yangira ekimaasho kye.
Anteire aha ntsigo, zaashohora, tiyansaasira,
Yaasheesha endurwe yangye aha nsi.
Anfumagwire,
Yaanyegyemera nk'emanzi.
N'eihembe ryangye naaritabika omu itaka.
Amaisho gangye gahonoirwe okurira,
N'ebitsigye byangye byeiririmba,
N'okushaba kwangye kushemeire.
Kandi okutaka kwangye kurekye kugira ahu kwatuuriza.
N'omwema wangye ari ahaiguru;
Amaisho gangye nigashuka amarira ahari Ruhanga,
Ngu aikirize omuntu kumwetonganiraho,
Nk'omuntu na mutaahi we.
Ndyatoora omuhanda ogu ntarigaruka kureetwa.
Ekituuro kintegyereize.
Buzimazima nyehinguririziibwe abarikunteerera enaku;
Eriisho ryangye nditaire aha bi barikundahuza.
Ori aho orikwija kuunyemererera n'oha?
Nk'oku ozibiire emitima yaabo kwetegyereza,
Nikyo otarikubaikiririza kusingura.
Amaisho g'abaana be garyabwerabwera.
Mpindukire ou abantu barikunuga butunu.
N'engingo zangye zoona ziri nk'ekibunda.
Abantu abagororokire nibakitangaarira,
