Kandi abatariho rubanja nibeezirika kurwanisa abatarikutiina Ruhanga;
Kandi oine engaro zishemeire naayeyongyera kugira amaani.
Mbwenu imwe mwena, mugarukye mwije;
Tihariho munyabwengye n'omwe ou ndikwija kushanga omuriimwe.
Ebiro byangye bihweire,
Ebi mbaire niinyenda kukora bifiire,
Nibyo byetengo by'omutima gwangye.
Nibagira ngu omushana guri haihi kuba nk'omwirima.
Ku naakwenda okuzimu ku eba eka yangye,
Naayara ekitabo kyangye omu mwirima,
Naagira ekiina nti: Niiwe tata,
N'enyogori nti: Ori maawe, nari munyaanyazi,
Mbwenu obwo amatsiko gangye gakaaba gakirahi?
Kandi ago matsiko garyareebwa oha?
Ku ndiba naahumwire nago omu mucuucu.
Bwanyima Biludaadi Omushuuhi yaagarukamu ati:
Nimuteekateekye, haza tubone kugamba.
Okatuteekateekaho nk'abataine bwengye?
Noogira ngu ensi neija kutsigwaho ahabwawe,
Nari orukiri rwihwe omu mwanya gwarwo?
N'endimi z'omuriro gwe tiziryaka;
Okuhweza kw'omu nju ye kuryaba omwirima,
N'etabaaza emuri ahaiguru eryaraazibwa.
N'enaama ze ziryamugwisa;
Akagyendera aha busya.
Omuriiti guryamukwata ekitsintsino,
N'omwiniko gumukwate, gumuhamye.
Aryategwa omurunga omu itaka,
Omutego gumukwatire omu kahanda.
Bimubingye bimuhambize.
Ku ariza kuteera entsibo, aryashanga akagwe kamugwereire.
Omubiri gwe guryamirwa kwo;
Eego, omujigaijo gwa rufu guryamira engingo ze.
Atwarwe aha mukama w'ebirikutiinisa.
Obuganga buryabuga ahu atwire hoona,
N'amataagi ge goomere eruguru.
N'eiziina rye tiririgaruka kugambwa mu mihanda.
Kandi acwerwe kimwe omu nsi.
N'obu yaakuba emponoka y'okutsigara ahu yaabaire atwire.
Nk'oku abaamubandiize baagizire obwoba.
Kandi ogwo nigwo mwanya gw'abatarikutiina Ruhanga.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Muryahitsya hi okuunyita kubi,
N'okumpendagura n'ebigambo?
Tikirikubaitsa enshoni kunkora kubi?
Hoona, n'obu naakubaire nsiisire,
Ekicumuro kyangye niinye kyakubaireho.
N'okuunyomesereza ahabw'enaku zangye,
akankubaakuba n'ekigoye kye.
Niinyeta munonga, kwonka mbura ow'okuncwera orubanja rw'oburyo.
N'emihanda yangye yaagitamu omwirima.
Yaanyiha ekirunga aha mutwe.
Ansheenyagwire embaju zoona, mpweireho,
N'amatsiko gangye agarandwire nk'ekiti.
Yanteekateekaho nk'omubisha we,
Zaarunda eby'okungotesa,
Zaateera orusiisira okwehinguririza eihema ryangye.
N'abamanyi bambeera kimwe abanyamahanga;
Abazaana bangye nibanteekateekaho nk'omunyaihanga,
Mbahindukiire omwijaija.
Niinyeta omuheereza wangye, tarikuunyetaba,
N'obu ndikumweshengyereza.
Ntamirwe omukazi wangye,
N'abaana ba maawe nibannuga.
Ku ndikwimuka, bangambuura.
N'abo abu mbaire ninkunda baanyehindukiriize.
Ntsigaize amaino gonka.
Ahabw'okuba omukono gwa Ruhanga gumpikireho.
Oku ndikushusha, tikurikubamara?
Bikahandiikwa omu kitabo!
Bikagumaho ebiro byona!
Kandi ku aryemera aha nsi aha muheru;
Bwanyima ndyareeba Ruhanga ntakigwine,
Eriisho ryangye, eritari ry'ondiijo, rikamwetegyereza.
Na mbwenu omutima gwangye nigugwa enshazi.
Ku muraabe nimugira ngu: Nitwija kumuhiiga,
Kandi ngu, enaku ze niwe zaakomookireho,
Ahabw'okuba ekiniga kireeta ekifubiro kya rurara,
Ngu mubone kuhamya ku hariho okucwa orubanja.
Bwanyima Zofari Omunaamasi yaagarukamu ati:
Mbwenu ebiteekateeko byangye nibingarukamu,
Ahabw'obwire obu nyine;
Nimpurira okuhana okurikunkwatsa enshoni;
Kwonka oku ndikureeba, hariho omwoyo ogurikungarukamu.
Omuntu yaaba kuteebwa aha nsi,
N'okushemererwa kw'abatarikutiina Ruhanga kuba okw'akaanya kakye?
Omutwe gwe gukaza omu bicu,
Abaamureebire baryagira bati: Mbwenu shi arahi?
Ahiigwe nk'okworekwa kwa nyekiro.
N'omwanya gwe tigurimureeba bundi.
Abaana be baryayekundisa abooro,
N'engaro ze ziryagarura eitungo rye;
Kwonka aryaziikwa nago omu mucuucu.
Akaguma naabunuriiriza ahansi y'orurimi rwe,
Akanga kubureka,
Kureka akaguma abuhunikire omu kanwa,
Bimubeere obushegu bw'encwera.
Amira obutungi, agaruka abutanaka,
Ruhanga abwiha omu nda ye.
Aitwe orurimi rw'empiri,
Nari otugyera otwijwire obwoki n'amakamo;
Ebi yaafeereire kubi aryabigarura, taribimira,
Amagoba g'obushuubuzi bwe tarigashemerererwa;
Ahabw'okuba akaita kubi abooro, yaabatsigaho;
Yaanyaga enju, ei atarombekire.
Tarirokora kintu na kimwe aha bi akunda.
Ku yaariire, taine ki yatsigire;
N'ahabw'ekyo okugogyera ke tikurigumaho.
Omu bunaku obu ariba aijwize ebintu bingi ebirikumumara, aryakyena;
Emikono y'abaine obujune boona eryamuteeraniraho.
Ruhanga aryamushukaho ekiniga kye kingi,
Akimugwiseho nk'enjura naarya.
Omwambi gw'omuringa gumucumite, gumwogyemu;
Omunwa gwagwo ogurikumurinkana gurugye omu ndurwe ye,
Eby'okutiinisa bimuhikyeho.
Omuriro ogutaakibwa bantu guryamumaraho,
Kandi ebitsigaire omu ihema rye ryona gubitookyeze.
Eiguru riryashuuruura okutahikiirira kwe,
N'ensi emwimukirire.
Eby'omu nju ye biryanyagwa,
Bitwarwe aha izooba ry'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.
N'obuhunguzi obu Ruhanga yaamuteereireho.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Haza obwo nimuba muunyaagiire.
Ku ndaaheze, mugumizemu nimusheka.
Mbwenu ekyakunzibira kugumisiriza niki?
Engaro muzite aha munwa.
Ku ndikwijuka oku ndi, ngira obwoba,
Omubiri gwangye gutetema.
Zikahika omu ngingo zaabukuru,
Zikagira obushoboorozi bw'amaani?
N'oruzaaro rwazo rugumaho nizirureeba.
N'enkoni ya Ruhanga tegahikaho.
Ente yaabo ezaara, tetorooga;
N'abandi baana baabo bagyenda nibatara.
Bashemerererwa okugamba kw'emikuri.
Bashuuma okuzimu bagwirwe gye.
Titurikwenda kumanya mihanda yaawe.
Kandi ku turikumushaba, nikitugasira ki?
Enaama z'enkozi z'ebibi zindi hare.
Bakaguubwaho akabi,
Ruhanga akabaha obusaasi abainiire ekiniga?
Kandi ni kangahi obu babaire nk'ebinyaatsi birikutwarwa omuyaga,
Nari nk'ebishushunga ebirikutwarwa akasooroora?
Ka Ruhanga abe niwe yaahana, abone kumanya ekibi kye!
Anywe ekiniga ky'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona!
Nimugira ngu, ebiriba aha b'enju ye abarimukurata aryaba naakibyetaho,
Haza ebiro by'emyaka byacwirweho?
Haza kunu niwe acwera ab'ekitiinisa emanja.
Omwe afa akiine amaani ge goona,
Aine obusingye, agaramisiriize;
Omubiri gwe gugomokire, guriitiraine,
N'omushokooro gw'omu magufa ge niguyagayaga.
Atakarozaga ha kirungi;
Bashwekwa enyogori.
Reeba, nimmanya ebi murikuteekateeka,
N'enaama mbi ezi muunyiniire;
Enju ei abasiisi baabaire batuuramu erahi?
Beitu shi, timukabuuzaga abagyenzi,
Kandi timurikwikiriza ebi bahamya,
Akajunwa aha kiro ky'okugirirwaho ekiniga?
Kandi n'oha owaakumuzimuurira ebi yaakozire?
Ku aritwarwa kuziikwa omu kiina,
Ekituuro kye kiryarindwa;
Abantu boona baryamukurata,
Ahakuba abaamubandiize bakaba batarikubarwa.
Mbwenu imwe nimubaasa muta kungumya n'ebitaine muhoho?
Ahakuba tihaine kindi ekitsigaire omu kugarukamu kwanyu kureka ebishuba.
Bwanyima Elifaazi Omutemaani yaagarukamu ati:
N'eky'amazima omunyabwengye obwengye bwe niwe bugasira.
Nari shi okushemeza emitwarize yaawe kiine eki kirikumwongyeraho?
Nikyo arikutonganira naiwe?
Ebibi byawe ti bingi?
Eby'okutahikiirira byawe tibiine bugarukiro;
Otaine ki ajwaire, waamujuura akajwaro ke.
N'oine enjara omwima eby'okurya.
Haza ow'obushoboorozi yaaba niwe yaatunga ensi,
Kandi ow'ekitiinisa yaagituuramu.
N'emikono y'abataine baishebo yaahendagurwa.
Ebihikiirizi ebirikutiinisa bikakutuntuza;
N'omwegyemure gw'amaizi gukushwekire.
Reeba, enyonyoozi z'ahaiguru munonga oku ziri hare omu rya nyakacu!
Naabasa kucwa orubanja, naayozya amaisho omu mwirima ndindindi?
Kandi naagyendera aha iguru eriri ahaiguru y'ensi.
Nooyenda kugumizamu omu muhanda ogwa ira,
Ogu abantu babi baatoiremu?
Bakabakurwa, baatwarwa obunaku bwabo butakahikire,
Omusingi gwabo gwatwarwa amaizi.
Kandi bati: Ow'obushoboorozi bwona naabaasa kutugira ata?
(Kwonka nyowe enaama z'ababi zindi hare!)
Abataine rubanja babashekyerera, babagaya,
Nibagira bati: Buzimazima ababisha baitu bacwekyereziibwe,
Kandi n'ebi batsigireho omuriro gwabimaraho.
Obwo nibwo ebirungi biriija ahariiwe.
N'ebigambo bye obigumye aha mutima.
Waata okutahikiirira hare n'amahema gaawe;
N'ezaabu ya Ofiri waagita omu mabaare g'omu kagyera,
N'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona yaaba eitungo ryawe,
Yaakubeera efeeza y'obuguzi bwingi,
Okaimutsya amaisho gaawe ahari Ruhanga.
Kandi ohikiirize ebi waahigire nooraganisa;
N'omushana guryajwera emihanda yaawe.
Kandi omucureezi Ruhanga aryamujuna.
Kandi oryajunwa ahabw'okushemera kw'engaro zaawe.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Okuteerwa kwangye nikuremeera okukira okutsinda kwangye,
Nkahika aha kitebe kye!
Nyijuza akanwa kangye eby'okwetonganira.
Obwo mmanya eki arangarukyemu
Nshoborokyerwa eki arangambire;
Akaantonganiise nk'omukuru ow'obushoboorozi bwingi?
Ngaaha! kureka akaanyetaireho.
Okwo niyo oine omutima ogugororokire yaakutonganira nawe;
Orikuncwera orubanja akarucwa, nkarusingira kimwe.
Nkigaruka enyima, amburira;
Nkitoora aha rubaju rwa bumosho ndemwa kumureeba;
Nkihindukira aha rwa buryo, nabwo ndemwa kumubona.
Ku ariheza kungyeza, ndyarugamu ninshusha ezaabu.
Omuhanda gwe ngugumiremu, tinaaguteishuka.
N'ebigambo by'omu kanwa ke mbikunzire okukira eby'okurya ebi ncumiirwe.
Eki ayenda, nikyo akora.
Kandi ebigambo bingi nk'ebyo abiine aha mutima.
Nikyo nyiniire obwoba omu maisho ge;
Ku ndikuteekateeka, mmutiina.
Ruhanga agwisize omutima gwangye enshazi,
Ow'obushoboorozi bwona antuntwize,
Ahabw'okuba nyehinguririziibwe omwirima,
Kandi omwirima ndindindi gwanshwenka ahamaisho.
Kandi ahabw'enki abarikumumanya batabureeba?
Bakanyagisa amaani amasyo, bakagariisa;
N'ente y'omufaakazi bakagikwatiriza;
N'abooro b'omu nsi boona bakeeshereka.
Nibasherura omu ihamba eky'okwita, kuba eby'okurya by'abaana baabo;
Batema obunyaatsi oburiibwa enyamaishwa omu ishwa,
Bahumba omu musiri gw'emizaabibu y'omusiisi;
Tibagira ky'okwefubika omu mbeho;
Beekinga omu mabaare babuzire obwegamo.
Hariho abashahura abataine baishebo, bakabaiha aha mabeere,
Bakakwatiriza omwereere w'omukyene;
Beekorera ebiba baine enjara;
Banyuukira amajuta g'emizeituuni omu misiri y'ababi,
Banyuukira omu manyuukiro gaabo ga viinyo baine eiriho.
Nibataka ngu baheebwe emikono,
Kwonka Ruhanga tayeta ha kutaka kwabo.
Tibamanya mihanda yaagwo,
N'obu kwakuba okuguma omu tuhanda twagwo.
Kandi nyekiro aba nk'omushuma.
Neegira eti, tihaine orandeebe;
Ayetwekyerera ahamaisho.
Nyomushana beekingirana, tibamanya kashana.
Ahabw'okuba aharibo omwirima ndindindi ni nk'akasheeshe,
Kandi ebitiinisa abantu omu mwirima ndindindi bo bakabimanyiira.
Omugabo gwabo omu nsi n'omukyeeno,
Tihariho munyuuki wa viinyo oza omu misiri yaabo y'emizaabibu.
Kandi n'Okuzimu nikwo egira abasiisire.
Enyogori zimurye nizimunuriiriza,
Tarigaruka kwijukwa bundi;
Okutahikiirira kwona kuryahendagurwa nk'ekiti.
Barya eby'engumba ezitakazaaraga,
Tibagira ki bagasira abafaakazi.
N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, abo bantu b'amaani Ruhanga abagumyaho n'amaani ge;
Ku baba beehweire amatsiko, abaimutsya;
Amaisho ge tigaruga ha mihanda yaabo.
Bagarurwa ahansi, baihwa omu muhanda nk'abandi boona,
Bagyeshwa nk'obushiisha bw'engano.
Ku biraabe bitari kwo, n'oha oraanyomesereze ekishuba,
akahamya ku ebi ndikugamba bitaine ku biri?
Bwanyima Biludaadi Omushuuhi yaagarukamu ati:
Obutegyeki n'ekitiinisa biinwe Ruhanga,
Kandi areeta obusingye omu myanya ye ey'omu iguru.
N'oha otajwerwa mushana gwe?
Owaazairwe omukazi naabaasa ata kuba oshemeire?
Reeba, n'okwezi tikurikumurinkana,
N'enyonyoozi tizishemeire mu maisho ge;
N'omwana w'omuntu omunyongororwa!
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu ati:
Eshi waamanya kuhwera otaine bushoboorozi!
Omukono ogutaine maani waamanya kugujuna!
Otaine bwengye waamanya kumuhabura,
Kandi waagamba ebigambo bingi ebirimu okumanya okuhikire!
Owaakugambisa ebyo bigambo n'oha?
Kandi omwoyo ogwakugambisa n'ogw'oha?
Hamwe n'ebituurayo.
Kandi n'owa nyamuteza taine ky'okweshweka.
N'ensi yaagihanika ahari busha.
Ebicu tibyataaguka.
Akishwekire ekicu kye.
Ahu omushana n'omwirima byatanira.
Zitangaarira okuhana kwe.
N'ahabw'obwengye bwe akacumita
N'omukono gwe agucumitisa ekijoka ekirikuhunga.
Kandi n'ebi tumuhuriraho ni bikye munonga nk'okugambirana omu kutu;
Kwonka okuhinda kw'obushoboorozi bwe n'oha orikubaasa kukwetegyereza?
Ow'obushoboorozi bwona otuntwize amagara gangye,
N'omwoyo gwa Ruhanga oku gukirikumpa okwitsya,
Eminwa yangye teribeiha,
N'orurimi rwangye tiruriryarya.
Okuhitsya obu ndifa, tindireka kuguma ndi omwesigwa;
Ahi naahika, omutima gwangye tigwine ki gurikunshinja omu bi ndakozire.
Omuzigu wangye abe nk'ababi,
N'orikuunyimukiirira abe nk'abatahikiriire.
Ruhanga ku araabe ari ow'okumucwekyereza, akaihaho amagara ge?
Ruhanga aryahurira okutaka kwe?
Aryashemerererwa omu W'obushoboorozi bwona,
Agume naatakira Ruhanga ebiro byona?
Niinyija kubeegyesa aha by'omukono gwa Ruhanga,
Tindikwija kubashereka by'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona.
Reeba, mwena mukabyereebeera;
Mbwenu shi, ahabw'enki mwena mubeereire kimwe abataine mugasho?
Obu nibwo buhunguzi obu abarikuhata baheebwa Ow'obushoboorozi bwona.
Kandi oruzaaro rwe tiruritunga by'okurya eby'okuruhaazya.
N'abafaakazi be tibaribacurira.
Akeegirira ebijwaro ebirikwingana eitaka,
N'efeeza ze ziryabaganwa abataine rubanja.
Nk'akaju akasharabagwa omurinzi.
Ku aza kubuurura ati amaisho, ashanga obutungi bwe bwagyenzire.
Akasooroora kamutwara nyekiro;
Gumwihira kimwe ahu yaaba ari.
N'obu yaakwenda kumwoga omu mikono kuhunga.
Nibeeshaanya ngu arugye omu ka ye.
Buzimazima efeeza egira ekiina eki etimbwamu,
N'ezaabu ei bashemeza egira omwanya gwayo;
Ekyoma kiihwa omu itaka,
N'omuringa guyagibwa omu butare.
Abantu tibeeta ha mwirima,
Bagwogamu, bahika aha muheru gwagwo,
Nibasherura obutare omu mwirima gw'ekibunda kya rufu.
Batimba ebiina hare n'ahu abantu batwire;
Beebwa abagyenzi, barereetera hare n'abantu,
Beecunda nibakora oku n'oku.
Kwonka okuzimu oshusha oti eitaka ryayo niritabuurwa omuriro.
Amabaare gaayo garugwamu safiro,
Kandi egira ezaabu y'omucuucu.
Ogwo muhanda tigumanywa mpungu,
N'eriisho ry'eishamba tirikagureebaga;
N'entare enshaarizi tekagurabamuga.
Arimiirira emizi y'enshozi, azijuumika;
Acwa emikura omu nkiri,
Kandi eriisho rye rireeba ekintu kyona eky'obuguzi bwingi;
Aigarira amaizi ngu garekye kujwa,
Kandi ekituura kisherekirwe, akiihayo kireebwa.
Nari shi okwetegyereza kukaaboneka hi?
Tihariho orikumanya omuhanda ogurikuza ei buri,
Tibuzoorwa mu nsi y'abahuriire.
Okuzimu neegira eti: Tiburi muriinye,
N'enyanja eti: Tiinye mbwine.
Kandi tihariho feeza erikupimwa ekahitsya obuguzi bwabwo.
Nari shohamu ey'obuguzi bwingi, n'obu yaakuba safiro.
Ezaabu n'ebirahuri tibirikwingana nabwo,
Kandi tiburikubaasa kuhingisibwa bintu by'ezaabu eshemeziibwe;
Obuguzi bwabwo nibukira obw'eruuru.
Kandi tiburikubaasa kwinganisibwa n'ezabu enungi.
Mbwenu shi obwengye buruga hi?
N'omwanya gw'okumanya gurahi?
Ahakuba busherekirwe abahuriire boona,
Kandi bushwekirwe ngu enyonyi z'omu mwanya zitabureeba.
Okuzimu na Rufu nibigira biti:
Tuhuriire nibabugambaho.
Kandi naamanya ahu butaaha;
Kandi ebiri ahansi y'eiguru byona abireeba.
Obu yaaha omuyaga ekiragiro,
Akarengyesa amaizi endengo,
Akateeraho emirabyo emihanda,
Obwo nibwo yaabureeba, akabumanyisa,
Akabuhamya, akabucondooza,
N'okutaana n'ekibi nikwo kwetegyereza.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagumizamu naacwa enfumu ze, naagira ati:
Nkaabaasibwa ki, mba nk'oku naabaire ndi omu meezi agaahingwire,
Nk'omu biro ebi Ruhanga yaabaire andindiramu,
Nindaba omu mwirima ahabw'okuhwezesa kwe,
Obu Ruhanga yaabaire akiine omukago n'eka yangye.
Abaana bangye bankiikiize;
N'orukiri niruunyitururira emigyera y'amajuta.
Ku naabaire nza aha irembo ry'orurembo,
Naata ekitebe kyange omu mbuga,
Abatsigazi bakaba bandeeba, bampigiza,
N'abagurusi baimuka, beemerera; q
Bataire engaro aha munwa;
Endimi zibaramata omu nkanka.
Okutu kwona okwabaire kumpurira, kuunyeta ohiiriirwe,
N'eriisho eryabaire rindeeba, rikihamya;
N'efuuzi etaine kihwera;
Kandi nkaba ndeetera omutima gw'omufaakazi kweshongora ahabw'okushemererwa.
Obwinganisa bwangye bukaba buri nk'omunagiro n'ekikwemba.
Empumi nkaba nzibeera amaisho,
N'ebirema mbibeera amaguru;
N'abu ntarikumanya, mbuuririza ekirikubasaasa;
Mbanagisa ebi baine omu maino.
Nkanyise ebiro byangye bibe nk'omusheenyi;
N'amataagi gangye gatondweho orume, burugyeho busheeshe,
N'obuta bwangye bugume buri busya omu ngaro zangye.
Obwo abantu bakaba bantega okutu,
Batengyereza eki ndaahanuure bahunami.
Ebigambo byangye bibatoonyereraho.
Baashama nk'abategyereize enjura ya katumba.
Kandi bakaba batammaraho kushemuuka.
Nkaba mbaihiramu ebi baraakore, nshutama nabo nk'omukuru waabo,
Mbatuuramu nk'omugabe omu ngabo ze,
Kandi nk'orikugumya abarikucura.
Abu naakugayire baishebo ngu batahika embwa ezirinda obusyo bwangye,
Nibanteerera enaku.
Emikono yaabo ekaangasira ki?
Bahweire aha magufa ahabw'obukyene n'enjara,
Nibaguga eitaka ryomire ery'aha mbuga,
Nibashoroma emifura n'amababi g'ebindi bishaka,
N'enkonya z'ebinyagashani nibo by'okurya byabo.
Nibacuubwa omu bantu,
Enduuru neebajuga enyima nk'abashuma.
N'amaaya g'omu itaka, n'enyanga z'omu mabaare.
Beeteeranira omu bicuragyenyi;
Nibabingwa omu nsi n'enkoba.
Buzima mbabeereire eky'okucweraho enfumu;
Kandi tibarikutiina kuncwera mumaisho;
Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga ayugize omurunga gwangye, yancureeza.
Tibakingirira kashoni.
Bambinga, bamburabuza,
Barunda eby'okutemberaho ngu bancwekyereze;
Baita omuhanda gwangye, bakanyisa enaku zangye;
Tihaine orikubazibira.
Baija nk'abarikuraba ahasheenyukire ahahango,
Baayekumbagariza aha rugo rugwire, bangwaho.
Ekitiinisa kyangye kibingirwe nk'ekirikubingwa omuyaga;
Okugogyeera kwangye nikuyaayuuka nk'ekicu.
Ebiro by'obusaasi bimbumbatiire;
Obuhuruzi oburikunsaasa tiburikutuuza;
Ahabw'amaani gaabwo ekijwaro kyangye nikisiisikara,
Nibunniga nk'ebitsya by'ekanzu.
Naahinduka nk'omucuucu n'eiju.
Ninkutakira, torikungarukamu;
Nyemereire, torikuunyetaho.
Nompiiga n'omukono gwawe ogw'amaani.
Onnaga oku n'oku n'eihunga ry'amaani;
Eego nimmanya ku orimpitsya ha kufa,
N'omu nju eyaateereirweho abahuriire boona.
N'omu kabi ke tateera enduuru?
Omutima gwangye tigurasaasiibwe omworo?
Nkitegyereza omushana, haija omwirima.
Omutima gwangye nigurabanamu tigutuurize;
Ebiro by'okubonabona byampikaho.
Nyemerera omu iteeraniro, ninteera enduuru.
Mugyenzi wa zaamaaya.
N'amagufa gangye gucumikirwemu omuriro.
N'omukuri gwangye gukateererwa abarikurira.
Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kureeba omwishiki, nkamwetenga?
Kandi obuhunguzi bwangye oburikuruga aha W'obushoboorozi bwona ahaiguru bukaaba ki?
Ebihikiirizi tibigwera abatahikiriire,
N'akagwe kakagwera enkozi z'ebibi?
Akabara entambwe zangye zoona?
Ku ndaabe ndagyenzire nimbeiha,
Ebigyere byangye bikeehuuta kuza kugobya,
Ruhanga amanye obwesigwa bwangye!)
N'omutima gwangye gukakurata ebi amaisho gangye geetenga,
Nari engaro zangye ku ziraabe ziragiirweho akabara koona,
N'ebi naahingire omu musiri gwangye bikakuurwamu.
Nkagwera aha rwigi rwa mutaahi wangye,
N'abandi bakamujuumarira;
Eego, kikaabaire ekibi ky'okufubirwa abaramuzi.
Kandi ekirikubaasa kurandura ebi mpingire byona.
Ku ndaabe ndagayire orubanja rw'omuhuuku wangye, nari orw'omuzaana wangye,
Obu bantonganisa,
Nari shi, ku yaakubimbuuza, nkaamugarukamu ki?
Owaatuhangire omu nda t'omwe?
Nari shi, okumara amatsiko amaisho g'omufaakazi?
Nari hariho obu ndariire ak'okurya kangye nyenka,
Efuuzi etakaboneho?
Kureka okuruga omu butsigazi bwangye nkarera ogwo mworo nka ishe,
N'omufaakazi nkamureeberera, okwiha obu naaruga omu nda ya maawe.
Nari enshoberwa ebuzire eky'okweshweka,
Kandi atamarwe mbeho oruhu rw'entaama zangye;
Ahabw'okureeba aha irembo orikugwera orubaju rwangye,
Eibega ryangye nirikataane n'orwano,
N'omukono gwangye gukanyukuka omu ngingo!
Ahabw'okuba ebihikiirizi ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga bikaba biinyitsa obwoba,
Kandi ndemwa kugumisiririza ekitiinisa kye ekingi.
Nkagira ezaabu eshemeziibwe nti, Niiwe bwesigye bwangye,
Nari ahabw'omukono gwangye kutunga bingi;
Nari okwezi nikugyenda nikumurinkana,
Kandi omutima gwangye gukabeihwabeihwa bwesherekye,
Akanwa kangye kakanywegyera engaro zangye,
Nari shi nkeesiima habw'akagwe akaamugwaho?
Ngu mmushabire okufa nimmukyeena.)
N'oha omuriimwe otaarya nyama, akahaaga?
Kureka nkaba nyigurira omuhinguzi weena.)
Nkashereka omu kifuba okutahikiirira kwangye,
N'okutiina okugaywa ab'emiryango yaitu,
Kikandeetera kuhunama n'okutashohora;
(Reeba, akamanyiso kangye nkaka! Ow'obushoboorozi bwona angarukyemu,
Naanye ndeebe ebirego ebihandiikirwe omubisha wangye.)
Buzimazima nkaabiheeka aha mabega,
Mbijwara nk'ekirunga,
Nkaamumanyisa ebi naakozire byona omu mitwarize yangye,
Mmuhika haihi nk'omunyiginya.
Ekyaro kyangye ku kiraabe kirantabaariize,
Entabire zaakyo zikaririra hamwe,
Nari shi nkareetera bakama baakyo kufa,
N'orumbugu rukamera omuri sayiri.
Ebigambo bya Yobu byagarukira aha.
Bwanyima Elihu mwene Barakeeli, Omubuuzi ow'omu muryango gwa Raamu, yaagira ekiniga. Yaagirira Yobu ekiniga ahabw'okweyeta ohikiriire okukira Ruhanga;
kandi yaakigirira na bagyenzi ba Yobu abo bonshatu, ahabw'okubura eky'okumugarukamu, n'obu baraabe bahamize ku ari omusiisi.
Kwonka Elihu akaba ategyereize kugamba na Yobu, ahabw'okuba abo bakaba nibamukira obukuru.
Elihu ku yaareebire abo bonshatu baabura eky'okugarukamu, yaagira ekiniga.
Ndi muto; imwe muri abagurusi;
Nikyo kindeeteire kutiina, ntarahukye kubamanyisa eki ndikuteekateeka;
Nkagira nti: Ka hagambe abaine ebiro bingi,
Abamazire emyaka mingi babe nibo baayegyesa obwengye.
N'omwoyo oguri omuriwe, omwitsyo gw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona.
N'abagurusi tibo barikumanya by'oburyo.
Nikyo ndikugirira nti: Muntegye amatu,
Naanye mbagambire ebi ndikuteekateeka.
Reeba, mbaire ntegyereize ebigambo byanyu;
Obu mubaire nimuteekateeka eby'okugamba,
Naagira ngu, mpurire ebi muraagambe.
Buzimazima ntaireho omutima kubahurira,
Kwonka tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe oyemeize Yobu,
N'obu kwakuba okugarukamu ebigambo bye.
Tihariho muntu owaakumubaasa, kureka akaabaasibwa Ruhanga.
Manya, ebi agambire, tiinye ahakaniise;
Naanye tindikwija kumugarukisamu ebyanyu.
Bashobeirwe, tibakigarukamu,
Tibaine ky'okugamba.
Mbwenu mpuname, ngu niho batakiine ky'okugamba,
Kureka okwemerera aho, bakabura eky'okugarukamu?
Naanye niinyija kugira eki naagarukamu,
Ngambe eki ndikuteekateeka;
Ahabw'okuba nyine bingi munonga eby'okugamba;
Omwoyo oguri omuriinye nigwo gurikungyema.
Nigwenda kubaruka nk'efurebe za viinyo y'omutahe.
Nyashame, mbone kugarukamu.
N'obu kwakuba okugira ou naashunga;
Ahabw'okuba timmanya kushunga;
Ku naakukikora, Omuhangi wangye akaanyita kitaraariire.
Mbwenu, Yobu, ninkweshengyereza, hurira ebi ndikugamba;
Ote omutima aha bigambo byangye byona.
Reeba naayashama,
Orurimi rw'omu kanwa kangye nirugamba;
Ebigambo byangye nibyoreka ku omutima gwangye gugororokire,
Kandi ebi ndikumanya nibyo eminwa yangye eraagambe etaine buryarya.
N'omwityso gw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona nigwo gumpa amagara.
Tebeekanisa gye ebigambo byawe omu maisho gangye, oyemerere aho.
Naanye nkahangwa omu itaka.
Reeba, omuriinye tiharimu kirikutiinisa ekishemereire kukwitsa obwoba;
Tindikwija kukurusya.
Buzimazima, ebi obaire noogamba, mbihuriire,
N'eiraka ryabyo ryampika omu matu.
Ndi oshemeire, kandi omuriinye tiharimu kutahikiirira;
Nanteekateekaho nk'omuzigu we;
Aguma ataire eriisho aha mihanda yangye yoona.
Reeba, ka nkugarukyemu, omuri ebyo tohikire;
Ahakuba Ruhanga ni mukuru okukira omuntu.
Tarikwija kugarukamu kigambo kyangye na kimwe?
N'obu omuntu araabe atakyetaho,
Abantu baahirwayo, bagwejegyereire omu bitanda byabo.
Akabatiinisa naabahana,
Ngu abone kuzibira omuntu ebi arikwenda kukoa,
N'okumumaramu amaryo.
N'amagara ge kumarwaho rurara.
N'omu magufa ge haguma harimu orugamba,
N'obu byakuba ebirikunura munonga tabigirira ifa.
N'amagufa ge, agaabaire gatarikureebwa, gatunama.
Omwoyo gwe gwiririra Ekiina,
N'amagara ge gairirira abahwerekyerezi.
Nangwa omwe wenka omuri rukumi ow'okumumanyisa ebimushemereire,
Yaamugirira embabazi naagira ati:
Mujune, atagwa omu Kiina; ndeebire, eky'okumucungura.
Agire amaani nk'agu yaabaire aine omu butsigazi bwe.
Akaija ah'ari n'okushemererwa,
Akagambira abantu eby'okujuna kwe,
Akagira ati: Nkashiisha, naakiikamya ebyabaire bihikire, tinaabiturwa;
N'amagara gangye garyareeba omushana.
Naatwaza atyo omuntu kabiri nari kashatu,
Ngu areebe omushana gw'amagara.
Nyaabura 'we, Yobu, tega amatu, ompurire;
Ohuname, ngambe.
Gamba; ahabw'okuba niinyenda kukwihaho orubanja.
Ku oraabe otakiine, ntega okutu;
Ohuname, nkuhabure obwengye.
Bwanyima Elihu yaagaruka yaagira ati:
Imwe abaine okumanya, muntegye amatu;
Ahabw'okuba okutu kutaanisa ebigambo,
Nk'oku orurimi rumanya eby'okurya.
Tweyihiremu ekirungi;
Ruhanga anyihireho ebinshemereire.
Obuhuta bwangye tiburikutambwa, n'obu ndaabe ntaine kicumuro.
Orikugotomera okugaya nk'amaizi,
Naakwatanisa n'abantu babi.
Tikwine ki kurikugasira omuntu.
Nikikabure Ruhanga okukora ebitahikire,
Ow'obushoboorozi bwona okukora kubi!
Kandi amureetere okuhikwaho ebishemereire emitwarize ye.
Ow'obushoboorozi bwona tariita manja.
Nari shi n'oha owaamwekoreize ensi yoona?
Yaayegarurira omwitsyo gwe,
Omuntu agaruka omu mucuucu.
Ku oraabe nooyetegyereza, hurira eki,
Otegye okutu eki ndikugamba.
Noogira ngu orikwanga obwinganisa, aryategyeka?
Okaacwera Ohikiriire kandi Ow'obushoboorozi orubanja kumusinga,
N'abakungu oti: Muri babi!
N'obu kwakuba okweta aha batungi okukira abooro,
Haza boona yaabahangire n'emikono ye?
N'omu itumbi abantu batetema, bagyenderayo,
Ab'amaani baihwaho, bataihirweho mukono gw'omuntu.
Kandi ayetegyereza emigyendere ye yoona.
Ahu enkozi z'ebibi zaakubaasa kweshereka.
Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga tarikwetenga kugaruka kwetegyereza omuntu
Ataikaizire mu maisho ge kucwerwa orubanja.
Ata abandi omu myanya yaabo.
Ahabw'okumanya atyo ebi barikukora,
Abajuumika nyekiro, bacwekyerera.
Abateerera omu maisho g'abantu,
Naabatura obubi bwabo,
Baayanga kuta omutima aha mihanda ye yoona.
Yaahurira okutaka kw'abarikubonabonesibwa.
Ku yaakushereka ah'amaisho ge, n'oha owaakumureeba,
Yaaba ihanga, nari omuntu?
Ngu omuntu otarikutiina Ruhanga arekye kutegyeka,
Akanaga abantu omu mutego.
Mbwenu hariho oragizire Ruhanga ati:
Mpanirwe; tindigaruka kucumura;
Ku ndaabe naakozire kubi, tindigarukira?
Aryakuzimuurira nk'oku orikwenda?
Manya niiwe oshemereire kwihamu eki orikwenda, tiinye.
N'ahabw'ekyo gamba eki orikumanya.
Abantu abarikwetegyereza, n'omunyabwenge weena orikumpurira,
Nabaija kugira bati:
Ebigambo bye tibirimu bwengye.
Nkaahenwa ki, Yobu agyezibwa okuhika aha muheru,
Ahakuba naagarukamu nk'oku ababi bagarukamu.
Atuteerera engaro naatuhena,
Agamba ebigambo bingi eby'okuhakanisa Ruhanga.
Elihu yaagaruka yaagira ati:
Iwe okugira oti: Okuhikiirira kwangye nikukira okwa Ruhanga,
Noogira ngu hati ndi gye okukira oku naakubaire ndi, kuri naasiisire?
Oyetegyereze ebicu, ebiri ahaiguru munonga okukukira.
N'eby'okushiisha byawe, ku biraabe bikanyire, biine oku bimugizire?
Nari shi, ahairwe ki ekirugire omu ngaro zaawe?
Ebibi byawe nibisaasa omuntu-buntu nkaiwe,
Kandi okuhikiirira kwawe nikugasira omwana w'omuntu.
Bashaba kuheebwa emikono ahabw'okuhata ab'obushoboorozi.
Oreetera abantu kweshongora nyekiro,
Kandi otuha obwengye okukira enyonyi z'omu mwanya?
Ahabw'amaryo g'abantu babi.
N'ekya buzima Ruhanga tahurira barikurizibwa busha,
Kandi Ow'obushoboorozi bwona tabyetaho;
Orubanja rwawe ruri omu maisho ge,
Kandi ngu omutegyereize!
Kandi nk'oku ateeta ha banyamaryo,
Akafukunkuka ebigambo bitarimu bwengye.
Kandi Elihu yaagumizamu naagira ati:
Ngumisiririza kakye, nkworekye,
Ahakuba nkiine ebi ndikwenda kugamba ahabwa Ruhanga.
Ngambe nimpamya ku Omuhangi wangye ahikiriire;
Oine okumanya okuhikire ari hamwe naiwe.
N'ow'obushoboorozi, kandi amaani ge gari omu kwetegyereza.
Kwonka abarikubonabona abaha ebibashemereire.
Kureka abashutamya n'abagabe aha bitebe obutarugaho, batunguuka.
Baakwatwa emirunga y'okubonabona,
Kuhamya ku baabikoreise amaryo.
Abaragiira kuruga omu kutahikiirira.
Bamara ebiro byabo omu kugogyeera,
N'emyaka yaabo bagimara bagwirwe gye.
Kwonka ku banga kuhurira, bamarwaho na rurara,
Bafa bataine kibamanyire.
Ku ababoha, tibataka ngu bahwerwe.
N'omuheru gw'amagara gaabo guba okuhemuka.
Aigura amatu gaabo ahabw'okureeba enaku.
Akutaire ahagarami ahatafunzire,
Haza ebyakutairwe aha meeza yaawe biba eby'ebishaju.
Kwonka omutima gwawe tigubamu kindi kureka okucwera ababi emanja;
Mbwenu orubanja rw'oburyo orukushemereire rwakukwata.
Nibiija kukumara, bikuzibire kureeba enaku?
Eki amahanga gaihirwaho, gakacwekyerezibwa.
Oyerinde, orekye kuta amaisho aha kutahikiirira;
Ahakuba otooraine kutwaza otyo, okukira okubonabona.
N'oha oyegyesa nkawe?
Nari shi n'oha owaakumugira ati: Waashobya.
Ogu abantu baabaire beeshongoraho.
Abantu boona bakaba bagureeba,
Omuntu agwetegyerereza hare.
Emyaka ye terikubaasa kubarwa;
Akihindura enjura,
Ehiika ahaiguru, ekasheesheka ahansi,
Ekateera abantu, ekagwa nyingi munonga.
N'oku okuhinda kuhindira omu ihema rya Ruhanga?
Kandi ashweka emizi y'enyanja.
Kandi nibyo ahaisa abantu eby'okurya bingi munonga.
Agiragiira; ahi yaagiragiira, ehateera.
Okuhinda kwayo kumanyisa ebye,
Kandi kumanyisa enyamaishwa ku eihunga ryaza kwija.
Kandi ebi nabyo bireetera omutima gwangye
Kutetema n'okwesikura.
Yeimwe, nimuhurire okuhinda kw'eiraka rye,
Okurikurigitira omu kanwa ke.
Akwohereza kubuga eiguru ryona,
N'okutyankana kw'emirabyo ye kuhika aha muheru gw'ensi.
Arigitsa eiraka ry'ekitiinisa kye,
Eiraka rye ku rihurirwa, tazibira nkuba.
Akora ebikuru ebi tutarikubaasa kushoboorora;
Ahabw'okuba agambira ebirika ati: Gwa ahansi,
Kandi agira orutoonyerera n'enjura ati: Mugire amaani.
Ngu boona bamanye ebi arikukora.
Ziguma omu nyanga zaazo,
N'embeho eruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
N'ebiyanja bikwata okuhika ahi birikugarukira.
Ekicu kikwaitse akiijuza amaizi,
Abamba ebicu ebirimu enkuba ze.
Ngu bibone kuhikiiriza eki arikubiragiira kukora kyona
Omu nsi etuurwamu abantu.
Nari ahabw'ensi ye, nari ahabw'embabazi ze.
Iwe Yobu, hurira ebi; ba orekire,
Obanze oteekateekye aha mirimo ya Ruhanga erikutangaaza.
Noomanya oku Ruhanga ateeraho ebicu bye ebiragiro,
Akaragiira omurabyo gwe kubityankaniramu?
Ku guri omurimo ogurikutangaaza ogw'Ogwo oine okumanya okuhikire,
Iwe, ou ebijwaro bitagata,
Ensi ku egira obucureera ahabw'omuyaga gw'obukizi-bwa-buryo?
Erigumire nk'endeeberwamu eheesirwe?
Ahabw'okuba titurikubaasa kutebeekanisa bigambo byaitu ahabw'omwirima.
Akaagambirwa ku ndikwenda kugamba nawe?
Hariho omuntu oyenda kumirirwa kimwe?
Kandi na hati abantu tibarikubaasa kureeba omushana ogurikumurinkana omu iguru
Omuyaga gwaheza kuhinguraho, gwayeruuraho ebicu.
Ruhanga ajwaire ekitiinisa kirikwitsa obwoba.
Rugambwa omu bushoboorozi, taita manja,
Kandi omu kuhikiirira kwe okuhikire taribonabonesa.
Kandi tayeta ha muntu weena orikweyeta omunyabwengye.
Ebirikushereka enaama?
Yezirikye mashaija,
Naaza kukubuuza, naiwe ongarukyemu.
Ku oraabe nooyetegyereza, ngambira.
N'oha owaataireho orugyero rwayo, ku oraabe noomumanya?
Nari shi, owaagigyereise omugoye n'oha?
Omusingi gwayo gukabyarwa ahari ki,
Nari shi, owaataireho eibaare ry'obuhamizo n'oha,
N'abaana ba Ruhanga boona bakateera akaari k'okushemererwa?
Obu yaatimbira omu nda y'ensi,
N'omwirima ndindindi gukaba engozi yaayo,
Nkataho empimbi n'enyigi,
Aha niho ebingonzi byawe by'amaryo biricungirirwa?
Kandi oramanyiise omushekye omwanya gwagwo,
Okakunkumura ababi abagirimu?
Ensi ehinduka, eba nk'eibumba eritairweho akamanyiso,
N'ebintu byona bireebeka nk'ebijwaro byayo.
N'emikono yaabo ebangire ehendeka.
Nari oragyendeire okuzimu ahagati y'enyanja?
Nari orareebire amarembo g'ekibunda kyayo?
Oramanyire obuhango bw'ensi?
Ku oraabe noomanya ebyo byona, bigambe.
Omuhanda ogurikuza ahu omushanga gutuura, gurahi,
Kandi omwirima gwo gutaaha hi,
N'okumanya emihanda erikuza omu ka yaagwo?
N'ebiro byawe bikaba byabaire baingi!
Nari shi, orareebire ahu orubaare rubiikwa,
Kurukoresa omu biro by'orugamba n'obweme?
Omushana ku guba nigugyenda, gutoora muhanda ki?
Nari shi, omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba guraba hi, niguza kutaataanira omu nsi?
Akaha omurabyo gw'enkuba omuhanda,
Okugwisa enjura aha nsi etarimu bantu,
Omu ihamba eritatuurwamu,
Ngu ribone kumera obunyaatsi bw'oruhiira?
Nari n'oha owaazaire amatondo g'orume?
Kandi n'oha owaazaire embeho y'enyababa?
Amaizi gakwata gaba nk'eibaare,
N'aha mutwe gw'amaizi hakwata.
Nari shi okuyuzya emirunga ya Orioni?
Nari shi noobaasa kwebembera Arukutuuro n'abaana baayo?
Noobaasa kuhamya obutegyeki bwaryo aha nsi?
Ngu amaizi gakweshukyeera?
Noobaasa kwohereza enkuba, ngu zigyende,
Zikakwetaba zitakagyenzire ziti: Turi aha?
N'oha owaataire obwengye omu bicu,
Nari owaahaire oruho okwetegyereza?
N'oha orikubaasa kubara ebicu ahabw'obwengye bwe?
N'oha orikubaasa kushuka amaizi g'omu furebe z'ahaiguru,
Obu omucuucu guba ebyondo,
N'ebitaka bikakwatana?
Nari okumara emigunju y'entare eifa,
Nari ziri omu myanya ei zigwereiremu?
Ebyana byakyo ku bitakira Ruhanga,
Byazeegyerera nibisherura eby'okurya?
Nari noobaasa kureeba enuuma neezaara?
Okaabaasa kumanya ameezi agu zimara zihakire,
Nari shi noomanya obunaku obu zizaariramu,
Zihenda enkokora, zizaara abaana baazo,
Zikira obusaasi?
Abaana baazo bagira amaani, bakurira omu bwerere,
Bacuuka, tibagaruka ahari zaanyinabo.
Owaarekire enturegye kugyenda nk'oku zirikwenda n'oha?
Kandi n'oha owaazitsibwire,
N'ensi y'engugo kuba obutaaho bwazo?
Kandi tizihurira kwamira kw'orikuziseetura.
Zitarangira omu nshozi ei ziriira,
Nizisherura ekintu kyona ekibisi.
Nari shi okuraara omu kihongore kyawe?
Noobaasa kukomerana embogo n'omuguha, ekaguma omu minyarara neehinga?
Neebaasa kwanjara eitaka ry'omu mpanga ekukuratiire?
Noija kugyesiga, ngu ahabw'okuba amaani gaayo ni maingi,
Nari shi, noija kugirekyera omurimo gwawe?
Noogyesiga ngu neija kugaruka,
Kukureetera oburo bwawe aha mbuga?
Amapapa ga maaya egateera n'amaryo;
Beitu noogira ngu ago mapapa n'amooya gaayo gagira embabazi?
Ahabw'okuba amahuri gaayo egatsiga aha itaka,
Gabumbatirwa omucuucu;
Eyebwa ku ekigyere kyakugaata,
Nari enyamaishwa ku yaakubaasa kugaribatiirira.
N'obu eraabe ehendekyera busha, kwonka tetiina.
Tiyaagiha kwetegyereza.
Ku eba neeyenda kuhunga,
Egaya embaraasi n'ogitembire.
Niiwe oha embaraasi amaani gaayo?
Niiwe waagihaire omugaara gw'okugijangarara omu bitsya?
Ekitiinisa ky'okukanga kwayo kiitsa obwoba.
Erahiza omu ruhanga, neeyemanya amaani;
Eshohora kubugaabugana n'engabo eziine eby'okurwanisa.
Eshekyerera obwoba; tegira ki etiina,
Tehunga rurara.
Omutana, eicumu eririkutyanka n'emihunda
Bigibomborekanira aha mugongo.
Tebaasa kuhamira hamwe yaahurira eiraka ry'enzamba.
Ku ehurira eiraka ry'enzamba, egira eti: Otyo!
Ekagira orugamba hare, endigito n'orwari eby'abakuru b'engabo.
Akaca kashungyezibwa obwengye bwawe,
Obu kajanjamura amapapa gaako, kagyemire obukiizi-bwa-buryo?
Kandi nikyo kiryarikisa ahaiguru?
Omu bibaare nimwo ritaaha, rikahagira eka yaaryo,
N'omu bicokoromi by'amabaare.
Ryema okwo, riranzya eki riraateere;
amaisho gaaryo gakireebera hare.
Ahu omutumbi guri, niho riza.
MUKAMA yaagaruka yaagira Yobu ati:
Orikuteera empaka na Ruhanga, naakigarukyemu.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu MUKAMA ati:
Mbwenu nkugarukyemu ki? Naata engaro aha munwa.
Eego nangwa ni kabiri, kwonka tinkyeyongyera.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaagarukamu Yobu omu muyaga mwingi gw'akasooroora ati:
Naaza kukubuuza, naiwe ongambire.
N'okuncwera orubanja, ngu iwe obone kurwihwaho?
Noobasa kuhindisa eiraka nkawe?
Yejwekye ekitiinisa n'okumurinkana kwakyo.
Oreebe omuntu weena ow'amaryo, omucwe busha.
Kandi oribatiirire ababi ahu beemereire.
Obakome ahamaisho bari omu mwanya ogwekiikire.
Ku omukono gwawe gwa buryo gurikubaasa kukujuna.
Reeba
Neerya obunyaatsi nk'ente.
Reeba amaani g'omu bishohoro byayo,
N'amaani g'enyama z'ebikamba by'enda yaayo.
Ehanika omukira gwayo nk'omwereezi;
Emitsi y'omu kibero kyayo erabainemu.
Amagufa gaayo ni nk'enshekye z'emiringa;
Amaguru gaayo ni nk'empimbi z'ebyoma.
Omu byahangirwe Ruhanga niyo nyamaishwa rugambwa;
Owaagihangire wenka niwe arikubaasa kugiirira haihi na rurara.
Ei enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba zoona zikinira.
Omu mwanya ogwekiikire omu mubimbiri n'omu rufunjo.
Ebiti ebiine ekicuucu bigisangira;
Emikinga y'aha mugyera egyehinguririza.
Reeba, omugyera ku guba gwijwire, tetiina;
N'obu Yorudani yaakwijura ekaboogaboogyera omu kanwa kaayo, teine ki eyetaho.
Noogira ngu hariho owaakugikwata neereeba,
Nari akagirabya omurunga omu nyindo?
Nari okukomesa orurimi rwayo omurunga?
Nari okufumura oruba rwayo n'eirobo?
Noogira ngu neija kukweshengyereza,
Nari okugamba gye naiwe?
Ngu ebe omuhuuku waawe ebiro byona?
Okaagizaanisa nk'orikuzaanisa enyonyi,
Nari okaagita aha nkomo kushetsya abazaana baawe?
Abajubi bakaacwererana obuguzi bwayo;
Bakaagibaganisiza abashuubuzi?
Okaabaasa kwijuza oruhu rwayo eshando,
Nari omutwe gwayo engobe?
Gibangire omukono; kwonka oijukye ku ruri orugamba,
Kandi torikigarukira.
Reeba, omuntu okugigiraho amatsiko n'okweruhiza busha;
Ahakuba owaakugicwa ati eriisho, omutima gukaamuhwa omunda.
Tihariho manzi eyaakwehanga kugiturukirira;
Mbwenu shi n'oha owaakubaasa kuunyemerera omumaisho?
Byona ebiri ahansi y'eiguru oku ringana n'ebyangye.
Tindikwija kureka kugamba aha ngingo zaayo,
Nari aha maani gaayo amaingi, nari aha kyemerero kyayo ekirungi.
N'oha owaakujuura ekijwaro kyayo eky'enyima?
N'oha owaakwozya omu kooti zaayo ez'ekyoma?
N'oha owaakubaasa kugyashamura?
Amaino gaayo oku gakiikiize goona nigaitsa obwoba.
Engamba zaayo ezigumire nizo eyehimbisizaho,
Zitembekyeraine hamwe, zaaramatana.
Engamba emwe ekwataine n'endiijo,
Kireetera embeho kutazirabamu.
Zikwataine, tizirikubaasa kutaanisibwa.
Ku eyetsyamura, orwoya rwayo rurabya nk'omushana;
Kandi amaisho gaayo ni nk'ebitsigye by'omushekye gurikujuguta.
Omu kanwa kaayo harugamu emuri ezirikwaka,
Ensasi z'omuriro zitaraaka.
Omu nyindo zaayo hacumbuukamu omwika,
Nk'ogw'enyungu erikutogota, nari nk'ekibingo ekirikusya.
Orwoya rwayo rwatsya amakara,
Kandi omu kanwa kaayo harugamu endimi z'omurio.
Omu bitsya byayo nimwo amaani gaba,
Okutiinisa kwayo kugyenda nikugigurukaguruka omumaisho.
Enyama z'omubiri gwayo zihingamiraine,
Zigihamiireho, tizirikubaasa kugirugaho.
Omutima gwayo gugumire nk'eibaare;
Buzimazima gugumire nk'orubengo.
Ku eimuka, amamanzi gatiina,
Ahabw'okukangarana kwayo gagwa eiraro.
N'obu baakugiteera rurara, teine ki yaakugiitsa,
N'obu ryakuba eicumu, nari endiga, nari omuhunda.
Ebyoma ebireeba nk'ekumbwe,
N'emiringa nk'ekiti kijunzire.
Emyambi tegibinga;
Ahariyo amabaare g'enjungu ni nk'ebishushunga.
Emihini ahariyo neeshusha nk'embuba,
Eshekyerera okukomangana kw'emihunda.
Ku erambira aha byondo, eba nk'ekyoma kirikuhuura.
Ereetera amaizi g'okuzimu kutogota nk'enyungu,
Ehindura enyanja nk'amajuta.
Ahi yaaraba, ehatsiga ekirari kirikwengyengyeta;
Omuntu akaateekateeka ngu ahagati y'amaizi hamezire enju.
Omu nsi tiharimu erikugishusha,
Ekihangirwe ekitagira bwoba.
Ereeba ebiri ahaiguru byona,
Niyo mukama w'ebinyamaryo byona.
Bwanyima Yobu yaagarukamu MUKAMA ati:
Kandi tihariho kirikubaasa kuzibira eki omaririire kukora.
Nikyo kingambiise ebi ntarikushoborokyerwa,
Ebirikutangaaza munonga ebindengire,
Ebi mbaire ntarikumanya.
Nkubuuze, haza naiwe ongarukyemu.
Nkaba nkuhuriza amatu,
Kwonka hati eriisho ryangye ryakwereebera.
Nkeeteisiza omu mucuucu n'omu iju.

MUKAMA ku yaaherize kugambira Yobu ebyo bigambo, yaagira Elifaazi Omutemaani ati: Nkugiriirre ekiniga kingi, iwe na bangyenzi baawe bombi, ahabw'okuba timungambireho bihikire, nk'omwiru wangye Yobu oku agizire.

N'ahabw'ekyo hati mutware enimi mushanju n'empaya z'entaama mushanju, muze ow'omwiru wangye Yobu, mwetambirireyo ekitambo ky'okwotsya; bwanyima omwiru wangye Yobu naija kubashabira; ahabw'okuba niwe ndikwija kwikiriza, nkareka kubatwaza nk'obushema bwanyu oku buri; ahakuba timungambireho bihikire nk'omwiru wangye Yobu oku agizire.
liz Elifaazi Omutemaani na Biludaadi Omushuuhi na Zofari Omunaamasi nikwo kugyenda, bakakora eki MUKAMA yaabaragiira, na MUKAMA akaikiriza okushaba kwa Yobu.

Bwanyima beene ishe boona na banyaanya, n'abaabaire nibamumanya baija ah'ari, baariira hamwe nawe omu nju ye, baamugirira esaasi, baamugumya ahabw'ebihikiirizi byona ebi MUKAMA yaamureetsireho; buri muntu yaamuha ekicweka ky'efeeza n'empeta y'ezaabu.
MUKAMA yaaha omugisha ebiro bya Yobu ebya bwanyima okukira eby'okubanza; yaatunga entaama kakumi n'enkumi ina, engamira enkumi mukaaga, enimi z'okuhingisa enkumi ibiri, n'ebuguma z'endogoya rukumi.
Kandi yaazaara aboojo mushanju n'baishiki bashatu.
Omwishiki w'okubanza yaamweta Yemima, orikumukurata yaamweta Keeziya, n'owa kashatu yaamweta Kerenihapuki.
Kandi omu nsi egyo hakaba hatarimu bakazi barungi nka bahara ba Yobu. Ishe yaabaraga ebye na banyaanyabo.
Bwanyima y'ebyo yaamara emyaka igana na makumi ana, yaareeba abaijukuru n'abaijukuruza, okuhika aha ruzaaro rwa kana.
Bwanyima Yobu yaafa, ari omugurusi amazire emyaka mingi.
Nari okwemerera omu muhanda gw'abasisi,
N'obu kwakuba okushutama aha bitebe by'abarikugaya;
Kandi Ebiragiro ebyo nibyo ateekateekaho nyomushana na nyekiro.
Ogwana ebyana byagwo omu bunaku bwabyo,
N'amababi gaagwo tigahotoka;
Ebi akora byona bigyenda gye.
Kureka bashusha nk'ebishushunga ebirikutwarwa omuyaga.
N'obu baakuba abasiisi omu kuteerana kw'abahikiriire;
Kwonka omuhanda gw'ababi guryabura.
Ahabw'enki abanyamahanga nibaza omu naama za busha?
N'abategyeki nibahanuura hamwe,
Okurwanisa MUKAMA n'ou yaashukireho amajuta, ni bagira bati:
Tunagye hare emirunga yaabo.
MUKAMA naabateerera enaku.
Aryabagambira abagwereirwe kubi,
Abatiinise n'ekiniga kingi, ati:
Aha rushozi rwangye orurikwera Saayuni.
Yangira ati: Ori Omwana wangye,
Eri izooba naakuzaara.
N'embaju zoona ez'ensi zibe eitungo ryawe.
Obaatagure nk'enyungu y'omubumbi.
N'ahabw'ekyo, imwe bagabe 'mwe, mugire obwengye,
Naimwe abategyeki b'ensi, mwikirize kuhaburwa.
Mushemererwa n'okutetema.
Mukahwerekyererera omu muhanda;
Ahakuba ekiniga kye nikiija kurahuka kwaka.
Boona abamuhungiraho baine omugisha.
Baingi baanyimukiriire;
Taine kuhwerwa kwona ahari Ruhanga.
Niiwe ndikwehimbisizaho, kandi niiwe oimukize omutwe gwangye.
Nawe angarukamu naayema aha rushozi rwe orurikwera.
Kandi naasisiimuka, ahakuba MUKAMA niwe andamira.
Abankubire kundwanisa.
Ruhanga wangye, njuna;
Ahakuba okateera abazigu bangye boona aha mushaya,
Waacwa amaino g'ababi.
Omugisha gwawe gube aha bantu baawe.
Ku ndaagume naakweta, onyetabe.
Ku naabaire nfunziibwe, wampa omwanya, naayeshanja.
Ongirire embabazi, ohurire okushaba kwangye.
Imwe bantu 'mwe, muryahitsya hi okuhemura ekitiinisa kyangye?
Muryahitsya hi okukunda ebitaine mugasho, n'okukuratira ebishuba?
MUKAMA ampurira, ku mmutakira.
Muhanuure n'emitima yaanyu mubyami, mucecekye.
Kandi mwesigye MUKAMA.
Ai MUKAMA, otwakize omushana gw'amaisho gaawe.
Okurikukira oku bagira omu biro by'omweru n'eby'emihiiso ya viinyo.
Ahakuba niiwe wenka, MUKAMA, ondinda nkagira obusingye.
Ai MUKAMA, tega amatu, ohurire ebigambo byangye,
Ote omutima aha kuteekateeka kwangye.
Mukama wangye, kandi Ruhanga wangye,
Ahakuba niiwe ndikushaba.
Buri kasheeshe nintebeekanisa eby'okukuhongyera, ngume nindeeba.
Ahakuba tori Ruhanga orikushemerererwa obubi,
Ekibi tikiriguma h'ori.
Oyanga boona abakora ebibi.
MUKAMA ayangira kimwe omwitsi w'abantu, n'engobya.
Ndyataaha omu nju yaawe;
Ndamye ntaire amaisho ahari hekalu yaawe erikwera ninkuha ekitiinisa.
Onshemereze omuhanda gwawe omu maisho gangye.
Emitama yaabo n'obubi busha,
Emimiro yaabo n'ekituuro kirangaire,
Bashunga abantu n'endimi zaabo.
Bagwe ahabw'enaama zaabo;
Obabingye ahabw'eby'okushiisha byabo bingi,
Ahakuba bakugomeire.
Bagume bateere akaari ahabw'okunanuka;
Ahakuba niiwe obarinda,
Kandi n'abakunda eiziina ryawe bashemerererwe omuriiwe.
Obakingize embabazi nk'engabo.
N'obu kwakuba okumpana n'ekiniga kyawe kingi.
Ontambire, MUKAMA, ahakuba amagufa gangye nigajegajega,
Beitu Iwe, ai MUKAMA, oryandeka okuhitsya ryari?
Ai MUKAMA, garuka ojune amagara gangye,
Onkize ahabw'embabazi zaawe;
N'oha orikubaasa kukuhimbisiza okuzimu?
Buri kiro ndirira aha kitabo kyangye;
Ekitanda kyangye nkijubya n'amarira.
Gakambire ahabw'abazigu bangye boona.
Ahakuba MUKAMA ahuriire eiraka ry'okurira kwangye;
MUKAMA naikiriza okushaba kwangye.
Baryagaruka enyima, bahemukye omuri ako kaanya.
Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, niiwe ndikwesiga;
Njuna boona abarikumpiiga, kandi onkize,
Nibantwara ntaine kijuna.
Emikono yangye ku eraabe yaakozire ekibi,
Ku ndaabe naatuzire busha omuzigu wangye,
Orekye omuzigu wangye ampiigye, ankwate,
Aribatiirire amagara gangye,
N'ekitiinisa kyangye akite omu mucuucu.
Oyemerere ogungire abazigu bangye abaanyiniire ekiniga kingi;
Sisiimuka, Ruhanga wangye; ahakuba niiwe waaragiire kucwa orubanja.
K'emitwe y'amahanga ekwehinguririze,
Naiwe obategyekye oshutami aha kitebe kyawe eky'ahaiguru.
Ai MUKAMA, oncwere orubanja nk'okuhikiirira kwangye oku kuri,
N'amazima agari omuriinye oku gari.
Reka obubi bw'ababi buhweho,
Kwonka abahikiriire obagumye.
Engabo yangye ni Ruhanga
Okiza abaine emitima egororokire.
Ogwerwa kubi ababi obutoosha.
Omuntu ku ayanga kweteisa,
Ruhanga atyaza rurara ye;
Areegire obuta bwe,
Yaabuteekateeka.
Emyambi ye agitaireho omuriro.
Agira enda y'eitima, kandi azaara ebishuba.
Kandi yaagwa omu busya obu atimbire.
Omwaga ogu agirira abandi guryamugwisiza akagwe.
Ndyayeshongora, mpimbise eiziina rya MUKAMA Rukira-boona.
Eiziina ryawe ka ni rirungi omu nsi yoona!
Okata ekitiinisa kyawe ahaiguru y'eiguru.
Amaani g'okugamba eby'okuhunamya abazigu n'abahoozi b'enzigu.
Okwezi n'enyonyoozi ebi waataireho,
Nari shi omwana w'omuntu Iwe kumutaayaayira?
Waamujweka ekirunga ky'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa.
Waamutegyekyesa emirimo y'emikono yaawe;
Waata ebintu byona ahansi y'ebigyere bye,
Entaama n'ente zoona,
N'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa,
N'enyonyi z'omu mwanya, n'eby'enyanja eby'omu mayanja,
N'ebirikuraba omu nyanja byona.
Ai MUKAMA, Mukama waitu,
Eiziina ryawe ka ni rirungi munonga omu nsi yoona!
Mmanyise abantu eby'okutangaaza byona ebi waakozire.
Ndyayeshongora eby'okuhimbisa eiziina ryawe, Iwe Rukira-boona.
Ahabw'okuba abazigu bangye bagarukire enyima,
Baagwa, baahwerekyererera omu maisho gaawe.
Oshutami aha kitebe kyawe eky'obukama, noocwa emanja omu buryo.
Waamariraho kimwe amaziina gaabo ebiro n'ebiro.
Abazigu bahweireho, bacwekyerereziibwe kimwe;
Endembo zaabo ozisheenyire, n'okwijukwa tizaakiijukwa.
Ateekateekire ekitebe kye kucwa emanja;
Acwere abantu boona orubanja omu mazima.
Obu bahungiramu omu biro by'obusaasi.
Ahakuba iwe, MUKAMA, tokahemukaga ha bakusherura.
Kandi mumanyise abantu boona ebi akora;
Kandi tayebwa kutaka kw'abari omu busaasi.
Ai MUKAMA, ongirire embabazi!
Reeba okubonabona oku ndikubonabonesibwa abarikuunyanga,
Iwe onyimutsya okaanyiha aha marembo ga rufu,
Kandi ndyashemerererwa okujuna kwawe
Omu marembo ga Saayuuni.
Ebigyere byabo byakwatwa ekigoye eki bategire.
Ababi bakwatirwa omutego omu bi bakozire n'emikono yaabo. Higayoni.
Nigo mahanga goona ageebwa Ruhanga.
Kandi amatsiko g'abooro tigarihwaho ebiro n'ebiro.
Amahanga gacwerwe orubanja omu maisho gaawe.
Obatiinise, ai MUKAMA!
Amahanga gamanye ku bari abantu-buntu.
Ahanki nooyeshereka omu biro by'obusaasi?
Ka bagwe omu naama ezi baagizire.
Ahakuba omubi ayehimbisa ahabw'ebi omutima gwe gwetenga;
N'omwetengi w'enshaagi ayehakana MUKAMA, kandi amugaya.
Kandi omu biteekateeko bye byona agira ngu, Tihariho Ruhanga.
Ahiirwa omu mihanda ye obutoosha bwona;
Okucwa emanja kwawe kumuri hare ahu atarikureeba;
Abazigu be boona abeeshaanya.
Ebiro byona tindigira by'okunnyangaraza.
Ahansi y'orurimi rwe hariho eitima n'okutahikiirira.
Agwera omu birorero;
Omu myanya eyekiikire nimwo aitira abataine kabi;
Amaisho ge agata aha bataine kihwera omu mubonano.
Agwera omuntu enshoberwa kumukwata;
Kandi kwo amukwata, amukuruza ekigoye kye.
Egyo nshoberwa eshekurwa, einama,
Kandi ebandama ahabw'amaani ge.
Akyehugize; tarikireeba.
Oteebwa abari omu busaasi.
Omubi agayira ki Ruhanga
Akagira omu mutima gwe ati: Tarikimbuuza?
Ngu obone kubikoraho n'omukono gwawe;
Omuntu enshoberwa ayeta omu mikono yaawe;
Ahakuba niiwe oshangwa oba omuhwezi w'efuuzi.
Ocaakye omubi bwe, okuhitsya obu oribureeba bwona.
Abanyamahanga baryahwera kimwe omu nsi ye.
Oryagumya emitima yaabo, obategye okutu,
Omuntu-buntu arekye kubatiinisa obundi.
Noobaasa ota kungira oti:
Hungira aha bibungo nk'enyonyi;
Babutamikamu omwambi gwabo,
Kurasira omu mwirima ab'emitima egororokire.
Emisingi ku yaakuhwerekyerezibwa,
Abahikiriire bakaakora ki?
Ekitebe kya MUKAMA kiri omu iguru;
Amaisho ge gareeba abantu, n'ekitsigye kye kibagyeza.
Kwonka ababi n'abakunda endwano omutima gwe gubanga.
Omuyaga gwa nyeirurwe guryaba omugabo omu kikopo kyabo.
Ab'emitima egororokire baryareeba amaisho ge.
Ahabw'okuba abarikwesigwa babuzire omu bantu.
Nibagamba n'eminwa erikushungana baine emitima ebiri.
MUKAMA aryacwaho eminwa yoona erikushungana,
N'orurimi orurikugamba eby'okwetunguura,
Abo abagira bati: Turyasinguza endimi zaitu;
Eminwa yaitu n'eyaitu; n'oha orikututegyeka?
Mbwenu ka nyimukye, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira,
Mmute omu mwanya gw'obusingye ogu atuura naayetenga.
Ni nk'efeeza eshemeziibwe omu iziiko ry'ahansi,
Eshemeziibwe emirundi mushanju.
MUKAMA, ogume oturinde,
Kandi otujune ab'obusingye obu.
Obufamutima ku buhingurana bwasiimwa abantu,
Ababi bagyenda nibanaga omukono hoonahoona.
Oryahitsya hi okuunyima amaisho?
Ndyahitsya hi okwehanuurira,
N'okurenzya eizooba nyine obusaasi omu mutima gwangye?
Omuzigu wangye aryahitsya hi okuunyetunguuraho?
Hwezesa amaisho gangye, ntakaagwejegyera oturo tw'okufa;
Abazigu bangye barekye kushemerererwa okutengyetsibwa kwangye.
Omutima gwangye guryashemererwa okujuna kwawe.
Ahakuba akangirira embabazi nyingi.
Ruhanga tabaho.
Basiisikaire nibakora ebihagaro,
Tihariho n'omwe orikukora gye.
Ngu amanye ku haraabe hariho abarikwetegyereza
Bakasherura Ruhanga.
Boona bahabire, boona hamwe basiisikaire;
Tihariho n'omwe orikukora gye; buzima tihariho n'omwe.
Barya abantu bangye nk'abarikurya eby'okurya,
Kandi tibatakira MUKAMA.
Okwo baryagirirayo obwoba bwingi,
Ahakuba Ruhanga ari hamwe n'abahikiriire.
Kwonka MUKAMA n'obuhugiro bwe.
MUKAMA ku arigarura abantu be abaanyagirwe,
Yakobo aryayesiima, na Israeli ananukye.
N'oha orituura aha kibungo kyawe ekirikwera?
Kandi akagamba eby'amazima aihire aha mutima;
N'obu kwakuba okukora kubi mugyenzi we,
Nari okuyaaga mutaahi we;
Kwonka abatiina MUKAMA abaha ekitiinisa;
Ku arahira, n'obu afeerwa, tahinduka.
N'obu kwakuba okurya enguzi, ngu asingise orubanja abatarwine.
Okora ebyo taritengyetsibwa ebiro byona.
Tiinyine karungi koona ahu otari.
Abu nshemerererwa n'omutima gwangye gwona.
Beekanyisiza obusaasi;
Ebihongwa byabo by'eshagama tindibihayo,
N'obu kwakuba okugamba aha maziina gaabo.
Niiwe orinda ebyangye.
N'ekya buzima nyine obuhunguzi burungi.
Kandi nyekiro omutima gwangye guunyegyesa.
Tinditengyetsibwa, ahakuba ari aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo.
Nikyo omutima gwangye gushemerererwa, n'amagara gangye gakeesiima;
N'omubiri gwangye guryaguma guri buhooro.
N'obu kwakuba okureka Orikwera waawe kujunda.
Omu maisho gaawe hariho okushemererwa kwingi munonga;
Omu mukono gwawe gwa buryo harimu ebirikushemeza ebiro byona.
Otegye okutu okushaba kwangye, okutarikuruga mu minwa y'obugobya.
K'obe niiwe wancwera orubanja;
Amaisho gaawe gareebe eby'oburyo!
Wangyeza, torikwija kundeebamu kibi kyona;
Mmaririire kutashiisha n'akanwa kangye.
Omu by'emirimo y'abantu, ahabw'ekigambo ky'eminwa yaawe
Nyetantaire emihanda y'abanyamwaga.
N'ebigyere byangye tibikateereraga.
Ontegye okutu, ohurire ebigambo byangye.
Oyorekye embabazi zaawe ez'okutangaaza,
Iwe Omujuni w'abo abasherura obuhungiro aha rubaju rwawe rwa buryo,
Nibahunga abazigu baabo.
Ombumbatire n'amapapa gaawe,
Onkize ababi abannyaga,
Nibo bazigu bangye abaanyehinguririize, abarikwenda kuunyita.
Akanwa kaabo kagamba eby'amaryo.
Banzooreire amaisho kunteera ahansi.
Nk'ekitsigazi ky'entare ekigwereire aheekiikire.
Imuka, ai MUKAMA, obatangye omumaisho, obatuure ahansi!
Okize amagara gangye ababi na rurara yaawe;
Abu omugabo gwabo guri ogw'ensi egi.
Oijuze enda zaabo ebi waababiikiire,
N'abaana baabo babihaagye,
Kandi nabo babitsigire n'abeereere baabo.
Ku ndisisiimuka, ndyamarwa okureeba oku orikushusha.
Ninkukunda, ai MUKAMA, maani gangye.
Ruhanga wangye, orukiri rwangye orugumire oru mpungiramu,
Engabo yangye, eihembe ry'okujunwa kwangye,
Kandi omunaara gwangye omuraingwa.
Obwo nibwo ndikira abazigu bangye.
N'emyegyemure y'okuhwerekyerera yantiinisa;
Emigoye y'Okuzimu ekanzingazinga;
Emitego ya Rufu yantanga omumaisho.
Naatakira Ruhanga wangye kumpa emikono;
Yaahurira eiraka ryangye ari omuri hekalu ye,
N'okurira kwangye kwahika omu matu ge.
N'emisingi y'ebibungo yaanyiganyiga,
Yaatengyetsibwa ekiniga kye.
N'omu kanwa ke haarugamu omuriro ogurikurya busha,
Gwayatsya amakara.
Omwirima ndindindi guri ahansi y'ebigyere bye;
Yaija naarahuka ari aha mapapa g'omuyaga.
N'ebicu ebikwaitse, ebitimbire omwirima mwingi gw'enjura,
Yaabigira eky'okumusangira.
Omu kumurinkana okwabaire kuri omu maisho ge
Haarugamu orubaare n'amakara garikwaka nibiruga omu bicu bye.
Rukira-boona yaagamba n'eiraka rye,
Haija orubaare n'amakara agarikwaka;
Niyo mirabyo ye mingi, yaababinga.
N'emisingi y'ensi ekashuuruuka
Ahabw'okuhuuha kw'amaani okw'omwitsyo gw'omu nyindo zaawe.
Yaanyiha omu maizi maingi;
Yankiza omuzigu wangye ow'amaani,
N'abo abaabaire nibaanyanga, ahakuba bakaba nibankiza amaani.
Bakampururira aha izooba ry'okureeberaho enaku;
Kwonka MUKAMA yaaba obwegamo bwangye.
Yanjuna, ahabw'okuba akaba nanshemerererwa.
Yanzimuurira nk'okushemera kw'emikono yangye oku kuri;
Kandi tinkacumuraga kuruga ahari Ruhanga wangye.
Ebiragiro bye byona bikaba biri omu maisho gangye,
Tinkeetantaraga bi yaaragiire.
Kandi nkeerinda okushiisha
Nikyo MUKAMA yaanyihuriire nk'okuhikiirira kwangye oku kuri,
Kandi akanzimuurira ebishemereire okushemera kw'emikono yangye omu maisho ge.
Ahari ohikire oyeyoreka ori ohikire;
Aha mugomi oyeyoreka ogumire.
Kwonka ab'amaisho g'amaryo obagarura ahansi.
MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye niwe ayakira omwirima gwangye.
Eego, ahabwawe nimbaasa kurwanisa omutwe gw'engabo,
Ahabw'okuhwerwa Ruhanga wangye nimbaasa kuguruka orugo.
Okuraganisa kwa MUKAMA kurengirwe, n'okw'amazima;
Niwe ngabo ekingira abamuhungiraho boona.
N'oha oba Rukiri, otari Ruhanga waitu?
Akashemeza omuhanda gwangye.
Anyemereza aha nengo mpamire.
Ngu emikono yangye ebaase kureega obuta bw'omuringa.
N'omukono gwawe gwa buryo gumbangiire,
Okutwaza gye kwawe kunkurize.
Ebigyere byangye tibyaterera.
Nkakurata abazigu bangye, naabahika,
Kandi tindagarukire okuhitsya obu baahweireho;
Naabacumita, tibaabaasa kwimuka,
Baagwa ahansi y'ebigyere byangye,
Ahakuba okanzirika amaani g'okurwana,
Waagomoora abaabaire nibaija kundwanisa.
Kandi n'abaabaire nibanyanga naabacwekyereza.
Baatakira MUKAMA, tiyaabagarukamu.
Naabateera, naabatuntumura nk'oku omuyaga gugira omucuucu;
Naabanaga nk'ebyondo by'omu nguuto.
Wampindura omukuru waago;
Naaheerezibwa abantu abu ntakamanyaga.
Ahonaaho abanyamahanga ku bampuriirre,
Baanyorobera, baanyehongyera.
Baaruga omu bigo byabo nibatetema.
MUKAMA n'ohuriire; Rukiri rwangye ahimbisibwe!
Ruhanga ow'okujunwa kwangye aheebwe ekitiinisa.
Akangomoorera amahanga;
Eego, okanta ahaiguru y'abarikundwanisa,
Waanyiha omu mikono y'abanyamwaga.
Kandi nyeshongore eby'okuhimbisa eiziina ryawe.
Kandi ayoreka ou yaashukireho amajuta embabazi,
Niwe Daudi n'abaijukuru ebiro n'ebiro.
N'omwanya gw'ahaiguru gworeka emirimo y'emikono ye.
Nyomushana egambira nyomushana endiijo ebigambo,
N'ekiro kimanyisa ekindi kiro obwengye.
Tihariho rurimi, n'obu byakuba ebigambo;
Amaraka gaabyo tigahurirwa.
Kandi n'ebigambo byabyo bihika aha muheru gw'ensi.
Omuribyo nimwo yaateire eihema ahabw'eizooba,
Rishemererwa nk'ow'amaani, niriraba omu rugyendo rwaryo.
Ryehinguririza, rihika aha gundi;
Tihariho kisherekwa okwotsya kwaryo.
Kigarura omutima omunda; Ebi MUKAMA yaahamize n'eby'okwesigwa,
Biha obwengye otabwine;
Bigwisa gye omutima;
Ekiragiro kya MUKAMA kishemeire,
Kihwezesa amaisho;
Kugumaho ebiro byona;
Ebi MUKAMA aragiira n'eby'amazima,
Kandi n'eby'okuhikiirira buzima.
Nangwa n'ezaabu enungi munonga;
Binuzire okukira obwoki
Oburikutoonya niburuga omu ngabo yaabwo.
Kandi nibyo bihabura omwiru waawe,
N'omu kubyorobera harimu ebihembo bingi.
Onshemezeho ebibi ebisherekirwe.
Otabiikiriza kuntegyeka!
Obwo ndyaba otaine ky'okuhanwa,
Kandi tindigira rubanja rw'okushiisha okuhinguraine.
N'okuteekateeka kw'omu mutima gwangye
Bisiimwe omu maisho gaawe,
Ai MUKAMA, orukiri rwangye, kandi omucunguzi wangye.
Eiziina rya Ruhanga wa Yakobo rikurinde!
Akutwekyere okuhwera okurikuruga omu Mwanya ogurikwera,
Akuhe amaani agarikuruga omuri Saayuuni.
aikirize ebitambo byawe ebyokize!
Kandi ahikiirize enaama zaawe zoona!
Kandi omu iziina rya Ruhanga waitu turyaimutsya endango zaitu.
MUKAMA ahikiirize ebi orikushaba byona!
Amugarukyemu, naayema omu iguru rye eririkwera,
N'obusinguzi bw'amaani g'omukono gwe gwa buryo.
Kwonka itwe twesiga eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Bo baryainama, bagwe;
Kwonka itwe turyaimuka, twemerere tuhamire.
Ai MUKAMA, ohe omugabe okusingura;
Kandi ku turaakutakire, otuhurire.
Eshi okuhwera kwawe naakushemerererwa munonga!
Kandi tomwimire ki eminwa ye eshabire.
Waamujweka ekirunga ky'ezaabu enungi aha mutwe.
Nikwo kumereera ebiro n'ebiro.
Kandi omujwekire okusiimwa n'obukuru.
Kandi omunanwire n'okushemererwa ahabw'okuguma omu maisho gaawe;
Kandi ahabw'embabazi za Rukira-boona taritengyetsibwa.
Omukono gwawe guryagwa aha bazigu baawe boona,
Omukono gwawe gwa buryo guryakwata abarikukwanga.
MUKAMA aryabamira n'ekiniga kye,
Kandi omuriro guryabamaraho.
Na baijukuru baabo obamare omu baana b'abantu.
N'obu barihanuura kukukora kubi,
Bakakugiraho enaama mbi, tibaribaasa.
Otaire emyambi yaawe omu buta ogyorekyeize aha maisho gaabo.
Ohimbisibwe, ai MUKAMA, omu maani gaawe;
Naitwe turyayeshongora tusingize obushoboorozi bwawe.
ahabw'enki ori hare, otarikumpwera, kandi otarikuhurira bigambo by'okutsinda kwangye?
Kandi na nyekiro, timpunama.
Iwe otuura aha kitebe ky'okuhimbisa kwa Israeli.
Baatatenkuriitwe bakakwesiga;
Ku baakwesigire, waabajuna.
Bakakwesiga, tibaayefuuza.
Ou abantu bajuma, kandi ogaywa boona.
Banteerera enaku n'eminwa yaabo, nibazongoza emitwe,
Amukize, ahakuba amushemerererwa.
Kandi okandinda nkiri aha mabeere.
Okwiha obu maawe yanzaara, niiwe oba Ruhanga wangye.
Kandi tiinyine kihwera.
Enimi nyingi ziinyehinguririize;
Enimi z'amaani eza Bashani zintangatangire;
Nk'entare esheegire, erikutsinda.
Amagufa gangye goona gataine;
Omutima gwangye guri nk'entsinda,
Niguyagira omu kifuba kyangye.
Orurimi rundamatiire aha nkanka;
Ontaire omu mucuucu gw'okufa.
Omutwe gw'enkozi z'ebibi guntaire ahagati;
Banfumwire ebiganja n'ebigyere.
Banteireho amaisho nibanshamaarira,
Baateerera enteenyu ekijwaro kyangye.
Iwe omuhwezi wangye, rahuka ompe emikono!
Amagara gangye ogaihe omu maani g'embwa!
