Abakunda kusheesha eshagama bandugaho,
Abazigu baawe abarahirira busha eiziina ryawe.
Tingwerwa kubi abaimuka kukurwanisa?
Nimbangira kimwe buzima;
Mbeeta abazigu bangye.
Ongyeze, omanye ebiteekateekateeko byangye;
Oreebe omuriinye ku haraabe harimu emitwarize yoona emibi,
Haza onyebembere omu muhanda ogw'ebiro n'ebiro.
Ondinde abanyamwaga,
Abateekateeka enaama mbi omu mitima yaabo,
Abeeteerana obutoosha kurwana.
Omu minwa yaabo harimu obushegu bw'encwera.
Ondinde abanyamwaga, abahanwire kutega ebigyere byangye.
Bategire ekigoye aha muhanda,
Bantega orugogo.
Tega amatu eiraka ry'okweshengyereza kwangye, ai MUKAMA.
Okakingira omutwe gwangye aha izooba ry'orugamba.
Kandi otamukwatsa kugumizamu n'enaama ye embi,
Arekye kwehimbisa.
Eitima ry'eminwa yaabo ribamareho;
Banagwe omu biina batarirugayo.
Orikugambuura atarihama omu nsi;
Ekibi kihiigye omunyamwaga, kimuhwerekyereze.
Arwanirire amazima g'abakyene.
N'ab'emitima egororokire baryatuura ah'ori.
Ohurire eiraka ryangye, ku ndaakutakire!
N'okwimutsya emikono yangye kube nk'ekitambo ky'omu mwabazyo.
Kandi ogume noorinda omuryango gw'eminwa yangye!
Ndekye kuguma ninkora eby'okutahikiirira n'enkozi z'ebibi,
N'obu kwakuba okurya aha by'okurya byazo ebinuzire.
Kwonka amajuta g'omubi gatarishukwa aha mutwe gwangye;
Ahakuba obutoosha nshaba nindwanisa emicwe yaabo emibi.
Ku bariheebwayo omu mikono y'abaribacwera orubanja,
Obwo nibwo barimanya ngu ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'eky'amazima.
Nikwo amagufa gaabo garinaganagwa gatyo aha munwa gw'Okuzimu.
Niiwe nsheruramu obuhungiro; otantsiga ntaine kirinda!
N'orugogo rw'enkozi z'ebibi.
Haza nyowe nkire.
Ngaruka mmweshengyereza naryo.
Kandi mmworeka enaku zangye.
Okamanya omuhanda gwangye.
Omu muhanda ogu ndabamu,
Nimwo bantegire omutego.
Kwonka naashanga hatariho orikuunyetaho;
Ntakiine h'okuhungira, hataine orikuntaho omutima.
Kandi omugabo gwangye omu nsi y'abahuriire.
Onkize abarikumpiiga; ahakuba nibankiza amaani.
Abahikiriire bamanye hamwe naanye
Ku onkorera eby'embabazi.
Ahabw'okwesigwa kwawe n'okuhikiirira kwawe ongarukyemu.
ahabw'okuba omu maisho gaawe tihariho muntu weena ohuriire orisinga orubanja.
Yaateera amagara gangye ahansi;
Yanshutamya omu kizima, nk'abaafiire ira.
N'omutima gwangye gukeeshobera.
Ninteekateeka aha bi emikono yaawe yaakozire.
Omutima gwangye gukwiniire eiriho, nk'ori omu nsi eyomire.
Sera
Otaanyima amaisho, nkaba nk'abarikushuuma Okuzimu.
Ahakuba niiwe nyesiga.
Ompabure omuhanda ogu nshemereire kurabamu,
Ahakuba niiwe nyimukiza omutima.
Niiwe mpungiireho ntakwakwa.
Ahakuba niiwe Ruhanga wangye;
Omwoyo waawe omurungi anyebembere omu muhanda oguringaniire.
Ahabw'okuhikiirira kwawe onyihe omu naku!
Kandi omareho boona abarikubonabonesa amagara gangye;
Ahabw'okuba ndi omwiru waawe.
Oyegyese emikono yangye kurashana, n'engaro zangye kurwana;
Omunaara gwangye omuraingwa, kandi omujuni wangye;
Engabo yangye, kandi ou nyesiga,
Ongomoorera abantu bangye.
Nari shi omwana w'omuntu Iwe okumuteekateekaho?
Ebiro bye ni nk'ekibunda ekirikuhwaho.
Okore aha bibungo, bicumbe omwika.
Orashe emyambi yaawe, obabingye.
Onjune, onyihe omu maizi maingi,
Omu mikono y'abanyamahanga;
N'omukono gwabo gwa buryo n'ogw'ebishuba.
Nyeshongore eby'okukuhimbisa ninteera enanga y'emirya ikumi.
Niiwe oha abagabe obusinguzi,
Okakiza omwiru waawe Daudi rurara erikwita kubi.
Onjune, onyihe omu mikono y'abanyamahanga,
Abu akanwa kaabo kagamba ebitaine mugasho,
N'omukono gwabo gwa buryo gukaba ogw'ebishuba.
Bahara baitu baba nk'amabaare agabaizirwe kwombeka nyaruju;
N'ebitara byaitu biijura eby'okurya by'emiringo yoona;
Entaama zaitu zizaara enkumi n'obukumi omu mariisizo gaitu;
Hareka kugira abaasheenya orugo, bakataaha,
Nari abaashohora kuza kurwana;
N'obu kwakuba okuboroogyera omu bihandagazi byaitu!
Eego, eihanga eri Ruhanga waaryo aba Yehova rihiiriirwe!
Ndyasiima eiziina ryawe ebiro byona.
Buri izooba ndyakusiima,
Mpimbise eiziina ryawe ebiro n'ebiro.
Obukuru bwe tibwetegyerezibwa.
Kandi bamanyise eby'amaani ebi waakozire.
Ndyagamba aha burungi bw'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwawe,
Ngume ninteekateeka aha mirimo yaawe y'okutangaaza.
Kandi naanye ndyagamba aha bukuru bwawe.
Beeshongore eby'okuhikiirira kwawe.
Tarahuka kuguubwa kubi, kandi aine okusaasira kwingi.
Kandi agira embabazi nyingi ahari byona ebi yaahangire.
N'abarikwera baawe baryakusingiza.
Baryagamba aha kitiinisa ky'obukama bwawe,
Bagambe aha by'obushoboorozi bwawe,
N'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bw'obukama bwawe.
N'obutegyeki bwawe buryagumaho obusingye bwona.
Kandi aimutsya boona abeyinamiriire.
Naiwe obiha eby'okurya omu bunaku obuhikire.
Oshashaanura engaro zaawe,
Ohaazya ekintu kyona ekihuriire ebi kirikwetenga.
Kandi ow'embabazi omu bi akora byona.
Boona abamutakira omu mazima.
Kandi aryahurira okutaka kwabo, abajune.
Kwonka ababi boona aryabahwerekyereza.
Ebiine omubiri byona bisiime eiziina rye eririkwera ebiro n'ebiro.
Haleluya
Himbisa MUKAMA, iwe magara gangye!
Nyeshongorere Ruhanga eby'okuhimbisa, nkiriho.
N'obu yaakuba omuntu, otaine kuhwera kwona.
Eryo izooba ebiteekateeko bye bihwaho.
Kandi ota amatsiko ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga we
Otuura ari omwesigwa ebiro byona,
Oha abaine enjara eby'okurya.
MUKAMA akomorora embohe;
MUKAMA aimutsya abeyinamiriire;
MUKAMA akunda abahikiriire.
Aramira abafaakazi n'efuuzi,
Kwonka omuhanda gw'ababi agwitira kimwe.
Iwe Saayuni, Ruhanga waawe aryategyeka okuhitsya obusingye bwona.
Haleluya!
Ahakuba ni kirungi okweshongorera Ruhanga waitu eby'okuhimbisa;
Ahabw'okuba n'ow'embabazi, kandi okuhimbisa kuhikire.
Ataaruura Abaisraeli abaabingirwe.
Ashemba obuhuta bwabo.
Zoona azeeta amaziina gaazo
Okwetegyereza kwe kurengire orugyero.
Kwonka ababi abanagira kimwe ahansi.
Mweshongorere Ruhanga waitu n'enanga!
Kandi akameza obunyaatsi aha migongo.
Kandi ariisa abaana b'ebikoona abarikwaniira.
N'amaguru g'omuntu tigo ashemerererwa,
Bakeesiga embabazi ze ezitahinduka.
Iwe Yerusaalemu, himbisa MUKAMA!
Naiwe Saayuuni, himbisa Ruhanga waawe!
Ahakuba akagumya empimbi z'amarembo gaawe;
N'abaana baawe abari omuriiwe yaabaha omugisha.
Akwijuza engano nungi munonga.
Atweka ekiragiro kye ahansi;
Ekigambo kye kiirukanga munonga.
amaamagiza ekime ky'embeho nk'eiju.
N'oha owaakubaasa kwemera embeho ye?
Atweka ekigambo kye, abiyazya;
Ahuuhisa omuyaga gwe, amaizi gagyenda.
Na Israeli amumanyisa ebiragiro bye n'emicwere ye.
Kandi n'emicwere ye tibakagimanyaga.
Haleluya!
Imwe ab'omu iguru, muhimbise MUKAMA,
Naimwe abari omu myanya y'ahaiguru mumuhimbise!
Naimwe ab'omu ihe rye mwena, mumuhimbise.
Iwe eizooba n'okwezi, mumuhimbise;
Naimwe enyonyoozi ezirikwaka mwena, mumuhimbise.
Naimwe amaizi agari ahaiguru y'eiguru.
Ahakuba akaragiira, byahangwa;
Yaataho ekiragiro ekitarihwaho.
Imwe emigoye, n'ahagati y'amayanja hoona;
Omuyaga gw'amaani, oguhikiiriza ekiragiro kye;
Emiti erikwana, n'emyereezi yoona;
Ebirikwekurura, n'enyonyi ezirikuguruka;
Abanyiginya n'abaramuzi boona ab'omu nsi;
Abatsigazi n'empangare;
Abagurusi n'abaana!
Ahakuba eiziina rye wenka niryo rihimbisibwa;
Ekitiinisa kye nikyeshumba ensi n'eiguru.
Nibo baana ba Israeli, eihanga erimuri haihi.
Haleluya!
Mweshongorere MUKAMA ekyeshongoro kisya,
Kandi mweshongore eby'okumuhimbisa omu mutwe gw'abarikwera.
N'abaana ba Saayuuni bashemerererwe Omugabe waabo.
Bamweshongorere eby'okuhimbisa n'engarabi n'enanga;
Abacureezi aryabahunda okujunwa.
Beeshongore ahabw'okushemererwa, bari aha bitabo byabo.
Na rurara ey'amoogi abiri egume omu ngaro zaabo
Okuhoora amahanga,
N'okuha abantu ebiheneso,
Okuboha abagabe baabo n'enjegyere,
N'abakuru baabo n'emihama y'ebyoma,
Kandi n'okubataho orubanja oruhandiikirwe.
Ekitiinisa ekyo n'eky'abarikwera be boona.
Haleluya!
Muhimbisize Ruhanga omu Mwanya gwe ogurikwera;
Mumuhimbisize omu kaabunga k'amaani ge.
Mumusiime nk'obukuru bwe obutakareebwaga oku buri.
Mumusiime n'endingiri n'enanga;
Mumusiime n'ebiine emirya n'esheegu;
Mumusiime n'ebitaasa ebirikukwaya munonga.
Haleluya!
Ez'okumanyisa obwengye n'okuhabura,
N'ez'okushoboorora ebigambo ebirimu okwetegyereza,
Omu kuhikiirira, omu buryo n'omu bwinganisa;
Okuhaisa otaine bwengye okwerinda;
N'omutsigazi okumuha okumanya obwerinzi,
Ngu omunyabwengye ahurire, ayeyongyere kwega,
Kandi omushaija oine okwetegyereza atungye obwengye obuhikire;
Ebigambo by'abanyabwengye n'ebishaakuzo.
Kwonka abashema bagaya obwengye n'okuhaburwa.
Mwana wangye, guma ohurire ebi sho arikukuhabura,
Kandi otanga ebi nyoko arikukwegyesa;
Kandi emikuufu omu bitysa byawe.
Mwana wangye, abasiisi ku barikubeihabeiha,
Otariikiriza.
Ku barigira ngu, Ija tugyendane, tugwere ab'okwita,
N'abataine rubanja tubature busha,
Okuzimu emira abantu bashugaine,
Nk'abo abashuuma omu Kiina;
Turyagwa aha bintu by'obuguzi bwingi,
Twijuze amaka gaitu eminyago;
Mbwenu kwatanisa naitwe,
Twena tugire enshaho emwe;
N'obu kwakuba okwimutsya ekigyere kyawe kutoora emihanda yaabo;
Birahuka kusheesha eshagama.
Manya, okutega omutego enyonyi neegureeba,
N'okweruhiza busha.
Kwonka abo bantu baba nibagwera eshagama yaabo bonka,
Nibagiira amagara gaabo omu kyetindo.
Niyo mihanda y'abo boona abagira omururu gw'amagoba,
Gaihaho amagara ga bakama baago.
Eiraka rye naariimukiza omu butare.
Naayetera aha mutwe gw'engo z'amabaare z'orurembo,
Aha marembo gaarwo niho arikugambira ebigambo bye, naagira ati:
Imwe abataine bwengye, muryahitsya hi okukunda okutagira bwengye?
Abateezi b'enaku baryahitsya hi okwesiimira okuteera enaku kwabo,
N'abashema okwanga okumanya?
Reeba, naaza kushuka Omwoyo wangye ahariimwe,
Mbamanyise ebigambo byangye.
Nkatega emikono, hakabura owaakitaho omutima;
Mukangira kimwe okuhana kwangye,
Ndyabateerera enaku, ekimurikutiina kyabahikaho.
Ekirikubatiinisa ku kiriija nk'eihunga,
N'ebihikiirizi byanyu byaija nk'omuyaga gw'akasooroora,
Mwagira enaku n'obusaasi,
Baryayezirika kunsherura, kwonka tibarindeeba.
N'okwihamu okutiina MUKAMA,
Bakagaya okuhana kwangye kwona,
Bakaiguta enaama zaabo mbi.
N'okugogyeera kw'abashema kuryabacwekyereza;
Agume agaramisiriize, ataine kabi k'arikutiina.
Mwana wangye, ku oraikirize ebigambo byangye,
Waagumya ebiragiro byangye aha mutima,
Waatega okutu kwawe obwengye,
Omutima gwawe waaguta aha kwetegyereza;
Eego, ku oriririra obwengye bw'okukyenga,
Eiraka waariimutsya nooshaba okwetegyereza,
Waakusherura nk'efeeza,
Waakuronda nk'eky'eitungo ekisherekirwe,
Obwo nibwo orishoborokyerwa okutiina MUKAMA,
okazoora okumanya Ruhanga;
Kandi omu kanwa ke nimwo haruga okumanya n'okwetegyereza;
Kandi abagyendera omu bwesigwa ababeera engabo;
Kandi n'abarikwera be abarinda omu mihanda yaabo.
Obwo oryamanya okuhikiirira n'eby'oburyo,
N'obwinganisa, na buri muhanda gwona omurungi;
Ahabw'okuba obwengye buryataaha omu mutima gwawe,
N'amagara gaawe gashemerererwe okumanya.
N'okwetegyereza kukurinde,
Kukwihe omu mihanda y'obubi,
Kukujune abantu abarikugamba eby'obutahurira,
Bakagyendera omu mihanda y'omwirima,
Bakashemerererwa obutahurira bw'abanyabibi,
Kandi abu emitwarize yaabo etagororokire.
Omukazi owaariire enshoni, owa karimi karungi,
Kandi akeebwa endagaano ya Ruhanga we;
N'emihanda ye neeshuuma omu bafu.
Abaza owe tibagaruka,
N'obu kwakuba okugaruka omu muhanda gw'amagara.
N'ahabw'ekyo oshemereire kugyendera omu mihanda y'abarungi,
N'okugumira omu mihanda y'abahikiriire;
N'abeesigwa bakagigumamu;
Kandi abarikureebya baryagikuurirwamu kimwe.
Kureka omutima gwawe gugume gworobere ebiragiro byangye;
N'emyaka mingi, n'okuba gye munonga omu magara gaawe.
Obihandiikye aha kishate ky'omutima gwawe.
Omu maisho ga Ruhanga n'abantu.
Orekye kwegamira okwetegyereza kwawe ahabwawe;
Nawe aryaguma naatebeekanisa emihanda yaawe yoona.
Tiina MUKAMA, orugye omu bibi.
Kiryaba eky'okutambira omubiri gwawe,
Kandi ekirikuruhuura amagufa gaawe.
Kandi n'emiganuro y'ebi oyerize.
N'amaato gaawe garyaijura viinyo, esheeshekye.
N'obu kwakuba okutamwa okuhana kwe;
Ahakuba ou MUKAMA akunda, amuhana,
Nk'oku ishe w'omwana ahana omwana we ou ashemerererwa,
Ohiiriirwe n'omuntu ozoora obwengye,
Kandi n'omuntu otunga okwetegyereza;
Kandi n'amagoba gaabwo nigakira ag'ezaabu;
N'obw'obuguzi bwingi okukira amabaare g'omuhendo,
Kandi omu bi waakwetenga byona, tihaine kirikwingana nabwo.
N'omu gwa bumosho harimu obutungi n'ekitiinisa.
Emihanda yaabwo n'emihanda erikugwisa gye,
N'otuhanda twabwo twona n'obusingye.
N'abarikubuhamya nibeetwa abahiiriirwe.
N'eiguru yaarihamya ahabw'okwetegyereza kwe.
N'ebicu byatoonya orume ahansi.
Mwana wangye, guma n'obwengye obuhikire, n'okwerinda;
Otaribireka bikakurugaho.
Kandi bikubeere eby'okwehunda omu maraka.
N'ekigyere kyawe kitateere ntsibo.
Ku oribyama, oturo turyakunurira.
Nari okuhwerekyerera kw'ababi kwabaho,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aryaba obwesigye bwawe,
Kandi arinde ekigyere kyawe kirekye kukwatwa omutego.
Otaribiima ababishemereire.
Nyencakare nkikuhe.
Haza obwo okiine.
Otarigirira mutaahi waawe enaama mbi,
Ou otwire nawe naakwesiga.
Otaritonganisiza busha omuntu weeana,
Ataine ki akwitsize.
Kandi omu mitwarize ye otarigira ei waamwegaho;
Kwonka ab'omutima ogugororokire abeesiga.
Kwonka abacureezi abagirira embabazi.
Kwonka abashema baryahemuka.
Baana bangye, mugume mutegye amatu okwegyesa kwa shoimwe,
Kandi mukuteho omutima, mubone kugira okwetegyereza;
Ahabw'okuba nimbaha ebiragiro birungi,
Mutarireka okwegyesa kwangye.
Ku naabaire ndi omwana, ndi hamwe na tata,
Ndi omwana orikworoba, kandi omwe wenka ahari maawe,
Omutima gwawe gugume guhamye ebigambo byangye,
Oyorobere ebiragiro byangye, obone kugumaho.
Gira obwengye; gira okwetegyereza.
Obukunde, buryakurinda.
Obwengye n'ekintu kikuru; gira obwengye;
Ebi otungire byona, obisheruze okwetegyereza.
Ku oribubumbatira, buryakuhaisa ekitiinisa.
Kandi bukuteho ekirunga kirungi.
Mwana wangye, hurira ebigambo byangye, kandi obiikirize,
Emyaka y'amagara gaawe ebone kuba mingi.
Nkakwegyesa oku oraatungye obwengye,
Naakuhabura emihanda egororokire.
Kandi ku oriiruka, toriteera ntsibo.
Hamya ebi oyegyesiibwe, otaribireka;
Obirinde, ahabw'okuba nigo magara gaawe.
Kandi otarigyendera omu muhanda gw'abantu babi.
Ogume ogwetantare, orekye kugurabamu;
Ogwehuzye, ogumizemu;
Ku baba batakateerize muntu ntsibo, babura oturo.
Ahabw'okuba barya eby'okurya by'obubi,
Kandi banywa viinyo y'okunyagisa abandi amaani.
Ogugumizamu nigwaka gukahitsya omu ihangwe.
Tibamanya kibateeza entsibo.
Mwana wangye, ta omutima aha bigambo byangye,
Otegye okutu ebi ndikugamba.
Otaribireka bikakuruga omumaisho,
Obigumye aha mutima gwawe;
Kandi n'omubazi aha mibiri yaabo yoona.
Ahakuba nigwo gurugwamu enshuro z'amagara.
Yete hare akanwa akarikugamba eby'okwehabagiza,
Kandi n'ebigaaniiro ebirikuhabisa obyete hare.
Kandi ogahamizeyo kimwe.
Obwo nibwo emihanda yaawe erihama.
Iha ekigyere kyawe omu bubi.
Mwana wangye, ta omutima aha bwengye bwangye,
Otegye okutu okwetegyereza kwangye,
Kandi eminwa yaawe erinde okumanya,
N'ebigambo bye bikiza amajuta kuterera,
Agira obwogi nka rurara y'amoogi abiri.
N'entambwe ze zitoora omuhanda ogurikuza Okuzimu.
Emihanda ye n'ey'okuzengyerera, kwonka we tabimanya.
Mbwenu baana bangye, mumpurire,
Murekye kuruga aha bi ndikugamba.
Mwetantarire hare,
Kandi otairira haihi emiryango y'enju ye,
Otakaaha ekitiniisa kyawe abandi,
N'emyaka yaawe abatarikusaasira,
Abanyamahanga batakaakumaramu amaani,
N'emirimo yaawe ekakorerwa omu nju y'omunyaihanga;
Kandi aha muheru gw'amagara gaawe okaborooga,
Waahweire aha magufa,
N'omutima gwangye kwanga kuhanwa!
Tindahuriire bi abashomesa bangye bangambiire,
N'obu kwakuba okutega amatu abarikumpabura.
Nkaba ndi haihi kufeera kimwe,
N'okugwa ahagati y'omutwe gw'abantu.
Agarikuruga omu iziba eri oyefukuriire.
Beitu shi, enshuro zaawe zishemereire kumaamagizibwa oku n'oku,
Zikaba emigyera y'amaizi omu nguuto?
Garekye kuba ag'abagyenyi baawe.
Oshemerererwe omukazi ow'omu butsigazi bwawe,
Amabeere ge gagume gakuhaazye,
Kandi obutoosha oshemezibwe okukunda kwe.
Okenda ngu ofumbate ogwo mukazi waariire enshoni?
Kandi niwe agumya eriisho aha mihanda ye yoona.
Emigoye y'ekibi kye emugumye.
Kandi ahabw'obufa-mutima bwe afeere kimwe.
Waakwatiriza omunyaihanga,
Bwanyima waashanga ogwire omu mutego omu bi ogambire,
Okwatiirwe omu bigambo ebirugire omu kanwa kaawe,
Ahakuba oryaba ogwire omu mikono ya mutaahi waawe;
Oryagyenda nooyehuuta, omukwate amaguru noomweshengyereza;
N'ebitsigye byawe kuhungira;
Nk'oku enyonyi esyoka omu ngaro z'ogitegire.
Oyetegyereze oku kitwaza, haza ogire obwengye.
Nari omutware, nari omutegyeki;
Kandi omu ishaaruura kyeshangururiza eby'okukitunga.
Iwe mweremwa 'we, oryabyama ohitsye hi?
Oryasisiimuka ryari kuruga omu turo?
Nangwa mpinyeho nti omukono, ngwejengyereho.
Kwonka omanye obworo ku burikwizira nk'omunyagi,
N'obukyene bukakuhikaho nk'omuntu ohagatiire eby'okurwanisa.
Omuntu otaine mugasho, omuntu omubi,
Agyenda naagamba ebikiikami,
Arengyeza bagyenzi be n'engaro.
Ateekateeka enaama mbi omu mutima ogurikwehabagiza,
Obutoosha abiba okwangana.
Ahendekye ahonaaho okuhendeka okutaribungwa.
Hariho ebintu mukaaga, nangwa ni mushanju,
Ebi MUKAMA ayanga, kandi ebi anuga,
Emikono esheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja,
Ebigyere ebirahukira ekibi,
N'omuntu obiba eby'okuteerana abantu omu b'eishemwe
Mwana wangye, ogume oyorobere ebiragiro bya sho,
Kandi otaruga aha kwegyesa kwa nyoko.
Kandi obizingirire omu maraka gaawe.
Bikurinde ogwejegyeire,
Kandi bigaaniire naiwe waasisiimuka.
N'okuhana kw'orikukutegyeka nigwo muhanda gw'amagara,
Okukurinda omukazi mubi,
N'okukurinda karimi karungi, omukazi owaariire enshoni.
Kandi otaritwarwa engohe ze;
Kwonka omukazi enshambani ahiiga amagara g'omushaija.
Emyenda ye etasye?
Nari omuntu akaabaasa kugyendera aha makara garikwotsya,
Ebigyere bye bitababukye?
Nikwo ari atyo oza ahari muka mutaahi we;
Tihariho n'omwe omukoraho oribura kufubirwa.
Abantu tibagaya mushuma
Yaiba kwemara enjara;
Ahayo eby'omu ka ye byona.
Okikora, aba naacwekyereza amagara ge.
Eki aihayo n'obuhuta n'okuhemuka,
Kandi okuhemuka kwe tikuriragazibwa;
Omu kuhoora enzigu tasaasira.
Taikiriza kuhongyerwa kwona,
N'obu waakumuha ebiconco ebirikwingana bita, takaikaikana.
Mwana wangye, rinda ebigambo byangye,
Kandi ebiragiro byangye obyezirikye.
N'ebi ndikwegyesa obirinde nk'emboni y'eriisho ryawe.
Obihandiikye aha kishate ky'omutima gwawe.
Gira Bwengye oti: Niiwe munyaanyazi;
Kandi okwetegyereza okwete munywani waawe ow'aha mara.
N'akarimi karungi ak'omukazi owaariire enshoni.
Ahakuba nkaringuririza
Omu dirisa y'enju yangye,
Omu batsigazi abataine bugobya, omutsigazi otaine bwengye,
Naaraba omu nguuto eririkuraba haihi n'akeekubo k'aha nju y'ogwo mukazi,
Agyemire omuhanda ogurikuzayo,
Nyekiro omu mwirima ndindindi.
Kandi reeba ogwo mukazi yaamubugana,
Ajwaire eby'obwamaraarya, aine omutima gw'oburyarya.
Ou ebigyere bye bitaikara mu nju.
Obumwe aza omu nguuto, obundi omu katare,
Naategyereza ahari buri keekubo k'omuhanda.
Ku yamureebire, yaamukwata, yaamunywegyera,
Yaagamba nawe ataine kashoni, naamugira ati:
Mbwenu ebi naaraganiise naabiheza eri izooba.
Nikyo naizira hati kukubugana,
Ninkusherura nkwiniire orushusho; mbwenu naakubona.
Ecwererainemu amabara g'emyenda ya Misri.
Ya sumuruna n'obunyanunga n'omudarasiini.
Ija tuhikiirize okukundana kwaitu, burugyeho busheeshe,
Tweshemeze omu kukundana kwaitu;
Ahakuba ibanye tarimu,
Azindukiire hare;
Atwaire enshaho y'empiiha;
Aryagaruka okwezi kuri ekizooro.
Yaamutwaza akarimi karungi.
Ahonaaho yaamukurata
Nk'ente erikuza kubaagwa,
Nk'omugwa-iraro orikutwarwa omu nkomo kuhanwa;
Nk'oku enyonyi eiruka ekagwa omu mutego
Etarikumanya ku amagara gaayo gategirwe.
Mbwenu baana bangye, mutegye amatu;
Mute omutima aha bigambo ebirikuruga omu kanwa kangye.
Otaikiriza omutima gwawe kuhungutukira omu mihanda ye,
Otahabira omu tuhanda twe;
Eego, boona abu araitsire n'eihe rihango.
nigushuuma omu bishengye bya rufu.
Kandi Kwetegyereza tarikwimutsya eiraka rye?
Ayemereire aha mutwe gw'ebibungo,
Omu nteeraniro z'emihanda,
Aha rubaju rw'amarembo omu maisho g'orurembo,
Ahu orikutaahira nooza omu irembo, niho arikwetera n'eiraka rihango naagira ati:
Imwe bashaija 'mwe, manya niimwe ndikweta,
Kandi eiraka ryangye niryeta abaana b'abantu.
Imwe abataine bwengye, mwegye okwerinda,
Naimwe abashema, mugire omutima ogurikwetegyereza.
Muhurire, ahabw'okuba ebi naaza kubagambira ni bikuru,
Kandi eminwa yangye neija kugamba ebihikire;
Kandi okugamba ebibi eminwa yangye nikyo enuga.
Ebigambo by'omu kanwa kangye byona bihikiriire;
Tibirimu kigambo na kimwe ekikiikakiikire nari ekitegami;
Kandi n'ebihikire aha barikuzoora okumanya.
N'okumanya okukira ezaabu etoorainwe;
Ahabw'okuba obwengye nibukira amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi,
Kandi omu birikwetengwa byona tihaine kirikwingana nabwo.
Nyowe Bwengye, okwerinda nkakugira obutaaho bwangye,
Nzoire okumanya n'okwetwara.
amaryo n'emyehimbiso, omuhanda gw'obubi,
N'ebigambo by'okwehabagiza nibyo nyanga.
Niinye kwetegyereza, kandi nyine obushoboorozi,
N'abategyeki bataho ebiragiro by'oburyo.
Ahabwangye abanyiginya bategyeka
N'abakungu batwara ensi.
N'abataho omutima kunsherura, bambona.
Hamwe n'obutungi oburikugumaho n'okugogyeera.
Kandi ebi nyerize nibikira efeeza etoorainwe.
Ngyendera omu mihanda y'okuhikiirira,
N'omu tuhanda tw'oburyo,
Ngu mbone kutungisa abarikunkunda,
N'okwijuza amabiikiro gaabo.
Atakagizire ki yaahanga.
Omu kutandika, ensi etakahangirwe.
Okuzimu etakabaireho nkoorekwa butunu,
Enshuro ezirikuhimintika amaizi maingi zitakabaireho,
Enshozi zitakahangirwe,
N'ebibungo bitakabaireho, nibwo naayorekwa;
Ruhanga atakahangire nsi n'obwerere,
N'obu gwakuba omucuucu gw'omu nsi ogwabandize.
Obu yaataho eiguru, nkaba ndiho;
Obu yaataho obugarukiro bw'okuzimu,
Obu yaataho enshuro z'okuzimu,
Ngu amaizi gatarenga emisingi y'ensi;
Obutoosha niinye naabaire ndi okushemererwa kwe,
Niinyesiimira omu maisho ge buri izooba,
Kandi okushemererwa kwangye kukaba kuri okuguma n'abantu.
Ahabw'okuba abarikugumizamu emihanda yangye bahiiriirwe.
Muhurire ebi ndikubahabura,
Mugire obwengye, mutabyanga.
Akaguma omu marembo gangye naareeba,
Ategyerereize aha biti by'emiryango yangye;
Kandi atunga obushongore ahari MUKAMA;
Boona abarikuunyanga, nibaba bakunzire rufu.
Yaabyara enyomyo ze mushanju.
Yaatebeekanisa emeeza ye.
Beemereire omu myanya mikuru y'omu irembo etunguukire
Nibagira bati:
Kandi nawe naagambira abataine bwengye ati:
Kandi munywe ahari viinyo ei nturiire.
Murekye obushema, mubone kugumaho,
N'okugyendera omu muhanda gw'okwetegyereza.
Kandi orikuhana enkozi y'ebibi, naaba ayegwisiize akagwe.
Otarihana omugayi, nyentsya akakwanga;
Ohane omunyabwengye, naija kukukunda.
Oyegyese ohikiriire, naija kweyongyera kwega.
N'okumanya Orikwera nikwo kwetegyereza;
Nkakwongyeraho emyaka ei orimara omu nsi.
Kandi ku oraabe omugayi, noomwebeera.
Tagira buntu, kandi tagira kashoni.
Ashutama aha muryango gw'enju ye,
Kandi arumbaara aha kitebe omu myanya mikuru y'orurembo
Kweta abarikuhingura,
Abakwaitse emihanda yaabo naagira ati:
Kandi agambira abataine bwengye ati:
Kandi ebiriibwa bwesherekye nibyo bishemeza.
Kandi n'abagyenyi be ku bari okuzimu owa Nyamuteza.
Omwana w'obwengye ashemeza ishe;
Kwonka omwana omushema agwisa kubi nyina.
Kwonka okuhikiirira kujuna omuntu omu kufa.
Kwonka okwetenga kw'ababi akurwanisa.
Kwonka ez'omweziriki zimutungisa.
Kwonka ogwejegyera omu igyesha aitsa enshoni.
Emigisha eba aha mutwe gw'ohikiriire,
Kwonka akanwa k'omubi kashereka okukora kubi.
Kwonka eiziina ry'omubi riryajunda.
Kwonka omushema engambi ya maingi aryagwa.
Kwonka orikwehabagiza aryamanywa.
Kwonka ohana butunu areeta obusingye.
Kwonka akanwa k'omubi kashereka okukora kubi.
Kwonka okukundana kushweka ebishobyo byona.
Kwonka amabega g'otaine bwengye gaba ag'enkoni.
Abanyabwengye babiika okumanya,
Kwonka omushema w'orurimi ayekururira okucwekyerera.
Ekicwekyereza abooro n'obworo bwabo.
Amagoba g'omubi gamureeteera okukora ekibi.
Kwonka nyantagambirwa ahaba.
Oshereka orwango, agira eminwa y'ebishuba,
Kandi obeiherera abandi aba ekifa-mutima.
Kwonka oyerinda omu bi arikugamba, aba aine obwengye.
Orurimi rw'ohikiriire n'efeeza etoorainwe,
Omutima gw'enkozi y'ebibi gugasha kakye.
Eminwa y'ohikiriire egaburira baingi,
Kwonka abashema bafa, bazira okutagira bwengye.
Kandi tagwongyeraho busaasi.
Aha mushema, okukora kubi ni nk'omuzaano,
Kwonka orikwetegyereza eki ayesiimira n'okukora n'obwengye.
Kandi eki ohikiriire ayetenga aryakiheebwa.
Omuyaga gw'akasooroora ku gurabaho, omubi ahwaho;
Kwonka ohikiriire aguma ahamire ebiro byona.
Nk'oku viinyo erikushaarira ereeta amangigina,
Kandi nk'oku omwika gusaasa amaisho,
N'orikweganda nikwo aba aha barikumutuma.
Kwonka emyaka y'omubi eryacuubwaho.
Kwonka amatsiko g'omubi garyabura.
Kwonka aha nkozi z'ebibi n'okucwekyerera.
Kwonka omubi tariguma mu nsi.
Kwonka orurimi orurikwehabagiza ruryacuubwaho.
Kwonka akanwa k'omubi kagamba ebikiikami.
Kwonka ebipimo by'amazima bimushemeza.
Kwonka obwengye bugirwa abacureezi.
Kwonka obugobya bw'abarikureebya buryabacwekyereza.
Kwonka okuhikiirira kwiha omu kufa.
Okuhikiirira kw'otaine kamogo kumushorongyeza omuhanda,
Kwonka omubi agwisibwa obubi bwe.
Kwonka abarikureebya baryakwatwa eitima ryabo.
Kandi amatsiko g'abatarikutiina Ruhanga gahwerekyerera.
Omubi aba niwe yaakagwamu.
Otarikutiina Ruhanga acwekyereza mutaahi we n'akanwa ke,
Kwonka abahikiriire baryatambirwa okumanya.
Kandi ababi ku bacwekyerera, habaho okuteera akaari.
Orurembo rutunguurwa omugisha gw'ow'omutima ogugororokire,
Kwonka rusheenywa akanwa k'omubi.
Kwonka omuntu orikwetegyereza aguma ayehunamiire.
Kwonka ow'omutima gw'obwesigwa tagigamba.
Kwonka ahu abahi b'obwengye bari, habaho obusingye.
Kwonka orikwanga okwemererera, naaguma ari buhooro.
Omukazi w'embabazi aheebwa ekitiinisa;
Abarikunyagisa amaani bagira obutungi.
Kwonka omunyamwaga ayesaasa.
Kwonka orikubiba okuhikiirira taribura kutunga ebihembo by'amazima.
Kwonka orikukuratira ebibi aryafa.
Kwonka ab'emitwarize ehikire bamushemeza.
Kwonka abahikiriire baryajunwa.
Omukazi murungi otaine mutima
Ni nk'empeta y'ezaabu ejwekirwe omu nyindo z'empunu.
Kwonka ogw'amatsiko g'omubi n'okugirirwa ekiniga.
Ondiijo aima eki ashemereire kuha, haza kimureetera kugira obworo bwonka.
Kandi orikuha abandi amaizi, nawe aryagaheebwa.
Orikwima abantu engano, aryajumwa boona;
Kwonka omugisha guryaba ahari orikuzibaguza.
Kwonka orikwendeza abandi obubi, buryamugarukana.
Kwonka ohikiriire aryabengyeya nk'eibabi ribisi.
Kandi omushema aryahakwa omunyabwengye.
Kandi oine obwengye ajunisa abantu.
Kaashwa ababi n'abasiisi.
Kwonka oyanga kuhanwa aba ari omushema.
Kwonka ogira enaama mbi, MUKAMA amucwera orubanja.
Kwonka emizi y'abahikiriire terikuurwa.
Kwonka okora ebirikuhemura buba obujunde omu magufa ge.
Kwonka okuhanuura kw'ababi n'okureebya.
Kwonka akanwa k'abaine emitima egororokire kakiza abantu.
Kwonka enju y'abahikiriire eryagumaho.
Omuntu asiimwa nk'oku obwengye bwe buri,
Kwonka ow'omutima ogurikwehabagiza agaywa.
Omuntu otaine kitiinisa, orikwekorera,
Naakira orikwegira mukuru, haza ataine ky'okurya.
Kwonka embabazi z'omubi guba omwaga.
Kwonka okuratira ebitaine mugasho, tagira bwengye.
Omunaara gugumire ogw'ababi gusheenyagurika,
Kwonka emizi y'abahikiriire eguma ehamire.
Kwonka ohikiriire akira enaku.
Kandi ebi omuntu akora n'engaro ze nibyo azimuurirwa.
Kwonka omunyabwengye aikiriza kuhaburwa.
Okuguubwa kubi kw'omushema kumanywa ahonaaho,
Kwonka omuntu orikwerinda tayeta ha bijumo.
Kwonka kareebi ow'ebishuba agamba eby'obugobya.
Kwonka orurimi rw'omunyabwengye rutamba.
Eminwa egamba amazima egumaho ebiro byona,
Kwonka orurimi orubeiha ruba orw'akaanya kakye.
Obugobya buba omu mitima y'abaza omu naama z'obubi,
Kwonka abo abaza omu naama z'obusingye bagira okushemererwa.
Kwonka ababi batuura baijwire enaku.
Kwonka abakora eby'obwesigwa nibo ashemerererwa.
Omuntu orikwerinda ashereka okumanya kwe,
Kwonka abashema babuzya obushema bwabo.
Omukono gw'omweziriki guryategyeka,
Kwonka omweremwa aryakoresibwa eby'obuhuuku.
Kwonka ekigambo kirungi kigushemeza.
Omuntu ohikiriire ayebembera mutaahi we,
Kwonka omuhanda gw'ababi gubahabya.
Omweremwa takwata ki ahiigire,
Kwonka omweziriki aryatunga ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi.
Kwonka omuhanda gw'okushobya gutwara omu kufa.
Kwonka omugayi taikiriza kuhanwa.
Kwonka eki endeebya zeetenga n'okunyagisa abandi amaani.
Kwonka okaashamya munonga aryacwekyerera.
Kwonka omutima gw'omweziriki guhaaga ebirungi.
Omuntu ohikiriire ayanga ebishuba,
Kwonka omubi ayetamisa, kandi ayehemura.
Kwonka obubi bugwisa ababi.
Kandi hariho oyegira omworo, haza aine eitungo ringi.
Amagara g'omuntu gacungurwa eitungo rye,
Kwonka omworo tagira ky'okumucungura.
Kwonka etabaaza y'omubi eryaraazibwa.
Amaryo gareeta entongane zonka,
Kwonka obwengye bugirwa abaikiriza kuhaburwa.
Kwonka orikutunga mporampora aryarikanyisa.
Kwonka ekirikwetengwa ku kiboneka, kiba eikti ky'amagara.
Kwonka oyorobera ekiragiro kye, aryaheebwa ebihembo.
Kureetera omuntu kwetantara emitego ya rufu.
Okumanya okuhikire kureeta obushongore,
Kwonka omuhanda gw'abasiisi gurusya.
Kwonka omushema ayoreka obushema bwe butunu.
Kwonka entumwa erikwesigwa ereeta obugwa gye.
Kwonka okunda kuhanwa aryaheebwa ekitiinisa.
Ebirikwetengwa ku bihikiirizibwa, bishemeza omutima,
Kwonka okwetantara ebibi n'ekirikunugwa aha bashema.
Ogyenda n'abanyabwengye, nawe ahinduka omunyabwengye,
Kwonka mugyenzi w'abashema aryakizira.
Kwonka abahikiriire baryaheebwa okugogyera.
Kwonka eitungo ry'omusiisi ribiikirwa abahikiriire.
Emisiri y'abooro eyeza bingi,
Kwonka ehwa neenyagirwa busha.
Kwonka omukunda, amuhana bukiri kare.
Ohikiriire agira ebirikumuhaazya,
Kwonka enda y'omubi eguma n'enjara.
Kwonka omukazi omushema agyesheenyera.
Kwonka oyehabagiza omu mihanda ye, aba naamugaya.
Kwonka eminwa y'abanyabwengye eryabarinda.
Ahu ente z'okuhingisa zitari, tihagira bihunikirwe;
Kwonka ahabw'amaani g'ezo nte ebyezire biba bingi.
Kwonka kareebi ow'ebishuba abeiha.
Kwonka okumanya kurahukira orikwetegyereza.
Ruga aha mushema,
Ahakuba tihariho kigambo ky'obwengye eki orimushangamu.
Obwengye bw'omwerinzi n'okumanya omuhanda gwe,
Kwonka obushema bw'abashema n'okugobya.
Kwonka ab'emitima egororokire bagira obushongore.
Obusaasi bumanywa omutima ogu burimu,
Kandi omu kushemererwa kwagwo tihariho mugyenyi okwatanisa nagwo.
Kwonka eihema ry'ow'omutima gugororokire eryasheenywa,.
Kwonka omuheru gwagwo guri omuhanda gw'okufa.
Kandi omuheru gw'okushemererwa n'enaku.
Kandi omuntu murungi aryahaagibwa ebyana by'ebi arikukora.
Otaine bwengye aikiririza eryo,
Kwonka omwerinzi ayetegyereza ahu arikuraba.
Kwonka omushema tayenda kutegyekwa, kandi tagira ki ayetaho.
Orahuka kugira ekiniga, akora eby'obushema;
Kwonka omuntu orikwerinda agumisiriza.
Abataine bwengye batunga obushema,
Kwonka abeerinzi bajwekwa ekirunga ky'okumanya.
N'ababi baguma aha marembo g'abahikiriire.
Kwonka omutungi agira abanyamikago baingi.
Kwonka orikugirira abooro embabazi, ahiiriirwe.
Abagira enaama mbi, baba batahabire?
Kwonka abagira enaama nungi, baryakorerwa eby'embabazi n'eby'amazima.
Omu kufa kubi okw'emiringo yoona habamu omugasho;
Kwonka okugamba kwonka kureeta obworo.
Ekirunga ky'abanyabwengye n'obutungi bwabo,
Kwonka obushema n'eihunde ry'abashema.
Kwonka ogamba ebishuba aba omureebya.
Kandi abaana be baryabona obuhungiro.
Kureetera abantu kuruga omu mitego ya rufu.
Kwonka omutegyeki otaine bantu acwekyerera.
Kwonka orahuka kukigira, ahimbisisa obushema.
Kwonka eihari rireetera amagufa kujunda.
Kwonka ogirira abakyene embabazi, amuha ekitiinisa.
Kwonka ohikiriire aguma n'amatsiko, nangwa n'omu kufa kwe.
Obwengye butuura omu mutima gw'orikwetegyereza,
Kwonka omu mitima y'abashema tibumanywamu.
Okuhikiirira kuhimbisisa eihanga;
Kwonka ekibi kijumisa ibara ihanga.
Kwonka agirira ekiniga orikukora ebirikuhemura.
Kwonka ekigambo ekirikusaasa kiimutsya ekiniga.
Kwonka akanwa k'abashema kafukunkuka eby'obushema.
Gareeba ababi n'abarungi.
Kwonka ku rukiikama, omutima gucweka.
Kwonka ota omutima aha kuhanwa, niwe aba omwerinzi.
Omu nju y'ohikiriire habamu obutungi bwingi,
Kwonka omu magoba g'omubi habamu enaku.
Kwonka emitima y'abashema tekora etyo.
Kwonka okushaba kw'ow'omutima ogugororokire nikwo ashemerererwa.
Kwonka akunda orikukuratira okuhikiirira.
Kwonka orikwanga kuhanwa aryafa.
Kaashwa ebiri omu mitima y'abantu!
Omugayi takunda kuhanwa,
Kandi taza w'abanyabwengye.
Kwonka omutima ogwine obusaasi gureeta okwehwa amatsiko.
Kwonka akanwa k'abashema katungwa obushema.
Ebiro by'abarikubonabona byona ni bibi,
Kwonka oine omutima ogushemereirwe ni nk'omuntu otuura omu bugyenyi.
Nikakira obutungi bwingi oburimu obujune.
Nikukira okurya ente y'ebishaju okurimu okwangana.
Otarahuka kugira kiniga acureeza empaka.
Omuhanda gw'omweremwa gufa ahabw'okumerwamu amahwa,
Kwonka akahanda k'ow'omutima ogugororokire guba omuhanda rugyendwa.
Kwonka omuntu omushema agaya nyina.
Kwonka omuntu orikwetegyereza ayetebeekanisiza omuhanda oguhikire.
Kwonka ahu abahi b'obwengye bari baingi, zihikiirizibwa.
Okugarukamu gye kureetera omuntu kushemererwa,
Kandi ekigambo ekigambiirwe omu bunaku bwakyo ka ni kirungi!
Ngu abone kuruga okuzimu owa Nyamuteza.
Kwonka ahamya orubibi rw'omufaakazi.
Ebiteekateeko by'ababi n'ekirikunugwa ahari MUKAMA,
Ebigambo by'abashemeire bimushemeza.
Kwonka orikwanga enguzi aryagumaho.
Kwonka akanwa k'omubi kafukunkuka ebigambo bibi.
Kwonka ahurira okushaba kw'ohikiriire.
Amaisho gashemuukire gashemeza omutima,
N'enkuru nungi ziruhuura amagufa.
Orikutega okutu okuhana kurungi
Aryatuura n'abanyabwengye.
Kwonka ota omutima aha kuhanwa ayeyongyera okwetegyereza.
Kandi okwecureeza kukuratwa ekitiinisa.
Kwonka okugarukamu kw'orurimi kuruga ahari MUKAMA.
Kwonka MUKAMA apima emitima.
Obwo nibwo enaama zaawe zirihamibwa.
Nangwa n'ababi akabateeraho ekiro ky'enaku.
Buzimazima taribura kufubirwa.
Kandi okutiina MUKAMA nikwo kurekyesa abantu ebibi.
Areetera abantu kuba gye nawe, nangwa n'abazigu be.
Nikakira empiiha nyingi ezitungirwa omu kutahikiirira.
Kwonka MUKAMA niwe amuhabura oku araateere entambwe.
Omu kucwa emanja akanwa ke tikashobya.
N'amabaare goona agarikupima ag'omu nshaho n'omurimo gwe.
Ahakuba ekitebe ky'obugabe kihamibwa okuhikiirira.
Kandi akunda orikugamba ebihikire.
Kwonka omunyabwengye aryakiikaikanisa.
Omugabe ku ashemuuka ahamaisho, kireeta amagara;
Kandi okukunda kwe kushusha ebicu ebirugamu enjura ya katumba.
Eego, omuntu akaatoorana okugira okwetegyereza okukira okutunga efeeza.
Orinda emitwarize ye, aba naarinda amagara ge.
N'omutima ogurikwetunguura gukuratwa okugwa.
Ni kirungi okugira omutima gworobi, okakwatanisa n'abooro,
Okukira okubagana eminyago n'abanyamaryo.
Kandi oyesiga MUKAMA aba ahiiriirwe.
Oine omutima gw'obwengye ayetwa omuntu orikukyenga;

Kwonka ekifubiro ky'abashema n'obushema bwabo.
Kandi gumwongyera kugamba ebirikwikirizisa abantu.
Binurira amagara g'omuntu, kandi bihamya amagufa ge.
Kwonka omuheru gwagwo guri omuhanda gw'okufa.
N'akanwa ke niko kamugyema kukora.
Kandi emigambire ye ni nk'omuriro ogurikubabura.
Kandi omuhwihwitsi ataanisa abanyamikago.
Omunyaitima abeihabeiha mutaahi we,
Amutwara omu muhanda ogutari murungi.
Oitira abandi eriisho, aba naahanuura enaama zikiikami;
Onena enshaya, aba naayenda kuhikiiriza obubi.
Kandi kitungwa ahabw'okugyendera omu muhanda gw'okuhikiirira.
Kandi orikutegyeka omutima gwe naakira okwatsire orurembo.
Kwonka endagu yoona eruga ahari MUKAMA.
Nikakira eka eijwire eby'okurya by'obugyenyi, kwonka erimu entongane.
Omuhuuku orikukoresa obwengye,
Aryategyeka omwana wa mukama we orikuhemura,
Kandi aragwe hamwe n'abaana ba mukama we.
N'omuriro guba ogw'okushemerezamu ezaabu,
Kwonka MUKAMA niwe agyeza emitima.
Enkozi y'ebibi ehurira emigambire y'obubi,
Kandi orikubeiha atega okutu orurimi rw'eitima.
Orikwesiimira abandi kugwerwa akagwe, taribura kufubirwa.
Abaijukuru n'ekirunga ky'abagurusi,
Kandi ekitiinisa ky'abaana ni baishebo.
Emigambire ehikire teizihira mushema,
Kandi okukira munonga emigambire y'ebishuba teizihira mutegyeki.
Enguzi aha muntu ogihaire ni nk'eibaare eririkukora eby'okutangaaza;
Ahu arikuza hoona, naagogyera.
Kwonka oyata eibanga, aba naayeyangisa munywani we.
Okuhanwa kuhika omunyabwengye aha mutima,
Okukira okuhanisa omushema enkoni igana.
Nikyo aritumirwa entumwa y'enshaarizi kumukwata.
Okukira okubugana omushema oitsirwe obushema.
Obubi tiburiruga mu ka ye.
N'ahabw'ekyo reka empaka zitakarugiremu okutongana.
Bombi n'ekirikunugwa ahari MUKAMA.
Ahabw'enki omushema agira empiiha omu ngaro ngu agure obwengye,
Haza ataine mutima?
Kandi ow'eishe-emwe azaarirwa okuhwera abantu omu bihikiirizi.
Kandi ayemererera ondi omu maisho ga mutaahi we.
Orikukunda kweshumbya abandi eka, naaba ayesheruriire okucwekyerera.
Oine omutima ogurikwehabagiza, taribona kirungi;
Kandi n'ow'orurimi orukiikami aryagwa omu kabi.
Ishe w'otaine bwengye tashemererwa.
Kwonka omutima ogucuramiriirwe gureetera omuntu kuhwa aha magufa.
Ngu abone kwita emanja z'oburyo.
Kwonka amaisho g'omushema, agata aha by'aha muheru gw'ensi.
Na nyina owaamuzaire amureetera obushaarizi.
Okubonabonesa ohikiriire ti kirungi,
N'obu kwakuba okuteera abakungu noobatura oburungi bwabo.
Kandi ow'omutima gutuurize aba omuntu orikwetegyereza.
Nangwa n'omushema ku ahunama, bateekateeka ngu n'omunyabwengye;
Ku aba abumbire eminwa, bagira ngu, N'omwerinzi.
Oyetaanisa n'abandi, aba naasherura ebye wenka;
Kandi aba ayangire obwengye bwona obuhikire.
Kureka ashemezibwa okugamba ebiteekateeko bye.
Ku haija obubi, n'okugaya kwija;
Kandi emitwarize mibi ereeta okuhemuka.
Kandi enshuro y'obwengye ni nk'omugyera gurikuhimintika.
N'obu kwakuba okwita orubanja rw'ohikiriire.
Ebigambo by'omushema bireeta entongane,
Kandi orurimi rwe rumuteeza enkoni.
N'eminwa ye niyo emugwisa omu mutego.
Bishuuma omu bicweka by'omunda.
Orikweganda aha murimo gwe
Ni murumuna w'orikucwekyereza.
Ohikiriire ku aguhungiramu, aguma ari buhooro.
Kandi ni nk'orugo ruraingwa rw'amabaare orurikumurinda.
Kwonka okwecureeza kukuratwa ekitiinisa.
Ogarukamu atabandize kuhurira
Kyoreka obushema bwe n'okuhemuka.
Omutima guhamire gugumya omuntu omu ndwara ye,
Kwonka oguhahaire n'oha owaakubaasa kugwemera?
Omutima gw'omwerinzi gutunga okumanya,
Kandi okutu kw'omunyabwengye nikyo kwetenga.
Kandi kimuhitsya omu maisho g'ab'ekitiinisa.
Omu rubanja, obanza kutongana oshusha oti ebye nibyo bihikire;
Kwonka kitabaarizibwa ku aija, amwomesereza.
Enteenyu emara empaka,
Kandi eramura ab'ekitiinisa abarikuhakana.
Okugarukana n'ow'eishe-mwe ogwisiibwe kubi kugumire okukira okwata orurembo rw'amaani,
Kandi entongane nk'ezo zigumire okukira ebihongorezo by'ekigo.
Kandi omweru gw'eminwa ye nigwo gurimuhaazya.
Orurimi rugira obushoboorozi bw'okwita n'obw'okukiza,
N'abarukunda baryaheebwa ebi ruribareetera.
Kandi aba atungire omugisha ogurugire ahari MUKAMA.
Kwonka omustungi amugarukisamu ekikabuko.
Kwonka habaho munywani w'omuntu okira owaanyina owaazairwe nawe.
Akira ow'orurimi rurikukiikamya ebigambo kandi omushema.
Omuntu okubaho otaine bwengye ti kirungi,
Kandi ogyenda naayehuuta, ahaba omuhanda.
Omutima gwe gwetomboitera MUKAMA.
Kwonka omworo atsigwaho munywani we.
Kandi orikugamba ebishuba tarikira.
Baingi basherura obuhakwa aha muntu efura,
Kandi buri muntu aba munywani w'ogwo orikugaba.
Mbwenu banywani be tibakiraho kumwetantara?
Ku abakuratsa amaganya, bamuhugaho beegyendera.
Owaagira obwengye, akunda amagara ge;
Orikurinda okwetegyereza, aryagogyera.
Kareebi ow'ebishuba taribura kufubirwa
Kandi omunyabishuba aryacwekyerera.
N'okukira munonga omuhuuku tashemereire kutegyeka abanyiginya.
Kandi okwehuzya eki bamushobeize kumuhaisa ekitiinisa.
Kwonka embabazi ze ziba nk'orume orutonzire aha bunyaatsi.
Kandi okutongana kw'omukazi ni nk'enjura erikuguma neetoonyerera.
Kwonka omukazi orikwerinda amuheebwa MUKAMA.
Kandi omweremwa aryaitwa enjara.
Kwonka otarikweta ha mitwarize ye aryafa.
Aryamuzimuurira ebi yaakozire.
Kwonka otamuteera ez'okumwita.
Ow'ekiniga kingi aryakizira,
Ahakuba n'obu waakumuramura, oryaguma okikora.
Guma ohurire enaama, oikirize okuhaburwa,
Obone kugira obwengye omu biro by'omumaisho.
Kwonka enaama ya Ruhanga niyo egumaho.
Embabazi z'omuntu nizo zimureetera kukundwa,
Kandi omworo naahita omunyabishuba.
Kandi okwine aryaguma amazirwe;
Tarihikwaho kabi.
Abura ageetamika.
Hana orikwetegyereza, aryayeyongyera obwengye.
Oshiisha ebya ishe, akabinga nyina,
N'omwana orikuhemura, kandi areeta ekijumo.
Haza okahaba, okareka ebigambo by'okumanya.
Kandi akanwa k'omubi kamirakwo okutahikiirira.
Kandi enkoni zicumiirwe amabega g'abashema.
Kandi ohabisibwa ebyo, tagira bwengye.
Owaamukwatsa ekiniga, aba ayekoreire kubi.
Kwonka omushema weena akunda okutongana.
N'ahabw'ekyo aryashabiriza omu ishaaruura, kwonka taine ki ariheebwa.
Kwonka orikwetegyereza aryazikyenga.
Mbwenu omuntu orikwesigwa okaamuzoora hi?
Abaana be abarimukurata bahiiriirwe!
Ebibi byona abibingisa amaisho ge, bitaataana.
Hati ekibi kyangye kindugireho?
Byombi n'ekirikunugwa ahari MUKAMA.
Omurimo gwe gwaba gushemeire, kandi guhikire.
Byombi bikahangwa MUKAMA.
Imuka ogume nooreeba; oryagira eby'okurya, ohaagye.
Orikugura, acamura eki arikugura ati: Ni kibi! Ni kibi!
Kwonka ku agyenda, ayesiima ahabw'eki yaagura.
Kwonka eminwa y'obwengye n'enkwanzi z'obuguzi bwingi.
Kandi ku aryemererera abanyamahanga, omugumye nk'omukwato.
Kwonka bwanyima bimubeera omusheenyi omu kanwa.
Kandi ku oriza kuhurura, ohurure oine enaama z'obwengye.
N'ahabw'ekyo otarikwatanisa n'orikugambira eryo.
Etabaaza ye eryaraarizibwa omu mwirima ndindindi.
Omuheru gwabwo tigurigira mugisha.
Tegyereza MUKAMA, nawe aryakuhwera.
Kandi eminzaani y'ebishuba teba mirungi.
Mbwenu omuntu naabaasa ata kumanya omuhanda gwe?
Ekintu eki n'ekirikwera! n'omutego;
Akiheza kurahira, akatsigara naayefuuza.
Omugabe w'obwengye ashungura ababi,
Kandi abaribatisa nyamuziga.
Ecaaka ebisherekirwe omu mutima gwe.
Kandi ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe kihamibwa okuhikiirira.
Kandi oburungi bw'abagurusi n'enju zaabo.
Okwasha omuntu na kibooko kumaraho ebibi,
Kandi enkoni zishemeza ebicweka by'omunda ebya hare.
Agutooza ahu arikwenda hoona, nk'orikuhabura amaizi omu mikura yaago.
Kwonka MUKAMA apima omutima.
Bisiimwa MUKAMA okukira ebitambo.
Niyo tabaaza y'ababi; byombi n'ekibi.
Kwonka weena orahukiiriza, ayereetera obukyene.
Obutungi obu omuntu atunga ahabw'okubeiha, n'omuyaayuuko;
Ababusherura baba ni basherura rufu.
Eitima ry'ababi riryabamaraho,
Ahabw'okuba banga kukora ebihikire.
Kwonka emicwe y'oshemeire ehikire.
Okukira okukwatana enju mpango n'omukazi entongani.
Omutima gw'omubi gwetenga ebibi;
Mutaahi we tamureebamu mbabazi.
Abataine bwengye bahinduka ababwine.
Omunyabwengye ku ahaburwa, aihamu okumanya.
Amanya oku ababi banagwa ahansi, bakacwekyerera.
Nawe aryataka, abure ow'okumuhurira.
Ekiconco ky'omu mubonano kiikaikanisa okuguubwa kubi,

Kwonka ababi bo bahahaaza omutima.
Omuntu orikuhaba, akaruga omu muhanda gw'okwetegyereza,

Orikukunda eby'okweshemeza aryaba omworo;
Orikukunda viinyo n'amajuta tariba mutungi.

Okukira okutuura n'omukazi entongani kandi orikuguubwa kubi hakyehakye.
Kwonka omushema abimurakwo.
Aryagira amagara n'ekitiinisa.
Asheenya ekigo eki baabaire nibeesiga.
Ayerinda akabi.

Akora n'amaryo n'emyekuniko.
Ahabw'okuba emikono ye eyanga kufa kubi.
Kwonka ohikiriire we aha, kandi taima.
Reero kaashwa okukitamba n'omutima mubi!

Omubi ayoma ahamaisho,
Kwonka ow'omutima gugororokire atebeekanisa emihanda ye.

Kwonka okusingura kuba okwa MUKAMA.

Orikwerinda aryabyetantara.
Kandi n'obu arikura, tarigurugamu.
Omutungi ategyeka omworo,

Ahabw'okuba abooro abaha aha by'okurya bye.
Okutongana n'okujumiirana bikahwaho.
Omugabe aryaba munywani we.

Kwonka ebigambo by'endeebya abibuzabuza.
Ku ndikushohora, neenyitira omu muhanda.
Ou MUKAMA agwereirwe kubi aryakigwamu.
Kwonka enkoni y'okuhana eryabumwihamu, ebute hare.
Nari orikuha abatungi, eki ariihamu n'okukyena.

Ahabw'okuba kiryaba kirungi, waabigumya omu mutima gwawe,

Nikyo naabikumanyisiza eri izooba, iwe wenka,
Ngu ogume nooyesiga MUKAMA.
Tinaakuhandiikira ebigambo ebirikukira oburungi,
Eby'okuhana n'eby'okumanya,

Kandi abarikubanyaga, aryabaihaho amagara gaabo.

N'obu kwakuba okugyenda n'omunyakiniga,

Okeenaga omu mutego.
Abeemererera abaine amabanja.

Nooyenda ku bakwiha aha kitanda kyawe, bakakitwara?
Ekyabyairwe baashwenkuru.

Tariheereza bataine iziina.

Aryakutonganisa, naabatonganira.

Ku orikumuteera omunyaafu, tarikufa.

Oryakiza amagara ge okuza Okuzimu.

Ku origuma noogamba ebihikire,
Amagara gangye garyashemererwa.

Orikuzaara omwana w'obwengye aryayesiima ahabwe.
Ka sho na nyoko bashemererwe,
Kandi nyoko owaakuzaire ayesiime!
Mwana wangye, mpa omutima gwawe,

Kandi akanyisa endeebya omu bantu.
Empaka zigirwa oha? Okwetomboita kugirwa oha?
Obuhuta bwa busha bugirwa oha? Okutukura amaisho kugirwa oha?

Otareeba viinyo ngu niho erikutukura,
Yaaba neebirira omu kikopo,
Neesheneneka aha mumiro.
Etema nk'empiri.
Amaisho gareeba ensi neegyenda,
Omutima gwawe gugamba ebitakwatiraine.
Oshusha nk'obyami ahagati y'enyanja,
Nari nk'obyami ahaiguru y'omurongooti gw'omu meeri;

Nsisiimukye ryari, nkaza kuvumba agandi!
N'obu kwakuba okwetenga kuguma nabo;
N'eminwa yaabo egamba eby'eitima.
N'ahabw'okwetegyereza ehamira kimwe.
Biijura ebintu byona ebirikushemeza kandi eby'obuguzi bwingi.
Eego, omuntu oine okumanya ayeyongyera amaani.
Kandi ahu abahi b'obwengye baingi bari, habaho obusinguzi.

Ogira enaama ez'okukora kubi,
Ayetwa omunyaitima.

Biri amaani gaawe ni makye.
N'abarikutetema nibaza kwitwa, obazibire.

Orye n'omushongi, ogurikuruga omu ngabo zaabwo, nigukunurira.

N'amatsiko gaawe tigariihwaho.

MUKAMA atakaakireeba, kikamusaasa,
Akamwihaho ekiniga kye.

Ni kibi okugwera orubaju omu kucwa emanja.
Aryakyeenwa abantu, amahanga gamutamwe;
Kwonka abarikuhana omubi baryashemererwa,

Ogarukamu ebihikire, aba anywegyeire eminwa.
Banza otebeekanise ebi orikwija kukora aheeru,
Oteekateekye ekintu kyona eki orikwenda omu ishwa;
Bwanyima obone kwombeka enju yaawe.
Kandi otarigobya n'eminwa yaawe.
Ndyamuhoora ahabw'eki yaakozire.
Nkaraba aha musiri gw'omweremwa,
N'aha musiri gw'emizaabibu gw'omuntu otaine bwengye;

Ku naabireebire, naabiteekateekaho munonga,
Naabyetegyereza, naihamu okushoborokyerwa.

Obwo, obworo buryakwizira nk'omunyagi,

Okabura oku waagira;

Owaakihurira akakugaya,
Ekihemu kikakugumaho.
Ni nk'amapeera g'ezaabu agari omu kiibo ky'efeeza.

Nikwo n'entumwa etangirira eba aha bagitumire,
ahabw'okuba eruhuura emitima y'abakama baayo.
Nikwo n'omuntu aba oyehimbisiza aha kiconco eki atarikwija kuha.
N'orurimi rworobi rwata eigufa.
Ku oraabe waagwire aha bwoki, oryeho oburikukuhaazya,
Otakaarengyesereza, okabutanaka.
Orekye kwitsa omwa mutaahi waawe akaribatiiriro,
Atakaakuhararuka, akakwanga.
Ni nk'akateererezo nari rurara, nari omwambi gw'omunwa.
Okwesiga otarikwesigwa omu bunaku bw'akabi
Ni nk'eriino rijunzire, nari ekigyere ekikonyokire.
Orikweshongorera ow'omutima ogweshobeire
Ni nk'orikujuura ekijwaro omu mbeho,
Kandi nka viinyo erikushaarira omu buhuta.
Ku arikwatwa eiriho, omuhe eky'okunywa;
Ahabw'okuba oryaba omurunzire amakara g'omuriro aha mutwe,
Kandi MUKAMA aryakuzimuurira.
Omuyaga gw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho gureeta enjura,
Kandi orurimi orurikugambuura rureeta okuhinduriza ahamaisho.
Okukira okukwatana enju n'omukazi entongani.
Nk'amaizi agarikufuka oku gaba aha muntu oine ekyaka,
Nikwo n'amakuru marungi gaba agarikuruga omu nsi ya hare.
Ohikiriire orikuhigiza omubi
Ni nk'eiziba ry'amaizi gatabangukire, nari enshuro esiisikaire.
Kandi n'ebigambo by'okumamarika toshemereire kubirengyesereza.
Omuntu otarikubaasa kwezibira,
Ni nk'orurembo orusheenyirwe, rukagumira aho, rutaine rugo.
Nikwo n'omushema atashemereire kitiinisa.
Nikwo n'omukyeeno gwa busha gutagira u gwita.
Kandi n'enkoni zishemerera amabega g'abashema.
Haza naiwe okaba nkawe.
Atakaayemanya ku aine obwengye.
Otuma omushema aba naayehenda amaguru,
Kandi ayereetera okufeerwa.
Nk'oku amaguru g'ebirema gatuura nigaregyeijana,
Nikwo n'enfumu eba etyo omu kanwa k'abashema.
Okuha omushema ekitiinisa
Ni nk'okukomera eibaare omu kenda k'enjungu.
Nk'oku eihwa ricumita engaro y'omusinzi, rikagihweramu,
Nikwo n'enfumu eba omu kanwa k'abashema.
Nk'oku omurasi arasha weena ou yaabanda,
N'orikukoresa omushema nari omuhinguzi nikwo ari.
Nikwo n'omushema ari orikugarukira obushemba bwe.
Okaagira amatsiko aha mushema okukira ahari ogwo muntu.
N'omu mihanda harimu entare.
Nk'oku orwigi rwecundira aha pata zaarwo,
Nikwo n'omweremwa ayehindahindurira aha kitanda kye.
Abura agaazigarura omu kanwa.
Okukira abashaija mushanju abarikubaasa kugarukamu nibeerinda.
Orikwetaasya omu ntongane zitari ze,
Ni nk'orikukwata amata g'embwa erikuhingura.
Omuntu ogobeza mutaahi we, akagira ati: Naaba ninteera obuyaga!
Ni nk'omugwa-iraro orikurekyera ebikongyezo n'emyambi na rufu.
Ahu enku zibura, omuriro guraara;
N'ahu omuhwihwitsi atari, entongane zihwaho.
Nikwo omuntu entongani akanyisa entongane.
Bimirwa, bihika omunda omu kishansha.
Omuntu orikugamba eby'okukunda, haza aine omutima mubi,
Ni nk'enyungu eshwekirwe ebirikwengyengyeta by'efeeza.
Omwangani aryarya n'eminwa ye,
Kwonka omu mutima gwe aba asherekiremu eitima.
Ahabw'okuba omu mutima gwe harimu ebirikunugwa mushanju.
N'obu yaakushweka rwango ye n'oburyarya,
Obubi bwe buryareebeka butunu ahu abantu bateeraniire.
Kandi orikukumbagaza eibaare, riryamugarukira.
Orurimi rurikubeiha rwanga abu rwahutaize,
Kandi akanwa akarikumamarika kareeta okucwekyerera.
Ahabw'okuba torikumanya ebi eryo izooba riraareete.
Haakiri osiimwe omugyenyi, kunu ti minwa yaawe.
Kwonka ekiniga ky'omushema nikibikira byombi.
Kwonka n'oha owaakubaasa kugumisiririza eihari?
Kwonka okunywegyera kw'omuzigu kuba okurengyesereza.
Kwonka aha mujara ekirikushaarira kyona kinuriirira.
Nikwo n'omuntu orara, akatsigaho eka ye, aba.
Nk'oku amajuta g'omugaju gashemeza omutima,
Nikwo n'omuntu ananurwa enaama za mugyenzi we ez'aha mutima.
Kandi aha izooba eri origiriraho ebihikiirizi,
Otaryerusya kuza kweta mwene sho.
Mutaahi waawe okuri haihi naakira ou ozairwe nawe okuri hare.
Mbone kugarukamu ogwo otuura nanjuma.
Kwonka otaine bwengye akeegyema, kamwita.
Kandi ku araayemererere abanyamahanga, omugumye nk'omukwato.
Oimuka kare akaza kwendeza mutaahi we omugisha naayomba,
Aryabarwa nk'orikumukyeena.
N'omukazi entongani nibishushana.
Orikwenda kumuzibira ni nk'owaakwenda kuzibira omuyaga,
Nari okukwata amajuta omu mukono gwe gwa buryo.
Nk'oku ekyoma kityaza ekindi,
Nikwo n'omuntu atyaza mugyenzi we.
N'orikurinda mukama we aryaheebwa ekitiinisa.
Nk'oku amaisho g'omuntu geereebera omu maizi,
Nikwo n'omutima gw'omuntu gureebana n'ogundi.
Nikwo n'amaisho g'omuntu gatahaaga kureeba.
N'omuriro guba ogw'okushemerezamu ezaabu,
Kandi n'omuntu amanyirwa aha bi barikumusiima.
Obushema bwe tibukaamurugamu.
Yezirikye kumanya amatungo gaawe oku gari,
Kandi oteho omutima kureeberera ente zaawe;
Noogira ngu ekirunga kigumaho obusingye bwona?
N'obw'omu bibungo bwateeranirwa omuka,
N'embuzi zikarugwamu empiiha z'okugura emisiri.
Amahenehene garyaba eky'okurya kyawe,
Gakuhaazye n'ab'omu ka yaawe,
Kandi gatungye n'abazaana baawe.
Kwonka abahikiriire baba emanzi nk'entare.
Kwonka ku egira abanyabwengye abaine okumanya,
Bagireetera okuguma ehamire.
Ni nk'enjura etatsiga myaka.
Kwonka ababyorobera babarwanisa.
Kwonka abasherura MUKAMA bamanya byona.
Akira omutungi oyehabagiriza omu mihanda ye.
Kwonka onywana n'abanyamururu ahemura ishe.
Aba ahendekyeire orikusaasira abooro.
Okushaba kwe kuba ekirikunugwa.
Aryagwa omu kiina eki atimbire;
Kwonka otaine kamogo aryahungura ebirungi.
Omutungi ayeyeta omunyabwengye,
Kwonka omworo orikwetegyereza amumanyira kimwe.
Kwonka ababi ku batunguuka, abantu beeshereka.
Kwonka orikubyatura, akabireka, aryasaasirwa.
Omuntu orikutiina MUKAMA obutoosha aine omugisha;
Kwonka orikugangaaza omutima gwe, aryagwerwa akagwe.
Ni nk'entare erikutsinda, nari nk'edubu eyaasyokayo kurwana.
Omutegyeki otaine kwetegyereza abonabonesa abantu munonga,
Kwonka omuntu orikwanga amagoba mabi aryahangaara.
Omuntu otukuriirwe eshagama y'ou aitsire,
K'agume ari omuhungi okuhitsya aha kufa;
Kandi hatarigira owaamuhwera.
Kwonka orikwehabagiriza omu mihanda ye, aryagwa omu kiina.
Kwonka orikukuratira ebitaine mugasho, aryagira obworo bwingi.
Kwonka orikutunga ebya bugubugu taribura kufubirwa.
N'obu kwakuba omuntu okushiisha ahabw'ak'okurya kakye.
Omuntu engumya asheruza eitungo obwira,
Kandi tamanya ku obworo burimuhikaho.
Okukira ow'orurimi rurikumamarika.
Oiba ishe nari nyina, akagira ati: Tiinyine ki naashobya,
Ogwo aba ari munywani w'omuhwerekyerezi.
Kwonka orikwesiga MUKAMA aryatungisibwa.
Kwonka orikugyendera omu bwengye aryajunwa.
Kwonka orikubeehuzya aryagira emikyeeno mingi.
Kwonka ku bacwekyerera, abahikiriire bakanya.
Aryahendeka kitaraariire, kandi taritambirwa.
Kwonka ababi ku bategyeka, abantu batsinda, baborooga.
Kwonka okwatanisa na baamaraaya, ashiisha ebye.
Omugabe ocwera ensi ye emanja z'oburyo, agihamya;
Kwonka orya enguzi, agicwekyereza.
Aba nk'omutegire ekigoye.
Kwonka ohikiriire ayesiima, ateera akaari.
Kwonka omubi tagira kwetegyereza kw'okubimanya.
Abagayi bajagaraza orurembo,
Kwonka abanyabwengye baikaikanisa ekiniga.
Ow'obwengye ku ahakana n'omushema,
Omushema n'obu agira ekiniga kingi, nari akasheka,
Hoona tihabaho buhuumure.
Kandi n'ow'omutima gugororokire basherura oku baraamwite.
Omushema ayoreka butunu ekiniga kye kyona,
Kwonka omunyabwengye ayezibira, akiikaikanisa.
Omutegyeki ku arikutega amatu enkuru z'ebishuba,
Abatware be boona baryahinduka babi.
MUKAMA ahwezesa amaisho gaabo bombi.
Ekitebe ky'obugabe bwe kiryahamibwa ebiro byona.
Kwonka omwana ou bahugaho, ahemura nyina.
Kwonka abahikiriire baryareeba okugwa kwabo.
Ashemeze omutima gwawe.
Kwonka oyorobera ebiragiro, ahiiriirwe.
Omuheereza tategyekwa bigambo byonka,
Ahakuba, n'obu abihurira, tabyetaho.
Bakaagira amatsiko aha mushema okukira ogwo.
Omuhuuku orikwiha omu buto naatetsibwa mukama we,
Aha muheru aryashangwa yaabaire omuhunguzi.
Orikurahuka kuguubwa kubi akanyisa ebicumuro.
Kwonka orikucureera omu mutima aryaheebwa ekitiinisa.
Ku ahurira nibamurahiza, tagira ki agarukamu.
Kwonka orikwesiga MUKAMA aryaguma ari buhooro.
Kwonka MUKAMA niwe areetera omuntu kucwerwa orubanja rw'oburyo.
Otahikiriire n'ekirikunugwa aha bahikiriire,
Kandi ow'omutima gugororokire n'ekirikunugwa aha babi.
Tiinyine kwetegyereza nk'okw'omuntu.
Tindeegire bwengye, kandi tindikumanya Orikwera.
N'oha owaafumbatiize omuyaga omu ntomi?
N'oha owaazingiriire amaizi omu mwenda?
N'oha owaateireho enshonda zoona ez'ensi?
Eiziina rye n'oha, n'ery'omutabani niriiha,
Ku oraabe noogamanya?
Niwe ngabo y'abamuhungiraho.
Atakaakuhana, okashangwa ori omubeihi.
Ninkushaba ebintu bibiri, otabiinyima ntakafiire.
Otampindura omworo nari omutungi,
Kureka ogume ompe eby'okurya ebinshemereire,
Nkagira nti: MUKAMA niki?
Nari shi, ntakaaba omworo nkaiba.
Nkajumisa eiziina rya Ruhanga wangye.
Nyentsya atarikukyeena, okagiibwaho orubanja.
Kandi batashabira baanyinabo omugisha.
Kwonka bateeziibweho bihagaro byabo.
Bagayisa abantu amaisho!
N'ebigigo byabo biri nk'emisyo,
Okumira abooro, bakabamara omu nsi,
N'abakyene, bakabamara omu bantu.
Omushundo gwine bahara baagwo babiri,
Bashaba obutoosha nibagira bati: Mpa! Mpa!
Hariho ebintu bishatu ebitahaaga,
Nangwa ni bina, ebitagira biti, Naiguta;
Ensi etahaaga amaizi.
N'omuriro ogutakagiraga guti, Naiguta.
Akeekunika, akanga kworobera nyina,
Riryanonkoorwa ebikoona by'omu mpanga,
Ririibwe amahungu.
Hariho ebintu bishatu ebikira kuntangaaza,
Nangwa ni bina ebi nteetegyereza,
Nibyo ebi: Emizeereerere y'empungu omu mwanya,
Emigyendere y'enjoka aha rukiri,
Emigyendere y'emeeri aha nyanja,
N'emitwarize y'omushaija aha mwishiki.
Nikwo n'emitwarize y'omukazi enshambani eba.
Arya, ayeragaza aha minwa, agira ati: Tiinyine ki naashobya.
Hariho ebintu bishatu ebitengyetsa ensi,
Nangwa ni bina ebi etabaasa kugumisiririza,
Omushema kuhaaga eby'okurya,
Omwishiki owaabengirwe kushwerwa,
N'omuzaana kuhungurira mugore we.
Aha nsi hariho ebintu bina, n'obu biraabe biba bikye,
Kwonka bigira obwengye bwingi munonga.
Kwonka byehunikira eby'okurya omu kyanda;
Kwonka zeegirira amaju omu mabaare;
Kwonka zigyendera hamwe omu buteeka;
N'ekinya n'ekintu eki orikubaasa kutwara omu ngaro,
Kwonka kituura omu bikaari by'abagabe.
Hariho ebintu bishatu nangwa ni bina,
Ebinyigimba omu migyendere yaabyo.
Nibyo ebi: Entare egira amaani okukira ezindi nyamaishwa,
Kandi tegira kindi kyona eki ehunga;
Embaraasi y'aha rugamba, empaya y'embuzi,
N'omugabe otaturukirirwa.
Nari okateekateeka kukora kubi, kwata aha munwa;
Ahabw'okuba okucunda amate kujwisa amajuta,
Okumiga enyindo kujwisa eshagama,
N'okwitsa ekiniga kureeta entongane.
N'enki, mwana wangye, ou naayezaariire?
N'enki, mwana wangye, ou naaraganiise Ruhanga nimpiga?
N'obu kwakuba okuza omuri abo abacwekyereza abagabe.
Ti ky'abagabe kunywa viinyo,
N'obu baakuba abategyeki kwetenga ebirikusinza,
Bakaita emanja z'abarikubonabonesibwa boona.
Ekirikusinza okihe orikwenda kufa,
Na viinyo ogihe oine obusaasi bwingi omu mutima,
Kandi otonganire abatsigirweho abataine ifo na ruguru.
Orwanirire abooro n'abakyene.
Ahakuba naakira amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi.
Omutima gwa iba gumwesiga,
Kandi omushaija we taribura kutunga.
Ebiro byona eby'amagara ge
Akora gye iba, tamukora kubi.
Ayezirika kutunga ebyoya by'entaama na furakisi,
Kandi akora n'emikono eyekundiire.
Omukazi ogwo ni nk'amaato g'abashuubuzi,
Aiha eby'okurya bye hare.
Atebeekanisiza ab'omu ka ye eby'okurya,
Kandi n'abazaana be abateekateekyera emirimo.
Ayetegyereza omusiri, agugura,
Agubyaramu emizaabibu, naakoresa ebirugire omu mikono ye.
Ayezirika amaani nk'omweko, kandi ahamya emikono ye.
Amanya ebi arikukora ku bimwiniire omugasho,
Kandi etabaaza ye nyekiro teraara.
Emikono ye agita aha kiti ky'ebyoya by'entaama,
N'engaro ze zikwata akati k'okukaragisa.
Ashashaanurira abooro engaro,
N'abakyene abahwera n'emikono ye.
Tatiinirira b'omu ka ye biro by'embeho,
Ahabw'okuba ab'omu ka ye boona bajwara ebirikutukura.
Ayebaziirira eby'okwefubika,
Kandi ajwara emyenda ya bafuta na bujwa.
Abaziira ebijwaro bya kitaani kandi abitunda,
Abashuubuzi abaha emyeko.
Amaani n'ekitiinisa nibyo bijwaro bye;
Ebiriija tabitiina, abishekyerera.
Akanwa ke kagamba eby'obwengye,
Kandi okwegyesa eby'embabazi tikumuruga mu kanwa.
Areeberera gye emicwe y'ab'omu ka ye;
Kandi tariira koya.
Abaana be baimuka, bamweta ow'omugisha;
Kandi na iba amusingiza naagira ati:
Abakazi baingi batwaza gye, kwonka iwe obakira boona.
Kwonka omukazi otiina MUKAMA aba ow'okusiimwa.
Mumusiime ahabw'ebi emikono ye ekozire,
Kandi emirimo ye emuhimbisise omu marembo.
Ebigambo by'Omubuurizi, mwene Daudi, omugabe ow'omuri Yerusaalemu.
Busha erikukira busha yoona,
Byona ni busha!
Oku afa kubi ahansi y'eizooba?
Kwonka ensi yo egumaho obutwire bwona.
Bwanyima rirahuka kugaruka ei riruga.
Gugaruka gutoora obwa-bumosho,
Guhindahinduka omu rugyendo rwagwo,
Kandi gugaruka omu kwehinguririza kwagwo.
Emigyera yoona eshuka omu nyanja,
Kwonka enyanja teijura;
Ei emigyera eza, niyo egaruka kuza.
Obu omuntu atarikubaasa kushoboorora.
Eriisho tirihaaga kureeba,
N'okutu tikuhaaga kuhurira.
Kandi ekirakozirwe nikyo kiriguma nikikorwa.
Tihariho kisya ahansi y'eizooba.
Hariho eki abantu baakugambaho ngu, Reeba, eki ni kisya?
Nakyo kirabaireho ira omu biro ebyatubandiize.
N'ebiribaho, ebitakabeireho, abarikurataho tibaribiijuka.
Nyowe Omubuurizi nkaba ndi omugabe wa Israeli omuri Yerusaalemu.
Nkata omutima aha kusherura n'okucondooza obwengye, ngu mbone kumanya ebirikukorwa ahansi y'eiguru byona; naashanga kuri okufa kubi okw'obusaasi oku Ruhanga yaahaire abantu kubarusya.
Nkeetegyereza byona ebirikukorwa ahansi y'eizooba, naashanga byona biri busha, biri okwitanira omuyaga.
Kandi ekitahikire tikirikubaasa kubarwa.
Naata omutima aha kwetegyereza obwengye n'obugwa-iraro n'obushema; naashanga nabyo kuri okwitanira omuyaga.
Ahakuba obwengye bwingi bubamu enaku nyingi,
Kandi oyeyongyera okumanya, ayeyongyera obusaasi.
Naagamba aha nsheko nti: N'eiraro! n'aha kweshemeza nti: Nikugasha ki?

Naateekateeka omu mutima gwangye oku naakubaasa kweshemeza na viinyo, omutima gwangye gukaguma nigumpabura obwengye, n'oku naakubaasa kumanya oku abantu bashemereire kutwaza ahansi y'eizooba omu biro ebi bamara omu nsi.
Naakora emirimo mikuru; naayeyombekyera amaju, naayebyarira emizaabibu,
naayehingira emisiri, naayekorera ebibanja, naabibyaramu emiti erikwana ebijuma,
naayecungirira ebiyanja, naataho emikura y'okutwara amaizi omu misiri ey'okwororeramu emiti.
Naagura abahuuku n'abazaana, n'abandi baazaarirwa omu ka yangye; kandi naagira amasyo maingi g'ente n'ag'entaama, agarikukira ag'abandi boona abambandiize omuri Yerusaalemu.
Kandi naayerundaanira efeeza n'ezaabu, n'eby'eitungo eby'abagabe n'eby'amashaza; naayetungira abeeshongozi abashaija n'abakazi, n'ebinyanshunju bingi ebirikushemeza abantu.

Eki amaisho gangye gaabaire geetenga kyona, nkaba ntakigaima; nkaba ntazibira mutima gwangye kweshemeza omu muringo gwona, ahakuba nkashemerererwa okufa kubi kwangye kwona; ebyo nibyo byabaire ebihembo byakwo.

Bwanyima naayetegyereza ebi naakozire n'emikono yangye byona, n'okufa kubi oku naafiire kubi nimbikora, naashanga byona biri busha, biri okwitanira omuyaga, kandi hataine kiine omugasho ahansi y'eizooba.
Bwanyima naareeba ku obwengye burikukira obushema, nk'oku omushana gukira omwirima.
Omunyabwengye agira amaisho, kwonka omushema agyendera omu mwirima ataine ki arikureeba; n'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, nkeetegyereza ngu omuheru gwabo boona guba gumwe.
Nikwo kuteekateeka omu mutima gwangye nti: Ebihika aha mushema, naanye nibyo birimpikaho. Mbwenu shi, okumukiza obwengye nikingasira ki? Ntyo naagira omu mutima gwangye nti: Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
Manya, omunyabwengye n'omushema nikyo kimwe; tihariho origuma naijukwa, ahabw'okuba omu biro ebiriija bombi baryaba baayebire. Ka n'eihano omunyabwengye kufa nk'omushema!
Ntyo naatamwa amagara, ahabw'okuba ebikorerwa ahansi y'eizooba byona bikangwisa kubi; byona ni busha n'okwitanira omuyaga.
Mbwenu n'oha orikumanya yaaba ariba omunyabwengye nari omushema? Kwonka niwe ariba mukama wa byona ebi naafeereire kubi ninkoresa obwengye bwangye ahansi y'eizooba. Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
Nikyo naahindukiire, omutima gwangye nkagumara amatsiko aha bi naafeereire kubi byona ahansi y'eizooba;
ahakuba obundi hariho omuntu okora n'obwengye n'okumanya n'obuhangu; kwonka aryabitsigira otarabihendekyeire, abigaramisirizemu. Ekyo nakyo ni busha, n'ekibi kihango.
Mbwenu shi, omuntu aiha ki omu kufa kubi kwe kwona, n'omu bi omutima gwe gwayezirikiire kukora ahansi y'eizooba?
Ahabw'okuba ebiro bye byona biijwire obusaasi, n'okukora kwe n'enaku; nangwa na nyekiro omutima gwe tiguruhuuka. Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
mbwenu We ah'atari n'oha orikubaasa kurya nari kweshemeza?

Ahabw'okuba omuntu oshemeza Ruhanga niwe aha obwengye n'okumanya n'okushemererwa; kwonka omusiisi Ruhanga amuha omurimo gw'okushaaruura n'okuhunika, ngu abone kubitsigira omuntu orikushemeza Ruhanga. Ekyo nakyo ni busha, n'okwitanira omuyaga.
Obunaku bw'okubyara, n'obunaku bw'okukuura ebyabyairwe;
Obunaku bw'okwita, n'obunaku bw'okukiza,
Obunaku bw'okusheenya, n'obunaku bw'okwombeka;
Obunaku bw'okucura, n'obunaku bw'okuzina;
Obunaku bw'okufumbatana, n'obunaku bw'okwerinda kufumbatana;
Obnaku bw'okusherura, n'obunaku bw'okubuza,
Obunaku bw'okubiika, n'obunaku bw'okunaga;
Obunaku bw'okuhunama, n'obunaku bw'okugamba;
Obunaku bw'obweme, n'obunaku bw'obusingye.

Buri kintu akakihanga kiri kirungi omu bunaku bwakyo; kandi yaata omu mitima y'abantu ebiteekateeko by'obunaku obutarihwaho, n'obu omuntu araabe atarikubaasa kumanya ebi Ruhanga yaakozire okwiha aha kutandika okuhitsya aha muheru.
Nimmanya ku hatariho kirikubakiriira okushemererwa n'okukora gye ebiro byona ebi bariba bakiriho;
kandi ku kiri ekiconco kya Ruhanga aha muntu weena okurya n'okunywa n'okushemerererwa ebi arikufeera kubi byona.
Nimmanya ngu, eki Ruhanga akora kyona kiryagumaho ebiro byona; tihaine kirikubaasa kukyongyerwaho, nari okukituubyaho; kandi Ruhanga akakihanga atyo, ngu abantu bamutiine.
Ekiriho kirabaireho; ekiribaho nakyo kirabaireho; kandi Ruhanga agaruraho ekyabaire kiihirweho.
Nikwo kugira omu mutima gwangye nti: Ruhanga aryacwera abahikiriire n'ababi orubanja; ahabw'okuba buri kintu na buri murimo akabiteeraho obunaku bwabyo.
Kandi naagira omu mutima gwangye nti: Ruhanga naagyeza abaana b'abantu, ngu babone kumanyiraho ku batari kindi kureka enyamaishwa.
Ahabw'okuba ekihika aha bantu, nikyo kihika aha nyamaishwa; nk'oku omuntu afa, nikwo n'enyamaishwa efa. Byona bigira emiikize emwe; omuntu taine ki akiza enyamaishwa, ahabw'okuba byona ni busha.
Byona biza omu mwanya gumwe; byona bikaruga omu mucuucu, kandi byona nimwo birigaruka.
N'oha orikumanya yaaba omwitsyo gw'omuntu gwinamuka ahaiguru, ogw'enyamaishwa gukashuuma omu itaka?
Nikyo ndikureebera ngu tihariho kirikukirira omuntu okushemerererwa emirimo ye, ahabw'okuba ogwo nigwo mugabo gwe. N'oha owaakumugarura kureeba ebiribaho yaarugireho?
Naateekateeka nti, abafu abaafiire bahiiriiirwe okukira abahuriire abakiriho;
kwonka orikubakira bombi n'otakabahoga, kandi otakareebaga bibi ebirikukorwa ahansi y'eizooba.
Bwanyima naareeba emirabanamu yoona y'eby'emirimo y'obuhangu byona, ku nibyo bireetera omuntu okugirirwa mutaahi we eihari. Kandi ekyo nakyo ni busha n'okwitanira omuyaga.
Kandi hoona nkagaruka naareeba busha ahansi y'eizooba;

omuntu otaine waabo, n'obu yaakuba omutabani, nari mwene ishe; kwonka okufa kubi kwe kutaine bugarukiro, kandi amaisho ge gatakahaagaga butungi, haza atakeebuuzaga ati: Beitu obu nfa kubi nti, mpendekyera ki ekinzibira kweshemeza? Ekyo nakyo ni busha n'emirabanamu mibi.
Ababiri nibakira omwe; ahabw'okuba baheebwa ebihembo birungi ahabw'okufa kubi kwabo.
Ahakuba ku bagwa, omwe aimutsya mugyenzi we; kwonka ogwa ari omwe wenka, akabura kiimutsya, areeba enaku.
Ekindi, ababiri ku babyama hamwe, batagatirwa; mbwenu omwe naabaasa ata kutagatirwa ari wenka?
Omuntu n'obu yaakusingura omwe, ababiri takaababaasa; kandi omurunga gw'enyabushatu tigucweka juba.
n'obu yaakuba yaarugire omu kihome akaza aha ngoma, nari yaazairwe ari omworo omu ihanga rye.
Nkareeba abantu boona abahuriire abarikugyendagyenda ahansi y'eizooba, beemereire aha rubanju rw'ogwo mutsigazi owaabaire naaza kuhungurira ogwo mugabe;
abantu abu yaabaire naategyeka bakaba bari baingi bataine bugarukiro. Kwonka abarikurataho tibarimushemerererwa. Buzimazima ekyo nakyo ni busha n'okwitanira omuyaga.
Otarirahukwa aha rurimi, kandi otariikiriza omutima gwawe kurahukiriza kurahira omu maisho ga Ruhanga; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga ari omu iguru, naiwe ori aha nsi; n'ahabw'ekyo ebigambo byawe bibe bikye.
Ahabw'okuba ebirooto bireetwa emirabanamu mingi, kandi eiraka ry'omushema rimanyirwa aha bigambo bingi.
Okuraganisa otahikiirize nikikirwa okutaraganisa.
Otariikiriza akanwa kaawe kukucumuza, kandi otarigamba omu maisho ga maraika oti: Kikaba kiri ekishobyo. Nooyendera ki ku Ruhanga agirira eiraka ryawe ekiniga, akacwekyereza emirimo y'emikono yaawe?
Kwonka omweru gw'ensi guba ogwa boona; n'omugabe atungwa ebi ahingiirwe.
Okunda efeeza tahaaga feeza; kandi n'okunda obutungi tahaaga magoba. Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
Ebintu ku bikanya, n'ab'okubirya bakanya; mbwenu nyinabyo aba ayeyongyeireho ki? Tokubireeba n'amaisho kwonka?
Oturo tw'omukozi tumugwa gye, n'obu arya bikye nari bingi; kwonka omwiguto gw'omutungi gumubuza oturo.
Hariho ekibi ekirengyesereize eki naareebire ahansi y'eizooba; nibwo butungi obu omuntu ayeebiikira, haza bukamureetera akabi;
obutungi bwe obwo bukamarwaho ebihikiirizi; kandi akizaara omwana, akabura eky'okumuha.
Nk'oku yaarugire omu nda ya nyina ataine ki ajwaire, nikwo arigyenda ataine ki aihire omu kufa kubi kwe, ekiiyaakutwara omu ngaro ze.
Kandi ekyo nakyo n'ekibi ekirengyesereize; oku yaizire, nikwo arigyenda. Mbwenu nikimugasira ki okwitanira omuyaga,
akamara ebiro bye byona ari omu mwirima, aine enaku nyingi n'endwara n'okwetomboita?
Reeba, eki naareebire kiri kirungi aha muntu, kandi kihikire, n'okurya n'okunywa n'okushemerererwa okufa kubi kwe ebiro bikye ebi Ruhanga amuhaire; ahabw'okuba ogwo nigwo mugabo gwe.
N'omuntu weena ou Ruhanga ahaire eitungo n'ebintu n'obushoboorozi bw'okubishemerererwa omu kufa kubi kwe, ekyo nakyo n'ekiconco kya Ruhanga.
Ahakuba taritongyeza munonga biro by'amagara ge, ahabw'okuba Ruhanga aryaguma naamuhuzya n'okushemererwa omu mutima gwe, naabimwebesa.

niwe muntu ou Ruhanga ahaire eitungo n'ebintu n'ekitiinisa, ataine kintu kyona eki arikwetenga, kwonka akamwima okubishemerererwamu, kureka omunyaihanga akaba niwe yaabishemerererwamu. Ekyo nakyo ni busha, kandi n'okubonabona kw'obusaasi.
Omuntu okuzaara abaana igana, akahangaara emyaka mingi, ebiro by'amagara ge bikakanya, kwonka omutima gwe gutahaagye birungi, akabura kiziika, ningira ngu omuntu ogwo naakirwa enda erugiremu;
ahakuba egyo nda erugamu etari kintu, eza omu mwirima, gushweka eiziina ryayo,
kandi eba etakareebaga izooba n'obu kwakuba okumanya ekintu kyona; n'obu eraabe eba etyo, etunga obuhuumure okukira ogwo muntu.
N'obu yaakuhangaara emyaka rukumi kabiri, atarikushemerererwa birungi, timurikumanya ngu byona biza omu mwanya gumwe?
Omunyabwengye naakiza ki omushema? Kandi omworo naakiza ki omuntu mukuru orikumanya kutwaza gye omu maisho g'abantu?
Okushemerererwa ebi orikureeba nikikira okuguma noozengyereza omutima aha bi orikwetenga. Ekyo nakyo ni busha n'okwitanira omuyaga.
Ebigambo ku byongyera kukanya, busha nayo ekanya; mbwenu ekyo omuntu kimwongyeraho ki?

N'oha owaakumanya ebishemereire kugirira omuntu omugasho akiriho ebiro byona eby'amagara ge agataine ku gari, agarikuhinguraho nk'ekicuucu? N'oha owaakugambira omuntu ebiribaho ahansi y'eizooba yaarugireho?
Eizooba ey'okufeeraho nirikira ery'okuzaarirwaho.
Okuza omu ka erimu okucura
Nikikira okuza omu ka erimu obugyenyi;
Ahabw'okuba ekyo nigwo muheru gw'abantu bona,
Kandi abahuriire baryakigumya aha mutima.
Ahabw'okuba enaku z'ahamaisho zishemeza omutima.
Omutima gw'omunyabwengye guba omu nju ei barikucuriramu;
Kwonka emitima y'abashema eba omu nju y'okwesiima.
Okukira okuhurira ekyehsongoro ky'abashema;
Ahakuba okusheka kw'omushema ni nk'amahwa
Agarikubarabarukira ahansi y'enyungu eteeka.
Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
Kandi enguzi eita obwengye.
Omuheru gw'ekintu gukira okutanidka kwakyo;
Ow'omutima ogurikugumisiriza akira ow'omutima gw'amaryo.
Ahabw'okuba ekiniga kituura omu mutima gw'abashema.
Otagira oti: Ahabw'enki ebiro bya ira nibihita ebya hati?
Ahabw'okuba obwengye tibwo burikukureetera kubuuza otyo.
Obwengye ni burungi waaba oine obuhunguzi,
Kandi nibugasira abakirikureeba eizooba.
Kandi omugasho gw'okumanya n'obwengye bw'okurinda amagara g'obwine.
N'oha owaakubaasa kugorora eki yaakiikamize?
Aha izooba ery'okuhiirwa, oshemererwe; n'aha izooba ry'akabi oteekateekye ku Ruhanga niwe yaabihangire byombi, ngu omuntu atarimanya ebiribaho atakiriho.
Otarengyesereza okuhikiirira, kandi oteehindura omunyabwengye orengyesereize. Nooyendera ki kwereetera okufa?
Otarengyesereza kuba mubi, kandi otaba omushema. Nooyendera ki kufa obunaku bwawe butakahikire?
Ni kirungi okuhamyaho kimwe, n'ekindi okutakireka; ahabw'okuba orikutiina Ruhanga aryaruga gye omuri ebyo byona.
Buzimazima tihariho ohikiriire omu nsi okora gye, atashiishe na kakye.
Kandi otarita omutima aha bigambo by'abantu, nyentsya otakaahurira omuhuuku waawe naakujuma;
ahakuba naiwe noomanya omu mutima gwawe kaingi ku okyeena abandi.
Ebyo byona nkabihamya ahabw'obwengye. Nkagira nti: Ndyaba omunyabwengye, kwonka bwamba hare.
Ekyo kiri hare munonga okuzimu; n'oha owaakubaasa kukizoora?
Bwanyima naahinduka, naamariirira omu mutima gwangye kumanya, kucondooza, kusherura obwengye, kwehanuuza ebintu, n'okumanya obubi bw'obushema, n'obushema oku buri eiraro.

Naagaruka naareeba ekintu ekirikukira rufu obushaarizi, niwe mukazi ou omutima gwe guri omutego n'ekigoye, kandi n'emikono ye eri enkomo. Orikushemeza Ruhanga niwe arimukira; kwonka omusiisi, ogwo mukazi aryamukwata.
Omubuurizi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Reeba, eki nikyo naaboine, ahabw'okuteerana ekintu n'ekindi, ngu ndeebe oku birikwingana,
eki omutima gwangye gusherwire kaingi, kwonka eki ntakareebire. Omu bashaija rukumi nkareebamu omwe, kwonka omu bakazi boona tindaboinemu n'omwe.
Reeba, eki kyonka nikyo naareebire, ngu Ruhanga akahanga omuntu agororokire, kwonka abantu baayesherurira bingi ebi baayegunziire.
N'oha ori nk'omunyabwengye?
Kandi n'oha orikumanya ekintu oku kirikushoboororwa?
Obwengye bw'omuntu bureetera aha maisho ge kushemuuka,
Bumaraho emifunya.
ruga omu maisho ge, oteeziringa eki yaakuragiira, n'obu kiraabe kitarikukushemeza; ahabw'okuba akora eki arikwenda kyona.
Manya, ekigambo ky'omugabe kigira obushoboorozi. N'oha owaakwehanga kumugira ati: Ekyo nookora ki?
Orikworobera ekiragiro, tarihikwaho kabi; kandi omutima gw'omunyabwengye gumanya obunaku buhikire, n'oburyo bw'okukoreramu;
ahabw'okuba ekintu kyona kigira obunaku bwakyo n'oburyo obu kishemereire kukorwamu, omuntu n'obu araabe ahendwa obusaasi bwe.
Ahabw'okuba tamanya biribaho; mbwenu n'oha owaakubaasa kumugambira oku biriba?
Tihariho muntu oine obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka omuyaga, n'obu kwakuba okwemereza eizooba rya rufu; omuri orwo rugamba tihabaho kuraga, kandi owaayehaireyo kukora ebibi, tibirimujuna.
Ebyo byona nkabireeba, obu naata omutima gwangye aha kumanya ebirikukorwa ahansi y'eizooba, omuntu naayekuriza ahari mugyenzi we kumukora kubi.
Bwanyima nkareeba ababi nibaziikwa, nibaza okuzimu; kwonka abaakozire gye baaruga omu Mwanya ogurikwera, baayeba omu rurembo. Ekyo nakyo ni busha.
Ahabw'ekifubiro ky'ekibi kutaija juba, nikyo emitima y'abantu emariiririra kukora ebibi.
Omusiisi n'obu akora ebibi emirundi igana, akahangaara, kwonka nimmanyira kimwe ngu abatuura omu maisho ga Ruhanga nibamutiina nibo bariba gye;
kwonka omubi we tariba gye, n'obu kwakuba okwongyera aha biro bye ebiri nk'ekicuucu, ahabw'okuba tatiina Ruhanga.

Ntyo naasiima okweruhuura; ahabw'okuba tihariho ekirikukirira omuntu okurya n'okunywa n'okweruhuura; ahakuba ebyo nibyo ariguma nabyo omu kufa kubi kwe ebiro byona ebi Ruhanga amuhaire kumara ahansi y'eizooba.
Ku naataire omutima aha kumanya obwengye n'okureeba emirabanamu eri aha nsi, (ahabw'okuba hariho abatagwejegyera na kakye nyomushana na nyekiro,)

bwanyima naayetegyereza emirimo ya Ruhanga yoona, naashanga omuntu atarikubaasa kushoborokyerwa murimo gwona ogukorwa ahansi y'eizooba. Omuntu n'obu yaakufa kubi ata kwenda kugumanya, takaagushoborokyerwa; nangwa n'obu omunyabwengye yaakugira ngu naagumanya, kwonka taribaasa kugumanya.

Byona bihika ahari boona omu muringo gumwe, ahari ohikiriire n'ahari otahikiriire, aha murungi n'aha mubi, ahari oshemeire n'ahari otashemeire, aha mutambi w'ebitambo n'aha muntu otabitamba. Oku omurungi aba, nikwo n'omusiisi aba; orahira ni nk'otarahira.

Obwo n'obubi obuba omuri byona ebikorwa ahansi y'eizooba, abantu boona kuhikwaho omuheru gumwe; ekindi, emitima y'abantu eijwire ebibi, kandi n'omu mitima yaabo habamu eiraro bakiriho; bwanyima y'ebyo bakurata abaafiire.
Kwonka okwatanisa n'abahuriire boona aba aine amatsiko, ahabw'okuba embwa ehuriire ekira entare efiire.
Abahuriire bamanya ku barifa; kwonka abafiire tibagira ki bamanya, kandi baba batakiine bindi bihembo; ahabw'ouba tibaakiijukwa.
Okukunda kwabo n'okwangana kwabo n'eihari ryabo, byona biba byahweireho; kandi baba batakiine mugabo gwona omuri byona ebirikukorwa ahansi y'eizooba okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Ebijwaro byawe bigume nibyera, kandi omutwe gwawe gurrekye kuburamu amajuta.
Kyona eki orikwenda kukora n'emikono yaawe, okikore n'amaani; ahabw'okuba okuzimu ei oriza tihabayo murimo, nari enaama, nari okumanya, n'obu bwakuba obwengye.
Ahabw'okuba tihariho muntu omanya obunaku bwe; nk'oku eby'enyanja bikwatwa akatimba kabi, n'enyonyi zikakwatwa omutego, nikwo n'abantu bakwatwa omutego omu bunaku bubi, ku bubagwaho kitaraariire.
Kandi naareeba ahansi y'eizooba eky'okureeberaho eki eky'obwengye ekyansusiire kikuru.
Omu rurembo rukye hakaba harimu abantu bakye; bwanyima omugabe rugambwa yaija, yaarugota, yaarwombekaho ebigo bihango.
Kwonka omuri orwo rurembo hakaba harimu omworo oine obwengye; bwanyima ahabw'obwengye bwe yaarukiza. N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, tihaine muntu weena owaijukire ogwo mworo.
Ntyo naagira nti: Obwengye bukira amaani; kwonka obwengye bw'omworo bugaywa, kandi ebigambo bye tibabyetaho.
Ebigambo by'omunyabwengye ebirikugambwa mpora nibikira ebi omutegyeki orikuyombera omu bashema.
Obwengye nibukira eby'okurwanisa, kwonka omusiisi omwe aita ebirungi bingi.
Enshohera ezifiire zinuutsya amajuta g'omugaju,
N'obushema bukye bumaraho obwengye n'ekitiinisa.
Omutima gw'omunyabwengye gumutooza ahari buryo,
Kwonka ogw'omushema gumutooza ahari bumosho.
Ou yaareeba weena amweta omushema.
Ahabw'okuba okworoba kusaasiza ebicumuro bihango.
Kandi hariho ekibi eki naareebire ahansi y'eizooba, nikwo kushobaya kw'omutegyeki.
Obushema buteebwa omu myanya mingi y'ekitiinisa, n'abatungi bashutama omu myanya erikugaywa.
Nkareeba abahuuku nibagyendera aha mbaraasi, n'abanyiginya nibagyendesa ebigyere nk'abahuuku.
Kandi orikufumura orugo aryariibwa enjoka.
Ohigura amabaare, gamuhutaaza,
N'oyatsa enku zimunaga omu kabi.
Ekyoma ku kihwa obwogi, nyinakyo ataakityaza,
Aba ashemereire kwongyera amaani;
Kwonka obwengye nibwo buhwera omuntu okuhikiiriza
Eki arikwenda kukora.
Omurogi waayo aba atakiine mugasho.
Ebigambo ebiruga omu kanwa k'omunyabwengye bimureetera okukundwa,
Kwonka ebigambo by'omushema biryamumaraho.
Okutandika kw'ebigambo ebiruga omu kanwa ke n'obushema,
N'omuheru gwabyo n'eiraro ribi.
N'obu haraabe hataine orikumanya ebiribaho;
Kandi n'oha owaakubaasa kumugambira ebiribaho yaarugireho?
Okufa kubi kw'omushema kumurusya,
Ahabw'okuba tamanya kahanda kaza obukama.
N'abanyiginya baawe nibaimukira aha by'okurya!
Kandi abanyiginya baawe ku baraagume nibariira omu bunaku buhikire,
Nibariira amaani, batarikunywera sindo!
Obweremwa bubonza orukanga,
Kandi emikono emyeremwa ereetera enju kwogwamu enjura.
Na viinyo ereetera amagara kushemererwa,
Kandi empiiha ekyenuura byona.
Otarijumira abatungi omu kishengye kyawe eki oraaramu;
Ahabw'okuba enyonyi y'omu mwanya eryatwara eiraka ryawe,
Nari ekiine amapapa kyona kibigambe.
Bwanyima y'ebiro bingi oryazireeba.
Ahabw'okuba torikumanya kabi akaribaho omu nsi.
Ebicu ku biba biijwire enjura,
Esheesheka aha nsi;
Kandi ekiti ku kigwa nikireeba obukiizi-bwa-buryo nari obwa-bumosho,
Ahu kigwa, niho kiguma.
Ohanga amaisho omuyaga, tabiba;
Kandi ogahanga ebicu, tagyesha.
Omu kasheeshe ogume obibe embibo, kandi n'omu mwabazyo orekye kugwisa omukono; ahabw'okuba torikumanya ekiryera, yaaba eki nari kiriya, nari shi yaaba byombi biriba birungi.
Buzimazima omushana ni murungi, n'okureeba eizooba kushemeza amaisho.
Omuntu ku araahangaare emyaka mingi, agishemerererwemu yoona; kwonka amanye ngu ebiro by'omwirima biryaba bingi. Ebiribaho byona ni busha.
N'ahabw'ekyo iha amaganya omu mutima gwawe, kandi omubiri gwawe ogutaanise n'ebibi; ahabw'okuba obuto n'obutsigazi ni busha.
eizooba n'omushana n'okwezi n'enyonyoozi bitakashwekirwe mwirima, kandi n'ebicu bitakagarukire enjura yaatsya;
obunaku obu abarinzi b'enju baritetema, n'emanzi zikabundabunda, abasi bakarereera ahabw'okuba bakye, n'abarikuringuririza omu dirisa amaisho gakagiibwaho oruho;
enyigi ezirikureeba omu nguuto zikakingwa, okugamba kw'emengo kukaba kukye, omuntu akasisiimurwa eiraka ry'enyonyi, kandi n'abaishiki boona abeeshongozi bakagarurwa ahansi;

baryatiina ekiri ahaiguru, kandi ebirikutiinisa biryaba biri omu muhanda; omurozi guryarabya, eseeneene ziryarusya, n'ebirikwetengwa biryahwaho, ahabw'okuba omuntu aryaba naaza omu ka y'entuura, n'abarikucura nibazengyerera omu nguuto;
akagoye k'efeeza katakacwekire, orwabya rw'ezaabu rutakaatikire, enyungu etakaatikiire ha nshuro, enziga etakahendekyeire ha iziba,
omucuucu gukagaruka omu itaka, nk'oku gwabaire guri, n'amagara gakagaruka ahari Ruhanga owaagahaire.
Atyo Omubuurizi yaagaruka yaagira ati: Ni busha bwa busha; byona ni busha!
Kandi Omubuurizi yaasherura ebigambo ebirikushemeza, yaahandiika ebigambo by'amazima n'omutima gugororokire.
Ebigambo by'abanyabwengye ni nk'emihunda, kandi ebigambo by'Omuriisa omwe ebiteerainwe hamwe ni nk'emisumaari ehamire.
Kandi mwana wangye, oyerinde ekintu kyona ekitari ebyo. Okuhandiika ebitabo bingi tikugira bugarukiro, n'okwega munonga kurusya.
ahabw'okuba Ruhanga aryacwera orubanja ekintu kyona ekyakozirwe, n'ekintu kyona ekyasherekirwe, yaaba kirungi nari kibi.
Nkaabaasibwa ki, onnywegyera n'eminwa yaawe,
Ahabw'okuba okukunda kwawe nikumpitira viinyo;
Eiziina ryawe ni nk'amajuta agashukirwe;
Nikyo empangare zikukundira.
