Omugabe antaahize omu bishengye bye;
Nitwija kwesiima, tushemerererwe omuriiwe,
Tusingize okukunda kwawe okukira viinyo.
Eki barikukukundira n'eky'amazima.
Imwe baishiki ba Yerusaalemu 'mwe,
Niinyiragura, kwonka ndi murungi;
Ndi nk'amahema ga Kedari,
Nk'emikingo ya Sulemaani.
Ahakuba eizooba niryo ryanyokize.
Abaana ba maawe bakangirira ekiniga,
Bangira omurinzi w'emizaabibu,
Kwonka eyangye tinaagirinda!
Ngambira ahu oriisiza obusyo bwawe,
N'ahu obuzaagiza omu ihangwe;
Ahabw'enki nimba nk'orikuzengyerera
Omu masyo ga bagyenzi baawe.
Iwe mukazi orikuhita abandi 'we,
Ku oraabe otarikuhamya,
Toora ekirari ky'obwo busyo haihi n'amahema g'abariisa,
Oriisizeyo abaana b'entaama.
N'omu maraka gaawe harimu orukwanzi rw'amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi.
Nitwija kukukorera amahunde g'ezaabu
N'amapeesha g'efeeza.
amajuta gangye g'omugaju gataamirana.
Nkunzi yangye ahariinye ni nk'akashaho ka sumuruna
akari ahagati y'amabeere gangye.
Nkunzi yangye ni nk'enganda y'ebirabyo bya Koferi
Omu misiri y'emizaabibu ya Eni-geedi.
Eshi ori murungi, amaisho gaawe ni nk'ag'enkombe.
Nkunzi yangye, eshi ori murungi;
Buzimazima nooshemeza,
Kandi ekitanda kyaitu ni nk'obunyaatsi buto.
Emitambiko y'enju yaitu n'emyereezi,
N'emiraba yaayo n'emiberooshi.
Ndi nk'endungu ya Sharooni,
Omwangangye gw'omu mpita.
Nk'omwangangye oku guba omu mahwa
Na nkunzi yangye nikwo aba omu baishiki.
Nikwo nkunzi yangye ari omu batsigazi.
Nkashutama ahansi y'ekicuucu kye n'okushemererwa kwingi,
Ebijuma bye byannurira;
Yantaasya omu nju y'obugyenyi,
Orurango rwe orwabaire ruri ahaiguru y'omutwe gwangye kukaba kuri okukunda.
Mpimbuuza otuzaabibu, onduhuuze otucungwa;
Ahabw'okuba rukundo n'ey'okuunyita.
N'ogwa buryo gunfumbata!
Nimbarahiza esirabo n'ebuguma y'empara,
Mutasisiimura nkunzi yangye, n'obu kwakuba okumwimutsya
Atakeeyendeire.
Hurira! eiraka rya nkunzi yangye!
Ngugwo yaija aha nshozi naaguruka,
Naagurukagurukira omu bibungo.
Nkunzi yangye ni nk'esirabo, nari eshonga y'empara;
Reeba, ayemereire enyima y'orugo rwaitu,
Naaringuririrza omu madirisa,
Naayeyoreka nitumureebera omu mbazi zaago.
Nkunzi yangye yaagamba nangira ati:
Imuka, nkunzi yangye, murungi wangye, tugyendane;
Ahakuba reeba, katumba ehweire,
Obunaku bw'enjura buhingwire;
Obunaku bw'okweshongora bwahika,
N'eiraka ry'enkombe nirihurirwa omu nsi yaitu.
N'emizaabibu neerabya, neetaamirana emigaju,
Imuka, nkunzi yangye, tugyendane.
N'omu nyanga z'amabaare,
Ka nkureebe ahamaisho, mpurire eiraka ryawe;
Ahabw'okuba eiraka ryawe nirishemeza,
N'aha maisho gaawe ni harungi.
Mutukwatire zaamuha,
Bwamuha obuto oburikushiisha emizaabibu,
Ahabw'okuba emizaabibu neerabya.
Ariisiza obusyo bwe omu myangangye.
Nkunzi yangye, kubuuka, obe nk'esirabo
Nari eshonga y'empara aha nshozi za Beteeri.
Naasherura ou omutima gwangye gukunda;
Naamusherura, kwonka tinaamureeba;
Nikwo kugira nti: Ka nyimukye, ngyendagyende omu rurembo,
Omu nguuto n'omu nteeraniro z'emihanda,
Nsherure ou omutima gwangye gukunda.
Naamusherura, kwonka tinaamureeba.
Naababuuza nti: Mwareeba ou omutima gwangye gukunda?
Naareeba ogwo ou omutima gwangye gukunda,
Naamukwata, naayanga kumurekura,
Okuhitsya obu naamuhikize omu nju ya maawe,
Omu kishengye ky'owanzaire.
Nimbarahiza esirabo n'ebuguma y'empara,
Mutasiisimura nkunzi yangye, n'obu kwakuba okumwimutsya,
Atakeeyendeire.
Orikushusha enyomyo y'omwika,
Oyoteire sumuruna n'obubaane n'emigaju yoona ey'abashuubuzi?
Reeba, n'engozi ya Sulemaani
Eyeehinguririziibwe abashaija b'amaani makumi mukaaga
Ab'omu mamanzi ga Israeli;
Boona bahagatiire zaarurara, n'amahano omu kurwana;
Buri muntu aine rurara aha kibero kye
Ahabw'okutiina akabi nyekiro.
Omugabe Sulemaani akeekorera engozi y'ekitiinisa
Omu miti ya Lebanooni;
Yaakora enyomyo zaayo omu feeza,
Eky'okwegamira kyayo kyaba eky'ezaabu,
Aharikushutamwa yaahakoresa omwenda gwa bujwa,
N'omunda yaayo haakorwa abaishiki ba Yerusaalemu na rukundo.
Mureebe omugabe Sulemaani,
Aine ekirunga eki yaajwekirwe nyina
Aha izooba eri yaashwereireho,
Niryo izooba eri omutima gwe gwananukiireho.
Buzimazima ori murungi!
amaisho gaawe ni nk'ag'enkombe omu kyetwekyerero kyawe;
Eishokye ryawe ni nk'obusyo bw'embuzi
Ezibyami omu rukiizi rw'orushozi Gileadi;
Ezirikuruga kwogibwa;
Zoona zigira babiri, tihaine n'emwe efiisa.
Eminwa yaawe ni nka karari,
N'akanwa kaawe ni karungi,
Enshaya zaawe ni nk'embari y'eikomamahanga
omu kyetwekyerero kyawe;
Ogwayombekyeirwe okubiikamu eby'okurwanisa,
Oguhanikirwemu engabo rukumi,
Engabo zoona ez'amamanzi ge;
Abarikuriira omu myangangye.
Niinyija kwegiira aha rushozi rwa sumuruna
N'aha kibungo ky'obubaane.
Toine kamogo.
Turugye hamwe Lebanooni;
Naga amaisho nooyema aha mutwe gwa Amano,
Aha mutwe gwa Seniiri na Herumooni,
Ori omu nyanga z'entare, n'omu bibungo by'engwe.
Ku ondeebeise oti eriisho, wantwara omutima
N'orukwanzi rw'omu maraka gaawe.
Okukunda kwawe ka nikunkirira viinyo!
Kandi okutaamirana kw'amajuta gaawe nikunkirira emigaju y'emiringo yoona.
Obwoki n'amate biri ahansi y'orurimi rwawe,
Okutaamirana kw'ebijwaro byawe ni nk'okwa Lebanooni.
N'enshuro eigaire, n'eiziba eryatairweho akamanyiso;
Ebibyairwe byawe n'omusiri gw'amakomamahanga
Ogweramu ebijuma birungi by'emiringo yoona,
Koferi n'otuti twa narada,
Narada na karakoomu, kalamo na kinamoono,
N'ebiti byona eby'obubaane,
Surumuna na
Ori eiziba ery'amaizi g'amagara,
N'emigyera erikushuuma neeruga Lebanooni.
Naiwe ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, rugayo!
Huuha omusiri gwangye, omugaju gwagwo gutaamirane hoona.
Ka nkunzi yangye aije omu musiri gwe,
Arye aha bijuma bye ebirikukira oburungi.
Kushoroma sumuruna yangye n'emigaju yangye,
N'okurya engabo zangye n'obwoki bwamwo,
N'okunywa viinyo yangye n'amate gangye.
Imwe banywani bangye, nimurye, kandi munywe;
Buzimazima munywe munonga, nkunzi zangye!
Naahurira eiraka rya nkunzi yangye naakongoota, naagira ati:
Nyigurira, munyaanyazi, nkunzi yangye,
Nkombe yangye, owangye oshugaine;
Ahakuba omutwe gwangye gutonzirweho orume,
N'eishokye ryangye ririmu amatondo ga nyekiro.
Nimbaasa nta kukigarukamu?
Naanaabire ebigyere, ngarukye mbishiishe?
Nkunzi yangye yaayozya engaro ze omu kihengyere ky'orwigi,
Omutima gwangye gwaijura okushemererwa.
Naimuka kwigurira nkunzi yangye,
Engaro zangye nizitoonya sumuruna,
Sumuruna neeyagayaga aha nkumu zangye,
Yaatoonya aha byoma ebikinga orwigi.
Naashanga yaayegyendeire, atakiriho
Kwonka obu yaabaire naagamba, omutima gukampuruutuka-
Naamusherura, yaamburira;
Naamweta, tiyaanyetaba.
Bambugana, banteera, bamputaaza;
Abarinzi b'orugo rwarwo baanyaka omunagiro gwangye.
Ku muraareebe nkunzi yangye, mumugambire
Ku rukundo erikwenda kuunyita.
Beitu nkunzi yaawe naakiza ki abandi,
Iwe mukazi ohita abandi 'we?
Waaza kuturahiza otyo,
Nkunzi yaawe naakiza ki abandi?
Nkunzi yangye naayera, naamwamwatikana,
Tarikubura mu bantu kakumi.
Omutwe gwe ni nk'ezaabu nungi munonga,
Eishokye rye n'omushasha,
Niriiragura nk'omubiri gw'ekikoona,
Googiibwe amate, geemi gye;
Enshaya ze ni nk'akasiri k'emigaju erikutaamirana,
Eminwa ye ni nk'emyangangye erikutoonya sumuruna erikuyagayaga.
Engaro ze ni nk'empeta z'ezaabu ezirimu berulo;
Omubiri gwe ni nk'emiino y'enjojo ebaizirwe, ehunzirwe n'otubaare twa safiro;
Amaguru ge ni nk'enyomyo za marimaari,
Ezibyairwe omu biina by'ezaabu nungi;
Emishusire ye ni nka Lebanooni,
Ni mirungi nk'emyereezi.
Buzimazima ni murungi weena.
Imwe baishiki ba Yerusaalemu 'mwe,
Ogwo niwe nkunzi yangye, kandi niwe munywani wangye.
Nkunzi yaawe agiire hi?
Nkunzi yaawe yaagaruka hi,
Tukabona kumusherura naiwe?
Omu tusiri tw'emigaju,
Kuriisa obusyo bwe omu musiri,
N'okucwa emyangangye.
Ariisiza obusyo bwe omu myangangye.
Oshemeire nka Yerusaalemu,
Nootinisa nk'eihe eririkugyenda n'endango.
Eishokye ryawe ni nk'obusyo bw'embuzi
Ezibyami omu rukiizi rwa Gileadi;
Amaino gaawe ni nk'obusyo bw'entaama
Ezirikuruga kwogibwa,
Zoona zigira babiri, tihaine n'emwe efiisa;
Enshaya zaawe ni nk'embari z'eikomamahanga omu kyetwekyerero kyawe.
Hariho abaigarire makumi mukaaga n'ebinyanshunju makumi munaana,
N'abaishiki batarikubarwa.
Kwonka nkombe yangye, owangye oshugaine, n'omwe wenka,
N'omwana omwe nyamunegyere ahari nyina,
Orikukundwa owaamuzaire.
Abaishiki ku baamureebire, baamweta ohiiriirwe,
Nangwa n'abaigarire n'ebinyanshunju baamusingiza.
Ogu n'oha owaija orikushusha nk'omushekye ogurikujuguta,
Murungi nk'okwezi, orikumurinkana nk'eizooba,
Orikutiinisa nk'eihe eririkugyenda n'endango?
Kureeba ebimezire omu mpita,
Kureeba yaaba omuzaabibu gutookire,
Nari amakomamahanga garabize.
Ntakakimanyire, omutima gwangye gwanta omu kigaari
Aha rubaju rw'omunyiginya mukama wangye.
Garuka, garuka, iwe Mushulaami 'we,
Garuka, garuka, tukwetegyereze.
Ahabw'enki nimwenda kwetegyereza Omushulaami
Nk'ekizino kya Mahanaimu?
Ebigyere byawe ka nibishemera omu nkaito!
Enyugunyu zaawe ni nk'amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi,
Nomurimo gw'engaro z'omuhangu;
Ekishoroshoro kyawe ni nk'ekikopo
Ekitakooshaga viinyo ejwangize;
Enda yaawe ni nk'ekirundo ky'engano
Ekyehinguririziibwe emyangangye;
Abaazairwe empasha.
Ebitsya byawe ni nk'omunaara gw'emiino y'enjojo;
Amaisho gaawe ni nk'ebiyanja bya Heshibooni
Ebiri aha irembo rya Batirabiimu;
Enyindo yaawe ni nk'omunaara gwa Lebanooni
Ogurikureeba Damasiko;
Omutwe gwawe ni nka Karumeeli;
Eishokye ryawe ni nk'omwenda gwa bujwa,
Omugabe akwatwa obutsibo bwaryo nk'enkwatwa.
Iwe orikukundwa, omwishiki orikurigirwa,
Eshi ori murungi kandi nooshemeza!
Ekyemerero kyawe ni nk'omukindo,
Amabeere gaawe ni nk'omutsitsa gwagwo.
Ningira nti: Niinyija kutemba ogwo mukindo,
Nkwate amataagi gaagwo.
Nkaabaasibwa ki, amabeere gaawe gaba nk'ebijuma by'omuzaabibu,
n'okutaamirana kw'omwitsyo gwawe kuba nk'okw'emicungwa.
Akanwa kaawe kaba nka viinyo erikuhita ezindi,
Erikuraba omu kanwa n'omu maino,
Ekasheneneka gye aha mumiro.
Kandi rukundo ye niinye eriho.
Nkunzi yangye, ija tugyendane omu ishwa,
Tuze omu birorero, tucumbikyeyo;
Tureebe oku erikutooka,
Tureebe ku eraabe yaarabize,
N'amakomamahanga gaarabize.
Okwo niyo ndaakworekyere rukundo yangye.
Kandi aha muryango gwaitu hariho ebijuma binuzire
Eby'emiringo yoona, ebisya n'ebikuru,
Ebi naakubiikiire, iwe nkunzi yangye.
Nkaabaasibwa ki, oba nka munyaanyazi,
Owaayonkire aha mabeere ga maawe!
Ku nkukubugaine aheeru, nkaakunywegyeire,
Kandi tihaine owaakungayire.
Omu kishengye ky'ogwo owanzaire,
Nkunywaisa aha nturire ya viinyo
N'aha shande y'amakomamahanga gangye.
N'ogwa buryo gunfumbata!
Imwe baishiki ba Yerusaalemu 'mwe, nimbarahiza,
Mutasisiimura nkunzi yangye, n'obu kwakuba okumwimutsya,
Atakeeyendeire.
Oriya orikwinamuka naaruga omu ihamba,
Ayegamiire nkunzi ye, n'oha?
Nkusisiimwire ahansi y'omucungwa,
Ahu nyonko yaarumiirwe naayenda kukuzaara;
Eego owaakuzaire niho yaarumiirwe.
Kandi onte n'aha mukono gwawe;
Ahabw'okuba rukundo n'ey'amaani nka rufu,
Kandi okufuuha tikusaasira, ni nk'ekituuro;
Endimi zaakwo nizityankana nk'ez'omuriro,
Nk'ez'omuriro ogurikurya busha.
Amaizi maingi tigarikubaasa kuraaza rukundo,
N'emyegyemure tekaagimira;
Omuntu n'obu yaakuhayo ebi atungire omu ka ye byona,
Bikaagayirwa kimwe.
Twine murumuna waitu omuto,
Takashunire mabeere.
Mbwenu turyamugira tuta
Aha izooba eri arigambirwaho obugyenyi?
Ku ariba orugo rw'amabaare,
Turyamwombekaho omunaara gw'efeeza;
Kwonka ku ariba omuryango,
Turyamukingisa embaaho z'emyereezi.
Nyowe nkaba ndi orugo rw'amabaare;
N'amabeere gangye gari nk'eminaara
Okuruga obwo naagira obusingye omu maisho ge.
Yaarutamu abarinzi,
Buri muntu okuguma naaha ebicweka by'efeeza ahabw'ebijuma byamwo.
Omusiri gwangye gw'emizaabiru n'ogwangye ahabwangye.
Iwe Sulemaani, oryaheebwa rukumi rwawe,
N'abarinzi b'ebijuma baheebwe magana abiri.
Bagyenzi bangye nibenda kuhurira ebi orikugamba;
Naanye ka mbihurire.
Nari nk'eshonga y'empara
Aha nshozi z'eby'emigaju.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA agizire ati:
Nkontsya abaana, naaboorora,
Kwonka mbwenu bangomeire.
Ente emanya mukama waayo,
N'endogoya emanya eka ya mukama waayo,
Kwonka Israeli taine ki arikumanya,
Abantu bangye tibarikwetegyereza.
Abantu abaijwire okutahikiirira,
Oruzaaro rw'enkozi z'ebibi,
Abaana abarikukora ebitahikire!
Baimwire MUKAMA,
Baagaya Orikwera wa Israeli,
Baahinduka, baagaruka enyima.
Nimuturwa okugumizamu nimugoma?
Omutwe gwona gurwaire,
Omutima gugwereire kimwe enshazi;
Okuruga aha mara g'ekigyere okuhika aha mutwe
Tihaine hahuriire,
Kureka ebihuta, n'ebihonoka,
N'ebironda ebirikunuuka;
Tibikamigwaga, tibikashembwaga,
Nobu kwakuba okubobeezibwa n'amajuta.
Endembo zaanyu zookiibwe n'omuriro;
Ensi yaanyu abanyamahanga nibagibariira omumaisho,
Ebaire amatongo, emazirweho abanyamahanga.
Nk'akaju k'omu musiri gw'emizaabibu,
Nk'eirindiro ry'omu musiri gw'emyongo,
Nk'orurembo rugotsirwe.
Tukaabaire nka Sodoma, tuba nka Gomora.
Imwe bategyeki ba Sodoma 'mwe,
Muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA!
Naimwe abantu ba Gomora, mutegye okutu,
Muhurire ebiragiro bya Ruhanga waitu!
Ebitambo byanyu ebirengyesereize nibingasira ki?
Ntamirwe ebitambo byanyu ebyokize eby'empaya z'entaama,
N'ebishaju by'amatungo agagomokire;
Kandi tindikushemerererwa shagama y'enimi,
Nari ey'abaana b'entaama, nari ey'empaya z'embuzi.
Ku muba mwizire omu maisho gangye,
N'oha owaabaragiire kuguma nimundibatiiririra ekibuga?
Obubaane n'ekirikunugwa ahariinye;
Okuboneka kw'ameezi, na zaasabato, n'okutaho enteerane
Tindikubaasa kugumisiririza kutahikiirira hamwe n'okuteerana okurikwera.
Amagyenyi gaanyu ag'okuboneka kw'okwezi, n'agandi agaatairweho,
omutima gwangye nigugangira kimwe;
Gankabize; okugagumisiririza kunduhize.
Nangwa n'obu muriguma nimushaba hakye-hakye, tindibahurira;
Ahabw'okuba engaro zaanyu ziijwire eshagama.
Mwiheho obubi bw'emicwe yaanyu omu maisho gangye;
Murekye kukora kubi,
Mwegye okukora gye,
Musherure eby'oburyo,
Muhane abarikuhata abandi;
Murwanirire efuuzi, mutonganire abafaakazi.
Ebibi byanyu n'obu biraabe nibitukura nka karari,
Biryayera nk'orubaare;
N'obu biraabe nibitukura tuku-tuku,
Biryaba nk'ebyoya by'entaama ebirikwera.
Ku muraikirize, mwayoroba,
Muryarya ebirungi by'ensi;
Muryariibwa rurara;
Ahabw'okuba akanwa ka MUKAMA niko kaakigamba.
Ka ruhindukire maraaya!
Omu eby'oburyo byabaire biri, n'eby'okuhikiirira,
Mbwenu hati abaitsi nibo barimu.
Efeeza yaawe ehindukire enkamba,
Viinyo yaawe efungwire;
Buri muntu naayenda enguzi n'okutoijerwa,
Tibarikurwanirira fuuzi,
Kandi emanja z'abafaakazi tizaakihika mu maramuriro gaabo.
Ow'obushoboorozi owa Israeli arikugirira ati:
Iwe, ndyayemarira ekiniga aha bazigu bangye,
N'ababisha bangye mbahoore enzigu.
Nyihiremu kimwe enkamba zaawe,
Nkumaremu ebyoma by'amabaati.
N'abahi b'obwengye baawe nk'omu kutandika.
Bwanyima oryayetwa orurembo rw'okuhikiirira,
Kandi orw'okwesigwa.
Saayuuni eryacungurwa okukora eby'oburyo,
N'abaamwo abarikweteisa bacungurwe okuhikiirira;
Kwonka abagomi n'abasiisi baryacwekyerezibwa kumwe,
N'abarikwimuura MUKAMA bamarweho.
Kandi n'ahabw'emisiri ei mwayetooraniire;
N'omusiri ogutaine maizi.
Ow'amaani aryaba nk'eshisha,
N'omurimo gwe guryaba nk'esiriira;
Byombi biryahiira hamwe,
Habure ow'okubiraaza.
Eki Isaaya mwene Amozi yaareebire ahari Yuda na Yerusaalemu-
Orushozi rw'enju ya MUKAMA ruhamibwe aha mitwe y'enshozi,
Rutunguukye, rukire ebibungo byona,
N'amahanga goona gahimintikireyo.
Mwije twinamukye aha rushozi rwa MUKAMA
Omu nju ya Ruhanga wa Yakobo,
Atwegyese emitwarize ye,
Naitwe tubone kugigyenderamu;
Ahabw'okuba ebiragiro biryaruga Saayuuni,
N'ekigambo kya MUKAMA kirugye Yerusaalemu.
Aramure enganda nyingi;
Obwo zaarurara zaabo baryaziheeshamu amafuka,
N'amacumu gaabo bagaheeshemu empabyo;
Eihanga tiriribangira rindi rurara,
Kandi tibarigaruka kwega by'engamba.
Imwe nju ya Yakobo 'mwe,
Nimwije tugyendere omu mushana gwa MUKAMA.
Noobatura okugira abafumu baingi b'oburugwa-izooba
N'abaraguzi nk'Abafilistia,
Kandi n'okukora endagaano n'abanyamahanga.
Ensi yaabo eijwire efeeza n'ezaabu,
Obutungi bwabo tibwine bugarukiro;
Ensi yaabo eijwire embaraasi,
N'ebigaari byabo tibiine bugarukiro.
Nibaramya emirimo y'emikono yaabo,
Ebi engaro zaabo ahabwabo zikozire.
Abantu b'obutoosha nibacureezibwa,
N'abakuru nibagarurwa ahansi.
N'ahabw'ekyo otabasaasira.
Oyesherekye omu mucuucu okutiinisa kwa MUKAMA
N'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwe.
Emyekuniko y'omuntu eryagarurwa ahansi,
N'amaryo g'abantu garibatiirirwe,
Eryo izooba MUKAMA wenka niwe arihimbisibwa.
Eki arirwanisizaho eby'amaryo n'ebirikwekuza byona
N'ekintu kyona ekirikwetunguura;
Kandi byona biryagarurwa ahansi;
Emiraigwa kandi erikwetunguura,
N'emyela ya Bashani yoona,
N'enshozi zoona endaingwa,
N'ebibungo byona ebiraingwa,
N'omunaara gwona omuraingwa,
N'orugo rwona orw'amabaare orugumire,
N'ebishushani byona ebirikushemeza.
Kandi emyekuniko y'omuntu eryacureezibwa,
N'amaryo g'abantu garyagarurwa ahansi;
Eryo izooba MUKAMA wenka niwe arihimbisibwa.
Ebishushani byona ebirikuramibwa biryahweraho kimwe.
N'omu biina by'eitaka
Nibahunga okutiinisa kwa MUKAMA
N'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwe,
Ku ariimuka kutetemya ensi munonga.
Eby'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu,
Ebi baayekoreire kuramya,
Babinagire efukuzi n'obuhundu,
Beesherekye omu nyanga n'omu biharamanga by'amabaare agaatikire,
Nibahunga okutiinisa kwa MUKAMA
N'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwe,
Ku ariimuka kutetemya ensi munonga.
Mbwenu bo nibo baahi?
Naija kwiha ahari Yerusaalemu na Yuda
Ekibaire kibatungire, n'eki babaire beegamiire,
Eby'okurya byona n'amaizi goona ebibaire bibatungire
Ow'amaani weena, omurwani,
Omuramuzi, nabi, omufumu, omukuru,
Omukuru w'engabo makumi ataano, ow'ekitiinisa,
Omuhi w'obwengye, omunyamwoga w'obwengye,
N'omuhaki w'engisha.
N'abeereere babategyekye.
Omuntu weena aite kubi mugyenzi we,
Na buri muntu mutaahi we,
Abato bagaye abakuru,
N'abataine kitiinisa bagaye abakiine.
Obwo omuntu aryakwata mwene ishe,
Ow'omu ka ya ishe, amugire ati:
Iwe, nk'oku oine eky'okujwara,
Obe niiwe waaba omutegyeki waitu;
N'eri itongo, obe niiwe waaritegyeka;
Eryo izooba aryahakana, agambe munonga ati:
Tindikwikiriza kuba ow'okubatambira,
Ahabw'okuba omu ka yangye tiharimu by'okurya, nari ebijwaro;
Timurikwija kungira mutegyeki w'abantu;
Na Yuda egwire,
Kandi nibarwanisa MUKAMA omu bigambo byabo n'omu bi barikukora,
Bagwisa kubi amaisho ge ag'ekitiinisa.
Emireebekyere yaabo neehamya ku orubanja rubasingire,
Nibakora ekibi butunu nk'aba Sodoma.
Tibarikukishereka. Baryareeba enaku,
Ahabw'okuba beereeteire akabi!
Ahabw'okuba baryarya ebi emikono yaabo ekozire.
Ahabw'okuba ebi emikono ye yaakozire nibyo arizimuurirwa.
Abantu bangye nibaitwa kubi abaana,
Kandi nibategyekwa abakazi.
Ai bambe bantu bangye! abeebembezi baanyu nibabahabya,
Batsibyatsibya emihanda ei murikurabamu.
Ayemereire kubacwera orubanja.
Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe naagira ati:
Niimwe mwariire omusiri gw'emizaabibu, mukagumaraho,
N'ebi mwanyagire abooro biri omu maka gaanyu.
N'okucwa abooro obusaasingo.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati:
Abaishiki ba Saayuuni baine emyekuniko,
Nibagyenda nibanaga ebitsya,
Nibareebana n'amaisho g'amakune,
Nibagyenda nibakimbagira, nibarangiza amajugo aha maguru;
Nikyo MUKAMA arirwariza aba baishiki ba Saayuuni
Ebiguuna omu mitwe,
Akajweka busha ebicweka byabo ebirikwitsa enshoni.
Eryo izooba Mukama aryacwa enyerere zaabo ezi babaire nibakunisa, amahunde n'ebirezi,
ebitaako, endaaba, ebitambaara,
ebikwemba, engoro, emyeko, otushanduukye tw'emigaju, engisha,
empeta z'omu nkumu n'ez'omu nyindo,
ebijwaro by'amagyenyi, emyenda, eminagiro, enshaho z'omu ngaro,
emyenda y'obutimba n'eya kitaani, ebikwemba n'eby'okwetwekyerera ahamaisho.
Omu mwanya gw'omweko habemu omugoye,
Omu mwanya gw'eishokye ry'omushasha habemu oruhara,
Omu mwanya gw'okwokwezirika emitanda, beezirikye ebiguniya,
N'ahaabaire hari harungi hagire enkojo.
Abashaija baawe baryaitwe rurara,
N'amamanzi gaawe gagwe aha rugamba;
Bashutame ahansi beeshobeire.
Bwanyima omuntu weena oriba atsigaireho omuri Saayuuni na Yerusaalemu, akahandiikwa omu bahuriire baamwo, aryayetwa orikwera,
Mukama ku ariba yaaherize kwozya oburofa bw'abaishiki ba Saayuuni, n'okumaraho amabara g'eshagama omuri Yerusaalemu, naabiihisaho omwoyo gw'emanja z'oburyo n'ogurikwotsya.

Bwanyima MUKAMA aryata aha rushozi rwona orwa Saayuuni n'aha bantu abariba bateeraniireyo ekicu n'omwika nyomushana, n'okuhweza kw'omuriro ogurikwaka nyekiro; ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kyaho kyona haryagira eky'okukisangira kandi n'eihema;
kibe eky'okukisangira omushana nyomushana, kandi obuhungiro n'obwegamo bw'eihunga n'enjura.
Nkunzi yangye akaba aine omusiri gw'emizaabibu
Aha kibungo kirikweza munonga.
Yaagubyaramu omuzaabibu ogurikuhita endiijo yoona,
Yaagwombekamu omunaara gw'abarinzi,
Yaagutamu einyuukiro,
Yaagira ngu nigwija kwana emizaabibu,
Kwonka gwayana ey'omu kishaka.
Mbwenu imwe batuuzi ba Yerusaalemu 'mwe,
N'abashaija ba Yuda,
Nimbeeshengyereza mutushoboorore
Nyowe n'omusiri gwangye gw'emizaabibu.
Eki ntaragukoreire?
Nkaba nyine amatsiko ngu guryayera emizaabibu;
Mbwenu ahabw'enki gwanire ey'omu kishaka?
Niinyija kwihaho orugo rwagwo,
Haza gwonerwe kimwe;
Nsheenye orugo rwagwo rw'amabaare, guribatiirirwe;
Kureka gumerwemu emikwatangwe n'amahwa;
Kandi ndyaragiira ebicu birekye kugugwisiza enjura.
Ahabw'okuba omusiri gw'emizaabibu ogwa MUKAMA ow'amahe n'enju ya Israeli,
N'abashija ba Yuda nikyo kibyairwekye ekirikushemeza;
Akaba abaineho amatsiko g'okukora eby'oburyo,
Kwonka yaabashangamu okusheesha eshagama,
N'amatsiko g'okuhikiirira,
Kwonka yaabashangamu okurira!
Bakeekubiraho ebibanja,
Okuhitsya obu baraabimareho, hatagire ahaatsigara,
Naimwe mukatsigara omu nsi mwenka.
Mpuriire MUKAMA ow'amahe naarahira ati:
Buzimazima amaka maingi, amahango kandi amarungi, garyaba emishaka;
Na homero emwe y'embibo erugwemu eefa emwe.
Kuza kusherura ebirikusinza,
Abatarama bakarenzya, okuhitsya obu amaarwa gabasinza!
Ebitaasa n'esheegu na viinyo;
Kwonka tibeeta ha mirimo ya MUKAMA,
N'obu kwakuba okuteekateeka aha bi arikukora.
Abashaija baabo b'ekitiinisa bakaitwa enjara,
N'abandi boona bakaitwa omwoma.
N'ahabw'ekyo Okuzimu eruruuhire,
Yaarangaaza munonga akanwa kaayo,
Abakungu ba Yerusaalemu n'abantu baamwo nibashuumayo
Hamwe n'orikugyehimbisizamu.
N'amaisho g'abarikwekunika gacureeziibwe;
Kwonka MUKAMA ow'amahe ahimbisiibwe ahabw'okukora eby'oburyo,
Ruhanga orikwera naayeyoreka ku ari orikwera omu kuhikiirira.
Omu biro ebyo abaana b'entaama baryarya nk'oku bariira omu mariisizo gaabo,
Enyana ezigomokire n'abaana b'embuzi biriire omu matongo.
Baryareeba enaku abakurura okutahikiirira n'emirunga y'ebishuba,
Abakurura ekibi nk'oku bakurura ekigaari n'emirunga,
Naarahutsye emirimo ye, tugireebe!
Enaama z'Orikwera wa Israeli zihikye haihi, ziije tuzimanye!
Baryareeba enaku abeeta ekibi ekirungi,
N'ekirungi bakakyeta ekibi,
Abata omwirima omu mwanya gw'omushana,
N'omushana omu mwanya gw'omwirima,
Abata ebirikushaarira omu mwanya gw'ekirikunuuriirira!
Bakeeteekateekaho ku bari enkyengi.
N'amamanzi omu kuturira ebirikusinza,
N'otaine rubanja bakamwima ebimushemereire!
Kandi nk'oku ebinyaatsi byomire bihwererera omu muriro ogurikwaka,
Nikwo emizi yaabo eriba obujunde,
N'ebirabyo byabo bikooma, bikatuumuuka nk'omucuucu;
Ahabw'okuba bakanga Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Baagaya ekigambo ky'Orikwera wa Israeli.
Akabanga omukono kubarwanisa, akabateera,
Enshozi zikatetema,
Emitumbi yaabo ekaba nk'esingo omu mihanda.
Hoona nabwo ekiniga kye tikikabarugireho.
Kureka omukono gwe gukibangire.
Ageetese ekicurizo, garugye aha muheru gw'ensi;
Nago gaija juba nigeehuuta.
Omurigo tiharigira owaaruha, akateera entsibo,
Tihaine n'omwe orihungira nari origwejegyera,
Enkoba ezi beezirikiise tiziriyuga,
N'enkaito zaabo tiziricweka;
Emyambi yaabo eryaba eine obwogi,
amata gaabo gareegire,
Ebyara by'embaraasi zaabo biryaba nibishusha nk'amabaare g'enkangabuye,
Na nyamuziga zaabo niziiruka nk'akasoorora.
Okutsinda kwabo kuryaba nk'okw'entare,
Batsinde nk'emigunju y'entare,
Baryaruruma, bakwate eminyago,
Bagitwarire kimwe, habure ow'okujuna.
Omuntu weena ku ariza kugira ati,
Aryareeba ensi eijwire omwirima n'obusaasi
Kandi n'ebicu bizibiire omushana kwaka.
Baaserafi beemereire ahaiguru ye; buri omwe aine amapapa mukaaga, abiri ageekingiize ahamaisho, abiri agashwekire ebigyere, kandi abiri naagagurukisa.
Omwe yayeta mugyenzi we naagira ati: MUKAMA ow'amahe n'Orikwera, n'Orikwea, n'Orikwera; ensi yoona eijwire ekitiinisa kye.
Emisingi y'ebiti by'amarembo yaatengyetsibwa eiraka ry'ogwo owaagambire, enju yaijura omwika.

Bwanyima naagira nti: Ai bambe! Mbwenuho naahitsya, ahakuba ndi omuntu w'eminwa etashemeire, kandi ntuura omu bantu abaine eminwa etashemeire; ahabw'okuba amaisho gangye gaareeba Mukama, MUKAMA ow'amahe.
Ahonaaho omwe ahari baaseraafi yaaguruka, yaija ahi ndi aine eikara eririkwotsya omu ngaro, eri yaiha aha itambiro n'oruhana.
Yaarinta aha minwa, yaagira ati: Reeba, eri ryakukora aha minwa, okutahiirira kwawe kwakwihwaho, n'ekibi kyawe kyasaasirwa.
Bwanyima naahurira eiraka rya Mukama naagira ati: Ntume oha, kandi n'oha oraatugyendere? Ntyo naagarukamu nti: Ndi aha; ba niinye waatuma.
Yangira ati: Irooko ogambire abo bantu oti:
Okuhurira kwo muhurire, kwonka mutashoborokyerwa;
N'okureeba mureebe, kwonka muteetegyereza;
Oigare amatu gaabo,
Kandi ohumye amaisho gaabo,
Batakaareebesa amaisho gaabo,
N'okuhurira n'amatu gaabo,
N'okwetegyereza n'emitima yaabo,
N'okuhinduka ngu bakizibwe.
Okuhitsya obu endembo ziriba emishaka,
Hatakiine otwiremu,
N'amaju hatakiine ogarimu,
N'ensi ekabeera kimwe amatongo,
MUKAMA akaihayo abantu, akabatwara hare,
Omu nsi yoona hakabamu emyanya mingi y'ebifurukwa.
Nakyo kiryamarwaho, nk'ekiti ky'omwela,
Nari omunyinya, ekyatemirwe kikatsigara kiri ekitsintsi.
Nikwo n'oruzaaro orurikwera ruriba ekitsintsi kyabo.
Ab'enju ya Daudi ku baagambiirwe ngu Abasiria bakwataniise na Abaefuraimu, omutima gwa Ahazi n'emitima y'abantu be yaatetema nk'emiti y'omu kibira erikutengyetsibwa omuyaga.
MUKAMA yaagira Isaaya ati: Shohora hati, ogyende na mutabani waawe Sheari-yashubu, obugane Ahazi aha muheru gw'omukura gw'ekiyanja kya ruguru, ekiri aha muhanda ogurikuza aha musiri gw'omwozi;
haza omugire oti: Oyerinde, ohitsye omutima omunda, orekye kutiina, kandi otahahaazibwa ekiniga kingi kya Rezini n'Abasiria, n'ekya mwene Remailia; bari nk'ebicumurwa bibiri by'enkanza zirikucumba.
Noomanya ku Abaisria n'Abaefuraimu na mwene Remalia bakugiriire enaama mbi nibagira bati:
Mwije twinamukye tuteere Yuda, tubatiinise, tubeekubuurire, twemekye mwene Tabeeli, abe omugabe waayo.
Kwonka Mukama RUHANGA agizire ati: Enaama yaabo terikwija kuhama, kandi terihikiirira;
Ahabw'okuba omutwe gwa Siria ni Damasiko, n'omutwe gwa Damasiko ni Rezini; kandi emyaka makumi mukaaga n'etaano etakahweireho, Abaefuraimu baryacuubwamu ebicweka, babe batakiba ihanga.
Omutwe gwa Efuraimu ni Samaria, n'omutwe gwa Samaria ni mwene Remalia. Ku muraayangye kwikiriza, buzimazima timurihama.
MUKAMA yaagaruka yaagira Ahazi ati:
Shaba MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akamanyiso, oshabe akarikuhika Okuzimu owa Nyamuteza, nari akarikuhika ahaiguru owa Herebe.
Kwonka Ahazi yaagira ati: Tindikwija kushaba, kandi tindikwija kugyeza MUKAMA.
Isaaya yaagira ati: Imwe nju ya Daudi 'mwe, nimuhurire! Nimugira ngu n'ekintu kikye okurusya abantu, mukataho n'okurusya Ruhanga wangye?
Nikyo Mukama wenka aribaheera akamanyiso. Reeba, omwishiki oshugaine aryagira enda, azaare omwana w'omwojo, amwete Emanueli.
Ogwo mwana, ku arimanya kwanga ekibi n'okwihamu ekirungi, aryatungwa amate g'amakamo n'obwoki.
Ahabw'okuba omwana ogwo ku ariba atakagizire bwengye bw'okwanga ekibi n'okwihamu ekirungi, ensi z'abo bagabe bombi, abu orikutiina, ziryaba ebifurukwa.
Iwe n'abantu baawe n'enju ya sho, MUKAMA aryabareetaho ebiro ebitakabahoga okwiha obu Abaefuraimu baataana n'Abayuda, nikwo kuteerwa omugabe wa Asiria.
Omu bunaku obwo MUKAMA aryayetesa ekicurizo eshohera eziri omu bicweka by'obukomooko bw'emigyera ya Misri, n'enjoki z'omu nsi ya Asiria,
byona biije bijanjaare omu mpanga ezitatuurwamu n'omu nyanga z'amabaare n'omu bishaka by'amahwa byona n'omu mariisizo goona.
Omu bunaku obwo Mukama aryamwa eishokye aha mutwe n'obwoya aha bigyere, abimwaise orumweiso rw'entiizano oruriruga seeri y'omugyera Furaati, niwe mugabe wa Asiria; kandi rumareho n'obureju.
Omuri obwo bunaku omuntu aryariisa ente nto y'ejigija, n'entaama ibiri;
kandi ahabw'amate agu zirikukamwa kuba maingi, aryatungwa amate g'amakamo; kandi n'abaritsigara omu nsi boona baryatungwa amate g'amakamo n'obwoki.
Kandi omu bunaku obwo omwanya gwona ogwabaire gubamu emizaabibu rukumi, erikugura shekeli rukumi, guryamerwamu emikwatangwe n'amahwa.
Oine obuta n'emyambi niwe arihikayo, ahabw'okuba ensi yoona eryaba emezibwamu emikwatangwe n'amahwa.
Kandi n'ebibungo byona ebyabaire bihingisibwa efuka, oryatiina kubihikamu ahabw'egyo mikwatangwe n'amahwa, kureka biryaba eby'okunaguramu ente n'entaama.
Bwanyima naatunga baakareebi abarikwesigwa kubihamya, Uriya omunyamurwa na Zekaria mwene Yeberekia.
Ntyo naaza owa nabikazi, yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo. Bwanyima MUKAMA yangira ati: Mwete eiziina Mahari-shalali-hashibaazi;
ahabw'okuba ogwo mwana ku ariba atakamanyire kugamba taata nari maama, obutungi bwa Damasiko n'eminyago ya Samaria biryatwarwa omugabe wa Asiria, agyende abyebembeize.
MUKAMA yaagaruka yangira ati:
Aba bantu obu baayanga amaizi ga Shiloa agarikugyenda mpora, bakatiina Rezini na mwene Ramalia,

Mukama naija kubarwanisa n'amaizi maingi g'amaani ag'omugyera Furaati, niwe mugabe wa Asiria n'ekitiinisa kye kyona; amaizi ago garyaijura, gashwekye emikura yoona, garengyere n'aha nkungu zaagwo zoona;
kandi garyahimintika, gahikye Yuda, gashandaare, gaijure, gahikye omu bitsya, kandi n'amapapa gaago agashashaanwire garyabuga ensi yaawe yoona, Emanueli.
Imwe mahanga 'mwe, mweteerane, kwonka muryahendagurika;
Kandi naimwe ab'omu nsi za hare, mutegye amatu mwena;
Mwezirikye, kwonka muryahendagurika;
Mutyo mwezirikye, kwona muryahendagurika.
Muhanuure hamwe, kwonka enaama zaanyu ziryafa busha,
Mugambe ekigambo, kwonka tikirihama,
Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga ari hamwe naitwe.
MUKAMA antaireho omukono gwe gw'amaani, yanteisa okutagyendera omu mitwarize y'eihanga eri nangira ati:
Eki ab'eihanga eri barikweta obugomi, murekye kukyeta obugomi, kandi mutaritiina eki barikutiina, n'obu kwakuba okwitwa obwoba;
kureka MUKAMA ow'amahe mube niwe mwaha ekitiinisa ahabw'okwera kwe, mube niwe mwatiina, akabaitsa obwoba.
Kandi niwe aribabeera Omwanya ogurikwera; kwonka aryabeera amaju ga Israeli gombi eibaare eririkuteeza entsibo n'orukiri orurikugwisa, abeere abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu obusya n'omutego.
Baingi baryamuteeraho entsibo, bagwe, bahendekye, bakwatwe omutego, batwarwe.
MUKAMA orikwima enju ya Yakobo amaisho ndyamutegyereza, mmwineho amatsiko.
Reeba, nyowe n'abaana abu MUKAMA ampaire turi akamanyiso n'eky'okutangaarira ahari Israeli, ebirikuruga ahari MUKAMA ow'amahe, otuura aha rushozi Saayuuni.

Kandi ku baraabagire ngu muraguze aha barikugambisa emizimu n'aha bafumu abarikuviigiira, n'abarikuhuhuma, timurikumanya ngu abantu bashemereire kwehanuuza ahari Ruhanga waabo? Nimugira ngu eby'abahuriire bishemereire kwehanuuzibwa aha baafiire?
Ebiragiro n'ebirikuhamya mube nibyo mwayehanuuzaho! Ku baraabe batarikugamba nk'oku ekigambo eki kiri, buzimazima omushekye tiguribajugutira.
Kureka baryaraba omu nsi baine obusaasi bwingi n'enjara; kandi ku barigira enjara, baryagira ekiniga kingi, bakyeene omugabe waabo na Ruhanga waabo, baimutsye amaisho, bagahangye eiguru,
kandi bagahangye ensi, babure eki baareeba, kureka obusaasi n'omwirima n'enaku eziri nk'obwire; bwanyima banagwe omu mwirima ndindindi.
Bareebire omushana mwingi,
N'abaabaire batwire omu nsi y'ekibunda kya rufu
Omushana gubajwereire.
Waayongyera aha kushemererwa kwabo;
Nibashemererwa omu maisho gaawe,
Nk'oku abashaija bashemererwa nibabagana eminyago.
N'enkoni eyaabaire ebatuura aha mabega,
N'ekihuuzo ky'orikubahata,
Obihenzire nk'aha izooba rya Midiani;
Ahakuba eby'okurwanisa byona ebihagatirwa abarwani aha rugamba,
N'ebijwaro ebikuringirwe omu shagama,
Biryaba eby'okwokibwa nk'enku omu muriro;
Omwana w'omwojo atuhairwe,
Obutegyeki buryaba aha mabega ge,
N'eiziina rye aryayetwa
Omuhanuuzi orikutangaaza,
Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi,
Tataitwe otahwaho, Mukama w'obusingye.
Tibirigira bugarukiro
Aha kitebe kya Daudi n'aha bukama bwe,
Okubutaho n'okubuhigikiza eby'oburyo n'okuhikiirira,
Okwiha hati n'okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Obweziriki bwa MUKAMA ow'amahe nibwo burihikiiriza ekyo.
Mukama atumire ekigambo kuhana Yakobo,
Nikiija kuhika n'ahari Israeli,
Kandi abantu boona baryakimanya.
Abaefuraimu n'abatwirewe omuri Samaria,
Abarikugambisa amaryo n'emyekuniko y'omu mutima, nibagira bati:
Amatafaari gagwire,
Kwonka nitwija kwombekyesa amabaare gabaizire;
Emisikamoori etemirwe,
Kwonka omu mwanya gwayo nitwija kutamu emyereezi.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikwija kwimukiza ababisha,
N'abazigu baabo kubarwanisa,
N'Abafilistia oburengyerwa-izooba,
Baarangaaza akanwa, baamira Abaisraeli.
Hoona nabwo ekiniga kya MUKAMA tikikabarugireho,
Omukono gwe gukibangire.
N'obu kwakuba okusherura MUKAMA ow'amahe.
akamaraho amataagi g'emikindo n'ekibingo aha izooba rimwe-
Omushaija mukuru ow'ekitiinisa, nigwo mutwe,
Kandi nabi orikwegyesa ebishuba, nigwo mukira;
Ahabw'okuba abarikwebembera aba bantu nibabahabisa,
Kandi abo abu beebembeire nibamarwaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo Mukama tarikwesiima habw'abatsigazi baabo,
Kandi tarigirira saasi fuuzi zaabo n'abafaakazi baabo,
Ahakuba buri muntu tarikweta hari Ruhanga, kandi n'enkozi y'ebibi,
Kandi omuntu weena naagamba eby'obushema.
Hoona nabwo ekiniga kya MUKAMA tikikabarugireho,
Omukono gwe gukibangire.
Manya, okutahikiirira nikwotsya nk'omuriro,
Kumaraho emikwatangwe n'amahwa,
kutweka ekishaka kikwataine eky'omu kibira,
Bituumuukira omu kiika kingi.
N'abantu baayo nibashusha nk'enku z'okuhembesa omuriro;
Tihariho n'omwe orikusaasira mwene ishe.
Ondiijo aryamirakwo eby'aha rubaju rwa bumosho, kwonka tarihaaga;
Buri muntu aryarya enyama y'omubiri gwa mutaahi we.
Kandi bombi bakwatanise bateere Yuda.
Hoona nabwo ekiniga kye tikikabarugireho.
Omukono gwe gukibangire.
N'abahandiiki abahandiika eby'okuhata,
Ngu babone kwitaita emanja z'abakyene,
N'okwaka abooro b'omu bantu bangye ebibashemereire,
N'okunyaga abafaakazi,
N'efuuzi okuzigira eminyago.
N'okuhwerekyerezibwa okuriruga hare?
Muryahungira ahari oha, ngu abahe emikono?
Kandi obutungi bwanyu muryabutsiga hi?
Kureka okweyinamirira omu mbohe,
Nari okugwa ahansi omu baitsirwe.
Hoona nabwo ekiniga kye tikikabarugireho,
Omukono gwe gukibangire.
Ekihuuzo ky'ekiniga kyangye,
Ndyamwohereza kurwanisa eihanga eriteeta hari Ruhanga,
Mmuragiire kuteera abantu abu nyiniire ekiniga,
Abanyagye, atware eminyago,
Abaribatiiririre ahansi nk'ebyondo by'omu muhanda.
N'omutima gwe tikwo gurikuteekateeka;
Kureka ekiri omu mutima gwe n'okucwekyereza
Kandi n'okumariraho kimwe amahanga gatari makye;
Ahabw'okuba naagira ati:
Abakuru b'engabo zangye boona t'abagabe?
Hamasi terikwingana na Arupaadi,
Nari shi Samaria na Damasiko?
Agaabaire garimu ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, ebibaizire,
Ebirikukira eby'omuri Yerusaalemu na Samaria,
Nk'oku naagizire Samaria n'ebyayo?
ahabw'okuba naagira ati:
Nkabikoresa amaani g'omukono gwangye,
N'obwengye bwangye, ahakuba nyine okwetegyereza;
Naihaho emyatano y'amahanga,
Naanyaga obutungi bwago,
Nk'emanzi naiha aha ngoma abaabaire bari aha bitebe by'obugabe.
Omukono gwangye gwagwa aha butungi bw'amahanga,
Nk'owaagwa aha kyashuri ky'enyonyi,
Kandi nk'oku omuntu ateeranira hamwe amahuri agu enyonyi etsigireho,
Nikwo naanye naateeraniire hamwe amahanga g'ensi yoona,
Hakabura owaimutsya eipapa.
Nari owaayashamya akanwa, n'obu kwakuba okuteeza.
Nimugira ngu empango neebaasa kwehimbisiza aha muntu orikugitemesa,
Nari omusimeeno ahari ogwo orikugusharisa?
Ni nk'oku enkoni yaakutengyetsa ogikwaitse,
Nari nk'oku ekihuuzo kyakwimutsya omuntu otari kiti!
Nikyo Mukama, MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Arirwariza engabo ze amamanzi omunywengyerero,
Kandi ahansi y'ekitiinisa kye haryaimukayo okwaka
Okurikushusha okwaka kw'omuriro.
N'Orikwera we abe ekirimi kyagwo;
Ogwo muriro guryayotsya amahwa ge
N'emikwatangwe ye, gubimareho eizooba rimwe.
Ahwerekyereze omutima n'omubiri gwe,
Abe nk'omuntu orwaire oku ahwa aha magufa.
Emiti eritsigara omu kibira kye ebe mikye,
Ei omwana arikubaasa kuhandiika.
Aba Yakobo abariba bahonokireho baryagarukira Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi.

Kwonka, n'obu abantu baawe Abaisraeli baraabe nibaingana nk'omusheenyi gw'aha nyanja, ekicweka kyabo kikye ekirihonokaho nikyo kirigaruka. Okucwekyerera kukaragiirwa, kushandaarira hamwe n'okuhikiirira,
ahabw'okuba Mukama, MUKAMA ow'amahe, aryabamaraho omu nsi yoona, nk'oku kyaragiirwe.
Nikyo Mukama, MUKAMA ow'amahe, arikugirira ati: Imwe bantu bangye 'mwe, abatwire Saayuuni, mutatiina Abaasiria ku baraabateeze enkoni, baababangira ebihuuzo, baabagira nk'oku Abanyamisri baabagizire,
ahabw'okuba hatsigaireho akaanya kakye, okuguubwa kubi kwangye kurugye ahariimwe; bwanyima ekiniga kyangye kiryabahindukana, mbacwekyereze.
MUKAMA ow'amahe arybaasha, nk'oku yaagizire Midiani aha rukiri rwa Orebu, kandi enkoni ye aryagiimutsya aha nyanja, agibangye, nk'oku yaagizire omuri Misri.
Eryo izooba omutwaro ogu yaakwekoreize guryakuruga aha ibega, kandi enkomo ye eryakwihwa omu bitsya.
Yainamuka naaruga Rimoni,
Yaahika Ayasi, yaaraba Migirooni,
Mikimaashi niyo abiikire ebintu bye,
Baarengyera omu kakiro, baaraara Geeba,
Aba Raama nibatetema,
Aba Gibeya eya Saulo baahunga.
Iwe Galimu, imutsya eiraka, otakye!
Naiwe Laisha, okihurire!
Iwe Anatoosi, mugarukyemu!
Aba Madimeena nibacwa,
N'abatuuzi ba Gebimu nibahunga kuronda obukiriro.
Eri izooba naija kuraara Noobu,
Atigitire orushozi Saayuuni entomi,
Nikyo kibungo kya Yerusaalemu.
Aryatema amataagi n'amaani garikutiinisa,
Abarikukira abandi aha mutwe baryatemwa,
N'abaraingwa baryagarurwa ahansi;
Kandi aryamaraho ebishaka by'omu kibira,
Lebanooni eryagwa n'emiti yaayo ey'ekitiinisa.
N'omu mizi ye haryarugamu eitaagi.
Agire omwoyo gw'obwengye n'okwetegyereza,
Omwoyo gw'okuhanuura n'obushoboorozi,
Omwoyo gw'okumanya n'okutiina MUKAMA.
Taricwa rubanja rw'amaisho,
N'obu rwakuba orw'okugambirwa,
N'abacureezi b'omu nsi aryabashoboorora omu bwinganisa;
Kandi ensi aryagiteeza enkoni y'akanwa ke,
N'ababi aryabaitsa omwitsyo gwe.
N'obwesigwa bube orukoba omu bwezirikiro bwe.
N'engwe eryabyama n'omwana gw'embuzi,
Enyana n'entare n'enimi y'ekimasha ekigomokire biryaguma hamwe,
Kandi omwana muto niwe aribifunya.
Abaana baazo baraare hamwe,
Kandi entare eryarya obunyaatsi nk'ente.
Omwana orikwonka aryazaanira aha mwina gw'encwera,
N'omwana w'encuukye aryata omukono gwe aha kiina ky'empiri.
Ebyo byona tibirikora kubi, n'obu kwakuba okwita
Aha rushozi rwangye rwona orurikwera;
Ahabw'okuba okumanya MUKAMA kuryabuga ensi yoona,
Nk'oku amaizi gabuga hoona omu nyanja.
Eryo izooba Mukama aryagorora omukono gwe obwa kabiri kugarura abantu be abaahonokireho, naabaiha Asiria, Misri, Patiroosi, Esiopia, Elamu, Shinaari, Hamasi, n'aha birwa by'omu nyanja.
Ateeranire hamwe Abaisraeli abaabingirwe
N'Abayuda abaataataine,
Naabaiha aha nshonda ina z'ensi.
Abarikuburabuza Yuda baryamarwaho;
Efuraimu tarigirira Yuda ihari,
Na Yuda tariburabuza Efuraimu.
Kandi baryakwatanisa, banyagye ab'oburugwa-izooba.
Baryabangira Edomu na Moabu emikono,
N'Abaamoni baryabakubuukira.
Aryareeta omuyaga gwe ogurikwomya
Naarabya omukono gwe aha mugyera Furaati,
Aguteere, agucwemu emigyera mushanju,
Abantu babone kugwambuka enkaito zitajubire.
Baryabona omuhanda rugyendwa gw'okubaiha Asiria,
Nk'ogu Abaisraeli baaboine
Nibaruga omu nsi ya Misri.
Eryo izooba muryagira muti:
MUKAMA, ninkusiima,
Ahabw'okuba, n'obu wangiriire ekiniga,
Kikatuuba; mbwenu ongarwire omutima omunda.
Ndyaguma nimmwesiga, tinditiina;
ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Yehoova niwe maani gangye n'ekyeshongoro kyangye,
Kandi ahindukire okujunwa kwangye.
kandi eryo izooba muryagira muti:
Musiime MUKAMA, mutakire eiziina rye,
Mubuzye omu mahanga ebi yaakozire,
Murangye eiziina rye kuririkuhimbisibwa.
Mweshongorere MUKAMA eby'okumuhimbisa,
Ahabw'okuba akozire eby'ekitiinisa.
Ebyo bibugye ensi yoona.
Oyeshongore ahabw'okushemererwa,
Ahabw'okuba Orikwera wa Israeli ori omuriiwe ni mukuru.
Eby'okuhanuura ebi Isaaya mwene Amozi yaareebire ahari Babulooni.
Mubarangire n'eiraka rihango,
Mubeetese omukono, bataahe
Omu marembo g'abakuru.
Nyowe ndagiire abu naashoroire,
Naayeta amamanzi gangye agarikugyenda nigeesiima
Kuhikiiriza eki ndikwenda ahabw'ekiniga kyangye.
Nimuhurire! Omu bibungo nihareetwamu orwari
Nk'orw'omutwe gw'abantu baingi munonga.
Muhurire oruyombo rw'amahanga agateeraniire hamwe!
MUKAMA ow'amahe naateerateerana amahe kuza aha rugamba.
Garugire omu nsi ya hare aha muheru gw'eiguru,
Gari hamwe na MUKAMA n'eby'okurwanisa by'ekiniga kye,
Naaza kucwekyereza ensi yoona.
Niriija nk'okucwekyereza okurikuruga aha W'obushoboorozi bwona!
Buri muntu omutima gumuhwe omunda, bahahaare,
Bagire obuhuruzi n'obusaasi,
Bashaashe nk'omukazi orikurumwa.
Baryareebana nibatangaara,
Amaisho gabatukure.
Reeba, eizooba rya MUKAMA niriija,
Ritarikusaasira, riine ekiniga kingi,
Okuhindura ensi amatongo
N'okucwekyereza abasiisi baayo n'okubamaramu.
Na zaakakaaga zaazo tiziryaka,
Eizooba riryairagura nirituruka,
N'okwezi tikuryaka.
Ndyafubira ensi yoona ningitura eby'okushiisha byayo,
N'ababi ahabw'okutahikiirira kwabo;
Ndyamaraho emyehimbiso y'abanyamaryo,
Ntuubye emyekuniko y'abataine saasi.
Abashaija baryaba ab'eicweka okukira ezaabu eshemeziibwe,
N'ekyetwa omuntu okukira ezaabu ya Ofiri.
N'ensi ekatengyeeta, ekaruga omu mwanya gwayo
ahabw'ekiniga kya MUKAMA ow'amahe
Aha izooba ry'ekishinjo kye ekingi.
Nk'entaama ezitaine kitanga,
Buri muntu aryagaruka omu ihanga rye,
N'omuntu weena ahungire omu nsi yaabo.
Orireebwa weena aryacumitwa, ryogyemu;
Kandi orikwatwa weena aryagwa na rurara.
Amaju gaabo garyanyagwa,
N'abakazi baabo bahambwe.
Abantu abateeta aha feeza
N'obu kwakuba okukunda ezaabu.
Amata gaabo garyaita abatsigazi,
tibarisaasira ruzaaro rw'enda zaabo,
Kandi amaisho gaabo tigarigirira baana saasi.
Oburungi n'okwehimbisa by'Abakaludaaya,
Eryaba nka Sodoma na Gomora
Obu Ruhanga yaazicwekyereza.
Nari okutuurwamu obusingye bwona;
Abaharabu tibariteerayo mahema gaabo,
Kandi n'abariisa tibarizaagizayo magana gaabo;
Kandi amaju gaayo garyaijura enyamaishwa ezirikuhuuma.
Okwo niyo maaya zirituura,
N'embuzi z'obwoshe niyo zirikinira.
Empitsi ziryahuumira omu minaara yaarwo,
Na zaamuha ziboigorere omu bikaari birungi byarwo;
Mbwenu obunaku bwarwo bwafunzire,
N'ebiro byarwo tibyakyongyerwaho.

Kandi abanyamahanga baryabatwara, babahitsye owaabo, ab'enju ya Israeli baryabahakira omu nsi ya MUKAMA, babagire abahuuku n'abazaana; baryatwara omu bukwatwa abo abaabaire babatwaire omu bukwatwa, kandi baryategyeka abaabaire babatwaza eikama.
MUKAMA ku ariheza kubahuumuza obusaasi n'enaku n'obuhuuku obu mwabaire mwitirwamu kubi nibabakoresa,
muryateerera omugabe wa Babulooni enaku nimugira muti:
Mamya omurahuzi takiriho,
N'ekiniga ky'omunyarubwa kihweireho!
Niyo nkoni y'abategyeki
Abaabaire bateera abantu n'ekiniga batarekire,
Bakategyekyesa amahanga ekiniga, bakagahiiga batarikusaasira.
Abantu nibateera akaari nibeeshongora.
N'emyereezi ya Lebanooni neegira eti:
Okwiha obu waagarurwa ahansi,
Tihariho mutemi oragarukire kututema.
Neimutsya emizimu y'abaabaire bari abategyeki b'ensi kukutangirira.
Boona abaabaire bari abagabe b'amahanga
Neebaiha aha bitebe byabo by'obugae.
Abo boona baryagamba nibakugira bati:
Naiwe ohindukire otaine maani nkaitwe,
Waaba nk'oku turi?
Ekitiinisa kyawe kishuumiibwe n'amaraka g'enanga zaawe,
Bishuumiibwe Okuzimu;
Waayeyarira enyogori, kandi waazeeshweka.
Iwe nyonyoozi y'omu buturuturu 'we, omwana w'omushekye,
K'orugire omu iguru okagwa!
Iwe owaabaire ocwa amahanga busha,
K'otemirwe, okaza aha itaka!
Ndyatemba omu iguru ahaiguru y'enyonyoozi za Ruhanga,
Ekitebe kyangye nkite ahaiguru.
Ndyashutama aha rushozi rw'eiteeraniro okwo hare
Aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Nyehindure, mbe nk'Orikukira byona.
Okahika owa Nyamuteza!
Abaraakureebe nibaija kukushamaarira,
Bakwetegyereze, nibagira bati:
Ogu niwe mushaija owaabaire atengyetsa ensi,
Akatetemya amahanga g'abagabe,
Akasheenya endembo zaamwo,
Akanga kureka enkwatwa ze kugaruka owaabo?
Abagabe b'amahanga boona bagwejegyereire omu kitiinisa,
Buri muntu omu kituuro kye;
Kwonka iwe onagirwe aheeru hare n'ekituuro kyawe
nk'eitaagi eryangiirwe kimwe;
Oshwekirwe emitumbi eitsirwe rurara,
Ekashuuma omu mabaare g'Okuzimu,
Nk'omutumbi oguribatiiriirwe n'ebigyere.
Ahabw'okuba okacwekyereza ensi yaawe,
Waita abantu baawe.
Oruzaaro rw'enkozi z'ebibi tirurigambwaho ebiro byona!
Nibaturwa okutahikiirira kw'ishebo,
Bataimuka bakakubuura ensi,
Bakagibuzya endembo.
Ndyagigira obutuuro bw'ebisegyesi n'ebiyanja by'amaizi. Kandi ndyagyeyerera n'ekyeyerezo ekirikuhwerekyereza; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
MUKAMA ow'amahe arahiire naagira ati:
Nk'oku naateekateekire, nikwo kiriba,
Kandi kiryaba nk'oku naamaririire.
Mmuribatiiririre aha bibungo byangye,
Enkomo ye ebone kubarugaho,
N'emitwaro ye ebarugye aha mabega.
Egyo niyo naama eyaagiriirwe ensi yoona,
Kandi ogwo nigwo mukono ogubangiirwe amahanga goona.
N'oha orikizibira?
Omukono gwe ku guraabe gubangire,
N'oha origuhinya?
Imwe Bafilistia 'mwe mwena, mutashemererwa,
Ngu ahabw'okuba enkoni eyaabateire ehendekire;
ahakuba omu kitsintsi ky'enjoka haryarugamu empiri,
N'ekyana kyayo kibe enjoka y'obushegu erikuguruka.
Emijigaijo y'abooro eryatunga eby'okurya,
N'abakyene baryabyama buhooro;
Kwonka ekitsintsi kyawe ndyakiitsa enjara,
N'abarihonokaho baryaitwa.
Naiwe rurembo 'we, ocure!
Abafilistia mwena, muhahaaze emitima,
ahabw'okuba omwika gwareetwa aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo,
Kandi omu ngabo ze tihaine otsigaire enyima.
Bati: MUKAMA niwe yaataireho Saayuuni,
Kandi omuriyo abantu be abarikwitwa kubi nimwo barihungira.
Aari orurembo rwa Moabu rucwekyereziibwe,
Rwamarwaho omu kiro kimwe;
Na Kiiri eya Moabu ecwekyereziibwe,
Yaamarwaho omu kiro kimwe.
Omwishiki wa Diboni ainamukire omu myanya mikuru kucurirayo,
Abamoabu nibaboroogyera Neebo na Medeba.
Emitwe yaabo yoona n'enkomborora,
Kandi boona bamweire ebireju;
Nibagyenda omu mihanda bajwaire ebiguniya,
Aha mitwe y'amaju gaabo n'omu nteeraniro z'emihanda
Buri muntu naaborooga, naacura munonga.
Aba Heshibooni n'aba Eleale nibataka,
Amaraka gaabo nigahika Yahazi;
Nikyo engabo za Moabu zirikucurira,
N'emitima yaabo ekatetema.
Omutima gwangye niguririra Moabu,
Abanyiginya baayo nibahungira Zoari
Na Egelaasi-shelishiya;
Aharikwinamuka Luhiisi niho barikwinamukira nibacura;
N'omu muhanda ogurikuza Horonaimu
Nimwo barikutakira okutaka kw'abarikucwekyerera.
Amaizi ga Nimuriimu goomire,
Obunyaatsi buhotokire, obunyaatsi busya bwangire kumera,
Tihakiriho kintu kyona ekibisi.
Nikyo barikucwisiza ebi baatungire byona,
N'ebi baabiikire, bakabyambutsya omugyera gw'emikinga;
Ahabw'okuba okurira kubugire ensi ya Moabu,
N'okuborooga kuhikire Egulaimu na Beereliimu.
Ahakuba amaizi ga Diboni gaijwire eshagama;
Kandi niinyija kureetera Diboni ebindi bihikiirizi,
Niyo ntare erikwija kurya Abamoabu abahonokireho
N'abatsigaire omu nsi yaabo.
Mubaihe Seela aharikureeba omu ihamba,
Mubahitsye aha rushozi Saayuuni.
Nk'oku enyonyi zitaataana, ekyashuri kisheenyirwe,
Nikwo n'abaishiki ba Moabu bari
aha nyambukiro za Arunooni,
Nibagira bati: Tuhe obwengye, ocwe emanja z'oburyo;
Omu mushana gw'eihangwe otubeere ekibunda kibe nka nyekiro;
Osherekye encuubwa, kandi otareebya abacwire.
Ozibeere obuhungiro aha muhwerekyerezi.
Orikuhata ku ariba atakiriho,
Okucwekyereza kwahweireho,
Kandi n'orikuribatiirira abantu atakireebwa mu nsi,
Habeho owaakishutamaho omu mazima omu ihema rya Daudi,
Omuramuzi orikucwa emanja omu bwinganisa,
Kandi orikurahuka kukora eby'okuhikiirira.
Ku arikwekunika munonga;
Emyekuniko ye, amaryo ge, n'orubwa rwe;
Kwonka okwehimbisa kwe n'okwa busha.
Nikyo Abamoabu bariboroogyera,
Buri muntu akacurira Moabu.
Muryaririra ebiihuro by'emizaabibu
Ya Kiruharaseesi, mushobererwa kimwe.
N'omuzaabibu gwa Sibuma, bihotokire;
Abategyeki b'amahanga bacwire amataagi gaagwo
Agaabaire gahikire Yazeri, gakaregyera n'omu ihamba,
Kandi gukagaba agandi mataagi agaabugire hoona,
Gakambuka n'enyanja.
Nikyo ndikuriririra omuzaabibu gwa Sibuma
Nk'oku aba Yazeri barikuguririra.
Iwe Heshibooni na Eleale,
Ndyakushukaho amarira gangye;
Ahabw'okuba ebijuma byawe by'omu kyanda n'eby'omu ishaaruura ryawe
Bibairemu enduuru z'engamba.
Omu misiri erikwera munonga;
Omu misiri y'emizaabibu tibakyeshongoreramu byeshongoro,
N'obu kwakuba okuteera akaari.
Tihakibamu munyuuki wa viinyo orikunyuukira omu bwato,
N'akaari k'abanyuuki tikakihurirwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo omutima gwangye nigucurira Moabu nk'enanga y'omu rufu,
Kandi n'omu nda yangye ninsaasibwa Kiriheresi.
Ekyo nikyo kigambo eki MUKAMA yaagambire ira ahari Moabu.

Kwonka hati MUKAMA naagira ati: Omu myaka eshatu nk'ey'orikukorera ebihembo, ekitiinisa kya Moabu, n'obu araabe aine eihe rihango munonga, kiryagaywa, kandi abarihonokaho baryaba bakye munonga abataine maani.
Reeba, Damasiko teriba rurembo bundi,
Kureka eryaba emituumo y'ebisheenyuka.
Endembo za Aroeri ziryaba ebifurukwa,
Zibe amariisizo g'amasyo agaribyamamu,
Hatagire kyagakanga.
Na Damasiko terigaruka kuba bugabe,
N'Abasiria abarihonokaho baryaba nk'ekitiinisa ky'Abaisraeli;
Nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
N'okugomoka kwe kuryatuuba ahoroote.
Omukono gwe gukagyesha obushiisha,
Kandi nk'orikuhumba oburo omu ruhita rwa Reefa.
Nk'ebitsigara omu mutiini gutengyetsiibwe,
Ebijuma bishatu nari bibiri ha itaagi eririkukira agandi aha mutwe;
Kandi ebijuma bitaano nari bina aha mataagi ag'omu mbaju zaagwo agarikwana munonga;
Nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba.
tibarita mutima ha matambiro agaayombiekirwe emikono yaabo, kandi amaisho tibarigahanga Ashera nari ebishushani by'eizooba ebi baakozire n'engaro zaabo.
Eryo izooba endembo zaabo ezigumire ziryaba nk'ebifurukwa by'Abahiivi n'Abaamori, ebi baafurukiremu nibahunga Abaisraeli, haza habe amatongo.
Kandi timwaijuka Rukiri obuhungiro bwanyu,
N'ahabw'ekyo n'obu muraabyare emiti y'okweshemeza,
Mukagibyaraho engurukira ezirikuruga ahandi,
N'obu mwakugimeza aha izooba eri mwagibyariraho,
Mukagireetera kurabya omuri ako kasheeshe,
Kwonka eishoroma ryayo riryabura
aha izooba ry'enaku n'obusaasi obutarikutuuza.
Ai bambe, hurira okuhoorera kw'abantu bainti!
Nibahoorera nk'okuhoorera kw'enyanja.
Ai bambe okurigita kw'amahanga!
Nigarigita nk'okurigita kw'amaizi g'amaani.
Kwonka We aryagakabukira, gahungire hare,
Gabingwe nk'ebishushunga ebirikutwarwa omuyaga aha mutwe gw'ebibungo,
Kandi nk'omucuucu ogurikutuumuurwa akasooroora.
Reeba, omu mwabazyo buryaba buri obwoba,
Kandi butakaseesire baryaba batakiriho!
Ogwo nigwo mugabo gw'abarikutunyaga,
Kandi ebyo nibyo birihika aha barikutwambura.
Ai bambe, iwe nsi erikuhooreza amapapa 'we,
Eya seeri y'omugyera gwa Esiopia,
Etuma entumawa, zikaraba omu nyanja
Nizigyendera aha maizi omu bwato bw'ebifunjo!
Mwirooko, imwe ntumwa z'amaguru 'mwe,
Muze omu ihanga ry'abantu baraingwa, ab'omubiri gurikuterera,
Eritiinwa aba haihi n'aba hare,
Eihanga ery'amaani eriribatiirira agandi,
Eri ensi yaaryo etaanisiibwe emigyera.
Imwe batuuzi b'omu nsi 'mwe mwena,
Abatuura omu nsi yoona,
Orurango ku ruriimukibwa aha bibungo, mureebe!
Kandi n'enzamba ku eriteerwa, muhurire!
Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA angambiire naagira ati:
Ndyayegumira omu mwanya gwangye nindeeba,
Nk'akashana kaamara embeho ahansi,
Nk'orume rw'omu bunaku bw'omushana gw'eishaaruura.
Emizaabibu etakahiisize,
Amataagi mato aryagashariza oruhabyo,
N'amataagi gatagwize agatemeho.
Goona garyatsigarira amahungu g'omu nshozi
N'enyamaishwa z'omu nsi.
Amahungu garyagaraaramu omu kyanda,
N'enyamaishwa z'omu nsi zoona zigatuuremu omu itumba.
Reeba MUKAMA aheekirwe ekicu kirikwiruka
Naaza Misri;
Ebishushani bya Misri ebirikuramibwa biryatetemera omu maisho ge,
emitima y'Abanyamisri ebahwe omunda.
Ndyateerana Abanyamisri barwane,
Buri muntu arwane na mwene ishe,
Kandi buri muntu arwane na mutaahi we,
Orurembo rurwane n'orundi,
N'obugabe burwane n'obundi.
Abanyamisri emitima eryabahwa omunda,
Naanye nyite enaama zaabo,
Baraguze aha bishushani ebirikuramibwa,
Abarogi, abafumu, n'abarikugambisa emizimu;
Kandi bategyekwe omugabe enshaarizi;
Nikwo Mukama, MUKAMA ow'amahe, arikugamba.
Amaizi g'enyanja garyayoma,
N'omugyera gwome, guhweho,
Emikura yaagwo enuukye,
N'amaizi g'otugyera twa Misri gaijururukye, goome,
Ebifunjo n'emibimbiri bijunde, bihweho.
Amariisizo ga Nailo ag'aha nkungu zaayo,
N'ebihingirwe byona biryayoma,
Bihweho, birekye kugaruka kureebwa.
Abategi b'eby'enyanja abarikutegyesa amarobo omuri Nailo boona
Baryacura, baboroogye;
N'abarikutegyesa obutimba omu maizi gaayo baryacweka entegye.
Abakozi ba furakisi eshemeziibwe baryashoberwa
Hamwe n'abaruki b'emyenda ya pamba erikwera.
Abaabaire bari enyomyo za Misri baryahendagurika,
N'abarikukorera ebihembo boona baryagira obusaasi.
Abanyiginya ba Zoani n'abashema buzima,
N'abahi b'obwengye ba Faraho nibamuha enaama z'obushema.
Noobaasa ota kugira Faraho oti:
Ndi omwana w'omunyabwengye,
Mwijukuru w'abagabe ba ira?
Nibakugambire, bakumanyise
Eki MUKAMA ow'amahe amaririire kukora Misri.
Abanyiginya ba Zoani bahindukire abashema,
N'aba Noofu babeihabeihirwe;
Kandi nibo bahabize Misri,
Haza kunu bari enyomyo z'enganda zaayo.
Baagireetera kugwererana omu bi erikukora byona,
Nk'oku omusinzi agwererana naatanaka.
Ogwakukozirwe omutwe nari ekibunu,
Amataagi g'emikindo nari ekibingo.
Ensi ya Yuda eryaba ekirikutiinisa Abanyamisri; omuntu weena origigambirwa aryatiina ahabw'eki MUKAMA ow'amahe amaririire kukora, ngu abarwanise.
Omuri obwo bunaku haryabaho endembo itaano ezirikugamba orurimi rw'Abanyakanaani, zikarahira MUKAMA ow'amahe. Rumwe ahari ezo ruryayetwa Orurembo rw'okuhwerekyerera.
Eryo izooba haryabaho eitambiro eryombekyeirwe MUKAMA ahagati omu nsi ya Misri, kandi n'enyomyo eribyarirwa MUKAMA aha mwatano gwayo.
Eryaba akamanyiso n'ekirikuhamya MUKAMA ow'amahe omu nsi ya Misri. Ku baritakira MUKAMA ahabw'abarikubahata, aryabooherereza omujuni w'okubarwanirira, abajune.
Obwo aryamanywa omuri Misri, n'Abanyamisri baryamumanya, bamuramye nibamutambira ebitambo, n'okumuhongyera empongano, kandi bamuraganise, bahikiirize ebi baamuraganiise.
Kandi MUKAMA aryarwanisa Misri; omu kubarwanisa abaite kandi abatambire, bwanyima bagarukye ahari MUKAMA; kandi aryahurira okweshengyereza kwabo, abatambire.
Kandi obwo Abaisraeli, Abanyamisri na Abaasiria bonshatu baryakwatanisa, bagume nibahaisa ensi omugisha;
ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ow'amahe abahaire omugisha naagira ati: Misri abantu bangye, Asiria ei emikono yangye yaahangire, na Israeli obuhunguzi bwangye baheebwe omugisha.
omu bunaku obwo MUKAMA akagambira Isaaya mwene Amozi, ati: Irooko, oyezirikuurure ebiguniya, ojuure enkaito. Nawe nikwo yaakozire, akagyenda ajwaire busha, kandi ataine nkaito.
MUKAMA akagira ati: Nk'oku omwiru wangye Isaaya amazire emyaka eshatu naagyenda ajwaire busha kandi ataine nkaito, okubeera Misri na Esiopia akamanyiso n'eky'okutangaaza,
nikwo n'omugabe wa Asiria aritwara Abanyamisri bari enkwatwa, n'Abaesiopia bari encuubwa, abato n'abakuru, bakagyenda bajwaire busha, bataine nkaito, ebibunu biri aheeru, kuhemura Misri.
Bwanyima abo abaabaire bataire amatsiko ahari Esiopia, nibeehimbisiza ahari Misri, baryahahaaza emitima, bashoberwe.

Eryo izooba abatuuzi b'omuri egi nsi y'aha rubaju rw'enyanja baryagira bati: Mbwenu, abu twabaire tutaireho amatsiko, tukabahungiraho ngu batujune omugabe wa Asiria, ku baraabe babaire batyo, itwe turyakira tuta?
Nk'akasooroora k'omuri Negebu oku kagyenda nikasingoorera,
Nikwo ebyahanwirwe ebyo biruga omu ihamba, omu nsi erikutiinisa.
Omunyagi naanyaga,
Omuhwerekyerezi naahwerekyereza.
Iwe Elamu, hurura,
Naiwe Media, obagote.
Amaganya goona agu yaareetsire ngamazireho.
N'ahabw'ekyo nyine obusaasi bw'okuunyita;
Ninshaasha munonga nk'omukazi orikurumwa;
Obusaasi nibunzibira kuhurira,
N'okuhahaaza omutima nikunzibira kureeba.
Akairima aku nyetegyire kandugiramu okutetema.
Nibaara emikyeeka,
Nibarya kandi nibanywa.
Mwimukye, imwe banyiginya 'mwe,
Musiigye amajuta aha ngabo!
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akangira ati:
Irooko, oteho omurinzi,
Agume agambe eki araareebe.
Ku araareebe omutwe gw'abantu
Abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi babiri-babiri,
Abarikugyendera aha ndogoya n'aha ngamira,
Ahurire ataireho omutima,
Ataireho omutima munonga.
Ai MUKAMA, obutoosha nyomushana
Nyemerera aha munaara gw'abarinzi,
Kandi buri kiro nguma omu mwanya ogu ntairweho.
Abatembire embaraasi babiri-babiri!
Yaagarukamu ati:
Babulooni egwire! Babulooni egwire!
N'ebishushani bya baaruhanga baayo byona byahendagurika.
Ebi mpuriire MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli nangambira,
Nibyo ndikukugambira.
Hariho orikuunyeta naayema Seiri, naagira ati:
Iwe murinzi 'we, ekiro kyahika hi!
Iwe murinzi 'we, ekiro kyahika hi?
Omurinzi nawe yangarukamu ati:
Nibuza kusheesha, kandi kwira.
Ku muraabe nimwenda kwehanuuza, mwehanuuze;
Muhindukye, mwije.
Imwe emitwe y'Abadedani erikuhingura,
Muryaraara omu bishaka bya Buharabu.
Imwe abatwire omu nsi ya Teema,
Nimureetere abaine eiriho amaizi,
Abarikucwa mubabuganise eby'okurya;
Ahakuba bahungire zaarurara,
Zaarurara ezisyoirweyo,
Amata agareegire,
N'ahu orugamba ruhamire.
kandi n'abaritsigara aha barasi, abashaija rugambwa aba Kedari, baryaba mbarwa; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli niwe akigambire.
Ebi nabi yaahanwire aha ruhanga rw'okworekyerwamu.
Mbwenu obaire ota, n'abantu baawe boona?
Ka muri aha mitwe y'amaju,
Iwe rurembo rwijwire oruyombo 'we,
Orujagaraire, orurikwesiima!
Abantu baawe abaitsirwe ka bataitsirwe na rurara,
Kandi ka batagwire ha rugamba!
Abategyeki baawe boona bahungiire hamwe,
Baakwatwa bateerwaineho;
Abantu baawe, ahu bashangirwe hoona, baakwatwa.
N'obu baraabe babaire bahungiire hare.
Muunyiheho amaisho.
Mundekye, ndire munonga,
Muteerusya kwenda kummara obusaasi,
Obu nyine ahabw'eihanga ryangye erinyagirwe.
Ery'okushoberererwaho omu ruhanga rw'okworekyerwamu,
Erirugire ahari Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe,
Ery'okusheenyeraho engo z'amabaare,
Kandi n'ery'okuboroogyeraho nibatakira ebibungo.
Aba Elamu bahagatiire emitana,
Baija n'ebigaari n'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi,
N'aba Kiiri baashohoza engabo.
Empita zaawe ezirikukira oburungi ziijwire ebigaari,
N'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi babambiire amarembo.
Ahari eryo izooba mukata amaisho aha by'okurwanisa by'omu nju y'ekibira,
mwareeba emyanya y'omu rugo rw'orurembo rwa Daudi esheenyukire eri mingi; mwateeranira hamwe amaizi g'omu kiyanja kya ifo,
mwabara amaju ga Yerusaalemu, mwagasheenya ahabw'okugumya orugo;
bwanyima amaizi g'omu kiyanja ekya ira mwagatimbira eiziba ahagati y'engo zombi. Kwonka timwaijuka owaakozire ebyo, n'obu kwakuba okweta aha Waateekateekire ira ku bibaho.
Eryo izooba Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe
Akeeta abantu ngu barire, baboroogye,
Bamwe enkomborora, kandi bajware ebiguniya.
N'okwita ente n'entaama,
N'okurya enyama n'okunywa viinyo,
Nimugira muti: Reka tweriire, twenywere,
Ahakuba nyencakare turi ab'okufa.
Buzimazima okutahikiirira oku timurikusaasirwa
Okuhitsya obu murifa;
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe arikugira.
Nookora ki aha; kandi aha oineho oha, waaza kwetimbira aha ekituuro, iwe orikukyetimbira omu mwanya gw'ahaiguru, okeekorera aha'okutuura omu rukiri?
Iwe mushaija w'amaani 'we, reeba, MUKAMA aryakujuguta n'amaani; aryakukwata, akuhamye,
akuzongoze, akurekyere nk'omupiira, akungye omu nsi egarami; okwo niyo origwa, n'ebigaari byawe by'ekitiinisa niyo biriguma, iwe orikuhemura enju ya mukama waawe.
Ndyakubinga omu murimo gwawe, ogarurwe ahansi orugye omu bukuru bwawe.
Eryo izooba ndyayeta omwiru wangye Eliakimu mwene Hilukia,
mmujwekye ekanzu yaawe, mmuzirikye orukoba rwawe, n'obushoboorozi bwawe mbumuhe; kandi aryaba ishe w'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, n'ab'enju ya Yuda.
Ekishumuruzo ky'enju ya Daudi ndyakita aha ibega rye. Niwe ariigura, hatagire waakinga, kandi arikinga, hatagire waigura.
Ndyamuteererera omu mwanya guhamire nk'enkondo, abeere enju ya ishe ekitebe ky'ekitiinisa,
bamuhanikyeho oburemeezi bwona obw'enju ya ishe, ab'enda ye n'oruzaaro rwe, ebintu byona ebikye, okwiha aha bikopo okuhika aha nnywero zoona.
Kandi MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Eryo izooba egyo nkondo, eyaateerereirwe omu mwanya oguhamire, eryakuuka, etemwe, egwe; n'ebibaire bigihanikirweho biihweho; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe akigambire.
Imwe meeri za Tarushiishi 'mwe, nimuboroogye,
Ahabw'okuba Tuuro ecwekyereziibwe, tihaatsigara nju nari nyambukiro!
Ebyo biboorekirwe nibiruga omu nsi ya Kitimu.
Imwe abatwire aha mbaju z'enyanja,
Abaabaire batungisibwa abashuubuzi ba Sidoni,
Abarikuraba omu nyanja, nimuhuname!
Nibyo byabaire bibareetera amagoba.
Okwo niyo akatare k'amahanga kaabaire kari.
Iwe Sidoni, gira enshoni; ahabw'okuba enyanja yaagamba,
Nikyo kigo kyayo, neegira eti:
Tinkarumwaga, tinkazaaraga,
Tinkontsyaga baana b'aboojo,
N'obu kwakuba okworora abaishiki.
Enkuru ya Tuuro ku erihika Misri,
Baryagigirira obusaasi.
Imwe abatwire aha mbaju z'enyanja,
Nimwambukye, muze Tarushiishi, mucure!
Beitu shi, oru nirwo rurembo rwanyu ruri
Orwabaire rwesiima orwa ira ryona,
Oru abantu baamwo baabaire bakunda kuza hare kutuurayo?
Kurwanisa Tuuro, haza ruri orurembo orwabaire rwemeka abagabe,
N'abatuuzi baarwo bari ab'ekitiinisa omu nsi?
MUKAMA ow'amahe niwe akimaririire,
Ngu abone kugayisa amaryo g'ekitiinisa kyona,
N'okukwatsa enshoni abanyakitiinisa boona ab'omu nsi.
Iwe Tarushiishi 'we,
Shandaara omu nsi yaawe nk'omugyera Nailo,
Ahabw'okuba tokiine kirikukuzibira.
MUKAMA agoroire omukono gwe aha nyanja,
Yaatengyetsa amahanga g'abagabe,
Yaagamba aha bya Kanaani naaragiira
Ngu bacwekyereze ebigo byayo eby'amaani.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati:
Iwe Sidoni 'we, omwishiki oshugaine orikuhatwa,
Tokigaruka kushemererwa;
Imuka, oyambukye Kitimu,
Kandi nayo, torigirirayo buhuumure.
Mureebe ensi y'Abakaludaaya! Tekiri ihanga. Abaasiria bakagihindura ey'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba. Bakagota Tuuro, baagyombekaho eminaara, baasheenya zaanyaruju zaayo, baagigira amatongo.

Omu bunaku obwo Tuuro eryayeba okumara emyaka makumi mushanju, nk'emyaka ei omugabe amara aha ngoma. Egyo myaka makumi mushanju ku erihwa, ebirihika ahari Tuuro biryaba nk'ebiri omu kyeshongoro kya maraaya, ekirikugira kiti:
Iwe maraaya waayebire 'we,
Twara enanga, ogyendagyende omu rurembo!
Ogiteere, ogijumeeze,
Oyeshongore ebyeshongoro bingi, obone kwijukwa.

Obutungi n'obushuubuzi bwayo buryayerezibwa MUKAMA; tiburibiikwa, tiburiteebwa hangahari nk'obw'engumya, kureka buryaheebwa abatuura omu maisho ga MUKAMA, ngu babone kurya n'okuhaaga, kandi babone ebijwaro ebirikuterera.
Reeba, MUKAMA aryahwerekyereza ensi, agihindure amatongo,
Agijuumikye, ataataanise abagitwiremu.
Ebirihika aha muhuuku, nibyo birihika ahari mukama we;
Ebirihika aha muzaana, nibyo birihika ahari mugore we;
Ebirihika aha muguzi, nibyo birihika aha mutunzi;
Ebirihika aha muntu orikuguza abandi, nibyo birihika aha muntu orikweguza;
Ebirihika aha muntu orikwihuza, nibyo birihika n'aha muntu orikwihuzibwa.
Ahakuba MUKAMA niwe agambire ekigambo eki.
Ensi yoona ehweire amaani, neehotoka;
Abeekuniki b'omu nsi bahweire amaani.
Ahabw'okuba basiisire ekiragiro, baihireho ebyatairweho,
Baita endagaano etahwaho.
N'abatuuzi baamwo bakasingwa orubanja;
N'ahabw'ekyo abagitwiremu bookiibwe, baatsigara mbarwa.
Viinyo neeganya, omuzaabibu guruhire,
Ab'emitima eshemereirwe nibatsinda.
Akaari k'abarikushemererwa kahunamire,
N'okushemererwa okurikureetwa enanga kuhweireho.
Tibarigaruka kunywa viinyo nibeeshongora,
Ebirikusinza biryashaarira abarikubinywa.
Orurembo orubaire rujagaraire rusheenyukire,
Amaju goona gakingire, ngu hatagira owaataahamu.
Ahu okushemererwa kubaire kuri, mbwenu n'ekizima;
Okwesiima kw'omu nsi kuhweireho.
Orurembo tirutsigairwemu kindi kureka amatongo,
Amarembo gaarwo gasheenyirwe, gaacwekyerezibwa.
Garyaba nk'omutiini ogurikutengyetsibwa,
Nari nk'oku bahumba emizaabibu, eishaaruura rihweire.
Baryaimutsya amaraka gaabo, beeshongore ahabw'okushemererwa,
Ab'oburengyerwa-izooba bateere akaari ahabw'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA.
Naimwe abatwire aha mbaju z'enyanja,
Musiime eiziina rya MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Nibasiima Ogwo orikwera munonga.
Kwonka nyowe ningira nti: Ai bambe, ka naareeba!
Mpweire aha magufa! Mpweire aha magufa!
Ahabw'okuba abarikureebya bareebize;
Buzimazima abarikureebya bareebize munonga.
Obwoba, ekiina n'omutego bikuriho!
Orikuhunga orwari rw'ebirikutiinisa
Naija kugwa omu kiina;
Kandi orikutemba kuruga omu kiina
Naija kukwatwa omutego,
Ahabw'okuba amadirisa g'eiguru gaigwire,
N'emisingi y'ensi neetetema.
Ensi eyatikire kimwe,
Ensi eyabiire kimwe,
Ensi etengyetsiibwe munonga.
Neezonga nk'akaju;
Okushiisha kwayo kugihingamiire,
Neija kugwa, kandi teriimuka bundi.
N'abagabe b'ahansi omu nsi;
Baryakingiranwa omu nju y'ekihome,
Kandi ku harihinguraho ebiro bingi, baryafubirwa.
N'eizooba riryakwatwa enshoni,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ow'amahe aryategyekyera
Aha rushozi Saayuuni n'omuri Yerusaalemu,
Kandi aryayoreka ekitiinisa kye
Omu maisho g'abantu be abakuru.
Ndyakuhimbisa, nsingize eiziina ryawe,
ahabw'okuba okozire eby'okutangaaza,
Ebi waateekateekire ira kukora omu bwesigwa n'amazima.
Orurembo orwehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare oruhindwire amatongo.
Ekikaari ky'abanyamahanga tikikiba rurembo,
Kandi tikirigaruka kwombekwa bundi.
Nikyo eihanga ry'amaani ririkuheera ekitiinisa,
Endembo z'amahanga agataine saasi zikakutiina.
Waababeera obwegamo bw'eihunga n'ekicuucu ky'okubatambira omushana;
Ahabw'okuba abataine saasi babateera nk'oku eihunga riteera orugo,
Nari nk'omushana gw'amaani omu nsi eyomire.
Niiwe ocureeza enduuru z'abanyamahanga,
Okahunamya ebyevugo by'abataine saasi,
Nk'oku omushana gwikaikanisibwa ekibunda ky'ekicu.
Kandi ahari oru rushozi aryamariraho kimwe ekirikushweka ekishwekire enganda zoona, n'eky'okwetwekyerera ekisangiire amahanga goona.
Kandi Mukama RUHANGA aryamirira kimwe rufu, aragaze amarira aha maisho goona, n'ekijumo eki barikujuma abantu be akiihe aha nsi yoona; ahakuba MUKAMA niwe akigambire.
ahakuba omukono gwa MUKAMA guryaguma ahari oru rushozi, kandi Moabu eryaribatiiririrwa omu mwanya gwayo, nk'oku baribatiirira embuba omu kiina ky'amasha.
Kandi Moabu eryanagiramu emikono, nk'oku orikuziha anaga emikono naaziha; kwonka MUKAMA aryamucwa amaryo, amumaremu obuhangu bw'engaro ze,
kandi ebigo bye by'eminaara ebyombekirwe aha ngo z'amabaare ez'endembo ze, aryabisheenya, abihigure, abikumbagaze ahansi, bihikire kimwe omu mucuucu.
Twine orurembo rugumire,
Ruhanga naataho okujunwa
Kuba orugo rwarwo orw'okurukingira.
Eihanga erihikiriire, kandi eririkwesigwa, ribone kutaahamu.
Omuntu orikukwegyekyerera omutima gwe,
Oryamurindira omu busingye buzima,
Ahabw'okuba naakwesiga.
Mwesigye MUKAMA ebiro byona,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Yehova n'orukiri rutahwaho.
Yaarugarura ahansi, yaaruhitsya aha itaka,
Yaarunaga omu mucuucu.
Ebigyere biryaruribatiirira,
Eby'abooro n'eby'abakyene.
Omuhanda gw'abahikiriire gutebeekaine,
Kandi Iwe ohikiriire, niiwe ohabura abahikiriire omuhanda.
Omu muhanda gw'ebiragiro byawe;
Emitima yaitu neeyetenga eiziina ryawe n'okukwijuka.
Omwoyo oguri omuriinye nigwezirika kukusherura;
Ahabw'okuba ebiragiro byawe ku biba biri omu nsi,
Abagitwiremu beega eby'okuhikiirira.
Tayega by'okuhikiirira;
N'omu nsi y'okuhikiirira akoreramu kubi,
Kandi tareeba bukuru bwa MUKAMA.
Kwonka tibarikugureeba.
Ka bareebe obweziriki obu oiniire abantu baawe, baitwe enshoni,
Abazigu baawe omuriro gubamareho.
MUKAMA, niiwe orituteeraho obusingye,
Ahabw'okuba emirimo yaitu yoona, niiwe ogitukorera.
Abandi bagabe abatari Iwe nabo bakatutegyeka,
Kwonka eiziina ryawe ryonka niryo turikumanya.
Abo bakafa, tibarigaruka kubaho;
Bakaba emizimu, tibarizooka;
Nikyo waabateereire okabacwekyereza,
Okatsibyatsibya okwijukwa kwabo kwona.
Okanyiise eihanga, waaheebwa ekitiinisa,
Kandi wairizayo emyatano yaaryo yoona.
Bakakusherura, baakushaba n'emitima yaabo yoona.
Oku arumwa, akaamuza omu kushaasha kwe,
MUKAMA, naitwe nikwo twabaire turi omu maisho gaawe.
Tukaba twine enda, twarumwa,
Twaba nk'abazaire omuyaga.
Titwareetera nsi yaitu kujunwa,
Kandi abatuuzi b'omu nsi tibakagwaga.
Emitumbi yaabo ezookye.
Imwe abatuura omu mucuucu, musisiimukye,
Mweshongore ahabw'okushemererwa!
Ahakuba orume rwawe ni nk'orume rw'aha bunyaatsi,
Kandi omu nsi y'emizimu nimwo orirureka rukatonda.
Mube mwekingirainemu akaanya kakye,
Okuhitsya ahu ekiniga kiraahwere;
Kuhana ab'omu nsi naabatura okutahikiirira kwabo.
Kandi ensi aryayoreka eshagama eyaagiseesirweho,
Kandi terigaruka kushweka bantu baayo abaitsirwe.
Reeba, omusiri gw'emizaabibu ya viinyo! Mugweshongore.
Nyowe, MUKAMA, niinye murinzi waagwo;
Ndyaguma ngushukyeere amaizi buri mwanya,
Kandi ngurinde nyomushana na nyekiro,
Ngu hatagira owaagushiisha.
Kwonka emikwatangwe n'amahwa ku byakwija kundwanisa,
Nkaabirwanisa, mbyotsya hamwe byona.
Nari bankwate amaguru ngu mbarinde,
Babone kugira obusingye naanye;
Kandi baryabugira.
Israeli aryatooka, arabye ebirabyo,
Kandi baryabuzya ensi yoona ebijuma.
Nari shi baitsirwe nk'oku abaabaitsire baitsirwe?
Aha izooba ry'omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba yaayemereza omuyaga gw'eihunga.
Kandi ebyo nibyo byana byona ebiriruga omu kumwihaho ekibi;
Ku ariheza kuhindura amabaare goona ag'eitambiro
Nk'amabaare g'ebisooni agahondagwirwe,
Tiharitsigaraho Ashera nari ekishushani ky'eizooba kyona ekirikuramibwa kyemereire.
Amaju gaarwo gatsigirweho garimu busha nk'eihamba.
Okwo niyo enyana ziriira, zikazaagira,
Zikakonkobora amataagi gaayo.
Abakazi baije, bagahembe.
Ahakuba eihanga eri n'eihanga eritarikwetegyereza;
Nikyo Ogwo owaabahangire ataribagiririra saasi,
Owaababumbire ataribagiririra mbabazi.
Eryo izooba enzamba mpango eryateerwa, abaabaire nibenda kucwekyererera omu nsi ya Asiria, n'ababingiirwe omu nsi ya Misri, baryaija, baramize MUKAMA aha rushozi orurikwera Yerusaalemu.
Ekirunga ky'amaryo g'abasinzi ba Efuraimu kiryareeba enaku,
Hamwe n'orurabyo rw'oburungi bw'ekitiinisa kye orurikuhonga,
Oruri aha mutwe gw'oruhanga rurikweza munonga rw'abamazirweho viinyo!
Aryabateera ahansi n'amaani
Nkeihunga ry'orubaare eririkucwekyereza,
Nk'omwegyemure gw'amaizi maingi agashandaire munonga.
Ekirunga ky'amaryo g'abasinzi ba Efuraimu
Kiryaribatiirirwa;
Kandi orurabyo rw'oburungi bw'ekitiinisa kye orurikuhonga,
Oruri aha mutwe gw'oruhanga orurikweza munonga,
Ruryaba nk'ekijuma ky'omutiini ekirikubanza kwera
Ekyanda kitakataahire;
Omuntu ku akireeba, yaakihitsya ati omu ngaro, akirya.
Eryo izooba MUKAMA ow'amahe aryabeera abantu be abahonokireho
Ekirunga ky'ekitiinisa, n'eihunde;
Amubeere omwoyo gw'okucwa emanja z'oburyo,
Kandi abantu abarikugarurayo abazigu bahikire omu marembo, ababeere amaani.
Ebirikusinza nibibagwereranisa;
Omunyamurwa na nabi nibagwereranisibwa ebirikusinza,
Viinyo ebamaziremu obwengye;
Nibahabisibwa ebirikusinza,
Nibahaba omu kworekwa.
Bateera entsibo omu kucwa emanja.
Emeeza zoona ziijwire entanaki n'oburofa,
Tihariho hashemeire hoona.
Mbwenu shi, n'oha ou aryegyesa obwengye?
Kandi n'oha ou arishobororera obutumwa?
Noogira ngu n'encuukye ezirugire aha mabeere?
Ahakuba ebye n'okwongyera ekiragiro aha kiragiro,
Ekiragiro aha kindi,
Omushorongo aha mushorongo, n'omushorongo aha gundi,
Aha kakye, hariya kakye.
Abarikugamba orundi rurimu,
Nibo MUKAMA arigambiriramu aba bantu
Murekye oruhire ahuumure;
Kandi oku nikwo kuruhuuka.
Kwonka baayanga kuhurira.
Ekiragiro aha kiragiro, ekiragiro aha kindi;
Omushorongo aha mushorongo, n'omushorongo aha gundi,
Aha kakye, hariya kakye,
Babone kugyenda, bagwe bagarami.
Bahendekye, bagwe omu mutego, bakwatwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo, imwe bagayi 'mwe,
Abarikutegyeka aba bantu abatwire Yerusaalemu,
Muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA!
Mugizire muti: Turagaine endagaano na rufu,
Kandi twikirizaine n'Okuzimu;
Ekibonaboneso ekirikumaraho ku kiriraba omu nsi,
Tikirituhikaho,
Ahabw'okuba tweboneire obuhungiro omu bishuba,
Twayegama omu bugobya;
Reeba, ninta omuri Saayuuni eibaare kuba omusingi,
Eibaare ry'obuhamizo bw'enju,
Ery'obuguzi bwingi, kandi erihamire.
Orikwikiriza tarirahukiiriza.
Eby'oburyo ndyabigira omugoye gw'okugyeresa,
N'okuhikiirira nkugire kariisho;
Orubaare ruryatwarira kimwe obwo buhungiro bw'ebishuba,
N'amaizi gamareho obwo bwegamo.
Obwo endagaano ei mwaragaine na rufu eryafa,
Kandi n'ebi mwaikirizaine n'Okuzimu tibirigumaho;
Kureka ekibonaboneso ekirikumaraho, ku kiriraba omu nsi,
Kiryabaribatiirira.
Buri kaanya ku kiriba nikirabamu, kiryabakwata;
Ahakuba kiryaguma nikirabamu buri kasheeshe,
Kirabemu nyomushana na nyekiro;
Kandi okushoborokyerwa obutumwa kuryaba okwitsa obwoba kwonka.
Ahakuba ekitanda ni kigufu, omuntu tarikubaasa kukirambikiririzaho,
N'eky'okweshweka n'enkyetero etarikumuhika;
Aryagira ekiniga, nk'eki yagiriire omu ruhanga rwa Gibeoni,
Abone kukora omurimo gwe, omurimo ogutari gw'obutoosha,
N'okuhikiiriza ebi ashangwa atakora.
Ebibakomire bitakaabariitira kimwe,
Ahabw'okuba mpuriire ekiragiro ky'okucwekyereza ensi yoona
Ekirugire ahari Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe.
Mutegye okutu, muhurire eiraka ryangye,
Muhuguukye, muhurire ebi ndikugamba!
Ohingira okubiba, ahinga obutoosha?
Atuura naateera amatsinde?
Ku aheza kwanjara eitaka,
Tabibamu oburo, n'eshogye,
Akabiba engano omu mishorongo,
Na sayiri akagibiba ahagishemereire,
N'ebicoori aha mbibi?
Ahabw'okuba ayorekyererwa gye;
Ruhanga we niwe amwegyesa.
Oburo tibuhuuzibwa kihuuzo ky'obwogi.
N'ebicoori tibihuruburwa nziga z'ekigaari,
Kureka oburo buhuurwa enkoni,
N'ebicoori bihuurwa ekihuuzo.
Nimugira ngu engano z'emigaati bazisa?
Ngaaha! Tibazisa, bazihuura.
N'obu azirabyaho enziga z'ekigaari kye
N'ebyara by'embaraasi, hoona nabwo tazisa.
Niwe muhanuuzi orikutangaaza,
Kandi orikukiza abantu boona obwengye.
Orurembo oru Daudi yaateiremu orusiisira!
Mwongyere omwaka aha mwaka,
Amagyenyi gabeho omu bunaku bwago;
Kwonka hoona ndyabonabonesa Arieli,
Habeho okucura n'amaganya.
Kandi Arieli haryambeera nk'amahega ga Ruhanga.
Nkugotese eminaara,
Nkutuumeho eby'okukurwanisizaho.
Ebigambo byawe birugye ahansi omu mucuucu,
Eiraka ryawe rirugye okuzimu nk'ery'omuzimu,
Rigambire mpora omu mucuucu.
Kwonka omutwe gw'abazigu baawe guryaba guri nk'omucuucu,
N'omutwe gw'abataine saasi nk'ebishushunga birikutuntumuka.
Nikwo biriba omuri ako kaanya.
MUKAMA ow'amahe aryabateeza okuhinda kw'enkuba,
N'omutsitsa, n'endigito mpango,
N'akasooroora, n'eihunga, n'ebirimi by'omuriro gurikurya busha.
Boona abarikumurwanisa n'ekigo kye, bakamubonabonesa,
Baryaba nk'ekirooto, nari okworekwa kwa nyekiro.
Nk'oku omujara aroota naarya,
Akasisiimuka aine enjara,
Nari nk'oine eiriho oku aroota naanywa,
Akasisiimuka n'ekyaka akiriine,
Okwo nikwo omutwe gw'amahanga goona
Agarikurwanisa Saayuuni gariba.
Mwegire ebifa-mutima, mube byo!
Mwehumye, mube empumi!
Mwesinze, mutanyweire!
Mugwererane mutanyweire birikusinza!
Omwoyo gw'oturo twingi,
Yaahumya amaisho gaanyu, nibo baanabi,
Yaatwekyerera emitwe yaanyu, nibo bahanuuzi.

Okworekwa kwona kubahindukiire nk'ebigambo by'omu kitabo ekikwatanisiibwe akamanyiso. Abantu ku bakiha omuntu orikumanya kushoma, baamugira bati, Kishome, abagarukamu ati: Tindikubaasa kukishoma, ahabw'okuba kikwatanisiibwe akamanyiso.
Kandi ku bakiha otarikumanya kushoma, baamugira bati, Kishome, abagarukamu ati: Tindikumanya kushoma.
Abantu aba nibaanyirira haihi,
Bampa ekitiinisa n'akanwa kaabo n'eminwa yaabo,
Kwonka emitima yaabo endi hare,
Kandi okuntiina kwabo n'ekiragiro eki baayegyesiibwe abantu.
Omurimo gw'eihano kandi ogurikutangaariza kimwe;
Obwengye bw'abanyabwengye baabo buryahwaho,
N'okwetegyereza kw'abantu baabo abarikwetegyereza kuryasherekwa.
Abu emirimo yaabo eri omu mwirima,
Abarikugira bati: N'oha orikutureeba?
Kandi bati: Orikutumanya n'oha?
Omubumbi ashemereire kwinganisibwa n'eibumba?
Kikaareetera ekibumbirwe kugamba aha mubumbi kiti:
Twe yambumbire;
Nari shi ekyahangirwe kugamba ahari Ogwo owaakihangire
Kiti: Tarikwetegyereza.
Timurikumanya ku hatsigaire akaanya kakye
Lebanooni kuhinduka omusiri gurikweza munonga,
N'omusiri gurikweza munonga kuba nk'ekibira?
N'empumi ziryahumuuka,
Zikire obuhumi n'omwirima;
N'abooro b'omu bantu baryayesiimira Orikwera wa Israeli,
N'abagayi baryahwaho,
Kandi abarikusherura oburyo bw'okukora eby'okutahikiirira
Baryamarwaho,
Orikuhanira abantu omu marembo bakamutega omutego,
Kandi ohikiriire bakamwimisa ekimushemereire,
Nibamutura busha.
Yakobo tarigaruka kukwatwa nshoni,
N'aha maisho ge tiharihinduka kundi.
Bari omu nsi ye ahagati,
Baryahaisa eiziina ryangye ekitiinisa;
Kandi baryaha Orikwera wa Yakobo ekitiinisa,
Batiine Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Abarikuhaba omu mitima baryahinduka abarikwetegyereza,
N'abarikwetomboita baikirize kwegyesibwa.
Abeehanuuza aha bandi, bataanyehanuuzeho,
Abaragaana endagaano, kwonka etari y'Omwoyo wangye,
Ngu babone kwongyera ekibi aha kindi;
Ngu beesigye amaani ga Faraho,
Basherure obwegamo omu kicuucu kya Misri!
N'okwesiga ekicuucu kya Misri kukaba okuhemuka kwanyu.
Ahabw'okuba abanyiginya be n'obu baraabe bari Zoani,
N'entumwa ze zihikire Hanesi,
Abatarikubaasa kubagasira,
Kandi abatarikubaha buhwezi n'obu gaakuba amagoba,
Kureka ab'okubahemura n'okubajumisa.
Eki nabi yaahanwire aha nyamaishwa z'omuri Negebu.
Nibaraba omu nsi y'akabi n'obusaasi,
Erikurugwamu entare y'enkazi n'enshaija,
Erimu encwera n'enjoka z'obushegu oburikubabiirira,
Baheekyeise endogoya eby'obutungi byabo,
Bataire ebintu byabo aha mabango g'engamira,
Nibaza omu ihanga ry'abantu abataribagasira.
Nikyo ndikugyetera eiziina
Rahabu oshutami kwonka.
Okihandiiye n'omu kitabo,
Kibe eky'obunaku oburiija,
Kigume kiboomesereze ebiro byona;
Ahabw'okuba n'eihanga eririkugoma,
Abaana abarikubeiha,
Aboojo abarikwanga kuhurira ebiragiro bya MUKAMA,
Bakagira baanabi bati:
Mutatuhanuurira ebihikire,
Kureka mugume mutugambire ebyorobi,
Muhanuure eby'obugobya.
Mutuhigize, muturugye omumaisho;
Titurikwenda kugaruka kuhurira eby'Orikwera wa Israeli.
Nikyo Orikwera wa Israeli arikugirira ati:
Ahabw'okugaya ekigambo eki,
Mukeesiga okuhata n'okwehabagiza,
Mukaba nibyo mwayegamira,
Okwo kutahikiirira kuryababeera
Nk'ekisiika kiraingwa ekishatukire, ekirikugogoma, ekiri haihi kugwa,
Eki okugwa kwakyo kubaho ahonaaho omu kaanya kakye;
Akagyata atarikugibariirira,
N'aha ngusyo zaayo hatatsigareho rwa kuguhisa omuriro omu mahega,
Nari orw'okutahisa amaizi omu iziba.
Omu kugaruka n'omu kuhuumura nimwo murijunirwa,
Omu kutuuza n'omu kwesiga nimwo amaani gaanyu gariruga.
Kwomka mwangire; mwagira muti:
Kwokwo muryahunga.
Muti: Nitwija kuhungira aha mbaraasi ezirikwiruka munonga;
N'ahabw'ekyo abaribakurata nabo baryaba abarikwiruka munonga.
Abantu bataano ku baribakangisa, muryahunga,
Okuhitsya obu muritsigara muri nk'ekiti kitsimbirwe aha mutwe gw'orushozi,
Nari nk'ekiti ky'orurango kitsimbirwe omu kibungo.
Kandi nikyo ariheerwa ekitiinisa, ngu abagirire esaasi;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ni Ruhanga ocwa emanja z'oburyo,
Abarikumutegyereza boona baine omugisha.
Iwe ihanga rya Saayuuni 'we, eritwire Yerusaalemu, torigaruka kurira. Ku arihurira eiraka ry'okutaka kwawe, taribura kukugirira mbabazi. Ku arikuhurira aryakugarukamu.
Kandi Mukama n'obu arikuha eby'okurya by'obusaasi n'amaizi g'okubonabonesibwa, Orikukwegyesa tarigaruka kweshereka, kureka amaisho gaawe garyaguma gamureebe.
Kandi ku muritoora aha mukono gwa buryo nari aha gwa bumosho, amatu gaanyu garyaguma nigahurira ekigambo nikibareetwa enyima nikigira kiti: Ogu nigwo muhanda, mube nigwo mwahamya.
Kandi muryashiisha ebishushani byanyu ebibaizirwe ebishwekirwe efeeza, n'ebiheesirwe ebishwekirwe ezaabu. Muryabinagira kimwe nk'ebintu ebisiisikaire, mubigire muti: Murugyeho!
ente n'endogoya ezirikuhinga ziryarya eby'okurya ebirimu omwonyo, ebiheheziibwe engari n'entaara.
Aha izooba ry'okwitirwaho baingi, eminaara ku eriba neesheenywa, orushozi rwona oruraingwa n'ekibungo kyona ekiraingwa, biryahimintikamu emigyera n'enshuro z'amaizi.

Kandi aha izooba eri MUKAMA arishemberaho obuhuta bw'abantu be, akabakiza ebihonoka by'enkoni ze, okwaka kw'okwezi kuryaba nk'okujwa kw'eizooba, n'omushana gwaryo guryayeyongyera emirundi mushanju, gube nk'omushana gw'ebiro mushanju.
Reeba, eiziina rya MUKAMA niriruga hare,
Niryaka n'ekiniga kye, omu mwika mwingi ogurikucumbuuka;
Eminwa ye eijwire okuguubwa kubi,
N'orurimi rwe ruri nk'omuriro gurikurya busha.
Ogurikuhika omuntu omu bitsya,
Kushungura amahanga n'orugari orurikucwekyereza,
N'okuta omu nshaya z'amahanga orukoba orurikuhabya.
Kandi MUKAMA aryahuriza eiraka rye ry'ekitiinisa, ayorekyere okuteera kw'omukono gwe omu kiniga kye kingi n'omu kirimi ky'omuriro gurikurya busha, n'eshato, n'eihunga, n'orubaare.
Abaasiria emitima eryabahwa omunda ahabw'okutiina eiraka rya MUKAMA, ku aribateera n'enkoni ye.
