Kandi ku bariba nibabateera enkoni ezi MUKAMA ariragiira kubateera, haryabaho okuteera amataari n'enanga; aryabarwanisa naatigita omukono gwe.

Ahakuba Tofeti ekateekateekwa okuruga ira, yaateekateekyerwa omugabe. Mbwenu MUKAMA agigizire mpango kandi ndaingwa, yaaba ekikoomi ky'omuriro gw'enku nyingi, kandi omwitsyo gwe, oguri nk'omugyera gw'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, nigwo guhatweka.
Abarikwesiga embaraasi, bakata amatsiko aha bigaari,
Ahabw'okuba bingi,
Kandi bakeesiga abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi,
Ahabw'okuba ab'amaani maingi,
Bakanga kuta amaisho ahari
Orikwera wa Israeli,
N'okwehanuuza ahari MUKAMA!
Haza kunu niwe aine obwengye, kandi niwe areeta akabi,
Atahindure bi agambire,
Kureka aryaimuka arwanise enju y'enkozi z'ebibi,
N'abarikuhwera abakora ebitari by'okuhikiirira.
N'embaraasi zaabo ti myoyo, ziine emibiri kwonka.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA ku aribanga omukono gwe,
Ogwo orikuhwera aryateera entsibo, n'orikuhwerwa aryagwa;
Boona bahwerekyerere hamwe.
Ahakuba MUKAMA angizire ati:
Nk'oku entare entsigazi etontomera aha ki yaita,
Abariisa bahuruziibwe kurwana nayo,
Etatiine rwari rwabo,
N'obu kwakuba okwehiga ahabw'enduuru zaabo,
Nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arishuuma
Kurwanira aha rushozi Saayuuni n'aha kabungo kaayo.
Nikwo na MUKAMA ow'amahe aririnda Yerusaalemu;
Aryagirinda, agijune;
Aryagisaasira, agikize abazigu.
ahakuba eryo izooba ebishushani bye by'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu, ebyakozirwe engaro zaanyu, bikabarugiramu ekibi.
Kandi rurara etari y'abantu ebamareho;
Baryagihunga,
N'abatsigazi baabo babe ab'okukoresibwa n'amaani.
N'abakuru baabo baryayehwa amatsiko ahabw'orurango;
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba ou omuriro gwe guri omuri Saayuuni,
N'ekikoomi kye omuri Yerusaalemu.
N'abanyiginya baryategyekyera omu buryo.
N'obwegamo bw'eihunga,
Kandi abe nk'emigyera y'amaizi aha itaka ryomire,
N'ekicuucu ky'eibaare rihango omu nsi erikurusya.
N'amatu g'abarikuhurira garyahurira.
Omutima gw'omuntu embakuki guryagira okwetegyereza,
N'orurimi rw'orikuhebebera ruryagamba gye.
Omushema tarigaruka kwetwa ow'ekitiinisa,
N'obu yaakuba engumya kwetwa efura;
Ahabw'okuba omushema aryaguma agambe eby'obushema,
N'omutima gwe gugire enaama z'okutahikiirira,
Akore eby'okutatiina Ruhanga,
Agambe eby'okuhabisa ahari MUKAMA,
Abajara abatsigye n'enjara yaabo,
N'abaine eiriho abaime eky'okunywa.
Eby'okurwanisa by'engumya biba bibi,
Acwa obwengye bubi,
Ngu acwekyereze omworo n'ebigambo by'ebishuba,
N'obu omukyene aba naagamba ebihikire.
Kwonka efura ecwa obwengye bw'okukora eby'obufura,
Kandi obwo bufura nibwo bumubaisaho.
Naimwe baishiki bataine ki mwetaireho 'mwe, mutegye amatu eki ndikugamba.
Imwe abakazi abataine ki mwetaireho, muryamara ebiro,
Ebirikweshumba aha mwaka, mwemereize omutima;
Ahabw'okuba eibiika rya viinyo riryabura,
N'eishaaruura tiriribaho.
Imwe bakazi bajarami 'mwe, muteteme!
Imwe abataine ki mwetaireho, muhahaaze emitima,
Mujuure ebi mujwaire, mujware busha,
Mwezirikye ebiguniya.
Baryayemaamaata nibasaasibwa emisiri yaabo,
Emisiri eyaabaire ebashemeza, n'emizaabibu eyaabaire eyera munonga,
N'amaju goona agarikushemeza
Ag'omu rurembo orurikushemererwa;
Ahabw'okuba ekikaari ky'omugabe kiryatsigwaho,
Orurembo orutwirwemu abantu baingi ruhindukye amatongo,
Ekibungo n'omunaara gw'abarinzi bihindukye amaaya ebiro byona,
Amakiniro g'enturegye n'amariisizo g'amasyo,
Amahamba gakabona kuba emisiri erikweza munonga,
N'omusiri ogurikweza munonga bakagweta ekibira.
Obwo eby'oburyo biryashangwa omu ihamba,
N'okuhikiirira kushangwe omu misiri erikweza munonga.
Kandi ekiriruga omuri okwo kuhikiirira kibe okutuuza
N'amatsiko agatarikubanganisibwa ebiro byona.
Abantu bangye baryatuura omu nsi baine obusingye,
Bagume omu maju gaabo agahamire,
N'omu myanya y'okuhuumuriramu etuurize.
N'orurembo rusheenyerwe kimwe.
Mukanagurayo ente n'endogoya.
Haza otakanyagwaga,
Iwe orikugobya otakagobezibwaga!
Ku oriheza kunyaga, naiwe oryanyagwa;
Kandi ku oriheza kugobya, naiwe oryagobezibwa.
Ai MUKAMA, otugirire embabazi, tukutegyereize;
Otubeere amaani buri kasheeshe,
Kandi otubeere okujunwa omu biro by'enaku.
Amahanga gabingirwe enduuru z'okwimukirira,
Kandi oimukire, amahanga gaataataana.
Baryateerana eminyago, nk'oku kanyananga eshanguruza,
Bagyeshukyemu nk'enzigye.
Aryaijuza Saayuuni eby'oburyo n'okuhikiirira.
Okujunwa kwawe kwingi, obwengye n'okumanya;
Okutiina MUKAMA niryo itungo rya Saayuuni.
Entumwa z'okushaba obusingye nizirira munonga,
Omugyenzi takigirabamu.
Endagaano zifiire,
Baakareebi nibagaywa,
Omuntu takyetwaho.
Ensi neecura, neehwerera,
Lebanooni eshobeirwe, ehotokire;
Sharooni ni nk'eihamba,
Bashani na Karumeeli nizikunkumuka amababi.
Naaza kweta ahaiguru, nsingizibwe hati hati.
Muryatwara enda y'ebishushunga, muzaare ebitsintsi by'embuba,
Omwitsyo gwanyu gube omuriro oguribootsya.
Amahanga garyayokibwa, gacwekye einoni,
Gabe nk'oku amahwa gatemwa, gakookibwa omu muriro.
Imwe abari hare munonga, muhurire eki nkozire;
Naimwe abari haihi, mwikirize amaani gangye.
Abatarikutiina Ruhanga bakwatsirwe orutetema.
N'oha omuriitwe owaakubaasa kutuura n'omuriro gurikurya busha?
N'oha omuriitwe owaakubaasa kutuura n'omuriro gurikwotsya ebiro byona?
Orikwanga amagoba g'okuhata,
Orikukunkumura engaro ze, ngu zitakaakwata enguzi,
Orikwekwata aha matu, ngu atahurira eby'okusheesha eshagama,
Orikuhumiza amaisho ngu atareeba ekibi.
Omwanya gwe gw'okwerindiramu guryaba oguzitiirwe amabaare;
Aryaguma agaburirwe eby'okurya,
N'amaizi g'okunywa tigarimuburira.
Gareebe n'ensi eyaririkire okuhika hare.
Ogire oti: Owaabazire emitoijo,
Akagipima, arahi?
Owaabazire eminaara, we arahi?
Ery'engambo etarikwetegyerezibwa,
Ei otarikubaasa kumanya,
Ery'orurimi rw'enduga-mahanga oru otarikubaasa kuhurira.
Yetegyereze Saayuuni, orurembo oru twabaire tukoreramu amagyenyi agaatairweho;
Amaisho gaawe garyareeba Yerusaalemu,
Oshangye eri obutuuro bucureire,
Eihema ryayo tiririfururwa,
Enkondo zaaryo tizirikuurwa ebiro byona,
N'omurunga gwaryo na gumwe tiguricweka;
Omwanya gw'emigyera mihango n'emikye
Etarirabwamu maato agarikuvugisibwa engahi,
N'obu yaakuba emeeri y'ekitiinisa.
MUKAMA niwe Mugabe waitu: aryatujuna.
Emigoye yaawe eyugire,
Tekibaasa kuhamya murongooti omu mwanya gwagwo,
N'obu kwakuba okureega amatanga;
N'ahabw'ekyo eminyago n'ebinyagirwe bingi biryabaganwa,
Nangwa n'ebirema nabyo biryatwara eminyago.
Abantu abatwireyo baryasaasirwa okutahikiirira kwabo.
Imwe mahanga 'mwe, mwirire haihi, muhurire;
Naimwe abantu, mutegye amatu!
Ensi ehurire, n'ebigirimu byona,
Kandi n'ebigirugamu byona.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA agwereirwe kubi amahanga goona,
Agiriire eihe ryago ryona ekiniga.
Abacwereire orubanja kubasinga,
Yaabahayo kwitwa.
Ekinuuko ky'emitumbi yaabo kiimukye,
N'enshozi ziryatengurwa eshagama yaabo.
Eiguru riryazingwa nk'omuzingo gw'empapura,
N'amahe gaaryo goona garyahotoka
Nk'amababi g'omuzaabibu,
Nari ag'omutiini oku gahotoka, gakaragarika.
Mbwenu yaaza kushuuma Edomu
N'omu bantu abu naakyeenire, ebahane.
Yaagomorwa ebishaju
N'eshagama y'entaama n'embuzi,
N'ebishaju by'aha ntsigo z'empaya;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA yaaza kwetambirira ebitambo Bozira,
N'okwita baingi omu nsi ya Edomu.
Embogo ziryagwa ahamwe nabo,
N'ebimasha hamwe n'enimi z'ebigundu;
Ensi yaabo ejengibwe eshagama,
N'eitaka ryayo rigomorwe ebishaju.
N'omwaka gw'okubazimuurira ebi bakoreire Saayuuni.
Emigyera ya Edomu eryahinduka koroto,
N'eitaka ryayo riryaba nk'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti,
Ensi yaayo ehindukye koroto erikubira.
Omwika gwayo guryacumbuuka ebiro byona.
Okuruga aha busingye okuhika aha bundi eryaguma eri amatongo,
Tihaine origirabamu okuhitsya ryari na ryari,
Kureka empungu n'ebinyogote nibyo birigikubuura,
Ebihihizi n'ebikoona bikagituuramu;
Aryahagyeresa omugoye, nikwo kujagarara,
Na kariisho, nikwo kutsigarwamu busha.
Baryayeta abakungu baayo kwihamu omwe ow'okwemeka,
Kwonka tihaine oribayo;
N'abanyiginya baayo boona baryaba busha.
N'ebigo byayo bimerwemu ebicuragyenyi n'amatojo.
Haryaba eikoobaaniro rya zaamuha
N'obutaaho bwa zaamaaya.
Enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa ziryabugaabugana n'emishega,
N'empaya y'obwoshe eryayetana na ngyenzi yaayo,
Kandi orukooko rwa nyekiro ruryateekama okwo,
Rebonere ah'okuhuumurira.
Okwo niyo ekihihizi kiryarika, kikateera amahuri,
Kikagaatira, kikabumbatira abaana baakyo;
Kandi okwo niyo zaamareere ziriteeranira,
Buri emwe n'enkazi yaayo.
Musherure omu kitabo kya MUKAMA, mushomemu;
Omuri ebyo tiharigira na kimwe ekiriburayo,
Tiharigira na kimwe ekiribura ekikazi kyakyo;
Ahabw'okuba akanwa ka MUKAMA niko kakiragiire,
Kandi Omwoyo we niwe abiteeraine.
N'omukono gwe gwagibibaganisiza n'omugoye.
Eryaba eyaabyo ebiro byona,
Bigituuremu nk'oku obusingye burigyenda nibwihaihana.
Eihamba n'ensi eyomire biryashemererwa,
Eihamba ry'omusheenyi riryashemererwa, rirabye ebirabyo nk'esheko y'ensi.
Riryarabya ebirabyo bingi munonga,
Ryesiime, rishemererwe, ryeshongore.
Riryaheebwa ekitiinisa kya Lebanooni,
N'oburungi bwa Karumeeli na Sharooni.
Baryareeba ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA,
Oburungi bwa Ruhanga waitu.
Muhamye amaju agatahamire,
Mugambire ab'omutima gw'obwoba muti:
Mugume, murekye kutiina!
Reeba Ruhanga waanyu naija kuhoora enzigu,
Nikwo kuzimuura kwe;
Aryaija, abajune.
N'amatu g'ebifa-matu garyaigurwa;
Ekirema kiryaguruka nk'empara,
N'orurimi rw'ekiteta rweshongore ahabw'okushemererwa;
Ahabw'okuba amaizi garyafumuka omu ihamba
N'emigyera omu ihamba ry'omusheenyi;
Omusheenyi gurikwotsya guryahinduka ekiyanja,
N'ensi ekarangataine ehindukye ey'enshuro z'amaizi;
Eikobezo rya zaamuha riryaba ekisharara,
N'obunyaatsi bwaho buhindukye ekibingo n'omubimbiri.
Gwetwe Omuhanda ogurikwera.
Abatashemeire tibarigurabamu,
Kureka guryaba ogw'abagyenzi;
N'obu bariba bari abashema,
Tibariguhabiramu.
Kandi enyamaishwa yoona enshaarizi teriguzamu;
Tizirishangwayo,
Kureka abacungwirwe nibo barigugyenderamu.
Baije Saayuuni nibeeshongora,
Okushemererwa okutahwaho kuri aha maisho gaabo;
Baryagira okushemererwa n'okunanuka,
Kandi obusaasi n'okutsinda biryakwata akakiro.

Bwanyima omugabe wa Asiria, ku yaabaire akiri Lakishi, yaatuma omutware Rabushaake n'eihe rihango aha mugabe Hezekia omuri Yerusaalemu. Rabushaake ku yaahikireyo, yaayemerera aha mukura gw'ekiyanja kya ruguru, ekiri aha muhanda rugyendwa ogurikuza aha kibanja ky'omwozi.
Okwo yaashangwayo Eliakimu mwene Hilukia, owaabaire ari omukuru w'ekikaari, Shebuna omuhandiiki na Yoa mwene Asafu omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho.
Omutware Rabushaake yaabagira ati: Mugambire Hezekia muti: Oku nikwo omugabe rugambwa, omugabe wa Asira, arikugamba naagira ati: Mbwenu ou orikwesiga n'oha?
Noogira ngu ebigambo bugambo nibyo naama n'amaani by'okurwanisa? Hari ou oyegamiire hati n'oha, waaza kungomera?

Reeba, hati oyegamiire Misri, orubango oruri nk'ekibingo ekihendekire, ekirikwija kucumita ekiganja ky'omuntu weena orikukihimbagiriraho. Okwo nikwo na Faraho omugabe wa Misri ari ahari boona abarikumwesiga.

Kandi ku murangire muti: Nitwesiga MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, tiwe Ogwo ou Hezekia yaihireho emyanya ye mikuru ey'okuramizamu, n'amatambiro ge, naagira Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu ati: Mushemereire kuramiza omu maisho g'eri eitambiro eriri Yerusaalemu?
Mbwenu, ija okwatirizane na mukama wangye omugabe wa Asiria, nkuhe embaraasi enkumi ibiri; ku oraabone ab'okuzitemba, ongire kwo!
Kandi noogira ngu nyizire kuteera ensi egi n'okugicwekyereza, ntaragiirwe MUKAMA? Omanye ngu MUKAMA niwe angizire ati: Inamuka oteere egyo nsi, ogicwekyereze.

Kwonka omutware Rabushaake yaabagarukamu ati: Nimugira ngu mukama wangye antumire ahari mukama waanyu naimwe, kuba niimwe naagambira ebigambo ebi mwenka? Tantumire kubigambira n'abashaija bariya abashutami aha rugo, abarikwija kurya naimwe amazi gaabo n'okunywa naimwe enkari yaabo?
Ahonaaho omutware Rabushaake yaayemerera, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango omu rurimi rw'Abayuda, naagira ati: Muhurire obutumwa bw'omugabe rugambwa, omugabe wa Asiria.
Oku nikwo omugabe arikugamba naagira ati: Mutaikiriza Hezekia kubabeihabeiha; ahabw'okuba tarikwija kubaasa kubajuna.
Mutaikiriza Hezekia kubeesigisa MUKAMA naabagira ati: Buzimazima MUKAMA naija kutujuna, kandi orurembo oru tirurikwija kuheebwayo mu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria.

Kandi mutahurira Hezekia; ahakuba oku nikwo omugabe wa Asiria arikugamba naagira ati: Mugarukane naanye, mwije munshangye aha; obwo buri omwe omuriimwe nibwo araarye omuzaabibu gwe n'omutiini gwe, kandi akanywa amaizi g'omu iziba rye,
okuhitsya obu ndiija nkabatwara omu nsi erikushushana n'eyaanyu, ensi y'engano na viinyo, n'ey'emigaati n'emizaabibu.
Mwerinde, Hezekia atakaababeihabeiha naagira ati: MUKAMA naija kutujuna. Nimugira ngu hariho ruhanga omuri baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga orajunire ensi ye omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria?
Mbwenu baaruhanga ba Hamasi na Arupaadi barahi? Na baaruhanga ba Sefavaimu barahi? Barajunire Samaria omu mikono yangye?
Nibaahi omuri baaruhanga boona ab'ezo nsi abarajunire ensi yaabo omu mikono yangye, mukabona kwesiga ku MUKAMA arikwija kwiha Yerusaalemu omu mikono yangye?
Kwonka abantu boona baahunama, tibaagira ki baamugarukamu, ahabw'okuba ekiragiro ky'omugabe kikaba nikigira kiti: Mutamugarukamu.

Bwanyima Eliakimu mwene Hilukia, owaabaire ari mukuru w'ekikaari, Shebuna omuhandiiki, na Yoa mwene Asafu, omuhandiiki w'ebirikubaho, baija ahari Hezekia, bataagwire ebijwaro byabo, baamuteekyerereza ebigambo by'omutware Rabushaake.
Yaatuma Eliakim omukuruu w'ekikaari, Shebuna omuhandiiki n'abanyamurwa abakuru ahari nabi Isaaya mwene Amozi, bajwaire ebiguniya.
Baamugira bati: Oku nikwo Hezekia arikugamba naagira ati: Eri izooba n'eizooba ry'obusaasi n'okuhanwa n'okuteererwa enaku; ahakuba abaana bahikire kuzaarwa, kwona amaani g'okubazaara tigariho.

Shana MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe ahuriire ebigambo byona ebigambirwe omutware Rabushaake, ou mukama we omugabe wa Asiria atumire kugaya Ruhanga otahwaho; obundi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akaamuhana ahabw'ebyo bigambo ebi ahuriire. N'ahabw'ekyo imutsya eiraka ryawe, oshabire abantu abakiriho abahonokire.
Abaheereza b'omugabe Hezekia ku baahikire owa Isaaya,
yaabagira ati: Mugambire mukama waanyu muti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Otatiina ebyo bigambo ebi ohuriire, ebi abaheereza b'omugabe wa Asiria banjumire.
Reeba, niinyija kumutamu ogundi mutima, ahurire orukuru, agarukye omu nsi ye; kandi ku araahikyeyo, mmwitse rurara.
Bwanyima omutware Rabushaake yaagarukayo, yaashanga omugabe wa Asiria naarwanisa Libuna; ahabw'okuba akaba ahuriire ku arugire Lakishi.
Omugabe yaahurira ebya Tiruhaaka omugabe wa Esiopia, nibagira bari, Reeba, aizire kukuteera. Ku yaakihuriire, yaagaruka yaatuma ahari Hezekia naagira ati:
Oku nikwo muraagire Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda muti: Otaikiriza Ruhanga waawe ogwo, ou orikwesiga, kukubeiha naakuraganisa ati: Yerusaalemu teriheebwayo mu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria.
Ohuriire oku abagabe ba Asiria baagizire ensi zoona, bakazicwekyerereza kimwe. Noogira ngu niiwe orikwija kukira?
Amahanga aga, Gozani, Harani, Rezefu, n'ab'omuri Edeni abaabaire batwire Telasaari, agu baatatenkuru baacwekyereize, noogira ngu baaruhanga baago bakagajuna?
Nyoreka omugabe wa Hamasi, owa Arupaadi, ow'orurembo rwa Sefavaimu, owa Hena, n'owa Iiva!
Hezekia yaayakiira ebaruha eyaareetsirwe ezo ntumwa, yaagishoma; bwanyima yainamuka, yaaza omu nju ya MUKAMA, yaagimushashaanurira omumaisho.
Hezekia yaashabira omu maisho ga MUKAMA naagira ati:
Ai MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, otuura aha kitebe ky'obukama ahagati ya baakerubi, iwe wenka niiwe Ruhanga w'obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi; niiwe waahangire eiguru n'ensi.
Ai MUKAMA, tega okutu kwawe; igura amaisho gaawe, MUKAMA, oreebe, ohurire ebigambo ebi Senakeribu atumire kurogota ahari Ruhanga otahwaho.
N'ekya buzima, ai MUKAMA, abagabe ba Asiria bakacwekyereza abantu b'ago mahanga n'ensi zaabo,
baanaga baaruhanga baabo omu muriro, ahabw'okuba bakaba batari baaruhanga nyamuhanga, kureka bakaba bakozirwe engaro z'abantu, omu biti n'omu mabaare; nikyo baacwekyerereziibwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati, MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, ninkweshengyereza otujune, otwihe omu mikono ye, obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi bumanye ku niiwe wenka oba MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Isaaya mwene Amozi yaatuma ahari Hezeki naagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okunshaba kukuhwera aha bya Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria,
eki nikyo kigambo eki MUKAMA amugambireho naagira ati:
Saayuuni oshugaine naakugaya, naakushekyerera;
Na Yerusaalemu naakuzongoreza omutwe.
N'oha ou ojumire, okarogotaho?
Kandi ou okabukiire, okateera ekitsyori n'oha?
N'Orikwera wa Israeli!
Noogira oti: Nyinamukire n'ebigaari byangye bingi
Aha mitwe y'enshozi
Hare munonga ahagati ya Lebanooni.
Niinyija kutema emyereezi yaayo emiraingwa
N'emiberooshi yaayo emirungi munonga;
Niinyija kuhika omu bweshereko bwayo hare munonga,
Omu kibira kyayo ekikwataine.
Nkatimba amaziba, naanywa amaizi gaago;
Naaribatiirira emigyera ya Misri yoona,
Naagyomya.
Torahuriire ku naamaririire ira kukikora?
Omu biro bya ira nkacuma enaama y'okukora
Ebi ndikuhikiiriza omu biro ebi,
Ngi ocwekyereze endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare,
Ozihindure amatongo.
Nikyo kyareeteire abazitwiremu kucweka entegye,
Bakahahaaza emitima, bakarimbagirirwa,
Bakaba nk'obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa,
Nk'obunyaatsi buto,
Bakahotoka nk'obunyaatsi obumezire aha mutwe gw'enju,
Nk'omusiri gw'engano ezitakakuzire.
Kwonka nimmanya emishutamire yaawe,
Emihururire yaawe n'emitabaarukire yaawe,
Kandi n'ekiniga eki wangiriire.
Kandi nkahurira eby'amaryo gaawe,
Niinyija kukuta eirobo ryangye omu nyindo,
N'ekyoma kyangye omu kanwa,
Nkugarure omuhanda gwakureetsire.

Kandi aka karyakubeera akamanyiso; omu mwaka ogu nimwija kurya ebyemerize, omu gwa kabiri murye ebyemerize eby'emiragarika y'ebyo; bwanyima omu mwaka gwa kashatu muryabiba mugyeshe, mubyare emizzaabibu, murye ebijuma byayo.
Kandi abaatsigaire aha b'enju ya Yuda abaahonokireho, baryagaruka batsimbe emizi okuzimu, n'ahaiguru baane ebyana;
ahabw'okuba omuri Yerusaalemu haryarugamu ekicweka ekiriba kitsigaireho, n'aha rushozi Saayuuni harugyeho omutwe gw'abaahonokireho. Obweziriki bwa MUKAMA buryakihikiiriza.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugambira aha mugabe wa Asiria, ati: Tarihika muri oru rurembo, nari okururashamu omwambi, nari okurwemurikira omumaisho aine engabo ye, n'obu kwakuba okurutuumaho omutuumo gw'eitaka.
Omuhanda ogwamureetsire nigwo gurimugarurayo, kandi taritaaha muri oru rurembo, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Ahakuba ndyarinda oru rurembo, ndujune ahabwangye n'ahabw'omwiru wangye Daudi.
Bwanyima Senakeribu omugabe wa Asiria yaarugayo, yaagaruka Nineeve, yaatuurayo.

Ku yaabaire ari omuri nyaruju ya ruhanga we Nisirooki naamuramya, Adurameleki na Sharezeeri abatabani baija, baamwitsa rurara, baacwa, baahungira omu nsi ya Araraati. Esari-hadooni omutabani yaategyeka omu mwanya gwe.
Ahonaaho Hezekia yaahinduka, yaareeba ekisiika, yaashaba MUKAMA naagira ati:
Ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza ijuka hati oku ngyendeire omu maisho gaawe omu bwesigwa n'omutima oguhikire, ninkora ebi orikusiima. Yaarira munonga.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Isaaya nikigira kiti:

Garukayo ogambire Hezekia oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Daudi shwenkuru, arikugamba naagira ati: Naahurira okushaba kwawe, kandi naareeba n'amarira gaawe; reeba, niinyija kukwongyeraho emyaka ikumi n'etaano.
Ndyakujuna, iwe n'orurembo oru, omu mikono y'omugabe wa Asiria, kandi ndyarurinda.

Reeba, ekicuucu eky'aha ky'okugyeresa kya Ahazi, ekirikureetwa eizooba eririkurenga, niinyija kukigarura enyima entambwe ikumi. Rityo eizooba ryaiha aha ryaba ryahika nirirenga, ryagaruka enyima entambwe ikumi ez'aha ky'okugyeresa ekyo.
Ebi Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda yaahandiikire, obu yaarwara, akakira, nibyo ebi.
Nkiri ahagati y'emyaka yangye,
Naaza kuraba omu marembo g'okuzimu,
Ncwirweho emyaka yangye.
Omu nsi y'abahuriire;
Tindigaruka kucwa muntu riisho
Omu bantu abatwire omu nsi.
Nk'eihema ry'omuriisa w'entaama;
Nzingire amagara gangye nk'omuruki w'emyenda,
Naija kuncwa aha biti by'okurukiraho emyenda.
Okwiha omu kasheehse okuhitsya nyekiro, ommariramu kimwe amaani.
Nindaara nintaka ngu mpwerwe okuhitsya omu kasheeshe,
Kwonka noohenda amagufa gangye goona nk'entare.
Okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya nyekiro, ommariramu kimwe amaani.
Ninganya nk'enkombe;
amaisho gangye garuhire ahabw'okugwa ahaiguru gategyereize.
Ai MUKAMA, niinyitwa kubi, onyemererere.
Mbwenu ngambe ki? Ahabw'okuba niwe anyegambiriire,
Kandi niwe akikozire.
Oturo tungurukire ahabw'obushaarizi bw'omu mutima.
Ai Mukama, ebyo nibyo bibaisaho abantu,
Kandi omuri ebyo byona nimwo amagara g'omwoyo gwangye gari.
Naakweshengyereza ngaruramu amagara, ombaiseho!
Ngu bundugiremu obusingye.
Kwonka ahabw'okunkunda waazibira amagara gangye
Kugwa omu kiina ky'okuhwerekyerereramu;
Ahabw'okuba ebibi byangye byona
Obyenagire enyima.
Rufu terikubaasa kukuhimbisa;
Abo abashuuma okuzimu tibarikubaasa
Kuta amatsiko aha bwesigwa bwawe.
Nk'oku ndikukusiima eri izooba;
Omuzaire w'abaana abamanyisa obwesigwa bwawe.
MUKAMA naija kunjuna,
N'ahabw'ekyo nitwija kuguma nitweshongorera omu nju ya MUKAMA
Ebyeshongoro ebi naagunzire,
Nitubyeshongorera aha nanga z'emiraya
Ebiro byona eby'amagara gaitu.
Obwo Isaaya akaba agizire ngu, Bareete ekitongye ky'emitiini, bakibatikye aha kizimba, akire.
Na Hezekia akaba agizire ati: Ni kamanyiso ki akarikummanyisa ku ndaije kwinamuka omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Hezekia yaazaakiira n'okushemererwa, yaazooreka enju ye yoona omu abiika ebintu bye eby'obuguzi bwingi, efeeza, ezaabu emigaju, amajuta g'obuguzi bwingi, n'ahu abiika eby'okurwanisa bye, n'ebyashangirwe omu mabiikiro ge byona. Tihariho kintu na kimwe omu nju ye nari omu bugabe bwe bwona, eki atarazoorekire.
Bwanyima nabi Isaaya yaija aha mugabe Hezekia, yaamugira: Abashija abo bagambire ki? Kandi beizire onaawen'baruga hi yaagira ati: Barugahi? Hezekia yaagira ati: Barugire omu nsi ya hare Babulooni.
Onu ati: Bareebire ki omwawe? Hezekia yaagarukamu ati: Byona ebiri omwangye babireebire; tihariho kintu kyona omu mabiikiro gangye eki ntaboorekire.
Isaaya yaagira Hezikia ati: Mbwenu hurira ekigmbo kya MUKAMA ow'amahe.
Reeba, obunaku buryahika, ebintu by'omu nju yaawe byona, n'ebi baashwenkuru baabiikire okuhitsya hati, bitwarwe Babulooni, harekye kugira ekyatsigaraho, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi bamwe ahari batabani baawe, abu oriba oyezaariire, baryatwarwa, bahindukye abakonwa omu kikaari ky'omugabe wa Babulooni.
Bwanyima Hezekia yaagira Isaaya ati: Ekigambo kya MUKAMA eki waagamba ni kirungi. Ahakuba Hezekia ogwo akagira ati: Niho harikwija kubaho obusingye n'obuhooro omu biro byangye.
Muhuumurize abantu bangye, mubahuumurize,
Nikwo Ruhanga waanyu arikugira.
Mugirangire n'eiraka rihango,
Ku engamba zaayo zihweire,
Ku okutahikiirira kwayo kusaasirwe,
Kandi ku MUKAMA agihaire kabiri ekifubiro
Neeturwa ebibi byayo byona.
Mushemeze omuhanda gwa MUKAMA omu ihamba,
Mugororere MUKAMA omuhanda rugyendwa omu ihamba ry'omusheenyi.
N'enshozi zoona n'ebibungo biryabandikwa;
Ebitegami biryagororwa,
N'emyanya etaringaniire eryaringanizibwa,
Kandi ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kiryashuuruurwa,
Abantu boona bakireebere hamwe,
Ahakuba akanwa ka MUKAMA niko kaakigamba.
Naanye naagira ati: Ndangye ki?
Emibiri yoona eba nk'obunyaatsi,
N'oburungi bwayo bwona buba nk'orurabyo rw'obunyaatsi.
Obunyaatsi buhonga, n'orurabyo ruhunduura,
Ahakuba MUKAMA arwikiza omwitsyo gwe.
Buzimazima abantu n'obunyaatsi.
Kwonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga waitu kiryagumaho ebiro byona.
Irooko otembe orushozi ruraingwa;
Iwe Yerusaalemu, orikuranga amakuru marungi,
Imutsya eiraka ryawe n'amaani;
Riimutsye, orekye kutiina;
Ogambire endembo za Yuda oti:
Reeba Ruhanga waanyu!
Naategyekyesa omukono gwe;
Reeba, naija aine ebihembo,
N'enzimuurano ye emwebembeire.
Aryakiikira abaana b'entaama ze omu mikono,
Abatwarire omu kifuba kye,
N'ezirikuhaka azishotoore.
Akateera eiguru ekita,
Akata omucuucu gw'ensi yoona omu ndengo,
Akapima enshozi n'ebibungo aha minzaani?
Akamwegyesa nk'omuhi w'obwengye we?
Kandi n'oha oramwegyeise emihanda y'eby'oburyo,
Akamwegyesa okumanya n'okwetegyereza?
Kandi nigagyeranisibwa n'omucuucu gw'aha minzaani;
Reeba, akiriza ebirwa nk'orikukiriza akantu kakye munonga.
Kandi n'enyamaishwa zaayo tizikaamara kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Ahariwe ni busha, nangwa nigabarwa nk'agarikukirwa busha.
Nari mukaamushushanisa na kintu ki?
Omuheesi w'ezaabu akishweka ezaabu,
Kandi akiheeshera emikuufu y'efeeza.
Asherura ekiti ekitarikujunda,
Bwanyima ayesherurira omukozi omunyamwoga
Kutaho ekishushani ekibaizirwe ekitarikubaasa kugwa.
Timukakigambirwaga okuruga iranaira?
Timukeetegyerezaga okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi?
N'abagituuramu bakaba nk'eseenene,
Niwe abamba eiguru nk'omukingo,
Akariteera nk'eihema ry'okuraaramu,
Akahindura abategyeki b'omu nsi busha.
Ekitsintsi kyabo nikikitsimba emizi omu itaka,
Ruhanga akibahuuha, bahotoka,
Akasooroora kabatwara nk'ekumbwe.
N'oha ou mwakungyeranisa nawe
Tukaingana?
Nikwo Orikwera arikubuuza.
Mwimutsye amaisho gaanyu ahaiguru, mureebe;
N'oha owaahangire biriya?
Niwe Ogwo oshohoza amahe gaabyo omu mitwe,
Byona akabyeta omu maziina;
Ahabw'obukuru bw'amaani ge,
Kandi ahabw'okuba ow'amaani omu bushoboorozi,
Tihariho na kimwe ekibuzireho.
Iwe Yakobo, ningira Israeli, ahabw'enki nooyesaasira noogra oti:
Omuhanda gwangye gusherekirwe MUKAMA, tarikugureeba,
Kandi n'ebyangye Ruhanga wangye tarikubyetaho?
MUKAMA ni Ruhanga otahwaho,
Owaahangire emperu z'ensi.
Tagwa nshazi, n'obu kwakuba okuruha;
Okucondooza obwengye bwe tikurikubaasika.
Abarikugwa enshazi abaha amaani,
Kandi n'otarikwebaasa, amwongyeraho amaani.
Abarikunyeeta baryawa enshazi, baruhe,
N'abatsigazi baryaghweramu kimwe amaani,
Baryagarukwamu amaani,
Batumbiikye ahaiguru n'amapapa nk'amashamba,
Baryairuka, tibariruha,
Baryagyenda, tibarigwa nshazi.
K'amahanga gagarukwemu amaani;
Gairire haihi, gagambe;
Twena tuteeranire hamwe, tushoboororane.
Otuura naasingura ahi aza hoona?
Ahayo amahanga omu maisho ge,
Ngu abone kuribatiirira abagabe;
Abahindura omucuucu na rurara ye,
Abagira ebishushunga ebirikutwarwa omuyaga n'obuta bwe.
Ababinga, arabaho n'obusingye,
Naaraba omu mihanda ei atakaribatamuga.
Akeeta abantu, nk'oku obusingye bwabo bwabaire nibukuratana,
Okwiha aha kutandika?
Nyowe MUKAMA, ow'okubanza,
Kandi ow'aha muheru. Niinye naakikozire.
Ebirwa bikareeba, byatiina,
Emperu z'ensi zaatetema;
Byairira haihi, byaija.
Buri muntu naahwera mutaahi we,
Naagira mwene ishe ati: Guma!
N'orikuteteza ekyoma n'enyondo agumya orikuheesha, naagira ati:
Ebyoma twabiteerana gye.
Bwanyima babihamya n'emisomaari,
Ngu birekye kujegajega.
Yakobo ou naatooraine,
Oruzaaro rwa Abrahamu munywani wangye;
Iwe ou naayetsire nkaiha aha muheru gw'ensi,
Kandi nkakwiha aha nshonda zaayo za hare,
Ninkugira nti: Ori omwiru wangye;
Nkakutoorana, tindakucwire.
Otahahaaza omutima, ahabw'okuba ndi Ruhanga waawe.
Ndyakuha amaani, ndyakuhwera,
Nkuramire n'omukono gwangye gwa buryo ogw'obusinguzi.
Reeba, abakwiniire ekiniga boona
Baryakwatwa enshoni, bashoberwe;
Abo abarikukurwanisa
Baryacweka busha, bahwerekyerere.
Kandi abarikukurwanisa baryacweka busha, babe nk'ebitariho.
Ahabw'okuba nyowe, MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Ndyakukwata omukono gwa buryo,
Nkugire nti: Otatiina,
Naija kukuhwera.
Naimwe bantu ba Israeli 'mwe,
Ndyabahwera, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Omucunguzi waanyu niwe Orikwera wa Israeli.
Ky'obwogi, kandi eky'amaino;
Oryahuura enshozi, ozaatagure,
Kandi ebibungo obihindure ebishushunga.
N'eihunga ribitaatanise;
Oryayesiimira omuri MUKAMA,
Oyeraatire omuri Orikwera wa Israeli
Gaababurira, orurimi rwabakarangatana,
Nyowe, MUKAMA, ndyabagarukamu;
Nyowe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, tindibahemukaho.
Ndyaigura emigyera aha bibungo by'emparamaata,
N'enshuro ahagati y'empanga,
Mpindure eihanga ekiyanja ky'amaizi,
N'ensi ekarangataine ngihindure enshuro z'amaizi,
Eminyinya, emikadasi, n'emizeituuni;
Kandi n'omu ihamba ry'omusheenyi ndyabyaramu emiberoohsi,
Emikadasi n'emiteyashuuri, bikurire hamwe,
Bateekateekye, beetegyereze hamwe,
Ku omukono gwa MUKAMA nigwo gukikozire,
Kandi Orikwera wa Israeli ku niwe yaakihangire.
Nimutongane orubanja rwanyu, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba,
Mureete ebi murikuhamizaho, nikwo Mukama wa Yakobo arikugamba.
Mutugambire ebyabaireho, nk'oku byabaire biri,
Tubiteekateekyeho,
Tumanye obugarukiro bwabyo;
Nari mutugambire ebirikwenda kubaho,
Tumanye ku muri baaruhanga buzima;
Mukore kurungi, nari kubi,
Tubireebe, emitima etuhwe omunda, tutiine.
Kandi timwine ki mwakukora;
Owaakuba niimwe yaihamu, akaaba ekihagaro.
Mbwenu yaija.
Yaaruga oburugwa-izooba, omuntu orikurahira eiziina ryangye;
Aryaribatiirira abategyeki, nk'orikukaata obudongo,
Kandi nk'omubumbi oku akaata eibumba.
Owaakirangire okwiha aha kutandika, ngu tukimanye, n'oha,
Akakihanuuraho ira, tukabona kugira ngu ahikire?
Tihariho owaakirangire, tihariho owaakigambire,
N'obu yaakuba owaahuriire ebigambo byanyu.
Nkatuma Yerusaalemu entumwa
Y'okubagambira ebigambo birungi.
Kwonka ku ndikureebayo, nshaga hatariyo muntu n'omwe;
Nangwa n'omuri baaruhanga abo, ku ndikubuuza,
Nshanga hatarimu muhi w'obwengye,
Orikubaasa kungarukamu.
Reeba, boona n'entakimazire,
Emirimo yaabo ni busha,
N'ebishushani byabo ebiyagiibwe, n'omuyaga musha.
Ou naatooraine, ou omutima gwangye gushemerererwa;
Mmutaireho Omwoyo wangye;
Aryareetera amahanga eby'oburyo.
Taritongana, tariyomba,
N'eiraka rye tiririhurirwa mu mihanda.
N'orurimi orurikwaka kubi tariruraaza;
Aryayoreka eby'oburyo omu mazima.
Okuhitsya obu ariteeraho kimwe eby'oburyo omu nsi;
N'ebirwa biryategyereza ebiragiro bye.
Owaahangire eiguru, akaribamba,
Owaashashaanwire ensi, akagibuzya ebigirugamu.
Abantu baamwo akabaha omwitsyo,
N'abarikugigyendamu akabaha omwoyo.
Ndyakukwata omukono, ndyakurinda,
Nkuhe okuba endagaano y'abantu
N'omushana gw'okumurikira amahanga,
Okwiha embohe omu kihome,
N'abashutami omu mwirima, okubaiha omu nju y'embohe.
Ekitiinisa kyangye tindikiha ondiijo,
N'obu kwakuba okuha ebishushani ebibaizirwe okuhimbisibwa kwangye.
Hati nimbarangira ebisya,
Nimbibagambira bitakabaireho.
Naimwe abari aha muheru gw'ensi, mweshongore eby'okumusingiza!
Reka enyanja ehinde n'ebigirimu byona,
N'ebirwa n'ababitwiremu.
Ka eihamba n'endembo zaamwo biimutsye amaraka gaabyo,
N'ebirwa ebitwirwemu Abakedari;
Abatuuzi ba Seela beeshongore ahabw'okushemererwa,
Bateerere akaari aha mitwe y'ebibungo.
Bahe MUKAMA ekitiinisa,
Baruangy eokuhimbisibwa kwe omu birwa.
Aryaimutsya ekiniga kye, nk'omushaija omanyiire engamba,
Ahigye, agambe n'eiraka rihango,
Ayeyorekye abazigu be ku ari emanzi.
Mmazire omwanya muhango mpunami,
Ntarikuteeza, kandi nyegumize;
Hati naaza kutaka nk'omukazi orikurumwa,
Mpeere, nsheemeekye.
Nyomye obunyaatsi bwabyo bwona;
Kandi emigyera ndyagihindura ebirwa
N'ebiyanja mbyomye.
Nzitooze omuhanda ogu zitarikamanya,
Nzirabye omu tuhanda otu zitakamanyaga.
Ndyahindura omwirima omushana omu maisho gaazo,
N'emyanya etaringaniire ngiringaanize.
Ebyo ndyabikora, tindibahemukaho.
Bakagira ebishushani ebiyagiibwe bati:
Niimwe baaruhanga baitu,
Baryagarurwa enyima, bahemurirwe kimwe.
Imwe bifa-matu 'mwe, muhurire;
Naimwe empumi, mubuuruure mubone kuhweza!
N'oha ori empumi okwihaho omuheereza wangye,
Nari ekifa-matu nk'entumwa ei ndikutuma?
N'oha ohumire nk'owangye owaayehaireyo,
Nari empumi nk'omuheereza wa MUKAMA?
Amatu ge gaigwire, kwonka tarikuhurira.
MUKAMA ahabw'okuhikiirira kwe akasiima
Kukuza ebiragiro bye n'okubiha ekitiinisa.
Abantu baamwo boona bagwire omu busya,
Kandi basherekirwe omu bihome.
Bahindukire enkwatwa, baabura kijuna,
Baaba eminyago, baabura owaagira ati: Mubibagarurire.
Akataho omutima kuhurira eby'obunaku oburiija?
N'oha owaahaireyo Yakobo kunyagwa,
Kandi akahayo Israeli omu bambuzi?
Ti MUKAMA ou twacumwireho,
Kandi ou bataraikiriize kugyendera mu mihanda ye,
N'okworobera ebiragiro bye?
N'engamba z'amaani,
Kikamwotsya embaju zoona, kwonka atakimanye,
Kikamubabura, kwonka atakyeteho.
Kandi akakubumba, iwe Israeli, naagira ati:
Otatiina, ahabw'okuba nkakucungura,
Naakweta omu iziina, ori owangye.
Ku oriraba omu migyera, terikutwara;
Ku origyendera omu muriro, torisya,
N'ebirimi byagwo tibirikubabura.
Orikwera wa Israeli, kandi Omujuni waawe.
Nkahayo Misri kuba eky'okukucungura,
Esiopia na Seeba nkazihayo ahabwawe.
Ahabw'okuba okambeera enkora-mutima,
Waaba ow'okuheebwa ekitiinisa, naanye naakukunda,
Nikyo ndiheerayo abantu ahabwawe,
N'amahanga ahabw'amagara gaawe.
Ndyareeta oruzaaro rwawe, ndwihe oburugwa-izooba.
Ndyagambira obukiizi-bwa-bumosho nti: Barekure!
N'obukiizi-bwa-buryo nti: Otabaanyima;
Ndeetera batabani bangye barugye hare,
Na bahara bangye barugye aha muheru gw'ensi,
Buri muntu weena orikwetererwa eiziina ryangye,
Ou naahangire kumpaisa ekitiinisa.
Eego niinye naamuhangire, kandi niinye naamubumbire.
Kandi abaine amatu, kwonka gafiire.
K'amahanga goona gateeranire hamwe,
Enganda zoona ziteerane.
Bakatworeka ebyabaireho ira?
Ka bareete baakareebi, basingye orubanja,
Babone kuhurira, bagire bati: N'eky'amazima.
Muri baakareebi b'okuhamya ebyangye,
Ngu mubone kummanya, muunyikirize,
Mwetegyereze ku ndi We.
Ntakabaireho, tihariho ruhanga orabaireho,
Kandi tihariho oribaho akankurata.
Kandi tihariho ondiijo mujuni kureka nyowe.
Niinye naarangire eby'okujunwa, nkabyoreka,
Obwo hatariho ruhanga w'enduga-mahanga omuriimwe.
Nikyo mubeereire baakareebi bangye b'okukihamya,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Niinyija kuguma ndi We.
Kandi tihariho orikubaasa kwiha ekintu kyona omu mikono yangye;
Niinyija kukora; n'oha orikubaasa kukizibira?
Orikwera wa Israeli naagira ati:
Ahabwanyu ndyatuma Babulooni,
Nshuumye abaayo boona bari empungi,
Nibo Bakaludaaya, bahungye n'emeeri zaabo
Ezi baabaire nibeesiimira.
Ndi MUKAMA, Orikwera waanyu,
Omuhangi wa Israeli, kandi Mukama waanyu.
Orabya omuhanda omu nyanja,
N'akahanda omu maizi maingi,
N'eihe ry'engabo, n'abarwani b'engamba;
Babyama hamwe, tibabaasa kwimuka,
Baraazibwa nk'oku baraaza orumuri;
N'ebyahingwire, murekye kubyetaho.
Hati kyaza kwatuka; timurikukireeba?
Ndyarabya omuhanda omu ihamba,
N'emigyera omu ihamba ry'omusheenyi.
Ziryampa ekitiinisa,
Ahabw'okuba nindeeta amaizi omu ihamba,
N'emigyera omu ihamba ry'omusheenyi
Kunywaisa abantu bangye abatoorainwe,
Ngu bamanyise eby'okuhimbisibwa kwangye.
Kwonka, iwe Yakobo, torantakiire,
Iwe Israeli, okantamwa!
Kandi tompaisize kitiinisa bitambo byawe.
Tinkuhenzire n'emitoijo,
N'obu kwakuba okukurusya n'obubaane bw'okuunyokyeza.
Kandi tonyigutsize bishaju by'ebitambo byawe,
Kureka ompenzire n'ebibi byawe,
Wandusya n'eby'okutahikiirira byawe.
Ebicumuro byawe, nkakwesaasirira,
Kandi ebibi byawe tindibiijuka.
Tongana ebyawe, obone kusinga.
N'abatonganizi baawe bancumuraho,
Nkagira Yakobo ekijumo,
Na Israeli eky'okukyeenwa.
Iwe Israeli ou naatooraine, hurira!
Kandi origuma naakuhwera, naagira ati:
Otatiina, iwe Yakobo omwiru wangye,
Yeshuruuni ou naatooraine,
N'emigyera aha itaka ryomire.
Ndyashika Omwoyo wangye aha ruzaaro rwawe,
Na baijukuru baawe mbahe omugisha.
Oku emera omu bunyaatsi.
Ondi ayeyeterere Yakobo,
N'ondiijo ayehandiikire n'omukono gwe ku ari owa MUKAMA,
Ayekubye Israeli.
MUKAMA, Mukama wa Israeli,
MUKAMA ow'amahe omucunguzi we, naagira ati:
Ndi ow'okubanza kandi ow'aha muheru;
Tihariho Ruhanga ondiijo kureka nyowe.
Akirangye, akyorekye omu maisho gangye.
Abaarangire ira ebirikwenda kwija nibaahi?
Nibatugambire ebirikwija kubaho.
Tiinye naabagambiire okuruga ira,
Nkabibamanyisa?
Naimwe muri baakareebi bangye!
Hariho Ruhanga ondiijo okwihaho nyowe?
Tihariho Rukiri ondiijo; tiinyine ondiijo weena ou ndukumanya.
N'oha orabaizire ekishushani kya ruhanga, nari oraheeesire ekishushani ekiyagiibwe ekitaine mugasho?
Reeba, bagyenzi be boona baryakwatwa enshoni, ahabw'okuba abanyamyoga baabyo n'abantu-buntu; ka boona bateeranire hamwe, beemerere; haza oreebe ku baitwa obwoba, enshoni zikababumbira hamwe.
Omuheesi akijugutirira omu makara, bwanyima akiteeza enyondo, akiheeshesa omukono gwe gw'amaani; kwonka ku agira enjara, ahwamu amaani; ku abura amaizi, agwa enshazi.
Omubaizi areega omugoye, aharaatuzaho ekaraamu akibaija n'embaijo, akigyeresamu ekyoma ekirikugyera, akishushanisa n'omuntu, kigira oburungi nk'obw'omuntu, kiguma omu nju.
Atema emyereezi, nari atooranamu omuzo nari omwela, agureka gukurira omu miti y'omu kibira; kandi abyara omuberooshi, enjura egwitirira.

Bwanyima gurugamu enku z'abantu; omuntu aihaho omuganda, agwota; ahemba omuriro, ateeka eby'okurya; kandi agubaijamu ekishushani kya ruhanga, akiramya, akihindura ekishushani ekirikuramibwa, akijuumara omumaisho.
Empimbi yaagwo agihemba; endiijo agyokyesa enyama, agirya, ahaaga; kandi ogwo muriro agaruka agwota, agira ati: Ayaayaaya, eshi naabona akariro, naahwa embeho!
Bwanyima empimbi eyatsigaraho agibaijamu ruhanga we, nikyo kishushani kye ekibaizirwe, akijuumara omumaisho, akiramya, akishaba ati: Nkiza; ahabw'okuba ori ruhanga wangye.
Tibaine ki barikumanya; kandi tibagira ki bateekateeka; ahakuba akabahumya amaisho, tibarikubaasa kureeba, yaabaita omutima, tibarikubaasa kwetegyereza.

Tihariho orikuteekateeka, tihariho orikumanya nari orikwetegyereza, akagira ati: Ekicweka kyagwo nkihembire, amakara gaakyo naagateekyesa omugaati, naayootsyaho enyama, naagirya; mbwenu ekitsigaireho nkihindure ekirikuzira, njuumare omu maisho g'empimbi y'ekiti, ngiramye?
Omuntu ogwo arya eiju, ahabisiibwe omutima ogurikwebeiha; tarikubaasa kwejuna nari okugira ati: Eki nyine omu mukono gwangye gwa buryo, ti ky'ebishuba?
Ahabw'okuba ori omwiru wangye.
Niinye naakuhangire; ori omwiru wangye.
Buzimazima Israeli, tindikwebwa.
Nkwerwireho ebicumuro byawe nk'ekicu,
N'ebibi byawe nk'oruho;
Ngarukira, ahabw'okuba nkakucungura.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe yaakikozire;
Iwe Okuzimu, gamba munonga;
Imwe enshozi, muteere akaari, mweshongore;
Naiwe Kibira 'we, n'emiti yoona erimu!
Ahakuba MUKAMA acungwire Yakobo,
Kandi aryaheebwa ekitiinisa omuri Israeli.
MUKAMA Omucunguzi waawe,
Owaakworoire okwiha obu waazaarwa, naagira ati:
Niinye MUKAMA, owaahangire ebintu byona,
Nkabamba eiguru nyenka,
Nkashashaanura ensi. N'oha ou naabaire nyine?
N'abafumu nkabahindura abashema,
Nkagarura enyima abanyabwengye,
Okumanya kwabo nkakuhindura obushema.
Nkahikiiriza enaama y'entumwa zangye,
Nkagamba ahari Yerusaalemu nti: Eryatuurwamu,
N'endembo z'omuri Yuda nti: Ziryayombekwa.
Kandi ndyagaruraho emyanya yaamwo eyaahindukire amatongo.
Kandi ndyayomya emigyera yaawe;
Aryahikiiriza ebi ndikwenda byona;
N'ahari Yerusaalemu nti: Eryayombekwa;
N'ahari hekalu nti: Omusingi gwawe guryateebwaho.
Ou naashukireho amajuta, Kuuro,
Ou naakwatsire omukono gwa buryo,
Ngu mmugomoorere amahanga,
Nzirikuurure abagabe,
Mmwigurire enyigi,
Amarembo garekye kukingwa;
Ahataringaniire mparingaanize;
Ndyahendagura enyigi z'emiringa,
N'empimbi z'ebyoma nzihirimburemu kabiri.
N'ebintu ebibiikirwe omu myanya y'omu mubonano,
Obone kumanya ku niinye MUKAMA,
Ruhanga wa Israeli, okwetsire omu iziina.
Israeli ou naatooraine,
Nkwetsire omu iziina, naakukubya ekikubyo,
N'obu oraabe otakammanyaga.
Niinye MUKAMA, tihariho ondiijo,
Kandi tihariho Ruhanga ondiijo, kureka nyowe.
Ndyaguma nkuzirikye, n'obu oraabe otakammanyaga,
Babone kumanya ku hatariho ondiijo, okwihaho nyowe.
Niinye MUKAMA, tihariho ondiijo.
Nkareeta obusingye n'enaku;
Niinye MUKAMA okora ebyo byona.
N'akaabunga kashukye okuhikiirira,
Ensi eigukye, okujunwa kushohore,
Kandi kumeremu okuhikiirira.
Nyowe MUKAMA, niinye owaabihangire.
Haza nawe ari orugusyo omu zindi!
Nimugira ngu eibumba rikaabuuza orikuribumba riti:
Nombumbamu ki?
Nari eki arikukora kimugira kiti: Toine ngaro?
Aryakareeba orikubuuza ishe ati: Noozaara ki?
Akagaruka akabuuza nyina ati: Noorumwa ki?
Kandi Omuhangi we arikugira ati:
Mukambuurize eby'abaana bangye,
Nari mundagiira oku ndatwaze ebi ndikukora n'emikono yangye?
Emikono yangye niyo yaabambire eiguru,
N'amahe gaaryo goona nkagategyeka.
Kandi ndyagorora emihanda ye yoona.
Aryayombeka orurembo rwangye,
Arekure abantu bangye abaanyagirwe,
Ataguririirwe, n'obu kwakuba okuheebwa ebihembo.
Nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba.
Abatungi ba Misri n'abashuubuzi ba Esiopia,
N'aba Seeba, abashaija baraingwa,
Baryaija ahariiwe, babe abaawe, bakukuratire;
Baryaija omu njegyere, bakwinamire,
Bakweshengyereze nibagira bati:
Ruhanga ari hamwe naiwe wenka;
Tihariho Ruhanga ondiijo kureka We.
Ai Ruhanga wa Israeli, Omujuni,
Buzimazima ori Ruhanga orikweshereka.
Abarikukora ebishushani boona baryaitwa enshoni,
Bashoberwe, baburaburirirwe hamwe.
Batungye okujunwa okutahwaho;
Timuriitwa nshoni, kandi timurishoberwa
Okuhiitsya ryari na ryari.
Owaahangire eiguru, (niwe Ruhanga)
Akahanga ensi, akagibumburika,
Kandi akagihamya.
(Taragihangire etari mu buteeka,
Kureka akagihanga kutuurwamu.)
Naagira ati: Niinye MUKAMA; tihariho ondiijo.
Omu nsi y'omwirima;
Tinkagiraga ruzaaro rwa Yakobo nti:
Munsherurire busha.
Nyowe MUKAMA ngamba amazima,
Ndanga ebihikire.
Mweteerane, mwije,
Mwirire haihi hamwe.
Abagyenda n'ebishushani byabo by'ebiti,
Bakaguma nibashaba ruhanga otarikubaasa kujuna,
Tibaine bwengye.
Ka bahanuure hamwe.
N'oha owaakyorekire obutakimanywa?
N'oha owaakirangire omu biro bya ira?
Tiinye MUKAMA?
Kandi tihariho ruhanga ondiijo kureka nyowe,
Ruhanga ohikiriire, kandi Omujuni;
Tihariho ondiijo weena, kureka nyowe.
Mundeebe, mujunwe!
Ahakuba niinye Ruhanga, tihariho ondiijo.
Ekigambo kirugire omu kanwa kangye omu kuhikiirira,
Kandi tikirifa busha; nindahira nti:
Abantu boona baryantsimbira amaju,
Na buri rurimi rube niinye rwarahira.
Omuri MUKAMA wenka nimwo okuhikiirira n'amaani biri;
Abaamugiriire ekiniga boona
Baryaija ah'ari, bakwatwe enshoni.
Omuri MUKAMA nimwo oruzaaro rwa Israeli rwona
Rurisingurira, rukeesiima.
Ebishushani byabo byekoreirwe enyamaishwa n'amatungo.
Ebintu ebi mwekorera bihindukire emitwaro
Erikwekorezibwa enyamaishwa eziruhire.
Nibainama, nibabandamira hamwe,
Tibarikubaasa kwihaho egyo mitwaro,
Kureka nayo yaatwarwa omu bukwatwa.
Naimwe ab'enju ya Israeli abaahonokireho,
Abu ntuura mpeekire,
Okwiha obu mwaruga omu nda mukazaarwa,
Kandi muryarugaho mumere enju nkibaheekire.
Niinye naahangire, kandi niinye ndiheeka;
Ndyaheeka, kandi njune.
Mukaanshushanisa n'oha, ou mwakuunyiganisa nawe,
Mukangyeranisa nawe, tukashushana?
Abafukunkura ezaabu omu nshaho,
Bakapima efeeza aha minzaani,
Baguriirira omuheesi w'ezaabu, aziheeshamu ruhanga;
Batyo bajuumara omu maisho g'ekyo kishushani, bakiramya!
Bakita omu mwanya gwakyo, kyemereramu;
Tikibaasa kugurugamu;
Omuntu ku akitakira, tikimugarukamu,
N'obu kwakuba okumujuna omu kabi.
Imwe abarikucumura, mwijukye ebyo,
Mweyorekye ku muri abashaija; mugarukye mubiteekateekyeho.
Mwijukye ebyabandize kubaho ira,
Ahakuba niinye Ruhanga, tihariho ondiijo;
Niinye Ruhanga; tihariho orikushushana naanye,
Naiha omu biro bya ira, nindanga ebitakabaireho,
Ningira nti: Enaama yangye eryahama,
Mpikiirize ebi naamaririire kukora byona.
Omushaija oine enaama zangye arugye omu nsi ya hare.
Nkakigamba, kandi ndyakihikiiriza,
Nkakimariirira, kandi ndyakukora.
Mumpurire, imwe abaine emitima egangaire,
Abari hare n'okuhikiirira;
Tikuri hare munonga,
N'okujuna kwangye tikurituurayo;
Ndyakuta omuri Saayuuni
Ahabwa Israeli ekitiinisa kyangye.
Shuuma, oshutame omu mucuucu!
Iwe Bukaludaaya 'we,
Shutama ahansi, otakiri ha kitebe ky'obugabe;
Ahabw'okuba torigaruka kwetwa ojarami,
Nari ogwirwe gye.
Oyeshuuruure ahamaisho;
Hinyirira ekiteetei kyawe, oyeshuuruure amaguru,
Orabe omu migyera, oyambukye.
Enjuuro yaawe eryareebwa,
N'enshoni zaawe ziryareebwa butunu.
Ndyahoora enzigu, tindisaasira muntu n'omwe.
Omucunguzi waitu, eiziina rye ni MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Orikwera wa Israeli.
Shutama ohuname, oze omu mwirima,
Ahabw'okuba torigaruka kwetwa
Omugabekazi w'ensi z'abagabe.
Naagayisa obuhunguzi bwangye;
Naabahayo omu mikono yaawe,
Tiwaabasaasira na kakye,
Abagurusi waabakorera omutwaro guremeire munonga;
Waagira oti: Ndyaba omugabekazi ebiro byona.
Ebyo tiwaabyetaho,
Kandi tiwaijuka bugarukiro bwabyo.
Okashutama otaine ki oyetaireho,
Okagira omu mutima gwawe oti:
Niinye ndiho, tihariho ondiijo okwihaho nyowe.
Tindiba mufaakazi,
Kadi tindifiisa baana.
Okufiisa abaana n'obufaakazi biryakugwaho bitatuubiibweho,
N'obu oburogi bwawe buraabe buri bwingi buta,
N'okubandwa kwawe kurengyesereize munonga.
Ahabw'okuba oyesigire obugomi bwawe,
Waagira oti: Tihariho ori kundeeba;
Obwengye bwawe n'okumanya kwawe nibyo bikuhabize,
Okagira omu mutima gwawe oti:
Niinye ndiho; tihariho ondiijo okwihaho nyowe.
Aku otarikubaasa kuzibira;
Oryagwerwa akagwe,
Aku otaribaasa kweihaho;
N'okucwekyerera oku otakamanyaga
Kuryakuhikaho kitaraariire.
Mbwenu gumira aha kubandwa kwawe
N'oburogo bwawe oburengyesereize,
Ebi waafeereire kubi okwiha omu buto;
Obundi nyentsya biryagira eki byakugasira,
Oitse abantu obwoba.
K'abantu abaragura eby'eiguru n'enyonyoozi
N'eby'okuboneka kw'ameezi
Baimukye, bakujune ebirikubaho.
Omuriro guryabootsya;
Tibaryeiha mu maani g'okubuguma kwagwo.
Ogwo muriro tiguriba makara g'okwota,
N'obu kwakuba okushutamwaho!
Okwo nikwo abo abu waabaire ofa kubi nabo barikubeera,
Abaabaire baashuubura naiwe okwiha omu butsigazi bwawe;
Baryayegyendera, buri omwe atoore omuhanda gwe;
Obure ow'okukujuna.
Imwe abarikwetererwa eiziina rya Israeli,
Abaakomookire omu nda ya Yuda,
Abarahira eiziina rya MUKAMA,
Bakagamba ku bari aba Ruhanga wa Israeli,
Kwonka batarikukikora mu mazima nari omu buryo.
Nibeegamira Ruhanga wa Israeli,
Ou eiziina rye riri MUKAMA ow'amahe.
Ebya ira nkabiranga obutakimanywa,
Byaruga omu kanwa kangye, naabimanyisa;
Naabikora ahonaaho, byabaho.
N'ebitsya byawe ku biri nk'omutsi gw'ekyoma,
N'aha buso bwawe ku hari nk'omuringa.
Naabikumanyisa bitakabaireho,
Ngu otakaagira oti: Ekishushani kyangye ekirikuramibwa
Nikyo kibikozire,
Ekishushani kyangye ekibaizire kandi n'ekiheesire
Nibyo bibiragiire.
Okakihurira; mbwenu reeba ebi byona,
Torikwija kubimanyisa?
Okwiha hati niinyija kukuhuriza ebigambo bisya,
Ebisherekirwe, ebi otakamanyaga.
Byahangwa hati, ti bya ira;
Okuhitsya eri izooba tokabihurirahoga,
Ngu otakaagira oti: Nkaba nimbimanya.
Tokahuriraga, tokamanyaga,
Okwiha ira okutu kwawe kukaba kutakaigukaga;
Ahabw'okuba nkamanya ngu noija kuba endeebya,
Kandi okwiha obu waazaarwa okeetwa omugomi.
Ahabw'okuhimbisibwa kwangye naaza kukugumisiririza,
Ndekye kukwihiraho kimwe.
Nkugyereize omu iziiko ry'okubonabonesibwa.
Mbwenu eiziina ryangye rijumirwe ki?
Ekitiinisa kyangye tindikiha ondiijo.
Mpurira, iwe Yakobo,
Kandi Israeli, ou naayetsire!
Niinye We; ndi ow'okubanza,
Kandi ow'aha muheru.
Omukono gwangye gwa buryo nigwo gwabambire eiguru.
Ku mbyeta, byemerera hamwe.
Imwe mwena, mute eranire hamwe, muhurire!
N'oha omuribo orarangire ebyo?
Ogwo muntu MUKAMA naamukunda,
Kandi aryagira Babulooni nk'oku MUKAMA arikwenda,
N'omukono gwe guryarwanisa Abakaludaaya.
Kandi mmureetsire; aryaba gye omu rugyendo rwe.
Okuruga aha kutandika tinkagambaga mu mubonano;
Okwiha byaba kubaho ntuurayo.
Mbwenu hati Mukama RUHANGA antumire,
Yantuma n'Omwoyo we.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA Omucunguzi waawe,
Orikwera wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati:
Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Orikukwegyesa eby'okukugasira,
Nkakwebembera omu muhanda ogu oshemereire kutoora.
Obwo obusingye bwawe bukaabaire nk'omugyera,
N'okuhikiirira kwawe kuba nk'ebingonzi by'enyanja;
Na baijukuru baawe baba nk'omucuucu gwagwo;
Eiziina ryabo tiryakwihirweho,
N'obu kwakuba okumarwaho omu maisho gangye.
Muhungye, murugye omu Bakaludaaya;
Mukirangye, nimuteera akaari k'okushemererwa,
Mukimanyise, mukibuzye, kihikye aha muheru gw'ensi,
Nimugira muti: MUKAMA acungwire omwiru we Yakobo!
Tibaragizire iriho;
Akabaihira amaizi omu rukiri, gaahimintika;
Yaayata orwo rukiri, amaizi gaayerekyera.
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
MUKAMA akaanyeta ntakazairwe,
Yaanyeta eiziina nkiri omu nda ya maawe.
Yanshereka omu kicuucu ky'omukono gwe;
Yamiika omu mutaana gwe;
Omuriiwe nimwo ndiheerwa ekitiinisa.
Amaani gangye gaafa busha.
Kwonka ebyangye MUKAMA niwe arikubimanya,
Kandi Ruhanga wangye niwe arinzimuurira.
Owampindwire omuheereza we, ninkiruga omu nda ya maawe,
Ngu mmugarurire Yakobo,
Abaisraeli babone kumuteeraniraho;
Ahabw'okuba ndi ow'ekitiinisa omu maisho ga MUKAMA,
Kandi Ruhanga wangye ahindukire amaani gangye
Okuba omuheereza wangye ow'okwimutsya enganda za Yakobo,
N'okugarura Abaisraeli abaahonokireho, n'ekintu kikye munonga;
Kureka ndyakugira omushana gw'okujwera amahanga,
Okujuna kwangye kubone kuhika aha muheru gw'ensi.
Omucunguzi wa Israeli kandi Orikwera we,
Ou amahanga garikugaya, gakatamirwa kimwe,
Omuheereza w'abategyeki, naagira ati:
Abagabe baryakureeba, baimukye
Hamwe n'abanyiginya, baramye,
Ahabwa MUKAMA orikwesigwa,
Orikwera wa Israeli owaakutooraine.
Omu bunaku bw'okwikiririzibwamu nkakugarukamu,
N'aha izooba ry'okujunirwaho naakuhwera;
Ndyakurinda, nkuteho kuba endagaano y'abantu,
Obone kuhamya ensi
N'okubaganisa obuhunguzi obwatsigirweho,
Okugambira embohe oti: Mushohore,
N'abari omu mwirima oti: Mweyorekye.
Baryariira omu mihanda,
N'aha mitwe y'enshozi zoona ez'emparamaata
Habe amariisizo gaabo;
N'obu kwakuba okwokibwa ekibabo ky'eizooba nari omushana;
Ahabw'okuba Ogwo obainiire esaasi aryabeebembera,
Abahitsye aha nshuro z'amaizi.
Kandi enshozi zangye zoona ndyazigira omuhanda,
N'emihanda yaangye rugyendwa eryatunguurwa.
Bariya barugye aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho
N'obw'oburengyerwa-izooba,
N'abandi barugye omu nsi ya Sinimu.
Naimwe nshozi 'we, muteere akaari, mweshongore!
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ahuumuriize abantu be,
Kandi abantu be abarikubonabonesibwa aryabagirira esaasi.
Mukama wangye anyebirwe.
Abure kugirira esaasi omwana orugire omu nda ye?
Nangwa bo bakaabaasa kwebwa,
Kwonka nyowe tindikwebwa.
Orugo rwawe ruryaguma omu maisho gangye obutoosha.
Abombeki baawe nibarahutsya kukwombeka;
Kandi abacwekyerezi baawe n'abaakugizire amatongo
Nibaija kukurugamu.
Bariya boona nibeeteerana kwija ahariiwe.
Niinyerahira, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba,
Boona oryabajwara nk'eihunde,
Obeezirikye, obe nk'omugore.
N'ensi yaawe eyaacwekyereziibwe,
Eryafundira abatuuzi baawe,
Kandi abaakumizire baryaba hare.
Baryakugambira omu kutu nibagira bati:
Omwanya ogu gutufundiire;
Tubonere omwanya gw'okutuuramu.
Obwo oryagira omu mutima gwawe oti:
Aba baana, n'oha owaabanzaariire?
Ka naafiisize abangye, nkaba engumba,
Encuubwa kandi ekizengyerezi;
Mbwenu owaayoroire aba n'oha?
Ka naatisigaire nyenka;
Mbwenu aba barugire hi?
Reeba, ndyaimukiza amahanga omukono gwangye,
N'enganda nzeetese orurango rwangye;
Obwo baryareeta batabani baawe, babaine omu kifuba,
Na bahara baawe babaheekire aha mabega.
N'abaigarire babe baanyoko bakwontsye.
Baryakwinamira, bajuumare ahansi,
Barigatse omucuucu gw'aha bigyere byawe.
Obwo nibwo orimanya ku ndi MUKAMA;
Kandi abarikuntegyereza tibarikwatwa nshoni.
Ab'amaani nibabaasa kwakwa eminyago,
Nari enkwatwa z'abarikuhatwa kwihwa omu mikono yaabo?
Buzimazima enkwatwa z'ab'amaani ziryaihwayo,
N'eminyago y'abarikuhata eryagarurwa,
Ahabw'okuba niinye ndikurwanira n'abarikukurwanisa,
Nkajuna n'abaana baawe.
Kandi baryasinda eshagama yaabo nk'oku basinda viinyo.
Batyo abantu boona baryamanya
Ku ndi MUKAMA omujuni waawe,
Kandi Omucunguzi waawe, Ow'amaani wa Yakobo.
Ebaruha ei naashendeise nyokoimwe erahi?
Nari shi n'oha omu barikuunyihuza
Ou naabagurize?
Reeba, mukagurwa ahabw'ebibi byanyu,
N'ebicumuro byanyu nibyo byashendeise nyokoimwe.
Ku naayetsire, hataragizire owaanyetaba?
Nimugira ngu omukono gwangye gubaire mugufu,
Tigurikubaasa kucungura?
Tiinyine maani g'okujuna?
Reeba, ahabw'okukabuka kwangye, nyomya enyanja,
Mpindura emigyera eihamba ry'omusheenyi;
Eby'enyanja binuuka ahabw'okubura amaizi,
Kandi bifa ahabw'eiriho.
Ndishweka ebiguniya.
Ngu mbone kumanya ekigambo eki ndaahangaanise oruhire.
Buri kasheeshe ansisiimura,
Asisiimura okutu kwangye kuhurira
Nk'abarikwegyesibwa.
Tinaagoma, kandi tinaagaruka nyima.
N'amatama gangye naagaha abarikumaanyura ebireju;
Tindasherekire maisho gangye enshoni n'okucwerwa amacwante.
Nikyo ntarikushobererwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo ngumize aha maisho gangye nk'eibaare ry'enkangabuye,
Kandi nimmanya ngu tindikwatwa nshoni.
N'oha orintonganisa?
Ka twemerere, tutongane;
Omuzigu wangye n'oha?
Naanyirire haihi.
Reeba, Mukama RUHANGA nampwera;
N'oha oricwa orubanja kunsinga?
Reeba, boona baryakura nk'ekijwaro,
Ebiyenje bibariire kimwe.
Akoorobera eiraka ry'omuheereza we,
Orikugyendera omu mwirima, ataine mushana,
Kwonka akeesiga eiziina rya MUKAMA,
Akeegamira Ruhanga we?
Reeba, imwe mwena abarikuhemba omuriro,
Mukeekiikiza emuri embaju zoona!
Mugyende nimumurikirwa omuriro gwanyu,
N'ogw'emuri zi mukongyerize.
Ebi nibyo mbacumiire,
Muryabyama n'obusaasi.
Mumpurire, imwe abarikukuratira okuhikiirira,
Imwe abarikusherura MUKAMA,
Mureebe orukiri oru mwashatwirweho,
N'ekiina ky'amabaare eki mwatimbirwemu.
Na Saara owaabazaire;
Ahakuba, ku yaabaire akiri omwe wenka, nkamweta,
Naamuha omugisha, naamukanyisa.
N'emyanya yaayo yoona eyaatsigirweho;
Eihamba ryayo aryarihindura nka Edeni,
N'eihamba ryayo ry'omusheenyi arigire nk'omusiri gwa MUKAMA;
Haryabamu okushemererwa n'okunanuka,
Okusiima n'amaraka g'okweshongora.
Naiwe ihanga ryangye 'we, ntega okutu!
Ahakuba ndyashohoza ekiragiro,
N'eby'oburyo byangye biryaba omushana gw'okujwera amahanga.
N'okujuna kwangye kushohoire.
Emikono yangye eryategyeka amahanga,
Ebirwa biryantegyereza,
Kandi omukono gwangye nigwo baryesiga.
Mureebe ensi ahansi;
Ahabw'okuba iguru riryahwaho nk'omwika,
N'ensi eryakura nk'ekijwaro,
N'abagitwiremu bafe nka mukwikwi;
Kwonka okujuna kwangye kuryagumaho ebiro byona,
N'okuhikiirira kwangye tikurihwaho.
Abantu abu ebiragiro byangye biri omu mitima yaanyu;
Murekye kutiina okujuna kw'abantu,
Kandi mutahahaaza emitima ahabw'okukyeena kwabo.
Ahabw'okuba ebiyenje biryabarya nk'ekijwaro,
Na kooya ebarye nk'ebyoya by'entaama;
Kwonka okuhikiirira kwangye kuryagumaho ebiro byona,
N'okujuna kwangye obusingye bwona.
Iwe omukono gwa MUKAMA!
Sisiimuka nk'omu biro bya ira,
Omu busingye obwa iranaira.
Tiiwe waatemagwire Rahabu,
Okacumita ekijoka kiri?
Amaizi maingi ag'ahagati yaayo gakarugaho,
Okagicwamu omuhanda, ngu abacungwirwe barabemu?
Kandi abu MUKAMA yaacungwire baryagaruka,
Baije Saayuuni nibeeshongora;
Okushemererwa okutahwaho kuri aha maisho gaabo;
Baryagira okushemererwa n'okunanuka,
Kandi obusaasi n'okutsinda biryakwata akakiro.
Obaire ota, iwe orikutiina omuntu orikufa,
Omwana w'omuntu owaahangirwe nk'obunyaatsi,
Haza okeebwa MUKAMA Omuhangi waawe,
Owabambire eiguru, akataho emisingi y'ensi,
Okaguma noorenzya eizooba
Nootiinisibwa ekiniga ky'orikuhata, yaaba amaririire kucwekyereza
Mbwenu ekiniga kye kirahi?
Terifa, ekaza omu kiina;
N'eby'oburyo byayo tibiribura,
Oimutsya enyanja, ebingonzi byayo bikahoorera
MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina ryangye
Naakushereka omu kicuucu ky'omukono gwangye,
Naabamba eiguru, naataho emisingi y'ensi,
Naagira Saayuuni nti: Muri abantu bangye.
Iwe onywereire omu mukono gwa MUKAMA
Ekikopo ky'ekiniga kye,
Okanywa ekikopo ky'okugwererana,
Okakyeranguuza.
Tiharimu n'omwe ow'okumwebembera,
Kandi n'omu bu yaayoroire boona
Tiharimu w'okumukwata omukono.
Ebyo byombi bikuhikireho;
N'oha oraakuyaagire?
Kandi n'okuba amatongo n'okucwekyerera,
N'enjara na rurara,
N'oha oraakuhuumurize?
Babyami omu nteeraniro z'enguuto,
Nk'empara ekwatsirwe ekigoye;
Bajuumikiirwe ekiniga kya MUKAMA,
Okuhana kwa Ruhanga waanyu.
Abasinzire, kwonka mutasinzire viinyo.
Orikutonganira abantu be, arikugamba naagira ati:
Reeba, nyihire omu ngaro zaawe
Ekikopo ky'okugwererana,
N'orushare rw'ekiniga kyangye
Torigaruka kurunywaho;
Abaakugizire bati:
Inama, tukwambukireho,
Naiwe omugongo gwawe okagugira nk'ahansi,
Nk'enguuto yaabo y'okurabamu.
Ojware amaani gaawe, iwe Saayuuni;
Jwara ebijwaro byawe ebirungi,
Iwe Yerusaalemu, orurembo orurikwera;
Ahabw'okuba abatashazirwe n'abatashemeire
Tibarigaruka kukwijamu.
Yekunkumure omucuucu, oimukye, oshutame,
Iwe Yerusaalemu enkwatwa;
Yuzya enkomo ezikuri omu bitsya,
Iwe Saayuuni enkwatwa.
Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Okubanza abantu bangye bakashuuma Misri kushuuhuukirayo; bwanyima Abaasiria baabaitira kubi busha.

Mbwenu aha nteekirweho ki, nindeeba abantu bangye nibatwarirwa busha? nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba. Abarikubategyeka nibababoroozya, kandi obutoosha eiziina ryangye risiiba nirigaywa, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Nikyo abantu bangye barimanyira eiziina ryangye; ahari eryo izooba baryamanya ngu niinye orikugamba; reeba niinye.
Ka ni birungi aha bibungo,
Orikuranga eby'obusingye, akareeta amakuru marungi g'ebigambo birungi,
Orikuranga eby'okujunwa, akagira Saayuuni ati:
Ruhanga waawe ari aha ngoma.
Nibeeshongorera hamwe n'okushemererwa,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA, ku arigaruka Saayuuni,
Baryareebana nawe.
Muteere akaari k'okushemererwa nimweshongorera hamwe,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ahuumuriize abantu be,
Yaacungura Yerusaalemu.
Omu maisho g'amahanga goona,
N'emperu z'ensi zoona
Ziryareeba okujuna kwa Ruhanga waitu.
Mutakora aha kintu kyona ekitashemeire,
Imwe abeekorera ebintu bya MUKAMA;
Murugye ahagati yaarwo, mweyeze.
Kandi timurigyenda nimuhunga;
Ahakuba MUKAMA niwe aribeebembera,
Kandi Ruhanga wa Israeli niwe aribaza enyima,
Akaguma naabarinda.
Aryahimbisibwa, atunguurwe,
Aze ahaiguru munonga.
Ahabw'okusiisikara ahamaisho okukira abantu boona,
N'enshusha ye okutaba nk'ey'abantu,
Abagabe bakeekwata aha munwa ahabwe;
Ahabw'okuba baryareeba ekitakabahoga,
Kandi n'eki batakahuriraga baryakyetegyereza.
Kandi omukono gwa MUKAMA gushuururiirwe oha?
Kandi nk'akati akatookire omu itaka ryomire.
Akaba ataine ku arikushusha, n'obu bwakuba oburungi, ngu tumureebe,
Nari akandi karungi aku turikumwetengaho.
Omuntu w'obujune, omanyiire enaku;
Kandi nk'ou abantu batiinisa amaisho,
Nikwo yaagayirwe atyo, naitwe tutamwetemu kaabuntu.
Yaatwara obujune bwaitu,
Haza itwe twateekateeka ngu Ruhanga niwe amuteire,
Akamwasha, akamubonabonesa.
Yaahondahondwa ahabw'okutahikiirira kwaitu;
Okuteerwa kw'okutureetera obusingye niwe yaakuteirwe,
Kandi emihiririzi ye niyo etukiza.
Twateishuka, buri muntu yaatoora omuhanda gwe,
Kwonka MUKAMA yaamutaho okutahikiirira kwaitu twena.
Kwonka tiyaayashamya kanwa ke;
Yaaba nk'akataama akarikutwarwa kwitwa,
Kandi nk'entaama oku ecureera omu maisho g'abakyemuzi b'ebyoya;
Okwo nikwo nawe ataraashamize kanwa ke.
Omu b'omu busingye bwe n'oha owaateekateekire
Ngu akaihirwaho kimwe omu nsi y'abahuriire?
Ahabw'eby'okushiisha by'abantu bangye nikyo yaateereirwe.
Kandi n'omutungi omu kufa kwe.
N'obu araabe atarakozire by'obubisha,
N'obu bwakuba obugobya kuruga omu kanwa ke.
Kwonka MUKAMA akasiima kumuhondahonda,
Yaamusaasa;
Ku araayehindure ekitambo ahabw'ekibi,
Aryareeba oruzaaro rwe, ayongyere aha biro bye,
Ebi MUKAMA arikwenda bihikiirizibwe gye omu mukono gwe.
Ahabw'okumanya kwe omuheereza wangye ohikiriire
Aryahaisa baingi okuhikiirira,
Kandi ayekorere eby'okutahikiirira byabo.
Nawe aryabagana eminyago n'ab'amaani,
Ahabw'okuba akashuka amagara ge okuhitsya aha kufa,
Yaabarirwa hamwe n'enkozi z'bibi,
Yaayekorera ebibi by'abaingi,
Kandi yaatonganira abasiisi.
Iwe otakazaaraga, teera akaari,
Oyeshongore n'eiraka rihango,
Iwe otakarumwaga;
Ahabw'okuba abaana b'otsigirweho nibakira ab'oine iba,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Oreegye emikingo y'omu maju gaawe,
Otagira eki waima, yongyera aha mirunga yaawe,
Ohamye enkondo zaawe;
Oruzaaro rwawe rukubuure amahanga,
N'endebo ezaabaire ziri amatongo zituurwemu.
Otashoberwa, ahabw'okuba toriitwa nshoni,
Kureka oryayebwa enshoni z'omu butsigazi bwawe,
Kandi ekijumo ky'obufaakazi bwawe torigaruka kukiijuka.
MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo eiziina rye;
Kandi Orikwera wa Israeli niwe Mucunguzi waawe,
Naayetwa Ruhanga w'ensi yoona.
Nk'omukazi otsigirweho, ou omutima gwe gwijwire enaku,
Nk'omukazi oshenzirwe akiri muto,
Nikwo Ruhanga waawe arikugamba.
Kwonka ndyakutaaruura, nkwiniire embabazi nyingi.
Ahabw'okukugirira ekiniga kingi
Nkamara akaanya kakye nkwimire amaisho,
Kwonka ndyakugirira esaasi, nkwiniire rukundo etahwaho,
Nikwo MUKAMA, Omucunguzi waawe, arikugamba.
Nk'oku naarahiire ku amaizi g'omu biro bye
Gatarigaruka kushandaara mu nsi,
Nikwo ndahiire ku ntarigaruka kukugirira kiniga
N'obu kwakuba okukukabukira.
N'ebibungo biihweho,
Kwonka embabazi zangye, ezitaruga ha rugyero, tizirikurugaho,
N'endagaano yangye ey'obusingye teriihwaho,
Nikwo MUKAMA okwiniire esaasi arikugamba.
Okanagwa oku n'oku omuyaga, otarikuhuumurizibwa,
Reeba, amabaare gaawe ndyagasharuraho amabara marungi,
N'emisingi yaawe ngyombekyese safiro.
Amatungu gaawe ndyagombekyesa kalukedoni,
Kandi amarembo gaawe ngombekyese kabunkulo,
N'orugo rwawe rwona ndwombekyese amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi.
Kandi okugogyera kwabo kuryaba kwingi;
Omu kuhikiirira nimwo orihamiibwa,
Okuhatwa kuryakuba hare,
Ahabw'okuba toritiina;
N'ebirikwitsa obwoba biryakuba hare,
Ahabw'okuba tibirikuhikaho.
Ziryaba zitarugire ahariinye;
Orikwimukiza engamba aryakuzira.
Reeba, mpangire omuheesi
Ojugutirira omuriro gw'amakara,
Akaihamu eby'okurwanisa;
Kandi mpangire omuhwerekyerezi kucwekyereza.
Tihariho ky'okurwanisa, eki baheesire kukurwanisa, ekirikubaasa,
Kandi orurimi rwona oruriimuka kukutonganisa oryarusinga.
Obwo nibwo buhunguzi bw'abaheereza ba MUKAMA,
Kandi okwo nikwo kuhikiirira kwabo okurikuruga ahariinye,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Kandi otaine mpiiha, aije, agure, arye;
Mwije mugure viinyo n'mate
Ahatari kuha mpiiha, ahatari kucwererana.
N'okuhendekyera ebitarikuhaazya?
Mumpurire mutaireho omutima, mubone kurya ebirungi,
Amagara gaanyu gashemerererwe ebirimu ebishaju.
Muhurire, amagara gaanyu gabone kugumaho,
Naanye ndyaragaana naimwe endagaano etarihwaho,
Nizo mbabazi ezitarirugaho ezi naaraganiise Daudi.
Kuba omwebembezi kandi omutegyeki waago.
Kandi amahanga agatarikukumanya garyakwehongyera
Ahabwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, Orikwera wa Israeli,
Ahabw'okuba akuhaire ekitiinisa.
Mumutakire akiri haihi.
Omubi arekye omuhanda gwe,
N'otahikiriire arekye ebiteekateeko bye,
Agarukye ahari MUKAMA, abone kumusaasira,
Ahari Ruhanga waitu, ahakuba naija kumusaasirira kimwe.
Mumanye ngu ebiteekateeko byangye tibyo biteekateeko byanyu,
N'emitwarize yaanyu tiyo mitwarize yangye,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Nikwo n'emitwarize yangye eri ahaiguru okukira eyaanyu,
N'ebiteekateeko byangye nikwo birikukira ebyanyu.
Bitagarukyeyo, kureka bikaitirira eitaka,
Bikarireetamu okutooka n'okumera,
Omubibi akabona embibo,
N'omuri bikamuha eby'okurya,
Nikwo n'ekigambo kyangye ekirikuruga omu kanwa kangye kiriba;
Tikirigaruka hariinye busha,
Kureka kiryahikiiriza ebi ndikwenda,
Kigire omugisha omuri ebyo ebi nkitumiire.
Murugyeyo mwebembeirwe, mwine obusingye;
Enshozi n'ebibungo biryateera akaari,
Byeshongore omu maisho gaanyu,
N'ebiti byona eby'omu ishwa biteere omu ngaro.
N'omu mwanya gw'emikwatangwe hameremu omukadasi,
Kibe eky'okwijukiraho MUKAMA,
Akamanyiso akatarihwaho ebiro byona.
Muhamire omu by'oburyo, mukore eby'okuhikiirira,
Ahabw'okuba okujuna kwangye kuri haihi kwija,
N'okuhikiirira kwangye kuri haihi kushuuruurwa.
Omwana w'omuntu orikubihamiraho,
Akarinda sabato, atagishiishe,
Kandi akazibira omukono gwe kukora ekibi kyona.
MUKAMA taribura kuntaanisa n'abantu be.
Kandi omukonwa arekye kugira ati:
Reeba, ndi ekiti kyomire.
Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Abakonwa abarikurinda sabato zangye,
Abatoorana ebirikunshemeza,
Bakahamira aha ndagaano yangye,
Mbahe n'eiziina eririkukira okugira abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki;
Ndyabaha eiziina eririgumaho
Eritariihwaho.
Kandi abanayamahanga abarikwehongyera MUKAMA
Kumukorera, kukunda eiziina rye,
N'okuba abaheereza be,
Buri muntu orikurinda sabato, atagishiishe,
Akahamira aha ndagaano yangye
Ebitambo byabo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo byabo
Biryaikirizibwa kutambirwa aha itambiro ryangye;
Ahabw'okuba enju yangye eryayetwa ey'okushabirwamu amahanga goona.
Arikugamba naagira ati:
Ndyamutaaruuriraho abandi,
Mbongyere aha baabaire baataarwirwe.
Naimwe mwena enyamaishwa z'omu kibira,
Nimwije mushonshomere.
Boona tibaine bwengye,
Boona n'embwa ezikwatsirwe aha munwa,
Ezitarikubaasa kumoka;
Nibaroota, nibabyama, kandi nibakunda kuhungira;
N'abariisa abataine ki barikumanya;
Boona bateishukire omuhanda, baatoora eyaabo,
Buri muntu naayesherurira amagoba ge
Ah'arikubaasa kuhika hoona.
Twenywere ebirikusinza, tubikimbuure;
Kandi na nyencakare tugire nka hati,
Turengyesereze.
Kwonka tihariho orikukitaho omutima;
Abarikutiina Ruhanga nibaihwaho,
Kwonka tihariho orikuteekateeka ngu,
Naaba aihirwe omu kabi,
Abagyendera omu kuhikiirira
Bahuumurira aha bitabo byabo.
Oruzaaro rw'omushambani na maraaya,
Nimwirire aha.
Ou murikushekyerera nimworekyeza orurimi n'oha?
Timuri abaana b'ebibi, oruzaaro rw'obugobya,
N'ahansi ya buri kiti kibisi ekyetwa omurinzi;
Mukaitira abaana omu mpanga,
Omu biharamanga by'amabaare?
Omugabo gwanyu guri omu mabaare ag'omu ruhanga agarikuterera;
Ago nigwo mubagano gwanyu.
Nigo mwashukiire empongano zaanyu z'eby'okunywa,
Mukagahongyera empongano z'esaano.
Nimugira ngu ekiniga eki nyine ahabw'ebyo nikibaasa kwikaikana?
Kandi okwo niyo waagiire kutambira ebitambo.
Enyima y'orwigi n'ebiti by'omuryango;
Ahakuba ojwariire busha ondiijo, otariinye,
Waatemba ekitanda kyawe, waakihangusya,
Waaragaana nabo endagaano.
Ku waareeba ekitanda kyabo, waakikunda.
Waaza ow'omugabe oyeesiigire,
Oyongyeire aha migaju yaawe,
Waatuma entumwa zaawe hare,
Waayemaramu ak'obuntu, waahika Okuzimu.
Kwonka tiwaagira oti: Tikiine mugasho;
Kureka waabona eky'okukwongeramu amaani,
Tiwaagwa nshazi.
Kikakureetera okubeiha, otaanyijukye,
Okanga kuunyetaho, n'oha?
Timmazire omwanya muhango, nyetsirize,
Haza otantiine?
Ndyagamba aha kuhikiirira kwawe n'aha bi orikukora;
Kwonka tibiine ki birikugasira.
Omanye ku omuyaga gurikwija kubitwara,
N'omwitsyo gukabituntumura;
Kwonka orikuunyesiga niwe arikubuura ensi,
Akahungura orushozi rwangye orurikwera.
Mutinde, mutinde, mushemeze,
Murimbure enkongi zoona omu muhanda gw'abantu bangye.
Otuura Ahatahwaho, ou eiziina rye riri Orikwera,
Naagira ati:
Ntuura omu mwanya gw'ahaiguru kandi ogurikwera
Hamwe n'ow'omutima ogurikweteisa kandi omucureezi,
Ngu mbone kuhimbuura emyoyo y'abacureezi,
N'emitima y'abarikweteisa.
Kandi tindiguma nyine ekiniga,
Ahakuba ku naakutwaza ntyo,
Emyoyo n'emitima ei naahangire
Ekaancwekyererera omumaisho.
Naamuteera, naamwima amaisho nyine ekiniga;
Kwonka yaagumizamu kugaruka enyima
Omu muhanda ogu omutima gwe gurikwenda.
Mmwebembere, mmugarurire obuhuumure,
Mpangye omu barikumuyaagira
Naanye ndyamutambira, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Ahakuba terikubaasa kucureera,
Kureka amaizi gaayo gaimukiiriza ebyondo n'oburofa.
Nikwo Ruhanga wangye arikugamba.
Imutsya eiraka ryawe nk'enzamba,
Ogambire abantu bangye okushiisha kwabo,
Ab'enju ya Yakobo oboorekye ebibi byabo.
Bashemerererwa okumanya emihanda yangye,
Nk'eihanga erikora eby'okuhikiirira,
Ritarekye biragiro bya Ruhanga waaryo;
Banshaba kubacwera emanja z'oburyo,
Bashemerererwa kwirira haihi Ruhanga.
Ahabw'enki twesiibizekwo, otakyeteho,
Tukeebonabonesa, otakiteho omutima?
Mumanye ngu, omu biro by'okwesiibyakwo kwanyu
Muba nimusherura eby'okweshemeza
N'okwita kubi abarikubakorera.
Reeba, eki mwesiibizakwo, n'okutongana n'okurwana,
N'okuteerana entomi z'obubi.
Okwesiibyakwo nk'okwanyu okw'eri izooba
Tikurikwija kureetera iraka ryanyu kuhurirwa ahaiguru.
Eizooba eri omuntu ayebonabonesezaho?
N'okwinika omutwe nk'ekibingo,
Omuntu akeeyarira ebiguniya, akabyama omu iju?
Okwo nikwo murikweta okwesiibyakwo,
N'eizooba eri MUKAMA arikusiima?
Okwesiibyakwo oku ndikusiima t'oku?
Okubohoorora emirunga y'obubi,
Okukomoorora enkomo z'obuhuuku,
Okurekura abarikuhatwa, bakeegyendera,
Kandi n'okuhenda emigamba yoona?
N'okutaasya enshoberwa ezitaine butaaho omu maka gaawe;
Okireeba ojwaire busha, okamujweka,
N'okuteehuzya abaanyu?
N'okukira kwawe kukarahuka kwija,
Okuhihiirira kwawe kukakwebembera,
N'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kikakuza enyima, kikakurinda.
Okamutakira, akakuhuumuriza ati: Ndi aha!
Ku muryemaramu okuhata,
okutunga omuntu orukumu, n'okugamba kubi,
Ku oryehotorera omujara,
Okamarira abarikubonabonesibwa ebi barikwetenga,
Obwo nibwo omushana gwawe gurijwa omu mwirima,
N'omwirima gwawe ndindindi gukaba nk'omushana gw'eihangwe.
Ahaazye amagara gaawe omu biro by'enjara,
Agumye amagufa gaawe.
Oryaba nk'omusiri ogurikwitirirwa amaizi,
Kandi obe nk'enshuro y'amaizi etarikwoma.
Oryagaruka oteho emisingi emazire obusingye bwingi egwireho;
Kandi oryayetwa omuhunduuzi w'ahasheenyukire,
Orikugaruraho otuhanda oturikutaaha omu maka.
N'okukora eby'okweshemeza aha izooba ryangye eririkwera,
Kureka sabato waagyeta okushemererwa,
Eizooba rya MUKAMA eririkwera waaryeta ery'ekitiinisa,
Kandi waariha ekitiinisa, otaagyendera omu by'emitwarize yaawe wenka,
N'obu kwakuba okusherura eby'okweshemeza,
Nari okugamba ebigambo ebitaine ku biri,
Naanye ndyakuha okutoogooga aha mitwe y'ebibungo by'ensi;
Kandi ndyakutungisa obuhunguzi bwa Yakobo shwenkuru;
Ahabw'okuba akanwa ka MUKAMA niko kaakigamba.
Kutabaasa kujuna,
N'okutu kwe tikufiire kutabaasa kuhurira;
Nibyo bibataaniise na Ruhanga waanyu,
N'ebibi byanyu nibyo bimureeteire kubaima amaisho,
Akanga kubahurira.
N'engaro zaanyu zisiisirwe okutahikiirira;
Eminwa yaanyu egambire ebishuba,
N'orurimi rwanyu niruhwihwitsa eby'obugobya.
Tihariho orikutongana eby'amazima;
Kureka nibeesiga ebitaine mugasho, bagamba ebishuba,
Bakaba enda z'eitima, bazaara okutahiikiirira.
Baatira amahuri g'empiri,
Baruka orububi rw'orutangura;
Orikurya amahuri gaabo naafa,
Eihuri rikyatwa, hatimbiramu encwera.
Tihaine orikwenda kweshweka ebi bakozire;
Emirimo yaabo n'ey'okutahikiirira,
Ebi barikukora n'engaro zaabo birimu eitima.
Barahuka kusheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja;
Ebiteekateeko byabo n'ebiteekateeko by'okutahikiirira;
Ei baza yoona, n'okuhwerekyereza n'okumaraho.
Kandi omu mitwarize yaabo tiharimu mazima.
Beeteereireho emihanda ekiikami;
Ogitooramu weena, tagira busingye.
N'eby'okuhikiirira bitatuhikyeho;
Nitutegyereza omushana, tureeba omwirima;
Tutegyereza okwaka, tugyendera omu mwirima ndindindi.
Eego, tubandagira nk'abataine maisho.
Tuteera entsibo omu ihangwe nk'omu rwita-waabo;
Omu b'amaani turi nk'emitumbi.
Nituganya nk'enkombe.
Nitutegyereza eby'oburyo, kwonka bibura;
Nitutegyereza okujunwa, kwona kutuba hare.
Ahabw'okuba eby'okushiisha byaitu birengyesereize omu maisho gaawe,
N'ebibi byaitu nibitushinja.
Ahabw'okuba eby'okushiisha byaitu bitwezingiriire,
Kandi n'okutahikiirira kwaitu nitukumanya,
Nitucumura, twehakana MUKAMA,
Nituteishuka, tureka kukuratira Ruhanga waitu,
Nitugamba eby'okwita kubi n'eby'obugomi,
Nitugunja eby'ebishuba, tubigamba tubiihire aha mutima.
Eby'oburyo nibinagwa enyima,
N'okuhikiirira kwemerera hare;
Ahabw'okuba amazima gagwire omu muhanda,
Kandi okugororoka tikurikubaasa kutaaha.
Eego, amazima gabuzire;
Orikureka ebibi, nibamwoya.
MUKAMA akabireeba, byamugwisa kubi
Ahabw'okureeba hatariho by'oburyo.
Yaatangaara ahabw'okutabaho mutonganizi;
N'ahabw'ekyo omukono gwe gwamureetera obusinguzi,
N'okuhikiirira kwe kwamuhigika.
Yaata aha mutwe enkofiira y'okujuna;
Yaajwara eby'okuhoora enzigu, kuba ebijwaro bye,
Yaayehumbika obweziriki nk'omunagiro.
Ababisha be abazimuurire ekiniga, n'abazigu be abaihure,
N'ebirwa nabyo abizimuurire.
N'ekitiinisa kye okwiha ei eizooba riruga;
Ahabw'okuba aryaija nk'omugyera ogurikuhimintika,
Ogurikutwarwa omwitsyo gwa MUKAMA.

Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Egi niyo ndagaano ei ndikuragaana nabo. Omwoyo wangye ori ahariiwe, n'ebigambo byangye, ebi naata omu kanwa kaawe, tibiriruga aha rurimi rwawe, n'obu rwakuba orw'abaana baawe, nari orwa baijukuru baawe, okwiha hati n'okuhitsya ebiro byona, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
N'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kukujwereire.
Ahakuba, reeba, omwirima guryashweka ensi,
Omwirima ndindindi gushwekye amahanga;
Kwonka MUKAMA aryakuturukiraho,
N'ekitiinisa kye kikureebekyereho.
N'abagabe omu kumurinkana kw'okuturuka kwawe.
Boona nibateerana, nibaija ahariiwe;
Batabani baawe baryaija barugye hare,
Na bahara baawe baije bakiikiirwe omu mikono.
Omutima gwawe gukagurukaaguruka, gukashemererwa,
Ahabw'okbua obwingi bw'ebirikuruga omu nyanja buryakugarukira,
Obutungi bw'amahanga bukwizire.
Engamira nto za Midiani n'eza Efa;
N'eziriruga Sheeba zoona ziryaija
Zireetsire ezaabu n'obubaane,
Zimanyise hoona okusingizibwa kwa MUKAMA.
N'empaya z'entaama za Nebayoosi zikuheereze,
Ziije aha itambiro ryangye, ziri ebitambo ebirikusiimwa;
Naanye ndyahimbisisa enju yangye y'ekitiinisa.
Aba nibaahi abarikuguruka nk'ekicu,
Bakashusha nk'enkombe ezirikugaruka kutaahira omu madirisa gaazo
N'emeeri za Tarushiishi nizo ziribanza
Kureeta batabani baawe nizibaiha hare,
Baine efeeza n'ezaabu zaabo
Ahabw'eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Orikwera wa Israeli;
Ahabw'okuba akuhaisize ekitiinisa.
N'abagabe baabo bakuheereze,
Ahabw'okuba nkakuteera nkwiniire ekiniga,
Kwonka nkusaasiire ahabw'embabazi zangye.
Tigarikingwa nyomushana na nyekiro,
Abantu babone kukureetera obutungi bw'amahanga,
Beebembeirwe abagabe baabo.
Biryahwerekyerera;
Eego, ago mahanga gahwerekyererezibwe kimwe.
Emyereezi, emiberooshi, n'emiteyashuuri,
Okushemeza Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera;
Kandi omwanya ogu ntamu ebigyere byangye ndyagugira ogw'ekitiinisa.
Baryaija nibakwinamira;
N'abaabaire nibakugaya baryajuumara aha bigyere byawe,
Bakwete Orurembo rwa MUKAMA,
Saayuuni y'Orikwera wa Israeli.
Okabura ow'okukurabamu,
Ndyakuhindura ow'ekitiinisa ebiro byona okukira abandi boona,
Ow'okushemererwa, nk'oku obusingye burigyenda nibwihaihana.
Oyonkye amabeere g'abagabe;
Kandi oryamanya ku nyowe, MUKAMA, ndi Omujuni waawe,
Omucunguzi waawe, Ow'amaani owa Yakobo.
Omu mwanya gw'ekyoma ndeete efeeza;
Omu mwanya gw'ebiti ndyatamu emiringa,
N'omu mwanya gw'amabaare, ntemu ebyoma.
Obusingye nibwo ndigira abareeberezi baawe,
Kandi okuhikiirira nikwo ndigira abarikukukoresa.
N'obu kwakuba okuhwerekyereza n'okumaraho;
Kureka engo zaawe oryazeeta Kujunwa,
N'amarembo gaawe ogeete Kuhimbisa.
Okumurinkana kw'okwezi tikurigaruka kukwakira,
Kureka MUKAMA niwe ariba omushana gwawe ogutahwaho,
Na Ruhanga waawe akaba ekitiinisa kyawe.
N'okwezi kwawe tikurituubya kwaka kwakwo;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aryaba omushana gwawe ogutahwaho,
N'ebiro by'okuganya kwawe biryahwaho.
Bakubuure ensi, ebe eyaabo ebiro byona,
Babe eitaagi eri nyebyariire, omurimo gw'engaro zangye,
Mbone kuheebwa ekitiinisa.
N'orikukira boona obukye arugyemu eihanga ry'amaani.
Niinye MUKAMA;
Kandi ndyakirahutsya omu bunaku bwakyo.
Ahakuba MUKAMA anshukireho amajuta
Kureetera abooro ebigambo birungi,
Kushemba abacwekire emitima,
Kumanyisa enkwatwa eby'okurekurwa,
N'ababohirwe eby'okwigurirwa ekihome
N'eizooba eri Ruhanga waitu arihooreraho enzigu,
Kuhuumuriza boona abarikuganya,
Eihunde ry'ebirabyo omu mwanya gw'eiju,
Amajuta g'okushemererwa omu mwanya gw'okuganya,
Omunagiro gw'okuhimbisa omu mwanya gw'omutima gw'obujune,
Babone kwetwa ebiti by'okuhikiirira,
Ebyabyairwe MUKAMA kumuhaisa ekitiinisa.
Baimutsye amaju agaabaire gaahindukire amatongo,
Bahunduure endembo ezaasheenyirwe,
Ezaakurataine omu kusheenywa omu busingye butari bumwe.
Abantu b'enduga-mahanga nibo baribahingira,
Bakasharira emizaabibu yaanyu;
Abantu babeete abaheereza ba Ruhanga waitu;
Muryatungwa obutungi bw'amahanga,
Mwehimbisize omu kitiinisa kyago.
Omu mwanya gw'okuhemuka muryashemerererwa ebi mubagaine.
N'ahabw'ekyo muryatunga emigabo ebiri omu nsi yaanyu,
Kandi okushemererwa kwanyu tikurihwaho.
Nyanga okunyaga n'okukora kubi;
Kandi ndyabazimuurira omu mazima,
Ndagaane nabo endagaano etarihwaho.
Oruzaaro rwabo ruryamanywa omu mahanga,
Na baijukuru baabo bamanywe omu bantu b'enganda nyingi.
Abaribareeba boona baryaikiriza
Ku bari oruzaaro oru MUKAMA ahaire omugisha.
Omitima gwangye gwesiimire omuri Ruhanga wangye;
Ahabw'okuba anjwekire ebijwaro by'okujunwa,
Yantaho ekanzu y'okuhikiirira,
Nk'oku kishwera ajwara eihunde,
Kandi nk'oku omugore ayehunda otubaare tw'obuguzi bwingi.
Ahakuba nk'oku ensi emeza ebirikutooka,
Kandi nk'oku omusiri gumeza ebigubyairwemu,
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arimeza okuhikiirira n'okuhimbisa
Omu maisho g'amahanga goona.
Ahabwa Yerusaalemu tindihuumura,
Okuhitsya obu okuhikiirira kwayo kurishohora nk'okumurinakana,
N'okujunwa kwayo kukaba nk'etabaaza erikwaka.
N'abagabe boona bareebe ekitiinisa kyawe,
Haza obwo oryayetwa eiziina risya,
Eri akanwa ka MUKAMA karikweta.
N'eihunde ry'obugabe omu ngaro za Ruhanga waawe.
N'ensi yaawe terigaruka kwetwa Amatongo;
Kureka oryayetwa Enkundwakazi,
N'ensi yaawe eyetwe Oshweirwe;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akushemerereirwe,
Kandi ensi yaawe eryashwerwa.
Nikwo batabani baawe barikushwera;
Kandi nk'oku kishwera ashemerererwa kishwerwa,
Nikwo Ruhanga waawe arikushemerererwa.
Aha ngo zaawe z'amabaare;
Tibarihunama nyomushana na nyekiro.
Imwe abaijutsya MUKAMA, mutahuumura;
Okuhitsya obu arihamya Yerusaalemu,
Akagihindura eky'okuhimbisibwa omu nsi.
Kandi omukono gwe gw'amaani, naagira ati:
Buzimazima tindigaruka kuha abazigu baawe
Engano zaawe kuba eby'okurya byabo,
Kandi abanyamahanga tibarigaruka kunywa viinyo yaawe
Ei waafeereire kubi;
Bakahimbisa MUKAMA,
Kandi abaricwa emizaabibu yaawe
Nibo bariginywera omu bikaari by'Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera.
Mubonereze abantu omuhanda;
Mutinde omuhanda rugyendwa, mugutinde,
Mwihemu amabaare,
Mwimukize abantu orurango.
Naagira ati: Mugambire Saayuuni muti:
Reeba, okujunwa kwawe nikwija;
Reeba Mukama naija aine ebihembo,
N'enzimuurano ye emwebembeire.
Abacungwirwe MUKAMA;
Naiwe oryayetwa Oshweirwe,
Orurembo orutatsigirweho.
Owaaruga Bozira ajwaire emyenda etukuziibwe,
Ojwaire eby'ekitiinisa,
Kandi orikugyendesa amaani maingi?
Niinye, orikuranga okuhikiirira,
Oine amaani kujuna.
Ebijwaro byawe bikashusha eby'orikunyuukira omu inyuukiro rya viinyo?
Omu bantu b'omu mahanga tihariho n'omwe ou mbaire nyine;
Naabaribata ngwirwe kubi,
Naabaribatiirira nyine ekiniga;
Eshagama yaabo yaataraakira ebijwaro byangye,
Emyenda yangye yaagiibwaho amabara.
Omwaka gwangye gw'okucungura gwahika.
Naamagamaga, naareeba hatariho w'okumpa emikono;
Naatangaara kureeba hatariho w'okumpwera;
N'ahabw'ekyo omukono gwangye gwandeetera obusinguzi,
N'ekiniga kyangye kyangumya.
Naagasinza n'ekiniga kyangye;
Eshagama yaabo naagishesha ahansi.
N'aha by'okumuhimbisa,
Nk'ebi yaatuhaire byona oku biri,
N'ebirungi bingi ebi yaahaire enju ya Israeli,
Nk'okusaasira kwe oku kuri,
N'embabazi ze nyingi oku ziri.
Ahabw'okuba akagira ati:
Buzimazima aba n'abantu bangye,
Abaana abatarikukoresa bugobya;
Atyo yaaba Omujuni waabo.
Kandi maraika wa Ruhanga wenka yaabajuna;
Ahabw'okukunda kwe n'okubagirira esaasi akabajuna,
Yaabakiriza, yaabaheeka omu biro bya ira byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo yaahinduka omuzigu waabo;
Kandi We wenka yaabeerwanisiza.
Baijuka na Musa omugaragwa we, nibagira bati:
Owaabaihire omu nyanja
N'abariisa b'entaama ze, arahi?
Owaabataire Omwoyo we Orikwera ahagati, arahi,
Aha mukono gwa buryo ogwa Musa,
Akataanisa amaizi omu maisho gaabo,
Ngu ayetungire eiziina eritahwaho,
Akabarabya ahagati y'amaizi maingi,
Batateere ntsibo nk'embaraasi erikuraba omu ihamba?
Nikwo Omwoyo wa MUKAMA yaabahaire obuhuumure.
Okwo nikwo yaayebembeire abantu baawe,
Ngu oyetungire eiziina ry'ekitiinisa.
Oreebe ori omu butaaho bwawe oburikwera kandi obw'ekitiinisa.
Obweziriki bwawe n'eby'amaani ebi waakozire, birahi?
Okwetenga kw'omu mutima gwawe n'embabazi zaawe
Mbiimirwe.
N'obu Abrahamu araabe atarikutumanya,
Israeli atwogire;
Iwe MUKAMA niiwe Tataitwe;
Omucunguzi waitu okuruga ira ryona niryo iziina ryawe.
Okatugangaaza emitima, tutakutiine?
Garuka ahabw'abairu baawe,
Nizo nganda z'obuhunguzi bwawe.
Abantu baawe abarikwera bakamara omwanya mukye
Baine Omwanya gwawe ogurikwera;
Mbwenu abazigu baitu baguribatiriire.
Twaba nk'abu otakategyekahoga,
Kandi nk'abatakeetererwaga iziina ryawe.
Enshozi zitengatenga omu maisho gaawe,
Gukareetera amaizi kubira
Eiziina ryawe ribona kumanywa ababisha baawe,
Amahanga gatetemera omu maisho gaawe!
okashuuma, enshozi zaatengatenga omu maisho gaawe.
Kandi n'okutu kwabo kutakahuriraga,
N'amaisho gatakareebaga Ruhanga ondiijo,
Oine eki arikukorera abarikumutegyereza, okwihaho iwe.
Iwe otangirira abarikushemerererwa eby'okuhikiirira, bakabikora,
Abarikukwijuka, iwe n'emitwarize yaawe;
Kwonka okagira ekiniga ahabw'okuba tukakora ebibi;
Twabimaramu omwanya muhango.
Ebyo turyajunwa?
N'eby'okuhikiirira kyaitu byona ni nk'ekijwaro ekisiisikaire.
Twena tuhonga nk'eibabi,
N'eby'okutahikiirira byaitu bitutwara nk'ekirikutwarwa omuyaga.
Nari orikwebatura kukukwata amaguru;
Ahabw'okuba otwimire amaisho,
Waatumaraho ahabw'eby'okutahikiirira byaitu.
Itwe turi eibumba, niiwe mubumbi waitu;
Twena turi ebibumbirwe engaro zaawe.
Kandi otaijuka eby'okutahikiirira byaitu ebiro byona.
Saayuuni ebaire eihamba,
Yerusaalemu yaaba amatongo.
Enju yaitu erikwera, kandi enungi,
Ei baatatenkuriitwe baabaire bakuhimbisizamu,
Ekasya;
Ebi twabaire nitukunda byona byacwekyerera.
Ohuname, otubonabonese munonga?
Abatakambuuririzaga;
