Nkaba nyeteekateekire kubonwa
Abakansheruraga.
Naagira eihanga eritakatakiraga iziina ryangye nti:
Reeba, ndi aha! Reeba, ndi aha!
Eizooba ryona nsiiba ntegire emikono eihanga erigomi
Abantu abarikugyendera omu muhanda ogutashemeire,
Nibakuratira obwengye bwabo bonka;
Nibatambira ebitambo omu misiri,
Nibooterera obubaane aha matofaari,
Abashutama omu bituuro,
Bakaraara aha kiro bari omu myanya eyekiikire,
Abarya enyama y'empunu,
N'omucuuzi gw'enyama zirikunugwa
Guri omu nyabya zaabo;
Otampika; ahabw'okuba ndi orikwera okukukira.
Abo bantu n'omwika gw'omu nyindo zangye,
Omuriro ogusiiba nigwaka.
Tindihunama, kureka ndyahoora;
N'ahabw'ebya baishenkurubo,
Kibasaase munonga, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba;
Ahabw'okwoterera obubaane aha nshozi,
Kandi bakanjumira aha bibungo,
Ndyabanza ngyere eki bashemereire,
Bwanyima mbafubire nk'ebi baakozire oku biri.
Nk'oku viinyo eshangwa omu mutsitsa,
Bakagira bati: Otagushiisha, ahakuba gurimu omugisha,
Naanye nikwo nditwaza, ahabw'abaheereza bangye,
Nkareka kubamaraho boona.
N'omuri Yuda nyihemu abarihungura ebibungo byangye;
Abashongore bangye babihungure,
N'abaheereza bangye babituuremu.
N'oruhanga rwa Akori rube orw'amasyo g'ente kubyamamu
Ahabw'abantu bangye abansherwire.
Mukeebwa orushozi rwangye orurikwera,
Mukateekyera
Mukaijuriza
Mwena muryacureerera okwitwa,
Ahabw'okuba, ku naayetsire, timureetabire;
Ku naagambire, timurategire kutu;
kureka mukakora ebi ntarikusiima,
Mwatoorana ebi ntarikushemerererwa.
Reeba, abaheereza bangye baryarya,
Kwonka imwe mugume n'enjara;
Reeba, abaheereza bangye baryanywa,
Kwonka imwe mugume n'eiriho;
Reeba, abaheereza bangye baryashemererwa,
Kwonka imwe mwitwe enshoni;
Kwonka imwe muryaborooga ahabw'obusaasi bw'omu mutima,
Muteere ekiboroogo ahabw'emitima y'obujune.
Mukama RUHANGA aryabaita,
Kwonka abaheereza be aryabeeta erindi iziina.
Aryagweshabira ahari Ruhanga ow'amazima,
Kandi orikurahirira omu nsi
Aryarahira Ruhanga ow'amazima;
Ahabw'okuba enaku eza ira zeebire,
Zanduga omumaisho.
Ebya ira tibiriijukwa,
N'obu kwakuba okuteebwaho omutima.
Ahabw'okuba, reeba, nimpanga Yerusaalemu kuba ey'okunanukiramu,
N'abantu baayo kuba abarikushemeza.
Nnanukye ahabw'abantu bangye.
Terihuririrwamu iraka ry'okucura,
N'obu kwakuba okurira kw'abaine enaku.
Akarikufa kamazire ebiro bikye,
N'obu yaakuba omugurusi otarikuhitsya biro bye;
Ahakuba omwana aryafa ahikize emyaka igana,
Kandi omusiisi, orifa ahikize emyaka igana, biri akyeenirwe.
Baryabyara emizaabibu, barye ebijuma byayo.
Tibaribyara mizaabibu, ekariibwa abandi;
Ahabw'okuba nk'oku ebiro by'omuti biba,
N'eby'abantu bangye nikwo biriba,
Kandi abatoorainwe bangye baryamara omwanya muhango
Nibashemerererwa ebi emikono yaabo ekozire.
N'obu kwakuba okuzaara abaana b'okugwerwa akagwe;
Ahabw'okuba baryaba oruzaaro rw'abu MUKAMA ahaire omugisha
Hamwe na baijukuru baabo.
Kandi ndyabahurira nibakigamba.
Entare eryarya obunyaatsi nk'ente,
Kandi omucuucu guryaba eby'okurya by'enjoka.
Aha rushozi rwangye orurikwera rwona
Tibarikoreraho kubi, n'obu kwakuba okucwekyereza,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Eiguru nikyo kitebe kyangye ky'obukama,
N'ensi n'akatebe k'ebigyere byangye.
Ni nju ki ei muriinyombekyera,
Nari shi ni mwanya ki ogu ndihuumuriramu?
N'ahabw'ekyo byona n'ebyangye,
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kwonka omuntu ou nditaho omutima
N'oine omutima omucureezi, kandi ogirikweteisa,
Kandi orikutetema ahabw'ekigambo kyangye.
Orikutamba omwana gw'entaama, ni nk'orikuhotora embwa ebitsya;
Orikuhonga empongano y'eby'okunywa ni nk'orikuhonga eshagama y'empunu;
Orikwotera obubaane, ni nk'orikushabira ekishushani ekirikuramibwa omugisha.
Buzima beetooraniire emihanda yaabo,
Emitima yaabo eshemerererwa ebirikunugwa byabo.
Naanye ndyabatooranira okubonabonesibwa,
Nbareeteho ebi barikutiina;
Ahabw'okuba ku naayetsire, haabura owaayetaba;
Ku naagambire, tibaatega matu;
Kureka baakora ebi ntarashemerereirwe.
Nimuhurire ekigambo kye.
Beene waanyu abarikubanga,
Bakabacwa nibabatura eiziina ryangye,
Bagizire bati: Ka MUKAMA ahimbisibwe,
Haza tureebe okwo kushemererwa kwanyu.
Kwonka nibo barikwatwa enshoni.
Eiraka eririkuruga omuri hekalu,
Eiraka rya MUKAMA orikuzimuurira abazigu be!
Ku yaabaire atakarumirwe, yaazaara;
Ku yaabaire atakagizire bisha,
Yaateeraho omwana w'omwojo.
Orareebire ekinti nk'ekyo n'oha?
Nari shi, ebyo birareebirwe oha?
Ensi ekaabaasa kuzaarwa omu izooba rimwe?
Eihanga rikaabaasa kuruga omu nda omu kaanya kakye?
Ahakuba Saayuuni ku yaarumirwe ati,
Ahonaaho yaazaara abaana be b'aboojo.
Ndyakuhitysa aha bunaku bw'okuzaara,
Ndemwe kukuzaaza? nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nyowe oha okuzaara, niinye ndiigara enda?
Nikwo Ruhanga waawe arikugira.
Mushemererwe hamwe nayo, mwesiime ahabwayo;
Imwe abarikugicurira mwena,
Mwesiime hamwe nayo n'okushemererwa.
Mwonkye amabeere g'okurembesereza kwayo, muhaagye,
Munywe munonga aha kitiinisa kyayo kingi mushemereirwe.
Reeba ndyamuha obusingye oburi nk'omugyera,
Mmuhe n'obutungi bw'amahanga nk'omugyera ogushandaire;
Mwonkye, muheekwe omu rubaju,
Mugurukagurukibwe aha bibero.
Nikwo ndibarembesereza,
Mukagwisizibwa gye omuri Yerusaalemu.
Amagufa gaanyu gakure gye nk'obunyaatsi bw'omuroba;
Kandi kiryamanywa ku omukono gwa MUKAMA guri hamwe n'abaheereza be,
N'ekiniga kye ku kiri aha bazigu be.
N'ebigaari bye biri nk'akasooroora,
Ngu okuguubwa kubi kwe akuhikiirize n'ekiniga kingi,
Kandi abahanise endimi z'omuriro.
Abateho ekifubiro ky'omuriro na rurara;
Kandi abariitwa MUKAMA baryaba baingi.
Abarikweyeza, bakeeshemeza, ngu baze omu misiri bakurataine, barye empunu n'ebirikunugwa n'embeba, abo boona baryacwekyererera hamwe, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.

Ndyata akamanyiso omuribo, abaahonokireho mbatume omu b'amahanga, Tarushiishi, Puuli, Luudi, ab'omu barasi, Tubali, Yavani omu birwa ebiri hare, ei batakahuriraga kurangaanwa kwangye, n'obu kwakuba okureeba ekitiinisa kyangye; batyo baryamanyisa amahanga ekitiinisa kyangye.

Kandi baryareeta beene waanyu boona baheekirwe aha mbaraasi, omu bigaari, omu ngozi, aha nyumbu n'aha ngamira, nibabaiha omu mahanga goona kuba empongano y'okuhongyera MUKAMA, babahitsye Yerusaalemu aha rushozi rwangye orurikwera, babitwaze nk'oku Abaisraeli bashangwa bareeta omu nju ya MUKAMA empongano zaabo z'esaano, omu nyabya zishemeziibwe, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Kandi ndyaihamu bamwe omuribo, mbagire abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Obunaku buryahika, obu abantu boona bariguma nibaija omu maisho gangye kuramya, buri kuboneka kw'okwezi, n'ahari buri sabato, nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba.
Kandi baryashohora baze kureeba emitumbi y'abangomeire; ahabw'okuba enyogori zaabo tizirifa, n'omuriro gwabo tiguriraazibwa, baryaba ekihagaro aha bantu boona.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikamwijaho omu butegyeki bwa Yosia mwene Amni omugabe wa Yuda, omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'eshatu ogw'omu butegyeki bwe;

kandi kyagaruka kyaija omu butegyeki bwa Yehoyakimi mwene Yosia omugabe wa Yuda, okuhitsya aha muheru gw'omwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe ogwa Zedekia mwene Yosia ogwo, omugabe wa Yuda, obu Yerusaalemu yaakwatwa omu mwezi kwa kataano kw'ogwo mwaka.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Naakweza otakazairwe,
Naakutaho kuba nabi w'amahanga.
Kwonka MUKAMA yangira ati:
Reka kugira oti: Ndi muto;
Ahabw'okuba abu ndikutumaho boona nibo orizamu,
Kandi eki ndikuragiira kyona nikyo origamba.
Ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naiwe kukujuna;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Reeba, naata ebigambo byangye omu kanwa kaawe;
Kutegyeka amahanga n'ensi z'abagabe,
Kurandura n'okusheenya,
Kucwekyereza n'okujuumika,
Kwombeka n'okubyara.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Waareeba gye; ahabw'okuba ntaire omutima aha kigambo kyangye kukihikiiriza.
MUKAMA nikwo kungira ati: Akabi karyagwa aha batuuzi b'omu nsi egi boona nikaruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.

Reeba, ndyayeta enganda zoona ez'omu nsi z'abagabe b'omu bukiizi-bwa-bumosho baije, buri omwe ate ekitebe kye ky'obugabe aha marembo ga Yerusaalemu, n'aha ngo zaayo zoona ezigyehinguririize, n'aha ndembo zoona eza Yuda; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi abantu baamwo ndyabacwera orubanja, rubasingye, ahabw'obubi bwabo boona obwabantsigiiseho, bakooterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane, bakaramya ebi emikono yaabo yaakozire.
Kwonka iwe, yezirikye, oimukye, obagambire ebi ndaakuragiire byona. Batakuhahaaza omutima, ntakaahahaaza ogwawe omu maisho gaabo.

Kandi reeba, eri izooba naakugira orurembo orwehinguririziibwe ebigo, enyomyo y'ekyoma n'engo z'emiringa, kurwanisa ensi egi yoona, abagabe ba Yuda, abanyiginya baayo, abanyamurwa baayo n'abantu baayo.
Baryakurwanisa, kwonka tibarikubaasa; ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naiwe kukujuna; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Irooko orangye, aba Yerusaalemu bakuhuriire, noogira oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Niinyijuka okwehayo kw'omu buhangare bwawe,
Na rukundo yaawe y'omu bugore,
Oku wankuratiire omu ihamba
Omu nsi etakahingwamuga.
Omuganuro gwe gw'okubanza.
Abaaguriireho boona bakagiibwaho orubanja,
Akabi kaabahikaho; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Imwe ab'enju ya Yakobo, naimwe enganda zoona ez'enju ya Israeli, muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Ni kibi ki, eki baashwenkuriimwe bandeebireho,
Kikabareetera kuunyimuura,
N'okukuratira ebitaine buryo
Bakahinduka abataine mugasho?
Owaatwihire omu nsi ya Misri,
Akaturabya omu ihamba,
Omu nsi y'amarungu n'ebiina,
Omu nsi eyomire, kandi ey'ekibunda kya rufu,
Ensi etarabwamu bantu, kandi etatuurwamu?
Kurya ebijuma byayo n'ebindi birungi byamwo;
Kwonka ku mwahikireyo, mwansiisira ensi,
Obuhunguzi bwangye mwabuhindura ekihagaro.
N'abanyabiragiro tibammanya,
Abategyeki bancumuraho,
Na baanabi baaragura ebya Baali,
Baakuratira ebitaine muhoho.
Kandi na baijukuru baanyu ndyabatonganisa.
Mwambukye muhikye aha birwa bya Kitimu, mureebe;
Muteme Kedari, mwetegyereze munonga,
Mureebe ku haraabe harabaireho ekigambo nk'ekyo.
N'obu baraabe batari baaruhanga buzima?
Kwonka abantu bangye bahingiise ekitiinisa kyabo
Ebitaine mugasho.
Ogire obwoba bwingi, oshoberwe munonga;
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira;
Baanyimwire, nyowe enshuro y'amaizi g'amagara,
Baayetimbira ebiziba,
Ebiziba bifumukire, ebitarikubaasa kugumwamu maizi.
Ahabw'enki ahindukire omunyago?
Zaatsinda munonga,
Zaahindura ensi ye amatongo,
Endembo ze zihiire, tizikiine bantu.
Baakwata eigufa ry'akazingiro k'omutwe.
Ahabw'okwimuura MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Obu yaakwebembera omu muhanda?
Nikikugasira ki?
Nari shi, nikikugasira ki okuza Asiria
Kunywa amaizi ga Furaati?
N'okugaruka enyima kwawe kukuteise;
Omanye, kandi oreebe ku kiri ekintu kibi kandi ekirikushaarira
Kuunyimuura, nyowe MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, otantiine;
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe arikugira.
Waacwa ebyabaire bikubohire,
Kandi waagira oti: Tindigaruka kuheereza;
Haza waaramiza aha mutwe gwa buri kibungo kiraingwa
N'ahansi ya buri kiti kibisi ekyetwa omurinzi,
Nka maraaya.
Gw'embibo etoorainwe.
Mbwenu kikaruga hi waaza kusiisikara,
Okaba omuzaabibu ogw'omu ishwa?
Okagaruka okooga na sabuuni nyingi,
Kwonka eibara ry'ekibi kyawe rikiri omu maisho gangye;
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi tinkuratiire Baabaali?
Reeba omuhanda gwawe omu ruhanga,
Omanye ebi okozire.
Ori nk'engamira erikukina neekora oku n'oku;
Erikukagiiriza omuyaga erinzire;
N'oha owaakubaasa kugizibira?
Tihariho n'emwe eruha neegisherura,
Ahakuba egibona omu kwezi kwayo.
N'omumiro gwawe kugyenda gwine ekyaka.
Kwonka okagira oti: Nooyeruhiza busha,
Ahabw'okuba nkunzire abanyamahanga,
Kandi nibo ndikwija kukuratira.
Nikwo enju ya Israeli erihemuka,
Bo n'abagabe baabo, abategyeki baabo,
Abanyamurwa baabo na baanabi baabo,
N'eibaare ati: Niiwe wanzaire;
Ahabw'okuba banteire amabega,
Baanyima amaisho.
Kwonka omu biro by'okureeba enaku
Baryataka bati: Imuka otujune.
Abu waayeteereireho barahi?
Ku baraabe nibabaasa kukujuna
Omu biro by'enaku zaawe, nibaimukye;
Ahabw'okuba, nk'oku endembo zaawe zirikwingana,
Na baaruhanga baawe nikwo bari, iwe Yuda.
Ahabw'enki noonyetomboitera?
Manya mwena mungomeire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Tibaikiriza kuhanwa;
Rurara yaanyu niyo emazireho baanabi baanyu
Nk'entare esheegire.
Naimwe ab'obusingye obu, mute omutima aha kigambo kya MUKAMA.
Ndabeereire Israeli eihamba,
Nari ensi y'omwirima ndindindi?
Mbwenu abantu bangye nibagirira ki bati:
Nitwetegyeka; titurikugarukaho bundi?
Nari omugore kwebwa ekyetwekyerero kye?
Kwonka abantu bangye baanyebirwe
Ebiro bingi ebitarikubarwa.
Eshi omanya kusherura nkunzi zaawe!
Nangwa n'abakazi babi obeegyeise emize yaawe.
Hareebekireho eshagama y'abanaku abu waatuzire busha,
Abu otakashangaga nibafumura enju.
Ogira oti: Tiinyine rubanja;
Buzimazima takiinyiniire kiniga.
Reeba, ndyakutonganisa
Ahabw'okugira oti: Tincumwire.
N'okuhindura emitwarize yaawe?
Misri neija kukuhemura
Nk'oku Asiria yaakugizire.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ayangire abu oyesiga,
Kandi tibaine ki barikugasira.
Ogwo mukazi yaamurugaho
Yaaba muka ondiijo,
Iba aryagaruka amushwere?
Egyo nsi tekaasiisikara munonga?
Iwe okaraaya na bashambane baawe baingi,
Ebyo nookingarukira? nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahu otarashambaniire ni nkahi?
Okaba oshutama aha rubaju rw'omuhanda, otegyereize bashambane baawe
Nk'Omuharabu omu ihamba.
Oshiisha ensi n'ebihagaro by'obwamaraaya bwawe.
Enjura ya katumba ekabura;
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, okaguma oyomire aha maisho nka maraaya,
Tiwaagira kashoni.
Na hati tokantakiire, oti:
Taata, niiwe mugyenzi wangye omu buhangare bwangye;
Aryaguubwa kubi okuhitsya aha muheru?
Reeba okwo nikwo waagizire,
Kwonka okakora ebibi byona nk'oku orikwenda.
Naateekateeka nti: Bwanyima y'okukora ebyo byona, naija kungarukira. Kwonka tiyaagaruka; kandi omurumuna Yuda endeebya yaakireeba.
Kandi egyo ndeebya Yuda, n'obu araabe yaareebire oku naabinga mukuru we Israeli, nkamuha ebaruha y'okumushenda nimmutura obushambani bwe bwona, taratiinire, kureka nawe akagyenda, yaaza kuraaya.
Ahabw'okwo kuraaya kumurahukira, yaashiisha ensi, naashambana n'amabaare n'ebiti.
Ebyo byona n'obu biraabe byabaire bityo, egyo ndeebya Yuda tarangarukiire n'omutima gwe gwona, kureka omu kuryarya; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Irooko, orangire ebi bigambo aharikureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho noogira oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Garuka, iwe Israeli owaagarukire enyima,
Tindikwija kukureebesa kiniga,
Ahabw'okuba ndi ow'embabazi;
Tindiguma na kiniga ebiro byona;
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kwonka oyemere ekibi kyawe,
Ku waagomeire MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Okayabatikana n'abanyamahanga
Ahansi ya buri kiti kibisi ekyetwa omurinzi,
Kandi otoorobere iraka ryangye;
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nimugarukye; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira;
Ahabw'okuba niinye mukama waanyu.
Ndyabatwara niinyiha omwe-omwe omu rurembo,
Babiri-babiri omu ruganda,
Mbahitsye Saayuuni.

Omu biro ebyo ku muriheza kukanya, mwaba baingi omu nsi, tibarigaruka kugamba ha by'eshenduukye y'endagaano ya MUKAMA; teriteekateekwaho, teriijukwa, kandi tibarigyefuuza n'obu kwakuba okugaruka kugikora.

Omu bunaku obwo Yerusaalemu eryayetwa ekitebe kya MUKAMA eky'obukama, amahanga goona garyakiteeraniraho, ei MUKAMA ariomuri Yerusaalemu, kandi tibarigaruka kukuratira obugangaazi bw'emitima yaabo emibi.
Omuri ebyo biro enju ya Yuda eryakwatanisa n'eya Israeli, bombi barugye omu nsi y'omu bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, bataahe omu nsi ei naahaire baashwenkuriimwe kuba obuhunguzi bwabo.
Nkuhe ensi nungi,
Obuhunguzi burungi munonga okukira obw'amahanga goona.
Kandi naagira nti: Oryanyeta Sho, torindugaho.
Kwonka iwe nju ya Israeli 'we, otuura nondeebya,
Nk'oku omukazi endeebya atsigaho iba.
Nkwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Okurira n'okweshengyereza kw'abaana ba Israeli
Ahabw'okushiisha emitwarize yaabo,
Bakeebwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo.
Niinyija kubatambira okugaruka enyima kwanyu.
Reeba, twaija ahariiwe,
Ahabw'okuba ori MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
N'okubandirwa aha nshozi n'ebya busha;
Buzimazima okujunwa kwa Israeli
Kuri omuri MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Kwonka okwiha omu buto bwaitu ekirikwitsa enshoni kimazireho byona ebi baatatenkuriitwe baahendekyeire, amasyo gaabo ag'entaama n'ag'ente, kandi na batabani baabo na bahara baabo.

Ka tubyame n'enshoni zaitu, okuhemuka kwaitu kutushwekye, ahabw'okuba tukacumura ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, itwe na baatatenkuriitwe, okwiha omu buto bwaitu n'okuhitsya eri izooba, kandi titukooroberaga iraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Iwe Israeli, ku oraikirize kugaruka,
Obe niinye waagarukira;
Kandi ku oraiheho ebihagaro byawe, byanduga omumasiho,
Otarikubangaanisa,
Waarahira omu mazima, omu buryo n'omu kuhikiirira,
Obwo amahanga garyayeshabira omugisha omuriwe,
Kandi omuriwe nimwo garyesiimira.
Mutabire endaara zaanyu,
Kandi mutabiba omu mahwa;
Mwiheho ekishushu ekiri aha mitima yaanyu,
Imwe aba Yuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu,
Ekiniga kyangye kitakaija nk'omuriro,
Kikabuguma, hakabura owaakiraaza,
Ahabw'obubi bw'ebi murikukora.
Muteere enzamba omu nsi yoona,
Mugambe n'eiraka rihango nimugira muti:
Muteerane, tuze omu ndembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare;
Muhungye, musherure obukiriro muteeziringa;
Ahabw'okuba naaza kureeta akabi karugye aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho,
Ndeete n'okucwekyerera kw'amaani.
Omuhwerekyerezi w'amahanga ari omu muhanda;
Arugire owe, naija kucwekyereza ensi yaawe,
Endembo zaawe zibe amatongo, zibure ab'okuzituuramu.
Mucure, muboroogye,
Ahabw'okuba ekiniga kya MUKAMA tikikaturugireho.
Bwanyima naagira nti: Ai bambe, Mukama RUHANGA, buzimazima obeiheire kimwe eri ihanga n'aba Yerusaalemu, noogira oti: Muryaba gye; haza kunu rurara ehikiire kimwe aha magara gaabo.
Omu biro ebyo baryagira eri ihanga n'aba Yerusaalemu bati: Omuyaga ogurikwotsya kuhuuha abantu bangye, ogurireetwa omu bibungo by'emparamaata eby'omu ihamba, gutari gw'okuheheeza nari okushemeza,
kureka ogw'amaani okukira aho, niinye gurikwizira. Mbwenu niinye ndikugamba nimbacwera orubanja.
Ebigaari bye by'orugamba biri nk'akasoorora,
N'embaraasi ze nizirahuka okukira amashamba.
Tutoore hi? Ka twaza kuhwaho!
Obone kujunwa.
Ebiteekateeko byawe bibi biryahitsya hi
Kuguma omuriiwe!
Niriranga obubi niryema omu bibungo bya Efuraimu.
Mumanyise aba Yerusaalemu nimugira muti:
Abagotsi nibaija nibaruga omu nsi ya hare,
Nibateerera endembo za Yuda orwari.
Ahabw'okuba ekangomera; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nibyo bikureeteire ebyo.
Ekyo nikyo kifubiro kyawe, kandi nikishaarira,
Ahabw'okuba kikuhikiire kimwe aha mutima.
Omutima gwangye tigwine buhuumure.
Tindikubaasa kuhunama,
Ahabw'okuba nimpurira eiraka ry'enzamba,
N'enduuru y'orugamba.
Ensi yoona ehindwirwe amatongo;
Amahema gangye nigacwekyerezibwa kitaraariire,
Emikingo yangye neecwekyerezibwa omu kaanya kakye.
Niinyija kuheerera hi n'okureeba orurango,
N'okuhurira eiraka ry'enzamba?
Tibarikummanya;
N'abaana bataine bwengye,
Kandi abatarikwetegyereza.
Omu kukora ebibi n'abanyabwengye,
Kwonka omu kukora ebirungi tibaine ki barikumanya.
N'eiguru ritarimu kashana.
N'ebibungo byona nibizonga.
N'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya byona byahungire.
N'endembo zaayo zoona zaasheenyeirwe
omu maisho ga MUKAMA, omu maisho g'ekiniga kye kingi.
N'eiguru rikairagura,
Ahabw'okuba nkakigamba, naakimariirira,
Tindikyefuuza, kandi tindikireka.
Ab'omuri buri rurembo baryahunga
Ahabw'okuhurira endigito y'ab'aha mbaraasi n'ab'amata,
Bashenshere omu bishaka, bataahe omu nkiri,
Endembo zoona zitsigweho,
Habure owaazituuramu.
N'enki ekirikukujwaza karari,
Okeehunda eby'ezaabu,
Okahangusya amaisho gaawe n'erangi?
Nooyeshemereza busha,
Nkunzi zaawe nizikugaya,
Kandi nizihiiga amagara gaawe.
Obusaasi nk'obw'omukazi orikujigaija,
Eiraka rya Saayuuni orikusheemeeka,
Akanaga emikono, naagira ati:
Ai bambe! Naagwa omu maisho g'abaitsi.
Mureebe, kandi mwetegyereze!
Musherure omu nteeraniro zaayo z'emihanda,
Ku muraabe nimubaasa kubonayo omuntu n'omwe,
Orikukora eby'oburyo, akasherura amazima,
Mbone kugisaasira.
Kwonka nibarahira ebishuba.
Okabateera, kwonka tibaahurira busaasi;
Waabamaraho, kwonka baayanga kuhanwa,
Baagumya aha maisho gaabo okukira eibaare,
Baayanga kweteisa.
Tibaine bwengye;
Ahabw'okuba tibarikumanya muhanda gwa MUKAMA,
N'obu byakuba ebiragiro bya Ruhanga waabo.
Mbe nibo naagamba nabo;
Ahabw'okuba bo nibamanya omuhanda gwa MUKAMA
N'ebiragiro bya Ruhanga waabo.
Kwonka naashanga nabo boona baahenzire omugamba,
Baacwire ebyabaire bibakomire.
N'omushega gurikuruga omu ihamba gukabacwekyereza;
Knadi engwe eryagwera aha ndembo zaabo,
Buri muntu orizirugamu aryataagataagurwa,
Ahabw'okuba ebicumuro byabo ni bingi,
N'okugaruka enyima kwabo kukanyire.
Abaana baawe baanyimwire,
Baarahira abo abatari baaruhanga.
Ku naabagaburiire, naabahaazya,
Baashambana, baayerunda aha maju ga baamaraaya.
Buri muntu naashiija muka mutaahi we.
Tindihoora enzigu eihanga nk'eri?,
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mwinamukye, murabe omu mishorongo y'emizaabibu yaayo,
Mugicwekyereze;
Kwonka mutagimariraho kimwe.
Mugikonkoboreho amataagi,
Ahabw'okuba ti ga MUKAMA.
Ahakuba enju ya Israeli n'eya Yuda
Zindeebeize kimwe; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nibagira bati: Taine ki arikora;
Tihariho kabi koona akarituhikaho;
Tituriitwa rurara, n'obu kwakuba okuteerwa enjara.
Baanabi abo baryahinduka omuyaga,
Ahabw'okuba ekigambo ky'amazima tikibarimu.
Okwo nikwo barikorwa.
Ahabw'okugamba ekyo kigambo,
Reeba, naaza kuhindura ebigambo byangye eby'omu kanwa kaawe omuriro,
N'abo bantu mbahindure enku, omuriro gubamareho.
Niinyija kukuteeza eihanga erya ira,
Eihanga eri otarikumanya rurimi rwaryo,
N'obu kwakuba okwetegyereza eki barikugamba.
Boona n'amamanzi.
Barye batabani baawe na bahara baawe,
Barye amasyo gaawe g'entaama n'ag'ente,
Barye emizaabibu yaawe n'emitiini yaawe,
Kandi endembo zaanyu ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare,
Ezi murikwesiga,
Baryazicwekyereza na rurara.
Kandi hoona n'omu biro ebyo tindibamariraho kimwe, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Abantu baawe ku barigira bati: Ahabw'enki MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu atukozireho ebyo byona? Oryabagira oti: Nk'oku mwanyimwire, mukaheereza baaruhanga b'abanyamahanga muri omu nsi yaanyu, nikwo muriheereza abanyamahanga muri omu nsi etari yaanyu.
Mukirangye omuri Yuda, nimugira muti:
Abaine amaisho, kwonka batarikureeba,
Abaine amatu, kwonka batarikuhurira;
Timurikutiina? Timurikutetemera omu maisho gangye?
Nkataho omusheenyi kuba omwatano gw'enyanja,
Omucungiro gw'ebiro byona, ogu etarikubaasa kurengyeraho;
Ebingozi n'obu byakwecunda bita, tibikaabaasa;
Kandi n'obu byakuhoorera bita, tibikaagurengyeraho.
Kwonka eri ihanga riine omutima gugangaire,
Bagomire, baayegyendera.
Ka tutiine MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu
Otuha enjura omu bunaku bwayo,
Enjura y'eibiba n'eya katumba,
Akaturindira saabiiti ezaateereirweho amagyesha.
Kandi ebibi byanyu bibazibiire kutunga ebirungi;
Nibagwera nk'abategi b'enyonyi,
Batega emitego, bakwata abantu.
Amaju gaabo gaijwire obugobya,
Nk'ekitukuru kiijwire enyonyi;
N'ahabw'ekyo bahindukire bakuru n'abatungi,
Omu kukora kubi tibaine bugarukiro;
Emanja z'efuuzi tibazicwa mu bwinganisa,
Ngu ezo fuuzi zibe gye,
Kandi tibatonganira bakyene.
Nimugira ngu tindibafubira ahabw'ebyo?
Tindihoora enzigu eihanga nk'eri?
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kigwire omu nsi egi,
Abanyamurwa nibategyeka nibagyendera aha bya baanabi abo;
Kandi abantu bangye nibasiima ku biba bityo.
Mbwenu muheru ku erihika, muryagira muta?
Murugye omuri Yerusaalemu, musherure obukiriro!
Muteere enzamba omuri Tekoa,
Mwimutsye orurango ahari Besi-hakeremu;
Ahabw'okuba akabi kaareetana nikareetwa aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho,
N'okucwekyerera kuhango.
Saayuuni omurungi kandi owaayoroirwe gye,
Naaza kumucwekyereza.
Bateere amahema gaabo, bamwehinguririze,
Buri omwe ariise ahakwe.
Mwimukye mumuteere omu ihangwe.
Mbwenu ho twahitsya!, ahabw'okuba bwaza kwira;
Ebicuucu by'omu mwabazyo nibigyenda nibiba biraingwa.
Mwimukye, tumuteere nyekiro,
Tucwekyereze ebikaari bye.
Muhonde ebiti bya Yerusaalemu,
Mugirundeho eby'okutemberaho.
Oru nirwo rurembo orushemereire kufubirwa,
Orutarimu kindi kureka okuhatana.
Narwo nikwo ruguma nirureeta obubi bwarwo;
Obubisha n'okucwekyereza nibiruhurirwamu;
Obutoosha nindeeba endwara n'okuhutaazana.
Ntakaataanira kimwe naiwe,
Nkakugira amatongo, n'ensi etatuurwamu.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati:
Humbira kimwe Abaisraeli abatsigaireho,
Nk'oku bahumba omuzaabibu;
Garuka omu mataagi gaagwo, ohumbe n'engaro zaawe,
Nk'oku omucwi w'ebijuma by'emizaabibu agira.
Bakahurira?
Reeba, amatu gaabo gaigaire,
Tibarikubaasa kuhurira;
Reeba, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kibahindukiire ekirikugaywa,
Tibarikukishemerererwa.
Nkaremwa kugumisiriza.
Kishukye aha baana abari omu muhanda,
N'omu nteerane z'abatsigazi,
Ahabw'okuba omushaija n'omukazi we bombi baryatwarwa,
Abagurusi n'empwitsi nabo batwarwe.
N'emisiri yaabo hamwe n'abakazi baabo;
Ahabw'okuba ndyabangira abatwire omu nsi omukono;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Buri muntu aine omururu gw'amagoba gatahikire.
Okuruga ahari nabi okuhika aha munyamurwa,
Buri muntu naakora eby'obugobya.
Nibagira bati: N'obusingye! N'obusingye!
Haza obusingye butariho.
Ngaaha! Tibarazigizire na kakye,
N'obu kwakuba okubwerabwera.
N'ahabw'ekyo baryagwa omuri abo abagwa;
Omu bunaku obu ndibafubiriramu,
Baryakumbagazibwa;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mwemerere aha mihanda, mureebe,
Mubuuririze otuhanda otwa ira,
Ahu omuhanda murungi guri, mube nigwo mwatoora.
Nimwo muribonera emitima yaanyu oburuhuukiro.
Kwonka baagira bati: Titurikwija kuguritaho.
Mute omutima aha iraka ry'enzamba;
Kwonka baagira bati: Titurikwija kugugyenderama.
N'ahabw'ekyo, iwe iguru 'we, hurira;
Omanye ekiribabaho;
Reeba, niinyija kureeta akabi ahari abo bantu,
Nibyo byana ebirikuruga omu naama zaabo,
Ahabw'okuba tibarataire mutima ha bigambo byangye,
N'ebiragiro byangye bakabyanga.
N'emigaju erikuruga omu nsi ya hare?
Ebitambo byanyu ebyokize tibirikwikirizibwa,
N'empongano zaanyu tizirikunshemeza.
Reeba, ndyata enkongi omu maisho g'abo bantu,
Ezi abaana na baishebo bariteeraho entsibo,
Bataahi baabo na bagyenzi baabo bakahwerekyerera.
Reeba, eihanga niriija niriruga omu nsi ey'omu bukiizi-bwa-bumosho,
Eihanga rikuru niriimuka kuruga ha muheru gw'ensi,
Rikwaitse amata n'amacumu;
N'abantu enshaarizi abataine saasi,
Endigito yaabo ni nk'enyanja erikuhoorera,
Nibagyendera aha mbaraasi,
Batengire orugamba nk'abarikurwana,
Kukurwansia iwe Saayuuni.
Emikono yaatentebuka,
Twagira obusaasi bwingi
Nk'obw'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara.
N'obu kwakuba okuraba omu muhanda;
Ahabw'okuba omuzigu aine rurara,
N'okutiinisa kuri embaju zoona.
Oyekuringye omu iju;
Ocure nk'ofiisize omwana omwe nyamunegyere,
Otonzye n'obusaasi bwingi,
Ahabw'okuba omuhwerekyerezi aryatuteera kitaraariire.
Ngu omanye emitwarize yaabo, ogicondooze.
Nibagyenda nibabeiherera abandi;
Bagumire nk'omuringa nari nk'ekyoma;
Boona nibakora ebitahikire.
Risasi ehwereziibwe omuriro,
Nibeeruhiza busha kugumizamu nibashemeza,
Ahabw'okuba ababi tibarikwihwamu.
Abantu nibabeeta efeeza y'enkamba,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA abangire.
Ekigambo kikaija ahari Yeremia nikiruga ahari MUKAMA; kyagira kiti:
Yemerera omu irembo ry'enju ya MUKAMA, orangireyo ekigambo eki, noogira oti: Nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, imwe mwena Abayuda abarikuraba omuri aga marembo nimuza kuramya MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Mushemeze emitwarize yaanyu n'ebi murikukora, mbone kubaikiriza kutuura omuri ogu mwanya.
Murekye kwesiga ebigambo ebi ebirikuhabisa nimugira muti: Hekalu ya MUKAMA, hekalu ya MUKAMA, hekalu ya MUKAMA niyo egi!
Mumanye ngu, ku muraashemereze kimwe emitwarize yaanyu n'ebi murikukora, mwakorerana eby'oburyo omu mzima,
mwareka kwita kubi omunyaihanga, efuuzi n'omufaakazi, n'okusheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja omuri ogu mwanya, mwareka n'okukuratira baaruhanga abandi kwereetaho akabi,
obwo ndyabaikiriza kutuura omuri ogu mwanya, omu nsi ei naahaire baashwenkuriimwe ira kuba eyaabo ebiro byona.
Reeba, nimweruhiza busha kwesiga ebigambo ebirikuhabisa.
Nimwija kwiba, kwita, kushambana, kurahira ebishuba, kwoterera Baali obubaane, n'okukuratira baaruhanga abandi abu mutakamanyaga,
haza mwije muunyemerere omumaisho omuri egi nju erikwetererwa eiziina ryangye, mugire muti: Tujunirwe!, haza kuri okugumizamu nimukora ebyo bihagaro byona?
Egi nju erikwetererwa eiziina ryangye ebahindukiire enyanga y'abambuzi? Reeba, nyowe ahabwangye nikireebire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nimwirooko muze omu mwanya gwangye ogwabaire guri Shiilo, ei naabandize kutuuza eiziina ryangye, mureebe oku naagugizire ningitura obubi bw'abantu bangye Israeli.
Mbwenu, ahabw'okukora ebyo byona, mukanga kuhurira n'obu ndaabe naagumiizemu nimbagambira, kandi nkibeeta mutaanyetabe,
nikyo ndigirira kubi enju erikwetererwa eiziina ryangye ei murikwesiga, n'omwanya ogu naabahaire na baashwenkuriimwe, nk'oku naagizire Shiilo.
Kandi ndyabacwa mundugye omumaisho, nk'oku naacwire beene waanyu boona oruzaaro rwona orwa Efuraimu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Torikureeba ebi barikukora omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu?

Abaana ni batorotoora enku, baishebo nibahemba omuriro, abakazi nibabumbabumba eisyanga, kuteekyera omugabekazi w'eiguru otukeeki, kandi bashukira baaruhanga abandi empongano z'eby'okunywa kuunyitsa ekiniga.
Nimugira ngu niinye barikwitsa ekiniga?, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira; tibo barikukyeitsa, bakeereetera okubwerabwera?

Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, okuguubwa kubi kwangye n'ekiniga kyangye biryashukwa aha mwanya ogu, aha bantu n'amatungo, aha biti by'omu ishwa n'aha myaka y'omu misiri, kyakye, kireme kuraaza.
ahabw'okuba aha izooba eri naihiireho baashwenkuriimwe omu nsi ya Misri, tindabagambiire, kandi tindabaragiire by'ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo;

kuraka eki nikyo kiragiro ki naabahaire, ningira nti: Mworobere eiraka ryangye, naanye ndyaba Ruhanga waanyu, naimwe mube abantu bangye, kandi mugyendere omu mitwarize yoona ei ndikubaragiira, mubone kuba gye.
Kwonka baayanga kworoba, n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, kureka baaguma nibagyendera omu naama zaabo n'omu buteegi bw'emitima yaabo emibi; omu mwanya gw'okugyenda omumaisho, baagaruka enyima.
Okwiha aha izooba eri baashwenkuriimwe baarugiireho omu nsi ya Misri n'okuhitsya eri izooba nkaguma nimbooherereza abairu bangye boona baanabi ntarikwosha;
kwonka hoona tibaraanyorobeire n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, kureka bakagangaaza ebitsya, baakora kubi okukira baishenkurubo.
Mbwenu obagambire ebigambo ebyo byona, kwonka tibarikwija kukuhurira; noija kubeeta, kwonka tibarikwija kukwetaba;
kandi obagire oti: Eri n'eihanga eritaroorobeire iraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waaryo, rikanga kutegyekwa; amazima gahwerekyereire, tigakiri mu kanwa kaabo.
Ocurire aha bibungo by'emparamaata;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ayangire abantu
Abu ainiire ekiniga, yabatsigaho.

Kandi bombekyeire Tofeti omwanya mukuru gw'okuramizamu omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, kurabya abaana baabo b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki omu muriro, eki ntarabaragiire, kandi ekitakaijaga mu biteekateeko byangye.

N'ahabw'ekyo mumanye ngu ebiro biryaija, obu ogwo mwanya gutarigaruka kwetwa ogwa Tofeti nari oruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, kureka guryayetwa oruhanga rw'eriitiro; ahabw'okuba omuri Tofeti nimwo bariziika ahabw'okubura ahandi hoona.
Emitumbi y'aba bantu eryariibwa amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu nsi, habure ow'okubikanga.
Kandi ndyahunamya eiraka ry'okushemererwa n'ery'okwesiima, n'eiraka rya kishwera na kishwerwa ngamare omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba ensi eryaba amatongo.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Omu biro ebyo amagufa g'abagabe ba Yuda, ag'abanyiginya baayo, ag'abanyamurwa, aga baanabi, n'ag'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, garyaihwa omu bituuro byabo,

bagaanikye omu maisho g'eizooba, omu maisho g'okwezi n'omu maisho g'eihe ryona ery'omu iguru, ebi baabaire bakunda bakabiheereza, bakabikuratira, bakabiherura kubiramya; tigarishanguruzibwa n'obu kwakuba okuziikwa, kureka garyaba nk'amasha aha itaka.
Abaritsigaraho omuri orwo ruganda rubi, ei ndiba mbataataanisiize yoona, okufa kuryabakirira okugumaho; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Beitu abantu ku bagwa, tibaimuka?
Omuntu ku ahaba, tahabuuka?
Bakagumizamu?
Bahamiire omu bugobya,
Baayanga kugaruka.
Naahurira nibagamba ebitahikire;
Tihariho n'omwe orikweteisa ebibi bye,
Akagira ati: Mbwenu eki naakora ki?
Buri muntu naatoora omuhanda gwe,
Nk'oku embaraasi eturumbuza neeza aha rugamba.
Zimanya obunaku bwazo;
Enkombe, entaratambi n'entuuha
Bimanya obunaku bwabyo bw'okwiziramu;
Beitu abantu bangye bo tibarikumanya
Ekiragiro kya MUKAMA.
Kandi ebiragiro bya MUKAMA niitwe tubiine?
Haza kunu ekaraamu y'abahandiiki embeihi
Ebihindwire eby'ebishuba.
Bahahaaze emitima, bakwatwe.
Reeba, beehakaine ekigambo kya MUKAMA;
Mbwenu ni bwengye ki obu baine?
N'emisiri yaabo ngihe abaribasingura,
Ahabw'okuba okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru
Boona baine omururu gw'amagoba gatahikire;
Okuruga ahari nabi okuhika aha munyamurwa
Boona nibakora eby'obugobya.
Obuhuta bw'abantu bangye babutambire aharuguru,
Nibagira bati: N'obusingye! N'obusingye!
Haza obusingye butariho.
Ngaaha! Tibarazigizire na kakye,
N'obu kwakuba okubwerabwera;
N'ahabw'ekyo baryagwa omuri abo abagwa;
Omu bunaku obu ndibafubiririramu,
Baryakumbagazibwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ebijuma tibiriboneka ha mizaabibu nari aha mitiini,
Kandi n'amababi gaayo garyahotoka,
N'ebi naabahaire biryabaihwaho.
Muteerane, tutaahe omu ndembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare,
Tube niyo twacwekyererera;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu atucwereire orubanja rw'okucwekyerera,
Yaatuha amaizi agarikwita kuganywa,
Ahabw'okuba tucumwire ahari MUKAMA.
Tutegyereize obunaku bw'okutambirirwamu,
Mbwenu reeba, haija ebirikutiinisa.
Eiraka ry'okububura kw'enimi zaazo
Nirireetera ensi yoona kutengyeeta,
Ahabw'okuba baizire, baamaraho ensi,
N'ebigirimu byona, orurembo n'abarutwiremu.
N'empiri ezitarikubaasa kurogwa,
Zibarume; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omutima gwangye gugwire enshazi.
Muhurire eiraka ry'eihanga ry'abantu bangye,
Eririkureetwa oku n'oku omu nsi yoona,
Nibagira bati: MUKAMA tari omuri Saayuuni?
Omugabe waayo timwo ari?
Ahabw'enki bangwisize kubi n'ebishushani byabo ebibaizire,
N'ebirikuramibwa eby'enduga-mahanga?
Eigyesha rihweire, n'ekyanda kyahwa,
Kandi titukajunirwe.
Ndi omu rufu, nshobeirwe.
Tihaakibayo omufumu?
Ahabw'enki abantu bangye batakakizire?
Nkaabaasibwa ki, omutwe gwangye gwijura amaizi,
N'amaisho gangye gaba enshuro y'amarira,
Ncura nyomushana na nyekiro
Ahabw'abantu bangye abaitsirwe!
Mbona kutsigaho abantu bangye, nza hare yaabo!
Ahabw'okuba boona n'enshambani,
N'omutwe gw'abantu endeebya.
Bahinduka ab'amaani omu nsi, kwonka kutarikurwanira mazima;
Kureka ku baheza kukora ekibi, bagaruka bakora ekindi,
Kandi tibarikummanya; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Arekye kugira mwene ishe weena ou yaayesiga;
Ahabw'okuba buri w'eishe-emwe n'engobya,
Na buri mutaahi naagyenda naabeiherera abandi.
Buri muntu naagobeza mutaahi we,
Tihaine orikugamba amazima;
Beegyeise endimi zaabo kubeiha,
Kandi nibakora ebibi, babura agabyeteisa.
N'obugobya aha bundi,
Banga kummanya; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugirira ati:
Reeba, ndyabashemeza, mbagyeze.
Mbwenu ekindi eki naakukorera abantu bangye niki?
Nirugamba eby'obugobya;
Buri muntu naagamba gye na mugyenzi we aha rurimi,
Kwonka omu mutima gwe ari omu naama y'okumugiira omu kyetindo.
Nimugira ngu tindibafubira ahabw'ekyo?
Tindihoora enzigu eihanga nk'eri?
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mutongyeze amariisizo g'omu ihamba,
Ahabw'okuba bihindukire amarungu,
Tihaine orikubirabamu,
Kandi n'okujuga kw'ente tikurikuhurirwayo.
Enyonyi z'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa
Bihungire, byagyenda.
N'eikoobaniro rya zaamuha;
N'endembo za Yuda nzigire amatongo,
Zibure ow'okuzituuramu.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Ahabw'okureka ebiragiro byangye ebi naabahaire, batoorobere iraka ryangye, nari okutwaza nk'oku ririkubaragiira,
kureka bakakuratira ebi emitima yaabo egangaire erikwenda, hamwe na Baabaali, nk'oku baishenkurubo baabeegyeise.
Nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugirira ati: Reeba, eri ihanga ndyarigaburira apusinto, ndinywaise amaizi agarikwita;
ndyabataataanisiza omu mahanga agu bo na baishenkurubo batakamanyaga, mbakuratse rurara, okuhitsya obu ndibamaraho.
Muteekateekye, mwete abakazi abarikumanya kucura,
Mutume aha bakazi abahangu, baije;
Barahukye, batucurire,
Amarira gatufukunkukye omumaisho,
n'ebitsigye byaitu bihimintikye amaizi;
Nirigira riti: Eshi tucwekyereziibwe!
Tuhemuriirwe kimwe,
Ahabw'okuba tutsigireho ensi,
Amaka gaitu baagasheenya.
Imwe bakazi 'mwe, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA,
Kandi amatu gaanyu gaakiire ekigambo ekirikuruga omu kanwa ke;
Mwegyese bahara baanyu okucura,
Kandi buri muntu ayegyese mutaahi we okutonzya;
Yaataaha omu bikaari byaitu,
Yaamara abaana omu nguuto,
N'abatsigazi omu nteeraniro z'emihanda.
Emitumbi y'abantu eryagwa omu ishwa nk'amasha,
Nk'enganda zitsigaire enyima y'omugyesi
Ezitaine kishanguruza.

kureka orikwehimbisa ayehimbise ahabw'ebi, ahabw'okuunyetegyereza n'ahabw'okummanya, ku ndi MUKAMA okora omu nsi eby'embabazi, eby'oburyo n'eby'okuhikiirira; ahabw'okuba ebyo nibyo nshemerererwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Misri, Yuda, Edomu, beene Amoni, Moabu n'abatwire omu ihamba boona, abatega ebyeyera; ahabw'okuba amahanga ago goona tigashazirwe; kandi n'enju ya Israeli teshazirwe mu mutima.
Imwe b'enju ya Israeli 'mwe, nimuhurire ekigambo eki MUKAMA arikubagambira.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Mutaritooreza emicwe y'abanyamahanga,
Nari okuhahaaza emitima ahabw'obumanyiso bw'omu iguru,
Ahabw'okuba amahanga gabuhahaariize emitima.
Ahakuba abantu batema ekiti omu kibira,
Omunyamwoga akibaija n'embaijo,
Abantu bakihunda efeeza n'ezaabu,
Bakihamisa emisumaari n'enyondo,
Ngu kitajegajega.
Omu musiri gw'ekihambo;
Tibigamba, biba eby'okuheekwa,
Ahabw'okuba tibibaasa kugyenda.
Mutaribitiina, ahakuba tibiine ki birikubaasa kukora,
Yaaba kibi, yaaba kirungi.
Ori mukuru, n'eiziina ryawe ni rikuru kandi ery'amaani.
Manya ekyo nikyo oshemereire,
Ahabw'okuba omu banyabwengye boona ab'omu mahanga,
N'mu nsi z'abagabe baago zoona,
Tihaine orikushushana naiwe.
Ebi ebishushani byegyesa n'ebiti nkabyo.
N'ezaabu eya Ufaazi.
Ebyo bishushani n'omurimo gw'abanyamyoga n'abaheesi b'ezaabu;
Ebijwaro byabo n'ebya bururu na bujwa;
Byona bikorwa abahangu.
Ruhanga ohuriire, kandi Omukama otahwaho.
Ku agira ekiniga, ensi etengyeeta,
Kandi amahanga tigarikubaasa kwemera kuguubwa kubi kwe.
Akagihamya n'obwengye bwe,
N'okwetegyereza kwe nikwo yaabambiise eiguru.
Ainamura oruho okuruga aha mperu z'ensi,
Ataho emirabyo kugwisa enjura,
Kandi areeta omuyaga naagwiha omu mabiikiro ge.
Buri muheesi w'ezaabu ahemwirwe ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa,
Ahabw'okuba ebishushani bye n'eby'ebishuba,
Kandi tibiine mwiysto.
Tibiine mugasho; n'omurimo gw'okubeihabeiha;
Omu biro by'okufubirwa kwabyo biryahwerekyerera.
Ahabw'okuba niwe yaahangire ebintu byona,
Kandi Israeli n'oruganda rw'obuhunguzi bwe;
MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina rye.
Iha ebintu byawe ahansi;
Reeba, naaza kunaga hare abatuuzi b'omuri egi nsi,
Nk'orikurekyera enjungu;
Mbareetere obusaasi, babuhurire.
Obuhuta bwangye nibumpurura.
Kwonka naagira nti: Buzimazima oku n'okubonabona,
Nshemereire kukwemera.
Emirunga yangye yoona ecwekire;
Abaana bangye bantsigireho, tibakiriho.
Tihariho w'okugaruka kunteerera eihema
N'okumpanikira emikingo.
Tibarikwehanuuza ahari MUKAMA;
Nikyo kibazibiire kuba gye,
N'obusyo bwona butaataine.
Hariho okujagarara kwingi okurikuruga omu nsi y'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho,
Okurihindura endembo za Yuda amatongo,
N'eikoobaniro rya zaamuha.
Kandi omuntu weena ogyenda tabaasa kwehabura mu rugyendo rwe ahu yaahika hoona.
Otampanisa ekiniga, okancwekyereza.
Aha nganda ezitatakira iziina ryawe;
Ahabw'okuba bashonshomeire Yakobo;
Bamushonshomeire, baamumaraho,
N'ahu atwire baahahindura amatongo.
Ekigambo kikaruga ahari MUKAMA, kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Hurira ebigambo byendagaano egi, ogambire Abayuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu oti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Omuntu otarikuta mutima ha bigambo by'endagaano egi, akyeenwe;

niyo ndagaano ei naaragiire baashwenkuriimwe, obu naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri, omu iziiko ry'ekyoma, ningira nti: Mugume muhurire eiraka ryangye, mukore ebi ndikubaragiira byona. Obwo nibwo muriba abantu bangye, naanye nkaba Ruhanga waanyu,
mukabona kuhikiiriza endahiro ei naarahiire baashwenkuriimwe kubaha ensi y'amate n'obwoki, nk'oku kiri hati. Ntyo naamugarukamu nti: MUKAMA, kibe nikwo kyaba.
ahabw'okuba, obu naiha baashwenkuriimwe omu nsi ya Misri, nkabeehanangiriza munonga, naaguma nimbateisa obutoosha n'okuhitsya hati, nti: Muhurire eiraka ryangye.

Kwonka tibaanyorobera n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, kureka buri muntu yaakuratira obugangaazi bw'omutima gwe omubi. Nikyo naabareeteireho ebigambo byona eby'egi ndagaano, ebi naabaragiire kukora, kwonka batabikore.

Bagarukire enyima omu by'okushiisha bya baishenkurubo abaayangire kuhurira ebigambo byangye; mbwenu bakuratiire baaruhanga abandi kubaheereza; enju ya Israeli n'eya Yuda baitsire endagaano yangye, ei naaragaine na baishenkurubo.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati: Reeba, naaza kubareetaho akabi, aku batarikubaasa kukira; n'obu barintakira, tindibahurira.
Obwo ab'omu ndembo za Yuda n'abatwire omuri Yerusaalemu baryaza kutakira baaruhanga abu booterera obubaane; kwonka tibaribaasa kubajuna mu biro by'obusaasi bwabo.

Ahabw'okuba iwe Yuda, nk'oku endembo zaawe zirikwingana, na baaruhanga baawe nikwo bari; kandi nk'oku enguuto za Yerusaalemu zirikwingana, nikwo n'amatambiro gaanyu gari, agu mwayombekyeire ekirikwitsa enshoni, nigo g'okwotereraho Baali obubaane.

Nkunzi yangye naakireetwa ki omu nju yangye, yaakozire n'abaingi ebihagaro? Noogira ngu eby'okuragaanisa noorahira n'enyama z'ebitambo nibibaasa kwihaho ekifubiro kyawe? Mbwenu noobaasa kwehimbisa, haza okozire ekibi?
Ira MUKAMA akaba akwetsire omuzeituuni murungi oguyumbize, kandi ogwine ebijuma birungi, mbwenu ahabw'okuhoorera kw'omuyaga mwingi aryagwotsya, amataagi gaagwo gasiriire.
MUKAMA ow'amahe owaakubyaire, akucwereire orubanja rw'okuhikwaho akabi, naakutura ebibi ebi enju ya Israeli n'eya Yuda baakozire, bakangwisa kubi ahabw'okwoterera Baali obubaane.
MUKAMA akakimmanyisa, naakimanya;
Bwanyima waanyoreka ebibi byabo, ebi barikukora.
Ogurikutwarwa kwitwa.
Tindamanyire ku niinye barikurwanisa,
Nibangiira omu naama, nibagira bati:
Ka tucwekyereze omuti n'ebijuma byagwo,
Ka tumumareho omu nsi y'abahuriire,
Eiziina rye ritariijukwa obundi.
Okagyeza emitima n'ebiteekateeko,
Bahoore nindeeba,
Ahabw'okuba niiwe nyegyekyereire ebyangye.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugambira aha bantu ba Anatoosi abarikwenda kukwita, nibagira bati: Reka kuhanuura omu iziina rya MUKAMA, tutakaakwita,
kandi nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugirira ati: Reeba, ndyabafubira; abatsigazi baitwe rurara, abaana baabo b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki baitwe enjara,
habure owaarokokaho; ahabw'okuba ndyareeta akabi ahari abo bantu b'omuri Anatoosi omu mwaka ogu barifubirirwamu.
Ori ohikiriire;
Kwonka nkaayenzire kwetonganira omu maisho gaawe.
Ahabw'enki ababi bahiirwa omu mihanda yaabo?
Ahabw'enki endeebya zoona ziba gye?
Bakakura, bakaana.
Tobaruga ha rurimi,
Haza emitima yaabo ekuri hare.
Ondeeba kandi omanya oku omutima gwangye gwemi ahariiwe.
Bahuruutureyo nk'entaama ezirikuza kubaagwa,
Obabiikire eizooba ry'okwitirwaho.
N'obunyaatsi bw'omuri buri ishwa kuhotoka?
Amatungo n'ebirikuguruka biryamarwaho
Ahabw'obubi bw'abagitwiremu,
Ahabw'okuba abantu bakagira bati:
Tarireeba muheru gwaitu.
Noobaasa ota kuhakana n'embaraasi?
Ku oraabe nooremwa ori omu nsi y'obusingye,
Oryagira ota omu bishaka bya Yorudani ebikwataine
Nabo bakureebize;
Nibakuyombera enyima, bakubingire;
N'obu barikugambira gye, otaribeesiga.
N'obuhunguzi bwangye naabureka;
Nkunzi yangye y'aha mara
Naamuhayo omu mikono y'abazigu be.
Obuhunguzi bwangye bumpindukiire entare y'omu kibira,
Bwaimutsya eiraka ryabwo, bwantontomera;
Nikyo ndikubwangira.
Agandi mahanga agabwehinguririize nigaburwanisa?
Mugyende, muteerane enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa,
Muzireete, zishonshomere.
Baaribatiirira omugabo gwangye;
Omugabo gwangye murungi baagugira eihamba eritatuurwamu.
Niguntakira ahabw'okushoberwa;
Ensi yoona ehindwirwe amatongo,
Kwonka tihariho muntu n'omwe okyetaireho.
Abahwerekyerezi baizire
Aha bibungo by'emparamaata eby'omu ihamba,
Ahabw'okuba rurara ya MUKAMA neerya busha
Okuruga aha rubaju rumwe rw'ensi okuhika aha rundi;
Tihariho kiine omubiri kyona ekiine obusingye.
Beerusya, babura eki baihamu;
Ebi basharwire biryabakwatsa enshoni
Ahabw'ekiniga kingi kya MUKAMA.
Kandi ku ndiheza kubarandura, ndyagaruka mbagirire esaasi, mbagarure, buri muntu agarukye omu buhunguzi bwe n'omu butaka bwe.

Kandi obunaku ku burihika, baayezirika kutooreza emicwe y'abantu bangye okurahira eiziina ryangye bati: Nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire, nk'oku baayegyeise abantu bangye kurahira Baali, obwo baryahamibwa omu bantu bangye.
Kwonka eihanga ryona ku riryanga kuhurira, ndyarirandurira kimwe, ndicwekyereze; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ntyo naagura orukoba, naarwezirikisa nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA oku kyabaire kiri.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho obwa kabiri nikigira kiti:
Twara orwo rukoba oru oguzire, oru oyezirikiise, oimukye oze Para, orusherekye omu nonko y'orukiri.
Ntyo naagyenda, naarushereka haihi na Para, nk'oku MUKAMA yandagiira.
Ebiro bingi ku byahingwireho, MUKAMA yangira ati: Imuka ogarukye Para, oiheyo orukoba oru naakuragiire kusherekayo.
Naanye nikwo kugaruka Para, nkacukura, nkaiha orwo rukoba ahu naabaire ndusherekire. Kandi reeba, orwo rukoba rukaba rusiisikaire, rutakiine mugasho.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Okwo nikwo ndishiisha amaryo ga Yuda n'amaryo ga Yerusaalemu agarengyesereize.

Eihanga eri eribi eririkwanga kuhurira ebigambo byangye, abantu abarikukuratira ebi emitima yaabo egangaire erikwenda, bakakuratira baaruhanga abandi kubaheereza n'okubaramya, baryaba nk'orwo rukoba orutakiine mugasho.

Ahabw'okuba nk'oku orukoba ruhamira omuntu omu bwezirikiro, nikwo naayehamiizeho enju ya Israeli yoona n'eya Yuda yoona, ngu bambeere eihanga, eiziina ery'okumpimbisisa, n'okumpaisa ekitiinisa; kwonka baayanga kuhurira.

Naiwe obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kusindiza kimwe abatwire omu nsi egi boona, abagabe abashutami aha kitebe kya Daudi, abanyamurwa, baanabi n'abatuuzi b'omuri Yerusaalemu boona,
mbahondanise, buri muntu na mugyenzi we, abaana na baishebo. Tindikwija kubasaasira, nari okubareka, n'obu kwakuba okubagirira esaasi, ngu ntabahwerekyereza; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Muhurire, kandi mutegye amatu;
Murekye amaryo, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe yaagamba.
Atakareetsire mwirima,
Ebigyere byanyu bitakateereire ntsibo aha bibungo omu rwita-waabo,
Kandi, mukiba nimusherura okuhweza,
Akakuhindura ekicuucu kya rufu,
Kukaba omwirima ndindindi.
Omutima gwangye nigwija kuririra omu mubonano
Nindizibwa amaryo gaanyu,
Niinyija kurira munonga, amarira nigampimintika omu maisho,
Ahabw'okuba obusyo bwa MUKAMA bunyagirwe.
Mwecureeze, mushutame ahansi;
Ahabw'okuba ebirunga byanyu ebirungi
Bibarugire aha mitwe.
Tihariho w'okuziigura;
Abayuda batwairwe omu bukwatwa,
Baatwarirwa kimwe.
obusyo bwawe buri oburungi, obu waabaire ohairwe, burahi?
Abu waayegyeise, bakaba banywani baawe?
Torikwatwa obusaasi, nk'obw'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara?
Ahabw'enki ebi byona bimpikireho?
Eby'okushiisha byawe ebirengyesereize
Nibyo bireeteire ekipumpuriya kyawe kuhenuka,
okufa kubi, obubisha bukakubonabonesa.
Nari engwe kuhindura amabara gaayo?
Kuri ekyo nikibaasika,
Naimwe abamanyiire kukora kubi
Mukaabaasize kukora kurungi.
Ebirikutwarwa omuyaga gw'omu ihamba.
Ahabw'okuunyebwa, okeesiga ebishuba;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nyowe nyenka nikyo ndihenurira ekipumpuriya kyawe,
Nkakikuhitsya aha buso, enshoni zaawe zikareebwa.
N'eiraka ry'obwamaraaya bwawe
Ebi okoreire omu ishwa aha bibungo.
Oryakareeba, iwe Yerusaalemu!
Oryahitsya hi n'okwanga kwezibwa?
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaija ahari Yeremia ahabw'omushana mwingi gw'ekyanda, nikigira kiti:
Omu marembo gaayo abantu nibagwa enshazi.
Abantu baayo nibatongyeza ahansi,
N'okuborooga kwa Yerusaalemu kuhikire ahaiguru.
Bakihika aha maziba, bashanga amaizi gatarimu,
Bagaruka enyungu zaabo zirimu busha,
Baine enshoni bashobeirwe,
Ahabw'ensi kugangabuka, ebuzire enjura.
Yaaheza kubazaara, ahabw'okubura obunyaatsi.
Zihaahagira nk'emishega;
Amaisho gazigwire omunda ahabw'okubura obunyaatsi.
Ai MUKAMA, kora ahabw'eiziina ryawe;
Ahabw'okuba okugaruka enyima kwaitu ni kwingi;
Tukakucumuraho.
Omujuna omu biro by'enaku,
Okaahindukiire ki nk'omunyaihanga omu nsi,
Nk'omugyenzi okiikama kuraara bwaira?
Nk'emanzi eremirwe kujuna?
Ai MUKAMA, n'obu kiraabe kiri kityo,
Ori omuriitwe, nitwetererwa eiziina ryawe.
Otatutsigaho.
Okwo nikwo baayenzire kurara
Batabandame hamwe;
Nikyo MUKAMA atarikubaikiririza;
Aryaijuka eby'okushiisha byabo,
Abafubire ahabw'ebibi byabo.
N'obu baraayesiibyekwo, tindikwija kuhurira kutaka kwabo; kandi n'obu barampongyere ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'esaano, tindikwija kubyakiira; kureka ndyabamaraho na rurara n'enjara n'orufu.

MUKAMA yangira ati: Baanabi abo nibahanuura ebishuba omu iziina ryangye; tiinye mbatumire, tiinye mbaragiire, n'obu kwakuba okubagambira. Nibabahanuurira okworekwa kw'ebishuba, baragura ebitaine mutambo, n'obugobya bw'omu mitima yaabo.

Nikyo MUKAMA arikugambira aha bya baanabi abarikuhanuura omu iziina ryangye, haza ntabatumire, bakgira bati: Rurara n'ejara tibiriteera egi nsi; naagira ati: Baanabi abo nibaija kumarwaho rurara n'ejara;

n'abantu abu baanabi barikuhanuurira baryanagwa omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu, nibaitwa enjara na rurara, babure kiziika, bo n'abakazi baabo na batabani baabo kandi na bahara baabo; ahabw'okuba ndyabashukaho obubi bwabo.
K'amaisho gangye gahimitikye amarira
Nyomushana na nyekiro, garekye kwoma;
Ahabw'okuba abantu bangye bateirwe munonga,
Baahutaazibwa obuhuta buhango.
Ku ndikuza omu ishwa,
Nshangayo abaitsirwe rurara;
Ku ndikuza omu rurembo,
Nshangamu abarembiibwe enjara,
Ahabw'okuba baanabi n'abanyamurwa nibazengyerera omu nsi egi
Bataine ki barikumanya.
Omutima gwawe gutamirwe Saayuuni?
Otuteereire ki, tukabura kutambirwa?
Tukategyereza obusingye, titwabona karungi;
Twategyereza okutambirwa, haija okushoberwa.
N'eby'okushiisha bya baatatenkuriitwe;
Ahabw'okuba tukakucumuraho.
Otakwatsa enshoni ekitebe kyawe ky'ekitiinisa.
Ijuka endagaano ei waaragaine naitwe, otagiita.
Harimu owaakubaasa kugwisa enjura?
Nari eiguru ahabwaryo niribaasa kugwisa enjura y'orutoonyerera?
Tiiwe MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu?
Niiwe twineho amatsiko,
Ahabw'okuba ebyo byona niiwe obikora.
Kandi ku baraakubuuze bati: Tuze hi? obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Ab'okwitwa rufu, baitwe rufu;
Ab'okwitwa rurara, baitwe rurara;
Ab'okwitwa enjara, baitwe enjara,
N'ab'okutwarwa omu bukwatwa, batwarwe.
Kandi ndyabahindura eky'okutiinisa amahanga g'abagabe boona ab'omu nsi nimbatura ebi Manaase mwene Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda yaakoreire Yerusaalemu.
Nari shi, n'oha oraakucurire?
N'oha oraayerusye kukiikama
kukubuuza oku oraire?
Waaguma noogaruka enyima;
Nikyo nkubangiriire omukono, nkakumaraho.
Ahabw'okuba okugumisiriza kunduhize.
Naabamaraho abaana, naacwekyereza abantu bangye;
Kwonka tibaareka mitwarize yaabo mibi.
Naabakanyisamu abafaakazi,
Baaba baingi okukira omusheenyi gw'aha nyanja.
Ndeeteire baanyina b'abatsigazi omuhwerekyerezi omu ihangwe;
Naabareetera obusaasi n'obwoba,
Naabibagwisaho kitaraariire.
Yaagwa enshazi;
Eizooba rye ryarenga butakaizire;
Akwatsirwe enshoni, yaabwerabwera.
Kandi abahonokireho ndyabacwekyerereza
Omu maisho g'abazigu baabo na rurara;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ai MUKAMA, nkaashemereire kujunwa, kuri ntarakweshengyereize kubakorera ebirungi, nari kukweshengyereza kubakiza abazigu omu biro by'enaku n'omu biro by'obusaasi!
Hariho omuntu owaakubaasa kuhenda ekyoma, ekyoma ekirikuruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, akahenda n'omuringa?
Ndyabareetera kuheerereza abazigu baawe omu nsi i otarikumanya; ahabw'okuba omuriro ogwakiibwe ekiniga kyangye guryaguma nigwaka ebiro byona.
Onyijukye, ontaayaayire,
Ompoorere enzigu abarikumpiiga;
Ahabw'okugumisiriza kwawe otaanyihaho,
Omanye ku ndikujumwa ninturwa iwe ahabwawe.
Byambeera okushemererwa,
N'okunanuka kw'omu mutima;
Ahabw'okuba niinyetererwa eiziina ryawe,
MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe.
Kandi naanye tindashemereirwe,
Kureka nkashutama nyenka ahabw'omukono gwawe,
Ahabw'okuba okaanyijuza okuguubwa kubi.
N'obuhuta bwangye butatambwa, bukanga kukira?
Noija kumbeera nk'akagyera akarikubeiha,
N'amaizi agarikwoma?
Ku oraagarukye, niinyija kukugarura,
Obone kuunyemerera omumaisho.
Ku oraataanise eby'omugasho n'ebitagwine,
Oryaba nk'akanwa kangye.
Baryakugarukira, kwonka iwe toribagarukira.
Baryakurwanisa, kwonka tibarikubaasa,
Ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naiwe
Kukukiza n'okukwiha omu mikono yaabo;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nkucungure, orugye omu mikono y'abarikutiinisa.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Otarishwera omukazi, kandi otarizaarira abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki omu mwanya ogu.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugmaba aha baana ba'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki abarizaarirwa omu mwanya ogu, n'ahari baanyinabo na baishebo abaabazaariire omu nsi egi, naagira ati:

Baryafa baitwe endwara ezirikwita. Tihariho oribacurira nari oribaziika; emitumbi yaabo eryaba nk'amasha aha itaka. Baryahwerekyerezibwa rurara n'ejara; kandi emitumbi yaabo eryaba egabo y'amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba.
Abakuru n'abato baryafeera omuri egi nsi hatariho mutaano; tibariziikwa, kandi tihariho oribacurira n'obu kwakuba okweshara nari okumwa enkomborora ahabwabo.
Tihariho baribegyera ori omu rufu omugaati kumuyaagira ahabw'okufeerwa; kandi tibariha ofeereirwe ishe nari nyina ekikopo ky'amaizi kumugwisa gye.
Kandi otaritaaha omu nju omu barikuriira obugyenyi kushutama nabo kurya n'okunywa;
ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyahunamya amaraka g'okwesiima n'okushemererwa, erya kishwera n'erya kishwerwa omu mwanya ogu, mukiriho nimureeba.
naiwe oryabagarukamu oti: Kireetsirwe baashwenkuriimwe abaanyimwire, bakakuratira baaruhanga abandi, bakabaheereza, bakabaramya, bakantsigaho, batoorobere biragiro byangye;
kandi naimwe mukirize baashwenkuriimwe abo kukora kubi, ahabw'okuba buri muntu weena omuriimwe naakuratira ebibi by'omu mutima gwe gw'obugangaazi naayanga kumpurira.

Nikyo ndibabingira omuri egi nsi, mukaza omu nsi ei mutakamanyaga n'obu baakuba baashwenkuriimwe, kandi okwo niyo muriheerereza baaruhanga abandi nyomushana na nyekiro; ahabw'okuba tindibagirira mbabazi.

kureka bagire bati: Nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire owaihire Abaisraeli omu nsi y'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'omu nsi zoona ei yaabaire ababingiire; ahabw'okuba ndyabagarura omu nsi yaabo y'obuzaarwa ei naahaire baishenkurubo.
Ahabw'okuba amaisho gangye ngataire aha mitwarize yaabo yoona; tensherekirwe, n'eby'okushiisha byabo tibisherekirwe, ngu ntabireeba.
Eby'okushiisha byabo n'ekibi kyabo ndyabibazimuurira kabiri, ahabw'okuba bakahagaza ensi yangye emitumbi y'ebishushani byabo ebirikunugwa, obuhunguzi bwangye baabwijuzamu ebihagaro byabo.
Kandi obuhungiro bwangye omu biro by'okubonabonesezibwamu,
Amahanga garyakwijaho
Nigaruga aha mpeuru z'ensi, gagire gati:
Ebi baatatenkuriitwe baahungwire n'ebishuba bisha,
Ni busha, n'ebintu bitaine mugasho.
Baaruhanga nk'abo ti baaruhanga!
n'abaana baabo nibakiijuka amatambiro gaabo n'ebishushani byabo bya Ashera ebyabaire biba haihi na buri kiti kibisi ekyetwa omurinzi aha bibungo biraingwa,
n'aha nshozi omu nsi z'obwerere. Obutungi bwawe n'ebintu byawe byona ebirungi ndyabihayo kuba eminyago omu nsi yaawe yoona nooturwa ekibi kyawe.
Naiwe wenka toriguma mu buhunguzi bwawe obu naakuhaire, kureka oryaheerereza abazigu baawe omu nsi ei otarikumanya; ahabw'okuba omuriro ogwakiibwe ekiniga kyangye guryaguma nigwaka ebiro byona.
Orikwesiga ondiijo muntu,
Akahindura omuntu-buntu eky'okumurinda,
Akaimuura MUKAMA omu mutima gwe, akyeenirwe.
Kandi ekirungi kyona ekiriija tarikireeba,
Kureka aryatuura omu myanya y'omu ihamba ekarangataine,
Omu nsi y'omwonyo etatuurwamu bantu.
Ahiiriirwe;
Ogurikutsimba emizi yaagwo haihi n'omugyera;
Tigutiina mushana gw'ekyanda,
Kureka amababi gaagwo gaguma nigabengyeya,
N'omu mwaka gw'omushana mwingi tigwemereza mutima,
Ahabw'okuba tigureka kwera bijuma.
Omutima n'engobya okukira ebintu byona,
Gwine endwara etarikutambwa;
N'oha owaakubaasa kugumanya?
Nkagyeza omutima
Nkazimuurira omuntu weena nk'emitwarize ye oku eri,
Nk'ebyana ebirugire omu bi akozire oku biri.
ni nk'endahi erikubumbatira abaana abu etazire.
Obwo butungi buryamuhwaho akiri rwagati y'amagara ge,
Bwanyima aha muheru gwe abe omushema.
Omwanya gwaitu ogurikwera n'ekitebe ky'obukama bw'ekitiinisa;
Kikateebwa ahaiguru okuruga aha kutandika.
Abarikukwimuura boona baryakwatwa enshoni;
Abarikukurugaho baryahandiikwa omu nsi,
Ahabw'okuba baimwire MUKAMA,
Enshuro y'amaizi g'amagara.
Njuna, nibwo ndaajunwe;
Ahabw'okuba niiwe ky'okutiinisa kyangye.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kirahi?
Mbwenu nu nikiije!
N'obu kwakuba okwetenga eizooba ry'akabi kwija,
Noobimanya.
Ekyarugire omu kanwa kangye kikaba nikireetwa butunu omumaisho gaawe.
Ori obuhungiro bwangye aha izooba ry'enaku.
Kwonka nyowe zirekye kunkwata;
Bo bahahaare omutima,
Kwonka ogwangye gurekye kuhahaara;
Obahitsyeho eizooba ry'akabi,
Obahwerekyereze kabiri.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA yangambiire naagira ati: Irooko oyemerere omu irembo rya Benyamiini, ahu abagabe ba Yuda bataahira n'ahu bashohorera, n'omu marembo goona aga Yerusaalemu,
obagire oti: Imwe bagabe ba Yuda 'mwe, na Yuda yoona, n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu mwena abaraba omuri aga marembo, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Mwerinde, muteekorera omutwaro gwona aha izooba rya sabato, n'obu kwakuba okugurabya omu marembo ga Yerusaalemu.
Kandi mutashohoza omutwaro omu maka gaanyu aha izooba rya sabato, n'obu kwakuba okurikoreraho omurimo gwona, kureka mugume murinde eryo izooba kuba eririkwera, nk'oku naaragiire baashwenkuriimwe.
Kwonka tibarahuriire n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, kureka bakagangaaza ebitsya, ngu barekye kuhurira n'obu kwakuba okwikiriza kwegyesibwa.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Kwonka ku murampurire, mutaarabya mutwaro gwona omu marembo g'oru rurembo aha izooba rya sabato, kureka mwaririnda kuba eririkwera, mutaagira murimo gwona ogu mwarikoreraho,

obwo abagabe abari aha ngoma ya Daudi baryataaha omu marembo g'oru rurembo bari omu bigaari by'orugamba n'aha mbaraasi, hamwe n'abanyiginya baabo n'abantu ba Yuda, n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu; kandi oru rurembo ruryagumaho ebiro byona.

Kandi abantu baryaguma nibaruga omu ndembo za Yuda, n'omu myanya yoona eyehinguririize Yerusaalemu, omu ishaza rya Benyamiini omu mpita, omu nsi y'ebibungo, n'omuri Negebu, nibareeta ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo, n'empongano z'esaano n'obubaane, kandi nibareeta empongano z'okusiima omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Kwonka ku muraayangye kumpurira n'okurinda eizooba rya sabato riri eririkwera, mwaraba omu marembo ga Yerusaalemu aha izooba rya sabato mwekoreire emitwaro, obwo ndyatweka omuriro omu marembo gaayo, gwotsye zaanyaruju za Yerusaalemu, kandi tiguriraazibwa.
Ekigambo ekyarugire ahari MUKAMA kikaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Imuka oshuume, oze ow'omubumbi, kandi okwo niyo ndaakugambirire ebigambo byangye.
Ntyo naashuuma, naaza ow'omubumbi, naashanga naabumbisa enziga ye.
Eki yaabaire naabumba omu ibumba kyasiisikarira omu ngaro ze; yaagaruka yaaribumbamu ekindi, nk'oku yaabaire naayenda.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Imwe b'enju ya Israeli 'mwe, nimugira ngu tinkaabaasa kubagira nk'oku ogwo mubumbi yaagira eibumba? Reeba, nk'oku eibumba riri omu ngaro z'omubumbi, naimwe nikwo muri omu ngaro zangye, imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe.
Omu bunaku bwona obu ndigambiramu aha ihanga nari aha bugabe kurirandura, kurisheenya n'okuricwekyereza,
eryo ihanga eri ndiba naagambireho, ku ririhinduka, ryareka ebibi byaryo, naanye ndyayegarukamu, ndekye akabi aku mbaire niinyenda kurireetaho.
Kandi omu bunaku obu ndigambiramu aha ihanga nari aha bugabe kuryombeka n'okuribyara,
eryo ihanga kuririkora ebirikwangwa omu maisho gangye, ryayanga kuhurira eiraka ryangye, obwo ndyayefuuza, ndekye kukora ebirungi ebi mbaire niinyenda kurikorera.

Mbwenu irooko ogambire abantu ba Yuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu oti: Oku niwko MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ninteekateeka kubareetaho akabi, kandi ncumire n'enaama y'okubarwanisa. Nyaabura 'mwe, nimugarukye, buri muntu arugye omu muhanda gwe omubi, mushemeze emitwarize yaanyu n'ebi murikukora.
Mubuuririze omu mahanga,
Ku haraabe hariho orahuriire ebigambo nk'ebyo.
Israeli akozire ekibi ky'eihano.
Nimugira ngu ebirika bya Lebanooni
Ebiri aha rukiri rw'omu ishwa biryabura?
Nari shi amaizi agarikufuka
Agarikuhimintika nigaruga hare garyayoma?
Baayoterera baaruhanga b'ebishuba obubaane;
Kandi kibareeteire kuteera entsibo
Omu mihanda yaabo eya ira,
Baatora obuhanda obw'aha rubaju,
Baareka omuhanda rugyendwa,
N'ekintu ky'okweshaanya ebiro byona.
Orikugirabamu weena agyenda naashoberwa
Naazongoza omutwe.
Nk'abarikuhunga omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba.
Aha izooba eri barigwererwaho akagwe
Ndyabateera amabega, tindireeba i bari.
Ohurire amaraka g'abarikumpakanisa.
Kwonka bo bantimbiire obusya.
Ijuka oku mbaire niinyemerera omu maisho gaawe
Kubatonganira, ngu mbaiheho ekiniga kyawe.
Kandi obaheyo, bamarweho rurara;
Abakazi baabo babe abamazire abaana, kandi abafaakazi,
Abashaija baabo bamarweho orufu,
N'abatsigazi baabo baitirwe rurara omu rugamba.
Ku oraabateeze ababisha kitaraariire!
Ahabw'okuba bantimbiire obusya,
N'ebigyere byangye baabitega emiriiti.
Enaama zaabo zoona ezi baanyiniire kuunyita.
Otabasaasira eby'okushiisha byabo,
N'obu kwakuba okuragaza ekibi kyabo omu maisho gaawe.
Kureka bateezibwe entsibo, bakugwere kimwe omumaisho,
Kandi omu biro by'ekiniga kyawe ogire oku waabagira.
muze omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, aharikutaahirwa omu Irembo ry'Engusyo, orangireyo ebigambo ebi ndaakugambire,

noogira oti: Imwe bagabe ba Yuda 'mwe n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyareeta akabi omuri ogu mwanya, akarireetera amatu g'orikahurira weena kuteera enduuru.

Ahabw'abantu kuunyimuura, bakahagara ogu mwanya nibagusiisisa okugwotereramu baaruhanga abandi obubaane, abu batakamanyaga n'obu baakuba baishenkurubo nari abagabe ba Yuda, n'okugwijuza eshagama y'abataine rubanja,

n'okwombekyera Baali emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu, okurabizamu batabani baabo omu mruriro kuba ebitambo by'okwotsya by'okutambira Baali, ebi ntararagiire n'obu kwakuba okutaho, kandi ebitakaijaga mu biteekateeko byangye;
n'ahabw'ekyo, reeba, obunaku buryaija, obu ogu mwanya gutarigaruka kwetwa ogwa Tofeti, n'obu rwakuba oruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, kureka guryayetwa oruhanga rw'eiriitiro; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Kandi omuri ogu mwanya enaama za Yuda na Yerusaalemu nimwo ndizicwera busha, nkareetera abantu baabo kwitirwa omu maisho g'abazigu baabo bakaitwa abarikubahiiga. Kandi emitumbi yaabo ndyagigaburira amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba.
Kandi orurembo ndyaruhindura ekirikutiinisa n'eky'okweshaanya, orirurabaho weena ashishwe, ayeshaanye ahabw'akabi koona aku rwareebire.
Ndyabariisa abaana baabo b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki, buri muntu arye mutaahi we omu biro by'okugotwa n'eby'enaku ezi abazigu baabo n'abaribahiiga baribareebesa.

obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Oku nikwo ndyata aba bantu n'oru rurembo, nk'oku omunutu ayata enyungu y'omubumbi, ekarema kuhomeererwa. Abantu baryaziika omuri Tofeti ahabw'okubura ahandi hoona ah'okuziika.
Okwo nikwo ndigira ogu mwanya n'abagutwiremu, nkagira oru rurembo nka Tofeti; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Amaju ga Yerusaalemu na zaanyaruju z'abagabe ba Yuda biryahagarwa nk'ogwo mwanya gwa Tofeti; nigo maju goona agaabaire nigookyezibwaho obubaane nibooterera eihe ryona ery'omu iguru, bakashukiriraho baaruhanga abandi empongano z'eby'okunywa.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyareeta omuri oru rurembo na tauni zaarwo zoona akabi koona aku ndugambireho; ahabw'okuba bakagangaaza ebitsya, baayanga kuhurira ebigambo byangye.
Pashuri ogwo yaateera nabi Yeremia, yaamuta omu nkomo ezaabaire ziri omu Irembo rya Benyamiini ery'eruguru ery'enju ya MUKAMA.
Ku bwaseesire, Pashuri yaiha Yeremia omu nkomo; Yeremia nikwo kumugira ati: MUKAMA tarikukweta Pashuri, kureka Magori-misabiibu, amakuru ngu Ebirikutiinisa embaju zoona.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyakugira ekirikutiinisa ahariiwe n'ahari bagyenzi baawe boona.
Baryaitwa rurara y'omugabe wa Babulooni, abatware Babulooni bari enkwatwa, abaite na rurara.

Kandi obutungi bwona obw'oru ruembo, amagoba gaarwo goona, ebintu byarwo byona eby'obuguzi bwingi, n'eitungo ryona ery'abagabe ba Yuda, ndyabihayo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo, babanyagye, babakwate, babatware Babulooni.
Kandi naiwe Pashuri n'abatuura omu nju yaawe boona, muryagyenda muri enkwatwa, oze Babulooni; okwo niyo origwa, kandi niyo oriziikwa, iwe na bagyenzi baawe boona abu ohanuurira ebishuba.
Nonkiza amaani, kandi osingwire.
Mpindukire eky'okushekyererwa eizooba ryona,
Buri muntu nanteerera enaku.
Ningira nti, Obubisha n'okucwekyereza!
Ahabw'okuba ekigambo kya MUKAMA kimpindukiire
Ekijumo n'ekigaaniizo eizooba ryona.
N'obu kwakuba okugaruka kugamba omu iziina rye,
Omu mutima gwangye oshusha oti harimu omuriro
Ogurikubuguma oguri omu magufa gangye;
Okufa mamigye nikundusya,
Kandi tindikukubaasa.
Okutiinisa kuri embaju zoona!
Banywani bangye ab'ah'amara
Abategyereize okugwa kwangye, nibagira bati:
Muregye, naitwe nitwija kumurega,
Shana akaabeihwabeihwa,
Tubone kumusingura, tumuhoora.
N'ahabw'ekyo abarikumpiiga baryateera entsibo,
Tibarinsingura.
Baryakwatirwa kimwe enshoni,
Ahabw'okuba tibaribaasa.
Okuhemuka kwabo okw'ebiro n'ebiro tikuryeba.
Kandi oreeba eby'omu mutima n'ebiteekateeko;
Ka ndeebe oku oraabahoore,
Ahabw'okuba niiwe nyegyekyereire ebyangye.
Ahabw'okuba ajunire amagara g'abakyene,
Yaagaiha omu mikono y'enkozi z'ebibi.
Ekiro eki maawe yanzaariireho nikikabure omugisha!
Waazaara omwana w'omwojo, naamushemeza,
Nawe naakakyeenwe!
Ezi MUKAMA yaacwekyereize ataine saasi,
Ahrira okucura omu kasheeshe,
N'enduuru omu ihangwe;
Maawe ekaba akituuro kyangye,
N'enda ye ekaguma eri nyarwegye.
Mbwenu nkaba naarugira ki omu nda,
Kufa kubi n'okureeba enaku,
N'okumara ebiro byangye nyine enshoni?
naagira ati: Tubuurize MUKAMA, ahabw'okuba Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni aizire kuturwanisa; obundi MUKAMA akaatugirira nk'eby'okutangaaza ebi akora oku biri, amutwihaho, areka kututeera.
Atyo Yeremia yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo muraagire Zedekia muti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kucwa busha eby'okurwanisa ebi mukwaitse kurwanisa omugabe wa Babulooni n'Abakaludaaya abari enyima y'orugo babagotsire, imwe mbagarure omu rurembo;
kandi nyowe nyerwanire naimwe mbabangiire omukono gw'amaani, mbagwereirwe kubi, mbainiire ekiniga kingi munonga.
Niinyija kuteera eby'omuri oru rurembo, abantu n'amatungo, biitwe orufu rw'amaani.

Kandi bwanyima y'ebyo Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda n'abagaragwa be n'abantu boona abariba baari omuri oru rurembo, barokokire ahari orwo rufu, n'ahari rurara n'enjara, ndyabahayo omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni n'ey'abazigu baabo, n'ey'abarikwenda kubaita. Aryabaitsa rurara, taribasaasira, nari kubareka, n'obu kwakuba okubagirira esaasi; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Origuma omuri oru rurembo aryaitwa rurara, enjara n'orufu; kwonka orishohora, akeenaga omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya ababagotsire, aryagumaho, atimbuukye omu rugamba n'engabirano, nigo magara ge.
Ahabw'okuba ntaire amaisho gangye ahari oru rurembo kurukora kubi, ti kurukora gye, kandi ruryaheebwayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni, arwotsye n'omuriro; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Muhurire ekigambo eki MUKAMA arikugambira enju y'omugabe wa Yuda,
naagira ati: Iwe nju ya Daudi 'we,
Mugume mucwe emanja z'oburyo buri kasheeshe,
Mujune abanyagirwe,
Mubaihe omu mikono y'abarikubahata,
Ekiniga kyangye kitakaayaka nk'omuriro,
Kikaaka, hakabura owaakiraaza,
nimbatura ebibi ebi murikukora.
Reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe, iwe otwire omu ruhanga,
N'aha rukiri rw'omu ruhita,
Iwe orikugira oti: N'oha orishuuma kuturwanisa?
Nairi n'oha oritaaha omu maka gaitu?
Ntwekye omuriro omu kibira kyaho,
Gumareho byona ebiheehinguririize.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Shuuma oze ow'omugabe wa Yuda, ogambireyo ekigambo eki,
noogira oti: Iwe mugabe wa Yuda 'we ori aha ngoma ya Daudi, hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA, iwe n'abagaragwa baawe n'abantu baawe abaraba omuri aga marembo.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Mugume mukore eby'oburyo n'eby'okuhikiirira, abanyagirwe mubaihe omu mikono y'abarikubahata, kandi omunyaihanga n'efuuzi n'omufaakazi mutabakora kubi, n'obu kwakuba okubakorera eby'obubisha, nari okusheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja omuri ogu mwanya.

Ahabw'okuba ku muraayorobere ekigambo eki omu mazima, abagabe abari aha ngoma ya Daudi baryaguma nibataahira omu marembo g'ebikaari by'egi nju, bari omu bigaari by'orugamba n'aha mbaraasi, bo n'abaragwa baabo, n'abantu baabo.
Kwonka ku muraayangye kuta omutima ahari ebyo bigambo, niinyerahira ti: Egi nju eryahinduka omushaka; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba aha nju y'omugabe wa Yuda ati:
Ombeereire nka Gileadi,
N'omutwe gw'orushozi Lebanooni,
Kwonka buzimazima ndyakuhindura eihamba ry'omusheenyi,
Orurembo orutatwirwemu.
Buri omwe akwaitse eby'okurwanisa bye;
Baryatema emyereezi yaawe erikukira oburungi,
Baginagye omu muriro.
Nabo baryagarukamu bati: Ahabw'okuba bakatsigaho endagaano ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, baaramya baaruhanga abandi, baabaheereza.
N'obu kwakuba okumuboroogyera,
Kureka muririre munonga ogyenzire,
Ahabw'okuba tarigaruka bundi
Kureeba ensi ye y'obuzaarwa.
Tarigaruka aha bundi, kureka ei baamutwaire ari enkwatwa, niyo arigwa, kandi tarigaruka kureeba egi nsi.
N'ebishengye bye akabyombekyesa obutainganisa,
Orikukoreseza mutaahi we busha,
Atamuhe bihembo bye,
Orikugira ati: Ndyayeyombekyera enju rutaaba,
Eine ebishengye bihango by'ahaiguru,
Ngicwemu amadirisa,
Ngikiikizemu embaaho z'emyereezi,
Ngisiigye erangi erikutukura.
Nikyo kiraakugire omugabe?
Sho akaba atarya, akanywa,
Kandi omu biro bye taratungire, akagogyeera?
Nabwo biba gye.
Okwo tikwo kummanya?
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kwonka amaisho gaawe n'omutima gwawe
Nibiruruuhira amagoba gatari g'amazima,
Kusheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja,
N'okukora eby'okuhata n'eby'obubisha.
Tibarimutongyeza nibagira bati:
Ai bambe, mukuru wangye! nari shi bati, Ai bambe munyaanyazi!
Kandi tibarimutongyeza nibagira bati:
Ai bambe, mukama wangye! nari shi bati, Nangwa ndikaitwa ekyo kitiinisa kye!
Akururwe, anagwe enyima y'amarembo ga Yerusaalemu.
Oimutsye eiraka ryawe omuri Bashani,
Oboroogye nooyema Abariimu,
Ahabw'okuba nkunzi zaawe zoona zicwekyereziibwe.
Nkagamba naiwe obu waabaire ogogyeire,
Kwonka wangira oti: Tindikwija kukuhurira.
Egyo niyo yaabaire eri emitwarize yaawe,
Okutoorobera iraka ryangye okwiha omu buto bwawe.
Nkunzi zaawe zize omu bukwatwa;
Obwo nibwo oriitwa enshoni, okabwerabwera
Ahabw'obubi bwawe bwona.
Otwire omu myereezi,
Eshi oryatsinda ku orihikwaho obusaasi,
Waagira ebisha nk'omukazi orikwenda kuzaara!
nkuhayo omu mikono y'abarikwenda kukwita, omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni n'omu y'Abakaludaaya.
Kandi iwe na nyoko kikuzaara ndyababinga, mbanagye omu ndiijo nsi ei otarazaariirwemu; okwo niyo murigwa.
Kwonka ensi ei baryatenga munonga kugarukamu, tibarigigarukamu.
Ei omuntu weena atarikwetaho?
Ahabw'enki we n'abaana be nibabingwa,
Kunagwa omu nsi ei batarikumanya?
Hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA!
Muhandiikye ogu mushaija nk'encwekye,
Omushaija otariba gye mu biro bye;
Ahabw'okuba tihariho w'omu ruzaaro rwe n'omwe oriba gye,
Akaza aha ngoma ya Daudi,
Akagaruka kutegyeka Yuda.

Nikyo MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugambira aha bariisa abarikureeberera abantu bangye, naagira ati: Mutaataaniise obusyo bwangye, mwabubinga, timwabutaho mutima. Reeba, naanye ndyabafubira mbature ebibi ebi murikukora; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Bwanyima ndyataaruura ab'obusyo bwangye abaritsigaraho, mbaihe omu nsi ezi naababingiiremu, mbagarure omu ka yaabo, bazaare, bakanye;
mbateho abariisa abaribataho omutima, tibaritiina bundi, n'obu kwakuba okuhahaaza omutima, kandi tiharigira n'omwe owaabura; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omu biro bye Yuda eryajunwa na Israeli etuure buhooro. Kandi eri niryo iziina eri aryetwa, MUKAMA OKUHIKIIRIRA kwaitu.

kureka bati: Nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire, owaareetsire baijukuru b'enju ya Israeli, akabeebembera naabaiha omu nsi y'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'omu nsi zoona ezi yaabaire ababingiiremu. Obwo nibwo barituura omu nsi yaabo ey'obuzaarwa.
Omutima gwangye omunda gucwekire,
Amagufa gangye goona gajogajogokire,
Ninshusha omusinzi,
Kandi ndi nk'omuntu orembiibwe viinyo,
Ahabwa MUKAMA n'ahabw'ebigambo bye ebirikwera.
Kandi omukyeeno gureeteire ensi okuborooga,
N'amariisizo g'omu ihamba goomire;
Emitwarize yaabo ni mibi,
N'amaani gaabo ti marungi.
Baanabi n'abanyamurwa tibarikutiina Ruhanga,
Kandi n'omu nju yangye nshangiremu obubi bwabo.
Nk'akahanda akarikuterera omu mwirima,
Aku baribingirwamu, bakakagwamu;
Ahabw'okuba ndyabareetaho akabi
Omu biro by'okufubirwa kwabo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nkareebamu ekintu ky'obushema;
Oku baabaire bahanuura omu iziina rya Baali,
Bakahabisa abantu bangye Israeli.
Nkareebamu ekirikureetera omuntu kushishwa,
Oku baabaire bashambana, bakabeiha;
Kandi bakaha emikono y'enkozi z'ebibi amaani,
Hakabura owaahinduka kureka obubi bwe;
Boona bakambeera nk'aba Sodoma,
N'abatuuzi baamwo nk'aba Gomora.
Reeba, niinyija kubagaburira
Mbanywaise amaizi garimu obushegu;
Ahabw'okuba omuri baanabi b'omuri Yerusaalemu
Harugiremu okutatiina Ruhanga, kwabuga ensi yoona.
Baguma nibagambira abarikungaya, nibagira bati: MUKAMA agizire ati: Muryaba gye; kandi bagambira omuntu weena orikukuratira ebi omutima gwe gurikwenda, bati: Tihariho kabi koona akarikuhikaho.
Okwetegyereza n'okuhurira ekigambo kye?
Nari n'oha orataire omutima
Aha kigambo kye, akakihurira?
Eego, omuyaga gw'akasooroora gwaza kuteera emitwe y'ababi.
Okuhitsya obu ariheza kufubira
N'okuhikiiriza ebi arikwenda kukora.
Omu biro by'aha muheru nibwo murikimanyira kimwe.
Kwonka bakarahuka, baayetumisiriza.
Tindabagambiire, kwonka bakahanuura.
Bakaagambiire abantu bangye ebigambo byangye,
Nabo bahinduka bareka emihanda yaabo mibi
N'obubi bw'ebi barikukora.
Kandi naagira ati: Hariho owaakubaasa kweshereka aheekiikire, ntamureebe? Tiinyijwire eiguru n'ensi? nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mpuriire ebi baanabi baagambire nibahanuura ebishuba omu iziina ryangye, nibagira bati: Ndootsire! Ndootsire!
Mbwenu ebyo biryahitsya hi okuguma omu mitima ya baanabi abarikuhanuura ebishuba n'eby'obugobya bw'omu mitima yaabo,
abarikuteekateeka kwebesa abantu bangye eiziina ryangye, ahabw'ebirooto byabo ebi barikurootororerana, nk'oku baishenkurubo baayebirwe eiziina ryangye ahabwa Baali?,
Nabi oine eki arootsire, akirootorore; kandi n'oine ekigambo kyangye, akigambe n'obwesigwa. Ebishushunga biine kakwate ki n'engano? nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ekigambo kyangye tikiri nk'omuriro, nari nk'enyondo erikwatagura orukiri? nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
N'ahabw'ekyo reeba, naaba omuzigu wa baanabi abarikwibana ebigambo byangye; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Reeba, naaba omuzigu wa baanabi abarikugambira eryo n'endimi zaabo nibagira bati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Reeba, naaba omuzigu w'abarikuhanuura ebirooto by'ebishuba, bakabirootorora, bakahabya abantu bangye n'ebishuba byabo n'okugambira eryo kwabo, haza ntabatumire n'obu kwakuba okubaragiira; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira. N'ahabw'ekyo tibaine ki barikugasira aba bantu na kakye; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omwe ahari aba bantu nari nabi nainga omunyamurwa ku haraagire owaakubuuza naagira ati: Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA niki?, obagire oti: Ogwo mutwaro niimwe, kandi ndyabanagira kimwe; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi nabi ogwo nari omunyamurwa, nari omwe aha bantu orikugira oti: Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA, ndyafubira ogwo muntu n'eka ye.
Oku nikwo buri muntu aribiiza mutaahi we na buri muntu mwene ishe ati: MUKAMA akugarukiremu ki? nari ati: MUKAMA agambire ki?

Kwonka mutarigaruka kugamba Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA obundi, ahabw'okuba ogwo mutwaro n'ekigambo eki buri muntu ayegunziire, kandi mutuura nimukiikamya ebigambo bya Ruhanga ohuriire, MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga waitu.
Oku nikwo oribuuza nabi ogwo oti: MUKAMA akugarukiremu ki? nari oti MUKAMA agambire ki?

Kwonka ku murigira muti: Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA, oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okugamba ekigambo eki muti, Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA, haza naabaire naabatumireho nti: Mutarigira muti, Omutwaro gwa MUKAMA,
n'ahabw'ekyo reeba, buzimazima ndyabakiriza mbanagye, mundugye omumaisho, imwe n'orurembo oru naabahaire na baashwenkuriimwe,
mbareeteho ekijumo ekitarihwaho, n'enshoni ez'ebiro n'ebiro ezitaryeba.
Ekiibo kimwe kikaba kirimu emitiini mirungi munonga nk'ey'okubanza; kwonka ekya kabiri kikaba kirimu emitiini mibi munonga, etarikubaasa kuriibwa.
MUKAMA yangira ati: Yeremia, nooreba ki? Naanye nti: Nindeeba emitiini, emirungi ni mirungi munonga, n'emibi ni mibi munonga etarikubaasa kuriibwa.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Nk'oku egi mitiini eri mirungi, nikwo ndibara Abayuda abatwairwe bari enkwatwa kuba barungi, abu naabingire omu mwanya ogu, nkabatwara omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya.
Ndyaguma mbataireho amaisho kubagirira gye, mbagarure omuri egi nsi. Ndyabombeka, tindibasheenya; ndyababyara, tindibakuura.
Ndyabaha omutima gw'okummanya ku niinye MUKAMA; kandi baryaba abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo, ahabw'okuba baryangarukira n'omutima gwabo gwona.
mbahindure eky'okunaganwa omu bugabe bwona obw'omu nsi, babe eky'okujumwa, eky'okucweraho enfumu, ekigaaniizo n'eky'okukyeenwa omu myanya yoona ei ndibabingiramu.
Kandi ndyabaitsa rurara, mbateeze enjara n'orufu, okuhitsya obu barimarirwaho kimwe omu nsi ei naabahaire na baishenkurubo.
Nabi Yeremia ogwo yaakigambira Abayuda boona n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu boona, naagira ati:

Okwiha omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'eshatu ogwa Yosia mwene Amoni omugabe wa Yuda okuhitsya hati, mmazire emyaka makumi abiri n'eshatu ekigambo kya MUKAMA nikiinyijaho, kandi ntuura nimbagambira, kwonka mukanga kuhurira.
Mukanga kuhurira n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, n'obu MUKAMA araabe atuura naabatumaho abairu be baanabi boona naagira ati:
Muhindukye hati, buri muntu omuriimwe arekye emitwarize ye mibi, n'ebibi ebi arikukora, mugume omu nsi ei MUKAMA yaabahaire na baashwenkuriimwe kuba eyaanyu okwiha ira okuhitsya ebiro byona;
kandi murekye kukuratira baaruhanga abandi kubaheereza n'okubaramya, murekye kungwisa kubi n'ebi murikukora n'emikono yaanyu. Obwo nibwo ntaribakora kubi.
Kwonka na hati timukaanyorobeire, kureka nimukingwisa kubi n'ebi murikukora n'emikono yaanyu, kwereetera akabi; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugirira ati: Ahabw'owanga kworobera ebigambo byangye,

reeba, niinyija kutuma aha nganda zoona ez'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, n'aha mwiru wangye Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, baije, mboohereze kuteera egi nsi n'abatuuzi baamwo, n'amahanga aga goona agabeehinduririize. Ndyabacwekyerereza kimwe, mbagire ekirikutiinisa, n'eky'okweshaanya, n'eky'okujumwa ebiro byona.
Kandi ndyabamaramu eiraka ry'okwesiima n'ery'okushemererwa, erya kishwera n'erya kishwerwa, ery'orubengo n'okwaka kw'etabaaza.
Egi nsi yoona eryaba amatongo n'eihamba, kandi ago mahanga garyamara emyaka makumi mushanju nigaheereza omugabe wa Babulooni.

Bwanyima egyo myaka makumi mushanju ku erihwa, ndyafubira omugabe wa Babulooni n'eryo ihanga, n'ensi y'Abakaludaaya, nimbatura eby'okushiisha byabo, mpagire eihamba ebiro byona; nkwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi ndyareeta aha nsi egyo ebigambo byona ebi naagigambireho, ebihandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo eky'ebi Yeremia yaahanwire aha mahanga goona.
Ahabw'okuba amahanga maingi n'abagabe b'amaani baryabahindura abahuuku; ntyo mbazimuurire ebirikwingana n'ebi baakozire, kandi nk'emirimo y'emikono yaabo oku eri.
Nigaija kunywa, gagwererane, gagwe eiraro, ahabwa rurara ei ndaagooherezemu.
Ntyo naiha ekikopo omu ngaro za MUKAMA, naakinywaisa amahanga goona agu MUKAMA yantumaho;
Yerusaalemu n'endembo za Yuda, abagabe baayo n'abanyiginya baayo, kubahindura amatongo, eihamba, eky'okweshaanya n'eky'okukyeenwa nk'oku kiri hati;
