na Faraho omugabe wa Misri, abaheereza be, abanyiginya be n'abantu be boona;
n'abanyamahanga boona ababatwiremu, abagabe boona ab'omu nsi ya Uuzi, n'abagabe boona ab'omu nsi y'Abafilisita (Ashekelooni, Gaaza, Ekurooni n'abatsigaire omuri Ashidoodi);
Edomu, Moabu n'Abaamojni,
abagabe boona aba Tuuro, n'abagabe boona aba Sidoni, n'abagabe b'ensi za seeri y'enyanja,
Dedani, Teema, Buuzi, abarikutega ebyeyera,
abagabe ba Buharabu boona, n'abagabe boona ab'enganda z'ebijwangye abatwire omu ihamba,
n'abagabe boona aba Zimuri, n'ab'omuri Elamu boona, n'aba Bumeedi boona,
n'ab'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho boona, abari hare n'abari haihi, nk'oku barikukuratana, n'obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi yoona. Kandi ku bariheza, n'omugabe wa Babulooni aryanywa.
Kandi ku baraayangye kwakiira ekikopo ekiri omu ngaro zaawe kukinywa, obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Nimuragiirwa kukinywa!

Ahabw'okuba reeba, orurembo orurikwetererwa eiziina ryangye, ku ndaabe nirwo ntandikiireho kukora kubi, nimugira ngu imwe nimwija kutsigara mutafubiirwe? Timuribura kufubirwa; ahabw'okuba niinyija kuhuruza rurara, erwanise abatwire omu nsi boona; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
MUKAMA naija kutsinda ari ahaiguru,
Aimutsye eiraka rye naayema omu butaaho bwe oburikwera;
Naija kutsinda n'amaani, ateere eka y'obusyo bwe,
Ateere akaari nk'abarikunyuuka emizaabibu,
Arwanise abatwire omu nsi boona.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aine eki arikufa n'amahanga;
Naija kutonganisa abaine omubiri boona,
N'ababi abaitse rurara;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Reeba, akabi nikagyenda nikaranda,
Nikaruga omu ihanga nikaza omu rindi;
Eihunga ry'amaani niriimuka,
Niritandikira aha muheru gw'ensi.
Naimwe bakama b'obusyo, mwekuringye omu iju,
Ahabw'okuba ebiro by'okwitwa n'okutaataana kwanyu bihikire;
Nimwija kugwa nk'empaya z'entaama ezicookirwe.
Abariisa baryabura obuhungiro,
Na bakama b'obusyo babure obukiriro.
Nimuhurire okutaka kw'abariisa,
N'okuborooga kwa bakama b'obusyo!
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA naashiisha eiriisizo ryabo,
Ahabw'ekiniga kya MUKAMA eky'amaani.
Ahabw'okuba ensi yaabo ehindukire eihambae
Ahabwa rurara ya MUKAMA n'ekiniga kye kingi.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Irooko oyemerere omu kikaari ky'enju ya MUKAMA, ogambire ab'omu ndembo za Yuda zoona, abatuura nibaija kuramiza omu nju ya MUKAMA, ebigambo byona ebi ndikukuragiira kubagambira; otagira ekigambo na kimwe eki waatsigayo.
Obundi bakaahurira, buri muntu ahinduka, aruga omu mitwairize ye emibi, naanye mbona kwegarukamu kureka akabi aku naaba niinyenda kubareetaho nimbatura ebibi ebi barikukora.
Kandi obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ku muraayangye kumpurira kugyendera omu biragiro byangye ebi naataire omu maisho gaanyu,
n'okuta omutima aha bigambo by'abaheereza bangye baanabi, abu ntuura nimbatumaho, kwonka mutarikukyeetaho,
egi nju ndyagigira nka Shiilo, n'oru rurembo ndugire eky'okukyeenwa omu mahanga goona ag'omu nsi.
Yeremia ku yaaherize kugamba byona ebi MUKAMA yaamuragiire kugambira abantu boona, abanyamurwa na baanabi n'abantu boona baamukwata, baagira ati: Buzimazima noija kufa.
Ahabw'enki ohanwire omu iziina rya MUKAMA noogira oti: Egi nju eryaba nka Shiilo, n'oru rurembo ruryaba amatongo, rubure ow'okurutuuramu? Abantu boona baateeranira ahari Yeremia omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Bwanyima abanyamurwa na baanabi baagambira abanyiginya n'abantu boona bati: Ogu muntu ashemereire kucwerwa orubanja rw'okufa, ahabw'okuba ahanwire kubi ahari oru rurembo, nk'oku mubihuriire n'amatu gaanyu.
Yeremia nikwo kugambira abanyiginya n'abantu boona ati: MUKAMA antumire kuhanuura aha nju egi n'ahari oru rurembo ebigambo ebi byona ebi muhuriire, ebirirubaho.
Mbwenu mushemeze emitwarize yaanyu n'ebi murikukora, kandi mworobere eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu; na MUKAMA naija kwegarukamu, arekye akabi aku abagambireho.
Kwonka nyowe reeba, ndi omu mikono yaanyu. Munkore eki murikusiima ngu ni kirungi kandi kihikire.

Kwonka mumanyire kimwe ngu, ku muraanyite, nimuba mwereetsireho eshagama y'otaine rubanja, kandi n'ahari oru rurembo n'abatuuzi baarwo; ahabw'okuba buzimazima MUKAMA niwe abantumireho kubagambira ebyo bigambo.
Bwanyima abanyiginya n'abantu boona baagambira abanyamurwa na baanabi bati: Ogu muntu tashemereire kucwerwa rubanja rw'okufa, ahabw'okuba atugambiire omu iziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Bamwe aha bakuru b'omuri egyo nsi baagambira abantu abateeraniire sho, bati:
Omu busingye bwa Hezekia omugabe wa Yuda Miika owa Moresheesi akahanuura, yaagira Abayuda boona ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati:
Saayuuni eryahingwa nk'omusiri,
Yerusaalemu ebe emituumo y'ebisheenyuka,
N'orushozi rw'enju ya MUKAMA rube nk'akabungo kashwekirwe ekibira.
Omugabe Yehoyakimu hamwe n'amamanzi ge goona n'abanyiginya be boona, ku baahuriire ebigambo bye, omugabe yaayenda kumwita; kwonka Uria ku yaakihuriire, yaatiina, yaacwa, yaahungira Misri.
Bwanyima omugabe Yehoyakimu yaatuma abantu Misri, Elinasani mwene Akiboora n'abandi abu yaabaire aine,
baihayo Uria, baamureetera omugabe Yehoyakimu, yaamwitsa rurara, omutumbi gwe baagunaga omu iziikiro ry'abantu b'obutoosha.
Kwonka Ahikaamu mwene Shafani yaarwana ahari Yeremia, tiyaaheebwayo mu mikono y'abantu kwitwa.
Omu kutandika kw'obutegyeki bwa Zedekia mwene Yosia omugabe wa Yuda, ekigambo eki kikaija ahari Yeremia nikiruga ahari MUKAMA.
Yeremia yaagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA angambiire naagira ati: Yesharire enkoba, oyebaijere emigamba, obite omu bitsya.
Bwanyima otume aha mugabe wa Edomu, owa Moabu, ow'Abaamoni, owa Tuuro n'owa Sidoni, obatumeho entumwa eziizire Yerusaalemu ahari Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda.
Ozitume ahari bakama baazo oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Oku nikwo muraagambire bakama baanyu muti:
Niinye naahangire ensi n'abantu n'enyamaishwa ebigirimu, nkabihangisa obushoboorozi bwangye bwingi n'omukono gwangye ogugoroirwe, kandi ningiha weena ou ndikusiima.
Mbwenu hati ezi nsi zoona naaziha omwiru wangye Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, kandi naamuha n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa zoona kumuheereza.
Amahanga goona garyamukorera, n'omwana we n'omwijukuru, okuhitsya obu obunaku bw'ensi ye burihika; bwanyima amahanga maingi n'abagabe g'amaani baryamugira omuhuuku waabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo murekye kuhurira baanabi baanyu, abafumu baanyu, nari abarogi baanyu, abarikubagira bati: Timuriheereza omugabe wa Babulooni;
ahabw'okuba ebi barikubahanuurira n'ebishuba ebirikwija kubareetera okutwarwa hare n'ensi yaanyu; kandi naanye ndyagibabingamu, muhwerekyerere.
Kwonka eihanga ryona eririikiriza kwinika ebitsya kutegyekwa omugabe wa Babulooni n'okumuheereza, eryo niryo ndireka omu nsi yaaryo kugihinga n'okugituuramu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mbwenu iwe n'abantu baawe ku mwakwitwa rurara n'enjara n'orufu, nk'oku MUKAMA agambire aha ihanga ryona eririkwanga kuheereza omugabe wa Babulooni, mukaazira ki?
Mutahurira ebigambo bya baanabi abarikubagira bati: Timuriheereza omugabe wa Babulooni; ahabw'okuba ebi barikubahanuurira n'ebishuba.
Tiinye mbatumire, kureka nibahanuura ebishuba omu iziina ryangye; ekiraarugyemu ndyababinga omuri egi nsi, muhwerekyerere, imwe na baanabi abarikubahanuurira; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mutabahurira; muheereze omugabe wa Babulooni, mubone kugumaho. Mbwenu oru rurembo ku rwakuhinduka amatongo, rukaazira ki?

Ku baraabe bari baanabi, kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA ku kiraabe kiri hamwe nabo, nibeeshengyereze MUKAMA ow'amahe, ebintu ebitsigaire omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu nju y'omugabe wa Yuda kandi n'omuri Yerusaalemu birekye kutwarwa Babulooni.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba aha nyomyo, ekitanka, ebitebe by'ebinaabiro, n'ebindi bintu ebitsigaire omuri oru rurembo,

ebi Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni ataratwaire, obu yaatwara Yekonia mwene Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda, naamwiha Yerusaalemu akamutwara Babulooni ari enkwatwa hamwe n'abakungu ba Yuda n'aba Yerusaalemu
naagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba aha bintu ebitsigaire omu nju ya MUKAMA n'omu nju y'omugabe wa Yuda n'omuri Yerusaalemu, naagira ati:
Biryatwarwa Babulooni, kandi niyo biriguma okuhitsya aha izooba eri ndibiijukiraho. Bwanyima ndyabigarura, mbite omuri ogu mwanya.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Mpenzire omugamba gw'obutegyeki bw'omugabe wa Babulooni.
Emyaka ebiri etakahweire, ndyagarura omu mwanya ogu ebintu byona eby'enju ya MUKAMA, ebi Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yaihiremu, akatwara Babulooni;
kandi ndyagarura Yekonia mwene Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda n'Abayuda boona abaagiire Babulooni bari enkwatwa; ahabw'okuba ndyahenda omugamba gw'obutegyeki bw'omugabe wa Babulooni.
Bwanyima nabi Yeremia yaagambirira nabi Hanania omu maisho g'abanyamurwa n'abantu boona abaabaire beemereire omu nju ya MUKAMA,
naagira ati: Amiina! Nkaabaasibwa ki MUKAMA akora atyo; kandi ahikiiriza ebi waahanuura, agarura omu mwanya ogu ebintu by'enju ya MUKAMA ebiri Babulooni, hamwe n'abatwairweyo boona bari enkwatwa.
Kwonka hati hurira ekigambo eki ndikukugambira, iwe n'abantu boona.
Baanabi aba ira abaatubandiize twembi bakahanuurira amahanga maingi n'obugabe bw'amaani, ku birihikwaho engamba, enjara n'orufu.
Kwonka nabi orikuhanuura eby'obusingye, ekigambo kya nabi ogwo ku kiriba kwo, niho kirimanyirwa ngu buzimazima MUKAMA niwe yaamutumire.
Bwanyima nabi Hanania yaiha emigamba eyaabaire eri aha bitsya bya nabi Yeremia, yaagihenda,

kandi yaagambira omu maisho g'abantu boona ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Nikwo ndihenda ntyo omugamba gw'obutegyeki bwa Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, nkwagwiha aha bitsya by'amahanga goona, emyaka ebiri etakahweire. Kwonka nabi Yeremia yaayegyendera.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, nabi Hanania aherize kuhenda emigamba eyaabaire eri aha bitsya bya nabi Yeremia, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Irooko ogambire Hanania oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ohenzire emigamba y'ebiti, kwonka nyowe niinyija kukora ey'ebyoma omu mwanya gwayo;

ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Ntaire omugamba gw'ekyoma aha bitsya by'ago mahanga goona kuba abahuuku ba Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni; kandi baryamuheereza, ahabw'okuba mmuhaire nangwa n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa.
Kandi nabi Yeremia yaagira nabi Hanania ati: Hurira, iwe Hanania; MUKAMA takutumire, kandi oreeteire aba bantu kwesiga ebishuba.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati: Reeba, niinyija kukwiha omu nsi. Ogu mwaka noogufamu, ahabw'okuba ogambire eby'okugomera MUKAMA.
Omuri ogwo mwaka omu kwezi kwa mushanju nabi Hanania yaafa.
Omuri obwo bunaku omugabe Yekonia, nyina-omugabe, abakonwa, abanyiginya ba Yuda na Yerusaalemu, ababaizi n'abaheesi, bakaba barugire Yerusaalemu.
Egyo baruha ekatwarwa Elasa mwene Shafani, na Gemaria mwene Hilukia, abu Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda yaatumire Babulooni ahari Nebukadeneeza omugabe waayo,
neegira eti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugambira enkwatwa zoona, ezi yaihire Yerusaalemu akoohereza Babulooni, naagira ati:
Nimwombekye amaju, mugatuuremu; muhingye emisiri, murye ebi muryezamu;
mushwere abakazi, muzaare abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki; mushwererere batabani baanyu, kandi muhingire bahara baanyu, nabo bazaare abaana b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki, mukanyireyo, murekye kutuuba.
Kandi orwo rurembo oru naabatwairemu muri enkwatwa, murwendeze ebirungi, murushabire ahari MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba ku ruriba gye, naimwe muryaba gye.
Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Mutaikiriza baanabi n'abafumu baanyu abari omuriimwe kubahabya, kandi muteeta aha birooto ebi barikuroota,
ahabw'okuba ebi barikubahanuurira omu iziina ryangye n'ebishuba. Tiinye mbatumire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kureka oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Emyaka makumi mushanju eyaahanwirwe ahari Babulooni ku erihwa, ndyabaayataayira, mpikiirize eki naabaraganiise, mbagarure omu mwanya ogu.
Ahakuba nimmanya ebi ndikubateekateekyera, eby'oburungi, bitari by'obubi, ngu mbone kubatamu amatsiko g'ebiribaho bwanyima; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Obwo nibwo murintakira, mukaija mukanshaba, naanye nkabahurira.
Muryansherura, mumbone, ku murinsherura n'omutima gwanyu gwona.

Buzimazima muryambona, kandi ndyabaiha omu bukwatwa, mbataaruure omu mahanga goona n'omu myanya yoona, ei naababingiiremu, mbagarure omu mwanya ogu naabaihiremu nimbatwara omu bukwatwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'okuba mugizire muti: MUKAMA atwimukiize baanabi omuri Babulooni
oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba aha mugabe ori aha ngoma ya Daudi, n'aha bantu boona abatwire omuri orwo rurembo, beene waanyu abataratwairwe naimwe mu bukwatwa,
naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kubaitsa rurara, mbateeze enjara n'orufu, mbagire nk'emitiini eri emibi munonga etarikubaasa kuriibwa.
Ndyabakuratsa rurara, enjara n'orufu, mbagire ekirikutiinisa aha mahanga goona ag'omu nsi, babe eky'okukyeenwa, eky'okutiinisa, eky'okweshaanya, n'ekijumo omu mahanga goona agu ndiba mbabingiiremu,
ahabw'okutata mutima aha bigambo byangye, ebi naabaire ntuura nimbatumaho abairu bangye baanabi, kwonka mukanga kuhurira; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mbwenu muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, imwe mwena enkwatwa abu naabingire Yerusaalemu kuza Babulooni.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba ahari Ahabu mwene Kolaaya, na Zedekia mwene Maaseya, abarikubahanuurira ebishuba, naagira ati: Reeba, ndyabahayo omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, abaitire omu maisho gaanyu.
Enkwatwa zoona eziri Babulooni ezaarugire Yuda nibo ziriihaho ekijumo nizigira ziti: MUKAMA naakakugire nka Zedekia na Ahabu, abu omugabe wa Babulooni yaayokize omu muriro

ahabw'okukora eby'obushema omuri Israeli, bakashambana n'abakazi ba bataahi baabo, bakagamba ebigambo by'ebishuba omu iziina ryangye, ebi ntarabaragiire. Niinye ndikubimanya, kandi niinye mushinja; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi mugambire Shemaanya owa Nehelaamu, muti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Oyeragiire, waatwekyera abantu boona ab'omuri Yerusaalemu ebaruha, na Zefania mwene Maaseya omunyamurwa, n'abanyamurwa boona noogira oti:
MUKAMA akugizire omunyamurwa omu mwanya gwa Yehoyaada omunyamurwa, kugira obushoboorozi omu nju ya MUKAMA bw'okutegyeka omushazi weena orikuhanuura, kumuboha amaguru n'okumuta omu nkomo.
Mbwenu n'enki ekikuzibiire kuhana Yeremia owa Anatoosi, oyegizire nabi ahariimwe?
Ahabw'okuba itwe abari omuri Babulooni atutumireho, naagira ati: obukwatwa bwanyu nibwija kumara omwanya muhango; mbwenu mwombekye amaju, mugatuuremu; muhingye emisiri, murye ebi muryezamu.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Tuma aha nkwatwa zoona, ozigire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba ahari Shemaaya owa Nehelaamu, naagira ati: Ahabwa Shemaaya kubahanuurira ntamutumire, akabeesigisa ebishuba,

nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati: Ndyafubira Shemaaya owa Nehelaamu n'abaijukuru; tarigira n'omwe oritsigara omu ihanga eri orireeba ebirungi ebi ndikorera abantu bangye, ahabw'okuba agambire eby'okungomera; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ekigambo ekyarugire ahari MUKAMA kikaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Handiika omu kitabo ebigambo byona ebi naakugambiire;
ahakuba reeba, obunaku buryahika, obu ndimariraho kimwe obukwatwa bw'abantu bangye Abaisraeli n'Abayuda, nkabagarura omu nsi ei naahaire baishenkurubo, kandi baryagikubuura.
Ebi nibyo bigambo ebi MUKAMA yaagambire ahari Israeli na Yuda.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Tuhuriire eiraka ry'abantu abarikukangarana,
Baine obwoba, kandi bataine busingye.
Omushaija naabaasa kurumwa okuzaara?
Ahabw'enki nindeeba buri mushaija
Ayekwaitse omu manyaanya nk'omukazi orikurumwa,
Aha maisho ge hahinduriize?
Ai bambe! Eshi eryo izooba rigumire,
Tihaine rindi eririkushushana naryo;
Nibyo biro by'enaku za Yakobo,
Kwonka aryabyogamu.
kureka baryaheereza MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo na Daudi omugabe waabo, ou ndibaimukiza.
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira;
Naiwe Israeli, otahahaaza omutima,
Ahabw'okuba ndyakujuna, nkwihe hare,
N'oruzaaro rwawe ndwihe omu nsi y'obukwatwa bwarwo.
Yakobo aryagaruka, ahitsye omutima omunda, aruhuukye,
Tihaine orimutiinisa.
Nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ndyamariraho kimwe amahanga goona,
Agu naakutaataanisiizemu;
Kwonka iwe tindikumariraho kimwe,
Kureka ndyakuteera ninkubarira;
Kandi hoona tindikureka ntakufubiire.
Obusaasi bwawe ti bw'okukira,
Obuhuta bwawe nibuhurura munonga,
Tihariho mubazi gw'okubwomoora,
N'obu kyakuba eky'okukutambira.
Tizaakikwetaho,
Ahabw'okuba nkuhutaarize obuhuta bw'obuzigu,
N'ekifubiro ky'omuzigu otaine saasi,
Ahabw'okuba orubanja rwawe ni ruhango,
N'ebibi byawe birengyesereize.
Okuhururwa kwawe tikurikubaasa kutambwa.
Ebyo byona nkabikukorera
Ahabw'orubanja rwawe ruhango,
N'ahabw'ebibi byawe ebirengyesereize.
N'abazigu baawe boona oku baingana baryatwarwa omu bukwatwa;
Abarikukunyaga baryanyagwa,
N'abarikukushahura, ndyabahindura eky'okushahurwa,
N'obuhuta bwawe mbukize,
Ahakuba bakakweta encuubwa nibagira bati:
Ni Saayuuni, etagira ogyetaho!
Reeba, ndyagarura ab'omu mahema ga Yakobo, mbaihe omu bukwatwa,
Ngirire embabazi amaka ge.
Orurembo ruryagaruka kwombekwa aha mituumo yaarwo,
Kandi n'ekikaari kiryaza ahu kyabaire kiri.
N'amaraka g'abarikushemererwa.
Ndyabahaisa ekitiinisa, tibariba abarikugaywa.
N'eihanga ryabo riryahamibwa omu maisho gangye,
Kandi ndyafubira abarikubahata boona.
Omutegyeki waabo abakomookyemu;
Ndyamwiriza haihi, ampikye.
Mbwenu owaakwehanga kumpika n'oha?
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Naanye mbe Ruhanga waanyu.
Ekiniga kye kyashohora nk'omuyaga gw'akasooroora;
Nikiza kuteera emitwe y'ababi.
Okuhitsya obu ariheza kufubira,
N'okuhikiiriza ebi arikwenda kukora.
Omu biro by'aha muheru nibwo murikimanyira kimwe.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Abantu abahonokire ahari rurara,
Bakagirirwa embabazi omu ihamba;
Israeli ku yaasherwire oburuhuukiro,
Nkakukunda na rukundo etahwaho,
Nikyo ngumiire ninkugirira embabazi.
Iwe mwishiki wa Israeli 'we oshugaine!
Oryagaruka oyehunde ebitaasa,
Oshohore oze kuzina n'abarikushemererwa.
Aha bibungo bya Samaria;
Ababyazi baryagibyara,
Bashemerererwe ebijuma byayo.
Ei abarinzi bariimukizaho amaraka
Omu nsi y'ebibungo eya Efuraimu nibagira bati:
Mwimukye tugyende, twinamukye Saayuuni,
Tushangyeyo MUKAMA, Ruhanga waitu.
Mweshongore n'okushemererwa ahabwa Yakobo,
Muteere akaari ahabw'eri ihanga eririkukira agandi obukuru;
Murangye, muhimbise, mugire muti:
MUKAMA ajunire abantu be Abaisraeli abahonokireho.
Mbataaruure nimbaiha aha muheru gw'ensi,
Barimu empumi, ebirema,
Abakazi abaine enda, n'abarikurumwa kuzaara,
Bagarukye aha, bari omutwe muhango.
Mbeebembere, mbagarure nimbarembesereza.
Ndyabarabya aha tugyera,
Omu muhanda ogugororokire, omu batariteerera ntsibo,
Ahakuba ahari Israeli ndi omuzaire,
Kandi Efuraimu n'omujigaijo gwangye.
Mukirangye omu birwa ebiri hare, nimugira muti:
Owaataataaniise Israeli niwe arimutaaruura,
Akamurinda nk'oku omuriisa arinda obusyo bwe.
Yaamwiha omu mikono y'orukumukiza amaani.
Beeshongorereyo munonga,
Bashemerererwe oburungi bwa MUKAMA,
Bashangyeyo engano, viinyo n'amajuta,
Kandi n'abaana b'omu masyo g'entaama n'ag'ente,
Amagara gaabo garyaba nk'omusiri ogurikwitirirwa amaizi;
Kandi tibarigaruka kuhwa maani.
Abatsigazi n'abagurusi bakeesiimira hamwe;
Ahabw'okuba okucura ndyakuhindura okushemererwa,
Mbahuumurize, mbahe okwesiima omu mwanya gw'enaku;
Kandi amagara g'abanyamurwa ndyagaigutsa eby'ebishaju,
Abantu bangye bahaagye oburungi bwangye;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Enduuru neehurirwa omuri Raama,
Okucura n'okurira munonga,
Rakeeli naacurira abaana be;
Tarikwenda kuyaagirwa,
ahabw'okuba bahweireho.
Zibira eiraka ryawe kucura,
N'amaisho gaawe kuhimintikwamu amarira;
Ahabw'okuba ebi orikukora biryakuhaisa ebihembo,
Kandi abo baana baryaruga omu nsi y'abazigu baabo, bagarukye;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Abaana baawe baryagaruka omu nsi yaabo y' obuzaarwa;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Okampana, naahanwa
Nk'ekimasha kitakeegyesiibwe kuhinga;
Ongarure, mbone kugarurwa;
Ahabw'okuba niiwe MUKAMA, Ruhanga wangye.
Kandi ku naaherize kwegyesibwa, naayemamaata,
Naagira enshoni, naabwerabwera,
Ahakuba nkaba nyekoreire ekihemu ky'obutsigazi bwangye.
T'omwana wangye enkoramutima?
Ahabw'okuba kaingi, n'obu ndaabe mmugambaho, nimmuhana;
Kwonka na hati ninkimwijuka.
Nikyo omutima gwangye gumwiniriire orushusho.
Buzimazima ndyamugirira embabazi;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Oyeteereho ebyapa by'okukuhabura;
Oyetegyereze gye omuhanda rugyendwa,
Ogu waatoire noogyenda.
Garuka, iwe Israeli 'we,
Ogarukye omuri ezi ndembo zaawe.
Iwe mwishiki orikugaruka enyima 'we?
Ahakuba MUKAMA ahangire ekitakareebwaga mu nsi,
Omukazi kurinda omushaija.
MUKAMA akuhe omugisha, iwe butaaho bw'okuhikiirira 'we,
Ekibungo ekirikwera!
Ahabw'okuba ndyahaazya abaruhire, n'abahweirwemu amaani ngabagaruremu.
Ahonaaho ku naasisiimukire, naashanga oturo nitukinnurira.
Nk'oku naabataireho amaisho kubarandura, kubasheenya, kubakumbagaza, kubacwekyereza n'okubareetaho akabi, nikwo ndibataho amaisho kubombeka n'okubabyara, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omu biro ebyo tibarigaruka kugira bati:
Abazaire bariire emizaabibu erikushaarira,
Amaino g'abaana gaaba nigo gaagira amangigina;
kureka buri muntu aryafa azire ekibi kye, n'omuntu weena orirya emizaabibu erikushaarira, amaino ge nigo garigira amangigina.
etarikushushana n'ei naaragaine na baishenkurubo, obu naabakwata aha mukono kubaiha omu nsi ya Misri; haza egyo ndagaano yangye bakagiita, n'obu ndaabe naabaire ndi ibabo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Kureka egi niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana n'enju ya Israeli bwanyima y'ebiro ebyo; ndyabatamu ebiragiro byangye, mbihandiikye omu mitima yaabo; kandi ndyaba Ruhanga waabo, nabo babe abantu bangye; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Kandi omuntu aryaba atakyegyesa mutaahi we nari mwene ishe, naamugira ati: Manya MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba boona baryammanya okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru; ahakuba ndyabasaasira eby'okushiisha byabo, n'ekibi kyabo tindikiijuka bundi; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Oha eizooba kwakira abantu nyomushana,
Akaragiira okwezi n'enyonyoozi kubamurikira nyekiro,
Oreetera enyanja kwimuka, ebingonzi byayo bikahoorera,
MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina rye.
Ebyo bintu ku byakuruga omu buteeka bwabyo omu maisho gangye,
Obwo n'oruzaaro rwa Israeli rukaarekyera aho
Kuba eihanga omu maisho gangye ebiro byona.
Eiguru eriri ahaiguru ku ryakubaasa kugyerwa,
N'emisingi y'ensi okuzimu ekazoorwa,
Obwo nkaacwa oruzaaro rwa Israeli rwona,
Ndutura ebi rwakozire byona;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi omugoye gw'okugyeresa guryayeyongyera omumaisho, gugumizemu guhikye aha kibungo Garebu, gukube guze Goa.

N'oruhanga rwona, oruteebwamu emitumbi n'eiju rya kashenda, n'emisiri yoona okuhika aha kagyera Kidirooni, n'okuhika aha keekubo k'aha Irembo ry'Embaraasi eririkureeba oburugwa-izooba, biryayerezibwa MUKAMA. Orwo rurembo tiruriihwaho bundi n'obu kwakuba okusheenywa ebiro byona.
Omu bunaku obwo eihe ry'omugabe wa Babulooni rikaba rigotsire Yerusaalemu, kandi nabi Yeremia akaba akomeirwe omu kibuga ky'abarinzi ekiri omu kikaari ky'omugabe wa Yuda.

Ahakuba Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda akaba amutaire omu kihome, naamugira ati: Ahabw'enki noohanuura, okagira oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, oru rurembo niinyija kuruhayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni, arukwate;
na Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda tarikira Bakaludaaya, kureka buzimazima aryaheebwayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni, bagambe hamwe nibareebana;
bwanyima aryatwara Zedekia Babulooni; okwo niyo ariguma okuhitsya obu ndimutaayaayira; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira. N'obu murirwanisa Abakaludaaya, timuribabaasa.
Yeremia yaagira ati: Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiinyizireho nikigira kiti:
Reeba, Hanameeli, mwene Shalumu shwento, naija kukwijaho akugire ati: Gura ekibanja kyangye ekiri Anatoosi; ahabw'okuba niiwe oine obushoboorozi bw'okukicungura, okakigura.

Bwanyima Hanameeli mwene tatento yanshanga omu kibuga ky'abarinzi, nk'oku ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyabaire kiri, yangira ati: Ninkweshengyereza, gura ekibanja kyangye ekiri Anatoosi omu ishaza rya Benyamiini; ahabw'okuba niiwe oine obushoboorozi bw'okukihungura n'okukicungura; mbwenu okyegurire. Ntyo naamanyira aho ku ekyo kigambo kirugire ahari MUKAMA.
Naata omukono aha ndagaano, naagitaho akamanyiso, naareeta baakareebi, naapima efeeza aha minzaani.
Bwanyima naatwara endagaano y'okugura etairweho akamanyiso, hamwe na kopi yaayo etakubire, nk'ebiragiro n'emigyenzo byabyo oku byabaire biri;

egyo ndagaano naagiheera Baruki mwene Neria, mwijukuru wa Maaseya, omu maisho ga Hanameeli mwene tatento, n'omu maisho ga baakareebi abataire emikono aha ndagaano, kandi n'omu maisho g'Abaydaaya boona abaabaire bashutami omu kibuga ky'abarinzi.
Naayehanangiririza Baruki omu maisho gaabo nti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Twara ezi ndagaano z'okugura, egi etairweho akamanyiso n'etakubire, ozite omu nyungu y'eibumba, zibone kumara ebiro bingi.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Amaju n'emisiri, n'emisiri y'emizaabibu, biryagaruka bigurwe omu nsi egi.
Ku naaherize kuha Baruki mwene Neria egyo ndagaano y'okugura, naashaba MUKAMA ningira nti:
Ai Mukama RUHANGA, niiwe waahangiise eiguru n'ensi obushoboorozi bwawe n'omukono gwawe ogugoroire. Tihariho kintu na kimwe ekikurema.
Iwe ogirira embabazi abantu enkumi n'enkumi. Kwonka ohoora abaana noobatura ebibi bya baihsenkurubo. Ori Ruhanga omukuru; MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina ryawe.
Ori rugambwa omu naama, kandi omu kukora ori ow'amaani; amaisho gaawe gareeba emitwarize y'abantu yoona, noozimuurira buri muntu nk'emitwarize ye n'ebirugire omu bi akaozire oku biri.
Niiwe waayorekire obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza omu nsi ya Misri, okaguma noobyoreka omu Baisraeli n'omu bantu boona n'okuhitysa hati, kandi okeetungira eiziina, nk'oku kiri hati.
Okaiha abantu baawe Abaisraeli omuri Misri, waabaihisayo obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'omukono gw'amaani ogubangire n'okutiinsia kwingi;
waabaha ensi egi, ei waarahiire kuha baishenkurubo, ensi y'amate n'obwoki,

baagizamu, baagikubuura; kwonka tibaayorobera iraka ryawe, n'obu kwakuba okugyendera omu biragiro byawe; tibaagira kintu na kimwe eki baakora omu bi waabaragiire byona. Nikyo waabareeteireho akabi aka koona.

Reeba eby'okutemberaho bigootsire orurembo; baahikire aha rurembo kurukwata; kandi orurembo ruhairweyo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya abarikururwanisa, ahabwa rurara n'enjara n'orufu. Ebi waagambire byona bihikiriire; naiwe nookireeba.
Kwonka, ai Mukama RUHANGA, n'obu orurembo ruraabe ruhairweyo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya, ongizire oti: Gura ekyo kibanja n'efeeza, kandi ogire baakareebi.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Reeba, ndi MUKAMA, Ruhanga w'ebiine omubiri byona; hariho ekirikundema?
N'ahabw'ekyo, oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, naaza kuhayo oru rurembo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya n'omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, arukwate.

Abakaludaaya abarikururwanisa nibaija kwija, barutwekyemu omuriro, barwotsye, hamwe n'amaju agu batuura nibootererera aha mitwe yaago Baali obubaane, bakashukiriraho baaruhanga abandi empongano z'eby'okunywa, kungwisa kubi.

Ahakuba Abaisraeli n'Abayuda, okwiha omu buto bwabo, tibaine kindi eki barakozire omu maisho gangye kureka ebibi byonka; kandi Abaisraeli tibaine kindi eki barakozire kureka okungwisa kubi n'ebi bakora; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Oru rurembo rukanyitsa ekiniga, rwangwisa kubi, okwiha aha izooba eri rwayombekyeirweho n'okuhitsya hati; n'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kurwiha omu maisho gangye,
nintura Abaisraeli n'Abayuda ebibi byona ebi baakozire kungwisa kubi, abagabe baabo, abanyiginya baabo, abanyamurwa baabo, baanabi baabo, abantu ba Yuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu.
Omu mwanya gw'okuntaho amaisho bakanteera omugongo; kandi n'obu ndaabe ntuura nimbegyesa, tibakategaga matu kuhurira okwegyesibwa.
Bakata ebirikunugwa byabo omu nju erikwetererwa eiziina ryangye kugihagara.

Bakombekyera Baali emyanya mikuru y'okuramizamu omu ruhanga rwa mwene Hinoomu, kuhongyererayo Moleki abaana baabo b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki, eki ntarabaragiire, kandi ekitakaijaga mu biteekateeko byangye, ngu bakore ekirikunugwa ekyo okusiisisa Yuda.
N'ahabw'ekyo oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba ahari oru rurembo oru orikugira ngu ruhairweyo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni kwitwa rurara, enjara n'orufu,
naagira ati: Reeba, ndyabataaruura, mbaihe omu nsi zoona ezi naababingiiremu, ngwirwe kubi, nyine ekiniga, kandi nyine ekiniga kingi, mbagarure omuri ogu mwanya, mbatuuzemu buhooro.
Kandi baryaba abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo.
Ndyabaha omutima gumwe n'emitwarize emwe, babone kuntiina ebiro byona, babe gye, bo n'abaana baabo abarikurataho.
Ndyaragaana nabo endagaano etarihwaho, ku ntarireka kubakorera gye, kandi ndyata okuntiina omu mitima yaabo, ngu barekye kundugaho.
Ndyashemerererwa okubakora gye, mbabyare omuri egi nsi omu mazima n'omutima gwangye gwona n'amagara gangye goona.
Bwnayima egi nsi, ei murikugira ngu n'amatongo, etarimu bantu nari amatungo, kureka ehairweyo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya, niyo muriguramu ebibanja.

Abantu baryagura ebibanja n'empiiha, bahandiikye endagaano z'okugura, baziteho emikono n'akamanyiso kandi zigire na baakareebi, omu ishaza rya Benyamiini, omu myanya eyehinguririize Yerusaalemu, omu ndembo za Yuda, omu ndembo z'omu nsi y'ebibungo, omu z'omu mpita n'omu ndembo z'omuri Negebu; ahabw'okuba ndyagarura abantu baabo abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, owaahangire ensi, akagikora kugihamya, MUKAMA niryo iziina rye, naagira ati:
Onyete, nkwetabe, nkugambire ebikuru eby'omubonano, ebi otakamanyaga.

Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba aha maju g'omuri oru rurembo, n'ahari zaanyaruju z'abagabe ba Yuda ezaasheenyirwe, ngu ebisheenyuka babone kubikumiiriza abarikutemba aha by'okutemberaho, n'abarikurwansa rurara, naagira ati:
Abakaludaaya nibaija kwija kurwana n'okwijuza ago maju emitumbi y'abantu, abu ndiita ngwirwe kubi, nyine ekiniga kingi; ahabw'okuba obubi bwabo bwona bundeeteire kwima oru rurembo amaisho.
Reeba, ndyarureetera okuba gye, ndutambire, n'abantu baamwo mbakize, mboorekye obusingye bwingi n'amazima.
Ndyagarura aha buteeka Abayuda n'Abaisraeli abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa, ngarukye mbombekye, babe nk'oku baabaire bari okubanza.
Ndyabashemeza, mbaiheho orubanja rwona orw'ebibi ebi bancumwireho; kandi ndyabasaasira eby'okushiisha byabo byona, ebi bancumwireho n'ebi baakozire nibangomera.

Kandi orurembo oru ruryambeera eiziina ry'okushemererwa, n'eky'okumpimbisisa, n'okumpaisa ekitiinisa omu maisho g'amahanga goona ag'omu nsi yoona, agarihurira ebirungi byona ebi ndikubakorera; kandi baryatiina, bateteme ahabw'ebirungi byona n'obusingye bwona obu nduhaire.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ogu mwanya ogu murikugira ngu n'amatongo, tigurimu bantu nari amatungo, n'endembo za Yuda, n'enguuto za Yerusaalemu, ezibaire amatongo, ezitaine bantu bazitwiremu n'obu gaakuba amatungo,
nigwo gurigaruka kuhurirwamu eiraka ry'okushemererwa n'okwesiima, eiraka rya kishwera na kishwerwa, n'amaraka g'abarikweshongora, nibareeta omu nju ya MUKAMA empongano z'okusiima nibagira bati:
Musiime MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Ahabw'okuba ni murungi,
Kandi embabazi ze n'ez'ebiro byona.
Ahakuba ndyagarura ensi aha buteeka nk'oku yaabaire eri okubanza; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Endembo z'omu nsi y'ebibungo, ez'omu mpita, ez'omuri Negebu, omu ishaza rya Benyamiini, emyanya eyehinguririize Yerusaalemu, n'endembo za Yuda, amasyo garyagaruka kuraba ahansi y'omukono gw'orikugabara; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omuri ebyo biro n'omuri obwo bunaku ndyamereza Daudi Eitaagi ry'okuhikiirira, kandi Itaagi ogwo aryahikiiriza emanja z'oburyo n'okuhikiirira omu nsi.
Omuri ebyo biro Yuda aryajunwa, Yerusaalemu etuure buhooro. Kandi eri niryo iziina eri eryetwa, MUKAMA Kuhikiirira kwaitu.
n'abanyamurwa Abaleevi tibaribura muntu w'okuunyemerera omumaisho kutamba ebitambo by'okwotsya, n'okwotsya empongano z'esaano n'okutamba ebitambo obutwire bwona.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ku mwakuba nimubaasa kwita endagaano yangye, ei naaragaine na nyomushana na nyekiro birekye kubaho omu bunaku bwabyo,
n'endagaano ei naaragaine n'omwiru wangye Daudi ekaafa, abura omwana w'okuza aha ngoma kutegyeka, kandi n'ei naaragaine n'abaheereza bangye abanyamurwa, Abaleevi nayo efa.
Nk'oku eihe ry'omu iguru ritarikubaasa kubarwa, n'omusheenyi gw'aha nyaja gutarikubaasa kurengwa, nikwo naanye ndikanyisa oruzaaro rw'omwiru wangye Daudi, n'abanyamurwa Abaleevi abarikumpeereza.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Torikuteekateeka aha ki abo bantu barikugamba nibagira bati: MUKAMA ayangire enganda ezo ibiri ezi yaatooraine? Okwo nikwo bagayire abantu bangye, ngu tibakiri ihanga omu maisho gaabo.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Kuri ntarahamize ndagaano yangye ei naaragaine na nyomushana na nyekiro, kandi ntarahamize biragiro by'eiguru n'ensi,

obwo nibwo naakwangire oruzaaro rwa Yakobo n'orwa Daudi omwiru wangye, nkanga kutoorana omwe aha baijukuru be kutegyeka oruzaaro rwa Abrahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo. Ahabw'okuba ndyabagarura, mbaihe omu bukwatwa, mbagirire embabazi.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Irooko ogambe na Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda, omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, oru rurembo ninduhayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni, kandi aryarwotsya n'omuriro;
kandi naiwe torimukira, kureka buzimazima oryakwatwa, oheebweyo omu mikono ye; ogwo mugabe wa Babulooni muryagamba hamwe nimureebana, bwanyima otwarwe Babulooni.
Kwonka iwe Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda, hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA! Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikukugambaho naagira ati: T oriitwa rurara, kureka oryafa gye.

Kandi nk'oku baayoterire baashwenkuru abagabe abaakubandiize obubaane, nikwo naiwe barikwoterera obubaane, bakakucurira nibagira bati: Ai bambe, mukama wangye! Ahakuba niinye naagamba ekyo kigambo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Atyo nabi Yeremia yaagambira Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda ebigambo ebyo byona bari Yerusaalemu,

obu eihe ry'omugabe wa Babulooni ryabaire nirirwanisa Yerusaalemu n'endembo za Yuda, Lakishi na Azeeka, ezaabaire zitsigaireho; ahabw'okuba ezo zombi nizo ndembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare ezaabaire zitsigaireho.
ngu buri muntu weena arekure abahuuku be n'abazaana be b'Abaheburaayo, harekye kubaho omuntu weena owaagira mwene waabo Omuyudaaya omuhuuku.

Boona baagyorobera; abanyiginya boona n'abantu boona abaaragaine egyo ndagaano erikugira ngu buri muntu arekure omuhuuku we n'omuzaana we, barekye kugaruka kuza omu buhuuku; boona baabyorobera, baabarekura.
Kwonka bwanyima baahinduka, baagarura abo bahuuku n'abazaana abu baarekwire, baabagarura omu buhuuku.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Nkaragaana na baashwenkuriimwe, obu naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri omu nju y'obuhuuku, ningira nti:

Ahari buri muheru gw'emyaka mukaaga, buri muntu omuriimwe aryarekura Omuheburaayo mugyenzi we ou yaaguziibwe, omazire emyaka mukaaga naamukorera; aryamurekura arugye omu buhuuku. Kwonka baashwenkuriimwe tibarampuriire n'obu kwakuba okuntega amatu.
Ebiro ebi mweteisize, mwakora ebi ndikusiima, mwaranga obusingye, buri muntu yaagambira mugyenzi we eby'okurekurwa, mwaragaanira endagaano omu maisho gangye omu nju erikwetererwa eiziina ryangye.

Kwonka muhindukire, mwajumisa eiziina ryangye, buri muntu omuriimwe yaagarura abahuuku be n'abazaana be, abu mubaire murekwire, nk'oku babaire nibenda, mwabagarura omu buhuuku kuba abahuuku n'abazaana.

Nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati: Timumpuriire, buri muntu kurangira mugyenzi we na mutaahi we eby'okurekurwa. Reeba, nyowe nimbarangira okurekurwa, nikwo kurekurirwa rurara, n'orufu n'enjara, mbahindure eky'okutiinisa aha mahanga goona ag'omu nsi; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi n'abo bashaija abaitsire endagaano yangye, bakanga kuhitsya egyo ndagaano ei baragaine omu maisho gangye, niinyija kubagira nk'enyana ei baacwiremu ebicweka bibiri, bakabiraba ahagati:
abanyiginya ba Yuda, aba Yerusaalemu, abakonwa, abanyamurwa n'abantu boona ab'omuri egi nsi, abaarabire ahagati y'ebicweka by'egyo nyana,
ndyabahayo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo n'ey'abarikwenda kubaita. Kandi emitumbi yaabo eryaba eby'okurya by'amahungu g'omu mwanya n'enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba.
Kandi Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda n'abanyiginya be ndyabahayo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo n'ey'abarikwenda kubaita, n'omu mikono y'eihe ry'omugabe wa Babulooni, eryabarugireho rikagarukayo.
Reeba, niinyija kubaragiira, bagarukye ahari oru rurembo, barurwanise, barukwate, barwotsye n'omuriro. N'endembo za Yuda ndyazihindura amatongo, zibure ab'okuzituuramu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Irooko oze omu nju y'aba Rekabu, ogambe nabo, kandi obareete omu nju ya MUKAMA omuri kimwe aha bishengye byayo, obahe viinyo y'okunywa.
Ntyo naatwara Yaazania mwene Yeremia, omwijukuru wa Habazinia, na beene ishe, n'abatabani boona.

Naabareeta omu nju ya MUKAMA omu kishengye kya beene Hanani mwene Igidalia omuntu wa Ruhanga, ekyabaire kiri haihi n'ekishengye ky'abanyiginya ekiri ahaiguru y'ekishengye kya Maaseya mwene Shalumu, omurinzi w'ekisasi.
Bwanyima naata omu maisho g'aba Rekabu enjoga ziijwire viinyo hamwe n'ebikopo, naabagira nti: Nimunywe viinyo.
Kwonka baagarukamu bati: Titurikwija kuginywa, ahabw'okuba Yonadabu mwene Rekabu tatenkuriitwe akaturagiira ati: Mutarinywa viinyo, imwe na batabani baanyu ebiro byona;

kandi mutaryombeka amaju, mutaribiba embiho, mutaribyara emizaabibu, n'obu kwakuba okugira omusiri gwayo; kureka mugume mutaahe omu mahema ebiro byanyu byona, mubone kuhangaarira omu nsi ei murishuuhuukiramu.
Naitwe twayorobera ekigambo kya Yonadabu mwene Rekabu tatenkuriitwe, omu bi yaaturagiire byona, kutanywa viinyo ebiro byaitu byona, itwe n'abakazi baitu na batabani baitu na bahara baitu,
n'okutombeka maju g'okutaahamu. N'ahabw'ekyo titwine misiri y'emizaabibu, nari endiijo misiri nari embibo;
kureka tutaaha omu mahema, kandi tutuura nitworobera ebi Yonadabu tatenkuriitwe yaaturagiire byona nitubikora.
Kwonka Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni ku yaizire kuteera ensi egi, twagira tuti: Mwije tuze Yerusaalemu, tuhungye eihe ry'Abakaludaaya n'ery'Abasiria. Nikyo tutuuriire Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima ekigambo kay MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli arikugamba naagira ati: Irooko ogambire abantu ba Yuda oti: MUKAMA naabagira ati: Timurikwikiriza kuhaburwa, mukahurira ebigambo byangye?

Ekigambo eki Yonadabu mwene Rekabu yaaragiire abatabani, kutanywa viinyo, kikahikiirizibwa; n'okuhitsya hati tibaginywa; ahabw'okuba bakoorobera ekiragiro kya ishenkurubo. Kwonka nyowe ntuura ningamba naimwe, haza mwanga kuunyorobera.

Kandi ntuura nimbatumaho abaheereza bangye baanabi, nimbatuma obutoosha ningira nti: Nimuhindukye, buri muntu omuriimwe arekye emitwarize ye emibi, mushemeze ebi murikukora, murekye kukuratira baaruhanga abadi kubaheereza; obwo nibwo murituura omu nsi ei naabahaire na baashwenkuriimwe. Kwonka timurantegire matu, n'obu kwakuba okumpurira.
Beene Yonadabu mwene Rekabu bakakora eki ishenkurubo yaabaragiire, kwonka abantu aba bo tibakaanyoroberaga.

Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, nindeeta ahari Yuda n'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu boona akabi koona aku naabagambireho, ahabw'okuba ngambire nabo, baayanga kuhurira; naabeeta, tibaanyetaba.

Kwonka ab'enju ya Rekabu Yeremia yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okworobera ekiragiro kya Yonadabu shwenkuriimwe, n'ebi yaataireho, mukakora ebi yaaragiire,
nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugirira ati: Yonadabu mwene Rekabu taribura muntu w'okumpeereza.
Kwata omuzingo gw'ekitabo, oguhandiikyemu ebigambo byona ebi naakugambiire nimpana Israeli na Yuda n'amahanga goona, okwiha aha busingye bwa Yosia n'okuhitsya hati.
Obundi ab'enju ya Yuda bakaahurira akabi koona aku mmaririire kubareetaho, buri muntu abona kuhinduka, areka emitwarize ye embibi, naanye mbona kubasaasira eby'okushiisha byabo n'ekibi kyabo.
Bwanyima Yeremia yaagira Baruki ati: Banzibiire kuza omu nju ya MUKAMA;

n'ahabw'ekyo obe niiwe waagyenda, kandi oshome ebigambo bya MUKAMA ebihandiikirwe omu muzingo gw'ekitabo ogu ohandiikiremu ebigambo ebi nkugambiire; obishomere abantu boona abateeraniire omu nju ya MUKAMA aha izooba ry'okwesiibyakwo. Kandi obishomere n'Abayuda boona abarugire omu ndembo zaabo.
Obundi okweshengyereza kwabo kukaahika ahari MUKAMA, buri muntu ahinduka areka emitwarize ye emibi, ahabw'okuba okuguubwa kubi kwa MUKAMA n'ekiniga kye, ebi agambire kugirira abo bantu, ni bingi.
Atyo Baruki mwene Neria yaakora byona ebi nabi Yeremia yaamuragiira, yaashoma ebigambo bya MUKAMA ebihandiikirwe omuri ogwo muzingo gw'ekitabo, naabishomera omu nju ya MUKAMA.

Bwanyima Baruki yaashoma omu muzingo gw'ekitabo ebigambo bya Yeremia, naabishomera omu nju ya MUKAMA omu kishengye kya Gemaria mwene Shafani omuhandiiki, ekiri omu kibuga kya ruguru, aharikutaahirwa omu Irembo Risya ery'enju ya MUKAMA.
Mikaaya mwene Gemarira, mwijukuru wa Shafani, ku yaahuriire ebigambo bya MUKAMA byona, ebyashomwa omuri ogwo muzingo,

yaashuuma, yaaza omuri nyaruju y'omugabe omu kishengye ky'omuhandiiki; yaashanga abanyiginya boona bashutami omwo, Elishaama omuhandiiki, Delaaya mwene Shemaaya, Elinasani mwene Akiboora, Gemaria mwene Shafani, Zedekia mwene Hanania n'abanyiginya boona.
Atyo yaabagambira ebigambo byona ebi yaahurira, obu Baruki yaaba naashomera abantu boona omuzingo gw'ekitabo.

Abanyiginya boona nikwo kutuma Yehudi mwene Netamia mwijukuru wa Shelemia mwene Kuushi, kugira Baruki bati: Kwata omuzingo ogu waashomera abantu, oije. Atyo Baruki mwene Neria yaagukwata, yaija ahu bari.
Baamugira bati: Shutama, ogushome. Atyo yaagubashomera.
Ku baahuriire ebigambo byona, baahindukirana baine obwoba, baagira Baruki bati: Buzimazima tushemereire kugambira omugabe ebigambo ebi byona.
Bwanyima baabuuza Baruki bati: Tugambire oku waahandiikikire ebyo bigambo byona, ebi Yeremia yaakugambiire.
Baruki yaabagarukamu ati: Akaba angambira ebigambo ebi byona, naanye mbihandiikisa bwino omuri ogu muzingo.
Abanyiginya baagira Baruki bati: Iwe na Yeremia mwirooko mwesherekye, hatagira owaamanya ahu muri.
Bwanyima ku baaherize kuta ogwo muzingo omu kishengye kya Elishaama omuhandiiki, baaza omu kikaari, ahu omugabe ari, baamugambira ebyo bigambo byona.
Ahonaaho omugabe yaatuma Yehudi kureeta ogwo muzingo, yaagwiha omu kishengye kya Elishaama omuhandiiki. Yehudi ku yaagureetsire, yaagushomera omugabe, abanyiginya boona bamwemereire aha rubaju.
Obwo kukaba kuri okwezi kwa mwenda, kandi omugabe akaba ashutami omu nju ei ashutamamu omu biro by'embeho, omuriro nigwaka omu mahega omu maisho ge.
Yehudi ku yaabaire aheza kushoma ebicweka bishatu nari bina, omugabe abishara n'akasyo, abinaga omu muriro omu mahega, okuhitsya obu ogwo muzingo gwona gwahwereire omu muriro omu mahega.
Kwonka n'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, omugabe n'obu yaakuba omwe aha bagaragwa be boona, abaahuriire ebyo bigambo byona, tibaratiinire, n'obu kwakuba okutaagura ebijwaro byabo.
Kandi hoona Elinasani na Delaaya na Gemaria n'obu baraabe bayeshengyereize omugabe kutootsya ogwo muzingo, kwonka tarabakundiire.
Bwanyima omugabe yaaragiira Yerameeli omutabani na Seraya mwene Azirieli na Shelemia mwene Abudeeli kukwata Baruki omuhandiiki na nabi Yeremia; kwonka MUKAMA yaabashereka.
Omugabe ku yaaherize kwotsya omuzingo gw'ekitabo ogurimu ebigambo ebi Yeremia yaagambiire Baruki kuhandiika, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia nikigira kiti:
Kwata ogundi muzingo, oguhandiikyemu ebigambo byona ebibaire biri omu muzingo gw'okubanza, ogu Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda ayokize.

Na Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Oyokize ogwo muzingo gw'ekitabo, noogira oti: Ahabw'enki waaguhandiikiremu oti: Buzimazima omugabe wa Babulooni aryaija acwekyereze egi nsi, agimaremu abantu n'amatungo?
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugambira ahari Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda ati: Tarigira w'okuza aha ngoma ya Daudi, kandi omutumbi gwe guryanagwa aheeru omu kibabo ky'omushana nyomushana, n'omu mbeho nyekiro.
Kandi ndyamuhana n'oruzaaro rwe n'abagaragwa be, mbature eby'okushiisha byabo; bo n'abatwire Yerusaalemu, n'abantu ba Yuda, ndyabareetaho akabi koona aku naabagambireho, haza bakanga kuhurira.

Atyo Yeremia yaakwata ogundi muzingo, yaaguha Baruki omuhandiiki mwene Neria, yaaguhandiikamu ebigambo byona ebyabaire biri omu muzingo ebyagambirwe Yeremia, ogu Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda yaayokize omu muriro; kandi yaayongyeraho ebindi bingi ebirikushushana nabyo.
Kwonka we n'abagaragwa be n'abantu b'omuri egyo nsi, tihaine waahuriire ebigambo bya MUKAMA ebi yaagambire naaraba omuri nabi Yeremia.
Obwo Yeremia akaba akiine obusingye kuza omu bantu naagaruka omuka, ahabw'okuba akaba atakatairwe mu kihome.
Kandi eihe rya Faraho rikaba rirugire Misri; Abakaludaaya abaabaire bagotsire Yerusaalemu, ku baahuriire enkuru yaabo, baaruga Yerusaalemu, baagyenda.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari nabi Yeremia nikigira kiti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Oku mube nikwo mwagambira omugabe wa Yuda obatumire kuunyehanuuzaho muti: Reeba, eihe rya Faraho, eriizire kubaha emikono, riri haihi kugaruka Misri omu nsi yaabo.
Bwanyima Abakaludaaya nibaija kugaruka, bateere oru rurembo, barukwate, barwotsye.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Murekye kwebeiha nimugira muti: Buzimazima Abakaludaaya baryagumayo; mumanye ngu tibarikwija kugumayo.
Ahakuba n'obu mwakusingura eihe ry'Abakaludaaya ryona eririkubarwanisa, hakatsigara emputa zonka, buri mputa ekaahuruutuka omu ihema ryayo, ziimuka, zootsya oru rurembo n'omuriro.
Eihe ry'Abakaludaaya ku ryarugire Yerusaalemu ahabw'okutiina eihe rya Faraho,
Yeremia yaaruga Yerusaalemu kuza omu nsi ya Benyamiini kutunga omugabo gwe omu bantu baayo.
Ku yaabaire yaahika aha irembo rya Benyamiini, omuserukare orikurinda orikwetwa Iriiya mwene Shelemia, mwijukuru wa Hanania, yaamukwata, yaamugira ati: Noocwa kuza omu Bakaludaaya.
Yeremia yaamugarukamu ati: Ngaaha! noobeiha; tindikucwera omu Bakaludaaya. Kwonka Iriiya tiyaikiriza bi arikugamba, yaamukwata, yaamutwarira abategyeki.
Abategyeki baagirira Yeremia ekiniga kingi, baamuteera, baamuta omu nju ya Yonasaani omuhandiiki, ahabw'okuba bakaba bagihindwire ekihome.

Bwanyima omugabe Zedekia yaatuma ku bamureeta, yaamwakiira, yaamubuuriza omu nju ye bari bombi, naagira ati: Hariho ekigambo kyona ekirugire ahari MUKAMA? Yeremia yaamugira ati: Kiriho. Yeremia yaagaruka yaagira ati: Noija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni.
Kandi Yeremia yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Nkucumwireho ki, iwe n'abaheereza baawe, nari ncumwire ki ahari eri ihanga, mwaza kunta omu kihome?
Baanabi baanyu, ababaire nibabahanuurira nibagira ngu omugabe wa Babulooni taribateera, n'obu kwakuba okurwanisa egi nsi, barahi?
Mbwenu mpurira, ninkweshengyereza, Nyakusinga Omugabe, oikirize okweshengyereza kwangye, orekye kungarura omu nju ya Yonasaani omuhandiiki, ntakaagwayo.

Atyo omugabe Zedekia yaaragiira ku barindira Yeremia omu kibuga ky'abarinzi; yaaguma naaheebwa omugaati gumwe buri izooba, okuruga omu nguuto y'abateeki b'emigaati, okuhitsya obu emigaati yoona yaahweire omu rurembo. Atyo Yeremia yaaguma omu kibuga ky'abarinzi.
Kandi Shefania mwene Mataani, Gedalia mwene Pashuri, Yukaali mwene Shelemia na Pashuri mwene Malukia baahurira ebigambo ebi Yeremia yaagambiire abantu boona, naagira ati:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Omuntu oraagume omuri oru rurembo naija kwitwa rurara, n'enjara, kandi n'orufu; kwonka oraarugyemu akeehongyera Abakaludaaya aryagumaho, atimbuukye omu rugamba n'engabirano, nigo magara ge.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Buzimazima orurembo oru nirwija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'eihe ry'omugabe wa Babulooni, rukwatwe.

Bwanyima abategyeki baagira omugabe bati: Reka ogu mushaija aitwe, ahabw'okuba naacwa abaserukare abatsigaire omuri oru rurembo, n'abandi bantu boona, entegye, ahabw'okubagambira ebigambo ebyo. Nimureeba omushaija ogu ku atarikwendeza eri ihanga ebirungi, kureka akabi.
Omugabe Zedekia yaagira ati: Reeba, ari omu mikono yaanyu; ahabw'okuba omugabe tarikubaasa kubazibira.

Batyo baatwara Yeremia, baamunaga omu kiziba kya Malukia kiri omu kibuga ky'abarinzi, baamushuumisamu emirunga. Kwonka omuri ekyo kiziba hakaba hatarimu maizi, kureka ebyondo. Yeremia yaabishaayiramu.
yaashohora, yaaruga omuri nyaruju, yaagira omugabe ati:
Nyakusinga Omugabe, abo bantu, omu bi bakozire Yeremia byona, bakozire kubi kumunaga omu kiziba; kandi naija kwitirwamu enjara, ahabw'okuba omu rurembo tihaakirimu mugaati gwona.
Ahonaaho omugabe yaaragiira Ebedi-meleki Omunyesiopia naamugira ati: Twara abashaija bashatu okuruga aha, mugyende mwihe nabi Yeremia omu kiziba atakafiire.

Atyo Ebedi-meleki yaagyenda n'abo bashaija, yaataaha omuri nyaruju omu kishengye ekibiikwamu emyenda, baihamu obucancabari bw'emyenda n'ebijwaro bikuzire, yaabishuumisa emirunga omu kiziba, yaabiha Yeremia.
Bwanyima Ebedi-meleki Omunyesiopia yaagira Yeremia ati: Ta obucancabari n'ebijwaro bikuzire omu maahwa, orabyeho emirunga. Yeremia yaakora atyo.
Batyo baiha Yeremia omu kiziba n'emirunga, baamutuuhuurayo. Okuruga aho Yeremia yaaguma omu kibuga ky'abarinzi.
Omugabe Zedekia yaatuma kweta nabi Yeremia, yaamwakiirira aha irembo rya kashatu erya hekalu ya MUKAMA. Omugabe yaagira Yeremia ati: Naaza kukubuuza; haza otagira eki wanshereka.
Yeremia yaagarukamu Zedekia ati: Ku ndaakugambire, buzimazima torikwija kuunyita? Kandi n'obu ndaakuhe obwengye, torikwija kuunyikiriza.
Bwanyima omugabe Zedekia yaarahirira Yeremia omu mubonano naagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire owaatuhangire, tindikwija kukwita, n'obu kwakuba okukuhayo omu mikono y'abantu abarikwenda kukwita.
Kwonka ku oraabe oteehongyeire bategyeki b'omugabe wa Babulooni, oru rurembo nirwija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya, barwotsye n'omuriro, kandi naiwe toribakira.
Omugabe Zedekia yaamugira ati: Nintiina Abayudaaya abeehongyeire Abakaludaaya, ngu ntakaaheebwayo omu mikono yaabo, bakandeebesa enaku.
Yeremia yaamugira ati: Torikwija kuheebwayo mu mikono yaabo. Ninkweshengyereza, yorobera eiraka rya MUKAMA omu bi ndikukugambira; obwo nibwo orikwija kuba gye, n'amagara gaawe gakakira.
Kwonka ku oraayangye kugomooka, eki nikyo MUKAMA anyorekire.
Ndeebire abakazi boona abatsigirwe omu nju y'omugabe wa Yuda, nibabashohoza, nibabatwarira abategyeki b'omugabe wa Babulooni; kandi abo bakazi babaire nibagira ngu,
Banywani baawe abu oyesiga bakubeihire,
Baakusingura,
Mbwenu ebigyere byawe ku biherize kushaayira omu byondo,
Baakutsigaho.
Bwanyima Zedekia yaagira Yeremia ati: Hatagira owaamanya ebyo bigambo, otakaafa.
Abategyeki ku baraahurire ngu ngambire naiwe, baakwijaho, baakubuuza bati: Tugambire ebi ogambiire omugabe, kandi n'ebi omugabe akugambiire; otagira eki waatushereka tukakwita,
obwo obagire oti: Nyeshengyereize omugabe n'obucureezi ngu atangarura omu nju ya Yonasaani, nkagwamu.
Bwanyima abategyeki boona baija ahari Yeremia, baamubuuza, nawe yaabagarukamu nk'oku omugabe amuhabwire. Batyo baareka kugamba nawe; ahabw'okuba eki yaagambire n'omugabe tikiramanyirwe.
Okuruga aho Yeremia yaaguma omu kibuga ky'abarinzi, okuhitsya aha izooba eri Yerusaalemu yaakwatiirweho.
Omu mwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe ogw'omu busingye bwa Zedekia, omu kwezi kwa kana, aha kiro kyakwo kya mwenda, bakasheenya ah'okutaahira omu rurembo.

Ku baaherize kurukwata, abategyeki b'omugabe wa Babulooni boona baarutaahamu, baashutama omu irembo ry'ahagati; amaziina gaabo ni Nerigali-sharezeeri, Samugaari-neebo, Sarusekimu, Rabusarisi, na Nerugaali-sherezeeri Rabumaagi, hamwe n'abandi bategyeki b'omugabe wa Babulooni boona.

Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda n'abaserukare be boona ku baabareebire, baahunga, baacwa omu rurembo nyekiro nibatoora omuhanda ogurikuraba omu musiri gw'omugabe omu irembo ry'ahagati y'engo zombi, baatoora ogurikuza Araba.

Kwonka eihe ry'Abakaludaaya ryabakurata, ryakwatira Zedekia omu ruhita rwa Yeriko. Ku baaherize kumukwata, baamutwarira Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni Ribula omu nsi ya Hamasi, yaamucwera orubanja.
Omugabe wa Babulooni yaitirayo batabani ba Zedekia omu maisho ga ishebo, kandi yaita n'abakungu ba Yuda boona.
Bwanyima yaihamu Zedekia amaisho, yaamubohesa emihama, yaamutwara Babulooni.
Kandi Abakaludaaya baayotsya nyaruju y'omugabe n'amaju g'abantu, baasheenya n'orugo rw'amabaare rwa Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaatwara abantu abaatsigaire omu rurembo, abaabaire bamwehongyeire hamwe n'abaabaire batsigaire omu rurembo, yaabatwara Babulooni bari enkwatwa.
Kwonka Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaatsiga omuri Yuda abooro bamwe abataine kantu, yaabaha emisiri y'emizaabibu n'eshambu omuri obwo bunaku.
Kandi Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yaaragiira Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi ebya Yeremia, naagira ati:
Mutware, omurinde gye, otagira eki waamwitsa, kureka eki araakugambire, obe nikyo waamukorera.
Atyo Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi, Nebushazibaani Rabusarisi, Nerugaali-sharezaari Rabumaagi, n'abandi bategyeki b'omugabe wa Babulooni boona
baatuma, baiha Yeremia omu kibuga ky'abarinzi, baamukwatsa Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu, mwijukuru wa Shafani, ngu amugarure omu ka ye. Atyo ku yaahikireyo, yaatuura omu bantu baayo.

Irooko ogambire Ebedi-meleki Omunyesiopia oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kuhikiiriza ahari oru rurembo ebi naagambire kurureetaho kabi, kutari kurureetaho birungi, kandi biryahikiirizibwa eryo izooba noobireeba;
kwonka iwe, eryo izooba ndyakujuna, orekye kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abo bantu bu orikutiina; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'okuba buzimazima ndyakujuna, toriitwa rurara; kureka oryatimbuuka omu rugamba n'engabirano, nigo magara gaawe, ahabw'okuba okaanyesiga; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Eki n'ekigambo ekyaizire ahari Yeremia nikiruga ahari MUKAMA, obu Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaabaire aherize kumurekura kuruga Raama, naamutwara abohirwe n'enjegyere hamwe n'ezindi nkwatwa zoona eza Yerusaalemu na Yuda, ezaabaire nizitwarwa Babulooni.
Omukuru w'abarinzi yaatwara Yeremia, yaamugira ati: MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe akagamba akabi aka akarihika aha mwanya ogu;
MUKAMA akihikiriize, yaakora nk'oku yaagambire. Ebi byona bibahikireho ahabw'okuba mukacumura ahari MUKAMA, mwayanga kuhurira eiraka rye.

Mbwenu eri izooba naaza kukwiha enjegyere aha mikono. Ku oraabe noosiima kugyenda naanye Babulooni, ija, naanye niinyija kukurinda gye. Kwonka ku oraabe otarikusiima kugyenda naanye Babulooni, orereere. Reeba, ensi yoona eri omu maisho gaawe; za ahu orikwenda hoona, ah'orikuteekateeka ngu ni harungi kandi hahikire.

Ku oraatsigare, ogarukye ahari Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu, mwijukuru wa Shafani, ou omugabe wa Babulooni ataireho kutegyeka endembo za Yuda, otuure nawe omu bantu; nari shi oze ahu orikusiima hoona. Atyo omukuru w'abarinzi yaamuha entanda n'ekiconco, yaamureka.
Bwanyima Yeremia yaagyenda yaashanga Gedalia mwene Ahikamu Mizipa, yaatuura nawe omu bantu abaabaire batsigaire omu nsi.

baaza Mizipa owa Gedalia, amaziina gaabo nigo aga, Ishimaeli mwene Nesania, Yohanaani mwenge Karea, Seraaya mwene Tanihumeesi, beene Efai aba Netofa, na Yezania mutabani w'Omunyamaaka, bo n'abashaija baabo.

Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu mwijukuru wa Shafani yaabarahira, bo n'abashaija baabo, yaabagira ati: Murekye kutiina kwehongyera Abakaludaaya. Mugume omu nsi egi, nimuheereza omugabe wa Babulooni; obwo nibwo muraije kuguma muri gye.

Nyowe niinyija kuguma Mizipa nimbatabaarira aha Bakaludaaya abariija owaitu; kwonka imwe mugume mushanguruze viinyo n'ebijuma by'omu kyanda n'amajuta, mubibiikye omu nyungu zaanyu, mutuure omu ndembo ezi mukubwire.

N'Abayuda boona abaabaire batwire Moabu n'omu Baamoni n'omuri Edomu n'omu nsi ezindi zoona, ku baahuriire ngu omugabe wa Babulooni atsigireyo abaahonokire aha Bayuda, yaataho Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu mwijukuru wa Shafani kuba omutegyeki waabo,
Abayudaaya abo boona baagaruka, baaruga ei baabaire babingiirwe yoona, baija Mizipa owa Gedalia omu nsi ya Yuda; baashanguruza viinyo n'ebijuma by'omu kyanda bingi munonga.
baamugira bati: Torikumanya ku Baalisi omugabe w'Abaamoni ayohereize Ishimaeli mwene Nesania kukwita? Kwonka Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu tiyaabaikiriza.

Bwanyima Yohanaani mwene Karea yaagambirira Gedalia Mizipa omu mubonano, ati: Ninkushaba, ondekye nze kwita Ishimaeli mwene Nesania, kandi tihariho orikwija kukimanya. Mbwenu, ku yaakukwita, Abayudaaya boona abaakuteeraniireho baataataana, n'abahonokire aha Bayuda baahwerekyerera, okaazira ki?
Kwonka Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu yaagira Yohanaani mwene Karea ati: Otakora ekyo kintu, ahabw'okuba noobeiherera Ishimaeli.

Ishimaeli mwene Nesania n'abo bashaija ikumi abu yaabaire aine, baimuka, baateera Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu, mwijukuru wa Shafani, rurara, baamugwisaho; kandi ogwo ou baitsire niwe omugabe wa Babulooni yaabaire ataireho kuba omutegyeki omuri egyo nsi.
Kandi Ishimaeli yaagaruka yaita Abayudaaya boona abu Gedalia yaabaire aine Mizipa, hamwe n'abaserukare b'Abakaludaaya abaabaire bariho.
Ku yaamazire kabiri aitsire Gedalia, kandi kitakamanyirwe muntu weena,

haija abantu makumi munaana nibaruga Shekemu, Shiilo na Samaria bamweire ebireju, bajwaire ebijwaro bitaagukire, beesharashazire emibiri, bareetsire empongano z'esaano n'obubaane, kubihongyera omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA.
Ishimaeli mwene Nesania yaaruga Mizipa kuza kubabugana, yaagyenda naarira. Ku yaabaire naakibabugana, yaabagira ati: Mwije tuze owa Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu.
Ku baahikire omu rurembo, Ishimaeli mwene Nesania n'abashaija abu yaabaire aine baita abo bantu, baabanaga omu kiina.
Kwonka hakaba hariho abantu ikumi omuribo abaagizire Ishimaeli bati: Otatwita, ahabw'okuba twine engano, sayiri, amajuta n'obwoki, bisherekire omu ishwa. Atyo yaabareka, tiyaabaita na bagyenzi baabo.

Bwanyima Ishimaeli yaatwara abantu abaabaire bari Mizipa na bahara b'omugabe n'abantu boona abaabaire batsigaire Mizipa, abu Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaabaire akwatsize Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu. Ishimaeli mwene Nesania yaabatwara bari enkwatwa, yaimuka kwambuka kuhungira omu Baamoni.
Bwanyima Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'engabo abu yaabaire aine, ku baahuriire akagwe aku Ishimaeli mwene Nesania agwisize,
baahurura n'engabo zaabo zoona, baaza kurwanisa Ishimaeli mwene Nesania. Baamugwaho aha kiyanja kihango ekyabaire kiri Gibeoni.
Abantu boona abaabaire bari hamwe na Ishimaeli, ku baareebire Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'engabo boona abu yaabaire aine, baashemererwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo abantu boona abu Ishimaeli mwene Nesania yaabaire aihire Mizipa, akabatwara bari enkwatwa, baakuba, baagaruka, baashanga Yohanaani mwene Karea.
Kwonka Ishimaeli mwene Nesania yaahunga Yohanaani aine abantu munaana, yaaza omu Baamoni.

Bwanyima Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'engabo boona abu yaabaire aine baatwara abantu boona abaabaire batsigaire, abu Ishimaeli mwene Nesania yaabaire atwaire bari enkwatwa naabaiha Mizipa, aherize kwita Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu. Yohanaani yaabagarura naabiaha Gibeoni, abaserukare, abakazi abaana n'abakonwa.
Baagyenda, baaguma Gerutikimuhaamu haihi na Betelehemu; obwo nibenda kuza Misri ahabw'Abakaludaaya;
ahabw'okuba bakaba nibabatiina ahabwa Ishimaeli mwene Nesania kwita Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu, ou omugabe wa Babulooni yaabaire ataireho kuba omutegyeki w'ensi egyo.

baamugira bati: Nitukweshengyereza oikirize okushaba kwaitu; otushabire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, itwe twena abatsigaireho; ahabw'okuba tukaba turi baingi, mbwenu tutsigaire bakye nk'oku orikutureeba.
MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe atworekye omuhanda ogu tushemereire kutoora n'ebi tushemereire kukora.
Nabi Yeremia yaabagarukamu ati: Naabahurira. Mbwenu naaza kushaba MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nk'oku mwashaba; kandi eki MUKAMA araagarukyemu kyona, niinyija kukibagambira. Tiinyine ki ndaabasherekye.
Bwanyima baagira Yeremia bati: Ku turaabe tutakozire ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe araakutume kutugambira, MUKAMA abe niwe yaaba mushinja waitu ow'amazima kandi omwesigwa.
Yaaba biba birungi nari bibi, nitwija kworobera eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ou turikukutumaho, tubone kuba gye, ku turaabe twayorobeire eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
Yaayeta Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'amahe boona abu yaabaire aine, n'abantu boona okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru,
yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, ou mwantumireho kumuhitsyaho okweshengyereza kwanyu, arikugamba naagira ati:
Ku muraagume omuri egi nsi, niinyija kubombeka, tindikwija kubasheenya; niinyija kubabyara, tindikwija kubakuura; ahabw'okuba nyefuurize ahabw'akabi aku naabareetsireho.
Murekye kutiina omugabe wa Babulooni, ou murikutiina; mutamutiina; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira; ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naimwe kubajuna n'okubaiha omu mikono ye.
Ndyabaha okugirirwa embabazi, nawe abone kuzibagirira, kandi abarekye mugume omu nsi yaanyu.
Kwonka ku muraagire muti: Titurikwija kuguma omuri egi nsi, mwagomera eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu,
nimugira muti: Ngaaha, nitwija kwegiira omu nsi ya Misri, ei tutarireeba ngamba, n'obu kwakuba okuhurira eiraka ry'enzamba, nari okubura eby'okurya, kandi okwo niyo turituura,
mbwenu nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, imwe abatsigaire omuri Yuda. Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Ku muraate amaisho aha kuza Misri, mwaza kutuurayo,
mumanye ngu rurara ei murikutiina neija kubahambiza omu nsi ya Misri, kandi n'enjara ei murikutiina neija kugyenda ebeezingiriire, okuhitsya obu murihikayo; kandi okwo niyo murigwa.
Abantu boona abataire amaisho aha kuza Misri kutuurayo nibaija kwitirwayo rurara n'enjara n'orufu; kandi tihariho n'omwe omuribo orihonokaho nari oritsigaraho, akakira akabi aku ndibareetaho.

Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Nk'okuguubwa kubi kwangye n'ekiniga kyangye oku byashukirwe aha batuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, nikwo naimwe murishukwaho ekiniga kyangye mwahika Misri. Kandi muryaba ekirikwamaganwa, ekirikutiinisa, eky'okukyeenwa n'eky'okushekyeererwa; kandi timurigaruka kureeba ogu mwanya bundi.
Imwe abatsigaire omuri Yuda, MUKAMA abagizire ati: Mutaza Misri. Mukimanyire kimwe ku naabeehanangiriza eri izooba,

ku mutashemereire kuhaba mukafa, ahabw'okuba mukantuma ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu, nimugira muti: Tushabire ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu; kandi kyona eki MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu araagambe, okutugambire, naitwe nitwija kukikora.
Mbwenu eri izooba naakibagambira, kwonka timwayorobera iraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu omuri byona ebi abantumireho.
N'ahabw'ekyo mumanyire kimwe, ku rurara n'enjara n'orufu birikwija kubaitira ei murikwenda kuza kutuura.
Yeremia ku yaaherize kugambira abantu boona ebigambo bya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo byona, ebi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo amubatumireho,
Azaria mwene Hoshaaya na Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abanyarubwa boona baagira Yeremia bati: Noobeiha; MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu takutumire kugira oti: Mutaza Misri kutuurayo;
kureka Baruki mwene Neria niwe atuteeraine naiwe kutuhayo omu mikono y'Abakaludaaya kutwita nari okututwara Babulooni turi enkwatwa.
Atyo Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'amahe boona n'abantu boona baayanga kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA kuguma omu nsi ya Yuda,
kureka Yohanaani mwene Karea n'abakuru b'amahe boona baatwara Abayuda boona abaabaire bagarukire kutuura omu nsi ya Yuda, barugire omu mahanga goona ei baabaire babingiirwe,

abashaija, abakazi, abaana, bahara ba'omugabe, na buri muntu weena ou Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaabaire akwatsize Gedalia mwene Ahikaamu, mwijukuru wa Shafani, hamwe na nabi Yeremia na Baruki mwene Neria.
Batyo baaza omu nsi ya Misri, ahabw'okuba bakanga kuhurira eiraka rya MUKAMA. Bwanyima baahika Tahapenesi.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija ahari Yeremia ari Tahapenesi, nikigira kiti:
Twara amabaare mahango omu ngaro, ogasherekye omu budongo ahansi y'amabaare agaariire aha irembo ry'ekikaari kya Faraho omuri Tahapenesi, Abayuda boona nibakureeba;

obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyayohereza omwiru wangye Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, ate ekitebe kye ky'obugabe ahari aga mabaare agu naashereka, kandi ateere eihema rye ry'obugabe ahaiguru yaago.
Aryaija ateere ensi ya Misri, aheyo ab'okwitwa rufu ebaite, ab'okutwarwa omu bukwatwa batwarwe, n'ab'okwitwa rurara ebaite.

Kandi aryatweka omuriro omuri hekalu za baaruhanga ba Misri, abootsye, abatware bari enkwatwa, ashemeze ensi ya Misri, nk'oku omuriisa ashemeza ekijwaro kye, akakimaramu enda. Bwanyima arugyeyo n'obusingye.
Aryasheenyagura enyomyo z'amabaare Beti-shemeshi ey'omu nsi ya Misri, kandi na hekalu za baaruhanga ba Misri aryazootsya n'omuriro.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Mukareeba akabi koona aku naareetsire ahari Yerusaalemu n'aha ndembo zaoona eza Yuda. Hati n'amatongo; tihaine ozitwiremu,
ahabw'obubi bw'ebi baakozire nibangwisa kubi, obu baaza kwotera obubaane, bakaheereza baaruhanga abandi abu batakamanyaga, bo naimwe na baashwenkuriimwe.
Kwonka nkaguma nimbatumaho abaheereza bangye baanabi boona, ningira nti: Nyaabura 'mwe, murekye kukora ebirikunugwa ebyo ebi ndikwanga.
Kwonka tibaahurira n'obu kwakuba okutega amatu, kuhinduka kureka obubi bwabo, n'okutooterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane.
Nikyo okuguubwa kubi kwangye n'ekiniga kyangye byashukiirwe, bikabuguma omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu, zikahinduka amatongo eihamba, nk'oku ziri hati.

Mbwenu oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'enki nimukora akabi kahango kati aha magara gaanyu, mukeemaraho omushaija n'omukazi, omwana muto n'omwereere ou mwatsigaza?

Ahabw'enki nimuunyitsa ekiniga n'ebi murikukora n'emikono yaanyu, mukooterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane omu nsi ya Misri, ei mwaizire kutuuramu, ngu mucuubwe, mube eky'okukyeenwa n'eky'okushekyererwa omu mahanga goona ag'omu nsi?
Mwebirwe obubi bwa baashwenkuriimwe n'obw'abagabe ba Yuda, obw'abakazi baabo, obwanyu n'obw'abakazi baanyu, obw'ebi baakoreire omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu?
Nangwa n'okuhitsya hati tibakeecureize, n'obu kwakuba okutiina, kandi tibakagyendeire mu biragiro byangye n'omu byatairweho, ebi naataire omu maisho gaanyu n'aga baashwenkuriimwe.

Kandi Abayuda abaatsigaireho abamaririire kwija omuri Misri kutuuramu, ndyabatwara, bamarweho; omuri egi nsi ya Misri nimwo barigwa, bakamarwaho rurara n'enjara; okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru baryaitwa rurara n'enjara, kandi baryaba ekirikwamaganwa, ekirikutiinisa, eky'okukyeenwa n'eky'okushekyererwa.
Ndyafubira abatwire omu nsi ya Misri, nk'oku naafubiire Yerusaalemu, mbaitse rurara n'enjara n'orufu,

habure n'omwe omu Bayuda abaatsigaireho abagiire omu nsi ya Misri kutuurayo owaahonokaho nari owaatsigaraho, nari owaagaruka omu nsi ya Yuda ei barikwetenga kugaruka kutuuramu; ahabw'okuba tihaine barigarukayo, kureka bakye abaacwire.

Bwanyima abashaija boona, abaabaire nibamanya ngu abakazi baabo nibooterera baaruhanga abandi obubaane, kandi n'abakazi boona abaabaire beemereire aho, bari omutwe muhango munonga, n'abantu boona abaabaire batwire Pasiroosi omu nsi ya Misri, baagarukamu Yeremia nibagira bati:
Titurikwija kukuhurira omuri ekyo kigambo ki otugambiire omu iziina rya MUKAMA,

kureka nitwija kuhikiiriza ekigambo kyona eki twagambire nituhiga, okwoterera omugabekazi w'omu iguru obubaane, n'okumushukira empongano z'eby'okunywa, nk'oku twabaire tukora, itwe na baatatenkuriitwe n'abagabe baitu n'abanyiginya baitu, tukiri omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu; ahabw'okuba omuri obwo bunaku tukaba twine eby'okurya bingi, turi gye, tutaine kabi karikutuhikaho.
Kwonka okwiha obu twarereera kwoterera omugabekazi w'omu iguru obubaane n'okumushukira empongano z'eby'okunywa, tukabura byona, twamarwaho rurara n'enjara.

Kandi abo bakazi baagira bati: Obu twabaire twoterera omugabekazi w'omu iguru obubaane, tukamushukira empongano z'eby'okunywa, noogira ngu tukaba tumukorera otukeeki tumuramya, tumushukira empongano z'eby'okunya, abashaija baitu batarikubisiima?

Beitu obubaane obu mwayotereire omu ndembo za Yuda n'omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu, imwe na baashwenkuriimwe, abagabe baanyu n'abanyiginya baanyu, n'abantu b'omuri egyo nsi, MUKAMA tarabiijukire, bikamuhika aha mutima?
MUKAMA akaba atakibaasa kugumisiririza bibi byanyu n'ebihagaro ebi mwabaire nimukora; nikyo ensi yaanyu yaahindukiire amatongo n'eihamba n'eky'okukyeenwa, etagire owaagituuramu, nk'oku kiri na hati.

Ekyabareeteire kuhikwaho akabi aka koona, nk'oku kiri hati, n'ahabw'okuba mukootera obubaane, mwacumura ahari MUKAMA, timwayorobera iraka rye, n'obu kwakuba okugyendera omu biragiro bye, n'omu byatairweho, n'omu bi yaahamize.
Bwanyima Yeremia yaagaruka yaagambira abantu boona n'abakazi boona ati: Imwe Bayuda 'mwe mwena abari omu nsi ya Misri, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugamba naagira ati: Imwe n'abakazi baanyu mukeegambira n'endimi zaanyu, mwabihikiiriza n'emikono yaanyu, nimugira muti: Tituribura kuhikiiriza ebi twagambire nituhiga, kwoterera omugabekazi w'omu iguru obubaane, n'okumushukira empongano z'eby'okunywa. Mpaho nimwirooko mugumizemu n'okuhiga kwanyu, kandi mukuhikiirize.

Kwonka imwe Bayuda 'mwe mwena abatwire omu nsi ya Misri, muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Reeba, ndahiire eiziina ryangye erikuru, ku eiziina ryangye ritarigaruka kurahirwa muntu wa Yuda weena ori omu nsi ya Misri naagira ati: Nindahira MUKAMA ohuriire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Reeba, mbataireho abiri kubakora kubi, ti kubakora gye. Abayuda boona abari omu nsi ya Misri baryamarwaho rurara n'enjara, okuhitsya obu barihweraho kimwe.

N'abarihonoka ahari rurara baryaruga omu nsi ya Misri, bagarukye omu nsi ya Yuda bari mbarwa; kandi Abayuda boona abatsigaireho abaizire omu nsi ya Misri kutuuramu baryamanya ou ekigambo kye krigumaho, yaaba kyangye nari kyabo.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Aka niko karibabeera akamanyiso, ku ndibafubirira omuri ogu mwanya, mukabona kumanya ku ebigambo byangye biriguma biri eby'amazima, bikabareetaho akabi.

Kandi oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kuhayo Faraho Hofura omugabe wa Misri omu mikono y'abazigu be n'abarikumuhiiga kumwita, nk'oku naahaireyo Zedekia omugabe wa Yuda omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, owaabaire ari omuzigu we, kandi naamuhiiga kumwita.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikukugira, iwe Baruki, ati:
Okagira oti: Ai bambe! eshi ndeebire, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ayongyeire enaku aha busaasi bwangye; okutsinda kwankabya, tiinyine buhuumure.
Mbwenu omugire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, eki naayombekire, ninkisheenya; kandi eki naabyaire, ninkikuura; kandi niinyija kukikora omu nsi yoona.

Mbwenu nooyesherurira ebikuru? Otabisherura. Ahabw'okuba reeba, naaza kureeta akabi aha bantu boona; kwonka iwe ndyakutimbuura omu rugamba n'engabirano, nigo magara gaawe, omu myanya yoona ei orizamu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Muze aha rugamba.
Muzitembe, imwe abazigyenderaho!
Muze omu myanya yaanyu mujwaire enkofiira,
Mweze amacumu gaanyu, mujware ebijwaro by'ebyoma.
Bahahaize emitima, baagaruka enyima,
N'amamanzi gaabo gasingwirwe,
Gairuka nigahunga, gatarikureeba nyima;
Ebirikutiinisa biri embaju zoona;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Empaya-maguru tizirikubaasa kuhunga,
N'amamanzi tigarikubaasa kukira.
Bateire entsibo, baagwa
Aha mugyera Furaati aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Nk'emigyera ei amaizi gaayo garikuboroogota?
Nk'emigyera ei amaizi gaayo garikuboroogota,
Neegira eti: Ndyaijura, nshwekye ensi yoona,
Ncwekyereze endembo n'abazitwiremu.
Naimwe bigaari 'mwe, nimurigite!
K'amamanzi gashohore,
Abanyesiopia n'Abapuuti enkwata-ngabo,
N'Abaluudi baarugambwa enkwata-mata.
Eizooba ry'okuhooreraho abazigu be enzigu;
Rurara eryarya, ehaagye,
Enywe eshagama yaabo, eigute;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe, naatambira ebitambo
Aha mugyera Furaati aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Iwe Misri 'we, omwishiki oshugaine!
Emibazi mingi ei otuura nookoresa n'eya busha;
Tori w'okukira.
Amahanga gahuriire okuhemuka kwawe,
N'ensi eijwire okuborooga kwawe;
Ahabw'okuba emanzi ebandaine n'endiijo,
Zombi zaagwera hamwe.
Murangye omuri Noofa na Tahapenesi,
Nimugira muti: Yemerera, kandi oyeteekateekye;
Ahabw'okuba rurara neija kumaraho embaju zaawe zoona.
Ahabw'enki
Ahabw'enki enimi yaawe tegumireho eyemereire?
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe agiteire ahansi.
Bwanyima baagira bati: Ka twimukye,
Tugarukye omuri beene waitu omu nsi ei twazaarirwemu,
Tuhungye rurara y'orikuhata.
Mumwete Ruyomba oteeta ha bunaku obutairweho.
Naagira ati: Niinyerahira,
Ku hariija orikushusha nk'oku Tabora eri omu nshozi,
Kandi nk'oku Karumeeli eri aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Mukome ebintu byanyu, mweteekateekyere okutwarwa omu bukwatwa;
Ahabw'okuba Noofu eryahinduka amatongo,
Eyokibwe, habure owaagituuramu.
Kwonka enkuriikizi erugire omu bukiizi-bwa-bumohso yaagigwaho.
Ni nk'enyana ezigomokire;
Eego, bahindukire, boona baahunga;
Tibaayemerera;
Ahakuba eizooba ryabo ry'okugwererwaho akagwe riizire,
Nibwo bunaku bw'okufubirwa kwabo.
Ahabw'okuba abazigu baayo nibaija n'amaani,
Kugirwanisa n'empango
Nk'ez'abarikwatsa enku.
N'obu kiraabe kitarikwogwamu;
Ahabw'okuba ni baingi okukira enzigye,
Tibarikubarwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Misri eryakwatwa enshoni,
Eheebweyo omu mikono y'abantu
Abarikuruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Ndyabahayo omu mikono y'abarikubahiiga, omu mikono ya Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni n'omu y'abakuru b'engabo ze. Bwanyima Misri erytuurwamu nk'omu biro bya ira; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi otahahaaza omutima, iwe Israeli,
Ahabw'okuba ndyakujuna, nkwihe hare,
N'oruzaaro rwawe ndwihe omu nsi ei baatwairwemu bari enkwatwa.
Yakobo aryagaruka atuuze, agaramisiriize,
Kandi tiharigira waamutiinisa.
Iwe Yakobo mwiru wangye;
Ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naiwe.
Ndyamariraho kimwe amahanga goona,
Agu naakubingiiremu;
Kwonka iwe tindikumariraho kimwe.
Ndyakuhana ninkubarira,
Kandi buzimazima tindireka kukufubira.
Reeba, reeba amaizi maingi nigaijura omu bukiizi-bwa-bumohso;
Kandi garyarugwamu omwegyemure gw'amaani,
Gushandaare omu nsi egi, gushwekye ebirimu byona
N'orurembo n'abarutwiremu boona;
Abashaija baryateera enduuru,
N'abatwire omu nsi boona baboroogye.
N'endigito y'enziga z'ebigaari bye ebirikwiruka,
Biryareetera abazaire kuhunga batareebire nyima kureeba abaana baabo,
Ahabw'emikono yaabo okutenteburwa,
Kumara omuri Tuuro na Sidoni
Omuhwezi weena oriba atsigairemu;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aryacwekyereza Abafilistia
Abaatsigaire aha baarugire omu kirwa Kafutoori.
Ashikelooni ehwerekyereire.
Yeimwe Abaanaki abatsigaireho,
Muryahitsya hi okwesharashara.
Oryatuuza ryari?
Yegarure omu kyobati kyawe;
Tuuza, oteetengyetsa.
MUKAMA agiragiire kukora?
Agitaireho kurwanisa Ashikelooni n'orubaju rw'enyanja.
Neebo eryakareeba, ahabw'okuhindurwa amatongo;
Kiryasaimu ehemwirwe, yaakwatwa;
Ekigo kyayo kihemwirwe,
Okurangaanwa kwa Moabu tikwakiriho,
Omuri Heshibooni bamugiriire enaama mbi,
Nibagira bati: Nimwije, tumumareho, arekye kuba eihanga!
Naiwe oryahunamibwa,
Kandi rurara eryakuhiiga.
Nimuhurire! Hariho okuborooga nikwema Horonaimu,
Nikugira kuti: Okweshobera n'okucwekyerera kuhango!
Moabu ecwekyereziibwe,
Okuborooga nikuhurirwa kuhika Zoari,
Ahakuba aharikwinamuka Luhiisi
Nibainamuka nibarira,
Kandi aharikushuumirwa Horonaimu
Bahuriire okuborooga kw'abarikucwekyerezibwa.
Mube nk'enturegye y'omu ihamba!
Naiwe oryakwatwa;
Na Kemoshi eryatwarwa omu bukwatwa
Hamwe n'abanyamurwa n'abanyiginya baayo.
Tihariho rurembo na rumwe orurikira;
Oruhanga ruryahwerekyerera,
N'oruhita ruryacwekyerezibwa,
Nk'oku MUKAMA agizire.
Ha Moabu amapapa,
Agurukye, ahungye;
Endembo ze zihindukye amatongo,
Zibure owaazituuramu.
Yaateeka nka viinyo y'omurera;
Tarashukanwirwe mu zindi nyungu,
N'obu kwakuba okuza omu bukwatwa;
Nikyo agumiire n'obunuzi bwe,
N'omugaju gwe tigukahindukire.
MUKAMA naagira ati: N'ahabw'ekyo reeba obunaku buryahika, obu ndimwoherereza ab'okumushuka, ebiri omu nyungu ze bakabimaramu, n'enywero ze bakazaatagura.
Haza obwo Moabu aryakwatwa enshoni ahabwa Kemoshi, nk'oku enju ya Israeli yaakwatsirwe enshoni ahabwa Beseeli, eyaabaire eri obwesigye bwabo.
Nimubaasa muta kugira muti:
Turi amamanzi kandi abashaija, rugambwa aha rugamba?
Abatsigazi be entoore bashuumire kwitwa;
Nikwo Mukama, ou eiziina rye riri MUKAMA ow'amahe, arikugira.
Akabi akaza kuhika ahari Moabu kari haihi;
Okubonabona kwe nikwiruka.
Naimwe mwena abarikumanya eiziina rye mugire muti:
Eshi enkoni y'amaani ey'obugabe ehendekire,
Enkoni ey'ekitiinisa.
Shuuma orugye omu kitiinisa kyawe,
Oshutame aha nsi ekarangataine!
Ahabw'okuba omuhwerekyerezi wa Moabu aizire kukurwanisa,
Aherize kucwekyereza ebigo byawe.
Iwe mutuuzi wa Aroeri!
Obuuze omushaija ocwire n'omukazi ohungire,
Oti: Biri bita?
Moabu ehemwirwe ahabw'okusheenywa;
Mucure, muboroogye!
Mugambire aha mugyera Arunooni
Muti: Moabu egizirwe amatongo.
Diboni, Neebo, Besidibulaimu,
Kiryasaimu, Besigamuli, Besi-meoni,
Keriosi, Bozira, n'endembo zoona ez'omu nsi ya Moabu eza hare n'eza haihi.
Eihembe rya Moabu ricwirweho, n'omukono gwe guhendekire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mumusinze, ayekuringye omu bitanaki bye, nawe ashekyererwe, ahabw'okuba ayekurize ahari MUKAMA.
Israeli okaba omushekyerera, omuzongoreza omutwe, obu waabaire omugambaho, nk'okwatiirwe omu bashuma.
Murugye omu ndembo, mutuure omu nyanga z'amabaare!
Mube nk'enkombe eyarika aha rubaju rw'omunwa gw'orusa.
Tuhuriire amaryo ga Moabu
Aine amaryo maingi
Emyemanyo n'emyehimbiso ye
Kandi n'emyekuniko y'omu mutima gwe.
MUKAMA naagira ati: Nimmanya orubwa rwe;
Ebi arikwehimbisizaho ti by'amazima,
Kandi n'ebi arikukora n'eby'ebishuba.
Nkaboroogyera Moabu yoona,
Nkacurira abashaija ba Kiriheresi.
Ndyakucurira okukira oku naacuriire Yazeri;
Amataagi gaawe gakambuka enyanja,
Gaahika Yazeri;
Omuhwerekyerezi ayetwire
Omu myaka yaawe y'ekyanda n'omu mizaabibu yaawe.
Okwesiima n'okushemererwa biihirwe
Omu nsi ya Moabu erikweza.
Nkabuza viinyo omu manyuukiro;
Tihariho orikunyuuka naateera akaari;
Kandi n'obu bariteera akaari,
Tikariba k'okushemererwa.
Heshibooni na Eleale nibataka; eiraka ry'okutaka kwabo nirihuririrwa Yahazi, okuruga Zoari okuhika Horonaimu na Egulaati-shelishiya. Ahabw'okuba amaizi ga Nimuriimu gatsigirweho.
Kandi ndyamariraho kimwe omuntu weena otambira ebitambo omu myanya mikuru ey'omuri Moabu, akooterera ruhanga we obubaane; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nikyo omutima gwangye gurikuboroogyerera Moabu nk'eiraka ry'esheegu; kandi gukaboroogyera gutyo abashaija ba kiriheresi; kandi nikyo eitungo eri baabaire baine rihwereireho.
Aha mitwe y'amaju ga Moabu goona n'omu nteeraniro z'emihanda zoona tihariyo kindi kureka okutonzya; ahabw'okuba nyatagwire Moabu nk'enyungu etarikweteebwaho; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Yeimwe, eshi ehendekire! Eshi nibaborooga! Eshi Moabu eteire abazigu omugongo, yaahemuka! Okwo nikwo ebaire eky'okushekyererwa n'kirikutiinisa ahari boona abagyehinguriririize.
Reeba, haryagira owaaguruka nk'eishamba,
Amapapa ge agashashaanure kurwanisa Moabu;
Endembo zikubuurwe, n'ebigo bikwatwe.
Kandi eryo izooba emitima y'amamanzi ga Moabu
Eryaba nk'ogw'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara.
Ahabw'okuba ekeekuza ahari MUKAMA.
Ekirikutiinisa, ekiina, n'omutego
Bikuri omumaisho; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Orihunga ekirikutiinisa aryagwa omu kiina,
N'oriruga omu kiina aryagwa omu mutego;
Ahabw'okuba ebyo byona ndyabireeta ahari Moabu
Omu mwaka gw'okufubirwa kwabo;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Abacwire beemereire, bataine maani;
Ahabw'okuba omuriro gurugire Heshibooni,
N'ekirimi kyagwo kyaruga omu nju ya Sihooni,
Gwacwekyereza obuso bwa Moabu,
Ekirunga ky'aha mutwe gw'abarikujagarara.
Eshi waakareeba, Moabu!
Abantu ba Kemoshi beeshobeire,
Ahabw'okuba batabani baawe bakwatsirwe,
Na bahara baawe banyagirwe.
Ndyagarura Abamoabu abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Aha niho orubanja rwa Moabu rwagarukira.
Beitu Israeli tagira batabani,
Tagira w'okumuhungurira?
Mbwenu ahabw'enki Milikomu abingire oruganda rwa Gaadi,
Abantu be bakakubuura endembo zaarwo, bakazituuramu?
