Obu ndireetera enduuru y'okuhuruza kuhurirwa
Abarirwanisa Rabba ey'Abaamoni;
Kandi eryahinduka emituumo y'ebisheenyirwe,
Ebirorero byayo byokibwe.
Bwanyima Israeli eryakubuura abaagikubwire;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Imwe bahara ba Rabba, nimucure,
Mwezirikye ebiguniya, mutonzye,
Nimukora oku n'oku omu ngo;
Ahabw'okuba Milikomu aryatwarwa omu bukwatwa
Hamwe n'abanyamurwa n'abanyiginya be.
Ahabw'enki nooyehimbisa ahabw'empanga zaawe,
Iwe mwishiki orikugaruka enyima 'we,
Owaabaire naayesiga eitungo rye, naagira ati:
N'oha oriija kundwanisa?
MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe naagira ati:
Reeba, ndyakureetaho ekirikutiinisa,
Kireetwe abakwehinguririize boona;
Kandi muryabingwa omu nsi, buri muntu atoore ogwe,
Habure ow'okubagarura.
Beitu omuri Temani tihaakibamu bwengye?
Okuhabura kuhweire omu banyabwengye?
Obwengye bwabo buhwereireho kimwe?
Muhungye, mugarukyeyo mutuure omu bicokoromi ahatarikuhikwa.
Ahabw'okuba obunaku bw'okumufubira ku burihika,
Ndyamureetaho akabi ka Esau.
Abashoromi b'emizaabibu ku baakwija owaawe,
Tibakaakutsigira eby'okuhumba?
Abashuma ku baakwija nyekiro,
Tibakaiba ebirikubahaazya byonka?
Nshuurwire obweshereko bwe,
Takibaasa kweshereka.
Abaana be, beene ishe na bataahi be,
Bacwekyereziibwe, kandi nawe takiriho.
N'abafakaazi baawe baanyesigye.
MUKAMA naagira ati: Nyerahiire, ku Bozira eriba ekirikutiinisa, eky'okushekyererwa, amatongo n'eky'okukyeenwa; n'endembo zaayo zoona ziryaguma ziri amatongo ebiro byona.
Entumwa etumirwe aha mahanga neegira eti:
Mweteerane, muze kumurwanisa,
Mwimukye, muze aha rugamba!
Ahabw'okuba reeba, niinyija kukugira mukye omu mahanga,
Obe orikugaywa omu bantu.
Bikubeihire,
Iwe otuura omu bicokoromi by'amabaare,
Okeegumira aha mutwe gw'ekibungo.
N'obu waakwarika ahaiguru nk'eishamba,
Ndyakuhanurayo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nk'oku Sodoma na Gomora n'endembo ezaabaire zihererasine nazo zaakumbagaziibwe, nikwo hatarigira waatuurayo, n'obu yaakuba ow'okushuhuukirayo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Reeba, nk'oku entare ejumbuka omu kishaka kya Yorudani kuteera eka y'entaama egumire, nikwo ndibareetera okumuhunga kitaraariire, nkamuteeraho ou ndikwenda weena kumutegyeka. Mbwenu n'oha orikushushana naanye? N'oha owaakubaasa kunteeraho obunaku bw'okwiziramu?

Ni muriisa ki owaakunza omu kaso? N'ahabw'ekyo muhurire enaama ei MUKAMA acumire kurwanisa Edomu, n'ebi amaririire kukora kurwanisa abatuuzi ba Temani. Buzimazima n'abaana b'entaama baryakururwa batwarwe, n'eka yaabo eshoberwe munong aahabw'ebiribaho.
Ensi eryatengyetsibwa obwaku bw'okugwa kwabo, eiraka ry'okuborooga kwabo riryahuririrwa aha Nyanja erikutukura.
Reeba, haryagira owaimuka agurukye naarahuka nk'eishamba, ashashaanure amapapa ge kuza kurwanisa Bozira; kandi ahari eryo izooba emitima y'amamanzi ga Edomu eryaba nk'ogw'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara.
Hamasi na Arupaadi bashobeirwe,
Ahabw'okuhurira enkuru mbi;
Emitima ebahweire omunda ahabw'okutiina,
nibarabanamu nk'enyanja etarikubaasa kucureera.
Yaakwatwa obwoba bwingi,
Obusaasi n'enaku byamugira
Nk'eby'omukazi orikwenda kuzaara.
Orurembo rugambwa kandi orurikushemeza
Ka rutsigirweho!
Kandi ahari eryo izooba abaserukare baarwo boona baryacwekyerezibwa;
nikwo MUKMA arikugira.
Gwokyeze kimwe zaanyaruju za Benihadadi.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Nimwimukye, mwinamukye muteere Kedari!
Mucwekyereze abantu b'oburugwa-izooba!
Hamwe n'emikingo yaabo n'ebintu byabo byona;
Engamira zaabo ziryabaakwa zitwarwe,
Abantu baryabateerera enduuru nibagira bati:
Reeba, eby'okutiinisa byabareetwa embaju zoona!
Nimuhungye, muze hare, mutuure omu bicokoromi ahatarikuhikwa;
Ahabw'okuba Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni
Acumire enaama y'okubarwanisa,
Kandi amaririire kubateera;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mwimukye, muhurure, muteere eihanga
Erigaramisiriize kandi eritwire buhooro,
Eritaine marembo n'obu zaakuba empimbi z'okukingisa,
Kandi eryetuuriire ryonka;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
N'amasyo gaabo g'ente ganyagwe.
Abarikutega ebyeyera,
Ndyabataataanisiza embaju zoona ei emiyaga ereetwa,
Mbareeteho akabi akaribareetwa embaju zoona;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ebe amatongo ebiro byona;
Terituurwamu muntu,
Kandi tiharigira waagishuhuukiramu.
Ndyareeta emiyaga ena, ereetwe aha mbaju ina z'eiguru, eteere Elamu, mbataataanisize ei egyo miyaga yoona yaareetwa; kandi tiharibaho ihanga eri abaribingwa omuri Elamu batarizamu.

Ndyatiinisiza Elamu omu maisho g'abazigu be n'omu maisho g'abarikumuhiiga. Ndyabareetaho akabi, nikyo kiniga kyangye ekingi; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira. Kandi ndyabakuratsa rurara, okuhitsya obu ndibamaraho,
bwanyima nte ekitebe kyangye ky'obukama omuri Elamu, ncwekyereze omugabe waabo n'abanyiginya baabo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kwonka omu biro bya bwanyima ndyagarura aba Elamu abaatwairwe bari enkwatwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mwimutsye orurango, murangye,
Murekye kukishereka, mugire muti:
Babulooni ekwatsirwe,
Beeli ehemwirwe,
Na Merodaaki ehahaize omutima;
Ebishushani bye bihemwirwe,
Ebirikuramibwa bihahaize omutima;
Baryahabuza omuhanda ogurikuza Saayuuni, bataireyo amaisho, nibagira bati: Nimwije, twehitsye MUKAMA, turagaane nawe endagaano etarihwaho, kandi etaryeba.
Abaabaire babashangayo baabashonshomera; abazigu baabo baagira bati: Titwine rubanja, ahabw'okuba bakacumura ahari MUKAMA, obutaaho bwabo obw'amazima, kandi amatsiko ga baishenkurubo.

ahabw'okuba reeba, niinyija kwimutsya omutwe gw'amahanga mahango, ngaihe omu nsi y'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, gateere Babulooni, bagitengyere orugamba, bakwatireyo abantu baayo, babatware. Emyambi yaabo ni nk'omurwani rugambwa otagaruka ngaro nsha.
Bukaludaaya eryanyagwa; abariginyaga boona baryahaaga; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
N'obu mwakushemererwa, n'obu mwakwesingiza,
N'obu mwakurinda nk'enyana erikwenda kwema,
Mukabubura nk'enimi,
Owaabazaire ahemukye.
Reeba, aryaba eihanga eririkuhereeruka enyima y'agandi,
Eihamba ryomire kandi ery'omusheenyi.
Ahabw'ekiniga kya MUKAMA tarituurwamu,
Kureka aryahindukira kimwe eihamba;
Buri muntu weena oriraba ahari Babulooni aryata engaro aha munwa,
Ayeshaanye ahabw'ebibonabono byayo byona.
Imwe mwena abananuuzi b'amata,
Mugirashe, mutatsigaza omwambi na gumwe,
Ahabw'okuba ekacumura ahari MUKAMA.
Ahakuba yaabagomookyera,
Ebigo byayo bigwire,
Engo zaayo zikumbagaziibwe,
Ahabw'okuba oku n'okuhoora enzigu kwa MUKAMA.
Mumuhoore, mumugire nk'oku yaagizire.
N'orikukwata omusyo gw'engyesho omu igyesha;
Ahabwa rurara y'orikuhata
Buri muntu aryagaruka omuri beene waabo,
Kandi buri muntu aryahungira omu nsi ye.
Nikyo MUKAMA ow'amahe, Ruhanga wa Israeli, arikugirira ati: Reeba, niinyija kufubira omugabe wa Babulooni n'ensi ye, nk'oku naafubiire omugabe wa Asiria.
Ndyagarura Israeli omu mariisizo ge, ariisize ahari Karumeeli n'omri Bashani; kandi omutima gwe guryahaahaagirira aha bibungo bya Efuraimu n'omuri Gileadi.

Omu biro ebyo n'omu bunaku obwo eby'okushiisha biryasherurwa omuri Israeli, bibure; kandi n'ekibi kiryasherurwa omuri Yuda, habure ekibi kyona ekyashangwamu; ahabw'okuba ndyasaasira abu nditsigamu abaatsigaireho; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Inamuka, oteere ensi ya Merasaimu,
Oteere n'abatuuzi ba Pekodi;
Obaite; ku oriheza kubaita, ocwekyerereze kimwe,
Okore byoan ebi naakuragiire;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Biri omuri egyo nsi!
K'etemirwe, ekagutuka!
Babulooni k'ehindukire
Ekirikwitsa amahanga obwoba.
Kandi tiwaakimanya;
Okareebwa, kandi waakwatwa
Nooturwa okurwanisa MUKAMA.
Yaihamu eby'okurwanisa by'ekiniga kye,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga aine
Eki arikuza kukora omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya.
Nimwije, mugiteere, nimugireetwa embaju zoona,
Mwigure ebitara byayo;
Mugicwekyerereze kimwe, mutagira ekyayo eki mwatsigaho.
Zishuume omu ibaagiro, muziitireyo.
Baryakareeba, ahabw'okuba obunaku bwabo buhikire,
Obunaku bw'okufubirwa kwabo.

Muhuruze abarasi boona, abananuuzi b'amata, bateere Babulooni. Mugyehinguririze ensiisira kugirwanisa; harekye kugira n'omwe owaacwa. Mugizimuurire ebirikwingana n'ebi yaakozire, mugigire nk'oku yaagizire kwona; ahabw'okuba ekagira amaryo, yaagaya MUKAMA, Orikwera wa Israeli.
Nikyo abatsigazi barigwera omu nteeraniro z'enguuto zaayo; kandi ahari eryo izooba abaserukare baayo boona baryacwekyerezibwa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mukama RUHANGA ow'amahe naagira ati:
Reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe, iwe munyamaryo 'we,
Ahabw'okuba eizooba ryawe ryahika,
Obunaku obu ndikwija kukufubiriraho.
Omunyamaryo aryateera entsibo, agwe,
Abure owaamwimutsya;
Ndyatweka omuriro omu ndembo ze,
Gumarireho kimwe ebimwehinguriririize byona.
Omucunguzi waabo n'ow'amaani; MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina rye. Buzimazima aryabatonganira, abone kuha ensi obuhuumure, kwonka abatuuzi ba Babulooni abahe omurabanamu.
Rurara yaaza kwita Abakaludaaya,
Abatuuzi ba Babulooni,
Abanyiginya n'abanyabwengye baayo.
Bahindukye ebifeera;
Yaaza kwita amamanzi gaayo, gacwekyerezibwe.
N'abaserukare b'endugamahanga boona abagitwiremu,
Babe abakazi.
Rurara yaaza kugwa aha butungi bwayo,
Abantu baayo banyagwe.
Ahabw'okuba n'ensi y'ebishushani ebibaizirwe,
Kandi ebishushani ebirikuramibwa bibatwaire omutima.
Nk'oku Ruhanga yaacwekyereize Sodoma na Gomora n'endembo ezihereraine nazo, nikwo nayo etarituurwamu muntu, n'obu kwakuba okushuhuukirwamu omwana w'omuntu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Eihanga ry'amaani n'abagabe baingi
Nibaimuka nibaruga omu bicweka ry'ensi ebirikuhereerukayo.
Bakwaitse amata na'amacumu;
N'enshaarizi, tibaine saasi.
Orwari rwabo ni nk'enyanja erikuhoorera;
Nibagyendera aha mbaraasi,
Bajwaire nk'omuntu orikuza aha rugamba
Kukurwanisa, iwe Babulooni!
Omugabe wa Babulooni ahuriire enkuru yaabo,
Emikono ye yaatentebuka,
Yaakwatwa obusaasi bwingi,
Nk'obw'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara.

N'ahabw'ekyo nimuhurire enaama ei MUKAMA acumire kurwanisa Babulooni, n'ebi amaririire kukora kurwanisa ensi y'Abakaludaaya. Buzimazima abaana b'entaama zaabo baryakururwa batwarwe, n'eka yaabo eshoberwe munong aahabw'ebiribabaho.
Ensi eryatetemesibwa obwaku bw'okukwatwa kwa Babulooni, eiraka ry'okuborooga kwayo rihuririrwe omu mahanga.
Reeba naaza kwimukiza Babulooni
N'abatwire Bukaludaaya
Omuyaga ogurikuhwerekyereza;
Bagiheheeze,
Ebyanga byayo babitsigyemu busha,
Ku bariija kugirwanisa aha izooba ry'enaku,
Bagiturukire embaju zoona.
Omurasi arekye kunanuura obuta bwe,
Arekye kwimuka kuhurura, ajwaire ekijwaro kye ky'ekyoma.
Mutarisaasira abatsigazi baayo,
Mucwekyerereze kimwe eihe ryayo ryona;
Emitumbi yaayo eryarambirirana omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya
N'emputa zirambirirane omu nguuto zaayo.
Ruhanga waabo, MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Ensi yaabo yoona n'obu eraabe eine orubanja
Ahari Orikwera wa Israeli.
Buri muntu akize amagara ge!
Mutacwekyererezibwa omu kufubirwa kwayo;
Ahabw'okuba obu n'obunaku bwa MUKAMA bw'okuhoora enzigu,
Naagizimuurira ebi yaakozire.
Neesinza ensi yoona;
Amahanga gakanywa aha maarwa gaayo,
Nikyo gashariire.
Yaahendeka. Nimugicurire!
Musherure omubazi gw'okugitambira obusaasi;
Obundi ekaakira.
Kwonka teratambiirwe.
Nimugitsigyeho, tugyende,
Buri muntu agarukye owaabo,
Ahabw'okuba orubanja rwayo ruhikire omu iguru,
Rwahika ahaiguru omu mwanya.
Mwije tumanyise omuri Saayuuni
Omurimo gwa MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu.
MUKAMA aimukize emitima y'abagabe b'Abameeedi, ahabw'enaama ye ei aine ahari Babulooni n'okugicwekyereza; kandi egyo niyo nzigu ya MUKAMA ei arikuhoorera hekalu ye.
Muteho abarinzi b'amaani
Ab'okurinda n'ab'okugwera;
Ahabw'okuba enaama y'ebi MUKAMA yaagambire aha batuuzi ba Babulooni,
Mbwenu agihikize.
Abaine eitungo ringi,
Omuheru gwanyu gwahika,
Akagoye k'amagara gaanyu kaacweka.
Buzimazima ndyakwijuzamu abantu baingi nk'enzigye,
Bakuteerereho akaari k'obusinguzi.
Akagihamya n'obwengye bwe;
N'okwetegyereza kwe
Nikwo yaabambiise eiguru.
Ku agamba n'eiraka rye,
Omu iguru habamu okuhoorera kw'amaizi;
Ainamura oruho okuruga aha muheru gw'ensi,
Ataho emirabyo kugwisa enjura,
Kandi aiha omuyaga omu mabiikiro ge.
Buri muntu ni nk'enyamaishwa, taine bwengye;
Buri muheesi w'ezaabu ahemwirwe ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa;
Ahabw'okuba ebishushani bye n'eby'ebishuba,
Tibiine mwitsyo.
Tibiine mugasho, n'omurimo gw'okubeihabeiha;
Omu biro by'okufubirwa kwabyo biryahwerekyerera.
Ogwo ori omugabo gwa Yakobo ti nkabyo;
Ahabw'okuba niwe yaahangire ebintu byona,
Kandi Israeli n'oruganda rw'obuhunguzi bwe.
MUKAMA ow'amahe niryo iziina rye.
Niiwe nsheenyaguza amahanga,
Kandi niiwe ncwekyerezesa ensi z'abagabe;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza embaraasi n'ogitembire;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza abashaija n'abakazi;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza abagurusi n'abatsigazi;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza abatsigazi n'empangare;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza omuriisa n'obusyo bwe;
Niiwe ncwagacwaguza omuhingi n'ente ze ezi arikuhingisa;
Kandi niiwe ncwagacwaguza abategyeki n'abakuru b'engabo.
Reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe;
nikwo MUKAMA orikucwekyereza ensi yoona arikugira.
Ndyagorora omukono gwangye, nkukwate,
Nkwihe aha mutwe gw'ebibaare, nkukumbagaze,
Nkuhindure orushozi rwokiibwe.
N'obu gaakuba amabaare g'emisingi,
Kureka oryaguma ori amatongo ebiro byona;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
muteere enzamba omu mahanga,
Muhateekateekyere amahanga g'okuhateera,
Muhuruze ensi z'abagabe kuharwanisa,
Araraati, Mini na Ashikenazi;
muhateekateekyere omwebembezi,
Muhateeze embaraasi eziri nk'ebitootera by'enzigye.
Abagabe b'Abameedi hamwe n'abategyeki baabo n'abatsigire baabo;
Na buri ihanga eriri omu butegyeki bwabo.
Mbwenu ensi neetetema, neeshamba ahabw'obusaasi;
Ahabw'okuba enaama, ei MUKAMA acumiire Babulooni
Ey'okuhindura ensi yaayo amatongo,
Ekabura ow'okugituuramu, ehamire.
Baaguma omu bigo byabo ebigumire;
Eishaija ribahweire, baaba nk'abakazi;
Amaka gaabo nigasya,
Emikingo yaabo ehendagwirwe.
N'omubiki nairuka kubugana mugyenzi we,
Kubikira omugabe wa Babulooni,
Ku orurembo rwe rukwatsirwe embaju zoona.
Enyambukiro zikwatsirwe,
Orufunjo barwokize,
N'abarwani baine obwoba bwingi, barimbagiriirwe.
Babulooni ni nk'eihuuriro omu bunaku bw'okuhuura;
Hatsigaire omwanya mukye,
Obunaku bw'okushaaruurwa kwayo bukahika.
Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni akanshonshomera,
Yampendagura,
Akangira nk'orunywero orurimu busha,
Yammira nk'omugoye;
Enda ye yaagiijuza ebyangye ebinuzire,
Yammunyunguza.
K'omutuuzi wa Saayuuni agire ati:
Obubisha obu naagiriirwe na beene waitu
Nibukagirirwe Babulooni;
Kandi owa Yerusaalemu agire ati:
Eshagama yangye etukurire abatwire Bukaludaaya.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati:
Reeba, naaza kukutonganira,
Kandi nkuhoorere.
Ndyayomya enyanja yaayo,
N'enshuro zaayo nzikarangatanise.
Eikoobaaniro rya zaamuha,
Eky'okutiinisa n'eky'okweshaanya,
Ebure owaagituuramu.
Barurume nk'emigunju yaazo.
Ku bariba bakiine ekiniga, ndyabateekyera obugyenyi,
Mbasiinze, bashemererwe,
Bagwejegyere obutasisiimuka;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira;
Ndyabashuumya omu ibaagiro nk'abaana b'entaama,
Nk'empaya z'entaama n'ez'embuzi.
Yaakwatwa, haza yaabaire eri rurangaanwa omu nsi yoona!
Eshi ebaire ekirikutiinisa omu mahanga!
Yaashwekwa ebingonzi byayo ebirikwimukirira;
Endembo zaayo zihindukire ekirikutiinisa,
Yaaba ensi y'omushana mwingi n'eihamba ry'omusheenyi,
Ensi etatuurwamu muntu weena,
N'obu kwakuba okurabwamu omwana w'omuntu.
Ngitanatsye eki yaamizire.
N'amahanga tigarigaruka kuhimintika nigagiijaho;
Orugo rwa Babulooni rugwire.
Imwe bantu bangye 'mwe, nimugirugyemu!
Buri muntu ahungye ekiniga kya MUKAMA ekingi,
Akize amagara ge.
N'obu kwakuba okutiina enkuru ezirikuhurirwa omu nsi;
Ahabw'okuba omu mwaka gumwe haija enkuru,
N'omu gundi hakurataho ezindi nkuru,
Obubisha buba omu nsi,
N'omutegyeki arwana n'ondiijo.
N'ahabw'ekyo obuaku nibwija kuhika,
Obu ndifubira ebishushani bya Babulooni,
Ensi yaayo yoona ekakwatwa enshoni,
Emitumbi y'abantu baayo ekagirambiriranamu.
Biryayeshongora nibyesiimirana Babulooni,
Ahabw'okuba abahwerekyerezi baryagiteera,
Nibareetwa aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Babulooni eshemereire kwitwa, ekaturwa Abaisraeli abaitsirwe,
Nk'oku ab'omu nsi yoona abaitsirwe baitsirwe ahabwayo.
Nimugyende, murekye kuguma mwemereire!
Mwijukye MUKAMA mukiri hare,
Kandi muteekateekye ahari Yerusaalemu.
Enshoni zitubumbire,
Ahabw'okuba abanyamahanga batabaire
Emyanya erikwera ey'enju ya MUKAMA.
Mbwenu reeba, obunaku nibwija,
Obu ndifubira ebishushani byayo,
Emputa zikatsindira omu nsi yaayo yoona.
Kandi n'obu yaakwombeka engo zaayo ndaingwa ez'amaani,
Hoona ndyayohereza abahwerekyerezi bagiteere;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nimuhurire! Okutaka nikuruga Babulooni!
Eiraka ry'okucwekyerera kuhango
Niriruga omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya!
Ahakuba MUKAMA naahindura Babulooni amatongo,
Naahunamya eiraka ryayo ery'amaani.
Ebingonzi byabo nibihoorera nk'amaizi maingi,
Orwari rwabo ruri ahaiguru;
Amamanzi gaayo gaakwatwa,
Amata gaayo gaahendagurwa,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ni Ruhanga ozimuura;
Buzimazima aryahoora.
Ndyasinza abanyiginya baayo, abanyabwengye baayo,
Abategyeki, abakuru b'engabo n'abarwani baayo;
Baryagwejegyera obutasisiimuka;
nikwo MUKAMA ou eiziina rye riba MUKAMA ow'amahe, arikugira.
Orugo ruhango rwa Babulooni ruryasheenyerwa kimwe,
N'amarembo gaayo maraingwa gookibwe.
Yeremia yaahandiika omu kitabo akabi koona akarihika ahari Babulooni, ebyo bigambo byona ebyahandiikirwe nibigamba ahari Babulooni.
Yeremia yaagira Seraaya ati: Ku oraahikye Babulooni, otabura kushoma ebyo bigambo byona,
kandi ogire oti: Ai bambe MUKAMA, ogambire akabi aha mwanya ogu kuguherekyereza, ngu hatagira owaagutuuramu, yaaba bantu nari amatungo, kureka gube amatongo ebiro byona.
Ku oriheza kushoma ekitabo eki, okikomeho eibaare, okinagye omu mugyera Furaati,
kandi ogire oti: Oku nikwo Babulooni erimirwa, etagarukye kutuuhuuka bundi ahabw'akabi aku ndigireetaho.
Ogu nigwo muheru gw'ebigambo bya Yeremia.
Yaakora ebirikwangwa MUKAMA, nk'ebi Yehoyakimu yaakozire byona.
Buzimazima ebyo byagwisa kubi MUKAMA; kandi hoona ebyo eby'omuri Yerusaalemu na Yuda byayeyongyera kuba kubi, okuhitsya obu MUKAMA yaababingire omu maisho ge.
Bwanyima Zedekia yaagomera omugabe wa Babulooni.

Omu mwaka gwa mwenda ogw'omu butegyeki bwe, omu kwezi kwa ikumi aha kiro kyakwo kya ikumi, Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni yaija n'eihe rye ryona kuteera Yerusaalemu, bwanyima baagigota, baagyombekaho eby'okugitemberaho embaju zoona.
Rutyo orurembo rwagotwa okuhitsya omu mwaka gwa ikumi na gumwe ogw'omu butegyeki bw'omugabe Zedekia.
Aha kiro kya mwenda eky'omu kwezi kwa kana, enjara yaaba nyingi omu rurembo, yaahebesereza, abantu b'omuri egyo nsi baabura eby'okurya.

Bwanyima orugo rw'orurembo rwasheenywaho ah'okuraba, abarwani boona baacwa, baashohora nyekiro, baahunga, baaraba omu irembo ry'ahagati y'engo zombi, eriri aha musiri gw'omugabe, baatoora ogurikuza Araba; obwo Abakaludaaya bagotsire orurembo.
Kwonka eihe ry'Abakaludaaya ryaza omugabe Zedekia omu kirari, ryamukwatira omu ruhita rwa Yeriko, engabo ze zoona zaamuhungaho, zaataataana.
Batyo baakwata omugabe Zedekia, baamutwara aha mugabe wa Babulooni Ribula omu nsi ya Hamasi, yaamucwera orubanja.
Omugabe wa Babulooni yaamwitira abatabani omumaisho, n'abanyiginya ba Yuda boona yaabaitira Ribula.
Yaihamu Zedekia amaisho, yaamubohesa emihama, yaamutwara Babulooni, yaamuta omu kihome, okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaafeereireho.
Yaayotsya enju ya MUKAMA, na nyaruju y'omugabe, n'amaju ga Yerusaalemu goona; eyetwa enju mpango yoona yaagyotsya.
Eihe ryona ery'Abakaludaaya, eri ogwo mukuru w'abarinzi yaabaire aine, ryasheenya engo zoona ezaabaire zeehinguririize Yerusaalemu.

Kandi Nebuzaradaani ogwo, omukuru w'abarinzi, yaatwara bamwe aha barikukira abandi boona kuba abooro bari enkwatwa, n'abaabaire batsigaire omu rurembo, n'abaabaire beehongyeire omugabe wa Babulooni, hamwe n'abanyamyoga abaabaire batsigaire.
Kwonka Nebuzaradaani ogwo, omukuru w'abarinzi, yaatsigamu abandi abarikukiza abandi obworo kuba ab'okurinda emizaabibu n'ab'okuhinga.
Baatwara enyungu n'ebyoma eby'okuyooza eiju, na makansi, n'enyabya, n'enyabya z'obubaane, n'ebindi bintu by'emiringa byona ebyabaire bikoresibwa omu murimo gwa hekalu;

kandi n'enyabya nkye, n'eby'okuguhisa omuriro, n'enyabya mpango, n'enyungu, n'ebikondo by'etabaaza, n'eby'okutamu obubaane, n'enyabya z'empongano ez'ebirikushukwa. Ebintu ebyabaire bikozirwe omu zaabu, omukru w'abarinzi yaabitwara biri ezaabu, n'eby'efeeza yaabitwara biri efeeza.

Enyomyo ziri zombi, n'ekitanka, n'enimi z'miringa ikumi na ibiri, ezi ekyo kitanka kyabaire kitairweho, n'ebitebe by'ebinaabiro, ebi omugabe Sulemaani yaakozire kukoresa omu nju ya MUKAMA, emiringa yaabyo yoona ekaba etarikubaasa kupimwa.
Eby'ezo nyomyo, oburaingwa bw'emwe bukaba buri mikono ikumi na munaana, obuhango bwayo okugyehinguririza mikono ikumi n'ebiri, n'omuzimba gwayo enkumu ina, kandi omunda eri omurangara.

Aha mutwe gwayo ekaba eine omutwe gw'omuringe; oburaingwa bwagwo mikono gw'omikono etaano; hashobeekaineho ebiri nk'akatimba n'amakomamahanga, byona biri emiringa, okugwehinguririza. Enyomyo ya kabiri nayo ekaba eine ebirikushusha bityo hamwe n'amakomamahanga.
Omu mbaju zaayo hakaba harimu amakomamahanga makumi mwenda na maukaaga; n'amakomamahanga goona agaabaire gari ahari ako katimba gakaba gari igana.

kandi omu rurembo yaihamu omukuru w'engabo owaabaire naategyeka abaserukare, n'abashaija mushanju b'omu ishengyero ry'omugabe, abaashangirwe omu rurembo, n'omuhandiiki w'omukuru w'eihe owaabaire ahandiika abantu b'omuri egyo nsi, kandi n'abashaija makumi mukaaga b'omuri egyo nsi abaashangirwe omu rurembo.
Yaabatwara, yaabahitsya omugabe wa Babulooni omuri Ribula.
Omugabe wa Babulooni yaabateera, yaabaitira Ribula omu nsi ya Hamasi. Batyo Abayuda baihwa omu nsi yaabo, baatwarwa bari enkwata.
Ogu nigwo mubaro gw'abantu abu Nebukadeneeza yaatwaire bari enkwatwa; omu mwaka gwa mushanju akatwara Abayudaaya enkumi ishatu na makumi abiri na bashatu;
omu mwaka gwa ikumi na munaana yaiha omuri Yerusaalemu abantu magana munaana na makumi ashatu na babiri, yaabatwara bari enkwatwa;

n'omu mwaka gwa makumi abiri n'eshatu ogw'omu busingye bwa Nebukadeneea, Nebuzaradaani omukuru w'abarinzi yaatwara Abayudaaya magana mushanju na makumi ana na bataano; abntu boona abaatwairwe bakahika enkumi ina na magana mukaaga.
yaagamba gye nawe, yaamuha ekitebe ekirikukira eby'abandi bagabe abaabaire bari hamwe nawe Babulooni.
Atyo Yehoyakiini yaajuura ebijwaro bye by'ekihome. Okuruga aho yaaguma naariira aha meeza y'omugabe ebiro byona ebi yaamazire.
Kandi eby'okumutunga omugabe yaaguma naamuha omugabo ogutarikurugaho, nk'okwetenga kwe okwa buri izooba oku kwabaire kuri, ebiro byona ebi yaamazire okuhitsya obu yaafiire.
Orwabaire ruba rukuru omu mahanga kuba nk'omufaakazi!
Orwabaire ruri omunyiginyakazi omu ndembo
Ruhindukire orw'okutoija!
amatama gashwekwa amarira;
Omuri nkunzi zaarwo tiharimu n'omwe
W'okururembesereza.
Banywani baarwo boona barureebize,
Baahinduka abazigu baarwo.
Yuda agiire omu bukwatwa;
Hati atwire omu mahanga,
Kwonka abuzire ah'okuhuumurira;
Abarikumuhiiga boona bamukwatsire,
Enaku zimukondahiriire.
Ahabw'okubura omuntu weena owaija aha magyenyi agaatairweho;
Amarembo gaayo goona n'ebifurukwa;
Abanyamurwa baayo nibatsinda,
Abaishiki baayo bakurwirwe, baatwarwa,
Kandi nayo neeshaasha munonga.
N'abarikugyanga bagogyeire.
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA agireeteire okubonabona
Ahabw'eby'okushiisha byayo kuba bingi munonga;
Abaana baayo bagyenzire bari enkwatwa,
Beebembeire abazigu baabo.
Abanyiginya baayo babaire nk'empara zibuzire oburiiro;
Bahungire abarikubahiiga nibakooza.
Yerusaalemu neijuka ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi byona
Ebi yaabaire eine okwiha ira.
Abantu baayo ku baagwire omu mikono y'abazigu,
Yaabura kihwera,
Abazigu baayo baagyesiimirana,
Nibagishekyerera ahabw'okugwa kwayo.
Nikyo yaahindukiire ekihagaro;
Boona abaabaire bagiha ekitiinisa, hati nibagigaya;
Ahabw'okuba bareebire enjuuro yaayo;
Eego yo neetsinda, ehugika omushaya.
Tereetaire ha birigibaho aha muheru;
N'ahabw'ekyo okugwa kwayo nikutiinisa,
Teine w'okugihuumuriza.
Ai MUKAMA, reeba okubonabona kwangye,
Ahabw'okuba omuzigu asingwire!
Eego, ereebire amahanga gahurwire nigataaha omu Mwanya gwayo ogurikwera,
Agu waazibiire kutaaha omu iteeraniro ry'abantu baawe.
Nibahayo eby'obutungi byabo
Kugura eby'okurya by'okubagaruramu amaani.
Ai MUKAMA, reeba, oyetegyereze,
Ahabw'okuba ningaywa.
Mureebe, mwetegyereze,
Ku haraabe hariho obusaasi bwona oburi nk'obwangye
Obu baanyitsize,
Obu MUKAMA yantaireho aha kiro ky'ekiniga kye kingi.
Yaagushuumya omu magufa gangye;
Yaatega ebigyere byangye ekigoya,
Yangarura enyima;
Yantsigaho nyeshobeire,
Ningwa enshazi eizooba ryona.
Omukono gwe gwabikomerana,
Byanteebwa omu bitsya nk'omugamba.
MUKAMA yammaramu amaani,
Yampayo omu mikono y'abu ntarikubaasa kuza omu kaso.
Agaabaire gari omuriinye;
Yaahuruza omutwe gw'abantu kundwanisa,
Ngu abone kusingyera abatsigazi bangye.
MUKAMA aribatiriire Yuda omwishiki oshugaine,
Nk'orikunyuukira omu inyuukiro rya viinyo.
Ebyo nibyo birikundiza,
Amaisho gangye gakafukunkuka amarira,
Ahakuba omuhuumuza owaakungarwire omutima omunda
Andi hare.
Abaana bangye beeshobeire, ahakuba omuzigu asingwire.
Kwonka tihaine w'okugihuumuriza.
MUKAMA aragiire ebya Yakobo,
Ngu bataahi be babe abazigu be.
Yerusaalemu ehindukire ekihagaro omuribo.
Ahabw'okuba ngomeire ekigambo kye;
Kwonka imwe mahanga 'mwe mwena, muhurire,
Mureebe obusaasi bwangye.
Empangare zangye n'abatsigazi bangye
Baagiire omu bukwatwa.
Nyetsire nkunzi zangye,
Kwonka bandyarya;
Abanyamurwa bangye n'abakuru bangye
Bacwekyerereire omu rurembo,
Nibasherura eby'okurya
By'okubagaruramu amaani.
Omutima guunyemereire,
Omunda ninkaanyuurwa,
Ahabw'okuba mbaire ndi omugomi orengyesereize.
Omu nju harimu rufu.
Tihaine w'okumpuumuriza.
Abazigu bangye boona bahuriire enaku zangye,
Nibeesiima ahabw'okuba okikozire.
Ohikiirize ekiro eki waagambire,
Nabo babe nkaanye.
Obagirire nk'oku wangiriire
Nontura ebicumuro byangye byona;
Ahabw'okuba okutsinda kwangye ni kwingi,
N'omutima gwangye gugwire enshazi.
Agiiniire ekiniga!
Oburungi bwa Israeli yaabwiha omu iguru,
Yaabunaga ahansi;
Taijukire katebe k'ebigyere bye
Aha izooba ry'ekiniga kye.
Ataine saasi;
Asheenyire ebigo bya Yuda
Aine ekiniga kingi.
Kandi obugabe n'abategyeki baabwo
Abigarwire ahansi, yaabihemura.
Amazireho amaani ga Israeli goona
Amwiniire ekiniga kingi,
Yaahinya omukono gwe gwa buryo
omu maisho g'abazigu baabo.
Yaayotsya Yakobo, naabuguma nk'omuriro
Ogurikurya busha embaju zoona.
Ayemereire abangire omukono gwe gwa buryo nk'omubisha;
Aitsire boona abashemeza amaisho gaitu
Abari omu ihema rya Saayuuni;
Yaashuka ekiniga kye nk'omuriro.
Yaamaraho Israeli,
Yaacwekyereza ebikaari byayo byona,
Ebigo byayo yaabigira amatongo,
Yaakanyisa okucura n'okutonzya omuri Yuda.
Omwanya gw'amagyenyi agu yaateireho
Yaagugira amatongo.
MUKAMA yaamariraho kimwe omuri Saayuuni
Obugyenyi na Sabato ebyatairweho,
Kandi omugabe n'omunyamurwa
Yaababingisa ekiniga kye kingi.
Yaatamirwa kimwe Omwanya gwe ogurikwera,
Engo z'ebikaari byayo
Yaazihayo omu mikono y'abazigu,
Baateerera omu nju ya MUKAMA orwari
Nk'orw'aha izooba ry'obugyenyi obwataireho.
Orugo rwa Saayuuni;
Yaarugyeresa omugoye;
Tiyaahinya mukono gwe kurekyera aho okucwekyereza;
Yaareetera ekigo n'orugo kutonzya,
Amaani gaabihweramu hamwe.
Empimbi zaayo yaazihendagura, yaazicwekyereza,
Omugabe waayo n'abanyiginya be bari omu mahanga,
Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga tibikiriho,
Na baanabi baayo tibakiine kworekwa
Okurikuruga ahari MUKAMA.
Abakuru ba Saayuuni
Bashutami ahansi bahunami,
Nibeeshuka omucuucu omu mitwe
Bajwaire ebiguniya;
Abaishiki ba Yerusaalemu bajuumikire emitwe omu itaka.
Omutima guunyemereire,
Omu busaasi bwangye amagara gampweiremu
Ahabw'okucwekyerezibwa kw'abantu bangye,
Ahabw'okuba abeereere n'abaana bato bagweireire enshazi
Omu nguuto z'orurembo.
Akagaati na viinyo birahi?
Nibarabira omu nguuto z'omu rurembo
Nk'abashaija bahutaire,
Nibahondobererera omu bifuba bya baanyinabo.
Mbwenu nkugambeho ki?
Nkugyeranise na ki?
Iwe Saayuuni 'we, omwishiki oshugaine,
Nkaakushushanisa na ki,
Ngu mbone kukuhuumuriza?
Ahabw'okub okucwekyerera kwawe ni kwingi nk'enyanja,
N'oha owaakubaasa kukutambira?
Eby'ebishuba kandi ebirikuhabisa;
Tiboorekire butunu by'okutahikiirira kwawe
Kugarura abantu baawe abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa;
Kureka ahabwawe boorekirwe
Okuragura kw'ebishuba kandi okurikuhabisa.
Nibeeshaanya Yerusaalemu,
Nibagizongoreza omutwe nibagira bati:
Beitu oru nirwo rurembo
Orwabaire nirwetwa rurungi orutaine kabara,
Oru ensi yoona eshemerererwa?
Nibakweshaanya, nibanena amaino,
Nibagira bati: Tumucwekyereize!
Otyo! Eri niryo izooba eri tutuura nitwenda;
Mbwenu twaribona, twarireeba!
Yaahikiiriza ekigambo kye
Eki yaaragiire omu biro bya ira;
Yaakukumbagaza ataine saasi,
Yaareetera omuzigu kukwesiimirana,
Yaatunguura amaani g'abazigu baawe.
Amarira gahimintikye nk'omutunga
Nyomushana na nyekiro!
Otahuumura, amaisho gaawe garekye kutuuza.
Ahu abarinzi batandikira,
Shuka ebiri omu mutima gwawe
Omu maisho ga MUKAMA nk'amaizi!
Omutegye emikono ahabw'amagara g'abaana baawe,
Abu enjara erikugwisiza enshazi
Omu mateeraniro g'enguuto zoona.
Abu waakozire otyo!
Nimugira ngu abakazi bashemereire kurya oruzaaro rwabo,
Abaana abu baayeyororoire?
Nari shi omunyamurwa na nabi
Bashemereire kwitirwa omu Mwanya gwa MUKAMA ogurikwera?
Empangare zangye n'abatsigazi bangye
Baitsirwe rurara;
Waabaita aha izooba ry'ekiniga kyawe,
Waabamaraho otaine saasi.
Nk'oku beeta abantu aha izooba ry'obugyenyi obuteekateekirwe,
Aha izooba ry'ekiniga kya MUKAMA;
Tihaine waarokokire nari owaahonokireho;
Abu naakiikiire nkoorora
Omuzigu wangye abamazireho.
Enkoni y'ekiniga kye.
Ahataine kuhweza kwona.
Buzimazima akaguma nambangira omukono
Buri kaanya, bwarugaho bwaira.
N'amagufa gangye yaagahendagura,
Obushaarizi n'okubonabona.
Nk'abaafiire ira.
Yambohesa enjegyere ziremeire;
Tarikwenda kuhurira kushaba kwangye;
Emihanda yangye agiitiise amabaare gabaizire,
N'otuhanda twangye atukiikamize.
Kandi nk'entare eyesherekire.
Anteishwire omuhanda, yantaanyagura,
Yampindura enshoberwa.
Yampindura ekimaasho ky'omwambi gwe.
Yaagimarira omu mutima gwangye;
Nibaanyeshongora eizooba ryona.
Yaanyigutsa apusinto.
Yanshweka eiju rya kashenda.
Omutima gwangye gubuzirwe obusingye,
Naayebwa oku okushemererwa kushusha.
Ntyo naagira nti: Eitiinisa kyangye
N'amatsiko gangye ahari MUKAMA bihweireho.
Ijuka okubonabona kwangye n'enaku zangye,
Apusinto n'endurwe.
Omutima gwangye gutuura nigubiijuka,
Gweinamiriire omunda yangye.
Kwonka eki ninkiijuka;
N'ahabw'ekyo nyine amatsiko.
N'okusaasira kwe kugumaho ebiro byona.
Obwesigwa bwawe ni bwingi.
Nikyo ndimugiriraho amatsiko.
N'aha muntu orikumusherura.
Okujuna kwa MUKAMA atuurize.
Akiri omutsigazi.
Ashutame wenka ahunami,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe agumukoreire.
Obundi hakaabaho amatsiko.
Bamwitse ebijumo.
Muntu ebiro byona;
Kwonka aryamugirira esaasi,
nk'oku embabazi ze nyingi ziri.
N'obu kwakuba okubasaasa.
Ebimushemereire omu maisho ga Rukira-boona,
Nari okumwitira orubanja,
Ebyo byona MUKAMA tabyenda.
MUKAMA atakiragiire?
Omu kanwa ka Rukira-boona?
Ayetomboitera okufubirwa ahabw'ebibi bye?
Tugarukye ahari MUKAMA.
Ahari Ruhanga omu iguru, tugire tuti:
Tiwaatusaasira.
Okeehumbika ekiniga kyawe,
Waatuhiiga, waatwita otaine saasi.
Okeeshweka ekicu,
Okushaba kwona kwabura oburabo.
N'ebisingo omu mahanga.
Abazigu baitu boona nibatujuma;
Byona bituhikireho.
Nindizibwa okucwekyerera kw'eihanga ryangye.
Amaisho gangye nigahimintika amaizi
Obutaitsya, gatarikurereera,
Akareeba ahansi;
Amaisho gangye nigandeetera obujune,
Ku ndikureeba ebiri aha baishiki b'omu rurembo rwangye.
Bampiigire nk'enyonyi;
Banteereramu amabaare;
Naagira nti: Mbwenuho naafeera kimwe.
Ndi okuzimu omu kiina;
Waahurira okweshengyereza kwangye, nti:
Otanga kutega okutu kwawe kuhurira okutaka kwangye.
Waagira oti: Otatiina.
Waacungura amagara gangye.
Ba niiwe wancwera orubanja.
N'enaama yaabo yoona ei bangiriire.
Ai MUKAMA, ohuriire ebigaaniizo byabo,
N'enaama yaabo yoona, ei bangiriire;
Abaanyimukiriire nibarenzya eizooba nibandwanisa
N'ebigambo byabo kandi n'ebiteekateeko byabo.
Nibaanyeshongora.
Nk'emirimo y'emikono yaabo oku eri.
Oryabaha omutima gugangaire,
Omukyeeno gwawe gubahikyeho.
Obahwerekyereze, obamare ahansi y'eiguru ryawe.
Ezaabu eshemeziibwe ehindukire!
Amabaare g'Omwanya ogurikwera
Ganaganagirwe ahu buri nguuto erikutandikira.
Abari nk'ezaabu eshemeziibwe
Ka bainganisiibwe n'enyungu z'eibumba
Ezi omubumbi abumbisa engaro ze!
Nangwa na zaamuha niziha ebibwana byazo amabwabwa
Zibyontsya,
Kwonka abantu bangye bahindukire enshaarizi
Nka zaamaya omu ihamba.
Zibaramatiire omu nkanka;
Abaana nibashaba eby'okurya,
Haabura owaabibaha.
Hati nibacwekyererera omu nguuto;
Abaayororeirwe omuri zaabujwa
Hati nibabyama ahu baata eiju.
Nikikira ekifubiro kya Sodoma,
Eyaacwekyereziibwe omu kaanya kakye,
Hataine mukono ogugikozireho.
Nibakira amate okwera,
Emibiri yaabo neemwamwatikana okukira amabaare agarikutukurikana,
N'okwengyengyeta kwabo kukaba kuri nk'okwa safiro.
Tibaakimanywa omu nguuto;
Omubiri gwabo guramataine na'amagufa gaabo,
Gwayoma, gwaba nk'ekiti.
Abaitsirwe rurara bakahiirwa
Okukira abaitsirwe enjara,
Abaahwereire ahabw'okubura ebishaarwirwe omu misiri.
Ekateeka abaana abu beezaariire,
Omu kuhwerekyerera kw'abantu bangye
Baabagira eby'okurya.
Yaashuka ekiniga kye ekirikubuguma;
Yaatweka omuriro omuri Saayuuni
Ogwokize emisingi yaayo.
Bakaba bataine kiteekateeko,
Ngu omuzigu nari omubisha weena naabaasa
Kutaaha omu marembo ga Yerusaalemu.
N'eby'okushiisha by'abanyamurwa baayo
Abaabaire bagisheeshamu eshagama y'abahikiriire.
Basiisirwe munonga eshagama,
Hataine waakubaasa kukora aha bijwaro byabo.
Nimurugyeho, imwe abasiisikaire!
Nimurugyeho! Nimurugyeho! Mutagira eki mwakoraho!
Batyo baahinduka abahungi n'ebizengyerezi;
Abantu baagirira omu mahanga bati:
Tibarigaruka kutuura naitwe bundi.
Taribeetaho bundi;
Abanyamurwa tibarahairwe kitiinisa,
N'abakuru tibaragiriirwe mbabazi.
Tuhendekyeire busha tutegyereize okuhwerwa;
Omu kutegyereza kwaitu, tukategyereza
Eihanga eritarikubaasa kujuna.
Kyatuzibira kuraba omu nguuto zaitu;
Omuheru gwaitu gwairira haihi; ebiro byaitu byaba mbarwa;
Ahabw'okuba omuheru gwaitu gukaba guhikire.
Amashamba g'omu mwanya;
Baatukurata omu nshozi batubingire,
Baatugwera omu ihamba.
Akakwatirwa omu busya bwabo,
Haza niwe twabaire twesigire ngu
omu kicuucu kye nimwo turituura, turi ahagati y'amahanga.
Yesiime, kandi oshemererwe;
Kwonka naiwe ekikopo kiryakuhikaho,
Osinde, oyejwekye busha.
Ekifubiro ky'eby'okushiisha byawe kihweire,
Tarikugumya mu bukwatwa obundi;
Kwonka iwe Edomu,
Aryakufubira ahabw'okushiisha kwawe,
Ashuuruure ebibi byawe.
Reeba oyetegyereze okuhemuka kwaitu!
Obuhunguzi bwaitu buhindwirwe obw'abanyamahanga,
N'amaka gaitu gabaire ag'enduga-mahanga.
Tuhindukire efuuzi, ezitaine baishezo,
Baamaaweitwe bahindukire abafaakazi.
Nitunywa amaizi g'engurano,
Twaza kubona enku nitubanza kuzigura.
Turuhire, titurikuheebwa kahuumuro,
Ngu tubone ak'okurya k'okututunga.
Mbwenu itwe twekoreire eby'okushiisha byabo.
Tihaine w'okubatujuna.
Ahabwa rurara y'omu ihamba.
Ahabw'ekibabo ky'omushana ogureetsire rwaranda.
Abakazi nibahambirwa omuri Saayuuni,
N'empangare omuri tauni za Yuda.
N'abakuru tibarikuheebwa kitiinisa.
N'aboojo nibataruza n'emba z'enku.
N'abatsigazi tibakiteera nanga.
N'okuzina kwaitu kuhindukire okucura.
Tugwereirwe akagwe, ahabw'okuba tukashiisha.
Ebyo nibyo bireeteire amaisho gaitu kubamu ebisanganana,
Zaamuha zikarushoobamu.
Ekitebe kyawe kigumaho okuhitysa aha busingye bwona.
Ahabw'enki omazire omwanya muraingwa gutyo otutsigireho?
Ogarure busya ebiro byaitu nka ira!
Otugwereirwe kubi munonga?
Aha kiro kya kataano eky'okwo kwezi (gukaba guri omwaka gwa kataano okwiha obu omugabe Yehoyakiini yaatwarwa omu bukwatwa),
ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaija ahari Ezekieli omunyamurwa, mwene Buuzi, ari omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya aha mugyera Kebari; okwo niyo omukono gwa MUKAMA gwamuhikiireho.

Ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeba omuyaga gw'amaani gwaija niguruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, n'ekicu kihango ekyehinguririziibwe omushana ogurikumurinkana, kyaguma nikirugwamu omuriro ogurikurabya nk'omurabyo, kandi ahagati y'ogwo muriro haabaho ekintu ekirikushusha nk'omuringa ogurikwengyengyeta.
Omuri ekyo kicu haarugamu ebihangirwe bina ebiine emagara. Kandi oku nikwo byabaire nibishusha. Bikaba biine ekyemerero nk'eky'omuntu;
kwonka buri kimwe kikaba kiine obuso buna, kandi kiine amapapa ana.
Amaguru gaabyo gagororokire, ahansi y'ebigyere byabo nihashusha nk'ebyara by'enyana, kandi nibyengyengyeta nk'omuringa ogweziibwe.
Aha mbaju zaabyo ina bikaba biine engaro nk'ez'omuntu ahansi y'mapapa gaabyo. Kandi byona bikaba biine obuso n'amapapa ebirikushusha biti.
Amapapa gaabyo gakaba nigakoranaho; buri kimwe nikigyenda omumaisho kitarikuhinduka; byona nibigyendera hamwe.

Emisusire yaabyo ahamaisho, buri kimwe kikaba kiine ahamaisho nk'ah'omuntu; kandi byona bina biine ahamaisho nk'ah'entare aha rubaju rwa buryo, biine aha maisho nk'ah'ente aha rubaju rwa bumosho, kandi biine ahamaisho nk'ah'eishamba aha nkomo.

Okwo nikwo aha maisho gaabyo haabaire nihashusha. Amapapa gaabyo gakaba gashashaanwire; buri kimwe kiine amapapa abiri, buri ipapa nirikora ah arya kigyenzi kyakyo, n'agandi abiri gashwekire omubiri gwakyo.
Buri kimwe kikaba nikigyenda omumaisho kitarikuhinduka. Ei Omwoyo yaabaire aza yoona, niyo byabaire bitoora bitarikuhinduka.

Ahagati y'ebyo bihangirwe bina ebiine amagara hakaba hariho ekirikushusha nk'amakara agarikwaka, nk'emuri ezirikukora oku n'oku ahagati yaabyo; ogwo muriro nigwaka munonga, kandi omuri ogwo muriro haaguma niharugamu omurabyo.
Ebyo bihangirwe byaguma nibikora oku n'oku nk'omurabyo gurikurabya.
Ku naabaire ninkireeba ebyo bihangirwe bina ebiine amagara, naareeba enziga ahansi aha rubaju rw'ebyo bihangirwe, enziga emwe ahabwa buri kimwe ahari ebyo ebina.
Emisusire y'ezo nziga n'oku zaabaire zikozirwe zikaba nizengyengyeta nka berulo; zoona ina zikaba nizishushana; oku zaabaire zikozirwe, zikaba nizireebeka oti, buri nziga eri omu ndiijo.
Ku zaabaire ziba nizigyenda, zigyenda zitarikuhinduka, nizitoora orubaju rwona oru zaayenda ahari ezo ina.
Ezo nziga zikaba ziine empanka n'enyomyo; ezo mpanka zikaba ziijwire amaisho okuzeehinguririza.
Ebyo bihangirwe ku byabaire bigyenda, ezo nziga zibigyenda aha rubaju; kandi ku byabaire biimuka byaza ahaiguru, nazo ziimuka ziza ahaiguru.
Ei Omwoyo yaabaire aza yoona, niyo byabaire bitoora, n'ezo nziga ziimuka nabyo; ahabw'okuba Omwoyo w'ebyo bihangirwe ebiine amagara akaba ari n'omuri ezo nziga.

Ku byabaire bigyenda, nazo zigyenda; bikyemerera, nazo zeemerera; ku byabaire biimuka byaza ahaiguru, ezo nziga nazo ziimuka nabyo, ziza ahaiguru; ahabw'okuba Omwoyo w'ebyo bihangirwe ebiine amagara akaba ari n'omuri ezo nziga.
Ahaiguru y'emitwe y'ebyo bihangirwe ebiine amagara, hakaba hariho ekirikushusha eiguru, ekirikumurinkana nka kristalo, kibambire ahaiguru y'emitwe yaabo.
Ahansi yaakyo amapapa gaabyo gashashaanwire, buri rimwe nirireebana na rigyenzi ryaryo; kandi buri kihangirwe kiine amapapa abiri gashwekire omubiri gwakyo.

Kandi ku byabaire bigyenda, mpurira okuhoorera kw'amapapa gaabyo kuri nk'okuhoorera kw'amaizi maingi, nk'okuhinda kw'Ow'obushoboorozi bwona, obwaku bwakwo buri nk'obw'orwari rw'eihe ry'engabo; ku byabaire byemerera, bigwisa amapapa gaabyo.
Kandi ahaiguru y'ekirikushusha eiguru ekyabaire kiri aha mitwe yaabyo, haareetwaho eiraka; ku byabaire byemerera, bigwisa amapapa gaabyo.

Okwiha omu bwezirikiro bwe okugarura ahaiguru naareeba nihengyengyeta nk'omuringa gweziibwe, ogurikushusha nk'omuriro gwehinguririize embaju zoona; kandi okwiha omu bwezirikiro bwe okugarura ahansi, naareeba nihashusha omuriro; kandi hariho ekirikumurinkana aha mbaju ze zoona.
Nk'oku omuhanganzima gureebeka aha kicu aha izooba ry'enjura, nikwo okureebeka kw'okumurinkana kwabaire kumwehinguririize.
Ebyo bikaba biri ekishushani ky'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA. Ku naakireebire, naagwa ahansi njuumaire, naahurira eiraka ry'orikugamba.
Ka yangambiire, Omwoyo yantaahamu, yaanyemereza, naahurira ogwo owaabaire naagamba naanye,
nangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ninkutuma aha bantu ba Israeli, eihaga ry'abagomi abangomeire; bo na baishenkurubo bakancumuraho n'okuhitsya eri izooba.
Abo bantu n'abanyarubwa, baine emitima egangaire. Abo nibo ndikukutumaho; ku oraabahikye, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Kandi bo, yaaba bahurira, yaaba banga, (ahabw'okuba n'ab'enju engomi,) kwonka nibaija kumanya ku nabi abaire abarimu.

Naiwe Mwana w'omuntu 'we, otabatiina, kandi otatiina ebigambo byabo, n'obu oraabe ori omu mikwatangwe n'omu mahwa, kandi otwire omuri skoropio. Otatiina ebigambo byabo, n'obu kwakuba okuhahaaza omutima ahabw'emireebekyere yaabo, ahakuba n'enju engomi.
Obagambire ebigambo byangye, yaaba bahurira, yaaba banga kuhurira; ahakuba n'enju engomi.
Ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeba omukono gungororoirwe; kandi reeba, gukaba gwine omuzingo gw'ekitabo;
yaaguzingururira omu maisho gangye, kandi gukaba guhandiikirwe omunda n'enyima, n'ebiguhandiikirwemu bikaba biri eby'amaganya, n'eby'okucura, n'eby'obusaasi.
Ntyo naayashama, yampa ogwo muzingo kugurya.
Yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, rya ogu muzingo ogu naakuha, ogwijuze omu nda yaawe. Ahonaaho naagurya; omu kanwa gwannurira nk'obwoki.
Yaagaruka yangira ati: Mwana w'omntu, irooko oze aha nju ya Israeli, obagambire ebigambo byangye;
ahakuba tiwaatumwa ha bantu b'orurimi rw'enduga-mahanga nari orugumire, kureka waatumwa aha nju ya Israeli,
ti ha mahanga maingi g'orurimi rw'enduga-mahanga nari orugumire, abu otarikuhurirana nabo. Buzimazima kuri naakutuma aha bantu nk'abo, bakaakuhuriire.
Kwonka ab'enju ya Israeli tibarikwija kukuhurira; ahabw'okuba naanye tibarikwenda kumpurira; ahakuba ab'enju ya Israeli boona baine obuso bugumire n'emitima egangaire.
Reeba, ngangaize aha maisho gaawe, ngu habone kugangaarira ahaabo, n'obuso bwawe kugangaarira obwabo.
Naahindura obuso bwawe nk'arimaasi, bugume okukira eibaare ry'enkangabuye. Otatiina, kandi otahahaazibwa emireebekyere yaabo, n'obu baraabe bari enju engomi.
Kandi yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ebigambo byangye byona, ebi naaza kukugambira, obitaasye omu mutima gwawe, kandi obihurire n'amatu gaawe.
Bwanyima ogyende, oze omu bantu baawe abaatwairwe omu bukwatwa, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba, yaaba bahurira, yaaba banga.
nikwo kuhoorera kw'amapapa g'ebyo bihangirwe ebiine amagara nigakoranaho, n'okuhoorera kw'ezo nziga aha rubaju rwabyo okurikushusha okurigita kw'omutsitsa.
Omwoyo yankiriza, yantwara, naagyenda ngwirwe kubi, nyine ekiniga kingi; kandi omukono gwa MUKAMA gukaba gungumize;
naahika Telabiibu, naashanga abaabaire batwairwe omu bukwatwa, batwire aha mugyera Kebari, naamarayo ebiro mushanju nshutami ahagati yaabo nshobeirwe.
Ebyo biro mushanju ku byahweire, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, nkugizire omurinzi w'enju ya Israeli; ku oraagume waahurira ekigambo ekirikuruga omu kanwa kangye, obanteisize.

Ku ndigira omubi nti: Buzimazima oryafa, naiwe otaamuteisa, nari okumwehanangiriza kuruga omu muhanda gwe omubi, ngu abone kujuna amagara ge, ogwo mubi aryafeera omu bibi bye, kwonka eshagama ye niiwe ndigibuuza.
Kwonka ku oriteisa ogwo mubi, yaayanga kuruga omu bubi bwe, nari omu muhanda gwe omubi, aryafeera omu kutahikiirira kwe, kwonka iwe oryaba okirize amagara gaawe.

Kandi ohikiriire, ku arireka okuhikiirira kwe, yaakora eby'okutahikiirira, naanye naata enkongi omu maisho ge, aryafa; ahakuba tomuteiseize, aryafa ahabw'ekyo kibi kye, kandi eby'okuhikiirira bye ebi yaakozire tibiriijukwa; kwonka eshagama ye niiwe ndigibuuza.
Kwonka ku oriteisa ohikiriire ogwo ngu atashiisha, nawe ataashiisha, buzimazima aryaba ohuriire, ehabw'okuba aikiriize kuteisibwa; naiwe oryaba okirize amagara gaawe.
Ntyo naimuka naaza omu ruhita; kandi reeba, ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA, ekirikushusha eki naareebeire aha mugyera Kebari, kyayemerera aho, naagwa ahansi njuumaire.
Kwonka Omwoyo yantaahamu, yaanyemereza, yaagamba naanye, naagira ati: Irooko oyekingirane omu nju yaawe.
Kandi iwe Mwana w'omuntu, nibaija kukutaho emirunga, bagikubohese, kandi toribaasa kuza mu bantu;
kandi niinyija kuramatisa orurimi rwarwe omu nkanka, obe ekiteta, obure agabahana; ahabw'okuba n'enju engomi.
Kwonka ku ndigamba naiwe, ndyayashamya akanwa kaawe, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugmba. Orikwenda kuhurira, ahurire; n'otarikwenda kuhurira, arereere; ahabw'okuba n'enju engomi.
Mbwenu iwe Mwana w'omuntu, twara eitafaari, orite omu maisho gaawe, oriteereho ekishushani ky'orurembo Yerusaalemu,
orugote, orwombekyeho ebigo, orurundeho eby'okutemberaho, kandi oruteereho ensiisira kururwanisa, orubyareho ebiti by'okuhiguza orugo embaju zoona;
kandi ogire ekyoma ky'eibaati, okyemereze nk'ekisiika ahagati yaawe n'orurembo; orugumyeho amaisho, rube nk'orugotsirwe, orugotere kimwe. Ekyo kiryaba akamanyiso aha nju ya Israeli.
Bwanyima obyamire orubaju rwa bumosho, nkuteho ekifubiro ky'enju ya Israeli; kandi oryayekorera ekifubiro kyabo, ekirikwingana n'ebiro byona ebi orimara orubyamiire.
Ahabw'okuba ndyakutaho omubaro gw'ebiro magana ashatu na makumi mwenda, ogurikwingana n'omubaro gw'emyaka y'ekifubiro kyabo; okwo nikwo orimara omwanya oyekoreire ekifubiro ky'enju ya Israeli.
Kandi ku oriheza ebyo, oryagaruka obyame, kwonka obyamire orubaju rwa buryo, oyekorere ekifubiro ky'enju ya Yuda; ekiro kimwe eki nkuteereireho kingane omwaka gumwe gw'ekifubiro.
Kandi oryagumya amaisho gaawe aha kugotwa kwa Yerusaalemu, omukono gwawe gutaine ki gushwekire, orwo rurembo oruhanuurire ebirirubaho.
Kandi reeba, nkutaireho emirunga, ngu otarihindukira orundi rubaju, okuhitsya obu orihikiiriza ebiro byona eby'okugota kwawe.

Kandi ogire engano, sayiri, ebihimba, enkoore, omugusha n'oburo, obite omu nyungu emwe, obigoyemu oburo. Omuri ebyo biro magana ashatu na makumi mwenda, ebi orimara obyamiire orubaju rumwe, nibyo origuma nooryaho.
Eby'okurya ebi orirya, biryaguma bipimwe, shekeli makumi abiri buri izooba, obirye rimwe buri izooba.
Kandi oryaguma onywe amaizi garengirwe; kimwe kya mukaaga kya hiini, oganywe rimwe buri izooba.
Ebyo by'okurya oryaguma obirye nk'embumburi ya sayiri, noobiteekyesa amazi g'abantu nibakureeba.
Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Okwo nikwo Abaisraeli barirya eby'okurya byabo bisiisikaire omu maisho g'amahanga agu ndibabingiramu.

Bwanyima naagira nti: Ai bambe, Mukama RUHANGA! Reeba, naaba kubaho tinkeeshiishaga na kintu kyona; ahakuba okwiha omu buto bwangye n'okuhitsya hati tinkaryaga kyefeereire, nari ekitaafura kyona; kandi n'enyama erikuzira tekahikaga mu kanwa kangye.
Nikwo kungira ati: Reeba, naakwikiriza kuteekyesa amasha g'ente omu mwanya gw'amazi g'abantu.

Yaagaruka yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, reeba, ndyahenda eky'okwehimbagiririzaho ky'aba Yerusaalemu, nibyo by'okurya byabo, bagume barye eby'okurya bipimirwe nibatiina, kandi banywe amaizi agu barengyeirwe bahahaize emitima.
Ekyo ndyakikora, ngu baboe kutuubirwa eby'okurya byabo n'amaizi gaabo, baareebane bonka na bonka bashobeirwe, bahwe aha magufa ahabw'okufubirwa kwabo.

Ebiro by'okugota ku birihwa, kimwe kya kashatu kyaryo okyokyeze ahagati y'orurembo; kimwe kya kashatu kyaryo ekindi okitware, oyehinguririze orurembo nookitemesa rurara; kandi kimwe kya kashatu kyaryo ekindi okimaamagize omu mwanya, kitwarwe omuyaga; naanye ndyasyorayo rurara, ngibikuratse.
Ahari ebyo bicweka oiheho rikye, orizingiririre omu kicweka kya ifo ky'ekanzu yaawe.
Kandi oihe rikye ahari eryo orinagye omu muriro, risye; aho niho omuriro guriruga gukahika aha nju ya Israeli.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Egi niyo Yerusaalemu, ei naataire ahagati y'amahanga n'ensi ezigyehinguriririize.

Kwonka ekagomera ebiragiro byangye, yaarengyesereza okukira ago mahanga, kandi ekagomera ebi naataireho okukira ezo nsi ezigyehinguriririize, ahabw'okwanga ebiragiro byangye n'okutagyendera mu bi naataireho.

Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira naagira ati: Nk'oku muri abanyarubwa okukira amahanga agabeehinguriririize, mukanga kworobera ebiragiro byangye, mutagyendere mu bi naataireho, kureka mukatwaza nk'emigyenzo y'abanyamahanga ababeehinguririize oku eri,
nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira naagira ati: Reeba, nyowe, nyowe buzima naaba omubisha waawe, ndyakureetamu ebifubiro, amahanga nigakireeba.
Ahabw'ebihagaro byawe, ndyakugira oku ntakakugiraga, kandi tindigaruka kukikora obundi.
Nikyo baishe b'abaana na batabani baabo bariryanirira omuriiwe, nkakureetaho ebifubiro, kandi ab'omuriiwe abariba bahonokireho, nkabataataanisiza ei emiyaga yona ereetwa.

N'ahabw'ekyo Mukama RUHANGA naagira ati: Nk'oku mwahagaize Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera ebintu byanyu ebirikunugwa n'ebihagaro byanyu byona, buzimazima niinyerahira nti: Niinyija kukutuubya, eriisho ryangye tiririkusaasira, kandi tindikugirira mbabazi.

Kimwe kya kashatu ky'abantu baawe kiryaitwa orufu, kimarirweho enjara omuriiwe; kimwe kya kashatu ekindi kiryaitwa rurara aha mbaju zaawe zoona; kandi na kimwe kya kashatu ekindi ndyakitaataanisiza ei emiyaga yoona ereetwa, nsyoreyo rurara, ngibakuratse.
Kandi bwanyima ndyakuhindura amatongo n'ekijumo omu mahanga agakwehinguriririize n'omu maisho g'abahinguzi boona.
Ku ndibataho ebifubiro mbagwereirwe kubi, mbainiire ekiniga kingi nimbahana munonga,

ku ndibarekurira emyambi y'enjara erikwita, ei ndyohereza kubacwekyereza; ku ndiguma nimbareetaho enjara, naahenda eki murikwehimbagiririzaho, nibyo by'okurya byanyu, muryaba ekijumo eky'okugaaniiza, eky'okureeberaho, kandi ekirikutiinisa aha mahanga agabeehinguriririize. Nyowe MUKAMA, niinye naakigamba.
Kandi ndyabateeza enjara, n'enyamaishwa mbi zibashahure abaana; orufu n'okusheesha eshagama biryabarabamu, kandi ndyabareetaho rurara. Nyowe MUKAMA, niinye naakigamba.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti.
Mwana w'omuntu, naga amaisho aha bibungo bya Israeli, obihanuurire ebiribigwera,
Amatambiro gaanyu garyacweka busha, n'ebishushani byanyu by'eizooba bisheenyagurwe, kandi emitumbi y'abantu baanyu abariitwa ndyaginaga omu maisho g'ebishushani byanyu ebirikuramibwa.
Kandi emitumbi y'Abaisraeli ndyaginaga omu maisho g'ebishushani byabo, nnaganagye amagufa gaanyu embaju zoona ez'amatambiro gaanyu.

Ahu murituura hoona, endembo zaanyu ziryahinduka amatongo, n'emyanya yaanyu mikuru y'okuramizamu eryasheenywa, amatambiro gaanyu gasheenywe, gacwekye busha; ebishushani byanyu ebirikuramibwa biryayatagurwa, bicwekyerezibwe, ebyoterero byanyu biihweho, n'emirimo yaanyu emarweho.
Abarikwitwa baryagwa ahagati yaanyu, mumanyireho ku ndi MUKAMA.

bwanyima abarirokokaho omuriimwe baryanyijukira omu mahanga, ei bariba batwairwe bari enkwatwa, bamanye oku naahenzirwe emitima yaabo erikururuuha eyaanyimwire, n'amaisho gaabo agarikururuuha gakatwarwa ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa; baryayetamwa ahabw'ebihagaro byona ebi baakozire.
Obwo baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA, kandi eki naagambire nti: Ndyabareetaho ako kabi, ku ntarakigambiire busha.
Ori hare aryaitwa rurara, n'oriba yaatsigaireho agoteirwe omu rurembo, aryaitwa enjara. Okwo nikwo ndihikiiriza ekiniga kyangye aharibo.

Emitumbi yaabo ku erirambirirana ahagati y'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, n'okwehinguririza amatambiro gaabo, aha mitwe y'ebibungo byona n'enshozi zoona, ahansi y'ekiti kyona ekibisi ekyetwa omurinzi, n'ahansi y'omwela gwona oguyumbize, ahu baabaire bootererera ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa emigaju erikutaamirana, obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ndyababangira omukono, ensi ngihindure amatongo n'ahatarikutuurwa, ahu baabaire batwire hoona, okuruga omu ihamba okuhika Ribula. Obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Kandi iwe Mwana w'omuntu 'we, hurira eki Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira enju ya Israeli, naagira ati: Mbwenu byahwa! Muheru yaahika aha nshonda ina zoona ez'ensi.
Mbwenu naiwe yaakuhikaho, naaza kukurekurira ekiniga kyangye, nkucwere orubanja orushemereire emitwarize yaawe, nkufubire ahabw'ebihagaro byawe byona.
Eriisho ryangye tiririkusaasira, kandi tindikugirira mbabazi, kureka ndyakufubira, nkuture emitwarize yaawe n'ebihagaro byawe ebiri ahagati omuriiwe. Obwo nibwo orimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Akabi, akabi k'aha muheru! Reeba nikaija.
Muheru yaija, omuheru gwahika, byakwimukirira. Reeba, nibikuhikaho.
Iwe otwire omu nsi 'we, ekifubiro kyawe kyakuhikaho; obunaku bwahika, eizooba riri haihi, eizooba ry'okujagararira omu bibungo, ti ry'okuteereraho kaari k'okushemererwa.
Mbwenu naaza kukushukaho ekiniga kyangye, nkumarireho okuguubwa kubi kwangye, nkucwere orubanja nk'emitwarize yaawe oku eri, nkufubire ninkutura ebihagaro byawe byona.
Eriisho ryangye tiririkusaasira, kandi tindikugirira mbabazi; kureka ndyakufubira nkuture emitwarize yaawe n'ebihagaro byawe ebiri omuriiwe. Obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA ofubira.
Reeba, eryo izooba! Reeba niriija. Ekifubiro kyawe kyaija, enkoni yaarabya, amaryo gaatooka.
Orubwa rukuzire, rwahinduka enkoni y'obubi. Omuribo tihaine oritsigaraho; n'omu bintu byabo enbingi, nari omu butungi bwabo tihaine kiritsigaraho, n'obu kwakuba okugira omukuru orikweshumba abandi.
Obunaku bwahika, eizooba niriirira haihi. Omuguzi arekye kushemererwa, n'omutunzi arekye kuganya, ahabw'okuba ekiniga kiri aha ihanga ryabo ryona.
Abatunzi tibarigarurirwa bi baatunzire, n'obu bariba bakiriho; ahabw'okuba ekiniga kiri aha ihanga ryabo ryona, kandi tikirihinduka; n'ahabw'okutahikiirira kwe tihariho muntu origumyaho amagara ge.
Bateire enzamba, baateekateeka byona, kwonka tihaine ohurwire, ahabw'okuba ekiniga kyangye kiri aha ihanga ryabo ryona.
Aheeru hariho rurara, omunda harimu orufu n'enjara, abari omu ishwa nibaitwa rurara, n'abari omu rurembo nibamarwaho orufu n'enjara.
Kandi ku harigira abaahonokaho, baryahungira omu bibungo nk'enkombe z'omu mpanga, boona nibaganya, buri muntu naaborooga ahabw'ebibi bye.
Emikono ya boona eryahwa amaani, n'entegye za boona ziryabonda, zibe nk'amaizi.
Baryayezirika ebiguniya, obwoba bubashwekye; boona bagire enshoni ahamaisho, n'emitwe y'abantu boona ebe enkomborora.

Baryanaga efeeza zaabo omu mihanda, n'ezaabu zaabo tiziribaasa kubajuna aha izooba ry'ekiniga kya MUKAMA. Tiziribamara njara, kandi tiziribaigutsa; ahabw'okuba ezo nizo zaababeereire ekirikuteeza entsibo, ekyabareeteire okutahikiirira.

Ebyo bintu byabo ebihunzire bakaba babikoresa okwehaisa ekitiinisa ekitaine mugasho, kandi baabikoramu ebishushani byabo by'ebihagaro, n'ebintu byabo by'ebihagaro, n'ebintu byabo ebirikunugirwa kimwe. Nikyo mbihinduriire ebitashemeire aharibo.
Kandi ndyabihayo omu mikono y'abanyamahanga, babinyagye, n'omu mikono y'ababi ab'omu nsi babishahure, babihagare.
Ndyabaihaho amaisho, bashiishe Omwanya gwangye ogw'obuguzi bwingi, abambuzi bagutaahemu, bagushiishe,
baguhindure amatongo. Nk'oku ensi eijwire obwitani, n'orurembo rukaijura eitima,
nikyo ndireetera amahanga agarikukira obubi, gakakubuura amaka gaabo. Ndyamaraho amaani gaabo agu barikwehimbisizaho, n'emyanya yaabo erikwera eshiishwe.
Enaku ku ziriija, baryasherura obusingye, kwonka tibaribubona.
Akabi karyakuratwa akandi, orukuru rukuratwe orundi; baryasherura okworekwa ahari nabi, kwonka omunyamurwa aryabura ekiragiro, n'abakuru babure obwengye bw'okuha abantu.

Omugabe aryaganya, omunyiginya aryayehumbika okushoberwa, n'emikono y'abantu b'omuri egyo nsi eryasharazibwa obwoba. Ndyabagira nk'oku emitwarize yaabo eri, mbacwere emanja, nk'oku emicwere yaabo eri; haza bamanye ku ndi MUKAMA.

Ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeeba orikushusha omuntu; okwiha omu bwezirikiro bwe okugarura ahansi gukaba guri omuriro; kandi okwiha omu bwezirikiro bwe okugarura ahaiguru nihengyengyeta nk'omuringa ogweziibwe.

Yaagorora ekirikushusha omukono, yaakwata obutsibo bw'eishokye ryangye, Omwoyo yankiriza, yampitsya ahagati y'ensi n'eiguru, yantwara Yerusaalemu ndi omu kworekwa kwa Ruhanga, yampitsya ah'orikutaahira nooza omu irembo ry'ekikaari ky'omunda, ekirikureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, ahu ekitebe ky'ekishushani ekirikugwisa kubi Ruhanga kyabaire kiri.
Kandi reeba, ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga wa Israeli kikaba kiri okwo, nk'oku naakyorekyeirwe omu ruhita.

Bwnayima yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, hati imutsya amaisho gaawe, oreebe aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho. Ntyo naagaimutsya, naareebayo, kandi reeba, aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bw'ah'orikutaahira omu irembo ry'eitambiro hakaba hariho ekishushani ekirikureetera Ruhanga eihato.

Yaagaruka yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, nooreeba ebi barikukora? Nooreeba ebihagaro by'eihano ebi ab'enju ya Israeli barikukorera aha, ebirikumbinga nkaza hare n'Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera? Kwonka noija kureeba ebindi bihagaro by'eihano ebirikukira ebyo.
Bwanyima yantwara aha irembo ry'ekyo kikaari; ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeba ekishenshero omu rugo.
Yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, hangusya ekyo kishenshero. Ntyo ku naahereize kukihangusya, naareeba orwigi.
Yaagaruka yangira ati: Taahamu, oreebe ebihagaro by'eihano ebi barikukorera aha.

Naanye naataahamu; ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeba ebishushani by'emiringo yoona y'ebirikwekurura ahansi, n'eby'enyamaishwa ezirikunugwa, n'eby'ebishushani byona ebirikuramibwa ab'enju ya Israeli, biteirwe aha kisiika embaju zoona.

Kandi omu maisho gaabyo heemereiremu abashaija makumi mushanju ab'omu bakuru b'enju ya Israeli, n'ahagati yaabo heemereireho Yaazania mwene Shafani, buri omwe aine ekyoterero kye omu ngaro; obwo omwika gw'obubaane nigucumbuuka ahaiguru nigutaamirana.

Bwanyima yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ebyo waareeba ebi abakuru b'enju ya Israeli barikukorera omu mwirima, buri muntu omu bishengye by'ebishushani by'ebiteekateeko bye? Ahabw'okuba nibagira bati: MUKAMA tarikutureeba; MUKAMA atsigireho ensi yaitu.
Yaagaruka yangira ati: Noija kureeba ebindi bihagaro by'eihano ebi barikukora.
Bwanyima yantwara ah'orikutaahira nooza omu irembo ry'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho ery'enju ya MUKAMA; kandi reeba, hakaba hashutamiyo abakazi nibacurira Tamuzi.
Yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu 'we, ebyo waabireeba? Noija kureeba ebindi bihagaro ebirikukira ebyo.

Yaagaruka yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu 'we, ebyo waabireeba? Noogira ngu ebihagaro ebi ab'enju ya Yuda barikukora n'ekintu kikye? Bashemereire kubuzya ensi eby'eitima n'okweyongyera kungwisa kubi? Reeba, nibata amataagi aha nyindo.
Nikyo ndikorera eby'ekiniga kingi; eriisho ryangye tiriribasaasira, kandi tindibagirira mbabazi; n'obu barimboroogyera omu matu bata, tindibahurira.
Bwanyima naahurira naagamba n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Imwe abarikurinda orurembo, mwirire haihi, buri muntu aine eky'okurwanisa ekirikucwekyereza omu ngaro ze.

Kandi reeba, haija abashaija mukaaga, baareetwa omu muhanda gw'eirembo rya ruguru, eririkureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, buri omwe aine eky'okurwanisa ekirikwita omu ngaro ze; kandi hakaba hariho ondiijo mushaija, ojwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani, ari hamwe nabo, aine eihembe rya bwino aha izinio. Baataaha, baayemerera aha rubaju rw'eitambiro ry'omuringa.

Baashanga ekitiinsia kya Ruhanga wa Israeli kyatembire kuruga ahari baakerubi, ahu kyabaire kiba, kyahika aha muryango gw'enju. MUKAMA yaayeta ogwo mushaija owaabaire ajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani, aine eihembe rya bwino aha izinio.
Yaamugira ati: Irooko orabarabe omu rurembo Yerusaalemu, ote akamanyiso aha buso bw'abantu abarikutsinda nibaborooga ahabw'ebihagaro byona ebirikukorerwamu;
kandi abo bashaija mukaaga yaabagambira mpuriire, naagira ati: Mwirooko murabarabe omu rurembo mumukuratiire, mwite abantu; amaisho gaanyu garekye kusaasira, kandi mutagira ou mwagirira embabazi;

mumareho abagurusi, abatsigazi, empangare, abaana bato n'abakazi; kwonka omuntu weena oine ako kamanyiso mutamukoraho. Kandi mutandikire omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera. Batyo baatandikira ahari abo bakuru abaabaire bari omu maisho g'enju.
Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Mushiishe enju, kandi ebikaari byayo mubiijuze emitumbi. Mbwenu mwirooko mugyende. Batyo baagyenda, baita ab'omu rurembo.

Ku baabaire nibakibaita, naatsigara nyenka, naagwa ahansi njuumaire, naataka nti: Ai bambe, Mukama RUHANGA! Mbwenu omu kushuka ahari Yerusaalemu ekiniga kyawe nooyenda kumaraho Abaisraeli boona abatsigaireho?
Naanye eriisho ryangye tiriribasaasira, kandi tindibagirira mbabazi; kureka ndyabatura ebi baakozire, mbibarunde aha mitwe.
Bwanyima reeba, ogwo mushaija owaabaire ajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani, aine eihembe rya bwino aha izinio, yaija, yaagamba ebi baamutuma, naagira ati: Naakora nk'oku wandagiira.

MUKAMA yaagambira ogwo mushaija owaabaire ajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani ati: Irooko oze ahagati y'enziga ezirikwehinguririza, eziri ahansi ya baakerubi; bwanyima oijuze engaro zaawe zombi amakara agarikwotsya, agu oraihe ahagati ya baakerubi, oganaganagye ahaiguru y'orurembo. Atyo yaazizamu nindeeba.
Obu ogwo mushaija yaataahamu, baakerubi bakaba beemereire aha rubaju rw'enju orw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, n'ekicu kiijwire ekikaari ky'omunda.
Ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyaruga ahari baakerubi, kyainamuka, kyayemerera aha muryango gw'enju; egyo nju yaijura ekicu, n'ekikaari kyaijura okumurinkana kw'ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA.
Okuhoorera kw'amapapa ga baakerubi kwahuririrwa hare, kwahika n'omu kikaari ky'aheeru, kuri nk'eiraka rya Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona yaaba naagamba.

MUKAMA ku yaaherize kuragiira ogwo mushaija owaabaire ajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani ati: Iha omuriro ahagati y'enziga ezirikwehinguririza, ahagati ya baakerubi, yaazizamu, yaayemerera aha rubaju rw'enziga emwe.

Bwanyima kerubi yaagorora omukono gwe, ari ahagati ya baakerubi bagyenzi be, yaakununkirira omuriro oguri ahagati ya baakerubi, yaiha omuriro ahari ogwo, yaaguta omu ngaro z'ogwo mushaija owaabaire ajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani; nawe yaagutwara, yaashohora.
Kandi baakerubi abo bakaba baine ekirikushusha engaro y'omuntu ahansi y'amapapa gaabo.
Emisusire y'ezo nziga, zoona ina zikaba nizishushana, nizireebeka oti buri nziga eri omu ndiijo.
Ku zaabaire ziba nizigyenda, zigyenda zitarikuhinduka, nizitoora ibara rubaju ahari ezo ina. Ei enziga ey'omumaisho yaabaire ereeba yoona, ngyenzi zaayo zigikurata, nizigyenda zitarikuhinduka.
Ezo nziga ezi baakerubi bana baabaire baine, hamwe n'empanka zaazo n'enyomyo zaazo, byona bikaba biine amaisho embaju zoona.
Ezo nziga, oku naahuriire, zikaba nizeetwa enziga ezirikwehinguririza.

Kandi buri kerubi akaba aine obuso buna; ahamaisho h'ow'okubanza hakaba hari ahamaisho ha kerubi; ahamaisho h'owa kabiri hari ah'omuntu; ah'owa kashatu hari ah'entare, kandi ah'owa kana hari ah'eishamba.
Baakerubi abo ku baabaire bagyenda, ezo nziga zibagyenda aha rubaju; ku baabaire baimutsya ampapa kuguruka kuza ahaiguru, ezo nziga zikaba zitahinduka kubaruga aha rubaju.
Ku baabaire beemerera, nazo zeemerera; bakiguruka, nazo ziguruka nabo; ahabw'okuba Omwoyo w'ebyo bihangirwe ebiine amagara akaba azirimu.

Baakerubi baimutsya amapapa gaabo, baaguruka baaza ahaiguru, ezo nziga zibari aha rubaju, nimbareeba nibagyenda; baayemerera aha rwigi rw'eirembo ry'enju ya MUKAMA ery'oburugwa-izooba; n'ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga wa Israeli kyabasangira.
Buri omwe akaba aine ahamaisho hana, n'amapapa ana, kandi ahansi y'amapapa gaabo hariho ebirikushusha engaro z'omuntu.
Kandi emisusire yaabo ey'ahamaisho niyo eri ei naareebire aha mugyera Kebari. Buri omwe yaagumizamu atarikuhinduka.
Atyo yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, aba bashaija nibo bantu abacuma enaama z'okutahikiirira, bakaha ab'omuri oru rurembo obwengye bubi,
nibagira bati: Obunaku bw'okwombeka amaju tibukahikire; oru rurembo n'enyungu, naitwe turi enyama.
N'ahabw'ekyo Mwana w'omuntu, hanuura, obahanuurire ebiribabaho.
Murengyesereize kwita abantu baanyu omuri oru rurembo, n'enguuto zaamwo mwaziijuza emitumbi.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Abantu baanyu abu mwaitsire, mukarambika emitumbi yaabo omuri oru rurembo nibo nyama, n'oru rurembo nirwo nyungu; kwonka imwe muryarwihwamu.
Mukaba mutiina rurara, kwonka ndyagireeta, ebaite; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Kandi ndyarubaihamu, mbaheyo omu mikono y'abanyamahanga, mbateho ebifubiro.
Muryaitwa rurara, mbacwere orubanja muri aha mwatano gwa Israeli; haza mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Oru rurembo tiruribabeera nyungu, kandi naimwe timuriba nyama omuriyo; kureka ndyabacwera orubanja muri aha mwatano gwa Israeli;
haza muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA; ahabw'okuba timuragyendeire mu biragiro byangye, n'obu kwakuba okuhikiiriza ebi naataireho; kureka mukakuratira ebiragiro by'abanyamahanga ababeehinguriririize.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, beene waanyu, abu waabingirwe nabo, enju ya Israeli yoona, abo boona nibo abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu bagambireho nibagira bati: Barugire ahari MUKAMA, baaza hare; ensi egi niitwe tugihairwe kuba obuhunguzi.

N'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: N'obu ndaabe naabaihire omu nsi yaabo, nkabatwara hare omu mahanga, kandi nkabataataanisiza omu nsi zaago, kwonka ndyababeera Omwanya ogurikwera okumara omwanya mukye omuri ezo nsi ezi baagiiremu.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama arikugamba naagira ati: Ndyabataaruura mbaihe omu mahanga, mbateeranire hamwe, nimbaiha omu nsi ezi mwataataaniiremu, mbahe ensi ya Israeli.
Kandi ku barihikayo, baryaihamu ebintu byona ebirikunugwa, n'ebihagaro byayo byona.
Ndyabaha omutima gumwe, mbatemu omwoyo musya, nyihe omutima gw'eibare omu buhangwa bwabo, mbahe omutima gworobi,
babone kugyendera omu biragiro byangye, n'okukwata ebi naataireho n'okubyorobera; kandi baryaba abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo.
Kwonka abo abu emitima yaabo erikukuratira ebyabo ebirikunugwa n'ebihagaro byabo, ndyabatura ebi baakozire, mbibatungikirire aha mitwe; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyaimuka, kyaruga ahagati y'orurembo, kyayemerera aha kibungo ekiri aha burugwa-izooba bw'orurembo.
Bwanyima Omwoyo yankiriza, yantwara Bukaludaaya omu nkwatwa, nkiri omu kworekwa kw'Omwoyo wa Ruhanga. Ku naahikireyo, okwo kworekwa oku naareebire kwandugaho.
Ntyo naateekyerereza ezo nkwatwa, ebi nyorekirwe MUKAMA byona.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, otuura omu b'enju engomi, abaine amaisho g'okureeba, kwonka tibareeba, n'amatu g'okuhurira, kwonka tibahurira; ahakuba n'enju engomi.

N'ahabw'ekyo, Mwana w'omuntu, koma ebintu byawe by'okufuruka, ofurukye nyomshana nibakureeba, ogyende nk'omufurki orugye omu mwanya gwawe, oze omu gundi nibakureeba. Obundi bakaayetegyereza, n'obu baraabe bari enju engomi.
Oshohoze ebintu byawe nyomushana nibakureeba, nk'eby'okufuruka oku biba; naiwe oshohore wenka omu mwabazyo nibakureeba, nk'oku abarikufuruka bagira.
Bwanyima ocwe ekishenshero omu rugo nibakureeba, obe nimwo waarabya ebyo bintu.
Ote ebyo bintu byawe aha ibega nibakureeba, obishohoze hariho omwirima; kandi oyeshwekye ahamaisho, orekye kureeba ahansi, ahabw'okuba nkutaireho kuba ak'okureeberaho aha nju ya Israeli.

Ntyo naakora nk'oku naaragiirwa. Naashohoza ebintu byangye nyomushana, nk'oku eby'okufuruka biba; kandi omu mwabazyo naacwa ekishenshero omu rugo n'emikono yangye nyenka. Naahsohora hariho omwirima, ntaire ebintu byangye aha ibega nibandeeba.
Omu kasheeshe ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, enju ya Israeli, enju engomi, tekubuurize eti: Nookora ki?
Mbwenu obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Okuhanuura oku n'okw'eby'omunyiginya w'omuri Yerusaalemu, n'eby'ab'enju ya Israeli boona barimu.
Ogire oti: Ndi ak'okureeberaho kaanyu; nk'oku nkozire, nabo nikwo barikorwa batyo; baryatwarwa omu bukwata, bari enkwatwa.
N'omunyiginya, oriba ari omuribo, aryata ebintu bye aha ibega hariho omwirima, ashohore, acwe ekishenshero omu rugo, akirabemu; aryayeshweka ahamaisho, arekye kureeba ahansi n'amaisho ge.
Kandi ndyamurengyezaho ekigoye, akwatwe omutego gwangye; bwanyima mmutware Babulooni omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya, kwonka tarigireeba; kandi niyo arigwa.
Boona abariba bamushagatiire kumuhwera, n'ngabo ze zoona, ndyabataataanisiza embaju zoona ei emiyaga ereetwa, nsyoreyo rurara, ngibakuratse.
Ku ndibataataanisiza omu mahanga, naabanaganaga omu nsi zaago, baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Kwonka ndyareka bamwe omuribo bahonokye ahari rurara, enjara n'orufu, babone kwaturira ebihagaro byabo byona omu mahanga ei bariza; kandi bamanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, rya eby'okurya byawe nootengyeza, kandi onywe amaizi nootetema, oyemereize omutima,

ogambire abantu omuri egyo nsi oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba aha by'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu n'ab'omu nsi ya Israeli, naagira ati: Baryarya eby'okurya byabo beemereize emitima, kandi banywe amaizi bashobeirwe, ahabw'okuba ensi yaabo eryaba emazirwemu ebigirimu byona, nibaturwa eitima ry'abagitwiremu boona.
Endembo ezitwirwemu ziryahindurwa amatongo, ensi ebe kifurukwa, naimwe muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, egi nfumu ei mucwa aha nsi ya Israeli, erikugira eti: Ebiro bitwireho; okworekwa kwona kurugiremu busha, neemanyisa ki?

N'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugmba naagira ati: Egyo nfumu ndyagimaraho, kandi tibarigaruka kugicwa omuri Israeli. Kureka obagire oti: Ebiro biiriire haihi, na buri kworekwa kuri haihi kuhikiirizibwa.
Ahabw'okuba tiharigaruka kubaho kworekwa kw'ebishuba, nari okuragura kw'okumamarika omu nju ya Israeli;

kureka nyowe MUKAMA, ndyagamba, kandi eki ndigamba kiryaba kwo; tikirigaruka kukyererezibwa, kureka omu biro byanyu, imwe enju engomi, ndyagamba ekigambo, nkihikiirize; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, reeba, ab'enju ya Israeli nibagira bati; Ebi ayorekirwe ebiro ebi, n'ebiriija hahweireho ebiro bingi; kandi naahanuura eby'obunaku obukiri hare munonga.

N'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Tihariho kigmbo kyangye na kimwe ekirigaruka kukyererezibwa; kureka ekigambo eki ndikugamba kiryaba kwo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, hanuura ebiriba ahari baanabi ba Israeli abarikuhanuura; ogambire abarikuhanuura ebi barikugunja omu mitima yaabo, noogira oti: Muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA!
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Baanabi b'ebifa-mutima baryareeba enaku, abakuratira eby'omu mitima yaabo bonka, haza bataine ki boorekirwe.
Iwe Israeli, baanabi baawe bari nka zaamuha z'omu matongo.
Timukainamukaga ha bisheenyuka, n'obu kwakuba okwombeka orugo, ahabw'enju ya Israeli, ngu mubone kwemerera omu rugamba muhamire, aha izooba rya MUKAMA.

Baanabi abo boorekirwe ebitaine ku biri, baaragura eby'ebishuba, nibagira bati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, haza MUKAMA atabatumire; kandi baareetera abantu kugira amatsiko ngu ekigambo kyabo kiryaba kwo.
Timurikumanya ku okworekwa oku mureebire kuri okwa busha, kandi okuragura kwanyu ku kuri okw'ebishuba, obu murikugira muti: MUKAMA niwe akigambire, haza ntaine ki ngambire?
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ahabw'okugamba ebitaine mugasho, mukoorekwa eby'ebishuba, reeba, nikyo ndikubarwanisiza, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Omukono gwangye guryaguma gurwanise baanabi, abarikworekwa ebitaine mugasho, bakaragura eby'ebishuba; tibariba b'omu ishengyero ry'abantu bangye, tibarihandiikwa mu kitabo ky'amaziina g'ab'enju ya Israeli, n'obu kwakuba okutaaha omu nsi ya Israeli; kandi muryamanya ku ndi Mukama RUHANGA.
Baanabi abo bahabiise abantu bangye nibagira bati: N'obusingye, haza obusingye butariho; kandi abantu ku barikwombeka ekisiika ekitagumire, baanabi abo baija bakisiigiriza n'obudongo butanogire;
N'ahabw'ekyo ogambire abo abarikukisiigiriza n'obudongo butanogire oti: Nikiija kugwa. Haryagwa enjura nyingi n'emengo z'orubaare, haije n'eihunga ry'amaani.
Mbwenu ekyo kisiika ku kirigwa, tibaribabuuza bati: Nya budongo buri obu mwasiigiriize burahi?
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ahabw'ekiniga ndyareeta eihunga ry'amaani; ahabw'okuguubwa kubi ngwise enjura nyingi, kandi ahabw'ekiniga ngwise emengo z'orubaare, bikicwekyereze.
Ndyasheenya ekisiika eki mwasiigiriize n'obudongo, nkigwise ahansi, omusingi gwakyo gureebwe; omu kugwa kwakyo naimwe mucwekyereremu; haza mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Okwo nikwo ndimarira ekiniga kyangye ahari ekyo kisiika n'ahari abo abaakisiigiriize n'obudongo obutanogire; kandi imwe, ndyabagambira nti: Ekisiika n'abaaakisiigiriize n'obudongo tibikiriho,
abo nibo baanabi ba Israeli abaabaire nibahanuura ebya Yerusaalemu, bakagireebera okworekwa kw'obusingye, haza obusingye butariho; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.

noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Baryareeba enaku, abakazi ababaziira engisha, bakazijweka abantu boona omu bujwariro bw'enyerere, bakakora n'ebitambaara by'okwetwekyerera eby'abantu aba buri rugyero, nibahiiga amagara gaabo! Nimwija kuhiiga amagara g'abantu bangye, mukiza ag'abandi, ngu mubone kwetungira amagoba?

Mukanjumisa omu bantu bangye ahabw'eigaro rimwe rya sayiri n'otwate tw'oburo, nimwita abantu abatakufiire, mukakiza abatashemereire kugumaho, nimubakirisa ebishuba ebi murikubeihabeihesa abantu bangye, abakunda kuhurira ebishuba.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, niinyanga engisha zaanyu ezi murikutegyesa abantu; ndyazibahuruutura aha mikono, ndekye abantu abu murikutega beegyendere nk'enyonyi.
Ebitambaara byanyu eby'okwetwekyerera ndyabibataagurira aha mutwe, njune abantu bangye, mbaihe omu mikono yaanyu; tibarigaruka kuba mu mikono yaanyu obundi nk'eminyago; kandi murymanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Mukahahaaza omutima gw'ohikiriire n'ebishuba byanyu, ou nyowe ntahahaarize; mwagumya omubi ngu arekye kuhinduka kuruga omu mitwarize ye emibi, akajuna amagara ge;
n'ahabw'ekyo timurigaruka kureeba kworekwa okutaine mugasho, n'obu kwakuba okuragura; kandi ndyajuna abantu bangye, mbaihe omu mikono yaanyu. Obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, aba bantu bataahize omu mitima yaabo ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, baata ekirikuteeza entsibo eky'okutahikiirira kwabo omu maisho gaabo. Noogira ngu nshemereire kubaikiriza kugira ekintu kyona eki baanyehanuuzaho?

Mbwenu ogambe nabo, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ibara muntu ow'omu nju ya Israeli otaahize omu mutima gwe ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa, akata ekirikuteeza entsibo eky'okutahikiirira kwe omu maisho ge, haza akaza owa nabi, nyowe MUKAMA niinye ndimwegarukiramu nimmutura omuna gw'ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa,
mbone kukwata emitima y'ab'enju ya Israeli, abampararukire ahabw'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa.

Ahabw'okuba ibara muntu ow'omu nju ya Israeli nari ow'omu banyamahanga owaabashuuhuukiremu orikumpararuka, akataasya omu mutima gwe ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa, akata ekirikuteeza entsibo eky'okutahikiirira kwe omu maisho ge, haza akaza owa nabi ngu amuunyehanuuzeho, nyowe MUKAMA niinye ndimwegarukiramu;
ogwo mushaija ndyamuta omu kaso, mmugire eky'okureeberaho n'eky'okucweraho enfumu, mmucwere kimwe omu bantu bangye; kandi muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Kandi nabi ku aribeihwabeihwa, yaagira eki yaagamba, nyowe MUKAMA niinye ndiba mmubeihabeihire, ndyamubangira omukono, mmucwekyereze arugye omu bantu bangye Abaisraeli.
Baryagiibwaho ekifubiro, ekifubiro kya nabi n'eky'orimwehanuuzaho biryaingana,
ab'enju ya Israeli barekye kugaruka kuhaba kundugaho, nari kugaruka kweshiisha n'ebicumuro byabo byona; kureka babe abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, ensi ku erincumuraho, yaakora ebitari by'obwesigwa, naanye naagibangira omukono, naahenda eki erikwehimbagiririzaho, nibyo by'okurya byayo, naagiteeza enjara, naagimaramu abantu n'amatungo,
n'obu abantu aba bashatu, Noa, Danieli na Yobu baakuba barimu, bakaakiza amagara gaabo bonka ahabw'okuhikiirira kwabo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Ku ndyohereza enyamaishwa kubuga ensi, zaagishiisha, yaaba amatongo, hataagira owaagirabamu ahabw'ezi nyamaishwa,
n'obu abo bantu bonshatu baakuba barimu, niinyerahira, tibakaabaasa kukiza batabani baabo nari bahara baabo; bo bonka bakaakira, kwonka ensi yo ehinduka amatongo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Nari shi, ku nditeeza ensi rurara, ningira nti: Ka rurara ebugye ensi, ngimaremu abantu n'amatungo;
n'obu abo bantu bonshatu baakuba barimu, niinyerahira, tibakaabaasa kukiza batabani baabo nari bahara baabo; kureka bo bonka bakaakira; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Nari shi, egyo nsi ku ndigiteeza orufu, naagishukaho ekiniga kyangye, ninsheesha eshagama kugimaramu abantu n'amatungo,

n'obu Noa, Danieli na Yobu baakuba barimu, niinyerahira tibakaabaasa kukiza batabani baabo nari bahara baabo, kureka bakaakiza amagara gaabo bonka ahabw'okuhikiirira kwabo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Kwonka ku hariba haagizire abaahonokaho ab'okugiihamu abaana baabo b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki, bwanyima baija ahariimwe, mwareeba emitwarize yaabo n'ebi barikukora, muryagarukwa emitima omunda ahabw'enaku ezi ndiba nyitsize Yerusaalemu, ahabw'ebyo byona ebi naagiteerize.
Kandi baryabagarura emitima omunda, ku murireeba emitwarize yaabo n'ebi barikukora; obwo nibwo murimanya ku ebi naagikoziremu byona, ntarabatuzire busha; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ekiti ky'omuzaabibu n'amataagi gaakyo nibikiza ki ebindi biti by'omu kibira?
Hariho owaakugitemaho empimbi, akagira eki yaagibaijamu? Nari shi, abantu bakaakitemaho enkondo y'okuhanikaho ekintu kyona?
Reeba, kicumiirwe okuba enku z'okuhemba; mbwenu omutwe gwakyo n'ekibunu kyakyo ku birisya, byahwaho, ahagati yaakyo haasiriira, kiryaba kikiine omugasho gwona?
Reeba, obu kibaire kikihundiriire, kibaire kitaine mugasho, reero kaashwa, obu kihiire kikasiriira!
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Nk'oku ekiti ky'omuzaabibu kiri omu biti by'omu kibira, eki naahaireyo kuba enku, nikwo ndihayo abatuuzi b'omuri Yerusaalemu.
Ndyabata omu kaso; n'obu barihunga omuriro, kwonka ogwo muriro guryabamaraho; kandi ku ndibata omu kaso, nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Bwanyima ndyahindura egyo nsi amatongo, ahabw'okuba bakakora ebitari by'obwesigwa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, manyisa Yerusaalemu ebihagaro byayo,
noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira Yerusaalemu, ati: Obukomooko bwawe n'obuzaarwa bwawe ori ow'omu nsi ya Kanaani; sho akaba ari Omuamori na nyoko ari Omuhiitikazi.
Eby'okuzaarwa kwawe obu waazaarwa, tibarakushariire, tibarakwogize kukushemeza, tibarakusiigire mwonyo, n'obu kwakuba okukuta omu twenda tw'obwereere.
Tihariho owaakureebeise eriisho ry'embabazi, ngu akugirire esaasi, akukorere ebyo; kureka okanagwa omu ishwa aha izooba eri waazaariirweho, ahabw'okuba okaba noonugwa.
Bwanyima ku naabaire ninkurabaho, naareeba nooyekuringa omu shagama, naakugira, okiri omuri egyo shagama, nti: Kagire amagara,
okakura nk'ekimezire omu ishwa. Naiwe waakura, waanyeeta, waaba empangare, amabeere gaagwa, n'eishokye ryawe ryakura; kwonka waaguma ojwaire busha, ori entangaare.
Bwanyima naakwozya, naakwogyezaho kimwe eshagama; naakusiiga amajuta.
Kandi naakujweka emyenda y'amabara g'ebicwererane, naakujweka enkaito z'oruhu rw'engongi; naakuzirika emyenda ya bafuta, naakushweka emyenda ya riiri.
Naakujweka amahunde, engoro aha mukono, n'emikuufu omu bitsya.
Naakuta empeta aha nyindo n'omu matu, n'ekirunga kirungi aha mutwe.

Okwo nikwo waahunzirwe ezaabu n'efeeza, n'ebijwaro byawe bikaba biri bafuta na riiri n'emyenda y'amabara gacwereraine. Okaba orya eby'esaano y'obunono n'obwoki n'amajuta. Okaba ori murungi okutakareebwaga, waarugaho waaba omwigarire.
Okurangaanwa kwawe kwahika omu mahanga ahabw'oburungi bwawe, ahabw'okuba bukaba buhikiibwe ekitiinisa eki naakuhaire; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Waatwara bimwe aha bijwaro byawe, waayekorera endaaro zihunzire, waazishambaniramu; tihariho nk'ebyo ebirabaireho, kandi tibiribaho.
Kandi okatwara amahunde gaawe amarungi agaakozirwe omu zaabu zangye n'efeeza zangye, ebi naakuhaire waabyekoreramu ebishushani by'abashaija, waashambana nabyo;
waatwara ebijwaro byawe eby'amabara agacwereraine, waabibishweka, kandi waata amajuta gangye n'obubaane bwangye omu maisho gaabyo.
Kandi n'eby'okurya byangye ebi naakuhaire, eby'esaano y'obunono n'amajuta n'obwoki, ebi naabaire nkugaburira, waabita omu maisho gaabyo, ngu bibe ekisooroora ekirungi; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi okatwara batabani baawe na bahara baawe, abu wanzaariire, waababitambira ngu bibamareho.
