Noogira ngu obwamaraaya bwawe n'ekintu kikye, kandi okongyeraho n'okwita abaana bangye, okabahayo aharibyo kuba ebitambo by'okurabya omu muriro?
Kandi omuri ebyo bihagaro byawe byona n'obwamaraaya bwawe toraijukire biro by'obuto bwawe, obu waabaire ojwaire busha, ori entangaare, nooyekuringa omu shagama.
Mbwenu bwanyima y'ebyo bibi byawe byona, (oryareeba enaku; eego oryazireeba, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira),
waayeyombekyera enju ahatunguukire, waayekorera omwanya mukuru ogw'okuramizamu omuri buri nguuto,
ahari buri iteeraniro ry'emihanda waaraayisizaho oburungi bwawe nooyehayo ahari ibara muhinguzi; otyo waahinguranisa obwamaraaya bwawe;
Kandi okaraaya n'Abanyamisri, bataahi baawe enduruuhi, waakanyisa obwamaraaya bwawe kungwisa kubi.
Reeba, nikyo nkubangiriire omukono, nkatuubya egabo yaawe, nkakuhayo aha bazigu baawe abarikwenda kukumira, bahara b'Abafilistia abaitsirwe enshoni ahabw'emitwarize yaawe mibi erengyesereize.
Kandi okaraaya n'Abaasiria, ahabw'okuba tohaaga; buzimazima okaraaya nabo, nabwo tiwaahaaga.
Kandi okahinguranisa obwamaraaya bwawe omu nsi y'abashuubuzi ba Bukaludaaya; n'abo nabo tibaakuhaazya.
Mukama RUHANGA yaagira ati: omutima gwawe ka gurwaziibwe okwetenga, ahabw'okuba okozire ebyo byona, ebikorwa omukazi maraaya owaariire enshoni,
kandi oyeyombekyeire enju ahatunguukire, waayekorera omwanya mukur ahari buri nteeraniro y'emihanda; kandi torabaire nka baamaraaya abandi, ahabw'okuba okaba ogaya okugurirwa.
Eshi ori omukazi enshambani, otaasya abahinguzi omu mwanya gwa baro!
Baamaraaya boona bagurirwa abashaija, kwonka iwe niiwe oha bashambane baawe boona ebiconco, noobagurira ngu bakwijeho nibaruga embaju zoona ahabw'obwamaraaya bwawe.
N'ahabw'ekyo obwamaraaya bwawe bwine omutaano n'obw'abandibakazi; kandi tihariho owaakwohize kuba maraaya, kureka iwe niiwe ogurira abantu, bo tibaakugurira. Nikyo obeereire ow'omutaano n'abandi.
Mbwenu, iwe maraaya 'we, hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA.

Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Manya, obuhemu bwawe bushuurwirwe, n'enjuuro yaawe yaareebwa butunu ahabw'obwamaraaya bwawe, obu waagizire na bashambane baawe, n'ahabw'ebishushani byawe byona ebirikuramibwa, n'ahabw'eshagama y'abaana ei waabihaire.

Reeba ahabw'ebyo byona ndyateeranira hamwe bashambane baawe boona, abaabaire bakushemeza, abu waabaire okunda boona, n'abu waabaire oyanga boona. Ndyabateeranira hamwe, bakurwanise nibaruga oku n'oku, nkujwekyere busha omu maisho gaabo, bareebe enjuuro yaawe yoona.
Kandi ndyakucwera orubanja oruri nk'orw'abakazi abasiisire obushwere, bakasheesha eshagama, nkuteho ekifubiro ky'eshagama, nkwiniire ekiniga n'eihato;

bwanyima nkuheyo omu mikono ya bashambane baawe, baasheenye enju yaawe eri ey'ahatunguukire, n'egyo myanya yaawe emikuru; kandi baryakujuura ebijwaro byawe, banyagye ebintu byawe eby'amahunde, bakutsigye entangaare, ojwaire busha;
bakureetere eihe rikuteere, bakuteere amabaare, kandi bakurezye na zaarurara zaabo.
Kandi baryayotsya amaka gaawe, bakuheere ebifubiro omu maisho g'abakazi baingi, nkuzibire kugaruka kuraaya; kandi torigaruka kuhayo bintu byawe obundi.
Okwo nikwo ndikumariraho ekiniga kyangye, eihato ryangye rikakurugaho, nkatuuza, nkareka kugaruka kukugirira ekiniga.

Ahabw'okutaijuka biro by'obuto bwawe, okaanyitsa ekiniga n'ebyo byona, nikyo naanye ndikuzimuuririra ebi waakozire, nkabikurunda aha mutwe; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira. Nangwa kuri otarakozire by'obwamaraaya, okabyongyera aha bihagaro byawe byona!
Ori owa nyoko owaayangire iba n'abaana be; kandi ori owa mukuru waawe na murumuna waawe, abaayangire baibabo n'abaana baabo. Nyoko akaba ari Omuhiitikazi, na sho ari Omuamori.
Mukuru waawe ni Samaria, owaabaire atwire aha bukiizi bwawe bwa bumosho na bahara be; kandi murumuna waawe, owaabaire atwire aha bukiizi bwawe bwa buryo, ni Sodoma na bahara be.
Kwonka torahaagiibwe kugyendera mu mihanda yaabo, n'obu kwakuba okutwaza nk'ebihagaro byabo oku biri; kureka omu kaanya kakye munonga okasiisikara omu mitwarize yaawe yoona okukira abandi.
Mukama RUHANGA naagira ati:
Reeba, eki nikyo kicumuro kya murumuna waawe Sodoma; we na bahara be bakagira amaryo, eby'okurya bingi n'okugogyeera; tiyaahwera booro n'abakyene.
Bakaba beekunika, bakorera ebihagaro omu maisho gangye; ntyo ku naabireebire, naabaihaho.

Nangwa na Samaria terakozire kimwe kya kabiri ky'ebibi byawe; kwonka iwe okakora ebihagaro bingi okubakira; ahabw'ebyo bihagaro byona ebi waakozire, okareetera mukuru waawe na murumuna waawe kureebeka nk'abahikiriire.

Yemera enshoni zaawe, ahabw'okuba niiwe waihiiseho mukuru waawe na murumna waawe orubanja. Ahabw'ebibi ebi waakozire ebirikukira ebyabo kuba bibi, bakukirize okuhikiirira. N'ahabw'ekyo bwerabwera, oyemere enshoni zaawe, ahabw'okuba niiwe waareeteire mukuru waawe na murumuna waawe okureebeka nk'abahikiriire.
obone kwemera enshoni zaawe, obwerabwere ahabw'ebi waakozire, ebyabareeteire kugarukwa emitima omunda.

Kandi ebya murumuna waawe, Sodoma na bahara be, n'ebya mukuru waawe, Samaria na bahara be, boona baryagaruka omu buteeka bwabo obwa ira; naiwe oryagaruka omu buteeka bwawe obwa ira hamwe na bahara baawe.
Murumuna waawe Sodoma akaba atari eky'okucweraho enfumu omu biro by'amaryo gaawe, obubi bwawe butakashuurwirwe?
Mbwenu obaire nkawe, waaba eky'okujumwa ahari bahara ba Siria na bataahi be na bahara b'Abafilistia abakwehinguririize abarikukugaya.
Oyekoreire orubanja orw'obwamaraaya bwawe n'ebihagaro byawe; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
N'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, ndyaijuka endagaano ei naaragaine naiwe omu biro by'obuto bwawe, mpamye naiwe endagaano etarihwaho.
Ku ndireeta mukuru waawe na murumuna waawe, naabakuha kuba nka bahara baawe, kwonka kitari habw'endagaano yaawe, obwo nibwo oriijuka emihanda yaawe, okakwatwa enshoni,
Kandi ndyahamya endagaano yangye naiwe, haza omanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
obone kwijuka, okwatwe enshoni, orekye kugaruka kugamba, ahabw'enshoni zaawe, naaheza kukusaasira byona ebi waakozire; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, gambira enju ya Israeli ekishaakuzo, ogicwere enfumu,
noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Empungu mpango eya'amapapa mahango kandi maraingwa, eine amooya g'amabara maingi, ekaija Lebanooni, yaatwara omutwe gw'omwereezi,
yaagucwaho akataagi akarikuhereeruka aha mutwe, yaakatwara omu nsi y'obushuubuzi, yakabyara omu rurembo rw'abashuubuzi.
Bwanyima yaatwara emwe aha mbibo z'omuri egyo nsi, yaagibiba omu itaka eririkweza, kandi yaagibyara haihi n'amaizi maingi, nk'akati k'omukinga,

kaakura, kaaba omuzaabibu mugufu, gwajanjamura amataagi; ago mataagi gaagwo gaakura nigatoora ei egyo mpungu eri, n'emizi yaagwo yaaguma ahu gwamezire. Katyo kaarugwamu omuzaabibu, kaatookaho amataagi, gaayumbya.

Kwonka hakaba hariho endiijo mpungu mpango y'amapapa mahango n'amooya maingi; kandi reeba, emizi y'ogwo muzaabibu yaaranda neetora ei eri, gwajanjamura amataagi gaagwo, gaatora ei eri kuguma neegagiitirira.
Yaagwiha omu isya eri gwabyairwemu, yaagutwara, yaagubyara omu itaka rirungi haihi n'amaizi maingi, ngu gubone kutooka amataagi kwera ebijuma n'okuba omuzaabibu gw'ekitiinisa.

Gira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Beitu ebyo, guryaba gye? Egyo mpungu terigukuura ekagurandura n'emizi, ekagutemaho amataagi, ngu amababi gaagwo goona agarikubengyeya gahotokye? Nangwa n'okugarandura tikiryetenga mukono gw'amaani nari abantu baingi.
Beitu shi, ku barigukuura, baagubyara ahandi, ebyo guryaba gye? Omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba ku guriguteera, tiguryomera kimwe omu isya eri baagubyairemu?
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mbwenu gambira egyo nju engomi oti: Timurikumanya amakuru g'ebigambo ebyo? Bagire oti: Reeba, omugabe wa Babulooni akaija Yerusaalemu, yaakwata omugabe waayo, n'abanyiginya baayo, yaabatwara owe Babulooni.
Yaatwara omwe aha baana b'ogwo mugabe, yaaragaana nawe endagaano naamurahiza. Kandi yaatwara abantu bakuru b'omuri egyo nsi,
ngu obugabe bugarurwe ahansi, burekye kutunguuka, kureka buhamibwe okukwata endagaano ye.
Kwonka yaamugomera, yaatuma entumwa Misri kushaba embaraasi n'eihe rihango. Nimugira ngu, aryaba gye? Omuntu orikukora ebintu nk'ebyo aryakira? Naabaasa kwita endagaano, akire?
Mukama RUHANGA naagira ati: Niinyerahira, buzimazima omu mwanya, ogu omugabe owaamwemekire atwiremu, ou agayire endahiro ye, kandi akaita endagaano ye, omuri Babulooni nimwo arigwa.
Faraho n'eihe rye ry'amaani n'engabo ze nyingi tarimuha mikono aha rugamba, ku barirunda eby'okutemberaho, baayombekaho ebigo, kucwekyereza abantu baingi.
Ahabw'okugaya endahiro akaita endagaano, n'ahabw'okuheza kwimutsya omukono akagaruka akakora ebyo byona, tarikira.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Niinyerahira, buzimazima endahiro yangye ei agayire, n'endagaano yangye ei aitsire, ndyabimutura mbimurunde aha mutwe.
Ndyamurengyezaho ekigoye, akwatwe omutego gwangye, mmutaasye Babulooni, mmucwerereyo orubaja rw'ekicumuro eki ancumwireho.
Kandi engabo ze z'entoore zoona ziryaitwa rurara, n'abarihonokaho bataataanisizibwe ei emiyaga yoona ereetwa; kandi muryamanya ku nyowe, MUKAMA, niinye naakigambire.

Aha rushozi ruraingwa rwa Israeli niho ndikabyara, katookye amataagi, kaane, kabe omwereezi gw'ekitiinisa. Enyamaishwa z'emiringo yoona ziryatuura ahansi yaagwo, kandi omu kicuucu ky'amataagi gaagwo ebirikuguruka eby'emiringo yoona nimwo biryarika.

Kandi emiti yoona ey'omu ishwa eryamanya ku nyowe MUKAM nagarura ahansi emiti miraingwa, nkatunguura emigufu, nkoomya emiti mibisi, nkabengyeyesa eyomire. Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba, kandi ndyakikora.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mugyenderera ki kucwera ensi ya Israeli enfumu egi, erikugira eti: Abazaire bariire emizaabibu erikushaarira, amaino g'abaana gaaba nigo gaagira amangigina?
Mukama RUHANGA naagira ati: Niinyerahira, timurigaruka kucwa egyo nfumu omuri Israeli.
Emyoyo yoona n'eyangye; omwoyo gw'omuzaire n'ogwangye, kandi n'ogw'omwana n'ogwangye; omwoyo ogukora ekibi nigwo gurifa.
Omuntu ku araabe ari ohikiriire, yaakora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire;
ku araabe atarikuriira ha nshozi, atarikwimukiza maisho ebishushani by'enju ya Israeli ebirikuramibwa, atarikushiisha muka mutaahi we, n'obu kwakuba okuhika omukazi ori omu kwezi,
atarikukora kubi muntu weena, orikugarurira omukwatiriize omukwato gwe, atarikunyaga by'abandi, kureka orikuha abaine enjara eby'okurya bye, akajweka abajwaire busha,
atarikuguza ngu bamuhe ekiteebwamu, n'obu kwakuba okutwara enshaagi, kureka orikuzibira omukono gwe kukora eby'okutahikiirira, orikuramura omuntu na mugyenzi we omu buryo,
kandi orikuguma naagyendera omu biragiro byangye, akoorobera ebi naataireho; ogwo niwe ahikiriire, kandi taribura kugumaho; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
kureka orikuriira aha nshozi, orikushiisha muka mutaahi we,
orikukora kubi abooro n'abakyene, orikunyaga eby'abandi, otarikugarura kyakwwatiriziibwe, orikwimukiza amaisho ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, orikukora ebihagaro,
orikuguza ngu bamuhe ekiteebwamu, akatwara enshaagi, omwana ogwo aryagumaho? Tarigumaho. Ahabw'okukora ebihagaro ebyo byona, taribura kufa; kandi orubanja rw'eshagama ruryaba ahariwe.
Kwonka ogwo mushaija ku arizaara omwana orikureeba ebibi ebi ishe akozire byona, akatiina, kwonka atakore nk'ebyo,
otarikuriira ha nshozi n'obu kwakuba okwimukiza amaisho ebishushani by'enju ya Israeli, otarikushiisha muka mutaahi we,
otarikukora kubi muntu weena, otarikukwatiriza, otarikunyaga kintu kyona eky'abandi, kureka orikuha abaine enjara eby'okurya bye, akajweka abajwaire busha,

orikuzibira omukono gwe kukora eby'okutahikiirira, otarikutwara kiteebwamu nari enshaagi, orikworobera ebi naataireho, akagyendera omu biragiro byangye, omwana ogwo tarifa ahabw'okutahikiirira kwa ishe; buzimazima aryagumaho.
Kwonka ishe, ahabw'okuba akaita kubi abantu ataine saasi, yaanyaga mwene waabo, yaakora omu bantu ebitari birungi, reeba, ogwo aryafa ahabw'okuhikiirira kwe.

N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, nimugira muti: Ahabw'enki omwana tarikuturwa okutahikiirira kwa ishe? Omwana ku arikora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire, yaata omutima aha kworobera ebiragiro byangye byona, buzimazima aryagumaho.

Omuntu orikukora ekibi niwe arifa. Omwana tariturwa kutahikiirira kwa ishe, na ishe w'omwana tariturwa kutahikiirira kw'omwana we. Okuhikiirira kw'ohikiriire niwe kuribarirwa, kandi n'obubi bw'omubi niwe buribarirwa.
Kwonka omuntu mubi ku arihinduka yaareka ebibi ebi yaakozire byona, yaayorobera ebiragiro byangye byona, yaakora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire, buzimazima aryagumaho, tarifa.
Omu by'okushiisha byona ebi yaakozire tihariho na kimwe ekirimwijukwaho; aryagumaho ahabw'eby'okuhikiirira ebi akozire.
Nimugira ngu ngira okushemererwa kwona ahabw'okufa kw'omubi?, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba. Eki nyenda t'okureka omuhanda gwe omubi, akagumaho?

Mbwenu ohikiriire ku arihinduka yaareka okuhikiirira kwe, yaakora eby'okutahikiirira, yaaakora ebihagaro ebi omusiisi akora, aryagumaho? Omu by'okuhikiirira byona ebi yaakozire tihariho na kimwe ekirimwijukwaho; ahabw'ekicumuro eki acumwire, n'ekibi eki akozire, aryafa.
Ohikiriire ku arihinduka yaareka okuhikiirira kwe, yaakora eby'okutahikiirira, aryafa abizire; ahabw'eky'okutahikiirira eki akozire, aryafa.
Kandi omuntu mubi ku arihinduka yaareka eby'okushiisha ebi yaakozire, yaakora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire, aryakiza amagara ge.
Ahabw'okuteekateeka akahinduka, akareka eby'okushiisha ebi yaakozire, buzimazima aryagumaho, tarifa.
N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, enju ya Israeli neegira eti: Emitwarize ya Mukama tehikire. Imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe, nimugira ngu emitwarize yangye tehikire? Eyaanyu tiyo etahikire?

N'ahabw'ekyo imwe ab'enju ya Israeli, nikyo ndibacwerera orubanja, buri muntu nk'oku emitwarize ye eri; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira. Mweteise, muhindukye, murekye eby'okushiisha byanyu byona, okutahikiirira kurekye kubacwekyereza.
Munagye hare eby'okushisha byanyu byona ebi mwancumwireho, mwetungire omutima musya n'omwoyo musya! Mbwenu nimwendera ki kufa, imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe?
Ahabw'okuba tinshemerererwa kufa kw'omuntu weena; n'ahabw'ekyo muhindukye, mubone kugumaho; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
noogira oti:
Nyoko akaba ari ki mishi!
Manya akaba ari entare enkazi eyaabaire ebyama omu zindi,
Ekonkyeza ebyana byayo ahagati y'emigunju y'entare.
Kyaba omugunju gw'entare.
Gwayega kukwata eki guhiigire,
Gwarya abantu.
Gwagwa omu busya bwabo,
Baagutwaza amarobo omu nsi ya Misri.
Yaahwa amatsiko,
Yaareeta ekindi kyana omu byana byayo,
Yaakigira omugunju.
Kyarugaho kyaba omugunju gw'entare,
Gwayega kukwata eki gwitsire,
Gwarya abantu.
Bwanyima gwasheenya ebigo byabyo ebigumire,
Gwacwekyereza endembo zaabo.
Ensi n'ebigirimu byona byahinduka amatongo,
Ahabw'eiraka ry'okutsinda kwagwo.
Gaagutega emitego embaju zoona;
Gaagurengyezaho ekigoye kyago,
Gwagwa omu busya bwago.
Gaagutwarira omugabe wa Babulooni,
Gaagutaasya omu kihome,
Ngu eiraka ryagwo ritagaruka kuhurirwa
Omu bibungo bya Israeli.
Ogubyairwe omu musiri haihi n'amaizi,
Ogwabaire nigwera gye, gwine amataagi maingi
Ahabw'okugira amaizi maingi.
Eitaagi ryagwo eririkukiza agandi kuguma
Ryahinduka enkoni y'omutegyeki,
Ryayoga omu gandi mataagi mahango,
Ryareebekyera ahaiguru
Riine amataagi maingi gakwataine.
Gwanagwa ahansi;
Omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba gwagwomya,
Ebijuma byagwo byakonkoboka,
Empimbi yaagwo yaayoma,
Omuriro gwagwotsya.
Gwabyarwa omu nsi eyomire, ekarangataine.
Gwayokyeza kimwe amataagi n'ebijuma byagwo;
N'ahabw'ekyo tigutsigaize mpimbi egumire,
N'obu yaakuba enkoni y'omutegyeki.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, gambira abakuru ba Israeli, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Mureetsirwe okunyehanuuzaho? Niinyerahira, tindikwikiriza ku muunyehanuuzaho; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ebyo noija kubacwera orubanja, Mwana w'omuntu? Noija kubacwera orubanja? Ku kiraabe kiri kityo, bamanyise ebihagaro bya baishenkurubo,

obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Aha izooba eri naatooraaniireho Israeli, nkarahira oruzaaro rw'enju ya Yakobo, obu naabeeyorekyera omu nsi ya Misri, ningira nti: Ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Ahari eryo izooba nibwo naabarahira ku ndibaiha omu nsi ya Misri, nkabatwara omu nsi ei naabasheruriire, ensi y'amate n'obwoki, ey'ekitiinisa okukira ezindi zoona.
Bwanyima naabagira nti: Mwena munagye hare ebirikunugwa, ebi buri muntu omuriimwe atuuzaho amaisho, kandi muteesiisisa ebishushani bya Misri ebirikuramibwa. Niinye MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu.
Kwonka bangomera, baayanga kumpurira. Boona tibaikiriza kunaga ebirikunugwa ebi baabaire batuuzaho amaisho, n'obu kwakuba okwimuura ebishushani bya Misri ebirikuramibwa.
Bwanyima naateekateeka kubashukaho ekiniga kyangye, n'okukibamariraho bakiri omuri Misri.
Kwonka tinaatwaza ntyo, ahabw'okutenda kujumisa eiziina ryangye omu maisho g'amahanga agu baabaire batwiremu, agu naayeyorekire omu maisho gaago, obu naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri.
Ntyo naabaiha omu nsi ya Misri, naabatwara omu ihamba.
Naabaha ebiragiro byangye, naabamanyisa ebi naataireho, ebibaisaho omuntu orikubyorobera.
Kandi naabaha sabato zangye kuba akamanyiso ahagati yangye nabo, ngu babone kumanya ku nyowe MUKAMA, niinye mbeeza.
Kwonka ab'enju ya Israeli bangomerera omu ihamba, tibaagyendera mu biragiro byangye, kureka baayanga ebi naataireho ebibaisaho orikubyorobera; na sabato zangye baazishiisha munonga.
Ekyarugiremu naateekateeka kubashukaho ekiniga kyangye bakiri omu ihamba, ngu mbamarireho kimwe.
Kwonka tinaatwaza ntyo ahabw'okutenda kujumisa eiziina ryangye omu maisho g'amahanga agu naabaire naabaihire omu maisho gaago.
Kandi naabarahirira omu ihamba ku ntaribataasya mu nsi ei naabaire mbahaire, ensi ey'amate n'obwoki, ey'ekitiinisa okukira ezindi zoona,
ahabw'okwanga ebi naataireho, batagyendere mu biragiro byangye, bakashiisha sabato zangye; ahabw'okuba emitima yaabo ekakuratira ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa.
Kwonka eriisho ryangye ryabasaasira, tinaabacwekyereza, n'obu kwakuba okubamaririraho kimwe omu ihamba.
Nyowe MUKAM niinye Ruhanga waanyu; mugume mugyendere omu biragiro byangye, mute omutima aha kworobera ebi naataireho,
kandi mugume mweze sabato zangye, zibe akamanyiso ahagati yangye naimwe, mubone kumanya ku nyowe MUKAMA ndi Ruhanga waanyu.
Kwonka abaana baabo nabo bangomera, tibaagyendera mu biragiro byangye, tibaata mutima aha bi naataireho, ebibaisaho orikubyorobera; na sabato zangye baazishiisha.
Ekyarugiremu naateekateeka kubashukaho ekiniga kyangye, nkakibamaririraho omu ihamba.
Kwonka naazibira omukono gwangye, naatwaza ntyo ahabw'okutenda kujumisa iziina ryangye omu maisho g'amahanga agu naabaire naabaihire omu maisho gaago.
Kandi naabarahiririra omu ihamba ku ndibataataanisiza omu mahanga, nkabanaganaga omu nsi zaago,
ahabw'okuba tibarakozire bi naataireho, kureka bakanga ebiragiro byangye, baashiisha sabato zangye, kandi amaisho gaabo baagahanga ebishushani bya baishenkurubo ebirikuramibwa.
Kandi naabaha ebiragiro ebyabaire bitari birungi, n'ebyatairweho ebitarikubaasa kubahaisa magara,
naabasiisisa empongano zaabo, ahabw'okuba bakarabya abaana baabo b'emijigaijo omu muriro, ngu mbone kubahindura enshoberwa, bamanye ku nsi MUKAMA.
N'ahabw'ekyo, Mwana w'omuntu, gambira ab'enju ya Israeli noobagira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Kandi n'omuri eki baashwenkuriimwe bakandogotaho nibandyarya.

Ahakuba ku naaherize kubataasya omu nsi ei naaragaine kubaha nindahira, okwiha obwo, ei baabaire bareeba ibara kibungo kiraingwa, nari ekiti kyona ekiyumbize, baba niyo baatambira ebitambo byabo, bakareeta empongano zaabo ezirikungwisa kubi; kandi okwo niyo baabaire booterera emigaju yaabo, bakashukirayo empongano zaabo z'eby'okunywa.
(Naababuuza nti: Ogu mwanya mukuru ogu murikuzamu n'ogw'enki? Nikyo gwayeteirwe
N'ahabw'ekyo gira enju ya Israeli oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Nimwenda kweshiihsa, nk'oku baashwenkuriimwe baagizire, n'okuhaba nimukuratira ebintu byabo ebirikunugwa?

Ahabw'okuba, ku muhonga empongano zaanyu, mwarabya abaana baanyu b'aboojo omu muriro, muba nimweshiisha n'ebishushani byanyu ebirikuramibwa n'okuhitsya hati. Imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe, mbwenu mukaanyehanuuzaho? Niinyerahira, timuriinyehanuuzaho; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ndyabaiha omu mahanga, mbataaruure omu nsi ezi mwataataaniiremu n'omukono gw'amaani ogubangire, nyine ekiniga kingi;
bwanyima mbareete omu ihamba ry'amahanga; okwo niyo ndibatonganisiza nitureebana.
Nk'oku naatonganiise baashenkuriimwe omu ihamba ry'omu nsi ya Misri, naimwe nikwo ndibatonganisa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ndyabarabya ahandi y'enkoni ningibabarisa, mbarekye mutaahemu.
Ndyabaihamu abagomi n'abancumwireho, mbaihe omu nsi ei baashuuhuukiiremu; kandi tibaritaaha mu nsi ya Israeli. Obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.

Ahakuba Mukama RUHANGA naagira ati: Ab'enju ya Israeli boona oku baingana baryampeerereza aha rushozi rwangye orurikwera, aha mutwe gw'ekibungo kya Israeli omuri egyo nsi; okwo niyo ndibaakiirira, kandi niyo ndibaihiraho ebi mureetsire, n'emiganuro yaanyu n'empongano zaanyu zoona ezirikwera.
Ku ndibagarura omu nsi ya Israeli ei naaraganiise kuha baashwenkuriimwe nindahira, obwo muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Okwo niyo muriijukira emitwarize yaanyu n'ebi mwakozire byona, ebi mwayesiisiise; kandi muryayetamwa ahabw'ebibi byona ebi mwakozire.

Imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe, ku ndibatwaza ntyo ahabw'eiziina ryangye, ntarikubatura mitwarize yaanyu emibi, nari ebihagaro ebi mwakozire, obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, ohagambire noohahana, ohanuure ebiriba aha kibira ky'omu nsi ya Negebu,

ogambire ekyo kibira oti: Hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA. Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, naaza kukutwekamu omuriro, gumarireho kimwe buri kiti kyona ekibisi n'ekyomire ekiri omuriiwe; omuriro ogurikubuguma tiguriraazibwa, kandi guryababura obuso bw'abantu boona okuruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Abantu boona baryareeba ku nyowe MUKAMA, niinye ngutwekire; kandi tiguriraazibwa.
Bwanyima, naagira nti: Ai bambe, Mukama RUHANGA, nibangambaho bati: Beitu omuntu ogu t'omucwi w'enfumu?
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe ahari Yerusaalemu, ogambire emyanya erikwera noogihana; kandi ohanuure ebiriba aha nsi ya Israeli,
ogigire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, naaba omuzigu waanyu, kandi niinyija kusyora rurara yangye omu kyobati kyayo, nkumaremu abahikiriire n'abasiisi.
Ahabw'okwenda kukumariramu kimwe abahikiriire n'abasiisi nikyo rurara erisyorerwa omu kyobati kyayo kurwanisa abantu boona, okuruga aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo okuhika aha bwa-bumosho;
kandi abantu boona baryamanya ku nyowe MUKAMA nsyoire rurara yangye omu kyobati kyayo; terikigarukamu bundi.
N'ahabw'ekyo, Mwana w'omuntu, tsinda; otsindire omu maisho gaabo, oine obusaasi bukucwire omugongo, n'enaku nyingi.

Kundi baraakubuuze bati: Ahabw'enki nootsinda? obagire oti: N'ahabw'ebimpuriire. Ku biriija, emitima y'abantu boona eryahwerera, n'emikono ya boona eryahwa amaani, emyoyo ya boona eryagwa enshazi, kandi n'entegye za boona ziryabonda, zibe nk'amaizi. Reeba nibiija, kandi biryahikiirizibwa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, hanuura noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama arikugamba naagira ati: Rurara, rurara etyarize kandi eyeziibwe,
etyaziibwe kwita, yaayezibwa kumurinkana nk'omurabyo. Mbwenu aho nitwija kwogaho, tugire okushemererwa? Mwana wangye, ogayire enkoni n'ekintu kyona ekyetwa ekiti.
Rurara egyo ehairweyo kwezibwa, ngu ebone kukoresibwa; etyaziibwe, yaayezibwa ngu ebone kuheebwa omwitsi.
Mwana w'omuntu, rira oboroogye, ahabw'okuba n'ey'okurwanisa abantu bangye, n'ey'okurwanisa abanyiginya ba Israeli boona; bahairweyo ahari rurara hamwe n'abantu bangye. N'ahabw'ekyo yemaamaate,
ahabw'okuba hariho ekigyezo; mbwenu enkoni erikugaya ku eraabe etakiriho, biryaba bita?, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
ngu emitima yaabo ehahaare, baingi bagwe omu marembo gaabo goona. Ayaayaaya! Neemurinkana nk'omurabyo, eyeziibwe ahabw'okwita.
Temera kimwe aha rubaju rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho, ei obwogi bwawe burikureeba.
Naanye niinyija kuteera omu ngaro, nyemare ekiniga. Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naagamba.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, taho emihanda ebiri eraarabwemu rurara y'omugabe wa Babulooni; yombi erugye omu nsi emwe. Bwanyima okore ekyapa, okite ahu omuhanda, ogurikuza omu rurembo, gurikutandikira;
oyorekye omuhanda ahabwa rurara erikuza Rabba ey'Abaamoni, n'ogundi ogurikuza Yuda na Yerusaalemu ey'ebigo bigumire.
Ahabw'okuba omugabe wa Babulooni ayemereire omu ntaaniro z'emihanda, ahu egyo mihanda yombi erikutandikira, kuragura; naazongoza enyambi, naaraguza

Omu mukono gwe gwa buryo endagu nizeerera Yeresaalemu kugiteera nibaashamya akanwa nibahiga, nibateera orwari, kugibyaraho ebiti by'okuhiguza amarembo, kurundaho eby'okutemberaho, kandi n'okugyombekaho ebigo by'okugigotesa.
Kwonka Abaisraeli bo kiryabasusira endagu z'ebishuba; ahakuba bakarahira endahiro ehamire. Kwonka naabaijutsya orubanja rwabo ngu bakwatwe.

Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ahabw'okureetera orubanja rwanyu kwijukwa, mukashuuruura ebicumuro byanyu byona, kikareetera ebibi byanyu kureebwa butunu omu bi murikukora byona; ahabw'okwijukwa muryabikwatirwamu.
Naiwe omugabe mubi owa Israeli, ou obunaku bwe buhikire, obunaku bw'ekifubiro kyawe ky'aha muheru,
oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ihaho ekitambaara, ojuure ekirunga; ebintu tibirikwija kuguma nk'oku byabaire biri; ekiri ahansi okitunguure, kandi ekitunguukire okigarure ahansi.
Ndyakijuumika, ndyakijuumika, ndyakijuumika; tikirigaruka kubaho, okuhitsya obu okiineho obushoboorozi ariija, nkaba niwe naakiha.

(ku barikuba nibakikureebera okworekwa okutari kw'amazima, nibakuragurira ebishuba) ngu oteebwe aha bitsya by'abantu babi, abahutaaziibwe obuhuta oburikwita; abu obunaku bwabo obw'ekifubiro ky'aha muheru buhikire.
Garura rurara egyo omu kyobati kyayo. Omu mwanya ogu waahangiirwemu, omu nsi ei waakomookiremu, nimwo ndikucwera orubanja.
Ndyakushukaho okuguubwa kubi kwangye, nkuhuuheho omuriro gw'ekiniga kyangye, nkuheyo omu mikono y'abantu abari nk'enyamaishwa, abaine obwengye bw'okucwekyereza.
Oryaba nk'enku z'okuhemba; eshagama yaawe eryasheeshwa ahagati y'ensi yaanyu; kandi toriijukwa bundi; ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Naiwe Mwana w'omuntu, nooyenda kucwa orubanja, kurucwera orurembo orurikusheesha eshagama? Mbwenu nu rumanyise ebihagaro byarwo byona,
ogire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, orurembo orusheesha eshagama ahagati yaarwo ngu obunaku bwarwo buhikye, kandi orwekorera ebishushani ebirikuramibwa kweshiisha!

Eshagama ei waaseesire ekureeteire kugiibwaho orubanja, n'ebishushani ebi waakozire byakushiisha. Oiriize haihi obunaku bwawe, kandi n'obunaku bw'emyaka yaawe eyaatairweho buhikire. Nikyo nkuhinduriire ekijumo aha mahanga n'eky'okugaaniiza omu nsi zaago zoona.
Abakuri haihi n'abakuri hare baryakugaaniiza, iwe rurangaanwa oijwire okujagarara.
Omuriiwe abazaire tibarikweteebwaho, nibagaywa; abashuuhuuki nibaitwa kubi, kandi efuuzi n'abafaakazi nibakorwa kubi.
Okagaya ebintu byangye ebirikwera, waashiisha sabato zangye.
Omuriiwe harimu abantu abarikubeiherera abandi ngu baitwe; mwine abandi abarikuriira aha nshozi, n'abandi abarikukorera omuriiwe eby'obushambani.
Omuriiwe harimu abarikujweka busha baishebo, kandi omuriiwe harimu abarikuhamba abakazi bari omu kwezi.
Omwe naakora ebihagaro na muka mutaahi we, ondiijo naashiisha omukaamwana, n'ondiijo naashiisha munyaanya owa ishe.
Omuriiwe abantu nibarya enguzi kusheesha eshagama; nootwara ekiteebwamu n'enshaagi; otunga amagoba ahari bataahi baawe ahabw'okuhata; haza nyowe onyebwa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Mbwenu omutima gwawe guryabaasa kugumisiriza, n'emikono yaawe egire amaani, aha izooba eri ndikuturiri aho ebi waakozire? Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba, kandi ndyakikora.
Ndyabataataanisiza omu mahanga, mbanaganagye omu nsi zaago, kandi nkumaremu oburofa bwawe.
Naanye ndyajumirwa omu maisho g'amahanga ahabwanyu, kandi muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, enju ya Israeli empindukiire enkamba; boona bahindukire enkamba, bari omu iziiko nk'efeeza n'emiringa n'eibaati n'ekyoma na rusasi.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA, arikugirira ati: Ahabw'okuhinduka enkamba mwena, nikyo ndibateeranirira omuri Yerusaalemu ahagati.

Nk'oku abantu bateeranira efeeza, emiringa, ebyoma, rusasi n'eibaati omu iziiko, bakabijugutirira omu muriro kubiyazya, naimwe nikwo ndibateeranira hamwe mbagwereirwe kubi, kandi mbainiire ekiniga, nkabata omu iziiko, nkabayazya.
Eego ndyabateeranira hamwe, mbajugutiririreho omu muriro gw'ekiniga kyangye, muyagire ahagati yaaryo.
Nk'oku efeeza eyagira ahagati y'eiziiko, naimwe nikwo muriyagira mutyo ahagati yaaryo; kandi muryamanya ku nyowe MUKAMA nshukire ekiniga kyangye ahariimwe.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, gigambire oti: Ori ensi etashemeziibwe, kandi etakagwirwemu njura aha izooba ry'okugirirwa ekiniga.

Abanyiginya baayo abagirimu ni nk'entare erikutsinda, erikutaanyagura eki eitsire; bamizire amagara g'abantu, banyagire obutungi n'ebintu by'obuguzi bwingi, abakazi baingi omuriyo babagizire abafaakazi.

Abanyamurwa baayo basiisire ebiragiro byangye n'eitima, baahagara ebintu byangye ebirikwera; tibataaniise birikwera n'ebitarikwera, tibeegyeise bantu kutaanisa ebitashemeire n'ebitshemeire, kandi na sabato zangye bakazeehuzya; ekirugiremu naagaywa omuribo.
Abategyeki baayo ni nk'emishega erikutaanyagura eki eitsire, nibasheesha eshagama, nibacwekyereza amagara g'abantu, ngu babone kutunga amagoba g'obugobya.

Baanabi baayo basiigiriize ebisiika ahabw'abo bategyeki n'obudongo obutanogire, nibareeba eby'okworekwa ebitari by'amazima, nibabaragurira ebishuba, nibagira bati: Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba, haza ataine ki agambire.
Kandi abantu b'omuri egyo nsi baitsire kubi abantu, baabanyaga; baahata abooro n'abakyene, baita kubi abashuuhuuki bataine ki bakoreirwe.
Bwanyima naasehrura omuntu omuribo owaakuhunduuza orugo, akeemerera omu maisho gangye ahasheenyukire ahabw'ensi ngu ntagicwekyereza, kwonka yamburira.
Nikyo mbashukiireho ekiniga kyangye kingi, nkabamaraho n'omuriro gw'okuguubwa kubi kwangye, nkabazimuurira ebi baakozire, nkabibarunda aha mutwe; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, hakaba hariho abakazi babiri enyineemwe;
baaraayira omuri Misri, baaraaya bakiri bato: okwo niyo amabeere gaabo gaabaire gakorerwaho, amabeere g'obuhangare bwabo gakakwatwakwatwaho.
Amaziina gaabo, omukuru akaba ari Ohola, n'omurumuna ari Oholiba. Bwanyima baahinduka abangye, baazaara aboojo n'abaishiki. Ago maziina gaabo Ohola niwe Samaria, na Oholiba niwe Yerusaalemu.
Abaasiria bo bakaba bari abarwani, bajwaire ebijwaro bya bujwa, abategyeki n'abakuru b'engabo; boona bari abatsigazi abarikurigirwa nibagyendera aha mbaraasi.
Atyo yaaraaya nabo; boona bakaba bari entoore za Asiria. Kandi yaayesiisia ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, byona eby'omuntu weena ou yaabaire arigira.
Kandi tiyaareka bwamaraaya bwe obu yaagizire, okwiha obu yaabaire ari Misri; ahakuba omu buto bwe abashaija bakabyama nawe, baakorakora aha mabeere ge, baamukanyisaho obushambani bwabo.
Nikyo naamuheereireyo omu mikono ya nkunzi ze Abaasiria abu yaakunzire akarengyesereza.
Abo baamujweka busha, baakwata batabani be na bahara be; kandi we baamwitsa rurara. Kandi ku baaherize kumuha ebifubiro, yaahinduka eky'okucweraho enfumu omu bakazi.
Murumuna we Oholiba yaakireeba; kwonka yaamukiza okusiisikara omu kurigira n'omu kuraaya; n'obwamaraaya bwe bwakira obwa mukuru we.
Yaarigira Abaasiria, abategyeki, abakuru b'engabo, abarwani abajwaire eby'okurwanisa byona, n'abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi; abo boona bakaba bari abatsigazi abarikurigirwa.
Ntyo naareeba ku asiisirwe; batyo bombi baatoora omuhanda gumwe.
Kwonka we yaakanyisa obwamaraaya bwe, ahabw'okuba akareeba ebishushani by'abashaija ebiteirwe aha kisiika, ebishushani by'Abakaludaaya, ebiteirwe n'erangi erikutukura,
abeezirikire emyeko omu bwezirikiro bwabo, n'ebikwemba by'amabara aha mitwe yaabo, boona nibashusha abanyiginya b'Abababulooni, abaakomookire omu nsi ya Bukaludaaya.
Ku yaabireebire, ahonaaho yaabirigira, yaatuma entumwa Bukaludaaya.
Batyo Abababulooni baija, baamushanga aha kitanda kye ky'obwamaraaya, baamushiisha n'obushambani bwabo. Ku baaherize kumushiisha, omutima gwe gwabatamwa.
Ku yaagumiizemu naashambana butunu, yaayejweka busha ataine nshoni, naanye omutima gwangye gwamutamwa, gwamurugaho, nk'oku gwarugire ahari mukuru we.
Kwonka n'obu kiraabe kyabaire kityo, yaagumizamu naakanyisa obwamaraaya bwe, obu yaabaire akorera obwamaraaya bwe omuri Misri,
naarigira bashambane be, abu ebicweka byabo byabaire biri nk'eby'endogoya, n'ebirikubarugamu biri nk'eby'embaraasi.
Okwo nikwo waijukize obwamaraaya bw'omu buto bwawe, obu Abanyamisri baabaire bakwatakwata amabeere gaawe, nibamiga amabeere g'obuhangare bwawe.

aba Babulooni n'Abakaludaaya boona, Pekodi, Shoa na Koa, hamwe n'Abaasiria boona, abatsigazi abarikurigirwa, abategyeki n'abakuru b'engabo boona oku baingana, abatware n'abarwani, boona abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi.

Baryakuteera nibaruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, baine eby'okurwanisa n'ebigaari n'eihe rihango ry'amahanga, bakutengyere orugamba, baine engabo enkye n'empango n'enkofiira z'ebyoma, bakureetwe embaju zoona; bwanyima mbahe obushoboorozi, bakucwere emanja nk'oku emicwere yaabo eri.

Naanye ndyakureetaho ekiniga kyangye, abo bazigu bakurwanise bakwiniire ekiniga kingi, bakucweho enyindo n'amatu, n'abantu baawe abarihonokaho baitwe rurara. Baryakwata batabani baawe na bahara baawe, kandi abaawe abarihonokaho bamarweho omuriro.
Kandi baryakujuura ebijwaro byawe, batware amahunde gaawe amarungi.
Okwo nikwo ndimaraho obushambani bwawe n'obwamaraaya bwawe, obu waihire omu nsi ya Misri, ngu orekye kugaruka kuhanga Abanyamisri amaisho, n'obu kwakuba okubaijuka obundi.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, niinyija kukuhayo omu mikono y'abu orikwanga, abu waatamirwe okataana nabo;
nabo baryakurwanisa bakwiniire rwango, bakunyagye byona ebi waahendekyeire, bakutsigye ojwaire busha, ori entangaare, n'enjuuro y'obwamaraaya bwawe ereebwe butunu.
Obushambani bwawe n'obwamaraaya bwawe nibwo bwakureeteire ebyo byona, ahabw'okuba okaraaya n'amahanga, waayesiisisa ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa.
Okuratsire mukuru waawe; nikyo ndikwija kuteera ekikopo kye omu ngaro zaawe.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Oryanywera aha kikopo kya mukuru waawe,
Ekiraingwa kandi ekihango.
Oryashekyererwa, oteererwe enaku,
Ahabw'okuba kirimu bingi.
Oryaijura esindo n'obujune.
Ekikopo kya mukuru waawe Samaria
N'eky'okutiinisa kandi eky'okweshobera;
Oyemaanyure eishokye,
Kandi oyetaagataagure amabeere;
ahabw'okuba niinye naakigamba; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ahabw'okuunyebwa, okannaga enyima yaawe, irooko oyemere ebirugire omu bushambani bwawe n'obwamaraaya bwawe.

Ahabw'okuba bakashambana, kandi eshagama ei baaseesire eri aha ngaro zaabo; baashambana n'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, kandi abaana baabo b'aboojo baabarabya omu muriro, ngu ebyo bishushani bibarye.
Kandi ebindi ebi baanyitsize nibyo ebi. Eizooba niryo rimwe baashiisha Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera, kandi bakashiisha na sabato zangye.

Ahabw'okuba ku baaherize kwita abaana baabo nibabatambira ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, eryo izooba baataaha omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera, baaguhagara. Tiwaareeba! Ebyo nibyo baakoreire omu nju yangye.
Kandi bakatuma entumwa kweta abashaija kuruga hare; batyo baija. Ahabw'okwija kwabo waayoga, waasiiga amaisho gaawe erangi, waajwara amahunde,
waashutama aha kitebe ky'ekitiinisa n'emeeza etebeekanisiibwe omu maisho gaakyo, ei waataireho obubaane bwangye n'amajuta gangye,

Abantu baingi abataine ki beetaireho baaguma aha kigaaniiro bamushagatiire; haija abantu b'obutoosha hamwe n'abasinzi abarugire omu ihamba; baajweka abakazi enyerere aha mikono n'ebirunga birungi aha mitwe.
Bwanyima naagira nti: Abashaija ku baba nibaraaya nawe, obwo baba batashambaine?
Ahabw'okuba bakamuzaho, nk'oku baza ahari maraaya. Kandi okwo nikwo baagiire ahari Ohola na Oholiba kushambana nabo.
Kwonka abahikiriire baryabacwera orubanja ku bari abakazi enshambani, kandi abarikusheesha eshagama; ahakuba n'abakazi enshambani buzima, kandi eshagama ei baaseesire eri aha ngaro zaabo.
Ezo ngabo ziryabateera amabaare, zibaitse rurara, ziite batabani baabo na bahara baabo, kandi zootsye amaka gaabo.
Okwo nikwo ndimariraho kimwe obushambani omu nsi, abakazi boona bakakireeberaho, bakareka kushambana nkaimwe.
Kandi muryaturwa obushambani bwanyu, mwemere ekifubiro ky'ebibi byanyu by'okuramya ebishushani; bwanyima muryamanya ku ndi Mukama RUHANGA.
Mwana w'omuntu, handiika eiziina ry'eri izooba ryonka; ahakuba eri izooba omugabe wa Babulooni yaagota Yerusaalemu.
Cwera egyo nju engomi enfumu noogigira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Ta enyungu aha mahega, ogiteho gye,
Ogishukyemu amaizi,
Ogitemu entongo z'enyama,
Entongo nungi zoona, ez'ekivune ky'okuguru n'eky'omukono,
Ogiijuze amagufa marungi;
Otoorane omu busyo erikuhita ezindi,
Oteekyerane enku ahansi yaayo;
ogiteekye, ebire gye,
Amagufa agarimu gabone kusya.
ahakuba eshagama ei rwaseesire ekiri ahagati yaarwo; rukagisheesha aha rukiri oruriho busha; tiruragishukire hansi kugishwekaho eitaka.
Ahabw'okwenda kwimutsya ekiniga kyangye ngu mpoore enzigu, nkata eshagama ei rwaseesire aha rukiri oruriho busha, ngu erekye kushwekwa.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Orurembo orusheesha eshagama ruryakareeba! Ndyateekyera enku, ekikoomi kibe kihango.
Yongyera enku, otemu omuriro, oteekye gye enyama, omaremu amaizi gaayo, amagufa gasiriire;
bwanyima ogite aha makara erimu busha, eyotsye, omuringa gwayo gusiriire, oburofa oburimu bubone kuyaga, omukyereenyo guhwemu.
Nyeruhiize busha; omukyereenyo gwamwo omwingi tigurikumarwamu muriro.

Omukyereenyo gwarwo n'obushambani bwawe obufiire. Nkaabaire naakushemeize, kwonka okanga kushemezibwa oburofa bwawe; n'ahabw'ekyo torigira bu oshemeziibwe, okuhitsya obu ndikumariraho ekiniga kyangye.

Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naagamba; kiryaba kwo; kandi niinye ndikikora. Tindigaruka nyima, tindisaasira, n'obu kwakuba okwefuuza. Ndyakucwera orubanja nk'emitwarize yaawe n'ebi orikukora oku biri; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, reeba, naaza kukwihaho eki otuuzaho amaisho ahonaaho; kwonka otacura n'obu kwakuba okurira, kandi amarira gatakufukunkuka omumaisho.
Tsinda, kwonka otahurirwa; otacurira ofiire; yezingirire ekitambaara, ojware enkaito, otashweka aha minwa n'obu kwakuba okurya eby'okurya nk'eby'abari omu rufu.
Ntyo omu kasheeshe naagambira abantu, omu mwabazyo omukazi wangye yaafa. Ku bwaseesire, naatwaza nk'oku ndagiirwe.
Naanye nikwo kubagira nti: Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiinyizireho nikigira kiti:

Gambira enju ya Israeli oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyashiisha Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera, ogurikubareetera amaryo, mukeemanya ku mwine amaani, ogu amaisho gaanyu gashemerererwa, kandi ogutuura gubatwaire emitima. Kandi batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu abu mwatsigireho baryaitwa rurara.
Naimwe muryatwaza nk'oku ntwarize; timurishweka aha minwa, n'obu kwakuba okurya eby'okurya by'abari omu rufu;
ebitambaara biryabaguma aha mitwe, n'enkaito zibagume omu bigyere; timuricura n'obu kwakuba okurira, kureka muryahwa aha magufa ahabw'eby'okutahikiirira byanyu, buri muntu atonzye na mugyenzi we.
Okwo nikwo Ezekieli aribabeera eky'okureeberaho; oku atwarize kwona, nikwo naimwe muritwaza. Ebyo ku biriba byabaireho, muryamanya ku ndi Mukama RUHANGA.
eryo izooba nibwo abarihonokaho bariija kukubikira.
Ahari eryo izooba akanwa kaawe karyagamba n'abahonokireho, ogambe, orekye kugaruka kuba ekiteta. Okwo nikwo oribabeera eky'okureeberaho, kandi nabo baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho aha Baamoni, obahanuurire ebiribabaho,

obagire oti: Muhurire ekigambo kya Mukama RUHANGA. Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okugira oti: Otyo!, nooyesiima ahabw'Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera kushiishwa, n'ensi ya Israeli kuhinduka amatongo, n'enju ya Yuda kutwarwa omu bukwatwa,
nikyo ndikwija kubaheerayo omu mikono y'ab'oburugwa-izooba, bakabakubuura; kandi baryabateeramu ensiisira, babombekyemu amaka, barye ebijuma byanyu, banywe n'amate gaanyu.
Raaba ndyahagira amariisizo g'engamira, n'endembo z'Abaamoni nzigire eizaagiriro ry'amasyo; haza obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'okuteera omu ngaro nimwesiima, nimwemurika mwine okushemererwa ahabw'eitima ryona eri mwiniire ensi ya Israeli omu mitima yaanyu,

n'ahabw'ekyo reeba, nkubangiire omukono, kandi niinyija kukuhayo omu mikono y'amahanga kuba eminyago yaabo; bwanyima ndyakucwa omu mahanga, nkucwekyereze omu nsi, nkumareho; haza obwo nibwo orimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
nikyo ndiihiraho omwatano gw'ensi ya Moabu, okuruga aha ndembo zaagwo okuhika Besi-yeshimoosi, Baali-meoni na Kiryasaimu, ezirihaisa egyo nsi ekitiinisa.
Egyo nsi ndyagiha ab'oburugwa-izooba hamwe n'Abaamoni kuba eyaabo, erekye kwijukwa omu mahanga obundi;
kandi Moabu egyo ndyagiha ebifubiro. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ndyabangira Edomu omukono, ngimariremu kimwe abantu n'amatungo, mpagire amatongo, baitwe rurara okuruga Temani okuhika Dedani.

Ndyahooresa Edomu abantu bangye Israeli, bakore omuri Edomu nk'oku ndikwenda nibahikiiriza ekiniga kyangye n'okuguubwa kubi kwangye. Kandi baryamanya okuhoora enzigu kwangye; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, ndyabangira Abafilistia omukono, mmareho Abakeresi, kandi ncwekyereze abatwire aha nkungu z'enyanja abatsigaireho.
Ndyabahoora okuhoora kw'amaani, mbahanise ekiniga kingi. Haza obwo, ku ndibahoora ntyo, nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.

Mwana w'omuntu, ahabwa Tuuro okugamba ahari Yerusaalemu, neegira eti: Otyo nikyo kihena! Eirembo ry'amahanga risheenyukire, ryanyigukira; mbwenu, obu Yerusaalemu egizirwe amatongo, niinyija kutunga bingi;
nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Iwe Tuuro, reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe; niinyija kukuteeza amahanga maingi, nk'oku enyanja einamura ebingonzi byayo.
Garyasheenya engo za Tuuro ez'amabaare, gakumbagaze eminaara yaayo; eitaka ryayo ndyariharagata, etsigare eri orukiri kwonka.
Eryahinduka embuga y'okwanikaho obutimba ahagati y'enyanja; ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba; eryaba omunyago gw'amahanga,
na bahara baayo abariba bari omu ishwa baryaitwa rurara. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Bahara baawe abari omu ishwa aryabaitsa rurara, akwombekyeho eby'okutemberaho, akuteeze abaine engabo zikwataine ez'okukingira emitwe yaabo.
Engo zaawe z'amabaare aryazibyaraho ebiti by'okuzihiguza, n'eminaara yaawe agisheenyese empango.

Ahabw'embaraasi ze kuba nyingi ziryaimutsya omucuucu, gukushwekye; ku ariba naaraba omu marembo gaawe, nk'oku bataaha omu rurembo oru engo zaarwo zisheenyirwe, engo zaawe ziryatengyetsibwa endigito y'ab'aha mbaraasi n'ey'enziga z'ebigaari by'orugamba.
Emihanda yaawe yoona aryagiribatiiriza ebyara by'embaraasi ze; abantu baawe aryabaitsa rurara; kandi enyomyo zaawe z'amaani ziryagwa ahansi.

Obutungi bwawe baryabunyaga, n'eby'obushuubuzi byawe bibe eminyago; baryakumbagaza engo zaawe z'amabaare, bacwekyereze amaju gaawe agarikushemeza; kandi amabaare gaawe n'embaaho zaawe n'eitaka ryawe baraybinaga omu nyanja.
Ndyahunamya amaraka g'abarikweshongora ebyeshongoro byawe; n'enanga zaawe tizirihurirwa bundi.
Ndyakugira orukiri oruriho busha, obe embuga y'okwanikaho obutimba; kandi torigaruka kwombekwa bundi, ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Obwo nibwo abagabe boona ab'aha nyanja bariruga aha bitebe byabo, bakajuura bushuuti zaabo, n'ebijwaro byabo eby'amabara gacwereraine; baryajwara okutetema, bashutame ahansi nibatetema buri kaanya, nibakutangaarira.
Baryakucurira nibakugira bati:
Ai bambe, iwe orurembo orwarangainwe,
Orwabaire ruri rukuru aha nyanja,
Iwe n'abaabaire bakutwiremu,
Abaabaire batiinisa abatwire omu nsi yoona,
K'ocwekyereire okahwa omu nyanja!
Mbwenu ebirwa nibitetema
Aha izooba ry'okugwa kwawe;
Eego, ebirwa by'omu nyanja bihahaize omutima
Ahabw'okuhwaho kwawe.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ku ndikugira orurembo orusheenyirwe nk'endembo ezitakituurwamu bantu, naakurengyezaho amaizi g'enyanja, amaizi maingi gaakushweka,
obwo ndyakuroha Okuzimu hamwe n'abarikushuumayo, oshangyeyo aba ira, nkutuuze omu nsi yaayo, ngu nyentsya otarituurwamu, n'obu kwakuba okugira omwanya omu nsi y'abahuriire.
Ndyakwita kubi, nkumareho; torigaruka kubaho; kandi n'obu barikusherura bata, torigaruka kuboneka; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mbwenu, Mwana w'omuntu, hati curira Tuuro,
eri aha nyambukiro y'enyanja, omushuubuzi orikushuubura omu mahanga g'omu birwa bingi, noogigira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Iwe Tuuro, ogizire oti:
Ndi murungi, tiinyine kabara.
Emyatano yaawe eri ahagati y'enyanja;
Abombeki baawe bakahikiiriza oburungi bwawe;
Omu miberooshi y'omuri Seniiri;
Baiha omwereezi omuri Lebanooni,
Baagukubaijeramu omurongooti;
Niyo baakubaiziiremu engahi;
Embaho ezaariire omu meeri bakazibaija omu miteyashuuri
Erikuruga omu birwa bya Kitimu,
Bakazicwereranamu emiino y'enjojo.
Amatanga gaawe gakakorwa omuri bafuta ey'ebicwererane,
Eyaarugire Misri,
Ngu gabe orurango rwawe;
Emyenda ya bururu n'eya bujwa eyaarugire omu birwa bya Elisha,
Abatuuzi ba Sidoni na Aruvaada
Nibo baabaire bari abavugi b'amaato gaawe;
Abahangu ba Zeemeri abaabaire bari omuriiwe,
Nibo baabaire bari abahabuzi b'emeeri zaawe.
Abakuru ba Gebali n'abahangu baayo abaabaire batwire omuriiwe,
Nibo baabaire bari abahomeerezi b'emeeri zaawe;
Emeeri z'omu nyanja zoona n'abarimbi baazo
Bikaba bri omuriiwe nibihingisa eby'obushuubuzi byawe.

Abashaija ba Aruvaadi n'aba Heleki bakaba bari aha mutwe gw'orugo rwawe orwabaire rukwehinguriririize, n'aba Gamedi bari omu minaara yaawe; nabo bakaba bahanika engabo zaabo aha bisiika byawe, bahikiiriza oburungi bwawe.
Aba Yavani, Tubali na Mesheki bakaba bashuubura naiwe; bareeta abantu n'ebintu by'emiringa, babihingisa eby'obushuubuzi byawe.
Aba Besitogarama bareeta embaraasi, n'embaraasi z'engamba, n'enyumbu, bazihingisa eby'obushuubuzi byawe.
Aba Dedani bakaba bashuubura naiwe; obushuubuzi bw'omu birwa bingi bukaba buri omu bushoboorozi bwawe; bakaba bakureetera emiino y'enjojo n'embaaho z'emifunjo kubihingisa.

Aba Siria bakaba bashuubura naiwe ahabw'ebintu byawe kuba bingi munonga; eby'obushuubuzi byawe bakaba babihingisa simaragido, erangi ya bujwa, emyenda y'amabara agacwereraine, bafuta, korali na kalukedoni.
Aba Yuda n'ab'omu nsi ya Israeli bakaba bashuubura naiwe; eby'obushuubuzi byawe babihingisa engano, emizeituuni, emitiini, obwoki, amajuta n'emibazi y'okutamba obuhuta.
Aba Damasiko bakaba bashuubura naiwe ahabw'ebintu byawe kuba bingi munonga, n'obutungi bwawe kuba bwingi kandi obw'emiringo yoona;
eby'obushuubuzi byawe babihingisa viinyo ya Helebooni, ebyoya by'entaama ebirikwera, viinyo ya Uzali, ebyoma, kasiya na kaane.
Aba Dedani bakaba bahingisa naiwe emyenda y'amatandiiko g'aha mbaraasi.
Abaharabu n'abanyiginya ba Kedari boona nibo waabaire okunda kuguraho abaana b'entaama, empaya z'entaama, n'embuzi; ezo nizo baabaire bahingisa naiwe.
Abashuubuzi ba Sheeba na Raama bakaba bahsuubura naiwe; eby'obushuubuzi byawe bakaba babihingisa emigaju y'emiringo yoona n'obubaane bwona obw'obuguzi bwingi, n'ezaabu.
Aba Harani, Kaana, Edeni, Ashuri na Kilumaadi, bakaba bashuubura naiwe.
Abo bo bakaba bakureetera emyenda mirungi munonga, emyenda ya bururu n'ey'amabara gacwereraine, n'ebirago by'ehuuzi z'amabara ebikomesiibwe emigoye eyogosire; ebyo nibyo baabaire bakuguza.
Emeeri za Tarushiishi zikaba zibunzya ebintu byawe by'obushuubuzi. Otyo waatunga ebintu bingi, waagira ekitiinisa kingi ahagati y'enyanja.
Omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba gwakuhendagurira ahagati yaayo.
Abarimbi baawe, abahabuzi b'emeeri zaawe,
Abahomeerezi baazo, abashuubuzi b'ebintu byawe,
Engabo zaawe zoona eziri omuriiwe,
N'abantu baawe boona abakurimu,
Byona biryarohama ahagati y'enyanja
Aha izooba ry'okucwekyerezibwa kwawe.
Ensi yaawe eryatetemesibwa
Obwaku bw'okutaka kw'abahabuzi b'emeeri zaawe,
Barugye omu meeri zaabo, batemburukye.
Abarimbi n'abahabuzi b'emeeri boona
Baryayemerera aha nkungu,
Bakucurire nibaborooga munonga,
Beeshukye omucuucu omu mitwe,
Beekuringye omu iju rya kashenda,
Bamwe enkomborora ahabwawe,
Beezirikye ebiguniya,
Bakucurire baine obusaasi bwingi aha mutima,
Baine amaganya maingi.
Omu kucura kwabo baryatonzya munonga,
Bakuririre nibaigira bati:
N'oha oracwekyerereire ahagati y'enyanja nka Tuuro?
Okaba ohaazya amahanga maingi;
Otungisa abagabe b'omu nsi
Obutungi bwawe bwingi kandi eby'obushuubuzi byawe.
Ori ahagati y'enyanja;
Ebintu byawe by'obushuubuzi n'abarimbi baawe boona
Baarohama naiwe.
N'abagabe baabo boona baine obwoba bwingi,
Aha maisho gaabo hahinduriize.
Ofiire kubi; torigaruka kubaho ebiro byona.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, gambira omugabe wa Tuuro oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Ahabw'omutima gwawe kugira amaryo,
Okagira oti: Ndi ruhanga,
Nshutama aha kitebe kya Ruhanga Nyamuhanga
Ahagati y'enyanja;
Kwonka ori omuntu, tori Ruhanga,
N'obu oraabe noogira ngu oine obwengye nka Ruhanga,
Tihariho mubonano, ogu otarikumanya;
Obwengye bwawe n'okumanya kwawe
Bikakureetera okwetungisa,
Washanguruza ezaabu n'efeeza,
Waabita omu mabiikiro gaawe.
Ahabw'okugira obwengye bwingi omu kushuubura,
Okanyiise obutungi bwawe,
Omutima gwawe gwabwehimbisizamu;
Ahabw'okugira ngu oine obwengye nka Ruhanga,
B'omu mahanga agarikukiza agandi kutiinisa,
Bakasyorayo zaarurara zaabo,
Bakarwanisa oburungi bw'obwengye bwawe,
Bakashiisha ekitiinisa kyawe.
Baryakuroha omu Kiina,
Ofe orufu orw'abaitiirwe ahagati y'enyanja.
Ebyo oryaba nookigambira omu maisho g'abarikukwita,
Oti: Ndi ruhanga,
Haza omu maisho g'abarikukuhutaaza
Ori omuntu-buntu, otari Ruhanga?
Ofe orufu rw'abatashazirwe;
Ahakuba niinye naakigamba.
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, tongyeza omugabe wa Tuuro, oboroogye, noomugira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Iwe, okaba ori eky'okureeberaho ky'okuba ohikire,
Oijwire obwengye, ori murungi otaine kabara.
Ohunzirwe buri kabaare koona ak'obuguzi bwingi,
Saradio, topazi, arimaasi,
Berulo, shohamu, yasipi,
Safiro, samaragido, kabunkulo n'ezaabu;
Eby'okutamu obwo bubaare, n'ebisharwirwe byawe
Bikozirwe omu zaabu.
Aha izooba eri waazaariirweho,
Ebyo byona bikaba bitebeekanisiibwe.
Nkakutamu hamwe na kerubi omurinzi,
Owaashukirweho amajuta;
Okaba ori aha rushozi rwa Ruhanga orurikwera,
Noogyendagyenda ahagati y'amabaare g'omuriro.
Okwiha obu waahangwa,
Okaba otagira kamogo omu mitwarize yaawe,
Okuhitsya obu waareebirwemu okutahikiirira.
Omu bushuubuzi bwawe bwingi
Okaijuriramu eitima, waacumura;
Nikyo naakubingiire nk'ekintu kisiisikaire,
Nkakwiha aha rushozi rwa Ruhanga;
Kerubi ogwo omurungi akakubinga
omuri ago mabaare g'omuriro.
Omutima gwawe gukeehimbisa ahabw'oburungi bwawe;
Waashiisha obwengye bwawe ahabw'ekitiinisa kyawe.
Naakunaga ahansi,
Naakwanika omu maisho g'abagabe,
Ngu bakushamaarire.
Omu kutahikiirira kw'obushuubuzi bwawe,
Okajumisa emyanya yaawe erikwera;
Nikyo naihiire omuriro omuriiwe, gukakwotsya,
Nkakucwera eiju aha nsi
Omu maisho g'abaakureebire boona.
Nibakutangaarira;
Ofiire kubi: torigaruka kubaho ebiro byona.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe ahari Sidoni, ogihanuurire ebirigibaho, noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Iwe Sidoni, reeba naaba omuzigu waawe;
Niinyija kworeka ekitiinisa kyangye omuriiwe.
N'okugyorekamu okwera kwangye,
Obwo baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA;
Nsheeshe eshagama omu nguuto zaayo;
Abariitwa baryagwa ahagati yaayo,
Nibaitwa rurara erikugirwansia embaju zoona;
Obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.

Baryagituuramu buhooro, bagyombekyemu amaju, bahingyemu emisiri y'emizaabibu. Ku ndita ebifubiro aha bantu abarikubagaya, abariba babeehinguririize, bo baryaguma bari buhooro. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi Mukama RUHANGA waabo.
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe ahari Faraho omugabe wa Misri, omuhanuurire ebirimubaho, we na Misri yoona,
noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe,
Iwe Faraho omugabe wa Misri,
Ekijoka ekituura omu migyera yaayo,
Ekirikugira kiti: Omugyera Nailo n'ogwangye,
Kandi niinye naaguhangire.
Ndeetera eby'enyanja by'omu migyera yaawe kukwatira aha ngamba zaawe,
Nkukuure omu mingyera yaawe
Hamwe n'eby'enyanja byamwo byona,
Ebiriba bikwatiire aha ngamba zaawe.
Iwe n'eby'enyanja by'omu migyera yaawe byona,
Ogwe omu bwerere, obure ow'okukurundarunda,
N'obu yaakuba ow'okukuziika;
Ahabw'okuba nkakuhayo kuba eby'okurya
By'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa n'amahungu g'omu mwanya.
ku baakukwatsireho, waashatuka, waataagura amabega gaabo goona; kandi ku baakwegamiire, waahendeka, waareetera enyugunyu zaabo zoona kutetema;
nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, ndyakuteeza rurara, nkumaremu abantu n'amatungo;
kandi ensi ya Misri yoona eryaba amatongo, ebe eihamba; obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ahabw'okugira oti: Omugyera Nailo n'ogwangye, niinye naaguhangire,
n'ahabw'ekyo reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe; n'ensi ya Misri ndyagihindurira kimwe amatongo, ngigire eihamba, okuruga ahari Migidooli okuhika Syene, n'okuhika aha mwatano gwa Esiopia.
Terirabwamu kigyere ky'omuntu, n'obu kyakuba eky'enyamaishwa; eryamara emyaka makumi ana etatwirwemu.

Kandi egyo nsi ya Misri ndyagigira amatongo ahagati y'ezindi nsi ezaahindukire amatongo; n'endembo zaayo zimare emyaka makumi ana ziri amatongo omu zaacwekyerereziibwe. Kandi ndyataataanisiza Abanyamisri omu mahanga, mbanaganagye omu nsi zaago.
kandi ndyagarura Abanyamiri abatwairwe bari enkwatwa, mbareete omu nsi Patiroosi, ensi ei baakomookiremu; okwo niyo barihindukira obugabe obutaine kitiinisa.
Kandi baryakira obundi bugabe bwona okutagira kitiinisa; tiburigaruka kutegyeka gandi mahanga.
Tiburigaruka kuba bwesigye bw'enju ya Israeli, okwijutsya ekicumuro kyabo ky'omu bunaku obu baabaire babahindukira ngu babahe emikono. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi Mukama RUHANGA.

Mwana w'omuntu, Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni akakoresa eihe rye n'amaani kurwanisa Tuuro, omutwe gwa buri muntu gwaba oruhara, n'amabega gaabo gaahonoka; kwonka taine ki iyaihireyo, we n'eihe rye, ahabw'okufa kubi kwe obu yaagiteera.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, ensi ya Misri ndyagiha Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni, atware abantu baayo, aginyagye, kandi ebi arinyaga bibe ebihembo by'engabo ze.
Mmuhaire ensi ya Misri kuba ebihembo by'ebi yaahendekyeire, ahabw'okuba niinye baakoreire; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, hanuura ogire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Muboroogye nimugira muti:
Eshi eryo izooba riryagwerwa akagwe!
Ahabw'okuba eryo izooba riri haihi;
Eizooba rya MUKAMA riri haihi;
Riryaba eizooba ry'ekibunda,
Bube obunaku bw'ekifubiro ky'amahanga.
Kandi obusaasi buryaba omuri Esiopia,
Abaitsirwe ku barigwa omuri Misri,
Obutungi bwayo bwanyagwa,
N'emisingi yaayo yaasheenywa.
Esiopia, Puuti, Luudi, Buharabu yoona, Libya, n'abantu b'omuri egyo nsi abariba baragaine endagaano y'okukwatanisa, baryaitirwa hamwe rurara.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Abantu abarikuhwera Misri baryagwa,
Kandi amaani agu erikwehimbisizaho garyaikaikana;
Abantu baayo baryaitwa rurara
Okuruga Migidooli okuhika Syene;
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ahagati y'ezindi nsi ezaahindwirwe amatongo,
N'endembo zaayo ziryaba ahagati y'ezaacwekyereziibwe.
Ku ndiba naatwekire omuriro omuri Misri,
N'abahwezi baayo boona baahendekire,
Obwo baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Eryo izooba entumwa z'amaguru ziryandugaho, zize kutiinisa Abanyesiopia abataine ki beetaireho, bagire obusaasi aha izooba eri Misri eritungiraho ekifubiro kandi reeba, eryo izooba ryaza kwija.
Ndyamaraho obutungi bwa Misri,
Bumarweho Nebukadeneeza omugabe wa Babulooni.
Ezirikukiza amahanga goona kutiinisa,
Ziryahuruzibwa kucwekyereza ensi,
Zisyoreyo zaarurara zaazo kurwanisa Misri,
N'okugiijuza emitumbi.
Egyo nsi ngiguze abantu ababi;
Kandi ndyareeta abanyamahanga
Bagihindure amatongo n'ebigirimu byona.
Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba.
Ndyacwekyereza ebishushani ebirikuramibwa,
Mmareho ebishushani omuri Noofu;
Omuri Misri tiharigaruka kubamu mugabe,
Ntyo ngireetemu okutiina.
Zoani ngitwekyemu omuriro,
Na Tebesi ngihe ebifubiro.
Kandi ndyashuka ekiniga kyangye ahari Siini,
Ekigo kya Misri ekigumire,
N'enyanja y'abantu b'omuri Tebesi mbamareho.
Ndyatweka omuriro omuri Misri;
Siini eryagira obusaasi bwingi,
Tebesi baryagisheenya bagitaahemu,
Engo zaayo zoona zikumbagazibwe.
Abatsigazi b'omuri Aveeni na Pibeseeti baryaitwa rurara,
N'abakzi baamwo batwarwe bari enkwatwa.
N'amaani g'amaryo gaayo gaahweraho kimwe,
Omushana guryahinduka omwirima,
Eshwekwe ebicu,
N'abaishiki baayo batwarwe bari enkwatwa.
Okwo nikwo ndiha Misri ebifubiro;
Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Mwana w'omuntu, mpenzire omukono gwa Faraho omugabe wa Misri; kandi tigukabungirwe n'obu kwakuba okugushemba kugutambira, ngu gubone kugira amaani g'okukwata rurara.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Reeba, naaba omuzigu wa Faraho; kandi ndyamuhenda emikono yombi, oguhuriire n'ogwahendekire, mmunagise rurara ei akwaitse.
Ndyataataanisiza Abanyamisri omu mahanga, mbanaganagye omu nsi zaago.
Ndyaha emikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni amaani, mmute rurara yangye omu ngaro; kwonka Faraho we ndyamuhenda emikono, atsindire omu maisho ge, nk'ohutaire obuhuta obw'okumwita.

Emikono y'omugabe wa Babulooni ndyagihamya, kwonka eya Faraho eryagwa; aho niho barimanyira ku ndi MUKAMA. Ku ndikwatsa omugabe wa Babulooni rurara yangye, aryabangira ensi ya Misri omukono kugirwanisa;
ndyataataanisiza Abanyamisri omu mahanga, mbanaganagye omu nsi zaago. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Mwana w'omuntu, gambira Faraho omugabe wa Misri n'enyanja ye y'abantu, omugire oti:
Omu bukuru bwawe nooshushana n'oha?
Reeba, ninkushushanisa n'omwereezi gw'omuri Lebanooni,
Ogwine amataagi marungi n'ekicuucu kihango,
Omuraingwa munonga,
Ogu omutwe gwagwo guhikire omu bicu.
Amaizi maingi gaagukuza, gwanyeeta;
Emigyera yaagwo yaaguma neeguhimintika
Embaju zoona ahu gwabairwe,
Gwahabura emikura yaagwo
Okwitirirwa emiti y'omu kibira yoona.
Okukira emiti y'omu kibira yoona,
Amataagi gaagwo gakakura, gakahanguha,
N'amakye gakagaara,
Gakakuzibwa amaizi maingi agu gwanyweire.
Gaayarika omu mataagi gaagwo,
Enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa zoona
Zaaguma nizizaarira ahansi y'ago mataagi;
N'amahanga makuru goona gaatuura omu kicuucu kyagwo.
Okwo nikwo gwabaire murungi omu buhango bwagwo
N'omu buraingwa bw'amataagi gaagwo;
Ahabw'okuba gukaba gutsimbire emizi okuzimu omu maizi maingi.
Terabaasize kugushereka,
N'emiberooshi ekaba etarikwingana n'amataagi gaagwo,
Emyalamooni ekaba eri busha
Omu kugigyeragyeranisa n'otutaagi twagwo;
Omu kibanja kya Ruhanga hakaba hatarimu muti
Ogwine oburungi nk'obw'ogwo.
Nkagugira murungi ahabw'amataagi gaagwo maingi munonga,
Kyareetera emiti y'omuri Edeni omu kibanja kya Ruhanga
Kugugirira eihari.
ndyaguhayo omu mukono gw'omunyaihanga ow'amaani, agugire nk'oku arikwenda, ahakuba nkagubinga ningutura obubi bwagwo.

Abanyamahanga agarikukira agandi okutiinisa baryagutema, bagutsigyeho; amataagi gaagwo garyagwa aha bibungo n'omu mpanga zoona, kandi amahango garyagwa omu mikura y'amaizi yoona ey'omu nsi, gagume gahendekire, n'amahanga goona ag'omu nsi garyaruga omu kicuucu kyagwo, gagutsigyeho.
Amahungu g'omu mwanya goona garyagutuuramu ahu gwagwire, n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa zoona zituure omu mataagi gaagwo.

Ebyo byona biryabaho ngu hatarigira emiti yoona eri aha rubaju rw'amaizi, eyaanyeeta ekahika ahaiguru, emitwe yaayo ekahika omu bicu; kandi ngu hatarigira omuti gwona, ogunywa amaizi, ogwaingana gutyo oburaingwa; ahabw'okuba yoona ehairweyo kufa, okushuuma Okuzimu owa Nyamuteza, n'okushangayo abantu abafa bakashuuma omu Kiina.

Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Aha izooba eri gwashuumiireho Okuzimu, nkareetera amaizi g'enyanja kugucurira, naazibira emigyera yaayo kugyenda, naacungira amaizi maingi; naareetera Lebanooni kugucurira, n'emiti yoona ey'omu ishwa kuhwa amaani ahabwagwo.

Ku naagunagire Okuzimu hamwe n'abarikushuuma omu Kiina, naareetera amahanga kutetema ahabw'okuhurira omutsindo gw'okugwa kwagwo. N'ahabw'ekyo emiti yoona ey'omuri Edeni, eyaatoorainwe kandi erikukira oburungi omuri Lebanooni, yaahuumurizibwa ahu yaabaire eri Okuzimu owa Nyamuteza.
Nayo yaagyenda nagwo Okuzimu, yaashangayo abaitsirwe rurara; eego n'abaabaire batwire omu kicuucu kyagwo baahwerekyerera.

Omu miti y'omuri Edeni ni muti ki ogurikwinganisa naiwe ekitiinisa n'obukuru? Kwonka oryagarurwa ahansi hamwe n'emiti y'omuri Edeni, ohikye Okuzimu owa Nyamuteza, obyame ahagati y'abatashazirwe hamwe n'abaitsirwe rurara.
Ogwo muti ni Faraho n'enyanja y'abantu be boona; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Mwana w'omuntu, tongyeza Faraho omugabe wa Misri, oboroogye, noomugira oti:
Nooyeteekateekaho ngu ori omugunju gw'entare omu mahanga,
Kwonka ori nk'ekijoka ekiri omu nyanja;
Otimbiire okuzimu y'amaizi g'emigyera yaawe,
Waatabangura amaizi n'ebigyere byawe,
Kandi n'emigyera yaago waagishiisha.
Ndyakurengyezaho akatimba kangye,
Ntume eihe ry'amahanga maingi,
Gakukurure, gakwiheyo ori omu katimba kangye.
Nkunaganagye omu bwerere,
Ndeetere amahungu goona ag'omu mwanya kukugwaho,
N'enyamaishwa z'omu nsi yoona nzikugaburire, zi bwegabwegye.
N'omutumbi gwawe ngwijuze empanga.
Ndyajengajenzya ensi n'eshagama yaawe erikusheesheka,
Ehikye na'aha nshozi,
Oijure n'emigyera.
Enyonyoozi zaaryo nziraaze,
Eizooba ndishwekye ekicu,
N'okwezi kurekye kujwa.
N'ensi yaawe ngishwekye omwirima;
Nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ku ndikutwara omu mahanga ori enkwatwa, naakuhitsya omu nsi ezi otakamanyaga, ndyahahaaza emitima y'amahanga maingi.

Ku nditigitira rurara yangye omu maisho gaabo, ndyareetera amahanga maingi kukushamaarira, n'abagabe baago kutetema ahabwawe. Aha izooba ry'okugwa kwawe baryatetema buri kaanya, buri muntu naatetemera amagara ge.
Ahabw'okuba oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Rurara y'omugabe wa Babulooni eryakuhikaho.
Ndyareetera enyanja yaawe y'abantu kwitwa zaarurara z'amamanzi agarikukira agandi goona omu mahanga kutiinisa.
Amaryo ga Misri baryagacwa busha,
N'enyanja y'abantu baamwo boona eryacwekyerezibwa.
Agari aha rubaju rw'amaizi maingi;
Ekigyere ky'omuntu weena tikirigaruka kugatabangura,
N'obu kyakuba ekyara ky'ekitungirwe kyona.
Nkareetera emigyera yaayo kuhimintika nk'amajuta;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Yaamarwamu ebiijwiremu byona,
N'abagirwiremu boona baabacwekyereza,
Obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Okwo nikwo kutonzya oku baritonzya; abaishiki b'amahanga nikwo baritonzya, nibatongyeza Misri n'enyanja y'abantu baayo boona; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Mwana w'omuntu, curira enyanja y'abantu ba Misri, obanagye Okuzimu owa Nyamuteza, bo n'abaishiki b'amahanga ag'ekitiinisa, bashangyeyo abashuuma omu Kiina, noogira oti:
Shuuma, obyame n'abatashazirwe.
Baryagwa ahagati y'abaitsirwe rurara, kandi enyanja y'abantu be boona eryabyama nawe.
Ahagati Okuzimu niho abategyeki b'amaani baribagambiraho baine abahwezi baabo, nibagira bati: Abatashazirwe bashuumireyo, niyo babyami batarikuteeza, baitsirwe rurara.
Okwo niyo Asiria eri, n'engabo zaayo zoona, eyehinguririziibwe ebituuro byayo, abo boona baitsirwe rurara, zaabagwisaho;
abu ebituuro byabo biri aha muheru gw'Ekiina, n'engabo zaayo zikiikiize ekituuro kyayo; boona baitsirwe, baitwe rurara.

Bamwariire ekitabo ahagati y'abaitsirwe hamwe n'enyanja y'abantu baayo boona, abu ebituuro byayo bigyehinguririize, abo boona n'abatashazirwe abaitsirwe rurara; ahabw'okuba okutiinisa kwabo kukabuga omu nsi y'abahuriire, kandi baayemera enshoni zaabo hamwe n'abashuuma omu Kiina, baateebwa ahagati y'abaitsirwe.

Kandi tibabyami n'amamanzi ga ira agaagwire, gakashuuma Okuzimu n'eby'okurwanisa byago by'orugamba, gakeeshegura zaarurara zaago, n'engabo zaago zikatungamira amagufa gaago; ahabw'okuba okutiinisa kwago kukaba kuri omu nsi y'abahuriire.
Nikwo naimwe murihendeka, mukabyama n'abatashazirwe abaitsirwe rurara.
ahabw'okuba akabuzya okutiina omu nsi y'abahuriire; n'ahabw'ekyo aryabyama omu batashazirwe hamwe n'abaitsirwe rurara, we n'enyanja y'abantu be boona; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, gambira abantu baawe, obagire oti: Ku ndireeta rurara omu nsi, abantu b'egyo nsi baayeihamu omuntu, baamugira omurinzi waabo;
ku arireeba rurara neija omu nsi, yaateera enzamba, yaagambira abantu;
obwo omuntu weena ku arihurira eiraka ry'enzamba, ataayeta hari okwo kubuura, rurara yaija, yaamwita, eshagama ye niwe eribarirwa;
ahakuba akahurira eiraka ry'enzamba, tiyaaryetaho; eshagama ye eryamubarirwa. Ahabw'okuba kuri yaaryetaireho, akaajunire amagara ge.

Kwonka omurinzi, ku arireeba rurara neija, ataateera nzamba kugambira abantu, rurara yaija, yaabaitamu omuntu, omuntu ogwo aryaitirwa omu by'okushiisha bye; kwonka eshagama ye ndyagibuuza ogwo murinzi.

Ku ndigira omubi nti: Iwe mubi 'we, buzimazima oryafa, naiwe otaagamba, okahana ogwo mubi ngu arekye omuhanda gwe omubi, omubi ogwo aryafeera omu by'okushiisha bye, kwonka eshagama ye niiwe ndigibuuza.
Kwonka ku orihana omubi ngu arekye omuhanda gwe omubi, yaayanga kugureka, aryafeera omu by'okushiisha bye, kwonka iwe oryaba okirize amagara gaawe.

Bagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Niinyerahira, tinshemerererwa kufa kw'omubi, kureka omubi okureka omuhanda gwe, akaba ohuriire; muhindukye, muhindukye murekye emihanda yaanyu emibi. Mbwenu nimwendera ki kufa, imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe?

Kandi iwe, Mwana w'omuntu, gambira abantu baawe oti: Ohikiriire, ku arishiisha, okuhikiirira kwe tikurimukiza; kandi omubi, ku arihinduka yaareka obubi bwe, obwo bubi bwe buryaba butakimwita; kandi ohikiriire, ku arishiisha, taribaasa kubaisibwaho okuhikiirira kwe.

N'obu naakugambira ohikiriire nti: Buzimazima oryaba ohuriire, kwonka ku aryesiga okuhikiirira kwe, yaakora eby'okushiisha, tihariho na kimwe omu by'okuhikiirira bye ekiriijukwa; kureka aryafeera omu by'okushiisha bye ebi akozire.
Kandi ekindi, n'obu naakugambira omubi nti: Buzimazima oryafa, kwonka ku arihinduka, yaareka ekibi kye, yaakora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire,
ogwo muntu yaagarura eki akwatiriziibwe, kandi yaagaruraho eki anyagire, yaagyendera omu biragiro ebirikuhaisa amagara, ataakora by'okushiisha, buzimazima aryagumaho, tarifa.
Tihariho kibi na kimw eomu bi yaakozire ekirimwijukwaho; ahakuba akozire eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire, buzimazima aryagumaho.
Ohikiriire ku arihinduka, yaareka okuhikiirira kwe, yaakora eky'okushiisha, aryafa abizire.
Kandi omubi ku arihinduka, yaareka obubi bwe, yaakora eby'ebiragiro kandi ebihikire, biryamubaisaho.
Kwonka nimugira muti: Emitwarize ya MUKAMA tehikire. Imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe, ndyabacwera orubanja, buri muntu nk'oku emitwarize ye eri.

Omukono gwa MUKAMA gukaba guraire guunyizireho omu mwabazyo, ogwo mushaija ocwire atakaizire; kandi MUKAMA akaba yaayashamize akanwa kangye, obu ogwo mushaija yampikaho omu kasheeshe; ntyo naagamba, tinaaguma ndi ekiteta.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, abatwire omu myanya y'omu nsi ya Israeli eyaatsigirweho batuura nibagira bati: Abrahamu akaba ari omuntu omwe wenka, kwonka yaakubuura ensi; mbwenu itwe turi baingi; buzimazima egi nsi tugihairwe kuba eyaitu.

N'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Murya enyama n'eshagama, mwimukiza amaisho gaanyu ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, kandi musheesha eshagama. Mbwenu ebyo muryakubuura egyo nsi?
Nimwesiga rurara, mukora ebihagaro, kandi buri muntu ashiisha muka mutaahi we. Mbwenu ebyo muryakubuura egyo nsi?

Okwo nikwo oraabagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Niinyerahira, buzimazima abatwire omuri egyo myanya eyaatsigirweho baryaitwa rurara; ori omu ishwa ndyamurekurira enyamaishwa, zimutaanyaguze, n'abari omu bigo bigumire n'omu maaya baitwe orufu.
Kandi ensi ndyagihindura amatongo, ebe eihamba, amaani g'amaryo gaayo gahwereho kimwe; n'ebibungo bya Israeli bibeere kimwe amatongo, harekye kugira owaarabamu.
Ku ndiheza kuhindura ensi amatongo, yaaba eihamba nimbatura ebihagaro byabo byona ebi baakozire, nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.

Naiwe Mwana w'omuntu, abantu baawe abarikukugambaho aha rubaju rw'engo n'aha miryango y'amaju, nibagambirana buri muntu na mwene ishe, nibagira bati: Nimwije tuhurire oku ekigambo kiri ekirikuruga omu kanwa ka MUKAMA.

Batyo bakwijaho nk'oku abantu baija, bashutama omu maisho gaawe nk'abantu bangye, bahurira ebi orikugamba, kwonka batarikwija kubikora; ahabw'okuba booreka okukunda kwingi n'eminwa yaabo, kwonka emitima yaabo eraramiire amagoba gaabo.
Kandi reeba, iwe aharibo ori nk'orikweshongora ekyeshongoro kirungi n'eiraka rirungi naateera gye enanga; ahabw'okuba nibahurira ebi orikugamba, kwonka batarikwija kubikora.
Ebyo ku biriija, kandi kwo biryaija, obwo nibwo barimanya ku nabi abaire abarimu.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, hanuura ebiriba aha bariisa ba Israeli; obahanuurire noobagira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira abariisa ba Israeli, naagira ati: Imwe bariisa ba Israeli 'mwe, abarikweriisa mwenka, omuriisa tashemereire kuriisa entaama?
Nimurya ebishaju, mujwara eby'ebyoya, mubaaga ezigomokire, haza mutarikuziriisa.
Ezitaine maani timurikuzigaruramu maani; ezirwaire timurikuzitambira; ezihendekire timurikuzibunga; ezirazire timurikuzitaaruura; ezibuzire timurikuzisherura, kureka nimuzitegyekyesa amaani n'omwaga.
Nikyo zaataataaniire, ahabw'okubura omuriisa, zikaba ez'okuriibwa enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa.
Entaama zikataataana, zaazengyerera omu nshozi zoona n'omu bibungo biraingwa byona; entaama zangye zikataataanira omu nsi yoona, zaabura ow'okuzisherura, n'obu yaakuba ow'okuzibuuririza.
N'ahabw'ekyo imwe bariisa 'mwe, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.

Mukama RUHANGA naayerahira naagira ati: Nimumanya ku entaama zangye zibaire eky'okwitwa, kandi zikaba ez'okuriibwa enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa ahabw'okutagira muriisa, n'abariisa kwanga kuzisherura, kureka bakaba ab'okweriisa bonka batariise ntaama zangye;
n'ahabw'ekyo, imwe bariisa 'mwe, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.

Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, naaba omuzigu w'abariisa; ndyababuuza entaama zangye, mbacwe aha kuziriisa; kandi abo bariisa tibarigaruka kweriisa. Ndyaiha entaama zangye omu kanwa kaabo, zirekye kugaruka kuba eby'okurya byabo.

Nk'oku omuriisa ashanga zimwe aha ntaama ze zitaataine, akazisherura kuzigarura omu busyo, naanye nikwo ndisherura entaama zangye, nkaziiha ei zaataataaniire yoona aha izooba ry'ekibunda n'omwirima ndindindi.
Kandi ndyazireeta ninziiha omu mahanga, nzitaaruure omu nsi zoona, nzigarure omu nsi yaazo, nziriisize omu nshozi za Israeli, aha mbaju z'emigyera n'omu myanya yoona ey'omu nsi etwirwemu abantu.
Ndyaziriisiza omu mariisizo marungi, amariisizo gaazo gabe aha bibungo biraingwa bya Israeli; okwo omu mariisizo marungi niyo ziribyama, zikariira omu mariisizo ga Israeli ag'obunyaatsi bwingi.
Nyowe nyenka niinye ndiba omuriisa w'entaama zangye,

nkazizaagiza; ndyasherura ezibuzire, ngarure ezirazire, mbungye ezihendekire; ezitaine maani, nzigagaruremu, ezigomokire n'ez'amaani nzirinde; kandi zoona ndyaziriisa omu bwinganisa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Nimugira ngu n'ekintu kikye, imwe kuheza kurya obunyaatsi bw'omu mariisizo marungi, haza mukaribatiirira obwatsigaraho, n'okunywa amaizi marungi, haza mukatabangura n'ebigyere byanyu agaatsigaraho?
Entaama zangye zishemereire kurya obunyaatsi obu muribaririire, kandi zikanywa amaizi agu mutabangwire?
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikubagirira ati: Reeba, nyowe, nyowe nyenka, ndyacwa orubanja rw'entaama ezigomokire n'ezihururukire.
Mutsikanisa embaju n'amabega, ezitaine maani muzicumitisa amahembe, okuhitsya obu muzitaataanisa zikaza hare;
nikyo ndijunira obusyo bwangye, butagarukye kuba eky'okwitwa, nkacwa orubanja rw'entaama na ngyenzi zaazo.
Bwanyima ndyaziteeraho omuriisa omwe, omwiru wangye Daudi aziriise; niwe ariziriisa, akaba omuriisa waazo.
Kandi nyowe MUKAMA ndyaba Ruhanga waazo, n'omwiru wangye Daudi abe omugabe omurizo. Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba.
Ezo ntaama zangye n'emyanya eyehinguririize orushozi rwangye byona, ndyabihindura ebirikuhaisa omugisha, ngwise enjura omu bunaku bwayo, ebe enjura y'omugisha.

Kandi ebiti by'omu ishwa biryayera ebijuma byabyo, n'eitaka ryeze emyaka yaaryo; zigume omu nsi yaazo ziri buhooro; kandi ku ndihenda omugamba gw'obuhuuku bwazo, naazijuna ninziiha omu mikono y'abarikuzigira abahuuku, obwo nibwo zirimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Tizirigaruka kuba minyago y'amahanga, nari kuriibwa enyamaishwa z'omu ihamba; kureka ziryaguma ziri buhooro, kandi tihaine orizitiinisa.
Ndyazimereza obunyaatsi oburikutangaaza, zirekye kugaruka kwitirwa enjara omuri egyo nsi, n'obu kwakuba okujumwa abanyamahanga.
Kandi ziryamanya ku nyowe Mukama RUHANGA waazo ndi hamwe nazo, kandi zo, emju ya Israeli, ku nibo bantu bangye; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba.
Naimwe muri entaama zangye, entaama z'omu iriisizo ryangye, naanye ndi Ruhanga waanyu; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe aha rushozi Seiri, oruhanuurire ebirirubaho,
noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Iwe orushozi Seiri, reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe, kandi naaza kukubangira omukono, nkuhindure amatongo, obe eihamba.
Endembo zaawe ndyazihindura amahamba, iwe ohindukye amatongo, omanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ahabw'okugira enzigu etarihwa, okahayo Abaisraeli kwitwa rurara omu biro by'enaku zaabo, n'omu bunaku bw'okufubirwa kwabo kw'aha muheru,
n'ahabw'ekyo niinyerahira, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira, ndyakuteekateekyera okujwisibwa eshagama, kandi eryakuhiiga ahabw'okusingwa orubaja rw'eshagama, nikyo erikuhiigira.
Ndyahindura orushozi Seiri eihamba, rube amatongo, ndumaremu boona abarikurwijamu n'abarikururugamu.
Orushozi rwawe ndyarwijuza emitumbi, abarikwitwa rurara bagwe omu bubungo byawe n'omu mpanga zaawe n'omu binonko byawe byona.
Ndyakuhindura amatongo g'ebiro byona, n'endembo zaawe tizirituurwamu. Haza obwo nibwo orimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.

nikyo nyowe MUKAMA ndikwerahirira ningira nti: Ndyakutwaza nk'ekiniga n'eihari ebi waayorekire oku biri, ninkutura rwango ei waabagiriire, kandi ndyayemanyisa omuriimwe omu bunaku obu ndibacwereramu emanja.
Ekirirugamu oryamanya ku nyowe MUKAMA naahuriire ebijumo byawe byona, ebi waajumire ebibungo bya Israeli noogira oti: Bihindwirwe amatongo, byatuheebwa kubirya.
Kandi mukanyekuzaho, orurimi rwanyu rwankanyisaho ebigambo, naabihurira.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ndyakuhindura amatongo, ensi yoona ebone kwesiima.

Nk'oku waayesiimire ahabw'obuhunguzi bw'enju ya Israeli kuba amatongo, naiwe nikwo ndikugira, okaba amatongo. Iwe rushozi Seiri na Edomu yoona ahu erikugarukira, muryaba amatongo. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Mbwenu, Mwana w'omuntu, hanuurira ebibungo bya Israeli noobigira oti: Imwe bibungo bya Israeli 'mwe, nimuhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugmaba naagira ati: Ahabw'omuzigu kukugambaho ati: Otyo, nikyo kihena!, kandi ati: Ebibungo byabo bya ira tubikubwire, byaba ebyaitu;

n'ahabw'ekyo hanuura noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahakuba, eego, bakuhindwire amatongo, baakusingyera nibakuturuka embaju zoona, mwahinduka ensi erikukubuurwa agandi mahanga agaatsigaireho, mwaba ekigaaniiro ky'okugambwaho kubi abantu,

n'ahabw'ekyo, imwe bibungo bya Israeli 'mwe, muhurire ekigambo kya Mukama RUHANGA. Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira enshozi, ebibungo, ebinonko n'empanga, amatongo n'amahamba, n'endembo ezihweiremu abantu, zikahinduka eminyago n'eky'okushekyererwa amahanga agatsigaireho agabyehinguririize, naagira ati:

Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Ngambire n'eihato eririkwaka nk'omuriro, nimpana amahanga agatsigaireho na Edomu yoona, abeehaire ensi yangye kuba eyaabo, baine okwesiima kwingi munonga omu mitima, n'okugaya kwingi, ahabw'okugikubuura n'okuginyaga.

N'ahabw'ekyo ohanuure ebiriba aha nsi ya Israeli, ogambire enshozi, ebibungo, ebinonko, n'empanga oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ningambisa ekiniga n'eihato, ningira nti: Ahabw'okwemera kuhemurwa amahanga,
nikyo ndikwerahirira nti: Buzimazima amahanga agabeehinguririize nago garyahemurwa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kwonka imwe bibungo bya Israeli 'mwe, muryatooka amataagi, mwanire abantu bangye Israeli ebijuma, ahabw'okuba bari haihi kugaruka.
Ahakuba reeba, ndi aha rubaju rwanyu, niinyija kubagarukira, mubone kuhingwa n'okubibwamu.
Ndyabakanyisamu abantu, ab'enju ya Israeli yoona; endembo ziryatuurwamu, n'amatongo gagarukye gombekwemu;

ndyabakanyisamu abantu n'amatungo, nabyo bizaare, bikanye; kandi ndyabareetera kutuurwamu nk'omu biro byanyu ebya ira, mbagire gye okukira oku naabagizire omu kubanza. Haza obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Buzimazima ndyareka abantu bangye Abaisraeli babagyendagyendeho; baryabakubuura, mube obuhunguzi bwabo, kandi timurigaruka kubaitira baana obundi.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Ahabw'abantu kubagira ngu muri ebibungo ebirikwita abantu, kandi eihanga ryanyu mukarimaramu abaana,
nikyo mutarigarukira kwita bantu bundi, omu ihanga ryanyu; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi tindikwenda ku mugaruka kuhurira okujuma oku abanyamahanga barikubajuma, n'obu kwakuba okwemera okuhemura kwabo; n'eihanga ryanyu timurigaruka kuriteeza ntsibo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, obu ab'enju ya Israeli baabaire batwire omu nsi yaabo y'obuzaarwa bakagisiisisa emitwarize yaabo ekansusira nk'okutashemera kw'omukazi ori omu kwezi.
Nikyo naabashukiireho ekiniga kyangye, nimbatura eshagama ei baaseesire omu nsi, kandi n'ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa ebi baagisiisiise.
Ntyo naabataataanisiza omu mahanga, baanaganagwa omu nsi zaago, naabacwera orubanja orushemereire emitwarize yaabo n'ebi barikukora.
Kandi ku baahikire omuri ago mahanga ei baabaire baza yoona, baashiisha eiziina ryangye eririkwera; ahabw'okuba abantu bakabagambaho bati: Aba n'abantu ba MUKAMA; kwonka bakabingwa omu nsi ye.
Kwonka naasaasibwa eiziina ryangye eririkwera, eri enju ya Israeli yaajumiise omu mahanga agu baagiiremu.

Ndyahimbisisa eiziina ryangye erikuru eryajumisiibwe omu mahanga, kandi eri mwagajumiisemu, gaikirize ku riri eririkwera; bwanyima ku ndiheza kwehimbisisa omuriimwe omu maisho g'ago mahanga ku ndi Orikwera, garyamanya ku ndi MUKAMA; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ahabw'okuba ndyabaiha omu mahanga, mbataaruure omu nsi zoona, mbagarure omu nsi yaanyu ey'obuzaarwa.
Ndyabashukyeera amaizi maingi, mushemezibweho oburofa bwanyu bwona, mbamaremu ebishushani byanyu byona ebirikuramibwa, mushemere.
Kandi ndyabaha omutima musya, mbatemu omwoyo musya; ndyabaihamu omutima gw'eibaare, mbatemu ogworobi.
Kandi ndyata omwoyo gwangye omuriimwe, mbagyendeseze omu biragiro byangye, mubone kurinda ebi naataireho n'okubikora.
