Kandi muryatuura omu nsi ei naahaire baashwenkuriimwe; muryaba abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waanyu.
Ndyabaiha omu burofa bwanyu bwona; ndyabamereza engano, nzikanyise, kandi tindibaitsa njara.
Ndyakanyisa ebijuma n'ebirikushaaruurwa omu misiri, murekye kugarukwaho ekijumo ky'enjara omu mahanga.
Haza obwo nibwo muriijuka emitwarize yaanyu emibi, n'ebi mwabaire mukora ebitari birungi, mukeetamwa ahabw'okutahikiirira kwanyu n'ebihangao byanyu.
Tindibikora habwanyu, nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira. Ekyo mukimanye. Imwe b'enju ya Israeli 'mwe, mugire enshoni, mubwerabwere ahabw'emitwarize yaanyu.
Ensi eyaabaire eri eihamba eryahingwa, erekye kuba amatongo nk'oku yaabaire eri omu maisho g'abahinguzi boona.

Bwanyima baryagira bati: Ensi egi ekaba eri amatongo, mbwenu ebaire nk'ekibanja kya Edeni; n'endembo ezaabaire zirugirwemu abantu zisheenyirwe, zihindukire amatongo, mbwenu zitwirwemu abantu, kandi zeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare.
Obwo amahanga agariba gabeehinguririize garyamanya ku nyowe MUKAMA niinye nyombekire emyanya eyaabaire esheenyirwe, nkahinga ahaabaire hari endaara. Nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigamba, kandi ndyakikora.
Endembo ezaabaire zisheenyirwe ziryaijuramu obusyo bw'abantu, nk'obusyo obureetwa kutambirwa omuri Yerusaalemi aha magyenyi gaayo agatairweho. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
Yanyebembera, yaagyenda naagandabyamu; reeba, gakaba gari maingi munonga omuri orwo ruhita, kandi goomire, gakarangataine.
Bwanyima yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ebyo aga magufa gakaabaasa kuba agahuriire? Naamugarukamu nti: Mukama RUHANGA, niiwe orikukimanya.
Yaagaruka yangira ati: Hanuurira aga magufa, ogagire oti: Imwe magufa goomire 'mwe, muhurire ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugambira aga magufa naagira ati: Reeba, naaza kubatamu omwitsyo, mube abahuriire.
Naaza kubataho emitsi, mbagarureho enyama, mbashwekyeho oruhu, mbatemu omwitsyo, mube abahuriire; haza mumanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Ntyo naahanuura nk'oku naaragiirwa; ku naabaire ninkihanuura, naahurira okukomangana, amagufa gaateerana, eigufa ryakwatana na ringyenzi ryaryo.
Ku naagiire kugira nti, naareeba gaagiibwaho emitsi n'enyama, byashwekwa oruhu, kwonka bitaabamu omwitsyo.

Bwanyima yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, hanuurira omwitsyo, ogugire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: iwe mwitsyo 'we, ruga omu mbaju ina ei emiyaga ereetwa, ohuuhe ahari egi mitumbi y'abaitsirwe, babe abahuriire.
Ntyo naahanuura nk'oku yandagiira, omwitsyo gwabazamu, baaba abahuriire, baayemerera eihe rihango munonga.
N'ahabw'ekyo obahanuurire, obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama Ruhanga arikugamba naagira ati: Imwe bantu bangye 'mwe, reeba, ndyaigura ebituuro byanyu mbaihemu, mbagarure omu nsi ya Israeli.
Kandi ku ndiheza kwigura ebituuro byanyu, naabaihamu, muryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA, Bantu bangye 'mwe.
Kandi ndyabatamu Omwoyo wangye, mube abahuriire, mbate omu nsi yaanyu y'obuzaarwa; haza obwo nibwo murimanya ku nyowe MUKAMA niinye naakigambire kandi nkakikora; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Mwana w'omuntu, kwata enkoni, ogihandiikyeho oti: N'eya Yuda n'abaana ba Israeli bagyenzi be; bwanyima okwate endiijo nkoni, ogihandiikyeho oti: N'eya Yosefu (enkoni ya Efuraimu), n'ab'enju ya Israeli boona bagyenzi be;
bwanyima oziteerane zibe enkoni emwe omu ngaro zaawe.
Kandi abantu baawe, ku baraakugir bati: Tokaatushoboororera amakuru g'ebyo?,

obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyatwara enkoni ya Yosefu eri omu ngaro za Efuraimu, n'enganda z'Abaisraeli bagyenzi be, ngiteerane n'eya Yuda, mbahindure enkoni emwe, babe bamwe omu ngaro zangye.
Ezo nkoni zi orikuhandiikaho, ku ziraabe ziri omu ngaro zaawe nibakureeba,
obagire oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyaiha Abaisraeli omu mahanga agu baagiiremu, mbataaruure nimbaiha embaju zoona, mbareete omu nsi yaabo y'obuzaarwa.
Ndyabahindura eihanga rimwe omu nsi y'ebibungo bya Israeli; kandi omugabe omwe niwe aribategyeka boona; tibarigaruka kuba mahanga abiri, n'obu kwakuba okucuubwamu obugabe bubiri.

Tibarigaruka kwesiisisa bishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa nari ebihagaro byabo nainga ebicumuro byabo byona; kureka ndyabajuna, mbatambire okugaruka enyima kwona, oku baacumuriiremu, mbashemeze; babe abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo.

Baryatuura omu nsi ei naahaire omwiru wangye Yakobo, ei baashwenkuriimwe baabaire batwiremu; okwo niyo bariguma, bo n'abaana baabo na baijukuru baabo ebiro byona; kandi omwiru wangye Daudi niwe ariba omugabe waabo ebiro byona.
Kandi ndyaragaana naboendagaano y'obusingye, ebe endagaano ei ndagaine nabo ey'ebiro byona; ndyabaha omugisha, mbakanyise nte Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera ahagati yaabo, gube ogw'obutwire bwona.
Obutaaho bwangye buryaba omuribo, mbe Ruhanga waabo nabo babe abantu bangye.
Omwanya gwangye ogurikwera ku guriguma ahagati yaabo ebiro byona, obwo nibwo amahanga garimanya ku nyowe MUKAMA niinye nyeza Israeli.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho gaawe ahari Googi omu nsi ya Magoogi, omugabe wa Rooshi, Mesheki na Tubali, omuhanuurire ebirimubaho,
noogira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Iwe Googi, omugabe wa Rooshi, Mesheki na Tubali, reeba, naaba omuzigu waawe;

ndyakuhindura, nkute amarobo omu matama, nkureete n'eihe ryawe ryona, embaraasi n'abarikuzigyenderaho, boona bajwaire eby'okurwanisa ebihikire, omutwe muhango munonga, boona baine engabo enkye n'empango, bakwaitse zaarurara,
aba Peresi Kuushi na Puuti bari hamwe nabo, baine engabo n'enkofiira z'ebyoma;
Gomeri n'amahe ge goona, na Besi-togaruma owaarugire omu bicweka by'aha muheru gw'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, amahanga amaingi gari hamwe naiwe.

Bwanyima y'ebiro bingi oryahuruzibwa; omu myaka ey'aha muheru oryahurura, oteere egyo nsi eyaabaire ecwekyereziibwe rurara, bwanyima ekagarurwa omu buteeka, ekatuurwamu abantu abataarwirwe omu mahanga maingi, bakaza omu bibungo bya Israeli ebyabaire biri amatongo; abo bantu bakaihwa omu mahanga, mbwenu batwire buhooro boona oku baingana.
Oryainamuka, oije ori nk'eihunga; oryaba nk'ekicu ekishwekire ensi, iwe n'amahe gaawe goona n'amahanga maingi agariba gari hamwe naiwe.

ogire oti: Naaza kwinamuka, nteere ensi y'ebirorero ebitaine ngo z'amabaare, ngwe aha bantu abagaramisiriize, abatwire buhooro, boona batwire ahataine ngo z'amabaare, n'obu gaakuba amarembo againe enyigi ezirikukingwa empimbi,
kunyaga eminyago n'okugitwara, okuteera emyanya eyaabaire eri amatongo, mbwenu etwirwemu, n'okuteera abantu abaataarwirwe omu mahanga bakeetungira ente n'ebintu, bakatuura ahagati y'ensi.

Aba Sheeba na Dedani n'abashuubuzi ba Tarushiishi n'ebirorero byabyo byona baryakubuuza nibagira bati: Beitu oizire kunyaga? Ohurwize engabo zaawe kwija kunyaga, kutwara efeeza n'ezaabu, amatungo n'ebintu, kukukumbura eminyago mingi?
N'ahabw'ekyo, Mwana w'omuntu, hanuurira Googi, noomugira oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Eryo izooba abantu bangye Abaisraeli ku bariba batwire buhooro, oryayehuruza,
orugye omu mwanya gwawe gw'omu bicweka by'aha muheru gw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho, iwe n'amahanga maingi agari hamwe naiwe, boona bari aha mbaraasi, eihe rihango kandi ry'amaani,
oteere abantu bangye Israeli, ori nk'ekicu ekishwekire ensi. Omu biro by'aha muheru ndyakuteeza ensi yangye, amahanga gabone kummanya, ku ndiba naakweyorekyeiremu, ku ndi Orikwera, iwe Googi.
Kwonka eryo izooba eri Googi ariteereraho ensi ya Israeli, ekiniga kyangye kiryaimuka; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ahabw'okuba ningambisa eihato n'ekiniga ekirikubuguma, ningira nti: Buzimazima eryo izooba haryabaho okutengatenga kw'amaani omu nsi ya Israeli,

okurireetera eby'enyanja, amahungu g'omu mwanya, enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa, ebirikwekurura ahansi byona n'abantu ab'omu nsi boona, kutetemera omu maisho gangye, enshozi zikakumbagazibwa, ebibaare bikahiguka, n'engo z'amabaare zoona zikakumbagara ahansi.
Ndyayeta ebirikutiinisa eby'emiringo yoona kurwanisa Googi, buri muntu aitise mugyenzi we rurara; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Ndyamucwera orubanja, mmuteho ekifubiro ky'orufu n'eky'okusheesha eshagama ye; kandi we n'amahe ge n'amahanga maingi, agu ariba aine, ndyabateeza omutsindansi gw'enjura, n'emengo z'orubaare, n'omuriro, n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti;
ntyo nyorekye obukuru bwangye n'okwera kwangye, kandi nyemanyise omu maisho g'amahanga maingi. Haza obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA.
ndyakuhindura, nkwebembeze, nkwihe omu bicweka by'aha muheru gw'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso, nkwinamure, nkuhitsye omu bibungo bya Israeli;
ku orihikayo, ndyateera obuta bwawe oburi omu mukono gwawe gwa bumosho, mbukunagise, n'emyambi yaawe eri omu mukono gwawe gwa buryo ngigwise ahansi.
Oryagwa aha bibungo bya Israeli, iwe n'amahe gaawe n'amahanga agu oriba oine, nkugaburire amahungu g'emiringo yoona n'enyamaishwa mbi, bikugaashe,
ogwe omu bwerere; ahabw'okuba niinye naakigamba; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi ndyayohereza omuriro, gwotsye Magoogi n'abantu abatwire buhooro omu birwa, bamanye ku ndi MUKAMA.
Reeba, nibiija, kandi biryabaho; eryo niryo izooba eri naagambire; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

tibaryetenga kusheenya omu ishwa, n'obu kwakuba okukonda ebiti omu kibira; ahabw'okuba baryahemba eby'okurwanisa byabo; baryatwara ebintu by'abaatwaire ebyabo, banyagye abaabanyagire; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Eryo izooba ndyaha Googi ah'okuziikwa omuri Israeli, omu ruhita rw'abahinguzi aha bukiizi bw'enyanja bw'oburugwa-izooba; okwo niyo bariziika Googi n'enyanja y'abantu be boona, omuhanda gw'abagyenzi gukafa; kandi haryayetwa Oruhita rwa Hamoni-googi.
Ab'enju ya Israeli baryamara ameezi mushanju nibabaziika, babone kushemeza ensi.
Abantu boona ab'omuri egyo nsi baryabaziika; kandi aha izooba eri ndihimbisizibwaho, kiryabahaisa ekitiinisa; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Bwanyima baryatoorana abantu b'okuguma nibaraba omu nsi nibaziika emitumbi eriba etsigaire omu nsi, ngu ensi eshemere; ago meezi mushanju ku garihwaho baryasherura.
Abo basheruzi ku bariraba omu nsi, omwe omuribo yaagwa aha igufa ry'omuntu, aryarita akamanyiso aha rubaju, okuhitsya obu abaziiki baririziika omu ruhanga rwa Hamoni-googi.
(Kandi aho niho hariba orurembo orurikwetwa Hamona). Okwo nikwo barishemza egyo nsi.
Nimwija kurya enyama z'amamanzi, munywe eshagama y'abagabe b'omu nsi; murye enyama z'empaya z'entaama, ez'abaana baazo, ez'embuzi, n'ez'enimi zoona ez'ebishaju eza Bashani;
nimwija kurya ebishaju, okuhitsya obu muraigute, munywe eshagama okuhitsya obu muraasinde aha bugyenyi bw'ebitambo, obu ndikubatebeekanisiza.
Kandi nimwija kwigutira aha meeza yangye embaraasi n'abarikuzigyenderaho hamwe n'amamanzi n'abarwani b'emiringo yoona; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Batyo ab'enju ya Israeli baryamanya ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, okutandikira ahari eryo izooba n'okugumizamu.

Kandi amahanga garyamanya ku ab'enju ya Israeli baatwairwe bari enkwatwa nibaturwa eby'okushiisha byabo, ahabw'okuba bakancumuraho, kyandeetera kubaihaho amaisho, n'okubahayo omu mikono y'abazigu baabo; boona baitwa rurara.
Nkabatwaza nk'okutahikiirira kwabo n'ebicumuro byabo oku byabaire biri, naabaima amaisho.
Ku bariba batwire buhooro bataine orikubatiinisa, baryayebwa enshoni zaabo ahabw'ebicumuro byona ebi bancumwireho.
Ku ndiheza kubaiha omu mahanga, naabagarura, naabataaruura omu nsi z'abazigu baabo, naayorekyera okwera kwangye omuribo omu maisho g'amahanga,

obwo nibwo barimanya ku ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo, ahabw'okuba nkabareetera kutwarwa omu mahanga bari enkwatwa, bwanyima naabataaruura, naabagarura omu nsi yaabo ey'obuzaarwa. Tindigira n'omwe ou naatsiga omu mahanga obundi;
Kandi, ku ndishuka Omwoyo wangye aha nju ya Israeli, tindigaruka kubaima maisho bundi; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
gwantwarira omu kworekwa omu nsi ya Israeli, gwanta aha kibungo kiraingwa munonga, ekyabaire kiriho ekintu ekirikushusha orurembo kishungaine naanye.
Ku yampikizeyo, reeba, hakaba hariyo omuntu orikushusha omuringa, aine omurunga gwa furakisi omu ngaro n'ekibingo ky'okugyeresa, ayemereire omu irembo.

Ogwo mushaija yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ta amaisho aha bi naaza kukworeka, obitegye amatu, kandi obiteho omutima, ahabw'okuba ekikureetsire aha n'okubikworeka; ebi oraareebe byona, obigambire enju ya Israeli.
Bwanyima yaahika aha irembo eririkureeba oburugwa-izooba; ku yaatembire aha matembero gaaryo, yaagyera ekisasi kyaryo eky'aheeru, haaba ekibingo kimwe;

buri kishengye eky'aha mbaju kyaba ekibingo kimwe oburaingwa kandi ekibingo kimwe obukiika; ahagati y'ebyo bishengye haabaho omwanya gwa mikono etaano; ekisasi ky'eirembo eky'omunda haihi naryo aharikureebana n'enju, naho haaba ekibingo kimwe.
Bwanyima yaagyera ekisasi eky'omunda kyaba mikono munaana.
Kandi yaagyera ebiti by'eirembo, byaba mikono ebiri; ekyo kisasi ky'eirembo kikaba kishungaine n'enju.
Kandi aha rubaju rw'eirembo ry'oburugwa-izooba hakaba hariho ebishengye bishatu ahari buri rubaju; byona biri orugyero rumwe, n'ebiti by'eirembo ahari buri rubaju nabyo biri orugyero rumwe.
Okuruga aho yaagyera obuhangoa bw'eirembo, bwaba mikono ikumi, n'obukiika bwaryo bwaba mikono ikumi n'eshatu.
Omu maisho g'ebishengye by'aha mbaju haabamu omwanya gwa mukono gumwe ahari buri rubaju, kandi ebyo bishengye by'ahari buri rubaju bikaba biri mikono mukaaga.
Bwanyima yaagyera eirembo, naiha enyima y'ekishengye kimwe okuhitsya enyima y'ekindi; obukiika obwo bwaba mikono makumi abiri n'etaano, okuruga aha rwigi okuhika aha rundi.
Yaagyera n'omu kisasi, haaba mikono makumi abiri; okwehinguririza ekyo kisasi ky'eirembo kyaba ekibuga.
Okuruga omu maisho g'eirembo okuhika ah'orikutaahira nooza omu kisasi ky'omunda aha muheru gwakyo haaba mikono makumi ataano.

Kandi ebishengye by'eirembo bikaba biine amadirisa okubyehinguririza, gafunzire omunda aharikureeba ebiti byago omu bishengye by'omunda; kandi n'ekisasi kikaba kiine amadirisa omunda okukyehinguririza; ebiti by'ago madirisa bikaba biriho emikindo.
Omwanya ogwo ogwariirwe gukaba gugyenzire aha rubaju rw'amarembo, nigwingana nago omu buraingwa; ekyo nikyo kyabaire kiri ekicweka kyariire ekya ifo.
Yaagaruka yaagyera naiha omu kicweka ky'omunda eky'omu maisho g'eirembo rya ifo okuhika aha rubaju rw'aheeru orw'ekibuga ky'omunda, kyaba mikono igana.
Bwanyima yaanyebembera, naatoora aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso, reeba hakaba hariyo eirembo eryabaire nirireebayo ery'ekibuga ky'enyima; yaagyera oburaingwa bwakyo n'obukiika bwakyo.

Ebishengye byaryo eby'aha rubaju, bishatu aha rubaju rumwe, na bishatu aha rundi, ebiti byaryo, n'ekisasi kyaryo, byona bikaba biri orugyero rumwe n'eby'eirembo ery'okubanza; oburaingwa bwaryo bukaba buri mikono makumi ataano, n'obukiika bwaryo buri mikono makumi abiri n'etaano.

Amadirisa gaaryo, ekisasi kyaryo, n'ebiti byaryo by'enkindo bikaba biri eby'orugyero rumwe n'eirembo eririkureeba oburugwa-izooba; kandi amatembero agaabaire nigarihikaho gakaba gari mushanju, n'ekisasi kyaryo kikaba kiri omunda.

Ahashungaine n'eirembo ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso hakaba hariho eirembo eririkutaaha omu kibuga ky'omunda, nk'oku kiri aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba. Yaagyera okuruga aha irembo okuhika aha rindi, haaba mikono igana.
Bwanyima yaanyebembera yantwara nantooza aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo; reeba, n'ahari orwo rubaju hakaba hariho eirembo; yaagyera ebiti byaryo n'ekisasi kyaryo; byaba eby'orugyero rumwe n'ebindi.

Omunda yaaryo n'omu kisasi kyaryo hakaba heehinguririziibwe amadirisa agarikwingana n'ag'omu gandi marembo; oburaingwa bwaryo buri mikono makumi ataano, n'obukiika bwaryo mikono makumi abiri n'etaano.
Kandi amatembero agaabaire nigarihikaho gakaba gari mushanju, n'ekisasi kyaryo kiri omunda; kandi ebiti byaryo bikaba biriho emikindo, gumwe aha rubaju rumwe, n'ogundi aha rundi.
Kandi aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo obw'ekibuga eky'omunda hakaba hariho eirembo; yaagyera okuruga aha irembo okuhika aha rindi ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, haaba mikono igana.
Bwanyima yandabya omu irembo ry'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, yantaasya omuri ekyo kibuga ky'omnda, yaagyera eryo irembo, ryaba ery'orugyero rumwe n'agandi.

Ebishengye by'aha mbaju zaaryo, n'ebiti byaryo, n'ekisasi kyaryo, bikaba biri eby'orugyero rumwe n'ebindi; kandi omuri eryo irembo n'omu kisasi kyaryo hakaba harimu amadirisa agarikwingana n'agandi okwehinguririza; oburaingwa bwaryo bwaba mikono makumi ataano, n'obukiika bwaryo mikono makumi abiri n'etaano.
Kandi hakaba hariho ebisasi okwehinguririza, oburaingwa bwabyo buri mikono makumi abiri n'etaano, n'obukiika bwabyo mikono etaano.
Ekisasi kyaryo kikaba nikireeba ekibuga ky'aheeru, n'amatembero agarikurihikaho gari munaana.
Yaagaruka yantaasya omu kibuga ky'omunda aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, yaagyera eirembo ry'aho, ryaba ery'orugyero rumwe n'agandi.

Ebishengye byaryo eby'omu mbaju, ebiti byaryo, n'ekisasi kyaryo, byaba eby'orugyero rumwe n'ebindi; omuri eryo irembo n'omu kisasi kyaryo hakiikiizemu amadirisa; oburaingwa bwaryo buri mikono makumi ataano, n'obukiika bwaryo mikono makumi abiri n'etaano.
Ekisasi kyaryo kikaba nikireeba ekibuga ky'aheeru, ebiti byaryo biriho emikindo, gumwe aha rubaju rumwe n'ogundi aha rundi; n'amatembero agarikurihikaho gari munaana.
Bwanyima yantwara aha irembo ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, yaarigyera; ryaba ery'orugyero rumwe n'agandi;

ebishengye byaryo eby'omu mbaju n'ebiti byaryo, n'ekisasi kyaryo, byaba eby'orugyero rumwe n'ebindi; rikiikiiziibwemu amadirisa; oburaingwa bwaryo buri mikono makumi ataano, n'obukiika bwaryo mikono makumi abiri n'etaano.
Ekisasi kyaryo kikaba nikireeba ekibuga ky'aheeru; ebiti byaryo bikaba biriho emikindo, gumwe aha rubaju rumwe n'ogundi aha rundi; n'amatembero agarikurihikaho gari munaana.
kandi omuri ekyo kisasi ky'eirembo hakaba harimu emeeza ibiri aha rubaju rumwe n'ezindi ebiri aha rundi rubaju, ez'okwitiraho ebitambo by'okwotsya, empongano y'ekibi, n'ey'okwihaho orubanja rw'ekibi.
Kandi aheeru y'ekisasi y'ah'orikutaahira nooza omu irembo ery'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho hakaba hariyo emeeza ibiri, n'aha rundi rubaju ezindi ibiri.
Aha rubaju rw'omunda orw'eryo irembo hariho emeeza ina, n'aha rubaju rwaryo orw'aheeru ezindi ina, zoona munaana ziri ez'okwitiraho ebitambo.

Hakaba hariho n'ezindi meeza ina ezibaizirwe omu mabaare, ez'okutaho ebitambo by'okwotsya, oburaingwa bwazo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka, obukiika bwazo mukono gumwe n'ekicweka, n'obwemi bwazo mukono gumwe, ezaabaire ziteebwaho eby'okwitsa ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo.
Kandi omuri ekyo kisasi hakaba hateereiremu ebyoma by'okuhanikaho eby'oburaingwa bw'ekita kimwe, bikiikiize omunda. Ahari ezo meeza niho haabaire haba ah'okuta enyama z'empongano.
Yangira ati: Eki kishengye ekirikureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo n'eky'abanyamurwa abareeberera hekalu;
n'ekishengye ekirikureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'eky'abanyamurwa abareeberera eitambiro; abo nibo beene Zadoki ab'omu ruganda rwa Leevi abarikwikirizibwa bonka kwirira haihi MUKAMA kumuheereza.
Yaagyera ekyo kibuga, kyaba mikono igana oburaingwa, na mikono igana obukiika, embaju zoona oku ziri ina zaingana; kandi eitambiro rikaba riri omu maisho ga hekalu.

Bwanyima yantwara aha kisasi kya hekalu, yaagyera enyomyo zaakyo zombi, ey'aha rubaju rumwe yaaba mikono etaano, n'ey'aha rubaju rundi nayo mikono etaano; obuhango bw'eirembo bwaba mikono ikumi n'ena, n'ebisiika by'omu rubaju rw'eirembo byaba mikono eshatu buri rubaju.
Oburaingwa bw'ekyo kisasi bwaba mikono ikumi n'ebiri; amatembero agarikukihikaho gari ikumi; kandi aha rubaju rw'ebiti by'eirembo hakaba hariho enyomyo emwe aha rubaju rumwe n'endi aha rundi.
Bwanyima yantwara omuri hekalu, yaagyera ebiti byayo by'emiryango; ahari buri rubaju obukiika bwabyo bwaba mikono mukaaga.

Obuhango bw'omuryango gwayo bwaba mikono ikumi; ebisiika by'omuryango orubaju n'orubaju byaba mikono etaano; yaagaruka yaagyera oburaingwa bwayo, bwaba mikono makumi ana oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono makumi abiri.

Bwanyima yaataaha omu kishengye ky'omunda, yaagyera ebiti by'omuryango gwakyo, byaba mikono ebiri; obuhango bw'omuryango bwaba mikono mukaaga, n'ebisiika byagwo orubaju n'orubaju byaba mikono mushanju.
Yaagyera oburaingwa bw'kyo kishengye, bwaba mikono makumi abiri, n'obukiika bwakyo mikono makumi abiri omu maisho g'ekishengye kya rwagati. Yaagaruka yangira ati: Aha n'Omwanya ogurikwera munonga.
Bwanyima yaagyera ekisiika kya hekalu, omuzimba gwakyo gwaba mikono mukaaga, n'obukiika bw'ebishengye byona ebikiikiize omu mbaju za hekalu bwaba mikono ena.

Ebyo bishengye by'omu mbaju za hekalu bikaba biri kaanyina-ishatu bitungamiraine; omuri buri mushorongo harimu ebishengye makumi ashatu. Okwehinguririza ekisiika kya hekalu hakaba hariho ah'okutaahiza ebishengye by'omu mbaju omuri ekyo kisiika kuhamiramu, kwonka bitarikwoga mu kisiika kya hekalu.

Ebyo bishengye by'omu mbaju byagyenda nibiba bihango, nk'oku bigyenzire nibitembekyerana okuza ahaiguru, nk'obuhango bw'okutaaha omu kisiika okwa buri mushorongo oku buri; aha rubaju rwa hekalu hakaba hariho amatembero g'okutemberaho; kandi omuntu ku yaabaire aruga omu kishengye ky'ahansi, naaza omu kya kaanyina-ishatu, araba omu kya kaanyina-ibiri.
Kandi naareeba hekalu eyehinguririziibwe ekicweka ky'omusingi ekitunguukire; emisingi y'ebishengye by'omu mbaju ekaba eri ey'orugyero rw'ekibingo kimwe kya mikono mukaaga emiraingwa.
Omuzimba gw'ebisiika by'aheeru eby'ebishengye ebikiikiize hekalu guri mikono etaano, kandi ekicweka ky'omusingi ekyatsigariire aho nakyo kiri mikono etaano.
Okuruga aha muheru gw'ekyo kicweka ky'omusingi okuhika aha bishengye by'omu kibuga ekaba eri mikono makumi abiri okwehinguririza hekalu embaju zoona.

Emiryango y'ebyo bishengye ebikiikiize hekalu ekaba neereeba ahari ekyo kicweka ky'omusingi ekyatsigariire aho, ogumwe nigureeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, ogundi aha bwa-buryo; kandi obukiika bw'ekyo kicweka ky'omusingi ekyatsigariire aho embaju zoona bukaba buri mikono etaano.

Ekyombeko ekyabaire nikireeba omu kibuga kya hekalu aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba kikaba kiri mukono makumi mushanju obukiika; kandi omuzimba gw'ekisiika ky'ekyo kyombeko gukaba guri mikono etaano embaju zoona, n'oburaingwa bwakyo mikono makumi mwenda.
Bwanyima yaagyera hekalu, oburaingwa bwayo bwaba mikono igana; ekibuga kyayo n'ekyombeko hamwe n'ebisiika byayo, oburaingwa bwabyo bwaba mikono igana;
kandi obukiika bw'omu maisho ga hekalu aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba hamwe n'ekibuga kyaho bwaba mikono igana.
Bwanyima yaagyera oburaingwa bw'ekyombeko ekirikureeba omu kibuga, eky'aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, hamwe n'ebisiika byakyo orubaju n'orubaju, bwaba mikono igana.

Ebisiika by'ekishengye kya hekalu ekya rwagati, n'eby'eky'omunda, n'eby'ekisasi ky'aheeru, bikaba bishwekirwe embaaho; byonshatu bikaba biine amadirisa agataahire omu kisiika embaju zoona. Ahashungaine n'ekisasi ekisiika kya hekalu nakyo kikaba kishwekirwe embaaho, okuruga ahansi okuhika aha madirisa; (kandi ago madirisa gakaba gashwekire),
n'okuhika aha mwanya ogw'ahaiguru y'omuryango, kandi n'okuhika aha kishengye ky'omunda n'aheeru.
Kandi ebisiika byona eby'ekishengye eky'omunda n'eby'ekya rwagati, bikaba bisharwirweho ebishushani bya baakerubi n'eby'emikindo, ahagati y'ekishushani kya kerubi n'ekindi ekishushani ky'omukindo.
Buri kerubi akaba aine ahamaisho habiri, ahamaisho h'omuntu nihareeba omukindo aha rubaju rumwe, n'ahamaisho h'entare nihareeba ogundi mukindo aha rundi rubaju.
Okwo nikwo byabaire bisharwirwe ahari hekalu yoona embaju zoona; okuruga ahansi okuhika ahaiguru y'omuryango hakaba hasharwirweho baakerubi n'emikindo.
Ebiti by'omuryango by'ekishengye ekya rwagati bikaba biine embaju ina ezirikwingaingana.

Kandi omu maisho g'Omwanya ogurikwera hakaba harimu ekirikushusha eitambiro ry'embaaho, obwemi bwakyo mikono eshatu, oburaingwa bwakyo mikono ebiri, n'obukiika bwakyo mikono ebiri; enshonda zaakyo n'ekitebe kyakyo, n'embaju zaakyo, biri eby'embaaho. Yangira ati: Egi niyo meeza etairwe omu maisho ga MUKAMA.
Kandi ekyo kishengye ekya rwagati n'ogwo Mwanya ogurikwera bikaba biine enyigi z'embari ibiri buri kimwe;
kandi ezo mbari zikaba ziine ebishate bibiri ebirikukubwa buri emwe.

Aha nyigi ez'ekishengye ekya rwagati hakaba hasharwirweho ebishushani bya baakerubi n'emikindo, nk'ebyababire bisharwirwe aha bisiika; kandi omu maisho g'ekisasi ky'aheeru hakaba hariho ekisanga ky'embaaho.
Kandi aha bisiika by'aha rubaju rw'ekisasi hakaba hariho amadirisa agataahire omu kisiika hamwe n'emikindo orubaju n'orubaju.
Oburaingwa bw'ekyo kyombeko ky'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho bukaba buri mikono igana, n'obukiika bwakyo mikono makumi ataano.
Kandi hakaba hariho amabaraza ga kaanyina-ishatu gatungamiraine, gahereraine n'omwanya gwa mikono makumi abiri ogw'ekibuga ky'omunda, kandi nigareebana n'ekicweka ekyariirwe amabaare.
Omu maisho g'ebyo bishengye ahagati hakaba hariho omwanya gw'okurabamu gwa mikono ikumi obukiika, na mikono igana oburaingwa; n'emiryango y'ebyo bishengye neereeba aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Ebishengye by'ahaiguru bikaba bifunzire okukira eby'ahagati n'eby'ahansi, ahabw'okuba ago mabaraza gakaba gabifundize okukira ebindi.
Ahakuba bikaba biri ebya kaanyina-ishatu, kandi bitaine nyomyo nk'ez'omu kibuga ky'aheeru; n'ahabw'ekyo ebishengye by'ahaiguru bikaba biri bikye okukira eby'ahagati n'eby'ahansi.
Kandi enyima y'ebyo bishengye hakaba hariyo ekisiika kiringaaniire nabyo, kandi kishungaine nabyo aha rubaju rw'ekibuga ky'aheeru, oburaingwa bwakyo mikono makumi ataano.
Ahakuba oburaingwa bw'ebishengye by'omu kibuga ky'aheeru bukaba buri mikono makumi ataano, kwonka obw'ebishungaine na hekalu buri mikono igana.
Ahansi y'ebyo bishengye hakaba hariho omuryango aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, ogwabaire gutaahirwamu abarikuruga omu kibuga ky'enyima,
ahu orugo rw'aheeru rwabaire nirutandikira. Kandi aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, ahashungaine n'ekibuga kandi n'ekyo kyombeko, hakaba hariho ebishengye eibiine omuhanda gw'okurabamu omumaisho;
bikaba nibishushana n'eby'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho, biri eby'orugyero rumwe oburaingwa n'obukiika, kandi nibishushanisa nabyo aharikushohorerwa, emyombekyere, n'emiryango.

Kandi ahansi y'ebyo bishengye by'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, hakaba hariho omuryango ogurikutaaha omu muhanda gw'ahagati gw'okurabamu; kandi ahashungaine nagwo hariho ekisiika ekirikubitaanisa.

Abanyamurwa ku bariguma baataaha omu Mwanya ogurikwera, tibarishohora kuza omu kibuga ky'aheeru, batabandize kujuura bijwaro ebi bajwara nibaheereza, bakabibiika, ahabw'okuba n'ebirikwera. Kandi ku bariba batakahikire mpongano z'abantu, bajware ebindi bijwaro.
Ku yaaherize kugyera ekibuga kya hekalu omunda, yantwara yandabya omu irembo ry'oburugwa-izooba, yaagyera omwanya gwa hekalu embaju zoona.
Yaagyeresa ekyo kibingo orubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, byaba ebibingo magana ataano;
yaahinduka yaakigyeresa orubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso, byaba ebibingo magana ataano.
Yaahinduka yaakigyeresa orubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, byaba ebibingo magana ataano;
kandi yaahindukira orubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, yaarukigyeresa, rwaba ebibingo magana ataano.
Yaagyera embaju zaakyo ina, yaashanga kyehinguririziibwe orugo rwa mikono magana ataano oburaingwa na magana ataano obukiika, okutaanisa aharikwera n'ahatari harikwera.
kandi reeba, ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga wa Israeli kyareetwa oburugwa-izooba; okuhoorera kw'okwija kwe kwaba nk'okw'amaizi maingi, kandi ensi yaayakwamu ekitiinisa kye.
Okworekwa oku naareebire kwaba nka kuri oku naareebire, obu yaija kucwekyereza orurembo, kandi nk'okworekwa oku naareebire aha mugyera Kebari; naagwa ahansi njuumaire.
Ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA ku kyabaire nikitaaha omuri hekalu, nikireetwa omu irembo ery'oburugwa-izooba,
Omwoyo yankiriza, yantaasya omu kibuga ky'omunda; kandi reeba, ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyaijura hekalu.

yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ogu nigwo mwanya gw'ekitebe kyangye ky'obukama, kandi ahu nta ebigyere byangye, ahu ndituura ahagati y'abantu ba Israeli ebiro byona. Kandi ab'enju ya Israeli n'abagabe baabo tibarigaruka kusiisisa eiziina ryangye eririkwera obwamaraaya bwabo, nari emitumbi y'abagabe baabo,

n'obu kwakuba okuhikaanisa ekisasi kyabo n'ekyangye, n'enyomyo zaabo n'ezangye; ahagati yangye nabo hakabaho ekisiika kyonka. Ahabw'okuba bakasiisisa eiziina ryangye eririkwera ebihagaro byabo ebi baakozire; nikyo naabamariireho, mbainiire ekiniga.
Mbwenu hati baanyihe omumaisho okuramya ebishushani kwabo n'emitumbi y'abagabe baabo, babite hare, mbone kuguma omuribo ebiro byona.

Ku baraakwatwe enshoni ahabw'ebyo byona ebi baakozire, oboorekye enyombekyere ya hekalu, obushohorero bwayo n'obutaahiro bwayo n'oku eyemi kwona; obamanyise emigyenzo yaayo yoona, n'ebiragiro byayo byona; kandi obihandiikye nibakureeba, babone kurinda n'okuhitsya ebiragiro byayo byona, n'emigyenzo yaayo yoona.
Eki nikyo kiragiro kya hekalu. Omwanya gwona ogw'aha mutwe gw'orushozi embaju zoona guryaba ogurikwera munonga. Reeba, ekyo nikyo kiragiro kya hekalu.

Obu nibwo buriba obwemi bw'eitambiro, okuruga ahansi aha kitebe kyaryo okuhika ahamukugiro gw'ahansi mikono ebiri, n'obukiika bwaryo mukono gumwe; kandi okuruga aha mukugiro omukye okuhika aha muhango mikono ena, n'obukiika mukono gumwe; n'amahega gaaryo mikono ena;
kandi okuruga aha mahega gaaryo habeho amahembe ana ageemereire bwemi, oburaingwa bwa buri ihembe mukono gumwe.
Amahega g'eitambiro garyagira embaju ina ezirikwingaingana, oburaingwa mikono ikumi n'ebiri, n'obukiika mikono ikumi n'ebiri.

Omukugiro gwaryo nagwo guryagira embaju ina ezirikwingaingana, oburaingwa bwagwo mikono ikumi n'ena, n'obukiika mikono ikumi n'ena, kandi gwehinguririzibwe omuguno, obuhango bwagwo ekicweka kya mukono, n'ekitebe kyaryo mukono gumwe okwehinguririza; kandi amatembero g'eryo itambiro garyareeba oburugwa-izooba.
abanyamurwa b'Abaleevi ab'omu ruzaaro rwa Zadoki, abaanyirira haihi kumpeereza, oryabaha enimi kuba empongano y'ekibi; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi otware aha shagama yaayo, ogite ahari ago mahembe ana g'eitambiro n'aha nshonda ina z'omukugiro, n'aha muguno oguryehinguririize; okwo nikwo oririshemeza, okaririhiirira.
Bwanyima oryatwara egyo nimi ey'empongano y'ekibi, eyokyezibwe omu mwanya gwa hekalu ogwaragiirwe, enyima y'orugo rw'ekibuga ekirikwera.
Aha kiro kya kabiri oryahonga empaya y'embuzi etaine kamogo kuba empongano y'ekibi; rityo eitambiro riryashemezibwa, nk'oku barishemeize n'egyo nimi.
Ku oriheza kurishemereza kimwe, oryahonga enimi etaine kamogo, n'empaya y'entaama y'omu busyo etaine kamogo,
ozimurikire MUKAMA; bwanyima abanyamurwa bazimemeerereho omwonyo, bazihongyere MUKAMA, zibe ekitambo ky'okwotsya.
Oryamara ebiro mushanju noohonga embuzi buri izooba kuba empongano y'ekibi, kandi bahongye enimi n'empaya y'entaama y'omu busyo etaine kamogo.
Baryamara ebiro mushanju nibarihiirira eitambiro n'okuryeza; batyo barihsoroore.

Kandi ku bariheza ebyo biro, okwiha aha kiro kya munaana n'okweyongyerayo, abanyamurwa baryaguma nibahongyera aha itambiro ebitambo byanyu by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye; naanye ndyabaikiriza; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Yangira ati: Eirembo eri riryaguma rikingire; tiririigurwa, kandi tihaine oririrabamu, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli arirabiremu; nikyo ririgumira rikingire.
Omunyiginya wenka niwe aririshutamamu kuriira eby'okurya omu maisho ga MUKAMA; aryaguma ataahe naaraba omu kisasi ky'eryo irembo; kandi nimwo ariguma naashohorera.

MUKAMA yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, yetegyereze gye, oreebe n'amaisho gaawe, kandi ohurire n'amatu gaawe, ebi naaza kukugambira byona eby'emigyenzo ya hekalu ya MUKAMA yoona, n'ebiragiro byayo byona; kandi oyetegyereze gye abarikwikirizibwa kutaaha omuri hekalu, n'abatarikwirizibwa kutaaha omu Mwanya ogurikwera.
Ogambire egyo nju engomi, enju ya Israeli, oti: Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Imwe nju ya Israeli 'mwe, nyaabura 'mwe nimurekyere kimwe ebihagaro byanyu byona,

eby'okwikiriza abanyamahanga abatashazirwe omu mutima n'omu mubiri, kuguma omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera nibagushiisha, mwaba nimumpongyera eby'okurya, ebishaju n'eshagama. Mwitsire endagaano yangye n'ebihangaro byanyu byona.
Kandi timurinzire bintu byangye ebirikwera; kureka mutaireho abanyamahanga kuba nibo baabirindira omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera.
Nikyo Mukama RUHANGA arikugirira ati: Tihariho munyaihanga otashazirwe mu mutima n'omu mubiri ow'omu banyamahanga boona ab'omu ihanga rya Israeli oriikirizibwa kutaah omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera.
Kandi Abaleevi abaanyimwire bakahaba nibakuratira ebishushani byabo ebirikuramibwa, obu Israeli yaahaba, baryagiibwaho ekifubiro ky'ebibi byabo.

Kwonka baryaba abaheereza omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera bari abakumiirizi aha marembo ga hekalu, kandi nibakoramu omurimo; baryaguma nibaita ebitambo by'okwotsya n'ebindi bitambo by'abantu b'obutoosha, kandi bagume beemerere omu maisho gaabo nibabaheereza;

ahabw'okuba abo Baleevi bakabaheerereza omu mmaisho g'ebishushani byabo ebirikurambwa, baahinduka ekiriteeza entsibo, kikareetera enju ya Israeli kucumura, nikyo naimukiize omukono nkarahira nti: Baryagiibwaho ekifubiro ky'ebibi byabo; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.

Tibarimpika haihi kunkorera omurimo gw'obunyamurwa, nari okugira eki bairira haihi omu bintu byangye ebirikwera n'ebindi ebirikwera munonga; kureka baryaitwa enshoni, ahabw'ebihagaro byabo ebi baakozire.
N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, ndyabataho kuba abarinzi ba hekalu, kukora obuheereza bwamwo bwona, n'ebindi byona ebishemereire kukorwamu.
Abo baryaguma nibataaha omu Mwanya gwangye ogurikwera, nibairira haihi emeeza yangye kumpeereza, nibakora ebi ndikubaragiira.

Ku bariguma baataaha omu marembo g'ekibuga ky'omunda, baryataahamu bajwaire ebijwaro bya kitaani, tibarijwara kintu kyona ekirimu ebyoya by'entaama, baaba nibakora omurimo gw'obuheereza omu marembo g'ekyo kibuga n'omunda yaakyo.
Baryaguma bajware ebikwemba bya kitaani omu mitwe, bajware n'empare za kitaani omunda; kandi tibaryezirika kintu kyona ekirikubareetera okutuutuka.

Kandi ku barishohora, baaza omu bantu omu kibuga ky'aheeru, baryajuura ebyo bijwaro, ebi bariba nibaheererezamu, babite omu bishengye ebirikwera, bajware ebindi bijwaro, ngu batakaayeza abantu n'ebyo bijwaro byabo.
Tibarimwa, kandi tibarikuza ishokye, kureka baryarituubya.
Tihariho munyamurwa weena orinywa viinyo, yaaba naataaha omu kibuga ky'omunda.
Tibarishwera mufaakazi, nari omukazi oshenzirwe, kureka omwishiki oshugaine ow'omu ruganda rw'enju ya Israeli, nari omufaakazi owaabaire ari muka omunyamurwa.
Baryaguma nibeegyesa abantu bangye omutaano gw'ebirikwera n'ebitari birikwera, baboorekye oku baakutaanisa ebishemeire n'ebitashemeire.

Ku haribaho empaka, baryakora nk'abaramuzi, baramure abantu nk'oku emicwere yangye eri. Baryayorobera ebiragiro byangye n'ebi naataireho omu magyenyi gangye goona agaatairweho, beeze na sabato zangye.
Tibaryesiisisa okuhika haihi omufu; kwonka omunyamurwa naikirizibwa kweshiisha ahabwa ishe, nari nyina, ahabwa mutabani we nari muhara we, n'ahabwa mwene ishe nari munyaanya otakashweirwe.
Kandi ku ariheza kusiisikara, aryayebarira ebiro mushanju, bwanyima abe oshemeire.
Aha izooba eri arigiiraho omu Mwanya ogurikwera omu kibuga ky'omunda kuheererezamu, aryahonga empongano ye y'ekibi; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Baryaguma barye aha mpongano z'esaano n'aha mpongano y'ekibi, n'aha mpongano ey'okwihaho orubanja; kandi ekintu kyona ekyabiikirwe Ruhanga omuri Israeli kiryaguma kibe ekyabo.

Emiganuro y'ebiribanza kwera byona eby'emiringo yoona, na buri mpongano yoona ey'omu mpongano zaanyu zoona ez'emiringo yoona biryaguma bibe eby'abanyamurwa; kandi muryaguma muhe abanyamurwa emiganuro y'ebiihuro byanyu, amaka gaanyu gabone kugumwamu emigisha.
Kandi abanyamurwa tibarirya ha kintu kyona ekyefeereire, nari ekiitsirwe enyamaishwa eky'ekirikuguruka nari eky'enyamaishwa.
Omuri ekyo kyanga ekibanja kya mikono magana ataano oburaingwa n'obukiika mikono magana ataano kiryaba obutaaho oburikwera bwehinguririzibwe akataajuure k'obukiika bwa mikono makumi ataano.

Kandi omuri ekyo kyanga ekirikwera ogyeremu ekicweka kya mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono kakumi ahu Obutaaho oburikwera buryombekwa, nigwo Omwanya gurikwera munonga.
Ogwo mwanya guryaba ekicweka ky'ensi ekirikwera, kibe eky'abanyamurwa abaheereza omu Butaaho burikwera, kandi abahika MUKAMA kumuheereza; guryaba omwanya gw'okutamu Omwanya ogurikwera munonga.
Ekindi kicweka kya mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono kakumi, kiryaba eky'Abaleevi, abaheerereza omuri hekalu, kibe ekyabo eky'okwombekamu endembo z'okutuuramu.

Aha rubaju rw'ekyo kicweka ekyaihirweho kuba ekyanga ekirikwera, muryahatooranira orurembo omwanya gwa mikono enkumi itaano obukiika, n'oburaingwa mikono obukumi n'enkumi itaano; guryaba ogw'enju ya Israeli yoona.
Kiryaba omugabo gwe omuri Israeli. Kandi abagabe bangye tibarigaruka kwita kubi bantu bangye, kureka baryareka enju ya Israeli etungye ensi nk'enganda zaabo oku ziri.
Mugire eminzaani ehikire, eefa ehikire, n'encuro ehikire.
Eefa n'encuro bibe eby'orugyero rumwe; encuro egiibwemu ekicweka kya ikumi kya homeri, na eefa nayo ekicweka kimwe kya ikumi kya homeri; homeri nayo ebe niyo yaaguma neeba eky'okurengyesa.
Shekeli eryabamu geera makumi abiri; shekeli itaano zibe shekeli itaano buzima, shekeli ikumi zibe shekeli ikumi buzima, kandi miina yaanyu eingane shekeli makumi ataano.
Egi niyo mpongano ei muriguma nimuhonga; ekicweka kimwe kya mukaaga kya eefa y'engano ekiihirwe omuri buri homeri; na kimwe kya mukaaga kya eefa ya sayriri omuri buri homeri,
n'encuro y'amajuta eyaatairweho, kimwe kya ikumi ky'enjoga omuri buri kooru (kooru emwe erimu enjoga ikumi, nk'oku kiri omuri homeri emwe);

kandi muhongye entaama emwe omuri buri busyo bw'entaama magana abiri. Emiryango ya Israeli yoona nikwo erihonga etyo, empongano y'esaano, ebitambo by'okwotsya, n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, kugirihiirira; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Abantu b'omu nsi boona baryaha omugabe wa Israeli egyo mpongano.

Kandi guryaba omurimo gw'ogwo mugabe kureeta ebitambo by'okwotsya, empongano z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa, omu magyenyi n'ahari buri kuboneka kw'okwezi n'aha sabato, amagyenyi goona agu enju ya Israeli yaaragiirwe; niwe aritebeekanisa empongano z'ekibi, empongano z'esaano, ebitambo by'okwotsya n'empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye okurihiirira enju ya Israeli.
Omunyamurwa aryatwara aha shagama y'empongano y'ekibi, agite aha biti by'emiryango ya hekalu, aha nshonda ina z'omukugiro gw'eitambiro, n'aha biti by'eirembo ry'ekibuga ky'omunda.
Kandi oryatwaza otyo aha kiro kya mushanju eky'okwo kwezi ahabw'omuntu weena oshobize nari omushema; okwo nikwo muririhiirira hekalu.
Ahari ekyo kiro omugabe aryareeta enimi nto ahabwe n'ahabw'abantu b'omu nsi boona, kuba empongano y'ekibi.

Kandi buri izooba omuri ebyo biro mushanju by'obugyenyi aryahongyera MUKAMA enimi mushanju n'empaya z'entaama mushanju ezitaine kamogo kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya; kandi buri izooba ahongye empaya y'embuzi kuba empongano y'ebibi.
Kandi aryatebeekanisa empongano y'esaano, eefa emwe ahabwa buri nimi, eefa emwe ahabwa buri mpaya y'entaama, na hiini emwe y'amajuta ahabwa buri eefa.
Omu kwezi kwa mushanju aha kiro kyakwo kya ikumi na bitaano, aryatwaza atyo, n'ahabw'ebiro mushanju by'obugyenyi, ahongye empongano z'ekibi, ebitambo by'okwotsya, empongano z'esaano, n'amajuta.

Omugabe aryaguma ataahire omu kisasi ky'eirembo eky'aheeru, ayemerere aha rubaju rw'ekiti kyaryo; abanyamurwa batambe ekitambo kye ky'okwotsya, bahongye empongano ze z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, nawe aramize omu kisasi ky'eirembo; bwanyima ashohore, kwonka eirembo rirekye kukingwa okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Abantu b'omu nsi baryaguma baramize ah'orikutaahira nooza omuri eryo irembo omu maisho ga MUKAMA ahari buri sabato n'ahari buri kuboneka kw'okwezi.
Ekitambo ky'okwotsya, eki omugabe ariguma naahongyera MUKAMA ahari sabato kiryaba abaana b'entaama mukaaga abataine kamogo, n'empaya y'entaama etaine kamogo;
kandi empongano y'esaano erikuhongwa n'egyo mpaya y'entaama eryaba eefa emwe, n'esaano ey'okuhongwa n'abaana b'entaama ebe nyingi nk'oku arikubaasa, hamwe na hiini y'amajuta ahabwa buri eefa.
Aha izooba ry'okuboneka kw'okwezi aryaguma ahongye enimi nto etaine kamogo, n'abaana b'entaama mukaaga, n'empaya y'entaama etaine kamogo;

kandi ahongye empongano y'esaano eefa emwe ahabwa buri nimi, eefa emwe ahabwa buri mpaya y'entaama, n'esaano nyingi ezi arikubaasa ahabw'abaana b'entaama, hamwe na hiini emwe y'amajuta ahabwa buri eefa y'esaano.
Omugabe ku ariba naataaha omuri hekalu, aryaguma arabe omu kisasi ky'eirembo; kandi n'omu kushohora, abe nimwo yaaraba.
Ku baritaahamu, omugabe aryataahamu nabo; kandi ku barishohora, nawe aryashohora.

Omu biro by'amagyenyi n'omu biro bikuru ebyatairweho, empongano eryaguma ebi eefa emwe ahabwa buri nimi nto, na eefa emwe ahabwa buri mpaya y'entaama, n'ahabw'abaana b'entaama omuntu ahe esaano nyingi nk'oku arikubaasa, hamwe na hiini y'amajuta ahabwa buri eefa y'esaano.

Kandi omugabe ku ariteekateeka kuhongyera MUKAMA empongano n'omutima gwekundiire, yaaba kitambo ky'okwotsya nari empongano z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, aryaigurirwa eirembo eririkureeba oburugwa-izooba, ahongye ekitambo kye ky'okwotsya n'empongano ze z'okusiima ahabw'obusingye, nk'oku ashangwa atwaza aha izooba rya sabato. Bwanyima aryashohora; ku ariheza kushohora, eriembo rikingwe.

Kandi aryahonga n'empongano y'esaano buri kasheeshe kimwe kya mukaaga kya eefa emwe, na kimwe kya kashatu kya hiini y'amajuta g'okworobya egyo saano, kuba empongano y'esaano ehongyeirwe MUKAMA; ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'ekitambo ky'okwotsya ekiriguma nikitambwa.
Kandi okwo nikwo bariteebeekanisa omwana gw'entaama n'empongano y'esaano n'amajuta kuba ekitambo ky'okwotsya ekiriguma nikitambwa.
Oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati: Omugabe ku ariiha ekiconco omu buhunguzi bwe, yaakiha omwe aha batabani, kiryaba eky'abatabani; omu biragiro by'obuhunguzi n'ekyabo.

Kwonka ku ariiha ekiconco omu buhunguzi bwe, yaakiha omwe aha baheereza be, kiryaguma kiri ekye okuhitsya omu mwaka gw'obusingye, bwanyima kigarukire omugabe; abatabani bonka nibo bariikirizibwa kugama n'ekiconco ekirugire omu buhunguzi bwe.

Kandi omugabe taritwara ha buhunguzi bw'abantu ahabw'okubabinga omu bintu byabo, kureka aryaraga abatabani ebirugire omu bi atungire byonka, harekye kugira n'omwe omu bantu bangye owaayakwa ebi atungire.

Bwanyima yandabya aharikutaahirwa aha rubaju rw'eirembo, yampitsya aha mushorongo gw'ebishengye ebirikwera eby'abanyamurwa eby'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho; naareebayo omwanya oguri aha muheru gwabyo aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.

Yangira ati: Hariya niho abanyamurwa bariguma nibateekyera empongano y'okwihaho orubanja, n'empongano y'ekibi; kandi niho bariguma nibateeka empongano y'esaano, ngu barekye kubishohoza omu kibuga ky'aheeru, bakabyezesa abantu.
Bwanyima yantwara omu kibuga ky'aheeru, yampitsya aha nshonda ina zaakyo; ahari buri nshonda hakaba hariho ekibuga;
omuri ezo nshonda ina z'ekibuga hakaba hariho obubuga bukye, buri kamwe mikono makumi ana oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono makumi ashatu, bwona buna nibwingaingana.
Omunda y'obwo bubuga bwona, hakaba hombekirwemu omushorongo okwehinguririza ogurimu emyanya y'okuteekyeramu embaju zoona.
Yangira ati: Ago nigo mateekyero agu abarikuheereza omuri hekalu bariteekyeramu ebitambo by'abantu.
Atyo yanshohoreza omu irembo ry'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, yanziguurutsya, yampitsya aha irembo ry'aheeru eririkureeba oburugwa-izooba; naashanga ago maizi nigashohorera aha rubaju rwayo rwa buryo.
Ogwo muntu yaatoora aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, naagyera aine omu ngaro omugoye gw'okugyeresa, yaagyera mikono rukumi, yaanyambutsya omuri ago maizi, naashanga nigahika aha bugombamburi.
Yaagaruka yaagyera mikono rukumi, yaanyambutsya, naashanga nigahika omu maju. Yaagaruka yaagyera mikono rukumi, aho naashanga nigakwata omunda.
Yaagaruka yaagyera mikono rukumi; aho gwaba omugyera ogu ntarikubaasa kwambuka; ahabw'okuba maizi gakaba gaijwire, gari ag'okuziha, omugyera ogutarikwambukwa n'amaguru.
Yangira ati: Mwana w'omuntu, ekyo waakireeba?
Bwanyima yangarurayo, yandabya aha nkungu y'omugyera;
ku naabaire ningarukayo naareeba ebiti bingi aha mbaju zombi z'omugyera.
Yangira ati: Amaizi aga nigahimintika nigatoora oburugwa-izooba, nigashuuma omuri Araba; ku garaahikye omu g'enyanja agatarikugyenda, ago maizi g'enyanja nigaija kuba marungi.

Ei ogwo mugyera gurihika yoona, ebihuriire byona biryagira amagara; kandi haryabamu eby'enyanja bingi munonga, ahabw'okuba amaizi ago nigaza omu nyanja, ngu ago maizi g'enyanja gabe marungi; n'ahabw'ekyo ei ogwo mugyera gurihika yoona, buri kintu kiryagira amagara.
Abajubi baryayemerera aha rubaju rw'enyanja; okuruga Eni-geedi okuhika Enegulaimu haryabaho okutega obutimba; haryabamu eby'enyanja by'emiringo mingi munonga, nk'eby'omu Nyanja empango.
Kwonka amaizi g'omu bisharara byayo n'ag'omu myanya yaayo yorutenga tigariba marungi; garyatsigwaho kwihwamu omwonyo.

Kandi aha nkungu z'aha mbaju zombi z'ogwo mugyera haryamera ebiti by'emiringo yoona eby'ebijuma ebirikuriibwa. Amababi gaabyo tigarihotoka, n'ebijuma byabyo tibirihunduura, kureka ebyo biti biryaguma nibyana buri kwezi; ahabw'okuba amaizi gaabyo nigaruga omu Mwanya ogurikwera. Ebijuma byabyo biryaba eby'okurya, n'amababi gaabyo gabe ag'okutamba.
Muryagibagana omu bwinganisa, ahabw'okuba nkarahira kugiha baashwenkuriimwe; kandi egyo nsi eryaba obuhunguzi bwanyu.
Berosa, Siburaimu eri aha mwatano ogurikutaanisa Damasiko na Hamasi, n'okuhika Hazeri-hatikooni aha mwatano gwa Hauraani.

Kandi omwatano guryaruga aha nyanja, guhikye Hazarenooni eri aha mwatano gwa Damasiko ogw'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, gwatane n'ogwa Hamasi aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho. Ogwo nigwo guriba omwatano ogw'aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho.

Aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba omwatano guryaruga Hazarenooni eri ahagati ya Hauraani na Damasiko, guryende aha rubaju rwa Yorudani ahagati ya Gileadi n'ensi ya Israeli, guhikye aha nyanja y'oburugwa-izooba, gugumizemu guhikye Tamari. Ogwo nigwo mwatano gw'oburugwa-izooba.

Aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo guryaruga Tamari, guhikye aha maizi ga Meribati-kadeshi, gurugyeyo gurabe aha rubaju rw'akagyera ka Misri, guhikye aha Nyanja empango. Ogwo nigwo mwatano gw'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba Enyanja empango niyo eriba omwatano, okuhika ahashungaine n'ah'orikutaahira nooza Hamasi. Orwo nirwo ruriba orubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba.
Okwo nikwo muribaganisa egyo nsi, nk'oku enganda za Israeli ziri.
Muryagibagana, ebe obuhunguzi bwanyu n'obw'abanyamahanga abatwire naimwe, bakabazaariramu; ahariimwe baryaba nk'enzaarwa za Israeli; baryaheebwa naimwe obuhunguzi omu nganda za Israeli.
Oruganda rwona oru omunyaihanga ariba atwiremu, mube nimwo mwamuha obuhunguzi; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Daani, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Ashera.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Ashera, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba guryaba omugabo gwa Nafutaali.
Aheereraine n'ekyanga kya Nafutaali, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba guryaba omugabo gwa Manaase.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Manaase, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Efuraimu.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Efuraimu, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba guryaba omugabo gwa Reubeeni.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Reubeeni, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Yuda.
Ekicweka eki muriihiraho MUKAMA kiryaba mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono obukumi bubiri.

Ekyo kicweka ekirikwera kiryabaganisibwa omu bicweka ebiabanyamurwa baryatunga omugabo gw'ekicweka kya mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho, mikono kakumi aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, mikono kakumi aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, na mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-rwa-buryo, kiine Omwanya ogurikwera gwa MUKAMA ahagati.
Ekyo kiryaba eky'abanyamurwa abashoroirwe, beene Zadoki, abaarinzire ebi naabakwatsize, abatarahabire obu Abaisraeli baahaba, nk'oku Abaleevi baahabire.
Guryaba omugabo gwabo ogu bacumiirwe ogwihirwe omuri ekyo kicweka ky'ensi ekirikwera, ekiheereraine n'ekicweka ky'Abaleevi.

Ahaheereraine n'ekicweka ky'abanyamurwa, Abaleevi baryaheebwa omugabo gwa mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano oburaingwa, n'obukiika mikono kakumi. Oburaingwa bw'ekyo kicweka kyona buryaba mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano n'obukiika mikono obukumi bubiri.
Ekyo kicweka ky'ensi ekiriihwaho tibarikitunda n'obu kwakuba okuhingisa ekicweka kyakyo kyona n'ekindi; kandi tikiriba ky'abandi bantu; ahabw'okuba n'ekyereziibwe MUKAMA.

Kandi ezi nizo ngyero zaarwo; aha rubaju rw'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso ruryaba mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano; orw'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano; orw'oburugwa-izooba mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano; n'orw'oburengyerwa-izooba narwo mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano.

Kandi orurembo ruryagira ogwo mwanya gw'akataajuure, aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso mikono magana abiri na makumi ataano, aha rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo mikono magana abiri na makumi ataano, aha rw'oburugwa-izooba mikono magana abiri na amkumi ataano, naha buryengyerwa-izooba naho mikono magana abiri na makumi ataano.

Ekicweka ekiritsigaraho, ekiheereraine n'ekicweka ky'omugabo ogurikwera, kiryaba mikono kakumi aha rubaju rw'orurembo orw'oburugwa-izooba, kandi mikono kakumi aha rubaju rwarwo orw'oburengyerwa-izooba; hoona haheererane n'ekyo kicweka ekirikwera. Kandi emyaka yaaho eryaguma ebe eby'okurya by'abakozi b'omu rurembo.
Abakozi b'omu rurembo, abarikuruga omu nganda zoona eza Israeli, nibo bariguma nibahahinga.
N'ahabw'ekyo ekicweka kyona, eki muriihaho, kiryaba ekya mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano embaju zaakyo zoona ina, nikyo kicweka ky'omugabo ogurikwera yhamwe n'omwanya gwona ogw'orurembo.

Kandi ekicweka ekiritsigara aha mbaju zombi ez'ekicweka ky'omugabo ogurikwera n'omwanya gw'orurembo kiryaba eky'omugabe. Okuruga ahari ogwo mwanya gw'omugabo ogurikwera gwa mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano, okuhika aha mwatano gw'oburugwa-izooba, kandi okutoora oburengyerwa-izooba okuruga ahari ogwo mwanya gw'omugabo ogurikwera gwa mikono obukumi bubiri n'enkumi itaano okuhika aha mwatano gw'oburengyerwa-izooba, ahaheereraine n'emigabo y'enganda, haryaba ah'omugabe. Kandi ogwo mugabo ogurikwera ogurimu Omwanya ogurikwera gwa hekalu ahagati,
hamwe n'omwanya gw'orurembo, guryaba ahagati y'ekyanga ky'omugabe. Ekyo kyanga kirayaba ahagati y'omugabo gwa Yuda n'ogwa Benyamiini.
Kandi eby'ezindi nganda, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Benyamiini.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Benyamiini okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba guryaba omugabo gwa Simeoni.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Simeoni, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Isakaari.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Isakaari, okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba ekyanga kya Zebuluuni.
Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Zebuluuni, okuruga aha burugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba, guryaba omugabo gwa Gaadi.

Ahaheereraine n'ekyanga kya Gaadi aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, omwatano guryaruga Tamari, guhikye aha maizi ga Meribati-kadeshi, gugumizemu gurabe aha rubaju rw'akagyera ka Misri, guhikye aha Nyanga empango.
Egyo niyo nsi ei muribagana omu nganda za Israeli kuba obuhunguzi, kandi egyo niyo migabo yaazo buri rumwe; nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Kandi aga nigo gariba amarembo g'orurembo; aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho orwa mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano
haryabaho amarembo ashatu, eirembo rya Reubeeni, erya Yuda n'erya Leevi, ago marembo geetererwa amaziina g'enganda za Israeli.
Aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, orwa mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano, amarembo ashatu, erya Yosefu, erya Benyamiini, n'erya Daani;
aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, orwa mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano, erya Simeoni, erya Isakaari n'erya Zebuluuni;
n'aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, orwa mikono enkumi ina na magana ataano, narwo amarembo ashatu, erya Gaadi, erya Asheri n'erya Nafutaali.
Aheehinguririize orurembo hoona haryaba mikono kakumi n'enkumi munaana. Kandi okwiha obwo orwo rurembo ruryayetwa Yehova-shama, amakuru ngu MUKAMA niyo ari.
Mukama yaahayo Yehoyakimu omugabe wa Yuda omu mikono ye, hamwe n'ebintu bimwe eby'omu nju ya Ruhanga; Nebukadeneeza yaabitwara Shinaari, yaabita omu ibiikiro ry'omuri hekalu ya ruhanga we.
Omugabe yaaragiira Ashipenazi omukuru w'abakonwa be kureeta bamwe aha batsigazi b'omu Baisraeli, ab'omu ruganda rw'abagabe n'orw'abakungu,

abatsigazi abataine kamogo, abarungi, abaine obwengye omu by'emyoga byona, abaine okumanya kwingi, abarikwetegyereza omu by'okwega, kandi abarikubaasa kuheereza omu kikaari ky'omugabe, ngu abeegyese obwengye bw'Abakaludaaya n'orurimi rwabo.

Atyo omugabe yaabateeraho omugabo gwa buri izooba gw'eby'okurya ebi yaabaire aryaho, na viinyo ei yaabaire anywaho, kumara emyaka eshatu nibariisibwa gye, ngu aha muheru gwayo babone kwemerera omu maisho g'omugabe.
Omuri abo hakaba harimu Danieli, Hanania, Mishaeli na Azaria ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda.
Kandi ogwo mukuru w'abakonwa yaabakubya agandi maziina; Danieli yaamweta Beliteeshaza, Hanania yaamweta Seduraaka, Mishaeli yaamweta Mesaaki, na Azaria yaamweta Abedeneego.

Kwonka Danieli yaamariirira omu mitima gwe okuteeshiisha n'eby'okurya by'omugabe, n'obu yaakuba viinyo ei yaabaire anywa; nikyo yaayeshengyerereize omukuru w'abakonwa ngu amwikirize, arekye kweshiisha.
Kandi Ruhanga yaaha Danieli okugirirwa embabazi n'esaasi omu maisho g'ogwo mukuru w'abakonwa.

Omukuru w'abakonwa yaagira Danieli ati: Nintiina mukama wangye omugabe, owaabateereireho eby'okurya n'eby'okunywa, atakaasahanga muhundamire okukira abatsigazi abu murikwingana nabo, mukantemesaho omutwe.
Bwanyima Danieli yaashaba omugabuzi, owaabaire atairweho omukuru w'abakonwa kureeberera Danieli ogwo Hanania, Mishaeli na Azaria, ati:
Ninkweshengyereza otugyeze, tumare ebiro ikumi niturya ebihimba, kandi ninywa amaizi.
Bwanyima otureebe, otushushanise n'abandi batsigazi abarikurya aha by'okurya by'omugabe; haza oku oraareebe, obe nikwo waatwaza abairu baawe.
Atyo yaabahurira, yaikiriza kumara ebiro ikumi naabagyeza, ahabw'ekyo eki baashaba.
Aha muheru gw'ebyo biro ikumi yaashanga nibareebeka gye, kandi bagomokire okukira abatsigazi boona abaabaire nibarya aha by'okurya by'omugabe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo mugabuzi yaabaiha ahari ebyo by'okurya ebi baabaire nibaragiirwa kurya, na viinyo ei baabaire nibaragiirwa kunywa, yaaguma naabaha ebihimba.
Obunaku obu omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaaragiire kubareeteramu ku bwahikire, omukuru w'abakonwa yaabareeta kubamumurikira.
Ku baahikire aho, omugabe yaagaaniira nabo; kwonka omu bandi boona tiharabonekiremu owaabaire ari nka Danieli, Hanania, Mishaeli na Azaria; nikyo baabeereire ab'okuheereza omugabe.
Kandi omu bigambo byona eby'obwengye n'eby'okwetegyereza, akashanga nibakira abafumu n'abarogi boona abaabaire bari omu bugabe bwe bwona emirundi ikumi.
Bwanyima Danieli ayaaguma aho okuhitsya omu mwaka gw'okubanza ogw'omu busingye bwa Kuuro.
Atyo omugabe yaaragiira ku baamwetera abafumu, abahi b'engisha, abarogi n'Abakaludaaya, ngu barootorore ebi arootsire. Batyo baija, baayemerera omu maisho g'omugabe.
Yaabagira ati: Ndootsire ekirooto; ahabw'okwenda kukimanya kyandeetera kwemereza omutima.
Batyo Abakaludaaya baagira omugabe bati: Karamaare, Nyakusinga! Gambira abairu baawe ekyo kirooto, tubone kukikushobororera.
Omugabe yaagarukamu Abakaludaaya ati: Eki ngamba tikihinduka; ku muraabe mutakindootororeire, mukanshobororera amakuru gaakyo, nimwija kutemagurwa, n'amaka gaanyu gahindurwe orubungo.
Kwonka ku mraakindootororere n'amakuru gaakyo, niinyija kubaha ebiconco, n'ebihembo kandi n'ekitiinisa kingi. Mbwenu mpaho, nimukinshobororere n'amakuru gaakyo.
Baamugarukamu obwa kabiri bati: Nyakusinga naagambire abairu be ekyo kirooto, naitwe nitwija kukimushobororera.
Omugabe yaabagarukamu ati: Nimmanyira kimwe ku murikwenda kumara omwanya gwa busha, ahakuba nimumanya ngu eki naagamba nikwo kiri;

ku muraabe mutandootororeire eki kirooto, hariho ekigambo kimwe kyonka eki ndikwija kubakora. Mugiire omu naama kumbeiha n'okugambira ebitahikire omu maisho gangye, okuhitsya obu ebintu biraahindukye. Mbwenu nimungambire eki ndootsire, mbone kumanya ku murikubaasa n'okunshobororera amakuru gaakyo.

Abakaludaaya baagarukamu omugabe bati: Tihariho muntu n'omwe omu nsi owaakubaasa kugambira omugabe ekyo kigambo; ahabw'okuba tihariho mugabe, n'obu yaakuba mukuru kandi ow'amaani ata, orabuurize omufumu weena, omurogi weena, nari Omukaludaaya weena ekigambo nk'ekyo.
Eki omugabe arikubuuza kigumire, tihariho orikubaasa kukishobororera omugabe kureka baaruhanga, abatatuura mu bantu.
N'ahabw'ekyo ekiragiro kyashohozibwa kwita abanyabwengye boona, baasherura Danieli na bagyenzi be kubaita.
Bwanyima Arioki omukuru w'abarinzi b'omugabe, owaagiire kwita abanyabwengye b'omuri Babuklooni, ku yaahikire Danieli, Danieli yaamugarukisamu obwengye n'okwerinda,
naagira ati: Ahabw'enki omugabe ashohoize ekiragiro ekirikushaarira kiti? Atyo Arioki yaakishobororera Danieli.
Ahonaaho Danieli yaaza ow'omugabe, yaamushaba kumuha obunaku, obu araizireho kumushobororera amakuru g'ekyo kirooto.
Bwanyima Danieli yaataaha omu nju ye, yaabimanyisa bagyenzi be Hanania, Mishaeli na Azaria,
yaabagambira kushaba Ruhanga ow'omu iguru kubagirira embabazi, akabashuuruurira ekyo kigambo, ngu we na bagyenzi be barekye kucwekyerezibwa n'abandi banyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni.
Ahonaaho ekyo kigambo kyashuuruurirwa Danieli nyekiro omu kworekwa. Danieli nikwo kusiima Ruhanga ow'omu iguru,
naagira ati
Eiziina rya Ruhanga rihimbisibwe ebiro byona,
Ahabw'okuba obwengye n'obushoboorozi n'ebye.
Niwe aihaho, abagabe, akataho abandi;
Aha abanyabwengye obwengye,
N'abarikwetegyereza abaha okumanya;
Amanya ebiri omu mwirima,
Kandi n'omushana gutuura nawe.
Ninkusiima, kandi ninkuhimbisa,
Ahabw'okuba wampa obwengye n'amaani,
Kandi hati wanshobororera ebi twakushaba;
Ahakuba waatumanyisa eki omugabe arikufa.

N'ahabw'ekyo Danieli yaaza owa Arioki, ou omugabe yaabaire aragiire kucwekyereza abanyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni, yaamugira ati: Otacwekyereza abanyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni; kureka ontwara ow'omugabe, mmushobororere amakuru g'ekirooto.
Atyo Arioki yaarahuka, yaatwara Danieli aha mugabe, yaamugira ati: Ndeebire omushaija w'omu Bayuda abaanyagirwe, orikubaasa kushobororera omugabe ekirooto kye.
Omugabe yaabuuza Danieli orikwetwa Beliteeshaza, ati: Iwe, noobaasa kungambira eki ndootsire n'amakuru gaakyo?

Danieli yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Omu banyabwengye, nari abarogi, nari abafumu, n'obu haakuba omu barikuragura eby'enyonyoozi, tiharimu n'omwe orikubaasa kushobororera omugabe ekitarikumanywa eki arikubuuza;

kureka hariho Ruhanga omu iguru, oshuuruura ebitarikumanywa, kandi niwe amanyiise omugabe Nebukadeneeza ebiribaho omu biro ebiriija. Ekirooto kyawe n'ebi oyorekirwe obyami aha kitanda kyawe nibyo ebi.
Nyakusinga, ku obaire obyami aha kitanda kyawe, waizirwa ebiteekateeko by'ebiribaho omu biro ebiriija; Oshuuruura ebitarikumanywa niwe akumanyiise ebiribaho.
Kandi nyowe ahabwangye timbishuuruuriirwe ahabw'okuba omunyabwengye okukira abandi boona, kureka ngu omugabe amanyisibwe amakuru gaabyo, kandi amanye ebiteekateeko by'omu mutima gwe.
Nyakusinga, ku ogiire kugira oti, waareeba ekishushani kihango. Ekyo kishushani rutaaba ekirikumurinkana kyarumbaara omu maisho gaawe, kandi okureebeka kwakyo kubaire nikutiinisa.
Omutwe gw'ekyo kishushani gubaire guri ogw'ezaabu eshemeziibwe, ekifuba kyakyo n'emikono yaakyo biri eby'efeeza, enda yaakyo n'ebibero byakyo biri eby'emiringa,
amaguru gaakyo gari ag'ekyoma, kandi ebigyere byakyo bibaire biri ekyoma n'ebumba.
Ku obaire nookikyetegyereza, haatimbirayo eibaare, eritahigwirwe muntu, ryateera ebigyere by'ekyo kishushani eby'ekyoma n'eibumba, ryabyatagura;

ahonaaho ekyoma, eibumba, emiringa, efeeza n'ezaabu byayatagurikira kimwe, byahinduka nk'omweziga omuyaga gwabituntumura, waashusha oti haaba hataine kiriho. Kwonka eryo ibaare, eryateera ekyo kishushani, ryahinduka orushozi ruhango, rwamara ensi yoona.
Ekyo nikyo kirooto; mbwenu twaza kushobororera omugabe amakuru gaakyo.
Nyakusinga, omugabe w'abagabe, ou Ruhanga w'omu iguru yaahaire obugabe, obushoboorozi, amaani n'ekitiinisa,
kandi akakuha abaana b'abantu, enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa n'amahungu g'omu mwanya, akakugira omutegyeki waabyo byona, ahu bituura hoona,mbwenu niiwe ogwo mutwe gw'ezaabu.
Ku orirugaho, haryaimuka obundi bugabe oburikukirwa obwawe; bwanyima hahurateho obundi bugabe bwa kashatu obw'omuringa, butegyekye ensi yoona.

Kandi haryabaho obugabe bwa kana, obugumire nk'ekyoma, ahabw'okuba ekyoma kyatagura ebintu byona, kibicwa obusaasingo; nk'oku ekyoma kyatagura, nikwo n'obwo bugabe buryatagura obwo bwona, bukabucwa obusaasingo.

Kandi nk'oku oreebire ebigyere n'enkumu zaabyo biri eibumba ry'omubumbi n'ekyoma, nikwo obwo bugabe buryebaganisamu; kwonka omuribwo haryabamu okuguma kw'ekyoma, nk'oku oreebire ekyoma kijwangizemu eibumba.
Kandi nk'oku enkumu z'ebigyere zibaire ziri ekyoma kandi eibumba, nikwo n'obwo bugabe buriba; ekicweka kyabwo kiryaba ekigumire, n'ekindi kibe ekirikwetwa busha.
Kandi nk'oku oreebire ekyoma kijwangire n'eibumba, nikwo barishwerana, bakajwanga, kwonka tibariguma hamwe, nk'oku ekyoma kitajwanga na ibumba.

Kandi omu busingye bw'abo bagabe Ruhanga w'omu iguru aryataho obundi bugabe, obutaricwekyerezibwa ebiro byona, kandi obutegyeki bwabwo tiburihungurwa rindi ihanga; kureka buryayatagura obwo bugabe bwona, bubumareho, kandi bwo buryagumaho,

nk'oku oreebire eibaare ryatimbira omu rushozi, ritahingwirwe muntu, rikacwanyagura ekyoma, emiringa, eibumba, efeeza n'ezaabu. Ruhanga omukuru ashuuruuriire omguabe ebiribaho bwanyima. Ekyo kirooto n'eky'amazima, n'amakuru gaakyo tigarikubanganisibwa.
Yaagira Danieli ati: Buzimazima Ruhanga waanyu niwe Ruhanga Nyamuhanga, Mukama w'abagabe, kandi niwe ashuuruura ebitarikumanywa; ahabw'okuba obaasize kushuuruura eki ekitarikumanywa.
Bwanyima omugabe yaaha Danieli ekitiinisa kingi n'ebiconco bingi bihango, yaamugira omutegyeki w'eishaza omureeberezi mukuru w'abanyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni boona.
Kandi Danieli yaashaba omugabe, omugabe yaataho Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego kureeberera eishaza rya Babulooni; kwonka Danieli we yaaguma omu kikaari ky'omugabe.
Omugabe Nebukadeneeza akakora ekishushani ky'ezaabu, oburaingwa bwakyo mikono makumi mukaaga, n'obuhango bwakyo mikono mukaaga. Yaakyemereza omu ruhita rwa Duura omu ishaza rya Babulooni.

Bwanyima omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaatuma kuteeranira hamwe ab'amashaza, abareeberezi, abakuru b'amahe, abahi b'obwengye, ababiiki, abahi b'ebiragiro, abaramuzi, n'abakungu boona ab'omu mashaza ngu baije kushoroora ekishushani eki omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaayemereize.

Batyo ab'amashaza, abareeberezi, abakuru b'amahe, abahi b'obwengye, ababiiki, abahi b'ebiragiro, abaramuzi n'abakungu boona ab'omu mashaza, baija, baateeranira hamwe kushoroora ekishushani eki omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaayemereize.
Omurangi yaaranga n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Imwe abantu b'amahanga, n'enganda, n'ab'endimi ezitari zimwe, nimuragiirwa ngu,

ku muraahurire amaraka g'enzamba, esheegu, endingiri, amakondere, enanga, obunyamurera n'emiringo yoona ey'ebirikugamba, mujuumare ahansi, muramye ekishushani ky'ezaabu eki omugabe Nebukadeneeza ayemereize;
kandi omuntu weena oraayangye kujuumara ahansi kukiramaya, naija kunagwa ahonaaho omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma.

N'ahabw'ekyo abantu boona ku bahuriire amaraka g'enzamba, esheegu, endingiri, amakondere, enanga, obunyamurera n'emiringo yoona ey'ebirikugamba, abantu boona ab'amahanga, n'enganda n'ab'endimi ezitari zimwe, baajuumara ahansi, baaramya ekyo kishushani ky'ezaabu, eki omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaayemereize.
Omuri ako kaanya Abakaludaaya bamwe baija, baarega Abayudaaya,
nibagira omugabe Nebukadeneeza bati: Karamaare, Nyakusinga!

Nyakusinga omugabe, otaireho ekiragiro, ngu omuntu weena oraahurire amaraka g'enzamba, esheegu, endigiri, amakondere, enanga, obunyamurera, n'emiringo yoona ey'ebirikugamba ajuumare ahansi, aramye ekishushani ky'ezaabu;
kandi ngu oraayangye kujuumara ahansi kukiramya, anagwe omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma.

Mbwenu hariho Abayudaaya bamwe, abu waataireho kureeberera eishaza rya Babulooni, Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego. Nyakusinga, abo bashaija tibarikukwetaho; tibarikuheereza baaruhanga baawe, kandi bangire kuramya ekishushani ky'ezaabu, eki oyemereize.
Ahonaaho Nebukadeneeza yaagira ekiniga kingi, yaaragiira ku bareeta Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego. Batyo baabareeta omu maisho g'omugabe.
Nebukadeneeza yaababuuza ati: Iwe Seduraaka, na Mesaaki na Abedeneego, n'eky'amazima, mwangire kuheereza baaruhanga bangye n'okuramya ekishushani ky'ezaabu, eki nyemereize?

Mbwenu ku muraahurire amaraka g'enzamba, esheegu, endingiri, amakondere, enanga, obunyamurera, n'miringo yoona ey'ebirikugamba, mwaikiriza kujuumara ahansi kuramya ekishushani eki nyemereize, obwo biri byaba gye; kwonka ku muraayangye kuramya, ahonaaho nimwija kunagwa omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma. Mbwenu ni ruhanga ki oraabaihe omu mikono yangye?
Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego baagarukamu omugabe bati: Nyakusinga Nebukadeneeza, tihaine kirikutugyema kukugarukamu aha kigambo ekyo.
Ku kiraabe kityo, Ruhanga waitu, ou tuheereza, naabaasa kutwiha omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma; kandi naija kutwiha omu mikono yaawe, Nyakusinga Omugabe.
Kandi n'obu kuraabe kitabaire kityo, Nyakusinga, okimanyire kimwe ku tutarikwija kuheereza baaruhanga baawe, n'obu kwakuba okuramya ekishushani ky'ezaabu eki oyemereize.

Okuruga aho Nebukadeneeza yaagira ekiniga kingi, aha maisho ge haahinduriza, yaateera Seduraaka, Mesaaki, na Abedeneego ekitsyori; yaaragiira okukoomeera omuriro ngu gubone kwaka n'amaani okukira oku gutakabaga emirundi mushanju.
Bwanyima yaatoorana abashaija b'amaani omu ngabo ze, yaabaragiira kuboha Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego, n'okubanaga omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma.
Batyo baaboha abo bashaija bajwaire empare ndaingwa n'ekooti n'enkofiira n'ebindi bijwaro ebi baabaire bajwaire, baabanaga omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma.
Kandi ahabw'ekiragiro ky'omugabe kuba eky'amaani, n'omuriro kubugumira kimwe, endimi z'omuriro zaita abo bashaija, abaakiriize Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego.
Batyo abo bashaija bonshatu, Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego baagwa omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ogurikubuguma babohirwe.

Bwanyima omugabe Nebukadeneeza yaatangaara, yaimuka n'obwira, yaabuuza abahi b'obwengye be ati: Hari abashaija abu twanaga omu muriro babohirwe baaba batari bashatu? Baamugarukamu bati: Nikwo, Nyakusinga.
Yaabagira ati: Mbwenu nindeeba abashaija bana batabohirwe, nibagyendagyenda ahagati omu muriro, bataine ku babaire; kandi emishusire y'owa kana neeshusha ey'omwana wa baaruhanga.

Ab'amashaza, abakuru b'amahe, n'abahi b'obwengye b'omugabe baateeranira hamwe, baareeba abo bashaija, baashanga omuriro gutaine ki gubaitsize, eishokye ry'aha mitwe yaabo ritababukire, ebijwaro byabo bitaine ku bibaire, n'ekibabo ky'omuriro kitarikubanuukaho.

Nikyo ndikuteeraho ekiragiro ngu, abantu boona b'omu mahanga goona n'enganda zoona ez'endimi ezitari zimwe, abarirogota ahari Ruhanga wa Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego, batemagurwe, n'amaka gaabo gasheenywe; ahabw'okuba tihariho ruhanga ondiijo orikubaasa kujuna ebi bigyene.
Okuruga aho omugabe yaakuza Seduraaka, Mesaaki na Abedeneego omu ishaza rya Babulooni.
Kyanshemeza kworeka obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebi Ruhanga orikukira boona ankoreire.
N'eby'okutangaaza bye ka ni bikuru!
Obukama bwe n'obukama obutarihwaho,
N'obutegyeki bwe bugumaho, nk'oku obusingye bugyenda nibwihaihana.
Nyowe, Nebukadeneeza, nkaba ngaramisiriize omu nju yangye, eby'omu kikaari kyangye byona nibigyenda gye.
Ekiro kimwe naaroota ekirooto ekyantiiniise; ku naabaire mayami aha kitanda kyangye, ebiteekateeko n'ebi naayorekirwe omu mutwe gangye byandeetera kwemereza omutima.
Nikyo naaragiriire ku bandeetera abanyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni boona, ngu banshobororere ebi naarootsire,
Batyo abafumu n'abhi b'engisha n'Abakaludaaya, n'abarikuragura eby'enyonyoozi, baija, naabagambira ekyo kirooto, kwonka baaremwa kukinshobororera.

Bwanyima Danieli yaija omu maisho gangye, (Danieli ogwo niwe owaayetsirwe Beliteeshaza, nibamweterera ruhanga wangye, kandi owaabaire aine omwoyo gwa baaruhanga abarikwera) naamugambira ekyo kirooto, ningira nti:

Iwe Beliteeshaza, omukuru w'abafumu, nimmanya ngu oine omwoyo gwa baaruhanga abarikwera, kandi tihaine kitarikumanywa eki oremwa kushoboorora; mbwenu nshobororera ekirooto eki ndootsire, mmanye amakuru gaakyo.
Ebi nyorekirwe ndi aha kitanda kyangye nibyo ebi. Ku ngiire kugira nti, naareeba ekiti kirumbaire ahagati y'ensi, oburaingwa bwakyo burengyesereize.
Ekyo kiti kyakura, kyahama, omutwe gwakyo gwahika omu iguru, kyareebwa ab'aha muheru gw'ensi yoona;

amababi gaakyo gaabengyeya, n'ebijuma byakyo byaba bingi; kandi kyabamu eby'okurya ebirikuhaazya abantu boona; enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa zaabona ekicuucu ahansi yaakyo, amahungu g'omu mwanya gaatuura omu mataagi gaakyo, n'ebiine omubiri byona kyaba nikyo kyabitunga.

Yaaragiira n'eiraka rihango naagira ati: Tema ekyo kiti, okikonkoboreho amataagi, okiiheho amababi, onaganagye ebijuma byakyo, enyamaishwa zihungye ahansi yaakyo, n'amahungu garugye omu mataagi gaakyo;

kwonka ekitsintsi okirekye kiri aha mizi yaakyo omu itaka omu bunyaatsi bw'omuroba obw'omu ishwa kibohirwe ebyoma n'emiringa, kigume nikitondwaho orume orurikuruga omu iguru, kandi kirye n'enyamaishwa obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa;
omutima gwakyo gurekye kuguma guri ogw'omuntu, kureka kiheebwe omutima gw'enyamaishwa; kigume kityo okumara omwanya nk'ogw'emyaka mushanju.

Ekyo kifubiro kiragiirwe abarinzi, kyateebwaho ekigambo ky'abarikwera, ngu abakiriho abahuriire bamanye ngu Orikukira boona niwe ategyeka obugabe bw'abantu, kandi akabugabira ou arikwenda, akabwemekamu ab'ahansi okukira abandi boona.

Ekyo kirooto, nyowe omugabe Nebukadeneeza, niinye nkirootsire. Mbwenu iwe Beliteeshaza, okinshobororere, ahabw'okuba abanyabwengye boona tibarikubaasa kukinshobororera; kwonka iwe nookibaasa, ahabw'okuba omwoyo gwa baaruhanga abarikwera guri omuriiwe.
Mbwenu ekyo kiti ki oreebire nikikura, kikahama, omutwe gwakyo gukahika omu iguru, kikareebwa ab'aha muheru gw'ensi yoona,

n'amababi gaakyo gakabengyeya, kikagira ebijuma bingi, kikabamu eby'okurya ebirikuhaazya abantu boona, kandi enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa zikabona ekicuucu ahansi yaakyo, amahungu g'omu mwanya gakatuura omu mataagi gaakyo,
Nyakusinga, ekyo kiti niiwe. Okakura, waahama, obukuru bwawe bwayeyongyera bwahika omu iguru, n'obutegyeki bwawe bwahika aha muheru gw'ensi.

Kandi, nk'oku omugabe areebire orikwera ogizirwe omurinzi naashuuma naaruga omu iguru, akagira ati: Tema ekyo kiti, okimareho; kwonka ekitsintsi n'emizi yaakyo obibohese ebyoma n'emiringa, obirekye omu itaka omu bunyaatsi bw'omuroba obw'omu ishwa, kigume nikitondwaho orume orurikuruga omu iguru, kandi kirye n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa, kigume kityo okumara omwanya nk'ogw'emyaka mushanju;
mbwenu Nyakusinga, amakuru gaakyo nigo aga. Omanye ku kiri ekiragiro kya Rukira-boona, ekyahika ahari mukama wangye omguabe.

Noija kubingwa omu bantu, otaahe n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa, orye obunyaatsi nk'ente, otondweho orume orurikuruga omu iguru, omare omwanya nk'ogw'emyaka mushanju ori otyo, okuhitsya obu orimanya ngu Rukira-boona niwe ategyeka obugabe bw'abantu, akabuha ou arikwenda weena.
Kandi nk'oku baragiire kureka ekitsintsi n'emizi y'ekyo kiti, nikwo obugabe bwawe burikwija kukurindirwa, okuhitsya obu orimanya ngu Eiguru niryo ritegyeka.

N'ahabw'ekyo, Nyakusinga, ninkushaba oikirize obwengye obu ndikukuha; omareho ebibi byawe ahabw'okukora eby'okuhikiirira, kandi ebicumuro byawe obiihiseho okugirira abarikuhatwa embabazi, obundi okuba gye kwawe kukaabaasa kwongyerwaho.
Bwanyima ebyo byona byahika aha mugabe Nebukadeneeza.
Ku haahingwire ameezi ikumi n'abiri, eizooba rimwe omugabe akaba naagyendagyenda aha mutwe gw'enju, nyaruju y'obugabe bwa Babulooni.
Yaagira ati: Babulooni egi yoona t'ei naayombekire n'amaani g'obushoboorozi bwangye kandi n'ekitiinisa ky'obukuru bwangye?
Ebyo bigambo ku byabaire bitakarugire mu kanwa k'omugabe, eiraka ryaruga omu iguru nirigira riti: Iwe mugabe 'we Nebukadeneeza, niiwe orikugambirwa. Obugabe bwawe bwakwihwaho,

noija kubingwa omu bantu, otuure n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa; noija kurya obunyaatsi nk'ente; kandi omare omwanya nk'ogw'emyaka mushanju ori otyo, okuhitsya obu orimanya ku Rukira-boona niwe ategyeka obugabe bw'abantu, akabuha ou arikwenda weena.

Ahonaaho ekigambo ekyo kyahikiirira ahari Nebukadeneeza, yaabingwa omu bantu, yaaguma naarya obunyaatsi nk'ente, omubiri gwe nigutondwaho orume orurikuruga omu iguru, okuhitsya obu eishokye rye ryakuzire rikaba nk'amooya g'eishamba, n'ebyara bye bikashokoza n'eby'enyonyi.
Ahabw'okuba obutegyeki bwe n'obutegyeki obutahwaho,
Kandi obukama bwe bugumaho, nk'oku obusingye bugyenda nibwihaihana.
Akora omu mahe g'omu iguru n'omu batuura omu nsi
Nk'oku arikwenda,
Kandi tihariho obaasa kumuteera ha mukono,
Nari okugira ati: Eki nookora ki?

Omu bunaku nibwo bumwe naagarukwamu akengye, kandi obukuru bwangye n'okwizihirwa kwangye byangarukaho kureetera obugabe bwangye ekitiinisa. Abahi b'obwengye bangye n'abakungu bangye bankubuukira, naahamibwa omu bugabe bwangye, n'obukuru bwangye bwayongyerwaho.
Omugabe Belishaza akateekyera abakungu be rukumi obugyenyi bwingi munonga, yaanywera viinyo omu maisho g'abo bakungu rukumi.

Belishaza, ku yaashomire ati ahari viinyo, yaaragiira kumureetera ebintu by'ezaabu n'efeeza, ebi Nebukadeneeza ishe yaanyagire omuri hekalu ya Yerusaalemu, ngu we n'abakungu be, abakazi be n'ebinyanshunju bye babinywaise.
Batyo baamureetera ebyo bintu by'ezaabu n'efeeza, ebyaihirwe omuri hekalu, enju ya Ruhanga, omuri Yerusaalemu; omugabe, abakungu be, abakazi be n'ebinyanshunju bye baabinywaisa;
baanywa viinyo, baahimbisa baaruhanga baabo b'ezaabu, b'efeeza, b'emiringa, b'ebyoma, b'ebiti, kandi n'ab'amabaare.
Ahonaaho enkumu z'engaro y'omuntu zaareebeka, zaahandiika aha kisiika kya nyaruju y'omugabe aharikureebana n'ekikondo ky'etabaaza; omugabe yaareeba egyo ngaro neehandiika.
Ku yaagireebire, yaahinduriza ahamaisho, yaayemereza omutima ahabw'ebiteekateeko; amanyaanya gaamunyuukuka, eseiso z'amaju zaakomangana.

Omugabe yaataka n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Nimundeetere abafumu n'Abakaludaaya n'abarikuragura eby'enyonyoozi. Abo banyabwengye b'omuri Babulooni ku baizire, omugabe yaabagira ati: Weena oraashome ekyo kihandiiko, akakinshobororera, naija kujwekwa omwenda gwa bujwa, n'omukuufu gw'ezaabu omu bitsya, kandi abe omutegyeki wa kashatu omu bugabe.
Batyo abo banyabwengye b'omugabe baatahamu, kwonka baaremwa kushoma ekyo kihandiiko, n'obu kwakuba okukimushobororera.
Omugabe Belishaza yaayemereza munonga omutima, yaahinduriza ahamaisho, n'abakungu be baashoberwa.

Reeba, omu bugabe bwawe harimu omushaija oine omwoyo gwa baaruhanga abarikwera. Nangwa n'omu busingye bwa sho, okuhweza n'okwetegyereza n'obwengye nk'obwa baaruhanga bikaba bimureebekamu, kandi sho, omugabe Nebukadeneeza, akamugira omukuru w'abafumu, abahi b'obwengye, Abakaludaaya n'abarikuragura eby'enyonyoozi;

ahabw'okuba ogwo mushaija Danieli, ou omugabe yaayetsire Beliteeshaza, akareebwamu omwoyo murungi n'okwetegyereza, akaba abaasa kurootorora ebirooto, n'okwita ebishaakuzo, n'okushoboorora ebiremire. Mbwenu nibamukwetere, naija kushoboorora n'eki.
Bwanyima baareeta Danieli omu maisho g'omugabe. Omugabe yaamubuuza ati: Niiwe Danieli ow'omu Bayuda abaanyagirwe, ou tata omugabe yaihire omuri Yuda?
Mpuriire nibakugambaho ku oine omwoyo gwa baaruhanga abarikwera, kandi ngu okwaka, okwetegyereza n'obwengye ebirikukira eby'abandi nibikureebekamu.
Baanyetera abanyabwengye n'abafumu kushoma eki kihandiiko, n'okunshobororera amakuru gaakyo, kwonka tibaakibaasa.

Mbenu mpuriire ngu iwe noobaasa kumanyisa amakuru g'ebintu n'okushoboorora ebiremire. Hati ku oraabe noobaasa kushoma eki kihandiiko, n'okunshobororera amakuru gaakyo, noija kujwekwa omwenda gwa bujwa, n'omukuufu gw'ezaabu omu bitysa, kandi obe omutegyeki wa kashatu omu bugabe.
Nyakusinga, Ruhanga orikukira boona akaha sho Nebukadeneeza obugabe, okurangaanwa, ekitiinisa n'obukuru;

abantu b'amahanga goona, n'enganda z'endimi ezitari zimwe, bakaba bamutiina, batetema omu maisho ge ahabw'obukuru obu Ruhanga yaamuhaire. Akaba aita ou arikwenda kwita, akiza ou arikwenda kukiza, atunguura ou arikwenda kutunguura, agarura ahansi ou arikwenda kugaruraho.
Kwonka ku yaayetungwire, yaagangaaza omutima gwe, yaakora eby'amaryo, yaihwa aha kitebe ky'obugabe, n'ekitiinisa kye kyamwihwaho.

Yaabingwa omu bantu, omutima gwe gwahinduka nk'ogw'enyamaishwa, yaatuura n'enturegye, yaarya obunyaatsi nk'ente, n'omubiri gwe gwaguma nigutondwaho orume orurikuruga omu iguru, okuhitsya obu yaamanyire ngu Ruhanga orikukira boona niwe ategyeka obugabe bw'abantu, kandi akabwemekamu ou arikwenda.
Kandi naiwe omutabani Belishaza tocureize mutima gwawe, n'obu oraabe omanyire ebyo byona,

kureka oyetungwire, waagomera Mukama w'eiguru, baakureetera ebintu by'omu nju ye, iwe, abakungu baawe, abakazi baawe, n'ebinyanshunju byawe, mwabinywaisa viinyo, mwahimbisa baaruhanga b'efeeza, b'ezaabu, b'emiringa, b'ebyoma, b'ebiti, n'ab'amabaare abatarikureeba, abatarikuhurira, n'obu kwakuba okumanya; haza Ruhanga, ou omwitsyo gwawe guba omu mukono gwe, kandi orikutegyeka orugyendo rw'amagara gaawe rwona, tiwaamuha kitiinisa.
Nikyo ayoherereize egyo ngaro, ekahandiika eki kihandiiko;
kandi ebihandiikirwe nibyo ebi-MENE, MENE, TEKEELI, PARASIINI.
Kandi oku nikwo birikushoboororwa. MENE, Ruhanga abazire ebiro by'obugabe bwawe, yaabugarukiza aho;
TEKEELI, opimirwe aha minzaani, waashangwa otahikire;
PERESI, obugabe bwawe bubaganisiibwemu, bwaheebwa Abameedi n'Abaperesi.
Kwonka ekyo kiro Belishaza omugabe w'Abakaludaaya yaitwa.
Bwanyima Dario Omumeedi yaaheebwa obugabe, aine emyaka makumi mukaaga n'ebiri.
Dario akasiima kucwa obugabe bwe omu bicweka igana na makumi abiri, n'okubitamu ab'amashaza, ngu babone kubuga obugabe bwe bwona;
kandi yaataho abakuru bashatu b'okubareeberera; omwe aharibo akaba ari Danieli; abo nibo ab'amashaza baabaire bahikizaho eby'omugabe, ngu arekye kufeerwa.
Bwanyima Danieli ogwo yaayoga ahari abo bakuru bagyenzi be n'abamashaza boona, ahabw'okuba akaba aine omwoyo murungi; nangwa n'omgabe akaba naayenda kumukwatsa obugabe bwona.

N'ahabw'ekyo abakuru n'abamashaza baasherura eki baraiheho kukwatsa Danieli orubanja omu bigambo by'obugabe; kwonka baabura ahu baraihe kumukwatsa orubaja, nari okumureebaho ekicumuro kyona, ahabw'okuba kaba ari omwesigwa, atarikureebwamu kishobyo, n'obu kyakuba ekicumuro.
Abo bashaija baagira ati: Titwine ki turaiheho kukwatsa Danieli orubanja, kureka tumuturukye omu biragiro bya Ruhanga we.
Bwanyima abo bakuru n'abamashaza baija aha mugabe n'omutima gumwe, baamugira bati: Karamaare, Nyakusinga Omugabe Dario!

Abakuru b'omu bugabe bwona, abareeberezi, abamashaza, abahi b'obwengye n'abategyeki baikirizana ngu omugabe ateho ekiragiro kihamire, ekirikugira kiti: Omu biro makumi ashatu omuntu oraashabe ruahga weena, nari omuntu weena otariiwe, anagwe omu kiina ky'entare.
Mbwenu, Nyakusinga, hamya ekyo kiragiro, okiteho omukono, kirekye kuhindurwa, nk'oku ebiragiro by'Abameedi n'Abaperesi bitahindurwa.
Atyo omugabe Dario yaata omukono aha kihandiiko ky'ekyo kiragiro.
Eizooba rimwe abo bashaija baija n'omutima gumwe, baashanga Danieli naashaba kandi naayeshengyereza omu maisho ga Ruhanga we.

Bwanyima baaza omu maisho g'omugabe, baagamba aha by'ekiragiro kye, nibagira bati: Nyakusinga, hari totaire omukono aha kiragiro ekirikugira kiti: Omu biro makumi ashatu omuntu oraashabe ruhanga weena nari omuntu weena otariiwe, anagwe omu kiina ky'entare?
