Omugabe yaagarukamu ati: Ekyo kiragiro nikwo kiri, n'ekiragiro kihamire, nk'oku ebiragiro by'Abameedi n'Abaperesi bitahindurwa.
Baamugarukamu bati: Eryo ihano Danieli ow'omu Bayuda abaanyagirwe tarikukwetaho, Nyakusinga n'obu kwakuba okweta aha kiragiro eki otaireho omukono; kureka naashaba kashatu buri izooba.
Abo bashaija baagaruka baateeranira ow'omugabe, baamugira bati: Nyakusinga, noomanya ku guba omucwe gw'Abameedi n'Abaperesi, ku ekiragiro nari ekitairweho eki omugabe ahamya kitabaasa kuhindurwa.
Atyo omugabe yaaragiira, baareeta Danieli, baamunaga omu kiina ky'entare. Omugabe yaagira Danieli ati: Nangwa bambe Ruhanga waawe, ou oheereza obutoosha, takujuna!
Bwanyima baareeta eibaare, baarita aha munwa gw'ekiina, omugabe yaarihamisa akamanyiso ke n'akamanyiso k'abakungu be, ngu omu bigambo bya Danieli hatagira ekyahindurwaho na kimwe.
Okuruga aho omugabe yaagaruka omu kikaari kye, yaayeraazakwo, tibaamuteerera nanga, n'oturo twamuguruka.
Ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana, omugabe yaimuka, yaagyenda naayehuuta, yaaza aha kiina ky'entare.

Ku yaahikire ahari ekyo kiina ki Danieli yaabaire arimu, yaayeta n'eiraka ry'obusaasi naagira ati: Iwe Danieli, omuheereza wa Ruhanga ohuriire, Ruhanga waawe ou oheereza obutoosha, abaasize kukujuna entare?
Danieli yaagarukamu omugabe ati: Karamaare, Nyakusinga!
Ruhanga wangye atumire maraika we, yaigara eminwa y'entare, tiziine ku zingizire, ahabw'okuba mbaire ntaine kamogo omu maisho ge, kandi ntaine ki ncumwire omu maisho gaawe, Nyakusinga.
Omugabe yaashemererwa munonga, yaaragiira ku baiha Danieli omu kiina. Batyo baamwihamu, baashanga ataine ku abaire kwona, ahabw'okuba akeesiga Ruhanga we.

Bwanyima omugabe yaaragiira, baareeta abo bashaija abaaregire Danieli, hamwe n'abaana baabo n'abakazi baabo, baabanaga omuri ekyo kiina ky'entare; entare zaabashamira omu mwanya, zaahendagura amagufa gaabo goona batakahikire hansi omu kiina.
Naataho ekiragiro nti: Abantu b'omu bugabe bwangye bwona bagume bateteme omu maisho ga Ruhanga wa Danieli, bamutiine,
Ahakuba niwe Ruhanga ohuriire
Ogumaho ebiro byona;
Obugabe bwe tiburihwerekyerezibwa,
N'obutegyeki bwe buryahika aha mperu.
Niwe akora obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza omu iguru n'omu nsi;
Kandi niwe ajunire Danieli, akamwiha omu byara by'entare.

Omu mwaka gw'okubanza ogw'omu busingye bwa Belishaza omugabe wa Babulooni, Danieli akaroota ekirooto, kandi yaayorekwa abyami aha kitanda kye. Bwanyima yaahandiika eki arootsire, yaakishoboorora omu bigambo bigufu.
Atyo yaagira ati: Ekiro kimwe nkoorekwa, naareeba emiyaga ena y'omu iguru neetabangura enyanja mpango.
Kandi omuri egyo nyanja haarugamu enyamaishwa mpango ina ezitarikushushana.

Ey'okubanza ekaba neeshusha entare kandi eine amapapa g'empungu. Ku naabaire nkigihangire amaisho, amapapa gaayo gaakuurwa, yaimukibwa, yaayemerera n'ebigyere bibiri nk'omuntu, kandi yaaheebwa obwengye nk'abantu.
Naagaruka naareeba endiijo nyamaishwa ya kabiri, erikushusha edubu. Ekaba etunguukire orubaju rumwe, eine embaju eshatu omu maino; baagiragiira bati: Imuka, oshonshomere enyama nyingi.
Bwanyima y'ekyo naareeba endiijo nyamaishwa erikushusha engwe, eine amapapa g'empungu aha mugongo. Egyo nyamaishwa ekaba eine emitwe ena, kandi yaaheebwa obutegyeki.

Bwanyima y'ekyo naagaruka naareeba omu kworekwa kwa nyekiro enyamaishwa ya kana erikutiinisa, erikwitsa obwoba, kandi ey'amaani agatakareebwaga. Ekaba eine ebiino by'ebyoma, yaashonshomera ebintu, yaabihendagura, n'ebyatsigaraho yaabiteera emigyere. Ekaba eine omutaano n'enyamaishwa zoona ezaagibandiize; kandi eine amahembe ikumi.

Ku naabaire ninkyetegyereza ago mahembe, naareeba gaamerwamu erindi ihembe eryabaire riri rikye; amahembe ashatu omu g'okubanza gaakuuka n'emizi omu maisho gaaryo. Kandi reeba, omuri eryo ihembe rikye hakaba harimu amaisho garikushusha ag'omuntu, n'akanwa akarikugmba ebintu bikuru.
Naareeba ebitebe by'obukama byateebwaho,
Omukuru owa iranaira yaashutama;
Ebijwaro bye bikaba nibyera nk'orubaare,
Kandi eishokye rye niryerera kimwe nk'ebyoya by'entaama;
Ekitebe ky'obukama bwe kiri endimi z'omuriro,
Kandi n'enziga zaakyo ziri omuriro ogurikwaka.
Rukumi emirundi enkumi baamuheereza,
N'akakumi emirundi obukumi baayemerera omu maisho ge.
Emanja zaatandika kuhurirwa,
Ebitabo byashuuruurwa.
Ezindi nyamaishwa ezaatsigaireho zaihwaho obutegyeki, kwonka zaarekyerwa amagara gaazo kumara omwanya n'obunaku.
Bwanyima naareeba omuri okwo kworekwa nyekiro, kandi
Reeba, Orikushusha omwana w'omuntu
Yaija n'ebicu by'omu iguru,
Yaahika Ogwo mukuru owa iranaira,
Yaamurikwa omu maisho ge;
Ngu abantu b'amahanga goona, n'enganda zoona z'endimi ezitari zimwe,
Bagume bamuheereze;
Obutegyeki bwe n'obutegyeki bw'ebiro byona obutarihwaho,
Kandi n'obukama bwe n'obukama oburarimarwaho.
Kwonka nyowe, Danieli, omutima gwanyemerera, n'ebi nyorekirwe byantiinisa.
Nairira haihi omwe ahari abo abaabaire beemereire aho, naamubuuza amazima g'ebyo byona. Atyo yangambira, yanshobororera amakuru gaabyo,
naagira ati: Ezo nyamaishwa mpango ina nibo bagabe bana abariimuka omu nsi.
Kwonka abarikwera ba Rukira-boona nibo bariheebwa obukama, bukaba obwabo okuhitsya ryari na ryari.

Bwanyima naayetenga kumanya amazima g'eby'enyamaishwa ya kana, eyaabaire eine omutaano n'ezindi zoona, neetiinisa munonga, ebiino byayo biri eby'ebyoma, n'ebyara byayo biri eby'emiringa, eyaashonshomeire ebintu ekabihendagura, kandi ebyatsigaireho ekabiteera omugyere;

kandi n'okumanya eby'ago mahembe ikumi agaabaire gari aha mutwe gwayo, n'eby'erindi ihembe eryamezire bwanyima, ashatu omuri gari gakakuurwa omu maisho gaaryo; n'eihembe eryabaire riine amaisho n'akanwa karikugamba ebintu bikuru, eryareebekire nirikira magyenzi gaaryo.
Ku naabaire ninkyetegyereza, eryo ihembe ryarwanisa abarikwera, ryaguma niribabinga,
okuhitsya obu Ogwo Mukuru owa iranaira yaizire, abarikwera ba Rukira-boona bakasinga orubaja, obunaku bukahika, abarikwera bakaheebwa obukama.
Atyo ogwo muntu yaagira ati:
Eby'egyo nyamaishwa ya kana,
Haryabaho obugabe bwa kana omu nsi,
Obutarishushana na bundi bugabe bwona;
Buryashonshomera ensi yoona,
Bugiribatiirire, bugicwanyagurire kimwe.
Omuri obwo bugabe haryaimukamu abagabe ikumi;
Bwanyima yaabo haimukye ondiijo mugabe,
Abe ow'omutaano aha baamubandiize;
Kandi bashatu ahari abo aryabagarura ahansi.
Kandi aryanyangaraza abarikwera ba Rukira-boona,
Agire enaama y'okuhindura obunaku n'ebiragiro.
Kandi biryarekwa omu mikono ye,
Okuhitsya obu obunaku, obunaku bubiri, n'ekicweka ky'obunaku birihwaho.
Bamwiheho obutegyeki,
Abone kuhwerekyerezibwa n'okumarirwaho kimwe okuhitsya aha muheru.
N'obukuru bw'amahanga agari ahansi y'eiguru ryona
Biryaheebwa eihanga ry'abarikwera ba Rukira-boona,
Obukama bwabo buryaba obukama obutarihwaho,
Kandi obugabe bwona buryaguma bubaheereze, buboorobere.
Omu mwaka gwa kashatu ogw'omu busingye bw'omugabe Belishaza, nyowe Danieli nkareeba okworekwa, okwabaire nikukurata okw'okubanza.
Naareeba ebintu omu kworekwa. Obwo nkaba ndi omu rurembo Shushani, oruri omu ishaza rya Elamu. Omuri okwo kworekwa naareeba ndi aha mugyera Ulai.

Ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba empaya y'entaama eyemereire aha nkungu y'omugyera. Egyo mpaya ekaba eine amahembe abiri, gombi gakaba gari maraingwa, kwonka erimwe niryeshumba erindi; kandi eriraingwa niryo ryamezire bwanyima.

Naareeba egyo mpaya neegyenda neeshengura busha aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba, aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso n'obwa buryo; hakaba hatariho nyamaishwa erikubaasa kugiza omu kaso, n'obu yaakuba orikubaasa kugijuna ekintu; yaaguma neeyegirira nk'oku erikwenda, eine eigundu.
Yaahika empaya y'entaama ey'amahembe abiri, ei naareebire eyemereire aha nkungu y'omugyera, yaagisyokyera n'amaani eine ekiniga kingi.

Naareeba neegiiririra, yaagigirira ekiniga, yaagishengura, yaagikooboraho ago mahembe gombi; egyo mpaya y'enttaama yaabura agagigaruka omu kaso, kureka egyo mpaya y'embuzi yaagituura ahansi, yaagiribatiirira; haabura owaabaasa kugigikiza.

Okuruga aho egyo mpaya y'embuzi yaagirira kimwe eigundu; kwonka ku yaakuzire yaahama, eryo ihembe rihango ryacweka, omu mwanya gwaryo haameramu agandi mahembe ana agarikureeba ei emiyaga y'omu iguru ena eruga.
Ryaba rihango, ryahika n'eihe ry'omu iguru, kandi enyonyoozi zimwe ez'omuri eryo ihe ryazinaga ahansi, ryaziribatiirira.
Rityo ryayetunguura, ryayeinganisa n'Omukuru w'eryo ihe; ryamwihaho ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha, kandi Omwanya ogurikwera gwasheenywa.
Ryaheebwa eryo ihe hamwe n'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha ekitambwa ahabw'okushiisha. Amazima gaanagwa ahansi; eryo ihembe ryagyenderwa gye omu bi ryabaire nirikora.

Bwanyima naahurira orikwera naagamba; kandi orikwera ondiijo yaamubuuza ati: Ebyo ebyayorekwa eby'ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha, n'eby'eky'okushiisha ekirikuhindura ensi amatongo, n'eby'okurekura Obutaaho oburikwera n'eryo ihe kuribatiirirwa, biryagarukira hi?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Biryamara ebiro enkumi ibiri na magana ashatu nibusheesha nibwira; bwanyima Obutaaho oburikwera bugarukye aha buteeka bwabwo.
Naahurira eiraka ry'omuntu niriruga ahagati y'omugyera Ulai, yaayeta naagira ati: Gaburieli, shobororera ogwo mushaija ebi yaayorekwa.
Atyo yairira ahu naabaire nyemereire. Ku yaizire, naatiina, naayetuura ahansi njuumaire. Kwonka yangira ati: Iwe mwana w'omuntu 'we, yetegyereze ku ebi waayorekwa biri eby'obunaku bw'aha mperu.
yaagira ati: Reeba, naaza kukumanyisa ebiribaho omu bunaku bw'aha muheru obw'okugirirwa ekiniga, ahabw'okuba n'eby'obunaku bw'aha muheru obwatairweho.
Eby'empaya y'entaama ey'amahembe abiri, ei waareeba, nibo bagabe babiri aba Bumeedi na Buperesi;
kandi egyo mpaya y'embuzi niwe mugabe wa Bugriika; n'eryo ihembe rihango ery'ahagati y'amaisho gaayo niwe mugabe waabwo ow'okubanza.
Kandi nk'oku ryacweka, omu mwanya gwaryo hakameramu agandi mahembe ana, nikwo haribaho obugabe buna oburikuruga omuri eryo ihanga; kwonka buryaba butaine maani nk'ag'ogwo mugabe w'okubanza.
Omu bunaku bw'aha muheru gw'obwo bugabe buna, abasiisi ku bariba baherize kushiisha bakarengyesereza, omugabe ow'ahamaisho aharikutiinisa, orikumanya ebitarikumanywa, aryaimuka.
Obushoboorozi bwe buryaba bwingi, aryareeta okucwekyerera okurikutiinisa, agyenderwe gye omu bi arikukora, acwekyereze abashaija b'amaani n'eihanga ry'abarikwera.

Ahabw'okuhwetahweteka kwe obugobya buryamubaasisa kukora ebi arikwenda; aryayehimbisa omu mutima gwe. Aryacwekyereza baingi batahabwirwe; kandi aryaimuka kurwanisa n'Omukama w'abakama; kwonka aryahendagurika hataine omukozireho.
Ebyayorekirwe bikagambwa ku biribaho, omu busheeshe n'omu myabazyo n'eby'amazima; kwonka orinde okwo kworekwa, ahabw'okuba n'okw'ebiro ebiriizira ira.

omuri ogwo mwaka gw'okubanza ogw'omu busingye bwe, nyowe Danieli nkamanyira omu bitabo emyaka ei Yerusaalemu erimara ekasheenywa, ku eri emyaka makumi mushanju, nk'ekigambo kya MUKAMA ekyahanwirwe nabi Yeremia oku kyabaire kiri.
Naashaba MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye, naamwaturira ningira nti: Ai Mukama, Ruhanga omukuru kandi orikutiinisa, ohikiiriza endagaano, kandi ogirira embabazi abarikukukunda, bakoorobera ebiragiro byawe.
Manya tukashiisha, twacumura, twakora ebitari by'okuhikiirira, twagoma, twateishuka, twareka ebiragiro byawe n'ebyatairweho;
kandi twayanga kuhurira abaheereza baawe baanabi, abaabaire bagambira abagabe baitu, abategyeki baitu, baatatenkuriitwe, n'abantu boona ab'omu nsi yaitu omu iziina ryawe.

Ai Mukama, okuhikiirira n'okwawe, kwonka ekyaitu n'okwitwa enshoni, nk'oku kiri eri izooba aha bashaija ba Yuda, n'abatwire Yerusaalemu, n'aha Baisraeli boona, ahari abo abari haihi, n'abo abari hare omu nsi zoona ei waababingiire ahabw'okucumura oku baakucumwireho.
Ai Mukama, itwe n'abagabe baitu, n'abategyeki baitu, na baatatenkuriitwe, ekyaitu n'okwitwa enshoni, ahabw'okuba tukakucumuraho.
Kwonka Mukama Ruhanga waitu niwe wenka ogira embabazi n'okusaasira, n'obu turaabe twamugomeire,
tutoorobere Mukama Ruhanga waitu, tukanga kukuratira ebiragiro bye ebi yaataire omu maisho gaitu naabirabya omu baheereza be baanabi.

Buzimazima, Abaisraeli boona bakashiisha ebiragiro byawe, baateishuka, baatoora ahandi, baayanga kuhurira eiraka ryawe. Nikyo omukyeeno n'endahiro ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebiragiro bya Musa omuheereza wa Ruhanga bitushukiirweho, ahabw'okuba tukamucumuraho.

Kandi ahamize ebigambo bye ebi yaagambire naatuhana, itwe n'abategyeki baitu abaabaire nibatutegyeka, ahabw'okutureetaho akabi kahango; ahabw'okuba ahansi y'eiguru tihariho kirakozirwe nk'ekyo ekyakozirwe ahari Yerusaalemu.

Akabi ako koona katuhikireho, nk'oku kihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebiragiro bya Musa; n'obu kiraabe kibaire kityo, MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, titukweshengyereize, ngu otugirire embabazi, kandi titurekire by'okutahikiirira byaitu, tukamanya amazima gaawe.
Nikyo MUKAMA ateekateekyeire akabi aka, akakatureetaho; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu n'ohikiriire omuri byona ebi akora, kwonka itwe titworobeire iraka rye.
Mbwenu, ai Mukama Ruhanga waitu, owaihire abantu baawe omu nsi ya Misri n'omukono gw'amaani, okeetungira eiziina, nk'oku kiri hati, tukacumura, twakora ebitari by'okuhikiirira.

Ai Mukama, ninkweshengyereza ahabw'eby'okuhikiirira byona ebi okora, okubiihirwa kwawe n'ekiniga kyawe birugye aha rurembo rwawe Yerusaalemu, orushozi rwawe orurikwera; ahabw'okuba Yerusaalemu n'abantu baawe bahindukire eky'okucweraho enfumu omu bantu boona abatwehinguririize ahabw'ebibi byaitu n'ahabw'eby'okushiisha bya baatatenkuriitwe.
Mbwenu, ai Ruhanga waitu, hurira okushaba n'okweshengyereza kw'omwiru waawe, kandi, ai Mukama, ahabw'ekitiinisa kyawe Omwanya gwawe ogurikwera ogubaire gwabaire omushaka, ogwakize amaisho gaawe.

Ai Ruhanga wangye, tega okutu kwawe, ohurire; igura amaisho gaawe, oreebe okweshobera kwaitu, n'orurembo orurikwetererwa eiziina ryawe; ahabw'okuba titurikukureetera kweshengyereza kwaitu ahabw'okwesiga okuhikiirira kwaitu, kureka ahabw'okwesiga embabazi zaawe.
Ai MUKAMA, hurira; ai MUKAMA, saasira; ai MUKAMA, taho omutima, okore; ai Ruhanga wangye, ahabwawe otakyerererwa, ahabw'okuba orurembo rwawe n'abantu baawe nibeetererwa eiziina ryawe.
ninkigamba ninshaba, omushaija Gaburieli, ou naareebire omu kworekwa kw'okubanza, yaagaruka, yaija naayehuuta, yampikaho,
yanshobororera naagira ati: Iwe Danieli, hati naija kukuha obwengye n'okwetegyereza.
Obu waaba nootandika kweshengyereza, haija ekigambo; mbwenu naija kukikugambira, ahakuba ori orikukundwa munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo teekateeka ahari ekyo kigambo, oyetegyereze okwo kworekwa.

Mbwenu, omanye kandi oyetegyereze, ngu okwiha aha kiragiro ky'okuhunduura n'okwombeka Yerusaalemu okuhitsya aha kwija kw'Omunyiginya owaahsukirweho amajta, haryabaho saabiiti mushanju. Bwanyima omu saabiiti makumi mukaaga na ibiri egarukye eyombekwe, egire enguuto n'enteeraniro zaazo, kwonka bikorwe omu biro by'emirabanamu.

Ezo saabiiti makumi mukaaga na ibiri kuzirihwaho, Owaashukirweho amajuta aryaihwaho, kandi tarigira ki aritsigaza. Abantu b'omutegyeki oriija baryacwekyereza orurembo h'Omwany ogurikwera; omuheru gwe guryaba okutwarwa omwegyemure; kandi habeho obweme okuhitsya aha muheru. Eby'okuhwerekyereza biragiirwe.

Ogwo mutegyeki aryaragaana na baingi endagaano ehamire, emare saabiiti emwe. Omu kicweka ky'okubanza ky'egyo saabiiti aryazibira abantu kutamba ebitambo n'okuhonga empongano. Bwanyima omuherekyerezi aryaizira aha ipapa ry'ebirikuzira, okuhitsya obu omuheru gwe ogwaragiirwe gurimuhikaho.
Omu biro ebyo, nyowe Danieli nkamara saabiiti ishatu ninganya;
kandi omu saabiiti ezo zoona tindariire k'okurya koona akanuzire; enyama n'obu yaakuba viinyo tibirahikire mu kanwa kangye, kandi tindeerabizeho kajuta koona.
Aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina omu kwezi kw'okubanza, nkaba nyemereire aha nkungu y'omugyera ogurikwetwa Hidekeeli;
ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba omushija ojwaire omwenda gwa kitaani, ayezirikiise orukoba rw'ezaabu nungi eya Ufaazi.

Omubiri gwe gukaba nigushusha berulo, aha maisho ge nihashusha omurabyo, amaishoge nigashusha amatabaaza g'omuriro, emikono ye n'amaguru ge nibyengyengyeta nk'omuringa ogweziibwe, n'eiraka rye riri nk'ery'abantu baingi.
Nyowe nyenka, Danieli, niinye naareebire okwo kworekwa; abantu abu naabaire nyine tibarakureebire, kwonka bakatetema munonga, baahunga baaza kweshereka.
Ntyo naatsigara nyenka, naareeba okwo kworekwa kuhango, omuriinye tihaatsigaramu twani twona, n'oburungi bwangye bwahindukira kimwe obujunde, amaani gampweramu kimwe.
Bwanyima naamuhurira naagamba; ku naahuriire eiraka rye, naagwa ahansi njuumaire, naagwejegyerera kimwe, omutwe ngucurikire okuzimu.
Kandi reeba, omukono gwankoraho, gwantsiga nintetema, ntsimbire emikono n'amaju.
Yangira ati: Iwe Danieli omushaija orikukundwa munonga, ta omutima aha bi ndikukugambira, kandi oyemerere gye; ahabw'okuba naakutumwaho. Ku yaabaire naakingambira ekyo kigambo, naayemerera nintetema.

Atyo yangira ati: Danieli, otatiina, ahakuba okwiha aha izooba eri otandikiireho kutaho omutima kwetegyereza n'okwecureeza omu maisho ga Ruhanga waawe, ebigambo byawe bihuriirwe; kandi nikyo kyandeeta.

Kwonka maraika w'obugabe bwa Buperesi amazire ebiro makumi abiri na kimwe ankumiriire; bwanyima Mikaeli, omwe ahari baamaraika abakuru, yaija kumpa emikono; ntyo naamutsigaho n'ogwo mukuru w'obugabe bwa Buperesi,
naija kukushobororera ebiriba aha bantu baawe omu biro bya bwanyima; ahabw'okuba okwo kworekwa n'okw'ebiro ebiriija.
Ku yaaherize kungambira ebyo bigambo, naajuumara ahansi, naagobwa orurimi.

Bwanyima reeba, haija orikushusha abaana b'abantu, yankora aha minwa; nikwo kwashamya akanwa kangye, nkagamba, ningira owaabaire anyemereire omumaisho, nti: Mukama wangye, ebi nyorekirwe bindeeteire obusaasi, naahweramu kimwe amaani.
Mbwenu nkaanye omwiru waawe, Mukama wangye, nimbaasa kugamba naiwe? Ahabw'okuba tinkiine twani twona, n'omwitsyo gwampweiremu.
Kandi owaabire naashusha omuntu yankoraho, yangaruramu amaani;

yangira ati: Iwe mushaija orikukundwa munonga 'we, otatiina, huumura; garukwamu amaani, ogume omutima. Ku yangambiire atyo, naagarukwamu amaani, naagira nti: Mukama wangye, k'ogambe, ahabw'okuba wangaruramu amaani.
Yambuuza ati: Noomanya ekyandeeta ahariiwe? Reeba, hati naaza kugarukayo kurwana na maraika wa Buperesi; kandi ku ndiheza kumusingura, maraika wa Bugriika aryaija.
Kwonka niinyija kukugambira ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'amazima; kandi tihariho ondiijo ou ndikukwatanisa nawe kubarwanisa, okwihaho Mikaeli maraika waanyu.
Bwanyima haryayema omugabe rugambwa, ategyekyese obushoboorozi bwingi, atwze nk'oku arikwenda.

Ku ariheza kuhama, obugabe bwe buryacwekamu ebicweka, bubaganisibwemu nibutoora ei emiyaga ena y'omu iguru ereetwa; kandi tiburihungurwa ruzaaro rwe, n'obu kwakuba okugaruka aha buteeka nk'oku yaabaire naakibutegyeka, ahabw'okuba obugabe bwe buryarandurwa, butwarwe abandi abatari abo.
Bwanyima omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo aryagira amaani; kwonka omwe aha bakuru b'engabo ze aryamukiza amaani, kandi obugabe bwe buryaba buhango.

Ku harihinguraho emyaka, baryakwatanisa; bwanyima muhara w'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo aryaza owa omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso kuragaana endagaano y'okugarukana; kwonka ogwo mwishiki tariguma na maani g'obushoboorozi bwe, n'omushaija we tarigumaho n'obu rwakuba oruzaaro rwe, kureka ogwo mwishiki n'abaragaragwa be n'omwana we n'omushaija owaamushweire baryaheebwayo.

Kwonka ebiro ebyo, omwe ow'omu ruzaaro rw'ogwo mwishiki, orikumukomookaho, aryaimuka, ahungurire ishenkuru; aryarwanisa ihe ryabo, ataahe omu kigo ky'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso, abarwanise, abasingure.

Aryanyaga baaruhanga baabo, n'ebishushani byabo ebiheesirwe, n'ebintu byabo by'obuguzi bwingi eby'efeeza n'eby'ezaabu, abitware Misri. Kandi aryamara emyaka atarikuteera mugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho.
Bwanyima ogwo mugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho aryateera ensi y'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, kwonka aryagaruka atyo omu nsi ye.

Bwanyima abatabani baryahuruza abantu, bateerane engabo nyingi munonga; ezo ngabo ziryateera ensi, zigijanjaare yoona, zoogyemu, zigumizemu nizirwana, zihikye n'aha kigo ky'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Ekirirugamu, ogwo mugabe aryagira ekiniga, ahurure, arwane n'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho. Ogwo mugabe aryahuruza eihe rihango munonga, kwonka riryakwatwa abazigu be.
Omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, ku ariheza kukwata ezo ngabo, aryayetunguura, aziitemu obukumi n'obukumi, kwonka taribasingurira kimwe;
ahakuba omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso aryagaruka, ahuruze eihe rihango munonga eririkukira ery'okubanza; ku harihinguraho emyaka, aryahurura n'engabo nyingi n'ebintu bingi.
Omuri obwo bunaku baingi baryaimuka kurwanisa omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, n'ababisha b'omu ihanga ryawe baryaimuka kuhikiiriza ebyayorekirwe, kwonka baryaremwa.

Bwanyima omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho aryaija, agote orurembo orwehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare ezigumire, arurundeho eby'okutemberaho, arukwate. Engabo z'omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, nangwa n'ez'entoore, tiziribaasa, ahabw'okuba tizirigira garwana.
Kureka oriija kumurwanisa, aryakora nk'oku arikwenda, kandi tihariho orimuza omu kaso; bwanyima aryayemerera omu nsi y'ekitiinisa, yoona eze omu bushoboorozi bwe.

Aryamariirira kuhuruza engabo z'obugabe bwe bwona, aragaane n'ogwo mugabe ebyakubaasa kureeta obusingye, abihikiirize. Aryahingira omugabe wa Misri muhara we, ngu abone kushiisha obwo bugabe. Kwonka enaama ye terihikiirira, kandi terigira ki yaamugasira.
Bwanyima aryahinduka ateere ebirwa, akubuure bingi; kwonka omukur w'eihe ondiijo aryamaraho emyekuniko ye; kandi egyo myekuniko ye nayo emuhindukane, emushongye.
Bwanyima aryahindukira ebigo by'omu nsi ye, kwonka aryateera entsibo, agwe aburire kimwe.

Bwanyima haryaimuka ondiijo omu mwanya gwe, ayohereze orikushoza omushoro, arabe omu nsi y'ekitiinisa; kwonka ku harihinguraho ebiro bikye, nawe aryacwekyerezibwa, ataitsirwe na kiniga, n'obu kwakuba okugwa omu rugamba.
Omu mwanya gwe haryaimuka omuntu orikugaywa, otakaheebwaga kitiinisa ky'obugabe; aryaija atamanyirwe, aheebwe obugabe ahabw'okwesiigisiriza.
Amahe garyatwarirwa kimwe omu maisho ge, gataataane, kandi n'Omukuru w'endagaano nawe abe atyo.
Kandi ku bariheza kuragaana nawe endagaano, aryakora eby'obugobya, ahindukye ow'amaani, haza aine abantu bakye.

Bwanyima aryateera ekicweka ky'egyo nsi ekirikukira oburungi atamanyirwe, akore eki baishe na baishenkuru batarakozire, abaganisize abantu be emicwijuro n'eminyago n'eby'obutungi. Kandi aryagira enaama z'okuteera ebigo byayo ebigumire, kwonka okumara akaanya kakye.

Bwanyima ayeteere ebinyomyo, agire obumanzi bw'okurwanisa omugabe w'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo n'eihe ringi; ogwo mugabe aryahurura n'eihe rihango munonga kandi ery'amaani; kwonka tarigumaho, ahabw'okuba baryamugirira enaama mbi.
Nangwa n'abariba batungirwe eby'okurya bye nibo barimucwekyereza; eihe rye riryatwarwa, kandi baingi omuriryo baitwe.

Abo bagabe bombi emitima yaabo eryararamira okukora eby'eitima; baryaguma nibabeihana bashutami aha meeza emwe, kwonka ebyo biryaba ebya busha, ahabw'okuba omuheru gwabyo guryabaho omu bunaku bwagwo obwatairweho.
Bwanyima aryagaruka omu nsi ye n'ebintu bingi, kandi omutima gwe guryaba nigukyanga endagaano erikwera. Aryakora eki arikwenda, agarukye omu nsi ye.
Omu bunaku obwatairweho aryagaruka omu nsi y'aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo, agiteere, kwonka omu bunaku obwo tikiriba nk'oku kyabaire bwabiso;

ahabw'okuba emeeri za Kitimu ziryaija kumurwanisa; nikyo aritiinira, akagarurayo engabo ze, akagyenda aine ekiniga kingi, akarwanisa abarikukunda endagaano erikwera. Omu kugaruka kwe aryata omutima ahari abo abarikureka endagaano erikwera.
Aryayohereza engabo ze, zihikyeyo, zishiishe hekalu n'ekigo kyayo, ziiheho ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoohsa, ziteho ekirikuzira ekirikuhwerekyereza.
Abarikushiisha egyo ndagaano aryababeihabeihesa akarimi karungi; kwonka abantu abarikumanya Ruhanga waabo baryahama, bakore eby'obumanzi.
Abaine obwengye omuri abo bantu, n'obu barimara ebiro bingi nibaitwe rurara n'omuriro, bakatwarwa bari enkwatwa banyagirwe, baryareetera baingi okwetegyereza.
Ku barigwa, baryatunga okuhwerwa kukye; baingi baryayeteerana nabo nibamamarika.
Kandi bamwe omuri abo banyabwengye baryaitwa, bamarwemu enkamba, bashemezibwe, kandi beezibwe, okuhitsya aha bunaku bw'aha muheru; ahabw'okuba obunaku obwatairweho buryaba butakahikire.
Kandi ogwo mugabe taryeta hari baaruhanga ba baishenkuru, nari okwetenga abakazi n'obu kyakuba ekyetwa ruhanga kyona, ahakuba aryayekuza okukira boona.

Omu mwanya gw'okuha baaruhanga abo ekitiinisa aryakiha ruhanga w'ebigo; kandi ruhanga ou baishenkuru baabaire batakamanyaga, niwe ariha ekitiinisa, naamutoijera ezaabu, efeeza, obubaare bw'obuguzi bwingi, n'ebiconco ebirikushemeza.
Aryasingura ebigo by'amaani naahwerwa ruhanga otakamanywaga; kandi abarimwemera kuba abe aryabakuza n'ekitiinisa, abahindure abategyeki b'abaingi, ababaganisize ensi ahabw'enguzi.
bwanyima ahikye omu nsi y'ekitiinisa. Obukumi n'obukumi baryaitwa, kwonka Abanyedomu, Abamoabu, n'abaingi b'omu Baamoni baryarokorwa omu mukono gwe.
Aryabangira amahanga maingi omukono, n'ensi ya Misri terimukira.
Aryagira obushoboorozi aha bintu ebibiikirwe, eby'ezaabu, eby'efeeza n'ebya Misri byona eby'obuguzi bwingi; kandi Abalibya n'Abanyesiopia baryagyenda bamukuratiire.
Kwonka bwanyima amakuru agariruga oburugwa-izooba n'aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso garyamwemereza omutima, ahurure n'ekiniga kingi kuhwerekyereza baingi n'okubamariraho kimwe.
Aryateera amahema ge g'obugabe ahagati y'enyanja n'orushozi orurikwera orw'ekitiinisa; kwonka aryahika aha muheru gw'amagara ge, ataine kihwera.
Kandi baingi omuri abo, abariba bagwejegyeire omu mucuucu gw'ensi, baryasisiimuka, abamwe basisiimukire amagara agatahwaho, abandi basisiimukire okuhemuka n'okugaywa okutarihwaho.
Kandi abaine obwengye baryayaka nk'omushana ogurikwakira omu mwanya, n'abarikuhindura baingi, bakabareeta omu kuhikiirira, baryayaka nk'enyonyoozi okuhitsya ryari na ryari.
Kwonka iwe Danieli shweka ahari ebyo bigambo, ekitabo okiteerane n'akamanyiso, okuhitsya aha bunaku bw'aha mperu. Baingi baryairuka nibakora oku n'oku, n'okumanya kuryayeyongyera.
Bwanyima nyowe Danieli, ku naayetegyereize, naareeba abandi babiri, omwe aha nkungu y'omugyera seenu, n'ondi aha nkungu y'omugyera seeri.
Omwe yaabuuza ori owaabaire ajwaire omwenda gwa kitaani, ari ahaiguru y'amaizi g'omugyera, ati: Eby'okutangaaza ebyo biryamara mwanya ki bitakahweireho?

Ogwo mushaija, owaabaire ajwaire omwenda gwa kitaani ari ahaiguru y'amaizi, yaimutsya omukono gwe gwa buryo n'ogwa bumosho, naagyoreka ahaiguru; naahurira naarahira Ogwo otuura ahuriire ebiro byona, ngu biryamara obunaku n'obunaku bubiri n'ekicweka ky'obunaku; kandi ngu, ku bariheza kusheenyagura amaani g'eihanga eririkwera, ebyo byona biryahikiirira.
Naabihurira, kwonka tinaabyetegyereza; nikwo kubuuza nti: Mukama wangye, ekirihereeruka omuri ebyo nikiiha?
Yaagira ati: Yegyendere, Danieli, ahabw'okuba ebigambo bishwekirwe, kandi byahamibwa n'akamanyiso, okuhitsya aha bunaku bw'aha mperu.
Baingi baryayeshemeza, beeyeze, barabibwe omu iziiko; kwonka ababi baryagumizamu nibakora ebibi; kandi tihariho n'omwe omuri abo babi oribyetegyereza, kwonka abaine obwengye bo baryabyetegyereza.
Okwiha aha bunaku obu ekitambo ky'okwotsya eky'obutoosha kiriihirwaho, bakataho ekirikuzira ekirikuhwerekyereza, haryahinguraho ebiro rukumi na magana abiri na makumi mwenda.
Oritegyereza akahika aha kiro kya rukumi na magana ashatu na makumi ashatu na bitaano, aryaba ahiiriirwe.
Kwonka yegyendere okuhitsya aha muheru; bwanyima oryahuumura, oyemerere omu mwanya ogwakuteereirweho, aha muheru gw'ebyo biro.
Nawe nikwo kugyenda akashwera Gomeri muhara wa Dibulaimu, akagira enda, akzaara omwana w'omwojo.
Eryo izooba ndyahendera obuta bwa Israeli omu ruhita rwa Yezereeli.
Kwonka enju ya Yuda yo, ndyagigirira embabazi, mbajunise MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo; tindibajunisa buta, rurara, rugamba, mbaraasi, n'obu baakuba abazigyenderaho.
Ku yaacuukize Lo-ruhama, yaagaruka yaagira enda, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo.
MUKAMA yaamugira ati: Eiziina rye omwete Lo-ami, amkuru ngu Ti bantu bangye; ahabw'okuba timuri bantu bangye, kandi naanye tindi Ruhanga waanyu.
Kandi Abayuda n'Abaisraeli baryateeranirwa hamwe, beetooranire omwebembezi omwe, kandi baryainamuka barugye omuri egyo nsi; ahabw'okuba ekiro kya Yezereeli kiryaba kikuru.
Tongana na nyoko, tongana;
Ahabw'okuba ti mukazi wangye,
Naanye tindi iba,
Aihe obwamaraaya mu maisho ge,

Ebi n'ebihembo byangye

nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

MUKAMA naagira ati: Eryo izooba oryanyeta Ishi, amakuru ngu Ibanye; oryaba otakiinyeta Baali, amakuru ngu Mukama wangye;
ahabw'okuba ndyaiha omu kanwa ke amaziina ga Baabaali, garekye kugambwaho obundi.
Eryo izooba ndyakuragaanira endagaano n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa n'amahungu g'omu mwanya kandi n'ebirikwekurura ahansi, mmareho obuta na rurara n'orugamba omu nsi, nkureetere kubyama ogaramisiriize.
Kandi ndyakwegambira obugyenyi, obe owangye ebiro byona, nkwegambire obugyenyi omu kuhikiirira, omu bwinganisa, omu kukunda n'omu mbabazi.
Ndyakwegambira obugyenyi omu bwesigwa, obone kumanya MUKAMA.
Ndyayetaba eiguru,

Akariisa entaama, ngu abone kushwera.)
Kandi nabi ogwo niwe yaamugumizeho.
N'ahabw'ekyo MUKAMA aryamureka, orubanja rw'okusheesha eshagama rumugumeho,
N'ebijumo bye abimugarureho.
Efuraimu ku yaabaire agamba, abantu batetema,
Ayetunguura omuri Israeli;
Kwonka ku yaayereetsireho orubanja ahabwa Baali, yaafa.
Nibeeheeshera ebishushani ebiyagiibwe,
Ebishushani ebirikurambiwa ebirikukorwa omu feeza zaabo,
Byona nibikorwa abanyamyoga.
Nibagira bati: Mube nibyo mwatambira.
N'eihano, abantu kunywegyera enyana!
Kandi nk'orume orutsya bukiri kare,
Nk'ebishushunga ebirikutuntumurwa akasooroora aha mbuga,
Nari nk'omwika ogurikuruga omu mahega.
Okwiha obu waabaire ori omu nsi ya Misri.
Tihariho Ruhanga ondiijo ou murikumanya, kureka nyowe;
Kandi ahatari nyowe, tihariho ondiijo mujuni.
Omu nsi y'omushana mwingi;
Baahaaga, emitima yaabo yaayetunguura;
N'ahabw'ekyo baanyebwa.
Nkabagwera aha rubaju rw'omuhanda nk'engwe.
Ntaagure ebifuba byabo;
Kandi okwo niyo ndibashonshomerera nk'entare,
Enyamaishwa mbi ekabataagura.
N'oha oribaasa kukuha emikono?
Abanyiginya baawe boona ab'okukurinda barahi,
Abu waashabire oti:
Mpa omugabe n'abanyiginya?
Kandi naabaihaho nyine ekiniga kingi.
N'ekibi kye kibiikirwe.
Kwonka n'omwana otaine bwengye,
Ahabw'okuba hati takatandikire kushuuriza.
Kandi mbacungure, mbakize Rufu?
Iwe Rufu 'we, ebibonaboneso byawe birahi?
Iwe Kuzimu 'we, okucwekyereza kwawe kurahi?
Tinkiine ku ndaabagirire esaasi.
Omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba, omuyaga gwa MUKAMA, guryaija
Niguruga omu ihamba;
Enshuro ye eryayoma,
N'eiziba rye riryakarangatana.
Guryamara omu mabiikiro ge
Ebintu byona eby'obuguzi bwingi.
Ahabw'okuba ekagomera Ruhanga waayo.
Abantu baamwo baryaitwa rurara,
Abeereere baabo baryateerwa ahansi, bacwagurukye,
N'abakazi baabo abaine enda baryabafumurana.
Iwe Israeli 'we, garuka ahari MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe,
Ahabw'okuba okagwisibwa eby'okushiisha byawe.
Mumugire muti: Twiheho eby'okushiisha byona,
Oyakiire ebirungi;
Naitwe nitwija kuhonga empongano z'eminwa yaitu erikuhimbisa.
Titurigyendera ha mbaraasi;
Titurigaruka kugira ebikozirwe emikono yaitu
Tuti: Muri baaruhanga baitu.
Ahabw'okuba omuriiwe nimwo efuuzi zishanga embabazi.
Mbakunde, bataine ki bahaire;
Ahabw'okuba tinkibainiire kiniga.
Arabye ebirabyo nk'emyangangye,
Atsimbe emizi nka Lebanooni.
Oburungi bwe bube nk'omuzeituuni,
N'omugaju gwe gube nk'ogwa Lebanooni.
Baryabengyeya nk'omusiri,
Barabye nk'omuzaabibu,
N'omugaju gwabo gube nk'ogwa viinyo ya Lebanooni.
Mmwetabire, kandi ndyamutaho amaisho.
Ndi nk'omuberooshi guyumbize;
Ebyana byawe niinye birugaho.
Oine okwetegyereza, abimanye;
Ahabw'okuba emihanda ya MUKAMA egororokire,
Kandi abahikiriire baryagigyendaramu,
Kwonka abasiisi baryagigwamu.
Eki n'ekigambo kya MUKAMA ekyaizire ahari Yoeli mwene Pesueli.
Naimwe mwena abatwire omu nsi, mutegye amatu!
Ebintu nk'ebi birabaireho omu biro byanyu,
Nari omu biro bya baashwenkuriimwe?
Abaana baanyu babiteekyerereze abaabo,
N'abaabo baryabiteekyerereza abaijukuruza.
Biriirwe kahembwe.
Ebi kahembwe etsigire,
Biriirwe ebitootera;
Kandi ebi ebitootera bitsigire,
Biriirwe ikuura.
Imwe mwena abanywi b'amaarwa, muboroogye,
Ahabw'okuburirwa amaarwa g'omutahe,
Ahabw'okuba gacwekire, tigarigaruka mu kanwa kaanyu.
Eihanga ry'amaani eritarikubarwa;
Amaino gaaryo ni nk'ag'entare,
N'ag'enshongyezo ni nk'ag'entare enkazi.
Rimazireho emizaabibu yangye,
Ryahenda emitiini yangye,
Ryagimaraho ebishushu, ryabinaga ahansi;
Amataagi gaayo gaatsigara nigeera.
Tonzya nk'omwishiki empangare oyezirikire ekiguniya,
Orikucurira obaire naayenda kumushwera.
Zicwirwe omu nju ya MUKAMA;
Abanyamurwa abarikuheereza MUKAMA nibacura.
Ahabw'okuba engano zihweireho,
Viinyo eyomire, kandi amajuta gabuzire.
Imwe abasharizi b'emizaabibu, muboroogye,
Muririre engano na sayiri;
Ahabw'okuba emyaka y'omu misiri efiire.
Omutiini nigukabakaba,
Emikomamahanga, emikindo n'ebiti by'amapeera,
Nangwa n'ebiti byona eby'omu misiri byomire;
Kandi okushemererwa kuhweire omu bantu.
Naimwe abaheereza aha itambiro, muboroogye!
Imwe baheereza ba Ruhanga wangye 'mwe,
Nimwije museese ekiro mujwaire ebiguniya;
Ahabw'okuba empongano z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa
Zicwirwe omu nju ya Ruhanga waanyu.
Mwetere abantu okuteerana okurikwera.
Muteeranire hamwe abakuru
N'abatwire omu nsi egi boona,
Baije omu nju ya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu,
Mumutakire.
Ahabw'okuba eizooba rya MUKAMA riri haihi,
Niriija riri nk'okucwekyereza okurikuruga aha W'obushoboorozi bwona.
Okushemererwa n'okwesiima bikahwa omu nju ya Ruhanga waitu?
Embibo zigwire omu itaka
Ebitara n'emirangara,
Amabiikiro gasheenyukire ahabw'okubura engano.
Amasyo g'ente gashobeirwe ahabw'okubura obunyaatsi;
Nangwa n'amasyo g'entaama gaburaburiirwe.
Ahabw'okuba omuriro gumazireho
Amariisizo g'omu ihamba,
N'endimi zaagwo zookize ebiti byona eby'omu ishwa.
Ahabw'okuba otugyera twomire,
Kandi omuriro gumazireho amariisizo g'omu ihamba.
Muteerere enduuru aha rushozi rwangye orurikwera!
K'abatwire omu nsi boona bateteme,
Ahabw'okuba eizooba rya MUKAMA, niriija, riri haihi,
Eizooba ry'ebicu n'omwirima ndindindi!
Eihanga rihango kandi ery'amaani rishwekire ebibungo nk'omwirima;
Okwiha iranaira enzigye ezirikushusha zityo tizikabahoga,
Kandi na bwanyima yaazo tizirigaruka kubaho
Nangwa n'omu myaka yoona ey'obusingye oburikurataho.
Kandi enyima yaazo endimi z'omuriro nizibuguma.
Omu maisho gaazo ensi neeshusha nk'ekibanja kya Edeni,
Kwonka enyima yaazo n'eihamba eririmu busha;
Tihaine kintu kyona ekirikuzikira.
Kandi niziiruka nk'embaraasi z'orugamba.
Nizihoorera nk'ebigaari by'orugamba,
Nk'okubarabaruka kw'omuriro ogurikwotsya embuba,
Nk'eihe ry'amaani eritengire orugamba.
Ahamaisho ga boona hahinduriize.
Niziteera nk'abarwani,
Nizitemba engo z'amabaare nk'engabo,
Buri rumwe nirugyenda ruturumbwize;
Tizirikushiisha mishorongo.
Buri rumwe nirugyenda omu muhanda gwarwo,
Nizitwarana ziraba omu macumu,
Kandi tizikwemerezibwa.
Ziirukira aha ngo z'amabaare;
Zitemba, zitaaha omu maju,
Ziraba omu madirisa nk'abashuma.
N'eiguru naryo niritengyeta.
Eizooba n'okwezi bishwekwa omwirima,
N'enyonyoozi zireka kwaka.
Ahabw'okuba eihe rye ni rihango munonga,
Kandi orikuhikiiriza ekigambo kye n'ow'amaani.
Ahakuba eizooba rya MUKAMA ni rikuru, kandi ni ritiinisa munonga;
N'oha owaakuryemera?
Mungarukire n'emitima yaanyu yoona,
Nimwesiibyakwo, nimurira, kandi nimucura.
Kandi muhindukire MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu,
Ahabw'okuba aba ow'embabazi, agira esaasi,
Tarahuka kuguubwa kubi, aijwire rukundo etahinduka.
Kandi ayegarukamu, areka kureeta akabi.
Akabatsigira omugisha,
Mukabona kuhongyera MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu
Empongano z'esaano n'ez'eby'okunywa?
Muteerere enzamba omuri Saayuuni,
Mweze eizooba ry'okwesiibyakwo;
Mweze ogwo mutwe gw'abateeraine,
Mureete abakuru, muteerane abaana,
Nangwa n'abeereere abarikwonka.
Kishwera arugye omu nju ye,
Na kishwerwa arugye omu kishengye kye.
Ahagati y'ekisasi n'eitambiro,
Nibagira bati: Ai MUKAMA, saasira abantu baawe,
Otahindura obuhunguzi bwawe ekijumo,
N'eky'okucweraho enfumu omu mahanga.
Mbwenu abanyamahanga bagirire ki bati:
Ruhanga waabo arahi?
Yaagirira abantu be esaasi.
Reeba, naaza kubooherereza
Engano, viinyo n'amajuta, muhaagye;
Kandi tindigaruka kubahindura kijumo
Omuri ago mahanga obundi.
Ndibingire omu nsi ekarangataine kandi ey'eihamba,
Ekicweka kyaryo eky'omumaisho kigwe omu nyanja y'oburugwa-izooba,
N'eky'enyima kigwe omu nyanja y'oburengyerwa-izooba,
N'ekinuuko ky'ekijunde kyaryo kiimukye,
Ahabw'okuba rikakora ebirengyesereize.
Shemererwa kandi oyesiime,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akozire bikuru!
Imwe nyamaishwa z'omu ishwa 'mwe, mutatiina,
Ahabw'okuba amariisizo g'omu ihamba gamezire;
Ebiti nibyana ebijuma byabyo,
Emitiini n'emizaabibu neeyera munonga.
Mwesiimire omuri MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu;
Ahabw'okuba abahaire enjura y'ebiba ey'orugyero ruhikire,
Kandi yaabagwisiza enjura nyingi munonga
Ey'eibiba n'eya katumba nk'eya bwabiso.
Amahuuriro garyaijura engano,
Amaato gaijure viinyo n'amajuta bisheeshekye.
Ndyabashumbuusha emyaka
Ei enzigye zaariire,
Ebitootera, kahembwe na rushanda,
Eihe ryangye rihango, eri naabateize.
Muhimbise eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waanyu,
Owaabatwaize gye omu muringo gw'kutangaaza;
N'abantu bangye tibarigaruka kuhemurwa bundi.
Kandi ku nyowe, MUKAMA, ndi Ruhanga waanyu, ku hatariho ondiijo;
N'abantu bangye tibarigaruka kuhemurwa bundi.
Ndyashuka Omwoyo wangye aha bantu boona;
Batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu baryaragura,
Abagurusi baanyu baryaroota ebirooto,
N'abatsigazi baanyu baryayorekwa.
Ndyabashukaho Omwoyo wangye omu biro ebyo.
Kandi ndyayoreka eb'amahano omu iguru n'omu nsi, eshagama n'omuriro n'okucumba kw'omwika.
Eizooba riryahinduka omwirima, n'okwezi kuhindukye eshagama, ekyo kiro kikuru kya MUKAMA ekirikutiinisa kitakahikire.

Kandi omu bunaku obwo boona abaritakira eiziina rya MUKAMA baryajunwa; ahabw'okuba aha rushozi rwangye Saayuuni n'omuri Yerusaalemu haryabayo abarihonokaho, omu baritsigaraho habemu abu MUKAMA arikweta.

ndyateeranira ahamwe amahanga goona, ngashuumye omu ruhita rwa Yehoshafaati, mbacwerereyo orubanja, nimbatura abantu bangye n'obuhunguzi bwangye Israeli, ahabw'okubataataanisiza omu mahanga, bakabaganisa ensi yangye,
bakateerera abantu bangye enteenyu, omwana w'omwojo bakamuhingisa maraaya, n'ow'omwishiki bakamuhinga viinyo, ngu babone eby'okunywa.

Iwe Tuuro na Sidoni, n'ebyanga byona eby'Abafilistia, nyine kakwate ki naimwe? Mwine eki murikwenda kunzimuurira ahabw'eki naabakoreire? Ku muranzimuurire, naanye niinyija kurahuka kubazimuurira juba eki mwakozire.
Ahabw'okuba mukatwara efeeza zangye n'ezaabu zangye, mwatwara ebintu byangye eby'obuguzi bwingi omuri hekalu zaanyu.
Abayuda n'aba Yerusaalemu mwabaguza Abagriika, mwabatwara hare n'ensi yaabo y'obuzaarwa.
Kwonka hati niinyija kubaimutsya, mbaihe omu nsi ei mwabagurizemu, mbazimuurire ebi mwakozire.
Abaana baanyu b'aboojo n'ab'abaishiki ndyabaguza Abayuda, nabo babaguze aba Sheeba, eihanga erya hare; ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe yaakigamba.
Mweteekateekyere orugamba;
Mwimutsye amamanzi,
Abarwani boona bairire haihi, bainamukye.
N'empabyo zaanyu muziheeshemu amacumu;
Otaine maani ahigye ati, Ndi ow'amaani.
Imwe mahanga 'mwe, agari aha mbaju zoona,
Nimurahukye mwije, mweteeranire ahamwe.
Ai MUKAMA, okwo obe niyo waashuumya amamanzi gaawe.
Gaije omu ruhita rwa Yehoshafaati;
Ahabw'okuba okwo niyo ndishutama
Kucwera amahanga agari aha mbaju zoona emanja.
Ahabw'okuba eigyesha rihikire;
Mwije munyuukye, ahabw'okuba einyuukiro riijwire;
Amaato gaijwire viinyo nigasheesheka,
Ahabw'okuba obubi bwabo ni bwingi.
Omu ruhita rw'okucweramu emanja!
Ahakuba eizooba rya MUKAMA riri haihi
Omu ruhita rw'okucweramu emanja.
Eizooba n'okwezi bishwekirwe omwirima,
Kandi enyonyoozi tizrikwaka.
Naimutsya eiraka rye ari Yerusaalemu,
Kandi eiguru n'ensi nibitengyeta.
Kwonka MUKAMA niwe buhungiro bw'abantu be,
Ekigo kigumire eky'Abaisraeli.
Otuura Saayuuni, orushozi rwangye orurikwera.
Yerusaalemu eryaba erikwera,
Kandi abanyamahanga tibarigirabamu bundi.
Ebibungo bihimintikwemu amate,
Kandi otugyera tw'omuri Yuda twona turyaijura amaizi;
N'enshuro y'amaizi erugye omu nju ya MUKAMA,
Eitirire oruhanga rwa Shitimu.
Na Edomu ebe eihamba ririmu busha,
Niziturwa obubisha obu zaagiriire Abayuda,
Ahabw'okuba zikasheesha eshagama y'abataine rubanja omu nsi yaabo.
Na Yerusaalemu etuurwemu obusingye bwona.
Kandi abasingirwe orubanja tindirubaihaho,
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA atuura Saayuuni.
Akagira ati:
MUKAMA naatsinda naayema Saayuuni,
Naimutsya eiraka rye ari Yerusaalemu;
Amariisizo g'abariisa nigacura,
Omutwe gwa Karumeeli niguhotoka.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Damasiko bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro,
ahabw'okuba bakahuura Gileadi n'ebihuuzo by'ebyoma.
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari bya Beni-hadadi.
Mmareho abatwire omu ruhita rwa Aveeni,
N'okwaitse enkoni y'obugabe omuri Besedeni;
Kandi n'Abasiria baryatwarwa Kiiri bari enkwatwa;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Gaaza bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba bakatwara eihanga ryona omu bukwatwa,
Baarihayo omu mikono y'Abanyedomu.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndyayohereza omuriro aha rugo rwa Gaaza,
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari byayo,
Mmareho abatwire omuri Ashidoodi,
N'okwaitse enkoni y'obugabe omuri Ashikelooni;
Ndyabangira Ekurooni omukono gwangye, ngiteere,
N'Abafilistia abatsigaireho bacwekyerere;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati:
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Tuuro bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba bakahayo eihanga ryona omu mikono y'Abanyedomu,
Tibaijuka ndagaano y'oruganda.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndyayohereza omuriro aha rugo rwa Tuuro,
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari byayo.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Edomu bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba Edomu akabingisa mwene ishe rurara,
Yaayenaga enyima embabazi ze,
Ekiniga kye kyaguma nikitaagura,
Yaaguma agwirwe kubi ebiro byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo ndyayohereza omuriro Temani,
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari bya Bozira.
Ahabw'ebicumuro by'Abaamoni bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindibaiho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba bakafumurana abakazi ba Gileadi baine enda,
Ngu babone kwirizayo emyatano yaabo.
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari byayo,
Habeyo orwari aha izooba ry'orugamba,
N'eihunga aha izooba ry'omuyaga gw'akasooroora.
Kandi omugabe waabo aryatwarwa omu bukwatwa,
We hamwe n'abanyiginya be;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Moabu bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba ekootsya amagufa g'omugabe wa Edomu,
Yaagagira eiju.
Gwokyeze kimwe ebikaari bya Keriosi.
Moabu eryagwa omu ruyombo,
n'enduuru n'eiraka ry'enzamba.
Mmwite hamwe n'abanyiginya baayo boona;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Yuda bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba bakanga ebiragiro bya MUKAMA,
Tibaarinda bi yaataireho,
Kureka ebishuba byabo byabahabya,
Ebi baishenkurubo baabaire bakuratira.
Ahabw'ebicumuro bya Israeli bishatu n'ahabwa bina,
Tindigiihaho kifubiro;
Ahabw'okuba nibatunda abahikiriire efeeza,
N'abakyene babahinga enkaito.
Nibakiikamya emihanda y'abacureezi;
Omushaija na ishe nibaza aha mwishiki omwe,
Bireetera eiziina ryangye eririkwera kujumwa;
Beeyariire ebijwaro by'omukwato;
Kandi nibanywera omu nju ya Ruhanga waabo
Viinyo y'abahongyesiibwe.
Kandi niinye naacwekyereize Abaamori omu maisho gaabo,
Abaabaire bari baraingwa nk'emyereezi,
Kandi bagumire nk'emyela;
Nkacwekyereza ebyana byabo eruguru
N'emizi yaabo okuzimu.
Nkamara emyaka makumi ana omu ihamba nimbeebembera,
Ngu mubone kukubuura ensi y'Abaamori.
N'omu batsigazi baanyu naihamu Abanaziiri.
Imwe Baisraeli 'mwe, buzimazima tikwo kiri?,
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Na baanabi mwabaragiira muti:
Mutarihanuura.
Ndyababandamirira omu mwanya gwanyu,
Nk'oku ekigaari kibandama kiijwire ebiba.
N'ow'amaani tariguma nago,
N'emanzi terikiza magara gaayo.
Kikwata-buta taryemerera,
Ow'amaguru taryejuna,
N'origyendera aha mbaraasi tarikiza magara ge.
Kandi na rugambwa omu mamanzi
Ahari eryo izooba aryahunga ajwaire busha;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Imwe mwenka niimwe naamanyire;
Nikyo ndibafubirira
Ahabw'eby'okushiisha byanyu byona.
Nimugira ngu abantu babiri nibabaasa kugyenda hamwe
Bataikirizaine?
Entare etsindira omu kibira
Etaine ki eitsire?
Omugunju gw'entare gururumira omuryaya,
Gutaine ki gukwatsire?
Enyonyi egwa ahansi omu mutego
Gutategire?
Omutego gubarashuka
Gutaine ki gukwatsire?
Abantu batatiine?
Akabi kagwa aha rurembo,
MUKAMA atakareetsire?
Atabandize kukishuuruurira bairu be baanabi.
Mbwenu n'oha otarikwija kutiina?
Mukama RUHANGA agambire;
N'oha orikubaasa kwezibira kuhanuura?
N'omu bikaari by'omu nsi ya Misri,
Nimugira muti: Mweteeranire omu bibungo bya Samaria,
Mureebe okujagarara kwingi okuriyo,
N'eby'okuhata ebigirimu.
Ababiika obubisha n'obwambuzi omu bikaari byabo
Tibamanya kukora bihikire.
Omuzigu aryayehinguririza ensi,
Asheenye engo zaawe ezrikukurinda,
N'ebikaari byawe binyagwe.
Nimuhurire, mushinje enju ya Yakobo;
Ndyafubiriraho n'amatambiro ga Beseeli,
Kandi amahembe g'eitambiro garyatemwaho,
Gagwe ahansi.
N'amaju g'emiino y'enjojo garyahwerekyerera,
Kandi na zaanyaruju ziryahwaho;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nimuhurire ekigambo eki, imwe nte za Bashani 'mwe,
Eziri omu kibungo kya Samaria,
Ezirikuhata abooro, zikasingyera abakyene,
Ezirikugira engundu zaazo ziti:
Mureete eby'okunywa, tunywe.
Ebiro nibiija kubahikaho,
Obu baribatwaza amarobo,
Bakatwaza abarihereeruka omuriimwe
Amarobo g'okutega eby'enyanja.
Kandi muryashohorera ahasheenyirwe,
Buri mukazi naatora ei agyemire;
Kandi muryanagwa omuri Harumooni
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mwije Gilugaali, mukanyise ebicumuro;
Mureete ebitambo byanyu buri kasheeshe,
N'ebicweka byanyu bya kimwe kya ikumi buri biro bishatu;
Kandi murangye empongano ezi muhonga mwekundiire,
Muzirangaane hoona;
Ahakuba ebyo nibyo mwenda, imwe Baisraeli 'mwe;
nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugira.
Amaino gaanyu gaaguma nigeera, ahu mutwire hoona;
Kwonka nabwo timwangarukira;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Hatsigaire ameezi ashatu eigyesha kuhika.
Obundi nkaba ngwisiza orurembo rumwe enjura,
Orundi ndugiima;
Omusiri gumwe guguubwamu enjura,
Ogu etaagwamu gwoma.
N'ahabw'ekyo ab'omu ndembo ibiri nari ishatu
Bakaba bazegyerera omu rurembo rumwe
Kunywa amaizi, babura kuhwa eiriho;
Kwonka nabwo timwangarukira;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Naacwekyereza emisiri yaanyu n'ey'emizaabibu;
Emitiini yaanyu n'emizeituuni yaanyu yaariibwa enzigye;
Kwonka nabwo timwangarukira;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Naitsa abatsigazi baanyu rurara,
Naanyaga embaraasi zaanyu,
Enyindo zaanyu naaziitsa ekinuuko ky'orusisiira rwanyu;
Kwonka nabwo timwangarukira;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nk'oku Ruhanga yaajuumikire Sodoma na Gomora.
Mwaba nk'ekicumurwa kiihirwe omu muriro;
Kwonka nabwo hoona timurangarukiire;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Nikyo ndikugirira ntyo, iwe Israeli,
N'ahabw'ekyo yeteekateekye kubugabugana na Ruhanga waawe, iwe Israeli;
ahabw'okuba niinyija kukugira ntyo.
Akagambira omuntu ebiteekateeko bye,
Kandi Ohindura akasheeshe omwirima,
Akagyendagyenda aha mitwe y'ebibungo by'omu nsi,
MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'amahe, niryo iziina rye.
Eki ndikugamba ninkutongyeza;
Kandi tarigaruka kwimuka;
Atsigirwe omu nsi ye,
Haabura ow'okumwimutsya.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Mukama RUHANGA arikugamba naagira ati:
Orurembo orwahurwirwemu engabo rukumi,
Haryatabaarukaho igana;
N'orwahurwirwemu igana,
Haryatabaarukaho ikumi
Eziritsigara aha nju ya Israeli.
Munsherure, mubone kugumaho;
Mutataaha omuri Gilugaali,
N'obu kwakuba okwambuka Beeri-sheba;
Ahabw'okuba buzimazima Gilugaali eryaza omu bukwatwa,
Na Beseeli eryahinduka busha.
Musherure MUKAMA, mubone kugumaho,
Atakaimuka omu nju ya Yosefu nk'omuriro,
Gukagyenda nigurya busha, hakabura ow'okuguraariza omuri Beseeli,
Imwe abarikuhindura eby'oburyo omuravunga,
Mukanaga ahansi okuhikiirira!
Ohindura omwirima ndindindi akasheeshe,
Akahindura nyomushana ekiro,
Otuma amaizi g'omu nyanja
Akagashandaaza ahansi,
MUKAMA niryo iziina rye,
Oreetera ab'amaani kucwekyerera kitaraariire,
Okucwekyerera kukahika aha kigo kigumire.
Kandi nibatamwa orikugamba amazima.
Mukabatoijesa engano,
Mweyombekyeire amaju g'amabaare gabaizire,
Kwonka timurigataahamu.
Mwebyariire emisiri mirungi y'emizaabibu,
Kwonka timurinywa viinyo yaayo.
N'ebibi byanyu ku birengyesereize,
Imwe abarikubonabonesa abahikiriire, mukarya enguzi,
Kandi abakyene mukabateereza enkokora omu irembo.
Ahabw'okuba n'obunaku bubi.
Mubone kugumaho;
Obwo nibwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe,
Ariguma naimwe, nk'oku mugambire.
Muhamye eby'oburyo omu irembo;
Obundi MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe,
Akaagirira embabazi aba Yosefu abatsigaireho.
Mukama arikugamba naagira ati:
Omu nteeraniro z'enguuto zoona haryabamu okuborooga,
N'omu nguuto zoona baryacura bati: Ai bambe! Ai bambe!
Baryatuma aha bahingi kwija omu rufu,
N'abarikumanya kutonzya kwija kucura;
Ahabw'okuba ndyaraba ahagati omuriimwe;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mbwenu eryo izooba rya MUKAMA nimuryendera ki?
N'ery'omwirima, ti ry'omushana;
Akabugana edubu;
Nari nk'owaakuza omu nju, akeegamiza omukono aha kisiika,
Enjoka ekamuruma.
Eryo izooba rya MUKAMA t'omwirima, gutari mushana?
T'omwirima ogutarimu kuhweza kwona?
Kandi tindikushemerererwa kuteerana kwanyu okurikwera na kakye.
N'obu murampongyere ebitambo byanyu eby'okwotsya,
N'empongano zaanyu z'esaano,
Tindikwija kubyakiira,
Kandi tindikwija kweta ha mpongano zaanyu
Ez'ente zaanyu z'ebishaju ez'okusiima ahabw'obusingye.
Tindikwija kutega kutu okujumeera kw'enanga zaayu.
Kureka murekye eby'oburyo bihimintikye nk'amaizi,
N'okuhikiirira nk'omugyera ogutarikwoma.
Mukaheeka ekishushani kya Sukooti omugabe waanyu, n'ekya Kiuni, enyonyoozi ya ruhanga waanyu, ebishushani ebi mwayebaijeire;
nikyo ndibatwarira omu bukwatwa seeri ya Damasiko; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira, ou eiziina rye riba Ruhanga ow'amahe.
N'abatwire omu kibungo kya Samaria bataine ki beeteireho,
Abakungu b'amahanga makuru agarikukira agandi,
Agu ab'enju ya Israeli baijaho!
Murugyeyo, muze Hamasi enkuru;
Bwanyima mushuume Gaasi ey'Abafilistia.
Nimugira ngu nizihita ezi nsi z'obugabe?
Nari shi ensi yaazo neekira eyaanyu obuhango,
Mukairiza haihi ekitebe ky'obubisha?
Bakeegororera aha bitabo byabo,
Bakarya ebyana by'entaama, nibabiiha omu busyo,
N'ebinyana ebi barikwiha omu kihongore,
Bakeegunzira ebirikuteerwa nka Daudi,
Abanywera amaarwa aha bishare,
Bakeesiiga amajuta marungi munonga;
Kwonka batasaasibwe kucwekyerera kwa Yosefu!
Kandi okweshemeza kw'abarikwenanuura kukahwaho.
MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe, naagira ati:
Ntamirwe amaryo ga Yakobo,
Ebigo bye ebigumire nimbyanga;
Kandi ndyahayo oru rurembo n'ebirimu byona.

N'oine obuzaare n'omuntu omwe ahari abo, ku ariija kumwotsya, aryamutwara kwiha amagufa omu nju, abuuze ori omu kishengye ati: Hakiriho ondiijo okiri hamwe naiwe? Onu amugarukyemu ati: Ngaaha! Ori amugire ati: Hunama! Titushemereire kugamba aha iziina rya MUKAMA.
Enju mpango neija kusheenywa,
N'enkye esheenyagurwe.
Omuntu ahingisa ente enyanja?
Kwonka imwe eby'oburyo mubihindwire endurwe,
N'ebyana by'okuhikiirira mwabihindura omuravunga,
Mukagira ngu mukwatsire Karunaimu ahabw'amaani gaanyu.
Imwe b'enju ya Israeli 'mwe;
Ribabonabonese okuruga aharikutaahirwa Hamasi,
Okuhika aha kagyera k'omuri Araba;
nikwo MUKAMA, Ruhanga ow'amahe, arikugira.
Eki nikyo Mukama RUHANGA yaanyorekire; reeba, akaba naakanyisa omuzinga gw'enzigye; obwo oruhiira nirutandika kumera, kandi orwo ruhiira n'orwamezire obunyaatsi bw'omugabe buherize kutemwa.
Ku zaaherize kurya obunyaatsi omu nsi, naagira nti:
Ai Mukama RUHANGA, ninkweshengyereza, gira embabazi!
Yakobo naabaasa ata kugumaho,
Haza ari mukye?
Bwanyima naagira nti:
Ai Mukama RUHANGA, ninkweshengyereza, rekyera aho!
Yakobo naabaasa ata kugumaho,
Haza ari mukye?
MUKAMA nikwo kwegarukamu ahabw'ekyo; Mukama RUHANGA akagira ati: N'ekyo tikiribaho.
MUKAMA yambuuza ati: Iwe Amosi, nooreeba ki? Naamugarukamu nti: Nindeeba kariisho. MUKAMA nikwo kugira ati: Reeba, ninta kariisho omu bantu bangye Israeli; tindibasaasira bundi;
emyanya mikuru ya Isaaka ey'okuramizamu eryahinduka ebifurukwa, n'emyanya ya Israeli erikwera esheenywe; kandi ndyaimuka ndwanise enju ya Yeroboamu na rurara.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Amosi arikugamba naagira ati:
Yeroboamu aryaitwa rurara,
Na Israeli aihwe omu nsi ye, atwarwe omu bukwatwa.
kwonka otagaruka kuhanuurira Beseeli, ahakuba n'omwanya gw'omugabe ogurikwera, kandi ni nyaruju y'obugabe.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaanyiha omu kuriisa amatungo, yangira ati: Irooko ohanuurire abantu bangye Israeli.
Mbwenu hurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Noogira oti: Otahanuurira Israeli ebirigibaho,
Kandi otagamba ekigambo kyona eky'okuhana enju ya Isaaka.
Omukazi waawe aryaba maraaya omuri oru rurembo,
Batabani baawe na bahara baawe baryaitwa rurara,
Kandi ensi yaawe eryabaganisisibwa omugoye;
Naiwe oryagwa omu nsi etashemeire,
Kandi buzimazima Israeli aryaihwa omu nsi ye
Atwarwe omu bukwatwa.
Eki nikyo Mukama RUHANGA yaanyorekire. Nkareeba ekiibo ky'ebijuma by'omu kyanda.
Yangira ati: Iwe Amosi, nooreeba ki? Naamugarukamu nti: Nindeeba ekiibo ky'ebijuma by'omu kyanda. MUKAMA nikwo kungira ati:
Omuheru gw'abantu bangye Israeli gwahika;
Tindibasaasira bundi.
Biryahinduka okuborooga;
Emitumbi y'abafu eryaba mingi,
Abantu baginaganagye hoona, bari omu kaceceko;
nikwo Mukama RUNANGA arikugira.
N'abooro b'omu nsi mukabamaraho.
Tukatunda oburo?
Na sabato neehwa ryari,
Tukahununura engano z'okutunda,
Tukatuubya eefa, tukahangusya shekeli,
tukaryangatanisisa eminzaani y'obugobya,
N'abakyene tukabagura enkaito,
Tukagura entiti z'engano?
Buzimazima tindyebwa kintu kyona eki baakozire,
N'abagitwiremu boona bakacura?
Yoona eryaijura nka Nailo,
Eyecunde, eijururukye nk'ogwo mugyera gwa Misri.
Ndyarenzya eizooba omu ihangwe,
Nshwekye ensi omwirima nyomushana.
N'ebyeshongoro byanyu byona mbihindure okutonzya.
Ndyareetera boona kwezirika ebiguniya,
N'emitwe ya boona ngihindure enkomborora.
Ndyarigira nk'ery'okucuririraho omwana w'omwojo omwe nyamunegyere,
N'omuheru gwaryo gube nk'eizooba ry'obusaasi.
Reeba, obunaku nibwija kuhika,
Obu nditeeza ensi enjara,
Etari njara y'eby'okurya, nari eiriho ry'eby'okunywa,
Kureka enjara y'okuhurira ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Nibaruga aha bukiizi-bwa-bumosho, nibahika oburugwa-izooba;
Baryairuka nibakora oku n'oku kusherura ekigambo kya MUKAMA,
Kwonka tibarikibona.
Ahari eryo izooba empangare nungi n'abatsigazi
Baryagwa enshazi nibaitwa eiriho.
Iwe Daani, nindahira ruhanga waawe;
Kandi bati: Nindahira omuhanda ogurikuza Beeri-sheba,
Nabo baryagwa, kandi tibariimuka bundi.
Teera emitwe y'enyomyo, okuhitsya obu ebisasi biraatengyete;
Ogisheenyagurire aha mitwe y'abantu boona;
Abaraahonokyeho mbaitse rurara;
Tihariho n'omwe omuribo oraahungye,
Tihariho n'omwe omuribo oraakire.
Nayo omukono gwangye gukaabaihayo;
N'obu baakutemba, bakahika omu iguru,
Nayo nkaabahanurayo.
N'obu baakweshereka aha mutwe gwa Karumeeli,
Nkaabasherura, mbaihayo;
N'obu baakuunyeshereka okuzimu ahansi y'enyanja,
Okwo nayo nkaayohereza enjoka, ebarumirayo.
Okwo nayo nkaaragiira rurara, ebaita;
Kandi nguma mbataireho eriisho
Ahabw'okubakora kubi, kutari kubakora gye.
Ogwo okora aha nsi, ekayaga,
Abagitwiremu boona bakacura,
Egyo nsi yoona ekaijura nka Nailo,
Ekaijura nk'ogwo mugyera gwa Misri,
Akahahamiza orukanga rwaryo ahansi,
Otuma amaizi g'omu nyanja kwija, akagashandaaza aha nsi,
MUKAMA niryo iziina rye.
Ahariinye timuri nk'Abanyesiopia?
Tindaihire Baisraeli omu nsi ya Misri,
Abafilistia omuri Kafutoori,
N'Abasiria omuri Kiiri?
Gari aha bugabe oburikukora ebibi,
Ndyabucwekyereza, mbumare aha nsi;
Kwonka enju ya Yakobo yo, tindigicwekyerereza kimwe;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Kandi nshungurire enju ya Israeli omu mahanga goona,
Nk'oku engano zishungurwa n'engari,
Hatagire ezaaragara ahansi.
Abarikugira bati: Titurihikwaho kabi,
N'obu kwakuba okukareeba.
Ndibaziire ahataagukire;
Nyimutsye ebicwagurika byaryo,
Ndyombekye, ribe nk'oku ryabaire riri obunyakare;
Babone kukubuura ekicweka kya Edomu ekyatsigaireho,
N'amahanga goona agarikwetererwa eiziina ryangye;
nikwo MUKAMA orikukora ebyo arikugira.
Obu omuhingi arihinga omugyesi atakashaarwire,
N'omunyuuki w'emizaabiru akanyuuka omubibi naakibiba;
Enshozi ziryatoonya viinyo enuzire,
N'ebibungo byona ebihimintikyemu.
Bagarukye bombekye endembo ezaabaire zisheenyirwe,
Bazituuremu.
Baryabyara emizaabibu, banywe viinyo yaayo,
Bahingye emisiri, barye ebyeziremu.
Tibarigaruka kukuurwa bundi
Omu nsi ei naabahaire;
nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arikugira.
Tuhuriire amakuru agarugire ahari MUKAMA,
Entumwa etumirwe aha mahanga.
Nimwimukye, twimukye tumurwanise.
Reeba, niinyija kukugira mukye omu mahanga,
Obe orikugayirwa kimwe.
Amaryo g'omu mutima gwawe gakubeihire,
Iwe otuura omu bicokoromi by'amabaare,
Otuura omu myanya y'ahaiguru,
Orikugira omu mutima gwawe oti:
N'oha owaakumpanurayo, akangarura ahansi?
N'obu oraatumbiikye eiguru nk'eishamba,
Okaarika ahaiguru ahagati y'enyonyoozi,
Okwo nayo ndyakuhanurayo, ogarukye ahansi;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Tibakaiba ebirikubamara byonka?
(Eshi ocwekyereziibwe!)
Abashoromi b'emizaabibu ku baakwija owaawe,
Tibakaakutsigira eby'okuhumba?
Eshi Esau anyagirwe,
Ebintu bye by'obuguzi bwingi byacaakwa!
Baakubinga, baakuhitsya aha mwatano;
Abantu abu ogira nabo obusingye bakusingwire,
Banywani baawe abu orikwesiga bakutegire omutego;
Kwonka tiwaakimanya.
Tindicwekyereza abanyabwengye, nkabamara omuri Edomu,
Okwetegyereza kukahwa aha rushozi rwa Esau?
Buri muntu w'aha rushozi rwa Esau aitwe.
Buryakureetera kushwekwa enshoni,
Omarirweho kimwe ebiro byona.
Obu abahinguzi baanyaga obutungi bwe,
Abanyamahanga bakataaha omu marembo ge,
Bakateerera Yerusaalemu enteenyu,
Naiwe okaba ori nkabo.
Aha izooba eri yaagwereirweho akagwe;
Okaba otashemereire kwesiimirana Abayuda
Aha izooba eri baacwekyerereziibweho;
Okaba otashemereire kwehimbisa
Aha izooba ry'okweshobera;
Okaba otashemereire kutaaha omu irembo ry'abantu bangye
Aha izooba eri baareebeireho enaku,
Nari okubateerera omu kwahwa
Aha izooba eri baareebeireho enaku,
Nari okushahura ebintu byabo
Aha izooba eri baareebeireho enaku;
Okaba otashemereire kwemerera omu ntaaniro z'emihanda
Kumaraho abantu be abarikuhunga;
Kandi okaba otashemereire kuhayo abantu be abaahonokireho
Aha izooba ryabo ry'okureeberaho enaku.
Nk'oku mwagizire, naimwe nikwo murigirwa;
Ebi mwakozire, biryabahindukana.
Nikwo n'amahanga goona agari embaju zoona garinywa;
Buzima garyanywa, gataruze,
Gabe nk'agatakabahoga.
Habe aharikwera.
Kandi ab'enju ya Yakobo baryagaruka batungye
Ebyabaire biri ebyabo.
Enju ya Yosefu eryaba ekirimi ky'omuriro,
N'enju ya Esau ebe nk'ebitsintsi by'embuba.
Baryabootsya, babamareho,
Habure owaahonokaho aha b'omuri egyo nju;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA niwe yaakigamba.
Ab'omu mpita bakubuure ensi y'Abafilistia,
Bakubuure ensi ya Efuraimu n'eya Samaria;
Kandi Benyamiini eryakubuura Gileadi.
Ziryakubuura Foiniiki okuhika Zarefaasi,
N'enkwatwa za Yerusaalemu ez'omuri Sefaraadi
Ziryakubuura endembo z'omuri Negebu.
Kutegyeka orushozi rwa Esau;
Kandi obugabe buryaba obwa MUKAMA.
Imuka, oze Nineeve, orurembo orwo ruhango, orurangire ebirirubaho; ahabw'okuba obubi bwarwo buhikire omu maisho gangye.
Kwonka Yona yaimuka kuhungira MUKAMA Tarushiishi, yaashuuma Yoopa, yaashangayo emeeri erikuza Tarushiishi; yaaha empiiha z'okumutwara, yaaza omu meeri kugyenda nabo Tarushiishi, ngu ahungye MUKAMA.
Kwonka MUKAMA yaayohereza omuyaga mwingi aha nyanja, enyanja yaagira ebingonzi bingi, emeeri yaayenda kusheenyagurika.

N'ahabw'ekyo abarimbi baatiina, buri omwe yaatakira ruhanga we, n'ebintu ebyabaire biri omu meeri baabinaga omu nyanja kwanguhiza emeeri. Kwonka Yona we akaba yaagiire omu kicweka kyayo eky'omunda, abyami, ayegwejegyereire.
Omukuru w'emeeri nikwo kwija ah'ari, akamugira ati: Obaire ota, iwe mugwejegyezi 'we? Imuka, otakire ruhanga waawe. Obundi ruhanga waawe akaatwijuka, tureka kucwekyerera.
Bwanyima baagambirana bati: Nimwije tuteere enteenyu, tubone kumanya otureeteire aka kabi. Batyo baateera enteenyu, yaakwata Yona.
Baamubuuza bati: Tugambire otureeteire aka kabi. Okora murimo ki? Nooruga hi? Owaanyi ni nkahi? Kandi ori owa ihanga ki?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ndi Omuheburaayo, nintiina MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'omu iguru, owaahangire enyanja n'ensi.
Okuruga aho baagira obwoba bwingi, baamubuuza bati: Beitu ekyo eki okozire niki? Ahabw'okuba abo bashaija bakamanya ku yaabaire ahungire MUKAMA; ahakuba akaba yaabagambiire.
Baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu tukugire tuta, enyanja ekabona kutuuza, tukakira? Ahabw'okuba enyanja ekaba neeyeyongyera kuhinduriza.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimunkirize, munnagye omu nyanja; obwo nibwo enyanja eraatuuze, mukakira; ahabw'okuba nimmanya ngu eri ihunga ry'amaani eryabajuumikira niinye ryabatura.
Kwonka abo bashaija baavuga munonga gu babone kuhitsya emeeri aha nkungu, baaremwa; ahabw'okuba enyanja ekaba neeyeyongyera kubatabangurira ebingonzi.

Nikyo baatakiriire MUKAMA, nibagira bati: Nitukweshengyereza, ai MUKAMA, otatureka tukahwerekyerera, tukazira ogu mushaija; kandi tura otatutaho orubanja rw'eshagama y'otaine rubaja; ahabw'okuba, ai MUKAMA, niiwe okozire nk'oku osiimire.
Batyo baakiriza Yona, baamunaga omu nyanja, enyanja yaatuuza.
Ahonaaho abo bashaija baatiina munonga MUKAMA, baamutambira ebitambo, baahiga nibarahira.
Bwanyima Yona yaashaba MUKAMA Ruhanga we, ari omu nda y'eky'enyanja, naagira ati:
Yangarukamu;
Naataka ndi omu nda y'Okuzimu,
Waahurira eiraka ryangye.
Ahagati y'enyanja;
Ago maizi gaanyehinguririza,
Ebingonzi byawe n'emijumba yaawe byona byandengyeraho.
Mbwenu ndyareeba nta hekalu yaawe erikwera obundi.
Amaizi maingi gaanyehinguririza,
Amarebe gaanyezingirira omu mutwe
Ahu enshozi zitsimbire emizi.
Ei empimbi zaayo zinkingiraniire kimwe;
Kwonka waiha amagara gangye omu Kiina,
Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye.
Naakwijuka, MUKAMA;
Okushaba kwangye kwahika omuri hekalu yaawe erikwera.
Baba batsigireho Orikubasaasira.
Eki naahigire nindaganisa, ndyakihikiiriza.
Okujuna n'okwa MUKAMA.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaaragiira ekyo ky'enyanja, kyatanaka Yona aha nkungu.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyaija ahari Yona obwa kabiri, nikigira kiti:
Imuka, oze Nineeve, orurembo orwo oruhango, orugambire obutumwa obu ndikukutuma.
Atyo Yona yaimuka, yaaza Nineeve, nk'oku MUKAMA yaamugambira. Kandi Nineeve rukaba ruri orurembo ruhango munonga, oru obuhango bwarwo burikugyenderwa ebiro bishatu.
Yona yaatandika kugyendagyenda omu rurembo, naagyenda orugyendo rw'eizooba rimwe; naagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Hatsigaire ebiro makumi ana, Nineeve ecwekyerezibwe.
Abantu ba Nineeve baikiriza Ruhanga; baaranga okwesiibyakwo, baajwara ebiguniya, okuruga aha mukuru okuhika aha muto.

Yaaragiira kubuzya ekiragiro omuri Nineeve, ekirikugira kiti: Ahabw'ekiragiro ky'omugabe n'abakungu be, hatagira ekyatamira eky'okurya kyona, yaaba muntu, yaaba busyo bw'ente nari obw'entaama, bitarya n'obu kwakuba okunywa;
kureka omuntu weena n'enyamaishwa yoona bihumbikwe ebiguniya, kandi abantu batakire munonga Ruhanga, buri muntu arekye omuhanda gwe omubi, n'obubisha oburi omu ngaro ze.
N'oha orikumanya ngu, obundi Ruhanga takaayegarukamu, akareka ekiniga kye kingi, tukareka kuhwerekyerera?
Kwonka ekyo kyagwisa kubi munonga Yona, yaagira ekiniga.

Yaashaba MUKAMA ati: Ai MUKAMA, eki tikyo naagambire, obu naabaire nkiri owaitu? Nikyo kyandeeteire kuhungira Tarushiishi; ahabw'okuba nkamanya ku ori Ruhanga ow'embabazi kandi orikusaasira, otarikurahuka kuguubwa kubi, oine rukundo etahinduka, kandi oyegarukamu okutareeta kabi.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ai MUKAMA, ninkweshengyereza, ihaho amagara gangye; haakiri nfe okukira okugumaho.
MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ati: Ebyo waakora gye okugira ekiniga?
Bwanyima Yona yaaruga omu rurembo, yaashutama aha rubaju rwarwo rw'oburugwa-izooba, yaayeyombekyerayo akaju, yaakahungiramu omushana, okuhitsya ahu arireebera oku orurembo ruriba.
Bwanyima MUKAMA Ruhanga yaaragiira omwongo kurandira ahu Yona yaabaire ari, gukamusangira aha mutwe kumutambira omushana ogwabaire nigumwita. Atyo Yona yaashemererwa munonga ahabw'ogwo mwongo.
Kwonka omu kasheeshe omushekye ku gwajugutsire, Ruhanga yaaragiira akakooko, kaarya ogwo mwongo, gwayoma.

Eizooba ku ryaturukire, Ruhanga yaaragiira omuyaga gw'oburugwa-izooba ogurikwomya, omushana gwateera omutwe gwa Yona, yaayenda kugwa enshazi, yaayeshabira okufa, naagira ati: Haakiri nfe okukira okugumaho.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaagira Yona ati: Ebyo waakora gye okugira ekiniga ahabw'omwongo? Onu ati: Eego, naakora gye okugira ekiniga, nangwa eky'okuunyita.
MUKAMA yaagira ati: Noosaasibwa omwongo, ogu otarahendekyeire, ogu otaramerize, ogwayemerize nyekiro, gukagaruka gukooma ekindi kiro.
Mbwenu noogira ngu tinkusaasiibwe Nineeve, orwo rurembo ruhango, orurimu abantu akasiriira kamwe n'obukumi bubiri n'okukiraho abatarikubaasa kutaanisa ndyo na mosho, kandi orurimu amatungo maingi?
Naiwe ensi n'ebigirimu byona, mutegye amatu;
Mukama RUHANGA abe niwe yaababeera mushinja,
Naayema omuri hekalu ye erikwera.
Naija kushuuma, aribatiirire ebibungo by'omu nsi.
N'empanga zigangabukye
Nk'ecumbwe omu maisho g'omuriro,
Nari nk'amaizi gaashukwa aheecurikire.
N'ahabw'ebibi by'enju ya Israeli.
Beitu ekicumuro kya Yakobo nikiiha?
Ti Samaria?
Kandi ekibi ky'enju ya Yuda nikiiha?
Ti Yerusaalemu?
Omwanya gw'okubyaramu emizaabibu;
Ndyashuka amabaare ge omu ruhanga,
Nshuuruure emisingi ye.
Ebihembo bye byona biryayokibwa omuriro,
Kandi ebishushani bye ebirikuramibwa ndyabicwekyereza;
Ahabw'okuba akabiiha omu bihembo bya maraaya,
Kandi niyo birigaruka.
Ngyende ntajwaire nkaito, kandi njwaire busha;
Ndyatonzya, nimboigora nka zaamuha,
Ncure nka zaamaaya.
Buhikire ahari Yuda,
Bwahika n'aha irembo ry'abantu bangye omuri Yerusaalemu.
Mutarira na kakye;
Mwekuringye omu mucuucu
Omuri Besi-leafura.
Imwe batuuzi ba Shafiri 'mwe,
Murabeho mujwaire busha, mwine enshoni;
Abatuuzi ba Zaanani tibarikushohora;
Okuborooga kwa Betazeeli
Kuryabazibira ku ebaha emikono.
Bategyereize ebirungi beemereize emitima;
Ahakuba akabi kashuumire nikaruga ahari MUKAMA,
Kaahika aha irembo rya Yerusaalemu.
Mukomere ebigaari aha mbaraasi;
Niimwe mwabandize kucumuza Saayuuni,
Ahabw'okuba omuriimwe nimwo ebicumuro bya Israeli byashangirwe.
Nikyo oriheera Moresheeti-gaasi
Ebiconco by'okuragana;
Amaju ga Akiziibu gakaba
Eky'okureebya abagabe ba Israeli.
Naimwe batuuzi ba Mareesha 'mwe,
Ndyagaruka mbareeteho ow'okubasingura;
Kandi ekitiinisa kya Israeli kiryahika Adulaamu.
Ahabw'abaana baanyu abu murikukunda;
Mwemwe enkomborora, emitwe yaanyu ebe nk'ey'ebihuhura-bahuta,
Ahabw'okuba baryaruga omuriimwe, batwarwe omu bukwata.
Bakakora kubi bakiri aha bitabo byabo!
Kandi bukisheesha, bakabikora,
Ahabw'okuba biri omu bushoboorozi bwabo.
Kandi beetenga n'amaju, baganyaga;
Bahata omuntu n'eka ye,
Omuntu n'obuhunguzi bwe.
Reeba, nincumira oru ruganda enaama y'okurureetaho akabi,
Aku mutaribaasa kwiha mu bitsya byanyu;
Kandi timurigyenda na myekuniko,
Ahabw'okuba obunaku obwo buryaba bubi.
Baboroogye, nibatonzya n'obusaasi bwingi,
Nibagira bati: Tumariirweho kimwe;
Yaahingisa omugabo gw'abantu bangye;
Mbwenu ka yaaguunyaka!
Emisiri yaitu agibaganisiize abarikutunyaga.
Nikyo muriburira ow'okubaganisisa omugoye
Emigabo y'omu ihanga rya MUKAMA.
Omuntu tashemereire kuhanuura ebigambo nk'ebi;
Okuhemuka tikurituhikaho.
Iwe nju ya Yakobo 'we, eki kikaagambirwe?
Omwoyo wa MUKAMA takiine kugumisiriza?
Ebi niwe arikubikora?
Ebigambo byangye tibirikugasira
Orikugyenda n'omutima gugororokire?
Abarikuba nibahingura baine obusingye
Batarikwenda kurwana,
Mubaaka eminagiro yaabo.
Abakazi b'abantu bangye mubabinga
Omu maju gaabo marungi,
N'abaana baabo abato mubaihiraho kimwe ekitiinisa kyangye.
Ahabw'okuba ogu ti mwanya gw'okuhuumuriramu,
Ahabw'oburofa bwagwo oburikucwekyereza
Okucwekyereza kubi munonga.
Naagira ati: Niinyija kubahanuurira ebya viinyo n'ebirikusinza;
Ogwo niwe yaakuba nabi w'aba bantu!
Ntaaruure Abaisraeli abatsigaireho;
Ndyabateeranira hamwe
Nk'entaama eziri omu kibuga kyazo,
Nk'obusyo oburi omu iriisizo ryabwo,
Bagire akaari kaingi ahabw'okuba baingi.
Bahabandanire, bashohore
Nibaraba omu irembo.
Omugabe waabo aryarabaho, abaze omumaisho,
MUKAMA abeebembeire.
Imwe bakuru ba Yakobo 'mwe,
Naimwe abategyeki b'enju ya Israeli, nimuhurire!
T'omurimo gwanyu okumanya eby'oburyo?
Abantu bangye mukabaihaho oruhu,
Mukoonoora enyama aha magufa gaabo,
Mukababaagaho oruhu,
Mukabacwagacwagura amagufa,
Mukabatematema nk'enyama
Ezi barikwenda kuta omu rwabya
Nari omu nyungu egoya.
Kwonka taribagarukamu;
Omuri obwo bunaku aryabaima amaisho
Ahabw'okukora kubi omu mitwarize yaabo.
Bikababeera omwirima, mukabura okuragura;
Eizooba riryarengyera ahari baanabi,
Na nyomushana ebairagurire;
N'abafumu baitwe enshoni,
Boona engaro bazite aha munwa
Ahabw'okubura okugarukamu kwa Ruhanga.
Ahabw'Omwoyo wa MUKAMA;
Nyijwirwe obwinganisa n'obushoboorozi
Bw'okumanyisa Yakobo ekicumuro kye
Na Israeli ekibi kye.
Nimuhurire eki, imwe bakuru b'enju ya Yakobo 'mwe,
N'abategyeki b'enju ya Israeli,
Abangira kimwe eby'oburyo,
Obwinganisa bwona mukabukiikamya,
Na Yerusaalemu mukagyombekyesa okukora kubi.
Abanyamurwa baayo beegyesa ahabw'okugurirwa,
Na baanabi baayo baragura ahabw'empiiha;
Haza beegamira MUKAMA nibagira bati:
MUKAMA tari omuriitwe?
Tihaine kabi karituhikaho.
Yerusaalemu ekaba omutuumo gw'ebisheenyuka,
N'orushozi rw'enju ya MUKAMA rukaba nk'ekibungo kishwekirwe ekibira.
Orushozi rw'enju ya MUKAMA ruryahamibwa
Kuba orushozi orurikukira ezindi aha mutwe,
Rutunguurwe, ruze ahaiguru y'ebibungo;
Kandi amahanga garyahimintikirayo.
N'amahanga maingi garyaija gagire gati:
Nimwije twinamukye aha rushozi rwa MUKAMA,
Aha nju ya Ruhanga wa Yakobo,
Atwegyese emihanda ye,
Tubone kugigyenderamu;
Ahakuba omuri Saayuuni nimwo hariruga Ebiragiro,
N'omuri Yerusaalemu hakarugamu ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Ahane amahanga g'amaani agari hare;
Zaarurara zaabo baryaziheeshamu amafuka,
N'amacumu gaabo bagaheeshemu empabyo;
Eihanga tiriribangira rindi rurara,
Kandi tibarigaruka kwega by'engamba;
Ahansi y'omuzaabibu gwe n'ahansi y'omutiini gwe,
Kandi tihaine oribakangisa;
Ahabw'okuba akanwa ka MUKAMA niko kaakigamba.
Buri rimwe omu iziina rya ruhanga waaryo;
Kwonka itwe turyaguma nitugyedera
Omu iziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu okuhitsya ryari na ryari.
Ndyateeranira hamwe ebirema,
Ntaaruure abaataataine,
N'abu naabonaboneise.
N'abacwirwe mbagire eihanga ry'amaani;
Kandi MUKAMA aryabategyekyera aha rushozi Saayuuni,
Okwiha obwo okuhitsya ebiro byona.
Kandi naiwe, munaara gw'obusyo 'we,
Ekibungo Saayuuni niiwe kirihikaho,
Obutegyeki bwa ira bukagaruka,
Obutegyeki bwa Yerusaalemu.
Omuriiwe tiharimu omugabe?
Omuhanuuzi waawe afiire,
Obusaasi bwaza kukukwata nk'omukzi orikurumwa?
Nk'omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara,
Ahakuba hati waaza kuruga omu rurembo,
Otuure omu bwerere,
Bwanyima oze Babulooni;
Okwo niyo MUKAMA arikucungurira,
Akakwiha omu mikono y'abazigu baawe.
Nigagira gati: Saayuuni k'eshiishwe,
Tugishamaarire.
N'obu kwakuba okwetegyereza enaama ye,
Ku agateeraniire hamwe nk'ebiba ebirunzire aha mbuga.
Ahabw'okuba eihembe ryawe ndyarihindura ekyoma,
N'ebyara by'ebigyere byawe mbigire emiringa.
Oryacwagacwagura amahanga maingi,
Amagoba gaabo ogahongyere MUKAMA,
N'eitungo ryago oryereze MUKAMA ow'ensi yoona.
Mbwenu oyehinguririziibwe orugo rw'amabaare;
Twagotwa;
Nibateeza omutegyeki wa Israeli
Enkono aha matama.
Ori mukye kubarirwa omu nganda za Yuda,
Omuriiwe nimwo hariruga
Orimbeera omutegyeki wa Israeli,
Ou obukomooko bwe buri obwa iranaira
Omu biro ebitakimanywa.
Obu orikurumwa arizaariramu;
Obwo ab'omuri beene ishe abariba batsigaireho
Baryagarukira Abaisraeli.
Aine amaani ga MUKAMA,
N'ekitiinisa ky'eiziina rya MUKAMA Ruhanga we.
Kandi nabo baryatuura buhooro,
Ahabw'okuba aryaba mukuru okuhitsya aha muheru gw'ensi,
Kandi omuntu ogwo aryaba obusingye bwaitu.
Yaagiribatiirira,
Turyaimutsya abariisa mushanju
N'abanyiginya munaana, bamurwanise.
N'ensi ya Nimuroodi bagitegyekyese rurara esyoirweyo.
Kandi Omuasirira ku arirenga emyatano yaitu,
Yaateera ensi yaitu, yaagiribatiirira,
Nibo barimutujuna.
Batyo aba Yakobo abariba batsigaireho
Baryaba ahagati y'amahanga maingi,
Nk'orume orurugire ahari MUKAMA,
Nari nk'orutoonyerera orurikugwa aha bunyaatsi,
Orutarinda muntu, n'obu kwakuba okutengyereza abantu.
Baryaba omu mahanga ahagati y'amahanga maingi,
Nk'entare eri ahagati y'enyamaishwa z'omu kibira,
Kandi nk'omugunju gw'entare oguri omu busyo bw'entaama,
Oguba niguzirabamu, gukaziribatiirira,
Gukazitaagataagura, hakabura ow'okuzijuna.
N'abarikukwanga boona bamarweho.
Ndyakumaraho embaraasi zaawe,
N'ebigaari byawe by'orugamba mbicwekyereze.
N'ebigo byawe byona mbisheenye.
Kandi torigira barangi bundi.
Kandi torigaruka kuramya bikozirwe emikono yaawe.
Ncwekyereze endembo zaawe;
Ndyagahoora enzigu ngwirwe kubi, ngainiire ekiniga.
Mbwenu nimuhurire eki MUKAMA arikugamba,
Mwimukye, mwetonganire omu maisho g'enshozi,
Ebibungo bihurire eiraka ryanyu.
Naimwe emisingi y'ensi ey'entuura;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA aine eki arikufa n'abantu be,
Kandi naatonganisa Israeli.
Ndabaruhize na ki? Nimungarukyemu!
Naabacungura omu nju y'obuhuuku;
Naatuma Musa, Arooni na Miriamu
Kubeebembera.
Ei Balaki omugabe wa Moabu yaacumire,
N'eki Balamu mwene Beori yaamugarukiremu,
Kandi n'ebyabaireho okuruga Shitimu okuhika Gilugaali,
Ngu mubone kumanya eby'okujuna ebi MUKAMA yaakozire.
Nkainama omu maisho ga Ruhanga orikukira boona?
Nyije omu maisho ge n'ebitambo by'okwotsya,
N'enyana ezihikize omwaka gumwe?
Nari emigyera y'emajuta obukumi?
Mpeyo omwana wangye w'omujigaijo ahabw'ekicumuro kyangye,
Ekyana ky'omubiri gwangye nkihongye ahabw'ekibi ky'amagara gangye?
Mbwenu eki MUKAMA arikukwenza niki,
Kureka okukora eby'oburyo, okukunda embabazi,
N'okugyenda na Ruhanga waawe n'obucureezi?
Kandi okutiina eiziina ryawe n'obwengye buhikire;
Iwe ruganda 'we, kandi naimwe abateeraine omu rurembo,
Nimuhurire.
Nimugira ngu nkaabaasa kwebwa eitungo ry'obubi
Eriri omu nju y'enkozi z'ebibi,
Kandi n'endengo zitahikire ezikyeenirwe?
N'oine enshaho y'amabaare agu arikugobezesa?
Abatuuzi baawe nibabeiha,
Kandi orurimi rw'omu kanwa kaabo niruryarya.
Nikyo ntandikiire kubateera,
Nkabahindura enshoberwa ahabw'ebibi byanyu.
Omuriimwe haryabamu enjara.
Muryabiika, kwonka ebi muribiika tibirigumaho,
Kandi ebi muribiika ndyabigaburira rurara.
Muryanyuuka ebyana by'emitiini,
Kwonka timuryesiiga majuta gaabyo;
Muryanyuuka ebijuma by'emizaabibu,
Kwonka timurinywa viinyo yaabyo;
N'ebyakozirwe ab'enju ya Ahabu byona.
Kandi mutuura nimukuratira obwengye bwabo,
Nikyo naaza kuabahindurira enshoberwa,
N'abatuuzi baanyu nkabagira eky'okweshaanya;
Mutyo mukaba ekirikugaywa amahanga.
Kandi omu bantu tihariho n'omwe oine omutima gugororokire;
Boona nibagwera kusheesha eshagama,
Buri muntu naatega mwene ishe ekigoye.
Kukikoresa obweziriki.
Omutegyeki n'omuramuzi nibashaba enguzi,
N'omuntu mukuru naagamba butunu ekibi
Eki omutima gwe gurikwetenga.
Okwo nikwo barikubugaabuganisa enaama zaabo.
N'orikukira kuba ohikiriire omuribo ni nk'orugo rw'amahwa.
Eizooba ry'abarinzi baabo, kandi ery'okufubirwa kwabo ryahika;
Mbwenuho baarimbagirirwa.
Mutagira obwesigye ahari munywani waanyu;
Kandi okwate akanwa
Nangwa n'aha mukazi waawe ou ofumbata;
Omwishiki naagomera nyina,
N'omukaamwana naagomera nyina-zaara,
Kandi abazigu b'omuntu n'ab'omu ka ye.
Ntegyereze Ruhanga ow'okujunwa kwangye.
Ruhanga wangye aryampurira.
N'obu ndigwa, ndyaimuka;
N'obu ndishutama omu mwirima,
MUKAMA aryambeera omushana.
Ahabw'okuba nkamugomera,
Okuhitysa obu arintonganira,
Akansingirira.
Aryanshohoza ampitsye omu mushana,
Ndeebe okuhikiirira kwe;
Akwatwe enshoni, owangizire ati:
MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arahi?
Amaisho gangye garyamwesiimirana.
Kandi obwo aryaribatiirirwa
Nk'ebyondo by'omu muhanda.
Eryo izooba emyatano eryairizibwa hare.
Barugire Asiria okuhika Misri,
Okuruga Misri okuhika aha mugyera Furaati,
Okuruga aha nyanja okuhika aha ndiijo,
Okuruga aha rushozi okuhika aha rundi.
Neeturwa abatuuzi baayo
Ahabw'ebirugire omu bi barikukora.
Obusyo bw'obuhunguzi bwawe,
Abatuura bonka omu ihamba
Eriri omuri Bashani na Gileadi
Nk'omu biro bya ira.
Nk'ebi naayorekire, obu waabaire nooruga Misri.
Gakwatirwe enshoni amaani gaago goona;
Engaro gazite aha munwa,
N'amatu gaago gaigare.
Nk'ebintu by'omu nsi ebirikugyendesa enda.
Baryaruga omu bigo byabo nibatetema,
Bahindukire MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu baine obwoba,
Batiine ahabwawe.
Osaasira okutahikiirira,
Oyehuzya ebicumuro by'ab'obuhunguzi bwe abatsigaireho?
Taguma na kiniga ebiro byona;
Ahabw'okuba ashemerererwa embabazi.
Aryaribatiirira eby'okushiisha byaitu ahansi y'ebigyere bye.
Oryanaga ebibi byaitu byona omu maizi maingi
Agari ahagati y'enyanja.
Na Abrahamu omukorere eby'embabazi,
Nk'oku waaraganiise baatatenkuriirwe
Okwiha omu biro bya ira.
MUKAMA naahora, kandi aine ekiniga kingi;
MUKAMA ahoora abazigu be,
Kandi abarikumwanga aguma abainiire ekiniga.
Aine obushoboorozi bwingi,
Kandi taiha orubanja ha muntu ou rusingire.
Omuhanda gwe guba mu kasooroora n'eihunga,
Kandi ebicu n'omucuucu gw'ebigyere bye.
Ayomya n'emigyera yoona;
Bashani na Karumeeli bihotoka,
Ebirabyo bya Lebanooni bihonga.
Ebibungo biyaga,
N'ensi ehindurwa busha omu maisho ge,
Ensi n'abagitwiremu boona.
N'oha owaakwemera okubuguma kw'ekiniga kye?
Ekiniga kye kishukirwe nk'omuriro,
Kandi enkiri niwe azishatura.
N'ekigo kigumire aha izooba ry'enaku,
Kandi amanya abamuhungiraho.
N'omwegyemure ogurikuhimintika n'amaani,
N'abarikumwanga ababingye, abahitsye omu mwirima.
Aryamariraho kimwe;
Abazigu be taribahoora bwa kabiri.
Kandi nk'ebitsintsi by'embuba ebyomire.
Akagirira MUKAMA enaama mbi,
Akaha abantu obwengye bw'okukora kubi?
N'obu baraabe bari ab'amaani kandi baingi,
Baryamarwaho, bahweho;
N'obu ndaabe naakubonaboneise,
Tindikubonabonesa bundi.
Ncwe n'ebikubohire.
Eiziina ryawe tiririguma nirihungurwa,
Ndyacwekyereza ekishushani kyona ekibaizire,
N'ekiheesirwe ekiri omu nju ya baaruhanga baawe;
Kandi ndyakurimira ekituuro, ahabw'okuba ori orikugaywa.
Orikureeta amakuru g'ebigambo birungi,
Akaranga eby'obusingye!
Iwe Yuda, guma oijukye amagyenyi gaawe,
Ohikiirize ebi waaraganiise noorahira;
Ahabw'okuba omubi tarigaruka kukurwanisa bundi;
Acwekyerereziibwe kimwe.
Ta abarinzi aha ngo z'amabaare;
Guma otaire amaisho aha muhanda,
Oyezirikye, oyegaruremu amaani gaawe goona.
Nke'kitiinisa kya Israeli;
Ahakuba abanyagi bamazireho ebyabo byona,
Baakonkobora amataagi g'emizaabibu yaabo.)
Engabo z'amamanzi ge nizitukurikana,
Abaserukare be bajwaire ebijwaro bya karari;
Ebigaari ebitengire orugamba
Nibimurinkana nk'ekirimi ky'omuriro;
Embaraasi nizikangaza,
Nibimurinkana nk'emuri,
Kandi nibirabya nk'omurabyo.
Bagyenda nibateera entsibo;
Nibeehuuta baza aha ngo z'amabaare,
Bataho eky'okwesangiza.
Ekikaari kyona emitima ebahweire omunda.
Abazaana be nibatonzya,
Nibacura, nibahuuma nk'enkombe, nibeemaamaata.
Ei amaizi gaayo gagyenzire,
Nibeeta nibagira bati: Mwemerere! Mwemerere!
Kwonka habura n'omwe owaareeba enyima.
Nimunyagye efeeza, munyagye n'ezaabu!
Ahakuba ebibiikire ti by'okuhwaho,
N'obu byakuba ebitungirwe eby'obuguzi bwingi.
Emitima ebahweire omunda, amaju nigatetema,
Boona bahinduriize ahamaisho!
N'ahu emigunju yaazo eriira,
Ahu entare ereetera ebyana byayo eki yaita,
Hataine orikubikanga?
Eniganigira enkazi zaayo,
Eijuza amaaya gaayo ebi eitsire,
Enyanga zaayo n'enyama ezi etaanyagwire.
Rwona rwijwire ebishuba n'obunyagi;
Eminyago yaarwo terikubarwa.
Emitsindo y'embaraasi n'okubomborekana kw'ebigaari!
Abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi nibeeroha omu rugamba,
Zaarurara nizityankana, n'amacumu nigamurinkana;
Enyanja y'abantu eitsirwe,
Emitumbi etungamiraine etarikubaasa kubarwa;
Abantu nibagiteeraho entsibo.
Obwamaraaya bw'ogwo orikurigirwa, kandi oine oburogo oburikwita,
Orikureebya amahanga n'obwamaraaya bwe,
Akarogyesa enganda oburogo bwe.
Reeba naaba omuzigu waawe.
Ndyahenuura ekipumpuriya kyawe, kikushwekye ahamaisho,
Ndekye amahanga gareebe enjuuro yaawe,
n'ensi z'obugabe nzoorekye enshoni zaawe.
Nkugire eky'okushamaarirwa.
Bagire bati: Nineeve ebaire amatongo,
N'oha oraagicurire?
Mbwenu nyihe hi ab'okugiyaagira?
Eyaabaire eri ahagati y'emigyera,
Eyehinguririziibwe amaizi,
Ekigo kyayo kiri enyanja,
N'amaizi gari orugo rwayo?
Agataine bugarukiro;
Aba Puuti n'Abalibya bakaba bari abahwezi baayo.
Ekanyagwa, yaatwarwa omu bukwatwa;
Abaana baayo abato baateerwa ahansi,
Baacwagurukira omuri buri nteeraniro y'enguuto.
Baateerera enteenyu abashaija baayo b'ekitiinisa,
Kandi abantu baayo boona abakuru baababohesa enjegyere.
Osherure ah'okuhungira abazigu.
Ku etengyetsibwa, bigwa omu kanwa k'omuri.
Amarembo g'ensi yaawe gaiguriirwe abazigu,
Omuriro gwokize empimbi zaawe.
Ogumye ebigo byawe;
