Oze omu ibumba, okaate obudongo,
Okwate eby'okubumbisa amatafaari.
Okaitwa rurara, ekakumaraho nk'enzigye,
Yekanyise nk'enzigye,
Oyekanyise nk'eseenene.
Okakanyisa abashuubuzi baawe,
Baakira enyonyoozi z'omu iguru obwingi.
Enzigye ziimutsya amababa, ziguruka, zigyenda.
Abahandiiki baawe ni nk'ekicu ky'enzigye
Eziguma zibandami aha ngo
Aha izooba ry'embeho;
Omushana gukijwa, zikaguruka, zikagyenda,
Hakabura owaamanya ei ziri.
Abariisa baawe bagwejegyeire,
N'abakungu baawe nibahungira;
Abantu baawe bataataaniire aha bibungo,
Babuzire ow'okubataaruura.
Obuhuta bwawe ni bubi munonga;
Boona abarikuhurira ebyawe
Bateera omu ngaro nibakwesiimirana.
Mbwenu n'oha otakahikwahoga obubi bwawe obutahwa?
Okanga kumpurira?
Nari okukutakira ahabw'okukorwa kubi,
Otanjune?
Okuhwerekyerera n'obubisha biri omu maisho gangye,
Entongane n'empaka ziri ahaiguru.
Kandi n'emanja tizirikucuubwa mu buryo.
Ahabw'okuba ababi nibeehinduririza abahikiriire,
Nikyo emanja z'oburyo zirikwitirwa.
Mutangaare, mute engaro aha munwa;
Ahabw'okuba ninkora omurimo omu biro byanyu,
Ogu mutarikubaasa kwikiriza, n'obu mwakugambirwa muta.
Eryo ihanga ry'enshaarizi kandi eririkubakuka,
Eririkubuga ensi yoona
Kukubuura amaka agatari gaaryo.
Nibatiinisa, kandi nibaitsa obwoba,
Emicwe yaabo n'ekitiinisa kyabo
Nibo barikubyeha.
Nizishaarira okukira emishega y'omu mwabazyo;
Abarikuzigyenderaho nibazikinisa n'amaryo,
Buzima abantu baabo abazitembire nibaruga hare.
Nibaguruka nk'eishamba eririkusyoka kuteera eky'okurya.
Okutiinisa kwabo kubeebembeire,
Nibarunda hamwe enkwatwa nk'omusheenyi.
Nibagaaniiza abategyeki.
Buri kigo nibakishekyerera,
Ahabw'okuba nibakirundaho eitaka, bakikwata.
Batyo barabaho nk'omuyaga, bagumizamu,
N'abantu abaine orubanja, abahindwire amaani gaabo ruhanga waabo.
Tori otahwaho ebiro byona?
Titurifa.
Ai MUKAMA, obataireho kucwera abantu emanja;
Naiwe Rukiri, obahamize ngu babone kuhana.
Kandi agatarikwemera kureeba bitahikire,
Ahabw'enki nooreeba abantu endeebya,
Omubi naamirakwo orikumukiza okuhikiirira,
Haza okeetsiza?
Ahakuba noohindura abantu nk'eby'enyanja,
Baba nk'ebirikugyendesa enda, ebitagira mukama.
Abaihisamu akatimba ke,
Abakwatsa entukuru;
Atyo ashemererwa, ayesiima.
N'ahabw'ekyo atambira akatimba ke ebitambo,
Ayoterera entukuru ye obubaane,
Ahakuba ebyo nibyo bimureetera kujarama,
Akarya eby'ebishaju.
Naija kuguma naafukunkura entukuru ye,
Naita amahanga ebiro byona ataine saasi?
Nyemerere aha munaara gw'okurindiraho,
Nnagye amaisho, ndeebe eki arangambire,
N'eki ndaagarukyemu ahabw'ebi ndikwetonganira.
Handiika ebi waayorekwa,
Obihandiikye gye aha bishate,
Oraabishome abishome naarahutsya.
Tibirituuraho kuhikiirizibwa,
Kandi tibiribeiha.
N'obu byakutuuraho, obitegyereze;
Buzimazima biryaija, tibirikyerererwa.
Kwonka ohikiriire aryaba ohuriire ahabw'okwikiriza kwe.
Kandi omunyamaryo otaikara muka.
Omururu gwe ni mwingi nk'Okuzimu;
Ni nka rufu, tahaaga.
Ayeteeraniraho amahanga goona,
Ayeshangururizaho enganda zoona.
Abu orikwihuza tibariimuka kitaraariire,
N'abarikutetemesa bakasisiimuka?
Obwo oryaba omunyago gwabo.
Amahanga goona agatsigaireho naiwe garyakunyaga,
Nigakutura eshagama y'abantu n'obubisha
Obu waagiriire ensi n'endembo n'abazitwiremu boona.
Ngu ayeyarikire ekyashuri kye ahaiguru,
Akabi koona karekye kumuhikaho.
Okahemura eka yaawe;
Waareebya amagara gaawe.
N'omutambiko gw'omu biti by'enju gurigarukyemu.
Akahamisa orurembo okutahikiirira, aryakareeba!
Abantu okuhendekyera omuriro gwonka,
N'amahanga okwerusya ahabw'ebitaine mugasho?
Okumanya ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA,
Nk'oku amaizi gabuga hoona omu nyanja.
Akakimusinzisa, ngu areebe enjuuro ye.
Naiwe nywa, otaruze!
Ekikopo ekiri omu ngaro ya MUKAMA eya buryo
Nikiija kurugaho kikuhikyeho,
Enshoni zize aha ktiinisa kyawe.
Okucwekyereza enyamaishwa kwawe kukwitse obwoba
Ahabw'eshagama y'abantu ei waaseesire,
N'obubisha obu waagiriire ensi,
N'endembo n'abazitwiremu boona.
Omukozi waakyo yaaheza kukikora,
Ekishushani ky'ekyoma ekirikwegyesa ebishuba?
Ahakuba omukozi ku aba naakora ebishushani bitarikugamba,
Aba naayesiga ebi ayekoreire n'emikono ye.
N'eibaare eritarikugamba ati: Imuka!
Nimugira ngu ebyo nibibasa kwegyesa?
Reeba, bishwekirwe ezaabu n'efeeza,
Kandi tibirimu mwitsyo gwona.
Ensi yoona ececekye omu maisho ge.
Okushaba kwa Habakuuki omu iraka rya Shigionoosi.
Ai MUKAMA, garura busya omurimo gwawe omuri egi myaka,
Ahagati y'egi myaka ogumanyise;
Omu kugira ekiniga oijukye okugira embabazi.
Orikwera yaaruga aha rushozi Parani,
Ekitiinisa kye kyashweka eiguru,
Kandi ensi yaijura okuhimbisibwa kwe. Sela
Amaranzi gaaturuka omu ngaro ze nigarabya;
Kandi okwo niyo yaasherekire amaani ge.
Emyambi y'omuriro yaamukuratira, emuri omu ntegye.
Yaanaga amaisho, yaatengyetsa amahanga;
Obwo enshozi ezituuraho zaataataanisibwa,
N'ebibungo by'ebiro byona byabandama,
Emitwarize ye yaaba nk'eya ira.
Emikingo y'ensi ya Midiani yaatetema.
Nari shi egyo migyera niyo waagwereirwe kubi,
Nari shi okagirira enyanja ekiniga,
Obu waagyendera aha mbaraasi zaawe,
N'omu kigaari kyawe ky'obusinguzi?
Waatamika emyambi omu rugye. Sela.
Ensi waagicwamu emikura y'emigyera.
Emyegyemure y'amaizi yaahimintika,
Eiraka ry'amaizi g'ahagati y'enyanja ryahurirwa,
Ebingozi byayo byanaga emikono.
Ahabw'okumurinkana kw'emyambi yaawe neerashwa,
N'ahabw'okurabya kw'eicumu ryawe eririkutyankana.
Waaribatiirira amahanga ogagwereirwe kubi.
N'okujuna ou waashukireho amajuta.
Waasingyera omutwe gw'omubi,
Waamujweka busha okuruga aha bibero okuhika omu bitsya. Sela.
Waacumuta emitwe y'abarwani be emango zaawe,
Abaizire nk'akasooroora kuntuntumura,
Nibeesiima nk'abarikwenda kumaraho abooro bwesherekye.
Okwecunda kw'amaizi g'amaani.
Eminwa yangye yaagira ekitengo ahabw'eryo iraka;
Okujunda kwantaaha omu magufa,
Amaguru ganjogajogoka.
Ndyategyereza eizooba ry'enaku, ntuurize,
Ku rihika aha bantu abarihurura kututeera.
N'obu emitiini eraabe etarikurabya,
Emizaabibu etaine bijuma,
Emizeituuni ebuzire amajuta,
Emisiri etarikwera by'okurya,
Obusyo bw'entaama buhweire omu kibuga,
N'obw'ente buhweire omuka,
Nyesiimire omuri Ruhanga ow'okujunwa kwangye.
Ahindura ebigyere byangye nk'eby'empara,
Kandi angyendesa omu myanya yangye etunguukire.
Aha mukuru w'abeeshongozi byeshongorerwe aha nanga y'emirya.
Ebintu byona aha nsi,
Mmareho ebirikuguruka omu mwanya,
Kandi n'eby'omu nyanja.
Ndyahwerekyereza ababi,
Mmareho oyetwa omuntu weena ori omu nsi;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
N'abatwire omuri Yerusaalemu boona;
Kandi omuri ogu mwanya ndyamaramu aba Baali abatsigaireho,
Mmareho eiziina ry'abanyamurwa abarikuramya ebishushani;
Aha mitwe y'amaju,
Abarikuramya nibarahira MUKAMA,
Kandi bakaramya na Milikoomu;
Abatakisherura MUKAMA, n'obu kwakuba okumwehanuuzaho.
Ahakuba eizooba rya MUKAMA riri haihi;
MUKAMA atebeekaniise ekitambo,
Yaayeza abagyenyi be.
Ndyafubira abategyeki na batabani b'omugabe
N'abajwaire ebijwaro by'enduga-mahanga boona.
Kandi eryo izooba ndyafubira
Buri muntu orikuguruka omuryango,
N'abariwijuza enju ya mukama waabo
Obubisha n'oburyangatanisa.
Enduuru eryahurirwa neeruga aha irembo ry'Eby'enyanja,
N'okuborooga nikureetwa omu kicweka kya kabiri,
N'okubaruka kuhango nikuruga omu bibungo.
Ahakuba abashuubuzi boona tibaakiriho,
N'abarikupima efeeza boona bamazirweho.
Nfubire abantu abarikugira omu mitima yaabo
Bati: MUKAMA tarikora kurungi,
n'obu kwakuba okukora kubi.
N'amaju gaabo gacwekyerezibwe.
N'obu baraayombekye amaju,
Kwonka tibarigaraaramu;
N'obu baraabyare emizaabibu,
Kwonka tibarinywa viinyo yaayo.
Riri haihi, kandi nirirahuka munonga;
Nimuhurire! Eizooba rya MUKAMA!
Emanzi neetakirayo munonga.
Ery'enaku n'obusaasi,
Ery'okucwekyereza n'okumariraho kimwe,
Ery'ekibunda n'omwirima,
Ery'ebicu n'omwirima ndindindi,
Kurwanisa endembo ezeehinguririziibwe engo z'amabaare
N'eminaara miraingwa.
Babandagire nk'empumi;
Ahabw'okuba bakacumura ahari MUKAMA,
Eshagama yaabo eryasheeshwa nk'omucuucu,
n'emibiri yaabo enagwe nk'amazi.
Tiziribaasa kubajuna aha izooba ry'ekiniga kya MUKAMA.
Kureka ensi yoona eryamarwaho
Omuriro gw'eihato ry'ekiniga kye;
Eego, aryamariraho kimwe
Abatwire omu nsi boona kitaraariire.
Nimwije, muteeranire hamwe,
Nk'ebishushunga ebirikutuntumuka,
Mutakahikirweho kiniga kya MUKAMA ekingi,
Mutakahikirweho izooba ry'ekiniga kya MUKAMA.
Abakora ebi MUKAMA aragiira,
Nimumusherure;
Kandi musherure okuhikiirira n'obucureezi;
Obundi mukaasherekwa aha izooba ry'ekiniga kya MUKAMA.
Ashikelooni ehindukye amatongo,
Ab'omuri Ashidoodi babingwe omu ihangwe,
Na Ekurooni erandurwe.
Abatwire aha rubaju rw'enyanja, muryakareeba!
Imwe Abanyakanaani, ensi y'Abafilistia,
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiryabarwanisa.
Ndyabacwekyereza okuhitsya obu hatarigira
Mutuuzi weena owaatsigaraho.
Kandi ezo mbaju z'enyanja ziryaba amariisizo,
Amaka g'abariisa n'ag'amasyo g'entaama,
Abariba batsigaireho, baziriisizemu,
Kandi omu maju g'omuri Ashikelooni
Nimwo baribyama omu mwabazyo;
Ahakuba MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo aryabataho omutima,
Abaihe omu bukwatwa, abagarure.
Nkahurira ebigaaniizo bya Moabu
N'ebijumo by'Abaamoni,
Oku baagaaniirize abantu bangye,
Bakeehimbisa ku barikwija kuteera ensi yaabo.
Buzimazima Moabu eryaba nka Sodoma
N'Abaamoni babe nka Gomora,
Ensi emazirweho ebicuragyenyi n'ebiina by'omwonyo,
Ebeere kimwe amatongo ebiro byona.
Abantu bangye abaritsigaraho baryabanyaga,
N'ab'eihanga ryangye abarihonokaho baryabakubuura.
ahabw'okuba bakateerera enaku abantu ba MUKAMA ow'amahe,
Baabeesiimirana.
Eego, baaruhanga b'ensi boona aryabahorootsa,
Kandi abantu baryamuramya,
Buri muntu amuramize ei ari,
Nangwa n'ab'omu nsi zoona ez'amahanga.
Naimwe Abanyesiopia,
Muryaitwa rurara yangye;
Acwekyereze Asiria,
Ahindure Nineeve amatongo,
Ebe ensi ekarangataine nk'eihamba ry'omusheenyi.
N'enyamaishwa zoona ez'omu ishwa,
Ebihuhura-bahuta n'ebinyogote
Biryatuura omu bisheenyuka by'enyomyo zaayo,
Ebihihizi bihihirire omu madirisa gaayo,
N'ebikoona bigambire omu bisasi by'amaju gaayo;
Ahakuba embaaho zaayo z'emyereezi ziryashuuruurwa.
Nirwehimbisa, nirwegira ruti:
Niinye ndiho, tihariho ondiijo.
Mbwenu ka ruhindukire amatongo,
Rukaba oburaaro bw'enyamaishwa!
Orikururabaho weena
Naayeshaanya, aruha mutinzi.
Kandi orusiisikaire, ruryakareeba!
Tirurikwenda kuhanwa,
Tirurikwirira haihi Ruhanga waarwo.
Abaramuzi baarwo n'emishega y'omu mwabazyo
Etagira ki etsiga okuhitsya omu kasheehe;
Abatarikwesigwa;
Abanyamurwa baarwo nibashiisha ekyetwa ekirikwera kyona,
Nibashiisha nkana Ebiragiro.
Takora kubi;
Buri kasheeshe areeta eby'oburyo bye omu mushana,
Tayosha;
Kwonka otahikiriire tagira kashoni.
Eminaara yaago n'ebisheenyuka;
Nyitiire kimwe enguuto zaago,
Ngu hatagira owaazirabamu;
Endembo zaago zihindukire amatongo,
Zaabura omuntu, zaabura n'ow'okuzituuramu.
Rwikirize kuhanwa,
Rurekye kwehuzya
Ebi naaruragiire byona.
Kwonka abarutwiremu baayeyongyera kwezirika
Kushiisha omu kukora kwabo kwona.
Okuhitsya aha izooba eri ndiimukiraho ndi mushinja;
Ahabw'okuba mmaririire kuteeranira hamwe
Amahanga n'obugabe butari bumwe,
Mbone kubishukaho ekiniga kyangye
N'okuguubwa kubi kwangye kwona,
Ahakuba ensi yoona eryamarwaho
Omuriro gw'eihato ry'ekiniga kyangye.
Ebe engambo nungi,
Ab'omuri ago mahanga boona
Babone kutakira eiziina rya MUKAMA
N'okumuheereza n'omutima gumwe.
Baryandeetera empongano, nibagiiha seeri y'emigyera ya Esiopia.
Ahabw'ebi waakozire nongomera;
Ahabw'okuba obwo ndyakwihamu
Abanyamaryo baawe abarikwehimbisa;
Kandi torigaruka kwekunikira
Ha rushozi rwangye orurikwera.
Abantu abacureezi kandi abatarikwetunguura;
Baryasherura obuhungiro omu iziina rya MUKAMA.
N'obu kwakuba okugamba ebishuba,
N'orurimi rw'obugobya
Tirurishangwa mu kanwa kaabo;
Ahakuba baryarya, babyame
Hataine orikubatiinisa.
Iwe Israeli, teera akaari!
Naiwe Yerusaalemu, shemererwa,
Oyesiime n'omutima gwawe gwona!
N'abazigu baawe yaabanaga aheeru.
Omugabe wa Israeli, MUKAMA, ari ahagati yaawe;
Torigaruka kutiina kabi bundi.
Iwe Saayuuni 'we, otatiina,
Emikono yaawe etatentebuka.
Emanzi erikujuna.
Aryakushemerererwa aine obunanukye,
Aryakushemerererwa naayeshongora
Nk'aha izooba ry'obugyenyi.
Ndyakwihaho akabi,
Karekye kukujumisa.
Ndyaitana n'abarikukuhata boona.
Ndyakiza abarema,
Ntaaruure encuubwa;
Kandi abaabaire bahemukiire omu nsi yoona
Ndyabaha okugmbwa gye n'eiziina rirungi.
Obu ndibataaruuriramu;
Ahakuba ku ndigarura abantu baanyu
Abatwairwe omu bukwatwa nimureeba,
Ndyabaha eiziina rirungi n'okuhimbisibwa
Omu mahanga goona ag'omu nsi;
nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Abantu aba nibagira bati: Obunaku bw'okugaruka kwombeka enju ya MUKAMA tibukahikire.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija nikiraba omuri nabi Hagai nikigira kiti:
Nimugira ngu obu nibwo bunaku obu mushemereire kuraara omu maju gaanyu agashwekirwe embaaho omunda, haza enju egi ekaguma eri omushaka?
N'ahabw'ekyo hati MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Muteekateekye aha mitwarize yaanyu.

Mukabiba bingi, mwagyesha bikye; nimurya, kwonka timurikuhaaga; nimunywa, kwonka timurikuhwa iriho; nimujwara, kwonka timurikutagatirwa; kandi n'orikukorera ebihembo, naabikorera kubibiika omu nshaho efumukire.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Muteekateekye aha mitwarize yaanyu.
Mwinamukye omu bibungo, mureete ebiti, mwombekye egyo nju, mbone kugishemerererwa n'okugihimbisizibwamu; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Mukagira amatsiko g'okutunga bingi, mbwenu reeba, bibaire bikye; kandi ku mubireetsire omuka, naabihuuha, byatuntumuka. Nimugira ngu ekyo kireetsirwe ki?, nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikubuuza. Kireetsirwe enju yangye kuguma eri omushaka, haza buri muntu omuriimwe akahugira aha kwombeka eye.
Nikyo eiguru ahaiguru yaanyu riimiire orume ahabwanyu, n'ensi ekanga kweza,
naanye nkareeta omushana mwingi omu nsi n'aha bibungo, aha mbibo, ahari viinyo, aha majuta, aha birikumera omu itaka byona, aha bantu, aha matungo n'aha bi barikuhendekyera byona.

Bwanyima Zerubabeeli mwene Shealutieli, na Yoshua mwene Yehozadaaki omunyamurwa omukuru n'abantu boona abaatsigaireho, baayorobera eiraka rya MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo yaamutumire; kandi abantu boona baatiina MUKAMA.
Bwanyima Hagai, entumwa ya MUKAMA, yaagambira abantu ebi MUKAMA amutumire, naagira ati: MUKAMA naagira ati: Ndi hamwe naimwe.

Atyo MUKAMA yaimutsya omutima gwa Zerubabeeli mwene Shealutieli omutegyeki wa Yuda, n'ogwa Yoshua mwene Yehozadaaki omunyamurwa omukuru, n'ey'abantu boona abaatsigareho, baija, baatandika kwombeka enju ya MUKAMA ow'amahe Ruhanga waabo,
aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina omuri okwo kwezi kwa mukaaga.

Omuri ogwo mwaka gwa kabiri ogw'omu busingye bw'omugabe Dario, omu kwezi kwa mushanju, aha kiro kyakwo ekya makumi abiri na kimwe, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyaija nikiraba omuri nabi Hagai, nikigira kiti:
Gambira Zerubabeeli, mwene Shealutieli na Yoshua mwene Yehozadaaki omunyamurwa omukuru n'abantu boona abatsigaireho oti:
Beitu omuriimwe harimu otsigaireho owaareebire ekitiinisa eki enju egi yaabaire eine obunyakare? Mbwenu hati nimugireeba muta? Ti busha omu maisho gaanyu?

Kwonka hati guma, iwe Zerubabeeli; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira; naiwe Yoshua mwene Yehozadaaki omunyamurwa omukuru, guma; kandi naimwe abantu b'omuri egi nsi mwena, mugume, kandi mukore; ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naimwe; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira,
nk'eki naaragaine naimwe, obu mwaruga Misri, oku kiri. Omwoyo wangye atuura omuriimwe, mutatiina.
Ahakuba oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Omu kaanya kakye niinyija kugaruka ntengyetse eiguru n'ensi, enyanja n'eitaka;
kandi ndyatengyetsa amahanga goona, eitungo ry'ago mahanga goona riije, n'egi nju ngiijuze ekitiinisa; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Efeeza n'ezangye, ezaabu nazo n'ezangye; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Ekitiinisa ky'egi nju ekya bwanyima kiryakira ekyayo eky'okubanza; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira; kandi omuri ogu myanya nimwo ndiheera obusingye; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Kandi aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina omu kwezi kwa mwenda omuri ogwo mwaka gwa kabiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Dario, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyaija nikiraba omuri nabi Hagai, nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Buuza abanyamurwa ekibuuzo eki oti:

Omuntu ku yaakutwarira enyama eyeziibwe omu kicweka kya ifo eky'ekanzu ye, yaakikoza aha mugaati, nari aha kicumbe, nari omuri viinyo nari omu majuta nari aha by'okurya by'omuringo gwona, kikaaba ekirikwera? Abanyamurwa baagarukamu bati: Ngaaha.
Hagai yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Omuntu orikushiishwa okukora aha mutumbi, ku yaakukora aha kintu kimwe ahari ebyo, kikaaba ekitashemeire? Abanyamurwa baagarukamu bati: Eego, kikaaba ekitashemeire.

Bwanyima Hagai yaagira ati: MUKAMA naagira ati: Kandi nikwo kiri n'omu maisho gangye ahari aba bantu n'ahari eri ihanga; kandi nikwo kiri n'aha murimo gwona ogu barikukoresa emikono yaabo; kandi n'eki barikuhongyerayo kyona kisiisikaire.
Mbwenu nimbeeshengyereza, muteekateekye ebirikwija kubaho okwiha hati. Obu eibaare ryona ryabaire ritakatairwe ha rindi omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA, bikabasusira ki?

Obu omuntu yaabaire ahika aha kirundo ky'encuro makumi abiri, akashangamu ikumi ryonka; kandi obu omuntu yaabaire ahika aha bwato bwa viinyo kutahamu enjoga makumi ataano, akashanga ziri makumi abiri zonka.
Nkabateeza okubabuka, okusya-nyamwenga n'orubaare, kwonka nabwo timurangarukiire; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

Nimbeeshengyereza muteekateekye okwiha hati, aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina eky'okwezi kwa mwenda n'omu biro ebirikwija. Okwiha aha izooba eri omusingi gwa hekalu ya MUKAMA gwateereirweho, muteekateekye.
Embibo zikiri omu bitara? Emizaabibu, emitiini9, emikomamahanga n'emizeituuni nibikyera busha? Okwiha eri izooba niinyija kubaha omugisha.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyaija ahari Hagai obwa kabiri aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina ky'okwo kwezi nikigira kiti:
Gambira Zerubabeeli omutegyeki wa Yuda noogira oti: Niinyija kutengyetsa eiguru n'ensi,
njuumikye ekitebe ky'obugabe; kandi niinyija kumaraho amaani g'obugabe bw'amahanga, njuumikye ebigaari by'orugamba n'abarikubigyenderamu; biryagwa ahansi, buri muntu aitwe rurara ya mugyenzi we.
Kandi MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Eryo izooba ndyakutwara, iwe Zerubabeeli omwiru wangye, mwene Shealutieli, nkugire empeta y'akamanyiso; ahabw'okuba nkutooraine; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
MUKAMA akagwerwa kubi munonga baashwenkuriimwe;
n'ahabw'ekyo obagire oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Mungarukire, naanye niinyija kubagarukira; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Mutaba nka baashwenkuriimwe, abu baanabi aba ira baabaire bagambira n'eiraka rihango bati: Mugarukye, murekye emitwarize yaanyu mibi, n'ebibi ebi murikukora. Kwonka baayanga kumpurira, n'obu kwakuba okuunyetaho; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mbwenu, baashwenkuriimwe barahi? Na baanabi, nimugira ngu batuuraho ebiro byona?

Beitu ebigambo byangye n'ebiragiro byangye, ebi naaragiire abairu bangye baanabi, tibirahikire ahari baashwenkuriimwe? N'ahabw'ekyo bakeeteisa nibagira bati: Nk'oku MUKAMA ow'amahe yaamaririire kutugira nk'emitwarize yaitu n'ebi twakozire, oku biri, nikwo atugizire.

Aha kiro kya makumi abiri na bina omu kwezi kwa ikumi na kumwe, okwezi okurikwetwa Shebati, omu mwaka gwa kabiri ogw'omu busingye bwa Dario, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaija ahari nabi Zekaria, mwene Berekia, mwijukuru wa Ido; nawe nikwo kugira ati:

Nyekiro ku ngiire kugira nti, naareeba omushaija naagyendera aha mbaraasi erikutukura; yaayemerera ahagati y'emiti emikadasi eri omu kahanga; kandi enyima ye habaire ahariyo embaraasi ezirikutukura, ez'obugondo n'ezirikwera.
Ntyo naabuuza nti: Biriya niki, mukma wangye? Maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye yangarukamu ati: Naaza kukworeka amakuru gaabyo.
Atyo omushaija owaabaire ayemereire omu mikadasi yaagira ati: Aba nibo MUKAMA atumire kugyendagyenda nibeetegyereza ensi.
Baagarukamu maraika owaabaire ayemereire omu mikadasi, nibagira bati: Tuherize kugyendagyenda omu nsi, twagyetegyereza, twashanga ensi yoona ecureire, etuurize.
Bwanyima maraika wa MUKAMA yaagira ati: Ai MUKAMA ow'amahe, oryahitsya hi okutasaasira Yerusaalemu n'endembo za Yuda, ezi omazire emyaka makumi mushanju ogwereirwe kubi?
Maraika ogwo owaabaire naagamba naanye, MUKAMA yaamugarukamu ebigambo by'embabazi kandi ebirikuhuumuriza.
Atyo maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye yangira ati: Gamba n'eiraka rihango, noogira oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Nyine eihato ringi ahabwa Yerusaalemu na Saayuuni.
Kandi nyine ekiniga kingi ahabw'amahanga agataine ki geetaireho; ahabw'okuba ku naagwereirwe kubi kakye Abaisraeli, ago mahanga gaababonabonesa, gaarengyesereza.
Nikyo MUKAMA arikugirira ati: Ngarukiire Yerusaalemu, ngiiniire embabazi; enju yangye eryagyombekwamu, kandi omugoye gw'okugyeresa guryagyeresibwa omuri Yerusaalemu; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Garuka ogambe n'eiraka rihango oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Endembo zangye ziryagaruka ziijure obugwa gye, bushandaare hoona, MUKAMA agarukye ahuumurize Saayuuni, atoorane Yerusaalemu.
Naabuuza maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye nti: Biriya niki? Yangarukamu ati: Biriya nigo mahembe agaataataaniise Yuda, Israeli na Yerusaalemu.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yaanyoreka abaheesi bana.

Naamubuuza nti: Bariya baija kukora ki? Yangarukamu ati: Ago nigo mahembe agaataataaniise Yuda, hakabura owaimutsya omutwe, kandi abo baheesi baizire kutiinisa amahanga agaimukize amahembe gaago kurwanisa ensi ya Yuda kugitaataanisa, n'okuteera ahansi ago mahembe.
Naamubuuza nti: Nooza hi? Yangarukamu ati: Ninza kugyera Yerusaalemu kumanya obukiika n'oburaingwa bwayo.
Reeba, maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye yaashohora, kandi maraika ondiijo yaija kumubugana;
yaamugira ati: Imuka ogambire oriya mutsigazi, noogira oti: Yerusaalemu eryatuurwamu, nk'oku batuura omu birorero ebitaine ngo, ahabw'abantu baamwo n'amatungo gaabo kuba bingi;
ahakuba niinye ndiba orugo rwayo rw'omuriro orugyehinguririize, kandi niinye ndiba ekitiinisa omuriyo; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Imwe batuuzi ba Babulooni 'mwe, nimuhungire Saayuuni;
ahakuba MUKAMA ow'amahe ku yaaherize kuntuma aha mahanga agaabaire nigabanyaga, kumuhaisa ekitiinisa, (ahabw'okuba obakoraho aba akozire aha mboni y'eriisho rye)
yangira ati: Reeba, ndyagatigitira omukono, ngubangire, gahindukye eminyago y'abaabaire nibagaheereza. Haza obwo muryamanya ku MUKAMA ow'amahe niwe antumire.
Iwe Saayuuni, yeshongore, oshemererwe; ahakuba reeba, niinyija, kandi ndyatuura omuriiwe ahagati; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Eryo izooba amahanga maingi garyayehongyera MUKAMA, babe abantu bangye; ndyaguma omuriiwe ahagati.
Haza obwo oryamanya ku MUKAMA ow'amahe akuntumireho. Bwanyima MUKAMA aryahungura Yuda ebe omugabo gwe omu nsi erikwera, agarukye atoorane Yuda.
MUKAMA yaagira Sitaane ati: Iwe Sitaane, MUKAMA akuhane! Torikumanya ogu ku ari ekicumurwa ekiihirwe omu muriro?
Obwo Yoshua akaba ayemereire omu maisho ga maraika, ajwaire ebijwaro bisiisikaire munonga.
Maraika yaagira abaamwemereire omumaisho ati: Mumujuure ebyo bijwaro bisiisikaire munonga. Kandi yaagira ati: Reeba, naakwihaho okutahikiirira kwawe, niinyija kukujweka ebijwaro birungi munonga.
Naanye naagira nti: Bamute ekikwemba kishemeire aha mutwe. Batyo baamuta ekikwemba kishemeire aha mutwe, baamujweka ebijwaro; obwo maraika wa MUKAMA ayemereire aho.
Maraika wa MUKAMA yaayehanangiriza Yoshua ati:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Ku oraagyendere omu mihanda yangye, waarinda gye ebi naakukwatsize, oryategyeka enju yangye, orinde n'ebikaari byangye; naanye ndyakuha obushoboorozi bw'okwehikira omuri aba abeemereire aha.
Mbwenu, iwe Yoshua omunyamurwa omukuru, hurira, iwe na bagyenzi baawe abashutama omumaisho gaawe, ahabw'okuba abo bantu n'akamanyiso. Reeba, ndyareeta omuheereza wangye Itaagi.

Reeba, aha ibaare eri ntaire omumaisho ga Yoshua, eibaare rimwe eriine embaju mushaju, ndyasharuraho eihandiiko byaryo; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira; kandi orubanja rw'egi nsi ndyarwihaho omu izooba rimwe.
Eryo izooba buri muntu omuriimwe aryayeta mutaahi we kushutama ahansi y'omuzaabibu gwe n'ahansi y'omutiini gwe; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
yangira ati: Nooreeba ki? Naamugira nti: Nindeeba ekikondo ky'etabaaza eky'ezaabu nsha, ekiteekirweho orwabya, kandi ekiriho amatabaaza mushanju, buri emwe eine eminwa mushanju.
Kandi aha rubaju rwakyo hariho emizeituuni ebiri, gumwe aha rubaju rwakyo rwa buryo, n'ogundi aha rwa bumosho.
Naabuuza maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye nti: Ebyo amakuru gaabyo niki, mukama wangye?
Maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye yambuuza ati: Ebyo torikumanya amakuru gaabyo? Naagarukamu nti: Ngaaha, mukama wangye.
Bwanyima yangira ati: Eki n'ekigambo eki MUKAMA arikutuma ahari Zerubabeeli, naagira ati: Ti habw'amaani, kandi ti habw'obushoboorozi, kureka n'ahabw'Omwoyo wangye; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Iwe rushozi ruraingwa 'we, niiwe oha? Omumaisho ga Zerubabeeli oryahinduka oruhita. Kandi oryareeta eibaare ery'aha mutwe gw'agandi eririkuhamirwaho, obwo abantu nibateera akaari nibagira bati: Nirikagire omugisha! Nirikagire omugisha!
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Emikono ya Zerubabeeli niyo yaataireho omusingi gw'egi nju, kandi emikono ye niyo erigiheza. Haza obwo nibwo murimanya ku MUKAMA ow'amahe abantumireho.
Mbwenu n'oha oragayire ebintu nibikitandika? Baryashemererwa, baareeba kariisho omu ngaro za Zerubabeeli. Ago matabaaza nigo maisho ga MUKAMA agarikubuga hoona nigareeba ebiri omu nsi yoona.
Bwanyima naamubuuza nti: Eriya mizeituuni ebiri eri aha rubaju rw'ekikondo ky'etabaaza orwa buryo n'orwa bumohso, amakuru gaayo niki?
Naagaruka naamubuuza obwa kabiri nti: Kandi gariya mataagi abiri g'emizeituuni agari aha mbaju zombi z'enshekye ibiri z'ezaabu omu amajuta garikushohorera, amakuru gaago niki?
Yangarukamu ati: Torikumanya amakuru gaago? Naamugarukamu nti: Ngaaha, mukama wangye.
Yangira ati: Ago mataagi n'abaashukirweho amajuta ababiri abeemerera aha rubaju rwa MUKAMA ow'ensi yoona.
Yangira ati: Nooreeba ki? Naagarukamu nti: Nindeeba omuzingo gw'ekitabo ogurikuguruka; oburaingwa bwagwo mikono makumi abiri, n'obukiika bwagwo mikono ikumi.

Bwanyima yangira ati: Ogwo nigwo mukyeeno ogurikushohora kubuga ensi yoona; ahabw'okuba omuntu weena orikwiba okwiha hati aryamarwaho, nk'oku gurikugira, kandi weena orikurahira ebishuba aryamarwaho nk'oku gurikugira.
MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Ndyagwohereza gutaahe omu nju y'omushuma, n'omu nju y'orikurahira eiziina ryangye naabeiha, gugume omu maju gaabo, gumarireho kimwe embaaho n'amabaare.
Bwanyima maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye yaija, yangira ati: Imutsya amaisho gaawe, oreebe eki ekirikushohora, omanye oku kiri.
Naagira nti: Ni kintu ki? Yaagira ati: Ni eefa erikushohora. Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Eki n'eky'okushiisha ekiri omu nsi yoona.
Kandi reeba, ekifundikizo kyayo ky'eibaati ku kyafundwirwe, naareeba omukazi agishutamimu.
Maraika ogwo yaagira ati: Ogwo niwe Bubi. Yaamwigatira omuri eefa, yaagarura ekyo kifundikizo ky'eibaati ekiremeire aha minwa yaayo.

Naagaruka naimutsya amaisho; ku naagiire kugiria nti, naareeba abakzi babiri nibaija, baine omuyaga omu mapapa gaabo; bakaba baine amapapa nk'ag'enkongoro; baakiriza eefa egyo, baagitwarira omu kaabunga.
Naabuuza maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye nti: Eefa eriya nibagitwara hi?
Yangarukamu ati: Nibagitwara omu nsi ya Shinaari kugyombekyerayo enju; kandi egyo nju ku erihwa, baryata eefa egyo omu mwanya gwayo.
Kandi naagaruka naimutsya amaisho; ku naagire kugira nti, naareeba ebigaari bina nibiruga ahagati y'enshozi ibiri; ezo nshozi zikaba ziri ez'emiringa.
Ekigaari ky'okubanza kikaba nikikururwa embaraasi zirikutukura, ekya kabiri nikikururwa ezirikwiragura;
ekya kashatu nikikururwa ezirikwera, kandi ekya kana nikikururwa ez'ebihuura by'obugondo.
Bwanyima naabuuza maraika owaabaire naagamba naanye nti: Ebi niki, mukama wangye?
Maraika yangarukamu ati: Ebi nibiija kushohora kuza ei emiyaga ena y'omu iguru ereetwa, byaheza kweyoreka omu maisho ga MUKAMA ow'ensi yoona.

Ekigaari ekirikukururwa embaraasi ezirikwiragura nizigyenda nizitoora omu nsi y'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso; ezirikwera nizitoora omu nsi y'oburengyerwa-izooba, ez'ebihuura by'obugondo nizitoora omu nsi y'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Ezo mbaraasi ku zaashohoire, zaagira obwira bw'okwenda akugyenda hoona, nizeetegyereza ensi. Yaagira ati: Nimwirooko mugyendagyende omu nsi, mugyetegyereze. Ztiyo zaagyenda nizeetegyereza ensi.
Bwanyima yangambira n'eiraka rihango ati: Reeba, ziriya ezirikuza omu nsi y'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso ziikaikaniise ekiniga kyangye eki nyiniire ab'omuri egyo nsi.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Iha omu baatwairwe omu bukwatwa Heludai, Tobiya na Yedaaya abarugire Babulooni, oze omwa Yosia mwene Zefania eri izooba.
Obaakye efeeza n'ezaabu, obiheeshemu ekirunga, okite aha mutwe gwa Yoshua mwene Yehozadaaki omunyamurwa omukuru,
omugira oti: Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, omuntu orikwetwa Itaagi; ahabw'okuba aryakurira gye omu mwanya gwe, kandi aryayombeka hekalu ya MUKAMA.

Niwe aryombeka hekalu ya MUKAMA, akagira ekitiinisa ky'obugabe, akshutama aha kitebe ky'obugabe, akategyeka. Kandi aha rubaju rw'ekitebe kye ky'obugabe haryabaho omunyamurwa, bombi bagire okumanyana kw'obusingye ahagati yaabo.
Ekyo kirunga kiryaguma omuri hekalu ya MUKAMA, kubeera Heludai, Tobiya, Yedaaya na Yosia mwene Zefania ekiijutsyo.
Omu mwaka gwa kana ogw'omu busingye bw'omugabe Dario, ekigambo kya MUKAMA kikaija ahari Zekaria aha kiro kya kana ky'okwezi kwa mwenda okurikwetwa Kisileevi.
Omu biro ebyo aba Beseeli bakaba batumire Sharezeeri na Regyemu-meleki n'abashaija baabo kweshengyereza MUKAMA kubagirira embabazi,
n'okubuuza abanyamurwa b'enju ya MUKAMA ow'amahe na baanabi, bati: Tushemereire kuza omu magyenyi n'okwesiibyakwo omu kwezi kwa kataano, nk'oku tubaire nitugira omu myaka egi yoona?
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA ow'amahe kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Gambira abantu b'omuri egi nsi boona n'abanyamurwa oti: Obu mwabaire mwesiibyakwo, mukaza omu magyenyi omu kwezi kwa kataano n'okwa mushanju omuri egyo myaka makumi mushanju, obwo niinye mwabaire mwesiibizakwo?
Kandi ku murya, mwanywa, ti mweriira mukeenywera?
Ebyo tibyo MUKAMA yaagambire naaraba omuri baanabi aba ira, obu Yerusaalemu yaabaire ekitwirwemu, ekigogyeire kandi ekyehinguririziibwe endembo zaayo, n'ensi y'obukiizi-bwa-buryo bikitwirwemu?
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyagaruka kyaija ahari Zekaria nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Mucwe emanja z'oburyo, buri muntu agirire mwene waabo embabazi n'esaasi.
Murekye kuhata abafaakazi, efuuzi, abashuuhuuki n'abooro; kandi harekye kugira n'omwe omuriimwe owaagirira mwene waabo enaama mbi omu mutima gwe.
Kwonka baayanga kuhurira, baatunika amabega, baayereebera kuriya, amatu baagahenderamu ebiti, ngu batampurira.

Baagangaaza emitima yaabo nk'amabaare, ngu batahurira ebiragiro bya MUKAMA ow'amahe, n'ebigambo ebi yaabatumireho Omwoyo we, naaraba omuri baanabi aba ira. Nikyo ekiniga kingi kyarugiire ahari MUKAMA ow'amahe.
MUKAMA naagira ati: Nk'oku naabeetsire, bakanga kuhurira, nikwo nabo baanyetsire, nkanga kubahurira,

nkabataataanisisa omuyaga gw'akasooroora omu mahanga goona agu batakamanyaga. Okwo nikwo ensi ei baatsigireho yaahindukire eihamba, ekabura owaagirabamu naagyenda nari naagaruka; etyo egyo nsi erikukundwa yaahinduka eihamba.
Kandi ekigambo kya MUKAMA ow'amahe kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Nyiniire Saayuuni eihato ringi, kandi ngiriiniire nyine ekiniga kingi.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA arikugamba naagira ati: Ndyagaruka Saayuuni, ntuure omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi Yerusaalemu egyo eryayetwa orurembo orurikwesigwa, n'orushozi rwa MUKAMA ow'amahe rwetwe orushozi orurikwera.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Abagurusi n'abakaikuru baryagaruka, bashutame omu nguuto za Yerusaalemu, buri muntu naayehimbagiririza aha kibango kye ahabw'okukura munonga.
Kandi enguuto z'orurembo ziryaijura aboojo n'abaishiki nibazizaaniramu.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Ku kiraabe kiri eky'okutangaaza omu maisho g'abantu aba abatsigaireho omuri ebi biro, nimugira ngu kishemereire kuba eky'okutangaaza omu maisho gangye?, nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Reeba, ndyajuna abantu bangye, mbaihe omu nsi y'oburugwa-izooba, n'omu nsi y'oburengyerwa-izooba,
mbareete batuure omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi baryaba abantu bangye, naanye mbe Ruhanga waabo omu mazima n'omu kuhikiirira.

ahakuba ebyo biro bitakahikire, tihaine waabaire aheebwa ebihembo ahabwe nari ahabw'enyamaishwa ye; kandi ahabw'ababisha hakaba hatariho busingye aha muntu weena owaabaire ataaha nari owaabaire ashohora; ahabw'okuba buri muntu nkamuteerana na mugyenzi we, baayangana.
Kwonka hati tindikwija kugira aba bantu abatsigaireho nk'oku naabagizire obunyakare; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Ahakuba haryabaho okubibira omu busingye n'omu kugogyera; emizaabibu eryayera ebijuma byayo, eitaka ryeze emyaka yaaryo, n'eiguru ritoonyereze orume; kandi ndyaha abo bantu abatsigaireho ebyo bintu byona, bibe ebyabo.

Kandi imwe nju ya Yuda n'eya Israeli 'mwe, nk'oku mwabaire muri eky'okucweraho enfumu n'eky'okukyeenwa omu mahanga, nikwo ndibajuna, mukaba ab'okuhaisa abandi omugisha. Mutatiina, kureka emikono yaanyu egume.
nikwo n'omuri ebi biro mmaririire kukora gye Yerusaalemu n'enju ya Yuda. Mutatiina; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Ebi nibyo muraagume nimukora. Mugume mugambirane amazima, mucwere omu marembo gaanyu emanja z'oburyo, kandi ezirikureeta obusingye;
murekye kugirirana enaama mbi omu mitima yaanyu, kandi murekye kukunda endahiro z'ebishuba; ahabw'okuba ebyo byona mbyanga; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Bwanyima ekigambo kya MUKAMA ow'amahe kyanyijaho nikigira kiti:

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Okwesiibyakwo okw'omu kwezi kwa kana, okw'omu kwa kataano, okw'omu kwa mushanju n'okw'omu kwa ikumi kuryabeera ab'enju ya Yuda obunaku bw'okwesiima, bw'okunanuka, n'obw'amagyenyi g'okushemererwa; n'ahabw'ekyo mukunde amazima n'obusingye.
Kandi oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Obunaku buryahika, amahanga gaije, nibo batuuzi b'omu ndembo nyingi;
abatwire omu rurembo rumwe baryaza aha rundi, bagire bati: Ka tuze kweshengyereza MUKAMA kutugirira embabazi, tusherure MUKAMA ow'amahe; naanye niinyija kuzayo.
Enganda nyingi n'amahanga g'amaani baryaija kusherura MUKAMA ow'amahe omuri Yerusaalemu, n'okumweshengyereza ngu abagirire embabazi.

Oku nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugamba naagira ati: Omuri ebyo biro abantu ikumi, abarikuruga omu mahanga aga buri rurimu, baryakwata omukugiro gw'ekanza y'Omuyudaaya, bamugire bati: Ka tugyende naiwe; ahabw'okuba tuhuriire ku Ruhanga ari hamwe naimwe.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA nikirwanisa ensi ya Haduraaka, kandi kiryaguma ahari Damasiko; ahabw'okuba endembo za Aramu n'eza MUKAMA, nk'oku enganda za Israeli zoona ziri eze.
Kandi Hamasi eri aha myatano yaazo, na Tuuro na Sidoni, zoona n'eze, n'obu ziraabe ziine obwengye bwingi.
Aba Tuuro beeyombekyeire ekigo kigumire,
Baarunda efeeza nk'omucuucu,
N'ezaabu nk'ebyondo by'omu nguuto.
Eitungo ryabo arinagye omu nyanja,
Na Tuuro emarweho omuriro.
Na Gaaza ekireebe, egire obusaasi bwingi;
Na Ekurooni yoona, ahabw'okuba ebi yaayesigire bihindukire busha.
Gaaza eryabura omugabe,
Na Ashikelooni ebure ab'okugituuramu;
Eihanga ryebizaarwa riryatuura Ashidoodi,
N'amaryo g'Abafilistia ndyagamaraho.
Ndiihe n'ebihagaro omu maino;
Kandi naryo riryaba ekicweka ekitsigaireho ahabwa Ruhanga waitu,
Ribe nk'oruganda omuri Yuda,
Na Ekurooni ebe nk'Abayebusi.
Ngyehinguririze nk'abarinzi,
Harekye kugira abaaguma nibarabaho;
Tihariho ihanga eririkuhata eririgaruka kubajuumikira;
Ahakuba hati nimbyereebera.
Naiwe Yerusaalemu, teera akaari!
Reeba, omugabe waawe naija ah'ori,
Ahikiriire kandi ari omusinguzi,
Omucureezi, kandi atembire endogoya,
Endogoya nto, omwana gw'endogoya.
Na Yerusaalemu ngimaremu embaraasi z'orugamba,
N'amata g'orugamba garyamarwaho,
Aragiire amahanga kugira obusingye.
Obutegyeki bwe buryaruga aha nyanja, buhikye aha ndiijo,
Burugye aha Mugyera, buhikye aha muheru gw'ensi.
Ndyarekura enkwatwa, nziihe omu kiina kitarimu maizi.
Eri izooba nimpamya ku ndibashumbuusha
Ebirimu ebyanyu kabiri.
Na Efuraimu naagigira omwambi gwabwo.
Iwe Saayuuni, ndyaimutsya batabani baawe
Kurwanisa batabani ba Bugriika,
Nkugire rurara y'emanzi.
Omwambi gwe gusyokye nk'omurabyo;
Mukama RUHANGA aryateera enzamba,
Ahururire omu kasoroora k'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.
Baryamaraho abarekyezi b'enjungu, babaribatiirire;
Baryanywa eshagama yaabo nka viinyo,
Baijure nk'orwabya,
Ebajubye nk'ey'aha nshonda z'eitambiro.
Ahabw'okuba n'obusyo bw'abantu be;
Baryayengyengyetera aha nsi ye,
Nk'amabaare g'omu kirunga ag'obuguzi bwingi.
Engano ziryareetera abatsigazi kuba gye,
Kandi viinyo y'omutahe ereetere abaishiki kubengyeya.
Mushabe MUKAMA oreeta emirabyo;
Nawe aryabagwisiza enjura ey'orutoonyerera,
Buri muntu amumereze obunyaatsi omu mariisizo ge.
N'abafumu nibareeba eby'ebishuba,
Nibahuumuriza abantu n'ebitaine mugasho.
Nikyo abantu barikuzengyererera nk'entaama,
Bakabonabonesibwa ahabw'okubura omuriisa.
N'abeebembezi b'abantu ndyabafubira;
Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ow'amahe naasaasibwa obusyo bwe,
Niyo nju ya Yuda;
Aryabagira nk'embaraasi ye y'ekitiinisa omu rugamba.
Omuriyo harugyemu enkondo y'eihema,
Omuriyo harugyemu obuta bw'orugamba,
Kandi omuriyo nimwo abategyeki boona bariruga.
Boona hamwe baryaba nk'abarwani b'amaani omu rugamba,
Baribatiiririre ababisha omu byondo by'omu nguuto;
Baryarwana, ahabw'okuba MUKAMA ari hamwe nabo,
Barimbagirize abarikugyendera aha mbaraasi.
Njune ab'enju ya Yosefu;
Ndyabagarura, ahabw'okuba mbainiire esaasi,
Kandi baryaba nk'abu ntakacwaga;
Ahabw'okuba ndi MUKAMA Ruhanga waabo,
Kandi ndyaguma mbagarukyemu.
Obwo Abaefuraimu baryahinduka abarwani rugambwa,
N'emitima yaabo eryashemererwa nk'abarikushemezibwa viinyo;
Kandi abaana baabo baryakireeba, bashemererwe,
N'emitima yaabo eyesiimire omuri MUKAMA.
Ahabw'okuba nkabacungura;
Kandi baryaba baingi nk'obunyakare.
Kwonka baryanyijukira omu nsi za hare,
Baryagumaho n'abaana baabo, kandi baryagaruka.
Mbataaruure, mbaihe n'omuri Asiria,
Mbahitsye omu nsi ya Gileadi na Lebanooni,
Okuhitsya obu barifundamu.
Kandi ebingonzi by'enyanja biryateerwa,
Hoona ahu amaizi maingi ga Nailo gari, hoome.
Amaryo ga Asiria garyacureezibwa,
N'enkoni y'obugabe bwa Misri eryarugiraho kimwe.
Nabo beesiimire omu iziina
rye; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Omuriro gumareho emyereezi yaawe!
Iwe muberooshi 'we, borooga, ahabw'okuba omwereezi gugwire,
Kandi ebiti birungi munonga bicwekyereziibwe!
Imwe myela ya Bashani 'mwe, nimuboroogye,
Ahabw'okuba ekibira ekikwataine kitemirwe!
Ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kyabo kibaihirweho!
Hurira okutsinda kw'entare,
Ahabw'okuba amaryo ga Yorudani gamazirweho!
Oku nikwo MUKAMA Ruhanga wangye agizire ati: Riisa obusyo bw'okubaagwa.
Abarikuzigura nibaziita, haza bagira ngu tibaine rubanja; n'abarikuzitunda nibagira bati: MUKAMA asiimwe, ahabw'okuba twaba abatungi; kandi abariisa baazo tibarikuzigirira saasi.

Kandi MUKAMA naagira ati: Tinkigaruka kugirira saasi abatwire omuri egi nsi. Reeba, ndyabahayo, buri muntu agwe omu mikono y'omuriisa we, kandi buri muntu omu mikono y'omugabe we; abo bariisa baryasingyera ensi, kandi tiinyine u ndiiha omu mikono yaabo.
Ntyo naaba omuriisa w'obusyo bw'entaama z'okubaagwa. Naakwata enkoni ibiri, emwe naagyeta Mbabazi, endiijo naagyeta Bumwe; ntyo naariisa obusyo.
Omu kwezi kumwe naacwekyereza abariisa bashatu; bwanyima zandusya, kandi nazo zantamwa.
Naanye nikwo kugira nti: Tindibariisa. Ow'okufa afe; ow'okucwekyerezibwa acwekyerezibwe; kandi abaritsigaraho baryane.
Bwanyima naakwata enkoni yangye Mbabazi, naagihenda, niinyita endagaano ei naaragaine n'amahanga goona.
Eryo izooba egyo ndagaano yaitwa, n'abashuubuzi b'entaama, abaabaire bampangire amaisho, baamanya ku kiri ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima naabagira nti: Ku muraabe nimukisiima, mumpe ebihembo byangye; nari ku muraabe mutarikukisiima, murereere. Batyo baapima shekeli z'efeeza makumi ashatu kuba ebihembo byangye.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yangira ati: Binagye omu ibiikiro, nibyo bihembo ebi bansiimiire. Ntyo naatwara shekeli ezo z'efeeza makumi ashatu, naazinaga omu ibiikiro eriri omu nju ya MUKAMA.
Bwanyima naahenda enkoni yangye ya kabiri erikwetwa Bumwe, niinyita obuzaare bwa Yuda na Israeli.
Bwanyima MUKAMA yangira ati: Garuka okwate ebintu by'omuriisa, omuriisa otaine mugasho;

ahakuba reeba, ninyiija kwimutsya omuriisa omu nsi, otarikweta ha ntaama ezibuzire, nari okusherura ezirazire, nari okubunga ezihendekire, n'obu kwakuba okuriisa ezihuriire, kureka orikwija kushonshomera enyama z'ezigomokire, akaguguna n'ebyara byazo.
Orikutsigaho obusyo!
Rurara eryamutema omukono, n'eriisho rya buryo,
Omukono gwe guryayoma,
N'eriisho rye rya buryo rifeere kimwe!
Reeba, niinyija kuhindura Yerusaalemu ekikopo ky'okugwereranisa amahanga goona agagyehinguririize, kandi kigwereranise na Yuda, Yerusaalemu yaaba neegotwa.
Eryo izooba Yerusaalemu egyo ndyagihindura eibaare eririkurema amahanga goona; abaririkiriza boona baryashaasha munonga. Amahanga goona ag'omu nsi garyayeteerana kugirwanisa.
MUKAMA naagira ati: Ndyaitsa buri mbaraasi yoona obwoba, n'ogitembire weena mmugwise eiraro. Kwonka enju ya Yuda ndyagigumyaho amaisho, kandi embaraasi z'amahanga zoona ndyazihumya.
Bwanyima enganda za Yuda ziryagira omu mitima yaazo ziti: Abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu baine amaani agu barikuheebwa MUKAMA ow'amahe Ruhanga waabo.
Kandi MUKAMA aryabanza kuha amahema ga Yuda obusinguzi, ngu ekitiinisa ky'enju ya Daudi n'eky'abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu kirekye kukira ekya Yuda.
Eryo izooba MUKAMA aryarinda abatuuzi ba Yerusaalemu, abataine maani omuribo babe nka Daudi, n'enju ya Daudi ebe nka Ruhanga, nka maraika wa MUKAMA obeebembeire.
Kandi eryo izooba ndyayehayo kucwekyereza amahanga goona agateera Yerusaalemu.
Eryo izooba omuri Yerusaalemu haryabamu okucura kwinigi okurikwingana n'oku baacuriire Hadadi-rimoni omu ruhita rwa Megido.
Kandi ensi eryacura, buri ruganda rucure okwarwo, oruganda rw'enju ya Daudi okwarwo n'abakazi baabo okwabo; oruganda rw'enju ya Nasani okwarwo, n'abakazi baabo okwabo;
oruganda rw'enju ya Leevi okwarwo n'abakazi baabo okwabo; oruganda rw'aba Shimei okwarwo n'abakazi baabo okwabo;
kandi n'enganda zoona eziritsigaraho, buri ruganda okwarwo n'abakazi baabo okwabo.

Ku harigira owaagaruka kuba nabi, ishe na nyina abaamuzaire baryamugira bati: Tori w'okugumaho; ahabw'okuba noohanuura ebishuba omu iziina rya MUKAMA; kandi ishe na nyina abaamuzaire, ku ariba naahanuura, baryamuteera eicumu, rimwogyemu.
Eryo izooba buri nabi, ku ariba naahanuura, aryakwatwa enshoni ahabw'ebi ayorekirwe; tarijwara kijwaro ky'ebyoya kubeiha abantu,
kureka aryagira ati: Tindi nabi, ndi omuhingi; ahabw'okuba okwiha omu buto bwangye eitaka rituura riri eitungo ryangye.
Kandi ku harigira owaamubuuza ati: Obwo buhuta bw'omu ngaro zaawe bukaruga hi?, aryagarukamu ati: obuhuta obu nkabuhutaarizibwa omu nju ya banywani bangye.
Mugyenzi wangye onyemerera aha rubaju;
nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Teera omuriisa, entaama zitaataane,
Kandi abaana baazo ndyabateeza omukono gwangye.
MUKAMA naagira ati: Omuri egyo nsi yoona
Ebicweka bibiri bya kashatu biryamarwaho, bicwekyerere;
Kwonka kimwe kya kashatu kiryatsigaraho kihuriire.
Mbashemeze nk'oku bashemeza efeeza,
Mbagyeze nk'oku bagyeza ezaabu.
Baryatakira eiziina ryangye,
Naanye mbagarukyemu.
Kandi ndyagira nti: Aba n'abantu bangye,
Nabo bagire bati: MUKAMA niwe Ruhanga waitu.

Ahakuba ndyateeranira hamwe amahanga goona, gateere Yerusaalemu, kandi orurembo ruryakwatwa, amaju ganyagwe, n'abakazi bahambwe. Ekicweka ky'ab'omu rurembo kiryatwarwa omu bukwatwa, kwonka abarirokokaho tibarimarwamu.
Obwo MUKAMA aryahurura, arwane n'ago mahanga, nk'oku arwana aha izooba ry'orugamba.

Eryo izooba aryayemerera aha kibungo kya Zeituuni ekishungaine na Yerusaalemu aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba; bwanyima ekyo kibungo kya Zeituuni kiryashatukamu kabiri okuruga aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba, hagire oruhanga ruhango munonga, ekicweka kimwe eky'ekyo kibungo kigwe aha rubaju rw'obukiizi-bwa-bumohso, n'ekindi aha rw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo.

Kandi muryahunga, murabe omu ruhanga rw'ahagati y'ebibungo byangye; ahabw'okuba orwo ruhanga rw'omu bibungo ruryahika Azeli; mutyo muhungye, nk'oku mwahungire omutsitsa ogwabaireho omu busingye bwa Uziya omugabe wa Yuda. Bwanyima MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe arayija hamwe n'abarikwera be boona.
Eryo izooba omushana tigurijwa, kandi tiharigira kibunda,
kureka riryaba eizooba rimwe eririkumanywa MUKAMA; tiburiba nyomushana, kandi tiburiba nyekiro, ahakuba n'omu mwabazyo omushana guryajwa.
Kandi MUKAMA aryaba omugabe orikutegyeka ensi yoona; eryo izooba MUKAMA aryaba omwe, n'eiziina rye ribe rimwe.
Kandi eryatuurwamu; ahakuba haryaba hatakiriho mukyeeno; aba Yerusaalemu baryatuura buhooro.
Kandi eki nikyo kibonaboneso eki MUKAMA ariteeza amahanga goona agarirwanisa Yerusaalemu; emibiri yaabo eryajunda bakyemereire, amaisho gajundire omu binonko byago, n'endimi zibajundire omu kanwa.
Eryo izooba baryakwatwa obwoba bwingi oburikuruga ahari MUKAMA, buri muntu akwatane na mugyenzi we, babangirane entomi;
nangwa na Yuda eryarwanisa Yerusaalemu. Knadi obutungi bw'amahanga goona agagyehinguriririize buryateeranirwa hamwe, ezaabu, efeeza n'ebijwaro bingi munonga.
Kandi ekibonaboneso nk'ekyo kiryahika aha mbaraasi, enyumbu, engamira, endogoya n'ahari ibara nyamaishwa eriba eri omu nsiisira zaabo.
Kandi oruganda rwona orw'omu nsi, ku ruriba rutainamukire Yerusaalemu kuramya Omugabe, MUKAMA ow'amahe, owaabo teriguubwa njura.
Kandi oruganda rwa Misri ku ruriba rutainamukire kweyoreka, baryahikwaho ekyo kibonaboneso ki MUKAMA ata aha mahanga aganga kwinamuka kwijuka obugyenyi bw'ensiisira.
Ekyo nikyo kiriba ekifubiro kya Misri n'eky'amahanga goona agatainamuka kwijuka bugyenyi bw'ensiisira.

Kandi buri nyungu yoona ey'omuri Yerusaalemu n'ey'omuri Yuda eryaba eyereziibwe MUKAMA ow'amahe, boona abarikutamba baije batwareho zimwe kuziteekamu enyama z'ebitambo. Kandi eryo izooba tiharibaho Munyakanaani omu nju ya MUKAMA ow'amahe obundi.
Eki n'ekigambo kya MUKAMA ekyahanuuriirwe Israeli nikiraba omuri Malaki.
Esau naamwanga; ensi ye y'ebibungo naagihindura eihamba, n'obuhunguzi bwe naabuha zaamuha z'omu ihamba.

Edomu n'obu araagira ati: Tushenyagwirwe, kwonka nitwija kugaruka kwombeka ebyasheenyukire; MUKAMA naagira ati: Nibombekye, kwonka niinyija kubisheenya, okuhitsya obu abantu baribeeta ensi esiisikaire, abantu abu MUKAMA atuura naagirira ekiniga ebiro byona.
Amaisho gaanyu garyakyereebera, mugire muti: MUKAMA ni mukuru, n'obukuru bwe niburenga emyatano ya Israeli!
Nimurigayira omu kuhongyera empongano z'eby'okurya bisiisikaire aha itambiro ryangye. Kandi nimugira muti: Nitubishiisha tuta? Ahabw'okuba nimugira muti: Emeeza ya MUKAMA n'ey'okugaywa.

Obu muba nimutamba ebitambo by'enyamaishwa ezihumire, mugira ngu ekyo ti kibi? Obu muba nimuhonga eziremaire, nari ezirwaire, ekyo kyo ti kibi? Irooko obihongyere omutegyeki waawe. Noogira ngu naija kukusiima? Naija kukureeba gye?, nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.
Mbwenu, mweshengyereze Ruhanga abaikirize, abone kutugirira embabazi. Ku muraabe nimumuhongyera ebirikushusha bityo, naabaasa ata kubaikiriza?, nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Nkaabaasibwa ki omwe omuriimwe akinga enyigi, mureka kuguma nimuhembera busha omuriro aha itambiro ryangye! Tindikubashemerererwa na kakye, kandi tindikwija kwikiriza mpongano yoona ei murampongyere; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Okuruga oburugwa-izooba okuhika oburengyerwa-izooba eiziina ryangye ni rikuru omu mahanga, kandi omuri buri mwanya gwona eiziina ryangye niryotererwa obubaane, kandi nirihongyerwa empongano ezishemeire; ahabw'okuba eiziina ryangye ni rikuru omu mahanga; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Kwonka imwe nimurihemura, obu murikuba nimugira muti: Emeeza ya MUKAMA esiisikaire, n'eby'okurya ebigiriho n'eby'okugaywa.

Kandi nimugira muti: Ebi ka byaturusya! Kandi nimubyeshaanya; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira. Nimureeta ekinyagirwe n'amaani, nari ekiremaire, nari ekirwaire, ngu ebyo ga mukireetsire kukihonga; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.

Omuntu endeebya akyeenwe, oine empaya omu busyo bwe, akahiga naaraganisa kugiha Ruhanga, kwonka akiza kutambira MUKAMA, akamutambira eine akamogo; ahabw'okuba ndi Omugabe mukuru, kandi eiziina ryangye ritiinwa omu mahanga; nikwo MUKAMA arikugira.

MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Ku muraayangye kuhurira, mwayanga kuta omutima aha kuhaisa eiziina ryangye ekitiinisa, niinyija kubooherereza omukyeeno, n'emigisha yaanyu ngikyeene; kandi buzimazima naaherize kugikyeena, ahabw'okuba mwangire kukita aha mutima.
Reeba, ndyahana oruzaaro rwanyu, mbasiigye amasha g'empongano zaanyu ahamaisho, mbacwe omu maisho gangye.
Haza obwo nibwo murimanya ku niinye naabahaire ekyo kiragiro, ngu endagaano ei naaragaine na Leevi ebone kugumaho; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Egyo ndagaano ei naaragaine nawe ekaba eri endagaano y'amagara n'obusingye; nkabimuha ngu atiine; kandi yantiina, yaagira obwoba ahabw'eiziina ryangye.
Okwegyesa eby'amazima kukabakutamuruga mu kanwa, kandi akaba atashangwa naagamba ebitahikire. Akaba agyendera naanye omu busingye n'omu kuhikiirira, kandi akaba ahindura baingi okuruga omu bibi.
Ahakuba eminwa y'omunyamurwa eshemereire kurinda okumanya, n'abantu bashemereire kuba niwe baayehabuuzaho; ahabw'okuba n'enitmwa ya MUKAMA ow'amahe.
Kwonka imwe muteeshukire omuhanda, muteerize baingi entsibo omu bi murikwegyesa; mwashiisha endagaano ya Leevi; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Nikyo ndikubagayisiza, nkabahindura abataine kitiinisa omu maisho g'abantu boona, ahabw'okuba timurarinzire biragiro byangye, kureka mukashoroora abantu omu bi murikwegyesa, mwagira orubaju.

Yuda tabaire mwesigwa, kandi omuri Israeli na Yerusaalemu hakozirwemu ebirikunugwa; ahabw'okuba Yuda ahagaire Omwanya gwa MUKAMA ogurikwera, ogu arikukunda, yaashwera muhara wa ruhanga w'enduga-mahanga.
Omuntu orikutwaza atyo, nkaabaasibwa ki MUKAMA amumariraho kimwe omuntu weena ow'okuhamya, ow'okugarukamu, nari ow'okuhongyera MUKAMA ow'amahe, omu mahema ga Yakobo!
Kandi eki nakyo nimukikora. Nimwitsa eitambiro rya MUKAMA amarira gaanyu, nimurira kandi nimuborooga, ahabw'okuba takyeta ha mpongano ezi murikuhonga, n'obu kwakuba okuziikiriza ashemereirwe.

Kwonka nimubuuza muti: Ahabw'enki atarikubiikiriza? Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA akaba kareebi w'okuhamya endagaano ei waaragaine n'omukazi w'omu butsigazi bwawe, ou waareebize, haza ari mugyenzi waawe, kandi omukazi waawe ou waaragaine nawe endagaano.

Ruhanga ogwo omwe taratuhangiire omwoyo gw'amagara, akagutugumizaho? Mbwenu ekindi naayenda ki? Naayenda oruzaaro orurikutiina Ruhanga. N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde, hatagira owaareebya omukazi w'omu butsigazi bwe.

Ahabw'okuba MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Israeli naagira ati: Nyanga okushenda, n'omuntu orikweshwekyerera, aine obubisha aha mukazi we; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira. N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde, murekye kuba endeebya.
Mbwenu n'oha oribaasa kwemera eizooba eri ariiziraho, kandi ku arireebwa, n'oha oribaasa kwemereraho? Ahabw'okuba ni nk'omuriro gw'omuheesi ogurikushemeza, kandi nka sabuuni y'omwozi.
Aryashutama nk'orikushemeza efeeza akagimaramu enkamba, ashemeze Abaleevi, abagire nk'oku bamara enkamba omu zaabu n'efeeza, okuhitsya obu barihongyera MUKAMA empongano zihikire.
Obwo nibwo empongano za Yuda na Yerusaalemu zirishemeza MUKAMA, nk'oku zaabaire zimushemeza omu biro bya ira, omu myaka eyaahingwire.
Ahabw'okuba nyowe MUKAMA timpinduka; nikyo imwe beene Yakobo mutarikumarirwaho.
Omuntu akaabaasa kwima Ruhanga ebye? Kwonka imwe nimuunyima ebyangye. Haza mugira muti: Nitukwima tuta? Nimuunyima ebicweka bya kimwe kya ikumi n'emitoijo.
Mukyeenirwe omukyeeno, ahabw'okuba imwe eihanga ryona nimuunyima ebyangye.

Mureete ebicweka bya kimwe kya ikumi ebihikire omu mabiikiro gangye, enju yangye ebone kubamu eby'okurya, mubingyerese, haza mureebe ku ntaabaigurira madarisa g'omu iguru, nkabashukaho omugisha, mukabura n'ah'okuguta; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Ndyakabukira orikwenda kubamira, arekye kucwekyereza emyaka y'omu itaka ryangyu, n'emizaabibu yaanyu teribura kwana; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Kandi obwo amahanga goona garyabeeta abahiiriirwe, ahabw'okuba muryaba ensi y'okushemererwa; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Mugizire muti: Tikiine mugasho kukorera Ruhanga. Kandi muti: Nikitugasira ki okworobera ebiragiro bye n'okugyendera omu maisho ga MUKAMA ow'amahe, turi nk'abari omu rufu?
Hati abanyamaryo nibo turikweta abahiiriirwe; kandi enkozi z'ebibi tizirikugogyera kwonka; n'obu zirikugyeza Ruhanga, nizikira.
Kandi MUKAMA ow'amahe naagira ati: Aha izooba eri ndikoreraho, baryaba abangye, babe eitungo ryangye eritoorainwe; kandi ndyabasaasira, nk'oku omuntu asaasira omwana we orikumukorera;
haza obwo muryagaruka mumanye kutaanisa abahikiriire n'ababi, abarikukorera Ruhanga n'abatarikumukorera.
Kwonka imwe abarikutiina eiziina ryangye, eizooba ry'okuhikiirira riryaturuka ahabwanyu, riine okutamba omu mapapa gaaryo. Muryashohora nimukina nk'enyana zirikuruga omu kihongore.
Aha izooba eri ndikoreraho, muryaribatiirira ababi, babe eiju ahansi y'ebigyere byanyu; nikwo MUKAMA ow'amahe arikugira.
Niwe arihindura emitima y'abazaire bakagarukana n'abaana baabo, n'ey'abaana bakagarukana n'abazaire baabo, ngu ntakaija nkaitsa ensi omukyeeno.
Abrahamu akazaara Isaaka, Isaaka yaazaara Yakobo, Yakobo yaazaara Yuda n'abarumuna,
Yuda yaazaara Pereezi na Zeera ahari Tamari, Pereezi yaazaara Hezirooni, Hezirooni yaazaara Raamu,
Raamu yaazaara Aminadabu, Aminadabu yaazaara Nahasooni, Nahasooni yaazaara Salumooni,
Salumooni yaazaara Boazi ahari Rahabu, Boazi yaazaara Obedi ahari Ruusi, Obedi yaazaara Yese,
Yese yaazaara Daudi omugabe. Daudi yaazaara Sulemaani ahari muka Uria,
Sulemaani yaazaara Rehoboamu, Rehoboamau yaazaara Abiya, Abiya yaazaara Asa,
Asa yaazaara Yehoshafaati, Yehoshafaati yaazaara Yoramu,
Yoramu yaazaara Hezekia,
Hezekia yaazaara Manaase, Manaase yaazaara Amoni, Amoni yaazaara Yosia,
Yosira yaazaara Yekonia n'abarumuna omu biro by'okutwarwa Babulooni omu bukwatwa.
Bwanyima y'okutwarwa Babulooni Yekonia akazaara Shealitieli, Shealitieli yaazaara Zerubabeeli,
Zerubabeeli yaazaara Abiuda, Abiuda yaazaara Eliakimu, Eliakimu yaazaara Azori,
Azori yaazaara Zadoki, Zadoki yaazaara Akimu, Akimu yaazaara Eliudi,
Eliudi yaazaara Eleazaari, Eleazaari yaazaara Mataani, Mataani yaazaara Yakobo,
Yakobo yaazaara Yosefu iba wa Mariamu; ogwo niwe nyina wa Yesu orikwetwa Kristo.

Nikwo kugira ngu baishenkuru boona okwiha ahari Abrahamu okuhitsya ahari Daudi n'ikumi na bana; kandi okwiha ahari Daudi okuhitsya aha kutwarwa Babulooni n'ikumi na bana; kandi okwiha aha kutwarwa Babulooni okuhitsya ahari Kristo n'ikumi na bana.
Mbwenu Yosefu iba, ahabw'okuba omuntu ohikiriire, tiyaayenda kumuhemura, yaateekateeka kwita obugyenyi bwe bwesherekye.

Kwonka ku yaabaire naakiteekateeka atyo, maraika wa Mukama yaamwizira omu kirooto, yaamugira ati: Iwe Yosefu mwene Daudi, otatiina kutaasya Mariamu omukazi waawe, ahakuba enda ei aine n'ey'Omwoyo Orikwera;
aryazaara omwana w'omwojo, kandi oryamweta Yesu, ahabw'okuba niwe arijuna abantu be omu bibi byabo.
Ebyo byona bikabaho ahabw'okuhikiiriza ebi Mukama yaagambire naaraba omuri nabi, naagira ati:
Reeba, omwishiki oshugaine
Aryagira enda, azaare omwana w'omwojo,
Eiziina rye aryayetwa Emanueli,
amakuru ngu Ruhanga ari hamwe naitwe.
Yosefu ku yaasisiimukire omu turo, yaakora nk'oku maraika wa Mukama yaamuragiira; yaataasya omukazi we;
kwonka tararaire nawe okuhitsya obu yaazaire omwana; ishe akamweta Yesu.
Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ozairwe ari nkahi? Ahabw'okuba tukareeba enyonyoozi ye oburugwa-izooba, mbwenu twizire kumuramya.
Omugabe Heroode, ku yaakihuriire, yaayemereza omutima ahamwe n'aba Yerusaalemu boona;
nikwo kuteerana abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki b'abantu boona, akabeehanuuzaho ahu Kristo yaaragwirwe kuzaarirwa.
Baamugarukamu bati: Omuri Betelehemu eya Buyudaaya; ahabw'okuba nikwo kyahandiikirwe nabi ngu:
Naiwe, Betelehemu ey'omu ishaza rya Buyudaaya,
Ahabw'okuba omuriiwe nimwo omutegyeki ariruga,
Oririisa abantu bangye Abaisraeli.
Bwanyima Heroode yaayeta abo banyabwengye omu mubonano, yaababuuza obunaku obu baareebeiremu enyonyoozi;
yaabatuma Betelehemu naabagira ati: Mwirooko mugyende, musherure gye ogwo mwana; ku muraamubone, mugarukye mungambire, naanye nze kumuramya.
Nabo ku baaherize kuhurira ebi yaabatuma, baarabaho baagyenda; kandi enyonyoozi ei baareebire oburugwa-izooba yaabeebembera, okuhitsya obu yaayemereire ahu omwana yaabaire ari.
Ku baareebire enyonyoozi, baayesiima munonga n'okushemererwa kwingi;
baataaha omu nju, baashangamu omwana na Mariamu nyina, bainama, baamuramya. Baakomoorora emitwaro yaabo, baamuha ebiconco by'ezaabu n'eby'emigaju na
Kandi ku baahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto, ngu barekye kugaruka owa Heroode, baimuka, baatoora ogundi muhanda, baagaruka owaabo.
Atyo yaimuka, yaahunzya omwana na nyina nyekiro, yaaza Misri,
yaagumayo okuhitsya obu Heroode yaafiire. Ekyo kikabaho okuhikiiriza ebi Mukama yaagambire naaraba omuri nabi ati: Nkeeta omwana wangye kuruga Misri.

Kandi Heroode ku yaareebire abo banyabwengye bamureebize, yaagira ekiniga kingi, yaatuma abantu kwita abaana b'aboojo boona abaabaire bari Betelehemu n'omu kyanga ekyo kyona, abaabaire bahikize emyaka ebiri, kandi n'abatakagihikize, naihirira aha bunaku obu yaamanyisiibwemu abanyabwengye.
Mbwenu eki nabi Yeremia yaagambire kyahikiirizibwa, eki yaagizire ati:
Okucura n'okuborooga munonga,
Rakeeli naaririra abaana be;
Kandi takyenda kuyaagirwa, ahakuba bahweireho.
Bwanyima Heroode ku yaafiire, maraika wa Mukama yaayeyorekyere Yosefu omu kirooto omuri Misri,
yaamugira ati: Imuka otware omwana na nyina, ogarukye omu nsi ya Israeli; ahabw'okuba abaabaire nibenda kwita omwana bafiire.
Yaimuka, yaatwara omwana na nyina, yaagaruka omu nsi ya Israeli.
Kwonka ku yaahuriire ngu Arukelao niwe ayemire Bayudaaya, ahunguriire Heroode ishe, yaatiina kugarukayo; ku yaahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto, yaakuba yaaza omu ishaza rya Galilaaya.
Nikwo kugyenda, akatuura omuri tauni erikwetwa Nazareesi, ekigambo eki baanabi baagambire kibone kuhikiirira ngu, Aryayetwa Omunazarayo.
ati: Mweteise, ahakuba obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.
Mumanye ngu ogu niwe nabi Isaaya yaagambireho, obu yaagira ati:
Eiraka ry'orikugambira omu ihamba ati:
Mushemeze omuhanda gwa Mukama,
Mugorore otuhanda twe.
Ahonaaho aba Yerusaalemu n'aba Buyudaaya n'ab'omu byanga ebiri haihi na Yorudani boona baija, baamushangayo;
yaababatiriza omu kyambu Yorudani nibaatura ebibi byabo.
Mbwenu nu mwane ebyana ebishemereire abeeteisize,
muteehimbisa nimugira omu mitima yaanyu muti: Twine Abrahamu, niwe tatenkuriitwe; ahakuba nyowe nimbagambira nti: Ruhanga naabaasa amabaare aga kugaihiramu Abrahamu abaijukuru.
Na mbwenu empango eteirwe aha kitsintsi ky'omuti; buri munti ogutarikwana byana birungi guryatemwa gunagwe omu muriro.
Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi ahabw'okweteisa, kwonka orikwija enyima yangye nankiza obushoboorozi; kandi tinshemereire na kumukwatira enkaito; We aryababatiza n'Omwoyo Orikwera n'omuriro.
Orugari rwe ruri omu ngaro ze, ahunikye oburo omu kitara kye, kwonka ebishushunga aryabyotsya omu muriro ogutaraara.
Kwonka Yohaana yaayenda kumwangira, naagira ati: Niinye ndikwenda ku ombatiza; kandi naiwe waija ahariinye?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Mbwenu ikiriza tutwaze tutyo, ahakuba kitushemereire kuhikiiriza eby'okuhikiirira byona. Atyo yaamwikiriza.
Yesu ku yaaherize kubatizibwa, yaaruga ati omu maizi, reeba, eiguru ryakinguuka, yaareeba Omwoyo wa Ruhanga naamushuumaho nk'enkombe,
yaahurira eiraka niriruga omu iguru, nirigira riti: Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda, kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga.
Ku yaamazire ebiro makumi ana atarikurya nyomushana na nyekiro, yaagira enjara.
Omwohi yaija yaamugira ati: Ku oraabe ori Omwana Ruhanga, gambira amabaare aga gahindukye eby'okurya.
Kwonka We yaamugarukamu ati: Kikahandiikwa ngu, Omuntu tatungwa by'okurya byonka, kureka n'ekigambo kyona ekiruga omu kanwa ka Ruhanga.
Bwanyima yaamuhitsya omu rurembo orurikwera, yaamuta aha itungu rya hekalu,
yaamugira ati: Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga, guruka oyetsimbe ahansi; ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu,
Aryaragiira baamaraika be, bakurinde;
Nabo baryakutega emikono yaabo,
Ngu orekye kuhikiza ekigyere kyawe aha ibaare.
Kandi Sitaane yaamuhitsya aha rushozi ruraingwa munonga, yaamworeka ensi z'abagabe boona n'ekitiinisa kyazo;
yaamugira ati: Ku orainame, wandamya, biriya byona niinyija kubikuha.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Rugaho, Sitaane, ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Oramye Mukama Ruhanga waawe; obe niwe waaheereza wenka.
Atyo Sitaane yaamurugaho; reeba baamaraika baija, baamuheereza.
Yaaruga Nazareesi, yaataaha Kaperenaumu ey'aha nyanja, yaaguma omu mashaza ga Zebuluuni na Nafutaali,
ngu ekigambo eki nabi Isaaya yaagambire kihikiirire eki yaagizire ati:
Omu ishaza rya Zebuluuni, n'erya Nafutaali,
Haihi n'enyanja, seeri ya Yorudani,
Galilaaya ey'Abanyamahanga,
Abantu abaabaire bari omu mwirima
Bakareeba omushana mwingi,
N'abaabaire batuura omu nsi y'okufa n'omu kibunda kyakwo,
Omushana gubajwereire.
Okuruga obwo Yesu yaatandika kubuurira naagira ati: Mweteise, ahakuba obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.
Yaabagira ati: Mwije munkuratire, naanye ndyabagira abajubi b'abantu.
Ahonaaho baatsigaho obutimba bwabo, baamukuratira.
Ku yairiire omumaisho hakye, yaareeba abandi babiri enyineemwe, Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo, na Yohaana omurumuna, abaabaire bari omu bwato nibashumikanisa obutimba; nabo yaabeeta.
Ahonaaho baatsigaho obwato na ishebo, baamukuratira.

Ahabw'ebyo okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga omuri Siria yoona, baamureetera abarwaire boona abaabaire bakwatsirwe endwara ezitari zimwe, n'okuhururwa, n'abaabaire bariho baadaimoni, n'abarikugwa entsimbo, n'abazingazingirwe; kandi yaabakiza.
Emitwe mingi y'abantu abaarugire Galilaaya, Dekapooli, Yerusaalemu, Buyudaaya na seeri ya Yorudaani baamukuratira.
yaatandika kugamba naabeegyesa ati:
Baine omugisha abagira, enjara n'eiriho, eby'okuhikiirira ahabw'okuba abo baryahaaga.
Baine omugisha abanyambabazi, ahabw'okuba abo baryagirirwa embabazi.
Mushemererwe, mwesiime munonga; ahabw'okuba ebihembo byanyu biryaba bingi omu iguru; kandi nikwo baahiigire batyo baanabi abaabandize imwe.
Kandi tihaine okongyeza etabaaza, akagijuumikira ekiibo, kureka agita aha kikondo kyayo kumurikira ab'omu nju boona.
Omushana gwanyu gube nikwo gwajwa gutyo omu maisho g'abantu, bareebe emicwe yaanyu emirungi, babone kuhimbisa Shoimwe ori omu iguru.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Eiguru n'ensi okuhitsya obu birihwaho, Ebiragiro tibirihwaho, n'obu yaakuba enyuguta emwe nari akatonyezi kamwe okuhitsya byona obu birihikiirizibwa.

Omuntu weena orihenda ekiragiro kimwe ahari ebi, n'obu kyakuba kiri kikye okukira ebindi byona, akakyegyesa abantu atyo, aryayetwa muto omu bukama bw'omu iguru; kwonka oribikwata, akabyegyesa, ogwo aryayetwa mukuru omu bukama bw'omu iguru.
Ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Okuhikiirira kwanyu ku kuriba kutakizire kuhikiirira kw'abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, timuritaaha mu bukama bw'omu iguru na kakye.
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: omuntu weena
N'ahabw'ekyo ku oraabe oreetsire empongano yaawe aha itambiro, waijukira aho eki oshobeize mugyenzi waawe,
otsigye empongano yaawe omu maisho g'eitambiro, ogyende, obanze ogarukane nawe, bwanyima ogarukye oheyo empongano yaawe egyo.
Rahuka kwikirizana n'ogwo orikukutabaariza, mukiri omu muhanda, orikukutabaariza atakaakuhayo aha muramuzi, n'omuramuzi akakuha omuserukare, naiwe okateebwa omu kihome.
Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Torirugamu okuhitsya obu oriihura eibanja ryona, otatsigyeyo nangwa na sente emwe.
Mukahurira ku kyaragiirwe ngu: Otarishambana.
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Orikureeba omukazi akamwetenga, biri aherize kumushambanaho omu mutima gwe.
N'eriisho ryawe rya buryo ku riraabe nirikureetera kukora ekibi, oriihemu, orinagye; haakiri okufeerwa ekicweka kyawe kimwe, okukira omubiri gwawe gwona okunagwa omuri Gehena.
Kandi omukono gwawe gwa buryo ku guraabe nigukureetera kukora ekibi, ogutemeho, ogunagye; haakiri okufeerwa ekicweka kyawe kimwe okukira omubiri gwawe gwona okunagwa omuri Gehena.
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena orishenda omukazi we, atamutuzire kushambana, biri aryaba amushambaniise, kandi orishwera ogwo oshenzirwe, biri aryaba ashambaine.
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: otarirahira na kakye, n'obu ryakuba eiguru, ahakuba n'ekitebe kya Ruhanga,
n'obu yaakuba ensi, ahakuba n'akatebe k'ebigyere bye, n'obu yaakuba Yerusaalemu, ahakuba n'orurembo rw'Omukama Omukuru.
Otarirahira omutwe gwawe; ahakuba torikubaasa kweza kashokye kamwe n'obu kwakuba okukairaguza.
Kwonka ebigambo byanyu bibe, Eego, Eego, nari Ngaaha, Ngaaha; ahakuba ebirikukira ahari ebyo biruga aha Mubi.
n'omuntu ku aryenda kukutabaariza ngu akwakye ekanzu yaawe, omuhe n'omunagiro gwawe.
Kandi weena orikugyema kugyenda nawe mahiro emwe, ogyende nawe n'eya kabiri.
Orikushaba, omuhe; orikweguzaho, otarimuteera amabega.
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mukunde abazigu baanyu, kandi mushabire n'abarikubahiiga,
mubone kuba abaana ba Shoimwe ori omu iguru; ahabw'okuba eizooba rye arijwisiza ababi n'abarungi, kandi agwisiza enjura abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire.
Mbwenu ku muraabe nimukunda abarikubakunda, muryaheebwa bihembo ki? N'abahooza tikwo bakora batyo?
Kandi ku muraabe nimuramutsya beene waanyu bonka, abandi nimubakiza ki? N'abanyamahanga tikwo bakora batyo?
N'ahabw'ekyo mube abahikiriire nka Shoimwe ori omu iguru oku ahikiriire.
Mwerinde, murekye kukorera eby'okuhikiirira byanyu omu maisho g'abantu ngu babareebe; mumanye ngu, ku muraabe nimukora mutyo, Shoimwe ori omu iguru taribaha bihembo.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku origabira abooro, otaryeteerera enzamba, nk'oku endyarya zikora omuri sinagogi n'omu nguuto, ngu basiimwe abantu. Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Baherize kuheebwa ebihembo byabo.
Kwonka ku oraabe waagabiire abooro, omukono gwawe gwa bumosho gurekye kumanya eki ogwa buryo gurikukora,
okugaba kwawe kube omu mubonano; kandi Sho oreeba eby'omu mubonano aryakuha ebihembo.
Kwonka iwe ku oraaze kushaba, otaahe omu kishengye kyawe, obanze okingye orwigi, oshabe Sho ori omu mubonano; kandi Sho ogwo oreeba eby'omu mubonano, aryakuha ebihembo.
Mutariba nkabo; ahakuba Shoimwe amanya ebi mukyenire mutakamushabire.
N'ahabw'ekyo mushabe muti:
Tataitwe ow'omu iguru,
Eiziina ryawe ryezibwe,
Ebi okunda bikorwe omu nsi
Nk'oku bikorwa omu iguru;
Otuhe hati eby'okurya ebi otuha obutoohsa;
Nkaitwe oku tusaasira abu turikwihuza;
Kureka otujune Omubi.
Ku murisaasira abantu eby'okushiisha byabo, naimwe Shoimwe ow'omu iguru aryabasaasira;
kwonka ku muriba mutarikusaasira bantu eby'okushiisha byabo, naimwe Shoimwe taribasaasira by'okushiisha byanyu.
Kwonka iwe, ku oraayesiibyekwo, ogume oyesiigye amajuta omu mutwe, onaabe ahamaisho,
abantu barekye kukureeba ku oyesiibizekwo, kureka Sho ori omu mubonano; kandi Sho oreeba eby'omu mubonano aryakuha ebihembo.
Mutaryebiikira eitungo omu nsi, ahi ebiyenje n'omukyereenyo birisiisira, n'abashuma ahu barima bakariiba.
Kwonka mwebiikire eitungo omu iguru, ahi ebiyenje n'omukyereenyo bitaririsiisira, n'abashuma ahu bataririma bakariiba;
ahakuba ahi eitungo ryawe riri, n'omutima gwawe niho guba.
Etabaaza ey'omubiri niryo riisho. N'ahabw'ekyo eriisho ryawe ku riraabe riri rirungi, omubiri gwawe gwona nigwija kwijura omushana;
kwonka eriisho ryawe ku riraabe riri ribi, omubiri gwawe gwona nigwija kwijura omwirima. Mbwenu omushana oguri omuriiwe ku guraabe guri omwirima, omwirima ogwo ka ni mwingi!
Tihariho muntu orikubaasa kuheereza abakama babiri; ahakuba aryayangaho omwe, akunde ondi; nari aryagumira kyarimwe ahari omwe, agaye ondi. Timurikubaasa kuheereza Ruhanga na
Mwetegyereze enyonyi z'omu mwanya; tizibiba, tizigyesha, n'obu kwakuba okuhunika omu bitara; kwonka Shoimwe ow'omu iguru aziriisa. Mbwenu imwe timurikuzikira?
N'oha omuriimwe
Mbwenu n'enki ekibeemereresa emitima ahabw'ebijwaro? Mwetegyereze ebirabyo by'omu ishwa oku bimera; tibigira murimo, tibiruka myenda;
beitu nimbagambira nti: Na Sulemaani omu kitiinisa kye kyona taraizihiirwe bijwaro nka kimwe aharibyo.
Mbwenu Ruhanga ku araabe ajweka obunyaatsi bw'omu kishaka, oburiho hati, nyencakare bukanagwa omu mahega, tarikizaho kubajweka, imwe abaine okwikiriza kukye?
N'ahabw'ekyo mutaryemereza emitima nimutonzya muti, Turyarya ki? nari, Turyanywa ki? nari shi, Turyajwara ki?
ahakuba ebyo byona Abanyamahanga nibyo basherura; kandi Shoimwe ow'omu iguru naamanya ku ebyo byona bibashemereire.
Kwonka mubanze musherure obukama bwe n'okuhikiirira kwe; n'ebyo byona muryabyongyerwaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutaryemereza emitima aha bya nyencakare; ahakuba ebya nyencakare biryayemererezibwa omutima okwabyo. Reka buri kiro kihwe n'amaganya gaakyo.
Ahabw'okuba orubanja oru mucwa, naimwe muryarucwerwa; kandi endengo ei murengamu, naimwe niyo murirengyerwamu.
Ahabwenki nooreeba akatokoozi akari omu riisho rya mugyenzi waawe, haza empimbi eri omu ryawe otagyeteho?
Nari shi noija kugambira mugyenzi waawe oti, Ka nkutokoore, haza obwo bwona empimbi eri omu riisho ryawe?
Iwe ndyarya 'we, banza oyekize empimbi eri omu riisho ryawe, obone kureeba gye oku oraatokoore mungyenzi waawe.
Mutariha embwa ekintu ekirikwera, nari okutambikira empunu
Ahakuba omuntu weena oshaba aheebwa; osherura azoora; oiguza aigurirwaho.
Ni muntu ki omuriimwe, ou omwana we yaakushaba omugaati, akamuha eibaare?
Nari ku yaakushaba eky'enyanja, akaamuha enjoka?
Imwe ku muraabe nimumanya kuha abaana baanyu ebirungi, haza muri babi, Shoimwe ow'omu iguru tarikizaho kuha ebirungi abo abamushaba?
N'ahabw'ekyo byona ebi mwenda ngu abantu babagirire, naimwe mube nikwo mwabagirira; ahakuba ebyo nibyo Biragiro kandi n'ebya Baanabi.
kwonka eirembo eririkutaasya omu magara rifunzire, n'akahanda kaaryo kagumire, n'abakazoora baba bakye.
Muryabamanyira aha byana byabo. Hariho abaakushoroma emizaabibu aha munyinya, nari shi emitiini aha matojo?
N'omuti gwona omurungi gwana ebyana birungi, kandi omuti omubi gwana ebyana bibi.
Omuti murungi tigubaasa kwana byana bibi, kandi omuti mubi tigubaasa kwana byana birungi.
Omuti gwona ogutaana byana birungi gutemwa, gunagwa omu muriro.
N'ahabw'ekyo muryabamanyira aha byana byabo.
Omuntu weena orikungira ati: Mukama wangye, Mukama wangye, tiwe aritaaha mu bukama bw'omu iguru, kureka orikukora ebi Tata ow'omu iguru akunda.

Baingi baryayetonganira aha kiro ekyo bati: Mukama waitu, Mukama waitu, torikumanya ku twabuuriire omu iziina ryawe, ku twabingire baadaimoni omu iziina ryawe, kandi ku twakozire eby'okutangaaza bingi omu iziina ryawe?
Haza naanye ndyabagarukamu nti: Tinkabamanyaga; mundugye omumaisho, imwe abakora eby'obugomi!
Buri muntu weena ohurira ebigambo byangye ebi, akabyorobera, naashushanisibwa n'omuntu ow'obwengye, owaayombekire enju ye aha rukiri;
bwanyima enjura ekagwa, omwegyemure gukahimintika, eihunga rikahuuha, byona bikateera egyo nju, kwonka etagwe, ahabw'okuba ekaba eyombekirwe aha rukiri.
Na buri muntu weena ohurira ebigambo byangye, atabyorobere, naashushanisibwa n'omuntu owaayombekire enju ye aha musheenyi;
bwanyima enjura ekagwa, omwegyemure gukahimintika, eihunga rikahuuha, bikateera egyo nju, ekagwa; n'okugwa kwayo kukaba kuhango.
Bwanyima Yesu, ku yaaherize kugamba ebigambo ebyo, abantu baatangaarira okwegyesa kwe,
ahabw'okuba akabeegyesa nk'oine obushoboorozi, kwonka ti nk'abahandiiki.
Kandi reeba, haija omubembe, yaamutsimbira amaju, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, ku oraabe nookunda, noobaasa kunshemeza.
Yesu yaagorora omukono, yaamukoraho, yaamugira ati: Ninkunda; shemera! Ahonaaho ebibembe bye byashemezibwa.
Yesu yaamuragiira ati: Oyerinde, otagira ou waagambira; kwonak irooko ogyende, oyeyorekye aha munyamurwa, oheyo eky'okusiima eki Musa yaaragiire, kibe eky'okuhamya omu maisho g'abantu.
naagira ati: Mukama wangye, omuheereza wangye abyami omu nju, azingazingirwe, naahururwa munonga.
Yaamugarukamu naagira ati: Ka nyije, mmukize.
Omukuru w'abaserukare yaamugarukamu naagira ati: Mukama wangye, tindi muntu ou oshemereire kutaaha omu nju ye; fa okugamba ekigambo kwonka, omuheereza wangye naija kukira.
Manya naanye ndi omuntu orikutwarwa, kandi nyine abaserukare abu ndikutegyeka. Ku ndagiira omwe nti, Gyenda, agyenda; n'ondiijo nti, Ija, aija; n'omuhuuku wangye nti, Gira oti, nawe agira kwo.
Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaatangaara, yaagambira abaabaire bamukuratiire, ati: Tinkareebaga kwikiriza okurikwingana kuti, n'obu haakuba omu Baisraeli.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Baingi baryaruga oburugwa-izooba n'oburengyerwa-izooba, bashutame na Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo omu bukama bw'omu iguru,
kwonka abaana b'obukama baryabingirwa aheeru omu mwirima; niho bariririra, bakanena enshaya.
Yesu yaagambira omukuru w'abaserukare ati: Irooko oyegyendere; nk'oku waikiriza, kikukorerwe kityo. Omuheereza we yaakira omuri kaanya ako.
yaamukora aha mukono, omushwija gwamurugaho; yaimuka, yaamuheereza.
Kandi ku bwabaire nibwira, baamureetera baingi abaabaire bariho baadaimoni, yaababingisa ekigambo kwonka, yaakiza boona abaabaire barwaire.
Ebyo byahikiiriza ebyagambirwe nabi Isaaya ati: We wenka akatwara obweremwa bwaitu, yaayekorera endwara zaitu.
Haija omuhandiiki, yaamugira ati: Mwegyesa, niinyija kukukuratira ahu oraaze hoona.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Zaamuha ziine ebiina, n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya ziine ebyashuri; kwonka Omwana w'omuntu taine na h'okuta omutwe.
Ondi aha beegi be yaamugambira ati: Mukama wangye, reka, mbanze ngyende nziikye tata.
Kwonka Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Nkuratira; reka abafu baziikye abafu baabo.
Eihunga ry'amaani ryaija omu nyanja, ebingonzi byayeshuka omu bwato; kwonka We akaba agwejegyeire.
Baija ah'ari, baamusisiimura nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, tujune, twafa.
Yaababuuza ati: Nimutiina ki, imwe abaine okwikiriza kukye? Ahonaaho yaimuka, yaakabukira eihunga n'enyanja, byacureera munonga.
Abashaija abo baatangaara, nibagira bati: Ogu ni muntu ki, ou eihunga n'enyanja birikuhurira?
Ku baamureebire, baayomba munonga nibagira bati: Noofa ki naitwe, Iwe Omwana wa Ruhanga? Oizire kutuburabuza, obunaku bwaitu butakahikire?
Aho hakaba hariho omukumbi gw'empunu nyingi hangahari nizirya.
Baadaimoni baamweshengyereza bati: Ku oraabe ori ow'okutubinga, twohereze omu mpunu.
Yaabagira ati: Nimwirooko! Baarugamu, baataaha omu mpunu; ahonaaho empunu ezo zoona zaarigita, nizishuuma aha ibanga, zaahwera omu nyanja.
Abariisa baazo bairuka, baataaha omuri tauni, baabagambira byona, n'ebyaba aha bantu abaabaire bariho baadaimoni.
Ab'omuri tauni boona baahwayo, baija kubugana Yesu; ku baamureebire, baamweshengyereza kubarugira omu nsi.
Baamureetera omuntu ozingazingirwe, abyami omu ngozi. Yesu ku yaareebire okwikiriza kwabo, yaagambira ozingazingirwe ati: Mwana wangye, huumura; ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa.
Abamwe aha bahandiiki baayetomboita bonka, ngu: Omuntu ogu naarogota.
Yesu ku yaamanyire ebiteekateeko byabo, yaababuuza ati: N'enki ekirikubateekateekyesa kubi omu mitima yaanyu?
Ekirikurahuka nikiiha, okugira nti, Ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa, nari nti, Imuka, ogyende?
Kwonka mumanye ngu Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi omu nsi okusaasira ebibi, yaagambira ozingazingirwe ati: Imuka, oyekorere engozi yaawe, otaahe.
Yaimuka, yaataaha.
Kandi abantu boona, ku baakireebire, baatiina, baahimbisa Ruhanga owaahaire abantu obushoboorozi oburikwingana butyo.
Bwanyima ku yaabaire ashutami omu nju naarya, reeba abahooza n'abasiisi baingi baija, baashutama na Yesu n'abeegi be.
Abafarisaayo, ku baakireebire, baabuuza abeegi be bati: Ahabw'enki omwegyesa waanyu naarya, kandi naanywa n'abahooza n'abasiisi?
Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: Abahuriire tibeetenga mufumu, kureka abarwaire.
Mbwenu mugyende mwegye amakuru g'ekigambo eki ngu, Eki ndikwenda n'embabazi, ti bitambo; ahabw'okuba tindaizire kweta bahikiriire, kureka abasiisi.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Abakwe nibabaasa bata kuganya bakiine kishwera? Obunaku buryahika, obu kishwera aribaihwaho; obwo nibwo baryesiibyakwo.
Tihariho muntu oteera ekiremu ky'omwenda musya aha mwenda omukuru; ahabw'okuba ekyo ekyabaziirwaho kikaataagura ekijwaro, n'ekifumuka kihanguha.

Kandi tibashuka viinyo y'omutahe omu furebe z'empu ezikuzire; ku baakukora batyo, efurebe zikaabaruka, viinyo eyatika zisiisikara. Kureka viinyo y'omutahe eshukwa omu furebe ensya, byona bibona kurama.
Yesu yaimuka, yaamukuratira n'abeegi be.
Kandi hakaba hariho omukazi, omazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire ekyejwiso; yaija enyima ya Yesu, yaakora aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye,
ahabw'okuba akahamya omu mutima gwe ati: N'obu naakukora aha kijwaro kye kwonka, nkaakira.
Yesu yaahinduka, yaamureeba, yaamugira ati: Mwana wangye, huumura; okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakutambira. Ahonaaho omukazi yaakira.
Yesu ku yaahikire aha nju y'ogwo mukungu, yaareeba abarikuteera esheegu n'abandi baingi nibacura.
Yaabagira ati: Murugyeho! Omwishiki tafiire, agwejegyeire. Baamushekyerera munonga.
Abantu ku baaherize kushohozibwa, yaataaha omu nju, yaakwata ogwo mwishiki omukono, yaimuka.
Egyo nkuru yaabuga omu ishaza eryo ryona.
Kandi Yesu ku yaabaire naarugayo, empumi ibiri zaamukuratira nizimuyombererera ziti: Iwe Omwana wa Daudi, otugirire embabazi.
Ku yaahikire omu nju, ezo mpumi zaamwirira haihi; Yesu yaazibuuza ati: Nimwikiriza ngu ekyo ninkibaasa? Zaamugarukamu ziti: Eego, Mukama waitu.
Atyo yaazikora aha maisho, naagira ati: kibe nk'oku mwaikiriza.
Amaisho gaabo gaahumuuka. Yesu yaabeehanangiriza munonga, naagira ati: Mwerinde, hatagira owaakimanya.
Kwonka bo ku baarugire aho, baamurangaana omu ishaza eryo ryona.
Ku baabaire nibarugayo, baamureetera ekiteta kiriho daimoni.
Yesu ku yaaherize kubinga daimoni ogwo, ekiteta kyagamba; abantu baatangaara nibagira bati: Tihariho kirikushusha nk'eki ekirareebirwe omuri Israeli.
Kwonka Abafarisaayo baagira bati: Baadaimoni naababingisa amaani ga mukama waabo.
Yesu yaagyendagyenda omuri tauni zoona n'omu birorero byona naayegyesa omuri sinagogi, zaabo, naagamba engiri y'obukama bw'omu iguru, kandi naakiza endwara zoona n'obumuga bwona.
Ku yaareebire emitwe y'abantu, yaabagirira esaasi, ahakuba bakaba baburaburiirwe, bashobeirwe nk'entaama ezitaine muriisa.
Nikwo kugira abeegi be ati: Eby'okugyesha ni bingi munonga, kwonka abagyesi ni bakye;
n'ahabw'ekyo mushabe Mukama w'eigyesha ayohereze abagyesi omu by'okugyesha bye.
Amaziina g'abeegi ikumi na babiri nigo aga: ow'okubanza ni Simooni orikwetwa Petero, na Anderea omurumuna; na Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo, na Yohaana omurumuna;
Filipo na Batolomaayo; Tomasi na Matayo omuhooza; Yakobo mwene Alufaayo na Tadaayo,
Simooni Omukananaayo na Yuda Iskaryota owaamureebize.
Abo ikumi na babiri Yesu akabatuma, yaabaragiira ati: Mutariza omu banyamahanga n'obu kwakuba okutaaha omuri tauni yoona ey'Abasamaria;
kureka mugyende omu ntaama ezaabuzire ez'omu ruganda rw'Abaisraeli.
Omu kugyenda mugyende nimugamba muti: Obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.
Mukize abarwaire, muzoore abafiire, mushemeze ababembe, mubingye baadaimoni. Mukaheerwa busha, naimwe muheere busha.
Mutaritwara ezaabu nari efeeza nari emiringa omu nshaho zaanyu;
omu rugyendo rwanyu mutaritwara efurebe, nari amakanzu abiri, nari enkaito, n'obu yaakuba enkoni; ahabw'okuba omukozi ashemereire kuheebwa eby'okumutunga.
Tauni yoona nari ekirorero kyona, omu muritaaha, mubanze musherure omuntu waamwo oshemereire, mube niwe mwaraarira okuhitsya obu murirugayo.
Ku muriba nimukitaaha omu nju egyo, mugiramutsye.
Enju ku eribashemerera, etungye obusingye bwanyu; ku eriba etabashemereire, obusingye bwanyu bubagarukire.
Omuntu weena ku aryanga kubakunira nari okuhurira ebigambo byanyu, ku muriba nimuruga omu nju egyo nari omu tauni egyo, mukunkumure omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byanyu.
Nimbagambira amazima nti: Aha kiro ky'okucwa orubanja, ekifubiro ky'ensi ya Sodoma na Gomora kiryaba ekirikubaasa kwemerwa okukira ekya tauni egyo.
Mwerinde abantu, ahabw'okuba baryabatwara omu mashengyero, baryabateerera omuri sinagogi,
kandi baryabatwara omu maisho g'abategyeki n'abagabe nibabantura, ahabw'okuba baakareebi b'okumpamya omu maisho gaabo n'ag'abanyamahanga.
Ku baribatwarayo, mutaryemereza emitima oku murigamba nari aha bi murigamba; ahakuba ebi murigamba, muryabiheebwa omu mwanya ogwo;
mumanye ngu tiimwe murigamba, kureka Omwoyo wa Shoimwe niwe aribagambisa.
Mukuru w'omuntu aryahayo omurumuna kwitwa, na ishe w'omwana aryahayo omwana we; abaana baryagomera abazaire baabo babaitise;
