kandi muryayangwa abantu boona nibabatura eiziina ryangye. Kwonka origumisiriza okuhitsya aha muheru, niwe arijunwa.
Ku baribahiiga omuri tauni emwe, muhungire omu ndiijo; buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Timuribuga tauni za Israeli zoona, Omwana w'omuntu atakaizire.
ekyakubaire gye aha mwegi n'okuba nk'omwegyesa we n'omuhuuku akaba nka mukama we. Ku baraabe beetsire nyineeka
Eki mbagambirira omu mwirima, mugume mukigambire omu mushana; eki murihurira kigambiirwe omu kutu, mukigambire aha mutwe gw'enju.
Kandi mutaritiina abarikwita omubiri, kwonka tibarikubaasa kwita magara; kureka mutiine Orikubaasa kuhwerekyereza byombi, amagara n'omubiri, omuri Gehena.
Ebiteera-nkumba bibiri tibigura sente emwe? Kwonka tihariho na kimwe ekigwa ahansi Shoimwe atakimanyire.
Nangwa n'eishokye ery'aha mitwe yaanyu ribazirwe ryona.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutaritiina; ahabw'okuba nimukira ebiteera-nkumba bingi.
Kandi buri muntu orimpamya omu maisho g'abantu, naanye ndyamuhamya omu maisho ga Tata ori omu iguru.
Kwonka weena oriinyehakana omu maisho g'abantu, naanye ndyamwehakana omu maisho ga Tata ori omu iguru.
Ahabw'okuba nkaija kutaanisa omwojo na ishe, omwishiki na nyina, omukazi na nyinazaara;
abazigu b'omuntu baryaba ab'omu ka ye.
Orikukunda ishe nari nyina okubankiza, tashemereire kuba owangye; kandi orikukunda omutabani nari muhara we okubankiza, tashemereire kuba owangye.
Kandi oteekorera musharaba gwe, akankuratira, tashemereire kuba owangye.
Orikukiza amagara ge, aryagabuza; kandi orikubuza amagara ge ahabwangye, aryagakiza.
Orikwikiriza nabi ahabw'okuba nabi, aryatunga ebihembo bya nabi; kandi orikwikiriza ohikiriire ahabw'okuba ohikiriire, aryatunga ebihembo by'ohikiriire.
Kandi orikunywaisa omwe ahari aba bato enkyeka y'amaizi agarikufuka ahabw'okuba omwegi wangye, nimbagambira amazima nti: Taribura bihembo bye.
Bwanyima Yesu ku yaaherize kwegyesa abeegi ikumi na babiri, yaarugayo, yaaza kwegyesa n'okubuurira omuri tauni zaabo.
ati: Niiwe ogwo orikwenda kwija, nari tutegyereze ondiijo?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Mugarukyeyo mugambire Yohaana ebi mwahurira, n'ebi mwareeba;
empumi zihumwirwe, ebirema nibigyenda, ababembe bashemeziibwe, ebifa-matu nibihurira, abafiire bazoirwe, n'abooro bagambiirwe ebigambo birungi.
Kandi otarikumbanganisaho aine omugisha.
Ku baagyenzire, Yesu yaatandika kugambira emitwe y'abantu aha bya Yohaana, naagira ati: Omu ihamba mukaza kureebayo ki? Orubingo orurikutengyetsibwa omuyaga?
Beitu mukaza kureeba ki? Omuntu ojwaire emyenda erikuterera? Manya abajwara ebirikuterera baba omu bikaari by'abagabe.
Beitu mukatwarwayo ki? Okureeba nabi? Eego, nimbagambira nti: Buzima naakirira kimwe nabi.
Kandi ogwo niwe owaahandiikirweho ngu,
Reeba, nintuma entumwa yangye, ekubandize;
niyo erishemeza omuhanda gwawe.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuri boona abaazairwe abakazi tihakabahoga n'omwe orikukira Yohaana Omubatizi obukuru; kwonka omuto omu bukama bw'omu iguru naamukira.
Okuruga omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatizi okuhitya hati, obukama bwa Ruhanga nibutwaranirwa, n'abarikubutwaranira babutaahamu n'amaani.
Ahakuba baanabi boona n'ebiragiro bikaba nibiranga okuhitsya omu biro bya Yohaana;
kandi ku muraabe nimukunda kukiikiriza, niwe Eliya owaarangirwe ku ariija.
Oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Mbwenu ab'ebiro ebi mbashushanise ki? Nibashusha nk'abaana bato abashutami omu katare, bakeeta bagyenzi baabo bati:
Tubateereire emikuri, timwazina; twacura timwaganya.
Ahakuba Yohaana akaija atarikurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa, baagira ngu, Ariho daimoni.
Omwana w'omuntu we yaija naarya kandi naanywa, baagira ngu, Reeba omunyamururu, kandi omusinzi, munywani w'abahooza n'abasiisi. Kwonka shi obwengye busiimirwa aha mirimo yaabwo.

Ati: Iwe Koraziini, oryakareeba! Naiwe, Besesaida, oryakareeba, ahabw'okuba eby'okutangaaza ebyakoreirwe omuriimwe, kuri noogira ngu bikakorerwa Tuuro na Sidoni, bakaabaire beeteisize kare, bajwaire ebiguniya, beeshukyeire eiju rya kashenda.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Aha kiro ky'okucwa orubanja, ekifubiro kya Tuuro na Sidoni kiryaba ekirikubaasa kwemerwa okukira ekyanyu.

Naiwe Kaperenaumu, nooyeraata ngu oryakuzibwa ohikye omu iguru? Ngabusha, oryagarurwa ahansi ohikye okuzimu. Ahabw'okuba eby'okutangaaza ebyakoreirwe omuriiwe, kuri noogira ngu bikakorerwa Sodoma, ekaabaire ekiriho n'okuhitsya hati.
Hoona nimbagambira nti: Aha kiro ky'okucwa orubanja, ekifubiro kya Sodoma kiryaba ekirikubaasa kwemerwa okukira ekyanyu.
Eego, Taata, ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo waasiimire.
Ebintu byona nkabiheebwa Tata, kandi tihariho omanya Omwana wa Ruhanga kureka Ishe kandi tihariho omanya Ishe, kureka Omwana we n'omuntu weena ou Omwana aikiriza kumushuuruurira.
Imwe mwena abaruhire n'abaremereirwe, mwije ahariinye, mbaruhuure.
Mwekorere omugamba gwangye, muunyegyereho; ahabw'okuba nintwaza gye, kandi ndi omucureezi omu mutima; naimwe muryatunga okuhuumura omu mitima yaanyu,
ahakuba omugamba gwangye tigurikuremeera, n'omutwaro gwangye gwanguhi.
Abafarisaayo ku baakireebire, baamugira bati: Reeba, abeegi baawe nibakora ekirikuzira, okucwa obushiisha ahari Sabato.
Nawe yaababuuza ati: Beitu shi timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire, obu yaagira enjara n'abu yaabaire aine;
ku yaataahire omu nju ya Ruhanga, akarya aha migaati ey'okumurikwa, ei Ebiragiro byabaire bitarikwikiriza ku aryaho, n'abu yaabaire aine, kureka abanyamurwa bonka?
Nari shi timukashomaga omu Biragiro abanyamurwa omuri hekalu oku baabaire bashobya Sabato, haza batagire rubanja?
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Orikukira hekalu ari aha.
Kuri nimumanya ekigambo eki ngu, Eki ndikwenda n'embabazi, ti bitambo, timwakusingisiriize bataine rubanja.
Ahakuba Omwana w'omuntu niwe Mukama wa Sabato.
yaashangamu omushaija okokootsire omukono. Baamubuuza bati: Ebiragiro nibiikiriza okutambira omuntu ahari Sabato? Bakamubuuza batyo ngu babone kumutabaariza.
Yaabagarukamu ati: N'oha omuriimwe owaakuba aine entaama ye emwe, ekagwa omu kiina aha izooba rya Sabato, atagikwate akagiihamu?
Mbwenu shi omuntu tarikukirira kimwe entaama? N'ahabw'ekyo Ebiragiro nibiikiriza okukora gye ahari Sabato.
Ahonaaho yaaragiira omushaija ogwo ati: Nanuura omukono gwawe. Yaagunanuura, gwakira, gwaba nk'ogundi.
Abafarisaayo baashohora, baaza omu naama, baahanuura oku baraamwite.
Yesu ku yaabimanyire, yaarugayo. Abantu baingi baamukuratira, yaabakiza boona,
yaabeehanangiriza ngu, batamurangaana.
Ekyo kikabaho ngu ebi Isaaya yaagambire bihikiirire ebi yaagizire ati:
Reeba omuheereza wangye ou nkunda, ou naatooraine,
Omutima gwangye ou gushemerererwa;
Ndyamutaho Omwoyo wangye
Agambire abanyamahanga eby'oburyo.
Taritongana, tariyomba,
Nangwa tihariho n'orihurira eiraka rye omu mihanda.
Orubingo orushatukire tariruhenda,
Kandi n'orumuri orurikwaka kubi tariruraaza,
Okuhitsya obu arisingura ahabw'okuhikiirira kwe.
Kandi abanyamahanga baryagira amatsiko aha iziina rye.
Abantu boona baatangaara, baayebuuza nibagira bati: Beitu ogu takaaba Omwana wa wa Daudi?
Kwonka Abafarisaayo ku baakihuriire, baagira bati: Omuntu ogu taine kindi ki arikubingisa baadaimoni kureka Belezebuli omukama wa baadaimoni.
Yesu ku yaamanyire ebiteekateeko byabo, yaabagambira ati: Obugabe bwona ku bwebaganisamu, buhwerekyerezibwa; n'orurembo rwona nari enju yoona, ku byebaganisamu, tibigumaho.
Na Sitaane ku araabe naabinga Sitaane, biri ayebaganiisemu. Obukama bwe buryagumaho buta?
Nyowe, ku ndaabe nimbingisa baadaimoni Belezebuli, abaana baanyu bo nibamubingisa oha? N'ahabw'ekyo abo nibo baribasingisa orubanja.
Kwonka ku ndaabe nimbingisa baadaimoni Omwoyo wa Ruhanga, mumanye ngu obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho.
Omuntu naabaasa ata kutaaha omu nju y'ondiijo ow'amaani okunyaga ebintu bye, atabandize kukoma ogwo ow'amaani, bwanyima akabona kunyaga gye eby'omu nju ye.
Nikyo ndikubagambirira nti: Abantu baryasaasirwa ekibi kyona n'okurogota kwona, kwonka okurogota aha Mwoyo Orikwera n'ekibi ekitarisaasirwa.
Omuntu weena orirogota aha Mwana w'omuntu, aryasaasirwa; kwonka orirogota aha Mwoyo Orikwera tarisaasirwa mu busingye obu, n'obu bwakuba oburiija.
Omuti ku muraagwete murungi, n'ebyana byagwo mubyete birungi; nari shi omuti ku muraagwete mubi, n'ebyana byagwo mubyete bibi; ahakuba omuti gumanyirwa aha byana byagwo.
Imwe baana b'enjoka 'mwe, nimubaasa muta kugamba ebigambo birungi, haza muri babi? Ebiijwire omutima, akanwa nibyo kagamba.
Omuntu murungi aiha ebirungi omu ibiikiro rye erirungi; n'omubi aiha ebibi omu ibiikiro rye eribi.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Ekigambo ekitaine buryo kyona eki abantu barigamba, baryakyetonganira aha kiro ky'okucwa orubanja.
Ebigambo byawe ebi ogamba nibyo birikwihisaho orubanja, nari shi nibyo birikusingisa orubanja.
Nawe yaabagarukamu ati: Abantu b'obusingye obu obubi obw'obushambani nibenda akamanyiso; kwonka tibarikaheebwa kureka akamanyiso ka nabi Yona.
Nk'oku Yona yaamazire amazooba ashatu n'ebiro byago omu nda y'eky'enyanja ekihango, nikwo n'Omwana w'omuntu arimara ebiro bishatu nyomushana na nyekiro ari okuzimu.
Abantu ba Nineeve baryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu aha kiro ky'orubanja, barubasingise, ahabw'okuba ku baahuriire okubuurira kwa Yona, baayeteisa; kandi reeba, Orikukira Yona ari aha.

Omugabekazi w'eihanga ery'obukiizi-bwa-buryo aryayemerera n'ab'ebiro ebi aha kiro ky'orubanja arubasingise, ahabw'okuba akaruga aha muheru gw'ensi, yaija kuhurira obwengye bwa Sulemaani; kandi reeba, Orikukira Sulemaani ari aha.
Daimoni, ku aruga omu muntu, araba omu mpita ezitarimu maizi, naasherura oburuhuukiro, bumuburira.
Agira ati: Ka ngarukye omu nju yangye omu naarugire. Ku ahikayo, ashanga harimu busha, eyeyereire, eboneziibwe.
Atyo agyenda areeta abandi baadaimoni mushanju ababi okumukira, bataaha omwo, bagumamu; ebya bwanyima by'omuntu ogwo bikira eby'okubanza kuba bibi. Nikwo kiriba kityo n'aha b'obusingye obu obubi.
Omuntu yaamugambira ati: Reeba, nyoko na barumuna baawe beemereire aheeru, nibenda kugamba naiwe.
Yaagarukamu owaamugambira, naamugira ati: Maawe n'oha, na barumuna bangye nibaahi?
Yaagorora omukono naagworekyeza abeegi be, naagira ati: Reeba, maawe na barumuna bangye n'aba!
Ahabw'okuba omuntu weena, okora ebi Tata ow'omu iguru akunda, niwe murumuna wangye, niwe munyaanyazi, niwe maawe.
Omutwe gw'abantu baingi baateeranira ah'ari; atyo yaaza omu bwato, yaabushutamamu; abantu abo boona baayemerera aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Yaabeegyesa bingi omu nfumu, naagira ati: Omubibi akashohora kubiba.
Ku yaabaire naabiba, embibo ezimwe zaagwa omu muhanda, enyonyi zaija, zaazitorotoora.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa aha rukiri, ahataine itaka ringi; ahonaaho zaamera; ahabw'eitaka kutaba ringi,
eizooba ku ryajwire, omushana gwaziteera, zaahonga; kandi ahabw'okutagira mizi, zaayoma.
Ezindi zaagwa omu mahwa; amahwa gaamera, gaazinyuruza.
Ezindi zaagwa omu itaka rirungi; zaayera, ezimwe zaahitsya igana, ezindi makumi mukaaga, n'ezindi makumi ashatu.
Oine amatu, ahurire.
Abeegi be baija ah'ari, baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki noobeegyesa omu nfumu?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Imwe muhairwe okumanya emibonano y'obukama bw'omu iguru, kwonka bo tibahairwe.
Ahabw'okuba oine niwe ariheebwa, kandi aryayongyerwaho, agire ebingi; kwonka otaine, aryayakwa n'ekyo eki aine.
Eki ndikubeegyeseza omu nfumu nikyo eki: ahakuba okureeba tibareeba, kandi n'okuhurira tibahurira, n'obu kwakuba okwetegyereza.
Ebi Isaaya yaaragwire bibahikireho, ebi yaagizire ati:
Okuhurira kwo muryahurira, kwonka timurishoborokyerwa;
Okureeba kwo muryareeba, kwonka timuryetegyereza;
Ahakuba emitima y'abantu aba ehindukire ebitsire,
N'amatu gaabo nigahurira kubi,
N'amaisho gaabo bagahumiize,
Ngu batakaareebesa amaisho gaabo,
N'okuhuriza amatu gaabo,
N'okwetegyereza n'emitima yaabo,
Bakahinduka, nkabakiza.
Kwonka amaisho gaanyu gaine omugisha, ahabw'okuba nigareeba, n'amatu gaanyu, ahabw'okuba nigahurira.
Kandi nimbagambira amazima nti: Baanabi baingi n'abantu abahikiriire baingi bakeetenga kureeba ebi murikureeba, tibaabireeba, n'okuhurira ebi murikuhurira, tibaabihurira.
Mbwenu nu, imwe muhurire enfumu y'omubibi.
Weena ohurira ekigambo ky'obukama, atakyetegyereze, Omubi aija, ashahura ekyabibwa omu mutima gwe; ebyo nibishoboorora amakuru g'embibo eyaagwire omu muhanda.
Eby'embibo ezaabibirwe aha rukiri, amakuru gaabyo n'omuntu ohurira ekigambo, akarahuka kukiikiriza ashemereirwe;
kwonka we ahabwe ataine mizi, akeehangaana omwanya mukye; hakibaho obusaasi nari okuhiigwa naaturwa ekyo kigambo, ahonaaho bikamugwisa.
Eby'ezaabibirwe omu mahwa, amakuru gaabyo n'omuntu ohurira ekigambo; kwonka amaganya g'ensi n'okubeihwabeihwa obutungi bwayo bikanyuruza ekigambo, kikaremwa kwera.
Eby'ezaabibirwe omu itaka rirungi, amakuru gaabyo n'omuntu ohurira ekigambo, akakimanya; buzima ogwo niwe ayana ebyana, omwe igana, ondiijo makumi mukaaga, n'ondiijo makumi ashatu.
Kandi akabacwera endiijo nfumu, naabagira ati: Obukama bw'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa n'omuntu owaabibire embibo nungi omu musiri gwe;
kandi abantu ku baabaire bagwejegyeire, omuzigu we yaija, yaabiba enkyenzi omu
Oburo ku bwamezire, bwaba obushiisha, enkyenzi nazo zaareebeka.
Abahuuku baija, baagambira mukama waabo bati: Mukama waitu, torabibire embibo nungi omu musiri gwawe? Mbwenu kandi enkyenzi zirugire hi?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ekyo kikakorwa omuzigu. Abahuuku baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu shi, nooyenda ngu tugyende tuzikuuremu?
Yaabagira ati: Ngaaha! Obundi mukaaba nimukuuramu enkyenzi, mukuuriranamu oburo.
Murekye bikure byombi, bihikye omu igyesha; kandi omu igyesha ndyagambira abagyesi nti: Mubanze mutooranemu enkyenzi, muzibohe enganda zookibwe, reero oburo mubuhunikye omu bitara byangye.
haza kari kakye okukira embibo zoona; kwonka ku kakuzire, kahanguha okukira ebishaka byona, kaahinduka omuti, enyonyi z'omu mwanya zaija zaayarika omu mataagi gaagwo.
Ebigambo ebyo byona Yesu akabyegyesa abantu omu nfumu; kandi tihariho ki yaabeegyeise kyona, atakirabize mu nfumu,
eki nabi yaagambire kihikiirire eki yaagizire ati:
Ndyayashamya akanwa kangye omu nfumu,
Ngambe ebigambo ebyasherekirwe okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi.
Bwanyima yaaraga emitwe y'abantu, yaataaha omu nju. Abeegi be baamwirira haihi, baamubuuza bati: Otushobororere amakuru g'enkyenzi z'omu musiri.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Owaabibire embibo nungi n'Omwana w'omuntu;
omusiri n'ensi; embibo enungi nibo baana b'obukama; enkyenzi n'abaana b'Omubi;
omuzigu owaazibibire ni Sitaane; eigyesha niyo mperu y'obusingye obu; n'abagyesi ni baamaraika.
Nk'oku enkyenzi zirundwa hamwe, zikookibwa n'omuriro, nikwo kiriba kityo aha mperu y'obusingye obu.
Omwana w'omuntu aryatuma baamaraika be, nabo baryaiha omu bukama bwe byona ebirikuteeza abantu entsibo, n'enkozi z'ebibi,
binagwe omu kikoomi ky'omuriro; omwo nimwo abantu bariririra, bakanena enshaya.
Obwo abahikiriire baryayengyengyeta nk'eizooba omu bukama bwa Ishebo. Oine amatu, ahurire.
Kandi obukama bw'omu iguru nibushusha nk'omushuubuzi orikusherura eruuru enungi;
ku yaaboine eruuru emwe ey'obuguzi bwingi, yaagyenda, yaatunda ebye byona, yaagigura.
Ku kaijwire, baakakurura, baakahitsya aha nkungu, baashutama, baatooranamu ebirungi, baabita omu bintu byabo, ebibi baabinaga.
Nikwo kiriba kityo aha mperu y'obusingye obu; baamaraika baryaija baihe ababi omu bahikiriire,
babanagye omu kikoomi ky'omuriro; omwo nimwo bariririra, bakanena enshaya.
Mwayetegyereza ebigambo ebyo byona? Baamugarukamu bati, Eego.
Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: N'ahabw'ekyo omuhandiiki weena oyegyesiibwe eby'obukama bw'omu iguru naashushanisibwa na nyineeka, oiha omu ibiikiro rye ebintu ebisya n'ebya ira.
ku yaahikire omu nsi y'owaabo, yaatandika kubeegyeseza omuri sinagogi yaabo; n'ahabw'ekyo baatangaara nibagira bati: Obwengye obu n'eby'okutangaaza ebi ogu akabiiha hi?
Beitu ogu t'omwana w'omubaizi, na nyina tarikwetwa Mariamu? N'abarumuna ti Yakobo, Yosefu, Simooni na Yuda?
Nangwa na banyaanya boona ti bari aha naitwe? Beitu ogu mushaija ebi byona akabiiha hi? Ebye byabashobera.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Nabi tabura kitiinisa kureka omu ihanga ryabo kandi n'omu ka ye.
Okwo Yesu tiyaakorayo by'okutangaaza bingi ahabw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
yaagambira abagaragwa be ati: Ogwo ni Yohaana Omubatizi azookire omu bafu; nikyo kirikumukoresa eby'okutangaaza ebyo.
Ahakuba ebyo bitakabaireho, Heroode akakwata Yohaana, yaamuboha, yaamuta omu kihome ahabwa Herodia, muka Filipo mwene ishe;
ahabw'okuba Yohaana akateisa Heroode ati: Ebiragiro tibirikukwikiriza kumugira omukazi waawe.
Ku yaabaire naayenda kumwita, yaatiina abantu, ahabw'okuba abantu bakaba nibahamya ku Yohaana ari nabi.
Kwonka ekiro ky'okwijuka okuzaarwa kwa Heroode ku kyahikire, muhara wa Herodia yaazinira omu maisho g'abangyenyi, yaashemeza Heroode.
N'ahabw'ekyo yaamuraganisa, naarahira ku arikwija kumuha eki araamushabe kyona.
Omwihsiki yaamushaba ati: Mpeera aha omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatizi omu rucuba.
Ekyo kyasaasa omugabe; kwonka ahabw'okushangwa yaarahiire omu maisho g'abagyenyi be, yaaragiira kugumuha.
Yaatuma, baatemaho Yohaana omutwe omu kihome.
Baareeta omutwe omu rucuba, baaguha omwishiki, nawe yaagutwarira nyina.
Abeegi be baija, baatwara omutumbi gwe baaguziika, baagyenda baamubikira Yesu.
Ku yaayambukire, yaashangayo emitwe mingi y'abantu, yaabagirira embabazi, yaatambira abarwaire baabo.
Ku bwaizire, abeegi be baija ah'ari, baamugira bati: Aha n'eihamba; kandi bwizire. Raga abantu bagyende omu birorero, beeshakire eby'okurya.
Kwonka Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Tihariho kirikubatwara; mubagaburire.
Baamugarukamu bati: Eki twine aha n'emigaati etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri kwonka.
Yaabagira ati: Mubindeetere.
Yaaragiira emitwe y'abantu kushutama omu kacwamba; yaayakiira egyo migaati etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaasiima, yaabega emigaati, yaagiha abeegi be, nabo baagaburira abantu.
Boona baarya, baahaaga. Bwanyima baatorotoora oburagarika obwatsigaraho, baijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri.
Abo abaariire bakaba bari abashaija enkumi itaano, otabariiremu bakazi n'abaana.
Ku yaaherize kubaraga, yainamuka omu kibungo wenka kushaba. Obwire bwaira akiriyo wenka;
kwonka obwo, obwato bukaba buri ahagati y'enyanja, nibuzongibwa ebingonzi; ahabw'okuba omuyaga gukaba gubaturukire omumaisho.
Enkoko ku zaabaire nizigamba, yaabaizira naagyendesa amaguru aha nyanja.
Abeegi be ku baamureebire naagyendera aha nyanja, baayemereza emitima, baataka ahabw'obwoba, nibagira bati: N'omuzimu!
Ahonaaho Yesu yaabahuumuriza, naagira ati: Muhuumure! Niinye, mutatiina.
Petero yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, ku oraabe ori iwe, ndagiira, nyije aho ningyendera aha maizi.
Yaamwikiriza ati: Ija. Petero yaaruga omu bwato, yaagyendera aha maizi kushanga Yesu.
Kwonka ku yaareebire omuyaga gwaba mwingi, yaatiina; ku yaatandikire kutobera, yaataka ati: Mukama wangye, njuna.
Ahonaaho Yesu yaagorora omukono gwe, yaamukwata, yaamugira ati: Iwe oine okwikiriza kukye, ahanki noobanganisa?
Ku baagiire omu bwato, omuyaga gwatuuza.
Abaabaire bari omu bwato baamuramya nibagira bati: Buzimazima ori Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Ku baaherize kwambuka, baahika seeri aharikwetwa Genesareeti.
Abantu bayo, ku baamumanyire, baagaba ebirari aho hoona, baamureetera boona abaabaire barwaire;
baamweshengyereza ngu nangwa bakore aha mukugiro gw'ekaanzu ye kwonka; boona abaagukozireho, oku baingana, baakirira kimwe.
Ahabw'enki abeegi baawe bashobya emigyenzo ya baishenkurubo? Ahabw'okuba tibajabika ngaro omu maizi, baaba nibaza kurya.
Yaabagarukamu naababuuza ati: Ahabw'enki imwe mushobya ebiragiro bya Ruhanga ahabw'emigyenzo yaanyu?
Nimumanya ngu Ruhanga akaragiira ati: Otiine sho na nyoko; kandi ati: Orijuma ishe nari nyina, aitwe.
Kwonka imwe nimugira muti: Omuntu orikugambira ishe nari nyina ati: Kyona eki naakukuhaire kukuhwera, nkihongyeire Ruhanga, ogwo aba atakigyemwa kutiina ishe.
Omu buryo obwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga mukihindura busha, ngu mugumye emigyenzo yaanyu.
Imwe ndyarya 'mwe, Isaaya akabaraguraho kurungi, obu yaagira ati:
Ab'eihanga eri nibampa ekitiinisa ky'aha minwa,
Kwonka emitima yaabo endi hare.
Bandamiza busha,
Ahakuba okwegyesa, oku beegyesa, kuba okw'ebiragiro by'abantu.
Yaayeta omutwe gw'abantu, yaabagambira ati: Muhurire, kandi mwetegyereze.
Ekitaaha omu kanwa tikyo kishiisha omuntu; kureka ekiruga omu kanwa, nikyo kishiisha omuntu.
Bwanyima abeegi be baija baamugira bati: Noomanya ku Abafarisaayo baaguubwa kubi ahabw'okuhurira ebyo ebi waagamba?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Buri muti gwona ogu Tata ow'omu iguru atarabyaire, guryakuurwa.
Mubarekye! N'abeebembezi empumi, haza nabo bahumire. Mumanye ngu empumi ku eyebembera endiijo, zombi zigwa omu kiina.
Petero yaamushaba ati: Tushobororere amakuru g'egyo nfumu.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Biri shi naimwe timukashoborokyeirwe?
Timurikumanya ngu, ekintu ku kitaaha omu kanwa, kiza omu nda, bwanyima kishohora?
Kwonka ebiruga omu kanwa biba nibiruga omu mutima; ebyo nibyo bishiisha omuntu.
Ahabw'okuba omu mutima nimwo haruga ebiteekateeko bibi, okwita, okushambana, okwiba, okubeiherera abandi, okujuma;
ebyo nibyo bishiisha omuntu; kwonka okuriisa engaro zitajabikire mu maizi, ekyo tikishiisha muntu.
Haija Omunyakanaanikazi ow'omu kyanga ekyo, yaamweshengyereza naagira ati: Mukama wangye, Mwana wa Daudi, ngirira embabazi! Muhara wangye ariho daimoni, naamwita kubi munonga.
Kwonka Yesu tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu. Abeegi be baija, bamweshengyereza nibagira bati: Muragiire, agyende, ahabw'okuba naatuyomberera.
We yaagarukamu ati: Tindatumirwe ha bandi kureka aha ntaama z'oruganda rwa Israeli ezaabuzire.
Omukazi yaagaruka yaamuramya naagira ati: Mukama wangye, mpwera.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ti kirungi omuntu kwaka abaana eby'okurya, akabitambikira embwa.
Omukazi yaamwikiriza ati: Eego, Mukama wangye, kwonka embwa nazo zirya oburagarika oburagara niburuga aha meeza ya mukama waazo.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Mukazi 'we, okwikiriza kwawe ni kwingi; kibe nk'oku orikwenda. Okuruga aho muhara we yaakira.
Yesu yaarugayo, yaaraba aha rubaju rw'enyanja ya Galilaaya; yainamuka omu migongo, yaashutamayo.
Emitwe y'abantu baingi baamushangayo, bamureeteire ebirema n'empumi n'ebitera n'ebimuga n'abandi baingi, baabata aha bigyere bye, yaabatambira;
n'ahabw'ekyo abantu baatangaara, ku baareebire ebiteta nibigamba, ebimuga nibikira, ebirema nibigyenda, n'empumi nizireeba; baahimbisa Ruhanga wa Israeli.
Abeegi be baamubuuza bati: Omuri eri ihamba nitwiha hi emigaati erikubaasa kuhaazya abantu abarikwingana bati?
Yesu yaababuuza ati: Mwine emigaati engahi? Banu bati: Ni mushanju n'obw'enyanja bukye.
Yaaragiira abantu kushutama ahansi;
yaakwata egyo migaati mushanju n'obw'enyanja; ku yaabisiimiire, yaabega emigaati, yaagiha abeegi be, nabo baagaburira abantu.
Boona baarya, baahaaga, baatorotoora oburagarika obwatsigaireho, baijuza ebiibo mushanju.
Boona abaariire bakaba bari enkumi ina, otabariiremu bakazi n'abaana.
Yaabaraga, yaaza omu bwato, yaataaha omu ishaza rya Magadani.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ku buba buri haihi kwira, mwareeba ebicu nibitukura, mugira ngu, omu kasheeshe nihaija kusiiba hakyeire.

Kandi omu kasheeshe mugira ngu eri izooba nihaija kuba habi, ahabw'okuba ebicu nibitukura kandi nibikondakonda. Nimumanya kukyenga enshusha y'eiguru, kwonka timurikubaasa kukyenga obumanyiso bw'obunaku.
Ab'obusingye obubi obw'obushambani nibenda akamanyiso; kwonka tibarikaheebwa kureka akamanyiso ka Yona. Yaabarugaho, yaayegyendera.
Abeegi be ku baahikire seeri, baijuka ku beebirwe kwereetera emigaati.
Yesu yaabahabura ati: Reeba, mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.
Baagambirana bati: Eki arikufa n'ahabw'okuba titwareeta migaati.
Yesu ku yaabimanyire, yaababuuza ati: Imwe abaine okwikiriza kukye, nimufa ki aha by'emigaati?
Timukashoborokyeirwe, n'obu kwakuba okwijuka emigaati etaano aha bantu enkumi itaano, n'ebitenga oku byaingaine ebi mwaijwize?
Kandi n'emigaati mushanju aha nkumi ina, n'ebiibo oku byaingaine ebi mwaijwize?
N'enki ekibazibiire kumanya ku ntarikugamba ha by'emigaati? Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.
Okuruga aho baamanya ku atabagambiire kwerinda ekitumbisa eky'emigaati, kureka enyegyesa y'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.
Baamugira bati: Abamwe nibagira ngu, Ori Yohaana Omubatizi, abandi ngu, Ori Eliya, kandi abandi ngu, Ori Yeremia nari omwe ahari baanabi.
Yaababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi imwe, mugira ngu mba oha?
Simooni Petero yaagarukamu ati: Ori Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga ohuriire.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Oine omugisha, Simooni mwene Yona; ahabw'okuba omubiri n'eshagama tibyo byakushuuruurira ekyo, kureka Tata ori omu iguru.
Kandi ninkugambira nti: Ori
Ndyakuha ebishumuruzo by'obukama bw'omu iguru; eki oriboha omu nsi kyona, kiryabohwa n'omu iguru; eki orikomoorora omu nsi kyona, kiryakomoororwa n'omu iguru.
Bwanyima yaayehanangiriza abeegi be kutagira ou baagambira ku ari Kristo.
Petero yaamuta aha rubaju, yaatandika kumuteisa, naamugira ati: Nikikabure, Mukama wangye! ekyo tikirikwija kukubaho na kakye.
Yesu yaahinduka, yaagira Petero ati: Garuka enyima yangye, Sitaane! Wambeera enkongi, ahabw'okuba torikuteekateeka bya Ruhanga, kureka eby'abantu.
Omuntu weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge, aryagabuza; kandi weena orikubuza amagara ge ahabwangye, aryagakiza.
Mbwenu kiryagasira ki omuntu kutunga ensi yoona, haza akafeerwa amagara ge? Nari shi, omuntu aryahayo ki kucungura amagara ge?
Mumanye ngu Omwana w'omuntu aryaija na baamaraika be omu kitiinisa kya Ishe; kandi obwo nibwo ariihura omuntu weena ebishemereire ebi yaakozire.
Buzima nimbagambira nti: Omuri aba abeemereire aha, hariho bamwe abarireeba Omwana w'omuntu naija omu bukama bwe batakafiire.
Yaahindurirwa omu maisho gaabo, aha maisho ge haamurinkana nk'eizooba, n'ebijwaro bye byayera nk'omushana.
Kandi Musa na Eliya baareebeka omu maisho gaabo, nibagaaniira nawe.
Petero yaagambira Yesu ati: Mukama wangye, ni kirungi obu turi aha; ku oraabe nookunda, twombekye obuju bushatu, akamwe kabe akaawe, akandi kabe aka Musa, n'akandi aka Eliya.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija ekicu kirikwengyengyeta, kyabasangira, eiraka ryakyemamu nirigira riti: ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda, ou nyesiimira munonga; mumuhurire.
Abeegi ku baarihuriire, baagwa bajuumaire, batiinire munonga.
Yesu yaija, yaabakoraho, yaabagambira ati: Mwimukye, mutatiina.
Ku baajuumwire amaisho, tibareeba muntu weena kureka Yesu wenka.
Bwanyima ku baabaire nibashuuma nibaruga aha rushozi, Yesu yaabeehanangiriza ati: Mutagira ou mwagambira ebi mworekirwe, okuhitsya obu Omwana w'omuntu arizooka omu bafu.
Abeegi be baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki abahandiiki bagira ngu: Eliya ashemereire kubanza kwija?
Yaabagarukamu ati: N'eky'amazima; Eliya aryaija, ashemeze byona;
kwonka nimbagambira ngu, Eliya akaheza kwija; kwonka tibaramumanyire, kureka bakamutwaza, nk'oku baayenzire. Kandi hoona n'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo barimubonabonesa.
Aho niho abeegi be baihire kumanya ku arikubagambira ahari Yohaana Omubatizi.
Mukama wangye, saasira omwana wangye; ahabw'okuba naagwa entsimbo, kandi zimukabya munonga; kaingi agwa omu muriro, kandi obundi agwa omu maizi.
Naamureetera abeegi baawe, baaremwa kumukiza.
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Imwe ab'obusingye obu obutarikwikiriza, oburikwehabagiza, ndyahitsya hi okuguma naimwe? Ndyahitsya hi okubagumisiririza? Mumundeetere!
Yaagambira kubi daimoni; yaamurugaho, omwana ogwo yaakirira aho omuri ako kaanya.
Bwanyima abeegi baija ahari Yesu omu mubonano, baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki itwe tutabaasize kumubinga?
Yaabagarukamu ati: N'ahabw'okwikiriza kwanyu kukye. Kandi buzima nimbagambira nti: Ku muraabe mwine okwikiriza nk'akajuma ka
Kwonka daimoni ow'omuringo nk'ogu tarikubingwa kindi kureka okushaba n'okwesiibyakwo.
baryamwita, kandi aha kiro kya kashatu aryazooka. Baaganya munonga.

Yaabagarukamu ati: Naashora. Ku yaataahire omu nju, Yesu yaaba niwe yaabanza kumubuuza ati: Nooteekateeka ota, Simooni? Abagabe b'ensi ehoozi n'omushoro babiheebwa bantu ki? Abaana baabo nari abantu abandi?
Ku yaamugarukiremu ati, Abandi, Yesu yaamugambira ati: Mbwenu abaana baabo baine obusingye.
Kwonka itwe tutabagwisa kubi, ogyende aha nyanja, otegyese eirobo, eky'enyanja eki oraabanze kukwata, okyashamure, omu kanwa kaakyo noija kushangamu sitateeri; obe niyo waabaha ahabwangye n'ahabwawe.
Yaayeta omwana muto, yaamwemereza ahagati yaabo,
yaagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ku muriba mutahindukire, mukaba nk'abaana bato, timuritaaha mu bukama bw'omu iguru na kakye.
Omuntu weena, orikwecureeza nk'omwana ogu omuto, niwe mukuru omu bukama bw'omu iguru.
Kandi weena orikwakiira omwana muto nk'ogu omu iziina ryangye, biri niinye ayakiire;
kwonka weena orireetera omwe ahari aba abato abarikuunyikiriza kukora ekibi, haakiri omuntu ogwo okubohwa orubengo ruhango omu bitsya, akanagwa ahagati omu nyanja.
Ensi eryakareeba ahabw'ebirikugwisa abantu. Ebirikugwisa tibiribura kwija; kwonka origwisa abandi, aryakareeba.

Omukono gwawe nari shi ekigyere kyawe ku kiraakureetere kukora ekibi, okitemeho, okinagye hare; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara, ori ekirema nari noocumbagira, okukira okunagwa omu muriro ogutaraara oine emikono yombi nari ebigyere byombi.
Kandi n'eriisho ryawe ku riraakureetere kukora ekibi, oriihemu orinagye hare; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara oine eriisho rimwe, okukira okunagwa omuri Gehena ey'omuriro oine amaisho gombi.
Ahabw'okuba Omwana w'omuntu akaija kujuna ekyabaire kibuzire.
Nimuteekateeka muta? Omuntu ku aba aine entaama igana, emwe aharizo yaarara, tatsiga ziri makumi mwenda na mwenda aha mugongo, akaza kusherura egyo erazire?
Kandi ku agibona, buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Agishemerererwa okukira ziri makumi mwenda na mwenda ezaaba zitarazire.
Nikwo na Tata ori omu iguru atarikwenda omwe ahari aba bato kuhwerekyerera.
Ku araayangye kukworobera, otware ondiijo nari babiri, ngu ekigambo kyona kihamibwe baakareebi babiri nari bashatu.
Nabo ku araayangye kuboorobera, okugambire ekanisa; kandi ku araayangye kworobera ekanisa, abe nk'omunyaihanga n'omuhooza ahariiwe.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ebi muriboha omu nsi byona, biryabohwa n'omu iguru; kandi ebi murikomoorora omu nsi byona, biryakomoororwa n'omu iguru.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Babiri ahariimwe ku barikwatansia omu nsi, baashaba ekintu kyona, kiryabakorerwa Tata ori omu iguru.
Ahabw'okuba babiri nari bashatu ku bariteeranira ahamwe omu iziina ryangye, naanye ndyaba ahagati yaabo.
Bwanyima Petero yaija, yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, mugyenzi wangye ku araagume nanshaagiza, mmusaasire kangahi? Mpitsye emirundi mushanju?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Tindikukugira nti, Ohitsye emirundi mushanju, kureka nti, Ohitsye emirundi makumi mushanju emirundi mushanju.
N'ahabw'ekyo obukama bw'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa n'omugabe owaayenzire kubara
Ku yaatandikire kubara, baamureetera omwe owaabaire aine eibanja rye ery'etalanta kakumi.
Ku yaabuzire eky'okwihura, mukama we yaaragiira ku bamutunda, we n'omukazi we n'abaana be n'ebi yaabaire aine byona, ngu abone kumara eibanja.
Omwambari ogwo nikwo kumukwata amaguru akamweshengyereza, naagira ati: Mukama wangye, nyihuza mpora, naanye ndyakwihura byona.
Mukama
Kwonka omwambari ogwo, ku yaashohoire, yaabugana omwambari mugyenzi we, owaabaire aine eibanja rye ery'edenaari igana; yaamukwata, yaamuta aha munigo, naagira ati: Nyihura eibanja ryangye.
Ogwo mwambari mugyenzi we yaamukwata amaguru, yaamweshengyereza ati: Nyihuza mpora, niinyija kukwihura.
We yaayanga, yaagyenda, yaamuta omu kihome, okuhitsya obu araaheze eibanja.
Mbwenu abambari bagyenzi be, ku baareebire ebyabaho, baamugwerwa kubi munonga; baagyenda baabigambira mukama waabo byona.
Mukama waabo nikwo kumutuma, akamujuukirira ati: Iwe mwambari 'we omubi, nkusaasiire eibanja eryo ryona ahabw'okuunyeshengyereza;
naiwe toshemereire kusaasira omwambari mugyenzi waawe, nk'oku nkusaasiire?
Mukama we yaamugwerwa kubi, yaamuhayo omu mikono y'abarinzi, okuhitsya obu ariihura eibanja ryona.
Nikwo Tata ow'omu iguru aribagira atyo, ku muriba mutasaasiire bagyenzi baanyu, mwihire aha mutima.
emitwe y'abantu baingi yaamukuratira, yaabakirizayo.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Timukashomaga ngu, Owaabahangire bwa mbere na mbere, akahanga omushaija n'omukazi?
Yaagira ati: Omushaija nikyo atsigiraho ishe na nyina, akaguma n'omukazi we; nabo bombi bakahinduka omuntu omwe.
Baba batakiri babiri kureka omwe. N'ahabw'ekyo eki Ruhanga yaateeraine hamwe, omuntu atarikitaanisa.
Baagaruka baamubuuza bati: Ku kiraabe kiri kityo, ahabw'enki Musa akaragiira omuntu kuha ebaruha y'okutaana, ngu abone kushenda omukazi we?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ahabw'obugangaazi bw'emitima yaanyu Musa nikyo yaikiririize ku mutaana n'abakazi baanyu, kwonka bwa mbere na mbere kikaba kitari kityo.
Kandi naanye nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena orishenda omukazi we atamutuzire bushambani, akashwera ondiijo, aryaba ashambaine; kandi n'orishwera oshenzirwe nawe aryaba ashambaine.
Abeegi be baamugira bati: Eby'omushaija n'omukazi ku biraabe nikwo biri, ti kirungi kushwera.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Abantu abarikubaasa kwemera ekigambo ekyo ti boona, kureka abo abakihairwe.

Nimumanya ngu hariho abakonwa abaazairwe batyo okuruga omu nda za baanyinabo; hariho n'abakonwa abaakonirwe abantu; kandi hariho abakonwa abaayekonire ahabw'obukama bw'omu iguru. Orikubaasa kwemera ekyo, akyemere.
Kwonka Yesu yaabagira ati: Murekye abaana bato baije ahariinye, mutabazibira; ahabw'okuba obukama bw'omu iguru n'obw'abari nk'aba.
Yaabataho engaro, yaarugayo.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Nombuuriza ki aha kirungi? Omurungi n'omwe. Ku oraabe nooyenda kutaaha omu magara, oyorobere ebiragiro.
Onu yaamubuuza ati: Nibiiha? Yesu ati: Otariita, Otarishambana, Otariiba, Otaribeiherera abandi;
Otiine sho na nyoko; kandi Okunde mutaahi waawe, nk'oku oyekunda.
Omutsigazi ogwo yaamugarukamu ati: Ebyo byona nkabyorobera; ekindi ekimbuzireho niki?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ku oraabe nooyenda kuba ohikire, gyenda otunde ebi oine byona; ebi oraihemu, obihe abooro; naiwe oryatunga eitungo omu iguru; haza oije onkuratire.
Omutsigazi ku yaahuriire ekigambo ekyo, yaagyenda aine enaku nyingi, ahabw'okuba akaba aine eitungo ringi.
Yesu yaagambira abeegi be ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Kigumire omutungi okutaaha omu bukama bw'omu iguru.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Nikirahuka engamira kuraba omu nyindo y'empitirizo, okukira omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Abeegi be, ku baakihuriire, baatangaara munonga, baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu shi hoona, n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa?
Yesu yaabareeba, yaabagarukamu ati: Ekyo tikirikubaasika ha bantu; kwonka ahari Ruhanga byona nibibaasika.
Petero nikwo kumugambira ati: Reeba itwe tukatsigaho byona, twakukuratira. Mbwenu turyatunga ki?

Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omu bunaku obu ebintu birihindukiramu bisya, Omwana w'omuntu ku arishutama aha kitebe ky'ekitiinisa kye, imwe abankuratiire muryashutama aha bitebe ikumi na bibiri, mucwere enganda za Israeli ikumi na ibiri emanja.
Omuntu weena owaatsigireho amaju, beene ishe, banyaanya, ishe, nyina, abaana nari ebibanja ahabw'eiziina ryangye, aryaheebwa nk'ebyo emirundi igana, kandi ahungure amagara agatahwaho.
Ahakuba obukama bw'omu iguru nibushusha nk'omushaija nyineeka, owaimukire kare omu kasheeshe kugurira ab'okuhinga omu musiri gwe gw'emizaabibu.
Ku yaaherize kuragaana nabo edenaari emwe ahabw'eizooba rimwe, yaaboohereza omu musiri gwe gw'emizaabibu.
Aha shaaha ya kashatu yaashohora, yaareeba abandi beemereire omu katare, bataine ki barikukora;
yaabagambira ati: Naimwe mugyende omu musiri gw'emizaabibu, niinyija kubaha ekibashemereire. Baagyenda.
Yaayongyera yaashohora aha shaaha ya mukaaga n'aha ya mwenda, naatwaza atyo.
Haihi n'eshaaha ya ikumi n'emwe yaashohora, yaashanga abandi beemereire, yaababuuza ati: N'enki ekibeemereize aho eizooba ryona, mutaine ki murikukora?
Baamugarukamu bati: Ahabw'okuba tihaine owaatuha omurimo. Yaabagira ati: Naimwe mwirooko muze omu musiri gw'emizaabibu.
Ku bwaizire, mukama w'omusiri gw'emizaabibu yaagira omunyampara we ati: Yeta abakozi, obahe ebihembo byabo, obandize aha ba bwanyima, okuhitsya aha baabanza.
Abaatandikire eshaaha ya ikumi n'emwe ku baizire, baihurwa edenaari emwe buri omwe.
Kandi abaabandize ku baizire, baagira ngu nibaija kwihurwa okukiraho; kwonka nabo baihurwa edenaari emwe buri omwe.
Ku baagihairwe, baayetomboitera nyineeka,
nibagira bati: Aba aba bwanyima baakora eshaaha emwe yonka, mbwenu waabainganisa naitwe abaahendeka eizooba ryona, tukaitwa omushana?
We yaagarukamu, naagira omwe aharibo ati: Mugyenzi wangye, tiinyine ki naakushaagiza. Torikumanya ku twaragaana edenaari emwe?
Twara eyaawe, ogyende; n'owa bwanyima naasiima kumuha nkaimwe.
Hariho ekirikunzibira kutwza ebyangye nk'oku ndikwenda? Nonteera ekitsyori ahabw'obufura bwangye?
Nikwo aba bwanyima bariba ab'okubanza, n'ab'okubanza bakaba aba bwanyima.
Reeba, nitwinamuka Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo aha banyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki; nabo bamucwere orubanja rw'okumwita;
kandi bamuheyo aha banyamahanga kumushungisa, n'okumwasha, n'okumubamba aha musharaba; kandi aha kiro kya kashatu aryazooka.
Yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda ki? Yaamugarukamu ati: Ragiira batabani bangye bombi bashutame omwe aha rubaju rwawe rwa buryo n'ondi aha rwa bumosho omu bukama bwawe.
Yaabagira ati: Ekikopo kyangye kyo muryakinywaho buzima; kwonka okunshutama aha rubaju rwa buryo, nari shi orwa bumosho, tiinye nkuha, kureka kuryaheebwa abo abu Tata yaakucumiire.
Kandi eikumi, ku baabihuriire, baagwerwa kubi enyineemwe ezo zombi.
Yesu yaabeeta, yaabagira ati: Nimumanya abakuru b'abanyamahanga ku babategyekyesa eikama, n'abakuru baabo bakabaragiiza obushoboorozi;
kwonka omuriimwe tikwo kiriba; weena orikwenda kuba mukuru omuriimwe, ashemereire kuba omuheereza waanyu;
n'orikwenda kuba ow'okubanza omuriimwe ashemereire kuba omuhuuku waanyu;
l nk'Omwana w'omuntu oku ataizire kuheerezibwa, kureka okuheereza abandi, n'okuhayo amagara ge okucungura baingi.
Kandi empumi ibiri zikaba zishutami aha rubaju rw'omuhanda. Ku zaahuriire ngu Yesu naahingura, zaayeta nizigira ziti: Mukama waitu, Mwana wa Daudi, otugirire embabazi!
Ab'omu mutwe baaziteisa ngu zicureere;
kwonka zo zaagumizamu nizeeta munonga ziti: Mukama waitu, Mwana wa Daudi, otugirire embabazi!
Yesu nikwo kwemerera, akazeeta, akazibuuza ati: Nimwenda ngu mbakorere ki?
Zikamugarukamu ziti: Mukama waitu, nitwenda ngu amaisho gaitu gahumuukye.
Yesu yaazigirira embabazi, yaakora aha maisho gaazo; ahonaaho zaahumuuka, zaamukuratira.
yaabagira ati: Mugyende omu kirorero ekibari omumaisho; ahonaaho nimwija kushangamu endogoya etsibikire n'omwana gwayo; muzitsibure, muzindeetere.
Omuntu weena ku araababuuze, mumugarukyemu muti: Mukama waitu naazenda. Ahonnaaho mukama waazo naija kuzoohereza.
Eki kikabaho okuhikiiriza ekyagambirwe nabi ati:
Reeba, Mukama waawe naija ah'ori,
Omucureezi, atembire endogoya,
Endogoya nto, omwana gw'endogoya.
Abeegi be baagyenda, baakora nk'oku Yesu yaabaragiira,
baareeta endogoya n'omwana gwayo, baazaaraho ebijwaro byabo; yaabishutamaho.
Abaingi baayarira ebijwaro byabo omu nguuto, abandi baatema amababi g'ebiti, baagariira omu nguuto.

Abaamushendekyereize bamwebembeire, n'abandi bamuri enyima nibagyenda nibeeshongora n'eiraka rihango, nibagira bati: Hosana aha Mwana wa Daudi! Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe! Hosana ahaiguru ya byona!
Ku yaataahire Yerusaalemu, orurembo rwona rwajagarara, abantu baabuuzana bati: Ogu n'oha?
Abaizire nawe baagarukamu bati: Ni nabi Yesu owaarugire Nazareesi eya Galilaaya.
yaabagira ati: Kikahandiikwa ngu, Enju yangye eryayetwa enju y'okushabiramu; mbwenu imwe mugihindwire nk'enyanga y'abambuzi.
Kandi empumi n'abarikucumbagira baija baamushanga omuri hekalu, yaabakiza.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki ku baareebire eby'okutangaaza ebi yaakozire, baahurira n'abaana nibeeshongorera omuri hekalu bati: Hosana aha Mwana wa Daudi, baaguubwa kubi munonga;
baamugira bati: Beitu ohuriire ebi aba barikugamba? Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Eego! Imwe timukashomaga ngu,
Omu kanwa k'abaana bato n'abarikwonka
Okatamu okuhimbisa okuhikire?
Yaabatsigaho, yaashohora omu rurembo, yaataaha Besania, yaaraarayo.
Omu kasheeshe ku yaabaire naagaruka omu rurembo, yaagira enjara.
Ku yaareebire omutiini aha rubaju rw'omuhanda, yaaguhikaho, tiyaagushangaho kantu kureka omubengyeyo gw'amababi. Yaagugira ati: Otaryana ebyana ebiro byona. Ahonaaho omutiini gwayoma.
Abeegi ku baakireebire, baatangaara nibagira bati: Omutiini gwarahuka guta kwoma?

Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ku murigira okwikiriza, mutarikubanganisa, timurikora eki ekyakorwa aha mutiini ogwo kyonka; nangwa n'obu muriragiira orushozi oru muti, Tsinduka onagwe omu nyanja, nikwo kiriba kityo.
Byona ebi muryenda omu kashaba kwanyu, mwabishaba mwine okwikiriza, muryabiheebwa.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Reka naanye mbabuuze ekigambo kimwe; ku murangarukyemu, naanye niinyija kubashobororera obushoboorozi obunkoresa ebi.

Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga nkahi? Omu iguru nari omu bantu? Baayegarukanamu bonka, nibagira bati: Ku turaagire tuti, Kukaruga omu iguru, naatugarukamu ati, Kandi shi, n'enki ekyabazibiire kumwikiriza?
Kandi turaagizire tuti, Kukaruga omu bantu, nitutiina abantu; ahabw'okuba boona nibahamya ku Yohaana yaabaire ari nabi.
Baamugarukamu bati: Titurikuhamanya. Yesu nikwo kubagira ati: Naanye tindikubagambira bushoborozi oburikunkoresa ebi.
Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta ahari ebyo? Omushaija akaba aine abatabani babiri; yaaragiira ow'omujigaijo ati: Mwana wangye, irooko okore omu musiri gwangye ogw'emizaabibu eri izooba.
Yaayanga ati: Tindikuzayo; kwonka bwanyima yaayeteisa, yaazayo.
Yaaza aha murumuna, nawe yaamuragiira nk'ebyo; yaamwikiriza ati: Eego Taata, ka ngyende; kwonka tiyaazayo.

Ahari abo bombi n'oha owaakozire eki ishe yaabaire naakunda? Banu bati: Ow'omujigaijo. Yesu yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Abahooza na baamaraaya nibaija kubabandiza kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.

Ahabw'okuba Yohaana akaija ahariimwe arabire omu muhanda gw'okuhikiirira, timwamwikiriza; kwonka abahooza na baamaraaaya bakamwikiriza; naimwe, n'obu mwabireebire mutyo, bwanyima timureefurize, mukamzwikiriza.
Mbwenu obunaku bw'okwera ku bwahikire, yaatuma abahuuku be ahari abo bahingi, ngu bamutwekyere aha byana by'emizaabibu ye.
Abahingi baakwata abo bahuuku be, omwe baamuteera, ondiijo baamwita, n'ondiijo baamuteera amabaare.
Yaagaruka yaatuma abandi bahuuku baingi okukira ab'okubanza; nabo baabatwaza batyo.
Bwanyima yaabatumaho omwana we, naagira ati: Omwana wangye baryamuha ekitiinisa.
Kwonka abahingi ku baareebire omwana we, baagambirana bati: Ogu niwe muhunguzi; murekye tumwite, tutungye obuhunguzi bwe.
Baamukwata, baamubinga omu musiri gw'emizaabibu, baamwita.
Mbwenu mukama w'emizaabibu, ku ariija, aryagira ata abo bahingi?
Baamugarukamu bati: Abagomi abo aryabaita kubi, n'emizaabibu ye aryagitsigamu abandi bahingi, abariguma nibamutwekyera ebyana byayo omu bunaku bwabyo.
Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire
Niryo ryahindukire erikuru ery'obuhamizo bw'enju;
Ekyo kikaruga ahari Mukama,
Kandi n'eky'okutangaaza omu maisho gaitu.
Nikyo ndikubagirira nti: Obukama bwa Ruhanga buryabaakwa, buheebwe eihanga eririkwana ebyana byabwo.
Omuntu weena origwa aha ibaare eryo aryacwagurika; kwonka ou ririgwera, riryamucwa obusaasingo.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo, ku baahuriire enfumu ze, baamanya ku nibo arikurengyeza.
Baayenda kumukwata; kwonka baatiina abantu, ahabw'okuba abantu bakaba nibahamya ku ari nabi.
Kandi Yesu yaagaruka yaabacwera enfumu naagira ati:
Obukama bw'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa n'omugabe owaataahize omwana we obugyenyi bw'okushwera.
Obugyenyi ku bwahikire, yaatuma abahuuku be kweta abeetsirwe, baayanga kwija.

Yaagaruka yaatuma abandi bahuuku, yaabagira ati: Mwirooko mungirire abeetsirwe muti: Reeba nteekateekire eby'okugabura, enimi n'enyana z'ebishaju zangye ziitsirwe, byona byatebeekaine, mwije mutaahe obugyenyi.
Kwonka tibaabitaho mutima, baayegyendera, omwe omu kibanja kye, ondiijo omu mirimo ye,
n'abaatsigaireho baakwata abahuuku be, baabahemangura, baabaita.
Omugabe yaakwatwa ekiniga, yaayohereza engabo ze, yaahwerekyereza abaitsi abo, yaayotsya orurembo rwabo.
Bwanyima yaagira abahuuku be ati: Obugyenyi bwatebeekaine, kwonka abeetsirwe tibabushemereire.
Mbwenu mugyende ahu emihanda y'omu rurembo erikuteeranira; abu muraareebeyo boona mubeete baije bataahe obugyenyi.
N'abahuuku abo baaza omuri egyo mihanda, baayeta boona abu baareebire, ababi n'abarungi; enju yaijura abagyenyi.
Omugabe ku yaizire kureeba abagyenyi, yaashangamu omushaija otajwaire kijwaro ky'obugyenyi.
Yaamubuuza ati: Mugyenzi wangye, waija ota aha otajwaire kijwaro ky'obugyenyi. Yaabura eky'okumugarukamu.
Omugabe nikwo kuragiira abambari be ati: Mumubohe emikono n'amaguru, mumunagye aheeru omu mwirima; okwo niyo abantu bariririra, bakanene enshaya.
Ahakuba abeetwa ni baingi, kwonka abatooranwa ni bakye.

Batyo baamutumaho abeegi baabo hamwe n'aba Heroode, baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, nitumanya ku ori ow'amazima, ku oyegyesa omuhanda gwa Ruhanga omu mazima, kandi ku otagwera rubaju rw'omuntu weena orutahikire, ahakuba totiinisibwa kitiinisa ky'omuntu.
Mbwenu otugambire eki orikuteekateeka. Ebiragiro nibiikiriza kuha Kaisaari omushoro, nari tikwo?
Kwonka Yesu ku yaamanyire obugobya bwabyo, yaagira ati: Nimuntegyera ki, imwe ndyarya 'mwe?
Muunyorekye empiiha ei mushora. Baamureetera edenaari.
Yaababuuza ati: Ekishushani eki n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha?
Baamugarukamu bati: N'ebya Kaisaari. Yesu yaabagira ati: Mbwenu ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.
Ku baabihuriire, baatangaara, baamurugaho, baagyenda.
Mwegyesa, Musa akagira ati: Omuntu ku arifa atakazaire, omurumuna ashemereire kuhungura omufaakazi ogwo, amumuzaarireho abaana.
Mbwenu owaitu hakaba hariyo enyineemwe mushanju. Ow'okubanza akashwera omukazi, yaafa; ahabw'okufa atakazaire, omukazi we yaamuraga owa kabiri.
Nikwo batyo owa kabiri n'owa kashatu, okuhika aha wa mushanju.
Boona ku baahweireho, omukazi nawe yaafa.
Mbwenu omu kuzooka aryaba muka oha ahari abo mushanju? Ahabw'okuba boona omushanju akabaho omukazi waabo.
Yesu yaabagarukamu naabagira ati: Muhabire, ahabw'okutamanya Ebyahandiikirwe n'obu gaakuba amaani ga Ruhanga.
Mumanye ngu omu kuzooka tibarishwera, kandi tibarishwerwa, kureka baryaba nka baamaraika b'omu iguru.
Ebirikukwata aha by'okuzooka kw'abafu, timukashomaga eki Ruhanga yaabagambiire ati:
Nyowe ndi Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo? Ti Ruhanga w'abafu, kureka Ow'abahuriire.
Abantu ku bakihuriire, baatangaarira okwegyesa kwe.
Omwe aharibo, omwegyesa w'Ebiragiro, yaamubuuza naamutega ati:
Mwegyesa, ekiragiro ekikuru omu biragiro nikiiha?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Kunda Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'amagara gaawe goona, n'obwengye bwawe bwona.
Eki nikyo kiragiro kikuru kandi eky'okubanza.
Ekya kabiri ekirikukishusha n'eki: Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda.
Omu biragiro ebi byombi Ebiragiro byona n'ebya Baanabi nimwo bikomooka.
Kristo nimumuteekateekaho muta? N'Omwana w'oha? Baamugarukamu bati: N'Omwana wa Daudi.
Yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Kandi shi ahanki Daudi, obu yaagambisibwa Omwoyo Orikwera, akamweta Mukama we ati:
Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
Okuhitsya obu ndita abazigu baawe ahansi y'ebigyere byawe.
Beitu shi, Daudi ku araabe yaayetsire Kristo Mukama we, kandi Kristo ogwo naabaasa ata kuba Omwana we?
Kandi tihariho n'omwe owaabaasize kumugarukamu ekigambo; n'okuruga aha kiro ekyo tihaine waayehangire kumubuuza ebindi bibuuzo.
Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo bashutama aha kitebe kya Musa.
N'ahabw'ekyo ebi babaragiira byona, mubikore, kandi mubihitsye; kwonka mutarikora nk'oku bakora; ahabw'okuba bagamba, kwonka tibakora.
Bakoma emitwaro erikuremeera, etarikubaasa kwekorerwa, bagyekoreza abantu aha mabega; kwonka bo tibenda kugitenzyaho n'orukumu rwabo.
Ebi bakora byona babikora kureebwa abantu; bahangutsya
bakunda emyanya y'ekitiinisa omu magyenyi, n'ebitebe by'ekitiinisa omuri sinagogi,
n'okutangirirwa omu katare, n'okwetwa abantu Rabi.
Kwonka imwe mutaryetwa Rabi, ahabw'okuba Omwegyesa waanyu n'omwe, kandi naimwe mwena muri eishe-emwe.
Kandi mutaryeta omuntu weena ow'omu nsi Shoimwe; ahabw'okuba mwine Shoimwe omwe ori omu iguru.
Kandi mutaryetwa abakama, ahabw'okuba mwine Omukama omwe, niwe Kristo.
Orikukira obukuru omuriimwe aryaba omuheereza waanyu;
orikwetunguura aryagarurwa ahansi; kandi orikwegarura ahansi, aryatunguurwa.

Kwonka muryakareeba, imwe Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, endyarya! Ahabw'okuba mukinga obukama bw'omu iguru, ngu abantu batabutaahamu; imwe mwenka timubutaahamu, kandi abarikwenda kubutaahamu, timubaikiriza.

Muryakareeba, imwe Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, endyarya; ahabw'okuba munyaga enju z'abafaakazi, kandi murandagatana omu kushaba, haza kunu nimuryarya; n'ahabw'ekyo muryacwerwa orubanja orurikukira obuhango.

Muryakareeba, imwe Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, endyarya, ahabw'okuba mwambuka enyanja, mugyendagyenda n'omu mahanga kuhindura omuntu omwe, ngu aikirize ediini yaanyu; kandi ku mumubona, mumuhindura omwana wa Gehena okukira emwe kabiri.
Imwe bashema 'mwe kandi empumi, ekirikukira obukuru n'enki, n'ezaabu, nari ni hekalu erikweza ezaabu?
Kandi nimugira ngu, Orikurahira eitambiro, ti rubanja; kureka ngu Orikurahira empongano eri aha itambiro, ashemereire kuhikiiriza eki yaarahiire kukora.
Imwe mpumi 'mwe! ekirikukira obukuru n'enki, n'empongano, nari n'eitambiro eririkweza empongano?
Mumanye ngu orikurahira eitambiro, biri arirahiire n'ebiririho byona;
kandi orikurahira hekalu biri agirahiire n'Ogwo ogituuramu.
N'orikurahira eiguru, biri arahiire ekitebe kya Ruhanga n'Ogwo okishutamaho.
Imwe abeebembezi empumi, abagyegyena omubu, mukamira engamira!
Iwe Omufarisaayo empumi, banza oyozye omunda y'enkyeka n'orwabya, aharuguru yaabyo habone kushemera.
Muryakareeba, imwe abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, endyarya ahabw'okuba nimushusha nk'ebituuro ebisiigire einoni; aharuguru bikareebeka nk'ebishemeire, haza omunda biijwire amagufa n'oburofa bwona.
Nikwo naimwe omu by'aharuguru mureebeka nka'abahikiriire omu maisho g'abantu, kwonka omunda mwijwire oburyarya n'obugomi.
Muryakareeba, imwe abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo, endyarya, ahabw'okuba mwombeka ebituuro bya baanabi, musharura ebiijutsyo by'abahikiriire,
nimugira ngu, Kuri twabaire turiho omu biro bya baatatenkuriitwe, titwakukwataniise nabo omu kusheesha eshagama ya baanabi.
Okwo nikwo mweshinja ku muri abaana b'abo abaitsire baanabi.
Mbwenu nu nimwijuze orugyero rwa baashwenkuriimwe.
Imwe enjoka kandi abaana b'encwera, muryakira muta orubanja rwa Gehena?

N'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kubatumaho baanabi n'abanyabwengye n'abahandiiki; abamwe aharibo muryabaita, abandi muryababamba, n'abandi muryabateerera omuri sinagogi zaanyu; muryabahiiga, mubabingye omuri tauni zoona ezi barihungiramu,

ngu mubone kutukurirwa eshagama y'abarikwera yoona eyaaseesirwe omu nsi, okwiha aha shagama ya Abeeli ohikiriire okuhitsya aha shagama ya Zakaria mwene Barakia, ou mwaitiire ahagati ya hekalu n'eitambiro.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ebyo byona biryahika aha bantu b'obusingye obu.
Reeba, enju yaanyu etsigirweho n'omushaka.
Nimbagambira nti: Timurindeeba okuruga hati okuhitsya obu murigira muti: Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe!
We yaabagarukamu, naagira ati: Timurikureeba ebi byona? Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tihariho ibaare eriritsigara riri aha rindi eritarinagwa ahansi.

Ku yaabaire ashutami omu kibungo kya Zeituuni, abeegi be baija ah'ari omu mubonano, baamubuuza bati: Tugambire ebi ahu biribeeraho, n'akamanyiso k'okwija kwawe oku kariba, n'ak'obunaku obu ensi egi erihweraho.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Mwerinde, omuntu weena ataribahabisa;
ahabw'okuba baingi baryaija omu iziina ryangye, nibagira bati: Niinye Krito! Kandi baryahabisa baingi.
Kandi muryahurira engamba n'okurangaanwa kwazo; mwerinde, mutaryemereza emitima, ahakuba ebyo byona tibiribura kwija; kwonka emperu yo eryaba etakahikire.
Eihanga riryateera erindi ihanga, n'obugabe buryateera obundi bugabe; haryabaho enjara n'emitsitsa omu myanya mingi.
Ebyo byona niyo ntandikiro y'obusaasi.
Omu biro ebyo baingi baryagwa, bareebyane, bangane.
Haryaimuka baanabi baingi b'ebishuba, bahabise baingi.
Ahabw'obugomi kukanya, okukunda kw'abaingi kuryahora.
Kwonka origumisiriza okuhitsya aha muheru, niwe arijunwa.
Kandi engiri egi ey'obukama eryagambwa omu nsi zoona okuba eky'okuhamya aha mahanga goona; obwo nibwo emperu erihika.
abo abariba bari Buyudaaya omu bunaku obwo bahungire aha nshozi;
n'ori aha mutwe gw'enju ataritemburuka ngu agire ebi aiha omu nju ye;
n'oriba ari omu misiri atarigarukayo kwenda ekijwaro kye.
Abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya omu biro ebyo baryakareeba!
Mushabe okuhunga kwanyu kutaribaho omu biro by'embeho nari ahari Sabato;
ahabw'okuba omu biro ebyo haryabaho okubonabona kwingi okutakabahoga okwiha aha kuhangwa kw'ensi okuhitsya hati, kandi tikuribaho.
Ebiro ebyo kuri bitaracwireho, tihaakurokokireho muntu n'omwe; kwonka ahabw'entoore ebiro ebyo biryacuubwaho.
Omu biro ebyo omuntu weena ku aribagira ati: Reeba, Kristo ari aha! nari shi, ari hariya, mutarimwikiriza;
ahakuba haryaimuka abarikweyeta Kristo na baanabi b'ebishuba, baryakora obumanyiso bukuru n'eby'okutangaaza, babone kuhabisa n'entoore, kyaba nikibaasika.
Reeba naabibagambira bitakahikire.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku baribagira bati: Reeba, ari omu ihamba, mutarizayo; nari ngu, ari omu kishengye, mutarikiikiriza.
Nk'oku omurabyo gurabiza oburugwa-izooba gukahika oburengyerwa-izooba, nikwo n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu kuriba.
Ahu omutumbi guri hoona, niho amahungu gateeranira.
obwo akamanyiso k'Omwana w'omutu karyareebeka omu iguru, amahanga goona ag'ensi garyacura, kandi baryareeba Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru, aine obushoboorozi n'ekitiinisa kingi.
Aryatuma baamaraika be n'eiraka rihango ry'enzamba, bateerane entoore ze nibazitaaruura omu mbaju ina okuruga aha muheru gw'eiguru okuhika aha gundi.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwegyere aha mutiini nk'eky'okureeberaho; eitaagi ryagwo ku ryoroba, ryatooka amababi, mumanya ku omwaka guri haihi.
Mutyo naimwe ku murireeba ebyo byona, mumanye ku ari haihi, ku yaahikire n'aha rwigi.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Obusingye obu tiburihwaho, okuhitsya obu ebi byona biribaho.
Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho, kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho.
Kwonka eby'ekyo kiro n'obwo bunaku tihaine orikubimanya, n'obu baakuba baamaraika b'omu iguru, n'obu yaakuba Omwana, kureka Isheboona wenka.
Nk'ebiro bya Noa oku byabaire biri, nikwo n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu kuriba.
Ahakuba nk'oku baabaire bari omu biro ebyo ebyabandiize omwegyemure gw'amaizi, nibarya kandi nibanywa, nibashwera, nibahingira, okuhitsya aha kiro eki Noa yaataahiireho omu bwato;
bakaba bari aho bataine ki barikumanya, okuhitsya obu omwegyemure gw'amaizi gwaizire, gukabatwara boona; n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo kuriba kutyo.
Obwo abashaija babiri baryaba bari omu musiri, omwe aryatwarwa, ondiijo atsigweho.
Abakazi babiri baryaba nibasa aha rubengo; omwe aryatwarwa, ondiijo atsigweho.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba, ahakuba timurikumanya kiro eki Mukama waanyu ariiziraho.
Mumanye ngu, kuri nyineeka yaamanyire obunaku nyekiro obu omushuma araiziremu, akaagumire naareeba, areka kwikiriza omushuma kurima n'okutaaho mu nju ye.
N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe mweteguure, ahabw'okuba obunaku obu mutarikuteekateeka, nibwo Omwana w'omuntu ariiziramu.
Ni
Aine omugisha omwambari ogwo, ou mukama we arigaruka akashanga naakora atyo.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Aryamukwatsa ebi atungire byona.
Kwonka omwambari omubi, ku ariteekateeka omu mutima gwe ati: Mukama wangye atwireyo,
akatandika kuteera abambari bagyenzi be, akarya kandi akanywa n'abasinzi,
mukama w'omwambari ogwo aryaija aha izooba eri atamutegyerereizeho, n'obunaku obu atarikumanya,
aryamutemamu habiri, amuhe omugabo gwe n'endyarya; okwo niyo abantu bariririra, bakanena enshaya.
Bataano aharibo bakaba bari abashema, n'abandi bataano bari ab'obwengye;
ahakuba abashema ku baatwaire etabaaza zaabo, tibaatwara gandi majuta;
kwonka ab'obwengye baatwara amajuta omu cupa hamwe n'etabaaza zaabo.
Kandi kishwera ku yairiirweyo, boona baahungira, baagwejegyera.
Bwanyima nyekiro omu itumbi haabaho orwari ngu: Reeba, kishwera yaija! Mushohore tumubugane.
Abaishiki abo baimuka, baashemeza etabaaza zaabo.
Abashema baashaba ab'obwengye bati: Mutuhe aha majuta gaanyu, ahakuba etabaaza zaitu zaaza kuraara.
Ab'obwengye baagarukamu bati: Nooshusha oti, tigarikutumarira twena; kureka mugyende ahu barikugatundira; mwegurire.
Ku baabaire bagiire kugura, kishwera yaija; abaabaire beeteekateekire baataaha nawe omu nju omu bugyenyi bw'okushwera; orwigi rwakingwa.
Bwanyima abaishiki abo abandi nabo baija, nibagira hati: Mukama waitu, Mukama waitu, twigurireho.
We yaabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tindikubamanya.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba, ahabw'okuba timurikumanya kiro n'obu yaakuba eshaaha.
Omwe yaamuha etalanta itaano, ondi ibiri, n'ondiijo emwe, nka buri omwe oku yaabaire naabaasa; yaaheza, yaagyenda.
Owaahairwe etalanta itaano ahonaaho yaagyenda, yaazishuubuza, yaashaazyamu ezindi itaano.
N'owaahairwe ibiri nawe yaashaazyamu atyo ezindi ibiri.
Kwonka owaahairwe emwe yaagyenda, yaatimba omu itaka, yaasherekamu etalanta ya mukama we.
Ebiro bingi ku byahingwireho, mukama w'abambari abo yaagaruka, yaabara nabo ebi yaabatsigiire.
Owaahairwe etalanta itaano, yaija yaareeta ezindi itaano, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, okantsigira etalanta itaano; reeba nshaagizemu ezindi itaano.
Mukama we yaamugira ati: Kazaare, iwe omwambari omurungi orikwesigwa! Obaire omwesigwa omuri bikye, ndyakuha obushoboorozi kutegyeka bingi; taaha omu kushemererwa kwa mukama waawe.
Owaahairwe etalanta ibiri nawe yaija, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, okantsigira etalanta ibiri; reeba nshaagizemu ezindi ibiri.
Mukama we yaagira ati: Kazaare, iwe omwambari omurungi orikwesigwa! Obaire omwesigwa omuri bikye; ndyakuha obushoboorozi kutegyeka bingi; taaha omu kushemererwa kwa mukama waawe.
Kandi n'ogwo owaahairwe etalanta emwe yaija, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, nkamanya ku ori omuntu ogumire, ogyesha ahu otarabibire, kandi ohunika ebi otaraheheerize;
n'ahabw'ekyo nkatiina, naagyenda naashereka etalanta yaawe omu itaka. Reeba ngigi, ogigarukane.
Muakama we nikwo kumugarukamu ati: Iwe omwambari omubi kandi omweremwa! Okamanya ku ngyesha ahu ntarabibire, nkahunika ebi ntaraheheerize.
N'ahabw'ekyo okaba oshemereire kuha etaanta yangye ababiiki b'empiiha, naanye ku naakwizire, nkaagigaruriirwe n'enshaagi yaayo.
Mbwenu mugimwakye, mugihe oine etalanta ikumi.
Ahakuba oine niwe ariheebwa, akagira bingi; kwonka otaine aryayakwa n'eki aine.
N'omwambari ogwo otaine mugasho, mumunagye aheeru omu mwirima; okwo niyo abantu bariririra, bakanena enshaya.
amahanga goona gateeranirwe omu maisho ge; kandi aryagashoroora, nk'oku omuriisa ashoroora entaama omu mbuzi.
Entaama aryazita aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, kwonka embuzi aryazita aha rwa bumosho.
Obwo Mukama aryagira ab'aha rubaju rwa buryo ati: Mwije, imwe abu Tata yaahaire omugisha, muhungure obukama obwabateekateekyeirwe okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi;
ahakuba nkaba nyine enjara, mwampa eby'okurya; nkaba nyine eiriho, mwampa eky'okunywa; nkaba ndi omugyenyi, mwankunira;
nkaba njwaire busha, mwanjweka; nkaba ndwaire, mwaija kundeeba; nkaba ndi omu kihome, mwantaayaayira.
Abahikiriire baryamubuuza bati: Mukama waitu, tukakureeba ryari oine enjara, tukakuha eby'okurya, nari oine eiriho tukakuha eky'okunywa?
Tukakureeba ryari ori omugyenyi tukakukunira, nari ojwaire busha tukakujweka?
Tukakureeba ryari orwaire, nari ori omu kihome tukaija kukureeba?
Mukama aryabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Nk'oku mwabikoreire omwe ahari beene Tata abo abato okukira abandi, biri niinye mwabikoreire.
ahakuba nkaba nyine enjara, timwampa by'okurya; nyine eiriho, timwampa ky'okunywa;
nkaba ndi omugyenyi, timwankunira; njwaire busha, timwanjweka; ndwaire kandi ndi omu kihome, timwaija kundeeba.
Nabo baryamugarukamu bati: Mukama waitu, tukakureeba ryari oine enjara, nari oine eiriho, nari ori omugyenyi, nari ojwaire busha, nari orwaire, nari ori omu kihome, tukabura eki twakukorera?
Nawe aryabagarukamu ati: Nk'oku mutarabikoreire omwe ahari abo abato okukira abandi, biri naanye timurabinkoreire.
Abo baryaza omu kubonabonesibwa okw'ebiro n'ebiro, kwonka abahikiriire bo baryataaha omu magara agatahwaho.
Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo byona, yaagira abeegi be ati:
Nimumanya ku hatsigaireho ebiro bibiri okuhika aha kiro ky'Okuhingurwaho, Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo kubambwa aha musharaba.
Omu biro ebyo abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'eihanga eryo bakateeranira omu ka y'omunyamurwa omukuru, owaabaire naayetwa Kayaafa;
baahanuura ahamwe oku baraakwate Yesu omu bwengye, bakamwita,
kwonka baagira bati: Haza tutamukwatira omu biro by'obugyenyi, hatabaho okurabanamu omu bantu.
haija omukazi oine eihembe ry'amajuta ag'obuguzi bwingi munonga, yaagashuka aha mutwe gwe ashutami naarya.
Abeegi be, ku baakireebire, baaguubwa kubi nibagira bati: Amajuta aga gaafa ki?
Nangwa kur gaguzirwemu bingi, bikagabirwa abooro!
Kwonka Yesu, ku yaabimanyire, yaabagira ati: Nimugwisiza ki kubi omukazi ogu? Ahakuba eki yankorera ni kirungi.
Ahabw'okuba abooro mutuura nabo obutoosha; kwonka nyowe timuriguma naanye obutoosha.
Omu kushuka amajuta aga aha mubiri gwangye, yaakikora ahabw'okunteekateekyera okuziikwa.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ahu engiri erigambwa hoona omu nsi zoona, n'eki omukazi ogu yaakora kiryagambwayo kumwijuka.
yaababuuza ati: Nimwija kumpa ki, naanye nkamubaha? Baamubarira
Okuruga aho yaasherura oburyo oku araamureebye.
Yaabaragiira ati: Mwirooko mugyende omu rurembo owa nanka, mumugire muti: Omwegyesa naagira ati: Obunaku bwangye nibwenda kuhika; omu nju yaawe nimwo ndaariire Okuhingurwaho hamwe n'abeebi bangye.
Abeegi abo baakora nk'oku Yesu yaabagambira; baatebeekanisa Okuhingurwaho.
Ku baabaire nibarya, yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omwe ahariimwe naija kundeebya.
Baashaasha munonga bashobeirwe, baatandika kumubuuza omwe omwe bati: Mukama wangye, niinye?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Owaaba naakoza naanye omu rwabya, niwe arikwija kundeebya.
Omwana w'omuntu naagyenda, nk'oku kyamuhandiikirweho; kwonka orikumureebya aryakareeba. Kikaabaire kirungi nangwa omuntu ogwo kuri atarazairwe.
Yuda owaamureebize yaamubuuza ati: Mwegyesa, niinye? Yaamugarukau ati: Eki waagamba nikwo kiri.
Yaakwata ekikopo; ku yaaherize kusiima, yaakibaha naagira ati: Munyweho mwena;
ahakuba egi n'eshagama yangye ey'endagaano ensya, esheesheka ahabwa baingi, ngu basaasirwe ebibi.
Nimbagambira nti: Tindinywa hari viinyo y'ebyana by'omuzaabibu okwiha hati okuhitsya aha kiro ekyo, obu ndinywa naimwe viinyo nsya omu mbukama bwa Tata.
Ku baaherize kweshongora zaaburi, baashohora, baaza omu kibungo kya Zeituuni.
Kwonka ku ndiheza kuzooka, ndyababandiza Galilaaya.
Petero yaahiga naagira ati: N'obu abandi boona baraagwe bakakuhemukaho, nyowe tindikwija kuhemukaho na kakye.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Iwe eki kiro, enkoko etakagambire, noija kuunyehakana kashatu.
Petero yaamugarukamu ati: N'obu ndaabe ow'okwitwa naiwe, tindikwija kukwehakana. N'abandi boona baahiga batyo.
Yaatwara Petero na beene Zebedaayo bombi, yaatandika kugira obusaasi bwingi n'okushoberwa munonga.
Yaabagira ati: Omutima gwangye gwine obusaasi bwingi, nibwija kuunyita; mugume aha, nimureeba naanye.
Yairira kakye omumaisho, yaajuumara ahansi, yaashaba ati: Ai bambe Taata, ekikopo eki kimpingure, ku kiraabe nikibaasika; kwonka kitaba nk'oku ndikwenda, kureka nkaiwe oku orikwenda.
Yaagaruka aha beegi be, yaashanga bagwejegyeire; yaabuuza Petero ati: Ebyo mwaremwa kwehangaana kureeba naanye nangwa n'eshaaha emwe?
Mureebe mushabe, murekye kugwa omu kwohibwa, Omutima gwo nigukunda, kwonka omubiri n'omweremwa.
Yaagarukayo obwa kabiri, yaashaba ati: Ai bambe Taata, ekikopo eki ku kiraabe kitarikubaasa kundabaho ntakinyweire, eki orikwenda kibe nikyo kyakorwa.
Yaagaruka yaija, nabwo yaashanga bagwejegyeire, ahabw'okuba amaisho gaabo gakaba nigahungira.
Nikwo kubareka, akagarukayo kushaba obwa kashatu, akashaba ebigambo bimwe nk'eby'okubanza.
Bwanyima yaagaruka aha beegi be, yaabaigra ati: Na hati mukigwejegyeire, mukihuumwire? Reeba, obunaku bwairira haihi, Omwana w'omuntu yaaheebwayo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
Mwimukye, tugyende; reeba, orikundeebya ari haihi.
Kandi ogwo owaabaire naamureebya, akaba abahaire akamanyiso, naagira ati: Ou ndaanywegyere, niwe ogwo; mumukwate.
Ahonaaho yaija ahari Yesu, yaamuramutsya ati: Osingire, Mwegyesa! Yaamunywegyera.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Mugyenzi wangye, kora eki oiziriire. Ahonaaho baija baamugurukira, baamukwata.
Kandi reeba, omwe ahari abo abaabaire bari na Yesu, yaatayo omukono, yaasyorayo rurara ye, yaatema omuhuuku w'omunyamurwa omukuru, yaamucwaho okutu.
Yesu yaamuhana ati: Garura rurara yaawe omu kyobati kyayo; ahakuba boona abatwara rurara, baryaitwa rurara.
Naari shi, noogira ngu, tindikubaasa kushaba Tata, akaanyoherereza ahonaaho baamaraika abarikukira
Mbwenu ku kyakubaire kitabaire kityo, Ebyahandiikirwe bihikiirira ryari, haza kandi nikwo kishemereire kuba?
Omu shaaha egyo Yesu yaagira emitwe y'abantu ati: Mwampururira kunkwata na zaarurara n'ebikoni, nk'oku bahururira omwambuzi? Ebiro byona nkaba ntuura omuri hekalu niinyegyesa, timurankwatsire.
Kwonka ebi byona byabaho, ngu ebyahandiikirwe baanabi bihikiirire. Okuruga aho abeegi be boona baamuhungaho, bairuka.
Kandi Petero yaamukuratira naamugyenda hare okuhika omu kibuga ky'omunyamurwa omukuru; ku yaataahiremu, yaashutama n'abambari kureeba ahu biraaherere.
Kandi abanyamurwa abakuru n'ab'omu ishengyero boona baasherura obwamushinja bw'ebishuba kubeiherera Yesu ngu bamwite;
tibaabubona, n'obu haraabe haizire baamushinja baingi b'ebishuba.
Bwanyima haija babiri, nibagira bati: Ogu mushaija akagira ati: Nimbaasa kusheenya hekalu ya Ruhanga, kandi ngyombekye omu biro bishatu.
Omunyamurwa omukuru yaayemerera, yaamubuuza ati: Toine ki orikwetonganira na kakye? Aba nibakwomesereza ki?
Yesu yaabeetsiza. Omunyamurwa omukuru yaamugira ati: Ninkurahiza Ruhanga ohuriire, tugambire ku oraabe ori kristo omwana wa Ruhanga.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Eki waagamba nikwo kiri; kandi nimbagambira nti: Bwanyima muryareeba Omwana w'omuntu ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo orw'Obushoboorozi naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru.
Ahonaaho omunyamurwa omukuru yaataagura ebijwaro bye, naagira ati: Yaarogota; nitukyendera ki baamushinja abandi? Naimwe mwayehuririra okurogota kwe.
Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta? Baagarukamu nibagira bati: Ashemereire kufa.
Baamucwera amacwante aha maisho, baamuteera entomi; abandi baamuteera empi,
nibagira bati: Iwe Kristo, ragura, otugambire owaakuteera.
Kandi Petero akaba ashutami aheeru omu kibuga. Omuzaana yaija ah'ari, yaamugira ati: Naiwe obaire ori hamwe na Yesu owa Galilaaya.
Kwonka we yaayehakanira omu maisho ga boona, ati: Tindikumanya ki orikugamba.
Ku yaabaire naashohora, yaahika aha irembo, omuzaana ondiijo yaamureeba, yaagambira abandi abaabaire bari aho, ati: Omushaija ogu nawe abaire ari hamwe na Yesu owa Nazareesi.
Yaagaruka yaayehakana naarahira ati: Omuntu ogwo tindikumumanya.
Ku haahingwireho akaanya kakye, abaabaire beemereire aho baija baagambira Petero bati: Buzimazima naiwe ori omwe aharibo, ahabw'okuba emigambire yaawe neekumanyisa.
Obwo yaatandika kukyeena n'okurahira, naagira ati: Omushaija ogwo tindikumumanya. Ahonaaho enkoko yaagamba.
Petero yaijuka ekigambo eki Yesu amugambiire ati: Enkoko etakagambire, noija kuunyehakana kashatu. Yaashohora aheeru, yaarira munonga.
Baamuboha, baamutwara, baamuhayo ahari Pilaato omutegyeki.
Kandi Yuda owaamureebize, ku yaareebire orubanja rwasinga Yesu, yaayefuuza, yaagarurira abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu ebyo bicweka by'efeeza makumi ashatu,
naagira ati: Nsiisire okureebya eshagama etaine rubanja. Kwonka bo baagarukamu bati: Ebyo shi n'ebyaitu? N'orubanja rwawe.
Yaatambika ebyo bicweka by'efeeza omuri hekalu, yaashohora, yaagyenda, yaayehanika.
Abanyamurwa abakuru baatorotoora ebyo bicweka by'efeeza, nibagira bati: Ebiragiro tibirikwikiriza kubita omu ibiikiro, ahabw'okuba n'obuguzi bw'eshagama.
Baahanuura, baabiguramu ekibanja ky'omubumbi kuguma nibaziikamu abahinguzi.
N'ahabw'ekyo ekibanja ekyo kyayetwa Ekibanja ky'eshagama okuruga obwo n'okuhitsya hati.
Okwo nikwo ekyagambirwe nabi Yeremia kyahikiriire, eki yaagizire ati: Bakatwara ebicweka by'efeeza makumi ashatu, nibwo buguzi bwe obu abamwe aha Baisraeli baamucwereire,
baabiguramu ekibanja ky'omubumbi, nk'oku Mukama yandagiire.
Kwonka ku yaatabaariziibwe abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu, tiyaagarukamu na kakye.
Pilaato nikwo kumubuuza ati: Tohuriire ebi byona ebi barikukushinja ku biri bingi?
We tiyaamugarukamu n'obu kyakuba ekigambo na kimwe; n'ahabw'ekyo omutegyeki yaatangaara munonga.
Kandi aha bugyenyi nk'obwo omutegyeki akaba amanyiire kurekurira abantu embohe emwe, ei baabaire bamushaba.
Omu biro ebyo bakaba baine embohe erangainwe ahabw'obubi erikwetwa Barabba.
Boona ku baaherize kuteerana, Pilaato yaababuuza ati: Nimwenda ngu mbarekurire oha? Barabba nari Yesu orikwetwa Kristo?
Ahakuba akamanya ku baamuhayo ahabw'eihari.
Ku yaashutamire aha kitebe ky'okucweraho emanja, omukazi we yaamutumaho naagira ati: Oyetantare ebigambo by'omushaija ogwo ohikiriire; ahakuba ebi mmurootsireho nyekiro binsaasize munonga.
Kwonka abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru baayosya abantu ngu bashabe Barabba, baite Yesu.
Omutegyeki yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Ahari abo bombi nimwenda ku mbarekurira oha? Baamugarukamu bati: Barabba.
Pilaato yaababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi, ngire nta Yesu orikwetwa Kristo? Boona baagarukamu bati: Abambwe aha musharaba.
Yaababuuza ati: Ahanki? Ni kibi ki eki akozire? Baayeyongyera kuyomba nibagira bati: Abambwe!

Pilaato ku yaareebire naayeruhiriza busha, kandi yaareeba ngu haza kubaho okurabanamu, yaayakiira amaizi, yaanaaba omu ngaro omu maisho g'abantu, naagira ati: Tiinyine rubanja ahabw'eshagama y'omuntu ogu ohikiriire; mubyemarire.
Abantu boona baagarukamu nibagira bati: Eshagama ye ebe niitwe yaatukurira n'abaana baitu.
Pilaato nikwo kubarekurira Barabba. Kandi ku yaaherize kwasha Yesu, yaamuhayo kubambwa.
Bwanyima abaserukare b'omutegyeki baatwara Yesu omu kibuga ekirikwetwa Puratorio, baayeta gwona gw'abaserikare omu maisho ge. omutwe gwabo gwona baagumuteeraniraho.
Baamujuura ebijwaro bye, baamujweka omwenda gwa karari.
Ku baaherize kuruka ekirunga ky'amahwa, baakimujweka omu mutwe, baamukwatsa ekibingo omu mukono gwe gwa buryo, baamutsimbira amaju, baamuteerera enaku nibagira bati: Singa, Mugabe w'Abayudaaya!
Baamucwera amacwante, baakwata ekyo kibingo, baakimuteera omu mutwe.
Ku baaherize kumuteerera enaku, baamujuura ogwo mwenda, baagaruka baamujweka ebijwaro bye, baamutwara kubambwa aha musharaba.
Ku baabaire nibashohora, baabugana omushaija wa Kureene orikwetwa Simooni; ogwo baamugyema kwekorera omusharaba gwa Yesu.
Ku baahikire aharikwetwa Gologosa, amakuru gaakyo ngu Omwanya gw'empanga y'omuntu,
baamuha viinyo ejwangiremu omubazi ogurikwetwa sumuruna; ku yaagirorizeho, yaayanga kuginywa.
Ku baaherize kumubamba, baabagana ebijwaro bye, nibabiteerera enteenyu.
Baashutama ahansi, baaguma nibamureeba.
Baahanika ebigambo ebi baamutabaariza ahaiguru y'omutwe gwe, ebyabaire bihandiikirwe biti: OGU NI YESU, OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA.
Kandi akabambwa hamwe n'abambuzi babiri, omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, n'ondi aha rwa bumosho.
Kandi n'abaabaire nibahinguraho baamutsyorera, nibamuzongoreza emitwe,
nibagira bati: Iwe orikusheenya hekalu, okagyombeka omu biro bishatu, yejune! Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga, hanuka orugye aha musharaba.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki n'abakuru b'abantu nabo baamutsyorera batyo nibagira bati:
Akajuna abandi; tarikubaasa kwejuna. Ngu, N'omugabe w'Abaisraeli! Naahanukye, arugye aha musharaba hati, naitwe tumwikirize.
Ayesiga Ruhanga, mbwenu naamujune hati, ku araabe naamukunda; ahabw'okuba yaagira ati: Ndi Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Kandi n'abambuzi abaabaire babambirwe nawe nabo nikwo baamuteerera enaku batyo.
Okuruga aha shaaha ya mukaaga okuhitsya aha ya mwenda omwirima gwashweka ensi yoona.
Ku bwabaire buri haihi kuhika aha shaaha ya mwenda, Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, ati: Eli, Eli, laama sabakasaani; amakuru ngu; Ruhanga wangye, Ruhanga wangye, n'enki ekyakuntsigisaho?
Bamwe aha baabaire beemereire aho, ku baakihuriire, baagira bati: Omushaija ogu naayeta Eliya.
Ahonaaho omwe aharibo yairuka, yaakwata ekyangu, yaakijabika omuri viinyo erikushaarira, yaakita aha kibingo, yaamuheereza kunywa.
Abandi baagira bati: Reka tureebe Eliya ku araabe naija kumujuna.
Bwanyima Yesu yaagaruka yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, yaahayo amagara ge.
ebituuro byaiguka; emitumbi mingi y'abahikiriire abaabaire bagwejegyeire yaazoorwa;
baaruga omu bituuro bwanyima y'okuzooka kwe, baataaha omu rurembo orurikwera, baareebwa baingi.
Omukuru w'abaserukare n'abu yaabaire aine nibarinda Yesu, ku baareebire omutsitsa n'ebindi byabaho, baatiina munonga, nibagira bati: Buzima kwo ogu abaire ari Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Hakaba hariho n'abakazi baingi beemereire nibareebera hangahari; abo nibo baarugire Galilaaya bamukuratiire nibamuheereza;
omuri abo hakaba harimu Mariamu Magadaleene na Mariamu nyina wa Yakobo na Yose, kandi na nyina wa beene Zebedaayo.
Omushaija ogwo yaaza owa Pilaato, yaashaba omutumbi gwa Yesu. Pilaato yaaragiira kugumuha.
Yosefu yaatwara omutumbi, yaaguzinga omu mwenda gwa kitaani ogurikwera,
yaagurambika omu kituuro kye kisya, eki yaabaire ayetimbiire omu rukiri; yaakumbagaza eibaare rihango, yaarikingisa aha muryango gwakyo, yaagyenda.
Kandi Mariamu Magadaleene na Mariamu ondiijo bakaba bariho, bashutami nibareeba ekyo kituuro.
Ku bwaseesire aha izooba eryakuratiire ekiro ky'Okweteguura, abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo baateeranira owa Pilaato,
baamugira bati: Mukama waitu, nitwijuka eki omubeihi ori yaagambire akiriho, ati: Ndyazooka bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu.

Mbwenu ragiira barindire kimwe ekituuro okuhitsya aha kiro kya kashatu, abeegi be batakaija bakamwiba, haza bakagambira abantu ngu, Azookire omu bafu; kandi okuhaba okurirugamu kuryaba kubi okukira okw'okubanza.
Pilaato yaabagarukamu ati: Mwine abarinzi b'abaserukare; mugyende, mukirindire kimwe, nk'oku murikubaasa.
Nabo baagyenda, baahamisa eryo ibaare akamanyiso, baataho n'abarinzi, ngu ekituuro kutaigurwa,
Haabaho omutsitsa gw'amaani; ahabw'okuba maraika wa Mukama akaruga omu iguru, yaija, yaakumbagaza eibaare, yaarishutamaho.
Enshusha ye akaba naamurinkana nk'omurabyo, n'ebijwaro bye bikaba nibyera nk'orubaare.
Abarinzi ahabw'okutiina baatetema, baahinduka nk'abafiire.
Kwonka maraika yaagambira abakazi ati: Imwe, mutatiina; ahakuba nimmanya ku murikusherura Yesu obambirwe.
Tari aha; ahabw'okuba azookire, nk'oku yaagambire. Mwije mureebe omwanya ahu abaire abyami.
Haza mwehuute, mugambire abeegi be ku azookire omu bafu, kandi ku arikwija kubabandiza Galilaaya; okwo niyo muraamureebere. Reeba naabagambira.
Baaruga aha kituuro, nibeehuuta baine obwoba n'okushemererwa kwingi, bairuka kugambira abeegi be.
Yesu yaababugana, yaabagira ati: Mushemererwe! Baamwirira haihi, baamukwata aha bigyere, baamuramya.
Yesu nikwo kubagambira ati: Mutatiina, mugyende, mugambire bagyenzi bangye baze Galilaaya; okwo niyo barandeebere.
Ku baabaire nibagyenda, abamwe ahari abo barinzi baija omu rurembo, baagambira abanyamurwa abakuru byona ebyabaho.
Abanyamurwa nikwo kuteerana abakuru b'abantu, bakahanuura hamwe; ku baaherize, baaha abaserukare empiiha nyingi,
baabagambira bati: Mugume mugire muti: Abeegi be baizire nyekiro, baamwiba itwe tugwejegyeire.
Omutegyeki ku araabimanye, nitwija kumwikiririsa, tubaiheho orubanja.
Abaserukare baayakiira empiiha, baakora nk'oku baahabwirwe; ekigambo ekyo kyabuga omuri Buyudaaya n'okuhitsya hati.
Bwanyima abeegi be ikumi n'omwe baaza Galilaaya, aha rushozi oru Yesu abaragiire.
Ku baamureebire, baamuramya; kwonka abandi baabanganisa.
Yesu yaija, yaabagira ati: Mpairwe obushoboorozi bwona omu iguru n'omu nsi.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugyende omu mahanga goona, muhindure abantu abeegi nimubabatiza omu iziina rya Isheboona n'ery'Omwana n'ery'Omwoyo Orikwera,
nimubeegyesa kworobera byona ebi naabaragiire; kandi reeba, ndi hamwe naimwe ebiro byona okuhitsya obu ensi egi erihwaho.
Okutandika kw'engiri ya Yesu Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga:
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya nabi Isaaya, ngu:
Reeba, nintuma entumwa yangye, ekubandize;
Niyo erishemeza omuhanda gwawe.
Mushemeze omuhanda gwa Mukama,
Mugorore otuhanda twe.
Yohaana akaija naabatiza omu ihamba, naabuurira okubatizibwa kw'okweteisa ahabw'okwihwaho ebibi.
Abantu b'omu ishaza rya Buyudaaya ryona n'aba Yerusaalemu boona baaruga owaabo, baamushangayo; yaababatiriza omu mugyera Yorudani, nibaatura ebibi byabo.
Kandi Yohaana akaba ajwara ekijwaro ky'ebyoya by'engamira, ayezirikisa orukoba omu nda, eby'okurya bye bikaba biri enzigye n'obwoki bw'omu ishwa.
Yaabagambira, naagira ati: Orikwija enyima yangye nankiza obushoboorozi; tinshemereire kwinama kuyuzya enkoba z'enkaito ze.
Nyowe naababatiza n'amaizi, kwonka We aryababatiza n'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ahonaaho ku yaabaire naaruga omu maizi, yaareeba eiguru rikinguukire, n'Omwoyo naamushuumaho nk'enkombe,
n'eiraka ryayema omu iguru riti: Niiwe Mwana wangye ou nkunda, kandi ou nsehemerererwa munonga.
yaamarayo ebiro makumi ana, naayohibwa Sitaane; yaaguma hamwe n'enyamaishwa, baamaraika nibamuheereza.
Obunaku buhikire; obukama bwa Ruhanga bwiriire haihi; mweteise, mwikirize engiri.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Mwije munkuratire, naanye ndyabahindura abajubi b'abantu.
Ahonaaho baatsigaho obutimba bwabo, baamukuratira.
Ku yairiire omumaisho hakye, yaareeba Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo na Yohaana omurumuna, abaabaire bari omu bwato, nibashumikanisa obutimba.
Ahonaaho yaabeeta; baatsiga ishebo Zebedaayo omu bwato hamwe n'abapakasi, baamukuratira.
Baatangaarira okwegyesa kwe, ahakuba akabeegyesa nk'oine obushoboorozi weena, kunu ti nk'abahandiiki.
Omuri egyo sinagogi hakaba harimu omuntu owaabaire ariho daimoni; ahonaaho yaaborooga naagira ati:
Noofa ki naitwe, iwe Yesu owa Nazareesi? Oizire kutucwekyereza? Ninkumanya, ori Orikwera wa Ruhanga.
Yesu yaamugambira kubi, naagira ati: Hunama! Murugyeho.
Daimoni yaamuteera ahansi, yaamutetemya, yaaborooga n'eiraka rihango, yaamurugaho.
Boona baatangaara, nibabuuzana bati: Eki n'enki? Oku n'okwegyesa kusya! Naaragiira baadaimoni n'obushoboorozi, nabo bamuhurira.
Ahonaaho okurangaanwa kwe kwahika hoonahoona embaju zoona eziri haihi na Galilaaya.
kandi nyinazaara wa Simooni akaba abyami arwaire omushwija; ahonaaho baamugambira oku ari;
yaija, yaamukwata aha mukono, yaamwimutsya, omushwija gwamurugaho, yaimuka, yaabaheereza.
Omu mwabazyo ogwo, eizooba nirirengarenga, baamureetera boona abaabaire barwaire n'abandi abaabaire bariho baadaimoni.
Abantu boona ab'omuri tauni baateeranira omu irembo.
Yaakiza baingi abaabaire barwaire endwara z'emiringo mingi; yaabinga baadaimoni baingi, kandi tiyaabaikiriza kugamba, ahakuba bakamumanya.
Simooni na bagyenzi be baamukurata.
Ku baamuboine, baamugira bati: Abantu boona nibakusherura.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Tugyende ahandi omuri tauni eziri haihi, nayo mbuurireyo; ahakuba nikyo naiziriire.
Yaagyenda omuri Galilaaya yoona, naabuurira omuri sinagogi zaabo, kandi naabinga baadaimoni.
Yaamusaasira, yaagorora omukono gwe, yaamukoraho, yaamugira ati: Ninkunda; shemera!
Ahonaaho ebibembe byamurugaho, yaashemezibwa.
Yaamwohereza ahonaaho, naamwehanangiriza munonga,
yaamuragiira ati: Reeba, otagira ou waagambira; kwonka irooko ogyende, oyeyorekye aha munyamurwa, oheyo ebi Musa yaaragiire ahabw'okuba oshemeziibwe, bibe eby'okuhamya omu maisho g'abantu.
Kwonka we ku yaashohoire, yaatandika kubigamba, naabibuzya omu bantu; okuruga aho Yesu tarabaasize kugaruka omuri tauni butunu, yaaguma omu ihamba; abantu baaruga oku n'oku, baamushangayo.
Abantu baingi baateeranira omu nju, baagiijura, omwanya gwabura nangwa n'aha muryango; yaabagambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija abantu bana bamureeteire omuntu ozingazingirwe, bamuheekire omu ngozi.

Ku baabuzire ah'okuraba kuhika ahari Yesu ahabw'omutwe gw'abantu, baakambura aha mutwe gw'enju aharinganiire n'ahu Yesu yaabaire ari; ku baaherize kuhakambura, baashuumizaho ozingazingirwe omu ngozi, ei yaabaire arimu.
Yesu ku yaareebire okwikiriza kwabo, yaagira ozingazingirwe ati: Mwana wangye, ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa.
Kwonka aha rubaju hakaba hashutamiho abamwe aha bahandiiki, baatandika kwetomboita nibeebuuza omu mitima yaabo bati:
Beitu shi, omuntu ogu ekirikumugambisa kityo n'enki? Naarogota! N'oha orikubaasa kusaasira ebibi kureka Ruhanga wenka?
