Ahonaaho Yesu, ku yaamanyire omu mwoyo gwe okwetomboita kw'omu mitima yaabo, yaababuuza ati: Nimwetomboitera ki mutyo omu mitima yaanyu?
Ekirikurahuka ni kiiha, okugira ozingazingirwe nti, Ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa; nari okugira nti, Imuka oyekorere engozi yaawe, ogyende?
Kwonka mumanye ngu Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi aha nsi okusaasira ebibi, yaahindukira ozingazingirwe yaamugira ati:
Ninkuragiira nti: Imuka oyekorere engozi yaawe, otaahe.
Yaimuka, ahonaaho yaayekorera engozi ye, yaashohora omu maisho gaabo boona; kyabatangaaza boona, baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati: Eki tikikareebwaga!
Bwanyima yaagumizamu, yaareeba Leevi mwene Alifaayo, ashutami omu ihoorezo, yaamugira ati: Nkuratira! Yaimuka, yaamukuratira.
Kandi Yesu ku yaabaire ashutami omwa Leevi naarya, abahooza baingi n'abasiisi baashutama hamwe nawe n'abeegi be; ahakuba abaabaire bamukuratiire bakaba bari baingi.
Abahandiiki b'Abafarisaayo, ku baareebire naarya n'abahooza n'abasiisi, baabuuza abeegi be bati: Ahabw'enki naarya kandi naanywa n'abahooza n'abasiisi?
Yesu ku yaabihuriire, yaabagarukamu ati: Abahuriire tibeetenga mufumu, kureka abarwaire; tindaizire kweta bahikiriire, kureka abasiisi.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Abakwe babaasa bata kwesiibyakwo bakiine kishwera? Ku baba bakiri hamwe nawe, tibeesiibyakwo.
Kwonka obunaku buryahika, kishwera aryabaihwaho; obwo nibwo baryesiibyakwo.
Tihariho muntu oteera ekiremu ky'omwenda musya aha mwenda ogukuzire; ku yaakukora atyo, ekiremu ekisya kikaataagura omwenda omukuru, n'ekifumuka kihanguha.

Kandi tihariho muntu oshuka viinyo y'omutahe omu furebe z'empu ezikuzire; ku yaakukora atyo, viinyo ekaabarura efurebe, viinyo egyo eyatika, n'efurebe zisiisikara; kureka viinyo y'omutahe eshukwa omu furebe nsya.
Abafarisaayo baamubuuza bati: Reeba, ahabw'enki abeegi baawe nibakora ekirikuzira, okucwa obushiisha aha izooba rya Sabato?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Beitu shi, timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire, obu yaabaire ashobeirwe, aine enjara, we n'abu yaabaire aine?

Omu biro ebi Abiasaari yaabaire ari omunyamurwa omukuru, Daudi akataaha omu nju ya Ruhanga, yaarya aha migaati ey'okumurikwa, yaagaruka yaahaho n'abu yaabaire aine, eki Ebiragiro byabaire bizibira omuntu weena kukora, kureka abanyamurwa bonka.
Yaabagambira ati: Sabato ekateebwaho ahabw'abantu; kwonka ti bantu ahabwa Sabato.
N'ahabw'ekyo Omwana w'omuntu niwe Mukama wa Sabato nayo.
Baaguma bamutaireho amaisho kureeba yaaba araamukize ahari Sabato, ngu baihe aho bamuregye.
Yaaragiira omushaija owaabaire akokootsire omukono, ati: Yemerera ahagati aho.
Yaababuuza ati: N'eky'Ebiragiro okukora gye ahari Sabato, nari okukora kubi? Okukiza amagara g'omuntu, nari okugahwerekyereza? Baahunama kwonka.
Yaababunzyamu amaisho aine ekiniga, agwirwe kubi ahabw'obugangaazi bw'omu mitima yaabo, yaaragiira omushaija ogwo, ati: Nanuura omukono gwawe. Yaagunanuura, gwakira.
Ahonaaho Abafarisaayo baashohora, baahanuura na ba Heroode oku baraamwite.
n'aba Yerusaalemu, n'aba Idumaaya, n'aba seeri ya Yorudani, n'abaabaire batwire haihi na Tuuro na Sidoni, ku baahuriire byona ebi yaakozire, baija ah'ari.
Yaagambira abeegi be kumureetera obwato haihi ahabw'omutwe gw'abantu, ngu barekye kumufunza;
ahakuba akaba akirize baingi, n'ahabw'ekyo boona abaabaire baine endwara baamigana ngu bakaamukoraho, bakira.
Kandi na baadaimoni, ku baabaire bamureeba, bagwa omu maisho ge, nibaborooga, nibagira bati: Ori Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Kwonka We yaabeehanangiriza ku bareka kumubuzya omu bantu.
Yaihamu ikumi na babiri kuguma nawe, ngu agume abatume kubuurira engiri,
kandi ngu abahe obushoboorozi bw'okubinga baadaimoni;
Simooni yaamweta eiziina Petero,
na Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo na Yohaana murumuna wa Yakobo, yaabeeta Boanerege, amakuru gaaryo ngu Abaana b'okuhinda;
na Anderea, Filipo Batolomaayo na Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo mwene Alifaayo, Tadaayo, Simooni Omukananaayo,
na Yuda Iskaryota owaamureebize.
Bwanyima yaataaha owaabo; omutwe gw'abantu gwayeyongyera kuteerana, n'ahabw'ekyo Yesu n'abeegi be tibaabaasa n'okurya.
Kandi abaabo ku baakihuriire, baashohora kumukwata, ahabw'okuba bakagira ngu, Agwire eiraro.
Kandi abahandiiki, abaashuumire nibaruga Yerusaalemu, baagira bati: Ariho
Yaabeeta, yaabacwera enfumu, ati: Sitaane naabaasa ata kubinga Sitaane?
Obugabe bwona, ku bwebaganisamu, obugabe obwo tibubaasa kugumaho.
N'enju yoona ku eyebaganisamu, enju egyo teebaasa kugumaho.
Kandi na Sitaane ku araabe naayerwanisa, akeebaganisamu, tarikubaasa kugumaho, kureka naahwaho.
Hoona tihariho muntu orikubaasa kutaaha omu nju y'ondi ow'amaani kunyaga ebintu bye, atabandize kuboha ogwo ow'amaani, bwanyima akabona kunyaga eby'omu nju ye.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Abantu baryasaasirwa ebibi byabo byona, na buri kurogota kwona;
kwonka weena orirogota aha Mwoyo Orikwera tarisaasirwa na kakye, ahakuba aryaba akwatsirwe orubanja rw'ekibi ky'ebiro n'ebiro.
Eki yaabagambiriire atyo, n'ahabw'okuba bakagira ngu, Ariho daimoni.
Omutwe gw'abantu abaabaire bashutami bamwehinguririize, baamugira bati: Reeba, nyoko na beene waanyu bari aheeru nibakweta.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Maawe na beene waitu nibaahi?
Yaabuzya amaisho omuri abo abaabaire bashutami bamwehinguririize, naagira ati: Reeba, maawe na beene waitu n'aba bari aha!
Weena okora ebi Ruhanga akunda, niwe murumuna wangye, niwe munyaanyazi, kandi niwe maawe.
Yaabeegyesa bingi omu nfumu omu kwegyesa kwe, yaabagambira naagira ati:
Mutegye amatu, muhurire!
Omubibi akashohora kubiba. Ku yaabaire naabiba, embibo ezimwe zaagwa omu muhanda; enyonyi zaija zaazitorotoora.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa aha rukiri ahataine itaka ringi; ahonaaho zaamera, ahabw'eitaka kutaba ringi;
eizooba ku ryajwire, omushana gwaziteera, zaahonga; kandi ahabw'okutagira mizi, zaayoma.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu mahwa; amahwa gaamera, gaazinyuruza, tizaayera.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu itaka rirungi; ku zaaherize kumera, zaakura gye, zaakanya, zaayera, ezimwe zaahitsya makumi ashatu, ezindi makumi mukaaga, n'ezindi igana.
Kandi yaagira ati: Oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Kandi ku yaabaire ari wenka, abo abaabaire bamwehinguririize hamwe na bari ikumi na babiri baamubuuza aha nfumu egyo.
Yaabagira ati: Imwe muhairwe okumanya emibonano y'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kwonka ab'aheeru bo byona babicwerwa omu nfumu,
ngu okureeba kwo bareebe, kwonka barekye kwetegyereza, kandi okuhurira kwo bahurire, kwonka barekye kushoborokyerwa, ngu batakaahinduka bakasaasirwa.
Yaabagira ati: Timurikumanya enfumu egi? Mbwenu shi, muryamanya muta enfumu zoona?
Omubibi abiba ekigambo.
Embibo ez'omu muhanda, ahi ekigambo kyabibirwe, abo nibo baheza kuhurira, ahonaaho Sitaane akaija, akabaihamu ekigambo ekyabibwa omuribo.
Kandi ezaabibirwe aha rukiri, abo nibo bahurira ekigambo, bakarahuka kukiikiriza n'okushemererwa;
ahabw'okushangwa bataine mizi ehamire, beehangaana omwanya mukye; bwanyima hakibaho obusaasi n'okuhiigwa nibaturwa ekyo kigambo, ahonaaho bagwa.
N'ezo ezaagwire omu mahwa, nibo bahurira ekigambo;
kwonka amaganya g'ensi, n'okubeihwabeihwa kw'obutungi bwayo, n'okwetenga ebindi, ku bikijwangamu, byanyuruza ekyo kigambo, kibura kwana.
Kwonka ezaabibirwe aha itaka rirungi, abo nibo bahurira ekigambo, bakakiikiriza, bakaana ebyana emirundi makumi ashatu, makumi mukaaga, na igana.
Ahakuba tihaine kyasherekirwe ekitaribonwa, nari eky'omubonano ekitarireebwa butunu.
Oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Kandi yaabagira ati: Mwerinde eki muhurira; endengo ei murengamu niyo murirengyerwamu, kandi muryayongyerwaho.
Ahakuba oine niwe aryongyerwa; kandi otaine aryayakwa n'ekyo eki aine.
Kandi yaagira ati: Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibushusha nk'oku omuntu abiba embibo omu itaka;
akabyama kandi akaimuka nyomushana na nyekiro; embibo zikamera, zikakura, atamanyire oku zikuzire.
Eitaka niryo rimeza ryonka; habanza akababi, hataho obushiisha, na bwanyima enjuma nkuru.
Ku biheza kwera, ahonaaho areeta omusyo, abigyesha, ahakuba eigyesha rihikire.
Nibushusha nk'akajuma ka
kwonka ku kaheza kubibwa, kamera, kakura, karugamu ekiti kihango okukira ebindi byona, kagira amataagi mahango, kandi n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya zaarika omu mataagi gaako.
Akaba abagambira ekigambo omu nfumu nyingi, nk'oku baabaire babaasa kushoborokyerwa;
tarabaasize kubeegyesa atabirabize mu nfumu; kureka abeegi be nibo yaabaire ashobororera byona omu mubonano.
Ku baaherize kuraga omutwe gw'abantu, baamutwara omu bwato nk'oku yaabaire ari; kandi hakaba hariho n'agandi maato.
Eihunga ringi ryaija, ebingonzi byateera obwato, amaizi gaabusheeshekamu, bwaba haihi kwijura;
kwonka We akaba agwejegyeire, ayeeshegwire omushego enyima omu bwato. Baamusisiimura, baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, torikututaho mutima? Reeba twafa!
Yaasisiimuka, yaakabukira eihunga, yaagambira enyanja ati: Reka, cureera! Eihunga ryacureera; haabaho obucureera bwingi.
Yaababuuza ati: N'enki ekirikubatiinisa? Timukagizire kwikiriza?
Baatiina munonga, baagambirana bati: Bantu 'mwe, ogu ni muntu ki, orikuragiira eihunga n'enyanja, bikamuhurira!
Ku yaarugire ati omu bwato, yaabuganwa omuntu owaabaire naaruga omu bituuro ariho daimoni.
Omushaija ogwo akaba atuura omu bituuro, kandi tihariho muntu owaabaire naakibaasa kumuboha, nangwa n'obu yaakuba n'emihama;
ahakuba emirundi mingi bakaba bamubohesa emirunga n'emihama; emihama agihendagura, n'emirunga agicwa; tihaine muntu owaabaire agira amaani g'okumucureeza.
Obutwire bwona nyomushana na nyekiro akaba ayamuriza omu bituuro n'omu bibungo naayeshaza amabaare.
Ku yaareebire Yesu akiri hare, yairuka yaamuramya;
naayamuza n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Noofa ki naanye, Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga Rukira-boona? Ninkurahiza Ruhanga, otaanyita kubi!
Ahakuba Yesu akaba yaamuragiira ati: Murugyeho, iwe daimoni!
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Eiziina ryawe ori oha? Yaamugarukamu ati: Eiziina ryangye niinye
Yaamweshengyereza munonga, ngu atababinga omu nsi omwo.
Kandi omu rukiizi hakaba hariiriireyo omukumbi gw'empunu nyingi;
baadaimoni baamweshengyereza bati: Twohereze omu mpunu, tube nizo twataahamu.
Yaabaikiriza. Baadaimoni baamurugaho, baazitaahamu; empunu ezo zikaba ziri nk'enkumi ibiri zaashuumira aha ibanga niziiruka, zaahwera omu nyanja.
Abariisa baazo bairuka, baabigambira ab'omuri tauni n'ab'omu maka; abantu baahurura, baija kureeba ekyabaho.
Ku baahikire ahari Yesu, baashangaho owaabaire ariho baadaimoni ashutami, ajwaire gye, aine obwengye bwe; baatiina.
Abariisa abaabireebire baabashobororera ebyaba ahari ogwo owaabaire ariho baadaimoni hamwe n'eby'empunu.
Baatandika kweshengyereza Yesu kubarugira omu nsi.
Kandi ku yaabaire naagaruka omu bwato, owaabaire ariho baadaimoni yaamweshengyereza kuguma nawe.
We yaamwangira, yaamugira ati: Irooko otaahe owaanyu omuri bagyenzi baawe, obagambire ebi Mukama akukoreire ku biri bikuru, n'oku akusaasiire.
Yaagyenda, yaatandika kubuzya omuri Dekapooli ebi Yesu amukoreire, ku biri bikuru; abantu boona baatangaara.
Yesu ku yaagarukire, yaayambukira omu bwato, yaahika seeri. Omutwe gw'abantu baingi gwateeranira ah'ari; kandi akaba ari haihi n'enyanja.
Haija omwe aha bakuru ba sinagogi, eiziina rye Yairo. Ku yaareebire Yesu, yaamukwata amaguru;
yaamweshengyereza, naagira ati: Kahara kangye naatsiga niguhiriita. Ija okateho engaro, kakire, kagire amagara.
Yaagyenda nawe. Abantu baingi baamukuratira, baagyenda bamushagatiire.
Kandi hakaba hariho omukazi owaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire ekyejwiso,
naafa kubi munonga naaraguza omu bafumu baingi, yaamariireyo ebintu bye byona, kwonka atarikukira, kureka okweyongyera kurwara.
Ku yaahuriire ebya Yesu, yaija enyima ye omu mutwe gw'abantu, yaakora aha kijwaro kye;
ahakuba akahamya naagira ati: N'obu naakukora aha bijwaro bye, nkaakira.
Ahonaaho ekyejwiso kye kyayoma; yaayehurira omu mubiri gwe ku yaakirira kimwe endwara ye.
Yesu, ku yaahuriire amaani gaamurugamu, ahonaaho yaahindukira omutwe gw'abantu, yaababuuza ati: N'oha owaakora aha kijwaro kyangye?
Abeegi be baamugira bati: Nooreeba abantu baingi nibakumigisiriza, oti, Owankoraho n'oha!
Yaababunzyamu amaisho kureeba owaakora ekyo.
Kwonka omukazi, ahabw'okumanya eki yaakorerwa, yaija aine obwoba naatetema, yaagwa ahansi omu maisho ge, yaamugambira amazima goona.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Mwana wangye, okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza, yegyendere n'obusingye, okirire kimwe endwara yaawe.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija abaaruga omu ka y'omukuru wa sinagogi, nibagira bati: Muhara waawe yaakaba; nooruhiza ki omwegyesa?
Kwonka Yesu tiyaata mutima aha ki baagamba, yaagambira omukuru wa sinagogi ati: Otatiina, ikiriza kwonka.
Kandi tiyaikiriza muntu weena kugyenda nawe, kureka Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana murumuna wa Yakobo.
Ku baahikire aha nju y'omukuru wa sinagogi, yaashangaho okucura, abantu nibarira nibaborooga.
Ku yaataahiremu, yaabagira ati: N'enki ekirikubateeza orwari n'okubariza? Omwishiki tafiire, agwejegyeire.
Baamushekyerera munonga. Kwonka ku yaaherize kubashohoza boona, yaatwara ishe w'omwishiki na nyina n'abu yaabaire aine, yaataahamu, yaahika ahu omwishiki yaabaire ari.
Yaamukwata aha mukono, yaamugira ati: Talisa-kuumi!, amakuru gaakyo ngu Mwishiki 'we, ninkugambira nti: Imuka.
Ahonaaho omwishiki ogwo yaimuka, yaagyenda; ahakuba akaba ahikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri. Ahonaaho baagira okutangaara kwingi munonga.
Yaabeehanangiriza munonga, ngu hatagira owaakimanya; yaaragiira ku bamuha eby'okurya.

Sabato ku yaahikire, yaatandika kwegyesa omuri sinagogi; baingi ku baamuhuriire, baatangaara, nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu akaiha hi ebi byona? Ni bwengye ki ogu obu yaahairwe? Ebi arikukora ka n'eby'okutangaaza!
Beitu ogu t'omubaizi, omwana wa Mariamu, mukuru wa Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Simooni? Na banyaanya tibari owaitu? Ebye byabashobera.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Nabi weena tabura kitiinisa, kureka omu ihanga ryabo, n'omu ruganda rwabo, n'omu ka ye.
N'ahabw'ekyo tarabaasize kukorerayo ky'okutangaaza kyona, kureka akata engaro aha barwaire bakye, yaabakiza.
Yaatangaara ahabw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
Bwanyima yaagyendagyenda omu birorero, naayegyesa.
Yaabaragiira kutagira ki baagyendana, kureka enkoni yonka; kutakoma ntanda, kutatwara furebe, n'obu zaakuba empiiha omu nshaho zaabo;
kureka bagyende bajwaire enkaito; kandi n'okutatwara makanzu abiri.
Kandi yaabaragiira ati: Enju yoona, ei muraataahemu, mube niyo mwagumamu okuhitsya obu murirugayo.
Kandi hoonahoona ahu batariikiriza kubaraaza, bakanga n'okubahurira, ku muriba nimurugayo, mutsigye mwabakunkumurira omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byanyu okuba eky'okubashinja.
Batyo baagyenda nibabuurira ku abantu bashemereire kweteisa.
Baabinga baadaimoni baingi, kandi baasiiga amajuta aha barwaire baingi, baakira.
Kwonka abandi baagira bati: N'Eliya; abandi bati: Ni nabi nk'omwe ahari baanabi aba ira.
Kwonka Heroode ku yaabihuriire, yaagira ati: Ni Yohaana ou naatemire omutwe, azookire.
Ahakuba ebyo bitakabaireho, Heroode akatuma, baakwata Yohaana, baamuboha, baamuta omu kihome ahabwa Herodia, muka Filipo mwene ishe; ahabw'okuba Heroode akaba amuhindwire omukazi we.
Yohaana ku yaabimanyire, yaateisa Heroode, ati: Ebiragiro tibirikukwikiriza kushwera muka mwene sho.
Herodia nikyo yaamwangiire, akenda kumwita; kwonka atabaase;
ahabw'okuba Heroode akaba naatiina Yohaana ahabw'okumumanya ku ari omuntu ohikiriire, kandi orikwera; yaamurinda. Kandi ku yaabaire agambirwa Yohaana,
Bwanyima oburyo bwaboneka aha kiro ky'okwijuka okuzaarwa kwa Heroode, Heroode yaateekyera abaami be na'abakuru b'abaserukare n'abakungu ba Galilaaya obugyenyi.
Omwishiki wa Herodia yaija, yaazina, yaashemeza Heroode n'abagyenzi be. Omugabe nikwo kugira omwishiki ati: Nshaba eki orikwenda kyona, niinyija kukikuha.
Yaarahira naamugira ati: Kyona kyona eki oranshabe, ninkikuha, n'obu kyakuba ekicweka ky'obugabe bwangye.
Omwishiki yaashohora, yaabuuza nyina ati: Mbwenu iwe, okaayenzire ngu mmushabe ki? Yaamugarukamu ati: Omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatizi.
Ahonaaho omwishiki yaarahuka, yaagaruka aha mugabe, yaamushaba ati: Niinyenda hati mbwenu ompe omutwe gwa Yohana Omubatizi omu rucuba.
Omugabe yaashaasha munonga; kwonka ahabw'okushangwa yaarahiire omu maisho g'abagyenyi be, yaashoberwa kumubeiha.
Ahonaaho omugabe yaatuma omuserukare, yaamuragiira kumutemaho omutwe n'okugureeta. Omuserukare yaagyenda omu kihome, yaamutemaho omutwe,
yaagureeta omu rucuba, yaaguha omwishiki, omwishiki yaagutwarira nyina.
Abeegi ba Yohaana ku baakihuriire, baija, baatwara omutimbi gwe, baaguziika.
Yaazigira ati: Mwije aheekiikire twehereere, muhuumureho; ahakuba hakaba hariho baingi abaabaire nibaija kandi nibagyenda; n'ahabw'ekyo Yesu n'abeegi be baabura omwanya nangwa n'ogw'okurya.
Nikwo kugyenda omu bwato aheekiikire, ngu beehereere.
Kwonka abantu baingi baabareeba nibagyenda, baabamanya; baaruga omuri tauni zoona, nibairukanga, baaraba ogw'ebigyere, baabatangayo.
Ku yaayambukire enyanja, yaashanga aho omutwe gw'abantu baingi, yaabagirira esaasi, ahabw'okuba bakaba bari nk'entaama ezitaine muriisa; yaatandika kubeegyesa bingi.
Ku bwabaire omu mwabazyo, abeegi be baija ah'ari, baamugira bati: Aha n'eihamba, kandi bwaza kwira.
Raga abantu bagyende omu byaro n'omu birorero ebiri haihi, beegurire eby'okurya.
We yaabagarukamu ati: Mube niimwe mwabagaburira. Baamugira bati: Mbwenu shi, tugyende tugure emigaati y'edenaari magana abiri, tube niyo twabagaburira?
Yaababuuza ati: Imwe mwineho engahi? Mugyende mwetegyereze. Ku baamanyire, baagira bati: Hariho etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri.
Yaabaragiira kubashutamya boona omu kacwamba omu miteeko.
Baashutama omu mitwe ya igana-igana, kandi n'eya makumi ataano-ataano.
Yaakwata egyo migaati etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaasiima, yaabega emigaati, yaaheereza abeegi be ngu bagite omu maisho g'abantu; n'eby'enyanja ebyo byombi yaabibaha boona.
Boona baarya, baahaaga.
Bwanyima baatorotoora oburagarika bw'emigaati n'eby'enyanja, baijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri.
Abo abaariire bakaba bari abashaija enkumi itaano.
Ku yaaherize kubaraga, yaatemba ekibungo, yaaza kushaba.
Kandi ku bwabaire nibwira, obwato bwahika ahagati y'enyanja, We akiri omu kibungo wenka.
Yaareeba nibabuvuga baremesiibwe omuyaga gubaturukire omumaisho. Omu kusisiimuka kwa kana yaabaizira naagyendesa amaguru aha nyanja, yaashusha nk'orikwenda kubahinguraho.
Ku baamureebire naagyendesa amaguru aha nyanja, baateekateeka ngu n'omuzimu, baayamuza;
ahakuba boona bakamureeba baatiina. Ahonaaho yaagamba nabo, yaabahuumuriza, ati: Muhuumure, niinye, mutatiina.
Yaaragara omu bwato, yaabashangamu. Ahonaaho omuyaga gwacureera. Boona baatangaarira kimwe;
kwonka tibarashoborokyeirwe by'emigaati, ahabw'okuba emitima yaabo ekaba egangaire.
Ku baayambukire, baahika omu nsi ya Genesareeti, baakoma obwato aha nkungu.
Ku baarugire omu bwato, ahonaaho abantu baamumanya,
bairuka baayegaba ebirari aho hoona, baatandika kuheeka abarwaire aha bitanda byabo, baabamushangisa ahu baabaire bahurira ari hoona.

Bwanyima ahu yaabaire aza hoona, omu birorero, n'omuri tauni, n'omu byaro, bakaba babyamya abarwaire omu katare, baamweshengyereza ngu bakore n'aha mukugiro gw'ekanzu ye kwonka; kandi boona abaabaire bagukoraho, bakaba bakira.
Baareeba bamwe aha beegi be nibariisa engaro zisiisikaire, nizo zitajabikire mu maizi ahabw'emigyenzo.
Ahakuba Abafarisaayo n'Abayudaaya boona tibarya ku baba batajabikire gye ngaro zaabo omu maizi, nibakuratira emigyenzo ya baishenkurubo.
Kandi ku baba nibaruga omu katare, tibarya batabandize kwoga. Kandi hariho n'endiijo migyenzo mingi, ei baaragiirwe kurinda, nk'okwozya ebikopo n'enyabya n'ebintu by'emiringa.
Abafarisaayo n'abahandiiki baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki abeegi baawe batakurata migyenzo ya baishenkurubo, bafa okuriisa engaro zisiisikaire?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Imwe ndyarya 'mwe, Isaaya akabaraguraho kurungi, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Ab'eihanga eri nibampaisa ekitiinisa eminwa yaabo,
Kwonka emitima yaabo endi hare.
Bandamiza busha,
Ahakuba enyegyesa ey'ebi beegyesa okuba obuhamizo bw'ediini
N'ebiragiro by'abantu.
Nimureka ekiragiro kya Ruhanga, ngu mugumye emigyenzo y'abantu.
Yaabagambira ati: Imwe mwine obwengye burungi obw'okwangiramu ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, ngu mubone kuhamira aha migyenzo yaanyu!
Ahakuba Musa akagira ati: Otiine sho na nyoko; kandi ati: Orijuma ishe nari nyina, buzimazima aitwe.
Kwonka imwe nimugira muti: Omuntu ku araagambire ishe nari nyina ati: Eki naakukuhaire ni Koribaani, amakuru gaakyo ngu, N'ekihongyeirwe Ruhanga;
muba mutakimwikiriza kugira eki yaakorera ishe nari nyina.
Omu buryo obwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga mukihindura busha ahabw'emigyenzo yaanyu eyaahindukire akarande. Kandi mukora n'ebindi bingi nk'ebyo.
Kandi yaagaruka yaayeta abantu, yaabagira ati: Mumpurire mwena, mwetegyereze.
Tihariho kintu ekiri aheeru y'omuntu, ekimutaahamu kikamushiisha; kwonka ebiruga omunda ye nibyo bimushiisha.
Omuntu oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Ku yaarugire omu bantu, yaataaha omu nju; abeegi be baamubuuza amakuru g'enfumu egyo.
Yaababuuza ati: Biri shi naimwe timwine bwengye? Timurikumanya ngu kyona ekiruga aheeru, kikataaha omu muntu, tikibaasa kumushiisha?
Ahabw'okuba tikimutaaha mu mutima, kureka omu nda, kandi namwo kigaruka kyogamu, kishohora. (Akagamba atyo, naahamya ku hatariho kiriibwa kyona ekrikuzira.)
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Ekiruga omu muntu nikyo kimushiisha;
ahakuba omunda omu mitima y'abantu nimwo haruga ebiteekateeko bibi, okushambana, okwiba, okwita,
okwetenga okubi, okukora kubi, okuryarya, okurigira okubi, eitima, okubeiherera abandi, amaryo, n'okwefiisa omutima.
Ebibi ebyo byona biruga omu muntu, kandi nibyo bimushiisha.
Ahonaaho omukazi, owaabaire aine akaishiki akaabaire kariho daimoni, ku yaamuhuriire, yaija, yaamukwata amaguru.
Kandi omukazi ogwo akaba ari Omugriika, oruganda rwe ari Omusirofoiniiki. Yaamweshengyereza kubinga daimoni aha mwana we.
Yesu yaamugambira ati: Reka abaana baabanze bahaagye; ahakuba ti kirungi kwaka abaana eby'okurya, okabitambikira embwa.
Omukazi ogwo yaamwikiriza ati: Eego, Mukama wangye; kwonka embwa nazo, eziri ahansi y'emeeza, zirya oburagarika bw'abaana.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Ahabw'ekigambo ekyo yegyendere; omwana waawe daimoni yaamurugaho.
Omukazi yaagaruka omu ka ye, yaashanga omwana arambiire aha kitanda, daimoni yaamurugireho.
Bwanyima yaagaruka naaruga omu ishaza rya Tuuro, yaaraba Sidoni; ku yaarabire omu ishaza rya Dekapooli, yaahika aha nyanja ya Galilaaya.
Baamureetera ekiteta ky'ekifa-matu; bamweshengyereza ngu amuteho engaro.
Yaamwiha omu mutwe gw'abantu, yaamwekiikana, yaamuta enkumu omu matu, kandi yaacwera amacwante, yaamukora aha rurimi;
yaareeba ahaiguru omu iguru, omwitsyo gwamuruga hare, yaamugambira ati: Efasa! Amakuru gaakyo ngu, Iguka.
Amatu ge gaiguka, n'engata y'orurimi rwe yaakomooroka, yaagamba gye.
Kandi yaabeehanangiriza kutagira u baakigambira; kwonka ahi yaagarukiire kubeehanangiriza, bakakizaho kukirangaana.
Baatangaara munonga barengyesereza, baagira bati: Byona yaabikora gye; yaahuriza ekifa-matu, kandi yaagambisa ekiteta.
Ninsaasira abantu aba, ahabw'okuba bamzire aha naanye ebiro bishatu, kandi hati tibaine by'okurya.
Ku ndaaboohereze kugaruka owaabo basiibirekwo, nibaija kugwera enshazi omu muhanda; kandi mumanye ngu abamwe omuribo barugire hare.
Abeegi be baamugarukamu bati: Mbwenu omuntu naabaasa ata kugaburira aba bantu aha omu ihamba?
Yaababuuza ati: Hari mwine emigaati engahi? Baamugarukamu bati: Ni mushanju.
Yaaragiira abantu kushutama ahansi; ku yaaherize kusiima yaagibega, yaagiha abeegi be kugiha abantu; nabo baagibata omumaisho.
Kandi bakaba baine eby'enyanja bikye; ku yaaherize kubishabira omugisha, yaaragiira ngu nabyo babibate omumaisho.
Baarya baahaaga; baatorotoora oburagarika obwatsigaireho, baijuza ebiibo mushanju.
Abantu bakaba bari nk'enkumi ina.
Yaabaraga; ahonaaho yaagaruka omu bwato n'abeegi be, yaayambuka, naaza omu kyanga kya Dalmanusa.
Omwitsyo gwamuruga hare, yaagira ati: Ab'obusingye obu nibendera ki akamanyiso? Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ab'obusingye obu tibarireeba kamanyiso.
Yaabatsigaho, yaaza omu bwato, yaayambuka seeri.
Kwonka bakaba beebirwe kukoma entanda, kandi omu bwato bakaba baine omugaati gumwe gwonka.
Yaabeehanangiriza ati: Reeba, mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'ekya Heroode.
Baagambirana bati: Eki arikufa n'ahabw'okuba titwine migaati.
Yesu ku yaabimanyire, yaababuuza ati: Nimufa ki aha by'emigaati? Timukamanyire n'obu kwakuba okushoborokyerwa? Mukiine emitima egangaire?
Ka mwine amaisho, timureeba? Ka mwine amatu, timuhurira? Nari shi, timwijuka?
Ku naagaburiire abantu enkumi itaano emigaati etaano, mukatorotoora ebitenga bingahi ebiijwire oburagarika? Baamugarukamu bati: Ikumi na bibiri.
Kandi shi, ku naagaburiire enkumi ina emigaati mushanju, bwo mukatorotoora ebiibo biijwire bingahi? Baamugarukamu bati: Ni mushanju.
Yaabagira ati: Timukashoborokyeirwe?
Baagarukayo, baahika Besesaida. Baamureetera empumi, baamweshengyereza ngu agikoreho.
Yaakwata empumi omukono, yaagishohoza okuruga omu kirorero; ku yaaherize kumucwera amacwante omu maisho, yaamukoraho n'engaro, yaamubuuza ati: Mbwenu hati, oine eki orikureeba?
Yaabuuruura amaisho, yaagira ati: Nindeeba abantu; kwonka nibansusira nk'emiti baaba nibagyenda.
Yesu yaagaruka, yaamuta engaro aha maisho, empumi egyo yaayetegyereza, yaakira, yaareeba byona kurungi.
Yaamwohereza kutaaha owe, naamugira ati: Nangwa otagaruka n'omu kirorero.
Yesu yaagumizamu n'abeegi be, baataaha omu birorero bya Kaisarea-Filipi. Ku baabaire nibakigyenda, yaabuuza abeegi be ati: Beitu abantu bagira ngu mba oha?
Baamugarukamu bati: Abamwe nibagira ntu, ori Yohaana Omubatizi; abandi ngu: Ori Eliya; kandi abandi ngu: Ori omwe ahari baanabi.
Yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi imwe, mugira ngu mba oha? Petero yaamugarukamu ati: Ori Kristo.
Yesu yaabeehanangiriza kutakigambiraho ondiijo.

Yaiha aho, yaatandika kubeegyesa ku Omwana w'omuntu ashemereire kubonabonesibwa omuri bingi, n'okwangwa abakuru n'abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki, n'okwitwa, kandi n'okuzooka bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu.
Ekigambo ekyo akakigamba butunu. Bwanyima Petero yaamuta aha rubaju, yaamuteisa.
Yesu yaahinduka, yaareeba abeegi be, yaahana Petero, naagira ati: Garuka enyima yangye, Sitaane; ahakuba torikuteekateeka bya Ruhanga, kureka eby'abantu.
Yaayeta emitwe y'abantu n'abeegi be, yaabagira ati: Omuntu weena ku araayende kunkuratira, ayeyangise, ayekorere omusharaba gwe, ankuratire.
Ahakuba omuntu weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge, aryagabuza; kandi weena orikubuza amagara ge ahabwangye n'ahabw'engiri, aryagakiza.
Mbwenu omuntu kiryamugasira ki okutunga ensi yoona, haza akafeerwa amagara ge?
Nari shi, omuntu akaahaireyo ki okucungura amagara ge?

Mumanye ngu omuntu weena orikwitwa enshoni ahabwangye n'ahabw'ebigambo byangye omu busingye obu obw'obushambani, haza kandi obubi, Omwana w'omuntu nawe aryaitwa enshoni ahabwe, ku ariizira omu kitiinisa kya Ishe na baamaraika abarikwera.
Yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuri aba abeemereire aha, hariho bamwe abarireeba obukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija n'amaani, batakafiire.
ebijwaro bye bayamurinkana, byayera tiitiiti, kandi tihariho mwozi omu nsi owaakubaasize kubyeza atyo.
Kandi Eliya na Musa baababonekyera, nibagaaniira na Yesu.
Petero yaagira Yesu ati: Mwegyesa, ni kirungi obu turi aha; twombekye obuju bushatu, akamwe kabe akaawe, akandi kabe aka Musa, n'akandi aka Eliya.
Akaba atarikumanya eki ashemereire kugamba, ahabw'okuba bakaba batiinire munonga.
Ahonaaho ekicu kyaija, kyabasangira; eiraka ryayema omu kicu nirigira riti: Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda; mumuhurire.
Ahonaaho ku baamagamagire, tibaareebaho muntu ondiijo, kureka Yesu wenka.
Ku baabaire nibashuuma, nibaruga aha rushozi, Yesu yaabeehanangiriza kutagira u baagambira ahari byona ebi baareebire, okuhitsya obu Omwana w'omuntu arizooka omu bafu.
Baakyerinda, nibeebuuza bonka bati: Okuzooka omu bafu n'enki?
Kadi baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki abahandiiki bagira ngu, Eliya ashemereire kubanza kwija?
Yaabagarukamu ati: N'eky'amazima; Eliya niwe w'okubanza kwija, abone kushemeza byona; beitu eby'Omwana w'omuntu byo bikahandiikwa bita, ngu ashemereire kubonabonesibwa omuri bingi, n'okugaywa?
Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Eliya araizire, kandi bakamutwaza nk'oku baayenzire, nk'oku kyamuhandiikirweho.
Ahonaaho abantu boona ku baamureebire, baatangaara munonga, bairuka baaza kumuramutsya.
Yaababuuza ati: Mwaba nimuhakana ki?
Omwe ahari abo bantu yaamugarukamu ati: Mwegyesa, nkureeteire omwana wangye, ahakuba ariho daimoni otarikugamba.
Ahu amukwatira hoona, amuteera ahansi; omwana areeta eifuro, anena amaino, agangaara; naashaba abeegi baawe kumubinga, baaremwa.
Yesu yaagambira abeegi be ati: Imwe abatarikwikiriza, ndyahitsya hi okuguma naimwe; ndyahitsya hi okubagumisiririza? Mumundeetere!
Baamumureetera. Daimoni ku yaamureebire, ahonaaho yaatetemya omwana, omwana yaagwa ahansi, yaayekuringa, yaareeta eifuro.
Yesu yaabuuza ishe ati: Akakwatwa ryari endwara egi? Ishe ati: Akakwatwa akiri muto.
Kaingi amutuura omu muriro n'omu maizi kumwita; ku oraabe noobaasa endwara egi, otugirire embabazi, otuhwere.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Wangira ngu, Ku ndaabe nimbaasa! Eego, byona nibibaasika ahari ogwo orikwikiriza.
Ahonaaho ishe w'omwana yaagamba munonga ati: Niinyikiriza! Onkize obutaikiriza bwangye!
Yesu ku yaareebire abantu baingi nibairuka nibamwizira, yaagambira kubi daimoni, yaamugira ati: Iwe daimoni otarikugamba, otarikuhurira, naakuragiira, murugyeho, otarimugarukaho obundi.
Daimoni yaayamuza, yaamutetemya munonga, yaamurugaho; omwana yaaba nk'ofiire; abangi baagira ngu, yaafa.
Kwonka Yesu yaamukwata aha mukono, yaamwimutsya; omwana yaayemerera.
Ku baataahire omu nju, abeegi be baamubuuza omu mubonano, bati: Itwe ahanki tutaabaasa kumubinga?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Daimoni ow'omuringo nk'ogu tarikubingwa kindi kureka okushaba n'okwesiibyakwo.
ahakuba akaba naayegyesa abeegi be ati: Omwana w'omuntu aryaheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu, bamwite; kandi ku ariheza kwitwa, aryazooka bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu.
Kwonka tibaramanyire ki arikugamba; n'okutiina baatiina kumubuuza.
Baahunama kwonka, ahabw'okuba ku baabaire bari omu muhanda, baahakana bonka ngu, N'oha oriba omukuru omuribo?
Yaashutama, yaayeta bari okumi na babiri, yaabagira ati: Omuntu oryenda kuba ow'okubanza, ogwo ashemereire kuba ow'enyima y'abandi boona, kandi omuheereza wa boona.
Yaakwata omwana muto, yaamuta ahagati yaabo, yaamukiikira omu mikono, yaabagira ati:
Weena orikwakiira omwe aha baana bato nk'ogu omu iziina ryangye, biri niinye ayakiire; kandi n'omuntu weena orikuunyakiira, tiinye arikwakiira, kureka Ogwo owantumire.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Mutamuzibira; ahakuba tihaine muntu weena okora eky'okutangaaza omu iziina ryangye, oribaasa kuhinduka juba, akangamba kubi;
ahakuba omuntu weena otari muzigu waitu, aba ari owaitu.
Kandi omuntu weena oribaha enkyeka ya'amaizi ahabw'okuba aba Kristo, buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tariimwa bihembo bye.
Omuntu weena orireetera omwe ahari abo bato abarikuunyikiriza kukora ekibi, haakiri ogwo okubohwa orubengo omu bitsya, akanagwa omu nyanja.
Omukono gwawe ku guraabe nigukureetera kukora ekibi, ogutemeho; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara ori ekimuga, okukira okuza Gehena omu muriro ogutaraara, oine emikono yombi,
ahu enyogori zaabo zitafa, n'ahu omuriro gutaraara.
N'ekigyere kyawe ku kiraabe nikikureetera kukora ekibi, okitemeho; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara ori ekimuga, okukira okuza Gehena oine ebigyere byombi,
ahu enyogori zaabo zitafa, n'ahu omuriro gutaraara.
N'eriisho ryawe ku riraabe nirikureetera kukora ekibi, oriihemu; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga oine eriisho rimwe, okukira okuza Gehena oine amaisho gombi,
ahu enyogori zaabo zitafa, n'ahu omuriro gutaraara.
Buri muntu aryabugwamu omuriro nk'oku omwonyo guhika omu by'okurya.
Omwonyo ni murungi; mbwenu ku guraabe guhweirwemu ensha, muryagigaruramu muta? Imwe mugire omwonyo omu mitima yaanyu, kandi mugire obusingye omuntu na mugyenzi we.
Kandi Abafarisaayo baija ah'ari, baamubuuza nibamutega bati: Beitu Ebiragiro biikiriza omuntu kushenda omukazi we?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Musa akabaragiira ata?
Baagarukamu bati: Musa akaikiriza omuntu kuhandiika ebaruha y'okutaana n'omukazi we, ngu abone kumushenda.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Eki yaabahereire ekiragiro ekyo n'ahabw'obugangaazi bw'omu mitima yaanyu;
kwonka okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi, Ruhanga akahanga omushaija n'omukazi.
Omushaija nikyo atsigiraho ishe na nyina, akaguma n'omukazi we,
n'abo bombi bakahinduka omuntu omwe; baba batakiri babiri kureka omwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo eki Ruhanga yaateeraine hamwe, omuntu atarikitaanisa.
Ku baabaire bari omu nju, abeegi be baagaruka baamubuuza aha kigambo ekyo.
Yaabashobororera ati: Omuntu weena orishenda omukazi we, akashwera ondiijo, biri ashambaine, kandi aitsire obushwere aha mukazi we;
n'omukazi ku aritaana na iba, yaashwerwa ondi, biri ashambaine.
Kwonka Yesu ku yaakireebire, yaabagwerwa kubi, yaabagira ati: Murekye abaana bato baije ahariinye, mutabazibira; ahabw'okuba obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obw'abari nk'abo.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena otaikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana muto, taributaahamu na kakye.
Yaabakiikira, yaabaha omugisha, abataireho engaro.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Noonyetera ki omurungi? Tihariho murungi, kureka Ruhanga wenka.
Noomanya ebiragiro, Otariita, Otarishambana, Otariiba, Otaribeiherera ondiijo, Otarigobya, Otiine sho na nyoko.
Omushaija yaamugarukamu ati: Mwegyesa, ebyo byona nkabyerinda okuruga omu buto bwangye.

Yesu ku yaamureebire, yaamukunda, yaamugira ati: Mbwenu nooburwaho kimwe; irooko ogyende, otunde byona ebi otungire; ebi oraihemu, obihe abooro; nibwo oritunga eitungo omu iguru; haza oije onkuratire.
Ku yaahuriire ebyo, yaahinduriza ahamaisho, yaagyenda aine enaku nyingi, ahabw'okuba akaba aine eitungo ringi.
Yesu nikwo kubabuzyamu amaisho, akagira abeegi be ati: Ka nikiremeera abatungi okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!
Abeegi be baatangaarira ebigambo bye. Kwonka Yesu yaabashobororera ati: Baana 'mwe, nikiremeera abeesiga obutungi okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Nikirahuka engamira okuraba omu nyindo y'empitirizo, okukira omutungi okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Baatangaara munonga, baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu shi hoona, n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa?
Yesu yaabareeba, yaabagarukamu ati: Ekyo tikirikubaasika ha bantu, kwonka ahari Ruhanga byona nibibaasika.
Petero nikwo kumugambira ati: Reeba itwe tukatsigaho byona, twakukuratira!
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tihaine muntu owaatsigireho enju, beene ishe, banyaanya, nyina, ishe, abaana, nari ekibanja kye ahabwangye n'ahabw'engiri,
otariheebwa omu biro bya hati ebirikukira ebyo emirungi igana, enju, beene ishe, banyaanya, baanyina, abaana, ebibanja, hamwe n'okuhiigwa, kandi omu biro bya bwanyima akaheebwa amagara agatahwaho.
Kwonka baingi ab'okubanza baryaba aba bwanyima, n'aba bwanyima baryaba ab'okubanza.
ati: Reeba, nitwinamuka Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu aryaheebwayo aha banyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki; baryamucwera orubanja rw'okumwita, bamuheyo aha Banyamahanga;
baryamushungisa, bamucwere amacwante; baryamwasha, baryamwita; kandi aryazooka bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimwenda ngu mbakorere ki?
Baamugarukamu bati: Twikirize omwe ashutame aha rubaju rwawe rwa buryo, n'ondi aha rwa bumohso omu kitiinisa kyawe.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Timurikumanya ki murikushaba. Nimubaasa kunywa aha kikopo eki ndikunywaho, nari okubatizibwa okubatizibwa oku ndikubatizibwamu?
Baamugarukamu bati: Eego, nitubaasa. Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Ekikopo eki ndikunywaho naimwe muryakinywaho; n'okubatizibwa oku ndikubatizibwamu, muryakubatizibwamu.
Kwonka okushutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo nari shi aha rwa bumohso, tiinye nkuha; kureka n'okwabo abaakucumiirwe.
Kandi eikumi ku baakihuriire, baatandika kugwerwa kubi Yakobo na Yohaana.
Yesu nikwo kubeeta, akabagira ati: Nimumanya ngu abo abeetwa abategyeki b'abanyamahanga babategyekyesa eikama, n'abakuru baabo babaragiiza obushoboorozi.
Kwonka omuriimwe tikwo kiriba; weena oryenda kuba omukuru omuriimwe, ashemereire kuba omuheereza waanyu;
n'oryenda kuba ow'okubanza omuriimwe, ashemereire kuba omuhuuku wa boona.
Ahabw'okuba omu mazima Omwana w'omuntu taraizire kuheerezibwa, kureka okuheereza abandi, n'okuhayo amagara ge okucungura baingi.
Ku yaahuriire ngu orikwija ni Yesu owa Nazareesi, yaatandika kwamuza n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Yesu, Omwana wa Daudi, ongirire embabazi!
Kandi baingi baamuteisa, ngu acureere; kwonka we yaagumizamu naagamba munonga ati: Mwana wa Daudi, ongirire embabazi!
Yesu yaayemerera, yaagira ati: Nimumwete. Baamweta, baamugambira bati: Huumura; imuka, naakweta.
Nawe yaanaga omwenda gwe, yaabandatuka, yaija ahari Yesu.
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda ngu nkukorere ki? Ogwo mushaija yaamugarukamu ati:
Yesu yaamwikiriza ati: Irooko, okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza. Ahonaaho yaahumuuka, yaamukuratira omu muhanda.
yaabagira ati: Mugyende omu kirorero ekibari omumaisho; ahonaaho ku muraataahemu, nimwija kushangamu omwana gw'endogoya gutsibikire, ogutakatembwahoga muntu; mugutsibure, mugundeetere.
Omuntu weena, ku araababuuze ati: Nimugutsiburira ki? Imwe mugarukyemu muti, Mukama waitu naagwenda, kandi naija kugugarura juba.
Batyo baagyenda, baashanga omwana gw'endogoya gutsibikire aha irembo aha rubaju rw'omuhanda; baagutsibura.
Kandi bamwe aha baabaire beemereire aho, baababuza bati: Nimukora ki okutsibura omwana gw'endogoya?
Baabagarukamu nk'oku Yesu yaabagambira; baabareka.
Baareetera Yesu omwana gw'endogoya, baagutaho ebijwaro byabo; Yesu yaagutembaho.
Baingi baayarira ebijwaro byabo omu nguuto, abandi amababi agu baihire omu misiri.
Abamushendekyereize bamwebembeire, n'abandi bamuri enyima, baayeshongora n'eiraka rihango bati: Hosana, Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe!
Obugabe oburikwija obwa tatenkuriitwe Daudi busiimwe! Hosana ahaiguru munonga!
Omu kasheeshe, ku baabaire baahika omu muhanda nibaruga Besania, yaagira enjara.

Ku yaareebire hangahari omutiini oguriho amababi, yaagyenda yaaguhikaho, ngu akaagira eki yaagushangaho. Kwonka ku yaaguhikireho, tiyaashangaho kantu kureka omubengyeyo gw'amababi, ahabw'okuba bukaba butari bunaku bw'okwana.
Yaagugira ati: Okuruga hati okuhitsya ebiro byona hatarigira omuntu owaarya aha byana byawe. N'abeegi be baakihurira.
kandi tiyaikiriza muntu weena kurabya omuri hekalu ekintu akyekoreire.
Yaayegyesa naabagambira ati: Timurikumanya ku kyahandiikirwe ngu, Enju yangye eryayetwa enju y'okuguma neeshabirwamu amahanga goona? Mbwenu imwe mugihindwire enyanga y'abambuzi,
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki, ku baakihuriire, baacwa obwengye oku baraamwite; kwonka baamutiina, ahabw'okuba abantu boona bakaba nibatangaarira okwegyesa kwe.
Kandi ku bwabaire bwira, aruga omu rurembo.
Kandi ku baabaire nibahingura omu kasheeshe akandi, baareeba ogwo mutiini gwomire okwiha omu mizi.
Petero yaijuka ekibaireho, yaagira Yesu ati: Rabi, reeba omutiini ogu okyeenire gwomire!
Yesu yaabagarukamu naagira ati: Mwesigye Ruhanga!
Kandi buzima nimbagambira nti: Weena origira orushozi oru ati, Tsinduka, onagwe omu nyanja, atarikubanganisa mu mutima gwe, naikiriza ngu eki arikugamba nikiija kubakwo, aryakikorerwa.
Nikyo ndikubagirira nti: Byona ebi murishaba omu kushaba kwanyu, mwikirize ngu mubihairwe, kandi kwo muryabiheebwa.
Obutoosha ku muraagume mwayemerera nimushaba, mwaba mwine ekigambo aha muntu weena, mumusaasire; na Shoimwe ori omu iguru abone kubasaasira eby'okushiisha byanyu.
Ahakuba ku muraabe mutarikusaasira, na Shoimwe ori omu iguru taribasaasira by'okushiisha byanyu.
baamubuuza bati: Ni bushoboorozi ki oburikukukoresa ebi, nari shi n'oha owaakuhaire obushoboorozi obu kubikora?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Reka naanye mbabuuze ekigambo kimwe; haza mungarukyemu, naanye mbone kubahsobororera obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebi.
Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga omu iguru nari omu bantu? Mungarukyemu.
Baayegarukanamu nibagira bati: Ku turaagire tuti, Kukaruga omu iguru, naatugarukamu ati: Kandi shi, n'enki ekyabazibiire kumwikiriza?
Tugire tuti, Kukaruga omu bantu? baatiina abantu, ahakuba abantu boona bakaba nibahamya ngu Yohaana ni nabi buzima.
Baamugarukamu bati: Titurikuhamanya. Yesu nikwo kubagira ati: Naanye tindikubagambira bushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebi.
Mbwenu obunaku bw'okwera ku bwahikire, yaatuma omuhuuku we ahari abo bahingi, ngu bamutwekyere aha byana by'emizaabibu.
Abahingi baamukwata, baamuteera, baamubinga, yaagarukayo atabiine.
Yaagaruka yaabatumaho ondiijo muhuuku; ogwo baamuhutaaza omutwe, baamuhemangura.
Nabwo yaagaruka yaabatumaho ondiijo, ogwo baamwita; n'abandi baingi, abamwe baabateera, abandi baabaita.
Kwonka akaba atsigaize omutabani ou arikukunda; yaamubatumaho bwanyima, naagira ati: Omwana wangye baryamuha ekitiinisa.
Kwonka abo bahingi baagambirana bonka nibagira bati: Ogu niwe muhunguzi; murekye tumwite, n'obuhunguzi buryaba obwaitu.
Baamukwata, baamwita, baamunaga aheeru y'omusiri gw'emizaabibu.
Mbwenu mukama w'emizaabibu aryakora ki? Aryaija, acwekyereze abo bahingi, n'omusiri gw'emizaabibu aguheereze abandi.
Timukashomaga ekyahandiikirwe eki ngu,
Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire,
Ekyo kikaruga ahari Mukama,
Kandi n'eky'okutangaaza omu maisho gaitu?
Baacwa obwengye oku baraamukwate, ahakuba bakamanya ku nibo yaaba naaregyeza omu kucwa enfumu egyo; kwonka baatiina abantu, baamureka, baagyenda.

Baija baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, nitumanya ku ori ow'amazima, kandi togwera rubaju rw'omuntu weeena orutahikire, ahabw'okuba totiinisibwa kitiinisa ky'omuntu, kureka oyegyesa omuhanda gwa Ruhanga omu mazima. Ebiragiro nibiikiriza kuha Kaisaari omushoro, nari tikwo?
Tushore, nari turereere? Kwonka ku yaamanyire oburyarya bwabo, yaabagira ati: Nimuntegyera ki? Mundeetere edenaari, ngireebe.
Baagireeta. Yaababuuza ati: Ekishishani eki n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha? Baamugarukamu bati: N'ebya Kaisaari.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Mbwenu nu ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari; n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga. Baamutangaarira munonga.
Mwegyesa, Musa akatuhandiikira, yaatugira ati: Mwene ishe w'omuntu, ku arifa yaatsiga omukazi atakazaire nawe, omuntu ogwo ahungure ogwo mufaakazi, amumuzaarireho abaana.
Mbwenu hakaba hariho enyine-emwe mushanju; mukuru waabo akashwera omukazi; yaafa atakazaire nawe.
Omurumuna yaamuhungura, nawe yaafa atakazaire; n'owa kashatu atyo.
Boona omushanju baafa batakazaire nawe. Bwanyima omukazi ogwo nawe yaabakurata, yaafa.
Mbwenu omu kuzooka aryaba muka oha? Ahakuba boona omushanju bakamushwera.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Ekibahabisa t'okutamanya Byahandiikirwe, n'obu gaakuba amaani ga Ruhanga?
Ahakuba omu kuzooka tibarishwera, kandi tibarishwerwa, kureka baryaba nka baamaraika ab'omu iguru.
Ebirikukwata aha by'okuzooka kw'abafu, timukashomaga omu kitabo kya Musa, Ruhanga oku yaamugambiire ari aha Rushaka, ati: Nyowe ndi Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo?
Ruhanga ti Ruhanga w'abafu, kureka ow'abahuriire. Muhabire munonga.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ekirikubikira n'ekirikugira kiti: Hurira, Israeli! Mukama Ruhanga waitu n'Omwe wenka;
okunde Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'amagara gaawe goona, n'obwengye bwawe bwona, kandi n'amaani gaawe goona.
Ekya kabiri n'ekirikugira kiti: okunde mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda. Tihariho kiragiro ekirikukira ebi.
Omuhandiiki yaamugarukamu ati: Haza kwo, Mwegyesa, waagamba gye okugira oti, n'Omwe, kandi oti, Tihariho ondiijo kureka We wenka;
kandi okumukunda n'omutima gwona, n'obwengye bwona, n'amaani goona, n'okukunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda, ebi nibikira ebitambo byona ebyokyeize kimwe n'empongano.
Yesu ku yaahuriire yaamugarukamu n'okwetegyereza, yaamugira ati: Tori hare n'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Okuruga aho tihaine owaagarukire kumuturukirira kumubuuza.
Haza Daudi we yaagambisiibwe Omwoyo Orikwera ati:
Mukama akagambira Mukama wangye ati:
Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
Okuhitsya obu ndita abazigu baawe ahansi y'ebigyere byawe.
Beitu shi, Daudi we wenka ku araabe amweta Mukama we, kandi naabaasa ata kuba omwana we? Omutwe gw'abantu ab'obutoosha gwamuhurira gushemereirwe.
n'okushutama aha bitebe by'ekitiinisa omuri sinagogi, n'emyanya y'ekitiinisa omu magyenyi,
kandi abanyaga enju z'abafaakazi, bakarandagatana omu kushaba, haza nibaryarya. Abo baryacwerwa orubanja orurikukira obuhango.
Bwanyima haija omufaakazi omworo, yaatamu obwoma bubiri oburikwingana sente ibiri.
Yesu yaayeta abeegi be, yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omufaakazi oriya omworo yaatamu bingi okukira bariya boona abaheereza ebiconco.
Ahabw'okuba abo boona baatamu aha bibashaagire; kwonka omufaakazi oriya yaatamu ebi aine byona, kandi niryo itungo rye heza.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Nooreeba ebyombeko ebi ku biri bihango? Kwonka tihariho ibaare eriritsigara riri aha rindi eritarinagwa hansi.
Ku yaabaire ashutami omu kibungo kya Zeituuni ahashungaine na hekalu, Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana na Anderea baamubuuza omu mubonano, nibagira bati:
Tugambire ebi ahu biribeeraho, kandi ni kamanyiso ki akaryoreka obunaku obu ebi byona birihikiirizibwamu?
Yesu yaatandika kubagarukamu ati: Mwerinde hatarigira omuntu weena owaabahabisa.
Baingi baryaija omu iziina ryangye nibagira bati: Niinye Kristo! Kandi baryahabisa baingi.
Ku murihurira engamba n'okurangaanwa kwazo, mutaritiina; ebyo bishemereire kubaho; kwonka emperu yo eryaba etakahikire.
Eihanga riryateera erindi ihanga, n'obugabe buryateera obundi bugabe; haryabaho emitsitsa omu myanya mingi, haryabaho n'enjara; ebyo niyo ntandikiro y'obusaasi.
Kandi engiri eshemereire kubanza kubuurirwa omu mahanga goona.
Ku bariba nibabatwara omu manja, baabahayo, mutaryeremeza omutima ahabw'ebi murigamba; ahakuba tiimwe muryegambisa kureka Omwoyo Orikwera.
Mukuru w'omuntu aryahayo omurumuna kwitwa, na ishe w'omwana aryahayo omwana we, abaana baryagomera abazaire baabo, babaitise;
kandi muryayangwa abantu boona nibabatura eiziina ryangye. Kwonka origumisiriza okuhitsya aha muheru, niwe arijunwa.
n'ori aha mutwe gw'enju ataritemburuka, n'obu kuriba okutaahamu, ngu agire eki yaihamu;
n'oriba ari omu misiri atarigarukayo kwenda omwenda gwe.
Abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya omu biro ebyo baryakareeba!
Mushabe bitarihika mu biro by'embeho.
Ahabw'okuba ebiro ebyo biryaba eby'obusaasi obutakabahoga okwiha aha kuhangwa kw'ebintu ebi Ruhanga yaahangire n'okuhitsya hati, kandi tibiribaho.
Kuri Mukama ataracwire ha biro ebyo, tihaakurokokireho muntu weena; kwonka ahabw'entoore ezi yaatooraine akatuubya aha biro ebyo.
Omu biro ebyo omuntu weena ku aribagambira ati: Reeba, Kristo ari aha! nari shi, ari hariya! mutarimwikiriza;
ahakuba haryaimuka abarikweyeta Kristo na baanabi b'ebishuba, baryakora eby'okureeberaho n'eby'okutangaaza, babone kuhabisa n'entoore, kyaba nikibaasika.
Kwonka imwe mwerinde; naabagambira byona bitakahikire.
enyonyoozi ziryaragara okuruga omu iguru, n'eby'amaani eby'omu iguru biryatengyetsibwa.
Obwo nibwo barireeba Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu, aine amaani maingi n'ekitiinisa.
Kandi aryatuma baamaraika be, ateerane entoore ze okuruga omu mbaju ina aha muheru gw'ensi, okuhika aha muheru gw'eiguru.
Mbwenu mwegyere aha mutiini nk'eky'okureeberaho; eitaagi ryagwo, ku ryoroba, ryatooka amababi, mumanya omwaka ku guri haihi.
Nikwo naimwe, ku murireeba ebyo byagyenda nibibaho, mumanye ku ari haihi, ku yaahikire n'aha rwigi.
Buzimazima nibmagambira nti: Obusingye obu tiburihwaho okuhitsya obu ebi byona biribaho.
Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho, kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho.
Kwonka eby'ekiro ekyo n'obunaku obwo tihaine orikubimanya, n'obu baakuba baamaraika ab'omu iguru, n'obu yaakuba Omwana, kureka Ishe wenka.
Mwerinde, mugume nimureeba, kandi mushabe, ahakuba timurikumanya ahu obunaku obwo burihikira.
Nikishusha nk'omuntu orikwenda kuza omu nsi endiijo; yaaba naaruga omu ka ye, atsiga aragiire abahuuku be emirimo, buri omwe amuha ogwe, n'omurinzi okurinda eka.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba, ahabw'okuba timurikumanya bunaku obu mukama w'eka ariiziramu, yaaba mu mwabazyo, nari omu itumbi, nari enkoko nizigamba, nari omu kasheeshe,
atakaija kitaraariire, akashanga mugwejegyeire.
Eki ndikubagambira imwe, nikyo ngambira boona, nti: Mugume nimureeba!
kwonka baagira bati: Turekye kumukwatira omu bugyenyi, hatabaho okwimukirira omu bantu.
Abamwe aha baabaire bariho baaguubwa kubi, nibagira bati: Amajuta aga gaafa ki?
Nangwa kuri gaagurwamu edenaari ezirikushaaga magana ashatu, zikagabirwa abooro! Baamwetomboitera.
Kwonka Yesu yaagira ati: Mumurekye; nimumugwisiza ki kubi? Eki yankorera ni kirungi;
ahabw'okuba abooro mutuura nabo obutoosha; nimubaasa kubakorera gye, mwaba nimwenda; kwonka nyowe timuriguma naanye obutoosha.
Yaakora nk'oku arikubaasa; yaabanza kunsiiga amajuta kuteekateeka omubiri gwangye, ntakaziikirwe.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Engiri ei erigambwa hoona omu nsi yoona, n'eki omukazi ogu yaakora kiryagambwayo kumwijuka.
Ku baakihuriire, baashemererwa, baaraganisa kumuha empiiha. Nawe yaasherura oburyo bw'okumureebya.
Yaatuma babiri aha beegi be, yaabagira ati: Mwirooko muze omu rurembo, okwo nimwija kubuganayo omushaija, ayekoreire enjoga y'amaizi; mumukuratire;
enju ei araataahemu yoona, mugambire nyineeka muti: Omwegyesa yaakutumaho, naakubuuza ngu, Ekishengye ky'abagyenyi kiri nkahi, omu araariire Okuhingurwaho n'abeegi be?
Naija kubooreka ekishengye kihango eky'ahaiguru ekicumirwe, ekirimu byona; mube nimwo mwatuteguurira.
Batyo abeegi baagyenda, baataaha omu rurembo, baashanga biri nk'oku yaabagambira; baatebeekanisa Okuhingurwaho.
Ku baabaire nibarya, Yesu yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omwe ahariimwe orikurya naanye naija kundeebya.
Baatandika kushaasha bashobeirwe, baamubuuza omwe omwe nibagira bati: Niinye?
Yaabagarukamu ati: N'omwe ahari aba ikumi na babiri orikukoza naanye omu rwabya.
Omwana w'omuntu naija kugyenda, nk'oku kyamuhandiikirweho, kwonka orikumureebya aryakareeba. Kikaabaire kirungi nangwa kuri atarazairwe.
Yaakwata ekikopo; ku yaaherize kusiima, yaakibaha, boona baanywaho.
Yaabagira ati: Egi n'eshagama yangye ey'endagaano, esheesheka ahabwa baingi.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tindinywa ha byana by'emizaabibu okuhitsya aha kiro ekyo, obu ndibinywa biri bisya omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Bwanyima Yesu yaabagira ati: Imwe mwena nimwija kumpemukaho; ahakuba nikwo kyahandiikirwe ngu, Ndyateera omuriisa, entaama zitaataane.
Kwonka ku ndiheza kuzooka, ndyababandiza Galilaaya.
Petero yaahiga naamugira ati: N'obu abandi boona baraakuhemukyeho, kwonka nyowe tindikwija kukuhemukaho.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Iwe eki kiro enkoko etakashubiire, noija kuunyehakana kashatu.
Kwonka Petero yaayeyongyera kuhigira kimwe ati: N'obu naakuba ow'okwitwa naiwe, tindikwija kukwehakana na kakye. N'abandi boona baagira batyo.
Yaatwara Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana; yaatandika kugira obusaasi bwingi n'okushoberwa munonga.
Yaabagira ati: Omutima gwangye gwine obusaasi bwingi bw'okuunyita; mugume aha nimureeba.
Yairiraho kakye omumaisho, yaajuumara ahansi, yaashaba ngu, ku kiraabe nikibaasika, eshaaha egyo emuhingure.
Yaagira ati:
Yaagaruka, yaashanga bagwejegyeire, yaabuuza Petero ati: Simooni, ogwejegyeire? Waaremwa kwehangaana kureeba nangwa n'eshaaha emwe?
Mureebe mushabe, murekye kugwa omu kwohibwa; omutima gwo nigukunda, kwonka omubiri n'omweremwa.
Yaakuba yaagarukayo, yaashaba ebigambo bimwe n'eby'okubanza.
Yaagaruka obwa kabiri, nabwo yaashanga bagwejegyeire, ahabw'okuba amaisho gaabo gakaba nigahungira, kandi tabaramanyire ki baraamugarukyemu.
Yaagaruka omurindi gwa kashatu, yaabagira ati: Na hati mukigwejegyeire, muhuumwire? Okwo nikumara; obunaku bwahika, Omwana w'omuntu, yaaza kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
Mwimukye, turugye aha; reba orikundeebya ari haihi.
Kandi obwo owaabaire naamureebya akaba abahaire akamanyiso naagira ati: Ou ndaanywegyere, niwe ogwo, mumukwate, mumutware nimumurinda.
Ku yaizire, ahonaaho yaamuhikaho, yaagira ati:
Baamugurukira, baamukwata.
Omwe aha baabaire beemereire aho yaasyorayo rurara ye, yaatema omuhuuku w'omunyamurwa omukuru, yaamucwaho okutu.
Yesu yaababuuza ati: Mwampururira kunkwata na zaarurara n'ebikoni, nk'oku bahururira omwambuzi?
Ebiro byona nkaba ntuura naimwe, nimbeegyesa omuri hekalu, timurankwatsire. Kwonka eki kyabaho, ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bihikiirire.
Okuruga aho abeegi be boona baamuhungaho, bairuka.
Kandi omutsigazi omwe yaamukuratira ajwaire omwenda gwa kitaani gwonka; nawe baamukwata;
yaatsiga ogwo mwenda gwa kitaani, yaahunga ajwaire busha.
Okuruga aho baatwara Yesu aha munyamurwa omukuru; baashanga abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu n'abahandiiki bateeraniireyo.
Obwo Petero akaba amukuratiire naamugyenda hare, yaataaha omu kibuga ky'omunyamurwa omukuru, yaashutama n'abarinzi, yaayota omuriro.
Kandi abanyamurwa abakuru n'ab'omu ishengyero boona baasherura obwamushinja ngu baite Yesu, tibaabubona.
N'obu abaamubeihereire baabaire bari baingi, kwonka obwamushinja bwabo tiburashushaine.
Abamwe baimuka, baamubeiherera nibagira bati:
Itwe tukamuhurira naagira ati: Ndyasheenya hekalu egi eyaayombekirwe emikono, kandi omu biro bishatu nyombekye endiijo etombekirwe mikono.
Obwamushinja bwabo obwo nabwo tibwashushana.
Omunyamurwa omukuru nikwo kwemerera ahagati yaabo, akabuuza Yesu ati: Toine ki orikwetonganira na kakye? Aba nibakwomesereza ki?
We yaahunama, tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu. Omunyamurwa omukuru yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Niiwe Kristo, Omwana w'Ogwo orikusiimwa?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Ndi We; naimwe muryareeba Omwana w'omuntu ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'Obushoboorozi, naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru.
Omunyamurwa omukuru yaataagura ebijwaro bye naagira ati: Kandi nitukyendera ki baamushinja abandi?
Naimwe mwayehuririra okurogota kwe! Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta? Boona baamucwera orubanja ngu ashemereire kufa.
Abamwe baatandika kumucwera amacwante, n'okumushweka omwenda aha maisho, n'okumuteera entomi, nibamugira bati: Ragura owaakuteera! N'abambari baamwakiira, bamuhikize aha mpi.
yaareeba Petero naayota; yaamwetegyereza, yaamugira ati: Naiwe obaire ori hamwe na Yesu owa Nazareesi.
Yaayehakana naagira ati: Tindikumanya ki orikugamba, n'obu kwakuba okukyetegyereza. Yaarugayo, yaaza omu irembo.
Omuzaana ogwo yaamureeba, yaagaruka yaagambira abaabaire beemereireho ati: Omushaija ogwo n'omwe aharibo.
Petero yaagaruka yaayehakana. Ku haahingwireho akaanya kakye, abaabaire beemereire aho baagauka baagira Petero bati: Buzima kwo ori omwe aharibo, ahabw'okuba ori Omunyagalilaaya.
We yaatandika kukyeena n'okurahira, naagira ati: Omuntu ogwo ou murikungambaho, tindikumumanya.
Ahonaaho enkoko yaashubiira. Petero yaijuka ekigambo eki Yesu amugambiire ati: Enkoko etakashubiire, noija kuunyehakana kashatu. Ku yaijukire ekyo, yaarira.
Kandi ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana, abanyamurwa abakuru hamwe n'abakuru b'abantu n'abahandiiki n'ab'omu ishengyero boona, baaza omu naama; bwanyima baaboha Yesu, baamutwara, baamuhayo ahari Pilaato.
Pilaato yaamubuuza ati: Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya? Yaamugarukamu ati: Eki waagamba nikwo kiri.
Abanyamurwa abakuru baamutabaariza bingi.
Pilaato yaagaruka yaamubuuza ati: Toine ki orikwetonganira na kakye? Ka baakutabaariza bingi!
Nabwo Yesu tiyaagarukamu; n'ahabw'ekyo Pilaato yaatangaara.
Kandi aha bugyenyi nk'obwo akaba amanyiire kubarekurira embohe yoona ei baabaire bamushaba.
Kandi omu baagomire bakaita abantu, abaabaire babohirwe omu ikhome ahabw'obugomi obwo, hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Barabba.
Abantu baingi baija baatandika kushaba Pilaato kubagirira nk'oku ashangwa abagirira.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimwenda ngu mbarekurire Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Ahakuba akamanya ku abanyamurwa abakuru baamuhayo ahabw'eihari.
Kwonka abanyamurwa abakuru baashunika engabo z'abantu kugamba bati: Haakiri Barabba obe niwe waaturekurira.
Pilaato yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi, ngire nta Ogu ou murikweta Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Baagaruka baayomba munonga bati: Mubambe aha musharaba!
Pilaato yaababuuza ati: Ahanki? Ni kibi ki eki akozire? Baayeyongyera kuyomba munonga bati: Mubambe!
Pilaato ahabw'okwenda kunanura ezo ngabo, yaabarekurira Barabba; ku yaaherize kwasha Yesu, yaamuhayo kubambwa.
Bwanyima abaserukare baamutwara, baamutaasya omu kibuga ekirikwetwa Puratorio; baayeta omutwe gwona ogwa'baserukare.
Baamujweka omwenda gwa bujwa, baaruka ekirunga ky'amahwa, baakimujweka.
Baatandika kumutangirira nibagira bati: Singa, Mugabe w'Abayudaaya!
Baamuhondesa ekibingo omu mutwe, baamucwera amacwante, baamutsimbira amaju nibamuramya.
Ku baaherize kimuteerera enaku, baamujuura ogwo mwenda, baamujweka ebijwaro bye. Baamushohoza, baaza kumubamba.
Baatwara Yesu aharikwetwa Gologosa, (ekirikumanyisa ngu, Omwanya gw'empanga y'omutwe).
Baamuha viinyo ejwangizemu omubazi ogurikwetwa
Bwanyima baamubamba aha musharaba; baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabiteerera enteenyu, ngu bamanye buri muntu eki araatware.
Baamubamba aha shaaha ya kashatu.
Ekirangiriro ky'ebi baamurega baakihanika ahaiguru ye, ekihandiikirwe ngu, OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA.
Kandi baamubamba hamwe n'abambuzi babiri, omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, n'ondiijo aha rwa bumohso.
Nikwo Ebyahandiikirwe byahikiriziibwe bityo ebirikugira ngu, Akabarirwa hamwe n'abasiisi.
Abaabaire nibahinguraho baamuteerera enaku, nibazongoza emitwe, nibagira bati: Iwe orikusheenya hekalu okagyombekyera ebiro bishatu,
yejune, ohanukye orugye aha musharaba.
Kandi n'abanyamurwa abakuru nikwo baamuteereire batyo enaku, nibagambirana n'abahandiiki bati: Akajuna abandi; tarikubaasa kwejuna.
Kristo, Omugabe wa Israeli, naarugye hati mbwenu aha musharaba, tukireebe twikirize. Kandi abaabambiirwe hamwe nawe nabo baamuteeerera enaku.
Aha shaaha egyo eya mwenda. Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakasaani, amakuru gaakyo ngu, Ruhanga wangye, Ruhanga wangye, n'enki ekyakuntsigisaho?
Kandi abamwe aha baabaire beemereire aho, ku baakihuriire, baagira bati: Hurira, naayeta Eliya!
Omwe yairuka, yaajabika ekyangu omuri viinyo erikushaarira, yaakita aha kibingo, yaamuheereza kunywa, naagira ati: Reka tureebe Eliya ku araabe naija kumuhanura.
Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, yaahayo amagara ge.
Omukingo gw'omuri hekalu gwataagukamu ebicweka bibiri okuruga aha mutwe gwagwo okuhika ahansi.
Kandi omukuru w'abaserukare akaba ayemereire naamureeba; ku yaareebire yaahayo amagara ge atyo, yaagira ati: Buzima kwo omuntu ogu yaaba ori Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Hakaba hariho n'abakazi beemereire nibareebera hangahari; omuri abo hakaba harimu Mariamu Magadaleene, na Mariamu nyina wa Yakobo omuto na Yose, na Saalome;
abo nibo baabaire bamukuratira, nibamuheereza, akiri Galilaaya; kandi hakaba hariho n'abandi bakazi baingi abaagyenzire nawe Yerusaalemu.
Yosefu owa Arimasaaya, omuhanuuzi w'ekitiinisa omu ishengyero, kandi owaabaire atuura ategyereize obukama bwa Ruhanga, yaatiinuuka, yaataaha owa Pilaato, yaashaba omutumbi gwa Yesu.
Pilaato yaatangaarira oku yaarahuka kukaba; yaatuma kweta omukuru w'abaserukare, yaamubuuza ku araabe yaakabire.
Ku yaahamiziibwe omukuru w'abaserukare ku yaaheza kukaba, yaikiriza kuha Yosefu omutumbi.
Yosefu yaagura omwenda gwa bafuta, yaahanura omutumbi, yaaguzinga omu mwenda ogwo gwa bafuta, yaaguta omu kituuro, ekyatimbirwe omu rukiri; yaakumbagaza eibaare, yaarikingisa omuryango gw'ekituuro.
Kandi Mariamu Magadaleene na Mariamu nyina wa Yose baayetegyereza ahu omutumbi gwe gwateebwa.
Omu kasheeshe munonga aha kiro ky'okubanza omu saabiiti baahika aha kituuro, eizooba ryaturukire,
nibabuuzana bati: N'oha oraatukumbagarize eibaare okuruga aha muryango gw'ekituuro?
Ku baanagire amaisho, baareeba eibaare rikumbagaziibwe hangahari; ahakuba rikaba riri rihango munonga.
Ku baataahire omu kituuro, baareeba omutsigazi ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo, ajwaire omwenda gurikwera; baatangaara.
Yaabagambira ati: Mutatangaara; nimusherura Yesu owa Nazareesi obambirwe. Yaazooka, tari aha; mureebe n'omwanya ahu babaire bamutaire.
Mbwenu mwirooko mugyende, mugambire abeegi be na Petero ngu, abeebembeire kuza Galilaaya; okwo niyo muraamushangye, nk'oku yaabagambiire.
Baashohora, baaruga aha kituuro nibahunga, ahakuba bakakwatwa orutetema n'okutangaara; kandi tibaine u bakigambiire, ahabw'okuba bakaba batiinire.
We yaagyenda, yaagambira abu Yesu yaabaire atuura nabo, yaashanga nibaganya, nibarira.
Kandi ku baagambiirwe ngu ariho ahuriire, kandi ngu yaareebwa Mariamu, tibaakiikiriza.
Bwanyima y'ekyo yaayeyoreka omu nshusha endiijo aha bandi babiri aharibo, abaabaire nibagyenda nibaza omu kyaro.
Abo nabo baagaruka Yerusaalemu, baabigambira abeegi abandi; nabo tibaabaikiriza.
Yaabagira ati: Mugyende omu nsi zoona, mubuurire engiri ebihangirwe byona.
Oriikiriza akabatizibwa, aryajunwa; kwonka otariikiriza, aryasingwa orubanja.
Obumanyiso oburiguma nibureebwa omu barikwikiriza n'obu: omu iziina ryangye baryabinga baadaimoni, baryagamba endimi nsya;
baryakwata enjoka, kandi ku barinywa ekirikwita kyona, tikiribarwaza; baryata engaro aha barwaire, bakire.
Nabo baashohora, baagyenda hoona hoona nibabuurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga, Mukama waitu ari hamwe nabo naabakwatsa, kandi naahamya ekigambo ekyo n'obumanyiso obwabaire bukikomookaho.
Abantu baingi bakateeraho kuhandiika ebyabaireho ebyakozirwe omuriitwe,
nk'oku twabigambiirwe abaabyereebeire butunu, bari abaheereza b'ekigambo kya Ruhanga okuruga obu byatandika.
Naanye, ku naaherize kukuratanisa byona nimbitondoora okuruga ahu byatandikiire, naareeba ku kishemereire kubikuhandiikira nk'oku byakurataine, iwe Teofilo ow'ekitiinisa,
ngu obone kumanya gye amazima g'ebyo ebi waayegyesiibwe.

Omu busingye bwa Heroode omugabe w'Abayudaaya hakaba hariho omunyamurwa, eiziina rye Zaakaria, ow'omu kicweka kya Abiya; kandi akaba aine omukazi ow'omu baijurukuru ba Arooni, eiziina rye Elizaabeesi.
Kandi bombi bakaba bari abahikiriire omu maisho ga Ruhanga, nibagyendera omu biragiro byona n'omu migyenzo yoona ebya Mukama bataine kamogo.
Kwonka bakaba bataine mwana, ahakuba Elizaabeesi akaba ari engumba, kandi bombi bakaba bakuzire munonga.
Ku yaabaire naakora omurimo gw'obunyamurwa omu maisho ga Ruhanga omu rubu rw'ekicweka kye,
nk'emicwe y'obunayamurwa oku yaabaire eri, yaakwatwa enteenyu kuza kwotera
Kandi omutwe gw'abantu gwona gukaba nigushabira aheeru omu shaaha egyo ey'okwotereramu obubaane.
Maraika wa Mukama yaamweyoreka, ayemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'eitambiro ry'okwotereraho obubaane.
Zaakaria ku yaamureebire, yaayekanga, yaatiina munonga.
Kwonka maraika yaamuhuumuriza, ati: Zaakaria, otatiina, ahakuba okushaba kwawe kuhuriirwe, Elizaabeesi omukazi waawe aryakuzaarira omwana w'omwojo, kandi oryamweta eiziina Yohaana.
Oryashemererwa oyesiime,
Kandi baingi baryashemerererwa okuzaarwa kwe,
Tarinywa viinyo, n'obu kyakuba ekirikusinza kyona;
Kandi aryaijura Omwoyo Orikwera okuruga omu nda ya nyina.
Baingi omu Baisraeli aryabahindura, abagarure ahari Mukama Ruhanga waabo.
Okuhindura emitima y'abazaire, bakagarukana n'abaana baabo,
N'abagomi okubagarura aha bwengye bw'abahikiriire,
Kandi n'okutebeekanisiza Mukama abantu abeeteekateekire.
Zaakaria yaabuuza maraika ati: Ekyo ndyakimanya nta ku kiri eky'amazima; ahabw'okuba ndi omugurusi, kandi n'omukazi wangye n'omukaikuru munonga.
Maraika yaamugarukamu ati: Niinye Gaburieli oyemerera omu maisho ga Ruhanga; kandi ntumirwe kugamba naiwe n'okukureetera ebigambo ebi ebirungi.
Mbwenu noija kuhunama, toribaasa kugamba, okuhitsya obu ebigambo ebi biribaho; ahabw'okuba tiwaikiriza ebi naakugambira, ebirihikiirizibwa omu bunaku bwabyo.
Kandi abantu abaabaire bategyereize Zaakaria, baatangaarira oku yaasiiba omuri hekalu.
Ku yaashohoire, tiyaabaasa kugamba nabo; baamanya ku yaareeba okworekwa omuri hekalu; yaaguma naabagambisisa engaro, agobirwe orurimi.
Obunaku bw'okuheereza kwe ku bahweire, yaagaruka omuka.
Ebiro ebyo ku byahingwireho, Elizaabeesi yaagira enda, yaamara ameezi ataano ayesherekire, naagira ati:
Oku nikwo Mukama angizire omu biro ebi andeebeiremu, kuunyihaho enshoni omu bantu.
Omu kwezi kwa mukaaga maraika Gaburieli akatumwa Ruhanga omuri tauni ya Galilaaya erikwetwa Nazareesi,
aha mwishiki oshugaine, owaabaire naagambwa obugyenyi omushaija orikwetwa Yosefu, ow'omu nju ya Daudi; eiziina ry'omwishiki ogwo akaba ari Mariamu.
Gaburieli yaija ah'ari, yaamugambira ati: Shemererwa, iwe orikukundwa munonga! Mukama ari naiwe.
We yaayekanga munonga ahabw'ekigambo ekyo, naateekateeka okuramutsya okwo oku kuri.
Maraika yaamuhuumuriza naagira ati: Otatiina, Mariamu, ahabw'okuba otungire obuganzi ahari Ruhanga.
Reeba oryagira enda, ozaare omwana w'omwojo, kandi oryamweta eiziina Yesu.
Kandi Mukama Ruhanga aryamuta aha kitebe ky'obugabe bwa ishenkuru Daudi,
Kandi obukama bwe tiburihwaho.
Mariamu yaabuuza maraika ati: Ekyo kiryabaasika kita, ka ntaine mushaija?
Maraika yaamugarukamu ati:
Omwoyo Orikwera aryakwizira,
N'amaani ga Rukira-boona garyakusangira;
Omwana orizaarwa nikyo aryeterwa Orikwera,
Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Kandi reeba, muhara waanyu Elizaabeesi nawe aine enda y'omwana w'omwojo omu bukaikuru bwe; owaabaire naayetwa engumba hati aine ameezi mukaaga.
Ahabw'okuba tihariho ekirema Ruhanga.
Mariamu yaagira ati: Reeba, ndi omuzaana wa Mukama; kimbeho nk'oku waagamba. Maraika yaamutsigaho, yaagyenda.
Omu biro ebyo Mariamu yaimuka, yaayehuuta, yaaza omu nsi y'ebibungo omuri tauni ya Buyudaaya,
yaataaha owa Zaakaria, yaaramutsya Elizaabeesi.
Elizaabeesi, ku yaahuriire okuramutsya kwa Mariamu, omwana yaagurukaguruka omu nda ye; Elizaabeesi yaijura Omwoyo Orikwera,
yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Omu bakazi boona niiwe ohairwe omugisha, n'omwana w'omu nda yaawe ahairwe omugisha!
Nyowe eki kyandugira hi nyina wa Mukama wangye okuntaayaayira?
Reeba ku naahurira eiraka ry'okuramutsya kwawe, omwana yaagurukaguruka omu nda yangye ahabw'okushemererwa.
Kandi ohairwe omugisha, iwe owaikiriize ku ebi waagambiirwe Mukama birihikiirizibwa.
Mariamu yaagira ati:
Amagara gangye nigahimbisa Mukama,
N'omutima gwangye nigushemerererwa Ruhanga Omujuni wangye;
Ahabw'okuba areebire obucureezi bw'omuzaana we.
Mbwenu reeba, okuruga hati ab'obusingye bwona baryanyeta ohairwe omugisha;
Ahakuba Ow'obushoboorozi ankoreire bikuru,
N'eiziina rye niryera.
Nk'oku obusingye bwihaihana.
Yaataataanisa abaine amaryo omu biteekateeko by'omu mitima yaabo;
Yaatunguura abatakiine.
N'abatungi yaababinga bataine kantu.
Ahwereire Israeli omugaragwa we,
Naijuka embabazi ze
Ezi yaaraganiise Abrahamu n'oruzaaro rwe ebiro n'ebiro,
Nk'oku yaagambiire baatatenkuriitwe.
Okuruga aho Mariamu yaamara ameezi nk'ashatu na Elizaabeesi; bwanyima yaagaruka owaabo.
Obunaku bwa Elizaabeesi bw'okuzaara bwahika, yaazaara omwana w'omwojo.
Bataabani be na beene waabo baahurira ku Mukama amugiriire embabazi, baashemererwa hamwe nawe.
Aha kiro kya munaana baija kushara omwana; bakaba nibenda kumweta Zaakaria, nibamweterera ishe;
kwonka nyina yaayanga, naagira ati: Tikwo; ayetwe Yohaana.
Baamugarukamu bati: Omuri beene waanyu tihariho n'omwe orikwetwa eiziina eryo.
Baabuuzisa ishe engaro oku arikwenda kumweta.
Yaashaba eky'okuhandiikaho; yaahandiika ati, Eiziina rye ni Yohaana. Boona baatangaara.
Ahonaaho akanwa ke kaiguka, n'orurimi rwe rwakomoroka, yaagamba naahimbisa Ruhanga.
Bataahi baabo boona baagira obwoba; n'ebigambo ebyo byona byabuga omu nsi y'ebibungo ebya Buyudaaya.
Abaabihuriire boona baabitaasya omu mitima yaabo, nibeebuuza bati: Mbwenu omwana ogu aryaba ata? Ahakuba buzima omukono gwa Mukama gukaba guri hamwe nawe.
Bwanyima Zaakaria ishe yaijura Omwoyo Orikwera, yaahanuura naagira ati:
Mukama Ruhanga wa Israeli ahimbisibwe;
Ahabw'okuba ataayaayiire abantu be, yaabacungura.
Omu nju y'omugaragwa we Daudi,
(Nk'oku yaagambire naaraba omuri baanabi be abarikwera,
Abaabaire bariho iranaira,)
Okutujuna abazigu baitu,
N'omu mikono y'abarikutwanga boona;
N'okwijuka endagaano ye erikwera,
Tubone kumuheereza tutaine ki turikutiina,
Turi abarikwera kandi abahikiriire omu maisho ge
Ebiro byona eby'amagara gaitu.
Ahabw'okuba oryayembera Mukama okushemeza emihanda ye,
Omu kusaasirwa ebibi byabo.
Omushekye guryajuguta niguruga omu iguru, gutujwere,
N'okushoronzya ebigyere byaitu omu muhanda gw'obusingye.
Bwanyima omwana yaakura, yaayeyongyera amaani omu mutima; kandi yaaguma omu ihamba okuhitsya aha kiro eki yaayorekyeirweho Abaisraeli.
Omu biro ebyo ekiragiro kikaruga ahari Kaisaari Augusto, nikiragiira ab'omu nsi yoona okwehandiikisa.
Okuhandiikwa okwo nikwo kw'okubanza okwabaireho, Kureenio naategyeka Siria.
Abantu boona baaza kwehandiikisa, buri muntu omuri tauni y'owaabo.
Na Yosefu yaaruga Galilaaya omuri tauni ya Nazareesi, yaataaha Buyudaaya omu rurembo rwa Daudi orurikwetwa Betelehemu, ahabw'okuba akaba ari ow'omuryango gw'oruganda rwa Daudi,
yaaza kwehandiikisa na Mariamu, ou yaabaire naagamba obugyenyi, aine enda.
Ku baabaire bakiri okwo, obunaku bwe bw'okuzaara bwahika;
yaazaara omwana w'omwojo, yaamuta omu twenda tw'obwereere, yaamubyamya omu nju y'amatungo, ahabw'okubura omwanya omu nju y'abagyenyi.
Omu nsi egyo hakaba harimu abariisa abaabaire batuura omu ishwa, nibarinda amasyo gaabo nyekiro.
Haija maraika wa Mukama, yaayemerera haihi nabo, ekitiinisa kya Mukama kyabeehinguririza nikimurinkana, baatiina munonga.
Maraika yaabagira ati: Mutatiina; ahakuba mbareeteire ebigambo birungi eby'okushemererwa kwingi, okurihika aha bantu boona;
ahabw'okuba eki kiro Omujuni yaabazaarirwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi, niwe Kristo Mukama waitu.
Aha niho muraabimanyire; nimwija kushanga omwana w'omwereere, ashwekirwe omu twenda tw'obwereere, abyamiibwe omu kihongore.
Ahonaaho hamwe na maraika ogwo haabaho omutwe gw'engabo z'omu iguru, nizihimbisa Ruhanga, nizigira ziti:
N'omu nsi obusingye bugirwe abantu abu ashemerereirwe munonga.
Bwanyima baamaraika ku baarugireho, baagaruka omu iguru, abariisa baagambirana bati: Mwije tuze Betelehemu, tureebe ekibaireyo, eki Mukama yaatumanyisa.
Baagyenda nibeehuuta, baashanga Mariamu na Yosefu, n'omwana w'omwereere abyami omu kihongore.
Ku baamureebire, baabateekyerereza ebi baagambirwa aha mwana ogwo.
Abaabihuriire boona baatangaarira ebi baagambirwa abariisa.
Kwonka Mariamu yaarinda ebyo byona, yaaguma naabiteekateeka omu mutima.
Abariisa baagarukayo, nibahimbisa Ruhanga, nibamusiimira ebigambo byona ebi baahurira, n'ebi baareeba, nk'oku baabigambirwa.
Ebiro munaana ku byahingwireho, yaasharwa, yaayetwa eiziina Yesu, riri eryagambirwe maraika, nyina atakagizire nda ye.
Bwanyima ebiro by'okushemezibwa kwabo ku byahingwireho, nk'ebiragiro bya Musa oku biri, baamutwara Yerusaalemu kumumurikira Mukama,
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu biragiro bya Mukama, ngu Ekyetwa ekishaija kyona eky'omujigaijo kiryayetwa ekirikwera ahari Mukama;
n'okutamba ekitambo nk'oku kyaragiirwe omu biragiro bya Mukama ngu, obwiba bubiri nari shi enkombe nto ibiri.

Kandi omuri Yerusaalemu hakaba harimu omushaija, eiziina rye Simeoni; omushaija ogwo akaba ari ohikiriire naatiina Ruhanga, ategyereize Okuhuumurizibwa kwa Israeli, kandi Omwoyo Orikwera akaba amuriho.
Akaba ashuuruuriirwe Omwoyo Orikwera ku atarifa atakareebire Kristo wa Mukama.
Yaatwarwa Omwoyo omuri hekalu; abazaire ba Yesu ku baamutaahizemu, ngu bamukorere nk'emigyenzo y'Ebiragiro oku eri,
Simeoni ogwo yaamukiikira omu mikono ye, yaahimbisa Ruhanga naagira ati:
Mukama wangye, mbwenu waaza kureka omwiru waawe agyende n'obusingye,
Nk'oku waagambire;
Ahakuba amaisho gangye gaareeba okujuna kwawe
Oku waateekateekyeire omu maisho g'abantu boona,
N'okuba ekitiinisa ky'abantu baawe Israeli.
Ishe na nyina baatangaarira ebyamugambwaho;
kandi Simeoni yaabashabira omugisha, yaagira Mariamu nyina ati: Reeba, omwana ogu yaateebwaho ngu baingi omu Baisraeli bagwe, kandi baingi baimukye, n'okuba ak'okureeberaho ak'okuhakanisibwa,
ngu ebiteekateeko by'omu mitima ya baingi bishuuruurwe; (naiwe rurara eryakucumita omu mutima.)
Kandi hakaba hariho n'omukazi nabi, eiziina rye Anna, muhara wa Fanueli, ow'omu ruganda rwa Asheri, owaabaire ari omukaikuru munonga; ku yaashweirwe, yaamara na iba emyaka mushanju;
bwanyima yaamara endiijo myaka makumi munaana n'ena ari omufaakazi. Omukazi ogwo akaba ataruga omuri hekalu, naaramya Ruhanga, naayesiibyakwo, kandi naashaba nyomushana na nyekiro.
Ku yaizire omu shaaha egyo, yaasiima Ruhanga, kandi
Abazaire ba Yesu, ku baaherize kuhikiiriza byona eby'omu biragiro bya Mukama, baagaruka Galilaaya omuri tauni y'owaabo Nazareesi.
Omwana yaakura, yaaguma naayeyongyera amaani, naijura obwengye, kandi embabazi za Ruhanga zaamugumaho.
Ku yaahikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri y'obukuru, bainamukayo, nk'omucwe gw'obugyenyi oku gwabaire guri.
Bwanyima y'ebiro by'obugyenyi, ku baabaire nibagarukayo, omwana ogwo Yesu yaatsigara Yerusaalemu.

Abazaire be tibaakimanya; kwonka ahabw'okuteekateeka ngu yaagyenda n'omutwe gw'abo abu baabaire nibagaruka nabo, baagyenda orugyendo rw'eizooba ryona, bwanyima baamusherurira omuri beene waabo na bataahi baabo;
ku yaababuriire, baagaruka Yerusaalemu, nibamusherura.
Bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu, baamushanga omuri hekalu, ashutami ahagati y'abeegyesa, naabahurira, kandi naababuuza ebibuuzo;
abaamuhuriire boona, baatangaarira obwengye bwe n'ebi yaabaire naabagarukamu.
Abazaire be ku baamureebire, baatangaara; nyina yaamubuuza ati: Mwana wangye, ahanki otugizire oti? Reeba, nyowe na sho tukusherwire twine obusaasi.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Mubaire nimunsherurira ki? Timurikumanya ku nshemereire kuguma omu nju ya Tata?
Kwonka bo tibaashoborokyerwa kigambo ekyo eki yaabagambira.
Yaashuuma nabo, yaataaha Nazareesi, yaaguma naaboorobera; kandi nyina yaagumya ebigambo ebyo byona aha mutima gwe.

Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'omu busingye bwa Tiberio Kaisaari, Pntio Pilaato obu yaabaire ari omutegyeki wa Buyudaaya, na Heroode ari ow'eishaza rya Galilaaya, n'omurumuna Filipo ari ow'eishaza rya Iturea na Tirakoniiti, na Lusania ari ow'eishaza rya Abileene,
kandi Ana na Kayaafa bari abanyamurwa abakuru, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikaizira Yohaana mwene Zaakaria omu ihamba;
yaagyenda omu byanga byona ebiri haihi na Yorudani, naabuurira okubatizibwa kw'okweteisa, ahabw'okusaasirwa ebibi.
Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'ebigambo bya nabi Isaaya ngu:
Eiraka ry'orikugambaira omu ihamba ati:
Mushemeze omuhanda gwa Mukama,
Mugorore otuhanda twe.
Empanga zoona ziryaijuzibwa,
Enshozi zoona n'ebibungo biryabandikwa,
Ebitegami biryagororwa,
N'emihanda etaboneire eryabonezibwa,
Kandi abantu boona baryareeba okujuna kwa Ruhanga.

Mbwenu mwane ebyana ebishemereire abeeteisize, mutatandika kugamba omu mitima yaanyu ngu, Twine Abrahamu, niwe tatenkuriitwe. Ahakuba nyowe nimbagambira nti: Ruhanga naabaasa amabaare aga kugaihiramu Abrahamu abaijukuru.
Na mbwenu empango etairwe aha bitsintsi by'emiti; omuti gwona ogutarikwana byana birungi guryatemwa gunagwe omu muriro.
Abantu baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu shi, tugire tuta?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Oine amakanzu abiri, aheho otagiine; n'oine eby'okurya, nawe atwaze atyo.
Abahooza nabo baija kubatizibwa, baamubuuza bati: Mwegyesa, itwe tugire tuta?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Mutarihooza ebirikukira ebi mwaragiirwe.
N'abaserukare baamubuuza bati: Kandi shi itwe, tugire tuta? Yaabagarukamu ati: Mutarinyaga omuntu weena ahabw'okumutwaza amaani, nari okumutabaariza eby'ebishuba; ekindi mumarwe ebihembo byanyu.

Yohaana yaabagarukamu boona naabagira ati: Buzima nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi: kwonka nihaija kwija Orikunkiza amaani, kandi tinshemereire n'okuyuzya orukoba rw'enkaito ze; Ogwo aryababatiza n'Omwoyo Orikwera n'omuriro.
Orugari rwe ruri omu mukono gwe, aryayeyerera gye embuga ye, ahunikye oburo omu kitara kye, kandi ebishushunga abyotsye omu muriro ogutaraara.
Kandi yaagaruka yaabahana ebindi bingi, naabuurira abantu ebigambo birungi.
Kwonka oweishaza Heroode, ku yaateisiibwe Yohaana ahabwa Herodia muka mwene ishe, n'ahabw'ebibi byona ebi Heroode yaabaire akozire,
ahari ebyo byona yaayongyeraho n'eki, yaata Yohaana omu kihome.
Omwoyo Orikwera yaamushuumaho nk'enkombe, omu kishushani ky'omubiri, n'eiraka ryayema omu iguru, nirigira riti: Niiwe Mwana wangye ou nkunda, kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga.
owa Mataati, owa Leevi, owa Meleki, owa Yanai, owa Yosefu,
owa Matatia, owa Amosi, owa Nahumu, owa Esili, owa Nagai,
owa Maati, owa Matatia, owa Semei, owa Yoseka, owa Yoda,
owa Yohanaani, owa Reesa, owa Zerubabeeli, owa Shealatieli, owa Neri,
owa Meleki, owa Adi, owa Kosamu, owa Elemadamu, owa Eri,
owa Yesu, owa Elieza, owa Yorimu, owa Mataati, owa Leevi,
owa Simeoni, owa Yuda, owa Yosefu, owa Yonamu, owa Eliakimu,
owa Meleya, owa Mena, owa Matata, owa Nasani, owa Daudi,
owa Yese, owa Obedi, owa Boazi, owa Salumooni, owa Nahasooni,
owa Aminadabu, owa Arani, owa Hezirooni, owa Pereezi, owa Yuda,
owa Yakobo, owa Isaaka, owa Abrahamu, owa Teera, owa Nahori,
owa Serugi, owa Reu, owa Pelegi, owa Eberi, owa Seela,
owa Kainani, owa Arufakisaadi, owa Sheemu, owa Noa, owa Lameki,
owa Mesuseela, owa Enoka, owa Yaredi, owa Mahalaleeli, owa Kainani,
owa Enosi, owa Seezi, owa Adamu, owa Ruhanga.
yaamarayo ebiro makumi ana, naayohibwa Sitaane, atarikurya ky'okurya kyona omu biro ebyo; ku byahweireho, yaagira enjara.
Omwohi nikwo kumugambira ati: Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga, gambira eibaare eri rihindukye eby'okurya.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Kikahandiikwa ngu, Omuntu tatungwa by'okurya byonka.
Omwohi yaagaruka yaamutembya, yaamworeka obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi yoona omu mwanya mukye,
yaamugira ati: Niinyija kukuha obushoboorozi obu bwona n'ekitiinisa kyabwo; ahakuba nkabuheebwa, kandi mbuheereza ou nkunda weena.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ku orainame wandamya, bwona nibuba obwawe.
Yesu yaamugarukamu naamugira ati: Kikahandiikwa ngu, Oramye Mukama Ruhanga waawe, obe niwe waaheereza wenka.
Bwanyima yaamwinamura Yerusaalemu, yaamuta aha itungu rya hekalu, yaamugambira ati: Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga, ruga aha, ogurukye oyetsimbe ahansi;
ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu, Aryaragiira baamaraika be, bakurinde;
kandi ngu: Baryakukwatirira omu mikono yaabo, ngu otakaahikiza ekigyere kyawe aha ibaare.
Yesu yaamugarukamu naamugira ati: Kikagambwa ngu, Otaryosya Mukama Ruhanga waawe.
Bwanyima Omwohi Sitaane, ku yaaherize byona ebi yaabaire naamwohesa, yaamurugaho, okuhitsya obu aribona ogundi mwanya.
Kandi Yesu yaagaruka Galilaaya aine amaani g'Omwoyo, okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga omu byanga byona ebiri haihi nayo,
yaayegyesa omuri sinagogi zaabo, boona baamusiima.
Baamuha ekitabo kya nabi Isaaya, yaakishuuruura, yaashanga ahu ekicweka kahandiikirwe ngu:
Omwoyo wa Mukama ari ahariinye,
Ahakuba akanshukaho amajuta kubuurira abooro ebigambo ebirungi,
Yantuma kumanyisa enkwatwa eby'okurekurwa,
N'okumanyisa empumi eby'okuhumuurwa,
N'okurekura abarikwitwa kubi,
N'okurangira abantu omwaka gwa Mukama ogw'embabazi.
Ku yaaherize kushoma, yaateerana ekitabo, yaakigarurira omuheereza, yaashutama; ab'omuri sinagogi boona baamugumyaho amaisho.
Yaatandika kubagambira ati: Eri izooba ebyahandiikirwe ebi byahikiirizibwa omu matu gaanyu.
Boona baamusiima, nibatangaarira ebigambo by'embabazi ebyaruga omu kanwa ke nibagira bati: Beitu ogu ti mwene Yosefu?
Yaabagira ati: Timuribura kuncwera enfumu egi muti: Iwe mufumu 'we, oyetambire! Byona ebi twahuriire ngu okakorera Kaperenaumu, bikorere n'aha omu nsi yaanyu.
Yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Tihariho nabi oikirizibwa omu nsi y'owaabo.

Kandi nimbagambira omu mazima nti: Omu biro bya Eliya hakaba hariho abafaakazi baingi omuri Israeli; omu biro ebyo eiguru rikakingwa, enjura yaabura okumara emyaka eshatu n'ameezi mukaaga, haabaho enjara nyingi omu nsi yoona;
kwonka Eliya taratumirwe nangwa na hari omwe omuribo, kureka akatumwa aha mukazi omufaakazi owa Zarefaasi omu ishaza rya Sidoni.
Kandi n'omu biro bya nabi Elisha hakaba hariho ababembe baingi omuri Israeli; kwonka tihariho n'omwe owaashemeziibwe, kureka Naamani Omusiria.
Ab'omuri sinagogi boona, ku baakihuriire, baagira ekiniga kingi;
baimuka, baamubinga omuri tauni, baamutwara nibamukurubana, baamuhitsya aha nengo y'ekibungo eki baabaire bombekireho tauni yaabo, ngu bamurengyezeho, abanzeyo omutwe.
Kwonka We yaaboogamu, yaagyenda.
baatangaarira okwegyesa kwe, ahabw'okuba ekigambo kye kikaba kiine obushoboorozi.
Kandi omuri sinagogi egyo hakaba harimu omuntu owaabaire ariho daimoni; yaaborooga n'eiraka rihango ati:
Ai bambe! Noofa ki naitwe, iwe Yesu owa Nazareesi; oizire kutucwekyereza? Ninkumanya; ori Orikwera wa Ruhanga.
Yesu yaamugambira kubi, naagira ati: Hunama, murugyeho! Daimoni ku yaamuteire ahansi ahagati yaabo, yaamurugaho, ataine ki amwitsize.
Boona baatangaara, nibabuuzana bati: Eki ni kigambo ki? Naaragiira baadaimoni n'obushoboorozi n'amaani, baarugamu.
Okurangaanwa kwe kwahika omu myanya yoona ehikaine n'ensi egyo.
