Yaamwemerera aha rubaju, yaakabukira omushwija, gwamurugaho; ahonaaho yaimuka, yaabaheereza.
Eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga, boona abaabaire barwarize abarwaire endwara zitari zimwe, baabamureetera; yaabataho engaro boona, yaabakiza.
Na baadaimoni baaruga omuri baingi, nibaamuza nibagira bati: Ori Omwana wa Ruhanga! Kwonka yaabagambira kubi, tiyaabaikiriza kugamba, ahabw'okuba bakamumanya ku ari Kristo.
Kandi ku bwaseesire, yaarugayo, yaaza omu mwanya ogwenagire. Abantu baamusherura, baija ah'ari, baayenda kumuzibira ngu atabarugaho;
kwonka yaabagira ati: Nshemereire kubuurira ebigambo ebirungi by'obukama bwa Ruhanga omuri tauni ezindi nazo; ahabw'okuba nikyo naatumiirwe.
Yaaguma naabuurira engiri omuri sinagogi za Galilaaya.
Yaareeba amaato abiri gari aha nkungu y'enyanja; kwonka abajubi bagarugiremu niboozya obutimba bwabo.
Yaaza omuri bumwe obwabaire buri obwa Simooni, yaamushaba kubwirizayo hakye okuruga aha nkungu. Yaabushutamamu, yaayegyesa abantu.
Ku yaaherize kugamba, yaagira Simooni, ati: Mwirire ahagati y'enyanja, mutegye obutimba bwanyu.
Simooni yaamugarukamu ati: Mwegyesa, turaire nitutega ekiro kyona, twabura eki twakwatsa. Kwonka ahabw'ekigambo kyawe, ka ntegye obutimba.
Ku baakozire ekyo, baakwatsa eby'enyanja bingi munonga, obutimba bwabo bwayenda kucweka;
nikwo kwetesa bagyenzi baabo engaro bari omu bundi bwato ngu baije babahwere. Baija, baijuza amaato gombi, gaayenda kumirwa.
Simooni Petero ku yaakireebire, yainama aha maju ga Yesu, yaagira ati: Ndugaho, Mukama wangye, ahabw'okuba ndi omusiisi.
Ahakuba we na bagyenzi be boona bakatangaara ahabw'eby'enyanja bingi ebi baakwatsire.
Kandi Yakobo na Yohaana, beene Zebedaayo, abaabaire bakwataniise na Simooni, nabo baatangaara. Yesu yaagambira Simooni ati: Otatiina, okuruga hati oryajuba abantu.
Ku baahikize amaato gaabo aha nkungu, baatsigaho byona, baamukuratira.
Yesu yaagorora omukono, yaamukoraho, naagira ati: Ninkunda; shemera. Ahonaaho ebibembe byamurugaho.

Yaamwehenangiriza kutagira ou yaakigambira, ati: Kwonka irooko ogyende oyeyorekye aha munyamurwa, ohongye empongano ahabw'okushemezibwa kwawe, nk'oku Musa yaaragiire, kibe eky'okuhamya omu maisho g'abantu.
Kwonka okurangaanwa kwe kwayeyongyera okukiraho kubuga hoona; n'emitwe mingi y'abantu yaateerana kuhurira n'okutambirwa endwara zaabo.
Kwonka We yaarugayo, yaaza omu ihamba, yaashaba.
Ahonaaho haija abantu bareetsire omushaija ozingazingirwe, bamuheekire omu nogzi; baasherura oku baraamutaasye omu nju, bakamurambika omu maisho ga Yesu.
Ku baabuzire ah'okumurabya ahabw'omutwe gw'abantu, baatemba ahaiguru y'enju, baamurabya omu mategura, baamushuumiza omu ngozi ahagati y'abantu omu maisho ga Yesu.
Ku yaareebire okwikiriza kwabo, yaagira ati: Mushaija 'we, ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa.
Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo baatandika kwetomboita, nibagira bati: Ogu n'oha orikurogota? N'oha orikubaasa kusaasira ebibi kureka Ruhanga wenka?
Yesu ku yaamanyire okwetomboita kwabo, yaababuuza ati: Nimwetomboitera ki omu mitima yaanyu?
Ekirikurahuka kirahi, okugira nti, Ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa; nari okugira nti, Imuka, ogyende?
Mbwenu mumanye ngu, Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi aha nsi okusaasira ebibi, yaagambira ozingazingirwe ati: Ninkuragiira nti: Imuka, oyekorere engozi yaawe, otaahe.
Ahonaaho yaimuka omu maisho gaabo, yaayekorera eki yaabaire abyamiho, yaataaha omuka naahimbisa Ruhanga.
Kyabatangaaza boona, baahimbisa Ruhanga, baine obwoba bwingi, nibagira bati: Eri izooba twareeba eby'okutangaaza.
Yaatsigaho byona, yaimuka, yaamukuratira.
Leevi ogwo yaamuteekyera obugyenyi bwingi omu nju ye; kandi hakaba hariho omutwe mwingi gw'abahooza n'abandi bashutami nabo aha by'okurya.
Abafarisaayo n'abahandiiki baabo baayetomboitera abeegi be nibagira bati: Ahabw'enki nimurya kandi nimunywa n'abahooza n'abasiisi?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Abahuriire tibeetenga mufumu, kureka abarwaire.
Tindaizire kweta bahikiriire kureka abasiisi ngu beeteise.
Baamugambira bati: Abeegi ba Yohaana kaingi beesiibyakwo, kandi bashaba; n'Abafarisaayo nabo nikwo bakora; kwonka abaawe barya kandi banywa.
Yesu yaababuuza ati: Nimubaasa muta kusiibyakwo abakwe, bakiine kishwera?
Obunaku buryahika, kishwera abaihweho; omu biro ebyo baryayesiibyakwo.

Kandi yaabacwera enfumu, ati: Tihariho muntu otaagura ekiremu aha kijwaro kisya, akakiteera aha kujwaro kikuru; ku yaakukora atyo, akaataagura ekyo kijwaro kisya, kandi ekiremu eki yaataagura aha kisya tikikaashushana n'ekijwaro ekikuru.
Kandi tihariho muntu oshuka viinyo nsya omu furebe z'empu nkuru; ku yaakukora atyo, viinyo ekaabarura efurebe, viinyo egyo eyatika, n'efurebe zisiisikara.
Kureka viinyo nsya eshemereire kushukwa omu furebe nsya.
Kandi tihariho muntu owaanyweire ahari viinyo nkuru, akakunda ensya; ahakuba naagira ati: Enkuru niyo nungi.
Kwonka abamwe aha Bafarisaayo baabuuza bati: Ahabw'enki nimukora ekirikuzira, okucwa obushiisha ahari Sabato?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Beitu shi, timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire, obu yaagira enjara, we n'abu yaabire aine?
Akataaha omu nju ya Ruhanga, yaakwata emigaati ey'okumurikwa, yaagiryaho, kandi yaagihaho n'abu yaabaire aine, haza kiri eki Ebiragiro byabaire bizibira omuntu weena kukora, kureka abanyamurwa bonka.
Yaabagira ati: Omwana w'omuntu niwe Mukama wa Sabato.
Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo baamutaho amaisho kureeba yaaba araamukize ahari Sabato, ngu babone eki baraamuregye.
Kwonka yaamanya ebiteekateeko byabo, yaagambira omuntu ogwo, owaabaire akokootsire omukono, ati: Imuka oyemerere aha. Yaimuka, yaayemerera aho.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Nimbabuuza, ahari Sabato Ebiragiro biikiriza okukora gye nari okukora kubi, okukiza amagara g'omuntu nari okugahwerekyereza?
Yaabuzya amaisho omuri boona, yaamuragiira ati: Nanuura omukono gwawe. Yaagunanuura, omukono gwe gwakira.
Abafarisaayo baagwa eiraro, baahanuura bonka oku baraakore Yesu.
Ku bwasesire, yaayeta abeegi be, yaatoorana omuribo ikumi na babiri, abu yaayetsire entumwa;
Simooni ou yaayetsire Petero, Anderea omurumuna, Yakobo, Yohaana, Filipo, Batolomayo,
Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo mwene Alifaayo, Simooni orikwetwa Zelote,
Yuda mwene Yakobo, na Yuda Iskaryota owaamureebize.
n'abaabaire bariho baadaimoni baakizibwa.
Ab'omu mitwe egyo boona baayenda ngu bamukoreho, ahabw'okuba amaani gakamurugamu, gaabakiza boona.
Mwine omugisha, imwe abooro, ahabw'okuba obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obwanyu.
Mwine omugisha, imwe abaine enjara hati, ahabw'okuba muryahaaga.
Mwine omugisha, imwe abarikurira hati, ahabw'okuba muryasheka.
Aha kiro ekyo mushemererwe, mugurukye ahabw'okwesiima; ahabw'okuba ebihembo byanyu ni bingi omu iguru; ahakuba nikwo baishenkurubo baagizire batyo baanabi.
Muryakareeba, imwe abahaagire hati mbwenu, ahabw'okuba muryagira enjara.
Muryakareeba, imwe abarikusheka hati mbwenu, ahabw'okuba muryarira muboroogye.
mushabire omugisha abarikubakyeena, mushabire abarikubaitsa omwaga.
Orikuteera oruhi rw'omushaya, omuhindurire ogundi; n'orikwaka ekanzu yaawe, n'omunagiro gwawe otarigumwima.
Orikushaba weena, omuhe; n'orinyaga ebintu byawe, otarigaruka kubimushaba.
Kandi nk'oku mwenda abantu kubagirira, naimwe mube nikwo mwabagirira.
Mbwenu ku muraabe nimukunda abarikubakunda, nimusiimwaho ki? Ahakuba abasiisi nabo bakunda ababakunda.
Kandi ku muraakorere gye ababakorera gye, nimusiimwaho ki? Ahakuba n'abasiisi nikwo bakora.
Kandi ku muraabe nimuguza abo, abu mwineho amatsiko, ngu nyentsya naimwe babahe, nimusiimwaho ki? N'abasiisi baguza abasiisi, ngu baihurwe ebirikwingana n'ebi baagurize.
Kureka mukunde abazigu baanyu, mubakorere gye, mubaguze mutaineyo matsiko; obwo ebihembo byanyu biryaba bingi, kandi muryaba abaana ba Rukira-boona; ahabw'okuba We akorera gye abatasiima n'ababi.
Mugire embabazi, nka Shoimwe oku agira embabazi.
Muhe, naimwe muryaheebwa; endengo enungi, eigatiirwe, ecugutsiibwe, erikusheeshekara, niyo murirengyerwa omu bifuba byanyu, ahabw'okuba endengo ei murengamu naimwe niyo murirengyerwamu.
Omwegi takira mwegyesa we; kwonka omwegi weena ku arihikiiriza eby'okwega, aryaba nk'omwegyesa we.
Ahabw'enki nooreeba akatokoozi akari omu riisho rya mugyenzi waawe, haza empimbi eri omu riisho ryawe otagyeteho?

Nari shi, noobaasa ota kugambira mugyenzi waawe oti: Mugyenzi wangye, ka nkutokoore akantu akari omu riisho ryawe, haza obwo bwona otarikureeba empimbi eri omu riisho ryawe? Iwe ndyarya 'we, banza oihe empimbi omu riisho ryawe, obwo nibwo oraareebe gye, okatokoora akantu akari omu riisho rya mugyenzi waawe.
Tihariho muti murungi ogwana ebyana bibi; kandi tihariho muti mubi ogwana ebyana birungi.
Omuti gwona gumanyirwa aha byana byagwo. Nimumanya ngu abantu tibashoroma mitiini aha minyinya, n'obu yaakuba emizaabibu aha matojo.
Omuntu murungi aiha ebirungi omu ibiikiro rirungi ery'omu mutima gwe; kandi omuntu mubi aiha ebibi omu ibiikiro rye eribi; ahakuba ebiijwire omutima akanwa nibyo kagamba.
Omuntu weena orikwija ahi ndi, akahurira ebigambo byangye, akabihikiiriza, naaza kubooreka ou arikushusha;
naashusha omuntu owaayombekire enju, akarima hare munonga, akata omusingi aha rukiri; omwegyemure ku gwahimintikire, amaizi gaateera enju egyo, tigaabaasa kugitengyetsa, ahabw'okuba ekombekwa gye.
Kwonka orikuhurira, akanga kukora, naashusha omuntu owaayombekire enju aha itaka, atarimire musingi; amaizi gakagiteera, ahonaaho yaagwa; n'okugwa kw'enju egyo kwaba kuhango.
Okwo hakaba hariyo omukuru w'abaserukare, owaabaire aine omuhuuku ou arikukunda munonga; omuhuuku ogwo akaba arwaire, ari haihi n'okufa.
Ku yaahuriire ebya Yesu, yaamutumaho abakuru b'Abayudaaya, naamushaba kwija kukiza omuhuuku we.
Abaatumirwe, ku baahikire ahari Yesu, baamweshengyereza munonga, bati: Omuntu ogwo ashemereire kukorerwa ekyo;
ahabw'okuba akunda eihanga ryaitu, kandi niwe yaatwombekyeire sinagigi yaitu.

Yesu nikwo kugyenda nabo. Ku yaabaire yaahika haihi n'enju, omukuru w'abaserukare yaatuma banywani be, ngu bamubugane, bamugambire ebi yaamutumaho, naagira ati: Mukama wangye, oteerusya kwija; ahakuba nyowe tikimpikire iwe kutaaha omu nju yangye;
n'ahabw'ekyo naareeba ngu tinshemereire kweizira; haakiri ogambe ekigambo kwonka, omuhuuku wangye abone kukira.
Kandi ati: Manya naanye ndi omuntu orikutwarwa, kandi nyine abaserukare abu ndikutegyeka. Ku ndagiira omwe nti, Gyenda, agyenda; n'ondiijo nti, Ija, aija; n'omuhuuku wangye nti, Kora eki, akikora.
Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaamutangaarira, yaahindukira omutwe gw'abantu abamukuratiire, yaabagira ati: Nimbagambira nti: Tinkareebaga kwikiriza okurikwingana kuti, n'obu haakuba omuri Israeli.
Abo abaatumirwe, ku baagarukire omuka, baashanga ogwo muhuuku yaakizire.
Ku haahingwireho omwanya mukye, yaagyenda omuri tauni erikwetwa Naini, ari hamwe n'abeegi be n'omutwe muhango gw'abantu.

Ku yairiire haihi n'eirembo rya tauni, yaabugana abarikushohoza omutumbi gw'omwojo ofiire, ou nyina yaazaire ari omwe nyamunegyere, kandi nyina akaba ari omufaakazi; abantu abaingi ab'omuri tauni bakaba bari hamwe nawe.
Mukama waitu ku yaamureebire, yaamugirira esaasi, yaamugira ati: Otarira.
Yairira haihi, yaakora aha katanda, abeekorezi baayemerera. Yaagira ati: Mwojo 'we, ninkugira nti: Imuka.
Ogwo owaaba afiire yaashutama, yaatandika kugamba. Yesu yaamuha nyinga.
Boona baakwatwa obwoba, baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati: Nabi omukuru aimukire omuriitwe. Kandi bati: Ruhanga ataayaayiire abantu be.
Okurangaanwa kw'ekyo eki yaakozire kwabuga Buyudaaya yoona n'ebyanga byona ebigyehinguririize.
Yohaana nikwo kweta babiri aha beegi be, akabatuma ahari Mukama waitu, naabuuza ati: Niiwe Ogwo orikwenda kwija, nari tutegyereze ondiijo?
Abashaija abo ku baamuhikire, baagira bati: Yohaana Omubatizi yaatutuma kukubuuza, naagira ati: Niiwe Ogwo orikwenda kwija, nari tutegyereze ondiijo?
Omu shaaha egyo yaakiza baingi endwara n'enaku na baadaimoni; kandi n'empumi nyingi yaazihumuura.

Yaagarukamu naabagira ati: Mugarukyeyo; mugambire Yohaana ebi mwareeba n'ebi mwahurira; empumi zihumwirwe, ebirema nibigyenda, ababembe bashemeziibwe, ebifa-matu nibihurira, abafu bazoirwe, n'abooro babuuriirwe ebigambo ebirungi.
Kandi otarikumbanganisaho aine omugisha.
Bwanyima, entumwa za Yohaana ku zaaherize kugarukayo, Yesu yaatandika kugambira emitwe y'abantu ebya Yohaana, ati: Omu ihamba mukaza kureebayo ki? Orubingo orurikutengyetsibwa omuyaga?
Beitu mukaza kureeba ki? Omuntu ojwaire emyenda erikuterera? Manya abajwara ebijwaro ebirikwengyengyeta, bakeegira gye, baba omu bikaari by'abagabe.
Beitu mukaza kureebayo ki? Nabi? Eego, nimbagambira nti: N'okukira naakirira kimwe nabi.
Kandi ogwo niwe yaahandiikirweho ngu,
Reeba, nintuma entumwa yangye, ekubandize;
Niyo erishemeza omuhanda gwawe.
Nimbagambira nti: Omuri abo abaazairwe abakazi tiharimu n'omwe orikukira Yohaana Omubatizi obukuru; kwonka omuto omu bukama bwa Ruhanga naamukira.
(Abantu boona n'abahooza, abaabatiziibwe Yohaana ku baakihuriire, baahamya ku Ruhanga ahikiriire;
kwonka Abafarisaayo n'abeegyesa ab'Ebiragiro, abatarabatiziibwe Yohaana, baayanga enaama ei Ruhanga yaabateekateekyeire.)
Mbwenu abantu ab'ebiro ebi mbagyeranise na ki? Kandi nibashusha ki?
Nibashusha nk'abaana abato abashutami omu katare, nibeetana bati: Tubateereire esheegu, timwazina; twacura, timwarira!
Ahakuba Yohaana Omubatizi akaija atarikurya mugaati, n'obu kwakuba okunywa viinyo; mwagira ngu, Ariho daimoni.
Kwonka Omwana w'omuntu we ku yaizire naarya, kandi naanywa, mwagira ngu, Reeba omunyamururu kandi omusinzi, munywani w'abahooza n'abasiisi.
Kwonka obwengye buhamibwa abaana baabwo boona ku buhikire.
Omukazi omusiisi w'omuri tauni egyo, ku yaamanyire ngu ari aha by'okurya omw'Omufarisaayo, yaareeta eihembe ry'amajuta ag'omugaju,
yaamwemerera enyima aha bigyere naarira; yaatandika kubijubya n'amarira, yaabiragaza n'eishokye rye, yaabinywegyera, yaabisiiga amajuta ago.
Omufarisaayo owaamwetsire, ku yaakireebire, yaateekateeka ati: Omuntu ogu, kuri yaaba ari nabi, akaamanyire omukazi ogu orikumukoraho oku ari, ku ari omusiisi.
Yesu yaagarukamu naamugira ati: Simooni, nyine eki ndikwenda kukugambira. Yaagira ati: Ngambira, Mwegyesa.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Hakaba hariho omuntu owaabaire aguza; akaba aine abu yaagurize babiri, omwe naamwihuza edenaari magana ataano, n'ondi makumi ataano.
Ku baabuzire eby'okumwihura, yaabasaasira bombi. Mbwenu ahari abo bombi, owaakizire kumukunda n'oha?
Simooni yaagarukamu naagira ati: Ningira ngu, n'ogwo ou yaasaasiire bingi. Yesu yaamugira ati: Waagarukamu gye.

Yesu yaahinduka, yaareeba omukazi, yaagira Simooni ati: Nooreeba omukazi ogu? Naataaha omu nju yaawe, tiwampa maizi g'okunaaba ebigyere byangye, kwonka we yaajubya ebigyere byangye n'amarira ge, yaabisiisiriza n'eishokye rye.
Iwe tiwaanywegyera, kwonka we, okwiha obu naahika aha, takarekire kunywegyera bigyere byangye;
tiwansiiga majuta aha mutwe, kwonka we yaasiiga ebigyere byangye amajuta.
N'ahabw'ekyo ninkugambira nti: Ebibi bye bingi yaabisaasirwa, ahabw'okuba okukunda kwe ni kwingi; kwonka osaasirwa ebikye, okukunda kwe ni kukye.
Yaagira ogwo mukazi ati: Ebibi byawe byakusaasirwa.
Abaabaire bashutami nibarya nawe baatandika kubuuzana bati: Ogu n'oha kandi orikusaasira ebibi?
Yesu yaagambira omukazi ati: Okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakujuna; gyenda n'obusingye.
Ku haahingwireho omwanya mukye, yaagyendagyenda omuri tauni n'birorero naabuurira kandi naagamba ebigambo ebirungi by'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Obwo akaba aine bari ikumi na babiri,
hamwe n'abakazi bamwe abaakiziibwe baadaimoni n'obumuga, Mariamu Magadaleene, owaarugirweho baadaimoni mushanju,
na Yoana muka Cuuza omubiiki wa Heroode, na Susaana, n'abandi baingi abaabaire nibabahwera n'ebintu byabo.
Omubibi akashohora kubiba; ku yaabaire naabiba, embibo zimwe zaagwa omu muhanda, zaaribatiirirwa, enyonyi z'omu mwanya zaazirya.
Ezindi zaagwa aha rukiri; ku zaamezire, zaahonga, ahabw'okubura amaizi.
Ezindi zaagwa omu mahwa; amahwa gaakura nazo, gaazinyuruza.
Ezindi zaagwa omu itaka rirungi, zaamera, zaayera emirundi igana. Ku yaaherize kugira atyo, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Abeegi ku baamubuurize amakuru g'enfumu egyo,
yaagira ati: Imwe muhairwe okumanya emibonano y'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kwonka abandi bagigambirwa omu nfumu, ngu omu kuhurira barekye kushoborokyerwa.
Mbwenu enfumu egyo niyo egi. Embibo n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Ez'omu muhanda, abo nibo bahurira; bwanyima Sitaane akiija, akaiha ekigambo omu mitima yaabo, ngu bataikiriza bakajunwa.
Ez'aha rukiri, abo nibo bahurira ekigambo, bakakiikiriza n'okushemererwa; kwonka bataine mizi, bakaikiriza omwanya mukye, kandi omu biro eby'okwohibwa bakagaruka enyima.
Ezaagwire omu mahwa, abo nibo bahurira; kwonka bakiba bari omu muhanda bakanyuruzibwa amaganya g'ensi, n'obutungi n'okweshemeza okw'amagara g'ensi egi, ebyana byabo biteere.
N'ezaagwire omu itaka rirungi, abo nibo bahurira ekigambo, bakakigumya omu mitima eshemeire emirungi, kandi bakaguma nibaana ebyana.
Ahakuba tihariho kyasherekirwe ekitarishuuruurwa, nari eky'omubonano ekitarimanywa kikareebwa butunu.
N'ahabw'ekyo omu kuhurira mwerinde, ahabw'okuba oine, niwe aryongyerwa, kandi otaine, aryayakwa n'ekyo eki arikuteekateeka ngu aine.
Abaabaire bari aho baamugira bati: Nyoko na barumuna baawe beemereire aheeru, nibenda kukureeba.
We yaabagarukamu naagira ati: Maawe na barumuna bangye n'abo abahurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga, bakakyorobera.
Ku baabaire nibagyenda, yaagwejegyera. Eihunga ringi ryabatangira aha nyanja, obwato bwayenda kwijura amaizi, baaba omu kabi.
Baija baamusisiimura, nibagira bati: Mwegyesa, Mwegyesa, twafa! Yaasisiimuka, yaakabukira eihunga n'okuhoorera kw'amaizi; byacureera, haabaho obucureera bwingi.
Yaababuuza ati: Okwikiriza kwanyu kuri nkahi? Baatiina, baatangaarana, baagambira bati: Ogu ni muntu ki, orikuragiira eihunga n'enyanja, bikamuhurira!

Ku yaatambuukiire ati aha nkungu, yaabuganwa omushaija ow'omuri tauni yaaho, owaabaire ariho daimoni. Omushaija ogwo akaba amazire ebiro bingi atakijwara kantu, kandi atakiraara mu nju kureka omu bituuro.
Ku yaareebire Yesu, yaayamuza, yaamugwa omumaisho, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Noofa ki naanye, Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga Rukira-boona? Ninkweshengyereza, otaanyita kubi;

ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba yaaragiire daimoni kuruga aha muntu ogwo. (Kandi kaingi daimoni ku yaabaire amukwata, abantu bamubohesa emihama n'emirunga ngu bamurinde; acwa ebimubohire, daimoni amurariza omu ihamba.)
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Eiziina ryawe ori oha? Yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi Legioni; ahakuba baadaimoni baingi bakaba bamutaahiremu.
Baamweshengyereza kutabaragiira kukyengera okuzimu.
Kandi aho omu rukiizi hakaba hariiriireyo omukumbi gw'empunu nyingi; baamweshengyereza kuba nizo baataahamu. Yaabaikiriza.
Baadaimoni nikwo kuruga omu muntu ogwo, bakataaha omu mpunu; empunu ezo zoona zikashuuma ibanga niziiruka, zikahwera omu nyanja.
Abariisa baazo ku baareebire ekyabaho, bairuka, baabigambira ab'omuri tauni n'ab'omu byaro.
Abantu baahurura kureeba ebyabaho; ku baahikire ahari Yesu, baashanga omushaija owaarugwaho baadaimoni ashutami aha bigyere bya Yesu, ajwaire gye, aine obwengye; baatiina.
Abariisa abaabireeba, baabateekyerereza oku owaabaire ariho baadaimoni yaakizibwa.
Abantu boona ab'omu nsi egyo ey'Abageraseene baamushaba kubarugamu; ahabw'okuba bakakwatwa obwoba bwingi; atyo Yesu yaaza omu bwato, yaagarukayo.
Atakagyenzire, omushaija owaarugwaho baadaimoni yaamweshengyereza ngu agume nawe; kwonka Yesu yaamwohereza, naagira ati:
Garuka omu ka yaawe, ogambe ebi Ruhanga yaakukorera oku biri bikuru. Yaagyenda naabuzya omuri tauni yoona ebikuru ebi Yesu amukoreire.
Haija omushaija eiziina rye Yairo, owaabaire ari omukuru wa sinagogi; yaakwata Yesu amaguru, naamweshengyereza kuza omu nju ye,
ahabw'okuba akaba aine omwishiki omwe wenka ohikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri, kandi akaba ari haihi n'okufa.
Ku yaabaire naagyenda, abantu baamufunza.
Haija omukazi owaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire ekyejwiso; kandi akaba yaamariire ebintu bye byona omu bafumu, kwonka hatariho n'omwe owaabaasize kumutambira.
Yaamuturuka enyima, yaakora aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye; ahonaaho ekyejwiso kye kyakira.
Yesu yaabuuza ati: N'oha owankoraho? Boona ku baayehakaine, Petero na bagyenzi be baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, emitwe ekwehinguririize, neekumigisiriza!
Yesu yaagira ati: Haine owankoraho, ahabw'okuba naahurira amaani gandugamu.
Omukazi ku yamanyire ngu tasherekirwe, yaija naatetema, yaajuunara omu maisho ge, yaagambira omu maisho ga boona ekyamumukoresaho, kandi n'oku yaakira ahonaaho.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Mwana wangye, okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza; gyenda n'obusingye.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, haija omuntu owaaruga ow'omukuru wa sinagogi, yaagira ati: Muhara waawe yaakaba; otarusya Omwegyesa.
Kwonka Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaamugambira ati: Otatiina; ikiriza kwonka, naija kukira.
Ku yaahikire aha nju, tiyaikiriza muntu weena kutaahamu nawe, kureka Petero na Yohaana na Yakobo na ishe w'omwishiki na nyina.
Kandi boona bakaba nibarira nibamucurira; kwonka Yesu yaabagira ati: Mutarira; ahabw'okuba tafiire, agwejegyeire.
Bamushekyerera munonga, ahabw'okuba bakamanya ku afiire.
We yaamukwata aha mukono, yaamweta ati: Mwishiki 'we, imuka.
Amagara ge gaamugarukamu, ahonaaho yaimuka; Yesu yaaragiira ngu bamuhe eky'okurya.
Abazaire be baatangaara munonga; kwonka yaabeehanangiriza kutagira u baagambira ebyabaho.
Yaabatuma kugamba eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'okukiza abarwaire.
Yaabaragiira ati: Mutagira eki mwagyendana, n'obu yaakuba enkoni, nari enshaho, nari eby'okurya, nari empiiha; kandi mutatwara amakanzu abiri.
Enju yoona ei muraataahemu, mugume omwo, kandi nimwo muriruga.
Kandi ahu bataribaakiira hoona, ku muriba nimuruga omuri tauni egyo, mukunkumure omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byanyu okuba mushinja aharibo.
Batyo baagyenda, baaraba omu birorero, nibabuuriria engiri, nibatambira abantu hoonahoona.
abandi ngu, Eliya areebekire; n'abandi ngu, omwe ahari baanabi aba ira azookire;
kwonka Heroode we yaagira ati: Yohaana nkamutemaho omutwe. Kandi ogwo n'oha, ou ndikuhuriraho ebigambo ebyo? Yaayenda ngu amureebe.
Emitwe y'abantu ku yaakimanyire, baamukurata; yaabaakiira n'okushemererwa, yaabagambira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, n'abaabaire nibenda kutambirwa yaabakiza.
Ku bwatandikire kwira, bari ikumi na babiri baija baamushaba nibagira bati: Raga abantu bagyende omu birorero n'omu byaro, baronde oburaaro n'eby'okurya; ahabw'okuba aha turi omu ihamba.
Kwonka We yaabaragiira ati: Mube niimwe mwabaha eby'okurya. Baagira bati: Ebi twine n'emigaati etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri kwonka, kureka tugyende tugure eby'okurya ahabw'aba bantu boona.
Ahakuba bakaba bari abashaija nk'enkumi itaano. Yaaragiira abeegi be ati: Mubashutamye omu mitwe, nk'ey'ataano ataano.
Baagira batyo, baabashutamya boona.
Yaakwata egyo migaati etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaasiima, yaabicwamu, yaabiha abeegi be ngu babite omu maisho g'abantu.
Boona baarya, baahaaga. Bwanyima baatorotoora oburagarika obwatsigaireho, bwaba ebitenga ikumi na bibiri.
Baamugarukamu bati: Yohaana Omubatizi; abandi ngu, Eliya; kandi abandi ngu Omwe ahari baanabi aba ira azookire.
Yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi imwe, mugira ngu mba oha? Petero yaagarukamu ati: Ori Kristo owa Ruhanga.
Yaabeehanangiriza naabaragiira kutagira u baakigambira;
naagira ati: Omwana w'omuntu ashemereire kubonabonesibwa omuri bingi, n'okwangwa abakuru n'abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki, n'okwitwa, kandi n'okuzooka aha kiro kya kashatu.
Kandi yaagambira boona ati: Omuntu weena oraayende kunkuratira, ayeyangise, ayekorere omusharaba gwe obutoosha, ankuratire.
Ahakuba omuntu weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge aryagabuza; kandi orikubuza amagara ge ahabwangye, aryagakiza.
Mbwenu omuntu kiryamugasira ki okutunga ensi yoona, akahwerekyerera, nari akaferwa amagara ge?

Mumanye ngu omuntu weena orikwitwa enshoni ahabwangye n'ahabw'ebigambo byangye, n'Omwana w'omuntu nawe aryaitwa enshoni ahabwe, ku ariizira omu kitiinisa kye, n'omu kitiinisa kya Ishe n'ekya baamaraika abarikwera.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuri aba abeemereire aha, hariho bamwe abarireeba obukama bwa Ruhanga, batakafiire.
Ku yaabaire naashaba, enshusha y'ahamaisho ge yaahindurwa, ebijwaro bye byayera nibimurinkana.
Kandi reeba abashaija babiri, Musa na Eliya, baagaaniira nawe;
baareebeka baine ekitiinisa, baagamba aha kufa kwe, oku ariija kuhikiiririza Yerusaalemu.
Kandi Petero na bagyenzi be bakaba baine oturo nibahungira; ku baakangukireyo, baareeba ekitiinisa kye n'abo bashaija babiri beemereire nawe.

Abashaija abo ku baabaire nibataana nawe, Petero yaagambira Yesu ati: Mwegyesa, ni kirungi obu turi aha; twombekye obuju bushatu, akamwe kabe akaawe, akandi kabe aka Muksa, n'akandi aka Eliya; ahakuba akaba atarikumanya ki arikugamba.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba, ekicu kyaija, kyabasangira; ku baataahire omu kicu, baatiina.
Eiraka ryayema omu kicu, nirigira riti: Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou ntooraine; mumuhurire!
Eiraka eryo ku ryaherize kugamba, baashanga Yesu ari wenka. N'ahabw'ekyo omu biro ebyo bakahunama, tibaagambiraho muntu weena kigambo na kimwe ahari ebyo ebi baareebire.
Reeba omushaija ow'omu mutwe ogwo yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Mwegyesa, ninkweshengyereza, ndeebera omwana wangye w'omwojo; ahakuba niwe naazaire wenka.
Daimoni ku amukwata, ahonaaho ayamuza; amutetemya, areeta eifuro; amuhendagura, amurugaho yaamunogize.
Kandi naayeshengyereza abeegi baawe kumubinga, tibaabaasa.
Yesu yaagambira abeegi be ati: Ab'obusingye obutarikwikiriza, abarikwehabagiza, ndyaherera hi okuguma naimwe, n'okubagumisiririza? Ndeetera mutabani waawe.
Omwana ku yaabaire naakiija, daimoni yaamuteera ahansi, yaamutaagura munonga. Yesu yaagambira kubi daimoni, yaatambira omwana, yaamugarurira ishe.
Boona baatangaarira ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga.
Kandi boona ku baabaire nibakitangaarira ebi yaakora byona, yaagira abeegi be ati:
Ebigambo ebi mubihurire gye n'amatu gaanyu; ahakuba Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu.
Kwonka tibarashoborokyeirwe ki yaabagambiire, kikaba kibakingiirwe, ngu batakyetegyereza; kandi batiina kukimubuuza.
Yesu ku yaamanyire ebiteekateeko by'omu mitima yaabo, yaakwata omwana muto, yaamwemereza aha rubaju rwe,
yaabagira ati: Weena orikwakira omwana ogu omuto omu iziina ryangye, biri niinye ayakiire; kandi weena orikuunyakiira, biri ayakiire Owantumire; ahakuba omuto omuriimwe mwena, ogwo niwe mukuru.
Yohaana yaagarukamu naagira ati: Mwegyesa, tureebire omuntu naabinga baadaimoni omu iziina ryawe, twamuzibira, ahabw'okutakwatanisa naitwe.
Kwonka Yesu yaamugira ati: Mutamuzibira, ahakuba otari muzigu waanyu, aba ari owaanyu.
Ebiro bye eby'okutemba omu iguru ku byabaire nibyenda kuhika, amaisho ge yaagateera kimwe aha kuza Yerusaalemu. Yaatuma entumwa kumwebembera;
zaagyenda, zaataaha omu kirorero ky'Abasamaria, kumuteguurira oburaaro.
Kwonka abantu baayanga kumwakiira, ahabw'okuba akaba agyemire ogurikuza Yerusaalemu.
Abeegi be Yakobo na Yohaana ku baakireebire, baamubuuza bati: Mukama waitu, nooyenda turagiire omuriro gurugye omu iguru, gushuume, gubacwekyereze?
We yaahinduka, yaabahana, ati: Timurikumanya mutima ogu mwine oku guri;
ahabw'okuba Omwana w'omuntu taraizire kucwekyereza amagara g'abantu, kureka okubajuna. Baagumizamu, baataaha omu kirorero ekindi.
Yesu yaamugambira ati: Zaamuha ziine ebiina, n'enyonyi z'omu mwanaya ziine ebyashuri; kwonka Omwana w'omuntu taine na h'okuta omutwe.
Yaagambira ondiijo ati: Nkuratira! We yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, reka mbanze ngyende, nziikye tata.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Reka abafu baziikye abafu baabo; kwonka iwe, ogyende obuzye hoona obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Kandi ondiijo yaagira ati: Ndyakukuratira, Mukama wangye; kwonka reka mbanze ndagye ab'omu ka.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Tihariho muntu ovuga ekyoma ekirikuhinga, akareeba enyima, oshemereire obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Yaabagira ati: Eby'okugyesha ni bingi, kwonka abagyesi ni bakye; n'ahabw'ekyo mushabe Mukama w'eigyesha atume abagyesi omu kugyesha kwe.
Mugyende; reeba, nimbatuma muri nk'entaama ahagati y'emishega.
Mutatwara enshaho z'empiiha, n'obu zaakuba efurebe, nari enkaito; kandi mutagira ou mwaramutsya omu muhanda.
Enju yoona ei muraataahemu, mubanze mugire muti: Obusingye bugume omu nju egi!
Ku muraashangyemu omwana w'obusingye, obusingye bwanyu nibwija kuguma ahariwe; kwonka ku kiraabe kitari kityo, obusingye bwanyu nibwija kubagarukira.
Mugume omu nju egyo, murye kandi munywe ebi baraabagaburire; ahakuba omukozi ashemereire ebihembo bye; mutariruga omu nju mukagyenda nimuraararaara omu zindi.
Kandi tauni yoona ei muraataahemu, bakabaakiira, murye ebi baraabate omumaisho.
Mukize abarwaire baamwo, mubagambire muti: Obukama bwa Ruhanga bubairiire haihi.
Kwonka ku muraataahe omuri tauni yoona, bataabaakiira, mushohore omu nguuto zaayo, nimugira muti:
N'omucuucu ogw'omuri tauni yaanyu ogukwatsire omu bigyere byaitu, twagubakunkumurira; kwonka mumanye ngu obukama bwa Ruhanga bwahika haihi.
Nimbagambira nti: Aha kiro ekyo ekifubiro kya Sodoma kiryaba ekirikubaasa kwemerwa okukira ekya tauni egyo.
Mumanye ngu aha kiro ky'okucwa orubanja ekifubiro kya Tuuro na Sidoni kiryaba ekirikubaasa kwemerwa okukira ekyanyu.
Naiwe Kaperenaumu, nooyeraata ngu oryakuzibwa ohikye omu iguru? Ngaaha, oryagarurwa ahansi ohikye Okuzimu.
Orikuhurira imwe, biri niinye ahuriire; kandi orikwanga imwe, biri niinye ayangire; kandi orikuunyanga, biri ayangire Ogwo owantumire.
Abo beegi be makumi mushaju baagaruka n'okushemererwa, nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, na baadaimoni nibatworobera omu iziina ryawe.
Yaabagira ati: Ndeebire Sitaane naagwa nk'omurabyo okuruga omu iguru.
Reeba, naabaha obushoboorozi bw'okuribata enjoka na
Kwonka eki mutakishemerererwa baadaimoni okuboorobera; kureka mushemererwe ahabw'amaziina gaanyu kuhandiikwa omu iguru.

Omu shaaha egyo yaashemerererwa omu Mwoyo Orikwera, naagira ati: Ninkusiima, Taata, Mukama w'eiguru n'ensi, ahabw'okuba ebyo okabishereka abanyabwengye n'abarikwetegyereza, waabishuuruurira abaana bato. Eego, Taata, ahakuba ekyo nikyo waasiimire.
Ebintu byona nkabiheebwa Tata; kandi tihariho orikumanya Omwana oku ari kureka Ishe, n'obu yaakuba orikumanya Ishe oku ari kureka Omwana, n'omuntu weena ou Omwana aikiriza kumumushuuruurira.
Yaahindukira abeegi be, yaabagambira omu mubonano ati: Amaisho agarikureeba ebi murikureeba gaine omugisha.
Nimbagambira nti: Baanabi n'abagabe baingi bakeetenga kureeba ebi murikureeba, tibaabireeba, kandi n'okuhurira ebi murikuhurira, tibaabihurira.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: N'enki ekihandiikirwe omu Biragiro? Oshoma ota?
Yaagarukamu ati: Kunda Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'amagara gaawe goona, n'amaani gaawe goona, n'obwengye bwawe bwona; kandi na mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Waagarukamu gye; kora otyo, noija kugira amagara.
Kwonka ahabw'okwenda kweyoreka nk'ohikiriire, yaabuuza Yesu ati: Mutaahi wangye n'oha?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Omushaija akaba naaruga Yerusaalemu naashuma Yeriko; yaagwa omu bambuzi; baamujuura ebijwaro, baamuteera, baatsiga naayenda kufa.
Kandi omunyamurwa omwe akaba naashuuma omu muhanda ogwo, yaamugwaho atakimanyire; ku yaamureebire, yaamwetantara, yaaraba aha rundi rubaju, yaagumizamu.
N'Omuleevi atyo, ku yaahikire aha mwanya ogwo, yaamureeba, yaaraba aha rundi rubaju.
Kwonka Omusamaria, owaabaire ari omu rugyendo rwe, ku yaizire, yaahika ahu yaabaire ari; ku yaamureebire, yaamugirira esaasi,
yaamuhikaho, yaashuka amajuta na viinyo omu buhuta bwe, yaamushemba; bwanyima yaamutembya aha ndogoya ye, yaamuhitsya omu nju y'abagyenzi, yaamurwaza.
Omu kasheeshe yaihayo edenaari ibiri, yaaziha mukama w'egyo nju, naagira ati: Omurwaze; ezi oraakorese okurenga aha zi nkutsigiire, ku ndigaruka, ndyazikwihura.
Nooteekateeka, n'oha ahari abo abashatu owaabaire mutaahi w'ogwo owaagwire omu bambuzi?
Yaagira ati: N'ogwo owaamugiriire esaasi. Yesu yaamugira ati: Gyenda, naiwe okore otyo.
Kandi akaba aine omurumuna orikwetwa Mariamu; we yaashutama aha bigyere bya Mukama waitu, naahurira ebigambo bye.
Kwonka Mariza akaba ayemereize omutima ahabw'emirimo mingi y'okuheereza; yaija ahari Yesu, yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, tikirikukusaasa, murumuna wangye okumpenza emirimo? Mugambire ampwere.
Mukama waitu yaamugarukamu ati: Mariza, Mariza, oyemereize omutima, noofa kubi n'ebintu bingi;
kwonka ekirikwetengwa ni kimwe kyonka. Mariamu we atooraine omugabo murungi ogutarimwakwa.
Yesu akaba ari omu mwanya gumwe naashaba; ku yaaherize, omwe aha beegi be yaamugira ati: Mukama waitu, twegyese okushaba, nk'oku Yohaana yaayegyeise abeegi be.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ku muraabe nimushaba, mugire muti: Tataitwe, eiziina ryawe ryezibwe; obukama bwawe bwije;
ogume otuhe eby'okurya byaitu ebya buri izooba;
otusaasire eby'okushiisha byaitu, ahakuba naitwe tusaasira omuntu weena oine eibanja ryaitu; kandi otatutwara omu kwohibwa.
Yaabagambira ati: N'oha omuriimwe oine munywani we, owaakuza owe omu itumbi, akamugira ati: Munywani wangye, nguza emigaati eshatu;
ahabw'okuba munywani wangye ondiijo yaija naaruga omu rugyendo, tiinyine ky'okumugaburira;
we akeema omu nju, akamugira ati: Reka kundusya! Naakingire, kandi nyowe n'abaana bangye twabyamire; tindikubaasa kwimuka kugira eki naakuha.
Nimbagambira nti: N'obu yaakuba ataimukire kugimuheereza ahabw'okuba munywani we; kwonka ahabw'okugumizamu naamurusya, naija kwimuka amuhe ebi arikwenda byona.
Naanye nimbagambira nti: Mushabe, muryaheebwa; musherure, muryazoora; mwiguze, muryaigurirwaho;
ahakuba omuntu weena oshaba aheebwa, osherura azoora, kandi oiguza aigurirwaho.
Ni muzaire ki omuriimwe, ou omwana we yaakushaba omugaati, akamuha eibaare; nari eky'enyanja, akamuha enjoka omu mwanya gwakyo?
Nari shi, ku yaakumushaba eihuri, akaamuha skorupio?
Imwe ku muraabe nimumanya kuha abaana baanyu ebiconco ebirungi, haza muri babi, mbwenu Shoimwe w'omu iguru tarikizaho kuha Omwoyo Orikwera abo abamushaba?
Kwonka abandi baagira bati: Omushaija ogu baadaimoni naababingisa Belezebuli mukama waabo.
Kandi abandi baamutega nibamushaba akamanyiso akarikuruga omu iguru.
Yesu, ku yaamanyire ebiteekateeko byabo, yaabagira ati: Obugabe bwona ku bwebaganisamu, buhwerekyerezibwa; n'enju ku eyebaganisamu, egwa.
Mbwenu Sitaane, ku araabe naayebaganisamu wenka, obukama bwe buryagumaho buta? Ahabw'okuba mugira ngu, baadaimoni mbabingisa Belezebuli.
Mbwenu nyowe baadaimoni ku ndaabe mbabingisa Belezebuli, abaana baanyu bo bababingisa oha? N'ahabw'ekyo abo nibo baribasingisa orubanja.
Kwonka ku ndaabe mbingisa baadaimoni orukumu rwa Ruhanga, mumanye ngu obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho.
Omuntu ow'amaani oine eby'okurwanisa bye, ku arinda eka ye, ebintu bye biguma omu busingye.
Kwonka orikumukiza amaani, ku amuteera yaamubinga, amwaka eby'okurwanisa bye byona ebi yaabaire naayesiga, n'ebintu bye biri abinyaga, n'eminyago egyo agigaba.
Ou tutakwatanisa, n'omuzigu wangye; kandi otataaruura hamwe naanye, ataataanisa.
Daimoni, ku aruga omu muntu, araba omu mpita ezitarimu maizi, naasherura oburuhuukiro; ku bumuburira, agira ati: Ka ngarukye omu nju yangye omu naarugire.
Daimoni ku agaruka, ashanga eyeyereire, eboneziibwe.
Atyo agyenda areeta baadaimoni abandi mushanju abarikumukira kuba babi; bataaha omwo, bagumamu. Ebya bwanyima by'omuntu ogwo bikira eby'okubanza kuba bibi.
Ku yaabaire naagamba ebyo, omukazi owaabaire ari omu bateeraniire aho yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, naamugira ati: Enda eyaakuzaire n'amabeere agu waayonkire biine omugisha!
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Okukira, abaine omugisha, n'abahurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga, bakakyorobera.
Nk'oku Yona yaabaire akamanyiso aha ba Nineeve, nikwo n'Omwana w'omuntu ariba aha b'obusingye obu.

Omugabekazi w'eihanga ry'obukiizi-bwa-buryo aryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu aha kiro ky'orubanja, arubasingise; ahabw'okuba akaruga aha muheru gw'ensi, yaija kuhurira obwengye bwa Sulemaani; kandi reeba, orikukira Sulemaani ari aha.
Aba Nineeve baryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu aha kiro ky'orubanja, barubasingise; ahabw'okuba bakeeteisa ahabiw'okuhurira yona; kandi reeba, orikukira Yona ari aha.
Etabaaza y'omubiri gwawe n'eriisho ryawe; eriisho ryawe ku riraabe riri gye, omubiri gwawe gwona guryaijura omushana; kwonka ku riraabe riri ribi, omubiri gwawe gwona guryaijura omwirima.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyerinde, omushana oguri omuriiwe gutaba omwirima.
Ahakuba omubiri gwawe gwona ku gurikuba gwijwire omushana, gutaine kacweka na kamwe ak'omwirima, guryabeera kimwe omushana, nk'oku etabaaza ekumurikira n'okwaka kwayo.
Omufarisaayo yaatangaara okureeba yaarya atabandize kunaaba.
Mukama waitu yaamugira ati: Imwe Abafarisaayo mwozya aharuguru y'enkyeka n'orwabya, kwonka omu nda zaanyu mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi.
Imwe bashema 'mwe, Ogwo owaahangire eby'aharuguru, tiwe yaahangire n'eby'omunda?
N'ahabw'ekyo ebiri omu nda zaanyu mube nibyo mwagabira abooro n'embabazi, haza obwo byona bibone kubabeera ebishemeziibwe.

Imwe Bafarisaayo 'mwe, muryakareeba! Ahabw'okuba muganura kimwe kya ikumi ky'enshogi, n'eshwiga, n'emboga zoona, kwonka mwehuzya okucwa emanja z'oburyo n'okukunda Ruhanga; ebyo mukaashemereire kubikora, kandi na biri okutabireka.
Imwe Bafarisaayo 'mwe, muryakareeba! Ahabw'okuba mukunda emyanya ey'ekitiinisa omuri sinagogi n'okutangirirwa omu katare.
Muryakareeba, ahakuba nimushusha nk'ebituuro ebitarikureebwa, ebi abantu baribataho batamanyire.
Omwe aha beegyesa b'Ebiragiro yaamugambira ati: Mwegyesa, ku orikugira otyo, naitwe nooba otujumire.
Yesu yaagira ati: Imwe abeegyesa b'Ebiragiro, naimwe muryakareeba! Ahabw'okuba mukorera abantu emitwaro etarikubaasa kwekorerwa, haza kunu mutarikugikoraho na rukumu rwanyu.
Muryakareeba! Ahabw'okuba mwombeka ebituuro bya baanabi, abu baashwenkuriimwe baitsire.
Mutyo muhamya ebi baashwenkuriimwe baakozire kandi mubisiima; ahakuba bo bakaita baanabi, kandi imwe mwombeka ebituuro byabo.
N'ahabw'ekyo Obwengye bwa Ruhanga bukagamba buti: Ndyabatumaho baanabi n'entumwa; abamwe aharibo baryabaita, abandi baryabahiiga,
eshagama ya baanabi boona eyaasheeshekire okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi etukurire ab'obusingye obu,
okwiha aha shagama ya Abeeli okuhika aha shagama ya Zakaria, owaagwire ahagati y'eitambiro na hekalu. Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Eryatukurira ab'obusingye obu.
Muryakareeba, imwe abeegyesa b'Ebiragiro! Ahabw'okuba mukaihaho ekishumuruzo ky'obwengye; imwe ahabwanyu timwataahamu, kandi n'abo abaabaire nibataahamu, mwabazibira.
Ku yaarugireyo, abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo baatandika kumumigisiriza n'amaani n'okumwegyenzaho, ngu bamugambise bingi,
nibamutega ngu bamwiheho ekigambo, bamuregye.
Omu biro ebyo, abantu enkumi n'enkumi bakateerana, baaribatiirirana; yaatandikira aha beegi be kubagambira ati: Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo, nibwo buryarya.
Tihariho kishwekirwe ekitarishuuruurwa, n'obu kyakuba ekisherekirwe ekitarimanywa.
Eki mwagambiire omu mwirima kyona kiryahuririrwa omu mushana; n'eki mwagambiire omu kutu, muri omu kishengye, kiryagambirwa aha mutwe gw'enju.
Kandi nimbagambira, imwe banywani bangye, mutatiina abo abarikwita omubiri, bwanyima bataine kindi ki barikubaasa kukora.
Kwonka nimbahabura ou muraatiine; mutiine Ogwo, oine obushoboorozi bw'okunaga omuntu omuri Gehena yaaheza kumwita; eego, nimbagambira nti: Mutiine Ogwo.
Ebiteera-nkumba bitaano tibigurwa sente ibiri? Kwonka tihariho na kimwe aharibyo ekyeba omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Nangwa n'eishokye ry'aha mitwe yaanyu ribazirwe ryona. Mutatiina; muri ab'obuguzi okukira ebiteera-nkumba bingi.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena orimpamya omu maisho g'abantu, Omwana w'omuntu nawe aryamuhamya omu maisho ga baamaraika ba Ruhanga;
kwonka oriinyehakana omu maisho g'abantu, aryayehakanwa omu maisho ga baamaraika ba Ruhanga.
Omuntu weena origamba kubi aha Mwana w'omuntu, aryasaasirwa, kwonka orirogota aha Mwoyo Orikwera tarisaasirwa.
Ku baribatwara omu maisho g'abakuru ba sinagogi n'ag'abategyeki n'abaine obushoboorozi, mutaryemereza emitima oku murigarukamu, nari ebi muryetonganira, nari shi ebi murigamba;
ahakuba Omwoyo Orikwera aryabeegyesa omuri egyo shaaha eki mushemereire kugamba.
Omuntu owaabaire ari omu mutwe ogwo yaamushaba ati: Mwegyesa, ragiira mwene tata tubagane obuhunguzi bwaitu.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Iwe mushaija 'we, n'oha owantaireho kubacwera orubanja, nari shi okuba ow'okubabaganisiza?
Yaabagira ati: Muhurire, mwerinde okwetenga kwona, ahabw'okuba amagara g'omuntu tigari mu bwingi bw'ebintu ebi aine.
Yaabacwera enfumu ati: Hakaba hariho omutungi owaabaire aine emisiri eyezire munonga.
Yaayebuuza omu mutima gwe ati: Ngire nta; ahakuba tiinyine h'okuhunika emyaka yangye?
Yaagira ati: Eki ndaakore n'eki; niinyija kusheenya ebitara byangye, nyombekye ebirikukira obuhango; omwo nimwo ndaahunikye emyaka yangye yoona,
obwo ndyagambira omutima gwangye nti: Mutima gwangye, oine ebintu bingi ebibiikirwe eby'okumara emyaka mingi; mbwenu huumura, orye, onywe, oshemererwe.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaagira ati: Iwe mushema 'we! Eki kiro noija kwakwa amagara gaawe. Mbwenu ebi waayeteekateekyeire biryaba eby'oha?
Nikwo omuntu ashusha atyo, oyebiikira obutungi, haza atari mutungi ahari Ruhanga.
Ahakuba amagara nigakira eby'okurya, n'omubiri nigukira ebijwaro.
Muteekateekye aha bikoona; tibibiba, kandi tibigyesha, tibigira bubiiko nari ebitara, kwonka Ruhanga abigaburira. Imwe, timurikukira enyonyi?
N'oha omuriimwe, orikubaasa kwongyera
Mbwenu ku muraabe mutarikubaasa kukora ekintu kikye nk'ekyo, nimwemerereza ki emitima ahabw'ebindi?
Muteekateekye aha birabyo oku bimera; tibigira murimo, tibiruka myenda; kwonka nimbagabmira nti: Nangwa na Sulemaani omu kitiinisa kye kyona taraizihiirwe nka kimwe aharibyo.
Mbwenu Ruhanga, ku araabe ajweka atyo obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa, oburiho eri izooba, nyencakare bukanagwa omu mahega, taribajweka okubukira imwe abaine okwikiriza kukye?
Mutarisherura eki muraarye nari eki muraanywe, kandi mutaryemereza emitima.
Nimumanya ngu ebyo byona amahanga goona ag'omu nsi nibyo gasherura; kandi Shoimwe naamanya ku mubikyenire.
Kureka musherure obukama bwa Ruhanga, n'ebyo nabyo muryabyongyerwa.
Mutatiina, imwe obusyo obukye, ahabw'okuba Shoimwe naasiima munonga kubaha obukama.
Ahakuba ahu eitungo ryanyu riri, n'omutima gwanyu niho guba.
naimwe mube nk'abantu abategyereize mukama waabo okugaruka omuka naaruga omu bugyenyi, ngu ku ariija yaayeranga, barahukye kumwiguriraho.
Baine omugisha abahuuku abo, abu mukama waabo ariija akashanga bamutegyereize. Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Aryayezirika, abashutamye aha by'okurya, aije abaheereze.
Ku ariija abantu baahirwayo, nari omu itumbi, yaashanga abahuuku abo bari batyo, baryaba baine omugisha.
Kwonka mumanye eki, ngu kuri nyineeka amanya obunaku omushuma obu araiziremu, akaagumire naareeba, taakurekire nju ye kurimwa.
Naimwe mugume mweteekateekire; ahabw'okuba omu shaaha ei muteeteekateekyeiremu Omwana w'omuntu niyo ariiziramu.
Petero yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, enfumu egi ei waacwa, niitwe waagicwera, nari waagicwera n'abandi boona?
Mukama waitu yaagira ati: Omubiiki orikwesigwa kandi ow'obwengye n'oha, ou mukama we aritsigira ab'omu ka ye, okubagaburira omugabo gwabo omu bunaku obushemereire?
Aine omugisha, omugaragwa ogwo, ou mukama we ariija, akashanga naakora atyo.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Aryamukwatsa ebi atungire byona.
Kwonka omugaragwa ogwo, ku arigira omu mutima gwe ati: Mukama wangye atwireyo, yaatandika kuteera abahuuku n'abazaana, kandi n'okurya n'okunywa n'okusinda;
mukama w'omugaragwa ogwo aryaija aha kiro eki atarikumuteekateekyeraho, n'omu shaaha ei atarikumanya, aryamwasha, amuhe omugabo gwe hamwe n'abatarikwesigwa.
Omugaragwa ogwo, owaamanyire ebi mukama we akunda, aryateerwa nyingi;
kwonka otarabimanyire, akakora ebishemereire kumuteeza, aryateerwa nkye. Omuntu weena orikuheebwa bingi, aryabuuzibwa bingi; n'ogwo orikwatsibwa bingi, niwe barikira kwenza bingi.
Nkaija kunaga omuriro aha nsi, kandi ku guraabe gwakwatsire, ekindi niinyenda ki?
Hariho okubatizibwa oku nshemereire kubatizibwamu; yeimwe, ka ninshaasha okuhitsya obu kurihikiirizibwa!
Nimuteekateeka ngu nikaija kureeta obusingye omu nsi? Nimbagambira nti: Tikwo kiri; kureka okutaanisa.
Okuruga hati omu nju emwe haryabamu bataano bataanukaine, abashatu n'ababiri, n'ababiri n'abashatu batakwataniise.

Oku nikwo baritaanuukana; omushaija tarikwatanisa na mutabani, omutabani na ishe; omukazi tarikwatanisa na muhara we, omuhara na nyina; nyinazaara tarikwatanisa na mukaamwana we, omukaamwana na nyinazaara.
Ku mureeba omuyaga nigwiha omu bukiizi-bwa-buryo, mugira ngu nihaija kujwa omushana mwingi; kandi nikwo kiba.
Imwe ndyarya 'mwe, mumanya kukyenga enshusha y'ensi n'eiguru; beitu ahabw'enki mutamanya kukyenga obunaku obu?
Kandi ahanki imwe ahabwanyu mutamanya ekihikire?
Ninkugambira nti: Torirugamu okuhitsya obu oriihura eibanja ryona, otatsigyeyo nangwa na sente emwe.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimugira ngu Abanyagalilaaya abo bakaba bari abasiisi okukira abandi Banyagalilaaya boona, nikyo baitiirwe kubi batyo?
Nimbagambira nti: Tikwo kiri; mumanye ngu naimwe, ku muraabe muteeteisize, muryahwerekyerera mwena nkabo.
Nari shi, abantu abo ikumi na munaana, abu omunaara gw'omuri Siloamu gwagwereire, gukabaita, nimugira ngu bakaba bari abasiisi okukira abandi boona abaabaire batuura Yerusaalemu?
Nimbagambira nti: Tikwo kiri; mumanye ngu naimwe ku muraabe muteeteisize, muryahwerekyerera mwena nkabo.
Yaagira omuhingi w'emizaabibu ati: Reeba, mmazire emyaka egi eshatu niinyija kusherura ebyana aha mutiini ogu, nibimburira. Guteme; nigwitira ki omwanya?
Omuhingi yaamugarukamu naagira ati: Mukama wangye, gurekye n'omwaka ogu, mbanze nguhingirire, ngutemu amasha.
Bwanyima ku guryana, kiryaba gye; ku guriba gutaanire, oryagutema.
Ku yaabaire naayegyesa omuri sinagogi emwe aha izooba rya Sabato;
hakaba harimu omukazi omazire emyaka ikumi na munaana ariho daimoni orikumuzya; akaba ainami, atarikubaasa kwinamuka.
Yesu ku yaamureebire, yaamweta, yaamugira ati: Mukazi 'we, waabohoororwa omu bumuga bwawe.
Yaamutaho engaro; ahonaaho yaagororoka, yaahimbisa Ruhanga.

Kwonka omukuru wa sinagogi yaagira ekiniga ahabw'okuba Yesu yaatamba ahari Sabato, yaagambira abantu ati: Hariho ebiro mukaaga, ebishemereire kukorerwamu emirimo; n'ahabw'ekyo mube nibyo mwaguma nimwiziramu kutambirwa, kwonka ti hari Sabato.
Mukama waitu yaamugarukamu ati: Imwe ndyarya 'mwe, omuriimwe mwena hariho otatsibura nte ye nari endogoya ye ahari Sabato, akagitwara kugyeshera?
N'omukazi ogu, muhara wa Abrahamu, ou Sitaane yaabohire emyaka ikumi na munaana, tashemereire kubohororwa omu bumuga obu aha izooba rya Sabato?
Ku yaagambire ebyo, abazigu be boona baakwatwa enshoni; abantu boona baashemerererwa eby'ekitiinisa byona ebi yaakozire.
Nibushusha nk'akajuma ka sinaapi, aku omuntu yaatwaire, akakabiba omu musiri gwe; bwanyima kakakura, kakaba omuti; enyonyi z'omu mwanya zikaarika omu mataagi gaagwo.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: Obukama bwa Ruhanga mbugyeranise na ki!
Nibushusha nk'ekitumbisa eki omukazi yaatwaire, akakishereka omu ncuro z'esaano ishatu, okuhitsya obu zoona zaatumbisiibwe.
Yaagumizamu yaaraba omuri tauni n'ebirorero, naayegyesa, ari omu muhanda naaza Yerusaalemu.
Omwe yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, biri abarikujunwa ni bakye? Yesu yaabagira ati:
Mwezirikye kutaahira omu irembo erifunzire; ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Baingi baryayetenga kutaahamu, tibaribaasa.

Nyineeka ku ariheza kwimuka n'okukinga orwigi, muryatandika kwemerera aheeru kukongoota aha rwigi nimwiguza, nimugira muti: Mukama waitu, twigurireho. Nawe aryabagarukamu ati: Tindikumanya i murikuruga.
Naimwe muryatandika kugira muti: Tukaba turiira kandi tunywera omu maisho gaawe, kandi naiwe okaba oyegyesa omu mihanda y'owaitu.
Kwonka aryabagarukamu ati: Nimbagambira nti: Tindikumanya i murikuruga; mundugye omumaisho, imwe enkozi z'ebibi.
Aho niho muriririra mukanena enshaya, ku murireeba Abrahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo na baanabi boona bari omu bukama bwa Ruhanga, haza imwe mubingiirwe aheeru.
Baryaruga oburugwa-izooba n'oburengyerwa-izooba, n'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'obwa-buryo, bashutame omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Kandi reeba, hariho ab'enyima abariba ab'okubanza, n'ab'okubanza abariba ab'enyima.
Omu shaaha egyo bamwe aha Bafarisaayo baija baamugira bati: Ruga aha, ogyende; ahabw'okuba Heroode naayenda kukwita.
Yaabagira ati: Mugyende mugambire muha egyo, muti: Reeba, naabinga baadaimoni, naakiza endwara eri izooba na nyencakare; kimwe eki yaiziriire.
Kwonka nshemereire kugumizamu eri izooba na nyencakare na bwasheesha; ahakuba tikirikubaasika nabi kuhwerekyererera ahandi, kureka Yerusaalemu.
Reeba, enju yaanyu ebatsigiirwe eri omushaka; kandi nimbagambira nti: Timurindeeba okuhitsya obu murigira muti: Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe.
Kandi omu maisho ge hakaba hariho omushaija orwaire orusimba.
Yesu yaabuuza abeegyesa b'Ebiragiro n'Abafarisaayo ati: Ebiragiro nibiikiriza okukiza ahari Sabato nari shi tikwo?
Baahunama. Yesu yaamukwata, yaamukiza, yaamwohereza.
Yaabagira ati: N'oha omuriimwe, ku arikuba aine endogoya nari ente yaagwa omu iziba, otarikugiihamu ahonaaho aha izooba rya Sabato?
Baabura eky'okumugarukamu ahari ekyo.
Omuntu, ku arikweta aha bugyenyi bw'okushwera, otarishutama omu mwanya gw'ekitiinisa, hatakaija ondiijo, orikukukiza ekitiinisa,
obeetsire mwembi akaija, akakugira ati: Heereza ogu omwanya, okatandika kugaruka omu mwanya gw'enyima y'endiijo yoona noobwerabwera.

Kwonka ku oryetwa aha bugyenyi, ogyende oshutame omu mwanya gw'enyima y'endiijo yoona, okwetsire ku araije, akugire ati: Munywani wangye, irira omumaisho; obwo oryagira ekitiinisa omu maisho gaabo boona abu oshutami nabo aha by'okurya.
Ahakuba weena orikwetunguura aryagarurwa ahansi; kandi orikwegarura ahansi, aryatunguurwa.

Kandi yaagambira n'ogwo omwetsire ati: Ku oriba waateekyeire abantu eby'okurya nyomushana nari nyekiro, otaryeta banywani baawe, nari beene sho, nari beene waanyu, n'obu baakuba bataahi baawe abatungi, nabo obundi batakaakweta nk'oku waabeetsire, bakakwihura.
Kwonka, ku oriba waateekire eby'okurya, oyete abooro, ebimuga, ebirema, n'empumi;
kandi oryaheebwa omugisha; ahabw'okuba bo tibaine ky'okukwihura; oryaihurwa aha kuzooka kw'abahikiriire.
Omwe ahari abo abaabaire bashutami nawe aha by'okurya, ku yaahuriire ebyo, yaamugira ati: Oririira eby'okurya omu bukama bwa Ruhanga aine omugisha!
Obunaku bw'okurya ku bwahikire, yaatuma omuhuuku kugambira abeetsirwe, ati: Mwije; ahakuba byona byatebeekanisiibwe.
Boona baatandika kwekwatsakwatsa nk'abaragaine. Ow'okubanza yaamugira ati: Nguzire ekibanja, nshemereire kugyenda nkireebe. Naakweshengyereza, ondereere.
Ondiijo yaagira ati: Nguzire enimi ikumi z'okuhingisa; ninza kuzigyeza; naakweshengyereza, ondereere.
Ondiijo yaagira ati: Ntaahize omukazi, n'ahabw'ekyo tindikubaasa kwija.

Omuhuuku yaagaruka, yaabitekyerereza mukama we. Nyineeka nikwo kukwatwa ekiniga, akagira omuhuuku we ati: Irooko oze omu nguuto n'omu mihanda omuri tauni, oreete abooro n'ebimuga n'empumi n'abarikucumbagira.
Bwanyima omuhuuku yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, eki waaragiira kyakorwa; kwonka hakiriho omwanya.
Mukama we yaagira omuhuuku we ati: Gyenda omu mihanda n'omu buhanda oburikuraba omu bikaari, ogyeme abantu baije, enju yangye eijure.
Ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Tihariho n'omwe ahari abo abeetsirwe, oraatamire aha by'okurya ebi mbateekyeire.
Emitwe y'abantu baingi yaamukuratira; Yesu yaabahindukira, yaabagira ati:
Omuntu weena, orikwija ahi ndi, atangire ishe na nyina, n'omukazi we, n'abaana be, na beene ishe, na banyaanya, kandi n'amagara ge, tarikubaasa kuba mwegi wangye.
Weena oteekorera musharaba gwe, akankurata, tarikubaasa kuba mwegi wangye.
N'oha omuriimwe, owaakuba naayenda kwombeka omunaara, atabanze kushutama akabariirira eby'emirimo yaagwo, akamanya ku araabe aine eby'okuguheza;
ku yaakuba atatwarize atyo, akiba yaaheza omusingi, akaremerwa aho, abarikukireeba boona bakaatandika kumushekyerera,
nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu akatandika kwombeka, tiyaabaasa kuheza.
Kandi ni mugabe ki, owaakuza kurwana n'ondi, atabanze kushutama, akeehanuuza ku araabe naabaasa kuhurura n'engabo ze kakumi, ngu abone kurwanisa ogwo oizire kumuteera n'engabo obukumi bubiri?
Ku areeba atarikubaasa, atuma ahari oriya entumwa, akiri hare munonga amubuuza eki yaakumuhongyera, ngu bagire obusingye.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena omuriimwe tarikubaasa kuba mwegi wangye, yaaba atatsigire bi aine byona.
Niguba gutakishemererera musiri, n'obu rwakuba orubungo; bafa okugunaga. Oine amatu agarikuhurira, ahurire.
Abahooza n'abasiisi bakaba nibamwirira haihi kumuhurira.
Abafarisaayo n'abahandiiki baayetomboita nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu ayakiira abasiisi, kandi arya nabo.
Yesu nikwo kubacwera enfumu egi ati:
Ku agibona, agiheeka aha mabega ge, ashemereirwe.
Ku ahika omuka, ayeta banywani be na bataahi be, naabagira ati: Mushemererwe naanye, ahabw'okuba mboine entaama yangye ebaire ebuzire.
Nimbagambira nti: Nikwo n'omu iguru barishemerererwa batyo omusiisi omwe orikweteisa, okukira abahikiriire makumi mwenda na mwenda abatarikwetenga kweteisa.
Nari shi ni mukazi ki, oine empiiha z'efeeza ikumi, ku haakuburaho
Ku agibona, ayeta banywani be na bataahi be, naagira ati: Mushemererwe naanye, ahabw'okuba mboine rupiiha yangye ebaire ebuzire.
Nimbagira nti: Nikwo hariho okushemererwa omu maisho ga baamaraika ba Ruhanga ahabw'omusiisi omwe orikweteisa.
Kandi yaagira ati: Hakaba hariho omushaija owaabaire aine abatabani babiri.
Omuto yaashaba ishe ati: Taata, mpa omugabo gw'ebintu ebi waakundagire. Ishe yaababaganisiza eitungo rye.
Bwanyima y'ebiro bikye, omwana ogwo omuto yaateerana hamwe ebintu bye byona, yaagyenda, yaaza omu nsi endiijo eya hare. Ku yaahikireyo, yaashiishagurira ebintu bye omu micwe mibi.
Ku yaabiherizeho, haabaho enjara nyingi omu nsi egyo; yaaconcoboza.
Ahabw'ekyo yaagyenda, yaashumba aha muntu ow'omu nsi egyo; omushaija ogwo yaamwohereza omu mariisizo ge kuriisa empunu.
Yaayetenga kurya ebishushu ebi empunu zaabaire zirya, kandi tihariho waabaire amuha ekintu kyona.
Ku yaayegarukiremu, yaayebuuza ati: Abapakasi ni bangahi abarikukorera tata, abarya eby'okurya bakaremwa; haza nyowe enjara neenyitira aha!
Ka nyimukye, nze owa tata, mmugire nti: Taata, nkacumura aha W'omu iguru kandi n'omu maisho gaawe;
tinshemereire kwetwa omwana waawe; ongire nk'omwe aha bapakasi baawe abakorera ebihembo.
Yaimuka kuza owa ishe. Ku yaabaire akiri hare munonga, ishe yaamureeba, yaakwatwa embabazi, yairuka, yaamugwa omunda, yaamunywegyera.
Omwana yaamugira ati: Taata, nkacumura aha W'omu iguru, kandi n'omu maisho gaawe, tinkiri w'okwetwa omwana waawe.
Kwonka ishe yaaragiira abahuuku be ati: Mwehuute mureete ekijwaro ekirikukira oburungi, mukimujwekye, n'empeta omu rukumu, n'enkaito omu bigyere;
mureete enyana y'ebishaju, mugiite, turye, tushemererwe;
ahabw'okuba omwana wangye ogu akaba afiire, hati yaazooka; akaba azaahire, mbwenu yaazaahuuka. Baatandika kushemererwa.
Obwo mukuru we akaba ari omu musiri; ku yaarugireyo, yairira haihi n'eka, yaahurira emikuri n'okuzina.
Yaayeta omwe aha bahuuku, yaamubuuza ebyo oku biri.
We yaamugarukamu ati: Murumuna waawe yaija; kandi sho yaamubaagira enyana y'ebishaju, ahabw'okumubona akihuriire.
Onu yaaguubwa kubi, yaayanga kutaaha omuka. Ishe yaashohora, yaamweshengyereza;
omwojo ogwo yaagarukamu ishe ati: Reeba, mmazire emyaka mingi ninkuheereza, tinkagomeraga kiragiro kyawe kyona; kwonka tokampaga kabuzi, ngu naanye nshemererwe n'abanywani bangye.
Mbwenu omwana waawe ogu, owaamariire obutungi bwawe omuri baamaraaya, ku yaija, waamubaagira enyana y'ebishaju.
Ishe yaamugira ati: Mwana wangye, otuura naanye ebiro byona, kandi ebyangye byona n'ebyawe.
Kwonka eky'okwesiima n'okushemererwa kyaba kihikire; ahabw'okuba murumuna waawe ogu akaba afiire, hati yaazooka; akaba azaahire, mbwenu yaazaahuuka.
Yesu yaagaruka yaagira abeegi be ati: Hakaba hariho omuntu omutungi, owaabaire aine omubiiki; baamumuregaho ku arikushiisha ebintu bye.
Yaamweta, yaamubuuza ati: Eki, eki ndikukuhuriraho, n'enki? Nyoreka oku waatwarize eby'obubiiki bwawe; ahakuba tokishemerera kuba mubiiki wangye.
Omubiiki yaayebuuza ati: Ngire nta, ahabw'okuba mukama wangye yaaza kumbinga omu bubiiki? Tiinyine maani g'okuhinga, kandi n'okushabiriza nikuunyitsa enshoni.
Mbwenu naamanya eki ndaakore, kikantaasya omu maka g'abantu, ku ndaabingwe omu bubiiki.
Yaayeta weena oine eibanja rya mukama we, yaabuuza ow'okubanza ati: Mukama wangye naakwihuza ki?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Encuro z'amajuta igana. Omubiiki yaamugira ati: Kwata orupapura rwawe oru orikwihurizibwaho, orahukye kushutama, ohandiikyeho makumi ataano.
Yaabuuza ondiijo ati: Iwe naakwihuza ki? Onu yaamugira ati: Ebitenga by'engano igana. Yaamugira ati: Kwata orupapura rwawe oru orikwihurizibwaho, ohandiikyeho makumi munaana.
Mukama w'omubiiki otarikwesigwa yaamusiima ahabw'obwengye obu yaagizire; ahakuba abantu b'ensi egi omu busingye bwabo nibakiza abantu b'omushana obwengye.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Mwenywanire na
Oyesigwa omu bikye munonga, niwe ayesigwa n'omu bingi; kandi oteesigwa mu bikye munonga, niwe ateesigwa na mu bingi.
Ku muraabe mubaire mutari beesigwa mu butungi obutari bw'okuhikiirira, n'oha oribakwatsa obutungi bw'amazima?
Kandi ku muraabe mubaire mutari beesigwa mu by'abandi, n'oha oribaha ebyanyu eby'okwetegyekyera?
Tihariho muhuuku orikubaasa kuheereza abakama babiri; ahakuba ku yaakukora atyo, akaayangaho omwe, akunda ondiijo; nari agumira ahari omwe, agaya ondiijo. Timurikubaasa kuheereza Ruhanga na Mamona.
Abafarisaayo, abaabaire bari abakunzi b'empiiha, ku baahuriire ebyo byona, baamushekyerera.
Yaabagira ati: Imwe muri abantu abeehindura abahikriire omu maisho g'abantu, kwonka Ruhanga naamanya emitima yaanyu; mumanye ngu ekirikuhimbisibwa omu bantu n'ekirikunugwa omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Nikirahuka eiguru n'ensi okuhwaho okukira akatoonyezi kamwe k'omu Biragiro okuhwaho.
Hakaba hariho omutungi, owaabaire ajwara ebijwaro bya bujwa n'emyenda ya bafuta emirungi, kandi ebiro byona akaba asiiba ajarami, naarya gye.
Kandi hakaba hariho n'omworo, owaabaire naayetwa Laazaaro, ou baabaire babyamya aha irembo ry'omutungi ogwo, omubiri gwe gwijwire ebironda.
Akaba ayetenga kugaburirwa ebirikuragara ahansi y'emeeza y'ogwo mutungi; kandi n'embwa zikaba ziija, zirigatsa ebironda bye.
Bwanyima omworo ogwo yaafa, yaatwarwa baamaraika omu kifuba kya Abrahamu. Omutungi ogwo nawe yaafa, yaaziikwa.
Ku yaahikire okuzimu, yainamura amaisho ge naahururwa, yaareeba Abrahamu hare na Laazaaro ari omu kifuba kye.
Yaayeta munonga naagira ati: Taata Abrahamu, nsaasira, otume Laazaaro akoze enshonga y'orukumu rwe omu maizi, afukiirize orurimi rwangye; ahabw'okuba nimpururwa omu muriro ogu.
Kwonka Abrahamu yaagira ati: Mwana wangye, ijuka oku waahairwe ebirungi byawe okiri omu nsi, na Laazaaro nikwo yaahairwe ebibi; mbwenu hati ari aha, ari gye, iwe noohururwa.
Kandi t'ekyo kyonka, ahagati yaitu naimwe hariho orusa ruhango orwataireho, ngu ruremese abarikwenda kuruga aha kuza ei muri, kandi ngu ruzibire omuntu weena kuruga okwo kwija ahu turi.
Omutungi yaagira ati: Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, Taata, omutume owa tata;
ahakuba nyineyo barumuna bangye bataano, abahabure, nabo barekye kwija omu mwanya ogu ogurimu okuhururwa munonga.
Abrahamu yaagira ati: Baine Musa na baanabi, babe nibo baahurira.
Omutungi yaagira ati: Ngaaha, Taata Abrahamu; ku haraazeyo ozookire omu bafu, baryayeteisa.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Ku baraabe banga kuhurira Musa na baanabi, tibariikirizisibwa muntu, n'obu yaakuba ozookire omu bafu.
Yesu yaagira abeegi be ati: Ebirikugwisa tibiribura kwija; kwonka oribireeta aryakareeba.
Haakiri ogwo okubohwa orubengo omu bitsya, akanagwa omu nyanja, okukira okureetera omwe ahari aba abato kukora ekibi.
Mwerinde; mwene sho ku araashiishe, omuhane; ku araayeteise, omusaasire;
ku araakukore kubi eizooba rimwe emirundi mushanju, yaakuhindukira emirundi mushanju naagira ati: Nyeteisize; omusaasire.
Entumwa zaagira Mukama waitu ziti: Twongyereho okwikiriza?
Mukama waitu yaagira ati: Kuri mwine okwikiriza okuri nk'akajuma ka sinaapi, mukaaragiire omusikamoori ogu muti, Higuka, obyarwe omu nyanja, gubahurira.
N'oha omuriimwe oine omuhuuku orikuhinga, nari orikuriisa entaama, ou yaakugambira naakiruga aha murimo, ati: Rahuka oije, oshutame, orye,
omu mwanya gw'okumugira ati: Ihura eby'okurya, oyezirikye, ompeereze, okuhitsya obu ndaaheze kurya n'okunywa; bwanyima obone kurya n'okunywa?
Nimugira ngu naasiima omuhuuku ogwo ahabw'okukora eki yaaragiirwa?
Muutyo naimwe, ku muraagume mwaheza kukora byona ebi muragiirwe, mugire muti: Turi abahuuku abataine mugasho; ebi twakora nibyo ebyo ebi tushemereire kukora.
Ku baabaire nibaza Yerusaalemu, yaaraba ahagati ya Samaria na Galilaaya.
Ku yaataahire omu kirorero kimwe, yaabuganwa ababembe ikumi, baayemerera hangahari,
baagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Yesu Mmwegyesa, otugirire embabazi.
Ku yaabareebire, yaabagira ati: Mwirooko mweyorekye aha banyamurwa. Ku baabaire nibagyenda, baashemezibwa.
Omwe aharibo, ku yaareebire yaakira, yaakuba, yaagaruka naahimbisa Ruhanga n'eiraka rihango;
yaajuumara aha bigyere bya Yesu, yaamusiima. Kandi ogwo akaba ari Omusamaria.
Yesu yaabuuza ati: Abaashemezibwa t'ikumi? Omwenda barahi?
Tihariho n'omwe owaagaruka kuhimbisa Ruhaga, kureka omunyaihanga ogu?
Yaamugira ati: Imuka oyegyendere; okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza.
kandi tibarigira ngu, Reeba mbubu! Nari, Mburiya! Ahakuba obukama bwa Ruhanga buri omuriimwe.
Yaagira abeegi be ati: Ebiro biryahika obu muryetenga kureeba ekiro kimwe aha biro by'Omwana w'omuntu, haza mutakireebe.
Baryabagira bati: Reeba hariya, Reeba aha! Mutarizayo, kandi mutaribakuratira.
Nk'oku omurabyo gurabiza aha rubaju rumwe rw'eiguru, okumurika kwagwo kukahika aha rundi, nikwo n'Omwana w'omuntu ariba aha kiro kye.
Kwonka ashemereire kubanza kubonabonesibwa omuri bingi, n'okwangwa ab'obusingye obu.
Nk'oku kyabaire omu biro bya Noa, nikwo kiriba kityo n'omu biro by'Omwana w'omuntu.
Bakaba nibarya, nibanywa, nibashwera, nibahingirwa, okuhitsya aha kiro eki Noa yaataahiireho omu meeri, omwegyemure gw'amaizi gukaija, gukabacwekyereza boona.
Kandi n'omu biro bya Looti nabyo kikaba kityo; bakaba nibarya, nibanywa, nibagura, nibatunda, nibahinga, nibombeka;
kwonka aha kiro eki Looti yaarugiireho omuri Sodoma, omuriro n'ekibiriiti bikagwa okuruga omu iguru, byabacwekyereza boona.
Nikwo kiriba kityo n'aha kiro eki Omwana w'omuntu arishuuruurirwaho.
Aha kiro ekyo oriba ari aha mutwe gw'enju, ebintu bye biri omu nju, ataritemburuka kubiihamu; n'oriba ari omu musiri, nawe atarigaruka.
Mwijukye muka Looti.
Omuntu weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge, aryagabuza; kandi orikubuza amagara ge, aryagakiza.
Nimbagambira nti: Aha kiro ekyo abashaija babiri baryaba bari aha kitabo kimwe; omwe aryatwarwa, ondiijo atsigweho.
Abakazi babiri baryaba nibasa kumwe; omwe aryatwarwa, ondiijo atsigweho.
Abashaija babiri baryaba bari omu musiri, omwe aryatwarwa, ondiijo atsigweho.
Baagarukamu nibamubuuza bati: Nkahi, Mukama waitu? Yaabagira ati: Ahu omutumbi guri, niho amahungu gateeranira.
Yaabagira ati: Omuri tauni emwe hakaba harimu omuramuzi owaabaire atatiina Ruhanga, n'obu kwakuba okweta aha bantu.
Kandi omuri tauni egyo hakaba harimu omufaakazi owaabaire aija obutoosha naamugambira ati: Nshoboorora n'omuzigu wangye.
Ogwo muramuzi yaamara omwanya ayangire; kwonka bwanyima yaagira omu mutima gwe ati: N'obu ndaabe ntatiina Ruhanga, nari okweta aha bantu,
kwonka omufaakazi ogu ahabw'okundusya, naaza kumushoboorora, arekye kuguma naija obutoosha kundusya.
Mukama waitu yaagira ati: Muhurire omuramuzi otahikiriire ei arikugamba.
Nimugira ngu Ruhanga tarishoboorora entoore ze, ezimutakira nyomushana na nyekiro? Aryazituuzaho?
Nimbagambira nti: Aryarahuka kubashoboorora. Beitu Omwana w'omuntu ku ariija, ebyo aryashanga okwikiriza omu nsi?
Kandi yaacwera enfumu egi abantu bamwe abaabaire nibeemanya ngu bahikiriire, haza nibagaya abandi.
Ati: Abantu babiri bakainamuka omuri hekalu kushaba, omwe akaba ari Omufarisaayo n'ondiijo ari omuhooza.
Omufarisaayo yaayemerera wenka, yaashaba ati: Ruhanga, ninkusiima, ahakuba tindi nk'abantu abandi, abanyagi, abatahikiriire, abashambani, nari nk'omuhooza oriya.
Nyesiibyakwo kabiri omu saabiiti, mpeereza kimwe kya ikumi kya byona ebi ntunga.
Kwonka omuhooza yaayemerera hangahari, nangwa tiyaayenda n'okwinamura amaisho ge kureeba ahaiguru, kwonka yaayeteerateera omu kifuba, naagira ati: Ruhanga, onsaasire nyowe omusiisi!
Nimbagambira nti: Omushaija ogwo akashuuma, yaagaruka owe aihirweho orubanja okukira ori; ahakuba weena orikwetunguura aryagarurwa ahansi; kandi orikwegarura ahansi, aryatunguurwa.
Kwonka Yesu yaabeeta ah'ari, naagira ati: Murekye abaana bato baije ahariinye, mutabazibira, ahabw'okuba obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obw'abari nk'abo.
Buzimazima nimbagabmira nti: Omuntu weena otarikwikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana muto, taributaahamu.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Noonyetera ki omurungi? Tihariho murungi, kureka omwe wenka, niwe Ruhanga.
Noomanya ebiragiro, Otarishambana, Otariita, Otariiba, Otaribeiherera ondiijo, Otiine sho na nyoko.
Yaagira ati: Ebyo byona nkabyerinda okuruga omu buto bwangye.
Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaamugira ati: Mbwenu nooburwaho kimwe; tunda ebi otungire byona, obihe abooro, oryatunga eitungo omu iguru; haza oije, onkuratire.
Ku yaabihuriire, yaagira enaku nyingi, ahabw'okuba akaba ari omutungi munonga.
Yesu ku yaamwetegyereize, yaagira ati: Ka nikiremeera abatungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!
Nikirahuka engamira kuraba omu nyindo y'empitirizo, okukira omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Abaakihuriire baagira bati: Mbwenu shi hoona, n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa?
Yaabagira ati: Ekitarikubaasika ha bantu nikibaasika ahari Ruhanga.
Petero yaamugira ati: Reeba, itwe tukatsiga ebyaitu, twakukuratira.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira ati: Tihariho muntu owaatsigire enju, nari omukazi, nari beene ishe, nari abazaire be, nari abaana be, ahabw'okubukama bwa Ruhanga,
otariheebwa bingi okukiraho omu biro ebi, kandi omu busingye oburiija akaheebwa amagara agatahwaho.
Aryaheebwayo aha Banyamahanga, baryamushungisa, bamugire kubi, bamucwere amacwante;
baryamwasha, baryamwita, kandi aha kiro kya kashatu aryazooka.
Kwonka tibaashoborokyerwa kigambo na kimwe ahari ebyo, ahabw'okuba ekigambo ekyo kikaba kibasherekirwe, tibaamanya bi baagambirwa.
Ku yaahuriire omutwe gw'abantu nigurabaho, egyo mpumi yaabuuza eti: N'enki ekyo?
Baagigira bati: Yesu owa Nazareesi niwe arikuhingura.
Yaayeta munonga ati: Yesu, Omwana wa Daudi, ngirira embabazi.
Abaabaire beebembeire baagigambira kubi, nibagicureeza; kwonka yo yaakizaho kweta munonga eti: Iwe Mwana wa Daudi, ngirira embabazi!
Yesu yaayemerera, yaaragiira ku bagimureetera; ku yaamuhikire, yaagibuuza ati:
Nooyenda ngu nkukorere ki? Yaagira eti: Mukama wangye, niinyenda ngu mpumuukye.
Yesu yaagigira ati: Humuuka; okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza.
Ahonaaho yaahumuuka, yaamukuratira naahimbisa Ruhanga; n'abantu boona ku baakireebire, baasiima Ruhanga.
Yaataaha omuri Yeriko, yaagumizamu naahingura.
Kandi hakaba hariho omushaija orikwetwa Zakaayo omuhooza mukuru, kandi omutungi.
Yaayenda kureeba oku Yesu arikushusha; kwonka tiyaabaasa ahabw'omutwe gw'abantu, kandi n'ahabw'okuba mugufu.
N'ahabw'ekyo yairuka, yaaza omumaisho, yaatemba omuti gw'omusikamoori, ngu amureebe; ahakuba akaba naija kuraba aho.
Yesu ku yaahikire omu mwanya ogwo, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaamugira ati: Zakaayo, rahuka, temburuka; ahabw'okuba erizooba nshemereire kusiiba omu nju yaawe.
Yaarahuka kutemburuka, yaamutaasya owe ashemereirwe.
Abantu boona ku baakireebire, baayetomboita, nibagira bati: Yaaza kuraarira omuntu omusiisi.
Zakaayo yaayemerera, yaagambira Mukama ati: Reeba, Mukama wangye, ekicweka ky'ebintu byangye naaza kukigabira abooro; kandi ou naagobeize weena, nimmuriha kana.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Eri izooba okujunwa kwataaha omu nju egi, ahakuba ogu nawe n'omwana wa Abrahamu;
kandi Omwana w'omuntu akaija kusherura n'okujuna ekyabuzire.
Nikyo yaagiriire ati: Omunyiginya omwe akagyenda omu nsi ya hare kuheebwa obugabe ngu bwanyima agarukye.
Yaayeta
Kwonka abantu be bakaba nibamwanga; baamukuratsa entumwa, nibagira bati: Titurikwenda muntu ogwo ku atutegyeka.
Ku yaagarukire, aheirwe obugabe, yaaragiira kumwetera abambari abo abu yaahaire empiiha, ngu amanye enshaagi ezi baihire omu kushuubura kwabo.
Ow'okubanza yaija omu maisho ge, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, miina yaawe eshaagizemu ezindi miina ikumi.
Yaamugira ati: Okozire gye, mwambari wangye omurungi! Ahakuba oyesigirwe ahari bikye munonga, obe omutegyeki w'endembo ikumi.
N'owa kabiri yaija, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, miina yaawe eshaagizemu ezindi miina itaano.
Yaamugira ati: Naiwe otegyekye endembo itaano.
N'ondiijo yaija, yaagira ati: Mukama wangye, miina yaawe ngigi! Nkagibiika omu kiremu.
Ahakuba nkakutiina, ahabw'okubali oba omuntu ogumire; oyanura ebi otaanikire; ogyesha ebi otabibire.
Yaamugira ati: Iwe mwambari 'we omubi, ninkucwera orubanja, niinyiha aha bi waagamba. Okamanya ku ndi omuntu ogumire, ku nyanura ebi ntaanikire, nkagyesha ebi ntabibire.
Mbwenu n'enki ekyakuzibiire kuha empiiha zangye abazibiika kuzishuubuza, naanye ku naakugarukire, nkaaziihireyo n'enshaagi?
Yaagambira abaabaire beemereire aho ati: Mumwakye miina egyo, mugihe oine miina ikumi.
Baamugira bati: Mukama waitu, ka aine ezindi kumi!
Nimbagambira nti: Oine niwe aryongyerwa; kwonka otaine aryayakwa n'eki aine.
Kandi abo bazigu bangye abatarenzire ku mbategyeka, mubareete aha, mubaitire omu maisho gangye.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaagumizamu kwinamuka Yerusaalemu.
Ku yaahikire haihi na Besifaage na Besania aha kibungo ekirikwetwa Zeituuni, yaatuma babiri aha beegi be, yaagira ati:
Mugyende omu kirorero ekibari omumaisho; ku muraabe nimutaahamu, nimwija kushanga omwana gw'endogoya gutsibikire, ogutakatembwahoga muntu; mugutsibure, mugureete aha.
Omuntu weena, ku araababuuze ati: Nimugutsiburira ki? Mugarukyemu muti: Mukama waitu naagwenda.
Abo abaatumirwe baagyenda, baashanga kiri nk'oku yaabagambira.
Ku baabaire nibatsibura omwana gw'endogoya, bakama baagwo baababuuza bati: Nimutsiburira ki omwana gw'endogoya?
Baabagarukamu bati: Mukama waitu naagwenda.
Baagureetera Yesu, baagutaho ebijwaro byabo, baagumushutamyaho.
Ku yaabaire naagyenda, baayara ebijwaro byabo omu nguuto.
Ku yairiire haihi, yaahika aha kashuumo k'ekibungo kya Zeituuni, omutwe gwona gw'abeegi be gwatandika kushemererwa n'okuhimbisa Ruhang n'eiraka rihango ahabw'eby'okutangaaza ebi baareebire,
nibagira bati: Omugabe orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe! Obusingye bube omu iguru, n'ekitiinisa kibe ahaiguru ya byona.
Bamwe aha Bafarisaayo abaabaire bari omu mutwe ogwo, baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, hana abeegi baawe.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nimbagambira nti: Aba ku baakuhunama, amabaare gakaagamba munonga.
naagira ati: Eri izooba, kuri noomanya ebyakukureetera obusingye! Kwonka shi hati bisherekirwe amaisho gaawe.
Ahakuba ebiro biryakwizira, abazigu baawe bakuzitireho orugo, bakwehinguririze, bakutangatangye embaju zoona;
bakuteere ahansi n'abaana baawe abakutwiremu; tibarikutsigamu ibaare eriri aha rindi, ahabw'okuba toramanyire biro eby'okutaayaayirwa kwawe.
yaabagira ati: Kikahandiikwa ngu, Enju yangye eryaba ey'okushabirwamu; mbwenu imwe mugihindwire enyanga y'abambuzi.
Yaaguma naayegyesa obutoosha omuri hekalu. Kwonka abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki n'abakuru b'abantu baacwa obwengye oku baraamwite;
baabura eki baraakore, ahakuba abantu boona bakata omutima munonga aha bigambo bye.
baamugira bati: Tugambire, ni bushoboorozi ki oburikukukoresa ebi, kandi n'oha owaakuhaire obushoboorozi obu?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Reka naanye mbabuuze ekigambo kimwe, haza mungarukyemu.
Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga omu iguru nari omu bantu?
Baahanuura bonka nibagira bati: Ku turaagire tuti, Kukaruga omu iguru, naatugarukamu ati, Kandi shi, n'enki ekyabazibiire kumwikiriza?
Kandi ku turaagire tuti, Kukaruga omu bantu, abantu boona nibaija kututeera amabaare, ahakuba nibahamiza kimwe ngu Yohaana akaba ari nabi.
Baagarukamu ngu tibarikumanya ei kwarugire.
Yesu nikwo kubagira ati: Naanye tindikwija kubagambira bushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebi.
Obunaku bw'okwera ku bwahikire, yaatuma omuhuuku we ahari abo bahingi, ngu bamutwekyere aha byana by'emizaabibu. Abahingi baamuteera, baamubinga, yaagarukayo engaro nsha.
Yaagaruka yaabatumaho ondiijo muhuuku, nawe baamuteera, baamuhemangura, baamubinga, yaagarukayo engaro nsha.
Nabwo yaagaruka yaabatumaho owa kashatu; ogwo baamuhutaaza, baamunaga aheeru.
Mukama w'omusiri gw'emizaabibu yaagira ati: Ngire nta? Niinyija kutuma omwana wangye ou ndikukunda; shana baryamuha ekitiinisa.
Kwonka abahingi abo ku baamureebire, baacuma enaama bonka, nibagira bati: Ogu niwe muhunguzi; murekye tumwite, obuhunguzi bube obwaitu.
Baamubinga omu musiri gw'emizaabibu, baamwita. Mbwenu mukama w'ogwo musiri aryabagira ata?
Aryaija, acwekyereze abo bahingi, n'ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu aguhe abandi. Ku baakihuriire, baagira bati; Nikikabure!
Yaabeetegyereza, yaagira ati: Ekyahandiikirwe eki nikishoboorora ki?
Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire,
Niryo ryahindukire erikuru ery'obuhamizo bw'enju.
Omu mwanya ogwo abahandiiki n'abanyamurwa abakuru baacwa obwengye kumukwata, kwonka baatiina abantu; ahabw'okuba bakamanya ngu nibo yaarengyeza.
Baamubuuza bati: Mwegyesa, nitumanya ngu ogamba kandi oyegyesa omuhanda gwa Ruhanga omu mazima.
Ebiragiro nibiikiriza okuha Kaisaari omushoro, nari tikwo?
Ku yaamanyire oburyarya bwabo, yaabagira ati:
Muunyorekye edenaari. Ekishushani n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha? Baagira bati: N'ebya Kaisaari.
Yaabagira ati: Mbwenu nu ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.
Tibaabaasa kumwihaho kigambo omuri ebyo omu maisho g'abantu; baatangaarira okugarukamu kwe, baahunama.
Mwegyesa, Musa akatuhandiikira ngu, Mwene ishe w'omuntu, ku arishwera omukazi, yaafa atakazaire nawe, omurumuna ahungure omukazi ogwo, amumuzaarireho abaana.
Mbwenu hakaba hariho enyineemwe mushanju; mukuru waabo yaashwera omukazi, yaafa atakamuzaireho mwana;
n'owa kabiri nikwo;
n'owa kashatu yaamuhungura, okuhitsya boona mushanju obu bahweireho batamuzaireho baana.
Bwanyima omukazi nawe yaabakurata, yaafa.
Mbwenu omu kuzooka aryaba muka oha? Ahabw'okuba boona mushanju bakamushwera.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Abaana b'obusingye obu bashwera kandi bahingirwa;
kwonka abarikuteekateekwa ku bashemereire kuhika omu busingye obwo n'aha kuzooka kw'abafu, tibarishwera, kandi tibarihingirwa.
Tibaribaasa kufa bwa kabiri, ahakuba baryashusha nka baamaraika; kandi n'abaana ba Ruhanga, ahabw'okuba n'abaana b'okuzooka.
Ebirikukwata aha by'okuzooka kw'abafu, na Musa akabyoreka omu byahandiikirwe aha byabaire aha Rushaka, ahu yaayeteire Mukama eiziina Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo.
Ruhanga ti Ruhanga w'abafu, kureka ow'abahuriire; ahakuba omu maisho ge boona baba abahuriire.
Bamwe aha bahandiiki baagarukamu bati: Mwegyesa, waagamba gye.
Okuruga aho tihaine waagarukire kumuturukirira kumubuuza ekindi.
Kandi yaababuuza ati: Nibabaasa bata kuhamya ngu Kristo n'Omwana wa Daudi?
Ahakuba Daudi we omu kitabo kya Zaaburi naagira ati:
Mukama akagambira Mukama wangye ati:
Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
Okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe
Akatebe k'ebigyere byawe.
Ahabw'ekyo Daudi, ku araabe amweta Mukama we, naabaasa ata kuba omwana we?
Mwerinde abahandiiki, abakunda kugyenda bajwaire ebijwaro biraingwa, n'okutangarirwa omu katare, n'ebitebe by'ekitiinisa omuri sinagogi, n'emyanya y'ekitiinisa omu magyenyi,
abanyaga enju z'abafaakazi, kandi abarandagatana omu kushaba, haza nibaryarya; abo baryacwerwa orubanja orurikukira obuhango.
Kandi yaareba n'omufaakazi omworo naatamu obusente bubiri.
Yaagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omufaakazi oriya omworo yaatamu bingi okukira bariya boona;
ahakuba bo baatamu aha bibashaagire; kwonka omufaakazi oriya omu bworo bwe yaatamu ebi aine byona, kandi niryo itungo rye heza.
Ebi byona ebi murikureeba, ebiro biryaija, tihariho ibaare eriritsigara riri aha rindi eritarinagwa hansi.
Baamubuuza bati: Mwegyesa, beitu ebyo biryabaho ryari? Kandi ni kamanyiso ki akaryoreka obunaku obu ebyo byona biribeeraho?
Yaagira ati: Mwerinde, mutarihabisibwa; ahabw'okuba baingi baryaija omu iziina ryangye, nibagira bati: Niinye Kristo! Kandi bati: Obunaku buri haihi! Mutaribakuratira.
Kandi ku murihurira engamba n'okujagarara, mutaritiina; ahabw'okuba ebyo bishemereire kubanza kubaho; kwonka emperu terihika ahonaaho.
Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Eihanga riryateera erindi ihanga n'obugabe buryateera obundi;
haryabaho emitsitsa y'amaani, n'enjara n'orufu omu myanya mingi; haryabaho ebirikutiinisa n'obumanyiso bukuru oburikuruga omu iguru.
Kwonka ebyo byona ku biriba bitakabaireho, baryabakwata, babahiigye, babaheyo omuri sinagogi n'omu bihome, babatware omu maisho g'abagabe n'abategyeki, nibabatura eiziina ryangye.
Obwo buryaba obunaku bwanyu bw'okuba abajurizi.
N'ahabw'ekyo eki mukihamye omu mitima yaanyu, ku mutariteekateeka by'okwetonganira, obunaku butakahikire;
ahabw'okuba ndyabaha orurimi n'obwengye, ebi abazigu baanyu bataribaasa kurwanisa n'obu kwakuba okuhakanisa.
Muryaheebwayo abazaire baanyu, na beene shoimwe, n'abanyaruganda, n'abanywani baanyu; baryabaitisa bamwe ahariimwe;
muryayangwa abantu boona ahabw'eiziina ryangye.
Kwonka n'akashokye k'aha mitwe yaanyu tikaribura.
Omu kwehangaana nimwo murijunira amagara gaanyu.
Ku murireeba Yerusaalemu eyehinguririziibwe engabo, obwo muryamanya ngu okuhwerekyerera kwayo kuri haihi.
Obwo abari Buyudaaya bahungire aha nshozi, n'abariba bari omu rurembo bashohore; n'abariba bari omu byaro batarirutaahamu.
Ahakuba ebiro ebyo nibyo biriba eby'okuhooreramu enzigu, ngu Ebyahandiikirwe byona bihikiirire.
Omu biro ebyo abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya baryareeba enaku! Ahakuba omu nsi haryabamu obusaasi bwingi, kandi n'ekiniga aha ihanga eri.
Abantu baryaitwa rurara, baryanyagwa batwarwe omu mahanga goona; na Yerusaalemu eryaguma neeribatiirirwa abanyamahanga, okuhitsya obu obusingye bw'Abanyamahanga burihwaho.
abantu bahahaaze emitima ahabw'obwoba n'okutegyereza ekirikwenda kwija aha nsi; ahabw'okuba eby'amaani eby'omu iguru biryatengyetsibwa.
Bwanyima y'ebyo baryareeba Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu kicu aine obushoboorozi n'ekitiinisa kingi.
Kandi ebi ku biritandika kubaho, mureebe ahaiguru, mwimutsye emitwe yaanyu, ahakuba okucungurwa kwanyu kuryaba kuri haihi.
Yaabacwera enfumu ati: Mwetegyereze omutiini n'emiti endiijo yoona;
ku etooka amababi, mwagareeba, mumanya ku obunaku bw'okugyesha buri haihi.
N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe ku murireeba ebyo nibibaho, mumanye ngu obukama bwa Ruhanga buri haihi.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Obusingye obu tiburihwaho, ebyo byona bitakabaireho.
Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho, kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho.
ahakuba kiryahika aha bantu boona abatwire omu nsi yoona.
Mugume nimureeba obutwire bwona, nimushaba ngu mubaase kukira ebyo byona ebiribaho, n'okwemerera omu maisho g'Omwana w'omuntu.
Kandi buri izooba akaba ayegyesa omuri hekalu; omu mwabazyo araara omu kibungo kya Zeituuni;
omu kasheeshe munonga abantu boona bamushanga omuri hekalu kumuhurira.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki baacwa obwengye oku baraamwite, ahakuba bakaba nibatiina abantu,
Yaagyenda yaahanuura n'abanyamurwa abakuru n'abaserukare, oku araamubareebeze.
Baahsemererwa, baaraganisa kumuha empiiha.
Yaikiriza, yaasherura oburyo bw'okumubareebeza, ahu omutwe gw'abantu gutari.
Yesu yaatuma Petero na Yohaana naagira ati: Mugyende, mututebeekanisize Okuhingurwaho, turye.
Baamubuuza bati: Nooyenda ngu tukutebeekanisize nkahi?
Yaabagira ati: Reeba, ku muraataahe omu rurembo, nimwija kubuganwa omushaija oyekoreire enjoga y'amaizi; mumukurate omu nju ei araataahemu.
Mugire nyineeka muti: Omwegyesa yaakutumaho, naakubuuza ngu; Ekishengye ky'abagyenyi kirahi, omu araariire Okuhingurwaho n'abeegi be?
Naija kubooreka ekishengye kihango eky'ahaiguru ekicumirwe; mutubonereze omwo.
Baagyenda, baashanga biri nk'oku yaabambira; baatebeekanisa Okuhingurwaho.
Eshaaha ku zaahikire, yaashutama aha by'okurya hamwe n'entumwa.
Yaabagira ati: Nyetengire munonga kuriira hamwe naimwe Okuhingurwaho oku, ntakabonabonesiibwe;
ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Tindirya Kuhingurwaho okundi, okuhitsya obu kurihikiirizibwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Yaakwata ekikopo; ku yaaherize kusiima, yaagira ati: Mukwate eki, mukibagane,
ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Tindinywa aha byana by'emizaabibu, okuruga hati okuhitsya obu obukama bwa Ruhanga buriija.
Ku baaherize kurya, yaakwata atyo n'ekikopo, yaagira ati: Ekikopo eki niyo ndagaano ensya ehamibwa eshagama yangye, esheesheka ahabwanyu.
