buzimazima Omwana w'omuntu naagyenda, nk'oku kyamuteekateekyeirwe; kwonka orikumureebya aryareeba enaku!
Baatandika kubuuzana bonka ngu, N'oha aharibo orikwenda kukora ekyo.
Yaabagambira ati: Abagabe b'Abanyamahanga babategyeka; n'abaine obushoboorozi aharibo beetwa Abahwezi b'abantu.
Kwonka imwe mutariba mutyo; omukuru omuriimwe abe nk'omuto; kandi orikutegyeka abe nk'orikuheereza.
Beitu omukuru n'oha, oshutami aha by'okurya, nari orikuheereza? T'ogwo oshutami aha by'okurya? Kwonka nyowe ndi ahagati yaanyu nk'omuheereza.
Kandi niimwe abaagumisiriize naanye omu bi naagyeziibwe;
nk'oku Tata yambiikiire obukama, naanye mbubabiikiire,
ngu muriire, kandi munywere aha meeza yangye omu bukama bwangye; kandi ngu mushutame aha bitebe by'obugabe, mucwere enganda za Israeli ikumi na ibiri emanja.
kwonka nyowe nkakushabira, ngu okwikiriza kwawe kutahwaho; kandi iwe, ku oriheza kuhinduka, ohamye ab'eishe-emwe.
Yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, nyeteekateekire kugyenda naiwe omu kihome, n'omu kufa.
Yesu yaagira ati: Ninkugambira iwe Petero, eri izooba enkoko terikwija kugamba, otakeehakaine kashatu ku otarikummanya.
Yaabagira ati: Mbwenu hati, oine enshaho y'empiiha, agihagatire, n'oine efurebe atyo; kandi otabiine, atunde omunagiro gwe, agure rurara.
Ahakuba nimbagambira nti: Ekyahandiikirwe eki kishemerire kuhikiirira ahariinye ngu, Akabarirwa hamwe n'abasiisi, ahabw'okuba ebyampandiikirweho nibyenda kuhika.
Baamugira bati: Mukama waitu, reeba zaarurara ibiri nzizi! Yaabagira ati: Ka bihwere aho!
Ku yaahikire okwo, yaabagira ati: Mushabe murekye kuza omu kwohibwa.
Yaabeeshorooramu hakye nk'aharikurekyerwa eibaare; yaatsimba amaju, yaashaba ati:
Taata, ku oraabe noikiriza, onyiheho ekikopo eki; kwonka kirekye kuba nk'oku ndikwenda, kureka nka Iwe oku orikwenda.
Maraika yaamweyoreka naaruga omu iguru, yaamugumya.
Ku yaasaasire munonga, yaayezirika kushaba; etuutu ye yaashusha nk'amatondo mahango g'eshagama omu kuragarika ahansi.
Ku yaaherize kushaba, yaimuka, yaija aha beegi be, yaashanga bagwejegyeire ahabw'okuganya;
yaababuuza ati: Ahabw'enki mugwejegyeire? Mwimukye, mushabe, murekye kuza omu kwohibwa.
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Yuda, noorebya Omwana w'omuntu n'okunywegyera?
Abaabaire bamuhereire, ku baareebire ebyaza kubaho, baabuuza bati: Mukama waitu, tubateme na zaarurara?
Omwe aharibo yaatema omuhuuku w'omunyamurwa omukuru, yaamucwaho okutu kwa buryo.
Yesu yaagira ati: Murekyere aho! Yaamukora aha kutu, yaamukiza.
Yesu yaabuuza abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abaserukare ba hekalu, n'abandi bakuru, abamuhururiire, ati: Mukampururiire nk'oku bahururira omwambuzi na zaarurara n'ebikoni?
Obu naabaire ntuura naimwe omuri hekalu, timurantaireho ngaro kunkwata; kwonka obunaku obu n'obwanyu, kandi n'obw'obushoboorozi bw'omwirima.
Ku baaherize kuhemba omuriro omu kibuga ahagati, baashutama hamwe ahansi, na Petero yaashutama ahagati yaabo.
Omuzaana yaamureeba ashutami aharikuhweza; ku yaamwetegyereize, yaagira ati: Omushaija ogu nawe abaire ari hamwe na Yesu.
Petero yaayehakana naagira ati: Mukazi 'we, tindikumumanya.
Ku hahingwireho akaanya kakye, ondiijo yaamureeba, yaagira ati: Naiwe ori owaabo. Petero yaagira ati: Mushaija 'we, tindi waabo.
Kandi bwanyima y'eshaaha nk'emwe n'ondiijo yaamwomesereza ati: Buzima omushaija ogu yaaba ari hamwe nawe; ahabw'okuba n'Omunyagalilaya.
Kwonka Petero yaagira ati: Mushaija 'we, tindikumanya ki orikugamba. Ahonaaho, ku yaabaire naakigamba, enkoko yaagamba.
Mukama waitu yaahinduka, yaareeba Petero, Petero yaijuka ekigambo kya Mukama waitu, oku amugizire ati: Enkoko etakagambire, noija kuunyehankana kashatu.
Yaashohora aheeru, yaarira munonga.
Baamukoma aha maisho, baamugira bati: Gamba; owaakuteera n'oha?
Baamugambaho n'ebindi bingi, nibamujuma.
Ku oraabe ori Kristo, tugambire. Yaabagarukamu ati: N'obu ndaabagambire, timurikwija kwikiriza;
kandi n'obu naakubabuuza, timukangarukamu.
Kwonka okuruga hati Omwana w'omuntu aryashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'Obushoboorozi bwa Ruhanga.
Boona baamubuuza bati: Iwe shi, ori Omwana wa Ruhanga? Yaabagarukamu ati: Ndi We nk'oku mwagamba.
Baagira bati: Kandi nitukyendera ki obwamushinja obundi? Ahabw'okuba itwe twayehuririra ebyaruga omu kanwa ke.
Baatandika kumutabaariza, nibagira bati: Omuntu ogu tukamureeba naahabisa eihanga ryaitu, naazibira abantu kushorera Kaisaari, naayehamya ku ari Kristo Omukama.
Pilaato yaamubuuza ati: Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya? Yaamugarukamu ati: Nikwo kiri nk'oku waagamba.
Pilaato yaagira abanyamurwa abakuru n'omutwe gw'abantu ati: Tindikureeba rubanja aha mushaija ogu.
Kwonka bo baayeyongyera kuhamisiriza, nibagira bati: Naagomesa abantu, naayegyesa omuri Buyudaaya yoona, okuruga Galilaaya nangwa n'okuhika omu mwanya ogu.
Pilaato ku yaahuriire atyo, yaababuuza omushaija ogwo ku araabe ari owa Galilaaya.
Ku yaamanyire ngu n'ow'omu butegyeki bwa Heroode, yaamutweka ahari Heroode, owaabaire ari Yerusaalemu omu biro ebyo.
Yaamubuuza ebigambo bingi; kwonka We tiyaamugarukamu.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abahandiiki baayemerera aho, nibamutabaariza n'amaani.
Heroode n'abaserukare be baamugaya, baamuteerera enaku, baamujweka ebijwaro ebirikwengyengyeta, yaamugarurira Pilaato.
Ahari ekyo kiro Heroode na Pilaato baihaho omukago, ahabw'okuba kare bakaba nibangana.
Pilaato nikwo kuteerana abanyamurwa abakuru n'abategyeki n'abandi bantu,
akabagira ati: Mwandeetera omushaija ogu, ngu ahabisa abantu; nyowe ahabwangye ku naamubuuriza munonga omu maisho gaanyu, tinaamureebaho rubanja omuri ebyo ebi mumutabaaririize;
nangwa n'obu yaakuba Heroode, ahakuba nawe yaamutugarurira. Nimureeba ku atakozire ekishemereire kumwitsa.
N'ahabw'ekyo naaza kumuteera, mmurekure. [
Ekyo akakigamba, ahabw'okuba akaba ashemereire kubabohoororera embohe emwe aha bugyenyi obwo.]
Boona baayombera hamwe, bati: Ihaho omushaija ogu, oturekurire Barabba.
(Niwe mushaija owaabaire atairwe omu kihome, atuzirwe obugomi obwabaire buri omu rurembo, kandi n'obwitsi.)
Pilaato, ahabw'okwenda kurekura Yesu, yaagaruka yaagamba nabo;
kwonka baayomba munonga, nibagira bati: Mubambe, omubambe aha musharaba!
Yaabagambira obwa kashatu, naabagira ati: Ahanki? Ni kicumuro ki omuntu ogu eki acumwire? Tinaamureebaho rubanja orushemereire kumwitsa; n'ahabw'ekyo naaza kumuteera, mmurekure.
Baamugyemesereza nibayomba munonga, nibamushaba ngu abambwe; amaraka gaabo gaarugaho gaamuremesa.
Pilaato nikwo kucwa orubanja ngu eki barikufa kibe nikyo kyakorwa.
Yaarekura omushaija ou bamushabire, owaabaire atairwe omu kihome ahabw'obugomi n'obwitsi; kandi yaahayo Yesu, ku bamukora nk'oku barikwenda.
Kandi omutwe muhango gw'abantu gwamukuratira; gurimu n'abakazi nibamucurira, nibeemaamaata.
Yesu yaabahindukira, yaagira ati: Imwe abaishiki ba Yerusaalemu, mutandirira, kureka mweririre n'abaana baanyu.
Ahabw'okuba ebiro biryahika ebi barigiriramu bati: Baine omugisha abakazi engumba, n'enda ezitakazaarahoga, n'amabeere agatakontsyaga.
Obwo baryatandika kweshengyereza enshozi nibagira bati: Mutugwere, n'ebibungo bati, Mutushwekyerere.
Mbwenu ku baraabe nibagira bati omuti omubisi, ogwomire gwo baryagugira bata?
Kandi hakaba hariho abandi babiri, abaabaire bari enkozi z'ebibi, abaatwairwe kwitwa nawe.
Ku baahikire aha mwanya ogurikwetwa Empanga y'omutwe, aho niho baamubambire hamwe n'ezo nkozi z'ebibi, omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, n'ondiijo aha rwa bumosho.
Abantu baayemerera aho nibashamaara; n'abategyeki baamutsyorera nibagira bati: Akajuna abandi; ku araabe ari Kristo owa Ruhanga, ou yaatooraine, naayejune.
N'abaserukare nabo baamutsyorera, baija, baamuheereza viinyo erikushaarira,
nibagira bati: Ku oraabe ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya, yejune.
Kandi ahaiguru ye hakaba hariho ekirangiriro ekihandiikirwe kiti: OGU N'OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA.
Omwe aha nkozi z'ebibi ezaabambirwe yaamuteerera enaku naagira ati: Tiiwe Kristo? Yejune, naitwe otujune.
Kwonka ondiijo yaagarukamu naamuteisa ati: Na Ruhanga torikumutiina, ahabw'okushushanisa nawe ekiheneso?
Itwe tukishemereire, ahabw'okuba tutuzirwe ebi twakozire; kwonka ogu we taine ki acumwire.
Yaagira ati: Yesu, ku oriija omu bukama bwawe, onyijukye.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Eri izooba noija kuguma naanye omuri
Omukingo gw'omuri hekalu gwataagukira ahagati.
Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango naagira ati: Taata, naata omwoyo gwangye omu mikono yaawe. Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaahayo amagara ge.
Omukuru w'abaserukare, ku yaareebire ekyabaho, yaahimbisa Ruhanga naagira ati: Buzima omushaija ogu yaaba ari omuntu ohikiriire.
Kandi abantu boona, abaabaire bateeraniire aho kushamaara, ku baareebire ebyabaho, baagaruka nibeemamaata.
Bagyenzi be boona n'abakazi abaamukuratiire okuruga Galilaaya, baayemerera hangahari, nibabireeba.
(We tarakwataniise nabo omu kuhanuura kwabo n'omuri ekyo eki bakozire.) Akaba ari owa Arimasaaya, tauni y'Abayudaaya, kandi akaba atuura ategyereize obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Omushaija ogwo yaaza owa Pilaato, yaashaba omutumbi gwa Yesu.
Yaaguhanura, yaaguzinga omu mwenda gwa bafuta, yaagurambika omu kituuro, ekyarimirwe omu rukiri, ekitakaziikwamuga muntu.
Ekiro ekyo kikaba kiri eky'Okweteguura; kandi Sabato ekaba neetandika.
N'abakazi, abaarugire Galilaaya hamwe nawe, baabakuratira, baareeba ekituuro, n'omutumbi gwe oku gwateebwamu.
Baagarukayo, baateekateeka eby'emigaju n'amajuta. Ahari Sabato baahuumura, nk'oku ekiragiro kiri.
Baashanga eibaare rikumbagaziibwe okuruga aha kituuro.
Kwonka ku baatahiremu, tibaashangamu mutumbi gwa Mukama waitu Yesu.
Ku baabaire bakishobeirwe ahabw'ekyo, reeba, abashaija babiri baayemerera haihi nabo, bajwaire ebijwaro birikumurinkana.
Ku baayekangire, bainika emitwe n'amaisho gaabo ahansi, abashaija abo baababuuza bati: Ahabw'enki nimusherurira ohuriire omu bafu?
Tari aha; azookire. Mwijukye ebi yaabagambiire akiri Galilaaya,
naagira ati: Omwana w'omuntu ashemereire kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu abanyabibi, n'okubambwa aha musharaba, kandi aha kiro kya kashatu okuzooka.
Baijuka ebigambo bye.
Baaruga aha kituuro, baagarukayo; ebyo byona baabigambira bari ikumi n'omwe n'abandi boona.
Kandi abakazi abaabigambiire entumwa ni Mariamu Magadaleene, na Yoana, na Mariamu nyina wa Yakobo, n'abandi bakazi abaabaire bari hamwe nabo.
Kwonka ebigambo ebyo byabasusira nk'eby'okugana ebitaine mugasho, tibaabiikiriza.
Bwanyima Petero yaimuka, yairuka aha kituuro, yainama, yaaringuriza, yaareeba emyenda ya bafuta eri yonka; yaagaruka omuka, naatangaarira ebibaireho.
nibagaaniira ahari ebyo byona ebibaireho.
Ku baabaire nibagaaniira, nibabuuzana, Yesu we wenka yairira haihi, yaagyenda nabo.
Kwonka amaisho gaabo gaakingirwa ngu barekye kumumanya.
Yaababuuza ati: Ni bigambo ki ebi murikugaaniira nimugyenda? Baayemerera, nibareebeka baine enaku.
Omwe aharibo orikwetwa Kuleopa yaagarukamu naamubuuza ati: Omu bagyenyi boona abari omuri Yerusaalemu, niiwe wenka otarikumanya ebibaireho omu biro ebi?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ni bigambo ki? Baamugira bati: Ebya Yesu owa Nazareesi, owaabaire ari nabi w'amaani omu bi yaabaire akora n'ebi yaabaire agamba, omu maisho ga Ruhanga n'ag'abantu boona.
Mbwenu abanyamurwa abakuru n'abategyeki baitu bamuhaireyo okucwerwa orubanja rw'okufa, baamubamba aha musharaba.
Haza itwe tukaba twine amatsiko ngu niwe aricungura Abaisraeli; kandi hamwe n'ebi byona, hati n'ekiro kya kashatu okwiha ahi ebi bibeereireho.
Kandi n'abakazi bamwe ab'owaitu abaaguruka kare munonga kuza aha kituuro, ku baija, baatutangaaza nibagira ngu baashanga omutumbi gwe gutarimu,
kandi ngu, baabonekyerwa baamaraika abaabagira ngu ariho ahuriire.
Na bagyenzi baitu abamwe baaza aha kituuro, baashanga biri nk'oku abakazi baagamba; kwonka We tibaamureeba.
Yesu yaabagambira ati: Imwe bashema 'mwe, ab'emitima etarikurahuka kwikiriza byona ebi baanabi baagambire!
Timurikumanya ngu Kristo kikamushemerera kubonabonesibwa ebi byona n'okutaaha omu kitiinisa kye?
Yaatandikira ahari Musa na baanabi boona, yaabashobororera omu Byahandiikirwe byona ebyamuhandiikirweho.
Batyo bairira haihi n'ekirorero, ei baabaire nibaza; We yaashusha nk'orikwenda kwogaho;
kwonka bo baamugyemesereza nibagira bati: Guma naitwe, ahabw'okuba bwaza kwira, n'eizooba ryarengyire. Atyo yaataaha omu nju yaabo kuguma nabo.
Ku yaabaire ashutami nabo aha by'okurya, yaakwata omugaati, yaagusiimira, yaagubega, yaagubaheereza.
Amaisho gaabo gaiguka, baamumanya; yaaburira aho, tibaamureeba.
Baagambirana bati: Emitima yaitu tiyaashashaanuka, obu yaaba naagamba naitwe omu muhanda, naatushuururira Ebyahandiikirwe?
Omu shaaha egyo baimuka, baagaruka Yerusaalemu baashanga bari ikumi n'omwe bateeraine na bagyenzi baabo abandi:
baahurira nibahamya bati: Mukama waitu Yesu yaazooka, kandi yaabonekyera na Simooni.
N'abo ababiri baabatekyerereza eby'omu muhanda, kandi ku baamumanyira aha kubega omugaati.
Baayekanga, baatiina, baateekateeka ngu baareeba omuzimu.
Yaababuuza ati: N'enki ekyabeemereza emitima, kandi n'okubanganisa kwaizira ki omu migima yaanyu?
Mureebe engaro zangye n'ebigyere byangye, mumanye ngu niinye buzima; munkoreho, mureebe, ahakuba omuzimu tigugira mubiri n'amagufa, nk'ebi mwandeeba nabyo.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaabooreka engaro ze n'ebigyere bye.
Ku baabaire batakaikiriize ahabw'okushemererwa n'okutangaara, yaabagira ati: Beitu aha mwineho eky'okurya?
Baamuha ekicweka ky'eky'enyanja kitarikire;
yaakyakiira, yaakiriira omu maisho gaabo.
Yaabagira ati: Ebi nibyo bigambo byangye ebi naabagambiire nkiri hamwe naimwe, ngu byona bishemereire kuhikiirizibwa ebyampandiikirweho omu biragiro bya Musa n'omu bya baanabi n'omuri zaaburi.
Atyo yaashuuruura obwengye bwabo, ngu bashoborokyerwe Ebyahandiikirwe;
yaabagira ati: Oku nikwo kyahandiikirwe ngu Kristo ashemereire kubonabonesibwa, n'okuzooka omu bafu aha kiro kya kashatu;
kandi ngu okweteisa n'okwihwaho ebibi bishemereire kubuurirwa omu iziina rye omu mahanga goona, okutandikira Yerusaalemu.
Imwe muri baakareebi b'ebigambo ebyo.
Kandi reeba, niinyija kubooherereza eki Tata yaaraganiise; kwonka mugume omu rurembo okuhitsya obu murijwekwa amaani agarikuruga omu iguru.
Ku yaabaire naakibaha omugisha, yaabatsigaho, yaatwarwa omu iguru.
Baamuramya, baagaruka Yerusaalemu n'okushemererwa kwingi;
kandi obutoosha baaguma nibaija omuri hekalu, nibasiima Ruhanga.
Ogwo omu kutandika akaba ariho na Ruhanga;
ebintu byona niwe yaabihangire, kandi omu byahangirwe byona tihariho kintu na kimwe eki atarahangire.
Amagara gakaba gari omuriwe,ago magana gakaba gari Omushana gw'abantu.
Omushana ogwo gujwa omu mwirima, kandi omwirima tigukaguraazaga.
Ogwo akaija kuba kareebi ngu ahamye eby'Omushana, abantu boona baikirize ahabwe.
We akaba atari Mushana ogwo; kwonka akaija kuhamya eby'Omushana.
Hakaba hariho Omushana ogw'amazima, ogujwera abantu boona, ogwabaire nigwija omu nsi.
Akaba ari omu nsi, kandi ensi niwe yaagihangire, kwonka ensi teramumanyire.
Akaija owe, abaabaire bari abe tibaamwakiira;
kwonka boona abaamwakiire, nibo abaikiriize eiziina rye, akabaha obushoboorozi okuba abaana ba Ruhanga.
Abo tibarazairwe shagama, n'obu kwakuba okukunda kw'omuntu; bakazaarwa Ruhanga.
Kigambo ogwo yaaba omuntu, yaatuura naitwe, twareeba ekitiinisa kye, ekitiinisa ky'eky'Omwana omwe nyamunegyere, owaarugire ahari Isheboona, aijwire embabazi n'amazima.
Kandi ebiri omuriwe byona nibyo twahairweho twena, n'embabazi ezongyererwa aha zindi.
Ahakuba Ebiragiro bikareetwa Musa; embabazi n'amazima byo byareetwa Yesu Kristo.
Okuruga iranaira tihariho orareebire Ruhanga; Omwana we omwe nyamunegyere, ori omu kifuba kya Ishe, niwe yaamumanyiise.
Oku nikwo kuhamya kwa Yohaana, obu Abayudaaya baamutumaho abanyamurwa n'Abaleevi abaarugire Yerusaalemu kumubuuza bati: Ori oha?
Yaabagambira butunu, atarikwehakana, naahamya ati: Nyowe tindi Kristo.
Baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu shi ori Eliya? Yaabagarukamu ati: Tindi we. Bati, Ori nabi ori? Yaabagarukamu ati: Ngaaha!
Nikyo baamubuuriize bati: Iwe shi, ori oha, tubone kugarukamu abatutumire? Nooyegamba ota?
Yaagira ati: Ndi eiraka ery'orikugambira omu ihamba, naagira ati: Mugorore omuhanda gwa Mukama, nk'oku nabi Isaaya yaagambire.
Abaatumirwe abo bakaba batumirwe Abafarisaayo.
Baamubuuza bati: Ahabw'enki iwe noobatiza, ku oraabe otari Kristo, otari Eliya, nari shi nabi ori?
Yohaana yaabagarukamu ati: Nyowe mbatiza n'amaizi; kwonka omuriimwe heemereiremu ou mutarikumanya;
niwe arikwija enyima yangye; tinshemereire kuyuzya orukoba rw'enkaito ze.
Ebyo bikabaho omuri Besania seeri ya Yorudani, ahu Yohaana yaabaire naabatiriza.
Ogu niwe naagambireho nti: Enyima yangye nihaija omuntu orikunkira, ahabw'okuba akaba ariho ntakabaireho.
Kandi nyowe ahabwangye tindamumanyire; kwonka nkaija nimbatiza n'amaizi, ngu abone kushuuruurirwa Abaisraeli.
Kandi Yohaana yaahamya naagira ati: Nkareeba Omwoyo naashuuma okuruga omu iguru nk'enkombe, yaamugumaho.
Nkaba ntamumanyire; kwonka Owantumire kubatiza n'amaizi, niwe yangambiire ati: Ou orireeba Omwoyo naashumaho, akamugumaho, Ogwo niwe abatiza n'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Naanye naareeba, naahamya nti, Ogwo n'Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Kandi ku bwaseesire, Yohaana akaba ayemereire n'abeegi be babiri,
yaareeba Yesu naagyenda, yaagira ati: Reeba, Omwana gw'entaama wa Ruhanga!
Abeegi abo bombi baamuhurira naagamba, baakuratira Yesu.
Yesu yaahinduka, yaareeba bamukaratiire, yaababuuza ati: Nimwenda ki? Baamugarukamu bati: Rabi, (amakuru gaakyo ngu, Mwegyesa,) nooraara hi?
Yaabagira ati: Mwije muhareebe. Baija, baareeba ahu yaabaire naaraara, baaguma nawe ekyo kiro, ahakuba eshaaha zikaba ziri nka ikumi.
Omwe ahari abo abaahuriire Yohaana, bakakuratira Yesu, ni Anderea, murumuna wa Simooni Petero.
Yaabanza kusherura mukuru we Simooni, yaamugira ati: Tureebire Mesia, (amakuru gaakyo ngu
Yaamureeta ahari Yesu. Yesu yaamureeba, yaagira ati: Ori Simooni mwene Yohaana; oryayetwa
Ku bwaseesire, Yesu yaayenda kurugayo kuza Galilaaya. Yaareeba Filipo, yaamugira ati: Nkurata.
Kandi Filipo ogwo akaba ari owa Besesaida, tauni y'ow'aba Anderea na Petero.
Filipo yaasherura Nasanaeli, yaamugira ati: Tureebire ou Musa yaahandiikireho omu Biragiro, kandi akahandiikwaho na baanabi, Yesu owa Nazareesi, omwana wa Yosefu.
Nasanaeli yaamubuuza ati: Noogira ngu omuri Nazareesi nihabaasa kurugamu ekintu kirungi? Filipo yaamugira ati: Ija, oreebe.
Yesu ku yaareebire Nasanaeli naija ah'ari, yaamugambaho ati: Reeba Omwisraeli kashushu, otaine buryarya!
Nasanaeli yaamugira ati: Wammanyisibwa ki? Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Filipo atakakwetsire, obu waaba ori ahansi y'omutiini, naakureeba.
Nasanaeli yaamugira ati: Rabi, ori Omwana wa Ruhanga! Ori Omugabe wa Israeli!
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ahabw'okukugambira nti, Naakureeba ahansi y'omutiini, nikyo waikiririza? Oryareeba ebikuru ebirikukira ebyo.
Yesu yaagaruka yaamugira ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Muryareeba eiguru rikinguukire, baamaraika ba Ruhanga nibatemba, kandi nibashuuma aha Mwana w'omuntu.
Aha kiro kya kashatu hakabaho obugyenyi bw'okushwera omuri Kaana eya Galilaaya, na nyina wa Yesu akaba ariyo.
Yesu nawe akeetwa aha bugyenyi n'abeegi be.
Bwanyima, viinyo ku yaahweire, nyina wa Yesu yaamugira ati: Tibaine viinyo.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Mukazi 'we, noofa ki naanye? Obunaku bwangye tibukahikire.
Nyina yaagira abaheereza ati: Eki araabaragiire kyona, mukikore.

Kandi hakaba hariho enyungu mpango mukaaga, ezibaizire omu mabaare, ezaabaire zihigikiirwe aho, zitairweho ahabw'okweyeza, nk'emigyenzo y'Abayudaaya oku eri; enyungu emwe ekaba ebamu enjoga ibiri nari ishatu.
Yesu yaabaragiira ati: Mwijuze enyungu amaizi. Baaziijuriza kimwe.
Yaabagira ati: Mbwenu mutahe, mutwarire omukuru w'obugyenyi. Baamutwarira.
Omukuru w'obugyenyi, ku yaarorize aha maiazi agaahinduka viinyo, atarikumanya i yaaruga, (kwonka abaheereza abatahire amizi bo nibakimanya) yaayeta kishwera,
yaamugira ati: Omuntu weena abanza kugabura viinyo enungi; bwanyima, abantu ku bahaaga, abaha viinyo etanuzire; kwonka iwe obiikire enungi okuhitsya hati.
Aka niko kamanyiso k'okubanza aku Yesu yaakozire; akakakorera omuri Kaana eya Galilaaya, naayoreka ekitiinisa kye; n'abeegi be baamwikiriza.
Bwanyima y'ekyo, yaashuuma, yaaza Kaperenaumu na nyina n'abarumuna n'abeegi be; baamarayo ebiro bikye.
Okuhingurwaho kw'Abayudaaya kukaba kuri haihi kuhika; Yesu yainamuka Yerusaalemu.
Ku yaataahire omuri hekalu, yaashangamu abarikutunda ente n'entaama n'enkombe, n'abarikuhingisa empiiha, bashutami nibazihingisa.
Yaakwata emigoye, yaagigira nk'orukoba, yaababinga boona omuri hekalu, n'entaama n'ente zaabo; yaashuka ahansi empiiha z'abarikuhingisa, yaajuumika n'emeeza zaabo;
n'abaabaire nibatunda enkombe yaabagira ati: Mwiheho ebi; enju ya Tata murekye kugigira enju y'abashuubuzi.
Abeegi be baijuka ebyahandiikirwe ngu, Okusaasibwa enju yaawe kuryandya.
Abayudaaya baagarukamu, baamubuuza bati: Ebyo waabikozire; mbwenu ni kamanyiso ki aku waakutworeka?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Musheenye hekalu egi; naanye ndyagiimutsya omu biro bishatu.
Abayudaaya baagira bati: Hekalu egi ekamara emyaka makumi ana na mukaaga neeyombekwa; mbwenu iwe oryagiimutsya omu biro bishatu?
Kwonka We akaba naagamba ahari hekalu ey'omubiri gwe.
Bwanyima, ku yaazookire omu bafu, abeegi be baijuka ku yaagambire ekyo, baikiriza Ebyahandiikirwe, n'ekigambo eki Yesu yaagambire.
Kandi ku yaabaire ari Yerusaalemu omu biro by'obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho, baingi baikiriza eiziina rye, ku baareebire obumanyiso obu yaakozire.
Kwonka Yesu tarabeesigire, ahakuba akaba naamanya abantu boona;
n'ahabw'ekyo tarenzire muntu weena kumumanyisa eby'abantu; ahakuba We akaba naamanya ebiri omu muntu.

Omushaija ogwo akaija ahari Yesu nyekiro, yaamugira ati: Rabi, nitumanya ku ori omwegyesa owaarugire ahari Ruhanga; ahakuba tihariho muntu orikubaasa kukora obumanyiso obu orikukora, kureka Ruhanga yaaguma nawe.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Omuntu, ku aba atazairwe bwa kabiri, tabaasa kureeba bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Nikodemu yaamubuuza ati: Omuntu naabaasa ata kuzaarwa yaakuzire? Naabaasa kugaruka omu nda ya nyina, azaarwe?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Omuntu, ku aba atazairwe maizi na Mwoyo, tabaasa kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Ekizaarwa omubiri kiba omubiri, n'ekizaarwa Omwoyo kiba omwoyo.
Otatangaarira eki naakugambira nti: Mushemereire kuzaarwa obwa kabiri.
Omuyaga guhuuha nigugarura ei gurikwenda, iwe ohurira okuhuuha kwagwo, kwonka tomanya i gurikuruga, n'obu yaakuba ei gurikuza; n'ozairwe Omwoyo weena nikwo aba.
Nikodemu yaamugarukamu ati: Ebyo nibibaasika bita?
Yesu yaagarukamu, naagira ati: Ori omwegyesa w'Abaisraeli, kandi torikumanya bigambo ebyo?
Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Itwe tugamba eki turikumanya, tuhamya eki twareebire; kwonka imwe timwikiriza kuhamya kwaitu.
Obu mbagambira eby'ensi, mutabiikirize, muryaikiriza muta, naabagambira eby'omu iguru?
Tihariho oratembire omu iguru, kureka Ogwo owaashuumire okuruga omu iguru, niwe Mwana w'omuntu ori omu iguru.
ngu omuntu weena orikumwikiriza aheebwe amagara agatahwaho.
Ahakuba oku nikwo Ruhanga yaakunzire atyo ensi, akahayo Omwana we omwe nyamunegyere, ngu omuntu weena orikumwikiriza arekye kuhwerekyerera, kureka atungye amagara agatahwaho.
Mumanye ngu Ruhanga taratumire Mwana we omu nsi kugicwera orubanja, kureka ngu ensi ejunwe ahabwe.
Orikumwikiriza, tarikucwerwa rubanja; kwonka otarikumwikiriza, aherize kurucwerwa, ahabw'okuba taikiriize iziina ry'Omwana wa Ruhanga omwe nyamunegyere.
Kandi oru nirwo rubanja, omushana gwizire omu nsi, abantu baakunda omwirima okukira omushana; ahakuba emicwe yaabo ekaba eri mibi.
Omuntu weena okora ebibi ayanga omushana, kandi taija ha mushana, ngu emicwe ye erekye kuhanwa.
Kwonka okora eby'amazima aija aha mushana, ngu emicwe ye ereebekye butunu ku yaakoreirwe omuri Ruhanga.
Bwanyima y'ebyo Yesu n'abeegi be baataaha omu ishaza rya Buyudaaya; yaagumayo nabo, naabatiza.
Kandi na Yohaana akaba naabatiriza Enoni haihi na Salimu, ahabw'okuba aho niho amaizi maingi gaabaire gari; abantu baingi baija, baabatizibwa.
Kandi obwo Yohaana akaba atakatairwe mu kihome.
Haabaho empaka ahagati y'abeegi ba Yohaana n'Omuyudaaya aha by'okweyeza.
Baija ahari Yohaana, baamugira bati: Rabi, omushaija owaabaire ari hamwe naiwe seeri ya Yorudani, ou waabaire noohamya, reeba nawe naabatiza, abantu boona nibagyenda ah'ari.
Yohaana yaagarukamu naagira ati: Omuntu tabaasa kweha kintu kyona, kureka biri akihairwe okuruga omu iguru.
Imwe mwenka nimuhamya ku naagambire nti: Nyowe tindi Kristo, kwonka nkatumwa kumwebembera.
Oine omugore niwe kishwera; omugambi w'obugyenyi, ku ayemerera aha rubaju rwa kishwera yaamuhurira, ashemererwa munonga ahabw'okuhurira eiraka rye; n'ahabw'ekyo okushemererwa kwangye oku kuhikire.
We ashemereire kuguma naakura, naanye nkaguma ningaruka ahansi.
Orugire omu iguru naakira boona; ow'ensi aba ari ow'ensi, kandi agamba eby'ensi. Orugire omu iguru naakira boona;
eki yaareebire n'eki yaahuriire, nibyo ahamya; kwonka tihariho muntu oikiriza ebi ahamya.
Oikiriza eby'okuhamya kwe, aba ahamize eki, ngu Ruhanga n'Ow'amazima.
Ou Ruhanga yaatumire agamba ebigambo bya Ruhanga; ahakuba Ruhanga ku aza kuha Omwoyo, tamurenga.
Ishe akunda Omwana, kandi amurekuriire byona.
Orikwikiriza Omwana aine amagara agatahwaho; kwonka otarikworobera Mwana, taribona magara; kureka ekiniga kya Ruhanga kiguma ahariwe.
Mukama waitu yaamanya ku Abafarisaayo bahuriire ngu naayegyesa kandi naabatiza abeegi baingi okukira Yohaana,
(haza kunu Yesu We tarabatiize, kureka abeegi be nibo baabatiize.)
Ahabw'ekyo yaaruga Buyudaaya, yaagaruka Galilaaya.
Yaahurira ashemereire kuraba Samaria.
Atyo yaahika omuri tauni ya Samaria, erikwetwa Sukaara, haihi n'ekibanja eki Yakobo yaahaire omutabani Yosefu.
Kandi aho hakaba hariho eiziba rya Yakobo. Yesu ahabw'okuruhibwa orugyendo, yaashutama aha rubaju rw'eiziba; obwo eshaaha zikaba ziri nka mukaaga.
Haija Omusamariakazi kutaha amaizi; Yesu yaamushaba ati: Mpa eky'okunywa.
Ahakuba abeegi be bakaba bagiire omuri tauni kugura eby'okurya.
Omusamariakazi yaamubuuza ati: K'ori Omuyudaaya, kandi nyowe Omusamariakazi, noobasa ota kunshaba eky'okunywa? (Ahakuba Abayudaaya bakaba batakwatanisa n'Abasamaria.)
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Kuri noomanya ekiconco kya Ruhanga, n'Ogu orikukushaba ati, Mpa eky'okunywa, naiwe okaamushabire, nawe akaakuhaire amaizi g'amagara.
Omukazi yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, toine ky'okutahisa, kandi n'eiziba ni riraingwa; mbwenu ago maizi g'amagara noogaiha hi?
Iwe nookira tatenkuriitwe Yakobo, owaatuhaire eiziba eri, eri yaabaire anywaho n'abaana be, akeesheraho n'amasyo ge?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Omuntu weena orikunywa aha maizi aga, aryagaruka agire eiriho;
kwonka weena orikunywa aha maizi agu ndimuha, tarigira iriho ebiro byona; ahakuba amaizi agu ndimuha garyahinduka enshuro y'amaizi, efumukye omuriwe, neereeta amagara agatahwaho.
Omukazi yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, mpa amaizi ago, ndekye kugira eiriho n'obu kwakuba okugaruka aha kutaha.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Irooko oyete baro, ogarukye aha.
Omukazi yaamugarukamu ati: Tiinyine mushaija. Yesu yaamugira ati: Waagamba gye okugira ngu, toine mushaija;
ahabw'okuba okashwerwa abashaija bataano; n'ogwo ou oine hati ti baro; eki waagamba n'amazima.
Omukazi yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, naayetegyereza ku ori nabi.
Baatatenkuriitwe bakaba baramiza aha rushozi oru, kwonka imwe nimugira ngu Yerusaalemu niyo abantu bashemereire kuramiza.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Mukazi 'we, nyikiriza, obunaku nibwija kuhika, obu mutariramizamu Isheboona aha rushozi oru, n'obu haakuba omuri Yerusaalemu.
Imwe muramya eki mutarikumanya; itwe turamya eki turikumanya, ahakuba okujunwa kuruga omu Bayudaaya.
Kwonka obunaku nibwija, kandi bwahikire, obu abaramya ab'amazima bariramizamu Isheboona omu mwoyo n'omu mazima; ahakuba Isheboona asherura abari nk'abo kumuramya.
Ruhanga n'Omwoyo; kandi abamuramya bashemereire kumuramiza omu Mwoyo n'omu mazima.
Omukazi yaamugira ati: Nimmanya ngu Mesia orikwetwa Kristo aryaija; ku ariija, aryatushobororera byona.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Manya, niinye orikugamba naiwe.
Omu mwanya ogwo abeegi be baija; baatangaara ahabw'okuba yaaba naagaaniira n'omukazi; kwonka tihaine waamubuurize ati: Nooyenda ki? Nari shi, ati: Ahabw'enki noogaaniira nawe?
Atyo omukazi yaatsiga aho enyungu ye, yaagaruka omuri tauni, yaagambira abantu ati:
Mwije mureebe omuntu owangambira ebi naakozire byona. Yaaba niwe Kristo? Shinta.
Baaruga omuri tauni, nibaza ei ari.
Ku baabaire batakamuhikire, abeegi be baamweshengyereza bati: Rabi, eby'okurya mbibi, ryaho.
Yaabagira ati: Nyine eby'okurya ebi mutarikumanya.
Abeegi be nikwo kubuuzana bati: Beitu shi, hariho owaamureetera eby'okurya?
Yesu yaabagira ati: Eby'okurya byangye nikwo kukora eki Owantumire akunda n'okuhikiiriza omurimo gwe.
Imwe timurikugira ngu, hatsigaire ameezi ana okuhika aha igyesha? Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Munagye amaisho, mureebe emisiri ku eyezire, ku ehikire kugyeshwa.
Omugyesi aheebwa ebihembo, ashanguririza emyaka omu magara agatahwaho, ngu omubibi n'omugyesi bashemererwe hamwe.
Ahakuba omuri ebi ekigambo eki nimwo kimanyirwa ku kiri eky'amazima, ngu: Habiba omwe, hagyesha ondiijo.
Nkabatuma kugyesha ebi mutarahendekyeire; abandi bakahendeka n'emirimo, imwe mwaija, mwahikira omu bi baafeereire kubi.
Abasamaria baingi ab'omuri tauni egyo baamwikiriza ahabw'ebigambo by'omukazi ebi yaagambire naahamya ati: Yangambira ebi naakozire byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abasamaria, ku baamuhikire, baamushaba ngu agume nabo; nawe nikwo kumarayo kabiri.
Haikiriza abandi baingi abarikukira ab'okubanza, ahabw'ekigambo kye.
Baagambira omukazi bati: Mbwenu titurikwikiriza habw'ebigambo byawe byonka; ahakuba naitwe twayehuririra, twamanya ngu Ogu niwe Mujuni w'ensi buzima.
Ebyo biro bibiri ku byahweire, yaarugayo, yaaza Galilaaya.
Ahakuba Yesu akahamya ati: Nabi tagira kitiinisa omu nsi y'owaabo.
Ku yaahikire Galilaaya, Abanyagalilaaya baamwakiira, ahabw'okuba bakareeba byona ebi yaakoreire Yerusaalemu aha bugyenyi; ahakuba nabo bakaba babutaahire.
Kandi yaagaruka, yaataaha Kaana eya Galilaaya, ahu yaahinduriire amaizi viinyo. Omuri Kaperenaumu hakaba harimu omukungu w'omugabe, owaabaire arwarize omutabani.
Ku yaahuriire ngu Yesu arugire Buyudaaya, yaaza Galilaaya, yaagyenda yaamushaba ngu ashuume akize omutabani, ahakuba akaba ari haihi kufa.
Ahabw'ekyo Yesu yaamugira ati: Ku muba mutareebire bumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza, timwikiriza na kakye.
Omukungu yaamushaba ati: Mukama wangye, shuuma oije, omwana wangye atakafiire.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Irooko otaahe; omwana waawe ahuriire. Omushaija ogwo yaikiriza ekigambo eki Yesu yaamugambira, yaagyenda.
Ku yaabaire naashuuma, abahuuku be baamubugana, baamugira bati: Omwana waawe ahuriire.
Yaababuuza eshaaha ei atandikiireho kubaho gye, baamugarukamu bati: Nyomwabazyo aha shaaha ya mushanju omushwija nibwo gumurugireho.
Ishe yaamanya ku nibwo bunaku obu Yesu amugambiriiremu ati: Omwana waawe ahuriire. Omushaija ogwo yaikiriza n'eka ye yoona.
Ako niko kamanyiso ka kabiri aku Yesu yaakozire, okwiha obu yaaruga Buyudaaya, naija Galilaaya.
Bwanyima y'ebyo hakaba hariho obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya; Yesu yainamuka Yerusaalemu.
Kandi omuri Yerusaalemu haihi n'eirembo ry'entaama, hakaba hariho ekiyanja, ekirikwetwa omu Ruheburaayo Beseseda, kiriho ebiju bitaano.
Omwo nimwo baabaire bata abarwaire baingi munonga, empumi, abarema, n'abazingazingirwe, nibategyereza amaizi kubira;
ahakuba obundi n'obundi maraika akaba ashuuma aija omu kiyanja, abiza amaizi; owaabaire atangamu abandi, amaizi gaatandika kubira, akaba akira endwara yoona ei yaabaire aba arwaire.
Aho hakaba hariho omushaija owaabaire amazire emyaka makumi ashatu na munaana arwaire.
Yesu ku yaamureebire abyami, kandi yaamanya ngu amazire aho omwanya muhango, yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda kukira?
Omurwaire yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, tingira muntu w'okunta omu kiyanja, amaizi gaaba nigatandika kubira; nyowe ku mba ninkiija, ondiijo antangamu.
Yesu yaamuragiira ati: Imuka, oyekorere ekirago kyawe, ogyende.
Ahonaaho omushaija yaakira, yaagyenda. Kandi eizooba eryo ekaba eri Sabato.
Abayudaaya baagambira owaatambirwa bati: Hati ni Sabato; ebiragiro tibirikukwikiriza kwekorera kirago kyawe.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Omushaija owantambira niwe yandagiira ati: Yekorere ekirago kyawe, ogyende.
Baamubuuza bati: Ogwo mushaija n'oha owaakuragiira ati: Yekorere ekirago kyawe, ogyende?
Kwonka owaatambiirwe tiyaamumanya, ahakuba Yesu akaba yaarugireho ahabw'omutwe muhango ogwabaire guriho.
Bwanyima Yesu yaamushanga omuri hekalu, yaamugira ati: Reeba, waakira; otarigaruka kushiisha, nyentsya otarihikwaho akabi akarikukira ako.
Omushaija yaagyenda, yaagambira Abayudaaya, ku Yesu niwe amukirize.
Ekyo nikyo Abayudaaya baahiigiire Yesu, ahabw'okuba akakora ebyo ahari Sabato.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Tata naakikora na hati, kandi naanye ninkora.
Nikyo kyakizire kureetera Abayudaaya kusherura oburyo bw'okumwita, ti habw'okushiisha Sabato yonka, kureka n'ahabw'okugira ati: Ruhanga ni Tata, akeeringanisa na Ruhanga.
Yesu yaagarukamu naabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omwana tabaasa kukora kintu kyona ahabwe, kureka eki areeba Ishe naakora; mumanye ngu ebi Ruhanga akora byona, n'Omwana nawe nibyo akora;
ahakuba Ishe akunda Omwana, kandi amworeka ebi akora byona; kandi aryamworeka ebirikukira ebi, ngu imwe mutangaare.
Nk'oku Isheboona azoora abafu, akabaha amagara, nikwo n'Omwana aha amagara abu ayenda kugaha.
Ahakuba na Ishe tacwera muntu weena orubanja, okucwa orubanja kwona akakurekurira Omwana,
ngu boona bahe Omwana ekitiinisa, nk'oku bakiha Ishe. Otaha Mwana kitiinisa, takiha na Ishe owaamutumire.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Orikuhurira ekigambo kyangye, akaikiriza Owantumire, aine amagara agatahwaho, kandi tariza mu rubanja; ahabw'okuba aherize kuruga omu kufa, yaataaha omu magara.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Obunaku nibwija, kandi buriho na hati mbwenu, abafu obu barihurira eiraka ry'Omwana wa Ruhanga; n'abo abaririhurira baryaba abahuriire.
Ahakuba nk'oku Ishe aine amagara omuriwe wenka, nikwo yaahaire n'Omwana kugagira omuriwe wenka;
kandi akamuha obushoboorozi bw'okucwa emanja, ahabw'okuba niwe Mwana w'omuntu.
Mutatangaarira eki; ahakuba obunaku nibwija, abari omu bituuro boona obu barihurira eiraka rye,
bakarugamu, abo abaakozire gye, bakazookyera amagara; nabo abaakozire kubi, bakazookyera okucwerwa orubanja.

Tindikubaasa kukora kintu kyona ahabwangye; oku mpurira, nikwo ncwa orubanja; n'emanja ezi ncwa, nzicwa omu mazima, ahabw'okuba tiinyenda kutwaza nk'oku ndikwenda ahabwangye, kureka nk'Owantumire oku arikwenda.
Ku ndikwehamya nyenka, okwehamya kwangye nikuba kutari kw'amazima;
hariho ondiijo orikumpamya, kandi nimmanya ngu okuhamya oku ampamya n'okw'amazima.
Imwe mukatuma ahari Yohaana, nawe yaabahamiza amazima.
Okuhamibwa, oku ndikwegamira, tikurikuruga ha muntu; kwonka ebi nimbigamba, ngu imwe mujunwe.
Yohaana ogwo akaba ari etabaaza erikwaka, ekamurika; naimwe mukamara akaanya kakye nimwikiriza kushemerererwa okumurika kwe.
Kwonka nyowe nyine ebirikumpamya ebikuru ebirikukira ebya Yohaana; ahakuba emirimo ei Tata yampaire kuhikiiriza, emirimo egyo ei ndikukora niyo erikumpamya ku Tata yantumire.
Kandi Tata owantumire niwe ampamize. Imwe timukahuriraga iraka rye, n'obu kwakuba okureeba enshusha ye;
kandi ekigambo kye tikituura muriimwe; ahabw'okuba timwikiriza u yaatumire.
Kwonka mwanga kwija ahariinye, ngu muheebwe amagara.
Tindikwikiriza kitiinisa eki ndikuheebwa abantu.
Ahakuba nimmanya imwe ku mutarikukunda Ruhanga omu mitima yaanyu.
Nyizire omu iziina rya Tata, timwanyakiira; ondiijo ku ariija omu iziina rye wenka, we muryamwakiira.
Nimubaasa muta kwikiriza, imwe abahaana ekitiinisa, haza mutasherura kitiinisa ekiruga ahari Ruhanga omwe wenka?
Murekye kugira ngu niinye ndibarega ahari Tata; hariho omwe obarega, niwe Musa, ou mwesiga.
Kuri mwaikiriize Musa, naanye mukaanyikiriize, ahakuba niinye yaahandiikireho.
Ku muraabe mutaikiriza bi yaahandiikire, muryabaasa muta kwikiriza ebigambo byangye?
Omutwe muhango gw'abantu gwamukuratira, ahakuba bakareeba obumanyiso obu yaakozire aha barwaire.
Yesu yaatemba omu bibungo, yaashutamayo n'abeegi be.
Kandi obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya obw'Okuhingurwaho bukaba buri haihi.
Yesu ku yaanagire amaisho, yaareeba omutwe gw'abantu baingi nigwija ah'ari, yaabuuza Filipo ati: Nitwija kugura hi emigaati, ei aba bantu baraarye?
Akamubuuza atyo kumugyeza, ahakuba We akaba naamanya eki araakore.
Filipo yaamugarukamu ati: Emigaati erikugurwa edenaari magana abiri terikubahika, n'obu omuntu weena yaakuryaho kakye.
Omwe aha beegi be, Anderea murumuna wa Simooni Petero, yaamugira ati:
Aha hariho omwojo oine emigaati ya sayiri etaano n'eby'enyanja bibiri; kwonka ebyo nibigasira ki abantu abarikwingana bati?
Yesu yaagira ati: Mushutamye abantu. Kandi aho hakaba hariho akacwamba kahango; abantu baashutama ahansi, bakaba bari nk'enkumi itaano.
Atyo Yesu yaayakiira egyo migaati; ku yaaherize kusiima, yaagigaburira abantu abaabaire bashutami; yaabaha n'eby'enyanja, nk'oku baayenzire.
Ku baahaagire, yaaragiira abeegi be ati: Mutorotoore oburagarika obwatsigaraho, hatagira akaaburaho.
Baabutorotoora, baijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri oburagarika obwashaagire aha migaati etaano ya sayiri, ei baariire.
Abantu ku baareebire akamanyiso aku yaakora, baagira bati: Buzima ogu niwe nabi ogwo orikwenda kwija omu nsi!
Yesu, ku yaayetegyereize ngu nibenda kwija kumukwatsa amaani ngu bamugire omugabe, yaabarugamu mpora, yaagaruka omu bibungo wenka.
baaragara omu bwato, baatandika kwambuka egyo nyanja, bagyemire Kaperenaumu. Bukaba bwaizire, kandi na Yesu akaba atakabahikire.
Enyanja yaahinduriza ahabw'omuyaga mwingi ogwabaire niguhuuha.
Ku baavugireho nka
We yaabahuumuriza naagira ati: Niinye; mutatiina.
N'ahabw'ekyo baikiriza obwato bwahika aha nkungu, ahu baabaire nibaza.
Ku bwaseesire, abantu abaabaire batsigaire seeri y'enyanja, baijuka ku haabaire hariho obwato bumwe bwonka, kandi Yesu ku atabugyenziremu n'abeegi be, kureka ku baagyenzire bonka.
Agandi maato gaija nigaruga Tiberia, gaahika haihi n'omwanya, ahu baariiriire emigaati ei Mukama waitu Yesu yaasiimiire.
Batyo abantu abo, ku baareebire ngu Yesu tariyo, n'obu baakuba abeegi be, bo baaragara omu maato ago, baaza Kaperenaumu, nibamusherura.
Ku baamushangire seeri y'enyanja, baamubuuza bati: Rabi, aha oizireho ryari?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Timurikunsherura ahabw'okuba mureebire obumanyiso, kureka ahabw'okuba muriire emigaati, mwaiguta.
Mutarihendekyera eby'okurya ebirikuhwaho, kureka eby'okurya ebirikugumaho okuhitsya aha magara agatahwaho, agu Omwana w'omuntu aribaha; ahakuba Ruhanga Ishe akamutaho akamanyiso.
Baamubuuza bati: Tushemereire kukora ki, tukabona kukora emirimo ya Ruhanga?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Ogu nigwo murimo gwa Ruhanga, imwe okwikiriza Ogwo ou yaatumire.
N'ahabw'ekyo baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu nookora kamanyiso ki, aku twakureeba, tukakwikiriza? Okora ki?
Baatatenkuriitwe bakarya emaanu omu ihamba; nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu, Akabaha omugaati ogwarugire omu iguru.
Yesu nikwo kubagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Musa tiwe yaabahaire omugaati ogwarugire omu iguru; kureka Tata niwe abaha omugaati gw'amazima oguruga omu iguru.
Ahakuba omugaati gwa Ruhanga nigwo gushuuma niguruga omu iguru, gukaha ensi amagara.
Baamushaba bati: Mukama waitu ogume otuhe ogwo mugaati obutoosha.
Kwonka nkabagambira nti: Mundeebire, kunu timwanyikiriza.
Abu Tata ampa boona baryaija ahariinye; orikwija ahariinye tindimubinga na kakye.
Ahakuba tindarugire mu iguru kukora ebi ndikweyendera, kureka okukora ebi Owantumire akunda;
kandi eki nikyo Owantumire akunda, ngu ahari boona abu yampaire, harekye kuburaho n'omwe, kureka mbazoore aha kiro ky'aha mperu.
Eki Tata akunda n'eki, ngu weena orikureeba Omwana, akamwikiriza, atungye amagara agatahwaho; naanye ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha mperu.
Ekyo nikyo kyareeteire Abayudaaya kumwetomboitera, ahabw'okuba akagira ati: Niinye mugaati ogwarugire omu iguru.
Baagira bati: Ogu tiwe Yesu mwene Yosefu, ou turikumanya ishe na nyina? Mbwenu naabaasa ata kugira ngu akaruga omu iguru?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Muteetomboita mwenka.
Tihariho orikubaasa kwija ahariinye, Tata owantumire yaaba atamwiriize haihi; naanye ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha mperu.
Kikahandiikwa omu bya Baanabi ngu, Boona baryayegyesibwa Ruhanga. Omuntu weena ohurira ebya Tata, akabyega, aija ahariinye.
Mutagira ngu hariho orareebire Tata, kureka Ogwo owaarugire ahari Ruhanga; niwe yaamureebire.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Orikwikiriza aine amagara agatahwaho.
Niinye mugaati gw'amagara.
Bashwenkuriimwe bakarya emaanu omu ihamba, baafa.
Ogu nigwo mugaati oguruga omu iguru buzima ogu omuntu aryaho, atafe.
Niinye mugaati gw'amagara ogwarugire omu iguru; omuntu weena ku arikurya aha mugaati ogu, naagumaho ebiro byona; kandi omugaati, ogu ndiha ahabw'ab'omu nsi ngu batungye amagara, n'omubiri gwangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo Abayudaaya baahakana bonka nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu naabaasa ata kutuha omubiri gwe kugurya?
Yesu yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ku murikuba mutariire mubiri gw'Omwana w'omuntu, kandi mutanyweire shagama ye, timurikugira magara omuriimwe.
Orikurya omubiri gwangye akanywa eshagama yangye, aine amagara agatahwaho, kandi ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha mperu;
ahakuba omubiri gwangye n'eky'okurya eky'amazima, kandi n'eshagama yangye n'eky'okunywa eky'amazima.
Orya omubiri gwangye, akanywa eshagama yangye, aguma omuriinye, naanye omuriwe.
Nka Tata ohuriire oku yantumire, naanye nk'oku ndi ohuriire ahabwa Tata, nikwo n'orikundya ariba ohuriire ahabwangye.
Ogu nigwo mugaati ogwarugire omu iguru, ti nk'ogu bashwenkuriimwe baariire bakafa; orikurya omugaati ogu aryagumaho ebiro byona.
Ebigambo ebyo akabigambira omuri
Baingi aha beegi be, ku baahuriire ekyo, baagira bati: Ekigambo eki nikiremeera; n'oha orikukibaasa?
Yesu, ku yaamanyire ngu abeegi be bakyetomboitera, yaababuuza ati: Ekyo nikyo kyabaremsa?
Mbwenu shi, kiryaba kita, ku murireeba Omwana w'omuntu naatemba ei yaabaire ari bwambere?
Omwoyo niwe aha amagara; omubiri tigwine mugasho; ebigambo ebi naabagambira n'omwoyo n'amagara.
Kwonka omuriimwe harimu abatarikwikiriza. Ahakuba Yesu akaba naamanya okuruga karenakare abatarikumwikiriza, n'ogwo owaabaire naayenda kumureebya oku ari.
Yaagira ati: Nikyo naabagambirira nti: Tihariho orikubaasa kwija ahariinye kureka biri yaakiheebwa Tata.
Okuruga aho baingi aha beegi be baagaruka enyima, tibaagumizamu kugyenda nawe.
Yesu nikwo kubuuza bari ikumi na babiri ati: Naimwe nimwenda kwegyendera?
Simooni Petero yaamugarukamu ati: Mukama waitu, nituza ahari oha? Ka niiwe oine ebigambo by'amagara agatahwaho;
naitwe tukaikiriza, twamanya ngu ori Orikwera wa Ruhanga.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Tiinye naabatooraine imwe ikumi na babiri? Kwonka omwe omuriimwe ni sitaane.
Ekyo akakigamba ahari Yuda mwene Simooni Iskaryota, owaabaire naayenda kumureebya, omwe ahari ikumi na babiri.
Kandi obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya, oburikwetwa obugyenyi bw'Ensiisira, bukaba buri haihi n'okuhika.
Abarumuna baamugira bati: Ruga aha, oze Buyudaaya, abeegi baawe babone kureeba emirimo ei orikukora.
Ahakuba tihariho muntu oyenda kumanywa butunu, akakora omu mubonano. Ku oraabe nookora ebi, oyeyorekye ensi.
Ahakuba n,abarumuna abo tibaramwikiriize.
Yesu yaabagambira ati: Obunaku bwangye tibukahikire; kwonka obwanyu n'obw'obutoohsa.
Ensi terikubaasa kubanga, kwonka nyowe neenyanga, ahabw'okuba nimpamya ku emirimo yaayo eri mibi.
Imwe mwinamukye aha bugyenyi; nyowe tinkabaire kuza ahari obwo bugyenyi, ahakuba obunaku bwangye tibukahikire.
Ku yaaherize kubagambira ebyo, yaaguma Galilaaya.
Abarumuna ku baaherize kwinamuka aha bugyenyi, nawe yainamuka, kwonka tiyaagyenda naareebwa, kureka yaagyenda bwesherekye.
Abayudaaya baamusherura aha bugyenyi, nibabuuririza bati: Ari nkahi?
Haabaho okumuhakanaho munonga omu bantu: abamwe nibagira bati: N'omushaija murungi; abandi bati: Ngaaha, naahabisa abantu.
Kwonka ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya tihariho n'omwe owaamugambireho butunu.
Obugyenyi ku bwahikire ahagati, Yetu yainamuka omuri hekalu, yaayegyesa.
Abayudaaya baatangaara, nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu akaiha hi obwengye obu, haza atakeegaga?
N'ahabw'ekyo Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Okwegyesa oku nyegyesa ti kwangye, n'okw'Ogwo owantumire.
Omuntu weena, ku ayenda kukora ebi Ogwo akunda, niwe arimanya yaaba okwegyesa okwo kuruga ahari Ruhanga, nari shi ku nyegambira ahabwangye.
Orikwegambira ahabwe, naaba naayesherurira ekitiinisa; kwonka orikusherurira Owaamutumire ekitiinisa, niwe w'amazima, kandi omuriwe tiharimu kutahikiirira kwona.
Musa tarabahaire Ebiragiro? Kwonka omuriimwe tihariho ohitsya Ebiragiro. Nimwendera ki kuunyita?
Abantu baamugarukamu bati: Oriho daimoni. N'oha orikwenda kukwita?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Nkakora ekintu kimwe, mwena mwakitangaarira.
Musa akabateeraho omugyenzo gw'okushara; (kwonka tikurarugire hari Musa, kureka ahari baashwenkuriimwe,) kandi mushara omuntu ahari Sabato.
Mbwenu shi, omuntu ku araabe asharwa ahari Sabato, ngu ekiragiro kya Musa kitahendwa, nimungwererwa ki kubi ahabw'okukiriza kimwe omuntu ahari Sabato?
Mutaricwa emanja nimwiha aha mireebekyere y'omuntu, mugume mucwe emanja z'oburyo.
Kandi bamwe aha ba Yerusaalemu baagira bati: Omushaija ou barikusherura kwita tiwe ogu?
Mbwenu ari aha, naagamba butunu, kandi tibaine ku baamugira! Ebyo, abakuru nibamanya buzima ku Ogu ari Kristo?
Itwe nitumanya omushaija ogu ei arikuruga; kwonka Kristo we ku ariija, tihariho n'omwe orimanya ahi arikuruga.
Nikyo Yesu yaagambiire n'eiraka rihango naayegyesa omuri hekalu ati: Nyowe nimummanya, kandi nimumanya n'ei naarugire. Tindaizire habwangye; Owantumire n'ow'amazima, kwonka We timurikumumanya.
Kwonka nyowe nimmumanya, ahabw'okuba nkaruga ah'ari, kandi niwe yantumire.
N'ahabw'ekyo baayenda kumukwata; kwonka tihariho n'omwe owaamutaireho emikono, ahakuba obunaku bwe bukaba butakahikire.
Kwonka abantu baingi baamwikiriza, nibagira bati: Kristo ku ariija, aryakora obumanyiso bwingi okukira obu omushaija ogu akozire?
Abafarisaayo baahurira abantu nibamugambaho mpora batyo; abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo nikwo kutuma abakuru b'abaserukare kumukwata.
Nikyo Yesu yaagiriire ati: Hatsigaire omwanya mukye, nyowe nkiri hamwe naimwe; bwanyima ngarukye ahari Ogwo owantumire;
muryansherura, timurimbona; kandi ei ndi, timurikubaasa kwijayo.
Abayudaaya baabuuzana bati: Omushaija ogu naayenda kuza hi, ei tutarimubona? Naayenda kuza omu baataataaniire omu Bagriika, ayegyese n'Abagriika?
Eki eki yaagamba n'enki, ati: Muryansherura, timurimbona, kandi ati: Ei ndi, timurikubaasa kwijayo?
Orikuunyikiriza, emigyera y'amaizi g'amagara eryahimintika omunda ye, nk'oku Ebyahandiikirwe bigamba.
Ekyo akaba naakigamba aha Mwoyo, ou abarikumwikiriza bariija kuheebwa; ahakuba Omwoyo akaba atakahairwe, ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba atakahimbisiibwe.
Abandi baagira bati: Ogu ni Kristo. Kwonka abandi bati: Hoona Kristo n'ow'okuruga omuri Galilaaya?
Timurikumanya ku Ebyahandiikirwe bihamya ngu Kristo aryakomooka omu ruganda rwa Daudi, omu Betelehemu, ekirorero eki Daudi yaabaire atwiremu?
Okwo abantu nikwo baamuhakaineho batyo.
Abamwe aharibo bakenda kumukwata; kwonka tihaine waamutaireho engaro.
Abakuru b'abaseruakre baagaruka aha banyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo; bo baababuuza bati: Ahanki mutaamureeta?
Abakuru b'abaserukare baagarukamu bati: Tihakabahoga muntu orikugamba nk'ogu mushaija!
Abafarisaayo baabagarukamu bati: Kandi shi naimwe yaabahabya?
Hariho n'omwe omu bategyeki nari omu Bafarisaayo oramwikiriize?
Kureka abo bantu, abatamanya Biragiro, n'abakeyeenirwe.
Nikodemu, omwe aharibo, owaizire ahari Yesu ira, yaababuuza ati:
Beitu ebiragiro byaitu nibiikiriza kucwera omuntu orubanja, batabandize kuhurira eki arikwetonganira, n'obu kyakuba eki akozire?
Baamugarukamu bati: Hari naiwe ori owa Galilaaya? Sherura oreebe, ku hatariho nabi oruga Galilaaya.
Baagyenda, buri muntu yaataaha owaabo.
Yesu yainamuka ekibungo kya Zeituuni.
Omu kasheeshe munonga yaagaruka omuri hekalu, abantu boona baija ah'ari; yaashutama, yaabeegyesa.
Abahandiiki n'Abafarisaayo baareeta omukazi, okwatsirwe naahsambana; baamuta ahagati,
baamugira bati: Mwegyesa, omukazi ogu akwatsirwe butunu, naashambana.
Kandi omu Biragiro Musa akaturagiira kuteera abarikukora batyo amabaare. Mbwenu iwe noomugambaho ki?
Eki bakakigamba nibamutega, ngu babone eki baraamuregye. Kwonka Yesu yainama, yaahandiika n'orukumu aha itaka.
Ku baagumiizemu nibamubuuza, yaajuumuuka, yaabagira ati: Omuriimwe otakashiishaga, abe niwe yaabanza kumuteera eibaare.
Yaagaruka, yainama, yaahandiika n'orukumu aha itaka.
Bo ku baakihuriire, baashinjwa omu mitima yaabo, baashoobooka nibashohora omwe omwe, haabanza abakuru, haahereeruka abato; Yesu yaatsigara wenka n'ogwo mukazi, ahu yaabaire ari.
Yesu yaajuumuuka, yaamubuuza ati: Iwe mukazi 'we, bari nkahi? Tihariho n'omwe owaakucwera orubanja?
Nawe yaagarukamu ati: Tariho, Mukama wangye. Yesu yaagira ati: Naanye tindikukucwera rubanja. Kwonka irooko okuruga hati otarigaruka kushiisha.
Abafarisaayo baamugira bati: Iwe nooyehamya; kwonka okwehamya kwawe ti kw'amazima.

Yesu yaagarukamu, yaabagira ati: N'obu ndaabe niinyehamya, okwehamya kwangye n'okw'amazima; ahakuba nimmanya ei naarugire, kandi n'ei ndikuza; kwonka imwe timurikumanya i naarugire, nari shi ei ndikuza.
Imwe mucwa orubanja nk'abantu-buntu; nyowe tihariho n'omwe ou nducwera.
Kandi nangwa n'obu naakurucwa, okucwa okwangye n'okw'amazima, ahabw'okuba nyowe tincwa nyenka, kureka nkwatanisa na Tata owantumire.
Omu biragiro byanyu kikahandiikwa ngu obwakareebi bw'abantu babiri n'obw'amazima;
nyowe nyehamya, kandi Tata owantumire nawe ampamya.
Nabo baamubuuza bati: Sho arahi? Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Timurikummanya n'obu yaakuba Tata; kuri nimummanya, na Tata mukaamumanyire.
Ebigambo ebyo akabigambira omu ibiikiro, naayegyesa omuri hekalu; kandi tihaabaho n'omwe owaamukwata, ahakuba obunaku bwe bukaba butakahikire.
Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Nyowe ningyenda; imwe muryansherura, kandi muryafeera omu kibi kyanyu; ei ndikuza, timurikubaasa kwijayo.
Abayudaaya baayebuuza bati: Beitu shi naayenda kwehanika? Ahakuba naagira ati: Ei ndikuza, timurikubaasa kwijayo.
Yaabagambira ati: Imwe muri ab'omu nsi, nyowe ndi ow'omu iguru; imwe muri ab'ensi egi, nyowe tindi w'ensi egi.
Nikyo naabagambirira nti: Muryafeera omu bibi byanyu; kandi buzima muryafeera omu bibi byanyu, ku muriba mutaikiriize ku ndi We.
Baamubuuza bati: Beitu oba oha? Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Nk'oku naabagambiire okuruga ira ryona.
Nyine bingi eby'okubagambaho, n'okubacwera orubanja; kwonka Ogwo owantumire n'ow'amazima, kandi ebi naahuriire ahariwe, nibyo ngambira ensi.
Kwonka bo tibaramanyire ku arikubagambira Ishe.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Ku muriheza kuhanika Omwana w'omuntu, obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi We, kandi ngu ebi nkora tiinyeragiira, kureka ngamba nk'oku Tata yaanyegyeise.
Ogwo owantumire turi hamwe; takantsigahoga nyenka, ahabw'okuba obutoosha nkora ebimushemeza.
Ku yaagambire ebigambo ebyo, baingi baamwikiriza.
Bwanyima Yesu yaagambira Abayudaaya abaamwikiriize ati: Ku muraahamire aha kigambo kyangye, nimuba muri abeegi bangye buzima;
kandi muryamanya maazima, n'amazima gryabahindura ab'obusingye.
Baamugarukamu bati: Itwe turi baijukuru ba Abrahamu; titukahakwaga muntu weena. Aho noogiriraho ota oti, Turyahinduka ab'obusingye?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena okora ekibi, aba omuhuuku w'ekibi.
Kandi omuhuuku taguma muka ebiro byona, kureka Omwana.
N'ahabw'ekyo Omwana ku aribahindura ab'obusingye, muryaba ab'obusingye buzima.
Nimmanya ku muri baijukuru ba Abrahamu; haza kunu nimwenda kuunyita, ahakuba ekigambo kyangye tikiine mwanya omuriimwe.
Nyowe ngamba ebi naareebire ahari Tata; naimwe mukora ebi mwahuriire ahari shoimwe.
Baagarukamu nibamugira bati: Abrahamu niwe tataitwe. Yesu yaabagira ati: Kuri muri abaana ba Abrahamu, mukaatwarize nk'oku Abrahamu yaatwarize.
Kwonka mbwenu nimwenda kuunyita, nyowe omuntu owaabagambira eby'amazima, ebi naahuriire ahari Ruhanga; haza kunu Abrahamu tarakozire atyo.
Imwe nimukora emirimo ya shoimwe. Baamugira bati: Tituri baana b'obushambani; twine Tataitwe omwe, ni Ruhanga.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Kuri noogira ngu Ruhanga ni Shoimwe, mukaankunzire, ahakuba omu kwija nkaruga ahari Ruhanga; tindaizire habwangye, kureka Ogwo niwe yantumire.
N'enki ekirikubazibira kushoborokyerwa eki ndikugamba? N'ahabwokuba timurikubaasa kworobera kigambo kyangye.
Muri aba shoimwe
Kwonka nyowe ahabw'okugamba amazima, imwe timuunyikiriza.
N'oha ahariimwe orikunyomesereza ekibi? Ku ndaabe ningamba amazima, n'enki ekirikubazibira kuunyikiriza?
Owa Ruhanga ahurira ebigambo bya Ruhanga; imwe eki mutabihuririra n'ahabw'okuba timuri ba Ruhanga.
Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: Tituhikire kukweta Omusamaria, kandi oriho daimoni?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Tindiho daimoni; nimpa Tata ekitiinisa; kwonka imwe nimungaya.
Haza nyowe tiinyesherurira kitiinisa; hariho Omwe okinsherurira, kandi niwe Mucwi w'emanja.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuntu ku ayorobera ekigambo kyangye, tarifa ebiro byona.
Abayudaaya baamugira bati: Mbwenu ho twamanya ku oriho daimoni. Abrahamu akafa, na baanabi baafa; haza ogira oti: Omuntu ku ayorobera ekigambo kyangye, tariroza ha kufa ebiro byona!
Iwe shi, nookira tatenkuriitwe Abrahamu owaafiire, kandi na baanabi? Nooyeyeta oha?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe niinyeha ekitiinisa, ekitiinisa kyangye ni busha. Tata, imwe ou mweta Ruhanga waanyu, niwe ampa ekitiinisa.
Imwe timukamumanyaga; kwonka nyowe nimmumanya; ku naakugira nti, Tindikumumanya, nkaaba omubeihi nkaimwe; kwonka nimmumanya, kandi nyorobera ekigambo kye.
Shoimwe Abrahamu akashemererwa aine ekihika ky'okureeba ekiro kyangye; ku yaakireebire, yaayesiima munonga.
Abayudaaya nikwo kumugarukamu bati: Tokahikize myaka makumi ataano, haza oti, nkareeba Abrahamu?
Yesu yaabagira ati: Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Abrahamu atakazairwe, nyowe Ndiho.
Okuruga aho baatorotoora amabaare kugamuteera; kwonka Yesu yaayeshereka, yaashohora omuri hekalu.
Ku yaabaire naahingura, yaareeba omushaija owaazairwe ari empumi.
Abeegi be baamubuuza bati: Rabi, owaasiisire n'oha, n'omushaija ogu, nari n'abaamuzaire, nikyo yaazaariirwe ari empumi?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Tarahumisiibwe kushiisha kwe nari okw'abazaire be, kureka kikabaho ngu emirimo ya Ruhanga eyorekyerwe ahariwe.
Tushemereire kukora emirimo y'Ogwo owantumire, bukiri nyomushana; ekiro nikiija, eki omuntu ataribaasa kukoreramu.
Obu nkiri omu nsi, ndi Omushana gw'ensi.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaacwera amacwante aha itaka, yaagaritobesa, yaarimusiiga omu maisho,
yaamuragiira ati: Gyenda onaabe omu kiyanja kya Siloamu, (amakuru gaakyo ngu Otumirwe.) Yaagyenda, yaanaaba, yaagaruka naahweza.
Bataahi be n'abaabaire bamureeba ira naasheega, baagira bati: Ogu t'omushaija owaabaire atuura naasheega?
Abamwe baagira ngu, Niwe; abandi ngu, Ngaaha, kwonka nibashushana. We yaagira ati: Niinye.
Baamubuuza bati: Beitu shi, amaisho gaawe gaahumuuka gata?
Yaagarukamu ati: Omushaija orikwetwa Yesu yaatoba eitaka, yaarinsiiga omu maisho, yangira ati: Gyenda aha kiyanja Siloamu, onaabe; naanye naagyenda, naanaaba, naahweza.
Baamubuuza bati: Mbwenu we arahi? Yaagira ati: Tindikumanya.
Owaabaire ari empumi baamutwara, baamuhitsya Abafarisaayo.
Kandi eizooba eri Yesu yaatobeireho eitaka, akahumuura amaisho ge, rikaba riri erya Sabato.
Abafarisayo nabo baamubuuza oku yaahumuuka. Yaabaigira ati: Yansiiga eitaka omu maisho, naanaaba, naahweza.
Abamwe aha Bafarisaayo baagira bati: Ti wa Ruhanga, ahakuba tarinda Sabato. Kwonka abandi baagira bati: Omuntu omusiisi naabaasa ata kukora obumanyiso bukuru nk'obu? Okuruga aho tibaikirizana.
Baagaruka baabuuza owaabaire ari empumi bati: Weeza iwe, nk'oku yaakuhumuura, noomugambaho ki? Yaagira ati: Ni nabi.
Abayudaaya baayanga kwikiriza ku yaabaire ari empumi, akahumuuka, okuhitsya obu baayetsire abazaire be,
bakababuuza nibagira bati: Ogu ni mutabani waanyu, ou mugira ngu akazaarwa ari empumi? Mbwenu yaahumuuka ata?
Abazaire be baagarukamu bati: Nitumanya ngu ogu n'omwana waitu, kandi akazaarwa ahumire;
kwonka oku yaahumuuka hati, titurikukumanya, kandi n'owaamuhumuura, titurikumumanya. Naimwe mumwebuurize; ni mukuru, ayegambire.
Abazaire be eki baagambiire ebyo n'ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya; ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya bakaba baragaine ngu omuntu weena origamba Yesu ku ari Kristo, abingwe omuri sinagogi.
Abazaire be nikyo baagiriire bati, Ni mukuru; mumwebuurize.
Omushaija ogwo owaabaire ari empumi, baamweta obwa kabiri, baamugira bati: Himbisa Ruhanga; itwe nitumanya ngu omushaija ogwo n'omusiisi.
Yaagarukamu ati: Ku araabe ari omusiisi, tindikumanya; eki ndikumanya ni kimwe; mbaire ndi empumi, mbwenu nimpweza.
Baamubuuza bati: Yaakugira ata? Amaisho gaawe yaagahumuuza ki?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Naaheza kubagambira, kwonka mwayanga kuhurira. Ahabw'enki nimwenda ngu nkigarukyemu? Naimwe nimwenda kuhinduka abeegi be?
Baamujuma nibagira bati: Niiwe mwegi we, itwe turi aba Musa.
Nitumanya ngu Ruhanga akagamba na Musa; kwonka omushaija ogwo titurikumanya i yaarugire.
Omushaija yaagarukamu naabagira ati: Ka n'eihano, imwe okutamanya i yaarugire, haza ahumwire amaisho gangye!
Nitumanya ngu Ruhanga tahurira basiisi, kwonka omuntu weena ku amuramya, yaakora ebi akunda, ogwo Ruhanga amuhurira.
Okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi tikikahurirwaga ngu hariho orahumwire amaisho g'omuntu owaazairwe ari empumi.
Omushaija ogwo ku akubaire atari wa Ruhanga, taine ki yaakubaasize kukora.
Baamugarukamu bati: Iwe okazaarirwa omu bibi bisha; mbwenu naiwe nooyenda kutwegyesa? Baamubinga.
Yesu yaahurira ku baamubinga; yaamusherura; ku yaamuboine, yaamubuuza ati: Noikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga?
Yaamugarukamu ati: N'oha, Mukama wangye, nkamwikiriza?
Yesu yaamugira ati: Waamureeba, niwe ogu orikugamba naiwe.
Yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, niinyikiriza. Yaamuramya.
Yesu yaagira ati: Okucwa emanja nikwo kwandeetsire omu nsi egi, ngu abatarikureeba bareebe, kandi abarikureeba bahindukye empumi.
Abamwe aha Bafarisaayo abaabaire bamuri haihi baahurira ebyo bigambo, baamubuuza bati: Naitwe turi empumi?
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Kuri noogira ngu muri empumi, timwakugizire kibi; kwonka mbwenu ahabw'okugira muti, Nitureeba, nikyo ekibi kyanyu kirikugumiraho.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Orikutaaha omu itsibikiro ry'entaama atareetsirwe mu irembo, kureka akatembera ahandi, ogwo n'omushuma kandi omwambuzi;
kwonka orikureetwa omu irembo niwe muriisa w'entaama.
We omurinzi w'eirembo amwiguriraho; n'entaama zihurira eiraka rye, ayetamu eze amaziina, azishohoza aheeru.
Ku aheza kushohoza eze zoona, azeebembera, nazo zimukuratira; ahakuba zimanya eiraka rye.
Ou zitarikumanya tizimukuratira, zimuhunga; ahakuba tizirikumanya maraka g'abandi.
Yesu akabacwera enfumu egyo, kwonka tibaamanya bi yaabaire naabagambira.
Abambandiize boona bakaba bari abashuma kandi abambuzi, n'entaama tizirabahuriire.
Niinye irembo; omuntu weena orikutaaha naaraba omuriinye, naajunwa; naataaha, naashohora, naabona eiriisizo.
Omushuma tareetwa kindi kureka okwiba n'okwita n'okucwekyereza; nyowe nkaija ngu zigire amagara, kandi ngu zigire maingi munonga.
Niinye muriisa omurungi. Omuriisa omurungi ahayo amagara ge ahabw'entaama ze.
Oriisiza ebihembo, atari muriisa buzima, kandi n'entaama zitari ze, ku areeba omushega nigwija, atsigaho entaama, ahunga; omushenga guzishahuramu, ezindi guzitaataanisa.
Naahunga, ahabw'okuba n'oguriirwe, entaama tarikuzeetaho.
Niinye muriisa omurungi; nimmanya ezangye, kandi n'ezangye nizimmanya;
nk'oku Tata arikummanya, naanye nkamanya Tata; kandi mpayo amagara gangye ahabw'ezo ntaama.
Nyine entaama ezindi, ezitari z'omu itsibikiro eri; nazo nshemereire kuzireeta, zihurire eiraka ryangye, zibe obusyo bumwe, n'omuriisa abe omwe.
Tata nikyo ankundira, ahabw'okuba mpayo amagara gangye, ngu mbone kugeegarurira.
Tihariho orikugaanyaka, ningahayo ahabwangye. Nyine obushoboorozi bw'okugahayo, kandi n'obw'okugeegarurira. Ekiragiro eki nkakiheebwa Tata.
Kandi Abayudaaya baagaruka kwebaganisamu ahabw'ebigambo ebyo.
Baingi aharibo baagira bati: Ariho daimoni, agwire eiraro; nimumuhuririra ki?
Abandi bati: Ebigambo ebi ti by'omuntu oriho daimoni. Nimugira ngu daimoni naabaasa kuhumuura amaisho g'empumi?
Obwo bukaba buri obugyenyi
ebiro ebyo bikaba biri eby'embeho. Yesu yaagyendagyenda omuri hekalu omu kisasi kya Sulemaani.
Abayudaaya baamwehinguririza, baamubuuza bati: Oryahitsya hi okutubanganisisa? Ku oraabe ori Kristo, otugambirire kimwe.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Nkabagambira, kwonka timurikwikiriza. Emirimo ei ndikukora omu iziina rya Tata, niyo erikumpamya;
kwonka timurikwikiriza, ahakuba timuri b'omu ntaama zangye.
Entaama zangye zihurira eiraka ryangye, naanye nzimanya, nazo zinkuratira;
nziha amagara agatahwaho, tizirihwerekyerera ebiro byona, kandi tihaine orizishahura omu mikono yangye.
Tata, owaazimpaire, naakira boona, kandi tihaine orikubaasa kuzishahura mu mikono ye.
Nyowe na Tata tuba omwe.
Yaabagarukamu ati: Nkabooreka emirimo mingi kandi mirungi eyaarugire ahari Tata; ni guuha omuriiyo ogurikubanteeresa amabaare?
Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: Titurikukuteera mabaare ahabw'omurimo murungi, kureka ahabw'okurogota, okeegira Ruhanga, haza kunu ori omuntu.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Tikirahandiikirwe omu biragiro byanyu ngu, Nkagira nti: Muri baaruhanga?
Abo abaiziirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga, ku araabe yaabeetsire baaruhanga, (kandi Ebyahandiikirwe tibibaasa kwihwaho,)
ogwo Isheboona ou yaayerize akatuma omu nsi, mumubarira okurogota, ahabw'okuba ngizire nti, Ndi Omwana wa Ruhanga?
Ku ndaabe ntakora mirimo ya Tata, murekye kuunyikiriza;
kwonka ku ndaabe ngikora, n'obu muraabe mutarikuunyikiriza, mwikirize emirimo, obwo mukaashoborokyerwa, mumanya ku Tata ari omuriinye, naanye omuriwe.
Baateeraho kugaruka kumukwata, yaabooga omu mikono.
Yaagaruka yaayambuka Yorudani, ahu Yohaana yaabaire naabatiriza okubanza, yaagumayo.
Baingi baija ah'ari; baagira bati: Yohaana tarakozire ky'okureeberaho, kwonka byona ebi yaagambire aha muntu ogu bikaba biri eby'amazima.
Baingi baamwikiririza okwo.
Mariamu ogwo niwe yaasiigire Mukama waitu amajuta, akamusiisirira ebigyere n'eishokye rye; kandi Laazaaro owaabaire arwaire akaba ari munyaanyabo.
Banyaanya abo bakatuma ahari Yesu, nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, ou okunda arwaire.
Yesu ku yaakihuriire, yaagira ati: Endwara egi ti y'okumwita, kureka n'ey'okuhimbisisa Ruhanga, ngu Omwana wa Ruhanga nawe ahimbisibwe ahabwayo.
Kandi Yesu akaba akunda Mariza n'omurumuna na Laazaaro.
Ku yaahuriire ngu arwaire, yaamara kabiri ei yaabaire ari.
Bwanyima y'ebyo biro yaagira abeegi be ati: Ka tugarukye Buyudaaya.
Abeegi be baamugira bati: Rabi, ebiro ebi Abayudaaya babaire nibenda kukuteera amabaare, kandi ogarukyeyo?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Omu izooba tiharimu eshaaha ikumi na ibiri? Omuntu ku agyenda nyomushana, tateera ntsibo, ahakuba areeba omushana gw'ensi egi.
Kwonka omuntu ku agyenda nyekiro, ateera entsibo, ahakuba omushana guba gutari muriwe.
Okwo nikwo yaagambire; bwanyima yaabagira ati: Munywani waitu Laazaaro agwejegyeire; ninza kumusisiimura omu turo.
Abeegi nikwo kumugira bati: Mukama waitu, ku araabe agwejegyeire, naija kukira.
Kwonka Yesu akaba naagama aha kufa kwe; haza bo baateekateeka ngu naagamba aha kugwejegyera okw'oturo.
Yesu yaabagambirira kimwe ati: Laazaaro afiire;
ahabwanyu nyowe niinyesiima okutabayo, mukaabona kwikiriza. Mbwenu ka tugyende ei ari.
Tomasi, orikwetwa
Yesu ku yaahikireyo, yaashanga Laazaaro amzire kana omu kituuro.
Kandi Besania ekaba eri haihi na Yerusaalemu nka
Abayudaaya baingi bakaba baizire kuyaagira Mariza na Mariamu ahabwa munyaanyabo.
Mariza ku yaahuriire ngu Yesu naija, yaagyenda, yaamubugana; Mariamu we yaaguma ashutami omu nju.
Mariza yaagambira Yesu ati: Mukama wangye, kuri obaire ori aha, munyaanyazi takufiire.
Hoona na hati nimmanya ngu eki oraashabe Ruhanga kyona, naija kukikuha.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Munyaanyoko naija kuzooka.
Mariza yaamugira ati: Nimmanya ku arizooka aha kuzooka okw'aha mperu.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Niinye kuzooka n'amagara; orikuunyikiriza, n'obu yaakufa, aryaba ohuriire;
n'omuntu weena oriho ohuriire, kandi orikuunyikiriza, tarifa ebiro byona. Noikiriza ekyo?
Yaamugarakamu ati: Eego, Mukama wangye, naikiriza ku ori Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga, otuura ari ow'okwija omu nsi.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaagyenda, yaayeta Mariamu omurumuna, yaamugambira mpora ati: Omwegyesa ari aha, naakweta.
Onu ku yaakihuriire, ahonaaho yaimuka, yaagyenda ah'ari.
Kandi Yesu akaba atakahikire mu kirorero, akiri omu mwanya ahu Mariza yaamushangire.
Abayudaaya abaabaire bari omu nju nibamuyaagira, ku baareebire Mariamu yaarahuka kwimuka yaashohora, baamukuratira nibateekateeka ngu naaza kuririra aha kituuro.
Mariamu ku yaahikire ahu Yesu ari, yaamureeba, yaamukwata amaguru, yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, kuri obaire ori aha, munyaanyazi takufiire.
Yesu ku yaamureebire naarira, n'Abayudaaya abaizire nawe nabo nibarira, yaatsinda omu mutima gwe, yaagira obusaasi.
Yaababuuza ati: Mumuziikire hi? Baamugira bati: Mukama waitu, ija oreebe.
Yesu yaarira.
Abayudaaya baagira bati: Eshi abaire naamukunda!
Kwonka bamwe aharibo baagira bati: Beitu omushaija ogu, owaahumwire empumi, taakubaasize kuzibira n'omuntu ogwo kufa?
Yesu yaagaruka yaatsinda, yaahika aha kituuro; (kikaba kiri enyanga, ekingirweho eibaare.)
Yesu yaaragiira ati: Mwiheho eibaare. Mariza munyaanya w'ogwo nyakufa yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, hati yaanuukire, ahabw'okuba amazire kana afiire.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Tinaakugira nti, Ku oraikirize, noija kureeba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga?
Batyo baihaho eibaare. Yesu yaimutsya amaisho ge, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaagira ati: Taata, ninkusiima, ahabw'okuba wampurira.
Kandi naamanya ku ompurira obutoosha; kwonka eki naakigamba ahabw'abantu aba abanyehinguririize, ngu baikirize ku niiwe wantumire.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Laazaaro, shohora, oije.
Nyakufa yaashohora, azingazingirwe omu myenda emikono n'amaguru, n'omutanda gukomire aha maisho ge. Yesu yaabaragiira ati: Mumukomorore, mumurekye agyende.
Abayudaaya baingi, abaizire owa Mariamu, ku baareebire ebi Yesu yaakora, baamwikiriza;
kwonka abandi baagyenda aha Bafarisaayo, baabagambira ebi Yesu yaakora.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo baateerana eishengyero, baagira bati: Tugire tuta? Ahakuba omushaija ogwo naakora obumanyiso bwingi.
Ku turaamurekye yaagumizamu atyo, boona nibaija kumwikiriza, kandi Abarooma baryaija batwakye omwanya gwaitu ogurikwera, batware n'eihanga ryaitu.
Omwe aharibo, Kayaafa, owaabaire ari omunyamurwa omukuru omu mwaka ogwo, yaabagambira ati: Timwine ki murikumanya;
timurikwetegyereza ku kiri kirungi ahabwanyu omuntu omwe kufeera abantu, okukira eihanga ryona okuhwerekyerera.
Ekigambo ekyo tarakigambiise bwengye bwe wenka, kwonka ahabw'okuba omunyamurwa omukuru omu mwaka ogwo, akaragura ku Yesu ashemereire kufeera eihanga eryo:
kandi ti ihanga eryo ryonka, kureka okuteeranira hamwe abaana ba Ruhanga abaataataine.
Okuruga aha izooba eryo baaguma nibahanuura hamwe oku baraite Yesu.
Nikyo Yesu yaarekyeire kugyendagyenda naareebwa omu Bayudaaya; akarugayo akaza omu mwanya oguri haihi n'eihamba, omuri tauni erikwetwa Efuraimu; akaguma okwo n'abeegi be.
Ku baahikireyo, baatandika kusherura Yesu, nibagambirana beemereire omuri hekalu bati: Nimuteekateeka muta? Nimugira ngu tarikwija aha bugyenyi?
Kandi abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo bakaba bataireho ekiragiro ngu omuntu weena ku araamanye ei ari, aije abagambire, bamukwate.
Okwo baamuteekyerayo eby'okurya bya nyekiro; Mariza yaaheereza, Laazaaro akaba ari omwe aha baabaire bashutami na Yesu aha by'okurya.
Mariamu yaakwata eraatiri y'amajuta g'omugaju ag'obuguzi bwingi munonga; yaagasiiga aha bigyere bya Yesu, yaabisiisiriza eishokye rye, enju yoona yaataamirana emigaju.
Kwonka Yuda Iskaryota, omwe aha beegi be, owaabaire naayenda kumureebya, yaagira ati:
Ahabw'enki amajuta aga gataatundwa gakarugamu edenaari magana ashatu, zikagabirwa abooro?
Taragambire atyo habw'okusaasira abooro; kureka akaba ari omushuma, kandi ahabw'okuba niwe yaabaire ahagatira enshaho, akaba atuura naakora aha byabaire biteebwamu.
Yesu yaagira ati: Mumurekye, agabiikire ekiro ky'okuziikwa kwangye.
Abooro mutuura nabo obutoosha, kwonka nyowe timuriguma naanye obutoosha.
Abantu baingi omu Bayudaaya ku baamanyire ngu ari okwo, bajayo, ti habwa Yesu wenka, kureka ngu bareebe na Laazaaro, ou yaazoire omu bafu.
Abanyamurwa abakuru baahanuura kwita na Laazaaro;
ahabw'okuba ahabwe baingi aha Bayudaaya bakabarugamu, baikiriza Yesu.
baatwara amataagi g'enkindo, baaza kumubugana, nibeeshongora bati: Hosana! Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama asiimwe, niwe Mugabe wa Israeli!
Yesu, ku yaareebire omwana gw'endogoya, yaagutembaho, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu,
Otatiina, iwe Saayuuni, reeba Mukama waawe naija, atembire omwana gw'endogoya.
Okubanza abeegi be tibarashoborokyeirwe ebyo; kwonka Yesu ku yaaherize kuhimbisibwa, baabona kwijuka ngu ebyo byona bikamuhandiikwaho, kandi byamukorerwa.
Kandi omutwe gw'abantu abaabaire bariho obu yaayeta Laazaaro okuruga omu kituuro, akamuzoora omu bafu, baabihamya.
N'ahabw'ekyo omutwe gw'abantu gwaza kumubugana, ahakuba bakaba bahuriire ku akozire akamanyiso ako.
Abafarisaayo nikwo kugambirana bati: Mureebe ku mutakiine ky'okukora; reeba, ensi yoona yaamukuratira.
Kandi omuri abo abaizire aha bugyenyi kuramya, hakaba harimu Abagriika.
Abo baija ahari Filipo owa Besesaida ey'omuri Galilaaya, baamushaba nibagira bati: Taata, nitwenda kureeba Yesu.
Filipo yaija yaabigambira Anderea. Anderea yaija na Filipo, baabigambira Yesu.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Obunaku bwahika Omwana w'omuntu kuhimbisibwa.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Akajuma k'engano, ku kaba katagwire mu itaka, kakafa, kagumaho konka; kwonka ku kafa, kaana ebyana bingi.
Orikukunda amagara ge, aryagabuza; kandi ogwo orikwanga amagara ge omu nsi egi, aryagarinda okuhitsya aha magara agatahwaho.
Omuntu weena ku araabe nampeereza, ankuratire; kandi ahi ndi, n'omuheereza wangye niho ariba; omuntu weena ku ampeereza, Tata aryamuha ektiinisa.
Taata, himbisa eiziina ryawe. Omu mwanya ogwo eiraka ryayema omu iguru, nirigira riti: Naarihimbisa, kandi ndyagaruka ndihimbise.
Abantu abaabaire beemereire aho, baarihurira, baagira bati, Eiguru ryahinda. Abandi bati: Ni maraika owaagamba nawe.
Yesu yaagarukamu naagira ati: Eiraka eri ryaija ahabwanyu, ti habwangye.
Hati ensi egi yaacwerwa orubanja; hati omutegyeki w'ensi egi naija kubingwa;
naanye ku ndiihwa aha nsi naahanikwa, ndyairiza abantu boona ahariinye.
Ekyo akakigamba kworeka okufa oku yaabaire naija kufa.
Abantu baamugarukamu bati: Omu Biragiro tukahurira ngu Kristo agumaho ebiro byona. Kandi noobaasa ota kugamba ngu Omwana w'omuntu ashemereire kuhanikwa? Omwana w'omuntu ogwo n'oha?
Yesu yaabagira ati: Hatsigaire omwanya mukye ogu mukiiniiremu omushana; mugyende mukiine omushana, obwire butakaabairirira omu muhanda; ogyendera omu mwirima, tamanya i arikuza.
Obu mukiine omushana, mwikirize omushana, mubone kuba abaana b'omushana. Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaarugayo, yaabeeshereka.
Kwonka n'obu araabe yaakozire obumanyiso bwingi omu maisho gaabo, hoona nabwo tibaramwikiriize,
ngu ekigambo kya nabi Isaaya kihikiirire, eki yaagambire ati:
Mukama, n'oha oikiriize ebigambo byaitu,
Kandi omukono gwa Mukama gukashuuruurirwa oha?
Akabahumya amaisho, yaagangaaza emitima yaabo,
Ngu barekye kureeba n'amaisho, n'okwetegyereza n'emitima yaabo,
N'okuhinduka, ngu mbakize.
Baingi nangwa n'abakuru baamwikiriza; kwonka ahabw'okutiina Abafarisaayo tibaakigamba, ngu batabingwa omuri sinagogi;
ahabw'okuba bakenda kusiimwa abantu okukira okusiimwa Ruhanga.
Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Orikuunyikiriza, tiinye arikuba aikiriize, kureka Ogwo owantumire.
Kandi orikundeeba, naaba areebire Owantumire.
Nyowe nyizire omu nsi kuba omushana, ngu omuntu weena orikuunyikiriza arekye kuguma omu mwirima.
Omuntu weena ku ahurira ebi ngamba, ataabyorobera, nyowe timmucwera rubanja; ahakuba tindaizire kucwera nsi rubanja, kureka okugijuna.
Orikuunyanga, akanga n'ebigambo byangye, aine orikumucwera orubanja; ekigambo eki naagambire, nikyo kirimucwera orubanja aha kiro ky'aha mperu.
Ahakuba tindagambire habwangye; Tata owantumire niwe yandagiire eky'okugamba, n'oku ndaakigambe.
Nimmanya ngu ekiragiro kye n'amagara agatahwaho; n'ahabw'ekyo ebi ngamba, mbigamba nk'oku Tata yaabingambiire.
Ku baabaire nibarya eby'okurya bya nyekiro, Sitaane yaaherize kwosya omutima gwa Yuda Iskaryota, mwene Simooni, kumureebya;
na Yesu yaamanyire ngu Ishe amurekuriire byona, kandi ngu akaruga ahari Ruhanga, kandi naagaruka ahari Ruhanga,
yaaruga aha by'okurya, yaajuura eby'okujwara bye, yaakwata ekitambaara, yaakyezirika omunda.
Yaashuka amaizi aha kinaabiro, yaatandika kunaabisa abeegi be ebigyere n'okubiragarisa ekitambaara eki yaabaire ayezirikiise.
Atyo yaahika ahari Simooni Petero. Petero yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, hoona Iwe kunnabisa ebigyere!
Yesu yaagarukamu naamugira ati: Eki ndikukora torikukimanya; kwonka oryakimanya bwanyima.
Petero yaamugira ati: Reka! Torinnaabisa bigyere ebiro byona. Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe ntakunaabiise, nituba tutakikwatanisa.
Simooni Petero yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, kyabaire kityo, otannaabisa ebigyere byonka, kureka n'emikono n'omu mutwe.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Owaayogire, tashemereire kindi kureka okunaaba aha bigyere byonka; ahabw'okuba aba naayera weena; kandi imwe nimwera, kwonka ti mwena.
Ahakuba akaba naamanya oraamureebye; nikyo yaagiriire ati: Mwena timurikwera.
Ku yaaherize kubanaabisa ebigyere, yaajwara ebijwaro bye, yaagaruka omu mwanya gwe, yaababuuza ati: Nimumanya eki naabakorera?
Muunyeta Omwegyesa kandi Mukama waanyu; kandi eki murikugamba nikyo, ahabw'okuba nikwo ndi.
Mbwenu ku ndaabe naabanaabisa ebigyere, haza ndi Mukama waanyu kandi Omwegyesa waanyu, naimwe kibashemereire kunaabisana ebigyere;
ahakuba naabaha eky'okureeberaho, ngu naimwe mukore nk'oku naabakorera.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Omuhuuku takira mukama we; kandi n'entumwa tekira ogitumire.
Ku muraabe nimumanya ebyo, muhiiriirwe mwaba nimubikora.
Nimbagambira eki hati, kitakabaireho, ngu ku kiriba kyabaireho, mwikirize ngu ndi Ogwo.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Oyakiira omuntu weena ou ntuma, biri niinye ayakiire; kandi onyakiira, biri ayakiire Ogwo owantumire.
Abeegi baareebana, nibabanganisa aha u yaagambaho.
Kandi omwe aha beegi be ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, akaba amwegamiire omu kifuba, bari aha by'okurya.
Simooni Petero yaamwitira eriisho, yaamugira ati: Tugambire ou yaagambaho.
Ogwo, nk'oku yaabaire ayegamiire Yesu omu kifuba, yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, n'oha?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Ou ndaakoreze ekitongye, nkakimuha, niwe ogwo. Ku yaakorize ekitongye, yaakiha Yuda mwene Simooni Iskaryota.
Ku yaaherize kuheebwa ekitongye, Sitaane yaamutaahamu. Nikyo Yesu yaamugiriire ati: Eki orikwenda kukora, kirahutsye.
Omuri abo abaabaire bashutami aha by'okurya, tihariho n'omwe owaamanyire eki yaamugambiriire ekyo.
Ahabw'okuba Yuda niwe yaabaire arinda enshaho y'empiiha, abamwe baateekateeka ngu Yesu yaamuragiira kugura ebirikwetengwa aha bugyenyi, nari shi kugira eki yaaha abooro.
Yuda, ku yaaherize kwakiira ekitongye, ahonaaho yaashohora; kandi bukaba bwaizire.
Ku yaaherize kushohora, Yesu yaagira ati: Hati mbwenu Omwana w'omuntu yaahimbisibwa, na Ruhanga yaahimbisizibwa omuriwe;
kandi Ruhanga ku araabe yaahimbisizibwa omu Mwana we, naija kuhimbisa Omwana we omuriwe, amuhimbise ahonaaho.
Baana bato 'mwe, nkiri naimwe omwanya mukye; muryansherura; kandi nk'oku naagambiire Abayudaaya, naimwe nikwo ndikubagambira nti: Ei ndikuza, timurikubaasa kwijayo.
Nimbaha ekiragiro kisya nti: Mukundane; nk'oku naabakunzire, naimwe mube nikwo mwakundana.
Ku muriguma nimukundana, nibwo abantu boona baribamanya ku muri abeegi bangye.
Petero yaamugambira ati: Mukama wangye, n'enki ekirikunzibira kukukuratayo hati? Niinyija kuhayo amagara gangye ahabwawe.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Noija kuhayo amagara gaawe ahabwangye? Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Enkoko terikwija kugamba, otakaanyehakaine kashatu.
Emitima yaanyu etarishoberwa; mwikirize Ruhanga, naanye muunyikirize.
Omu nju ya Tata harimu emyanya mingi ey'okutuuramu; kuri kitari kityo, nkaabagambiire; hati ninza kubashemereza omwanya.
Kandi ku ndaabe ninza kubashemereza omwanya, ndyagaruka aha, mbatware ei ndi; okwo ei ndi, naimwe mube niyo mwatuura.
Kandi ei ndikuza, omuhanda nimugumanya.
Tomasi yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, ka tutarikumanya i orikuza, omuhanda nitugumanya tuta?
Yesu yaamugambira ati: Niinye muhanda, n'amazima, n'amagara; tihariho oija ahari Isheboona, atarabire muriinye.
Kuri mwammanyire, na Tata nawe mukaamumanyire. Okuruga hati nimummanya, kandi mwamureeba.
Filipo yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, tworekye Isheboona; ekyo nikitumara.
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Filipo, ahi naakatuurira naimwe, tokammanyaga? Ondeebire, biri areebire Isheboona; n'enki ekirikukushabisa oti, Otworekye Isheboona?
Torikwikiriza ku ndi omuri Tata, kandi na Tata ku ari omuriinye? Ebigambo ebi mbagambira timbyetuma, kureka Tata ori omuriinye niwe akora emirimo ye.
Muunyikirize ku ndi omuri Tata, na Tata ku ari omuriinye; nari shi muunyikirize ahabw'emirimo yonka.
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Orikuunyikiriza, emirimo ei nkora nawe aryagikora, kandi arykory erikukira eyangye obuhango, ahabw'okuba nyowe ningyenda ahari Tata.
Kandi kyona eki murishaba omu iziina ryangye, ndyakikora, Isheboona abone kuhimbisibwa omu Mwana.
Ku murishaba ekintu kyona omu iziina ryangye, ndyakikora.
Naanye ndyashaba Tata, nawe aryabaha Omuhwezi ondiijo, agume naimwe obutwire bwona.
Omuhwezi ogwo n'Omwoyo ow'amazima, ou ensi etarikubaasa kwakiira, ahakuba temureeba n'obu kwakuba okumumanya; kwonka imwe mumumanya; ahakuba aguma naimwe, kandi aryatuura omuriimwe.
Tindibatsiga muri efuuzi; ndyaija ahi muri.
Hatsigaire omwanya mukye, ensi okutandeeba bundi; kwonka imwe muryandeeba; ahabw'okuba ndi ohuriire, naimwe muryaba abahuriire.
Aha kiro ekyo muryamanya ku ndi omuri Tata, naimwe ku muri omuriinye, naanye omuriimwe.
Oine ebiragiro byangye akabyorobera niwe arikunkunda; kandi orikunkunda, aryakundwa Tata, naanye ndyamukunda, mmweyorekye.
Yuda, otari Iskaryota, yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, kibaire kita iwe okutweyoreka, oteeyorekye nsi?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Omuntu ku arikunkunda, aryarinda ekigambo kyangye, na Tata aryamukunda; kandi turyaija ahariwe, tutuure nawe.
Otarikunkunda, tarinda bigambo byangye; kandi ekigambo eki muhurira ti kyangye; n'ekya Tata owantumire.
Ebigambo ebi naabibagambira nkibaine.
Kwonka Omuhwezi, Omwoyo Orikwera, ou Isheboona aryohereza omu iziina ryangye, niwe aribeegyesa byona, akabaijutsya byona ebi naabagambiire.
Nimbatsigira obusingye; obusingye bwangye nimbubaha; tindikubaha nk'oku ensi eha. Emitima yaanyu etarishoberwa, n'obu kwakuba okutiina.
Mwahurira ku naabagambira nti, Ningyenda, kandi ndyagaruka ahu muri. Kuri nimunkunda, mukaashemereirwe, ahabw'okuba ninza ahari Tata; kandi Tata nankira.
Hati naakibagambira kitakabaireho, ngu ku kiriba kyahikire, mukiikirize.
Tinkigamba bingi naimwe, ahabw'okuba omutegyeki w'ensi egi naija, kwonka taanyineho bushoboorozi.
Nyowe nkora nk'oku Tata yandagiire, ngu ensi emanye ku mmukunda. Mwimukye, turugye aha.
Buri itaagi eriri omuriinye, eritaana byana, aritemaho; kandi buri itaagi eryana ebyana, arisharira ngu rikizeho kwana.
Hati mwaheza kushemezibwa ahabw'ekigambo eki naabagambira.
Mugume omuriinye, naanye omuriimwe. Nk'oku eitaagi ritabaasa kwana byana ryonka, ryaba ritagumire ha muzaabibu, nikwo naimwe mutarikubaasa, mwaba mutagumire muriinye.
Niinye muzaabibu, naimwe muri amataagi. Oguma omuriinye, naanye omuriwe, ogwo niwe ayana ebyana bingi; ahakuba nyowe ahu ntari, timwine ki murikubaasa kukora.
Omuntu ku aba atagumire muriinye, anagwa nk'eitaagi, kandi ayoma; ago mataagi gashangurizibwa, ganagwa omu muriro, gasya.
Ku muraagume omuriinye, n'ebigambo byangye byaguma omuriimwe, mushabe kyona eki murikwenda, kiryabakorerwa.
Ekihimbisisa Tata, kikahamya ku muri abeegi bangye, niimwe okwana ebyana bingi.
Nk'oku Tata yankunzire, naanye nikwo naabakunzire; mugume omu kukunda kwangye.
Ku muriguma nimworobera ebiragiro byangye, muryaguma omu kukunda kwangye, nkaanye oku ntuura niinyorobera ebiragiro bya Tata, nkaguma omu kukunda kwe.
Ebi naabibagambira, ngu okushemererwa kwangye kube omuriimwe, kandi ngu okushemererwa kwanyu kube okuhikire.
Eki nikyo kiragiro kyangye, mukundane nk'oku naabakunzire.
Tihariho rukundo erikukira egi, omuntu okufeera banywani be.
Imwe muri banywani bangye, ku muraabe nimukora ebi ndikubaragiira.
