Tinkibeeta bahuuku, ahakuba omuhuuku tamanya ki mukama we akora; kureka mbeetsire banywani bangye, ahakuba byona ebi naagambiirwe Tata, mbibamanyiise.
Tiimwe mwantooraine; niinye naabatooraine, nkabataho ngu mugyende mwane ebyana, kandi ngu ebyana byanyu bigumeho; n'ahabw'ekyo kyona eki murishaba Isheboona omu iziina ryangye, aryakibaha.
Ebi nimbibaragiira ngu mukundane.
Kuri muri ab'ensi, ensi ekaabakunzire, ahabw'okuba abaayo; kwonka ahabw'okuba timuri b'ensi, kandi nkabatoorana kubaiha omu b'ensi, nikyo ensi erikubangira.
Mwijukye ekigambo eki naabagambiire nti: Omuhuuku takira mukama we. Ku baraabe bampiigire, naimwe baryabahiiga; ku baraabe baarinzire ekigambo kyangye, n'ekyanyu baryakirinda.
Ebyo byona baryabibakora nibabatura eiziina ryangye, ahabw'okuba tibarikumanya Owantumire.
Kuri ntaraizire, nkagamba nabo, tibaakugizire kibi; kwonka hati tibaine ky'okwetonganira ahabw'ekibi kyabo.
Orikuunyanga, naaba ayangire na Tata.
Kuri ntarakozire muribo emirimo etakakorwaga ondiijo, tibaakugizire kibi; kwonka hati bagireebire, baayogaho baanyanga na Tata.
Byona bibaireho ngu ekigambo ekyahandiikirwe kihikiirire, ekirikugira kiti: Bakaanyangira busha.
Kwonka Omuhwezi ku ariija, ou ndibooherereza okuruga ahari Isheboona, Omwoyo ow'amazima orikuruga ahari Tata, ogwo aryahamya ebyangye;
naimwe muri baakareebi, ahabw'okuba okuruga aha kutandika mukaba muri hamwe naanye.
Ebi naabibagambira ngu mutarishoberwa.
Baryababinga omuri sinagogi; kandi obunaku buryahika, omuntu weena oribaita aryateekateeka ngu naakorera Ruhanga.
Ekyo baryakikora, ahabw'okuba tibaramanyire Isheboona n'obu yaakuba nyowe.
Ebi naabibagambira, ngu obunaku bwabyo ku buriba bwahikire, mwijukye ku naabibagambiire. Ebigambo ebyo tindabibagambiire ha kutandika, ahabw'okuba nkaba nkibaine.
Mbwenu hati ningyenda ahari Ogwo owantumire; kwonka tihaine n'omwe omuriimwe orikumbuuza ati: Nooza hi?
Emitima yaanyu eijwire obusaasi, ahakuba naabagambira ebigambo ebi.
Kwonka nimbagambira amazima; ni kirungi ahabanyu nyowe okugyenda; ahakuba nyowe ku ndiba ntagyenzire, Omuhwezi taribaizira; kwonka ku ndigyenda, ndyamubooherereza.
We ku ariija aryayomesereza ensi ekibi, n'okuhikiirira, n'orubanja;
ekibi, ahabw'okutaanyikiriza;
okuhikiirira, ahakuba ningyenda ahari Tata, kandi nimuba mutakindeeba;
n'orubanja, ahakuba omutegyeki w'ensi egi aherize kucwerwa orubanja.
Kureka Omwoyo ow'amazima ku ariija, aryabeebembera omu mazima goona, ahakuba taryetuma; kwonka byona ebi arihurira, nibyo arigamba, kandi aryabamanyisa ebiriija kubaho.
Aryampimbisa, ahakuba aryaiha aha byangye, abibamanyise.
Ebi Tata aine byona n'ebyangye; nikyo naabagirira nti, Aryaiha aha byangye, abibamanyise.
Hatsigaire omwanya mukye kutandeeba; kandi ogundi mukye, muryandeeba.
Bamwe aha beegi be baagambirana bati: Eki arikutugambira n'enki ati, Hatsigaire omwanya mukye kutandeeba; kandi ati, Ogundi mukye, muryandeeba; kandi ati: Ahakuba ningyenda ahari Isheboona?
Baagaruka baagira bati: Eki arikugamba n'enki ati, Hatsigaire omwanya mukye? Titurikumanya ki arikugamba.
Yesu yaamanya ku barikwenda kumubuuza, yaabagira ati: Nimubuuzana aha ki naabagira nti, Hatsigaire owmanya mukye, kutandeeba; kandi nti, Ogundi mukye, muryandeeba?
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Muryarira mucure, kwonka ensi eryashemererwa; muryagira obusaasi, kwonka obusaasi bwanyu buryahinduka okushemererwa.
Omukazi, ku arumwa kuzaara, agira obusaasi, ahakuba obunaku bwe buba buhikire; kwonka ku aheza kuzaara, aba atakiijuka buri busaasi ahabw'okushemerererwa omwana ozairwe omu nsi.
N'ahabw'ekyo imwe mwine obusaasi hati; kwonka ndyagaruka mbareebe, emitima yaanyu eshemererwe; kandi okushemererwa kwanyu tihaine orikubaaka.
Aha kiro ekyo tihariho bi murimbuuza. Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Ku murishaba Isheboona ekintu kyona omu iziina ryangye, aryakibaha.
Okuhitsya hati tihariho ki mwashabire omu iziina ryangye; mushabe, muryaheebwa, okushemererwa kwanyu kubone kuhikiirira.
Ebyo naabibagambira omu nfumu; obunaku nibwija, obu ndiba ntakibagambira mu nfumu, kureka ndyabagambira ebya Tata bwerure.
Aha kiro ekyo muryashaba omu iziina ryangye; kandi tindikubagambira ku ndibashabira ahari Isheboona;
ahakuba Isheboona nawe abakunda, ahabw'okuba mukankunda, mwaikiriza ku naarugire ahari Isheboona.
Nkaruga ahari Isheboona, naija omu nsi; mbwenu ensi ningirugamu, ningaruka ahari Isheboona.
Abeegi be baagira bati: Mbwenu hati noogamba bwerure, tokigamba mu nfumu.
Hati twamanya ku omanya byona, kandi torikwetenga muntu weena kugira eki yaakubuuza; n'ahabw'ekyo nitwikiriza ku waarugire ahari Ruhanga.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Hati nimwikiriza?
Reeba obunaku nibwija, kandi bwahikire, obu muritaataanisizibwamu, buri muntu omu ka ye, mukantsiga nyenka; kwonka tindi nyenka, ahabw'okuba Tata ari hamwe naanye.
Ebi naabibagambira ngu mugire obusingye omuriinye. Omu nsi mwine obusaasi; kwonka muhuumure, nyowe nsingwire ensi.
Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebigambo ebyo, yainamura amaisho, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaagira ati: Taata, obunaku bwahika; himbisa Omwana waawe, n'Omwana abone kukuhimbisa,
nk'oku waamuhaire obushoboorozi aha bantu boona, ngu abone kuha abu waamuhaire boona amagara agatahwaho.
Aga nigo magara agatahwaho, okumanya iwe Ruhanga omwe ow'amazima, n'Ogwo ou waatumire, Yesu Kristo.
Nkuhaisize ekitiinisa omu nsi, ahabw'okuba omurimo ogu wampaire kukora nguhikiriize.
Mbwenu, Taata, mpimbisa omu maisho gaawe n'ekitiinisa ekyo eki naabaire nyine naiwe, ensi etakahangirwe.
Abashaija, abu wampaire omu nsi, nkabooreka eiziina ryawe; bakaba bari abaawe, waabampa, kandi barinzire ekigambo kyawe.
Hati bamanyire ngu byona ebi wampaire biruga ah'ori;
ahakuba ebigambo ebi wampaire mbibahaire, baabiikiriza, baamanya omu mazima ku naarugire ah'ori, kandi baikiriza ngu niiwe wantumire.
Abo nibo ndikushabira; tindikushabira b'ensi, kureka abo abu wampaire, ahakuba n'abaawe;
abangye boona n'abaawe, n'abaawe n'abangye, kandi nimpimbisibwa omuribo.
Mbwenu hati tinkiri mu nsi, kwonka bo bari omu nsi, kandi niinyija ah'ori. Taata orikwera, obarindire omu iziina ryawe eri wampaire, babe bamwe nkaitwe oku turi bamwe.
Obu naabaire nkibaine, nkabarindira omu iziina ryawe eri wampaire; nkabarinda, tihaine n'omwe owaabuzire, kureka omwana ow'okuhwerekyerera, ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bihikiirizibwe.
Mbwenu niinyija ah'ori; ebi nimbigamba nkiri omu nsi, ngu okushemererwa kwangye kuhikiirizibwe omuribo.
Mbahaire ekigambo kyawe; ensi yaabanga, ahabw'okuba ti b'ensi, nk'oku naanye ntari w'ensi.
Tindikukushaba ngu obaihe omu nsi, kureka ngu obarinde Omubi.
Ti b'ensi, nk'oku naanye ntari w'ensi.
Obeeze omu mazima; ekigambo kyawe nigo mazima.
Nk'oku wantumire omu nsi, naanye nikwo mbatumire omu nsi.
Nyowe niinyeyeza ahabwabo, ngu nabo beezibwe omu mazima.
Tindikushabira abo bonka, kureka n'abandi abariinyikiriza ahabw'ekigambo kyabo,
ngu boona babe bamwe, nkaiwe Taata, oku ori omuriinye, naanye omuriiwe, nabo babe omuriitwe, ab'ensi babone kwikiriza ku niiwe wantumire.
Ekitiinisa eki wampaire nkibahaire, ngu babe bamwe nkaitwe oku turi bamwe,
nyowe omuribo, naiwe omuriinye, babeere kimwe bamwe, ab'ensi bamanye ku niiwe wantumire, okabakunda nk'oku wankunzire.
Taata, niinyenda ngu abu wampaire nabo bagume naanye ahi ndi, babone kureeba ekitiinisa kyangye eki wampaire; ahakuba okankunda, ensi etakahangirwe.
Taata ohikiriire, ensi terakumanyire; kwonka nyowe nkakumanya; kandi n'aba nibamanya ku niiwe wantumire.
Nkabamanyisa eiziina ryawe, kandi ndyarimanyisa, ngu okukunda, oku wankunzire, kube omuribo, naanye mbe omuribo.
Kandi Yuda, owaamureebize, akaba naamanya ogwo mwanya; ahakuba Yesu kaingi akaba ateeranirayo n'abeegi be.
Mpaho Yuda, ku yaaherize kutunga omutwe gw'abaserukare n'abakuru baabo, abu yaahairwe abanyamurwa abakuru n'Abafarisaayo, baazayo baine etabaaza n'emuri n'eby'okurwanisa.
Yesu, ku yaamanyire byona ebyaza kumubaho, yaarugayo yaababuuza ati: Nimusherura oha?
Baamugarukamu bati: Yesu owa Nazareesi. Yesu yaabagira ati: Niinye. Yuda owaamureebize akaba ayemereire nabo.
Ku yaabagizire ati, Niinye, baagarura ebigyere enyima, baagwa ahansi.
Yaagaruka yaababuuza ati: Nimusherura oha? Baamugarukamu bati: Yesu owa Nazareesi.
Yesu yaagira ati: Manya, naabagira nti: Niinye; n'ahabw'ekyo, ku muraabe nimunsherura, murekye aba bagyende.
Akagira atyo ngu ekigambo eki yaagambire kibekwo, eki yaagizire ati: Ahari abo abu wampaire, tihariho n'omwe orambuzireho.
Simooni Petero, owaabaire aine rurara, yaagisyorayo, yaatema omuhuuku w'omunyamurwa omukuru, yaamucwaho okutu kwa buryo. Eiziina ry'omuhuuku ogwo akaba ari Maliko.
Yesu yaaragiira Petero ati: Garura rurara yaawe omu kyobati kyayo. Ekikopo eki Tata ampaire tindikukinywa?
Okuruga aho omutwe gw'abaserukare n'omukuru waabo n'abambari b'Abayudaaya baakwata Yesu, baamuboha.
Baabanza kumutwara ahari Aana; ahakuba akaba ari ishe-zaara wa Kayaafa, owaabaire ari omunyamurwa omukuru omu mwaka ogwo.
Kandi Kayaafa ogwo niwe yaahaire Abayudaaya obwengye ati, Ni kirungi omuntu omwe kufeera abantu.
kwonka Petero yaaguma ayemereire aheeru aha irembo. Omwegi ogwo, owaabaire naamanywa omunyamurwa omukuru, yaashohora, yaagamba n'omwishiki owaabaire naakumiirira, yaataasya Petero.
Omwishiki ogwo omukumiirizi yaabuuza Petero ati: Naiwe tori omwe aha beegi b'omushaija ogu? Yaagira ati: Ngaaha, tindi mwegi we.
Kandi abahuuku n'abambari bakaba niboota omuriro gw'amakara, ahakuba hakaba hariho embeho; beemereire aho, niboota; na Petero ayemereire nabo naayota.
Omunyamurwa omukuru yaabuuza Yesu aha beegi be, n'eby'okwegyesa kwe.
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Nkaba ngambira abantu butunu; nyegyesa obutosha omuri sinagogi n'omuri hekalu, ahi Abayudaaya boona bateeranira; tinkagambaga mu mubonano.
Mbwenu nombuuriza ki? Abo abaabaire bampurira, obe nibo waabuuza ebi naabagambiire; bo nibamanya ebi naagambire.
Yesu ku yaagambire ekyo, omwe aha bambari, owaabaire ayemereire aho, yaamuteera oruhi, yaagira ati: Haza ogarukamu otyo omunyamurwa omukuru?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe naagamba kubi, nyomesereza ekibi; mbwenu ku ndaabe naagamba gye, wanteerera ki?
Bwanyima Aana yaamutwekyera Kayaafa omunyamurwa omukuru, abohirwe.
Kandi Simooni Petero akaba ayemereire naayota. Baamubuuza bati: Naiwe tori omwe aha beegi be? Yaayehakana ati: Ngaaha; tindi mwegi we.
Omwe aha bahuuku b'omunyamurwa omukuru, ow'omu ruganda rw'ogwo ou Petero yacwireho okutu, yaabuuza ati: Tinkureebire nawe omu musiri?
Petero yaagaruka yaakyehakana; ahonaaho enkoko yaagamba.
Bwanyima baamwiha owa Kayaafa, baamutwara omuri
Pilaato yaashohora, yaabashanga aheeru, yaababuuza ati: Omushaija ogu nimumutabaariza ki?
Baamugarukamu bati: Omushaija ogu, kuri atari nkozi y'ebibi, titwakumukuhaire.
Pilaato yaabagira ati: Mumwetwarire, mumucwere orubanja nk'ebiragiro byanyu oku biri. Abayudaaya baamugira bati: Ebiragiro tibitwikiriza kwita muntu.
Ekyo kikahikiiriza ekigambo eki Yesu yaagambire okworeka okufa oku arifa.
Pilaato yaagaruka yaataaha omuri Puratorio, yaayeta Yesu, yaamubuuza ati: Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Ekigambo ekyo nookigamba ahabwawe, nari shi okigambiirwe abandi?
Pilaato yaagarukamu ati: Noogira ngu nyowe ndi Omuyudaaya? Manya ab'eihanga ryawe n'abanyamurwa abakuru nibo baakundeetera. Ocumwire ki?
Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Obugabe bwangye ti bw'ensi egi: kuri obugabe bwangye bwaba buri obw'ensi egi, engabo zangye zikaarwaine, ndeka kuheebwayo omu Bayudaaya; kwonka obugabe bwangye ti bw'ensi egi.

Pilaato yaamugira ati: Biri shi naiwe ori Omugabe? Yesu yaagarukamu ati: Eki waagamba nikyo, ndi Omugabe. Ahakuba nikyo naiziire omu nsi, ngu mpamye amazima. Omuntu weena ow'amazima ahurira eiraka ryangye.
Pilaato yaamubuuza ati: Amazima n'enki? Ku yaaherize kukigamba, yaashohora, yaagaruka aha Bayudaaya, yaabagira ati: Tindikumureebaho rubanja.
Kwonka mugira omucwe ngu nshemereire kubarekurira omuntu omwe aha Kuhingurwaho; mbwenu nimwenda ngu mbarekurire Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Baagaruka baayomba, nibagira bati: T'ogu, kureka Barabba! Kandi Barabba ogwo akaba ari omwambuzi.
Bwanyima Pilaato yaatwara Yesu, baamwasha.
Ku baaherize, abaserukare baaruka ekirunga ky'amahwa, baakimujweka omu mutwe, baamujweka n'omwenda gwa bujwa;
baija ah'ari, baamutangirira nibagira bati: Osingire, Mugabe w'Abayudaaya! Baamuteera empi.
Pilaato yaagaruka yaashohora, yaabagira ati: Reeba, naaza kumubareetera, mumanye ku ntaamureebaho rubanja.
Atyo Yesu yaashohora, ajwaire ekirunga ky'amahwa, n'omwenda gwa bujwa. Pilaato yaabagira ati: Reeba omuntu ogu!
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abambari, ku baamureebire, baayomba munonga, bati: Mubambe, mubambe aha musharaba! Pilaato yaabagarukamu ati: Mumutware, mumwebambire, ahakuba tindikumureebaho rubanja.
Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: Twine ekiragiro; n'ahabw'ekiragiro ekyo ashemereire kufa, ahabw'okuba ayegizire Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Pilaato ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, yaayeyongyera kutiina;
yaagaruka omuri Puratorio, yaabuuza Yesu ati: Ori owa nkahi? Kwonka Yesu tiyaamugarukamu.
Pilaato nikwo kumugambira ati: Torikungarukamu? Torikumanya ku nyine obushoboorozi bw'okukurekura nari kukubamba?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Tokungizireho bushoboorozi, kuri otarabuhairwe okuruga omu iguru; n'ahabw'ekyo owaakumpa niwe aine ekibi ekirikukira ekyawe.
Pilaato ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, yaashohoza Yesu, yaashutama aha kitebe ky'eiramuriro omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Amabaare agaariire, omu Ruheburaayo, Gabasa.
Eizooba eryo rikaba riri ery'Okweteguurira Okuhingurwaho, ziri nk'eshaaha mukaaga. Pilaato yaagambira Abayudaaya ati: Reeba Omugabe waanyu!
Baayomba munonga nibagira bati: Mwiheho! Mwiheho! Omubambe. Pilaato yaababuuza ati: Mbambe omugabe waanyu? Abanyamurwa abakuru baamugarukamu bati; Titwine mugabe kureka Kaisaari.
Okuruga aho yaamubaha kubambwa aha musharaba.
Baatwara Yesu, yaagyenda ayekoreire omusharaba gwe, baahika aha mwanya ogurikwetwa Empanga y'omutwe, omu Ruheburaayo Gologosa.
Aho niho baamubambire, n'abandi babiri, omwe aha rubaju rumwe, n'ondi aha rundi, na Yesu ahagati.
Pilaato yaahandiika ekihandiiko; yaakita aha musharaba, nikigira kiti: YESU OWA NAZAREESI, OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA.
Ekihandiiko ekyo kikashomwa Abayudaaya baingi; ahabw'okuba omwanya ogu Yesu yaabambirwemu gukaba guri haihi n'orurembo; kandi kikaba kihandiikirwe omu Ruheburaayo n'omu Rulatini n'omu Rugriika.
Abanyamurwa abakuru b'Abayudaaya baagambira Pilaato bati: Otahandiika oti, Omugabe w'Abayudaaya, kureka oti, Akagira ati: Ndi Omugabe w'Abayudaaya.
Pilaato yaagarukamu ati: Eki naahandiikire, naakihandiikire.

Abaserukare ku baaherize kubamba Yesu, baatwara ebijwaro bye, baabibaganisa omu miteeko ena, buri muserukare yaatwara omuteeko gwe. Kwonka ekanzu ye ekaba etaine mubaziiro, ekaba erukirwe okuruga omu bitsya okuhika ahansi.

N'ahabw'ekyo baahanuura bati: Tutagitaagura, kureka tugiteerere enteenyu, tureebe oraagitware. Eki kikabaho ngu Ekyahandiikirwe kihikiirire ekirikugira kiti: Bakabagana ebijwaro byangye, baateerera ekanzu yangye enteenyu. Ebyo nibyo abaserukare baakozire.
Kandi haihi n'omusharaba gwa Yesu hakaba heemereireho nyina na nyinento, na Mariamu muka Kuleopa, na Mariamu Magadaleene.
Yesu ku yaareebire nyina, kandi n'omwegi ou yaabaire akunda ayemereire haihi, yaagambira nyina ati: Mukaikuru, reeba omwana waawe!
Kandi yaagambira omwegi ogwo ati: Reeba omukaikuru waawe! Okuruga aho omwegi ogwo yaamutwara omu ka ye.
Kandi hakaba haateekirweho enjoga eijwire viinyo erikushaarira; baagijabikamu ekyangu, baakita aha kibingo, baakimukwatira aha munwa.
Yesu ku yaaherize kukiheebwa, yaagira ati: Kyahwa! Yainika omutwe gwe, yaahayo amagara ge.
Abaserukare baija, baahenda amaguru g'ow'okubanza, n'ag'owa kabiri, abaabaire babambirwe nawe;
kwonka ku baahikire ahari Yesu, baashanga yaakabire; tibaamuhenda maguru.
Kwonka omwe aha baserukare yaamucumita eicumu omu rubaju, ahonaaho haarugamu eshagama n'amaizi.
Owaakireebire, niwe yaakihamize, n'okuhamya kwe n'okw'amazima; kandi naamanya ku agamba amazima, ngu naimwe mwikirize.
Ebyo bikabaho, ngu Ekyahandiikirwe kihikiirire ekirikugira kiti: Tarihendwa igufa;
kandi Ekyahandiikirwe ekindi nikigira kiti: Baryareeba ogwo ou baacumitsire.
Na Nikodemu, owaabandize kwija ahari Yesu nyekiro, nawe yaija, areetsire eby'omugaju ebirimu sumuruna n'enkaka, oburemeezi bwabyo nk'eraatiri igana.
Baatwara omutumbi gwa Yesu, baaguzinga omu myenda ya kitaani ei baatairemu eby'emigaju, nk'emicwe y'Abayudaaya ey'okuziika oku yaabaire eri.
Kandi omu mwanya ogu yaabaire abambirwemu hakaba harimu omusiri; n'omu musiri omwo hakaba harimu ekituuro kisya ekitakazikwamuga muntu.
Omwo nimwo baaziikire Yesu, ahabw'okuba rikaba riri eizooba ry'Okweteguura kw'Abayudaaya, kandi ekituuro ekyo kikaba kiri haihi.
N'ahabw'ekyo yairuka, yaahika Simooni Petero n'omwegi ondiijo, ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, yaabagira ati: Baihire Mukama waitu omu kituuro, kandi titurikumanya hu bamutaire.
Petero yaashohora n'omwegi ogwo ondiijo kuza aha kituuro.
Bombi bairuka; kwonka omwegi ogwo ondiijo yaatsiga Petero, yaamutanga aha kituuro;
yainama, yaaringurizamu, yaareeba emyenda ya kitaani etairwe aho, kwonka tiyaatahamu.
Bwanyima Simooni Petero yaija amukuratiire, yaataaha omu kituuro; yaareeba emyenda ya kitaani etairwe aho,
n'omutanda, ogwabaire guri aha mutwe gwe, gutatairwe ha myenda egyo ya kitaani, kureka gukubirwe, gutairwe aha kwagwo gwonka.
Omwegi ogwo ondiijo, owaabandize aha kituuro, nawe yaataahamu, yaareeba, yaikiriza;
obwo bakaba batakeetegyereize Ekyahandiikirwe ngu ashemereire kuzooka omu bafu.
Bwanyima abeegi abo baagaruka omu maka gaabo.
Kwonka Mariamu Magadaleene yaaguma ayemereire aha kituuro naarira; ku yaabaire naarira, yainama yaaringuriza omu kituuro;
yaareeba baamaraika babiri bajwaire ebirikwera, bashutami ahu omutumbi gwa Yesu gubaire gutairwe, omwe aha mushego, n'ondiijo aha mirambikirizo.
Baamubuuza bati: Mukazi 'we, noorizibwa ki? Yaabagarukamu ati: Ahabw'okuba batwaire Mukama wangye, kandi tindikumanya i bamutaire.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaahinduka, yaareeba Yesu ayemereire; kwonka tiyaamanya ku ari Yesu.

Yesu yaamubuuza ati: Mukazi 'we, noorizibwa ki? Noosherura oha? Mariamu yaateekateeka ngu n'omuhingi w'ogwo musiri, yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, ku oraabe niiwe omutwaire, ngambira ei omutaire, nze kumwihayo.
Yesu yaamugira ati: Mariamu. Yaahinduka, yaamugarukamu omu Ruheburaayo ati: Rabooni!, (amakuru gaakyo ngu Omwegyesa),

Yesu yaamugira ati: Otankwata, ahakuba tinkatembire mu iguru ahari Tata; kwonka irooko ogyende aha b'eishe-emwe, obagire oti: Naatemba omu iguru ahari Ishe kandi Shoimwe, ahari Ruhanga we kandi Ruhanga waanyu.
Mariamu Magadaleene yaagyenda, yaagambira abeegi ati: Naareeba Mukama waitu. Yaabateekyerereza n'ebi yaamugambira.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaabooreka engaro ze n'orubaju rwe. Abeegi, ku baareebire Mukama waabo, baashemererwa.
Yesu yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Mugire obusingye! Nk'oku Tata yantumire, naanye nikwo ndikubatuma.
Ku yaagambire ekyo, yaabaikiza omwitsyo, ati: Mwakiire Omwoyo Orikwera.
Boona abu murisaasira ebibi, baryabisaasirwa; kandi abu murigumyaho ebibi, biryabagumaho.

Abeegi abandi baamugira bati: Twareeba Mukama waitu. Kwonka we yaabagira ati: Ku ndaabe ntareebire nkojo z'emisumaari mu biganja bye, nkazitamu orukumu rwangye, nkata n'ekiganja kyangye omu rubaju rwe, tindiikiriza.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro munaana, nabwo abeegi be bari omu nju, kandi na Tomasi ari hamwe nabo. Yesu yaija enyigi zikingirwe, yaabeemerera ahagati, yaagira ati: Mugire obusingye!
Yaagambira Tomasi ati: Reeta orukumu rwawe, n'ekiganja kyawe, okite omu rubaju rwangye; orekye kuba otaine kwikiriza, kureka oine okwikiriza.
Tomasi yaagarukamu yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye! kandi Ruhanga wangye!
Yesu yaamugira ati: Waikiriza ahabw'okundeeba. Baine omugisha abaikiriza, bataine ki bareebire.
Hariho n'eby'okureeberaho ebindi bingi, ebi Yesu yaakoreire omu maisho g'abeegi be, ebitahandiikirwe omu kitabo eki;
kwonka ebi bihandiikirwe ngu mwikirize ku Yesu ari Kristo Omwana wa Ruhanga, kandi ngu, ku muraikirize, mugire amagara omu iziina rye.
Bwanyima y'ebyo Yesu yaagaruka yaayeyoreka abeegi be aha nyanja ya Tiberia; kandi oku nikwo yaabeeyorekire.
Simooni Petero, na Tomasi orikwetwa Didumo, na Nasanaeli owa Kaana eya Galilaaya, na beene Zebedaayo, n'abeegi be abandi babiri, bakaba bari hamwe.
Simooni Petero yaabagira ati: Ninza kujuba eby'enyanja. Baamugira bati: Naitwe nitugyenda naiwe. Baagyenda baaza omu bwato; kwonka ekiro ekyo tibaagira ki baakwata.
Ku bwabaire nibusheehsa, Yesu yaayemerera aha nkungu; kwonka abeegi tibaamanya ku ariwe.
Yesu yaababuuza ati: Boojo, mwine eby'okurya? Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha!
Yaabaragiira ati: Mutegye akatimba aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'obwato; nimwija kubikwata. Batyo baakatega, tibaabaasa kukaiha mu maizi ahabw'eby'enyanja kuba bingi.
Omwegi ogwo, ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, yaagambira Petero ati: Ni Mukama waitu. Simooni Petero, ku yaahuriire ngu ni Mukama waitu, yaajwara omwenda, ahakuba akaba ajwaire busha, yaayetuura omu nyanja.
Abeegi abandi baija omu bwato, nibakurura akatimba kaijwire eby'enyanja; ahakuba bakaba batari hare na nkungu, nk'entambwe igana.
Ku baahikire aha nkungu, baareebaho omuriro gw'amakara, guriho eby'enyanja, n'omugaati guri aha rubaju.
Yesu yaabagira ati: Mureete aha eby'enyanja aha bi mwakwata hati.

Simooni Petero yaaguruka omu bwato, yaakurura akatimba, yaakahitsya aha nkungu kaijwire eby'enyanja bihango igana na makumi ataano na bishatu; kwonka n'obu biraabe byabaire biri bingi bityo, akatimba tikaracwekire.
Yesu yaabeeta ati: Mwije murye. Kandi tihariho n'omwe aha beegi be owaateireho kumubuuza ati: Ori oha? Ahakuba bakamanya ku ari Mukama waabo.
Yesu yaija, yaakwata omugaati, yaagubaha, kandi n'eby'enyanja atyo.
Ogwo nigwo murundi gwa kashatu ogu Yesu yaareebekyeire abeegi be, aherize kuzooka omu bafu.

Ku baaherize kurya, Yesu yaabuuza Simooni Petero ati: Simooni mwene Yohaana, onkunda okukira aba? Yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, Mukama wangye; noomanya ku nkukunda. Yesu yaamugira ati: Riisa abaana b'entaama zangye.
Yesu yaamubuuza obwa kabiri ati: Simooni mwene Yohaana, onkunda? Yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, Mukama wangye; noomanya ku nkukunda. Yesu ati: Riisa entaama zangye.

Yaamubuuza obwa kashatu ati: Simooni, mwene Yohaana, onkunda? Petero yaashaasha ahabw'okumubuuza obwa kashatu ati: Onkunda? Yaamugira ati: Mukama wangye, iwe noomanya byona; noomanya ku nkukunda. Yesu yaamugira ati: Riisa entaama zangye.
Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: obu waabaire ori omutsigazi, okaba oyezirika, oza ei orikwenda yoona; kwonka ku oriba omugurusi, oryagorora emikono yaawe, ondiijo akuzirikye, akutware ei otarikwenda.
Ekyo akakigamba kworeka omuringo ogu arifamu oku gurihimbisisa Ruhanga. Bwanyima y'ekyo yaamugira ati: Nkurata.
Petero, ku yaahindukire yaareeba omwegi ogwo, ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, abakuratiire; niwe owaabaire ayegamiire Yesu omu kifuba nibarya, obu yaamubuuza ati: Mukama wangye, n'oha orikuza kukureebya?
Petero, ku yaamureebire, yaabuuza Yesu ati: Mukama wangye, ogu aryaba ata?
Yesu yaamugarukamu ati: Ku naakwenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya ahu ndiizira, noofa ki? Iwe nkuratira!
Ekigambo ekyo kyabuga omu b'eishe-emwe, ku omwegi ogwo atarifa; kwonka Yesu taramugambiire ku atarifa, kureka ati: Ku naakwenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya ahu ndiizira, noofa ki?
Ogwo niwe mwegi orikuhamya ebyo, kandi niwe yaabihandiikire; kandi nitumanya ngu okuhamya kwe n'okw'amazima.
Kandi hariho n'ebindi bingi ebi Yesu yaakozire; kuri noogira ngu byona bikahandiikwa buri kimwe, ninteekateeka nti, ebitabo ebyakuhandiikirwe bikaashaagire omu nsi.
okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaatwariirweho omu iguru, aherize kuragiira entumwa ezi yaatooraine, naazitumaho Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ku yaaherize kubonabonesibwa, yaabeeyoreka ahuriire, yaakihamisa obumanyiso bwingi, yaamara ebiro makumi ana naabeeyoreka, naabagambira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Ku yaabaire ateeraine nabo, yaabeehanangiriza kutaruga omuri Yerusaalemu, ati: Kureka mutegyereze eki Isheboona yaaraganiise, eki naabagambiire;
ahakuba Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi, kwonka imwe nimwija kubatizibwa n'Omwoyo Orikwera omu biro bikye.
Ku baabaire bateeraniire hamwe, baamubuuza bati: Mukama waitu, obu nibwo bunaku obu orikwenda kugaruriramu obugabe bwa Israeli?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Imwe, ti kyanyu kumanya ebiro nari obunaku ebi Isheboona yaataireho kuba omu bushoboorozi bwe wenka;
kwonka muryaheebwa amaani, Omwoyo Orikwera ku ariheza kubaijaho, kandi muryaba baakareebi bangye omuri Yerusaalemu, n'omuri Buyudaaya yoona, n'omuri Samaria, n'okuhitsya aha muheru gw'ensi.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaatwarwa ahaiguru nibamureeba, ekicu kyamubakingira.
Ku baabaire bakihangire eiguru amaisho, We naakigyenda, reeba abashaija babiri baabeemerera haihi, bajwaire ebirikwera;
baabagira bati: Imwe bashaija ba Galilaaya 'mwe, muhangiire ki amaisho ahaiguru? Yesu ogwo owaabaihwaho akatwarwa omu iguru, nikwo arigaruka nk'oku mwamureeba naatemba omu iguru.
Batyo baagaruka Yerusaalemu nibaruga omu kibungo kya Zeituuni, ekyabaire kiri haihi na Yerusaalemu orugyendo orutarikuzira kugyendwa ahari Sabato.

Ku baahikireyo, baatemba, baaza omu kishengye kya kanyinaibiri, omu aba boona baagumire, Petero, Yohaana, Yakobo, Anderea, Filipo, Tomasi, Batolomayo, Matayo, Yakobo mwene Alifaayo, Simooni Zeloote na Yuda mwene Yakobo.
Abo boona hamwe n'abakazi na Mariamu nyina wa Yesu n'abarumuna, baayezirika kuguma nibashaba n'omutima gumwe.
Omu biro ebyo Petero akeemerera ahagati y'ab'eishe-emwe, abaabaire bateeraine, bari nka igana na makumi abiri, yaabagira ati:
B'eishe-emwe, Ebyahandiikirwe bishemereire kuhikiirizibwa ebi Omwoyo Orikwera yaarangiire omu kanwa ka Daudi ahari Yuda, owaayebembeire abaizire kukwata Yesu.
Ahabw'okuba akaba naabarirwa hamwe naitwe, yaaheebwa omugabo gw'obuheereza obu.
Omushaija ogwo akagura omusiri n'empiiha ezi yaahairwe ahabw'ekibi eki yaakozire; yaagwa ajuumaire, yaabaruka enda, amagara ge goona gaayohoka.
Ekyo kyamanywa boona abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu, n'ahabw'ekyo omusiri ogwo gukeetwa Akeludaama omu rurimi rwabo, amakuru ngu, omusiri gw'eshagama.
Ahakuba kikahandiikwa omu kitabo kya Zaaburi ngu,
Eka ye ehindukye eitongo;
Hatarigira omuntu owaarituuramu.
Kandi ngu,
Obureeberezi bwe butwarwe ondiijo.
Mwenu omu bashaija abaabaire bagyenda naitwe ebiro byona ebi Mukama waitu Yesu yaamazire naitwe,
okuruga aha kubatiza kwa Yohaana okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaatwihiirweho okutwarwa omu iguru, omuri abo omwe ashemereire kuba kareebi hamwe naitwe ow'okuhamya okuzooka kwe.
Baatoorana babiri, Yosefu orikwetwa Barusaba, ou baayetsire Yusito, n'ondiijo Matiya.
Baashaba nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, Iwe orikumanya emitima y'abantu boona omuri aba bombi otworekyemu omwe ou waatoorana,
atware omwanya gw'obuheereza obu n'obutumwa, obu Yuda yaarugiremu akeegyendera.
Baabateerera enteenyu, enteenyu yaakwata Matiya; yaabarirwa hamwe n'entumwa ikumi n'emwe.
Eizooba rya Pentekoote obu ryahika, boona bakaba bateeraniire omu mwanya gumwe.
Ahonaaho okuhoorera kwaruga omu iguru, nk'omuyaga oku guhoorera n'amaani, kwaijuriza kimwe enju omu baabaire bashutami.
Haareebeka endimi nk'ez'omuriro, zeebaganiisemu, nizaakira ahari buri omwe omuribo.
Boona baijura Omwoyo Orikwera, baatandika kugamba endimi ezindi, nk'oku Omwoyo yaabahaire kuzigamba.
Omu biro ebyo omuri Yerusaalemu hakaba harimu Abayudaaya, abashaija abanyadiini abaarugire omu mahanga goona agari ahansi y'eiguru.
Omutwe muhango gw'abantu, ku baahuriire okuhoorera okwo, baateeranira hamwe bashobeirwe ahabw'okuba buri muntu akahurira entumwa nizigamba omu rurimi rw'owaabo.
Boona baatangaara nibagira bati: Beitu aba boona abarikugamba t'Abagalilaaya?
Mbwenu kyaruga hi itwe twena okuhurira nibagamba endimi z'owaitu ei twazaariirwe?
Haza turi Abapaazi, Abameedi, Abelamiti n'abatuura Mesopotamia, omuri Buyudaaya, omuri Kapadokia, omuri Ponto, omuri Asia,
omuri Furugia na Pamfulia, omuri Misri n'omu mashaza ga Libya agahereraine na Kureene, n'abagyenyi abarugire Rooma, b'Abayudaaya n'abahindukire bakataaha omu diini yaabo,
n'Abakureete n'Abaharabu; nitubahurira nibagamba omu ndimi zaitu eby'amaani ebikozirwe Ruhanga.
Boona baatangaara nibabanganisa, nibabuuzana bati: Eki n'enki?
Kwonka abandi baabashekyerera, nibagira bati: Basinzire viinyo y'omutahe.

Bwanyima Petero yaayemerera hamwe na bari ikumi n'omwe, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango naabagira ati: Imwe bashaija ba Buyudaaya 'mwe n'abari Yerusaalemu mwena, mumanye eki, kandi mutegye amatu, muhurire ebigambo byangye.
Mumanye ku aba batasinzire, nk'oku murikuteekateeka, ahakuba hati n'eshaaha ishatu za nyomushana;
kureka eki nikyo kyaragwirwe nabi Yoeli ati:
Ruhanga akagira ati: Omu biro by'aha muheru
Ndyashuka Omwoyo wangye aha bantu boona;
Batabani baanyu na bahara baanyu baryaragura;
Abatsigazi baanyu baryayorekwa,
N'abagurusi baanyu baryaroota ebirooto;
Kandi omu biro ebyo ndyashuka Omwoyo wangye
Aha bahuuku bangye n'abazaana bangye, baragure.
Ndyayoreka eby'okutangaaza omu iguru ahaiguru,
N'obumanyiso omu nsi ahansi,
Eshagama n'omuriro n'okucumba kw'omwika;
Eizooba riryahinduka omwirima,
N'okwezi kuhindukye eshagama,
Ekiro ekyo ekikuru ekya Mukama eky'okutangaaza kutakahikire.
Kandi omuntu weena oritakira eiziina rya Mukama aryajunwa.

Imwe bashaija ba Israeli 'mwe, muhurire ebigambo ebi. Yesu owa Nazareesi, omushaija ou Ruhanga yaabahamiize n'emirimo mikuru n'eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso, ebi yaamukoreise ahagati yaanyu, nk'oku mwabyereebeire,
Yesu ogwo, ku yaaherize kuheebwayo nk'oku Ruhanga yaakiteekateekire, akakimanya kitakahikire, mwamubamba aha musharaba, mwamwitsa emikono y'Abanyamahanga abatategyekwa Biragiro.
Kwonka Ruhanga akamuzoora, aherize kubohoororwa omu kuhururwa kw'okufa, ahabw'okuba tikurabaasize kumuhamiza kimwe.
Kandi Daudi akamugambaho ati:
Nkaba ndeeba Mukama omu maisho gangye obutoosha,
Ahakuba atuura aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo, ngu ntanyiganyiga;
Nikyo omutima gwangye gwashemerereirwe, n'orurimi rwangye rukeesiima;
Kandi n'omubiri gwangye guryahuumura gwine amatsiko;
Ahakuba toritsiga magara gangye kuzimu,
N'obu kwakuba okureka Orikwera waawe kujunda.
Okampabura emihanda y'amagara;
Kandi oryanyijuza okushemererwa ahabw'okuba omu maisho gaawe.
Nka nabi akamanya ku Ruhanga yaamurahiriire endahiro, ku arita omwe aha baijukuru aha ngoma.
Ku yaamanyire ekyo kitakabaireho, yaagamba aha kuzooka kwa Kristo, ku ataratsigirwe kuzimu, kandi n'omubiri gwe ku gutarajunzire.
Yesu ogwo Ruhanga akamuzoora, itwe twena turi baakareebi baakyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ku yaaherize kutunguurwa omukono gwa buryo gwa Ruhanga, n'okuheebwa Omwoyo Orikwera, ou Isheboona yaaraganiise, yaashuka eki, eki murikureeba, kandi eki murikuhurira.
Nimumanya ku Daudi we ataratembire mu iguru; kwonka akeegambaho ati:
Mukama akagambira Mukama wangye ati:
Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
Okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe
Akatebe k'ebigyere byawe.
Petero yaabagarukamu ati: Mweteise, mwena mubatizibwe omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo, mubone kusaasirwa ebibi byanyu; kandi nimwija kuheebwa ekiconco ky'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ahakuba okuraganisibwa oku n'okwanyu n'okw'abaana baanyu, n'okwa boona abari hare, omuntu weena oryetwa Mukama Ruhanga waitu.
Yaagaruka yaabamanyisa ebigambo ebindi bingi, naabeehanangiriza ati: Mujunwe, murugye omu bantu b'obusingye obu obutegami.
Kandi abaikiriize ekigambo kye baabatizibwa; eryo izooba haayongyerwaho abantu nk'enkumi ishatu.
Baaguma nibeezirikira okwegyesa kw'entumwa, n'okukwatanisa nazo omu kubega omugaati n'omu kushaba.
Abantu boona baagira obwoba; eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bingi byakorwa entumwa.
Kandi abaikiriize boona bakaguma hamwe, nibakwatanisa omu bintu byabo byona;
nibatunda amatungo gaabo n'ebintu byabo, nibabigabira boona nk'okukyena kw'omuntu oku kwabaire kuri.
Obutoosha baaguma nibeezirika kuteeranira omuri hekalu n'omutima gumwe, kandi n'okubega omugaati omu maka gaabo; kandi nibarya eby'okurya baine okushemererwa n'emitima etaine buryarya,
nibahimbisa Ruhanga, kandi nibasiimwa abantu boona. Obutoosha Mukama yaaguma naabongyeraho abarikujunwa.
Petero na Yohaana bakaba nibainamuka omuri hekalu omu shaaha ey'okushaba, niyo ya mwenda.
Kandi hakaba hariho omuntu owaazairwe aremaire ebigyere; ebiro byona bakaba bamuheeka, bamubyamya aha irembo rya hekalu eririkwetwa Erirungi, okushabiriza abarikutaaha omuri hekalu.
Ku yaareebire Petero na Yohana nibataaha omuri hekalu, yaabashaba empiiha.
Petero yaamutaho amaisho, hamwe na Yohaana, yaamugira ati: Tuteho amaisho!
Onu yaagabataho, aine amatsiko ngu baaza kugira eki baamuha.
Petero yaagira ati: Efeeza n'ezaabu tinziine; kwonka eki nyine, nikyo ndikukuha. Omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareesi, imuka ogyende.
Yaamukwata omukono gwa buryo, yaamwimutsya; ahonaaho ebigyere bye n'obugomba-mburi bwe byatunga amaani.
Yaabandatuka, yaayemerera, yaatandika kugyenda; yaataaha nabo omuri hekalu, naagyenda, naaguruka, naahimbisa Ruhanga.
Abantu boona baamureeba naagyenda naahimbisa Ruhanga;
baamanya ku ari ogwo owaabaire atuura aha irembo erirungi rya hekalu, naashabiriza; baashoberwa munonga, batangaarira ekyo ekyamubaho.
Ku yaabaire akwaitse Petero na Yohaana, abantu boona bairukira ahu baabaire bari omu ksiasi ekirikwetwa ekya Sulemaani, nibatangaara munonga.

Petero ku yaabareebire, yaabagambira ati: Imwe bashaija ba Israeli 'mwe, ahabw'enki nimutangaarira omushaija ogu? Nari nimutushamaaririra ki nk'abarikuteekateeka ngu amaani gaitu nari shi okutiina Ruhanga kwaitu nibyo byagyendesa omushaija ogu?

Ruhanga owa Abrahamu, owa Isaaka, kandi owa Yakobo, Ruhanga wa yooatatenkuruitwe, niwe yaahaisize ekitiinisa omuheereza we Yesu, ou mwahaireyo mukeehakanira omu maisho ga Pilaato, obu yaabaire amaririire kumurekura.
Kwonka imwe mwayehakana Orikwera kandi Ohikiriire, mwashaba kuheebwa omwitsi;
kandi Mukama w'amagara mwamwita; kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafu; naitwe turi baakareebi ab'okukihamya.

Kandi omushaija ogu, ou murikureeba, kandi ou murikumanya, ahabw'okwikiriza eiziina rya Yesu, eiziina eryo niryo ryamuha amaani; kandi okwikiriza oku yesu aha nikwo kwamukiriza kimwe omu maisho gaanyu mwena.
Mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, nimmanya ngu mukakikora omu butamanya, kandi n'abategyeki baanyu nikwo baakozire.
Kwonka Ruhanga, ebi yaaraguriire omu kanwa ka baanabi boona, ngu Kristo we aryabonabonesibwa, nikwo yaakihikiriize atyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo mweteise, muhindukye, ebibi byanyu biragazibwe, ebiro eby'okugaruka obusya bibone kwija okuruga ahari Mukama;
atume Kristo owaabateereirweho, niwe Yesu,
ou eiguru rishemereire kwakiira, okuhitsya obunaku bw'okugaruramu ebintu byona obusya, obu Ruhanga yaabaire agambira omu kanwa ka baanabi be abarikwera abaabire bariho okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi.
Buzima kwo Musa akagira ati: Mukama Ruhanga aryabaimukiza nabi nkaanye okuruga omuri beene waanyu; ogwo ebi aribagambira byona, mubyorobere.
Nabi ogwo, ku ariija, omuntu weena otarimworobera aryahwerekyerezibwa, aihwe omu bantu.
Kandi na baanabi boona abaaragwire okuruga ahari Samueli n'abaamukuratiire, nabo nikwo baagambire aha biro ebi.
Imwe muri batabani ba baanabi, kandi ab'endagaano ei Ruhanga yaaraganiise baashwenkuriimwe, obu yaagambira Abrahamu ati: Kandi omuri
Niimwe Ruhanga yaabandize kutumaho Omugaragwa we, aherize kumuzoora, ngu abahe omugisha naabahindura, omuntu weena omuriimwe arugye omu bibi bye.
babagwereirwe kubi, ahabw'okwegyesa abantu, nibabagambira ngu omuri Yesu nimwo okuzooka omu bafu kubonekyeire.
Baabakwata, baabata omu kihome okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, ahakuba bukaba buri omu mwabazyo.
Kwonka baingi ahari abo abaahuriire ekigambo ekyo bakaikiriza; n'omubaro gw'abashaija gwayeyongyera, gwahika nk'enkumi itaano.
Ku bwaseesire, abategyeki baabo n'abakuru b'abantu n'abahandiiki baateeranira Yerusaalemu,
na Aana omunyamurwa omukuru na Kayaafa na Yohaana na Alegizanda, n'abandi boona ab'omuryango gw'omunyamurwa omukuru.
Ku baaherize kubeemereza ahagati, baababuuza bati: Ni bushoboorozi ki, nari n'iziina ki, ebyabakoresa eki?
Petero, aijwire Omwoyo Orikwera, yaabagarukamu ati: Imwe abategyeki b'abantu n'abakuru,
ku turaabe nitubuuzibwa hati ahabw'ekirungi eki tukoreire omuntu ogwo ekirema, n'ekimukirize,

imwe mwena n'abantu boona Abaisraeli mumanye ngu omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareesi, ou mwabambire aha musharaba, kandi ou Ruhanga yaazoire omu bafu, ahabw'Ogwo omushaija ogu ayemereire omu maisho gaanyu akizire.
Yesu ogwo niwe ibaare imwe abombeki eri mwayangire, eryahindukire obuhamizo bw'enju.
Kandi tihariho ondiijo ou twakuboneramu okujunwa, ahakuba tihariho rindi iziina ahansi y'eiguru eryahairwe abantu, erishemereire kutujuna.
Ku baareebire obumanzi bwa Petero na Yohaana, haza nibamanya ku bari abantu babisi abateegyesiibwe, baatangaara; bwanyima baijuka ku baabaire batuura na Yesu.
Kandi ku baareebire omushaija ogwo okizire ayemereire hamwe nabo, baabura oku baraabahakanise.
Ku baaherize kubaragiira kushohora aheeru y'eishengyero, baahanuura bonka,
nibagira bati: Abashaija aba tubagire tuta? Abantu boona abatwire Yerusaalemu nibamanya ku bakozire eky'okutangaaza ekirangainwe, kandi naitwe titurikubaasa kukyehakana.
Mbwenu okukizibira kubuga omu bantu, murekye tubakangise, okuruga hati batagira omuntu ou baagaruka kugambira omu iziina eryo.
Nikwo kubeeta, bakabeehanangiriza kutagaruka kuteeza n'obu kwakuba okwegyesa omu iziina rya Yesu.
Kwonka Petero na Yohaana baagarukamu, nibabagira bati: Ku kiraabe kihikire omu maisho ga Ruhanga kuhurira imwe okukira Ruhanga, naimwe mukireebe;
kwonka itwe titurikubaasa kuhunama kutagamba ebi twareebire, n'ebi twahuriire.
Ku baaherize kugaruka kubakangisa, baabarekura, ahabw'okuba bakabura oku baraabahane ahabw'okutiina abantu; ahakuba boona bakaba nibahimbisa Ruhanga ahabw'ekyo ekikozirwe.
Kandi omushaija ogwo, owaakoreirwe eky'okutangaaza ekyo eky'okukizibwa, akaba ahingwize emyaka makumi ana.
Ku baarekwirwe, baagyenda baashanga bagyenzi baabo, baabatekyerereza byona ebi abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu baabagambira.
Ku baabihuriire, baimutsya amaraka gaabo ahari Ruhanga n'omutima gumwe, nibagira bati: Mukama waitu, niiwe owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja n'ebirimu byona;
kandi okagambira omu kanwa ka tatenkuriitwe Daudi, omugaragwa waawe, naagambisibwa Omwoyo Orikwera ati:
N'enki ekyajagaraize Abanyamahanga,
N'amahanga nigateekateekyera ki ebitaine mugasho?
Abagabe b'ensi bakatenga orugamba,
N'abategyeki bakeeteerana hamwe
Kurwanisa Mukama na
N'eky'amazima omu rurembo oru Heroode na Pontio Pilaato hamwe n'abanyamahanga n'enganda za Israeli bakeeteerana kurwanisa Omuheereza waawe orikwera Yesu, ou waashukireho amajuta,
ngu bahikiirize ebi waamaririire ira omu bwengye bwawe kukora n'omukono gwawe.
Hati mbwenu, Mukama waitu, reeba okukangisa kwabo, obaasise abahuuku baawe kugamba ekigambo kyawe n'obumanzi bwona,
iwe ogoroire omukono gwawe kukiza, haza obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bikorwe omu iziina ry'Omuheereza waawe orikwera Yesu.
Ku baaherize kushaba, omwanya ogu baabaire bateeraniiremu gwatengyeta; boona baijura Omwoyo Orikwera, baagamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obumanzi.
Abo boona abaikiriize bakaba baine omutima gumwe n'enaama emwe; omuribo tihariho owaabaire aine obunyakantu aha bintu bye, bakaba nibakwatirana omu bintu byabo byona.
Kandi entumwa zikagira amaani maingi g'okuhamya okuzooka kwa Mukama waitu Yesu; n'embabazi nyingi zaabagumaho boona.
Omuribo tihaine owaabaire aine eki akyenire, ahabw'okuba abaabaire baine ebibanja nari amaju bakabitunda, baareeta empiiha ezaabirugiremu,
baazita aha bigyere by'entumwa; baazibabaganisiza nk'okwetunga kwa buri muntu oku kwabaire kuri.
Na Yosefu, ou entumwa zaayetsire Barunaba, amakuru ngu, Omwana w'Okwezirikisa, Omuleevi enzaarwa ya Kupuro,
akaba aine omusiri, yaagutunda, yaareeta empiiha, yaazita aha bigyere by'entumwa.
Kwonka omushaija orikwetwa Anania n'omukazi we Safira baatunda ekibanja;
yaayetsigariza ekicweka ky'obuguzi bwakyo, n'omukazi we naakimanya, yaareeta ekyatsigaireho, yaakita aha bigyere by'entumwa.
Petero yaagira ati: Beitu Anania, ahabw'enki Sitaane aijwire omutima gwawe okubeiha Omwoyo Orikwera, okeetsigariza ekicweka ky'obuguzi bw'ekibanja?

Otakakitundize, kikaba kitari kyawe? Hoona na waaherize kukitunda, obuguzi bwakyo tiburagumire omu bushoboorozi bwawe? N'enki ekikuteekateekyeise omu mutima gwawe okukora otyo? Tobeihire bantu, obeihire Ruhanga.
Anania, ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, yaagwa ahansi, yaafa. Boona abaakihuriire baakwatwa obwoba bwingi.
Abatsigazi baimuka, baamuzinga, baamutwara, baamuziika.
Ku haahingwireho omwanya gw'eshaaha nka ishatu, omukazi we yaija ataine ki arikumanya.
Petero yaamubuuza ati: Ngambira; obuguzi obu nibwo mwatunzire omu kibanja? Yaamugarukamu ati: Eego, nibwo obwo.
Petero yaamugira ati: Ahabw'enki mwaikirizaine kugyeza Omwoyo wa Mukama? Hurira emitsindo y'abarikuruga kuziika baro, bari aha rwigi, naiwe bakushohoze.
Ahonaaho yaagwa ahansi aha bigyere bye, yaakinuka. Abatsigazi abo, ku baataahiremu, baashanga yaafiire, baamushohoza aheeru, baamuziika aha rubaju rwa iba.
Obwoba bwingi bwakwata ekanisa yoona, na boona abaabihuriire.
Aha bandi tihariho n'omwe owaayehangire kuteerana nabo; kwonka abantu boona bakaba babahimbisa munonga;
n'abaikiriize baingi, abashaija n'abakazi, baayeyongyera munonga kukanya, nibeehongyera Mukama;
n'okutwara batwara abarwaire baabo, babarambika omu nguuto aha bitanda n'omu ngozi, ngu abamwe aharibo bakaahikwaho ekinyimanyimi kya Petero yaaba naahingura.
Kandi abantu baaruga omuri tauni eziri haihi na Yerusaalemu, baateeranira aho, bareetsire abarwaire n'abariho baadaimoni; boona baatambirwa.
Bwanyima omunyamurwa omukuru yaimuka n'abo abu yaabaire aine, ab'omu kicweka ky'Abasadukaayo, baijwire eihari;
baakwata entumwa, baazita omu kihome zoona.
Kwonka nyekiro, maraika wa Mukama yaigura enyigi z'ekihome, yaabashohoza aheeru, yaagira ati:
Mugyende mwemerere omuri hekalu, mugambire abantu ebigambo byona eby'Amagara aga.

Ku baakihuriire, baataaha omuri hekalu omu kasheeshe, baayegyesa. Ku baabaire bakiriyo, omunyamurwa omukuru yaija hamwe n'abo abu yaabaire aine, yaateerana eishengyero n'abakuru boona b'Abaisraeli, yaatuma omu kihome kubareeta.
Abakuru b'abaserukare ku baahikireyo, tibaabashangamu, baagaruka, baabamanyisa, bati:
Ekihome twashanga kikingirwe gye buzima, n'abarinzi beemereire aha nyigi; kwonka ku twaiguraho, titwashangamu muntu.
Omurinzi wa hekalu n'abanyamurwa abakuru ku baahuriire ebigambo ebyo, baashoberwa munonga, baayebuuza ahu biraagarukire.
Omu mwanya ogwo haija omuntu yaabagambira ati: Reeba, abashaija abo abu mutaire omu kihome, beemereire omuri hekalu nibeegyesa abantu.
Omurinzi ogwo hamwe n'abakuru b'abaserukare nikwo kugyenda bakabareeta, batarikubaita kubi, ahakuba bakaba nibatiina abantu ngu batabateera amabaare.
Ku baabahikize aho, baabeemereza omu maisho g'eishengyero, omunyamurwa omukuru yaababuuza ati:
Titurabeehanangiririize kimwe kutagaruka kwegyesa omu iziina eryo? Mbwenu reeba mwijwize Yerusaalemu okwegyesa kwanyu. Nimwenda ngu eshagama y'ogwo mushaija etutukurire?
Petero n'ezindi ntumwa baagarukamu bati: Tushemereire kworobera Ruhanga okukira abantu.
Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe akazoora Yesu ou mwaitsire muhanikire aha muti.
Ogwo Ruhanga akamutembya, yaamuta aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo, ngu abe Omwebembezi mukuru kandi Omujuni, okuhaisa Abaisraeli okweteisa n'okusaasirwa ebibi.
Itwe turi baakareebi b'ebyo hamwe n'Omwoyo Orikwera ou Ruhanga yaahaire abarikumworobera.
Kwonka omu ishengyero hakaba harimu Omufarisaayo orikwetwa Gamalieli omwegyesa w'Ebiragiro, owaabaire ari ow'ekitiinisa omu bantu boona; yaayemerera, yaaragiira kushohoza entumwa omwanya mukye.
Yaabagira ati: Imwe bashaija ba Israeli 'mwe, mwerinde; ebi murikwenda kukora aba bantu, mubigyendeho mpora.

Nimumanya ngu omu biro bihingwire, hakaimuka omushaija orikwetwa Teuda, yaayegambaho ku ari omuntu mukuru; kandi abantu nka magana ana baakwatanisa nawe; kwonka omushaija ogwo akaitwa, n'abaamukuratiire boona baataataana, baahwaho.
Bwanyima y'ogwo omu biro by'okwehandiikisa, hakaimuka Yuda owa Galilaaya, yaagomesa abantu baingi, baamukuratira; kwonka nawe yaitwa, n'abaamukuratiire boona baataataana.
Mbwenu hati nimbagambira nti: Eby'aba bantu mubyetantare, mubarekye; ahakuba enaama egi nari omurimo ogu ku biraabe biri eby'abantu, biryahwerekyerera;
kwonka ku biraabe biri ebya Ruhanga, timuribaasa kubihwerekyereza; mwerinde mutakaareebeka nimurwanisa Ruhanga.
Batyo baikiriza obwengye obu yaabaha; baayeta entumwa, baaziteera; baazeehanangiriza kutagaruka kugamba omu iziina rya Yesu, baazirekura.
Zityo zaaruga omu maisho g'eishengyero, nizishemererwa ahabw'okuheebwa ekitiinisa eky'okuhemurwa niziturwa eiziina rya Yesu.
Kandi ebiro byona, omuri hekalu n'omu maka gaabo tibararekire kwegyesa bya Yesu n'okubuurira abantu ku ari Kristo.
Bari ikumi na babiri baayeta omutwe gwona ogw'abeegi, baagira bati: Tikihikire itwe kurereera kugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga ahabw'okugabura.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, mutoorane omuriimwe abashaija mushanju abarikusiimwa, abaijwire Omwoyo n'obwengye, abu turaahe omurimo ogu.
Reero itwe nitwija kwezirikira okushaba n'okuheereza ekigambo kya Ruhanga.

Ekigambo ekyo kyasiimwa omutwe gwona; baatoorana Stefano, omushaija oijwire okwikiriza n'Omwoyo Orikwera, na Filipo, na Porokoro, na Nikanoori, na Timoni, na Pamena, na Nikola owa Antiokia, owaahindukiire omu diini y'Abayudaaya.
Baabeemereza omu maisho g'entumwa; ku baaherize kushaba, baabataho engaro.
Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongyera kubuga; omubaro gw'abeegi gwakanya munonga omuri Yerusaalemu; kandi abanyamurwa baingi baayorobera okwikiriza.
Kandi Stefano, aijwire embabazi n'obushoboorozi, yaakora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bikuru omu bantu.
Kwonka bamwe ab'omuri
Kwonka tibaabaasa kusinga obwengye n'Omwoyo ebyabaire nibumugambisa.
Nikwo kuguriirira abantu, abaagizire bati: Tukahurira naagamba ebigambo by'okurogota ahari Musa n'ahari Ruhanga
Baayosya abantu n'abakuru baabo n'abahandiiki, baamugurukira, baamukwata, baamutwara omu maisho g'eishengyero.
Baataho baakareebi ab'ebishuba, abaagizire bati: Omushaija ogu tayosha kugamba kubi aha mwanya ogu ogurikwera n'aha Biragiro;
ahakuba tukahurira naagira ati: Yesu ogwo owa Nazareesi aryahwerekyereza omwanya ogu, ahindure emigyenzo ei Musa yaatuhaire.
Boona abaabaire bashutami omu ishengyero, ku baamutaireho amaisho, baareeba ahamaisho ge nihashusha aha maraika.
Omunyamurwa omukuru yaamubuuza ati: Ebyo nikwo biri bityo?
Stefano yaagira ati:
Beene waitu kandi baataata, muhurire. Ruhanga ow'ekitiinisa akabonekyera tatenkuriitwe Abrahamu, akiri Mesopotamia, atakatwire Harani;
yaamuragiira ati: Ruga omu nsi y'owaanyu n'omuri beene waanyu, oze omu nsi ei ndikworeka.
Nawe nikwo kuruga omu nsi y'Abakaludaaya, akatuura Harani. Bwanyima ishe ku yaafiire, Ruhanga yaamwihayo, yaamutaasya omu nsi egi, ei mutwiremu na hati mbwenu.
Kwonka taragimuhairemu butaka, nangwa n'obu haakuba ah'okuta ekigyere; kureka akaraganisa kugimuha okuba obutaka bwe n'obw'abaana be bwanyima ye, n'obu araabe yaabaire ataine mwana.
Kandi Ruhanga yaagira ati: Oruzaaro rwe ruryashuhuukira omu nsi y'abandi; abo baryabagira abahuuku, bamare emyaka magana ana nibabategyeka kubi.
Eihanga eryo eriribahindura abahuuku, nyowe Ruhanga ndyaricwera orubanja; bwanyima y'ebyo baryarugayo, bandamize omu mwanya ogu.
Atyo yaamuha endagaano y'okusharwa; n'ahabw'ekyo Abrahamu ku yaazaire Isaaka, yaamushara aha kiro kya munaana; na Isaaka yaazaara Yakobo, na Yakobo yaazaara baatatenkuriitwe ikumi na babiri.
Baatatenkuriitwe abo baagirira Yosefu eihari, baamutunda omu nsi ya Misri; kwonka Ruhanga yaaguma nawe,
yaamwiha omu kubonabona kwe kwona, yaamuha okukundwa Faraho omugabe wa Misri n'okuba omunyabwengye omu maisho ge; Faraho ogwo yaamuhindura omutegyeki wa Misri n'ekikaari kye kyona.
Kwonka Yakobo, ku yaahuriire ngu Misri hariyo engano, yaatumayo baatatenkuriitwe omurindi gw'okubanza.
Aha murundi gwa kabiri Yosefu yaayemanyisa bakuru be; na Faraho yaamanyira aho oruganda rwa Yosefu.
Yosefu nikwo kutuma ahari Yakobo ishe, akamweta na beene waabo boona, abantu makumi mushanju na bataano.
Yakobo yaashuuma, yaaza Misri; okwo niyo yaagwire, na baatatenkuriitwe;
emitumbi yaabo yaatwarwa Shekemu, yaaziikwa omu kituuro eki Abrahamu yaaguzire n'efeeza ahari batabani ba Hamori owa Shekemu.
Kwonka obunaku bw'endagaano ei Ruhanga yaaraganiise Abrahamu ku bwahikire, Abaisraeli baakanya, baaba baingi omuri Misri,
okuhitsya obu haayemire omugabe ondiijo, owaabaire atarikumanya Yosefu.
Ogwo yaacwa obwengye bw'okuteera aha mutwe eihanga ryaitu, yaagyema baatatenkuriitwe kunaga abaana baabo, ngu batagumaho.
Omu bunaku obwo Musa yaazaarwa, kandi akaba ari murungi munonga; yaarererwa omu nju ya ishe okumara ameezi ashatu.
Ku yaanagirwe, muhara wa Faraho yaamutwara, yaamworora nk'omwana we.
Musa yaayegyesibwa obwengye bwona obw'Abanyamisri; yaaba ow'amaani omu bigambo bye n'omu bi yaabaire naakora.
Ku yaahikize emyaka makumi ana, yaizirwa ekitekateeko ky'okutaayaayira beene ishe Abaisraeli.
Ku yaareebire omwe aharibo naaturwa busha, yaamurwanaho, yaamuhoorera, yaita Omunyamisri.
Yaagira ngu beene ishe bakaayetegyereza ku Ruhanga arikwenda kubajunisa omukono gwe; kwonka bo tibaakimanya.
Ku bwaseesire, yaashanga babiri nibarwana, yaayenda ngu abaramure abateerane, yaabagira ati: Bashaija 'mwe, ahabw'enki nimukorana kubi, haza muri ab'oruganda rumwe?
Ogwo owaabaire naashaagiza mugyenzi we, yaatsindika Musa naagira ati: N'oha owaakugizire omutegyeki kandi omuramuzi waitu?
Nooyenda kuunyita, nk'oku oitsire Omunyamisri nyomwabazyo?
Ahabw'ekigambo ekyo Musa yaahunga, yaatuura omu nsi ya Midiani nk'omugyenyi, ei yaazaariire abatabani babiri.
Musa ku yaagureebire, yaagutangaarira; ku yairiire haihi kureeba, eiraka rya Mukama ryamugira riti:
Ndi Ruhanga wa baashwenkuru, Ruhanga wa Abrahamu, owa Isaaka, kandi owa Yakobo. Musa yaatetema, yaatiina kugumyayo amaisho.
Mukama yaamugira ati: Iha enkaito omu bigyere, ahakuba omwanya ogu oyemereiremu n'ogurikwera.
Buzimazima ndeebire okubonabonesibwa kw'abantu bangye abari omuri Misri, naahurira okutsinda kwabo; mbwenu nshuumire kubajuna. N'ahabw'ekyo ija hati, nkutume Misri.
Ku yaaherize kukora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso omuri Misri, yaabaihayo, yaagumizamu naabikora aha Nyanja erikutukura, n'omu ihamba omu myaka makumi ana.
Kandi Musa ogwo niwe yaaraguriire Abaisraeli ati: Ruhanga aryabaimukiza nabi omuri beene waanyu, nk'oku yaanyimukize.

Hoona niwe yaabaire ari ahagati y'omutwe gw'abantu omu ihamba, ari hamwe na maraika owaamugambiriire aha rushozi Sinai, kandi ari hamwe na baatatenkuriitwe; niwe yaahairwe ebigambo by'amagara ngu abituhe.
Baatatenkuriitwe baayanga kumworobera, baamutsindika kuriya, kandi omu mitima yaabo baahinduka, baagaruka Misri
baagambira Arooni bati: Otukorere baaruhanga, batwebembere; ahakuba Musa ogwo owaatwihire omu nsi ya Misri, titurikumanya oku abaire.
Omu biro ebyo baaheesha ekishushani ky'enyana, baakihongyera ekitambo, baashemerererwa emirimo y'emikono yaabo.

Ruhanga nikwo kuhinduka, akabareka ngu baramye eihe ry'omu iguru, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabo kya baanabi, ngu: Imwe ab'oruganda rwa Israeli, amatungo n'ebitambo ebi mwatambiire omu ihamba emyaka egyo makumi ana, nimugira ngu niinye mwabitambiire?
Ngaaha; omu mazima ebi mwabaire nimuheeka n'eihema rya Moloki, n'enyonyoozi ya ruhanga Refani, ebishushani ebi mwayekoreire kuramya. Naanye ndyabatwara, mbarengyeze Babulooni.
Baatatenkuriitwe bakaba baine eihema ry'Ebirikuhamya omu ihamba, nk'Owaagambiire Musa oku yaamuragiire kurikora naarishushanisa n'ekishushani eki yaareebire.

Eihema eryo niryo baatatenkuriitwe baahairwe baishebo, bakaritaasya omu nsi egi, obu baija na Yoshua, bakakubuura ensi y'Abanyamahanga abu Ruhanga yaabingire omu maisho gaabo okuhitsya aha busingye bwa Daudi.
Daudi ogwo, ku yaatungire obuganzi omu maisho ga Ruhanga, yaashaba kwikirizibwa kusherurira Ruhanga wa Yakobo ah'okutuura.
Kwonka Sulemaani niwe yaamwombekyeire enju.
Haza Rukira-boona atatuura mu maju agombekirwe emikono, nk'oku nabi yaagizire ati:
Eiguru nikyo kitebe kyangye ky'obukama,
N'ensi n'akatebe k'ebigyere byangye.
Ni nju ki ei muriinyombekyera? Nikwo Mukama arikubuuza.
Nari shi ni mwanya ki ogu ndihuumuriramu?
Omukono gwangye tigwo gwahangire ebyo byona?
Ni nabi ki ou baashwenkuriimwe batarahiigire? Bakaita abo abaarangire okwija kw'Ogwo ohikiriire; mbwenu naimwe mukamureebya, mwamwita,
imwe abaahairwe Ebiragiro nk'oku byaragiirwe baamaraika, haza mutabyorobere.
Ku baahuriire ebyo, baagira ekiniga kingi, baamunenera amaino.
Kwonka we, aijwire Omwoyo Orikwera, yaagumya amaisho ge ahaiguru, yaareeba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga, na Yesu ayemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo rwa Ruhanga;
yaagira ati: Reeba, nindeeba eiguru rikinguukire, n'Omwana w'omuntu ayemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo rwa Ruhanga.
Baayomba munonga, baayekwata aha matu, baamweshukaho;
baamutsindika aheeru y'orurembo, baamuteera amabaare; kandi baamushinja baatambika ebijwaro byabo aha bigyere by'omutsigazi orikwetwa Saulo.
Okwo nikwo baateire Stefano amabaare, naashaba naagira ati: Mukama wangye Yesu, yakiira omwoyo gwangye.
Yaatsimba amaju, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Mukama wangye, otabatura ekibi eki. Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaagwejegyera.
Kandi Saulo akasiima okwitwa kwe. Aha izooba eryo baatandika kuhiiga munonga ekanisa y'omuri Yerusaalemu; boona baataataanira omu byanga bya Buyudaaya na Samaria, okwihaho entumwa zonka.
Abashaija abarikutiina Ruhanga baaziika Stefano, baamucurira munonga.
Kwonka Saulo we yaaguma naashiisha ekanisa, naataaha omuri buri nju, naakwata abashaija n'abakazi, naabata omu kihome.
N'ahabw'ekyo abaataataine baagyenda boona nibabuurira ekigambo.
Filipo yaashuuma, yaaza omu rurembo rwa Samaria, yaababuurira Kristo.
Emitwe mingi y'abantu, ku baabaire bahurira ebi Filipo arikugamba, baareeba obumanyiso obu arikukora, baabiikiriza n'omutima gumwe.
Ahabw'okuba baingi aharibo abaabaire bariho baadaimoni, baadaimoni bakaba babarugaho nibaamuza munonga; kandi baingi abaabaire bazingazingirwe, n'abaremaire, bakizibwa.
Haabaho okushemererwa kwingi omu rurembo orwo.
Kandi hakaba hariho omushaija orikwetwa Simooni, owaabaire akora eby'obufumu omu rurembo orwo, naatangaaza eihanga ry'Abasamaria, naayeyeta omuntu mukuru.
Abantu boona, okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru, bakaba bamutiina, nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu niwe naani ga Ruhanga ageetwa Rugambwa.
Bakaba bamutiina, ahabw'okuba akaba amazire omwanya muhango naabatangaaza n'obufumu bwe.
Kwonka ku baikiriize Filipo owaababuuriire ebigambo birungi eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'eiziina rya Yesu Kristo, baabatizibwa, abashaija n'abakazi.
Kandi Simooni nawe yaikiriza; ku yaaherize kubatizibwa, yaaguma na Filipo; ku yaareebire naakora obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bikuru, yaatangaara munonga.
Kandi entumwa ezaabaire ziri Yerusaalemu, ku zaahuriire ngu aba Samaria baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga, zaabatumaho Petero na Yohaana.
Nabo, ku baahikireyo, baabashabira ngu baheebwe Omwoyo Orikwera;
ahakuba Omwoyo akaba atakaizire aha muntu weena omuribo, kureka bakaba babatiziibwe omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Ahonaaho Petero na Yohaana baabataho engaro, baaheebwa Omwoyo Orikwera.
Simooni, ku yaareebire baaheebwa Omwoyo Orikwera ahabw'okuteebwaho engaro z'entumwa, yaazireetera empiiha,
naagira ati: Naanye mumpe amaani aga, weena ou ndaateho engaro aheebwe Omwoyo Orikwera.
Kwonka Petero yaamugarukamu ati: Efeeza yaawe ebure naiwe, ahabw'okuba waateekateeka kugura ekiconco kya Ruhanga n'empiiha.
Toine mugabo n'obu kwakuba okukwatanisa naitwe omu kigambo eki; ahabw'okuba omutima gwawe tiguri gye mu maisho ga Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyeteise obubi bwawe obu, oshabe Mukama, shana akaakusaasira ekiteekateeko ky'omu mutima gwawe.
Nindeeba ku ori omu ndurwe erikushaarira n'omu nkomo z'obubi.
Simooni yaagarukamu naagira ati: Munshabire ahari Mukama, byona ebi mwagamba bitampikaho.
Bwanyima entumwa, ku zaaherize kuhamya ekigambo kya Mukama n'okukigamba, zaagaruka Yerusaalemu, nizibuurira engiri omu birorero bingi eby'Abasamaria.
Maraika wa Mukama yaagambira Filipo ati: Imuka ogyende, otoore omuhanda gw'eihamba ogw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo ogurikushuuma, okuruga Yerusaalemu okuhika Gaaza.

Yaimuka, yaagyenda. Kandi hakaba hariho omushaija omukonwa owa Esiopia, ow'obushoboorozi bwingi, obu yaahairwe Kandake, omugabekazi wa Esiopia, owaabaire ari omubiiki w'ebintu bye byona; ogwo akaba agiire Yerusaalemu kuramya.
Ku yaabaire naagaruka owaabo, ashutami omu kigaari kye, naashoma ekitabo kya nabi Isaaya,
Omwoyo yaagambira Filipo, ati: Hika ekigaari kiriya, ogyende nakyo.
Filipo yairuka, yaamuhika, yaahurira naashoma omu kitabo kya nabi Isaaya, yaamubuuza ati: Nooshoborokyerwa ebi orikushoma?
Yaamugarukamu ati: Nimbaasa nta, ntaine w'okunshobororera? Yaashaba Filipo ngu atembe omu kigaari, ashutame nawe.
Kandi ekicweka eky'omu Byahandiikirwe eki yaabaire naashoma, kikaba kiri eki ngu:
Akatwarwa kwitwa nk'entaama,
Kandi nk'omwana gw'entaama oku gucureera omu maisho g'omukyemuzi waagwo,
Nikwo ataraashamize kanwa ke.
Omu kugarurwa ahansi kwe bakamwitira orubanja;
Oruganda rwe n'oha orirushoboorora?
Ahakuba amagara ge gakaihwa omu nsi.
Omukonwa yaabuuza Filipo naagira ati: Ninkushaba onshobororere, nabi ogwo akagamba ahari oha? Akeegambaho, nari akagamba aha muntu ondiijo?
Filipo yaatandika kugamba naihirira aha Byahandiikirwe ebyo, yaamugambira ebya Yesu.
Filipo yaamugira ati: Ku oraabe waikiriza n'omutima gwawe gwona, nikibaasika. Yaagarukamu ati: Niinyikiriza ku Yesu Kristo ari Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Atyo yaaragiira ku beemereza ekigaari; bombi Filipo n'omukonwa baashuuma omu maizi; yaamubatiza.
Ku baarugire omu maizi, Omwoyo wa Mukama yaatwara Filipo, omukonwa tiyaagaruka kumureeba; kureka yaagumizamu, yaagyenda ashemereirwe.
Kwonka Filipo we yaashangwa Azooto; bwanyima yaagyenda naabuurira engiri omuri tauni zoona okuhitsya obu yaahikire Kaisarea.
yaamushaba kuhandiikira sinagogi za Damasiko ebaruha ngu, ku araashangyeyo abarikwikiriza eby'Omuhanda ogwo, yaaba abashaija nari abakazi, abatware Yerusaalemu babohirwe.
Ku yaabaire naakigyenda, yaahika haihi na Damasiko, omushana ogurikuruga omu iguru gwamujwera gumwehinguririize,
yaagwa ahansi, yaahurira eiraka nirimugira riti: Saulo, Saulo, nompiigira ki?
Yaagarukamu ati: Ori oha, Mukama wangye? We ati: Niinye Yesu ou orikuhiiga.
Yaatetema ashobeirwe, yaabuuza ati: Mukama wangye, nooyenda ngu ngire nta? Mukama yaamugarukamu ati: Imuka, otaahe omu rurembo, noija kugambirwa ebi oshemereire kukora.
Abashaija abaabire nibagyenda nawe baayemerera bahunami, nibahurira eiraka, kwonka batarikureeba muntu.
Saulo yaimuka ahansi; ku yaabuurwire amaisho, tiyaahweza kintu; baamukwata omukono, baamutwara Damasiko.
Yaamarayo ebiro bishatu atarikuhweza, kandi atarikurya n'obu kwakuba okunywa.
Kandi Damasiko hakaba hariyo omwegi orikwetwa Anania. Mukama waitu yaamugambira omu kworekwa ati: Anania! Yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi aha, Mukama wangye.
Mukama waitu yaamugira ati: Imuka oze omu muhanda ogurikwetwa Ogugororokire, obuuze omu nju ya Yuda omuntu orikwetwa Saulo owa Taruso; ahakuba hati naashaba.
Kandi areebire omu kworekwa omushaija orikwetwa Anania naija kumutaho engaro ngu ahumuukye.
Kwonka Anania yaagarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, nkahurira baingi nibagamba aha mushaija ogwo, ku yaakozire kubi munonga abarikwera baawe omuri Yerusaalemu;
na mbwenu aha aine obushoboorozi, obu aihire aha banyamurwa abakuru, kuboha boona abarikwikiriza eiziina ryawe.
Kwonka Mukama yaamugira ati: Irooko ogyende; ahakuba omushaija ogwo n'ekintu kyangye eki ntooraine okutwara eiziina ryangye omu maisho g'Abanyamahanga n'abagabe n'Abaisraeli;
naanye ndyamworeka obusaasi bwingi obu ashemereire kwemera ahabw'eiziina ryangye.

Anania nikwo kugyenda, akataaha omu nju egyo; akamutaho engaro, akamugira ati: Ow'eishe-emwe Saulo, Mukama waitu Yesu, okweyorekyeire omu muhanda ogu oreetsirwemu, yantuma ngu ohumuukye, oijure Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ahonaaho ebintu ebiri nk'ebikoko byamuruga aha maisho, yaahumuuka; yaayemerera, yaabatizibwa.
Ku yaaherize kurya eby'okurya, yaagarukwamu amaani. Bwanyima yaamara ebiro bikye n'abeegi Damasiko.
Ahonaaho yaatandika kugamba Yesu omuri sinagogi, ku ari Omwana wa Ruhanga.

Boona abaamuhuriire baatangaara nibagira bati: Ogu t'omushaija owaabaire anyangaraza aba Yerusaalemu abaabaire batakira eiziina eryo? Kandi ekyo nikyo kibaire kimureetsire n'aha, ngu abatware babohirwe omu maisho g'abanyamurwa abakuru.
Kwonka Saulo yaayeyongyera kutunga amaani, yaakwatsa enshoni Abayudaaya abaabaire batwire Damasiko, naahamiza kimwe ku Yesu ari Kristo.
kwonka enaama yaabo Saulo yaagimanya. Baamugwera aha marembo nyomushana na nyekiro, ngu bamwite;
kwonka abeegi be baamucwisa nyekiro, baamurengyeza aha rugo rw'amabaare, baamushuumiza omu kitukuru.
Ku yaahikire Yerusaalemu, yaateeraho kwehitsya abeegi; kwonka boona baamutiina, tibaikiriza ku ari omwegi.
Kwonka Barunaba yaamutwara, yaamuhitsya entumwa, yaabashobororera oku yaareebire Mukama akiri omu muhanda, Mukama akagamba nawe, kandi n'oku yaabuuriire n'obumanzi omu iziina rya Yesu omuri Damasiko.
Yaaguma naataayaayira ab'omuri Yerusaalemu,
naabuurira n'obumanzi omu iziina rya Mukama. Kandi yaahakanisa Abahelenesti; nabo baasherura oku baraamwite.
Ab'eishe-emwe ku baakimanyire, baamutwara Kaisarea, baamwohereza Taruso.
N'ahabw'ekyo ekanisa y'omuri Buyudaaya yoona na Galilaaya na Samaria yaagira obusingye yahamibwa; abantu baayeyongyera kukanya nibagyendera omu kutiina Mukama, bahangainwe Omwoyo Orikwera.
Omu biro ebyo Petero, ku yaabaire naataayaayira hoona, yaashuuma, yaataayaayira n'abarikwera abaabaire batwire Luuda.
Yaashangayo omushaija orikwetwa Ainea, owaabaire amazire emyaka munaana abyami aha kitanda ahabw'okuzingazingwa.
Petero yaamugira ati: Ainea, Yesu Kristo yaakutambira; imuka, oyeyarire. Ahonaaho yaimuka.
Abaabaire batwire Luuda na Sharooni boona ku baamureebire, baahindukira Mukama.
Omuri Yoopa hakaba harimu omwegi orikwetwa Tabisa, amakuru gaaryo ni Doruka, nari Esirabo; omukazi ogwo akaba akora emirimo mingi mirungi n'eby'embabazi eby'okuhwera abooro.
Omu biro ebyo akarwara, yaafa. Ku baaherize kwozya omutumbi gwe, baagubyamya omuri kanyinaibiri.
Kandi ahabwa Luuda kuba haihi na Yoopa, abeegi ku baahuriire ngu Petero niyo ari, baamutumaho abashaija babiri, baamweshengyereza nibagira bati: Orahukye, oije otureebe.
Petero yaimuka, yaagyenda nabo. Ku yaahikireyo, baamutembya omuri kanyinaibiri; n'abafaakazi boona baija, baamwemerera haihi nibarira, nibooreka amakanzu n'ebijwaro ebi Doruka yaakozire akiriho.
Petero yaabashohoza, yaatsimba amaju, yaashaba; yaahindukira omutumbi, yaagira ati: Tabisa, imuka. Yaabuuruura amaisho; ku yaareebire Petero yaashutama.
Petero yaamuha omukono, yaamwimutsya, yaayeta abarikwera n'abafaakazi, yaamubooreka ahuriire.
Ekyo kyamanywa omuri Yoopa yoona; baingi baikiriza Mukama.
Bwanyima yaamara ebiro bingi omuri Yoopa omu nju ya Simooni omuhazi w'empu.
akaba ari omunyadiini, orikutiina Ruhanga hamwe n'ab'omu ka ye boona, owaabaire ahwera abooro n'ebintu bye bingi, kandi naashaba Ruhanga obutoosha.
Eizooba rimwe aha shaaha nk'eya mwenda akareeba maraika wa Ruhanga omu kworekwa naija ah'ari, yaamugira ati: Koruneelio.
We yaamuhanga amaisho aine obwoba, yaamubuuza ati: N'enki, Mukama wangye? Yaamugarukamu ati: Okushaba kwawe n'obuhwezi bwawe bitembire okuba ekiijutsyo ahari Ruhanga.
Mbwenu tuma abashaija Yoopa, beeteyo omuntu Simooni orikwetwa Petero,
orikuraara owa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, enju ye eri aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Maraika owaabarize nawe ku yaagyenzire, Koruneelio yaatuma abambari be babiri, n'omuserukare omunyadiini w'omuri abo abaabaire bamuheereza obutoosha;
ku yaaherize kubateekyerereza byona, yaabatuma Yoopa.
Omu kasheeshe, abo abaatumirwe ku baabaire bahika haihi na tauni egyo, bakiri omu rugyendo rwabo, Petero yaatembas aha utwe gw'enju kushaba aha shaaha nk'eya muakaga;
yaagira enjara, yaayenda kurya; ku baabaire nibaihura, yaaba nk'orikuroota;
yaareeba eiguru rikinguukire, n'ekintu ekirikushusha nk'omwenda muhango munonga, ogukwatsirwe aha nshonda ina, nikishuuma ahansi,
kirimu enganda zoona z'enyamaishwa n'ebirikugyendesa enda n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya.
Yaahurira eiraka nirimugira riti: Petero, imuka, oite orye.
Kwonka Petero yaagira ati: Ngaaha, Mukama wangye; ahabw'okuba tinkaryaga kintu kyona ekirikuzira nari ekitashemeire.
Eiraka ryagaruka ryamugambira obwa kabiri riti: Eki Ruhanga yashemeize, otarikihindura ekirikuzira.
Ebyo byabaho bityo kashatu; ahonaaho ekintu ekyo kyagarurwa omu iguru.
Petero ku yaabaire arimbagiriirwe, akishobeirwe amakuru g'okworekwa okwo oku yaareeba, abashaija abo, abatumirwe Koruneelio, ku baaherize kuhabuza enju ya Simooni, baija, baayemerera aha irembo,
baayeta nibabuuza bati: Simooni orikwetwa Petero naaraara aha?
Petero ku yaabaire naakiteekateeka aha kworekwa, Omwoyo yaamugira ati: Reeba, abashaija bashatu nibakusherura;
imuka oshuume, ogyende nabo otarikubanganisa; ahakuba niinye naabatuma.
Petero nikwo kushuuma, akabahika, akabagira ati: Niinye ou murikusherura. Muhuutsirwe ki?

Baamugira bati: Koruneelio, omukuru w'abaserukare, omushaija ohikiriire, orikutiina Ruhanga, kandi orikusiimwa eihanga ry'Abayudaaya ryona, aragiirwe maraika orikwera kukweta kwija omu ka ye, ngu ahurire ebi oraamugambire.
Yaabataasya omu nju, yaabaraaza. Ku bwaseesire, Petero yaimuka, yaagyenda nabo hamwe n'ab'eishe-emwe bamwe aba Yoopa.
Aha kiro ekindi baataaha Kaisarea. Baashanga Koruneelio abategyereize n'abanywani be buzima.
Petero ku yaabaire naakitaaha, Koruneelio yaamubugana, yaamugwa aha bigyere, yaamuramya.
Kwonka Petero yaamwimutsya, naagira ati: Imuka; naanye ndi omuntu nkaiwe.
Ku yaabaire naakigamba nawe, yaataahamu, yaashanga baingi bateeraine;

yaabagira ati: Imwe nimumanya ku kizira Omuyudaaya okukwatanisa n'omuntu w'eihanga erindi, n'obu kwakuba kumutaayaayira; kwonka nyowe Ruhanga akaanyoreka ku ntashemereire kunuga muntu weena nari shi okumweta otashemeire.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ku nyetsirwe, tinaayanga kwija. Nikyo ndikubuuriza eki muunyeteire.

Koruneelio yaagira ati: Ebiro bina ebihingwire mbaire ninshabira omu nju yangye aha shaaha y'okushaba eya mwnea; ku mbaire ninshaba, naareeba omushaija anyemereire omumaisho, ajwaire ebijwaro ebirikwengyengyeta,
yaagira ati: Koruneelio, okushaba kwawe kuhuriirwe, n'obuhwezi bwawe bwijukirwe ahari Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo tuma Yoopa, oyeteyo Simooni orikwetwa Petero; hati naaraara omu nju ya Simooni omuhazi w'empu aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Ahonaaho naakutumaho; kandi naiwe waakora gye kwija. Mbwenu hati turi aha twena omu maisho ga Ruhanga okuhurira byona ebi oragiirwe Mukama.
kureka omu mahanga goona orikumutiina, akakora eby'okuhikiirira, ogwo niwe arikusiimwa.
Ekigambo ky'engiri y'obusingye obu tuhairwe ahabwa Yesu Kristo, (niwe Mukama wa boona,) Ruhanga akakyoherereza Abaisraeli.
Ekigambo ekyo naimwe nimukimanya, nikyo kyagambirwe omuri Buyudaaya yoona, okutandikira Galilaaya, bwanyima y'okubuurira kwa Yohaana okw'okubatiza;

nikigamba ebya Yesu owa Nazareesi, oku Ruhanga yaamushukireho Omwoyo Orikwera n'amaani, akagyendagyenda naakora ebirungi, naakiza boona abaabaire nibaitwa kubi Sitaane; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akaba ari hamwe nawe.
Naitwe turi baakareebi by'ebyo byona ebi yaakozire omu nsi y'Abayudaaya n'omuri Yerusaalemu. Yesu ogwo bakamwita, bamuhanikire aha muti;
kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora aha kiro kya kashatu yaamworeka butunu,
ti mu bantu boona, kureka ahari baakareebi, abaatoorainwe Ruhanga ira, nibo itwe abaariire kandi abaanyweire nawe aherize kuzooka omu bafu.
Bwanyima yaaturagiira kubuurira abantu, n'okuhamya ngu niwe ogwo ou Ruhanga yaataireho kuba Omucwi w'emanja z'abahuriire n'abafiire.
Ogwo niwe baanabi boona baahamize, ngu ahabw'eiziina rye omuntu weena orikumwikiriza naihwaho ebibi.
Petero ku yaabaire naakigamba ebigambo ebyo, Omwoyo Orikwera yaashuuma ahari boona abaabaire nibahurira ekigambo.
Abaikiriize ab'omu bashazirwe, abaizire na Petero boona, baatangaara ahabw'Abanyamahanga nabo kushukwaho ekiconco ky'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ahakuba bakabahurira nibagamba omu ndimi, nibahimbisa Ruhanga. Petero nikwo kubuuza ati:
Abantu aba abaaheebwa Omwoyo Orikwera nkaitwe, hariho orikubaasa kubaima amaizi ngu batabatizibwa?
Yaaragiira ngu babatizibwe omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo. Bwanyima baamweshengyereza kumarayo ebiro bikye.
Entumwa n'ab'eishe-emwe abaabaire bari Buyudaaya bakahurira ngu Abanyamahanga nabo baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Petero ku yaagarukire Yerusaalemu, ab'omu kigombe ky'abashazirwe baahakana nawe,
nibagira bati: Okataaha omu bantu abatashazirwe, kandi waarya nabo.
Petero yaatandika kubashobororera byona oku byakurataine, naagira ati:

Nyowe nkaba ndi omuri tauni Yoopa, ninshaba; naashusha nk'orikuroota, naayorekwa ekintu, ekirikushusha nk'omwenda muhango munonga ogukwatsirwe aha nshonda ina, nikishuuma okuruga omu iguru; kyampikaho.
Ku naakigumizeho amaisho, naayetegyereza, naareeba enyamaishwa z'omu nsi z'amaguru ana, n'endi z'abantu, n'ebirikugyendesa enda, n'ebirikuguruka omu mwanya.
Kandi naahurira n'eiraka eririkungambira riti: Petero, imuka oite orye.
Kwonka nyowe naagira nti: Ngaaha, Mukama wangye!, ahabw'okuba ekintu ekirikuzira nari ekitashemeire tikikahikaga mu kanwa kangye.
Kwonka eiraka ryangarukamu obwa kabiri, niriruga omu iguru riti: Eki Ruhanga yaashemeize, otarikihindura ekirikuzira.
Ekyo kyabaho kashatu; bwanyima byona byagarurwa omu iguru.
Omu shaaha egyo abashaija bashatu baayemerera omu maisho g'enju, ei twabaire turimu, batumirwe ahariinye nibaruga Kaisarea.
Omwoyo yandagiira kugyenda nabo ntarikubanganisa. Nikwo kugyenda n'ab'eishe-emwe mukaaga, tukataaha omu nju y'omushaija ogwo.
Nawe akatuteekyerereza oku yaareebire maraika ayemereire omu nju ye, naagira ati: Tuma Yoopa, oyeteyo Simooni orikwetwa Petero;
ogwo aryakugambira ebigambo ebirikujunisa n'ab'omu ka yaawe boona.
Ku naatandikire kugamba, Omwoyo Orikwera yaabashuumaho, nk'oku yaizire ahariitwe bwa mbere.
Ahonaaho naijuka ekigambo kya Mukama, eki yaagambire ati: Buzimazima Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi; kwonka imwe muryabatizibwa n'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Mbwenu, Ruhanga ku araabe yaabahaire ekiconco nk'eki yaatuhaire obu twaikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, nyowe nkaba ndi oha okurwanisa Ruhanga?
Ku baahuriire ebyo, baacureera, baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati: Mbwenu Ruhanga ahaire n'Abanyamahanga okweteisa ngu baheebwe amagara agatahwaho.
Kwonka hakaba hariho bamwe aharibo, abashaija ba Kupuro na Kureene; abo ku baahikire Antiokia, baagambira n'Abagriika, nibababuurira ebya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Omukono gwa Mukama gukaba guri aharibo, omutwe mwingi gw'abantu abaikiriize baahindukira Mukama.
Enkuru zaabyo zaahurirwa ekanisa ey'omuri Yerusaalemu, baatuma Barunaba Antiokia.
Ku yaahikireyo, yaareeba embabazi za Ruhanga, yaashemererwa; yaabeehanangiriza boona kuguma ahari Mukama n'omutima oguhamire.
Barunaba ogwo akaba ari omushaija murungi, oijwire Omwoyo Orikwera n'okwikiriza; kandi abantu baingi baija, baayehongyera Mukama.
Bwanyima yaarugayo, yaaza Taruso kusherura Saulo;
ku yaamureebire, yaamureeta Antiokia. Okuruga aho baamarayo omwaka gwona, nibakwatanisa n'ekanisa yaayo, nibeegyesa abantu baingi. Kandi Antiokia okwo abeegi niyo batandikiire kwetwa Abakristaayo.
Omu biro ebyo baanabi aba Yerusaalemu baija Antiokia.
Omwe aharibo orikwetwa Agabo yaayemerera, yaaragurira omu Mwoyo ku haribaho enjara nyingi munonga omu nsi yoona; niyo njara eyaabaireho omu biro bya Kulaudio.
Abeegi baayo baamariirira, buri muntu nk'oku yaabaasize, kwohereza eby'okuhwera ab'eishe-emwe abaabaire batwire Buyudaaya.
Baakora batyo, baabyoherereza abakuru, byatwarwa Barunaba na Saulo.
Yakobo mukuru wa Yohaana yaamwitsa rurara.
Ku yaareebire Abayudaaya baakisiima, yaagaruka yaakwata na Petero. (Ebiro ebyo bikaba biri eby'Emigaati etatumbisiibwe.)
Ku yaaherize kumukwata, yaamuta omu kihome, yaamutaho abaserukare ikumi na mukaaga kumurinda bana-bana, amaririire kumureeta omu maisho g'abantu bwanyima y'Okuhingurwaho.
Petero nikwo yaarinzirwe atyo omu kihome. Kwonka ekanisa yaayezirika kumushabira ahari Ruhanga.
Heroode ku yaabaire naayenda kumubareetera omu kasheeshe, ekiro ekyo Petero akaba agwejegyeire ari ahagati y'abaserukare babiri, n'abarinzi bari aha rwigi barinzire ekihome.
Maraika wa Mukama yaamwemerera aha rubaju, omushana gwajwa omu kishengye; yaateerateera Petero omu mbaju, yaamusisiimura, yaagira ati: Rahuka kwimuka. Enjegyere zaamuruga aha mikono.
Maraika yaamugira ati: Yezirikye, ojware enkaito zaawe. Yaakora atyo. Kandi ati: Jwara omunagiro gwawe, onkurate.
Yaashohora, yaamukuratira; kwonka tiyaamanya ekyakorwa maraika yaaba kiri eky'amazima, kureka yaateekateeka ngu n'okworekwa.

Ku baahingwire aha barinzi b'okubanza n'aba kabiri, baahika aha rwigi rw'ekyoma, orurikuza omu irembo. Orwigi orwo rwabaigukira rwonka; baashohora, baahingura omu muhanda gumwe; ahonaaho maraika yaamutsigaho.

Petero ku yaagarukirwe omutima omunda, yaagira ati: Mbwenu naamanyira kimwe ku Mukama yaatuma maraika we kunjuna omu mikono ya Heroode, n'okunkiza omuri byona ebi Abayudaaya baabaire baineho amatsiko.
Ku yaakongootsire aha rwigi rw'eirembo, omwishiki orikwetwa Rooda yaija kwetaba.
Ku yaamanyire eiraka rya Petero, okushemererwa kwamuzibira kwiguraho orwigi, yaagaruka omu nju nairuka, yaabagira ati: Petero ayemereire aha irembo.
Baamugira bati: Ogwire eiraro. Omwihsiki yaahamiza kimwe ku nikwo kiri. Baagira bati: Ni maraika we.
Kwonka Petero yaagumizamu naakongoota; ku baigwireho, baamureeba, baatangaara munonga.
Yaabacureeza n'omukono, yaabateekyerereza oku Mukama yaamwiha omu kihome. Kandi yaagira ati: Mubigambire Yakobo n'ab'eishe-emwe. Atyo yaarugayo, yaaza ahandi.
Ku bwaseesire, haabaho okujagarara kwingi omu baserukare ahabw'okushoberwa oku Petero abaire.
Heroode ku yaatumire kumweta, yaashanga abuzire, yaabuuza munonga abarinzi; atyo yaaragiira ku babaita. Bwanyima yaaruga Buyudaaya, yaaza Kaisarea, yaagumayo.

Heroode akaba agwereirwe kubi munonga aba Tuuro na Sidoni. Nabo baija ah'ari n'omutima gumwe; ku baaherize kunywana na Bulasto omukuru w'abambari b'omugabe, baashaba obusingye, ahakuba ensi yaabo ekaba neeshaka omu nsi y'omugabe.
Aha kiro eki yaataireho, Heroode yaajwara ebijwaro by'obugabe, yaashutama aha kitebe kye, yaabagambira ebigambo bye.
Abantu baagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Eiraka eri n'erya ruhanga, ti ry'omuntu.
Ahonaaho maraika wa Mukama yaamuteera, ahakuba tarahaire Ruhanga kitiinisa; yaariibwa enyogori, yaafa.
Barunaba na Saulo ku baaherize omurimo gwabo gw'okuheereza, baaruga Yerusaalemu, baagarukayo, nibatwara Yohaana orikwetwa Mako.
Omu kanisa eyaabaire eri Antiokia hakaba harimu baanabi n'abeegyesa, Barunaba na Simeoni orikwetwa Niga na Lukio owa Kureene na Manaeni owaarezirwe hamwe n'Oweishaza Heroode, na Saulo.
Ku baabaire nibaheereza Mukama nibeesiibyakwo, Omwoyo Orikwera yaagira ati: Muntooranire Barunaba na Saulo, bakore omurimo ogu mbeeteire.
Ku baaherize kwesiibyakwo n'okushaba, baabataho engaro, baaboohereza.
Ku baatumirwe Omwoyo Orikwera, baashuuma Selukia; okwo baaragarirayo omu meeri, baayambuka Kupuro.
Ku baabaire bari Salami, baabuurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga omuri sinagogi z'Abayudaaya; kandi bakaba baine Yohaana nk'omuhereza waabo.
Ku baaherize kuraba omuri ekyo kirwa kyona, baahika Paafo; okwo baashangayo omushaija omurogi, nabi w'ebishuba, Omuyudaaya, orikwetwa Bayesu;
kandi akaba atwire n'Oweishaza Omutegyeki, orikwetwa Serugiro Paulo, omushaija w'omunyabwengye. Ogwo yaayeta Barunaba na Saulo, naayenda kuhurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Kwonka Eluma omurogi (ahakuba nigo makuru g'eiziina rye) yaabahakanisa, ngu abone kuhabisa Oweishaza ataikiriza.
Kwonka Saulo, niwe Paulo, aijwire Omwoyo Orikwera, yaamutaho amaisho,
naagira ati: Iwe oijwire obugobya bwona n'obubi bwona, iwe mwana wa Sitaane 'we, omuzigu w'okuhikiirira kwona, torireka kukiikamya emihanda ya Mukama egororokire?
Mbwenu hati omukono gwa Mukama nigukuhana, noija kuhuma, noomara omwanya otarikureeba mushana. Ahonaaho oruho n'omwirima byamushweka; yaabandagira, naasherura ow'okumwebembera amukwaitse omukono.
Okuruga aho oweishaza, ku yaareebire ebyakorwa, yaikiriza, ahabw'okuba akatangaarira okwegyesa kwa Mukama.
Bwanyima Paulo n'abagyenzi be baaruga Paafo omu meeri, baayambuka, baahika Peruga ey'omuri Pamfulia. Yohaana yaabatsigayo, yaagaruka Yerusaalemu;
kwonka bo ku baahingwire nibaruga Peruga, baahika Antiokia ey'omuri Pisidia. Baataaha omuri sinagogi aha izooba rya Sabato, baashutama.
Bwanyima y'okushoma Ebiragiro n'ebya Baanabi, abakuru ba sinagogi baabeeta, baabagira bati: B'eishe-emwe, ku muraabe mwine ekigambo ky'okugumya abantu, mukigambe.
Paulo nikwo kwimuka, akaimutsya omukono, naagira ati:
Imwe bashaija ba Israeli 'mwe, naimwe abarikutiina Ruhanga, muhurire.
Ruhanga ow'eihanga eri ry'Israeli akatoorana baatatenkuriitwe, yaakuza abantu abo obu baabaire batwire omu nsi ya Misri; bwanyima yaabaihisayo omukono gw'amaani.
Yaamara emyaka nka makumi ana abagumisiririize omu ihamba.
Ku yaaherize kuhwerekyereza amahanga mushanju omu nsi ya Kanaani, yaabaha ensi yaabo kuba obuhunguzi,
baamarayo emyaka nka magana ana na makumi ataano; bwanyima y'ebyo yaabaha abaramuzi okuhitsya ahari nabi Samueli.
Bwanyima baashaba omugabe; Ruhanga yaabaha Saulo mutabani wa Kiishi, ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, yaabategyekyera emyaka makumi ana.
Ogwo ku yaamwihireho, yaayemeka Daudi kuba omugabe waabo, ou yaahamize, naagira ati: Mboine Daudi mutabani wa Yese, omuntu ori nk'omutima gwangye oku gurikwenda; aryakora byona ebi ndikukunda.
Omu ruzaaro rw'omushaija ogwo, nimwo Ruhanga yaihiire Israeli Omujuni, Yesu, nk'oku yaaraganiise.
Yesu ogwo atakaizire, Yohaana akabuurira Abaisraeli boona okubatizibwa okw'okweteisa.
Kandi Yohaana ku yaabaire naamariiriza orugyendo rwe, yaagira ati: Nimugira ngu, mba oha? Nyowe tindi We. Kwonka hariho orikwija enyima yangye, ou ntashemereire kuyuzya enkaito ze.
B'eishe-emwe, abaana b'oruganda rwa Abrahamu, n'abari omuriimwe abarikutiina Ruhanga, ekigambo ky'okujunwa oku niitwe kyatumirweho.

Mumanye ngu abaabaire batwire Yerusaalemu n'abategyeki baabo, ahabw'okutamumanya, n'obu kwakuba okushoborokyerwa ebyagambirwe baanabi, ebirikushomwa buri Sabato, bakabihikiiriza, obu baamusingisa orubanja.
Kandi n'obu baraabe baabuzire orubanja rw'okumwitsa, bakashaba Pilaato ngu aitwe.
Ku baaherize kuhikiiriza byona ebyamuhandiikirweho, baamuhanura aha muti, baamuziika omu kituuro.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafu;
yaamara ebiro bingi naareebwa abo abaarugire nawe Galilaaya nibaza Yerusaalemu; nibo baakareebi abarikumuhamya hati omu bantu.
Naitwe tubareeteire ebigambo birungi eby'endagaano, ei Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe,
kandi endagaano egyo akagihikiiriza ahariitwe, abaana baabo, obu yaazoora Yesu; nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omuri zaaburi eya kabiri ngu, Ori Omwana wangye, eri izooba naakuzaara.
Nk'oku yaamuzoire omu bafu okutagaruka mu kujunda, akagira ati: Ndyabaha emigisha erikwera kandi etahwaho eya Daudi.
Kandi akagambira n'omuri zaburi endiijo ati: Toriikiriza Orikwera waawe kujunda.
Nimumanya Daudi ku yaaherize kuhikiiriza enaama ya Ruhanga omu biro bye, yaagwejegyera, yaaziikwa na baishenkuru, yaajunda;
kwonka Ogwo ou Ruhanga yaazoire tarajunzire.
kandi ahabw'Ogwo orikwikiriza weena naihwaho orubanja rw'ebibi byona, ebi mutaakubaasize kwihwaho Biragiro bya Musa.
Mbwenu mwerinde, mutakaahikwaho ekyagambirwe baanabi, nibagira bati:
Imwe abagaya, mureebe, mutangaare, muhweho; ahakuba ninkora omurimo omu biro byanyu, omurimo ogu mutariikiriza na kakye, n'obu omuntu yaakuba naagubashobororera.
Ku baabaire nibashohora, abantu baayeshengyereza ngu ebigambo ebyo bagarukye babigambirwe ahari Sabato erikwija.
Ku baaherize kushohora, Abayudaaya baingi n'abahindukiire omu diini yaabo baakuratira Paulo na Barunaba; bo baabeehanangiriza nibabagambira kugumizamu omu mbabazi za Ruhanga.
Ahari Sabato egyo ab'omu rurembo haihi boona baateerana kuhurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Kwonka Abayudaaya ku baareebire emitwe y'abantu, baagira eihari ringi, baahakanisa ebigambo ebyagambirwe Paulo, baamujuma.

Paulo na Barunaba baagamba n'obumanzi, bati: Kikaba kishemereire kuba niimwe mwabanza kugambirwa ekigambo kya Ruhanga; mbwenu obu mwakyanga, mukeeyoreka ku mutashemereire magara agatahwaho, reeba twahindukira Abanyamahanga.
Ahakuba Mukama waitu nikwo yaaturagiire ati:
Nkutaireho kuba Omushana gw'Abanyamahanga
Ngu otware okujunwa, okuhitsya aha muheru gw'ensi.
Ekigambo kya Mukama kyabuga omu nsi egyo yoona.
