Kwonka Abayudaaya baayosya abakazi abanyadiini ab'ekitiinisa n'abashaija bakuru ab'omu rurembo, baahiiga Paulo na Barunaba, baababinga omu ishaza ryabo.
Kwonka bo baabakunkumurira omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byabo, baaza Ikonio.
Abeegi baijura okushemererwa n'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Ku baahikire Ikonio, baataaha omuri sinagogi y'Abayudaaya, baagamba ebigambo birungi ebyareeteire omutwe gw'Abayudaaya n'Abagriika baingi okwikiriza.
Kwonka Abayudaaya, abaayangire kuhurira, baayosya Abanyamahanga, baashiisha emitima yaabo ngu bangye ab'eishe-emwe.
Okuruga aho baamarayo ebiro bingi, nibagamba n'obumanzi, beegamiire Mukama, owaahamize ekigambo ky'embabazi ze n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebi yaabahaire kukora n'emikono yaabo.
Kwonka ab'omu rurembo baayebaganisamu; abamwe baaza aha rubaju rw'Abayudaaya, abandi aha rw'entumwa.
Bwanyima Abanyamahanga n'Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okubakora kubi n'okubaitsa amabaare;
entumwa ku zaakimanyire, zaahungira Lusitura na Derube, tauni za Lukaonia, n'ebyanga ebihikaine n'aho;
okwo baabuurirayo engiri.
Omuri Lusitura hakaba harimu omushaija, owaabaire atarikubaasa kugyendesa maguru, owaazairwe ari ekirema, otakagyendahoga.
Ogwo yaahurira Paulo naagamba. Paulo, ku yaamwetegyereize, yaareeba ku aine okwesiga ngu naabaasa kutambirwa,
yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, ati: Imuka, oyemerere n'ebigyere byawe. Yaabandatuka, yaagyenda.
Ab'emitwe ku baareebire eki Paulo yaakora, baayombera ahaiguru, nibagamba omu rurimi rwa Lukaonia, bati: Baaruhanga baatushuumamu omu nshusha y'abantu.
Barunaba baamweta Zeu, na Paulo baamweta Herume, ahabw'okuba niwe yaabaire ari mukuru omu kugamba.
Omunyamurwa wa hekalu ya Zeu, eyaabaire eri omu maisho g'orurembo, yaareeta ente n'ebishaba by'ebirabyo aha irembo, yaija n'abantu kutamba ekitambo.
Kwonka entumwa, Barunaba na Paulo, ku baahuriire ekyo, baataagura ebijwaro byabo, baayeshuka omu bantu, nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati:

Bashaija 'mwe, n'enki ekirikubakoresa ebyo? Naitwe turi abantu-buntu nkaimwe, twabareetera ebigambo ebirungi, ngu murekye ebi ebitaine mugasho, muhindukire Ruhanga ohuriire, owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja n'ebintu byona ebirimu.
Omu busingye bwa ira akareka amahanga goona kugyendera omu mihanda yaago.

Kwonka tararekyeire aho kubura eky'okumuhamya, ahakuba akaguma naabakora gye, naabagwisiza enjura okuruga omu iguru, naabeereza emyaka omu bunaku bwayo, naabahaazya eby'okurya, naijuza emitima yaanyu okushemererwa.
Batyo baazibira abantu kubatambira ebitambo n'ebigambo ebyo, kwonka kyabarusya munonga.
Kwonka abeegi ku baayemereire bamwehinguririize, yaimuka, yaagaruka omu rurembo; ku bwaseesire, yaashohora na Barunaba, baaza Derube.
Ku baaherize kubuurira engiri ah'omuri tauni egyo n'okuhindura abeegi baingi, baagaruka Lusitura na Ikonio na Antiokia
nibagumya emitima y'abeegi, nibabeehanangiriza kuguma omu kwikiriza, kandi bati: Tushemeriere kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga, nituraba omu busaasi bwingi.
Kandi ku baaherize kubateeraho abakuru omuri buri kanisa, nibashaba nibeesiibyakwo, baabatsigira Mukama ou baikiriize.
Bwanyima baaraba omuri Pisidia, baahika Pamufulia.
Ku baaherize kugamba ekigambo omuri Peruga, baashuuma, baataaha Atalia.
Omu kurugayo baaza omu meeri, baahika Antiokia, ahu baatsigiriirwe embabazi za Ruhanga ahabw'omurimo ogu baaheza kuhikiiriza.
Ku baahikireyo, baateerana ekanisa yoona, baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaakozire hamwe nabo, kandi n'oku yaiguriire Abanyamahanga orwigi rw'okwikiriza.
Baagumayo n'abeegi ebiro bitari bikye.

Paulo na Barunaba baahakanisa abantu abo munonga, baahika n'aha kutongana; ab'eishe-emwe nikwo kwohereza Paulo na Barunaba n'abandi bamwe aharibo kwinamuka Yerusaalemu aha ntumwa n'abakuru, ngu babamare empaka ahari ekyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo abo, ku baaherize kushendekyerezibwa ab'ekanisa, baaraba omuri Foiniike na Samaria, nibagambira ab'eishe-emwe eby'okuhinduka kw'Abanyamahanga, byareetera boona okushemererwa kwingi.
Ku baahikire Yerusaalemu, baayakiirwa ab'ekanisa n'entumwa n'abakuru, baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaakozire hamwe nabo.
Kwonka haayemerera bamwe ab'omu kigombe ky'Abafarisaayo abaikiriize, baagira bati: Ekirikwetengwa n'okubashara, kandi n'okubaragiira okuhitsya Ebiragiro bya Musa.
Entumwa n'abakuru baateerana hamwe kuteekateeka aha kigambo ekyo.

Ku baaherize omwanya muhango nibahanuura, Petero yaayemerera, yaabagira ati: B'eishe-emwe, nimumanya ngu omu biro byahweire Ruhanga akantoorana omuriimwe kuba niinye naagambira Abanyamahanga ekigambo ky'engiri, ngu bakihurire, baikirize.
Kandi Ruhanga orikumanya emitima yaabahamya, naabaha Omwoyo Orikwera nk'oku yaamutuhaire;
tiyaatutaanisa nabo, yaashemeza emitima yaabo ahabw'okwikiriza.
Mbwenu nimugyereza ki Ruhanga okwekoreza abeegi emitwaro ei baatatenkuriitwe batarabaasize kwekorera, n'obu baakuba itwe?
Kwonka itwe nitwikiriza ngu turyajunwa ahabw'embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu, nk'abo oku barijunwa.
Abantu boona baacureera, baahurira Barunaba na Paulo nibabateekyerereza obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebi Ruhanga yaabakoreise omu Banyamahanga.
Ku baaherize kugamba, Yakobo yaagira ati: B'eishe-emwe, mumpurire!
Simooni yaaheza kubateekyerereza oku Ruhanga yaatandikire kutaayaayira Abanyamahanga okutoorana abantu omuribo kuba eihanga eririkwetererwa eiziina rye.
Kandi ebigambo bya baanabi nibiikirizana nabyo, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu
Bwanyima y'ebyo ndyagaruka,
Nyimutsye enju ya Daudi eyaagwire;
Ahu yaasheenyukire ndyahashemeza, mpaimutsye,
Ngu abantu abaahonokireho basherure Mukama,
Hamwe n'Abanyamahanga boona abarikwetererwa eiziina ryangye;
Nikwo Mukama arikugira, okora ebyo byona
Ebyamanyirwe okuruga iranaira.
N'ahabw'ekyo nindagiira nti: Turekye kurusya abarikuruga omu Banyamahanga bakahindukira Ruhanga;
kwonka tubahandiikire, barekye kweshiisha n'okuramya ebishushani, n'eshagama.
Ahakuba okuruga ira Musa aine omu ndembo zoona abarikumugambaho, kandi buri Sabato ebitabo bye bishomerwa omuri sinagogi.

Bwanyima entumwa n'abakuru hamwe n'ekanisa yoona baasiima kutoorana omuribo abashaija ab'okutuma na Paulo na Barunaba omuri Antiokia. Baatuma Yuda orikwetwa Barusaba na Siila, abantu bakuru omu b'eishe-emwe;
baahandiika ebaruha, baagibaha, ehandiikirwe eti: Itwe entumwa n'ab'eishe-emwe abakuru nitubahandiikira imwe ab'eishe-emwe ab'omu Banyamahanga abari Antiokia na Siria na Kilikia, nitubaramutysa.
Tukahurira ngu bamwe abaarugire omuriitwe bakabagambira ebigambo by'okubeemereza emitima n'okubabanganisisa, haza tutarabaragiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku twateeraine, twasiimira hamwe kutoorana abashaija n'okubabatumaho hamwe na Barunaba na Paulo, abu turikukunda,
abashaija abaayogire amagara gaabo ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Mbwenu abu twatuma ni Yuda na Siila, nibo baraabashobororere ebigambo ebyo n'akanwa.
Mumanye ngu Omwoyo Orikwera naitwe twasiima kutabakorera gundi mutwaro oguremeire kureka okwikiriza ebi ebibashemereire,
okureka kurya ebihongyeirwe ebishushani, n'eshagama, n'ebinigirwe, n'obushambani; ku muraayerinde ebyo, muryaguma muri gye. Mugumeho.
Ku baaherize kuragwa, baashuuma, baaza Antiokia. Ku baahikireyo, baateerana ab'omutwe boona, baabaha ebaruha.
Ku baagishomire, baashemererwa ahabw'okuhuumurizibwa okwo.
Kandi Yuda na Siila, ahabw'okuba nabo bakaba bari baanabi, baayehanangiriza ab'eishe-emwe n'ebigambo bingi, baabagumya.
Ku baamazireyo ebiro ebitari bikye, baaragwa n'obusingye ab'eishe-emwe kugaruka ahari abo abaabatumire.
Kwonka Siila we yaasiima kutsigarayo.
Kandi Paulo na Barunaba nabo baaguma Antiokia, nibeegyesa, nibabuurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga hamwe n'abandi baingi.
Barunaba akaba naakunda ngu bagyende na Yohaana orikwetwa Mako;
kwonka Paulo tiyaasiima kugyenda n'omuntu owaataaniire nabo Pamfulia, obu yaayanga kugyenda nabo aha murimo.
Haabaho empaka nyingi, ahabw'ekyo baataana; Barunaba yaatwara Mako, baaza omu meeri, baayambuka Kupuro.
Paulo we yaatoorana Siila; ab'eishe-emwe ku baaherize kumutsigira embabazi za Mukama, yaagyenda.
Yaaraba omuri Siria na Kilikia, naagumya amakanisa.
Timoseo ogwo akaba asiimwa ab'eishe-emwe aba Lusitura na Ikonio.
Pauli yaayenda ngu bagyendane; yaamutwara, yaamushara ahabw'Abayudaaya abaabaire bari omu myanya egyo; ahakuba boona bakaba nibamanya ngu ishe n'Omugriika.
Ku baabaire nibaraba omuri tauni ezo, baabaha ebiragiro ebyatairweho entumwa n'abakuru abaabaire bateeraniire Yerusaalemu, ngu babikwate.
N'ahabw'ekyo amakanisa gaagumibwa omu kwikiriza, abantu baayeyongyera kukanya obutoosha.
Ku baazibiirwe Omwoyo Orikwera kugamba ekigambo omuri Asia, baaraba omu byanga bya Furugia na Galatia;
ku baahikire haihi na Musia, baayenda ngu baze Bisunia; kwonka Omwoyo wa Yesu tiyaabaikiriza.
Batyo baaraba Musia, baashuuma baahika Troa.
Nyekiro Paulo yaayorekwa, yaareeba omushaija owa Makedonia, ayemereire, naamweshengyereza ati: Yambuka, oije Makedonia, otuhwere.
Ku yaareebire okworekwa okwo, ahonaaho twayenda kuza Makedonia, twahamiza kimwe ngu Ruhanga atwetsire kubabuurira engiri.
N'ahabw'ekyo twaruga Troa omu meeri, twagyema ogurikwambuka Samoserakia; aha izooba erindi twahika Neapooli;
ku twarugireyo, twahika Filipi, orurembo orukuru orwa Makedonia, orwayombekirwe Abarooma abaafurukiireyo; twamara ebiro omu rurembo orwo.

Aha izooba rya Sabato twashohora twaraba omu irembo ryarwo, twaza aha rubaju rw'omugyera, ahu twateekateekire ngu hariho omwanya gw'okushabiramu; twasuhtama ahansi, twagamba n'abakazi abaateeraniireyo.

Omuri abo hakaba harimu omukazi orikwetwa Ludia, omushuubuzi w'emyenda ya bujwa, ow'omuri tauni eya Suatira, owaabaire atiina Ruhanga; ku yaatuhuriire, Mukama yaigura omutima gwe okweta aha bigambo ebyagambwa Paulo.
Ku yaaherize kubatizibwa n'ab'omu ka ye, yaatweshengyereza, naagira ati: Ku muraabe mwansiima ngu ndi omwesigwa ahari Mukama, mwije omu nju yangye, mucumbikyemu. Yaatugyemesereza.
Ku twabaire nituza omuri ogwo mwanya gw'okushabiramu, twabuganwa omuzaana oriho daimoni orikuragura, owaabaire atungisa bakama be munonga n'emikimbo ei yaabaire akimbirwa.
Omuzaana ogwo yaakuratira Paulo naitwe, naayamuza n'eiraka rihango ati: Abashaija aba n'abahuuku ba Ruhanga Rukira-boona; nibabamanyisa omuhanda gw'okujunwa.
Yaaguma naakora atyo ebiro bingi. Paulo, ku yaatamirwe, yaahinduka, yaagira daimoni ati: Ninkuragiira omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo, murugyeho. Daimoni yaamurugaho omuri ako kaanya.
Bakama be ku baareebire baahwa amatsiko g'okumutungaho ebintu, baakwata Paulo na Siila, baabakurura, baabatwara omu katare omu maisho g'abategyeki;
ku baabahikize abaramuzi, baagira bati: Abashaija aba n'Abayudaaya, nibarabanisamu orurembo rwaitu.
Nibeegyesa emicwe ei ebiragiro bituzibira kwikiriza n'obu kwakuba okukora, ahakuba turi Abarooma.
N'abaabaire bateeraniire aho baabaimukiririra hamwe; n'abaramuzi baabataagurira ebijwaro aha mibiri, baaragiira kubateeza enkoni.
Ku baaherize kubateera enkoni nyingi, baabaroha omu kihome, baaragiira omurinzi w'embohe kubarinda munonga.
Ku yaaragiirwe atyo, yaabatsindika omu kishengye kya hagati eky'omu kihome, yaaboha amaguru gaabo omu
Nyekiro nk'omu itumbi Paulo na Siila bakaba nibashaba, nibeeshongorera Ruhanga, n'embohe zibategire amatu;
omu mwanya ogwo haabaho omutsitsa mwingi, omusingi gw'ekihome gwatengyetsibwa; ahonaaho enyigi zoona zaiguka, n'emihama ya buri muntu yaakomoroka.
Omurinzi w'ekihome ku yaasisiimukire, yaareeba enyigi ziigukire, yaasyorayo rurara ye, yaayenda kwerezya, ahabw'okuba akateekateeka ngu embohe zicwire.
Kwonka Paulo yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, naagira ati: Oteekora kubi, ahakuba twena turi aha.
Yaatuma amatabaaza, yaayetuura omu nju, yaajuumara omu maisho ga Paulo na Siila, naatetema aine obwoba;
yaabashohoza aheeru, yaababuuza ati: Baataata, nshemereire kukora ki, nkajunwa?
Baagarukamu bati: Ikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu, noija kujunwa, iwe n'eka yaawe.
Kandi baamugambira ekigambo kya Mukama hamwe na boona abaabaire bari omu ka ye.
Yaabatwara omu shaaha egyo nyekiro, yaabanaabisa emihiriirizi; ahonaaho yaabatizibwa n'ab'omu ka ye boona.
Bwanyima yaabatwara omu nju ye, yaabareetera eby'okurya, ashemereirwe munonga n'ab'omu nju ye ahabw'okwikiriza Ruhanga.
Ku bwaseesire, abaramuzi baatuma abaserukare, nibagira bati: Murekure abashaija abo.
Omurinzi w'embohe yaagambira Paulo ebigambo ebyo, ati: Abaramuzi baatuma ngu tubarekure; mbwenu hati mushohore, mugyende n'obusingye.

Kwonka Paulo yaabagira ati: Batuteereire omu maisho g'abantu tutakacwereirwe rubanja, haza turi Abarooma; kandi baaturoha omu kihome; mbwenu nibenda kutwihamu kitamanyirwe? Ngaaha! Reka, babe nibo baija, batweshohoreze.
Abo baserukare baagambira abaramuzi ebigambo ebyo; ku baahuriire ngu n'Abarooma, baatiina.
Baija, baabeehohoora; ku baabashohoize, baabashaba kuruga omu rurembo.
Batyo baaruga omu kihome, baataaha omu nju ya Ludia; ku baareebaine n'ab'eishe-emwe, baabagumya, baarugayo.
Ku baarabire omuri Amfipooli na Apolonia, baahika Tesalonika; aho hakaba hariho sinagogi y'Abayudaaya.
Paulo, nk'omucwe gwe oku gwabaire guri, yaabataahamu, yaabahakanisa omu Byahandiikirwe okumara amazooba ashatu ga Sabato,
naashoboorora, kandi naahamya ku Kristo yaashemereire kubonabonesibwa, n'okuzooka omu bafu; kandi ati: Yesu ogwo, ou ndikubagambira, niwe Kristo buzima.
Abamwe aharibo baikiriza, baakwatanisa na Paulo na Siila; kandi haikiriza omutwe muhango gw'Abagriika abanyadiini, n'abakazi bw'ekitiinisa abatari bakye.

Kwonka Abayudaaya bo baakwatwa eihari, baatwara abashaija babi b'ebizengyerezi, baateerana omutwe muhango, baateerera orwari omu rurembo; baakuba enju ya Yasooni, nibenda kushohoza Paulo na Siila, ngu babareete omu maisho g'abantu.
Ku baababuriire, baakurura Yasooni n'abamwe aha b'eishe-emwe, baabatwara omu maisho g'abategyeki b'orurembo, nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Abashaija aba abajuumikire ensi, mbwenu baizire n'aha;
na Yasooni yaabaakiira; haza boona nibagomera ebiragiro bya Kaisaari, nibagira ngu hariho omugabe ondiijo, Yesu.
Omutwe gw'abantu n'abategyeki b'orurembo, ku baabihuriire, baayemereza emitima.
Ku baaherize kwiha ahari Yasooni n'abandi omusingo, baabarekura.
Ahonaaho ab'eishe-emwe baayohereza Paulo na Siila nyekiro ngu bataahe Beroya. Ku baahikireyo, baaza omuri sinagogi y'Abayudaaya.

Kwonka abo bo bakaba batwaza gye okukira aba Tesalonika, ahabw'okuba bakaakiira ekigambo n'emitima erikukundira kimwe, nibashwijuma omu Byahandiikirwe obutoosha, kureeba ebigambo ebyo ku biraabe nikwo biri.
N'ahabw'ekyo baingi aharibo baikiriza, n'Abagriikakazi ab'ekitiinisa n'abashaija abatari bakye.
Kwonka Abayudaaya ba Tesalonika ku baamanyire ngu Paulo agambire ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'omuri Beroya, nayo baazayo, baayosya abantu, baabajagaraza emitima.
Ahonaaho ab'eishe-emwe baayohereza Paulo kugyenda ngu ahikye aha nyanja; Siila na Timoseo baatsigarayo.
Abaashendekyereize Paulo baamuhitsya Aseene; ku yaaherize kubaragiira kugambira Siila na Timoseo ngu beehuute bamushangyeyo, baagyenda.
Paulo ku yaabaire akibategyerereize Aseene, omutima gwe gwashaasha munonga ahabw'okureeba orurembo rwijwire ebishushani ebirikuramibwa.
Atyo yaahakanisa Abayudaaya n'abanyadiini omuri sinagogi, kandi n'omu katare yaahakana n'abu yaabaire ashangamu obutoosha.

Kandi bamwe aha banyabwengye Abaepikureyo n'Abastoyiko baamubugana. Abamwe baagira bati: Mbwenu reero naayenda kugamba ki, egi ngambi y'amaingi? Abandi bati: Naashusha nk'orikugamba ebya baaruhanga abasya; ahakuba akaba naagamba ebya Yesu n'eby'okuzooka.
Baamukwata, baamutwara Areopaago, nibagira bati: Nitwenda kumanya eby'okwegyesa oku okusya, oku orikugamba, oku kuri.
Ahakuba oreetsire ebigambo bisya omu matu gaitu; nikyo turikwendera kumanya amakuru gaabyo.
Kandi aba Aseene boona n'abagyenyi abaabaire bariyo bakaba batakiine kindi eki barikukora kureka okugamba, n'okuhurira ebigambo bisya ebihangire.
Paulo nikwo kwemerera ahagati ya Areopaago, akagira ati: Imwe abashaija ba Aseene, ndeebire omuri byona ku murengyesereize okuba abanyadiini.

Ahakuba ku mbaire nimpingura, naareeba ebi murikuramya, naashanga eitambiro erihandiikirweho ngu, N'ERYA RUHANGA OTARIKUMANYWA. Haza mbwenu eki muramya nk'ekitarikumanywa, nikyo ndikwenda kubagambira.
Ruhanga owaahangire ensi n'ebintu byona ebirimu, ahabw'okuba Mukama w'eiguru n'ensi, tatuura muri hekalu ezombekirwe n'emikono,
n'obu kwakuba okuheerezibwa emikono y'abantu, nk'one eki akyenire; ahakuba niwe wenka aha abantu boona amagara n'omwitsyo na buri kintu kyona;
kandi akahanga amahanga goona ag'abantu, naabakomoora aha muntu omwe, ngu batuure omu nsi yoona. Niwe yaataireho obunaku bw'emyaka okwihaihana, akataho emyatano y'ahu abantu batwire;
ngu babone kusherura Ruhanga, nibabandagira baine amatsiko g'okumugwaho, n'obu araabe atari hare n'omuntu weena omuriitwe;
ahakuba omuriwe tuba abahuriire, tugyenda, kandi tugumaho; nk'abamwe aha bahimbi baanyu b'ebyoshongoro oku baagambire nibagira bati: Ahakuba naitwe turi oruzaaro rwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku turaabe turi oruzaaro rwa Ruhanga, titushemereire kuteekateeka ngu Ruhanga naashusha ezaabu nari efeeza, nari amabaare agasharwire omu buringaringo n'obwengye bw'abantu.
Ebiro ebyo eby'okutamanya, Ruhanga akabirenzya amaisho, kwonka hati naaragiira abantu boona abari hoona kweteisa,
ahakuba akataho ekiro eki aricweraho emanja z'ensi yoona omu kuhikiirira, naazicwisa Omuntu ou yaatooraine; kandi ebyo akabihamiza abantu boona, obu yaamuzoora omu bafu.
Ku baahuriire aha by'okuzooka omu bafu, abamwe baabishekyerera, abandi baagira bati: Turyakuhurira obundi, obitugambire.
Atyo Paulo yaabarugaho.
Kwonka abashaija bamwe baaguma nawe, baikiriza; omuribo hakaba harimu Dionisio ow'omu ba Areopaago, n'omukazi orikweta Damari, hamwe n'abandi.
Bwanyima y'ebyo yaaruga Aseene yaaza Korinso.

Yaashangayo Omuyudaaya orikwetwa Akula, enzarwa ya Pontio, nibwo yaabaire arugire Italia n'omukazi we Priskila, ahabw'okuba Kulaudio akaba aragiire Abayudaaya boona kuruga Rooma. Paulo yaaza owaabo kubareeba;
kandi, ahabw'okushangwa ari ow'omwoga gumwe n'ogwabo, yaaguma nabo, nibakora hamwe; ahakuba omwoga gwabo gukaba guri okubaziira amahema.
Buri Sabato yaaguma naahakanisa Abayudaaya n'Abagriika omuri sinagogi, naabaikiririsa.
Siila na Timoseo ku baarugire Makedonisa, Paulo yaagyemwa ekigambo kya Ruhanga, naahamiza Abayudaaya ku Yesu ari Kristo.
Ku baamuhakaniise munonga, baarogota, yaakunkumura ebijwaro bye, yaabagira ati: Eshagama yaanyu ebe niimwe yaatukururira; nyowe ndi mwere; okuruga hati niinyija kuza omu Banyamahanga.
Yaarugayo, yaataaha omu nju y'omuntu orikwetwa Tito Yusto, owaabaire aramya Ruhanga, enju ye ekaba eri haihi na sinagogi.
Kandi Krispo omukuru wa sinagogi yaikiriza Mukama n'eka ye yoona; n'aba Korisno baingi, ku baahuriire, baikiriza, baabatizibwa.
Mukama waitu yaagambira Paulo nyekiro omu kworekwa ati: Otatiina, ogume ogambe, orekye kuhunama;
ahabw'okuba ndi hamwe naiwe, kandi tihariho muntu oraakutaahirire kukukora kubi; ahakuba nyine abantu baingi omu rurembo oru.
Bwanyima yaamarayo omwaka n'ameezi mukaaga, naabeegyesamu ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Galio ku yaabaire ari omutegyeki wa Akaya, Abayudaaya baimukirira Paulo n'omutima gumwe, baamutwara omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'eiramuriro;
nibagira bati: Omushaija ogu naikiririsa abantu kuramya Ruhanga omu buryo oburikuhakanisa Ebiragiro.

Kwonka Paulo ku yaabaire naayenda kwashamya akanwa ke kwetonganira, Galio yaagambira Abayudaaya ati: Imwe Bayudaaya 'mwe, kuri ruri orubanja rw'ekibi nari shi ekihagaro, nkaagizire oburyo bw'okubagumisiririza, mbahurira;
kwonka obu ziri empaka z'ebigambo n'amazima n'ebiragiro byanyu mwenka, mubyemarire; tindikwenda kucwa orubanja rw'ebigambo nk'ebyo.
Yaababinga omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'eiramuriro.
Boona baakwata Soseene, omukuru wa sinagogi, baamuteerera omu maisho g'ekyo kitebe. Kwonka ebyo byona Galio tiyaabyetaho.
Ku baahikire Efeso, yaabatsigayo; yaataaha omuri sinagogi wenka, yaahakanisa Abayudaaya.
Ku baamushabire kuguma nabo ebiro ebindi, tiyaabaikiriza;
kwonka yaabaraga naagira ati: Ruhanga ku arikunda, ndyagaruka. Atyo yaaza omu meeri, yaaruga Efeso.
Ku yaayambukire Kaisarea, yainamuka, yaaramutsya ekanisa; bwanyima yaaza Antiokia.
Ku yaamazireyo ebiro, yaarugayo, yaaraba omu mashaza ga Galatia na Furugia, naareeba emyanya yaamwo nk'oku yaabaire ekurataine, naagumya abeegi boona.
Omushaija ogwo akaba ayegyesiibwe omuhanda gwa Mukama; kandi ahabw'okwezirika omu Mwoyo, yaagamba ebya Yesu, naabeegyesa gye, n'obu araabe yaabaire naamanya okubatiza kwa Yohaana kwonka.
Yaatandika kubuurira n'obumanzi omuri sinagogi. Kwonka Priskila na Akula, ku baamuhuriire, baamutwara owaabo, baayongyera kumushobororera gye omuhanda gwa Ruhanga.
Ku yaateekateekire kwambuka Akaya, ab'eishe-emwe baamugumya, baahandiikira abeegi kumwakiira; ku yaahikireyo, embabazi za Ruhanga zaamubaasisa kuhwera abo abaabaire baikiriize;
ahakuba akaba ahakanisa Abayudaaya n'amaani omu maisho ga boona, abasinga, naabahamiza omu Byahandiikirwe ku Yesu ari Kristo.
Apolo ku yaabaire akiri Korinso, Paulo yaaraba omu kyanga kya ruguru, yaahika Efeso, yaashangayo abeegi bamwe;
yaababuuza ati: Obu mwaikiriza, mukaheebwa Omwyoyo Orikwera? Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha, n'okuhurira titukahuriraga, yaaba habaho Omwoyo Orikwera.
Yaagira ati: Mukabatizibwa omu kubatizibwa ki? Bati: Omu kubatuza kwa Yohaana.
Paulo yaagira ati: Yohaana akabatiza okubatiza kw'okweteisa, naagambira abantu kwikiriza Ogwo orikwenda kwija enyima ye, niwe Yesu.
Ku baahuriire ekyo, baabatizibwa omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Paulo ku yaabataireho engaro, Omwoyo Orikwera yaabaijaho; baagamba endimi ezindi, baaragura.
Boona bakaba bari ikumi na babiri.
Yaataaha omuri sinagogi, yaamara ameezi ashatu naagamba n'obumanzi, naahakanisa abantu, kandi naabaikiririsa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Kwonka bamwe ku baagangaize emitima, baayanga kuhurira nibajuma Omuhanda ogwo omu maisho g'abantu, yaabarugaho, yaashorooramu abeegi, yaaguma naahakanira omu ishomero rya Turaano.
Yaagumizamu naakora atyo okumara emyaka ebiri; n'ahabw'ekyo boona abaabaire batwire Asia, Abayudaaya n'Abagriika, baahurira ekigambo kya Mukama.
Ruhanga yaakoresa emikono ya Paulo eby'okutangaaza ebitari by'obutoosha;
kandi ebitambaara n'emyenda ebyarugire aha mubiri gwe baabitwarira abarwaire, baakira endwara zaabo, n'abariho baadaimoni baabarugaho.
Hakaba hariho abashaija mushanju, batabani ba Skewa Omuyudaaya, omunyamurwa omukuru, abaabaire nibakora batyo.
Daimoni yaabagarukamu ati: Yesu nimmumanya, na Paulo nimmumanya; beitu imwe muri baahi?
Omushaija owaabaire ariho daimoni yaabagurukira boona, yaabakiza amaani, yaababinga, baahunga omu nju egyo bajwaire busha, bahutaire.
Kandi ekyo kyamanywa boona, Abayudaaya n'Abagriika, abaabire batwiire Efeso; boona baatiina munonga, kandi eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu ryahimbisibwa.
Kandi baingi ahari abo abaikiriize baija, baayatura ebibi byabo, baagamba n'ebi baakozire.

Baingi ahari abo, abaabaire bakora eby'obufumu baateeranira hamwe ebitabo byabo eby'okuragura, baabyokyeza omu maisho g'abantu boona; baabariirira obuguzi bwabyo, baashanga nibuhika ebicweka by'efeeza obukumi butaano.
Okwo nikwo ekigambo kya Mukama kyayeyongyeire kityo amaani, kikasingura.
Kandi ebyo ku byahweire, Paulo yaamariirira omu mutima gwe kubanza kuraba Makedonia na Akaya, ngu abone kuza Yerusaalemu, naagira ati: Ku ndiba naahikireyo, nshemereire kuza kureeba Rooma nayo.
Ku yaaherize kutuma Makedonia babiri aha bahwezi be, Timoseo na Erasto, we yaaguma Asia ebiro bikye.
Ahakuba omushaija orikwetwa Demeterio, omuheesi w'efeeza, owaabaire aheesha ebishushani bya hekalu ya Atemi omu feeza, naatungisa abaheesi be munonga;
akabateerana hamwe n'abandi abaabaire bakora omwoga ogwo, yaabagira ati: Bashaija 'mwe, nimumanya omwoga ogu ku nigwo gubaire nigututungisa.

Mbwenu nimureeba, kandi nimuhurira ku kitari muri Efeso yonka, kureka n'omuri Asia haihi yoona, Paulo ogwo ayohize abantu baingi, naabahindura, naagira ati: Baaruhanga abakozirwe n'emikono, ti baaruhanga b'amazima.

Mbwenu nu hariho akabi, ti habw'omwoga gwaitu kugaywa kwonka, kureka n'ahabwa hekalu na ruhangakazi rugambwa Atemi kuhindurwa busha; kandi na ruhangakazi ogwo, orikuramibwa ab'omu nsi zoona, kwihwaho ekitiinisa kye.
Ku baahuriire ekyo, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi, baayomba munonga bati: Atemi wa Efeso ni mukuru!
Orurembo rwona rwayoogoorekana; abantu baakwata Gaayo na Aristariiko aba Makedonia, abaabaire bagyenda na Paulo omu ngyendo ze, boona baashutuka, baaza omu izaaniro.
Paulo yaayenda kubataahamu, kwonka abeegi be tibaamwikiriza;
kandi bamwe aha bakungu bakuru ba Asia, abaabaire bari banywani be, baamutumaho, baamweshengyereza ngu arekye kweroha omu iteeraniro.
Ab'omu mutwe ogwo abamwe baayomba okwabo, n'abandi okwabo, ahakuba boona bakaba nibayoogoorekana, kandi abaingi batamanyire ekyabateerana.
Baiha Alegizanda omu mutwe, Abayudaaya baaba nibo baamwebembeza. Alegizanda yaabacureeza n'omukono, ngu abone kwetonganira aha bantu.
Kwonka ku baamanyire ku ari Omuyudaaya, boona baayombera hamwe okumara nk'eshaaha ibiri nibagira bati: Atemi wa Efeso ni mukuru!

Bwanyima omuhandiiki omukuru ow'omu rurembo yaacureeza abantu naagira ati: Imwe bashaija ba Efeso 'mwe, ni muntu ki otarikumanya ngu orurembo rwa Efeso nirwo rurinda hekalu ya Atemi omukuru, n'ekishushabni ekyarugire omu iguru?
Mbwenu, nk'oku hatariho orikubaasa kubyehakana, mushemereire kuhunama, mutakora ekintu kyona nimurahukiriza.
Ahakuba abashaija abo tibaibire by'omuri hekalu zaitu, n'obu kwakuba okurogota ahari ruhangakazi waitu; mbwenu mwabareeta aha.
N'ahabw'ekyo Demeterio n'abaheesi bagyenzi be, ku baraabe baine eki barikutabaariza omuntu weena, amaramuriro gariho, n'abategyeki bariho; babe niyo baatabaarizana.
Kwonka ku muraabe mwine ekindi eki murikushobooroza, biryamarirwa omu ishengyero ry'obutoosha.
Mumanye ku turi omu kabi k'okuregwa ahabw'okuyoogoorekana kw'eri izooba; ahakuba tihariho buryo obu turaayetonganire bukashoboorora okuteerana oku.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaagambira abantu, baayaabuuka.
Okurabanamu ku kwahweireho, Paulo yaatuma abeegi; ku yaaherize kubagumya, yaabaraga, yaarugayo kuza Makedonia.
Ku yaaherize kuraba omu bicweka ebyo, n'okubagumya omuri bingi, yaahika Bugriika.
Okwo yaamarayo ameezi ashatu; ku yaabaire naayenda kugyendera omu meeri kuza Siria, Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okumwita; n'ahabw'ekyo yaamariirira kugaruka ogwa Makedonia.
Abaagyenzire nawe kumuhitsya Asia ni Sopateera owa Beroya, mwene Puuro, Aristariiko na Sekundo aba Tesalonika, Gaayo owa Derube, na Timoseo, Tukiko na Trofimo aba Asia.
Abo baatwebembera, baatutegyerereza Troa;
kwonka itwe, bwanyima y'ebiro by'Emigaati etatumbisiibwe, twaruga Filipi, twaza omu meeri, twabashanga Troa, tumazire ebiro bitaano; okwo twamarayo ebiro mushanju.
Omuri kanyinaishatu omu twabaire tuteeraniire, hakaba harimu amatabaaza maingi;

kandi omutsigazi orikwetwa Yutuko akaba ashutami omu dirisa; yaagira oturo twingi; Paulo ku yaagumiizemu naagamba, Yutuko ogwo yaarembibwa oturo, yaahanantuka omuri kanyinaishatu, yaagwa ahansi, baamwihaho akabire.
Paulo yaashuuma, yaamwinamaho, yaamubumbatira, naagira ati: Mutacura, ahakuba akihuriire.
Paulo yaagaruka yaatemba, yaabega omugaati, yaarya, bwanyima yaagumizamu naagaaniira nabo omwanya muhango okuhitsya omu kasheeshe; atyo yaagyenda.
Omutsigazi ogwo baamwihayo ahuriire, baagarukwa emitima omunda.
Itwe twayebembera kuza aha meeri, twagizamu, twayambuka Asosi, ei twayenzire ngu twakiirire Paulo; ahakuba akaba aturagiire atyo, ngu we arabe ogw'ebigyere.
Ku yaatubugaine Asosi, twamutaasya omu meeri, twaija Mituleene.
Ku twarugireyo, omu kasheeshe twahika aharikureeba Kio; aha kiro kya kashatu twahika Samo; aha kiro kya kana twahika Mileeto.
Paulo akaba amaririire kuhingura Efeso ari omu meeri, ngu atakyerererwa Asia; ahabw'okuba akaba naayehuuta ngu, ku kiraabe nikibaasika, ekiro kya Pentekoote kimushangye Yerusaalemu.
Ku yaabaire ari Mileeto, yaatuma omuri Efeso kwetayo abakuru b'ekanisa.
Ku baamuhikireho, yaabagira ati: Imwe nimumanya oku naatwire naimwe ebiro byona okuruga aha izooba eri naahikiireho omuri Asia;
nkaba nkorera Mukama n'obucureezi bwingi nindira, omu by'okugyezibwa ebyambaireho ahabw'enaama mbi z'Abayudaaya.
Nimumanya ku ntaratiinire kubagambira kigambo kyona eky'omugasho, nimbeegyeseza omu maisho ga boona, kandi n'omu maju gaanyu emwe-emwe,
nimpamiza Abayudaaya n'Abagriika okweteisiza Ruhanga, n'okwikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Kandi mbwenu, reeba niinyinamuka Yerusaalemu, ngyemirwe Omwoyo, ntarikumanya birambeho naahikayo;
kureka Omwoyo Orikwera nammanyisiza omuri buri tauni ku okubohwa n'okubonabonesibwa bintegyerereizeyo.

Tindikuteekateeka ha magara gangye nk'ekintu kikuru eky'obuguzi; eki ndikwenda ni kimwe, n'okuheza orugyendo rwangye n'obuheereza obu naahairwe Mukama waitu Yesu, bw'okuhamya engiri y'embabazi za Ruhanga.
Hati mbwenu nimmanya ngu imwe mwena abu naabaire ndabamu nimbuurira eby'obukama, timurindeeba bundi.
Nikyo ndikuhamiza omu maisho gaanyu mwena nti: Ndi mwere aha by'eshagama y'abantu boona;
ahakuba tindatiinire kubagambira naama yoona eya Ruhanga.
Imwe mwerinde, kandi murinde n'obusyo bwona obu Omwoyo Orikwera yaabakwatsize kuba abareeberezi baabwo, okuriisa ekanisa ya Ruhanga ei yaayeguriire n'eshagama ye.
Nimmanya ngu, ku ndiheza kubarugaho, emishega eshuugire eryabataahirira, terisaasira busyo;
kandi n'omuriimwe haryarugamu abantu abarikugamba eby'obuhabe, niboosya abeegi ngu babakurate.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba, kandi mwijukye ku ntararekire kuhana muntu weena n'amarira, okumara emyaka eshatu nyomushana na nyekiro.
Kandi na hati mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, nimbatsigira Ruhanga n'ekigambo ky'embabazi ze, ekirikubaasa kubombeka n'okubaha obuhunguzi hamwe na boona abeeziibwe.
Tindeetengire feeza y'omuntu weena, n'obu eraabe ezaabu, n'obu kyakuba eky'okujwara.
Imwe mwena nimumanya ngu emikono yangye egi nimwo naabaire nyiha eby'okuntunga n'abu naabaire nyine.

Omuri byona mbabeereire eky'okureeberaho, ngu mubone kukora mutyo emirimo, kuhwera abataine maani, n'okwijuka ebigambo ebi Mukama waitu Yesu yaagambire naagira ati: Okugaba kuhaisa omugisha okukira okuheebwa.
Boona baarira munonga, baagwa Paulo omu bitsya, baamunywegyera,
nibashaasha, n'okukira byona ahabw'ekigambo eki yaabaragisa, ati: Amaisho n'aga. Baamushendekyereza okuhika aha meeri.
Ku twataine nabo, twaza omu meeri, twagyema ogurikuza Koosi; ku bwaseesire, twahika Roodo; twarugayo twahika Patara.
Ku twashangire emeeri neeyenda kuza Foiniike, twagizamu, twagyenda.
Ku twarangiza Kupuro, twagitsiga aha rubaju rwa bumosho, twaza Siria, twahika aha nkungu ya Tuuro, ahakuba niho baabaire nibaza kuteekururira ebintu omu meeri.
Ku twareebire abeegi, twamarayo ebiro mushanju. Abo baateisa Paulo nibagambisibwa Omwoyo, kutaza Yerusaalemu.

Ku twamazireyo ebyo biro, twarugayo, twahamya orugyendo rwaitu; boona hamwe n'abakazi baabo n'abaana baatushendekyereza, okuhitsya obu baatwogize omu rurembo; ku twahikire aha nyanja, twatsimba amaju, twashaba, twaragana.
Ku twataahire omu meeri, baagaruka owaabo.
Ku twaherize orugyendo rw'okuruga Tuuro, twahika Potolemai; twaramutsya ab'eishe-emwe, twaraarayo nabo.
Ku bwaseesire, twarugayo, twahika Kaisarea; twataaha omu nju ya Filipo omubuurizi w'engiri, owaabaire ari omwe ahari bari badiikoni mushanju, twaguma owe.
Kandi akaba aine abaishiki bana b'empangare, abaabaire baragura.
Ku twagumireyo ebiro bingi, haija omushaija nabi, orikwetwa Agabo, naaruga Buyudaaya.

Ku yaatuhikire, yaakwata orukoba rwa Paulo, yaarwekomesa ebigyere n'emikono, yaagira ati: Oku nikwo Omwoyo Orikwera arikugira ati: Abayudaaya ba Yerusaalemu nikwo barikoma mukama w'orukoba oru, bakamuhayo omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga.
Ku twahuriire ekyo, itwe n'abantu baayo twamweshengyereza ngu arekye kwinamuka Yerusaalemu.
Paulo yaagarukamu ati: Nimukora ki okurira n'okuncwa omutima? Mumanye ngu tiinyeteekateekire kuboherwa Yerusaalemu kwonka, kureka n'okufeerayo ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Ku yaayangire kutuhurira, twarereera, twagira tuti: Eki Mukama arikwenda kibe nikyo kyakorwa.
Bwanyima y'ebiro ebyo twakoma ebyaitu, twainamuka Yerusaalemu;
n'abeegi bamwe aba Kaisarea baagyenda naitwe, baija n'omwegi owa ira orikwetwa Munasooni owa Kupuro, owaabaire naayenda kuturaaza.
Ku twahikire Yerusaalemu, ab'eishe-emwe baatwakiira n'okushemererwa.
Ku bwaseesire, Paulo yaagyenda naitwe owa Yakobo; kandi abakuru boona bakaba bari aho.
Ku yaaherize kubaramutsya, yaabateekyerereza byona buri kimwe, ebi Ruhanga yaakozire omu Banyamahanga omu kuheereza kwe.
Nabo ku baabihuriire, baahimbisa Ruhanga. Bwanyima baamugira bati: Ow'eishe-emwe, oreebire omu Bayudaaya ku harimu abantu enkumi n'enkumi abaikiriize; boona baine obweziriki ahabw'Ebiragiro;
kandi boona bakagambirwa ebyawe ngu oyegyesa Abayudaaya boona abaatwire omu Banyamahanga kureka ebya Musa, kandi obagambira ngu barekye kushara abaana baabo, n'okukwata emigyenzo y'ediini yaabo.
Mbwenu tigure tuta? Ahakuba tibaribura kuhurira ku oizire.
N'ahabw'ekyo kora eki turikukugambira. Aha twineho abashaija bana abaayerahiriire endahiro;

obatware, oyeyeze hamwe nabo, obaihurire ebi bacwereirwe, babone kumwa eishokye aha mitwe yaabo. Mbwenu boona nibaija kumanya ngu ebi baagambiirwe ahariiwe n'ebishuba, ahakuba naiwe wenka oyerinda, kandi oyorobera Ebiragiro.
Kandi eby'Abanyamahanga abaikiriize, tukabahandiikira ebaruha, nitubaragiira kwerinda ebihongyirwe ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, n'eshagama, n'ebinigirwe, n'obushambani.
Atyo Paulo yaatwara abashaija abo; ku bwaseesire, yaayeyeza nabo, yaataaha nabo omuri hekalu, yaaranga ahu ebiro by'okwezibwa birihwera, ku nibwo ekitambo kya buri omwe kiriheebwayo.
Ebiro ebyo mushanju ku byabaire biri haihi kuhwa, Abayudaaya abaarugire Asia, ku baamureebire omuri hekalu, baajagaraza omutwe gwona ogw'abantu, baamuyookyera, baamukwata,

baayomba nibagira bati: Imwe bashaija Baisraeli 'mwe, nimutuhwere! Omushaija ogu niwe ayegyesa abantu boona hoonahoona kugaya eihanga ryaitu, n'Ebiragiro, n'omwanya ogu; kandi areetsire Abagriika omuri hekalu, yaashiisha omwanya ogu ogurikwera.
Ahakuba bakaba bahereerukire kumureeba omu rurembo na Trofimo owa Efeso, baateekateeka ngu Paulo amureetsire omuri hekalu.
Orurembo rwona rwatengatenga, abantu baayooka, baakwata Paulo, baamukurura omuri hekalu; ahonaaho enyigi zaakingwa.
Ku baabaire nibenda kumwita, enkuru yaahika aha mukuru w'engabo, ngu Yerusaalemu yoona neerabanamu.
Ahonaaho yaahurura n'abaserukare n'abakuru baabo, yaabashuumira nairuka; bo, ku baamureebire n'abaserukare, baarekyeraho kuteera Paulo.
Omukuru w'engabo yairira haihi, yaakwata Paulo, yaaragiira kumukomesa enjegyere ibiri; bwanyima yaamubuuza eiziina rye, n'eki akozire.
Abamwe aha b'omu mutwe baayomba okwabo, n'abandi okwabo; ku yaareebire ataabaasa kushoborokyerwa amazima ahabw'okuyomba, yaaragiira kumutwara omu kigo ky'abaserukare.
Ku yaahikire aha matembero, abaserukare baamukiriza ahabw'ekiniga ky'abantu;
ahabw'okuba omutwe gw'abantu gukamukuratira niguyomba munonga nigugira guti: Mumwiheho!
Paulo, ku yaabaire ari haihi kutaaha omu kigo, yaashaba omukuru w'engabo ati: Nkaagira eki naagamba? Yaamubuuza ati: Noomanya Orugriika?
Tori Omunyamisri ori owaagomeise abantu omu biro bihingwire, akatwara omu ihamba abashaija enkumi ina abaitsi b'abantu?
Paulo yaamugarukamu ati: Ndi Omuyudaaya owa Taruso ey'omuri Kilikia, ow'omu rurembo orutarikugaywa; ninkweshengyereza, onyikirize ngambire aba bantu.
Ku yaamwikiriize, Paulo yaayemerera aha matembero, yaacureeza abantu n'omukono; ku haabaireho okucureera kwingi yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo ati:
Beene waitu kandi Baataata, muhurire ebigambo ebi ndikwetonganira omu maisho gaanyu.
Ku baahuriire yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo, baayeyongyera kucureera. Yaagira ati:

Nyowe ndi Omuyudaaya; nkazaarirwa Taruso ey'omuri Kilikia, kwonka naakurira omu rurembo oru, nintendekwa Gamalieli, niinyegyesibwa munonga kukuratira emigyenzo y'ebiragiro bya baatatenkuriitwe, nyine obweziriki ahari Ruhanga, nkaimwe oku mubwine hati;
kandi nkaba mpiiga ab'Omuhanda ogu ngu baitwe, nimboha abashaija n'abakazi, nimbataisa omu kihome.

N'omunyamurwa omukuru niwe kareebi wangye, hamwe n'abakuru b'eishengyero boona; nibo bampaire ebaruha ezi baahandiikiire beene waitu aba Damasiko, ntwairweyo okukwata abaayo n'okubareeta Yerusaalemu babohirwe, ngu baheebwe ekiheneso.
Ku naabaire ningyenda, naahika haihi na Damasiko, nk'omu ihangwe ahonaaho naayakirwa omushana mwingi niguruga omu iguru gwanyehinguririza.
Naagwa ahansi, naahurira eiraka niringira riti: Saulo, Saulo, ompiigira ki?
Naagarukamu nti: Ori oha, Mukama wangye? Yangira ati: Niinye Yesu owa Nazareesi, ou orikuhiiga.
Abu naabaire ngyenzire nabo baareeba omushana ogwo, kwonka tibaahurira iraka ry'ogwo owaabaire naagamba naanye.
Naabuuza nti: Ngire nta, Mukama wangye? Mukama yangarukamu ati: Imuka oze Damasiko; niyo oraagambirirwe byona ebi oragiirwe kukora.
Okumurinkana kw'omushana ogwo kwampumya; n'ahabw'ekyo naakwatirirwa abo abu naabaire nyine, naahika Damasiko.
Omushaija orikwetwa Anania, omunyadiini omu Biragiro, orikusiimwa Abayudaaya boona abaabaire batwire okwo,
yaija, yaanyemerera aha rubaju, yangambira ati: Ow'eishe-emwe Saulo, humuuka. Omu kaanya ako naahumuuka, naamureeba.
Yaagira ati: Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe akutooraine ngu omanye ebi akunda, oreebe Ogwo Ohikiriire, kandi ohurire eiraka eririkuruga omu kanwa ke.
Ahakuba oryaba kareebi we ow'okuhamiza abantu boona ebi oreebire n'ebi ohuriire.
Mbwenu otegyereize ki? Imuka, obatizibwe, oyogye ebibi byawe, otakire eiziina rye.
naamureeba yangira ati: Otakyerererwa; rahuka orugye Yerusaalemu, ahabw'okuba tibarikwija kwikiriza okuhamya oku orikumpamya.
Naanye naagira nti: Mukama wangye, bo bonka nibamanya ngu nkaba nkwata abarikukwikiriza, mbata omu bihome, kandi mbateerera omuri sinagogi zoona;
kandi obu baajwisa eshagama ya Stefano kareebi waawe, nkaba nyemereireho nimbisiima, ndinzire n'ebijwaro byabo abaamwitsire.
Yangambira ati: Irooko, ahakuba niinyija kukutuma hare omu Banyamahanga.
Baaguma bamuhurikiize okuhitsya obu yaagambire ekigambo ekyo; okuruga aho baayomba munonga nibagira bati: Mwihe omu nsi ekishaija ekyo; tikishemereire kugumaho.
Ku baabaire nibayomba munonga, nibatambika emyenda yaabo, kandi nibanaga n'omucuucu ahaiguru,
omukuru w'engabo yaaragiira kumutaasya omu kigo, n'okumwasha nibamutatsya, ngu abone kwetegyereza eki baamuteererera enduuru.
Ku baaherize kumubohesa enkoba, Paulo yaabuuza omukuru w'abaserukare owaabaire ayemereire haihi, ati: Ebiragiro nibibaikiriza kwasha omuntu Omurooma, atakacwereirwe rubanja?
Omukuru ogwo, ku yaakihuriire, yaaza aha mukuru w'engabo, yaamugira ati: Nooyenda kukora ki? Ahakuba omushaija ogu n'Omurooma.
Omukuru w'engabo yaija, yaamubuuza ati: Ngambira; ori Omurooma? Paulo ati: Eego.
Omukuru w'engabo yaagira ati: Nyowe nkatunga Oburooma obu n'empiiha nyingi. Paulo ati: Kwonka nyowe nibwo naazairwemu.
Ahonaaho abo abaabaire nibenda kumutatsya baamurugaho; kandi omukuru w'engabo nawe yaatiina, ahabw'okumanya ku Paulo ari Omurooma, kandi yaamubohire.

Ku bwaseesire, yaayenda kumanya amazima g'ekigambo eki Abayudaaya bamutabaaririize, yaamubohoorora, yaaragiira abanyamurwa abakuru n'ab'eishengyero boona kuteeranira hamwe, yaashuumya Paulo, yaamuta omu maisho gaabo.
Omunyamurwa omukuru orikwetwa Anania yaaragiira abamwemereire haihi kumuteera omunwa.
Paulo yaamugira ati: Ruhanga aryakuteera naiwe, iwe kisiika ekisiigirwe einoni 'we! Waashutama kuncwera orubanja nk'Ebiragiro oku biri; kandi waaragiira kunteera omu buryo oburikubihenda?
Abeemereire haihi baagira bati: Okaajumire omunyamurwa wa Ruhanga omukuru?
Paulo yaagira ati: Beene waitu, naaba ntamanyire ku ari omunyamurwa omukuru; ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Otarijuma omutegyeki w'eihanga ryanyu.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, haabaho okutongana kw'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo; eishengyero ryayebaganisamu habiri.
Ahakuba Abasadukaayo bagira ngu tihariho kuzooka, n'obu yaakuba maraika, n'obu gwakuba omuzimu; kwonka Abafarisaayo bo babiikiriza byona.

Haabaho okuyoogoorekana kwingi; abamwe ab'omu kigombe ky'abahandiiki b'Abafarisaayo baayemerera, baahakana nibagira bati: Tihariho kibi eki twareeba aha mushaija ogu. Shana omwoyo nari maraika akaaba amugambiire?
Empaka zaabo ku zaabire ez'amaani maingi munonga, omukuru w'engabo yaatiina ngu baaza kutaanyagura Paulo, nikwo kuragiira abaserukare kushuuma kumubaihamu n'amaani, n'okumureeta omu kigo.
Ku bwaseesire, Abayudaaya baateeranira hamwe, baahiga nibarahira okutarya n'obu kwakuba okunywa okuhitsya obu baraite Paulo.
Abaacumire egyo naama bakaba nibakira makumi ana.
Baaza aha banyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu, baabagira bati: Turahiire endahiro mpango munonga kutaroza ha by'okurya, okuhitsya obu turaite Paulo.
N'habw'ekyo imwe n'ab'eishengyero mugambire omukuru w'engabo hati, amubashuumize, nk'abarikwenda kwongyera kwetegyerereza kimwe eby'orubanja rwe; itwe tweteekateekire kumwita, atakabahikire.
Kwonka mwihwa wa Paulo yaahurira enaama yaabo ey'okumugwera, yaagyenda yaataaha omu kigo, yaakigambira Paulo.
Paulo nikwo kweta omwe aha bakuru b'abaserukare, akagira ati: Twara omutsigazi ogu, omuhitsye omukuru w'engabo; ahakuba aine eki arikwenda kumugambira.
Yaamutwara, yaamuhitsya omukuru w'engabo, yaagira ati: Paulo embohe yaanyeta, yanshaba kukureetera omutsigazi ogu, ngu aine eki arikwenda kukugambira.
Omukuru w'engabo yaamukwata omukono, yaamukiika aha rubaju, yaamubuuza omu mubonano ati: Nooyenda kungambira ki?
Onu yaagira ati: Abayudaaya bacumire enaama emwe kukushaba, ngu nyencakare oshuumye Paulo omu ishengyero, nk'abarikwenda kwongyera kubuuza ebye.

Kwonka otabaikiriza; ahabw'okuba abashaija baabo abarikukira ahari makumi ana bamugwereire, kandi barahiire endahiro okutarya n'obu kwakuba okunywa batakamwitsire; mbwenu beeteekateekire, bategyereize ekigambo kyawe.
Omukuru w'engabo yaaraga omutsigazi, naamwehanangiriza ati: Otagira ou waamanyisa ku waabingambira.

Atyo yaayeta abakuru b'abaserukare babiri, yaabaragiira ati: Muteekateekye abaserukare magana abiri n'ab'embaraasi makumi mushanju n'ab'amacumu magana abiri, baimukye eshaaha ishatu za nyekiro baze Kaisarea;
kandi yaabaragiira kusherura enyamaishwa ezirikuheeka kuheeka Paulo, babone kumuhitsya gye Felikisi omutegyeki.
Yaahandiika n'ebaruha erikugira eti:
Ow'ekitiinisa Felikisi Omutegyeki, nyowe Kulaudio Lusia ninkuramutsya munonga.
Omushaija ogu akakwatwa Abayudaaya, baayenda kumwita; ku naamanyire ku ari Omurooma, naabaizira n'abaserukare, naamujuna.
Kandi ku naayenzire kwetegyereza ebi barikumutabaariza, naamureeta omu ishengyero ryabo.
Naashanga atabaariziibwe ahabw'ebigambo by'omu biragiro byabo, kwonka rutari rubanja orw'okumwitsa n'obu kwakuba okumubohesa.
Ku naagambiirwe ku hariho enaama y'okumwita, ahonaaho naamukwoherereza, naaragiira n'abaamutabaariize okugambira omu maisho gaawe eki barikufa nawe.
Batyo abaserukare batwara Paulo, nk'oku baaragiirwe, baamuhitsya Antipatiri nyekiro.
Ku bwaseesire, abaserukare baamutsigira ab'embaraasi kugumizamu nawe, bo baagaruka omu kigo.
Kandi abo, ku baahikire Kaisarea, baaheereza Omutegyeki ebaruha, baamumurikira na Paulo,
Ku yaaherize kugishoma, yaabuuza eishaza eri yaarugiremu; ku yaamanyire ngu n'owa Kilikia,
yaagira ati: Abaakutabaariize ku baraije, niinyija kuhurira orubanja rwawe. Yaaragiira kumurindira omu kikaari kya Heroode.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro bitaano, omunyamurwa omukuru Anania yaashuma n'abakuru b'abantu bamwe n'omushija orikwetwa Terituulo ow'okubatonganira. Batyo baatabaariza Paulo aha Mutegyeki.
Ku baamwetsire, Terituulo yaatandika kumutabaariza, naagira ati:
Ow'ekitiinisa Felikisi, noomanya ngu obusingye obu bwona, obu turikwesiimiramu, niiwe burikurugaho, kandi n'ebindi ebi orikwezirika kukora kushemeza eihanga eri.
Ebyo nitubiikiriza omu buryo bwona n'omu myanya yoona, kandi nitubikusiimira munonga.
Kwonka, ka ndekye kwongyera kukurusya, ninkushaba ahabw'embabazi zaawe kutuhurira omu bigambo bikye.
Tukareeba omushaija ogu ku ari mubi munonga, naagomesa Abayudaaya baingi abari omu nsi zoona, kandi niwe mukuru omu kigombe ky'Abanazaraayo.
Ekindi akateeraho kushiisha hekalu, twamukwata, twayenda ngu tumucwere orubanja nk'ebiragiro byaitu oku biri;
kwonka omukuru w'engabo Lusia yaija, yaamutwakisa amaani maingi,
yaaragiira abaamutabaariize kwija ah'ori. Na mbwenu ku oraamubuuze, noija kumanya ebi byona ebi turikumutabaaririza.
Abayudaaya nabo baakwatanisa nawe omuribyo, baahamya ku byona nikwo biri.
Omutegyeki ku yaamwikiriize kugamba, Paulo yaagarukamu ati: Nimmanya ngu omazire emyaka mingi ori omuramuzi w'eihanga eri; n'ahabw'ekyo naaza kwetonganira nshemereirwe.
Ku oraabuuze, noija kumanya ku mmazire ebiro ikumi na bibiri nyinamukire Yerusaalemu kuramya.
Tibaranshangire nimpakana n'omuntu weena, nari shi ninjagaraza abantu omuri hekalu nari omuri sinagogi nari omu rurembo.
Kandi tibakaabaasa kukuhamiza ebi barikuntabaaririza hati.

Kwonka eki ndikwemera omu maisho gaawe n'eki: Omuhanda ogwo, ogu aba barikweta ekigombe, nigwo ngyederamu nimpeereza Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe, niinyikiriza ebyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro n'omu bya Baanabi byona;
kandi nyine amatsiko ahari Ruhanga, nk'oku nabo barikwikiriza, ngu haryabaho okuzooka kw'abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire.
Omuri ebyo nyezirika obutoosha kuguma n'omutima ogutariho rubanja ahari Ruhanga n'aha bantu.
Nkiri omuri ebyo, banshanga omuri hekalu nyeziibwe, ntaine mutwe gw'abantu abu nteeraine, n'obu rwakuba orwari. Kwonka hakaba hariho Abayudaaya bamwe abaarugire omuri Asia;
nangwa kuri nibo baizire omu maisho gaawe kuntabaariza, ku baraabe baine ekigambo ahariinye.
Nari shi reka abantu aba bagambe ekibi eki bandeebireho, obu naayemerera omu maisho g'eishengyero,
okwihaho ekigambo kimwe eki naagambire butunu nyemereire ahagati yaabo nti: Okuzooka kw'abafu nikwo kuunyemereize omu rubanja omu maisho gaanyu eri izooba.
Kwonka Felikisi, ahabw'okushoborokyerwa gye eby'Omuhanda ogwo, yaabooshesa, naagira ati: Lusia omukuru w'engabo ku ariija, nibwo ndicwa orubanja rwanyu.
Yaaragiira omukuru w'abaserukare kumurinda n'okumuha obusingye, n'okutazibira banywani be kumuhwera.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, Felikisi yaija n'omukazi we Durusila Omuyudaayakazi; yaayeta Paulo, yaahurira ebi arikugamba aha by'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
Ku yaabaire naagamba aha by'okuhikiirira n'eby'okwerinda n'eby'orubanja oruriija, Felikisi yaatiina munonga, yaagira ati: Hati rekyera aho! Ku ndibona omwanya, ndyakweta.
Kandi akaba aine amatsiko ngu Paulo aryamuha enguzi. Nikyo yaabaire amwetera kaingi kugaaniira nawe.
Kwonka ku haahingwireho emyaka ebiri, Felikisi yaahungurirwa Porokio Festo; kandi Felikisi, ahabw'okwenda kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yaatsiga Paulo omu kihome.
Festo ku yaahikire omu butegyeki bwe, bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu yaaruga Kaisarea, yainamuka Yerusaalemu.
Abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamuregyera Paulo;
baamweshengyereza nibamushaba ngu abakorere gye, amwete aije Yerusaalemu, babone kumugwera kumwitira omu muhanda.
Kwonka Festo yaagarukamu ati: Paulo arindiirwe Kaisarea, kandi niinyenda kugarukayo juba.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati: N'ahabw'ekyo abakuru omuriimwe bashuume tugyendane; omushaija ogwo ku araabe aine ekibi eki yaakozire, bamutabaarize.
Ku yaamazire owaabo ebiro ebitarikukira ahari munaana nari ikumi, yaashuuma Kaisarea; ku bwaseesire, yaashutama aha kitebe ky'eiramuriro, yaaragiira kureeta Paulo.
Ku yaizire, Abayudaaya abarugire Yerusaalemu baayemerera bamwehinguririize, nibamutabaariza emanja nyingi ez'eihano, ezi batarabaasize kuhamya mu mazima.
Paulo yaayetonganira ati: Tihariho kibi eki naakozire okushobya ebiragiro by'Abayudaaya, nari okushiisha hekalu, nari okugomera Kaisaari.
Kwonka Festo, ku yaayenzire kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yaamubuuza ati: Nooyenda kwinamuka Yerusaalemu, ngu obe niyo waacwererwa emanja ezi omu maisho gangye?
Paulo yaagarukamu ati: Nyemereire omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'eiramuriro ekya Kaisaari; niho nshemereire kucwererwa orubanja. Aha Bayudaaya tihariho kibi eki naakozire, kandi naiwe nookimanya gye.

Ku ndaabe nkozire kubi, nari shi nkozire ekishemereire kuunyitsa, tindikwanga kufa; kwonka omuri ebyo ebi barikuntabaariza, ku haraabe hatarimu na kimwe ekihikire, tihariho muntu orikubaasa kubampa. Ninjurira ahari Kaisaari.
Festo, ku yaaherize kuhanuura n'ab'eishengyeo rye, yaagira ati: Waajurira ahari Kaisaari; owa Kaisaari obe niyo waaza.
Bwanyima ku haahingwireho ebiro, Aguripa omugabe na Bereniike baahika Kaisarea, baaramutsya Festo.
Ku baamazireyo ebiro bingi, Festo yaateekyerereza omugabe orubanja rwa Paulo, naagira ati: Hariho omushaija ou Felikisi yaatsigire omu kihome.
Ku naabaire ndi Yerusaalemu, abanyamurwa abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya banteekyerereza ebye, nibanshaba kumucwera orubanja.
Naabagarukamu nti: Timucwe gw'Abarooma kuhayo omuntu oregirwe, atakeemereire n'abarikumurega, akaheebwa omwanya gw'okwetonganira ebi bamuregire.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku baateeraniire aha, tinaabiraariza; ku bwaseesire, naashutama aha kitebe ky'eiramuriro, naaragiira kureeta ogwo mushaija.
Baakitabaaza ku baayemereire, tibaareeta rubanja rw'ebigambo bibi, nk'oku naabaire ninteekateeka;
kureka baamutabaaririza empaka zimwe z'ediini yaabo, n'eby'omuntu orikwetwa Yesu owaafiire, ou Paulo arikuhamya ngu ariho ahuriire.
Ku naashobeirwe, naabura kwetegyereza empaka ezo, naamubuuza ku araabe naayenda kwinamuka Yerusaalemu, n'okucwererwayo orubanja rw'ezo mpaka.
Kwonka Paulo ku yaashabire kwemereza orubanja okuhitsya obu ruricuubwa Augusto, naaragiira ngu bamurinde, okuhitsya obu ndimwoherereza Kaisaari.
Aguripa yaagambira Festo ati: Naanye nkaayenzire kuhurira omuntu ogwo. Festo yaagira ati: Omu kasheeshe noija kumuhurira.
Ku bwaseesire, Aguripa na Bereniike baija n'ekitiinisa kingi, baataaha omu iramuriro n'abakuru b'engabo n'abakungu b'orurembo. Festo yaaragiira ku bareeta Paulo.
Festo yaagira ati: Nyakusinga Aguripa naimwe mwena abari aha, mwareeba omushaija ogu, ou omutwe gwona gw'Abayudaaya gwanshabiire Yerusaalemu n'aha, nibayomba munonga ngu tashemereire kugumaho.
Kwonka nkareeba atakozire kibi ekishemereire kumwitsa; kandi nawe ku yaajuriire ahari Augusto, naamariirira kumumutwekyera.

Mbwenu mbuzire ekigambo kihikire ahariwe eky'okuhandiikira mukama wangye. Nikyo naamureetera omu maisho gaanyu, n'okukira munonga omu maisho gaawe, Nyakusinga Aguripa, ngu ku turaaheze kumutonganisa, mbone eky'okuhandiika.
Ahakuba ninteekateeka ngu n'eky'obushema kwohereza embohe, haza ntoorekye rubanja rwe.
Aguripa yaagambira Paulo ati: Noikirizibwa kwetonganira. Paulo yaimutsya omukono, yaayetonganira naagira ati:
Nyakusinga Aguripa, naahiirwa ahakuba ebi naatabaariziibwe Abayudaaya byona niiwe naaza kubitonganaho;
kandi okukira munonga ahabw'okuba noomanyira kimwe emicwe yoona n'empaka zoona eby'Abayudaaya; n'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza ogumisirize ompurire.
Okwiha omu buto bwangye emicwe yangye, ei naakuriiremu omu ihanga ryaitu na Yerusaalemu, Abayudaaya boona nibagimanya.
Okuruga ira nibammanya, ku baakuba nibaikiriza kugamba, bakaahamya ku naabaire ndi Omufarisaayo ow'omu kicweka ekirikukira ebindi okuhitsya emigyenzo y'ediini yaitu.
Mbwenu nyemereire aha kucwerwa orubanja ahabw'amatsiko ag'eki Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe;

kandi n'enganda zaitu ikumi na ibiri, ezirikwezirika kuheereza Ruhanga nyomushana na nyekiro, nazo nikyo zitegyereize kuhikaho. Kandi naanye, ahabw'amatsiko ago, nikyo ntabaaririziibwe Abayudaaya, Nyakusinga Aguripa!
N'enki ekirikubateekateekyesa ekigambo eki ku kitarikubaasika Ruhanga kuzoora abafiire?
N'okukora nkabikora Yerusaalemu; naata abarikwera baingi omu bihome, mpairwe obushoboorozi abanyamurwa abakuru; t'ekyo kyonka, kandi n'abaabaire baitwa, nkaba nsiima ngu baitwe.
Kaingi omuri sinagogi zoona nkaba mbaha ebiheneso, mbagyemesereza kurogota; kandi ku naabaire mbagirira ekiniga kinshaza, mbahiiga nangwa n'okuhika mpika omu ndembo z'Abanyamahanga.
Mbwenu ku naabaire ninza Damasiko nyine obushoboorozi n'obutumwa bw'abanyamurwa abakuru,
Nyakusinga Omugabe, nkiri omu muhanda omu ihangwe, naareeba omushana niguruga omu iguru, nigumurinkana okukira eizooba, gwanjwera guunyehinguririize n'abo abu twagyendaine.
Ku twagwire ahansi twena, naahurira eiraka niringambira omu Ruheburaayo riti: Saulo, Saulo, ompiigira ki? Nooyerusya kuteera emigyere aha mihunda.
Naamubuuza nti: Ori oha, Mukama wangye? Mukama waitu yaagira ati: Ndi Yesu ou orikuhiiga.
Kwonka imuka, oyemerere; ahakuba nikyo naakubonekyerera, ngu nkutoorane nkugire omuheereza na kareebi w'okuhamya ebi ebi wandeeberamu, n'ebindi ebi ndikweyorekyeramu;
kandi ngu nkujune omu ihanga eri n'omu Banyamahanga abu ndikutumamu,

okuhumuura amaisho gaabo, ngu bahindukye barugye omu mwirima, baze omu mushana, barugye omu bushoboorozi bwa Sitaane, bahindukire Ruhanga; babone kwihwaho ebibi, n'okuheebwa obuhunguzi hamwe n'abarikwezibwa ahabw'okuunyikiriza.
naatandikira aho kugambira aba Damasiko, bwanyima aba Yerusaalemu n'ab'omu ishaza ryona erya Buyudaaya, kandi n'Abanyamahanga, ngu beeteise, bahindukire Ruhanga, bakore ebishemereire okweteisa kwabo.
Nikyo Abayudaaya bankwatiire ndi omuri hekalu, bakenda kuunyita.
Kwonka ahabw'okuhwera kwa Ruhanga nkyemereire n'okuhitsya eri izooba, nimpamiza abato n'abakuru, ntaine kindi eki ndikugamba kureka ebi baanabi na Musa baaragwire ku biribaho;
bati: Kristo ashemereire kubonabonesibwa; kandi ahabw'okuba ow'okubanza kuzooka omu bafu, amanyise eihanga eri n'Abanyamahanga eby'omushana.
Ku yaabaire naakyetonganira, Festo yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Paulo oshazire; obwengye bwawe bwingi bwaza kukugwisa eiraro.
Kwonka Paulo yaagira ati: Ow'ekitiinisa Festo, tinshazire, kureka ningamba ebigambo by'amazima, ntarikurengyesereza.
Ahakuba n'omugabe naamanya ebigambo ebi; kandi nimbimugambira ntaine ki ndikwekyenga; nimmanyira kimwe ngu tihariho kigambo na kimwe omuri ebi eki atarikumanya; ahakuba tibirakozirwe bwesherekye.
Nyakusinga Omugabe Aguripa, noikiriza baanabi? Nimmanya ku orikwikiriza.
Aguripa yaamugarukamu ati: Iwe oyenzire kukirahutsya kumpindura, ngu mbe omukristaayo.
Paulo yaagira ati: Ninshaba Ruhanga, yaaba mu kaanya kakye, nari shi kahango, tiiwe wenka, kureka na boona abampurira eri izooba bahindukye nkaanye, okwihaho eby'ezi njegyere.
Omugabe yaimuka n'Omutegyeki na Bereniike n'abo abaabaire bashutami nabo;
ku baashohoire, baagambirana bati: Omuntu ogu takozire kibi ekishemereire kumwitsa nari okumubohesa.
Aguripa yaagira Festo ati: Omushaija ogu akaareekwirwe, kuri atarajuriire hari Kaisaari.
Ku baaherize kuturagiira kwambuka omu meeri kuza Italia, baahayo Paulo n'ezindi mbohe, baabakwatsa omukuru w'omutwe gw'abaserukare ogurikwetwa Omutwe gwa Augusto, eiziina rye Yulio.
Twaza omu meeri ya Aduramutio, eyaabaire neeyenda kuraba aha nyambukiro za Asia, twagyenda omu nyanja, tushendekyereziibwe Aristariiko, Omunyamakedonia owa Tesalonika.
Aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Sidoni; okwo Yulio yaagirirayo gye Paulo, yaamwikiriza kutaayaayira banywani be n'okuruhuukaho.
Twarugayo, twaraba ahansi y'ekirwa kya Kupuro kwekingayo omuyaga, ahakuba gukaba gututurukire omumaisho.
Ku twayambukire enyanja eri haihi na Kilikia na Pamufulia, twahika Mura, tauni ya Likia.
Okwo omukuru w'abaserukare niyo yaashangire emeeri ya Alegizanderia, neeza Italia, akagitutamu.
Twamara ebiro bingi nitugyenda mpora, twahika haihi na Kunido twaruhire; omuyaga ku gwatuzibiire kugumizamu, nikwo kugaruka ahansi y'ekirwa kya Kureete omu maisho ga Salumooni kugwekingaho.
Twakyekiikuura twaruhire, twahika aharikwetwa Nyambukiro-nungi haihi n'orurembo Lasea.
Baataata, nindeeba ngu orugyendo oru nirwija kubamu okusiisikarirwa n'okufeerwa kwingi, ti kwa bintu n'emeeri byonka, kureka kandi n'amagara gaitu.
Kwonka omukuru w'abaserukare yaayeta aha bigambo by'omuvugi n'omukuru w'emeeri okukira ebya Paulo.

Ahabw'enyambukiro kutaba nungi kumariramu ebiro by'embeho, abaingi baabahabura ngu ekirungi n'okurugayo bakagumizamu aha nyanja, ngu shana bakaahika Foinike enyamubukiro y'omuri Kureete erikureeba ahagati y'obukiizi-bwa-bumosho n'oburugwa-izooba, n'ahagati y'obukiizi-bwa-buryo n'oburugwa-izooba, bamarirayo ebiro by'embeho.
Omuyaga ku gwahuuhire mpora nigwiha omu bukiizi-bwa-buryo, baateekateeka ngu baabona eki baaba nibenda; baakuura ekitsibo, baagyenda baakiikuuka Kureete haihi n'enkungu.
Kwonka ku haahingwireho omwanya mukye, haija eihunga ry'amaani eririkwetwa Yurakuulo niriruga aha kirwa.
Emeeri yaayemerera, yaaremawa kugyema omu muyaga, nikwo kugireka, gukatutwara gwonka.
Twaraba ahansi y'akarwa akarikwetwa Kulauda, twayekingaho omuyaga, twabona kukomera akaato ak'enyima omu meeri, kwonka kyaturusya munonga.

Ku baaherize kukahitsya omu meeri, baihayo emirunga, baagirabya ahansi y'emeeri, baagikoma, baagigumya. Bwanyima ku baatiinire kunagwa aha musheenyi ogurikwetwa Siruti, baahanura amatanga, baatwarwa batyo omuyaga.
Ku twacurangiibwe eihunga munonga, aha kiro kya kabiri baatandika kunaga ebintu omu nyanja.
Aha kiro kya kashatu baanaga ebirikugyendesa emeeri n'emikono yaabo.
Ku twamazire ebiro bingi tutakireeba izooba n'obu zaakuba enyonyoozi, kandi eihunga ringi nirikituteera, amatsiko goona ag'okukira twagahwa.
Ku baamazire omwanya muhango batarikurya, Paulo yaayemerera ahagati yaabo, yaagira ati: Baataata, mukaba mushemereire kumpurira kutaruga Kureete, kureeba okusiisiikarirwa oku, n'okufeerwa.
Mbwenu nimbagambira nti: Mugume emitima, ahabw'okuba tiharikwija kufa muntu n'omwe omuriimwe, kureka emeeri yonka.
Ahakuba eki kiro haizire maraika wa Ruhanga, naanye ou ndi owe, kandi ou mpeereza, yaanyemerera aha rubaju;
yaagira ati: Paulo, otatiina; oshemereire kwemerera omu maisho ga Kaisaari; kandi reeba, Ruhanga akuhaire abo boona abarikugyenda naiwe.
Mbwenu, mugume emitima, bashaija 'mwe; ahakuba niinyesiga Ruhanga, ku kirikwija kuba nk'oku ngambiirwe.
Kwonka tushemereire kugira ekirwa eki twanagwaho.
Ekiro kya ikumi na bina kyahika nitucurangibwa omuyaga omu nyanja ya Aduria; omu itumbi abarimbi baateekateeka ngu bairiire haihi n'enkungu.
Baagyera oburaingwa bw'amaizi, baashanga ziri yaadi makumi ana; ku bairiire kakye omumaisho, baagaruka baagyera, baashanga ziri yaadi makumi ashatu.
Ahabw'okutiina kweshekura aha nkiri, baashuumya ebitsibo bina enyima y'emeeri, nibenda ngu bubanze busheeshe.
Abarimbi baateeraho kuruga omu meeri ngu bahungye, baashuumya akaato omu nyanja, nibeeshushanisa nk'abarikwenda kushuumya ebitsibo omu maisho g'emeeri;
Paulo yaagambira omukuru w'abaserukare n'abaserukare ati: Abo ku baraabe batagumire mu meeri, timurikubaasa kukira.
Abaserukare nikwo kushara emirunga y'akaato, bakakareka, kakagyenda.
Ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana, Paulo yaabeeshengyereza boona kurya aha by'okurya, naagira ati: Eri izooba n'ekiro kya ikumi na bina nimusiibakwo, mutariire kantu.
Nikyo ndikubeeshengyerereza kurya aha by'okurya; nibyo biraija kubaha amaani, kandi tiharikwija kugira kashokye na kamwe akaabura aha mitwe yaanyu mwena.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaakwata omugaati, yaasiima Ruhanga omu maisho ga boona, yaagubega, yaatandika kurya.
Boona baiha aho baaguma emitima, baarya aha by'okurya.
Twena abaabaire bari omu meeri tukaba turi abantu magana abiri na makumi mushanju na mukaaga.
Ku baaherize kuhaaga, baanaga engano omu nyanja, ngu emeeri eyanguhirwe.
Ku bwaseesire, tibaamanya nsi ei baareebire; kwonka baareeba omukono gw'enyanja oguriho enyambukiro y'omusheenyi, baahanuura kureeba yaaba nibabaasa kuhitsyayo emeeri.

Baacwaho ebitsibo, baabitsiga omu nyanya; ku baabaire nibakikora ebyo, baakomorora emirunga eyaabaire ekwatsire ebirikubogora emeeri; baahanika eitanga ery'omumaisho ngu babone kutwarwa omuyaga nibagyema enyambukiro.
Kwonka ku baahikire ahu amaizi gaabugaabuganira, omutwe gw'emeeri gwashaaya, emeeri yaaguma aho, kandi ekibunu kyayo kyasheenyagurwa amaani g'ebingozi.
Abaserukare baacwa obwengye kwita embohe, ngu zitaziha, zikacwa;
kwonka omukuru waabo, ahabw'okwenda kukiza Paulo, yaabazibira kubaita; yaaragiira ngu, abarikumanya kuziha beetuure omu nyanja, bazihe bahikye aha nkungu,
kandi ngu abandi bagyendere aha mbaaho nari aha bicweka by'emeeri. Batyo boona baakira, baahika aha nkungu.
Ku twaherize kukira, twabona kumanya ngu ekirwa ekyo nikyetwa melita.
Enzaarwa zaakyo zaatugirira embabazi ezitagirwa bantu boona; ahakuba zikatuhembera omuriro, zaatwakiira twena, ahabw'enjura eyaabaire neegwa, kandi hariho n'embeho.
Paulo ku yaateeraine omuganda gw'enku, yaazita omu muriro; ahonaaho ahabw'ekibabo ky'omuriro haarugamu empiri, emuri aha mukono neereereeta.
Abazaarwa b'ekyo kirwa, ku baareebire egyo mpiri emwezingire aha mukono, baagambirana bati: Buzima omuntu ogu n'omwitsi; n'obu araabe yaakira enyanja, ruhanga otasingisiriza tayenzire ku agumaho.
Kwonka Paulo yaakunkumurira egyo mpiri omu muriro, tiyaagira ku yaaba.

Abashaija abo baateekateeka ngu naija kuzimba, nari shi agwe aho, afeereho; kwonka ku baamazire omwanya muhango bategyereize, baareeba hataine kabi akaamubaho, baahindura ebiteekateeko, baagira ngu, Ni ruhanga.
Haihi n'omwanya ogwo hakaba hariho emisiri y'omutegyeki mukuru w'ekirwa ekyo orikwetwa Pubulio, yaatwakiira, yaatukunira gye ebiro bishatu.
Kandi ishe wa Pubulio akaba arwaire omushwija n'esheshe. Paulo yaataaha omu nju ye, yaamushabira, yaamutaho engaro, yaamukiza.
Ekyo ku kyakozirwe, n'abandi barwaire ab'omu kirwa ekyo baija, baatambirwa.
Baatuha ekitiinisa kingi; kandi ku twabaire niturugayo, baatureetera omu meeri ebi twabaire nitwetenga byona.
Ku hahingwireho ameezi ashatu, twarugayo omu meeri eya Alegizanderia, eyaamazire ebiro by'embeho omu kirwa ekyo, akamanyiso kaayo bari Baaruhanga b'Empasha.
Twahika Surakuusa, twamarayo kashatu.
Omu kurugayo twayekiikuura, twahika Regio; ku haahingwireho ekiro kimwe, haija omuyaga gw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo; aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Puteoli.
Okwo twashangayo ab'eishe-emwe, baatweshengyereza kumara nabo ebiro mushanju. Okwo nikwo twahikire Rooma.
Ab'eishe-emwe ab'omuri Rooma, ku baatuhuriire, baija, baatubugana aha Katare ka Apio, n'aha Maduuka Ashatu. Paulo, ku yaabareebire, yaasima Ruhanga, yaaguma omutima.
Ku twataahire omuri Rooma, omukuru w'abaserukare yaamurikira embohe omukuru w'abaserukare abaabaire nibarinda Kaisaari; kwonka baikiriza Paulo kweraaza naarindwa omuserukare.

Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu, yaayeta abakuru b'Abayudaaya; ku baateeraine hamwe, yaabagira ati: Beene waitu, nyowe n'obu ndaabe ntaine kibi eki naakozire aha ihanga ryaitu, nari okushobya emigyenzo ya baatatenkuriitwe, kwonka bakampayo aha Barooma ndi embohe, nibaanyiha Yerusaalemu.
Abarooma bo, ku baaherize kuntonganisa, baayenda kundekura, ahabw'okuba bakareeba ntaine rubanja rw'okuunyitsa.
Bwanyima Abayudaaya ku baabyangire, naagyemwa kujurira ahari Kaisaari; kwonka ntaine ki ndikurega eihanga ryaitu.
Ebyo nibyo mbatumiire ngu tureebane, tugaaniire; ahabw'okuba eki naatuzirwe, kandi ekimboheise omu rujegyere oru, n'amatsiko agu Abaisraeli batuura bategyereize.

Nabo baamugarukamu bati: Itwe titukatungaga mabaruha agarikuruga Buyudaaya kutumanyisa ebyawe, kandi tihariho n'omwe omuri beene waitu oraizire aha, akatugambira enkuru mbi ahariiwe, n'obu kwakuba okukugambaho kubi.
Mbwenu ka tuhurire eki orikuteekateeka; ahakuba ekigombe eki nikijumwa hoonahoona.

Baamuraganisa erindi izooba; baija baingi omu nju ei yaabaire acumbikiremu. Yaabashobororera okuruga omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu mwabazyo, naabahamiza eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, naateeraho kubaikiririsa ebya Yesu, naiha omu Biragiro bya Musa n'omu bya Baanabi.
Abamwe baikiriza ebi yaabagambira, abandi tibaabiikiriza.
Ku baabire nibenda kurugayo bataikirizaine, Paulo yaayongyera kubagambira ekigambo kimwe ati: Ebi Omwoyo Orikwera yaagambiire baashwenkuriimwe omu kanwa ka nabi Isaaya, akabigamba gye ati:
Okuhurira kwo muryahurira, kwonka timurishoborokyerwa;
Okureeba kwo muryareeba, kwonka timuryetegyereza;
Ahakuba emitima y'abantu aba ehindukire ebitsire,
N'amatu gaabo nigahurira kubi,
N'amaisho gaabo bagahumiize,
Ngu batakaareebesa amaisho gaabo,
N'okuhuriza amatu gaabo,
N'okwetegyereza n'emitima yaabo,
N'okuhinduka, ngu mbakize.
Ku yaagambire ebigambo ebyo, Abayudaaya baagyenda nibahakana munonga bonka na bonka.
Bwanyima Paulo yaamarayo emyaka ebiri yoona, nayeihurira empiiha z'enju ei yaabaire naaraaramu; naayakiira boona abaabaire bamutaayaayira,
naabuurira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, naayegyesa ebya Mukama waitu Yesu n'obumanzi bwona, ataine orikumuzibira.
ei yaaraganiise ira omu kanwa ka baanabi be omu Byahandiikirwe ebirikwera;
engiri egyo niyo emanyisa eby'Omwana we owaazairwe omuri baijukuru ba Daudi omu mubiri,
kandi akoorekwa n'amaani ku ari Omwana wa Ruhanga ahabw'okuzooka omu bafu, nk'oku Omwoyo Orikwera yaaragwire, Ogwo niwe Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu.
Niwe yaatuhaisize embabazi n'okuba entumwa ez'okureetera ab'omu mahanga goona okworobera owkwikiriza ahabw'eiziina rye;
kandi naimwe muri omuri abo abaayetsirwe kuba aba Yesu Kristo.

Mbwenu imwe ab'omuri Rooma, abarikukundwa Ruhanga, kandi abaayetsirwe kuba abarikwera, naabahandiikira. Nimbendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe, na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Okubanza ninsiima Ruhanga wangye omuri Yesu Kristo ahabwanyu mwena, ahabw'okuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikugambwa omu nsi zoona.
Ruhanga, ou mpeereza omu mutima gwangye omu ngiri n'Omwana we, niwe kareebi wangye orikuhamya ku mbaijuka obutoosha omu kushaba kwangye,
ngu, ku kiraabe nikibaasika hati ahabw'okukunda kwa Ruhanga, aha muheru gwa byona aikirize kundeeta n'obusingye, ampitsye owaanyu,
ahakuba mbainiire orushusho ngu mbone kubaha omugisha gw'Omwoyo, gubagumye;
nikwo kugira ngu tugumyane, nyowe ngumibwe okwikiriza kwanyu, naimwe okwangye.
B'eishe-emwe, niinyenda ku mumanya ngu kaingi nkenda kwija owaanyu, ngu ndeebe n'omuriimwe ebyana, nk'oku naabireebire omu Banyamahanga abandi; kwonka hariho ebyanzibiire n'okuhitsya hati.
Abagriika n'ab'amahanga agandi, abanyabwengye n'abatabwine, mbaineho eibanja;
n'ahabw'ekyo nyowe ahabwangye ninkunda munonga kubabuurira engiri naimwe ab'omuri Rooma.
Ahakuba engiri terikunkwatsa nshoni, ahabw'okuba nigo maani ga Ruhanga, agahaisa orikwikiriza weena okujunwa, okubandiza aha Bayudaaya, kandi n'aha Bagriika.

Ahakuba omu ngiri egyo okuhikiirira okurikuruga ahari Ruhanga nimwo kushuuruurirwa okuheebwa ahabw'okwikiriza, kukagumizamu omu kwikiriza, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Ohikiriire aryaba ohuriire ahabw'okwikiriza.
ahakuba ebirikubaasikira abantu kumanya ahari Ruhanga babishoborokyerwa, ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akabibashuuruurira.
Okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi ebya Ruhanga ebitareebwa eby'obushoboorozi bwe obutahwaho, n'obwaruhanga bwe, bikareebekyera kimwe, nibimanyirwa aha bi yaahangire; n'ahabw'ekyo tibaine ky'okwekwatsa;
ahakuba, n'obu baraabe baamanyire Ruhanga, kwonka tibaramuhimbiise nka Ruhanga, n'obu kwakuba okumusiima, bakahabisibwa ebiteekateeko byabo, n'emitima yaabo y'emishema yaashwekwa omwirima.
Ku baayeyetsire abanyabwengye, baahinduka ebifa-mutima;
omu mwanya gw'ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga otafa baatamu ebishushani by'abantu abafa, n'eby'ebirikuguruka, n'eby'enyamaishwa, n'eby'ebirikugyendesa enda.
Nikyo Ruhanga yaabarekyeire kukurata ebi emitima yaabo erikwetenga, bakakora ebihagaro, bakashiisha oburungi bw'emibiri yaabo bonka na bonka;
ahakuba amazima ga Ruhanga bakagahindura ebishuba, baaramya ebyahangirwe, baabiheereza okukira Omuhangi orikusiimwa ebiro byona Amiina.
N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga akabareka, ngu bategyekwe emize erikwitsa enshoni; abakazi baabo baareka eki emibiri yaabo yaahangiirwe, baagikoresa ekitari ky'obuhangwa;
kandi n'abashaija nabo baareka kukorera abakazi eby'obuhangwa, baabugumwamu okurigira okubi, abashaija baakora eby'obuhemu aha bandi bashaija, baihurwa omu mibiri yaabo ebishemereire obuhabe bwabo.
Kandi nk'oku baayangire kumanya Ruhanga omu mitima yaabo, Ruhanga nikyo yaabarekyeire kugira emitima etarikusiimwa, n'okukora ebitashemeire;
baijuriire kimwe okutahikiirira kwona, obubi, omururu, n'okwangana; baijwire n'eihari, obwitsi, n'entongane, obugobya, n'eitima;
n'abantu abahwihwitsa, n'abagambuura nibabeiha, abanga Ruhanga, abanyamaryo, abeemanya, abeekuza, abeecwera ebibi, abagomera abaabazaire,
abateetegyereza, abaita endagaano, abatakunda bantu, abatasaasira.
Abo, n'obu bamanya orubanja oru Ruhanga acwera abakora nk'ebyo, ngu bashemereire kufa, tibabikora kwonka, kandi basiima n'ababikora.
Kandi nitumanya ngu orubanja, oru Ruhanga acwera abakora nk'ebyo, n'orw'amazima.
Iwe omuntu, ocwera abakora nk'ebyo orubanja, haza naiwe noobikora, nooteekateeka ngu oryakira orubanja rwa Ruhanga?
Nari noogaya obutungi bw'embabazi ze, n'obw'okugumisiriza kwe, n'obw'okwetwara kwe? Torikumanya ngu embabazi za Ruhanga ziba ez'okukuhitsya aha kweteisa?
Kwonka ahabw'omutima gwawe ogugangaire, oguteeteisa, oyebiikira ekiniga ekiribaho aha kiro ky'ekiniga, ahu Ruhanga arishuuruurira orubanja oruhikire;
ahakuba aryaihura omuntu weena ebishemereire ebi yaakozire.
Abasherura ekitiinisa n'okusiimwa n'okutafa, nibabisheruza okukora gye batarikuruha, aryabaihura amagara agatahwaho;
kwonka abaine emitima y'empaka n'abatoorobera mazima, kureka aboorobera okutahikiirira, aryabaihura okuguubwa kubi n'ekiniga kingi,
n'okubonabonesibwa n'obusaasi; ebyo nibyo biriba aha muntu weena okora kubi, okubandiza aha Muyudaaya okuhika aha Mugriika;
kwonka oburungi n'ekitiinisa n'obusingye biryaba aha muntu weena okora gye, okubandiza aha Muyudaaya okuhika aha Mugriika;
ahakuba Ruhanga tashoroora mu bantu.
Abaakozire ebibi batarikumanya Biragiro, baryahwerekyerezibwa batarikuturwa Biragiro; kandi boona abaakozire ebibi nibamanya Ebiragiro, baryacwerwa orubanja omu Biragiro;
ahakuba abahurira buhurizi Ebiragiro tibo bahikiriire omu maisho ga Ruhanga; kureka ababyorobera nibo baihwaho orubanja.
Abanyamahanga abataine Biragiro, ku baraabe bakora ebi ebiragiro biragiira ahabw'obuhangwa, biri baba beehindukiire ebiragiro, n'obu baraabe bataine Biragiro.
Booreka ngu eki Ebiragiro byetenga kihandiikirwe omu mitima yaabo, kihamibwa eiraka ry'omwoyo erituura omuribo, kandi kikwatanisa n'ebiteekateeko byabo kubashinja, nari kubatonganira;
kandi nikwo kiriba aha kiro eki Ruhanga aricweraho emanja z'ebi abantu baakozire omu mubonano, naazicwisa Yesu Kristo, nk'engiri ei naahairwe oku egira.
Kwonka iwe oyeyeta Omuyudaaya, okeegamira Ebiragiro, okeehimbisiza omuri Ruhanga,
okamanya ebi akunda, okasiima ebirikukira oburungi ahabw'okwegyesibwa eby'omu Biragiro,
kandi okeehamya ku ori omwebembezi w'empumi, n'omushana gw'abari omu mwirima,
n'omuhabuzi w'abataine bwengye, n'omwegyesa w'abaana abato, ahabw'okuba omu Biragiro oine ebirikumanyisa obwengye n'amazima;
mbwenu iwe oyegyesa abandi, toyeyegeysa? Iwe obuurira abandi okutaiba, oiba?
Iwe ogira ngu omuntu tashemereire kushambana, oshambana? Iwe onuga ebishushani by'abacwezi, oiba eby'omuri hekalu zaabo?
Iwe oyehimbisiza omu Biragiro, kandi niiwe ogayisa Ruhanga omu kubishobya?
Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Eiziina rya Ruhanga nirijumwa omu Banyamahanga ahabwanyu.
N'eky'amazima, okusharwa nikugasha, waaba noohitsya Ebiragiro; kwonka ku orikuba noobishobya, okusharwa kwawe nikuhinduka okutasharwa.
Omuntu otashazirwe, ku araabe naahitsya ebi Ebiragiro biragiira, okutasharwa kwe tikuribarwa nk'okusharwa?
Otashazirwe mu mubiri, ku araabe naahitsya eby'omu Biragiro, tarikusingisa orubanja iwe orikushobya Ebiragiro, haza oine Ebyahandiikirwe kandi oshazirwe omu mubiri?
Ahakuba Omuyudaaya ow'aharuguru kwonka tiwe Muyudaaya w'amazima, kandi okusharwa okw'aharuguru okw'omubiri tikwo kusharwa kw'amazima;

kwonka Omuyudaaya ow'omu mutima niwe Muyudaaya, kandi okusharwa okw'omu mutima okw'omu mwoyo, kutari kw'omu bihandiiko, nikwo kusharwa; okusiimwa kw'omuntu ogwo tikuruga ha bantu, kureka ahari Ruhanga.
Omuyudaaya naakiza ki abandi? Nari shi okusharwa nikugasha ki?
Nibigasha munonga omu miringo yoona. Eky'okubanza, Abayudaaya nibo baakwatsiibwe ebyagambirwe Ruhanga.
Mbwenu shi tugambe ki? N'obu abamwe bataraikiriize, okutaikiriza kwabo nikubaasa kuhindura okwesigwa kwa Ruhanga okuba busha?
Rubuuza! Ka tuhamye Ruhanga ku aba ow'amazima, n'obu omuntu weena yaakuba omunyabishuba, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Obe ohikiriire omu bigambo byawe;
Osingye, ku oraacwerwe orubanja.
Okutahikiirira kwaitu ku kuraabe nikuhamya okuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga, tugambe ki? Tugire tuti: Ruhanga ku ahanisa ekiniga, aba atahikiriire? (Naagamba nk'oku abantu bagamba.)
Rubuuza! Ku kiraabe kiri kityo, Ruhanga aryacwera ata ensi orubanja?
Ebishuba byangye ku biraabe nibimanyisa amazima ga Ruhanga, bikamuhaisa ekitiinisa, ahanki nyowe nicwerwa orubanja nk'omusiisi?
Kandi n'enki ekirikutuzibira kukora ekibi, ngu ebirungi bibone kwija? nk'oku abamze batubeiherera, bakahamya ngu nikwo tugamba. Abarikugira batyo baryacwerwa orubanja orubashemereire.
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Tihariho ohikiriire, tihariho n'omwe;
Tihariho orikushoborokyerwa, tihariho orikusherura Ruhanga.
Boona bakahaba, boona hamwe baahinduka entakimazire;
Tihariho orikukora gye, tihariho n'omwe.
Bagobya n'endimi zaabo,
Obushegu bw'encwera buri omu minwa yaabo;
Akanwa kaabo kaijwire okukyeena n'obushaarizi;
Okuhwerekyereza n'enaku biri omu mihanda yaabo,
N'omuhanda gw'obusingye tibarikugumanya;
Tibata mutima aha kutiina Ruhanga.
ahakuba omu maisho ge tihariho muntu n'omwe orisinga orubanja ahabw'okukora emirimo erikuragiirwa Ebiragiro; ahabw'okuba Ebiragiro nibyo bimanyisa ekibi.
Kwonka hati hariho okuhikiirira okushuurwirwe okuruga ahari Ruhanga, kutari kw'ebiragiro, haza Ebiragiro n'ebya baanabi nibikuhamya,
nikwo kuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga, oku abarikwikiriza boona baheebwa ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo. Mumanye ngu tihariho mutaano;
ahakuba boona bakashiisha, kandi tibarikuhika ha kitiinisa kya Ruhanga.
Kureka baihirwaho busha orubanja ahabw'embabazi ze, naabacunguza okucungurwa okuri omuri Yesu Kristo.
Niwe Ruhanga yaataireho okuba ekarabo y'abarikwikiriza eshagama ye, ngu abone kworeka okuhikiirira kwe, okwamureeteire okwetsiza ebibi ebyakozirwe ira, ebi yaagumisiririize;
kandi ngu omu biro ebi ayorekye okuhikiirira kwe, abe Ohikiriire, kandi Oiha orubanja aha muntu weena orikwikiriza Yesu.
Mbwenu aho okwehimbisa kurahi? Tikuriho. Nikuzibirwa ki? Ahabw'emirimo? Ngaaha; kureka n'ahabw'okwikiriza.
Ahakuba nituhamya ngu omuntu aihwaho orubanja ahabw'okwikiriza, tarwihwaho habw'okukora emirimo y'Ebiragiro.
Nari shi Ruhanga n'ow'Abayudaaya bonka? Ti Ruhanga w'Abanyamahanga nabo? Eego, n'ow'Abanyamahanga nabo;
ahakuba Ruhanga aba omwe; kandi niwe ariiha aha bashazirwe orubanja ahabw'okwikiriza, n'aha batashazirwe ahabw'okwikiriza.
Mbwenu shi Ebiragiro nitubihindura busha ahabw'okwikiriza? Ngaaha! Tikwo kiri; nituhamya Ebiragiro.
Ku biraabe biri bityo, tugambe ki ahari Abrahamu, tatenkuriitwe omu mubiri, eki yaareebire?
Ahabw'okuba Abrahamu, kuri yaihirweho orubanja ahabw'emirimo, akaagizire eky'okwehimbisizaho, kwonka takiine ahari Ruhanga.
Ebyahandiikirwe nibigira bita? Biti: Abrahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, kyamubarirwa okuba okuhikiirira.
Nimumanya ngu, okora omurimo, ebihembo bye tibibarwa nk'ekiconco kureka nk'enyihurano.
Kwonka otakora mirimo, akaikiriza Ogwo oiha orubanja aha batatiina Ruhanga, okwikiriza kwe kumubarirwa okuba okuhikiirira.
Nk'oku Daudi nawe yaagambire aha mugisha oguheebwa omuntu ou Ruhanga abarira okuhikiirira, okutari habw'okukora emirimo, ati:
N'ebibi byabo bikashwekwa.
Aine omugisha omuntu ou Mukama ataribarira kibi.
Mbwemu omugisha ogu gugambwa aha bashazirwe bonka, nari n'aha batashazirwe? Ahakuba twagira tuti: Okwikiriza kwa Abrahamu kukamubarirwa okuba okuhikiirira.
Kukamubarirwa ryari: Yaashazirwe, nari atakashazirwe? Tikuramubariirwe yaashazirwe, kureka atakashazirwe.

Bwanyima yaaheebwa okusharwa okuba akamanyiso k'okuhamya okuhikiirira kwe kw'okwikiriza, oku yaabaire aine atakashazirwe, ngu abone kuba ishenkuru wa boona abaikiriza batashazirwe, ngu nabo babarirwe okuhikiirira;
kandi abe na ishenkuru w'abashazirwe, batari abafiire kusharwa kwonka, kureka abagyendera omu kwikiriza kwa tatenkuriitwe Abrahamu, oku yaabaire aine atakashazirwe.
Ahakuba endagaano ei Abrahamu n'abaijukuru baaraganisiibwe ku barihungura ensi, terarugire mu Biragiro, kureka omu kuhikiirira ahabw'okwikiriza.
Abeesiga Ebiragiro kuri nibo bahunguzi, okwikiriza kukaabaire okwa busha, n'ebyaraganisiibwe bikaabaire bifiire;
ahakuba Ebiragiro bireeta ekiniga; kwonka ahu Ebiragiro bitari tihariho kushobya.

N'ahabw'ekyo okuhikiirira kuruga omu kwikiriza, ngu ebyaraganisiibwe ebyo bibone kwegamira embabazi, kandi bihamibwe aha baijukuru boona, t'abarikwesiga Biragiro bonka, kureka nabo abarikugyendera omu kwikiriza kwa Abrahamu; ahabw'okuba niwe tatenkuriitwe twena;
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Nkakugira ishenkuru w'amahanga maingi omu maisho g'Ogwo ou yaikiriize, niwe Ruhanga ozoora abafu, kandi oyeta ebitariho nk'ebiriho.
Abrahamu ogwo akaikiriza, yaagira amatsiko omu bunaku obu yaakugahwereiremu, ngu aryaba ishenkuru w'amahanga maingi, nk'oku kyagambirwe ngu: Abaijukuru nikwo bariba batyo.
Kandi n'obu araabe yaareebire omubiri gwe nigushusha nk'ogufiire ahabw'okumara emyaka y'obukuru nka igana, akareeba na Saara yaabaire ekicura atakibaasa kuzaara, okwikiriza kwe tikuratentebukire;
kureka, ku yaataire amaisho aha bi Ruhanga yaaraganiise, tiyaabanganisisibwa kutaikiriza, kureka yaagumibwa okwikiriza, yaahimbisa Ruhanga;
kandi yaamanyira kimwe ngu eki Ruhanga yaaraganiise, naabaasa kukikora.
Nikyo okwikiriza kwe kwamubariirwe okuba okuhikiirira.
Tikiramuhandiikiirwe wenka, ngu kikamubarirwa okuba okuhikiirira,
kureka ahabwaitu naitwe abaribarirwa okuhikiirira, itwe abarikwikiriza Ogwo owaazoire Yesu Mukama waitu omu bafu;
niwe yaahairweyo ahabw'eby'okushiisha byaitu, kandi akazoorwa kutwihaho orubanja.
kandi ahabw'Ogwo tureebire oburyo bw'okutaaha omu mbabazi ezi, ezi tuhamiiremu ahabw'okwikiriza, kandi nitwesiima twine amatsiko g'okureeba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga.
Kandi t'ekyo kyonka; kureka nitwesiimira n'omu busaasi, ahabw'okuba nitumanya ngu omu busaasi harugamu okugumisiriza,
omu kugumisiriza harugamu okuhamibwa, n'omu kuhamibwa harugamu amatsiko;
kandi amatsiko tigakwatsa nshoni, ahabw'okuba okukunda kwa Ruhanga kushukirwe omu mitima yaitu Omwoyo Orikwera ou twahairwe.
Ku twabaire tukiri enshoberwa, omu bunaku buhikire Kristo yaafeera abatatiina Ruhanga.
Nimumanya ku kigumire omuntu kufeera ohikiriire; nangwa shana akaayemera kufeera ow'emicwe mirungi;
kwonka Ruhanga ayoreka okukunda kwe oku atukunda, ahakuba ku twabaire tukiri abanyabibi, Kristo yaatufeera.
Mbwenu okukira munonga, nk'oku tuherize kwihwaho orubanja ahabw'eshagama ye, turyakira ekiniga kya Ruhanga ahabwe.
Ahakuba ku turaabe twagarukaine na Ruhanga ahabw'okufa kw'Omwana we tukiri abazigu be, mbwenu okukira munonga, nk'oku tuherize kugarukana nawe, amagara ge garyatukiza;
kandi t'ekyo kyonka, kureka nitushemerererwa omuri Ruhanga ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, otuhaisize hati okugarukana oku.
Nimumanya ngu Ebiragiro bitakatairweho, ekibi kikaba kiri omu nsi; kwonka ekibi tikibarirwa muntu ahu Ebiragiro bitari.
Okuruga ahari Adamu okuhika ahari Musa, okufa kukaba kutegyeka abantu, nangwa n'abatarasiisire nk'oku Adamu yaacumwire, kandi niwe kishushani ky'Ogwo owaabaire naayenda kwija.

Kwonka ekiconco ky'embabazi tikiine kakwate n'ekicumuro ekyo; ahakuba ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe ku kiraabe kyareeteire abantu baingi okufa, okukira munonga embabazi za Ruhanga n'ekiconco ky'embabazi z'omuntu omwe Yesu Kristo nikwo byakanyire ahari baingi.

Kandi ekiconco ekyo eky'embabazi tikirikushushana n'ebyarugire aha kicumuro ky'omuntu ogwo omwe; ahakuba orubanja orwarugire aha kicumuro ekyo eky'omwe rukareeta okusingwa; kwonka ekiconco ky'embabazi, ekyaizire ahanyima y'ebicumuro bingi, kikareeta okurwihwaho.

Ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe ku kiraabe kyareeteire rufu okwema ahabw'ogwo, okukira munonga abaakiira ezo embabazi nyingi munonga n'ekiconco ky'okuhikiirira, baryayemekwa omu magara masya ahabw'omwe niwe Yesu Kristo.
Nk'oku ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe kyasingiise abantu boona orubanja, nikwo n'eky'okuhikiirira, eki omuntu omwe yaakozire kyahikire kityo aha bantu boona, ngu baihweho orubanja, baheebwe amagara.
Ahakuba nk'oku baingi baahindukire abasiisi ahabw'okutahurira kw'omuntu omwe, nikwo baingi barihinduka abahikiriire ahabw'okuhurira kw'omwe.
Kandi Ebiragiro nabyo bikaija, ngu ebicumuro bikanye; kwonka ei ekibi kyagarukiire kukanya, embabazi zikakiraho kukanya munonga,
ngu, nk'oku ekibi kyategyekire kikareeta okufa, embabazi zibe nikwo zaategyekyesa okuhikiirira okuhitsya omu magara agatahwaho ahabwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu.
Mbwenu tugambe ki? Tugume omu kibi, ngu embabazi zibone kukanya?
