Nikikabure! Itwe abaaherize kufa aha kibi, nitubaasa tuta kukigarukamu, tukakigumamu?
Timurikumanya ngu itwe twena abaabatiziibwe kutaaha omuri Kristo Yesu, tukabatizibwa kutaaha omu kufa kwe?
N'ahabw'ekyo ahabw'okubatizibwa tukaziikwa nawe kutaaha omu kufa, nk'oku Kristo yaazookire omu bafu ahabw'amaani g'ekitiinisa kya Isheboona, naitwe tube nikwo twagyendera tutyo omu magara masya.
Ku turaaba twateeraine nawe ahabw'okushushanisibwa nawe omu kufa kwe, turyateerana nawe tutyo omu kuzooka nk'okwe.
Nitumanya ngu omuntu waitu owa ira akabambwa nawe, ngu omubiri gw'ekibi guhindurwe busha, itwe turekye kuguma nitutegyekwa ekibi;
ahakuba ofiire aba atakitegyekwa kibi.
Kwonka ku turaabe twafiire hamwe na Kristo, nitwikiriza ngu turyamereera nawe;
ahabw'okuba nitumanya ngu, Krito nk'oku yaazookire omu bafu, takigaruka kufa; okufa tikwakimutegyeka.
Okufa oku yaafiire, akafa rimwe aha kibi yaaheza; mbwenu amagara agu aine, againe ahari Ruhanga.
Naimwe mwebare mutyo, ku mufiire aha kibi, kwonka ku muri abahuriire ahari Ruhanga omuri Kristo Yesu.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutaikiriza ekibi kutegyeka omu mibiri yaanyu ey'okufa, mukoorobera okurigira kwayo okubi;
kandi mutaha ekibi engingo zaanyu kuzikoresa eby'okutahikiirira, kureka mweheereze Ruhanga nk'abahuriire abazoirwe kuruga omu bafu, kandi n'engingo zaanyu muzimuhe kuzikoresa eby'okuhikiirira.
Ekibi tikiribategyeka, ahabw'okuba timurikutegyekwa Biragiro kureka embabazi.
Mbwenu shi, tukore ekibi, ngu ahabw'okuba titurikutegyekwa Biragiro kureka embabazi? Rubuuza!
Timurikumanya ngu ogwo ou mweha nk'abahuuku kumuhurira, muba muri abahuuku b'ogwo ou muhurira, yaaba kibi ekireeta okufa, nari okuhurira okureeta okuhikiirira?
Kwonka Ruhanga asiimwe, ahakuba imwe abaabaire muri abahuuku b'ekibi, mbwenu muhindukire abarikutegyekwa enyegyesa ei mwahairwe, mukagyorobera omu mitima yaanyu;
kandi nk'oku mwacungwirwe okuruga omu butegyeki bw'ekibi, muhindukire abahuuku b'okuhikiirira.

Naagamba nk'omuntu ahabw'amaani makye ag'obuntu bwanyu; kwonka nk'oku mwabaire muhayo engingo zaanyu nk'abahuuku kukora ebihagaro n'eby'okushiisha ebirengyesereize, hati mube nikwo mwahayo engingo zaanyu nk'abahuuku kukora eby'okuhikiirira, mubone kwezibwa.
Obu mwabaire mukiri abahuuku b'ekibi, mukaba mutategyekwa kuhikiirira.
Mbwenu
Kwonka hati nk'oku mucungwirwe kuruga omu butegyeki bw'ekibi, mukahinduka abahuuku ba Ruhanga, ebyana ebi murikwana n'okwezibwa; kandi omuheru gwabyo n'amagara agatahwaho.
Ahakuba ebihembo by'ekibi n'okufa; kwonka ekiconco kya Ruhanga n'amagara agatahwaho omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
B'eishe-emwe, timurikumanya ku Ebiragiro bitegyeka omuntu, akiriho? (Ningambira abarikumanya Ebiragiro.)
Nimumanya ngu omukazi oine iba, ekiragiro kimutegyeka kuguma na iba, akiriho; kandi iba ku afa, aba atakitegyekwa kiragiro kya iba.
Kwonka ku ashwerwa ondiijo mushaija, iba akiriho, ayetwa omushambani; kwonka iba ku afa, aba atakitegyekwa ekyo kiragiro; n'ahabw'ekyo ku ashwerwa omushaija ondiijo, tayetwa mushambani.
Nikyo kimwe, B'eishe-emwe, mukafa aha Biragiro ahabw'okufeera hamwe na Kristo omu mubiri gwe, ngu mubone kuba ab'ondiijo owaazoirwe omu bafu, ngu twanire Ruhanga ebyana.
Ku twabaire tukiri omu buzaarwa bw'omubiri, okwetenga ebibi kwaitu, okwaimukiibwe Ebiragiro, kukakorera omu ngingo zaitu ngu twanire okufa ebyana.
Kwonka hati tukomoroirwe, titwakitegyekwa Biragiro ahabw'okufa ahari ekyo ekyabaire kitukwatsire, ngu tubone kuheereza omu buhuuku busya obw'Omwoyo, butari bwa ira obw'ebihandiiko.
Kwonka ekibi, ku kyaboine obwiho omu Biragiro, kyaimutsya omuriinye emiringo yoona ey'okwetenga; ahakuba ahatari Biragiro, ekibi kiba kifiire.
Naanye ira nkaba ndi ohuriire ahatari Biragiro; kwonka Ekiragiro, ku kyaizire, ekibi kyahimbuuka, nyowe naafa.
Ekiragiro, ekyakubaire eky'okumpa amagara, nkashanga kindugiiremu okufa;
ahakuba ekibi, ku kyaboine obwiho omu kiragiro, kyangobeza, kyanyita nikyema omuri ekyo kiragiro.
Mbwenu Ebiragiro nibyera, n'ekiragiro nikyera, kihikire, kandi ni kirungi.
Nimugira ngu ekirungi nikyo kyandeeteire okufa? Ngaaha! Ekyakundeeteire n'ekibi; kikaanyitsa ekirungi, ngu ekibi kimanywe ku kiri kibi, kandi ahabw'Ebiragiro kihindukye kibi buzima ekirengyesereize.
Kwonka nitumanya ngu Ebiragiro n'eby'Omwoyo; kwonka nyowe ndi ow'obuzaarwa bw'obuntu, nkagurwa kutegyekwa ekibi;
eki nkora, tinkimanya; ahabw'okuba eki nkunda kukora tikyo nkora; kureka eki nyanga nikyo nkora.
Mbwenu ku ndaabe nkora eki ntenda, biri niinyikiriza ngu Ebiragiro ni birungi.
N'ahabw'ekyo tiinye nkikora, kureka ekibi ekituura omuriinye.
Nimmanya ngu omuriinye omu buntu bwangye tihabamu karungi koona; ahakuba obutoosha nkunda kukora ekirungi, kwonka okukikora kundema.
Ekirungi eki nkunda kukora tikyo nkora; kureka ekibi eki nyanga nikyo nkora.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku ndaabe nkora eki ntenda, tiinye nkikora, kureka ekibi ekintuuramu.
N'ahabw'ekyo nshangire ebiragiro biri biti, nyowe ku mba niinyenda kukora ekirungi, ekibi kimba haihi.
Omu mutima gwangye nsiima ebiragiro bya Ruhanga;
kwonka omu ngingo zangye nshangamu ekindi kiragiro ekirwanisa ekiragiro eky'omu bwengye bwangye, kimpindura omuhuuku w'ebiragiro by'ekibi ebiri omu ngingo zangye.
Ai bambe, ka ndi omuntu enshoberwa! N'oha orinjuna omu mubiri ogu ogw'okufa?
Ruhanga asiimwe, ahabwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu. Mbwenu omu bwengye bwangye nyorobera Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, kwonka omu mubiri gwangye nyorobera ebiragiro by'ekibi.
N'ahabw'ekyo abari omuri Kristo Yesu tibakiine rubanja;
ahakuba ekiragiro ky'Omwoyo gw'amagara agari omuri Kristo Yesu kikankomoorora kutategyekwa kiragiro eky'ekibi n'okufa.

Ruhanga yaakora eki Ebiragiro bitarabaasize kukora ahabw'okuremesibwa amaani makye g'obuntu; yaatuma Omwana we omu kishushani ky'omubiri gw'ekibi, kandi ahabw'ekibi, yaacwera ekibi orubanja omu mubiri,
ngu ebi Ebiragiro birikutwihuza bibone kuhikiirira omuriitwe abatakuratira by'omubiri, kureka eby'Omwoyo.
Ahabw'okuba abakuratira eby'omubiri bata omutima aha by'omubiri; kwonka abakuratira Omwoyo bata omutima aha by'Omwoyo.
Mumanye ngu okuta omutima aha by'omubiri n'okufa; kwonka okuta omutima aha by'Omwoyo n'amagara n'obusingye;
ahabw'okuba okuta omutima aha by'omubiri n'obuzigu ahari Ruhanga; ahakuba tikworobera biragiro bya Ruhanga, kandi buzima tikubaasa kubyorobera;
n'ahabw'ekyo abarikutegyekwa omubiri tibabaasa kugwisa gye Ruhanga.
Kandi Kristo ku araabe ari omuriimwe, biri omubiri gufiire ahabw'ekibi, kwonka omwoyo guhuriire ahabw'okuhikiirira.
Ku muraabe mutuurwamu Omwoyo w'Ogwo owaazoire Yusu omu bafu, Ogwo owaazoire Kristo Yesu omu bafu aryahindura n'emibiri yaanyu ey'okufa okuba ehuriire ahabw'Omwoyo we otuura omuriimwe.
B'eishe-emwe, twine eibanja, ti ry'omubiri ngu tukuratire ebyagwo;
ahakuba ku muraakuratire eby'omubiri, nimwija kufa; kwonka ku muraitse Omwyo emicwe yaanyu ey'omubiri, muryaba abahuriire.
Manya, boona abeebemberwa Omwoyo wa Ruhanga, nibo baana ba Ruhanga;
ahakuba timurahairwe mwoyo gw'obuhuuku kugaruka kutiina, kureka mukaheebwa Omwoyo owaabahindwire abaana ba Ruhanga, otugambisa tukagira tuti:
Omwoyo ogwo niwe ahamya n'emyoyo yaitu ku turi abaana ba Ruhanga;
kandi ku turaabe turi abaana, turi abahunguzi, abahunguzi ba Ruhanga, kandi ab'okuhungura hamwe na Kristo, ku turaabe nitushaasha hamwe nawe, ngu tubone kuheebwa ekitiinisa hamwe nawe.
Mumanye ngu ebyahangirwe byona bituura bitegyereize n'ekihika okushuuruurwa kw'abaana ba Ruhanga;
ahakuba ebihangirwe bikaragiirwa kutegyekwa ebitaine mugahso, ti habw'okweyendera, kureka kikakorwa Ogwo owaaragiire ku bitegyekwa bityo biine amatsiko;
ahabw'okuba ebihangirwe ebyo nabyo biryacungurwa, birekye kuba eby'okujunda, kureka biheebwe obusingye bw'abaana ba Ruhanga obw'ekitiinisa.
Nitumanya ngu ebihangirwe byona bituura nibitsinda, nibisaasira hamwe n'okuhitsya hati;
kandi tibyo byonka, kureka naitwe abaine ebyana by'omujigaijo eby'Omwoyo, nitutsinda omu mitima yaitu, nitutegyereza kuhindurwa abaana ba Ruhanga, nikwo kucungurwa kw'emibiri yaitu;
ahakuba tukajunwa twine amatsiko ago. Manya, eki omuntu aineho amatsiko, ku aheza kukireeba, gaba gatakiri matsiko. Mbwenu n'oha ogira amatsiko aha ki arikureeba?
Kwonka ku tugira amatsiko aha ki tutakareebire, tukitegyereza n'okugumisiriza.
Oku nikwo Omwoyo atuhwera omu bweremwa bwaitu; ahakuba titumanya kushaba nk'oku kitushemereire, kwonka Omwoyo we wenka atutonganira n'okutsinda oku omuntu atakaabaasa kugamba.
Kandi Ogwo, ocaaka emitima y'abantu, amanya ebi Omwoyo ateekateeka, ku atonganira abarikwera, nk'oku Ruhanga akunda.
Ahakuba abu yaamanyire ira, nibo yaashoroire batakabaireho kushushanisibwa n'Omwana we, ngu abone kuba omujigaijo omu b'eishe-emwe baingi.
Abu yaashoroire batakabaireho, nibo yaayetsire; n'abu yaayetsire, nibo yaihireho orubanja; kandi n'abu yaihireho orubanja, nibo yaahaire ekitiinisa.
Otaratwimire Mwana we ahabwe, kureka akamuhayo ahabwaitu twena, aryazibirwa ki kutuha byona hamwe nawe?
N'oha orirega entoore za Ruhanga? Ni Ruhanga, haza kandi obaihaho orubanja?
N'oha oribacwera orubanja rw'okubasinga? Ni Kristo Yesu owaabafeereire, kandi okukira owaazookire omu bafu, ori aha rubaju rwa buryo rwa Ruhanga okututonganira?
N'oha oritutaanisa n'okukunda kwa Kristo? N'obusaasi, okwitwa kubi, okuhiigwa, enjara, okujwara busha, akabi, nari shi rurara?
Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Ahabwawe nitwitwa eizooba ryona,
Nituteekateekwa nk'entaama z'okubaagwa.
Ahakuba nimmanyira kimwe ngu okufa, n'obu gaakuba amagara, nari baamaraika, nari abarikutegyeka, nari ebiriho, nari ebiribaho, nari ab'obushoboorozi,
nari oburaingwa obwa bwemi nari oburaingwa obw'okuzimu, n'obu kyakuba ekindi kintu kyona ekihangirwe, tihaine kiribaasa kututaanisa n'okukunda kwa Ruhanga okuri omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
Ningamba amazima omuri Kristo, tindikubeiha; nimpamya n'omutima gwangye omu Mwoyo Orikwera,
ku nyine enaku nyingi n'obusaasi obutarikutuuza omu mutima gwangye.
Ahakuba nkaayenzire ngu nyowe ahabwangye nkyeenwe, kandi ncuubwe ahari Krito ahabwa beene waitu ab'oruganda rwangye omu mubiri, nibo Baisraeli,
abaahairwe omugabo gw'okuba abaana ba Ruhanga, n'ekitiinisa kye, n'endagaano ze, n'Ebiragiro n'emigyenzo y'okuramya Ruhanga, n'ebyaraganisiibwe;
nibo baakomookire ahari baatatenkuriitwe; kandi na Kristo nibo yaakomookiremu omu mubiri, otegyeka byona, kandi niwe Ruhanga ohimbisibwa ebiro byona. Amiina.
kandi okuba oruzaaro rwa Abrahamu tikyo kihindura boona abaana be buzima; kwonka nikigira kiti: Baijukuru baawe baryayetererwa Isaaka.
Nikwo kugira ngu, abazairwe omu mubiri tibo baana ba Ruhanga, kureka abazairwe omu ndagaano nibo babarwa kuba abaijukuru.
Nimumanya ku ekigambo ekyaraganisiibwe kyagizire kiti: Omu bunaku nk'obu ndyagaruka, kandi Saara aryazaara omwana w'omwojo.
Kandi t'ekyo kyonka, kureka na Rebeka, ku yaabaire abakire enda y'empasha z'omushaija tatenkuriitwe Isaaka,

yaagambirwa ngu: Kakuru aryaheereza Kato, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Yakobo nkamukunda, Esau naamwanga; yaabigambirwa, abaana abo batakazairwe, kandi batakakoire kirungi nari ekibi, ngu eki Ruhanga yaatooraine omu naama ye kigumeho, kiteegamiire mirimo, kureka Ogwo owaatwetsire.
Mbwenu tugambe ki? Tuti, omu mitwarize ya Ruhanga habamu okutainganisa? Rubuuza!
Ahakuba akagambira Musa ati: Ndyasaasira ou ndisaasira, kandi ndyagirira embabazi ou ndizigirira.
N'ahabw'ekyo tikirikwegamira kweyendera kw'omuntu, nari obweziriki bwe, kureka okusaasira kwa Ruhanga.
Nimumanya ngu, omu Byahandiikirwe Ruhanga akagira Faraho ati: Eki naakwemekyeire n'okukworekyeraho amaani gangye, ngu eiziina ryangye rigambwe omu nsi zoona.
Nikwo asaasira ou ayenda kusasira, kandi agangaaza omutima gw'ogwo ou ayenda ngu gugangaare.
Mbwenu noija kumbuuza oti: Ahanki naakibarira abantu ebishobyo? Kandi n'oha owaakubaasa kuzibira ebi arikwenda?
Beitu shi, iwe omuntu, niiwe oha orikuhakanisa Ruhanga? Ekibumbirwe nikibaasa kubuuza owaakibumbire kiti, Ahabw'enki okambumba oti?
Omubumbi taine obushoboorozi aha ibumba omu mugoma gumwe kubumbamu orwabya rumwe rw'okukoresa eby'ekitiinisa, n'orundi rw'okukoresa ebirikwitsa enshoni?
Mbwenu Ruhanga, ku araabe yaayenzire kworeka ekiniga kye, n'okumanyisa obushoboorozi bwe, nikiita ki We okugumisiririza n'embabazi ze nyingi enyabya ez'ekiniga ezaateekateekyeirwe okuhwerekyerera;
ngu abone kworeka obutungi bw'ekitiinisa kye aha nyabya ez'okusaasirwa ezi yaateekateekyeire ekitiinisa okuruga ira,
niitwe abu yaayetsire, ti mu Bayudaaya bonka, kureka n'omu Banyamahanga?
Nk'oku yaagambire naaraba omuri nabi Hosea ati:
Abantu abatari b'eihanga ryangye
Ndyabeeta eihanga ryangye;
Kandi owaabaire ari enyangwakazi
Ndyamweta enkundwakazi.
Niho baryeterwa abaana ba Ruhanga ohuriire.
ahakuba Mukama aryahikiiriza orubanja oru yaacwereire ensi, aruheze atarusiibizeho.
Kandi nk'oku Isaaya yaagizire ira ati:
Kuri Mukama ow'amahe ataratutsigiireho baijukuru,
Tukaabaire nka Sodoma, tushushana na Gomora.
Mbwenu tugambe ki? Tuti: Abanyamahanga, abatarakuratiire kuhikiirira, bakakuhikaho, nikwo kuhikiirira okuruga omu kwikiriza;
kwonka Abaisraeli, abaakuratiire Ebiragiro by'okuhikiirira, tibarahikize biragiro byakwo.
Bakazibirwa ki? Ahabw'okuba tibareezirikire kukuhikaho ahabw'okwikiriza, kureka ahabw'emirimo. Baateera entsibo aha ibaare ry'okuteerwaho entsibo,
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu,
Reeba, ninta omuri Saayuuni
Eibaare eririkuteeza entsibo n'orukiri orurikugwisa,
Kandi orikumwikiriza tarikwatwa nshoni.
B'eishe-emwe, ekyakunanura omutima gwangye, kandi eki nshabira Abaisraeli ahari Ruhanga nikyo eki, ngu bajunwe.
Ahakuba nimpamya nti: Baine obweziriki ahari Ruhanga, kwonka tiburimu kushoborokyerwa;
ahabw'okutamanya kuhikiirira okurikuruga ahari Ruhanga, bakeesherurira oku baakuhamya okuhikiirira kwabo ahabwabo, tibaroorobeire kuhikiirira okurikuruga ahari Ruhanga.
Ahakuba omuri Kristo nimwo Ebiragiro bihikiiririzibwa, ngu abone kuhaisa okuhikiirira omuntu weena orikwikiriza.
Kwonka okuhikiirira okwegamiire okwikiriza nikugira kuti: Otagamba omu mutima gwawe oti: N'oha oritemba omu iguru?, (amakuru ngu, okushuumya Kristo ahansi,)
nari shi oti: N'oha orishuuma okuzimu?, (amakuru ngu, okwiha Kristo omu bafu.)
Beitu kugira kuta? Kugira kuti, Ekigambo kikuri haihi, omu kanwa kaawe n'omu mutima gwawe, nikyo kigambo ky'okwikiriza eki tubuurira;
tuti: Ku oryatura n'akanwa kaawe oti, Yesu niwe Mukama, waikiriza n'omutima gwawe ku Ruhanga yaamuzoire omu bafu, oryajunwa;
ahakuba omutima nigwo omuntu aikiririsa akaheebwa okuhikiirira, kandi akanwa niko ayatuza akaheebwa okujunwa.
Ebyahandiikirwe nibigira biti: Omuntu weena orikumwikiriza tarikwatwa nshoni.
Tihariho mutaano gw'Omuyudaaya n'Omugriika; ahakuba Mukama omwe niwe Mukama wa boona, kandi n'omutungi ahari boona abamutakira;
ahabw'okuba omuntu weena oritakira eiziina rya Mukama aryajunwa.
Mbwenu shi, abantu baryatakira bata ou batakaikiriize? Kandi baryamwikiriza bata ou batakahuriraga? Kandi baryahurira bata ahatari mubuurizi?
Kandi baryabuurira bata batatumirwe?, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Ebigyere by'ababuurizi ka ni birungi munonga, abo ababuurira engiri y'ebigambo ebirungi!
Kwonka abaayorobeire engiri ti boona; ahakuba Isaaya akagira ati: Mukama n'oha oikiriize ebi twarangire?
Manya, okwikiriza kuruga omu bi tuhurira, kandi ebi tuhurira biruga omu kigambo kya Kristo.
Eiraka ryabyo rikabuga omu nsi zoona,
N'ebigambo byabyo byahika aha muheru gw'ensi.
Ndyabaitsa eihari aha ihanga eritari ihanga buzima,
Ndyabakwatsa ekiniga n'eihanga eritaine bwengye.
Nkabonwa abataransherwire,
Naayeyoreka abatarambuuririize.
Kwonka aha Baisraeli yaagira ati: Eizooba ryona nsiiba ntegire emikono eihanga eritahurira kandi erigomi.
Ruhanga taracwire bantu be abu yaamanyire batakabaireho. Timurikumanya ebi Ebyahandiikirwe bigamba ahari Eliya, oku yaaregire Abaisraeli ahari Ruhanga?
Ati: Mukama, baitsire baanabi baawe, basheenyire amatambiro gaawe; niinye ntsigaireho nyenka, kandi naanye nibenda kuunyita.
Beitu Ruhanga akamuagarukamu ata? Ati: Nyetsigariize abantu enkumi mushanju abatakatsimbiraga Baali maju.
Na mbwenu omu bunaku obu nikwo biri; hariho abantu bakye abatsigaireho abaatoorainwe embabazi.
Kwonka, ku biraabe biri ahabw'embabazi, tibikiri habw'emirimo; ahakuba ku kyakubaire kitari kityo, embabazi tizaakubaire mbabazi.
nk'oku kyahandiirwe ngu: Ruhanga akabaha omutima gw'okuhungira, n'amaisho ngu batareeba, n'amatu ngu batahurira n'okuhitsya eri izooba.
Kandi Daudi akagira ati:
Emeeza yaabo ebahinduukire omutego n'orugogo,
N'enkongi, n'eky'okubaihura.
Amaisho gaabo gashwekwe omwirima, ngu batahweza,
Emigongo yaabo ogiinikye ebiro byona.
Mbwenu okucumura kwabo ku kuraabe kwatungiise ab'ensi zoona, kandi n'okuremwa kwabo kukatungisa Abanyamahanga, kaashwa okugarurwa kwabo!
Kwonka ningambira imwe Abanyamahanga. Nk'oku ndi entumwa aha Banyamahanga, nimpimbisa obutumwa bwangye,
ngu nkaakwatsa beene waitu Abayudaaya eihari, abamwe omuribo bajunwa.
Okucuubwa kwabo ku kuraabe nikureetera ab'ensi zoona kugarukana na Ruhanga, okugarurwa kwabo kuryareeta ki? Tikurireeta okuzooka omu bafu?
Esaano y'omuganuro ku eba eri erikwera, n'ekiihuro kyona nikwo kiba; kandi ekitsitsa ku kiba kiri ekirikwera, n'amataagi nikwo gaba.
Kwonka amataagi agamwe ku garaabe gaahagwirweho, kandi iwe owaabaire ori omuzeituuni ogwo ogw'omu iswas okagabyarwarru kuriisibwa eshande y'omuzeituuni ogwo,
oteehimbisiza aha mataagi. Ku oraabe nooyehimbisa, oijukye ngu tiiwe ekitsitsa kimezireho, kureka niiwe omezire aha kitsitsa.
Obundi okaagira oti: Amataagi gakahagurwa ngu nyowe mbyarwemu.
N'eky'amazima; gakahagurwa ahabw'okutaikiriza kwago; haza naiwe okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kukwemereize. Oteemanya, kureka otiine;
ahakuba Ruhanga ku araabe atarasaasiire mataagi agahangiirweho, naiwe tarikusaasira.
Yetegyereze embabazi za Ruhanga, kandi n'okutasaasira kwe; ahari abo abaagwire, n'okutasaasira kwe; kwonka ahariiwe n'embabazi ze, ku oraabe n'ozigumamu; ku oriba otazigumiremu, naiwe oryahagurwaho.
Kandi nabo, ku bariba batagumiire mu butaikiriza bwabo, baryabyarwamu, ahakuba Ruhanga aine obushoboorozi kugaruka kubabyaramu.

Omanyen ngu ku oraabe waahagwirwe aha muzeituuni ogw'omu ishwa omu buhangwa, okabyarwa omu muzeituuni omurungi, ogu waabaire otaine buzaare nagwo, amataagi gari agaabaire gari ag'obuhangwa tigarikira munonga kugaruka kubyarwa aha muzeituuni gwago?
obwo Abaisraeli boona baryajunwa, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Omujuni aryaruga omuri Saayuuni,
Aihe omuri Yakobo okutatiina Ruhanga;
Ku ndibaihaho ebibi byabo.
Omu by'engiri bo n'abazigu ba Ruhanga ahabwanyu; kwonka omu by'okutooranwa Ruhanga n'abarikukundwa ahabwa baishenkurubo.
Mumanye ngu ebi Ruhanga agaba n'okweta kwe tabyefuuza.
Nk'oku ira mwabaire mugomeire Ruhanga, kwonka hati musaasiirwe ahabw'obugomi bwabo,
nikwo nabo hati bagomire, ngu embabazi ezi mwagiriirwe zibareetere okusaasirwa;
ahakuba Ruhanga akabarira hamwe abantu boona omu bugomi, ngu abone kusaasira boona.
Yeimwe! Obutungi bwa Ruhanga, obwengye bwe n'okumanya kwe ka bitaine bugarukiro! Emicwere ye n'emitwarize ye tibirikubaasa kumanywa.
Nari n'oha orabaire omuhanuuzi we?
Nari n'oha orabandize kumuha ekintu
Ngu amuzimuurire?
Ahakuba byona niwe bikomookaho, kandi bibaho ahabwe, kandi niwe mukama waabyo; aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona. Amiina.

Kandi mutashushanisibwa n'ab'obusingye obu, kureka muhindurwe basya ahabw'okugarurwa obusya omu biteekateeko byanyu, mubone kumanya gye ebi Ruhanga akunda, oku biri birungi, ebirikusiimwa, kandi ebihikire buzima.
Mumanye ngu, nk'oku twine engingo nyingi omu mubiri, kandi nk'oku zoona zikora emirimo etari emwe,
naitwe nikwo turi; turi baingi, kwonka omuri Kristo turi omubiri gumwe, kandi omuntu weena n'orugingo rwa mugyenzi we.
Nk'oku twine ebiconco ebitari bimwe, nk'embabazi ezi twahairwe oku ziine omutaano, tubikorese; ku kuraabe kuri okubuurira, tubuurire nk'oku tugyereirwe okwikiriza;
nari okuheereza, twezirikye kuheereza; nari orikwegyesa, ayezirikye kwegyesa;
orikuhabura, ayezirikye kuhabura; orikugaba, agabe n'obufura; orikutegyeka, ategyekye n'obweziriki; n'orikugira embabazi, azigire ashemereirwe.
Okukunda kwanyu kutabamu oburyarya. Mwangire kimwe ekibi, muhamire aha kirungi;
omu kukunda ab'eishe-emwe, mukundane buzima; omu kuhaana ekitiinisa, buri muntu ateekateekye ahari mugyenzi we okumweshumba;
omu bweziriki mutaba abeeremwa; emyoyo yaanyu etagate, muheereze Mukama.
Mushemererwe mwine amatsiko; mugumisirize omu busaasi; mugumizemu kushaba muhamire.
Muhe aha byanyu okuhwera abarikwera omu bukyene bwabo; mwezirikye kukunira abagyenyi.
Mushemererwe hamwe n'abarikushemererwa; murire hamwe n'abarikurira.
Mugire omutima gumwe omu bi murikuteekateekanaho; mutata omutima aha by'ekitiinisa, kureka mugyende hamwe n'abataine kitiinisa. Muteemanya ku muri abanyabwengye.
Mutaihura omuntu weena ekibi ahabw'ekibi; mwerinde, ebi murikukora bireebekye bihikire omu maisho g'abantu boona.
Ku kiraabe nikibaasika aha rubaju rwanyu, mutuurane n'abantu boona n'obusingye.
Imwe abarikukundwa, muteehoorera enzigu, mukurekyere ekiniga kya Ruhanga, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Okuhoora enzigu n'okwangye; niinye ndizimuura, nikwo Mukama arikugira.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuzigu waawe ku araagire enjara, omugaburire; ku araakwatwe eiriho, omuhe eky'okunywa; ahabw'okuba omu kukora otyo nooba omurunzire amakara g'omuriro aha mutwe.
Otasingurwa ekibi, kureka ekibi okisinguze ekirungi.
N'ahabw'ekyo orikugomera obutegyeki, naaba agomeire eki Ruhanga yaataireho; kandi abarikugoma beereetera orubanja.
Nimumanya ngu abategyeki tibatiinwa barikukora gye, kureka abarikukora kubi. Mbwenu nooyenda kutatiina mutegyeki? Kora ebirungi, haza aryakusiima;

ahabw'okuba we n'omuheereza wa Ruhanga ow'okukuhaisa ebirungi. Kwonka ku oraabe nookora kubi, otiine; ahakuba takwatira busha rurara; kureka n'omuheereza wa Ruhanga, ohoora enzigu aha muntu okora kubi.
N'ahabw'ekyo mushemereire kuboorobera, ti habw'okutiina kiniga ekyo kwonka, kureka n'ahabw'eiraka ry'omwoyo.
Kandi nikyo muheera omushoro, ahakuba abakama abo n'abaheereza ba Ruhanga abeezirika kukora omurimo ogwo obutoosha.
Mwihure boona ebi barikubaihuza; abarikushoza mubahe omushoro; abarikuhooza mubahoorere; ab'okutiinwa mubatiine; ab'ekitiinisa mubahe ekitiinisa.
Ahabw'okuba ebi ngu, Otarishambana, otariita, Otariiba, Otaryetenga eby'abandi, n'ebindi biragiro byona, biteeranira omu kigambo eki ngu: Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda.
Oine okukunda tagirira mutaahi we kubi; n'ahabw'ekyo okukunda nikwo kuhitsya Ebiragiro.
Kandi mugume mukore mutyo, ahakuba nimumanya ngu obunaku buhikire imwe kusisiimuka omu turo; ahabw'okuba okujunwa kutwiriire haihi okukira obu twatandika kwikiriza.
Ekiro kyahweire; buri haihi kusheesha; n'ahabw'ekyo ka tujuure emicwe y'omwirima, tujware eby'okurwanisa eby'omushana;
tugyende tushemeire, nk'abarikugyenda nyomushana, tutarikujagarara, tutarikusinda, tutarikushambana, tutarikukora birikwitsa enshoni, tutarikutongana, tutarikugirirana ihari.
Kureka mujware Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, kandi mutaha omubiri orwekwatso kukora ebi gurikwetenga.
Omuntu omwe aine okwikiriza okurikumubaasisa kurya byona; kwonka otaine maani, arya emboga zonka.
Orikurya byona arekye kugaya otarikubirya; kandi otarikubirya arekye kucwera orikubirya orubanja; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akamwakiira.
Niiwe oha arikucwera omuhuuku w'ondiijo orubanja? Mukama we niwe orikumanya ku ayemereire, nari ku agwire. Kandi buzima, aryayemerezibwa, ahabw'okuba Mukama waitu aine amaani kumwemereza.
Orinda ekiro akirinda ahabwa Mukama; n'orya byona, nawe abirya ahabwa Mukama, ahabw'okuba asiima Ruhanga; kandi obyanga abyanga ahabwa Mukama, kandi nawe asiima Ruhanga.
Ahakuba omuriitwe tihariho obaho ahabwe wenka, kandi tihariho ofa ahabwe wenka.
Ku tubaho, tubaho ahabwa Mukama; kandi ku tufa, tufa ahabwa Mukama; n'ahabw'ekyo, yaaba twabaho, yaaba twafa, turi aba Mukama.
Ekyo nikyo Kristo yaafeereire kandi akazooka, ngu abone kuba Mukama w'abafiire n'abahuriire.
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Mukama naayerahira ati: Nk'oku ndi ohuriire,
Abantu boona baryantsimbira amaju,
N'orurimi rwona ruryahimbisa Ruhanga.
Nikwo buri omwe omuriitwe aryegambira, naayetonganira ahari Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo okuruga hati turekye kucwererana emanja; kureka buri muntu omuriitwe ahamize kimwe okutateeza mwene Ishe ntsibo, nari okukora ekirikumugwisa.
Nimmanya, kandi niinyikiririza kimwe omuri Mukama waitu Yesu nti: Tihariho kintu kyona ekyahangirwe nikizira ahabwakyo; kwonka omuntu ku ateekateeka ngu nikizira, ahariwe kizira.
Mwene Sho ku araabe naakorwa kubi ebi orikurya, nooba otakigyendera mu kukunda. Otahwerekyereza n'eby'okurya byawe ogwo ou Kristo yaafeereire.
N'ahabw'ekyo otajumisa ekirungi kyawe.
Manya, obukama bwa Ruhanga ti by'okurya, nari eby'okunywa, kureka okuhikiirira n'obusingye n'okushemererwa omu Mwoyo Orikwera.
Ahakuba oheereza atyo Kristo, niwe ashemeza Ruhanga, kandi asiimwa n'abantu.
N'ahabw'ekyo tukuratire ebirikureeta obusingye n'okwombekana.
Mutashiisha omurimo gwa Ruhanga ahabw'eby'okurya. Omu mazima byona bishemeire; kwonka ni kibi omuntu kugwisa abandi ahabw'ebi arikurya.
Ni kirungi okutarya nyama, nari okunywa viinyo, nari okukora ekintu kyona ekirikuteeza mwene Sho entsibo, nari okumugwisa nari okumumaramu amaani.
Okwikiriza oku oine, ogume nakwo omu mutima gwawe omu maisho ga Ruhanga. Otarikwecwera rubanja omu bi arikwikiriza ahiiriirwe.
Kwonka ogwo orikubanganisa, ku arya, asingwa orubanja, ahabw'okuba tiyaarya aikiriize; kandi kyona ekitaruga mu kwikiriza, kiba kibi.
Itwe abaine amaani tushemereire kwekorera obweremwa bw'abatagaine, turekye kweshemeza twenka.
Omuntu weena omuriitwe ashemeze mutaahi we, amukwatse omu birungi eby'okumukuza;
ahakuba na Kristo tareeshemeize wenka; kwonka nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Ebijumo ebi baakujumire niinye byagwereire.
Mumanye ngu Ebyahandiikirwe ira byona bikahandiikwa kutwegyesa, ngu tubone kugira amatsiko ahabw'okugumisiriza, n'ahabw'okuhuumuzibwa Ebyahandiikirwe ebyo.
Mbwenu, Ruhanga mukama w'okugumisiriza n'okuhuumuza abahe okukwatanisa omu biteekateeko byanyu, nk'oku Kristo Yesu akunda,
mubone kuhimbisa Ruhanga Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'omutima gumwe n'akanwa kamwe.
N'habw'ekyo mwakiirane, nk'oku Kristo yaabaakiire, Ruhanga abone kuhimbisibwa.
Eki ndikugamba n'eki nti: Kristo akahinduka omuheereza w'abashazirwe ow'okubooreka amazima ga Ruhanga, ngu abone kuhamya ebi baishenkurubo baaraganisiibwe,
kandi ngu Abanyamahanga bahimbise Ruhanga ahabw'okusaasira kwe, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Nikyo ndikuhimbisiza omu Banyamahanga,
Kandi nkeeshongorera eiziina ryawe.
Kandi ngu:
Imwe Abanyamahanga, mushemererwe hamwe n'eihanga rye.
Kandi ahandi ngu:
Muhimbise Mukama, imwe mwena Abanyamahanga,
Kandi n'amahanga goona gamuhimbise.
Haryabaho ekitsitsa kya Yese,
Niwe ariimuka kutegyeka Abanyamahanga,
Kandi niwe Abanyamahanga barigiramu amatsiko.
Ruhanga mukama w'amatsiko abaijuze okushemererwa kwona n'obusingye omu kwikiriza, amatsiko gaanyu gakanyisibwe amaani g'Omwoyo Orikwera.
Beene Tata, nimmanya gye ebyanyu ntarikubanganisa, ku mwijwire emicwe mirungi n'okwetegyereza kwona, kandi ku murikubaasa kuhuguurana.
Kwonka ebimwe omu baruha egi naabibahandiikira n'obumanzi, nimbaijutsya, oku Ruhanga yaangiriire embabazi,
akantaho kuba omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo aha Banyamahanga ow'okukora omurimo gw'engiri ya Ruhanga nk'omunyamurwa, ngu Abanyamahanga babe empongano erikusiimwa, eyeziibwe Omwoyo Orikwera.
N'ahabw'ekyo, omuri Kristo Yesu nyine eby'okwehimbisizaho omu murimo ogu nkoreire Ruhanga.
Tinkaayehanga kugamba aha bindi kureka aha bi naakoresiibwe Kristo kworobya Abanyamahanga, omu kugamba n'omu kukora,
ahabw'amaani g'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza, nimbukoresibwa Omwoyo Orikwera; okuruga Yerusaalemu, okwehinguririza okuhika Iluriko, nkabuurira hoona engiri ya Kristo.
Kandi nkeezirika kubuurira engiri ahi eiziina rya Kristo ritakamanywaga, ngu ndekye kwombeka aha musingi ogwatairweho abandi;
kibone kuba nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Abatakagambirwaga ebye baryareeba,
Kandi abatakahuriraga baryashoborokyerwa.
Nikyo naagiriire ebirikunzibira kaingi kwija owaanyu;
kwonka hati, nk'oku ntakiine hatsigaire omu mahanga aga, kandi mmazire emyaka mingi niinyetenga kwija owaanyu,
ku ndiba ninza Spania, nyine amatsiko kubarabaho nkabareeba; kandi ku ndimara naimwe ebiro bikye, naabahwa orushusho, mubone kunshendekyereza omu rugyendo rwangye.
Kwonka hati ninza Yerusaalemu nintwara eby'okuhwera abarikwera;
ahabw'okuba aba Makedonia n'aba Akaya bakasiima kuteerana eby'okuhwera abooro ab'omu barikwera abari Yerusaalemu.
Bakasiima kukikora, kandi buzima nibahurira baine eibanja aharibo, ahabw'okuba Abanyamahanga ku baraabe baakwataniise nabo omu by'Omwoyo, nibaihuzibwa kubahwera omu by'omubiri.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ku ndiheza kubahitsya ebiconco ebyo, ndyabarabaho ninza Spania.
Kandi nimmanya ngu, ku ndiija owaanyu, ndyaija nyijwire omugisha gwa Kristo.
mbone kukira ab'omu Bayudaaya abatarikwikiriza, kandi n'eby'obuhwezi ebi ndikutwara Yerusaalemu bisiimwe abarikwera;
ntyo naanye Ruhanga ku araasiime, mbone kwija owaanyu nshemereirwe, turuhuukire hamwe.
Ruhanga mukama w'obusingye agume naimwe mwena. Amiina.
Nimbasiimira munyaanyaitwe Foibe omudiikonikazi w'ekanisa ya Kenkerea;
mumwakiire omuri Mukama waitu, nk'oku kishemereire abarikwera, kandi mumuhwere omuri byona ebi aryatenga ahariimwe; ahabw'okuba abaire naahwera baingi, naanye ntababuziremu.
Mundamukize Priska na Akula, abakozi bagyenzi bangye omuri Kristo Yesu,
abaabaire beehaireyo kucuubwaho ebitsya ahabw'amagara gangye. Tiinye nyenka orikubasiima, kureka n'amakanisa goona ag'Abanyamahanga;
kandi muramutsye ekanisa ey'omu ka yaabo. Muramutsye na munywani wangye Epaineeto, owaabandize kuhindukira Kristo omuri Asia.
Muramutsye Mariamu owaabakoreire munonga.
Muramutsye Anderoniiko na Yuniasi, ab'omuryango gwangye, abu naabohirwe nabo, abashaija rugambwa omu ntumwa, kandi abambandiize omuri Kristo.
Muramutsye Ampuliato, munywani wangye omuri Mukama.
Muramutsye Urubano, omukozi mugyenzi waitu omuri Kristo hamwe na Staako munywani wangye.
Muramutsye Apele, orikusiimwa omuri Kristo. Muramutsye n'ab'omuka ya Aristobulo.
Muramutsye Herodioni ow'omuryango gwangye. Muramutsye abo abari omuri Mukama ab'omu ka ya Nakiso.
Muramutsye Trufaina na Trufoosa abarikukorera omuri Mukama. Muramutsye Peresi orikukundwa, owaayezirikire kukorera omuri Mukama.
Muramutsye Rufo owaatoorainwe omuri Mukama, kandi na nyina naanye ou nyeta maawe.
Muramutwey Asunkuriito, Fulegoni, Herume, Patiroba, Heruma n'ab'eishe-emwe abatwire nabo.
Muramutsye Filologo, Yulia, Nereu na munyaanya, na Olumpa n'abarikwera boona abatwire nabo.
Muramukansie okunywegyerana okurikwera. Amakanisa ga Kristo goona gaabaramutsya.
Kandi nimbeeshengyereza, B'eishe-emwe, mwetegyereze abo abarikureeta eby'okubataanisa n'eby'okubateeza entsibo, ebitaanuukaine n'enyegyesa ei mwayegire; mubeetantare;
ahakuba abari nk'abo tibaheereza Mukama waitu Kristo, kureka enda zaabo bonka; kandi emitima y'abataine bugobya bagibeihabeihesa okugamba gye n'ebigambo by'okuteera ekimama.
Ahakuba okworoba kwanyu nikumanywa omu bantu boona; nikyo ndikwesiimira ahabwanyu; kwonka niinyenda ngu mube abanyabwengye aha kirungi, kandi abataine buryarya aha kibi;
kandi Ruhanga mukama w'obusingye aryasingyeera Sitaane juba ahansi y'ebigyere byanyu. Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe.
Timoseo, omukozi mugyenzi wangye, yaabaramutsya; kandi Lukio, Yasooni na Sosipateeri ab'omuryango gwangye nabo baabaramutsya.
Nyowe Teretio, omuhandiiki w'ebaruha egi, nimbaramutsya omuri Mukama.
Gaayo orikundaaza, n'ekanisa yoona baabaramutsya. Erasto, omubiiki w'empiiha z'orurembo, n'ow'eishe-emwe Kwato, baabaramutsya.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe mwena. Amiina.
kwonka hati eshuurwirwe, kandi yaamanyisibwa aha mahanga goona omu byahandiikirwe baanabi, nka Ruhanga otahwaho oku yaaragiire, ngu amahanga ago gabone kumwikiriza n'okumworobera.
Ruhanga ow'obwengye omwe wenka aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona ahabwa Yesu Kristo. Amiina.
Paulo owaayetsirwe kuba entumwa ya Yesu Kristo, nk'oku Ruhanga yaakunzire, na Soseene ow'eishe-emwe,

twabahandiikira imwe ab'omu kanisa ya Ruhanga eri Korinso, abaayeziibwe omuri Kristo Yesu, bakeetwa kuba abarikwera hamwe na boona abari hoonahoona abatakira eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, Mukama waabo kandi owaitu.
Nitubendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Obutoosha nsiima Ruhanga wangye ahabwanyu, nimmusiimira embabazi ze ezi mwahairwe omuri Kristo Yesu,
ahabw'okuba omu miringo yoona mukahinduka abatungi omuriwe, omuri byona ebi mugamba kandi n'ebi mumanya,
nk'okuhamya Kristo kwaitu oku kwahamiibwe omuriimwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo tihariho kiconco kyona eky'Omwoyo eki mutaine, nimutegyereza okushuuruurwa kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo;
niwe aribagumya okuhitsya aha muheru, mukashangwa mutaine ky'okuhanwa aha kiro kya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ruhanga n'omwesigwa owaabeetsire kutaaha omu kukwatanisa hamwe n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu.
Ahakuba mperize kumanyisibwa ab'owa Keloe ngu mwine empaka, B'eishe-emwe.
Eki ndikugamba nikyo eki ngu, buri omwe omuriimwe naagira ati: Nyowe ndi owa Paulo; kandi ondi ati: Ndi owa Apolo; ondi ati: Ndi owa Keefa; n'ondiijo ati: Ndi owa Kristo.
Nimugira ngu Kristo abagansiibwemu? Paulo akababambirwa? Nari mukabatizibwa omu iziina rya Paulo?
Ninsiima Ruhanga ahabw'okuba tindabatiize muntu omuriimwe, kureka Krispo na Gaayo,
ahu mwakwekwatsize ngu mukabatizibwa omu iziina ryangye.
(Kureka nkabatiza ab'omu ka ya Stefana; tindikwijuka yaaba hariho ondiijo weena ou naabatiize).
Ahabw'okuba Kristo tarantumire kubatiza, kureka okubuurira engiri, ntarikugigambisa bigambo by'obwengye, ngu omusharaba gwa Kristo gurekye kuhinduka ogwa busha.
ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu:
Ndyacwekyereza obwengye bw'abanyabwengye,
N'okwetegyereza kw'abarikwetegyereza ndyakuhindura busha.
Ahakuba omu bwengye bwa Ruhanga ku atarasiimire obwengye bw'ensi kuba nibwo bwareetera abantu kumumanya, yaasiima kujuna abarikwikiriza, naabajunisa obushema bw'okubuurira kwaitu.
Abayudaaya bashaba obumanyiso, n'Abagriika basherura obwengye,
kwonka itwe tubuurira Kristo owaabambirwe aha musharaba; kandi ogwo aha Bayudaaya n'enkongi, n'aha Banyamahanga n'obushema,
kwonka ahari abo abarikwetwa Abayudaaya n'Abagriika, ni Kristo, amaani ga Ruhanga kandi obwengye bwa Ruhanga.
Mumanye ngu obushema bwa Ruhanga n'obw'obwengye okukira obwengye bw'abantu, kandi n'obweremwa bwa Ruhanga n'obw'amaani okukira amaani g'abantu.
kwonka Ruhanga akatoorana abashema b'ensi ngu akwatse enshoni abanyabwengye; kandi Ruhanga akatoorana ebitaine maani ngu akwatse enshoni ebiine amaani;
n'eby'ahansi eby'ensi n'ebirikugaywa Ruhanga akabitoorana, kandi n'ebitariho, abone kuhindura busha ebiriho,
ngu hatakaagira omuntu weena owaayehimbisa omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Kandi ahabwe muri omuri Kristo Yesu, ou Ruhanga yaahindwire obwengye bwaitu, n'okuhikiirira, n'okwera, n'obucunguzi;
n'ahabw'ekyo orikwehimbisa, ayehimbise ahabwa Mukama, nk'oku kihandiikirwe.
ahakuba nkamariirira kutagira kindi kyona eki naamanya omuriimwe, kureka Yesu Kristo, ogwo owaabambirwe.
Nkaba ntuura naimwe nyine obweremwa, n'obwoba bwingi, nintetema.
Emigambire yangye n'obutumwa bwangye bikaba bitari bigambo by'obwengye eby'okwikiririsa abantu, kureka eby'okubooreka Omwoyo n'amaani,
ngu okwikiriza kwanyu kuteegamira obwengye bw'abantu kureka amaani ga Ruhanga.
Kwonka obwengye tubugamba n'abo abahikiriire, kwonka buba butari bwa nsi egi, n'obu bwakuba obw'abategyeki b'ensi egi ab'okuhwaho.
Itwe tugamba obwengye bwa Ruhanga, obwasherekirwe omu naama ei Ruhanga yaataireho ensi zoona zitakahangirwe, okutuhaisa ekitiinisa.
Tihariho n'omwe omu bategyeki b'ensi egi owaabumanyire; ahakuba, kuri baabumanyire, tibaakubambire Mukama ow'ekitiinisa;
kwonka nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Ebi eriisho ritakareebaga, n'okutu ebi kutakahuriraga,
Ebitakataahaga mu mutima gw'omuntu,
Byona ebi Ruhanga yaacumiire abamukunda,
Ruhanga akabitushuuruurira, naabitumanyisisa Omwoyo we; ahabw'okuba arondoora byona, nangwa n'ebitarikumanywa bya Ruhanga.
N'oha omu bantu orikumanya ebi omuntu ateekateeka, kureka omwoyo ogu omuntu aine. Na mbwenu tihariho orikumanya ebya Ruhanga kureka Omwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Kandi itwe omwoyo ou twahairwe ti w'ensi egi, kureka n'Omwoyo oruga ahari Ruhanga, ngu tubone kwetegyereza ebi Ruhanga atuheera busha.
Nibyo tugamba, tutarikubigambisa bigambo ebyegyesibwa n'obwengye bw'abantu, kureka ebyegyesiibwe Omwoyo,
Omuntu ow'obuzaarwa bw'obuntu taikiriza by'Omwoyo wa Ruhanga, ahabw'okuba bimubeera eby'obushema, kandi tabaasa kubyetegyereza, ahakuba byetegyerezibwa omu buryo bw'Omwoyo.
Ow'Omwoyo ayetegyereza byona, kwonka we tayetegyerezibwa muntu weena.
N'oha oramanyire ebi Mukama ateekateeka, haza akaija kumwegyesa? Kwonka itwe twine okuteekateeka kwa Kristo.
Nkabagaburira amate, tindabahaire by'okurya bigumire; ahabw'okuba mukaba mutakabibaasize. Kandi na hati hoona timukabibaasize,
ahakuba mukiri ab'omu mubiri kwonka. Omuriimwe ku haraabe harimu eihari n'empaka, timuri omu buryo bw'omubiri, abarikutwaza nk'abantu-buntu?
Omwe ku araabe naagira ati, Nyowe ndi owa Paulo; n'ondiijo ati, Nyowe ndi owa Apolo, obwo nimuba mutari abantu-buntu?
Mbwenu Apolo n'enki? Nari Paulo n'enki? N'abakozi abaabaikiririise, nka buri omwe oku Mukama yaamuhaire.
Nyowe nkabyara, Apolo yaitirira amaizi, kwonka Ruhanga niwe yaabikurize.
N'ahabw'ekyo orikubyara ti kintu, n'obu yaakuba orikwitirira amaizi, kureka Ruhanga okuza.
Orikubyara n'orikwitirira amaizi nibaingana, kandi buri omwe aryaheebwa ebihembo nk'omurimo gwe oku guriba guri;
ahakuba turi abakozi abakora kumwe, nitukorera Ruhanga; imwe muri omusiri gwa Ruhanga, n'enju erikwombekwa Ruhanga.
Mumanye ngu tihariho gundi musingi ogu omuntu weena yaakubaasa kutaho, kureka ogwo ogwatairweho, niwe Yesu Kristo.
Omuntu weena ku ayombeka aha musingi ogu n'ezaabu, n'efeeza, n'amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi, n'emiganda, n'obunyaatsi n'ebikonko,
omurimo gw'omuntu weena guryamanyisibwa; ahakuba Ekiro ekyo kiryagworeka, ahabw'okuba guryashuuruurwa omuriro; kandi omuriro nigwo gurihamya omurimo gw'omuntu weena oku guri.
Omurimo ogu omuntu weena yaayombekire aha musingi ogu, ku gurigumaho, aryaheebwa ebihembo.
Kandi omurimo gw'omuntu weena ku gurisya, aryafeerwa; kwonka we wenka aryajunwa, kwonka nk'orabire omu muriro.
Omuntu weena ku arihwerekyereza hekalu ya Ruhanga, nawe Ruhanga aryamuhwerekyereza, ahakuba hekalu ya Ruhanga n'erikwera, kandi hekalu egyo niimwe.
Ahakuba obwengye bw'ensi egi n'obushema ahari Ruhanga; nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Akwatira abanyabwengye omu bugobya bwabo.
Kandi ngu: Mukama naamanya ebiteekateeko by'abanyabwengye ku biba busha.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena arekye kwehimbisa ahabw'abantu; ahakuba byona n'ebyanyu,
yaaba Paulo, yaaba Apolo, yaaba Keefa, nari ensi, nari amagara, nari rufu, nari ebiriho, nari ebiribaho; byona n'ebyanyu;
naimwe muri aba Kristo, na Kristo n'owa Ruhanga.
Oku nikwo omuntu weena ashemereire kututeekateekaho, ku turi abaheereza ba Kristo n'ababiiki b'enaama za Ruhanga.
Kandi buzima ekyetengwa aha babiiki n'okuba abeesigwa.
Kwonka orubanja oru muncwera, nari oru ncwerwa abandi bantu, ahariinye n'akantu kakye munonga; kandi naanye nyenka tiinyine ru nyecwera.
Mumanye ngu tiinyine ki ndikwemanyaho; kwonka ekyo tikyo kiinyihaho rubanja, kureka Mukama niwe ancwera orubanja.

N'ahabw'ekyo mutaricwa orubanja rw'ekintu kyona, obunaku butakahikire, okuhitsya obu Mukama waitu ariija; niwe arimurika ebyasherekirwe omu mwirima, akooreka enaama ez'omu mitima. Obwo omuntu weena Ruhanga aryamusiima, nk'oku ashemereire.
Beitu n'oha orikukuhindura ow'omutaano aha bandi? Kandi oine ki eki otarahairwe? Mbwenu ku oraabe waakihairwe, ahabw'enki oyehimbisa nk'otarakihairwe?
Muherize kwiguta; muherize kutunga; muhindukire nk'abagabe ahu tutari; ku mwakuhinduka abagabe, tukaashemererwa, nangwa naitwe tutegyeka hamwe naimwe.
Ahakuba ninteekateeka ngu: Itwe entumwa, Ruhanga akatumurika aha muheru gw'abandi boona, nk'abacwereirwe orubanja rw'okufa; ahakuba tuhindukire ab'okushungwa ensi na baamaraika n'abantu.
Itwe turi abashema ahabwa Kristo, kwonka imwe muri abanyabwengye omuri Kristo. Itwe turi abeeremwa, kwonka imwe muri ab'amaani. Imwe muri ab'ekitiinisa, kwonka itwe turi abarikugaywa.
Na hati hoona twine enjara n'eiriho, tujwaire busha, nituterwa entomi, titwine maka,
nitufa kubi, nitukora emirimo n'emikono yaitu. Ku batukyeena, tubashabira omugisha; ku batuhiiga, tugumisiriza;
ku tubeihererwa, tugarukamu gye; tuhindwirwe ekumbwe omu nsi, nk'ebiragazibwa aha bintu byona, n'okuhitsya hati.
Ebi tinaabihandiika kubakwatsa enshoni, kureka okubahuguura nk'abaana bangye abarikukundwa.
Ahakuba n'obu muraabe mwine ababahabura kakumi omuri Kristo, kwonka timwine baashoimwe baingi; nimumanya ngu niinye naabazaire omuri Kristo Yesu ahabw'engiri.
N'ahabw'ekyo nimbeeshengyereza kukuratira emitwarize yangye.
Nikyo naatumira Timoseo ahariimwe, niwe mwana wangye omuri Mukama, ou ndikukunda, omwesigwa; aryabaijutsya emitwarize yangye ey'omuri Kristo, nk'oku nyegyesa hoonahoona omu makanisa goona.
Abamwe nibeehimbisa, nibagira ngu tindiija waanyu.
Kwonka ndyaija owaanyu juba, Mukama ku arikunda; obwo nibwo ndimanya amaani g'abo abarikwehimbisa, bitari bigambo byabo byonka.
Ahakuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tiburi mu kigambo bugambo, kureka omu maani.
Nimwenda ki? Nyije n'ekoni, nari omu kukunda n'omu mwoyo gw'obucureezi?
Kandi nimwehimbisa! Timushemereire kushaasha, mukaiha omuriimwe ogwo okozire ekyo?
N'obu ndaabe ntari naimwe omu mubiri, kwonka ndi naimwe omu mwoyo; nk'ori naimwe buzima, omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu mperize kucwa orubanja rw'omuntu ogwo okozire ekibi ekyo.
Ku muriba muteeraine, naanye ndi hamwe naimwe omu mwoyo n'amaani ga Mukama waitu Yesu,
mushemereire kuhayo omuntu ogwo ahari Sitaane, ahwerekyerere omu mubiri, omwoyo gwe gubone kujunwa aha kiro kya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Okwehimbisa kwanyu ti kurungi. Timurikumanya ngu akatumbisa kakye katumbisa ekiihuro kyona?
Mwihemu ekitumbisa ekya ira, mubone kuba ekiihuro kisya, mutarimu kitumbisa. Ahakuba Kristo Omwana gw'entaama ogw'Okuhingurwaho kwaitu akatambwa ahabwaitu.
N'ahabw'ekyo ka tugume turinde ekiro ky'Obugyenyi obwo, tutaine kitumbisa ekya ira n'obu kyakuba eky'eitima n'obubi, kureka omugaati ogutarimu kitumbisa ogushemeire, kandi ogw'amazima.
Omu baruha ei naabahandiikiire nkabaragiira kutakwatanisa na bashambani;
kwonka tindagambire kutaanira kimwe n'abashambani b'ensi egi, nari abeetengi, nari abambuzi, nari abarikuramya ebishushani; ahabw'okuba ku kyakubaire kityo, mukaabaire mushemereire kuruga omu nsi.

Kwonka eki naabahandiikiire, n'okutakwatanisa na muntu orikwetwa ow'eishe-emwe, ku araabe ari omushambani, nari omwetengi, nari orikuramya ebishushani, nari omujumi, nari omusinzi, nari omwambuzi; orikushusha atyo, n'okurya mutarirya nawe.
Nyowe ninfa ki okucwera ab'aheeru orubanja? Ab'omu kanisa ti bo mushemereire kucwera orubanja?
Kwonka ab'aheeru Ruhanga niwe arirubacwera. Mwihe omuriimwe omuntu ogwo omubi.
Omuntu weena omuriimwe, ku araabe aine eki arikufa na mutaahi we, tikirikumukwatsa enshoni kumutabaariza omu maisho g'abatahikiriire, omu mwanya gw'okumutabaariza omu maisho g'abarikwera?
Timurikumanya ngu abarikwera nibo baricwera ensi orubanja? Kandi ku muraabe niimwe muricwera ensi orubanja, timurikubaasa kucwa emanja nkye nk'ezo?
Timurikumanya ku turicwera baamaraika emanja? Reero kaashwa eby'amagara aga?
Mbwenu shi, ku muraabe nimugira emanja nk'ezo, ahabw'enki mutoorana abarikugaywa ekanisa kuba nibo baazicwa?
Ebi naabigamba kubakwatsa enshoni. Omuriimwe tiharimu n'omwe oine obwengye owaakubaasa kucwera beene ishe orubanja?
Ahakuba ab'eishe-emwe nibatabaariza ab'eishe-emwe abandi, kandi batabaarizana aha batarikwikiriza!
Mbwenu omu mwanya gw'ebyo niimwe mukora kubi abandi, mukabagobeza, kandi abu mugobeza n'abeishe-emwe.
Timurikumanya ngu abatahikiriire tibarihungura bukama bwa Ruhanga? Mutaribeihwa; abashambani, nari abarikuramya ebishushani, nari abeegira abakazi, nari ebitingwa,
nari abashuma, nari abeetengi, nari abasinzi, nari abajumi, n'obu baakuba abanyagi, abo boona tibarihungura bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Kandi bamwe omuriimwe mukaba muri nka bo; kwonka mukoogibwa, mwayezibwa, mwaihwaho orubanja omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Byona nimbiikirizibwa, kwonka ti byona ebirikungasira. Byona nimbiikirizibwa, kwonka tinditegyekwa kintu kyona.
Eby'okurya n'eby'enda, kandi enda nayo n'ey'eby'okurya; kwonka Ruhanga aryabiihaho byombi. Omubiri tigurahangiirwe bushambani, kureka gukahangirwa Mukama waitu, na Mukama waitu niwe Mukama w'omubiri;
kandi Ruhanga akazoora Mukama waitu, naitwe aryatuzoora n'amaani ge.
Timurikumanya ngu emibiri yaanyu eba engingo za Kristo? Mbwenu nimbaasa nta kutwara engingo za Kristo, nkazihindura engingo za maraaya? Rubuuza!
Nari shi, timurikumanya ngu orikuteerana na maraaya nibaba omubiri gumwe? Ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Abo bombi baryaba omubiri gumwe.
Kwonka oteeraine na Mukama nibaba omwoyo gumwe.
Mwetantare obushambani. Ekibi ekindi kyona eki omuntu akora kiba aheeru y'omubiri gwe; kwonka orikushambana naaba akozire ekibi ky'okushiisha omubiri gwe wenka.
Timurikumanya ngu omubiri gwanyu niyo hekalu y'Omwoyo Orikwera ori omuriimwe, ou mwahairwe Ruhanga? Imwe timurikwetegyeka;
ahabw'okuba mukagurwa n'obuguzi bwingi. N'ahabw'ekyo muhaise Ruhanga ekitiinisa omu mibiri yaanyu.
Ebirikukwata aha bi mwampandiikiire, ekirungi n'omushaija kutakora ha mukazi.
Kwonka ahabw'okwerinda obushambani, omushaija weena agire omukazi we; kandi omukazi weena agire omushaija we.
Omushaija ahe omukazi we ekimushemereire, kandi omukazi nawe ahe iba ekimushemereire.
Ahakuba omukazi tategyeka mubiri gwe, kureka gutegyekwa iba; kandi n'omushaija tategyeka mubiri gwe, kureka gutegyekwa omukazi we.
Murekye kwimana, kureka mwaba muragaine omwanya, ngu mubone kwehayo omu kushaba, bwanyima mugarukye kuba hamwe, Sitaane arekye kubategyesa okuteezibira kwanyu.
Ebi naabigamba kubaha obusingye, ti kiragiro ngu nimbaragiira;
kureka nkaayenzire abantu boona kuba nkaanye. Kwonka omuntu weena aine ekiconco kye eki yaahairwe Ruhanga, omwe okwe, n'ondiijo okwe.
Kwonka abatakashweire, n'abatakashweirwe, n'abafaakazi nimbagambira nti: Ekyakubaire kirungi aharibo n'okuba nkaanye.
Kwonka ku baraabe batarikubaasa kwezibira, bashwere, nari bashwerwe; ahakuba haakiri okushwera nari okushwerwa okukira okubuguma.
Kandi abashweire n'abashweirwe nimbaragiira, kwonka tiinye kureka Mukama waitu, omukazi arekye kutaana na iba;
kandi ku araabe yaataine nawe, agumire aho ataashwerwa ondiijo, nari shi agarukane na iba, kandi omushaija atarishenda omukazi we.
Abandi niinye ndikubagambira, ti Mukama nti: Ow'eishe-emwe weena, ku araabe aine omukazi otarikwikiriza, omukazi ogwo yaakunda kuguma nawe, arekye kumushenda.
Kandi omukazi weena, oine iba otarikwikiriza, iba yaakunda kuguma nawe, omukazi ogwo ataritaana n'omushaija we.

Ahakuba omushaija otarikwikiriza ayezibwa ahabw'omukazi we; n'omukazi otarikwikiriza ayezibwa ahabw'ow'eishe-emwe ogwo. Kuri kitari kityo, abaana baanyu bakaabaire abatashemeziibwe, kwonka hati n'abarikwera.
Kwonka otarikwikiriza, ku araabe naayenda kutaana, ataane. Ku birikuba bityo, ow'eishe-emwe omushaija nari omukazi naaba atakibohwa. Ahakuba Ruhanga akatwetera obusingye.
Iwe mukazi 'we, noomanya ota ku otarijuna baro? Nari shi, iwe mushaija 'we, noomanya ota ku otarijuna mukazi waawe?
Kwonka, nk'oku Mukama waitu yaahaire omuntu weena, kandi nk'oku Ruhanga yaayetsire buri muntu, abe niwko yaatwaza. Naanye nikwo ndagiire omu makanisa goona.
Hariho omuntu owaayetsirwe ashazirwe? Arekye kuhinduka nk'otashazirwe. Nari shi hariho owaayetsirwe atashazirwe? Arekye kusharwa.
Okusharwa tikwine mugasho, n'obu kwakuba okutasharwa, kureka okworobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga.
Omuntu weena agume nk'oku yaabaire ari, obu yaayetwa.
Okeetwa ori omuhuuku? Kirekye kukusaasa;
Mumanye ngu owaayetsirwe omuri Mukama ari omuhuuku, aheebwa obusingye Mukama; kandi n'ogwo owaayetsirwe aine obusingye, aba omuhuuku wa Kristo.
Mukagurwa obuguzi bwingi; murekye kuhinduka abahuuku b'abantu.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, omuntu weena agume omuri Ruhanga ari nk'oku yaabaire ari, obu yaayetwa.
Eby'abatakashweire n'abatakashweirwe, tiinyine kiragiro kya Mukama aharibyo. Kwonka ningamba eki ndikubiteekateekaho, nk'omuntu omwesigwa ahabw'embabazi za Mukama.
Kandi ninteekateeka ngu, ahabw'obusaasi oburiho omu biro ebi, ni kirungi buri muntu okuguma nk'oku ari.
Okateeranwa n'omukazi? Oteetenga kutaanisibwa. Okataanisibwa n'omukazi? Otashwera ondiijo.
Kwonka ku oraashwere, nooba otasiisire; n'omwishiki ku araashwerwe, naaba atasiisire. Kwonka abarikushwerana baryagira obusaasi omu mubiri; kandi eki naakwenzire n'okububakiza.
Ekyo nikyo ndikugambira nti: B'eishe-emwe, hatsigaire ebiro bikye; okuruga hati abaine abakazi babe nk'abatabaine;
abarikurira babe nk'abatarikurira; abarikushemererwa babe nk'abatarikushemererwa; abarikugura babe nk'abataine ki baine;
n'abarikukoresa eby'ensi
Niinyenda ngu muteemereza omutima. Otaine mukazi ata omutima aha bya Mukama oku araagwise gye Mukama;
kwonka oine omukazi ata omutima aha by'ensi, oku araagwise gye omukazi we.

Kandi hariho omutaano gw'oine omushaija, n'otamwine. Otaine mushaija ata omutima aha bya Mukama, ngu abone kuguma ayeziibwe omu mubiri n'omu mwoyo; kwonka oine omushaija ata omutima aha by'ensi, oku araagwise gye iba.
Ebyo naabigamba ahabw'okubahwera, ti kubatega mutego, kureka kubooreka ebishemeire, ngu mubone kukorera Mukama mutaine mitima ebiri.
Omuntu weena ku araateekateekye ngu tarikukora gye mwishiki ou arikugamba obugyenyi, kandi
Kwonka ohamire omu mutima gwe, otaine kirikumugyema, kandi orikubaasa kutegyeka omubiri gwe, akamariirira kumureka akaguma ari omwishiki, naaba akozire gye.
N'ahabw'ekyo orikushwera omwishiki ou arikugamba obugyenyi, naaba akozire gye; kwonka orikureka kumushwera, naaba amweshumbize kukora gye.
Kwonka ku yaakuguma aho nk'oku ari, obwo nibwo yaakukiraho kuba gye, nyowe nikwo ndikuteekateeka; kandi ningira ngu nyine Omwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Omuntu weena ku nteekateeka ngu aine eki arikumanya, aba atakakimanyire, nk'oku ashemereire kukimanya.
Kwonka omuntu ku akunda Ruhanga, niwe amanywa Ruhanga.
N'obu haraabe hariho abarikwetwa baaruhanga, ahaiguru n'ahansi, nk'oku hariho baaruhanga baingi n'abakama baingi;

kwonka ahariitwe hariho Ruhanga omwe Isheboona, ou ebintu byona bikomookaho, naitwe turi abahuriire ahabw'okuba abe; kandi hariho Mukama omwe, niwe Yesu Kristo, obaisaho ebintu byona, naitwe akatubaisaho.

Kwonka okwetegyereza oku tikuri mu bantu boona. Abandi ahabw'okumanyiira kukorera ebishushani, n'okuhitsya hati ku barya enyama z'ebibitambiirwe, bateekateeka ngu abu babitambiire ni baaruhanga buzima, emitima yaabo etahamire esiisikara.
Kwonka eby'okurya tibyo bitusiimisa ahari Ruhanga. Ku tuba tutabiriire, tihariho ki tufeerwa; kandi ku tubirya, titwine ki twongyerwaho.
Kwonka mwerinde, obundi obusingye bwanyu obu butakaateeza abatahamire entsibo.

Mbwenu omuntu, ku yaakukureeba, ori omuntu oyetegyereize, oshutami nooriira omuri hekalu y'ekishushani ekirikuramibwa, yaaba ataine maani, omutima gwe tigukaatiinuuka, akarya ebitambiirwe ebishushani ebirikuramibwa?
N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo otaine maani naahwerekyerera naazira okwetegyereza kwawe, kandi ari ow'eishe-emwe ou Kristo yaafeereire.
Ku mukora ekibi aha b'eishe-emwe, mwahutaaza emitima yaabo etahamire, muba mukozire ekibi ahari Kristo.
N'ahabw'ekyo eby'okurya ku biraabe nibigwisa ow'eishe-emwe, tindirya nyama ebiro byona, ngu ndekye kugwisa ow'eishe-emwe.
N'obu ndaabe ntari ntumwa aha bandi, kwonka ahariimwe ndi entumwa; ahabw'okuba imwe muri akamanyiso omuri Mukama k'okuhamya ku ndi entumwa buzima.
Eki nikyo ndikwetonganira ahari abo abarikumpakanisa.
Titurikwikirizibwa kuheebwa eby'okurya n'eby'okunywa?
Titurikwikirizibwa kutwara abakazi baitu, baaba bari ab'eishe-emwe, n'okugyenda nabo, nk'entumwa ezindi, na barumuna ba Mukama waitu, na Keefa?
Nari nyowe na Barunaba niitwe twenka abatarikwikirizibwa kureka kukora eby'okwehwera?
Ni muserukare ki oza aha rugamba, haza akeegurira eby'okukoresa? N'oha obyara omusiri gw'emizaabibu, atarye ha bijuma byayo? N'oha oriisa amasyo atanywe mate gaago?
Ebi nimbigamba nk'oku abantu bagamba? Nari Ebiragiro byo tikwo bigamba?
Nimumanya ku kyahandiikirwe omu biragiro bya Musa ngu: Otariboha akanwa k'ente, yaaba neejunga oburo. Noogira ngu ente nizo Ruhanga asaasibwa zonka?

Nari shi tarakigambire buzima ahabwaitu? Eego, kikahandiikwa ahabwaitu, ahabw'okuba omuhingi ashemereire kuhinga aine amatsiko; kandi omuhuuzi ashemereire kuhuura aine amatsiko g'okutwara aha bi yaahuura.
Itwe ku turaabe twababibiremu eby'Omwoyo, nimugira ngu nikiremeera munonga kubagyeshamu eby'okuhwera omubiri?
Abandi ku baraabe baine obwo bushoboorozi obu; kureka tukeemera byona, ngu turekye kuzibira engiri ya Ruhanga kubuga.
Timurikumanya ngu abakora emirimo y'omuri hekalu, batungwa ebya hekalu? N'abaheereza aha itambiro, batunga omugabo aha birikutambwaho?
Na Mukama waitu nikwo yaaragiire ati: Ababuurizi b'engiri batungwe engiri.
Kwonka nyowe ahari ebyo tindakoreiseho na kimwe; kandi tinaahandiika ebi ngu mbone kukorerwa ntyo; ahakuba haakiri nyowe okufa, okukira omuntu weena kuhindura busha okwehimbisa kwangye oku.
Ku ndaabe nimbuurira engiri, tiinyine ki ndikwehimbisizaho, ahabw'okuba nimbuurira ngyemesereziibwe; kandi ku naakuba ntabuuriire engiri, nkaareeba enaku.
Ahakuba ku ndaabe nimbuurira engiri nyeyendeire, nyine ebihembo; kwonka ku ndaabe ningibuurira ngyemirwe, na mbwenu nshemereire kubuurira ahabw'okukwatsibwa engiri egyo.
Mbwenu ebihembo byangye niki? Nibyo ebi ngu, ku ndaabe nimbuurira engiri, ngibuurire ahabw'embabazi, ndekye kukoresa obushoboorozi bwangye bwona obu nyine omu murimo gw'engiri.
Aha Bayudaaya nkatwaza nk'Omuyudaaya, ngu mbone Abayudaaya; aha barikutegyekwa Ebiragiro nkatwaza nk'orikutegyekwa Ebiragiro, (n'obu biraabe bitarikuntegyeka) ngu mbone abarikutegyekwa Ebiragiro;
n'aha bataine Biragiro, nkaba nk'otabiine, ngu mbone abataine Biragiro; (ti nk'otaine biragiro ahari Ruhaga, kureka nk'orikutegyekwa ebiragiro bya Kristo).
Aha bataine maani, nkahinduka otaine maani, ngu mbone kutunga abataine maani. Ahari boona mpindukire byona, ngu omu miringo yoona mbone kukiza bamwe.
Kandi ebyo byona mbikora ahabw'engiri, ngu ntungye aha migisha yaayo.
Omuntu oyezirika omu mizaano egyo ayerinda omuri byona. Kandi abo babikora ahabw'okuheebwa ekirunga ekirikusiisikara, kwonka itwe ahabw'ekitarikusiisikara.
Nikyo nyirukira ntyo, ti nk'otarikumanya i arikuza; nteera entomi, ti nk'orikuteera busha;
kureka nteera omubiri gwangye ogu ngutegyekye, bwanyima ku ndiheza kubuurira abandi, nyowe ahabwangye ntarishangwa ndi otarikwikirizibwa.
kandi boona ku baabatiziibwe omu Kicu n'omu Nyanja okukwatanisa na Musa;
kandi boona ku baariire eky'okurya kimwe eky'Omwoyo,
boona bakanywa eky'okunywa akimwe eky'Omwoyo; ahakuba bakaba banywa aha rukiri orw'Omwoyo orwabaire rubakurata. Orukiri orwo akaba ari Kristo.
Kwonka abarikukira obwingi omuribo Ruhanga tarabasiimire, ahakuba bakahwerekyererezibwa omu ihamba.
Kandi murekye kuba abarikuramya ebishushani, nka bamwe omuribo oku baabaire bari, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Abantu bakashutama ahansi kurya n'okunywa, baimuka kuzina.
Kandi tutashambana, nka bamwe omuribo oku baashambaine, hakafa abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ishatu eizooba rimwe.
Turekye kugyeza Mukama, nka bamwe omuribo oku baamugyerize, bakamarwaho enjoka.
Kandi muteetomboita nka bamwe omuribo oku baayetomboitsire, bakamarwaho Omuhwerekyerezi.
Ebyo bikabahikaho kuba eby'okureeberaho, kandi bikahandiikwa kutuhuguura, itwe abariho omu biro by'aha muheru gw'ensi.
N'ahabw'ekyo orikuteekateeka ngu ayemereire ayerinde atagwa.

Tihariho kigyezo ekirababaireho ekitari kya bantu boona. Kwonka Ruhanga n'ow'okwesigwa; taribaikiriza kugyezibwa kigyezo eki mutarikubaasa; kureka omu kigyezo ekyo aryabateeraho oburyo bw'okuhunga, ngu mubaase kukigumisiririza.
N'ahabw'ekyo, abarikukundwa, mwetantare, okuramya ebishushani.
Nimbagambira nk'abantu abaine obwengye; mwetegyereze eki ndikugamba.
Okukwatana ekikopo ky'omugisha, eki tushabira omugisha, tikwo kukwatanisa omu shagama ya Kristo? Okubagana omugaati ogu tucwamu, tikwo kukwatanisa omu mubiri gwa Kristo?
Nk'oku omugaati guri gumwe, nikwo naitwe, n'obu turi baingi, turi omubiri gumwe, ahabw'okuba twena tubagana omugaati gumwe.
Mureebe Abaisraeli omu buzaare bw'omubiri, abarya aha bitambo tibateeranwa eitambiro?
Mbwenu ngambe ki? Nti: Ekihongyeirwe ekishushani n'ekintu? Nari ekishushani kyo n'ekintu?
Kwonka eki ndikugamba n'eki nti: Abanyamahanga ebi batamba, babitambira baadaimoni, ti Ruhanga; kandi tindikwenda imwe kukwatanisa na baadaimoni.
Timurikubaasa kunywa ha kikopo kya Mukama, kandi n'aha kya baadaimoni. Timurikubaasa kuriira ha meeza ya Mukama waitu n'aha ya baadaimoni.
Mbwenu nitukwatsa Mukama waitu eihari? Nari shi nitumukiza amaani?
Omuntu weena arekye kwesherurira ebye ahabwe, kureka asherure eby'okuhwera mutaahi we.
Ekirikugurwa omu itundiro ry'enyama kyona mukirye, mutaine ki mubuurize ahabw'okwiha okubanganisa omu mutima;
ahakuba ensi n'ebirimu byona n'ebya Mukama.
Omwe aha batarikwikiriza ku ariba yaabeetsire aha bugyenyi, mwasiima kuzayo, murye ebi babata omumaisho, mutaine ki mubuurize ahabw'okwiha okubanganisa omu mutima.
Kwonka ku harigira omuntu owaabagambira ati: Eki kitambiirwe baadaimoni, murekye kukirya ahabw'ogwo owaabamanyisa, n'ahabw'eiraka ry'omwoyo eriri omuriimwe;
(eiraka eri ndikugamba ti ryawe, n'ery'omuntu ogwo). Ahabw'enki obusingye bwangye nibucwerwa orubanja eiraka ry'omwoyo gw'ondiijo muntu?
Ku ndaabe ndya n'okusiima, ahabw'enki njumwa ahabw'ekyo eki naasiimira?
N'ahabw'ekyo ku muraabe nimurya nari nimunywa nari nimukora ekintu kyona, mukore byona okuhimbisisa Ruhanga.
Mutagwisa kubi Abayudaaya nari Abagriika nari ekanisa ya Ruhanga;
naanye nk'oku nteeraho kushemeza abantu boona omuri byona ebi nkora, ntarikusherura by'okungasira nyenka, kureka eby'okugasira baingi, ngu bajunwe.
Nimbasiima ahabw'okuunyijuka omuri byona, n'okugumizamu omu migyenzo nk'oku naagibeegyeise.
Kwonka niinyenda ngu imwe mumanye ku omutwe gw'omushaija ari Kristo, n'omutwe gw'omukazi ku ari iba, kandi omutwe gwa Kristo ku ari Ruhanga.
Omushaija weena orikushaba nari orikubuurira ayetwekyereire, naaba ahemwire omutwe gwe;
kwonka omukazi weena orikushaba nari orikubuurira ateetwekyereire, naaba ahemwire omutwe gwe; ahakuba ni nk'omweire enkomborora.
Omukazi ku araabe atarikwenda kwetwekyerera, bamutegye eishokye; kwonka ku kiraabe kiri eky'enshoni omukazi okusharwa eishokye nari okutegwa, ayeetwekyerere.
Mumanye ngu omushaija tashemereire kwetwekyerera, ahakuba n'ekishushani kya Ruhanga n'ekitiinisa kye; kwonka omukazi n'ekitiinisa ky'omushaija.
Ahakuba omushaija tarahangirwe kuruga omu mukazi, kureka omukazi niwe yaarugire omu mushaija.
Kandi omushaija tarahangiirwe mukazi, kureka omukazi niwe yaahangiirwe omushaija.
N'ahabw'ekyo omukazi ahsemereire kugira eky'okwetwekyerera ahabwa baamaraika.
Kwonka omuri Mukama omukazi tabaho hatari mushaija, n'omushaija tabaho hatari mukazi;
ahakuba nk'oku omukazi yaarugire omu mushaija, nikwo n'omushaija azaarwa omukazi; kandi byona biruga ahari Ruhanga.
Naimwe mubiteekateekyeho. Ni kirungi omukazi kushaba Ruhanga ateetwekyereire?
Nangwa n'emicwe y'obuntu tebeegyesa ngu omushaija okureka eishokye rye rikakura nikimuhemura?
Kwonka omukazi ku areka eishokye rye ryakura, kiba eky'ekitiinisa ahariwe; ahabw'okuba akaheebwa eishokye kumutwekyerera.
Kwonka ku haraabe hariho orikwenda kureeta empaka, amanye ngu omugyenzo nk'ogwo titugwine, kandi n'omu makanisa ga Ruhanga tigurimu.
Omu bi ndikwenda kubaragiira, tindikubasiima, ahakuba ku mweteerana, tiharugamu kugyenda mumaisho, kureka okugaruka enyima.
Eky'okubanza, nimpurira ngu, ku muba mweteeraine nk'ekanisa, habaho okutaikirizana omuriimwe, kandi ebimwe niinyikiriza ngu nikwo biri.
Mumanye ngu okutaana kushemereire kubaho omuriimwe, abarikusiimwa omuriimwe babone kureebwa.
Ku muba muteeraine, ti kuba kurya By'okurya bya Mukama waitu;
ahakuba omu kurya okwo omuntu weena abanza kurya eby'okurya bye ahabwe, omwe aguma aine enjara, ondiijo asinzire.
Imwe! Timugira amaju g'okuriiramu n'okunyweramu? Nari mugaya ekanisa ya Ruhanga, mukwatsa enshoni abataine kantu? Mbagambire ki? Mbasiime ahabw'ekyo? Ngaaha, tindikubasiima.
Ahakuba eki naahairwe Mukama, nikyo naabahaire naimwe, ngu Mukama waitu Yesu, aha kiro eki baamureebeizeho, akakwata omugaati;
ku yaaherize kusiima, yaagubega, yaagira ati: Ogu nigwo mubiri gwangye oguheebwayo ahabwanyu; mugume mukore muti okuunyijukiraho.
Ku baaherize kurya, yaakwata atyo n'ekikopo, yaagira ati: Ekikopo eki niyo ndagaano nsya omu shagama yangye. Mugume mukore muti, mwaba nimuginywa, okuunyijukiraho.
Ahakuba ku murya aha mugaati ogu, kandi mwanywa n'aha kikopo eki, muba nimworeka okufa kwa Mukama waitu, okuhitsya obu ariija.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu ayeshwijume, abone kurya aha mugaati ogwo n'okunywa aha kikopo ekyo.
Ahakuba omuntu ku arya yaanywa, ateetaire ha mubiri gwa Mukama, aba naayeriira kandi naayenywera orubanja.
Nikyo kireeteire baingi omuriimwe kugira amagara mabi n'okurwara; kandi n'abagwejegyeire ti bakye.
Kuri twecwera orubanja twenka, titwakurucwereirwe.
Kwonka nka ku turucwerwa Mukama waitu, atuhana ngu turekye kucwerwa orubanja hamwe n'ab'ensi.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, ku muraagume mwateerana kurya, mugume murindane,
(omuntu weena ku araabe aine enjara, arye omuka) murekye kweteerana mukeereetera orubanja. Ebindi ndyabibahabura naija.
Ebirikukwata aha biconco by'Omwoyo, B'eishe-emwe, tindikwenda ngu mutabimanya.
Nimumanya ngu, obu mwabaire mukiri abakafiiri, mukaba muhabisibwa muhabira omu bishushani ebitarikubaasa kugamba, nk'oku mwabaire muhabisibwa hoona.
N'ahabw'ekyo nimbamanyisa nti: Tihariho muntu ogambire omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga owaakugira ati: Yesu akyeenwe; kandi tihariho owaakubaasa kugira ati: Yesu niwe Mukama, atagambisiibwe Mwoyo Orikwera.
Mumanye ngu hariho ebiconco by'emiringo mingi, kwonka Omwoyo n'omwe;
hariho n'okuheereza kw'emiringo mingi, kwonka Mukama n'omwe;
kandi hariho okukora kw'emiringo mingi, kwonka Ruhanga okoresa byona omuri boona n'omwe.
Kandi buri muntu ashuuruurirwa eby'Omwoyo kugasira boona.
Ahakuba omwe aheebwa Omwoyo ekigambo ky'obwengye, ondiijo aheebwa ekigambo ky'okwetegyereza omu buryo bw'Omwoyo ogwo;
ondiijo aheebwa Omwoyo ogwo okwikiriza, ondiijo aheebwa Omwoyo ogwo omwe ebiconco eby'okutamba endwara,
ondiijo okukora eby'okutangaaza, ondiijo okubuurira, ondiijo obwengye obw'okutaanisa omu myoyo, ondiijo ekiconco eky'okugamba endimi ezitari zimwe, ondiijo eky'okushoboorora endimi.
Kandi ebyo byona bikorwa Omwoyo ogwo omwe, niwe agabira buri muntu, nk'oku ayenda.
Mumanye ngu, nk'oku omubiri guba gumwe, gukagira engingo nyingi, kandi engingo ezo zoona ez'omubiri, n'obu ziraabe ziri nyingi, guba omubiri gumwe; na Kristo nikwo ari.
Ahakuba omu Mwoyo omwe twena tukabatizibwa kuba omubiri gumwe, n'obu turaabe turi Abayudaaya nari Abagriika, abahuuku nari ab'obusingye; twena tukanyweisibwa aha Mwoyo omwe.
Ahakuba omubiri tiguba rugingo rumwe, kureka nyingi.
Ekigyere ku kyakugira kiti: Obu ntari mukono, tindi rugingo rw'omubiri, ekyo tikikaakihindura kutaba ky'omubiri.
N'okutu ku kwakugira kuti: Obu ntari riisho, tindi rugingo rw'omubiri, ekyo tikikaakuhindura kutaba kw'omubiri.
Omubiri gwona kuri gwabaire eriisho, gukaahuriire guta? Kandi kuri gwabaire okutu, gukaakagiise ki?
Kwonka Ruhanga akataho engingo zoona omu mubiri, buri rugingo nk'oku yaasiimire.
Engingo zoona kuri zaabaire orugingo rumwe, omubiri gukaabaire gurahi?
Kwonka, nk'oku kiri, engingo ni nyingi, kwonka omubiri ni gumwe.
Eriisho tiririkubaasa kugira omukono riti: Tonyiniire mugasho; nari shi omutwe kugira ebigyere guti: Timunyiniire mugasho.
Nangwa n'ekindi, engingo z'omubiri ezi tuteekateekaho ngu tiziine maani, nizo ziba ezirikwetengwa;
n'engingo z'omubiri ezi tuteekateekaho ngu tiziine kitiinisa, nizo tuha ekitiinisa okukira ezindi; kandi engingo zaitu eziitsa enshoni nizo tujwarira,
kwonka ezitaitsa nshoni tizeetenga kujwekwa. Nikwo Ruhanga yaateeraine omubiri, orugingo orutaine kitiinisa yaaba nirwo yaaha ekitiinisa okukira ezindi,
ngu omu mubiri harekye kubamu okutaikirizana, kureka engingo zoona zisaasibwane.
Orugingo rumwe ku rushaasha, engingo zoona zisaasira hamwe; orugingo rumwe ku ruheebwa ekitiinisa, engingo zoona zishemerererwa hamwe.
Mbwenu naimwe muri omubiri gwa Kristo, kandi n'engingo zaagwo buri omwe.

Kandi Ruhanga akataho abantu omu kanisa, ab'okubanza entumwa, aba kabiri baanabi, aba kashatu abeegyesa, bwanyima abakora eby'okutangaaza; bwanyima yaataho ab'okutamba endwara, n'abahwezi, n'abategyeki, n'ab'okugmba endimi zitari zimwe.
Nimugira ngu boona n'entumwa? Boona ni baanabi? Boona n'abeegyesa? Boona bakora eby'okutangaaza?
Boona baine ekiconco eky'okutamba endwara? Boona bagamba endimi? Boona bazishoboorora?
Kwonka mute omutima aha kusherura ebiconco ebirikukira oburungi. Kandi niinyija kubooreka omuhanda ogurikukira oburungi.
N'obu naakugamba endimi z'abantu n'eza baamaraika, kwonka ntaine kukunda, nkaaba ndi nk'omuringa ogurikurangira n'ekyoma ekirikugamba.
Kandi n'obu naakugira ekiconco eky'obunabi, nkamanya enaama zoona n'obwengye bwona, kandi n'obu naakugira okwikiriza kwona, okwakumbaasisa kwihaho enshozi, kwonka ntaine kukunda, nkaaba ntari kintu.
Kandi n'obu naakugaba ebintu byangye byona kuriisa abooro, kandi n'obu naakuhayo omubiri gwangye kwokibwa, kwonka ntaine kukunda, tikiine ki kyakungasira.
Okukunda kugumisiriza, kugira embabazi; okukunda tikugira ihari; okukunda tikwehimbisa, tikwetunguura;
tikukora birikwitsa enshoni, tikwesherurira byakwo; tikurahuka kuguubwa kubi, tikuteekateeka kibi aha muntu;
tikushemerererwa kutahikiirira, kureka kushemerererwa amazima.
Okukunda kwemera byona, kwikiriza byona, kugira amatsiko ahari byona, kugumisiririza byona.
ahakuba nitumanyaho kakye; nituragura kakye;
kwonka ebihikire ku biriija, ebitahikire biryaihwaho.
Obu naabaire ndi muto, nkaba ngamba nk'omuto, nyetegyereza nk'omuto, nteekateeka nk'omuto; ku naakuzire, naareka eby'obuto.
Nimumanya ngu hati nitureebera omu ndeeberwamu tutarikuhweza gye; kwonka omu biro ebyo turyareebana butunu. Hati nimmanyaho kakye; kwonka omu biro ebyo ndyamanyira kimwe nk'oku naamanyiirwe kimwe.
Mbwenu ebirikugumaho ni bishatu, okwikiriza, amatsiko n'okukunda; kwonka ekirikukira byona n'okukunda.
Orikugamba orurimi naaba atarikugambira bantu, kureka Ruhanga; ahabw'okuba tihaine orikubishoborokyerwa; kwonka we Omwoyo naaba naamugambisa enaama.
Kwonka orikubuurira naaba naagambira abantu eby'okubombeka n'okubeezirikisa n'okubahuumuriza.
Orikugamba orurimi naaba naayeyombeka wenka; kwonka orikubuurira naaba naayombeka ekanisa.
Mumanye ngu niinyenda ku mwena mugamba endimi, kwonka okukira ku mubuurira. Ahakuba obuurira akira ogamba endimi, kureka haagira owaazishoboorora, ngu ekanisa ebone kwombekwa.
Mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, ku ndiija owaanyu ningamba endimi, ndyabagasira ki, ku ndiba ntagambire ki naashuuruurirwa, nari eky'okumanya, nari eky'okubuurira, nari eky'okubeegyesa?
Nangwa n'ebintu ebigamba, ebitaine magara, nk'emikuri nari enanga, ku birikuba bitataaniise maraka gaabyo, baryamanya bata eki birikugamba?
Enzamba ku egamba eiraka eritarikwetegyerezibwa, n'oha oyeteekateeka kuza aha rugamba?
Mbwenu imwe, ku muraabe mutarikugamba mu ndimi ebigambo ebirikushobooroka, baryamanya bata ebirikugambwa? Ahakuba muryaba nimushusha nk'abarikugambira omuyaga.
Omu nsi yoona n'obu harimu endimi nyingi zita, tihariho na rumwe orutaine oku rushoboororwa.
Ku mba ntashoborokyeirwe rurimi, mba nk'omunyamahanga ahari ogwo orikugamba, nawe ambeera atyo.
Naimwe nk'oku mwine obweziriki aha biconco by'Omwoyo, mweshumbyeho okwezirika kwombeka ekanisa.
N'ahabw'ekyo orikugamba orurimi, ashabe kuheebwa okurushoboorora.
Ahakuba ku mba ninshaba omu rurimi, omwoyo gwangye gushaba, kwonka obwengye bwangye tibugira ki bukora.
Mbwenu ngire nta? Niinyija kushabisa Omwoyo, kandi nshabise n'obwengye; niinyija kwehsongoza Omwoyo, kandi nyenshongoze n'obwengye.
Ku oriba otatwarize otyo, haza waashabira omugisha omu Mwoyo wenka, omuntu ori aha rubaju rw'abatarikwetegyereza, aryaikiriza ata ati: Amiina, waaheza kusiima, haza we ataamanya ki waagamba?
N'amazima, ahabwawe nooba osiimire gye: kwonka ogwo we tarikuhwerwa.
Ninsiima Ruhanga, ahakuba mwena nimbakiza kugamba endimi;
kwonka omu kanisa omu mwanya gw'okugamba ebigambo kakumi omu rurimi, nkaayenzire kugamba ebigambo bitaano n'obwengye bwangye, ngu nyegyese abandi.
Omu Biragiro kikahandiikwa ngu: ndyagamba n'eihanga eri omu kanwa k'abantu abarikugamba endimi ezindi n'omu kanwa k'abanyamahanga; kwonka, n'obu Ndigamba ntyo, tibarimpurira, nikwo Mukama arikugira.
N'ahabw'ekyo endimi n'akamanyiso aha batarikwikiriza, ti ha barikwikiriza; kwonka okubuurira n'akamanyiso aha barikwikiriza, ti ha batarikwikiriza.
Ekanisa yoona ku yakauba eteeraine, boona baagamba endimi, ku haakutaahamu abatarikushoborokyerwa nari abatarikwikiriza? tibakaagira ngu mugwire eiraro?
Kwonka boona ku baakuba nibabuurira, kandi omuntu otarikwikiriza nari otarikushoborokyerwa ku yaakutaahamu, akaahanwa boona, kandi acwerwa boona orubanja;
enaama z'omu mutima gwe zishuuruurwa, abona kujuumara ahansi n'okuramya Ruhanga naahamya ati: Buzima kwo Ruhanga ari omuriimwe.

Mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, biri bita? Ku muteerana, buri muntu areeta ekye, omwe areeta zaaburi, ondiijo eky'okwegyesa, ondiijo eki ashuuruuriirwe, ondiijo orurimi, n'ondiijo eky'okushoboorora. Byona bigume bikorwe ahabw'okwombeka abantu.
Ku haraabe haabaireho abarikugamba endimi, hagambe babiri, kutarenga ahari bashatu, kandi bagambe omu mbu; habeho n'ow'okubishoboorora.
Kwonka ku haraabe hatariho ow'okushoboorora, orikugamba orurimi ahuname omu kanisa, abigambe n'omutima gwe, kandi abigambire Ruhanga.
Kandi ababuurizi bagambe babiri nari bashatu, abandi babyetegyereze.
Kwonka ku haraabe hariho oshutami, yaashuuruurirwa ekigambo, owaaba naagamba ahuname.
Ahakuba mwena nimubaasa kubuurira omwe omwe, ngu boona babone kwega, n'okwezirikisana.
Emyoyo ya baanabi etegyekwa baanabi;
ahakuba Ruhanga ti Ruhanga w'okujagarara, kureka n'ow'obusingye.
Kandi baaba nibenda kushoborokyerwa ekigambo, bakibuurize abashaija baabo omuka, ahabw'okuba n'eky'enshoni omukazi kugamba omu kanisa.
Mbwenu, nimugira ngu niimwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyakomookiremu? Nari niimwe mwenka abu kyaiziire?
Kandi weena otarikukiikiriza tarikwikirizibwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo, Beene Tata, mwetengye munonga okubuurira, kandi mutazibira okugamba endimi;
kwonka byona bikorwe gye, bitebeekanisiibwe.
B'eishe-emwe, ningaruka kubamanyisa engiri ei naababuuriire, mukaikiriza, kandi ei muhamiiremu,
niyo erikubajuna, ku muraabe nimugigumya, nk'oku naagibabuuriire, kureka okwikiriza kwanyu kube kwabaire kuri okwa busha.
Nimumanya ngu ekikuru eki naabandize kubaha, eki naahairwe, n'eki ngu, Kristo akafa ahabw'ebibi byaitu, nk'oku Ebyahandiikirwe bigira,
kandi ngu akaziikwa, yaazooka aha izooba rya kashatu, nk'oku Ebyahandiikirwe bigira,
yaayeyoreka Keefa, bwanyima yaayeyoreka eikumi na babiri.
Kandi bwanyima yaayeyorekyera hamwe ab'eishe-emwe okukira ahari magana ataano; abaingi aharibo baikiriho na hati, n'obu abamwe baraabe bagwejegyeire.
Bwanyima yaayeyoreka Yakobo, na bwanyima entumwa zoona.
Aha muheru gwa boona naanye yaanyeyoreka ndi nk'omwana orengize amazaariro.
Ahakuba ndi muto aha ntumwa ezindi, otashemereire kwetwa ntumwa, ahabw'okuba nkahiiga ekanisa ya Ruhanga.

Kwonka ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanda ndi nk'oku ndi; kandi embabazi ze ahariinye tizirabaire za busha, ahakuba nkakora munonga okukira entumwa zoona, kwonka tiinye, kureka embabazi za Ruhanga ezaabaire zimpwera.
Mbwenu yaaba nyowe, nari ezo ntumwa, okwo nikwo tubuurira, kandi nikwo mwaikiriize.
Mbwenu Kristo ku araabe naagambwa ngu akazooka omu bafu, abamwe omuriimwe nibahamya bata ngu tihariho kuzooka kw'abafu?
Ku haraabe hatariho kuzooka kw'abafu, na Kristo tarazookire.
Kandi Kristo ku araabe atarazoirwe, biri okubuurira kwaitu n'okwa busha, n'okwikiriza kwanyu nakwo n'okwa busha.
Nangwa naitwe nituba tuhindukire baakareebi ba Ruhanga ab'ebishuba, ahabw'okuba tukahamya ngu Ruhanga akazoora Kristo, ou atarazoire, ku kiraabe kiri eky'amazima ngu abafu tibazooka.
Ahakuba abafu ku baraabe batazooka, na Kristo tarazoirwe.
Kandi Kristo ku araabe atarazoirwe, okwikiriza kwanyu n'okwa busha; nimuba mukiri omu bibi byanyu.
Kandi n'abo abaagwejegyereire omuri Kristo nibaba bacwekyereire.
Ku turaabe twine amatsiko omuri Kristo omu biro by'amagara aga gonka, nituba turi ab'okusaasirwa okukira abandi boona.
Ahakuba nk'oku okufa kwareetsirwe omuntu, nikwo n'okuzooka kw'abafu kwareetsirwe omuntu.
Nk'oku boona bafa omuri Adamu, nikwo n'omuri Kristo boona barihindurwa abahuriire.
Kwonka buri muntu omu rubu rwe, Kristo niwe muganuro; bwanyima hakurateho abe ku ariija.
Ku ariheza kukwatsa Ruhanga Isheboona obukama, yaaheza kumaraho obutegyeki bwona n'obushoboorozi bwona n'amaani goona, obwo emperu eryahika.
Ahakuba ashemereire kutegyeka okuhitsya obu arita abazigu be boona ahansi y'ebigyere bye.
Omuzigu orihereeruka kwihwaho ni rufu.

Ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu; Akamuha kutegyeka byona, abitaire ahansi y'ebigyere bye. Kwonka, ku kiraabe nikigira kityo, ngu byona bitairwe omu butegyeki bwe, nikimanywa ngu Ogwo owaamuhaire kutegyeka byona tabirimu.
Kandi ebintu byona ku biriheza kuteebwa omu butegyeki bwe, obwo Omwana nawe aryateebwa omu butegyeki bw'Ogwo owaataire byona ahansi ye, Ruhanga abone kuba byona ahari boona.
Ku kiraabe kitari kityo, ababatizibwa ahabw'abaafiire baryaba bata? Abafiire ku baraabe batazooka buzima, n'enki ekibabatirisa ahabw'abaafiire?
Kandi ahabw'enki tweta omu kabi buri kaanya?
Nindahira nti, buri izooba mba ow'okufa, nimbirahira ahabw'okwehimbisa oku nyine ahabwanyu, B'eishe-emwe, omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
Ku ndaabe naarwaine n'enyamaishwa omuri Efeso omu muringo gw'abantu, nkaagasirwa ki? Abafu ku baraabe batazooka, reka tweriire, twenywere, ahakuba nyencakare turi ab'okufa.
Mutabeihwabeihwa; ekigombe kibi kishiisha emicwe mirungi.
Musinduukye, mube abahikiriire, murekye kushiisha; ahakuba abamwe tibarikumanya Ruhanga. Ebi naabigamba kubakwatsa enshoni.
Shana omwe akaabuuza ati: Abafu bazoorwa bata? Kandi baryazooka na mubiri ki?
Iwe mushema 'we, embibo ei obiba temera kureka yaaheza kufa.
Kandi n'ei obyara tobyara mubiri ogu erigira, kureka enjuma kwonka, yaaba y'engano nari ey'enjuma ezindi.
Kwonka Ruhanga agiha omubiri, nk'oku akunda, kandi buri njuma agiha omubiri ogwayo yonka.
Nimumanya ngu emibiri yoona teshushana; hariho omuringo gumwe ogw'abantu, ogundi gw'enyamaishwa, ogundi gw'enyonyi, n'ogundi ogw'eby'enyanja.
Hariho eby'omu iguru, kandi n'eby'omu nsi; kwonka ekitiinisa ky'eby'omu iguru kiri okwakyo, n'ekitiinisa ky'eby'omu nsi nakyo kiri okwakyo.
Hariho ekitiinisa ky'eizooba, n'eky'okwezi, n'ekindi ky'enyonyoozi; kandi enyonyoozi nazo zikizakizana ekitiinisa.
N'okuzooka kw'abafu nikwo kuri. Omubiri gubibwa guri ogw'okujunda, guzoorwa guri ogw'okutajunda.
Gubibwa gutaine kitiinisa, guzoorwa gwine ekitiinisa. Gubibwa gutaine maani, guzoorwa gwine amaani.
Gubibwa guri omubiri gw'obuntu, guzoorwaguri ogw'omwoyo. Ku haraabe hariho omubiri gw'obuntu, hariho n'ogw'omwoyo.
Kandi kukahandiikwa ngu: Omuntu ow'okubanza, Adamu, akahinduka omuntu oine amagara; Adamu owa bwanyima yaahinduka Omwoyo orikureeta amagara.
Kwonka Ow'omwoyo tiwe yaabandize, kureka ow'omubiri ogw'obuntu, bwanyima haakurataho Ow'omwoyo.
Omuntu ow'okubanza akaruga omu itaka, n'omuntu w'omucuucu; Omuntu owa kabiri akaruga omu iguru.
Nk'ow'omu itaka oku yaabaire ari, nikwo n'ab'omu itaka bari; kandi nk'Ow'omu iguru oku ari, n'ab'omu iguru nikwo bari.
Kandi nk'oku twashushaine n'ow'omu itaka, nikwo turishushana n'Ow'omu iguru.
Mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, eki ndikugamba nikyo eki nti: Omubiri n'eshagama tibirikubaasa kuhungura bukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi n'ebijunda tibirihungura butajunda.
omu kaanya kakye, nk'ak'okuhumbya eriisho, aha nzamba ey'aha mperu. Ahakuba enzamba eryagamba, kandi abaafiire baryazoorwa obutagaruka kujunda, naitwe turyahindurwa.
Mumanye ngu omubiri ogu ogujunda gushemereire kujwara okutajunda, kandi omubiri ogu ogufa gushemereire kujwara okutafa.
Ogujunda ogu kandi n'ogufa ogu ku guriba gwajwaire okutafa, obwo ekigambo ekyahandiikirwe kiryahikiirira ekirikugira kiti:
Okufa kumiziirwe okusingura.
Iwe Rufu, oruburi rwawe rurahi?
Kwonka Ruhanga asiimwe, otuha okusingura ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu saabiiti, buri muntu omuriimwe agume abiikye omu ka ye ebi arikubaasa aha bi atungire, ku ndiba naizire, harekye kubaho okuteerana empiiha.
Ku ndihika okwo, abu muriha ebaruha z'okubasiima, nibo ndyohereza kutwara ebiconco byanyu Yerusaalemu.
Kandi naanye ku kiriba kinshemereire kugyenda, turyagyendana.
kandi shana ndyaguma naimwe, obundi nkaamarirayo n'ebiro by'embeho, mubone kunshendekyereza ahi ndiza hoona.
Ahakuba tindikwenda kubarabyaho amaguru hati; ahabw'okuba nyine amatsiko g'okumara naimwe ebiro, Mukama ku arikunda.
Kwonka ndyaguma omuri Efeso okuhitysa aha kiro kya Pentekoote;
ahakuba nyiguriirwe orwigi ruhango kuza omu mirimo ey'omugasho; kwonka abarikundwanisa ni baingi.
n'ahabw'ekyo hatarigira owaamugaya; mumushendekyereze n'obusingye, abone kugaruka ahi ndi; ahabw'okuba mmutegyereize kwija hamwe n'ab'eishe-emwe.
Byona ebi murikukora, mubikorese rukundo.
Nimbeehanangiriza kworobera abari nk'abo, n'ondiijo weena orikukwatanisa n'abandi omu mirimo n'obweziriki.
Kandi nyine okushemererwa ahabw'okwija kwa Stefana na Forutunaato na Akaiko; ahabw'okuba bammazire orushusho oru naabaire mbainiire;
ahakuba bakaruhuura omwoyo gwangye n'ogwanyu. N'ahabw'ekyo abari nk'abo mubamanye.
Amakanisa g'omuri Asia gaabaramutsya. Akula na Pruskila n'ekanisa eteeranira omu ka yaabo baabaramutsya munonga omuri Mukama.
Ab'eishe-emwe boona baabaramutsya. Muramukanise okunywegyerana okurikwera.
Ku haraabe hariho omuntu otarikukunda Mukama, akyeenwe. Mukama waitu naija.
Embabazi zigume naimwe.
Okukunda kwangye kugume naimwe mwena omuri Kristo Yesu. Amiina.
Paulo, entumwa ya Kristo Yesu nk'oku Ruhanga yaakunzire, na Timoseo ow'eishe-emwe, twabahandiikira imwe abari omu kanisa ya Ruhanga ey'omuri Korinso, hamwe n'abarikwera boona abari omuri Akaya yoona;
nitubendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe, na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ruhanga asiimwe, Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, Tataitwe ow'okusaasira, kandi Ruhanga ow'okuhuumuza kwona,
otuhuumuza omu busaasi bwaitu bwona, ngu naitwe tubone kubaasa kuhuumuza abo abari omu busaasi bwona, nitubahuumuza n'obuhuumure obu tuhuumuzibwa Ruhanga.
Ahakuba, nk'okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo oku kwakanyire munonga omuriitwe, nikwo n'obuhuumure bwaitu omuri Kristo bwakanyire butyo.
Ku tureeba enaku, tuzireeba ngu imwe muhuumuzibwe, kandi mujunwe; ku tuhuumuzibwa, tuhuumura ngu mugire obuhuumure oburikureetwa okugumisiriza okubonabonesibwa, nkaitwe oku tubonabonesibwa.
Kandi tubainemu amatsiko tutarikubanganisa; ahakuba nitumanya ngu, nk'oku mukwatanisa naitwe omu kubonabonesibwa, nikwo mukwatanisa naitwe n'omu buhuumure.
twateekateeka omu mitima yaitu ku tucwereirwe orubanja rw'okufa, ngu turekye kwesiga amaani gaitu twenka, kureka twesigye Ruhanga ozoora abafu.
Niwe yaatujunire omu kufa kwingi kutyo, kandi aryatujuna; niwe twinemu amatsiko ngu aryaguma naatujuna.
Naimwe mushemereire kukwatanisa kutuhwera omu kushaba kwanyu; ngu omugisha ogu twahairwe ahabw'okushaba kwa baingi, baingi bagusiimire Ruhanga ahabwaitu.
Titurikubahandiikira bindi kureka ebyo ebi murikushoma, mukashoborokyerwa; kandi nyine amatisko ngu nimwija kubishoborokyerwa byona,
nk'oku mushoborokyeirwe ekicweka, ngu aha kiro kya Mukama waitu Yesu muryayehimbisa ahabwaitu, nk'oku naitwe turyehimbisa ahabwanyu.
Omu matsiko ago nkaba niinyenda kuba niimwe naabanza kutaayaayira, ngu muheebwe omugisha kabiri,
ndabe owaanyu ninza Makedonia, kandi omu kurugayo ngarukye ndabe owaanyu, mubone kunshendekyereza ninza Buyudaaya.
Ku naateekateekire kukora ntyo, nkaba nk'orikugambira habiri? Nari ebi nteekateeka kukora, mbiteekateeka omu bwengye bw'abantu, ngu mbe orikwikiririza eryo, nti, Eego, Eego, nari Ngaaha, Ngaaha?
Nk'oku Ruhanga ari omwesigwa, ekigambo eki tubagambira tikiri Eego, kandi na Ngaaha;
