ahakuba Omwana wa Ruhanga Yesu Kristo, ou twabarangiire, nyowe na Siluwaano na Timoseo, akaba atari Eego kandi na Ngaaha, kureka omuriwe obutoosha ni Eego.
Ahakuba byona ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise biba Eego omuriwe; kandi nikyo tugirira omuriwe tuti, Amiina, ngu Ruhanga ahimbisibwe omuriitwe.
Kwonka Ruhanga niwe atuhamya naimwe omuri Kristo, kandi akatushukaho amajuta;
niwe yaatutaireho akamanyiso, akatuha omukwato gw'Omwoyo Orikwera omu mitima yaitu.
Kwonka Ruhanga niwe kareebi wangye, orikumanya omutima gwangye, ngu ekyanzibiire kwija Korinso n'ahabw'okubasaasira;
ti habw'okubategyeka omu kwikiriza kwanyu, kureka nitukorera ahamwe naimwe ahabw'okubareetera okushemererwa; ahabw'okuba mwemereziibwe okwikiriza.
Mbwenu, ku ndaabagwise kubi, n'oha orangwise gye? T'ogwo ou ngwisize kubi?
Ekyo nkakihandiika ngu, ku ndiba naizire, ndekye kugwisibwa kubi abaakunshemeize, ahakuba nimbeesiga mwena ngu okushemererwa kwangye kukaabaire okwanyu mwena.
Mumanye ngu nkabahandiikira nyine enaku n'obusaasi bwingi omu mutima, kandi n'amarira maingi, ti habw'okwenda ngu muguubwe kubi, kureka okubamanyisa okukunda kwingi oku ndikubakunda.
Ku haraabe hariho owaareetsire okushaasha, tiinye yaasaasize, kureka haihi mwena, ntakaarengyesereza nti, akasaasa mwena.
Ekiheneso omushaija ogwo eki yaahairwe abarikukira obwingi nikimara;
nikyo kibashemerereire kumusaasira n'okumuhuumuza, ngu shana atakaarengwa obusaasi.
N'ahabw'ekyo nimbeeshengyereza ngu mugarukye muhamye ku murikumukunda.
Ekindi ekindeeteire kuhandiika n'okubagyeza, ngu mmanye ku muraabe nimworoba omuri byona.
Omuntu weena ou musaasira, naanye mmusaasira; naanye eki naasaasiire, ku kiraabe kiriho, nkakimusaasira ahabwanyu omu maisho ga Kristo,
Sitaane arekye kutugobeza, ahabw'okuba tituri batarikumanya bwengye bwe obu arikutucwera.
kwonka tindagizire kuhuumura omu mutima gwangye ahabw'okutashangayo ow'eishe-emwe Tito. Nikwo kubaraga, nkagumizamu kutaaha Makedonia.
Ruhanga asiimwe, otutabaarura obutoosha, turi abasinguzi omuri Kristo, kandi otuha okubuzya hoona eby'okumumanya, ngu bibe nk'okutaamirana kw'omugaju.
Ahakuba itwe turi omugaju gwa Kristo ahari Ruhanga omu bantu abarikujunwa n'omu barikuhwerekyerera;
aha barikuhwerekyerera, turi omugaju gw'okufa ogureeta okufa, kwonka aha barikujunwa turi omugaju ogw'amagara ogureeta amagara. Mbwenu ebyo n'oha orikubibaasa?
Ahakuba tituri nk'abandi baingi abashuubuza Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kukiihamu enshaagi; kureka itwe turi ab'amazima, tutumwa Ruhanga, kandi tugambira omuri Kristo omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Imwe mwenka niimwe baruha y'okutusiimisa, ehandiikirwe omu mitima yaanyu, erikumanywa kandi ekashomwa abantu boona;
kandi nimureebeka muri ebaruha ya Kristo ei yaatuhandiikiise, etahandiikirwe na bwino, kureka n'Omwoyo wa Ruhanga ohuriire, hatari ha bishate by'amabaare, kureka aha mbari z'emitima y'abantu.
Obu nibwo bwesigye obu twesiga Ruhanga ahabwa Kristo;
ahakuba itwe titwine ki turikwebaasiza twenka, kuteekateeka ekintu kyona ngu niitwe kirugireho; kureka okubaasa kwaitu kuruga ahari Ruhanga,
niwe yaatubaasiise kuba abaheereza b'endagaano nsya, etari y'ebihandiiko, kureka ey'Omwoyo; ahakuba ey'ebihandiiko eita, kwonka Omwoyo areeta amagara.
nimugira ngu obuheereza obw'Omwoyo tiburiija n'ekitiinisa ekirikukiraho?
N'ahabw'ekyo obuheereza oburikusingisa orubanja ku buraabe bwagizire ekitiinisa, obuheereza oburikuhaisa okuhikiirira buryagira ekitiinisa ekirikukiraho.
Mbwenu obuheereza, obwabaire bwine ekitiinisa, tibukikiine, ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kyabwo kikamarwaho eky'obwo oburikubukira.
Oburikuhwaho ku buraabe bwagizire ekitiinisa, obutahwaho buryagira ekitiinisa ekirikukiraho.
Nk'oku twine amatsiko agarikwingana gatyo, nitugamba n'obumanzi bwingi;
ti nka Musa oku yaataire eky'okwetwekyerera ahamaisho ge, ngu Abaisraeli batareeba omuheru gw'ekitiinisa ekyabaire nikihwaho.

Kwonka emitima yaabo ekagangaazibwa; ahakuba n'okuhitsya eri izooba ku bashoma endagaano eya ira, hoona eky'okwetwekyerera ekyo kigumaho kitashuurwirwe; ahabw'okuba omuri Kristo wenka nimwo kiihirwaho;
ahakuba obutoosha ku bashoma ebya Musa, eky'okwetwekyerera ekyo kiguma aha mitima yaabo n'okuhitsya hati.
Kwonka omuntu ku ahindukira Mukama, eky'okwetwekyerera ekyo kiihwaho.
Mbwenu Mukama waitu niwe Mwoyo; kandi ahu Omwoyo wa Mukama ari, niho obusingye buri.

Itwe twena ku turaabe nitworeka ekitiinisa kya Mukama ahamaisho gaitu, twaba nk'endeeberwamu, obwo ahamaisho gaitu hatatwekyereire, tuguma nituhindurwa okushushana nawe, nituruga omu kitiinisa kuza omu kitiinisa ekindi ekirikukiraho; ebyo nibirunga ahari Mukama niwe Mwoyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo, nk'oku tuhairwe obuheereza obu ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga, titurikuhwa matsiko.

Tukanga eby'enshoni ebirikukorerwa omu mwirima, titurikugyendera omu bugobya, n'obu kwakuba okuhindura okundi ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kureka tworeka amazima, ngu omuntu weena atusiimise omutima omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Kwonka engiri ei tugamba ku eraabe etwekyereirwe, etwekyereirwe aha barikuhwerekyerera;
nibo batarikwikiriza, abu ruhanga ow'ensi egi yaahumize emitima, ngu omushana gw'engiri y'ekitiinisa kya Kristo, niwe kishushani kya Ruhanga, gutabaakira.
Mumanye ngu titurikwegambaho nk'abakama, kureka nitugamba Yesu Kristo ku niwe Mukama, kandi itwe turi abahuuku baanyu ahabwa Yesu.
Ahakuba Ruhanga, owaaragiire ati: Omushana gujwe omu mwirima, Ogwo niwe yaajwire omu mitima yaitu kutuha okuhsoborokyerwa ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga ekirikureeberwa omuri Yesu Kristo.
Tukubirwe embaju zoona, kwonka titufunziibwe; nitushoberwa, kwonka titurikuhwa matsiko;
nituhiigwa, kwonka titurikutsigwaho; twikarirwa, kwonka titugwaho;
obutoosha tugyenda twine okufa kwa Yesu omu mibiri yaitu, ngu amagara ge gareebekyere omu mibiri yaitu.
Ahakuba itwe abahuriire tuheebwayo obutoosha okufa ahabwa Yesu, ngu amagara ga Yesu goorekwe omu mibiri yaitu erikufa.
N'ahabw'ekyo okufa kukorera omuriitwe, kwonka amagara gakorera omuriimwe.
ahakuba nitumanya ngu Owaazoire Mukama waitu Yesu aryatuzoora hamwe nawe, atuhitsye omu maisho ge hamwe naimwe.
Ahakuba byona biri ahabwanyu, ngu, nk'oku embabazi zibugire omu bantu abarikweyongyera kuba baingi, zibe nikwo zaakanyisa okusiima, Ruhanga abone kuhimbisibwa.
Mumanye ngu obusaasi bwaitu bukye, obw'omwanya mukye ogu, bweyongyera obutoohsa kututeekateekyera ekitiinisa kingi munonga ekitahwaho,
itwe ku tuba tutahangire maisho ebirikureebwa, kureka ebitarikureebwa; ahakuba ebirikureebwa n'eby'okuhwaho juba, kwonka ebitarikureebwa n'eby'ebiro byona.
N'ekya buzima omuri egi nitutsinda, nitwetenga kujwara eyaitu ey'omu iguru,
ku turiba nitugijwekwa, turekye kushangwa tujwaire busha.
Ahakuba itwe abakiri omu nju egi ey'orusiisira nitutsinda turemeirwe, ti habw'okwenda kujuurwa, kureka okwongyera kujwekwa, ngu eky'okufa kimirwe amagara.
Kandi owaatuteekateekyeire ekyo ni Ruhanga, kandi niwe yaatuhaire omukwato gw'Omwoyo.
Ekyo nikyo kitugumya omutima obutoosha; nitumanya ngu ku tuba tukiri owaitu omu mubiri, tuba turi hare na Mukama waitu;
(ahakuba tugyenda ahabw'okwikiriza, ti habw'okureeba.)
Tuguma omutima; kwonka eki turikukira kukunda n'eki, okutaana n'omubiri, tukataaha omuka owa Mukama waitu.
Nikyo twezirikira kumushemeza, yaaba turi owaitu omuka, yaaba tutariyo.
Mumanye ngu twena tushemereire kwemerera omu maisho g'ekitebe kya Kristo eky'okucweraho emanja, ngu omuntu weena abone kuheebwa ekishemereire ebi yaakozire omu mubiri, yaaba kirungi nari kibi.
Ahabw'okumanya ku Mukama aba ow'okutiinwa, twikiririsa abantu; kwonka Ruhanga niwe amanya oku turi; kandi nyine amatsiko ngu naimwe nimumanya oku turi omu mitima yaanyu.
Titurikugaruka kwehimbisa ahariimwe, kureka nitubaha oburyo bw'okwehimbisa ahabwaitu, ngu mubaase kugarukamu abarikwehimbisiza aha birikureebwa kwonka, bitari by'omu mutima.
Ku turaabe tugwire eiraro, turigwire ahabwa Ruhanga; ku turaabe tuhuriire, tuhuriire ahabwanyu.
Ahakuba okukunda kwa Kristo nikwo kutugyema, nitumanyira kimwe ngu Omwe akafeera boona; nahabw'ekyo boona bakafa.
Kandi eki yaafeereire ahabwa boona n'eki; akafa ngu abariho barekye kuguma bariho ahabwabo bonka, kureka ahabw'Ogwo owaabafeereire akabazookyera.
Mbwenu okuruga hati titukimanya muntu weena omu buzaare bw'omubiri. N'obu turaabe twamanyire Kristo, nk'oku abantu baamumanyire, mbwenu titukimumanya tutyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena, ku aba ari omuri Kristo, aba ari ekihangirwe kisya; ebya kare biba bihweire, reeba byona biba bihindukire bisya.
Kwonka byona biruga ahari Ruhanga, owaatwegaruririire omuri Kristo, akatuha omurimo gw'okugarukanisa abantu na Ruhanga;
ekirikushoboororwa ngu Ruhanga akaba ari omuri Kristo naayegarurira abari omu nsi, atakibabarira by'okushiisha byabo, kandi naitwe yaatukwatsa ekigambo ky'okugarukanisa okwo.
Mbwenu turi entumwa omu mwanya gwa Kristo, Ruhanga naashusha nk'orikweshengyereza abantu omuriitwe. Naitwe nitubeeshengyereza omu iziina rya Kristo, mugarukane na Ruhanga;
ahakuba Ogwo otaramanyire kibi Ruhanga akamuhindura ekibi ahabwaitu, ngu omuriwe tuhindukye okuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga.
Naitwe, nk'oku turi abarikukora nawe, nitubeeshengyereza, murekye kufiisa busha embabazi za Ruhanga;
ahakuba We agira ati:
Omu bunaku bw'okwikiririzibwamu nkakuhurira;
Kandi aha izooba ry'okujunirwaho naakuhwera.
Reeba, hati nibwo bunaku bw'okwikiririzibwamu buzima;
Reeba, hati niryo izooba ry'okujunirwaho.
Nikyo twerindira kutateeza omuntu weena ntsibo, ngu obuheereza bwaitu burekye kugaywa,
kureka omuri byona nitweyoreka nk'abashemereire kuba abaheereza ba Ruhanga, nitugumisiriza munonga omu kubonabona, omu bworo, omu busaasi,
omu kuteerwa enkoba, omu kuteebwa omu bihome, omu kujagarara, omu kufa kubi, omu kuraara aha kiro, n'omu kwesiibyakwo;
nitumuheereza omu kwera, omu bwengye, omu kugumisiriza, omu mbabazi, omu Mwoyo Orikwera, omu kukunda okutarimu buryarya,
omu kigambo ky'amazima, n'omu maani ga Ruhanga; tukwaitse eby'okurwanisa by'okuhikiirira omu mukono gwa buryo n'ogwa bumohso;
omu kitiinisa n'omu kugaywa, omu kagambwaho kubi n'omu kugambwaho gye; nituteekyerezibwaho nk'abanyabishuba, kunu turi ab'amazima;
nk'abatarikumanywa, haza nitumanywa; nk'abarikufa, haza turi abahuriire; nka'abarikubonabonesibwa, kwonka tutaitsirwe;
nk'abaine obusaasi, kwonka nitushemererwa obutoosha; nk'abooro, haza nitutungisa baingi; nk'abataine kantu, haza twine byona.
Timufunzire muriitwe, kureka mufunzire omu mitima yaanyu.
Nimbagambira nk'abaana bangye, naimwe mushashaanukye, mukore nk'oku mwagiriirwe.
Nari Kristo naakwatanisa ata na Beliali? Orikwikiriza aine mugabo ki n'otarikwikiriza?
Hekalu ya Ruhanga neikirizana eta n'ebishushani ebiramibwa? Ahakuba itwe turi hekalu ya Ruhanga ohuriire, nk'oku yaagizire ati:
Ndyabatuuramu, mbagyendagyendemu;
Ndyaba Ruhanga waabo,
Nabo babe abantu bangye.
Mubeetaaniseho; nikwo Mukama arikugira;
Mutarikora aha kintu kyona ekitashemeire;
Obwo naanye ndyabaakiira,
Naimwe mube batabani bangye na bahara bangye,
Nikwo Mukama ow'obushoboorozi bwona arikugira.
Nk'oku twine ebyaraganisiibwe ebyo, abarikukundwa, tweyozyeho oburofa bwona obw'aha mubiri n'obw'omu mwoyo, nituhikiiriza okwera omu kutiina Ruhanga.
Tindikugamba ekyo kubacwera orubanja; ahakuba nkabagambira kare, ku muri omu mitima yaitu okufa hamwe naitwe, kandi n'okuguma naitwe turi abahuriire.
Nimbeesiga buzima; niinyehimbisa munonga ahabwanyu; nyijwire obuhuumure; nangwa n'omu busaasi bwaitu bwona nyine okushemererwa okushaagire.
N'obu twahikire Makedonia, emibiri yaitu teraboine kuhuumura na kakye, kureka tukagira obusaasi embaju zoona; aheeru hakaba hariyo engamba, omunda harimu obwoba.
Kwonka Ruhanga, ohuumuza enshoberwa, akatuhuumuza ahabw'okwija kwa Tito;

kandi ti kwija kwe kwonka, kureka n'okuhuumuzibwa oku yaahuumuziibwe omuriimwe, ku yaatuteekyerereize orushusho rwanyu oru munyiniire, n'okurira kwanyu n'obweziriki bwanyu ahabwangye; nikyo kyandeeteire kweyongyera kushemererwa.

N'obu ndaabe naabareeteire obusaasi ahabw'ebaruha ei naabahandiikiire, tindikwefuuza, (n'obu ndaabe naabandize kwefuuza); ekyanyefuuriise n'okureeba ngu ebaruha egyo ekabasaasa, n'obu muraabe mwasaasire omwanya mukye.
Kwonka hati ninshemererwa, ti habw'okushaasha kwanyu, kureka ahabw'okushaasha oku mwagizire kukabareetera okweteisa; ahakuba mukashaasha omu buryo bwa Ruhanga, ngu mutagira eki mwafeerwa ahabwaitu.
Mumanye ngu okwefuuza okurimu okutiina Ruhanga kureeta okweteisa okutarikwefuuzibwa, okurikuhitsya aha kujunwa; kwonka okwefuuza okw'ensi kureeta okufa.

Mbwenu mureebe okwefuuza oku okw'omu buryo bwa Ruhanga oku kwabareeteire okutaho munonga omutima, kukabareetera okwetonganira, n'okutamwa, n'obwoba, n'okwetenga, n'obweziriki, n'okuhana abarikushobya! Omuri byona mukeeyoreka ku mutaine rubanja omu kigambo ekyo.
N'obu naabahandiikiire, tindabahandiikiire ahabw'ogwo owaasiisire, nari shi ahabw'ogwo owaasiisirwe, kureka ngu mushuuruurirwe obweziriki bwanyu oku buri ahabwaitu omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo tukahuumuzibwa; kandi omu buhuumure obwo twayeyongyera kushemererwa munonga ahabw'okushemererwa kwa Tito, ahakuba mwena mukaruhuura omwoyo gwe.

Ku ndaabe naamugambiire ekigambo kyona eky'okwehimbisa ahabwanyu, tindakwatsirwe nshoni; kwonka nk'oku twabagambiire byona omu mazima, nikwo n'okwehimbisa kwaitu ahari Tito kwashangirwe kuri okw'amazima.
Ku aijuka oku mwamworobeire mwena, mukamwakiira mwine obwoba n'okutetema, omutima gwe gweyongyera kubakunda.
Naanye ninshemererwa, ahabw'okuba omuri byona ngumire omutima ahabwanyu.
Ku baabaire nibakigyezibwa okubonabonesibwa kwingi, okushemererwa kwabo okuhinguraine, n'obworo bwabo bwingi, bikakanya, byabareetera okugaba bingi munonga nk'abatungi.
Ahakuba nimpamya ngu, bakagaba beekundiire nk'oku baabaasize, nangwa n'okukiraho,
nibatushaba n'okweshengyereza kwingi okwikirizibwa kukwatanisa n'abarikuhwera abarikwera.
Kandi tibarakozire nk'oku twabaire nituteekateeka, kureka bakabanza kwehayo ahari Mukama n'ahariitwe, nk'oku Ruhanga yaakunzire.
Nikyo twayehanangiririize Tito ngu, nk'oku yaatandikire ira, abe nikwo yaahikiiriza omuriimwe omurimo ogu ogw'embabazi.
Kwonka, nk'oku murikuhingurana omuri byona, omu kwikiriza, omu kugamba, omu bwengye, omu bweziriki bwona, n'omu kukunda oku murikutukunda, mube nikwo mwahingurana n'omu murimo ogu ogw'embabazi.
Ekyo tindikukigamba nk'orikuragiira, kureka niinyenda kuhamya okukunda kwanyu ku kuraabe kuri okw'amazima, niinyihirira aha bweziriki bw'abandi.
Ahakuba nimumanya embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo; n'obu yaabaire ari omutungi, kwonka akahinduka omworo ahabwanyu, ngu obworo bwe bubatungise.
Omuri eki nimbagambira eki ndikuteekateeka; imwe abaabandiize abandi kutandika, hahingwire omwaka, kibashemereire kukora; kandi ti kukora kwonka, kureka okukora n'okukunda.
Kwonka hati mbwenu mwongyereho kuhikiiriza okukora okwo; nk'oku mwayeteekateekire kukikunda, mube nikwo mwakihikiiriza n'ebi mwine.
Ahakuba ahu okukunda kuri, nikwikirizibwa nk'oku omuntu aine, ti nk'oku ataine.
Tindikugamba ntyo kwanguhiza abandi, ngu imwe muremeerwe;
kureka ngu mwingaingane; ebi mushaagize omu biro ebi bimare obworo bwabo, kandi nabo ebi barishaazya biije bimare obworo bwanyu, mubone kwingaingana;
nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Owaashangurwize bingi, taine ki yaashaagizeho; n'owaashangurwize bikye, taine ki yaakyenire.
Kwonka Ruhanga asiimwe, owaataire omu mutima gwa Tito obweziriki nk'obu nyine ahabwanyu.
Ahakuba taraikiriize kwija ahabw'okushaba kwaitu kwonka, kureka ahabw'obweziriki obu aine ahabwe naija kwija owaanyu ahabw'okwekundira.
Kandi nitwija kumutuma hamwe n'ow'eishe-emw, orikusiimwa omu makanisa goona ahabw'okubuurira engiri kwe.
T'ekyo kyonka; kandi hoona akatooranwa amakanisa kugyenda naitwe omu murimo ogu ogw'embabazi, itwe ogu turikukora kuhaisa Mukama ekitiinisa, kandi n'okworeka okukunda kwaitu.
Nitwerinda ngu hatagira owaatubeiherera ahabw'ekiconco eki ekihango, eki turikuheereza;
ahakuba eki turikugyenderera n'okukora ebirikusiimwa, ti mu maisho ga Mukama kwonka, kureka n'omu maisho g'abantu.
Kandi hamwe nabo nitutuma ow'eishe-emwe ondiijo ou tugyerize kaingi, tukashanga ari omweziriki omuri bingi, kandi hati n'omweziriki okukira oku yaabaire ari, ahabw'okuba naabeesiga munonga.
Ebya Tito mumanye ngu ni mugyenzi wangye ou turikukora hamwe, kandi ou tukwataniise kubaheereza; kandi eby'ab'eishe-emwe abo n'entumwa z'amakanisa ezihimbisisa Kristo.
N'ahabw'ekyo muboorekye ebirikuhamya okukunda kwanyu, kandi n'okwehimbisa kwaitu ahabwanyu omu maisho g'amakanisa.
Aha by'okuhwera abarikwera tindikureeba ki ndikubahandiikirira;
ahakuba nimmanya okukunda kwanyu, oku ndikweraata ahabwanyu omu Bamakedonia, ningira nti: Abaakaya bamazire omwaka beeteekateekire; kandi obweziriki bwanyu bwezirikiise baingi munonga aharibo.
Kwonka nintuma ab'eishe-emwe abo ngu okwehimbisa kwaitu ahabwanyu omu kigambo ekyo kutaba kwa busha, kureka babashangye mweteekateekire, nk'oku naagambire;
ahakuba tindikwenda itwe, (tutagizire imwe) kukwatwa nshoni z'ebyo ebi tubainemu matsiko, Abamakedonia bamwe batakaija naanye, bakashanga muteeteekateekire.

Nikyo naateekateekyeire ngu kishemereire kweshengyereza ab'eishe-emwe abo kumbandiza okwo, ngu bateekateekye kare ekiconco kyanyu eki mwaraganiise, ira, ngu kishangwe kyatebeekanisiibwe, kiri eky'embabazi, kitari ky'okugyemwa.
Omuntu weena akore, nk'oku amaririire omu mutima gwe, atarikunyomwa nari kugyemwa; ahakuba Ruhanga akunda efura.
Ruhanga naabaasa kubakanyisiza emigisha yoona, ngu imwe, ku muraatungye obutoosha ebirikubamara, mubone kugira bingi eby'okuhwera omurimo gwona omurungi.
Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu:
Akateera hoona embibo, yaagabira abooro;
Okuhikiirira kwe nikugumaho ebiro byona.
Naimwe omuri byona muryatungisibwa munonga, mubone kugira obufura oburisiimisa Ruhanga ahabwaitu;
ahakuba okuheereza eby'okuhwera ebyo tikurikumara bworo bw'abarikwera kwonka, beitu kandi nikureetera baingi okukiraho kusiima Ruhanga;

ahabw'okuba omu kugyezibwa okw'okuheereza oku, Ruhanga naija kuhimbisibwa ahabw'okworoba kwanyu oku mwayorobeire engiri ya Kristo, kandi n'obufura bwanyu omu bintu ebi mwahaire ahabw'abo n'ahabw'abandi boona;
kandi baryabagirira orushusho, nibabashabira ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga ezihinguraine omuriimwe.
Ruhanga asiimwe ahabw'ekiconco kye ekitarikubaasa kushoboororwa.
Nimbeeshengyereza nti: Ku ndiija owaanyu, ndekye kugyemwa kukoresa obumanzi, nk'oku nshemereire kubukoresa aha bantu bamwe abarikututeekateekaho ngu tutwaza nk'abantu nyabuntu.
Ahakuba n'obu turaabe nitugyenda, turi abantu abaine omubiri, kwonka titurikurwana nitutwaza nk'abanyamubiri;
mumanye ngu eby'okurwanisa by'orugamba rwaitu ti by'abantu, kureka n'eby'amaani ga Ruhanga okusheenya ebigo,
nitumaraho tutyo empaka n'ekintu kyona ekirikwetunguura kurwanisa okumanya Ruhanga, kandi nitugomoora ekiteekateeko kyona, ngu kyorobere Kristo;
kandi nikwo tweteekateekire kuhana okutahurira kwona, okworoba kwanyu ku kuraabe kuhikire.
Mureebe ebiri omu maisho gaanyu. Omuntu weena ku araabe naayesiga ngu n'owa Kristo, aijukye ngu, nk'oku we ari owa Kristo, naitwe nikwo turi.
N'obu naakurenzya aha kwehimbisa ahabw'obushoboorozi obu Mukama yampaire kubombeka, kutari kubasheenya, tinkaakwatwa nshoni.
Nyowe tinkwenzire kushusha nk'orikubatiinisa n'ebaruha zangye.
Ahakuba nibagira bati: Ebaruha ze zigumire kandi n'ez'amaani; kwonka ku aba ariho, areebeka ari omweremwa, n'ebigambo bye biri ebirikugaywa.
Abarikugamba batyo bamanye ngu, eki tuhandiika omu baruha tutariho, hoona nikyo tukora twaba turiho.
Itwe titurikwehanga kwebarira omu bantu bamwe abarikwehimbisa, nari okweringaaniza nabo; bo ku beegyera aha rugyero rwabo bonka, kandi bayegyeranisa bonka, baba bataine ki barikumanya.
Titurikukununkirira okurenga orugyero orwo, nk'abatarabahikire; ahakuba niitwe twabandize kuhika ahariimwe, tubareeteire engiri ya Kristo.
Titurikwehimbisiza ha mirimo y'abandi okukira oku turi; kureka twine amatsiko ngu, okwikiriza kwanyu ku kuryeyongyera, itwe turyahimbisibwa omuriimwe aha rugyero oru twagyereirwe, ngu tweyongyere,
tubone kubuurira engiri omu mahanga agari seeri y'owaanyu, tutarikwenda kwehimbisa ahabw'ebi twashangire bitebeekanisiibwe omu myanya ehairwe ondiijo.
Mbwenu orikwehimbisa ayehimbisize omuri Mukama;
ahakuba orikwehimbisa ti we aikirizibwa, kureka orikusiimwa Mukama.
Nkaayenzire ngu mungumisiririze kakye omu bushema bwangye; na mbwenu mungumisiririze!
Ahakuba nimbagirira eihato rya Ruhanga, ahabw'okuba nkabahingira Kristo, ngu mbareete omu maisho ge nk'omwishiki oshugaine oku ahingirwa omushaija omwe.
Kwonka nyine obwoba nti: Nk'oku enjoka yaategire Haawa n'obugobya bwayo, ebiteekateeko byanyu bikaahabisibwa, muruga omu muhanda ogurikurahuka kandi ogurikwera oguri omuri Kristo.

Ahakuba omuntu ku arikwija yaababuurira Yesu ondiijo, ou tutarababuuriire, nari mwayakiira omwoyo ogundi, ogu mutaraakiire, nari mwaikiriza engiri ey'omuringo ogundi, etari i mwaikiriize, mumwikiriza ahonaaho mutarikubanganisa.
Nyowe ningira ngu ezo ntumwa nkuru munonga tiziine ki zirikunkiza na kakye.
N'obu ndaabe ndi omushema omu kugamba, kwonka tindi mushema mu bwengye; ahakuba omuri byona tukabubooreka butunu omu maisho g'abantu boona.
Nkanyaga amakanisa agandi ningatungaho ebihembo, ngu mbone kubaheereza.

Ku naabaire ndi owaanyu nkyenire, tindaruhize muntu weena omuriimwe, ahakuba ab'eishe-emwe abaarugire Makedonia nibo bampaire ebi naabaire nkyenire. N'ahabw'ekyo nkeerinda kutabarusya omu muringo gwona; na mbwenu niinyija kuguma niinyerinda.
Nk'amazima ga Kristo oku gari omuriinye, tihariho muntu w'omu byanga bya Akaya orinzibira kwehimbisa ahabw'ekyo.
Ahabw'enki? N'ahabw'okutabakunda? Ruhanga naabimanya.
Kandi oku nkora, nikwo ndigumizamu ninkora, ngu mbone kwiha orwekwatso ahari abo abarikwenda kuhamya ngu batwaza nkaitwe omu murimo gwabo ogu barikwehimbisizamu.
Mumanye ngu abantu nk'abo n'entumwa z'ebishuba, n'abakozi engobya, abeehindura nk'entumwa za Kristo.
Kwonka ekyo ti ky'okutangaaza; ahakuba na Sitaane ayehindura nka maraika w'omushana.
N'ahabw'ekyo ti ky'okutangaaza abaheereza be kwehindura nk'abaheereza b'okuhikiirira; emperu yaabo eryashemerera ebi baakozire.
Ningaruka kugira nti: Hatagira omuntu omuriimwe orikunteekateekaho ngu ndi omushema; kwonka, ku muraabe nimunteekateekaho mutyo, muunyikirize nk'omushema, mbone kwehimbisaho kakye.
Eki naaza kugamba, tindikukigamba nk'ekigambo kya Mukama, kureka ninkigamba nk'omushema, niinyesiga ngu nyine eki ndikwehimbisiza.
Nk'oku baingi beehimbisa omu by'obuntu nyabuntu, naanye ka nyehimbise.
Ahakuba imwe nk'abanyabwengye mugumisiririza abashema n'okushemererwa!
Mugumisiririza omuntu ku abagira abahuuku, yaabanyaga, yaabakwata n'amaani, yaabeekuzaho, yaabateera empi z'emishaya.
Ebi naabigamba nyine enshoni, ahakuba itwe tukabibaho abeeremwa.
Mumanye ngu ekirikureetera omuntu weena obumanzi bw'okwehimbisa, naanye nikibundeetera, ningamba nk'omushema.
Bo n'Abaheburaayo? Naanye ndi Omuheburaayo. Bo n'Abaisraeli? Naanye ndi Omwisraeli. Bo ni baijukuru ba Abrahamu? Naanye ndi omwijukuru.
Bo n'abaheereza ba Kristo? Ningamba nk'omushazi, nyowe nimbakira; nimbakira omu kukora munonga, omu kubohwa kaingi omu kihome, omu kuteerwa enkoba okutarikubarwa, omu kabi k'okufa emirundi mingi.
Abayudaaya bakanteera kataano enkoba makumi ashatu na mwenda.
Nkateerwa enkoni kashatu; nkateerwa rimwe amabaare. Emeeri ezi naabaire ngyendamu zikacweka kashatu, nindaara omu nyanja, ninsiibamu;
omu ngyendo nyingi nkareeba akabi omu migyera, omu bambuzi, omu b'eihanga ryaitu, omu Banyamahanga, omu rurembo, omu ihamba, omu nyanja, omu b'eishe-emwe ab'ebishuba;
omu kuruha n'omu kufa kubi, omu kuraara aha kiro kaingi, omu njara n'eiriho, omu kubura eby'okurya kaingi, omu mbeho n'okubura eky'okujwara.
Kandi n'obu ndaabe ntagambire bindi, hariho ektuura kindemereire n'okwemereza omutima habw'amakanisa goona.
N'oha obura amaani, naanye ntabure maani? N'oha ogwisibwa, kitangwise kubi?
Ku ndaabe nshemereire kwehimbisa, ka nyehimbise ahabw'eby'obweremwa bwangye.
Ruhanga, Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu, orikusiimwa ebiro byona, naamanya ku ntarikubeiha.
Omuri Damasiko, omutegyeki w'omugabe Areta akarinda orurembo orwo, ngu ankwate;
kwonka banta omu kitukuru, bandengyeza omu dirisa ey'omu rugo rw'amabaare, naamwoga omu mikono.
Kinshemereire kwehimbisa, n'obu kuraabe kutaine mugasho; kwonka niinyija kugamba eby'okworekwa n'ebi Mukama yanshuururiire.

Nimmanya omuntu ow'omuri Kristo, owaakwatsirwe akatwarwa omu iguru rya kashatu, emyaka ikumi n'ena ehingwire; (yaaba yaabaire ari omu mubiri, nari atari mu mubiri, tindikukimanya; nikimanywa Ruhanga.)
Kandi nimmanya ngu omuntu ogwo akakwatwa yaatwarwa omuri
yaahurira ebigambo ebitagambwa, ebi omuntu atashemereire kushohoza.
Ka nyehimbise ahabw'omuntu ogwo; kwonka ahabwangye tindikwija kwehimbisa, kureka ahabw'obweremwa bwangye.
Ku naakwenda kwehimbisa, tinkaaba mushema, ahakuba nkaaba ningamba amazima. Kwonka tinkikora, ngu hatagira omuntu owanteekateekaho okukira ebi arikundeebamu n'ebi arikumpuriraho.
Kandi ngu ndekye kwehimbisa ahabw'okushuuruurirwa kwingi, okukira oku nshemereire, nkacumitwa eihwa omu mubiri, entumwa ya Sitaane ey'okunteera entomi, ngu ndekye kwehimbisa okukira oku nshemereire.
Nkeeshengyereza Mukama kashatu ahabw'ekintu ekyo, ngu kindugyeho.

Yangarukamu ati: Embabazi zangye nizikumara, ahabw'okuba amaani gangye gahikiiririzibwa omu bweremwa. N'ahabw'ekyo niinyija kwehimbisa n'okuhsmererwa kwingi ahabw'obweremwa bwangye, ngu amaani ga Kristo gabone kungumaho.
Mbwenu ahabwa Kristo ninshemererwa ahabw'obweremwa, omu kujumwa, n'omu bworo, omu kuhiigwa, n'omu busaasi; ahakuba ku mba omweremwa, nibwo ngira amaani.
Mbaire omushema, kwonka niimwe mwakingyemire; ahabw'okuba niimwe mwabaire mushemereire kumpimbisa. Mumanye ngu, n'obu ndaabe ntari kintu, ezo ntumwa nkuru munonga tiziine ki zankirize na kakye.
Buzimazima ebirikuhamya entumwa nkabikorera omuriimwe omu kugumisiriza kwingi, ninkora obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'eby'amaani.
Amakanisa agandi gakabakiza ki? kureka nyowe okutabarusya. Munsaasire ekishobyo ekyo!

Mbwenu nyeteekateekire kwija owaanyu omurundi gwa kashatu; kwonka tindibarusya, ahakuba tindikwenda byanyu, kureka niimwe ndikwenda; nimumanya ngu abaana tibo bashemereire kubiikira abazire baabo, kureka abazaire nibo babiikira abaana.
Ahabwangye ndyashemererwa munonga kuhayo ebyangye, kandi n'okwehayo nyeheyo ahabw'amagara gaanyu. Obu mbakunzire munonga, nibwo nkunzirwe kakye.
Imwe nimugira ngu okubarusya tindabaruhize; ngu kwonka nkabaitsa obwengye, naabagobeza.
Beitu shi, omuri abo abu naabatumireho hariho oine eki yaabaanyihiireho?
Nkeeshengyereza Tito kwija owaanyu, naamutuma n'ow'eishe-emwe ogwo. Mbwenu Tito aine eki yaabaihireho? Tituratoire ekirari kimwe?

Okuruga ira n'okuhitsya hati muteekateeka ngu nitwerwanaho ahariimwe? Mumanye ngu ebi tugamba tubigambira omuri Kristo omu maisho ga Ruhanga, kandi byona, abarikukundwa munonga, tubigamba ahabw'okubombeka.

Kwonka eki ndikutiina shana nikwo kwija, nkashanga mutari nk'oku ndikwenda, kandi naimwe mukandeeba ndi oku mutarikwenda; kandi shana mwine entongane, eihari, ekiniga, empaka, okugambuurana, okuhwihwitsa, okwekuza, n'omurabanamu;
kandi ngu, ku ndiija, Ruhanga wangye aryancureeza omu maisho gaanyu, naanye nsaasibwe baingi abaasiisire kare, bateeteise bihagaro n'obushambani n'okurigirana okubi, ebi baakozire.
Obu naabaire ndi owaanyu obwa kabiri, nkabateisa; na mbwenu n'obu ntari okwo, nimbateisa ntakaizire, nti: Abo abaasiisire n'abandi boona, ku ndiba naizire, tindibasaasira;
ahakuba musherura ekirikuhamya ngu Kristo niwe angambisa. We ti mweremwa ahariimwe, kureka n'Ow'amaani omuriimwe,
ahabw'okuba akabambirwa omu bweremwa, kwonka ariho ahuriire ahabw'amaani ga Ruhaga. Naitwe turi abeeremwa omuriwe, kwonka turyaba abahuriire nawe omu bi turibakorera ahabw'amaani ga Ruhanga.
Kwonka nyine amatsiko ngu nimwija kumanya ku tutari batarikwikirizibwa.
Kandi nitushaba Ruhanga ngu murekye kukora ekibi, ti habwe okugira ngu itwe tureebekye nitusiimwa, kureka n'okubendeza ngu mukore ebihikire, n'obu twakureebeka nk'abatarikwikirizibwa.
Mumanye ngu titurikubaasa kurwanisa amazima, kureka okugarwanirira.
Nikitushemeza itwe kuba abeeremwa, imwe mukaba ab'amaani; eki turikubashabira n'eki, ngu mube abarikuhikiiririzibwa kimwe.
Nikyo naahandiikira ebi ntakaizire, ngu ku ndiba naizire, ndekye kutwaza amaani n'obushoboorozi obu naahairwe Mukama obw'okubombeka, butari bw'okubasheenya.
Eky'aha muheru, B'eishe-emwe, mugumeho. Muhikiiririzibwe kimwe, muhuguurane, mugire omutima gumwe, mugume n'obusingye; obwo nibwo Ruhanga ow'okukunda n'obusingye ariguma naimwe.
Muramukanise okunywegyera okurikwera.
Abarikwera boona baabaramutsya.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, n'okukunda kwa Ruhanga, n'okukwatanisa kw'Omwoyo Orikwera bigume naimwe mwena.
nyowe n'ab'eishe-emwe boona abu nyine twabahandiikira imwe ab'amakanisa g'omuri Galatia.
Nimbendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
owaayehaireyo ahabw'ebibi byaitu, ngu atujune omu busingye obubi oburiho, nka Ruhanga waitu kandi Tataitwe oku asiima;
aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Ntangaariire oku murahukire kuruga ahari Ogwo owaabeetsire ahabw'embabazi za Kristo, mukaikiriza engiri etari nka i mwabandize kwikiriza;
ti habw'okugira ngu hariho endiijo ngiri; kureka hariho abantu abarikubarabanisamu, nibenda kuhindura engiri ya Kristo okundi.
Kwonka ku haakugira owaababuurira engiri etari nka i twababuuriire, yaaba itwe n'obu yaakuba maraika orugire omu iguru, akyeenwe.
Nk'oku twagambire ira, na hati nikwo ndikugamba nti: Omuntu weena orikubabuurira endiijo ngiri etari i mwaikiriize, akyeenwe.
Nimugira ngu niinyenda kusiimwa abantu nari okusiimwa Ruhanga? Nari shi, ninteeraho kushemeza abantu? Kuri noogira ngu ninkishemeza abantu, tinkubaire muhuuku wa Kristo.
B'eishe-emwe, nimbamanyisa nti, engiri ei naabuuriire ti y'abantu;
ahakuba tindagihairwe muntu, kandi tindagyegyesiibwe, kureka nkagishuuruurirwa Yesu Kristo.
Nimpamya ngu mukahurira aha by'emitwarize yangye eya ira omu diini ey'Abayudaaya, oku naarengyesereize kuhiiga ekanisa ya Ruhanga, ngu ngiihireho kimwe;
kandi nkahingurana omu diini y'Abayudaaya, n'okukira naakira baingi abu naanyetsire nabo omu ihanga ryangye, nyine obweziriki bwingi munonga bw'okugumya emigyenzo ya baatatenkuru.
Kwonka Ruhanga owaantooraine nkiri omu nda ya maawe, akaanyeta ahabw'embabazi ze,
ku yaasiimire kunshuuruurira Omwana we ngu mmurangye omu Banyamahanga, ahonaaho tindeehanwize ha bantu nyabuntu,
n'obu kwakuba okwinamuka Yerusaalemu kwehanuuza aha ntumwa ezambandiize, kureka nkaza omuri Buharabu; bwanyima naagaruka Damasiko.
Kwonka omu zindi ntumwa tiinyine i naareebire kureka Yakobo murumuna wa Mukama waitu.
Ebyo ebi naabahandiikira, nindahira omu maisho ga Ruhanga, tindikubeiha.
Bwanyima naaza omu mashaza ga Siria na Kilikia.
Kandi omu biro ebyo amakanisa ga Kristo ag'omuri Buyudaaya gakaba gatakandeebire;
kwonka bakaba nibahurira buhurizi abarikugira bati: Omuntu ogwo owaabaire naatuhiiga ira, hati naabuurira eby'ediini ei yaabaire ayenda kuhwerekyereza.
Baahimbisa Ruhanga ahabwangye.

Nainamukayo ahabw'ebi naashuururiirwe; naabashobororera engiri ei mbuurira omu Banyamahanga, kwonka omu mubonano aha baabaire nibasiimwa ahabw'obukuru, ngu ndekye kushusha nk'orikwirukira busha, nari nk'owairukiire busha.
Nangwa na Tito ou twagyendaine, n'obu araabe ari Omugriika, taragyemirwe kusharwa.
Kwonka hakaba hariho ab'eishe-emwe ab'ebishuba, abaataahire omuriitwe bwesherekye kutata obusingye bwaitu obu twine omuri Kristo Yesu, ngu batugarure omu buhuuku.
Abo tituraboorobeire nangwa n'akaingana busha, ngu amazima g'engiri gabone kurindwa ahabwanyu.
Kandi abo abaabaire nibasiimwa ngu ni bakuru oku baabaire bari ira, ebyo timbyetaireho; Ruhanga tashoroora mu bantu ahabw'obuganzi abakuru abo tibaine ki baanyongyeireho,
kureka bakeetegyereza ku naakwatsiibwe engiri kugibuurira Abanyamahanga, nk'oku Petero yaagikwatsiibwe kugibuurira abashazirwe.
(Mumanye ngu Owabaasize Petero kuba entumwa aha bashazirwe, naanye niwe yambaasize kuba entumwa aha Banyamahanga.)

Ku baayetegyereize omugisha ogu naahairwe, Yakobo na Keefa na Yohaana, abaabire nibasiimw kuba enyomyo, baatuha omukono gwa buryo, nyowe na Barunaba, okworeka ku bakwataniise naitwe, ngu itwe tugyenda omu Banyamahanga, nabo omu bashazirwe;
kureka eki baatushabire ni kimwe, n'okwijuka abooro; kandi ekyo naanye nkaba nkyezirikiire kukikora.
Kwonka Keefa ku yaahikire Antiokia, naamuhakanisiza kimwe nitureebana, ahakuba akaba ashobize butunu.
Ahabw'okuba abaatumirwe Yakobo batakaizire, akaba naarya n'Abanyamahanga; kwonka ku baizire, yaayehinya, yaabeecwaho ahabw'okutiina abashazirwe.
Kandi n'Abayudaaya abandi baamutooreza, baakwatanisa nawe omu buryarya, nangwa na Barunaba nawe yaatwarwa obwo buryarya bwabo.

Kwonka ku naareebire bataakuratira mazima g'engiri, naagambira Petero omu maisho ga boona nti: Iwe ku oraabe nootwaza nk'Abanyamahanga, etari mitwarize y'ekiyudaaya, haza ori Omuyudaaya, ahabw'enki noogyema Abanyamahanga kutwaza nk'Abayudaaya?
Itwe n'obu turaabe turi Abayudaaya enzaarwa, tutari basiisi b'Abanyamahanga,

nitumanya ngu omuntu taihwaho rubanja habw'okuhikiiriza Ebiragiro, kureka ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo; kandi naitwe tukaikiriza Kristo Yesu, ngu tubone kwihwaho orubanja ahabw'okwikiriza Kristo, kunu ti habw'okuhikiiriza Ebiragiro; ahabw'okuba tihariho muntu weena oihwaho orubanja ahabw'okuhikiiriza Ebiragiro.
Kwonka, ku turaabe twayenzire kwihwaho orubanja omuri Kristo, kandi tukashangwa turi abasiisi, mbwenu shi nimugira ngu Kristo naakwatsiza ekibi? Rubuuza!
Ahakuba ku ngaruka kwombeka ebi naasheenyire, mba nyeyorekire ku ndi omusiisi.
Ahakuba nyowe ahabw'Ebiragiro nkafa aha Biragiro, ngu mbone kuba ohuriire ahari Ruhanga.
Nkabambwa na Kristo; tinkiri nyowe ori, kureka Kristo niwe ari omuriinye; kandi amagara agu nyine omu mubiri ngaine ahabw'okwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga, owankunzire akeehayo ahabwangye.
Tindikuhindura busha mbabazi za Ruhanga; ahakuba kuri okwihwaho orubanja kuheebwa ahabw'okuhikiiriza Ebiragiro, Kristo akaabaire afeereire busha.
Imwe Bagalatia b'abashema 'mwe, n'oha owaabarogire, imwe abaayorekirwe butunu Yesu Kristo abambirwe?
Reka mbabuuze eki kyonka. Mukaheebwa Omwoyo ahabw'okuhikiiriza Ebiragiro, nari ahabw'okuhurira mukaikiriza?
Nikwo muri abashema mutyo? Mukatandikira omu by'Omwoyo, mbwenu mwahereerukana eby'omubiri?
Obwo busaasi bwingi butyo obu mwagumisiririize, omu mazima bukaba buri obwa busha?
Mbwenu Ogwo obaha Omwoyo, akakora eby'okutangaaza omuriimwe, abikora ahabw'okuba muhitsya Ebiragiro, nari ahabw'okuhurira mukaikiriza?
Nk'oku Abrahamu yaikiriize Ruhanga, okwikiriza okwo kukamubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira;
n'ahabw'ekyo mumanye ngu abaine okwikiriza nibo baana ba Abrahamu.

Ebyahandiikirwe, ahabw'okumanya ira ngu Ruhanga aryaiha aha Banyamahanga orubanja ahabw'okwikiriza, bikarangira Abrahamu enkuru nungi, ebyo bitakabaireho, biti: Omuriiwe amahanga goona nimwo gariheerwa omugisha.
N'ahabw'ekyo abaine okwikiriza baheebwa omugisha na Abrahamu owaikiriize.
Kandi nikimanywa ngu tihariho muntu oihwaho orubanja omu maisho ga Ruhanga ahabw'Ebiragiro, ahakuba kihandiikwa ngu: Ohikiriire aryagira amagara ahabw'okwikiriza;
kwonka Ebiragiro tibyegamira kwikiriza, ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Orikubihitsya biryamuhaisa amagara.
Kristo akatucungura omu mukyeeno gw'Ebiragiro, obu yaakyeenwa ahabwaitu, ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Omuntu weena orikuhanikwa aha muti akyeenwe:
ngu ahabwa Kristo Yesu omugisha ogwahairwe Abrahamu guhikye n'aha Banyamahanga, okwikiriza kubone kutuhaisa Omwoyo owaaraganisiibwe.
B'eishe-emwe, ka ngambe nk'oku abantu bagamba. Endagaano, nangwa n'obu yaakuba ey'omuntu, ku eheza kuhamibwa, tihariho ondiijo ogiita nari ogyongyeraho.
Nimumanya ngu endagaano Ruhanga akaziragaanisa Abrahamu n'omwijukuru. Taragizire ati, abaijukuru nka baingi; kureka akagamba omwe, ati, mwijukuru waawe, niwe Kristo.

Ka mbashobororere eki ndikugamba. Endagaano ei Ruhanga yaaraganiise ira, Ebiragiro ebyahairwe bwanyima hahingwireho emyaka magana ana na makumi ashatu tibirikubaasa kugiita, nari okuhindura busha ekyaraganisiibwe.
Ahakuba obuhunguzi, kuri bwahairwe ahabw'Ebiragiro, bukaabaire butakiri bw'okuraganisibwa; kwonka Ruhanga akabuha Abrahamu naamuraganisa.
Mbwenu shi, Ebiragiro bikabaho ahabw'enki? Bikongyerwaho ahabw'okushiisha, okuhitsya aha kwija kw'Omwijukuru owaaraganisiibwe omu ndagaano; byakwatsibwa baamaraika, ngu babihe omuteerani.
Kandi omuteerani taba w'omwe, kwonka Ruhanga n'omwe.

Mbwenu ku kiraabe kiri kityo, nimugira ngu Ebiragiro nibihakanisa ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise? Rubuuza! Ahakuba kuri haabaireho ekiragiro eky'okuhaisa amagara, okuhikiirira kukaatungirwe ahabw'Ebiragiro.
Kwonka Ebyahandiikirwe bikatwarira hamwe byona kutegyekwa ekibi, ngu abarikwikiriza baheebwe ebyaraganisiibwe ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo.
Kwonka okwikiriza kutakaizire, tukaba turindirwa omu butegyeki bw'Ebiragiro, tutegyereze okwikiriza okwabaire nikwenda kushuuruurwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo Ebiragiro bikatubeera omwegyesa w'okutuhitsya ahari Kristo, ngu tubone kwihwaho orubanja ahabw'okwikiriza.
Kwonka mbwenu, nk'oku okwikiriza kwizire, titwakiri mu butegyeki bw'omurezi;
ahakuba omuri Kristo Yesu mwena muri abaana ba Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza.
Mwena abaabatiziibwe kutaaha omuri Kristo, mukajwara Kristo.
Tihaakiriho Muyudaaya nari Omugriika, n'obu yaakuba omuhuuku nari ow'obusingye, n'obu yaakuba omushaija nari omukazi; ahakuba mwena muri bamwe omuri Kristo Yesu.
Kandi ku muraabe muri baijukuru,kandi aba Kristo, biri muri abahunguzi, nk'oku kyaraganisiibwe.
Kwonka ningira nti: Omuhunguzi, ku aba akiri omwana muto, taine ki akiza omuhuuku, n'obu araabe ari mukama wa byona;
kureka ategyekwa abarezi n'ababiiki okuhitsya aha bunaku obwaragiirwe ishe.
Nikwo naitwe; obu twabaire tukiri abaana bato, tukaba tutegyekwa nk'abahuuku eby'okubandizaho eby'omu nsi egi.
Kwonka obunaku ku bwahikiire kimwe, Ruhanga yaatuma Omwana we, owaazairwe omukazi omu butegyeki bw'Ebiragiro,
ngu acungure abaabaire nibategyekwa Ebiragiro, tuheebwe okuhindurwa abaana.
Kandi imwe, ahabw'okuhinduka abaana, Ruhanga akatuma Omwoyo w'Omwana we omu mitima yaitu, otugambisa ati: Abba, Taata!
Mbwenu tokiri muhuuku, kureka ori omwana; kandi ku oraabe ori omwana, ori omuhunguzi ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga.
Haza omu bunaku obwo, obu mwabaire mutarikumanya Ruhanga, mukaba muri abahuuku b'abo, abatari baaruhanga buzima omu buhangwa bwabo;

kwonka hati nk'oku muherize kumanya Ruhanga, nari okukira We nk'oku abamanyire, mugarukire muta enyima omu migyenzo ei mwabandiizeho, etaine maani n'obu gwakuba omugasho, okwenda ngu egarukye ebategyekye?
Nimugyenza ebiro n'ameezi n'obunaku n'emyaka!
Nintiina nti, shana byona ebi naabakoreire, nkahendekyera busha.
Nimbeeshengyereza, B'eishe-emwe, mube nkaanye, ahakuba naanye mbaire nkaimwe. Timurankozire kubi;
nimumanya ngu endwara y'omu mubiri niyo yandeeteire kubabuurira engiri aha murundi ogw'okubanza;
kandi endwara egyo, n'obu eraabe yaabaruhize, timurangayire, n'obu kwakuba okunnuga; kureka mukaanyakiira nka maraika wa Ruhanga, nari nka Kristo Yesu.
Mbwenu okwesiima kwanyu oku mwabaire mwine, hati kuri nkahi? Ahakuba nimpamya ngu, kuri kyabaire nikibaasika, mukaabaire mwihiremu amaisho gaanyu, mugampa.
Mbwenu mpindukire omuzigu waanyu ahabw'okubagambira amazima?
Abo nibabeekundisa, kwonka ti habw'okubendeza ebirungi; kureka nibenda kubakingirana aheeru, ngu mube nibo mwahakwaho.
Mumanye ngu obutoosha bwona ni kirungi okukundwa, kwonka mukundirwe ebirungi, t'obu ndi naimwe bwonka.
Baana bangye abato, abu ndikugaruka kusaasibwa nk'omukazi orikurumwa, okuhitsya obu Kristo arihangwa omuriimwe!
Nkaayenzire kuguma naimwe, n'okworobya aha migambire yangye; ahakuba ebyanyu binshobeire.
Imwe abarikwenda kutegyekwa Ebiragiro, nimungambire. Timuhurira Ebiragiro?
Nimumanya ku kyahandiikirwe ngu: Abrahamu akaba aine abatabani babiri, omwe akaba ari ow'omuzaana, ondiijo ari ow'omukazi nyeiteeka.
Kandi omwana ow'omuzaana akazaarwa ahabw'okwetenga kw'omubiri, ow'omukazi yaazaarwa ahabw'endagaano.
Ebyo biri nk'enfumu, ahakuba abakazi abo nibamanyisa endagaano ibiri, emwe ekaruga aha rushozi Sinai, eyaazaire abaana ab'obuhuuku, niwe Hagari;
mbwenu Hagari ogwo naashushanisibwa nk'orushozi Sinai orw'omuri Buharabu, orurikugyeranisibwa na Yerusaalemu ekiriho na hati; ahakuba ari omu buhuuku hamwe n'abaana be.
Kwonka Yerusaalemu ey'omu iguru niwe mukazi nyeiteeka, kandi niwe maaweitwe.
Ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu:
Shemererwa, iwe engumba etazaara!
Imutsya eiraka, oteere akaari, iwe otarumwa kuzaara;
Ahakuba abaana b'enyangwakazi nibakira ab'enkundwakazi.
Mbwenu itwe, B'eishe-emwe, turi abaana b'endagaano nka Isaaka.
Kandi nk'owaazairwe ahabw'okwetenga kw'omubiri omu biro ebyo oku yaahiigire owaazairwe ahabw'Omwoyo, nikwo kiri na hati.
Beitu Ebyahandiikirwe bigira bita? Biti: Binga omuzaana n'omwana we; ahakuba omwana w'omuzaana tarihungura n'ow'omukazi nyeiteeka.
Mbwenu, B'eishe-emwe, tituri baana b'omuzaana, kureka ab'omukazi nyeiteeka.
Reeba, nyowe Paulo nimbagambira nti: Ku muraikirize kusharwa, Kristo naaba atakibainiire mugasho.
Ningaruka kuhamiza omuntu weena orisharwa, nti: Aine eibanja ry'okuhitsya ebiragiro byona.
Imwe abarikwenda kwihwaho orubanja ahabw'Ebiragiro, mwecwire ahari Kristo, mwagwa mwaruga omu mbabazi.
Kwonka itwe, ahabw'Omwoyo n'ahabw'okwikiriza kwaitu tutegyereize, kandi twine amatsiko g'okuheebwa okuhikiirira.
Mumanye ngu omuri Kristo Yesu okusharwa tikwine mugasho, n'obu kwakuba okutasharwa; ekiine omugasho buzima n'okwikiriza okurikukoresibwa okukunda.
Ka mwabaire nimugyenda gye; n'oha owaabazibiire kworobera amazima?
Okwohibwa oku tikurarugire ahari Ogwo owaabeetsire.
Ekitumbisa kikye kitumbya ekiihuro kyona.
Nyowe nimbeesiga omuri Mukama ku mutariikiriza bindi ebitari byangye; kwonka ogwo orikubarabanisamu aryagiibwaho orubanja.
Beitu B'eishe-emwe, ku ndaabe ninkibuurira eby'okusharwa, ahabw'enki ninkihiigwa? Obwo enkongi y'omusharaba neeba eihirweho.
Nkaayenzire ngu abo abarikubarabanisamu babarugyemu.
Ahakuba Ebiragiro bihikiirizibwa omu kigambo kimwe eki ngu: Kunda mutaahi waawe, nk'oku oyekunda.
Kwonka ku muraabe nimurumana, mwaryana, mwerinde mutamaranaho.
Kwonka nyowe ningira nti: Mugume mugyendere omu Mwoyo; obwo nibwo mutarihikiiriza eby'okwetenga kw'omubiri;
ahakuba omubiri gurwanisa Omwoyo, kandi n'Omwoyo arwanisa omubiri; ahabw'okuba ebyo byombi birwanisana; n'ahabw'ekyo timurikubaasa kukora ki murikwenda.
Kwonka ku mwebemberwa Omwoyo, muba mutakitegyekwa Biragiro.
Mbwenu emirimo y'obuzaarwa bw'omubiri neemanywa, niyo egi: obushambani, ebirikwitsa enshoni, okurigira okubi,
okuramya ebishushani, okuroga, obuzigu, okurwana, eihari, ekiniga, empaka, okwebaganisamu, okurwanira orubanju,
okwangirana, obusinzi, okuraara enkyera, n'ebindi nk'ebyo. Nimbateisa, nk'oku naabateisize ira, nti: Abarikukora nk'ebyo tibarihungura bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Kwonka ebyana by'Omwoyo nibyo ebi: okukunda, okushemererwa, obusingye, okugumisiriza, embabazi, oburungi, obwesigwa,
obucureezi, n'okwerinda; ebiri nk'ebyo tihariho kiragiro ekirikubizibira.
Kandi abo aba Kristo Yesu bakabamba aha musharaba omubiri n'emize yaagwo n'okwetenga kwagwo.
Ku turaabe turiho ahabw'Omwoyo, ka tugyendere omu Mwoyo.
Turekye kwehimbisiza ahari busha, n'obu kwakuba okugwisana kubi, nari okugirirana amahari.
Muhwerahwerane emitwaro yaanyu, mubone kuhikiiriza mutyo ekiragiro kya Kristo.
Ahakuba omuntu orikweteekateekaho ngu n'ekintu, haza kunu ataine ku ari, naaba naayebeiha.
Ekirungi nikwo omuntu weena kugyeza omurimo gwe, akaba nigwo yaayehimbisizamu, kutari kwehimbisiza mu gwa mutaahi we.
Ahabw'okuba omuntu weena aryayekorera omutwaro gwe wenka.
Mutabeihwebeihwa; Ruhanga tagaaniizibwa; ahakuba ebi omuntu abiba nibyo agyesha.
Orikubibira omubiri gwe, omuri ogwo mubiri nimwo arigyesha okujunda; kwonka orikubibira Omwoyo, omu Mwoyo ogwo nimwo arigyesha amagara agatahwaho.
Mbwenu nu turekye kuruha omu kukora gye; ahakuba obunaku ku burihika, turyagyesha, ku turiba tutarikuhwa matsiko.
N'ahabw'ekyo, obu tukiine omwanya, tukore gye abantu boona, kwonka okukira munonga abari omu nju y'okwikiriza.
Mureebe enyuguta oku ziri mpango, ezi naabahandiikira n'omukono gwangye nyenka.
Boona abarikwenda kweyoreka ku bari gye omu by'omubiri, nibo babagyema kusharwa; babikunda ngu barekye kuhiigwa ahabw'omusharaba gwa Kristo.
Kandi hoona n'abasharwa tibahitsya Biragiro; kwonka benda ngu musharwe, babone kwehimbisa ahabw'emibiri yaanyu.
Kwonka nyowe tindikwenda kwehimbisa habw'ekintu kyona, kureka ahabw'omusharaba gwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, ogwareeteire ensi ahariinye kuba ebambirwe, kandi naanye ahariyo kuba obambirwe.
Ahakuba okusharwa ti kintu, n'obu kwakuba okutasharwa, kureka okuhinduka ekihangirwe kisya.
Kandi boona abarikukuratira okuhabura oku, nibo Baisraeli ba Ruhanga, bagire obusingye n'okusaasirwa.
B'eishe-emwe, embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume n'emyoyo yaanyu. Amiina.
Paulo, entumwa ya Kristo Yesu ahabw'okukunda kwa Ruhanga, naabahandiikira imwe abarikwera abari omuri Efeso, kandi abeesigwa omur Kristo Yesu.
Nimbendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe, na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ruhanga asiimwe, Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, owaatuhaire emigisha yoona ey'Omwoyo omu myanya y'omu iguru omuri Kristo,
nk'oku yaatutooraniire omuriwe ahabwa rukundo, ensi etakahangirwe, ngu tube abarikwera abataine kamogo omu maisho ge.
Akatutoorana tutakabaireho, ngu tuhindurwe abaana be ahabwa Yesu Kristo, nk'oku yaasiimire omu kukunda kwe,
ngu embabazi ze ez'ekitiinisa zisiimwe, ezi yaatuheereire busha omuri Ogwo ou akunda.
Omuri Ogwo tuheebwa okucungurwa ahabw'eshagama ye, okusaasirwa eby'okushiisha byaitu, nk'obutungi bw'embabazi ze oku buri,
ezi yaatusheeshekaizeho.
Ahakuba akatumanyisa enaama y'okukunda kwe omu bwengye bwona n'okwetegyereza kwona, nk'ebi yaagyendereire kworeka omuri Kristo oku biri,
ngu atebeekanise ebintu, kandi obunaku ku burihika, abone kuteeranira atyo byona omuriwe nk'Omutwe, eby'omu iguru n'eby'omu nsi.
ngu tube ab'okuhimbisisa ekitiinisa kye, itwe abaabandize kwesiga Kristo.
Kandi naimwe, ku mwaherize kuhurira ekigmbo ky'amazima, niyo ngiri y'okujunwa kwanyu, mukaikiriza Yesu, mwahamibwa omuriwe n'akamanyiso k'Omoyo Orikwera owaaraganisiibwe;
nigwo mukwato gw'obuhunguzi bwaitu, okuhitsya obu tuributunga, ekitiinisa kye kikasiimwa.
tinkarekaga kubasiimira Ruhanga, n'okubaijuka omu kushaba kwangye,
nimbashabira ngu: Ruhanga wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, Tataitwe ow'ekitiinisa, abahe omwoyo gw'obwengye n'okushuuruurirwa, mumumanye;
amaisho g'emitima yaanyu gamurikirwe, mubone kushoborokyerwa eki mugiraho amatsiko, eki mwayeteirwe, mumanye n'obutungi bw'obuhunguzi bwe obw'ekitiinisa, obu aine omu barikwera,
mumanye n'amaani ge agu aine ahariitwe abarikwikiriza, oku gari maingi munonga, nk'okukora kw'amaani g'obushoboorozi bwe oku kuri,
oku yaahikiririize omuri Kristo, obu yaamuzoora omu bafu, akamushutamya aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo omu iguru,
ahaiguru munonga y'obutegyeki bwona n'obushoboorozi bwona n'amaani goona n'obugabe bwona, kandi ahaiguru y'eiziina ryona erigambwa ti mu busingye obu bwonka, kureka n'omu busingye oburiija;
kandi yaamuha okutegyeka byona, yaabita ahansi y'ebigyere bye, yaamuhindura Omutwe gwa byona omu kanisa,
nigwo mubiri gwe oguhikiirizibwa Ogwo ohikiiriza byona omuri boona.
ebi mwabaire mugyenderamu ira nimukuratira emitwarize y'ensi egi, kandi n'okukuratira omukama w'obushoboorozi bw'omu mwanya gw'ahaiguru, nigwo mwoyo ogurikukorera hati omu batarikuhurira.

Kandi naitwe twena tukaba tubarimu, nitukuratira okurigira okubi kw'emibiri yaitu, nitukora ebi emibiri yaitu n'ebiteekateeko byaitu byetenga; kandi ahabw'obuhangwa bwaitu tukaba turi ab'okugirirwa ekiniga nk'abandi boona.
Kwonka Ruhanga ahabw'okuba omutungi w'embabazi, omu kukunda kwe kwingi oku yaatukunzire,
n'obu twabaire turi abafu omu by'okushiisha byaitu, akatuhindura abahuriire hamwe na Kristo, (mukajunwa ahabw'embabazi),
yaatuzoora hamwe nawe, yaatushutamya nawe omu myanya y'omu iguru omuri Kristo Yesu,
ngu omu busingye oburiija ayorekye obutungi bw'embabazi ze obutarikugyerwa omu birungi ebi yaatukoreire omuri Kristo Yesu.
Mumanye ngu embabazi ze nizo zaabajunire ahabw'okwikiriza; ti habw'okukora kwanyu, kureka n'ekiconco kya Ruhanga,
ekitararugire mu mirimo, ngu hatagira omuntu weena owaayehimbisa.
Ahakuba turi ebihangirwe bye, ebi yaahangiire omuri Kristo Yesu okukora emirimo emirungi, ei Ruhanga yaateekateekire ira, ngu tube niyo twagyenderamu.
N'ahabw'ekyo hariho eki ndikubaijutsya, imwe Abanyamahanga omu buzaare, abu abashazirwe n'engaro emibiri yaabo beeta abatashazirwe;
mwijukye ngu omu biro ebyo mukaba mutaine Kristo, mutaanisiibwe n'oruganda rwa Israeli, mutaine kakwate aha ndagaano y'ebyaraganisiibwe, mutaine matsiko, kandi muri omu nsi mutaine Ruhanga.
Kwonka hati omuri Kristo Yesu imwe abaabaire bari hare munonga ira, mwiriziibwe haihi ahabw'eshagama ya Kristo.
Ahabw'okuba Ogwo niwe busingye bwaitu, owaatuhindwire, itwe ababiri, kuba omwe, akasheenya ekisiika ekyabaire nikitutaanisa, nibwo buzigu,
ahabw'okuhayo omubiri gwe kwihaho ebiragiro ebyaragiirwe n'ebyatairweho, ngu abaabaire bari babiri abahangyemu omuntu omwe omusya, abone kureeta atyo obusingye;
kandi atuteerane twembi na Ruhanga omu mubiri gumwe ahabw'omusharaba, ogu yaitsize obuzigu.
Yaija, yaabuurira engiri y'obusingye imwe abaabaire bari hare; n'abaabaire bari haihi, nabo yaabagambira obwo busingye;
ahakuba ahabw'Ogwo twembi twiriziibwe haihi na Isheboona omu Mwoyo omwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo timukiri banyamahanga nari abahinguzi, kureka muri abanyarurembo hamwe n'abarikwera, kandi ab'omu kikaari kya Ruhanga,
mwombekirwe aha musingi gw'entumwa na baanabi, kandi Kristo Yesu niwe ibaare ery'obuhamizo;
omuriwe ekyombeko kyona nikiteeranwa gye, kikura kiba hekalu erikwera omuri Mukama;
naimwe mwombekirwe hamwe omuriwe kuba omwanya gwa Ruhanga ogw'okutuuramu omu Mwoyo.
N'ahabw'ekyo nyowe Paulo, embohe ahabwa Kristo Yesu, eyaabohirwe ahabwanyu Abanyamahanga,
ku muraabe mwahuriire oku naakwatsiibwe embabazi za Ruhanga ezi naahairwe ahabwanyu,
oku naamanyisiibwe enaama egyo omu kushuuruurirwa, nk'oku naabandize kubahandiikira omu bigambo bikye,
naimwe, ku muraabishome, nimwija kwetegyereza oku naamanyire enaama ya Kristo,
etaramanyirwe bantu ira ryona, nk'oku hati eshuuruuriirwe entumwa ze ezirikwera na baanabi omu Mwoyo;
oku Abanyamahanga nabo bari abahunguzi hamwe naitwe, n'engingo z'omubiri gumwe naitwe, kandi abakwataniise naitwe omu byaraganisiibwe omuri Kristo Yesu ahabw'engiri.
Nyowe, n'obu ndaabe ndi muto okukira orikukira obuto omu barikwera boona, nkaheebwa omugisha ogu okubuurira Abanyamahanga obutungi bwa Kristo obutarikwetegyerezibwa,
n'okumanyisa abantu boona, bakashoborokyerwa enaama eyaasherekirwe ira ryona omuri Ruhanga owaahangire byona,
ngu omu biro ebi ab'obutegyeki n'obushoboorozi obw'omu iguru babone kumanyisibwa ekanisa obwengye bwa Ruhanga obw'emiringo mingi,
nk'oku yaateekateekire ira ryona, akabihikiiriza omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
Omuri Ogwo twine obumanzi n'obwesigye okuhika ahari Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu.
Nikyo ndikubashabira ngu mutahwa amatsiko ahabw'okubonabonesibwa kwangye ahabwanyu, okwo nikyo kitiinisa kyanyu.
N'ahabw'ekyo ntsimba amaju omu maisho ga Isheboona,
ou enganda zoona ez'omu iguru n'ez'omu nsi zeetererwa,
nimmushaba ku abaha okugumibwa n'amaani ahabw'Omwoyo we omu muntu ow'omunda, nk'obutungi bw'ekitiinisa kye oku buri;
ngu Kristo abone kutuura omu mitima yaanyu ahabw'okwikiriza; ku muraaheze kutsimba emizi omuri rukundo, mwahamiramu,
mugire amaani ag'okugishoborokyerwa hamwe n'abarikwera boona, mumanye oburaingwa bwayo obw'obukiika, n'obw'oburaingwa, n'obwa bwemi, n'obwa bucuzi,
n'okumanyira kimwe okukunda kwa Kristo okurengire munonga okumanya kw'abantu, mubone kwijuzibwa n'okwijura kwona okwa Ruhanga.
Ogwo orikubaasa kukora ebirikukirira kimwe ebi tushaba nari ebi tuteekateeka, ahabw'amaani agakorera omuriitwe,
ekitiinisa kibe ekye omu kanisa n'omuri Kristo Yesu okuhitsya obusingye bwona ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
mwebundaarize n'obucureezi bwona, nimwetwara, nimugumiriririzana omuri rukundo,
nimwezirika kurinda obumwe bw'Omwoyo, muteerainwe omurunga gw'obusingye.
Hariho omubiri gumwe, n'Omwoyo omwe, nk'oku mwayeteirwe amatsiko gamwe omu kwetwa kwanyu,
Omukama omwe, okwikiriza kumwe, okubatizibwa kumwe,
Ruhanga omwe, Tataitwe twena, orikukira boona, okoresa boona, kandi ori omuri boona.
Kwonka omuntu weena omuriitwe akaheebwa embabazi nk'ekigyero ky'ekiconco kya Kristo oku kiri.
Nikyo kyagambiirwe ngu:
Ku yaatembire omu iguru, akatwara eminyago,
Yaagabira abantu ebiconco.
Ogwo owaashuumire niwe yaatembire, akaza ahaiguru munonga aharikweshumba eiguru ryona, ngu abone kuhikiiriza byona.)
Kandi akaha abamwe kuba entumwa, abandi baanabi, abandi ababuurizi b'engiri, abandi kuba abariisa n'abeegyesa,
ngu abarikwera bateekateekyerwe omurimo gw'okuheereza, babone kwombeka omubiri gwa Kristo,
okuhitsya obu twena turihika aha kugira obumwe bw'okwikiriza, n'okuhika aha kumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga, okuhitsya obu turiba abantu bakuru, tukahika aha bukuru obw'orugyero rwa Kristo oruhikire,
ngu turekye kuguma turi abaana, nituza oku n'oku, nitutwarwa buri muyaga gw'enyegyesa n'oburyarya bw'abantu n'obugobya bwabo n'obwengye bwona bw'okutuhabisa.
Kureka tugambe amazima omu kukunda, omuri byona tukurire omuri Yesu, niwe Mutwe;

omu Mutwe ogwo nimwo omubiri gwona guteeranirwa gye, gukahamibwa hamwe emitsi y'engingo zoona, nk'oku zihwerana, buri rugingo rwaba nirukora eki rwahangiirwe; okwo nikwo omubiri gwona gukura, gukeeyombeka omuri rukundo.
N'ahabw'ekyo eki ndikugamba kandi nkahamya omuri Mukama waitu n'eki; murekye kugyenda nk'oku Abanyamahanga bagyenda, nibakuratira ebiteekateeko byabo ebitaine mugasho;
obwengye bwabo buri omu mwirima, obutamanya oburi omuribo n'obugangaazi bw'omu mitima yaabo bibataaniise n'amagara agarikuruga ahari Ruhanga;
kandi bari nk'ebiti, beetaahize omu by'okurigira okubi, n'omu mururu gw'okukora ebihagaro eby'emiringo yoona.
Kwonka imwe tikwo mwayegire Kristo mutyo,
ku muraabe niwe mwahuriire, mukeegyesibwa omuriwe nk'oku amazima gaba omuri Yesu.
Ebyo nibibeegyesa aha by'emicwe yaanyu eya ira, ngu mujuure omuntu waanyu owa ira, orikujunzibwa okwetenga okurikuhabisa,
muhindurwe basya omu mwoyo gw'obwengye bwanyu,
mujware omuntu ondiijo omusya, owaahangirwe omu nshusha ya Ruhanga omu kuhikiirira n'okwera okw'amazima.
Mugire ekiniga, kwonka murekye kushiisha; eizooba rirekye kurenga mukikiine;
murekye kuha Sitaane omwanya.
Omushuma arekye kugaruka kwiba, kureka akore n'amaani, naakoresa emikono ye emirimo mirungi, abone kutunga eby'okuha abooro.
Omu kanwa kaanyu hatarirugamu ekigambo kyona ekibi; kureka mugambe ebirungi ebirikubaasa kukuza abantu ahu bishemereire kugambirwa, bibone kuhaisa abarikubihurira omugisha.
Kandi mutarigwisa kubi Omwoyo Orikwera wa Ruhanga, owaabateereirweho kuba akamanyiso okuhitsya aha kiro ky'okucungurirwaho.
Obushaarizi bwona n'ekiniga n'okuguubwa kubi n'oruyombo n'okujumiirana, hamwe n'eihari ryona biihwe omuriimwe.
Mukorerane gye, mugirirane embabazi, kandi musaasirane, nk'oku Ruhanga yaabasaasiire omuri Kristo.
N'ahabw'ekyo mukuratire Ruhanga nk'abaana abarikukundwa.
Kandi mugyendere omu kukunda nk'oku Kristo yaatukunzire, akeehayo ahabwaitu okuba empongano n'ekitambo ahari Ruhanga, omugaju ogurikutaamirana.
Kwonka obushambani n'ekihagaro kyona n'okwetenga kwona bitarigambwaho omuriimwe, mube nk'oku abarikwera bashemereire kuba.
Omu kugamba kwanyu murekye kugamba ebirikwitsa enshoni n'eby'obushema n'eby'okushetsya ebitahikire; kureka musiime Ruhanga.
Kwonka eki mukimanyire kimwe, ngu tihariho mushambani n'obu yaakuba okora ebihagaro n'obu yaakuba omwetengi, niwe oramya ebishushani, oriheebwa omugabo omu bukama bwa Kristo na Ruhanga.
Hatagira omuntu owaababeihabeihesa ebigambo ebitaine mugasho; ahabw'okuba ebibi ebyo nibyo bireeta ekiniga kya Ruhanga aha batarikuhurira.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutarikwatanisa nabo;
ahakuba ira mukaba muri omwirima, kwonka hati muri omushana omuri Mukama; mugume mugyende nk'abaana b'omushana;
ahabw'okuba ebyana by'omushana bireeberwa omu burungi bwona n'omu kuhikiirira n'omu mazima;
kandi mwetegyereze ebirikusiimwa Mukama.
Mutarikwatanisa n'emirimo y'omwirima etarikwana; kureka mugihane.
Ahakuba ebi abo bakorera omu mubonano, nangwa n'okubigambaho kwonka, n'eky'enshoni.
Kwonka byona, ku byakirwa omushana, bireebwa; ahakuba kyona ekyakirwa omushana kikareebwa, kiba omushana;
nikyo kirikugambirwa ngu:
Sisiimuka, iwe ogwejegyeire, ozookye omu bafu,
Kristo akwakire.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde, mumanye oku murikugyenda, mutagyenda nk'abataine bwengye, kureka nk'abanyabwengye,
mutafiisa busha omwanya, ahakuba ebiro ebi ni bibi.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutaba abashema, kureka mumanye buzima ebi Mukama waitu arikwenda.
Mutarisinda viinyo erimu okujagarara, kureka mwijure Omwoyo.
Mugambirane zaaburi n'ebyeshongoro n'ebyevugo eby'Omwoyo, nimweshongorera Mukama n'emitima yaanyu yoona, nimuteera enanga,
nimusiima Ruhanga Isheboona obutoosha ahabwa byona omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
nimworoberana ahabw'okutiina Kristo.
Ahakuba omushaija niwe mutwe gw'omukazi, nk'oku Kristo ari Omutwe gw'ekanisa, omubiri gwe; kandi niwe Mujuni waayo.
Nk'oku ekanisa eyorobera Kristo, n'abakazi babe nikwo baayorobera abashaija baabo omuri byona.
Kandi imwe abashaija, mukunde abakazi baanyu, nk'oku Kristo yaakunzire ekanisa, akeehayo ahabwayo,
ngu agyeeze, aherize kugishemeza ahabw'okugyogyesa amaizi n'Ekigambo kye;
ngu ekanisa egyo ebone kumurikwa omu maisho ge eri ey'ekitiinisa, etaine ibara n'obu gwakuba omufunya, nari ekintu kyona ekirikushusha kityo, kureka ebe erikwera etaine kamogo.
Nikwo n'abashaija bashemereire kukunda abakazi baabo nk'emibiri yaabo bonka. Okunda omukazi we, biri ayekunzire;
ahakuba tihariho muntu oyanga omubiri gwe, kureka aguriisa, agucuma, nk'oku Kristo agira ekanisa;
ahabw'okuba turi engingo z'omubiri gwe.
Nikyo omushaija atsigiraho ishe na nyina, akateeranwa n'omukazi we, bombi bakaba omubiri gumwe.
Egi n'enaama nkuru; kwonka nyowe ningigyeranisa ahari Kristo n'ekanisa.
N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, omuntu weena omuriimwe akunde omukazi we, nk'oku ayekunda; n'omukazi nawe ashemereire kutiina iba.
Tiina sho na nyoko; (ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'okubanza ekirimu okuraganisibwa)
obone kuba gye, okahangaara omu nsi.
Naimwe baishebo, murekye kugwisa kubi abaana baanyu, kureka mubarere, nimubategyeka gye, kandi nimubeegyeseza omuri Mukama.
Imwe abahuuku, mworobere bakama baanyu ab'omu nsi, nk'abarikworobera Kristo, mubatiine nimutetema n'omutima ogutaine buryarya.
Mutabakorera ahabw'okureebwa, nk'abarikwenda kusiimwa abantu, kureka nk'abahuuku ba Kristo abakora ebi Ruhanga akunda, nimukora mwihire aha mutima.
Mubakorere n'omutima murungi, nk'abarikukorera Mukama, ti nk'abarikukorera abantu,
nimumanya ngu ekirungi kyona eki omuntu akora, aryakiihurwa Mukama, yaaba muhuuku nari ow'obusingye.
Kandi imwe bakama baabo, naimwe mube nikwo mwabatwaza, murekye kubatiinisa, nimumanya ngu Mukama waanyu mwembi ari omu iguru, kandi tashoroora mu bantu.
Mujware eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, mubone kwemerera mutasingwirwe bugobya bwa Sitaane.

Ahabw'okuba titurikufukaana n'abaine omubiri n'eshagama, kureka niturwana n'ebirikutegyeka n'ebiine obushoboorozi n'ebirikutwara ensi egi omu busingye obu obw'omwirima, kandi niturwana n'amahe g'emyoyo emibi ey'omu myanya y'omu iguru.
N'ahabw'ekyo mukwate eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, mubone kuguma aha izooba ribi; kandi, ku muriheza kukora byona, mwemerere muhamire.
Ahabw'ekyo mwemerere, mwezirikire amazima omu nda nk'orukoba, mujwaire eky'okuhikiirira nk'ekyoma ky'okwekingiza omu kifuba,
mujwaire enkaito ez'okweteekateeka kugamba engiri y'obusingye;
kandi ahari ebyo byona mukwatireho engabo y'okwikiriza, ei murikubaasa kuraarisa emyambi y'omuriro yoona ey'Omubi.
Kandi mujware enkofiira ey'okujunwa, na rurara y'Omwoyo, nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga;
mushabire omu Mwoyo obutoosha omu kushaba kw'emiringo yoona n'okweshengyereza, nimubyezirikira n'okugumisiriza kwona, nimushabira abarikwera boona;
kandi naanye munshabire, mbone kuheebwa okugamba n'obumanzi, hoona ahi ndyashamiza akanwa kangye okumanyisa enaama y'engiri,
ei ndi entumwa yaayo omu nkomo, ngigambe n'obumanzi, nk'oku kinshemereire.
Kandi Tukiko, ow'eishe-emwe orikukundwa, omuheereza omwesigwa omuri Mukama, aryabateekyerereza byona, mubone kumanya ebyangye n'ebi ndikukora.
Nikyo naamubatumiraho ku mumanya nk'oku turi, kandi ngu agumye emitima yaanyu.
Obusingye bugume n'ab'eishe-emwe, n'okukunda hamwe n'okwikiriza ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Embabazi zibe ahari boona abarikukunda Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo okukunda okutahwaho.
Nyowe Paulo na Timoseo, abahuuku ba Kristo Yesu, twabahandiikira, imwe abarikwera boona omuri Kristo Yesu, abatwire Filipi hamwe n'abareeberezi n'abadiikoni;
nitubendeza embabazi n'obusiingye ebirikarugye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
kandi omu kushaba kwangye kwona okw'obutoosha mbashabira mwena n'okushemererwa,
ahabw'okuba mukakwatanisa naanye omu kubuzya engiri okwiha ahu mwatandikiire n'okuhitsya hati.
Kandi hoona nimpamiza kimwe ngu: Ogwo owaatandikire omurimo murungi omuriimwe aryaguhikiiriza aha kiro kya Yesu Kristo.
Kandi kinshemereire kubateekateekaho ntyo mwena, ahakuba muntuura aha mutima, kandi mwena mukwataniise naanye omu mbabazi za Ruhanga, omu kubohwa kandi n'omu kurwanirira engiri kwangye n'okugihamya.
Ruhanga niwe kareebi wangye, naamanya ku mbainiire orushusho mwena omu mbabazi za Kristo Yesu.
Kandi eki ndikubashabira n'eki, ngu okukunda kwanyu kugume kweyongyere kukanya omu kumanya n'okwetegyereza kwona,
mubone kusiima ebirikukira oburungi, mushangwe mutaine buryarya nari akamogo aha kiro kya Kristo,
mwijwire ebyana by'okuhikiirira ebi Yesu Kristo arikwanira omuriimwe, mubone kuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa n'okumuhimbisa.
Niinyenda kubamanyisa, B'eishe-emwe, ngu ebyambaireho bikaija kwongyera kubuzya engiri,
ahabw'okuba kikamanywa abaserukare boona abarikurinda Kaisari n'abandi boona, ku naabohirwe ahabwa Kristo;
kandi ab'eishe-emwe abarikukira obwingi kyabareetera kuhama omuri Mukama ahabw'okubohwa kwangye, baayeyongyera kugira obumanzi bw'okugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga bataine bwoba.
N'ekya buzima abamwe nibagamba Kristo ahabw'eihari n'empaka, kwonka abandi nibamugamba n'omutima murungi;
abo babuurira Kristo ahabw'okukunda, nibamanya ngu ndi aha ahabw'okurwana aha ngiri:
kwonka abandi tibarikumugamba mu mazima, kureka okurwanira orubaju rwabo, nibagira ngu nibaija kuunyongyera obusaasi omu kubohwa kwangye.
Mbwenu ninfa ki? Kizima omu buryo bwona, yaaba mu buryarya, yaaba omu mazima, Kristo naagambwa; ekyo nikyo ndikushemerererwa, kandi ndyakishemerererwa.
Ahakuba nimmanya ngu, ahabw'okushaba kwanyu n'okuhwerwa Omwoyo wa Yesu Kristo ekyo kiryandugiramu okujunwa,

nk'oku ntegyereize kimwe n'amatsiko, ngu tihariho kyona ekirinkwatsa enshoni, kureka nk'oku kyabaire kiri kare, hoona na hati mbwenu Kristo aryaguma ahimbisibwe n'obumanzi bwingi omu mubiri gwangye, yaaba ndiho nari nfiire;
ahakuba ahariinye okugumaho ni Kristo, n'okufa n'enshaagi;
kwonka ebyangye yaaba kugumaho omu mubiri, nikyo kirikanyisa ebyana omu murimo gwangye. Nyowe tindikumanya ki nshemereire kutooranaho.
Ndi embaju zombi; nkaayenzire kugyenda kuguma na Kristo, ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo kirikukirira kimwe oburungi.
Kwonka shi ahabwanyu okugumaho omu mubiri nikyo kirikwetengwa.
Ahabw'okwetegyereza ekyo, nimmanya ngu niinyija kugumaho, ntuure naimwe mwena, mubone kweyongyera omumaisho omu kwikiriza kandi n'okukushemerererwamu,
okwehimbisa kwanyu kubone kukanya omuri Kristo Yesu ahabwangye, ku ndiba naagarukire owaanyu.

Kwonka emitwarize yaanyu ebe eshemereire engiri ya Kristo; ku ndiba naizire nari ntaizire kubareeba, mpurire ebyanyu ngu muhamire mwine omwoyo gumwe, nimurwana aha kwikiriza kw'engiri n'omutima gumwe,
kandi mutarikutiinisibwa bazigu omu kigambo kyona; ekyo n'akamanyiso k'okuhwerekyerera aharibo akarikumanywa, kwonka ahariimwe n'ak'okujunwa kwanyu akarikuruga ahari Ruhanga.
Ahakuba timurahairwe kwikiriza Kristo kwonka, kureka n'okubonabonesibwa ahabwe,
nimurwana orugamba, nk'oku mwandeebire, kandi oru murikumpuriraho na hati.
Ku haraabe hariho okugumibwa omuri Kristo, nari okuhuumurizana okurikuruga omuri rukundo, nari okukwatanisa omu Mwoyo, nari embabazi n'esaasi,
muhikiirize okushemererwa kwangye ahabw'okugira omutima gumwe omu kukundana, nimwikirizana n'omutima gumwe.
Mutarikora ekintu kyona ahabw'okurwanira orubaju nari okwekuza, kureka omu bucureezi omuntu weena asiime mugyenzi we okukira oku arikwesiima.
Omuntu weena omuriimwe arekye kweta aha bye wenka, kureka ayete n'aha by'abandi.
Mugire omutima guri ogwabaire guri omuri Kristo Yesu.
Ogwo, n'obu araabe yaabaire ari omu muringo gwa Ruhanga, tarateekateekire okwingana na Ruhanga ku kiri ekintu eki ashmereire kugumya;
kureka akeeyihaho ekitiinisa, yaikiriza kuhinduka nk'omuhuuku, yaazaarwa omu muringo gw'abantu;
ku yaareebirwe ari omu muringo gw'omuntu, yaayecureeza, yaayoroba okuhika aha kufa, kandi okufa okw'aha musharaba.
Nikyo Ruhanga yaamukuriize munonga, akamuha eiziina eririkukira amaziina goona,
ngu boona abari omu iguru n'omu nsi n'okuzimu batsimbire amaju eiziina rya Yesu,
kandi endimi zoona zaature ku Yesu Kristo ari Mukama, Ruhanga Tataitwe ahimbisibwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo, abarikukundwa, nk'oku mwabaire mworoba obutoosha, na mbwenu mube nikwo mwahikiiriza okujunwa kwanyu mwine obwoba n'okutetema, t'obu ndiho bwonka, kureka okukira munonga n'obu ntariho;
ahakuba Ruhanga niwe akorera omuriimwe, akabaha okukunda ebi asiima n'okubikora.
Mukore byona mutarikwetomboita, mutaine mpaka,

mubone kuba abataine ky'okuhanwa nari oburyarya, muri abaana ba Ruhanga abataine kamogo, ahagati y'ab'obusingye obu obukiikami, oburikwehabagiza, abu mwakiramu nk'etabaaza omu nsi, nimworeka ekigambo ky'amagara,
naanye ngire eki ndyehimbisizaho aha izooba rya Kristo, ku ntarairukiire busha, nari ku ntarakoreire busha.
Kandi n'obu eshagama yangye yaakuba nk'empongano y'eby'okunywa eshukwa aha kitambo ky'okuheereza Ruhanga ky'okwikiriza kwanyu, nkaananuka, nshemererwa hamwe naimwe mwena.
Kandi naimwe mukaananuka mutyo, mushemererwa hamwe naanye.
Nyine amatsiko omuri Mukama waitu Yesu kubatumaho juba Timoseo, naanye nkaagarukwa omutima omunda, naamanya eby'owaanyu.
Ahakuba tiinyine ondiijo nkawe, orita omutima munonga aha byanyu.
Abandi boona nibasherura ebyabo bonka, ti bya Yesu Kristo;
kwonka omugasho gwa Timoseo nimugumanya; nk'oku omwana akorera ishe, nikwo yaakozire naanye omu kubuzya engiri.
N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo niwe nyine amatsiko kwohereza ahonaaho, naaheza kureeba ebyangye oku byaba;
kandi niinyesiga Mukama ngu naanye niinyija kwija juba.
Kandi nkateekateeka ku nshemereire kubatumaho Epafurodiito, mwene waitu, ou tukwataniise omurimo n'orugamba, kandi entumwa ei mwanyoherereize kumpwera omu bi ndikwetenga;
ahabw'okuba kabagirira orushusho mwena; kandi yaashaasha ahabw'okuba mukahurira ku yaabaire arwaire.
Kandi n'ekya buzima akaba arwaire, ari haihi kufa. Kwonka Ruhanga akamugirira embabazi, kandi tiwe yaazigiriire wenka, naanye akazingirira, ngu obusaasi burekye kuntembekyeranaho.
Nikyo nteereireho omutima kumubooherereza, ngu mushemererwe ahabw'okugaruka kumureeba, kandi naanye obusaasi bwangye butuube.
N'ahabw'ekyo mumwakiire omuri Mukama n'okushemererwa kwingi; kandi abantu nk'abo mubahe ekitiinisa,
ahakuba akaba ari haihi kufa ahabw'omurimo gwa Kristo, ayogire amagara ge, ngu abone kuhikiiriza eby'okumpwera kwanyu.
Ahabw'okuba abashazirwe omu mazima niitwe, abaramya Ruhanga omu Mwoyo, abeehimbisiza omuri Kristo Yesu, kandi abateesiga mubiri;
nyowe n'obu ndaabe nyine ekirikuunyesigisa omubiri. Omuntu ondiijo ku yaakuteekateeka kwesiga omubiri, nkaaba nimmukira.
Nkasharwa aha kiro kya munaana, ndi ow'omu ihanga rya Israeli, ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, Omuheburaayo enzaarwa, omu by'Ebiragiro ndi Omufarisaayo;
omu by'obweziriki nkahiiga ekanisa; omu kuhikiirira okw'okukwata Ebiragiro nkaba ntaine ki ndikugaywaho.
Kwonka ebyo ebyabaire biri nk'enshaagi ahariinye, nkabibara nk'ebifiire ahabwa Kristo;
kandi buzima byona nimbibara nk'ebifiire, ahabw'okuba okumanya Kristo Yesu Mukama wangye nikubikira munonga. Ahabw'Ogwo nkafeerwa byona, naabibara nk'eshaabo, ngu mbone kutunga Kristo,
kandi ndeebwe ndi omuriwe, ntaine kuhikiirira okwangye ahabwangye okw'okuhitsya Ebiragiro, kureka okuri omu kwikiriza Kristo, nikwo kuhikiirira okuruga ahari Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza;
ngu mmumanye, kandi mmanye n'amaani ag'okuzooka kwe, nkwatanise nawe omu kubonabonesibwa kwe, nshushane nawe omu kufa kwe,
naanye, ku kiribaasika, mbone kuhika aha kuzooka omu bafu.
Tindikugira ngu mperize kukitunga, nari shi ngu mperize kuhikiirizibwa; kwonka ningumizamu, ngu naanye nkwate ekyo eki Kristo Yesu yankwatiire.
B'eishe-emwe, tindikweteekateekaho ngu naaherize kukikwata; kureka eki ndikukora ni kimwe; niinyebwa eby'enyima, ninkununkirira eby'omumaisho,
niinyezirika kuhika aharikuhakanirwa ngu mpeebwe ekihembo eky'okweta kwa Ruhanga omuri Kristo Yesu okw'okuza omu iguru.
N'ahabw'ekyo itwe abahikiriire twena oku turikwingana, tuteekateekye tutyo; kandi ku muraateekateekye okundi aha kintu kyona, nakyo Ruhanga aryakibashuuruurira.
Kwonka amazima agu tuhikiremu, tube nigo twagyenderamu.
Ahakuba hariho baingi, abu naabagambiireho kaingi, na mbwenu ningaruka kubagambira nindira, nti, batuura bari abazigu b'omusharaba gwa Kristo;
emperu yaabo n'okuhwerekyerera, ruhanga waabo n'enda yaabo, nibeehimbisiza omu birikuhemura, emitima yaabo bagitaire aha by'ensi.
Kwonka itwe owaitu n'omu iguru, ei tutegyereza Omujuni kuruga, Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
orihindura emibiri yaitu emyeremwa kuba nk'omubiri gwe ogw'ekitiinisa n'amaani agamubaasisa kwegomoorera byona.
Ninteisa Eodia, kandi ninteisa na Suntuke, ngu baikirizane omuri Mukama.

Kandi naiwe, mugyenzi wangye ou tukwataniise buzima, ninkweshengyereza kuhwera abakazi abo; ahakuba bakakwatanisa naanye omu murimo gw'engiri, hamwe na Kelementi n'abandi bakozi bagyenzi bangye, abu amaziina gaabo gari omu kitabo ky'amagara.
Mushemererwe obutoosha omuri Mukama; kandi ningaruka kugira nti: Mugume mushemererwe.
Okworoberana kwanyu kumanywe abantu boona. Mukama waitu ari haihi.
Muteemereza omutima aha kintu kyona, kureka omuri byona mumanyise Ruhanga ebi murikwetenga omu kushaba n'okweshengyereza, kandi musiime.
Kandi obusingye bwa Ruhanga, oburengire okwetegyereza kw'omuntu weena, buryaguma burinde emitima yaanyu n'obwengye bwanyu omuri Kristo Yesu.

Eky'aha muheru, B'eishe-emwe, byona eby'amazima, byona ebishemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, byona eby'oburyo, byona ebishemeire, byona ebirikushemeza, byona ebirikusiimwa, ku haraabe hariho oburungi, ku haraabe hariho ebishemereire kuhimbisibwa, mube nibyo mwateekateekaho.
Ebi muunyegyeireho, ebi mwahairwe, ebi mwampuriireho, n'ebi mwandeebireho, mube nibyo mwakora; obwo nibwo Ruhanga mukama w'obusingye ariguma naimwe.
Ninshemererwa munonga omuri Mukama, ahakuba mbwenu aha muheru gwa byona mugarukire kuunyijuka; kandi n'ekya buzima mukaba nimuunyijuka, kwonka mukabura omwanya.
Ekyo tindikukigambisibwa kwetenga; ahakuba nkeega kumarwa omu muringo gwona ogu mba ndimu.
Nimmanya okugarurwa ahansi, nimmanya n'okugira ebishaagire; omu kintu kyona n'omu miringo yoona nkeega oburyo bw'okumarwa, omu kwiguta n'omu njara, omu kugira ebishaagire kandi n'omu bworo.
Nimbaasa kukora byona omuri Kristo ompa amaani.
Kwonka mukakora gye kukwatanisa naanye omu busaasi bwangye.
Kandi, imwe Abafilipi, nimumanya omu kutandika kw'engiri, obu naaruga Makedonia, tihariho kanisa eyaakwataniise naanye omu kigambo ky'okuha n'okuheebwa, kureka imwe mwenka.
Ahakuba n'omuri Tesalonika mukantwekyera eby'okumpwera, kandi ti rimwe, ni kabiri.
Ti kugira ngu ninkunda ebiconco, kureka niinyenda ngu ebyana byanyu byeyongyere, kandi bibabarirwe.

Ahabwangye nyine ebi ndikwetenga byona, nangwa n'okushaaga nibishaaga; mpaagire, ahabw'okuheebwa ebiconco ebi mwatwekire Epafurodito, ebyambeereire nk'omugaju, ekitambo ekiikirizibwa kandi ekirikusiimwa Ruhanga.
Kandi Ruhanga wangye aryamara obukyene bwanyu bwona, nk'obutungi bw'ekitiinisa kye omuri Kristo Yesu oku buri.
Ruhanga waitu Tataitwe aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Muramutsye orikwera weena omuri Kristo Yesu. Ab'eishe-emwe abari kunu baabaramutsya.
Abarikwera boona, okukira munonga ab'omu kikaari kya Kaisaari, baabaramutsya.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume n'emyoyo yaanyu.
Nyowe Paulo, entumwa ya Kristo Yesu, nk'oku Ruhanga yaakunzire, na Timoseo ow'eishe-emwe,
twabahandiikira, imwe abarikwera n'ab'eishe-emwe abarikwesigwa omuri Kristo abari omuri Kolosai. Nitubendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe.
Obutoosha ku tuba nitubashabira, tusiima Ruhanga, Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
ahabw'okuhurira eby'okwikiriza kwanyu oku murikwikiriza Kristo Yesu, n'okukunda oku mwine aha barikwera boona,
n'ahabw'ebi mubiikiirwe omu iguru ebi mwineho amatsiko. Amatsiko ago mukagahuriraho ira omu kigambo ky'amazima g'engiri,
eyaizire omuriimwe, nk'oku yaahikire omu nsi zoona, ekaana ebyana, ekeeyongyera, nk'oku kiri omuriimwe okuruga aha kiro eki mwahuririireho embabazi za Ruhanga, mukazeetegyereza omu mazima,
n'oku mwayegyesiibwe Epafura, omuhuuku mugyenzi waitu orikukundwa. N'omuheereza omwesigwa wa Kristo ahabwaitu,
kandi niwe yaatugambiire okukunda kwanyu oku mwine omu Mwoyo.
mugyende nk'oku aba Mukama bashemereire, nimumushemeza omuri byona, nimwana ebyana omu mirimo yoona emirungi, kandi nimweyongyera omu kumanya Ruhanga.
Mugumibwe n'obushoboorozi bwona, nk'amaani g'ekitiinisa kye oku gari, mubone kugumisiriza omuri byona n'okutaruha, mwine okushemererwa,
nimusiima Isheboona, owaatuhindwire abashemereire kubagana n'abarikwera omugabo gw'obuhunguzi omu mushana.
Niwe yaatwihire omu butegyeki bw'omwirima, akatutaasya omu bukama bw'Omwana we ou akunda,
ou twatungiiremu okucungurwa, nikwo kusaasirwa ebibi byaitu.

ahakuba omuri Ogwo nimwo ebintu byona byahangiirwe, eby'omu iguru n'eby'ahansi, ebirikureebwa n'ebitarikureebwa, yaaba bitebe by'obugabe, nari obukama, nari obutegyeki, nari obushoboorozi byona niwe yaabihangire, kandi byahangwa kuba ebye.
Niwe yaabandiize ebintu byona, kandi omuriwe byona nimwo biteeranira.
Niwe Mutwe gw'omubiri, niyo kanisa; niwe butandikiro, niwe mujigaijo gw'okuruga omu bafu, ngu abone kuba ow'okubanza omuri byona.
Ahakuba Ruhanga akasiima ngu obwaruhanga bwe bwona bube omuriwe,
kandi ku yaaherize kureeta obusingye ahabw'eshagama ya Yesu aha musharaba, yaasiima ngu omuriwe ayegarurire byona, yaaba by'ahansi nari eby'omu iguru.
mbwenu Yesu abagarukaniise na Ruhanga omu mubiri gwe ogw'obuntu ahabw'okufa kwe, ngu abone kubamurika omu maisho ga Ruhanga, muri abarikwera abataine kamogo, kandi abatarikugaywa,

mwaba mugumire omu kwikiriza, mwombekirwe gye muhamire, mutarikutengyetsibwa, mutarikwihwa omu matsiko g'engiri, ei mwahuriire, kandi eyaagambiirwe ebihangirwe byona eby'ahansi y'eiguru, ei nyowe Paulo naagizirwe omuheereza waayo.
Mbwenu ninshemerererwa omu kubonabonesibwa kwangye ahabwanyu, kandi ebyatsigaire aha by'okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo nibyo ndikuhikiiriza ahabw'omubiri gwe, niyo kanisa;
ei naagizirwe omuheereza waayo, nk'obukuru obu Ruhanga yampaire ahabwanyu oku buri, okumanyisiza kimwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga,
niyo naama eyaasherekirwe okwiha ira ryona n'obusingye bwona, kwonka hati emanyirwe abarikwera be.
Nibo Ruhanga yaasiimire kumanyisa obutungi bw'ekitiinisa ky'enaama egi oku eri omu Banyamahanga; enaama egyo ni Kristo okuba omuriimwe, niwe matsiko g'ekitiinisa.
Ogwo niwe tugamba, nituhana omuntu weena omu bwengye bwona, ngu tumurikye omuntu weena aihikre omuri Kristo.
Kandi nikyo nyezirikira kukora, nindwana nk'obushoboorozi bwe oku buri, oburikunkoresa n'amaani.
Ahakuba niinyenda ku mumanya oku ndikubarwanirira munonga imwe n'aba Laodikea, n'abandi boona abatakandeebaga,
ngu emitima yaabo egumibwe, nk'oku barikuteerana hamwe omuri rukundo, baheebwe obutungi bw'okwetegyereza n'okumanyira kimwe enaama ya Ruhanga; n'enaama egyo niwe Kristo;
kandi omuri Ogwo nimwo obutungi bwona obw'obwengye n'okumanya busherekirwe.
Eki ninkigamba ngu hatagira omuntu owaabahabya n'ebigambo by'okubabeihabeiha;
ahakuba, n'obu ndaabe ntari naimwe omu mubiri, kwonka ndi naimwe omu mwoyo, ninshemerererwa kureeba obuteeka bwanyu oburungi n'okuhama kw'okwikiriza kwanyu omuri Kristo.
mutsimbire emizi omuriwe, mwombekirwe omuriwe, kandi muhamiibwe omu kwikiriza, nk'oku mwayegyesiibwe, kandi muhingurane omu kusiima.
Mwerinde, hatagira omuntu owaabanyagisa obwengye bw'abantu n'oburyarya obutaine mugasho, omu kukuratira emigyenzo y'abantu, n'okukuratira eby'okubanza eby'omu nsi egi, okutakuratira Kristo.
Ahakuba omuriwe harimu Obwaruhanga bwona obureeberwa omu mubiri gwe;
kandi naimwe mwine amagara agahikire omuriwe, niwe Mutwe gw'obutegyeki bwona n'obushoboorozi bwona.
Kandi omuriwe mukasharwa okusharwa okutari kw'abantu, obu mwajuura omubiri gw'obuntu omu kusharwa kwa Kristo;
kandi mukaziikwa nawe omu kubatizibwa, oku mwazookyeiremu nawe ahabw'okwikiriza okukora kwa Ruhanga owaamuzoire omu bafu.
Naimwe, abaabaire bafeereire omu by'okushiisha byanyu n'omu kutasharwa kw'emibiri yaanyu, Ruhanga akabahindura abahuriire hamwe nawe, ku yaaherize kutusaasira eby'okushiisha byaitu byona,
yaaragaza ebihandiikirwe aha rupapura, ebyabaire nibitwomesereza nibiturega, yaarwihaho, yaarubamba aha musharaba;
kandi ku yaaherize kujuura eby'obutegyeki n'obushoboorozi, yaabihemura butunu, yaabisinguza ogwo musharaba.
Ebyo n'ekishushani ky'ebiriija, kwonka amazima gaabyo gari omuri Kristo.
Hatarigira owaanyaga ebihembo byanyu ahabw'okubendeza okwecwendeeka nk'okwe n'okuramya baamaraika, ayegamiire ebi ayorekirwe, naayehimbisiza aha bwengye bwe bw'obuntu obutaine mugasho;
haza atahamiire ha Mutwe, omu omubiri gwona guriisibwa, gukahamibwa hamwe emitsi y'engingo zaagwo, kandi gukakura omu kukura okurikuruga ahari Ruhanga.
ngu, Otarikwataho, Otarirozaho, Otarikoraho;
(haza ebyo byona n'ebihwaho byaheza kuriibwa), mukakurata ebyaragiirwe abantu n'enyegyesa yaabo?

N'amazima, ebyo nibishusha nk'eby'obwengye ahabw'okukundisa abantu emigyenzo y'ediini ei beegunziire, n'okwecwendeeka, n'okwesaasa omubiri; kwonka tibiine mugasho na kakye kuzibira okwetenga kw'omubiri.
Mute omutima aha by'omu iguru, murekye eby'omu nsi;
ahakuba mukafa, kandi amagara gaanyu gasherekirwe na Kristo omuri Ruhanga.
Kristo amagara gaitu ku ariboneka, naimwe muryareebwa muri hamwe nawe omu kitiinisa.
Ebyo nibyo bireeta ekiniga kya Ruhanga aha batarikuhurira,
kandi naimwe mukaba mubigyenderamu, obu mwabaire mukibirimu.
Kwonka hati mbwenu murekye n'ebi byona, okuguubwa kubi, ekiniga, eitima, n'okujumiirana, kandi omu kanwa kaanyu hatarirugamu ebigambo ebirikwitsa enshoni.
Mutaribeihana, ahakuba mukajuura omuntu owa ira n'emitwarize ye,
mwajwara omuntu omusya, ohindurwa musya obutoosha omu bwengye kushushanisibwa n'Owamuhangire.
Aho tihariho Mugiriika n'obu yaakuba n'Omuyudaaya, oshazirwe n'otashazirwe, omunyamahanga,
N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku muri abaatoorainwe Ruhanga, abarikwera kandi abarikukundwa, mujware omutima gw'esaasi, embabazi, okutwaza gye, obucureezi, n'okugumisiriza,
nimugumisiririzana; kandi ku haraabe hariho oine eki arikufa na mugyenzi we, musaasirane; nk'oku Mukama yaabasaasiire, mube nikwo mwatwaza.
Kandi okwongyera ahari ebyo byona mujware okukunda, nikwo kukomerana byona bikakwatanisiza kimwe.
Kandi obusingye bwa Kristo obu mwayeteirwe nk'engingo z'omubiri gumwe, butegyekye omu mitima yaanyu. Kandi mube abarikusiima.
Ekigambo kya Kristo kigume omuriimwe kikanye, mwegyesane, muhanane omu bwengye burungi bwona, nimweshongorera Ruhanga zaaburi n'ebyeshongoro n'ebyevugo by'Omwoyo, nimumuhimbisa omu mitima yaanyu.
Kandi eki muraagambe kyona, n'eki muraakore kyona, byona mubikore omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu, nimusiima Ruhanga Isheboona omuriwe.
Imwe abashaija, mukunde abakazi baanyu, murekye kubaitsa omwaga.
Imwe abaana, mworobere abazaire baanyu omuri byona; ahakuba ekyo nikyo kishemeza Mukama.
Imwe baishebo, mutagwisa kubi abaana baanyu, barekye kuhahaara emitima.
Imwe abahuuku, omuri byona mworobere bakama baanyu ab'omu nsi, mutabakorera ahabw'okureebwa nk'abarikwenda kusiimwa abantu, kureka mubakorere n'omutima ogutaine buryarya, nimutiina Mukama.
