Kyona eki muraakore, mukikore mwihire aha mutima, nk'abarikukorera Mukama, kunu ti bantu;
nimumanya ngu Mukama niwe aribaha obuhunguzi, nibyo bihembo byanyu; ahakuba nimukorera Mukama waitu Kristo;
ahakuba orikukora kubi aryaihurwa ahabw'ekibi eki yaakozire; kandi Mukama tashoroora mu bantu.
kandi naitwe mutushabire Ruhanga atwigurire orwigi, tubone kugamba ekigambo ky'okumanyisa enaama ya Kristo, eki mboheirwe,
nkimanyise nk'oku nshemereire kugamba.
Ab'aheeru mubagyendemu n'obwengye, murekye kufiisa busha omwanya.
Ebigambo byanyu bigume biri eby'embabazi, nk'ebirimu omwonyo, mubone kumanya oku mushemereire kugarukamu omuntu weena.
Eki naamubatumiraho n'okubamanyisa oku turi, kandi ngu agumye emitima yaanyu;
naamutuma na Onesimo, ow'eishe-emwe omwesigwa orikukundwa, kandi mwene waanyu. Baryabateekyerereza byona ebiri kunu.
Aristariiko ou mbohirwe nawe yaabaramutysa, na Mako mwihwa wa Barunaba, (ou mwaragiirwe, ngu ku ariija, mumwakiire);
na Yesu orikwetwa Yusto yaabaramutsya. Omu bakozi bagyenzi bangye abu nkora nabo omurimo gw'obukama bwa Ruhanga, abo nibo bonka abaarugire omu bashazirwe, kandi bakampuumuza.
Epafura, mwene waanyu, yaabaramutsya; nawe n'omuhuuku wa Kristo Yesu, oyezirika obutoosha kubaijuka omu kushaba kwe, ngu mugume muri abahikire, kandi abarikumanyira kimwe byona ebi Ruhanga akunda.
Ahakuba nimmuhamya ku akozire omurimo muhango munonga ahabwanyu n'ahabw'aba Laodikea, n'aba Hierapooli.
Luka omufumu orikukundwa na Deema baabaramutsya.
Mundamukize ab'eishe-emwe ab'omuri Laodikea, kandi muramutsye na Numfa n'ekanisa y'omu nju ye.
Ebaruha egi ku eriheza kubashomerwa, eshomerwe n'omu kanisa eya Laodikea, kandi naimwe mushome egyo eriruga Laodikea.
Mugambire Arakipo muti: Oyezirikye ohitsye obuheereza obu waahairwe omuri Mukama.
Nyowe Paulo naahandiika okuramutsya oku n'omukono gwangye. Mwijukye ku ndi omu kihome. Embabazi zigume naimwe.
Ebiro byona tusiima Ruhanga ahabwanyu mwena, nitugamba aha maziina gaanyu omu kushaba kwaitu,

nitwijuka obutoosha omu maisho ga Ruhanga Tataitwe emirimo yaanyu erikuruga omu kwikiriza, n'okukora okurikuruga omu kukunda, n'okugumisiriza okurikuruga omu matsiko agu mwine omuri Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
B'eishe-emwe abarikukundwa Ruhanga, nitumanya ku yaabatooraine,
ahakuba engiri yaitu terabaiziire mu bigambo byonka, kureka omu maani n'omu Mwoyo Orikwera n'omu kwikiririza kimwe mutarikubanganisa. Naimwe nimumanya oku twabaire turi omuriimwe ahabw'okubahwera;
kandi obu mwayakiira ekigambo omu busaasi bwingi mwine okushemererwa okurikuruga omu Mwoyo Orikwera, mukatooreza emitwarize yaitu n'eya Mukama;
n'ahabw'ekyo mukahinduka eky'okureeberaho aha barikwikiriza boona ab'omuri Makedonia na Akaya.

Ahakuba ekigambo kya Mukama nimwo kyarugire nikigambwa, ti muri Makedonia na Akaya zonka, kureka hoonahoona okwikiriza Ruhanga kwanyu kurangainwe; n'ahabw'ekyo titwine kindi eki tushemereire kubigambaho.
Ahakuba nabo bonka nibagamba ebyaitu, oku mwatwakiire, n'oku mwarekire ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, mukahindukira Ruhanga, okuheereza Ruhanga ogwo ohuriire, ow'amazima,
n'okutegyereza Omwana we kuruga omu iguru, ou yaazoire omu bafu, Yesu otujuna ekiniga ekirikwenda kwija.
Ahakuba naimwe, B'eishe-emwe, nimumanya ngu okubataayaayira kwaitu tikurabaire kwa busha;
kwonka, n'obu turaabe twabonabonesiibwe tukahemangurwa munonga omuri Filipi, nk'oku murikumanya, tukagira obumanzi omuri Ruhanga waitu kubabuurira engiri ye omu kuhakanisibwa kwingi.
Mumanye ngu okubuurira kwaitu ti kw'okuhabya, ti kw'ebihagaro, kandi tikurimu bugobya;
kureka, nk'oku twasiimirwe Ruhanga kukwatsibwa engiri, nikwo tugamba, ti habw'okushemeza bantu, kureka okushemeza Ruhanga ocaaka emitima yaitu.
Nimumanya ngu titukakoresaga bigambo by'okushunga, n'obu byakuba eby'okushwekyerera okwetenga okubi, Ruhanga niwe kareebi;
kandi titukendaga bantu kutuha ekitiinisa, yaaba imwe, nari abandi, n'obu turaabe twabaire tushemereire kubarusya nk'entumwa za Kristo.
Kwonka tukatwaza gye omuriimwe, nk'oku omurezi arera abaana be.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ahabw'okubasaasibwa munonga, tukashemerererwa okubaha, ti ngiri ya Ruhanga yonka, kureka n'okuhayo amagara gaitu, ahabw'okuba mukahinduka abaitu ab'aha mara.
Imwe muri baakareebi, hamwe na Ruhanga, abarikuhamya emitwarize yaitu ahariimwe abarikwikiriza, ku yaabaire eri erikwera, ey'okuhikiirira, kandi etarikugaywa;
ahakuba nimumanya oku twabaire twehnangiriza omuntu weena omuriimwe nitubagumya, kandi nitubaragiira, nk'oku omushaija ahana abaana be,
ngu mutwaze nk'oku kishemereire aba Ruhanga orikubeeta kutaaha omu bukama bwe n'ekitinisa kye.

Kandi hoona eki tusiimira Ruhanga obutoosha n'eki; ahakuba, ku mwahuriire ekigambo ky'engiri ya Ruhanga eki twabagambiire, mwakyakiira; kandi timwakyakiira nk'ekigambo ky'abantu, kureka nk'ekigambo kya Ruhanga ekirikukora omuriimwe abarikwikiriza; kandi omu mazima nikwo kiri.

Kandi, B'eishe-emwe, mukakuratira amakanisa ga Ruhanga aga Buyudaaya agari omuri Kristo Yesu; ahakuba ebi mwabonabonesiibwe beene waanyu bikashusha nk'ebi ab'ago makanisa baabonabonesiibwe Abayudaaya,
abaitsire Mukama waitu Yesu na baanabi, naitwe bakatubinga, bakagwisa kubi Ruhanga, bakaba abazigu b'abantu boona,
nibatuzibira kubuurira Abanyamahanga eby'okujunwa, ngu babone kuhikiiriza batyo obutoosha orugyero rw'ebibi byabo. Kwonka ekiniga kya Ruhanga kiizire kubamariraho kimwe.
Kwonka itwe, B'eishe-emwe, ku twabaihirweho okumara omwanya mukye, omu mubiri ti mu mutima, twayeyongyera munonga kugira orushusho rw'okwenda kureebana naimwe;
ahakuba tukamariirira kwija owaanyu, nangwa nyowe Paulo nkenda kwija, ti rimwe ni kabiri; kwonka Sitaane yaatuzibira.
Mbwenu amatsiko gaitu niki, nari okushemererwa kwaitu nari ekirunga kyaitu eky'okwesiimiraho? Tiimwe, omu maisho ga Mukama waitu Yesu ku ariija?
Ahakuba niimwe kitiinisa kyaitu n'okushemererwa kwaitu.
twatuma ow'eishe-emwe Timoseo, omuheereza wa Ruhanga omu ngiri ya Kristo, kubagumya n'okubeezirikisa omu kwikiriza kwanyu,
ngu hatagira owaashoberwa ahabw'okubonabonesibwa okwo. Naimwe ahabwanyu nimumanya ku nikyo twateereirweho.
Ahakuba tukabamanyisa kare tukiri owaanyu, ku turi ab'okubonabonesibwa; kandi nikwo kyabaire, nk'oku murikumanya.
N'ahabw'ekyo, ku naaremirwe kugumisiriza, naabatumaho kumanya okwikiriza kwanyu oku kuri, twine obwoba, ngu shana obundi omutegi akaaba yaabategire, naitwe okukora kwaitu kufa busha.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, tuhuumwire ahabwanyu omu kushoberwa n'omu kubonabona kwaitu ahabw'okwikiriza kwanyu;
mbwenu hati turiyo gye, ahabw'okuba mwemereire muhamiire omuri Mukama.
Ni kusiima ki oku turaabasiimire Ruhanga ahabw'okushemererwa kwona oku twine ahabwanyu omu maisho ga Ruhanga waitu,
tukashaba n'obweziriki nyomushana na nyekiro, ngu tureebane, kandi tuhikiirize ekibuzire omu kwikiriza kwanyu?
Mbwenu Ruhanga Tataitwe ahabwe na Mukama waitu Yesu atuhe oburyo bw'okwija owaanyu;
Mukama abongyere kandi abakanyisize okukunda oku murikukundana, kandi oku murikukunda abantu boona, nk'oku turikubakunda imwe,
abone kuhamya emitima yaanyu, eshangwe etaine ki erikugaywa omu kwera omu maisho ga Ruhanga Tataitwe aha kiro ky'okwija kwa Mukama waitu Yesu n'abarikwera be boona.
Ahakuba nimumanya ebiragiro ebi twbahaire omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Mumanye ngu eki nikyo Ruhanga arikubendeza, okwezibwa, mukeerinda obushambani,
omuntu weena omuriimwe amanye
ti mu mururu gw'okurigira okubi nk'abanyamahanga abatarikumanya Ruhanga,
omuntu weena arekye kushiisha akashaagiza mugyenzi we omu kigambo ekyo, ahakuba Mukama niwe muhoozi w'enzigu ow'ebyo byona, nk'oku twabaire twabahabwire nitubahamiiriza.
Ahakuba Ruhanga taratweteire kukora bihagaro, kureka akatwetera okuba abarikwera.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu orikugaya ebyo, naaba atagayire muntu kureka Ruhanga obaha Omwoyo we Orikwera.
kandi buzima nimukunda ab'eishe-emwe boona ab'omuri Makedonia yoona. Kwonka nitubeehanangiriza, B'eishe-emwe, mugume mweyongyere kukundana,
mwezirikire okucureera, mukore emirimo yaanyu, kandi mukorese emikono yaanyu, nk'oku twabaragiire,
mugire emicwe mirungi aha b'aheeru, kandi murekye kutungwa eby'abandi.
Ahakuba ku turaabe nitwikiriza ngu Yesu akafa yaazooka, n'abaagwejegyereire omuri Yesu nikwo Ruhanga aribareeta atyo hamwe nawe.
Kandi nitubagambira eki, tukigambiirwe Mukama waitu, ngu itwe abahuriire abarishangwa bakiriho aha kiro ky'okwija kwa Mukama, tituribandiza abo abaagwejegyeire.
Ahakuba Mukama aryayeimukira ashuume naaruga omu iguru agambe munonga n'eiraka rya maraika omukuru n'enzamba ya Ruhanga; kandi abaafeereire omuri Kristo nibo baribanza kuzooka;
bwanyima naitwe abahuriire abariba bakiriho turyatwarwa nabo omu bicu kubugana Mukama waitu omu kaabunga; tutyo tugume na Mukama ebiro byona.
N'ahabw'ekyo muhuumurizane n'ebigambo ebyo.
ahabw'okuba imwe ahabwanyu nimumanya gye ngu ekiro kya Mukama kiryaija nk'omushuma wa nyekiro.
Ku bariba nibagira ngu, n'obusingye, tihariho kabi, obwo nibwo okucwekyerera kuribagwaho, nk'oku ebisha bikwata omukazi orikurumwa kuzaara, kandi tibarikira na kakye.
Kwonka imwe, B'eishe-emwe, timuri omu mwirima, ekiro ekyo kubagwaho nk'omushuma;
ahabw'okuba imwe mwena muri abaana b'omushana, kandi abaana ba nyomushana; itwe tituri ba nyekiro n'obu baakuba ab'omwirima.
N'ahabw'ekyo turekye kugwejegyera nk'abandi; kureka tugume nitureeba, tutasinda;
ahakuba abagwejegyera bagwejegyera nyekiro, n'abasinda basinda nyekiro;
kwonka itwe, nk'oku turi aba nyomushana, twerinde ebirikusinza, tujware okwikiriza na rukundo nk'eky'okwekingiza omu kufuba, kandi n'amatsiko g'okujunwa nk'enkofiira.
Mumanye ngu Ruhanga taratuteereireho kiniga kureka okutunga okujunwa ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
owaatufeereire ngu tugume nawe, yaaba tuhuriire nari tugwejegyeire.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugumyane, kandi mwombekane, nk'oku murikukora.
mubahe ekitiinisa munonga omuri rukundo ahabw'omurimo gwabo. Mugume mwine obusingye, omuntu na mugyenzi we.
Ahabw'okuba nitubeeshengyereza, B'eishe-emwe, muteise entahurira, mugumye abahahaire emitima, muramire abataine maani, mugumisiririze boona.
Mwerinde hatagira omuntu weena omuriimwe owaihura ondiijo ekibi ahabw'ekibi, kureka obutoosha mwezirikire okukorerana gye, n'okukorera gye abandi boona.
Mugume mushemererwe ebiro byona,
mushabe obutoosha,
kandi omuri byona musiime; ahakuba nikyo Ruhanga arikubendeza omuri Kristo Yesu.
Mutaraaza Omwoyo;
mutagaya ebya baanabi;
mugyeze byona; muhamire aha kirungi;
mwetantare kyona ekirikushusha ekibi.

Ruhanga mukama w'obusingye we wenka abeereze kimwe; kandi emyoyo yaanyu n'amagara gaanyu n'emibiri yaanyu birindwe gye, bishangwe bitaine ki birikuhanwa aha kiro ky'okwija kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ogwo orikubeeta n'omwesigwa, kandi n'okukora niwe arikikora.
B'eishe-emwe, mutushabire.
Muramutsye ab'eishe-emwe boona n'okunywegyera okurikwera.
Nimbarahiza Mukama mushomere ab'eishe-emwe boona ebaruha egi.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe.
Paulo na Siluwaano na Timoseo twabahandiikira imwe ab'ekanisa y'Abatesalonika abari omuri Ruhanga Isheboona na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo;
nitubendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
N'ahabw'ekyo naitwe nitwehimbisa ahabwanyu omu makanisa ga Ruhanga, nitusiima okugumisiriza kwanyu n'okwikiriza kwanyu omu kuhiigwa n'omu kubonabona ebi mwemeire;
(ebyo nibyoreka ku Ruhanga acwa emanja z'oburyo,) ngu mubone kuteekateekwa kuba abashemereire obukama bwa Ruhanga, obu murikubonabonera;
ahabw'okuba Ruhanga naateekateeka ngu kihikire okwihura obusaasi abarikubasaasa,
n'okuha imwe abarikushaasha okuhuumura naitwe, Mukama waitu Yesu ku arishuuruurwa naaruga omu iguru na baamaraika be ab'amaani,
ari omu muriro ogurikwaka, okuhoora enzigu abatarikumanya Ruhanga n'abarikwanga kworobera engiri ya Mukama waitu Yesu.
Abo baryaheebwa ekifubiro eky'okuhwerekyerera okw'ebiro n'ebiro, babingwe omu maisho ga Mukama n'omu kitiinisa ky'obushoboorozi bwe,
ku ariija aha izooba eryo kuhimbisibwa omu barikwera be, n'okutangaarirwa ahabw'abaamwikiriize boona, ahakuba obujurizi bwaitu obu twabahaire bukaikirizibwa.
Nikyo tubashabirira obutoosha, ngu Ruhanga waitu abaikirize okuba abashemereire okweta kwe, kandi ahikiirize n'amaani ge ebirungi byona ebi murikwetenga n'emirimo y'okwikiriza,
eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu ribone kuhimbisibwa omuriimwe, naimwe omuriwe, nk'embabazi za Ruhanga waitu na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo oku ziri.
Ebirkukwata aha by'okwija kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'okuteerana kwaitu okumubugana, nitubeeshengyereza, B'eishe-emwe,
mutarahuka kuhahaaza emitima mukabura obwengye, mutajagarazibwa yaaba mwoyo nari ekigambo nari ebaruha, ei barikugira ngu ekahandiikwa itwe, ebirikuranga ngu ekiro kya Mukama kiiriire haihi.
Hatagira omuntu owaababeihabeiha omu muringo gwona; ahakuba ekiro ekyo tikiriija, hatakabandize kubaho okutaana na Ruhanga, omuntu ogwo omugomi akashuuruurwa, niwe mwana w'okuhwerekyerera,
kandi omuzigu oyetunguura, akarwanisa ekintu kyona ekyetwa Ruhanga nari ekiramibwa, akashutama omuri hekalu ya Ruhanga, naayeyeta Ruhanga.
Timurikwijuka ku naabagambiire ebyo, nkiri owaanyu?
Kandi nimumanya ekirikumuzibira hati n'eki, ngu arekye kushuuruurwa obunaku bwe butakahikire.
Ahakuba enaama y'obugomi na mbwenu etandikire kukora; kwonka orikuzibira hati naija kugumizamu okuhitsya obu ariihwaho.
Obwo, omugomi ogwo aryashuuruurwa, kandi Mukama waitu Yesu aryamwitsa orwoya rw'omu kanwa ke, amuhwerekyereze n'okumurinkana kw'ekitiinisa ky'okwija kwe.
Omugomi ogwo oriija ahabw'amaani ga Sitaane, aryaija n'obushoboorozi bwona, n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza by'ebishuba,
n'obugobya bwona obubi obw'okuhabya ab'okuhwerekyerera, ahabw'okuba bakanga kukunda amazima ngu bajunwe.
Nikyo Ruhanga arikubooherereza ekirikuhabya eky'amaani kubaikiririsa eby'ebishuba,
ngu boona abataraikiriize mazima, bakashemerererwa okutahikiirira, basingwe orubanja.
Nikyo yaabeeteire n'engiri yaitu, ngu mutungye ekitiinisa kya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, mwemerere muhamire, mugumye emitwarize ei twabeegyeise, yaaba mu bigambo, nari omu baruha zaitu.
Kandi Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo na Ruhanga Tataitwe, owaatukunzire akatuha okuhuumura okutahwaho n'amatsiko marungi ahabw'embabazi ze,
ahuumuze emitima yaanyu, agigumye gye omu mirimo yoona emirungi n'ebigambo byona ebirungi.
kandi naitwe tukire abantu babi abahabire; ahakuba abaine okwikiriza ti boona.
Kwonka Mukama waitu n'ow'okwesigwa; aryabagumya, kandi abarinde Omubi.
Kandi hoona twine obwesigye omuri Mukama ahabwanyu, ngu nimukora ebi turikubaragiira, kandi nimwija kugumizamu nimubikora.
Mukama waitu atebeekanise emitima yaanyu omu kukunda kwa Ruhanga n'omu kugumisiriza kwa Kristo.
Ahakuba naimwe ahabwanyu nimumanya oku mushemereire kutooreza emitwarize yaitu; obu twabaire turi owaanyu, tituragyendeire mu bweremwa,
titurariiriire busha by'okurya by'omuntu weena, kureka tukaba tukora munonga twecurenga nyomushana na nyekiro, ngu tutagira ou twarusya omuriimwe;
ti habw'okugira ngu tukaba tutashemereire kubikorerwa, kwonka tukenda ngu tube eky'okureeberaho, mubone kutooreza emitwarize yaitu.
Nangwa n'obu twabaire tukiri owaanyu, tukabaragiira tuti: Omuntu weena ku araabe atarikwenda kukora, arekye n'okurya.
Ahakuba tuhuriire ngu omuriimwe harimu abeeremwa abatarikukora na kakye, kureka okwetaasya omu by'abandi.
Abantu nk'abo nitubaragiira, kandi nitubeehanangiriza omuri Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo kukora emirimo yaabo batuurize, babone kugira eby'okubatunga.
Kwonka imwe, B'eishe-emwe, murekye kuruha omu kikora gye.
Omuntu weena otarikuhurira eki turikugamba omu baruha egi, mumumanye, mutakwatanisa nawe, abone kukwatwa enshoni.
Kwonka mutamuteekateekaho nk'omuzigu, kureka mumuhabure nk'ow'eishe-emwe.
Kandi Mukama w'obusingye we wenka agume abahe obusingye ebiro byona n'omu miringo yoona. Mukama agume naimwe mwena.
Nyowe Paulo, naahandiika endamutsyo egi n'omukono gwangye nyenka. Niko kamanyiso omu baruha yangye yoona; okwo nikwo mpandiika.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe mwena.
Nyowe Paulo, entumwa ya Kristo Yesu ahabw'okuragiirwa Ruhanga Omujuni waitu, na Kristo Yesu amatsiko gaitu,
naakuhandiikira, Timoseo omwana wangye buzima omu kwikiriza; ninkwendeza embabazi n'okusaasirwa n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona na Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
Ku naabaire ninza Makedonia, nkatsiga naakwehanangiriza ku oguma Efeso, ngu obone kuhana abantu bamwe barekye kwegyesa endiijo nyegyesa,
n'okuhugira aha nfumu z'ebigunjano, n'okutondoora obukomooko bwa baishenkurubo obutaine bugarukiro, ebirikuzaarukwamu empaka, bitarikugasira murimo gwa Ruhanga oguri omu kwikiriza;
haza ekigyendererwa omu kwegyesa kwaitu n'okukunda okurikuruga aha mutima ogushemeire n'omwoyo ogutarikweshinja n'okwikiriza okutarimu buryarya.
Hariho abantu bamwe abateishukire ebyo, bakahabira omu mpaka ezitaine mugasho,
nibenda kuba abeegyesa b'Ebiragiro, haza batarikwetegyereza ki barikugamba, n'obu byakuba ebi barikuhamya.

naashoborokyerwa ngu Ebiragiro tibiratairweho habw'abahikiriire, kureka ahabw'abagomi n'abatarikuhurira, ahabw'abatatiina Ruhanga n'abasiisi, ahabw'abatarikwera n'abateeta ha bya Ruhanga, ahabw'abaita baishebo na baanyinabo, n'abaitsi b'abandi,
n'abashambani, n'abashaija abakorana eby'enshoni, n'abanyaga abantu bakabatunda, n'ababeihi, n'abarahira ebishuba, n'ebindi byona ebirikurwanisa enyegyesa ehikire,
erikukuratira engiri y'ekitiinisa eya Ruhanga orikusiimwa, ei naakwatsiibwe.
n'obu ndaabe obunyakare naamurogotsireho, nkamujuma, ndi omuntu enshaarizi; kwonka nkasaasirwa ahabw'okubikorera omu butamanya n'omu butaikiriza;
kandi embabazi za Mukama waitu zikaba nyingi munonga hariinye hamwe n'okwikiriza n'okukunda okuri omuri Kristo Yesu.
Ekigambo eki n'eky'okwesigwa, kishemereire kwikiririzibwa kimwe, ngu Kristo Yesu akaija omu nsi kujuna abasiisi; kandi omuri abo niinye w'okubanza;
kwonka eki naasaasiriirwe, Yesu Kristo akenda kworekyera omuriinye, omusiisi w'okubanza, eky'okureeberaho ahari abo abarimwikiriza kutunga amagara agatahwaho.
Mukama otahwaho, otafa, otareebwa, Ruhanga Nyamuhanga, aheebwe ekitiinisa, ahimbisibwe ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Omurimo ogwo naagukukwatsa, Timoseo mwana wangye, nk'ebi baanabi baabire bakugambireho, ngu bikwezirikise kurwana okurwana okurungi,
noohamya okwikiriza n'omutima murungi ogutarikweshinja, ogu abamwe baanagire hare, bakasiisikarirwa okwikiriza kwabo nk'obwato oku bufeera omu nyanja.
Omuri abo ni Humenaayo na Alegizanda, abu naarekyeire Sitaane, ngu bakaayega okutarogota.
mushabire abagabe n'abategyeki boona tubone kugira obusingye tutebeekane, nitutiina Ruhanga kandi nitwerinda omu buryo bwona.
Eki nikyo kirungi kandi ekishemeire omu maisho ga Ruhanga Omujuni waitu,
oyenda ngu abantu boona bajunwe, bamanyire kimwe amazima;
ahakuba hariho Ruhanga omwe, kandi n'Omuteerani omwe owa Ruhanga n'abantu, ogwo muntu ni Kristo Yesu,
owaayehaireyo kuba ow'okucungura abantu boona. Ebyo bikahamibwa omu bunaku bwabyo;
nyowe nkateebwaho kuba omubuurizi waabyo kandi entumwa, (ningamba amazima, tindikubeiha), n'omwegyesa w'Abanyamahanga kubeegyesa okwikiriza n'amazima.
N'ahabw'ekyo niinyenda ngu abashaija babe nibo baashaba omu myanya yoona, nibaimutsya emikono erikwera bataine kiniga nari empaka.
Kandi abakazi bo bagume beecume, bajware ebijwaro ebibashemereire, baine obucureezi n'okwerinda, barekye kutsiba eishokye, n'obu kwakuba okujwara ezaabu nari eruuru nari ebijwaro by'obuguzi bwingi,
kureka bakore emirimo miringi eshemereire abakazi abeeyeta abarikutiina Ruhanga.
Omukazi agume ayegye ahunami omu kworoba kwona.
Ahakuba tindikwikiriza mukazi kubuurira nari kutegyeka abashaija; kureka agume ahunami.
Ahakuba Adamu niwe yaabandize kuhangwa, haakurataho Haawa;
kandi Adamu tiwe yaabeihabeihirwe, kureka omukazi niwe yaabeihabeihirwe, akahinduka omusiisi.
Kwonka omukazi ku ariguma omu kwikiriza, omu kukunda, omu kwera, hamwe n'omu kwerinda, aryaguma atabaarukye gye omu kuzaara abaana.
Mumanye ngu omureeberezi ashemereire kutagira ki arikugaywaho, omushaija oine omukazi omwe, omwerinzi, omunyabwengye, omukwata mpora, orikukunira abagyenyi, orikurahukirwa kwegyesa,
otarikusinda, otarikurwana, kureka orikutwaza gye, otarikutongana, otarikukunda mpiiha,
orikutegyeka gye eka ye, ou abaana be barikworobera bakamuha ekitiinisa omu miringo yoona;
(omuntu otarikumanya kutegyeka ab'omu ka ye, naabaasa ata kutegyeka ekanisa ya Ruhanga?)
tashemereire kuba Mukristaayo musya, obundi atakaayetunguura, akagwa, akacwerwa orubanja nk'oru Sitaane yaacwereirwe;
kandi ashemereire kuba orikusiimwa ab'aheeru, arekye kujumwa n'okugwa omu mutego gwa Sitaane.
Kandi abadiikoni nabo bashemereire kuba abeerinzi abatarikugambira habiri, abatarikunywa viinyo nyingi, abatarikwetenga nshaagi,
abarikurinda enaama y'okwikiriza, abaine omutima ogutarikweshinja.
Kandi abo babanze bagyezibwe; ku baraashangwe bataine ki barikugaywaho, babone kukora omurimo gw'obudiikoni.
Abadiikonikazi nabo bashemereire kuba abeerinzi, abatarikubeiherera bandi, abatarikukunda birikusinza, kandi abeesigwa omuri byona.
Abadiikoni babe abashaija abaine omukazi omwe, abarikutegyeka gye abaana baabo n'abamaka gaabo;
ahakuba abaheereza gye omu murimo gw'obudiikoni beetungira eiziina rirungi n'obumanzi bwingi omu kwikiriza okuri omuri Kristo Yesu.
ngu, ku ndiba ntarahukire kwija, omanye oku abantu bashemereire kutwaza omu nju ya Ruhanga, niyo kanisa ya Ruhanga ohuriire, enyomyo kandi obuhamizo bw'amazima.

Kandi tihariho kubanganisa, enaama y'ediini yaitu ku eri nkuru buzima, erikugira eti: Akoorekwa aine omubiri, yaahamibwa Omwoyo, yaareebwa baamaraika, yaabuurirwa omu mahanga, yaikirizibwa ab'omu nsi, yaatwarwa omu iguru kutaaha omu kitiinisa.
bahabisibwe oburyarya bw'abantu abarikubeiha ebishuba, abaine emitima etakihuriira, nk'esiriiziibwe ekyoma ekirukwotsya,
abaziza okushwera, kandi eby'okurya ebi Ruhanga yaahangiire abarikwikiriza bakamanya amazima ngu babyakiire n'okusiima.
Ahakuba eki Ruhanga yaahangire kyona ni kirungi; kandi tihariho kirikuzira, ku kiba kyakiirwe n'okusiima;
ahakuba nikiba kyeziibwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okushaba.
Ku orishobororera ab'eishe-emwe ebigambo ebyo, oryaguma ori omuheereza murungi wa Kristo Yesu, orikutungwa ebigambo by'okwikiriza n'eby'enyegyesa nungi ei waakuratiire.
Ebiteekyerezo by'ebigunjano eby'abakaikuru, ebitari bya Ruhanga, otaribiikiriza. Yemanyiize okutiina Ruhanga;
ahakuba okwemanyiiza eby'omubiri nikugasha kakye, kwonka okwemanyiiza okutiina Ruhanga nikugasha omu muringo gwona, ahakuba kwine eki kuturaganisa aha magara g'ebiro ebi n'ag'ebiro ebiriija.
Ekigambo ekyo n'eky'okwesigwa, kandi kishemereire kwikiririzibwa kimwe.
Nikyo tufeera kubi, kandi nikyo twezirikira, ahakuba twesiga Ruhanga ohuriire, Omujuni w'abantu boona, na buzima ow'abarikwikiriza.
Ebyo obiragiire kandi obyegyese.
Hatagira owaagaya obutsigazi bwawe, kureka obe eky'okureeberaho aha barikwikiriza omu kugamba n'omu mitwarize, omu kukunda, omu kwikiriza n'omu kugira omutima ogushemeire.
Oyezirikye kushomera abantu Ebyahandiikirwe, n'okubuurira, n'okwegyesa, okuhitsya obu ndiija.
Otarireka kukoresa ekiconco eki oine, eki waahairwe ahabw'ebi waagambirweho baanabi, obu abakuru baakutaho engaro.
Ebyo obyezirikire, obe nibyo waataho omutima, boona bareebe oku orikweyongyera kugyenda omumaisho.
Oyerinde iwe wenka, kandi n'omu bi orikwegyesa. Ogumizemu n'ebyo; ahakuba omu kukora otyo, noija kwejuna, kandi ojune n'abarikukuhurira.
abakazi bakuru nka nyoko, abakazi bato n'abaishiki nka banyaanyoko, obaineho omutima ogushemeire.
Abafaakazi enshoberwa buzima obahe ekitiinisa.

Omufaakazi, ku araabe aine abaana nari abaijukuru, babanze beegye kworeka okutiina Ruhanga kwabo omu bi barikukorera ab'omu maka gaabo, nibaihura ebi abazaire baabo baabakoreire, ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo kishemeire omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Omufaakazi enshoberwa ata amatsiko ahari Ruhanga, aguma naashaba naayeshengyereza nyomushana na nyekiro;
kwonka oyehayo kweshemeza, aba afiire n'obu aba ahuriire.
Obaragiire otyo, barekye kugira eki barikugaywaho.
Kwonka omuntu weena, otarikuhwera banyabuzaare, n'okukira munonga ab'omu ka ye, biri ayehakaine okwikiriza, kandi naaba ari mubi okukira otarikwikiriza.
Hatarigira omufaakazi owaabarirwa omu b'okuhwerwa atakahikize myaka makumi mukaaga ey'obukuru, kandi ashemereire kuba omukazi owaashweirwe omushaija omwe,

kandi orikusiimwa ahabw'emirimo mirungi, owaakurize gye abaana be, owaabaire akunira abagyenyi, akanaabisa ebigyere by'abarikwera, akahwera abarikushaasha, kandi owaayehaireyo kukora ebirungi omu muringo gwona.
Kwonka abafaakazi abakiri bato otariikiriza kubataasya omu mutwe gw'abafaakzi, ahakuba ku barema kwerinda n'okworobera Kristo, benda kushwerwa;
batyo basingwa orubanja, ahabw'okwita endagaano yaabo ey'okubanza.
N'ekindi beega obweremwa, basiiba nibabungyeera omu maka; kandi ti bweremwa bwonka, kureka baba ab'okubuzya orukuru, beetaasya omu bitari byabo, nibagamba ebitabashemereire.
N'ahabw'ekyo ninkunda ngu abafaakazi abakiri bato bashwerwe, bazaare abaana, bombekye amaka gaabo, barekye kuha abazigu obwiho bw'okutujuma.
Ahakuba na hati hariho bamwe abahabire bakakuratira Sitaane.
Omukazi weena orikwikiriza ku araabe aine abafaakazi abanyabuzaare, abe niwe yaabahwera, barekye kurusya ekanisa, ebone kuhwera abafaakazi enshoberwa.
ahabw'okuba Ebyahandiikirwe biragiira biti: Otariboha akanwa k'ente erikujunga engano. Kandi biti: Omukozi ashemereire ebihembo bye.
Abo abakozire ekibi ogume obateisize omu maisho ga boona, n'abandi babone kutiina.
Ninkwehanangiriza omu maisho ga Ruhanga na Kristo Yesu na baamaraika abaatoorainwe, oyerinde ebyo biragiro, okutagira rubaju ru waagwera, n'obu kwakuba okukorera omuntu weena ekintu ahabw'obuganzi.
Otarirahukiriza kuta engaro aha muntu weena, n'obu kwakuba okukwatanisa n'abandi omu bibi; oyerinde ogume ori oshemeire.
Okuruga hati otarinywa amaizi gonka; kureka onywe viinyo nkye ahabw'enda yaawe, n'ahabw'okurwararwara kwawe.
Ebibi by'abantu abamwe nibireebwa butunu, biri eby'okureeta orubanja; kwonka eby'abandi bireebwa bwanyima.
Okwo nikwo n'emirimo mirungi ereebwa butunu; kwonka n'obu biba bitari bityo, tibibaasa kuguma bisherekirwe.

Abaine bakama baabo abarikwikiriza bataribagaya ngu niho bari ab'eishe-emwe; kureka bakizeho okubakorera gye, ahabw'okuba abaine omugisha gw'okuheerezibwa okwo n'abantu abarikwikiriza kandi abarikukundwa. Ebyo guma obyegyese kandi obyehanangirize abantu.
aba ayekurize, kandi ataine ki arikumanya; arwaire endwara y'empaka n'okuhakana aha bigambo, ezirugwamu eihari n'okutongana n'okugambuurana n'okurengyerera,
n'empaka z'abantu abasiisikaire obwengye, abaihilirweho amazima, nibateekateeka ngu okutiina Ruhanga n'oburyo bw'okutunga enshaagi.
Haza kunu okutiina Ruhanga, okurimu okumarwa, kurimu enshaagi nyingi;
ahakuba titurareetsire kintu mu nsi, kandi titurikubaasa kwihamu kintu;
ku turaabe twine eby'okurya n'eby'okujwara, ebyo bigume bitumare.
Kwonka abeetenga kuba abatungi bagwa omu kwohibwa n'omu mutego n'omu kwetenga kwingi kw'obushema okurikushiisha, kukaroha abantu omu kuconcoboza n'okuhwerekyerera.
Ahakuba okwetenga empiiha n'omuzi gw'ebibi byona; hariho bamwe abaagiriire ebyo omururu, bakahaba, bakaruga omu kwikiriza, bakeecumitira kimwe n'enaku nyingi.
Kwonka iwe omuntu wa Ruhanga, oyetantare ebyo; okuratire okuhikiirira n'okutiina Ruhanga, okwikiriza, okukunda, okugumisiriza, n'obucureezi.
Rwana okurwana okurungi okw'okwikiriza, ohamize kimwe amagara agatahwaho, agu waayeteirwe, obu waagamba butunu okuhamya okurungi omu maisho ga baakareebi baingi.
Ninkwehanangiriza omu maisho ga Ruhanga oha ebintu byona amagara, na Kristo Yesu, owaahamize okuhamya okurungi omu maisho ga Pontio Pilaato,
oyorobere ekiragiro otaine kamogo, kandi otaine ki orikugaywaho okuhitsya aha kworekwa kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
okuryorekwa omu bunaku bwakwo, Omutegyeki ogwo orikusiimwa omwe wenka, Omugabe w'abagabe, Omukama w'abakama,
niwe wenka oine okutafa, otuura omu mushana ogutahikwaho, otakareebwaga muntu weena, kandi otabaasa kureebwa. Ekitiinisa n'obutegyeki obutahwaho bibe ebye. Amiina.
Kandi bakore ebirungi, babe abatungi omu micwe mirungi, babe efura omu kugaba, bagire omutima gw'okukwatanisa n'abandi;
batyo beebiikire obutungi obu baryegamira omu biro ebiriija, babone kutunga amagara aga buzima.
ahakuba bamwe ahabw'okwegira ngu babwine, bakahaba baaruga omu kwikiriza.
Embabazi zigume naimwe. Amiina.
Paulo, entumwa ya Kriso Yesu, nk'oku Ruhanga yaayenzire, eyaatumirwe kugamba eby'amagara agaraganisiibwe omuri Kristo Yesu,
naakuhandiikira, Timoseo omwana wangye orikukundwa; ninkwendeza embabazi n'okusaasirwa n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona, na Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu.
Ku nyijuka okurira kwawe, ngira orushusho kukureeba ngu nyijure okushemererwa.
Biinyijutsya okwikiriza kwawe okutarimu buryarya, okwabandize kuba omuri nyokwenkuru Loisi, na nyoko Yunike, na hati nimpamya ngu kuri n'omuriiwe.
Nikyo ndikukwijukiza kwenegyeza ekiconco kya Ruhanga ekiri omuriiwe, eki waahairwe ahabw'okuteebwaho engaro zangye;
ahakuba Ruhanga taratuhaire mutima gw'obwoba, kureka omutima ogw'amaani n'okukunda n'okwerinda.
owaatujunire akatwetesa okweta okurikwera, ti habw'emirimo yaitu, kureka ahabw'eki yaagyendereire, n'ahabw'embabazi ezi yaatuhaire ira ryona omuri Kristo Yesu;
kandi hati ebyo abyorekyeire omu kwija kw'omujuni waitu Kristo Yesu, owaahindwire okufa akakucwa busha, akooreka amagara n'okutafa omu mushana gw'engiri.
Engiri egyo niyo naateereirweho kuba omubuurizi waayo, n'okuba entumwa kandi omwegyesa;
kandi ahabwayo ninshaasha, nk'oku ndikushaasha hati; kwonka tindikwitwa nshoni; ahabw'okuba nimmanya ou naikiriize, kandi nimpamiza kimwe ngu naabaasa kurinda
Eky'okureeberaho ky'ebigambo by'amazima ebi waahuriire ningamba, okikuratire omu kwikiriza n'okukunda ebiri omuri Kristo Yesu;
orinde ekyo kirungi eki waakwatsiibwe Omwoyo Orikwera otuura omuriitwe.
Mukama agirire embabazi ab'omuka ya Onesifooro, ahabw'okuba kaingi akaba angarura omutima omunda; kandi taraitsirwe nshoni ahabw'enjegyere zangye.
Ku yaahikire Rooma, yaataho omutima kunsherura, yambona.
Mukama amuhe okusaasirwa omu maisho ge aha kiro ekyo. Kandi noomanya gye ebi yankoreire byona omuri Efeso.
Mbwenu nu, mwana wangye, guma ori ow'amaani omu mbabazi eziri omuri Kristo Yesu;
kandi ebi waahuriire ningamba omu maisho ga baakareebi baingi, obikwatse abantu abarikwesigwa, abaribaasa kubyegyesa abandi.
Okwatanise naanye omu kwemera obusaasi nk'omuserukare murungi owa Kristo Yesu.
Tihariho muserukare oza kurwana, akeetaasya omu mirabanamu ey'amagara aga, ngu asiimwe owaamuhandiikiire obuserukare.
Kandi omuzaani orikuhakana omu mpaka taheebwa kirunga kureka yaazaana nk'ebiragiro by'okuzaana oku biri.
Omuntu empingi niwe ashemereire kuba ow'okubanza omu kutogyera ebi ahingire.
Ta omutima aha bi ndikugamba; ahakuba Mukama naija kukuha okushoborokyerwa byona.
Guma oijukye Yesu Kristo owaazookire omu bafu, mwijukuru wa Daudi, nk'engiri ei naahairwe oku egamba;
niyo ngiri ei barikumbonaboneseza, kandi ei mboheirwe nk'enkozi y'abibi. Kwonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyo tikibohirwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ningumisiririza byona ahabw'abatoorainwe, ngu nabo batungye okujunwa n'ekitiinisa ekitahwaho ebiri omuri Kristo Yesu.
Ku turaabe twafiire hamwe nawe, turyaba abahuriire hamwe nawe;
Ku turigumisiriza, turyayema tutegyekye nawe;
Ku turimwehakana, nawe aryatwehakana;
Ahakuba We tabaasa kuhinduka.
Ebyo ogume obibaijutsye, noobeehanangiriza omu maisho ga Mukama kwetantara okuhakana aha bigambo okutaine mugasho, kureka okurikugwisa abarikukuhurira.
Oyezirikye kweyoreka ahari Ruhanga nk'orikusiimwa, omukozi otashemereire kukwatwa nshoni, orikushoboorora gye ekigambo ky'amazima.
Oyetantare okuregyeta okutarimu kutiina Ruhanga, ahakuba nikwongyera kureetera abantu kutamutiina;
kandi ebigambo byabo biryarima nk'ekishebe ekirikutana. Omuri abo ni Himenaayo na Fileeto,
abaateishukire amazima, nibahamya ngu okuzooka kukaheza kuhwaho, bakajuumikirira kimwe okwikiriza kw'abamwe.
Kwonka omusingi gwa Ruhanga oguhamire guriho, gwine akamanyiso aka ngu, Mukama naamanya abe; kandi ngu, Omuntu weena orikugamba eiziina rya Mukama arugye omu bubi.
Omuri nyaruju tihabamu bintu by'ezaabu n'efeeza byonka, kureka n'eby'ebiti n'eby'eibumba; ebimwe bikoresibwa emirimo y'ekitiinisa, ebindi erikugaywa.
Omuntu weena ku arikweshemeza yaayetaanisa n'ebyo, aryaba orwabya rw'okukoresa omurimo gw'ekitiinisa, orweziibwe, orutebeekanisiibwe ahabw'omurimo gwona omurungi.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyetantare okwetenga okubi kw'obutsigazi, okuratire okuhikiirira, okwikiriza, okukunda n'obusingye hamwe na boona abatakira Mukama n'omutima ogushemeire.
Kwonka empaka z'obushema ezitaine buryo ozeetantare, noomanya ku zizaarukwamu okutongana.
Kandi omuhuuku wa Mukama tashemereire kuba entongani, kureka orikutwaza gye ahari boona, orikurahukirwa kwegyesa, orikugumisiriza,
orikuhana n'obucureezi abarikumuhakanisa, ngu ku kiraabe nikibaasika, Ruhanga abahe okweteisa, bamanyire kimwe amazima,
basinduukye barugye omu mutego gwa Sitaane, owaabaire abakwatsire, babone kukora ebi Ruhanga akunda.
Kwonka omanye eki ngu, omu biro by'aha mperu, haryabaho ebiro by'akabi kaingi,
ahakuba abantu baryaba abarikwekunda, abakunzi b'empiiha, abanyamaryo, abarikwemanya, abarikujumiirana, abarikugomera abazaire baabo, entasiima, abatarikwera,
abatarikukunda baabo, abatarikwenda kugarukana n'abandi, abarikubeihererana, abatarikweyangisa, enshaarizi, abarikwanga ebirungi,
abarikureebyana, engangaazi, abarikwekuza, abarikukunda kweshemeza bonka okukira Ruhanga,
abarikuhamya emigyenzo y'ediini, bakahakanisa obushoboorozi bwayo. Abantu nk'abo obeetantare;
ahakuba omuri abo harimu abashoobookyera omu maju, bakahamba abakazi abataine mutima, abaremereirwe ebibi, kandi abarikutwarwa okurigira okubi kw'emiringo mingi,
abeega obutoosha, kwonka batahikye ha kumanyira kimwe amazima.
Nka Yane na Yambere oku baahakaniise Musa, nikwo n'abashaija abo bahakanisa amazima; n'abasiisikaire obwengye, abatarikusiimwa omu kwikiriza.
Kwonka tibaribaasa kurengaho, ahakuba obushema bwabo buryareebwa butunu abantu boona, nk'obw'abashaija abo bombi oku bumanyirwe.
Kwonka iwe, okakuratira enyegyesa yangye, emitwarize yangye, eki ndikugyenderera, okwikiriza kwangye, okugumisiriza kwangye, okukunda kwangye, okuhamya kwangye,
n'okuhiigwa n'obusaasi ebyambaireho omuri Antiokia na Ikonio na Lusitura; okuhiigwa kwo nkahiigwa munonga, naagumisiriza; kwonka Mukama waitu yaabinkizamu byona.
Kandi buzima abamaririire kumara ebiro by'amagara gaabo byona omuri Yesu nibatiina Ruhanga baryahiigwa.
Kwonka abantu babi, abarikwegira oku batari, baryayeyongyera kuba babi nibabeihabeiha, kandi nabo nibabeihwabeihwa.
Kwonka iwe, ogumizemu omu bi waayegire okamanyira kimwe, ahakuba noomanya abaabikwegyeise,
kandi noijuka ngu okuruga omu buto bwawe okamanya Ebyahandiikirwe ebirikwera ebirikubaasa kukuhaisa obwengye bw'okukuhabura omuhanda gw'okujunwa ahabw'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
Ebyahandiikirwe byona, ebihandiikisiibwe Omwoyo wa Ruhanga, biine omugasho gw'okwegyesa omuntu, n'okumuhana, n'okumuhabura, n'okumutendeka omu by'okuhikiirira,
ngu omuntu wa Ruhanga abone kuba ohikire buzima, oine byona ebishemereire omurimo gwona omurungi.
ogume obuurire ekigambo kya Ruhanga, ogambe n'obweziriki omu bunaku oburagiirwe n'butaragiirwe, ohane, oteise, oyehanangirize n'okugumisiriza kandi n'okwegyesa.
Ahakuba ebiro biryaija, obu abantu baryanga kuhurira enyegyesa y'amazima; kwonka ahabw'okugira amatu agarikubarya baryayekanyisiza abeegyesa abarikwegyesa nk'okwetenga kwabo oku kuri,
beigare amatu ngu batahurira amazima, bahabe, bakuratire ebiteekyerezo by'ebigunjano.
Kwonka iwe, oyerinde omuri byona, ogumisiririze obusaasi, okore omurimo gw'omubuurizi w'engiri, ohikize kimwe okuheereza kwawe.
Ndwaine okurwana okurungi, mperize orugyendo rwangye, ndinzire okwikiriza.
Ekitsigaire mbiikiirwe ekirunga ky'okuhikiirira, eki Mukama omucwi w'emanja ohikiriire arimpa aha kiro ekyo, kandi tiinye nyenka, kureka na boona abarikukunda okugaruka kwe.
Oteereho, nk'oku orikubaasa, kwija kundeeba juba;
ahakuba Deema, ahabw'okukunda eby'ensi eby'ebiro ebi, akantsigaho, yaataaha Tesalonika; Kreskeene yaaza Galatia, na Tito yaaza Dalumatia.
Luka wenka niwe ntsigaire nawe. Reeba Mako, mwijane; ahakuba nangasira munonga omu kuheereza.
Tukiko nkamutuma Efeso.
Omu kwija ondeetere eky'okwefubika eki naatsigire Troa owa Kaapo, n'ebitabo, kandi okukira munonga oreete eby'empu.
Alegizanda omuheesi w'emiringa akankora kubi munonga; Mukama waitu aryamwihura ebi yaakozire.
Naiwe omwerinde; ahakuba akarwanisa munonga ebigambo byaitu.
Omu kwetonganira kwangye okw'okubanza tihaine waanyemereireho, boona bakantsigaho. Ninshaba ngu batarikiturwa.
Kwonka Mukama waitu akanyemerera haihi, yangumya, ngu mbone kugambira kimwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga, Abanyamahanga boona bakihurire. Kandi nkashahurwa omu kanwa k'entare.
Mukama waitu aryaguma ankize omu kabi koon, anjune okuhitsya obu nditaaha omu bukama bwe bw'omu iguru. Aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona. Amiina.
Ondamukize Priska na Akula kandi n'ab'omu ka ya Onesifooro.
Erasto akaguma Korinso; kandi Trofimo nkamutsiga Mileeto arwaire.
Oteho omutima munonga, oije ebiro by'embeho bitakahikire. Yubulo, Pudenti, Liino, Kulaudio n'ab'eishe-emwe boona baabaramutsya.
Mukama agume n'omwoyo gwawe. Embabazi zibe naimwe.
Nyowe Paulo, omuhuuku wa Ruhanga kandi entumwa ya Yesu Kristo, owaatumirwe aha baatooraimwe Ruhanga ngu beeyongyere omu kwikiriza n'okumanya amazima agarimu okutiina Ruhanga,
baine amatsiko g'amagara agatahwaho, agu Ruhana otabaasa kubeiha yaaraganiise iranaira;
kandi obunaku obu yaatooraine ku bwahikire, yaayoreka ekigambo kye omu butumwa obu naakwatsiibwe nka Ruhanga Omujuni waitu oku yandagiire;
naakuhandiikira, Tito mwana wangye buzima omu kwikiriza oku tukwataniise; ninkwendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona na Kristo Yesu Omujuni waitu.
Eki naakutsigiire Kureeta n'okushemeza ebyatsigariire kandi n'okutaho abakuru omuri tauni zoona, nk'oku naakuragiire;
omuntu weena omuribo abe otaine ki arikugaywaho, oine omukazi omwe, kandi oine abaana abarikwikiriza, abatarikwetwa birare nari abagomi.

Ahakuba omureeberezi ashemereire kutagira ki arikugaywaho, nk'omubiiki wa Ruhanga; kandi tashemereire kuba otarikuteisibwa nari orikurahuka kubiihirwa nari omusinzi nari omuteezi w'abantu nari oine omururu gw'enshaagi,
kureka abe orikukunira abagyenyi, orikukunda oburungi, oine omutima murungi, ohikiriire, orikwera, omwerinzi,
orikuhamira aha kigambo ky'okwesigwa ekiri nk'okwegyesa kwaitu oku kuri, abone kushobororera abantu enyegyesa y'amazima, n'okusinga abarikugihakanisa.
Ahakuba hariho abagomi baingi, abagamba busha kandi engobya, okukira munonga ab'omu kigombe ky'abashazirwe;
abo bashemereire kuzibirwa kugamba; n'abantu abarikusheenya amaka, nibeegyesa ebitashemeire ahabw'okwetungira enshaagi.
Omwe omuribo, nabi waabo, akagira ati: Aba Kureete obutoosha bashangwa baba abanyabishuba, enyamaishwa mbi, abeeremwa, endiirakukinduka.
Okuhamya oku n'okw'amazima. N'ahabw'ekyo obahane n'amaani, babone kuhamira omu kwikiriza;
omu mwanya gw'okweta aha biteekyerezo by'ebigunjano by'Abayudaaya n'ebiragiro by'abantu abarikuteishuka bakaruga omu mazima.
Aha bashemeire byona bishemeire, kwonka aha basiisikaire n'abatarikwikiriza tihariho kishemeire; ahakuba obwengye bwabo n'emitima yaabo bisiisikaire.
Beegamba ku barikumanya Ruhanga, kwonka omu micwe yaabo bamwehakana; n'ab'okunugwa, entahurira, kandi abatarikugasha mu murimo gwona omurungi.
ogambire abagurusi barekye kusinda, babe abeerinzi, abaine omutima ogurikweyangisa, kandi babe abahikire omu kwikiriza n'omu kukunda kandi n'omu kugumisiriza;
abakaikuru nabo batwaze nk'oku kishemereire abarikwera, abatarikubeiherera bandi, abatari bahuuku b'ebirikusinza; beegyese ebirungi,
babone kutendeka abakazi bato kukunda baibabo n'abaana baabo,
bagire omutima murungi, beerinde obushambani, bakore emirimo yaabo omu maka, bagire embabazi, boorobere baibabo, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kirekye kujumwa;
kandi oragiire abatsigazi nabo bagire omutima ogurikweyangisa;
naiwe omuri byona oyeyorekye nk'eky'okureeberaho omu kukora gye; omu kwegyesa kwawe oyeyorekye ku otari ndyarya, kureka ku ori omwerinzi,
orikugamba ebigambo by'amazima ebitarikugaywa, haza ogwo orikuturwanisa akwatwe enshoni ahabw'okubura ekibi ky'okutwomesereza.
Gambira abahuuku boorobere bakama baabo, babone kusiimwa omuri byona; barekye kwetomboita,
nari okwiba; kureka beeyorekye bari abeesigwa buzima, babone kusiimisa enyegyesa ya Ruhanga Omujuni waitu omuri byona.
Ahakuba embabazi za Ruhanga zireebekire nizireetera abantu boona okujunwa,
nizituhabura kwanga okutatiina Ruhanga n'okwetenga eby'ensi, ngu tubone kugumaho omu busingye obu obwa hati, nitwerinda, turi abahikiriire, abarikutiina Ruhanga,
tutegyereize eki twineho amatsiko agarimu omugisha, nikwo kworekwa kw'ekitiinisa okwa Ruhanga waitu, Yesu Kristo,
owaayehaireyo ahabwaitu, kutucungura omu bugomi bwona, n'okutweza ahabwe, ngu tubone kuba eihanga rye eritoorainwe, eririkwezirikira kukora emirimo emirungi.
Ebyo obe nibyo waagamba, obibahabure, obahane n'obushoboorozi bwingi. Hatagira omuntu weena owaakugaya.
okutagira ou bagambaho kubi, okutatongana kureka okutwaza gye, nibooreka obucureezi bwingi aha bantu boona.

Ahakuba naitwe ira tukaba turi abashema, entahurira, abahabisiibwe, abahuuku b'okwetenga okubi n'okweshemeza okw'emiringo mingi, nitumarira omwanya gwaitu omu itima n'eihari, nitwangwa, kandi nitwangana.
Kwonka embabazi za Ruhanga Omujuni waitu n'okukunda oku yaakunzire abantu ku byareebekire,
yaatujuna, ti habw'eby'okuhikiirira ebi twakozire, kureka ahabw'okusaasira kwe, akatujunisa okwogibwa okw'okuzaarwa obwa kabiri n'okuhindurwa abasya omu Mwoyo Orikwera,
ou yaatushukireho atarikubariirira, naamurabya omuri Yesu Kristo Omujuni waitu,
ngu tubone kwihwaho orubanja ahabw'embabazi ze, tuhindukye abahunguzi abaine amatsiko g'amagara agatahwaho.

Ekigambo eki n'eky'okwesigwa; kandi niinyenda ngu ebyo obihamye otarikubanganisa, abaikiriize Ruhanga babone kuguma nibata omutima aha kukora ebirungi. Ebigambo ebi ni birungi, kandi nibigasira abantu.
Kwonka oyetantare ebibuuzo by'obushema n'eby'okutondoora obukomooko bwa baishenkurubo n'entongane n'okuhakana aha Biragiro; ahakuba ebyo tibiine mugasho kandi n'ebya busha.
Orikureeta okwecwamu ebicweka omu kanisa, ku orimuteisa rimwe nari kabiri, yaayanga, omurekye;
noomanya ku omuntu nk'ogwo ahabire, kandi ku ari enkozi y'ebibi, orikwesingisa orubanja.
Kandi oteereho n'okushendekyereza Zeena, omwegyesa w'Ebiragiro, na Apolo; oreebe ngu tibaine ki babuzire.
Kandi abantu baitu b'okwo beegye kuguma nibakora ebirungi, babone kuhwera abashemereire kuhwerwa buzima, barekye kuba abatarikwana byana.
Boona abari hamwe naanye baakuramutsya. Naiwe ondamukize abarikutukunda omu kwikiriza.
Embabazi zigume naimwe mwena.
Nyowe Paulo, embohe ahabwa Kristo Yesu na Timoseo ow'eishe-emwe, twakuhandiikira, iwe Filemooni omukozi mugyenzi waitu orikukundwa,
na Apofia munyaanyaitwe, na Arakipo ou tukwataniise orugamba, n'ekanisa ey'omu nju yaawe,
nitubendeza embabazi n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Obutoosha nsiima Ruhanga wangye, ku nkwijuka omu kushaba kwangye,
ahabw'okuhurira okukunda kwawe oku oine aha barikwera boona, n'okwikiriza oku oine ahari Mukama waitu Yesu,
kandi nkushabira ngu okukwatanisa n'abandi eby'okwikiriza kwawe kwongyere omuribo okusohborokyerwa ebirungi byona ebi twine omuri Kristo.
Ow'eishe-emwe, okukunda kwawe kukanshemeza munonga, kwangarura omutima omunda, ahabw'okuba okaruhuura emitima y'abarikwera.
N'ahabw'ekyo, n'obu ndaabe nyine obumanzi bwingi omuri Kristo kukuragiira kukora ekihikire,
kwonka ahabwa rukundo naihamu kukweshengyereza, nyowe Paulo omugurusi kandi hati embohe ahabwa Kristo Yesu.
Ninkweshengyereza ahabw'omwana wangye, Onesimo, ou naazaariire omu kihome.
Ira akaba atakwiniire mugasho, kwonka hati n'ow'omugasho buzima ahariiwe n'ahariinye.
Naamukugarurira, nk'owaakugarurira orura rwangye buzima.
Nkaayenzire kuguma nawe, ngu ampeereze omu mwanya gwawe omu kubohwa kwangye ahabw'engiri;
kwonka tiinyenzire kukora kintu kyona otaanyikiriize, ngu ekirungi kyawe kirekye kuba eki ogyemirwe, kureka eki oyekundiire.
Shana akaaba yaakurugireho omwanya mukye, ngu abone kugaruka kuguma naiwe ebiro byona,
atakiri muhuuku kureka orikukira omuhuuku, ow'eishe-emwe orikukundwa na buzima ahariinye, kwonka okukira munonga ahariiwe, omu by'obuntu n'omu bya Mukama.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku oraabe noonyeta mugyenzi waawe, omwakiire nk'oku waakuunyakiire.
Kandi ku araabe yaakushaagiize, nari aine eibanja ryawe, obe niinye waihuza.
Nyowe, Paulo, niinye naahandiika ebi n'omukono gwangye, nti, Ndyariihura; ndekye kusiiba ninkugambira nti, naiwe oine eibanja ryangye; eibanja ryangye eryo n'amagara gaawe.
Eego Ow'eishe-emwe, ka ntungye okushemererwa ahariiwe omuri Mukama. Oruhuure omutima gwangye omuri Kristo.
Naakuhandiikira nyesigire okworoba kwawe, kandi nimmanya ngu nangwa oryakora ebirikukira ebi naagamba.
Kandi ekindi onteguurire aha'okuraara, ahabw'okuba nyine amatsiko ngu nimwija kundeeba ahabw'okushaba kwanyu.
kandi na Mako, Aristariiko, Deema na Luka, abakozi bagyenzi bangye.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume n'emyoyo yaanyu.
Ira Ruhanga akatuma baanabi ahari baatatenkuriitwe kubagambira omu miringo mingi etari emwe;
kwonka omu biro ebi ebya bwanyima itwe akatutumaho Omwana we kuba niwe yaatugambira, ou yaataireho kuba omuhunguzi w'ebintu byona, kandi ou yaahangiise ensi.

Ogwo niwe kumurinkana kw'ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga kandi ekishushani kye buzima, kandi niwe ahigika byona n'ekigambo kye eky'obushoboorozi. Ku yaaherize kuhikiiriza eky'okwozyaho ebibi, yaashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo orw'Ow'ekitiinisa omu iguru,
yaakiza atyo baamaraika obukuru, nk'oku eiziina eri yaatungire ryahitsire agaabo.
Ori Omwana wangye,
Eri izooba naakuzaara? Nari ahandi ati:
Nyowe ndyamubeera Omuzaire,
Nawe ambeere Omwana?
Kandi ahandi, ku yaareetsire omwana w'omujigaijo omu nsi, yaagira ati: Baamaraika boona aba Ruhanga bamuramye.
Ohindura baamaraika be emiyaga,
N'abaheereza be endimi z'omuriro.
Ekitebe kyawe ky'obukama, ai Ruhanga, n'eky'ebiro n'ebiro,
Enkoni yaawe y'obukama n'ey'okuhikiirira.
Okakunda okuhikiirira, waayanga obugomi;
Nikyo Ruhanga, Ruhanga waawe, yaakushukiireho amajuta
G'okushemererwa okukira bagyenzi baawe.
Iwe, Mukama, omu kutandika okataho omusingi gw'ensi,
N'eiguru rikahangwa emikono yaawe;
Ebyo biryahwaho, kwonka Iwe oryagumaho;
Ebyo byona biryakura nk'ekijwaro;
Kandi oryabizinga nk'omunagiro,
Bihindurwe okundi;
Kwonka Iwe tohinduka,
N'emyaka yaawe terihwaho.
Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
Okuhitsya obu ndihindura abazigu baawe
Akatebe k'ebigyere byawe?
Baamaraika boona t'emyoyo erikuheereza, etumwa kukora omurimo gw'okuhwera abarihungura okujunwa?
Nikyo tushemerereire kuta omutima aha bi twahuriire, ngu tutahaba tukabirugaho.
Mbwenu ekigambo ekyagambirwe baamaraika, ku kiraabe kyahamire, kandi n'okushiisha kwona n'okutahurira kwona ku biraabe byahairwe ekifubiro ekibishemereire,
itwe turyakira tuta, ku turiba tuteetaire ha kujunwa okukuru okurikwingana kuti? Okujunwa okwo kukabanza kugambwa Mukama, twakuhamizibwa abaamuhuriire;
kandi na Ruhanga yaakuhamya n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'eby'amahano by'emiringo mingi n'ebiconco by'Omwoyo Orikwera, ebi Ruhanga yaagabire nk'oku yaasiimire.
Ahakuba baamaraika ti bo Ruhanga yaahaire kutegyeka ensi eribaho, ei turikugambaho.
Kandi hariho owaahamize ahandi ati:
Omuntu ni kintu ki, Iwe kumwijuka,
Nari Omwana w'omuntu, Iwe kumwetaho?
Omu mwanya mukye waamugarura ahansi okukira baamaraika,
Waamujweka ekirunga ky'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa,
Waamutegyekyesa emirimo y'emikono yaawe,
Ruhanga omu kumugomoorera byona taine ki yaatsigire kitari mu butegyeki bwe. Mbwenu hati titurikureeba bintu byona bimugomookyeire.

Kureka owaagarwirwe ahansi omwanya mukye okukira baamaraika, niwe Yesu, nitumureeba ajwekirwe ekirunga ky'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa ahabw'okwemera obusaasi bw'okufa, ngu aroze aha kufa omu mwanya gw'abantu boona ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga.

Ahakuba Ruhanga, Omuhangi wa byona, ou ebintu byona byahangiirwe, ku yaayenzire kutaasya abaana baingi omu kitiinisa, kikamushemerera kuhindura Omwebembezi w'okujunwa kwabo kuba ohikire ahabw'obusaasi.
Ahakuba Orikweza n'abarikwezibwa boona bakakomooka ahari Omwe. Nikyo atakwatirwa nshoni kubeeta beene Ishe,
naagira ati:
Ndyagamba eiziina ryawe omuri beene Tata,
Ndyayeshongora eby'okukuhimbisa omu kanisa.
kandi ajune boona abatuura omu buhuuku ebiro byona eby'amagara gaabo ahabw'okutiina okufa.
Ahakuba nitumanyira kimwe ngu baamaraika tibo ahwera, kureka baijukuru ba Abrahamu.
N'ahabw'ekyo kikamushemerera kushushanisibwa na beene Ishe omuri byona, ngu abone kuba Omunyamurwa omukuru ow'embabazi kandi ow'ekwesigwa omu murimo gwa Ruhanga, ahongyerere ebibi by'abantu;
ahabw'okuba We, nk'oku yaabonabonesiibwe atyo, kandi akoohibwa, naabaasa kuhwera abarikwohibwa.
Akaba ari owmesigwa ahari Ogwo owaamutooraine, nk'oku Musa yaabaire ari omwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga;
kwonka Yesu ogwo akateekateekwaho ku ashemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa ekirikukira ekya Musa, nk'omwombeki w'enju oku agira ekitiinisa okukira egyo nju.
(Ahakuba enju yoona eyombekwa omuntu nanka, kwonka Omwombeki w'ebinti byona ni Ruhanga.)
Buzima kwo Musa akaba ari omwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga yoona, kwonka shi nk'omugaragwa ow'okuhamya ebyabaire nibiija kugambwa bwanyima;

kwonka Kristo akaba ari omwesigwa orikutegyeka enju ya Ruhanga nk'omwana we. Kandi enju ye niitwe, ku turaabe nitugumiza kimwe obumanzi bwaitu n'okwesiimira ebi twineho amatsiko tuhamire okuhitsya aha muheru.
Eri izooba, ku muraahurire eiraka rye,
aha kro eky'okugyezibwa omu ihamba,
Baashwenkuriimwe ei bantegyeire nibangyeza,
Bakamara emyaka makumi ana nibareeba emirimo yangye.
Nikyo naagwerirwe kubi ab'obusingye obwo,
Ningira nti: Emitima yaabo ehaba obutoosha;
Kandi tibakamanyire mihanda yangye.
Tibaritaaha mu buruhuukiro bwangye.
B'eishe-emwe, mwerinde, omuntu weena omuriimwe atagira omutima mubi ogutarikwikiriza, gukamuhabya kuruga ahari Ruhanga ohuriire.
Kureka muhaburane obutoosha, obunaku butakarengire; hatagira n'omwe omuriimwe owaagangaazibwa obugobya bw'ekibi.
Ahakuba tuhindukire abakwataniise omuri Kristo, ku turaabe nitugumiza kimwe ebi twabandize kwikiriza tutarikubanganisa okuhitsya aha muheru;
nk'oku kyagambirwe ngu: Eri izooba ku muraahurire eiraka rye, mutagangaaza emitima yaanyu, nk'oku mwagigangaize omu bunaku obu mwangomeiremu.
Nimugira ngu ni baahi abaahuriire, haza bakagoma? T'abo abaarugire Misri, beebembeirwe Musa?
Kandi ni baahi abaamazire emyaka makumi ana nibamugwisa kubi? T'abo abaasiisire, abu emitumbi yaabo yaagwire omu ihamba?
Kandi ni baahi abu yaarahiriire okutataaha mu buruhuukiro bwe? T'abo abatarahuriire?
N'ahabw'ekyo nitureeba ngu bakaremwa kutaahamu ahabw'okutaikiriza.
N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku endagaano y'okutaaha omu buruhuukiro bwe ekiriho, ka tutiine, omuntu weena omuriimwe atashusha nk'owaaremwa kubuhikaho.
Ahakuba buzima naitwe tukagambirwa ebigambo birungi nka bo, kwonka ekigambo eki baahuriire tikirabagasiire, ahabw'okuba tikirashangire kwikiriza omuribo.

Mumanye ngu itwe abaikiriize tutaaha omu buruhuukiro obwo, nk'oku yaagizire ati: Nikyo naagiriire ekiniga nkarahira nti, Tibaritaaha mu buruhuukiro bwangye; n'obu emirimo ye eraabe yaahweire, okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi.
Ahakuba hariho ahandi ahu yaagambire aha by'ekiro kya mushanju ati: Ruhanga akahuumura emirimo ye yoona aha kiro kya mushanju.
Kandi hoona omu mwanya ogwo yaagira ati: Tibaritaaha mu buruhuukiro bwangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku hakiriho bamwe ab'okubutaahamu, kandi abaagambiirwe ira obutumwa burungi baaremirwe kubutaahamu ahabw'okutahurira,

nikyo Ruhanga yaateereireho ekindi kiro, eki yaayetsire Eri izooba, naakigambira omuri Daudi bwanyima y'ebiro bingi, (nk'oku kyaheza kugambwa eruguru,) ati: Eri izooba ku muraahurire eiraka rye, mutagangaaza emitima yaanyu.
Ahakuba kuri noogira ngu Yoshua akabaha oburuhuukiro, Ruhanga takugambire ha kiro ekindi bwanyima.
N'ahabw'ekyo hakiriho sabato y'okuhuumuriraho ebiikiirwe abantu ba Ruhanga;
ahakuba omuntu weena otaahire omu buruhuukiro bwa Ruhanga, biri ahuumwire emirimo ye, nk'oku Ruhanga yaahuumwire eye.
N'ahabw'ekyo ka twezirikye kutaaha omu buruhuukiro obwo, hatagira omuntu weena owaagwisibwa okutahurira okw'omuringo nk'ogwo.

Ahakuba ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiine amagara n'amaani, kiine obwogi bwingi okukira rurara yoona ey'amoogi abiri, nikicumita kihika ahu kitaanisiza amagara n'omwoyo, ngingo n'omushokooro, kandi kirahuka kucaaka ebi omuntu arikuteekateeka n'ebi amaririire omu mutima gwe kukora.
Kandi omu maisho ge tihariho kihangirwe ekisherekirwe; kureka ebintu byona bishuurwirwe nibireebwa butunu omu maisho g'Ogwo oshoboorora ebyaitu.
ahakuba titwine munyamurwa omukuru otarikubaasa kusaasira hamwe naitwe omu bweremwa bwaitu, kureka twine owaayohiibwe omu miringo yoona nkaitwe, kwonka We atashiishe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ka twirire haihi n'ekitebe ky'embabazi tutaine bwoba, tubone kuheebwa okusaasirwa, n'okugirirwa embabazi z'okutuhwera ahu turaazeetengyere hoona.
Nimumanya ngu omunyamurwa omukuru weena, otoorainwe omu bantu, aba atairweho kukora ebya Ruhanga ahabw'abantu, okuhonga empongano n'okutamba ebitambo ahabw'ebibi.
Naabaasa kutwaza gye abataine bwengye n'abahabire, ahabw'okuba nawe ayehinguririziibwe obweremwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo ashemereire kwetambirira ebitambo ahabw'ebibi bye, nk'oku abitambirira abandi.
Kandi tihariho oyeha obukuru obwo, kureka yaaba ayetsirwe Ruhanga, nk'oku Arooni yaayetsirwe.
Na mbwenu Kristo nawe tareekurize ngu aheebwe obunyamurwa obukuru, kureka akabuteebwaho Ogwo owaamugizire ati:
Ori Omwana wangye,
Eri izooba naakuzaara;
Ori Omunyamurwa w'ebiro byona,
Omu muringo gwa Melikizedeki.
n'obu araabe yaabaire ari Omwana, akeega kworoba omu bi yaabonabonesiibwemu.
Kandi ku yaaherize kuhikiirizibwa, yaahinduka obukomooko bw'okujunwa okutahwaho ahari boona abamworobera,
ou Ruhanga yaayetsire Omunyamurwa omukuru omu muringo gwa Melikizedeki.
Ogwo twine bingi by'okumugambaho, kandi ebigumire eishoborora, ahakuba muhindukire abarikuhurira kubi.

N'obu muraabe mwabaire mushemereire kuba abeegyesa ahabw'okumara omwanya muhango nimwega, kwonka nimwetenga omuntu w'okugaruka kubeegyesa eby'okubandizaho ebyorobi omu byagambirwe Ruhanga. Kandi muhindukire abarikwetenga amate, bitari by'okurya ebigumire.
Mumanye ngu omuntu weena otungwa amate aba atakamanyiire kukoresa kigambo ky'okuhikiirira, ahakuba n'omwana;
kureka eby'okurya ebigumire bishemereire abakuru, abu emitima yaabo eherize kumanyiira kutaanisa ekirungi n'ekibi.
n'okwegyesa eby'okubatiza n'eby'okutaho engaro n'eby'okuzooka kw'abafu n'orubanja orwe'ebiro n'ebiro.
Kandi ekyo turyakikora, Ruhanga ku arisiima.
Mumanye ngu abaabaire bajwereirwe omushana, bakaroza aha kiconco eky'omu iguru, bakahinduka abakwataniise omu Mwoyo Orikwera,
kandi bakaroza aha burungi bw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'aha maani ag'obusingye oburiija,
abo, ku bagwa baabirugamu, kiba kitakibaasika kubagarura bwa kabiri omu kweteisa, ahabw'okuba baba bagarukire kwebambira Omwana wa Ruhanga aha musharaba, n'okumukwatsa enshoni butunu.
Eitaka ku rihaaga enjura erigwireho kaingi, ryamera emboga ezishemereire abu rihingiirwe, Ruhanga ariha omugisha;
kwonka ku rimera amahwa n'amatojo, riba ritakiine mugasho, riri haihi n'okukyeenwa; n'omuheru gwaryo kuri okwokibwa.
Kwonka, abarikukundwa, n'obu turaabe twagamba tutyo, nituteekateeka tutarikubanganisa ngu ebyanyu biri gye okukira ebyabo, kandi birimu okujunwa.
Ahakuba Ruhanga t'otahikiriire kwebwa emirimo yaanyu n'okukunda oku mwayorekire aha iziina rye, obu mwaheereza abarikwera, abu mukirikuheereza na hati.
Naitwe nitwetenga ngu omuntu weena omuriimwe ayorekye obweziriki, abone kugira amatsiko atarikubanganisa okuhitsya aha muheru;
murekye kuba abarikweganda, kureka mutooreze abo abahungura ebyaraganisiibwe ahabw'okwikiriza n'okugumisiriza.
naagira ati: Buzima okukuha ndyakuha omugisha, kandi n'okukukanyisa ndyakukanyisa.
Nikwo Abrahamu yaahairwe atyo eki yaaraganisiibwe, ku yaaherize kugumisiriza obutaruha.
Nimumanya ngu abantu barahira orikubakira, kandi omu mpaka zaabo zoona ekizimara n'okurahira.
N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga ku yaayenzire kworekyera kimwe abahunguzi b'ebi yaaraganiise, ku enaama ye etahinduka, yaagihamya n'okurahira;
ngu ebintu bibiri ebitabaasa kuhinduka, ebi Ruhanga atabaasa kubeiheramu, bigumye emitima yaitu buzima, itwe abaamuhungiireho, tubone kuhamya eki twiineho amatsiko ekyatairwe omu maisho gaitu.
Amatsiko aga tugaine nk'ekitsibo ky'amagara, n'amatsiko agahamire kandi agatarikunyiganyigibwa, agataaha Aharikwera munonga omunda y'omukingo,
ahu Yesu yaabandize kuza ahabwaitu obu yaahinduka Omunyamurwa omukuru ow'ebiro byona omu muringo gwa Melikezedeki.

kandi niwe Abrahamu yaahaire kimwe kya ikumi ekya byona. Melikizedeki ogwo okubanza n'omugabe w'okuhiikirira, nk'eiziina rye oku ririkushoboororwa, ekya kabiri n'omugabe wa Salemu, ekirikushoboororwa ngu omugabe w'obusingye.
Taine ishe, taine nyina, n'obu baakuba baishenkuru; taine butandikiro bw'amagara ge, kandi taine bugarukiro, kureka naashushanisibwa nk'Omwana wa Ruhanga, atuura ari omunyamurwa ebiro byona.
Muteekateekye aha muntu ogwo, mureebe ku ari mukuru munonga, ou Abrahamu tatenkuriitwe yaahaire kimwe kya ikumi eky'eminyago erikukira oburungi.
Nimumanya ku Ebiragiro biragiira ab'omuri baijukuru ba Leevi, abaheebwa obunyamurwa, kutwara kimwe kya ikumi ky'eby'abantu beene waabo, n'obu baraabe bakomookire ahari Abrahamu;
kwonka omushaija ogwo, otari w'omu ruganda rwabo, katoijerwa Abrahamu kimwe kya ikumi, yaashabira omugisha ogwo owaabaire araganisiibwe.
Tihariho kubanganisa ku omuto niwe ashabirwa omukuru omugisha.
Kandi nk'oku biri hati, kimwe kya ikumi kiheebwa abantu abafa; kwonka omu bunaku obwo kikaheebwa ogwo orikuhamibwa ku ariho.
Nangwa nitubaasa kugamba ngu na Leevi orikuheebwa kimwe kya ikumi akabitoijera omuri Abrahmu ishenkuru;
ahakuba akaba akiri omunda ye, obu Melikizedeki yaamubugana.

Kuri noogira ngu okuhikiirizibwa kukatungwa ahabw'obunyamurwa bw'ekileevi, (ahakuba omu butegyek obwo nimwo abantu baaheereirwe Ebiragiro) n'enki ekyakwetengyeise ondiijo munyamurwa kwimuka ow'omuringo gwa Melikizedeki, ateetsirwe omu muringo gwa Arooni?
Ahakuba, ku haraabe hariho okuhinduka omu bunyamurwa, hashemereire kubaho okuhinduka n'omu Biragiro.
Kwonka Ogwo owaagambirweho ebyo n'ow'omu ruganda orundi, orutakarugwamuga muntu w'okuheereza aha itambiro.
Ahakuba nikimanywa ngu Mukama waitu akakomooka omuri Yuda; kandi oruganda orwo Musa tararugambireho by'obunyamurwa.
Kandi ekyo kikakira kumanywa gye, obu haimuka ondiijo munyamurwa orikushusha Melikizedeki,
otaratooraniirwe bunaymurwa nk'ekiragiro ky'abantu nyabuntu oku kiragiira, kureka owaabuhairwe ahabw'okugira amaani g'amagara agatarikuhwerekyerezibwa.
Ahakuba bakamuhamya bati:
Ori omunyamurwa w'ebiro byona
omu muringo gwa Melekizedeki.
Ahakuba ekiragiro eky'okubanza kikaihwaho ahabw'okutagira maani n'okubura omugasho;
(mumanye ngu ekiragiro tikiine ki kyahikize buzima), haagarurwaho amatsiko agarikukira oburungi, agarikutwiriza haihi na Ruhanga.
Kandi ekyo tikirabaireho hatari ndahiro.
Abalevi bo bakaheebwa obunyamurwa, hatariho ndahiro; kwonka Owaabuhaire Ogwo akarahira, yaamugira ati:
Mukama akarahira, kandi taryefuuza
Yaagira ati: Ori omunyamurwa ow'ebiro byona.
Kandi abanyamurwa aba ira bakaba bakuratana baingi, ahakuba rufu ekaba ebazibira kugumaho;
kwonka Ogwo, ahabw'okugumaho ebiro byona, aguma ari omunyamurwa otarikurugaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo naabaasa kujunira kimwe abairirira Ruhanga nibaraba omuriwe, ahakuba atuura obutoosha bwona naabeeshengyerereza.
Kikaba kihikire itwe kugira omunyamurwa omukuru nk'Ogwo, orikwera, otaine ki arikuganywa, otaine kamogo, otaanisiibwe n'abasiisi, owaakuziibwe okuba ahaiguru munonga harikweshumba eiguru ryona.

Tarikushusha banyamurwa abakuru abandi, abeetenga kutamba ebitambo obutoosha, okubanza ahabw'ebibi byabo, bwanyima ahabw'ebibi by'abandi. Ahakuba ekyo We akakikora rimwe yaaheza, obu yaayehayo kuba ekitambo.
Mumanye ngu Ebiragiro bikataho abantu b'amaani makye kuba abanyamurwa abakuru; kwonka ekigambo ky'egyo ndahiro, kikataho Omwana wa Ruhanga owaahikiririziibwe kimwe okuhitsya ebiro byona.
orikuheerereza Aharikwera omu Ihema ery'amazima, eritarateirwe bantu, kureka eryateirwe Mukama.
Nimumanya ngu omunyamurwa omukuru weena ateebwaho okuhonga empongano n'okutamba ebitambo; n'ahabw'ekyo nawe ashemereiree kugira eky'okuhonga.
Kuri yaabaire ari omu nsi, takubaire munyamurwa na kakye, ahakuba hariho abanyamurwa abashangwa bahonga empongano, nk'oku kiragiirwa.

Kandi ebyo ebi bakora n'enshusha kandi n'ebishushani by'eby'omu iguru; ahakuba Musa ku yaabaire naayenda kuteera eihema, akahaburwa Ruhanga owaamugizire ati: Oteho omutima, okore byona, noobishushanisa nk'ebi waareebire aha rushozi.
Kwonka hati Kristo ahairwe obuheereza oburikukira obwa ira oburungi, ahabw'okuba We n'omuteerani w'endagaano erikukira oburungi, ahakuba neehamibwa ebyaraganisiibwe ebirikukira ebya ira.
Endagaano ey'okubanza kuri yaabaire etaine kishobiremu, tihaakwetengirwe ndiijo;
ahakuba Mukama akabahana naagira ati:
Reeba, ebiro biryaija, nikwo Mukama arikugira,
Obu ndiragaana endagaano nsya
N'ab'enju ya Israeli n'eya Yuda,
Aha kiro eki naabakwatiire aha mukono
Kubaiha omu nsi ya Misri;
Ahakuba tibaragumire mu ndagaano yangye.
Nikyo naarekyeire kubataho omutima, nikwo Mukama arikugira.
Kwonka egi niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana n'enju ya Israeli
Bwanyima y'ebiro ebyo, nikwo Mukama arikugira;
Ndyata ebiragiro byangye omu bwengye bwabo,
Kandi aha mitima yaabo niho ndibihandiika;
Nyowe ndyaba Ruhanga waabo,
Nabo babe abantu bangye.
Kandi tibaryegyesana buri muntu na mutaahi we,
Nari shi omuntu weena na mwene ishe bati: Manya Mukama!
Ahakuba boona baryammanya
Okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru;
Ahabw'okuba ndyabasaasira eby'okushiisha byabo,
N'ebibi byabo tindibiijuka bundi.
Nimumanya ngu endagaano ey'okubanza ekaba eine emigyenzo eyaaragiirwe ey'okuramya Ruhanga, n'omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omu nsi egi;
ahakuba hakaba hariho Eihema eryakozirwe; omu mwanya gw'okubandizaho omuriryo hakaba harimu etabaaza n'emeeza n'emigaati y'okumurikwe; aho niho haabaire heetwa Aharikwera.
Kandi omunda y'omukingo ogwa kabiri hakaba heebwa Aharikwera munonga,

harimu eky'okwotereraho obubaane ekiheesirwe omu zaabu, n'eshanduukye y'endagaano eshwekirwe ezaabu embaju zoona, eyaabaire erimu orwabya rw'ezaabu orwabiare rubiikirwemu emaanu, n'enkoni ya Arooni eyaatookire, kandi n'ebishate by'amabaare g'endagaano;
ahaiguru yaayo hakaba hariho Baakerubi b'ekitiinisa basangiire ekitebe ky'okusaasira. Ebyo titurikubaasa kubitondoora buri kimwe.
Ku baaherize kutebeekanisa ebyo byona, okuruga aho abanyamurwa baguma nibataaha omu mwanya ogw'okubanza kuhikiiriza emirimo y'okuheereza;
kwonka omu mwanya ogwa kabiri hakaba hazamu omunyamurwa omukuru wenka rimwe omu mwaka, akaba atazayo ataine shagama y'okwetambirira n'okutambirira ebibi by'abantu ebi baakoreire omu butamanya,
Omwoyo Orikwera naamanyisa atyo, ngu omuhanda gw'okutaaha omu mwanya ogurikwera munonga tigurkabonekire, eihema ery'okubanza rikiriho, (eririkutushobororera eby'obusingye obu.)
N'omu biro ebyo bakaba bahonga empongano, batamba n'ebitambo ebitarikubaasa kushemeza buzima mutima gw'ogwo orikuramya Ruhanga,
kureka bikwata aha by'okurya n'eby'okunywa n'eby'okwoga okw'emiringo etari emwe, niyo migyenzo eyaatairweho ahabw'omubiri okuhitsya aha biro by'okuhindurwa obusya.

Kwonka Kristo ku yaizire kuba omunyamurwa omukuru ow'ebirungi ebyabaire nibyenda kwija, yaaraba omu Ihema eririkukira obukuru n'okuhikiirira, (eritakozirwe bantu, amakuru ngu eritari ry'ebihangirwe by'omu nsi);
tarataahire mu Mwanya ogurikwera, aine eshagama y'embuzi nari ey'ente, kureka akataahayo rimwe yaaheza, aine eye; atyo yaatutungira okucungurwa okutahwaho.
Mbwenu eshangama y'embuzi n'ente n'eiju ry'enyana y'eruutsi ebimiisiirwa aha bantu abasiisikaire ku biraabe nibyeza emibiri ekashemera,

eshagama ya Kristo, owaayehaireyo ahari Ruhanga ahabw'Omwoyo Orikwera kuba ekitambo ekitaine kamogo, terikira munonga kushemeza emitima yaanyu kureka emirimo efiire, mukabona kuheereza Ruhanga ohuriire?
Nimumanya ngu, ahi endagaano ey'okuraga eri, hashemereire kubaho ekirikuhamya okufa kwa nyakuraga;
ahakuba endagaano ey'okuraga ehama, nyakuraga yaaheza kufa; ahabw'okuba tekora nyakuraga akiriho.
N'ahabw'ekyo n'endagaano ey'okubanza terahamiibwe ahatari shagama.

Ahakuba Musa ku yaaherize kugambira abantu boona buri kiragiro ekyaragiirwe omu Biragiro, yaatwara eshagama y'enyana n'embuzi hamwe n'amaizi n'obwoya bw'entaama oburikutukura n'enyaweera, yaamiisiira ekitambo kye'biragiro n'abantu boona;
naagira ati: Eshagama egi n'ey'endagaano ei Ruhanga yaabaragiire.
Bwanyima egyo shagama yaagimiisiira atyo Eihema n'ebintu byona ebyabaire nibikoresibwa emirimo y'obuheereza.
Buzima omu Biragiro haihi buri kintu kyezibwa eshagama; kandi ahatari kuhseesha shagama, tihariho kwihwaho bibi.
N'ahabw'ekyo kikaba kihikire ebishushani by'eby'omu iguru kwezibwa ebyo; kwonka eby'omu iguru byo byezibwa ebitambo ebirikukira ebyo.
Ahakuba Kristo tarataahire mu mwanya ogurikwera ogwakozirwe abantu, ogurikushushanisibwa nk'ogwo ogw'amazima, kureka akataaha omu iguru buzima ngu ayeyorekye hati omu maisho ga Ruhanga ahabwaitu.
Taragiireyo kwehayo kaingi, nk'omunyamurwa omukuru oku yaabaire ataaha omu mwanya ogurikwera buri mwaka, aine eshagama etari ye ahabwe.

Kuri kyabaire kityo, akaabaire ashemereire kubonabonesibwa kaingi okwiha aha kuhangwa kw'ensi; kwonka hati mbwenu aha muheru gw'obusingye obwo akareebeka rimwe yaaheza, ngu abone kwihaho ebibi ahabw'okwehayo kuba ekitambo.
Kandi nk'oku abantu bateereirweho okufa rimwe, bwanyima yaakwo bakacwerwa orubanja,
nikwo na Kristo, ku yaaherize kuheebwayo rimwe kwekorera ebibi bya baingi, aryareebeka omurindi gwa kabiri, ti habw'ebibi, kureka ahabw'okujuna abariba bamutegyereize.
Kuri kyabaire nikibaasika, tibyakurekirwe kutambwa? Ahakuba abarikuramya, ku baakuherize kushemezibwa rimwe buzima, tibaakugarukire kwemanyaho bibi.
Kwonka ebitambo ebyo bikaba bibaijutsya ebibi byabo buri mwaka;
ahakuba eshagama y'enimi n'ey'embuzi tebaasa kwihaho bibi.
Ebitambo n'empongano torabikunzire,
Kureka okanteekateekyera omubiri;
Ebitambo ebyokiibwe ebitambwa ahabw'ebibi ti byo waasiimire.
Nyowe nikwo kugira nti: Ai Ruhanga reeba, naija kukora ebi okunda,
Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ahariinye omu muzingo gw'ekitabo.

Omu bi arikugamba aharuguru, ku yaaherize kugira ati: Ebitambo n'empongano n'ebitambo ebyokiibwe ebiheebwayo ahabw'ebibi torabisiimire n'obu kwakuba okubishemerererwa, (ebyo nibyo biheebwayo nk'oku Ebiragiro biragiira)
yaagaruka yaagira ati: Reeba, naija kukora ebi okunda. Atyo yaihaho eby'okubanza, ngu ahamye ekya kabiri.
Kandi omuri ekyo eki akunda itwe tukeezibwa ahabw'okuheebwayo kw'omubiri gwa Yesu Kristo rimwe akaheza.
Nimumanya ngu omunyamurwa weena ayemerera obutoosha omu rubu rwe, naatamba ebitambo kaingi ebitahainduka ebitarikubaasa kwihaho bibi ebiro byona;
kwonka Kristo we, ku yaaherize kutamba ekitambo kimwe eky'ebiro byona ahabw'ebibi, yaashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo rwa Ruhanga;
okwiha obwo atuura ategyereize, okuhitsya obu abazigu be barihindurwa akatebek'ebigyre bye.
Ahakuba abarikwezibwa akabahikiiriza ahabw'ekitambo kimwe yaaheza okumara ebiro byona.
Kandi Omwoyo orikwera nawe naabituhamiza; ahakuba ku yaaherize kugamba ati:
Bwanyima y'ebiro ebyo, nikwo Mukama arikugira,
Ndyata ebiragiro byangye omu mitima yaabo,
Kandi mbihandiikye omu bwengye bwabo.
Yaagaruka yaagira ati:
Ebibi byabo n'eby'okushiisha byabo tindibiijuka bundi.
Kandi ahi ebibi bisaasiirwe, haba hatakiriho kutamba kitambo ahabw'ekibi.
nituraba omu muhanda musya ogw'amagara, ogu yaatucwereire omu mukingo, nigwo mubiri gwe,
kandi nk'oku twine omunyamurwa omukuru orikutegyeka enju ya Ruhanga,
katwirire haihi n'omutima gw'amazima nitwikiririza kkimwe tutarikubanganisa, twine emitima emiisiirwe okwihwaho ebibi ebi emyoyo yaitu erikutushinja, kandi n'emibiri yaitu eyogiibwe amaizi amarungi.
Ka tugumizemu kuhamya amatsiko gaitu tutarikunyiganyiga, ahabw'okuba Owaaraganiise n'omwesigwa.
Kandi ka tuteekateekye oku twakwezirikisana kukundana n'okukora ebirungi,
tutarikureka kuteeranira hamwe, nk'oku abamwe bagira, kureka tugumyane, kandi nk'oku murikureeba ngu ekiro ekyo kiri haihi n'okuhika, mweyongyere kutwaza mutyo.
kureka hatsigara kutegyereza n'obwoba okucwerwa orubanja, n'omuriro gw'ekibabo oguryokeza kimwe abazigu ba Ruhanga.
Omuntu ku agomera ekiragiro kya Musa, yaashinjwa abantu bashatu nari babiri, tasaasirwa, aitwa.

Mbwenu owaateire Omwana wa Ruhanga omugyere, akateekateeka aha shagama y'endagaano ei yaayeziibwemu okuba etaine mugasho, akarogota aha Mwoyo ow'embabazi, nimuteekateeka ngu tashemereire kifubiro kihango ekirikukira ekyabo?
Ahakuba nitumanya Ogwo owaagizire ati: Okuhoora enzigu n'okwangye; niinye ndiihura. Kandi ati: Mukama aryacwera abantu be orubanja.
Ka n'eihano omuntu okugwa omu mikono ya Ruhanga ohuriire!
Kwonka mwijukye ebiro ebyahingwire, muherize kujwerwa omushana, oku mwagumisiririize engamba nyingi n'obusaasi;
obundi mukahinduka ab'okushungwa nibabajuma nibababonabonesa; obundi mukakwatanisa n'abarikugirwa batyo.
Ahakuba mukagirira embohe esaasi, kandi imwe ahabwanyu mwaikiriza n'okuhsemererwa kunyagwa ebi mutungire, ahabw'okumanya ngu imwe mwine eitungo eririkukira oburungi, kandi eritahwaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo mutarinaga okugumisiriza kwanyu okwine ebihembo bingi;
ahakuba nimwetenga kugumisiriza, ku muriheza kukora ebi Ruhanga akunda, mubone kuheebwa ebyaraganisiibwe.
Orikwija aryaija, tariikarayo;
Kandi ku agaruka enyima, omutima gwangye tigumushemerererwa.
Kwonka itwe tituri muuri abo abarikugaruka enyima, bakahwerekyerera, kureka turi omuri abo abarikwikiriza, bakajuna amagara gaabo.
Okwikiriza nikwo kuhamiza kimwe ebi twineho amatsiko, kandi nikwo kutumanyisiza kimwe ebitarikureebwa;
abakuru aba ira bakasiimwa Ruhanga ahabw'okukugira.
Okwikiriza nikwo kutumanyisa ku ensi yaahangirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga, kandi n'ebirikureebwa kubitarahangirwe mu bintu ebiriho.
Ahabw'okwikiriza Enoka akatwarwa omu iguru ngu arekye kufa; tiyaagaruka kureebwa, ahakuba Ruhanga, akamutwara. Kandi ku yaabaire atakatwairwe, akahamibwa ku ashemeize Ruhanga.
Kandi otarikwikiriza tarikubaasa kumushemeza; ahakuba omuntu weena orikwija ahari Ruhanga, ashemereire kwikiriza ku ariho, kandi ku aha ebihembo abamusherura.

Ahabw'okwikiriza, Noa ku yaahabwirwe Ruhanga aha byabaire bitakabaireho, akamworobera, yaakora emeeri ey'okukiza ab'omu nju ye; n'ahabw'ekyo akasingisa ensi orubanja, yaahinduka omuhunguzi w'okuhikiirira okurikuruga omu kwikiriza.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Abrahamu ku yaayetsirwe kuruga owaabo kuza omu nsi ei yaabaire naaza kuheebwa kuba obuhunguzi, akooroba, yaarugayo, atarikumanya ei arikuza.
Ahabw'okwikiriza akatuura nk'omwaijaija omu nsi ei yaaraganisiibwe, nk'etari yaabo, yaaguma omu mahema na Isaaka na Yakobo, abahunguzi b'ebyaraganisiibwe hamwe nawe.
Ahakuba akaba aine amatsiko g'okutaaha omu rurembo orwine emisingi, oru Ruhanga yaagyezire, kandi akarwombeka.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, na Saara akaheebwa amaani kugira enda, n'obu araabe yaabaire akakwire, ahakuba akateekateeka ahari Ogwo owaamuraganiise ku ari omwesigwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu omwe, kandi owaabaire ari nk'ofiire, yaakomookwaho abaijukuru baingi nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, kandi nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja ogutarikubarwa.
Abo boona bakafa bakiri omu kwikiriza, batakahairwe bi baaraganisiibwe, kwonka bakaba babireebera hare, baabyesiimira, baahamya ku bari abagyenyi kandi abagyenzi omu nsi egi.
Ahakuba abarikugamba batyo baba nibamanyisa ku barikusherura ensi yaabo buzima.
Kuri baajuzire ensi egyo ei baarugiremu, bakaabaasize kugarukayo.
Kwonka hati nibeetenga ensi erikukira oburungi, niyo y'omu iguru; nikyo Ruhanga atakwatirwa nshoni kwetwa Ruhanga waabo, ahakuba akabateekateekyera orurembo.
owaabaire agambirweho ngu: Omuri Isaaka nimwo baijukuru baawe baryetererwa;
ahakuba akateekateeka ngu Ruhanga naabaasa kuzoora abafu: nikyo yaamugaruriirwe nk'owaaruga omu bafu.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Isaaka akashabira Yakobo na Esau omugisha ogw'ebiribaho bwanyima.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Yakobo ku yaabaira ari haihi kufa, yaashabira abaana ba Yosefu bombi omugisha, naaramya Ruhanga ayehigikire eifundo ry'nkoni ye.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Yosefu ku yaabaire ari haihi kufa, yaagamba ha by'okuruga Misri kw'Abaisraeli, kandi yaabaragiira n'eby'okuziikwa kwe.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Musa ku yaakuzire, yaayanga kwetwa mutabani wa muhara wa Faraho,
yaihamu okukorwa kubi hamwe n'abantu ba Ruhanga, yaayanga kuguma omu by'okweshemeza by'ekibi ebirikuhwaho juba.
Yaateekateeka okujumwa naaturwa Kristo ku kuri eitungo ringi okukira obutungi bwa Misri; ahakuba akaba ategyereize ekihembo eki ariheebwa.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, akaruga Misri atatiinire kiniga ky'omugabe; ahakuba akagumisiriza, amaisho agataire ahari Ogwo otareebwa.
Ahabw'okwikiriza akataho Okuhingurwaho, kandi yaamiisiira eshagama, ngu ogwo owaabaire naacwekyereza emijigaijo atakaabakoraho.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Abaisraeli bakaraba omu Nyanja erikutukura nk'abarikuraba ahoomire; kwonka Abanyamisri ku baateireho kurabamu, baamirwa amaizi.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, orugo rw'amabaare rwe Yeriko rukagwa bwanyima y'okurweziguruka amazooba mushanju.
Ahabw'okwikiriza, Rahabu maraaya taracwekyereire hamwe n'abandi abaabaire bari abagomi, ahakuba aka kunira gye entatsi.
Mbwenu ngambe mpitsye hi? Ahakuba omwanya gukaampwaho, ku naakuza kugamba ebya Gideoni, Baraki, Samusooni, Yefusa, Daudi na Samueli na baanabi:
abaasingwire obundi bugabe ahabw'okwikiriza, abaakozire eby'okuhikiirira, abaahairwe ebyaraganisiibwe, abaabumbire eminwa y'entare,
abaaraize ekibabo ky'omuriro, abaakizire obwogi bwa rurara, abaarugire omu bweremwa, bakatunga amaani, abaahindukire amamanzi omu ngamba, abaabingire engabo z'amahanga agandi.
Abakazi bakagarurirwa abafu baabo abaazoirwe. Abamwe bakateerwa ez'okubaita, batarikwenda kurekurwa, ngu nyentsya babone kuheebwa okuzooka okurikukira oburungi.
Abandi bakashekyererwa, abandi bakaashwa, abandi bakabohwa n'enjegyere, baatebwa omu bihome;

abandi bakateerwa amabaare, baasharwamu habiri n'emisimeeno, abandi bakarengwa buzima, baitwa zaarurara, abandi bakazengyerera bajwaire empu z'entaama n'ez'embuzi, baconcoboize, nibabonabonesibwa, nibaitwa kubi;
abu ensi etarashemereire ngu bagituuremu; nibazengyerera omu mahamba n'omu nshozi, nibaraara omu maaya n'omu biina omu itaka.
Abo boona, n'obu baraabe bahamiibwe ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo, tibaratungire bi baaraganisiibwe,
ahakuba Ruhanga akatuteekateekyera ira ekirikukira oburungi, ngu barekye kuhikiirizibwa, itwe tutariho.

amaisho tugahangire Yesu wenka, owaatandikire okwikiriza kwaitu kandi omuhikiiriza waakwo; owaayemeire omusharaba ahabw'okushemererwa okwatairweho omu maisho ge, akagaya enshoni zaagwo, kandi hati ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'ekitebe ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Imwe timukahikire ha kujwisibwa eshagama nimurwana n'ekibi.
Mwebirwe ekigambo ekirikubeehanangiriza nk'abaana kiti?
Mwana wangye, otagaya okuhana kwa Mukama,
Kandi otagwa enshazi ku araakuhane.
Kandi ateera omwana weena ou aikiriza.
Mugumisiririze okuhanwa; ahakuba Ruhanga naabatwaza nk'abaana; mbwenu ni mwana ki ou ishe atahana?
Kwonka ku muraabe mutarikuhanwa nk'abandi boona nimuba mutari baana, kureka ebizaarwa.
Kandi hoona tukaba twine baatataitwe ab'omu nsi abaabaire batuhana, naitwe tukaba tuboorobera. Mbwenu titushemereire kukizaho kworobera Ishe w'emyoyo yaitu, tukagira amagara?
Ahakuba abo bakaba batuhana ebiro bikye nk'oku baabaire basiima; kwonka We atuhana ngu tugasirwe, kandi tukwatanise nawe omu kuhikiirira kwe.
Omuntu ku aba naakihanwa, tashemererwa kureka ashaasha; kwonka abamanyiziibwe okuhanwa, bwanyima kubarugiramu ebyana by'okuhikiirira ebirikureeta obusingye.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwimutsye emikono yaanyu enoganogokire, munanuure amaju gaanyu agazingazingirwe,
mucwere ebigyere byanyu emihanda eshororokire, abarikucumbagira barekye kugiremerwamu, kureka bakire.
Mwezirikye okugira obusingye n'abantu boona, kandi n'okwezibwa; ahakuba ahatari kwezibwa tihariho orireeba Mukama.
Mwerinde hatagira omuntu owaagwa akaruga omu mbabazi za Ruhanga, haza omuzi ogurikushaarira ogwabameramu, gukabatuntuza emitima, n'abaingi bakasiisikara;
kandi hatabaho omushambani weena, nari otarikweta ha bya Ruhanga nka Esau owaagurize obuhunguzi bwe bw'omujigaijo akaihuro k'eby'okurya.
Ahakuba nimumanya ngu, bwanyima ku yaayenzire kuragwa omugisha ogwo, akangirwa, tiyaabona buryo bw'okweteisa, n'obu araabe yaagushabire naarira.
n'okugamba kw'enzamba, n'eiraka ry'ebigambo; abaarihuriire bakeeshengyereza ngu batagambirwa ebindi.
Ahabw'okuba tibareemeire kyaragiirwe ngu, Ekirihika aha rushozi orwo kyona, n'obu kyakuba ekitungirwe, kiteerwe amabaare.
Kandi n'ebyareebirwe bikaba nibitiinisa; nikyo Musa yaagiriire ati: Nyine obwoba bwingi nintetema.
Kureka mwizire aha rushozi Saayuuni, omu rurembo rwa Ruhanga ohuriire, Yerusaalemu orw'omu iguru, n'ahari baamaraika abateeraine omu mitwe etarikubarwa,
n'omu iteraniro ry'emijigaijo ehandiikirwe omu iguru, kandi mwizire n'ahari Ruhanga omucwi w'emanja za boona, n'emyoyo y'abahikiriire abaahikiriziibwe,
n'ahari Yesu omuteerani w'endagaano ensya, n'eshagama erikumiisiirwa, erikugamba ebirungi okukira eya Abeeli.
Obwo eiraka rye rikatengyetsa ensi; kwonka hati araganiise ati: Niinyija kugaruka kutengyetsa ensi rimwe, kandi ti nsi yonka kureka n'eiguru.
Ekigambo eki ngu, Hatsigaire rimwe, nikimanyisa okwihwaho okw'ebiritengyetsibwa, nibyo byahangirwe, ngu ebyo ebitarikutengyetsibwa bibone kugumaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku twine obukama obutarikubaasa kutengyetsibwa, ka tusiime Ruhanga, tumuheereze nk'oku akunda, nitumuha ekitiinisa nitutiina;
ahakuba Ruhanga waitu n'omuriro ogurikurya busha.
Mutarireka kukunira abagyenyi; ahakuba omu muringo nk'ogwo hariho abaakuniire baamaraika batakimanyire.
Mwijukye abari omu bihome, nk'ababohirwe nabo; kandi mwijukye n'abarikwitwa kubi, ahakuba naimwe mwine emibiri.
Obushwere mwena mubuhe ekitiinisa; kandi ekitabo ky'obushwere kirekye kushiishwa, ahakuba abashambani Ruhanga aryabacwera orubanja.
Mutarigira omutima ogurikukunda empiiha, ebi mwine bibe nibyo byabamara; ahakuba We akagira ati: Tindikutsigaho, kandi tindikuhemukaho na kakye.
Nikyo turikugambira, tutarikubanganisa, tuti:
Mukama niwe muhwezi wangye,
Tinditiina;
Omuntu naabaasa kungira ata?
Mwijukye abeebembezi baanyu, abaabagambiire ekigambo kya Ruhanga; mwetegyereze omuheru gw'amagara gaabo, mutooreze okwikiriza kwabo.
Yesu Kristo tahinduka; oku abaire ari nyomwabazyo, n'eri izooba nikwo ari, kandi nikwo ariguma ebiro byona.
Mutahabisibwa enyegyesa ezihangire ez'emiringo mingi; ahakuba ni kirungi omutima kuhamibwa embabazi za Ruhanga, kunu ti migyenzo y'eby'okurya etaragasiire baagiikiriize.
Twine eitambiro eri abaheereza b'omu Ihema bataikirizibwa kurya ebiritambiirweho.
Ahakuba enyamaishwa, ezi omunyamurwa omukuru atwara eshagama yaazo omu Mwanya ogurikwera okuba ebitambo by'ebibi, emitumbi yaazo bagyokyeza aheeru y'orusiisira.
Nikwo na Yesu yaabonaboneire aheeru y'eirembo, ngu abone kweza abantu n'eshagama ye.
N'ahabw'ekyo naitwe ka tushohore, tumushangye aheeru y'orusiisira, twekoreire ekijumo ahabwe.
Ahabw'okuba aha titwineho rurembo orurikugumaho, kureka nitusherura orundi oruriija.
Mbwenu ahabw'Ogwo ka tugume tutambe ekitambo ky'okusiima Ruhanga, nikyo kyana ky'eminwa erikuhimbisa eiziina rye.
Mutarireka kukorera abantu ebirungi, n'okukwatanisa omu bi mwine; ahakuba ebhitambo nk'ebyo nibyo bishemeza Ruhanga.
Mutushabire, ahakuba nituhamya ngu twine omutima ogutarikweshinja, nitwetenga kutwaza gye omuri byona.
Kandi nimbeeshengyereza munonga, mwezirikye kutushabira, mbone kurahuka kubagarurirwa juba.
abahe ebirungi byona, mubone kukora ebi akunda, naakorera omuriimwe ebirikusiimwa omu maisho ge, ahabwa Yesu Kristo; aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona. Amiina.
B'eshe-emwe, nimbeeshengyereza, mwikirize ekigambo eki naabahabura, ahakuba naabahandiikira nincwera hagufu.
Mumanye ngu ow'eishe-emwe Timoseo akarekurwa; ku ariija juba, turyabareebera hamwe.
Mundamukize abeebembezi baanyu boona n'abarikwera boona. Aba Italia baabaramutsya.
Embabazi zigume naimwe mwena. Amiina.
ahakuba nimumanya ngu okugyezibwa omu kwikiriza kwanyu kurugamu okugumisiriza.
