Kandi murekye okugumisiriza kuhitsye omurimo gwakwo, naimwe mubone kuba abahikire omuri byona, mutaine ki mubuzirweho.
Kwonka ashabe aine okwikiriza, atarikubanganisa, ahakuba orikubanganisa naashusha nk'ekingonzi ky'enyanja ekirikutwarwa omuyaga oku n'oku.
Kandi omuntu ogwo arekye kuteekateeka ngu Mukama naija kumuha ekintu kyona;
ahakuba aine emitima ebiri, kandi omu mihanda ye taine hu ahamiire.
kandi n'omutungi ayehimbise ahabw'okugarurwa ahansi, ahakuba aryahunduuka nk'orurabyo rw'obunyaatsi.
Nimumanya ngu omu kasheeshe eizooba riija n'omushana gurikwotsya, guhonzya obunyaatsi, orurabyo rwabwo ruragara, n'oburungi bwabwo buhwaho. Nikwo n'omutungi arihunduuka omu mihanda ye.
Omuntu weena ku araayohibwe, arekye kugira ati: Naayohibwa Ruhanga; ahakuba Ruhanga tabaasa kwohibwa kibi, kandi nawe tayosya muntu;
kwonka omuntu weena ayohibwa, yaabeihwabeihwa okwetenga kwe, kwamwosyosya.
Bwanyima okwetenga okwo, ku kuheza kutwara enda, kuzaara ekibi; n'ekibi ku kikura, kizaara okufa.
B'eishe-emwe abarikukundwa, mutabeihwabeihwa;

engabirano yoona enungi n'ekiconco kyona ekihikire biruga omu iguru, nibishuuma okuruga ahari Isheboona, Omuhangi w'ebirikwaka, otahindahinduka na kakye, n'obu kwakuba okugira ekicuucu ekireetwa okuhinduka.
Ahabw'okukunda kwe akatuzaaza ekigambo ky'amazima, ngu tube nk'emijigaijo y'ebi yaahangire.
Eki nimukimanya, B'eishe-emwe abarikukundwa; omuntu weena arahukye kuhurira, kwonka atarahukiiriza kugamba, n'okugira ekiniga;
ahakuba ekiniga ky'omuntu tikikora by'okuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwiheho ekihagaro kyona n'obubi oburengyesereize; mwakiire n'obucureezi ekigambo ekibyairwe omuriimwe, ekirikubaasa kujuna amagara gaanyu.
Ahakuba omuntu weena ku aba omuhurizi w'Ekigambo, ataakyorobera, ashusha nk'omuntu orikwereebera omu ndeeberwamu oku arikushusha ahamaisho;
akiheza kwereeba, yaagyenda, ahonaaho akeebwa oku arikushusha.
Kwonka ogwo orikwetegyereza ebiragiro ebihikire eby'obusingye, akabyezirikira, atari orikubihurira akeebwa, kureka ari omukozi orikubyorobera, omuntu ogwo aryaheebwa omugisha omu kukora kwe.
Ediini eshemeire, etaine kamogo omu maisho ga Ruhanga Isheboona niyo egi: okutaayaayira efuuzi n'abafaakazi omu busaasi bwabo, n'okwerinda okugira amabara g'ensi.
B'eishe-emwe, mutariikiriza Mukama waitu ow'ekitiinisa, Yesu Kristo, kandi mukashoroora omu bantu.
Mbwenu omuntu ku yaakwija ahu muteeraniire, ajwaire empeta z'ezaabu n'ebijwaro ebirikwengyengyeta, kandi haija omworo ojwaire emyenda y'obutaanyagurika,
mwata omutima ahari ogwo ojwaire gye, muti; Ija oshutame aha aharungi; kandi mwagira omworo ogwo muti, Iwe! Yemerera kuriya! Nari shi, Shutama ahansi aha bigyere byangye;
obwo nimuba muteetaaniisemu, mukaba abaramuzi abaine ebiteekateeko bibi?
Muhurire, B'eishe-emwe abarikukundwa. Abooro omu nsi egi, Ruhanga tarabatooraine kuba abatungi omu kwikiriza, n'okuba abahunguzi b'obukama obu yaaraganiise abarikumukunda?
Kwonka nimwanga mugaya ogwo mworo. Abatungi tibo babatwaza eikama, bakababindirana nibabata omu maramuriro?
Tibo barogota aha Iziina ry'ekitiinisa eri mweta?
Kwonka ku murikushoroora omu bantu, nimuba musiisire, nimwomeserezibwa Ebiragiro nk'abasiisi.
Ahakuba omuntu weena orikuhitsya Ebiragiro byona, akashobyaho kimwe, naaba ashobize byona.
Ahabw'okuba Owaagizire ati: otarishambana, niwe yaagizire ati: Otariita. N'ahabw'ekyo n'obu orikuba otashambaine, kwonka okaita, nooba oshobize Ebiragiro.
Ahabw'ekyo mugambe kandi mukore, nk'abantu abaricwerwa orubanja Ebiragiro by'obusingye.
Otasaasira aryacwerwa orubanja atarikusaasirwa; kwonka embabazi zeehimbisiza aha rubanja.
Mbwenu ku haakubaho ow'eishe-emwe, omushaija nari omukazi, otaine by'okujwara nari eby'okurya,
omwe ahariimwe yaabagira ati: Mugyende n'obusingye, mutagate, muhaagye, haza atabahaire by'okuhwera emibiri yaabo, kikaabagasira ki?
N'okwikiriza kwonka, ku kuba kutaine kukora, kuba kufiire.
Iwe oikiriza ngu Ruhanga n'omwe; ekyo ni kirungi. Nangwa na baadaimoni bakiikiriza, nibatetema.
Iwe mushema 'we, nooyenda kworekwa okwikiriza okutaine kukora ku kuri okufiire?
Torikumanya ngu Abrahamu tatenkuriitwe akaihwaho orubanja ahabw'okukora, obu yaahayo omutabani Isaaka aha itambiro?
Waareeba oku okwikiriza kwe kwagyendeire hamwe n'okukora, kandi ahabw'okukora, okwikiriza kwe kukahika;
kandi Ekyahandiikirwe kikahikiirizibwa ekirikugira ngu: Abrahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, kyamubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira; kandi yaayetwa munywani wa Ruhanga.
Mwareeba omuntu oku aihwaho orubanja ahabw'okukora, kutari kwikiriza kwonka.
Kandi na Rahabu maraaya taraihirweho orubanja ahabw'okukora, obu yaakunira entumwa, akazigarura omuhanda ogundi?
Ahakuba nk'omubiri ogutarimu mwoyo oku guba gufiire, nikwo n'okwikiriza okutaine kukora kuba kufiire.
B'eishe-emwe, mutariikiriza baingi omuriimwe kuhinduka abeegyesa; ahakuba nimumanya ngu itwe abeegyesa turyacwerwa orubanja orurikukira ez'abandi.
Ahabw'okuba twena tushobya omuri bingi; omuntu weena otashobya mu kugamba, ogwo n'omuntu ohikire, naabaasa kutegyeka n'omubiri gwona.
Nimumanya ngu, ku tuta ebyoma omu kanwa k'embaraasi, ngu zitworobere, tuhindura emibiri yaazo yoona.
Kandi mureebe n'emeeri; n'obu ziraabe ziri mpango munonga, kandi nizitwarwa omuyaga gw'amaani, kwonka zihindurwa akabaaho kakye munonga, kuza ei omuvugi arikwenda yoona.
N'orurimi narwo nikwo ruri; n'akagingo kakye, akeehimbisa omu bintu bikuru. Mureebe ekibira n'obu kiraabe kiri kihango kita, kitwekwa akariro kakye!
N'orurimi ruba omuriro. Orurimi n'ensi mbi etuura omu ngingo zaitu, rushiisha omubiri gwona, rwotsya obuzaarwa bw'obuntu bwaitu bwaona, kandi narwo rwokibwa Gehena.
Nimumanya ngu emiringo yoona ey'enyamaishwa n'ebirikuguruka, ebirikwekurura n'eby'omu nyanja, nibibaasa kutegyekwa kandi bikaba bitegyekwa abantu;
kwonka tihariho muntu orikubaasa kutegyeka orurimi; n'obubi obutatuuza, rwijwire obushegu oburikwita.
Nirwo tuhimbisisa Mukama Isheboona, kandi nirwo tukyeenesa abantu, abahangirwe omu kishushani kya Ruhanga.
Omu kanwa kamwe harugamu okuhimbisa n'okukyeena. B'eishe-emwe, ebyo tibishemerire kuba bityo.
Enshuro neebaasa kurugwamu amaizi amarungi n'agarikushaarira?
B'eishe-emwe, omutiini nigubaasa kwana emizeituuni, nari omuzaabibu kwana emitiini? Nikwo n'amaizi g'omwonyo gatabaasa kurugwamu amarungi.
Kwonka ku muraabe mwine eihari ry'obushaarizi n'okweyendeza omu mitima yaanyu, murekye kwehimbisa n'okubeiha, mukarwanisa amazima.
Obwengye obwo ti bwengye oburikuruga omu iguru, kureka n'obw'ensi, n'obw'abantu-buntu, n'obwa baadaimoni.
Ahakuba ahu eihari n'okweyendeza biri, niho haba okurabanamu n'okukora kubi kwona.

Kwonka obwengye oburikuruga omu iguru, okubanza buba obushemeire, kandi obw'obusingye, obw'okutwaza gye, obwikiriza okuteisibwa, obwijwire embabazi n'ebyana ebirungi, obutarimu kugambira habiri n'obu bwakuba obugobya.
Abareeta obusingye babiba embibo omu busingye ezireeta ebyana by'okuhikiirira.
Engamba n'endwano eziri omuriimwe niziruga hi? Tizirikuruga omu kwetenga okubi okurikurwanira omu ngingo zaanyu?
Mwetenga, timuheebwa; n'ekirugamu mwita; kandi mukwatwa eihari, timubaasa kutunga; n'ekirugamu murwana, kandi muhurura. Ekibazibira kuheebwa n'okutashaba.
Mushaba, timuheebwa, ahakuba mushaba kubi kubikoresa okwetenga kwanyu.
Imwe bashambani 'mwe, timurikumanya ngu omukago gw'ensi n'obuzigu ahari Ruhanga? N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu okunda kuba munywani w'ensi, aba ayehindwire omuzigu wa Ruhanga.
Nari nimugira ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bigambira busha obu bigira biti: Omwoyo ogu yaatuhaire kutuura omuriitwe tagugirira bwiko?
Kwonka akanyisa omugisha. Nikyo bigirira biti: Ruhanga arwanisa abaine amaryo, kwonka abacureezi abaha omugisha.
N'ahabw'ekyo mworobere Ruhanga. Murwanise Sitaane, aryabahunga.
Mwirire haihi Ruhanga, nawe abone kubairira haihi. Munaabbe engaro zaanyu, imwe abasiisi; mushemeze emitima yaanyu imwe abaine emitima ebiri.
Mushaashe, mucure, murire; okusheka kwanyu kuhindukye okucura, n'okushemererwa kwanyu kuhindukye okuganya.
Mwecureeze omu maisho ga Mukama, nawe aryabatunguura.

B'eishe-emwe, mutarigambuurana. Orikugambuura mwene ishe, nari orikumucwera orubanja, naaba agambire kubi aha Biragiro, kandi abicwereire orubanja. Kwonka ku orikucwera Ebiragiro orubanja, nooba otarikworobera Biragiro, kureka ori omucwi w'emanja.
Hariho Omwe owaataireho Ebiragiro, kandi omucwi w'emanja; niwe arikubaasa kujuna kandi n'okucwekyereza. Mbwenu iwe niiwe oha orikucwera mutaahi waawe orubanja?
haza mutarikumanya ekiraabeho nyencakare. Amagara gaanyu ni ki? Muri nk'oruho orureebwa akaanya kakye, bwanyima rukaamuuka.
Kureka mukaagizire muti: Mukama waitu ku arikunda, turyagumaho tukore eki na kiriya.
Kwonka hati nimwesiimira omu kwehimbisa kwanyu; haza okwesiima kwona nk'okwo ni kubi.
N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu orikumanya kukora ebirungi, atabikore, ahariwe kiba kibi.
Obutungi bwanyu bujunzire, n'ebijwaro byanyu biriirwe ebiyenje.
Ezaabu zaanyu n'efeeza zikyereenyire, n'omukyereenyo gwazo guryabashinja, kandi gurye emibiri yaanyu nk'omuriro. Mukeebiikira eitungo ahabw'ebiro by'aha muheru.
Reeba, ebihembo byabagyesi b'emisiri yaanyu, ebi mwabaimire ahabw'obugobya, nibibarega; kandi n'okurira kw'abashaaruuzi kuhikire omu matu ga Mukama ow'amahe.
Mukatuura omu nsi omu kwegira gye n'omu kweshemeza; mukahaazya emitima yaanyu aha kiro ky'okwitwa.
Mukacwera ohikiriire orubanja, mwamwita, tiyaabangira.
Naimwe mugumisirize. Mugumye emitima yaanyu; ahabw'okuba okwija kwa Mukama wiatu kuru haihi.
B'eishe-emwe, mutaryetomboiterana, nyentsya mutaricwerwa orubanja; reeba, Omucwi w'emanja ayemereire aha rwigi.
B'eishe-emwe, baanabi abaabagambiire omu iziina rya Mukama, mubatware nk'eky'okureeberaho eky'okubonabona n'okugumisiriza.
Mumanye ngu abagumisiriza tubeeta abahiiriirwe. Mukahurira aha kugumisiriza kwa Yobu, kandi mwareeba eki Mukama yaagyendereire, oku aine embabazi nyingi n'okusaasira.
Omuriimwe harimu orikushaasha? Ashabe. Harimu oshemereirwe? Ayeshongore eby'okuhimbisa.
Omuriimwe harimu orwaire? Atume aha bakuru b'ekanisa, bamushabire, bamusiigye amajuta omu iziina rya Mukama;
n'okushaba okurimu okwikiriza kuryakiza ogwo orwaire, Mukama amwimutsye; kandi ku araabe aine ebibi ebi akozire, aryabisaasirwa.
N'ahabw'ekyo mweteisizane ebibi byanyu, kandi mushabirane, mubone kukira. Okushaba kw'ohikiriire kugira amaani maingi omu kukora kwakwo.
Eliya akaba ari omuntu nkaitwe; yaashaba munonga ngu enjura erekye kugwa; n'enjura yaamara emyaka eshatu n'ameezi mukaaga etarikugwa ha nsi.
Yaagaruka yaashaba, eiguru ryagwisa enjura, eitaka ryameza emyaka yaaryo.
B'eishe-emwe, omuntu weena omuriimwe ku araahabe, yaaruga omu mzima, ondiijo yaamugarura,
mumanye ngu orikuhindura omusiisi akamwiha omu muhanda ogu yaahabiiremu, aryaba akirize amagara ge okufa, kandi aryaba ashwekire ebibi bingi munonga.
abaatoorainwe Ruhanga Isheboona, nk'oku yaabamanyire ira, mukeezibwa Omwoyo, ngu mworobere Yesu Kristo, kandi ngu mumiisiirwe eshagama ye. Embabazi n'obusingye bikanye omuriimwe.
Ruhanga, Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, asiimwe! Ahabw'embabazi ze nyingi akatuzaara obwa kabiri ngu tugire amatsiko agatahwaho ahabw'okuzooka omu bafu kwa Yesu Kristo;
ngu tutungye obuhunguzi obutarikubaasa kuhwerekyerera, obutarikusiisikara, kandi obutarikuhunduuka, obwababiikiirwe omu iguru,
imwe abarindwa amaani ga Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza, murindiirwe okujunwa okurishuuruurwa aha kiro ky'aha mperu.
Ebyo nimubishemerererwa, n'obu muraabe hati mushemereire kumara akaanya kakye nimushaasha ahabw'okugyezibwa okw'emiringo mingi, ku kiraabe nikyetengwa,

ngu okwikiriza kwanyu kuhamibwe ku kuri okw'amazima, kandi ku kurikukiza ezaabu obuguzi bwingi (mumanye ngu ezaabu, n'obu eraabe eri erikuhwaho, ehamibwa yaagyezibwa omu muriro) kandi okugyezibwa kw'okwikiriza kwanyu kubareetere okusiimwa n'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbusibwa aha kushuuruurwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
Ogwo mumukunda, mutakamureebaga; kandi n'obu muraabe mutarikumureeba hati, nimumwikiriza, mumushemerererwa n'okwesiima okutarikubaasa kushoboororwa okwine ekitiinisa kingi,
nimuheebwa okujunwa kw'amagara gaanyu, nk'ebihembo by'okwikiriza kwanyu.
nibabuuza obunaku n'obumanyiso bwabwo oku buri, obu baayorekirwe Omwoyo wa Kristo owaabaire ari omuribo, naabamanyisa obusaasi bwa Kristo butakabaireho, n'ekitiinisa ekiribaho bwanyima y'ebyo.

Kandi nabo bakashuuruurirwa, baamanya ngu ti habw'abo bonka, kureka n'ahabwanyu, baaragura ebigambo ebi mugambiirwe omu biro ebi abantu abaababuuriire ebigambo birungi ahabw'Omwoyo Orikwera owaatumirwe naaruga omu iguru; kandi ebigambo ebyo na baamaraika nibeetenga kubyetegyereza.
Mube nk'abaana abarikuhurira, mutashushanisibwa nk'oku mwabaire muri, nimukurata okwetenga okubi omu butamanya bwanyu obwa ira;
kureka nk'Ogwo owaabeetsire oku ari orikwera, naimwe mube nikwo mwaba abarikwera omu micwe yaanyu yoona;
ahakuba kikahandiikwa ngu: Muryaba abarikwera, ahabw'okuba nyowe ndi orikwera.
Kandi ku muraatakire Ogwo nka Shoimwe, ocwera omuntu weena orubanja orushemereire ebi yaakozire, atarikweta aha kitiinisa kye, mumare ebiro by'obushuhuuki bwanyu nimutiina.
Nimumanya ku mutaracunguziibwe bintu ebihwaho nk'efeeza n'ezaabu okuruga omu micwe yaanyu etaine mugasho ei mwahungwire ahari baashwenkuriimwe,
kureka Kristo akabacungura n'eshagama ye ey'obuguzi bwingi, nk'ey'omwana gw'entaama ogutaine kamogo n'obu ryakuba eibara;
owaamanyirwe ira ensi etakahangirwe, kwonka akoorekwa omu bunaku bw'aha mperu ahabwanyu,
imwe abu yaahaire okwikiriza Ruhanga, owaamuzoire omu bafu, akamuha ekitiinisa, ngu okwikiriza kwanyu n'amatisko gaanyu bibe omuri Ruhanga.
Ahakuba mukaheza kuzaarwa obwa kabiri, mutazairwe mbibo erikujunda, kureka etarikujunda, nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga ekihuriire kandi ekigumaho;
ahakuba
Emibiri yoona eba nk'obunyaatsi
N'oburungi bwayo buba nk'orurabyo rw'obunyaatsi;
Obunyaatsi buhonga, n'orurabyo ruhunduura,
Kwonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga kigumaho ebiro byona. Kandi ekigambo ekyo nibwo butumwa burungi obu mwagambiirwe.
Mube nk'abaana abeereere, mwetengye amate g'Omwoyo agatafungwire, gabakuze, gabahitsye aha kujunwa,
ku muraabe mwarorize aha mbabazi za Mukama waitu.
kandi naimwe nk'amabaare agahuriire mwombekirwe okuba enju y'omwoyo, n'oruganda rw'abanyamurwa abarikwera ab'okutamba ebitambo by'omwoyo ebirikusiimwa Ruhanga ahabwa Yesu Kristo.
Ahakuba omu Byahandiikirwe kikahandiikwa ngu:
Reeba, ninta omuri Saayuuni eibaare ry'obuhamizo bw'enju,
Eritoorainwe ery'obuguzi bwingi;
Kandi orikumwikiriza tarikwatwa nshoni.
N'ahabw'ekyo ahariimwe abarikwikiriza n'Ow'obuguzi bwingi, kwonka aha batarikwikiriza kikahandiikwa ngu,
Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire
Niryo ryahindukire ery'obuhamizo bw'enju;
N'eibaare eriteeza abantu entsibo,
N'orukiri orubagwisa,
bateera entsibo, ahabw'okuba tiboorobera kigambo, nk'oku baakiteereirweho ira.
Ira mukaba mutari ihanga, kwonka hati muri eihanga rya Ruhanga; ira mukaba mutasaasiirwe, mbwenu hati musaasiirwe.
mugire emicwe mirungi omu Banyamahanga, kandi ku baraaze kubagambuura nibabeeta enkozi z'ebibi, bareebe ebirungi ebi murikukora, bahimbise Ruhanga omu bunaku bw'okutaayaayirwa.
Ahabwa Mukama mworobere obutegyeki bwona obw'abantu, yaaba buri obw'omugabe nk'omutwe gwa boona,
nari obw'abategyeki nk'abatairweho Ogwo kuhana enkozi z'ebibi, n'okusiima abarikukora gye.
Ahakuba eki Ruhanga akunda n'eki ngu okukora gye kwanyu kubumbe akanwa k'abashema babure eky'okubagambaho omu butamanya bwabo.
Mugire obusingye, kwonka obusingye bwanyu mutabukoresa nk'eky'okushwekyerera obubi, kureka mube abahuuku ba Ruhanga.
Muhe abantu boona ekitiinisa. Mukunde ab'eishe-emwe. Mutiine Ruhanga. Muhe omugabe ekitiinisa.
Ahakuba omuntu asiimwa, yaagumisiririza obusaasi naaturwa busha, ahabw'okugira omutima murungi ahari Ruhanga.
Mbwenu nimusiimwa ki, ku muraabe nimuteerwa ahabw'okukora kubi mukagumisiriza? Kwonka ku murikukora gye, mwabonabonesibwa, mukagumisiriza, ekyo nikyo kirikusiimwa ahari Ruhanga.
Kandi nikyo mwayeteirwe, ahakuba na Kristo akabonabonesibwa ahabwanyu, yaabatsigira eky'okureeberaho, ngu mutoore omuhanda ogu yaarabiremu.
We tarakozire kibi; n'omu kanwa ke tihararugiremu bugobya.
Ku yaajumirwe, tiyaabagarurira; ku yaabonabonesiibwe, tiyaabahayira, kureka akeehayo ahari Ogwo ocwa emanja z'amazima.
Niwe yaayekoreire ebibi byaitu omu mubiri gwe aha muti, ngu itwe abaherize kufa aha bibi, tugire amagara omu kuhikiirira.
Ahakuba mukaba nimuhaba nk'entaama, kwonka hati mugarukire aha Muriisa kandi Omureeberezi w'amagara gaanyu.
ahabw'okureeba emitwarize yaanyu mirungi ey'okutiina Ruhanga.
kureka okwecuma kwanyu kube okw'omunda omu mutima, okw'ekijwaro ekitasiisikara eky'omwoyo omucureezi ogutuurize ogw'obuguzi bwingi omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
N'abakazi abarikwera aba ira, abaabaire baine amatsiko ahari Ruhanga, nikwo baabaire beecuma, niboorobera baibabo;
nk'oku Saara yaabaire ayorobera Abrahamu, naamweta mukama we. Naimwe hati muri bahara be, ku muraabe nimukora gye, mutaine kirikubatiinisa.
Eky'aha muheru mwena mukwatanise omu mwoyo, musaasirane, mukundane nk'eishe-emwe, mugirirane embabazi n'omutima omucureezi.
Murekye kwihurana ebibi, nari okugarurirana ebijumo; kureka omu mwanya gw'ebyo mushabirane omugisha; manya nikyo mwayeteirwe ngu muhungure omugisha.
Ahakuba
Orikwenda kukunda amagara ge,
N'okugira obusingye omu biro bye,
Ashemereire kuzibira orurimi rwe kugamba kubi,
N'eminwa ye kugamba eby'obugobya;
Kandi ahindukye arugye omu bubi, akore ebirungi;
Asherure obusingye, kandi abukuratire.
N'amatu ge agatega okushaba kwabo,
Kwonka abarikukora kubi abateera ekitsyori.
Mbwenu n'oha oribakora kubi, ku muraabe nimwezirika kukora ebirungi?
Kwonka ku muraabe nimuhiigwa ahabw'okuhikiirira, muhiiriirwe. Mutaritiina okukangisa kwabo, kandi mutaryemereza omutima;

kureka muhe Kristo ekitiinisa nka Mukama omu mitima yaanyu. Mugume mweteekateekire kushobororera omuntu weena orikubashobooroza eby'amatsiko agu mwine, kwonka mubashobororere n'obucureezi n'okutiina Ruhanga,
n'omutima ogutarikweshinja, ngu omuri ebyo ebi murikugambwaho kubi, abarikujuma emitwarize yaanyu mirungi ey'omuri Kristo bakwatwe enshoni.
Ahakuba ni kirungi okubonabonesibwa ahabw'okukora gye, Ruhanga ku araabe naakisiima, okukira okubonabonesibwa ahabw'okukora kubi.
Ahabw'okuba na Kristo akabonabonesibwa rimwe ahabw'ebibi yaaheza, Ohikiriire ahabw'abatahikiriire, ngu atureete ahari Ruhanga, yaitwa omu mubiri, kwonka yaahindurwa ohuriire omu mwoyo,
ou yaagyendeiremu okubuurira emyoyo ey'omu kihome,
ey'abantu abatarahuriire Ruhanga ira, obu yaagumisiriza omu biro bya Noa, nibakikora emeeri, ei abantu bakye munaana baakiriiremu amaizi.
Amaizi ago nikyo kishushani ky'ago agabakiza omu kubatizibwa, ti kwihaho nziro z'omubiri, kureka n'endagaano y'omutima ogutarikweshinja ahari Ruhanga, kandi ebajuna ahabw'okuzooka kwa Yesu Kristo,
owaagiire omu iguru, ari aha rubaju rwa buryo rwa Ruhanga, naategyeka baamaraika n'abategyeki n'ab'obushoboorozi.
mubone kumara ebiro ebi mutsigaize omu magara g'omubiri mutarikukora by'okurigira okubi kw'abantu, kureka ebi Ruhanga akunda.

Murekye ebiro ebyahingwire bimare, ebi mwakoreiremu ebi Abanyamahanga bakunda, okugyendera omu micwe mibi ey'obushambani, n'okwetenga okubi, n'obusinzi, n'okuraara enkyeera, n'okunywa amaarwa maingi, n'emizizo mibi ey'okuramya ebishushani.
Ekirikubatangaaza n'okureeba mutarikurahuka kukwatanisa nabo omu burare obuhinguraine; nikyo barikubajumira.
Kwonka baryatonganisibwa Ogwo oyeteekateekire kucwa orubanja rw'abahuriire n'abafiire.
Nikyo engiri yaagambiriirwe n'abaafiire, ngu bacwerwe orubanja nk'abantu oku barucwerwa, babone kugira amagara omu mwoyo nka Ruhanga.
Emperu ya byona eri haihi; n'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde, muhuguukye, mwezirikire kushaba.
Okukira byona mukundane munonga; ahabw'okuba okukunda kushweka ebibi bingi.
Mukunirane mutarikunyomwa;
nk'oku omuntu weena yaahairwe ekiconco, mube nikwo mwabihweresana, nk'ababiiki barungi ab'embabazi za Ruhanga ez'emiringo yoona;

orikugamba agambe nk'orikugamba ebi ashuururiirwe Ruhanga; orikuheereza aheereze n'amani agu Ruhanga amuhaire, Ruhanga abone kuhimbisibwa omuri byona ahabwa Yesu Kristo; aheebwe ekitiinisa n'obutegyeki ebiro byona Amiina.
Abarikukundwa, mutatangaazibwa omuriro ogwizire kubagyeza, nk'abaahikwaho eihano;
kureka mushemererwe ahabw'okukwatanisa na Kristo omu busaasi bwe; kandi ekitiinisa kye ku kirishuuruurwa, nabwo mushemererwe n'okwesiima kwingi.
Ku muraabe nimujumwa ahabw'okuturwa eiziina rya Kristo, muhiiriirwe, ahabw'okuba Omwoyo ow'ekitiinisa kandi owa Ruhanga atuura ahariimwe.
Kwonka hatarigira omuntu omuriimwe owaabonabonesibwa ahabw'okwita, nari okwiba, nari okukora kubi, nari okweta omu by'abandi;
kwonka omuntu ku araabonabonesibwe nk'omukristaayo, arekye kukwatwa enshoni, kureka ahimbise Ruhanga ahabw'eiziina eryo.
Ahakuba obunaku buhikire orubanja okutandikira aha b'omu nju ya Ruhanga; mbwenu ku ruraabe nirubandiza ahariitwe, omuheru gw'abatoorobera ngiri ya Ruhanga guryaba guta?
Kandi abahikiriire ku baraagumirwe okujunwa, abatatiina Ruhanga n'abasiisi baryaba bata?
N'ahabw'ekyo abarikubonabona nk'oku Ruhanga akunda, bagume nibakora gye, kandi bakwatse amagara gaabo Omuhangi orikwesigwa.

Muriise gye obusyo bwa Ruhanga, obu mwakwatsiibwe, mutaburiisa nk'abagyemirwe, kureka muburiise mweyendeire nk'oku Ruhanga arikukunda; ti habw'omururu mubi gw'okutunga ebintu, kureka mwine omutima ogurikukunda,
murekye kutegyekyesa eikama obusyo obu mwakwatsiibwe, kureka mube eky'okureeberaho aharibwo.
Bwanyima Omuriisa omukuru ku aryorekwa, muryaheebwa ekirunga ky'ekitiinisa ekitarikuhunduuka.
Nikwo naimwe abato mworobere abakuru. Mwena mwezirikye obucureezi, mubone kuheerezana; ahakuba Ruhanga arwanisa ab'amaryo, kwonka abacureezi abaha omugisha.
Mumwegyekyerere okushoberwa kwanyu kwona, ahabw'okuba naabataho omutima.
Mwerinde; mugume nimureeba. Sitaane omuzigu waanyu naashooba nk'entare erikutsinda, naasherura ou araarye.
Mumurwanise, muhamire omu kwikiriza kwanyu, nimumanya ngu ab'eishe-emwe abari omu nsi yoona nabo bahikwaho obusaasi nk'obwanyu.
Kandi Ruhanga ow'embabazi zoona, owaabeeteire ekitiinisa kye ekitahwaho omuri Kristo, ku muriheza kubonabonesibwa akaanya kakye, aryabagarura busya, abagumye, abahe amaani.
Aheebwe obutegyeki ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.

Naabahandiikira nincwera ahagufu, nimpandiikisa Siluwano, ow'eishe-emwe orikwesigwa, nk'oku ndikuteekateeka; nimbeehanangiriza, kandi nimpamya ngu ezi nizo mbabazi za Ruhanga ez'amazima; mube nizo mwahamiramu.
Ekanisa ya Babulooni eyaatoorainwe nkaimwe yaabaramutsya; kandi na Mako omwana wangye yaabaramutsya.
Muramukanise okunywegyera kw'okukunda. Mugume n'obusingye, imwe mwena abari omuri Kristo.

Nyowe Simooni Petero, omuhuuku kandi entumwa ya Yesu Kristo, naabahandiikira imwe abaahairwe okwikiriza kw'obuguzi bwingi nk'okwaitu, omu kuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga waitu kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo;
embabazi n'obusingye byongyerwe omuriimwe omu kumanya Ruhanga na Yesu Mukama waitu.
ebyamureeteire kuturaganisa eby'obuguzi bwingi kandi ebikuru munonga, ngu ahabw'ebyo murugye omu kujunda okw'omu nsi okurikureetwa okwetenga okubi, mubone kukwatanisa na Ruhanga omu buteeka bwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo mugire obweziriki bwingi; aha kwikiriza kwanyu mwongyereho emicwe emirungi; aha micwe emirungi yaanyu mwongyereho okwetegyereza;
aha kwetegyereza mwongyereho okwerinda; aha kwerinda mwongyreho okugumisiriza; aha kugumisiriza mwongyereho okutiina Ruhanga;
aha kutiina Ruhanga mwongyereho okukunda ab'eishe-emwe; kaachi aha kukunda ab' eishe-emwe mwongyereho okukunda.
Kandi ebyo ku muraabe mubiine, byayongyera kuba bingi munonga, nibibazibira kuba abeeremwa nari abatarikwana byana omu by'okumanya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ahakuba obuzirweho ebyo aba afiire amaisho, naareeba ebiri haihi, kandi aba ayebirwe ku yaashemeziibweho ebibi bye ebya ira.
N'ahabw'ekyo, B'eishe-emwe, mwongyere kwezirika kuhamya okwetwa kwanyu n'okutooranwa kwanyu; ahakuba ku muraatwaze mutyo, timurigwa biro byona;
kureka muryaheerwa kimwe okutaaha omu bukama obutahwaho bwa Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nikyo nyendera kubaijutsya obutoosha ebigambo ebyo, n'obu muraabe nimubimanya, kandi muhamiire omu mazima agu mwine.
Kandi ninteekateeka nti, obu nkiri omu rusiisira oru, nshemereire kubeezirikisa ahabw'okubaijutsya,
nimmanya ngu okwihwaho okw'orusiisira rwangye kuri haihi, nka Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo oku yammanyiise.
Kandi niinyija kwezirika ngu, ku ndiheza kufa, mubaase kuguma nimweyijutsya ebyo buri mwanya gwona.
Mumanye ngu titurakuratiire nfumu ezaagunzirwe n'obwengye, obu twabamanyisa obushoboorozi bwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'okwija kwe, kureka tukaba turi baakareebi b'ekitiinisa ky'obukama bwe.
Ahakuba Ruhanga Isheboona akamuha ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa, obu eiraka ryamwizira niriruga omu kitiinisa ekirikukira byona, nirigira riti: Ogu n'Omwana wangye orikukundwa, ou nshemerererwa munonga;
kandi eryo iraka tukarihurira niriruga omu iguru, obu twabaire turi hamwe nawe aha rushozi orwo orurikwera.

Kandi twine ekigambo ky'obunabi ekirikukira kuhamibwa. Ku murikyetaho, muryaba mukozire gye, ahakuba kiri nk'etabaaza erikwaka omu mwirima, okuhitsya obu buritaagurikana, n'enyonyoozi ey'omu kasheeshe ekaaka omu mitima yaanyu.
Mubanze mumanye eki ngu tihariho kigambo ky'obunabi eky'omu Byahandiikirwe ekirikubaasa kushoboororwa omuntu nk'oku arikweyendera;
ahakuba tihariho kigambo kya baanabi ekyabaire kireetwa okukunda kw'omuntu, kureka abantu bakaba bagamba ebyaruga ahari Ruhanga, nibakoresibwa Omwoyo Orikwera.
Kandi baingi baryakuratira emicwe yaabo ey'obushambani; abo baryajumisa omuhanda gw'amazima.
Omu kwetenga kwabo baryabaihamu enshaagi, nibababeihabeiha n'ebigambo by'ebishuba; kwonka orubanja oru baacwereirwe ira tiruriikarayo, n'okucwekyerera kwabo tikurihungira.
Ahakuba Ruhanga ku araabe atarasaasiire baamaraika obu baashiisha, akabanaga okuzimu, akabata omu biina eby'omwirima okurindirwayo okuhitsya aha kiro ky'orubanja;
kandi ku araabe atarasaasiire nsi eya ira, akakiza Noa omurangi w'okuhikiirira n'abandi mushanju, obu yaareeta omwegyemure gw'amaizi aha nsi ey'abatarikumutiina;
kandi ku araabe yaacwereire endembo za Sodoma na Gomora orubanja, akazihindura eiju, akazigira eky'okureeberaho aha barikugyendera omu kutamutiina;
akakiza Iooti ohikiriire, owaabaire ashobeirwe ahabw'emicwe mibi y'abashambani;
(ahakuba omushaija ogwo ohikiriire akaba atwire nabo, naareeba kandi naahurira ebi baabaire bakora, kwonka agira enaku ebiro byona omu mutima gwe oguhikiriire ahabw'eby'obugomi ebi baabaire nibakora)
n'ahabw'ekyo Mukama naamanya kukiza abarikumutiina omu kugyezibwa, kandi n'okugumya abatahikiriire omu kifubiro okuhitsya aha kiro ky'orubanja,
okukira abo abatwarwa omubiri n'okwetenga kwagwo okurikubashiisha, n'abarikugaya obutegyeki.
N'abantu abatagira ki batiina, ebyegyengye abatatiina kujuma b'ekitiinisa,
kunu baamaraika, n'obu baraabe babakiza amaani n'obushoboorozi, tibacwera b'ekitiinisa abo rubanja omu maisho ga Mukama, nibabajuma.
Kwonka abo bashusha nk'enyamaishwa ezitaine bwengye, ezaahangiirwe kutegwa n'okwitwa, kandi basheka ebi batarikumanya; aha muheru okuhwerekyerera kwabo nabo kuryabahwerekyereza,
bakorwe kubi, nibaihurwa ebihembo by'okukora kubi kwabo. Beesiimira ebinoomo nyomushana; n'abantu b'amabara mabi n'obumogo, bazaana kubi omu magyenyi gaabo, nibariira hamwe naimwe;
baine amaisho agaijwire obushambani, kandi agataruha kushiisha; niboosya ab'emitima etahamire, baine omutima ogumanyiire okwetenga okubi; n'abaana bakyeenirwe;
abaateishukire omuhanda oguhikire, bakahaba, bakatoora omuhanda gwa Balamu mutabani wa Beori, owaakunzire ebihembo by'okutahikiirira;
kwonka akahanwa ahabw'okushiisha kwe, obu endogoya etagamba yaagamba nk'omuntu, ekazibira eiraro rya nabi ogwo.
Bagamba ebigambo ebikuru eby'okwetunguura ebitaine mugasho; boosya abantu ababa bahungire abatuura omu buhabe, nibababeihabeihesa okwetenga okubi okw'omubiri.
Babaraganisa obusingye, haza bo bari abahuuku b'okujunda; ahakuba ekisingura omuntu, nikyo aba omuhuuku waakyo.
Ahabw'okuba abaaherize kukira ebihagaro eby'ensi ahabw'okumanya Mukama n'Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo, ku bagaruka kubyetaasyamu, byabasingura, ebya bwanyima byabo biba bibi okukira eby'okubanza.
Mumanye ngu ekyakubaire gye aharibo, kuri bataramanyire muhanda gw'okuhikiirira, okukira obu baherize kugumanya, bakateishuka, bakareka ekiragiro ekirikwera eki baahairwe.
Ekyo kibahikireho nk'enfumu y'amazima erikugira eti: Embwa neegarukira ebitanaki byayo, n'empunu eyoogiibwe egaruka kwekuringa omu shaabo.
Abarikukundwa, egi n'ebaruha ya kabiri ei naabahandiikira; omu baruha ezo zombi eki naagyendereire n'okusisiimura emitima yaanyu etarimu buryarya nimbaijutsya;
ngu mwijukye ebigambo ebyagambirwe ira baanabi abarikwera, n'ekiragiro kya Mukama kandi Omujuni waitu eki mwagambiirwe entumwa ezaabatumirweho.
Mubanze mumanye eki ngu, omu biro by'aha mperu haryaija abagaaniizi abarikugaaniiza, nibakuratira okwetenga kwabo okubi,
nibagira bati: Ku yaaraganiise kwija! Mbwenu arahi? Ahakuba okwiha obu baatatenkuriitwe baagwejegyera, byona bituura nk'oku byabaire biri aha kutandika kw'okuhangwa kw'ensi.
Ahakuba nibabyeyebesa nkana, nibamanya ngu hakaba hariho eiguru okuruga ira, n'ensi eyaahangirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga okuruga omu maizi, kandi ekaguma eri ahagati yaago;
kandi ahabw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga ensi eyaabaire eriho ekagaruka yaashwekwa amaizi g'omwegyemure, yaamirwa;
kwonka eiguru n'ensi ebiriho hati, ahabw'ekigambo ekyo, bibiikiirwe omuriro, nibirindwa okuhitsya aha kiro ky'orubanja eki abantu abatatiina Ruhanga baricwekyererezibwaho.
Mukama tatuuzayo ki yaaraganiise, nk'abamwe oku barikuteekateeka, kureka agumisiriza ahabwanyu, atarikwenda muntu weena kuhwerekyerera, kureka naayenda ngu boona bahikye aha kweteisa.
Kwonka ekiro kya Mukama kiryaija nk'omushuma; obwo eiguru riryarugaho n'okuhinda kuhango, n'ebintu by'obuhangwa biryayagibwa omuriro, kandi ensi n'ebigirimu biryayokibwa.
Ebyo byona ku biraabe biri eby'okuyaga bityo, mureebe oku mushemereire kuba abarikwera kandi abarikutiina Ruhanga omu mitwarize yaanyu,
nimutegyereza ekiro kya Mukama, kandi nimukora eby'okukirahutsya; ahabw'ekyo kiro eiguru riryayokibwa rihweho, kandi eby'obuhangwa biryayagibwa omuriro mwingi.
Kwonka itwe nitutegyereza eiguru erisya n'ensi ensya ebituurwamu okuhikiirira, nk'oku yaaraganiise.
N'ahabw'ekyo, abarikukundwa, nk'oku mutegyereize ebyo, mwezirikye abashangye mwine obusingye, mutaine ibara ribi n'obu kaakuba akamogo omu maisho ge.
Mumanye ngu okugumisiriza kwa Mukama waitu okwo nikwo kujunwa; nka mugyenzi waitu orikukundwa paulo oku yaabahandiikiire nk'obwengye obu yaahairwe oku buri,

naagamba atyo omu baruha ze zoona. Omuri ezo harimu ebigambo bimwe ebigumire kwetegyerezibwa, ebi abatarikwetegyereza n'abatahamire bakiikamya, nk'oku bagira ebyahandiikirwe ebindi, bakeereetaho okuhwerekyerera.
N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe, abarikukundwa, nk'oku mushangirwe nimumanya ebyo, mwerinde mutahabisibwa obuhabe bw'abantu babi, mukaruga omu kuhama kwanyu.
Kureka mukurire omu mbabazi za Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo, n'omu kumumanya. Aheebwe ekitiinisa hati n'ebiro byona. Amiina.
(kandi amagara ago gakoorekwa, twagareeba, twagahamya, kandi nitubagambira amagara ago agatahwaho agaabaire gari na Isheboona gakatworekwa)
eki twareebire kandi eki twahuriire, nikyo turikubagambira ngu naimwe mukwatanise naitwe; kandi naitwe tukwataniise na Isheboona n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo;
kandi nitubahandiikira ebyo ngu okushemererwa kwaitu kube okuhikire.
Ku turaabe nitugira ngu nitukwatanisa nawe, haza kunu nitugyendera omu mwirima, biri nitubeiha kandi titurikukora by'amazima;
kwonka ku tugyendera omu mushana, nka We oku ari omu mushana, tukwatanisa hamwe, kandi eshagama ya Yesu Kristo Omwana we eguma neetwozyaho ebibi byona.
Ku tugira ngu titwine kibi, tuba nitwebeiha, kandi tuba tutaine mazima.
Ku twatura ebibi byaitu, niwe w'okwesigwa kandi ohikiriire kutusaasira ebibi n'okutwozyaho eby'okutahikiirira byona.
Ku tugira ngu titukashiishaga, tumuhindura omubeihi, kandi ekigambo kye kiba kitari muriitwe.
kandi Ogwo niwe karabo ahabw'ebibi byaitu, kandi ti byaitu twenka, kureka n'ebibi by'ensi yoona.
Ahari eki niho turikuhamiza ngu nitumumanya, ku turaabe nitukora ebi aturagiira.
Orikugira ati, Nimmumanya, atarikworobera biragiro bye, n'omubeihi, kandi naaba ataine mazima;
kwonka orikworobera ekigambo kye, okukunda oku akunda Ruhanga kuba kuhikiriziibwe buzima omuriwe. Aho niho tumanyira ku turi omuriwe;
orikugira ngu atuura omuriwe, ashemereire kutwaza nka We oku yaabaire atwaza.
Abarikukundwa, tindikubahandiikira kiragiro kisya, kureka ekya ira, eki mwabaire mwine okwiha iranaira; ekiragiro ekyo ekya ira nikyo kigambo eki mwahuriire.
Kwonka kandi nimbahandiikira ekiragiro kisya, kandi eky'amazima omuriwe n'omuriimwe, ahakuba omwirima niguhwaho, kandi n'omushana ogw'amazima gwajwire.
Orikugira ngu ari omu mushana, akanga mwene ishe, biri akiri omu mwirima na hati.
Orikukunda mwene ishe, naaba ari omu mushana, kandi omuriwe tiharimu kirikuteeza ntsibo.
Kwonka orikwanga mwene ishe, naaba ari omu mwirima, kandi naaba atarikumanya i arikuza, ahabw'okuba omwirima niguba gumuhumize amaisho.
Nimbahandiikira, imwe abaana bato, ahakuba ebibi byanyu bibasaasiirwe ahabw'eiziina rye.

Nimbahandiikira, imwe baishebo, ahakuba nimumanya Ogwo owaabaire ariho okwiha iranaira. Nimbahandiikira, imwe abatsigazi, ahakuba musingwire Omubi. Naabahandiikira, imwe abaana bato, ahakuba nimumanya Isheboona.

Naabahandiikira, imwe baishebo, ahakuba nimumanya Ogwo owaabaire ariho okwiha iranaira. Naabahandiikira, imwe abatsigazi, ahakuba mwine amaani, n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga kituura omuriimwe, kandi musingwire Omubi.
Ahakuba byona eby'omu nsi, ebi omubiri gwetegna, n'ebi amaisho geetenga, n'okwehimbisa ahabw'eby'amagara aga, tibiruga hari Isheboona, kureka biruga omu nsi egi.
Kandi ensi egi neehwaho n'okwetenga kwayo; kwonka okora ebi Ruhanga akunda, agumaho ebiro byona.
Imwe abaana bato, ogu nigwo mwanya gw'aha muheru; nk'oku mwahuriire ngu nihenda kwija
Bakataana naitwe, baaturugamu; kwonka bakaba batari baitu; ahakuba kuri baabaire bari abaitu, bakaagumire naitwe; kwonka bakeegyendera, ngu kimanyirwe kimwe ku boona batari baitu.
Kwonka imwe mukashukwaho amajuta Ogwo Orikwera, kandi mwena nimukimanya.
Tinaabahandiikira nk'abatarikumanya mazima, kureka nk'abarikugamanya, kandi nimumanya ngu tihariho kishuba ekiruga omu mazima.
Omubeihi n'oha? T'ogwo ohakana ku Yesu atari Kristo? Antikristo n'ogwo oyehakana Isheboona n'Omwana.
Tihariho oyehakana Omwana akagira Isheboona. Ogwo oikiriza Omwana niwe aine na Isheboona.
N'ahabw'ekyo eki mwahuriire okwiha iranaira kibe nikyo kyaguma omuriimwe. Eki mwahuriire okwiha iranaira ku kiriguma omuriimwe, naimwe muryaguma omu Mwana n'omuri Isheboona.
Kandi endagaano ei yaaturaganiise n'egi, okuheebwa amagara agatahwaho.
Ebi naabibahandiikira kubamanyisa eby'abarikwenda kubahabisa;

naimwe okushukwaho amajuta, oku yaabahaire, nikuguma omuriimwe, kandi timurikwetenga w'okubeegyesa; nk'okushukaho amajuta kwe oku kubeegyesa ahari byona, kandi oku kuri okw'amazima, kutari kw'ebishuba, nk'oku kwabeegyeise, mube nikwo mwaguma omuriwe.
Na mbwenu, baana bangye abato, mugume omuriwe, bwanyima ku arireebeka, tubone kwija omu maisho ge twine obumanzi, tutarikukwatwa nshoni tukeenyonya aha kwija kwe.
Ku muraabe nimumanya ngu ahikiriire, mumanye ngu omuntu weena okora eby'okuhikiirira biri azairwe Ruhanga.
Abarikukundwa, hati turi abaana ba Ruhanga; oku turiba, tikukamanyirwe; kwonka nitumanya, ngu ku arishuuruurwa, turyashushana nawe, ahabw'okuba turyamureeba nk'oku ari.
Kandi omuntu weena omwineho amatsiko ago, ayeshemeze nka We oku ari oshemeire.
Omuntu weena okora ekibi akora eby'obugomi; kandi ekibi nibwo bugomi.
Nimumanya ngu Ogwo akoorekwa kwihaho ebibi, kandi omuriwe tiharimu kibi.
Weena oguma omuriwe tashiisha; weena oshiishs takamureebaga, n'obu kwakuba okumumanya.
Imwe abaana bato, hatagira omuntu weena owaabahabya. Okora eby'okuhikiirira niwe ahikiriire, nka We oku ahikiriire.
Okora ekibi n'owa Sitaane; ahakuba okwiha iranaira Sitaane ashiisha. Nikyo Omwana wa Ruhanga yaayorekyeirwe kuhwerekyereza emirimo ya Sitaane.
Weena ozairwe Ruhanga takora kibi; ahabw'okuba embibo ye eguma omuriwe; kandi tabaasa kukora kibi, ahakuba akazaarwa Ruhanga.
Ekyo nikyo kimanyisa abaana ba Ruhanga n'abaana ba Sitaane; weena otakora eby'okuhikiirira ti wa Ruhanga, n'obu yaakuba otakunda mwene ishe.
turekye kuba nka Kaini owaabaire ari ow'Omubi, akaita omurumuna. Mbwenu akamwitira ki? Ahabw'okuba emicwe ye ekaba eri mibi, kandi ey'omurumuna ekaba eri ey'ohikiriire.
B'eishe-emwe, mutatangaara ngu ensi neebanga.
Itwe nitumanya ngu tukaruga omu kufa, twataaha omu magara, ahabw'okuba tukunda ab'eishe-emwe. Otaine rukundo aguma omu kufa.
Weena orikwanga mwene ishe n'omwitsi; kandi nimumanya ngu tihariho mwitsi oine amagara agatahwaho omuriwe.
Aha niho tumanyira rukundo, ahakuba Yesu akahayo amagara ge ahabwaitu; naitwe tushemereire kuhayo amagara gaitu ahabwa beene waitu.
Mbwenu omuntu weena otungire ebintu by'ensi egi, ku yaakureeba mugyenzi we abikyenire, yaamwehuzya, okukunda kwa Ruhanga kukaaguma kuta omuriwe?
Baana bato, turekye kukundana omu bigambo nari aha rurimi, kureka tukundane omu bi turikukora n'omu mazima.
Aha niho turikumanyira ka turi ab'amazima, tukagarukwamu emitima omu maisho ge,
omuri byona ebi etushinja; ahakuba Ruhanga ni mukuru okukira emitima yaitu, kandi naamanya byona.
Abarikukundwa, emitima yaitu ku eraabe etarikutushinja, twine obumanzi omu maisho ga Ruhanga;
kandi eki tushaba kyona akituha, ahakuba tworobera ebiragiro bye, kandi tukora ebishemeire omu maisho ge.
Kandi eki nikyo kiragiro kye, ngu twikirize eiziina ry'Omwana we Yesu Kristo, kandi tukundane nk'oku yaaturagiire.
Boona aboorobera ebiragiro bye baguma omuriwe, nawe aguma omuribo. Kandi aha niho tumanyira ngu aguma omuriitwe, ahabw'Omwoyo ou yaatuhaire.
Aha niho tumanyira Omwoyo wa Ruhanga; buri mwoyo gwona ogugamba ku Yesu Kristo yaiziire omu mubiri, guba niguruga ahari Ruhanga;
kandi omwoyo gwona ogutagamba Yesu gutyo, guba gutari gwa Ruhanga. Ogwo n'omwoyo gwa antikristo ogu mwahuriire ngu nigwija, kandi na hati gwahikire omu nsi.
Imwe abaana bato, muri aba Ruhanga, kandi mubasingwire, ahakuba Ori omuriimwe ni mukuru okukira ori omu nsi.
Bo n'ab'ensi; n'ahabw'ekyo nibagamba eby'ensi kandi n'ensi neebahurira.
Itwe turi aba Ruhanga. Omuntu weena omanya Ruhanga atuhurira; kandi otari wa Ruhanga tatuhurira. Aho niho tumanyira omwoyo ogw'amazima, n'omwoyo ogurikuhabya.
Abarikukundwa, tukundane, ahakuba okukunda kuruga ahari Ruhanga, kandi omuntu weena ogira rukundo aba azairwe Ruhanga.
Otagira rukundo tamanya Ruhanga; ahakuba Ruhanga aba rukundo.
Omuri eki nimwo okukunda kwa Ruhanga kwayorekyeirwe ahariitwe, obu yaatuma Omwana we omwe nyamunegyere, ngu tube abahuriire ahabwe.
Omuri eki nimwo okukunda kuri, tiitwe twakunzire Ruhanga, kureka niwe yaatukunzire, akatuma Omwana we kuba ekarabo ahabw'ebibi byaitu.
Abarikukundwa, Ruhanga ku araabe yaatukunzire atyo, naitwe tushemereire kukundana.
Tihariho muntu orareebire Ruhanga; ku tukundana, Ruhanga aguma omuriitwe, n'okukunda kwe kuhikiirizibw aomuriitwe.
Aha niho tumanyira ngu tuguma omuriwe, nawe omuriitwe, ahabw'okuba akatuha aha Mwoyo we.
Itwe tukareeba kandi twahamya ku Isheboona yaatumire Omwana we kuba Omujuni w'ensi.
Omuntu weena orikumanya ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga, Ruhanga naaguma omuriwe, kandi nawe naaguma omuri Ruhanga.
Itwe nitumanya, kandi nitwikiriza okukunda oku Ruhanga atukunda. Ruhanga ni rukundo; kandi oguma omuri rukundo niwe aguma omuri Ruhanga, na Ruhanga akaguma omuriwe.
Omuri eki nimwo okukunda kuhikiirizibwa omuriitwe, ngu tugire obumanzi tutaritiina aha kiro ky'orubanja, ahakuba nk'oku ari nikwo naitwe turi omu nsi egi.
Omu kukunda tihabamu bwoba, okukunda okuhikire kubingira aheeru obwoba; ahakuba obwoba bugyenda n'ekiheneso, kandi oine obwoba aba ataine kukunda okuhikire.
Itwe nitukunda, ahakuba We akabanza kutukunda.
Omuntu weena ku agira ati, Ninkunda Ruhanga, haza naayanga mugyenzi we, n'omubeihi; ahakuba otakunda mugyenzi we ou arareebire, tabaasa kukunda Ruhanga ou atakareebaga.
Kandi twine ekiragiro eki ekyarugire ahariwe ngu, Orikukunda Ruhanga akunda na mugyenzi we.
Omuntu weena oikiriza ngu Yesu ni Kristo aba azairwe Ruhanga; kandi weena okunda omuzaire aba naakunda n'ou yaazaire.
Aha niho turikumanyira ngu tukunda abaana ba Ruhanga, ku tukunda Ruhanga, twayorobera ebiragiro bye.
Ahakuba oku nikwo kukunda Ruhanga, itwe okworobera ebiragiro bye; kandi ebiragiro bye tibirusya.
Ahabw'okuba kyona ekizairwe Ruhanga kisingura ensi; kandi obu nibwo businguzi obusingura ensi, nikwo kwikiriza kwaitu.
Mbwenu n'oha osingura ensi? T'ogwo oikiriza ngu Yesu n'Omwana wa Ruhanga?
Ogwo niwe yaizire, akaraba omu maizi n'eshagama, Yesu Kristo, ti mu maizi gonka, kureka omu maizi n'eshagama;
kandi Omwoyo niwe abihamya, ahabw'okuba Omwoyo nigo mazima.
Hariho ebirikuhamya bishatu, Omwoyo n'amaizi n'eshagama; kandi ebishatu ebyo biikirizana.
Ku turaabe nitwikiriza okuhamya kw'abantu, okuhamya kwa Ruhanga nikukira okwabo; ahakuba okuhamya kwa Ruhanga nikwo oku, ngu akahamya eby'Omwana we.
Oikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga aine okuhamya okwo omuriwe. Otaikiriza Ruhanga aba amuhindwire omubeihi, ahabw'okuba aba ataikiriize kuhamya oku Ruhanga yaahamize aha Mwana we.
Kandi oku nikwo kuhamya okwo, ngu Ruhanga akatuha amagara agatahwaho, kandi amagara ago gari omu Mwana we.
Omuntu oine ogwo Mwana niwe aine amagara; otaine Mwana wa Ruhanga taine magara.
Ebi naabihandiikira imwe abaikiriza eiziina ry'Omwana wa Ruhanga, ngu mubone kumanya ku mwine amagara agatahwaho.
Kandi obu nibwo bumanzi obu twine omuriwe, ngu kutushaba ekintu kyona nk'oku akunda, atuhurira.
Kandi ku turaabe nitumanya ngu atuhurira omuri byona ebi tushaba, nitumanya ngu tutungire ebi twamushabire.

Omuntu weena ku araareebe mugyenzi we naakora ekibi ekitari ky'okumwitsa, ashabe, kandi Ruhanga aryamuha amagara ahabw'abo abakozire ekibi ekitari ky'okubaitsa. Hariho ekibi ekirikwitsa; ekyo tindikugira ngu aryakyeshengyerereza.
Ekitari ky'okuhikiirira kyona kiba ekibi; kwonka hariho ekibi ekitari ky'okwitsa.
Nitumanya ngu omuntu weena ozairwe Ruhanga takora kibi; ahakuba Ogwo owaazairwe Ruhanga niwe amurinda, kandi Omubi tamukoraho.
Itwe nitumanya ku turi aba Ruhanga, kandi ensi yoona ku eri omu butegyeki bw'Omubi ogwo.

Kandi nitumanya ngu Omwana wa Ruhanga akaija, yaatuha okwetegyereza, ngu tumanye Ow'amazima; naitwe turi omuri Ogwo ow'amazima, niwe Yesu Kristo Omwana we. Ogwo niwe Ruhanga ow'amazima, n'amagara, agatahwaho.
Imwe baana bato 'mwe, mwerinde ebishushani ebirikuramibwa.
Nyowe nk'omukuru naakuhandiikira, iwe Omuzaire owaatoorainwe n'abaana baawe, abu ndikukunda omu mazima, kandi tiinye nyenka kureka n'abandi boona abarikumanya amazima,
ahabw'amazima agatuura omuriitwe, kandi agariguma naitwe ebiro byona;
embabazi n'okusaasira n'obusingye ebirikuruga ahari Ruhanga Isheboona na Yesu Kristo Omwana we, biryaguma naitwe omu mazima n'okukunda.
Nkashemererwa munonga ahakuba nkashanga abamwe aha baana baawe nibagyendera omu mazima nk'oku twaragiirwe Isheboona.
Mbwenu ninkweshengyereza, Muzaire, ntari nk'orikukuhandiikira ekiragiro kisya, kureka ekyo eki tushangirwe twine okwiha iranaira, ekituragiira ngu tukundane.
Kandi oku nikwo kukunda, itwe okugyendera omu biragiro bye. Eki nikyo kiragiro, nk'oku mwahuriire okuruga iranaira, ngu mube nikyo mwagyenderamu.
Ahakuba hariho abarikuhabisa baingi abaizire omu nsi, abatarikwikiriza ngu Yesu Kristo akaija aine omubiri. Orikugamba atyo n'omuntu orikuhabya abandi, kandi ni antikristo.
Mwerinde, mutafeerwa eki mwakoreire, kureka muheebwe ekihembo ekihikire.
Omuntu weena orikurenzya aha nyengyesa ya Kristo atagigumiremu, naaba ataine Ruhanga; orikugumira omu nyegyesa egyo, ogwo naaba aine Isheboona kandi n'Omwana.
Omuntu weena ku ariija ahi muri, ataine nyegyesa egyo mutarimutaasya omu nju, n'obu kwakuba okumuramutsya;
ahakuba orimuramutsya, aryaba akwataniise nawe omu micwe ye emibi.
N'obu ndaabe nyine bingi kubahandiikira, kwonka tindikusiima kubihandiikisa bwino aha rupapura; ahakuba nyine amatsiko kwija okwo kugaaniira naimwe nitureebana, tubone kuhitsya okushemererwa kwaitu.
Abaana ba murumuna waawe baakuramutsya.
Nyowe nk'omukuru naakuhandiikira, iwe Gaayo orikukundwa, ou nkunda omu mazima.
Orikukundwa, ninshaba ngu obe gye omuri byona, kandi ngu ogire amagara omu mubiri, nk'oku ori gye omu mwoyo.
Ahakuba nkashemererwa munonga obu abamwe aha b'eishe-emwe baija, nibahamya amazima gaawe, kandi n'oku orikugagyenderamu.
Tihariho ki ndikushemerererwa okukira eki, okuhurira ngu abaana bangye nibagyendera omu mazima.
Orikukundwa, nookora omurimo gw'obwesigwa omuri byona ebi orikukorera ab'eishe-emwe, haza kandi bari abagyenyi abu otarikumanya,
abahamize okukunda kwawe omu maisho g'ekanisa. Kandi ku oribaraga gye omu rugyendo rwabo omu muringo ogurikusiimisa Ruhanga, oryaba okozire gye.
Ahabw'okuba bakaruga owaabo ahabw'Eiziina eryo, bataine ki baihire aha Banyamahanga.
N'ahabw'ekyo naitwe tushemereire kwakiira abari nk'abo, tube abarikukwatanisa nabo kuhwerana omu mazima.
Hariho eki naahandiikiire ekanisa; kwonka Diotorefe, okunda kwekuza, tarikutwikiriza.

N'ahabw'ekyo, ku ndiija, ndyabaijutsya ebi arikukora, naatujuma, kandi naatugambaho ebigambo bibi. Kandi tagarukira hari ebyo byonka, kureka ataho n'okwanga kwakiira ab'eishe-emwe, n'abarikwenda kubaakiira abazibira, agaruka abacwa omu kanisa.
Orikukundwa, otaritooreza orikukora ekibi, kureka orikukora ekirungi. Orikukora gye n'owa Ruhanga; orikukora kubi, takareebaga Ruhanga.
Demeterio naasiimwa boona, kandi n'amazima nigakihamya; naitwe nitumuhamya, kandi naiwe noomanya ngu okuhamya kwaitu n'okw'amazima.
Nkaba nyine bingi kukuhandiikira; kwonka tindikusiima kubihandiikisa akacumu na bwino.
Kwonka nyine amatsiko kukureeba juba; obwo turyagaaniira nitureebana.
Obusingye bugume naiwe. Banywani baitu baakuramutsya. Ndamukiza banywani baitu buri omwe.
embabazi n'obusingye n'okukunda byeyongyere omuriimwe.

Abarikukundwa, ku naabaire niinyezirika munonga kubahandiikira eby'okujunwa kwaitu twena, nkagyemwa kubahandiikira nimbeehanangiriza kurwanira munonga okwikiriza oku abarikwera baahairwe rimwe kikahwa.

Ahakuba hariho abantu bamwe abashensheire omuriitwe batamanyirwe, abaarangirwe ira ku baricwerwa orubanja oru; n'abantu abatatiina Ruhanga, abahindura embabazi za Ruhanga orwekwatso ngu bashambane, bakeehakana Omutegyeki waitu omwe wenka kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo.
kandi na baamaraika, abatararinzire bukuru bwabo, bakaruga omu mwanya gwabo ogu baabaire batuuramu, akibarindiire omu mwirima omu njegyere ezitarugwamu, okuhitsya aha kiro kikuru eky'orubanja;

kandi n'aba Sodoma na Gomora n'ab'omu ndembo ezaabaire zihereraine nazo, abaayehaireyo omu bushambani n'okukoranaho eby'enshoni ebitari by'obuhangwa, bakaheebwa ekifubiro ky'omuriro ogutaraara, baaba eky'okureeberaho.
Kwonka Mikaeli maraika omukuru, ku yaarwaniise Sitaane, naahakana nawe nibafa omubiri gwa Musa, tareehangire kumucwera rubanja naamujuma, kureka akagira ati: Mukama akuhane.
Kwonka abashaija abo bajuma ebi batarikumanya; kandi ebi barikumanya, babimanyisibwa obuntu bwabo nk'enyamaishwa ezitaine bwengye, nibyo bakoresa okweshiisha.
Baryakareeba! Ahakuba batoora omuhanda gwa Kaini, boohokyera omu buhabe bwa Balamu ahabw'okutunga enshaagi, kandi bacwekyererera omu bugomi bwa Koora.

Abo, ku baba nibarya naimwe, ni nk'amabara agarikushiisha amagyenyi gaanyu ag'okukundana; n'abariisa b'entaama abariisa enda zaabo batarikutiina; n'ebicu ebitarimu njura ebitwarwa omuyaga; n'ebiti ebitariho byana omu bunaku bw'ekyanda ebifiire kabiri, ebirimbwirwe n'emizi;
ni nk'ebingonzi by'enyanja eby'amaani, babira eifuro ry'enshoni zaabo; kandi ni nk'enyonyoozi ezitahamiire hamwe, abarindiirwe omwirima ndindindi ebiro byona.

okucwera boona orubanja, n'okurusingisa boona abatatiina Ruhanga ahabw'eby'okutamutiina ebi baakozire bakamucumuraho, kandi n'ebigambo ebigumire byona ebi abasiisi abatatiina Ruhanga baamugambireho nibamurwanisa.
Abo n'abeetomboita, abatuura nibatonzya, abakurata okwetenga kwabo okubi, abeehimbisa n'ebigambo ebirengyesereize, kandi abaha abantu ekitiinisa nibabendamu enshaagi.
Kwonka imwe, abarikukundwa, mwijukye ebigambo ebyagambirwe ira entumwa za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo,
oku zaabagambiire, nizigira ziti: Omu biro by'aha mperu haryabaho abashekyerezi, abarikukurata okwetenga kwabo okw'okutatiina Ruhanga.
Abo nibo bareeta okwetaanisamu, abantu-buntu abataine Mwoyo.
Kwonka imwe, abarikukundwa, mweyombekye aha musingi gw'okwikiriza kwanyu okurikwera munonga; mushabe omu Mwoyo Orikwera.
Mwerindire omu kukunda kwa Ruhanga; mutegyereze okusaasira kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo, okuribahitsya omu magara agatahwaho.
Kandi abamwe abarikubanganisa mubaikiririse;
abandi mubakize nimubashahura omu muriro; n'abandi mubasaasire nimutiina, nangwa mwangye n'ekijwaro ekiine amabara agateirweho omubiri.

Ruhanga ogwo omwe wenka, Omujuni waitu owaatujunire ahabwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu, aheebwe ekitiinisa eky'obukama bwe n'obutegyeki n'obushoboorozi, ebi yaabaire aine ira ryona, hati n'ebiro byona. Amiina.
owaahamize ebi yaareebire byona eby'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'eby'okuhamya oku Yesu Kristo yaahamize.
Orikushoma ebigambo by'obunabi obu aine omugisha, kandi baine omugisha abarikubihurira, bakata omutima aha bihandiikirwemu; ahabw'okuba obunaku buri haihi.
kandi ebirikuruga ahari Yesu Kristo kareebi omwesigwa, omujigaijo omu kuzooka, kandi omutegyeki w'abagabe b'ensi. Ogwo otukunda, kandi owaatukomoroire omu bibi byaitu n'eshagama ye,
akatuhindura obukama n'abanyamurwa ahari Ruhanga we kandi Ishe, aheebwe ekitiinisa n'obutegyeki ebiro byona. Amiina.
Reeba, naija n'ebicu, kandi eriisho ryona riryamureeba, n'abo abaamucumitsire; n'enganda zoona ez'omu nsi ziryaborooga ahabw'okwija kwe. Eego, Amiina.
Nyowe Yohaana mwene waanyu, okwataniise naimwe omuri Yesu omu busaasi n'omu bukama n'omu kugumisiriza, nkaba ndi aha kirwa Patumo, ntuzirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okuhamya ebya Yesu.
Aha izooba rya Mukama nkaba ndi omu Mwoyo, naahurira eiraka rihango nk'ery'enzamba enyima yangye,
nirigira riti: Ebi oraareebe obihandiikye omu kitabo, okyoherereze amakanisa aga mushanju, eya Efeso, Sumuruna, Perugamo, Suatira, Saadi, Filudelafia na Laodikia.
Ahonaaho naahinduka kureeba owaabaire naagamba naanye; ku naahindukire, naareeba ebikondo by'etabaaza mushanju eby'ezaabu,
kandi ahagati y'ebyo bikondo hakaba hariho Orikushusha Omwana w'omuntu, ojwaire ekijwaro ekihikire aha bigyere, kandi ayezirikire orukoba rw'ezaabu omu kifuba;
omutwe gwe n'eishokye rye bikaba nibyera nk'ebyoya by'entaama, nibyerera kimwe nk'orubaare; amaisho ge gakaba gari nk'endimi z'omuriro,
ebigyere bye bikaba nibyengyengyeta nk'omuringa ogushemereziibwe omu iziiko, kandi eiraka rye rikaba nirihoorera nk'amaizi maingi;
omu mukono gwe gwa buryo akwaitsemu enyonyoozi mushanju, omu kanwa ke haarugamu rurara ey'amoogi abiri, kandi ahamaisho ge hakaba nihamurinkana nk'eizooba eririkujwisa amaani.
Nkaba nfiire, mbwenu ndi ohuriire ebiro byona; kandi nyine ebishumuruzo bya Rufu n'Okuzimu.
Mbwenu handiika ebi waareeba, ebiriho kandi ebiribaho bwanyima.

Amakuru g'enyonyoozi mushanju ezi waareeba omu mukono gwangye gwa buryo, kandi n'ebikondo by'etabaaza mushanju eby'ezaabu, ezo nyonyoozi mushanju nibo baamaraika b'ago makanisa mushanju, kandi ebyo bikondo by'etabaaza mushanju nigo makanisa mushanju.

Handiikira maraika w'ekanisa ey'omuri Efeso, oti: Ebi nibyo bigambo by'Ogwo okwaitse enyonyoozi mushanju omu mukono gwe gwa buryo, kandi ogyenda naataayaayira ebikondo by'etabaaza mushanju eby'ezaabu.

Ati: Nimmanya ebi orikukora, okwezirika kwawe, n'okugumisiriza kwawe; kandi nimmanya ku otabaasa kugumisiririza abantu babi, kandi ku waayetegyereize abeeyeta entumwa, haza batari bo, okashanga bari ab'ebishuba.
Nimmanya ku ogumisiriza, kandi ku oyemera bingi ahabw'eiziina ryangye, kandi ku otakaruhaga.
Kwonka nyine eki ndikufa naiwe; okareka okukunda kwawe okw'okubanza.

N'ahabw'ekyo oijukye ahu waihire waaza kugwa, oyeteise, ogarukye okore nk'oku waabaire nookora okubanza. Ku oraabe otakozire otyo, ndyaija ahariiwe, nyihe ekikondo ky'etabaaza yaawe omu mwanya gwakyo, ku oriba oteeteisize.
Kwonka eki oine, oyanga ebi Abanikolaiti bakora, naanye ebi nyanga.
Oine amatu ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa. Orikusingura ndyamwikiriza kurya aha muti gw'amagara, oguri omuri
Handiikira maraika w'ekanisa ey'omuri Sumuruna, oti: Ebi nibyo bigambo by'Ow'okubanza kandi Ow'aha muheru, owaabaire afiire, mbwenu ahuriire.
Naagira ati: Nimmanya obusaasi bwawe, n'obworo bwawe (kwonka ori omutungi), kandi nimmanya ngu ojumwa abeeyeta Abayudaaya, haza batari bo, bari sinagogi ya Sitaane.

Otatiina ebi orikwija kubonabonesibwamu. Reeba, Sitaane naija kuta bamwe omuriimwe omu kihome, ngu mugyezibwe, kandi mumare ebiro ikumi nimubonabonesibwa. Guma ori omwesigwa okuhitsya aha kufa; naanye ndyakuha ekirunga ky'amagara.
Oine amatu ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa. Orikusingura, okufa okwa kabiri tikwine ki kurimwitsa.

naagira ati: Nimmanya ahu otuura ku niho ekitebe ky'obukama bwa Sitaane kiba; ku ogumiza kimwe eiziina ryangye, kandi ku otareehakaine ku orikuunyikiriza, nangwa n'omu biryo bya Antipa, kareebi wangye omwesigwa, owaitiirwe owaanyu, ahu Sitaane atuura.

Kwonka nyine ebigambo bikye ebi ndikufa naiwe; okwo oineyo abarikwikiriza enyegyesa ya Balamu, owaayegyeise Balaki kuta enkongi omu maisho g'Abaisraeli, ngu barye ebitambiirwe ebishushani ebirikuramibwa, kandi bashambane.
Kandi hoona oine n'abandi abarikwikiriza enyegyesa ey'Abanikolaiti.
N'ahabw'ekyo oyeteise; ku oraabe oteeteisize, niinyija kwija juba ahariiwe, mbarwanise na rurara ey'omu kanwa kangye.

Oine amatu, ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa. Orikusingura ndyamuha omugabo aha maanu esherekirwe, kandi ndyamuha eibaare eririkwera, erihandiikirweho eiziina risya, eritarikumanywa muntu weena kureka ogwo owaariheebwa.
Handiikira maraika w'ekanisa ey'omuri Suatira, oti: Ebi nibyo bigambo by'Omwana wa Ruhanga, oine amaisho agari nk'endimi z'omuriro, n'ebigyere bye biri nk'omuringa ogurikwengyengyeta.
Naagira ati: Nimmanya emirimo yaawe, n'okukunda kwawe n'okwikiriza n'okuheereza n'okugumisiriza kwawe, kandi nimmanya ngu emirimo yaawe eya bwanyima neekira ey'okubanza.
Kwonka nyine eki ndikufa naiwe; ogumisiririza omukazi Yezebeeli, orikweyeta nabikazi, kandi oyegyesa abahuuku bangye, akabahabya ngu bashambane, kandi ngu barye ebitambiirwe ebishushani.
Nkamuha omwanya gw'okweteisa; kwonka yaayanga kweteisa obushambani bwe.
Reeba, niinyija kumunaga aha kitabo n'abashambane be omu kubonabona kwingi, ku baraabe bateeteisize by'emicwe ye;
kandi n'abaana be ndyabaitsa rufu; amakanisa goona garyamanya ngu niinye ocaaka emitima n'emyoyo; kandi ndyazimuurira omuntu weena omuriimwe ebishemereire ebi yaakozire.
Kwonka imwe ab'omuri Suatira abatsigaire mutaikiriize nyegyesa egyo, abatarikumanya bi abandi beeta enaama za Sitaane, nimbagambira ku ntarikubakorera gundi mutwaro;
kwonka muhamye eki mwine okuhitsya obu ndiija.
Orikusingura, akaguma naakora emirimo yangye okuhitsya aha muheru, ndyamuha obutegyeki aha mahanga goona,
kandi aryabategyeka n'enkoni y'ekyoma, nk'oku omuntu ayatagura enyabya z'eibumba, nkaanye oku naahairwe Tata obutegyeki;
kandi ndyamuha Enyonyoozi ey'obusheeshe.
Oine amatu, ahurire ebi Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa.
Sisiimuka, ogume nooreeba, ogumye ebikiriho ebiri haihi kufa; ahakuba nshangire omuri byona ebi okora hatarimu kihikire omu maisho ga Ruhanga wangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo oijukye ebi waahairwe kandi n'ebi waahuriire; obihamye, oyeteise. Ahabw'okuba ku oraabe otasisiimukire, okareeba, ndyaija nk'omushuma; torimanya bunaku obu ndikuhikiraho.
Kwonka oine amaziina makye g'abantu b'omuri Saadi, abatarasiisire bijwaro byabo; abo baryagenda naanye bajwaire ebirikwera, ahakuba babishemereire.
Orikusingura aryajwekwa atyo ebijwaro birikwera, kandi tindiiha iziina rye mu kitabo ky'amagara, kureka ndyarihamya omu maisho ga Tata n'omu maisho ga baamaraika be.
Oine amatu, ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa.
Handiikira maraika w'ekanisa y'omuri Filadelufia oti: Ebi nibyo bigambo by'Ogwo orikwera, ow'amazima, oine ekishumuruzo kya Daudi, oigura hatagire owaakinga, kandi okinga hatagire, owaigura.

Naagira ati: Nimmanya emirimo yaawe. Reeba, ntaire omu maisho gaawe orwigi orwigwire, oru omuntu weena atarikubaasa kukinga. Nimmanya ngu oine amaani makye, kwonka okeerinda ekigambo kyangye, tiwaayehakana iziina ryangye.
Mbwenu reeba, naakuha ab'omuri sinagogi ya Sitaane, abeeyeta Abayudaaya, haza batari bo, nibabeiha; ndyabagyema baije bainame omu maisho gaawe, babone kumanya ku naakukunzire.
Iwe okarinda ekigambo eki waagambiirwe aha by'okugumisiriza kwangye; naanye nikyo ndikurindira omu bunaku bw'okutegwa okuriija omu nsi yoona, okugyeza boona abagituuramu.
Niinyija juba; gumiza kimwe eki oine, hatagira owaakwaka ekirunga kyawe.

Orikusingura ndyamugira enyomyo omuri hekalu ya Ruhanga wangye; nawe tarigirugamu ebiro byona; kandi ndyamuhandiikaho eiziina rya Ruhanga wangye, n'eiziina ry'orurembo rwa Ruhanga wangye, nirwo rurembo Yerusaalemu orusya orurikushuuma okuruga omu iguru ahari Ruhanga wangye, kandi n'eiziina ryangye erisya.
Oine amatu, ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa.
Ati: Nimmanya emirimo yaawe, ku otarikufuka kandi ku otarikwotsya; nangwa kuri noofuka, nari nooyotsya!
Mbwenu ahabw'okutagata kooyakooya, otarikufuka kandi otarikwotsya, niinyija kukutanaka.

N'ahabw'ekyo ninkuhabura ku onguraho ezaabu eshemeziibwe omu muriro obone kuba omutungi, n'ebijwaro ebirikwera obone kujwara, orekye kukwatwa enshoni ahabw'okureebwa ojwaire busha, ogure n'omubazi gw'okuta omu maisho, obone kuhweza.
Boona abu nkunda mbateisa kandi mbahana; n'ahabw'ekyo oyezirikye, oyeteise.
Orikusingura, ndyamwikiriza kushutama aha kitebe kyangye ky'obukama, nkaanye oku naasingwire, nkashutama hamwe na Tata aha kitebe ky'obukama bwe.
Oine amatu, ahurire eki Omwoyo arikugambira amakanisa.
Ahonaaho naashanga ndi omu Mwoyo, naareeba ekitebe ky'obukama kitairwe omu iguru, naareeba n'Owaabaire akishutamiho;
kandi Ogwo owaabaire ashutami akaba naashusha nk'eibaare rya
Kandi kikaba kyehinguririziibwe ebindi bitebe makumi abiri na bina; aha bitebe ebyo hakaba hashutamiho abakuru makumi abiri na bana, bajwaire ebijwaro birikwera n'ebirunga by'ezaabu aha mitwe yaabo.
Ahansi y'ekyo kitebe ky'obukama haarugaho emirabyo n'amaraka n'okuhinda kw'enkuba; kandi omu maisho gaakyo haayakamu amatabaaza g'omuriro mushanju, niyo myoyo mushanju eya Ruhanga;
kandi omu maisho g'ekyo kitebe hakaba hariho ekirikushusha nk'enyanja y'endeeberwamu, erikushusha
Okwehinguririza ekyo kitebe embanju zoona, hakaba hariho ebihangirwe ebiine amagara bina, ebiijwire amaisho omumaisho n'enyima.
Ekihangirwe eky'okubanza kikaba nikishusha entare, ekya kabiri nikishusha enimi, ekya kashatu kikaba kiine ahamaisho aharikushusha ah'omuntu, n'ekya kana nikishusha empungu erikuguruka.
Ebyo bihangirwe ebina buri kimwe kiine amapapa mukaaga, biijwire amaisho embaju zoona n'omunda; kandi nibyeshongora obutaremuura nyomushana na nyekiro, biti:
Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona
Owaabaire ariho, oriho, kandi oribaho,
Niwe Arikwera, Arikwera, Arikwera.
abakuru abo makumi abiri na bana bagwa ahansi, bajuumara omu maisho g'Ogwo oriho ebiro n'ebiro, kandi banaga ahansi ebirunga byabo omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama, nibagira bati:
Mukama Ruhanga waitu, oshemereire
Kuhimbisibwa n'okuheebwa ekitiinisa n'obushoboorozi,
Ahabw'okuba niiwe waahangire byona;
Ahabw'okukunda kwawe bikahangwa kandi byabaho.
Bwanyima naareeba maraika w'amaani, naagamba n'eiraka rihango, ati: N'oha oshemereire kushuuruura ekitambo n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwakyo?
Kwonka tihaabaho n'omwe omu iguru n'omu nsi n'obu haakuba ahansi y'ensi, owaabaasa kushuuruura ekyo kitabo, n'obu kwakuba okukireebamu;
naarira munonga ahabw'okutabaho waareebeka ashemereire kushuuruura ekyo kitabo n'okukireebamu.

Omwe ahari abo bakuru yangira ati: Otarira! Reeba, Entare y'omu ruganda rwa Yuda, ekitsitsa kya Daudi, akasingura; n'ahabw'ekyo naabaasa kushuuruura ekyo kitabo n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwakyo mushanju.
Yaija, yaiha ekitabo omu mukono gwa buryo gw'Ogwo oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama.

Ku yaatwaire ekitabo, ebihangirwe ebyo ebina n'abakuru abo makumi abiri na bana baagwa ahansi, baajuumara omu maisho g'Omwana gw'entaama, buri omwe aine enanga n'orwabya rw'ezaabu orwijwire obubaane bw'omugaju, nibyo by'okushaba by'abarikwera;
baayeshongora ekyeshongoro kisya nibagira bati:
Oshemereire kutwara ekitabo n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwakyo,
Ahabw'okuba okaitwa, waacungurira Ruhanga abantu n'eshagama yaawe
Ab'enganda zoona n'endimi zoona n'abantu boona n'amahanga goona,
Kandi baryaba abategyeki omu nsi.
nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Omwana gw'entaama owaitsirwe ashemereire kuheebwa obushoboorozi n'obutungi n'obwengye n'amaani n'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa n'omugisha!

Kandi naahurira buri kihangirwe kyona ekiri omu iguru n'omu nsi n'ahansi y'ensi n'omu nyanja n'ebirimu byona, nibigira biti: Oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama n'Omwana gw'entaama baheebwe omugisha n'ekitiinisa n'okuhimbisibwa n'obushoboorozi ebiro n'ebiro!
Ebihangirwe ebyo ebiine amagara ebina byaikiriza biti: Amiina! N'abakuru abo baagwa ahansi, baaramya.
Ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba embaraasi erikwera, kandi owaabaire agishutamiho akaba aine obuta; yaaheebwa ekirunga, yaagyenda naasingura omu kurwana ngu abone kusingurira kimwe.
Ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kabiri, naahurira ekihangirwe ekya kabiri nikigira kiti: Ija!
Haarugayo embaraasi endiijo erikutukura; owaabaire agishutamiho yaikirizibwa kwiha obusingye omu nsi, ngu abantu baitane; kandi yaaheebwa rurara mpango.

Ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kashatu, naahurira ekihangirwe ekya kashatu nikigira kiti: Ija! Ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba embaraasi erikwiragura; kandi owaabaire agishutamiho akaba aine eminzaani omu ngaro ze;
naahurira nk'eiraka ahagati y'ebihangirwe ebiine amagara ebina, nirigira riti: Endengo y'engano y'edenaari, n'endengo ishatu za sayiri z'edenaari; kwonka amajuta na viinyo otabishiisha.
Ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kana, naahurira eiraka ry'ekihangirwe ekya kana nikigira kiti: Ija!

Ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba embaraasi kisa, n'owaabaire agishutamiho akaba naayetwa Rufu, Okuzimu yaamukuratira, baaheebwa obushoboorozi aha kicweka kimwe kya kana eky'ensi okwitsa abantu rurara n'enjara na rufu n'enyamaishwa mbi z'omu nsi.
Ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kataano, naareeba ahansi y'eitambiro emyoyo y'abaitsirwe ahabw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'ahabw'obujurizi obu baahaire;
baataka n'eiraka rihango, nibagira bati: Ai bambe, Mukama waitu orikwera kandi ow'amazima, oryahitsya hi okutacwera rubanja abatuura omu nsi n'okubahoora enzigu ahabw'eshagama yaitu?

Bwanyima buri omwe yaaheebwa ekijwaro ekirikwera, kandi baaragiirwa kumara ogundi mwanya mukye bahuumwire, okuhitsya omuhendo gw'abaheereza bagyenzi baabo na beene waabo, abarikwija kwitwa nkabo, obu gurihika.
n'enyonyoozi z'ahaiguru zaagwa aha nsi, nk'oku omutiini guragaza ebijuma byagwo bitakahiisize, gwatengyetsibwa omuyaga mwingi;
n'eiguru ryaihwaho nk'oku omuzingo gw'ekitabo guzingwa, kandi enshozi zoona n'ebirwa byona byaihwa omu myanya yaabyo.
Kandi n'abagabe b'ensi, n'abakungu, n'abakuru b'engabo, n'abatungi, n'ab'obushoboorozi n'abantu boona, abahuuku n'ab'obusingye, baayeshereka omu nyanga n'omu nkiri z'omu nshozi,
nibatakira enshozi n'enkiri, bati: Mutugwere, mutusherekye amaisho g'Ogwo oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama, n'ekiniga ky'Omwana gw'entaama;
ahakuba ekiro kikuru ky'ekiniga kyabo kyahika; n'oha orikubaasa kukyemera?
Kandi naareeba maraika ondiijo nainamuka naaruga oburugwa-izooba, aine akamanyiso ka Ruhanga ohuriire; yaayeta n'eiraka rihango baamaraika abo abana abaahairwe obushoboorozi kushiisha ensi n'enyanja,
naagira ati: Mutashiisha ensi nari enyanja n'obu byakuba ebiti, okuhitsya obu turiheza kuta akamanyiso aha buso bw'abahuuku ba Ruhanga waitu.
Naahurira omubaro gw'abaatairweho akamanyiso, ogwabaire guri akasiriira n'obukumi buna n'enkumi ina, abaarugire omu nganda zoona ez'abaana ba Israeli;
ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda abaatairweho akamanyiso bakaba bari kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Gaadi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri,
ab'omu ruganda rwa Asheeri kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaase kakumi n'enkumi ibiri,
ab'omu ruganda rwa Simeoni kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Leevi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Isakaari kakumi n'enkumi ibiri,
ab'omu ruganda rwa Zebuluuni kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, ab'omu ruganda rwa Yosefu kakumi n'enkumi ibiri, n'ab'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini abaatairweho akamanyiso nabo kakumi n'enkumi ibiri.

Bwanyima y'ebyo ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba omutwe muhango gw'abantu ogu omuntu atarikubaasa kubara, abaarugire omu mahanga goona n'enganda zoona n'abantu boona n'endimi zoona, beemereire omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama n'omu maisho g'Omwana gw'entaama, bajwaire ebijwaro birukwera, baine amataagi g'enkindo omu ngaro zaabo,
nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Okujuna n'okwa Ruhanga waitu, oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama, kandi n'okw'Omwana gw'entaama.
Kandi baamaraika boona abaabaire beemereire, beehinguririize ekitebe ky'obukama n'abakuru n'ebihangirwe ebiine amagara ebina, baagwa ahansi, baajuumara omu maisho g'ekitebe, baaramya Ruhanga,
nibagira bati: Amiina! Ruhanga waitu aheebwe omugisha n'ekitiinisa n'obwengye n'okusiimwa n'okuhimbisibwa n'obushoboorozi n'amaani ebiro n'ebiro, Amiina.
Kandi omwe aha bakuru abo yambuuza, naagira ati: Aba abajwaire ebijwaro birikwera ni baahi, kandi nibaruga hi?
Naanye naamugarukamu nti: Mukama wangye, niiwe orikumanya. Yangira ati: Aba nibo baarugire omu kubonabona kwingi, bakoozya ebijwaro byabo omu shagama y'Omwana gw'entaama, bikeera.
Nikyo bagumira omu maisho g'ekitebe kya Ruhanga eky'obukama nibamuheereza omuri hekalu ye nyomushana na nyekiro; kandi Ogwo oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama aryabasangira n'eihema rye.
Tibarigira njara bundi, n'obu ryakuba eiriho; tibariitwa mushana, n'obu kyakuba ekibabo kyagwo;
ahabw'okuba Omwana gw'entaama ori aha kitebe ky'obukama aryaba omuriisa waabo; aryabeebembera abahitsye aha nshuro z'amaizi g'amagara; kandi Ruhanga aryaragaza amarira goona aha maisho gaabo.
Omwana gw'entaama ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka mushanju, haabaho akaceceko omu iguru okumara nk'ekicweka ky'eshaaha.
Bwanyima naareeba baamaraika mushanju abeemerera omu maisho ga Ruhanga, kandi baaheebwa enzamba mushanju.

Haija maraika ondiijo, yaayemerera aha itambiro, aine ekyoterero ky'ezaabu; yaaheebwa obubaane bwingi bw'okwotera eby'okushaba by'abarikwera boona, ngu abyoterere aha itambiro ry'ezaabu omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama;
omwika gw'obubaane gwainamuka n'eby'okushaba by'abarikwera omu maisho ga Ruhanga, niguruga omu mukono gwa maraika.
Maraika yaakwata ekyoterero, yaakiijuza omuriro gw'aha itambiro, yaakinaga aha nsi; haabaho okuhinda n'amaraka n'emirabyo n'omutsitsa.
Baamaraika mushanju, abaabaire baine enzamba mushanju, baayeteekateeka kuziteera.
n'ekicweka kya kashatu ky'ebihangirwe eby'omu nyanja ebiine amagara kyafa; kandi n'ekicweka kya kashatu ky'emeeri zoona kyacwekyerezibwa.
Na maraika owa kashatu yaateera; enyonyoozi mpango, erikwaka nk'orumuri, yaagwa neeruga omu iguru; yaagwa ahari kimwe kya kashatu ky'emigyera n'aha nshuro z'amaizi.
Kandi eiziina ry'enyonyoozi egyo ni

Ku naimukize amaisho naareeba eishamba nirizeereera omu mwanya, naahurira nirigamba n'eiraka rihango riti: Ai mbambe! Ai bambe! Abatuura omu nsi baryareeba enaku, ku barihurira amaraka g'enzamba ezi baamaraika abashatu barikwenda kuteera.
yaigura ekyo kiina ekitaine bugarukiro, kyarugwamu omwika nk'ogw'ekikoomi kihango, eizooba n'akaabunga byaba omwirima ahabw'omwika ogwaruga omuri ekyo kiina.
Kandi omu mwika ogwo haarugamu enzigye, zaija aha nsi, zaaheebwa obushoboorozi nka
Zaaragiirwa kutashiisha bunyaatsi bw'omu nsi, n'obu kyakuba ekintu kyona ekibisi, nari ekiti kyona, kureka abantu bonka abataine kamanyiso ka Ruhanga aha buso bwabo;
zaikirizibwa kubabonabonesa ameezi ataano, kwonka okutabaitira kimwe; kandi okusaasa kwazo kukaba kuri nk'okwa skorupio yaatonera omuntu.
Omu biro ebyo abantu baryasherura okufa, tibarikubona; baryayetenga rufu, eryabahunga.
obwoya bwazo bukaba nibushusha eishokye ry'abakazi, n'amaino gaazo nigashusha ag'entare;
ziine eby'okwekingiza aha kifuba ebigumire nk'ebyoma, n'okuhoorera kw'amababa gaazo kukaba kuri nk'okw'ebigaari ebirikukururwa embaraasi ezaasyoka niziza aha rugamba;
ziine emikira n'emburi ez'obushegu nka skorupio, kandi amaani gaazo g'okubonabonesa abantu ameezi ataano gakaba gari omu mikira yaazo;
kandi ziine omukama waazo maraika w'ekiina ekitaine bugarukiro, eiziina rye omu Ruheburaayo ni Abadooni, kandi n'omu Rugriika naayetwa Apolyoni.
Ekibonaboneso eky'okubanza kyahwa; reeba nihaija kukurataho ebindi bibiri.
Maraika owa mukaaga yaateera enzamba, naahurira eiraka niriruga omu mahembe ana g'eitambiro ry'ezaabu eriri omu maisho ga Ruhanga,
nirigambira maraika owa mukaaga owaabaire aine enzamba, riti: Komorora baamaraika bana ababoheirwe aha mugyera Furaati.
Baamaraika abo abana baakomororwa, abaabaire bateekateekyeirwe eshaaha n'ekiro n'okwezi n'omwaka ngu baite ekicweka kya kashatu eky'abantu.
Omubaro gw'abarikurwanira aha mbaraasi gukaba guri kakumi emirundi kakumi emirundi ebiri; naahurira omubaro gwabo.
Oku nikwo naareebire omu kworekwa, nkareeba embaraasi n'abaabaire bazishutamiho. Abo abazishutamiho bakaba bajwaire ebyoma eby'okwekingiza aha kifuba ebirikushusha omuriro na
Ekicweka kya kashatu ky'abantu kyaitwa ebibonaboneso ebyo byonshatu, omuriro n'omwika n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, ebyaruga omu kanwa kaazo.
Ahakuba amaani g'embaraasi gaba omu kanwa kaazo n'omu mikira yaazo; emikira yaazo esuhsha enjoka, eine emitwe; kandi niyo zirumisa.
kandi baayanga n'okweteisa obwitsi bwabo, oburogo bwabo, obushambani bwabo n'obushuma bwabo.
Akaba aine omuzingo gw'akatabo kashuurwirwe omu ngaro ze. Yaata ekigyere kye kya buryo aha nyanja n'ekya bumusho aha nsi;
yaagamba n'eiraka rihango nk'oku entare etsinda; kandi ku yaagambire, ebirikuhinda mushanju byagamba.
Ku byaherize kugamba, naayenda kuhandiika; kwonka naahurira eiraka niriruga omu iguru, nirigira riti: koma n'akamanyiso ebyo bigambo ebyagambwa ebirikuhinda mushanju; otabihandiika.
Maraika ogwo, ou naareebire ayemereire aha nyanja n'aha nsi, yaimutsya ahaiguru omukono gwe gwa buryo,
yaarahira Ogwo obaho ebiro byona, owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja n'ebirimu byona, ku hataribaho kutuuraho bundi;
kwonka omu biro ebi maraika owa mushanju ariteereramu enzamba ye, enaama ya Ruhanga eryahikiirizibwa, nk'ebigambo ebirungi oku biri ebi yaagambiire
Eiraka eryo eri naahuriire niriruga omu iguru ryagaruka ryagira riti: Gyenda, otware omuzingo gw'akatabo akashuurwirwe akari omu mukono gwa maraika oyemereire aha nyanja n'aha nsi.
Ntyo naaza ahari maraika, naamugambira kumpa ako katabo; yangarukamu ati: Nkako, katware, okarye, nikaija kunura nk'obwoki omu kanwa kaawe, kwonka omunda yaawe kashaarire.
Nikwo kukaiha omu mukono gwa maraika, nkakarya; omu kanwa kangye kakanura nk'obwoki; kwonka ku naaherize kukarya, omu nda kaashaarira.
Naagambirwa ku nshemereire kugaruka kuranga eby'abantu b'enganda nyingi, n'amahanga, n'endimi, n'eby'abagabe.
kwonka otagyera ekibuga kyayo; okirekye, ahabw'okuba kikaheebwayo omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga, kandi baryaribatiirira orurembo orurikwera okumara ameezi makumi ana n'abiri.
Kandi abajurizi bangye babiri ndyabaha obushoboorozi bw'okumara ebiro rukumi na magana abiri na makumi mukaaga nibaranga bajwaire ebiguniya.
Omuntu weena ku ayenda kubakora kubi, omuriro guruga omu kanwa kaabo, gumaraho abazigu baabo; kandi okwo nikwo omuntu weena orikwenda kubakora kubi, ashemereire kwitwa.

Abo baine obushoboorozi kuzibira eiguru kugwisa enjura omu biro by'okuranga kwabo; kandi baine obushoboorozi okuhindura amaizi eshagama, n'okubonabonesa ensi n'ekibonaboneso kyona, ahu bayendera hoona.
Kandi ku bariheza obujurizi bwabo, enyamaishwa eryaruga okuzimu omu kiina ekitaine bugarukiro, ebarwanise, ebasingure, ebaite;
n'emitumbi yaabo eryaguma erambiire omu nguuto y'orurembo oruhango, orurikwetwa omu migambire y'omwoyo Sodoma na Misri, ahu Mukama waabo yaabambirwe.
Kandi abantu b'emiringo mingi n'enganda n'endimi n'amahanga baryamara ebiro bishatu n'ekicweka nibashamaarira emitumbi yaabo, tibariikiriza ku eziikwa omu kituuro;
n'abatwire omu nsi yoona baryayesiima ahabw'okufa kwabo, bashemererwe; kandi baryatwekyerana ebiconco; ahabw'okuba baanabi abo ababiri bakaba babonabonesa abatuura omu nsi.
Kwonka bwanyima, ebiro ebyo bishatu n'ekicweka bihingwireho, omwitsyo gw'amagara ogurikuruga ahari Ruhanga gwabataahamu, baayemerera; abaabareebire baakwatwa obwoba bwingi;
kandi baahurira eiraka rihango eririkuruga omu iguru niribagira riti: Mwinamukye mwije kunu! Baatemba omu iguru omu kicu, abazigu baabo nibabareeba.
Omu shaaha egyo haabaho omutsitsa mwingi, ekicweka kya ikumi ky'orurembo kyagwa; abantu enkumi mushanju baitwa omutsitsa; kandi abaatsigaireho baakwatwa obwoba; baahimbisa Ruhanga ow'omu iguru.
Ekibonaboneso kya kabiri kyahwaho; reeba, ekibonaboneso kya kashatu kiri haihi kwija.
Abakuru abo makumi abiri na bana, abashutama aha bitebe byabo omu maisho ga Ruhanga, baagwa, baajuumara, baaramya Ruhanga,
nibagira bati: Nitukusiima, Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona, oriho kandi owaabaireho, ahakuba otwaire obushoboorozi bwawe obukuru, kandi oyemire.
Amahanga gakaba gaguubwa kubi, mbwenu ekiniga kyawe kyaija, obunaku bwahika bw'okucwera abafiire orubanja, n'obw'okuha
Kandi hekalu ya Ruhanga ey'omu iguru yaigurwa, n'eshanduukye y'endagaano yaareebeka omuri hekalu ye; haabaho emirabyo n'amaraka mahango n'okuhinda n'omutsitsa n'orubaare rwingi.
Eky'okutangaaza kihango munonga kikareebwa omu iguru, omukazi ajwaire eizooba, n'okwezi kuri ahansi y'ebigyere bye, n'aha mutwe gwe hariho ekirunga ky'enyonyoozi ikumi na ibiri.
Omukazi ogwo akaba aine enda; yaarumwa, yaatakibwa ebisha by'okuzaara.
Kandi eky'okutangaaza ekindi kyareebwa omu iguru, ekijoka kihango ekirikutukura, ekiine emitwe mushanju n'amahembe ikumi, kandi kiine ebirunga mushanju aha mitwe yaakyo.

Omukira gwakyo gwayeyerera ekicweka kya kashatu ky'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru, gwazinaga aha nsi. Ekyo kijoka kyayemerera omu maisho g'omukazi owaabaire naayenda kuzaara ngu, ku araaheze ati kuzaara, kishonshomere omwana we.
Yaazaara omwana w'omwojo oritegyekyesa amahanga goona enkoni y'ekyoma; kwonka omwana ogwo yaashahurwa, yaatwarwa ahari Ruhanga n'aha kitebe ky'obukama bwe;
kandi omukazi yaahungira omu ihamba ei Ruhanga yaamuteekateekyeire omwanya, ngu babone kumuriisizayo okumara ebiro rukumi na magana abiri na makumi mukaaga.
baabingwa, kandi okuruga obwo tibaratungire mwanya omu iguru obundi.
Ekijoka ekyo ekihango ekya ira, ekirikwetwa Omuregi kandi Sitaane, orikugobeza ensi yoona, yaanagwa aha nsi hamwe na baamaraika be.

Kandi naahurira eiraka rihango omu iguru nirigira riti: Hati mbwenu okujuna kwa Ruhanga waitu n'amaani ge n'obukama bwe n'obushoboorozi bwa Kristo we biizire, ahakuba omuregi w'ab'eishe-emwe anagirwe ahansi, obarega nyomushana na nyekiro omu maisho ga Ruhanga waitu.
Bakamusingura ahabw'eshagama y'Omwana gw'entaama n'ahabw'ekigambo ky'obujurizi bwabo, nangwa n'okufa bakakwemera.
N'ahabw'ekyo, iwe eiguru naimwe abarituuramu, naiwe enyanja, muryareeba enaku ahabw'okuba omuregi yaabaizira n'ekiniga kingi, ahakuba naamanya ku aine omwanya mukye.
Ekijoka ku kyareebire kyanagwa aha nsi, kyahiiga omukazi owaazaire omwana w'omwojo.
Kwonka omukazi yaaheebwa amapapa abiri g'eishemba rihango, ngu agurukye ahungire ekyo kijoka omu ihamba, omu mwanya ogu aririisizibwamu okumara omwanya n'emyanya n'ekicweka ky'omwanya.
Ekijoka kyacwera amaizi agarikwingana omwegyemure enyima y'ogwo mukazi, ngu gamutware;
kwonka ensi yaahwera omukazi, yaayashama, yaamira omwegyemure, ogu ekyo kijoka kyacweire.
Ekijoka nikwo kugirira ogwo mukazi ekiniga, kikaza kurwanisa oruzaaro rwe orutsigaireho, orurikworobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, rukahamya ebya Yesu; kikeemerera aha musheenyi gw'enyanja.

Egyo nyamaishwa ei naareebire ekaba neeshusha engwe, ebiganja byayo nibishusha eby'edubu, n'akanwa kaayo nikashusha ak'entare. Ekijoka kyagiha amaani gaakyo n'ekitebe ky'obukama bwakyo n'obushoboorozi bwingi.
Ogumwe aha mitwe yaayo nooshusha oti gukaba gwine obuhuta obw'okugiita; kwonka obuhuta obwo bukakira; ab'ensi yoona baagikurata nibagitangaarira.
Kandi baaramya ekijoka ahabw'okuba kikaha egyo nyamaishwa obushoboorozi bwakyo; baaramya enyamaishwa egyo nibagira bati: N'oha orikushusha enyamaishwa egi? Kandi n'oha owaakubaasa kugirwanisa?
Yaayashamya akanwa kaayo, yaagamba eby'okurogota ahari Ruhanga, neerogota aha iziina rye n'aha ihema rye, nibo abatuura omu iguru.
Kandi yaikirizibwa kurwanisa abarikwera n'okubasingura; yaaheebwa n'obushoboorozi aha nganda zoona n'abantu n'endimi n'amahanga;
boona abatuura omu nsi baryagiramya, abu amaziina gaabo gatahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'amagara eky'Omwana gw'entaama owaitsirwe okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi.
Weena oine okutu ahurire.
Neetegyekyesa obushoboorozi bwona obw'enyamaishwa ey'okubanza omu maisho gaayo, neegyema ensi n'abagituuramu kuramya enyamaishwa ey'okubanza, eyaakizire obuhuta bw'okugiita.
Neekora obumanyiso obukuru, nangwa n'okwiha omuriro omu iguru gukagwa aha nsi omu maisho g'abantu;
ahabw'obumanyiso obwo obu yaahairwe kukorera omu maisho g'egyo nyamaishwa, yaabeihabeiha abatuura omu nsi, ngu bakore ekishushani ahabw'enyamaishwa egyo eyaahutaaziibwe na rurara, ekanga ekagumaho.
Yaikirizibwa kuha ekyo kishushani ky'enyamaishwa omwitsyo, ngu kigambe, kandi kiitise abantu boona abangire kukiramya.
Kandi abantu boona, abato n'abakuru, abatungi n'abooro, ab'obusingye n'abahuuku, yaabaragiira kuteebwa akamanyiso aha mukono gwa buryo, nari aha buso,
ngu hatabaho owaagura nari owaatunda, kureka ogwo oine ako kamanyiso, niryo iziina ry'enyamaishwa, nari enamba y'eiziina ryayo.
Okukishoborokyerwa nikwetenga obwengye. Orikwetegyereza abare enamba y'enyamaishwa; ahakuba n'enamba y'omuntu; enamba egyo ni magana mukaaga na makumi mukaaga na mukaaga.
Naahurira eiraka eririkuhoorera nk'amaizi maingi kandi nk'eiraka ery'okuhinda kuhango niriruga omu iguru; kandi eiraka eryo eri naahuriire rikaba riri nk'ery'enanga ezirikuteerwa abateezi baazo;

nibeeshongorera ekyeshongoro kisya omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama n'omu maisho g'ebihangirwe ebiine amagara ebina n'ag'abo bakuru. Kandi tihariho owaabaasize kwega ekyeshongoro ekyo, kureka abo akasiriira n'obukumi buna n'enkumi ina, abaacungwirwe okuruga omu nsi.

Abo nibo abatareesiisire na bakazi, ahakuba bakaba nibabyerinda; kandi abo nibo bakuratira Omwana gw'entaama ei aza yoona. Abo bakacungurwa omu bantu okuba omuganuro ahari Ruhanga n'aha Mwana gw'entaama;
kandi omu kanwa kaabo hakaba hatabamu bishuba, ahakuba bakaba batagira kamogo.
yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Mutiine Ruhanga, mumuhe ekitiinisa, ahakuba obunaku bwe bw'okucweramu orubanja buhikire; muramye Ogwo owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja n'enshuro z'amaizi.

ogwo nawe aryanywa aha maarwa g'ekiniga kya Ruhanga, agaashukirwe omu kikopo ky'okubiihirwa kwe agatafungwire, kandi aryabonabonesibwa n'omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti omu maisho ga baamaraika abarikwera n'omu maisho g'Omwana gw'entaama.
Omwika gw'okubonabonesibwa kwabo gucumbuuka ebiro n'ebiro; abo abaramya enyamaishwa n'ekishushani kyayo, n'omuntu weena oteebwaho akamanyiso k'eiziina ryayo tibahuumura nyomushana na nyekiro.
Aho niho okugumisiriza kw'abarikwera kumanyirwa, aboorobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, bakaikiriza Yesu.
Bwanyima ku naimukize amaisho, naareeba ekicu kirikwera, kandi aha kicu ekyo hashutamiho orikushusha Omwana w'omuntu ajwaire ekirunga ky'ezaabu aha mutwe, kandi omu ngaro ze ainemu omuhoro gw'obwogi.

Maraika ondiijo yaaruga omuri hekalu, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, naagira Ogwo owaabaire ashutami aha kicu ati: Kiika omuhoro gwawe oteme, ahabw'okuba obunaku bw'okutema buhikire; kandi eby'okushaaruurwa by'ensi byereire kimwe.
Atyo owaabaire ashutami aha kicu yaanaga omuhoro gwe aha nsi, ensi yaashaaruurwa.
Maraika ondiijo yaaruga omuri hekalu ey'omu iguru, kandi nawe aine omuhoro gw'obwogi.
