Na maraika ondiijo, oine obushoboorozi aha muriro, yaaruga ah a itambiro, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango, naagira ogwo owaabaire aine omuhoro gw'obwogi ati: Kiika omuhoro gwawe gw'obwogi, ogucwise ebijuma by'omuzaabibu gw'ensi; ahakuba bihiisiize kimwe.
Atyo maraika yaanaga omuhoro gwe aha nsi, yaacwa ebijuma by'omuzaabibu gw'ensi, yaabishuka omu inyuukiro rihango ery'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.
Byanyuukirwa omu inyuukiryo eryo n'ebigyere aheeru y'orurembo, eshagama yaaruga omu inyuukiro, yaijura okuhika ahaiguru aha nkoba z'embaraasi, kandi ahansi yaahitsya
Nibeeshongora ekyeshongoro kya Musa
Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Ebi waakozire ni bikuru kandi n'eby'okutangaaza;
Emihanda yaawe ehikiriire kandi n'ey'amazima,
Nyakusinga Mukama w'amahanga.
Ahakuba niiwe wenka orikwera;
Amahanga goona garyaija gakuramye,
Ahakuba emitwarize yaawe y'oburyo eyorekirwe.
omuri hekalu egyo haarugamu baamaraika mushanju abaabaire baine ebibonaboneso mushanju, bajwaire emyenda mirungi erikwengyengyeta, beezirikire emyeko y'ezaabu omu kifuba.
Kimwe aha bihangirwe ebiine amagara ebina kyaha baamaraika mushanju enyabya z'ezaabu ziijwire ekiniga kya Ruhanga otuuraho ebiro n'ebiro.

Hekalu yaijura omwika ogurikuruga omu kitiinisa kya Ruhanga n'omu bushoboorozi bwe; kandi tihariho muntu weena owaabaasize kutaaha omuri egyo hekalu, ebibonaboneso mushanju bya baamaraika mushanju bitakahweireyo.
Maraika owa kabiri yaashuka orwabya rwe omu nyanja, enyanja yaahinduka, yaashusha eshagama y'omufu, kandi ekintu kyona ekihuriire ekyabaire kiri omu nyanja kyafa.
Naahurira maraika naagira ati:
Iwe Orikwera, oriho, kandi owaabaireho,
Ori ohikiriire, ahabw'okucwa otyo emanja;
Mbwenu obahaire eshagama kuginywa;
Kandi nikyo kibashemereire.
Eego, kibe kityo, Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona,
Emicwere yaawe n'ey'amazima kandi n'ey'oburyo.
Maraika owa kana yaashuka orwabya rwe aha izooba, ryaikirizibwa kubabura abantu n'omuriro;
abantu baayokibwa ekibabo kingi; baajuma eiziina rya Ruhanga, oine obushoboorozi aha bibonaboneso ebyo; tibaayeteisa ngu bamuhe ekitiinisa.
baajuma Ruhanga ow'omu iguru ahabw'okuhururwa n'ahabw'ebironda byabo, kandi nabwo tibaayeteisa bi baakozire.
Kandi naareeba omu kanwa k'ekijoka n'omu kanwa k'enyamaishwa n'omu kanwa ka nabi ow'ebishuba niharugamu emyoyo mibi eshatu erikushusha ebikyere;
niyo myoyo ya baadaimoni erikukora obumanyiso, erikuza oku n'oku omu bagabe b'ensi zoona, okubateeranira hamwe kuza omu rugamba orw'ekiro kikuru kya Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona.
(Reeba, niinyija nk'omushuma! Aine omugisha orikuguma naareeba, akarinda ebijwaro bye, ngu arekye kugyenda ajwaire busha, bakareeba enshoni ze.)
Emyoyo egyo yaabateeranira omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Haramagedoni omu Ruheburaayo.
Maraika owa mushanju yaashuka orwabya rwe ahaiguru omu mwanya, eiraka rihango ryaruga omuri hekalu aha kitebe ky'obukama, nirigira riti: Kyahwa.
Haabaho emirabyo n'amaraka mahango n'okuhinda n'omutsitsa muhango; omutsitsa muhango kandi ogw'amaani gutyo tigukabahoga okwiha obu abantu baabaho omu nsi.
Orurembo rukuru rwabaganukamu ebicweka bishatu: endembo z'amahanga zaagwa; kandi Ruhanga yaijuka Babulooni, orurembo orukuru, okuruha ekikopo kya viinyo ey'obushaarizi bw'ekiniga kye.
Ebirwa byona byahunga, kandi ebibungo byona byabura.
Orubaare rwingi rwateera abantu niruruga omu iguru, buri rubaare rwine oburemeezi
owaashambaine n'abagabe b'ensi, n'abatuura omu nsi bakasinda viinyo, nibwo bushambani bwe.
Yantwara omu ihamba ndi omu Mwoyo, naareeba omukazi ashutami aha nyamaishwa erikutukura, eijwire amaziina g'okurogota, kandi eine emitwe mushanju n'amahembe ikumi.

Omukazi ogwo akaba ajwaire emyenda ya bujwa n'erikutukura, ayehunzire eby'ezaabu n'amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi n'eruuru, aine ekikopo ky'ezaabu omu ngaro ze ekiijwire ebihagaro n'okusiisikara kw'obushambani bwe;
kandi aha buso bwe hahandiikirweho eiziina erisherekirwe, BABULOONI ORUREMBO ORUKURU, NYINA WA BAAMARAAYA N'EBIHAGARO BY'ENSI.
Naareeba omukazi ogwo asinzire eshagama y'abarikwera n'ey'abaitsirwe ahabwa Yesu.
Ku naamureebire, naatangaara munonga.
Maraika yambuuza ati: Waatangaazibwa ki? Niinyija kukugambira eky'omubonano ky'ogwo mukazi n'eky'enyamaishwa ei arikugyenderaho, eine emitwe mushanju n'amahembe ikumi.

Enyamaishwa ei waareeba ekaba eriho, hati teriho, neeyenda kuruga omu kiina ekitaine bugarukiro, eze omu kuhwerekyerera; kandi abatuura omu nsi, abu amaziina gaabo gatakahandiikwaga mu kitabo ky'amagara okuruga aha kuhangwa kw'ensi, baryatangaara ahabw'okureeba enyamaishwa egyo, ahakuba ekaba eriho, mbwenu teriho, haza kandi n'eija kubaho.
Eki nikyetenga omutima ogwine obwengye. Emitwe mushanju nibwo bubungo mushanju, ahu ogwo mukazi ashutami;
kandi nibo bagabe mushanju; aharibo bataano bakagwa, omwe ariho, ondiijo takaizire; ku ariija, ashemereire kugumaho omwanya mukye.
Enyamaishwa eyaabaire eriho, bwenu etariho, niwe mugabe owa munaana, kwonka n'omwe ahari abo mushanju, kandi nawe naija kuhwerekyerera.
Kandi amahembe ikumi agu waareeba n'abagabe ikumi abatakeemire; kwonka nibaija kuheebwa obushoboorozi nka'bagabe okumara eshaaha emwe hamwe n'egyo nyamaishwa.
Abo nibakwatanisa hamwe kuha egyo nyamaishwa amaani gaabo n'obushoboorozi bwabo;
baryarwanisa Omwana gw'entaama, kwonka Omwana gw'entaama aryabasingura, ahakuba ni Mukama w'abakama kandi Omugabe w'abagabe, kandi abo abu aine n'abaayetsirwe, abaatoorainwe kandi abeesigwa.
Kandi amahembe ikumi agu waareeba hamwe n'enyamaishwa baryayanga maraaya ogwo, atsigare wenka ajwaire busha; baryarya enyama ye, bamwokyeze kimwe n'omuriro;

ahakuba Ruhanga akakita omu mitima yaabo ngu bahikiirize enaama ye, ahabw'okugira omutima gumwe okuha enyamaishwa egyo obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka obugabe bwabo, okuhitsya obu ebigambo bya Ruhanga birihikiirizibwa.
Kandi omukazi ogwo, ou waareeba, nirwo rurembo orukuru orurikutegyeka abagabe b'ensi.
Yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Orurembo orukuru Babulooni rugwire, rugwire! Ruhindukire obutaaho bwa baadaimoni, n'obweshereko bw'emyoyo yoona emibi n'obw'amahungu goona amabi agarikunugwa;

ahakuba amahanga goona ganyweire viinyo y'okurigira okubi kw'orurembo orwo, n'abagabe b'einsi bashambaine narwo, kandi n'abashuubuzi b'ensi batungisiibwe ebintu byarwo n'okwegira gye kwarwo okurengyesereize.
Kandi naahurira eiraka erindi niriruga omu iguru nirigira riti: Mururugyemu, imwe bantu bangye 'mwe, mutakaakwatanisa narwo omu bibi byarwo, mukaheebwa ekifubiro ky'ebirikwija kurubonabonesa;
ahakuba ebibi byarwo bituumire byahika ahaiguru munonga, kandi Ruhanga aijukire eby'okushiisha byarwo.
Murugire nk'oku rwagizire abandi; murwihure kabiri ahabw'ebi rwakozire; omu kikopo eki rwabaijuriizemu ebijwangire, murujwangizemu kabiri.

Nk'oku rwayehimbiise, rukarengyesereza omu kwegira gye, mube nikwo mwarwihura okubonabona n'amaganya; ahakuba nirugira omu mutima gwarwo ruti: Nshutami nk'omugabekazi; tindi mufaakazi; tindigira maganya na kakye.
N'ahabw'ekyo ebibonaboneso ebyo biryarugwaho omu izooba rimwe, rufu n'amaganya n'enjara, rwokibwe n'omuriro; ahabw'okuba Mukama Ruhanga orikurucwera orubanja n'ow'amaani.
baryayemerera hangahari ahabw'okutiina okubonabonesibwa kwarwo nibagira bati: Ai bambe! Ai bambe! Babulooni orurembo orukuru orw'amaani! Okucwerwa orubanja kwawe kwaizira omu shaaha emwe.
Abashuubuzi b'ensi nibarira nibarucurira, ahabw'okuba tihakiriho b'okugura eby'obushuubuzi byabo

eby'ezaabu n'efeeza, amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi n'eruuru, emyenda emirungi ya kitaani n'eya bujwa n'eya riiri n'erikutukura, ebiti eby'emigaju eby'emiringo yoona, ebintu by'emiino, n'ebintu byona ebibaizirwe omu mbaaho z'obuguzi bwingi, n'eby'emiringa n'eby'ebyoma, n'ebibaizirwe omu ibaare eririkwetwa
omudarasiini n'ebinzaari n'omugaju na
Ebyana ebi omutima gwawe gwayetengire bikurugireho, n'ebintu byona ebinuzire, n'ebirungi byawe, bikuhweireho; tibirigaruka kureebwa na kakye.
Abashuubuzi b'ebintu ebyo, abu rwatungiise, baryayemerera hangahari ahabw'okutiina okubonabonesibwa kwarwo nibarira, nibaborooga, nibagira bati:
Ai bambe! Ai bambe! Orurembo orukuru orwabaire rujwara emyenda mirungi ya kitaani n'eya bujwa n'erikutukura, rwehunzire eby'ezaabu n'amabaare ag'obuguzi bwingi n'eruuru!
Omu shaaha emwe obutungi obu bwona bwacwekyerezibwa. Bakama b'emeeri boona, n'abarikuzigyenderamu, abavugi baazo na boona abarikukora omu nyanja, baayemerera hangahari;
baateera enduuru nibareeba omwika gw'okusya kwarwo, nibagira bati: Ebyo harabaireho orurembo orurikwingana n'orurembo oru orukuru!
Baayeshuka omucuucu omu mitwe, nibarira nibaborooga, nibagira bati: Ai bambe! Ai bambe! Orurembo orukuru, orwatungiise boona abaabaire baine emeeri aha nyanja! Omu shaaha emwe rwacwekyerezibwa.
Murwehimbisizeho, iwe eiguru, naimwe abarikwera n'entumwa na baanabi, ahakuba Ruhanga arucwereire orubanja ahabwanyu.
Amaraka g'abateezi b'enanga n'abeeshongozi, n'ag'abateezi b'esheegu n'enzamba, tigarigaruka kuhurirwa bundi omuriiwe; n'emengo tizirigaruka kuhurirwa obundi omuriiwe;

omuriiwe tiharyakiramu tabaaza obundi; kandi eiraka rya kishwera n'erya kishwerwa tigarigaruka kuhurirwa omuriiwe, ahakuba abashuubuzi baawe bakaba bari bakuru omu nsi, kandi oburogo bwawe bukagobeza amahanga goona.
N'eshagama ya baanabi n'abarikwera n'eya boona abaitsirwe omu nsi ekashangwa omuri orwo rurembo.
Bwanyima y'ebyo naahurira eiraka rihango nk'ery'omutwe muhango g'wabantu omu iguru, nirigira riti: Haleluya! Okujuna n'ekitiinisa n'obushoboorozi n'ebya Ruhanga waitu.
Ahabw'okuba emanja ezi acwa n'ez'amazima kandi n'ez'oburyo; ahakuba akacwera orubanja maraaya omukuru owaasiisire ensi n'obushambani bwe; kandi yaamuhoora enzigu ahabw'eshagama
Baagaruka baagamba n'eiraka rihango bati: Haleluya! Kandi omwika gwe gwaguma nigucumbuuka ebiro n'ebiro.
Kandi abakuru makumi abiri na bana n'ebihangirwe ebiine amagara ebina baagwa ahansi, baaramya Ruhanga oshutami aha kitebe ky'obukama, nibagira bati: Amiina, Haleluya!
Eiraka ryaruga omuri ekyo kitebe ky'obukama, nirigira riti: Musiime Ruhanga waitu, imwe

Bwanyima naahurira eiraka nk'ery'omutwe muhango gw'abantu eriri nk'eiraka ry'amaizi maingi, kandi nk'ery'okuhinda kw'amaani, nirigira riti: Haleluya! Ahakuba Mukama Ruhanga waitu ow'obushoboorozi bwona ari aha ngoma.
Tushemererwe, tunanukye, tumuhe ekitiinisa; ahakuba obugyenyi bw'Omwana gw'entaama buhikire, kandi Omugore we ayeteekateekire;
yaikirizibwa kujwara emyenda mirungi eya kitaani erikwengyengyeta kandi erikwera; egyo myenda ya kitaani nibyo by'okuhikiirira by'abarikwera.
Maraika yangira ati: Handiika oti: Baine omugisha abarikwetwa aha bugyenyi bw'Omwana gw'entaama. Kandi yangira ati: Buzimazima ebi n'ebigambo by'amazima ebya Ruhanga.

Ahonaaho naagwa ahansi aha bigyere bye kumuramya, yangira ati: Reeka! Otakikora. Ndi omuheereza mugyenzi waawe n'owa beene sho abarikuhamya amazima ga Yesu. Ramya Ruhanga. Ahakuba okuhamya amazima ga Yesu nigwo mwoyo gw'obunabi.
Amaisho ge nigashusha nk'endimi z'omuriro; kandi ajwaire ebirunga bingi aha mutwe; aine eiziina erihandiikirwe, eirtarikumanywa muntu weena kureka We wenka.
Ajwaire ekijwaro ekimiisiirwe eshagama, kandi eiziina rye ni Kigambo kya Ruhanga.
Amahe ag'omu iguru gaamukurata gatembire embaraasi zirikwera, bajwaire emyenda ya kitaani erikwera kandi emirungi munonga.
Omu kanwa ke haarugamu rurara y'obwogi ey'okutemesa amahanga; kandi aryabategyekyesa enkoni y'ekyoma, abaribatiirire omu inyuukiro ry'obushaarizi bw'ekiniga kya Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona;
kandi aha kijwaro kye n'aha kibero kye hahandiikirweho eiziina eri, Omugabe w'abagabe, kandi Omukama w'abakama.
murye enyama z'abagabe n'ez'abakuru b'amahe n'ez'amamanzi, ez'embaraasi n'ez'abazigyenderaho n'ez'abantu boona, ab'obusingye n'abahuuku, abato n'abakuru.
Kandi naareeba egyo nyamaishwa n'abagabe b'ensi n'amahe gaabo biteeraniire hamwe kurwanisa Ogwo oshutami aha mbaraasi n'eihe rye.

Enyamaishwa egyo yaakwatwa hamwe na nabi w'ebishuba, owaabaire akora obumanyiso omu maisho gaayo, naabibeihabeihesa abo abaine akamanyiso k'enyamaishwa n'abarikuramya ekishushani kyayo. Abo bombi baanagwa omu nyanja erikwakamu omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti bahuriire.
Abaatsigaireho baitwa rurara y'Ogwo oshutami aha mbaraasi, eyaarugire omu kanwa ke; n'amahungu goona gaigutira kimwe enyama z'emitumbi yaabo.
Yaakwata ekyo kijoka ekya ira niwe Muregi kandi Sitaane, yaamuboha okumara emyaka rukumi,

yaamunaga omu kiina ekitaine bugarukiro, yaakinga, yaataho akamanyiso, ngu arekye kurugamu kubeihabeiha amahanga obundi, okuhitsya ahi emyaka rukumi erihwera. Bwanyima y'egyo myaka ashemereire kubohororwa okumara omwanya mukye.
Kwonka abafu abandi abaatsigaireho bo tibaragarukire kuba abahuriire, okuhitsya ahi emyaka rukumi yaahwereire. Oku nikwo kuzooka kw'okubanza.

Omuntu owaatungire omugabo omu kuzooka okwo okw'okubanza aine omugisha kandi n'orikwera. Abari nk'ogwo okufa kwa kabiri tikubaineho bushoboorozi; kureka baryaba abanyamurwa ba Ruhanga na Kristo, bategyekye nawe okumara emyaka rukumi.
Egyo myaka rukumi ku erihwa, Sitaane aryakomororwa arugye omu kihome,
aryashohora aze kubeihabeiha amahanga agari aha mbaju ina ez'ensi, Googi na Magoogi, okubateerana hamwe kurwana. Obwingi bwabo buryaba nk'omusheenyi ogw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Baahurura nibareetwa embaju zoona ez'ensi, baayehinguririza orusiisira rw'abarikwera n'orurembo orurikukundwa; kwonka omuriro gwaruga omu iguru, gwabamaraho;
na Sitaane, owaababeihabeihire, yaanagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, ahu enyamaishwa na nabi ow'ebishuba baabaire bari. Baryabonabonesibwa nyomushana na nyekiro ebiro n'ebiro.

Naareeba abafu, abakuru n'abato, beemereire omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama, ebitabo byashuuruurwa. N'ekitabo ekindi kyashuuruurwa, nikyo eky'amagara. Abafu baacwerwa emanja z'ebyahandiikirwe omu bitabo nk'ebi baakozire oku biri.
Enyanja yaagarura abafu abaabaire bagirimu, na Rufu n'Okuzimu byagarura abafu abaabaire bariyo; boona baacwerwa emanja ez'ebi baakozire.
Rufu n'Okuzimu byanagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro. Egyo nyanja y'omuriro nikwo kufa okwa kabiri.
Kandi omuntu weena, ou eiziina rye ryabaire ritahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'amagara, yaanagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro.
Kandi naareeba orurembo orurikwera Yerusaleemu orusya, nirushuuma okuruga omu iguru ahari Ruhanga, ruteekateekirwe nk'omugore ocumiirwe iba;

naahurira eiraka rihango niriruga omu kitebe ky'obukama nirigira riti: Reeba, eihema rya Ruhanga riri omu bantu. Ruhanga aryatuura nabo; baryaba abantu be, kandi We wenka aryaguma nabo, ari Ruhanga waabo;
aryaragaza amarira goona ahamaisho gaabo; tiharibaho kufa bundi, n'obu kwakuba okucura nari okurira nari obusaasi, ahakuba ebya ira biryaba bihweireho.
Yangira ati: Kyahwa. Niinye Alufa na Omega, obutandikiro n'obugarukiro. Oine eiriho ndyamuhera busha amaizi agarikuruga aha nshuro y'amaizi g'amagara.
Orikusingura aryahungura ebi, ndyaba Ruhanga we, nawe abe omwana wangye.

Kwonka abatiini, abatarikwikiriza, abakora ebihagaro, abaitsi, abashambani, abarogi, abaramya ebishushani, n'ababeihi, boona omugabo gwabo guryaba omu nyanja erikwaka omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti, nikwo kufa kwa kabiri.
Bwanyima haija omwe ahari baamaraika mushanju abaabaire baine enyabya mushanju eziijwire ebibonaboneso mushanju eby'aha mperu, yangira ati: Ija nkworekye omugore muka Omwana gw'entaama.
Yantwara aha rushozi ruhango kandi ruraingwa ndi omu Mwoyo, yaanyoreka orurembo orurikwera Yerusaalemu, nirushuuma okuruga omu iguru ahari Ruhanga,
rwine ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga; okumurinkana kwarwo nikushusha nk'okw'eibaare ry'obuguzi bwingi, eririkwetwa yasipi, eririkwengyengyeta nka
Rukaba rwine orugo ruhango kandi ruraingwa n'amarembo ikumi n'abari; aha marembo ago hariho baamaraika ikumi na babiri, kandi hahandiikirweho amaziina g'enganda ikumi na ibiri z'abaana ba Israeli.
Aha rubaju rw'oburugwa-izooba amarembo ashatu, aha bukiizi-bwa-bumohso ashatu, aha bukiizi-bwa-buryo ashatu, n'aha rubaju rw'oburengyerwa-izooba amarembo ashatu.
Kandi orugo rw'orwo rurembo rukaba rwine emisingi ikumi n'ebiri, ehandiikirweho amaziina g'entumwa ikumi na ibiri ez'Omwana gw'entaama.

Kandi orurembo rukaingaingana embaju zoona; oburaingwa bwarwo bwingana n'obukiika bwarwo; yaagaruka yaagyera orurembo n'orubango rwe, yaashanga ziri mahiro rukumi na magana ataano; oburaingwa bwarwo n'obukiika bwarwo n'obwemi bwarwo byona nibiingana.
Kandi yaagyera orugo rwarwo, yaashanga rurimu mikono igana na makumi ana n'ena omu migyerere y'abantu, nikyo kimwe n'eya maraika.
Orugo rw'orurembo rukaba rwombekirwe n'amabaare ga yasipi, haza orurembo rwo ruri orw'ezaabu nungi nirwengyengyeta nk'endeeberwamu.

Emisingi y'orugo rw'orurembo ekaba etonire n'amabaare g'emiringo yoona ag'obuguzi bwingi. Omusingi gw'okubanza gukaba gutonire yasipi, ogwa kabiri safiro, ogwa kashatu kalukedoni, ogwa kana simaragido,
ogwa kataano sarudoniksi, ogwa mukaga sarudio, ogwa mushanju krosoliito, ogwa munaana berulo, ogwa mwenda topazi, ogwa ikumi krusopuraso, ogwa ikumi na gumwe huwakinto, ogwa ikumi n'ebiri amesuusito,
Amarembo ikumi n'abiri n'eruuru ikumi na ibiri, buri irembo rikozirwe n'eruuru emwe, kandi enguuto y'orwo rurembo ekozirwe n'ezaabu nungi erikwengyengyeta nk'endeeberwamu.
Kandi omu rurembo orwo tindareebiremu hekalu, ahakuba Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona n'Omwana gw'entaama nibo hekalu yaarwo.
Orurembo orwo tirwetenga izooba nari okwezi kurwakira, ahakuba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga nigwo mushana gwarwo, kandi Omwana gw'entaama niwe tabaaza yarwo.
Amahanga garyagyendera omu mushana gwarwo, n'abagabe b'ensi baryarureetamu ekitiinisa kyabo;
amarembo gaarwo tigarikingwa nyomushana, kandi tiharibayo kiro.
Baryarureetamu ekitiinisa ky'amahanga n'okuhimbisibwa kwago.
Kwonka tiharitaahamu kintu kyona ekitashemeire, n'obu yaakuba weena okora ebihagaro nari omubeihi, kureka abo bonka abahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'amagara eky'Omwana gw'entaama.

niguraba ahagati y'enguuto y'orwo rurembo; seeri na seenu y'ogwo mugyera hariyo omuti gw'amagara ogwana ebyana by'emiringo ikumi n'ebiri, nigwana buri kwezi, kandi amababi gaagwo gari ag'okutambira amahanga.
Tiharibayo mukyeeno obundi, ekitebe kya Ruhanga eky'obukama n'eky'Omwana gw'entaama nibyo biriba omuri orwo rurembo,
baryareeba amaisho ge, n'eiziina rye riryahandiikwa aha buso bwabo.
Tiburigaruka kwira, kandi tibaryetenga kwakirwa tabaaza n'obu ryakuba eizooba, ahakuba Mukama Ruhanga aryaba omushana gwabo, kandi baryategyeka ebiro n'ebiro.
Kandi yangira ati: Ebigambo ebi n'eby'okwesiwga kandi eby'amazima. Mukama Ruhanga w'emyoyo ya baanabi akatuma maraika we kworeka abaheereza be ebishemereire kubaho juba.
Reeba, niinyija juba. Aine omugisha orikuta omutima aha bigambo by'obunabi eby'omu kitabo eki.
kwonka yangira ati: Reka! Otakikora; ndi omuheereza mugyenzi waawe n'owa beene sho baanabi, hamwe n'abo abata omutima aha bigambo by'omu kitabo eki. Ramya Ruhanga.
Kandi yangira ati: Otakoma ebigambo by'obunabi eby'omu kitabo eki n'akamanyiso, ahakuba obunaku buri haihi.
K'enkozi y'ebibi egume ebikore; osiisikaire agume ari osiisikaire; ohikiriire agume akore eby'okuhikiirira; orikwera agume ari orikwera.
Niinye Alufa na Omega, ow'okubanza kandi ow'aha muheru, obutandikiro kandi obugarukiro.
Baine omugisha abarikwozya ebijwaro byabo, ngu babone kwikirizibwa kurya aha muti gw'amagara, kandi bataahe omu rurembo nibaraba omu marembo.
Aheeru hariyo embwa, abarogi, abashambani, n'abarikuramya ebishushani, kandi n'omuntu weena okunda ebishuba akabikora.
kandi omuntu weena ku aricwa aha bigambo eby'omu kitabo ky'obunabi obu, Ruhanga aryamwaka omugabo gwe ogw'aha muti gw'amagara n'ogw'omu rurembo orurikwera, ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo eki.
Orikuhamya ebi naagira ati: Buzimazima niinyija juba. Amiina. Ija, Mukama waitu Yesu.
Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu zigume n'abarikwera boona. Amiina.
